original: śrīgaṇādhipataye namaḥ / sarasvatyainamaḥ / atha śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇaṃ prārabhyate / tatrādau karmakāṇḍākhyaḥ pūrvakhaṇḍaḥ prārabhyate / oṃ nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam / devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayamudīrayet //
analyzed: śrī gaṇādhipataye namaḥ sarasvatyai namaḥ atha śrī garuḍa mahā purāṇam prārabhyate tatra ādau karmakāṇḍa ākhyaḥ pūrva khaṇḍaḥ prārabhyate om nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam devīm sarasvatīm ca eva tatas jayam udīrayet

original: oṃ ajamajaramanantaṃ jñānarūpaṃ mahāntaṃ śivamamalamanādiṃ bhūtadehādihīnam / sakalakaraṇahīnaṃ sarvabhūtasthitaṃ taṃ harimamalamamāyaṃ sarvagaṃ vanda ekam //
analyzed: om ajam ajaram anantam jñāna rūpam mahāntam śivam amalam anādim bhūta deha ādi hīnam sakala karaṇa hīnam sarva bhūta sthitam tam harim amalam amāyam sarvagam vande ekam

original: namasyāmi hariṃ rudraṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca gaṇādhipam / devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva manovākkarmabhiḥ sadā //
analyzed: namasyāmi harim rudram brahmāṇam ca gaṇādhipam devīm sarasvatīm ca eva manaḥ vāc karmabhiḥ sadā

original: sūtaṃ paurāṇikaṃ śāntaṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradam / viṣṇubhaktaṃ mahātmānaṃ naimiśāraṇyamāgatam //
analyzed: sūtam paurāṇikam śāntam sarva śāstra viśāradam viṣṇu bhaktam mahātmānam naimiśa araṇyam āgatam

original: tīrthayātrāprasaṅgena upaviṣṭaṃ śubhāsane / dhyāyantaṃ viṣṇumanaghaṃ tamabhyarcyāstuvankavim //
analyzed: tīrtha yātrā prasaṅgena upaviṣṭam śubha āsane dhyāyantam viṣṇum anagham tam abhyarcya astuvan kavim

original: śaunakādyā mahābhāgā naimiṣīyāstapodhanāḥ / munayo ravisaṅkāśāḥ śāntā yajña parāyaṇāḥ //
analyzed: śaunaka ādyāḥ mahābhāgāḥ naimiṣīyāḥ tapodhanāḥ munayaḥ ravi saṅkāśāḥ śāntāḥ yajña parāyaṇāḥ

original: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ / sūta / jānāsi sarvaṃ tvaṃ pṛcchāmastvāmato vayam / devatānāṃ hi ko deva īśvaraḥ pūjya eva kaḥ //
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ sūta jānāsi sarvam tvam pṛcchāmaḥ tvām atas vayam devatānām hi kaḥ devaḥ īśvaraḥ pūjyaḥ eva kaḥ

original: ko dhyeyaḥ ko jagatsraṣṭā jagatpātti ca hanti kaḥ / kasmātpravartate dharmo duṣṭahantā ca kaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ dhyeyaḥ kaḥ jagat sraṣṭā jagat pātti ca hanti kaḥ kasmāt pravartate dharmaḥ duṣṭa hantā ca kaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: tasya devasya kiṃ rūpaṃ jagatsargaḥ kathaṃ mataḥ / kairvrataiḥ sa tu tuṣṭaḥ syātkena yogena vāpyate //
analyzed: tasya devasya kim rūpam jagat sargaḥ katham mataḥ kaiḥ vrataiḥ sa tu tuṣṭaḥ syāt kena yogena vā āpyate

original: avatārāśca ke tasya kathaṃ vaṃśādisambhavaḥ / varṇāśramādidharmāṇāṃ kaḥ pātā kaḥ pravartakaḥ //
analyzed: avatārāḥ ca ke tasya katham vaṃśa ādi sambhavaḥ varṇa āśrama ādi dharmāṇām kaḥ pātā kaḥ pravartakaḥ

original: etatsarvaṃ tathānyacca brūhi sūta / mahāmate / / nārāyaṇakathāḥ sarvāḥ kathayāsmākamuttamāḥ //
analyzed: etat sarvam tathā anyat ca brūhi sūta mahāmate nārāyaṇa kathāḥ sarvāḥ kathaya asmākam uttamāḥ

original: sūta uvāca / purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ vakṣye sāraṃ viṣṇukathā śrayam / garuḍoktaṃ kaśyapāya purā vyāsācchrutaṃ mayā //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca purāṇam gāruḍam vakṣye sāram viṣṇu kathā śrayam garuḍa uktam kaśyapāya purā vyāsāt śrutam mayā

original: eko nārāyaṇo devo devānāmīśvareśvaraḥ / paramātmā paraṃ brahma janmādyasya yato bhavet //
analyzed: ekaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ devānām īśvara īśvaraḥ paramātmā param brahma janma ādyasya yatas bhavet

original: jagato rakṣaṇārthāya vāsudevo 'jaro 'maraḥ / sa kumārādirūpeṇa avatārānkarotyajaḥ //
analyzed: jagataḥ rakṣaṇa arthāya vāsudevaḥ jaraḥ maraḥ sa kumāra ādi rūpeṇa avatārān karoti ajaḥ

original: hariḥ sa prathamaṃ devaḥ kaumāraṃ sargamāsthitaḥ / cacāra duścaraṃ brahman brahmacaryamakhaṇḍitam //
analyzed: hariḥ sa prathamam devaḥ kaumāram sargam āsthitaḥ cacāra duścaram brahman brahmacaryam akhaṇḍitam

original: dvitīyaṃ tu bhavāyāsya rasātalagatāṃ mahīm / uddhariṣyannupādatte yajñeśaḥ saukaraṃ vapuḥ //
analyzed: dvitīyam tu bhavāya asya rasātala gatām mahīm uddhariṣyan upādatte yajñeśaḥ saukaram vapuḥ

original: tṛtīyamṛṣisargaṃ tu devarṣitvamupetya saḥ / tantraṃ sātvatamācaṣṭe naiṣkarmyaṃ karmaṇāṃ yataḥ //
analyzed: tṛtīyam ṛṣi sargam tu devarṣi tvam upetya saḥ tantram sātvatam ācaṣṭe naiṣkarmyam karmaṇām yatas

original: naranārāyaṇo bhūtvā turye tepe tapo hariḥ / dharmasaṃ rakṣaṇārthāya pūjitaḥ sa surāsuraiḥ //
analyzed: naranārāyaṇaḥ bhūtvā turye tepe tapaḥ hariḥ dharmasam rakṣaṇa arthāya pūjitaḥ sa sura asuraiḥ

original: pañcamaḥ kapilo nāma siddheśaḥ kālaviplutam / provāca sūraye sāṅkhyaṃ tattvagrāmavi nirṇayam //
analyzed: pañcamaḥ kapilaḥ nāma siddha īśaḥ kāla viplutam provāca sūraye sāṅkhyam nirṇayam

original: ṣaṣṭhamatrerapatyatvaṃ dattaḥ prāpto 'nasūyayā / ānvīkṣikīmalarkāya prahlādādibhya ūcivān //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭham atreḥ apatya tvam dattaḥ prāptaḥ nasūyayā ānvīkṣikīm alarkāya prahlāda ādibhyaḥ ūcivān

original: tataḥ sapta ākūtyāṃ ruceryajño 'bhyajāyata / sutrāmādyaiḥ suragaṇairyaṣṭvā svāyambhuvāntare //
analyzed: tatas sapta ākūtyām ruceḥ yajñaḥ bhyajāyata sutrāma ādyaiḥ sura gaṇaiḥ yaṣṭvā svāyambhuva antare

original: aṣṭame merudevyāṃ tu nābherjāta urukramaḥ / darśayanvartma nārīṇāṃ sarvāśramanamaskṛtam //
analyzed: aṣṭame merudevyām tu nābheḥ jātaḥ uru kramaḥ darśayan vartma nārīṇām sarva āśrama namaskṛtam

original: ṛṣibhiryācito bheje navamaṃ pārthivaṃ vapuḥ / dugdhairmahauṣadhairviprāstena saṃjīvitāḥ prajāḥ //
analyzed: ṛṣibhiḥ yācitaḥ bheje navamam pārthivam vapuḥ dugdhaiḥ mahauṣadhaiḥ viprāḥ tena saṃjīvitāḥ prajāḥ

original: rūpaṃ sa jagṛhe mātsyaṃ cākṣuṣāntarasaṃplave / nāvyāropya mahīmayyāmapādvaivasvataṃ manum //
analyzed: rūpam sa jagṛhe mātsyam cākṣuṣa antara saṃplave nāvi āropya mahīmayyām apāt vaivasvatam manum

original: surāsurāṇāmudadhiṃ mathnatāṃ mandarācalam / dadhre kamaṭharūpeṇa pṛṣṭha ekādaśe vibhuḥ //
analyzed: sura asurāṇām udadhim mathnatām mandara acalam  dadhre kamaṭha rūpeṇa pṛṣṭhe ekādaśe vibhuḥ

original: dhānvantaraṃ dvādaśamaṃ trayodaśamameva ca / āpyāyatsurānanyānmohinyā mohayaṃstriyā //
analyzed: dhānvantaram dvādaśamam trayodaśamam eva ca  āpyāyat surān anyān mohinyā mohayan striyā

original: caturdaśaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ caitya (vaira)
analyzed: caturdaśam nārasiṃham caitya vaira

original: daityendramūrjitam / dadāra karajairugrairerakāṃ kaṭakudyathā //
analyzed: daitya indram ūrjitam dadāra karajaiḥ ugraiḥ erakām

original: pañcadaśaṃ vāmanako bhūtvāgādadhvaraṃ baleḥ / pāda trayaṃ yācamānaḥ pratyāditsustriviṣṭapam //
analyzed: pañcadaśam vāmanakaḥ bhūtvā agāt adhvaram baleḥ pāda trayam yācamānaḥ pratyāditsuḥ triviṣṭapam

original: avatāre ṣoḍaśame paśyanbrahmadruho nṛpān / triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ kupito niḥ kṣattrāmakaronmahīm //
analyzed: avatāre ṣoḍaśame paśyan brahma druhaḥ nṛpān tris sapta kṛtvas kupitaḥ niḥ kṣattrām akarot mahīm

original: tataḥ saptadaśe jātaḥ satyavatyāṃ parāśarāt / cakre vedataroḥ śākhāṃ dṛṣṭvā puṃso 'lpamedhasaḥ //
analyzed: tatas saptadaśe jātaḥ satyavatyām parāśarāt  cakre veda taroḥ śākhām dṛṣṭvā puṃsaḥ lpa medhasaḥ

original: naradevatvamāpannaḥ surakāryacikīrṣayā / samudranigrahādīni cakre kāryāṇyataḥ param //
analyzed: naradeva tvam āpannaḥ sura kārya cikīrṣayā samudra nigraha ādīni cakre kāryāṇi atas param

original: ekonaviṃśe viṃśatime vṛṣṇiṣu prāpya janmanī / rāmakṛṣṇāviti bhuvo bhagavānaharadbharam //
analyzed: ekonaviṃśe viṃśatime vṛṣṇiṣu prāpya janmanī rāma kṛṣṇau iti bhuvaḥ bhagavān aharat bharam

original: tataḥ kalestu sandhyānte saṃmohāya suradviṣām / buddho nāmrā jinasutaḥ kīkaṭeṣu bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: tatas kaleḥ tu sandhyā ante saṃmohāya suradviṣām buddhaḥ nāmrā jinasutaḥ kīkaṭeṣu bhaviṣyati

original: atha so 'ṣṭamasandhyāyāṃ naṣṭaprāyeṣu rāñjasu / bhavitā viṣṇuyaśaso nāmnā kalkī jagatpatiḥ //
analyzed: atha saḥ ṣṭama sandhyāyām naṣṭa prāyeṣu bhavitā viṣṇuyaśasaḥ nāmnā kalkī jagatpatiḥ

original: avatārā hyasaṃkhyeyā hareḥ sattvanidherdvijāḥ / manuvedavido hyādyāḥ sarve viṣṇukalāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: avatārāḥ hi asaṃkhyeyāḥ hareḥ sattva nidheḥ dvijāḥ manu veda vidaḥ hi ādyāḥ sarve viṣṇu kalāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: tasmātsargādayo jātāḥ saṃpūjyāśca vratādinā / purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ vyāsaḥ purāsau me 'bravīdidam //
analyzed: tasmāt sarga ādayaḥ jātāḥ saṃpūjyāḥ ca vrata ādinā purāṇam gāruḍam vyāsaḥ purā asau me bravīt idam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye karmakāṇḍe etatpurāṇapravṛttihetunirūpaṇaṃ nāma prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye karmakāṇḍe etatpurāṇapravṛttihetunirūpaṇam nāma prathamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 2
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ / kathaṃ vyāsena kathitaṃ purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava / etatsarvaṃ samākhyāhi paraṃ viṣṇukathāśrayam //
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ katham vyāsena kathitam purāṇam gāruḍam tava  etat sarvam samākhyāhi param viṣṇu kathā āśrayam

original: sūta uvāca / ahaṃ hi munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ gato badarikāśramam / tatra dṛṣṭo mayā vyāso dhyāyamānaḥ pareśvaram //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca  aham hi munibhiḥ sārdham gataḥ badarikāśramam  tatra dṛṣṭaḥ mayā vyāsaḥ dhyāyamānaḥ para īśvaram

original: taṃ praṇamyopaviṣṭo 'haṃ pṛṣṭavānhi munīśvaram / sūta uvāca / vyāsa brūhi hare rūpaṃ jagatsargādikaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: tam praṇamya upaviṣṭaḥ ham pṛṣṭavān hi muni īśvaram  sūtaḥ uvāca  vyāsa brūhi hareḥ rūpam jagat sarga ādikam tatas

original: manye dhyāyasi taṃ yasmāttasmājjānāsi taṃ vibhum / evaṃ pṛṣṭo yathā prāha tathā viprā?
analyzed: manye dhyāyasi tam yasmāt tasmāt jānāsi tam vibhum  evam pṛṣṭaḥ yathā prāha tathā viprāḥ

original: nibodhata //
analyzed: nibodhata

original: vyāsa uvāca / śṛṇu sūta / pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava / saha nāradadakṣādyairbrahmā māmuktavānyathā //
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca śṛṇu sūta pravakṣyāmi purāṇam gāruḍam tava saha nārada dakṣa ādyaiḥ brahmā mām uktavān yathā

original: sūta uvāca / dakṣanāradamukhyaistu yuktaṃ tvāṃ kathamuktavān / brahmā śrīgāruḍaṃ puṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ sāravācakam //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca dakṣa nārada mukhyaiḥ tu yuktam tvām katham uktavān brahmā śrī gāruḍam puṇyam purāṇam sāra vācakam

original: vyāsa uvāca / ahaṃ hi nārado dakṣo bhṛgvādyāḥ praṇipatya tam / sāraṃ brūhīti papracchurbrahmāṇaṃ brahmalokagam //
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca  aham hi nāradaḥ dakṣaḥ bhṛgu ādyāḥ praṇipatya tam sāram brūhi iti papracchuḥ brahmāṇam brahma loka gam

original: brahmovāca / purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ sāraṃ rudraṃ ca māṃ yathā / suraiḥ sahābravīdviṣṇustathāhaṃ vyāsa vacmite //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca purāṇam gāruḍam sāram rudram ca mām yathā suraiḥ saha abravīt viṣṇuḥ tathā aham vyāsa vacmi te

original: vyāsa uvāca / kathaṃ rudraṃ suraiḥ sārdhamabravīdvai hariḥ purā / purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ sāraṃ brūhi brahmanmahārthakam //
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca katham rudram suraiḥ sārdham abravīt vai hariḥ purā purāṇam gāruḍam sāram brūhi brahman mahā arthakam

original: brahmovāca / ahaṃ gato 'driṃ kailāsamindrādyairdaivataiḥ saha / tatra dṛṣṭo mayā rudro dhyāyamānaḥ paraṃ padam //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca  aham gataḥ drim kailāsam indra ādyaiḥ daivataiḥ saha  tatra dṛṣṭaḥ mayā rudraḥ dhyāyamānaḥ param padam

original: pṛṣṭo namaskṛtaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ devaṃ dhyāyasi śaṅkara? / tvatto nānyaṃ paraṃ devaṃ jānāmi brūhi māṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: pṛṣṭaḥ namaskṛtaḥ kim tvam devam dhyāyasi śaṅkara  tvattaḥ na anyam param devam jānāmi brūhi mām tatas

original: sārātsārataraṃ tattvaṃ śrotukāmaḥ suraiḥ saha / rudrauvāca / ahaṃ dhyāyāmi taṃ viṣṇuṃ paramātmānamīśvaram //
analyzed: sārāt sārataram tattvam śrotu kāmaḥ suraiḥ saha  rudraḥ uvāca aham dhyāyāmi tam viṣṇum paramātmānam īśvaram

original: sarvadaṃ sarvagaṃ sarvaṃ sarvaprāṇihṛdisthitam / bhasmoddhūlitadehastu jaṭāmaṇḍalamaṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: sarva dam sarva gam sarvam sarva prāṇi hṛdisthitam bhasma uddhūlita dehaḥ tu jaṭā maṇḍala maṇḍitaḥ

original: viṣṇorārādhanārthaṃ me vratacaryā pitāmaha / tameva gatvā pṛcchāmaḥ sāraṃ yaṃ cintayāmyaham //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ ārādhana artham me vrata caryā pitāmaha tam eva gatvā pṛcchāmaḥ sāram yam cintayāmi aham

original: viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ padmanābhaṃ hariṃ dehavivarjitam / śuciṃ śuciṣadaṃ haṃsaṃ tatpadaṃ parameśvaram //
analyzed: viṣṇum jiṣṇum padmanābham harim deha vivarjitam śucim śuciṣadam haṃsam tad padam parameśvaram

original: yuktā sarvātmanātmānaṃ taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham / yasminviśvāni bhūtāni tiṣṭhanti ca viśanti ca //
analyzed: yuktā sarva ātmanā ātmānam tam devam cintayāmi aham yasmin viśvāni bhūtāni tiṣṭhanti ca viśanti ca

original: guṇabhūtāni bhūteśe sūtre maṇigaṇā iva / sahasrākṣaṃ sahasrāṅghriṃ sahasroruṃ varānanam //
analyzed: guṇa bhūtāni bhūteśe sūtre maṇi gaṇāḥ iva sahasra akṣam sahasra aṅghrim sahasra ūrum vara ānanam

original: aṇīyasāmaṇīyāṃsaṃ sthaviṣṭhaṃ ca sthavīyasām / garīyasāṃ gariṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca śreyasāmapi //
analyzed: aṇīyasām aṇīyāṃsam sthaviṣṭham ca sthavīyasām garīyasām gariṣṭham ca śreṣṭham ca śreyasām api

original: yaṃ vākyeṣvanuvākyeṣu niṣatsūpaniṣatsu ca / gṛṇanti satyakarmāṇaṃ satyaṃ satyeṣu sāmasu //
analyzed: yam vākyeṣu anuvākyeṣu ca gṛṇanti satya karmāṇam satyam satyeṣu sāmasu

original: purāṇa puruṣaḥ prokto brahmā prokto dvijātiṣu / kṣaye saṅkarṣaṇaḥ proktastamupāsyamupāsmahe //
analyzed: purāṇa puruṣaḥ proktaḥ brahmā proktaḥ dvijātiṣu kṣaye saṅkarṣaṇaḥ proktaḥ tam upāsyam upāsmahe

original: yasmiṃllokāḥ sphurantīme jale śakunayo yathā / ṛtamekākṣaraṃ brahma yattatsadasataḥ param //
analyzed: yasmin lokāḥ sphuranti ime jale śakunayaḥ yathā ṛtam eka akṣaram brahma yat tat sat asataḥ param

original: arcayanti ca yaṃ devā yakṣarākṣasapannagāḥ / yasyāgnirāsyaṃ dyaurmūrdhā khaṃ nābhiścaraṇau kṣitiḥ //
analyzed: arcayanti ca yam devāḥ yakṣa rākṣasa pannagāḥ  yasya agniḥ āsyam dyauḥ mūrdhā kham nābhiḥ caraṇau kṣitiḥ

original: candrādityau ca nayane taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham / yasya trilokī jaṭhare masya kāṣṭhāśca bāhavaḥ //
analyzed: candra ādityau ca nayane tam devam cintayāmi aham yasya trilokī jaṭhare kāṣṭhāḥ ca bāhavaḥ

original: yasyocchvāsaśca pavanaḥ taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham / yasya keśeṣu jīmūtā nadyaḥ sarvāṅgasandhiṣu //
analyzed: yasya ucchvāsaḥ ca pavanaḥ tam devam cintayāmi aham yasya keśeṣu jīmūtāḥ nadyaḥ sarva aṅga sandhiṣu

original: kukṣau samudrāścatvārastaṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham / paraḥ kālātparo yajñātparaḥ sadasataścayaḥ //
analyzed: kukṣau samudrāḥ catvāraḥ tam devam cintayāmi aham paraḥ kālāt paraḥ yajñāt paraḥ sat asataḥ cayaḥ

original: anādirādi rviśvasya taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham / manasaścandramā yasya cakṣuṣośca divākaraḥ //
analyzed: anādiḥ ādiḥ viśvasya tam devam cintayāmi aham manasaḥ candramāḥ yasya cakṣuṣoḥ ca divākaraḥ

original: mukhādagniśca saṃjajñe taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham / padybhāṃ yasya kṣitirjātā śrotrābhyāṃ ca tathā diśaḥ //
analyzed: mukhāt agniḥ ca saṃjajñe tam devam cintayāmi aham padi bhām yasya kṣitiḥ jātā śrotrābhyām ca tathā diśaḥ

original: mūrdhabhāgāddivaṃ yasya taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham / sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca //
analyzed: mūrdha bhāgāt divam yasya tam devam cintayāmi aham sargaḥ ca pratisargaḥ ca vaṃśaḥ manvantarāṇi ca

original: vaṃśānucaritaṃ yasmāttaṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham / yaṃ dhyāyāmyahametasmādūjāmaḥ sāramīkṣitum //
analyzed: vaṃśānucaritam yasmāt tam devam cintayāmi aham yam dhyāyāmi aham etasmāt ūjāmaḥ sāram īkṣitum

original: brahmovāca / ityukto 'haṃ purā rudraḥ śvetadvīpanivāsinam / stutvā praṇamya taṃ viṣṇuṃ śrotukāma sthitaḥ suraiḥ //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca iti uktaḥ ham purā rudraḥ śvetadvīpa nivāsinam stutvā praṇamya tam viṣṇum śrotu kāma sthitaḥ suraiḥ

original: asmākaṃ madhyato rudra uvāca parameśvaram / sārāntsārataraṃ viṣṇuṃ pṛṣṭavāṃstaṃ praṇamya vai //
analyzed: asmākam madhyatas rudraḥ uvāca parameśvaram sārān sārataram viṣṇum pṛṣṭavān tam praṇamya vai

original: brahmovāca / yathā papraccha māṃ vyāsa stathāsau bhagavān bhavaḥ / papraccha viṣṇuṃ devādyaiḥ śṛṇvatāmamaraiḥ saha //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca yathā papraccha mām vyāsaḥ stathā asau bhagavān bhavaḥ papraccha viṣṇum deva ādyaiḥ śṛṇvatām amaraiḥ saha

original: rudra uvāca / hare kathaya deveśa / devadevaḥ ka īśvaraḥ / ko dhyeyaḥ kaśca vai pūjyaḥ kairvratai stuṣyate paraḥ //
analyzed: rudraḥ uvāca hare kathaya deveśa devadevaḥ kaḥ īśvaraḥ kaḥ dhyeyaḥ kaḥ ca vai pūjyaḥ kaiḥ vrataiḥ stuṣyate paraḥ

original: kairdharmaiḥ kaiśca niyamaiḥ kayā vā dharmapūjayā / kenācāreṇa tuṣṭaḥ syātkiṃ tadrūpaṃ ca tasya vai //
analyzed: kaiḥ dharmaiḥ kaiḥ ca niyamaiḥ kayā vā dharma pūjayā kena ācāreṇa tuṣṭaḥ syāt kim tad rūpam ca tasya vai

original: kasmāddevājjagajjātaṃ jagatpālayate cakaḥ / kīdṛśairavatāraiśca kasminyāti layaṃ jagat //
analyzed: kasmāt devāt jagat jātam jagat pālayate cakaḥ kīdṛśaiḥ avatāraiḥ ca kasmin yāti layam jagat

original: sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca / kasmāddevātpravartante kasmimannetatpratiṣṭhitam //
analyzed: sargaḥ ca pratisargaḥ ca vaṃśaḥ manvantarāṇi ca  kasmāt devāt pravartante kasmiman etat pratiṣṭhitam

original: etatsarvaṃ hare / brūhi yaccānyadapi kiñcana / parameśvaramāhātmyaṃ yuktayogādikaṃ tathā //
analyzed: etat sarvam hare brūhi yat ca anyat api kiñcana parameśvara māhātmyam yukta yoga ādikam tathā

original: tathāṣṭādaśa vidyāśca harī rudraṃ tato 'bravīt / hariruvāca / śṛṇu rudra / pravakṣyāmi brahmaṇā ca suraiḥ saha //
analyzed: tathā aṣṭādaśa vidyāḥ ca hariḥ rudram tatas bravīt hariḥ uvāca śṛṇu rudra pravakṣyāmi brahmaṇā ca suraiḥ saha

original: ahaṃ hi devo devānāṃ sarvalokeśvareśvaraḥ / ahaṃ dhyeyaśca pūjyaśca stutyohaṃ statibhiḥ suraiḥ //
analyzed: aham hi devaḥ devānām sarva loka īśvara īśvaraḥ aham dhyeyaḥ ca pūjyaḥ ca stutyaḥ ham statibhiḥ suraiḥ

original: ahaṃ hi pūjito rudra / dadāmi paramāṃ gatim / niyamaiśca vrataistuṣṭa ācāreṇa ca mānavaiḥ //
analyzed: aham hi pūjitaḥ rudra dadāmi paramām gatim niyamaiḥ ca vrataiḥ tuṣṭaḥ ācāreṇa ca mānavaiḥ

original: jagatsthiterahaṃ bījaṃ jagatkartā tvahaṃ śiva / / duṣṭanigrahakartā hi dharmagoptā tvahaṃ hara / //
analyzed: jagat sthiteḥ aham bījam jagat kartā tu aham śiva   duṣṭa nigraha kartā hi dharma goptā tu aham hara  /

original: avatāraiśca matsyādyaiḥ pālayāmyakhilaṃ jagat / ahaṃ mantrāśca mantrārthaḥ pūjādhyānaparo hyaham //
analyzed: avatāraiḥ ca matsya ādyaiḥ pālayāmi akhilam jagat  aham mantrāḥ ca mantra arthaḥ pūjā dhyāna paraḥ hi aham

original: svargādīnāṃ ca kartāhaṃ svargādīnyahameva ca / yogī yogohamevādyaḥ purāṇānyahamevaca //
analyzed: svarga ādīnām ca kartā aham svarga ādīni aham eva ca yogī yogaḥ uham eva ādyaḥ purāṇāni aham eva ca

original: jñātā śrotā tathā mantā vaktā vaktavyameva ca / sarvaḥ sarvātmako devo bhuktimuktikaraḥ paraḥ //
analyzed: jñātā śrotā tathā mantā vaktā vaktavyam eva ca sarvaḥ sarva ātmakaḥ devaḥ bhukti mukti karaḥ paraḥ

original: dhyānaṃ pūjopahāro 'haṃ maṇḍalānyahameva ca / itihāsānyahaṃ rudra / sarvavedā hyahaṃ śiva / //
analyzed: dhyānam pūjā upahāraḥ haṃ maṇḍalāni aham eva ca itihāsāni aham rudra sarva vedāḥ hi aham śiva

original: sarvajñānānyahaṃ śambho / brahmātmāhamahaṃ śiva / / ahaṃ brahmā sarvalokaḥ sarvadevātmako hyaham //
analyzed: sarva jñānāni aham śambho brahma ātmā aham aham śiva   aham brahmā sarva lokaḥ sarva deva ātmakaḥ hi aham

original: ahaṃ sākṣātsadācāro dharmo 'haṃ vaiṣṇavo hyaham / varṇāśramāstathā cāhaṃ taddharmo 'haṃ purātanaḥ //
analyzed: aham sākṣāt sat ācāraḥ dharmaḥ ham vaiṣṇavaḥ hi aham varṇa āśramāḥ tathā ca aham tad dharmaḥ ham purātanaḥ

original: yamo 'haṃ niyamo rudra / vratāni vividhāni ca / ahaṃ sūryastathā candro maṅgalādīnyahaṃ tathā //
analyzed: yamaḥ ham niyamaḥ rudra vratāni vividhāni ca  aham sūryaḥ tathā candraḥ maṅgala ādīni aham tathā

original: purā māṃ garuḍaḥ pakṣī tapasārādhayadbhuvi / tuṣṭa ūce varaṃ brūhi matto vavre varaṃ sa tu //
analyzed: purā mām garuḍaḥ pakṣī tapasā ārādhayat bhuvi tuṣṭaḥ ūce varam brūhi mattaḥ vavre varam sa tu

original: garuḍa uvāca / mama mātā ca vinatā nāgairdāsīkṛtā hare / yathāhaṃ deva tāñjitvā cāmṛtaṃ hyānayāmi tat //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca  mama mātā ca vinatā nāgaiḥ dāsīkṛtā hare  yathā aham deva tān jitvā ca amṛtam hi ānayāmi tat

original: dāsyādvimokṣayiṣyāmi yathāhaṃ vāhanastava / mahābalo mahāvīryaḥ sarvajño nāgadāraṇaḥ //
analyzed: dāsyāt vimokṣayiṣyāmi yathā aham vāhanaḥ tava mahā balaḥ mahā vīryaḥ sarvajñaḥ nāga dāraṇaḥ

original: purāṇasaṃhitākartā yathāhaṃ syāṃ tathā kuruṃ / viṣṇuruvāca / yathā tvayoktaṃ garuḍa tathā sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: purāṇa saṃhitā kartā yathā aham syām tathā kurum viṣṇuḥ uvāca yathā tvayā uktam garuḍa tathā sarvam bhaviṣyati

original: nāgadāsyānmātaraṃ tvaṃ vinatāṃ mokṣayiṣyasi / devādīnsakalāñjitvā cāmṛtaṃ hyānayiṣyasi //
analyzed: nāga dāsyāt mātaram tvam vinatām mokṣayiṣyasi deva ādīn sakalān jitvā ca amṛtam hi ānayiṣyasi

original: mahābalo vāhanastvaṃ bhaviṣyasi viṣārdanaḥ / purāṇaṃ matprasādācca mama māhātmyavācakam //
analyzed: mahā balaḥ vāhanaḥ tvam bhaviṣyasi viṣa ardanaḥ purāṇam mad prasādāt ca mama māhātmya vācakam

original: yaduktaṃ matsvarūpaṃ ca tava cāvirbhaviṣyati / gāruḍaṃ tava nāmnā talloke khyātiṃ gamiṣyati //
analyzed: yat uktam mad sva rūpam ca tava ca āvirbhaviṣyati gāruḍam tava nāmnā tat loke khyātim gamiṣyati

original: yathāhaṃ devadevānāṃ śrīḥ khyāto vinatāsuta / tathā khyātiṃ purāṇeṣu gāruḍaṃ gāruḍaiṣyati //
analyzed: yathā aham devadevānām śrīḥ khyātaḥ vinatā suta tathā khyātim purāṇeṣu gāruḍam gāruḍa eṣyati

original: yathāhaṃ kīrtanīyo 'tha tathā tvaṃ garuḍātmanā / māṃ dhyātvā pakṣimukhyedaṃ purāṇaṃ gada gāruḍam //
analyzed: yathā aham tathā tvam garuḍa ātmanā mām dhyātvā pakṣi mukhya idam purāṇam gada gāruḍam

original: ityukto garuḍo rudra / kaśyapāyāha pṛcchate / kaśyapo gāruḍaṃ śrutvā vṛkṣaṃ dagdhamajīvayat //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ garuḍaḥ rudra kaśyapāya āha pṛcchate kaśyapaḥ gāruḍam śrutvā vṛkṣam dagdham ajīvayat

original: svayaṃ cānyamanā bhūtvā vidyayānyānya jīvayat / yakṣi oṃuṃsvāhājāpī vidyayaṃ gāruḍī parā / garuḍoktaṃ gāruḍaṃ hi śṛṇu rudra / madātmakam //
analyzed: svayam ca anya manāḥ bhūtvā yakṣi om uṃ svāhā jāpī gāruḍī parā garuḍa uktam gāruḍam hi śṛṇu rudra mad ātmakam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇotpattinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇotpattinirūpaṇam nāma dvitīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 3
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / iti rudrābjajo viṣṇoḥ śuśrāva brahmaṇo muniḥ / vyāso vyāsādahaṃ vakṣyehaṃ te śaunaka naimiṣe //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca iti rudra abjajaḥ viṣṇoḥ śuśrāva brahmaṇaḥ muniḥ vyāsaḥ vyāsāt aham vakṣye iham te śaunaka naimiṣe

original: munīnāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ madhye sargādyaṃ devapūjanam / tīrthaṃ bhuvanakośaṃ ca manvantaramihocyate //
analyzed: munīnām śṛṇvatām madhye sarga ādyam deva pūjanam tīrtham bhuvana kośam ca manvantaram iha ucyate

original: varṇāśramādidharmāśca dānarājādidharmakāḥ / vyavahāro vrataṃ vaṃśā vaidyakaṃ sanidānakam //
analyzed: varṇa āśrama ādi dharmāḥ ca dāna rāja ādi dharmakāḥ vyavahāraḥ vratam vaṃśāḥ vaidyakam sa nidānakam

original: aṅgāni pralayo dharmakāmārthajñānamuttamam / saprapañcaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ kṛtaṃ viṣṇornigadyate //
analyzed: aṅgāni pralayaḥ dharma kāma artha jñānam uttamam sa prapañcam niṣprapañcam kṛtam viṣṇoḥ nigadyate

original: purāṇe gāruḍe sarvaṃ garuḍo bhagavānatha / vāsudevaprasādena sāmarthyātiśayairyutaḥ //
analyzed: purāṇe gāruḍe sarvam garuḍaḥ bhagavān atha vāsudeva prasādena sāmarthya atiśayaiḥ yutaḥ

original: bhutvā harervāhanaṃ ca sargādīnāṃ ca kāraṇam / devānvijitya garuḍo hyamṛtāharaṇaṃ tathā //
analyzed: bhutvā hareḥ vāhanam ca sarga ādīnām ca kāraṇam devān vijitya garuḍaḥ hi amṛtā haraṇam tathā

original: cakre kṣudhā hṛtaṃ yasya brahmāṇḍamudare hareḥ / yaṃ dṛṣṭvā smṛtamātreṇa nāgāndīnāṃ ca saṃkṣayaḥ //
analyzed: cakre kṣudhā hṛtam yasya brahmāṇḍam udare hareḥ  yam dṛṣṭvā smṛta mātreṇa nāgāndīnām ca saṃkṣayaḥ

original: kaśyapo gāruḍādvṛkṣaṃ dagdhaṃ cājīvayadyataḥ / garuḍaḥ sa haristena proktaṃ śrīkaśyapāya ca //
analyzed: kaśyapaḥ gāruḍāt vṛkṣam dagdham ca ajīvayat yatas garuḍaḥ sa hariḥ tena proktam śrī kaśyapāya ca

original: tacchrīmadrāruḍaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvadaṃ paṭhatastava / vakṣye vyāsaṃ namaskṛtya śṛṇu śaunaka tadyathā //
analyzed: tat śrīmat rāruḍam puṇyam sarva dam paṭhataḥ tava vakṣye vyāsam namaskṛtya śṛṇu śaunaka tat yathā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣayanirūpaṇaṃ nāma tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣayanirūpaṇam nāma tṛtīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 4
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: rudra uvāca / sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca / vaṃśānucaritaṃ caiva etad brūhi janārdana //
analyzed: rudraḥ uvāca sargaḥ ca pratisargaḥ ca vaṃśaḥ manvantarāṇi ca vaṃśānucaritam ca eva etat brūhi janārdana

original: hariruvāca / śṛṇu rudra pravakṣyāmi sargādīnpāpanāśanām / sargasthitilayāntāṃ tāṃ viṣṇoḥ krīḍāṃ purātanīm //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca  śṛṇu rudra pravakṣyāmi sarga ādīn pāpa nāśanām sarga sthiti laya antām tām viṣṇoḥ krīḍām purātanīm

original: naranārāyaṇo devo vāsudevo nirañjanaḥ / paramātmā paraṃ brahma jagajjanilayādikṛt //
tadetatsarvamevaitavdyaktāvyaktasvarūpavat / tathā puruṣarūpeṇa kālarūpeṇa ca sthitam //
analyzed: tat etat sarvam eva etat dyakta avyakta sva rūpavat tathā puruṣa rūpeṇa kāla rūpeṇa ca sthitam

original: vyaktaṃ viṣṇustathāvyaktaṃ puruṣaḥ kāla eva ca / krīḍato bālakasyeva ceṣṭāstasya niśāmaya //
analyzed: vyaktam viṣṇuḥ tathā avyaktam puruṣaḥ kālaḥ eva ca krīḍataḥ bālakasya iva ceṣṭāḥ tasya niśāmaya

original: anādinidhano dhātā tvanantaḥ puruṣottamaḥ / tasmādbhavati cāvyaktaṃ tasmādātmāpi jāyate //
analyzed: anādinidhanaḥ dhātā tu anantaḥ puruṣottamaḥ tasmāt bhavati ca avyaktam tasmāt ātmā api jāyate

original: tasmāhuddhirmanastasmāttataḥ khaṃ pavana stataḥ / tasmāttejastatastvāpastato bhūmistato 'bhavat //
analyzed: tasmāt āhuddhiḥ manaḥ tasmāt tatas kham pavanaḥ statas tasmāt tejaḥ tatas tu āpaḥ tatas bhūmiḥ tatas bhavat

original: aṇḍo hiraṇmayo rudra tasyāntaḥ svayameva hi / śarīragrahaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭyarthaṃ kurute prabhuḥ //
analyzed: aṇḍaḥ hiraṇmayaḥ rudra tasya antar svayam eva hi śarīra grahaṇam pūrvam sṛṣṭi artham kurute prabhuḥ

original: brahmā caturmukho bhūtvā rajomātrādhikaḥ sadā / śarīragrahaṇaṃ kṛtvāsṛjadetaccarācaram //
analyzed: brahmā catur mukhaḥ bhūtvā rajaḥ mātra adhikaḥ sadā śarīra grahaṇam kṛtvā asṛjat etat carācaram

original: aṇḍasyāntarjagatsarvaṃ sadevāsuramānuṣam / sraṣṭā sṛjati cātmānaṃ viṣṇuḥ pālyaṃ ca pāti ca //
analyzed: aṇḍasya antar jagat sarvam sa deva asura mānuṣam sraṣṭā sṛjati ca ātmānam viṣṇuḥ pālyam ca pāti ca

original: apasaṃhriyate cānte saṃhartā ca svayaṃ hara / brahmā bhūtvāsṛjadviṣṇurjagatpāti hariḥ svayam //
analyzed: apasaṃhriyate ca ante saṃhartā ca svayam hara brahmā bhūtvā sṛjat viṣṇuḥ jagat pāti hariḥ svayam

original: rudrarūpī ca kalpānte jagatsaṃharate 'khilam / brahmā tu sṛṣṭikāle 'smiñjamadhyagatāṃ mahīm //
analyzed: rudra rūpī ca kalpa ante jagat saṃharate khilam brahmā tu sṛṣṭi kāle mahīm

original: daṃṣṭūyoddharati jñātvā vārahīmāsthitastanūm / devādisargānvakṣye 'haṃ saṃkṣepācchṛṇu śaṅkara / //
analyzed: daṃṣṭūya uddharati jñātvā vāra hīm āsthitaḥ tanūm  deva ādi sargān vakṣye haṃ saṃkṣepāt śṛṇu śaṅkara

original: (1)prathamo mahataḥ sargo virūpo brahmaṇastu saḥ / (2) nanmātrāṇāṃ dvitīyastu bhūtasargo hi sa smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: mahataḥ sargaḥ virūpaḥ brahmaṇaḥ tu saḥ   nanmātrāṇām dvitīyaḥ tu bhūta sargaḥ hi sa smṛtaḥ

original: (3)vaikārikastṛtīyastu sargastvaindriyakaḥ smṛtaḥ / ityeṣa prākṛtaḥ sargaḥ sambhūto buddhipūrvakaḥ //
analyzed: sargaḥ tu aindriyakaḥ smṛtaḥ iti eṣa prākṛtaḥ sargaḥ sambhūtaḥ buddhi pūrvakaḥ

original: (4)mukhyasargaścaturthastu mukhyā vai sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ / (5)tiryaksrotāstu yaḥ proktastiryagyonyaḥ sa ucyate //
analyzed: mukhyāḥ vai sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ   yaḥ proktaḥ tiryagyonyaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: (6) tadūrdhvastotasāṃ ṣaṣṭho devasargastu sa smṛtaḥ / (7) tator'vāksrotasāṃ sargaḥ saptamaḥ sa tu mā nuṣaḥ //
analyzed: tat ūrdhvastotasām ṣaṣṭhaḥ deva sargaḥ tu sa smṛtaḥ   tatas ṛvāksrotasām sargaḥ saptamaḥ sa tu mā

original: (8)aṣṭamo 'nugrahaḥ sargaḥ sāttvikastāmasastu saḥ / pañcaite vaikṛtāḥ sargāḥ prākṛtāstu trayaḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: anugrahaḥ sargaḥ sāttvikaḥ tāmasaḥ tu saḥ pañca ete vaikṛtāḥ sargāḥ prākṛtāḥ tu trayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: prākṛto vaikṛtaścāpi (9)
analyzed: prākṛtaḥ vaikṛtaḥ ca api

original: kaumāro navamaḥ smṛtaḥ / sthāvarāntāḥ surādyāstu prajā rudra / caturvidhāḥ //
analyzed: kaumāraḥ navamaḥ smṛtaḥ sthāvara antāḥ sura ādyāḥ tu prajāḥ rudra caturvidhāḥ

original: brahmaṇaḥ kurvataḥ sṛṣṭiṃ jajñire mānasāḥ sutāḥ / tato devāsurapitṝnmānuṣāṃśca catuṣṭayam //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ kurvataḥ sṛṣṭim jajñire mānasāḥ sutāḥ tatas deva asura pitṝn mānuṣān ca catuṣṭayam

original: sisṛkṣurambhāṃsyetāni svamātmānamayūyujat / vyaktātmanastamomātrādudriktāstatprajāpateḥ //
analyzed: sisṛkṣuḥ ambhāṃsi etāni svam ātmānam ayūyujat  vyakta ātmanaḥ tamaḥ mātrāt udriktāḥ tat prajāpateḥ

original: sisṛkṣerjaghanātpūrvamasurā jajñire tataḥ / utsasarja tatastāṃ tu tamomātrātmikāṃ tanūm //
analyzed: sisṛkṣeḥ jaghanāt pūrvam asurāḥ jajñire tatas  utsasarja tatas tām tu tamaḥ mātra ātmikām tanūm

original: tamomātrā tanustyaktā śaṅkarābhūdvibhāvarī / yakṣopakṣāṃsi taddehe prītimāpustataḥ surāḥ //
analyzed: tamaḥ mātrā tanuḥ tyaktā śaṅkara abhūt vibhāvarī yakṣa upakṣāṃsi tad dehe prītim āpuḥ tatas surāḥ

original: sattvodriktāstu mukhataḥ saṃbhūtā brahmaṇo hara / / sattvaprāyā tanustena santyaktā sāpyabhūddinam //
analyzed: sattva udriktāḥ tu mukhataḥ saṃbhūtāḥ brahmaṇaḥ hara    sattva prāyā tanuḥ tena san tyaktā sā api abhūt dinam

original: tato hi balino rātrāvasurā devatā divā / sattvamātrāṃ tanuṃ gṛhya pitaraśca tato 'bhavan //
analyzed: tatas hi balinaḥ rātrau asurāḥ devatāḥ divā sattva mātrām tanum gṛhya pitaraḥ ca tatas bhavan

original: sā cotsṛṣṭābhavatsandhyā dinanaktāntarasthitiḥ / rajomātrāṃ tanuṃ gṛhya manuṣyāstvabhavaṃstataḥ //
analyzed: sā ca utsṛṣṭā abhavat sandhyā dina nakta antara sthitiḥ rajaḥ mātrām tanum gṛhya manuṣyāḥ tu abhavan tatas

original: sā tyaktā cābhavajjyotsnā prāksandhyā yābhidhīyate / jyotsnā rātryahanī sandhyā śarīrāṇi tu tasya vai //
analyzed: sā tyaktā ca abhavat jyotsnā prāc sandhyā yā abhidhīyate jyotsnā rātri ahanī sandhyā śarīrāṇi tu tasya vai

original: rajomātrāṃ tanu gṛhya kṣudabhūtkopa eva ca / kṣuttṛṭkṣāmā amṛgbhakṣā rākṣasā rakṣaṇācca ye //
analyzed: rajaḥ mātrām tanu gṛhya kṣudh abhūt kopaḥ eva ca kṣudh tṛṣ kṣāmāḥ rākṣasāḥ rakṣaṇāt ca ye

original: yakṣākhyā jakṣaṇājjñeyāḥ sarpā vai keśasarpaṇāt / jātāḥ kopena bhūtāste gandharvā jajñire tataḥ //
analyzed: yakṣa ākhyāḥ jakṣaṇāt jñeyāḥ sarpāḥ vai keśa sarpaṇāt jātāḥ kopena bhūtāḥ te gandharvāḥ jajñire tatas

original: gāyanto jajñire vācaṃ gandharvāpsarasaśca ye / svargaṃ dyaurvakṣasaścakre sukhato 'jāḥ sa muṣṭavān //
analyzed: gāyantaḥ jajñire vācam gandharva apsarasaḥ ca ye svargam dyauḥ vakṣasaḥ cakre sukhataḥ jāḥ sa

original: sṛṣṭavānudarādrāśca pārśvābhyāṃ ca prajāpatiḥ / padybhāṃ caivāntyamātaṅgānmahiṣoṣṭrāvikāṃstathā //
analyzed: sṛṣṭavān udarāt rāḥ ca pārśvābhyām ca prajāpatiḥ padi bhām ca eva antya mātaṅgān mahiṣa uṣṭra avikān tathā

original: opadhyaḥ phalamūlinyo romabhyastasya jajñire / gaurajaḥ puruṣo medhyo hyaśvāśvataragardabhāḥ //
analyzed: opadhyaḥ phala mūlinyaḥ romabhyaḥ tasya jajñire gauḥ ajaḥ puruṣaḥ medhyaḥ hi aśva aśvatara gardabhāḥ

original: etān grāmyānpaśūnprāhurāraṇyāṃśca nibodha me / śvāpadaṃ dvikhuraṃ hastivānarāḥ pakṣipañcamāḥ //
analyzed: etān grāmyān paśūn prāhuḥ āraṇyān ca nibodha me śvāpadam dvi khuram hasti vānarāḥ pakṣi pañcamāḥ

original: audakāḥ paśavaḥ ṣaṣṭhāḥ saptamāśca sarīsṛpāḥ / pūrvādibhyo mukhebhyastu ṛgvedādyāḥ prajajñire //
analyzed: audakāḥ paśavaḥ ṣaṣṭhāḥ saptamāḥ ca sarīsṛpāḥ pūrva ādibhyaḥ mukhebhyaḥ tu ṛgveda ādyāḥ prajajñire

original: āsyādvai brāhmaṇā jātā bāhubhyāṃ kṣattriyāḥ smṛtāḥ / ūrubhyāṃ tu viśaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ śūdraḥ padybhāma jāyata //
analyzed: āsyāt vai brāhmaṇāḥ jātāḥ bāhubhyām kṣattriyāḥ smṛtāḥ ūrubhyām tu viśaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ śūdraḥ padi bhāma jāyata

original: brahmaloko brāhmaṇānāṃ śākraḥ kṣattriyajanmanām / mārutaṃ ca viśāṃ sthānaṃ gāndharvaṃ śūdrajanmanām //
analyzed: brahma lokaḥ brāhmaṇānām śākraḥ kṣattriya janmanām mārutam ca viśām sthānam gāndharvam śūdra janmanām

original: brahmacārivratasthānāṃ brahmalokaḥ prajāyate / prājāpatyaṃ gṛhasthānāṃ yathāvihitakāriṇām //
analyzed: brahmacāri vrata sthānām brahma lokaḥ prajāyate prājāpatyam gṛhasthānām yathā vihita kāriṇām

original: sthānaṃ saptaṛṣīṇāṃ ca tathaiva vanavāsinām / yatīnāmakṣayaṃ sthānaṃ yadṛcchāgāmināṃ sadā //
analyzed: sthānam sapta ṛṣīṇām ca tathā eva vanavāsinām yatīnām akṣayam sthānam yadṛcchā gāminām sadā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sṛṣṭivarṇanaṃ nāma caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe sṛṣṭivarṇanam nāma caturthaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 5
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: iriruvāca / kṛtvehāmutrasaṃsthānaṃ prajāsargaṃ tu mānasam / athāmṛjatprajākartṝnbhānasāṃstanayānprabhuḥ //
analyzed: iriḥ uvāca kṛtvā iha amutra saṃsthānam prajā sargam tu mānasam  atha amṛjat prajā kartṝn bhānasān tanayān prabhuḥ

original: dharmaṃ rudraṃ manuṃ caiva sanakaṃ ca sanātanam / bhṛguṃ sanatkumāraṃ ca ruciṃ śraddhāṃ tathaiva ca //
analyzed: dharmam rudram manum ca eva sanakam ca sanātanam bhṛgum sanatkumāram ca rucim śraddhām tathā eva ca

original: marīcimatryaṅgirasau pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum / vasiṣṭhaṃ nāradaṃ caiva pitṝnbarhiṣadastathā //
analyzed: marīcim atri aṅgirasau pulastyam pulaham kratum  vasiṣṭham nāradam ca eva pitṝn barhiṣadaḥ tathā

original: agniṣvāttāṃśca kavyādānājyapāṃśca sukālinaḥ / upahūtāṃstathā dīpyāṃ (prā)
analyzed: agniṣvāttān ca kavya ādān ājyapān ca sukālinaḥ upahūtān tathā dīpyām prā

original: strīṃśca mūrtivivarjitān //
analyzed: strīn ca mūrti vivarjitān

original: caturo mūrtiyuktāṃśca aṅguṣṭhāddakṣamīśvaram / vāmāṃ guṣṭhāttasya bhāryāmasṛjatpadmasambhavaḥ //
analyzed: caturaḥ mūrti yuktān ca aṅguṣṭhāt dakṣam īśvaram  vāmām guṣṭhāt tasya bhāryām asṛjat padmasambhavaḥ

original: tasyāṃ tu janayāmāsa dakṣo duhitaraḥ śubhāḥ / dadau tā brahmaputrebhyaḥ satīṃ rudrāya dattavān //
analyzed: tasyām tu janayāmāsa dakṣaḥ duhitaraḥ śubhāḥ dadau tāḥ brahma putrebhyaḥ satīm rudrāya dattavān

original: rudra putrā babhūvurhi asaṃkhyātā mahābalāḥ / bhṛgave ca dadau khyātiṃ rūpeṇāpratimāṃ śubhām //
analyzed: rudra putrāḥ babhūvuḥ hi asaṃkhyātāḥ mahā balāḥ bhṛgave ca dadau khyātim rūpeṇa apratimām śubhām

original: bhṛgordhātāvidhātārau janayāmāsa sā śubhā / śriyaṃ ca janayāmāsa patnī nārāyaṇasya yā //
analyzed: bhṛgoḥ dhātāvidhātārau janayāmāsa sā śubhā śriyam ca janayāmāsa patnī nārāyaṇasya yā

original: tasyāṃ vai janayāmāsa balonmādau hariḥ svayam / āyatirniyatiścaiva manoḥ kanye mahātmanaḥ //
analyzed: tasyām vai janayāmāsa bala unmādau hariḥ svayam āyatiḥ niyatiḥ ca eva manoḥ kanye mahātmanaḥ

original: dhātāvidhātroste bhārye tayorjātau sutāvubhau / prāṇaścaiva mṛkaṇḍuśca mārkaṇḍeyo mṛkaṇḍutaḥ //
analyzed: dhātāvidhātroḥ te bhārye tayoḥ jātau sutau ubhau prāṇaḥ ca eva mṛkaṇḍuḥ ca mārkaṇḍeyaḥ mṛkaṇḍutaḥ

original: patni marīceḥ sambhūtiḥ paurṇamāsamasūyata / virajāḥ sarvagaścaiva tasya putrau mahātmanaḥ //
analyzed: patni marīceḥ sambhūtiḥ paurṇamāsam asūyata virajāḥ sarvagaḥ ca eva tasya putrau mahātmanaḥ

original: smṛteścāṃṅgirasaḥ putrāḥ prasūtāḥ kanyakāstathā / sinīvālī kuhūścaiva rākā cānumatistathā //
analyzed: smṛteḥ ca aṃṅgirasaḥ putrāḥ prasūtāḥ kanyakāḥ tathā sinīvālī kuhūḥ ca eva rākā ca anumatiḥ tathā

original: anasūyā tathaivātrerjajñe putrānakalmaṣān / somaṃ durvāsasaṃ caiva dattātreyaṃ ca yoginam //
analyzed: anasūyā tathā eva atreḥ jajñe putrān akalmaṣān somam durvāsasam ca eva dattātreyam ca yoginam

original: prītyāṃ pulastyabhāryāyāṃ dattolistatsuto 'bhavat / karṃmaśaścārthavīraśca sahiṣṇuśca sutatrayam //
analyzed: prītyām pulastya bhāryāyām dattoliḥ tad sutaḥ bhavat karṃmaśaḥ ca arthavīraḥ ca sahiṣṇuḥ ca suta trayam

original: kṣamā tu suṣuve bhāryā pulahasya prijāpateḥ / kratośca sumatirbhāryā bālakhilyānasūyata //
analyzed: kṣamā tu suṣuve bhāryā pulahasya kratoḥ ca sumatiḥ bhāryā bālakhilyā anasūyata

original: ṣaṣṭiryāni sahasrāṇi ṛṣīṇāmūrdharetasām / aṅguṣṭhaparvamātrāṇāṃ jvaladbhāskaravarcasām //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭiḥ yāni sahasrāṇi ṛṣīṇām ūrdha retasām aṅguṣṭha parva mātrāṇām jvalat bhāskara varcasām

original: ūrjāyāṃ tu vasiṣṭasya saptājāyanta vai sutāḥ / rajogātrordhabāhuśca śaraṇaścānaghastathā //
analyzed: ūrjāyām tu vasiṣṭasya sapta ajāyanta vai sutāḥ rajogātra ūrdhabāhuḥ ca śaraṇaḥ ca anaghaḥ tathā

original: sutapāḥ śukra ityete sarve saptarṣayo 'malāḥ / svāhāṃ prādātsa dakṣo 'pi śaśarīrāya vahnaye //
analyzed: sutapāḥ śukraḥ iti ete sarve sapta ṛṣayaḥ malāḥ svāhām prādāt sa dakṣaḥ u pi vahnaye

original: tasmātsvāhā sutāṃllebhe trīnudāraujaso hara / / phāvakaṃ pavamānaṃ ca śuciṃ cāpi jalāśinaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt svāhā sutān lebhe trīn udāra ojasaḥ hara

original: pitṛbhyaśca svadhā jajñe menāṃ vaitaraṇīṃ tathā / te ubhe brahmavādinyau menāyāṃ tu himācalaḥ //
analyzed: pitṛbhyaḥ ca svadhā jajñe menām vaitaraṇīm tathā te ubhe brahma vādinyau menāyām tu himācalaḥ

original: mainākaṃ janayāmāsa gaurīṃ pūrvaṃ tu yā satī / tato brahmātmasambhūtaṃ pūrvaṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ prabhuḥ //
analyzed: mainākam janayāmāsa gaurīm pūrvam tu yā satī tatas brahma ātma sambhūtam pūrvam svāyaṃbhuvam prabhuḥ

original: ātmānameva kṛtavānprajāpālyaṃ manuṃ hara / / śatarūpāṃ ca tāṃ nārīṃ taponihatakalmaṣām //
analyzed: ātmānam eva kṛtavān prajāpālyam manum hara    śatarūpām ca tām nārīm tapaḥ nihata kalmaṣām

original: svāyambhuvo manurdevaḥ patnitve jagṛhe vibhuḥ / tasmācca puruṣāddevī śatarūpā vyajāyata //
analyzed: svāyambhuvaḥ manuḥ devaḥ jagṛhe vibhuḥ tasmāt ca puruṣāt devī śatarūpā vyajāyata

original: priyavratottānapādau prasūtyākūtisaṃjñete / devahūtiṃ manustāsu ākūtiṃ rucaye dadau //
analyzed: priyavrata uttānapādau prasūti ākūti saṃjñā ite devahūtim manuḥ tāsu ākūtim rucaye dadau

original: prasūtiṃ caiva dakṣāya davahūtiṃ ca kardame / ruceryajño dakṣiṇābhūddakṣiṇāyāṃ ca yajñataḥ //
analyzed: prasūtim ca eva dakṣāya davahūtim ca kardame ruceḥ yajñaḥ dakṣiṇā abhūt dakṣiṇāyām ca yajñataḥ

original: abhavandvādaśa sutā yāmā nāma mahābalāḥ / caturvośatikanyāśca sṛṣṭavāndakṣa uttamāḥ //
analyzed: abhavan dvādaśa sutāḥ yāmāḥ nāma mahā balāḥ sṛṣṭavān dakṣaḥ uttamāḥ

original: śraddhā calā dhṛtistuṣṭiḥ puṣṭirmedhā kriyā tathā / buddhirlajjā vapuḥ śāntirṛddhiḥ kīrtistnayodaśī //
analyzed: śraddhā calā dhṛtiḥ tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ medhā kriyā tathā buddhiḥ lajjā vapuḥ śāntiḥ ṛddhiḥ kīrtiḥ tnayodaśī

original: patnyarthaṃ pratijagrāha dharmo dākṣāyaṇīprabhuḥ / khyatiḥ satyatha sambhūtiḥ smṛtiḥ prītiḥ kṣamā tathā //
analyzed: patnī artham pratijagrāha dharmaḥ dākṣāyaṇī prabhuḥ khyatiḥ satī atha sambhūtiḥ smṛtiḥ prītiḥ kṣamā tathā

original: sannatiścānasūyā ca ūrjā svāhā svadhā tathā / bhṛghurbhavo marīciśca tathā caivāṅgirā muniḥ //
analyzed: sannatiḥ ca anasūyā ca ūrjā svāhā svadhā tathā marīciḥ ca tathā ca eva aṅgirāḥ muniḥ

original: pulastyaḥ pulahaścaiva kratuścarṣivarastathā / ātrirvasiṣṭho vahniśca pitaraśca yathākramam //
analyzed: pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ ca eva kratuḥ ca ṛṣi varaḥ tathā

original: khyātyādyā jagṛhuḥ kanyā munayo munisattamāḥ / śraddhā kāmaṃ calā darpaṃ niyamaṃ dhṛtirātmajam //
analyzed: khyāti ādyāḥ jagṛhuḥ kanyāḥ munayaḥ muni sattamāḥ śraddhā kāmam calā darpam niyamam dhṛtiḥ ātmajam

original: santoṣaṃ ca tathā tuṣṭirlobhaṃ puṣṭirasūyata / medhā śrutaṃ kriyā daṇḍaṃ layaṃ vinayameva ca //
analyzed: santoṣam ca tathā tuṣṭiḥ lobham puṣṭiḥ asūyata medhā śrutam kriyā daṇḍam layam vinayam eva ca

original: bodhaṃ buddhistathā lajjā vinayaṃ vapurātmajam / vyavasāyaṃ prajajñe vai kṣemaṃ śāntirasūyata //
analyzed: bodham buddhiḥ tathā lajjā vinayam vapuḥ ātmajam vyavasāyam prajajñe vai kṣemam śāntiḥ asūyata

original: sukhamṛddhiryaśaḥ kīrtirityete dharmasūnavaḥ / kāmasya ca ratirbhāryā tatputro harṣa ucyate //
analyzed: sukham ṛddhiḥ yaśaḥ kīrtiḥ iti ete dharma sūnavaḥ kāmasya ca ratiḥ bhāryā tad putraḥ harṣaḥ ucyate

original: īje kadācidyajñena hayamedhena dakṣakaḥ / tasya jāmātaraḥ sarve yajñaṃ jagmurnimantritāḥ //
analyzed: īje kadācid yajñena hayamedhena dakṣakaḥ tasya jāmātaraḥ sarve yajñam jagmuḥ nimantritāḥ

original: bhāryabhiḥ sahitāḥ sarve rudraṃ devīṃ satīṃ vinā / anāhūtā satī prāptā dakṣeṇaivāvamānitā //
analyzed: bhāryabhiḥ sahitāḥ sarve rudram devīm satīm vinā anāhūtā satī prāptā dakṣeṇa eva avamānitā

original: tyaktā dehaṃ punarjātā menāyāṃ tu himālayāt / śambhorbhāryābhavadraurī tasyāṃ jajñe vināyakaḥ //
analyzed: tyaktā deham punar jātā menāyām tu himālayāt  śambhoḥ bhāryā bhavat raurī tasyām jajñe vināyakaḥ

original: kumāraścaiva bhṛṅgīśaḥ kruddho rudraḥ pratāpavān / vidhvaṃsya yajñaṃ dakṣaṃ tu taṃ śaśāpa pinākadhṛk / dhruvasyānvayasambhūto manuṣyastvaṃ bhaviṣyasi //
analyzed: kumāraḥ ca eva bhṛṅgīśaḥ kruddhaḥ rudraḥ pratāpavān vidhvaṃsya yajñam dakṣam tu tam śaśāpa pinākadhṛk  dhruvasya anvaya sambhūtaḥ manuṣyaḥ tvam bhaviṣyasi

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prajākartrādisṛṣṭirnāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe prajākartrādisṛṣṭiḥ nāma pañcamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 6
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / uttānapādādabhavatsurucyāmuttamaḥ sutaḥ / sunītyāṃ tu dhruvaḥ putraḥ sa lebhe sthānamuttamam //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca  uttānapādāt abhavat surucyām uttamaḥ sutaḥ sunītyām tu dhruvaḥ putraḥ sa lebhe sthānam uttamam

original: muniprasādādārādhya devadevaṃ janārdanam / dhruvasya tanayaḥ śliṣṭirmahābalaparākramaḥ //
analyzed: muni prasādāt ārādhya devadevam janārdanam  dhruvasya tanayaḥ śliṣṭiḥ mahā bala parākramaḥ

original: tasya prācīnavarhistu putrastasyāpyudāradhīḥ / divañjayastasya sutastasya putro ripuḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tasya prācīnavarhiḥ tu putraḥ tasya api udāra dhīḥ divañjayaḥ tasya sutaḥ tasya putraḥ ripuḥ smṛtaḥ

original: ripoḥ putrastathā śrīmāṃścākṣuṣaḥ kīrtito manuḥ / rurustasya sutaḥ śrīmānaṅgastasyāpi cātmajaḥ //
analyzed: ripoḥ putraḥ tathā śrīmān cākṣuṣaḥ kīrtitaḥ manuḥ ruruḥ tasya sutaḥ śrīmān aṅgaḥ tasya api ca ātmajaḥ

original: aṅgasya veṇaḥ putrastu nāstiko dharmavarjitaḥ / adharṃmakārī veṇa(na)
analyzed: aṅgasya veṇaḥ putraḥ tu nāstikaḥ dharma varjitaḥ a dharṃma kārī

original: śca munibhiśca kuśairhataḥ //
analyzed: munibhiḥ ca kuśaiḥ hataḥ

original: ūruṃ mamanthuḥ putrārthe tato 'sya tanayo 'bhavat / hrasvo 'timātraḥ kṛṣṇāṅgo niṣīdeti tato 'bruvan //
analyzed: ūrum mamanthuḥ putra arthe tatas sya tanayaḥ bhavat hrasvaḥ timātraḥ kṛṣṇa aṅgaḥ niṣīda iti tatas bruvan

original: niṣādastena vai jāto bindhyaśailanivāsakaḥ / tato 'sya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ mamanthuḥ sahasā dvijāḥ //
analyzed: niṣādaḥ tena vai jātaḥ bindhya śaila nivāsakaḥ  tatas sya dakṣiṇam pāṇim mamanthuḥ sahasā dvijāḥ

original: tasmāttasya suto jāto viṣṇormānasarūpadhṛk / puthurityevanāmā sa veṇaputro divaṃ yayau //
analyzed: tasmāt tasya sutaḥ jātaḥ viṣṇoḥ mānasa rūpadhṛk sa veṇa putraḥ divam yayau

original: dudoha pṛthivīṃ rājā prajānāṃ jīvanāya hi / antardhānaḥ pṛthoḥ putro tahavirdhānastadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: dudoha pṛthivīm rājā prajānām jīvanāya hi antardhānaḥ pṛthoḥ putraḥ tahavirdhānaḥ tad ātmajaḥ

original: prācīnavaharstetputraḥ pṛthivyāmekarāḍ babhau / upayeme samudrasya lavaṇasya sa vai sutām //
analyzed: prācīnavahaḥ te putraḥ pṛthivyām ekarāj babhau  upayeme samudrasya lavaṇasya sa vai sutām

original: tasmātsuṣāva sāmudrī daśa prācīnabarhiṣaḥ / sarve prācetasā nāma dhanurvedasya pāragāḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt suṣāva sāmudrī daśa prācīnabarhiṣaḥ sarve prācetasāḥ nāma dhanurvedasya pāragāḥ

original: apṛthagadharṃmacaraṇāste 'tapyanta mahattapaḥ / daśavarṣasahasrāṇi samudrasalileśayāḥ //
analyzed: a pṛthak a dharṃma caraṇāḥ te tapyanta mahat tapaḥ daśa varṣa sahasrāṇi samudrasalileśayāḥ

original: prajāpatitvaṃ saṃprāpya bhāryā teṣāṃ ca māriṣa / abhavaddhavaśāpena tasyāṃ dakṣo 'bhavattataḥ //
analyzed: prajāpati tvam saṃprāpya bhāryā teṣām ca māriṣa abhavat hava śāpena tasyām dakṣaḥ bhavat tatas

original: asṛjanmanasā dakṣaḥ prajāḥ pūrvaṃ caturvodhāḥ / nāvardhanta ca tāstasya apadhyātā hareṇa tu //
analyzed: asṛjat manasā dakṣaḥ prajāḥ pūrvam catur vodhāḥ  na avardhanta ca tāḥ tasya apadhyātāḥ hareṇa tu

original: maithunena tataḥ sṛṣṭiṃ kartumaicchatprajāpatiḥ / asikrīmāvahadbhāryāṃ vīraṇasya prajāpateḥ //
analyzed: maithunena tatas sṛṣṭim kartum aicchat prajāpatiḥ asikrīm āvahat bhāryām vīraṇasya prajāpateḥ

original: tasya putrasahasraṃ tu vairaṇyāṃ samapadyata / nāradoktā bhuvaścāntaṃ gatā jñātuṃ ca nāgatāḥ //
analyzed: tasya putra sahasram tu vairaṇyām samapadyata nārada uktāḥ bhuvaḥ ca antam gatāḥ jñātum ca na āgatāḥ

original: dakṣaputrasahasraṃ ca teṣu naṣṭeṣu sṛṣṭavān / śavalāśvāste 'pi gatā bhrātṝṇāṃ padavīṃ hara / //
analyzed: dakṣa putra sahasram ca teṣu naṣṭeṣu sṛṣṭavān śavalāśvāḥ te gatāḥ bhrātṝṇām padavīm hara

original: dakṣaḥ kruddhaḥ śaśāpātha nāradaṃ janma cāpsyasi / nārado hyabhavatputraḥ kaśyapasya muneḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: dakṣaḥ kruddhaḥ śaśāpa atha nāradam janma ca āpsyasi nāradaḥ hi abhavat putraḥ kaśyapasya muneḥ punar

original: yajñe dhvaste 'tha dakṣo 'pi śaśāprograṃ maheśvaram / stutvātvāmupacāraiśca pūjayiṣyanti śaṅkara //
analyzed: yajñe dhvaste śaśāpra ugram maheśvaram stutvā tvām upacāraiḥ ca pūjayiṣyanti śaṅkara

original: janmāntare 'pi vaireṇa te vinaśyanti śaṅkara / / tasmādvairaṃ na kartavyaṃ kadācidapi kenacit / asiknyāṃ (mahiṣyāṃ)
analyzed: janmāntare vaireṇa te vinaśyanti śaṅkara   tasmāt vairam na kartavyam kadācid api kenacid asiknyām mahiṣyām

original: janayāmāsa dakṣo duhitaro hyatha //
analyzed: janayāmāsa dakṣaḥ duhitaraḥ hi atha

original: ṣaṣṭiṃ kanyā rūpayutā dve caivāṅgirase dadau / dve prādātsa kṛśāśvāya daśa dharṃmāya cāpyatha //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭim kanyāḥ rūpa yutāḥ dve ca eva aṅgirase dadau  dve prādāt sa kṛśāśvāya daśa dharṃmāya ca api atha

original: caturdaśa kaśyapāya aṣṭāviṃśātimindave / pradadau bahuputrāya suprabhāṃ bhāminīṃ tathā //
analyzed: caturdaśa kaśyapāya aṣṭāviṃśā atimindave pradadau bahuputrāya suprabhām bhāminīm tathā

original: manoramāṃ bhānumatīṃ viśālāṃ bahudāmatha / dakṣaḥ prādānmahādeva / catasro 'riṣṭanemaye (ne) //
analyzed: manoramām bhānumatīm viśālām bahudām atha dakṣaḥ prādāt mahādeva catasraḥ riṣṭanemaye ne

original: sa kṛśāśvāya ca prādātsuprajāṃ ca tathā jayām / arundhatī vasuryār(jā)
analyzed: sa kṛśāśvāya ca prādāt suprajām ca tathā jayām arundhatī

original: mī lambā bhānurmarudvatī //
analyzed: mī lambā bhānuḥ marudvatī

original: saṅkalpā ca muhūrtā ca sādhyā viśvā ca tā daśa / dharṃmapatnyaḥ samākhyātāḥ kaśyapasya vadāmyaham //
analyzed: saṅkalpā ca muhūrtā ca sādhyā viśvā ca tāḥ daśa dharṃma patnyaḥ samākhyātāḥ kaśyapasya vadāmi aham

original: aditirditirdanuḥ kālā hyanāyuḥ siṃhikā muniḥ / kadrūḥ sādhyā harā krodhā vinatā surabhiḥ khagā //
analyzed: aditiḥ ditiḥ danuḥ kālā hi anāyuḥ siṃhikā muniḥ kadrūḥ sādhyā harā krodhā vinatā surabhiḥ khagā

original: viśvedevāstu viśvāyāḥ sādhyā sādhyānvyajāyata / marutvatyāṃ marutvanto vasostu vasavastathā //
analyzed: viśvedevāḥ tu viśvāyāḥ sādhyā sādhyān vyajāyata marutvatyām marutvantaḥ vasoḥ tu vasavaḥ tathā

original: bhānostu bhānavo rudra / muhūrtācca muhūrtajāḥ / lambāyāścaiva ghoṣo 'tha nāgavīthistu yā (jā) mitaḥ //
analyzed: bhānoḥ tu bhānavaḥ rudra muhūrtāt ca muhūrta jāḥ lambāyāḥ ca eva nāgavīthiḥ tu yā mitaḥ

original: pṛthivīviṣayaṃ sarvamarutvatyāṃ vyajāyata / saṅkalpāyāstu sarvātmā jajñe saṃkalpa eva hi //
analyzed: pṛthivī viṣayam sarva marutvatyām vyajāyata saṅkalpāyāḥ tu sarvātmā jajñe saṃkalpaḥ eva hi

original: āpo dhruvaśca somaśca dharaścaivānilo 'nalaḥ / pratyūṣaśca prabhāsaśca vasavo nāmabhiḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: āpaḥ dhruvaḥ ca somaḥ ca dharaḥ ca eva anilaḥ nalaḥ pratyūṣaḥ ca prabhāsaḥ ca vasavaḥ nāmabhiḥ smṛtāḥ

original: āpasya putro vetuṇḍiḥ (ṇḍaḥ)
analyzed: āpasya putraḥ vetuṇḍiḥ ṇḍaḥ

original: śramaḥ śrānto dhvanistathā / dhruvasya putro bhagavānkālo lokaprakālanaḥ //
analyzed: śramaḥ śrāntaḥ dhvaniḥ tathā dhruvasya putraḥ bhagavān kālaḥ loka prakālanaḥ

original: somasya bhagavānvarcā varcasvī yena jāyate / dharasya putro druhiṇo hutahavyavahastathā //
analyzed: somasya bhagavān varcāḥ varcasvī yena jāyate dharasya putraḥ druhiṇaḥ hutahavyavahaḥ tathā

original: manoharāyāṃ śiśiraḥ prāṇo 'tha ramaṇastathā / anilasya śivā bhāryā tasyāḥ putraḥ pulomajaḥ //
analyzed: manoharāyām śiśiraḥ ramaṇaḥ tathā anilasya śivā bhāryā tasyāḥ putraḥ pulomajaḥ

original: avijñātagatiścaiva dvau putrāvanilasya tu / agniputraḥ kumārastu śarastambe vyajāyat //
analyzed: avijñātagatiḥ ca eva dvau putrau anilasya tu agni putraḥ kumāraḥ tu śarastambe vyajāyat

original: tasya śākho viśākhaśca naigameyaśca pṛṣṭajaḥ / apatyaṃ kṛttikānāṃ tu kārtikeya iti smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tasya śākhaḥ viśākhaḥ ca naigameyaḥ ca pṛṣṭajaḥ apatyam kṛttikānām tu kārtikeyaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: pratyuṣasya viduḥ putramṛṣiṃ nāmnā tu devalam / viśvakarṃmā prabhāsasya vikhyāto devavardhakiḥ //
analyzed: pratyuṣasya viduḥ putram ṛṣim nāmnā tu devalam viśvakarṃmā prabhāsasya vikhyātaḥ devavardhakiḥ

original: ajaikapādahirbudhnyastvaṣṭā rudraśca vīryavān / tvaṣṭuścāpyātmajaḥ putro viśvarūpo mahātapāḥ //
analyzed: ajaikapād ahirbudhnyaḥ tvaṣṭā rudraḥ ca vīryavān tvaṣṭuḥ ca api ātmajaḥ putraḥ viśvarūpaḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: haraśca bahurūpaśca tryambakaścāparājitaḥ / vṛṣākapiśca śambhuśca kaparde raivatastathā //
analyzed: haraḥ ca bahurūpaḥ ca tryambakaḥ ca aparājitaḥ vṛṣākapiḥ ca śambhuḥ ca kaparde raivataḥ tathā

original: mṛgavyādhaśca śarvaśca kapālī ca mahāmune / / ekādaśaite kathitā rudrāstribhuvaneśvarāḥ //
analyzed: mṛgavyādhaḥ ca śarvaḥ ca kapālī ca mahā mune    ekādaśā ete kathitāḥ rudrāḥ tribhuvana īśvarāḥ

original: adityāṃ kaśyapāccaiva sūryā dvādaśa jajñire / viṣṇuḥ śakror'yyamā dhātā tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathaiva ca //
analyzed: adityām kaśyapāt ca eva sūryāḥ dvādaśa jajñire viṣṇuḥ śakroḥ yamā dhātā tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathā eva ca

original: vivasvānsavitā caiva mitro varuṇa eva ca / aśumāṃśca bhagaścaiva ādityā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: vivasvān savitā ca eva mitraḥ varuṇaḥ eva ca aśumān ca bhagaḥ ca eva ādityāḥ dvādaśa smṛtāḥ

original: saptaviṃśatiḥ somasya patnyo nakṣatrasaṃjñitāḥ / hiraṇyakaśipurdityāṃ hiraṇyākṣo 'bhavattadā //
analyzed: saptaviṃśatiḥ somasya patnyaḥ nakṣatra saṃjñitāḥ hiraṇyakaśipuḥ dityām hiraṇyākṣaḥ bhavat tadā

original: siṃhikā cābhavatkanyā vipracittiparigrahā / hiraṇyakaśipoḥ putrāścatvāraḥ pṛthulaujasaḥ //
analyzed: siṃhikā ca abhavat kanyā vipracitti parigrahā hiraṇyakaśipoḥ putrāḥ catvāraḥ pṛthula ojasaḥ

original: anuhrādaśca hrādaśca prahrādaścaiva vīryavān / saṃhrādaścāvamasteṣāṃ prahrādo viṣṇutatparaḥ //
analyzed: anuhrādaḥ ca hrādaḥ ca prahrādaḥ ca eva vīryavān saṃhrādaḥ ca avamaḥ teṣām prahrādaḥ viṣṇu tatparaḥ

original: saṃhrādaputra āyuṣmāñchibirvāṣkala eva ca / virocanaśca prāhrādirbalirjajñe virocanāt //
analyzed: saṃhrāda putraḥ āyuṣmān śibiḥ vāṣkalaḥ eva ca virocanaḥ ca prāhrādiḥ baliḥ jajñe virocanāt

original: baleḥ putraśataṃ tvāsīdvāṇajyeṣṭhaṃ vṛṣadhvaja / / hiraṇyākṣasutāścāsansarva eva mahābalāḥ //
analyzed: baleḥ putra śatam tu āsīt vāṇa jyeṣṭham vṛṣadhvaja hiraṇyākṣa sutāḥ ca āsan sarve eva mahā balāḥ

original: utkuraḥ śakuniścaiva bhūtasantāpanastathā / mahānāgo mahābāhuḥ kālanābhastathāparaḥ //
analyzed: utkuraḥ śakuniḥ ca eva bhūtasantāpanaḥ tathā mahānāgaḥ mahābāhuḥ kālanābhaḥ tathā aparaḥ

original: abhavandanuputrāśca dvimūrdhā śaṅkarastathā / ayomukhaḥ śaṅkuśirāḥ kapilaḥ śambarastathā //
analyzed: abhavan danu putrāḥ ca dvimūrdhā śaṅkaraḥ tathā ayomukhaḥ śaṅkuśirāḥ kapilaḥ śambaraḥ tathā

original: ekacakro mahābāhustārakaśca mahābalaḥ / svarbhānurvṛṣaparvā ca pulomā ca mahāsuraḥ //
analyzed: ekacakraḥ mahābāhuḥ tārakaḥ ca mahā balaḥ svarbhānuḥ vṛṣaparvā ca pulomā ca mahā asuraḥ

original: ete danoḥ sutāḥ khyātā vipracittiśca vīryavān / svarbhānoḥ suprabhā kanyā śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī //
analyzed: ete danoḥ sutāḥ khyātāḥ vipracittiḥ ca vīryavān svarbhānoḥ suprabhā kanyā śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī

original: upadānavī hayaśirāḥ prakhyātā varakanyakāḥ / vaiśvānarasute cobhe pulomā kālakā tathā //
analyzed: upadānavī hayaśirāḥ prakhyātāḥ vara kanyakāḥ vaiśvānara sute ca ubhe pulomā kālakā tathā

original: ubhe te tu mahābhāge mārīcestu parigrahaḥ / tābhyāṃ putrasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭirdānavasattamāḥ //
analyzed: ubhe te tu mahābhāge mārīceḥ tu parigrahaḥ tābhyām putra sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭiḥ dānava sattamāḥ

original: paulomāḥ kālakañjāśca mārīcatanayāḥ smṛtāḥ / siṃhikāyāṃ samutpannā vipracittisutāstathā //
analyzed: paulomāḥ kālakañjāḥ ca mārīca tanayāḥ smṛtāḥ siṃhikāyām samutpannāḥ vipracitti sutāḥ tathā

original: vyaṃśaḥ śalyaśca balavānnabhaścaiva mahābalaḥ / vātāpirnamuciścaiva ilvalaḥ khasṛmāṃstathā //
analyzed: vyaṃśaḥ śalyaḥ ca balavān nabhaḥ ca eva mahā balaḥ vātāpiḥ namuciḥ ca eva ilvalaḥ khasṛmān tathā

original: añja (nta) ko narakaścaiva kāla nābhastathaiva ca / nivātakavacā daityāḥ prahrādasya kule 'bhavan //
analyzed: narakaḥ ca eva kāla nābhaḥ tathā eva ca nivāta kavacāḥ daityāḥ prahrādasya kule bhavan

original: ṣaṭ sutāśca mahāsattvāstāmrāyāḥ parikīrtitāḥ / śukī śyenī ca bhāsī ca sugrīvī śucigṛdhrike //
analyzed: ṣaṭ sutāḥ ca mahā sattvāḥ tāmrāyāḥ parikīrtitāḥ śukī śyenī ca bhāsī ca sugrīvī śuci gṛdhrike

original: śukī śukānajanayadulūkī pratyalūkakān / śyenī śyenāṃstathā bhāsī bhāsān gṛdhrāṃśca gṛdhryapi //
analyzed: śukī śukān ajanayat ulūkī pratyalūkakān  śyenī śyenān tathā bhāsī bhāsān gṛdhrān ca gṛdhrī api

original: śukyaudakānpakṣigaṇānsugrīvī tu vyajāyata / (aśvānuṣṭān gardabhāṃśca tāmrāvaṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: śukī audakān pakṣi gaṇān sugrīvī tu vyajāyata aśvān uṣṭān gardabhān ca tāmrā vaṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: vinatāyāstu putrau dvau vikhyātau garuḍāruṇau / surasāyāḥ sahasraṃ tu sarpāṇāmamitaujasām //
analyzed: vinatāyāḥ tu putrau dvau vikhyātau garuḍa aruṇau surasāyāḥ sahasram tu sarpāṇām amita ojasām

original: kādraveyāśca phaṇinaḥ sahasramamitaujasaḥ / teṣā prādhānā bhūteśa / śeṣavāsukitakṣakāḥ //
analyzed: kādraveyāḥ ca phaṇinaḥ sahasram amita ojasaḥ teṣām śeṣa vāsuki takṣakāḥ

original: śaṅkhaḥ śveto mahāpadmaḥ (śaṅkhaḥ)
analyzed: śaṅkhaḥ śvetaḥ mahāpadmaḥ śaṅkhaḥ

original: kambalāśvatarau tathā / elāpatrastathā nāgaḥ karkoṭakadhanañjayau //
analyzed: kambala aśvatarau tathā elāpatraḥ tathā nāgaḥ karkoṭaka dhanañjayau

original: gaṇaṃ krodhavaśaṃ viddhi te ca sarve ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ / krodhā tu janayāmāsa piśācāṃśca mahābalān //
analyzed: gaṇam krodha vaśam viddhi te ca sarve ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ krodhā tu janayāmāsa piśācān ca mahā balān

original: gāstu vai janayāmāsa surabhirmahiṣāṃstathā / irā vṛkṣalatāballīstṛṇajātīśca sarvaśaḥ //
analyzed: gāḥ tu vai janayāmāsa surabhiḥ mahiṣān tathā irā vṛkṣa latā ballīḥ tṛṇa jātīḥ ca sarvaśas

original: khagā ca yakṣarakṣāṃsi munirapsarasastathā / ariṣṭā tu mahāsattvān gandharvānsamajījanat //
analyzed: khagā ca yakṣa rakṣāṃsi muniḥ apsarasaḥ tathā  ariṣṭā tu mahā sattvān gandharvān samajījanat

original: devā ekonapañcāśanmaruto hyabhavanniti / ekajyo tiśca dvirjyoticaturjyotistathaiva ca //
analyzed: devāḥ ekonapañcāśat marutaḥ hi abhavan iti ekajyo tiḥ ca dvirjyoti caturjyotiḥ tathā eva ca

original: ekaśukro dviśukraśca triśukraśca mahābalaḥ / īdṛk sadṛk tathānyādṛk tataḥ pratisadṛk tathā //
analyzed: eka śukraḥ dvi śukraḥ ca tri śukraḥ ca mahā balaḥ īdṛś sadṛś tathā anyādṛś tatas pratisadṛś tathā

original: mitaśca samitaścaiva sumitaśca mahābalaḥ / ṛtajitsatyajiccaiva suṣeṇaḥ senajittathā //
analyzed: mitaḥ ca samitaḥ ca eva sumitaḥ ca mahā balaḥ ṛtajit satyajit ca eva suṣeṇaḥ senajit tathā

original: atimitro 'pyamitraśca dūramitro 'jitastathā / ṛtaśca ṛtadharṃmā ca vihartā varuṇo (camaso) dhruvaḥ //
analyzed: atimitraḥ pyamitraḥ ca dūramitraḥ jitaḥ tathā ṛtaḥ ca ṛta dharṃmā ca vihartā varuṇaḥ camasaḥ dhruvaḥ

original: vidhāraṇaśca durmedhā ayamekagaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ / īdṛśaśca sadṛkṣaśca etādṛkṣo mitāśanaḥ //
analyzed: vidhāraṇaḥ ca durmedhāḥ ayam eka gaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ īdṛśaḥ ca sadṛkṣaḥ ca etādṛkṣaḥ mitāśanaḥ

original: etenaḥ prasadṛkṣaśca surataśca mahātapāḥ / hetumānprasavastadvatsurabhaśca mahāyaśāḥ //
analyzed: prasadṛkṣaḥ ca surataḥ ca mahā tapāḥ hetumān prasavaḥ tadvat surabhaḥ ca mahā yaśāḥ

original: nādirugro dhvanirbhāso bimukto vikṣipaḥ sahaḥ / dyutirvasuranādhṛṣyo lābha kāmo jayī virāṭ //

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryādīnāṃ sarasvatyāśca pūjanaṃ nāma saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ

original: ṣoḍaśaiḥ koṣṭhakaistatra saṃmitaṃ rudra? kārayet / caturthapañcakoṇeṣu sūtrapātaṃ tu kārayet //

analyzed: koṇa sūtrāt ubhayatas koṇāḥ ye tatra saṃsthitāḥ teṣu ca eva prakurvīta sūtra pātam vicakṣaṇaḥ

analyzed: tad anantara koṇeṣu evam eva hi kārayet prathamā nābhiḥ uddiṣṭā madhye rekhā prasaṃgame

original: antareṣu ca sarveṣu aṣṭau caiva tunābhayaḥ / pūrvamadhyamanābhi bhyāmathaṃ sūtraṃ tu bhrāmayet //
analyzed: antareṣu ca sarveṣu aṣṭau ca eva tunābhayaḥ pūrva madhyama nābhi bhyāmatham sūtram tu bhrāmayet

original: antarā sa dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ pādonaṃ bhrāmayeddhara / / anena nābhisūtrasya karṇikāṃ bhrāmayecchiva / //
analyzed: antarā sa dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ pāda ūnam bhrāmayet hara   anena nābhi sūtrasya karṇikām bhrāmayet śiva  /

original: karṇikāyā dvibhāgena kesarāṇi vicakṣaṇaḥ / tadagreṇa sadā vidvāndalānyeva samālikhet //
analyzed: karṇikāyāḥ dvi bhāgena kesarāṇi vicakṣaṇaḥ tad agreṇa sadā vidvān dalāni eva samālikhet

original: sarveṣu nābhikṣetraṣu mānenānena suvrata / / padmāni tāni kurvīta deśikaḥ para mārthavit //
analyzed: sarveṣu mānena anena suvrata   padmāni tāni kurvīta deśikaḥ para mā artha vid

original: ādisūtravibhāgena dvārāṇi parikalpayet / dvāraśobhāṃ tathā tatra tadardhena tu kalpayet //
analyzed: ādi sūtra vibhāgena dvārāṇi parikalpayet dvāra śobhām tathā tatra tad ardhena tu kalpayet

original: karṇikāṃ pītavarṇena sitaraktādikesaraiḥ / antaraṃ nīlavarṇena dalāni asitena ca //
analyzed: karṇikām pīta varṇena sita rakta ādi kesaraiḥ antaram nīla varṇena dalāni asitena ca

original: kṛṣṇavarṇena rajasā caturaśraṃ prapūrayet / dvārāṇi śuklavarṇena rekhāḥ pañca ca maṇḍale //

original: hṛnmadhye tu nyasedviṣṇuṃ kaṇṭhe saṅkarṣaṇaṃ tathā / pradyumnaṃ śirasi nyasya śikhāyāmaniruddhakam //
analyzed: hṛd madhye tu nyaset viṣṇum kaṇṭhe saṅkarṣaṇam tathā pradyumnam śirasi nyasya śikhāyām aniruddhakam

original: brahmāṇaṃ sarvagātreṣu karayoḥ śrīdharaṃ tathā / ahaṃ viṣṇuriti dhyātvā karṇikāyāṃ nyaseddharim //
analyzed: brahmāṇam sarva gātreṣu karayoḥ śrīdharam tathā aham viṣṇuḥ iti dhyātvā karṇikāyām nyaset harim

original: śrīdharaṃ rudrakoṇeṣu indrādīndikṣu vinyaset / tato 'bhyarcya ca gandhādyaiḥ prāpnuyātparamaṃ padam //
analyzed: śrīdharam rudra koṇeṣu indra ādīn dikṣu vinyaset tatas bhyarcya ca gandha ādyaiḥ prāpnuyāt paramam padam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupūjopayogivajranābhamaṇḍalanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣṇupūjopayogivajranābhamaṇḍalanirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 9

original: caturdvāraṃ bhavettacca brahmatīrthādanukramāt / hastaṃ padmaṃ samākhyātaṃ patrāṇyaṅgulayaḥ smṛtāḥ //

original: karṇikā talahastantu nakhānyasya tu kesarāḥ / tatrārcayeddhariṃ dhyātvā sūryandvagnayantareva ca //
analyzed: karṇikā talahaḥ tantu nakhāni asya tu kesarāḥ tatra arcayet harim dhyātvā ca

original: taṃ hastaṃ pātayenmūrdhni śiṣyasya tu samāhitaḥ / haste viṣṇuḥ sthito yasmādviṣṇuhastastatastvayam / naśyanti sparśanāttasya pātakānyakhilāni ca //

original: guruḥ śiṣyaṃ samabhyarcya netre baddhe tu vāsasā / devasya pramukhaṃ kṛtvā puṣpamevārpayettataḥ / puṣpaṃ nipatitaṃ yatra mūrdhno devasya śārṅgiṇaḥ //

original: tannāma kārayettasya strīṇāṃ nāmāṅkitaṃ svayam / śūdrāṇāṃ dāsasaṃyuktaṃ kārayettu vicakṣaṇaḥ //

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇudīkṣānidṛ nāma navamo 'dhyāyaḥ

analyzed: kṣetrapālam atha agni ādau homān juhāva kāma bhāj om ghaṃ ṭaṃ ḍaṃ haṃ śrī mahālakṣmyai namaḥ

original: oṃ hrīṃ vadavadavāgvādinisvāhā oṃ hrīṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ //
analyzed: om   om   sarasvatyai namaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe lakṣmyarcananirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe lakṣmyarcananirūpaṇam nāma daśamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 11
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvācaṃ / navavyūhārcanaṃ vakṣye yaduktaṃ kaśyapāya hi / jīvamutkṣipya mūrdhanyaṃ nābhyāṃ vyomniniveśayet //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca navavyūha arcanam vakṣye yat uktam kaśyapāya hi jīvam utkṣipya mūrdhanyam nābhyām vyomni niveśayet

original: tatoramiti bījena dahedbhūtātmakaṃ vapuḥ / yamityanena bījena tacca sarva vināśayet //
analyzed: tatas raṃ iti bījena dahet bhūta ātmakam vapuḥ yam iti anena bījena tat ca sarva vināśayet

original: lamityanena bījena plāvayetsacarācaram / vamityanena bījena cintayedamṛtaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: lam iti anena bījena plāvayet sacarācaram  vam iti anena bījena cintayet amṛtam tatas

original: tato budvudamadhye tu pītavāsāścaturbhujaḥ / ahaṃ matastathātmānaṃ dhyānena paricintayet //
analyzed: tatas budvuda madhye tu pīta vāsāḥ catur bhujaḥ aham mataḥ tathā ātmānam dhyānena paricintayet

original: mantranyāsaṃ tataḥ kuryāttrividhaṃ karadehayoḥ / dvādaśākṣarabījena uktabījairanantaram //
analyzed: mantra nyāsam tatas kuryāt trividham kara dehayoḥ  dvādaśa akṣara bījena ukta bījaiḥ anantaram

original: ṣaḍaṅgena tataḥ kuryātsākṣādyena harirbhavet / dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhamārabhya madhyāṅguṣṭhandale nyaset //
analyzed: ṣaḍaṅgena tatas kuryāt sākṣāt yena hariḥ bhavet  dakṣiṇa aṅguṣṭham ārabhya nyaset

original: madhye bījadvayaṃ nyasya nyasedaṅge tataḥ punaḥ / hṛcchirasi śikhāvarṃmavakkrākṣyudahapṛṣṭhataḥ //
analyzed: madhye bīja dvayam nyasya nyaset aṅge tatas punar hṛd śirasi

original: bāhvośca karayorjānvoḥ pādayoścāpi vinyaset / padmākārau karau kṛtvā madhye 'ṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet //
analyzed: bāhvoḥ ca karayoḥ jānvoḥ pādayoḥ ca api vinyaset padma ākārau karau kṛtvā madhye ṅguṣṭham niveśayet

original: cintayettatra sarveśaṃ paraṃ tattvamanāmayam / kramāccaitāni bījāni tarjanyādiṣu vinya set //
analyzed: cintayet tatra sarva īśam param tattvam anāmayam  kramāt ca etāni bījāni tarjanī ādiṣu vinya set

original: tato mūrdhākṣivakkreṣu kaṇṭhe ca hṛdaye tathā / nābhau guhye tathā jānvoḥ pādayorvinyasetkramāt //
analyzed: tatas mūrdha akṣi vakkreṣu kaṇṭhe ca hṛdaye tathā nābhau guhye tathā jānvoḥ pādayoḥ vinyaset kramāt

original: pāṇyoḥ ṣaḍaṅgabījāni nyasya kāye tato nyaset / aṅguṣṭhādikaniṣṭhāntaṃ vinyasedvījapañcakam //
analyzed: pāṇyoḥ ṣaḍaṅga bījāni nyasya kāye tatas nyaset aṅguṣṭha ādi kaniṣṭhā antam vinyaset vīja pañcakam

original: karamadhye netrabījamaṅganyāsa'pyayaṃ kramaḥ / hṛdaye hṛdayaṃ nyasya śiraḥ śirasi vinyaset //
śikhāyāṃ tu śikhāṃ nyasya kavacaṃ sarvatastanau / netraṃ netre vidhātavyamastrañca karayordvayoḥ //
analyzed: śikhāyām tu śikhām nyasya kavacam sarvatas tanau  netram netre vidhātavyam astram ca karayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: tenaiva ca diśo baddhā pūjā vidhimathācaret / hṛdaye cintayetpūrvaṃ yogapīṭhaṃ samāhitaḥ //
analyzed: tena eva ca diśaḥ baddhā pūjā vidhim atha ācaret hṛdaye cintayet pūrvam yogapīṭham samāhitaḥ

original: dharma jñanaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryaṃ ca yathākramam / āgneyādau ca pūrvādāvadharmādīṃśca vinyaset //
analyzed: dharma jñanam ca vairāgyam aiśvaryam ca yathākramam āgneya ādau ca pūrva ādau adharma ādīn ca vinyaset

original: ebhiḥ paricchannatanuṃ pīṭhabhūtaṃ tadātmakam / anantaṃ vinsetpaścātpūrvakāyonnataṃ sthitam //
analyzed: ebhiḥ paricchanna tanum pīṭha bhūtam tad ātmakam anantam vinset paścāt pūrva kāya unnatam sthitam

original: tato vidyātsarojātaṃ dalāṣṭasamadigdalam / sitābjaṃ śatapatrāḍhyaṃ viprakīrṇordhakarṇikam //
analyzed: tatas vidyāt saraḥ jātam dala aṣṭa sama diś dalam sita abjam śata pattra āḍhyam viprakīrṇa ūrdhva karṇikam

original: dhyātvā vedādinā paścātsūryasomānalātmanām / maṇḍalāni kramādevamuparyupari cintayet //
analyzed: dhyātvā vedādinā paścāt sūrya soma anala ātmanām maṇḍalāni kramāt evam upari upari cintayet

original: tataḥ pūrvādidiksaṃsthāḥ śaktīḥ keśavagocarāḥ / vimalādyā nyasedaṣṭau navamīṃ karṇikāgatām //
analyzed: tatas pūrva ādi diś saṃsthāḥ śaktīḥ keśava gocarāḥ vimalā ādyāḥ nyaset aṣṭau navamīm karṇikā gatām

original: evaṃ dhyātvā samabhyarcya yogapīṭhamanantaram / manasāvāhya tatreśaṃ hariṃ śārṅgaṃ nyasetpunaḥ //
analyzed: evam dhyātvā samabhyarcya yogapīṭham anantaram manasā āvāhya tatra īśam harim śārṅgam nyaset punar

original: hṛdayādīni pūrvādicaturdigdalayogataḥ / madhye netraṃ tu koṇeṣu astramantraṃ nyasettataḥ //
analyzed: hṛdaya ādīni pūrva ādi catur diś dala yogataḥ madhye netram tu koṇeṣu astramantram nyaset tatas

original: saṅkarṣaṇādibījāni pūrvādikramayogataḥ / dvāri pūrve pare caiva vainateyaṃ tu vinyaset //
analyzed: saṅkarṣaṇa ādi bījāni pūrva ādi krama yogataḥ dvāri pūrve pare ca eva vainateyam tu vinyaset

original: sudarśanaṃ sahasrāraṃ dakṣiṇe dvāri vinyaset / śriyaṃ dakṣiṇato nyasya lakṣmīmuttaratastathā //
analyzed: sudarśanam sahasrāram dakṣiṇe dvāri vinyaset śriyam dakṣiṇatas nyasya lakṣmīm uttaratas tathā

original: dvāryattare gadāṃ nyasya śaṅkhaṃ koṇeṣu vinyaset / devadakṣiṇataḥ śārṅgaṃ vāme caiva sudhīrnyaset //
analyzed: dvāri attare gadām nyasya śaṅkham koṇeṣu vinyaset deva dakṣiṇatas śārṅgam vāme ca eva sudhīḥ nyaset

original: tadvatkhaṅgaṃ tathā cakraṃ nyasetpārśvadvayordvayam / tato 'ntarlokapālāṃśca svadigbhedena vinyaset //
analyzed: tadvat khaṅgam tathā cakram nyaset pārśva dvayoḥ dvayam tatas ntar lokapālān ca sva diś bhedena vinyaset

original: vajrādīnyāyudhānyeva tathaiva viniveśayet / ūrghvaṃ brihma tathānantamadhaśca paricintayet //
analyzed: vajra ādīni āyudhāni eva tathā eva viniveśayet

original: sarvaṃ dhyātveti saṃpūjya mudrāḥ sandarśayettataḥ / añjaliḥ prathamā mudrā kṣipraṃ devaprasādhanī //
analyzed: sarvam dhyātvā iti saṃpūjya mudrāḥ sandarśayet tatas añjaliḥ prathamā mudrā kṣipram deva prasādhanī

original: vandanī hṛdayāsaktātsārdhaṃ dakṣiṇatonnatā / ūrdhāṅguṇṭho vāmamuṣṭirdakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhabandhanaḥ //
analyzed: vandanī hṛdaya āsaktāt sārdham dakṣiṇatas unnatā

original: savyasya tasya cāṅguṣṭho yaḥ sa uddhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ / tisraḥ sādhāraṇā hyetā mūrtibhedena kalpitāḥ //
analyzed: savyasya tasya ca aṅguṣṭhaḥ yaḥ saḥ prakīrtitaḥ tisraḥ sādhāraṇāḥ hi etāḥ mūrti bhedena kalpitāḥ

original: kaniṣṭhādipramokeṇa aṣṭau mudrā yathākramam / aṣṭānāṃ pūrvabījānāṃ kramaśastvavadhārayet //
analyzed: kaniṣṭhā ādi pramokeṇa aṣṭau mudrāḥ yathākramam aṣṭānām pūrva bījānām kramaśas tu avadhārayet

original: aṅguṣṭhena kaniṣṭhāntaṃ nāmayitvāṅgulitrayam / mudreyaṃ narasiṃhasya nyubjaṃ kṛtvā karadvayam //
analyzed: aṅguṣṭhena kaniṣṭhā antam nāmayitvā aṅguli trayam  mudrā iyam narasiṃhasya nyubjam kṛtvā kara dvayam

original: savyahastaṃ tathottānaṃ kṛtvordhaṃ bhrāmayecchanaiḥ / navamīyaṃ smṛtā mudrā varāhābhimatā sadā //
analyzed: savya hastam tathā uttānam kṛtvā ūrdham bhrāmayet śanais navamī iyam smṛtā mudrā varāha abhimatā sadā

original: muṣṭidvayamathottānamṛjvaikaikena mocayet / utkuñcayetsarvamuktā aṅgamudreyamucyate //
analyzed: muṣṭi dvayam atha uttānam ṛjvā ekaikena mocayet utkuñcayet sarva muktā aṅgamudrā iyam ucyate

original: muṣṭidvayamatho baddhā evamevānupūrvaśaḥ / daśānāṃ lokapālānāṃ mudrāśca kramayogataḥ //
analyzed: muṣṭi dvayam atho baddhā evam eva anupūrvaśas daśānām lokapālānām mudrāḥ ca krama yogataḥ

original: suramādyaṃ dvitīyaṃ ca upāntyañcāntyameva ca / vāsudevo balaḥ kāmo hyaniruddho yathākramam //
analyzed: suram ādyam dvitīyam ca upāntyam ca antyam eva ca vāsudevaḥ balaḥ kāmaḥ hi aniruddhaḥ yathākramam

original: praṇavastatsadityetad huṃ kṣaiṃ bhūriti mantrakāḥ / nārāyaṇastathā brahmā viṣṇuḥ siṃho varāharāṭ //
analyzed: praṇavaḥ tat sat iti etat hum kṣaiṃ bhūḥ iti mantrakāḥ nārāyaṇaḥ tathā brahmā viṣṇuḥ siṃhaḥ varāha rāj

original: sitāruṇaharidrābhā nīlaśyāmallohitāḥ / meghāgnimadupiṅgābhā varṇato navanāmakāḥ //
analyzed: sita aruṇa haridrā ābhāḥ nīla śyāma lohitāḥ varṇataḥ nava nāmakāḥ

original: kaṃ ṭaṃ paṃ śaṃ garutmānsyājjaṃ khaṃ vaṃ ca sudarśanam / ṣaṃ caṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadādevī vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ ca śaṅkhakam //
analyzed: kaṃ ṭaṃ paṃ śam garutmān syāt jaṃ khaṃ vaṃ ca sudarśanam ṣaṃ caṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadā devī vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ ca śaṅkhakam

original: ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ bhavecchrīśca gaṃ jaṃ vaṃ śaṃ ca puṣṭikā / ghaṃ vaṃ ca vanamālā syācchrī vatsaṃ daṃ saṃ bhavet //
analyzed: ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ bhavet śrīḥ ca gaṃ jaṃ vaṃ śam ca puṣṭikā ghaṃ vaṃ ca vanamālā syāt śrī vatsam daṃ sam bhavet

original: chaṃ ḍaṃ paṃ yaṃ kaustubhaḥ proktaścānanto hyahameva ca / ityaṅgāniyathāyogaṃ devadevasya vai daśā //
analyzed: chaṃ ḍaṃ paṃ yaṃ kaustubhaḥ proktaḥ ca anantaḥ hi aham eva ca iti aṅgāni yathāyogam devadevasya vai daśā

original: garuḍo 'mbujasaṃkāśo gadā caivāsitākṛtiḥ / puṣṭiḥ śirīṣapuṣpābhā lakṣmīḥ kāñcanasannibhā //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ mbuja saṃkāśaḥ gadā ca eva asita ākṛtiḥ puṣṭiḥ śirīṣa puṣpa ābhā lakṣmīḥ kāñcana sannibhā

original: pūrṇacandranibhaḥ śaṅkhaḥ kaustubhastvaruṇadyutiḥ / cakraṃ sūryasahasrābhaṃ śrīvatsaḥ kundasannibhaḥ //
analyzed: pūrṇa candra nibhaḥ śaṅkhaḥ kaustubhaḥ tu aruṇa dyutiḥ cakram sūrya sahasra ābham śrīvatsaḥ kunda sannibhaḥ

original: pañcavarṇanibhā mālā hyananto meghasannibhaḥ / vidyudrūpāṇi cāstrāṇi yāni noktāni varṇataḥ //
analyzed: pañca varṇa nibhā mālā hi anantaḥ megha sannibhaḥ vidyut rūpāṇi ca astrāṇi yāni na uktāni varṇataḥ

original: arghyapādyādi vai dadyātpuṇḍarīkākṣavidyayā //
analyzed: arghya pādya ādi vai dadyāt puṇḍarīkākṣa vidyayā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navavyūhārcanaṃ nāmaikādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe navavyūhārcanam nāma ekādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 12
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / pūjānukramasiddhyarthaṃ pūjānukrama ucyate / oṃ nama ityādau saṃsmṛtiḥ paramātmanaḥ //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca pūjā anukrama siddhi artham pūjā anukramaḥ ucyate  om namaḥ ityādau saṃsmṛtiḥ paramātmanaḥ

original: yaṃ raṃ vaṃ lamiti kāyaśuddhiḥ / oṃ nama iti caturbhujātmanirmāṇam //
analyzed: yaṃ raṃ vaṃ lam iti kāya śuddhiḥ om namaḥ iti caturbhuja ātma nirmāṇam

original: tatastrividhaḥ karakāyanyāsaḥ / tato tdṛdisthayogapīṭhapūjā / oṃ anantāya namaḥ / oṃ dharmāya namaḥ / oṃ jñānāya namaḥ / oṃ vairāgyāya namaḥ / oṃ aiśvaryāya namaḥ / oṃ adharṃmāya namaḥ / oṃ ajñānāya namaḥ / oṃ avairāgyāya namaḥ / oṃ anaiśvaryāya namaḥ / oṃ padmāya namaḥ / oṃ ādityamaṇḍalāya namaḥ / oṃ candramaṇḍalāya namaḥ / oṃ vahnimaṇḍalāya namaḥ / oṃ vimalāyai namaḥ / oṃ utkarṣiṇyai namaḥ / oṃ jñānāyai namaḥ / oṃ kriyāyai namaḥ / oṃ yogāyai namaḥ / oṃ prahvyai namaḥ / oṃ satyāyai namaḥ / oṃ īśānāyai namaḥ / oṃ sarvatomukhyai namaḥ / oṃ saṃgopāṅgāya harerāsanāya namaḥ / tataḥ karṇikāyām-aṃ vāsudevāya namaḥ / āṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ / īṃ śirase namaḥ / ūṃ śikhāyai namaḥ / aiṃ kavacāya namaḥ / auṃ netratrayāya namaḥ / aḥ phaṭ astrāya namaḥ / āṃ saṅkarṣaṇāya namaḥ / aṃ pradyumnāya namaḥ / aḥ aniruddhāya namaḥ / oṃ aḥ nārāyaṇāya namaḥ / oṃ tatsabdahmaṇe namaḥ / oṃ huṃ viṣṇave namaḥ / kṣaiṃ narasiṃhāya bhūrvarāhya kaṃ vainateyāya jaṃ khaṃ vaṃ sudarśanāya khaṃ caṃ phaṃ
analyzed: tatas trividhaḥ kara kāya nyāsaḥ om anantāya namaḥ om dharmāya namaḥ om jñānāya namaḥ om vairāgyāya namaḥ om aiśvaryāya namaḥ om namaḥ om ajñānāya namaḥ om avairāgyāya namaḥ om adharṃmāya namaḥ om ajñānāya namaḥ om avairāgyāya namaḥ om anaiśvaryāya namaḥ om padmāya namaḥ om āditya maṇḍalāya namaḥ om candra maṇḍalāya namaḥ om vahni maṇḍalāya namaḥ om vimalāyai namaḥ om utkarṣiṇyai namaḥ om jñānāya namaḥ om anantāya

original: ṣaṃ gadāyai vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ pāñcajanyāya ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ śriyai gaṃ ḍaṃ vaṃ śaṃ
analyzed: ṣaṃ gadāyai vaṃ laṃ maṃ   pāñcajanyāya ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ śriyai gaṃ ḍaṃ vaṃ śaṃ

original: puṣṭyai dhaṃ vaṃ vanamālāyai daṃ śaṃ śrīvatsāya chaṃ ḍaṃ yaṃ kaustubhāya śaṃ śārṅgāya
analyzed: puṣṭyai dhaṃ vaṃ vanamālāyai daṃ śam śrīvatsāya chaṃ ḍaṃ yaṃ kaustubhāya śam śārṅgāya

original: iṃ iṣudhibhyāṃ caṃ carmaṇe khaṃ khaḍgāya indrāya surāya partaye agnaye tejodhipatayeyamāyadharmādhipatayekṣaṃnairṛtāyarakṣodhipataye
analyzed: iṃ iṣudhibhyām caṃ carmaṇe khaṃ khaḍgāya indrāya surāya agnaye tejaḥ dhipataye yamāya dharma adhipataye ikṣam nairṛtāya rakṣaḥ dhipataye

original: varuṇāya jalādhipataye yoṃ vāyave prāṇādhipataye dhāṃ dhanadāya dhanādhipataye hāṃ
analyzed: varuṇāya jala adhipataye yoṃ vāyave prāṇa adhipataye dhām dhanadāya dhana adhipataye hām

original: īśānāya vidyādhipataye oṃ vajrāya śaktyai oṃ daṇḍāya khaṅgāya oṃ pāśāya dhvajāya
analyzed: īśānāya vidyā adhipataye om vajrāya śaktyai om daṇḍāya khaṅgāya om pāśāya dhvajāya

original: gadāyai triśūlāya laṃ anantāya pātālādhipataye khaṃ brahmaṇe sarvalokādhipataye oṃ
analyzed: gadāyai triśūlāya laṃ anantāya pātāla adhipataye khaṃ brahmaṇe sarva loka adhipataye om

original: namo bhagavate vāsudevāya namaḥ / oṃ oṃ namaḥ / oṃ naṃ namaḥ / oṃ moṃ namaḥ / oṃ oṃ bhaṃ namaḥ / oṃ gaṃ namaḥ / oṃ vaṃ namaḥ / oṃ teṃ namaḥ / oṃ vāṃ namaḥ / oṃ suṃ namaḥ / oṃ deṃ namaḥ / oṃ vāṃ namaḥ / oṃ yaṃ namaḥ / oṃ oṃ namaḥ / oṃ naṃ namaḥ / oṃ moṃ namaḥ / oṃ nāṃ namaḥ / oṃ rāṃ namaḥ / oṃ ṇāṃ namaḥ / oṃ yaṃ namaḥ / oṃ naṃnoṃ bhagavateṃ vāṃsuṃdevāyaṃ oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ / oṃ puruṣottamāya namaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya namaḥ om om namaḥ om naṃ namaḥ om moṃ namaḥ om om bhaṃ namaḥ om gaṃ namaḥ om vaṃ namaḥ om teṃ namaḥ om vām namaḥ om suṃ namaḥ om deṃ namaḥ om vām namaḥ om yaṃ namaḥ om om namaḥ om naṃ namaḥ om moṃ namaḥ om nām namaḥ om rāṃ namaḥ om nāṃ namaḥ om yaṃ namaḥ om naṃ noṃ om namaḥ nārāyaṇāya namaḥ om namaḥ nārāyaṇāya namaḥ om namaḥ nārāyaṇāya namaḥ om namaḥ nārāyaṇāya nama

original: namaste puṇḍarīkākṣa namaste viśvabhāvana / subrahmaṇya namaste 'stu mahāpuruṣa pūrvaja //
analyzed: namaḥ te puṇḍarīkākṣa namaḥ te viśvabhāvana subrahmaṇya namaḥ te stu mahāpuruṣa pūrvaja

original: homakarṇaṇi caiteṣāṃ svāhāntamupakalpayet / evaṃ japtvā vidhānena śatamaṣṭottaraṃ tathā //
analyzed: ca eteṣām svāhā antam upakalpayet  evam japtvā vidhānena śatam aṣṭa uttaram tathā

original: arghaṃ dattvā jitaṃ tena praṇāmaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ / tato 'gnāvapi sampūjyaṃ taṃ yajeta yathāvidhi //
analyzed: argham dattvā jitam tena praṇāmam ca punar punar tatas gnau api sampūjyam tam yajeta yathāvidhi

original: devadevaṃ svabījena aṅgādibhirathācyutam / pūrvamullikhya cābhyukṣya praṇavena tu mantravit //
analyzed: devadevam sva bījena aṅga ādibhiḥ atha acyutam pūrvam ullikhya ca abhyukṣya praṇavena tu mantra vid

original: bhrāmayitvānalaṃ kuṇḍe pūjayecca śubhaiḥ phalaiḥ / pūrvaṃ tatsakalaṃ dhyātvā maṇḍale manasā nyaset //
analyzed: bhrāmayitvā analam kuṇḍe pūjayet ca śubhaiḥ phalaiḥ pūrvam tat sakalam dhyātvā maṇḍale manasā nyaset

original: vāsudevākhyatattvena hutvā cāṣṭottaraṃ śatam / saṃkarṣaṇādibījena yajetṣaṭkaṃ tathaiva ca //
analyzed: vāsudeva ākhya tattvena hutvā ca aṣṭa uttaram śatam saṃkarṣaṇa ādi bījena yajet ṣaṭkam tathā eva ca

original: trayantrayaṃ tathāṅgānāmekaikāndikpatīṃstathā / pūrṇāhutiṃ tathaivānte dadyātsamyagupasthitaḥ //
analyzed: trayantrayam tathā aṅgānām eka ekān dikpatīn tathā pūrṇāhutim tathā eva ante dadyāt samyak upasthitaḥ

original: vāgatīte pare tattve ātmānaṃ ca layaṃ nayet / upaviśya punarmudrāṃ darśayitvā nametpunaḥ //
analyzed: vāc atīte pare tattve ātmānam ca layam nayet upaviśya punar mudrām darśayitvā namet punar

analyzed: caturbhujaḥ vāsudevaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pradyumnaḥ eva ca saṃkarṣaṇaḥ navavyūhaḥ daśa ātmakaḥ

original: aniruddho dvādaśātmā atha ūrdhamanantakaḥ / ete ekādibhiścakrairvijñeyā lakṣitāḥ surāḥ //
analyzed: aniruddhaḥ dvādaśa ātmā atha ūrdham anantakaḥ ete eka ādibhiḥ cakraiḥ vijñeyāḥ lakṣitāḥ surāḥ

original: cakrāṅkitaiḥ pūjitaḥ syāndrṛhe rakṣetsadānaraiḥ / oṃ cakrāya svāhā,
analyzed: cakra aṅkitaiḥ pūjitaḥ rakṣet sadā naraiḥ om cakrāya svāhā

original: oṃ vicakrāya svāhā,
analyzed: om vicakrāya svāhā

original: oṃ sucakrāya svāhā,
analyzed: om sucakrāya svāhā

original: oṃ mahācakrāya svāhā,
analyzed: om mahācakrāya svāhā
