original: dvārakācakrapūjeyaṃ gṛhe rakṣākarī śubhā //
analyzed: dvārakā cakra pūjā iyam gṛhe rakṣā karī śubhā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pūjānukramanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe pūjānukramanirūpaṇam nāma dvādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 13
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / pravakṣyāmyadhunā hyetadvaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ śubham / namonamaste movidaṃ cakraṃ gṛhya sudarśanam //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca pravakṣyāmi adhunā hi etat vaiṣṇavam pañjaram śubham namaḥ namaḥ te cakram gṛhya sudarśanam

original: prācyāṃ rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo / tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ / gadāṃ kaumodakīṃ gṛhṇa padmanābha namo 'sta te //
analyzed: prācyām rakṣasva mām viṣṇo tvām aham śaraṇam gataḥ gadām kaumodakīm gṛhṇa padmanābha namaḥ sta te

original: yāmyāṃ rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo / tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ / halamādāya saunande namaste puruṣottama //
analyzed: yāmyām rakṣasva mām viṣṇo tvām aham śaraṇam gataḥ halam ādāya saunande namaḥ te puruṣottama

original: pratīcyāṃ rakṣa māṃ viṣṇo / tvāmaha śaraṇaṃ gataḥ / musalaṃ śātanaṃ gṛhya puṇḍarīkākṣa rakṣa mām //
analyzed: pratīcyām rakṣa mām viṣṇo tvām aha śaraṇam gataḥ musalam śātanam gṛhya puṇḍarīkākṣa rakṣa mām

original: uttarasyāṃ jagannātha / bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ / khaḍgamādāya carṃmātha astraśāstrādikaṃ hare / //
analyzed: uttarasyām jagannātha bhavantam śaraṇam gataḥ khaḍgam ādāya astra śāstra ādikam hare

original: namaste rakṣa rakṣoghna / aiśānyāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ / pāñcajanyaṃ mahāśaṅkhamanughoṣyaṃ ca paṅkajam //
analyzed: namaḥ te rakṣa rakṣaḥ ghna aiśānyām śaraṇam gataḥ pāñcajanyam mahā śaṅkham anughoṣyam ca paṅkajam

original: pragṛhya rakṣa māṃ viṣṇo āgnyeyyāṃ rakṣa sūkara / candrasūryaṃ samāgṛhya khaḍgaṃ cāndramasaṃ tathā //
analyzed: pragṛhya rakṣa mām viṣṇo āgnyeyyām rakṣa sūkara candra sūryam samāgṛhya khaḍgam cāndramasam tathā

original: nairṛtyāṃ māṃ ca rakṣasva divyamūrte nṛkesarin / vaijayantīṃ smapragṛhya śrīvatsaṃ kaṇṭhabhūṣaṇam //
analyzed: nairṛtyām mām ca rakṣasva divya mūrte nṛ kesarin vaijayantīm sma pragṛhya śrīvatsam kaṇṭha bhūṣaṇam

original: vāyavyāṃ rakṣa māṃ deva hayagrīva namo 'stu te / vainateyaṃ samāruhya tvantarikṣe janārdana / //
analyzed: vāyavyām rakṣa mām deva hayagrīva namaḥ stu te  vainateyam samāruhya tu antarikṣe janārdana  /

original: māṃ rakṣasvājita sadā namaste 'stvaparājita / viśālākṣaṃ samāruhya rakṣa māṃ tvaṃ rasātale //
analyzed: mām rakṣasva ajita sadā namaḥ te stu aparājita viśāla akṣam samāruhya rakṣa mām tvam rasātale

original: akūpāra namastubhyaṃ mahāmīna namo 'stu pte / karaśīrṣādyaṅgulīṣu satya tvaṃ bāhupañjaram //
analyzed: akūpāra namaḥ tubhyam mahā mīna namaḥ stu pte kara śīrṣa ādi aṅgulīṣu satya tvam bāhu pañjaram

original: kṛtvā rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo namaste puruṣottama / etaduktaṃ śaṅkarāya vaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ mahat //
analyzed: kṛtvā rakṣasva mām viṣṇo namaḥ te puruṣottama etat uktam śaṅkarāya vaiṣṇavam pañjaram mahat

original: purā rakṣārthamīśānyāḥ kātyāyanyā vṛṣadhvaja / nāśāyāmāsa sā yena cāmarānmahiṣāsuram //
analyzed: purā rakṣā artham īśānyāḥ kātyāyanyāḥ vṛṣadhvaja  nāśāyāmāsa sā yena ca amarān mahiṣa asuram

original: dānavaṃ raktabījaṃ ca anyāṃśca surakaṇṭakān / etajjapannaro bhaktyā śatrūnvijayate sadā //
analyzed: dānavam raktabījam ca anyān ca sura kaṇṭakān  etat japan naraḥ bhaktyā śatrūn vijayate sadā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupañjarastotraṃ nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣṇupañjarastotram nāma trayodaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 14
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / atha yogaṃ pravakṣyāmi bhuktimuktikaraṃ param / dhyāyibhiḥ procyate dhyeyo dhyānena harirīśvaraḥ //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca atha yogam pravakṣyāmi bhukti mukti karam param dhyāyibhiḥ procyate dhyeyaḥ dhyānena hariḥ īśvaraḥ

original: tacchṛṇuṣva maheśāna sarvapāpavināśanam / viṣṇuḥ sarveśvaro 'nantaḥ ṣaḍbhirbhūparivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: tat śṛṇuṣva maheśāna sarva pāpa vināśanam viṣṇuḥ sarva īśvaraḥ nantaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ bhū parivarjitaḥ

original: vāsudevo jagannātho brahmātmāsmyahameva hi / dehidehasthito nityaḥ sarvadehavivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ jagannāthaḥ brahmā ātmā asmi aham eva hi dehi deha sthitaḥ nityaḥ sarva deha vivarjitaḥ

original: dehadharṃmavihīnaśca kṣarākṣaravivarjitaḥ / ṣaḍvidheṣu sthito draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā hyatīndriyaḥ //
analyzed: deha dharṃma vihīnaḥ ca kṣara akṣara vivarjitaḥ ṣaḍvidheṣu sthitaḥ draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā hi atīndriyaḥ

original: taddharṃmarahitaḥ sraṣṭā nāmagotravivarjitaḥ / mantā manaḥ sthito devo manasā parivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: tad harṃma rahitaḥ sraṣṭā nāma gotra vivarjitaḥ mantā manaḥ sthitaḥ devaḥ manasā parivarjitaḥ

original: manodharṃmavihīnaśca vijñānaṃ jñānameva ca / boddhā buddhisthitaḥ sākṣī sarvajño buddhivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: manaḥ dharṃma vihīnaḥ ca vijñānam jñānam eva ca boddhā buddhi sthitaḥ sākṣī sarvajñaḥ buddhi varjitaḥ

original: buddhidharṃmavihīnaśca sarvaḥ sarvagato manaḥ / sarvaprāṇivinirmuktaḥ prāṇadharṃmavivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: buddhi dharṃma vihīnaḥ ca sarvaḥ sarva gataḥ manaḥ sarva prāṇi vinirmuktaḥ prāṇa dharṃma vivarjitaḥ

original: prāṇaprāṇo mahāśānto bhayena parivarjitaḥ / ahaṅkārādihīnaśca taddharṃmaparivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: prāṇa prāṇaḥ mahā śāntaḥ bhayena parivarjitaḥ ahaṅkāra ādi hīnaḥ ca tad harṃma parivarjitaḥ

original: tatsākṣī tanniyantā ca paramānandarūpakaḥ / jāgratsvapnasuṣuptisthastatsākṣī tadvivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: tad sākṣī tad niyantā ca paramānanda rūpakaḥ jāgrat svapna suṣupti sthaḥ tad sākṣī tad vivarjitaḥ

original: turīyaḥ paramo dhātā dṛgrūpo guṇavarjitaḥ / mukto buddho 'jaro vyāpī satya ātmāsmyahaṃ śivaḥ //
analyzed: turīyaḥ paramaḥ dhātā dṛś rūpaḥ guṇa varjitaḥ muktaḥ buddhaḥ jaraḥ vyāpī satyaḥ ātmā asmi aham śivaḥ

original: evaṃ ye mānavā vijñā dhyāyantīśaṃ paraṃ padam / prāpnuyuste ca tadrūpaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: evam ye mānavāḥ vijñāḥ dhyāyanti īśam param padam  prāpnuyuḥ te ca tad rūpam na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: iti dhyānaṃ samākhyātaṃ tava śaṅkara suvrata / paṭhedya etatsatataṃ viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati //
analyzed: iti dhyānam samākhyātam tava śaṅkara suvrata paṭhet yaḥ etat satatam viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dhyānayogo nāma caturdaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe dhyānayogaḥ nāma caturdaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 15
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: rudra uvāca / saṃsārasāgarāddhorāmucyate kiṃ japanprabho / narastanme paraṃ japyaṃ pathaya tvaṃ janārdana //
analyzed: rudraḥ uvāca saṃsāra sāgarāt horām ucyate kim japan prabho naraḥ tat me param japyam pathaya tvam janārdana

original: hariruvāca / pareśvaraṃ paraṃ brahma paramātmānamavyayam / viṣṇuṃ nāmasahasreṇa stuvanmukto bhavennaraḥ //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca para īśvaram param brahma paramātmānam avyayam viṣṇum nāma sahasreṇa stuvan muktaḥ bhavet naraḥ

original: yatpa vitraṃ paraṃ japyaṃ kathayāmi vṛṣadhvaja / / śṛṇuṣvāvahito bhūtvā sarvapāpavināśanam //
analyzed: param japyam kathayāmi vṛṣadhvaja śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ bhūtvā sarva pāpa vināśanam

original: oṃ vāsudevo mahāviṣṇurvāmano vāsavo vasuḥ / bālacandra nibho bālo balabhadro balādhipaḥ //
analyzed: om vāsudevaḥ mahā viṣṇuḥ vāmanaḥ vāsavaḥ vasuḥ bāla candra nibhaḥ bālaḥ balabhadraḥ balādhipaḥ

original: balibandhanakṛdvedhā (11)
analyzed: bali bandhana kṛt vedhā

original: vareṇyo vedavitkiviḥ / vedakartā vedarūpo vedyo vedapariplutaḥ //
analyzed: vareṇyaḥ veda vid kiviḥ veda kartā veda rūpaḥ vedyaḥ veda pariplutaḥ

original: vedāṅgavettā vedeśo(20)
analyzed: vedāṅga vettā

original: balādhāro balārdanaḥ / avikāro vareśaśca varuṇo varuṇādhipaḥ //
vīrahā ca bṛhadvīro vanditaḥ parameśvaraḥ (30) / ātmā ca paramātmā ca pratyagātmā viyatparaḥ //
analyzed: vīra hā ca bṛhat vīraḥ vanditaḥ parameśvaraḥ   ātmā ca paramātmā ca pratyagātmā viyatparaḥ

original: padmanābhaḥ padmanidhiḥ padmahasto gadādharaḥ / paramaḥ (40)parabhūtaśca puruṣottama īśvaraḥ //
padmajaṅghaḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ padmamālādharaḥ priyaḥ / padmākṣaḥ padmagarbhaśca parjanyaḥ (50)
analyzed: padmajaṅghaḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ padma mālā dharaḥ priyaḥ padmākṣaḥ padmagarbhaḥ ca parjanyaḥ

original: padmasaṃsthitaḥ //
analyzed: padma saṃsthitaḥ

original: apāraḥ paramārthaśca parāṇāṃ ca paraḥ prabhuḥ / paṇḍitaḥ paṇḍiteḍyaśca pavitraḥ pāpamardakaḥ //
analyzed: apāraḥ parama arthaḥ ca parāṇām ca paraḥ prabhuḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṇḍita īḍyaḥ ca pavitraḥ pāpa mardakaḥ

original: śuddhaḥ (60)prakāśarūpaśca pavitraḥ parirakṣakaḥ / pipāsāvarjitaḥ pādyaḥ puruṣaḥ prakṛtistathāḥ //
analyzed: śuddhaḥ pavitraḥ parirakṣakaḥ pipāsā varjitaḥ pādyaḥ puruṣaḥ prakṛtiḥ tathā

original: pradhānaṃ pṛthivīpadmaṃ padmanābhaḥ (70)
analyzed: pradhānam pṛthivī padmam padmanābhaḥ

original: priyapradaḥ / sarveśaḥ sarvagaḥ sarvaḥ sarvavitsarvadaḥ suraḥ //
sarvasya jagato dhāma sarvadarśo ca sarvabhṛt (80) / sarvānugrahakṛddevaḥ sarvabhūtahṛdi sthitaḥ //
analyzed: sarvasya jagataḥ dhāma ca sarva bhṛt sarva anugraha kṛt devaḥ sarva bhūta hṛdi sthitaḥ

original: sarvapūjyaśca sarvādyaḥ sarvadevanamaskṛtaḥ / sarvasya jagato mūlaṃ sakalo niṣkalo 'nalaḥ (90) //
analyzed: sarva pūjyaḥ ca sarva ādyaḥ sarva deva namaskṛtaḥ sarvasya jagataḥ mūlam sakalaḥ niṣkalaḥ nalaḥ

original: sarvagoptā sarvaniṣṭhaḥ sarvakāraṇakāraṇam / sarvadhyeyaḥ sarvamitraḥ sarvadesvavarūpadhṛk //
sarvādhyakṣaḥ surādhyakṣa surāsuranamaskṛtaḥ / duṣṭānāṃ ca surāṇāṃ ca sarvadā ghātako 'ntakaḥ (101) //
analyzed: sarva adhyakṣaḥ sura adhyakṣa sura asura namaskṛtaḥ duṣṭānām ca surāṇām ca sarvadā

original: satyapālaśca sannābhaḥ siddheśaḥ siddhavanditaḥ / siddhasādhyaḥ siddhasiddhaḥ sādhyasiddho (siddhisiddha)
analyzed: satyapālaḥ ca sannābhaḥ siddheśaḥ siddhavanditaḥ siddhasādhyaḥ siddhasiddhaḥ sādhyasiddhaḥ siddhisiddha

original: hṛdīśvaraḥ //
analyzed: hṛdi īśvaraḥ

original: śaraṇaṃ jagataścaiva (110)
analyzed: śaraṇam jagataḥ ca eva

original: śreyaḥ kṣemastathaiva ca / śubhakṛcchobhanaḥ saumyaḥ satyaḥ satyaparākramaḥ //
analyzed: śreyaḥ kṣemaḥ tathā eva ca śubha kṛt śobhanaḥ saumyaḥ satyaḥ satya parākramaḥ

original: satyasthaḥ satyasaṅkalpaḥ satyavitsatya (tpa) dastathā (121) / dharmo dharṃmo ca karmo ca sarvakarṃmavivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: satyasthaḥ satya saṅkalpaḥ satya vid satya daḥ tathā   dharmaḥ ca ca sarva karṃma vivarjitaḥ

original: karṃmakartā ca karmaiva kriyā kāryaṃ tathaiva ca / śrīpatirnṛpatiḥ (131)
analyzed: ca karma eva kriyā kāryam tathā eva ca śrīpatiḥ nṛpatiḥ

original: śrīmānsarvasya patirūrjitaḥ //
analyzed: śrīmān sarvasya patiḥ ūrjitaḥ

original: sadevānāṃ patiścaiva vṛṣṇīnāṃ patirīḍitaḥ / patirhiraṇyagarbhasya tripurāntapatistathā //
analyzed: sa devānām patiḥ ca eva vṛṣṇīnām patiḥ īḍitaḥ patiḥ hiraṇyagarbhasya tripurāntapatiḥ tathā

original: paśūnāṃ ca patiḥ prāyo vasūnāṃ patireva ca (140) / patirākhaṇḍalasyaiva varūṇasya patistathā //
analyzed: paśūnām ca patiḥ prāyas vasūnām patiḥ eva ca patiḥ ākhaṇḍalasya eva varūṇasya patiḥ tathā

original: vanaspatīnāṃ ca patiranilasya patistathā / analasya patiścaiva yamasya patireva ca //
analyzed: vanaspatīnām ca patiḥ anilasya patiḥ tathā analasya patiḥ ca eva yamasya patiḥ eva ca

original: kuberasya patiścaiva nakṣatrāṇāṃ patistathā / oṣadhīnāṃ patiścaiva vṛkṣāṇāṃ ca patistathā (150) //
analyzed: kuberasya patiḥ ca eva nakṣatrāṇām patiḥ tathā  oṣadhīnām patiḥ ca eva vṛkṣāṇām ca patiḥ tathā

original: nāgānāṃ patirarkasya dakṣasya patireva ca / suhṛdāṃ ca patiścaiva nṛpāṇāṃ ca patistathā //
analyzed: nāgānām patiḥ arkasya dakṣasya patiḥ eva ca suhṛdām ca patiḥ ca eva nṛpāṇām ca patiḥ tathā

original: gandharvāṇāṃ patiścaiva asūnāṃ patiruttamaḥ / parvatānāṃ patiścaiva nimnagānāṃ patistathā //
analyzed: gandharvāṇām patiḥ ca eva asūnām patiḥ uttamaḥ parvatānām patiḥ ca eva nimnagānām patiḥ tathā

original: surāṇāṃ ca patiḥ śreṣṭhaḥ (160)
analyzed: surāṇām ca patiḥ śreṣṭhaḥ

original: kapilasya patistathā / latānāṃ ca patiścaiva vīrudhāṃ ca patistathā //
analyzed: kapilasya patiḥ tathā latānām ca patiḥ ca eva vīrudhām ca patiḥ tathā

original: munīnāṃ ca patiścaiva sūryasya patiruttamaḥ / patiścandramasaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sukrasya patireva ca //
analyzed: munīnām ca patiḥ ca eva sūryasya patiḥ uttamaḥ patiḥ candramasaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sukrasya patiḥ eva ca

original: grahāṇāṃ ca patiścaiva rākṣasānāṃ patistathā / kinnarāṇāṃ patiścaiva (170)
analyzed: grahāṇām ca patiḥ ca eva rākṣasānām patiḥ tathā kinnarāṇām patiḥ ca eva

original: dvijānāṃ patiruttamaḥ //
analyzed: dvijānām patiḥ uttamaḥ

original: saritāṃ ca patiścaiva samudrāṇāṃ patistathā / sarasāṃ ca patiścaiva bhūtānāṃ ca patistathā //
analyzed: saritām ca patiḥ ca eva samudrāṇām patiḥ tathā sarasām ca patiḥ ca eva bhūtānām ca patiḥ tathā

original: vetālānāṃ patiścaiva kūṣmāṇḍānāṃ patistathā / pakṣiṇāṃ ca patiḥ śreṣṭhaḥ paśūnāṃ patireva ca //
analyzed: vetālānām patiḥ ca eva kūṣmāṇḍānām patiḥ tathā pakṣiṇām ca patiḥ śreṣṭhaḥ paśūnām patiḥ eva ca

original: mahātmā (180)maṅgalo meyo mandaro mandareśvaraḥ / merurmātā pramāṇaṃ ca mādhavo malavarjitaḥ //
analyzed: mahātmā meyaḥ mandaraḥ mandareśvaraḥ meruḥ mātā pramāṇam ca mādhavaḥ mala varjitaḥ

analyzed: mālā dharaḥ mahādevena pūjitaḥ mahā śāntaḥ mahābhāgaḥ madhusūdanaḥ eva ca

original: lakṣmaṇo lakṣaṇaścaiva lambauṣṭho lalitastathā(250) / nānālaṅkārasaṃyukto nānācandanacarcitaḥ //
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ lakṣaṇaḥ ca eva lamba oṣṭhaḥ nānā alaṅkāra saṃyuktaḥ nānā candana carcitaḥ

analyzed: nānā rasa ujjavalat vakkraḥ nānā puṣpa upaśobhitaḥ rāmaḥ ramā patiḥ ca eva sa bhāryaḥ parameśvaraḥ

analyzed: ratna daḥ ratna hartā

analyzed: rūpī rūpa vivarjitaḥ mahā rūpa ugra rūpaḥ ca saumya rūpaḥ tathā eva ca

original: hyavarṇakaḥ //

analyzed: suvarṇāvayavaḥ ca eva suvarṇaḥ svarṇamekhalaḥ

analyzed: kāraṇam mahataḥ ca eva pradhānasya ca kāraṇam buddhīnām kāraṇam ca eva kāraṇam manasaḥ tathā

original: kāraṇaṃ caitasaścaiva(300)
analyzed: kāraṇam

analyzed: ahaṅkārasya kāraṇam bhūtānām kāraṇam tadvat kāraṇam ca vibhāvasoḥ

analyzed: ākāśa kāraṇam tadvat pṛthivyāḥ kāraṇam param aṇḍasya kāraṇam ca eva prakṛteḥ kāraṇam tathā

original: tadvatkāraṇaṃ ca tvacastathā //

original: jihvāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ caiva prāṇasyaiva ca kāraṇam / hastayoḥ kāraṇaṃ tadvatpādayoḥ kāraṇaṃ tathā //
analyzed: jihvāyāḥ kāraṇam ca eva prāṇasya eva ca kāraṇam hastayoḥ kāraṇam tadvat pādayoḥ kāraṇam tathā

analyzed: yamasya kāraṇam ca eva

original: nṛpāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ dharṃmasyaiva tu kāraṇam / jantūnāṃ kāraṇaṃ caiva vasūnāṃ kāraṇaṃ param //
analyzed: nṛpāṇām kāraṇam śreṣṭham dharṃmasya eva tu kāraṇam jantūnām kāraṇam ca eva vasūnām kāraṇam param

original: gandharvāṇāṃ ca kāraṇam //
analyzed: gandharvāṇām ca kāraṇam

original: nadānāṃ kāraṇaṃ caiva nadīnāṃ kāraṇaṃ param / kāraṇaṃ ca samudrāṇāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ tathā //

analyzed: kāraṇam vīrudhām ca eva lokānām kāraṇam tathā pātāla kāraṇam ca eva devānām kāraṇam tathā

analyzed: sarpāṇām kāraṇam

analyzed: śreyasām kāraṇam tathā pūśanām kāraṇam ca eva sarveṣām kāraṇam tathā

original: śabdātmā caiva (370)
analyzed: śabda ātmā ca eva

analyzed: atniḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ pulahaḥ pulastyaḥ kutsaḥ eva ca yājñavalkyaḥ devalaḥ ca vyāsaḥ ca eva parāśaraḥ

analyzed: anantaḥ

kṣamākāntirbhaktaścaiva (530)
analyzed: kṣamā kāntiḥ bhaktaḥ ca eva

original: dayā parā //
