original: matsyaḥ paraśurāmaśca(550)
analyzed: matsyaḥ

original: prahrādo balirevaca / śaraṇyaścaiva nityaśca buddho muktaḥ śarīrabhṛt //
analyzed: prahrādaḥ baliḥ eva ca śaraṇyaḥ ca eva nityaḥ ca buddhaḥ muktaḥ śarīra bhṛt

original: kharadūṣaṇahantā ca rāvaṇasya pramardanaḥ / sītāpatiśca (560)
analyzed: khara dūṣaṇa hantā ca rāvaṇasya pramardanaḥ sītā patiḥ ca

original: vardhiṣṇurbharataśca tathaiva ca //
analyzed: vardhiṣṇuḥ bharataḥ ca tathā eva ca

original: kumbhendrajinnihantā ca kumbhakarṇapramardanaḥ / narāntakāntakaścaiva devāntakavināśanaḥ //
analyzed: kumbha indrajit nihantā ca kumbhakarṇa pramardanaḥ narāntaka antakaḥ ca eva devāntaka vināśanaḥ

original: duṣṭāsuranihantā ca śambarāristathaiva ca / narakasya nihantā ca triśīrṣasya vināśanaḥ (570) //
analyzed: duṣṭa asura nihantā ca śambarāriḥ tathā eva ca narakasya nihantā ca triśīrṣasya vināśanaḥ

original: yamalārjanabhettā ca tapohitakarastathā / vāditraṃ caiva vādyaṃ ca buddhaścaiva varapradaḥ //
analyzed: yamalā arjana bhettā ca tapaḥ hita karaḥ tathā vāditram ca eva vādyam ca buddhaḥ ca eva vara pradaḥ

original: sāraḥ sārapriyaḥ sauraḥ kālahantṛnikṛntanaḥ(580) / agastyo devalaścaiva nārado nāradapriyaḥ //
analyzed: sāraḥ sārapriyaḥ sauraḥ    agastyaḥ devalaḥ ca eva nāradaḥ nāradapriyaḥ

original: prāṇo 'pānastathā vyāno rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamaḥ (590)śarat / udānaśca samānaśca bheṣajaṃ ca bhiṣak tathā //
analyzed: prāṇaḥ pānaḥ tathā vyānaḥ rajaḥ sattvam tamaḥ    udānaḥ ca samānaḥ ca bheṣajam ca bhiṣaj tathā

original: kūṭasthaḥ svaccharūpaśca sarvadehavivarjitaḥ / cakṣurindriyahīnaśca vāgindriyavivarjitaḥ(600) //
analyzed: kūṭasthaḥ su accha rūpaḥ ca sarva deha vivarjitaḥ cakṣuḥ indriya hīnaḥ ca

original: hastendriyavihīnaśca pādābhyāṃ ca vivarjitaḥ / pāyūpasthavihīnaśca marutāpavivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: hasta indriya vihīnaḥ ca pādābhyām ca vivarjitaḥ pāyu upastha vihīnaḥ ca maru tāpa vivarjitaḥ

original: prabodhena vihīnaśca buddhyā caiva vi varjitaḥ / cetasā vigataścaiva prāṇena ca vivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: prabodhena vihīnaḥ ca buddhyā ca eva vi varjitaḥ cetasā vigataḥ ca eva prāṇena ca vivarjitaḥ

original: apānena vihīnaśca vyānena ca vivarjitaḥ(610) / udānena vihīnaśca samānena vivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: apānena vihīnaḥ ca vyānena ca     udānena vihīnaḥ ca samānena vivarjitaḥ

original: ākāśena vihīnaśca vāyunā parivarjitaḥ / agninā ca vihīnaśca udakena vivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: ākāśena vihīnaḥ ca vāyunā parivarjitaḥ agninā ca vihīnaḥ ca udakena vivarjitaḥ

original: pṛthivyā ca vihīnaśca śabdena ca vivarjitaḥ / sparśena ca vihīnaśca sarvarūpavivarjitaḥ(620) //
analyzed: pṛthivyā ca vihīnaḥ ca śabdena ca vivarjitaḥ sparśena ca vihīnaḥ ca

original: rāgeṇa vigataścaiva aghena parivarjitaḥ / śokena rahitaścaiva vacasā parivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: rāgeṇa vigataḥ ca eva aghena parivarjitaḥ śokena rahitaḥ ca eva vacasā parivarjitaḥ

original: rajo vivarjitaścaiva vikāraiḥ ṣaḍbhireva ca / kāmena varjitaścaiva krodhena parivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: rajaḥ vivarjitaḥ ca eva vikāraiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ eva ca kāmena varjitaḥ ca eva krodhena parivarjitaḥ

original: lobhena vigataścaiva dambhena ca vivarjitaḥ / sūkṣmaścaiva (630)
analyzed: lobhena vigataḥ ca eva dambhena ca vivarjitaḥ sūkṣmaḥ ca eva

original: susūkṣmaśca sthūlātsthūlatarastathā //
analyzed: su sūkṣmaḥ ca sthūlāt sthūlataraḥ tathā

original: viśārado balādhyakṣaḥ sarvasya kṣobhakastathā / prakṛteḥ kṣobhakaścaiva mahataḥ kṣobhakastathā //
analyzed: viśāradaḥ bala adhyakṣaḥ sarvasya kṣobhakaḥ tathā prakṛteḥ kṣobhakaḥ ca eva mahataḥ kṣobhakaḥ tathā

original: bhūtānāṃ kṣobhakaścaiva buddheśca kṣomakastathā / indriyāṇāṃ kṣobhakaśca(640)
analyzed: bhūtānām kṣobhakaḥ ca eva buddheḥ ca kṣomakaḥ tathā indriyāṇām

original: viṣayakṣobhakastathā //
analyzed: viṣaya kṣobhakaḥ tathā

original: brahmaṇaḥ kṣobhakaścaiva rudrasya kṣobhakastathā / agamyaścakṣurādeśca śrotrāgamyastathaiva ca //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ kṣobhakaḥ ca eva rudrasya kṣobhakaḥ tathā agamyaḥ cakṣuḥ ādeḥ ca śrotra agamyaḥ tathā eva ca

original: tvacā na gamyaḥ kūrṃmaśca jihvāgrāhyastathaiva ca / grāṇondriyāgamya eva vācāgrāhyastathaiva ca (650) //
analyzed: tvacā na gamyaḥ kūrṃmaḥ ca jihvā grāhyaḥ tathā eva ca grāṇa indriya agamyaḥ eva vācā agrāhyaḥ tathā eva ca

original: agamyaścaiva pāṇibhyāṃ padāgamyastathaiva ca / agrāhyo manasaścaiva buddhyāgrāhyo haristathā //
analyzed: agamyaḥ ca eva pāṇibhyām pada agamyaḥ tathā eva ca agrāhyaḥ manasaḥ ca eva buddhyā agrāhyaḥ hariḥ tathā

original: ahaṃ buddhyā tathā grāhyaścetasā grāhyā eva ca / śaṅkhapāṇiścāvyayaśca gadāpāṇistathaiva ca (660) //
analyzed: aham buddhyā tathā grāhyaḥ cetasā grāhyāḥ eva ca śaṅkhapāṇiḥ ca avyayaḥ ca gadā pāṇiḥ tathā eva ca

original: śārṅgapāṇiśca kṛṣṇaśca jñānamūrtiḥ parantapaḥ / tapasvī jñānagamyo hi jñānī jñānavideva ca //
analyzed: śārṅgapāṇiḥ ca kṛṣṇaḥ ca jñāna mūrtiḥ parantapaḥ tapasvī jñāna gamyaḥ hi jñānī jñāna vid eva ca

original: jñeyaśca jñeyahīnaśca (670)
analyzed: jñeyaḥ ca jñeya hīnaḥ ca

original: jñaptiścaitanyarūpakaḥ / bhāvo bhāvyo bhavakaro bhāvano bhavanāśanaḥ //
go vindo gopatirgopaḥ(680)
analyzed: go vindo

original: sarvagopīsukhapradaḥ / gopālo gogatiścaiva gomatirgodharastathā //
upendraśca nṛsiṃhaśca śauriścaiva janārdanaḥ / āraṇeyo(690) bṛhadbhānurbṛhaddīptistathaiva ca //
analyzed: upendraḥ ca nṛsiṃhaḥ ca śauriḥ ca eva janārdanaḥ   bṛhadbhānuḥ bṛhaddīptiḥ tathā eva ca

original: dāmodarastnikālaśca kālajñaḥ kālavarjitaḥ / trisandhyo dvāparaṃ tretā prajādvāraṃ(700)
analyzed: dāmodaraḥ tnikālaḥ ca kālajñaḥ kālavarjitaḥ trisandhyaḥ dvāparam tretā

original: trivikramaḥ //
analyzed: trivikramaḥ

original: vikramo daṇḍa(ra)
analyzed: vikramaḥ daṇḍara

original: hastaśca hyekadaṇḍī tridaṇḍadhṛk / sāmabhedastathopāyaḥ sāmarūpī ca sāmagaḥ //
analyzed: hastaḥ ca hi ekadaṇḍī tridaṇḍa dhṛk sāma bhedaḥ tathā upāyaḥ sāmarūpī ca sāmagaḥ

original: sāmavedoḥ(710)hyatharvaśca sukṛtaḥ sutarūpaṇaḥ / atharvavedaviccaiva hyatharvācārya eva ca //
analyzed: su kṛtaḥ suta rūpaṇaḥ atharvaveda vid ca eva hi atharva ācāryaḥ eva ca

original: ṛgrūpī caiva ṛgveda ṛgvedeṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ / bahupācca supāccaiva tathaiva ca sahasrapāt / catuṣpācca dvipāccaiva smṛtirnyāyo yamo balī(730) //
analyzed: ṛk rūpī ca eva ṛgvedaḥ ṛgvedeṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ bahupād ca supād ca eva tathā eva ca sahasrapād  catuṣpād ca dvipād ca eva smṛtiḥ nyāyaḥ

original: sannyāsī cai sannayāsaścaturāśrama eva ca / brahmacārī gṛhasthaśca vānaprasthaśca bhikṣukaḥ //
analyzed: sannyāsī sannayāsaḥ catur āśramaḥ eva ca brahmacārī gṛhasthaḥ ca vānaprasthaḥ ca bhikṣukaḥ

original: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ (740)
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vaiśyaḥ

original: śūdro varṇastathaiva ca / śīladaḥ śīlasampanno duḥ śīlaparivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: śūdraḥ varṇaḥ tathā eva ca śīla daḥ śīla sampannaḥ duḥ śīla parivarjitaḥ

original: mokṣo 'dhyātmasamāviṣṭaḥ stutiḥ stotā ca pūjakaḥ / pūjyo(750)vāk karaṇaṃ caiva vācyaṃ caiva tu vācakaḥ //
analyzed: mokṣaḥ dhyā ātma samāviṣṭaḥ stutiḥ stotā ca pūjakaḥ karaṇam ca eva vācyam ca eva tu vācakaḥ

original: vettā vyākaraṇaṃ caiva vākyaṃ caiva ca vākyavit / tīrthastīrtho ca tīrthavit //
analyzed: vettā vyākaraṇam ca eva vākyam ca eva ca vākya vid tīrthaḥ tīrtho ca tīrtha vid

original: tīrthādibhūtaḥ sāṃkhyaśca niruktaṃ tvadhidaivatam / praṇavaḥ praṇaveśaśca praṇavena pravanditaḥ(770) //
analyzed: tīrtha ādi bhūtaḥ sāṃkhyaḥ ca niruktam tu adhidaivatam praṇavaḥ praṇava īśaḥ ca praṇavena

original: praṇavena ca lakṣyo vai gāyatrī ca gadādharaḥ / śālagrāmanivāsī ca (780)
analyzed: praṇavena ca lakṣyaḥ vai gāyatrī ca gadā dharaḥ śālagrāma nivāsī ca

original: śālagrāmastathaiva ca //
analyzed: śālagrāmaḥ tathā eva ca

original: jalaśāyī yogaśāyī śeṣaśāyī kuśeśayaḥ / mahībhartā ca (790)
analyzed: jalaśāyī yogaśāyī śeṣaśāyī kuśeśayaḥ mahībhartā ca

original: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ pṛthivīdharaḥ //
analyzed: kāryam ca kāraṇam pṛthivīdharaḥ

original: prajāpatiḥ śāśvataśca kāmyaḥ kāmayitā virāṭ / samrāṭ pūṣā(800)
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ śāśvataḥ ca kāmyaḥ kāmayitā virāj samrāj

original: tathā svargo rathasthaḥ sārathirbalam //
analyzed: tathā svargaḥ ratha sthaḥ sārathiḥ balam

original: dhanī dhanaprado dhanyo yādavānāṃ hite rataḥ / arjunasya priyaścaiva hyarjuno(810)
analyzed: dhanī dhana pradaḥ dhanyaḥ yādavānām hite rataḥ arjunasya priyaḥ ca eva

original: bhīma eva ca //
analyzed: bhīmaḥ eva ca

original: parākramo durviṣahaḥ sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ / sārasvato mahābhīṣmaḥ pārijātaharastathā //
analyzed: parākramaḥ durviṣahaḥ sarva śāstra viśāradaḥ sārasvataḥ mahā bhīṣmaḥ pārijāta haraḥ tathā

original: amṛtasya pradātā ca kṣīrodaḥ kṣīrameva ca (820) / indrātmajastasya goptā govardhanadharastathā //
analyzed: amṛtasya pradātā ca kṣīrodaḥ kṣīram eva ca    indra ātmajaḥ tasya goptā govardhana dharaḥ tathā

original: kaṃsasya nāśanastadvaddhastipo hastināśanaḥ / śipiviṣṭaḥ prasannaśca sarvalokārtināśanaḥ //
analyzed: kaṃsasya nāśanaḥ tadvat hastipaḥ hasti nāśanaḥ śipiviṣṭaḥ prasannaḥ ca sarva loka ārti nāśanaḥ

original: mudro(830)mudrā karaścaiva sarvamudrāvivarjitaḥ / dehī dehasthitaścaiva dehasya ca niyāmakaḥ //
analyzed: karaḥ ca eva sarva mudrā vivarjitaḥ dehī deha sthitaḥ ca eva dehasya ca niyāmakaḥ

original: śrotrā śrotraniyantā ca śrotavyaḥ śravaṇaṃ tathā / sparśayitvā spṛśyaṃ ca sparśanaṃ tathā //
analyzed: śrotrā śrotra niyantā ca śrotavyaḥ śravaṇam tathā sparśayitvā spṛśyam ca sparśanam tathā

original: rūpadraṣṭā ca cakṣuḥ stho niyantā cakṣuṣastathā / dṛśyaṃ caivatu jihvāstho rasajñaśca niyāmakaḥ (850) //
analyzed: rūpa draṣṭā ca cakṣuḥ sthaḥ niyantā cakṣuṣaḥ tathā dṛśyam ca eva tu jihvā sthaḥ rasa jñaḥ ca niyāmakaḥ

original: ghrāṇastho ghrāṇakṛd ghrātā ghrāṇendriyaniyāmakaḥ / vākstho vaktā ca vaktavyo vacanaṃ vāṅniyāmakaḥ //
analyzed: ghrāṇa sthaḥ ghrāṇa kṛt ghrātā ghrāṇa indriya niyāmakaḥ vāc sthaḥ vaktā ca vaktavyaḥ vacanam vāc niyāmakaḥ

original: prāṇisthaḥ (860)
analyzed: prāṇi sthaḥ

original: śilpa kṛcchilpo hastayośca niyāmakaḥ / padavyaścaiva gantā ca gantavyaṃ gamanaṃ tathā //
analyzed: śilpa kṛt śilpaḥ hastayoḥ ca niyāmakaḥ padavyaḥ ca eva gantā ca gantavyam gamanam tathā

original: niyantā pādayoścaiva pādyabhākca visargakṛt(870) / visargasya niyantā ca hyupasthasthaḥ sukhaṃ tathā //
analyzed: niyantā pādayoḥ ca eva pādya bhāj ca visargasya niyantā ca hi upastha sthaḥ sukham tathā

original: upasthasya niyantā ca tadānandakaraśca ha / śatrughnaḥ kārtavīryaśca dattātreyastathaiva ca //
analyzed: upasthasya niyantā ca tad ānanda karaḥ ca ha śatrughnaḥ kārtavīryaḥ ca dattātreyaḥ tathā eva ca

original: alarkasya hitaścaiva kārtavīryanikṛntanaḥ (880) / kālanemirmahānemirmegho meghapatistathā //
analyzed: alarkasya hitaḥ ca eva kārtavīrya nikṛntanaḥ   kālanemiḥ mahānemiḥ meghaḥ meghapatiḥ tathā

original: annaprado 'nnarūpī ca hyannādo 'nnapravartakaḥ / devakīputra uttamaḥ //
analyzed: anna pradaḥ nna rūpī ca hi anna ādaḥ nna pravartakaḥ devakīputraḥ uttamaḥ

original: devakyānandano nando rohiṇyāḥ priya eva ca / vasudevapriyaścaiva vasudevasutastathā //
analyzed: devakī ānandanaḥ nandaḥ rohiṇyāḥ priyaḥ eva ca vasudeva priyaḥ ca eva vasudeva sutaḥ tathā

original: dundubhirhāsarūpaśca puṣpahāsastathaiva ca (900) / aṭṭahāsapriyaścaiva sarvādhyakṣaḥ kṣaro 'kṣaraḥ //
analyzed: dundubhiḥ hāsarūpaḥ ca puṣpahāsaḥ tathā eva ca   aṭṭahāsapriyaḥ ca eva sarvādhyakṣaḥ kṣaro kṣaraḥ

original: acyutaścaiva satyeśaḥ satyāyāśca priyo varaḥ / rukmiṇyāśca patiścaiva rukmiṇyā vallabhastathā //
analyzed: acyutaḥ ca eva satyeśaḥ satyāyāḥ ca priyaḥ varaḥ rukmiṇyāḥ ca patiḥ ca eva rukmiṇyāḥ vallabhaḥ tathā

original: gopīnāṃ vallabhaścaiva(910)
analyzed: gopīnām

original: puṇyaślokaśca viśrutaḥ / vṛṣākapiryamo guhyo makulaśca budhastathā //
analyzed: puṇyaślokaḥ ca viśrutaḥ vṛṣākapiḥ yamaḥ guhyaḥ makulaḥ ca budhaḥ tathā

original: rāhuḥ keturgraho grāho(920)
analyzed: rāhuḥ ketuḥ grahaḥ

original: gajendramukhamelakaḥ / grāhasya vinihantā ca grāmī rakṣakastathā //
analyzed: gaja indra mukha melakaḥ grāhasya vinihantā ca grāmī rakṣakaḥ tathā

original: kinnaraścaiva siddhaśca chandaḥ svacchanda eva ca / viśvarūpo viśālākṣo(930)
analyzed: kinnaraḥ ca eva siddhaḥ ca chandaḥ svacchandaḥ eva ca

original: daityasūdana eva ca //
analyzed: daitya sūdanaḥ eva ca

original: anantarūpo bhūtastho devadānavasaṃsthitaḥ / suṣuptisthaḥ suṣuptiśca sthānaṃ sthānānta eva ca //
analyzed: ananta rūpaḥ bhūta sthaḥ deva dānava saṃsthitaḥ suṣupti sthaḥ suṣuptiḥ ca sthānam sthāna antaḥ eva ca

original: jagatsthaścaiva jāgartā sthānaṃ jāgaritaṃ tathā (940) / svaprasthaḥ svapravitsvapnasthānaṃ svapnastathaiva ca //
analyzed: jagatsthaḥ ca eva jāgartā sthānam jāgaritam tathā svapra sthaḥ svapravid svapna sthānam svapnaḥ tathā eva ca

original: jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaiśca vihīno vai caturthakaḥ / vijñānaṃ vedyarūpaṃ ca jīvo jīvayitā tathā (950) //
analyzed: jāgrat svapna suṣuptaiḥ ca vihīnaḥ vai caturthakaḥ vijñānam vedya rūpam ca jīvaḥ jīvayitā tathā

original: bhuvanādhipatiścaiva bhuvanānāṃ niyāmakaḥ / pātālavāsī pātālaṃ sarvajvaravināśanaḥ //
analyzed: bhuvana adhipatiḥ ca eva bhuvanānām niyāmakaḥ pātāla vāsī pātālam sarva jvara vināśanaḥ

original: paramānandarūpī ca dharṃmāṇāṃ ca pravartakaḥ / sulabho durlabhaścaiva prāṇāyāmaparastathā(960) //
analyzed: parama ānanda rūpī ca dharṃmāṇām ca pravartakaḥ sulabhaḥ durlabhaḥ ca eva

original: pratyāhāro dhārakaśca pratyāhārakarastathā / prabhā kāntistathā hyarciḥ śuddhasphaṭikasannibhaḥ //
analyzed: pratyāhāraḥ dhārakaḥ ca pratyāhāra karaḥ tathā prabhā kāntiḥ tathā hi arciḥ śuddha sphaṭika sannibhaḥ

original: agrāhaścaiva gauraśca sarvaḥ(970)
analyzed: agrāhaḥ ca eva gauraḥ ca

original: śucirabhiṣṭutaḥ / vaṣaṭkāro vaṣaḍ vauṣaṭ svadhā svāhā ratistathā //
analyzed: śuciḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ vaṣaṭkāraḥ vaṣaṭ vauṣaṭ svadhā svāhā ratiḥ tathā

original: paktā nandayitā(980)
analyzed: paktā

original: bhoktā boddhā bhāvayitā tathā / jñānātmā caiva dehātmā bhū(u)
analyzed: bhoktā boddhā bhāvayitā tathā jñāna ātmā ca eva deha ātmā

original: mā sarveśvareśvaraḥ //
analyzed: mā sarva īśvara īśvaraḥ

original: nadī nandī ca nandīśo(990)
analyzed: nadī nandī ca

original: bhāratastarunāśanaḥ / cakrapaḥ śrīpatiścaiva nṛpāṇāṃ cakravartinām //
analyzed: bhārataḥ taru nāśanaḥ cakrapaḥ śrīpatiḥ ca eva nṛpāṇām cakravartinām

original: īśaśca sarvadevānāṃ dvārakāsaṃsthitastathā / puṣkaraḥ puṣkarādhyakṣaḥ puṣkaradvīpa eva ca (1000) //
analyzed: īśaḥ ca sarva devānām dvārakā saṃsthitaḥ tathā puṣkaraḥ puṣkarādhyakṣaḥ puṣkaradvīpaḥ eva ca

original: bharato janako janyaḥ sarvākāravi varjitaḥ / nirākāro nirnimitto nirātaṅko nirāśrayaḥ (1008) //
analyzed: bharataḥ janakaḥ janyaḥ varjitaḥ nirākāraḥ nirnimittaḥ nirātaṅkaḥ nirāśrayaḥ

original: iti nāmasahasraṃ te vṛṣabhadhvaja kīrtitam / devasya viṣṇorīśaśya sarvapāpavināśanam //
analyzed: iti nāma sahasram te vṛṣabhadhvaja kīrtitam devasya viṣṇoḥ īśa śya sarva pāpa vināśanam

original: paṭhandvijaśca viṣṇutvaṃ kṣatriyo jayamāpnuyāt / vaiśyo dhanaṃ sukhaṃ śūdro viṣṇubhaktisamanvitaḥ //
analyzed: paṭhan dvijaḥ ca viṣṇu tvam kṣatriyaḥ jayam āpnuyāt vaiśyaḥ dhanam sukham śūdraḥ viṣṇu bhakti samanvitaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrīviṣṇusahasranāmastotranirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe śrīviṣṇusahasranāmastotranirūpaṇam nāma pañcadaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 16
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: rudra uvāca / punardhyānaṃ samācakṣva śaṅkhacakragadādhara / viṣṇorīśasya devasya śuddhasya paramātmanaḥ //
analyzed: rudraḥ uvāca punar dhyānam samācakṣva śaṅkha cakra gadā dhara viṣṇoḥ īśasya devasya śuddhasya paramātmanaḥ

original: hariruvāca / śṛṇu rudra / harerdhyānaṃ saṃsāratarunāśanam / dṛśirūpamanantaṃ ca sarvavyāpyajamavyayam //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca śṛṇu rudra hareḥ dhyānam saṃsāra taru nāśanam dṛśi rūpam anantam ca sarva vyāpi ajam avyayam

original: akṣaraṃ sarvagaṃ nityaṃ mahabdrahmāsti kevalam / sarvasya jagato mūlaṃ sarvagaṃ parameśavaram //
analyzed: akṣaram sarvagam nityam mahat drahma asti kevalam sarvasya jagataḥ mūlam sarvagam parameśa varam

original: sarvabhūtahṛdisthaṃ vai sarvabhūtamaheśvaram / sarvādhāraṃ nirādhāraṃ sarvakāraṇakāraṇam //
analyzed: sarva bhūta hṛdistham vai sarva bhūta maheśvaram sarva ādhāram nirādhāram sarva kāraṇa kāraṇam

original: alepakaṃ tathā muktaṃ muktayogivicititam / sthūladehavihīnaṃ ca cakṣuṣā parivarjitam //
analyzed: alepakam tathā muktam sthūla deha vihīnam ca cakṣuṣā parivarjitam

original: vāgindriyavihīnaṃ ca prāṇidharṃmavivarjitam / pādendriyavihīnaṃ ca vāgdharmaparivarjitam / pāyūpasthavihīnaṃ ca sarvaiṃndriya vivarjitam //
analyzed: vāc indriya vihīnam ca prāṇi dharṃma vivarjitam pāda indriya vihīnam ca vāc dharma parivarjitam pāyu upastha vihīnam ca sarva indriya vivarjitam

original: manovirahitaṃ tadvanmanodharṃmavivarjitam / buddhyā vihīnaṃ deveśaṃ cetasā parivarjitam //
analyzed: manaḥ virahitam tadvat manaḥ dharṃma vivarjitam  buddhyā vihīnam deveśam cetasā parivarjitam

original: ahaṅkāravihīnaṃ vai buddhidharṃmavivarjitam / prāṇena rahitaṃ caiva hyapānena vivarjitam //
analyzed: ahaṅkāra vihīnam vai buddhi dharṃma vivarjitam prāṇena rahitam ca eva hi apānena vivarjitam

original: vyānākhyavāyuhīnaṃ vai prāṇadharṃmavivarjitam / hariruvāca / punaḥ sūryarcanaṃ vakṣye yaduktaṃ bhṛgave purā //
analyzed: vyāna ākhya vāyu hīnam vai prāṇa dharṃma vivarjitam hariḥ uvāca punar sūri arcanam vakṣye yat uktam bhṛgave purā

original: oṃ khakholkāya namaḥ / sūryasya mūlamantro 'yaṃ bhuktimuktipradāyakaḥ //
analyzed: om khakholkāya namaḥ sūryasya mūlamantraḥ yam bhukti mukti pradāyakaḥ

original: oṃ khakholkāya tridaśāya namaḥ / oṃ vici ṭhaṭha śirase namaḥ / oṃ jñānine ṭhaṭha śikhāyai namaḥ / oṃ sahasraraśmaye ṭhaṭha kavacāya namaḥ //
analyzed: om khakholkāya tridaśāya namaḥ om ṭha ṭha śirase namaḥ om jñānine ṭha ṭha śikhāyai namaḥ om sahasraraśmaye ṭha ṭha kavacāya namaḥ

original: oṃ sarvatejo 'dhipataye ṭhaṭha astrāya namaḥ / oṃ jvalajvala prajvalaprajvala ṭhaṭha namaḥ //
analyzed: om sarva tejaḥ dhipataye ṭha ṭha astrāya namaḥ om jvala jvala prajvala prajvala ṭha ṭha namaḥ

original: agniprākāramantro 'yaṃ sūryasyāghavināśanaḥ / oṃ ādityāya vidmahe,
analyzed: agni prākāra mantraḥ yam sūryasya agha vināśanaḥ om ādityāya vidmahe

original: viśvabhā vāya dhīmahi,
analyzed: viśva bhās vāya dhīmahi

original: tannaḥ sūrya pracodayāt //
analyzed: tat naḥ sūrya pracodayāt

original: sakalīkaraṇaṃ kuryādrāyatryā bhāskarasya ca / dharṃmātmane ca pūrvasminyamā yeti ca dakṣiṇe //
analyzed: sakalīkaraṇam kuryāt rāyatryā bhāskarasya ca  dharṃma ātmane ca pūrvasmin yamāḥ yā iti ca dakṣiṇe

original: daṇḍanāyakāya tato daivatāyeti cottare / śyāmapiṅgalamaiśānyāmāgneyyāṃ dīkṣitaṃ yajet //
analyzed: daṇḍanāyakāya tatas daivatāya iti ca uttare śyāma piṅgalam aiśānyām āgneyyām dīkṣitam yajet

original: vajrapāṇiṃ ca nairṛtyāṃ bhūrbhuvaḥsvaśca vāyave / oṃ candrāya nakṣatrādhipataye namaḥ / oṃ aṅgārakāya kṣitisutāya namaḥ / oṃ budhāya somasutāya namaḥ / oṃ vāgīśvarāya sarvavidyādhipataye namaḥ / oṃ śukrāya maharṣaye bhṛgusutāya namaḥ / oṃ śanaiścarāya sūryātmajāya namaḥ / oṃ rāhave namaḥ / oṃ ketave namaḥ //
analyzed: vajrapāṇim ca nairṛtyām bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar ca vāyave om candrāya nakṣatra adhipataye namaḥ om aṅgārakāya kṣitisutāya namaḥ om budhāya somasutāya namaḥ om vāc īśvarāya sarva vidyā adhipataye namaḥ om śukrāya mahā ṛṣaye bhṛgusutāya namaḥ om śanaiścarāya sūryātmajāya namaḥ om rāhave namaḥ om ketave namaḥ om rāhave namaḥ om ketave namaḥ om anuṣṭubhaḥ namaḥ om anuṣṭubhaḥ namaḥ om anuṣṭubhaḥ namaḥ om anuṣṭubhaḥ namaḥ

original: pūrvādīśānaparyantā ete pūjyā vṛṣadhvaja / oṃ anūkāya namaḥ / oṃ prathamanāthāya namaḥ / oṃ buddhāya namaḥ //
analyzed: pūrva ādi īśāna paryantāḥ ete pūjyāḥ vṛṣadhvaja om anūkāya namaḥ om prathama nāthāya namaḥ om buddhāya namaḥ

original: oṃ bhagavannaparimitamayūkhamālin / sakalajagatpate / saptāśvavāhana / caturbhuja / paramasiddhiprada / visphuliṅgapiṅgala / tata ehyehi idamarghyaṃ mama śirasi gataṃ gṛhṇagṛhṇa tejograrūpam anagna / jvalajvala ṭhaṭha namaḥ //
analyzed: om bhagavan aparimita mayūkhamālin sakala jagat pate sapta aśva vāhana catur bhuja parama siddhi prada visphuliṅga piṅgala tatas ehi ehi idam arghyam mama śirasi gatam gṛhṇa gṛhṇa teja ugra rūpam anagna jvala jvala ṭha ṭha namaḥ

original: anenāvāhya mantreṇa tataḥ sūryaṃ visarjayet / oṃ namo bhagavate ādityāya sahasra kiraṇāya gaccha sukhaṃ punarāgamanāyeti //
analyzed: anena āvāhya mantreṇa tatas sūryam visarjayet om namaḥ bhagavate ādityāya sahasra kiraṇāya gaccha sukham punarāgamanāya iti

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe haridhyānasūryārcanayornirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe haridhyānasūryārcanayornirūpaṇam nāma ṣoḍaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 17
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / punaḥ sūryārcanaṃ vakṣye yaduktaṃ dhanadāya hi / aṣṭapatraṃ likhetpadmaṃ śucau deśe sakarṇikam //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca punar sūrya arcanam vakṣye yat uktam dhanadāya hi aṣṭa patram likhet padmam śucau deśe sa karṇikam

original: āvāhanīṃ tato baddhā mudrāmāvāhayedravim / khakholkaṃ sthāpya mudrāṃ tu sthāpayenmantrarūpiṇīm //
analyzed: āvāhanīm tatas baddhā mudrām āvāhayet ravim khakholkam sthāpya mudrām tu sthāpayet mantra rūpiṇīm

original: āgneyyāṃ diśi devasya hṛdayaṃ sthāpayecchiva / / aiśānyāṃ tu śiraḥ sthāpyaṃ nairṛtyāṃ vinyasecchikhām //
analyzed: āgneyyām diśi devasya hṛdayam sthāpayet śiva aiśānyām tu śiraḥ sthāpyam nairṛtyām vinyaset śikhām

original: paurandaryāṃ nyaseddharṃmamekāgrasthitamānasaḥ / vāyavyāṃ caiva netraṃ tu vāruṇyāmastrameva ca //
analyzed: paurandaryām nyaset harṃmam ekāgra sthita mānasaḥ vāyavyām ca eva netram tu vāruṇyām astram eva ca

original: aiśānyāṃ sthāpayetsomaṃ paurandaryāṃ tu lohitam / āgneyyāṃ somatanayaṃ yāmyāṃ caiva bṛhaspatim //
analyzed: aiśānyām sthāpayet somam paurandaryām tu lohitam  āgneyyām soma tanayam yāmyām ca eva bṛhaspatim

original: nairṛtyāṃ dānavaguruṃ vāruṇyāṃ tu śanaiścaram / vāyavyāṃ ca tathā ketuṃ kauberyāṃ rāhumeva ca //
analyzed: nairṛtyām dānavagurum vāruṇyām tu śanaiścaram vāyavyām ca tathā ketum kauberyām rāhum eva ca

original: dvitīyāyāṃ tu kakṣāyāṃ sūryāndvādaśa pūjayet / bhagaḥ sūryor'yyamā caiva mitro vai varuṇastathā //
analyzed: dvitīyāyām tu kakṣāyām sūryān dvādaśa pūjayet bhagaḥ ca eva mitraḥ vai varuṇaḥ tathā

original: savitā caiva dhātā ca vivasvāṃśca mahābalaḥ / tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathā cendro dvādaśo viṣṇurucyate //
analyzed: savitā ca eva dhātā ca vivasvān ca mahā balaḥ tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathā ca indraḥ dvādaśaḥ viṣṇuḥ ucyate

original: pūrvādāvarcayeddevānindrādīñchraddhayā naraḥ / jayā ca vijayā caiva jayanti cāparājitā / śeṣaśca vāsukiścaiva nāgānityādi pūjayet //
analyzed: pūrva ādau arcayet devān indra ādīn śraddhayā naraḥ jayā ca vijayā ca eva jayanti ca aparājitā  śeṣaḥ ca vāsukiḥ ca eva nāgān ityādi pūjayet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryārcana vidhirnāma saptadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe sūryārcanavidhiḥ nāma saptadaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 18
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / garuḍoktaṃ kaśyapāya vakṣye mṛtyuñjayārcanam / uddhārapūrvakaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvadevamayaṃ matam //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca garuḍa uktam kaśyapāya vakṣye mṛtyuñjaya arcanam uddhāra pūrvakam puṇyam sarva deva mayam matam

original: oṅkāraṃ pūrvamuddhṛtya ju(hu)
analyzed: oṅkāram pūrvam uddhṛtya juhu

original: ṅkāṃraṃ tadanantaram / savisargaṃ tṛtīyaṃ syānmṛtyudāridrayamardanam //
analyzed: tad anantaram sa visargam tṛtīyam syāt

original: īśaviṣṇavarkadevyādikavacaṃ sarvasādhakam / amṛteśaṃ mahāmantrantryakṣaraṃ pūjanaṃ samam / japanānmṛtyuhīnāḥ syuḥ sarvapāpavivarjitāḥ //
analyzed: īśa viṣṇava arka devī ādi kavacam sarva sādhakam amṛta īśam pūjanam samam  japanāt mṛtyu hīnāḥ syuḥ sarva pāpa vivarjitāḥ

original: śatajapyādvedaphalaṃ yajñatīrthaphalaṃ labhet / aṣṭottaraśatājjāpyātrisandhyaṃ mṛtyu śatrujita //
analyzed: śata japyāt veda phalam yajña tīrtha phalam labhet aṣṭottaraśatāt jāpya atrisandhyam

original: dhyāyecca sitapadmasthaṃ varadaṃ cābhayaṃ kare / dvābhyāṃ cāmṛtakumbhaṃ tu cintayedamṛteśvaram //
analyzed: dhyāyet ca sita padma stham vara dam ca abhayam kare dvābhyām ca amṛta kumbham tu cintayet amṛta īśvaram

original: tasyaivāṅgagatāṃ devīmamṛtāmṛtabhāṣiṇī(vini) m / kalaśaṃ dakṣiṇe haste vāmahaste saroruham //
analyzed: tasya eva aṅga gatām devīm amṛta amṛta bhāṣiṇī vini m  kalaśam dakṣiṇe haste vāma haste saroruham

original: japedaṣṭasahasraṃ vai trisandhyaṃ māsamekataḥ / jarāmṛtyumahāvyādhiśatrucchivaśāntidam //
analyzed: japet aṣṭa sahasram vai trisandhyam māsam ekatas jarā mṛtyu mahā vyādhi śatru chiva śānti dam

original: āhvānaṃ sthāpanaṃ rodhaṃ sannidhānaṃ niveśanam / pādyamā camanaṃ snānamarghyaṃ sraganulepanam //
analyzed: āhvānam sthāpanam rodham sannidhānam niveśanam pādyam ā camanam snānam arghyam sraj anulepanam

original: dīpāṃbaraṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ ca naivadyaṃ pānavījanam / mātrāmudrājapadhyānaṃ dakṣiṇā cāhutiḥ stutiḥ //
analyzed: dīpa aṃbaram bhūṣaṇam ca naivadyam pāna vījanam mātrā mudrā japa dhyānam dakṣiṇā ca āhutiḥ stutiḥ

original: vādyaṃ gatiṃ ca nṛtyaṃ ca nyāsayogaṃ pradakṣiṇam / praṇatirmantraśayyā ca vandanaṃ ca visarjanam //
analyzed: vādyam gatim ca nṛtyam ca nyāsa yogam pradakṣiṇam praṇatiḥ mantra śayyā ca vandanam ca visarjanam

original: ṣaḍaṅgādiprakāreṇa pūjanaṃ tu kramoditam / parameśamukhodrītaṃ yo jānāti sa pūjakaḥ //
analyzed: ṣaḍaṅga ādi prakāreṇa pūjanam tu krama uditam parameśa mukha udrītam yaḥ jānāti sa pūjakaḥ

original: arghyapātrārcanaṃ cādāvastreṇaiva tu tāḍanam / śodhanaṃ kavacenaiva amṛtīkaraṇaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: arghya pātra arcanam ca ādau astreṇa eva tu tāḍanam śodhanam kavacena eva amṛtīkaraṇam tatas

original: pūjā cādhāraśaktyādeḥ prāṇāyāmaṃ tathāsane / pīṭhasuddhiṃ tataḥ kuryācchoṣaṇādyaistataḥ smaret //
analyzed: pūjā ca ādhāra śakti ādeḥ prāṇāyāmam tathā āsane pīṭha suddhim tatas kuryāt śoṣaṇa ādyaiḥ tatas smaret

original: ātmānaṃ devarūpaṃ ca karāṅganyāsakaṃ caret / ātmānaṃ pūjayetpaścājyo tīrūpaṃ hṛdabjataḥ //
analyzed: ātmānam deva rūpam ca kara aṅga nyāsakam caret ātmānam pūjayet hṛd abjataḥ

original: mūrtau vā sthaṇḍile vāpi kṣipetpuṣpaṃ tu bhāsvaram / āhvānadvārapūjārthaṃ pūjā cādhāraśaktitaḥ //
analyzed: mūrtau vā sthaṇḍile vā api kṣipet puṣpam tu bhāsvaram āhvāna dvāra pūjā artham pūjā ca ādhāra śaktitaḥ

original: sānnidhyakaraṇaṃ deve parivārasya pūjanam / aṅgaṣaṭkasya pūjā vai kartavyā ca vipaścitaiḥ //
analyzed: sānnidhya karaṇam deve parivārasya pūjanam aṅga ṣaṭkasya pūjā vai kartavyā ca vipaścitaiḥ

original: dharmādayaśca śakrādyāḥ sāyudhāḥ parivārakāḥ / yugavedamuhūrtāśca pūjeyaṃ bhuktimuktikṛt //
analyzed: dharma ādayaḥ ca śakra ādyāḥ sa āyudhāḥ parivārakāḥ yuga veda muhūrtāḥ ca pūjā iyam bhukti mukti kṛt

original: mātṛkāśca gaṇāṃścādau nandigaṅge ca pūjayet / mahākālaṃ ca yamanāṃ dehalyāṃ pūjayetpurā //
analyzed: mātṛkāḥ ca gaṇān ca ādau nandi gaṅge ca pūjayet mahākālam ca dehalyām pūjayet purā

original: oṃ amṛteśvara oṃ bhairavāya namaḥ / evaṃ oṃ juṃ haṃsaḥ sūryāya namaḥ //
analyzed: om amṛta īśvara om bhairavāya namaḥ evam om juṃ haṃsaḥ sūryāya namaḥ

original: evaṃ śivāya kṛṣṇāya brahmaṇe ca gaṇāya ca / caṇḍikāyai sarasvatyai mahālakṣmādi pūjayet //
analyzed: evam śivāya kṛṣṇāya brahmaṇe ca gaṇāya ca caṇḍikāyai sarasvatyai mahā lakṣma ādi pūjayet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśāvye ācārakāṇḍe 'mṛteśamṛtyuñjayapūjanaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa āvye ācāra kāṇḍe mṛteśamṛtyuñjayapūjanam nāma aṣṭādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 19
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / prāṇeśvaraṃ gāruḍaṃ ca śivoktaṃ pravadāmyaham / sthānānyādau pravakṣyāmi nāgadaṣṭo na jīvati //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca prāṇeśvaram gāruḍam ca śiva uktam pravadāmi aham sthānāni ādau pravakṣyāmi nāga daṣṭaḥ na jīvati

original: citāvalmīkaśailādau kape ca vivare taroḥ / daṃśe rekhātrayaṃ yasya pracchannaṃ sa na jīvati //
analyzed: citā valmīka śaila ādau ca vivare taroḥ daṃśe rekhā trayam yasya pracchannam sa na jīvati

original: ṣaṣṭhyāṃ ca karkaṭe meṣe mūlāśleṣāmaghādiṣu / kakṣāśroṇigale sandhau śaṅkhakarṇodarādiṣu //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhyām ca karkaṭe meṣe mūla āśleṣā maghā ādiṣu kakṣa śroṇi gale sandhau śaṅkha karṇa udara ādiṣu

original: daṇḍī śastradharo bhikṣurna gnādiḥ kāladūtakaḥ / bāhau ca vakkre grīvāyāṃ daṣṭāyāṃ na hi jīvati //
analyzed: daṇḍī śastradharaḥ bhikṣuḥ na gna ādiḥ kāla dūtakaḥ bāhau ca vakkre grīvāyām daṣṭāyām na hi jīvati

original: pūrvaṃ dinapatirbhuṅkte ardhayāmaṃ tato 'pare / śeṣā grahāḥ pratidinaṃ ṣaṭsaṃkhyā parivartanaiḥ //
analyzed: pūrvam dinapatiḥ bhuṅkte ardha yāmam pare śeṣāḥ grahāḥ pratidinam ṣaṣ saṃkhyā parivartanaiḥ

original: nāgabhogaḥ kramāñjñeyo rātrau bāṇavivartanaiḥ / śeṣor'kaḥ phaṇipaścandrastakṣako bhauma īritaḥ //
analyzed: nāgabhogaḥ kramāt jñeyaḥ rātrau bāṇa vivartanaiḥ śeṣa ūrkaḥ śeṣa ūrkaḥ

original: karkoṭo jño guruḥ padmo mahāpadmaśca bhārgavaḥ / śaṅkhaḥ śanaiścaro rāhuḥ kulikaścāhayo grahāḥ //
analyzed: karkoṭaḥ jñaḥ guruḥ padmaḥ mahāpadmaḥ ca bhārgavaḥ śaṅkhaḥ śanaiścaraḥ rāhuḥ kulikaḥ ca ahayaḥ grahāḥ

original: rātrau divā suragurorbhāge syādamarāntakaḥ / paṅgoḥ kāle divā rāhuḥ kulikena saha sthitaḥ //
analyzed: rātrau divā suraguroḥ bhāge syāt amara antakaḥ paṅgoḥ kāle divā rāhuḥ kulikena saha sthitaḥ

original: yāmārdhasandhisaṃsthāṃ ca velāṃ kālavatīṃ caret / bāṇadviṣaḍvahnivājiyugabhūrekabhāgataḥ? //
analyzed: yāma ardha sandhi saṃsthām ca velām kālavatīm caret bāṇa dvi ṣaṣ vahni vāji yuga bhūḥ eka bhāgataḥ

original: divā ṣaḍedanetrādripañcatrimānuṣāṃśakaiḥ / pādāṅguṣṭhe pādapṛṣṭhe pādapṛṣṭhe gulphe jānuni liṅgake //
analyzed: divā pādāṅguṣṭhe pāda pṛṣṭhe pāda pṛṣṭhe gulphe jānuni liṅgake

original: nābhau hṛdi stanataṭe kaṇṭhe nāsāpuṭe 'kṣiṇi / karṇayośca bhruvoḥ śaṅkhe mastake pratipatkramāt //
analyzed: nābhau hṛdi stana taṭe kaṇṭhe nāsāpuṭe kṣiṇi karṇayoḥ ca bhruvoḥ śaṅkhe mastake pratipad kramāt

original: tiṣṭhaccandraśca jīvecca puṃso dakṣiṇabhāgake / kāyasya vāmabhāge tu striyā vāyuvahātkarāt //
analyzed: tiṣṭhat candraḥ ca jīvet ca puṃsaḥ dakṣiṇa bhāgake kāyasya vāma bhāge tu striyāḥ vāyu vahāt karāt

original: amṛtastatkṛto moho nivarteta ca mardanāt / ātmanaḥ paramaṃ bījaṃ haṃsākhyaṃ sphaṭikāmalam //
analyzed: amṛtaḥ tad kṛtaḥ mohaḥ nivarteta ca mardanāt ātmanaḥ paramam bījam haṃsa ākhyam sphaṭika amalam

original: dātavyaṃ viṣapāpaghnaṃ bījaṃ tasya caturvidham / vindupañcasvarayutamādyamuktaṃ dvitīyakam / ṣaṣṭhārūḍhaṃ tṛtīyaṃ syātsavisargaṃ caturthakam / oṃ kuru kule svāhā //
analyzed: dātavyam viṣa pāpa ghnam bījam tasya caturvidham  vindu pañca svara yutam ādyam uktam dvitīyakam  ṣaṣṭha ārūḍham tṛtīyam syāt sa visargam caturthakam  om kuru kule svāhā

original: vidyā trailokyarakṣārthaṃ garuḍena dhṛtā purā / vadhepsurnāganāgānāṃ mukhe 'tha praṇavaṃ nyaset //
analyzed: vidyā trailokya rakṣā artham garuḍena dhṛtā purā vadha īpsuḥ nāga nāgānām mukhe praṇavam nyaset

original: gale kuru nyaseddhīmānkule ca gulphayoḥ smṛtaḥ / svāhā pādayuge caiva yugahā nyāsa īritaḥ //
analyzed: gale kuru nyaset dhīmān kule ca gulphayoḥ smṛtaḥ svāhā pāda yuge ca eva yuga hā nyāsaḥ īritaḥ

original: gṛhe vivikhitā yatra tannāgāḥ saṃtyajanti ca / sahasramantraṃ japtvā tu karṇe sūtraṃ dhṛtaṃ tathā //
analyzed: gṛhe yatra tat nāgāḥ saṃtyajanti ca sahasra mantram japtvā tu karṇe sūtram dhṛtam tathā

original: yadrṛhe śarkarā japtā kṣiptā nāgāstyajanti tat / saptalakṣasya japyāddhi siddhiḥ prāptā surāsuraiḥ //
analyzed: yad ṛhe śarkarā japtā kṣiptāḥ nāgāḥ tyajanti tat sapta lakṣasya japyāt hi siddhiḥ prāptā sura asuraiḥ

original: oṃ suvarṇarekhe kukkuṭavigraharūpiṇi svāhā / evañcāṣṭadale padma dale varṇayugaṃ likhet //
analyzed: om suvarṇarekhe kukkuṭa vigraha rūpiṇi svāhā evam ca aṣṭadale padma dale varṇa yugam likhet

original: nāmaitadvāridhārābhiḥ snāto daṣṭo viṣaṃ tyajet / oṃ pakṣi svāhā //
analyzed: nāma etat vāri dhārābhiḥ snātaḥ daṣṭaḥ viṣam tyajet om pakṣi svāhā

original: aṅguṣṭhādi kaniṣṭhāntaṃ kare nyasyātha dehake / ke (kai) vakkre hṛdi liṅge ca pādayorgaruḍasya hi //
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha ādi kaniṣṭhā antam kare nyasya atha dehake  ke kai vakkre hṛdi liṅge ca pādayoḥ garuḍasya hi

original: nākrāmanti ca tacchāyāṃ svapne 'pi viṣapannagāḥ / yastu lakṣaṃ japeccāsyāḥ sa dṛṣṭvā(ṣṭyā)
analyzed: na ākrāmanti ca tad chāyām svapne viṣa pannagāḥ yaḥ tu lakṣam japet ca asyāḥ sa dṛṣṭvā aṣṭyā

original: nāśayedviṣam //
analyzed: nāśayet viṣam

original: oṃ hrī hrau hrīṃ bhi(bhī)
analyzed: om hrī hrau hrīṃ bhibhī

original: ruṇḍāyai svāhā / karṇe japtā tviyaṃ vidyā daṣṭakasya viṣaṃ haret //
analyzed: ruṇḍāyai svāhā karṇe japtā tu iyam vidyā daṣṭakasya viṣam haret

original: a ā nyasettu pādāgre i ī gulaphe 'tha jānuni / u ū e ai kaṭitaṭe o nābhau hṛdi au nyaset //
analyzed: nyaset tu pāda agre gulaphe jānuni kaṭi taṭe nābhau hṛdi nyaset

original: vakkre amuttamāṅge aḥ nyasedvai haṃsasaṃyutāḥ / haṃso viṣādi ca harejjapto dhyāto 'tha pūjitaḥ //
analyzed: vakkre aṃ uttamāṅge aḥ nyaset vai haṃsa saṃyutāḥ haṃsaḥ viṣa ādi ca haret japtaḥ pūjitaḥ

original: garuḍo 'hamiti dhyātvā kuryādviṣaharāṃ (rīṃ) kriyām / haṃmantraṃ gātravinyastaṃ viṣādiharamīritam //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ ham iti dhyātvā kuryāt viṣa harām rīṃ kriyām haṃ mantram gātra vinyastam viṣa ādi haram īritam

original: nyasya haṃsaṃ vāmakare nāsāmukhanirodhakṛt / mantro hareddaṣṭakasya tvaṅmāṃsādigataṃ viṣam //
analyzed: nyasya haṃsam vāma kare nāsā mukha nirodha kṛt mantraḥ haret daṣṭakasya tvac māṃsa ādi gatam viṣam

original: sa vāyunā samākṛṣya daṣṭānāṃ garalaṃ haret / tanau nyaseddaṣṭakasya nīlakaṇṭhādi saṃsmaret //
analyzed: sa vāyunā samākṛṣya daṣṭānām garalam haret tanau nyaset daṣṭakasya nīlakaṇṭha ādi saṃsmaret

original: pītaṃ pratyaṅgirāmūlaṃ taṇḍuladbhirviṣāpaham / punarnavāphalinīnāṃ mūlaṃ vakkrajamīdṛśam //
analyzed: pītam pratyaṅgirā mūlam punarnavā phalinīnām mūlam vakkra jam īdṛśam

original: mūlaṃ śuklabṛhatyāstu karkoṭyāgairikarṇikam / adbhirghṛṣṭaghṛtopetalepo 'yaṃ viṣamardanaḥ //
analyzed: mūlam śukla bṛhatyāḥ tu karkoṭyāḥ gairika ṛṇikam adbhiḥ ghṛṣṭa ghṛta upeta lepaḥ yam viṣa mardanaḥ

original: viṣamṛddhiṃ na vrajecca uṣṇaṃ pibati yo ghṛtam / pañcāṅgaṃ tu śirīṣasya mūlaṃ gṛñjanajaṃ tathā //
analyzed: viṣam ṛddhim na vrajet ca uṣṇam pibati yaḥ ghṛtam pañcāṅgam tu śirīṣasya mūlam gṛñjana jam tathā

original: sarvāṅgalepataśacāpi pānādvā viṣahṛdbhavet / hrīṃ gonasādiviṣahṛt //
analyzed: sarva aṅga lepataḥ śacā api pānāt vā viṣa hṛt bhavet   gonasa ādi viṣa hṛt

original: hṛllalāṭavisargāntaṃ dhyātaṃ vaśyā dikṛdbhavet / nyastaṃ yonau vaśetkanyāṃ kuryānmadajalāvilam //
analyzed: hṛd lalāṭa visarga antam dhyātam vaśyā di kṛt bhavet nyastam yonau kuryāt mada jala āvilam

original: japtvā saptāṣṭasāhasraṃ garutmāniva sarvagaḥ / kaviḥ syācchrutidharī ca vaśyāḥ strīścāyurāpnuyāt / viṣahṛtsyātkathā tadvanmaṇirvyāsaḥ smṛto dhruvam //
analyzed: japtvā sapta aṣṭa sāhasram garutmān iva sarvagaḥ  kaviḥ ca vaśyāḥ strīḥ ca āyuḥ āpnuyāt  viṣa hṛt syāt kathā tadvat maṇiḥ vyāsaḥ smṛtaḥ dhruvam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sarpaviṣaharopāya(prāṇeśvaravidyā)
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe sarpa viṣa hara upāya prāṇeśvara vidyā

original: nirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nirūpaṇam nāma ekonaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 20
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / vakṣye tatparamaṃ guhyaṃ śivoktaṃ mantrabṛndakam / pāśaṃ dhanuśca cakraṃ ca mudraraṃ śūlapaṭṭiśam //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca vakṣye tat paramam guhyam śiva uktam mantra bṛndakam pāśam dhanuḥ ca cakram ca śūla paṭṭiśam

original: etairevāyudhairyuddhe mantraiḥ śatrūñjayennṛpaḥ / mantroddhāraḥ padmapātre ādi pūrvādike likhet //
analyzed: etaiḥ eva āyudhaiḥ yuddhe mantraiḥ śatrūn jayet nṛpaḥ mantra uddhāraḥ padma pātre ādi pūrva ādike likhet

original: aṣṭavargaṃ cāṣṭamaṃ ca khyātamīśānapatrake / oṃ kāro brahma bījaṃ syāddhrīṅkāro viṣṇureva ca //
analyzed: aṣṭa vargam ca aṣṭamam ca khyātam īśāna patrake om kāraḥ brahma bījam syāt hrīṅkāraḥ viṣṇuḥ eva ca

original: hrīṅkā raśca śivaḥ śūle triśākhe tu kramānnyaset / oṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ //
analyzed: hrīṅkā raḥ ca śivaḥ śūle tri śākhe tu kramāt nyaset om hrīṃ hrīṃ

original: śūlaṃ gṛhītvā hastenābhrāmya cākāśasaṃmukham / taddarśanāndrahā nāgā dṛṣṭvā vā nāśamāpnu yuḥ //
analyzed: śūlam gṛhītvā hastena ābhrāmya ca ākāśa saṃmukham nāgāḥ dṛṣṭvā vā nāśam āpnu yuḥ

original: dhūmārakte karaṃ madhye dhyātvā khe cintayennaraḥ / duṣṭā nāgā grahā meghā vinaśyanti ca rākṣasāḥ //
analyzed: dhūma ārakte karam madhye dhyātvā khe cintayet naraḥ duṣṭāḥ nāgāḥ grahāḥ meghāḥ vinaśyanti ca rākṣasāḥ

original: trilokānrakṣayenmantro martyalokasya kā kathā / oṃ jūṃ sūṃ hūṃ phaṭ //
analyzed: tri lokān rakṣayet mantraḥ martya lokasya kā kathā om jūṃ sūṃ hūm phaṭ

original: khādirānkīlakānaṣṭau kṣetre saṃmantrya vinyaset / na tatra vajrapātasya sphūrjathvāderupadravaḥ //
analyzed: khādirān kīlakān aṣṭau kṣetre saṃmantrya vinyaset na tatra vajra pātasya sphūrjathu ādeḥ upadravaḥ

original: garuḍoktairmahāmantraiḥ kīlakānaṣṭa mantrayet / ekaviṃśativārāṇi kṣetre tu nikhanenniśi //
analyzed: garuḍa uktaiḥ mahā mantraiḥ kīlakān aṣṭa mantrayet  ekaviṃśati vārāṇi kṣetre tu nikhanet niśi

original: vidyunmūṣakavajrādisamupadrava eva ca / harakṣamalavarayū binduyuktaḥ sadāśivaḥ //
analyzed: vidyut mūṣaka vajra ādi samupadrave eva ca bindu yuktaḥ sadāśivaḥ

original: oṃ hrāṃ sadāśivāya namaḥ / tarjanyā vinyasetpiṇḍaṃ (ṇḍe)
analyzed: om   sadāśivāya namaḥ tarjanyā vinyaset piṇḍam ṇḍe

original: dāḍimīkusumaprabham //
analyzed: dāḍimī kusuma prabham

original: tasyaiva darśanādduṣṭā meghavidyuddipādayaḥ / rākṣasā bhūtaḍākinyaḥ pradravanti diśo daśa //
analyzed: tasya eva darśanāt duṣṭāḥ megha vidyut dipa ādayaḥ rākṣasāḥ bhūta ḍākinyaḥ pradravanti diśaḥ daśa

original: oṃ hrīṃ gaṇeśāya namaḥ / (oṃ hrīṃ) stambhanādicakrāya namaḥ / oṃ aiṃ brahayaintrai lokyaḍāmarāya namaḥ //
analyzed: om   gaṇeśāya namaḥ  om   stambhana ādi cakrāya namaḥ om aim lokya ḍāmarāya namaḥ

original: bhairavaṃ piṇḍamākhyātaṃ viṣapāpagrahāpaham / kṣetrasya rakṣaṇaṃ bhūtarākṣasādeḥ pramardanam //
analyzed: bhairavam piṇḍam ākhyātam viṣa pāpa graha apaham kṣetrasya rakṣaṇam bhūta rākṣasa ādeḥ pramardanam

original: oṃ namaḥ / indravajraṃ kare dhyātvā duṣṭameghādivāraṇam / viṣa śatrugaṇā bhūtā naśyante vajramudrayā //
analyzed: om namaḥ indra vajram kare dhyātvā duṣṭa megha ādi vāraṇam viṣa śatru gaṇāḥ bhūtāḥ naśyante vajra mudrayā

original: oṃ kṣuṃ(kṣa) namaḥ / smaretpāśaṃ vāmahaste viṣabhūtādi naśyati / oṃ hrāṃ (hro) namaḥ / hareduccāraṇānmantro viṣameghagrahādikān //
analyzed: om kṣuṃkṣa namaḥ smaret pāśam vāma haste viṣa bhūta ādi naśyati om     namaḥ haret uccāraṇāt mantraḥ viṣa megha graha ādikān

original: dhyātvā kṛtāntaṃ ca dahecchedakāstreṇa vai jagat / oṃ kṣṇaṃ (kṣma) namaḥ / dhyātvā tu bhairavaṃ kuryāndrahabhūtaviṣāpaham //
analyzed: dhyātvā kṛtāntam ca dahet chedaka astreṇa vai jagat  om     namaḥ dhyātvā tu bhairavam

original: oṃ lasaddijihvākṣa svāhā / kṣetrādau grahabhūtādiviṣapakṣinivāraṇam //
analyzed: om svāhā kṣetra ādau graha bhūta ādi viṣa pakṣi nivāraṇam

original: oṃ kṣva (kṣṇaṃ) namaḥ / raktena paṭahe likhya śabdātresurgrahādayaḥ / oṃ mara mara mārayamāraya svāhā / oṃ huṃ phaṭ svāhā //
analyzed: om kṣva kṣṇaṃ namaḥ raktena paṭahe likhya śabdāḥ tresuḥ graha ādayaḥ om mara mara māraya māraya svāhā om hum phaṭ svāhā

original: śūlaṃ cāṣṭaśatairmantrya bhrāmaṇācchatruvṛndahṛt / ūrdhaśaktinipātena adhaḥ śaktiṃ nikuñceyet //
analyzed: śūlam ca aṣṭaśataiḥ mantrya bhrāmaṇāt śatru vṛnda hṛt  ūrdha śakti nipātena adhas śaktim nikuñceyet

original: pūrake pūritā mantrāḥ kumbhakena sumantritāḥ / praṇavenāpyāyitāste manavastadudīritāḥ / evamāpyāyitā mantrā bhṛtyavatphaladāyakāḥ //
analyzed: pūrake pūritāḥ mantrāḥ kumbhakena su mantritāḥ praṇavena āpyāyitāḥ te manavaḥ tad udīritāḥ  evam āpyāyitāḥ mantrāḥ bhṛtya vat phala dāyakāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣādiharamantrabṛndanirūpaṇaṃ nāma viṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣādiharamantrabṛndanirūpaṇam nāma viṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 21
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / pañcavatkrārcanaṃ vakṣye pṛtha gyadbhuktimuktidam / oṃ bhūrviṣṇave ādibhūtāya sarvādhārāya mūrtaye svāhā //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca  pañcavatkra arcanam vakṣye om bhūḥ viṣṇave ādi bhūtāya sarva ādhārāya mūrtaye svāhā

original: sadyojātasya cāhvānamanena prathamaṃ caret / oṃ hāṃ sadyojātāyaiva kalā hyaṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: sadyojātasya ca āhvānam anena prathamam caret om hāṃ sadyojātāya eva kalāḥ hi aṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ

original: siddhirṛddhirdhṛtirlakṣmīrmedhā kāntiḥ svadhā sthitiḥ (8) / oṃ hīṃ vāmadevāyaiva kalāstasya trayodaśa //
analyzed: siddhiḥ ṛddhiḥ dhṛtiḥ lakṣmīḥ medhā kāntiḥ svadhā sthitiḥ om hīṃ vāmadevāya eva kalāḥ tasya trayodaśa

original: rajā rakṣā ratiḥ pālyā kānti stṛṣṇā matiḥ kriyā / kāmā buddhiśca rātriśca trāsanī mohinī tathā (13) //
analyzed: rajā rakṣā ratiḥ pālyā kāntiḥ stṛṣṇā matiḥ kriyā kāmā buddhiḥ ca rātriḥ ca trāsanī mohinī tathā

original: manonmanī aghorā ca tathā mohā kṣudhā kalāḥ / nidrā mṛtyuśca māyā ca (8)
analyzed: manonmanī aghorā ca tathā mohā kṣudhā kalāḥ nidrā mṛtyuḥ ca māyā ca

original: aṣṭasaṃkhyā bhayaṅkara //
analyzed: aṣṭa saṃkhyā bhayaṅkara

original: oṃ haiṃ tatpuruṣāyaiva (ṣāya)
analyzed: om haiṃ tatpuruṣāya eva ṣāya

original: nivṛttiśca pratiṣṭhā ca vidyā śāntirna kevalā //
analyzed: nivṛttiḥ ca pratiṣṭhā ca vidyā śāntiḥ na kevalā

original: oṃ hauṃ īśānāya namo niścalā ca nirañjanā / śaśinī cāṅganā caiva marīcirjvālinī tathā //
analyzed: om   īśānāya namaḥ niścalā ca nirañjanā śaśinī ca aṅganā ca eva marīciḥ jvālinī tathā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍaṃ pañcavakkrapūjanaṃ nāmaikaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍam pañcavakkrapūjanam nāma ekaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 22
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / śivārcanaṃ pravakṣyāmi buktimuktikaraṃ param / śāntaṃ sarvagataṃ śūnyaṃ mātrādvādaśake sthitam //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca śiva arcanam pravakṣyāmi bukti mukti karam param śāntam sarva gatam śūnyam mātrā dvādaśake sthitam

original: pañca vakkrāṇi hrasvāni dīrghāṇyaṅgāni bindunā / savisargaṃ vadedastraṃ śiva ūrghvaṃ tathā punaḥ //
analyzed: pañca hrasvāni dīrghāṇi aṅgāni bindunā sa visargam vadet astram śivaḥ ūrghvam tathā punar

original: ṣaṣṭhenādho mahāmantro haumityevākhilārthadaḥ / hastābhyāṃ saṃspṛśetpādāvūrdhvaṃ pādānmastakam //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhena adhas mahā mantraḥ   iti eva akhila artha daḥ hastābhyām saṃspṛśet pādau ūrdhvam pādāt mastakam

original: mahāmudrā hi sarveṣāṃ karāṅganyāsamācaret / tālahastena pṛṣṭhaṃ ca astramantreṇa śodhayet //
analyzed: mahāmudrā hi sarveṣām kara aṅganyāsam ācaret tāla hastena pṛṣṭham ca astramantreṇa śodhayet

original: kaniṣṭhāmāditaḥ kṛtvā tarjanyaṅgāni vinyaset / pūjanaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi karṇikāyāṃ tdṛdambuje //
analyzed: kaniṣṭhām āditas kṛtvā tarjanī aṅgāni vinyaset pūjanam saṃpravakṣyāmi karṇikāyām

original: dharmaṃ jñānaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryādi tdṛdārcayet / āvāhanaṃ sthāpanaṃ ca pādyamarghyaṃ hṛdārpayet //
analyzed: dharmam jñānam ca vairāgyam aiśvarya ādi tdṛdā arcayet āvāhanam sthāpanam ca pādyam arghyam hṛdā arpayet

original: ācāmaṃ snapanaṃ pūjāmekādhāraṇatulyakam? / agnikāryavidhiṃ vakṣye astreṇollekhanaṃ caret //
analyzed: ācāmam snapanam pūjām eka ādhāraṇa tulyakam agni kārya vidhim vakṣye astreṇa ullekhanam caret

original: varṃmaṇābhyukṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ śaktinyāsaṃ hṛdā caret / tdṛdi vā śaktigarte ca prakṣipejjātavedasam //
analyzed: varṃmaṇā abhyukṣaṇam kāryam śakti nyāsam hṛdā caret vā śakti garte ca prakṣipet jātavedasam

original: garbhādhānādikaṃ kṛtvā niṣkṛtiṃ cārasya paścimām / hṛdā kṛtvā sarvakarṃma śivaṃ sāṃgaṃ tu homayet //
analyzed: garbhādhāna ādikam kṛtvā niṣkṛtim cārasya paścimām hṛdā kṛtvā sarva karṃma śivam sa aṃgam tu homayet

original: pūjayenmaṇḍale śambhuṃ padmagarbhe garāṅkitam / catuḥ ṣaṣṭyantamaṣṭādi khākṣi khādyādimaṇḍalam //
analyzed: pūjayet maṇḍale śambhum padmagarbhe gara aṅkitam catuḥ ṣaṣṭi antam aṣṭa ādi kha akṣi kha ādi ādi maṇḍalam

original: khākṣīndrasūryagaṃ sarvakhādivedendu (devendu) vartanam / āgneyyāṃ kārayetkuṇḍamardhacandranibhaṃ śubham //
analyzed: kha akṣi indra sūrya gam sarva kha ādi veda indu deva indu vartanam āgneyyām kārayet kuṇḍam ardha candra nibham śubham

original: agniśāstra parāyustho tdṛdayādigaṇocyate / astraṃ diśā supadmasya karṇikāyāṃ sadāśivaḥ //
analyzed: astram diśā su padmasya karṇikāyām sadāśivaḥ

original: dīkṣāṃ vakṣye pañcatattve sthitāṃ bhūmyādikāṃ pare / nivṛttirbhūpratiṣṭhādyairvidyāgniḥ śāntivannijaḥ //
analyzed: dīkṣām vakṣye pañcatattve sthitām bhūmi ādikām pare nivṛttiḥ bhū pratiṣṭhā ādyaiḥ vidyā agniḥ śānti vat nijaḥ

original: śāntyatītaṃ bhavevdyoma tatparaṃ śāntamavyayam / ekaikasya śataṃ homā hatyevaṃ pañca homayet //
analyzed: śānti atītam bhavet dyoma tat param śāntam avyayam ekaikasya śatam homāḥ pañca homayet

original: paścātpūrṇāhutiṃ dattvā prā(pra)
analyzed: paścāt pūrṇāhutim dattvā prāpra

original: sodana śivaṃ smaret / prāyaścittaviśuddhyarthamekaikāṣṭāhutiṃ kramāt //
analyzed: śivam smaret prāyaścitta viśuddhi artham ekaika aṣṭa āhutim kramāt

original: homayedastrabījena evaṃ dīkṣāṃ samāpayet / yajanavyatirekeṇa gopyaṃ saṃskāramuttamam //
analyzed: homayet astra bījena evam dīkṣām samāpayet yajana vyatirekeṇa gopyam saṃskāram uttamam

original: evaṃ saṃskāraśuddhasya śivatvaṃ jāyate dhruvam //
analyzed: evam saṃskāra śuddhasya śiva tvam jāyate dhruvam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śivārcanaprakāro nāma dvāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe śivārcanaprakāraḥ nāma dvāviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 23
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / śivārcanaṃ pravakṣyāmi dharṃmakāmādisādhanam / tribhirmantrairācāmettu svāhāntaiḥ praṇavādikaiḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca  śiva arcanam pravakṣyāmi dharṃma kāma ādi sādhanam tribhiḥ mantraiḥ ācāmet tu svāhā antaiḥ praṇava ādikaiḥ

original: oṃ hāṃ ātmatattvāya vidyātattvāya hīṃ tathā / oṃ hūṃ śivatattvāya svāhā hṛdā syācchrotravandanam //
analyzed: om hāṃ ātma tattvāya vidyā tattvāya hīṃ tathā om   śivatattvāya svāhā hṛdā syāt śrotra vandanam

original: bhasmasnānaṃ tarpaṇaṃ ca oṃ hāṃ svāhā sarvamantrakāḥ / sarve devāḥ sarvamunirnamo 'nto vauṣaḍantakaḥ //
analyzed: bhasma snānam tarpaṇam ca om hāṃ svāhā sarva mantrakāḥ sarve devāḥ sarva muniḥ namaḥ ntaḥ vauṣaṭ antakaḥ

original: svadhāntāḥ sarvapitaraḥ svadhāntāśca pitāmahāḥ / oṃ hāṃ prapitāmahebhyastathā mātāmahādayaḥ //
analyzed: svadhā antāḥ sarva pitaraḥ svadhā antāḥ ca pitāmahāḥ om hāṃ prapitāmahebhyaḥ tathā mātāmaha ādayaḥ

original: hāṃ namaḥ sarvamātṛbhyastataḥ syātprāṇasaṃyamaḥ / ācāmaṃ mārjanaṃ cātho gāyatrīṃ ca japettataḥ //
analyzed: hāṃ namaḥ sarva mātṛbhyaḥ tatas syāt prāṇasaṃyamaḥ ācāmam mārjanam ca atho gāyatrīm ca japet tatas

original: oṃ hāṃ tanmaheśāya vidmahe,
analyzed: om hāṃ tat maheśāya vidmahe

original: vāgviśuddhāya dhīmahi,
analyzed: vāc viśuddhāya dhīmahi

original: tanno rudraḥ pracodayāt //
analyzed: tat naḥ rudraḥ pracodayāt

original: sūryopasthānakaṃ kṛtvā sūryamantraiḥ prapūjayet / oṃ hāṃ hīṃ hūṃ haiṃ hauṃ haḥ śivasūryāya namaḥ / oṃ haṃ khakholkāya sūryamūrtaye namaḥ / oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namaḥ //
analyzed: sūrya upasthānakam kṛtvā sūrya mantraiḥ prapūjayet  om hāṃ hīṃ hūm haiṃ   haḥ śiva sūryāya namaḥ  om haṃ khakholkāya sūrya mūrtaye namaḥ om hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namaḥ

original: daṇḍine piṅgale tvātibhūtāni ca tataḥ smaret / agnayādau vimaleśānamārādhya paramaṃ sukham //
analyzed: daṇḍine piṅgale tvā ati bhūtāni ca tatas smaret agnayā ādau vimala īśānam ārādhya paramam sukham

original: yajetpadmāṃ ca rāṃ dīptāṃ rīṃ sūkṣmāṃ rūṃ jayāṃ ca reṃ / bhadrāṃ ca raiṃ vibhūtiṃ roṃ vimalāṃ raumamodhi (rodhi) kām //
analyzed: yajet padmām ca rām dīptām rīṃ sūkṣmām rūm jayām ca reṃ bhadrām ca raiṃ vibhūtim roṃ vimalām kām

original: raṃ vidyutāṃ ca pūrvādau rā (raṃ)
analyzed: raṃ vidyutām ca pūrva ādau rā raṃ

original: madhye sarvatomukhīm / arkāsanaṃ sūryamūrteṃ hrāṃ hrūṃ (hrīṃ)
analyzed: madhye sarvatomukhīm arka āsanam sūrya mūrteṃ hrāṃ

original: saḥ sūryamarcayet //
analyzed: saḥ sūryam arcayet

original: oṃ āṃ hṛdarkāya ca śiraḥ śikhā ca bhūrbhuvaḥ svarom / jvālinīṃ hraṃ kavacasya cāstraṃ rājñāṃ ca dīkṣitām //
analyzed: om āṃ hṛd arkāya ca śiraḥ śikhā ca bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar om jvālinīm hraṃ kavacasya ca astram rājñām ca dīkṣitām

original: yajetsūryahṛdā sarvānsoṃ somaṃ maṃ ca maṅgalam / baṃ budhaṃ bṛṃ bṛhaspatiṃ bhaṃ bhārgavaṃ śaṃ śanaiścaram //
analyzed: yajet sūrya hṛdā sarvān soṃ somam maṃ ca maṅgalam baṃ budham bṛṃ bṛhaspatim bhaṃ bhārgavam śam śanaiścaram

original: raṃ rāhuṃ kaṃ yajetketuṃ oṃ tejaścaṇḍamarcayet / sūryamabhyarcya cācamya kaniṣṭhāto 'ṅgakāṃnyaset //
analyzed: raṃ rāhum kam yajet ketum om tejaḥ caṇḍam arcayet sūryam abhyarcya ca ācamya kaniṣṭhātaḥ ṅgakām nyaset

original: hāṃ hṛcchiro hūṃ śikhā haiṃ varṃma hauṃ caiva netrakam / ho 'straṃ śaktisthitiṃ kṛtvā bhūtaśuddhiṃ punarnyaset //
analyzed: hāṃ hṛd śiraḥ hūm śikhā haiṃ varṃma haum ca eva netrakam ho stram śakti sthitim kṛtvā bhūtaśuddhim punar nyaset

original: arghyapātraṃ tataḥ kṛtvā tadadbhiḥ prokṣayedyajet //
analyzed: arghya pātram tatas kṛtvā tat adbhiḥ prokṣayet yajet

original: ātmānaṃ padmasaṃsthaṃ ca hauṃ śivāya tato bahiḥ / dvāre nandimahākālau gaṅgā ca yamunātha gauḥ //
analyzed: ātmānam padma saṃstham ca hauṃ śivāya tatas bahis dvāre nandi mahākālau gaṅgā ca yamunā atha gauḥ

original: śrīrastraṃ vāstvadhipatiṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca gaṇaṃ gurum / śaktyanantau yajenmadhye pūrvādau dharṃmakādikam //
analyzed: śrīḥ astram vāstu adhipatim brahmāṇam ca gaṇam gurum  śakti anantau yajet madhye pūrva ādau dharṃmaka ādikam

original: adharṃmādyaṃ ca vahnyādau madhye padmasya karṇike / vāmājyeṣṭhā ca pūrvādau raudrī kālī ca pūrṣadaḥ //
analyzed: ca vahni ādau madhye padmasya karṇike vāmā jyeṣṭhā ca pūrva ādau raudrī kālī ca pūrṣadaḥ

original: oṃ hauṃ kalavikariṇyai balavikariṇī tataḥ / balapramathinī sarvabhūtānāṃ damanī tataḥ //
analyzed: om   kala vikariṇyai bala vikariṇī tatas balapramathinī sarva bhūtānām damanī tatas

original: manonmanī yajedetāḥ paṭhimadhye śivāgrataḥ / śivāsanaṃ mahāmūrti mūrtimadhye śivāya ca //
analyzed: manonmanī yajet etāḥ paṭhi madhye śiva agratas śiva āsanam mahā mūrti mūrti madhye śivāya ca

original: āvāhanaṃ sthāpanaṃ ca sannidhānaṃ nirodhanam / sakalīkaraṇaṃ mudrādarśanaṃ cārghyapādyakam //
analyzed: āvāhanam sthāpanam ca sannidhānam nirodhanam sakalīkaraṇam mudrā darśanam ca arghya pādyakam

original: ācāmābhyaṅgamudvartaṃ snānaṃ nirṃmathanaṃ caret / vastraṃ vilepanaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ caruṃ dadet //
analyzed: ācāma abhyaṅgam udvartam snānam nirṃmathanam caret vastram vilepanam puṣpam dhūpam dīpam carum dadet

original: ācāmaṃ mukhavāsaṃ ca tāmbūlaṃ hastaśodhanam / chatracāmarapāvitraṃ paramīkaraṇaṃ caret //
analyzed: ācāmam mukha vāsam ca tāmbūlam hasta śodhanam chatra cāmara pāvitram paramīkaraṇam caret

original: rūpakpena caikāhajapo jāpyasamarpaṇam / stutirnatirhṛdādyaiśca jñeyaṃ nāmāṅga pūjanam //
analyzed: ca eka aha japaḥ jāpya samarpaṇam stutiḥ natiḥ hṛd ādyaiḥ ca jñeyam nāma aṅga pūjanam

original: agnīśarakṣo vāyavye madhye pūrvāditantrakam / indrādyāṃśca yajeccaṇḍaṃ tasmai nirmālyamarpayet //
analyzed: agni īśa rakṣaḥ vāyavye madhye pūrva ādi tantrakam indra ādyān ca yajet caṇḍam tasmai nirmālyam arpayet

original: guhāyātiguhyagoptā tvaṃ gṛhāṇāsmatkṛtaṃ japam / siddhirbhavatu me deva tatprasādāttvayi sthitiḥ //
analyzed: tvam gṛhāṇa asmad kṛtam japam siddhiḥ bhavatu me deva tad prasādāt tvayi sthitiḥ

original: yatkiñcitkriyate karma sadā sukṛtaduṣkṛtam / tanme śivapadasthasya rudra kṣapaya śaṅkara //
analyzed: yat kiñcid kriyate karma sadā sukṛta duṣkṛtam tat me śiva pada sthasya rudra kṣapaya śaṅkara

original: śivo dātā śivo bhoktā śivaḥ sarvamidaṃ jagat / śivo jayati sarvatra yaḥ śivaḥ so 'hameva ca //
analyzed: śivaḥ dātā śivaḥ bhoktā śivaḥ sarvam idam jagat  śivaḥ jayati sarvatra yaḥ śivaḥ saḥ ham eva ca

original: yatkṛtaṃ yatkariṣyāmi tatsarvaṃ sukṛtaṃ tava(tastavam) / tvaṃ trātā viśvanetā ca nānyonātho 'stimeśiva //
analyzed: yat kṛtam yat kariṣyāmi tat sarvam su kṛtam tavatastavam  tvam trātā viśva netā ca na anyonā atho

original: athānyena prakāreṇa śivapūjāṃ vadāmyaham / gaṇaḥ sarasvatī nandī mahākālo 'thagaṅgayā //
analyzed: atha anyena prakāreṇa śiva pūjām vadāmi aham gaṇaḥ sarasvatī nandī mahākālaḥ thagaṅgayā

original: pavanāstraṃ vāstvadhipo dvāri pūrvāditastvime / indrādyāḥ pūjanīyāśca tattvāni pṛthivī jalam //
analyzed: pavanāstram vāstu adhipaḥ dvāri pūrva āditaḥ tu ime indra ādyāḥ pūjanīyāḥ ca tattvāni pṛthivī jalam

original: tejo vāyurvyoma gandho rasarūpe ca śabdakaḥ / sparśo vāk pāṇi pādaṃ ca pāyūpasthaṃ śrutitvacam //
analyzed: tejaḥ vāyuḥ vyoma gandhaḥ rasa rūpe ca śabdakaḥ sparśaḥ vāc pāṇi pādam ca pāyu upastham śruti tvacam

original: cakṣurjihvā ghrāṇamano buddhiścāhaṃ prakṛtyapi / pumānnāgo buddhividye kalā kālo niyatyapi //
analyzed: cakṣuḥ jihvā ghrāṇa manaḥ buddhiḥ ca aham prakṛti api pumān nāgaḥ buddhi vidye kalā kālaḥ niyatī api

original: māyā ca śuddha vidyā ca īśvaraśca sadāśivaḥ / śaktiḥ śivaśca tāñjñātvā mukto jñānī śivo bhavet //
analyzed: māyā ca śuddha vidyā ca īśvaraḥ ca sadāśivaḥ śaktiḥ śivaḥ ca tān jñātvā muktaḥ jñānī śivaḥ bhavet

original: yaḥ śivaḥ sa harirbrahmā so 'haṃ brahmāsmi śaṅkara //
analyzed: yaḥ śivaḥ sa hariḥ brahmā saḥ ham brahmā asmi śaṅkara

original: bhūtaśuddhiṃ pravakṣyāmi yayā śuddhaḥ śivo bhavet / hṛtpadme sadyomantraḥ syānnivṛttiśca kalā iḍā //
analyzed: bhūtaśuddhim pravakṣyāmi yayā śuddhaḥ śivaḥ bhavet hṛd padme sadyomantraḥ syāt nivṛttiḥ ca kalā iḍā

original: piṅgalā dve ca nāḍyau tu prāṇo 'pānaśca mārutau / indro deho brahmahetuścaturastraṃ ca maṇḍalam //
analyzed: piṅgalā dve ca nāḍyau tu prāṇaḥ pānaḥ ca mārutau indraḥ dehaḥ brahma hetuḥ catur astram ca maṇḍalam

original: vaktreṇa lāñchitaṃ vāyumekoddhātaguṇāḥ śarāḥ / tdṛtsthānasādṛśyarutaṃ śatakoṭipravistaram //
analyzed: vaktreṇa lāñchitam vāyum eka uddhāta guṇāḥ śarāḥ tdṛt sthāna sādṛśya rutam śata koṭi pravistaram

original: oṃ hrīṃ pratiṣṭhāyai hrūṃ hraḥ phaṭ / oṃ hrīṃ hrūṃ vidyāyai hraṃ hraḥ phaṭ / caturaśītikoṭīnāmucchrayaṃ bhūmitantrakam //
analyzed: om hrīṃ pratiṣṭhāyai     phaṭ  om     vidyāyai hraṃ   phaṭ  caturaśīti koṭīnām ucchrayam bhūmi tantrakam

original: tanmadhye bhavavṛkṣaṃ ca ātmānaṃ ca vicintayet / adhomukhīṃ tataḥ pṛthvīṃ tattacchudhdaṃ bhaveddhruvam //
analyzed: tad madhye bhava vṛkṣam ca ātmānam ca vicintayet adhomukhīm tatas pṛthvīm tat tat śudhdam bhavet dhruvam

original: vāmā devī pratiṣṭhā ca suṣumnā dhārikā tathā / samānodānavaruṇā devatā viṣṇu kāraṇam //
analyzed: vāmā devī pratiṣṭhā ca suṣumnā dhārikā tathā samāna udāna varuṇāḥ devatāḥ viṣṇu kāraṇam

original: addhātāśca guṇā vedāḥ śvetaṃ dhyānaṃ tathaiva ca / evaṃ kuryātkaṇṭhapadmamardhacandrākhyamaṇḍalam //
analyzed: addhātāḥ ca guṇāḥ vedāḥ śvetam dhyānam tathā eva ca evam kuryāt kaṇṭha padmam ardhacandra ākhya maṇḍalam

original: padmāṅkitaṃ dviviṃśatikakoṭivistīrṇamau smaret / caturnavatyucchrayaṃ ca ātmānaṃ ca adhomukham //
analyzed: padma aṅkitam dvi viṃśatika koṭi vistīrṇa amau smaret caturnavati ucchrayam ca ātmānam ca adhomukham

original: tālusthānaṃ ca padmaṃ ca aghoro vidyayānvitaḥ / nābhyo(ḍyo) ṣṭhayorhastijihvādhyāno nāgognidevatā //
analyzed: tālu sthānam ca padmam ca aghoraḥ vidyayā anvitaḥ

original: rudrahetustriruddhātāstriguṇā raktavarṇakam / jvālākṛte trikoṇaṃ ca catuḥ koṭiśatāni ca //
analyzed: rudra hetuḥ tris uddhātāḥ triguṇāḥ rakta varṇakam jvālā kṛte trikoṇam ca catuḥ koṭi śatāni ca

original: vistīrṇaṃ ca samutsedhaṃ rudratattvaṃ vicintayet / lalāṭe vai tatpuruṣaḥ śāntiryaḥ śādvalaṃ budhāḥ (vṛṣā) //
analyzed: vistīrṇam ca samutsedham rudra tattvam vicintayet lalāṭe vai tatpuruṣaḥ śāntiḥ yaḥ śādvalam budhāḥ vṛṣā

original: kūrmaśca kṛkaro vāyurdeva īśvarakāraṇam / dviruddhāto guṇau dvau ca dhūmraṣaṭkoṇamaṇḍalam //
analyzed: kūrmaḥ ca kṛkaraḥ vāyuḥ devaḥ īśvara kāraṇam dvis uddhātaḥ guṇau dvau ca dhūmra ṣaṭkoṇa maṇḍalam

original: bindvaṅkitaṃ cāṣṭakoṭivistīrṇaṃ cocchrayastathā / caturdaśādhikaṃ koṭivāyutattvaṃ vicintayet //
analyzed: bindu aṅkitam ca aṣṭa koṭi vistīrṇam ca ucchrayaḥ tathā caturdaśa adhikam koṭi vāyu tattvam vicintayet

original: dvādaśati sarasije śāntya tītāstatheśvarāḥ / kuhūśca śaṅkhinī nāḍyo devadatto dhanañjayaḥ //
analyzed: dvādaśati sarasije tītāḥ tathā īśvarāḥ kuhūḥ ca śaṅkhinī nāḍyaḥ devadattaḥ dhanañjayaḥ

original: śikhaiśānakāraṇaṃ ca sadāśiva iti smṛtaḥ / guṇa ekastathoddhātaḥ śuddhasphaṭikavatsmaret //
analyzed: śikhā aiśāna kāraṇam ca sadāśivaḥ iti smṛtaḥ guṇaḥ ekaḥ tathā uddhātaḥ śuddha sphaṭika vat smaret

original: ṣoḍaśakoṭivistīrṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatikocchrayam / vartulaṃ cintayevdyoma bhutaśuddhirudāhṛtā //
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa koṭi vistīrṇam pañcaviṃśatika ucchrayam vartulam cintayet dyoma bhutaśuddhiḥ udāhṛtā

original: guṇayo gururbojaguruḥ śaktayanantau ca dharṃmakaḥ / jñānavairāgyamaiśvaryaistataḥ pūrvādipatrake //
analyzed: guṇayaḥ guruḥ boja guruḥ śaktaya anantau ca dharṃmakaḥ jñāna vairāgyam aiśvaryaiḥ tatas pūrva ādi patrake

original: adhordhvavadane dve ca padmakarṇikakesaram / vāmādyā ātmavidyā ca sadā dhyāyecchivākhyakam //
analyzed: adhas ūrdhva vadane dve ca padma karṇika kesaram vāmā ādyā ātma vidyā ca sadā dhyāyet śiva ākhyakam

original: tattvaṃ śivāsane mūrtirhe hauṃ vidyādehāya namaḥ / baddhapadmāsanāsīnaḥ sitaḥ ṣoḍaśavārṣikaḥ //
analyzed: tattvam śiva āsane mūrtiḥ he   vidyā dehāya namaḥ baddha padmāsana āsīnaḥ sitaḥ ṣoḍaśa vārṣikaḥ

original: pañcavaktraḥ karāgraiḥ svairdaśabhiścaiva dhārayan / abhayaṃ prasādaṃ śaktiṃ śūlaṃ khaṭvāṅgamīśvaraḥ //
analyzed: pañcavaktraḥ kara agraiḥ svaiḥ daśabhiḥ ca eva dhārayan abhayam prasādam śaktim śūlam khaṭvāṅgam īśvaraḥ

original: dakṣaiḥ karairvāmakaiśca bhujaṅgaṃ cākṣasūtrakam / ḍamarukaṃ nīlotpalaṃ bījapūrakamuttamam //
analyzed: dakṣaiḥ karaiḥ vāmakaiḥ ca bhujaṅgam ca akṣasūtrakam ḍamarukam nīlotpalam bījapūrakam uttamam

original: icchājñānakriyāśaktistrinetro hi sadāśivaḥ / evaṃ śivārcanadhyānī sarvadā kālavarjitaḥ //
analyzed: icchā jñāna kriyā śaktiḥ trinetraḥ hi sadāśivaḥ evam śiva arcana dhyānī sarvadā kāla varjitaḥ

original: ihāhorā vacāreṇa trīṇi varṣāṇi jīvati / dinadvayasya cāreṇa jīvedvarṣadvayaṃ naraḥ //
analyzed: trīṇi varṣāṇi jīvati dina dvayasya cāreṇa jīvet varṣa dvayam naraḥ

original: dinatrayasya cāreṇa varṣamekaṃ sa jīvati / nākāle śītale mṛtyuruṣṇe caiva tu kārake //
analyzed: dina trayasya cāreṇa varṣam ekam sa jīvati na akāle śītale mṛtyuḥ uṣṇe ca eva tu kārake

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śivārcananirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayoviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe śivārcananirūpaṇam nāma trayoviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: (iti śivādipūjā samāptā) / śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 24
analyzed: iti śiva ādi pūjā samāptā śrī garuḍa mahā purāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / vakṣye gaṇādikāḥ pūjāḥ sarvadā svargadāḥ parāḥ / gaṇāsanaṃ gaṇamūrti gaṇādhipatimarcayet //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca vakṣye gaṇa ādikāḥ pūjāḥ sarvadā svarga dāḥ parāḥ gaṇa āsanam gaṇa mūrti gaṇādhipatim arcayet

original: gāmādihṛdayādyaṅgaṃ durgāyā gurupādukāḥ / durgāsanaṃ ca tanmūrtiṃ hrīṃ durge rakṣaṇīti ca //
analyzed: gām ādi hṛdaya ādi aṅgam durgāyāḥ guru pādukāḥ durga āsanam ca tad mūrtim hrīṃ durge rakṣaṇe iti ca

original: tdṛdādikaṃ nava śaktyo rudracaṇḍā pracaṇḍayā / caṇḍogrā caṇḍanāyikā caṇḍā caṇḍavatī kramāt //
analyzed: nava śaktyaḥ rudracaṇḍā pracaṇḍayā caṇḍogrā caṇḍanāyikā caṇḍā caṇḍavatī kramāt

original: caṇārūpā caṇḍikākhyā durgedurge 'tha rakṣiṇi / vajrakhaḍgādikā mudrāḥ śivādyā vahnideśataḥ //
analyzed: caṇārūpā caṇḍikā ākhyā rakṣiṇi vajra khaḍga ādikāḥ mudrāḥ śiva ādyāḥ vahni deśataḥ

original: sadāśivamahāpretapadmāsana mathāpi vā / aiṃ klīṃ (hrīṃ)
analyzed: sadāśiva mahāpreta padmāsana vā aim klīṃ hrīṃ

original: saustripurāyai namaḥ / oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ kṣeṃ kṣaiṃ strīṃ skīṃ roṃ spheṃ sphīṃ śāṃ padmāsanaṃ ca mūrtiṃ ca tripurātdṛdayādikam //
analyzed: sauḥ tripurāyai namaḥ om hrāṃ hrīṃ kṣeṃ kṣaiṃ strīm skīṃ roṃ spheṃ sphīṃ śām padmāsanam ca mūrtim ca tripurāt dṛdaya ādikam

original: pīṭhāmbuje tu brāhayādīrbrahmāṇī ca maheśvarī / kaumārī vaiṣṇavī pūjyā vārāhī cendradevatā //
analyzed: pīṭha ambuje tu kaumārī vaiṣṇavī pūjyā vārāhī ca indra devatā

original: cāmuṇḍā caṇḍikā pūjyā bhairavākhyāṃstato yajet / asitāṅgoruruścaṇḍaḥ krodha unmattabhairavaḥ //
analyzed: cāmuṇḍā caṇḍikā pūjyā bhairava ākhyān tatas yajet asita aṅga uruḥ caṇḍaḥ krodhaḥ unmattabhairavaḥ

original: kapālī bhīṣaṇaścaiva saṃhāraścāṣṭa bhairavāḥ / ratiḥ prītiḥ kāmadevaḥ pañca bāṇāśca yoginī //
analyzed: kapālī bhīṣaṇaḥ ca eva saṃhāraḥ ca aṣṭa bhairavāḥ ratiḥ prītiḥ kāmadevaḥ pañca bāṇāḥ ca yoginī

original: vaṭukaṃ durgayā vighnarājo guruśca kṣetrapaḥ / padmagarbhe maṇḍale ca trikoṇe cintayeddhṛdi //
analyzed: vaṭukam durgayā vighna rājaḥ guruḥ ca kṣetrapaḥ padmagarbhe maṇḍale ca trikoṇe cintayet hṛdi

original: śuklāṃ varadākṣasūtrapustābhayasamanvitām / lakṣajapyācca homācca tripurā siddhidā bhavet //
analyzed: śuklām vara da akṣasūtra pusta abhaya samanvitām lakṣa japyāt ca homāt ca tripurā siddhi dā bhavet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe tripurādipūjānirūpaṇaṃ nam caturviśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe tripurādipūjānirūpaṇam nam caturviśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 25
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / aiṃ krīṃ śrīṃ spheṃ kṣaiṃ anantaśaktipādukāṃ pūjayāmi namaḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca aim krīṃ śrīṃ spheṃ   anantaśakti pādukām pūjayāmi namaḥ

original: aiṃ śrīṃ phraiṃ kṣaiṃ ādhāraśaktipādukāṃ pūjayāmi namaḥ / oṃ hraṃ kālāgnirudrapādukāṃ pūjayāmi namaḥ //
analyzed: aim śrīṃ phraiṃ kṣaiṃ ādhāra śakti pādukām pūjayāmi namaḥ om hraṃ kālāgni rudra pādukām pūjayāmi namaḥ

original: oṃ hrīṃ huṃ hāṭakeśvaradevapādukāṃ pūjayāmi namaḥ / oṃ hrīṃ śeṣabhaṭṭārakapādukāṃ pūjayāmi namaḥ //
analyzed: om   hum hāṭakeśvara deva pādukām pūjayāmi namaḥ om   śeṣa bhaṭṭāraka pādukām pūjayāmi namaḥ

original: oṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ pūthivītatsavarṇabhuvanadvīpasamudradiśāmanantākhyamāsanaṃ padmāsanaṃ pūjayāmi namaḥ //
analyzed: om   śrīṃ pūthivī tad savarṇa bhuvana dvīpa samudra diśām ananta ākhyam āsanam padmāsanam pūjayāmi namaḥ

original: hrīṃ śrīṃ nivṛttyādi kalā pṛthivyāditattva manantādibhuvanamoṅkārādivarṇam / hakārādinavātmakapadaḥ sadyodātādimantraḥ hrāṃ hṛdayādyaṅgaḥ / evaṃ mantramaheśvara siddhavidyātmakaḥ parāmṛtārṇavaḥ sarvabhūto diksamastaṣaḍaṅgaḥ
analyzed: hrīṃ śrīṃ nivṛtti ādi kalā pṛthivī ādi tattva m ananta ādi bhuvanam oṅkāra ādi varṇam hakāra ādi nava ātmaka padaḥ sadyas dātā ādi mantraḥ hrāṃ hṛdaya ādi aṅgaḥ evam mantramaheśvara siddhavidyā ātmakaḥ para amṛta arṇavaḥ sarva bhūtaḥ diś samasta ṣaṣ aṅgaḥ

original: sadāśivārṇavapayaḥ pūrṇodadhipakṣaśrīmānāspadātmakaḥ vidyomāpūrṇajñatvakartṛtvalakṣaṇajyeṣṭhācakrarudraśaktyātmakakarṇi kaḥ / navaśaktiśivādibhirmūlamaṇḍalatrayakujātmakotpannāpadmāsanapādukāṃ pūjayāmi namaḥ //
iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe āsanapūjānirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe āsanapūjānirūpaṇam nāma pañcaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgarūḍamahāpurāṇam- 26
analyzed: śrī garūḍa mahā purāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / anantaraṃ karanyāsaḥ / vidyākarī śuddhiḥ kāryā / padmamudrāṃ baddhvā mantranyāsaṃ kuryāt / kaiṃ kaniṣṭhāyai namaḥ / naiṃ anāmikāyai namaḥ / maiṃ madhyamāyai namaḥ / taiṃ tarjanyai namaḥ / aṃ aṅguṣṭhāyai namaḥ / lāṃ karatalāyai namaḥ / vāṃ karapṛṣṭhāyai namaḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca anantaram karanyāsaḥ vidyākarī śuddhiḥ kāryā padma mudrām baddhvā mantra nyāsam kuryāt kaiṃ kaniṣṭhāyai namaḥ naiṃ anāmikāyai namaḥ maiṃ madhyamāyai namaḥ taiṃ tarjanyai namaḥ aṃ aṅguṣṭhāyai namaḥ lāṃ karatalāyai namaḥ vām kara pṛṣṭhāyai namaḥ

original: atha dehanyāsaḥ / smaṃsmaṃ maṇibandhāya namaḥ / aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ karāsphālāya namaḥ / mahātejorūpaṃ huṃhuṅkāreṇa karāsphālanaṃ kuryāt //
analyzed: atha dehanyāsaḥ smaṃ smaṃ maṇibandhāya namaḥ aim hrīṃ śrīṃ kara āsphālāya namaḥ mahā tejaḥ rūpam huṃhuṅkāreṇa kara āsphālanam kuryāt

original: aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ sphaiṃ namo bhagavate sphaiṃ kubjīkāyai namaḥ / hraṃ hrīṃ hrauṃ ṅañaṇaname aghorāmukhi hrāṃ hrīṃ kilikili vicce sthaulyakrośī hrīṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ aiṃ namo bhagavate urdhvavaktrāya namaḥ / sphaiṃ kubjikāyai pūrvavaktrāya namaḥ / hrīṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ ṅaāñaṇaname dakṣiṇavaktrāya namaḥ / oṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ kilikili paścimavaktrāya namaḥ / oṃ akhoramukhi uttaravaktrāya namaḥ / oṃ namo bhagavate hṛdayāya namaḥ kṣaiṃ (kṣeṃ aiṃ)
analyzed: aim hrīṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ sphaiṃ namaḥ bhagavate sphaiṃ kubjīkāyai namaḥ hraṃ hrīṃ hraum aghorā mukhi hrāṃ hrīṃ kili kili vicce sthaulya krośī hrīṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ aim namaḥ bhagavate urdhva vaktrāya namaḥ sphaiṃ kubjikāyai pūrva vaktrāya namaḥ hrīṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ dakṣiṇa vaktrāya namaḥ om hrīṃ śrīṃ kili kili paścima vaktrāya namaḥ om akhora mukhi uttara vaktrāya namaḥ om namaḥ bhagavate hṛdayāya namaḥ namaḥ namaḥ namaḥ bhaga

original: kubjikāyai śirase svāhā / hrīṃ krīṃ hrīṃ āṃ ṅa ña ṇa name śikhāyai vaṣaṭ / aghorāmukhi kavacāya huṃ / haiṃ haiṃ īṃ netratrayāya vauṣaṭ / kilikili vicce astrāya phaṭ //
analyzed: kubjikāyai śirase svāhā       āṃ name śikhāyai vaṣaṭ aghorā mukhi kavacāya hum     īṃ netratrayāya vauṣaṭ kili kili vicce astrāya phaṭ

original: (1) aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ akhaṇḍamaṇḍalākāramahāśūlamaṇḍalamāya namaḥ (2)
analyzed: aim   śrīṃ akhaṇḍa maṇḍala ākāra mahā śūla maṇḍala māya namaḥ

original: aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ vāyumaṇḍalāya namaḥ / (3) aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ somamaṇḍalāya namaḥ / (4) aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ mahākulabodhāvalimaṇḍalāya namaḥ (5)
analyzed: aim   śrīṃ vāyu maṇḍalāya namaḥ   aim   śrīṃ soma maṇḍalāya namaḥ   aim   śrīṃ mahā kula bodha āvali maṇḍalāya namaḥ

original: aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ mahākaulamaṇḍalāya namaḥ / (6) aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ gurumaṇḍalāya namaḥ (7)
analyzed: aim   śrīṃ mahā kaula maṇḍalāya namaḥ   aim   śrīṃ guru maṇḍalāya namaḥ

original: aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ sāmamaṇḍalāya namaḥ(8)
analyzed: aim hrīṃ śrīṃ sāma maṇḍalāya

original: aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ samagra (9)
analyzed: aim hrīṃ śrīṃ samagra

original: siddha (10)
analyzed: siddha

original: yogīnīpīṭhāpapīṭha (11)
analyzed: yogīnī pīṭha apapīṭha

analyzed: namaḥ evam maṇḍalānām dvādaśakam krameṇa pūjyam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe ācārakāṇḍe karanyāsādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe ācāra kāṇḍe karanyāsādinirūpaṇam nāma ṣaḍviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 27
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / oṃ kaṇicikīṇikakrāṇī carvāṇī bhūtahāriṇi phaṇiviṣiṇi virathanārāyayaṇi ume dahadaha
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca om carvāṇī bhūta hāriṇi phaṇi viṣiṇi ume daha daha

original: haste caṇḍe raudre māheśvari mahāmukhi jvālāmukhi śaṅkukarṇi śukamuṇḍe śatruṃ hanahana
analyzed: haste caṇḍe raudre māheśvari mahāmukhi jvālāmukhi śaṅkukarṇi śukamuṇḍe śatrum hana hana

original: sarvanāśini svedaya sarvāṅgaśoṇitaṃ tannirīkṣāsi manasā devi saṃmohayasaṃmohaya rudrasya
analyzed: sarvanāśini svedaya sarva aṅga śoṇitam tat nirīkṣa asi manasā devi saṃmohaya saṃmohaya rudrasya

original: hṛdaye jātā rudrasya tdṛdaye sthitā / rudro raudreṇa rūpeṇa tvaṃ devi rakṣarakṣa māṃ hrūṃ māṃ hrūṃ phaphapha ṭhaṭhaḥ skandamekhalābālagrahaśatruviṣahārī
analyzed: hṛdaye jātā rudrasya sthitā rudraḥ raudreṇa rūpeṇa tvam devi rakṣa rakṣa mām   mām   phaphapha ṭha ṭhaḥ skanda mekhalā bālagraha śatru viṣa hārī

original: oṃ śāle māle harahara viṣoṅkārarahiviṣavege hāṃ hāṃ śavari huṃ śavari ākaulavegeśe
analyzed: om śāle māle hara hara viṣa uṅkāra rahi viṣa vege hāṃ hāṃ śavari hum śavari ākaulavegeśe

original: sarve viñcameghamāle sarvanāgādiviṣaharaṇam //
analyzed: sarve viñca megha māle sarva nāga ādi viṣa haraṇam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nāgādivividhaviṣahara mantranirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāgādivividhaviṣahara mantranirūpaṇam nāma saptaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 28
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / gopālapūjāṃ vakṣyāmi bhuktimuktipradāyinīm / dvāre dhātā vidhātā ca gaṅgāyamunayā saha //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca gopāla pūjām vakṣyāmi bhukti mukti pradāyinīm dvāre dhātā vidhātā ca gaṅgā yamunayā saha

original: śaṅkhapadmanidhī caiva sāraṅgaḥ śarabhaḥ śriyā / pūrve bhadraḥ subhadro dvau dakṣe caṇḍapracaṇḍakau //
analyzed: śaṅkha padma nidhī ca eva sāraṅgaḥ śarabhaḥ śriyā pūrve bhadraḥ subhadraḥ dvau dakṣe caṇḍa pracaṇḍakau

original: paścime balaprabalau jayaśca vijayo yajet / uttare śrīścaturdvāre gaṇo durgā sarasvatī //
analyzed: paścime bala prabalau jayaḥ ca vijayaḥ yajet  uttare śrīḥ catur dvāre gaṇaḥ durgā sarasvatī

original: kṣetrasyāgnyādikoṇeṣu dikṣu nāradapūrvakam / siddho gururnalakūvaraṃ koṇe bhagavataṃ yajet //
