original: ahaṃ viṣṇuriti dhyātvā kṛtvā vai śodhanādikam / yaṃ kṣaiṃ ramiti bījaiśca kaṭhinī kṛtya nāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: aham viṣṇuḥ iti dhyātvā kṛtvā vai śodhana ādikam yaṃ kṣaiṃ ram iti bījaiḥ ca kaṭhinī kṛtya nāmabhiḥ

original: aṇḍamutpādya ca tataḥ praṇavenaiva bhedayet / tatra pūrvoktarūpaṃ tu bhāvayitvā vṛṣadhvaja //
analyzed: aṇḍam utpādya ca tatas praṇavena eva bhedayet tatra pūrva ukta rūpam tu bhāvayitvā vṛṣadhvaja

original: ātmapūjāṃ tataḥ kuryādrandhapuṣpādibhiḥ śubhaiḥ / āvāhya pūjayetsarvā devatā āsanasya yāḥ //
analyzed: ātma pūjām tatas kuryāt randha puṣpa ādibhiḥ śubhaiḥ  āvāhya pūjayet sarvāḥ devatāḥ āsanasya yāḥ

original: mantrairebhirmahādeva tanmantraṃ śṛṇu śaṅkara / viṣṇavāsanadevatā āgacchata //
analyzed: mantraiḥ ebhiḥ mahādeva tat mantram śṛṇu śaṅkara viṣṇava āsana devatāḥ āgacchata

original: oṃ samastaparivārāyācyutāya namaḥ / oṃ dhātre namaḥ / oṃ vidhātre namaḥ / oṃ gaṅgāyai namaḥ / oṃ yamunāyai namaḥ / oṃ śaṅkhanidhaye namaḥ / oṃ padmanidhaye namaḥ / oṃ caṇḍāya namaḥ / oṃ pracaṇḍāya namaḥ / oṃ dvāraśriyai namaḥ / oṃ ādhāraśaktyai namaḥ / oṃ kūrṃmāya namaḥ / oṃ anantāya namaḥ / oṃ śriyai namaḥ / oṃ dharṃmāya namaḥ / oṃ jñānāya namaḥ / oṃ vairāgyāya namaḥ / oṃ aiśvaryāya namaḥ / oṃ adharṃmāya namaḥ / oṃ ajñānāya namaḥ / oṃ avairāgyāya namaḥ / oṃ anaiśvaryāya namaḥ / oṃsaṃ sattvāya namaḥ / oṃ raṃ rajase namaḥ / oṃ taṃ tamase namaḥ / oṃ kaṃ kandāya namaḥ / oṃ naṃ nālāya namaḥ / oṃ lāṃ padmāya namaḥ / oṃ aṃ arkamaṇḍalāya namaḥ / oṃ soṃ somamaṇḍalāya namaḥ / oṃ vaṃ vahnimaṇḍalāya namaḥ / oṃ vimalāyai namaḥ / oṃ utkarṣiṇyai namaḥ / oṃ jñānāyai namaḥ / oṃ kriyāyai namaḥ / oṃ yogāyai namaḥ / oṃ prahvyai namaḥ / oṃ satyāyai namaḥ / oṃ īśānāyai namaḥ / oṃ anugrahāyai namaḥ //
analyzed: om samasta parivārāya acyutāya namaḥ om dhātre namaḥ om vidhātre namaḥ om gaṅgāyai namaḥ om yamunāyai namaḥ om śaṅkhanidhaye namaḥ om padmanidhaye namaḥ om caṇḍāya namaḥ om pracaṇḍāya namaḥ om dvāra śriyai namaḥ om ādhāra śaktyai namaḥ om kūrṃmāya namaḥ om anantāya namaḥ om śriye namaḥ om dharṃmāya namaḥ om jñānāya namaḥ om vairāgyāya namaḥ om aiśvaryāya namaḥ om adharṃmāya namaḥ om adharṃmāya namaḥ om adharṃmāya na

original: gandhapuṣpādibhistvetairmantrairetāstu pūjayet / pūjayitvā tato viṣṇuṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārakāriṇam //
analyzed: gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ tu etaiḥ mantraiḥ etāḥ tu pūjayet pūjayitvā tatas viṣṇum sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kāriṇam

original: āvāhya maṇḍale rudra pūjayetpa rameśvaram / anena vidhinā rudra sarvapāpaharaṃ param //
analyzed: āvāhya maṇḍale rudra pūjayet pa rameśvaram anena vidhinā rudra sarva pāpa haram param

original: yathātmani tathā deve nyāsaṃ kurvīta cāditaḥ / mudrāṃ pradarśayetpaścādarghyādīnarpayettataḥ //
analyzed: yathā ātmani tathā deve nyāsam kurvīta ca āditas mudrām pradarśayet paścāt arghya ādīn arpayet tatas

original: snānāṃ kuryāttato vastraṃ dadyādācamanaṃ tataḥ / gandhapuṣpaṃ tathā dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ dadyāccaruṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: snānām kuryāt tatas vastram dadyāt ācamanam tatas gandha puṣpam tathā dhūpam dīpam dadyāt carum tatas

original: pradakṣiṇaṃ tato japyaṃ tatastasminsarpayet / aṅgādīnāṃ svamantraiśca pūjāṃ kurvīta sādhakaḥ //
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam tatas japyam tatas tasmin sarpayet  aṅga ādīnām sva mantraiḥ ca pūjām kurvīta sādhakaḥ

original: devasya mūlamantreṇetyevaṃ viddhi vṛṣadhvaja / mantrāñchṛṇu trinetra tvaṃ kathyamānānmayādhunā //
analyzed: devasya mūlamantreṇa iti evam viddhi vṛṣadhvaja mantrān śṛṇu trinetra tvam kathyamānān mayā adhunā

original: oṃ hāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ / oṃ hīṃ śirase namaḥ / oṃ hūṃ śikhāyai namaḥ / oṃ haiṃ kavacāya namaḥ / oṃ hauṃ netratrayāya namaḥ / oṃ haḥ astrāya namaḥ / oṃ śriyai namaḥ / oṃ śaṅkāya namaḥ / oṃ padmāya namaḥ / oṃ cakrāya namaḥ / oṃ gadāyainamaḥ / oṃ śrīvatsāya namaḥ / oṃ kaustubhāya namaḥ / oṃ vanamālāyai namaḥ / oṃ pītāmbarāya namaḥ / oṃ khaḍgāya namaḥ / oṃ musalāya namaḥ / oṃ pāśāya namaḥ / oṃ aṅkuśāya namaḥ / śārṅgāya namaḥ / oṃ śarāya namaḥ / oṃ brahmaṇe namaḥ / oṃ nārādāya namaḥ / oṃ pūrvasiddhebhyo namaḥ / oṃ bhāgavatebhyo namaḥ / oṃ gurubhyo namaḥ / oṃ paramagurubhyo namaḥ / oṃ indrāya surādhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ / oṃ agnaye tejo 'dhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ / oṃ yamāya pretādhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ / oṃ nirṛtaye rakṣo 'dhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ / oṃ varuṇāya jalādhipataye savādanaparivārāya namaḥ / oṃ vāyave prāṇādhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ / oṃ somāya nakṣatrādhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ / oṃ īśānāya vidyādhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ / oṃ anantāya nāgādhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ / oṃ brahmaṇe lokādhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ / oṃ vajrāya huṃ phaṭ namaḥ / oṃ śaktyai huṃ phaṭ namaḥ / oṃ daṇḍāya huṃ phaṭ namaḥ / oṃ khaḍgāya huṃ phaṭ namaḥ / oṃ pāśāya huṃ phaṭ namaḥ / oṃ dhvajāya huṃ phaṭ namaḥ / oṃ gadāyai huṃ phaṭ namaḥ / oṃ triśūlāya huṃ phaṭ namaḥ / oṃ cakrāya huṃ phaṭ namaḥ / oṃ padmāya huṃ phaṭ namaḥ / oṃ vaiṃ viṣvaksenāya namaḥ //
analyzed: om hāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ om hīṃ śirase namaḥ om   śikhāyai namaḥ om   kavacāya namaḥ om   netratrayāya namaḥ om haḥ astrāya namaḥ om śriyai namaḥ om śaṅkāya namaḥ om padmāya namaḥ om cakrāya namaḥ om gadāyai namaḥ om śrīvatsāya namaḥ om kaustubhāya namaḥ om vanamālāyai namaḥ om pītāmbarāya namaḥ om khaḍgāya namaḥ om musalāya namaḥ om pāśāya namaḥ om aṅkuśāya namaḥ om aṅkuśāya namaḥ om aṅkuśāya namaḥ om aṅkuśāya

original: ebhimantrairmahādeva pūjyā aṅgādayo naraiḥ / pūjayitvā mahātmānaṃ viṣṇuṃ brahmasvarūpiṇam //
analyzed: ebhiḥ mantraiḥ mahādeva pūjyāḥ aṅga ādayaḥ naraiḥ pūjayitvā mahātmānam viṣṇum brahma svarūpiṇam

original: stuvīta cānayā stutyā paramātmānamavyayam / viṣṇave devadevāya namo vai prabhaviṣṇave //
analyzed: stuvīta ca anayā stutyā paramātmānam avyayam viṣṇave devadevāya namaḥ vai prabhaviṣṇave

original: viṣṇave vāsudevāya namaḥ sthitikarāya ca / grasiṣṇave namaścaiva namaḥ pralayaśāyine //
analyzed: viṣṇave vāsudevāya namaḥ sthiti karāya ca grasiṣṇave namaḥ ca eva namaḥ pralaya śāyine

original: devānāṃ prabhave caiva yajñānāṃ prabhave namaḥ / munīnāṃ prabhave nityaṃ yakṣāṇāṃ prabhaviṣṇave //
analyzed: devānām prabhave ca eva yajñānām prabhave namaḥ munīnām prabhave nityam yakṣāṇām prabhaviṣṇave

original: jiṣṇave sarvadevānāṃ sarvagāya mahātmane / brahmendrarudravandyāya sarveśāya namonamaḥ //
analyzed: jiṣṇave sarva devānām sarvagāya mahātmane brahma indra rudra vandyāya sarva īśāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: sarvalokahitārthāya lokādhyakṣāya vai namaḥ / sarvagoptre sarvakartre sarvaduṣṭavināśine //
analyzed: sarva loka hita arthāya loka adhyakṣāya vai namaḥ sarva goptre sarva kartre sarva duṣṭa vināśine

original: varapradāya śāntāya vareṇyāya namonamaḥ / śaraṇyāya surūpāya dharmakāmārthadāyine //
analyzed: vara pradāya śāntāya vareṇyāya namaḥ namaḥ śaraṇyāya surūpāya dharma kāma artha dāyine

original: stutvā dhyāyetsvahṛdaye brahmarūpiṇamavyayam / elaṃ tu pūjayedviṣṇuṃ mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara //
analyzed: stutvā dhyāyet sva hṛdaye brahma rūpiṇam avyayam elam tu pūjayet viṣṇum mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara

original: mūlamantraṃ japedvāpi yaḥ sa yāti naro harim / etatte kathitaṃ rudra viṣṇorarcanamuttamam //
analyzed: mūlamantram japet vā api yaḥ sa yāti naraḥ harim etat te kathitam rudra viṣṇoḥ arcanam uttamam

original: rahasyaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ param / etadyaśca paṭhedvidvānviṣṇubhaktaḥ pumānhara / śṛṇuyācchrāvayedvāpi viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati //
analyzed: rahasyam paramam guhyam bhukti mukti pradam param etat yaḥ ca paṭhet vidvān viṣṇu bhaktaḥ pumān hara śṛṇuyāt śrāvayet vā api viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupūjāvidhirnāmaikatriṃśodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣṇupūjāvidhiḥ nāma ekatriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 32
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: maheśvara uvāca / pañcatattvārcanaṃ brūhi śaṅkhacakragadādhara / yena vijñānamātreṇa naro yāti paraṃ padam //
analyzed: maheśvaraḥ uvāca pañcatattva arcanam brūhi śaṅkha cakra gadā dhara  yena vijñāna mātreṇa naraḥ yāti param padam

original: hariruvāca / pañcatattvārcanaṃ vakṣye tava śaṅkara suvrata / maṅgalyaṃ maṅgalaṃ divyaṃ rahasyaṃ kāmadaṃ param //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca pañcatattva arcanam vakṣye tava śaṅkara suvrata maṅgalyam maṅgalam divyam rahasyam kāma dam param

original: tacchṛṇuṣva mahādeva pavitraṃ kalināśanam / eka evāvyayaḥ śāntaḥ paramātmā sanātanaḥ //
analyzed: tat śṛṇuṣva mahādeva pavitram kali nāśanam ekaḥ eva avyayaḥ śāntaḥ paramātmā sanātanaḥ

original: vāsudevo dhruvaḥ śuddhaḥ sarvavyāpī nirañjanaḥ / sa eva māyāyā deva pañcadhā saṃsthito hariḥ //
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ dhruvaḥ śuddhaḥ sarva vyāpī nirañjanaḥ saḥ eva māyāyāḥ deva pañcadhā saṃsthitaḥ hariḥ

original: lokānugrahakṛdviṣṇuḥ sarvaduṣṭavināśanaḥ / vāsudevasvarūpeṇa tathā saṅkarṣaṇena ca //
analyzed: loka anugraha kṛt viṣṇuḥ sarva duṣṭa vināśanaḥ vāsudeva sva rūpeṇa tathā saṅkarṣaṇena ca

original: tathā pradyumnarūpeṇāniruddhākhyena ca sthitaḥ / nārāyaṇasvarūpeṇa pañcadhā hyadvayaḥ sthitaḥ //
analyzed: tathā pradyumna rūpeṇa aniruddha ākhyena ca sthitaḥ nārāyaṇa sva rūpeṇa pañcadhā hi advayaḥ sthitaḥ

original: eteṣāṃ vācakānmantrānetāñchṛṇu vṛṣadhvaja / / oṃ aṃ vāsudevāya namaḥ / oṃ āṃ saṃkarṣaṇāya namaḥ / oṃ aṃ pradyumnāya namaḥ / oṃ aniruddhāya namaḥ / oṃ oṃ nārāyaṇāya namaḥ //
analyzed: eteṣām vācakān mantrān etān śṛṇu vṛṣadhvaja om aṃ vāsudevāya namaḥ om āṃ saṃkarṣaṇāya namaḥ om aṃ pradyumnāya namaḥ om aniruddhāya namaḥ om om nārāyaṇāya namaḥ

original: pañca mantrāḥ samākhyātā devānāṃ vācakāstava / sarvapāpaharāḥ puṇyāḥ sarvarogavināśanāḥ //
analyzed: pañca mantrāḥ samākhyātāḥ devānām vācakāḥ tava  sarva pāpa harāḥ puṇyāḥ sarva roga vināśanāḥ

original: adhunā saṃpravakṣyāmi pañcatattvārcanaṃ śubham / vidhinā yena kartavyaṃ yairvā mantraiśca śaṅkara / //
analyzed: adhunā saṃpravakṣyāmi pañcatattva arcanam śubham vidhinā yena kartavyam yaiḥ vā mantraiḥ ca śaṅkara

original: ādau snānaṃ prakurvīta snātvā sandhyāṃ samācaret / arcanāgāramāsādya prakṣālyārṅghyādikaṃ tathā //
analyzed: ādau snānam prakurvīta snātvā sandhyām samācaret arcana āgāram āsādya prakṣālya ārṅghya ādikam tathā

original: ācamyopaviśetprājño baddhāsanamabhīpsitam / śoṣaṇādi tataḥ kuryād aṃ kṣaiṃ ramiti mantrakaiḥ //
analyzed: ācamya upaviśet prājñaḥ baddha āsanam abhīpsitam  śoṣaṇa ādi tatas kuryāt aṃ kṣaiṃ ram iti mantrakaiḥ

original: sāmānyaṃ kaṭhinīkṛtya cāṇḍamutpādayettataḥ / vibhidyāṇḍaṃ tato hyaṇḍe bhāvayetparameśvaram //
analyzed: sāmānyam kaṭhinīkṛtya ca aṇḍam utpādayet tatas vibhidya aṇḍam tatas hi aṇḍe bhāvayet parameśvaram

original: vāsudevaṃ jagannāthaṃ pītakauśeyavāsasam / sahasrādityasaṅkāśaṃ sphuranmakarakuṇḍalam //
analyzed: vāsudevam jagannātham pītakauśeyavāsasam sahasra āditya saṅkāśam sphurat makara kuṇḍalam

original: ātmano hṛdi padme tu dhyāyettu parameśvaram / tataḥ saṃkarṣaṇaṃ devamātmānaṃ cintayetprabhum //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ hṛdi padme tu dhyāyet tu parameśvaram  tatas saṃkarṣaṇam devam ātmānam cintayet prabhum

original: pradyumnamaniruddhaṃ ca śrīmannārāyaṇaṃ tataḥ / indrādīṃśca surāṃstasmāddevadevātsamutthitān //
analyzed: pradyumnam aniruddham ca śrīmat nārāyaṇam tatas  indra ādīn ca surān tasmāt devadevāt samutthitān

original: cintayecca tato nyāsaṃ kayyāndvai kārayordvayoḥ / vyāpakaṃ mūlamantreṇa cāṅganyāsaṃ tataḥ param //
analyzed: cintayet ca tatas nyāsam kārayoḥ dvayoḥ  vyāpakam mūlamantreṇa ca aṅganyāsam tatas param

original: aṅgamantrairmahādeva / tānmantrāñśṛṇu suvrata / / oṃ āṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ / oṃ īṃ śirase namaḥ / oṃ ūṃ śikhāyai namaḥ / oṃ aiṃ kavacāya namaḥ / oṃ auṃ netratrayāya namaḥ / oṃ aḥ astrāya phaṭ //
analyzed: aṅgamantraiḥ mahādeva tān mantrān śṛṇu suvrata om āṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ om īṃ śirase namaḥ om ūm śikhāyai namaḥ om aim kavacāya namaḥ om aum netratrayāya namaḥ om aḥ astrāya phaṭ

original: oṃ samastaparivārāyācyutāya namaḥ / oṃ dhātre namaḥ / oṃ vidhātre namaḥ / oṃ ādhāraśaktayai namaḥ / oṃ kūrmāya namaḥ / oṃ anantāya namaḥ / oṃ pṛthivyainamaḥ / oṃ dharmāya namaḥ / oṃ dharmāya namaḥ / oṃ jñānāya namaḥ / oṃ vairāgyāya namaḥ / oṃ aiśvaryāya namaḥ / oṃ ajñānāya namaḥ / oṃ anaiśvaryāya namaḥ / oṃ aṃ arkamaṇḍalāya namaḥ / oṃ soṃ somamaṇāḍalāya namaḥ / oṃ vaṃ vahnimaṇḍalāya namaḥ / oṃ vaṃ vāsudevāya parabrahmaṇe śivāya tejorūpāya vyāpine sarvadevādhidevāya namaḥ / oṃ pāñcajanyāya namaḥ / oṃ sudarśavanāya namaḥ / oṃ gadāyai namaḥ / oṃ padmāya namaḥ / oṃ śriyai namaḥ / oṃ hriyai namaḥ / oṃ puṣṭyai namaḥ / oṃ gītyai namaḥ / oṃ śaktyai namaḥ / oṃ prītyai namaḥ / oṃ indrāya namaḥ / oṃ agnaye namaḥ / oṃ yamāya namaḥ / oṃ nirṛtaye namaḥ / oṃ varuṇāya namaḥ / oṃ vāyave namaḥ / oṃ somāya namaḥ / oṃ īśānāya namaḥ / oṃ anantāya namaḥ / oṃ brahmaṇe namaḥ / oṃ viṣvaksenāya namaḥ //
analyzed: om samasta parivārāya acyutāya namaḥ om dhātre namaḥ om vidhātre namaḥ om ādhāra śaktayai namaḥ om kūrmāya namaḥ om anantāya namaḥ om pṛthivyai namaḥ om dharmāya namaḥ om dharmāya namaḥ om jñānāya namaḥ om vairāgyāya namaḥ om aiśvaryāya namaḥ om ajñānāya namaḥ om anaiśvaryāya namaḥ om aṃ arka maṇḍalāya namaḥ om soṃ soma maṇḍalāya namaḥ om vaṃ vahni maṇḍalāya namaḥ om vaṃ vāyu maṇḍalāya namaḥ om aṃ arka maṇḍal

original: ete mantrāḥ samākhyātāstava rudra samāsataḥ / pūjā caiva prakartavyā maṇḍale svastikādike //
analyzed: ete mantrāḥ samākhyātāḥ tava rudra samāsatas pūjā ca eva prakartavyā maṇḍale svastika ādike

original: oṃ padmāya namaḥ / aṅganyāsaṃ ca kṛtvā tu mudrāḥ sarvāḥ pradaśayat / ātmānaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca dhyātvā caiva pareśvaram //
analyzed: om padmāya namaḥ aṅganyāsam ca kṛtvā tu mudrāḥ sarvāḥ pradaśayat ātmānam vāsudevam ca dhyātvā ca eva para īśvaram

original: āsanaṃ pūjayetpaścādāvāhya vidhivannaraḥ / dvāre dhāturvidhātuśca pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja //
analyzed: āsanam pūjayet paścāt āvāhya vidhivat naraḥ dvāre dhātuḥ vidhātuḥ ca pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja

original: garuḍaṃ pūjayedagre vāsudevasya śaṅkara / śaṅkhādipadmaparyantaṃ madhyadeśe prapūjayet //
analyzed: garuḍam pūjayet agre vāsudevasya śaṅkara śaṅkha ādi padma paryantam madhya deśe prapūjayet

original: dharmaṃ jñānaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryaṃ pūrvadeśataḥ / āgneyādiṣvarcayedvai adharmādicatuṣṭayam //
analyzed: dharmam jñānam ca vairāgyam aiśvaryam pūrva deśataḥ āgneya ādiṣu arcayet vai adharma ādi catuṣṭayam

original: maṇḍalatrayamadhye tu kīrtitā hyasanasthitiḥ / pūrvādipadmapatreṣu pūjyāḥ saṃkarṣaṇādayaḥ //
analyzed: maṇḍala traya madhye tu kīrtitā hi asana sthitiḥ pūrva ādi padma patreṣu pūjyāḥ saṃkarṣaṇa ādayaḥ

original: karṇikāyāṃ vāsudevaṃ pūjayetparameśvaram / pāñcajanyādayaḥ pūjyāḥ aiśānyādiṣu saṃsthitāḥ //
analyzed: karṇikāyām vāsudevam pūjayet parameśvaram  pāñcajanya ādayaḥ pūjyāḥ aiśānī ādiṣu saṃsthitāḥ

original: śaktayaścaiva pūrvādau devadevasya śaṅkara / indrādayo lokapālāḥ pūjyāḥ pūrvādiṣu sthitāḥ //
analyzed: śaktayaḥ ca eva pūrva ādau devadevasya śaṅkaraḥ indra ādayaḥ lokapālāḥ pūjyāḥ pūrva ādiṣu sthitāḥ

original: adho nāga tadūddhva tu brahmāṇaṃ pūjayetsudhīḥ / iti sthānakramo jñeyo maṇḍale śaṅkara tvayā //
analyzed: adhas nāga tad ūddhva tu brahmāṇam pūjayet sudhīḥ iti sthāna kramaḥ jñeyaḥ maṇḍale śaṅkara tvayā

original: āvāhya maṇḍale devaṃ kṛtvā nyāsaṃ tu tasya ca / mudrāṃ pradarśya pādyadīndadyānmūlena śaṅkara //
analyzed: āvāhya maṇḍale devam kṛtvā nyāsam tu tasya ca mudrām pradarśya pādī adīn dadyāt mūlena śaṅkara

original: snānaṃ vastraṃ tathācāmaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam / dīpaṃ naivedyamācāmaṃ namaskāraṃ pradakṣiṇam / kuryācchaṅkara mūlena japaṃ cāpi samarpayet //
analyzed: snānam vastram tathā ācāmam gandham puṣpam ca dhūpakam  dīpam naivedyam ācāmam namaskāram pradakṣiṇam kuryāt śaṅkara mūlena japam ca api samarpayet

original: daṃ stotraṃ japetpaścādvāsudevamanusmaran / oṃ namo vāsudevāya namaḥ sakarṣaṇāya ca //
analyzed: stotram japet paścāt vāsudevam anusmaran om namaḥ vāsudevāya namaḥ sakarṣaṇāya ca

original: pradyumnāyādidevāyāniruddhāya namonamaḥ / namo nārāyaṇāyaiva narāyaṇāṃ pataye namaḥ //
analyzed: pradyumnāya ādidevāya aniruddhāya namaḥ namaḥ namaḥ nārāyaṇāya eva pataye namaḥ

original: narapūjyāya kīrtyāya stutyāya varadāya ca / anādinidhanāyaiva purāṇāya namonamaḥ //
analyzed: nara pūjyāya kīrtyāya stutyāya vara dāya ca an ādi nidhanāya eva purāṇāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: sṛṣṭisaṃhārakartre ca brahmaṇaḥ pataye namaḥ / mano vai vedavedyāya śaṅkhacakradharāya ca //
analyzed: sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kartre ca brahmaṇaḥ pataye namaḥ manaḥ vai veda vedyāya śaṅkha cakra dharāya ca

original: kalikalmaṣahartre ca sureśāya namonamaḥ / saṃkāravṛkṣacchetre ca māyābhetre namonamaḥ //
analyzed: kali kalmaṣa hartre ca sureśāya namaḥ namaḥ saṃkāra vṛkṣa chetre ca māyā bhetre namaḥ namaḥ

original: vahurūpāya tīrthāya triguṇāyāguṇāya ca / brahmaviṣṇavīśarūpaya mokṣadāya namonamaḥ //
analyzed: vahu rūpāya tīrthāya triguṇāya aguṇāya ca mokṣa dāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: mokṣadvārāya dharmāya nirmāṇāya namonamaḥ / sarvakāmapradāyaiva parabrahmasvarūpiṇe //
analyzed: mokṣadvārāya dharmāya nirmāṇāya namaḥ namaḥ sarva kāma pradāya eva para brahma svarūpiṇe

original: saṃsārasāgare ghore nimagnaṃ māṃ samuddhara / tvadanyo nāsti deveśa nāsti trātā jagatprabho //
analyzed: saṃsāra sāgare ghore nimagnam mām samuddhara tvad anyaḥ nā asti deveśa nā asti trātā jagatprabho

original: tvāmava sarvagaṃ viṣṇuṃ gato 'haṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ / jñānadīpapradānena tamomuktaṃ prakāśaya //
analyzed: sarvagam viṣṇum gataḥ ham śaraṇam gataḥ jñāna dīpa pradānena tamaḥ muktam prakāśaya

original: evaṃ stuvīta deveśaṃ sarvakleśavināśanam / anyaiścavādakeḥ stātraiḥ stutvā vai nīlalohita //
analyzed: evam stuvīta deveśam sarva kleśa vināśanam stātraiḥ stutvā vai nīlalohita

original: pañcatattvasamāyuktaṃ dhyāyodviṣṇuṃ naro hṛdi / visarjayattatā devamiti pūjā prakīrtitā //
analyzed: pañcatattva samāyuktam dhyāyot viṣṇum naraḥ hṛdi devam iti pūjā prakīrtitā

original: sarvakāmapradā śreṣṭhā vāsudevasya śaṅkara / etatpūjanamātreṇa kṛtakṛtyo bhavennaraḥ //
analyzed: sarva kāma pradā śreṣṭhā vāsudevasya śaṅkara etad pūjana mātreṇa kṛtakṛtyaḥ bhavet naraḥ

original: idaṃ ca yaḥ paṭhedrudra pañcatattvārcanaṃ naraḥ / śṛṇuyācchravāyedvāpi viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati //
analyzed: idam ca yaḥ paṭhet rudra pañcatattva arcanam naraḥ śṛṇuyāt śravāyet vā api viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pañcatattvā(viṣṇavar)
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe

original: ca navidhirnāma dvātriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: ca navidhiḥ nāma dvātriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 33
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: rudra uvāca / sudarśanasya pūjāṃ me vada śaṅkhagadādhara / graharogādikaṃ sarvaṃ yatkṛtvā nāśameti vai //
analyzed: rudraḥ uvāca sudarśanasya pūjām me vada śaṅkha gadā dhara graha roga ādikam sarvam yat kṛtvā nāśam eti vai

original: hariruvāca / sudarśanasya cakrasya śṛṇu pūjāṃ vṛṣadhvaja / snānamādau prakurvīta pūjayecca hariṃ tata //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca sudarśanasya cakrasya śṛṇu pūjām vṛṣadhvaja snānam ādau prakurvīta pūjayet ca harim tata

original: mūlamantreṇa vai nyāsaṃ mūlamantraṃ śṛṇuṣvaca / sahasrāraṃ huṃ phaṭ namo mantraḥ praṇavapūrvakaḥ //
analyzed: mūlamantreṇa vai nyāsam mūlamantram śṛṇuṣva ca sahasrāram hum phaṭ namaḥ mantraḥ praṇava pūrvakaḥ

original: kathitaḥ sarvaduṣṭānāṃ nāśako mantrabhedakaḥ / dhyāyetmudarśanaṃ devaṃ hṛdi padme 'male śubhe //
analyzed: kathitaḥ sarva duṣṭānām nāśakaḥ mantra bhedakaḥ  dhyāyet mudarśanam devam hṛdi padme male śubhe

original: śaṅkacakragadāpadmadharaṃ saumyaṃ kirīṭinam / āvāhya maṇḍale devaṃ pūrvoktavidhinā hara //
analyzed: śaṅka cakra gadā padma dharam saumyam kirīṭinam āvāhya maṇḍale devam pūrva ukta vidhinā hara

original: pūjayedrandhapuṣpādyairupacārairmaheśvara / pūjayitvā japenmantraṃ śatamaṣṭottaraṃ naraḥ //
analyzed: pūjayet randha puṣpa ādyaiḥ upacāraiḥ maheśvara pūjayitvā japet mantram śatam aṣṭa uttaram naraḥ

original: evaṃ yaḥ kurute rudra / cakrasyārcanamuttamam / sarvarogavinirmukto viṣṇulokaṃ samāpnuyāt //
analyzed: evam yaḥ kurute rudra cakrasya arcanam uttamam sarva roga vinirmuktaḥ viṣṇu lokam samāpnuyāt

original: etatstotraṃ japetpaścātsarvavyādhivināśanam / namaḥ sudarśanāyaiva sahasrādityavarcase //
analyzed: etat stotram japet paścāt sarva vyādhi vināśanam namaḥ sudarśanāya eva sahasra āditya varcase

original: jvālāmālāpradīptāya sahasrārāya cakṣuṣe / sarvaduṣṭavināśāya sarvapātakamardine //
analyzed: jvālā mālā pradīptāya sahasra ārāya cakṣuṣe sarva duṣṭa vināśāya sarva pātaka mardine

original: sucakrāya vicakrāya sarvamantravibhedine / prasavitre jagaddhātre jagadvidhvaṃsine namaḥ //
analyzed: su cakrāya vicakrāya sarva mantra vibhedine prasavitre jagat dhātre jagat vidhvaṃsine namaḥ

original: pālanārthāya lokānāṃ duṣṭāsuravināśine / ugrāya caiva saumyāya caṇḍāya ca namonamaḥ //
analyzed: pālana arthāya lokānām duṣṭa asura vināśine  ugrāya ca eva saumyāya caṇḍāya ca namaḥ namaḥ

original: namaścakṣuḥ kvarūpāya saṃsārabhayabhedine / māyāpañjarabhetre ca śivāya ca namonamaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ cakṣuḥ kva rūpāya saṃsāra bhaya bhedine māyā pañjara bhetre ca śivāya ca namaḥ namaḥ

original: grahātigraharūpāya grahāṇāṃ pateya namaḥ / kālāya mṛtyave caiva bhīmāya ca namonamaḥ //
analyzed: graha ati graha rūpāya grahāṇām pateya namaḥ kālāya mṛtyave ca eva bhīmāya ca namaḥ namaḥ

original: bhaktānugrahadātre ca bhaktagoptre namonamaḥ / viṣṇurūpāya śāntāya cāyudhānāṃ dharāya ca //
analyzed: bhakta anugraha dātre ca bhakta goptre namaḥ namaḥ viṣṇu rūpāya śāntāya ca āyudhānām dharāya ca

original: viṣṇuśastrāya cakrāya namo bhūyo namonamaḥ / iti stotraṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ cakrasya tava kīrtitam //
analyzed: viṣṇu śastrāya cakrāya namaḥ bhūyas namaḥ namaḥ iti stotram mahā puṇyam cakrasya tava kīrtitam

original: yaḥ paṭhetparayā bhaktyā viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati / cakrapūjāvidhiṃ yaśca paṭhedrudra jitondriyaḥ / sa pāpaṃ bhasmasātkṛtvā viṣṇulokāya kalpate //
analyzed: yaḥ paṭhet parayā bhaktyā viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati cakra pūjā vidhim yaḥ ca paṭhet rudra jita indriyaḥ sa pāpam bhasmasātkṛtvā viṣṇu lokāya kalpate

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sudarśanapūjāvidhirnāma trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe sudarśanapūjāvidhiḥ nāma trayastriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 34
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: rudra uvāca / punardevārcanaṃ brūhi hṛṣīkeśa gadādhara / śṛṇvato nāsti tṛptirme gadatastava pūjanam //
analyzed: rudraḥ uvāca punar deva arcanam brūhi hṛṣīkeśa gadādhara śṛṇvataḥ na asti tṛptiḥ me gadataḥ tava pūjanam

original: hariruvāca / hayagrīvasya devasya pūjanaṃ kathayāmi te / tacchṛṇuṣva jagannātho yena viṣṇuḥ pratuṣyati //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca hayagrīvasya devasya pūjanam kathayāmi te tat śṛṇuṣva jagannāthaḥ yena viṣṇuḥ pratuṣyati

original: mūlamantraṃ mahādeva hayagrīvasya vācakam / pravakṣyāmi paraṃ puṇyaṃ tadādau śṛṇu śaṅkara //
analyzed: mūlamantram mahādeva hayagrīvasya vācakam pravakṣyāmi param puṇyam tat ādau śṛṇu śaṅkara

original: oṃ saiṃ kṣaiṃ śirase namaḥ iti praṇavasaṃyutaḥ / ayaṃ navākṣaromantraḥ sarvavidyāpradāyakaḥ //
analyzed: om saiṃ kṣaiṃ śirase namaḥ iti praṇava saṃyutaḥ ayam nava akṣaraḥ mantraḥ sarva vidyā pradāyakaḥ

original: asyāṅgāni mahādeva tāñchṛṇuṣva vṛṣadhvaja / oṃ kṣāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ / oṃ kṣīṃ śirase svāhāśiraḥ proktaṃ kṣūṃ vaṣaṭ tathā //
analyzed: asya aṅgāni mahādeva tān śṛṇuṣva vṛṣadhvaja om   hṛdayāya namaḥ om   śirase svāhā śiraḥ proktam   vaṣaṭ tathā

original: oṃ kārayuktā devasya śikhā jñeyā vṛṣadhvaja / oṃ kṣaiṃ kavacāya huṃ vai kavacaṃ parikīrtitam //
analyzed: om kāra yuktā devasya śikhā jñeyā vṛṣadhvaja om kṣaiṃ kavacāya hum vai kavacam parikīrtitam

original: oṃ kṣaiṃ netratrayāya vauṣaṭ netraṃ devasya kīrtitam / oṃ haḥ astrāya phaṭ astraṃ devasya kīrtitam //
analyzed: om kṣaiṃ netratrayāya vauṣaṭ netram devasya kīrtitam  om haḥ astrāya phaṭ astram devasya kīrtitam

original: pūjāvidhiṃ pravakṣyāmi nanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu ādau snātvā tathācamya tato yāgagṛhaṃ vrajet //
analyzed: pūjā vidhim pravakṣyāmi nat me nigadataḥ śṛṇu ādau snātvā tathā ācamya tatas yāga gṛham vrajet

original: tataḥ praviśya vidhivatkuryādvaṃ śoṣaṇādikam / yaṃ kṣaiṃ ramiti bījaiśca kaṭhinīkṛtya lamiti //
analyzed: tatas praviśya vidhivat kuryāt vam śoṣaṇa ādikam yaṃ kṣaiṃ ram iti bījaiḥ ca kaṭhinīkṛtya lam iti

original: aṇḍamutpādya ca tataḥ oṃ kāreṇaiva bhedayet / aṇḍamadhye hayagrīvamātmānaṃ paricintayet //
analyzed: aṇḍam utpādya ca tatas om kāreṇa eva bhedayet aṇḍa madhye hayagrīvam ātmānam paricintayet

original: śaṅkhakundendudhavalaṃ mṛṇālarajataprabham / gokṣīrasadṛśaṃ tadvatsūryakoṭisamagrabham / śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ padmaṃ dhārayantaṃ caturbhujam //
analyzed: śaṅkha kunda indu dhavalam mṛṇāla rajata prabham go kṣīra sadṛśam tadvat sūrya koṭi samagra bham śaṅkham cakram gadām padmam dhārayantam caturbhujam

original: kirīṭinaṃ kuṇḍalinaṃ vanamālāsamaṃnvitam / sucakraṃ sukapolaṃ ca ṣītāmbaradharaṃ vibhum //
analyzed: kirīṭinam kuṇḍalinam vanamālā samaṃnvitam su cakram su kapolam ca ṣīta ambara dharam vibhum

original: bhāvayitvā mahātmānaṃ sarvadevaiḥ samanvitam / aṅgamantraistato nyāsaṃ mūlamantreṇa vai tathā //
analyzed: bhāvayitvā mahātmānam sarva devaiḥ samanvitam  aṅgamantraiḥ tatas nyāsam mūlamantreṇa vai tathā

original: tataśca darśayenmudrāṃ śaṅkhapadmādikāṃ śubhām / dhyāyeddhyātvārcayedviṣṇuṃ mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara //
analyzed: tatas ca darśayet mudrām śaṅkhapadma ādikām śubhām dhyāyet dhyātvā arcayet viṣṇum mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara

original: tataścāvāhayedrudra devatā āsanasya yāḥ / oṃ hayagrīvāsanasya āgacchata ca devatāḥ //
analyzed: tatas ca āvāhayet rudra devatāḥ āsanasya yāḥ om hayagrīva āsanasya āgacchata ca devatāḥ

original: āvāhya maṇḍale tāstu pūjayetsvastikādike / dvāre dhāturvidhātuśca pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja //
analyzed: āvāhya maṇḍale tāḥ tu pūjayet svastika ādike  dvāre dhātuḥ vidhātuḥ ca pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja

original: samastaparivārāya acyutāya nama iti / asya madhyer'canaṃ kāryaṃ dvāre gaṅgāñca pūjayet //
analyzed: samasta parivārāya acyutāya namaḥ iti asya madhya īrcanam kāryam dvāre gaṅgām ca pūjayet

original: yamunāṃ ca mahādevīṃ śaṅkhapadmanidhī tathā / garuḍaṃ pūjayedagre madhye śaktiñca pūjayet //
analyzed: yamunām ca mahā devīm śaṅkha padma nidhī tathā garuḍam pūjayet agre madhye śaktim ca pūjayet

original: ādhārākhyāṃ mahādeva tataḥ kūrmaṃ samarcayet / anantaṃ pṛthivīṃ paścāddharmajñāne(nau)
analyzed: ādhāra ākhyām mahādeva tatas kūrmam samarcayet anantam pṛthivīm paścāt dharma jñānenau

original: tato 'cayet //
analyzed: cayet

original: vairāgyamatha caiśvaryamāgneyādiṣu pūjayet / adharmājñānāvairāgyānaiśrargyādīṃstu pūrvataḥ //
analyzed: vairāgyam atha ca aiśvaryam āgneya ādiṣu pūjayet adharma ajñāna avairāgya anaiśrargya ādīn tu pūrvatas

original: sattvaṃ rajastamaścaiva madhyadeśe 'tha pūjayet / kandaṃ nālaṃ ca padmaṃ ca madhye caiva prapūjayet //
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ ca eva madhyadeśe pūjayet kandam nālam ca padmam ca madhye ca eva prapūjayet

original: arkasomāgnisaṃjñānāṃ maṇḍalānāṃ hi pūjanam / madhyadeśe prakartavyamiti rudra prakīrtitam //
analyzed: arka soma agni saṃjñānām maṇḍalānām hi pūjanam madhyadeśe prakartavyam iti rudra prakīrtitam

original: vimalotkarṣiṇī jñānā kriyāyoge vṛṣadhvaja / prahvī satyā tatheśānānugrahau śaktayo hyamūḥ //
analyzed: vimalā utkarṣiṇī jñānā kriyā yoge vṛṣadhvaja prahvī satyā tathā īśānā anugrahau śaktayaḥ hi amūḥ

original: pūrvādiṣu ca patreṣu pūjyāśca vimalādayaḥ / anugrahā karṇikāyāṃ pūjyā śreyo 'rthibhirnaraiḥ //
analyzed: pūrva ādiṣu ca patreṣu pūjyāḥ ca vimalā ādayaḥ anugrahā karṇikāyām pūjyā śreyaḥ rthibhiḥ naraiḥ

original: praṇavādyairnamo 'ntaiśca caturthyantaiśca nāmabhiḥ / mantrairebhirmahādeva āsanaṃ paripūjayet //
analyzed: praṇava ādyaiḥ namaḥ ntaiḥ ca caturthī antaiḥ ca nāmabhiḥ mantraiḥ ebhiḥ mahādevaḥ āsanam paripūjayet

original: snānagandhapradānena puṣpadhūpapradānataḥ / dīpanaivedyadānena āsanasyārcanaṃ śubham //
analyzed: snāna gandha pradānena puṣpa dhūpa pradānataḥ dīpa naivedya dānena āsanasya arcanam śubham

original: kartavyaṃ vidhinānena iti te hara kīrtitam / tataścāvāhayeddevaṃ hayagrīvaṃ sureśvaram //
analyzed: kartavyam vidhinā anena iti te hara kīrtitam tatas ca āvāhayet devam hayagrīvam sureśvaram

original: vāmanāsāpuṭenaiva āgacchantaṃ vicintayet / āgacchataḥ prayogeṇa mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara //
analyzed: vāma nāsā puṭena eva āgacchantam vicintayet āgacchataḥ prayogeṇa mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara

original: āvāhanaṃ prakartavyaṃ devadevasya śaṅkhinaḥ / āvāhyamaṇḍale tasya nyāsaṃ kuryādatandritaḥ //
analyzed: āvāhanam prakartavyam devadevasya śaṅkhinaḥ āvāhya maṇḍale tasya nyāsam kuryāt atandritaḥ

original: nyāsaṃ kṛtvā ca tatrasthaṃ cintayetparameśvaram / hayagrīvaṃ mahādevaṃ surāsuranamaskṛtam //
analyzed: nyāsam kṛtvā ca tatrastham cintayet parameśvaram  hayagrīvam mahādevam sura asura namaskṛtam

original: indrādilokapālaiśca saṃyuktaṃ viṣṇumavyayam / dyātvā pradarśayenmudrāḥ śaṅkhacakrādikāḥ śubhāḥ //
analyzed: indra ādi lokapālaiḥ ca saṃyuktam viṣṇum avyayam

original: pādyārghyācamanīyāni tato dadyācca viṣṇave / snāpayecca tato devaṃ padmanābhamanāmayam //
analyzed: pādya arghya ācamanīyāni tatas dadyāt ca viṣṇave snāpayet ca tatas devam padmanābham anāmayam

original: devaṃ saṃsthāpya vidhivadvastraṃ dadyādvṛṣadhvaja / tato hyācamanaṃ dadyādupavītaṃ tataḥ śubham //
analyzed: devam saṃsthāpya vidhivat vastram dadyāt vṛṣadhvaja tatas hi ācamanam dadyāt upavītam tatas śubham

original: tataśca maṇḍale rudra dhyāyeddevaṃ pareśvaram / dhyātvā pādyādikaṃ bhūyo dadyāddevāya śaṅkara //
analyzed: tatas ca maṇḍale rudra dhyāyet devam pareśvaram  dhyātvā pādya ādikam bhūyas dadyāt devāya śaṅkara

original: dadyādbhairavadevāya mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara / oṃ kṣāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ anena hṛdayaṃ yajet //
analyzed: dadyāt bhairava devāya mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara om   hṛdayāya namaḥ anena hṛdayam yajet

original: oṃ kṣīṃ śirase namaśca śirasaḥ pūjanaṃ bhavet / oṃ kṣūṃ śikhāyai namaśca śikhāmetena pūjayet //
analyzed: om kṣīṃ śirase namaḥ ca śirasaḥ pūjanam bhavet om   śikhāyai namaḥ ca śikhām etena pūjayet

original: oṃ kṣaiṃ kavacāya namaḥ kavacaṃ paripūjayet / oṃ kṣaiṃ netrāya namaśca netraṃ cānena pūjayet //
analyzed: om kṣaiṃ kavacāya namaḥ kavacam paripūjayet om kṣaiṃ netrāya namaḥ ca netram ca anena pūjayet

original: oṃ kṣaḥ astrāya nama iti astraṃ cānena pūjayet / hṛdayaṃ ca śiraścaiva śikhāṃ ca kavacaṃ tathā //
analyzed: om kṣaḥ astrāya namaḥ iti astram ca anena pūjayet hṛdayam ca śiraḥ ca eva śikhām ca kavacam tathā

original: pūrvādiṣu pradeśeṣu hyetāstu paripūjayet / koṇeṣvastraṃ yajedrudra netraṃ madhyai prapūjayet //
analyzed: pūrva ādiṣu pradeśeṣu hi etāḥ tu paripūjayet koṇeṣu astram yajet rudra netram prapūjayet

original: pūjayetparamāṃ devīṃ lakṣmīṃ lakṣmīpradāṃ śubhām / śaṅkhaṃ padmaṃ tathā cakraṃ gadāṃ pūrvāditor'cayet //
analyzed: pūjayet paramām devīm lakṣmīm lakṣmī pradām śubhām śaṅkham padmam tathā cakram gadām pūrva āditas urcayet

original: khaḍgaṃ ca musalaṃ pāśamaṅkuśaṃ saśaraṃ dhanuḥ / pūjayetpūrvato rudra ebhirmantraiḥ svanāmakaiḥ //
analyzed: khaḍgam ca musalam pāśam aṅkuśam sa śaram dhanuḥ pūjayet pūrvatas rudraḥ ebhiḥ mantraiḥ sva nāmakaiḥ

original: śrīvatsaṃ kaustubhaṃ mālāṃ tathā pītāmbaraṃ śubham / pūjayetpūrvato rudra śaṅkhacakragadādharam //
analyzed: śrīvatsam kaustubham mālām tathā pīta ambaram śubham pūjayet pūrvatas rudra śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: brahmāṇaṃ nāradaṃ siddhaṃ guruṃ paraguruṃ tathā / gurośca pāduke tadvatparamasya gurostathā //
analyzed: brahmāṇam nāradam siddham gurum para gurum tathā guroḥ ca pāduke tadvat paramasya guroḥ tathā

original: indraṃ savāhanaṃ cātha parivārayutaṃ tathā / agniṃ yamaṃ nirṛtiṃ ca varuṇaṃ vāyumeva ca //
analyzed: indram sa vāhanam ca atha parivāra yutam tathā agnim yamam nirṛtim ca varuṇam vāyum eva ca

original: somamīśānamevaṃ vai brahmāṇaṃ paripūjayet / pūrvādikordhvaparyantaṃ pūjayedvṛṣabhadhvaja //
analyzed: somam īśānam evam vai brahmāṇam paripūjayet pūrva ādika ūrdhva paryantam pūjayet vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: vajraṃ śaktiṃ tathā daṇḍaṃ khaṅgaṃ pāśaṃ dhvajaṃ gadām / triśūlaṃ cakrapadme ca āyudhānyatha pūjayet //
analyzed: vajram śaktim tathā daṇḍam khaṅgam pāśam dhvajam gadām triśūlam cakra padme ca āyudhāni atha pūjayet

original: viṣvaksenaṃ tato devamaiśānyāṃ diśi pūjayet / ebhirmantrairnamo 'ntaiśca praṇavādyairvṛṣadhvaja //
analyzed: viṣvaksenam tatas devam aiśānyām diśi pūjayet ebhiḥ mantraiḥ namaḥ ntaiḥ ca praṇava ādyaiḥ vṛṣadhvaja

original: pūjā kāryā mahādeva hyanantasya vṛṣadhvaja / devasya mūlamantreṇa pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja //
analyzed: pūjā kāryā mahādeva hi anantasya vṛṣadhvaja  devasya mūlamantreṇa pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja

original: gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ tathā dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ naivedyameva ca / pradakṣiṇaṃ namaskāraṃ japyaṃ tasmai samarpayet //
analyzed: gandham puṣpam tathā dhūpam dīpam naivedyam eva ca pradakṣiṇam namaskāram japyam tasmai samarpayet

original: stuvīta cānyā stutyā praṇavādyairvṛṣadhvaja / oṃ namo hayaśirase vidyādhyakṣāya vai namaḥ //
analyzed: stuvīta ca anyā stutyā praṇava ādyaiḥ vṛṣadhvaja om namaḥ haya śirase vidyā adhyakṣāya vai namaḥ

original: namo vidyāsvarūpāya vidyādātre namonamaḥ / namaḥ śāntāya devāya triguṇāyātmane namaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ vidyā svarūpāya vidyā dātre namaḥ namaḥ namaḥ śāntāya devāya triguṇāya ātmane namaḥ

original: surāsuranihantre ca sarvaduṣṭavināśine / sarvalokādhipataye brahmarūpāya vai namaḥ //
analyzed: sura asura nihantre ca sarva duṣṭa vināśine sarva loka adhipataye brahma rūpāya vai namaḥ

original: namaśceśvaravandyāya śaṅkacakradhāraya ca / nama ādyāya dāntāya sarvasattvahitāya ca //
analyzed: namaḥ ca īśvara vandyāya śaṅka cakra dhāraya ca  namaḥ ādyāya dāntāya sarva sattva hitāya ca

original: triguṇāyāguṇāyaiva brahmaviṣṇusvarūpiṇe / kartre hartre sureśāya sarvagāya namonamaḥ //
analyzed: triguṇāya aguṇāya eva brahma viṣṇu svarūpiṇe kartre hartre sureśāya sarvagāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: ityevaṃ saṃstavaṃ kṛtvā devadevaṃ vicintayet / hṛtpadme vimale rudra śaṅkhacakragadādharam //
analyzed: iti evam saṃstavam kṛtvā devadevam vicintayet hṛd padme vimale rudra śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: sūryakoṭipratīkāśaṃ sarvāvayavasundaram / hayagrīvomahīśeśaṃ paramātmānamavyayam //
analyzed: sūrya koṭi pratīkāśam sarva avayava sundaram hayagrīvaḥ mahī īśa īśam paramātmānam avyayam

original: iti te kathitā pūjā hayagrīvasya śaṅkara / yaḥ paṭhetparayā bhaktyā sa gacchetparamaṃ padam //
analyzed: iti te kathitā pūjā hayagrīvasya śaṅkara yaḥ paṭhet parayā bhaktyā sa gacchet paramam padam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe hayagrīvapūjāvidhirnāma catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe hayagrīvapūjāvidhiḥ nāma catustriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 35
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / nyāsādikaṃ pravakṣyāmi gāyattryāḥ śṛṇu śaṅkara / viśvāmitraṛṣiścaiva savitā cātha devatā //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca nyāsa ādikam pravakṣyāmi gāyattryāḥ śṛṇu śaṅkara viśvāmitra ṛṣiḥ ca eva savitā ca atha devatā

original: brahmaśīrṣā rudraśikhā viṣṇorhṛdayasaṃśritā / viniyogaikanayanā kātyāyanasagotrajā //
analyzed: brahma śīrṣā rudra śikhā viṣṇoḥ hṛdaya saṃśritā viniyoga eka nayanā kātyāyana sagotra jā

original: trailokyacaraṇā jñeyā pṛthivīkukṣisaṃsthitā / evaṃ jñātvā tu gāyattrīṃ japeddvādaśalakṣakam //
analyzed: trailokyacaraṇā jñeyā pṛthivī kukṣi saṃsthitā  evam jñātvā tu gāyattrīm japet dvādaśa lakṣakam

original: tripadāṣṭākṣarā jñeyā catuṣpādā ṣaḍakṣarā / jepa ca tripadā groktā arcane ca catuṣpadā //
analyzed: tripadā aṣṭa akṣarā jñeyā catuṣpādā ṣaṣ akṣarā ca tripadā arcane ca catuṣpadā

original: nyāse jape tathā dhyāne agnikārye tathārcane / gāyattrīṃ vinyasennityaṃ sarvapāpagraṇāśinīm //
analyzed: nyāse jape tathā dhyāne agni kārye tathā arcane gāyattrīm vinyaset nityam sarva pāpa graṇa āśinīm

original: pādāṃsuṣṭhe gulphamadhye jaṅghayorviddhi jānunoḥ / ūrvorguhye ca vṛṣaṇe nāḍyāṃ nābhau tanūdare //
analyzed: gulpha madhye jaṅghayoḥ viddhi jānunoḥ ūrvoḥ guhye ca vṛṣaṇe nāḍyām nābhau tanu udare

original: stanayorhṛdi kaṇṭhauṣṭhamukhe tāluni cāṃsayoḥ / netre bhuvārlalāṭe ca pūrvasyāṃ dakṣiṇottare //
analyzed: stanayoḥ hṛdi kaṇṭha oṣṭha mukhe tāluni ca aṃsayoḥ netre bhuvār lalāṭe ca pūrvasyām dakṣiṇa uttare

original: paścame mūrdhni cākāraṃ nyasedvarṇānvadāmyaham / indranīlaṃ ca vahniṃ ca pītaṃ śyāmaṃ ca kāpilam //
analyzed: paścame mūrdhni ca ākāram nyaset varṇān vadāmi aham indranīlam ca vahnim ca pītam śyāmam ca kāpilam

original: śvetaṃ vidyutprabhaṃ tāraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ raktaṃ krameṇa tat / śyāmaṃ śuklaṃ tathā pītaṃ śvetaṃ vai padmarāgavat //
analyzed: śvetam vidyutprabham tāram kṛṣṇam raktam krameṇa tat śyāmam śuklam tathā pītam śvetam vai padmarāga vat

original: śaṅkhavarṇaṃ pāṇḍuraṃ ca raktaṃ cāsavasannibham / arkavarṇasamaṃ saumyaṃ śaṅkhābhaṃ śvetameva ca //
analyzed: śaṅkha varṇam pāṇḍuram ca raktam ca āsava sannibham arka varṇa samam saumyam śaṅkha ābham śvetam eva ca

original: yadyatspṛśati hastena yacca paśyati cakṣuṣā / pūtaṃ bhavati tatsarvaṃ gāyattryā na paraṃ viduḥ //
analyzed: yat yat spṛśati hastena yat ca paśyati cakṣuṣā pūtam bhavati tat sarvam gāyattryāḥ na param viduḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gāyattrīnyāsanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe gāyattrīnyāsanirūpaṇam nāma pañcatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 36
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / sandhyāvidhiṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu rudrāghanāśanam / prāṇāyāmatrayaṃ kṛtvā sandhyāsnānamupakramet //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca sandhyā vidhim pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu rudra agha nāśanam prāṇāyāma trayam kṛtvā sandhyā snānam upakramet

original: sapraṇavāṃ savyāhṛtiṃ gāyattrīṃ śirasā saha / triḥ paṭhedāyatapraṇaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ sa ucyate //
analyzed: sa praṇavām sa vyāhṛtim gāyattrīm śirasā saha tris paṭhet āyata praṇaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: manovākrāyajaṃ doṣaṃ prāṇāyāmairdaheddvijaḥ / tasmātsarveṣu kāleṣu prāṇāyāmaparo bhavet //
analyzed: manaḥ vāc rāya jam doṣam prāṇāyāmaiḥ dahet dvijaḥ tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu prāṇāyāma paraḥ bhavet

original: sāyamagniśca metyuktā prātaḥ sūryetyapaḥ pibet / āpaḥ punantu madhyāhne upaspṛśya yathāvidhi //
analyzed: sāyam agniḥ ca mā iti uktā prātar sūrya iti apaḥ pibet āpaḥ punantu madhyāhne upaspṛśya yathāvidhi

original: āpohiṣṭhetyṛcā kuryānmārjanaṃ tu kuśodakaiḥ / praṇavena tu saṃyuktaṃ kṣipedvāri padepade //
analyzed: āpohiṣṭhā iti ṛcā kuryāt mārjanam tu kuśa udakaiḥ praṇavena tu saṃyuktam kṣipet vāri pade pade

original: rajastamaḥ svamohotthāñjāgratsvapnasuṣuptijān / vāṅmanaḥ karmajāndoṣānnavaitānnavabhirdahet //
analyzed: rajaḥ tamaḥ sva moha utthān jāgrat svapna suṣupti jān vāc manaḥ karma jān doṣān nava etān navabhiḥ dahet

original: samuddhṛtyodakaṃ pāṇau japtvā ca drupadāṃ kṣipet / tripaḍaṣṭau dvādaśadhā vartayedaghamarpaṇam //
analyzed: samuddhṛtya udakam pāṇau japtvā ca drupadām kṣipet tri paḥ aṣṭau dvādaśadhā vartayet agham arpaṇam

original: udutyañcitramityābhyāmupatiṣṭheddivākaram / divā rātrau ca yatpāpaṃ sarvaṃ naśyati tatkṣaṇāt //
analyzed: ud utyan citram ityābhyām upatiṣṭhet divākaram divā rātrau ca yat pāpam sarvam naśyati tad kṣaṇāt

original: pūrvasaṃdhyāṃ japaṃstiṣṭhetpaścimāmupaviśya ca / mahāvyāhṛtisaṃyuktāṃ gāyattrīṃ praṇavānvitām //
analyzed: pūrva saṃdhyām japan tiṣṭhet paścimām upaviśya ca mahāvyāhṛti saṃyuktām gāyattrīm praṇava anvitām

original: daśabhirjanmajanitaṃ śatena tu purā kṛtam / triyugaṃ tu sahasreṇa gāyattrī hanti duṣkṛtam //
analyzed: daśabhiḥ janma janitam śatena tu purā kṛtam tri yugam tu sahasreṇa gāyattrī hanti duṣkṛtam

original: raktā bhavati gāyattrī sāvitrī śuklavarṇikā / kṛṣṇā sarasvatī jñeyā saṃdhyātrayamudāhṛtam //
analyzed: raktā bhavati gāyattrī sāvitrī śukla varṇikā kṛṣṇā sarasvatī jñeyā saṃdhyā trayam udāhṛtam

original: oṃ bhūrvinyasya hṛdaye oṃ bhuvaḥ śirasi nyaset / oṃ svariti śikhāyāṃ ca gāyattryāḥ prathamaṃ padam //
analyzed: om bhūḥ vinyasya hṛdaye om bhuvaḥ śirasi nyaset om svar iti śikhāyām ca gāyattryāḥ prathamam padam

original: vinyasetkavace vidvāndvitīyaṃ netrayornyaset / tṛtīyenāṅgavinyāsaṃ caturthaṃ sarvato nyaset //
analyzed: vinyaset kavace vidvān dvitīyam netrayoḥ nyaset  tṛtīyena aṅga vinyāsam caturtham sarvatas nyaset

original: saṃdhyākāle tu vinyasya japedvai vedamātaram / śivastasyāstu sarvāhne prāṇāyāmaparaṃ nyaset //
analyzed: saṃdhyā kāle tu vinyasya japet vai vedamātaram śivaḥ tasyāḥ tu sarvāhne prāṇāyāma param nyaset

original: tripadā yā tu gāyattrī brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarī / viniyogamṛṣicchando jñātvā tu japamārabhet //
analyzed: tripadā yā tu gāyattrī brahma viṣṇu maheśvarī viniyogam ṛṣicchandaḥ jñātvā tu japam ārabhet

original: sarvapāpavinirmukto brahmalokamavāpnuyāt / parorajasi sāvadoṃ turīyapadamīritam //
analyzed: sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ brahma lokam avāpnuyāt paras rajasi turīya padam īritam

original: taṃ hanti sūryaḥ sandhyāyāṃ nopāstiṃ kurute tu yaḥ / turīyasya padasyāpi ṛṣirnirmala eva ca //
analyzed: tam hanti sūryaḥ sandhyāyām na upāstim kurute tu yaḥ turīyasya padasya api ṛṣiḥ nirmalaḥ eva ca

original: chandastu devī gāyattrī paramātmā ca devatā //
analyzed: chandaḥ tu devī gāyattrī paramātmā ca devatā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe saṃdhyāvidhirnāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe saṃdhyāvidhiḥ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 37
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / gāyattrī paramā devī bhuktimuktipradā ca tām / yo japettasya pāpānivinaśyanti mahāntyapi //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca gāyattrī paramā devī bhukti mukti pradā ca tām  yaḥ japet tasya pāpāni vinaśyanti mahānti api

original: gāyattrīkalpamākhyāsye bhuktimuktipradaṃ ca tat / aṣṭottaraṃ sahasraṃ vā athavāṣṭaśataṃ japet //
analyzed: gāyattrī kalpam ākhyāsye bhukti mukti pradam ca tat aṣṭa uttaram sahasram vā athavā aṣṭaśatam japet

original: trisandhyaṃ brahmalokīsyācchataṃ japtvā jalaṃ pibet / saṃdhyāyāṃ sarvapāpaghnīṃ devīmāvāhya pūjayet //
analyzed: trisandhyam brahma lokī syāt śatam japtvā jalam pibet saṃdhyāyām sarva pāpa ghnīm devīm āvāhya pūjayet

original: bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ svamantreṇa yutāṃ dvādaśanāmabhiḥ / gāyatryai namaḥ / sāvitryai sarasvatyai namonamaḥ //
analyzed: bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar sva mantreṇa yutām dvādaśa nāmabhiḥ gāyatryai namaḥ sāvitryai sarasvatyai namaḥ namaḥ

original: vedamātre ca sāṃkṛtyai brahmāṇī kauśikī kramāt / sādhvyai sarvārthasādhinyai sahasrākṣyai ca bhūrbhuvaḥ //
analyzed: vedamātre ca brahmāṇī kauśikī kramāt sādhvyai sarva artha sādhinyai sahasrākṣyai ca bhūḥ bhuvaḥ

original: svarevaṃ juhuyā dagnau samidājyaṃ haviṣyakam / aṣṭottarasahasraṃ vāpyathavāṣṭaśanta ghṛtam //

original: mudrāyā darśanaṃ rudra mūlamantreṇa vā hara / tejorūpaṃ raktavarṇaṃ sitapadmopari sthitam / ekacakrarathārūḍhaṃ dvibāhuṃ dhṛtapaṅkajam //

analyzed: rāhum vāyavya deśe tu nandyāvarta nibhim hara aiśānyām dhūmra varṇam tu ketum sam paripūjayet

original: ebhirmantrairmahādeva tacchṛṇuṣva ca śaṅkara //
analyzed: ebhiḥ mantraiḥ mahādeva tat śṛṇuṣva ca śaṅkara

original: oṃ soṃ somāya namaḥ / oṃ buṃ budhāya namaḥ / oṃ bṛṃ bṛhaspataye namaḥ / oṃ bhaṃ bhārgavāya namaḥ / oṃ aṃ aṅgārakāya namaḥ / oṃ śaṃ śanaiścarāya namaḥ / oṃ raṃ rāhave namaḥ / oṃ kaṃ ketave nama iti //
analyzed: om soṃ somāya namaḥ om buṃ budhāya namaḥ om bṛṃ bṛhaspataye namaḥ om bhaṃ bhārgavāya namaḥ om aṃ aṅgārakāya namaḥ om śam śanaiścarāya namaḥ om raṃ rāhave namaḥ om kaṃ ketave namaḥ iti

original: pādyādīnmūlamantreṇa dattvā sūryāya śaṅkara / naivedyānte dhenumudrāṃ darśayetsādhakottamaḥ //
analyzed: pādya ādīn mūlamantreṇa dattvā sūryāya śaṅkara naivedya ante dhenu mudrām darśayet sādhaka uttamaḥ

original: japtvā cāṣṭasahasraṃ tu tacca tasmai samarpayet / aiśānyāṃ diśi bhūteśa tejaścaṇḍaṃ tu pūjayet //
analyzed: japtvā ca aṣṭa sahasram tu tat ca tasmai samarpayet aiśānyām diśi bhūteśa tejaḥ caṇḍam tu pūjayet

original: oṃ tejaścaṃṇḍāya huṃ phaṭ svadhā svāhā pauṣaṭ / nirmālyaṃ cārpayettasmai hyarghyaṃ dadyāttato hara //
analyzed: om tejaścaṃṇḍāya hum phaṭ svadhā svāhā pauṣaṭ nirmālyam ca arpayet tasmai hi arghyam dadyāt tatas hara

original: tilataṇḍulasaṃyuktaṃ raktacandanacarcitam / gandhodakena saṃmiśraṃ puṣpadhūpasamanvitam //
analyzed: tila taṇḍula saṃyuktam raktacandana carcitam gandha udakena saṃmiśram puṣpa dhūpa samanvitam

original: kṛtvā śirasi tatpātraṃ jānubhyāmavaniṃ gataḥ / darghyaṃ tu sūryāya tdṛnmantreṇa vṛṣadhvaja //
analyzed: kṛtvā śirasi tat pātram jānubhyām avanim gataḥ darghyam tu sūryāya vṛṣadhvaja

original: gaṇaṃ gurūnprapūjyātha sarvāndevānanprapūjayet / oṃ gaṃ gaṇapataye namaḥ / oṃ aṃ gurubhyo namaḥ //
analyzed: gaṇam gurūn prapūjya atha sarvān devān an prapūjayet  om gaṃ gaṇapataye namaḥ om aṃ gurubhyaḥ namaḥ

original: sūryasya kathitā pūjā kṛtvaitāṃ viṣṇulokabhāk //
analyzed: sūryasya kathitā pūjā kṛtvā etām viṣṇu loka bhāj

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryārcanaprakāro nāmaikonacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe sūryārcanaprakāraḥ nāma ekonacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 40
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śaṅkara uvāca / māheśvarīṃ ca me pūjāṃ vada śaṅkhagadādhara / yāṃ jñātvā mānavāḥ siddhiṃ gacchanti parameśvara //
analyzed: śaṅkaraḥ uvāca māheśvarīm ca me pūjām vada śaṅkha gadā dhara yām jñātvā mānavāḥ siddhim gacchanti parameśvara

original: hariruvāca / śṛṇu māheśvarīṃ pūjāṃ kathyamānāṃ vṛṣadhvaja / ādau snātvā tathācamya hyāsane copaviśya ca //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca śṛṇu māheśvarīm pūjām kathyamānām vṛṣadhvajaiḥ ādau snātvā tathā ācamya hi āsane ca upaviśya ca

original: nyāsaṃ kṛtvā maṇḍale vai pūjayacce maheśvaram / mantrairetairmaheśāna parivārayutaṃ haram //
analyzed: nyāsam kṛtvā maṇḍale vai maheśvaram  mantraiḥ etaiḥ mahā īśāna parivāra yutam haram

analyzed: om hāṃ śiva āsana devatāḥ āgacchata iti anena āvāhayet rudra devatāḥ āsanasya yāḥ

original: oṃ hāṃ gaṇapataye namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ nandine namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ mahākālāya namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ gaṅgāyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ lakṣmyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ mahākalāyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ astrāya nama iti //

analyzed: ete dvāre prapūjyāḥ vai snāna gandha ādibhiḥ haraiḥ om hāṃ brahmaṇe vāstu adhipataye namaḥ om hāṃ gurubhyaḥ namaḥ om hāṃ ādhāra śaktyai namaḥ om hāṃ anantāya namaḥ om hāṃ dharmāya namaḥ om hāṃ jñānāya namaḥ om hāṃ vairāgyāya namaḥ om hāṃ aiśvaryāya namaḥ om hāṃ adharmāya namaḥ om hāṃ ajñānāya namaḥ om hāṃ avairāgyāya namaḥ om hāṃ anaiśvaryāya namaḥ om hāṃ urdhva chandāya namaḥ om hāṃ adharmāya namaḥ

original: oṃ hāṃ siddhyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ ṛddhyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ vidyutāyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ lakṣmyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ bodhāyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ kālyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ svadhāyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ prabhāyai namaḥ //

analyzed: satyasya aṣṭau kalāḥ jñeyāḥ pūjyāḥ pūrva ādiṣu sthitāḥ

original: oṃ hāṃ vāmadevāya namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ rajase namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ rakṣāyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ ratyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ kanyāyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ kāmāyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ jananyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ kriyāyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ vṛddhyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ kāryāyai namaḥ / oṃ rā(dhā) tryai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ bhrāmaṇyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ mohinyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ kṣa(tva)

original: rāyai namaḥ / vāmadevakalā jñeyāstrayo daśa vṛṣadhvaja //
analyzed: rāyai namaḥ vāmadeva kalāḥ jñeyāḥ trayaḥ daśa vṛṣadhvaja

original: oṃ hāṃ tatpuruṣāya namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ nivṛttyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ pratiṣṭhāyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ vidyāyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ śāntyai namaḥ / jñeyāstatpuruṣasyaiva catasro vṛṣabhadhvaja //
analyzed: om hāṃ tatpuruṣāya namaḥ om hāṃ nivṛttyai namaḥ om hāṃ pratiṣṭhāyai namaḥ om hāṃ vidyāyai namaḥ om hāṃ śāntyai namaḥ jñeyāḥ tatpuruṣasya eva catasraḥ vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: oṃ hāṃ tṛṣṇāyai namaḥ / kalāṣaṭkaṃ hyakhorasya vijñeyaṃ bhairavaṃ hara //
analyzed: om hāṃ tṛṣṇāyai namaḥ kalā ṣaṭkam hi akhorasya vijñeyam bhairavam hara

original: oṃ hāṃ īśānāya namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ samityai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ aṅgadāyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ kṛṣṇāyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ marīcyai namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ jvālāyai namaḥ / īśānasya kalāḥ pañca jānīhi vṛṣabhadhvaja //
analyzed: om hāṃ īśānāya namaḥ om hāṃ samityai namaḥ om hāṃ aṅgadāyai namaḥ om hāṃ kṛṣṇāyai namaḥ om hāṃ marīcyai namaḥ om hāṃ jvālāyai namaḥ īśānasya kalāḥ pañca jānīhi vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: oṃ hāṃ śivaparivārebhyo namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ indrāya surādhipataye namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ agnaye tejo 'dhipataye namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ yamāya pretādhipataye namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ nirṛtaye rakṣo 'dhipataye namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ varuṇāya jalādhipataye namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ vāyave prāṇādhipataye namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ somāya netrādhipataye namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ īśānāya sarvavidyādhipataye namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ anantāya nāgādhipataye namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ brahmaṇe sarvalokādhipataye namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ dhūlicaṇḍeśvarāya namaḥ //
analyzed: om hāṃ śiva parivārebhyaḥ namaḥ om hāṃ indrāya sura adhipataye namaḥ om hāṃ agnaye tejaḥ dhipataye namaḥ om hāṃ yamāya preta adhipataye namaḥ om hāṃ nirṛtaye rakṣaḥ dhipataye namaḥ om hāṃ varuṇāya jala adhipataye namaḥ om hāṃ vāyave prāṇa adhipataye namaḥ om hāṃ somāya netra adhipataye namaḥ om hāṃ īśānāya sarva vidyā adhipataye namaḥ om hāṃ anantāya nāga adhipataye namaḥ om hāṃ brahmaṇe sarva loka adhipataye namaḥ om hā

original: āvāhanaṃ sthāpanaṃ sannidhānaṃ ca śaṅkara / sannirodhaṃ tathā kuryātsakalīkaraṇaṃ tathā //
analyzed: āvāhanam sthāpanam sannidhānam ca śaṅkara sannirodham tathā kuryāt sakalīkaraṇam tathā

original: tattvanyāsaṃ ca mudrāyā darśanaṃ dyānameva ca / pādyamācamanaṃ hyarghyaṃ puṣpāṇyabhyaṅgadānakam //
analyzed: tattva nyāsam ca mudrāyāḥ darśanam ca  pādyam ācamanam hi arghyam puṣpāṇi abhyaṅga dānakam

original: tata udvartanaṃ snānaṃ sugandhaṃ cānulepanam / vastrālaṃ kārabhogāṃśca hyaṅganyāsaṃ ca dhūpakam //
analyzed: tatas udvartanam snānam su gandham ca anulepanam vastra alam kāra bhogān ca hi aṅganyāsam ca dhūpakam

original: dīpaṃ naivedyadānaṃ ca hastodvartanameva ca / pādyārghyācamanaṃ gandhaṃ tāmbūlaṃ gītavādanam //
analyzed: dīpam naivedya dānam ca hasta udvartanam eva ca pādya arghya ācamanam gandham tāmbūlam gīta vādanam

original: nṛtyaṃ chatrā dikaraṇaṃ mudrāṇāṃ darśanaṃ tatā / rūpaṃ dhyānaṃ japañcātha ekavadbhāva eva ca //
analyzed: nṛtyam chatrāḥ ādi karaṇam mudrāṇām darśanam rūpam dhyānam japan ca atha eka vat bhāvaḥ eva ca

original: mūlamantreṇa vai kuryājjapapūjāsamarpaṇam / māheśī kathitā pūjā rudra pāpavināsinī //
analyzed: mūlamantreṇa vai kuryāt japa pūjā samarpaṇam māheśī kathitā pūjā rudra pāpa vināsinī

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe maheśvarapūjāvidhirnāma catvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe maheśvarapūjāvidhiḥ nāma catvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 41
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: vāsudeva uvāca / oṃ viśvāvasurnāma gandharvaḥ kanyānāmadhipatirlabhāmi te kanyāṃ samutpādya tasmai viśvavāsave svāhā / strīlābho mantrajāpyācca kālarātriṃ vadāmyaham //
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ uvāca om viśvāvasuḥ nāma gandharvaḥ kanyānām adhipatiḥ labhāmi te kanyām samutpādya tasmai viśva vāsave svāhā strī lābhaḥ mantra jāpyāt ca kālarātrim vadāmi aham

original: oṃ namo bhagavati ṛkṣakarṇi caturbhuje ūrdhvakeśi trinayane kālarātri mānuṣāṇāṃ vasārudhirabhojane
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavati ṛkṣa karṇi catur bhuje ūrdhva keśi tri nayane kālarātri mānuṣāṇām vasā rudhira bhojane

original: amukasya prāptakālasya mṛtyuprade huṃ phaṭ hanahana dahadaha māṃsarudhiraṃ pacapaca ṛkṣapatni svāhā / na tithirna ca nakṣatraṃ nopavāso vidhīyate //
analyzed: amukasya prāpta kālasya mṛtyu prade hum phaṭ hana hana daha daha māṃsa rudhiram paca paca ṛkṣa patni svāhā na tithiḥ na ca nakṣatram na upavāsaḥ vidhīyate

original: kruddho raktena saṃmārjya karau tābhyāṃ pragṛhya ca / pradoṣe saṃjapelliṅgamāmapātraṃ ca mārayet / oṃ namaḥ sarvatoyantrāṇyetadyathā jambhani mohani sarvaśatruvidāriṇi rakṣarakṣa māmamukaṃ sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ svāhā / śukre naṣṭe mahādeva vakṣye 'haṃ dvijapādiha //
analyzed: kruddhaḥ raktena saṃmārjya karau tābhyām pragṛhya ca pradoṣe saṃjapet liṅgam āma pātram ca mārayet om namaḥ sarvatas yantrāṇi etat yathā jambhani mohani sarva śatru vidāriṇi rakṣa rakṣa mām amukam sarva bhaya upadravebhyaḥ svāhā śukre naṣṭe mahādeva vakṣye haṃ dvi japāt iha  /

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaśyādisādhikamantranirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vaśyādisādhikamantranirūpaṇam nāma ekacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 42
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / pavitrāropaṇaṃ vakṣye sivasyāśivanāśanam / ācāryaḥ sādhakaḥ kuryātputrakaḥ samayī hara //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca pavitrāropaṇam vakṣye sivasya aśiva nāśanam  ācāryaḥ sādhakaḥ kuryāt putrakaḥ samayī hara

original: saṃvatsarakṛtāṃ pūjāṃ vighneśo harate 'nyathā / āṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe māghe kuryādbhādrapade 'pi vā //
analyzed: saṃvatsara kṛtām pūjām vighneśaḥ harate nyathā āṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe māghe kuryāt bhādrapade vā

original: sauvarṇaraupyatāmraṃ ca sūtraṃ kārpāsikaṃ kramāt / jñeyaṃ kujādau saṃgrāhyaṃ kanyayā kartitaṃ ca yat //
analyzed: sauvarṇa raupya tāmram ca sūtram kārpāsikam kramāt jñeyam kuja ādau saṃgrāhyam kanyayā kartitam ca yat

original: triguṇaṃ triguṇīkṛtya tataḥ kuryātpavitrakam / granthayo vāmadevena satyena kṣālayecchiva //
analyzed: triguṇam triguṇīkṛtya tatas kuryāt pavitrakam  granthayaḥ vāmadevena satyena kṣālayet śiva

original: aghoreṇa tu saṃśodhya baddhastatpuruṣādbhavet / dhūpayedīśamantreṇa tantudevā iti (me) smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: aghoreṇa tu saṃśodhya baddhaḥ tatpuruṣāt bhavet  dhūpayet īśamantreṇa tantudevāḥ iti me smṛtāḥ

original: oṃ kāraścandramā vahnirbrahnā nāgaḥ śikhidhvajaḥ / ravirviṣṇuḥ śivaḥ proktaḥ kramāttantuṣu devatāḥ //
analyzed: om kāraḥ candramāḥ vahniḥ brahnā nāgaḥ śikhidhvajaḥ raviḥ viṣṇuḥ śivaḥ proktaḥ kramāt tantuṣu devatāḥ

original: aṣṭottaraśataṃ kuryātpañcāśatpañcaviṃśatim / rudro 'ttamādi vijñeyaṃ mānaṃ ca granthayo daśa //
analyzed: aṣṭottaraśatam kuryāt pañcāśat pañcaviṃśatim  rudro ttama ādi vijñeyam mānam ca granthayaḥ daśa

original: caturaṅgulāntarāḥ syurgranthināmāni ca kramāt / prakṛtiḥ pauruṣī vīrā caturtho cāparājitā //
analyzed: catur aṅgula antarāḥ syuḥ granthi nāmāni ca kramāt prakṛtiḥ pauruṣī ca aparājitā

original: jayā ca vijayā rudrā ajitā ca sadāśivā / manonmanī sarvamukhī dvyaṅgulāṅgulato 'thavā //
analyzed: jayā ca vijayā rudrā ajitā ca sadāśivā manonmanī sarvamukhī

original: rañjayetkuṅkumādyaistu kuryādrandhaiḥ pavitrakam / saptamyāṃ vā trayodaśyāṃ śuklapakṣe tathetare //
analyzed: rañjayet kuṅkuma ādyaiḥ tu kuryāt randhaiḥ pavitrakam  saptamyām vā trayodaśyām śukla pakṣe tathā itare

original: kṣīrādibhiśca saṃsnāpya liṅgaṃ gandhādibhiryajet / dadyādrandhapavitraṃ tu ātmane brahmaṇe hara //
analyzed: kṣīra ādibhiḥ ca saṃsnāpya liṅgam gandha ādibhiḥ yajet dadyāt randha pavitram tu ātmane brahmaṇe hara

original: puṣpaṃ gandhayutaṃ dadyānmūleneśānagocare / pūrve ca daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ tu uttare cāmalakīphalam //
analyzed: puṣpam gandha yutam dadyāt mūlena īśāna gocare pūrve ca daṇḍa kāṣṭham tu uttare ca āmalakī phalam

original: mṛttikāṃ paścime dadyāddakṣiṇe bhasma bhūtayaḥ / nairṛtehyaguruṃ dadyācchikhāmantreṇa mantravit //
analyzed: mṛttikām paścime dadyāt dakṣiṇe bhasma bhūtayaḥ

original: vāyavyāṃ sarṣapaṃ dadyātkavacena vṛṣadhvaja / gṛhaṃ saṃveṣṭya sūtreṇa dadyādrandhapavitrakam //
analyzed: vāyavyām sarṣapam dadyāt kavacena vṛṣadhvaja gṛham saṃveṣṭya sūtreṇa dadyāt randha pavitrakam

original: homaṃ kṛtvā gneya dattvā dadyādbhūtabaliṃ tathā / āmantrito 'si deveśa gaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ maheśvara //
analyzed: homam kṛtvā dattvā dadyāt bhūta balim tathā āmantritaḥ si deveśa gaṇaiḥ sārdham maheśvara

original: prātastvāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi atra sannihito bhava / nimantryānena tiṣṭhettu kurvan gītādikaṃ niśi //
analyzed: prātar tvām pūjayiṣyāmi atra sannihitaḥ bhava nimantrya anena tiṣṭhet tu kurvan gīta ādikam niśi

original: mantritāni pavitrāṇi sthāpayeddevapārśvataḥ / snātvādityaṃ caturdaśyāṃ prāgrudraṃ ca prapūjayet //
analyzed: mantritāni pavitrāṇi sthāpayet deva pārśvataḥ snātvā ādityam caturdaśyām prāk rudram ca prapūjayet

original: lalāṭasthaṃ viśvarūpaṃ dhyātvātmānaṃ prapūjayet / astreṇa prokṣitānyevaṃ hṛdayenārcitānyatha //
analyzed: lalāṭa stham viśvarūpam dhyātvā ātmānam prapūjayet  astreṇa prokṣitāni evam hṛdayena arcitāni atha

original: saṃhitāmantritānyeva dhūpitāni samarpayet / śivatattvātmakaṃ cādau vidyātattvātmakaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: saṃhitā mantritāni eva dhūpitāni samarpayet śiva tattva ātmakam ca ādau vidyā tattva ātmakam tatas

original: ātmatattvātmakaṃ paścāddevakākhyaṃ tator'cayet / oṃ hauṃ hauṃ śivatattvāya namaḥ / oṃ hīṃ(hīḥ) vidyātattvāya namaḥ //
analyzed: ātma tattva ātmakam paścāt devaka ākhyam tatas ūrcayet om hauṃ hauṃ śivatattvāya namaḥ om hīṃhīḥ vidyā tattvāya namaḥ

original: oṃ hāṃ (hauḥ) ātmatattvāya namaḥ / oṃ hāṃ hīṃ hūṃ kṣaiṃ sarvatattvāya namaḥ / kālātmanā tvayā deva yaddṛṣṭaṃ māmake vidhau //
analyzed: om hāṃ hauḥ ātma tattvāya namaḥ om hāṃ hīṃ hūm kṣaiṃ sarva tattvāya namaḥ kāla ātmanā tvayā deva yat dṛṣṭam māmake vidhau

original: kṛtaṃ kliṣṭaṃ samutsṛṣṭaṃ hutaṃ gupta ca yatkṛtam / sarvātmanātmanā śambho pavitreṇa tvadicchayā //
analyzed: kṛtam kliṣṭam samutsṛṣṭam hutam gupta ca yat kṛtam sarva ātmanā ātmanā śambho pavitreṇa tvad icchayā

original: pūrayapūraya makhavrataṃ tanniyameśvarāya sarvatattvātmakāya sarvakāraṇapālitāya oṃ hāṃ hīṃ hūṃ haiṃ hauṃ śivāya namaḥ //
analyzed: pūraya pūraya makha vratam tat niyama īśvarāya sarva tattva ātmakāya sarva kāraṇa pālitāya om hāṃ hīṃ hūm haiṃ haum śivāya namaḥ

original: pūrvairanena yo dadyātpavitrāṇāṃ catuṣṭayam / dattvā vahneḥ (vare)
analyzed: pūrvaiḥ anena yaḥ dadyāt pavitrāṇām catuṣṭayam dattvā vahneḥ vare

original: pavitraṃ ca gurave dakṣiṇāṃ diśet //
analyzed: pavitram ca gurave dakṣiṇām diśet

original: baliṃ dattvā dvijān bhojya caṇḍaṃ prācyai visarjayet //
analyzed: balim dattvā dvijān bhojya caṇḍam prācyai visarjayet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śivapavitrāropaṇaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe śivapavitrāropaṇam nāma dvicatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 43
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / pavitrāropaṇaṃ vakṣye bhuktimuktipradaṃ hareḥ / purā devāsure yuddhe brahmādyāḥ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca pavitrāropaṇam vakṣye bhukti mukti pradam hareḥ  purā devāsure yuddhe brahma ādyāḥ śaraṇam yayuḥ

original: viṣṇuśca teṣāṃ devānāṃ dhvajaṃ graiveyakaṃ dadau / etau dṛṣṭvā vinaṅkṣyanti dānavānabravīddhariḥ //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ ca teṣām devānām dhvajam graiveyakam dadau  etau dṛṣṭvā vinaṅkṣyanti dānavān abravīt hariḥ

original: viṣṇūkte hyabravīnnāgo vāsukeranujastadā / vṛṇīta ca vapitrākhyaṃ varaṃ cedaṃ vṛṣadhvaja //
analyzed: viṣṇu ukte hi abravīt nāgaḥ vāsukeḥ anujaḥ tadā vṛṇīta ca vapitṛ ākhyam varam ca idam vṛṣadhvaja

original: graiveyaṃ haridattaṃ tu mannāmnā khyātimeṣyati / ityukte tena te devāstannāmnā tadvaraṃ viduḥ //
analyzed: graiveyam hari dattam tu mad nāmnā khyātim eṣyati iti ukte tena te devāḥ tad nāmnā tad varam viduḥ

original: prāvṛṭkāle tu ye martyā nārciṣyanti pavitrakaiḥ / teṣāṃ sāṃvatsarī pūjā viphalā ca bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: prāvṛṣ kāle tu ye martyāḥ na arciṣyanti pavitrakaiḥ teṣām sāṃvatsarī pūjā viphalā ca bhaviṣyati

original: tasmātsarveṣu deveṣu pavitrāropaṇaṃ kramāt / pratipatpaurṇamāsyāntā yasya yā tithirucyate //
analyzed: tasmāt sarveṣu deveṣu pavitra āropaṇam kramāt pratipad paurṇamāsyā antāḥ yasya yā tithiḥ ucyate

original: dvādaśyāṃ viṣṇave kāryaṃ śukle kṛṣṇe 'tha vā hara / vyatīpāte 'yane caiva candarasūryagrahe śiva //
analyzed: dvādaśyām viṣṇave kāryam śukle kṛṣṇe vā hara vyatīpāte yane ca eva candara sūrya grahe śiva

original: viṣṇave vṛddhikārye ca gurorāgamane tathā / nityaṃ pavitramuddiṣṭaṃ prāvṛṭkāle tvavaśyakam //
analyzed: viṣṇave vṛddhi kārye ca guroḥ āgamane tathā nityam pavitram uddiṣṭam prāvṛṣ kāle tu avaśyakam

original: kauśeyaṃ paṭṭasūtraṃ vā kārpāsaṃ kṣaumameva vā / kuśasūtra dvijānāṃ syādrājñā kauśeyapaṭṭakam //
analyzed: kauśeyam paṭṭa sūtram vā kārpāsam kṣaumam eva vā kuśa sūtra dvijānām syāt rājñā kauśeya paṭṭakam

original: vaiśyānāṃ cīraṇaṃ kṣaumaṃ śūdrāṇāṃ śaṇavalkajam / kārpāsaṃ padmajaṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ śastamīśvara //
analyzed: vaiśyānām cīraṇam kṣaumam śūdrāṇām śaṇa valka jam kārpāsam padma jam ca eva sarveṣām śastam īśvara

original: brāhmaṇyā kartitaṃ sūtraṃ triguṇaṃ triguṇīkṛtam / oṃ kāro 'tha śivaḥ somo hyagnirbrahyā phaṇī raviḥ //
analyzed: brāhmaṇyā kartitam sūtram triguṇam triguṇīkṛtam om śivaḥ somaḥ hi agniḥ brahyā phaṇī raviḥ

original: vighneśo viṣṇurityete sthitāstantuṣu devatāḥ / brahmā viṣṇuśca rudraśca trisūtre devatāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: vighneśaḥ viṣṇuḥ iti ete sthitāḥ tantuṣu devatāḥ brahmā viṣṇuḥ ca rudraḥ ca tri sūtre devatāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: sauvarṇe rājate tāmre vaiṇave mṛnmaye nyaset / aṅguṣṭhena catuḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ śreṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ tadardhataḥ //
analyzed: sauvarṇe rājate tāmre vaiṇave mṛd maye nyaset aṅguṣṭhena catuḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ śreṣṭham madhyam tad ardhataḥ

original: tadardhā tu kaniṣṭhā syātsūtramaṣṭottaraṃ śatam / uttamaṃ madhyamaṃ caiva kanyasaṃ pūrvavatkramāt //
analyzed: tad ardhā tu kaniṣṭhā syāt sūtram aṣṭa uttaram śatam uttamam madhyamam ca eva kanyasam pūrvavat kramāt

original: uttamoṃ'guṣṭhamānena madhyamo madhyamena tu / kanyase ca kaniṣṭhena aṅgulyā granthayaḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: uttama aṃguṣṭha mānena madhyamaḥ madhyamena tu kanyase ca kaniṣṭhena aṅgulyā granthayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: vimāne sthaṇḍile caiva etatsāmānyalakṣaṇam / śivoddhṛtaṃ pavitraṃ tu pratimāyāṃ ca kārayet //
analyzed: vimāne sthaṇḍile ca eva etat sāmānya lakṣaṇam  śiva uddhṛtam pavitram tu pratimāyām ca kārayet

original: hṛnnābhirū(ru)
analyzed: hṛd nābhiḥ ūru

original: rumāne ca jānubhyāmavalambinī / aṣṭottarasahasreṇa catvāro granthayaḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: rumāne ca jānubhyām avalambinī  aṣṭottarasahasreṇa catvāraḥ granthayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: ṣaṭtriṃ(ḍviṃ)
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃś viṃ

original: śacca caturviśaddvādaśa granthayo 'thavā / uttamādiṣu vijñeyāḥ parvabhirvā pavitrakam //
analyzed: caturviśat dvādaśa granthayaḥ uttama ādiṣu vijñeyāḥ parvabhiḥ vā pavitrakam

original: carcitaṃ kuṅkumenaiva haridrācandanena vā / sopavāsaḥ pavitrantu pātrasthamadhivāsayet //
analyzed: carcitam kuṅkumena eva haridrā candanena vā sa upavāsaḥ pavitram tu pātra stham adhivāsayet

original: aśvatthapatrapuṭake aṣṭadikṣu niveśitam / daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ kuśāgraṃ ca pūrve saṅkarṣaṇena tu //
analyzed: aśvattha patra puṭake aṣṭa dikṣu niveśitam daṇḍa kāṣṭham kuśa agram ca pūrve saṅkarṣaṇena tu

original: rocanākuṅkumenava pradyumnena tu dakṣiṇe / yuddhārtho phalasiddhyarthamaniruddhena paścime //
analyzed: pradyumnena tu dakṣiṇe

original: candanaṃ nīlayuktaṃ ca tilabhasmākṣataṃ tathā / āgneyādiṣu koṇeṣur śyādīnāṃ tu kramānnyaset //
analyzed: candanam nīla yuktam ca tila bhasma akṣatam tathā āgneya ādiṣu koṇa iṣuḥ śyā ādīnām tu kramāt nyaset

original: pavitraṃ vāsudevena abhimantrya sakṛtsakṛt / dṛṣṭvā punaḥ prapūjyātha vastreṇācchādya yatnataḥ //
analyzed: pavitram vāsudevena abhimantrya sakṛt sakṛt dṛṣṭvā punar prapūjya atha vastreṇa ācchādya yatnataḥ

original: devasya purataḥ sthāpyaṃ pratimāmaṇḍalasya vā / paścime dakṣiṇe caiva uttare pūrvavatkramāt //
analyzed: devasya puratas sthāpyam pratimā maṇḍalasya vā paścime dakṣiṇe ca eva uttare pūrvavat kramāt

original: brāhmādīṃścāpi saṃsthāpya kalaśaṃ cāpi pūjayet / astreṇa maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā naivedyañca samarpayet //
analyzed: brāhma ādīn ca api saṃsthāpya kalaśam ca api pūjayet astreṇa maṇḍalam kṛtvā naivedyam ca samarpayet

original: adhivāsya pavitraṃ tu trisūtreṇa navena vā (ca) / vedikāṃ veṣṭayitvā tu ātmānaṃma kalaśaṃ ghṛtam //
analyzed: adhivāsya pavitram tu tri sūtreṇa navena vā ca vedikām veṣṭayitvā tu kalaśam ghṛtam

original: agnikuṇḍaṃ vimānaṃ ca maṇḍapaṃ gṛhameva ca / sūtramekaṃ tu saṃgṛhya dadyāddevasya mṛrdhāni //
analyzed: agni kuṇḍam vimānam ca maṇḍapam gṛham eva ca sūtram ekam tu saṃgṛhya dadyāt devasya

original: dattvā paṭhedimaṃ mantraṃ pūjayitvā maheśvaram / āvāhito 'si deveśa pūjārthaṃ parameśvara //
analyzed: dattvā paṭhet imam mantram pūjayitvā maheśvaram  āvāhitaḥ si deveśa pūjā artham parameśvara

original: tatprabhāter'cayiṣyāmi sāmagyāḥ sannidhau bhava / ekarātraṃ trirātraṃ vā adhivāsya pavitrakam //
analyzed: tat prabhātā īrcayiṣyāmi sāmagyāḥ sannidhau bhava eka rātram tri rātram vā adhivāsya pavitrakam

original: rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā prātaḥ saṃpūjya keśavam / āropayetkrameṇaiva jyeṣṭhamadhyakanīyasam //
analyzed: rātrau jāgaraṇam kṛtvā prātar saṃpūjya keśavam  āropayet krameṇa eva jyeṣṭha madhya kanīyasam

original: dhūpayitvā pavitraṃ tu mantreṇaivābhimantrayet / prajaptagranthikaṃ caiva pūjayetkusumādibhiḥ //
analyzed: dhūpayitvā pavitram tu mantreṇa eva abhimantrayet  prajapta granthikam ca eva pūjayet kusuma ādibhiḥ

original: gāyattryā cārcitaṃ tena devaṃ saṃpūjya dāpayet / samaṃ putrakalatrādyaiḥ sūtrapucchaṃ tu dhārayet //
analyzed: gāyattryā ca arcitam tena devam saṃpūjya dāpayet samam putra kalatra ādyaiḥ sūtra puccham tu dhārayet

original: viśuddhagranthikaṃ ramyaṃ mahāpātakanāśanam / sarvapāpakṣayaṃ deva tavāgre dhārayāmyaham //
analyzed: viśuddha granthikam ramyam mahāpātaka nāśanam sarva pāpa kṣayam deva tava agre dhārayāmi aham

original: evaṃ dhūpādinābhyarcya madhyamādīntsamarpayet / pavitraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ sarvapātakanāśanam //
analyzed: evam dhūpa ādinā abhyarcya madhyama ādīn samarpayet pavitram vaiṣṇavam tejaḥ sarva pātaka nāśanam

original: dharmakāmārthasiddhyarthaṃ svakaṇṭhe dhārayāmyaham / vanamālāṃ samabhyarcya svena mantreṇa dāpayet //
analyzed: dharma kāma artha siddhi artham sva kaṇṭhe dhārayāmi aham vanamālām samabhyarcya svena mantreṇa dāpayet

original: naivedyaṃ vividhaṃ dattvā kusumāderbaliṃ haret / agniṃ saṃtarpya tatrāpi dvādaśāṅgulamānataḥ //
analyzed: naivedyam vividham dattvā kusuma ādeḥ balim haret  agnim saṃtarpya tatra api dvādaśa aṅgula mānataḥ

original: aṣṭottaraśatenaiva dadyādekapavitrakam / ādau dattvārghyamāditye tatra caikaṃ pavitrakam //
analyzed: aṣṭottaraśatena eva dadyāt eka pavitrakam  ādau dattvā arghyam āditye tatra ca ekam pavitrakam

original: viṣvaksenaṃ tataḥ prārcya surumarghyādibhirhara / devasyāgre paṭhenmantraṃ kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ sthitaḥ //
analyzed: viṣvaksenam tatas prārcya surum arghya ādibhiḥ hara devasya agre paṭhet mantram kṛtāñjali puṭaḥ sthitaḥ

original: jñānato 'jñānato vāpi pūjanādi kṛtaṃ mayā / tatsarvaṃ pūrṇamevāstu tvatprasādātsureśvara //
analyzed: jñānataḥ jñānataḥ vā api pūjana ādi kṛtam mayā tat sarvam pūrṇam eva astu tvad prasādāt sureśvara

original: maṇividrumamālabhirmandārakusumādibhiḥ / iyaṃ sāṃvatsarī pūjā tavāstu garuḍadhvaja //
analyzed: maṇi vidruma mālabhiḥ mandāra kusuma ādibhiḥ iyam sāṃvatsarī pūjā tava astu garuḍadhvaja

original: vanamālā yathā deva kaustubhaṃ satataṃ hṛdi / tadvatpavitraṃ tantūnāṃ mālāṃ tvaṃ hṛdaye dhara //
analyzed: vanamālā yathā deva kaustubham satatam hṛdi tadvat pavitram tantūnām mālām tvam hṛdaye dhara

original: evaṃ prārthya dvijān bhojya dattvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām / visarjayettu tenaiva sāyāhne tvapare 'hani //
analyzed: evam prārthya dvijān bhojya dattvā tebhyaḥ ca dakṣiṇām visarjayet tu tena eva sāyāhne tu apare hani

original: sāṃvatsarīmimāṃ pūjāṃ sampādya vidhivanmayā / vrajeḥ pavitrakedānīṃ viṣṇulekaṃ visarjitaḥ //
analyzed: sāṃvatsarīm imām pūjām sampādya vidhivat mayā vrajeḥ pavitraka idānīm viṣṇu lekam visarjitaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupavitrāropaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣṇupavitrāropaṇam nāma tricatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 44
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / pūjayitvā pavitrādyairbrahma dhyātvā harirbhavet / brahmadhyānaṃ pravakṣyāmi māyāyantrapramardakam //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca pūjayitvā pavitra ādyaiḥ brahma dhyātvā hariḥ bhavet  brahma dhyānam pravakṣyāmi māyā yantra pramardakam

original: yacchedvāṅmanasaṃ prājñastaṃ yajejjñānamātmani / jñānaṃ mahati saṃyacchedya icchejjñānamātmāni //
analyzed: yacchet vāc manasam prājñaḥ tam yajet jñānam ātmani jñānam mahati saṃyacchet yaḥ icchet jñānam ātmāni

original: dehendriyamanobuddhiprāṇāhaṅkarāvarjitam / varjitaṃ bhūtatanmātrairguṇajanmāśanādibhiḥ //
analyzed: deha indriya manaḥ buddhi prāṇa ahaṅkara āvarjitam varjitam bhūta tanmātraiḥ guṇa janma aśana ādibhiḥ

original: svaprakāśaṃ nirākāraṃ sadānaṃ damanādi yat / nityaṃ śuddhaṃ buddhamṛddhaṃ satyamānandamadvayam //
analyzed: sva prakāśam nirākāram sa dānam damana ādi yat  nityam śuddham buddham ṛddham satyam ānandam advayam

original: turīyamakṣaraṃ brahma ahamasmi paraṃ padam / ahaṃ brahmetyavasthānaṃ samādhirapi (riti) gīyate //

original: ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ rathameva tu / buddhiṃ ca sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragrahameva ca / indriyāṇi hayānāhurviṣayāsteṣu gocarāḥ //
analyzed: ātmānam rathinam viddhi śarīram ratham eva tu  buddhim ca sārathim viddhi manaḥ pragraham eva ca  indriyāṇi hayān āhuḥ viṣayāḥ teṣu gocarāḥ

original: ātmendriyamanoyukto bhoktetyārmanīṣiṇaḥ / yastu vijñāna bāhmena yuktena manasā sadā //

analyzed: manaḥ dhṛtiḥ dhāraṇā sthāt samādhiḥ brahmaṇi sthitiḥ pūrvam cetaḥ sthiram na syāt tatas mūrtim vicintayet

original: gṛhāntarāṇi sarvāṇi sajalaiḥ kadalīgṛhaiḥ / pañcavarṇaiśca kusumaiḥ śobhitāni prakalpayet //
analyzed: gṛha antarāṇi sarvāṇi sa jalaiḥ kadalī gṛhaiḥ pañca varṇaiḥ ca kusumaiḥ śobhitāni prakalpayet

original: prākāraṃ tadvahirdadyātpañcahastapramāṇataḥ / evaṃ viṣṇvāśramaṃ kuryādvanaiścopavanairyutam //
analyzed: prākāram tad vahis dadyāt pañca hasta pramāṇataḥ  evam viṣṇu āśramam kuryāt vanaiḥ ca upavanaiḥ yutam

original: catuḥ ṣaṣṭipado vāstuḥ prāsādādau prapūjitaḥ / madhye catuṣpado brahmā dvipa dāstvaryamādayaḥ //
analyzed: catuḥ ṣaṣṭi padaḥ vāstuḥ prāsāda ādau prapūjitaḥ madhye catuṣpadaḥ brahmā dvipa dāstu aryama ādayaḥ

original: karṇe caivātha śikhyādyāstathā devāḥ prakīrtitāḥ / tebhyo hyubhayataḥ sārdhādanye 'pi dvipadāḥ surāḥ //
analyzed: karṇe ca eva atha śikhi ādyāḥ tathā devāḥ prakīrtitāḥ tebhyaḥ hi ubhayatas sārdhāt anye dvipadāḥ surāḥ

original: catuḥ ṣaṣṭipadā devā ityevaṃ parikīrtitāḥ / carakī ca vidārī ca pūtanā pāparākṣasī //
analyzed: catuḥ ṣaṣṭi padāḥ devāḥ iti evam parikīrtitāḥ carakī ca vidārī ca pūtanā pāpa rākṣasī

original: īśānādyāstato bāhye devādyā hetukādayaḥ / haitukastripurāntaśca agnivetālakau yamaḥ //
analyzed: īśāna ādyāḥ tatas bāhye deva ādyāḥ hetuka ādayaḥ haitukaḥ tripura antar ca agni vetālakau yamaḥ

original: agnijihvaḥ kālakaśca karālo hyakapādakaḥ / aiśānyāṃ bhīmarūpastu pātāle pretanāyakaḥ //
analyzed: agni jihvaḥ kālakaḥ ca karālaḥ aiśānyām bhīma rūpaḥ tu pātāle preta nāyakaḥ

original: ākāśe gandhamālī syātkṣetrapālāṃstato yajet / vistārābhihataṃ dairghyaṃ rāśiṃ vāstostu kārayet //
analyzed: ākāśe gandhamālī syāt kṣetrapālān tatas yajet vistāra abhihatam dairghyam rāśim vāstoḥ tu kārayet

original: kṛtvā ca vasubhirbhāgaṃ śeṣaṃ baddhā yamādiśet / punarguṇitamaṣṭābhirṛbhāgaṃ tu bhājayet //
analyzed: kṛtvā ca vasubhiḥ bhāgam śeṣam baddhā yam ādiśet punar guṇitam aṣṭābhiḥ ṛ bhāgam tu bhājayet

original: yaccheṣaṃ tadbhavedṛkṣaṃ bhāgairhṛtvāvyayaṃ bhavet / ṛkṣaṃ caturguṇaṃ kṛtvā navabhirbhāgahāritam //
analyzed: yat śeṣam tat bhavet ṛkṣam bhāgaiḥ hṛtvā avyayam bhavet ṛkṣam caturguṇam kṛtvā navabhiḥ bhāga hāritam

original: śeṣamaṃśaṃ vijānīyāddevalasya mataṃ yathā / aṣṭābhirguṇitaṃ piṇḍaṃ ṣaṣṭibhirbhāgāharitam //
analyzed: śeṣam aṃśam vijānīyāt devalasya matam yathā aṣṭābhiḥ guṇitam piṇḍam ṣaṣṭibhiḥ bhāgāharitam

original: yaccheṣaṃ tadbhavejjīvaṃ maraṇaṃ bhatahāritam / vāstukroḍe gṛhaṃ kuryānna pṛṣṭhe mānavaḥ sadā //
analyzed: yat śeṣam tat bhavet jīvam maraṇam vāstu kroḍe gṛham kuryāt na pṛṣṭhe mānavaḥ sadā

original: vāmapārśvena svāpiti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / siṃhakanyātulāyāṃ ca dvāraṃ śudhyedathottaram //
analyzed: vāma pārśvena na atra kāryā vicāraṇā siṃha kanyā tulāyām ca dvāram śudhyet atha uttaram

original: evaṃ ca vṛścikādau syātpūrvadakṣiṇapaścimam / dvāraṃ dīrghārdhavistāraṃ dvārāṇyaṣṭau smṛtāni ca //
analyzed: evam ca vṛścika ādau syāt pūrva dakṣiṇa paścimam  dvāram dīrgha ardha vistāram dvārāṇi aṣṭau smṛtāni ca

original: santānapreṣyanīcatvaṃ svayānaṃ svarṇabhūṣaṇam / sutahīnaṃ tu raudreṇa vīryaghnaṃ dakṣiṇe tathā //
analyzed: santāna preṣya nīca tvam sva yānam svarṇa bhūṣaṇam suta hīnam tu raudreṇa vīrya ghnam dakṣiṇe tathā

original: vahnau badhaścāyurvṛddhiṃputtralābhasutṛptidaḥ / dhanade nṛpapīḍādamarthaghnaṃ rogadaṃ jale //
analyzed: vahnau badhaḥ ca āyuḥ vṛddhim puttra lābha su tṛpti daḥ dhanade nṛpa pīḍā dam artha ghnam roga dam jale

original: nṛpabhī tirmṛtāpatyaṃ hyanapatyaṃ na vairadam / arthadaṃ cārthahānyai ca doṣadaṃ putramṛtyudam //
analyzed: nṛpa bhī hi anapatyam na vaira dam artha dam ca artha hānyai ca doṣa dam putra mṛtyu dam

original: dvārāṇyuttarasaṃjñāni pūrvadvārāṇi vacmyaham / agnibhītirbahu kanyādhanasaṃmānakopadam //
analyzed: dvārāṇi uttara saṃjñāni pūrva dvārāṇi vacmi aham agni bhītiḥ bahu kanyā dhana saṃmāna kopa dam

original: rājaghnaṃ kopadaṃ pūrve phalato dvāramīritam / īśānādau bhavetpūrvamagneyyādau tu dakṣiṇam //
analyzed: rāja ghnam kopa dam pūrve phalataḥ dvāram īritam īśāna ādau bhavet pūrvam agneyī ādau tu dakṣiṇam

original: nairṛtyādau paścimaṃ syādvāyavyādau tu cottaram / aṣṭabhāge kṛte bhāge dvārāṇāṃ ca phalāphalam //
analyzed: nairṛtya ādau paścimam syāt vāyavī ādau tu ca uttaram aṣṭa bhāge kṛte bhāge dvārāṇām ca phala aphalam

original: aśvatthaplakṣanyagrodhāḥ pūrvādau syādudumbaraḥ / gṛhasya śobhanaḥ prokta īśāne caiva sālmaliḥ / pūjito vignahārī syātprāsādasya gṛhasya ca //
analyzed: aśvattha plakṣa nyagrodhāḥ pūrva ādau syāt udumbaraḥ gṛhasya śobhanaḥ proktaḥ īśāne ca eva sālmaliḥ pūjitaḥ vigna hārī syāt prāsādasya gṛhasya ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vāstumānalakṣaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vāstumānalakṣaṇam nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 47
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / prāsādānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca vakṣye śaunaka tacchṛṇu / catuḥ ṣaṣṭipadaṃ kṛtvā digvidikṣūpalakṣitam //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca prāsādānām lakṣaṇam ca vakṣye śaunaka tat śṛṇu catuḥ ṣaṣṭi padam kṛtvā diś vidikṣu upalakṣitam

original: catuṣkoṇaṃ caturbhiśca dvārāṇi sūryasaṃkhyayā / catvāriṃśāṣṭabiścaiva bhittīnāṃ kalpanā bhavet //
analyzed: catuṣkoṇam caturbhiḥ ca dvārāṇi sūrya saṃkhyayā bhittīnām kalpanā bhavet

original: ūrdhvakṣetrasamā jaṅghā jaṅghārdhadviguṇaṃ bhavet / garbhavistāravistīrṇaḥ śukāṅghriśca vidhīyate //
analyzed: ūrdhva kṣetra samā jaṅghā jaṅghā ardha dviguṇam bhavet garbha vistāra vistīrṇaḥ śuka aṅghriḥ ca vidhīyate

original: tattribhāgena kartavyaḥ pañcabhāgena vā punaḥ / nirgamastu śukāṅghreśca ucchrāyaḥ śikharārdhagaḥ //
analyzed: tad tri bhāgena kartavyaḥ pañca bhāgena vā punar nirgamaḥ tu śuka aṅghreḥ ca ucchrāyaḥ śikhara ardha gaḥ

original: caturdhā śikharaṃ kṛtvā tribhāge vedibandhanam / caturthe punarasyaiva kaṇṭhamāmūlasādhanam //
analyzed: caturdhā śikharam kṛtvā tri bhāge vedi bandhanam caturthe punar asya eva kaṇṭham ā mūla sādhanam

original: atha vāpi samaṃ vāstuṃ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśabhāgikam / tasya madhye caturbhāgamādau garbhaṃ tu kārayet //
analyzed: atha vā api samam vāstum kṛtvā ṣoḍaśa bhāgikam tasya madhye catur bhāgam ādau garbham tu kārayet

original: caturbhāgena bhittīnāmucchrāyaḥ syātpramāṇataḥ //
analyzed: catur bhāgena bhittīnām ucchrāyaḥ syāt pramāṇataḥ

original: dviguṇaḥ śikharocchrāyo bhittyucchāyācca mānataḥ / śikharārdhasya cairdhena vidheyāstu pradakṣiṇāḥ //
analyzed: dviguṇaḥ śikhara ucchrāyaḥ bhitti ucchāyāt ca mānataḥ śikhara ardhasya vidheyāḥ tu pradakṣiṇāḥ

original: caturdikṣu tathā jñeyo nirgamastuḥ tathā budhaiḥ / pañcabhāgena saṃbhajya garbhamānaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: catur dikṣu tathā jñeyaḥ tathā budhaiḥ pañca bhāgena saṃbhajya garbha mānam vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: bhāgamekaṃ gṛhītvā tu nirgamaṃ klapayetpunaḥ / garbhasūtrasamo bhāgādagrato mukhamaṇḍapaḥ //
analyzed: bhāgam ekam gṛhītvā tu nirgamam klapayet punar garbha sūtra samaḥ bhāgāt agratas mukhamaṇḍapaḥ

original: etatsāmānyamuddiṣṭaṃ prāsādasya hi lakṣaṇam / liṅgamānamatho vakṣye pīṭho liṅgasamo bhavet //
analyzed: etat sāmānyam uddiṣṭam prāsādasya hi lakṣaṇam liṅga mānam atho vakṣye pīṭhaḥ liṅga samaḥ bhavet

original: dviguṇena bhavedrarbhaḥ samantācchaunaka dhruvam / taddvidhā ca bhavedbhītirjaṅghā tadvistarārdhagā //
analyzed: dviguṇena bhavet rarbhaḥ samantāt śaunaka dhruvam tat dvidhā ca bhavet bhītiḥ jaṅghā tad vistara ardha gā

original: dviguṇaṃ śikharaṃ proktaṃ jaṅghāyāścaiva śaunaka / pīṭhagarbhāvaraṃ karma tanmānena śukāṅghrikam //
analyzed: dviguṇam śikharam proktam jaṅghāyāḥ ca eva śaunaka pīṭha garbha avaram karma tad mānena śuka aṅghrikam

original: nir gamastu samākhyātaḥ śeṣaṃ pūrvavadeva tu / liṅgamānaṃ smṛtaṃ hyetaddvāramānamathocyate //
analyzed: niḥ gamaḥ tu samākhyātaḥ śeṣam pūrva vat eva tu liṅga mānam smṛtam hi etat dvāra mānam atha ucyate

original: karāgraṃ vedavatkṛtvā dvāraṃ bhāgāṣṭamaṃ bhavet / vistareṇa samākhyātaṃ dviguṇaṃsvecchayā bhavet //
analyzed: kara agram veda vat kṛtvā dvāram bhāga aṣṭamam bhavet vistareṇa samākhyātam dviguṇam sva icchayā bhavet

original: dvāravatpīṭhamadhye tu śeṣaṃ suṣirakaṃ bhavet / pādikaṃ śeṣikaṃ bhittirdvārārdhena parigrahāt //
analyzed: dvāra vat pīṭha madhye tu śeṣam suṣirakam bhavet pādikam śeṣikam bhittiḥ dvāra ardhena parigrahāt

original: tadvistārasamā jaṅghā sikharaṃ dviguṇaṃ bhavet / śukāṅghriḥ pūrvavajjñeyā nirgamocchrāyakaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: tad vistāra samā jaṅghā sikharam dviguṇam bhavet śuka aṅghriḥ pūrva vat jñeyā nirgama ucchrāyakam bhavet

original: maṇḍape mānametattu svarūpaṃ cāparaṃ vade / traivedaṃ kārayetkṣetraṃ yatra tiṣṭhanti devatāḥ //
analyzed: maṇḍape mānam etat tu svarūpam ca aparam vade kārayet kṣetram yatra tiṣṭhanti devatāḥ

original: itthaṃ kṛtena mānena bāhyabhāgavinirgatam / nemiḥ pādena vistīrṇā prāsādasya samantataḥ //
analyzed: ittham kṛtena mānena bāhya bhāga vinirgatam nemiḥ pādena vistīrṇā prāsādasya samantataḥ

original: garbhaṃ tu dviguṇaṃ kuryānnemyā mānaṃ bhavediha / sa eva bhitterutsedho śikharo dviguṇo mataḥ //
analyzed: garbham tu dviguṇam kuryāt nemyāḥ mānam bhavet iha saḥ eva bhitteḥ utsedhaḥ śikharaḥ dviguṇaḥ mataḥ

original: prāsādānāṃ ca vakṣyāmi mānaṃ yoniṃ ca mānataḥ / vairājaḥ puṣpakākhyaśca kailāso mālikāhvayaḥ //
analyzed: prāsādānām ca vakṣyāmi mānam yonim ca mānataḥ vairājaḥ puṣpaka ākhyaḥ ca kailāsaḥ mālikā āhvayaḥ

original: triviṣṭapaṃ ca pañcaite prāsādāḥ sarvayonayaḥ / prathamaścaturaśro hi dvitīyastu tadāyataḥ //
analyzed: triviṣṭapam ca pañca ete prāsādāḥ sarva yonayaḥ prathamaḥ caturaśraḥ hi dvitīyaḥ tu tad āyataḥ

original: vṛtto vṛttāyataścānyo 'ṣṭāśraśceha ca pañcamaḥ / etebhya eva sambhūtāḥ prāsādāḥ sumanoharāḥ //
analyzed: vṛttaḥ vṛttāyataḥ ca anyaḥ ṣṭāśraḥ ca iha ca pañcamaḥ etebhyaḥ eva sambhūtāḥ prāsādāḥ su manoharāḥ

original: sarvaprakṛtibhūtebhyaścatvāriṃśattathaiva ca / meruśca mandaraścaiva vimānaśca tathāparaḥ //
analyzed: sarva prakṛti bhūtebhyaḥ catvāriṃśat tathā eva ca meruḥ ca mandaraḥ ca eva vimānaḥ ca tathā aparaḥ

original: bhadrakaḥ sarvatā bhadro rucako nandanastathā / nandivardhanasaṃjñaśca śrīvatsaśca navetyamī //
analyzed: bhadrakaḥ sarvatā bhadraḥ rucakaḥ nandanaḥ tathā nandivardhana saṃjñaḥ ca śrīvatsaḥ ca navā iti amī

original: caturaśrāḥ samudbhūtā vairājāditi gamyatām / valabhī gṛharājaśca śā lāgṛhaṃ ca mandiram //
analyzed: caturaśrāḥ samudbhūtāḥ vairājāt iti gamyatām valabhī gṛha rājaḥ ca śā lāgṛham ca mandiram

original: vimānaṃ ca tathā brahmamandiraṃ bhavanaṃ tathā / uttambhaṃ śibikā veśma navaite puṣpakodbhavāḥ //
analyzed: vimānam ca tathā brahma mandiram bhavanam tathā uttambham śibikā veśma navā ete puṣpaka udbhavāḥ

original: valayo dundubhiḥ padmo mahāpadmastathāparaḥ / mukulī cāsya uṣṇīṣī śaṅkhaśca kalaśastathā //
analyzed: valayaḥ dundubhiḥ padmaḥ mahāpadmaḥ tathā aparaḥ mukulī ca asya uṣṇīṣī śaṅkhaḥ ca kalaśaḥ tathā

original: guvāvṛkṣastathānyaśca vṛttāḥ kailāsasambhavāḥ / gajo 'tha vṛṣabho haṃso garuḍaḥ siṃhanāmakaḥ //
