analyzed: guvāvṛkṣaḥ tathā anyaḥ ca vṛttāḥ kailāsa sambhavāḥ vṛṣabhaḥ haṃsaḥ garuḍaḥ siṃha nāmakaḥ

original: bhūmukho bhūdharaścaiva śrījayaḥ pṛthivīdharaḥ / vṛttāyatāḥ samudbhūtā navaite maṇikāhvayāt //
analyzed: bhūmukhaḥ bhūdharaḥ ca eva śrījayaḥ pṛthivīdharaḥ vṛtta āyatāḥ samudbhūtāḥ navā ete maṇika āhvayāt

original: vajraṃ cakraṃ tathānyacca muṣṭikaṃ vabhrusaṃjñitam / vakraḥ svastikakhaḍgau ca gadā śrīvṛkṣa eva ca //
analyzed: vajram cakram tathā anyat ca muṣṭikam vabhru saṃjñitam vakraḥ svastika khaḍgau ca gadā śrīvṛkṣaḥ eva ca

original: vijayo nāmataḥ śvetastriviṣṭipasamudbhavāḥ / trikoṇaṃ padmamardhenduścatuṣkoṇaṃ dviraṣṭakam //
analyzed: vijayaḥ nāmataḥ śvetaḥ triviṣṭipa samudbhavāḥ trikoṇam padmam ardhenduḥ catuṣkoṇam dvis aṣṭakam

original: yatra tatra vidhātavyaṃ saṃsthānaṃ maṇḍapasya tu / rājyaṃ ca vibhavaścaivaḥ hyāyurvardvanameva ca //
analyzed: yatra tatra vidhātavyam saṃsthānam maṇḍapasya tu rājyam ca vibhavaḥ ca eva hi āyuḥ vardvanam eva ca

original: putralābhaḥ striyaḥ puṣṭistrikoṇādikramādbhavet / kuryāddhajādikaṃ khyātadvāri garbhagṛhaṃ tathā //
analyzed: putra lābhaḥ striyaḥ puṣṭiḥ trikoṇa ādi kramāt bhavet khyāta dvāri garbhagṛham tathā

original: maṇāḍapaḥ samasaṃkhyābhirguṇitaḥ sūtrakastathā / maṇḍapasya caturthāṃśādbhadraḥ kāryo vijānatā //
analyzed: maṇāḍapaḥ sama saṃkhyābhiḥ guṇitaḥ sūtrakaḥ tathā maṇḍapasya caturtha aṃśāt bhadraḥ kāryaḥ vijānatā

original: spardhāgavākṣakopeto nirgavākṣo 'tha vā bhavet / sārdhabhittipramāṇena bhitimānena vā punaḥ //
analyzed: vā bhavet sārdha bhitti pramāṇena bhiti mānena vā punar

original: bhitterdvaiguṇyato vāpi kartavyā maṇḍapāḥ kracit / prāsāde mañcarī kāryā citrā viṣamabhūmikā //
analyzed: bhitteḥ dvaiguṇyataḥ vā api kartavyāḥ maṇḍapāḥ kracid prāsāde mañcarī kāryā citrā viṣama bhūmikā

original: parimāṇavirodhena rekhāvaiṣamyabhūṣitā / ādhārastu caturdhāraścaturmaṇḍapaśobhitaḥ //
analyzed: parimāṇa virodhena rekhā vaiṣamya bhūṣitā ādhāraḥ tu catur dhāraḥ catur maṇḍapa śobhitaḥ

original: śataśṛṅgasamāyukto meruḥ prāsāda uttamaḥ / maṇḍapāstasya kartavyā bhadraistribhiralaṅkṛtāḥ //
analyzed: śata śṛṅga samāyuktaḥ meruḥ prāsādaḥ uttamaḥ maṇḍapāḥ tasya kartavyāḥ bhadraiḥ tribhiḥ alaṅkṛtāḥ

original: ghacanākāramānānāṃ bhinnābhinnā bhavanti te / kiyanto yeṣu cādhārā nirādhārāśca kecana //
analyzed: gha cana ākāra mānānām bhinna abhinnāḥ bhavanti te kiyantaḥ yeṣu ca ādhārāḥ nirādhārāḥ ca kecana

original: praticchandakabhedena prāsādāḥ sambhavanti te / anyonyāsaṃkarāsteṣāṃ ghaṭanānāmabhedataḥ //
analyzed: praticchandaka bhedena prāsādāḥ sambhavanti te anyonya asaṃkarāḥ teṣām ghaṭanānām abhedataḥ

original: devatānāṃ viśeṣāya prāsādā bahavaḥ smṛtāḥ / prāsāde niyamo nāsti devatānāṃ svayambhuvām //
analyzed: devatānām viśeṣāya prāsādāḥ bahavaḥ smṛtāḥ prāsāde niyamaḥ na asti devatānām svayambhuvām

original: tāneva devatānāṃ ca pūrvamānena kārayet / caturaśrāyatāstattra catuṣkoṇasamanvitāḥ //
analyzed: tān eva devatānām ca pūrva mānena kārayet caturaśra āyatāḥ tattra catuṣkoṇa samanvitāḥ

original: candraśālānvitā kāryā bherīśikharasaṃyutā / purato vāhanānāṃ ca kartavyā lagna(ghu)
analyzed: candraśālā anvitā kāryā bherī śikhara saṃyutā puratas vāhanānām ca kartavyā

original: maṇḍapāḥ //
analyzed: maṇḍapāḥ

original: nāṭyaśālā ca kartavyā dvāradeśasamāśrayā / prasāde devatānāṃ ca kāryā dikṣu vidikṣvapi //
analyzed: nāṭya śālā ca kartavyā dvāra deśa samāśrayā prasāde devatānām ca kāryā dikṣu vidikṣu api

original: dvārapālāśca kartavyā mukhyā gatvā pṛthakpṛthak / kiñcidadūrataḥ kāryā maṭhāstatropajīvinām //
analyzed: dvārapālāḥ ca kartavyāḥ mukhyāḥ gatvā pṛthak pṛthak kiñcid adūrataḥ kāryāḥ maṭhāḥ tatra upajīvinām

original: prāvṛtā jagatī kāryā phalapuṣpajalānvitā / prasādeṣu surāṃsthāpya pūjābhiḥ pūjayennaraḥ / vāsudevaḥ sarvadevaḥ sarvabhāk tadgṛhādikṛt //
analyzed: prāvṛtā jagatī kāryā phala puṣpa jala anvitā prasādeṣu surān sthāpya pūjābhiḥ pūjayet naraḥ vāsudevaḥ sarva devaḥ sarva bhāj tad gṛha ādi kṛt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe prāsādaliṅgamaṇḍapādilakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃnāma saptacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśe ācāra kāṇḍe prāsādaliṅgamaṇḍapādilakṣaṇanirūpaṇam nāma saptacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 48
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / pratiṣṭhāṃ sarvadevānāṃ saṃkṣepeṇa vadāmyaham / sutithyādau suramyāṃ ca pratiṣṭhāṃ kārayedguruḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca pratiṣṭhām sarva devānām saṃkṣepeṇa vadāmi aham su tithi ādau su ramyām ca pratiṣṭhām kārayet guruḥ

original: ṛtvigbhiḥ saha cācāryaṃ varayenmadhyadeśagam / svaśākhoktavidhānena atha vā praṇavena tu //
analyzed: ṛtvigbhiḥ saha ca ācāryam varayet madhyadeśa gam sva śākhā ukta vidhānena atha vā praṇavena tu

original: pañcabhirbahubhirvātha kuryātpādyārghyameva ca / mudrikābhistathā vastrairgandhamālyānulepanaiḥ //
analyzed: pañcabhiḥ bahubhiḥ vā atha kuryāt pādya arghyam eva ca mudrikābhiḥ tathā vastraiḥ gandha mālya anulepanaiḥ

original: mantranyāsaṃ guruḥ kṛtvā tataḥ karma samārabhet / prāsādasyāgrataḥ kuryānmaṇḍapaṃ daśahastakam //
analyzed: mantra nyāsam guruḥ kṛtvā tatas karma samārabhet prāsādasya agratas kuryāt maṇḍapam daśa hastakam

original: kuryāddvādaśahastaṃ vā stambhaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiryutam / dhvajāṣṭakaiścaturhastāṃ madhye vediṃ ca kārayet //
analyzed: kuryāt dvādaśa hastam vā stambhaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ yutam dhvaja aṣṭakaiḥ catur hastām madhye vedim ca kārayet

original: nadīsaṃgamatīrātthāṃ vālukāṃ tatra dāpayet / caturaśraṃ kārmukābhaṃ vartulaṃ kamalākṛti //
analyzed: vālukām tatra dāpayet caturaśram kārmuka ābham vartulam kamala ākṛti

original: pūrvāditaḥ samārabhya kartavyaṃ kuṇḍapañcakam / athavā caturaśrāṇi sarvāṇyetāni kārayet //
analyzed: pūrva āditaḥ samārabhya kartavyam kuṇḍa pañcakam athavā caturaśrāṇi sarvāṇi etāni kārayet

original: śāntikarmidhānena sarvakāmārthasiddhaye / śiraḥ sthāne tu devasya ācāryo homamācaret //
analyzed: sarva kāma artha siddhaye śiraḥ sthāne tu devasya ācāryaḥ homam ācaret

original: aiśānyāṃ kecidicchanti upalipyāvaniṃ śubhām / dvārāṇi caiva catvāri kṛtvā vai toraṇāntike //
analyzed: aiśānyām kecid icchanti upalipya avanim śubhām dvārāṇi ca eva catvāri kṛtvā vai toraṇa antike

original: nyagrodhodumbarāśvatthabailvapālāśakhādirāḥ / toraṇāḥ pañcahastāśca vastrapuṣpādyalaṅkṛtāḥ //
analyzed: nyagrodha udumbara aśvattha bailva pālāśa khādirāḥ toraṇāḥ pañca hastāḥ ca vastra puṣpa ādi alaṅkṛtāḥ

original: nikhaneddhastamekakaṃ catvāraścaturo diśaḥ / pūrvadvāre mṛgendraṃ tu hayarājaṃ tu dakṣiṇe //
analyzed: nikhanet hastam ekakam catvāraḥ caturaḥ diśaḥ pūrva dvāre mṛga indram tu haya rājam tu dakṣiṇe

original: paścime gopatirnāma suraśārdūlamuttare / agnimīleti hi mantreṇa prathamaṃ pūrvato nyaset //
analyzed: paścime gopatiḥ nāma sura śārdūlam uttare agnimīlā iti hi mantreṇa prathamam pūrvatas nyaset

original: īṣetvetihi mantreṇa dakṣiṇasyāṃ dvitīyakam / agnāyāhimantreṇa paścimasyāṃ tṛtīyakam //
analyzed: īṣā itvā iti hi mantreṇa dakṣiṇasyām dvitīyakam agnāya ahi mantreṇa paścimasyām tṛtīyakam

original: śannodevīti mantreṇa uttarasyāṃ caturthakam / pūrve ambudavatkāryā āgnoyyāṃ dhūmarūpiṇī //
analyzed: śannodevī iti mantreṇa uttarasyām caturthakam pūrve ambuda vat kāryā āgnoyyām dhūma rūpiṇī

original: yāmyāṃ vai kṛṣṇarūpā tu nairṛtyā śyāmalā (dhūsarā) bhavet / vāruṇyāṃ pāṇḍurā jñeyā vāyavyāṃ pītavarṇikā //
analyzed: yāmyām vai kṛṣṇa rūpā tu śyāmalā dhūsarā bhavet  vāruṇyām pāṇḍurā jñeyā vāyavyām pīta varṇikā

original: uttare raktavarṇā tu śukleśī ca patākikā / bahurūpā tathā madhye indravidyeti pūrvake //
analyzed: uttare rakta varṇā tu śukla īśī ca patākikā bahu rūpā tathā madhye indra vidyā iti pūrvake

original: āgniṃ saṃsuptimantreṇa yamonāgeti dakṣiṇe / pūjyā rakṣohanoveti paścime uttare 'pi ca //
analyzed: ā agnim saṃsupti mantreṇa yamaḥ nāga iti dakṣiṇe pūjyāḥ rakṣaḥ hanaḥ vā iti paścime uttare ca

original: vāta ityabhiṣicyātha āpyāyasveti cottare / tamīśānamataścaiva viṣṇornuketi madhyame //
analyzed: vātaḥ iti abhiṣicya atha āpyāyasva iti ca uttare tam īśānam atas ca eva viṣṇoḥ nukā iti madhyame

original: kalaśau tu tato dvaudvau niveśyau toraṇāntike / vastrayugmasamāyuktāścandanādyaiḥ svalaṅkṛtāḥ //
analyzed: kalaśau tu tatas dvau dvau niveśyau toraṇa antike vastra yugma samāyuktāḥ candana ādyaiḥ su alaṅkṛtāḥ

original: puṣpairvitānairbahulairādivarṇābhimantritāḥ / dikpālāśca tataḥ pūjyāḥ śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā //
analyzed: puṣpaiḥ vitānaiḥ bahulaiḥ ādi varṇa abhimantritāḥ dikpālāḥ ca tatas pūjyāḥ śāstra dṛṣṭena karmaṇā

original: trātāramindrabhantreṇa agnirmūrdheti cāpare / asminvṛkṣa itaṃ caiva pracārīti parā smṛtā //
analyzed: trātāram indrabhantreṇa agniḥ mūrdhā iti ca apare asmin vṛkṣe ca eva pracārī iti parā smṛtā

original: kiñcedadhātu ācatvābhitvādeti ca saptamī / imārudreti dikyālānpūjayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: kiñca id adhātu ca saptamī imāḥ rudra iti dikyālān pūjayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: homadravyāṇi vāyavye kuryātsopaskarāṇi ca / śaṅkhāñchāstroditāñchvetānnetrābhyāṃ vinyasedguruḥ //
analyzed: homa dravyāṇi vāyavye kuryāt sa upaskarāṇi ca śaṅkhān śāstra uditān śvetān netrābhyām vinyaset guruḥ

original: ālokanena dravyāṇi śuddhiṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥ / tdṛdayādīni cāṅgāni vyāhṛtipraṇavena ca //
analyzed: ālokanena dravyāṇi śuddhim yānti na saṃśayaḥ

original: astraṃ caiva samastānāṃ nyāso 'yaṃ sarvakāmikaḥ / akṣatānviṣṭaraṃ caiva astreṇaivābhimantritān //
analyzed: astram ca eva samastānām nyāsaḥ yam sarvakāmikaḥ akṣatān viṣṭaram ca eva astreṇa eva abhimantritān

original: viṣṭareṇa spṛśedduvyānyāgamaṇḍapasaṃbhṛtān / akṣatānvikiretpaścādastrapūtānsamantataḥ //
analyzed: viṣṭareṇa spṛśet duvyān yāga maṇḍapa saṃbhṛtān  akṣatān vikiret paścāt astra pūtān samantataḥ

original: śakrīṃ diśamathārabhya yāvadīśānagocaram / avakīryākṣatārnsaṃvāṃllepayenmaṇḍapaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: śakrīm diśam atha ārabhya yāvat īśāna gocaram  avakīrya akṣatān saṃvān lepayet maṇḍapam tatas

original: gandhādyairarghyapātre ca mantragrāmaṃ nyasedguruḥ / tenārghyapātratoyena prokṣayedyāgamaṇḍapam //
analyzed: gandha ādyaiḥ arghya pātre ca mantra grāmam nyaset guruḥ tena arghya pātra toyena prokṣayet yāga maṇḍapam

original: pratiṣṭhā yasya devasya tadākhyaṃ kalaśaṃ nyaset / aiśānyāṃ pūjayedyāmye astreṇaiva ca bardhanīm //
analyzed: pratiṣṭhā yasya devasya tad ākhyam kalaśam nyaset aiśānyām pūjayet yāmye astreṇa eva ca bardhanīm

original: kalaśaṃ vardhanīṃ caiva grahānvāsttoṣpatiṃ tathā / āsanetāni sarvāṇi praṇavākhyaṃ japedguruḥ //
analyzed: kalaśam vardhanīm ca eva grahān vāsttoṣpatim tathā āsana itāni sarvāṇi praṇava ākhyam japet guruḥ

original: sūtragrīvaṃ ratnagarbhaṃ vastrayugmena veṣṭitam / sarvauṣadhīgandhaliptaṃ pūjayetkalaśaṃ guruḥ //
analyzed: sūtra grīvam ratna garbham vastra yugmena veṣṭitam sarva oṣadhī gandha liptam pūjayet kalaśam guruḥ

original: devastu kalaśe pūjyo vardhanyā vastramuttamam / vardhanyā tu samāyuktaṃ kalaśaṃ bhrāmayedanu //
analyzed: devaḥ tu kalaśe pūjyaḥ vardhanyā vastram uttamam vardhanyā tu samāyuktam kalaśam bhrāmayet anu

original: vardhanīdhārayā siñcannagrato dhārayettataḥ / abhyarcya vardhanīkumbhaṃ sthaṇḍile devamarcayet //
analyzed: vardhanī dhārayā siñcan agratas dhārayet tatas abhyarcya vardhanī kumbham sthaṇḍile devam arcayet

original: ghaṭaṃ cāvāhya vāyavyāṃ gaṇānāṃ tveti sadgaṇam / devamīśānakoṇe tu japedvāstoṣpatiṃ budhaḥ //
analyzed: ghaṭam ca āvāhya vāyavyām gaṇānām tvā iti sat gaṇam devam īśāna koṇe tu japet vāstoṣpatim budhaḥ

original: vāstoṣpatīti mantreṇa vāstudoṣopaśāntaye / kumbhasya pūrvato bhūtaṃ gaṇadevaṃ baliṃ haret //
analyzed: vāstoṣpatī iti mantreṇa vāstu doṣa upaśāntaye kumbhasya pūrvatas bhūtam gaṇa devam balim haret

original: paṭhediti ca vidyāśca kuryādālambhanaṃ budhaḥ / yogeyogeti mantreṇāstaraṇaṃ śādvalaiḥ kuśaiḥ //
analyzed: paṭhet iti ca vidyāḥ ca kuryāt ālambhanam budhaḥ yoge yoga iti mantreṇa āstaraṇam śādvalaiḥ kuśaiḥ

original: ṛtvigbhiḥ sārdhamācāryaḥ snānapīṭhe gurustadā / vividhairbrahmaghoṣaiśca puṇyāhajayamaṅgalaiḥ //
analyzed: ṛtvigbhiḥ sārdham ācāryaḥ snāna pīṭhe guruḥ tadā vividhaiḥ brahma ghoṣaiḥ ca puṇya aha jaya maṅgalaiḥ

original: kṛtvā brahmarathe devaṃ pratiṣṭhanti tato dvijāḥ / aiśānyāmānayetpīṭhamaṇḍape vinyasedguruḥ //
analyzed: kṛtvā brahma rathe devam pratiṣṭhanti tatas dvijāḥ aiśānyām ānayet pīṭha maṇḍape vinyaset guruḥ

original: bhadraṅkarṇetyatha snātvā sūtravalkalajena tu / saṃsnāpya lakṣaṇoddhāraṃ kuryāttūryādi (dūrābhi)
analyzed: bhadraṅkarṇa iti atha snātvā sūtra valkala jena tu saṃsnāpya lakṣaṇa uddhāram kuryāt tūrya ādi dūra abhi

original: vādanaiḥ //
analyzed: vādanaiḥ

original: madhusarpiḥ samāyuktaṃ kāṃsye vā tāmrabhājane / akṣiṇī cāñjayeccāsya suvarṇasya śalākayā //
analyzed: madhu sarpiḥ samāyuktam kāṃsye vā tāmra bhājane akṣiṇī ca añjayet ca asya suvarṇasya śalākayā

original: agnirjyotīti mantreṇa netrodvāṭaṃ tu kārayet / lakṣaṇe kriyamāṇe tu nāmaikaṃ sthāpako va(da) det //
analyzed: agniḥ jyotiḥ iti mantreṇa tu kārayet lakṣaṇe kriyamāṇe tu nāma ekam sthāpakaḥ det

original: imaṃmegaṅgemantreṇa netrayoḥ śītalakriyā / agnirmūrdheti mantreṇa dadyādvalmī kamṛttikām //
analyzed: netrayoḥ śītala kriyā agniḥ mūrdhā iti mantreṇa dadyāt valmīka mṛttikām

original: bilvodumbaramaśvatthaṃ vaṭaṃ pālāśameva ca / yajñāyajñeti mantreṇa dadyātpañcakaṣāyakam //
analyzed: bilva udumbaram aśvattham vaṭam pālāśam eva ca yajñāyajña iti mantreṇa dadyāt pañca kaṣāyakam

original: pañcagavyaṃ snāpayecca sahadevyādi bhistataḥ / sahadevī balā caiva śatamūlī śatāvarī //
analyzed: pañcagavyam snāpayet ca sahadevī ādi bhiḥ tatas sahadevī balā ca eva śatamūlī śatāvarī

original: kumārī ca guḍūcī ca siṃhī vyāghrī tathaiva ca / yā oṣadhīti mantreṇa snānamoṣadhimajjalaiḥ //
analyzed: kumārī ca guḍūcī ca siṃhī vyāghrī tathā eva ca yāḥ oṣadhī iti mantreṇa snānam oṣadhimat jalaiḥ

original: yāḥ phalinīti mantreṇa phalasnānaṃ vidhīyate / drupadādiveti mantreṇa kāryamudvartanaṃ budhaiḥ //
analyzed: yāḥ phalinī iti mantreṇa phala snānam vidhīyate drupadāt iva iti mantreṇa kāryam udvartanam budhaiḥ

original: kalaśeṣu ca vinyasya uttarādiṣvanukramāt / ratnāni caiva dhānyāni oṣadhīṃ śatapuṣpikām //
analyzed: kalaśeṣu ca vinyasya uttara ādiṣu anukramāt  ratnāni ca eva dhānyāni oṣadhīm śatapuṣpikām

original: samudrāṃścaiva vinyasya caturaścaturo diśaḥ / kṣīraṃ dadhi kṣīrodasya ghṛtodasyeti vā punaḥ //
analyzed: samudrān ca eva vinyasya caturaḥ caturaḥ diśaḥ kṣīram dadhi kṣīrodasya ghṛtodasya iti vā punar

original: āpyāyasva dadhikrāvṇo yā auṣadhīritīti ca / tejo 'sīti ca mantraiśca kumbhaṃ caivābhimantrayet //
analyzed: āpyāyasva dadhikrāvṇaḥ yāḥ auṣadhīḥ iti iti ca tejaḥ si iti ca mantraiḥ ca kumbham ca eva abhimantrayet

original: samudrākhyaiścaturbhiśca snāpayetkalaśaiḥ punaḥ / snātaścaiva suveṣaśca dhūpo deyaśca gugguluḥ //
analyzed: samudra ākhyaiḥ caturbhiḥ ca snāpayet kalaśaiḥ punar snātaḥ ca eva su veṣaḥ ca dhūpaḥ deyaḥ ca gugguluḥ

original: abhiṣekāya kumbheṣu tattattīrthāni vinyaset / pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni saritaḥ sāgarāstathā //
analyzed: abhiṣekāya kumbheṣu tat tat tīrthāni vinyaset pṛthivyām yāni tīrthāni saritaḥ sāgarāḥ tathā

original: yā oṣadhīti mantreṇa kumbhaṃ caivābhimantrayet / tena toyena yaḥ snāyātsa mucyetsarvapātakaiḥ //
analyzed: yāḥ oṣadhī iti mantreṇa kumbham ca eva abhimantrayet tena toyena yaḥ snāyāt sa mucyet sarva pātakaiḥ

original: abhiṣicya samudraiśca tvarghyaṃ dadyāttataḥ punaḥ / gandhadvāreti gandhaṃ ca nyāsaṃ vai vedamantrakaiḥ //
analyzed: abhiṣicya samudraiḥ ca tu arghyam dadyāt tatas punar gandha dvāra iti gandham ca nyāsam vai veda mantrakaiḥ

original: svaśāstravihitaiḥ prāptairyuvaṃvastreti vastrakam / kavihāviti mantreṇa ānayenmaṇḍapaṃ śubham //
analyzed: sva śāstra vihitaiḥ prāptaiḥ yuvam vastra iti vastrakam mantreṇa ānayet maṇḍapam śubham

original: śambhavāyeti mantreṇa śayyāyāṃ viniveśayet / viśvataścakṣurmantreṇa kuryātsakalaniṣkalam //
analyzed: śambhavāya iti mantreṇa śayyāyām viniveśayet viśvatas cakṣuḥ mantreṇa kuryāt sakala niṣkalam

original: sthitvā caiva pare tattve mantranyāsaṃ tu kārayet / svaśāstravihito mantro nyāsastasmiṃstathoditaḥ //
analyzed: sthitvā ca eva pare tattve mantra nyāsam tu kārayet sva śāstra vihitaḥ mantraḥ nyāsaḥ tasmin tathā uditaḥ

original: vastreṇācchādayitvā tu pūjanīyaḥ svabhāvataḥ / yathāśāstraṃ nivedyāni pādamūle tu dāpayet //
analyzed: vastreṇa ācchādayitvā tu pūjanīyaḥ svabhāvataḥ yathāśāstram nivedyāni pāda mūle tu dāpayet

original: atha praṇavasaṃyuktaṃ vastrayugmena veṣṭitam / kalaśaṃ sahiraṇyaṃ ca śiraḥ sthāne nivedayet //
analyzed: atha praṇava saṃyuktam vastra yugmena veṣṭitam kalaśam sa hiraṇyam ca śiraḥ sthāne nivedayet

original: sthitvā kuṇḍasamīpe 'tha agneḥ sthāpanamācaret / svaśāstravihitairmantrairvedoktairvātha vā guruḥ //
analyzed: sthitvā kuṇḍa samīpe agneḥ sthāpanam ācaret sva śāstra vihitaiḥ mantraiḥ veda uktaiḥ vā atha vā guruḥ

original: śrīsūktaṃ pāvamānyaṃ ca vāsadāmyasavājinam / vṛṣākapiṃ ca mitraṃ bahvacaḥ pūrvato japet //
analyzed: śrīsūktam pāvamānyam ca vṛṣākapim ca mitram bahu acaḥ pūrvatas japet

original: rudraṃ puruṣasūktaṃ ca ślokādhyāyaṃ ca śukriyam / brahmāṇaṃ pitṛmaitraṃ ca adhvaryurdakṣiṇe japet //
analyzed: rudram puruṣasūktam ca śloka adhyāyam ca śukriyam brahmāṇam pitṛ maitram ca adhvaryuḥ dakṣiṇe japet

original: vedavrataṃ vāmadevyaṃ jyeṣṭhasāma rathantaram / bheruṇḍāni ca sāmāni chandogaḥ paścime japet //
analyzed: vedavratam vāmadevyam jyeṣṭhasāma rathantaram bheruṇḍāni ca sāmāni chandogaḥ paścime japet

original: atharvaśirasaṃ caiva kumbhasūktamatharvaṇaḥ / nīlarudrāṃśca maitraṃ ca atharvaścottare japet //
analyzed: atharvaśirasam ca eva kumbhasūktam atharvaṇaḥ nīlarudrān ca maitram ca atharvaḥ ca uttare japet

original: kuṇḍaṃ cāstreṇa saṃprokṣya ācāryastu viśeṣataḥ / tāmrapātre śarāve vā yathāvibhavato 'pi vā //
analyzed: kuṇḍam ca astreṇa saṃprokṣya ācāryaḥ tu viśeṣataḥ tāmra pātre śarāve vā vā

original: jātavedasamānīya agratastaṃ niveśayet / astreṇa jvālayedvahniṃ kavacena tu veṣṭayet //
analyzed: jātavedasam ānīya agratas tam niveśayet  astreṇa jvālayet vahnim kavacena tu veṣṭayet

original: amṛtīkṛtya taṃ paścānmantraiḥ sarvaiśca deśikaḥ / pātraṃ gṛhya karābhyāṃ ca kuṇḍaṃ bhrāmya tataḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: amṛtīkṛtya tam paścāt mantraiḥ sarvaiḥ ca deśikaḥ pātram gṛhya karābhyām ca kuṇḍam bhrāmya tatas punar

original: vaiṣṇavena tu yogena paraṃ tejastu niḥ kṣipet / dakṣiṇe sthāpayedbrahma praṇītāñcottareṇa tu //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavena tu yogena param tejaḥ tu niḥ kṣipet dakṣiṇe sthāpayet brahma praṇītān ca uttareṇa tu

original: sādhāraṇena mantreṇa svasūtravihitena vā / dikṣudikṣu tato dadyātparidhiṃ viṣṭaraiḥ saha //
analyzed: sādhāraṇena mantreṇa sva sūtra vihitena vā dikṣu dikṣu tatas dadyāt paridhim viṣṭaraiḥ saha

original: brahmaviṣṇuhareśānāḥ pūjyāḥ sādhāraṇena tu / darbheṣu sthāpayedvahniṃ darbhaiśca pariveṣṭitam //
analyzed: brahma viṣṇu hara īśānāḥ pūjyāḥ sādhāraṇena tu darbheṣu sthāpayet vahnim darbhaiḥ ca pariveṣṭitam

original: darbhatoyena saṃspṛṣṭo mantrahīno 'pi śudhyati / prāgagrairudagagraiśca pratyagagrairakhaṇḍitaiḥ //
analyzed: darbha toyena saṃspṛṣṭaḥ śudhyati prāc agraiḥ udak agraiḥ ca pratyak agraiḥ akhaṇḍitaiḥ

original: vitatairveṣṭito vahniḥ svayaṃ sānnidhyamāvrajet / agnestu rakṣaṇārthāya yaduktaṃ karma ntravit //
analyzed: vitataiḥ veṣṭitaḥ vahniḥ svayam sānnidhyam āvrajet  agneḥ tu rakṣaṇa arthāya yat uktam karma

original: ācāryāḥ kecidicchanti jātakarmādyanantaram / pavitraṃ tu tataḥ kṛtvā kuryādājyasya saṃskṛtim //
analyzed: ācāryāḥ kecid icchanti jātakarma ādi anantaram pavitram tu tatas kṛtvā kuryāt ājyasya saṃskṛtim

original: ācāryo 'tha nirīkṣyāpi nīrājyamabhimantritam / ājyabhāgābhighārāntamavekṣetājyasiddhaye //
analyzed: nirīkṣya api nīrājyam abhimantritam  ājyabhāga abhighāra antam avekṣeta ājya siddhaye

original: pañcapañcāhutīrhutvā ājyena tadanantaram / garbhādhānāditastāvadyāvadgaudānikaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: pañca pañca āhutīḥ hutvā ājyena tad anantaram garbhādhāna āditas tāvat yāvat gaudānikam bhavet

original: svaśāstravihitairmantraiḥ praṇavenātha homayet / tataḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ dattvā pūrṇātpūrṇamanārethaḥ //
analyzed: sva śāstra vihitaiḥ mantraiḥ praṇavena atha homayet tatas pūrṇāhutim dattvā pūrṇāt pūrṇam an ārethaḥ

original: evamutpādito vahniḥ sarvakarmasu siddhidaḥ / pūjayitvā tato vahniṃ kuṇḍeṣu viharettathā //
analyzed: evam utpāditaḥ vahniḥ sarva karmasu siddhi daḥ pūjayitvā tatas vahnim kuṇḍeṣu viharet tathā

original: indrādīnāṃ svamantraiśca tathāhutiśataṃśatam / purṇāhutiṃ śatasyānte sarveṣāṃ caiva homayet //
analyzed: indra ādīnām sva mantraiḥ ca tathā āhuti śatam śatam purṇāhutim śatasya ante sarveṣām ca eva homayet

original: svāmāhutimathājyeṣu hotā tatkalaśe nyaset / devatāścaiva mantrāṃśca tathaiva jātavedasam //
analyzed: svām āhutim atha ājyeṣu hotā tad kalaśe nyaset devatāḥ ca eva mantrān ca tathā eva jātavedasam

original: ātmānamekataḥ kṛtvā tataḥ pūrṇāṃ pradāpayet / niṣkṛṣya bahirācāryo dikpālānāṃ baliṃ haret //
analyzed: ātmānam ekatas kṛtvā tatas pūrṇām pradāpayet niṣkṛṣya bahis ācāryaḥ dikpālānām balim haret

original: bhūtānāṃ caiva devānāṃ nāgānāṃ ca prayogataḥ / tilāśca samidhaścaiva homadravyaṃ dvayaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: bhūtānām ca eva devānām nāgānām ca prayogataḥ tilāḥ ca samidhaḥ ca eva homa dravyam dvayam smṛtam

original: ājyaṃ tayoḥ sahakāri tatpradhānaṃ yadaṅka(kṣa)yoḥ / paruṣasuktaṃ pūrveṇaiva rudracaiva tu dakṣiṇe //
analyzed: ājyam tayoḥ sahakāri tat pradhānam yat aṅka kṣayoḥ pūrveṇa eva tu dakṣiṇe

original: jyeṣṭhasāma ca bhāruṇḍaṃ tannayāmīti paścime / nīlarudro mahāmantraḥ kumbhasūktamatharvaṇaḥ //
analyzed: jyeṣṭhasāma ca bhāruṇḍam tat nayāmi iti paścime nīlarudraḥ mahā mantraḥ kumbhasūktam atharvaṇaḥ

original: hutvā sahasramekaikaṃ devaṃ śirasi kalpayet / evaṃ madhye tathā pāde pūrṇāhutyā tathā punaḥ //
analyzed: hutvā sahasram ekaikam devam śirasi kalpayet evam madhye tathā pāde pūrṇāhutyā tathā punar

original: śiraḥ sthāneṣu juhuyādāviśeccāpyanukramāt / vedānāmādimantrairvā mantrairvā devanāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: śiraḥ sthāneṣu juhuyāt āviśet ca api anukramāt  vedānām ādi mantraiḥ vā mantraiḥ vā deva nāmabhiḥ

original: svaśāstravihitairvāpi gāyattryā vātha te dvijāḥ / gāyattryā vāthavācāryo vyāhṛtipraṇavena tu //
analyzed: sva śāstra vihitaiḥ vā api gāyattryā vā atha te dvijāḥ gāyattryā vā athavā ācāryaḥ vyāhṛti praṇavena tu

original: evaṃ homavidhiṃ kṛtvā nyasenmantrāṃstu deśikaḥ / caraṇāvagnimīḷe tu iṣetvo gulphayoḥ sthitāḥ //
analyzed: evam homa vidhim kṛtvā nyaset mantrān tu deśikaḥ caraṇau agnim īḍe tu gulphayoḥ sthitāḥ

original: agna āyāhi jaṅghe dve śannodevīti jānunī / bṛhadrathantare ūrū udareṣvātilo (svātino) nyaset //
analyzed: agne āyāhi jaṅghe dve śannodevī iti jānunī bṛhat rathantare ūrū udareṣu ātilaḥ svātinaḥ nyaset

original: dīrghāyuṣṭvāya hṛdaye śrīścate galake nyaset / trātāramindramurasi netrābhyāṃ tu triyambakam //
analyzed: dīrgha āyuḥ tvāya hṛdaye śrīḥ ca te galake nyaset trātāram indram urasi netrābhyām tu triyambakam

original: mūrdhābhava tathā mūrdhni ālagnāddhomamācaret / utthā payettato devamuttiṣṭhabrahmaṇaspate / //
analyzed: tathā mūrdhni ālagnāt homam ācaret  utthāpayet tatas devam uttiṣṭha brahmaṇaspate

original: vedapuṇyāhaśabdena prāsādānāṃ pradakṣiṇam / piṇḍikālaṃbhanaṃ kṛtvā devasyatveti mantravit //
analyzed: veda puṇya aha śabdena prāsādānām pradakṣiṇam piṇḍikā ālaṃbhanam kṛtvā devasya tvā iti mantra vid

original: dikpā lānsaha ratnaiśca dhātūnoṣadhayastathā / lauhabījāni siddhāni paścāddevaṃ tu vinyaset //
analyzed: dikpāḥ lān saha ratnaiḥ ca dhātūn oṣadhayaḥ tathā lauha bījāni siddhāni paścāt devam tu vinyaset

original: na garbhe sthāpayeddevaṃ na garbhaṃ tu parityajet / īṣanmadhyaṃ parityajya tato doṣāpahaṃ tu tat //
analyzed: na garbhe sthāpayet devam na garbham tu parityajet īṣat madhyam parityajya tatas doṣa apaham tu tat

original: tilasya tuṣamātraṃ tu uttaraṃ kiñcidānayet / oṃ sthiro bhava śivo bhava prajābhyaśca namonamaḥ //
analyzed: tilasya tuṣa mātram tu uttaram kiñcid ānayet om sthiraḥ bhava śivaḥ bhava prajābhyaḥ ca namaḥ namaḥ

original: devasya tvā saviturvaḥ ṣaḍbhyo vai vinyasedguruḥ / tattvavarṇakalāmātraṃ prajāni bhuvanātmaje //
analyzed: devasya tvā savituḥ vaḥ ṣaḍbhyaḥ vai vinyaset guruḥ tattva varṇa kalā mātram prajāni bhuvana ātmaje

original: ṣaḍbhyo vinyasya siddhārthaṃ dhruvārthairabhimantrayet / sampātakalaśenaiva snāpayetsupratiṣṭhitam //
analyzed: ṣaḍbhyaḥ vinyasya siddhārtham dhruva arthaiḥ abhimantrayet  sampāta kalaśena eva snāpayet su pratiṣṭhitam

original: dīpadhūpasugandhaiśca naivedyaiśca prapūjayet / arghyaṃ dattvā namaskṛtya tato devaṃ kṣamāpayet //
analyzed: dīpa dhūpa su gandhaiḥ ca naivedyaiḥ ca prapūjayet arghyam dattvā namaskṛtya tatas devam kṣamāpayet

original: pātraṃ vastrayugaṃ chatraṃ tathā divyāṅgulīyakam / ṛttvigbhyaśca pradātavyā dakṣiṇā caiva śaktitaḥ //
analyzed: pātram vastra yugam chatram tathā divya aṅgulīyakam

original: caturthau juhuyātpaścādyajamānaḥ samāhitaḥ / āhutīnāṃ śataṃ hutvā tataḥ pūrṇāṃ pradāpayet //
analyzed: caturthau juhuyāt paścāt yajamānaḥ samāhitaḥ āhutīnām śatam hutvā tatas pūrṇām pradāpayet

original: niṣkramya bahirācāryo dikpālānāṃ baliṃ haret / ācāryaḥ puṣpahastastu kṣamasveti visarjayet //
analyzed: niṣkramya bahis ācāryaḥ dikpālānām balim haret  ācāryaḥ puṣpa hastaḥ tu kṣamasva iti visarjayet

original: yāgānte kapilāṃ dadyādācāryāya ca cāmaram / mukuṭaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ chatraṃ keyūraṃ kaṭisūtrakam //
analyzed: yāga ante kapilām dadyāt ācāryāya ca cāmaram mukuṭam kuṇḍalam chatram keyūram kaṭi sūtrakam

original: vyajanaṃ grāmavastrādīnsopaskāraṃ sumaṇḍapam / bhojanaṃ ca mahātkuryātkṛtakṛtyaśca jāyate / yajamāno vimuktaḥ syātsthāpakasya prasādataḥ //
analyzed: vyajanam grāma vastra ādīn sa upaskāram su maṇḍapam bhojanam ca mahāt kuryāt kṛtakṛtyaḥ ca jāyate yajamānaḥ vimuktaḥ syāt sthāpakasya prasādataḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe devapratiṣṭhādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe devapratiṣṭhādinirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 49
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: iti pratiṣṭhāprakaraṇaṃ samāptam / brahmovāca / sargādikṛddhariścaiva pūjyaḥ svāyambhuvādibhiḥ / viprādyaiḥ svena dharmeṇa taddharmaṃ vyāsa / vai śṛṇu //
analyzed: iti pratiṣṭhā prakaraṇam samāptam brahmā uvāca sarga ādi kṛt hariḥ ca eva pūjyaḥ svāyambhuva ādibhiḥ  vipra ādyaiḥ svena dharmeṇa tad dharmam vyāsa vai śṛṇu

original: yajanaṃ yājanaṃ dānaṃ brāhmaṇasya pratigrahaḥ / adhyāpanaṃ cādhyayanaṃ ṣaṭ karmāṇidvijottame //
analyzed: yajanam yājanam dānam brāhmaṇasya pratigrahaḥ adhyāpanam ca adhyayanam ṣaḍ karmāṇi dvijottame

original: dānamadhyayanaṃ yajño dharmaḥ kṣattriyavaiśyayoḥ / daṇḍastasya kṛṣirvaiśyasya śasyate //
analyzed: dānam adhyayanam yajñaḥ dharmaḥ kṣattriya vaiśyayoḥ  daṇḍaḥ tasya kṛṣiḥ vaiśyasya śasyate

original: śuśrūṣaiva dvijātīnāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ dharmasādhanam / kārukarma tathā'jīvo pākayajño 'pi dharmataḥ //
analyzed: śuśrūṣā eva dvijātīnām śūdrāṇām dharma sādhanam kāru karma pākayajñaḥ dharmataḥ

original: bhikṣācaryātha śuśrūṣā guroḥ svādhyāya eva ca / sandhyākarmāgnikāryañca dharmo 'yaṃ brahmacāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: bhikṣā caryā atha śuśrūṣā guroḥ svādhyāyaḥ eva ca sandhyā karma agni kāryam ca dharmaḥ yam brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: sarveṣāmāśramāṇāṃ ca dvaividhyaṃ tu caturvidham / brahmacāryupakurvāṇo naiṣṭhiko brahmatatparaḥ //
analyzed: sarveṣām āśramāṇām ca dvaividhyam tu caturvidham brahmacārī upakurvāṇaḥ naiṣṭhikaḥ brahma tatparaḥ

original: yo 'dhītya vidhivadvedān gṛhasthāśramamāvrajet / upakurvāṇako jñeyo naiṣṭhiko maraṇāntikaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ dhītya vidhivat vedān gṛhastha āśramam āvrajet  upakurvāṇakaḥ jñeyaḥ naiṣṭhikaḥ maraṇa antikaḥ

original: agnayo 'tithiśuśrūṣā yajño dānaṃ surārcanam / gṛhasthasya samāsena dharmo 'yaṃ dvijasattama / //
analyzed: tithi śuśrūṣā yajñaḥ dānam sura arcanam gṛhasthasya samāsena dharmaḥ yam dvijasattama

original: udāsīnaḥ sādhakaśca gṛhastho dvividho bhavet / kuṭumbabharaṇe yuktaḥ sādhako 'sau gṛhī bhavet //
analyzed: udāsīnaḥ sādhakaḥ ca gṛhasthaḥ dvividhaḥ bhavet kuṭumba bharaṇe yuktaḥ sau gṛhī bhavet

original: ṛṇāni trīṇyapākṛtya tyaktvā bhāryādhanādikam / ekākī yastu vicaredudāsīnaḥ sa maukṣikaḥ //
analyzed: ṛṇāni trīṇi apākṛtya tyaktvā bhāryā dhana ādikam ekākī yaḥ tu vicaret udāsīnaḥ sa maukṣikaḥ

original: bhūmau mūlaphalāśitvaṃ svādhyāyastapa eva ca / saṃvibhāgo yathānyāyaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ vanavāsinaḥ //
analyzed: bhūmau mūla phala āśi tvam svādhyāyaḥ tapaḥ eva ca saṃvibhāgaḥ yathānyāyam dharmaḥ yam vanavāsinaḥ

original: tapastapyati yo 'raṇye yajeddevāñjuhoti ca / svādhyāye caiva nirato vanasthastāpasottamaḥ //
analyzed: tapaḥ tapyati yaḥ raṇye yajet devān juhoti ca svādhyāye ca eva nirataḥ vanasthaḥ tāpasa uttamaḥ

original: tapasā karśito 'tyarthaṃ yastu dhyānaparo bhavet / sanyāsī sa hi vijñeyo vānaprasthāśrame sthitaḥ //
analyzed: tapasā tyartham yaḥ tu dhyāna paraḥ bhavet sa nyāsī sa hi vijñeyaḥ vānaprastha āśrame sthitaḥ

original: yogābhyāsarato nityamārurukṣurjitendriyaḥ / jñānāya vartate bhukṣuḥ procyate pārameṣṭhikaḥ //
analyzed: yoga abhyāsa rataḥ nityam ārurukṣuḥ jita indriyaḥ jñānāya vartate bhukṣuḥ procyate pārameṣṭhikaḥ

original: yastvātmaratireva syānnityatṛpto mahāmuniḥ / samyak ca damasampannaḥ sa yogī bhikṣurucyate //
analyzed: yaḥ tu ātma ratiḥ eva syāt nitya tṛptaḥ mahā muniḥ samyak ca dama sampannaḥ sa yogī bhikṣuḥ ucyate

original: bhaikṣyaṃ śrutaṃ ca maunitvaṃ tapo dhyānaṃ viśeṣataḥ / samyak ca jñānavairāgyaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ bhikṣuke mataḥ //
analyzed: bhaikṣyam śrutam ca mauni tvam tapaḥ dhyānam viśeṣataḥ samyak ca jñāna vairāgyam dharmaḥ yam bhikṣuke mataḥ

original: jñānasanyāsinaḥ kecidvedasanyāsino 'pare / karmasanyāsinaḥ kecittrividhaḥ pārameṣṭhikaḥ //
analyzed: jñāna sanyāsinaḥ kecid veda sanyāsinaḥ pare karma sanyāsinaḥ kecid trividhaḥ pārameṣṭhikaḥ

original: yogī ca trividho jñeyo bhautikaḥ kṣattra evaca / tṛtīyo 'ntyāśramī prokto yogamūrtiṃsamāsthitaḥ //
analyzed: yogī ca trividhaḥ jñeyaḥ bhautikaḥ kṣattraḥ eva ca tṛtīyaḥ proktaḥ yoga mūrtim samāsthitaḥ

original: prathamā bhāvanā pūrve mokṣe tvakṣa(duṣka) rabhāvanā / tṛtīye cāntimā proktā bhāvanā pārameśvarī //
analyzed: prathamā bhāvanā pūrve mokṣe tu akṣa duṣka ra bhāvanā tṛtīye ca antimā proktā bhāvanā pārameśvarī

original: dharmātsaṃjāyate mokṣo hyarthātkāmo 'bhijāyate / pravṛttiśca nivṛttiśca dvividhaṃ karma vaidikam //
analyzed: dharmāt saṃjāyate mokṣaḥ hi arthāt kāmaḥ bhijāyate pravṛttiḥ ca nivṛttiḥ ca dvividham karma vaidikam

original: jñānaṃ pūrvaṃ nivṛttaṃ syātpravṛttaṃ cāgnidevakṛt / kṣamā damo dayā dānamalobhā (bho)
analyzed: jñānam pūrvam nivṛttam syāt pravṛttam ca agni deva kṛt kṣamā damaḥ dayā dānam alobhāḥ bho

original: bhyāsa eva ca //
analyzed: bhyāsaḥ eva ca

original: ārjavaṃ cānsūyā ca tīrthānusaraṇaṃ tathā / satyaṃ saṃtoṣa āstikyaṃ tathā cendriyanigrahaḥ //
analyzed: ārjavam ca ansūyā ca tīrtha anusaraṇam tathā satyam saṃtoṣaḥ āstikyam tathā ca indriya nigrahaḥ

original: devatābhyarcanaṃ pūjā brāhmaṇānāṃ viśeṣataḥ / ahiṃsā priyavāditvamapaiśunyamarūkṣatā //
analyzed: devatā abhyarcanam pūjā brāhmaṇānām viśeṣataḥ ahiṃsā priya vādi tvam apaiśunyam arūkṣa tā

original: ete āśramikā dharmāścaturvarṇyaṃ bavīmyataḥ / prājāpatyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ smṛtaṃ sthānaṃ kriyāvatām //
analyzed: ete āśramikāḥ dharmāḥ caturvarṇyam bavīmi atas prājāpatyam brāhmaṇānām smṛtam sthānam kriyāvatām

original: sthānamaindraṃ kṣattriyāṇāṃ saṃgrāmeṣvapalāyinām / vaiśyānāṃ mārutaṃ sthānaṃ svadharamamanuvartatām //
analyzed: sthānam aindram kṣattriyāṇām saṃgrāmeṣu apalāyinām vaiśyānām mārutam sthānam

original: gāndharvaṃ śūdrajātīnāṃ paricāre ca vartatām / aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇāmṛṣīṇāmūrdhvaretasām //
analyzed: gāndharvam śūdra jātīnām paricāre ca vartatām aṣṭāśīti sahasrāṇām ṛṣīṇām ūrdhvaretasām

original: smṛtaṃ teṣāṃ tu yatsthānaṃ tadeva vana (guru) vāsinām / saptarṣīṇāṃ tu yatsthānaṃ sthānaṃ tadvai vanaukasām //
analyzed: smṛtam teṣām tu yat sthānam tat eva vana guru vāsinām saptarṣīṇām tu yat sthānam sthānam tat vai vanaukasām

original: yatīnāṃ yatacittānāṃ nyāsināmūrdhvaretasām / ānandaṃ brahma tatsthānaṃ yasmānnāvartate muniḥ //
analyzed: yatīnām yata cittānām nyāsinām ūrdhvaretasām ānandam brahma tat sthānam yasmāt na āvartate muniḥ

original: yogināmamṛtasthānaṃ vyomākhyaṃ paramākṣaram / ānandamaiśvaraṃ yasmānmukto nāvartate naraḥ //
analyzed: yoginām amṛta sthānam vyoma ākhyam parama akṣaram ānandam aiśvaram yasmāt muktaḥ na āvartate naraḥ

original: muktiraṣṭāṅgavijñānātsaṃkṣepāttadvade śṛṇu / yamāḥ pañca tvahiṃsādyā ahiṃsā prāṇyahiṃsanam //
analyzed: muktiḥ aṣṭa aṅga vijñānāt saṃkṣepāt tat vade śṛṇu yamāḥ pañca tu ahiṃsā ādyāḥ ahiṃsā prāṇi ahiṃsanam

original: satyaṃ bhūtahitaṃ vākyamasteyaṃ svāgrahaṃ param / amaithunaṃ brahmacaryaṃ sarvatyāgo 'parigrahaḥ //
analyzed: satyam bhūta hitam vākyam asteyam sva agraham param amaithunam brahmacaryam sarva tyāgaḥ parigrahaḥ

original: niyamāḥ pañca satyādyā bāhmamābhyantaraṃ dvidhā / śaucaṃ tuṣṭiśca santoṣastapaścondriyanigrahaḥ //
analyzed: niyamāḥ pañca satya ādyāḥ bāhmam ābhyantaram dvidhā śaucam tuṣṭiḥ ca santoṣaḥ tapaḥ ca indriya nigrahaḥ

original: svādhyāyaḥ syānmantrajāpaḥ praṇidhānaṃ hareryajiḥ / āsanaṃ padmakādyuktaṃ prāṇāyāmo marujjayaḥ //
analyzed: svādhyāyaḥ syāt mantra jāpaḥ praṇidhānam hareḥ yajiḥ āsanam padmaka ādi uktam prāṇāyāmaḥ marut jayaḥ

original: mantradhyāna to garbho viparīto hyagarbhakaḥ / evaṃ dvidhā tridhāpyuktaṃ puraṇātpūrakaḥ sa ca //
analyzed: mantra dhyāna to garbhaḥ viparītaḥ hi agarbhakaḥ evam dvidhā tridhā api uktam puraṇāt pūrakaḥ sa ca

original: kumbhako niścalatvācca recanādrecakastridhā / laghurdvādaśamātraḥ syāccaturviṃśatikaḥ paraḥ //
analyzed: kumbhakaḥ niścala tvāt ca recanāt recakaḥ tridhā laghuḥ dvādaśa mātraḥ syāt caturviṃśatikaḥ paraḥ

original: ṣaṭtriṃśanmātrikaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ pratyāhāraśca rodhanam / brahmātmacintā dhyānaṃ syāddhāraṇā manaso dhṛtiḥ //
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśat mātrikaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ pratyāhāraḥ ca rodhanam brahma ātma cintā dhyānam syāt dhāraṇā manasaḥ dhṛtiḥ

original: ahaṃ brahmetyavasthānaṃ samādhirbrahmaṇaḥ sthitiḥ / ahamātmā paraṃ brahma satyaṃ jñānamanantakam //
analyzed: aham brahma iti avasthānam samādhiḥ brahmaṇaḥ sthitiḥ aham ātmā param brahma satyam jñānam anantakam

original: brahma vijñānamānandaḥ sa tattvamasi kevalam / ahaṃ brahmāsmyahaṃ brahma aśarīramānindriyam //
analyzed: brahma vijñānam ānandaḥ sa tat tvam asi kevalam aham brahma asmi aham brahma aśarīram anindriyam

original: ahaṃmanobuddhimahadahaṅkārādivarjitam / jāgratsvapnasuṣuptyādiyuktajyotistadīyakam //
analyzed: aham manaḥ buddhi mahat ahaṅkāra ādi varjitam jāgrat svapna suṣupti ādi yukta jyotiḥ tadīyakam

original: nityaṃ śuddhaṃ buddhamuktaṃ satyamānandamadvayam / yo 'sāvādityapuruṣaḥ so 'sāvahamakhaṇḍitam / iti dhyāyanvimucyet brāhmaṇo bhavabandhanāt //
analyzed: nityam śuddham buddham uktam satyam ānandam advayam  saḥ āditya puruṣaḥ saḥ saḥ aham akhaṇḍitam iti dhyāyan vimucyet brāhmaṇaḥ bhava bandhanāt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe varṇāśramadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonapañcāśattamodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe varṇāśramadharmanirūpaṇam nāma ekonapañcāśattamaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 50
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / ahanyahani yaḥ kuryātkriyāṃ sa jñānamāpnuyāt / brāhme muhūrte cotthāya dharmamarthaṃ ca cintayet //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca ahani ahani yaḥ kuryāt kriyām sa jñānam āpnuyāt brāhme muhūrte ca utthāya dharmam artham ca cintayet

original: cintayeddhṛdi padmasthamānandamajaraṃ harim / uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte kṛtvā cāvaśyakaṃ budhaḥ //
analyzed: cintayet hṛdi padma stham ānandam ajaram harim  uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte kṛtvā ca āvaśyakam budhaḥ

original: strāyānnadīṣu śuddhāsu śaucaṃ kṛtvā yathāvidhi / prataḥ snānena pūyante ye 'pi pāpakṛto janāḥ //
analyzed: strāyāt nadīṣu śuddhāsu śaucam kṛtvā yathāvidhi pratas snānena pūyante ye pi pāpa kṛtaḥ janāḥ

original: tasmātsarvaprayatnena prātaḥ snānaṃ samācaret / prātaḥ snānaṃ praśaṃsanti dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaṣṭakaraṃ hi tat //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena prātar snānam samācaret  prātar snānam praśaṃsanti hi tat

original: sukhātsuptasya satataṃ lālādyāḥ saṃstravanti hi / ato naivācaretkarmāṇyakṛtvā snānamāditaḥ //
analyzed: sukhāt suptasya satatam lālā ādyāḥ saṃstravanti hi atas nā eva ācaret karmāṇi a kṛtvā snānam āditas

original: alakṣmīḥ kālakarṇo ca duḥ svapnaṃ durvicintitam / prataḥ snānena pāpāni dhūyante nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: alakṣmīḥ kālakarṇo ca dus svapnam dus vicintitam  snānena pāpāni dhūyante na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: na ca snānaṃ vinā puṃsāṃ prāśastyaṃ karma saṃsmṛtam / home japye viśeṣeṇa tasmātsnānaṃ samācaret //
analyzed: na ca snānam vinā puṃsām prāśastyam karma saṃsmṛtam home japye viśeṣeṇa tasmāt snānam samācaret

original: aśaktāvaśiraskaṃ tu snānamasya vidhīyate / ārdreṇa vāsasā vāpi mārjanaṃ kāyikaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: aśaktau aśiraskam tu snānam asya vidhīyate  ārdreṇa vāsasā vā api mārjanam kāyikam smṛtam

original: brāhmamāgneyamuddiṣṭaṃ vāyavyaṃ divyameva ca / vāruṇaṃ yaugikaṃ tadvatṣaḍaṅgaṃ snānamācaret //
analyzed: brāhmam āgneyam uddiṣṭam vāyavyam divyam eva ca vāruṇam yaugikam tadvat ṣaṣ aṅgam snānam ācaret

original: brāhmaṃ tu mārjanaṃ mantraiḥ kuśaiḥ sodakabindubhiḥ / āgreyaṃ bhasmanā'pādamastakāddehadhūnanam //
analyzed: brāhmam tu mārjanam mantraiḥ kuśaiḥ sa udaka bindubhiḥ  āgreyam bhasmanā ā pāda mastakāt deha dhūnanam

original: gavāṃ hi rajasā proktaṃ vāyavyaṃ snānamuttamam / yattu sātapavarṣeṇa snānaṃ taddivyamucyate //
analyzed: gavām hi rajasā proktam vāyavyam snānam uttamam yat tu sa ātapa varṣeṇa snānam tat divyam ucyate

original: vāruṇaṃ cāvagāhaṃ ca mānarsa tvātmavedanam / yaugikaṃ snānamākhyātaṃ yogena haricintanam //
analyzed: vāruṇam ca avagāham ca tu ātma vedanam  yaugikam snānam ākhyātam yogena hari cintanam

original: ātmatīrthamiti khyātaṃ sevitaṃ brahmavādibhiḥ / kṣīravṛkṣasamudbhūtaṃ mālatīsambhavaṃ śubham //
analyzed: ātma tīrtham iti khyātam sevitam brahma vādibhiḥ kṣīravṛkṣa samudbhūtam mālatī sambhavam śubham

original: apāmārgaṃ ca vilvaṃ ca karavīraṃ ca dhāvane / udaṅmukhaḥ prāṅmukho vā bhakṣayeddantadhāvanam //
analyzed: apāmārgam ca vilvam ca karavīram ca dhāvane udak mukhaḥ prāc mukhaḥ vā bhakṣayet dantadhāvanam

original: prakṣālya bhuktvā tajjahyācchucau deśe samāhitaḥ / snātvā santarpayeddevānṛṣīnpitṛgaṇāṃstathā //
analyzed: prakṣālya bhuktvā tat jahyāt śucau deśe samāhitaḥ snātvā santarpayet devān ṛṣīn pitṛ gaṇān tathā

original: ācamya vidhivannityaṃ punarācamya vāgyataḥ / saṃmārjya mantrai rātmānaṃ kuśaiḥ sodakabindubhaiḥ //
analyzed: ācamya vidhivat nityam punar ācamya vāgyataḥ saṃmārjya mantraiḥ rātmānam kuśaiḥ sa udaka bindubhaiḥ

original: āpohiṣṭhāvyāhṛtibhiḥ sāvitryā vāruṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ / oṅkāravyāhṛtiyutāṃ gāyattrīṃ vedamātaram //
analyzed: āpohiṣṭhā vyāhṛtibhiḥ sāvitryā vāruṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ  oṅkāra vyāhṛti yutām gāyattrīm vedamātaram

original: japtvā jalāñjaliṃ dadyādbhāraskaraṃ prati tanmanāḥ / prākkūleṣu tataḥ sthitvā darbheṣu susamāhitaḥ //
analyzed: japtvā jala añjalim dadyāt bhāraskaram prati tad manāḥ prāc kūleṣu tatas sthitvā darbheṣu su samāhitaḥ

original: prāṇāyāmaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā dhyāyetsandhyāmiti śrutiḥ / yā sandhyā sā jagatsūtirmāyātītā hi niṣkalā //
analyzed: prāṇāyāmam tatas kṛtvā dhyāyet sandhyām iti śrutiḥ yā sandhyā sā jagat sūtiḥ māyā atītā hi niṣkalā

original: aiśvarī kevalā śaktistattvatrayasamudbhavā / dhyātvā raktāṃ sitāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ gāyattrīṃ vai japedvudhaḥ //
analyzed: aiśvarī kevalā śaktiḥ tattva traya samudbhavā dhyātvā raktām sitām kṛṣṇām gāyattrīm vai japet vudhaḥ

original: prāṅmukhaḥ satataṃ vipraḥ sandhyopāsanamācaret / sandhyāhīno 'śucirnityamanarhaḥ sarvakarmasu //
analyzed: prāc mukhaḥ satatam vipraḥ sandhyā upāsanam ācaret sandhyā hīnaḥ śuciḥ nityam anarhaḥ sarva karmasu

original: yadanyatkurute kiñcinna tasya phalabhāgbhavet / ananyacetasaḥ santo brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ //
analyzed: yat anyat kurute kiñcid na tasya phala bhāj bhavet an anya cetasaḥ santaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ vedapāragāḥ

original: upāsya vidhivatsandhyāṃ prāptāḥ pūrvaparāṃ gatim / yo 'nyatra kurute yatnaṃ dharma kārye dvijottamaḥ //
analyzed: upāsya vidhivat sandhyām prāptāḥ pūrva parām gatim  yaḥ nyatra kurute yatnam dharma kārye dvijottamaḥ

original: vihāya sandhyāpraṇatiṃ sa yāti narakāyutam / tasmātsarvaprayatnena sandhyopāsanamācaret //
analyzed: vihāya sandhyā praṇatim sa yāti naraka ayutam  tasmāt sarva prayatnena sandhyā upāsanam ācaret

original: upāsito bhavettena devo yogatanuḥ paraḥ / sahasraparamāṃ nityāṃ śatamadhyāṃ daśāvarām //
analyzed: upāsitaḥ bhavet tena devaḥ yoga tanuḥ paraḥ sahasra paramām nityām śata madhyām daśa avarām

original: gāyattrīṃ vai japedvidvānprāṅmukhaḥ prayataḥ śuciḥ / athopatiṣṭhedādityamudayasthaṃ samāhitaḥ //
analyzed: gāyattrīm vai japet vidvān prāc mukhaḥ prayataḥ śuciḥ atha upatiṣṭhet ādityam udaya stham samāhitaḥ

original: mantraistu vividhaiḥ sauraiḥ ṛgyajuḥsāmasaṃjñitaiḥ / upasthāya mahāyogaṃ devadevaṃ divākaram //
analyzed: mantraiḥ tu vividhaiḥ sauraiḥ ṛk yajuḥ sāma saṃjñitaiḥ upasthāya mahā yogam devadevam divākaram

original: kurvīta praṇatiṃ bhūmau mūrdhānamabhimantritaḥ / oṃ khakholkāya śāntāya kāraṇatrayahetave //
analyzed: kurvīta praṇatim bhūmau mūrdhānam abhimantritaḥ om khakholkāya śāntāya kāraṇa traya hetave

original: nivedayāmi cātmānaṃ namaste jñānarūpiṇe / tvameva brahma paramamāpo jyotī raso 'mṛtam //
analyzed: nivedayāmi ca ātmānam namaḥ te jñāna rūpiṇe tvam eva brahma paramam āpaḥ jyotiḥ rasaḥ mṛtam

original: bhūrbhuvaḥ svastvamoṅkāraḥ sarvo rudraḥ sanātanaḥ / etadvai sūryahṛdayaṃ japtvā stavanamuttamam //
analyzed: bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar tvam oṅkāraḥ sarvaḥ rudraḥ sanātanaḥ etat vai sūryahṛdayam japtvā stavanam uttamam

original: prātaḥ kāle ca madhyāhne namaskuryāddivākaram / athāgamya gṛhaṃ vipraḥ (paścāt)
analyzed: prātar kāle ca madhyāhne namaskuryāt divākaram atha āgamya gṛham vipraḥ paścāt

original: samācamya yathāvidhi //
analyzed: samācamya yathāvidhi

original: prajvālya vahniṃ vidhivajjuhuyājjātavedasam / ṛtvik putro 'tha patnī vā śiṣyo vāpi sahodaraḥ //
analyzed: prajvālya vahnim vidhivat juhuyāt jātavedasam ṛtvij patnī vā śiṣyaḥ vā api sahodaraḥ

original: prāpyānujñāṃ viśeṣeṇa juhuyādvā yathāvidhi / vinā ma (ta) ntreṇa yatkarma nāmutreha phalapradam //
analyzed: prāpya anujñām viśeṣeṇa juhuyāt vā yathāvidhi vinā ma ta ntreṇa yat karma na amutra iha phala pradam

original: daivatāni namaskuryādupahārānnivedayet / guruṃ caivāpyupāsīta hitaṃ cāsya samācaret //
analyzed: daivatāni namaskuryāt upahārān nivedayet  gurum ca eva api upāsīta hitam ca asya samācaret

original: vedābhyāsaṃ tataḥ kuryātprayatnācchaktito dvijaḥ / japedvādhyāpayecchiṣyāndhārayedvai vicārayet //
analyzed: veda abhyāsam tatas kuryāt prayatnāt śaktitaḥ dvijaḥ japet vā adhyāpayet śiṣyān dhārayet vai vicārayet

original: avekṣeta ca śāstrāṇi dharmādīni dvijottamaḥ / vaidikāṃścaiva nigamānvedāṅgāni ca sarvaśaḥ //
analyzed: avekṣeta ca śāstrāṇi dharma ādīni dvijottamaḥ vaidikān ca eva nigamān vedāṅgāni ca sarvaśas

original: upayādīśvaraṃ caiva yogakṣemaprāsiddhaye / sādhayedvividhānarthānkuṭumbārthaṃ tato dvijaḥ //
analyzed: upayāt īśvaram ca eva yogakṣema prāsiddhaye sādhayet vividhān arthān kuṭumba artham tatas dvijaḥ

original: tato madhyāhnasamaye snānārthaṃ mṛdamāharet / puṣpākṣatāṃstilakuśān gomayaṃ śuddhameva ca //
analyzed: tatas madhyāhna samaye snāna artham mṛdam āharet puṣpa akṣatān tila kuśān gomayam śuddham eva ca

original: nadīṣu devakhāteṣu taḍāgeṣu saraḥ su ca / snānaṃ samācarennaiva parakīye kadācana //
analyzed: nadīṣu devakhāteṣu taḍāgeṣu saraḥ su ca snānam samācaret na eva parakīye kadācana

original: pañca piṇḍānanuddhṛtya snānaṃ duṣyanti nityaśaḥ / mṛdaikayā śiraḥ kṣālyaṃ dvābhyāṃ nābhestathopari //
analyzed: pañca piṇḍān an uddhṛtya snānam duṣyanti nityaśas mṛdā ekayā śiraḥ kṣālyam dvābhyām nābheḥ tathā upari

original: adhaśca tisṛbhiḥ kṣālyaṃ pādau ṣaṭbhistathaiva ca / mṛttikā ca samuddiṣṭā vṛddhāmalakamātnikā //
analyzed: adhas ca tisṛbhiḥ kṣālyam pādau ṣaṭbhiḥ tathā eva ca mṛttikā ca samuddiṣṭā

original: gomayasya pramāṇaṃ tu tenāṅgaṃ lepayettataḥ / prakṣālyācamya vidhivattataḥ snāyātsamāhitaḥ //
analyzed: gomayasya pramāṇam tu tena aṅgam lepayet tatas prakṣālya ācamya vidhivat tatas snāyāt samāhitaḥ

original: lepayitvā tu tīrasthastalliṅgaireva mantrataḥ / abhimantrya jalaṃ mantrairāliṅgairvāruṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ //
analyzed: lepayitvā tu tīra sthaḥ tad liṅgaiḥ eva mantrataḥ abhimantrya jalam mantraiḥ āliṅgaiḥ vāruṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ

original: tnānakāle smaredviṣṇamāpo nārāyaṇo yataḥ / prekṣya oṅkāramādityaṃ trirnimajjejjalāśaye //
analyzed: smaret viṣṇam āpaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ yatas prekṣya oṅkāram ādityam tris nimajjet jalāśaye

original: ācāntaḥ punarācāmenmantreṇānena mantravit / antaścarasi bhūteṣu guhāyāṃ viśvatomukhaḥ //
analyzed: ācāntaḥ punar ācāmet mantreṇa anena mantra vid  antar carasi bhūteṣu guhāyām viśvatomukhaḥ

original: tvaṃ yajñastvaṃ vaṣaṭkāra āpo jyotī raso 'mṛtam / drupadāṃ vā trirabhyasyevdyāhṛtipraṇavānvitām //
analyzed: tvam yajñaḥ tvam vaṣaṭkāraḥ āpaḥ jyotiḥ rasaḥ mṛtam drupadām vā tris abhyasyet dyāhṛti praṇava anvitām

original: sāvitrīṃ vā jape dvidvāṃstathā caivāghamarṣaṇam / tataḥ saṃmārjanaṃ kuryādāpohiṣṭhāmayobhuvaḥ //
analyzed: sāvitrīm vā jape dvidvān tathā ca eva aghamarṣaṇam tatas saṃmārjanam kuryāt āpohiṣṭhā mayobhuvaḥ

original: idamāpaḥ pravahatavyāhṛtibhistathaiva ca / tato 'bhimantritaṃ topamāpo hiṣṭhādimantrakaiḥ //
analyzed: idam apaḥ pravahata vyāhṛtibhiḥ tathā eva ca tatas hi ṣṭhā ādi mantrakaiḥ

original: antarjalamavāṅmagno japettriraghamarṣaṇam / drupadāṃ vātha sāvitrariṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam //
analyzed: antar jalam avāk magnaḥ japet tris aghamarṣaṇam drupadām vā atha sāvitrarim tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam

original: āvartayedvā praṇavaṃ devadevaṃ ramareddharim / apaḥ pāṇau samādāya japtvā vai mārjane kṛte //
analyzed: āvartayet vā praṇavam devadevam ramaret harim apaḥ pāṇau samādāya japtvā vai mārjane kṛte

original: vinyasya mūrdhni tattoyaṃ mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ / sandhyāmupāsya cācamya saṃsmarennityamīśvaram //
analyzed: vinyasya mūrdhni tat toyam mucyate sarva pātakaiḥ sandhyām upāsya ca ācamya saṃsmaret nityam īśvaram

original: athopatiṣṭhedādityamūrdhvapuṣpānvitāñjalim / prakṣipyālokayeddevamudayantaṃ na śakyate //
analyzed: atha upatiṣṭhet ādityam ūrdhva puṣpa anvita añjalim prakṣipya ālokayet devam udayantam na śakyate

original: udutyaṃ citramityevaṃ taccakṣuriti mantrataḥ / haṃsaḥ śuciṣadetena sāvitryā ca viśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: udutyam citram iti evam tat cakṣuḥ iti mantrataḥ haṃsaḥ śuciṣad etena sāvitryā ca viśeṣataḥ

original: anyaiḥ saurairvaidikaiśca gāyattrīṃ ca tato japet / mantrāṃśca vividhānpaścātprākkūle ca kaśāsane //
analyzed: anyaiḥ sauraiḥ vaidikaiḥ ca gāyattrīm ca tatas japet mantrān ca vividhān paścāt prāc kūle ca

original: tiṣṭhaṃśca vīkṣyamāṇor'kaṃ japaṃ kuryātsamāhitaḥ / sphaṭikābjākṣarudrākṣaiḥ putrajīvasamudbhavaiḥ //
analyzed: tiṣṭhan ca vīkṣyamāṇa ūrkam japam kuryāt samāhitaḥ sphaṭika abja akṣa rudrākṣaiḥ putrajīva samudbhavaiḥ

original: kartavyā tvakṣālā syādantarā tatra sā smṛtā / yadi syātklinnavāsā vai vārimadhyagataścaret //
analyzed: kartavyā syāt antarā tatra sā smṛtā yadi syāt klinna vāsāḥ vai vāri madhya gataḥ caret

original: anyathā ca śucau bhūmyāṃ darbheṣu ca samāhitaḥ / pradakṣiṇaṃ samāvṛtya namaskṛtya tataḥ kṣitau //
analyzed: anyathā ca śucau bhūmyām darbheṣu ca samāhitaḥ pradakṣiṇam samāvṛtya namaskṛtya tatas kṣitau

original: ācamya ca yathāśāstraṃ śaktyā svādhyāyamācaret / tataḥ santarpayeddevānṛṣīnpitṛgaṇāṃstathā //
analyzed: ācamya ca yathāśāstram śaktyā svādhyāyam ācaret tatas santarpayet devān ṛṣīn pitṛ gaṇān tathā

original: ādāvoṅkāramuccārya namo 'nte tarpayāmi ca / devānbrahmaṛṣīṃścaiva tarpayedakṣatodakaiḥ //
analyzed: ādau oṅkāram uccārya namaḥ nte tarpayāmi ca devān brahma ṛṣīn ca eva tarpayet akṣata udakaiḥ

original: pitṝndevānmunīn bhaktyā svasūtroktavidhānataḥ //
analyzed: pitṝn devān munīn bhaktyā sva sūtra ukta vidhānataḥ

original: devarṣoṃstarpayeddhīmānudakāñjalibhiḥ pitṝt / yajñopavītī devānāṃ nivītī ṛṣitarpaṇe //
analyzed: deva ṛṣīn tarpayet dhīmān udaka añjalibhiḥ yajña upavītī devānām nivītī ṛṣi tarpaṇe

original: prācīnāvītī pitrye tu tena tīrthena bhārata / niṣpīḍya snānavastraṃ vai samācamya ca vāgyataḥ //
analyzed: prācīnāvītī pitrye tu tena tīrthena bhārata niṣpīḍya snāna vastram vai samācamya ca vāgyataḥ

original: svairmantrairarcayeddevānpuṣpaiḥ patraistathāmbubhiḥ / brahmāṇaṃ śaṅkaraṃ sūryaṃ tathaiva madhusūdanam //
analyzed: svaiḥ mantraiḥ arcayet devān puṣpaiḥ patraiḥ tathā ambubhiḥ brahmāṇam śaṅkaram sūryam tathā eva madhusūdanam

original: anyāṃścābhimatāndevān bhaktyā cākrodhano hara / / pradadyādvātha puṣpādi sūktena puruṣeṇa tu //
analyzed: anyān ca abhimatān devān bhaktyā ca akrodhanaḥ hara   pradadyāt vā atha puṣpa ādi sūktena puruṣeṇa tu

original: āpo vā devatāḥ sarvāstena samyak samarcitāḥ / dhyātvā praṇavapūrvaṃ vai devaṃ vārisamāhitaḥ //
analyzed: āpaḥ vā devatāḥ sarvāḥ tena samyak samarcitāḥ dhyātvā praṇava pūrvam vai devam vāri samāhitaḥ

original: namaskāreṇa puṣāpāṇi vinyasedvai pṛthakpṛthak / narte hyārādhanātpuṇyaṃ vidyate karma vaidikam //
analyzed: namaskāreṇa puṣā pāṇi vinyaset vai pṛthak pṛthak na ṛte hi ārādhanāt puṇyam vidyate karma vaidikam

original: tasmāttatrādimadhyānte cetasā dhārayeddharim / tadviṣṇoriti mantreṇa sūktena puruṣeṇa tu //
analyzed: tasmāt tatra ādi madhya ante cetasā dhārayet harim tat viṣṇoḥ iti mantreṇa sūktena puruṣeṇa tu

original: nivedayecca ātmānaṃ viṣṇave 'malatejase / tadādhyātmamanāḥ śāntastadviṣṇoriti mantrataḥ //
analyzed: nivedayet ca ātmānam viṣṇave mala tejase tadā adhyātma manāḥ śāntaḥ tat viṣṇoḥ iti mantrataḥ

original: aprete saśirā vetiyajetvā puṣpake harim / devayajñaṃ pitṛyajñaṃ tathaiva ca / mānuṣaṃ brahmayajñaṃ ca pañca yajñānsamācaret //
analyzed: aprete sa śirāḥ vā iti yajet vā puṣpake harim devayajñam pitṛyajñam tathā eva ca mānuṣam brahmayajñam ca pañca yajñān samācaret

original: yadi syāttarpaṇādarvāgbrayajñaṃ kuto bhavet / kṛtvā manuṣyayajñaṃ vai tataḥ svādhyāyamācaret //
analyzed: yadi syāt tarpaṇāt arvāk brahma yajñam kutas bhavet kṛtvā manuṣyayajñam vai tatas svādhyāyam ācaret

original: vaiśvadevastu kartavyo devayajñaḥ sa tu smṛtaḥ / bhūtayajñaḥṛ sa vai jñeyo bhūtebhyo yastvayaṃ baliḥ //
analyzed: vaiśvadevaḥ tu kartavyaḥ deva yajñaḥ sa tu smṛtaḥ bhūtayajñaḥ sa vai jñeyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ yaḥ tu ayam baliḥ

original: śvabhyaśca śvapacebhyaśca patitādibhya eva ca / dadyādbhūmau bahistvannaṃ pakṣibhyaśca dvijottamaḥ //
analyzed: śvabhyaḥ ca śvapacebhyaḥ ca patita ādibhyaḥ eva ca  dadyāt bhūmau bahis tu annam pakṣibhyaḥ ca dvijottamaḥ

original: ekaṃ tu bhojayedvipraṃ pitṝnuddiśya sattamāḥ / nityaśrāddhaṃ taduddiśya pitṛyajño gatipradaḥ //
analyzed: ekam tu bhojayet vipram pitṝn uddiśya sattamāḥ nitya śrāddham tat uddiśya pitṛ yajñaḥ gati pradaḥ

original: uddhṛtya vā yathāśakti kiñcidannaṃ samāhitaḥ / vedatattvārthaviduṣe dvijāyaivopapādayet //
analyzed: uddhṛtya vā yathāśakti kiñcid annam samāhitaḥ veda tattva artha viduṣe dvijāya eva upapādayet

original: pūjayedatithiṃ nityaṃ namasyedarcayoddvijam / manovākkarmabhiḥ śāntaṃ svāgataiḥ svagṛhaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: pūjayet atithim nityam namasyet arcayot dvijam manaḥ vāc karmabhiḥ śāntam svāgataiḥ sva gṛham tatas

original: bhikṣāmāhurgrāsamātramannaṃ tatsyāccaturguṇam / puṣkalaṃ hantakāraṃ tu taccaturguṇamucyate //
analyzed: bhikṣām āhuḥ grāsa mātram annam tat syāt caturguṇam puṣkalam hantakāram tu tat caturguṇam ucyate

original: godohamātrakālaṃ vai pratīkṣyo hyatithiḥ svayam / abhyāgatānyathāśakti pūjayedatithiṃ tathā //
analyzed: godoha mātra kālam vai pratīkṣyaḥ hi atithiḥ svayam abhyāgatān yathāśakti pūjayet atithim tathā

original: bhikṣāṃ vai bhikṣave dadyādvidhivadbrahyacāriṇe / dadyādannaṃ yathāśakti arthibhyo lobhavarjitaḥ //
analyzed: bhikṣām vai bhikṣave dadyāt vidhivat brahyacāriṇe dadyāt annam yathāśakti arthibhyaḥ lobha varjitaḥ

original: bhuñjati bandhubhiḥ sārdhaṃ vāgyato 'nnamakutsayan / akṛtvā tu dvijaḥ pañca mahāyajñān dvijottamaḥ //
analyzed: bhuñjati bandhubhiḥ sārdham vāgyataḥ nnam akutsayan  a kṛtvā tu dvijaḥ pañca mahāyajñān dvijottamaḥ

original: bhuñjate cetsa mūḍhātmā tiryagyoniṃ ca gacchati / vedābhyāso 'nvahaṃ śaktyā mahāyajñakriyākṣamāḥ //
analyzed: bhuñjate ced sa mūḍha ātmā tiryagyonim ca gacchati veda abhyāsaḥ nu aham śaktyā mahāyajña kriyā kṣamāḥ

original: nāśayantyāśu pāpāni devānāmarcanaṃ tathā / yo mohādatha vālasyādakṛtvā devatārcanam //
analyzed: nāśayanti āśu pāpāni devānām arcanam tathā yaḥ mohāt atha vā ālasyāt a kṛtvā devatā arcanam

original: bhuṅkte sa yāti narakāntsūṃkareṣveva jāyate / aśaucaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi aśuciḥ pātakī sadā //
analyzed: bhuṅkte sa yāti narakān sūṃkareṣu eva jāyate aśaucam saṃpravakṣyāmi aśuciḥ pātakī sadā

original: aśaucaṃ caiva saṃsargācchuddhiḥ saṃsargavarjanāt / daśāhaṃ prāhurāśaucaṃ sarveviprā vipaścitaḥ //
analyzed: aśaucam ca eva saṃsargāt śuddhiḥ saṃsarga varjanāt daśa aham prāhuḥ āśaucam sarve viprāḥ vipaścitaḥ

original: mṛteṣu vātha jāteṣu brāhmaṇānāṃ dvijottama / ādantajananāt sadya ācūḍādekarātrakam //
analyzed: mṛteṣu vā atha jāteṣu brāhmaṇānām dvijottama ā danta jananāt sadyas ācūḍāt eka rātrakam

original: trirātramaupanayanāddaśarātramataḥ param / kṣattriyo dvādaśahena daśabhiḥ pañcabhirviśaḥ //
analyzed: tri rātram aupanayanāt daśa rātram atas param kṣattriyaḥ dvādaśahena daśabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ viśaḥ

original: śudhyenmāsena vai śūdro yatīnāṃ nāsti pātakam / rātribhirmāsatulyābhirgarbhastrāveṣu śaucakam //
analyzed: śudhyet māsena vai śūdraḥ yatīnām na asti pātakam rātribhiḥ māsa tulyābhiḥ garbha strāveṣu śaucakam

original: iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nityakarmāśaucayornirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nityakarmāśaucayornirūpaṇam nāma pañcāśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 51
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi dānadharmamanuttamam / arthānāmucite pātre śraddhayā pratipādanam //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca atha atas saṃpravakṣyāmi dāna dharmam anuttamam arthānām ucite pātre śraddhayā pratipādanam

original: dānaṃ tu kathitaṃ tajjñairbhuktimuktiphalapradam / nyāyenopārjayedvittaṃ dānabhogaphalaṃ ca tat //
analyzed: dānam tu kathitam tad jñaiḥ bhukti mukti phala pradam  nyāyena upārjayet vittam dāna bhoga phalam ca tat

original: adhyāpanaṃ yājanaṃ ca vṛttamāhuḥ pratigraham / kusīdaṃ kṛṣivāṇijyaṃ kṣattravṛtto 'tha varjayet //
analyzed: adhyāpanam yājanam ca vṛttam āhuḥ pratigraham kusīdam kṛṣi vāṇijyam varjayet

original: yaddīyate tu pātrebhyastaddānaṃ parikīrtitam / nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ vimalaṃ dānamīritam //
analyzed: yat dīyate tu pātrebhyaḥ tat dānam parikīrtitam nityam naimittikam kāmyam vimalam dānam īritam

original: ahanyahani yatkiñciddīyate 'nupakāriṇe / anuddiśya phalaṃ tasmādbrāhmaṇāya tu nityaśaḥ //
analyzed: ahani ahani yat kiñcid dīyate n upakāriṇe an uddiśya phalam tasmāt brāhmaṇāya tu nityaśas

original: yattu pāpopaśāntyai ca dīyate vidupāṃ kare / naimittikaṃ taduddiṣṭandānaṃ sadbhiranuṣṭhitam //
analyzed: yat tu pāpa upaśāntyai ca dīyate vidupām kare naimittikam tat uddiṣṭan dānam sadbhiḥ anuṣṭhitam

original: apatyavijayaiśvaryasvargārthaṃ yatpradīyate / dānaṃ tatkāmyamākhyātamṛṣibhirdharmācintakaiḥ //
analyzed: apatya vijaya aiśvarya svarga artham yat pradīyate dānam tat kāmyam ākhyātam ṛṣibhiḥ dharma acintakaiḥ

original: īśvaraprīṇanārthāya brahmāvitsupradīyate / cetasā sattvayuktena dānaṃ tadvimalaṃ śivam //
analyzed: īśvara prīṇana arthāya brahmā vid su pradīyate cetasā sattva yuktena dānam tat vimalam śivam

original: ikṣubhiḥ santatāṃ bhumiṃ yavagodhūmaśālinīm / dadāti vedaviduṣe sa na bhūyo 'bhijāyate //
analyzed: ikṣubhiḥ santatām bhumim yava godhūma śālinīm  dadāti veda viduṣe sa na bhūyas bhijāyate

original: bhūmidānātparaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati / vidyāṃ dattvā brāhmaṇāya brahmaloke mahīyate //
analyzed: bhūmi dānāt param dānam na bhūtam na bhaviṣyati vidyām dattvā brāhmaṇāya brahma loke mahīyate

original: dadyādaharahastāstu śraddhayā brahmacāriṇe / sarvapāpavinirmukto brahmasthānamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: dadyāt aharahar tāḥ tu śraddhayā brahmacāriṇe sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ brahma sthānam avāpnuyāt

original: vaiśākhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ tu brāhmaṇānsapta pañca ca / upoṣyābhyarcayedvidvānmadhunā tilasarpiṣā //
analyzed: vaiśākhyām paurṇamāsyām tu brāhmaṇān sapta pañca ca  upoṣya abhyarcayet vidvān madhunā tila sarpiṣā

original: gandhādibhiḥ samabhyarcya vācayedvā svayaṃ vadet / prīyatāṃ dharmarājeti yathā manasi vartate //
analyzed: gandha ādibhiḥ samabhyarcya vācayet vā svayam vadet prīyatām dharmarājā iti yathā manasi vartate

original: yāvajjīvaṃ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tatkṣaṇādeva naśyati / kṛṣṇājine tilānkṛtvā hiraṇyamadhusarpiṣā //
analyzed: yāvajjīvam kṛtam pāpam tat kṣaṇāt eva naśyati kṛṣṇājine tilān kṛtvā hiraṇya madhu sarpiṣā

original: dadāti yastu viprāya sarvaṃ tarati duṣkṛtam / ghṛtānnamudakaṃ caiva vaiśākhyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: dadāti yaḥ tu viprāya sarvam tarati duṣkṛtam  ghṛta annam udakam ca eva vaiśākhyām ca viśeṣataḥ

original: nirdiśya dharmarājāya viprebhyo mucyate bhayāt / dvādaśyāmarcayedviṣṇumupoṣyāghapraṇāśanam //
analyzed: nirdiśya dharmarājāya viprebhyaḥ mucyate bhayāt  dvādaśyām arcayet viṣṇum upoṣya agha praṇāśanam

original: sarvapāpavinirmukto naro bhavati niścitam / yo hi yāṃ devatāmicchetsamārādhayituṃ naraḥ //
analyzed: sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ naraḥ bhavati niścitam yaḥ hi yām devatām icchet samārādhayitum naraḥ

original: brāhmaṇānpūjayeddatnādbhojayedyoṣitaḥ surān / santānakāmaḥ satataṃ pūjayedvai purandaram //
analyzed: brāhmaṇān pūjayet datnāt bhojayet yoṣitaḥ surān santāna kāmaḥ satatam pūjayet vai purandaram

original: brahmavarcasakāmastu brāhmaṇānbrahmaniścayāt / ārogyakāmo 'tha raviṃ dhanakāmo hutāśanam //
analyzed: brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ tu brāhmaṇān brahma niścayāt  ārogya kāmaḥ tha ravim dhana kāmaḥ hutāśanam

original: karmaṇāṃ siddhikāmastu pūjayedvai vināyakam / bhogakāmo hi śaśinaṃ balakāmaḥ samīraṇam //
analyzed: karmaṇām siddhi kāmaḥ tu pūjayet vai vināyakam  bhoga kāmaḥ hi śaśinam bala kāmaḥ samīraṇam

original: mumukṣuḥ sarvasaṃsārātprayatnenārcayeddharim / akāmaḥ sarvakāmo vā pūjayettu gadādharam //
analyzed: mumukṣuḥ sarva saṃsārāt prayatnena arcayet harim akāmaḥ sarva kāmaḥ vā pūjayet tu gadādharam

original: vāridastṛptimāpnoti sukhamakṣayyamannadaḥ / tilapradaḥ prajāmiṣṭāṃ dīpadaścakṣuruttamam //
analyzed: vāri daḥ tṛptim āpnoti sukham akṣayyam anna daḥ tila pradaḥ prajām iṣṭām dīpa daḥ cakṣuḥ uttamam

original: bhūmidaḥ sarvamāpnoti dīrghamāyurhiraṇyadaḥ / gṛhado 'gryāṇi veśmāni rūpyado rūpamuttamam //
analyzed: bhūmi daḥ sarvam āpnoti dīrgham āyuḥ hiraṇya daḥ gṛha daḥ gryāṇi veśmāni rūpya daḥ rūpam uttamam

original: vāsodaścāndrasālokyamaśvisālokyamaśvadaḥ / anaḍuddaḥ śriyaṃ puṣṭāṃ godo bradhnasya viṣṭapam //
analyzed: vāsaḥ daḥ cāndra sālokyam aśvi sālokyam aśva daḥ anaḍuh daḥ śriyam puṣṭām go daḥ bradhnasya viṣṭapam

original: yānaśayyāprado bhāryāmaiśvaryamabhayapradaḥ / dhānyadaḥ śāvataṃ saukhyaṃ brahmado brahma śāśvatam //
analyzed: yāna śayyā pradaḥ bhāryām aiśvaryam abhaya pradaḥ dhānya daḥ śāvatam saukhyam brahma daḥ brahma śāśvatam

original: vedavitsu dadajjñānaṃ svargaloke mahīyate / gavāṃ ghāsapradānena sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate //
analyzed: veda vitsu dadat jñānam svarga loke mahīyate  gavām ghāsa pradānena sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: indhanānāṃ pradānena dīptāgnirjāyate naraḥ / auṣadhaṃ snehamāhāraṃ rogirogapraśāntaye //
analyzed: indhanānām pradānena dīpta agniḥ jāyate naraḥ auṣadham sneham āhāram rogi roga praśāntaye

original: dadāno rogarahitaḥ sukhī dīrghāyureva ca / asipatravanaṃ mārgaṃ kṣuradhārāsamanvitam //
analyzed: dadānaḥ roga rahitaḥ sukhī dīrgha āyuḥ eva ca asipatravanam mārgam kṣura dhārā samanvitam

original: tīkṣṇā tapaṃ ca taraticchatropānatprado naraḥ / yadyadiṣṭatamaṃ loke yaccāsya dayitaṃ gṛhe //
analyzed: tīkṣṇā tapam ca tarati chatra upānah pradaḥ naraḥ yat yat iṣṭatamam loke yat ca asya dayitam gṛhe

original: tattadguṇavate deyaṃ tadevākṣayamicchatā / ayena viṣuve caiva grahaṇe candrasūryayoḥ //
analyzed: tat tat guṇavate deyam tat eva akṣayam icchatā ayena viṣuve ca eva grahaṇe candra sūryayoḥ

original: saṃkrāntyādiṣu kāleṣu dattaṃ bhavati cākṣayam / prayāgādiṣu tīrtheṣu gayāyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: saṃkrānti ādiṣu kāleṣu dattam bhavati ca akṣayam prayāga ādiṣu tīrtheṣu gayāyām ca viśeṣataḥ

original: dānadharmātparo dharmo bhūtānāṃ nahe vidyate / svargāyurbhūtikāmena dānaṃ pāpopaśāntaye //
analyzed: dāna dharmāt paraḥ dharmaḥ bhūtānām na he vidyate svarga āyuḥ bhūti kāmena dānam pāpa upaśāntaye

original: dīyamānaṃ tu yo mohādgoviprāgnisureṣu ca / nivārayati pāpātmā tiryagyoniṃ vrajennaraḥ //
analyzed: dīyamānam tu yaḥ mohāt go vipra agni sureṣu ca  nivārayati pāpa ātmā tiryagyonim vrajet naraḥ

original: yastu durbhikṣavelāyāmannādyaṃ na prayacchati / mriyamāṇeṣu vipreṣu brahmahā sa tu garhitaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ tu durbhikṣa velāyām annādyam na prayacchati mriyamāṇeṣu vipreṣu brahma hā sa tu garhitaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dānadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe dānadharmanirūpaṇam nāma ekapañcāśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 52
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi prāyaścittavidhiṃ dvijāḥ / brahmahā ca surāpaśca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca atas param pravakṣyāmi prāyaścitta vidhim dvijāḥ brahma hā ca surāpaḥ ca steyī ca gurutalpa gaḥ

original: pañca pātakinastvete tatsaṃyogī ca pañcamaḥ / upapāpāni gohatyāprabhṛtīni surā jaguḥ //
analyzed: pañca pātakinaḥ tu ete tad saṃyogī ca pañcamaḥ upapāpāni gohatyā prabhṛtīni surāḥ jaguḥ

original: brahmahā dvādaśābdāni kuṭīṃ kṛtvā vane vaset / kuryādanaśanaṃ vātha bhṛgoḥ patanameva ca //
analyzed: brahma hā dvādaśa abdāni kuṭīm kṛtvā vane vaset  kuryāt anaśanam vā atha bhṛgoḥ patanam eva ca

original: jvalantaṃ vā viśedagniṃ jalaṃ vā praviśetsvayam / brāhmaṇārthe gavārthe vā samyak prāṇānparityajet //
analyzed: jvalantam vā viśet agnim jalam vā praviśet svayam brāhmaṇa arthe gavā arthe vā samyak prāṇān parityajet

original: dattvā cānnaṃ ca viduṣe brahmahatyāṃ vyapohati / aśvamedhāvabhṛthake snātvā vā mucyate dvijaḥ //
analyzed: dattvā ca annam ca viduṣe brahma hatyām vyapohati aśvamedha avabhṛthake snātvā vā mucyate dvijaḥ

original: sarvasvaṃ vā vedavide brāhmaṇāya pradāpayet / sarasvatyāstaraṅgiṇyāḥ saṅgame lokaviśrute //
analyzed: sarva svam vā veda vide brāhmaṇāya pradāpayet sarasvatyāḥ taraṅgiṇyāḥ saṅgame loka viśrute

original: śuddhe triṣavaṇasnātastrirātropoṣito dvijaḥ / setubandhe naraḥ snātvā mucyate brahmahatyayā //
analyzed: śuddhe triṣavaṇa snātaḥ tri rātra upoṣitaḥ dvijaḥ setubandhe naraḥ snātvā mucyate brahma hatyayā

original: kapālamocane snātvā vārāṇasyāṃ tathaiva ca / surāpastu surāṃ pītvā agnivarṇāṃ dvijottamaḥ //
analyzed: kapālamocane snātvā vārāṇasyām tathā eva ca surāpaḥ tu surām pītvā agni varṇām dvijottamaḥ

original: payo ghṛtaṃ vā gomūtraṃ tasmātpāpātpramucyate / suvarṇasteyī muktaḥ syānmusalena hato nṛpaiḥ //
analyzed: payaḥ ghṛtam vā go mūtram tasmāt pāpāt pramucyate suvarṇa steyī muktaḥ syāt musalena hataḥ nṛpaiḥ

original: cīravāsā dvijo 'raṇye caredbrahmahaṇavratam / gurubhāryāṃ samāruhya brāhmaṇaḥ kāmamohitaḥ //
analyzed: cīra vāsāḥ dvijaḥ raṇye caret brahma haṇa vratam guru bhāryām samāruhya brāhmaṇaḥ kāma mohitaḥ

original: avagūhetstriyaṃ taptāṃ dīptāṃ kārṣṇāyasīṃ kṛtām / gurvaṅganāgāminaśca careyurbahmahavratam //
analyzed: avagūhet striyam taptām dīptām kārṣṇāyasīm kṛtām guru aṅganā gāminaḥ ca careyuḥ bahma ha vratam

original: cāndrāyaṇāni vā kuryātpañca catvāri vā punaḥ / patitena ca saṃsargaṃ kurute yastu vai dvijaḥ //
analyzed: cāndrāyaṇāni vā kuryāt pañca catvāri vā punar patitena ca saṃsargam kurute yaḥ tu vai dvijaḥ

original: sa tatpāpāpanodārthaṃ tasyaiva vratamācaret / taptakṛcchraṃ caredvātha saṃvatsaramatandritaḥ //
analyzed: sa tad pāpa apanoda artham tasya eva vratam ācaret taptakṛcchram caret vā atha saṃvatsaram atandritaḥ

original: sarvasvadānaṃ vidhivatsarvapāpaviśodhanam / cāndrāyaṇaṃ ca vidhinā kṛtaṃ caivātikṛcchrakam //
analyzed: sarva sva dānam vidhivat sarva pāpa viśodhanam cāndrāyaṇam ca vidhinā kṛtam ca eva atikṛcchrakam

original: puṇyakṣetre gayādau ca gamanaṃ pāpanāśanam / amāvasyāṃ tithiṃ prāpya yaḥ samārādhayedbhavam //
analyzed: puṇya kṣetre gayā ādau ca gamanam pāpa nāśanam amāvasyām tithim prāpya yaḥ samārādhayet bhavam

original: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate / upoṣitaścaturdaśyāṃ kṛṣṇapakṣe samāhitaḥ //
analyzed: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate  upoṣitaḥ caturdaśyām kṛṣṇa pakṣe samāhitaḥ

original: yamāya dharmarājāya mṛtyave cāntakāya ca / vaivasvatāya kālāya sarvabhūtakṣayāya ca //
analyzed: yamāya dharmarājāya mṛtyave ca antakāya ca vaivasvatāya kālāya sarva bhūta kṣayāya ca

original: pratyekaṃ tilasaṃyuktāndadyātsapta jalāñjalīn / snātvā nadyāṃ tu pūrvāhne mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ //
analyzed: pratyekam tila saṃyuktān dadyāt sapta jala añjalīn snātvā nadyām tu pūrvāhne mucyate sarva pātakaiḥ

original: brahmacaryamadhaḥ śayyāmupavāsaṃ dvijārcanam / vrateṣveteṣu kurvīta śāntaḥ saṃyatamānasaḥ //
analyzed: brahmacaryam adhas śayyām upavāsam dvija arcanam vrateṣu eteṣu kurvīta śāntaḥ saṃyata mānasaḥ

original: paṣṭhyāmupoṣito devaṃ śuklapakṣe samāhitaḥ / saptamyāmarcayedbhānuṃ mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ //
analyzed: paṣṭhyām upoṣitaḥ devam śukla pakṣe samāhitaḥ saptamyām arcayet bhānum mucyate sarva pātakaiḥ

original: ekādaśyāṃ nirāhāraḥ samabhyarcya janārdanam / dvādaśyāṃ śuklapakṣasya mahāpāpaiḥ pramucyate //
analyzed: ekādaśyām nirāhāraḥ samabhyarcya janārdanam  dvādaśyām śukla pakṣasya mahā pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: tapo japastīrthasevā devabrāhmaṇapūjanam / grahaṇādiṣu kāleṣu mahāpātakanāśanam //
analyzed: tapaḥ japaḥ tīrtha sevā deva brāhmaṇa pūjanam grahaṇa ādiṣu kāleṣu mahāpātaka nāśanam

original: yaḥ sarvapāpayukto 'pi puṇyatīrtheṣu mānavaḥ / niyamena tyajetprāṇānmucyate sarvapātakaiḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ puṇya tīrtheṣu mānavaḥ niyamena tyajet prāṇān mucyate sarva pātakaiḥ

original: brahmaghnaṃ vā kṛtaghnaṃ vā mahāpātakadūṣitam / bhartāramuddharennārī praviṣṭā saha pāvakam //
analyzed: brahma ghnam vā kṛtaghnam vā mahāpātaka dūṣitam  bhartāram uddharet nārī praviṣṭā saha pāvakam

original: pativratā tu yā nārī bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇotsukā / na tasyā vidyate pāpamiha loke paratra ca //
analyzed: pativratā tu yā nārī bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇa utsukā na tasyāḥ vidyate pāpam iha loke paratra ca

original: tathā rāmasya subhagā sītā trailokyaviśrutā / patnī dāśaratherdevī vijigye rākṣaseśvaram //
analyzed: tathā rāmasya subhagā sītā trailokya viśrutā patnī dāśaratheḥ devī vijigye rākṣaseśvaram

original: phalgutīrthādiṣu snātaḥ sarvācāraphalaṃ labhet / ityāha bhagavānviṣṇuḥ purā mama yatavratāḥ //
analyzed: phalgutīrtha ādiṣu snātaḥ sarva ācāra phalam labhet iti āha bhagavān viṣṇuḥ purā mama yata vratāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prāyaścittanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvipañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe prāyaścittanirūpaṇam nāma dvipañcāśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 53
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / evaṃ brahmābravīcchrutvā hareraṣṭanidhīṃstathā / tatra padmamahāpadmau tathā makarakacchapau //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca  evam brahmā abravīt śrutvā hareḥ aṣṭa nidhīn tathā tatra padma mahāpadmau tathā makara kacchapau

original: mukundaku(na)
analyzed: mukundakuna

original: ndau nīlaśca śaṅkhaścaivāparo nidhiḥ / satyāmṛddhau bhavantyete svarūpaṃ kathayāmyaham //
analyzed: nīlaḥ ca śaṅkhaḥ ca eva aparaḥ nidhiḥ satyām ṛddhau bhavanti ete svarūpam kathayāmi aham

original: padmena lakṣitaścaiva sāttviko jāyate naraḥ / dākṣiṇyasāraḥ puruṣaḥ suvarṇādikasaṃgraham //
analyzed: padmena lakṣitaḥ ca eva sāttvikaḥ jāyate naraḥ dākṣiṇya sāraḥ puruṣaḥ suvarṇa ādika saṃgraham

original: rupyādi kuryāddadyāttu yatidaivādiyajvanām / mahāpadmāṅkito dadyāddhanādyaṃ dhārmikāya ca //
analyzed: rupya ādi kuryāt dadyāt tu yati daiva ādi yajvanām mahāpadma aṅkitaḥ dadyāt dhana ādyam dhārmikāya ca

original: nīdhī padmamahāpadmau sāttvikau puruṣau smṛtī / makareṇāṅkitaḥ khaḍgabāṇakuntādisaṃgrahī //
analyzed: padma mahāpadmau sāttvikau puruṣau smṛtī makareṇa aṅkitaḥ khaḍga bāṇa kunta ādi saṃgrahī

original: dadyācchrutāya maitrīṃ ca yāti nityaṃ ca rājabhiḥ / dravyārthaṃ śatruṇā nāśaṃ saṃgrāme cāpi saṃvrajet //
analyzed: dadyāt śrutāya maitrīm ca yāti nityam ca rājabhiḥ  dravya artham śatruṇā nāśam saṃgrāme ca api saṃvrajet

original: makaraḥ kacchapaścaiva tāmasau tu nidhī smṛtau / kacchapī viśvasennaiva na bhuṅkena (nā)
analyzed: makaraḥ kacchapaḥ ca eva tāmasau tu nidhī smṛtau kacchapī viśvaset nā eva na nā

original: dadāti ca //
analyzed: dadāti ca

original: nidhānamurvyāṃ kurute nidhiḥ sopyekapūruṣaḥ / rājasenamukundena lakṣitā rājyasaṃgrahī //
analyzed: nidhānam urvyām kurute nidhiḥ saḥ api eka pūruṣaḥ rājasena mukundena lakṣitā rājya saṃgrahī

original: bhuktabhogo gāyanebhyo dadyādveśyādikāsu ca / rajastamomayo nandī ādhāraḥ syātkulasya ca //
analyzed: bhukta bhogaḥ gāyanebhyaḥ dadyāt veśyā ādikāsu ca  rajaḥ tamaḥ mayaḥ nandī ādhāraḥ syāt kulasya ca

original: stutaḥ prīto bhavati vai bahubhāryā bhavanti ca / pūrvamitreṣu śaithilyaṃ prītimanyaiḥ karoti ca //
analyzed: stutaḥ prītaḥ bhavati vai bahu bhāryāḥ bhavanti ca pūrva mitreṣu śaithilyam prītim anyaiḥ karoti ca

original: nīlana cāṅkitaḥ sattvatejasā saṃyuto bhavet / vastradhānyādisaṃgrāhī taḍāgādi karoti ca //
analyzed: ca aṅkitaḥ sattva tejasā saṃyutaḥ bhavet vastra dhānya ādi saṃgrāhī taḍāga ādi karoti ca

original: tripū(pau) ruṣo nidhiścaiva āmrārāmādi kārayet / ekasya syānnidhiḥ śaṅkhaḥ svayaṃ bhuṅkte dhanādi(nta)kam //
analyzed: tri pūpau ruṣaḥ nidhiḥ ca eva āmra ārāma ādi kārayet ekasya syāt nidhiḥ śaṅkhaḥ svayam bhuṅkte dhanādintakam

original: kadannabhukparijano na ca śobhanavastradhṛk / svapoṣaṇaparaḥ śaṅkhī dadyātparanare vṛthā //
analyzed: kadanna bhuj parijanaḥ na ca sva poṣaṇa paraḥ śaṅkhī dadyāt para nare vṛthā

original: miśrāvalokanānmiśrasvabhāvaphaladāyinaḥ / nidhīnāṃ rūpamuktaṃ tu hariṇāpi harādike / harirbhuvanakośādi yathovāca tathā vade //
analyzed: miśra avalokanāt miśra svabhāva phala dāyinaḥ nidhīnām rūpam uktam tu hariṇā api hara ādike  hariḥ bhuvana kośa ādi yathā uvāca tathā vade

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navanidhivarṇanaṃ nāma tripañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe navanidhivarṇanam nāma tripañcāśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 54
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / agnīdhraścāgnibāhuśca bapuṣmāndhyutimāṃstathā / medhāmedhātithirbhavyaḥ śabalaḥ putra eva ca //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca agnīdhraḥ ca agnibāhuḥ ca bapuṣmān dhyutimant tathā medhāḥ medhātithiḥ bhavyaḥ śabalaḥ putraḥ eva ca

original: jyotiṣmāndaśamo jātaḥ putrā hyete priyavratāt / medhāgnibāhuputrāstu trayo yogaparāyaṇāḥ //
analyzed: jyotiṣmān daśamaḥ jātaḥ putrāḥ hi ete priyavratāt medha agnibāhu putrāḥ tu trayaḥ yoga parāyaṇāḥ

original: jātismarā mahābhāgā nairājyāya mamo daṣuḥ / vibhajya sapta dvīpāni saptānāṃ pradadau nṛpaḥ //
analyzed: jātismarāḥ mahābhāgāḥ nairājyāya vibhajya sapta dvīpāni saptānām pradadau nṛpaḥ

original: yojanānāṃ pramāṇena pañcāśatkoṭirāplutā / jalopari mahī yātā maurivāste sarijjale //
analyzed: yojanānām pramāṇena pañcāśat koṭiḥ āplutā jala upari mahī yātā mauri vā āste sarit jale

original: jambūplakṣāhvayau dvīpau śālmalaścāparo hara / kuśaḥ krauñcastathā śākaḥ puṣkaraścaiva saptamaḥ //
analyzed: jambū plakṣa āhvayau dvīpau śālmalaḥ ca aparaḥ hara kuśaḥ krauñcaḥ tathā śākaḥ puṣkaraḥ ca eva saptamaḥ

original: ete dvīpāḥ samudraistu sapta saptabhirāvṛtāḥ / lavaṇekṣusurāsarpirdādhidugdhajalaiḥ samam //
analyzed: ete dvīpāḥ samudraiḥ tu sapta saptabhiḥ āvṛtāḥ lavaṇa ikṣu surā sarpiḥ dādhi dugdha jalaiḥ samam

original: dvīpāttu dviguṇo dvīpaḥ samudraśca vṛṣadhvaja / jambūdvīpe sthito merurlakṣayojanavistṛtaḥ //
analyzed: dvīpāt tu dviguṇaḥ dvīpaḥ samudraḥ ca vṛṣadhvaja jambūdvīpe sthitaḥ meruḥ lakṣa yojana vistṛtaḥ

original: caturaśītisāhasrairyojanairasya cocchrayaḥ / praviṣṭaḥ ṣoḍaśādhastāddvatriṃśanmūrdhni vistṛtaḥ //
analyzed: caturaśīti sāhasraiḥ yojanaiḥ asya ca ucchrayaḥ praviṣṭaḥ ṣoḍaśa adhastāt dvatriṃśat mūrdhni vistṛtaḥ

original: adhaḥ ṣoḍaśasāhasraḥ karṇikākārasaṃsyitaḥ / himavānhemakūṭaśca niṣadhaścāsya dakṣiṇe //
analyzed: adhas ṣoḍaśa sāhasraḥ karṇikā ākāra saṃsyitaḥ himavān hemakūṭaḥ ca niṣadhaḥ ca asya dakṣiṇe

original: nīlaḥ śvetaśca śṛṅgī ca uttare varṣaparvatāḥ / plakṣādiṣu narā rudra ye vasanti sanātanāḥ //
analyzed: nīlaḥ śvetaḥ ca śṛṅgī ca uttare varṣaparvatāḥ plakṣa ādiṣu narāḥ rudra ye vasanti sanātanāḥ

original: śaṅkarātha na teṣvasti yugāvasthā kathañcana / jambūdvīpeśvarātputrā hyagrīdhnādabhavannava //
analyzed: śaṅkara atha na teṣu asti yuga avasthā kathañcana  jambūdvīpa īśvarāt putrāḥ hi agrīdhnāt abhavat nava

original: nābhiḥ kiṃpuruṣaścaiva harivarṣamilā vṛtaḥ / ramyo hiraṇmayākhyaśca kururbhadrāśva eva ca //
analyzed: nābhiḥ kiṃpuruṣaḥ ca eva harivarṣam ilā vṛtaḥ ramyaḥ hiraṇmaya ākhyaḥ ca kuruḥ bhadrāśvaḥ eva ca

original: ketumālo nṛpastebhyastatsaṃjñān khaṇḍakāndadau / nābhestu merudevyāṃ tu putro 'bhūdṛṣabho hara //
analyzed: ketumālaḥ nṛpaḥ tebhyaḥ tad saṃjñān khaṇḍakān dadau nābheḥ tu merudevyām tu putraḥ bhūt ṛṣabhaḥ hara

original: tatputro bharato nāma śālagrāme sthito vratī / sumatirbharatasyābhūttatputrastaijaso 'bhavat //
analyzed: tad putraḥ bharataḥ nāma śālagrāme sthitaḥ vratī sumatiḥ bharatasya abhūt tad putraḥ taijasaḥ bhavat

original: indradyumnaśca tatputraḥ parameṣṭhī tataḥ smṛtaḥ / pratīhāraścatatputraḥ pratihartā tadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: indradyumnaḥ ca tad putraḥ parameṣṭhī tatas smṛtaḥ pratīhāraḥ ca tad putraḥ pratihartā tad ātmajaḥ

original: sutastasmādathai jātaḥ prastārastatsuto vibhuḥ / pṛthuśca tatsuto nakto naktasyāpi gayaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: sutaḥ tasmāt athai jātaḥ prastāraḥ tad sutaḥ vibhuḥ pṛthuḥ ca tad sutaḥ naktaḥ naktasya api gayaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: naro gayasya tanayastatputrobhudvirāḍagataḥ / tato dhīmānmahātejā bhauvanastasya cātmajaḥ //
analyzed: naraḥ gayasya tanayaḥ tad putraḥ bhudvirāj agataḥ tatas dhīmān mahā tejāḥ bhauvanaḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ

original: tvaṣṭā tvaṣṭuśca virajā rajastasyāpyabhūtsutaḥ / śatajidrajasastasya viṣvagjyotiḥ sutaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tvaṣṭā tvaṣṭuḥ ca virajāḥ rajaḥ tasya api abhūt sutaḥ śatajit rajasaḥ tasya viṣvagjyotiḥ sutaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanopayogipriyavratavaṃśanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ pañcaśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanopayogipriyavratavaṃśanirūpaṇam nāma catuḥ pañcaśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 55
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / madhye tvilāvṛto varṣo bhadrāśvaḥ pūrvato 'dbhutaḥ / pūrvadakṣaiṇato varṣo hiraṇvānvṛṣabhadhvaja //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca madhye tu ilāvṛtaḥ varṣaḥ bhadrāśvaḥ pūrvatas dbhutaḥ pūrva dakṣa eṇataḥ varṣaḥ hiraṇvān vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: tataḥ kimpuruṣo varṣo merordakṣiṇataḥ smṛtaḥ / bhārato dakṣiṇe prokto harirdakṣiṇapāścime //
analyzed: tatas kimpuruṣaḥ varṣaḥ meroḥ dakṣiṇatas smṛtaḥ bhārataḥ dakṣiṇe proktaḥ hariḥ dakṣiṇa pāścime

original: paścime ketumālaśca ramyakaḥ paścimottare / uttare ca kurorvarṣaḥ kalpavṛkṣasamāvṛtaḥ //
analyzed: paścime ketumālaḥ ca ramyakaḥ paścima uttare uttare ca kuroḥ varṣaḥ kalpavṛkṣa samāvṛtaḥ

original: siddhiḥ svābhāvikī rudra / varjayitvā tu bhāratam / indradvīpaḥ kaśerumāṃstāmravarṇo gabhastitamān //
analyzed: siddhiḥ svābhāvikī rudra varjayitvā tu bhāratam indradvīpaḥ kaśerumān tāmravarṇaḥ

original: nāgadvīpaḥ kaṭāhaśca siṃhalo vāruṇastathā / ayaṃ tunavamasteṣāṃ dvīpaḥ sāgarasaṃvṛtaḥ //
analyzed: nāgadvīpaḥ kaṭāhaḥ ca siṃhalaḥ vāruṇaḥ tathā ayam tu navamaḥ teṣām dvīpaḥ sāgara saṃvṛtaḥ

original: pūrve kirātāstasyāste paścime yavanāḥ sthitāḥ / andhrā dakṣiṇato rudra / turaṣkāstvapi cottare //
analyzed: pūrve kirātāḥ tasyāḥ te paścime yavanāḥ sthitāḥ andhrāḥ dakṣiṇatas rudra turaṣkāḥ tu api ca uttare

original: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣattriyā vaiśyāḥ sūdrāścāntaravāsinaḥ / mahendro malayaḥ sahyaḥ śuktimānṛkṣaparvataḥ //
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣattriyāḥ vaiśyāḥ sūdrāḥ ca antara vāsinaḥ mahendraḥ malayaḥ sahyaḥ śuktimān ṛkṣa parvataḥ

original: vindhyaśca pāriyātraśca saptātra kulaparvatāḥ / vedasmṛtir narmadā ca varadā surasā śivā //
analyzed: vindhyaḥ ca pāriyātraḥ ca sapta atra kulaparvatāḥ vedasmṛtiḥ narmadā ca varadā surasā śivā

original: tāpī payoṣṇī sarayūḥ kāverī gomatī tathā / godāvarī bhīmarathī kṛṣṇaveṇī mahānadī //
analyzed: tāpī payoṣṇī sarayūḥ kāverī gomatī tathā godāvarī bhīmarathī kṛṣṇaveṇī mahānadī

original: ketumālā tāmraparṇo candrabhāgā sarasvatī / ṛṣikulyā ca kāverī mattagaṅgā payasvinī //
analyzed: ketumālā tāmraparṇī candrabhāgā sarasvatī ṛṣikulyā ca kāverī mattagaṅgā payasvinī

original: vidarbhā ca śatadrūśca nadyaḥ pāpaharāḥ śubhāḥ / āsāṃ pibanti salilaṃ madhyadeśādayo janāḥ //
analyzed: vidarbhā ca śatadrūḥ ca nadyaḥ pāpa harāḥ śubhāḥ āsām pibanti salilam madhyadeśa ādayaḥ janāḥ

original: pāñcālāḥ kuravo matsyā yaudheyāḥ sapaṭaccarāḥ / kuntayaḥ śūrasenāśca madhyadeśajanāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: pāñcālāḥ kuravaḥ matsyāḥ yaudheyāḥ sa paṭaccarāḥ kuntayaḥ śūrasenāḥ ca madhyadeśa janāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: vṛṣadhvaja / janāḥ pādmāḥ sūtamāgadhacedayaḥ / kāśaya (ṣāyā)
analyzed: vṛṣadhvaja janāḥ pādmāḥ sūta māgadha cedayaḥ kāśaya ṣāyā

original: śca videhāśca pūrvasyāṃ kosalāstathā //
analyzed: videhāḥ ca pūrvasyām kosalāḥ tathā

original: kaliṅgavaṅgapuṇḍrāṅgā vaidarbhā mūlakāstathā / vindhyāntarnilayā deśāḥ pūrvadakṣiṇataḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: kaliṅga vaṅga puṇḍra aṅgāḥ vaidarbhāḥ mūlakāḥ tathā vindhya antar nilayāḥ deśāḥ pūrva dakṣiṇatas smṛtāḥ

original: pulandāśmakajīmūtanayarāṣṭranivāsinaḥ / karṇār(nā)ṭakambojaghaṇā dakṣiṇāpathavāsinaḥ //
analyzed: pulanda aśmaka jīmūta naya rāṣṭra nivāsinaḥ dakṣiṇāpatha vāsinaḥ

original: ambaṣṭhadraviḍā lāṭāḥ kāmbhojā strīmukhāḥ śakāḥ / ānartavāsinaścaiva jñeyā yakṣiṇapaścime //
analyzed: ambaṣṭha draviḍāḥ lāṭāḥ strīmukhāḥ śakāḥ ānarta vāsinaḥ ca eva jñeyāḥ yakṣiṇa paścime

original: strīrājyāḥ saindhavā mlecchā nāsti kā yavanāstathā / paścimena ca vijñeyā māthurā naiṣadhaiḥ saha //
analyzed: strī rājyāḥ saindhavāḥ mlecchāḥ na asti kāḥ yavanāḥ tathā paścimena ca vijñeyāḥ māthurāḥ naiṣadhaiḥ saha

original: māṇḍavyāśca tuṣārāśca mūlikāśvamukhāḥ khaśāḥ / mahākeśā mahānāsā deśāstūttarapaścime //
analyzed: māṇḍavyāḥ ca tuṣārāḥ ca mūlika aśvamukhāḥ khaśāḥ mahākeśāḥ mahānāsāḥ deśāḥ tu uttara paścime

original: lamba (mpā) kā stananāgāśca mādragāndhārabāhlikāḥ / himācalālayā mlecchā udīcīṃ diśamāśritāḥ //
analyzed: stana nāgāḥ ca mādra gāndhāra bāhlikāḥ himācala ālayāḥ mlecchāḥ udīcīm diśam āśritāḥ

original: trigartanīlakolāta (bha)
analyzed: bha

original: brahmaputrāḥ saṭaṅkaṇāḥ / abhīṣāhāḥ sakāśmīrā udakparveṇa kīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: brahma putrāḥ sa ṭaṅkaṇāḥ abhīṣāhāḥ sa kāśmīrāḥ udak parveṇa kīrtitāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanaṃ nāma pañcapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanam nāma pañcapañcāśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 56
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / sapta medhātitheḥ putrāḥ plakṣadvīpeśvarasya ca / jyeṣṭhaḥ śāntabhavo nāma śiśirastadantaraḥ //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca sapta medhātitheḥ putrāḥ plakṣadvīpa īśvarasya ca  jyeṣṭhaḥ śāntabhavaḥ nāma śiśiraḥ tad antaraḥ

original: sukhodayastathā nandaḥ śivaḥ kṣemaka eva ca / dhruvaśca saptamasteṣāṃ plakṣadvīpeśvarā hi te //
analyzed: sukhodayaḥ tathā nandaḥ śivaḥ kṣemakaḥ eva ca  dhruvaḥ ca saptamaḥ teṣām plakṣadvīpa īśvarāḥ hi te

original: gomedaścaiva candraśca nārado dundubhistathā / somakaḥ sumanāḥ śailo baibhrājaścātra saptamaḥ //
