analyzed: gomedaḥ ca eva candraḥ ca nāradaḥ dundubhiḥ tathā somakaḥ sumanāḥ śailaḥ baibhrājaḥ ca atra saptamaḥ

original: anutaptā śikhī caiva vipāśā tridivā kramuḥ / amṛtā sukṛtā caiva saptaitāstatra nimnagāḥ //
analyzed: anutaptā śikhī ca eva vipāśā tridivā kramuḥ amṛtā sukṛtā ca eva saptā etāḥ tatra nimnagāḥ

original: vapuṣmāñchālmalasyeśastatsutā varṣanāmakāḥ / śveto 'tha haritaścaiva jīmūto rohitastathā //
analyzed: vapuṣmān śālmalasya īśaḥ tad sutāḥ varṣa nāmakāḥ haritaḥ ca eva jīmūtaḥ rohitaḥ tathā

original: vaidyuto mānasaścaiva saprabhaśācapi saptamaḥ / kumudaśconnato droṇo mahiṣo 'tha balāhakaḥ //
analyzed: vaidyutaḥ mānasaḥ ca eva saprabha śāc api saptamaḥ kumudaḥ ca unnataḥ droṇaḥ mahiṣaḥ balāhakaḥ

original: krauñcaḥ kakudmānhyete vai girayaḥ saritastvimāḥ / yonitoyā vitṛṣṇā ca candrā śukla vimocanī //
analyzed: krauñcaḥ kakudmān hi ete vai girayaḥ saritaḥ tu imāḥ yoni toyā vitṛṣṇā ca candrā śukla vimocanī

original: vidhṛtiḥ saptamī tāsāṃ smṛtāḥ pāpapraśāntidāḥ / jyotiṣmataḥ kuśadvīpe sapta putrāḥ śṛṇuṣvatān //
analyzed: vidhṛtiḥ saptamī tāsām smṛtāḥ pāpa praśānti dāḥ jyotiṣmataḥ kuśadvīpe sapta putrāḥ

original: udbhido veṇumāṃścaiva dvairatho lambano dhṛtiḥ / prabhākaro 'tha kapilastannāmā varṣapaddhatiḥ //
analyzed: udbhidaḥ veṇumān ca eva dvairathaḥ lambanaḥ dhṛtiḥ kapilaḥ tad nāmā varṣa paddhatiḥ

original: vidrumo hemaśailaśca dyutimānpuṣpavāṃstathā / kuśeśayo hariścaiva saptamo mandarācalaḥ //
analyzed: vidrumaḥ hemaśailaḥ ca dyutimān puṣpavān tathā kuśeśayaḥ hariḥ ca eva saptamaḥ mandara acalaḥ

original: dhūtapāpā śivā caiva pavitrā sanmatistathā / vidyudabhrā mahī cānyā sarvapāpaharāstvimāḥ //
analyzed: dhūtapāpā śivā ca eva pavitrā sanmatiḥ tathā vidyudabhrā mahī ca anyā sarva pāpa harāḥ tu imāḥ

original: krauñcadvīpe dyutimataḥ putrāḥ sapta mahātmanaḥ / kuśalo mandagaścoṣṇaḥ pīvaro 'thondhakārakaḥ //
analyzed: krauñcadvīpe dyutimataḥ putrāḥ sapta mahātmanaḥ kuśalaḥ mandagaḥ ca uṣṇaḥ pīvaraḥ

original: muniśca dundubhiścaiva saptaite tatsutā hara / krauñcaśca vāmanaścaiva tṛtīyaścāndha (tha) kārakaḥ //
analyzed: muniḥ ca dundubhiḥ ca eva saptā ete tad sutāḥ hara krauñcaḥ ca vāmanaḥ ca eva tṛtīyaḥ ca andha kārakaḥ

original: divāvṛtpañcamaścānyo dundubhiḥ puṇḍarīkavān / gaurī kumudvatī caiva sandhyā rātrirmanojavā //
analyzed: divāvṛt pañcamaḥ ca anyaḥ dundubhiḥ puṇḍarīkavān  gaurī kumudvatī ca eva sandhyā rātriḥ manojavā

original: khyātiśca puṇḍarīkā ca saptaitā varṣanimnagāḥ / śākadvīpeśvarādbhavyātsapta putrāḥ prajajñire //
analyzed: khyātiḥ ca puṇḍarīkā ca saptā etāḥ varṣa nimnagāḥ śākadvīpa īśvarāt bhavyāt sapta putrāḥ prajajñire

original: jaladśca kumāraśca sukumāroruṇī bakaḥ / kusumodaḥ samodārkiḥ saptamaśca mahādrumaḥ //
analyzed: jaladaḥ ca kumāraḥ ca sukumāra ūruṇī bakaḥ kusumodaḥ samodārkiḥ saptamaḥ ca mahādrumaḥ

original: sukumārī kumārī ca nalinī dhenukā ca yā / ikṣuśca veṇukā caiva gabhastī saptamī tathā //
analyzed: sukumārī kumārī ca nalinī dhenukā ca yā ikṣuḥ ca veṇukā ca eva gabhastī saptamī tathā

original: śabalātpuṣkareśācca mahāvīraśca dhātakiḥ / abhūdvarṣadvayaṃ caiva mānasottaraparvataḥ //
analyzed: śabalāt puṣkara īśāt ca mahāvīraḥ ca dhātakiḥ abhūt varṣa dvayam ca eva mānasottara parvataḥ

original: yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi ūrdhvaṃ pañcāśaducchritaḥ / tāvaccaiva ca vistīrṇaḥ sarvataḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ //
analyzed: yojanānām sahasrāṇi ūrdhvam pañcāśat ucchritaḥ tāvat ca eva ca vistīrṇaḥ sarvatas parimaṇḍalaḥ

original: svādūdakenodadhinā puṣkaraḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ / svādūdakasya purato dṛśyate lokasaṃsthitiḥ //
analyzed: svādu udakena udadhinā puṣkaraḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ svādu udakasya puratas dṛśyate loka saṃsthitiḥ

original: dviguṇā kāñcanī bhūmiḥ sarvajantuvivarjitā / lokālokastataḥ śailo yojanāyutāvistṛtaḥ / tamasā parvato vyāptastamo 'pyaṇḍakaṭāhataḥ //
analyzed: dviguṇā kāñcanī bhūmiḥ sarva jantu vivarjitā  lokālokaḥ tatas śailaḥ yojana ayuta avistṛtaḥ tamasā parvataḥ vyāptaḥ pi aṇḍa kaṭāhataḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭpañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanam nāma ṣaṭpañcāśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 57
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / saptatistu sahasrāṇi bhūmyucchrāyo 'pi kathyate / daśasāhasramekaikaṃ pātālaṃ vṛṣabhadhvaja //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca saptatiḥ tu sahasrāṇi kathyate daśa sāhasram ekaikam pātālam vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: atalaṃ vitalaṃ caiva nitalaṃ ca gabhastimat / mahākhyaṃ sutalaṃ cāgryaṃ pātālaṃ cāpi saptamam //
analyzed: atalam vitalam ca eva nitalam ca gabhastimat mahā ākhyam sutalam ca agryam pātālam ca api saptamam

original: kṛṣṇā śuklāruṇā pītā śarkarā śailakāñcanā / bhūyastatra daiteyā vasanti ca bhujaṅgamāḥ //
analyzed: kṛṣṇā śuklā aruṇā pītā śarkarā śaila kāñcanā  bhūyas tatra daiteyāḥ vasanti ca bhujaṅgamāḥ

original: raudre tu puṣkaradvīpe narakāḥ santi tāñchṛṇu / rauravaḥ sūkaro rodhastālo vinaśanastathā //
analyzed: raudre tu puṣkaradvīpe narakāḥ santi tān śṛṇu rauravaḥ sūkaraḥ rodhaḥ tālaḥ vinaśanaḥ tathā

original: mahājvālastaptakumbho lavaṇo 'thi vimohitaḥ / rudhirākhyo vaitaraṇī kṛmiśaḥ kṛmibho janaḥ //
analyzed: mahājvālaḥ taptakumbhaḥ lavaṇaḥ vimohitaḥ rudhirākhyaḥ vaitaraṇī kṛmiśaḥ kṛmibhaḥ janaḥ

original: asipatravanaḥ kṛṣṇo nānābhakṣaśca dāruṇaḥ / tathā pūyavahaḥ pāpo vahnijvālastvadhaḥ śirāḥ //
analyzed: asipatravanaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ nānābhakṣaḥ ca dāruṇaḥ tathā pūyavahaḥ pāpaḥ vahnijvālaḥ tu adhas sirāḥ

original: saṃdaṃśaḥ kṛṣṇasūtraśca tamaścāvīcireva ca / śvabhojano 'thāpratiṣṭhoṣṇavīcirnarakāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: saṃdaṃśaḥ kṛṣṇasūtraḥ ca tamaḥ ca avīciḥ eva ca

original: pāpinasteṣu pacyante viṣaśastrāgnidāyinaḥ / uparyupari vai lokā rudra / bhūtādayaḥ sthitāḥ //
analyzed: pāpinaḥ teṣu pacyante viṣa śastra agni dāyinaḥ upari upari vai lokāḥ rudra bhūta ādayaḥ sthitāḥ

original: vārivahnyanilākāśairvṛtaṃ bhūtādinā ca tat / tadaṇḍaṃ mahatā rudra / pradhānena ca veṣṭitam //
analyzed: vāri vahni anila ākāśaiḥ vṛtam bhūtādinā ca tat tat aṇḍam mahatā rudra pradhānena ca veṣṭitam

original: aṇḍaṃ daśaguṇaṃ vyāptaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ //
analyzed: aṇḍam daśaguṇam vyāptam nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ

original: iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośagatāpātalanarakādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe bhuvanakośagatāpātalanarakādinirūpaṇam nāma saptapañcāśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 58
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / vakṣye pramāṇasaṃsthāne sūryādīnāṃ śṛṇuṣva me / yojānānāṃ sahasrāṇi bhāskarasya ratho nava //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca vakṣye pramāṇa saṃsthāne sūrya ādīnām śṛṇuṣva me yojānānām sahasrāṇi bhāskarasya rathaḥ nava

original: īṣādaṇḍastathaivāsya dviguṇo vṛṣabhadhvaja / sārdhakoṭistathā sapta niyutānyadhikāni ca //
analyzed: īṣā daṇḍaḥ tathā eva asya dviguṇaḥ vṛṣabhadhvaja sārdha koṭiḥ tathā sapta niyutāni adhikāni ca

original: yojanānāṃ tu tasyākṣastatra cakraṃ pratiṣṭhitam / trinābhimati pañcāre ṣaṇneminyakṣayātmake //
analyzed: yojanānām tu tasya akṣaḥ tatra cakram pratiṣṭhitam tri nābhimati pañca āre ṣaṣ nemini akṣaya ātmake

original: saṃvatsaramaye kṛtsnaṃ kālacakraṃ pratiṣṭhitam / catvāriṃśatsahasrāṇi dvitīyo 'kṣo vivasvataḥ //
analyzed: saṃvatsara maye kṛtsnam kālacakram pratiṣṭhitam catvāriṃśat sahasrāṇi dvitīyaḥ kṣaḥ vivasvataḥ

original: pañcānyāni tu sārdhāni syandanasya vṛṣadhvaja / akṣapramāṇamubhayoḥ pramāṇaṃ tu yugārdhayoḥ //
analyzed: pañca anyāni tu sārdhāni syandanasya vṛṣadhvaja akṣa pramāṇam ubhayoḥ pramāṇam tu yuga ardhayoḥ

original: hrasvo 'kṣastadyugārdhena dhruvādhāre rathasya vai / dvitīye 'kṣe tu taccakraṃ saṃsthitaṃ mānasācale //
analyzed: hrasvaḥ kṣaḥ tad yuga ardhena dhruva ādhāre rathasya vai dvitīye kṣe tu tat cakram saṃsthitam mānasa acale

original: gāyattrī sabṛhatyuṣṇigjagatītriṣṭubeva ca / anuṣṭuppaṅktirityuktāśchandāṃsi harayo raveḥ //
analyzed: gāyattrī sa bṛhatī uṣṇih jagatī triṣṭubh eva ca anuṣṭubh paṅktiḥ iti uktāḥ chandāṃsi harayaḥ raveḥ

original: dhātā kratusthalā caiva pulastyo vāsukistathā / rathakṛdgrāmaṇīrhetistumburuścaitramāsake //
analyzed: dhātā kratusthalā ca eva pulastyaḥ vāsukiḥ tathā rathakṛt grāmaṇīḥ hetiḥ tumburuḥ caitra māsake

original: aryamā pulahaścaiva rathojāḥ puñjikasthalā / prahetiḥ kacchanīraśca nāradaścaiva mādhave //
analyzed: aryamā pulahaḥ ca eva rathojāḥ puñjikasthalā prahetiḥ kacchanīraḥ ca nāradaḥ ca eva mādhave

original: mitro 'tristakṣako rakṣaḥ pauruṣeyo 'tha menakā / hāhā rathasvanaścaiva jyeṣṭhe bhāno rathe sthitāḥ //
analyzed: rakṣaḥ menakā  hāhā rathasvanaḥ ca eva jyeṣṭhe bhānoḥ rathe sthitāḥ

original: varuṇo vasiṣṭho rambhā sahajanyā kuhūrbudhaḥ / rathacitrastathā śukro vasantyāṣāḍhasaṃjñite / //
analyzed: varuṇaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ rambhā sahajanyā kuhūḥ budhaḥ rathacitraḥ tathā śukraḥ vasanti āṣāḍha saṃjñite  /

original: indro viśvāvasuḥ srota(śrotra)
analyzed: indraḥ viśvāvasuḥ srota śrotra

original: elāpatrastathāṅgirāḥ / pramlocā ca nabhasyete sarpāścārke tu santi vai //
analyzed: elāpatraḥ tathā aṅgirāḥ pramlocā ca nabhasi ete sarpāḥ ca arke tu santi vai

original: vivasvānugrasenaśca bhṛgurāpūraṇastathā / anumlocāśaṅkhapālau vyāghro bhādrapade tatā //
analyzed: vivasvān ugrasenaḥ ca bhṛguḥ āpūraṇaḥ tathā anumlocā śaṅkhapālau vyāghraḥ bhādrapade

original: pūṣā ca surucirdhātā gautamo 'tha dhanañjayaḥ / suṣeṇo 'nyo dhṛtācī ca vasantyāśvayuje ravau //
analyzed: pūṣā ca suruciḥ dhātā gautamaḥ dhanañjayaḥ suṣeṇaḥ dhṛtācī ca vasanti āśvayuje ravau

original: viśvāvasurbharadvājaḥ parjanyairāvatau tadā / viśvācī senajiccāpaḥ (pi)
analyzed: viśvāvasuḥ bharadvājaḥ parjanya airāvatau tadā viśvācī senajit cāpaḥ pi

original: kārtike cādhikāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: kārtike ca adhikāriṇaḥ

original: aṃśuśca kāśyapastārkṣyo mahāpadmastathorvaśī / citrasenastathā vidyunmārgaśīrṣādhikāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: aṃśuḥ ca kāśyapaḥ tārkṣyaḥ mahāpadmaḥ tathā urvaśī citrasenaḥ tathā vidyut mārgaśīrṣa adhikāriṇaḥ

original: kraturbhargastathorṇāyuḥ sphūrjaḥ karkoṭakastathā / ariṣṭanemiścaivānyā pūrvacittivarrātsarāḥ / pauṣamāse vasantyete sapta bhāskaramaṇḍale //
analyzed: kratuḥ bhargaḥ tathā ūrṇāyuḥ sphūrjaḥ karkoṭakaḥ tathā  ariṣṭanemiḥ ca eva anyā pūrva citti varrāt sarāḥ pauṣa māse vasanti ete sapta bhāskara maṇḍale

original: tvaṣṭātha jamadagniśca kambalo 'tha tilottamā / brahmāpeto 'tha ṛtajiddhṛtarāṣṭraśca saptamaḥ / māghamāse vasantyete sapta bhāskaramaṇḍale //
analyzed: tvaṣṭā atha jamadagniḥ ca tilottamā  ṛtajit dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ ca saptamaḥ māgha māse vasanti ete sapta bhāskara maṇḍale

original: viṣṇuraśvataro rambhā sūryavarcāśca satyajit / viśvāmitrastathā rakṣo yajñāpeto hi phālgune //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ aśvataraḥ rambhā sūryavarcāḥ ca satyajit  viśvāmitraḥ tathā rakṣaḥ yajñāpetaḥ hi phālgune

original: saviturmaṇḍale brahmanviṣṇuśaktyupabṛṃhitāḥ / stuvanti munayaḥ sūryaṃ gandharvairgoyate puraḥ //
analyzed: savituḥ maṇḍale brahman viṣṇu śakti upabṛṃhitāḥ stuvanti munayaḥ sūryam gandharvaiḥ goyate puras

original: nṛtyantyo 'psaraso yānti sūryasyānuniśācarāḥ / vahanti pannagā yakṣaiḥ kriyate 'bhīṣusaṃgrahaḥ //
analyzed: nṛtyantyaḥ u psarasaḥ yānti sūryasya anu niśācarāḥ  vahanti pannagāḥ yakṣaiḥ kriyate bhīṣu saṃgrahaḥ

original: bālakhilyāstathaivainaṃ parivārya samāsate / rathastricakraḥ somasya kundābhāstasya vājinaḥ //
analyzed: bālakhilyāḥ tathā eva enam parivārya samāsate rathaḥ tri cakraḥ somasya kunda ābhāḥ tasya vājinaḥ

original: vāmadakṣiṇato yuktā daśa tena caratyasau / vārya (yva) granidravyasambhūto rathaścandrasutasyaca //
analyzed: vāma dakṣiṇataḥ yuktāḥ daśa tena carati asau

original: piśaṅgesturagairyuktaḥ so 'ṣṭābhirvāyuvegibhiḥ / savarūthaḥ sānukarṣo yukto bhūmibhavairhayaiḥ //
analyzed: piśaṅgeḥ turagaiḥ yuktaḥ saḥ ṣṭābhiḥ vāyu vegibhiḥ sa varūthaḥ sa anukarṣaḥ yuktaḥ bhūmi bhavaiḥ hayaiḥ

original: sopāsaṃgapatākastu śukrasyāpi ratho mahān / ratho bhūmisutasyāpi taptakāñcanasannibhaḥ //
analyzed: sa upāsaṃga patākaḥ tu śukrasya api rathaḥ mahān rathaḥ bhūmisutasya api tapta kāñcana sannibhaḥ

original: aṣṭāśvaḥ kāñcanaḥ śrīmān bhaumasyāpi ratho mahān //
analyzed: aṣṭa aśvaḥ kāñcanaḥ śrīmān bhaumasya api rathaḥ mahān

original: padmarāgāruṇairaśvaiḥ saṃyukto vahnisaṃbhavaiḥ / aṣṭābhiḥ pāṇḍarairyuktairvājibhiḥ kāñcane rathe //
analyzed: padmarāga aruṇaiḥ aśvaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ vahni saṃbhavaiḥ aṣṭābhiḥ pāṇḍaraiḥ yuktaiḥ vājibhiḥ kāñcane rathe

original: tiṣṭhaṃstiṣṭhati varṣaṃ vai rāśaurāśau bṛhaspatiḥ / ākāśasambhavairaśvaiḥ śavalaiḥ syandanaṃ yutam //
analyzed: tiṣṭhan tiṣṭhati varṣam vai rāśau rāśau bṛhaspatiḥ ākāśa sambhavaiḥ aśvaiḥ śavalaiḥ syandanam yutam

original: samāruhya śanairyāti mandagāmī śanaiścaraḥ / svarbhānosturagā hyaṣṭau bhṛṅgābhā dhūsaraṃ ratham //
analyzed: samāruhya śanais yāti manda gāmī śanaiścaraḥ svarbhānoḥ turagāḥ hi aṣṭau bhṛṅga ābhāḥ dhūsaram ratham

original: sakṛdyaktāstu bhūteśabahantyavirataṃ śiva / tathā keturathasyāśvā aṣṭau te vātaraṃhasaḥ //
analyzed: sakṛt yaktāḥ tu bhūteśa bahanti aviratam śiva tathā ketu rathasya aśvāḥ aṣṭau te vāta raṃhasaḥ

original: palāladhūmavarṇābhā lākṣārasanibhāruṇāḥ / dvīpanadyadrayudanvanto bhuvanāniharestanuḥ //
analyzed: palāla dhūma varṇa ābhāḥ lākṣā rasa nibha aruṇāḥ dvīpa nadī adrayu danvantaḥ bhuvanāni hareḥ tanuḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe bhuvanakośanirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭapañcāśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 59
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: (atha jyotiḥ śāstram)
analyzed: atha jyotiḥ śāstram

original: sūta uvāca / jyotiścakraṃ bhuvo mānamuktvā provāca keśavaḥ / caturlakṣaṃ jyotiṣasya sāraṃ rudrāya sarvadaḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca jyotiścakram bhuvaḥ mānam uktvā provāca keśavaḥ catur lakṣam jyotiṣasya sāram rudrāya sarva daḥ

original: hariruvāca / kṛttikāstvagnidevatyā rohiṇyo brahmaṇaḥ smṛtāḥ / ilvalāḥ somadevatyā raudraṃ cārdramudāhṛtam //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca kṛttikāḥ tu agni devatyāḥ rohiṇyaḥ brahmaṇaḥ smṛtāḥ ilvalāḥ soma devatyāḥ raudram ca ārdram udāhṛtam

original: punarvasustathādityastiṣyaśca gurudaivataḥ / aśleṣāḥ sarpadevatyā maghāśca pitṛdevatāḥ //
analyzed: punarvasuḥ tathā ādityaḥ tiṣyaḥ ca guru daivataḥ aśleṣāḥ sarpa devatyāḥ maghāḥ ca pitṛ devatāḥ

original: bhāgyāśca pūrvaphalgunya aryamā ca tathottaraḥ / sāvitraśca tathā hastā citrā tvaṣṭā prakīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: bhāgyāḥ ca aryamā ca tathā uttaraḥ sāvitraḥ ca tathā hastā citrā tvaṣṭā prakīrtitaḥ

original: svātī ca vāyudevatyā nakṣatraṃ parikīrtitam / indrāgnidevatā proktā viśākhā vṛṣabhadhvaja //
analyzed: svātī ca vāyu devatyā nakṣatram parikīrtitam indra agni devatā proktā viśākhā vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: maitramṛkṣamanūrādhā jyeṣṭhā śākraṃ prakīrtitam / tathā nirṛtidevatyo mūlastajjñairudāhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: maitram ṛkṣam anūrādhā jyeṣṭhā śākram prakīrtitam tathā nirṛti devatyaḥ mūlaḥ tad jñaiḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: āpyāstvāṣāṭhapūrvāstu uttarā vaiśvadevatāḥ / brāhmaścaivābhijitproktaḥ śravaṇā vaiṣṇavaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: āpyāḥ tu āṣāṭha pūrvāḥ tu uttarāḥ vaiśvadevatāḥ brāhmaḥ ca eva abhijit proktaḥ śravaṇāḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: vāsavastu tathā ṛkṣaṃ dhaniṣṭhā procyate budhaiḥ / tathā śatabhiṣā proktaṃ nakṣatraṃ vāruṇaṃ śiva //
analyzed: vāsavaḥ tu tathā ṛkṣam dhaniṣṭhā procyate budhaiḥ tathā śatabhiṣā proktam nakṣatram vāruṇam śiva

original: ājaṃ bhādrapadā pūrvā ahirbrudhnyastathottarā / pauṣṇaṃ ca revatī ṛkṣamaśvayukcāśvadaivatam //
analyzed: ājam bhādrapadā pūrvā ahirbrudhnyaḥ tathā uttarā pauṣṇam ca revatī ṛkṣam aśvayuj ca aśva daivatam

original: bharaṇyṛkṣaṃ tathā yāmyaṃ proktāste ṛkṣadevatāḥ / brahmāṇī saṃsthitā pūrve pritapannavamītithau //
analyzed: bharaṇī ṛkṣam tathā yāmyam proktāḥ te ṛkṣa devatāḥ brahmāṇī saṃsthitā pūrve pritapat navamī tithau

original: māheśvarī cottare ca dvitīyā daśāmītithau / pañcamyāṃ ca trayodaśyāṃ vārāhī dakṣiṇe sthitā //
analyzed: māheśvarī ca uttare ca dvitīyā daśāmī tithau pañcamyām ca trayodaśyām vārāhī dakṣiṇe sthitā

original: ṣaṣṭhyāṃ caiva caturdaśyāmindrāṇī paścime sthitā / saptamyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca cāmuṇḍā vāyugocare //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhyām ca eva caturdaśyām indrāṇī paścime sthitā saptamyām paurṇamāsyām ca cāmuṇḍā vāyugocare

original: aṣṭamyamāvāsyayoge mahālakṣmīśagocare / ekādaśyāṃ tṛtīyāyāmagnikoṇe tu vaiṣṇavī //
analyzed: aṣṭamī amāvāsyā yoge mahālakṣmīśa gocare ekādaśyām tṛtīyāyām agnikoṇe tu vaiṣṇavī

original: dvādaśyāṃ ca caturthyāṃ tu kaumārī nairṛte tathā / yoginīsuṃmukhenaiva gamanādi na kārayet //
analyzed: dvādaśyām ca caturthyām tu kaumārī nairṛte tathā yoginī suṃmukhena eva gamana ādi na kārayet

original: aśvinīmaitrarevatyo mṛgamūlapunarvasu / puṣyā hastā tathā jyeṣṭhā prasthāne śreṣṭhamucyate //
analyzed: aśvinī maitrarevatyaḥ mṛga mūla punarvasu puṣyā hastā tathā jyeṣṭhā prasthāne śreṣṭham ucyate

original: hastādipañcaṛkṣāṇi uttarātrayameva ca / aśvinī rohiṇī puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā ca punarvasū //
analyzed: hasta ādi pañca ṛkṣāṇi uttarā trayam eva ca aśvinī rohiṇī puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā ca punarvasū

original: vastraprāvaraṇe śreṣṭho nakṣatrāṇāṃ gaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ / kṛttikā bharaṇyaśleṣā maghā mūlaviśākhayoḥ //
analyzed: vastra prāvaraṇe śreṣṭhaḥ nakṣatrāṇām gaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ kṛttikā bharaṇī aśleṣāḥ maghā mūla viśākhayoḥ

original: trīṇi,pūrvā tathā caiva adhovakrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ? / eṣu vāpītaḍāgādikūpabhūmitṛṇāni ca //
analyzed: tathā ca eva adhovakrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ eṣu vāpī taḍāga ādi kūpa bhūmi tṛṇāni ca

original: devāgārasya khananaṃ nidhānakhananaṃ tathā / gaṇitaṃ jyotiṣārambhaṃ khanibilapraveśanam //
analyzed: devāgārasya khananam nidhāna khananam tathā gaṇitam jyotiṣārambham khani bila praveśanam

original: kuryādadhogatānyeva anyāni ca vṛṣadhvaja / revatī cāśvinī citrā svātī hastā punarvasū //
analyzed: kuryāt adhas gatāni eva anyāni ca vṛṣadhvaja revatī ca aśvinī citrā svātī hastā punarvasū

original: anurādhā mṛgo jyeṣṭhā ete pārśvamukhāḥ smṛtāḥ / gajoṣṭrāśvabalīvardadamanaṃ mahiṣasya ca //
analyzed: anurādhā mṛgaḥ jyeṣṭhāḥ ete pārśvamukhāḥ smṛtāḥ gaja uṣṭra aśva balīvarda damanam mahiṣasya ca

original: bījānāṃ vapanaṃ kuryādgamanāgamanādikam / cakrayantrarathānāṃ ca nāvādīnāṃ pravāhaṇam //
analyzed: bījānām vapanam kuryāt gamana āgamana ādikam cakrayantra rathānām ca nāvā ādīnām pravāhaṇam

original: pārśveṣu yāni karmāṇi kuryādeteṣu tānyapi / rohiṇyārdrāṃ tathā puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā cottarātrayam //
analyzed: pārśveṣu yāni karmāṇi kuryāt eteṣu tāni api rohiṇī ārdrām tathā puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā ca uttarā trayam

original: vāruṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ caiva nava cordhvamukhāḥ smṛtāḥ / eṣu rājyābhiṣekaṃ ca paṭṭabandhaṃ ca kārayet //
analyzed: vāruṇam śravaṇam ca eva nava ca ūrdhva mukhāḥ smṛtāḥ eṣu rājya abhiṣekam ca paṭṭabandham ca kārayet

original: ūrdhvamukhyānyucchritāni sarvāṇyeteṣu kārayet / caturtho cāśubhā ṣaṣṭhī aṣṭamī navamī tathā //
analyzed: ūrdhva mukhyāni ucchritāni sarvāṇi eteṣu kārayet ca aśubhā ṣaṣṭhī aṣṭamī navamī tathā

original: amāvāsyā pūrṇimā ca tadvādaśī ca caturdaśī / aśuklā pratipacchreṣṭhā dvitīyā candra sūnunā //
analyzed: amāvāsyā pūrṇimā ca tad dvādaśī ca caturdaśī aśuklā pratipad śreṣṭhā dvitīyā candra sūnunā

original: tṛtīyā bhūmiputreṇa caturtho ca śanaiścare / gurau śubhā pañcamī syātṣaṣṭīmaṅgalaśukrayoḥ //
analyzed: tṛtīyā bhūmiputreṇa ca śanaiścare gurau śubhā pañcamī syāt ṣaṣṭī maṅgala śukrayoḥ

original: saptamī somaputreṇa aṣṭamī kujabhāskarau / navamī candravā(sau)
analyzed: saptamī somaputreṇa aṣṭamī kuja bhāskarau navamī candra vāsau

original: reṇa daśamī tu gurau śubhā //
analyzed: reṇa daśamī tu gurau śubhā

original: ekādaśyā guruśukrau dvādaśyāṃ ca punarbudhaḥ / trayodaśī śukrabhaumau śanau śreṣṭhā caturdaśī //
analyzed: ekādaśyāḥ guru śukrau dvādaśyām ca punar budhaḥ trayodaśī śukra bhaumau śanau śreṣṭhā caturdaśī

original: paurṇamāsyapyamāvāsyā śreṣṭhā syācca bṛhaspatau / dvādaśīṃ dahate bhānuḥ śaśī caikādaśīṃ dahet //
analyzed: paurṇamāsī api amāvāsyā śreṣṭhā syāt ca bṛhaspatau dvādaśīm dahate bhānuḥ śaśī ca ekādaśīm dahet

original: kujo dahecca daśāmīṃ navamīṃ ca budho dahet / aṣṭamīṃ dahate jīvaḥ saptamīṃ bhārgavo dahet //
analyzed: kujaḥ dahet ca daśāmīm navamīm ca budhaḥ dahet aṣṭamīm dahate jīvaḥ saptamīm bhārgavaḥ dahet

original: sūryaputro dahetṣaṣṭhīṃ gamanādyāsu nāsti vai / pratipannavamīṣveva caturdaśyaṣṭamīṣu ca //
analyzed: sūryaputraḥ dahet ṣaṣṭhīm gamana ādyāsu na asti vai pratipad navamīṣu eva caturdaśī aṣṭamīṣu ca

original: budhavāreṇa prasthānaṃ dūrataḥ parivarjayet / meṣe karkaṭake ṣaṣṭhī kanyāyāṃ mithune 'ṣṭamī //
analyzed: budhavāreṇa prasthānam dūratas parivarjayet meṣe karkaṭake ṣaṣṭhī kanyāyām mithune ṣṭamī

original: vṛṣe kumbhe caturtho ca dvādaśī makare tule / daśamī vṛścike siṃhe dhanurmone caturdaśī //
analyzed: vṛṣe kumbhe caturthī ca dvādaśī makare tule daśamī vṛścike siṃhe dhanuḥ mone caturdaśī

original: etā dagdhā na gantavyaṃ pīḍādiḥ kila mānavaiḥ / viśākhātrayamāditye pūrvāṣāḍhātraye śaśī //
analyzed: etāḥ dagdhāḥ na gantavyam pīḍā ādiḥ kila mānavaiḥ viśākhā trayam āditye pūrvāṣāḍhā traye śaśī

original: dhaniṣṭhātritayaṃ bhaume budhe vai revatītrayam / rohiṇyāditrayaṃ jīve śukre puṣyātrayaṃ śiva //
analyzed: dhaniṣṭhā tritayam bhaume budhe vai revatī trayam rohiṇī ādi trayam jīve śukre puṣyā trayam śiva

original: śanivāre varjayecca uttarāphalgunītrayam / eṣu yogeṣu cotpātamṛtyurogādikaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: śanivāre varjayet ca uttarā phalgunī trayam eṣu yogeṣu ca utpāta mṛtyu roga ādikam bhavet

original: mūler'kaḥ śravaṇe candraḥ proṣṭhapadyuttare kujaḥ / kṛttikāsu budhaścaiva gurau rudra punarvasuḥ //
analyzed: mūla irkaḥ śravaṇe candraḥ proṣṭhapadī uttare kujaḥ kṛttikāsu budhaḥ ca eva gurau rudra punarvasuḥ

original: pūrvaphalgunī śukre ca svātiścaiva śanaiśvare / etai cāmṛtayogāḥ syuḥ sarvakāryaprasādhakāḥ //
analyzed: pūrva phalgunī śukre ca svātiḥ ca eva śanaiśvare etaiḥ ca amṛta yogāḥ syuḥ sarva kārya prasādhakāḥ

original: kālaṃ pravadhyanni?
analyzed: kālam

original: śaktidā?
analyzed: śakti dā

original: neṣṭamanda? / parvādistu jñeyaḥ kālaḥ kālaviśāradaiḥ //
analyzed: na iṣṭa manda parva ādiḥ tu jñeyaḥ kālaḥ kāla viśāradaiḥ

original: ekīkṛtyākṣarānmātraṃ nāmnoḥ strīpuṃsayostribhiḥ / bhāge dviśeṣe strīnāśaḥ pusaḥ syādekaśūnyayoḥ //
analyzed: ekīkṛtya akṣarāt mātram nāmnoḥ strīpuṃsayoḥ tribhiḥ bhāge dvi śeṣe strī nāśaḥ pusaḥ syāt eka śūnyayoḥ

original: viṣkambhe ghaṭikāḥ pañca śūle sapta prakīrtitāḥ / ṣaḍgaṇḍe cātigaṇḍe ca nava vyāghātavajrayoḥ //
analyzed: viṣkambhe ghaṭikāḥ pañca śūle sapta prakīrtitāḥ ṣaḍgaṇḍe ca atigaṇḍe ca nava vyāghāta vajrayoḥ

original: vyatīpāte ca parighe vaidhṛte ca dinedine / etai mṛtyuyutā hyeṣu sarvakarmāṇi varjayet //
analyzed: vyatīpāte ca parighe vaidhṛte ca dine dine  etaiḥ mṛtyu yutā hi eṣu sarva karmāṇi varjayet

original: haster'kaśca guruḥ puṣye anurādhā budhe śubhā / rohiṇī ca śanau śreṣṭhā saumaṃ somena vai śubham //
analyzed: hasta īrkaḥ ca guruḥ puṣye anurādhā budhe śubhā rohiṇī ca śanau śreṣṭhā saumam somena vai śubham

original: śukre ca revatī śreṣṭhā aśvinī maṅgale śubhā / eteṣu siddhiyogā vai sarvadoṣavināśanāḥ //
analyzed: śukre ca revatī śreṣṭhā aśvinī maṅgale śubhā eteṣu siddhi yogāḥ vai sarva doṣa vināśanāḥ

original: bhārgave bhaparaṇī caiva some citrā vṛṣadhvaja / / bhaume cai vottarāṣāḍhā dhaniṣṭhā ca budhe hara / //
analyzed: bhārgave bhaparaṇī ca eva some citrā vṛṣadhvaja    bhaume vā uttarāṣāḍhā dhaniṣṭhā ca budhe hara  /

original: garau śatabhiṣā rudra / śukre vai rohiṇī tathā / śanau ca revatī śambho / viṣayogāḥ prakīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: garau śatabhiṣā rudra śukre vai rohiṇī tathā śanau ca revatī śambho viṣa yogāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: puṣyaḥ punarvasuścaiva revatī citrayā saha / śravaṇaṃ ca dhaniṣṭhā ca hastāśvanīmṛgāstathā //
analyzed: puṣyaḥ punarvasuḥ ca eva revatī citrayā saha  / śravaṇam ca dhaniṣṭhā ca hasta aśvanī mṛgāḥ tathā

original: kuryācchatabhiṣāyāṃ ca jātakarmādi mānavaḥ / viśākhā cottarātrīṇi maghārdrā bharaṇī tathā / āśleṣā kṛttikā rudra / prasthāne maraṇapradāḥ //
analyzed: kuryāt śatabhiṣāyām ca jātakarma ādi mānavaḥ viśākhā ca uttarā trīṇi maghā ārdrā bharaṇī tathā āśleṣā kṛttikā rudra prasthāne maraṇa pradāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre nakṣatrataddevatādagdhayogādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre nakṣatrataddevatādagdhayogādinirūpaṇam nāma ekonaṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 60
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / ṣaḍāditye daśā jñeyā some pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ / aṣṭāvaṅgārake cava budhai spatadaśa smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca ṣaṭ āditye daśā jñeyā some pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ aṣṭau aṅgārake budhaiḥ smṛtāḥ

original: śanaiścare daśa jñeyā gurorekonaviṃśatiḥ / rāhordvādaśavarṣāṇi ekaviṃśatirbhārgave //
analyzed: śanaiścare daśa jñeyāḥ guroḥ ekonaviṃśatiḥ rāhoḥ dvādaśa varṣāṇi ekaviṃśatiḥ bhārgave

original: raverdaśā duḥ khadā syādudveganṛpanāśakṛt / vibhūtidā somadaśā sukhamiṣṭānnadā tathā //
analyzed: raveḥ daśā duḥ kha dā syāt udvega nṛpa nāśa kṛt  vibhūti dā soma daśā sukham iṣṭa anna dā tathā

original: duḥ khapradā kujadaśā rājyādeḥ syādvināśinī / divyastrīdā budhadaśā rājyadā kośavṛddhidā //
analyzed: duḥ kha pradā kuja daśā rājya ādeḥ syāt vināśinī divya strī dā budha daśā rājya dā kośa vṛddhi dā

original: śanerdaśā rājyanāśabandhuduḥ khakarī bhavet / gurordaśā rājyadā syātsukhadharmādidāyinī //
analyzed: śaneḥ daśā rājya nāśa bandhu duḥkha karī bhavet guroḥ daśā rājya dā syāt sukha dharma ādi dāyinī

original: rāhordaśā rājyanāśavyādhidā duḥ khadā bhavet / hastyaśvadā śukradaśā rājyastrīlābhadā bhavet //
analyzed: rāhoḥ daśā rājya nāśa vyādhi dā duḥ kha dā bhavet hasti aśva dā śukra daśā rājya strī lābha dā bhavet

original: meṣa aṅgārakakṣetraṃ vṛṣaḥ śukrasya kīrtitaḥ / mithunasya budho jñeyaḥ somaḥ karkaṭakasya ca //
analyzed: meṣa aṅgāraka kṣetram vṛṣaḥ śukrasya kīrtitaḥ mithunasya budhaḥ jñeyaḥ somaḥ karkaṭakasya ca

original: sūryakṣetraṃ bhavetsiṃhaḥ kanyā kṣetraṃ budhasya ca / bhārgavasya tulā kṣetraṃ vṛścikoṅgārakasya ca //
analyzed: sūrya kṣetram bhavet siṃhaḥ kanyā kṣetram budhasya ca bhārgavasya tulā kṣetram vṛścika uṅgārakasya ca

original: dhanuḥ sura guroścaiva śanermakarakumbhakau / mīnaḥ suraguroścaiva grahakṣetraṃ prakīrtitam //
analyzed: dhanuḥ sura guroḥ ca eva śaneḥ makara kumbhakau mīnaḥ sura guroḥ ca eva graha kṣetram prakīrtitam

original: paurṇamāsyādvayaṃ tatra pūrvāṣāḍhādvayaṃ bhavet / dvirāṣāḍhaḥ sa vijñeyo viṣṇuḥ svapiti karkaṭe //
analyzed: paurṇamāsyāḥ dvayam tatra pūrvāṣāḍhā dvayam bhavet dvirāṣāḍhaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ viṣṇuḥ svapiti karkaṭe

original: aśvinī revatī citrā dhaniṣṭhā syādalaṅkṛtau / mṛgāhikapimārjāraśvānaḥ sūkarapakṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: aśvinī revatī citrā dhaniṣṭhā syāt alaṅkṛtau mṛga ahi kapi mārjāra śvānaḥ sūkara pakṣiṇaḥ

original: nakulo mūṣakaścaiva yātrāyāṃ dakṣiṇe śubhaḥ / viprakanyā śivā eṣāṃ śaṅkhabherīvasundharāḥ //
analyzed: nakulaḥ mūṣakaḥ ca eva yātrāyām dakṣiṇe śubhaḥ vipra kanyā śivā eṣām śaṅkha bherī vasundharāḥ

original: veṇustrīpūrṇakumbhāśca yātrāyāṃ darśanaṃ śubham / jambūkoṣṭrakharādyāśca yātrāyāṃ vāmake śubhāḥ //
analyzed: veṇu strī pūrṇa kumbhāḥ ca yātrāyām darśanam śubham jambūka uṣṭra khara ādyāḥ ca yātrāyām vāmake śubhāḥ

original: kārpāsauṣadhitailaṃ ca pakrāṅgārabhujaṅgamāḥ / muktakeśī raktamālyanagnādyaśubhamīkṣitam //
analyzed: kārpāsa oṣadhi tailam ca pakra aṅgāra bhujaṅgamāḥ mukta keśī rakta mālya nagna ādya śubham īkṣitam

original: hakrāya lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye labhatpūrve mahāphalam / āgneye śokasantāpau dakṣiṇe hānimāpnuyāt //
analyzed: lakṣaṇam vakṣye labhat pūrve mahā phalam āgneye śoka santāpau dakṣiṇe hānim āpnuyāt

original: nairṛtya śokasantāpau miṣṭānnaṃ caiva paścime / artha prāpnoti vāyavye uttare kalahobhavet //
analyzed: nairṛtya śoka santāpau miṣṭānnam ca eva paścime artha prāpnoti vāyavye uttare kalahaḥ bhavet

original: īśāne maraṇaṃ proktaṃ hikkāyāścaphalāphalam / vilikhya ravicakraṃ tu bhāskaro narasannibhaḥ //
analyzed: īśāne maraṇam proktam hikkāyāḥ ca phala aphalam vilikhya ravicakram tu bhāskaraḥ nara sannibhaḥ

original: yasminnṛkṣe vasadbhānustadāndi trīṇi mastake / trayaṃ vakre pradātavyamekaikaṃ skandhayornyaset //
analyzed: yasmin ṛkṣe trīṇi mastake trayam vakre pradātavyam ekaikam skandhayoḥ nyaset

original: ekaikaṃ bāhuyugme tu ekaika hastayordvayoḥ / hṛdaye pañca ṛkṣāṇi ekaṃ nābhau pradāpayet //
analyzed: ekaikam bāhu yugme tu ekaika hastayoḥ dvayoḥ hṛdaye pañca ṛkṣāṇi ekam nābhau pradāpayet

original: ṛkṣamekaṃ nyasedguhye ekaikaṃ jānuke nyaset / nakṣatrāṇi ca śeṣāṇi ravipāde niyojayet //
analyzed: ṛkṣam ekam nyaset guhye ekaikam jānuke nyaset nakṣatrāṇi ca śeṣāṇi ravi pāde niyojayet

original: caraṇasyena ṛkṣeṇa alpāyurjāyate naraḥ / vidaśagamanaṃ jānau guhyasthe paradāravān //
analyzed: ṛkṣeṇa alpa āyuḥ jāyate naraḥ vidaśa gamanam jānau guhya sthe para dāravān

original: nābhisthenālpasantuṣṭo hṛtsthena syānmaheśvaraḥ / pāṇisthena bhaveccauraḥ sthānabhraṣṭo bhaveddhaja //
analyzed: nābhi sthena alpa santuṣṭaḥ hṛd sthena syāt maheśvaraḥ pāṇi sthena bhavet cauraḥ sthāna bhraṣṭaḥ

original: skandhasthite dhanapatirmukhe miṣṭānnamāpnuyāt / mastake padṛvastraṃ syānnakṣatraṃ yadi sthitam //
analyzed: skandha sthite dhanapatiḥ mukhe miṣṭānnam āpnuyāt  mastake syāt nakṣatram yadi sthitam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍaṃ prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre grahadaśādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍam prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre grahadaśādinirūpaṇam nāma ṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 61
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / saptamopacayādyasthaścandraḥ sarvatra śobhanaḥ / śuklapakṣe dvitīyastu pañcamo navamastathā //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca saptama upacaya ādya sthaḥ candraḥ sarvatra śobhanaḥ śukla pakṣe dvitīyaḥ tu pañcamaḥ navamaḥ tathā

original: saṃpūjyamāno lokaistu guruvaddṛśyate śaśī / candrasya dvādaśāvasthā bhavanti śṛṇu tā api //
analyzed: saṃpūjyamānaḥ lokaiḥ tu guru vat dṛśyate śaśī candrasya dvādaśa avasthāḥ bhavanti śṛṇu tāḥ api

original: triṣutriṣu ca ṛkṣeṣu aśvinyādi vadāmyaham / pravāsasthaṃ punardṛṣṭaṃ mṛtāvasthaṃ jayāvaham //
analyzed: triṣu triṣu ca ṛkṣeṣu aśvinī ādi vadāmi aham pravāsa stham punar dṛṣṭam mṛta avastham jaya āvaham

original: hāsyāvasthaṃ natā(krīḍā)
analyzed: hāsya avastham nata ākrīḍā

original: vasthaṃ pramodāvasthameva ca / viṣādāvasthabhogasthe jvarāvasthaṃ vyavasthitam //
analyzed: pramoda avastham eva ca viṣāda avasthā bhoga sthe jvara avastham vyavasthitam

original: kampā(nyā) vasthaṃ sukhāvasthaṃ dvādaśāvasthagaṃ bhavet / pravāso hānimṛnyṛ ca jayo hāseratiḥ sukham //
analyzed: sukha avastham dvādaśa avastha gam bhavet pravāsaḥ ca jayaḥ hāseratiḥ sukham

original: śoko bhogo jvaraḥ kampaḥ sukhaṃ ceti kramātphalam / janmasthaḥ kurute tuṣṭiṃ dvitīye nāsti nirvṛtiḥ //
analyzed: śokaḥ bhogaḥ jvaraḥ kampaḥ sukham ca iti kramāt phalam janma sthaḥ kurute tuṣṭim dvitīye nā asti nirvṛtiḥ

original: tṛtīye rājasanmānaṃ caturthe kalahāgamaḥ / pañcamena mṛgāṅkena strīlābho vai tathā bhavet //
analyzed: tṛtīye rāja sanmānam caturthe kalaha āgamaḥ pañcamena mṛgāṅkena strī lābhaḥ vai tathā bhavet

original: ghanadhānyāgamaḥ ṣaṣṭhe ratiḥ pūjā ca saptame / aṣṭame prāṇasandeho navame kośasañcayaḥ //
analyzed: ghana dhānya āgamaḥ ṣaṣṭhe ratiḥ pūjā ca saptame  aṣṭame prāṇa sandehaḥ navame kośa sañcayaḥ

original: daśame kāryaniṣpattidhruvamekādaśe jayaḥ / dvādaśena śaśāṅkena mṛtyureva na saṃkhayaḥ //
analyzed: daśame kārya niṣpatti dhruvam ekādaśe jayaḥ dvādaśena śaśāṅkena mṛtyuḥ eva na saṃkhayaḥ

original: kṛttikādau ca pūrveṇa saptarkṣāṇi ca vai vrajet / maghādau dakṣiṇe gacchedanurādhādi paścime //
analyzed: kṛttikā ādau ca pūrveṇa sapta ṛkṣāṇi ca vai vrajet maghā ādau dakṣiṇe gacchet anurādhā ādi paścime

original: praśastā cottara yātrā dhaniṣṭhādiṣu saptasu / aśvinī revatī citrā dhaniṣṭhā samalaṅkṛtau //
analyzed: praśastā ca uttara yātrā dhaniṣṭhā ādiṣu saptasu aśvinī revatī citrā dhaniṣṭhā samalaṅkṛtau

original: mṛgāśvicitrāpuṣyāśca mūlā hastā śubhāḥ sadā / kanyāpradāne yātrāyāṃ pratiṣṭhādiṣu karmasu //
analyzed: mṛga aśvi citrā puṣyāḥ ca mūlā hastā śubhāḥ sadā kanyā pradāne yātrāyām pratiṣṭhā ādiṣu karmasu

original: śukracandrau hi janmasthau śubhadau ca dvitīyake / śaśijñaśukrajīvāśca rāśau rāśau cātha tṛtīyake //
analyzed: śukra candrau hi janma sthau śubha dau ca dvitīyake  śaśi jña śukra jīvāḥ ca rāśau rāśau ca atha tṛtīyake

original: bhaumamandaśaśāṅkārkā budhaḥ śreṣṭhaścaturthake / śukrajīvau pañcame ca candraketusamāhitau //
analyzed: bhauma manda śaśāṅka arkāḥ budhaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ caturthake  śukra jīvau pañcame ca candra ketu samāhitau

original: mandākārai ca kujaḥ ṣaṣṭhe gurucandrau ca saptame / jñaśukrāvaṣṭame śreṣṭhau navamastho guruḥ śubhaḥ //
analyzed: ca kujaḥ ṣaṣṭhe guru candrau ca saptame jña śukrau aṣṭame śreṣṭhau navama sthaḥ guruḥ śubhaḥ

original: arkārkicandrā daśame grahā ekādaśe khilāḥ / budho 'tha dvādaśe caiva bhārgavaḥ sukhado bhavet //
analyzed: arka ārki candrāḥ daśame grahāḥ ekādaśe khilāḥ dvādaśe ca eva bhārgavaḥ sukha daḥ bhavet

original: siṃhena makaraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kanyayā meṣa uttamaḥ / tulayā saha mīnastu kumbhena sahakarkaṭaḥ //
analyzed: siṃhena makaraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kanyayā meṣaḥ uttamaḥ tulayā saha mīnaḥ tu kumbhena saha karkaṭaḥ

original: dhanuṣā vṛṣabhaḥ śreṣṭho mithunena ca vṛścikaḥ / etatṣaḍaṣṭakaṃ?
analyzed: dhanuṣā vṛṣabhaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ mithunena ca vṛścikaḥ etat ṣaṣ aṣṭakam

original: prītyai bhavatyeva na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: prītyai bhavati eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre grahāṇāṃ śubhāśubhasthānādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikapaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre grahāṇām śubhāśubhasthānādinirūpaṇam nāma ekapaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre lagnaghaṭikā pramāṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre lagnaghaṭikā pramāṇādinirūpaṇam nāma dviṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 63
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 63
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / narastrīlakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye saṃkṣapācchṛṇu śaṅkara / asvedinau mṛdutalau kamalodarasannibhau //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca nara strī lakṣaṇam vakṣye saṃkṣapāt śṛṇu śaṅkara asvedinau mṛdu talau kamala udara sannibhau

original: śliṣṭāṅgulī tāmranakhau sugulphau śirayojjhitau / kūrmonnatau ca caraṇau syātāṃ nṛpavarasya hi //
analyzed: śliṣṭa aṅgulī tāmra nakhau su gulphau śirayā ujjhitau kūrma unnatau ca caraṇau syātām nṛpa varasya hi

original: virūkṣapāṇḍuranakhau vakrau caiva śirānatau / sūrpākārau ca caraṇau saṃkhuṣkau viralāṅgulī //
analyzed: virūkṣa pāṇḍura nakhau vakrau ca eva śira ānatau sūrpa ākārau ca caraṇau saṃkhuṣkau virala aṅgulī

original: duḥ khadāridyadau syātā nātra kāryāṃ vicāraṇā / alparomayutā śreṣṭhā jaṅghā hastikaropamā //
analyzed: syātā na atra kāryām vicāraṇā alpa roma yutā śreṣṭhā jaṅghā hasti kara upamā

original: romaikaikaṃ kūpake syādbhūpānāṃ tu mahātmanām / dvedve romṇī paṇḍitānāṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ tathaiva ca //
analyzed: roma ekaikam kūpake syāt bhūpānām tu mahātmanām dve dve romṇī paṇḍitānām śrotriyāṇām tathā eva ca

original: romatrayaṃ daridrāṇāṃ rogī nirmāṃsajānukaḥ / alpaliṅgī ca dhanavānsyācca putrādivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: roma trayam daridrāṇām rogī nirmāṃsa jānukaḥ alpa liṅgī ca dhanavān syāt ca putra ādi varjitaḥ

original: sthūlaliṅgo daridraḥ syāddukhyekavṛṣṇī bhavet / viṣamestrīcañcalo vai nṛpaḥ syādvṛṣaṇe same //
analyzed: sthūla liṅgaḥ daridraḥ syāt dukhī eka vṛṣṇiḥ bhavet viṣame strī cañcalaḥ vai nṛpaḥ syāt vṛṣaṇe same

original: pralambavṛṣaṇo 'lpāyurnirdravyaḥ kumaṇirbhavet / pāṇḍurairmalinaiścaiva maṇibhiśca sukhī naraḥ //
analyzed: pralamba vṛṣaṇaḥ lpa āyuḥ nirdravyaḥ kumaṇiḥ bhavet pāṇḍuraiḥ malinaiḥ ca eva maṇibhiḥ ca sukhī naraḥ

original: niḥ svāḥ saśabdamūtrāḥ syurnṛpā niḥśabdadhārayā / bhogāḍhyāḥ samajaṭharā niḥ svāḥ syurghaṭasannibhāḥ //
analyzed: niḥ svāḥ sa śabda mūtrāḥ syuḥ nṛpāḥ niḥśabda dhārayā bhoga āḍhyāḥ sama jaṭharāḥ niḥ svāḥ syuḥ ghaṭa sannibhāḥ

original: sarpodarā daridrāḥ syū rekhābhiścāyurucyate / lalāṭe yasya dṛśyante tisro rekhāḥ samāhitāḥ //
analyzed: sarpa udarāḥ daridrāḥ syuḥ rekhābhiḥ ca āyuḥ ucyate lalāṭe yasya dṛśyante tisraḥ rekhāḥ samāhitāḥ

original: sukhī putrasamāyuktaḥ sa ṣaṣṭiṃ jīvate naraḥ / catvāriṃśacca varṣāṇi dvirekhādarśanānnaraḥ //
analyzed: sukhī putra samāyuktaḥ sa ṣaṣṭim jīvate naraḥ catvāriṃśat ca varṣāṇi dvi rekhā darśanāt naraḥ

original: viṃśatyabdaṃ tvekarekhā ākarṇāntāḥ śatāyuṣaḥ //
analyzed: viṃśati abdam tu eka rekhāḥ ā karṇa antāḥ śata āyuṣaḥ

original: saptatyāyurdvirekhā tu ṣaṣṭyāyustisṛbhirbhavet / vyaktāvyaktābhī rekhābhirviṃśatyāyurbhavennaraḥ //
analyzed: saptati āyūḥ dvi rekhā tu ṣaṣṭi āyūḥ tisṛbhiḥ bhavet vyakta avyaktābhiḥ rekhābhiḥ viṃśati āyūḥ bhavet naraḥ

original: catvāriṃśacca varṣāṇi hīnarekhastu jīvati / bhinnābhiścaiva rekhābhirapamṛtyurnarasya hi //
analyzed: catvāriṃśat ca varṣāṇi hīna rekhaḥ tu jīvati bhinnābhiḥ ca eva rekhābhiḥ apamṛtyuḥ narasya hi

original: triśūlaṃ paṭṭiśaṃ vāpi lalāṭe yasya dṛśyate / dhanaputra samāyuktaḥ sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam //
analyzed: triśūlam paṭṭiśam vā api lalāṭe yasya dṛśyate dhana putra samāyuktaḥ sa jīvet śaradaḥ śatam

original: tarjanyā madhyamāṅgulyā āyūrekhā tu madhyataḥ / saṃprāptā yā bhavedrudra / sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam //
analyzed: tarjanyāḥ madhyamā aṅgulyāḥ āyūrekhā tu madhyataḥ saṃprāptā yā bhavet rudra sa jīvet śaradaḥ śatam

original: prathamā jñānarekhā tu hyaṅguṣṭhādanuvartate / madhyamāmūlagā rekhā āyūrekhā ataḥ param //
analyzed: prathamā jñāna rekhā tu hi aṅguṣṭhāt anuvartate madhyamā ā mūla gā rekhā āyūrekhā atas param

original: kaniṣṭhikāṃ samāśritya āyūrekhā samāviśet / acchinnā vā vibhaktā vā sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam //
analyzed: kaniṣṭhikām samāśritya āyūrekhā samāviśet acchinnā vā vibhaktā vā sa jīvet śaradaḥ śatam

original: yasya pāṇitale rekhā āyustasya prakāśayet / śatavarṣāṇi jīvecca bhogī rudra / na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: yasya pāṇi tale rekhā āyuḥ tasya prakāśayet śata varṣāṇi jīvet ca bhogī rudra na saṃśayaḥ

original: kaniṣṭhikāṃ samāśritya madhyamāyāmupāgatā / ṣaṣṭhivarṣāyuṣaṃ kuryādāyūrekhā tu mānavam //
analyzed: kaniṣṭhikām samāśritya madhyamāyām upāgatā kuryāt āyūrekhā tu mānavam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike puṃllakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma triṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike puṃllakṣaṇanirūpaṇam nāma triṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 64
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / yasyāstu kuñcitāḥ keśā mukhaṃ ca parimaṇḍalam / nābhiśca dakṣiṇāvartā sā kanyā kulavardhinī //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca yasyāḥ tu kuñcitāḥ keśāḥ mukham ca parimaṇḍalam nābhiḥ ca dakṣiṇa āvartā sā kanyā kula vardhinī

original: yā ca kāñcanavarṇābhā raktahastasaroruhā / sahasrāṇāṃ tu nārīṇāṃ bhavetsāpi pativratā //
analyzed: yā ca kāñcana varṇa ābhā rakta hasta saroruhā sahasrāṇām tu nārīṇām bhavet sā api pativratā

original: vakrakeśā ca yā kanyā maṇḍalākṣī ca yā bhavet / bhartā ca mriyate tasyā niyataṃ duḥ khabhāginī //
analyzed: vakra keśā ca yā kanyā maṇḍala akṣī ca yā bhavet bhartā ca mriyate tasyāḥ niyatam duḥ kha bhāginī

original: pūrṇacandramukhī kanyā bālasūryasamaprabhā / viśālanetrā bimboṣṭhī sā kanyā labhate sukham //
analyzed: pūrṇa candra mukhī kanyā bāla sūrya sama prabhā viśāla netrā bimboṣṭhī sā kanyā labhate sukham

original: rekhābhirbahubhiḥ kleśaṃ svalpābhirdhanahīnatā / raktābhiḥ sukhamāpnoti kṛṣṇābhiḥ preṣyatāṃvrajet //
analyzed: rekhābhiḥ bahubhiḥ kleśam su alpābhiḥ dhana hīna tā  raktābhiḥ sukham āpnoti kṛṣṇābhiḥ preṣya tām vrajet

original: kārye ca mantrī satstrī syātsatī (khī)
analyzed: kārye ca mantrī sat strī syāt satī khī

original: syātkaraṇeṣu ca / streheṣu bhāryā mātā syādveśyā ca śayane śubhā //
analyzed: syāt karaṇeṣu ca bhāryā mātā syāt veśyā ca śayane śubhā

original: aṅkuśaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ cakraṃ yasyāḥ pāṇitale bhavet / putraṃ prasūyate nārī narendraṃ labhate patim //
analyzed: aṅkuśam kuṇḍalam cakram yasyāḥ pāṇi tale bhavet putram prasūyate nārī narendram labhate patim

original: yasyāstu romaśau pārśvau romaśau ca payodharau / annatau cādharoṣṭhau ca kṣipraṃ mārayate patim //
analyzed: yasyāḥ tu romaśau pārśvau romaśau ca payodharau ca kṣipram mārayate patim

original: yasyāḥ pāṇitale rekhā prākārastoraṇaṃ bhavet / api dāsakule jātā rājñītvamupagacchati //
analyzed: yasyāḥ pāṇi tale rekhā prākāraḥ toraṇam bhavet api dāsa kule jātā rājñī tvam upagacchati

original: udvṛttā kapilā yasya romarājī nirantaram / api rājakule jātā dāsītvamupagacchati //
analyzed: udvṛttā kapilā yasya romarājī nirantaram api rāja kule jātā dāsī tvam upagacchati

original: yasyā anāmikāṅguṣṭhau pṛthivyāṃ naiva tiṣṭhataḥ / patiṃ mārayate kṣipraṃ svecchācāreṇa vartate //
analyzed: yasyāḥ anāmikā aṅguṣṭhau pṛthivyām na eva tiṣṭhataḥ patim mārayate kṣipram sva icchā ācāreṇa vartate

original: yasyā gamanamātreṇa bhūmikampaḥ prajāyate / patiṃ mārayate kṣipraṃ svecchācāreṇa vartate //
analyzed: yasyāḥ gamana mātreṇa bhūmi kampaḥ prajāyate patim mārayate kṣipram sva icchā ācāreṇa vartate

original: cakṣuḥ snehena saubhāgyaṃ dantasnehena bhojanam / tvacaḥ snehena śāyyāṃ ca pādasnehena vāhanam //
analyzed: cakṣuḥ snehena saubhāgyam danta snehena bhojanam tvacaḥ snehena śāyyām ca pāda snehena vāhanam

original: snigdhonnatau tāmranakhau nāryāśca caraṇau śubhau / matsyāṅkuśābjacihnau ca cakralāṅgalalakṣitau //
analyzed: snigdha unnatau tāmra nakhau nāryāḥ ca caraṇau śubhau matsya aṅkuśa abja cihnau ca cakra lāṅgala lakṣitau

original: asvedinau mūdutalau praśastau caraṇau striyāḥ / śubhe jaṅghe virome ca ūrū hastikaropamau //
analyzed: asvedinau mūdu talau praśastau caraṇau striyāḥ śubhe jaṅghe virome ca ūrū hasti kara upamau

original: aśvatthapatrasadṛśaṃ vipulaṃ guhyamuttamam / nābhiḥ praśastā gambhīrā dakṣiṇāvartikā śubhā / aromā trivalī nāryā hṛtstanau romavarjitau //
analyzed: aśvattha patra sadṛśam vipulam guhyam uttamam nābhiḥ praśastā gambhīrā dakṣiṇa āvartikā śubhā aromā trivalī nāryāḥ hṛd stanau roma varjitau

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike strīlakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike strīlakṣaṇanirūpaṇam nāma catuḥ ṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 65
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / samudroktaṃ pravakṣyāmi narastrīlakṣaṇaṃ śubham / yena vijñātamātreṇa atītānāgatāpramā //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca samudra uktam pravakṣyāmi nara strī lakṣaṇam śubham yena vijñāta mātreṇa atīta anāgata apramā

original: asvedinau mṛdutalau kamalodarasannibhau / śleṣṭāṅgulī tāmranakhau pādāviṣṇau śirojjhitau //
analyzed: asvedinau mṛdu talau kamala udara sannibhau śleṣṭa aṅgulī tāmra nakhau pāda āviṣṇau śira ujjhitau

original: kūrmonnatau gūḍhagulphau supārṣṇo nṛpateḥ smṛtau / śū(sar) pākārau virūkṣau ca vakrau pādau śirālakau //
analyzed: kūrma unnatau gūḍha gulphau su pārṣṇaḥ nṛpateḥ smṛtau

original: saṃśuṣkau pāṇḍuranakhau niḥ svasya viralāṅgulī / mārgāyotkaṇṭakau pādau kaṣāyasadṛśau tathā //
analyzed: saṃśuṣkau pāṇḍura nakhau niḥ svasya virala aṅgulī mārgāya utkaṇṭakau pādau kaṣāya sadṛśau tathā

original: vicchittidau ca vaṃśasya brahmanghau śaṅku (pakra) sannibhau / agamyāgamane prītau jaṅghā viralaromikā //
analyzed: vicchitti dau ca vaṃśasya brahmanghau śaṅku pakra sannibhau agamyā gamane prītau jaṅghā viralaromikā

original: mṛduromā samā jaṅghā tathā karikaraprabhā / ūravo jānavastulyā nṛpasyopacitāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: mṛdu romā samā jaṅghā tathā kari kara prabhā ūravaḥ jānavaḥ tulyāḥ nṛpasya upacitāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: niḥ svasya sṛgālajaṅghā raumaikaikaṃ cakūpake / nṛpāṇāṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ ca dvedve śriye ca dhīmatām //
analyzed: niḥ svasya sṛgāla jaṅghāḥ rauma ekaikam ca kūpake nṛpāṇām śrotriyāṇām ca dve dve śriye ca dhīmatām

original: tryādyairniḥ svā mānavāḥ syurduḥ svabhājaśca ninditāḥ / keśāśca vai kuñcitāśca pravāse mriyate naraḥ //
analyzed: tri ādyaiḥ niḥ svāḥ mānavāḥ syuḥ duḥ sva bhājaḥ ca ninditāḥ  keśāḥ ca vai kuñcitāḥ ca pravāse mriyate naraḥ

original: nirmāṃsajānuḥ saubhāgyamalpairnimnai ratiḥ striyāḥ / vikaṭaiśca daridrāḥ syuḥ samāṃsai rājyameva ca //
analyzed: nirmāṃsa jānuḥ saubhāgyam alpaiḥ nimnaiḥ ratiḥ striyāḥ  vikaṭaiḥ ca daridrāḥ syuḥ sa māṃsaiḥ rājyam eva ca

original: mahadbhirāyurākhyātaṃ hyalpaliṅgo dhanī naraḥ / apatyarahitaścaiva sthūlaliṅgo ghanojjhitaḥ //
analyzed: mahadbhiḥ āyuḥ ākhyātam hi alpa liṅgaḥ dhanī naraḥ apatya rahitaḥ ca eva sthūla liṅgaḥ ghana ujjhitaḥ

original: meḍhe vāmanate caiva sutārtharahito bhavet / vakre 'nyathā putravāntsyāddāridrayaṃ vinatetvadhaḥ //
analyzed: meḍhe vāma nate ca eva suta artha rahitaḥ bhavet vakre nyathā putravān syāt dāridrayam

original: alpe tvatanayo liṅgeśirāle 'tha sukhī naraḥ / sthūlagranthiyute liṅge bhavetputrādisaṃyutaḥ //
analyzed: alpe tu a tanayaḥ sukhī naraḥ sthūla granthi yute liṅge bhavet putra ādi saṃyutaḥ

original: kośagūḍhe dīrghairbhugnaiśca dhanavarjitaḥ / balavānyuddhaśīlaśca laghuśektaḥ sa eva ca //
analyzed: kośa gūḍhe dīrghaiḥ bhugnaiḥ ca dhana varjitaḥ balavān yuddha śīlaḥ ca saḥ eva ca

original: durbalastvekavṛṣaṇo viṣamābhyāñcalaḥ striyām / samābhyāṃ kṣitipaḥ proktaḥ pralambena śatābdavān //
analyzed: durbalaḥ tu eka vṛṣaṇaḥ viṣamābhyām añcalaḥ striyām samābhyām kṣitipaḥ proktaḥ pralambena śata abdavān

original: udvṛṃ (ddha) tābhyāṃ ca bahvāyū rūkṣairmaṇibhirīśvaraḥ / pāṇḍarairmaṇibhirniḥ svā malinaiḥ sukhabhāginaḥ //
analyzed: tābhyām ca bahu āyuḥ rūkṣaiḥ maṇibhiḥ īśvaraḥ pāṇḍaraiḥ maṇibhiḥ niḥ svāḥ malinaiḥ sukha bhāginaḥ

original: saśabdaniḥ śabdamūtrāḥ syudaṃridrāśca mānavāḥ / ekadvitricatuḥ pañcaṣaḍbhirdhārābhireva ca //
analyzed: sa śabdaniḥ śabda mūtrāḥ syuḥ aṃridrāḥ ca mānavāḥ eka dvi tri catuḥ pañca ṣaḍbhiḥ dhārābhiḥ eva ca

original: dakṣiṇāvartacalitamūtrā bhiśca nṛpāḥ smṛtāḥ / vikīrṇamūtrā niḥ svāśca pradhānasukhadāyikāḥ //
analyzed: dakṣiṇa āvarta calita mūtrāḥ bhiḥ ca nṛpāḥ smṛtāḥ vikīrṇa mūtrāḥ svāḥ ca pradhāna sukha dāyikāḥ

original: ekadhārāśca vanitāḥ snigdhairmaṇibhirunnataiḥ / samaiḥ strīratnadhanino madhye nimnaiśca kanyakāḥ //
analyzed: eka dhārāḥ ca vanitāḥ snigdhaiḥ maṇibhiḥ unnataiḥ samaiḥ strī ratna dhaninaḥ madhye nimnaiḥ ca kanyakāḥ

original: śuṣkairniśvā viśuṣkaiśca durbhagāḥ parikīrtitāḥ / puṣpagandhe nṛpāḥ śukre madhugandhe dhanaṃ bahuḥ //
analyzed: śuṣkaiḥ niśvāḥ viśuṣkaiḥ ca durbhagāḥ parikīrtitāḥ puṣpa gandhe nṛpāḥ śukre madhu gandhe dhanam bahuḥ

original: putrāḥ śukre matsyagandhe tanuśukre ca kanyakāḥ / mahābhogī māṃsagandhe yajvā syānmadagandhini //
analyzed: putrāḥ śukre matsya gandhe tanu śukre ca kanyakāḥ mahā bhogī māṃsa gandhe yajvā syāt mada gandhini

original: daridraḥ kṣāragandhe ca dīrghāyuḥ śīghramaithunī / aśīghramaithunyalpāyuḥ sthūlasphik syāddhanojjhitaḥ //
analyzed: daridraḥ kṣāra gandhe ca dīrgha āyuḥ śīghra maithunī aśīghra maithunī alpa āyuḥ sthūla sphic syāt dhana ujjhitaḥ

original: māṃsalasphik sukhī syācca siṃhasphik bhūpatiḥ smṛtaḥ / bhavetsiṃhakaṭī rājā niḥ svaḥ kapikaṭirnaraḥ //
analyzed: māṃsala sphic sukhī syāt ca siṃha sphic bhūpatiḥ smṛtaḥ bhavet siṃha kaṭī rājā niḥ svaḥ kapi kaṭiḥ naraḥ

original: sarpodarā daridrāḥ syuḥ piṭharaiśca ghaṭaiḥ samaiḥ / dhanino vipulaiḥ pārśvairniḥ svā raktaiśca nimnagaiḥ //
analyzed: sarpa udarāḥ daridrāḥ syuḥ piṭharaiḥ ca ghaṭaiḥ samaiḥ dhaninaḥ vipulaiḥ pārśvaiḥ niḥ svāḥ raktaiḥ ca nimna gaiḥ

original: samakakṣāśca bhogāḍhyā nimnakakṣā dhanojjhitāḥ / nṛpāśconnatakakṣāḥ syurjihnā viṣamakakṣakāḥ //
analyzed: sama kakṣāḥ ca bhoga āḍhyāḥ nimna kakṣāḥ dhana ujjhitāḥ nṛpāḥ ca unnata kakṣāḥ syuḥ jihnāḥ viṣama kakṣakāḥ

original: matsyodarā bahudhanā nābhibhiḥ sukhinaḥ smṛtāḥ / vistīrṇābhirbahulābhirnimnābhiḥ kleśabhāginaḥ //
analyzed: matsya udarāḥ bahu dhanāḥ nābhibhiḥ sukhinaḥ smṛtāḥ vistīrṇābhiḥ bahulābhiḥ nimnābhiḥ kleśa bhāginaḥ

original: balimadhyagatā nābhiḥ śūlabādhāṃ karoti hi / vāmāvartaśca sādhyaṃ vai medhāṃ dakṣiṇatastathā //
analyzed: bali madhya gatā nābhiḥ śūla bādhām karoti hi vāma āvartaḥ ca sādhyam vai medhām dakṣiṇatas tathā

original: pārśvāyatā cirāyurdā tūpaviṣṭā dhaneśvaram / adho gavāḍhyaṃ kuryācca nṛpatvaṃ padmakarṇikā //
analyzed: pārśva āyatā cira āyuḥ dā tu upaviṣṭā dhaneśvaram adhas gavā āḍhyam kuryāt ca nṛpa tvam padma karṇikā

original: ekabaliḥ śatāyuḥ syācchrībhogī dvivaliḥ smṛtaḥ / trivaliḥ kṣmāpa ācārya ṛjubhirvālibhiḥ sukhī //
analyzed: eka baliḥ śata āyuḥ syāt śrī bhogī dvi valiḥ smṛtaḥ tri valiḥ kṣmāpaḥ ācāryaḥ sukhī

original: agamyāgāmī jihmabalirbhūpāḥ pārśvaiśca māṃsalaiḥ / mṛdubhiḥ susamaiścaiva dakṣiṇāvartaromabhiḥ //
analyzed: agamyā gāmī jihma baliḥ bhūpāḥ pārśvaiḥ ca māṃsalaiḥ mṛdubhiḥ su samaiḥ ca eva dakṣiṇa āvarta romabhiḥ

original: viparītaiḥ parapreṣyā nirdravyāḥ sukhavarjitāḥ / anuddhataiścūcukaiśca bhavanti subhagā narāḥ //
analyzed: viparītaiḥ para preṣyāḥ nirdravyāḥ sukha varjitāḥ anuddhataiḥ cūcukaiḥ ca bhavanti subhagāḥ narāḥ

original: nirdhanā viṣamairderghaiḥ pītopacitakairnṛpāḥ / samonnataṃ ca hṛdayamakampaṃ māṃsalaṃ pṛthu //
analyzed: nirdhanāḥ viṣamaiḥ derghaiḥ pīta upacitakaiḥ nṛpāḥ sama unnatam ca hṛdayam akampam māṃsalam pṛthu

original: nṛpāṇāmadhamānāṃ ca khararomaśirālakam / arthavānsamavakṣāḥ syātpīnairvakṣobhirūrjitaḥ //
analyzed: nṛpāṇām adhamānām ca khara roma śirālakam arthavān sama vakṣāḥ syāt pīnaiḥ vakṣobhiḥ ūrjitaḥ

original: vakṣobhirviṣamairniḥ svaḥ śastreṇanidhanāstathā / viṣamairjatrubhirniḥ svā asthinaddhaiśca mānavāḥ //
analyzed: vakṣobhiḥ viṣamaiḥ niḥ svar śastreṇa nidhanāḥ tathā viṣamaiḥ jatrubhiḥ niḥ svāḥ asthi naddhaiḥ ca mānavāḥ

original: unnatairbhogino nimnairniḥ svāḥ pīnairdhanānvitāḥ / niḥ svaścipiṭakaṇṭhaḥ syācchirāśuṣkagalaḥ sukhī //
analyzed: unnataiḥ bhoginaḥ nimnaiḥ niḥ svāḥ pīnaiḥ dhana anvitāḥ niḥ svaḥ cipiṭa kaṇṭhaḥ syāt sirā śuṣka galaḥ sukhī

original: śūraḥ syānmahiṣagrīvaḥ śāstrātto mṛgakaṇṭhakaḥ / kambugrīvaśca nṛpatirlambakaṇṭho 'tibhakṣakaḥ //
analyzed: śūraḥ syāt mahiṣa grīvaḥ śāstra āttaḥ mṛga kaṇṭhakaḥ kambu grīvaḥ ca nṛpatiḥ lamba kaṇṭhaḥ ti bhakṣakaḥ

original: aromaśā bhugnapṛṣṭhaṃ śubhaṃ cāśubhamanyathā / kakṣāśvatthadalā śreṣṭhā sugandhirmṛgaromikā //
analyzed: aromaśā bhugna pṛṣṭham śubham ca aśubham anyathā kakṣā aśvattha dalā śreṣṭhā sugandhiḥ mṛga romikā

original: anyathā tvarthahīnānāṃ dāridrayasya ca kāraṇam / saṃmāsau caiva bhugnālpau śliṣṭau ca vipulau śubhau //
analyzed: anyathā tu artha hīnānām ca kāraṇam

original: ājānulambitau bāhū vṛttau pīnau nṛpeśvare / niḥ svānāṃ romaśau hrasvau śreṣṭhau karikara prabhau //
analyzed: ājānu lambitau bāhū vṛttau pīnau nṛpa īśvare niḥ svānām romaśau hrasvau śreṣṭhau kari kara prabhau

original: hastāṅgulaya eva syuvāyudvārayutāḥ śubhāḥ / medhāvināṃ ca sūkṣmāḥ syurbhṛtyānāṃ cipiṭāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: hasta aṅgulayaḥ eva syuḥ vāyu dvāra yutāḥ śubhāḥ  medhāvinām ca sūkṣmāḥ syuḥ bhṛtyānām cipiṭāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: sthūlāṅgulībhirniḥ svāḥ syurnatāḥ syuḥ sukṛśaistadā / kapitulyakarāḥ niḥ svā vyāghratulyakarairbalam //
analyzed: sthūla aṅgulībhiḥ niḥ svāḥ syuḥ natāḥ syuḥ su kṛśaiḥ tadā kapi tulya karāḥ niḥ svāḥ vyāghra tulya karaiḥ balam

original: pitṛvittavināśaśca nimnātkaratalānnarāḥ / maṇibandhairnigūḍhaiśca suśliṣṭaiḥ śubhagandhibhiḥ //
analyzed: pitṛ vitta vināśaḥ ca nimnāt kara talāt narāḥ maṇibandhaiḥ nigūḍhaiḥ ca su śliṣṭaiḥ śubha gandhibhiḥ

original: nṛpā hīnāḥ karacchaidaiḥ saśabdairdhanavarjitāḥ / saṃvṛtaiścaiva nimnaiśca dhaninaḥ parikīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: nṛpāḥ hīnāḥ kara chaidaiḥ sa śabdaiḥ dhana varjitāḥ saṃvṛtaiḥ ca eva nimnaiḥ ca dhaninaḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: prottānaka radātāro viṣamairviṣamā narāḥ / karaiḥ karatalaiścaiva lākṣābhairīśvarāstalaiḥ //
analyzed: prottānaka ra dātāraḥ viṣamaiḥ viṣamāḥ narāḥ karaiḥ kara talaiḥ ca eva lākṣā ābhaiḥ īśvarāḥ talaiḥ

original: paradāraratāḥ pītairūkṣairniḥ svā narā matāḥ / tuṣatulyanakhāḥ klībāḥ kuṭilaiḥ sphuṭitairnarāḥ //
analyzed: paradāra ratāḥ pītaiḥ ūkṣaiḥ niḥ svāḥ narāḥ matāḥ tuṣa tulya nakhāḥ klībāḥ kuṭilaiḥ sphuṭitaiḥ narāḥ

original: niḥ svāśca kunakhaistadvadvivarṇaiḥ paratarkakāḥ / tāmrairbhūpā dhanāḍhyāśca aṅguṣṭhaiḥ sayavaistathā //
analyzed: niḥ svāḥ ca kunakhaiḥ tadvat vivarṇaiḥ paratarkakāḥ tāmraiḥ bhūpāḥ dhana āḍhyāḥ ca aṅguṣṭhaiḥ sa yavaiḥ tathā

original: aṅguṣṭhamūlajaiḥ putrī syāddīrghāṅguliparvakaḥ / dīrghāyuḥ subhagaścaiva nirdhano viralāṅguliḥ //
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha mūla jaiḥ putrī syāt dīrgha aṅguli parvakaḥ  dīrgha āyuḥ subhagaḥ ca eva nirdhanaḥ virala aṅguliḥ

original: ghanāṅguliśca sadhanastisro rekhāścayasya vai / nṛpateḥ karatalagā maṇibandhātsamutthitāḥ //
analyzed: ghana aṅguliḥ ca sa dhanaḥ tisraḥ rekhāḥ cayasya vai nṛpateḥ kara tala gāḥ maṇibandhāt samutthitāḥ

original: yugamīnāṅkitanaro bhavetsatraprado naraḥ / vajrākārāśca dhanināṃ matsyapucchanibhā budhe //
analyzed: yuga mīna aṅkita naraḥ bhavet satra pradaḥ naraḥ vajra ākārāḥ ca dhaninām matsya puccha nibhāḥ budhe

original: śaṅkhātapatraśivikāgajapadmopamā nṛpe / kumbhāṅkuśapatākābhā mṛṇālābhā nidhīśvare //
analyzed: śaṅkha ātapatra śivikā gaja padma upamāḥ nṛpe kumbha aṅkuśa patākā ābhāḥ mṛṇāla ābhāḥ nidhi īśvare

original: dāmābhāśca gavāḍhyānāṃ svastikābhā nṛpeśvare / cakrāsitomaradhanuḥ kuntābhā nṛpateḥ kare //
analyzed: dāma ābhāḥ ca gavā āḍhyānām svastika ābhāḥ nṛpa īśvare cakra asi tomara dhanuḥ kunta ābhāḥ nṛpateḥ kare

original: alūkhalābhā yajñāḍhyā vedībhā cāgnihotriṇi / vāpīdevakulyābhāstrikoṇābhāścadhārmike //
analyzed: alu ukhala ābhāḥ yajña āḍhyāḥ vedī bhā ca agnihotriṇi vāpī devakulyā ābhāḥ trikoṇa ābhāḥ ca dhārmike

original: aṅguṣṭhamūlagā rekhāḥ putrāḥ sūkṣmāśca dārikāḥ / pradeśinīgatā rekhā kaniṣṭhāmūlagāminī //
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha mūla gāḥ rekhāḥ putrāḥ sūkṣmāḥ ca dārikāḥ pradeśinī gatā rekhā kaniṣṭhā mūla gāminī

original: śatāyuṣaṃ ca kurute chinnayā taruto bhayam / niḥ svāśca bahurekhāḥ syunirdravyāścibukaiḥ kṛśaiḥ //
analyzed: śata āyuṣam ca kurute chinnayā tarutaḥ bhayam niḥ svāḥ ca bahu rekhāḥ syuḥ nirdravyāḥ cibukaiḥ kṛśaiḥ

original: māṃsalaiśca dhanopetā āraktairadharairnṛpāḥ / bimbopamaiśca sphuṭitairoṣṭhairūkṣaiścakaṇḍitaiḥ //
analyzed: māṃsalaiḥ ca dhana upetāḥ āraktaiḥ adharaiḥ nṛpāḥ bimba upamaiḥ ca sphuṭitaiḥ oṣṭhaiḥ ūkṣaiḥ cakaṇḍitaiḥ

original: viṣamairdhanahīnāśca dantāḥ snigdhā ghanāḥ śubhāḥ / tīkṣṇā dantāḥ samāḥ śreṣṭhā jihvā raktā samā śubhā //
analyzed: viṣamaiḥ dhana hīnāḥ ca dantāḥ snigdhāḥ ghanāḥ śubhāḥ  tīkṣṇāḥ dantāḥ samāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ jihvā raktā samā śubhā

original: ślakṣṇā dīrghā ca vijñeyā tālū śvete dhanakṣaye / kṛṣṇe ca paruṣo vakraṃ samaṃ saumyaṃ ca saṃvṛtam //
analyzed: ślakṣṇā dīrghā ca vijñeyā tālū śvete dhana kṣaye kṛṣṇe ca paruṣaḥ vakram samam saumyam ca saṃvṛtam

original: bhūpānāmamalaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ viparītaṃ ca duḥ khinām / mahā duḥ khaṃ durbhagāṇāṃ strīmukhaṃ putramāpnuyāt //
analyzed: bhūpānām amalam ślakṣṇam viparītam ca duḥ khinām mahā duḥ kham durbhagāṇām strī mukham putram āpnuyāt

original: āḍhyānāṃ vartulaṃ vakraṃ nirdravyāṇāṃ ca dīrghakam / bhīruvakraḥ pāpakarmā dhūrtānāṃ caturaśrakam //
analyzed: āḍhyānām vartulam vakram nirdravyāṇām ca dīrghakam bhīru vakraḥ pāpa karmā dhūrtānām caturaśrakam

original: nimnaṃ vakramaputrāṇāṃ kṛpaṇānāṃ ca hrasvakam / sampūrṇaṃ bhogināṃ kāntaṃ śmaśru snigdhaṃ śubhaṃ mṛdu //
analyzed: nimnam vakram aputrāṇām kṛpaṇānām ca hrasvakam sampūrṇam bhoginām kāntam śmaśru snigdham śubham mṛdu

original: saṃhataṃ cāsphuṭitāgraṃ raktaśmaśruśca caurakaḥ / raktālpaparuṣaśmaśrukarṇāḥ syuḥ pāpamṛtyavaḥ //
analyzed: saṃhatam ca a sphuṭita agram rakta śmaśruḥ ca caurakaḥ rakta alpa paruṣa śmaśru karṇāḥ syuḥ pāpa mṛtyavaḥ

original: nirmāṃsaiścipiṭairbhogāḥ kṛpaṇā hrasvakarṇakāḥ / śaṅkukarṇāśca rājāno romakarṇā gatāyuṣaḥ //
analyzed: nirmāṃsaiḥ cipiṭaiḥ bhogāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ hrasva karṇakāḥ  śaṅku karṇāḥ ca rājānaḥ roma karṇāḥ gata āyuṣaḥ

original: bṛhatkarṇāśca dhaninorājānaḥ parikīrtitāḥ / karṇaiḥ snigdhāvanaddhaiśca vyālambairmāṃsalairnṛpāḥ //
analyzed: bṛhat karṇāḥ ca dhaninaḥ rājānaḥ parikīrtitāḥ karṇaiḥ snigdha avanaddhaiḥ ca vyālambaiḥ māṃsalaiḥ nṛpāḥ

original: bhogī vai nimnagaṇḍaḥ syānmatrī sampūrṇagaṇḍakaḥ / śukanāsaḥ sukhī syācca śuṣkanāso 'tijīvanaḥ //
analyzed: bhogī vai nimna gaṇḍaḥ syāt matrī sampūrṇa gaṇḍakaḥ śuka nāsaḥ sukhī syāt ca śuṣka nāsaḥ ti jīvanaḥ

original: chinnāgrakūpanāsaḥ syādagamyāgamane rataḥ / dīrghanāse ca saubhāgyaṃ cauraścākuñcitendriyaḥ //
analyzed: chinna agra kūpa nāsaḥ syāt agamyā gamane rataḥ dīrgha nāse ca saubhāgyam cauraḥ ca ākuñcita indriyaḥ

original: mṛtyuścipiṭanāse syāddhīno bhāgyavatāṃ bhavet / svalpacchidrau supuṭau ca avakrau ca nṛpeśvare //
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ cipiṭa nāse syāt hīnaḥ bhāgyavatām bhavet su alpa chidrau su puṭau ca avakrau ca nṛpa īśvare

original: krūre dakṣiṇavakrā syādvalināṃ ca kṣutaṃ sakṛt / syādviniṣpiṇḍitaṃ hrādi sānunādaṃ ca jīvakṛt //
analyzed: krūre dakṣiṇa vakrā syāt valinām ca kṣutam sakṛt syāt viniṣpiṇḍitam hrādi sa anunādam ca jīva kṛt

original: vakrāntaiḥ padmapatrābhairlocanaiḥ sukhabhāginaḥ / mārjāralocanaiḥ pāpmā durātmā madhupiṅgalaiḥ //
analyzed: vakra antaiḥ padma patra ābhaiḥ locanaiḥ sukha bhāginaḥ mārjāra locanaiḥ pāpmā durātmā madhu piṅgalaiḥ

original: krūrāḥ kekaranetrāśca haritākṣāḥ sakalmaṣāḥ / jihyaiśca locanaiḥ śūrāḥ senānyo gajalocanāḥ //
analyzed: krūrāḥ kekara netrāḥ ca harita akṣāḥ sa kalmaṣāḥ locanaiḥ śūrāḥ gaja locanāḥ

original: gambhīrākṣā īśvarāḥ syurmantriṇaḥ sthūlacakṣuṣaḥ / nīlotpa lākṣā vidvāṃsaḥ saubhāgyaṃ śyāmacakṣuṣām //
analyzed: gambhīra akṣāḥ īśvarāḥ syuḥ mantriṇaḥ sthūla cakṣuṣaḥ  nīlotpa lākṣāḥ vidvāṃsaḥ saubhāgyam śyāma cakṣuṣām

original: syātkṛṣṇatārakākṣāṇāmakṣṇāmutpāṭanaṃ kila / maṇḍalākṣāśca pāpāḥ syurniḥ svāḥ syurdenalocanāḥ //
analyzed: syāt kṛṣṇa tāraka akṣāṇām akṣṇām utpāṭanam kila maṇḍala akṣāḥ ca pāpāḥ syuḥ niḥ svāḥ

original: dṛk snigdhā vipulā bhoge alpāyuradhikonnatā / viśālonnatā sukhinī daridrā viṣamabhruvaḥ //
analyzed: dṛś snigdhā vipulā bhoge alpa āyuḥ adhika unnatā viśāla unnatā sukhinī daridrāḥ viṣama bhruvaḥ

original: ghanadīrghāsusaktabhrūrbālendūnnatasubhruvaḥ / āḍhyo niḥ svaśca khaṇḍabhrṛrmadhye ca vinatabhruvaḥ //
analyzed: ghana dīrgha asu sakta bhrūḥ bāla indu unnata su bhruvaḥ āḍhyaḥ niḥ svaḥ ca khaṇḍa bhrṛḥ madhye ca vinata bhruvaḥ

original: strīṣu gamyāsu saktāḥ syuḥ sutārthe parivarjitāḥ / annatairvipulaiḥ śaṅkhairlalāṭairviṣamaistathā //
analyzed: strīṣu gamyāsu saktāḥ syuḥ suta arthe parivarjitāḥ annataiḥ vipulaiḥ śaṅkhaiḥ lalāṭaiḥ viṣamaiḥ tathā

original: nirdhanā dhanavantaśca ardhendusadṛśairnarāḥ / ācāryāḥ śuktiviśālaiḥ śirālaiḥ pāpakāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: nirdhanāḥ dhanavantaḥ ca ardha indu sadṛśaiḥ narāḥ ācāryāḥ śukti viśālaiḥ śirālaiḥ pāpa kāriṇaḥ

original: annatābhaiḥ śirābhiśca svastikābhirdhaneśvarāḥ / nimnairlalāṭairbandhārhāḥ krūrakarmaratāstathā //
analyzed: sirābhiḥ ca svastikābhiḥ dhana īśvarāḥ nimnaiḥ lalāṭaiḥ bandha arhāḥ krūra karma ratāḥ tathā

original: saṃvṛtaiśca lalāṭaiśca kṛpaṇā unnatairnṛpāḥ / anaśru snigdharuditamadīnaṃ śubhadaṃ nṛṇām //
analyzed: saṃvṛtaiḥ ca lalāṭaiḥ ca kṛpaṇāḥ unnataiḥ nṛpāḥ anaśru snigdha ruditam adīnam śubha dam nṛṇām

original: pracurāśrudīnaṃ rūkṣaṃ ca ruditaṃ ca sukhāvaham / akampaṃ hasitaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mīlitākṣamaghāvaham //
analyzed: pracura aśru dīnam rūkṣam ca ruditam ca sukha āvaham akampam hasitam śreṣṭham mīlita akṣam agha āvaham

original: asakṛddhasitaṃ duṣṭaṃ sonmādasya hyanekadhā / lalāṭopasṛtāstisro rekhāḥ syuḥ śatavarṣiṇām //
analyzed: asakṛt hasitam duṣṭam sa unmādasya hi anekadhā lalāṭa upasṛtāḥ tisraḥ rekhāḥ syuḥ śata varṣiṇām

original: nṛpatvaṃ syāccatasṛbhirāyuḥ pañcanavatyatha / arekheṇāyurnavatirvicchinnābhiśca puṃślalāḥ //
analyzed: nṛpa tvam syāt catasṛbhiḥ āyuḥ pañcanavati atha arekheṇa āyuḥ navatiḥ vicchinnābhiḥ ca

original: keśāntopagatābhiśca aśītyāyurnaro bhavet / pañcabhiḥ saptabhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pañcāśadvahubhistathā //
analyzed: keśānta upagatābhiḥ ca aśīti āyūḥ naraḥ bhavet pañcabhiḥ saptabhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pañcāśat vahubhiḥ tathā

original: catvāriṃśacca vakrābhistriṃśadbhrūlagnagāmibhiḥ / viṃśatirvāmavakrā bhirāyuḥ kṣudrābhiralpakam //
analyzed: catvāriṃśat ca vakrābhiḥ triṃśat bhrū lagna gāmibhiḥ  viṃśatiḥ vāma vakrā bhiḥ āyuḥ kṣudrābhiḥ alpakam

original: chatrākāraiḥ śirobhistu nṛpā nimnaśirā dhanī / cipiṭaiśca piturmṛtyurgavādyāḥ parimaṇḍalaiḥ //
analyzed: chatra ākāraiḥ śirobhiḥ tu nṛpāḥ nimna śirāḥ dhanī cipiṭaiḥ ca pituḥ mṛtyuḥ gavā ādyāḥ parimaṇḍalaiḥ

original: ghaṭamūrdhā pāparucirdhanādyaiḥ parivarjitaḥ / kṛṣṇairākuñcitaiḥ keśaiḥ snigdhairekaikasambhavaiḥ //
analyzed: ghaṭa mūrdhā pāpa ruciḥ dhana ādyaiḥ parivarjitaḥ kṛṣṇaiḥ ākuñcitaiḥ keśaiḥ snigdhaiḥ ekaika sambhavaiḥ

original: abhinnāgraiśca mṛdubhirna cātibahubhirnṛpāḥ / bahumūlaiśca viṣamaiḥ sthūlāgraiḥ kapilaistathā //
analyzed: abhinna agraiḥ ca mṛdubhiḥ na ca ati bahubhiḥ nṛpāḥ bahu mūlaiḥ ca viṣamaiḥ sthūla agraiḥ kapilaiḥ tathā

original: niḥ svāścaivātikucilairghanairasita (dhika)
analyzed: niḥ dhika

original: mūrdhajaiḥ / yadyadgātraṃ mahārūkṣaṃ śirālaṃ māṃsavarjitam //
analyzed: mūrdhajaiḥ yat yat gātram mahā rūkṣam sirālam māṃsa varjitam

original: tattatsyā daśubhaṃ sarvaṃ tato 'nyathā / vipulastriṣu gambhīro dīrghaḥ sūkṣmaśca pañcasu //
analyzed: tat tat syāḥ sarvam tatas nyathā vipulaḥ triṣu gambhīraḥ dīrghaḥ sūkṣmaḥ ca pañcasu

original: ṣaḍunnataścaturhrasvo raktaḥ saptasvasau nṛpaḥ / nābhiḥ svaraśca sasattvaṃ ca trayaṃ gambhīramīritam //
analyzed: ṣaṣ unnataḥ catur hrasvaḥ raktaḥ saptasu asau nṛpaḥ nābhiḥ svaraḥ ca sa sattvam ca trayam gambhīram īritam

original: puṃsaḥ syādativistīrṇaṃ lalāṭaṃ vadanaṃ hyuraḥ / cakṣuḥ kakṣā nāsikā ca ṣaṭ syur nṛpakṛkāṭikāḥ //
analyzed: puṃsaḥ syāt ati vistīrṇam lalāṭam vadanam hi uraḥ  cakṣuḥ kakṣāḥ nāsikā ca ṣaṭ syuḥ nṛpa kṛkāṭikāḥ

original: unnatāni ca hrasvani jaṅghā grīvā ca liṅgakam / pṛṣṭhaṃ catvāri raktāni karatālvadharā nakhāḥ //
analyzed: unnatāni ca hrasvani jaṅghā grīvā ca liṅgakam pṛṣṭham catvāri raktāni kara tālu adharāḥ nakhāḥ

original: netrāntapādajihvauṣṭhāḥ pañca sūkṣmāṇi santi vai / daśanāṅguliparvāṇi nakhakeśatvacaḥ śubhāḥ //
analyzed: netra anta pāda jihvā oṣṭhāḥ pañca sūkṣmāṇi santi vai daśana aṅguli parvāṇi nakha keśa tvacaḥ śubhāḥ

original: dīrghāḥ stanāntaraṃ bāhudantalocananāsikāḥ / narāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ vadāmi strīṣu lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: dīrghāḥ stanāntaram bāhu danta locana nāsikāḥ  narāṇām lakṣaṇam proktam vadāmi strīṣu lakṣaṇam

original: rājñyāḥ snigdhau samau pādau talau tāmrau nakhau tathā / śliṣṭāṅgulī connatāgrau tāṃ pāpya nṛpatirbhavet //
analyzed: rājñyāḥ snigdhau samau pādau talau tāmrau nakhau tathā śliṣṭa aṅgulī ca unnata agrau tām pāpya nṛpatiḥ bhavet

original: nigūḍhagulphopacitau padmakāntitalau śubhau / asvedinau mṛdutalau matsyāṅkuśaghvajāñcitau //
analyzed: nigūḍha gulpha upacitau padma kānti talau śubhau asvedinau mṛdu talau

original: vajrābjahalacihnau ca dāsyāḥ pādau tato 'nyathā / jaṅghe ca romarahite suvṛtte viśire śubhe //
analyzed: vajra abja hala cihnau ca dāsyāḥ pādau tatas nyathā jaṅghe ca roma rahite su vṛtte viśire śubhe

original: anulbaṇaṃ sandhideśaṃ samaṃ jānudvayaṃ śubham / ūrū karikarākārāvaromau ca samau śubhau //
analyzed: anulbaṇam sandhi deśam samam jānu dvayam śubham ūrū kari kara ākārau aromau ca samau śubhau

original: aśvatthapatrasadṛśaṃ vipulaṃ guhyamuttamam / śroṇīlalāṭakaṃ strīṇāmūru kūrmonnataṃ śubham //
analyzed: aśvattha patra sadṛśam vipulam guhyam uttamam śroṇī lalāṭakam strīṇām ūru kūrma unnatam śubham

original: gūḍho maṇiśca śubhado nitambaśca guruḥ śubhaḥ / vistīrṇamāṃsopacitā gambhīrā vipulā śubhā //
analyzed: gūḍhaḥ maṇiḥ ca śubha daḥ nitambaḥ ca guruḥ śubhaḥ vistīrṇa māṃsa upacitā gambhīrā vipulā śubhā

original: nābhiḥ pradakṣiṇāvartā madhyaṃ tribaliśobhitam / aromaśau stanau pīnau ghanāvaviṣamau śubhau //
analyzed: nābhiḥ pradakṣiṇa āvartā madhyam tri bali śobhitam aromaśau stanau pīnau ghanau aviṣamau śubhau

original: kaṭhinau romaśā śastā mṛdugrīvā ca kambubhā / āraktāvadharau śreṣṭhau māṃsalaṃ vartulaṃ mukham //
analyzed: kaṭhinau romaśā śastā mṛdu grīvā ca kambu bhā āraktau adharau śreṣṭhau māṃsalam vartulam mukham

original: kundapuṣpasamā dantā bhāṣitaṃ kokilāsamam / dākṣiṇyayuktamaśaṭhaṃ haṃsaśabdasukhāvaham //
analyzed: kunda puṣpa samāḥ dantāḥ bhāṣitam kokilā samam dākṣiṇya yuktam aśaṭham haṃsa śabda sukha āvaham

original: nāsā samā samapuṭā strīṇāṃ tu rucirā śubhā / nīlotpalanibhaṃ cakṣurnāsālagnaṃ na lambakam //
analyzed: nāsā samā sama puṭā strīṇām tu rucirā śubhā nīlotpala nibham cakṣuḥ nāsā lagnam na lambakam

original: na pṛthū bālendunibhe bhruvau cātha lalāṭakam / śubhamardhendusaṃsthānamatuṅgaṃ syādalomaśam //
analyzed: na pṛthū bāla indu nibhe bhruvau ca atha lalāṭakam śubham ardha indu saṃsthānam atuṅgam syāt alomaśam

original: sumāṃsalaṃ karṇayugmaṃ samaṃ mṛdu samāhitam / snigdhā nīlāśca mṛdavo mūrdhajāḥ kuñcitāḥ kacāḥ //
analyzed: su māṃsalam karṇa yugmam samam mṛdu samāhitam snigdhāḥ nīlāḥ ca mṛdavaḥ mūrdhajāḥ kuñcitāḥ kacāḥ

original: strīṇāṃ samaṃ śiraḥ śreṣṭhaṃ pāde pāṇitale 'tha vā / vājikuñjaraśrīvṛkṣayūpeṣuyavatomaraiḥ //
analyzed: strīṇām samam śiraḥ śreṣṭham pāde pāṇi tale vā vāji kuñjara śrīvṛkṣa yūpa iṣu yava tomaraiḥ

original: dhvajacāmaramālābhiḥ śailakuṇḍalavedibhiḥ / śaṅkhātapatrapadmaiśca matsyasvastikasadrathaiḥ //
analyzed: dhvaja cāmara mālābhiḥ śaila kuṇḍala vedibhiḥ śaṅkha ātapatra padmaiḥ ca matsya svastika sat rathaiḥ

original: lakṣaṇairaṅkuśādyaiśca striyaḥ syū rājavallabhāḥ / nigūḍhamaṇibandhau ca padmagarbhopamau karau //
analyzed: lakṣaṇaiḥ aṅkuśa ādyaiḥ ca striyaḥ syuḥ rāja vallabhāḥ nigūḍha maṇibandhau ca padmagarbha upamau karau

original: na nimnaṃ nonnataṃ strīṇāṃ bhavetkaratalaṃ śubham / rekhānvitaṃ tvavidhavāṃ kuryātsaṃbhoginīṃ striyam / rekhā yā maṇibandhotthā gatā madhyāṅguliṃ kare //
analyzed: na nimnam nā unnatam strīṇām bhavet kara talam śubham rekhā anvitam tu avidhavām kuryāt saṃbhoginīm striyam rekhā yā maṇibandha utthā gatā madhyāṅgulim kare

original: gatā pāṇitale yā ca yordhvapādatale sthitā / strīṇāṃ puṃsāṃ tathā sā syādrājyāya ca sukhāya ca //
analyzed: gatā pāṇi tale yā ca yā ūrdhva pāda tale sthitā strīṇām puṃsām tathā sā syāt rājyāya ca sukhāya ca

original: kaniṣṭhikāmūlabhavā rekhā kuryācchatāyuṣam / pradeśinīmadhyamābhyāmantarālagatā satī //
analyzed: kaniṣṭhikā mūla bhavā rekhā kuryāt śata āyuṣam pradeśinī madhyamābhyām antarāla gatā satī

original: ūnā ūnāyuṣaṃ kuryādrekhāścāṅguṣṭhamūlagāḥ / bṛhatyaḥ putrāstanvyastu pramadāḥ parikīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: ūnā ūna āyuṣam kuryāt rekhāḥ ca aṅguṣṭha mūla gāḥ bṛhatyaḥ putrāḥ tanvyaḥ tu pramadāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: svalpāyuṣo bahu (laghu)
analyzed: su alpa āyuṣaḥ bahu laghu

original: cchinnā dīrghāchinnā mahāyuṣam / śubhaṃ tu lakṣaṇaṃ strīṇāṃ proktaṃ tvaśubhamanyathā //
analyzed: chinnā mahā āyuṣam  śubham tu lakṣaṇam strīṇām proktam tu aśubham anyathā

original: kaniṣṭhikānāmikā vā yasyā na spṛśate mahīm / aṅguṣṭhaṃ vā gatātītya tarjanī kulaṭā ca sā //
analyzed: kaniṣṭhikā anāmikā vā yasyāḥ na spṛśate mahīm aṅguṣṭham vā gatā atītya tarjanī kulaṭā ca sā

original: ūrdhvaṃ dvābhyāṃ piṇḍikābhyāṃ jaṅghe cātiśirālake / romaśecātimāṃse ca kumbhākāraṃ tathodaram //
analyzed: ūrdhvam dvābhyām piṇḍikābhyām jaṅghe ca ati śirālake romaśe ca ati māṃse ca kumbha ākāram tathā udaram

original: vāmāvartaṃ nimnamalpaṃ duḥ khitānāṃ ca guhyakam / grīvayā hrasvayā niḥ svā dīrghayā ca kulakṣayaḥ //
analyzed: vāma āvartam nimnam alpam duḥ khitānām ca guhyakam grīvayā hrasvayā niḥ svāḥ dīrghayā ca kula kṣayaḥ

original: pṛthulayā pracaṇḍāśca striyaḥ syurnātra saṃśayaḥ / kekare piṅgale netre śyāme lolekṣaṇā satī //
analyzed: pṛthulayā pracaṇḍāḥ ca striyaḥ syuḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ kekare piṅgale netre śyāme lola īkṣaṇā satī

original: smite kūpe gaṇḍayośca sā dhruvaṃ vyabhicāriṇī / pralambinī lalāṭe tu devaraṃ hanti cāṅganā //
analyzed: smite kūpe gaṇḍayoḥ ca sā dhruvam vyabhicāriṇī pralambinī lalāṭe tu devaram hanti ca aṅganā

original: udare śvaśuraṃ hanti patiṃ hanti sphicordvayoḥ / yā tu romottarauṣṭhī syānna śubhā bhartureva hi //
analyzed: udare śvaśuram hanti patim hanti sphicoḥ dvayoḥ  yā tu roma uttara oṣṭhī syāt na śubhā bhartuḥ eva hi

original: stanau saromāvaśubhau karṇau ca viṣamau tathā / karālā viṣamā dantāḥ kleśāya ca bhavanti te //
analyzed: stanau sa romau aśubhau karṇau ca viṣamau tathā karālāḥ viṣamāḥ dantāḥ kleśāya ca bhavanti te

original: cauryāya kṛṣṇamāṃsāśca dīrghā bhurtuśca mṛtyave / kravyādarūpairhastaiśca vṛkakākādisannibhaiḥ //
analyzed: cauryāya kṛṣṇa māṃsāḥ ca dīrghāḥ bhurtuḥ ca mṛtyave kravyāda rūpaiḥ hastaiḥ ca vṛka kāka ādi sannibhaiḥ

original: śirālairviṣamaiḥ śuṣkairvittahīnā bhavanti hi / samunnatottareṣṭhī yā kalahe rūkṣabhāṣiṇī //
analyzed: śirālaiḥ viṣamaiḥ śuṣkaiḥ vitta hīnāḥ bhavanti hi samunnata uttareṣṭhī yā kalahe rūkṣa bhāṣiṇī

original: strīṣu doṣā virūpāsu patrākāro guṇāstataḥ / narastrīlakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ vakṣye tajjñānadāyakam //
analyzed: strīṣu doṣāḥ virūpāsu patra ākāraḥ guṇāḥ tatas nara strī lakṣaṇam proktam vakṣye tad jñāna dāyakam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike strīnaralakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike strīnaralakṣaṇam nāma pañcaṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 66
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / nirlakṣaṇā śubhā syācca cakrāṅkitaśilārcanāt / ādau sudarśano mūrtirlakṣmīnārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca nirlakṣaṇā śubhā syāt ca cakra aṅkita śilā arcanāt ādau sudarśanaḥ mūrtiḥ lakṣmī nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ

original: tricakro 'sāvacyutaḥ syāccatuścakraścaturbhujaḥ / vāsudevaśca pradyumnastataḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: sa avacyutaḥ syāt catur cakraḥ catur bhujaḥ vāsudevaḥ ca pradyumnaḥ tatas saṅkarṣaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: puruṣottamaścāṣṭamaḥ syānnavyūho daśātmakaḥ / ekādaśo 'niruddhaḥ syāddvādaśo dvādaśātmakaḥ //
analyzed: puruṣottamaḥ ca aṣṭamaḥ syāt navyūhaḥ daśa ātmakaḥ ekādaśaḥ niruddhaḥ syāt dvādaśaḥ dvādaśa ātmakaḥ

original: ata ūrdhvamanantaḥ syācchakre rekādikaiḥ kramāt / sudarśanā lakṣitāśca pūjitāḥ sarvakāmadāḥ //
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam anantaḥ syāt śakre reka ādikaiḥ kramāt sudarśanāḥ lakṣitāḥ ca pūjitāḥ sarva kāma dāḥ

original: śālagrāmaśilā yatra devo dvāravatībhavaḥ / ubhayoḥ saṃgamo yatra tatra muktirna saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: śālagrāma śilā yatra devaḥ dvāravatī bhavaḥ  ubhayoḥ saṃgamaḥ yatra tatra muktiḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: śālagrāmo dvārakā ca naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ gayā / vārāṇasī prayāgaśca kurukṣetraṃ ca sūkaram //
analyzed: śālagrāmaḥ dvārakā ca naimiṣam puṣkaram gayā vārāṇasī prayāgaḥ ca kurukṣetram ca sūkaram

original: gaṅgā ca narmadā caiva candrabhāgā sarasvatī / puruṣottamo mahākālastīrthānyetāni śaṅkara //
analyzed: gaṅgā ca narmadā ca eva candrabhāgā sarasvatī puruṣottamaḥ mahākālaḥ tīrthāni etāni śaṅkara

original: sarvapāpaharāṇyeva bhuktamuktipradāni vai / prabhavo vibhavaḥ śuklaḥ pramodo 'tha prajāpatiḥ //
analyzed: sarva pāpa harāṇi eva bhukta mukti pradāni vai prabhavaḥ vibhavaḥ śuklaḥ pramodaḥ tha prajāpatiḥ

original: aṅgirāḥ śrīmukho bhāvaḥ yuvā dhātā tathaiva ca / īśvaro bahudhānyaśca pramāthī vikramo viṣuḥ //
analyzed: aṅgirāḥ śrīmukhaḥ bhāvaḥ yuvā dhātā tathā eva ca īśvaraḥ bahudhānyaḥ ca pramāthī vikramaḥ viṣuḥ

original: citrabhānuḥ svabānuśca tāraṇaḥ pārthivo vyayaḥ / sarvajitsarvadhārī ca virodhī vikṛtiḥ kharaḥ //
analyzed: citrabhānuḥ svabānuḥ ca tāraṇaḥ pārthivaḥ vyayaḥ sarvajit sarvadhārī ca virodhī vikṛtiḥ kharaḥ

original: nandano vijayaścaiva jayo manmathadurmukhau / hemalambo vilaṃbaśca vikāraḥ śarvarī plavaḥ //
analyzed: nandanaḥ vijayaḥ ca eva jayaḥ manmatha durmukhau hemalambaḥ vilaṃbaḥ ca vikāraḥ śarvarī plavaḥ

original: śubhakṛcchobhanaḥ krodhī viśvāvamuparābhavau / plavaṅgaḥ kīlakaḥ saumyaḥ sādhāraṇavirodhakṛt //
paridhāvī pramādī ca ānando rākṣaso nalaḥ / piṅgalaḥ kālasiddhārthau raudrirvai durmatistathā //
analyzed: paridhāvī pramādī ca ānandaḥ rākṣasaḥ nalaḥ piṅgalaḥ kāla siddhārthau raudriḥ vai durmatiḥ tathā

original: dundubhī rudhirodgārī raktākṣaḥ krodhano 'kṣayaḥ / aśobhanāḥ śobhanāśca nāmnaivaite hi vatsarāḥ //
analyzed: dundubhiḥ rudhirodgārī raktākṣaḥ krodhano kṣayaḥ aśobhanāḥ śobhanāḥ ca nāmnā eva ete hi vatsarāḥ

original: kālaṃ vakṣyāmi saṃsiddhyai rudra pañcasvarodayāt / rājā sā(mā) jā udāsā ca pīḍā mṛtyustathaiva ca //
analyzed: kālam vakṣyāmi saṃsiddhyai rudra pañca svara udayāt  rājā sāmā jā udāsā ca pīḍā mṛtyuḥ tathā eva ca

original: ā ī ū ai au svarāṃśca likhetpañcāgnikoṣṭhake / ūrdhvatiryaggatai rekhaiḥ ṣaḍvahnikramamāgataiḥ //
analyzed: ā ī ū ai au svarān ca likhet pañca agni koṣṭhake ūrdhva tiryañc gataiḥ rekhaiḥ ṣaṣ vahni kramam āgataiḥ

original: tithī ekā gnikoṣṭheṣu trayo rājātha sā (mā) jayāḥ / udāsāmṛtyupīḍāśca kujaḥ somasutaḥ kramāt //
analyzed: tithī ekā agni koṣṭheṣu trayaḥ rājā atha sā mā jayāḥ udāsā mṛtyu pīḍāḥ ca kujaḥ somasutaḥ kramāt

original: guruśukrau ca mandaśca ravicandrau yathoditam / revatyādimṛgāntāśca ṛkṣāṇi prathamā kalā //
analyzed: guru śukrau ca mandaḥ ca ravi candrau yathā uditam revatī ādi mṛga antāḥ ca ṛkṣāṇi prathamā kalā

original: pañcapañcānyatra bhāni caitrādya udayastathā / dvādaśāhairdvayormāsanāmnorādyakṣaraṃ tathā //
analyzed: pañca pañcāni atra bhāni caitra ādyaḥ udayaḥ tathā dvādaśa ahaiḥ dvayoḥ māsa nāmnoḥ ādi akṣaram tathā

original: kalāliṅgā ca yā tiṣṭhetpañcamastasya vai mṛtiḥ / kalā tithistathā vāro nakṣatraṃ māsameva ca //
analyzed: kalā liṅgā ca yā tiṣṭhet pañcamaḥ tasya vai mṛtiḥ kalā tithiḥ tathā vāraḥ nakṣatram māsam eva ca

original: nāmodayasya pūrvaṃ ca tathā bhavati nānyathā / oṃ kṣaiṃ (kṣauḥ)
analyzed: nāma udayasya pūrvam ca tathā bhavati na anyathā om kṣaiṃ kṣauḥ

original: śivāya namaḥ //
analyzed: śivāya namaḥ

original: kṣāmādyaṅgaśivāmīkṣā viṣagrahamatirhara / trailokyamohanaṃ bījaṃ nṛsiṃhasya tu padma(nna)gam //
analyzed: kṣāma ādi aṅga śivām īkṣā viṣa graha matiḥ hara trailokya mohanam bījam nṛsiṃhasya tu padman nagam

original: mṛtyuñjayo gaṇo lakṣmī rocanādyaistu lekhitaḥ / bhūrje tu dhāritāḥ kaṇṭhe bāhau ceti jayādidāḥ //
analyzed: mṛtyuñjayaḥ gaṇaḥ lakṣmī rocana ādyaiḥ tu lekhitaḥ bhūrje tu dhāritāḥ kaṇṭhe bāhau ca iti jaya ādi dāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre śālagrāmaṣaṣṭyūbdasvarodayānāṃ nirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre śālagrāmaṣaṣṭyūbdasvarodayānām nirūpaṇam nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 67
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: (iti jyotiḥ śāstraṃ samāptam) / sūta uvāca / hareḥ śrutvā haro gaurīṃ dehasthaṃ jñānamabravīt //
analyzed: iti jyotiḥ śāstram samāptam sūtaḥ uvāca hareḥ śrutvā haraḥ gaurīm deha stham jñānam abravīt

original: kujo vahnī raviḥ pṛthvī saurirāpaḥ prakīrtitaḥ / vāyusaṃsthāsthito rāhurdakṣarandhrāvabhāsakaḥ //
analyzed: kujaḥ vahniḥ raviḥ pṛthvī sauriḥ āpaḥ prakīrtitaḥ vāyu saṃsthā sthitaḥ rāhuḥ dakṣa randhra avabhāsakaḥ

original: guruḥ śukrastathā saumyaścandraścaiva caturthakaḥ / vāmanāḍīṃ tu madhyasthāṃ kārayedātmanastathā //
analyzed: guruḥ śukraḥ tathā saumyaḥ candraḥ ca eva caturthakaḥ vāma nāḍīm tu madhya sthām kārayet ātmanaḥ tathā

original: yadācara ilāyuktastadā karmasamācaret / sthānasevāṃ tathā dhyānaṃ vāṇijyaṃ rājadarśanam //
analyzed: ilā yuktaḥ tadā karma samācaret sthāna sevām tathā dhyānam vāṇijyam rāja darśanam

original: anyāni śubhakarmāṇi kārayeta prayatnataḥ / dakṣanāḍīpravāhe tu śanirbhaumaśca saihikaḥ //
analyzed: anyāni śubha karmāṇi kārayeta prayatnataḥ  dakṣa nāḍī pravāhe tu śaniḥ bhaumaḥ ca sa aihikaḥ

original: inaścaiva tathāpye pāpānāmudayo bhavet / śubhāśubhaviveko hi jñāyate tu svarodayāt //
analyzed: inaḥ ca eva tathā āpye pāpānām udayaḥ bhavet śubha aśubha vivekaḥ hi jñāyate tu svara udayāt

original: dehamadhye sthitā nāḍyo bahurūpāḥ suvistarāḥ / nābheradhastādyaḥ kandastvaṅkurāstatra nirgatāḥ //
analyzed: deha madhye sthitāḥ nāḍyaḥ bahu rūpāḥ su vistarāḥ nābheḥ adhastāt yaḥ kandaḥ tu aṅkurāḥ tatra nirgatāḥ

original: dvisaptatisahasrāṇi nābhimadhye vyavasthite / cakravacca sthitāstāstu sarvāḥ prāṇaharāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: dvisaptati sahasrāṇi nābhi madhye vyavasthite  cakra vat ca sthitāḥ tāḥ tu sarvāḥ prāṇa harāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: tāsāṃ madhye trayaḥ śreṣṭhā vāmadakṣaiṇamadhyamāḥ / vāmā somātmikā proktā dakṣiṇā ravisannibhā //
analyzed: tāsām madhye trayaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ vāma dakṣa eṇa madhyamāḥ  vāmā soma ātmikā proktā dakṣiṇā ravi sannibhā

original: madhyamā ca bhavedagniḥ phalantī kālapūriṇī / vāmā hyamṛtarūpā ca jagadāpyāyane sthitā //
analyzed: madhyamā ca bhavet agniḥ phalantī kāla pūriṇī vāmā hi amṛta rūpā ca jagat āpyāyane sthitā

original: dakṣiṇā raudrabhāgena jagacchoṣayate sadā / dvayorvāhe tu mṛtyuḥ syātsarvakāryavināśinī //
analyzed: dakṣiṇā raudra bhāgena jagat śoṣayate sadā dvayoḥ vāhe tu mṛtyuḥ syāt sarva kārya vināśinī

original: nirgame tu bhavedvāmā praveśe dakṣaiṇā smṛtā / iḍācāre tathā saumyaṃ candrasūryagatastathā //
analyzed: nirgame tu bhavet vāmā praveśe dakṣā eṇā smṛtā iḍā ācāre tathā saumyam candra sūrya gataḥ tathā

original: kārayetkrūra karmāṇi prāṇe piṅgalasaṃsthite / yātrāyāṃ sarvakāryeṣu viṣāpahāraṇe iḍā //
analyzed: kārayet krūra karmāṇi prāṇe piṅgala saṃsthite yātrāyām sarva kāryeṣu viṣa apahāraṇe iḍā

original: bhojane maithune yuddhe piṅgalā siddhidāyikā / uccāṭamāraṇādyeṣu karmasveteṣu piṅgalā //
analyzed: bhojane maithune yuddhe piṅgalā siddhi dāyikā uccāṭa māraṇa ādyeṣu karmasu eteṣu piṅgalā

original: maithune caiva saṃgrāme bhojane siddhidāyikā / śobhaneṣu ca kāryeṣu yātrāyāṃ viṣakarmaṇi //
analyzed: maithune ca eva saṃgrāme bhojane siddhi dāyikā  / śobhaneṣu ca kāryeṣu yātrāyām viṣa karmaṇi

original: śāntimuktyarthasiddhyai ca iḍā yojyā narādhipaiḥ / dvābhyāṃ caiva pravāhe ca krūrasaumyavivarjane //
analyzed: śānti mukti artha siddhyai ca iḍā yojyā narādhipaiḥ dvābhyām ca eva pravāhe ca krūra saumya vivarjane

original: viṣavattaṃ tu jānīyātsaṃsmarettu vicakṣaṇaḥ / saumyādiśubhakāryeṣu lābhādijayajīvite //
analyzed: viṣa vat tam tu jānīyāt saṃsmaret tu vicakṣaṇaḥ saumya ādi śubha kāryeṣu lābha ādi jaya jīvite

original: gamanāgamane caiva vāmā sarvatra pūjitā / yuddhādibhojane ghāte strīṇāṃ caiva tu saṃgame //
analyzed: gamana āgamane ca eva vāmā sarvatra pūjitā yuddha ādi bhojane ghāte strīṇām ca eva tu saṃgame

original: praśastā dakṣiṇā nāḍī praveśe kṣudrakarmaṇi / śubhāśubhāni kāryāṇi lābhālābhau jayājayau //
analyzed: praśastā dakṣiṇā nāḍī praveśe kṣudra karmaṇi śubha aśubhāni kāryāṇi lābha alābhau jaya ajayau

original: jīvājīvāya yatpṛcchenna sidhyati ca madhyamā / vāmācāre 'thavā dakṣe pratyaye yatra nāyakaḥ //
analyzed: jīva ajīvāya yat pṛcchet na sidhyati ca madhyamā vāma ācāre dakṣe pratyaye yatra nāyakaḥ

original: tanusthaḥ pṛcchate yastu tatra siddhirna saṃśayaḥ / vaicchando vāmadevastu yadā vahati cātmani //
analyzed: tanu sthaḥ pṛcchate yaḥ tu tatra siddhiḥ na saṃśayaḥ vāmadevaḥ tu yadā vahati ca ātmani

original: tatra bhāge sthitaḥ pṛcchetsiddhirbhavati niṣphalā / vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi yatra saṃkramate śivā //
analyzed: tatra bhāge sthitaḥ pṛcchet siddhiḥ bhavati niṣphalā vāme vā dakṣiṇe vā api yatra saṃkramate śivā

original: ghore ghorāṇi kāryāṇi saumye vai madhyamāni ca / prasthite bhāgato haṃse dvābhyāṃ vai sarvavāhinī //
analyzed: ghore ghorāṇi kāryāṇi saumye vai madhyamāni ca prasthite bhāgataḥ haṃse dvābhyām vai sarva vāhinī

original: tadā mṛtyuṃ vijānīyādyogī yogaviśāradaḥ / yatrayatra sthitaḥ pṛcchedvāmadakṣiṇasaṃmukhaḥ //
analyzed: tadā mṛtyum vijānīyāt yogī yoga viśāradaḥ yatra yatra sthitaḥ pṛcchet vāma dakṣiṇa saṃmukhaḥ

original: tatratatra samaṃ diśyādvātasyodayanaṃ sadā / agrato vāmikā śreṣṭhā pṛṣṭhato dakṣiṇā śubhā //
analyzed: tatra tatra samam sadā

original: vāmena vāmikā proktā dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇā śubhā / vāme vāmā śubhe caiva dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇā śubhā //
analyzed: vāmena vāmikā proktā dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇā śubhā vāme vāmā śubhe ca eva dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇā śubhā

original: jīvo jīvati jīvena yacchūnyaṃ tastvaro bhavet / yatkiñcitkāryamuddiṣṭaṃ jayādiśubhalakṣaṇam //
