analyzed: jīvaḥ jīvati jīvena yat śūnyam bhavet yat kiñcid kāryam uddiṣṭam jaya ādi śubha lakṣaṇam

original: tatsarvaṃ pūrṇanāḍyāṃ tu jāyate nirvikalpataḥ / anyanāḍyādiparyantaṃ pakṣatrayamudāhṛtam //
analyzed: tat sarvam pūrṇa nāḍyām tu jāyate nirvikalpataḥ anya nāḍī ādi paryantam pakṣa trayam udāhṛtam

original: yāvatṣaṣṭhī tu pṛcchāyāṃ pūrṇāyāṃ prathamo jayet / riktāyāṃ tu dvitīyastu kathayettadaśaṅkitaḥ //
analyzed: yāvat ṣaṣṭhī tu pṛcchāyām pūrṇāyām prathamaḥ jayet riktāyām tu dvitīyaḥ tu kathayet tat aśaṅkitaḥ

original: vāmācārasamo vāyurjāyate karmasiddhidaḥ / pravṛtte dakṣiṇe mārge viṣame viṣamākṣaram //
analyzed: vāma ācāra samaḥ vāyuḥ jāyate karma siddhi daḥ pravṛtte dakṣiṇe mārge viṣame viṣama akṣaram

original: anyatra vāmavāhe tu nāma vai viṣamākṣaram / tadāsau jayamāpnoti yodhaḥ saṃgrāmamadhyataḥ //
analyzed: anyatra vāma vāhe tu nāma vai viṣama akṣaram tadā asau jayam āpnoti yodhaḥ saṃgrāma madhyataḥ

original: dakṣavātapravāhe tu yadi nāma samākṣaram / jā(ja) yate nātra sandeho nāḍīmaghye tu lakṣayet //
analyzed: dakṣa vāta pravāhe tu yadi nāma sama akṣaram yate na atra sandehaḥ nāḍī maghye tu lakṣayet

original: piṅgalāntargate prāṇe śamanīyāhavaṃ jayet / yāvannāḍyudayaṃ cārastāṃ diśaṃ yāvadāpayet //
analyzed: piṅgalā antargate prāṇe śamanīya āhavam jayet yāvat nāḍī udayam cāraḥ tām diśam yāvat āpayet

original: na dātuṃ jāyate so 'pi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / atha saṃgrāmamadhye tu yatra nāḍī sadā vahet //
analyzed: na dātum jāyate na atra kāryā vicāraṇā atha saṃgrāma madhye tu yatra nāḍī sadā vahet

original: sā diśā jayamāpnoti śūnye bhaṅgaṃ vinirdiśet / jātacāre jayaṃ vidyānmṛtake mṛtamādiśet //
analyzed: sā diśā jayam āpnoti śūnye bhaṅgam vinirdiśet jāta cāre jayam vidyāt mṛtake mṛtam ādiśet

original: jayaṃ parājayaṃ caiva yo jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ / vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi yatra sañcarate śivam //
analyzed: jayam parājayam ca eva yaḥ jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ vāme vā dakṣiṇe vā api yatra sañcarate śivam

original: kṛtvā tatpadamāpnoti yātrā santataśobhanā / śaśisūryapravāhe tu sati yuddhaṃ samācaret //
analyzed: kṛtvā tat padam āpnoti yātrā santata śobhanā śaśi sūrya pravāhe tu sati yuddham samācaret

original: yastu pṛcchati tatrasthaḥ sa sādhurjayatidhruvam / yāṃ diśaṃ vahate vāyustāṃ diśaṃ yāvadājayaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ tu pṛcchati tatrasthaḥ sa sādhuḥ jayati dhruvam  yām diśam vahate vāyuḥ tām diśam yāvat ājayaḥ

original: jāyate nātra sandeha handro yadyagrataḥ sthitaḥ / meṣyādyā daśa yā nāḍyo dakṣiṇā vāma saṃsthitāḥ //
analyzed: jāyate na atra sandeha handraḥ yadi agratas sthitaḥ meṣī ādyāḥ daśa yāḥ nāḍyaḥ dakṣiṇāḥ vāma saṃsthitāḥ

original: caresthire tadvimārge tādṛśetādṛśe kramāt / nirgame nirgamaṃ yāti saṃgrahe saṃgrahaṃ viduḥ //
analyzed: tad vimārge tādṛśa tādṛśe kramāt nirgame nirgamam yāti saṃgrahe saṃgraham viduḥ

original: pṛcchakasya vacaḥ śrutvā ghaṇṭākāreṇa lakṣayet / vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi pañcatattvasthitaḥ śive //
analyzed: pṛcchakasya vacaḥ śrutvā ghaṇṭā ākāreṇa lakṣayet vāme vā dakṣiṇe vā api pañcatattva sthitaḥ śive

original: ūrdhve 'gniradha āpaśca tiryaksaṃsthaḥ prabhañjanaḥ / madhye tu pṛthivī jñeyā nabhaḥ sarvatra sarvadā //
analyzed: ūrdhve gniḥ adhas āpaḥ ca tiryak saṃsthaḥ prabhañjanaḥ madhye tu pṛthivī jñeyā nabhaḥ sarvatra sarvadā

original: ūrdhve mṛtyuradhaḥ śāntistiryak coccāṭayetsudhīḥ / madhye stambhaṃ vijānīyānmokṣaḥ sarvatra sarvage //
analyzed: ūrdhve mṛtyuḥ adhas śāntiḥ tiryak ca uccāṭayet sudhīḥ madhye stambham vijānīyāt mokṣaḥ sarvatra sarvage

original: iti śrīgāruḍemahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe svarodaye śubhāśubhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe svarodaye śubhāśubhanirūpaṇam nāma saptaṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 68
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / parikṣāṃ vacmiratnānāṃ balo nāmāsuro 'bhavat / indrādyā nirjitāstena vijetuṃ tairna śakyate //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca parikṣām vacmi ratnānām balaḥ nāma asuraḥ bhavat indra ādyāḥ nirjitāḥ tena vijetum taiḥ na śakyate

original: varavyājena paśutāṃ yācitaḥ sa surairmakhe / balo dadau sa (sva)
analyzed: vara vyājena paśu tām yācitaḥ sa suraiḥ makhe balaḥ dadau sa sva

original: paśutāmatisattva surairhataḥ //
analyzed: paśu tā mati sattva suraiḥ hataḥ

original: paśuvatsa viśastastaiḥ svavākyāśaniyantritaḥ / balo lokoparāya devānāṃ hitakāmyayā //
analyzed: paśu vat sa viśastaḥ taiḥ sva vākya aśani yantritaḥ balaḥ loka uparāya devānām hita kāmyayā

original: tasya sattvaviśuddhasya viśuddhena ca karmaṇā / kāyasyāvayavāḥ sarve ratnabījatvamāyayuḥ //
analyzed: tasya sattva viśuddhasya viśuddhena ca karmaṇā kāyasya avayavāḥ sarve ratna bīja tvam āyayuḥ

original: devānāmatha yakṣāṇāṃ siddhānāṃ pavanāśinām / ratnabījaṃsva(jama)
analyzed: devānām atha yakṣāṇām siddhānām pavanāśinām

original: yaṃ grāhaḥ sumahānabhavattadā //
analyzed: yam grāhaḥ su mahān abhavat tadā

original: teṣāṃ tu patatāṃ vegādvimānena vihāyasā / yadyatpapāta ratnānāṃ bījaṃ kracana kiñcana //
analyzed: teṣām tu patatām vegāt vimānena vihāyasā  yat yat papāta ratnānām bījam kracana kiñcana

original: mahodadhau sariti vā pavarta kānane 'pi vā / tattadākaratāṃ yātaṃ sthānamādheyagauravāt //
analyzed: mahā udadhau sariti vā kānane vā  tat tad ākara tām yātam sthānam ādheya gauravāt

original: teṣu rakṣoviṣavyālavyādhighnānyaghahāni ca / prādurbhavanti ratnāni tathaiva viguṇāni ca //
analyzed: teṣu rakṣaḥ viṣa vyāla vyādhi ghnāni agha hāni ca prādurbhavanti ratnāni tathā eva viguṇāni ca

original: vajraṃ muktāmaṇayaḥ sapadmarāgāḥ samarakatāḥ proktāḥ / api cendranīlamaṇivaravaidūryāḥ puṣparāgāśca //
analyzed: vajram muktā maṇayaḥ sa padmarāgāḥ sa marakatāḥ proktāḥ api ca indranīla maṇi vara vaidūryāḥ puṣparāgāḥ ca

original: karketanaṃ sapulakaṃ rudhirākhyasamanvitaṃ tathā sphaṭikam / vidrumamaṇiśca yatnāduddiṣṭaṃ saṃgrahe tajjñaiḥ //
analyzed: karketanam sa pulakam rudhira ākhya samanvitam tathā sphaṭikam vidruma maṇiḥ ca yatnāt uddiṣṭam saṃgrahe tad jñaiḥ

original: ākāravarṇau prathamaṃ guṇadoṣau tatphalaṃ parīkṣā ca / mūlyaṃ ca ratnakuśalairvijñeyaṃ sarvaśāstrāṇām //
analyzed: ākāra varṇau prathamam guṇa doṣau tad phalam parīkṣā ca mūlyam ca ratna kuśalaiḥ vijñeyam sarva śāstrāṇām

original: kulagneṣūpajāyante yāni copahate 'hani / dauṣaistānyapiyujyante hīyante guṇasampadā //
analyzed: ku lagneṣu upajāyante yāni ca upahate hani dauṣaiḥ tāni apiyujyante hīyante guṇa sampadā

original: parīkṣāpariśuddhānāṃ ratnānāṃ pṛthivībhujā / dhāraṇaṃ saṃgraho vāpi kāryaḥ śriyamabhīpsatā //
analyzed: parīkṣā pariśuddhānām ratnānām pṛthivībhujā dhāraṇam saṃgrahaḥ vā api kāryaḥ śriyam abhīpsatā

original: śāstrajñaḥ kuśalāścāpi ratnabhājaḥ parīkṣakāḥ / ta eva mūlyamātrāyā vettāraḥ parikīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: śāstra jñaḥ kuśalāḥ ca api ratna bhājaḥ parīkṣakāḥ te eva mūlya mātrāyāḥ vettāraḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: mahā prabhāvaṃ vibudhairyasyamādvajramudāhṛtam / vajrapūrvā parīkṣeyaṃ tato 'smābhiḥ prakīrtyate //
analyzed: mahā prabhāvam vibudhaiḥ yasya amāt vajram udāhṛtam  vajra pūrvā parīkṣā iyam smābhiḥ prakīrtyate

original: tasyāsthileśo nipapāta yeṣu bhuvaḥ pradeśeṣu kathañcideva / vajrāṇi vajrāyudhanirjigīṣorbhavanti nānākṛtimanti teṣu //
analyzed: tasya asthi leśaḥ nipapāta yeṣu bhuvaḥ pradeśeṣu kathañcid eva vajrāṇi vajrāyudha nirjigīṣoḥ bhavanti nānā ākṛtimanti teṣu

original: haimamātaṅgasaurāṣṭrāḥ pauṇḍrakāliṅgakosalāḥ / veṇvātaṭāḥ sasauvīrā vajrasyāṣṭa vihārakāḥ //
analyzed: haima mātaṅga saurāṣṭrāḥ pauṇḍra kāliṅga kosalāḥ veṇvātaṭāḥ sasauvīrāḥ vajrasya aṣṭa vihārakāḥ

original: ātāmrā himaśailajāśca śaśibhā veṇvātaṭīyāḥ smṛtāḥ sauvīre tvasitābjameghasadṛśāstābhrāśca saurāṣṭrajāḥ / kāliṅgāḥ kana kāvadātarucirāḥ pītaprabhāḥ kosale śyāmāḥ puṇḍrabhavā mataṅgaviṣaye nātyantapītaprabhāḥ //
analyzed: ātāmrāḥ himaśaila jāḥ ca śaśi bhāḥ veṇvātaṭīyāḥ smṛtāḥ sauvīre tu asita abja megha sadṛśāḥ tābhrāḥ ca saurāṣṭra jāḥ kāliṅgāḥ kana ka avadāta rucirāḥ pīta prabhāḥ kosale śyāmāḥ puṇḍra bhavāḥ mataṅga viṣaye na atyanta pīta prabhāḥ

original: atyarthaṃ laghu varṇataśca guṇavatpārśveṣu samyak samaṃrekhābindukalaṅkakākapadakatrāsādibhirvarjitam / loke 'sminparāmāṇumātramapi yadvajraṃ kraciddṛśyate tasmindevasamāśrayo hyavitathastīkṣṇāgradhāraṃ yadi //
analyzed: atyartham laghu varṇataḥ ca guṇavat pārśveṣu samyak samam rekhā bindu kalaṅka kākapadaka trāsa ādibhiḥ varjitam loke smin parāmāṇu mātram api yat vajram kracid dṛśyate tasmin deva samāśrayaḥ hi avitathaḥ tīkṣṇa agra dhāram yadi

original: vajreṣu varṇayuktyā devānāmapi vigrahaḥ proktaḥ / varṇebhyaśca vibhāgaḥ kāryo varṇāśrayādeva //
analyzed: vajreṣu varṇa yuktyā devānām api vigrahaḥ proktaḥ varṇebhyaḥ ca vibhāgaḥ kāryaḥ varṇa āśrayāt eva

original: haritasitapītapiṅgaśyāmāstāmrāḥ svabhāvato rucirāḥ / harivaruṇaśakrahutavahapitṛpatimarutāṃ svakā varṇāḥ //
analyzed: harita sita pīta piṅga śyāmāḥ tāmrāḥ svabhāvataḥ rucirāḥ hari varuṇa śakra hutavaha pitṛpati marutām svakāḥ varṇāḥ

original: viprasya śaṅkhakumudasphaṭikāvadātaḥ syātkṣattriyasya śaśababhruvilocanābhaḥ / vaiśyasya kāntakadalīdalasannikāśaḥ śūdrasya dhautakaravālasamānadīptiḥ //
analyzed: viprasya śaṅkha kumuda sphaṭika avadātaḥ syāt kṣattriyasya śaśa babhru vilocana ābhaḥ vaiśyasya kānta kadalī dala sannikāśaḥ śūdrasya dhauta karavāla samāna dīptiḥ

original: dvau vajravarṇau pṛthivīpatīnāṃ sadbhiḥ pradiṣṭau na tu sārvajanyau / yaḥ syājjavāvidrumabhaṅgaśoṇo yo vā haridrārasannikāśaḥ //
analyzed: dvau vajra varṇau pṛthivīpatīnām sadbhiḥ pradiṣṭau na tu sārvajanyau yaḥ syāt javāvi druma bhaṅga śoṇaḥ yaḥ vā haridrāra sannikāśaḥ

original: īśatvātsarvavarṇānāṃ guṇavatsārbavarṇikam / kāmato dhārayedrājā na tvanyo 'nyatkathañcana //
analyzed: īśa tvāt sarva varṇānām guṇavat sārbavarṇikam  kāmataḥ dhārayet rājā na tu anyaḥ nyat kathañcana

original: adharottaravṛttayā hi yādṛk syādvarṇasaṅkaraḥ / tataḥ kaṣṭataro vajravarṇānāṃ saṅkaro mataḥ //
analyzed: adhara uttara vṛttayā hi yādṛś syāt varṇa saṅkaraḥ tatas kaṣṭataraḥ vajra varṇānām saṅkaraḥ mataḥ

original: na ca mārgavibhāgamātravṛttyā viduṣā vajraparigraho vidheyaḥ / guṇavadguṇasampadāṃ vibhūtirviparīto vyasanodayasya hetuḥ //
analyzed: na ca mārga vibhāga mātra vṛttyā viduṣā vajra parigrahaḥ vidheyaḥ guṇavat guṇa sampadām vibhūtiḥ viparītaḥ vyasana udayasya hetuḥ

original: ekamapi yasya śṛṅgaṃ vidalitamavalokyate viśīrṇaṃ vā / guṇavadapi tanna dhāryaṃ vajraṃ śreyo 'rthibhirbhavane //
analyzed: ekam api yasya śṛṅgam vidalitam avalokyate viśīrṇam vā guṇavat api tat na dhāryam vajram śreyaḥ rthibhiḥ bhavane

original: sphuṭitāgnivi śīrṇaśṛṅgadeśaṃ malavarṇaiḥ pṛṣatairupetamadhyam / na hi vajrabhṛto 'pi vajramāśu śriyamapyāśrayalālasāṃ na kuryāt //
analyzed: śīrṇa śṛṅga deśam mala varṇaiḥ pṛṣataiḥ upeta madhyam na hi vajrabhṛtaḥ vajram āśu śriyam api āśraya lālasām na kuryāt

original: yasyaikadeśaḥ kṣatajāvabhāso yadvā bhavellohitavarṇacitram / na tanna kuryāddhriyamāṇamāśu svacchandamṛtyorapi jīvitāntam //
analyzed: yasya eka deśaḥ kṣataja avabhāsaḥ yat vā bhavet lohita varṇa citram  na tat na kuryāt dhriyamāṇam āśu svacchanda mṛtyoḥ api jīvitāntam

original: koṭyaḥ pārśvani dhārāśca ṣaḍaṣṭau dvādaśeti ca / uttuṅgasamatīkṣṇāgrāḥ vajrasyākarajā guṇāḥ //
analyzed: koṭyaḥ pārśvani dhārāḥ ca ṣaṣ aṣṭau dvādaśa iti ca uttuṅga sama tīkṣṇa agrāḥ vajrasya ākara jāḥ guṇāḥ

original: ṣaṭkoṭi śudvamamalaṃ sphuṭatīkṣṇadhāraṃ varṇānvitaṃ laghu supārśvamapetadoṣam / indrāyudhāṃśuvisṛticchuritāntarikṣamevaṃvidhaṃ bhuvi bhavetsulabhaṃ na vajram //
analyzed: ṣaṭkoṭi śudvam amalam sphuṭa tīkṣṇa dhāram varṇa anvitam laghu su pārśvam apeta doṣam indrāyudha aṃśu visṛti churita antarikṣam evaṃvidham bhuvi bhavet sulabham na vajram

original: tīkṣṇāgraṃ vimalamapetasarvadoṣaṃ dhatte yaḥ prayatatanuḥ sadaiva vajram / vṛddhistaṃ pratidinameti yāvadāyuḥ strīsampatsutadhanadhānyagodaśūnām //
analyzed: tīkṣṇa agram vimalam apeta sarva doṣam dhatte yaḥ prayata tanuḥ sadā eva vajram vṛddhiḥ tam pratidinam eti yāvadāyus strī sampad suta dhana dhānya go daśūnām

original: vyālavahniviṣavyāghrataskarāmbubhayāni ca / dūrāttasya nivartante karmāṇyātharvaṇāni ca //
analyzed: vyāla vahni viṣa vyāghra taskara ambu bhayāni ca dūrāt tasya nivartante karmāṇi ātharvaṇāni ca

original: yadi vajramapetasarvadoṣaṃ bibhṛyāttaṇḍulaviṃśatiṃ gurutve / maṇiśāstravido vadanti tasya dviguṇaṃ rūpakalakṣamagramūlyam //
analyzed: yadi vajram apeta sarva doṣam bibhṛyāt taṇḍula viṃśatim guru tve maṇi śāstra vidaḥ vadanti tasya dviguṇam rūpaka lakṣam agra mūlyam

original: tribhāgahīnārdhatadardhaśeṣaṃ trayodaśaṃ triṃśadator'ddhabhāgāḥ / aśītibhāgo 'tha śatāṃśabhāgaḥ sahasrabhāgo 'lpasamānayogaḥ //
analyzed: tri bhāga hīna ardha tad ardha śeṣam trayodaśam triṃśat atas ūrddha bhāgāḥ śata aṃśa bhāgaḥ sahasra bhāgaḥ lpa samāna yogaḥ

original: yattaṇḍulairdvādaśabhiḥ kṛtasya vajrasya mūlyaṃ prathamaṃ pradiṣṭam / dvābhyāṃ kramādvānimupāgatasya tvekāvamānasya viniścayo 'yam //
analyzed: yat taṇḍulaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ kṛtasya vajrasya mūlyam prathamam pradiṣṭam dvābhyām tu eka avamānasya viniścayaḥ yam

original: na cāpi taṇḍulaireva vajrāṇāṃ dharaṇakramaḥ / aṣṭābhiḥ sarṣapairgairaistaṃṇḍulaṃ parikalpayet //
analyzed: na ca api taṇḍulaiḥ eva vajrāṇām dharaṇa kramaḥ aṣṭābhiḥ sarṣapaiḥ gairaiḥ taṇḍulam parikalpayet

original: yattu sarvaguṇairyuktaṃ vajraṃ tarati vāriṇi / ratnavarge samaste 'pi tasya dhāraṇamiṣyate //
analyzed: yat tu sarva guṇaiḥ yuktam vajram tarati vāriṇi ratna varge samaste tasya dhāraṇam iṣyate

original: alpenāpi hi doṣeṇa lakṣyālakṣyeṇa dvaṣitam / sva (sa) mūlyāddaśamaṃ bhāgaṃ vajraṃ labhati mānavaḥ //
analyzed: alpena api hi doṣeṇa lakṣya alakṣyeṇa dvaṣitam

original: prakaṭānekadoṣasya svalpasya mahato 'pi vā / sva (su) mūlyācchataśo bhāgo vajrasya na vidhīyate //
analyzed: prakaṭa aneka doṣasya vā bhāgaḥ vajrasya na vidhīyate

original: spaṣṭadoṣamalaṅkāre vajraṃ yadyapi dṛśyate / ratnānāṃ parikarmārthaṃ mūlyaṃ tasya bhavellaghu //
analyzed: spaṣṭa doṣam alaṅkāre vajram yadi api dṛśyate ratnānām parikarma artham mūlyam tasya bhavet laghu

original: prathamaṃ guṇasampadābhyupetaṃ pratibaddhaṃ samupaiti yacca doṣam / alamābharaṇena tasya rājño guṇahīno 'pi maṇirna bhūṣaṇāya //
analyzed: prathamam guṇa sampadā abhyupetam pratibaddham samupaiti yat ca doṣam alam ābharaṇena tasya rājñaḥ guṇa hīnaḥ maṇiḥ na bhūṣaṇāya

original: nāryā vajramadhāryaṃ guṇavadapi sutaprasūtimicchantyā / anyatra dīrghācipiṭatryaśrādyaguṇairviyuktācca //
analyzed: nāryāḥ vajram adhāryam guṇavat api suta prasūtim icchantyāḥ anyatra

original: ayasā puṣparāgeṇa tathā gomedakena ca / vaidūryasphaṭikābhyāṃ ca kācaiścāpi pṛthagvidhaiḥ //
analyzed: ayasā puṣparāgeṇa tathā gomedakena ca vaidūrya sphaṭikābhyām ca kācaiḥ ca api pṛthagvidhaiḥ

original: pratirūpāṇi kurvanti vajrasya kuśalā janāḥ / parīkṣā teṣu kartavyā vidvadbhiḥ suparīkṣakaiḥ //
analyzed: pratirūpāṇi kurvanti vajrasya kuśalāḥ janāḥ parīkṣā teṣu kartavyā vidvadbhiḥ su parīkṣakaiḥ

original: kṣārollekhanaśāṇābhisteṣāṃ kāryaṃ parīkṣaṇam / pṛthivyāṃ yāni ratnāni ye cānye lohadhātavaḥ //
analyzed: kṣāra ullekhana śāṇābhiḥ teṣām kāryam parīkṣaṇam pṛthivyām yāni ratnāni ye ca anye loha dhātavaḥ

original: sarvāṇi vilikhedvajraṃ tacca tairna vilikhyate / gurutā sarvaratnānāṃ gauravādhārakāraṇam //
analyzed: sarvāṇi vilikhet vajram tat ca taiḥ na vilikhyate guru tā sarva ratnānām gaurava ādhāra kāraṇam

original: vajre tāṃ vaiparītyena sūrayaḥ paricakṣate / jātirajātiṃ vilikhati jātiṃ vilikhanti vajrakuruvindāḥ //
analyzed: vajre tām vaiparītyena sūrayaḥ paricakṣate jātiḥ ajātim vilikhati jātim vilikhanti vajra kuruvindāḥ

original: vajrairvajraṃ vilikhati nānyena vilikhyate vajram / vajrāṇi muktāmaṇayo ye ca kecana jātayaḥ //
analyzed: vajraiḥ vajram vilikhati na anyena vilikhyate vajram vajrāṇi muktāmaṇayaḥ ye ca kecana jātayaḥ

original: na teṣāṃ pratibaddhānāṃ bhā bhavatyūrdhvagāminī / tiryak kṣatatvātkeṣāñcitkathañcidyadi jāyate / tiryagvilikhyamānānāṃ sā (sa)
analyzed: na teṣām pratibaddhānām bhā bhavati ūrdhva gāminī tiryak kṣata tvāt keṣāñcid kathañcid yadi jāyate tiryak vilikhyamānānām sā sa

original: pārśveṣu vihanyate //
analyzed: pārśveṣu vihanyate

original: yadyapi viśīrṇakoṭiḥ sabindurekhānvito vivarṇo vā / tadapi dhanadhānyaputrānkaroti sendrāyudho vajraḥ //
analyzed: yadi api viśīrṇa koṭiḥ sa bindu rekhā anvitaḥ vivarṇaḥ vā tat api dhana dhānya putrān karoti sa indrāyudhaḥ vajraḥ

original: saudā minīvisphuritābhirāmaṃ rājā yathoktaṃ kaliśaṃ dadhānaḥ / parākramākrāntaparapratāpaḥ samastasāmantabhuvaṃ bhunakti //
analyzed: saudā minī visphurita abhirāmam rājā yathoktam kaliśam dadhānaḥ parākrama ākrānta para pratāpaḥ samasta sāmanta bhuvam bhunakti

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ratnatadviśeṣavajraparīkṣaṇādivarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ratnatadviśeṣavajraparīkṣaṇādivarṇanam nāma aṣṭaṣaṣṭitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 69
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / dvipendrajīmūtavarāhaśaṅkhamatsyāhiśuktyudbhavaveṇujāni / muktāphalāni prathitāni loke teṣāṃ ca śuktyudbhavameva bhūri //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca dvipa indra jīmūta varāha śaṅkha matsya ahi śukti udbhava veṇu jāni muktāphalāni prathitāni loke teṣām ca śukti udbhavam eva bhūri

original: tatraiva caikasya hi mūlamātra niviśyate ratnapadasya jātu / vedhyaṃ tu śuktayudbhavameva teṣāṃ śeṣāṇyavedhyāni vadanti tajjñāḥ //
analyzed: tatra eva ca ekasya hi niviśyate ratna padasya jātu vedhyam tu śuktayudbhavam eva teṣām śeṣāṇi avedhyāni vadanti tad jñāḥ

original: tvaksāranāgendratimiprasūtaṃ yacchaṅkhajaṃ yacca varā hajātam / prāyo vimuktāni bhavanti bhāsā śastāni māṅgalyatayā tathāpi //
analyzed: tvaksāra nāga indra timi prasūtam yat śaṅkha jam yat ca varā ha jātam prāyas vimuktāni bhavanti bhāsā śastāni māṅgalya tayā tathā api

original: yā mauktikānāmiha jātaye 'ṣṭau prakīrtitā ratnaviniścayajñaiḥ / kambūdbhavaṃ teṣvadhamaṃ pradiṣṭamutpadyate yacca gajendrakumbhāt //
analyzed: yāḥ mauktikānām iha jātaye ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ ratna viniścaya jñaiḥ kambu udbhavam teṣu adhamam pradiṣṭam utpadyate yat ca gaja indra kumbhāt

original: svayonimadyacchavitulyavarṇaṃ śāṅkhaṃ bṛhallolaphalapramāṇam / utpadyate vāraṇakumbhamadhyādāpītavarṇaṃ prabhayā vihīnam //
analyzed: sva yoni madya chavi tulya varṇam śāṅkham bṛhat lola phala pramāṇam utpadyate vāraṇa kumbha madhyāt āpīta varṇam prabhayā vihīnam

original: ye kambavaḥ śārṅgamukhāvamarśapītasya śaṅkhapravarasya gotre / mataṅgajāścāpi viśuddhavaṃśyāste mauktikānāṃ prabhavāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ //
analyzed: ye kambavaḥ śārṅga mukha avamarśa pītasya śaṅkha pravarasya gotre mataṅga jāḥ ca api viśuddha vaṃśyāḥ te mauktikānām prabhavāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ

original: utpadyate mauktikameṣu vṛttamāpītavarṇaṃ prabhayā vihīnam / pāṭhīnapṛṣṭhasya samānavarṇaṃ mīnātsuvṛttaṃ laghu cātisūkṣmam //
analyzed: utpadyate mauktikam eṣu vṛttam āpīta varṇam prabhayā vihīnam pāṭhīna pṛṣṭhasya samāna varṇam mīnāt su vṛttam laghu ca ati sūkṣmam

original: utpadyate vāricarānaneṣu matsyāśce te madhyacarāḥ payodheḥ / varāhadaṃṣṭrāprabhavaṃ pradiṣṭaṃ tasyaiva daṃṣṭrāṅkuratulyavarṇam //
analyzed: utpadyate vāricara ānaneṣu matsyāḥ ce te madhya carāḥ payodheḥ  varāha daṃṣṭrā prabhavam pradiṣṭam tasya eva daṃṣṭra aṅkura tulya varṇam

original: kracitkathañcitsa bhuvaḥ pradeśe prajāyate sūkararāḍviśiṣṭaḥ / varṣopalānāṃ samavarṇaśobhaṃ tvaksāraparvaprabhavaṃ pradiṣṭam //
analyzed: kracid kathañcid sa bhuvaḥ pradeśe prajāyate sūkara rāj viśiṣṭaḥ varṣopalānām sama varṇa śobham tvaksāra parva prabhavam pradiṣṭam

original: te veṇavo divyajanopabhogye sthāne prarohanti na sārvajanye / bhaujaṃ gamaṃ mīnaviśuddhavṛttaṃ saṃsthānato 'tyujjvalavarṇaśobham //
analyzed: te veṇavaḥ divya jana upabhogye sthāne prarohanti na sārvajanye bhaujam gamam mīna viśuddha vṛttam

original: nitāntadhautapravikalpamānanistriṃśadhārāsamavarṇakānti / prāpyātiratnāni mahāprabhāṇi rājyaṃ śriyaṃ vā mahatīṃ durāpām //
analyzed: nitānta dhauta pravikalpamāna nistriṃśa dhārā sama varṇa kānti prāpya ati ratnāni mahā prabhāṇi rājyam śriyam vā mahatīm durāpām

original: tejo 'nvitāḥ puṇyakṛto bhavanti muktāphalasyāhiśirobhavasya / jijñāsayā ratnadhanaṃ vidhijñaiḥ śubhemuhūrte prayataiḥ prayatnāt //
analyzed: tejaḥ nvitāḥ puṇya kṛtaḥ bhavanti muktāphalasya ahi śiraḥ bhavasya jijñāsayā ratna dhanam vidhi jñaiḥ śubhe muhūrte prayataiḥ prayatnāt

original: rakṣāvidhānaṃ sumahadvidhāya harmyopariṣṭhaṃ kriyate yadā tat / tadā mahādundubhimandraghoṣairvidyullatāvisphuritāntarālaiḥ //
analyzed: rakṣā vidhānam su mahat vidhāya harmya upariṣṭham kriyate yadā tat tadā mahā dundubhi mandra ghoṣaiḥ vidyut latā visphurita antarālaiḥ

original: payodharākrāntivilambinamrairghanairnavairāvriyate 'ntarikṣam / na taṃ bhujaṅgā na tu yātudhānā na vyādhayo nāpyupasargadoṣāḥ //
analyzed: payodhara ākrānti vilambi namraiḥ ghanaiḥ navaiḥ āvriyate ntarikṣam na tam bhujaṅgāḥ na tu yātudhānāḥ na vyādhayaḥ nā api upasarga doṣāḥ

original: hiṃsanti yasyāhiśiraḥ samutthaṃ muktāphalaṃ tiṣṭhati kośamadhye / nābhyeti meghaprabhavaṃ dharitrīṃ vipradgataṃ tadvibudhā haranti //
analyzed: hiṃsanti yasya ahi śiraḥ samuttham muktāphalam tiṣṭhati kośa madhye na abhyeti megha prabhavam dharitrīm tat vibudhāḥ haranti

original: arciḥ prabhānāvṛtadigvibhāgamādityavahuḥ khavibhāvyabimbam / tejastiraskṛtya hutāśanendunakṣatratārāprabhavaṃ samagram //
analyzed: arciḥ prabhā anāvṛta diś vibhāgam āditya vahuḥ kha vibhāvya bimbam tejaḥ tiraskṛtya hutāśana indu nakṣatra tārā prabhavam samagram

original: divā yathā dīrptiṅkaraṃ tathaiva tamo 'vagāḍhāsvapi tanniśāsu / vicitraratnadyuticārutoyā catuḥ samudrābharaṇopapannā //
analyzed: divā yathā dīrptiṅkaram tathā eva tamaḥ vagāḍhāsu api tat niśāsu vicitra ratna dyuti cāru toyā catuḥ samudra ābharaṇa upapannā

original: mūlyaṃ na vā syāditi niścayo me kṛtsnā mahī tasya muvarṇapūrṇā / hīno 'piyastallabhate kadācidvipākayogānmahataḥ śubhasya //
analyzed: mūlyam na vā syāt iti niścayaḥ me kṛtsnā mahī tasya  /

original: sāpatnyahīnāṃ sa mahīṃ samagrāṃ bhunakti tattiṣṭhati yāvadeva / na kevalaṃ tacchubhakṛnnṛpasya bhāgyaiḥ prajānāmapi tasya janma //
analyzed: sāpatnya hīnām sa mahīm samagrām bhunakti tat tiṣṭhati yāvat eva na kevalam tat śubha kṛt nṛpasya bhāgyaiḥ prajānām api tasya janma

original: tadyojanānāṃ paritaḥ sahasraṃ sarvānanarthānvimukhī karoti / nakṣatramāleva divo viśīrṇā dantāvalistasya mahāmurasya //
analyzed: tat yojanānām paritas sahasram sarvān anarthān vimukhī karoti nakṣatra mālā iva divaḥ viśīrṇā danta āvaliḥ tasya mahā murasya

original: vicitravarṇeṣu viśuddhavarṇā payaḥ su patyuḥ payasāṃ papāta / sampūrṇacandrāṃśukalāpakāntermāṇipravekasya mahāguṇasya //
analyzed: vicitra varṇeṣu viśuddha varṇā payaḥ su patyuḥ payasām papāta sampūrṇa candra aṃśu kalāpa kānteḥ māṇipravekasya mahā guṇasya

original: tacchuktimatsu sthitimāpa bījamāsanpurāpyanyabhavāni yāni / yasminpradeśe 'mbunidhau papāta sucārumuktāmaṇiratnabījam / tasminpayastoyadharāvakīrṇaṃ śuktau sthitaṃ mauktikatāmavāpa //
analyzed: tat śuktimatsu sthitim āpa bījam āsan purā api anya bhavāni yāni yasmin pradeśe mbunidhau papāta su cāru muktāmaṇi ratna bījam tasmin payaḥ toyadhara avakīrṇam śuktau sthitam mauktika tām avāpa

original: saiṃhalikapāralaukikasaurāṣṭrikatāmraparṇapāraśavāḥ / kauverapāṇḍyahāṭakahemakamityākarāstvaṣṭau //
analyzed: saiṃhalika pāralaukika saurāṣṭrika tāmraparṇa pāraśavāḥ kauvera pāṇḍya hāṭaka hemaka miti ākarāḥ tu aṣṭau

original: śuktyudbhavaṃ nātinikṛṣṭavarṇaṃ pramāṇasaṃsthānaguṇaprabhābhiḥ / utpadyate vardhanapārasīkapātālalokāntarasiṃhaleṣu //
analyzed: śuktyudbhavam na ati nikṛṣṭa varṇam pramāṇa saṃsthāna guṇa prabhābhiḥ utpadyate vardhana pārasīka pātāla lokāntara siṃhaleṣu

original: cintyā na tasyākarajā viśeṣā rūpe pramāṇe ca yateta vidvān / na ca vyavasthāsti guṇāguṇeṣu sarvatra sarvākṛtayo bhavanti //
analyzed: cintyāḥ na tasya ākara jāḥ viśeṣāḥ rūpe pramāṇe ca yateta vidvān na ca vyavasthā asti guṇa aguṇeṣu sarvatra sarva ākṛtayaḥ bhavanti

original: etasya śuktiprabhasya muktāphalasya cānyena samunmitasya / mūlyaṃ sahasrāṇi tu rūpakāṇāṃ tribhiḥ śatairapyādhikāni pañca //
analyzed: etasya śuktiprabhasya muktāphalasya ca anyena samunmitasya mūlyam sahasrāṇi tu rūpakāṇām tribhiḥ śataiḥ api ādhikāni pañca

original: yanmāṣakārdhena tato vihīnaṃ tatpañcabhāgadvayahīnamūlyam / yanmāṣakāṃstrīnbibhṛyātsahasre dve tasya mūlyaṃ paramaṃ pradiṣṭam //
analyzed: yat māṣaka ardhena tatas vihīnam tat pañca bhāga dvaya hīna mūlyam yat māṣakān trīn bibhṛyāt sahasre dve tasya mūlyam paramam pradiṣṭam

original: ardhādhikau dvau vahato 'sya mūlyaṃ tribhiḥ śatairapyadhikaṃ sahasram / dvimāṣa konmānitagauravasya śatāni cāṣṭau kathitāni mūlyam //
analyzed: ardha adhikau dvau sya mūlyam tribhiḥ śataiḥ api adhikam sahasram dvi māṣa ka unmānita gauravasya śatāni ca aṣṭau kathitāni mūlyam

original: ardhādhikaṃ māṣakamunmitasya samaṃ ca viṃśatritayaṃ śatānām / guñjāśca ṣaḍ dhārayataḥ śate dve mūlyaṃ paraṃ tasya vadanti tajjñāḥ / adhyardhamunmāna(pa)
analyzed: ardha adhikam māṣakam unmitasya samam ca viṃśa tritayam śatānām guñjāḥ ca ṣaḍ dhārayataḥ śate dve mūlyam param tasya vadanti tad jñāḥ adhyardham unmānapa

original: kṛtaṃ śataṃ syānmūlyaṃ guṇaistasya samanvitasya //
analyzed: kṛtam śatam syāt mūlyam guṇaiḥ tasya samanvitasya

original: yadi ṣoḍaśabhirbhavedanūnandharaṇaṃ tatpravadanti dārvikākhyam / adhikaṃ daśabhiḥ śataṃ ca mūlyaṃ samavāpnotyapi bāliśasya hastāt //
analyzed: yadi ṣoḍaśabhiḥ bhavet anūnandharaṇam tat pravadanti dārvikākhyam adhikam daśabhiḥ śatam ca mūlyam samavāpnoti api bāliśasya hastāt

original: dviguṇairdaśabhirbhavedanūnaṃ dharaṇaṃ tadbhavakaṃ vadanti tajjñāḥ / navasaptatimāpnuyātsvamūlyaṃ yadi na syādguṇasampadā vihīnam //
analyzed: dviguṇaiḥ daśabhiḥ bhavet anūnam dharaṇam tad bhavakam vadanti tad jñāḥ nava saptatim āpnuyāt sva mūlyam yadi na syāt guṇa sampadā vihīnam

original: triṃśatā dharaṇaṃ pūrṇaṃ śikyaṃ tasyeti kīrtyate / catvāriṃśadbhavettasyāḥ paraṃ mūlyaṃ viniścayaḥ //
analyzed: triṃśatā dharaṇam pūrṇam śikyam tasya iti kīrtyate  catvāriṃśat bhavet tasyāḥ param mūlyam viniścayaḥ

original: catvāriṃśadra bhavettasyāstriṃśanmūlyaṃ labhet sā / pañcāśattu bhavetsomastasya mūlyaṃ tu viṃśatiḥ //
analyzed: bhavet tasyāḥ triṃśat mūlyam labhet sā pañcāśat tu bhavet somaḥ tasya mūlyam tu viṃśatiḥ

original: ṣaṣṭirnikaraśīrṣaṃ syāttasyā mūlyaṃ caturdaśa / aśītirnavatiścaiva kūpyeti parikīrtitā / ekādaśa syānnava ca tayormūlyamanukramāt //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭiḥ nikaraśīrṣam syāt tasyāḥ mūlyam caturdaśa aśītiḥ navatiḥ ca eva kūpyā iti parikīrtitā ekādaśa syāt nava ca tayoḥ mūlyam anukramāt

original: ādāya tatsakalameva tato 'nnabhāṇḍaṃ jambīrajātarasayojanayā vipakram / ghṛṣṭaṃ tato mṛdutanūkṛtapiṇḍamūlaiḥ kuryādyatheṣṭamanu mauktikamāśu viddham //
analyzed: ādāya tat sakalam eva tatas nna bhāṇḍam jambīra jāta rasa yojanayā vipakram ghṛṣṭam tatas mṛdu tanūkṛta piṇḍa mūlaiḥ kuryāt yatheṣṭam anu mauktikam āśu viddham

original: mṛlliptamatsyapuṭamadhyagataṃ tu kṛtvā paścātpacettanu tataśca biḍālapuṭyā / dugdhe tataḥ payasi taṃ vipacetsudhāyāṃ pakraṃ tato 'pi payasā śucicikraṇena //
analyzed: mṛd lipta matsya puṭa madhya gatam tu kṛtvā paścāt pacet tanu tatas ca biḍāla puṭyā dugdhe tatas payasi tam vipacet sudhāyām pakram payasā

original: śuddhaṃ tato vimalavastranigharṣaṇena syānmauktikaṃ vipulasadguṇakāntiyuktam / vyāḍirjagāda jagatāṃ hi mahāprabhāvaḥ siddho vidagdhahitatatparayā dayāluḥ //
analyzed: śuddham tatas vimala vastra nigharṣaṇena syāt mauktikam vipula sat guṇa kānti yuktam vyāḍiḥ jagāda jagatām hi mahā prabhāvaḥ siddhaḥ vidagdha hita tad parayā dayāluḥ

original: śvetakācasamaṃ tāraṃ hemāṃśaśatayojitam / rasamadhye pradhāryeta mauktikaṃ dehabhūṣaṇam //
analyzed: śvetakāca samam tāram hema aṃśa śata yojitam rasa madhye pradhāryeta mauktikam deha bhūṣaṇam

original: evaṃ hi siṃhale deśe kurvanti kuśalā janāḥ / yasminkṛtraimasandehaḥ kracidbhavati mauktike //
analyzed: evam hi siṃhale deśe kurvanti kuśalāḥ janāḥ yasmin kṛtraima sandehaḥ kracid bhavati mauktike

original: uṣṇe salavaṇe snehe niśāṃ tadvāsayejjale / vrīhibhirmardanīyaṃ vā śuṣkavastropaveṣṭitam //
analyzed: uṣṇe sa lavaṇe snehe niśām tat vāsayet jale vrīhibhiḥ mardanīyam vā śuṣka vastra upaveṣṭitam

original: yattu nāyāti vaivarṇyaṃ vijñeyaṃ tadakṛtrimam / sitaṃ pramāṇavatsnigdhaṃ guru svacchaṃ sunirmalam //
analyzed: yat tu na āyāti vaivarṇyam vijñeyam tat akṛtrimam sitam pramāṇavat snigdham guru su accham su nirmalam

original: tejo 'dhikaṃ suvṛttaṃ ca mauktikaṃ guṇavatsmṛtam //
analyzed: tejaḥ dhikam su vṛttam ca mauktikam guṇavat smṛtam

original: pramāṇavadgauravaraśmiyuktaṃ sitaṃ suvṛttaṃ samasūkṣmavedham / akreturapyāvahati pramodaṃ yanmauktikaṃ tadguṇavatpradiṣṭam //
analyzed: pramāṇavat gaurava raśmi yuktam sitam su vṛttam sama sūkṣma vedham akretuḥ api āvahati pramodam yat mauktikam tat guṇavat pradiṣṭam

original: evaṃ samastena guṇodayena yanmauktikaṃ yogamupāgataṃ syāt / na tasya bhartāramanarthajāta eko 'pi kaścit samupaiti doṣaḥ //
analyzed: evam samastena guṇa udayena yat mauktikam yogam upāgatam syāt na tasya bhartāram anartha jātaḥ ekaḥ pi kaścid samupaiti doṣaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe muktāphalapramāṇādivarṇanaṃ nāma muktāphalaparīkṣā nāmaikonasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe muktāphalapramāṇādivarṇanam nāma muktāphala parīkṣā nāma ekonasaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 70
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / divākarastasya mahāmahimno mahāsurasyottamaratnabījam / asṛggṛhītvā carituṃ pratasthe nistriṃśanīlena nabhaḥ sthalena //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca divākaraḥ tasya mahā mahimnaḥ mahā asurasya uttama ratna bījam asṛj gṛhītvā caritum pratasthe nistriṃśa nīlena nabhaḥ sthalena

original: jettrā surāṇāṃ samareṣvajastraṃ vīryāvalepoddhatamānasena / laṅkādhipenārdhapathe sametya svarbhānuneva prasabhaṃ niruddhaḥ //
analyzed: jettrā surāṇām samareṣu ajastram vīrya avalepa uddhata mānasena laṅkā adhipena ardha pathe sametya svarbhānunā iva prasabham niruddhaḥ

original: tatsiṃhalīcārunitambabimbavikṣo bhitāgādhamahāhradāyām / pūgadrumābaddhataṭadvayāyāṃ mumoca sūryaḥ sariduttamāyām //
analyzed: tad siṃhalī cāru nitamba bimba vikṣaḥ bhita agādha mahā hradāyām  pūga druma ābaddha taṭa dvayāyām mumoca sūryaḥ sarit uttamāyām

original: tataḥ prabhṛti sā gaṅgā tulyapuṇyaphalodayā / nāmnā rāvaṇagaṅgeti prathimānamupāgatā //
analyzed: tatas prabhṛti sā gaṅgā tulya puṇya phala udayā nāmnā rāvaṇagaṅgā iti prathimānam upāgatā

original: tataḥ prabhṛtyeva ca śarvarīṣu kūlāni ratnairnicitāni tasyāḥ / suvarṇanārācaśatairivāntarbahiḥ pradīptairniśitāni bhānti //
analyzed: tatas prabhṛti eva ca śarvarīṣu kūlāni ratnaiḥ nicitāni tasyāḥ suvarṇa nārāca śataiḥ iva antar bahis pradīptaiḥ niśitāni bhānti

original: tasyāstaṭepūjjvacārurāgā bhavanti toyeṣu ca padmarāgāḥ / saugandhikotthāḥ kuruvindajāśca mahāguṇāḥ sphāṭikasaṃprasūtāḥ //
analyzed: tasyāḥ taṭeṣu ujjva cāru rāgāḥ bhavanti toyeṣu ca padmarāgāḥ saugandhika utthāḥ kuruvinda jāḥ ca mahā guṇāḥ sphāṭika saṃprasūtāḥ

original: bandhū kaguñjāsakalendragopajavāsamāsṛksamavarṇaśobhāḥ / bhrājiṣṇavo dāḍimabījavarṇāstathāpare kiśukapuṣpabhāsaḥ //
analyzed: bandhū ka guñjā sakala indragopa ja vāsama asṛj sama varṇa śobhāḥ bhrājiṣṇavaḥ dāḍima bīja varṇāḥ tathā apare kiśuka puṣpa bhāsaḥ

original: khindurapadmotpalakuṅkumānāṃ lākṣārasasyāpi samānavarṇaḥ / sāṃdre 'pi rāge prabhayā svayaiva bhānti svalakṣyāḥ sphuṭamadhyaśobhāḥ //
analyzed: lākṣā rasasya api samāna varṇaḥ sāṃdre pi rāge prabhayā svayā eva bhānti sva lakṣyāḥ sphuṭa madhya śobhāḥ

original: bhānośca bhāsāmanuvedhayogāmāsādya raśami prakareṇa dūram / pārśvāni sarvāṇyanurañjayanti guṇāpapannāḥ sphaṭikaprasūtāḥ //
analyzed: bhānoḥ ca bhāsām anuvedha yogām āsādya raśami prakareṇa dūram pārśvāni sarvāṇi anurañjayanti guṇa apapannāḥ sphaṭika prasūtāḥ

original: kusuṃbhanīlavyatimiśrarāgapratyugraraktābujatulyabhāsaḥ / tathāpare 'ruṣkarakaṇṭakāripuṣpatviṣo hiṅgulavattviṣo 'nye //
analyzed: kusuṃbha nīla vyatimiśra rāga pratyugra raktā buja tulya bhāsaḥ tathā apare ruṣkara kaṇṭakāri puṣpa tviṣaḥ hiṅgula vat tviṣaḥ nye

original: cakorapuṃskokilasārasānāṃ netrāvabhāsaśca bhavanti kecit / anye punaḥ santi ca puṣpitānāṃ tulyatviṣā kokanadottamānām //
analyzed: cakora puṃskokila sārasānām netra avabhāsaḥ ca bhavanti kecid anye punar santi ca puṣpitānām tulya tviṣā kokanada uttamānām

original: prabhāvakāṭhinyagurutvayogaiḥ prāyaḥ samānāḥ sphaṭikodbhavānām / ānīlaraktotpalacārubhāsaḥ saugandhikotthā maṇayo bhavanti //
analyzed: prabhāva kāṭhinya guru tva yogaiḥ prāyas samānāḥ sphaṭika udbhavānām ānīla rakta utpala cāru bhāsaḥ saugandhika utthāḥ maṇayaḥ bhavanti

original: kāmaṃ tu rāgaḥ kuruvindajeṣu sa naiva yādṛk sphaṭikodbhaveṣu / nirarciṣo 'ntarbahulā bhavanti prabhāvavanto 'pi nataiḥ samastaiḥ //
analyzed: kāmam tu rāgaḥ kuruvinda jeṣu sa nā eva yādṛś sphaṭika udbhaveṣu nirarciṣaḥ ntar bahulāḥ bhavanti nataiḥ samastaiḥ

original: ye tu rāvaṇagaṅgāyāṃ jāyante kuruvindakāḥ / padmarāgaghanaṃ rāgaṃ bibhrāṇāḥ sphaṭikārciṣaḥ //
analyzed: ye tu rāvaṇagaṅgāyām jāyante kuruvindakāḥ padmarāga ghanam rāgam bibhrāṇāḥ sphaṭika arciṣaḥ

original: varṇānuyāyinasteṣā māndhradeśe tathā pare / na jāyante hi ye kecinmūlyaleśamavāpnuyuḥ //
analyzed: varṇa anuyāyinaḥ teṣā māndhra deśe tathā pare na jāyante hi ye kecid mūlya leśam avāpnuyuḥ

original: tathaiva sphāṭikotthānāṃ deśe tumburusaṃjñake / sadharmāṇaḥ prajāyante svalpamūlyā hi te smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: tathā eva sphāṭika utthānām deśe tumburu saṃjñake sadharmāṇaḥ prajāyante su alpa mūlyāḥ hi te smṛtāḥ

original: varṇādhikyaṃ gurutvaṃ ca snigdhatā samatācchatā / arciṣmattā mahattā ca maṇīnāṃ guṇasaṃgrahaḥ //
analyzed: varṇa ādhikyam guru tvam ca snigdha tā sama tā accha tā arciṣmat tā mahat tā ca maṇīnām guṇa saṃgrahaḥ

original: ye karkaracchidramalopadigdhāḥ prabhāvimuktāḥ paruṣā vivarṇāḥ / na te praśastā maṇayo bhavanti samānato jātiguṇaiḥ samastaiḥ //
analyzed: ye karkara chidra mala upadigdhāḥ prabhā vimuktāḥ paruṣāḥ vivarṇāḥ na te praśastāḥ maṇayaḥ bhavanti samānatas jāti guṇaiḥ samastaiḥ

original: doṣopasṛṣṭaṃ maṇimaprabodhādvibharti yaḥ kaścana kañcideva / taṃ śokacintāmayamṛtyuvittanāśādayo doṣagaṇā bhajante //
analyzed: doṣa upasṛṣṭam maṇim aprabodhāt vibharti yaḥ kaścana kañcid eva tam śoka cintā āmaya mṛtyu vitta nāśa ādayaḥ doṣa gaṇāḥ bhajante

original: kāmaṃ cārutarāḥ pañca jātīnā pratirūpakāḥ / vijā tayaḥ prayatnena vidvāṃstanupalakṣayet //
analyzed: kāmam cārutarāḥ pañca pratirūpakāḥ

original: kalaśapurodbhavasiṃhalatumburudeśotthamuktapāṇīyāḥ / śrīpūrṇakāśca sadṛśā vijātayaḥ padmarāgāṇām //
analyzed: kalaśapura udbhava siṃhala tumburu deśa uttha muktapāṇīyāḥ śrīpūrṇakāḥ ca sadṛśāḥ vijātayaḥ padmarāgāṇām

original: tuṣopasargātkalaśābhidhānamātāmrabhāvādapi tumburūttham / kārṣṇyāttathā siṃhaladeśajātaṃ muktābhidhānaṃ nabhasaḥ svabhāvāt //
analyzed: tuṣa upasargāt kalaśa abhidhānam ātāmra bhāvāt api tumburu uttham kārṣṇyāt tathā siṃhala deśa jātam muktā abhidhānam nabhasaḥ svabhāvāt

original: śrīpūrṇakaṃ dīptivinākṛtatvādvijātiliṅgāśraya eva bhedaḥ / yastāmrikāṃ puṣyati padmarāgo yogāttuṣāṇāmiva pūrṇamadhyaḥ //
analyzed: śrīpūrṇakam dīpti vinā kṛta tvāt vijāti liṅga āśrayaḥ eva bhedaḥ yaḥ tāmrikām puṣyati padmarāgaḥ yogāt tuṣāṇām iva pūrṇa madhyaḥ

original: strehapradigdhaḥ pratibhāti yaśca yo vā praghṛṣṭaḥ prajahāti dīptim / ākrāntamūrdhā ca tathāṅgulibhyāṃ yaḥ kālikāṃ pārśvagatāṃ bibharti //
analyzed: streha pradigdhaḥ pratibhāti yaḥ ca yaḥ vā praghṛṣṭaḥ prajahāti dīptim ākrānta mūrdhā ca tathā aṅgulibhyām yaḥ kālikām pārśva gatām bibharti

original: saṃprāpya cotkṣipya yathānuvṛttiṃ vibhartiyaḥ sarvaguṇānatīva / tulyapramāṇasya ca tulyajāteryo vā gurutvena bhavettu tulyaḥ / prāpyāpi ratnākarajā svajātiṃ lakṣedgurutvena guṇena vidvān //
analyzed: saṃprāpya ca utkṣipya yathā anuvṛttim vibharti yaḥ sarva guṇān atīva tulya pramāṇasya ca tulya jāteḥ yaḥ vā guru tvena bhavet tu tulyaḥ prāpya api ratna ākara jā sva jātim lakṣet guru tvena guṇena vidvān

original: apraṇaśyati sandehe śāṇe tu parilekhayet / su(sva) jātakasamutthena likhitvāpi parasparam //
analyzed: apraṇaśyati sandehe śāṇe tu parilekhayet

original: vajraṃ vā kuruvindaṃ vā vimucyānena kenacit / nāśakyaṃ lekhanaṃ kartuṃ padmarāgendranīlayoḥ //
analyzed: vajram vā kuruvindam vā vimucya anena kenacid  na aśakyam lekhanam kartum padmarāga indranīlayoḥ

original: jātyasya sarve 'pi maṇerna jātu vijātayaḥ santi samānavarṇāḥ / tathāpi nānākaraṇārthameva bhedaprakāraḥ paramaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: jātyasya sarve maṇeḥ na jātu vijātayaḥ santi samāna varṇāḥ tathā api nānā karaṇa artham eva bheda prakāraḥ paramaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ

original: guṇopapannena sahāvabaddhomeṇirna dhāryo viguṇo hi jātyā / na kaustubhenāpi sahāvabaddhaṃ vidvānvijātiṃ bibhṛyātkadācit //
analyzed: guṇa upapannena saha avabaddhaḥ meṇiḥ na dhāryaḥ viguṇaḥ hi jātyā na kaustubhena api saha avabaddham vidvān vijātim bibhṛyāt kadācid

original: cāṇḍāla eko 'pi yathā dvijātīnsametya bhūrīnapi hantyayatnāt / atho maṇīnbhūriguṇopapannāñchakroti viplāvayituṃ vijātyaḥ //
analyzed: cāṇḍālaḥ ekaḥ pi yathā dvijātīn sametya bhūrīn api hanti ayatnāt atho maṇīn bhūri guṇa upapannān śakroti viplāvayitum vijātyaḥ

original: sapatnamadhye 'pi kṛtādhivāsaṃ pramādavṛttāvapi vartamānam / na padmarāgasya mahāguṇasya bhartāramāpatspṛśatīha kācit //
analyzed: sapatna madhye kṛta adhivāsam pramāda vṛttau api vartamānam na padmarāgasya mahā guṇasya bhartāram āpad spṛśati iha kācid

original: doṣopasargaprabhavāśca ye te nopadravāstaṃ samabhidravanti / guṇaiḥ samuttejitacārurāgaṃ yaḥ padmarāgaṃ prayato bibharti //
analyzed: doṣa upasarga prabhavāḥ ca ye te na upadravāḥ tam samabhidravanti guṇaiḥ samuttejita cāru rāgam yaḥ padmarāgam prayataḥ bibharti

original: vajrasya yattaṇḍulasaṃkhyayoktaṃ mūlyaṃ samutpāditagauravasya / tatpadmarāgasya mahāguṇasya tanmāṣakalpākalitasya mūlyam //
analyzed: vajrasya yat taṇḍula saṃkhyayā uktam mūlyam samutpādita gauravasya tat padmarāgasya mahā guṇasya tat māṣa kalpa ākalitasya mūlyam

original: varṇadāptyapapannaṃ hi maṇiratnaṃ praśasyate / tābhyāmīṣadapi bhraṣṭaṃ maṇimūlyātprahīyate //
analyzed: varṇa dāpti apapannam hi maṇi ratnam praśasyate tābhyām īṣat api bhraṣṭam maṇi mūlyāt prahīyate

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe padmarāgaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma saptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe padmarāgaparīkṣaṇam nāma saptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 71
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / dānavādhipateḥ pittamādāya bhujagādhipaḥ / dvidhā kurvanniva vyoma satvaraṃ vāsukiryayau //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca dānava adhipateḥ pittam ādāya bhujaga adhipaḥ dvidhā kurvan iva vyoma sa tvaram vāsukiḥ yayau

original: sa tadā svaśiroratnaprabhādīpte nabho 'mbudhau / rājataḥ samahānekaḥ khaṇḍaseturivābabhau //
analyzed: sa tadā sva śiraḥ ratna prabhā dīpte nabhaḥ mbudhau rājataḥ sa mahān ekaḥ khaṇḍa setuḥ iva ābabhau

original: tataḥ pakṣanipātena saṃharanniva rodasī / garutmānpannagendrasya prahartumupacakrame //
analyzed: tatas pakṣa nipātena saṃharan iva rodasī garutmān pannaga indrasya prahartum upacakrame

original: sahasaiva mumoca tatphaṇīndraḥ surasābhyaktaturuṣka (raṣka) pādapāyām / kalikāghanagandhavāsitā yāṃ varamāṇikyagirerupatyakāyām //
analyzed: sahasā eva mumoca tat phaṇi indraḥ surasa abhyakta turuṣka raṣka pādapāyām kalikā ghana gandha vāsitā yām vara māṇikya gireḥ upatyakāyām

original: tasya prapātasamanantarakālameva tadvadvarālayamatītya ramāsamīpe / sthānaṃ kṣiterupapayonidhitīralekhaṃyāṃ varamāṇikyagirerupatyakāyām //
analyzed: tasya prapāta samanantara kālam eva tadvat vara ālayam atītya ramā samīpe sthānam kṣiteḥ upa payonidhi tīra lekhaṃyām vara māṇikya gireḥ upatyakāyām

original: tatraiva kiñcitpatatastu pittādupetya jagrāha tato garutmān / mūrchāparītaḥ sahasaiva ghoṇārandhradvayena pramumoca sarvam //
analyzed: tatra eva kiñcid patataḥ tu pittāt upetya jagrāha tatas garutmān mūrchā parītaḥ sahasā eva ghoṇā randhra dvayena pramumoca sarvam

original: tatrākaṭhoraśukakaṇṭhaśirīṣapuṣpakhadyotapṛṣṭhacaraśādvalaśaivalānām / kalhāraśaṣpakabhujaṅgabhujāñca patraprāptatviṣo marakatāḥ śubhadā bhavanti //
analyzed: tatra ā kaṭhora śuka kaṇṭha śirīṣa puṣpa khadyota pṛṣṭha cara śādvala śaivalānām kalhāra śaṣpaka bhujaṅga bhujām ca patra prāpta tviṣaḥ marakatāḥ śubha dāḥ bhavanti

original: tadyatra bhogīndrabhujābhiyuktaṃ papāta pittaṃ ditijādhipasya / tasyākarasyātitarāṃ sa deśo duḥ khopalabhyaśca guṇaiśca yuktaḥ //
analyzed: tat yatra bhogi indra bhuja abhiyuktam papāta pittam ditija adhipasya tasya ākarasya atitarām sa deśaḥ duḥ kha upalabhyaḥ ca guṇaiḥ ca yuktaḥ

original: tasminmarakatasthāne yatkiñcidupajāyate / tatsarvaṃ viṣarogāṇāṃ praśamāya prakīrtyate //
analyzed: tasmin marakata sthāne yat kiñcid upajāyate tat sarvam viṣa rogāṇām praśamāya prakīrtyate

original: sarvamantrau ṣadhigaṇairyanna śakyaṃ cikitsitum / mahāhidaṃṣṭrāprabhavaṃ viṣaṃ tattena śāmyati //
analyzed: sarva mantrau ṣadhi gaṇaiḥ yat na śakyam cikitsitum mahā ahi daṃṣṭrā prabhavam viṣam tat tena śāmyati

original: anyadapyākare tatra yaddoṣairupavarjitam / jāyate tatpavitrāṇāmuttamaṃ parikīrtitam //
analyzed: anyat api ākare tatra yat doṣaiḥ upavarjitam jāyate tat pavitrāṇām uttamam parikīrtitam

original: atyantaharitavarṇaṃ komalamarcirvibhedajaṭilaṃ ca / kāñcanacūrṇasyāntaḥ pūrṇamiva lakṣyate yacca //
analyzed: atyanta harita varṇam komalam arciḥ vibheda jaṭilam ca kāñcana cūrṇasya antar pūrṇam iva lakṣyate yat ca

original: yuktaṃ saṃsthānaguṇaiḥ samarāgaṃ gauraveṇa na vihīnam / savituḥ karasaṃsparśācchurayati sarvāśramaṃ dīptyā //
analyzed: yuktam saṃsthāna guṇaiḥ sama rāgam gauraveṇa na vihīnam savituḥ kara saṃsparśāt churayati sarva āśramam dīptyā

original: hitvā ca haritabhāvaṃ yasyāntarvinihitā bhaveddīptiḥ / aciraprabhāprabhāhatanavaśādvalasannibhā bhāti //
analyzed: hitvā ca harita bhāvam yasya antar vinihitā bhavet dīptiḥ acira prabhā prabhā hata nava śādvala sannibhā bhāti

original: yacca manasaḥ prasādaṃ vidadhāti nirīkṣyamatimātram / nanmarakataṃ mahāgaṇamiti ratnavidāṃ manovṛttiḥ //
analyzed: yat ca manasaḥ prasādam vidadhāti nirīkṣyam atimātram nat marakatam mahā gaṇam iti ratna vidām manaḥ vṛttiḥ

original: varṇasyāti vibhutvādyasyāntaḥ svacchakiraṇaparidhānam / sāndrasnigdhaviśuddhaṃ komalabarhiprabhādisamakānti //
analyzed: varṇasya ati vibhu tvāt yasya antar su accha kiraṇa paridhānam sāndra snigdha viśuddham komala barhi prabhā ādi sama kānti

original: varṇojjvalayā kāntyā sāndrākāro vibhāsayā bhāti / tadapi guṇavatsaṃjñāmāpnoti hi yādṛśī pūrvam //
analyzed: varṇa ujjvalayā kāntyā sāndra ākāraḥ vibhāsayā bhāti tat api guṇavat saṃjñām āpnoti hi yādṛśī pūrvam

original: śabalakaṭhoramalinaṃ rūkṣaṃ pāṣāṇakarkaropetam / digdhaṃ śilājatunā marakatamevaṃvidhaṃ viguṇam //
analyzed: śabala kaṭhora malinam rūkṣam pāṣāṇa karkara upetam digdham śilājatunā marakatam evaṃvidham viguṇam

original: yatsandhiśoṣitaṃ ratnamanyanmarakatādbhavet / śreyaskāmairna taddhāryaṃ kretavyaṃ vā katañcana //
analyzed: yat sandhi śoṣitam ratnam anyat marakatāt bhavet śreyaskāmaiḥ na tat dhāryam kretavyam vā katañcana

original: bhallātakī putrikā ca tadvarṇasamayogataḥ / maṇermarakatasyaite lakṣaṇīyā vijātayaḥ //
analyzed: bhallātakī putrikā ca tad varṇa sama yogataḥ maṇeḥ marakatasya ete lakṣaṇīyāḥ vijātayaḥ

original: kṣaumeṇa vāsasā mṛṣṭā dīptiṃ tyajati putrikā / lāghavenaiva kācasya śakyā kartuṃ vibhāvanā //
analyzed: kṣaumeṇa vāsasā mṛṣṭā dīptim tyajati putrikā  lāghavena eva kācasya śakyā kartum vibhāvanā

original: kasyacidanekarūpairmarakatamanugacchato 'pi guṇavarṇaiḥ / bhallātakasyasvanāttu vaiṣamyamupaiti varṇasya //
analyzed: kasyacid aneka rūpaiḥ marakatam anugacchataḥ guṇa varṇaiḥ

original: vajrāṇi muktāḥ santyanye ye ca keciddvijātayaḥ / teṣāṃ nāpratibaddhānāṃ bhā bhavatyūrdhvagāminī //
analyzed: vajrāṇi muktāḥ santi anye ye ca kecid dvijātayaḥ teṣām na apratibaddhānām bhās bhavati ūrdhva gāminī

original: ṛjutvāccaiva keṣāñcitkathañcidupajāyate / tiryagālocyamānānāṃ sadyaścaiva praṇaśyati //
analyzed: ṛju tvāt ca eva keṣāñcid kathañcid upajāyate tiryak ālocya mānānām sadyas ca eva praṇaśyati

original: snānācamanajapyeṣu rakṣāmantrakriyāvidhau / dadadbhirgohiraṇyāni kurvadbhiḥ sādhanāni ca //
analyzed: snāna ācamana japyeṣu rakṣā mantra kriyā vidhau dadadbhiḥ go hiraṇyāni kurvadbhiḥ sādhanāni ca

original: daivapitryātitheyeṣu gurusaṃpūjaneṣu ca / bādhyamāneṣu vividhairdeṣajātairviṣodbhavaiḥ //
analyzed: daiva pitrya ātitheyeṣu guru saṃpūjaneṣu ca bādhyamāneṣu vividhaiḥ deṣa jātaiḥ viṣa udbhavaiḥ

original: dauṣairhenaṃ guṇairyuktaṃ kāñcanapratiyojitam / saṃgrāme vicaradbhiśca dhāryaṃ marakataṃ budhaiḥ //
analyzed: guṇaiḥ yuktam kāñcana pratiyojitam saṃgrāme vicaradbhiḥ ca dhāryam marakatam budhaiḥ

original: tulayā padmarāgasya yanmūlyamupajāyate / labhate 'bhyadhikaṃ tasmādguṇairmarakataṃ yutam //
analyzed: tulayā padmarāgasya yat mūlyam upajāyate labhate bhyadhikam tasmāt guṇaiḥ marakatam yutam

original: tathā ca padmarāgāṇāṃ doṣairmūlyaṃ prahīyate / tato 'syāpyadhikā hānirdeṣairmarakate bhavet //
analyzed: tathā ca padmarāgāṇām doṣaiḥ mūlyam prahīyate hāniḥ deṣaiḥ marakate bhavet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍa marakataparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmaikasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍa marakataparīkṣaṇam nāma ekasaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 72
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / tatraiva siṃhalavadhūkarapallavāgravyālūnabālalavalīkusumapravāle / deśe papāta ditijasya nitāntakāntaṃ protphullanīrajasamadyuti netrayugmam //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca tatra eva siṃhala vadhū kara pallava agra vyālūna bāla lavalī kusuma pravāle deśe papāta ditijasya nitānta kāntam protphulla nīraja sama dyuti netra yugmam

original: tatpratyayādubhayaśobhanavīcibhāsā vistāriṇī jalanidherupakacchabhūmiḥ / prodbhinnaketakavanapratibaddhalekhāsāndrendranīlamaṇiratnavatī vibhāti //
analyzed: tad pratyayāt ubhaya śobhana vīci bhāsā vistāriṇī jalanidheḥ upa kaccha bhūmiḥ prodbhinna ketaka vana pratibaddha lekhā sāndra indranīla maṇi ratnavatī vibhāti

original: tatrāsitābjahalabhṛdvasanāsibhṛṅgaśārṅgāyudhāṅgaharakaṇṭhakaṣāyapuṣpaiḥ / śuṣketaraiśca kusumairgirikarṇikāyāstasmādbhavanti maṇayaḥ sadṛśāvabhāsaḥ //
analyzed: tatra asita abja halabhṛt vasana asi bhṛṅga śārṅga āyudha aṅga hara kaṇṭha kaṣāya puṣpaiḥ śuṣka itaraiḥ ca kusumaiḥ girikarṇikāyāḥ tasmāt bhavanti maṇayaḥ sadṛśa avabhāsaḥ

original: anye prasannapayasaḥ payasāṃ nidhāturambutviṣaḥ śikhigaṇapratimāstathānye / nīlīrasaprabhavabudvudabhāśca kecitkecittathā samadakokilakaṇṭhabhāsaḥ //
analyzed: anye prasanna payasaḥ payasām nidhātuḥ ambu tviṣaḥ śikhi gaṇa pratimāḥ tathā anye nīlī rasa prabhava budvuda bhāḥ ca kecid kecid tathā sa mada kokila kaṇṭha bhāsaḥ

original: ekaprakārā vispaṣṭavarṇaśobhāvabhāsinaḥ / jāyante maṇayastasminnindranīlā mahāguṇāḥ //
analyzed: eka prakārāḥ vispaṣṭa varṇa śobhā avabhāsinaḥ jāyante maṇayaḥ tasmin indranīlāḥ mahā guṇāḥ

original: mṛtpāṣāṇaśilārandhrakarkarātrāsasaṃyutāḥ / abhrikāpaṭalacchāyāvarṇadoṣaiśca dūṣitāḥ //
analyzed: mṛd pāṣāṇa śilā randhra karkarā trāsa saṃyutāḥ abhrikā paṭala chāyā varṇa doṣaiḥ ca dūṣitāḥ

original: tata eva hi jāyante maṇayastatra bhūrayaḥ / sāstrasambodhitadhiyastānpraśaṃsanti sūrayaḥ //
analyzed: tatas eva hi jāyante maṇayaḥ tatra bhūrayaḥ sa astra sambodhita dhiyaḥ tān praśaṃsanti sūrayaḥ

original: dhāryamāṇasya ye dṛṣṭā padmarāgamaṇerguṇāḥ / dhāraṇādindranīlasya tānevāpnoti mānavaḥ //
analyzed: dhāryamāṇasya ye dṛṣṭā padmarāga maṇeḥ guṇāḥ dhāraṇāt indranīlasya tān eva āpnoti mānavaḥ

original: yathā ca padmarāgāṇāṃ jātakatritayaṃ bhavet / indra nīleṣvapi tathā draṣṭavyamaviśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: yathā ca padmarāgāṇām jātaka tritayam bhavet indra nīleṣu api tathā draṣṭavyam aviśeṣatas

original: parīkṣāpratyayairyaiśca padmarāgaḥ parīkṣyate / ta eva pratyayā dṛṣṭā indranīlamaṇerapi //
analyzed: parīkṣā pratyayaiḥ yaiḥ ca padmarāgaḥ parīkṣyate te eva pratyayāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ indranīla maṇeḥ api

original: yāvantaṃ ca kramedagniṃ padmarāgopayogataḥ / indranīlamaṇistasmātkrameta sumahattaram //
analyzed: yāvantam ca kramet agnim padmarāga upayogataḥ indranīla maṇiḥ tasmāt krameta su mahattaram

original: tathāpi na parīkṣārthaṃ guṇānāmabhi (ti) vṛddhaye / maṇiragnau samādheyaḥ kathañcidapi kaścana //
analyzed: tathā api na parīkṣā artham guṇānām abhi vṛddhaye maṇiḥ agnau samādheyaḥ kathañcid api kaścana

original: agnimātrāparijñāne dāhadoṣaiśca dūpitaḥ / so 'narthāya bhavedbhartuḥ kartuḥ kārayitustathā //
analyzed: agni mātrā parijñāne dāha doṣaiḥ ca dūpitaḥ saḥ narthāya bhavet bhartuḥ kartuḥ kārayituḥ tathā

original: kācotpalakaravīrasphaṭikādyā iha budhaiḥ savaidūryāḥ / kathitā vijātaya ime sadṛśā maṇinendranīlena //
analyzed: kāca utpala karavīra sphaṭika ādyāḥ iha budhaiḥ sa vaidūryāḥ kathitāḥ vijātayaḥ ime sadṛśāḥ maṇinā indranīlena

original: gurubhāvakaṭhinabhāvāveteṣāṃ nityameva vijñeyau / kācādyathāvaduttaravivardhamānau viśeṣeṇa //
analyzed: guru bhāva kaṭhina bhāvau eteṣām nityam eva vijñeyau kācāt yathāvat uttara vivardhamānau viśeṣeṇa

original: indranīlo yathā kaścidvibhartyātāmravarṇatām / rakṣaṇayau tathā tāmrau karavīrotpalāvubhau //
analyzed: indranīlaḥ yathā kaścid vibharti ātāmra varṇa tām  rakṣaṇayau tathā tāmrau karavīra utpalau ubhau

original: yasya madhyagatā bhāti nīlasyendrāyudhaprabhā / tamindranīlamityāhurmahārhaṃ bhuvi durlabham //
analyzed: yasya madhya gatā bhāti nīlasya indrāyudha prabhā  tam indranīlam iti āhuḥ mahārham bhuvi durlabham

original: yasya varṇasya bhūyastvātkṣīre śataguṇe sthitaḥ / nīlatāṃ tannayetsarvaṃ mahānīlaḥ sa ucyate //
analyzed: yasya varṇasya bhūyaḥ tvāt kṣīre śataguṇe sthitaḥ nīla tām tat nayet sarvam mahānīlaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: yatpadmarāgasya mahāguṇasya mūlyaṃ bhavenmāṣasamunmitasya / tadindranīlasya mahāguṇasya suvarṇa saṃkhyātu litasya mūlyam //
analyzed: yat padmarāgasya mahā guṇasya mūlyam bhavet māṣa samunmitasya tat indranīlasya mahā guṇasya mūlyam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe indranīlaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma dvisaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe indranīlaparīkṣaṇam nāma dvisaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 73
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / vaidūryapuṣparāgāṇāṃ karkete bhīṣmake vade / parīkṣāṃ brahmaṇā proktāṃ vyāsena kathitāṃ dvijā //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca vaidūrya puṣparāgāṇām karkete bhīṣmake vade parīkṣām brahmaṇā proktām vyāsena kathitām dvijāḥ

original: kalpāntakālakṣubitāmburāśernirhrādakalpādditijasya nādāt / vaidūryamutpannamanekavarṇaṃ śobhābhirāmadyutivarṇabījam //
analyzed: kalpa anta kāla kṣubita amburāśeḥ nirhrāda kalpāt ditijasya nādāt vaidūryam utpannam aneka varṇam śobha abhirāma dyuti varṇa bījam

original: avidūre vidūrasya gireruttuṅgarodhasaḥ / kāmabhūtikasīmānamanu tasyākarobhavat //
analyzed: avidūre vidūrasya gireḥ uttuṅga rodhasaḥ kāma bhūtika sīmānam anu tasya akaraḥ bhavat

original: tasya nādasamutthatvādākaraḥ sumahāguṇaḥ / abhūduttarīto loke lokatrayavibhūṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: tasya nāda samuttha tvāt ākaraḥ su mahā guṇaḥ abhūt uttarītaḥ loke loka traya vibhūṣaṇaḥ

original: tasyaiva dānavapaterninadānurūpāḥ pravṛṭpayodavaradarśita cārurūpāḥ / vaidūryaratnamaṇayo vividhāvabhāsastasmātsphuliṅganivahā iva saṃbabhūvuḥ //
analyzed: tasya eva dānava pateḥ ninada anurūpāḥ pravṛṣ payoda vara darśita cāru rūpāḥ vaidūrya ratna maṇayaḥ vividha avabhāsaḥ tasmāt sphuliṅga nivahāḥ iva saṃbabhūvuḥ

original: padmarāgamupādāya maṇivarṇā hi ye kṣitau / sarvāṃstānvarṇaśobhābhirvaidūryamanugacchati //
analyzed: padmarāgam upādāya maṇi varṇāḥ hi ye kṣitau sarvān tān varṇa śobhābhiḥ vaidūryam anugacchati

original: teṣāṃ pradhānaṃ śikhikaṇṭhanīlaṃ yadvā bhavedveṇudalaprakāśam / cāṣāgrapakṣapratimaśriyo ye na te praśastā maṇiśāstravidbhiḥ //
analyzed: teṣām pradhānam śikhikaṇṭha nīlam yat vā bhavet veṇu dala prakāśam cāṣa agra pakṣa pratima śriyaḥ ye na te praśastāḥ maṇi śāstra vidbhiḥ

original: guṇavānvaidūryamaṇiryojayati svāminaṃ paraṃbhā (bho) gyaiḥ / doṣairyukto doṣaistasmādyatnātparīkṣeta //
analyzed: guṇavān vaidūrya maṇiḥ yojayati svāminam paraṃbhāḥ bho gyaiḥ doṣaiḥ yuktaḥ doṣaiḥ tasmāt yatnāt parīkṣeta

original: girikācaśiśupālau kāca sphaṭikāśca dhūmanirbhinnāḥ / vaidūryamaṇerete vijātayaḥ sannibhāḥ santi //
analyzed: giri kāca śiśupālau kāca sphaṭikāḥ ca dhūma nirbhinnāḥ vaidūrya maṇeḥ ete vijātayaḥ sannibhāḥ santi

original: likhyābhāvātkācaṃ laghubhāvācchaisupālakaṃ vidyāt / girikācasadīptitvātsphaṭikaṃ varṇojjvalatvena //
analyzed: likhya abhāvāt kācam laghu bhāvāt śaisupālakam vidyāt giri kāca sa dīpti tvāt sphaṭikam varṇa ujjvala tvena

original: yadindranīlasya mahāguṇasya suvarṇasaṃkhyākalitasya mūlyam / tadeva vaidūryamaṇeḥ pradiṣṭaṃ paladvayonmāpi tagauravasya //
analyzed: yat indranīlasya mahā guṇasya suvarṇa saṃkhyā kalitasya mūlyam tat eva vaidūrya maṇeḥ pradiṣṭam pala dvaya unmāpi ta gauravasya

original: jātyasya sarve 'pi maṇestu yādṛgvijātayaḥ santi samānavarṇāḥ / tathāpi nānākaraṇānumeyabhedaprakāraḥ paramaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: jātyasya sarve maṇeḥ tu yādṛś vijātayaḥ santi samāna varṇāḥ tathā api nānā karaṇa anumeya bheda prakāraḥ paramaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ

original: sukhopalakṣyaśca sadā vicāryo hyayaṃ prabhedo viduṣā nareṇa / snehaprabhedo laghutā mṛdutvaṃ vijātiliṅgaṃ khalu sārvajanyam //
analyzed: sukha upalakṣyaḥ ca sadā vicāryaḥ hi ayam prabhedaḥ viduṣā nareṇa sneha prabhedaḥ laghu tā mṛdu tvam vijāti liṅgam khalu sārvajanyam

original: kuśalākuśalaiḥ prapūryamāṇāḥ pratibaddhāḥ pratisatkriyāprayogaiḥ / guṇadoṣasamudbhavaṃ labhante maṇayor'thontaramūlyameva bhinnāḥ //
analyzed: kuśala akuśalaiḥ prapūryamāṇāḥ pratibaddhāḥ prati satkriyā prayogaiḥ guṇa doṣa samudbhavam labhante bhinnāḥ

original: kramaśaḥ samatītavartamānāḥ pratibaddhā maṇibandhakena yatnāt / yadi nāma bhavanti doṣahīnā maṇayaḥ ṣaḍguṇamāpnuvanti mūlyam //
analyzed: kramaśas samatīta vartamānāḥ pratibaddhāḥ maṇibandhakena yatnāt yadi nāma bhavanti doṣa hīnāḥ maṇayaḥ ṣaḍguṇam āpnuvanti mūlyam

original: ākarānsamatītānāmudadhestīrasannidhau / mūlyametanmaṇīnāṃ tu na sarvatra mahītale //
analyzed: ākarān samatītānām udadheḥ tīra sannidhau mūlyam etat maṇīnām tu na sarvatra mahī tale

original: suvarṇo manunā yastu proktaḥ ṣoḍaśamāṣakaḥ / tasya saptatimo bhāgaḥ saṃjñārūpaṃ kariṣyati //
analyzed: suvarṇaḥ manunā yaḥ tu proktaḥ ṣoḍaśa māṣakaḥ tasya saptatimaḥ bhāgaḥ saṃjñā rūpam kariṣyati

original: śāṇaścaturmāṣamāno māṣakaḥ pañcakṛṣṇalaḥ / palasya daśamo bhāgo dharaṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: śāṇaḥ catur māṣa mānaḥ māṣakaḥ pañca kṛṣṇalaḥ palasya daśamaḥ bhāgaḥ dharaṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: itthaṃ maṇividhiḥ prokto ratnānāṃ mūlyaniścaye //
analyzed: ittham maṇi vidhiḥ proktaḥ ratnānām mūlya niścaye

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidūryaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma trisaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vaidūryaparīkṣaṇam nāma trisaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 74
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / patitāyā himādrau tu tvacastasya suradviṣaḥ / prādurbhavanti tābhyastu puṣpa (ṣya)
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca patitāyāḥ himādrau tu tvacaḥ tasya suradviṣaḥ prādurbhavanti tābhyaḥ tu

original: rāgā mahāguṇāḥ //
analyzed: rāgāḥ mahā guṇāḥ

original: āpītapāṇḍuruciraḥ pāṣāṇaḥ padmarāgasaṃjñastu / kaukaṇṭakanāmā syātsa eva yadi lohitāpītaḥ //
analyzed: āpīta pāṇḍu ruciraḥ pāṣāṇaḥ padmarāga saṃjñaḥ tu kaukaṇṭaka nāmā syāt saḥ eva yadi lohita āpītaḥ

original: ālohitastu pītaḥ svacchaḥ kāṣāyakaḥ sa ekoktaḥ / ānīlaśuklavarṇaḥ snigdhaḥ somāla(na)
analyzed: ālohitaḥ tu pītaḥ su acchaḥ kāṣāyakaḥ saḥ eka uktaḥ ānīla śukla varṇaḥ snigdhaḥ somālana

original: kaḥ saguṇaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ sa guṇaḥ

original: atyantalohito yaḥ sa eva khalu padmarāgasaṃjñaḥ syāt / api cendranīlasaṃjñaḥ sa eva kathitaḥ sunīlaḥ san //
analyzed: atyanta lohitaḥ yaḥ saḥ eva khalu padmarāga saṃjñaḥ syāt api ca indranīla saṃjñaḥ saḥ eva kathitaḥ su nīlaḥ san

original: mūlyaṃ vaidūryamaṇeriva gāditaṃ hyasya ratnasāravidā / dhāraṇaphalaṃ ca tadvatkiṃ tu strīṇāṃ sutaprado bhavati //
analyzed: mūlyam vaidūrya maṇeḥ iva gāditam hi asya ratna sāra vidā dhāraṇa phalam ca tadvat kim tu strīṇām suta pradaḥ bhavati

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe puṣparāgaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ saptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe puṣparāgaparīkṣaṇam nāma catuḥsaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 75
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / vāyurnakhāndaityapatergṛhītvā cikṣepa satpadmavaneṣu hṛṣṭaḥ / tataḥ prasūtaṃ pavanopapannaṃ karketanaṃ pūjayatamaṃ pṛthivyām //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca vāyuḥ nakhān daitya pateḥ gṛhītvā cikṣepa sat padma vaneṣu hṛṣṭaḥ tatas prasūtam pavana upapannam karketanam pūjayatamam pṛthivyām

original: varṇena tadrudhirasomamadhuprakāśamātāmrapītadahanojjvalitaṃ vibhāti / nīlaṃ punaḥ khalu sitaṃ paruṣaṃ vibhinnaṃ vyādhyādidoṣakaraṇena ca tadvibhāti //
analyzed: varṇena tat rudhira soma madhu prakāśam ātāmra pīta dahana ujjvalitam vibhāti nīlam punar khalu sitam paruṣam vibhinnam vyādhi ādi doṣa karaṇena ca tat vibhāti

original: snigdhā viśuddhāḥ samarāgiṇaśca āpītavarṇā guravo vicitrāḥ / trāsavraṇavyālavivarjitāśca karketanāste paramaṃ pavitrāḥ //
analyzed: snigdhāḥ viśuddhāḥ sama rāgiṇaḥ ca āpīta varṇāḥ guravaḥ vicitrāḥ trāsa vraṇa vyāla vivarjitāḥ ca karketanāḥ te paramam pavitrāḥ

original: patreṇa kāñcanamayena tu veṣṭayitvā taptaṃ yadā hutavahe bhavati prakāśam / rogapraṇāśanakaraṃ kalināśanaṃ tadāyuṣkaraṃ kulakaraṃ ca sukhapradaṃ ca //
analyzed: patreṇa kāñcana mayena tu veṣṭayitvā taptam yadā hutavahe bhavati prakāśam roga praṇāśana karam kali nāśanam tat āyuṣkaram kula karam ca sukha pradam ca

original: evaṃvidhaṃ bahuguṇaṃ maṇimāvahanti karketanaṃ śubhalaṅkṛtaye narā ye / te pūjitā bahudhanā bahubāndhavāśca nityojjvalāḥ pramuditā apite bhavanti //
analyzed: evaṃvidham bahu guṇam maṇim āvahanti karketanam śubha alaṅkṛtaye narāḥ ye te pūjitāḥ bahu dhanāḥ bahu bāndhavāḥ ca nitya ujjvalāḥ pramuditāḥ api te bhavanti

original: eke 'panahya vikṛtākulanīlabhāsaḥ pramlānarāgalulitāḥ kaluṣā virūpāḥ / tejo 'tidīpti kulapuṣṭivihīnavarṇāḥ karketanasya sadṛśaṃ vapurudvahanti //
analyzed: eke vikṛta ākula nīla bhāsaḥ pramlāna rāga lulitāḥ kaluṣāḥ virūpāḥ kula puṣṭi vihīna varṇāḥ karketanasya sadṛśam vapuḥ udvahanti

original: karketanaṃ yadi parīkṣitavarṇarūpaṃ pratyagrabhāsvaradivākarasuprakāśam / tasyottamasya maṇi śāstravidāṃ mahimnā tulyaṃ tu mūlyamuditaṃ tulitasya kāryam //
analyzed: karketanam yadi parīkṣita varṇa rūpam pratyagra bhāsvara divākara su prakāśam tasya uttamasya maṇi śāstra vidām mahimnā tulyam tu mūlyam uditam tulitasya kāryam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karketanaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe karketanaparīkṣaṇam nāma pañcasaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 76
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / himavatyuttaradeśe vīryaṃ patitaṃ suradviṣastasya / saṃprāptamuttamānāmākaratāṃ bhīṣmaratnānām //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca himavati uttara deśe vīryam patitam suradviṣaḥ tasya saṃprāptam uttamānām ākaratām bhīṣma ratnānām

original: śuklāḥ śaṅkhābjanibhāḥ syonākasannibhā prabhāvantaḥ / prabhavanti tatastaruṇā vajranibhā bhīṣmapāṣāṇāḥ //
analyzed: śuklāḥ śaṅkha abja nibhāḥ syonāka sannibhā prabhāvantaḥ prabhavanti tatas taruṇāḥ vajra nibhāḥ bhīṣma pāṣāṇāḥ

original: hemādipratibaddhāḥ śuddhamapi śraddhayā vidhatte yaḥ / bhīṣmamaṇiṃ grīvādiṣu susampadaṃ sa sarvadā labhate //
analyzed: hema ādi pratibaddhāḥ śuddham api śraddhayā vidhatte yaḥ bhīṣma maṇim grīvā ādiṣu su sampadam sa sarvadā labhate

original: nirīkṣya palāyante yaṃ tamaraṇyanivāsinaḥ samīpa'pi / dvīpivṛkaśarabhakuñjarasiṃhavyāghrādayo hiṃstrāḥ //
analyzed: nirīkṣya palāyante yam tam araṇya nivāsinaḥ dvīpi vṛka śarabha kuñjara siṃha vyāghra ādayaḥ hiṃstrāḥ

original: tasoyatkalataṣṭatarorbhavati bhayaṃ na cāstīśamupahasanti / bhīṣmamaṇirguṇayukto samyakprāptāṅgulīkalatratvaḥ //
analyzed: samyak prāpta aṅgulī kalatra tvaḥ

original: pitṝtarpaṇe pitṝṇāṃ tṛptirbahuvārṣikī bhavati / śāmyantyadbhutānyapi sarpāṇḍajākhuvṛścikaviṣāṇi / salilāgnivairitaskarabhayāni bhīmāni naśyanti //
analyzed: pitṝ tarpaṇe pitṝṇām tṛptiḥ bahu vārṣikī bhavati śāmyanti adbhutāni api sarpa aṇḍaja ākhu vṛścika viṣāṇi salila agni vairi taskara bhayāni bhīmāni naśyanti

original: śaivalabalāhakābhaṃ puruṣaṃ pītaprabhaṃ prabhāhīnam / malinadyuti ca vivarṇaṃ dūrātparivarjayetprājñaḥ //
analyzed: śaivala balāhaka ābham puruṣam pīta prabham prabhā hīnam malina dyuti ca vivarṇam dūrāt parivarjayet prājñaḥ

original: mūlyaṃ prakalpyameṣāṃ vibudhavarairdaiśakālavijñānāt / dūre bhūtānāṃ bahu kiñcinnikaṭaprasūtānām //
analyzed: mūlyam prakalpyam eṣām vibudha varaiḥ daiśa kāla vijñānāt dūre bhūtānām bahu kiñcid nikaṭa prasūtānām

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidūryaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭsaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vaidūryaparīkṣaṇam nāma ṣaṭsaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 77
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / puṇyeṣu parvatavareṣu ca nimnagāsu sthānāntareṣu ca tathottaradeśagatvāt / saṃsthāpitāḥ svanakhabāhugateḥ prakāśaṃ saṃpūjya dānavapatiṃ prathite pradeśe //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca puṇyeṣu parvata vareṣu ca nimnagāsu sthāna antareṣu ca tathā uttara deśa ga tvāt  saṃsthāpitāḥ sva nakha bāhu gateḥ prakāśam saṃpūjya dānava patim prathite pradeśe

original: dāśārṇavāgadara (va)
analyzed: va

original: mekalakālagādau guñjāñjanakṣaudramṛṇālavarṇāḥ / gandharvavahnikadalīsadṛśāvabhāsā ete praśastāḥ pulakāḥ prasūtāḥ //
analyzed: mekala kālaga ādau guñjā añjana kṣaudra mṛṇāla varṇāḥ gandharva vahni kadalī sadṛśa avabhāsāḥ ete praśastāḥ pulakāḥ prasūtāḥ

original: śaṅkhābjabhṛṅgārkavicitrabhaṅgā sūtrairur (vya)
analyzed: śaṅkha abja bhṛṅga arka vicitra bhaṅgā

original: petāḥ paramāḥ pavitrāḥ / maṅgalyayuktā bahubhakticitrā vṛddhipradāste pulakā bhavanti //
analyzed: petāḥ paramāḥ pavitrāḥ maṅgalya yuktāḥ bahu bhakti citrāḥ vṛddhi pradāḥ te pulakāḥ bhavanti

original: kākā (ka.)śvarāsabhasṛgālavṛkograrūpairgṛdhraiḥ samāṃsarudhirārdramukhairupetāḥ / mṛtyupradāśca viduṣā parivarjanīyā mūlyaṃ palasya kathitaṃ ca śatāni pañca //
analyzed: kākā kaśva rāsabha sṛgāla vṛka ugra rūpaiḥ gṛdhraiḥ sa māṃsa rudhira ārdra mukhaiḥ upetāḥ mṛtyu pradāḥ ca viduṣā parivarjanīyāḥ mūlyam palasya kathitam ca śatāni pañca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pulakaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma saptasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe pulakaparīkṣaṇam nāma saptasaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 78
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / hutabhugrūpamādāya dānavasya yathepsitam / narmadāyāṃ nicikṣepa kiñciddhīnādibhūmiṣu //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca hutabhuj rūpam ādāya dānavasya yathā īpsitam narmadāyām nicikṣepa kiñcid hīna ādi bhūmiṣu

original: tatrendragopakalitaṃ śukavakravarṇaṃ saṃsthānataḥ prakaṭapīlusamānamātram / nānāprakāravihitaṃ rudhirākṣa(khya)
analyzed: tatra indragopa kalitam śuka vakra varṇam saṃsthānataḥ prakaṭa pīlu samāna mātram nānā prakāra vihitam rudhirākṣa khyaiḥ

original: ratnamuddhṛtya tasya khalu sarvasamānameva //
analyzed: ratnam uddhṛtya tasya khalu sarva samānam eva

original: madhyendupāṇḍuramatīva viśuddhavarṇaṃ taccendranīlasadṛśaṃ paṭalaṃ tule syāt / saiśvaryabhṛtyajananaṃ kathitaṃ tadaiva pakrañca tatkila bhavetsuravajravarṇam //
analyzed: madhya indu pāṇḍuram atīva viśuddha varṇam tat ca indranīla sadṛśam paṭalam tule syāt sa aiśvarya bhṛtya jananam kathitam tadā eva tat kila bhavet sura vajra varṇam

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rudhirākṣaratnaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe rudhirākṣaratnaparīkṣaṇam nāma aṣṭasaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 79
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / kāveravindhyayavanacīnanepālabhūmiṣu / lāṅgalī vyakiranmedo dānavasya prayatnataḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca kāvera vindhya yavana cīna nepāla bhūmiṣu  lāṅgalī vyakirat medaḥ dānavasya prayatnataḥ

original: ākāśaśuddhaṃ tailākhyamutpannaṃ sphaṭikaṃ tataḥ / mṛṇālaśaṅkhadhavalaṃ kiñcidvarṇāntaranvitam //
analyzed: ākāśa śuddham taila ākhyam utpannam sphaṭikam tatas mṛṇāla śaṅkha dhavalam kiñcid varṇa antar anvitam

original: na ttulyaṃ hi ratnānāmathavā pāpanāśanam / saṃskṛtaṃ śilpinā sadyo mūlyaṃ kiñcillabhettataḥ (dā) //
analyzed: na hi ratnānām athavā pāpa nāśanam  saṃskṛtam śilpinā sadyas mūlyam kiñcid labhet tatas

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sphaṭikaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmaikonāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe sphaṭikaparīkṣaṇam nāma ekonāśītitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 80
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / ādāya śeṣastasyāntraṃ balasya kelādiṣu / cikṣepa tatra jāyante vidrumāḥ subhahāguṇāḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca ādāya śeṣaḥ tasya antram balasya cikṣepa tatra jāyante vidrumāḥ

original: tatra pradhānaṃ śaśalohitābhaṃ guñjājapāpuṣpanibhaṃ pradiṣṭam / sunīlakaṃ devakaromakañca sthānāni teṣu prabhavaṃ surāgam //
analyzed: tatra pradhānam śaśa lohita ābham guñjā japā puṣpa nibham pradiṣṭam su nīlakam devaka romakam ca sthānāni teṣu prabhavam su rāgam

original: anyatra jātaṃ ca na tatpradhānaṃ mūlyaṃ bhavecchilpiviśeṣayogāt / prasannaṃ komalaṃ snigdhaṃ surāgaṃ vidrumaṃ hi tat //
analyzed: anyatra jātam ca na tat pradhānam mūlyam bhavet śilpi viśeṣa yogāt prasannam komalam snigdham su rāgam vidrumam hi tat

original: dhanadhānyakaraṃ loke viṣārtibhayanāśanam / parīkṣā pulakasyoktā rudhirākṣasya vai maṇeḥ / sphaṭikasya vidrumasya ratnajñānāya śaunaka / //
analyzed: dhana dhānya karam loke viṣa ārti bhaya nāśanam  parīkṣā pulakasya uktā rudhirākṣasya vai maṇeḥ sphaṭikasya vidrumasya ratna jñānāya śaunaka

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vidrumaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vidrumaparīkṣaṇam nāma aśītitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 81
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: (iti ratnamuktādi parīkṣā samāptā ) / (atha tīrthakṣetramāhātmyamārabhyate ) / sūta uvāca / sarvatīrthāni vakṣyāmi gaṅgā tīrthottamottamā / sarvatra sulabhā gaṅgātriṣu sthāneṣu durlabhā //
analyzed: iti ratnamuktā ādi parīkṣā samāptā   atha tīrtha kṣetra māhātmyam ārabhyate   sūtaḥ uvāca sarva tīrthāni vakṣyāmi gaṅgā tīrtha uttama uttamā sarvatra sulabhā gaṅgā triṣu sthāneṣu durlabhā

original: gaṅgādvāre prayāge ca gaṅgāsāgarasaṅgame / prayāgaṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ mṛtānāṃ bhuktimuktidam //
analyzed: gaṅgādvāre prayāge ca gaṅgāsāgara saṅgame prayāgam paramam tīrtham mṛtānām bhukti mukti dam

original: sevanātkṛtapiṇḍānāṃ pāpajitkāmadaṃ nṛṇām / vārāṇasī paraṃ tīrthaṃ viśveśo yatra keśavaḥ //
analyzed: sevanāt kṛta piṇḍānām pāpa jit kāma dam nṛṇām vārāṇasī param tīrtham viśveśaḥ yatra keśavaḥ

original: kurukṣetraṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ dānādyairbhuktimuktidam / prabhāsaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ somanātho hi tatra ca //
analyzed: kurukṣetram param tīrtham dāna ādyaiḥ bhukti mukti dam  prabhāsam param tīrtham somanāthaḥ hi tatra ca

original: dvārakā ca purī ramyā bhuktimuktipradāyikā / prācī sarasvatī puṇyā saptasārasvataṃ param //
analyzed: dvārakā ca purī ramyā bhukti mukti pradāyikā prācī sarasvatī puṇyā saptasārasvatam param

original: kedāraṃ sarvapāpaghnaṃ sa (śa)
analyzed: kedāram sarva pāpa ghnam sa śa

original: mbhalagrāma uttamaḥ / naranarāyaṇaṃ tīrthaṃ muktyai vadarikāśramaḥ //
analyzed: mbhalagrāmaḥ uttamaḥ naranarāyaṇam tīrtham muktyai vadarikāśramaḥ

original: śvetadvīpaṃ purī māyā naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ param / ayodhyā cārghyatīrthaṃ tu citrakūṭaṃ ca gomatī //
analyzed: śvetadvīpam purī māyā naimiṣam puṣkaram param ayodhyā ca arghyatīrtham tu citrakūṭam ca gomatī

original: vaināyakaṃ mahītīrthaṃ rāmagiryāśramaṃ param / kāñcīpurī tuṅgabhadrā śrīśailaṃ setubandhanam //
analyzed: vaināyakam mahī tīrtham rāmagiri āśramam param kāñcī purī tuṅgabhadrā śrīśailam setubandhanam

original: rāmeśvaraṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ kārtikeyaṃ tathottamam / bhṛgutuṅgaṃ kāmatīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ cāmarakaṇṭakam //
analyzed: rāmeśvaram param tīrtham kārtikeyam tathā uttamam bhṛgutuṅgam kāmatīrtham tīrtham ca amarakaṇṭakam

original: ujjayinyāṃ mahākālaḥ kubjake śrīdharo hariḥ / kubjāmrakaṃ mahātīrthaṃ kālasarpiśca kāmadam //
analyzed: ujjayinyām mahākālaḥ kubjake śrīdharaḥ hariḥ kubjāmrakam mahā tīrtham kālasarpiḥ ca kāma dam

original: mahā keśī ca kāverī candrabhāgā vipāśayā / ekāmraṃ ca tathā tīrthaṃ brahmeśaṃ devakoṭakam //
analyzed: mahā keśī ca kāverī candrabhāgā vipāśayā    ca tathā

original: mathurā ca purī ramyā śoṇaścaiva mahānadaḥ / jambūsaro mahātīrthaṃ tāni tīrthāni viddhi ca //
analyzed: mathurā ca purī ramyā śoṇaḥ ca eva mahā nadaḥ jambūsaraḥ mahā tīrtham tāni tīrthāni viddhi ca

original: sūryaḥ śivo gaṇo devī hariryatra ca tiṣṭhati / eteṣu ca yathānyeṣu snānaṃ dānaṃ japastapaḥ //
analyzed: sūryaḥ śivaḥ gaṇaḥ devī hariḥ yatra ca tiṣṭhati eteṣu ca yathā anyeṣu snānam dānam japaḥ tapaḥ

original: pūjā śrāddhaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati cākṣayam / śālagrāmaṃ sarvadaṃ syāttīrthaṃ paśupateḥ param //
analyzed: pūjā śrāddham piṇḍa dānam sarvam bhavati ca akṣayam śālagrāmam sarva dam syāt tīrtham paśupateḥ param

original: kokāmukhaṃ ca vārāhaṃ bhā (bhu)
analyzed: kokāmukham ca vārāham bhā bhu

original: ṇḍīraṃ svāmisaṃjñakam / lo (mo) hadaṇḍe mahāviṣṇurmandāre madhusūdanaḥ //
analyzed: ṇḍīram svāmi saṃjñakam

original: kāmarūpaṃ mahātīrthaṃ kāmākhyā (kṣā)
analyzed: kāmarūpam mahā tīrtham kāma ākhyā kṣā

original: yatra tiṣṭhati / puṇḍravardhanakaṃ tīrthaṃ kārtikeyaśca yatra ca //
analyzed: yatra tiṣṭhati puṇḍravardhanakam tīrtham kārtikeyaḥ ca yatra ca

original: virajastu mahātīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ śrīpuruṣottamam / mahendraparvatastīrthaṃ kāverī ca nadī parā //
analyzed: virajaḥ tu mahā tīrtham tīrtham śrīpuruṣottamam  mahendra parvataḥ tīrtham kāverī ca nadī parā

original: godāvarī mahātīrthaṃ payoṣṇī varadā nadī / vindhyaḥ pāpaharaṃ tīrthaṃ narmadābheda uttamaḥ //
analyzed: godāvarī mahā tīrtham payoṣṇī varadā nadī vindhyaḥ pāpa haram tīrtham narmadā bhedaḥ uttamaḥ

original: gokarṇaṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ māhiṣmatī purī / kālañjaraṃ mahītīrthaṃ śuklatīrthamanuttamam //
analyzed: gokarṇam paramam tīrtham tīrtham māhiṣmatī purī kālañjaram mahī tīrtham śuklatīrtham anuttamam

original: kṛte śauce muktidaṃ ca śārṅgadhārī tadantike / virajaṃ sarvadaṃ tīrthaṃ svarṇākṣaṃ tīrthamuttamam //
analyzed: kṛte śauce mukti dam ca śārṅgadhārī tad antike virajam sarva dam tīrtham svarṇākṣam tīrtham uttamam

original: nanditīrthaṃ muktidaṃ ca koṭitīrthaphalapradam / nāsikyaṃ ca mahātīrthaṃ govardhanamataḥ param //
analyzed: nanditīrtham mukti dam ca koṭi tīrtha phala pradam nāsikyam ca mahā tīrtham govardhanam atas param

original: kṛṣṇaveṇī bhīmarathī gaṇḍakī yā tvirāvatī / tīrthaṃ bindusaraḥ puṇyaṃ viṣṇupādodakaṃ param //
analyzed: kṛṣṇaveṇī bhīmarathī gaṇḍakī yā tu irāvatī tīrtham bindusaraḥ puṇyam viṣṇu pāda udakam param

original: brahmadhyānaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthamindriyanigrahaḥ / damastīrthaṃ tu paramaṃ bhavaśuddhiḥ paraṃ tathā //
analyzed: brahmadhyānam param tīrtham tīrtham indriyanigrahaḥ  damaḥ tīrtham tu paramam bhavaśuddhiḥ param tathā

original: jñānahrade dhyānajale rāgadveṣamalāpahe / yaḥ snāti mānase tīrthe sa yāti paramāṃ gatim //
analyzed: jñāna hrade dhyāna jale rāga dveṣa mala apahe yaḥ snāti mānase tīrthe sa yāti paramām gatim

original: idaṃ tīrthamidaṃ neti ye narā bhedadarśinaḥ / teṣāṃ vidhīyate tīrthagamanaṃ tatphalaṃ ca yat //
analyzed: idam tīrtham idam na iti ye narāḥ bheda darśinaḥ teṣām vidhīyate tīrtha gamanam tad phalam ca yat

original: sarvaṃ brahmetiyo 'veti nātīrthaṃ tasya kiñcana / eteṣu snānadānāni śrāddhaṃ piṇḍamathākṣayam //
analyzed: sarvam brahma iti yaḥ vā iti na a tīrtham tasya kiñcana eteṣu snāna dānāni śrāddham piṇḍam atha akṣayam

original: sarvā nadyaḥ sarvaśailāḥ tīrthaṃ devādisevitam / śrīraṅgaṃ ca harestīrthaṃ tāpī śreṣṭhā mahānadī //
analyzed: sarvāḥ nadyaḥ sarva śailāḥ tīrtham deva ādi sevitam  śrīraṅgam ca hareḥ tīrtham tāpī śreṣṭhā mahānadī

original: saptagodāvaraṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ koṇagiriḥ param / mahālakṣmīryatra devī praṇītā paramā nadī //
analyzed: saptagodāvaram tīrtham tīrtham koṇagiriḥ param mahā lakṣmīḥ yatra devī praṇītā paramā nadī

original: sahyādrau devadeveśa ekavīraḥ sureśvarī / gaṅgādvāre kuśāvarte vindhyake nīlaparvate //
analyzed: sahya adrau devadeveśaḥ eka vīraḥ sureśvarī  gaṅgādvāre kuśāvarte vindhyake nīlaparvate

original: snātvā kanakhale tīrthe sa bhavenna punarbhave / sū uvāca / etānyanyāni tīrthāni snānādyaiḥ sarvadāni hi //
analyzed: snātvā kanakhale tīrthe sa bhavet na punarbhave  sū uvāca etāni anyāni tīrthāni snāna ādyaiḥ sarva dāni hi

original: śrutvābravīddharerbrahmā vyāsaṃ dakṣādisaṃyutam / etānyuktvā ca tīrthāni puna stīrthottamottamam / gayākhyaṃ prāha sarveṣāmakṣayaṃ brahmalokadam //
analyzed: śrutvā abravīt hareḥ brahmā vyāsam dakṣa ādi saṃyutam  etāni uktvā ca tīrthāni punar stīrtha uttama uttamam  gayā ākhyam prāha sarveṣām akṣayam brahma loka dam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sarvatīrtha māhātmyaṃ nāmaikāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe sarvatīrtha māhātmyam nāma ekāśītitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 82
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ / (atha gayāmāhātmyaṃ prārabhyate) / brahmovāca / sārātsārataraṃ vyāsa gayābhāhātmya muttamam / pravakṣyāmi samāsena buktimuktipradaṃ śṛṇu //
analyzed: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ atha gayāmāhātmyam prārabhyate  brahmā uvāca sārāt sārataram vyāsa gayā bhāhātmya muttamam pravakṣyāmi samāsena bukti mukti pradam śṛṇu

original: gayāsuro 'bhavatpūrvaṃ vīryavānparamaḥ sa ca / tapastapyanmahāghoraṃ sarvabhūtopatāpanam //
analyzed: gaya asuraḥ bhavat pūrvam vīryavān paramaḥ sa ca tapaḥ tapyan mahā ghoram sarva bhūta upatāpanam

original: tattapastāpitā devāstadvadhārthaṃ hariṃ gatāḥ / śaraṇaṃ harirūce tān bhavitavyaṃ śivātmabhaiḥ //
analyzed: tad tapaḥ tāpitāḥ devāḥ tad vadha artham harim gatāḥ śaraṇam hariḥ ūce tān bhavitavyam

original: pātyate 'sya mahādeho tathetyūcuḥ surā harim / kadācicchivapūjārthaṃ kṣīrābdheḥ kamalāni ca //
analyzed: pātyate tya mahā dehaḥ tathā iti ūcuḥ surāḥ harim kadācid śiva pūjā artham kṣīrābdheḥ kamalāni ca

original: ānīya kīkaṭe deśe śayanaṃ cākarodvalī / viṣṇumāyāvimūḍho 'sau gadayā viṣṇunā hataḥ //
analyzed: ānīya kīkaṭe deśe śayanam ca akarot valī viṣṇu māyā vimūḍhaḥ sau gadayā viṣṇunā hataḥ

original: ato gadādharo viṣṇurgayāyāṃ muktidaḥ sthitaḥ / tasya deho liṅgarūpī sthitaḥ śuddhe pitāmahaḥ //
analyzed: atas gadādharaḥ viṣṇuḥ gayāyām mukti daḥ sthitaḥ tasya dehaḥ liṅga rūpī sthitaḥ śuddhe pitāmahaḥ

original: janārdanaśca kāleśastathānyaḥ prapitāmahaḥ / viṣṇurāhātha maryādāṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: janārdanaḥ ca kāla īśaḥ tathā anyaḥ prapitāmahaḥ viṣṇuḥ āha atha maryādām puṇya kṣetram bhaviṣyati

original: yajñaṃ śrāddhaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ snānādi kurute naraḥ / sa svargaṃ brahmalokaṃ ca gacchenna narakaṃ naraḥ //
analyzed: yajñam śrāddham piṇḍa dānam snāna ādi kurute naraḥ sa svargam brahma lokam ca gacchet na narakam naraḥ

original: gayātīrthaṃ paraṃ jñātvā yāgaṃ cakre pitāmahaḥ / brāhmaṇānpūjayāmāsa ṛtvigarthamupāgatān //
analyzed: gayā tīrtham param jñātvā yāgam cakre pitāmahaḥ brāhmaṇān pūjayāmāsa ṛtvij artham upāgatān

original: mahānadīṃ rasavahāṃ sṛṣṭvā vāpyādikaṃ tathā / bhakṣyabhojyaphalādīṃśca kāmadhenuṃ tathāsṛjat //
analyzed: mahā nadīm rasa vahām sṛṣṭvā vā api ādikam tathā bhakṣya bhojya phala ādīn ca kāmadhenum tathā sṛjat

original: pañcakrośaṃ gayokṣetraṃ brāhmaṇebhyo dadau prabhuḥ / dharamayāgeṣu lobhāttu pratigṛhya dhanādikam //
analyzed: pañcakrośam brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dadau prabhuḥ lobhāt tu pratigṛhya dhana ādikam

original: sthitā viprāstadā śaptā gayāyāṃ brāhmaṇāstataḥ / mā bhūttraipuruṣī vidyā mā bhūttraipuruṣaṃ dhanam //
analyzed: sthitāḥ viprāḥ tadā śaptāḥ gayāyām brāhmaṇāḥ tatas mā bhūt traipuruṣī vidyā mā bhūt traipuruṣam dhanam

original: yuṣmākaṃ syādvārivahā nadī pāṣāṇaparvataḥ / śaptaistu prārthito brahmānugrahaṃ kṛtavānprabhuḥ //
analyzed: yuṣmākam syāt vāri vahā nadī pāṣāṇa parvataḥ śaptaiḥ tu prārthitaḥ brahmā anugraham kṛtavān prabhuḥ

original: lokāḥ puṇyā gayāyāṃ hi śrāddhino brahmalokagāḥ / yuṣmānye pūjayiṣyanti tairahaṃ pūjitaḥ sadā //
analyzed: lokāḥ puṇyāḥ gayāyām hi śrāddhinaḥ brahma loka gāḥ yuṣmān ye pūjayiṣyanti taiḥ aham pūjitaḥ sadā

original: brahmajñānaṃ gayāśrāddhaṃ gogṛhe maraṇaṃ tathā / vāsaḥ puṃsāṃ kurukṣetre muktireṣā caturvidhā //
analyzed: brahma jñānam gayā śrāddham go gṛhe maraṇam tathā vāsaḥ puṃsām kurukṣetre muktiḥ eṣā caturvidhā

original: samudrāḥ saritaḥ sarvā vāpīkūpahradāstathā / snātukāmā gayātīrthaṃ vyāsa yāsa yānti na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: samudrāḥ saritaḥ sarvāḥ vāpī kūpa hradāḥ tathā snātu kāmāḥ gayā tīrtham vyāsa yānti na saṃśayaḥ

original: brahmahatyā surāpānaṃ steyaṃ gurvaṅganāgamaḥ / pāpaṃ tatsaṃgajaṃ sarvaṃ gayāśrāddhādvinaśyati //
analyzed: brahmahatyā surā pānam steyam guru aṅganā āgamaḥ pāpam tad saṃga jam sarvam gayā śrāddhāt vinaśyati

original: asaṃskṛtā mṛtā ya ca paśucorahatāśca ye / sarpadaṣṭā gayāśrāddhānmuktāḥ svargaṃ vrajanti te //
analyzed: asaṃskṛtāḥ ca paśu cora hatāḥ ca ye sarpa daṣṭāḥ gayā śrāddhāt muktāḥ svargam vrajanti te

original: gayāyāṃ piṇḍadānena yatphalaṃ labhate naraḥ / na tacchakyaṃ mayā vaktuṃ varṣakoṭiśatairapi //
analyzed: gayāyām piṇḍa dānena yat phalam labhate naraḥ na tat śakyam mayā vaktum varṣa koṭi śataiḥ api

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma dvyaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyam nāma dvyaśītitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 83
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / kīkaṭeṣu gayā puṇyā puṇyaṃ rājagṛhaṃ vanam / viṣayaścāraṇaḥ puṇyo nadīnāṃ ca punaḥ punā //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca kīkaṭeṣu gayā puṇyā puṇyam rājagṛham vanam viṣayaḥ cāraṇaḥ puṇyaḥ nadīnām ca punar

original: muṇḍapṛṣṭhaṃ tu pūrvasminpaścime dakṣiṇottare / sārdhakrośadvayaṃ mānaṃ gayāyāṃ parikīrtitam //
analyzed: muṇḍapṛṣṭham tu pūrvasmin paścime dakṣiṇa uttare sa ardha krośa dvayam mānam gayāyām parikīrtitam

original: pañcakrośaṃ gayākṣetraṃ krośamekaṃ gayāśiraḥ / tatra piṇḍapradānena tṛptirbhavati śāśvatī //
analyzed: pañcakrośam gayā kṣetram krośam ekam gayāśiraḥ tatra piṇḍa pradānena tṛptiḥ bhavati śāśvatī

original: nagājjanārdanāccaiva kūpāccottaramānasāt / etadgayāśiraḥ proktaṃ phalgutīrthaṃ taducyate //
analyzed: nagāt janārdanāt ca eva kūpāt ca uttaramānasāt  etat gayāśiraḥ proktam phalgutīrtham tat ucyate

original: tatra piṇḍapradānena pitṝṇā paramā gatiḥ / gayāgamanamātreṇa pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet //
analyzed: tatra piṇḍa pradānena pitṝṇām paramā gatiḥ gayā gamana mātreṇa pitṝṇām anṛṇaḥ bhavet

original: gayāyāṃ pitṛrūpeṇa devadevo janārdanaḥ / taṃ dṛṣṭvā puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ mucyate vai ṛṇatrayāt //
analyzed: gayāyām pitṛ rūpeṇa devadevaḥ janārdanaḥ tam dṛṣṭvā puṇḍarīkākṣam mucyate vai ṛṇa trayāt

original: rathamārgaṃ gayatīrthe dṛṣṭvā rudrapadādike / kāleśvaraṃ ca kedāraṃ pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet //
analyzed: ratha mārgam gaya tīrthe dṛṣṭvā rudrapada ādike kāleśvaram ca kedāram pitṝṇām anṛṇaḥ bhavet

original: dṛṣṭvā pitāmahaṃ devaṃ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate / lokaṃ tvanāmayaṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā ca prapitāmaham //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā pitāmaham devam sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate lokam tu anāmayam yāti dṛṣṭvā ca prapitāmaham

original: tathā gadādharaṃ devaṃ mādhavaṃ puruṣottamam / taṃ praṇamya prayatnena na bhūyo jāyate naraḥ //
