analyzed: tathā gadādharam devam mādhavam puruṣottamam  tam praṇamya prayatnena na bhūyas jāyate naraḥ

original: maunādityaṃ mahātmānaṃ kanakārkaṃ viśeṣataḥ / dṛṣṭvā maunena viprarṣe pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet //
analyzed: mauna ādityam mahātmānam kanaka arkam viśeṣataḥ dṛṣṭvā maunena viprarṣe pitṝṇām anṛṇaḥ bhavet

original: brahmāṇaṃ pūjayitvā ca brahmalokamavāpnuyāt / gāyattrīṃ pratarutthāya yastu paśyati mānavaḥ //
analyzed: brahmāṇam pūjayitvā ca brahma lokam avāpnuyāt  gāyattrīm pratar utthāya yaḥ tu paśyati mānavaḥ

original: sandhyāṃ kṛtvā prayatnena sarvavedaphalaṃ labhet / sāvitrīṃ caiva madhyāhne dṛṣṭvā yajñaphalaṃ labhet //
analyzed: sandhyām kṛtvā prayatnena sarva veda phalam labhet sāvitrīm ca eva madhyāhne dṛṣṭvā yajña phalam labhet

original: sarasvatīṃ ca sāyāhne dṛṣṭvā dānaphalaṃ labhet / nagasthamīśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet //
analyzed: sarasvatīm ca sāyāhne dṛṣṭvā dāna phalam labhet naga stham īśvaram dṛṣṭvā pitṝṇām anṛṇaḥ bhavet

original: dharmāraṇyaṃ dharmamīśaṃ dṛṣṭvā syādṛṇanāśanam / devaṃ gṛdhreśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā ko na mucyeta bandhanāt //
analyzed: dharmāraṇyam dharmam īśam dṛṣṭvā syāt ṛṇa nāśanam  devam gṛdhreśvaram dṛṣṭvā kaḥ na mucyeta bandhanāt

original: dhenuṃ dṛṣṭvā dhenuvane brahmalokaṃ nayetpitṝn / prabhāseśaṃ prabhāse ca dṛṣṭvā yāti parāṃ gatim //
analyzed: dhenum dṛṣṭvā dhenu vane brahma lokam nayet pitṝn prabhāseśam prabhāse ca dṛṣṭvā yāti parām gatim

original: koṭīśvaraṃ cāśvamedhaṃ dṛṣṭvā syādṛṇanāśanam / svargadvāreśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā mucyate bhavabandhanāt //
analyzed: koṭīśvaram ca aśvamedham dṛṣṭvā syāt ṛṇa nāśanam svargadvāra īśvaram dṛṣṭvā mucyate bhava bandhanāt

original: rāmeśvaraṃ gadālolaṃ dṛṣṭvā svargamavāpnuyāt / brahmeśvaraṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā mucyate brahmahatyayā //
analyzed: rāmeśvaram gadālolam dṛṣṭvā svargam avāpnuyāt brahmeśvaram tathā dṛṣṭvā mucyate brahma hatyayā

original: muṇḍapṛṣṭhe mahācaṇḍīṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmānavāpnuyāt / phalgvīśaṃ phalgucaṇḍīṃ ca gaurīṃ dṛṣṭvā ca maṅgalām //
analyzed: muṇḍapṛṣṭhe mahācaṇḍīm dṛṣṭvā kāmān avāpnuyāt phalgvīśam phalgucaṇḍīm ca gaurīm dṛṣṭvā ca maṅgalām

original: gomakaṃ gopatiṃ devaṃ pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet / aṅgāreśaṃ ca siddheśaṃ gayādityaṃ gajaṃ tathā //
analyzed: gomakam gopatim devam pitṝṇām anṛṇaḥ bhavet aṅgāreśam ca siddheśam gayādityam gajam tathā

original: mārkaṇḍeyeśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet / phalgutīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā devaṃ gadādharam //
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyeśvaram dṛṣṭvā pitṝṇām anṛṇaḥ bhavet phalgutīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā devam gadādharam

original: etena kiṃ na paryāptaṃ nṝṇāṃ sukṛtakāriṇām / brahmalokaṃ prayāntīha puruṣā ekaviṃśatiḥ //
analyzed: etena kim na paryāptam nṝṇām sukṛta kāriṇām brahma lokam prayānti iha puruṣāḥ ekaviṃśatiḥ

original: pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthānī ye samudrāḥ sarāṃsi ca / phalgutīrthaṃ gamiṣyanti vāramekaṃ dinedine //
analyzed: pṛthivyām yāni tīrthānī ye samudrāḥ sarāṃsi ca phalgutīrtham gamiṣyanti vāram ekam dinedine

original: pṛthivyāṃ ca gayā puṇyā gayāyāṃ ca gayāśiraḥ / śreṣṭhaṃ tathā phalgutīrthaṃ tanmukhaṃ ca surasya hi //
analyzed: pṛthivyām ca gayā puṇyā gayāyām ca gayāśiraḥ śreṣṭham tathā phalgutīrtham tat mukham ca surasya hi

original: udīci kanakānadyo nābhitīrthaṃ tu madhyataḥ / puṇyaṃ brahmasadastīrthaṃ snānātsyādbrahmalokadam //
analyzed: udīci nābhitīrtham tu madhyatas puṇyam brahmasadaḥ tīrtham snānāt syāt brahma loka dam

original: kūpe piṇḍādikaṃ kṛtvā pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavem / tathākṣayavaṭe śrāddhī brahmalokaṃ nayetpitṝn //
analyzed: kūpe piṇḍa ādikam kṛtvā pitṝṇām anṛṇaḥ tathā akṣayavaṭe śrāddhī brahma lokam nayet pitṝn

original: haṃsatīrthe naraḥ snātvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate / koṭitītha gayālole vaitaraṇyāṃ ca gomake //
analyzed: haṃsatīrthe naraḥ snātvā sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate koṭitītha gayālole vaitaraṇyām ca gomake

original: brahmalokaṃ nayecchrāddhī puruṣānekaviṃśatim / brahmatīrthe rāmatīrthe āgneye somatīrthake //
analyzed: brahma lokam nayet śrāddhī puruṣān ekaviṃśatim brahmatīrthe rāmatīrthe āgneye somatīrthake

original: śrāddhī rāmahrade brahmalokaṃ pitṛkulaṃ nayet / uttare mānase śrāddhī na bhūyo jāyate naraḥ //
analyzed: śrāddhī rāmahrade brahma lokam pitṛ kulam nayet  uttare mānase śrāddhī na bhūyas jāyate naraḥ

original: dakṣiṇe mānase śrāddhī brahmalokaṃ pitṝnnayet / svagadvāre naraḥ śrāddhī brahmalokaṃ nayetpitṝn / bhīṣmatarpaṇakṛttasya kūṭe tārayate pitṝn / gṛdhreśvare tathā śrāddhī pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe mānase śrāddhī brahma lokam pitṝn nayet svagadvāre naraḥ śrāddhī brahma lokam nayet pitṝn  bhīṣma tarpaṇa kṛttasya kūṭe tārayate pitṝn  gṛdhreśvare tathā śrāddhī pitṝṇām anṛṇaḥ bhavet

original: śrāddhī ca dhenukāraṇye brihmalokaṃ pitṝnnayet / tiladhenupradaḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā dhenuṃ na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: śrāddhī ca dhenukāraṇye brihma lokam pitṝn nayet tiladhenu pradaḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā dhenum na saṃśayaḥ

original: aindre vā naratīrthe ca vāsave vaiṣṇave tathā / mahānadyāṃ kṛtaśrāddho brahmalokaṃ nayetpitṝn //
analyzed: aindre vā naratīrthe ca vāsave vaiṣṇave tathā mahānadyām kṛta śrāddhaḥ brahma lokam nayet pitṝn

original: gāyattre caiva sāvitre tīrthe sārasvate tathā / snānasa ndhyātarpaṇakṛcchrāddhī caikottaraṃ śatam //
analyzed: gāyattre ca eva sāvitre tīrthe sārasvate tathā snāna sa ndhyā tarpaṇa kṛt śrāddhī ca eka uttaram śatam

original: pitṝṇāṃ tu kulaṃ brahmalokaṃ nayati mānavaḥ / brahmayoniṃ vinirgacchetprayataḥ pitṛmānasaḥ //
analyzed: pitṝṇām tu kulam brahma lokam nayati mānavaḥ brahmayonim vinirgacchet prayataḥ pitṛ mānasaḥ

original: tarpayitvā pitṝndevānna viśedyonisaṅkaṭe / tarpaṇe kākajaṅghāryā pitṝṇāṃ tṛptirakṣayā //
analyzed: tarpayitvā pitṝn devān na viśet yoni saṅkaṭe tarpaṇe kākajaṅghā āryā pitṝṇām tṛptiḥ akṣayā

original: dharmāraṇye mataṅgasya vāpyāṃ śrāddhāddivaṃ vrajet / dharmayūpe ca kūpe ta pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet //
analyzed: dharmāraṇye mataṅgasya vāpyām śrāddhāt divam vrajet  dharmayūpe ca kūpe pitṝṇām anṛṇaḥ bhavet

original: pramāṇaṃ devatāḥ santu lokapālāśca sākṣiṇaḥ / mayāgatya mataṅge 'sminpitṝṇāṃ niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā //
analyzed: pramāṇam devatāḥ santu lokapālāḥ ca sākṣiṇaḥ mayā āgatya mataṅge smin pitṝṇām niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā

original: rāmatīrthe narāḥ snātvā śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā prabhāsake / śilāyāṃ pretabhāvātsyurmuktāḥ pitṛgaṇāḥ kila //
analyzed: rāmatīrthe narāḥ snātvā śrāddham kṛtvā prabhāsake śilāyām preta bhāvāt syuḥ muktāḥ pitṛ gaṇāḥ kila

original: śrāddhakṛccha svapuṣṭāyāṃ triḥ saphtakuṃlamuddharet / śrāddhakṛnmuṇḍapṛṣṭhādau brahmalokaṃ nayetpitṝn //
analyzed: sva puṣṭāyām tris sa phta kuṃlam uddharet  śrāddha kṛt muṇḍapṛṣṭha ādau brahma lokam nayet pitṝn

original: gayāyāṃ na hi tatsthānaṃ yatra tīrthaṃ na vidyate / pañcakrośe gayākṣetre yatra tatra tu piṇḍadaḥ //
analyzed: gayāyām na hi tat sthānam yatra tīrtham na vidyate pañcakrośe gayā kṣetre yatra tatra tu piṇḍa daḥ

original: akṣayaṃ phalamāpnoti brahmalokaṃ nayetpitṝn / janārdanasya haste tu piṇḍaṃ dadyātsvakaṃ naraḥ //
analyzed: akṣayam phalam āpnoti brahma lokam nayet pitṝn janārdanasya haste tu piṇḍam dadyāt svakam naraḥ

original: eṣa piṇḍe mayā dattastava haste janārdana / / paralokaṃ gate mokṣamakṣayyamupatiṣṭhatām //
analyzed: eṣa piṇḍe mayā dattaḥ tava haste janārdana   para lokam gate mokṣam akṣayyam upatiṣṭhatām

original: brahmalokamavāpnoti pitṛbhiḥ saha niścitam / gayāyāṃ dharmapṛṣṭhe ca sarasi brahmaṇastathā //
analyzed: brahma lokam avāpnoti pitṛbhiḥ saha niścitam gayāyām dharmapṛṣṭhe ca sarasi brahmaṇaḥ tathā

original: gayāśīrṣe 'kṣayavaṭe pitṝṇāṃ dattamakṣayam / dharmāraṇyaṃ dharmapṛṣṭhaṃ dhenukāraṇyameva ca //
analyzed: gayāśīrṣe kṣayavaṭe pitṝṇām dattam akṣayam dharmāraṇyam dharmapṛṣṭham dhenukāraṇyam eva ca

original: dṛṣṭvaitāni pitṝṃścāryavaṃśyānviṃśatimuddharet / brahmāraṇyaṃ mahānadyāḥ paścimo bhāga ucyate //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā etāni pitṝn ca ārya vaṃśyān viṃśatim uddharet  brahmāraṇyam mahānadyāḥ paścimaḥ bhāgaḥ ucyate

original: pūrvo brahmasado bhāgo nāgādrirbharatāśramaḥ / bharatasyāśrame śrāddhī mataṅgasya pade bhavet //
analyzed: pūrvaḥ brahmasadaḥ bhāgaḥ nāga adriḥ bharatāśramaḥ bharatasya āśrame śrāddhī mataṅgasya pade bhavet

original: gayāśīrṣāddakṣiṇato mahānadyāśca paścime / tatsmṛtaṃ campakavanaṃ tatra pāṇḍuśilāsti hi //
analyzed: gayāśīrṣāt dakṣiṇatas mahānadyāḥ ca paścime tat smṛtam campakavanam tatra pāṇḍu śilā asti hi

original: śrāddhī tatra tṛtīyāyāṃ niścirāyāśca maṇḍale / mahāhrade ca kauśikyāmakṣayaṃ phalamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: śrāddhī tatra tṛtīyāyām niścirāyāḥ ca maṇḍale mahāhrade ca kauśikyām akṣayam phalam āpnuyāt

original: vaitaraṇyā ścottaratastṛtīyākhyo jalāśayaḥ / padāni tatra krauñcasya śrāddhī svargaṃ nayetpitṝn //
analyzed: vaitaraṇyāḥ ca uttaratas tṛtīya ākhyaḥ jalāśayaḥ padāni tatra krauñcasya śrāddhī svargam nayet pitṝn

original: krauñcapādāduttarato niścirākhyo jalāśayaḥ / sakṛdyatrābhigamanaṃ sakṛtpiṃṇḍaprapātanam //
analyzed: krauñcapādāt uttaratas niścirā ākhyaḥ jalāśayaḥ sakṛt yatra abhigamanam sakṛt piṃṇḍa prapātanam

original: durlabhaṃ kiṃ punarnityamasminneva vyavasthitiḥ / mahānadyāmupaspṛśya tarpayetpitṛdevatāḥ //
analyzed: durlabham kim punar nityam asmin eva vyavasthitiḥ mahānadyām upaspṛśya tarpayet pitṛ devatāḥ

original: akṣayānprāpnuyāllokānkulaṃ cāpi samuddharet / sāvitre paṭhyate sandhyā kṛtā syāddvādaśābdikī //
analyzed: akṣayān prāpnuyāt lokān kulam ca api samuddharet sāvitre paṭhyate sandhyā kṛtā syāt dvādaśa ābdikī

original: śuklakṛṣṇāvubhau pakṣau gayāyāṃ yo vasennaraḥ punātyāsaptamaṃ caiva kulaṃ nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: śukla kṛṣṇau ubhau pakṣau gayāyām yaḥ vaset naraḥ punāti āsaptamam ca eva kulam na asti atra saṃśayaḥ

original: gayāyāṃ muṇāḍapṛṣṭhaṃ ca aravindaṃ ca parvatam / tṛtīyaṃ kraiñcapādaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate //
analyzed: gayāyām muṇāḍapṛṣṭham ca aravindam ca parvatam tṛtīyam kraiñcapādam ca dṛṣṭvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: makare vartamāne ca grahaṇe candrasūryayoḥ / durlabhaṃ triṣu lokeṣu gayāyāṃ piṇḍapātanam //
analyzed: makare vartamāne ca grahaṇe candra sūryayoḥ  durlabham triṣu lokeṣu gayāyām piṇḍapātanam

original: mahāhrade ca kauśikyāṃ mūlakṣetre viśeṣataḥ / guhāyāṃ gṛdhrakūṭasya śrāddhaṃ dattaṃ (sapta)
analyzed: mahāhrade ca kauśikyām mūla kṣetre viśeṣataḥ guhāyām gṛdhrakūṭasya śrāddham dattam sapta

original: mahāphalam //
analyzed: mahā phalam

original: yatra māheśvarī dhārā śrāddhī tatrānṛṇo bhavet / puṇyāṃ viśālāmāsādya nadīṃ trailokya viśrutām //
analyzed: yatra māheśvarī dhārā śrāddhī tatra anṛṇaḥ bhavet puṇyām viśālām āsādya nadīm trailokya viśrutām

original: agniṣṭomamavāpnoti śrāddhī prāyāddivaṃ naraḥ / śrāddhī māsapade snātvā vājapeyaphalaṃ labhet //
analyzed: agniṣṭomam avāpnoti śrāddhī prāyāt divam naraḥ śrāddhī māsapade snātvā vājapeya phalam labhet

original: ravipāde piṇḍadānātpatitoddhāraṇaṃ bhavet / gayāstho yo dadātyannaṃ pitarastena putriṇaḥ //
analyzed: ravi pāde piṇḍa dānāt patita uddhāraṇam bhavet gayā sthaḥ yaḥ dadāti annam pitaraḥ tena putriṇaḥ

original: kāṅkṣante pitaraḥ putrānnarakādbhayabhīravaḥ / gayāṃ yāsyati yaḥ kaścitso 'smānsantarayiṣyati //
analyzed: kāṅkṣante pitaraḥ putrān narakāt bhaya bhīravaḥ gayām yāsyati yaḥ kaścid saḥ smān santarayiṣyati

original: gayāprāptaṃ sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā pitṝṇāmutsavo bhavet / pabhdyāmapi jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā asmabhyaṃ kila dāsyati //
analyzed: gayā prāptam sutam dṛṣṭvā pitṝṇām utsavaḥ bhavet pabhdyām api jalam spṛṣṭvā asmabhyam kila dāsyati

original: ātmajo vā tathānyo vā gayākūpe yadā tadā / yannāmnā pātayetpiṇḍaṃ taṃ nayedbrahma śāśvatam //
analyzed: ātmajaḥ vā tathā anyaḥ vā gayākūpe yadā tadā yad nāmnā pātayet piṇḍam tam nayet brahma śāśvatam

original: puṇḍarīkaṃ viṣṇulokaṃ prāpnuyātkoṭitīrthagaḥ / yā sā vaitaraṇī nāma triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā //
analyzed: puṇḍarīkam viṣṇu lokam prāpnuyāt koṭitīrtha gaḥ yā sā vaitaraṇī nāma triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā

original: sāvatīrṇā gayākṣetre pitṝṇāṃ tāraṇāya hi / śrāddhadaḥ piṇḍadastatra gopradānaṃ karotiyaḥ //
analyzed: sā avatīrṇā gayā kṣetre pitṝṇām tāraṇāya hi śrāddha daḥ piṇḍa daḥ tatra go pradānam karoti yaḥ

original: ekaviṃśativaṃśyānsa tārayennātra saṃśayaḥ / yadi putro gayāṃ gacchetkadācitkālaparyaye //
analyzed: ekaviṃśati vaṃśyān sa tārayet na atra saṃśayaḥ yadi putraḥ gayām gacchet kadācid kāla paryaye

original: tāneva bhojayedviprānbrahmaṇā ye prakalpitāḥ / teṣāṃ brahmasadaḥ sthānaṃ somapānaṃ tathaiva ca //
analyzed: tān eva bhojayet viprān brahmaṇā ye prakalpitāḥ teṣām brahmasadaḥ sthānam somapānam tathā eva ca

original: brahmaprakalpitaṃ sthānaṃ viprā brahmaprakalpapitāḥ / pūjitaiḥ pūjitāḥ sarve pitṛbhiḥ saha devatāḥ //
analyzed: brahma prakalpitam sthānam viprāḥ brahma prakalpa pitāḥ pūjitaiḥ pūjitāḥ sarve pitṛbhiḥ saha devatāḥ

original: tarpayettu gayāviprānhavyakavyairvidhānataḥ / sthānaṃ dehaparityāge gayāyāṃ tu vidhīyate //
analyzed: tarpayet tu gayā viprān havya kavyaiḥ vidhānataḥ sthānam deha parityāge gayāyām tu vidhīyate

original: yaḥ karoti vṛṣotsargaṃ gayākṣetre hyanuttame / agniṣṭomaśataṃ puṇyaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ karoti vṛṣotsargam gayā kṣetre hi anuttame agniṣṭoma śatam puṇyam labhate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: ātmano 'pi mahābuddhirgayāyāṃ tu tilairvinā / piṇḍanirvāpaṇaṃ kuryādanyeṣāmapi mānavaḥ //
analyzed: mahā buddhiḥ gayāyām tu tilaiḥ vinā piṇḍa nirvāpaṇam kuryāt anyeṣām api mānavaḥ

original: yāvanto jñātayaḥ pitryā bāndhavāḥ suhṛdastathā / tebhyo vyāsagayābhūmau piṇḍo deyo vidhānataḥ //
analyzed: yāvantaḥ jñātayaḥ pitryāḥ bāndhavāḥ suhṛdaḥ tathā tebhyaḥ vyāsa gayā bhūmau piṇḍaḥ deyaḥ vidhānataḥ

original: rāmatīrthe naraḥ snātvā gośatasyāpnuyātphalam / mataṅgavāpyāṃ snātvā ca gosahasraphalaṃ labhet //
analyzed: rāmatīrthe naraḥ snātvā go śatasya āpnuyāt phalam mataṅga vāpyām snātvā ca go sahasra phalam labhet

original: niścirāsaṃgame snātvā brahmalokaṃ nayetpitṝn / vasiṣṭhasyāśrame snātvā vājapeyaṃ ca vindati //
analyzed: niścirā saṃgame snātvā brahma lokam nayet pitṝn vasiṣṭhasya āśrame snātvā vājapeyam ca vindati

original: mahākauśyāṃ samāvāsādaśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet / pitāmahasya sarasaḥ prasṛtā lokapāvanī //
analyzed: mahākauśyām samāvāsāt aśvamedha phalam labhet pitāmahasya sarasaḥ prasṛtā loka pāvanī

original: samīpe tvagnidhāreti viśrutā kapilā hi sā / agniṣṭomaphalaṃ śrāddhī snātvātra kṛtakṛtyatā //
analyzed: samīpe tu agnidhārā iti viśrutā kapilā hi sā agniṣṭoma phalam śrāddhī snātvā atra kṛtakṛtya tā

original: śrāddhī kumāradhārāyāmaśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet / kumāramabhigamyātha natvā muktimavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: śrāddhī kumāradhārāyām aśvamedha phalam labhet kumāram abhigamya atha natvā muktim avāpnuyāt

original: somakuṇḍe naraḥ snātvā somalokaṃ ca gacchati / saṃvartasya naro vāpyāṃ subhagaḥ syāttu piṇḍadaḥ //
analyzed: somakuṇḍe naraḥ snātvā soma lokam ca gacchati saṃvartasya naraḥ vāpyām subhagaḥ syāt tu piṇḍa daḥ

original: dhautapāpo naro yāti pretakuṇḍe ca piṇḍadaḥ / devanadyāṃ lelihāne mathane jānugartake //
analyzed: dhauta pāpaḥ naraḥ yāti pretakuṇḍe ca piṇḍa daḥ devanadyām lelihāne mathane jānugartake

original: evamādiṣu tīrtheṣu piṇḍadastārayetpitṝn / natvā devānvasiṣṭheśaprabhṛtīnṛṇasaṃkṣayam //
analyzed: evamādiṣu tīrtheṣu piṇḍa daḥ tārayet pitṝn natvā devān vasiṣṭha īśa prabhṛtīn ṛṇa saṃkṣayam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma tryaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyam nāma tryaśītitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 84
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / udyatastu gayāṃ gantuṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ / vidhāya kārpaṭīviṣaṃ grāmasyāpi pradakṣiṇam //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca  udyataḥ tu gayām gantum śrāddham kṛtvā vidhānataḥ vidhāya kārpaṭī viṣam grāmasya api pradakṣiṇam

original: tato grāmāntaraṃ gatvā śrāddhaśeṣasya bhojanam / kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ gacchetpratigrahavivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: tatas grāma antaram gatvā śrāddha śeṣasya bhojanam kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam gacchet pratigraha vivarjitaḥ

original: gṛhāccalitamātrasya gayāyāṃ gamanaṃ prati / svargārohaṇasopānaṃ pitṝṇāṃ tu padepade //
analyzed: gṛhāt calita mātrasya gayāyām gamanam prati svarga ārohaṇa sopānam pitṝṇām tu pade pade

original: muṇḍanaṃ copavāsaśca sarvatīrtheṣvayaṃ vidhiḥ / varjayitvā kurukṣetraṃ viśālāṃ virajāṃ gayām //
analyzed: muṇḍanam ca upavāsaḥ ca sarva tīrtheṣu ayam vidhiḥ varjayitvā kurukṣetram viśālām virajām gayām

original: divā ca sarvadā rātrau gayāyāṃ śrāddhakṛdbhavet / vārāṇasyāṃ kṛtaṃ śrāddhaṃ tīrthe śoṇanade tathā //
analyzed: divā ca sarvadā rātrau gayāyām śrāddha kṛt bhavet vārāṇasyām kṛtam śrāddham tīrthe śoṇanade tathā

original: punaḥ punāmahānadyāṃ śrāddhī svargaṃ pitṝnnayet / uttaraṃ mānasaṃ gatvā siddhiṃ prāpnotyanuttamām //
analyzed: punar śrāddhī svargam pitṝn nayet  uttaram mānasam gatvā siddhim prāpnoti anuttamām

original: tasminnivartayecchrāddhaṃ snānaṃ caiva nivartayet / kāmānsa labhate divyānmokṣopāyaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ //
analyzed: tasmin nivartayet śrāddham snānam ca eva nivartayet  kāmān sa labhate divyān mokṣa upāyam ca sarvaśas

original: dakṣiṇaṃ mānasaṃ gatvā maunī piṇḍādi kārayet / ṛṇatrayāpākaraṇaṃ labheddakṣiṇamānase //
analyzed: dakṣiṇam mānasam gatvā maunī piṇḍa ādi kārayet ṛṇa traya apākaraṇam labhet dakṣiṇamānase

original: siddhānāṃ prītijananaiḥ pāpānāṃ ca bhayaṅkaraiḥ / lelihānairmahāghorairakṣataiḥ pannagottamaiḥ //
analyzed: siddhānām prīti jananaiḥ pāpānām ca bhayaṅkaraiḥ lelihānaiḥ mahā ghoraiḥ akṣataiḥ pannaga uttamaiḥ

original: nāmnā kanakhalaṃ tīrthaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam / udīcyāṃ muṇḍapṛṣṭhasya devarṣigaṇasevitam //
analyzed: nāmnā kanakhalam tīrtham triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam udīcyām muṇḍapṛṣṭhasya devarṣi gaṇa sevitam

original: tatra snātvā divaṃ yāti śrāddhaṃ dattamathākṣayam / sūryaṃ natvā tvidaṃ kuryātkṛtapiṇḍādisatkriyaḥ //
analyzed: tatra snātvā divam yāti śrāddham dattam atha akṣayam sūryam natvā tu idam kuryāt kṛta piṇḍa ādi satkriyaḥ

original: kavyavāhastathā somo yamaścaivāryamā tathā / agniṣvāttā barhiṣadaḥ somapāḥ pidṛdevatāḥ //
analyzed: kavyavāhaḥ tathā somaḥ yamaḥ ca eva aryamā tathā agniṣvāttāḥ barhiṣadaḥ somapāḥ pidṛ devatāḥ

original: āgacchantu mahābhāgā yuṣamābhī rakṣitāstviha / madīyāḥ pitaro ye ca kule jātāḥ sanābhayaḥ //
analyzed: āgacchantu mahābhāgāḥ yuṣamābhiḥ rakṣitāḥ tu iha madīyāḥ pitaraḥ ye ca kule jātāḥ sanābhayaḥ

original: teṣāṃ piṇḍapradānārthamāgato 'smi gayāmimām / kṛtapiṇḍaḥ phalgutīrthe paśyaiddevaṃ pitāmaham //
analyzed: teṣām piṇḍa pradāna artham āgataḥ smi gayām imām kṛta piṇḍaḥ phalgutīrthe paśyait devam pitāmaham

original: gadādharaṃ tataḥ paśyetpitṝṇāmanṛṇāmanṛṇo bhavet / phalgutīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā devaṃ gadādharam //
analyzed: gadādharam tatas paśyet pitṝṇām anṛṇām anṛṇaḥ bhavet phalgutīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā devam gadādharam

original: ātmānaṃ tārayetsadyo daśa pūrvāndaśāparān / prathamehnividhiḥ prokto dvitīyadivase vrajet //
analyzed: ātmānam tārayet sadyas daśa pūrvān daśa aparān prathamehni vidhiḥ proktaḥ dvitīya divase vrajet

original: dharmāraṇyaṃ mataṅgasya vāpyāṃ piṇḍādikṛdbhavet / dharmāraṇyaṃ samāsādya vājapeyaphalaṃ labhet //
analyzed: dharmāraṇyam mataṅgasya vāpyām piṇḍa ādi kṛt bhavet dharmāraṇyam samāsādya vājapeya phalam labhet

original: rājasūyāśvamedhābhyāṃ phalaṃ syādbrahmatīrthake / śrāddhaṃ piṇḍodakaṃ kāryaṃ madhye vai kūpayūpayoḥ //
analyzed: rājasūya aśvamedhābhyām phalam syāt brahmatīrthake  śrāddham piṇḍa udakam kāryam madhye vai kūpa yūpayoḥ

original: kūpodakena tatkāryaṃ pitṝṇāṃ dattamakṣayam / tṛtīye 'bahni brahmasado gatvā snātvātha tarpaṇam //
analyzed: kūpa udakena tat kāryam pitṝṇām dattam akṣayam tṛtīye bahni brahmasadaḥ gatvā snātvā atha tarpaṇam

original: kṛtvā śrāddhādikaṃ piṇḍaṃ madhye vai yūpakūpayoḥ / gopracārasamīpasthā ābrahma brahmakalpitāḥ //
analyzed: kṛtvā śrāddha ādikam piṇḍam madhye vai yūpa kūpayoḥ  go pracāra samīpa sthāḥ ābrahma brahma kalpitāḥ

original: teṣā sevanamātreṇa pitaro mokṣagāminaḥ / yūpaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vājapeyaphalaṃ labhet //
analyzed: teṣām sevana mātreṇa pitaraḥ mokṣa gāminaḥ yūpam pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vājapeya phalam labhet

original: phalgutīrthe caturthe 'hini snātvā devāditarpaṇam / kṛtvā śrāddhaṅgayāśīrṣe kuryādrudrapadādiṣu //
analyzed: phalgutīrthe caturthe hini snātvā deva ādi tarpaṇam kṛtvā śrāddham gayāśīrṣe kuryāt rudra pada ādiṣu

original: piṇāḍāndehimukhe vyāse pañcāgnau ca padatraye / sūryendukārtikeyeṣu kṛtaṃ śrāddhaṃ tathākṣayam //
analyzed: vyāse pañca agnau ca pada traye sūrya indu kārtikeyeṣu kṛtam śrāddham tathā akṣayam

original: śrāddhaṃ tu navadevatyaṃ kuryāddvādaśadaivatam / anvaṣṭakāsu vṛddhau ca gayāyāṃ mṛtavāsare //
analyzed: śrāddham tu nava devatyam kuryāt dvādaśa daivatam anvaṣṭakāsu vṛddhau ca gayāyām mṛta vāsare

original: atra mātuḥ pṛthak śrāddhamanyatra patinā saha / snātvā daśāśvamedhe tu dṛṣṭvā devaṃ pitāmaham //
analyzed: atra mātuḥ pṛthak śrāddham anyatra patinā saha snātvā daśāśvamedhe tu dṛṣṭvā devam pitāmaham

original: rudrapādaṃ naraḥ spṛṣṭvā na cehāvartate punaḥ / trirvittapūrṇāṃ pṛthivīṃ dattvā yatphalamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: rudrapādam naraḥ spṛṣṭvā na ca iha āvartate punar tris vitta pūrṇām pṛthivīm dattvā yat phalam āpnuyāt

original: sa tatphalamavāpnoti kṛtvā śrāddhaṃ gayāśire / śamīpatrapramāṇena piṇḍaṃ dadyādgayāśire //
analyzed: sa tat phalam avāpnoti kṛtvā śrāddham gayāśire  śamī patra pramāṇena piṇḍam dadyāt gayāśire

original: pitaro yānti devatvaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / muṇḍapṛṣṭe padaṃ nyastaṃ mahādevena dhīmatā //
analyzed: pitaraḥ yānti deva tvam na atra kāryā vicāraṇā muṇḍapṛṣṭe padam nyastam mahādevena dhīmatā

original: alpena tapasā tatra mahāpuṇyamavāpnuyāt / gayāśīrṣe tu yaḥ piṇḍānnāmnā yeṣāṃ tu nirvapet //
analyzed: alpena tapasā tatra mahā puṇyam avāpnuyāt gayāśīrṣe tu yaḥ piṇḍān nāmnā yeṣām tu nirvapet

original: narakasthā divaṃ yānti svargasthā mokṣamāpnuyuḥ / pañcame 'hni gandālole snātvā vaṭatale tataḥ //
analyzed: naraka sthāḥ divam yānti svarga sthāḥ mokṣam āpnuyuḥ pañcame hni gandālole snātvā vaṭa tale tatas

original: piṇḍāndadyātpitṝṇāṃ ca sakalaṃ tārayetkulam / vaṭamūlaṃ samāsādya śākenoṣṇodakena vā //
analyzed: piṇḍān dadyāt pitṝṇām ca sakalam tārayet kulam  vaṭa mūlam samāsādya śākena uṣṇa udakena vā

original: ekasmin bhojite vipra koṭirbhavati bhojitāḥ / kṛte śrāddhe 'kṣayavaṭe dṛṣṭvā ca prapitāmaham //
analyzed: ekasmin bhojite vipra koṭiḥ bhavati bhojitāḥ kṛte śrāddhe kṣayavaṭe dṛṣṭvā ca prapitāmaham

original: akṣayāllaṃbhate lokānkulānāmuddharecchatam / eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ puttrā yadyeko 'pi gayāṃ vrajet //
analyzed: akṣayān laṃbhate lokān kulānām uddharet śatam  eṣṭavyāḥ bahavaḥ puttrāḥ yadi ekaḥ gayām vrajet

original: yajeta vāśvamedhena nīlaṃ vā vṛṣamutsṛjet / pretaḥ kaścitsamuddiśya vaṇijaṃ kañcidabravīt //
analyzed: yajeta vā aśvamedhena nīlam vā vṛṣam utsṛjet pretaḥ kaścid samuddiśya vaṇijam kañcid abravīt

original: mama nāmnā gayāśīrṣe piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ kuru / pretabhāvādvimuktaḥ syāṃsvargado dātureva ca //
analyzed: mama nāmnā gayāśīrṣe piṇḍa nirvapaṇam kuru preta bhāvāt vimuktaḥ syām svarga daḥ dātuḥ eva ca

original: śrutvā vaṇiggayāśīrṣa pretarājāya piṇḍakam / pradadāvanujaiḥ sārdhaṃ svapitṛbhyastato dadau //
analyzed: śrutvā vaṇij gayāśīrṣa pretarājāya piṇḍakam pradadau anujaiḥ sārdham sva pitṛbhyaḥ tatas dadau

original: sarve muktā viśālo 'pi saputro 'bhucca piṇḍadaḥ / viśālāyāṃ viśālo 'bhūdrājaputrobravīddvijān //
analyzed: sarve muktāḥ sa putraḥ piṇḍa daḥ  viśālāyām viśālaḥ bhūt rāja putraḥ bravīt dvijān

original: kathaṃ putrādayaḥ syurme viprāścoturviśālakam / gayāyāṃ piṇḍadānena tava sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: katham putra ādayaḥ syuḥ me viprāḥ ca ūtuḥ viśālakam gayāyām piṇḍa dānena tava sarvam bhaviṣyati

original: viśālo 'tha gayāśīrṣa piṇḍado 'bhūcca putravān / dṛṣṭvākāśe sitaṃ raktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ puruṣamabravīt //
analyzed: gayāśīrṣa piṇḍa daḥ bhūt ca putravān  dṛṣṭvā ākāśe sitam raktam kṛṣṇam puruṣam abravīt

original: ke yūyaṃ teṣu caivaikaḥ sitaḥ proce viśālakam / ahaṃ sitaste janaka indralokaṃ gataḥ śabham //
analyzed: ke yūyam teṣu ca eva ekaḥ sitaḥ proce viśālakam aham sitaḥ te janakaḥ indra lokam gataḥ śabham

original: mama putra pitā rakto brahmahā pāpakṛtparam / ayaṃ pitāmahaḥ kṛṣṇa ṛṣayo 'nena ghātitāḥ //
analyzed: mama putra pitā raktaḥ brahma hā pāpa kṛt param ayam pitāmahaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ ṛṣayaḥ nena ghātitāḥ

original: avīciṃ narakaṃ prāptau muktau jātau ca piṇḍada / muktīkṛtāstataḥ sarve vrajāmaḥ svargamuttamam //
analyzed: avīcim narakam prāptau muktau jātau ca piṇḍada muktīkṛtāḥ tatas sarve vrajāmaḥ svargam uttamam

original: kṛtakṛtyo viśālo 'pi rājyaṃ kṛtvā divaṃ yayau / ye 'smatkule tu pitaro luptapiṇḍodakakriyāḥ //
analyzed: kṛtakṛtyaḥ viśālaḥ pi rājyam kṛtvā divam yayau ye smad kule tu pitaraḥ lupta piṇḍa udakakriyāḥ

original: ye cāpyakṛtacūḍāstu ye ca garbhādviniḥsṛtāḥ / yeṣāṃ dāho na kriyāca ye 'gnidagdhāstathāpare //
analyzed: ye ca api akṛta cūḍāḥ tu ye ca garbhāt viniḥsṛtāḥ yeṣām dāhaḥ na kriyā ca ye gni dagdhāḥ tathā apare

original: bhūmau dattena tṛpyantu tṛptā yāntu parāṃ gatim / pitā pitāmahaścaiva tathaiva prapitāmahaḥ //
analyzed: bhūmau dattena tṛpyantu tṛptāḥ yāntu parām gatim pitā pitāmahaḥ ca eva tathā eva prapitāmahaḥ

original: mātā pitāmahī caiva tathaiva prapitāmahī / tathā mātāmahaścaiva pramātāmaha eva ca //
analyzed: mātā pitāmahī ca eva tathā eva prapitāmahī tathā mātāmahaḥ ca eva pramātāmahaḥ eva ca

original: vṛddhapramātāmahaśca tathā mātāmahī param / pramātāmahī tathā vṛddhapramātāmahīti vai //
analyzed: vṛddhapramātāmahaḥ ca tathā mātāmahī param pramātāmahī tathā vṛddhapramātāmahī iti vai

original: anyeṣāṃ caiva piṇḍo 'yamakṣayyamupatiṣṭhatām //
analyzed: anyeṣām ca eva piṇḍaḥ yama kṣayyam upatiṣṭhatām

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma caturaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyam nāma caturaśītitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 85
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / snātvā pretaśilādau tu varuṇāsthāmṛtena ca / piṇḍaṃ dadyādimairmantrairāvāhya ca pitṝnparān //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca snātvā pretaśilā ādau tu varuṇa āstha amṛtena ca  piṇḍam dadyāt imaiḥ mantraiḥ āvāhya ca pitṝn parān

original: asmatkule mṛtā ye ca gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate / āvāhayiṣyetānsarvān darbhapṛṣṭhe tilodakaiḥ //
analyzed: asmad kule mṛtāḥ ye ca gatiḥ yeṣām na vidyate  āvāhayiṣyetān sarvān darbha pṛṣṭhe tila udakaiḥ

original: pitavaṃśe mṛtā ye ca mātṛvaṃśe ca ye mṛtāḥ / taṣāmuddharaṇārthāye imaṃ piṇḍe dadāmyaham //
analyzed: pita vaṃśe mṛtāḥ ye ca mātṛ vaṃśe ca ye mṛtāḥ imam piṇḍe dadāmi aham

original: mātāmahakule ye ca gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate / teṣāmuddharaṇārthāya imaṃ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham //
analyzed: mātāmaha kule ye ca gatiḥ yeṣām na vidyate teṣām uddharaṇa arthāya imam piṇḍam dadāmi aham

original: ajātadantā ye kecidye ca garbhe prapīḍitāḥ / teṣāmuddharaṇārthāya ima piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham //
analyzed: ajāta dantāḥ ye kecid ye ca garbhe prapīḍitāḥ teṣām uddharaṇa arthāya piṇḍam dadāmi aham

original: bandhuvargāśca ye kecinnāmagotravivarjitāḥ / svagotre paragotre vā gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate / teṣāmuddharaṇārthāya ima piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham //
analyzed: bandhu vargāḥ ca ye kecid nāma gotra vivarjitāḥ sva gotre para gotre vā gatiḥ yeṣām na vidyate teṣām uddharaṇa arthāya piṇḍam dadāmi aham

original: udbandhanamṛtā ye ca viṣaśastrahatāśca ye / ātmopaghātino ye ca tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham //
analyzed: udbandhana mṛtāḥ ye ca viṣa śastra hatāḥ ca ye ātma upaghātinaḥ ye ca tebhyaḥ piṇḍam dadāmi aham

original: agnidāhe mṛtā ye ca siṃhavyāghrahatāścaye / daṃṣṭribhiḥ śṛṅgibhirvāpi teṣāṃ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham //
analyzed: agni dāhe mṛtāḥ ye ca siṃha vyāghra hatāḥ caye daṃṣṭribhiḥ śṛṅgibhiḥ vā api teṣām piṇḍam dadāmi aham

original: agnidagdhāśca ye kecinnāgnidagdhāstathāpare / vidyuccaurahatā ye ca tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham //
analyzed: agni dagdhāḥ ca ye kecid na agni dagdhāḥ tathā apare vidyut caura hatāḥ ye ca tebhyaḥ piṇḍam dadāmi aham

original: raurave cāndhatāmistre kālasūtre ca ye gatāḥ / teṣāmuddharaṇārthāya imaṃ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham //
analyzed: raurave ca andhatāmistre kālasūtre ca ye gatāḥ teṣām uddharaṇa arthāya imam piṇḍam dadāmi aham

original: asipatravane ghore kaṃbhīpāke ca ye gatāḥ / teṣāmuddharaṇārthāya iṃ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham //
analyzed: asipatravane ghore kaṃbhīpāke ca ye gatāḥ teṣām uddharaṇa arthāya iṃ piṇḍam dadāmi aham

original: anyeṣāṃ yātanā sthānāṃ pretalokanivāsinām / teṣāmuddharaṇārthāya ima piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham //
analyzed: anyeṣām preta loka nivāsinām teṣām uddharaṇa arthāya piṇḍam dadāmi aham

original: puśuyoniṃ gatā ye ca pakṣikīṭasarīsṛpāḥ / athavā vṛkṣayoni sthāstebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham //
analyzed: puśu yonim gatāḥ ye ca pakṣi kīṭa sarīsṛpāḥ athavā vṛkṣa yoni sthāḥ tebhyaḥ piṇḍam dadāmi aham

original: asaṃkhyayātanāsaṃsthā ye nītā yamaśāsanaiḥ / teṣāmuddharaṇārthāya imaṃ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham //
analyzed: asaṃkhya yātanā saṃsthāḥ ye nītāḥ yama śāsanaiḥ teṣām uddharaṇa arthāya imam piṇḍam dadāmi aham

original: jātyantarasahasreṣu bhramanti svena karmaṇā / mānuṣyaṃ durlabhaṃ yeṣāṃ tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham //
analyzed: jāti antara sahasreṣu bhramanti svena karmaṇā mānuṣyam durlabham yeṣām tebhyaḥ piṇḍam dadāmi aham

original: ye bāndhavābāndhavā vā ye 'nyajanmani bāndhavāḥ / te sarvetṛptimāyāntu piṇḍadānena sarvadā //
analyzed: ye bāndhava abāndhavāḥ vā ye nya janmani bāndhavāḥ te sarve tṛptim āyāntu piṇḍa dānena sarvadā

original: ye kecitpretarūpeṇa vartante pitaro mama / te sarve tṛptimāyāntu piṇḍadānena sarvadā //
analyzed: ye kecid preta rūpeṇa vartante pitaraḥ mama te sarve tṛptim āyāntu piṇḍa dānena sarvadā

original: ye me pitṛkule jātāḥ kule mātustathaiva ca / guruśvaśurabandhūnāṃ ye cānye bāndhavā mṛtāḥ //
analyzed: ye me pitṛ kule jātāḥ kule mātuḥ tathā eva ca guru śvaśura bandhūnām ye ca anye bāndhavāḥ mṛtāḥ

original: ye me kule luptapiṇḍāḥ puttradāravivarjitāḥ / kriyālo pahatā ye ca jātyandhāḥ paṅgavastathā //
analyzed: ye me kule lupta piṇḍāḥ puttra dāra vivarjitāḥ  upahatāḥ ye ca jāti andhāḥ paṅgavaḥ tathā

original: virūpā āmagarbhāśca jñātājñātāḥ kule mama / teṣāṃ piṇḍaṃ mayā dattamakṣayyamupatiṣṭhatām //
analyzed: virūpāḥ āmagarbhāḥ ca jñāta ajñātāḥ kule mama teṣām piṇḍam mayā dattam akṣayyam upatiṣṭhatām

original: sākṣiṇaḥ santu me devā brahmeśānādayastathā / maya gayāṃ samāsādya pitṝṇāṃ niṣkatiḥ kṛtā //
analyzed: sākṣiṇaḥ santu me devāḥ brahma īśāna ādayaḥ tathā gayām samāsādya pitṝṇām niṣkatiḥ kṛtā

original: āgato 'haṃ gayāṃ deva / pitṛkārye gadādhara / tanme sākṣī bhavatvadya anṛṇo 'hamṛṇatrayāt //
analyzed: āgataḥ ham gayām deva pitṛkārye gadādhara tat me sākṣī bhavatu adya anṛṇaḥ ham ṛṇa trayāt

original: mahānadī brahmasaro 'kṣayo vaṭaḥ prabhāsamudyantamaho? gayāśiraḥ / sarasvatīdharmakadhenupṛṣṭhā ete kurukṣetragatā gayāyām //
analyzed: mahānadī brahmasaraḥ kṣayaḥ vaṭaḥ prabhāsam udyanta mahaḥ gayāśiraḥ sarasvatī dharmaka dhenu pṛṣṭhāḥ ete kurukṣetra gatāḥ gayāyām

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma pañcāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyam nāma pañcāśītitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 86
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / yeyaṃ pretaśilā khyātā gayāyāṃ sā tridhā sthitā / prabhāse pretakuṇḍe ca gayāsuraśirasyapi //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca yā iyam pretaśilā khyātā gayāyām sā tridhā sthitā prabhāse pretakuṇḍe ca gayāsuraśirasi api

original: dharmeṇa dhāritā bhūtyai sarvadevamayī śilā / pretatvaṃ ye gatā nṝṇāṃ mitrādyā bāndhavādayaḥ //
analyzed: dharmeṇa dhāritā bhūtyai sarva deva mayī śilā preta tvam ye gatāḥ nṝṇām mitra ādyāḥ bāndhava ādayaḥ

original: teṣāmuddharaṇārthāya yataḥ pretaśilā śubhā / ato 'tra munayo bhūpā rājapatnyādayaḥ sadā //
analyzed: teṣām uddharaṇa arthāya yatas pretaśilā śubhā munayaḥ bhūpāḥ rāja patnī ādayaḥ sadā

original: tasyāṃ śilāyāṃ śrāddhādikartāro brahmalokagāḥ / gayāsurasya yanmuṇḍaṃ tasya pṛṣṭhe śilā yataḥ //
analyzed: tasyām śilāyām śrāddha ādi kartāraḥ brahma loka gāḥ gaya asurasya yat muṇḍam tasya pṛṣṭhe śilā yatas

original: muṇāḍapṛṣṭho giristasmātsarvadevamayo hyayam / muṇḍapṛṣṭhasya pādeṣu yato brahmasaromukhāḥ //
analyzed: muṇāḍapṛṣṭhaḥ giriḥ tasmāt sarva deva mayaḥ hi ayam muṇḍapṛṣṭhasya pādeṣu yatas brahmasaraḥ mukhāḥ

original: aravindavanaṃ teṣu tena caivopalakṣitaḥ / aravindo girirnāma krauñcapādāṅkito yataḥ //
analyzed: aravinda vanam teṣu tena ca eva upalakṣitaḥ aravindaḥ giriḥ nāma krauñca pāda aṅkitaḥ yatas

original: tasmā dgiriḥ kraiñcapādaḥ pitṝṇāṃ brahmalokadaḥ / gadādharādayo devā ādyā ādau vyavasthitāḥ //
analyzed: tasmai dgiriḥ kraiñcapādaḥ pitṝṇām brahma loka daḥ gadādhara ādayaḥ devāḥ ādyāḥ ādau vyavasthitāḥ

original: śilārūpeṇa cāvyaktāstasmāddevamayī śilā / gayā śiraśchādayitvā gurutvādāsthitā śilā //
analyzed: śilā rūpeṇa ca avyaktāḥ tasmāt deva mayī śilā gayā śiraḥ chādayitvā guru tvāt āsthitā śilā

original: kālāntareṇa vyaktaścasthita ādigadādharaḥ / mahārudrādidevaistu ānādinidhano hariḥ //
analyzed: kāla antareṇa vyaktaḥ ca sthitaḥ ādigadādharaḥ mahārudra ādi devaiḥ tu ān ādi nidhanaḥ hariḥ

original: dharma saṃrakṣaṇārthāya adharmādivinaṣṭaye / daityarākṣasanāśārthaṃ matsyaḥ pūrvaṃ yathābhavat //
analyzed: dharma saṃrakṣaṇa arthāya adharma ādi vinaṣṭaye daitya rākṣasa nāśa artham matsyaḥ pūrvam yathā bhavat

original: kūrmo varāho nṛharirvāmano rāma ūrjitaḥ / yathā dāśarathī rāmaḥ kṛṣṇobuddho 'tha kalkyapi //
analyzed: kūrmaḥ varāhaḥ nṛhariḥ vāmanaḥ rāmaḥ ūrjitaḥ yathā dāśarathiḥ rāmaḥ kalkī api

original: tathā vyakto 'vyaktarūpī āsīdādirgadādharaḥ / ādirādau pūjito 'tra devairbrahmādibhiryataḥ //
analyzed: tathā vyaktaḥ vyakta rūpī āsīt ādiḥ gadādharaḥ ādiḥ ādau devaiḥ brahma ādibhiḥ yatas

original: pādyādyairgandhapuṣpādyairata ādigadādharaḥ / gadādharaṃ suraiḥ sārdhamādyaṃ gatvā dadāti yaḥ //
analyzed: pādya ādyaiḥ gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ atas ādigadādharaḥ gadādharam suraiḥ sārdham ādyam gatvā dadāti yaḥ

original: arghyaṃ pātraṃ ca pādyaṃ ca gandhapuṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam / dīpaṃ naivaidyamutkaṣṭaṃ mālyāni vividhāni ca //
analyzed: arghyam pātram ca pādyam ca gandha puṣpam ca dhūpakam dīpam naivaidyam utkaṣṭam mālyāni vividhāni ca

original: vastrāṇi mukuṭaṃ ghaṇṭā cāmaraṃ prekṣaṇīyakam / alaṅkārādikaṃ piṇḍamannadānādikaṃ tathā //
analyzed: vastrāṇi mukuṭam ghaṇṭā cāmaram prekṣaṇīyakam alaṅkāra ādikam piṇḍam anna dāna ādikam tathā

original: teṣāṃ tāvaddhanaṃ dhānyamāyurāro gyasampadaḥ / puttrādisantatiśreyovidyārthaṃ kāma īpsitaḥ //
analyzed: teṣām tāvat dhanam dhānyam āyuḥ āraḥ gya sampadaḥ puttra ādi santati śreyaḥ vidyā artham kāmaḥ īpsitaḥ

original: bhāryā svargādivāsaśca svargādāgatya rājyakam / kulīnaḥ sattvasampanno raṇe marditaśātravanaḥ //
analyzed: bhāryā svarga ādi vāsaḥ ca svargāt āgatya rājyakam kulīnaḥ sattva sampannaḥ raṇe

original: vadhabandhavinirmuktaścānte mokṣamavāpnuyāt / śrāddhapiṇḍādikartāraḥ pitṛbhirbrahmalokagāḥ //
analyzed: vadha bandha vinirmuktaḥ ca ante mokṣam avāpnuyāt  śrāddha piṇḍa ādi kartāraḥ pitṛbhiḥ brahma loka gāḥ

original: jagannāthaṃ ye 'pcayanti subhadrāṃ balabhadrakam / jñānaṃ prāpya śriyaṃ putrānvrajanti puruṣottamam //
analyzed: jagannātham ye subhadrām balabhadrakam  jñānam prāpya śriyam putrān vrajanti puruṣottamam

original: puruṣottamarājasya sūryasya ca gaṇasya ca / puratastatra piṇḍādi pitṝṇāṃ brihmalokadaḥ //
analyzed: puruṣottama rājasya sūryasya ca gaṇasya ca puratas tatra piṇḍa ādi pitṝṇām

original: natvā kapardivighneśaṃ sarvavighnaiḥ pramucyate / kārtikeyaṃ pūjayitvā brahmalokamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: natvā kapardi vighneśam sarva vighnaiḥ pramucyate kārtikeyam pūjayitvā brahma lokam avāpnuyāt

original: dvādaśādityamabhyarcya sarvarogaiḥ pramucyate / vaiśvānaraṃ samabhyarcya uttamāṃ dīptimāpnuyāt //
analyzed: dvādaśādityam abhyarcya sarva rogaiḥ pramucyate vaiśvānaram samabhyarcya uttamām dīptim āpnuyāt

original: revantaṃ pūjayitvātha aśvānāpnotyanuttamān / abhyarcyendraṃ mahaiśvaryaṃ gaurīṃ saubhāgyamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: revantam pūjayitvā atha aśvān āpnoti anuttamān abhyarcya indram mahā aiśvaryam gaurīm saubhāgyam āpnuyāt

original: vidyāṃ sarasvatīṃ prārcya lakṣmīṃ saṃpūjya ca śriyam / garuḍaṃ ca samabhyarcya vighnavṛndātpramucyate //
analyzed: vidyām sarasvatīm prārcya lakṣmīm saṃpūjya ca śriyam garuḍam ca samabhyarcya vighna vṛndāt pramucyate

original: kṣetrapālaṃ samabhyarcya grahavṛndaiḥ pramucyate / muṇḍapṛṣṭhaṃ samabhyarcya sarvakāmamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: kṣetrapālam samabhyarcya graha vṛndaiḥ pramucyate muṇḍapṛṣṭham samabhyarcya sarva kāmam avāpnuyāt

original: nāgāṣṭakaṃ samabhyarcya nāgadaṣṭo vimucyate / brahmāṇaṃ pūjayitvā ca brahmalokamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: nāga aṣṭakam samabhyarcya nāga daṣṭaḥ vimucyate  brahmāṇam pūjayitvā ca brahma lokam avāpnuyāt

original: balabhadraṃ samabhyarcya balārogyamavāpnuyāt / subhadrāṃ pūjayitvā tu saubhāgyaṃ paramāpnuyāt //
analyzed: balabhadram samabhyarcya bala ārogyam avāpnuyāt subhadrām pūjayitvā tu saubhāgyam param āpnuyāt

original: sarvānkāmānavāpnoti saṃpūjya puruṣottamam / nārāyaṇaṃ tu saṃpūjya narāṇāmadhipo bhavet //
analyzed: sarvān kāmān avāpnoti saṃpūjya puruṣottamam  nārāyaṇam tu saṃpūjya narāṇām adhipaḥ bhavet

original: spṛṣṭvā natvā nārasiṃhaṃ saṃgrāme vijayī bhavet / varāhaṃ pūjayitvā tu bhūmirājyamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: spṛṣṭvā natvā nārasiṃham saṃgrāme vijayī bhavet varāham pūjayitvā tu bhūmi rājyam avāpnuyāt

original: mālāvidyādharau spaṣṭvā vidyādharapadaṃ labhet / sarvānkāmānavāpnoti saṃpūjyādigadādharam //
analyzed: mālā vidyādharau vidyādhara padam labhet  sarvān kāmān avāpnoti saṃpūjya ādigadādharam

original: somanāthaṃ samabhyarcya śivalokamavāpnuyāt / rudreśvaraṃ namaskṛtya rudraloke mahīyate //
analyzed: somanātham samabhyarcya śiva lokam avāpnuyāt rudra īśvaram namaskṛtya rudra loke mahīyate

original: rāmeśvaraṃ naro natvā rāmavatsupriyo bhavet / brahmeśvaraṃ naraḥ stutvā brahmalokāya kalpyate //
analyzed: rāmeśvaram naraḥ natvā rāma vat su priyaḥ bhavet brahmeśvaram naraḥ stutvā brahma lokāya kalpyate

original: kāleśvaraṃ samabhyarcya naraḥ kālañjayo bhavet / kedāraṃ pūjayitvā tu śivaloke mahīyate //
analyzed: kāleśvaram samabhyarcya naraḥ kālañjayaḥ bhavet kedāram pūjayitvā tu śiva loke mahīyate

original: siddheśvaraṃ ca saṃpūjya siddho brahmapuraṃ vrajet / ādyai rudrādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ dṛṣṭvā hyādigadādharam //
analyzed: siddheśvaram ca saṃpūjya siddhaḥ brahma puram vrajet  ādyaiḥ rudra ādibhiḥ sārdham dṛṣṭvā hi ādigadādharam

original: kulānāṃ śatamuddhṛtya nayedbrahmapuraṃ naraḥ / dharmārtho prāpnuyāddharmamarthārtho cārthamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: kulānām śatam uddhṛtya nayet brahma puram naraḥ

original: kāmānsaṃprāpnuyātkāmī mokṣārtho mokṣamāpnuyāt / rājyārtho rājyamāpnoti śāntyartho śāntimāpnuyāt //
analyzed: kāmān saṃprāpnuyāt kāmī mokṣa arthaḥ mokṣam āpnuyāt rājya arthaḥ rājyam āpnoti śānti arthaḥ śāntim āpnuyāt

original: sarvārtho sarvamāpnoti saṃpūjyādigadādharam / putrānputrārthinī strī ca saubhāgyaṃ ca tadarthinī //
analyzed: sarvam āpnoti saṃpūjya ādigadādharam  putrān putra arthinī strī ca saubhāgyam ca tad arthinī

original: vaṃśārthinī ca vaṃśānvai prāpyārcyādigadādharam / śrāddhena piṇḍadānena annadānena vāridaḥ //
analyzed: vaṃśa arthinī ca vaṃśān vai prāpya arcya ādigadādharam  śrāddhena piṇḍa dānena anna dānena vāri daḥ

original: brahmalokamavāpnoti saṃpūjyādigadādharam / pṛthivyāṃ sarvatīrthebhyo yathā śreṣṭhā gayā purī //
analyzed: brahma lokam avāpnoti saṃpūjya ādigadādharam  pṛthivyām sarva tīrthebhyaḥ yathā śreṣṭhā gayā purī

original: tathā śilādirūpaśca śreṣṭhaścaiva gadādharaḥ / tasmindṛṣṭe śilā dṛṣṭā yataḥ sarvaṃ gadādharaḥ //
analyzed: tathā śilā ādi rūpaḥ ca śreṣṭhaḥ ca eva gadādharaḥ tasmin dṛṣṭe śilā dṛṣṭā yatas sarvam gadādharaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma ṣaḍaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyam nāma ṣaḍaśītitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: (iti gayāmāhātmyaṃ samāptam) / śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 87
analyzed: iti gayāmāhātmyam samāptam śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / caturdaśa manūnvakṣye tatsutāśca sukādikān / manuḥ svāyambhuvaḥ pūrvamagnighrādyāśca tatsutāḥ //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca caturdaśa manūn vakṣye tad sutāḥ ca manuḥ svāyambhuvaḥ pūrvam agni ghrā ādyāḥ ca tad sutāḥ

original: marīciratryaṅgirasau pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ / vasiṣṭhaśca mahātejā ṛṣayaḥ saptakīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: marīciḥ atri aṅgirasau pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ ca mahā tejāḥ ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ

original: jayākhyāśācamitākhyāśca śukrā yāmāstathaiva ca / gaṇā dvādaśakāścaiti catvāraḥ somapāyinaḥ //
analyzed: śukrāḥ yāmāḥ tathā eva ca gaṇāḥ dvādaśakāḥ ca eti catvāraḥ soma pāyinaḥ

original: viśvabhugvāmadevendro bāṣkalistadarirhyabhūt / sa hato viṣṇunā daityaścakreṇa sumahātmanā //
analyzed: viśvabhuj vāmadeva indraḥ bāṣkaliḥ tad ariḥ hi abhūt sa hataḥ viṣṇunā daityaḥ cakreṇa su mahātmanā

original: manuḥ svārociṣaścātha tatputro maṇḍaleśvaraḥ / citrako vinataścaiva karṇānto vidyuto raviḥ //
analyzed: manuḥ svārociṣaḥ ca atha tad putraḥ maṇḍala īśvaraḥ citrakaḥ vinataḥ ca eva karṇāntaḥ vidyutaḥ raviḥ

original: bṛhadguṇo nabhaścaiva mahābalaparākramaḥ / ūrja stambastathā prāṇa ṛṣabho niścala (ra) stathā //
analyzed: bṛhadguṇaḥ nabhaḥ ca eva mahā bala parākramaḥ

original: datto (mbho) liścāvarīvāṃśca ṛṣyaḥ saptakīrtitāḥ / tuṣitā dvādaśa proktāstathā pārāvatāśca ye //
analyzed: dattaḥ ṛṣyaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ tuṣitāḥ dvādaśa proktāḥ tathā pārāvatāḥ ca ye

original: indro vipaściddevānāṃ tadripuḥ purukṛtsaraḥ / jaghāna hastirūpeṇa bhagavānmadhusūdanaḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ vipaścit devānām tad ripuḥ purukṛtsaraḥ jaghāna hasti rūpeṇa bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ

original: auttamasya manoḥ putrā ājaśca paraśustathā / vinītaśca suketuśca sumitraḥ subalaḥ śuciḥ //
analyzed: auttamasya manoḥ putrāḥ ājaḥ ca paraśuḥ tathā vinītaḥ ca suketuḥ ca sumitraḥ subalaḥ śuciḥ

original: devo devāvṛdho rudra / mahotsāhojitastathā / rathaujā ūrdhvabāhuśca śaraṇaścānagho muniḥ //
analyzed: devaḥ devāvṛdhaḥ rudra mahotsāhaḥ ujitaḥ tathā rathaujāḥ ūrdhvabāhuḥ ca śaraṇaḥ ca anaghaḥ muniḥ

original: sutapāḥ śaṅkurityete ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ / vaśavartisvadhāmānaḥ śivāḥ satyāḥ pratardanāḥ //
analyzed: sutapāḥ śaṅkuḥ iti ete ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ vaśavarti svadhāmānaḥ śivāḥ satyāḥ pratardanāḥ

original: pañca devagaṇāḥ proktā sarve dvādaśakāstu te / indraḥ svaśāntistacchukraḥ pralambo nāma dānavaḥ //
analyzed: pañca deva gaṇāḥ proktā sarve dvādaśakāḥ tu te indraḥ sva śāntiḥ tad śukraḥ pralambaḥ nāma dānavaḥ

original: matsyarūpī harirviṣṇustaṃ jaghāna ca dānavam / tāmasasya manoḥ putrā jānujaṅgho 'tha nirbhayaḥ //
analyzed: matsya rūpī hariḥ viṣṇuḥ tam jaghāna ca dānavam tāmasasya manoḥ putrāḥ nirbhayaḥ

original: navakhyātirnayaścaiva priyabhṛtyo vivikṣipaḥ / dṛḍheṣudhiḥ prastalākṣaḥ kṛbandhuḥ kṛtastathā //
analyzed: navakhyātiḥ nayaḥ ca eva priyabhṛtyaḥ vivikṣipaḥ dṛḍheṣudhiḥ kṛbandhuḥ kṛtaḥ tathā

original: jyotirdhāmā pṛthuḥ (dhṛṣṭa)
analyzed: jyotirdhāmā pṛthuḥ dhṛṣṭa

original: kāvyaścaitraścetāgnihemakāḥ (kau) / munayaḥ kīrtitāḥ sapta surāgāḥ sudhiyastathā //
analyzed: kāvyaḥ caitraḥ cetā agnihemakāḥ kau munayaḥ kīrtitāḥ sapta su rāgāḥ sudhiyaḥ tathā

original: harayo devatāmāṃ ca catvāraḥ pañca (sapta) viṃśakāḥ / gaṇā indraḥ śivistasya śatrurbhomarathāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: harayaḥ ca catvāraḥ pañca sapta viṃśakāḥ gaṇāḥ indraḥ śiviḥ tasya śatruḥ bhomarathāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: hariṇā kūrmarūpeṇa hato bhīmaratho 'suraḥ / raivatasya manoḥ putro mahā prāṇaśca sādhakaḥ //
analyzed: hariṇā kūrma rūpeṇa hataḥ suraḥ raivatasya manoḥ putraḥ mahā prāṇaḥ ca sādhakaḥ

original: vana (la) bandhurniramitraḥ pratyaṅgaḥ parahā śuciḥ / dṛḍhavrataḥ ketuśṛgaṃ ṛṣayastasya varṇyate //
analyzed: bandhuḥ niramitraḥ pratyaṅgaḥ para hā śuciḥ dṛḍha vrataḥ ṛṣayaḥ tasya varṇyate

original: vedaśrīrvedabāhuśca ūrdhvabāhustathaiva ca / hiraṇyaromā parjanyaḥ satyanetraḥ (nāmā)
analyzed: vedaśrīḥ vedabāhuḥ ca ūrdhvabāhuḥ tathā eva ca hiraṇyaromā parjanyaḥ satyanetraḥ nāmā

original: svadhāma ca //
analyzed: svadhāma ca

original: abhūtarajasaścaiva tathā devāśvamedhasaḥ / vaikuṇṭha (ṇṭhāḥ ścāmṛta (tā)
analyzed: abhūtarajasaḥ ca eva tathā devāśvamedhasaḥ vaikuṇṭha ṇṭhāḥ śca amṛta tā

original: ścaiva catvāro devatāgaṇāḥ //
analyzed: ca eva catvāraḥ devatā gaṇāḥ

original: gaṇe caturdaśa surā vibhuridraḥ pratāpavān / śāntaḥ śatrurhato daityo haṃsarūpeṇa viṣṇunā //
analyzed: gaṇe caturdaśa surāḥ vibhuḥ idraḥ pratāpavān śāntaḥ śatruḥ hataḥ daityaḥ haṃsa rūpeṇa viṣṇunā

original: cākṣuṣasya manoḥ putrā uruḥ pururmahābalaḥ / śatadyumnastapasvī ca satyabāhuḥ(kyo)
analyzed: cākṣuṣasya manoḥ putrāḥ uruḥ puruḥ mahā balaḥ śatadyumnaḥ tapasvī ca

original: kṛtistathā //
analyzed: kṛtiḥ tathā

original: agniṣṇuratirātraśca sudyumnaśca tathā naraḥ / haviṣmānuttamaḥ śrīmānsva (su)
analyzed: agniṣṇuḥ atirātraḥ ca sudyumnaḥ ca tathā naraḥ haviṣmān uttamaḥ

original: dhāmā virajastathā //
analyzed: dhāmā virajaḥ tathā

original: abhimānaḥ sahiṣṇuśca madhuśrīrṛṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ / āryāḥ prabhūtā bhāvyāśca lekhāśca pṛthukāstathā //
analyzed: abhimānaḥ sahiṣṇuḥ ca madhuśrīḥ ṛṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ āryāḥ prabhūtāḥ bhāvyāḥ ca lekhāḥ ca pṛthukāḥ tathā

original: aṣṭakasya gaṇāḥ pañca tathā proktā divaukasām / indro manojavaḥ śatrurmahākālo mahābhajaḥ //
analyzed: aṣṭakasya gaṇāḥ pañca tathā proktāḥ divaukasām indraḥ manojavaḥ śatruḥ mahākālaḥ

original: aśvarūpeṇa sa hato hariṇā lokadhāriṇā / manorvaivasvatasyete putrā viṣṇuparāyaṇāḥ //
analyzed: aśva rūpeṇa sa hataḥ hariṇā loka dhāriṇā manoḥ vaivasvatasya ete putrāḥ viṣṇu parāyaṇāḥ

original: ikṣvākuratha nābhāgo dhṛṣṭaḥ śaryātireva ca / nariṣyantastathā pāṃsurnabho nediṣṭha eva ca //
analyzed: ikṣvākuḥ atha nābhāgaḥ dhṛṣṭaḥ śaryātiḥ eva ca nariṣyantaḥ tathā pāṃsuḥ nabhaḥ nediṣṭhaḥ eva ca

original: karūṣaśca pṛṣadhraśca sudyumnaśca manoḥ sutāḥ / atrirvasiṣṭho bhagavāñjamadagniśca kaśyapaḥ //
analyzed: karūṣaḥ ca pṛṣadhraḥ ca sudyumnaḥ ca manoḥ sutāḥ atriḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān jamadagniḥ ca kaśyapaḥ

original: gautamaśca bharadvājo viśāmitro 'tha saptamaḥ / tathā hyekonapañcāśanmarutaḥ parikīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: gautamaḥ ca bharadvājaḥ viśāmitraḥ saptamaḥ tathā hi ekonapañcāśat marutaḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: ādityā vasavaḥ sādhyāgaṇā dvādaśakāstrayaḥ / ekādaśā tathā rudrā vasavo 'ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: ādityāḥ vasavaḥ sādhyāḥ gaṇāḥ dvādaśakāḥ trayaḥ ekādaśā tathā rudrāḥ ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ

original: dvāvaśvinau vinirdiṣṭau viśvedevāstathā daśā / daśauvāṅgiraso devā nava devagaṇāstathā //
analyzed: dvau aśvinau vinirdiṣṭau viśvedevāḥ tathā daśā daśa uvā aṅgirasaḥ devāḥ nava deva gaṇāḥ tathā

original: tejasvī nāma vai śakro hiraṇyākṣo ripuḥ smṛtaḥ / hato varāharūpeṇa hariṇyākhyo 'tha viṣṇunā //
analyzed: tejasvī nāma vai śakraḥ hiraṇyākṣaḥ ripuḥ smṛtaḥ hataḥ varāha rūpeṇa viṣṇunā

original: vakṣye manorbhaviṣyasya sāvarṇyākhyasya vai sutān / vijayaścārvavīraśca nirmohaḥ satyavākrṛtī //
analyzed: vakṣye manoḥ bhaviṣyasya sāvarṇya ākhyasya vai sutān vijayaḥ cārvavīraḥ ca nirmohaḥ

original: variṣṭhaśca gariṣṭhaśca vācaḥ saṃgatireva ca / aśvatthāmā kṛpo vyāso gālavo dīptimānatha //
analyzed: variṣṭhaḥ ca gariṣṭhaḥ ca vācaḥ saṃgatiḥ eva ca aśvatthāmā kṛpaḥ vyāsaḥ gālavaḥ dīptimān atha

original: ṛṣyaśṛṅgastathā rāma ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ / sutapā amṛtābhāśca mukhyāścāpi tathā surāḥ //
analyzed: ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ tathā rāmaḥ ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ sutapāḥ amṛtābhāḥ ca mukhyāḥ ca api tathā surāḥ

original: teṣāṃ gaṇastu devānā mekaiko viṃśakaḥ smṛtaḥ / virocanasutasteṣāṃ balirindro bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: teṣām gaṇaḥ tu devānām ekaikaḥ viṃśakaḥ smṛtaḥ virocana sutaḥ teṣām baliḥ indraḥ bhaviṣyati

original: dattvemāṃ yācamānāya viṣṇave yaḥ padatrayam / ṛddhimindrapadaṃ hitvā tataḥ siddhimavāpsyati //
analyzed: dattvā imām yācamānāya viṣṇave yaḥ pada trayam ṛddhim indra padam hitvā tatas siddhim avāpsyati

original: vāruṇerdakṣasāvarṇernavamasya sutāñchṛṇu / dhṛtiketurdeptiketuḥ pañcahasto nirāmayaḥ / pṛtuśravā bṛhadūdyumna ṛcīko bṛhato guṇaḥ //
analyzed: vāruṇeḥ dakṣasāvarṇeḥ navamasya sutān śṛṇu dhṛtiketuḥ deptiketuḥ pañcahastaḥ nirāmayaḥ pṛtuśravāḥ bṛhadūdyumnaḥ ṛcīkaḥ bṛhataḥ guṇaḥ

original: medhātithirdyutiścaiva savaso vasureva ca / jyotiṣmānhavyakavyau ca ṛṣayo vibhurīśvaraḥ //
analyzed: medhātithiḥ dyutiḥ ca eva savasaḥ vasuḥ eva ca jyotiṣmān havya kavyau ca ṛṣayaḥ vibhuḥ īśvaraḥ

original: paro marīcirgarbhaśca sva (su)
analyzed: paraḥ marīciḥ garbhaḥ ca sva su

original: dharmāṇaśca te trayaḥ / deśaśatru) kālakākṣastaddhantā padmanābhakaḥ //
analyzed: dharmāṇaḥ ca te trayaḥ deśa śatru kālakākṣaḥ tad hantā padmanābhakaḥ

original: bhaviṣyanti tadā devā ekaiko dvādaśo gaṇaḥ / teṣāmindro mahāvīryo bhaviṣyatyadbhuto hara //
analyzed: bhaviṣyanti tadā devāḥ ekaikaḥ dvādaśaḥ gaṇaḥ teṣām indraḥ mahā vīryaḥ bhaviṣyati adbhutaḥ hara

original: dhamaputrasya putrāṃstu daśa masya manoḥ śṛṇu / sukṣetraścottamaujāśca bhūriśreṇyaśca vīryavān //
analyzed: dhama putrasya putrān tu daśa masya manoḥ śṛṇu sukṣetraḥ ca uttamaujāḥ ca bhūriśreṇyaḥ ca vīryavān

original: śatānīko niramitro vṛṣaseno jayadrathaḥ / bhūridyumnaḥ suvarcāśca śāntirindraḥ pratāpavān //
analyzed: śatānīkaḥ niramitraḥ vṛṣasenaḥ jayadrathaḥ bhūridyumnaḥ suvarcāḥ ca śāntiḥ indraḥ pratāpavān

original: ayo (po) mūrtirhaviṣmāṃśca sukṛtiścāvyayastathā / nābhāgo 'pratimaujāśca saurabha ṛṣayastathā //
analyzed: mūrtiḥ haviṣmān ca sukṛtiḥ ca avyayaḥ tathā nābhāgo pratimaujāḥ ca saurabhaḥ ṛṣayaḥ tathā

original: prāṇākhyāḥ śatasaṃkhyāstu devatānāṃ gaṇastadā / teṣāmindraśca bhavitā śāntirnāma mahābalaḥ / baliḥ śatrustaṃ hariśca gadayā ghātayiṣyati //
analyzed: prāṇa ākhyāḥ śatasaṃkhyāḥ tu devatānām gaṇaḥ tadā teṣām indraḥ ca bhavitā śāntiḥ nāma mahā balaḥ baliḥ śatruḥ tam hariḥ ca gadayā ghātayiṣyati

original: rudra putrasya te putrānvakṣyāmyekādaśasya tu / sarvatragaḥ suśarmā ca devānīkaḥ pururguruḥ //
analyzed: rudra putrasya te putrān vakṣyāmi ekādaśasya tu sarvatragaḥ suśarmā ca devānīkaḥ puruḥ guruḥ

original: kṣetravarṇo dṛḍheṣuśca ārdrakaḥ putrakastathā / haviṣmāṃśca haviṣyaśca varuṇo viśvavistarau //
analyzed: kṣetravarṇaḥ dṛḍheṣuḥ ca ārdrakaḥ putrakaḥ tathā haviṣmān ca haviṣyaḥ ca varuṇaḥ viśva vistarau

original: viṣṇuścaivāgnitejāśca ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ / vihaṅgamāḥ kāmagam nirmāṇarucayastathā //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ ca eva agnitejāḥ ca ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ vihaṅgamāḥ kāmagam nirmāṇa rucayaḥ tathā

original: ekaikastriṃśakasteṣāṃ gaṇaścaindraśca vai vṛṣaḥ / dhasagrīvo ripustasya śrīrūpī ghātayiṣyati //
analyzed: ekaikaḥ triṃśakaḥ teṣām gaṇaḥ ca aindraḥ ca vai vṛṣaḥ ripuḥ tasya śrī rūpī ghātayiṣyati

original: manostu dakṣaputrasya dvādaśasyātmajāñchṛṇu / devavānu padevaśca devaśreṣṭho vidūrathaḥ //
analyzed: manoḥ tu dakṣa putrasya dvādaśasya ātmajān śṛṇu devavān u padevaḥ ca deva śreṣṭhaḥ vidūrathaḥ

original: mitravānmitradevaśca mitrabinduśca vīryavān / mitravāhaḥ pravāhaśca dakṣaputramanoḥ sutāḥ //
analyzed: mitravān mitradevaḥ ca mitrabinduḥ ca vīryavān mitravāhaḥ pravāhaḥ ca dakṣa putra manoḥ sutāḥ

original: tapasvī sutapāścaiva tapomūrtistaporatiḥ / tapodhṛtirdyutiścānyaḥ saptamaśca tapodhanāḥ //
analyzed: tapasvī sutapāḥ ca eva tapomūrtiḥ taporatiḥ tapodhṛtiḥ dyutiḥ ca anyaḥ saptamaḥ ca tapodhanāḥ

original: svadharmāṇaḥ sutapaso harito hohitāstathā / surārayo gaṇāścaite pratyekaṃ daśako gaṇaḥ //
analyzed: sva dharmāṇaḥ su tapasaḥ haritaḥ surārayaḥ gaṇāḥ ca ete pratyekam daśakaḥ gaṇaḥ

original: ṛtadhāmā ca bhadre (tatre)
analyzed: ṛta dhāmā ca bhadre tatre

original: ndrastārako nāma tadripuḥ / harirnapuṃsakaṃ bhūtvā ghātayiṣyati śaṅkara //
analyzed: ndraḥ tārakaḥ nāma tad ripuḥ hariḥ napuṃsakam bhūtvā ghātayiṣyati śaṅkara

original: trayodaśasya raucyasya manoḥ putrānnibodha me / citraseno vicitraśca tapodharmarato dhṛtiḥ //
analyzed: trayodaśasya raucyasya manoḥ putrān nibodha me citrasenaḥ vicitraḥ ca tapaḥ dharma rataḥ dhṛtiḥ

original: sunetraḥ kṣetravṛttiśca sunayo dharmapo dṛḍhaḥ / dhṛtimānavyayaścaiva niśārūpo nirutsukaḥ //
analyzed: sunetraḥ kṣetravṛttiḥ ca sunayaḥ dharmapaḥ dṛḍhaḥ dhṛtimān avyayaḥ ca eva niśārūpaḥ nirutsukaḥ

original: nirmohastattvadarśo ca ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ / sva (su) romāṇaḥ sva (su)
analyzed: ca ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ

original: dharmāṇaḥ sva (su)
analyzed: dharmāṇaḥ sva su

original: karmāṇastathāmarāḥ //
analyzed: karmāṇaḥ tathā amarāḥ

original: trayastriṃśadvibhedāste devānāṃ tatra vai gaṇāḥ / indro divaspatiḥ śatrustviṣṭibho nāma dānavaḥ //
analyzed: trayastriṃśat vibhedāḥ te devānām tatra vai gaṇāḥ indraḥ divaspatiḥ śatruḥ tu iṣṭibhaḥ nāma dānavaḥ

original: māyūreṇa ca rūpeṇa ghātayiṣyati mādhavaḥ / caturdaśasya bhautyasya śṛṇu putrānmanormama //
analyzed: māyūreṇa ca rūpeṇa ghātayiṣyati mādhavaḥ caturdaśasya bhautyasya śṛṇu putrān manoḥ mama

original: ururgabhīro dhṛṣṭaśca tarasvīgrā (gra) ha eva ca / abhimāni pravīraśca jiṣṇuḥ saṃkrandanastathā / tejasvī durlabhaścaiva bhautyasyaite manoḥ sutāḥ //
analyzed: uruḥ gabhīraḥ dhṛṣṭaḥ ca tarasvī igrā gra haḥ eva ca  pravīraḥ ca jiṣṇuḥ saṃkrandanaḥ tathā tejasvī durlabhaḥ ca eva bhautyasya ete manoḥ sutāḥ

original: agnīdhraścāgnibāhuśca māgadhaśca tathā śuciḥ / ajito muktaśukrau ca ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: agnīdhraḥ ca agnibāhuḥ ca māgadhaḥ ca tathā śuciḥ ajitaḥ mukta śukrau ca ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ

original: cākṣuṣāḥ karmaniṣṭhāśca pavitrā bhrājinastathā / vacovṛddhā devagaṇāḥ pañca proktāstu saptakāḥ //
analyzed: cākṣuṣāḥ karma niṣṭhāḥ ca pavitrāḥ bhrājinaḥ tathā vacaḥ vṛddhāḥ deva gaṇāḥ pañca proktāḥ tu saptakāḥ

original: śucirindro mahādaityo ripuhantā hariḥ svayam / eko devaścaturdhā tu vyāsarūpeṇa viṣṇunā //
analyzed: śuciḥ indraḥ mahā daityaḥ ripu hantā hariḥ svayam ekaḥ devaḥ caturdhā tu vyāsa rūpeṇa viṣṇunā

original: kṛtastataḥ purāṇāni vidyāścāṣṭādaśaiva tu / aṅgāni caturo vedā mīmāṃsā nyāyavistaraḥ //
analyzed: kṛtaḥ tatas purāṇāni vidyāḥ ca aṣṭādaśa eva tu aṅgāni caturaḥ vedāḥ mīmāṃsā nyāya vistaraḥ

original: purāṇaṃ dharmaśāstraṃ ca āyurvedārthaśāstrakam / dhanurvedaśca gāndharvo vidyā hyaṣṭādaśaiva tāḥ //
analyzed: purāṇam dharma śāstram ca āyurveda arthaśāstrakam dhanurvedaḥ ca gāndharvaḥ vidyāḥ hi aṣṭādaśa eva tāḥ

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe manutadvaṃśanirūpaṇaṃ nāma spatāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe manutadvaṃśanirūpaṇam nāma spatāśītitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 88
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / harirmanvantarāṇyāha brahmādibhyo harāya ca / mārkaṇḍeyaḥ pitṛsto traṃ krauñcukiṃ prāha tacchṛṇu //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca hariḥ manvantarāṇi āha brahma ādibhyaḥ harāya ca  mārkaṇḍeyaḥ pitṛ sto tram krauñcukim prāha tat śṛṇu

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca / ruciḥ prajāpatiḥ pūrvaṃ nirmamo nirahaṅkṛtiḥ / atrasto 'mitamāyī ca cacāra pṛthivīmimām //
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca  ruciḥ prajāpatiḥ pūrvam nirmamaḥ nirahaṅkṛtiḥ atrastaḥ mita māyī ca cacāra pṛthivīm imām

original: anagnimaniketaṃ tamekāhāramanāśramam / nimuktasaṃgaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā procuḥ svapitaro munim //
analyzed: anagnim aniketam tam eka āhāram anāśramam tam eka āhāram anāśramam tam dṛṣṭvā procuḥ sva pitaraḥ munim

original: pitara ūcuḥ / vatsa kasmāttvayā puṇyo na kṛto dāra saṃgrahaḥ / svargāpavargahe (se)
analyzed: pitaraḥ ūcuḥ vatsa kasmāt tvayā puṇyaḥ na kṛtaḥ dāra saṃgrahaḥ svarga apavarga he se

original: tutvādvandhastenāniśaṃ (nimiṣaṃ) vinā //
analyzed: tu tvāt vandhaḥ tena aniśam nimiṣam vinā

original: gṛhī samastadevānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca tathārhaṇam / ṛṣīṇāmarthināṃ caiva kurvallo kānavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: gṛhī samasta devānām pitṝṇām ca tathā arhaṇam ṛṣīṇām arthinām ca eva kurvan lo kān avāpnuyāt

original: svāhoccāraṇato devānsvadhoccāraṇataḥ pitan / vibhajatyannadānena bhṛtyādyānatithīnapi //
analyzed: svāhā uccāraṇataḥ devān svadhā uccāraṇataḥ pitan  vibhajati anna dānena bhṛtya ādyān atithīn api

original: sa ttvaṃ daivādṛṇādvandhamimamasmadṛṇādapi / avāpto 'si manuṣyarṣe bhūtebhyaśca dinedine //
analyzed: sa ttvam daivāt ṛṇāt vandham imam asmat ṛṇāt api avāptaḥ si manuṣya ṛṣe bhūtebhyaḥ ca dine dine

original: anatpādya sutāndevānasantarpya pitṝstathā / akṛtvā ca kathaṃ māṇḍyaṃ svargatiṃ prāptumicchasi //
analyzed: sutān devān a santarpya pitṝn tathā a kṛtvā ca katham svar gatim prāptum icchasi

original: kleśabodhaikakaṃ putra anyāyena bhavettava / mṛtasya narakaṃ tyaktvā kleśa evānyajanmani //
analyzed: kleśa bodha ekakam putra anyāyena bhavet tava mṛtasya narakam tyaktvā kleśaḥ evā anya janmani

original: ruciruvāca / parigraho 'tiduḥ khāya pāpāyā dhogatestathā / bhavatyato mayā pūrvaṃna kṛto dārasaṃgrahaḥ //
analyzed: ruciḥ uvāca pāpāyāḥ dhogateḥ tathā  bhavati atas mayā pūrvam na kṛtaḥ dāra saṃgrahaḥ

original: ātmanaḥ saṃśayopāyaḥ kriyate kṣaṇamantraṇāt / svamuktiheturna bhavatyasāvapi parigrahāt //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ saṃśaya upāyaḥ kriyate kṣaṇa mantraṇāt sva mukti hetuḥ na bhavati asau api parigrahāt

original: prakṣālyate 'nudivasaṃ ya ātmā niṣparigrahaḥ / mama tvapaṅkadigdho 'pi vidyāmbhobhirvaraṃ hi tat //
analyzed: prakṣālyate nudivasam yaḥ ātmā niṣparigrahaḥ mama tu a paṅka digdhaḥ vidyā ambhobhiḥ varam hi tat

original: anekabhavasaṃbhūtakarmapaṅkāṅkito budhaiḥ / ātmā tattvajñānatoyaiḥ prakṣālyo niyatendriyaiḥ //
analyzed: aneka bhava saṃbhūta karma paṅka aṅkitaḥ budhaiḥ ātmā tattva jñāna toyaiḥ prakṣālyaḥ niyata indriyaiḥ

original: pitara ūcuḥ / yuktaṃ prakṣālanaṃ kartumātmano 'pi yatendriyaiḥ / kiṃ tu nopāyamārgo 'yaṃ yatastvaṃ putra vartase //
analyzed: pitaraḥ ūcuḥ yuktam prakṣālanam kartum ātmanaḥ yata indriyaiḥ kim tu na upāya mārgaḥ yam yatas tvam putra vartase

original: pañcayajñaistapodānairaśubhaṃ nudatastava / phalābhisandhirahitaiḥ pūrvakama śubhāśubhaiḥ //
analyzed: pañcayajñaiḥ tapaḥ dānaiḥ aśubham nudataḥ tava phala abhisandhiḥ ahitaiḥ pūrvakam śubha aśubhaiḥ

original: evaṃ na bandho bhavati kurvataḥ kāraṇātmakam / na ca bandhāya tatkarma bhavatyanatisannibham //
analyzed: evam na bandhaḥ bhavati kurvataḥ kāraṇa ātmakam na ca bandhāya tat karma bhavati an ati sannibham

original: pūrvakarma kṛtaṃ bogaiḥ kṣīyate hyaniśantathā / sukhaduḥ khātmakairvatsa puṇyā puṇyātmakaṃ nṛṇām //
analyzed: pūrva karma kṛtam kṣīyate hi aniśam tathā sukha duḥ kha ātmakaiḥ vatsa puṇyā puṇya ātmakam nṛṇām

original: evaṃ prakṣālyate prājñairātmā bandhācca rakṣyate / rakṣyaśca svavivekairna pāpapaṅkena dahyate //
analyzed: evam prakṣālyate prājñaiḥ ātmā bandhāt ca rakṣyate rakṣyaḥ ca sva vivekaiḥ na pāpa paṅkena dahyate

original: ruciruvāca / avidyā pacyate vede karmamārgātpitāmahāḥ / tatkathaṃ karmaṇo mārge bhavanto yojayanti mām //
analyzed: ruciḥ uvāca avidyā pacyate vede karma mārgāt pitāmahāḥ tat katham karmaṇaḥ mārge bhavantaḥ yojayanti mām

original: pitara ucuḥ / avidyā sarvamevaitatkarmaṇaitanmṛṣā vacaḥ / kiṃ tu vidyāpariprāptau hetuḥ karma na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: pitaraḥ ucuḥ avidyā sarvam eva etat karmaṇā etat mṛṣā vacaḥ kim tu vidyā pariprāptau hetuḥ karma na saṃśayaḥ

original: vihitākaraṇānartho na sadbhiḥ kriyate tu yaḥ / saṃyamo muktaye yo 'nyaḥ pratyutādhogatipradaḥ //
analyzed: vihita akaraṇa anarthaḥ na sadbhiḥ kriyate tu yaḥ saṃyamaḥ muktaye yaḥ nyaḥ pratyuta adhogati pradaḥ

original: prakṣālayāmīti bhavānyadetanmanyate varam / vihitākaraṇodbhūtaiḥ pāpaistvamapi dahyase //
analyzed: prakṣālayāmi iti bhavān yat etat manyate varam vihita akaraṇa udbhūtaiḥ pāpaiḥ tvam api dahyase

original: avidyāpyupakārāya viṣavajjāyate nṛṇām / anuṣṭhānā bhyupāyena bandhayogyāpi no hi sā //
analyzed: avidyā api upakārāya viṣa vat jāyate nṛṇām anuṣṭhānā abhyupāyena bandha yogyā api naḥ hi sā

original: tasmādvatsa kuruṣva tvaṃ vidhivaddārasaṃgraham / ājanma viphalante 'stu asamprāpyānyalaukikam //
analyzed: tasmāt vatsa kuruṣva tvam vidhivat dāra saṃgraham ājanma viphalante stu a samprāpya anya laukikam

original: ruciruvāca / vṛddho 'haṃ sāmprataṃ ko me pitaraḥ sampridāsyati / bhāryāntathā daridrasya duṣkaro dārasaṃgrahaḥ //
analyzed: ruciḥ uvāca vṛddhaḥ ham sāmpratam kaḥ me pitaraḥ bhāryā antathā daridrasya duṣkaraḥ dāra saṃgrahaḥ

original: pitara ūcuḥ / asmākaṃ patanaṃ vatsa bhavataścāpyadhogatiḥ / nūnaṃ bhāvi bhavitrī ca nābhinandasi no vacaḥ //
analyzed: pitaraḥ ūcuḥ asmākam patanam vatsa bhavataḥ ca api adhogatiḥ nūnam bhāvi bhavitrī ca nā abhinandasi naḥ vacaḥ

original: ityuktvā pitarastasya paśyato munisattama / babhūvuḥ sahasādṛśyā dīpā vātahatā iva //
analyzed: iti uktvā pitaraḥ tasya paśyataḥ muni sattama babhūvuḥ saha sādṛśyāḥ dīpāḥ vāta hatāḥ iva

original: muniḥ kraiñcukaye prāha mārkaṇḍeyo mahātapāḥ / rucivṛttāntamakhilaṃ pitṛsaṃvādalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: muniḥ kraiñcukaye prāha mārkaṇḍeyaḥ mahā tapāḥ ruci vṛttāntam akhilam pitṛ saṃvāda lakṣaṇam

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karmajñānamā nāmāṣṭāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma aṣṭāśītitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 89
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / pṛṣṭaḥ kraiñcukinovāca mārkaṇḍeyaḥ punaśca tam / sa tena pitṛvākyane bhṛśamudvagnamānasaḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca pṛṣṭaḥ kraiñcukinā uvāca mārkaṇḍeyaḥ punar ca tam sa tena pitṛ vākyane bhṛśam udvagna mānasaḥ

original: kanyābhilāṣī viprarṣiḥ paribabhrāma medinīm / kanyāmalabhamāno 'sau pitṛvākyena dīpitaḥ / cintāmavāpa mahītamatīvodvagnamānasaḥ //
analyzed: kanyā abhilāṣī viprarṣiḥ paribabhrāma medinīm  kanyām alabhamānaḥ sau pitṛ vākyena dīpitaḥ cintām avāpa mahītamatī iva udvagna mānasaḥ

original: kiṃ karomi kra gacchāmi kathaṃ me dārasaṃgrahaḥ / kṣipraṃ bhavenmatpitṝṇāṃ mamābhyudayakārakaḥ //
analyzed: kim karomi gacchāmi katham me dāra saṃgrahaḥ kṣipram bhavet mad pitṝṇām mama abhyudaya kārakaḥ

original: iti cintayatastasyamatirjātā mahātmanaḥ / tapasārādhayāmyenaṃ brahmāṇaṃ kamalodbhavam //
analyzed: iti cintayataḥ tasya amatiḥ jātā mahātmanaḥ tapasā ārādhayāmi enam brahmāṇam kamalodbhavam

original: tato varṣaśataṃ divyaṃ tapastepe mahāmanāḥ / tatra sthitaściraṃ kālaṃ vaneṣu niyamasthitaḥ / ārādhanāya sa tadā paraṃ niyamamāsthitaḥ //
analyzed: tatas varṣa śatam divyam tapaḥ tepe mahā manāḥ tatra sthitaḥ ciram kālam vaneṣu niyama sthitaḥ  ārādhanāya sa tadā param niyamam āsthitaḥ

original: tataḥ pradarśayāmāsa brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ / uvācātha prasanno 'smītyucyatāmabhivāñchitam //
analyzed: tatas pradarśayāmāsa brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ uvāca atha prasanno smi iti ucyatām abhivāñchitam

original: tato 'sau praṇipatyāha brahmāṇaṃ jagato gatim / pitṝṇāṃ vacanāttena yatkartumabhivāñchitam //
analyzed: tatas sau praṇipatya āha brahmāṇam jagataḥ gatim  pitṝṇām vacanāt tena yat kartum abhivāñchitam

original: brahmovāca / prajāpatistvaṃ bhavitā sraṣṭavyā bhavatā prajāḥ / sṛṣṭvā prajāḥ sutānvipra samutpādya kriyāstathā //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca prajāpatiḥ tvam bhavitā sraṣṭavyāḥ bhavatā prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā prajāḥ sutān vipra samutpādya kriyāḥ tathā

original: kṛtvā kṛtādhikārastvaṃ tataḥ siddhimavāpyasi / satvaṃ yathoktaṃ pitṛbhiḥ kuru dāraparigraham //
analyzed: kṛtvā kṛta adhikāraḥ tvam tatas siddhim avāpyasi satvam yathā uktam pitṛbhiḥ kuru dāra parigraham

original: kāmaṃ cemamabhidhyāya kriyatāṃ pitṛpūjanam / ta eva tuṣṭāḥ pitaraḥ pradāsyanti tavepsitam / patnīṃ sutāṃśca santuṣṭāḥ kiṃ na dadyuḥ pitāmahāḥ //
analyzed: kāmam ca imam abhidhyāya kriyatām pitṛ pūjanam  te eva tuṣṭāḥ pitaraḥ pradāsyanti tava īpsitam  patnīm sutān ca santuṣṭāḥ kim na dadyuḥ pitāmahāḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca / ityṛṣirvacanaṃ śrutvā brahmaṇo 'vyaktajanmanaḥ / nadyā vivikte puline cakāra pitṛtarpaṇam //
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca iti ṛṣiḥ vacanam śrutvā brahmaṇaḥ vyakta janmanaḥ nadyāḥ vivikte puline cakāra pitṛ tarpaṇam

original: tuṣṭāva ca pitṝnvipraḥ stavairebhirathādṛtaḥ / ekāgraprayato bhūtvā bhaktinamrātmakandharaḥ //
analyzed: tuṣṭāva ca pitṝn vipraḥ stavaiḥ ebhiḥ atha ādṛtaḥ ekāgra prayataḥ bhūtvā bhakti namra ātma kandharaḥ

original: ruciruvāca / namasye 'haṃ pitṝn bhaktyā ye vasantyadhidevatam / devairapi hi tarpyante ye śrāddheṣu svadhottaraiḥ //
analyzed: ruciḥ uvāca namasye ham pitṝn bhaktyā ye vasanti adhidevatam  devaiḥ api hi tarpyante ye śrāddheṣu svadhā uttaraiḥ

original: namasye 'haṃ pitṝn svarge ye tarpyante maharṣibhiḥ / śrāddhairmanomayairbhaktyā bhuktimuktimabhīpsubhiḥ //
analyzed: namasye ham pitṝn svarge ye tarpyante mahā ṛṣibhiḥ śrāddhaiḥ manaḥ mayaiḥ bhaktyā bhukti muktim abhīpsubhiḥ

original: namasye 'haṃ pitṝnsvarge siddhāḥ santarpayanti yān / śrāddheṣu divyaiḥ sakalairupahārairanuttamaiḥ //
analyzed: namasye ham pitṝn svarge siddhāḥ santarpayanti yān  śrāddheṣu divyaiḥ sakalaiḥ upahāraiḥ anuttamaiḥ

original: namasye 'haṃ pitṝn bhaktyā yer'cyante guhyakairdivi / tanmayatvena vādhadbhiḥ ṛddhimātyantikīṃ parām //
analyzed: namasye ham pitṝn bhaktyā yā īrcyante guhyakaiḥ divi tad maya tvena vā ādhadbhiḥ ṛddhim ātyantikīm parām

original: namasye 'haṃ pitṝnmartyairarcyante bhuvi ye sadā / śrāddheṣu śraddhayābhīṣṭalokapuṣṭipradāyinaḥ //
analyzed: namasye ham pitṝn martyaiḥ arcyante bhuvi ye sadā śrāddheṣu śraddhayā abhīṣṭa loka puṣṭi pradāyinaḥ

original: namasye 'haṃ pitṝnviprairarcyante bhuvi ye sadā / vāñchitābhīṣṭalābhāya prājāpatyapradāyinaḥ //
analyzed: namasye ham pitṝn vipraiḥ arcyante bhuvi ye sadā vāñchita abhīṣṭa lābhāya prājāpatya pradāyinaḥ

original: namasye 'haṃ pitṝnye vai tarpyante 'raṇyavāsibhiḥ / vanyaiḥ śrāddhairyatāhāraistaponirdhūtakalmaṣaiḥ //
analyzed: namasye ham pitṝn ye vai tarpyante raṇya vāsibhiḥ vanyaiḥ śrāddhaiḥ yata āhāraiḥ tapaḥ nirdhūta kalmaṣaiḥ

original: namasye 'haṃ pitṝnviprairnaiṣṭhikairdharmacāribhiḥ / ye saṃyatātmabhirnityaṃ santarpyante samādhibhiḥ //
analyzed: namasye ham pitṝn vipraiḥ naiṣṭhikaiḥ dharma cāribhiḥ ye saṃyata ātmabhiḥ nityam santarpyante samādhibhiḥ

original: namasye 'haṃ pitṝñchrāddhai rājanyāstarpayanti yān / kavyairaśeṣaividhivallokadvayaphalapradān //
analyzed: namasye ham pitṝn śrāddhaiḥ rājanyāḥ tarpayanti yān kavyaiḥ aśeṣaiḥ vidhivat loka dvaya phala pradān

original: namasye 'haṃ pitṝnvaiśyairarcyante bhuvi ye sadā / svakarmābhiratairnnityaṃ puṣpadhūpānnavāribhiḥ //
analyzed: namasye ham pitṝn vaiśyaiḥ arcyante bhuvi ye sadā puṣpa dhūpa anna vāribhiḥ

original: namasye 'haṃ pitṝñchrāddhe śūdrairapi ca bhaktitaḥ / santarpyate jagatkṛtsnaṃ nāmnā khyātāḥ sukālinaḥ //
analyzed: namasye ham pitṝn śrāddhe śūdraiḥ api ca bhaktitaḥ santarpyate jagat kṛtsnam nāmnā khyātāḥ sukālinaḥ

original: namasye 'haṃ pitṝñchrāddhe pātāle ye mahāsuraiḥ / santarpyante sudhāhārāstyaktadambhamadaiḥ sadā //
analyzed: namasye ham pitṝn śrāddhe pātāle ye mahā asuraiḥ santarpyante sudhā āhārāḥ tyakta dambha madaiḥ sadā

original: namasye 'haṃ pitṝñchrāddhairarcyante ye rasātale / bhogairaśeṣairvidhivannāgaiḥ kāmānabhīpsubhiḥ //
analyzed: namasye ham pitṝn śrāddhaiḥ arcyante ye rasātale  bhogaiḥ aśeṣaiḥ vidhivat nāgaiḥ kāmān abhīpsubhiḥ

original: namasye 'haṃ pitṝñchrāddhaiḥ sarpaiḥ santarpitānsadā / tatraiva vidhivanmantrabhogasampatsamanvitaiḥ //
analyzed: namasye ham pitṝn śrāddhaiḥ sarpaiḥ santarpitān sadā tatra eva vidhivat mantra bhoga sampad samanvitaiḥ

original: pitṝnnamasye nivasanti sākṣādye devaloke 'tha mahītale vā / tathāntarikṣe ca surāripūjyāste vai pratīcchantu mayopanītam //
analyzed: pitṝn namasye nivasanti sākṣāt ye deva loke mahī tale vā tathā antarikṣe ca surāri pūjyāḥ te vai pratīcchantu mayā upanītam

original: pitṝnnamasye paramārthabhūtā ye vai vimāne nivasantyamūrtāḥ / yajanti yānastamalairmanobhiryogīśvarāḥ kleśavimuktihetūn //
analyzed: pitṝn namasye paramārtha bhūtāḥ ye vai vimāne nivasanti amūrtāḥ yajanti yān asta malaiḥ manobhiḥ yogi īśvarāḥ kleśa vimukti hetūn

original: pitṝnnamasye divi ye ca mūrtāḥ svadhābhujaḥ kāmyaphalābhisandhau / pradānaśaktāḥ sakalepsitānāṃ vimuktidā ye 'nabhisaṃhiteṣu //
analyzed: pitṝn namasye divi ye ca mūrtāḥ svadhā bhujaḥ kāmya phala abhisandhau pradāna śaktāḥ sakala īpsitānām vimukti dāḥ ye

original: tṛpyantu te 'sminpitaraḥ samastā icchāvatāṃ ye pradiśanti kāmān / suratvamindratvamito 'dhikaṃ vā gajāśvaratnāni mahāgṛhāṇi //
analyzed: tṛpyantu te smin pitaraḥ samastāḥ icchāvatām ye pradiśanti kāmān sura tvam indra tvam itas dhikam vā gaja aśva ratnāni mahā gṛhāṇi

original: somasya ye raśmiṣu yer'kabimbe śukle vimāne ca sadā vasanti / tṛpyantu te 'sminpitaro 'nnatoyairgandhādinā puṣṭimito vrajantu //
analyzed: somasya ye raśmiṣu ye irka bimbe śukle vimāne ca sadā vasanti tṛpyantu te smin pitaraḥ nna toyaiḥ gandha ādinā puṣṭim itas vrajantu

original: yeṣāṃ hute 'gnau haviṣā ca tṛptirye bhuñjate vipraśarīrasaṃsthāḥ / ye piṇḍadānena mudaṃ prayānti tṛpyantu te 'sminpitaro 'nnatoyaiḥ //
analyzed: yeṣām hute gnau haviṣā ca tṛptiḥ ye bhuñjate vipra śarīra saṃsthāḥ ye piṇḍa dānena mudam prayānti tṛpyantu te smin pitaraḥ nna toyaiḥ

original: ye khaḍgamāṃsena surairabhīṣṭaiḥ kṛṣṇaistilairdivya manoharaiśca / kālena śākena maharṣivaryaiḥ saṃprīṇitāste mudamatra yāntu //
analyzed: ye khaḍga māṃsena suraiḥ abhīṣṭaiḥ kṛṣṇaiḥ tilaiḥ divya manoharaiḥ ca  kālena śākena mahā ṛṣi varyaiḥ saṃprīṇitāḥ te mudam atra yāntu

original: kavyānyaśeṣāṇi ca yānyabhīṣṭānyatīva teṣāṃ mama pūjitānām / teṣāñca sānnidhyamihāstu puṣpagandhāmbubhojyeṣu mayā kṛteṣu //
analyzed: kavyāni aśeṣāṇi ca yāni abhīṣṭāni atīva teṣām mama pūjitānām teṣām ca sānnidhyam iha astu puṣpa gandha ambu bhojyeṣu mayā kṛteṣu

original: dinedine ye pratigṛhṇater'cāṃ māsāntapūjyā bhuvi ye 'ṣṭakāsu / ye vatsarānte 'bhyudaye ca pūjyāḥ prayāntu te me pitaro 'tra tuṣṭim //
analyzed: dine dine ye pratigṛhṇata ṛcām māsa anta pūjyāḥ bhuvi ye ṣṭakāsu ye vatsara ante bhyudaye ca pūjyāḥ prayāntu te me tuṣṭim

original: pūjyā dvijānāṃ kumudendubhāso ye kṣattriyāṇāṃ jvalanārkavarṇāḥ / tathā viśāṃ ye kanakāvadātā nīlīprabhāḥ śūdrajanasya ye ca //
analyzed: pūjyāḥ dvijānām kumuda indu bhāsaḥ ye kṣattriyāṇām jvalana arka varṇāḥ tathā viśām ye kanaka avadātāḥ nīlī prabhāḥ śūdra janasya ye ca

original: te 'sminsamastā mama puṣpagandhadhūpāmbubhojyādinivedanena / tathāgnihomena ca yānti tṛptiṃ sadā pitṛbhyaḥ praṇato 'smi tebhyaḥ //
analyzed: te smin samastāḥ mama puṣpa gandha dhūpa ambu bhojya ādi nivedanena tathā agni homena ca yānti tṛptim sadā pitṛbhyaḥ praṇataḥ smi tebhyaḥ

original: ye devapūrvāṇyabhitṛptihetora śranti kavyāni śubhāhṛtāni / tṛptāśca ye bhūtisṛjo bhavanti tṛpyantu te 'sminpraṇato 'smi tebhyaḥ //
analyzed: ye deva pūrvāṇi abhi tṛpti hetoḥ a śranti kavyāni śubha āhṛtāni tṛptāḥ ca ye bhūti sṛjaḥ bhavanti tṛpyantu te smin praṇataḥ smi tebhyaḥ

original: rakṣāṃsi bhūtānyasurāṃstathogrātrirṇāśayantu tvaśivaṃ prajānām / ādyāḥ surāṇāmamareśapūjyāstṛpyantu te 'sminpraṇato 'smitebhyaḥ //
analyzed: rakṣāṃsi bhūtāni asurān tu aśivam prajānām  ādyāḥ surāṇām amara īśa pūjyāḥ tṛpyantu te smin praṇataḥ smitebhyaḥ

original: agniṣvāttā barhiṣada ājyapāḥ somapāstathā / vrajantu tṛptiṃ śrāddhe 'sminpitarastarpitā mayā //
analyzed: agniṣvāttāḥ barhiṣadaḥ ājyapāḥ somapāḥ tathā vrajantu tṛptim śrāddhe smin pitaraḥ tarpitāḥ mayā

original: agniṣvāttāḥ pitṛgaṇāḥ prācīṃ rakṣantu me diśam / tathā barhiṣadaḥ pāntu yāmyāṃ me pitaraḥ sadā / pratīcīmājyapāstadvadudīcīmapi somapāḥ //
analyzed: agniṣvāttāḥ pitṛ gaṇāḥ prācīm rakṣantu me diśam tathā barhiṣadaḥ pāntu yāmyām me pitaraḥ sadā pratīcīm ājyapāḥ tadvat udīcīm api somapāḥ

original: rakṣobhūtapiśācebhyastathaivāsuradoṣataḥ / sarvataḥ pitaro rakṣāṃ kurvantu mama nityaśaḥ //
analyzed: rakṣaḥ bhūta piśācebhyaḥ tathā eva asura doṣataḥ sarvatas pitaraḥ rakṣām kurvantu mama nityaśas

original: viśvo viśvabhugārādhyo dharmo dhanyaḥ śubhānanaḥ / bhūtido bhūtikṛd bhūtiḥ pitṝṇāṃ ye gaṇā nava //
analyzed: viśvaḥ viśvabhuj ārādhyaḥ dharmaḥ dhanyaḥ śubha ānanaḥ bhūti daḥ bhūti kṛt bhūtiḥ pitṝṇām ye gaṇāḥ nava

original: kalyāṇaḥ kalyadaḥ kartā kalyaḥ kalyatarāśrayaḥ / kalyatāheturanghaḥ ṣaḍime te gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: kalyāṇaḥ kalya daḥ kartā kalyaḥ kalyatara āśrayaḥ ṣaṭ ime te gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: varo vareṇyo varadastuṣṭidaḥ puṣṭidastathā / viśvapātā tathā dhātā saptaite ca gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: varaḥ vareṇyaḥ varadaḥ tuṣṭidaḥ puṣṭidaḥ tathā viśvapātā tathā dhātā saptā ete ca gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: mahānmahātmā mahito mahimāvānmahābalaḥ / gaṇāḥ pañca tathaivaite pitṝṇāṃ pāpanāśanāḥ //
analyzed: mahān mahātmā mahitaḥ mahimāvān mahā balaḥ gaṇāḥ pañca tathā eva ete pitṝṇām pāpa nāśanāḥ

original: sukhado dhanadaścānyo dharmado 'nyaśca bhūtidaḥ / pitṝṇāṃ kathyate caiva tathā gaṇacatuṣṭayam //
analyzed: sukhadaḥ dhanadaḥ ca anyaḥ dharmadaḥ nyaḥ ca bhūtidaḥ pitṝṇām kathyate ca eva tathā gaṇa catuṣṭayam

original: ekatriṃśatpitṛgaṇā yairvyāptamakhilaṃ jagat / ta evātra pitṛgaṇāstuṣyantu ca madāhitāt //
analyzed: ekatriṃśat pitṛ gaṇāḥ yaiḥ vyāptam akhilam jagat  te eva atra pitṛ gaṇāḥ tuṣyantu ca mad āhitāt

original: mākraṇḍeya uvāca / evaṃ tu stuvatastasya tejasorāśirucchritaḥ / prādurbabhūva sahasā gaganavyāptikārakaḥ //
analyzed: mākraṇḍeyaḥ uvāca evam tu stuvataḥ tasya tejasoḥ rāśiḥ ucchritaḥ prādurbabhūva sahasā gagana vyāpti kārakaḥ

original: taddṛṣṭvā sumahattejaḥ samācchādya sthitaṃ jagat / jānubhyāmavanīṃ gatvā ruciḥ stotramidañjagau //
analyzed: tat dṛṣṭvā su mahat tejaḥ samācchādya sthitam jagat jānubhyām avanīm gatvā ruciḥ stotram idam jagau

original: ruciruvāca / arcitānāmamūrtānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ dīptatejasām / namasyāmi sadā teṣāṃ dhyānināṃ divyacakṣuṣām //
analyzed: ruciḥ uvāca arcitānām amūrtānām pitṝṇām dīpta tejasām  namasyāmi sadā teṣām dhyāninām divya cakṣuṣām

original: indrādīnāṃ ca netāro dakṣamārīcayostathā / saptarṣoṇāṃ tathānyeṣāṃ tānnamasyāmi kāmadān //
analyzed: indra ādīnām ca netāraḥ dakṣa mārīcayoḥ tathā saptarṣoṇām tathā anyeṣām tān namasyāmi kāma dān

original: manvādīnāṃ ca netāraḥ sūryācandramasostathā / tānnamasyāmyahaṃ sarvānpitṝnapyudadhāvapi //
analyzed: manu ādīnām ca netāraḥ sūryācandramasoḥ tathā  tān namasyāmi aham sarvān pitṝn api udadhau api

original: nakṣatrāṇāṃ grahāṇāṃ ca vāyvagnyornabhasastathā / dyāvāpṛthivyośca tathā namasyāmi kṛtāñjaliḥ //
analyzed: nakṣatrāṇām grahāṇām ca vāyu agnyoḥ nabhasaḥ tathā dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ ca tathā namasyāmi kṛta añjaliḥ

original: prajāpateḥ kaśyapāya somāya varuṇāya ca / yogeśvarebhyaśca sadā namasyāmi kṛtāñjaliḥ //
analyzed: prajāpateḥ kaśyapāya somāya varuṇāya ca yoga īśvarebhyaḥ ca sadā namasyāmi kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: namo gaṇebhyaḥ saptabhyastathā lokeṣu saptasu / svāyambhuve namasyāmi brahmaṇe yogacakṣuṣe //
analyzed: namaḥ gaṇebhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ tathā lokeṣu saptasu svāyambhuve namasyāmi brahmaṇe yoga cakṣuṣe

original: somādhārānpitṛgaṇānyogamūrtidharāṃstathā / namasyāmi tathā somaṃ pitaraṃ jagatāmaham //
analyzed: soma ādhārān pitṛ gaṇān yoga mūrti dharān tathā namasyāmi tathā somam pitaram jagatām aham

original: agnirūpāṃstathaivānyānnamasyāmi pitṝnaham / agnisomamayaṃ viśvaṃ yata etadaśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: agni rūpān tathā eva anyān namasyāmi pitṝn aham agni soma mayam viśvam yatas etat aśeṣatas

original: ye ca tejasi ye caite somasūryāgnimūrtayaḥ / jagatsvarūpiṇaścaiva tathā brahmasvarūpiṇaḥ //
analyzed: ye ca tejasi ye ca ete soma sūrya agni mūrtayaḥ jagat svarūpiṇaḥ ca eva tathā brahma svarūpiṇaḥ

original: tebhyo 'khilebhyo yogibhyaḥ pitṛbhyo yatamānasaḥ / namonamo namaste 'stu prasīdantu svadhābhujaḥ //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ khilebhyaḥ yogibhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ yata mānasaḥ namaḥ namaḥ namaḥ te stu prasīdantu svadhā bhujaḥ

original: mākraṇḍeya uvāca / evaṃ stutāstatastena tajaso munisattamāḥ / niścakramuste pitaro bhāsayanto diśādaśa //
analyzed: mākraṇḍeyaḥ uvāca  evam stutāḥ tatas tena muni sattamāḥ  niścakramuḥ te pitaraḥ bhāsayantaḥ diśā daśa

original: nivedanañca yattena puṣpagandhānulepanam / tadbhūṣitānatha sa tāndadṛśe purataḥ sthitān //
analyzed: nivedanam ca yat tena puṣpa gandha anulepanam tad bhūṣitān atha sa tān dadṛśe puratas sthitān

original: praṇipatya rucirbhaktyā punareva kṛtāñjaliḥ / namastubhyaṃ namastubhyamityāha pṛthagādṛtaḥ //
analyzed: praṇipatya ruciḥ bhaktyā punar eva kṛtāñjaliḥ namaḥ tubhyam namaḥ tubhyam iti āha pṛthak ādṛtaḥ

original: tataḥ prasannāḥ pitarastamūcurmunisattamam / varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti sa tānuvācānatakandharaḥ //
analyzed: tatas prasannāḥ pitaraḥ tam ūcuḥ muni sattamam varam vṛṇīṣva iti sa tān uvāca ānata kandharaḥ

original: ruciruvāca / prajānāṃ sargakartṛtvamādiṣṭaṃ brahmaṇā mama / so 'haṃ patnīmabhīpsāmi dhanyāṃ divyāṃ prajāvatīm //
analyzed: ruciḥ uvāca prajānām sarga kartṛ tvam ādiṣṭam brahmaṇā mama  saḥ ham patnīm abhīpsāmi dhanyām divyām prajāvatīm

original: pitara ūcuḥ / atraiva sadyaḥ patnī te bhavatvatimanoramā / tasyāñca putro bhavitā bhavato munisattama / //
analyzed: pitaraḥ ūcuḥ atrā eva sadyas patnī te bhavatu ati manoramā tasyām ca putraḥ bhavitā bhavataḥ muni sattama  /

original: manvantarādhipo dhīmāṃstvannāmnaivopalakṣitaḥ / ruce / raucya iti khyātiṃ prayāsyati jagattraye //
analyzed: manvantara adhipaḥ dhīmān tvad nāmnā eva upalakṣitaḥ ruce raucyaḥ iti khyātim prayāsyati jagattraye

original: tasyāpi bahavaḥ putrā mahābalaparākramāḥ / bhaviṣyanti mahātmānaḥ pṛthivīparipālakāḥ //
analyzed: tasya api bahavaḥ putrāḥ mahā bala parākramāḥ bhaviṣyanti mahātmānaḥ pṛthivī paripālakāḥ

original: tvaṃ ca prijāpatirbhūtvā prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā caturvidhāḥ / kṣīṇādhikāro dharmajñastataḥ siddhimavāpsyasi //
analyzed: tvam ca prijāpatiḥ bhūtvā prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā caturvidhāḥ kṣīṇa adhikāraḥ dharma jñaḥ tatas siddhim avāpsyasi

original: stotreṇānena ca naro yo 'smāṃstoṣyati bhaktitaḥ / tasya tuṣṭā vayaṃ bhogānātmajaṃ dhyānamuttamam //
analyzed: stotreṇa anena ca naraḥ yaḥ smān toṣyati bhaktitaḥ tasya tuṣṭāḥ vayam bhogān ātma jam dhyānam uttamam

original: āyurārogyamarthaṃ ca putrapautrādikaṃ tathā / vāñchadbhiḥ satataṃ stavyāḥ stotreṇānena vai yataḥ //
analyzed: āyuḥ ārogyam artham ca putra pautra ādikam tathā vāñchadbhiḥ satatam stavyāḥ stotreṇa anena vai yatas

original: śrāddheṣu ya imaṃ bhaktyā tvasmatprītikaraṃ stavam / paṭhiṣyati dvijāgryāṇāṃ bhuñjatāṃ purataḥ sthitaḥ //
analyzed: śrāddheṣu yaḥ imam bhaktyā tu asmad prīti karam stavam paṭhiṣyati dvijāgryāṇām bhuñjatām puratas sthitaḥ

original: stotraśravaṇasaṃprītyā sannidhāne pare kṛte / asmābhirakṣayaṃ śrāddhaṃ tadbhaviṣyatyasaṃśayam //
analyzed: stotra śravaṇa saṃprītyā sannidhāne pare kṛte asmābhiḥ akṣayam śrāddham tat bhaviṣyati asaṃśayam

original: yadyapyaśrotriyaṃ śrāddhaṃ yadyapyupahataṃ bhavet / anyāyopāttavittena yadi vā kṛtamanyathā //
analyzed: yadi api aśrotriyam śrāddham yadi api upahatam bhavet anyāya upātta vittena yadi vā kṛtam anyathā

original: aśrāddhārhairupatairupahāraistathā kṛtaiḥ / akāle 'pyatha vā deśe vidhihīnamathāpi vā //
analyzed: aśrāddha arhaiḥ upataiḥ upahāraiḥ tathā kṛtaiḥ akāle pi atha vā deśe vidhi hīnam atha api vā

original: aśraddhayā vā puruṣairdambhamāśritya yatkṛtam / asmākaṃ tṛptaye śrāddhantathāpyetadudīraṇāt //
analyzed: aśraddhayā vā puruṣaiḥ dambham āśritya yat kṛtam asmākam tṛptaye śrāddham tathā api etad udīraṇāt

original: yatraitatpaṭhyate śrāddhe stotramastatsukhāvaham / asmākaṃ jāyate tṛptistatra dvādaśāvarṣikī //
analyzed: yatra etat paṭhyate śrāddhe asmākam jāyate tṛptiḥ tatra dvādaśa āvarṣikī

original: hemante dvādaśābdāni tṛptimetatprayacchati / śiśire dviguṇābdāni tṛptiṃ stotramidaṃ śubham //
analyzed: hemante dvādaśa abdāni tṛptim etat prayacchati śiśire dviguṇa abdāni tṛptim stotram idam śubham

original: vasante ṣoḍaśa samāstṛptaye śrāddhakarmaṇi / grīṣme ca ṣoḍaśaivaitatpaṭhitaṃ tṛptikārakam //
analyzed: vasante ṣoḍaśa samāḥ tṛptaye śrāddha karmaṇi grīṣme ca ṣoḍaśa eva etat paṭhitam tṛpti kārakam

original: vikale 'pi kṛte śrāddhe stotreṇānena sādhite / varṣāsu tṛptirasmākamakṣayyā jāyate ruce //
analyzed: vikale pi kṛte śrāddhe stotreṇa anena sādhite varṣāsu tṛptiḥ asmākam akṣayyā jāyate ruce

original: śaratkāle 'pi paṭhitaṃ śrāddhakāle prayacchati / asmākametatpuruṣaistṛptiṃ pañcadaśābdikīm //
analyzed: śarad kāle pi paṭhitam śrāddha kāle prayacchati asmākam etat puruṣaiḥ tṛptim pañcadaśa ābdikīm

original: yasmin gehe ca likhitametattiṣṭhati nityadā / sannidhānaṃ kṛte śrāddhe tatrāsmākaṃ bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: yasmin gehe ca likhitam etat tiṣṭhati nityadā sannidhānam kṛte śrāddhe tatra asmākam bhaviṣyati

original: tasmādetattvayā śrāddhe viprāṇāṃ bhuñjatāṃ puraḥ / śrāvaṇīyaṃ mahābhāga asmākaṃ puṣṭikārakam //
analyzed: tasmāt etat tvayā śrāddhe viprāṇām bhuñjatām puras śrāvaṇīyam mahābhāga asmākam puṣṭi kārakam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rucikṛtapitṛstotraṃ nāmaikonanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe rucikṛtapitṛstotram nāma ekonanavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 90
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: mākraṇḍeya uvāca / tatastasmānnadīmadhyātsamuttasthau manoramā / pramlaucā nāma tanvaṅgī tatsamīpe varāpsarāḥ //
