analyzed: mākraṇḍeyaḥ uvāca tatas tasmāt nadī madhyāt samuttasthau manoramā pramlaucā nāma tanvaṅgī tad samīpe vara apsarāḥ

original: sā covāca mahātmānaṃ ruciṃ sumadhurākṣarakam / prasādayāmāsa bhūyaḥ pramlocā ca varāpsarāḥ //
analyzed: sā ca uvāca mahātmānam rucim su madhura akṣarakam prasādayāmāsa bhūyas pramlocā ca vara apsarāḥ

original: atīvarūpiṇī kanyā matprasādvarāṅganā / jātā varuṇaputreṇa puṣkareṇa mahātmanā //
analyzed: atīva rūpiṇī kanyā mad prasādvara aṅganā jātā varuṇa putreṇa puṣkareṇa mahātmanā

original: tāṃ gṛhāṇa mayā dattāṃ bhāryārthe varavarṇinīm / manurmahāmatistasyāṃ samutpatsyati te sutaḥ //
analyzed: tām gṛhāṇa mayā dattām bhāryā arthe varavarṇinīm manuḥ mahāmatiḥ tasyām samutpatsyati te sutaḥ

original: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca / tatheti tena sāpyuktā tasmāttoyādvapuṣmatīm / uddadhāra tataḥ kanyāṃ māninīṃ nāma nāmataḥ //
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca tathā iti tena sā api uktā tasmāt toyāt vapuṣmatīm uddadhāra tatas kanyām māninīm nāma nāmataḥ

original: nadyāśca puline tasminsa munirmunisattamāḥ / jagrāha pāṇiṃ vidhivatsamānīya mahāmuniḥ //
analyzed: nadyāḥ ca puline tasmin sa muniḥ muni sattamāḥ jagrāha pāṇim vidhivat samānīya mahā muniḥ

original: tasyāṃ tasya suto jajñe mahāvīryo mahādyutiḥ / śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 91
analyzed: tasyām tasya sutaḥ jajñe mahā vīryaḥ mahā dyutiḥ śrī garuḍa mahā purāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / svāyambhuvādyā munayo hariṃ dhyāyanti karmaṇā / vratācārārcanādhyānastutijapyaparāyaṇāḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca svāyambhuva ādyāḥ munayaḥ harim dhyāyanti karmaṇā vrata ācāra arcana dhyāna stuti japya parāyaṇāḥ

original: dehendriyamanobuddhiprāṇāhaṅkāravarjitam / ākaśena vihīnaṃ vai tejasā parivarjitam //
analyzed: deha indriya manaḥ buddhi prāṇa ahaṅkāra varjitam ākaśena vihīnam vai tejasā parivarjitam

original: udakena vihīnaṃ vai taddharmaparivarjitam / pṛthivīrahitaṃ caiva sarvabhatavivarjitam //
analyzed: udakena vihīnam vai tad dharma parivarjitam pṛthivī rahitam ca eva

original: bhūtādhyakṣaṃ tathā baddhaniyantāraṃ prabhuṃ vibhum / caitanyarūpatārūpaṃ sarvādhyakṣaṃ nirañjanam //
analyzed: bhūta adhyakṣam tathā baddha niyantāram prabhum vibhum caitanya rūpa tā rūpam sarva adhyakṣam nirañjanam

original: muktasaṅgaṃ maheśānaṃ sarvadevaprapūjitam / tejorūpamasattvaṃ ca tapasā parivarjitam //
analyzed: mukta saṅgam maheśānam sarva deva prapūjitam tejaḥ rūpam asattvam ca tapasā parivarjitam

original: rahitaṃ rajasā nityaṃ vyatiriktaṃ guṇaistribhiḥ / sarvarūpavihīnaṃ vai kartṛtvādivivarjitam //
analyzed: rahitam rajasā nityam vyatiriktam guṇaiḥ tribhiḥ sarva rūpa vihīnam vai kartṛ tva ādi vivarjitam

original: vāsanārahitaṃ śuddhaṃ sarvadoṣavivarjitam / pipāsāvarjitaṃ tattaccho kamohavivarjitam //
analyzed: vāsanā rahitam śuddham sarva doṣa vivarjitam pipāsā varjitam tat tat śo ka moha vivarjitam

original: jarāmaraṇahīnaṃ vai kūṭasthaṃ mohavarjitam / utpattirahitaṃ caiva pralayena vivarjitam //
analyzed: jarā maraṇa hīnam vai kūṭastham moha varjitam utpatti rahitam ca eva pralayena vivarjitam

original: satyaṃ sarvācārahīnaṃ niṣkalaṃ parameśvaram / jāgratsvapnasuṣuptyādivarjitaṃ nāmavarjitam //
analyzed: satyam sarva ācāra hīnam niṣkalam parameśvaram jāgrat svapna suṣupti ādi varjitam nāma varjitam

original: adhyakṣaṃ jāgradādīnāṃ śāntarūpaṃ sureśvaram / jāgradādisthitaṃ nityaṃ kāryakāraṇavarjitam //
analyzed: adhyakṣam jāgrat ādīnām śānta rūpam sureśvaram jāgrat ādi sthitam nityam kārya kāraṇa varjitam

original: sarvadṛṣṭaṃ tathā mūrtaṃ sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmataraṃ param / jñānadṛk śrotravijñānaṃ paramānandarūpakam //
analyzed: sarva dṛṣṭam tathā mūrtam sūkṣmam sūkṣmataram param jñāna dṛś śrotra vijñānam paramānanda rūpakam

original: viśvena rahitaṃ tadvattaijasena vivarjitam / prājñena rahitañcaiva turīyaṃ paramākṣaram //
analyzed: viśvena rahitam tadvat taijasena vivarjitam prājñena rahitam ca eva turīyam paramākṣaram

original: sarvagoptṛ sarvahantṛ sarvabhūtātmarūpi ca / buddhidharmavihīnaṃ vai nirādhāraṃ śivaṃ harim //
analyzed: sarva goptṛ sarva hantṛ sarva bhūtātma rūpi ca  buddhi dharma vihīnam vai nirādhāram śivam harim

original: vikriyārahitaṃ caiva vedāntairvedyameva ca / vedarūpaṃ paraṃ bhūtamindriyebhyaḥ paraṃ śubham //
analyzed: vikriyā rahitam ca eva vedāntaiḥ vedyam eva ca veda rūpam param bhūtam indriyebhyaḥ param śubham

original: śabdena varjitañcaiva rasena ca vivarjitam / sparśena rahitaṃ devaṃ rūpamātravivarjitam //
analyzed: śabdena varjitam ca eva rasena ca vivarjitam sparśena rahitam devam rūpa mātra vivarjitam

original: rūpeṇa rahitaṃ ñcaiva gandhena parivarjitam / anādi brahma randhrāntamahaṃ brahmāsmi kevalam //
analyzed: rūpeṇa rahitam gandhena parivarjitam anādi brahma randhra antam aham brahma asmi kevalam

original: evaṃ jñātvā mahādevadhyānaṃ kuryājjitendriyaḥ / dhyānaṃ yaḥ kurute hyevaṃ sa bhavedbahma mānavaḥ //
analyzed: evam jñātvā mahādeva dhyānam kuryāt jita indriyaḥ dhyānam yaḥ kurute hi evam sa mānavaḥ

original: iti dhyānaṃ samākhyātamaśvirasya mayā tava / adhunā kathayāmyanyatkintadbrūhi vṛṣadhvaja //
analyzed: iti dhyānam samākhyātam aśviḥ asya mayā tava  adhunā kathayāmi anyat kim tat brūhi vṛṣadhvaja

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe haridhyānaṃ nāmaikanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe haridhyānam nāma ekanavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 92
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: rudrauvāca / viṣṇordhyānaṃ punarbrūhi śaṅkhacakragadādhara / yena vijñātamātreṇa kṛtakṛtyo bhavennaraḥ //
analyzed: rudraḥ uvāca viṣṇoḥ dhyānam punar brūhi śaṅkha cakra gadā dhara  yena vijñāta mātreṇa kṛtakṛtyaḥ bhavet naraḥ

original: hariruvāca / pravakṣyāmi harerdhyānaṃ māyātantravimardakam / mūrtāmūrtādibhedena taddhyānaṃ dvividhaṃ hara //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca pravakṣyāmi hareḥ dhyānam māyā tantra vimardakam  mūrta amūrta ādi bhedena tat dhyānam dvividham hara

original: amūrtaṃ rudra kathitaṃ hanta mūtta bravīmyaham / sūryakoṭipratīkāśo jiṣṇurbhājiṣṇurekataḥ //
analyzed: amūrtam rudra kathitam hanta mūtta bravīmi aham sūrya koṭi pratīkāśaḥ jiṣṇuḥ bhājiṣṇuḥ ekatas

original: kundagokṣīradhavalo harirdhyeyo mumukṣubhiḥ / viśālena susaumyena śaṅkhena ca samanvitaḥ //
analyzed: kunda go kṣīra dhavalaḥ hariḥ dhyeyaḥ mumukṣubhiḥ viśālena su saumyena śaṅkhena ca samanvitaḥ

original: sahasrādityatulyena jvālāmālograrūpiṇā / cakreṇa cānvitaḥ śānto gadāhastaḥ śubhānanaḥ //
analyzed: sahasra āditya tulyena jvālā mālā ugra rūpiṇā cakreṇa ca anvitaḥ śāntaḥ gadā hastaḥ śubha ānanaḥ

original: kirīṭena mahārheṇa ratnaprajvalitena ca / sāyudhaḥ sarvago devaḥ saroruhadharastathā //
analyzed: kirīṭena mahārheṇa ratna prajvalitena ca sa āyudhaḥ sarva gaḥ devaḥ saroruha dharaḥ tathā

original: vanamālādharaḥ śubhraḥ samāṃso hemabhūṣaṇaḥ / suvastraḥ śuddhadehaśca sukarṇaḥ padmasaṃsthitaḥ //
analyzed: vanamālā dharaḥ śubhraḥ sa māṃsaḥ hema bhūṣaṇaḥ su vastraḥ śuddha dehaḥ ca su karṇaḥ padma saṃsthitaḥ

original: hiraṇmayaśarīraśca cāruhārī śubhāṅgadaḥ / keyūreṇa samāyukto vanamālāsamanvitaḥ //
analyzed: hiraṇmaya śarīraḥ ca cāru hārī śubha aṅgadaḥ keyūreṇa samāyuktaḥ vanamālā samanvitaḥ

original: śrīvatsakaustubhayuto lakṣmīvandyekṣaṇānvitaḥ / amimādiguṇairyuktaḥ sṛṣṭisaṃhārakārakaḥ //
analyzed: śrīvatsa kaustubha yutaḥ lakṣmī vandya īkṣaṇa anvitaḥ

original: munidhyeyo 'suradhyeyo devadhyeyo 'tisundaraḥ / brahmādistambaparyantabhūtajātahṛdisthitaḥ //
analyzed: sura dhyeyaḥ deva dhyeyaḥ tisundaraḥ brahma ādi stamba paryanta bhūta jāta hṛdisthitaḥ

original: sanātano 'vyayo medhyaḥ sarvānugrahakṛtprabhuḥ / nārāyaṇo mahādevaḥ sphuranmakarakuṇḍalaḥ //
analyzed: sanātanaḥ vyayaḥ medhyaḥ sarva anugraha kṛt prabhuḥ nārāyaṇaḥ mahādevaḥ sphurat makara kuṇḍalaḥ

original: santāpanāśano 'bhyarcyo maṅgalyo duṣṭanāśanaḥ / sarvātmā sarvarūpaśca sarvago grahanāśanaḥ //
analyzed: santāpa nāśanaḥ bhyarcyaḥ maṅgalyaḥ duṣṭa nāśanaḥ sarva ātmā sarva rūpaḥ ca sarva gaḥ graha nāśanaḥ

original: cārvaṅgulīyasaṃyuktaḥ sudīptanakha eva ca / śaraṇyaḥ lasukhakārī ca saumyarūpo maheśvaraḥ //
analyzed: cāru aṅgulīya saṃyuktaḥ su dīpta nakhaḥ eva ca śaraṇyaḥ ca saumya rūpaḥ maheśvaraḥ

original: sarvālaṅkārasaṃyuktaścārucandanacarcitaḥ / sarvadevasamāyuktaḥ sarvadevapriyaṅkaraḥ //
analyzed: sarva alaṅkāra saṃyuktaḥ cāru candana carcitaḥ sarva deva samāyuktaḥ sarva deva priyaṅkaraḥ

original: sarvalokahitaiṣī ca sarveśaḥ sarvabhāvanaḥ / ādityamaṇḍale saṃstho agnistho vārisaṃsthitaḥ //
analyzed: sarva loka hita eṣī ca sarva īśaḥ sarva bhāvanaḥ āditya maṇḍale saṃsthaḥ agni sthaḥ vāri saṃsthitaḥ

original: vāsudevo jagaddhātā dhyeyo viṣṇurmumukṣubhiḥ / vāsudevo 'hamasmīti ātmā dhyeyo harihariḥ //
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ jagat dhātā dhyeyaḥ viṣṇuḥ mumukṣubhiḥ vāsudevaḥ ham asmi iti ātmā dhyeyaḥ hari hariḥ

original: dhyāyantyevaṃ ca ye viṣṇuṃ te yānti paramāṃ gatim / yājñavalkyaḥ purā hyevaṃ dhyātvā viṣṇuṃ sureśvaram //
analyzed: dhyāyanti evam ca ye viṣṇum te yānti paramām gatim  yājñavalkyaḥ purā hi evam dhyātvā viṣṇum sureśvaram

original: dharmopadeśakartṛtvaṃ saṃprāpyāgātparaṃ padam / tasmāttvamapi deveśa / viṣṇuṃ cintaya śaṅkara / //
analyzed: dharma upadeśa kartṛ tvam saṃprāpya agāt param padam  tasmāt tvam api deveśa viṣṇum cintaya śaṅkara

original: viṣṇudhyānaṃ paṭhedyastu prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim //
analyzed: viṣṇudhyānam paṭhet yaḥ tu prāpnoti paramām gatim

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇudhyānaṃ nāma dvinavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣṇudhyānam nāma dvinavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 93
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: maheśvara uvāca / yājñavalkyena yatpūrvaṃ dharmaṃ proktaṃ kayaṃ hare / / tanme kāthaya keśighna / yathā tattvena mādhava / //
analyzed: maheśvaraḥ uvāca yājñavalkyena yat pūrvam dharmam proktam hare   tat me kāthaya keśi ghna yathā tattvena mādhava  /

original: hariruvāca / yājñavalkyaṃ namaskṛtya mithilāyāṃ samāsthitam / apṛcchannṝṣayo gatvā varṇadharmādyaśeṣataḥ / tebhyaḥ sa kathayāmāsa viṣṇuṃ dhyātvā jitendriyaḥ //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca yājñavalkyam namaskṛtya mithilāyām samāsthitam  apṛcchan ṛṣayaḥ gatvā varṇa dharma ādi aśeṣatas tebhyaḥ sa kathayāmāsa viṣṇum dhyātvā jita indriyaḥ

original: yājñavalkya uvāca / yasmindeśe mṛgaḥ kṛṣṇastasmindharmānnibodhata / purāṇanyāyamīmāṃsādharmaśāstrāṅgamiśritāḥ //
analyzed: yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca yasmin deśe mṛgaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ tasmin dharmān nibodhata purāṇa nyāya mīmāṃsā dharma śāstra aṅga miśritāḥ

original: vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānāṃ dharmasya ca caturdaśa / vaktāro dharmaśāstrāṇāṃ manurviṣṇuryamo 'ṅgirāḥ //
analyzed: vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānām dharmasya ca caturdaśa vaktāraḥ dharma śāstrāṇām manuḥ viṣṇuḥ yamaḥ ṅgirāḥ

original: vasiṣṭhadakṣasaṃvartaśātātapaparāśarāḥ / āpastambośanovyāsāḥ kātyāyanabṛhaspatī //
analyzed: vasiṣṭha dakṣa saṃvarta śātātapa parāśarāḥ āpastamba uśanaḥ vyāsāḥ kātyāyana bṛhaspatī

original: gautamaḥ śaṅkhalikhito hārīto 'trirahaṃ tathā / ete viṣṇuṃ samārādhya jātā dharmopadeśakāḥ //
analyzed: gautamaḥ śaṅkhalikhitaḥ hārīto tris aham tathā ete viṣṇum samārādhya jātāḥ dharma upadeśakāḥ

original: deśakāla upāyena dravyaṃ śraddhāsamanvitam / pātre pradīyate yattatsakalaṃ dharmalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: deśa kāle upāyena dravyam śraddhā samanvitam pātre pradīyate yat tat sakalam dharma lakṣaṇam

original: ijyācāro damo 'hiṃsā dānaṃ svādhyāyakarma ca / ayaṃ ca paramo dharmo yadyogenātmadarśanam //
analyzed: ijyā ācāraḥ damaḥ hiṃsā dānam svādhyāya karma ca  ayam ca paramaḥ dharmaḥ yat yogena ātma darśanam

original: catvāro vedadharmajñāḥ parṣattraividyameva vā / sā brūte yatsvadharmaḥ syādeko vādhyātmavittamaḥ //
analyzed: catvāraḥ veda dharma jñāḥ parṣad traividyam eva vā sā brūte yat svadharmaḥ syāt ekaḥ vā adhyātma vittamaḥ

original: brahmakṣāttriyaviṭśūdrā varṇāstvādyāstrayo dvijāḥ / niṣekādyāḥ śmaśānāntāsteṣāṃ vai mantrataḥ kriyāḥ //
analyzed: brahma kṣāttriya viś śūdrāḥ varṇāḥ tu ādyāḥ trayaḥ dvijāḥ niṣeka ādyāḥ śmaśāna antāḥ teṣām vai mantrataḥ kriyāḥ

original: garbhādhānamṛtau puṃsaḥ savanaṃ spandanātpurā / ṣaṣṭhe 'ṣṭame vā sīmantaḥ prasave jātakarma ca //
analyzed: garbhādhānam ṛtau puṃsaḥ savanam spandanāt purā ṣaṣṭhe ṣṭame vā sīmantaḥ prasave jātakarma ca

original: ahanyekādaśe nāma caturthe māsi niṣkramaḥ / ṣaṣṭhe 'nnaprāśanaṃ māsi cūḍāṃ kuryādyathākulam //
analyzed: ahani ekādaśe nāma caturthe māsi niṣkramaḥ ṣaṣṭhe nnaprāśanam māsi cūḍām kuryāt yathā kulam

original: evamenaḥ śamaṃ yāti bījagarbhasamudbhavam / tūṣṇa īmetāḥ kriyāḥ strīṇāṃ vivāhaśca samantrakaḥ //
analyzed: evam enaḥ śamam yāti bīja garbha samudbhavam tūṣṇe īm etāḥ kriyāḥ strīṇām vivāhaḥ ca sa mantrakaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavarṇadharṃmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma trinavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavarṇadharṃmanirūpaṇam nāma trinavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 94
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: yājñavalkya uvāca / garbhāṣṭame 'ṣṭame vābde brāhmaṇasyopanāyanam / rajñāmekādaśe saike viśāmeke yathākulam //
analyzed: yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca garbha aṣṭame ṣṭame vā abde brāhmaṇasya upanāyanam   /

original: upanīya kuruḥ śiṣyaṃ mahāvyāhṛtipūrvakam / vedamadhyāpayedenaṃ śaucācārāṃśca śikṣayet //
analyzed: upanīya kuruḥ śiṣyam mahā vyāhṛti pūrvakam vedam adhyāpayet enam śauca ācārān ca śikṣayet

original: divā sandhyāsu karṇasthabrahmasūtra udaḍmukhaḥ / kuryānmūtrapurīṣe tu rātrau ceddakṣiṇāmukhaḥ //
analyzed: divā sandhyāsu karṇa stha brahmasūtraḥ udak mukhaḥ kuryāt mūtra purīṣe tu rātrau ced dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ

original: gṛhītaśiśraścotthāya mṛdbhirabhyuddhṛtairjalaiḥ / gandhalepakṣayakaraṃ śaucaṃ kuryānmahāvrataḥ //
analyzed: gṛhīta śiśraḥ ca utthāya mṛdbhiḥ abhyuddhṛtaiḥ jalaiḥ gandha lepa kṣaya karam śaucam kuryāt mahā vrataḥ

original: antarjānuḥ śucau deśa upaviṣṭa udaṅmukhaḥ / prāgvā brāhmeṇa tīrthena dvijo nityamupaspṛśet //
analyzed: antar jānuḥ śucau deśe upaviṣṭaḥ udak mukhaḥ prāk vā brāhmeṇa tīrthena dvijaḥ nityam upaspṛśet

original: kaniṣṭhādeśinyaṅguṣṭhamūlānyagraṃ karasya ca / prajāpatipitṛbrahmadevatīrthānyanukramāt //
analyzed: kaniṣṭhā deśinī aṅguṣṭha mūlāni agram karasya ca prajāpati pitṛ brahma deva tīrthāni anukramāt

original: triḥ prāśyāpo dvirunmṛjya khānyādbhiḥ samupaspṛśet / adbhistu prakṛtisthābhirhenābhiḥ phenabuhudaiḥ //
analyzed: tris prāśya apaḥ dvis unmṛjya khāni ā adbhiḥ samupaspṛśet adbhiḥ tu prakṛti sthābhiḥ henābhiḥ phena buhudaiḥ

original: hṛtkaṇṭhatālugābhistu yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dvijātayaḥ / śudhyeraṃstrī ca śūdraśca sakṛtspṛṣṭābhirantataḥ //
analyzed: hṛd kaṇṭha tālu gābhiḥ tu yathāsaṃkhyam dvijātayaḥ śudhyeran strī ca śūdraḥ ca sakṛt spṛṣṭābhiḥ antatas

original: snānamabdaivatairmantrairmārjanaṃ prāṇasaṃyamaḥ / sūryasya cāpyupasthānaṃ gāyattrayāḥ pratyayaṃ japaḥ //
analyzed: snānam ap daivataiḥ mantraiḥ mārjanam prāṇasaṃyamaḥ sūryasya ca api upasthānam gāyatrayāḥ pratyayam japaḥ

original: gāyattrīṃ śirasā sārdhaṃ japedvyāhṛtipūrvikām / pratipraṇavasaṃyuktāṃ trirayaṃ prāṇasaṃyamaḥ //
analyzed: gāyattrīm śirasā sārdham japet vyāhṛti pūrvikām prati praṇava saṃyuktām tris ayam prāṇasaṃyamaḥ

original: prāṇānāyamya samprokṣya tryṛcenābdaivatena tu / japannāsīta sāvittrīṃ pratyagātārakodayāt //
analyzed: prāṇān āyamya samprokṣya tryṛcena ap daivatena tu japan āsīta sāvittrīm

original: sandhyāṃ prāk prātarevaṃ hi tiṣṭhedāsūryadarśanāt / agnikāryaṃ tataḥ kuryātsandhyayorubhayorapi //
analyzed: sandhyām prāk prātar evam hi tiṣṭhet ā sūrya darśanāt  agni kāryam tatas kuryāt sandhyayoḥ ubhayoḥ api

original: tato 'bhivādayedvṛdvānasāvahamiti bruvan / guruṃ caivāpyupāsīta svādhyāyārthaṃ samāhitaḥ //
analyzed: tatas bhivādayet vṛdvān asau aham iti bruvan gurum ca eva api upāsīta svādhyāya artham samāhitaḥ

original: sāhūtaścāpyadhīyīta sarvaṃ cāsmai nivedayet / hitaṃ tasyācarennityaṃ manovākrāyakarmabhiḥ //
analyzed: sa āhūtaḥ ca api adhīyīta sarvam ca asmai nivedayet hitam tasya ācaret nityam manaḥ vāc rāya karmabhiḥ

original: daṇḍājinopavītāni mekhalāṃ caiva dhārayet / brāhmaṇeṣu caredbhaikṣamanindyeṣvātmavṛttaye //
analyzed: daṇḍa ajina upavītāni mekhalām ca eva dhārayet brāhmaṇeṣu caret bhaikṣam anindyeṣu ātma vṛttaye

original: ādimadhyāvasāneṣu bhavecchandopalakṣitā / brāhmaṇakṣattriyaviśāṃ bhaikṣacaryā yathākramam //
analyzed: ādi madhya avasāneṣu bhavet chanda upalakṣitā brāhmaṇa kṣattriya viśām bhaikṣa caryā yathākramam

original: kṛtāgnikāryo bhuñjīta vinīto gurvanujñayā / āpośānakriyāpūrvaṃ satkṛtyānnamakutsayan //
analyzed: kṛta agni kāryaḥ bhuñjīta vinītaḥ guru anujñayā āpośāna kriyā pūrvam satkṛtya annam akutsayan

original: brahmacāryāsthito naikamannamadyādanāpadi / brāhmaṇaḥ kāmamaśrīyācchrāddhe vratamapaḍiyan //
analyzed: brahmacārī āsthitaḥ na ekam annam adyāt anāpadi brāhmaṇaḥ kāmam aśrīyāt śrāddhe vratam apaḍiyan

original: madhu māṃsaṃ tathā svinnamityādi parivarjayet / sa gururyaḥ kriyāḥ kṛtvā vedamasmai prayacchati //
analyzed: madhu māṃsam tathā svinnam ityādi parivarjayet sa guruḥ yaḥ kriyāḥ kṛtvā vedam asmai prayacchati

original: upanīya dadātyenāmācāryaḥ sa prakīrtitaḥ / ekadeśamupādhyāya ṛtvigyajñakṛducyate //
analyzed: upanīya dadāti enām ācāryaḥ sa prakīrtitaḥ eka deśam upādhyāyaḥ ṛtvijaḥ yajña kṛt ucyate

original: ete mānyā yathāpūrvamebhyo mātā garīyasī / prativedaṃ brahmacaryaṃ dvādaśābdāni pañca vā //
analyzed: ete mānyāḥ yathāpūrvam ebhyaḥ mātā garīyasī prativedam brahmacaryam dvādaśa abdāni pañca vā

original: grahaṇāntikamityeke keśāntaścaiva ṣoḍaśe / āṣoḍaśā'dvāviṃśāccācaturviṃśācca vatsarāt //
analyzed: grahaṇa antikam iti eke keśāntaḥ ca eva ṣoḍaśe ā ṣoḍaśāt vā ā viṃśāt ca ā caturviṃśāt ca vatsarāt

original: brahmakṣattraviśāṃ kāla aupanāyanikaḥ paraḥ / ata ūrdhvaṃ patantyete sarvadharmavivarjitāḥ //
analyzed: brahma kṣattra viśām kālaḥ aupanāyanikaḥ paraḥ atas ūrdhvam patanti ete sarva dharma vivarjitāḥ

original: sāvitrīpatitā vrātyā vrātyastomādṛte kratoḥ / māturyadagre jāyante dvitīyaṃ mauñjabandhanam //
analyzed: sāvitrīpatitāḥ vrātyāḥ vrātyastomāt ṛte kratoḥ mātuḥ yat agre jāyante dvitīyam mauñjabandhanam

original: brāhmaṇakṣattriya viśastasmādete dvijātayaḥ / yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ caiva śubhānāṃ caiva karmaṇām //
analyzed: brāhmaṇa kṣattriya viśaḥ tasmāt ete dvijātayaḥ yajñānām tapasām ca eva śubhānām ca eva karmaṇām

original: veda eva dvijātīnāṃ niḥ śreyasakaraḥ paraḥ / madhunā payasā caiva sa devāṃstarpayeddvijaḥ //
analyzed: vedaḥ eva dvijātīnām niḥ śreyasa karaḥ paraḥ madhunā payasā ca eva sa devān tarpayet dvijaḥ

original: pitṝnmadhughṛtābhyāṃ ca ṛco 'dhīte hi so 'nvaham / yajuḥ sāma paṭhettadvadatharvāṅgirasaṃ dvijaḥ //
analyzed: pitṝn madhu ghṛtābhyām ca ṛcaḥ dhīte hi saḥ nu aham yajuḥ sāma paṭhet tadvat atharvāṅgirasam dvijaḥ

original: santarpayetpitṝndevānso 'nvahaṃ hi ghṛtāmṛtaiḥ / vākovākyaṃ purāṇaṃ ca nārāśaṃsīśca gāthikāḥ //
analyzed: santarpayet pitṝn devān saḥ nu aham hi ghṛta amṛtaiḥ vākovākyam purāṇam ca nārāśaṃsīḥ ca gāthikāḥ

original: itihāsāṃstathā vidyā yo 'dhīte śaktito 'nvaham / santarpayetpitṝndevānmāṃsakṣīrodanādibhiḥ //
analyzed: itihāsān tathā vidyāḥ yaḥ dhīte śaktitaḥ nu aham santarpayet pitṝn devān māṃsa kṣīra odana ādibhiḥ

original: te tṛptāstarpayantyenaṃ sarvakāmaphalaiḥ śubhaiḥ / yaṃyaṃ kratumadhītesau tasyasyāpnuyātphalam //
analyzed: te tṛptāḥ tarpayanti enam sarva kāma phalaiḥ śubhaiḥ yam yam kratum adhīte asau tasya asya āpnuyāt phalam

original: bhūmidānasya tapasaḥ svādhyāyaphalabhāgdvijaḥ / neṣṭhiko brahmacārī tu vasedācāryasannidhau //
analyzed: bhūmi dānasya tapasaḥ svādhyāya phala bhāj dvijaḥ neṣṭhikaḥ brahmacārī tu vaset ācārya sannidhau

original: tadabhāve 'sya tanaye patnyāṃ vaiśvānare 'pi vā / anena vidhinā dehe sādhayedvijitendriyaḥ / brahmalokamavāpnoti na ceha jāyate punaḥ //
analyzed: tad abhāve tanaye patnyām vaiśvānare vā anena vidhinā dehe sādhayet vijita indriyaḥ brahma lokam avāpnoti na ca iha jāyate punar

original: ita śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavarṇadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturnavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavarṇadharmanirūpaṇam nāma caturnavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 95
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: yājñavalkya uvāca / śṛṇvantu munayo dharmān gṛhasthasya yatavratāḥ / gurave ca dhanaṃ dattvā snātvā ca tadanujñayā //
analyzed: yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca  śṛṇvantu munayaḥ dharmān gṛhasthasya yata vratāḥ gurave ca dhanam dattvā snātvā ca tad anujñayā

original: samāpitabrahmacaryo lakṣaṇyāṃ striyamudvahet / ananyapūrvikāṃ kāntāmasapiṇḍāṃ yavīyasīm //
analyzed: samāpita brahmacaryaḥ lakṣaṇyām striyam udvahet ananya pūrvikām kāntām asapiṇḍām yavīyasīm

original: arogiṇīṃ bhrātṛmatīmasamānārṣagotrajām / pañcamātsaptamādūrdhvaṃ mātṛtaḥ pitṛtastathā //
analyzed: arogiṇīm bhrātṛmatīm asamāna ārṣa gotra jām pañcamāt saptamāt ūrdhvam mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ tathā

original: daśapūruṣavikhyātācchrotriyāṇāṃ mahākulāt / savarṇaḥ śrotriyo vidvānvaro doṣānvito na ca //
analyzed: daśa pūruṣa vikhyātāt śrotriyāṇām mahā kulāt savarṇaḥ śrotriyaḥ vidvān varaḥ doṣa anvitaḥ na ca

original: yaducyate dvijātīnāṃ śūdrāddāropasaṃgrahaḥ / na tanmama mataṃ yasmāttatrāyaṃ jāyate svayam //
analyzed: yat ucyate dvijātīnām śūdrāt dāra upasaṃgrahaḥ na tat mama matam yasmāt tatra ayam jāyate svayam

original: tisro varṇānupūrvyeṇa dve tathaikā yathākramam / brāhmaṇakṣattriyaviśāṃ bhāryāḥ svā śūdrajanmanaḥ //
analyzed: tisraḥ varṇa ānupūrvyeṇa dve tathā ekā yathākramam brāhmaṇa kṣattriya viśām bhāryāḥ svā śūdrajanmanaḥ

original: brāhmo vivāha āhūya dīyate śaktyalaṅkṛtā / tajjaḥ punātyubhayataḥ puruṣonekaviṃśatim //
analyzed: brāhmaḥ vivāhaḥ āhūya dīyate śakti alaṅkṛtā tad jaḥ punāti ubhayatas puruṣaḥ ekaviṃśatim

original: yajñasthāyartvije daivamādāyārṣastu goyugam / caturdaśa prathamajaḥ punātyuttarajaśca ṣaṭū //
analyzed: yajña sthāya ṛtvije daivam ādāya ārṣaḥ tu go yugam caturdaśa prathama jaḥ punāti uttara jaḥ ca ṣaṭū

original: ityuktvā caratāṃ dharmaṃ saha yā dīyate 'rthine / sa kāyaḥ pāvayettajjaḥ ṣaḍvaṃśyānātmanā saha //
analyzed: iti uktvā caratām dharmam saha yā dīyate rthine sa kāyaḥ pāvayet tad jaḥ ṣaṭ vaṃśyān ātmanā saha

original: āsuro draviṇādānādgāndharvaḥ samayānmithaḥ / rākṣaso yuddhaharaṇātpaiśācaḥ kanyakācchalāt //
analyzed: āsuraḥ draviṇa ādānāt gāndharvaḥ samayāt mithas rākṣasaḥ yuddha haraṇāt paiśācaḥ kanyakā chalāt

original: catvāro brāhmaṇasyādyāstathā gāndharvarākṣasau / rājñastathāsuro vaiśye śūdre cāntyastu garhitaḥ //
analyzed: catvāraḥ brāhmaṇasya ādyāḥ tathā gāndharva rākṣasau rājñaḥ tathā āsuraḥ vaiśye śūdre ca antyaḥ tu garhitaḥ

original: pāṇirgrāhyaḥ savarṇāsu gṛhṇīta kṣattriyā śaram / vaiśyā pratodamādadyādvedane cāgrajanmanaḥ //
analyzed: pāṇiḥ grāhyaḥ savarṇāsu gṛhṇīta kṣattriyā śaram  vaiśyā pratodam ādadyāt vedane ca agrajanmanaḥ

original: pitā pitāmaho bhrātā sakulyo jananī tathā / kanyāpradaḥ pūrvanāśe prakṛtīsthaḥ paraḥ paraḥ //
analyzed: pitā pitāmahaḥ bhrātā sakulyaḥ jananī tathā kanyā pradaḥ pūrva nāśe prakṛtī sthaḥ paraḥ paraḥ

original: aprayacchansamāpnoti bhrūṇahatyāmṛtāvṛtau / eṣāmabhāve dātṝṇāṃ kanyā kuryāt svayaṃvaram //
analyzed: aprayacchān samāpnoti bhrūṇa hatyām ṛtau ṛtau  eṣām abhāve dātṝṇām kanyā kuryāt svayaṃvaram

original: sakṛtpradīyate kanyā haraṃstāṃ coradaṇḍabhāk / aduṣṭāṃ hi tyajandaṇḍyaḥ suduṣṭāṃ tu parityajet //
analyzed: sakṛt pradīyate kanyā haran tām cora daṇḍa bhāj  aduṣṭām hi tyajan daṇḍyaḥ su duṣṭām tu parityajet

original: aputrā gubapujñāto devaraḥ putrakānyagā / sapiṇḍo vā samotro vā ghṛtābhyakta ṛtāviyāt //
analyzed: aputrā devaraḥ sapiṇḍaḥ vā sama ūtraḥ vā ghṛta abhyaktaḥ ṛtau iyāt

original: āgarbhasambhavaṃ gacchetpatitastvanyathā bhavet / anena vidhinā jāta kṣetrapasya bhavetsutaḥ //
analyzed: ā garbha sambhavam gacchet patitaḥ tu anyathā bhavet  anena vidhinā jāta kṣetrapasya bhavet sutaḥ

original: hṛtādhikārāṃ malināṃ piṇḍamātropasevinīm / paribhūtāmadhaḥ śayyāṃ vāsayedyvabhicāriṇīm //
analyzed: hṛta adhikārām malinām piṇḍa mātra upasevinīm paribhūtām adhas śayyām vāsayet yvabhicāriṇīm

original: somaḥ śaucaṃ dadau tāsāṃ gandharvaśca subhāṃ giram / pāvakaḥ sarvamedhyatvaṃ medhyā vai yoṣito yataḥ //
analyzed: somaḥ śaucam dadau tāsām gandharvaḥ ca subhām giram pāvakaḥ sarva medhya tvam medhyāḥ vai yoṣitaḥ yatas

original: vyabhicārādṛtauśuddhirgarbhetyāgaṃ karoti ca / garbhabhartṛvadhe tāsāṃ tathā mahati pātake //
analyzed: vyabhicārāt ṛtau śuddhiḥ garbhetyāgam karoti ca garbha bhartṛ vadhe tāsām tathā mahati pātake

original: surāpi vyādhitā dveṣṭrī vandhyārthaghnyapriyaṃvadā / adhivinnā ca bhartavyā mahadenonyathā bhavet //
analyzed: vyādhitā dveṣṭrī vandhyā artha ghnī apriyaṃvadā adhivinnā ca bhartavyā mahat enāḥ nyathā bhavet

original: yatrāvirodho dampatyostrivargastattra vardhate / mṛte jīvati yā patyau yā nānyamupagacchati //
analyzed: yatra avirodhaḥ dampatyoḥ trivargaḥ tattra vardhate mṛte jīvati yā patyau yā na anyam upagacchati

original: seha kīrtimavāpnoti modate comayā saha / śuddhāṃ tyajaṃstṛtīyāṃśaṃ dadyādāmaraṇaṃ striyāḥ //
analyzed: sā iha kīrtim avāpnoti modate ca umayā saha śuddhām tyajan tṛtīya aṃśam dadyāt āmaraṇam striyāḥ

original: strībhirbharturvacaḥ kāryameṣa dharmaḥ paraḥ striyāḥ / ṣoḍaśartuniśāḥ strīṇāṃ tāsu yugmāsu saṃviśet //
analyzed: strībhiḥ bhartuḥ vacaḥ kāryam eṣa dharmaḥ paraḥ striyāḥ ṣoḍaśa ṛtu niśāḥ strīṇām tāsu yugmāsu saṃviśet

original: brahmacārī ca parvāṇyādyāśtatastrastu varjayet / evaṃ gacchaṃ striyaṃ kṣāmāṃ maghāṃ mūlāṃ ca varjayet //
analyzed: brahmacārī ca parvāṇi ādyāḥ tatas traḥ tu varjayet evam gaccham striyam kṣāmām maghām mūlām ca varjayet

original: lakṣaṇyaṃ janayedeva putraṃ rogavivarjitam / yathā kāmī bhavedvāpi strīṇāṃ (sma)
analyzed: lakṣaṇyam janayet eva putram roga vivarjitam yathā kāmī bhavet vā api strīṇām sma

original: valamanusmaran //
analyzed: valam anusmaran

original: svadāranirataścaiva striyo rakṣyā yatastataḥ / bhartṛbhrātṛpitṛjñātiśvaśrūśvaśuradevaraiḥ //
analyzed: sva dāra nirataḥ ca eva striyaḥ rakṣyāḥ yatas tatas bhartṛ bhrātṛ pitṛ jñāti śvaśrū śvaśura devaraiḥ

original: bandhubhiśca striyaḥ pūjyā bhūṣaṇācchādanāśanaiḥ / saṃyato paskarā dakṣā hṛṣṭā vyayaparāṅmukhī //
analyzed: bandhubhiḥ ca striyaḥ pūjyāḥ bhūṣaṇa ācchādana aśanaiḥ saṃyatā u paskarā dakṣā hṛṣṭā vyaya parāṅmukhī

original: śvaśrūśvaśurayoḥ kuryātpādayorvandanaṃ sadā / krīḍāśarīrasaṃskārasamājotsavadaśanam //
analyzed: śvaśrū śvaśurayoḥ kuryāt pādayoḥ vandanam sadā krīḍā śarīra saṃskāra samāja utsava daśanam

original: hāsyaṃ paragṛhe yānaṃ tyajetpreṣitabhartṛkā / rakṣetkanyāṃ pitā bālye yauvane patireva tām //
analyzed: hāsyam para gṛhe yānam tyajet preṣita bhartṛkā  rakṣet kanyām pitā bālye yauvane patiḥ eva tām

original: vārdhakye rakṣate putro hyanyathā jñātayastathā / patiṃ vinā na tiṣṭhettu divā vā yadi vā niśi //
analyzed: vārdhakye rakṣate putraḥ hi anyathā jñātayaḥ tathā patim vinā na tiṣṭhet tu divā vā yadi vā niśi

original: jyeṣṭhāṃ dharmavidhau kuryānna kaniṣṭhāṃ kadācana / dāhayedagnihotreṇa striyaṃ vṛttavatīṃ patiḥ //
analyzed: jyeṣṭhām dharma vidhau kuryāt na kaniṣṭhām kadācana  dāhayet agni hotreṇa striyam vṛttavatīm patiḥ

original: āharedvidhivaddārānagniṃ caivāvilambitaḥ / hitā bharturdivaṃ gacchediha kīrtīravāpya ca //
analyzed: āharet vidhivat dārān agnim ca eva avilambitaḥ hitā bhartuḥ divam gacchet iha kīrtīḥ avāpya ca

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktagṛhalthadharmanirṇayo nāma pañcanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktagṛhalthadharmanirṇayaḥ nāma pañcanavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrāgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 96
analyzed: śrā garuḍa mahā purāṇam

original: yājñavalkya uvāca / vakṣye saṅkarajātyādigṛhasthādi vidhiṃ param / viprānmūrdhāvaṣikto hi kṣāttriyāyāṃ viśaḥ striyām //
analyzed: yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca vakṣye saṅkara jāti ādi gṛhastha ādi vidhim param viprāt mūrdhāvasiktaḥ hi kṣāttriyāyām viśaḥ striyām

original: jāto 'mbaṣṭhastu śūdrāyāṃ niṣādaḥ parvato 'pi vā / māhiṣyaḥ kṣattriyājjāto vaiśyāyāṃ mlecchasaṃjñitaḥ //
analyzed: jātaḥ mbaṣṭhaḥ tu śūdrāyām niṣādaḥ vā  / kṣattriyāt jātaḥ vaiśyāyām mleccha saṃjñitaḥ

original: śūdrāyāṃ karaṇo vaiśyādvinnāsveṣa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ / brāhmaṇyāṃ kṣattriyātsūto vaiśyādvaidehakastathā //
analyzed: śūdrāyām karaṇaḥ vaiśyāt vinnāsu eṣa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ brāhmaṇyām kṣattriyāt sūtaḥ vaiśyāt vaidehakaḥ tathā

original: śūdrājjātastu cāṇḍālaḥ sarvavarṇavigarhitaḥ / kṣattriyā māgadhaṃ vaiśyācchūdrā kṣattārameva ca //
analyzed: śūdrāt jātaḥ tu cāṇḍālaḥ sarva varṇa vigarhitaḥ kṣattriyā māgadham vaiśyāt śūdrā kṣattāram eva ca

original: śūdrādayogavaṃ vaiśyā janayāmāsa vai sutam / māhiṣyeṇa karaṇyāṃ tu rathakāraḥ prajāyate //
analyzed: śūdrāt ayogavam vaiśyā janayāmāsa vai sutam māhiṣyeṇa karaṇyām tu rathakāraḥ prajāyate

original: asatsantastu vai jñeyāḥ pratilomānulomajāḥ / jātyutkarṣāddvijo jñeyaḥ saptame pañcame 'pi vā //
analyzed: asat santaḥ tu vai jñeyāḥ pratiloma anuloma jāḥ jāti utkarṣāt dvijaḥ jñeyaḥ saptame pañcame vā

original: vyatyaye karmaṇāṃ sāmyaṃ pūrvavaccottarāvaram / karma smārtaṃ vivāhāgnau kurvīta pratyahaṃ gṛhī //
analyzed: vyatyaye karmaṇām sāmyam pūrvavat ca uttara avaram karma smārtam vivāha agnau kurvīta pratyaham gṛhī

original: dāyakālādṛte vāpi śrautaṃ vaitānikāgniṣu / śarīracintāṃ nirvartya kṛtaśaucavidhirdvijaḥ //
analyzed: dāya kālāt ṛte vā api śrautam vaitānika agniṣu śarīra cintām nirvartya kṛta śauca vidhiḥ dvijaḥ

original: prātaḥ sandhyāmupāsīta dantadhāvanapūrvakam / hutvāgnau saryadevatyāñjapenmantrānsamāhitaḥ //
analyzed: prātar sandhyām upāsīta danta dhāvana pūrvakam  hutvā agnau sarya devatyān japet mantrān samāhitaḥ

original: vedārthānadhigacchecca śāstrāṇi vividhāni ca / yogakṣomādisiddhyarthamupeyādīśvaraṃ gṛhī //
analyzed: veda arthān adhigacchet ca śāstrāṇi vividhāni ca yogakṣoma ādi siddhi artham upeyāt īśvaram gṛhī

original: snātvā devānpitṝṃścaiva tarpayedarcayettathā / vedānatha purāṇāni setihāsāni śaktitaḥ //
analyzed: snātvā devān pitṝn ca eva tarpayet arcayet tathā vedān atha purāṇāni sa itihāsāni śaktitaḥ

original: japayajñānusiddhyarthaṃ vidyāṃ cādhyātmikīṃ japet / balikarmasvadhāhomasvādhyāyātithisakriyāḥ //
analyzed: japa yajña anu siddhi artham vidyām ca ādhyātmikīm japet bali karma svadhā homa svādhyāya atithi sakriyāḥ

original: bhūtapitramarabrahmamanuṣyāṇāṃ mahāmakhāḥ / devebhyastu hutaṃ cāgnau kṣipedbhūtabaliṃ haret //
analyzed: bhūta pitṛ amara brahma manuṣyāṇām mahā makhāḥ devebhyaḥ tu hutam ca agnau kṣipet bhūta balim haret

original: annaṃ bhūmauśvacāṇḍālavāyasebhyaśca niḥ kṣipet / annaṃ pitṛmanuṣyebhyo deyamapyanvahaṃ jalam //
analyzed: annam bhūmi auśva cāṇḍāla vāyasebhyaḥ ca niḥ kṣipet annam pitṛ manuṣyebhyaḥ deyam api anvaham jalam

original: svādhyāyamanvahaṃ kuryānna paceccānnamātmane / bālasvavāsinīvṛddhagarbhiṇyāturakanyakāḥ //
analyzed: svādhyāyam anvaham kuryāt na pacet ca annam ātmane bāla svavāsinī vṛddha garbhiṇī ātura kanyakāḥ

original: saṃbhojyātithibhṛtyāṃśca dampatyoḥ śeṣabhojanam / prāṇāgnihotravidhināśrīyādannamakutsayan //
analyzed: saṃbhojya atithi bhṛtyān ca dampatyoḥ śeṣa bhojanam prāṇa agnihotra vidhinā āśrīyāt annam akutsayan

original: mitaṃ vipākaṃ ca hitaṃ bhakṣyaṃ bālādipūrvakam / āpośānenopariṣṭādadhastāccaiva bhujyate //
analyzed: mitam vipākam ca hitam bhakṣyam bāla ādi pūrvakam āpośānena upariṣṭāt adhastāt ca eva bhujyate

original: anagnamamṛtaṃ caiva kāryamannaṃ dvijanmanā / atithibhyastu varṇebhyo deyaṃ śaktyānupūrvaśaḥ //
analyzed: anagnam amṛtam ca eva kāryam annam dvijanmanā atithibhyaḥ tu varṇebhyaḥ deyam śaktyā anupūrvaśas

original: apraṇodyo 'tithiḥ sāyamapi nātra vicāraṇā / satkṛtya bhikṣave bhikṣā dātavyā suvratāya ca //
analyzed: apraṇodyaḥ tithiḥ sāyam api na atra vicāraṇā satkṛtya bhikṣave bhikṣā dātavyā suvratāya ca

original: āgatān bhojayetsarvānmahokṣaṃ śrotriyāya ca / pratisaṃvatsaraṃ tvarcyāḥ snātakācāryapārthivāḥ //
analyzed: āgatān bhojayet sarvān mahā ukṣam śrotriyāya ca  pratisaṃvatsaram tu arcyāḥ snātaka ācārya pārthivāḥ

original: priyo vivāhyaśca tathā yajñaṃ pratyṛrtvijaḥ punaḥ / adhvanīno 'tithiḥ proktaḥ śrotriyo vedapāragaḥ //
analyzed: priyaḥ vivāhyaḥ ca tathā yajñam punar tithiḥ proktaḥ śrotriyaḥ vedapāragaḥ

original: mānyāvetau gṛhasthasya brahmalokamabhīpsataḥ / parapākarucirna syādanindyāmantraṇādṛte //
analyzed: mānyau etau gṛhasthasya brahma lokam abhīpsataḥ para pāka ruciḥ na syāt anindya āmantraṇāt ṛte

original: vākpāṇipādacāpalyaṃ varjayaccātibhojanam / śrotriyaṃ vātithiṃ tṛptamāsīmāntādanuvrajet //
analyzed: vāc pāṇi pāda cāpalyam varjayat ca ati bhojanam śrotriyam vā atithim tṛptam ā sīmāntāt anuvrajet

original: ahaḥ śeṣaṃ sahāsīta śiṣṭairiṣṭaiśca bandhubhiḥ / upāsya paścimāṃ sandhyāṃ hutvāgnau bhojanaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: ahar śeṣam saha āsīta śiṣṭaiḥ iṣṭaiḥ ca bandhubhiḥ  upāsya paścimām sandhyām hutvā agnau bhojanam tatas

original: kuryādbhatyaiḥ samāyuktaiścintayedātmano hitam / brāhme muhūrte cotthāya mānyo vipro dhanādibhiḥ //
analyzed: kuryāt bhatyaiḥ samāyuktaiḥ cintayet ātmanaḥ hitam  brāhme muhūrte ca utthāya mānyaḥ vipraḥ dhana ādibhiḥ

original: vṛddhārtānāṃ samādeyaḥ panthā vai bhāravāhinām / ijyādhyayanadānāni vaiśyasya kṣattriyasya ca //
analyzed: vṛddha ārtānām samādeyaḥ panthāḥ vai bhāra vāhinām ijyā adhyayana dānāni vaiśyasya kṣattriyasya ca

original: pratigraho 'dhiko vipre yājanādhyāpane tathā / pradhānaṃ kṣattriye karma prajānāṃ paripālanam //
analyzed: pratigrahaḥ dhikaḥ vipre yājana adhyāpane tathā pradhānam kṣattriye karma prajānām paripālanam

original: kusīdakṛṣivāṇijyaṃ pāśupālyaṃ viśaḥ smṛtam / śūdrasya dvijaśuśrūṣā dvijo yajñānna hāpayet //
analyzed: kusīda kṛṣi vāṇijyam pāśupālyam viśaḥ smṛtam śūdrasya dvija śuśrūṣā dvijaḥ yajñāt na hāpayet

original: ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ śaucamindriyasaṃyamaḥ / damaḥ kṣamārjavaṃ dānaṃ sarveṣāṃ dharmasādhanam //
analyzed: ahiṃsā satyam asteyam śaucam indriya saṃyamaḥ damaḥ kṣamā ārjavam dānam sarveṣām dharma sādhanam

original: ācaretsadṛśīṃ vṛttimajihmāmaśaṭhāntathā / traivārṣikā dhikānno yaḥ sa somaṃ pātumarhati //
analyzed: ācaret sadṛśīm vṛttim a jihmām a śaṭhān tathā traivārṣikāḥ dhika annaḥ yaḥ sa somam pātum arhati

original: syādannaṃ vārṣikaṃ yasya kuryātprakasaumikīṃ kriyām / pratisaṃvatsaraṃ somaḥ paśuḥ pratyayanaṃ tathā //
analyzed: syāt annam vārṣikam yasya kuryāt kriyām pratisaṃvatsaram somaḥ paśuḥ pratyayanam tathā

original: kartavyā'grahaṇeṣṭiśca cāturmāsyāni yatnataḥ / eṣāmasambhave kuryādiṣṭiṃ vaiśvānarīṃ dvijaḥ //
analyzed: kartavyā a grahaṇa iṣṭiḥ ca cāturmāsyāni yatnataḥ eṣām asambhave kuryāt iṣṭim vaiśvānarīm dvijaḥ

original: hīnakalpaṃ na kurvīta sati dravye phalapradam / caṇḍālo jāyate yajñakaraṇācchūdrabhikṣitāta //
analyzed: hīna kalpam na kurvīta sati dravye phala pradam  caṇḍālaḥ jāyate yajña karaṇāt śūdra bhikṣitāta

original: yajñārthalabdhaṃ nādadyādbhāsaḥ kāko 'pi vā bhavet / kusūtakumbhīdhānyo vā tryāhikaḥ śvastano 'pi vā //
analyzed: yajña artha labdham na ādadyāt bhāsaḥ vā bhavet

original: jīvedvāpi śiloñchena śreyāneṣāṃ paraḥ paraḥ / na svādhyāyavirodhyarthamīheta na yatastataḥ //
analyzed: jīvet vā api śilā uñchena śreyān eṣām paraḥ paraḥ na svādhyāya virodhi artham īheta na yatas tatas

original: rājāntevāsiyājyebhyaḥ sīdanniccheddhanaṃ kṣudhā / dambhahaitukapāṣaṇḍibakavṛttīṃśca varjayet //
analyzed: rāja antevāsi yājyebhyaḥ sīdan icchet dhanam kṣudhā dambha haituka pāṣaṇḍi bakavṛttīn ca varjayet

original: śuklāmbaradharo nīcakeśaśmaśrunakhaḥ śuciḥ / na bhāryādarśane 'śrīyānnaikavāsā na saṃsthitaḥ //
analyzed: śukla ambara dharaḥ nīca keśa śmaśru nakhaḥ śuciḥ na bhāryā darśane śrīyāt na eka vāsāḥ na saṃsthitaḥ

original: apriyaṃ na vadejjātu brahmasūtrī vinītavān / devapradakṣiṇāṅkuryādyaṣṭimānsakamaṇḍaluḥ //
analyzed: apriyam na vadet jātu brahmasūtrī vinītavān  deva pradakṣiṇām kuryāt yaṣṭimān sa kamaṇḍaluḥ

original: na tu mehennadīcchāyābhasmagoṣṭāmbuvartmasu / na pratyagnyarkagosomasandhyāmbustrīdvijanmanām //
analyzed: na tu mehet nadī chāyā bhasma goṣṭa ambu vartmasu na prati agni arka go soma sandhyā ambu strī dvijanmanām

original: nekṣetāgnyarkanagnāṃ strīṃ na ca saṃsṛṣṭamaithunām / na ca mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ vā svapetpratyakūśirā na ca //
analyzed: na īkṣeta agni arka nagnām strīm na ca saṃsṛṣṭa maithunām na ca mūtram purīṣam vā svapet pratyakū śirāḥ na ca

original: ṣṭīvanāsṛkśakṛnmūtraviṣāṇyapsu na saṃkṣipet / pādau pratāpayennāgnau na cainamabhilaṅghayet //
analyzed: ṣṭīvana asṛj śakṛt mūtra viṣāṇi apsu na saṃkṣipet pādau pratāpayet na agnau na ca enam abhilaṅghayet

original: pibennāñjalinā toyaṃ na śayānaṃ prabodhayet / nākṣaiḥ krījecca kitavairvyādhitaiśca na saṃviśet //
analyzed: pibet na añjalinā toyam na śayānam prabodhayet na akṣaiḥ kitavaiḥ vyādhitaiḥ ca na saṃviśet

original: viruddhaṃ varjayetkama pretadhūmaṃ nadītaram / keśabhasmatuṣāṅgārakapāleṣu ca saṃsthitim //
analyzed: viruddham varjayet kama pretadhūmam nadī taram keśa bhasma tuṣa aṅgāra kapāleṣu ca saṃsthitim

original: nācakṣīta dhayantīṃ gāṃ nādvāreṇāviśetkracit / na rājñaḥ pratigṛhṇāyāllubdhasyocchāstravartinaḥ //
analyzed: na ācakṣīta dhayantīm gām na advāreṇa āviśet kracid na rājñaḥ pratigṛhṇāyāt lubdhasya ucchāstra vartinaḥ

original: adhyāyānāmupākarma śrāvaṇyāṃ śravaṇena vā / hastenauṣadhibhāve vā pañcamyāṃ śrāvaṇasya ca //
analyzed: adhyāyānām upākarma śrāvaṇyām śravaṇena vā hastena oṣadhi bhāve vā pañcamyām śrāvaṇasya ca

original: pauṣamāsasya rohiṇyāmaṣṭakāyāmathāpi vā / jalānte chandasāṃ kuryādutsargaṃ vidhivadvahiḥ //
analyzed: pauṣa māsasya rohiṇyām aṣṭakāyām atha api vā jala ante chandasām kuryāt utsargam vidhivat vahis

original: anadhyāyastryahaṃ prete śiṣyartviggurubandhuṣu / upākarmaṇi cotsarge svaśākhaśrotriye mṛte //
analyzed: anadhyāyaḥ tri aham prete upākarmaṇi ca utsarge sva śākhā śrotriye mṛte

original: sandhyāgarjitanirghātabhūkampolkānipātane / samāpya vedaṃ dyuniśamāraṇyakamadhītya ca //
analyzed: sandhyā garjita nirghāta bhūkampa ulkā nipātane samāpya vedam dyuniśam āraṇyakam adhītya ca

original: pañcadaśyāṃ caturdaśyāmaṣṭamyāṃ rāhusūtake / ṛtusandhiṣu bhuktvā vā śrāddhikaṃ pratigṛhya ca //
analyzed: pañcadaśyām caturdaśyām aṣṭamyām rāhusūtake ṛtu sandhiṣu bhuktvā vā śrāddhikam pratigṛhya ca

original: paśumaṇḍūkanakulaśvāhimārjārasūkaraiḥ / kṛte 'ntare tvahorātraṃ śakrapāte tathocchraye //
analyzed: paśu maṇḍūka nakula śva ahi mārjāra sūkaraiḥ kṛte ntare tu ahorātram śakrapāte tathā ucchraye

original: śvakroṣṭugardabholūkasāmabāṇārtaniḥ svane / amedhyaśavaśūdrāntyaśmaśānapatitāntike //
analyzed: śva kroṣṭu gardabha ulūka sāma bāṇa ārtaniḥ svane amedhya śava śūdra antya śmaśāna patita antike

original: deśe 'śucāvātmani ca vidyutstanitasaṃplave / bhuktvārdrapāṇirambho 'ntarardharātre 'timārute //
analyzed: deśe śucau ātmani ca vidyut stanita saṃplave bhuktvā ārdra pāṇiḥ ambhaḥ ntar ardharātre timārute

original: digdāhe pāṃsuvarṣeṣu sandhyānī hārabhītiṣu / dhāvataḥ pūtigandhe ca śiṣṭe ca gṛhamāgate //
analyzed: digdāhe pāṃsu varṣeṣu sandhyānī hāra bhītiṣu dhāvataḥ pūti gandhe ca śiṣṭe ca gṛham āgate

original: kharoṣṭrayānahastyaśvanauvṛkṣagirirohaṇe / saptatriṃśadanadhyāyānetāṃstātkālikānviduḥ //
analyzed: khara uṣṭra yāna hasti aśva nau vṛkṣa giri rohaṇe saptatriṃśat anadhyāyān etān tātkālikān viduḥ

original: vedadiṣṭaṃ tathācāryaṃ rājacchāyāṃ parastriyam / nākrāmedraktaviṇmūtraṣṭhīvanodvartanāni ca //
analyzed: veda diṣṭam tathā ācāryam rāja chāyām para striyam na ākrāmet rakta viṣ mūtra ṣṭhīvana udvartanāni ca

original: viprāhikṣattriyātmāno nāvajñeyāḥ kadācana / dūrāducchiṣṭaviṇmūtrapādāmbhāṃsi samutsṛjet //
analyzed: vipra ahi kṣattriya ātmānaḥ na avajñeyāḥ kadācana dūrāt ucchiṣṭa viṣ mūtra pāda ambhāṃsi samutsṛjet

original: śrutismṛtyuktamācāraṃ kuryānmarmaṇi na spṛśet / na nindātāḍane kuryātsutaṃ śiṣyaṃ ca tāḍayet //
analyzed: śruti smṛti uktam ācāram kuryāt marmaṇi na spṛśet  na nindā tāḍane kuryāt sutam śiṣyam ca tāḍayet

original: ācaretsarvadā dharmaṃ tadviruddhaṃ tu nācaret / mātāpitratithībhyāḍhyairvivādaṃ nācaredgṛhī //
analyzed: ācaret sarvadā dharmam tad viruddham tu na ācaret mātā pitṛ atithi ibhya āḍhyaiḥ vivādam na ācaret gṛhī

original: pañca piṇḍānanuddhṛtya na snāyātparavāriṣu / snāyānnadīprastravaṇadevakhātahradeṣu ca //
analyzed: pañca piṇḍān an uddhṛtya na snāyāt para vāriṣu snāyāt nadī prastravaṇa devakhāta hradeṣu ca

original: varjayetparaśayyādi na cāśrīyādanāpadi / kadaryabaddhaco (vai)
analyzed: varjayet para śayyā ādi na ca āśrīyāt anāpadi kadarya baddhacaḥ vai

original: rāṇāṃ tathā cānamnikasya ca //
analyzed: rāṇām tathā ca anamnikasya ca

original: vaiṇābhiśastavārdhuṣyagaṇikāgaṇadīkṣiṇām / cikitsakāturakruddhaklībaraṅgopajīvinām //
analyzed: vaiṇa abhiśasta vārdhuṣya gaṇikā gaṇadīkṣiṇām cikitsaka ātura kruddha klība raṅga upajīvinām

original: krūrograpatitavrātyadāmbhikocchiṣṭabhojinām / śāstravikrayiṇaścaiva strījitagrāmayājinām //
analyzed: krūra ugra patita vrātya dāmbhika ucchiṣṭa bhojinām śāstra vikrayiṇaḥ ca eva strī jita grāma yājinām

original: nṛśaṃsarājarajakakṛtaghnavadhajīvinām / piśunānṛtinoścaiva somavikrayiṇastathā //
analyzed: nṛśaṃsa rāja rajaka kṛtaghna vadhajīvinām piśuna anṛtinoḥ ca eva soma vikrayiṇaḥ tathā

original: bandināṃ svarṇakārāṇāmannameṣāṃ kadācana / na bhoktavyaṃ vṛthā māṃsaṃ keśakīṭasamanvitam //
analyzed: bandinām svarṇakārāṇām annam eṣām kadācana  na bhoktavyam vṛthā māṃsam keśa kīṭa samanvitam

original: bhaktaṃ paryuṣitocchiṣṭaṃ śvaspṛṣṭaṃ patito (te) kṣitam / udakyāspṛṣṭasaṃghuṣṭamaparyāptaṃ ca varjayet //
analyzed: bhaktam paryuṣita ucchiṣṭam śva spṛṣṭam te kṣitam udakyā spṛṣṭa saṃghuṣṭam aparyāptam ca varjayet

original: ghoghrātaṃ śakunocchiṣṭaṃ pādaspṛṣṭa ca kāmataḥ / śūdreṣu dāsagopālakulamitrārdhasīriṇaḥ //
analyzed: śakuna ucchiṣṭam pāda spṛṣṭa ca kāmataḥ śūdreṣu dāsa gopāla kula mitra ardhasīriṇaḥ

original: bhojyānno nāpitaścaiva yaścātmānaṃ nivedayet / annaṃ paryuṣitaṃ bhojyaṃ snehāktaṃ cirasaṃbhṛ (sthi) tam //
analyzed: bhojya annaḥ nāpitaḥ ca eva yaḥ ca ātmānam nivedayet annam paryuṣitam bhojyam sneha aktam cira saṃbhṛ sthi

original: asnehā api ghodhūmayavagorasavikriyāḥ / auṣṭramaikaśaphaṃ strīṇāṃ payaśca parivarjayet //
analyzed: asnehāḥ api ghodhūma yava gorasa vikriyāḥ auṣṭram aikaśapham strīṇām payaḥ ca parivarjayet

original: kravyādapakṣidātyūhaśukamāṃsāni varjayet / sārasaikaśaphānhaṃsānbalākabakaṭiṭṭibhān //
analyzed: kravyāda pakṣi dātyūha śuka māṃsāni varjayet sārasa ekaśaphān haṃsān balāka baka ṭiṭṭibhān

original: vṛthā kṛsarasaṃyāva pāyasāpūpaśaṣkulīḥ / kuraraṃ jālapādaṃ ca khañjarīṭamṛgadvijān //
analyzed: vṛthā kṛsara saṃyāva pāyasa apūpa śaṣkulīḥ kuraram jālapādam ca khañjarīṭa mṛga dvijān

original: cāṣānmatsyātraktapādañcagddhvā vai kāmato naraḥ / ballūraṃ kāmato jagddhvā sopa vāsastryahaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: vai kāmataḥ naraḥ ballūram kāmataḥ jagddhvā saḥ upa vāsaḥ tri aham bhavet

original: palāṇḍulaśunādīni jagddhvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret / śrāddhe devānpitṝnprārcya khādanmāṃsaṃ na doṣabhāk //
analyzed: palāṇḍu laśuna ādīni jagddhvā cāndrāyaṇam caret  śrāddhe devān pitṝn prārcya khādat māṃsam na doṣa bhāj

original: vasetsa narake ghora dināni paśuromataḥ / saṃmitāni durācāro yo hantyavidhinā paśūn / māṃsaṃ santyajya saṃprārthya kāmānyāti tato harim //
analyzed: vaset sa narake ghora dināni paśu romataḥ saṃmitāni durācāraḥ yaḥ hanti avidhinā paśūn māṃsam santyajya saṃprārthya kāmān yāti tatas harim

original: iti śrīgāruje mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktaśrāddhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṇṇavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruje mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktaśrāddhanirūpaṇam nāma ṣaṇṇavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 97
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: yājñavalkya uvāca / dravyaśuddhiṃpravakṣyāmi tannibodhata sattamāḥ / sauvarṇarājatābjānāṃ śaṅkharajjvādicarmaṇām //
analyzed: yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca dravya śuddhim pravakṣyāmi tat nibodhata sattamāḥ sauvarṇa rājata ap jānām śaṅkha rajju ādi carmaṇām

original: pātrāṇāṃ cāsanānāṃ ca vāriṇā śuddhiriṣyate / uṣṇavābhaḥ strukstruvayordhānyādeḥ prokṣaṇena ca //
analyzed: pātrāṇām ca āsanānām ca vāriṇā śuddhiḥ iṣyate struc struvayoḥ dhānya ādeḥ prokṣaṇena ca

original: takṣaṇāddāruśṛṅgāderyajñapātrasya mārjanāt / soṣṇairudakagomūtraiḥ śudhyatyāvikakauśikam //
analyzed: takṣaṇāt dāru śṛṅga ādeḥ yajña pātrasya mārjanāt sa uṣṇaiḥ udaka go mūtraiḥ śudhyati āvika kauśikam

original: bhaikṣyaṃ yoṣinmukhaṃ paśyanpunaḥ pākānmahīmayam / gāghnāte 'nne tathā keśamakṣikākīṭadūṣite //
analyzed: bhaikṣyam yoṣit mukham paśyan punar pākāt mahī mayam  gā ghnāte nne tathā keśa makṣikā kīṭa dūṣite

original: bhasmakṣepādviśuddhiḥ syādbhūśuddhirmājanādinā / trapusīsakatāmrāṇāṃ kṣārāmlodakavāribhiḥ //
analyzed: bhasma kṣepāt viśuddhiḥ syāt bhū śuddhiḥ mājana ādinā trapu sīsaka tāmrāṇām kṣāra amla udaka vāribhiḥ

original: bhasmādbhirlohakāṃsyānāmajñātaṃ ca sadā śuci / amedhyāktasya mṛttoyairgandhalepāpakarṣaṇāt //
analyzed: bhasma adbhiḥ loha kāṃsyānām ajñātam ca sadā śuci amedhya aktasya mṛd toyaiḥ gandha lepa apakarṣaṇāt

original: śuci gotṛptidaṃ toyaṃ prakṛtisthaṃ mahīgatam / tathā māṃsaṃ śvacāṇḍālakravyādādinipātitam //
analyzed: śuci go tṛpti dam toyam prakṛti stham mahī gatam tathā māṃsam śva cāṇḍāla kravyāda ādi nipātitam

original: raśmiragnī rajaśchāyā gauraśvo vasudhānilāḥ / aśvājavipruṣo medhyā stathācamanabindavaḥ //
analyzed: raśmiḥ agniḥ rajaḥ chāyā gauḥ aśvaḥ vasudhā anilāḥ aśva aja vipruṣaḥ medhyāḥ stathā ācamana bindavaḥ

original: snātvā pītvā kṣute supte bhuktvā rathyāprasarpaṇe / ācāntaḥ punarācāmedvāso 'nyatparidhāya ca //
analyzed: snātvā pītvā kṣute supte bhuktvā rathyā prasarpaṇe ācāntaḥ punar ācāmet vāsaḥ ca

original: kṣute niṣṭhīvite svāpe paridhāne 'śrupātane / pañcasveteṣu nācāmeddakṣiṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ spṛśet / tiṣṭhantyagnyādayo devā viprakarṇe tu dakṣiṇe //
analyzed: kṣute niṣṭhīvite svāpe paridhāne śru pātane  pañcasu eteṣu na ācāmet dakṣiṇam śravaṇam spṛśet  tiṣṭhanti agni ādayaḥ devāḥ vipra karṇe tu dakṣiṇe

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktadravyaśuddhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktadravyaśuddhinirūpaṇam nāma saptanavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 98
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: yājñavalkya uvāca / atha dānividhiṃ vakṣye tanme śṛṇuta suvratāḥ / anyebhyo brāhmaṇāḥ śreṣṭhāstebhyaścaiva kriyāparāḥ //
analyzed: yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca atha dāni vidhim vakṣye tat me śṛṇuta suvratāḥ anyebhyaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ tebhyaḥ ca eva kriyā parāḥ

original: brahmavettā ca tebhyo 'pi pātraṃ vidyāttapo 'nvitāḥ (tam) / gobhūdhānyahiraṇyādi pātre dātavyamarcitam //
analyzed: brahma vettā ca pātram vidyāt tapaḥ nvitāḥ tam go bhū dhānya hiraṇya ādi pātre dātavyam arcitam

original: vidyātapobhyāṃ hīnena na tu grāhyaḥ pratigrahaḥ / gṛhṇanpradātāramadho nayatyātmānameva ca //
analyzed: vidyā tapobhyām hīnena na tu grāhyaḥ pratigrahaḥ gṛhṇan pradātāram adhas nayati ātmānam eva ca

original: dātavyaṃ pratyahaṃ pātre nimitteṣu viśeṣataḥ / yācitenāpi dātavyaṃ śraddhāpūtaṃ tu śaktitaḥ //
analyzed: dātavyam pratyaham pātre nimitteṣu viśeṣataḥ yācitena api dātavyam śraddhā pūtam tu śaktitaḥ

original: hemaśṛṅgī śaphaiḥ raupyaiḥ śuśīlā vastrasaṃyutā / sakāṃsyāpātrā dātavya kṣīriṇī gauḥ sadakṣiṇā //
analyzed: hema śṛṅgī śaphaiḥ raupyaiḥ śuśīlā vastra saṃyutā kṣīriṇī gauḥ sa dakṣiṇā

original: daśasauvarṇikaṃ śṛṅgaṃ śaphaṃ saptapalaiḥ kṛtam / pañcāśatpalikaṃ pātraṃ kāṃsyaṃ vatsasya kīrtyate //
analyzed: daśa sauvarṇikam śṛṅgam śapham sapta palaiḥ kṛtam pañcāśat palikam pātram kāṃsyam vatsasya kīrtyate

original: svarṇapippalapātreṇa vatso vā vatsikāpi vā / asyā api ca dātavyamapatyaṃ rogavarjitam //
analyzed: svarṇa pippala pātreṇa vatsaḥ vā vatsikā api vā asyāḥ api ca dātavyam apatyam roga varjitam

original: dātā svargamavāpnoti vatsarānromasaṃmitān / kaṣilā cetārayet bhūyaścāsaptamaṃ kulam //
analyzed: dātā svargam avāpnoti vatsarān roma saṃmitān kaṣilā ced itārayet bhūyas ca āsaptamam kulam

original: yāvadvatsasya dvau pādau mukhaṃ yonyāṃ pradṛśyate / tāvadgauḥ pṛthivī jñeyā yāvadgarbhaṃ na muñcati //
analyzed: yāvat vatsasya dvau pādau mukham yonyām pradṛśyate tāvat gauḥ pṛthivī jñeyā yāvat garbham na muñcati

original: yathā kathañciddattvā gāndhenuṃ vādhenumeva vā / arogāmaparikliṣṭāṃ dātā svarge mahīyate //
analyzed: yathā kathañcid dattvā vā adhenum eva vā arogām aparikliṣṭām dātā svarge mahīyate

original: śrāntasaṃvāhanaṃ rogiparicaryā surārcanam / pādaśaucaṃ dvijocchiṣṭamārjanaṃ gāpradānavat //
analyzed: śrānta saṃvāhanam rogi paricaryā sura arcanam pāda śaucam dvija ucchiṣṭa mārjanam gā pradāna vat

original: dvijāya yadabhīṣṭaṃ tu dattvā svargamavāpnuyāt / bhūdīpāṃścānnavastrāṇi sarpirdattvā vrajecchiyam //
analyzed: dvijāya yat abhīṣṭam tu dattvā svargam avāpnuyāt bhū dīpān ca anna vastrāṇi sarpiḥ dattvā

original: gṛhadhānyacchatramālyavṛkṣayā naghṛtaṃ jalam / śayyānulepanaṃ dattvā svargaloke mahīyate //
analyzed: gṛha dhānya chatra mālya vṛkṣayā na ghṛtam jalam śayyā anulepanam dattvā svarga loke mahīyate

original: brahmadātā brahmalokaṃ prāpnoti suradurlabham / vedārthayajñaśāstrāṇi dharmaśāstrāṇi caiva hi //
analyzed: brahma dātā brahma lokam prāpnoti sura durlabham veda artha yajña śāstrāṇi dharma śāstrāṇi ca eva hi

original: mūlyenāpi likhitvāpi brahmalokamavāpnuyāt / etanmūlaṃ jagadyasmādasṛjatpūrvamīśvaraḥ //
analyzed: mūlyena api likhitvā api brahma lokam avāpnuyāt  etat mūlam jagat yasmāt asṛjat pūrvam īśvaraḥ

original: tasmātsarvaprayatnena kāryo vedārthasaṃgrahaḥ / itihāsapurāṇaṃ vā likhitvā yaḥ prayacchati //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena kāryaḥ veda artha saṃgrahaḥ itihāsa purāṇam vā likhitvā yaḥ prayacchati

original: brahmadānasamaṃ puṇyaṃ prāpnoti dviguṇonnatim / lokāyataṃ kutarkaśca prākṛtamlecchabhāṣitam //
analyzed: brahma dāna samam puṇyam prāpnoti dviguṇa unnatim  lokāyatam kutarkaḥ ca prākṛta mleccha bhāṣitam

original: na śrotavyaṃ dvijenaitadadho nayati taṃ dvijam / samartho yo na gṛhṇīyāddātṛlokānavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: na śrotavyam dvijena etat adhas nayati tam dvijam samarthaḥ yaḥ na gṛhṇīyāt dātṛ lokān avāpnuyāt

original: kuśāḥ śākaṃ payo gandhāḥ pratyākhyeyā na vāri ca / ayacitāhṛtaṃ grāhyamapi duṣkṛtakarmaṇaḥ //
analyzed: kuśāḥ śākam payaḥ gandhāḥ pratyākhyeyāḥ na vāri ca a yacita āhṛtam grāhyam api duṣkṛta karmaṇaḥ

original: anyatra kulaṭāṣaṇḍhapatitebhyo dviṣastathā / devātithyarcanakṛte pitṛtṛptyarthameva ca / sarvataḥ pratigṛhṇīyādātmatṛpsarthameva ca //
analyzed: anyatra kulaṭā ṣaṇḍha patitebhyaḥ dviṣaḥ tathā deva atithi arcana kṛte pitṛ tṛpti artham eva ca sarvatas pratigṛhṇīyāt ātma tṛps artham eva ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktadānadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktadānadharmanirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭanavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 99
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: yājñavalkya uvāca / atha śrāddhavidhiṃ vakṣye sarvapāpapraṇāśanam / amāvasyāṣṭakāvṛddhikṛṣṇapakṣāyanadvayam //
analyzed: yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca atha śrāddha vidhim vakṣye sarva pāpa praṇāśanam amāvasyā aṣṭakā vṛddhi kṛṣṇa pakṣa ayana dvayam

original: dravyaṃ brāhmaṇasampattirviṣuvatsūryasaṃkramaḥ / vyatīpāto gajacchāyā grahaṇaṃ candrasūryayoḥ //
analyzed: dravyam brāhmaṇa sampattiḥ viṣuvat sūrya saṃkramaḥ vyatīpātaḥ gajacchāyā grahaṇam candra sūryayoḥ

original: śrāddhaṃ pratiruciścaiva śrāddhakālāḥ prakīrtitāḥ / agniyaḥ sarvadeveṣu śrotriyo vedavidyuvā //
analyzed: śrāddham pratiruciḥ ca eva śrāddha kālāḥ prakīrtitāḥ sarva deveṣu śrotriyaḥ veda vid yuvā

original: vedārthavijjyeṣṭhasāmā trimadhustrisuparṇikaḥ / svastrīya ṛtvigajāmātāyajyaśvaśuramātulāḥ //
analyzed: veda artha vid jyeṣṭha sāmā trimadhuḥ tri suparṇikaḥ svastrīyaḥ ṛtvij a jāmātā āyajya śvaśura mātulāḥ

original: triṇāciketadauhitraśiṣyasambandhibāndhavāḥ / karmaniṣṭhāstaponiṣṭhāḥ pañcāgnibrahmacāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: triṇāciketa dauhitra śiṣya sambandhi bāndhavāḥ karma niṣṭhāḥ tapaḥ niṣṭhāḥ pañca agni brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: pitṛmātṛparāścaiva brāhmaṇāḥ śrāddhadevatāḥ / rogī hīnātiriktāṅgaḥ kāṇaḥ paunarbhavastathā //
analyzed: pitṛ mātṛ parāḥ ca eva brāhmaṇāḥ śrāddha devatāḥ rogī hīna atirikta aṅgaḥ kāṇaḥ paunarbhavaḥ tathā

original: avakīrṇyāda yo ye ca ye cācāravivarjitāḥ / avaiṣṇavāśca te sarve na śrāddhārhāḥ kadācana //
analyzed: avakīrṇī āda yaḥ ye ca ye ca ācāra vivarjitāḥ avaiṣṇavāḥ ca te sarve na śrāddha arhāḥ kadācana

original: nimantrayecca pūrvedyurdvijairbhāvyaṃ ca saṃyataiḥ / ājāntāṃścaiva pūrvāhnehyāsaneṣūpaveśayet //
analyzed: nimantrayet ca pūrvedyus dvijaiḥ bhāvyam ca saṃyataiḥ āja antān ca eva pūrvāhne ihi āsaneṣu upaveśayet

original: yugmāndeve tathā pitrye svapradeśeṣu śaktitaḥ / dvau daiva prāgudak pitrye trīṇyekaṃ cobhayoḥ pṛthak //
analyzed: yugmān deve tathā pitrye sva pradeśeṣu śaktitaḥ dvau prāc udak pitrye trīṇi ekam ca ubhayoḥ pṛthak

original: mātāmahānāmapyevaṃ tantraṃ vā vaiśvadevikam / hastaprakṣālanaṃ dattvā viṣṭarārthe kuśānapi //
analyzed: mātāmahānām api evam tantram vā vaiśvadevikam hasta prakṣālanam dattvā viṣṭara arthe kuśān api

original: āvāhya tadanujñāto viśvadevāsaityṛcā / yavairannaṃ vikīryātha bhājane sapavitrake //
analyzed: āvāhya tad anujñātaḥ yavaiḥ annam vikīrya atha bhājane sa pavitrake

original: śannodevyā payaḥ kṣiptvā yavo 'sīti yavāṃstathā / yādivyā iti mantreṇa hasteṣveva viniḥ kṣipet //
analyzed: śannodevyā payaḥ kṣiptvā sīti yavān tathā iti mantreṇa hasteṣu eva viniḥ kṣipet

original: gandhodake tathā dīpamālyadāmapradīpakam / apasavyaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā pitṝṇāmapradakṣiṇam //
analyzed: gandha udake tathā dīpa mālya dāma pradīpakam  apasavyam tatas kṛtvā pitṝṇām apradakṣiṇam

original: dviguṇāṃstu kuśāndattvā uśantastvetyṛcā pitṝn / āvāhya tadanu jñāto japedāyantunastataḥ //
analyzed: dviguṇān tu kuśān dattvā uśantaḥ tvā iti ṛcā pitṝn  āvāhya tadanu jñātaḥ japet āyantunaḥ tatas

original: yavārthastu tilaiḥ kāryaḥ kuryādarghyādi pūrvavat / dattvārghyaṃ saṃstravāṃsteṣāṃ pātre kṛtvā vidhānataḥ //
analyzed: yava arthaḥ tu tilaiḥ kāryaḥ kuryāt arghya ādi pūrvavat  dattvā arghyam saṃstravān teṣām pātre kṛtvā vidhānataḥ

original: pitṛbhyaḥ sthānamasīti nyubjaṃ pātraṃ karotyadhaḥ / agnau kariṣya ādāya pṛcchatyannaṃ ghṛplutam //
analyzed: pitṛbhyaḥ sthānam asi iti nyubjam pātram karoti adhas agnau kariṣye ādāya pṛcchati annam ghṛ plutam

original: kuruṣveti tathoktosau hutvāgnau pitṛyajñavat / hutaśeṣaṃ pradadyācca bhājaneṣu samāhitaḥ //
analyzed: kuruṣva iti tathā uktā usau hutvā agnau pitṛ yajña vat huta śeṣam pradadyāt ca bhājaneṣu samāhitaḥ

original: yathālābhopapanneṣu raupyeṣu ca viśeṣataḥ / dattvānnaṃ pṛthivīpātramiti pātrābhimantraṇam //
analyzed: yathā lābha upapanneṣu raupyeṣu ca viśeṣataḥ dattvā annam pṛthivī pātram iti pātra abhimantraṇam

original: kṛtve daṃviṣṇurityevaṃ dvijāṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet / savyāhṛtiṃ ca gāyattrīṃ madhuvātetyṛcastathā //
analyzed: kṛtve daṃviṣṇuḥ iti evam dvija aṅguṣṭham niveśayet sa vyāhṛtim ca gāyattrīm madhuvāta iti ṛcaḥ tathā

original: japtvā yathāsukhaṃ vācyaṃ bhuñjīraṃste 'pi vāgyatāḥ / annamiṣṭaṃ haviṣyaṃ ca dadyādakrodhanotvaraḥ //
analyzed: japtvā yathāsukham vācyam bhuñjīran te vāgyatāḥ annam iṣṭam haviṣyam ca dadyāt

original: ātṛptestu pavitrāṇi japtvā pūrvajapaṃ tathā / annamādāya tṛptāḥ sthaḥ śeṣaṃ caivānumantrya ca //
analyzed: ātṛpteḥ tu pavitrāṇi japtvā pūrva japam tathā annam ādāya tṛptāḥ sthaḥ śeṣam ca eva anumantrya ca

original: tadannaṃ vikiredbhūmau dadyāccāpaḥ sakṛtsakṛt / sarvamannamupādāya satilaṃ dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ //
analyzed: tat annam vikiret bhūmau dadyāt ca apaḥ sakṛt sakṛt sarvam annam upādāya sa tilam dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ

original: ucchiṣṭasannidhau piṇḍānpradadyātpitṛyajñavat / mātāmahānāmapyavaṃ dadyādācamanaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: ucchiṣṭa sannidhau piṇḍān pradadyāt pitṛ yajña vat  mātāmahānām api avam dadyāt ācamanam tatas

original: svasti vācyaṃ tato dadyādakṣayyodakameva ca / dattvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā svadhākāramudāharet //
analyzed: svasti vācyam tatas dadyāt akṣayya udakam eva ca  dattvā ca dakṣiṇām śaktyā svadhākāram udāharet

original: vācyatāminyanujñātaḥ pitṛbhyaśca svadhocyatām / viprairastu svadhetyukto bhūmau siñcettato jalam //
analyzed: vācyatāminī anujñātaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ ca svadhā ucyatām  vipraiḥ astu svadhā iti uktaḥ bhūmau siñcet tatas jalam

original: prīyantāmiti cāhaivaṃ viśvedevyaṃ jalaṃ dadat / dātāro no 'bhivardhantāṃ vedāḥ santatireva ca //
analyzed: prīyantām iti ca āha evam viśvedevyam jalam dadat  dātāraḥ naḥ bhivardhantām vedāḥ santatiḥ eva ca

original: śraddhā ca no mā vyagamadvahu deyaṃ ca no 'stviti / ityutkrotkrā priyā vācaḥ praṇipatya visarjayet //
analyzed: śraddhā ca naḥ mā vyagamat vahu deyam ca naḥ stu iti iti utkrā utkrā priyāḥ vācaḥ praṇipatya visarjayet

original: vājevāje iti prītyā pitṛpūrvaṃ visarjanam / yasmiṃste saṃstravāḥ pūrvamarghyapātre nipātitāḥ //
analyzed: vājevāje iti prītyā pitṛ pūrvam visarjanam yasmin te saṃstravāḥ pūrvam arghya pātre nipātitāḥ

original: pitṛpātraṃ taduttānaṃ kṛtvā viprānvisarjayet / pradakṣiṇamanuvrajya bhuñjīta pitṛsevitam //
analyzed: pitṛpātram tat uttānam kṛtvā viprān visarjayet pradakṣiṇam anuvrajya bhuñjīta pitṛ sevitam

original: brahmacārī bhavettāṃ tu rajanīṃ bhāryayā maha / evaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā vṛddhau nāndīmukhānapi //
analyzed: brahmacārī bhavet tām tu rajanīm bhāryayā maha evam pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā vṛddhau nāndīmukhān api

original: yajettadadhikarkandhūmiśrāḥ piṇḍā yaivaḥ śritāḥ / ekoddiṣṭaṃ daivahīnaṃ ekānnaikapavitrakam //
analyzed: yajet tad adhi karkandhū miśrāḥ piṇḍāḥ śritāḥ ekoddiṣṭam daiva hīnam eka anna eka pavitrakam

original: āvāhanāgnaukaraṇarahitaṃ tvapasavyavat / upatiṣṭhatāmityakṣayyasthāne viprānvisarjayet //
analyzed: āvāhana agnaukaraṇa rahitam tu apasavyavat upatiṣṭhatām iti akṣayya sthāne viprān visarjayet

original: abhiraṇyatāṃ prabūyād bruyustebhiratāḥ sma ha / gandho dakatilairmiśraṃ kuryātpātracatuṣṭayam //
analyzed: sma ha

original: arghyārthaṃ pitṛpātreṣu pretapātraṃ prasecayet / yesamānā iti dvābhyāṃ śeṣaṃ pūrvavadācaret //
analyzed: arghya artham pitṛpātreṣu pretapātram prasecayet iti dvābhyām śeṣam pūrvavat ācaret

original: etatsapiṇḍīkaraṇamekoddiṣṭaṃ striyā api / arvāk sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ yasya saṃvatsarādbhavet //
analyzed: etat sapiṇḍīkaraṇam ekoddiṣṭam striyāḥ api arvāk sapiṇḍīkaraṇam yasya saṃvatsarāt bhavet

original: tasyāpyannaṃ sodakumbhaṃ dadyātsaṃvatsaraṃ dvijaḥ / piṇḍāṃśca goja viprebhyo dadyādgnau jale 'pi vā //
analyzed: tasya api annam sa udakumbham dadyāt saṃvatsaram dvijaḥ piṇḍān ca viprebhyaḥ dadyāt agnau jale vā

original: haviṣyānnena vai māsaṃ pāyasena tu vatsaram / mātsyahāriṇakaurabhraśākunacchāgapārṣataiḥ //
analyzed: haviṣya annena vai māsam pāyasena tu vatsaram mātsya hāriṇaka aurabhra śākuna chāga pārṣataiḥ

original: aiṇarauravavā rāhaśāśamāṃsairyathākramam / māsavṛddhyāpi tuṣyanti dattairiha pitāmahāḥ //
analyzed: aiṇa raurava vā rāha śāśa māṃsaiḥ yathākramam māsa vṛddhyā api tuṣyanti dattaiḥ iha pitāmahāḥ

original: dadyādvarṣātrayodaśyāṃ maghāsu ca na saṃśayaḥ / pratipatprabhṛtiṣvevaṃ kanyā dīñchrāddhado labhet //
analyzed: dadyāt varṣā trayodaśyām maghāsu ca na saṃśayaḥ pratipad prabhṛtiṣu evam kanyāḥ dīn śrāddha daḥ labhet

original: śastreṇa nihatānāṃ tu caturdaśyāṃ pradīyate / svargaṃ hyapatyamojaśca śauryaṃ kṣetraṃ balaṃ tathā //
analyzed: śastreṇa nihatānām tu caturdaśyām pradīyate svargam hi apatyam ojaḥ ca śauryam kṣetram balam tathā

original: putraśraiṣṭyaṃ sa saubhāgyaṃ samṛddhiṃ mukhyatāṃ śubham / pravṛttacakratāṃ caiva vāṇijyaprabhṛtīṃstathā //
analyzed: putra śraiṣṭyam sa saubhāgyam samṛddhim mukhya tām śubham pravṛtta cakra tām ca eva vāṇijya prabhṛtīn tathā

original: arogitvaṃ yaśo vītaśokatāṃ paramāṃ gatim / dhanaṃ vidyāṃ ca vāksiddhiṃ kupyaṃ gojāvikaṃ tathā //
analyzed: arogi tvam yaśaḥ vīta śoka tām paramām gatim dhanam vidyām ca vāc siddhim kupyam gojāvikam tathā

original: aśvānāyuśca vidhivadyaḥ śrāddhaṃ saṃprayacchati / kṛttikādibharaṇyantaṃ sa kāmānprāpnuyādimān //
analyzed: aśvān āyuḥ ca vidhivat yaḥ śrāddham saṃprayacchati kṛttikā ādi bharaṇī antam sa kāmān prāpnuyāt imān

original: vastrādyāḥ prīṇayantyeva naraṃ śrāddhakṛtaṃ dvijāḥ / āyuḥ prajā dhanaṃ vidyāṃ svargamokṣasukhāni ca //
analyzed: vastra ādyāḥ prīṇayanti eva naram śrāddha kṛtam dvijāḥ āyuḥ prajāḥ dhanam vidyām svarga mokṣa sukhāni ca

original: prayacchati yathā rājyaṃ prītyā nityaṃ pitāmahaḥ //
analyzed: prayacchati yathā rājyam prītyā nityam pitāmahaḥ

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktaśrāddhavidhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma navanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktaśrāddhavidhinirūpaṇam nāma navanavatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrāgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 100
analyzed: śrā garuḍa mahā purāṇam

original: yājñavalkya uvāca / vināyakopasṛṣṭasya lakṣaṇāni nibodhata / svapne 'vagāhate 'tyarthaṃ jalaṃ muṇḍāṃśca paśyati //
analyzed: yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca vināyaka upasṛṣṭasya lakṣaṇāni nibodhata svapne vagāhate tyartham jalam muṇḍān ca paśyati

original: vimanā viphalārambhaḥ saṃsadityanimittataḥ / rājā rājyaṃ kumārī ca patiṃ putraṃ ca gurviṇī //
analyzed: vimanāḥ viphala ārambhaḥ rājā rājyam kumārī ca patim putram ca gurviṇī

original: nāpnuyātsnāpanaṃ tasya puṇye 'hnividhipūrvakam / gaurasarṣapakalkena sājyenotsāritasya tu //
analyzed: nāpnuyāt snāpanam tasya puṇye hni vidhi pūrvakam gaurasarṣapa kalkena sa ājyena utsāritasya tu

original: sarvauṣadhaiḥ sarvagandhairviliptaśirasastathā / bhadrāsanopaviṣṭasya svasti vācyaṃ dvijāñchubhān //
analyzed: sarva auṣadhaiḥ sarva gandhaiḥ vilipta śirasaḥ tathā bhadrāsana upaviṣṭasya svasti vācyam dvijān śubhān

original: mṛttikāṃ rocanāṃ gandhān gugguluṃ cāpsu niḥ kṣipet / yā āhṛtā ekavarṇaiścaturbhiḥ kalaśairhradāt //
analyzed: mṛttikām rocanām gandhān guggulum ca apsu niḥ kṣipet yāḥ āhṛtāḥ eka varṇaiḥ caturbhiḥ kalaśaiḥ hradāt

original: carmaṇyānuḍuhe rakte sthāpyaṃ bhadrāsane tathā / sahasrākṣaṃ śatadhāramṛṣibhiḥ pāvanaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: carmaṇi ānuḍuhe rakte sthāpyam bhadrāsane tathā sahasrākṣam śatadhāram ṛṣibhiḥ pāvanam smṛtam

original: tena tvāmabhiṣiñcāmi pāvamānyaḥ punantu te / bhagaṃ tu varuṇo rājā bhagaṃ sūryo bṛhaspatiḥ //
analyzed: tena tvām abhiṣiñcāmi pāvamānyaḥ punantu te bhagam tu varuṇaḥ rājā bhagam sūryaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ

original: bhagamindraśca vāyuśca bhagaṃ saptarṣayo daduḥ / yatte keśeṣu daurbhāgyaṃ sīmante yacca mūrdhani //
analyzed: bhagam indraḥ ca vāyuḥ ca bhagam saptarṣayaḥ daduḥ yat te keśeṣu daurbhāgyam sīmante yat ca mūrdhani

original: lalāṭe karṇayorakṣṇorāpastadghnuntu te sadā / snātasya sārṣapaṃ tailaṃ snuveṇaudumbareṇa tu //
analyzed: lalāṭe karṇayoḥ akṣṇoḥ āpaḥ tat ghnuntu te sadā snātasya sārṣapam tailam snuveṇa audumbareṇa tu

original: juhuyānmūrdhani kuśānsavyena parigṛhya ca / mitaścasamitaścaiva tathā śālakaṭaṅkaṭau //
analyzed: juhuyāt mūrdhani kuśān savyena parigṛhya ca mitaḥ ca samitaḥ ca eva tathā śāla kaṭaṅkaṭau

original: kuṣmāṇḍo rājaputraśca ante svāhāsamanvitaiḥ / dadyāccatuṣpathe bhūmau kuśānāstīrya sarvaśaḥ //
analyzed: kuṣmāṇḍaḥ rājaputraḥ ca ante svāhā samanvitaiḥ dadyāt catuṣpathe bhūmau kuśān āstīrya sarvaśas

original: kṛtākṛtāṃstaṇḍulāṃśca palalaudanameva ca / puṣpaṃ citraṃ sugandhaṃ ca surāṃ ca trividhāmapi //
analyzed: kṛta akṛtān taṇḍulān ca palala odanam eva ca puṣpam citram su gandham ca surām ca trividhām api

original: mūlakaṃ pūrikāpūpaṃ tathaivauṇḍerakastrajaḥ / dadhi pāyasamannaṃ ca guḍapiṣṭaṃ samodakam //
analyzed: mūlakam pūrikā apūpam dadhi pāyasam annam ca guḍapiṣṭam samodakam

original: etānsarvānupāhṛtya bhūmau kṛtvā tataḥ śiraḥ / ambikāmupatiṣṭhecca dadyādarghyaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ //
analyzed: etān sarvān upāhṛtya bhūmau kṛtvā tatas śiraḥ ambikām upatiṣṭhet ca dadyāt arghyam kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: dūrvāsarṣapapuṣpaiśca putrajanmabhirantataḥ / kṛtasvastyayanaṃ caiva prārthayedambikāṃ satīm //
analyzed: dūrvā sarṣapa puṣpaiḥ ca putra janmabhiḥ antatas kṛta svastyayanam ca eva prārthayet ambikām satīm

original: rūpaṃ dehi yaśodehi bhagaṃ bhagavati / dehi me / putrāndehi śriyaṃ dehi sarvānkāmāṃśca dehi me //
analyzed: rūpam dehi yaśaḥ dehi bhagam bhagavati dehi me putrān dehi śriyam dehi sarvān kāmān ca dehi me

original: brāhmaṇān bhojayetpaścācchuklavastrānulepanaiḥ / vastrayugmaṅgurordadyāsaṃpūjya ca grahāṃstathā / śreyaḥ karmaphalaṃ vindyātsūryārcanaratastathā //
analyzed: brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt śukla vastra anulepanaiḥ  vastra yugma aṅguroḥ dadyāt saṃpūjya ca grahān tathā śreyaḥ karma phalam vindyāt sūrya arcana rataḥ tathā

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkloktagaṇapatikalpanirūpaṇaṃ nāma śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkloktagaṇapatikalpanirūpaṇam nāma śatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 101
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: yājñavalkya uvāca / śrīkāmaḥ śāntikāmo vā grahadṛṣṭyabhicāravān / grahayañjñaṃ samaṃ kuryādgahāścaite budhaiḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca śrī kāmaḥ śānti kāmaḥ vā graha dṛṣṭi abhicāravān  grahayan jñam samam kuryāt gahāḥ ca ete budhaiḥ smṛtāḥ

original: sūryaḥ somo maṅgalaśca budhaścaiva bṛhaspatiḥ / śukraḥ śanaiścaro rāhuḥ keturgrahagaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: sūryaḥ somaḥ maṅgalaḥ ca budhaḥ ca eva bṛhaspatiḥ śukraḥ śanaiścaraḥ rāhuḥ ketuḥ graha gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: tāmrakātsphāṭikādraktacandanātsvarṇakādubhau / rajatādayasaḥ sīsātkāṃsyādvarṇānnibodhata //
analyzed: tāmrakāt sphāṭikāt raktacandanāt svarṇakāt ubhau rajatāt ayasaḥ sīsāt kāṃsyāt varṇān nibodhata

original: raktaḥ śuklastathā raktaḥ pītaḥ pītaḥ sitositaḥ / kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kramādvarṇā dravyāṇi munayastataḥ //
analyzed: raktaḥ śuklaḥ tathā raktaḥ pītaḥ pītaḥ sita usitaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kramāt varṇāḥ dravyāṇi munayaḥ tatas

original: sthāpayedgahavarṇāni homārthaṃ pralikhetpaṭe / snāpayeddhomayeccaiva grahadravyairvidhānataḥ / suvarṇāni pradeyāni vāsāṃsi susumāni ca //
analyzed: sthāpayet gaha varṇāni homa artham pralikhet paṭe snāpayet homayet ca eva graha dravyaiḥ vidhānataḥ suvarṇāni pradeyāni vāsāṃsi su sumāni ca

original: gandhāśca balayaścaiva dhūpo deyaścagugguluḥ / kartavyāstatra mantraiśca caravaḥ pratidaivatam //
analyzed: gandhāḥ ca balayaḥ ca eva dhūpaḥ deyaḥ ca gugguluḥ  kartavyāḥ tatra mantraiḥ ca caravaḥ pratidaivatam

original: ākṛṣṇena imandevā agnirmūrdhādivaḥ kakut / ubdudhyasveti juhuyādebhireva yathākramam //
analyzed: ākṛṣṇena agniḥ mūrdhā divaḥ kakud  ubdudhyasva iti juhuyāt ebhiḥ eva yathākramam

original: bṛhaspateparidīyeti sarve annātparisutam / śannodevī kayānaśca ketuṅkraṇvanniti kramāt //
analyzed: sarve annāt parisutam  śannodevī kayānaḥ ca ketuṅkraṇvan iti kramāt

original: arkaḥ palāśaḥ khadirastvapāmārgo 'tha pippalaḥ / audumbaraḥ śamī dūrvā kuśāśca samidhaḥ kramāt //
analyzed: arkaḥ palāśaḥ khadiraḥ tu apāmārgaḥ pippalaḥ audumbaraḥ śamī dūrvā kuśāḥ ca samidhaḥ kramāt

original: hotavyā madhusarpirbhyāṃ dadhnā caiva samanvitaḥ / guḍaudanaṃ pāyasaṃ ca haviṣyaṃ kṣīraṣāṣṭikam //
analyzed: hotavyāḥ madhu sarpirbhyām dadhnā ca eva samanvitaḥ guḍa odanam pāyasam ca haviṣyam kṣīraṣāṣṭikam

original: dadhyodanaṃ haviḥ pūpānmāṃsaṃ citrānnameva ca / dadyādgahakramādetān grahebhyo bhājanaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: dadhi odanam haviḥ pūpān māṃsam citrānnam eva ca  dadyāt gaha kramāt etān grahebhyaḥ bhājanam tatas

original: dhenuḥ śaṅkhastathānaḍvānhema vāso hayastathā / kṛṣṇā gaurāyasaṃ chāga etā vai dakṣiṇāḥ kramāt / grahāḥ pūjyāḥ sadā yasmādrajyādi prāpyate phalam //
analyzed: dhenuḥ śaṅkhaḥ tathā anaḍvān hema vāsaḥ hayaḥ tathā  kṛṣṇā gauḥ āyasam chāgaḥ etāḥ vai dakṣiṇāḥ kramāt grahāḥ pūjyāḥ sadā yasmāt rajyā ādi prāpyate phalam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktagrahaśāntinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktagrahaśāntinirūpaṇam nāma ekottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 102
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: yājñavalkya uvāca / vānaprasthāśramaṃ vakṣye tacchṛṇvantu maharṣayaḥ / putreṣu bhāryāṃ niḥ kṣipya vanaṃ gacchetsahaiva vā //
analyzed: yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca vānaprastha āśramam vakṣye tat śṛṇvantu mahā ṛṣayaḥ putreṣu bhāryām niḥ kṣipya vanam gacchet saha eva vā

original: vānaprastho brahmacārī sāgniḥ sopāsanaḥ kṣamī / aphālakṛṣṭenāgnīṃśca pitṛdevātithīṃstathā //
analyzed: vānaprasthaḥ brahmacārī sa agniḥ sa upāsanaḥ kṣamī a phāla kṛṣṭena agnīn ca pitṛ deva atithīn tathā

original: bhṛtyāṃstu tarpayecchmaśrujaṭālomabhṛdātmavān / dāntastriṣavaṇasnāyī nivṛttaśca pratigrahāt //
analyzed: bhṛtyān tu tarpayet śmaśru jaṭā loma bhṛt ātmavān dāntaḥ triṣavaṇa snāyī nivṛttaḥ ca pratigrahāt

original: svādhyāyavāndhyānaśīlaḥ sarvabhūtahita rataḥ (tiḥ) / ahno māsasya madhye vā kuryādvārthaparigraham //
analyzed: svādhyāyavān dhyāna śīlaḥ sarva bhūta hita rataḥ tiḥ ahnaḥ māsasya madhye vā kuryāt vā artha parigraham

original: kṛtaṃ tyajedāśvayuje yuñjetkālaṃ vratādinā / pakṣe māse thavāśnīyāddantolūkhaliko bhavet //
analyzed: kṛtam tyajet āśvayuje yuñjet kālam vrata ādinā pakṣe māse aśnīyāt dantolūkhalikaḥ bhavet

original: cāndrāyaṇī svapedbhūmau karma kuryātphalādinā / grīṣme pañcāgnimadhyastho varṣāsu sthaṇḍileśayaḥ //
analyzed: svapet bhūmau karma kuryāt phala ādinā grīṣme pañcāgni madhya sthaḥ varṣāsu sthaṇḍileśayaḥ

original: ārdravāsāstu hemante yogābhyāsāddinaṃ nayet / yaḥ kaṇṭakairvitudati candanairyaśca limpati / akruddhaḥ parituṣṭaśca samastasya ca tasya ca //
analyzed: ārdra vāsāḥ tu hemante yoga abhyāsāt dinam nayet  yaḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ vitudati candanaiḥ yaḥ ca limpati akruddhaḥ parituṣṭaḥ ca samastasya ca tasya ca

original: iti śrīgāruje mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavānaprasthadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruje mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavānaprasthadharmanirūpaṇam nāma dvyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 103
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: yājñavalkya uvāca / bhikṣordharmaṃ pravakṣyāmitaṃ nibodhata sattamāḥ / vanādgṛhādvā kṛtveṣṭiṃ sarvavedasadakṣiṇām //
analyzed: yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca bhikṣoḥ dharmam pravakṣyāmi itam nibodhata sattamāḥ vanāt gṛhāt vā kṛtvā iṣṭim sarvavedasa dakṣiṇām

original: prājāpatyantadante 'pi agnimāropya cātmani / sarvabhūtahitaḥ śāntastridaṇḍī sakamaṇḍaluḥ //
analyzed: prājāpatya anta dante agnim āropya ca ātmani sarva bhūta hitaḥ śāntaḥ tridaṇḍī sa kamaṇḍaluḥ

original: sarvārāmaṃ parivrajya bhikṣārtho grāmamāśrayet / apramattaścaredbhaikṣyaṃ sāyāhne nābhilakṣitaḥ //
analyzed: sarva ārāmam parivrajya bhikṣā arthaḥ grāmam āśrayet apramattaḥ caret bhaikṣyam sāyāhne na abhilakṣitaḥ

original: rohite bhikṣukairgrāme yātrāmātra malolupaḥ / bhavetparamahaṃso vā ekadaṇḍī yamāditaḥ //
analyzed: rohite bhikṣukaiḥ grāme yātrā mātra ma lolupaḥ bhavet paramahaṃsaḥ vā ekadaṇḍī yama āditaḥ

original: siddhayogastyajandehamamṛtatvamihāpnuyāt / dātātithipriyo jñānī gṛhī śrāddhe 'pimucyate //
analyzed: siddha yogaḥ tyajan deham amṛta tvam iha āpnuyāt  dāta atithi priyaḥ jñānī gṛhī śrāddhe pimucyate

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavānaprasthasannyāsadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma tryuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavānaprasthasannyāsadharmanirūpaṇam nāma tryuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrāgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 104
analyzed: śrā garuḍa mahā purāṇam

original: yājñavalkya uvāca / narakātpatākodbhūtātkṣayātpāpasya kamaṇaḥ / brahmahā śvā kharoṣṭraḥ syādbheko yakaḥ surāpyapi //
analyzed: yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca narakāt patākā udbhūtāt kṣayāt pāpasya brahma hā śvā khara uṣṭraḥ syāt bhekaḥ yakaḥ surāpī api

original: svarṇacoraḥ kṛmiḥ kīṭaḥ tṛṇādirgurutalpagaḥ / kṣayarogī śyāvadantaḥ kunakhī śipiviṣṭakaḥ //
analyzed: svarṇa coraḥ kṛmiḥ kīṭaḥ tṛṇa ādiḥ guru talpa gaḥ kṣaya rogī śyāva dantaḥ kunakhī śipiviṣṭakaḥ

original: brahmahatyākramātsyuśca tatsarvaṃ vā śiśerbhavet / annahartā mayāvī syānmūko vāgapahārakaḥ //
analyzed: brahmahatyā kramāt syuḥ ca tat sarvam vā śiśeḥ bhavet anna hartā mayāvī syāt mūkaḥ vāc apahārakaḥ

original: dhānyahāryatiriktāṅgaḥ piśunaḥ pūtināsikaḥ / tailāhārī tailapāyī pūtivaktrastu sūcakaḥ //
analyzed: dhānya hārī atirikta aṅgaḥ piśunaḥ pūti nāsikaḥ taila āhārī taila pāyī pūti vaktraḥ tu sūcakaḥ

original: brahmasvaṃ kanyakāṃ krītvā vane rakṣo bhavedvṛṣaḥ / ratnahṛddhīnajātaḥ syātpatraśākaharaḥ śikhī //
analyzed: brahma svam kanyakām krītvā vane rakṣaḥ bhavet vṛṣaḥ ratna hṛt hīna jātaḥ syāt patra śāka haraḥ śikhī

original: gucchaṃ cucundarī hṛtvā dhānyahṛnmūṣako bhavet / phalaṃ kapiḥ paśūnhṛtvā tvajā kākaḥ payastathā //
analyzed: guccham cucundarī hṛtvā dhānya hṛt mūṣakaḥ bhavet phalam kapiḥ paśūn hṛtvā tu ajā kākaḥ payaḥ tathā

original: māṃsaṃ gṛdhraḥ paṭaṃ śvitrī cīrī lavaṇahārakaḥ / yathākarma phalaṃ prāpya tiryaktvaṃ kālaparyayāt //
analyzed: māṃsam gṛdhraḥ paṭam śvitrī cīrī lavaṇa hārakaḥ yathākarma phalam prāpya tiryaktvam kāla paryayāt

original: jāyante lakṣaṇabhraṣṭā daridrāḥ puruṣādhamāḥ / tato niṣkaluṣībhūtā kule mahati yoginaḥ //
analyzed: jāyante lakṣaṇa bhraṣṭāḥ daridrāḥ puruṣa adhamāḥ tatas niṣkaluṣībhūtā kule mahati yoginaḥ

original: jāyante lakṣaṇopetā dhanadhānyasamanvitāḥ //
analyzed: jāyante lakṣaṇa upetāḥ dhana dhānya samanvitāḥ

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktakarmavipākanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktakarmavipākanirūpaṇam nāma caturuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 105
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: vihitasyānanuṣṭhānānninditasya ca sevanāt / anigrahāccendriyāṇāṃ naraḥ patanamṛcchati //
analyzed: vihitasya ananuṣṭhānāt ninditasya ca sevanāt anigrahāt ca indriyāṇām naraḥ patanam ṛcchati

original: tasmādyatnena kartavyaṃ prāyaścittaṃ viśuddhaye / evamasyāntarātmā ca lokaścaiva prasaditi //
analyzed: tasmāt yatnena kartavyam prāyaścittam viśuddhaye evam asya antarātmā ca lokaḥ ca eva

original: lokaḥ prasīdedātmaivaṃ prāyaścittairaghakṣayaḥ / prāyaścittamakurvāṇāḥ paścāttāpavivarjitāḥ //
analyzed: lokaḥ prasīdet ātmā evam prāyaścittaiḥ agha kṣayaḥ prāyaścittam akurvāṇāḥ paścāttāpa vivarjitāḥ

original: narakānyānti pāpā vai mahārauravarauravān / tāmistraṃ lohaśaṅkuṃ ca pūtigandhasamākulam //
analyzed: narakān yānti pāpāḥ vai mahāraurava rauravān tāmistram lohaśaṅkum ca pūtigandhasamākulam

original: haṃsābhaṃ lohitodaṃ ca sañjīvananadīpatham / mahānilayakākolamandhatāmistravāpanam //
analyzed: haṃsābham lohitodam ca sañjīvana nadīpatham mahānilaya kākolam andhatāmistra vāpanam

original: avīciṃ kumbhīpākaṃ ca yānti pāpā hyapuṇyataḥ / brahmahā madyapaḥ steyī saṃyogī gurutalpagaḥ //
analyzed: avīcim kumbhīpākam ca yānti pāpāḥ hi apuṇyataḥ brahma hā madyapaḥ steyī saṃyogī guru talpa gaḥ

original: gurunindā vedanindā brahmahatyāsame hyubhe / niṣiddhabhakṣaṇaṃ jihmakriyācaraṇameva ca //
analyzed: guru nindā veda nindā brahma hatyā same hi ubhe niṣiddha bhakṣaṇam jihma kriyā caraṇam eva ca

original: rajasvalāmukhāsvādaḥ surāpānasamāni tu / aśvaratnādiharaṇaṃ suvarṇasteyasaṃmitam //
analyzed: rajasvalā mukha āsvādaḥ surā pāna samāni tu aśva ratna ādi haraṇam suvarṇa steya saṃmitam

original: sakhibhāryākumārīṣu svayoniṣvantyajāsu ca / sagotrāsu tathā strīṣu gurutalpasamaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: sakhi bhāryā kumārīṣu sva yoniṣu antyajāsu ca sagotrāsu tathā strīṣu guru talpa samam smṛtam

original: pituḥ svasāraṃ mātuśca mātulānīṃ snuṣāma pi / mātuḥ sapatnīṃ bhaginīmācāryatanayāṃ tathā //
analyzed: pituḥ svasāram mātuḥ ca mātulānīm snuṣām a pi mātuḥ sapatnīm bhaginīm ācārya tanayām tathā

original: ācāryapatnīṃ svasutāṃ gacchaṃstu gurutalpagaḥ / chittvā liṅgaṃ vadhastasya sakāmāyāḥ striyāstathā //
analyzed: ācārya patnīm sva sutām gacchan tu guru talpa gaḥ chittvā liṅgam vadhaḥ tasya sa kāmāyāḥ striyāḥ tathā

original: govadho vrātyatāsteyamṛṇānāṃ ca parikriyā / anāhitāgnitāpaṇyavikrayaḥ parivedanam //
analyzed: go vadhaḥ vrātya tā steyam ṛṇānām ca parikriyā anāhitāgni tā paṇya vikrayaḥ parivedanam

original: bhṛtyācādhyayanādānaṃ bhṛtakādhyā panantathā / pāradāryaṃ pārivittyaṃ vārdhuṣyaṃ lavaṇakriyā //
analyzed: bhṛtyāḥ ca adhyayana ādānam bhṛtaka adhyā panam tathā pāradāryam pārivittyam vārdhuṣyam lavaṇa kriyā

original: sacchūdraviṭkṣattrabandhorninditārthopajīvitā / nāstikyaṃ vratalopaśca śūlyaṃ gośveva vikrayaḥ //
analyzed: sat śūdra viś kṣattrabandhoḥ nindita artha upajīvi tā nāstikyam vrata lopaḥ ca śūlyam vikrayaḥ

original: pitṛmātṛsuhṛttyāgastaḍāgārāmavikrayaḥ / kanyāyādūṣaṇa caiva parivindakayājanam //
analyzed: pitṛ mātṛ suhṛd tyāgaḥ taḍāga ārāma vikrayaḥ ca eva parivindaka yājanam

original: kanyāpradānaṃ tasyaiva kauṭilyaṃ vratalopanam / ātmanor'the kriyārambho madyapastrīniṣevaṇam //
analyzed: kanyā pradānam tasya eva kauṭilyam vrata lopanam ātmanā arthe kriyā ārambhaḥ madyapa strī niṣevaṇam

original: svādhyāyāgnisutatyāgo bāndhavatyāga eva ca / asacchāstrābhigamanaṃ bhāryātmaparivi krayaḥ //
analyzed: svādhyāya agni suta tyāgaḥ bāndhava tyāgaḥ eva ca asat śāstra abhigamanam krayaḥ

original: upapāpāni coktāni prāyaścittaṃ nibodhata / śiraḥ kapāladhvajavān bhikṣāśī karma vedayan //
analyzed: upapāpāni ca uktāni prāyaścittam nibodhata śiraḥ kapāla dhvajavān bhikṣāśī karma vedayan

original: brahmahā dvādaśa samā mitabhuk śuddhimāpnuyāt / lomabhyaḥ svāheti ca vā lomaprabhṛti vai tanum //
analyzed: brahma hā dvādaśa samāḥ mita bhuj śuddhim āpnuyāt lomabhyaḥ svāhā iti ca vā loma prabhṛti vai tanum

original: majjāntāṃ juhuyādvāpi svasvamantrairyathākramam / śuddhiḥ syādbrāhmaṇatrāṇātkṛtvaivaṃ śuddhireva ca //
analyzed: majjā antām juhuyāt vā api sva sva mantraiḥ yathākramam śuddhiḥ syāt brāhmaṇa trāṇāt kṛtvā evam śuddhiḥ eva ca

original: nirātaṅkaṃ dvijaṃ gāṃ ca brāhmaṇārthe hato 'pi vā / araṇye niyato juptvā triḥ kṛtvo vedasaṃhitām //
analyzed: nirātaṅkam dvijam gām ca brāhmaṇa arthe vā araṇye niyataḥ tris kṛtvas veda saṃhitām

original: sarasvatīṃ vā saṃsevyaṃ dhanaṃ pātre samarpayet / yāgasthakṣattraviḍghāt caredbrahmahaṇo vratam //
analyzed: sarasvatīm vā saṃsevyam dhanam pātre samarpayet

original: garbhahā vā yathāvarṇaṃ tathātreyīniṣū (sū) danam / caredbratamahatvāpi ghātanārthamupāgataḥ //
analyzed: garbha hā vā yathāvarṇam danam  caret bratam a hatvā api ghātana artham upāgataḥ

original: dviguṇaṃ savanasthe tu brāhmaṇe vratamācaret / surāmbughṛtagomūtraṃ pītvā śuddhiḥ surāpiṇaḥ //
analyzed: dviguṇam savana sthe tu brāhmaṇe vratam ācaret surā ambu ghṛta go mūtram pītvā śuddhiḥ surāpiṇaḥ

original: agnivarṇaṃ ghṛtaṃ vāpi cīravāsa jaṭī bhavet / vrataṃ brahmahaṇaḥ kuryātpunaḥ saṃskāramarhati //
analyzed: agnivarṇam ghṛtam vā api cīra vāsa jaṭī bhavet vratam brahma haṇaḥ kuryāt punar saṃskāram arhati

original: reteviṇmūtrapānācca surāpā brāhmaṇī tathā / patilokaparibhraṣṭā gṛdhrī syātsūkarī śunī //
analyzed: retaḥ viṣ mūtra pānāt ca surā pā brāhmaṇī tathā pati loka paribhraṣṭā gṛdhrī syāt sūkarī śunī

original: svarṇahārī dvijo rājñe dattvā tu musalaṃ tathā / karmaṇaḥ khyāpanaṃ kṛtvā hatastena bhavecchuciḥ //
analyzed: svarṇa hārī dvijaḥ rājñe dattvā tu musalam tathā karmaṇaḥ khyāpanam kṛtvā hataḥ tena bhavet śuciḥ

original: ātmatulyaṃ suvarṇaṃ vā dattvā śuddhimiyāddvijaḥ / śayane sārdhamāyasyā yoṣitā nibhṛtaṃ svapet //
analyzed: ātma tulyam suvarṇam vā dattvā śuddhim iyāt dvijaḥ śayane sārdham āyasyā yoṣitā nibhṛtam svapet

original: ucchedya liṅgaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ nairṛtyāmutsṛjoddiśi / prājāpatyaṃ caretkṛcchraṃ samā vā gurutalpagaḥ //
analyzed: ucchedya liṅgam vṛṣaṇam nairṛtyām utsṛja uddiśi prājāpatyam caret kṛcchram samāḥ vā guru talpa gaḥ

original: cāndrāyaṇaṃ vā trīnmāsanabhyasedvedasaṃhitām / pañcagavyaṃ pibedgoghno māsamāsīta saṃyataḥ //
analyzed: cāndrāyaṇam vā trīn māsan abhyaset veda saṃhitām pañcagavyam pibet go ghnaḥ māsam āsīta saṃyataḥ

original: goṣṭheśayo go 'nugāmī gopradānena śudhyati / upapātakaśuddhiḥ syāccāndrāyaṇavratena ca //
analyzed: goṣṭheśayaḥ go nugāmī go pradānena śudhyati upapātaka śuddhiḥ syāt cāndrāyaṇa vratena ca

original: payasā vāpi māsena parākeṇāpi vā punaḥ / ṛṣabhaikaṃ sahasraṃ gā dadyātkṣattravadhe pumān //
