analyzed: payasā vā api māsena parākeṇa api vā punar ṛṣabha ekam sahasram gāḥ dadyāt kṣattra vadhe pumān

original: brahmahatyāvrataṃ vāpi vatsaratritayaṃ caret / vaiśyahābdaṃ ca (bdāṃśca)
analyzed: brahma hatyā vratam vā api vatsara tritayam caret vaiśya hā abdam ca bdān ca

original: redetaddadyādvaikaśataṃ gavām //
analyzed: red etat dadyāt vā ekaśatam gavām

original: ṣaṇmāsācchūdrahā caitaddadyādvā dhenavo daśa / apraduṣṭāṃ striyaṃ hatvā śūdrahatyāvrataṃ caret //
analyzed: ṣaṣ māsāt śūdra hā ca etat dadyāt vā dhenavaḥ daśa a praduṣṭām striyam hatvā śūdra hatyā vratam caret

original: mārjāragodhānakulapaśumaṇḍūkaghātanāt / pibetkṣīraṃ tryahaṃ pāpī kṛcchraṃ vāpyadhikaṃ caret //
analyzed: mārjāra godhā nakula paśu maṇḍūka ghātanāt pibet kṣīram tri aham pāpī kṛcchram vā api adhikam caret

original: gaje nīlānvṛṣānpañca śuke vatsaṃ dvihāyanam / kharājameṣeṣu vṛṣo deyaḥ krauñce trihāyaṇaḥ //
analyzed: gaje nīlān vṛṣān pañca śuke vatsam dvi hāyanam khara aja meṣeṣu vṛṣaḥ deyaḥ krauñce trihāyaṇaḥ

original: vṛkṣagulmalatāvīrucchedane japyamṛkśatam / avakīrṇo bhavedgattvā brahmacārī ca yoṣitam //
analyzed: vṛkṣa gulma latā vīrudh chedane japyam ṛc śatam avakīrṇaḥ brahmacārī ca yoṣitam

original: gardabhaṃ paśumālabhya nairṛtaṃ ca viśudhyati / madhumāṃsāśane kāryaṃ kṛcchraṃ śeṣavratāni ca //
analyzed: gardabham paśum ālabhya nairṛtam ca viśudhyati madhu māṃsa aśane kāryam kṛcchram śeṣa vratāni ca

original: kṛcchratrayaṃ guruḥ kuryānmriyet prahito yadi / pratikūlaṃ guroḥ kṛtvā prasādyaiva viśudhyati //
analyzed: kṛcchra trayam guruḥ kuryāt mriyet prahitaḥ yadi pratikūlam guroḥ kṛtvā prasādya eva viśudhyati

original: ripūndhānyapradānādyaiḥ snehādyairvāpyupakramet / kriyamāṇopakāre ca mṛte vipre na pātakam //
analyzed: ripūn dhānya pradāna ādyaiḥ sneha ādyaiḥ vā api upakramet kriyamāṇa upakāre ca mṛte vipre na pātakam

original: mahāpāpopapāpābhyāṃ yobhiśasto mṛṣā param / abbhakṣo māsamāsīta sa jāpī niyatandriyaḥ //
analyzed: mahā pāpa upapāpābhyām yaḥ abhiśastaḥ mṛṣā param ap bhakṣaḥ māsam āsīta sa jāpī niyata indriyaḥ

original: aniyukto bhrātṛbhāryāṃ gacchaṃścāndrāyaṇaṃ caret / trirātrānte ghṛtaṃ prāśya gatvodakyāṃ śucirbhavet //
analyzed: a niyuktaḥ bhrātṛ bhāryām gacchan cāndrāyaṇam caret tri rātra ante ghṛtam prāśya gatvā udakyām śuciḥ bhavet

original: goṣṭhe vasanbrahmacārī māsamekaṃ payovratī / gāyattrījapyanirato mucyate 'satpratigrahāt //
analyzed: goṣṭhe vasan brahmacārī māsam ekam payaḥ vratī gāyattrī japya nirataḥ mucyate sat pratigrahāt

original: triḥ kṛcchramācaredvrātyayājako 'pi carannapi / vedaplāvī yavāśyabdaṃ tyaktvā ca śaraṇāgatān //
analyzed: tris kṛcchram ācaret vrātya yājakaḥ caran api veda plāvī yava āśī abdam tyaktvā ca śaraṇa āgatān

original: prāṇāyāmatrayaṃ kuryātkharayānoṣṭrayānagaḥ / nagnaḥ snātvā ca suptvā ca gatvā caiva divā striyam //
analyzed: prāṇāyāma trayam kuryāt khara yāna uṣṭra yāna gaḥ nagnaḥ snātvā ca suptvā ca gatvā ca eva divā striyam

original: guruntvaṃ kṛtya huṅkṛtya vipraṃ nirjitya vāda taḥ / prasādya taṃ ca munayastato hyupavaseddinam //
analyzed: kṛtya huṅkṛtya vipram nirjitya taḥ  prasādya tam ca munayaḥ tatas hi upavaset dinam

original: vipre daṇḍodyame kṛcchramatikṛcchraṃ nipātane / deśaṃ kālaṃ vayaḥ śaktiṃ pāpaṃ cāvekṣya yatnataḥ //
analyzed: vipre daṇḍa udyame kṛcchram atikṛcchram nipātane deśam kālam vayaḥ śaktim pāpam ca avekṣya yatnataḥ

original: prāyaścitaṃ prakalpyaṃ syādyatra yoktā tu niṣkṛtiḥ / garbhatyāgo bhartṛnindā strīṇāṃ patanakāraṇam //
analyzed: prāyaścitam prakalpyam syāt yatra yoktā tu niṣkṛtiḥ garbha tyāgaḥ bhartṛ nindā strīṇām patana kāraṇam

original: eṣa grahāntike doṣaḥ tasmāttāṃ dūtarastyajet / vikhyātadoṣaḥ kurvīta guroranumataṃ vratam //
analyzed: eṣa graha antike doṣaḥ tasmāt tām vikhyāta doṣaḥ kurvīta guroḥ anumatam vratam

original: asaṃvikhyātadoṣastu rahasyaṃ vratamācaret / trirātropoṣaṇo japtvā brahmahā tvaghamarṣaṇam //
analyzed: asaṃvikhyāta doṣaḥ tu rahasyam vratam ācaret tri rātra upoṣaṇaḥ japtvā brahma hā tu aghamarṣaṇam

original: antarjale viśuddhe ca dattvā gāṃ ca payasvinīm / lomabhyaḥ svāheti ṛcā divasaṃ mārutāśanaḥ //
analyzed: antar jale viśuddhe ca dattvā gām ca payasvinīm  lomabhyaḥ svāhā iti ṛcā divasam mārutāśanaḥ

original: jale japtvā tu juhuyāccātvāriṃśadghṛtāhutīḥ / trirātropoṣaṇo hutvā kūṣmāṇḍībhirghṛtaṃ śuciḥ //
analyzed: jale japtvā tu juhuyāt cātvāriṃśat ghṛta āhutīḥ tri rātra upoṣaṇaḥ hutvā kūṣmāṇḍībhiḥ ghṛtam śuciḥ

original: surāpaḥ svarṇahārī ca rudrajāpī jale sthitaḥ / sahasraśīrṣājapyena mucyate gurutalpagaḥ //
analyzed: surāpaḥ svarṇa hārī ca rudra jāpī jale sthitaḥ sahasraśīrṣā japyena mucyate guru talpa gaḥ

original: prāṇāyāmaśataṃ kuryātsarvapāpāpanuktye / oṅkārābhiyutaṃ somasalilapraśanācchuciḥ //
analyzed: prāṇāyāma śatam kuryāt sarva pāpa apanuktye oṅkāra abhiyutam soma salila praśanāt śuciḥ

original: kṛtvopavāsaṃ retoviṇmūtrāṇāṃ prāśanedvijaḥ / ajñānakṛtapāpasya nāśaḥ sandhyātraye kṛte //
analyzed: kṛtvā upavāsam retaḥ viṣ mūtrāṇām ajñāna kṛta pāpasya nāśaḥ sandhyā traye kṛte

original: rudraikādaśajapyāddhi pāpanāśo bhaveddvijaiḥ / vedābhyāsarataṃ śāntaṃ pañcayajñakriyāparam //
analyzed: rudra ekādaśa japyāt hi pāpa nāśaḥ bhavet dvijaiḥ veda abhyāsa ratam śāntam pañcayajña kriyā param

original: na spṛśanti hā pāpāni cāśu smṛtvā hyapohitaḥ / japtvā sahasragāyattrīṃ śucirbrahmahaṇādṛte //
analyzed: na spṛśanti hā pāpāni ca āśu smṛtvā hi apohitaḥ japtvā sahasra gāyattrīm śuciḥ brahma haṇāt ṛte

original: brahmacaryaṃ dayā kṣāntirdhyānaṃ satyamakalkatā / ahiṃsā steyamādhurye damaścaite yamāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: brahmacaryam dayā kṣāntiḥ dhyānam satyam akalka tā ahiṃsā steya mādhurye damaḥ ca ete yamāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: snānamaunopavāsojyāsvādhyāyopasthanigrahaḥ / tapo 'krodho gurorbhaktiḥ śaucaṃ ca niyamāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: snāna mauna upavāsa ujyā svādhyāya upastha nigrahaḥ krodhaḥ guroḥ bhaktiḥ śaucam ca niyamāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: pañcagavyaṃ tu gokṣīraṃ dadhimūtraśakṛdghṛtam / jagdhvā parehnyupavasetkṛcchraṃ sāntapanaṃ caret //
analyzed: pañcagavyam tu go kṣīram dadhi mūtra śakṛt ghṛtam jagdhvā parehni upavaset kṛcchram sāntapanam caret

original: pṛthak sāntapanairdravyaiḥ ṣaḍahaḥ sopavāsakaḥ / saptāhena tu kṛcchro 'yaṃ mahāsāntapanaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: pṛthak sāntapanaiḥ dravyaiḥ ṣaṣ ahar sa upavāsakaḥ sapta ahena tu kṛcchraḥ yam mahāsāntapanaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: parṇodumbararājīvabīlvapatrakuśodakaiḥ / pratyekaṃ pratyahābhyastaiḥ parṇa kṛcchra udāhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: parṇa udumbara rājīva bīlva patra kuśa udakaiḥ pratyekam pratyaha abhyastaiḥ parṇa kṛcchraḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: taptakṣīraghṛtāmbūnāmekaikaṃ pratyahaṃ pibet / ekarātropavāsaśca taptakṛcchraśca pāvanaḥ //
analyzed: tapta kṣīra ghṛta ambūnām ekaikam pratyaham pibet eka rātra upavāsaḥ ca taptakṛcchraḥ ca pāvanaḥ

original: ekabhaktena naktena tathaivāyācitena ca / upavāsena cakana pādakṛcchra udāhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: eka bhaktena naktena tathā eva a yācitena ca upavāsena pādakṛcchraḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: yathā kathañcittriguṇaḥ prajāpatyo 'yamucyate / ayamevātikṛcchraḥ syātpāṇipūrṇāmbubhojanāt //
analyzed: yathā kathañcid triguṇaḥ prajāpatyaḥ yam ucyate  ayam eva atikṛcchraḥ syāt pāṇi pūrṇa ambu bhojanāt

original: kṛcchrātikṛcchraṃ payasā divasānekaviṃśatim / dvādaśāhopavāsaiśca parākaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: kṛcchrātikṛcchram payasā divasān ekaviṃśatim dvādaśa aha upavāsaiḥ ca parākaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ

original: piṇyākācāmatakrāmbusaktūnāṃ prativāsaram / ekaikamupavāsaśca kṛcchraḥ saumyo 'yamucyate //
analyzed: piṇyāka ācāma takra ambu saktūnām prativāsaram ekaikam upavāsaḥ ca kṛcchraḥ saumyaḥ yam ucyate

original: eṣāṃ trirātramabhyāsādekaikaṃ syādyathākramāt / tulāpuruṣa ityeṣa jñeyaḥ pañcadaśāhikaḥ //
analyzed: eṣām tri rātram abhyāsāt ekaikam syāt yathākramāt tulāpuruṣaḥ iti eṣa jñeyaḥ pañcadaśāhikaḥ

original: tithipiṇḍāṃścaredvṛddhyā śukle śikhyaṇḍasaṃmitān / ekaikaṃ hrāsayetkṛṣṇe piṇḍaṃ cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret //
analyzed: tithi piṇḍān caret vṛddhyā śukle śikhi aṇḍa saṃmitān ekaikam hrāsayet kṛṣṇe piṇḍam cāndrāyaṇam caret

original: yathākathañcitpiṇḍānāṃ catvāriṃśacchatadvayam / māsenaivopabhuñjīta cāndrāyaṇamathāparam //
analyzed: yathā kathañcid piṇḍānām catvāriṃśat śata dvayam māsena eva upabhuñjīta cāndrāyaṇam atha aparam

original: kṛtvā triṣavaṇaṃ snānaṃ piṇḍaṃ cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret / pavitrāṇi japetpiṇḍān gāyattryā cābhimantrayet //
analyzed: kṛtvā triṣavaṇam snānam piṇḍam cāndrāyaṇam caret pavitrāṇi japet piṇḍān gāyattryā ca abhimantrayet

original: anādiṣṭeṣu pāpeṣu śuddhiścāndrāyaṇena tu / dharmārtho yaścaredetaccandrasyaiti salokatām //
analyzed: an ādiṣṭeṣu pāpeṣu śuddhiḥ cāndrāyaṇena tu dharma arthaḥ yaḥ caret etat candrasya eti salokatām

original: kṛcchrakṛddharmakāmastu mahatīṃ śriyamaśnute //
analyzed: kṛcchra kṛt dharma kāmaḥ tu mahatīm śriyam aśnute

original: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktaprāyaścittaviveko nāma pañcottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrā gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktaprāyaścittavivekaḥ nāma pañcottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 106
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: yājñavalkya uvāca / pretā (ta) śaucaṃ pravakṣyāmi tacchṛṇudhvaṃ yatavratāḥ / ūnadvivarṣaṃ nikhanenna kuryādu dakaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca śaucam pravakṣyāmi tat śṛṇudhvam yata vratāḥ ūna dvi varṣam nikhanet na kuryāt u dakam tatas

original: ā śmaśānādanuvrajya itarairjñātibhiryutaḥ / yamasūktaṃ tathā japyaṃ japadbhirlaukikāgninā //
analyzed: ā śmaśānāt anuvrajya itaraiḥ jñātibhiḥ yutaḥ yama sūktam tathā japyam japadbhiḥ laukika agninā

original: sa dagdhavya upetaścaidāhitāgnyāvṛtārthavat / saptamāddaśamādvāpi jñātayo 'bhyupayāntyapaḥ //
analyzed: sa dagdhavyaḥ upetaḥ ca et āhitāgni āvṛta artha vat  saptamāt daśamāt vā api jñātayaḥ bhyupayānti apaḥ

original: apanaḥ śośucadaghamanena pitṛdiṅmukhāḥ / evaṃ mātāmahācāryapatnīnāṃ codakakriyāḥ //
analyzed: apanaḥ śośucat agham anena pitṛ diś mukhāḥ evam mātāmaha ācārya patnīnām ca udaka kriyāḥ

original: kāmodakāḥ putrasakhisvastrīyaśvaśurartvijaḥ / nāmagotreṇa hyudakaṃ sakṛtsiñcanti vāgyatāḥ //
analyzed: kāma udakāḥ putra sakhi sva strīya śvaśura ṛtvijaḥ nāma gotreṇa hi udakam sakṛt siñcanti vāgyatāḥ

original: pāṣaṇḍapatitānāṃ tu na kuryurudakakriyāḥ / nabrahmacāriṇo vrātyā yoṣitaḥ kāmagāstathā //
analyzed: pāṣaṇḍa patitānām tu na kuryuḥ udakakriyāḥ na brahmacāriṇaḥ vrātyāḥ yoṣitaḥ kāmagāḥ tathā

original: surāpyastvātmaghātinyo nāśaucodakabhājanāḥ / tato na roditavyaṃ hi tvanityā jīvasaṃ sthitiḥ //
analyzed: surāpyaḥ tu ātma ghātinyaḥ na āśauca udaka bhājanāḥ tatas na roditavyam hi tu anityā sthitiḥ

original: kriyā kāryā yathāśakti tato gacchedgṛhānprati / vidaśya nimbapatrāṇi niyatā dvāri veśmanaḥ //
analyzed: kriyā kāryā yathāśakti tatas gacchet gṛhān prati vidaśya nimba patrāṇi niyatāḥ dvāri veśmanaḥ

original: ācamyāthāgnimudakaṃ gomayaṃ gaurasarṣapān / praviśeyuḥ samālabhya kṛtvāśmani padaṃ śanaiḥ //
analyzed: ācamya atha agnim udakam gomayam gaurasarṣapān praviśeyuḥ samālabhya kṛtvā aśmani padam śanais

original: praveśanādikaṃ karma pretasaṃsparśanādapi / īkṣatāṃ tatkṣaṇācchuddhiḥ pareṣāṃ snānasaṃyamāt //
analyzed: praveśana ādikam karma preta saṃsparśanāt api īkṣatām tad kṣaṇāt śuddhiḥ pareṣām snāna saṃyamāt

original: krītalabdhāśanā bhūmau svapeyuste pṛthakpṛthak / piṇḍayajñakṛtā deyaṃ pretāyānnaṃ dinatrayam //
analyzed: krīta labdha aśanāḥ bhūmau svapeyuḥ te pṛthak pṛthak piṇḍa yajña kṛtā deyam pretāya annam dina trayam

original: jalamekāhamākāśe sthāpyaṃ kṣīraṃ tu mṛnmaye / vaitānopāsanāḥ kāryāḥ kriyāśca śruticoditāḥ //
analyzed: jalam eka aham ākāśe sthāpyam kṣīram tu mṛd maye vaitānopāsanāḥ kāryāḥ kriyāḥ ca śruti coditāḥ

original: ādantajanmanaḥ sadyaḥ ācūḍaṃ naiśikī smṛtā / trirātramā vratādeśāddaśarātramataḥ param //
analyzed: ā danta janmanaḥ sadyas ācūḍam naiśikī smṛtā tri rātram ā vrata ādeśāt daśa rātram atas param

original: trirātraṃ daśarātraṃ vā śāvamāśaucamucyate / ūnadvivarṣa ubhayoḥ sūtakaṃ mātureva hi //
analyzed: tri rātram daśa rātram vā śāvam āśaucam ucyate ūna dvi varṣaḥ ubhayoḥ sūtakam mātuḥ eva hi

original: antarā janmamaraṇe śeṣāhobhirviśudhyati / daśa dvādaśa varṇānāṃ tathā pañcadaśaiva ca //
analyzed: antarā janma maraṇe śeṣa ahobhiḥ viśudhyati daśa dvādaśa varṇānām tathā pañcadaśa eva ca

original: triṃśaddināni ca tathā bhavati pretasūtakam / ahastvadattakanyāsu bāleṣu ca viśodhanam //
analyzed: triṃśat dināni ca tathā bhavati preta sūtakam ahar tu adatta kanyāsu bāleṣu ca viśodhanam

original: gurvantevāsyanūcānamātulaśrotriyeṣu ca / anauraseṣu putreṣu bhāryāsvanyagatāsu ca //
analyzed: guru antevāsi anūcāna mātula śrotriyeṣu ca anauraseṣu putreṣu bhāryāsu anya gatāsu ca

original: nivāsarājani tathā tadahaḥ śuddhikāra(ṇa)m / hatānāṃ nṛpagoviprairanvakṣaṃ cātmaghātinām //
analyzed: nivāsa rājani tathā tat ahar śuddhi kāraṇam hatānām nṛpa go vipraiḥ anvakṣam ca ātmaghātinām

original: viṣādyaiśca hatānāṃ ca nāśaucaṃ pṛthivīpateḥ / satrivratibrahmacāridātṛbrahmavidāṃ tathā //
analyzed: viṣa ādyaiḥ ca hatānām ca na āśaucam pṛthivīpateḥ satri vrati brahmacāri dātṛ brahma vidām tathā

original: dāne vivāhe yajñe ca saṃgrāme deśaviplave / āpadyapi ca kaṣṭāyāṃ sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate //
analyzed: dāne vivāhe yajñe ca saṃgrāme deśa viplave  āpadi api ca kaṣṭāyām sadyas śaucam vidhīyate

original: kālo 'gniḥ karmamṛdvāyurmano jñānaṃ tapo japaḥ (lam) / paścāttāṣo nirāhāraḥ sarveṣāṃ śuddhihetavaḥ //
analyzed: kālaḥ gniḥ karma mṛd vāyuḥ manaḥ jñānam tapaḥ japaḥ lam paścāttāṣaḥ nirāhāraḥ sarveṣām śuddhi hetavaḥ

original: akāryakāriṇāṃ dānaṃ vego nadyāstu śuddhikṛt / kṣāttreṇa karmaṇā jīvedviśāṃ vāpyāpadi dvijaḥ //
analyzed: akārya kāriṇām dānam vegaḥ nadyāḥ tu śuddhi kṛt kṣāttreṇa karmaṇā jīvet viśām vā api āpadi dvijaḥ

original: phalasomakṣaumavīruddadhi kṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ jalam / tilodanarasakṣāramadhu lākṣā śṛtaṃ haviḥ //
analyzed: phala soma kṣauma vīrudh dadhi kṣīram ghṛtam jalam tila udana rasa kṣāra madhu lākṣā śṛtam haviḥ

original: vastropalāsavaṃ puṣpaṃ śākamṛccarmapādukam / eṇatvacaṃ ca kauśeyaṃ lavaṇaṃ māsameva ca //
analyzed: vastra upala āsavam puṣpam śāka mṛd carma pādukam eṇa tvacam ca kauśeyam lavaṇam māsam eva ca

original: piṇyākamūlagandhāṃśca vaiśyavṛtto na vikrayet / dharmārthaṃ vikrayaṃ neyāstilā dhānyena tatsamāḥ //
analyzed: piṇyāka mūla gandhān ca vaiśya vṛttaḥ na vikrayet  dharma artham vikrayam neyāḥ tilāḥ dhānyena tad samāḥ

original: lavaṇādi na vikrīyāttathā cāpadgato dvijaḥ / hīnādvipro vigṛhṇaṃśca lipyate nārkavaddvijaḥ //
analyzed: lavaṇa ādi na vikrīyāt tathā ca āpad gataḥ dvijaḥ hīnāt vipraḥ vigṛhṇan ca lipyate na arka vat dvijaḥ

original: kuryātkṛṣyādikaṃ tadvadavikreyā hayāstathā / bubhukṣitastryaṃ sthitvā dṛṣṭvā vṛttivivarjitam / rājā dharmyāṃ prakurvīta vṛttiṃ viprādikasya ca //
analyzed: kuryāt kṛṣi ādikam tadvat avikreyāḥ hayāḥ tathā  bubhukṣita stryam sthitvā dṛṣṭvā vṛtti vivarjitam rājā dharmyām prakurvīta vṛttim vipra ādikasya ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktāśaucāpadvṛttyornirūpaṇaṃ nāma paḍuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktāśaucāpadvṛttyornirūpaṇam nāma paḍuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 107
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / parāśaro 'bravīdvyāsaṃ dharmaṃ varṇāśramādikam / kalpekalpe kṣayotpattyā kṣīyante nu prajādayaḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca parāśaraḥ bravīt vyāsam dharmam varṇa āśrama ādikam kalpe kalpe kṣaya utpattyā kṣīyante nu prajā ādayaḥ

original: śrutiḥ smṛtiḥ sadācaro yaḥ kaścidve dakartṛkaḥ / vedāḥ smṛtā brāhmaṇādau dharmā manvādibhiḥ sadā //
analyzed: śrutiḥ smṛtiḥ sadā caraḥ yaḥ kaścid veda kartṛkaḥ  vedāḥ smṛtāḥ brāhmaṇa ādau dharmāḥ manu ādibhiḥ sadā

original: dānaṃ kaliyuge dharmaḥ kartāraṃ ca kalau tyajet / pāpakṛtyaṃ tu tatraiva śāpaṃ phalati varṣataḥ //
analyzed: dānam kali yuge dharmaḥ kartāram ca kalau tyajet pāpa kṛtyam tu tatra eva śāpam phalati varṣataḥ

original: ācārātprāpnuyātsarvaṃ ṣaṭ karmāṇi dinedine / sandhyā snānaṃ japo homo devātithyādipūjanam //
analyzed: ācārāt prāpnuyāt sarvam ṣaḍ karmāṇi dine dine  sandhyā snānam japaḥ homaḥ deva atithi ādi pūjanam

original: apūrvaḥ suvratī vipro hyapūrvā yatayastadā / kṣattriyaḥ parasainyāni jitvā pṛthvīṃ prapālayet //
analyzed: apūrvaḥ su vratī vipraḥ hi apūrvāḥ yatayaḥ tadā kṣattriyaḥ para sainyāni jitvā pṛthvīm prapālayet

original: vaṇik kṛṣyādi vaiśye syāddvijabhaktiśca śūdrake / abhakṣyabhakṣaṇāccauryādagamyā gamanātpatet //
analyzed: vaṇij kṛṣi ādi vaiśye syāt dvija bhaktiḥ ca śūdrake abhakṣya bhakṣaṇāt cauryāt agamyā gamanāt patet

original: kṛṣiṃ kurvandvijaḥ śrāntaṃ balīvardaṃ na vāhayet / dinārdhaṃ snānayogādikārī viprāṃśca bhojayet //
analyzed: kṛṣim kurvan dvijaḥ śrāntam balīvardam na vāhayet dina ardham snāna yoga ādi kārī viprān ca bhojayet

original: nirvapetpañca yajñāni krūre nindāṃ ca kārayet / tilājyaṃ na vikrīṇita sūnāyajñamaghānvitaḥ //
analyzed: nirvapet pañca krūre nindām ca kārayet tila ājyam na sūnā yajñam agha anvitaḥ

original: rājño dattvā tu ṣaḍbhāgaṃ devatānāṃ ca viṃśatim / trayastriṃśacca viprāṇāṃ kṛṣikartā na lipyate //
analyzed: rājñaḥ dattvā tu ṣaṣ bhāgam devatānām ca viṃśatim trayastriṃśat ca viprāṇām kṛṣi kartā na lipyate

original: karṣakāḥ kṣattraviṭchūdrāḥ khale 'dattvā tu caurakaḥ / dinatrayeṇa śudhyeta brāhmaṇaḥ pretasūtake //
analyzed: karṣakāḥ kṣattra viś śūdrāḥ khale dattvā tu caurakaḥ dina trayeṇa śudhyeta brāhmaṇaḥ preta sūtake

original: kṣattro daśāhādvaiśyāstu dvādaśāhānmāsi śūdrakaḥ / yāti vipro daśāhāttu kṣattro dvādaśakāddināt //
analyzed: kṣattraḥ daśa ahāt vaiśyāḥ tu dvādaśa ahāt māsi śūdrakaḥ yāti vipraḥ daśa ahāt tu kṣattraḥ dvādaśakāt dināt

original: pañcadaśāhādvaiśyastu śūdro māsena śudhyati / ekapiṇḍāstu dāyādāḥ pṛthagdvāraniketanāḥ //
analyzed: pañcadaśa ahāt vaiśyaḥ tu śūdraḥ māsena śudhyati eka piṇḍāḥ tu dāyādāḥ pṛthak dvāra niketanāḥ

original: janmanā ca vipattau ca bhavetteṣāṃ ca sūtakam / caturthe daśarātraṃ syātṣaṇṇiśāḥ puṃsi pañcame //
analyzed: janmanā ca vipattau ca bhavet teṣām ca sūtakam caturthe daśa rātram syāt ṣaṣ niśāḥ puṃsi pañcame

original: ṣaṣṭhe catura hācchuddhiḥ saptame ca dinatrayam / deśāntare mṛte bāle sadyaḥ śuddhiryato mṛte //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhe saptame ca dina trayam deśa antare mṛte bāle sadyas śuddhiḥ yatas mṛte

original: ajātadantā ye bālā ye ca garbhādviniḥ sṛtāḥ / na teṣāmagnisaṃskāro na piṇḍaṃ nodakakriyā //
analyzed: a jāta dantāḥ ye bālāḥ ye ca garbhāt viniḥ sṛtāḥ na teṣām agni saṃskāraḥ na piṇḍam na udakakriyā

original: yadi garbho vipadyata stravate vāpi yoṣitaḥ / yāvanmāsaṃ sthito garbhastāvaddināni sūtakam //
analyzed: yadi garbhaḥ vipadyate stravate vā api yoṣitaḥ yāvat māsam sthitaḥ garbhaḥ tāvat dināni sūtakam

original: ānāmakaraṇātsadya ācūḍāntādaharniśam / āvratāttu trirātreṇa tadūrdhvandaśabhirdinaiḥ //
analyzed: ā nāma karaṇāt sadyas ā cūḍā antāt aharniśam ā vratāt tu tri rātreṇa tad ūrdhvan daśabhiḥ dinaiḥ

original: ācaturthādbhavetstravaḥ pātaḥ pañcamaṣaṣṭhayoḥ / brahmacaryā dagnihotrānnāśuddhiḥ saṅgavarjanāt //
analyzed: ā caturthāt bhavet stravaḥ pātaḥ pañcama ṣaṣṭhayoḥ  brahmacaryāt agnihotrāt na aśuddhiḥ saṅga varjanāt

original: śilpinaḥ kāravo vaidyā dāsīdāsāśca bhṛtyakāḥ / agnimāñchrotriyo rājā sadyaḥ śaucāḥ prakīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: śilpinaḥ kāravaḥ vaidyāḥ dāsī dāsāḥ ca bhṛtyakāḥ agnimān śrotriyaḥ rājā sadyas śaucāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: daśāhācchudhyate mātā snānātsūte pitā śuciḥ / saṅgātsūtau sūtakaṃ syādupaspṛśya pitā śuciḥ //
analyzed: daśa ahāt śudhyate mātā snānāt sūte pitā śuciḥ saṅgāt sūtau sūtakam syāt upaspṛśya pitā śuciḥ

original: vivāhotsavayajñeṣu antarā mṛtasūtake / pūrvasaṃkalpitādanyavarjanaṃ ca vidhīyate //
analyzed: vivāha utsava yajñeṣu antarā mṛta sūtake pūrva saṃkalpitāt anya varjanam ca vidhīyate

original: mṛtena śudhyate sūtiḥ mṛtavajjātakaṃ janau / gograhādau vipannānāmekarātraṃ tu sūtakam //
analyzed: mṛtena śudhyate sūtiḥ mṛta vat jātakam janau go graha ādau vipannānām eka rātram tu sūtakam

original: anāthapretavahanātprāṇāyāmena śudhyati / pretaśūdrasya vahanāntrirātramaśucirbhavet //
analyzed: anātha preta vahanāt prāṇāyāmena śudhyati preta śūdrasya vahanāt tri rātram aśuciḥ bhavet

original: ātmaghātiviṣodvandhakṛmidaṣṭe na saṃskṛtiḥ / gohataṃ kṛmidaṣṭaṃ ca spṛṣṭvā kṛcchreṇa śudhyati //
analyzed: ātmaghāti viṣa udvandha kṛmi daṣṭe na saṃskṛtiḥ go hatam kṛmi daṣṭam ca spṛṣṭvā kṛcchreṇa śudhyati

original: aduṣṭāpatitaṃ bhāryā yauvane yā parityajet / saptajanma bhavetstrītvaṃ vaidhavyaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: aduṣṭa apatitam bhāryā yauvane yā parityajet sapta janma bhavet strī tvam vaidhavyam ca punar punar

original: bālahatyā tvagamanādṛtau ca strī tu sūkari / agamyā vratakāriṇyo bhraṣṭapānodakakriyāḥ //
analyzed: bāla hatyā tu agamanāt ṛtau ca strī tu sūkari agamyāḥ vrata kāriṇyaḥ bhraṣṭa pāna udaka kriyāḥ

original: aurasaḥ kṣetrajaḥ putraḥ pitṛjau piṇḍadau pituḥ / parivittestu kṛcchraṃ syātkanyāyāḥ kṛcchrameva ca //
analyzed: aurasaḥ kṣetrajaḥ putraḥ pitṛ jau piṇḍa dau pituḥ parivitteḥ tu kṛcchram syāt kanyāyāḥ kṛcchram eva ca

original: atikṛcchraṃ careddātā hotā cāndrāyaṇañcaret / kubjavāmanaṣaṇḍeṣu gadgadeṣu jaḍeṣu ca //
analyzed: atikṛcchram caret dātā hotā cāndrāyaṇam caret kubja vāmana ṣaṇḍeṣu gadgadeṣu jaḍeṣu ca

original: jātyandhabadhire mūke na doṣaḥ parivedane / naṣṭe mṛte pravrajite klībe vā patite patau //
analyzed: jātyandha badhire mūke na doṣaḥ parivedane naṣṭe mṛte pravrajite klībe vā patite patau

original: pañcasvāpatsu nārīṇāṃ patiranyo vidhīyate / bhartrā sahamṛtā nārī romābdāni vaseddivi //
analyzed: pañcasu āpatsu nārīṇām patiḥ anyaḥ vidhīyate bhartrā sahamṛtā nārī roma abdāni vaset divi

original: śvādidaṣṭastu gāyattryā japācchuddho bhavennaraḥ / dāhyo lokāgninā vipraścāṇḍālādyairhato 'gnimān //
analyzed: śva ādi daṣṭaḥ tu gāyattryāḥ japāt śuddhaḥ bhavet naraḥ dāhyaḥ loka agninā vipraḥ cāṇḍāla ādyaiḥ hataḥ gnimān

original: kṣīraiḥ prakṣālya tasyāsthi svāgninā mantrato dahet / pravāse tu mṛte bhūyaḥ kṛtvā kuśamayaṃ dahet //
analyzed: kṣīraiḥ prakṣālya tasya asthi sva agninā mantrataḥ dahet pravāse tu mṛte bhūyas kṛtvā kuśa mayam dahet

original: kṛṣṇājine samāstīrya ṣaṭ śatāni palāśajān / śamīṃ śiśre viniḥ kṣipya araṇiṃ vṛṣaṇe kṣipet //
analyzed: kṛṣṇājine samāstīrya ṣaḍ śatāni palāśa jān śamīm kṣipya araṇim vṛṣaṇe kṣipet

original: kaṇḍaṃ dakṣiṇahaste tu vāmahaste tathopabhṛt / pārśve tūlūkhalaṃ dadyātpṛṣṭhe tu musalaṃ dadet //
analyzed: kaṇḍam dakṣiṇa haste tu vāma haste tathā upabhṛt pārśve tu ulūkhalam dadyāt pṛṣṭhe tu musalam dadet

original: ure niḥ kṣipya dṛṣadaṃ taṇḍulājyatilānmukhe / śrotra ca prokṣaṇīṃ dādyadājyasthālīṃ ca cakṣuṣoḥ //
analyzed: niḥ kṣipya dṛṣadam taṇḍula ājya tilān mukhe ca prokṣaṇīm ca cakṣuṣoḥ

original: karṇe netre mukhe ghrāṇe hiraṇyaśakalān kṣipet / agnihotropakaraṇādbrahmalokagatirbhavet //
analyzed: karṇe netre mukhe ghrāṇe hiraṇya śakalān kṣipet agnihotra upakaraṇāt brahma loka gatiḥ bhavet

original: asau svargāya lokāya svāhetyājyāhutiḥ sakṛt / haṃsasārasakrauñcānāṃ cakravākaṃ ca kukruṭam //
analyzed: asau svargāya lokāya svāhā iti ājya āhutiḥ sakṛt haṃsa sārasa krauñcānām cakravākam ca kukruṭam

original: mayarameṣaghātī ca ahorātreṇa śudhyati / pakṣiṇaḥ sakalānhatvā ahorātreṇa śudhyati //
analyzed: maya rameṣa ghātī ca ahar rātreṇa śudhyati pakṣiṇaḥ sakalān hatvā ahar rātreṇa śudhyati

original: sarvāṃścatuṣpadānhatvā ahorātro ṣito japet / śūdraṃ hatvā caretkṛcchramatikṛcchraṃ tu vaiśyahā / kṣattraṃ cāndrāyaṇaṃ vipraṃ dvāviṃśātriṃśamāhare (vahe) t //
analyzed: sarvān catuṣpadān hatvā japet  śūdram hatvā caret kṛcchram atikṛcchram tu vaiśya hā kṣattram cāndrāyaṇam vipram dvāviṃśa triṃśam āhare vahe

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe parāśaroktadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākye ācāra kāṇḍe parāśaroktadharmanirūpaṇam nāma saptottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 108
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / nītisāraṃ pravakṣyāmi arthaśāstrādisaṃśritam / rājādibhyo hitaṃ puṇyamāyuḥ svargādidāyakam //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca nīti sāram pravakṣyāmi artha śāstra ādi saṃśritam  rāja ādibhyaḥ hitam puṇyam āyuḥ svarga ādi dāyakam

original: sadbhiḥ saṅgaṃ prakurvīta siddhikāmaḥ sadā naraḥ / nāsadbhirihalokāya paralokāya vā hitam //
analyzed: sadbhiḥ saṅgam prakurvīta siddhi kāmaḥ sadā naraḥ na asadbhiḥ ihalokāya para lokāya vā hitam

original: varjayetkṣudrasaṃvādamaduṣṭasya tu darśanam / virodhaṃ saha mitreṇa saṃprītiṃ śatrusevinā //
analyzed: varjayet kṣudra saṃvādam aduṣṭasya tu darśanam virodham saha mitreṇa saṃprītim śatru sevinā

original: mūrkhaśiṣyopadeśena duṣṭastrībharaṇena ca / duṣṭānāṃ saṃprayogeṇa paṇḍito 'pyavasīdati //
analyzed: mūrkha śiṣya upadeśena duṣṭa strī bharaṇena ca duṣṭānām saṃprayogeṇa paṇḍitaḥ u pi avasīdati

original: brāhmaṇaṃ bāliśaṃ kṣattramayoddhāraṃ viśaṃ jaḍam / śūdramakṣarasaṃyuktaṃ dūrataḥ parivarjayet //
analyzed: brāhmaṇam bāliśam kṣattra mayoddhāram viśam jaḍam śūdram akṣara saṃyuktam dūratas parivarjayet

original: kālena ripuṇāsandhiḥ kāle mitreṇa vigrahaḥ / kāryakāraṇamāśritya kālaṃ kṣipati paṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: kālena ripuṇā asandhiḥ kāle mitreṇa vigrahaḥ kārya kāraṇam āśritya kālam kṣipati paṇḍitaḥ

original: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ / kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ //
analyzed: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālaḥ hi duratikramaḥ

original: kāleṣu harate vīryaṃ kāle garbhe ca vartate / kālo janayate sṛṣṭiṃ punaḥ kālo 'pi saṃharet //
analyzed: kāleṣu harate vīryam kāle garbhe ca vartate kālaḥ janayate sṛṣṭim punar kālaḥ u pi saṃharet

original: kālaḥ sūkṣmagatirnityaṃ dvividhaśceha bhāvyate / sthūlasaṃgrahacāreṇa sūkṣmacārāntareṇa ca //
analyzed: kālaḥ sūkṣma gatiḥ nityam dvividhaḥ ca iha bhāvyate sthūla saṃgraha cāreṇa sūkṣma cāra antareṇa ca

original: nītisāraṃ surendrāya imamūca bṛhaspatiḥ / sarvajño yena cendro 'bhūddaityānhatvāpnuyāddivam //
analyzed: nīti sāram sura indrāya imam ūca bṛhaspatiḥ sarva jñaḥ yena ca indraḥ bhūt daityān hatvā āpnuyāt divam

original: rājarṣibrāhmaṇaiḥ kāryaṃ devaviprādipūjanam / aśvamedhena yaṣṭabyaṃ mahāpātakanāśanam //
analyzed: rāja ṛṣi brāhmaṇaiḥ kāryam deva vipra ādi pūjanam aśvamedhena yaṣṭabyam mahāpātaka nāśanam

original: uttamaiḥ saha sāṅgatyaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ saha satkathām / alubdhaiḥ saha mitratvaṃ kurvāṇo nāvasīdati //
analyzed: uttamaiḥ saha sāṅgatyam paṇḍitaiḥ saha sat kathām alubdhaiḥ saha mitra tvam kurvāṇaḥ na avasīdati

original: parīvādaṃ parārthaṃ ca parihāsaṃ parastriyam / paraveśmani vāsaṃ ca na kurvīta kadācana //
analyzed: parīvādam para artham ca parihāsam para striyam para veśmani vāsam ca na kurvīta kadācana

original: paro 'pi hitavābandhurbandhurapyahitaḥ paraḥ / ahito dehajo vyādhirhitamāraṇyamauṣadham //
analyzed: paraḥ bandhuḥ api ahitaḥ paraḥ  ahitaḥ deha jaḥ vyādhiḥ hitam āraṇyam auṣadham

original: sa bandhuryo hite yuktaḥ sa pitā yastu poṣakaḥ / tanmitraṃ yatra viśvāsaḥ sa deśo yatra jīvyate //
analyzed: sa bandhuḥ yaḥ hite yuktaḥ sa pitā yaḥ tu poṣakaḥ tat mitram yatra viśvāsaḥ sa deśaḥ yatra jīvyate

original: sa bhṛtyo yo vidheyastu tadbījaṃ yatprarohati / sā bhāryā yā priyaṃ brūte sa putro yastu jīvati //
analyzed: sa bhṛtyaḥ yaḥ vidheyaḥ tu tat bījam yat prarohati sā bhāryā yā priyam brūte sa putraḥ yaḥ tu jīvati

original: sa jīvati guṇā yasya dharmo yasya sa jīvati / guṇadharmavihīno yo niṣphala tasya jīvanam //
analyzed: sa jīvati guṇāḥ yasya dharmaḥ yasya sa jīvati guṇa dharma vihīnaḥ yaḥ tasya jīvanam

original: sā bhāryā yā gṛhe dakṣā sā bhāryāyā priyaṃvadā / sā bhāryā yā patiprāṇā sā bhāryā yā pativratā //
analyzed: sā bhāryā yā gṛhe dakṣā sā bhāryāyāḥ priyaṃvadā sā bhāryā yā pati prāṇā sā bhāryā yā pativratā

original: nitya snātā sugandhā ca nityaṃ ca priyavādinī / alpabhuktālpabhāṣī ca satataṃ maṅgalairyutā //
analyzed: snātā sugandhā ca nityam ca priya vādinī  alpa bhukta alpa bhāṣī ca satatam maṅgalaiḥ yutā

original: satataṃ dharmabahulā satataṃ ca patipriyā / satataṃ priyavakrī ca satataṃ tvṛtukāminī //
analyzed: satatam dharma bahulā satatam ca pati priyā satatam priya vakrī ca satatam tu ṛtu kāminī

original: etadādikriyāyuktā sarvasau bhāgyavardhinī / yasyedṛśī bhavedbhāyyā sa devendrona mānuṣaḥ //
analyzed: etad ādi kriyā yuktā sarva asau bhāgya vardhinī yasya īdṛśī bhavet bhāyyā sa deva indraḥ na mānuṣaḥ

original: yasya bhāryā virūpākṣī kaśmalā kalahapriyā / uttarottaravādā syā sā jarā na jarā jarā //
analyzed: yasya bhāryā virūpa akṣī kaśmalā kalaha priyā  uttara uttara vādā syā sā jarā na jarā jarā

original: yasya bhāryā śritānyañca paraveśmābhikāṅkṣiṇī / kukriyā tyaktalajjā ca sā jarā na jarā jarā //
analyzed: yasya bhāryā para veśma abhikāṅkṣiṇī kukriyā tyakta lajjā ca sā jarā na jarā jarā

original: yasya bhāryā guṇajñā ca bhartāramanugāminī / alpālpena tu santuṣṭā sā priyā na priyā priyā //
analyzed: yasya bhāryā guṇa jñā ca bhartāram anugāminī alpa alpena tu santuṣṭā sā priyā na priyā priyā

original: duṣṭā bhāryā śaṭhaṃ mitraṃ bhṛtyaścottaradāyakaḥ / sasarpe ca gṛhe vāsomṛtyureva na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: duṣṭā bhāryā śaṭham mitram bhṛtyaḥ ca uttara dāyakaḥ sa sarpe ca gṛhe vāsaḥ mṛtyuḥ eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: tyaja durjanasaṃsargaṃ bhaja sādhusamāgamam / kuru puṇyamahorātra smara nityamanityatām //
analyzed: tyaja durjana saṃsargam bhaja sādhu samāgamam  kuru puṇyam ahorātra smara nityam anitya tām

original: vyālīkaṇṭhapradeśāhyapi ca phaṇabhṛdbhāṣaṇā yā ca raudrī yā kṛṣṇā vyākulāgī rudhiranayanasaṃvyākulā vyāghrakalpā / krodhe yaivogravaktrā sphuradanalaśikhā kākajihvā karālā sevyā na strī vidagdhā parapuragamanā bhrāntacittā virākta //
analyzed: ca phaṇabhṛt bhāṣaṇā yā ca raudrī yā kṛṣṇā rudhira nayana saṃvyākulā vyāghra kalpā krodhe yā eva ugra vaktrā sphurat anala śikhā kāka jihvā karālā sevyā na strī vidagdhā para pura gamanā bhrānta cittā

original: saktiḥ sutoke sukṛtaṃ kṛtaghne śatiṃ ca vahnau (sītāpahau hyatapayaiva)?haime / utpadyate daivavaśātkadācidveśyāsu rāgo na bhavetkadācit //
analyzed: saktiḥ su toke sukṛtam kṛtaghne śatim ca vahnau sītā apahau utpadyate daiva vaśāt kadācid veśyāsu rāgaḥ na bhavet kadācid

original: bhujaṅgame veśmani dṛṣṭidṛṣṭe vyādhau cikitsāvinivartite ca / dehe ca bālyādivayo 'nvite ca kālā vṛto 'sau labhate dhṛtiṃ kaḥ //
analyzed: bhujaṅgame veśmani dṛṣṭi dṛṣṭe vyādhau cikitsā vinivartite ca dehe ca bālya ādi vayaḥ nvite ca labhate dhṛtim kaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhaspatiproktanītisāranirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe bṛhaspatiproktanītisāranirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 109
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / āpadarthe dhanaṃ rakṣeddārānrakṣeddhanairapi / ātmānaṃ satataṃ rakṣeddārairapi dhanairapi //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca  āpad arthe dhanam rakṣet dārān rakṣet dhanaiḥ api  ātmānam satatam rakṣet dāraiḥ api dhanaiḥ api

original: tyajedakaṃ kulasyārthe grāmasyārthe kulaṃ tyajet / grāmaṃ janapadasyārthe ātmārthe pṛthivīṃ tyajet //
analyzed: tyajet akam kulasya arthe grāmasya arthe kulam tyajet grāmam janapadasya arthe ātma arthe pṛthivīm tyajet

original: varaṃ hi narake vāso na tu duścarite gṛhe / narakātkṣīyate pāpa kugṛhānna nivartate //
analyzed: varam hi narake vāsaḥ na tu duścarite gṛhe narakāt kṣīyate pāpa kugṛhāt na nivartate

original: calatyekena pādena tiṣṭhatyekena buddhimān / na parīkṣya paraṃ sthānaṃ pūrvamāyatanaṃ tyajet //
analyzed: calati ekena pādena tiṣṭhati ekena buddhimān  na parīkṣya param sthānam pūrvam āyatanam tyajet

original: tyajeddeśamasadvṛttaṃ vāsaṃ sopadravaṃ tyajet / tyajetkṛpaṇarājānaṃ mitraṃ māyāmayaṃ tyajet //
analyzed: tyajet deśam asat vṛttam vāsam sa upadravam tyajet tyajet kṛpaṇa rājānam mitram māyā mayam tyajet

original: arthena kiṃ kṛpaṇahastagatena kena jñānena kiṃ bahuśaṭhāgrahasaṃkulena / rūpeṇa kiṃ guṇaparākramavarjitena mitreṇa kiṃ vyasanakālaparāṅmukhena //
analyzed: arthena kim kṛpaṇa hasta gatena kena jñānena kim bahu śaṭha agraha saṃkulena rūpeṇa kim guṇa parākrama varjitena mitreṇa kim vyasana kāla parāṅmukhena

original: adṛṣṭapūrvā bahavaḥ sahāyāḥ sarve padasthasya bhavanti mitrāḥ / arthairvihīnasya padacyutasya bhavatyakāle svajano 'pi śatruḥ //
analyzed: a dṛṣṭa pūrvāḥ bahavaḥ sahāyāḥ sarve pada sthasya bhavanti mitrāḥ arthaiḥ vihīnasya pada cyutasya bhavati akāle sva janaḥ pi śatruḥ

original: āpatsu mitraṃ jānī yādraṇe śūraṃ rahaḥ śucim / māryā ca vibhave kṣīṇe durbhikṣe ca priyātithim //
analyzed: āpatsu mitram jānī yādraṇe śūram rahaḥ śucim  mā āryā ca vibhave kṣīṇe durbhikṣe ca priya atithim

original: vṛkṣaṃ kṣīṇaphalaṃ tyajanti vihagāḥ śuṣkaṃ saraḥ sārasānirdravyaṃ puruṣaṃ tyajanti gaṇikā bhraṣṭaṃ nṛpaṃ mantriṇaḥ / puṣpaṃ paryuṣitaṃ tyajanti madhupāḥ dargdha vanāntaṃ mṛgāḥ sarvaḥ kāryavaśājjano hi ramate kasyāsti ko vallabhaḥ //
analyzed: vṛkṣam kṣīṇa phalam tyajanti vihagāḥ śuṣkam saraḥ sārasa a nirdravyam puruṣam tyajanti gaṇikāḥ bhraṣṭam nṛpam mantriṇaḥ puṣpam paryuṣitam tyajanti madhupāḥ vanāntam mṛgāḥ sarvaḥ kārya vaśāt janaḥ hi ramate kasya asti kaḥ vallabhaḥ

original: lubdhamarthapradānena ślādhyamañjalikarmaṇā / mūrkhaṃ chandānuvṛttyā ca yāthātathyena paṇḍitam //
analyzed: lubdham artha pradānena ślādhyam añjali karmaṇā mūrkham chanda anuvṛttyā ca yāthātathyena paṇḍitam

original: sadbhāvena hi tuṣyanti devāḥ satpuruṣā dvijāḥ / itareḥ khādyapānena mānadānena paṇḍitāḥ //
analyzed: sat bhāvena hi tuṣyanti devāḥ sat puruṣāḥ dvijāḥ khādya pānena māna dānena paṇḍitāḥ

original: uttamaṃ praṇipātena śaṭhaṃ bhedena yojayet / nīcaṃ svalpapradānena samaṃ tulyaparākramaiḥ //
analyzed: uttamam praṇipātena śaṭham bhedena yojayet nīcam su alpa pradānena samam tulya parākramaiḥ

original: yasyayasya hi yo bhāvastasyatasya hitaṃ vadan / anupraviśya medhāvī kṣipramātmavaśaṃ nayet //
analyzed: yasya yasya hi yaḥ bhāvaḥ tasya tasya hitam vadan anupraviśya medhāvī kṣipram ātma vaśam nayet

original: nadīnāṃ ca nakhīnāṃ ca śṛṅgiṇāṃ śastrapāṇinām / viśvāso naiva gantavyaḥ striṣu rājakuleṣu ca //
analyzed: nadīnām ca nakhīnām ca śṛṅgiṇām śastra pāṇinām viśvāsaḥ na eva gantavyaḥ striṣu rāja kuleṣu ca

original: arthanāśaṃ manastāpaṃ gṛhe duścaritāni ca / vañcanaṃ cāpa mānaṃ ca matimānna prikāśayet //
analyzed: artha nāśam manaḥ tāpam gṛhe duścaritāni ca vañcanam ca āpa mānam ca matimān na prikāśayet

original: hīnadurjanasaṃsarga atyantavirahādaraḥ / sneho 'nyagehavāsaśca nārīsacchīlanāśanam //
analyzed: hīna durjana saṃsargaḥ atyanta viraha ādaraḥ snehaḥ nyageha vāsaḥ ca nārī sat śīla nāśanam

original: kasya doṣaḥ kule nāsti vyādhinā ko pīḍitaḥ / kena na vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ śriyaḥ kasya nirantarāḥ //
analyzed: kasya doṣaḥ kule na asti vyādhinā pīḍitaḥ kena na vyasanam prāptam śriyaḥ kasya nirantarāḥ

original: kor'thaṃ prāpya na garvito bhuvi naraḥ kasyāpadonāgatāḥ strībhiḥ kasya na khaṇḍitaṃ bhuvi manaḥ ko nāma rājñāṃ priyaḥ / kaḥ kālasya na gocarāntaragataḥ kor'tho gato gauravaṃ ko vā durjanavāgurānipatitaḥ kṣemeṇa yātaḥ pumān //
analyzed: kaḥ ṛtham prāpya na garvitaḥ bhuvi naraḥ strībhiḥ kasya na khaṇḍitam bhuvi manaḥ kaḥ nāma rājñām priyaḥ kaḥ kālasya na gocara antara gataḥ kaḥ ṛthaḥ gataḥ gauravam kaḥ vā durjana vāgurā nipatitaḥ kṣemeṇa yātaḥ pumān

original: suhṛtsvajanabandhurna buddhiryasya na cātmani / yasminkarmaṇi siddhe 'pi na dṛśyeta phalodayaḥ / vipattau ca mahadduḥkhaṃ tadvudhaḥ kathamācaret //
analyzed: suhṛd sva jana bandhuḥ na buddhiḥ yasya na ca ātmani  yasmin karmaṇi siddhe na dṛśyeta phala udayaḥ vipattau ca mahat duḥkham tat vudhaḥ katham ācaret

original: yasmindeśe na saṃmānaṃ na prītirna ca bāndhavāḥ / na ca vidyāgamaḥ kaścittaṃ deśaṃ parivarjayet //
analyzed: yasmin deśe na saṃmānam na prītiḥ na ca bāndhavāḥ na ca vidyā āgamaḥ kaścid tam deśam parivarjayet

original: dhanasya yasya rājato bhayaṃ na cāsti caurataḥ / mṛtaṃ ca yanna mucyate samarjayasva taddhanam //
analyzed: dhanasya yasya rājataḥ bhayam na ca asti caurataḥ mṛtam ca yat na mucyate samarjayasva tat dhanam

original: yadarjitaṃ prāṇaharaiḥ pariśramairmṛtasya taṃ vai vibhajantirikthinaḥ / kṛtaṃ ca yadduṣkṛtamarthalipsayā tadeva doṣopahatasya yautukam //
analyzed: yat arjitam prāṇa haraiḥ pariśramaiḥ mṛtasya tam vai vibhajanti rikthinaḥ kṛtam ca yat duṣkṛtam artha lipsayā tat eva doṣa upahatasya yautukam

original: sañcitaṃ nihitaṃ dravyaṃ parāmṛśyaṃ muhurmuhuḥ / ākhoriva kadaryasya dhanaṃ duḥ khāya kevalam //
analyzed: sañcitam nihitam dravyam parāmṛśyam muhur muhur ākhoḥ iva kadaryasya dhanam duḥ khāya kevalam

original: nagnā vyasanino rūkṣāḥ kapālāṅkitapāṇayaḥ / darśayantīha lokasya adātuḥ phalamīdṛśam //
analyzed: nagnāḥ vyasaninaḥ rūkṣāḥ kapāla aṅkita pāṇayaḥ darśayanti iha lokasya adātuḥ phalam īdṛśam

original: śikṣayanti ca yācante dehīti kṛpaṇā janāḥ / avastheyamadānasya mā bhūdevaṃ bhavānapi //
analyzed: śikṣayanti ca yācante dehi iti kṛpaṇāḥ janāḥ avastheyam adānasya mā bhūt evam bhavān api

original: sañcitaṃ kratuśatairna yujyate yācitaṃ guṇavate na dīyate / tatkadaryaparirakṣitaṃ dhanaṃ corapārthivagṛhe prayujyate //
analyzed: sañcitam kratu śataiḥ na yujyate yācitam guṇavate na dīyate tat kadarya parirakṣitam dhanam cora pārthiva gṛhe prayujyate

original: na devebhyo na viprobhyo bandhubhyo naiva cātmane / kadaryasya dhanaṃ yāti tvagnitaskararājasu //
analyzed: na devebhyaḥ na bandhubhyaḥ nā eva ca ātmane kadaryasya dhanam yāti tu agni taskara rājasu

original: atikleśena ye 'pyarthā dharmasyātikrameṇa ca / arervā praṇipātena mā bhūtaste kadācana //
analyzed: ati kleśena ye pi arthāḥ dharmasya atikrameṇa ca  areḥ vā praṇipātena mā bhūtaḥ te kadācana

original: vidyāghāto hyanabhyāsaḥ strīṇāṃ ghātaḥ kucailatā / vyādhīnāṃ bhojanaṃ jīrṇaṃ śatrorghātaḥ prapañcatā //
analyzed: vidyā ghātaḥ hi anabhyāsaḥ strīṇām ghātaḥ kucaila tā  vyādhīnām bhojanam jīrṇam śatroḥ ghātaḥ prapañca tā

original: taskarasya vadho daṇḍaḥ kumitrasyālpabhāṣaṇam / pṛthak śayyā tu nārīṇāṃ brāhmaṇasyānimantraṇam //
analyzed: taskarasya vadhaḥ daṇḍaḥ ku mitrasya alpa bhāṣaṇam pṛthak śayyā tu nārīṇām brāhmaṇasya a nimantraṇam

original: durjanāḥ śilpino dāsā duṣṭāśca paṭahāḥ striyaḥ / tāḍitā mārdavaṃ yānti na te satkārabhājanam //
analyzed: durjanāḥ śilpinaḥ dāsāḥ duṣṭāḥ ca paṭahāḥ striyaḥ tāḍitāḥ mārdavam yānti na te satkāra bhājanam

original: jānīyātpreṣaṇe bhṛtyānbāndhavānvyasanāgame / mitramāpadi kāle ca bhāryāñca vibhavakṣaye //
analyzed: jānīyāt preṣaṇe bhṛtyān bāndhavān vyasana āgame mitram āpadi kāle ca bhāryām ca vibhava kṣaye

original: strīṇāṃ dviguṇa āhāraḥ prajñā caiva caturguṇā / ṣaḍguṇo vyavasāyaśca kāmaścāṣṭaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: strīṇām dviguṇaḥ āhāraḥ prajñā ca eva caturguṇā ṣaḍguṇaḥ vyavasāyaḥ ca kāmaḥ ca aṣṭaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: na svapnena jayennidrāṃ na kāmena striyaṃ jayet / na cendhanairjayedvahniṃ na madyena tṛṣāṃ jayet //
analyzed: na svapnena jayet nidrām na kāmena striyam jayet  na ca indhanaiḥ jayet vahnim na madyena tṛṣām jayet

original: samāṃsairbhojanaiḥ snigdhairmadyairgandhavilepanaiḥ / vastrairmanoramairmālyaiḥ kāmaḥ strīṣu vijṛmbhate //
analyzed: sa māṃsaiḥ bhojanaiḥ snigdhaiḥ madyaiḥ gandha vilepanaiḥ vastraiḥ manoramaiḥ mālyaiḥ kāmaḥ strīṣu vijṛmbhate

original: brahmacarye 'pi vaktavyaṃ prāptaṃ manmathaceṣṭitam / hṛdyaṃ hi puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā yoniḥ praklidyate striyāḥ //
analyzed: brahmacarye vaktavyam prāptam manmatha ceṣṭitam  hṛdyam hi puruṣam dṛṣṭvā yoniḥ praklidyate striyāḥ

original: suveṣaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ yadi vā sutam / yoniḥ klidyati nārīṇāṃ satyaṃsatyaṃ hi śaunaka / //
analyzed: su veṣam puruṣam dṛṣṭvā bhrātaram yadi vā sutam  yoniḥ klidyati nārīṇām satyam satyam hi śaunaka

original: nadyaśca nāryaśca samasvabhāvāḥ svatantrabhāve gamanādikeca / toyaiśca doṣaiśca nipātayanti nadyo hi kūlāni kulā ni nāryaḥ //
analyzed: nadyaḥ ca nāryaḥ ca sama svabhāvāḥ svatantra bhāve toyaiḥ ca doṣaiḥ ca nipātayanti nadyaḥ hi kūlāni ni nāryaḥ

original: nadī pātayate kūlaṃ nārī pātayate kulam / nārīṇāñca nadīnāṃ ca svacchandā lalitā gatiḥ //
analyzed: nadī pātayate kūlam nārī pātayate kulam nārīṇām ca nadīnām ca svacchandā lalitā gatiḥ

original: nāgnistṛpyati kāṣṭhānāṃ nāpagānāṃ mahodadhiḥ / nāntakaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ na puṃsāṃ vāmalocanāḥ //
analyzed: na agniḥ tṛpyati kāṣṭhānām na āpagānām mahā udadhiḥ na antakaḥ sarva bhūtānām na puṃsām vāmalocanāḥ

original: na tṛptirasti śiṣṭānāmiṣṭānāṃ priyavādinām / sukhānāñca sutānāñca jīvitasya varasya ca //
analyzed: na tṛptiḥ asti śiṣṭānām iṣṭānām priya vādinām sukhānām ca sutānām ca jīvitasya varasya ca

original: rājā na tapto dhanasaṃcayena na sāgarastṛptimagājjalena / na paṇḍitastṛpyati bhāṣitena tṛptaṃ na cakṣurnṛpadarśanena //
analyzed: rājā na taptaḥ dhana saṃcayena na sāgaraḥ tṛptim agāt jalena  na paṇḍitaḥ tṛpyati bhāṣitena tṛptam na cakṣuḥ nṛpa darśanena

original: svakarma dharmārjitajīvitānāṃ śāstreṣu dāreṣu sadā ratānām / jitendriyāṇāmatithipriyāṇāṃ gṛhe 'pi mokṣaḥ puruṣottamānām //
analyzed: sva karma dharma arjita jīvitānām śāstreṣu dāreṣu sadā ratānām jita indriyāṇām atithi priyāṇām gṛhe mokṣaḥ puruṣa uttamānām

original: mano 'nukūlāḥ pramadārūpavatyaḥ svalaṅkṛtāḥ / vasaḥ prāsādapṛṣṭheṣu svargaḥ syācchubhakarmaṇaḥ //
analyzed: pramadā rūpavatyaḥ su alaṅkṛtāḥ prāsāda pṛṣṭheṣu svargaḥ syāt śubha karmaṇaḥ

original: na dānena na mānena nārjavena na savayā / na śastreṇa na śāstreṇa sarvathā viṣamā striyaḥ //
analyzed: na dānena na mānena na ārjavena na na savayā na śastreṇa na śāstreṇa sarvathā viṣamāḥ striyaḥ

original: śanairvidyā śanairthāḥ śanaiḥ parvatamāruhet / śanaiḥ kāmaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca pañcaitāni śanaiḥ śanaiḥ //
analyzed: śanais vidyā śanais parvatam āruhet śanais kāmam ca dharmam ca pañca etāni śanais śanais

original: śāśvataṃ devapūjādi vipradānaṃ ca śāśvatam / śāśvataṃ saguṇā vidyā suhṛnmitraṃ ca śāśvatam //
analyzed: śāśvatam deva pūjā ādi vipra dānam ca śāśvatam  śāśvatam sa guṇā vidyā suhṛd mitram ca śāśvatam

original: ye bālabhāvānna paṭhanti vidyāṃ ye yauvanasthā hyadhanātmadārāḥ / te śocanīyā iha jīvaloke manuṣyarūpeṇa mṛgāścaranti //
analyzed: ye bāla bhāvāt na paṭhanti vidyām ye yauvana sthāḥ hi a dhana ātma dārāḥ te śocanīyāḥ iha jīva loke manuṣya rūpeṇa mṛgāḥ caranti

original: paṭhane bhojane cittaṃ na kuryācchāstrasevakaḥ / sudūramapi vidyārtho vrajedgaruḍavegavān //
analyzed: paṭhane bhojane cittam na kuryāt śāstra sevakaḥ su dūram api vidyā arthaḥ vrajet garuḍa vegavān

original: ye bālabhāve na paṭhanti vidyāṃ kāmāturā yauvananaṣṭavittāḥ / te vṛddhabāve paribhūyamānāḥ saṃdahyamānāḥ śiśire yathābjam //
analyzed: ye bāla bhāve na paṭhanti vidyām kāma āturāḥ yauvana naṣṭa vittāḥ te vṛddha bāve paribhūyamānāḥ saṃdahyamānāḥ śiśire yathā abjam

original: tarke 'pratiṣṭhā śrutayo vibhinnāḥ nāsāvṛṣiryasya mataṃ na bhinnam / dharmasya tattvaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ mahājano yena gataḥ sa panthāḥ //
analyzed: tarke pratiṣṭhā śrutayaḥ vibhinnāḥ na asau ṛṣiḥ yasya matam na bhinnam  dharmasya tattvam nihitam guhāyām mahājanaḥ yena gataḥ sa panthāḥ

original: ākārairiṅgitairgatyā ceṣṭayā bhāṣitena ca / netravakravikārābhyāṃ lakṣyate 'ntargataṃ manaḥ //
analyzed: ākāraiḥ iṅgitaiḥ gatyā ceṣṭayā bhāṣitena ca netra vakra vikārābhyām lakṣyate ntargatam manaḥ

original: anuktamapyūhati paṇḍito janaḥ pareṅgitajñānaphalā hi buddhayaḥ / udīritorthaḥ paśunāpi gṛhyate hayāśca nāgāśca vahanti darśitam //
analyzed: anuktam api ūhati paṇḍitaḥ janaḥ para iṅgita jñāna phalāḥ hi buddhayaḥ udīrita ūrthaḥ paśunā api gṛhyate hayāḥ ca nāgāḥ ca vahanti darśitam

original: arthādbhraṣṭastīrthayātrāṃ tu gacchetsatyādbhraṣṭo rauravaṃ vai vrajecca / yogādbhraṣṭaḥ satyaghṛtiñca gacchedrājyādbhraṣṭo mṛgayāyāṃ vrajecca //
analyzed: arthāt bhraṣṭaḥ tīrtha yātrām tu gacchet satyāt bhraṣṭaḥ rauravam vai vrajet ca yogāt bhraṣṭaḥ gacchet rājyāt bhraṣṭaḥ mṛgayāyām vrajet ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre navottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nīti sāre navottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 110
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / yodhruvāṇi parityajya hyadhuvāṇi niṣevate / dhruvāṇi tasya naśyanti hyadhruvaṃ naṣṭameva ca //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca  yaḥ dhruvāṇi parityajya hi adhuvāṇi niṣevate  dhruvāṇi tasya naśyanti hi adhruvam naṣṭam eva ca

original: vāgyantrahīnasya narasya vidyā śastraṃ yathā kāpuruṣasya haste / na tuṣṭimutpādayate śarīre hyandhasya dārā iva darśanīyāḥ //
analyzed: vāc yantra hīnasya narasya vidyā śastram yathā kāpuruṣasya haste na tuṣṭim utpādayate śarīre hi andhasya dārāḥ iva darśanīyāḥ

original: bhojye bhojanaśaktiśca ratiśaktirvarastriyaḥ / vibhave dānaśaktiśca nālpasya tapasaḥ phalam //
analyzed: bhojye bhojana śaktiḥ ca rati śaktiḥ vara striyaḥ  vibhave dāna śaktiḥ ca na alpasya tapasaḥ phalam

original: agnihotraphalā vedāḥ śīlavṛttiphalaṃ śubham / ratiputraphalā dārā dattabhuktaphalaṃ dhanam //
analyzed: agnihotra phalāḥ vedāḥ śīla vṛtti phalam śubham rati putra phalāḥ dārāḥ datta bhukta phalam dhanam

original: varayetkulajāṃ prājño virūpāmapi kanyakām / surūpāṃ sunitambāñca nākulīnāṃ kadācana //
analyzed: varayet kula jām prājñaḥ virūpām api kanyakām surūpām su nitambām ca na akulīnām kadācana

original: arthenāpi hi kiṃ tena yasyānarthe tu saṃgatiḥ / ko hi nāma śikhājātaṃ pannagasya maṇiṃ haret //
analyzed: arthena api hi kim tena yasya anarthe tu saṃgatiḥ kaḥ hi nāma śikhā jātam pannagasya maṇim haret

original: havirduṣṭakuladvāhyaṃ bālādapi subhāṣitam / amedhyātkāñcanaṃ grāhyaṃ strīratnaṃ duṣkulādapi //
analyzed: bālāt api subhāṣitam  amedhyāt kāñcanam grāhyam strī ratnam duṣkulāt api

original: viṣādapyamṛtaṃ grāhyamamedhyādapi kāñcanam / nīcādapyuttamāṃ vidyāṃ strīratnaṃ duṣkulādapi //
analyzed: viṣāt api amṛtam grāhyam amedhyāt api kāñcanam nīcāt api uttamām vidyām strī ratnam duṣkulāt api

original: na rājñā saha mitratvaṃ na sarpo nirviṣaḥ kracit / na kulaṃ nirmalaṃ tatra strījano yatra jāyate //
analyzed: na rājñā saha mitra tvam na sarpaḥ nirviṣaḥ kracid na kulam nirmalam tatra strī janaḥ yatra jāyate

original: kule niyojayedbhaktaṃ putraṃ vidyāsu yojayet / vyasane yojayecchatrumiṣṭaṃ dharme niyojyet //
analyzed: kule niyojayet bhaktam putram vidyāsu yojayet  vyasane yojayet śatrum iṣṭam dharme niyojyet

original: sthāneṣveva prayoktāvyā bhṛtyāścābharaṇāni ca / na hi cūḍāmaṇiḥ pāde śobhate vai kadācana //
analyzed: sthāneṣu eva prayoktāvyāḥ bhṛtyāḥ ca ābharaṇāni ca  na hi cūḍāmaṇiḥ pāde śobhate vai kadācana

original: cūḍāmaṇiḥ samudro 'gnirghaṇṭā cākhaṇḍamambaram / athavā pṛthivīpālo mūrdhni pāde pramādataḥ //
analyzed: cūḍāmaṇiḥ samudraḥ gniḥ ghaṇṭā ca akhaṇḍam ambaram athavā pṛthivīpālaḥ mūrdhni pāde pramādataḥ

original: kusumastabakasyeva dve gatī tu manasvinaḥ / mūrdhni vā sarvalokānāṃ śīrṣataḥ patito vane //
analyzed: kusuma stabakasya iva dve gatī tu manasvinaḥ mūrdhni vā sarva lokānām śīrṣataḥ patitaḥ vane

original: kanakabhūṣaṇasaṃgrahaṇocito yadi maṇistrapuṇi pratibadhyate / na ca virauti na cāpi sa śobhate bhavati yojayiturvacanīyatā //
analyzed: kanaka bhūṣaṇa saṃgrahaṇa ucitaḥ yadi maṇiḥ trapuṇi pratibadhyate na ca virauti na ca api sa śobhate bhavati yojayituḥ vacanīya tā

original: vājivāraṇalauhānāṃ kāṣṭhapāṣāṇavāsasām / nārīpuruṣatoyānāmantaraṃ mahadantaram //
analyzed: vāji vāraṇa lauhānām kāṣṭha pāṣāṇa vāsasām nārī puruṣa toyānām antaram mahat antaram

original: kadarthitasyāpi hi dhairyavṛtterna śakyate sarvaguṇapramāthaḥ / adhaḥ khalenāpi kṛtasya vahnernādhaḥ śikhā yāti kadācideva //
analyzed: kadarthitasya api hi dhairya vṛtteḥ na śakyate sarva guṇa pramāthaḥ adhas khalena api kṛtasya vahneḥ na adhas śikhā yāti kadācid eva

original: na sadaśvaḥ kaśāghātaṃ siṃho na gajagarjitam / vīro vā paranirdiṣṭaṃ na sahedbhīmaniḥ svanam //
analyzed: na sat aśvaḥ kaśā ghātam siṃhaḥ na gaja garjitam vīraḥ vā para nirdiṣṭam na sahet bhīma niḥ svanam

original: yadi vibhavavihīnaḥ pracyuto vāśu daivānna tu khalajanasevāṃ kāṅkṣayennaiva nīcām / na tṛṇamadanakārye sukṣudhārto 'tti siṃhaḥ pibati rudhiramuṣṇaṃ prāyaśaḥ kuñcarāṇām //
analyzed: yadi vibhava vihīnaḥ pracyutaḥ vā āśu daivāt na tu khala jana sevām kāṅkṣayet na eva nīcām  na tṛṇa madana kārye su kṣudhā ārtaḥ siṃhaḥ pibati rudhiram uṣṇam prāyaśas kuñcarāṇām

original: sakṛdduṣṭañca yo mitraṃ punaḥ sandhātumicchati / sa mṛtyumeva gṛhṇīyādgarbhamaśvatarī yathā //
analyzed: sakṛt duṣṭam ca yaḥ mitram punar sandhātum icchati sa mṛtyum eva gṛhṇīyāt garbham aśvatarī yathā

original: śatrorapatyāni priyaṃvadāni nopekṣitavyāni budhairmanuṣyaiḥ / tānyeva kāleṣu vipatkarāṇi viṣasya pātrāṇyapi dāruṇāni //
analyzed: śatroḥ apatyāni priyaṃvadāni na upekṣitavyāni budhaiḥ manuṣyaiḥ tāni eva kāleṣu vipad karāṇi viṣasya pātrāṇi api dāruṇāni

original: upakāragṛhītena śatruṇā śatrumuddharet / pādalagnaṃ karasthena kaṇṭakenaiva kaṇṭakam //
analyzed: upakāra gṛhītena śatruṇā śatrum uddharet pāda lagnam kara sthena kaṇṭakena eva kaṇṭakam

original: apakāraparānnityaṃ cinta yenna kadācana / svayameva patiṣyanti kūlajātā iva drumāḥ //
analyzed: apakāra parān nityam cinta yet na kadācana svayam eva patiṣyanti kūla jātāḥ iva drumāḥ

original: anarthā hyartharūṣāśca arthāścānartharūpiṇaḥ / bhavanti te vināśāya daivāyattasya vai sadā //
analyzed: anarthāḥ hi artha rūṣāḥ ca arthāḥ ca anartha rūpiṇaḥ bhavanti te vināśāya daiva āyattasya vai sadā

original: kāryakālocitāpāpā matiḥ sañjāyate hi vai / sānukūle tu daive śaṃ puṃsaḥ sarvatra jāyate //
analyzed: kārya kāla ucita apāpā matiḥ sañjāyate hi vai sa anukūle tu daive śam puṃsaḥ sarvatra jāyate

original: dhanaprayogakāryeṣuḥ tathā vidyā gameṣu ca / āhāre vyavahāre ca tyaktalajjaḥ sadā bhavet //
analyzed: dhana prayoga kārya iṣuḥ tathā vidyā gameṣu ca āhāre vyavahāre ca tyakta lajjaḥ sadā bhavet

original: dhaninaḥ śrotriyo rājā nadī vaidyastu pañcamaḥ / pañca yatra na vidyante na kuryāttatratra saṃsthitim //
analyzed: dhaninaḥ śrotriyaḥ rājā nadī vaidyaḥ tu pañcamaḥ pañca yatra na vidyante na kuryāt tatra tra saṃsthitim

original: lokayātrā bhayaṃ lajjā dākṣiṇyaṃ dānaśīlatā / pañca yatra na vidyante na tatra divasaṃ vaset //
analyzed: lokayātrā bhayam lajjā dākṣiṇyam dāna śīla tā pañca yatra na vidyante na tatra divasam vaset

original: kālavicchotriyo rājā nadī sādhuśca pañcamaḥ / ete yatra na vidyante tatra vāsaṃ na kārayet //
analyzed: kāla vid śotriyaḥ rājā nadī sādhuḥ ca pañcamaḥ ete yatra na vidyante tatra vāsam na kārayet

original: naikatra pariniṣṭhāsti jñānasya kila śaunaka / sarvaḥ sarvaṃ na jānāti sarvajño nāsti kutracit //
analyzed: na ekatra pariniṣṭhā asti jñānasya kila śaunaka sarvaḥ sarvam na jānāti sarvajñaḥ nā asti kutracid

original: na sarvavitkaścidihāsti loke nātyantamūrkho bhuvi cāpi kaścit / jñānena nīcottamamadhyamena yo 'yaṃ vijānāti sa tena vidvān //
analyzed: na sarva vid kaścid iha asti loke na atyanta mūrkhaḥ bhuvi ca api kaścid jñānena nīca uttama madhyamena yaḥ yam vijānāti sa tena vidvān

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre daśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nīti sāre daśottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 111
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / pārthivasya tu vakṣyāmi bhṛtyānāñcaiva lakṣaṇam / sarvāṇi hi mahīpālaḥ samyaṅnityaṃ parīkṣayet //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca pārthivasya tu vakṣyāmi bhṛtyānām ca eva lakṣaṇam sarvāṇi hi mahīpālaḥ samyak nityam parīkṣayet

original: rājyaṃ pālayate nityaṃ satyadharmaparāyaṇaḥ / nirjitya parasainyāni kṣitaṃ dharmeṇa pālayet //
analyzed: rājyam pālayate nityam satya dharma parāyaṇaḥ nirjitya para sainyāni kṣitam dharmeṇa pālayet

original: puṣpātpuṣpaṃ vicinvīta mūlacchedaṃ na kārayet / mālākāra ivāraṇye na yathāṅgārakārakaḥ //
analyzed: puṣpāt puṣpam vicinvīta mūla chedam na kārayet mālākāraḥ iva araṇye na yathā aṅgāra kārakaḥ

original: dogdhāraḥ kṣīrabhuñjānā vikṛtaṃ tanna bhuñjate / pararāṣṭraṃ mahīpālairbhoktavyaṃ na ca dūṣayet //
analyzed: dogdhāraḥ kṣīra bhuñjānāḥ vikṛtam tat na bhuñjate para rāṣṭram mahīpālaiḥ bhoktavyam na ca dūṣayet

original: nodhaśchindyāttu yo dhenvāḥ kṣārārtho labhate payaḥ / evaṃ rāṣṭraṃ prayogeṇa pīḍyamānaṃ na vardhate //
analyzed: na ūdhaḥ chindyāt tu yaḥ dhenvāḥ kṣāra arthaḥ labhate payaḥ evam rāṣṭram prayogeṇa pīḍyamānam na vardhate

original: tasmātsarvaprayatnena pṛthivīmanupālayen / pālakasya bhavedbhūmiḥ kīrtirāyuryaśo balam //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena pṛthivīm anupālayen  pālakasya bhavet bhūmiḥ kīrtiḥ āyuḥ yaśaḥ balam

original: ābhyarcya viṣṇuṃ dharmātmā gobrāhmaṇahite rataḥ / prajāḥ pālayituṃ śaktaḥ pārthivo vijitendriyaḥ //
analyzed: ā abhyarcya viṣṇum dharma ātmā go brāhmaṇa hite rataḥ prajāḥ pālayitum śaktaḥ pārthivaḥ vijita indriyaḥ

original: aiśvaryamadhruvaṃ prāpya rājā dharme matiñcaret / kṣaṇena vibhavo naśyennātmāyattaṃ dhanādikam //
analyzed: aiśvaryam adhruvam prāpya rājā dharme matin caret kṣaṇena vibhavaḥ naśyet na ātma āyattam dhana ādikam

original: satyaṃ manoramāḥ kāmāḥ satyaṃ ramyā vibhūtayaḥ / kintu vai vanitāpāṅgabhaṅgilolaṃ hi jīvitam //
analyzed: satyam manoramāḥ kāmāḥ satyam ramyāḥ vibhūtayaḥ kintu vai vanitā apāṅga bhaṅgi lolam hi jīvitam

original: vyāghrīva tiṣṭhati jarā paritarjayantī rogāśca śatrava iva prabhavanti gātre / āyuḥ paristravati bhinnaghaṭādivāmbho loko na cātmahitamācaratīha kaścit //
analyzed: vyāghrī iva tiṣṭhati jarā paritarjayantī rogāḥ ca śatravaḥ iva prabhavanti gātre āyuḥ paristravati bhinna ghaṭāt iva ambhaḥ lokaḥ na ca ātma hitam ācarati iha kaścid

original: niḥ śaṅkaṃ kiṃ manuṣyāḥ kuruta parahitaṃ yuktamagre hitaṃ yanmodadhvaṃ kāminībhirmadanaśarahatā mandamandātidṛṣṭyā / mā pāpaṃ saṃkurudhvaṃ dvijahariparamāḥ saṃbhajadhvaṃ sadaiva āyurniḥ śeṣameti skhalati jalaghaṭībhūtamṛtyucchalena //
analyzed: niḥ śaṅkam kim manuṣyāḥ kuruta para hitam yuktam agre hitam yat modadhvam kāminībhiḥ madana śara hatāḥ manda manda ati dṛṣṭyā mā pāpam saṃkurudhvam dvija hari paramāḥ saṃbhajadhvam sadā eva āyuḥ niḥ śeṣam eti skhalati jala ghaṭī bhūta mṛtyu chalena

original: mātṛvatparadāreṣu paradravyeṣu loṣṭavat / ātmavat sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ paśyati sa paṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: mātṛ vat para dāreṣu para dravyeṣu loṣṭa vat ātma vat sarva bhūteṣu yaḥ paśyati sa paṇḍitaḥ

original: etadarthaṃ hi viprendrā rājyamicchanti bhūbhṛtaḥ / yadeṣāṃ sarvakāryeṣu vaco na pratihanyate //
analyzed: etad artham hi vipra indrāḥ rājyam icchanti bhūbhṛtaḥ yat eṣām sarva kāryeṣu vacaḥ na pratihanyate

original: etadarthaṃ hi kurvanti rājāno dhanasañcayam / rakṣayitvā tu cātmānaṃ yaddhanaṃ taddvijātaye //
analyzed: etad artham hi kurvanti rājānaḥ dhana sañcayam rakṣayitvā tu ca ātmānam yat dhanam tat dvijātaye

original: oṅkāraśabdo viprāṇāṃ yena rāṣṭraṃ pravardhate / sa rājā vardhate yogādvyādhibhiśca na badhyate //
analyzed: oṅkāra śabdaḥ viprāṇām yena rāṣṭram pravardhate sa rājā vardhate yogāt vyādhibhiḥ ca na badhyate

original: asamarthāśca kurvanti munayo dravyasañcayam / kiṃ punastu mahīpālaḥ putravatpālayanprajāḥ //
analyzed: asamarthāḥ ca kurvanti munayaḥ dravya sañcayam  kim punar tu mahīpālaḥ putra vat pālayan prajāḥ

original: yasyārthāstasya mitrāṇi yasyārthāstasya bāndhavāḥ / yasyārthāḥ sa mumāṃllāke yasyārthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: yasya arthāḥ tasya mitrāṇi yasya arthāḥ tasya bāndhavāḥ yasya arthāḥ sa yasya arthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ

original: tyajanti mitrāṇi dhanairvihīnaṃ putrāśca dārāśca suhṛjjanāśca / te cārthavantaṃ punarāśrayanti hyartho hi loke puruṣasya bandhuḥ //
analyzed: tyajanti mitrāṇi dhanaiḥ vihīnam putrāḥ ca dārāḥ ca suhṛd janāḥ ca  te ca arthavantam punar āśrayanti hi arthaḥ hi loke puruṣasya bandhuḥ

original: andhā hi rājā bhavati yastu sāstravivarjitaḥ / andhaḥ paśyati cāreṇa śāstrahīno na paśyati //
analyzed: andhāḥ hi rājā bhavati yaḥ tu sa astra vivarjitaḥ andhaḥ paśyati cāreṇa śāstra hīnaḥ na paśyati

original: yasya putrāśca bhṛtyāśca mantriṇaśca purohitāḥ / indriyāṇi prasuptāni tasya rājyaṃ ciraṃ na hi //
analyzed: yasya putrāḥ ca bhṛtyāḥ ca mantriṇaḥ ca purohitāḥ indriyāṇi prasuptāni tasya rājyam ciram na hi

original: yenārjitāstrayo 'pyo 'pyete putrā bhṛtyāśca bāndhavāḥ / jitā tena samaṃ bhūpaiścaturabdhirvasundharā //
analyzed: yena arjitāḥ trayaḥ pya u pi ete putrāḥ bhṛtyāḥ ca bāndhavāḥ jitā tena samam bhūpaiḥ catur abdhiḥ vasundharā

original: laṅghayecchāstrayuktāni hetuyuktāni yāni ca / sahi naśyati vai rājā iha loke paratra ca //
analyzed: laṅghayet śāstra yuktāni hetu yuktāni yāni ca sahi naśyati vai rājā iha loke paratra ca

original: manastāpaṃ na kurvīta āpadaṃ prāpya pārthivaḥ / samabuddhiḥ prasannātmā prasannātmā sukhaduḥkhe samo bhavet //
analyzed: manaḥ tāpam na kurvīta āpadam prāpya pārthivaḥ sama buddhiḥ prasanna ātmā prasanna ātmā sukha duḥkhe samaḥ bhavet

original: dhīrāḥ kaṣṭamanuprāpya na bhavanti viṣādinaḥ / praviśya vadanaṃ rāhoḥ kiṃ nodati punaḥ śaśī //
analyzed: dhīrāḥ kaṣṭam anuprāpya na bhavanti viṣādinaḥ praviśya vadanam rāhoḥ kim punar śaśī

original: dhigdhik śarīrasukhalālitamānaveṣu mā khedayeddhanakṛśaṃ hi śarīrameva / saddārakā hyadhanapāṇḍusutāḥ śrutā hi duḥkhaṃ vihāya punareva sukhaṃ prapannāḥ //
analyzed: dhik dhik śarīra sukha lālita mānaveṣu mā khedayet dhana kṛśam hi śarīram eva sat dārakāḥ hi adhana pāṇḍu sutāḥ śrutāḥ hi duḥkham vihāya punar eva sukham prapannāḥ

original: gandharvavidyāmālokya vādyaṃ ca gaṇikāgaṇān / dhanurvedārthaśāstrāṇi loke rakṣecca bhūpatiḥ //
analyzed: gandharva vidyām ālokya vādyam ca gaṇikā gaṇān dhanurveda artha śāstrāṇi loke rakṣet ca bhūpatiḥ

original: kāraṇena vinā bhṛtye yastu kupyati pārthivaḥ / sa gṛhṇāti viṣonmādaṃ kṛṣṇasarpavisarjitam //
analyzed: kāraṇena vinā bhṛtye yaḥ tu kupyati pārthivaḥ sa gṛhṇāti viṣa unmādam kṛṣṇasarpa visarjitam

original: cāpalādvārayeddṛṣṭiṃ mithyāvākyañca vārayet / mānave śrotriye caiva bhṛtyavarge sadaiva hi //
analyzed: cāpalāt vārayet dṛṣṭim mithyā vākyam ca vārayet mānave śrotriye ca eva bhṛtya varge sadā eva hi

original: līlāṃ karoti yo rājā bhṛtyasvajanagarvitaḥ / śāsane sarvadā kṣipraṃ ripubhiḥ paribhūyate //
analyzed: līlām karoti yaḥ rājā bhṛtya sva jana garvitaḥ śāsane sarvadā kṣipram ripubhiḥ paribhūyate

original: huṅkāre bhṛkuṭīṃ naiva sadā kurvīta pārthivaḥ / vinā doṣeṇa yo bhṛtyānrājādhamaṇa śāsti ca / līlāsukhāni bhogyāni tyajediha mahīpatiḥ //
analyzed: huṅkāre bhṛkuṭīm nā eva sadā kurvīta pārthivaḥ vinā doṣeṇa yaḥ bhṛtyān rāja adhamaṇa śāsti ca līlā sukhāni bhogyāni tyajet iha mahīpatiḥ

original: sukhapravṛttaiḥ sādhyantai śatravo vigrahe sthitaiḥ //
analyzed: sukha pravṛttaiḥ śatravaḥ vigrahe sthitaiḥ

original: udyogaḥ sāhasaṃdhairyaṃ buddhiḥ śaktiḥ parākramaḥ / ṣaḍvidho yasya utsāhastasya devo 'pi śaṅkate //
analyzed: udyogaḥ sāhasam dhairyam buddhiḥ śaktiḥ parākramaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ yasya utsāhaḥ tasya śaṅkate

original: udyogena kṛte kārye siddharyasya na vidyate / daivaṃ tasya pramāṇaṃ hi kartavyaṃ pauruṣaṃ sadā //
analyzed: udyogena kṛte kārye siddhar yasya na vidyate  daivam tasya pramāṇam hi kartavyam pauruṣam sadā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre ekādaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nīti sāre ekādaśottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 112
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / bhṛtyā bahuvidhā jñeyā uttamādhamamadhyamāḥ / niyoktavyā yathārheṣu trividheṣveva karmasu //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca bhṛtyāḥ bahuvidhāḥ jñeyāḥ uttama adhama madhyamāḥ niyoktavyāḥ yathārheṣu trividheṣu eva karmasu

original: bhṛtye parikṣaṇaṃ vakṣye yasyayasya hi yo guṇaḥ / tamimaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi ye yathākathitaṃ kila //
analyzed: bhṛtye pari kṣaṇam vakṣye yasya yasya hi yaḥ guṇaḥ tam imam saṃpravakṣyāmi ye yathā kathitam kila

original: yathā caturbhiḥ kanakaṃ parīkṣyate nigharṣaṇacchedanatāpatāḍanaiḥ / tathā caturbhirbhṛtakaṃ parīkṣayedvatena śīlena kalena karmaṇā //
analyzed: yathā caturbhiḥ kanakam parīkṣyate nigharṣaṇa chedana tāpa tāḍanaiḥ tathā caturbhiḥ bhṛtakam śīlena kalena karmaṇā

original: kulaśīlaguṇopetaḥ satyadharmaparāyaṇaḥ / rūpavānsuprasannaśca kośādhyakṣo vidhīyate //
analyzed: kula śīla guṇa upetaḥ satya dharma parāyaṇaḥ rūpavān su prasannaḥ ca kośa adhyakṣaḥ vidhīyate

original: mūlyarūpaparīkṣākṛdbhave dratnaparīkṣakaḥ / balābalaparijñātā senādhyakṣo vidhīyate //
analyzed: mūlya rūpa parīkṣā kṛt bhave dratna parīkṣakaḥ bala abala parijñātā senā adhyakṣaḥ vidhīyate

original: iṅgitākāratattvajño balavān priyadarśanaḥ / apramādī pramāthī ca pratīhāraḥ sa ucyate //
analyzed: iṅgita ākāra tattva jñaḥ balavān priya darśanaḥ apramādī pramāthī ca pratīhāraḥ saḥ ucyate

original: medhāvī vākpaṭuḥ prājñaḥ satyavādī jitendriyaḥ / sarvaśāstrasamālokī hyeṣa sādhuḥ sa lekhakaḥ //
analyzed: medhāvī vāc paṭuḥ prājñaḥ satya vādī jita indriyaḥ sarva śāstra samālokī hi eṣa sādhuḥ sa lekhakaḥ

original: buddhimānmatimāṃścaiva paracittopalakṣakaḥ / krūro yathoktavādī ca eṣa dūto vidhīyate //
analyzed: buddhimān matimān ca eva para citta upalakṣakaḥ krūraḥ yathā ukta vādī ca eṣa dūtaḥ vidhīyate

original: samastasmṛtiśāstrajñaḥ paṇḍito 'tha jitendriyaḥ / śauryavīryaguṇopeto dharmādhyakṣo vidhīyate //
analyzed: samasta smṛti śāstra jñaḥ jita indriyaḥ śaurya vīrya guṇa upetaḥ dharma adhyakṣaḥ vidhīyate

original: pitṛpaitāmaho dakṣaḥ śāstrajñaḥ satyavācakaḥ / śuciśca kaṭhinaścaiva sūpakāraḥ sa ucyate //
analyzed: pitṛpaitāmahaḥ dakṣaḥ śāstra jñaḥ satya vācakaḥ śuciḥ ca kaṭhinaḥ ca eva sūpa kāraḥ saḥ ucyate

original: āyurvedakṛtābhyāsaḥ sarveṣāṃ priyadarśanaḥ / āyuḥ śīlaguṇopeto vaidya eva vidhīyate //
analyzed: āyurveda kṛta abhyāsaḥ sarveṣām priya darśanaḥ āyuḥ śīla guṇa upetaḥ vaidyaḥ eva vidhīyate

original: vedavedāṅgatattvajño japahamaparāyaṇaḥ / āśīrvādaparo nityameṣa rājapurohita //
analyzed: veda vedāṅga tattva jñaḥ japa hama parāyaṇaḥ āśīrvāda paraḥ nityam eṣa rāja purohita

original: lekhakaḥ pāṭhakaścaiva gaṇakaḥ pratirodhakaḥ / ālasyayuktaścaidrājā karma saṃvarjayetsadā //
analyzed: lekhakaḥ pāṭhakaḥ ca eva gaṇakaḥ pratirodhakaḥ  ālasya yuktaḥ ca edrājā karma saṃvarjayet sadā

original: dvijihvamudvegakaraṃ krūramekāntadāruṇam / khalasyāheśca vadanamapakārāya kevalam //
analyzed: dvijihvam udvega karam krūram ekānta dāruṇam khalasya aheḥ ca vadanam apakārāya kevalam

original: durjanaḥ parihartavyo vidyayālaṅkṛto 'pisan / maṇinā bhūṣitaḥ sarpaḥ kimasau na bhayaṅkaraḥ //
analyzed: durjanaḥ parihartavyaḥ vidyayā alaṅkṛtaḥ pisan maṇinā bhūṣitaḥ sarpaḥ kim asau na bhayaṅkaraḥ

original: akāraṇaviṣkṛtakopadhāriṇaḥ khalādbhayaṃ kasya na nāma jāyate / viṣaṃ mahāherviṣamasya durvacaḥ saduḥ sahaṃ sannipatetsadā mukhe //
analyzed: akāraṇa viṣkṛta kopa dhāriṇaḥ khalāt bhayam kasya na nāma jāyate viṣam mahā aheḥ viṣamasya durvacaḥ sa duḥ saham san nipatet sadā mukhe

original: tulyārthaṃ tulyasāmarthyaṃ marmajñaṃ vyavasāyinam / ardharājyaharaṃ bhṛtyaṃ yo hanyātsa na hanyate //
analyzed: tulya artham tulya sāmarthyam marma jñam vyavasāyinam ardha rājya haram bhṛtyam yaḥ hanyāt sa na hanyate

original: śūratvayuktā mṛdumandavākyā jitendriyāḥ satyaparākramāśca / prāgeva paścādviparī tarupā ye te tu bhṛtyā na hitā bhavanti //
analyzed: śūra tva yuktāḥ mṛdu manda vākyāḥ jita indriyāḥ satya parākramāḥ ca prāk eva paścāt viparī ye te tu bhṛtyāḥ na hitāḥ bhavanti

original: nirālasyāḥ susantuṣṭāḥ pratibodhakāḥ / sukhaduḥ khasamā dhīrā bhṛtyā lokeṣu durlabhāḥ //
analyzed: nirālasyāḥ su santuṣṭāḥ pratibodhakāḥ sukha duḥ kha samāḥ dhīrāḥ bhṛtyāḥ lokeṣu durlabhāḥ

original: kṣāntistayavihīnaśca krūrabuddhiśca nindakaḥ / dāmbhikaḥ kapaṭī caiva śaṭhaśca spṛhayānvitaḥ / aśakto bhayabhītaśca rājñā tyaktavya eva saḥ //
analyzed: kṣāntiḥ taya vihīnaḥ ca krūra buddhiḥ ca nindakaḥ  dāmbhikaḥ kapaṭī ca eva śaṭhaḥ ca spṛhayā anvitaḥ aśaktaḥ bhaya bhītaḥ ca rājñā tyaktavyaḥ eva saḥ

original: susandhānāni cāstrāṇi śastrāṇi vividhāni ca / durge praveśitavyāni tataḥ śatruṃ nipātayet //
analyzed: su sandhānāni ca astrāṇi śastrāṇi vividhāni ca  durge praveśitavyāni tatas śatrum nipātayet

original: ṣaṇmāsamatha varṣaṃ vā sandhiṃ kuryānnarādhipaḥ / paśyansañcitamātmānaṃ punaḥ śatruṃ nipātayet //
analyzed: ṣaṣ māsam atha varṣam vā sandhim kuryāt narādhipaḥ paśyan sañcitam ātmānam punar śatrum nipātayet

original: mūrkhānniyojayedyastu trayo 'pyete mahīpateḥ / ayaśaścārthanāśaśca narake caiva pātanam //
analyzed: mūrkhān niyojayet yaḥ tu trayaḥ pi ete mahīpateḥ ayaśaḥ ca artha nāśaḥ ca narake ca eva pātanam

original: yatkiñcitkurute karma śubhaṃ vā yādi vāśubham / tena sma vardhate rājā sūkṣmato bhṛtyakāryataḥ //
analyzed: yat kiñcid kurute karma śubham vā yā ādi vā aśubham tena sma vardhate rājā sūkṣmataḥ bhṛtya kāryataḥ

original: tasmādbhūmīśvaraḥ prājñaṃ dharmakāmārthasādhane / niyoja yeddhisatataṃ gobrāhmaṇahitāya vai //
analyzed: tasmāt bhūmīśvaraḥ prājñam dharma kāma artha sādhane niyoja yet hi satatam go brāhmaṇa hitāya vai

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhaspatyukta nītiptāre dvādaśottarakaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe dvādaśottarakaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 113
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / guṇavantaṃ niyuñjīta guṇahīnaṃ vivarjayet / paṇḍitasya guṇāḥ sarve mūrve doṣāśca kevalāḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca guṇavantam niyuñjīta guṇa hīnam vivarjayet paṇḍitasya guṇāḥ sarve mūrve doṣāḥ ca kevalāḥ

original: sadbhirāsīta satataṃ sadbhiḥ kurvīta saṅgatim / sadbhirvivādaṃ maitrīñca nāsadbhiḥ kiñcidācaret //
analyzed: sadbhiḥ āsīta satatam sadbhiḥ kurvīta saṅgatim sadbhiḥ vivādam na asadbhiḥ kiñcid ācaret

original: paṇḍitaiśca virnātaiśca dharmaśaiḥ satyavādibhiḥ / bandhstho 'pi tiṣṭhecca na tu rājye khalaiḥ saha //
analyzed: paṇḍitaiḥ ca dharmaśaiḥ satya vādibhiḥ tiṣṭhet ca na tu rājye khalaiḥ saha

original: sāvaśeṣāṇi kāryāṇi kuvatrarthe yujyate / tasmātsarvāṇi kāryāṇi sāvaśeṣāṇi kārayet //
analyzed: sa avaśeṣāṇi kāryāṇi kuvatra arthe yujyate tasmāt sarvāṇi kāryāṇi sa avaśeṣāṇi kārayet

original: madhuheva duhetsāraṃ kusumañca na ghātayet / vatsāpekṣī duhetkṣīraṃ bhūmiṃ gāñcaiva pārthipaḥ //
analyzed: madhu hā iva duhet sāram kusumam ca na ghātayet vatsa apekṣī duhet kṣīram bhūmim gān ca eva pārthipaḥ

original: yathākrameṇa puṣpebhyaścinute madhu ṣaṭpadaḥ / tathā vittamu pādāya rājā kurvīta sañcayam //
analyzed: yathākrameṇa puṣpebhyaḥ cinute madhu ṣaṭpadaḥ tathā vittam u pādāya rājā kurvīta sañcayam

original: valmīkaṃ madhujālañca śuklaṇkṣe tu candramāḥ / rājadravyañca bhaikṣyañca stokaṃstokaṃ pravardhate //
analyzed: valmīkam madhu jālam ca śuklaṇkṣe tu candramāḥ rāja dravyam ca bhaikṣyam ca stokam stokam pravardhate

original: arjitasya kṣayaṃ dṛṣṭā saṃpradattasya sañcayam / avandhyaṃ divasaṃ kuryāddānadhyayanakarmasu //
analyzed: arjitasya kṣayam dṛṣṭā saṃpradattasya sañcayam avandhyam divasam kuryāt dāna adhyayana karmasu

original: vane 'pi doṣāḥ prabhavanti rāgiṇāṃ gṛhe 'pi pañcendriyanigrahastapaḥ / akutsite karmaṇi yaḥ pravartate nivṛttarāgasya gṛhaṃ tapovanam //
analyzed: vane pi doṣāḥ prabhavanti rāgiṇām gṛhe pi pañca indriya nigrahaḥ tapaḥ akutsite karmaṇi yaḥ pravartate nivṛtta rāgasya gṛham tapaḥ vanam

original: satyena rakṣyate dharmo vidyā yogena rakṣyate / mṛjayā rakṣyate pātraṃ kulaṃ śalina rakṣyate //
analyzed: satyena rakṣyate dharmaḥ vidyā yogena rakṣyate  mṛjayā rakṣyate pātram kulam śalina rakṣyate

original: varaṃ vindhyāṭavyāṃ nivasanamabhuktasya maraṇaṃ varaṃ sarpākīrṇe śayanamatha kūpe nipatanam / varaṃ bhrāntāvarte sabhayajalamadhye praviśanaṃ na tu svīye pakṣe hi dhanamaṇu dehīti kathanam //
analyzed: varam vindhya aṭavyām nivasanam abhuktasya maraṇam varam sarpa ākīrṇe śayanam atha kūpe nipatanam varam bhrānta āvarte sa bhaya jala madhye praviśanam na tu svīye pakṣe hi dhanam aṇu dehi iti kathanam

original: bhāgyakṣayeṣu kṣīyante nopabhogena sampadaḥ / pūrvārjite hi sukṛte na naśyanti kadācana //
analyzed: bhāgya kṣayeṣu kṣīyante na upabhogena sampadaḥ pūrva arjite hi sukṛte na naśyanti kadācana

original: viprāṇāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ vidyā pṛthivyā bhūṣaṇaṃ nṛpaḥ / nabhaso bhūṣaṇaṃ candraḥ śīlaṃ sarvasya bhūṣaṇam //
analyzed: viprāṇām bhūṣaṇam vidyā pṛthivyāḥ bhūṣaṇam nṛpaḥ nabhasaḥ bhūṣaṇam candraḥ śīlam sarvasya bhūṣaṇam

original: ete te candratulyāḥ kṣitipatitanayā bhīmasenārjunādyāḥ śurāḥ satyapratijñā dinakaravapuṣaḥ keśavenopagūḍhāḥ /  te vai duṣṭagrahasthāḥ kṛpaṇavaśagatā bhaikṣyacaryāṃ prayātāḥ ko vā kasminsamartho bhavati vidhivaśādbhrāmayetkarmarekhā //
analyzed: ete te candra tulyāḥ kṣitipati tanayāḥ bhīmasena arjuna ādyāḥ śurāḥ satya pratijñāḥ dinakara vapuṣaḥ keśavena upagūḍhāḥ   te vai duṣṭa graha sthāḥ kṛpaṇa vaśa gatāḥ bhaikṣya caryām prayātāḥ kaḥ vā kasmin samarthaḥ bhavati vidhi vaśāt bhrāmayet karma rekhā

original: brahmā yena kulālavanniyamito brahmāṇḍabhāṇḍodare viṣṇuryena daśāvatāragahane kṣipto mahāsaṅkaṭe / rudroyena kapālapāṇipuṭake bhikṣāṭanaṃ kāritaḥ sūryo bhrāmyati nityameva gagane taramai namaḥ karṇaṇe //
analyzed: brahmā yena kulāla vat niyamitaḥ brahmāṇḍa bhāṇḍa udare viṣṇuḥ yena daśa avatāra gahane kṣiptaḥ mahā saṅkaṭe rudroyena kapāla pāṇi puṭake bhikṣāṭanam kāritaḥ sūryaḥ bhrāmyati nityam eva gagane taramai namaḥ karṇaṇe

original: dātā baliryācakako murārirdānaṃ mahī vipramukhasya madhye / dattvā phalaṃ bandhanameva labdhaṃ namo 'stu te daiva yatheṣṭakāriṇe //
analyzed: dātā baliḥ yācakakaḥ murāriḥ dānam mahī vipra mukhasya madhye dattvā phalam bandhanam eva labdham namaḥ stu te daiva yatheṣṭa kāriṇe

original: mātā yadi bhavellakṣmīḥ pitā sākṣājjanārdanaḥ / kubuddhau pratipattiścaittasmindaṇḍaḥ patetsadā //
analyzed: mātā yadi bhavet lakṣmīḥ pitā sākṣāt janārdanaḥ ku buddhau pratipattiḥ ca et tasmin daṇḍaḥ patet sadā

original: yenayena yathā yadvatpurā karma suniścitam / tattadevāntarā bhuṅkte svayamāhitamātmanā //
analyzed: yena yena yathā yadvat purā karma su niścitam tat tat eva antarā bhuṅkte svayam āhitam ātmanā

original: ātmanā vihitaṃ duḥ khamātmanā vihitaṃ sakham / garbhaśayyāmupādāya bhuṅkte vai paurvadaihikam //
analyzed: ātmanā vihitam duḥ kham ātmanā vihitam sakham  garbhaśayyām upādāya bhuṅkte vai paurvadaihikam

original: na cāntarikṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivarapraveśe / na mātṛmūrdhni pradhṛtastathāṅke tyaktuṃ kṣamaḥ karma kṛtaṃ naro hi //
analyzed: na ca antarikṣe na samudra madhye na parvatānām vivara praveśe  na mātṛ mūrdhni pradhṛtaḥ tathā aṅke tyaktum kṣamaḥ karma kṛtam naraḥ hi

original: dugastrikūṭaḥ parikhā samudro rakṣāṃsi yodhāḥ paramā ca vṛttiḥ / śāstrañca vai tūśanasā pradiṣṭaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ kālavaśādvinaṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: dugaḥ tri kūṭaḥ parikhā samudraḥ rakṣāṃsi yodhāḥ paramā ca vṛttiḥ śāstram ca vai tu uśanasā pradiṣṭam sa rāvaṇaḥ kāla vaśāt vinaṣṭaḥ

original: yasminvayasi yatkāle yaddivā yacca vā niśi / yanmuhūrte kṣaṇe vāpi tattathā na tadanyathā //
analyzed: yasmin vayasi yat kāle yat divā yat ca vā niśi yat muhūrte kṣaṇe vā api tat tathā na tat anyathā

original: gacchanti cāntarikṣe vā praviśanti mahītale / dhārayanti diśaḥ sarvā nādattamupalabhyate //
analyzed: gacchanti ca antarikṣe vā praviśanti mahī tale dhārayanti diśaḥ sarvāḥ na a dattam upalabhyate

original: purādhītā ca yā vidyā purā dattañca yaddhanam / purā kṛtāni karmāṇi hyagre dhāvanti dhāvataḥ //
analyzed: purā adhītā ca yā vidyā purā dattam ca yat dhanam purā kṛtāni karmāṇi hi agre dhāvanti dhāvataḥ

original: karmāṇyatra pradhānāni samyagṛkṣe śubhagrahe / vasiṣṭhakṛtalagnāpi jānakī duḥ khabhājanam //
analyzed: karmāṇi atra pradhānāni samyak ṛkṣe śubha grahe vasiṣṭha kṛta lagnā api jānakī duḥ kha bhājanam

original: sthūlajaṅgho yadā rāmaḥ śabdagāmī ca lakṣmaṇaḥ / ghanakeśī yadā sītā trayaste duḥ khabhājanam //
analyzed: sthūlajaṅghaḥ yadā rāmaḥ śabdagāmī ca lakṣmaṇaḥ ghanakeśī yadā sītā trayaḥ te duḥ kha bhājanam

original: na pituḥ karmaṇā putraḥ pitā vā putrakarmaṇā / svayaṃ kṛtena gacchanti svayaṃ baddhāḥ svakarmaṇā //
analyzed: na pituḥ karmaṇā putraḥ pitā vā putra karmaṇā svayam kṛtena gacchanti svayam baddhāḥ sva karmaṇā

original: karmajanyaśarīreṣu rogāḥ śarīramānasāḥ / śarā iva patantīha vimuktā dṛḍhadhanvibhiḥ //
analyzed: karma janya śarīreṣu rogāḥ śarīra mānasāḥ śarāḥ iva patanti iha vimuktāḥ dṛḍha dhanvibhiḥ

original: anyathā śāstragārbhiṇyā dhiyā dhīror'thamīhate / svāmivatprākkṛtaṃ karma vidadhāti tadanyathā //
analyzed: anyathā śāstra gārbhiṇyā dhiyā dhīra ūrtham īhate svāmi vat prāk kṛtam karma vidadhāti tat anyathā

original: bālo yuvā ca vṛddhaśca yaḥ karoti śubhāśubham / tasyāntasyāmavasthāyāṃ bhuṅkte janmanijanmani //
analyzed: bālaḥ yuvā ca vṛddhaḥ ca yaḥ karoti śubha aśubham

original: anīkṣamāṇo 'pi naro videśastho 'pi mānavaḥ / svakarmapātavātena nīyate yatra tatphalam //
analyzed: an īkṣamāṇaḥ pi naraḥ videśa sthaḥ pi mānavaḥ sva karma pāta vātena nīyate yatra tat phalam

original: prāptavyamarthaṃ labhate manuṣyo devo 'pi taṃ vārayituṃ na śaktaḥ / ato na śocāmi na vismayo me lalāṭalekhā na punaḥ prayāti (yadasmadīyaṃ na tu tat pareṣām //
analyzed: prāptavyam artham labhate manuṣyaḥ tam vārayitum na śaktaḥ atas na śocāmi na vismayaḥ me lalāṭa lekhā na punar prayāti yat asmadīyam na tu tat pareṣām

original: sarpaḥ kūpe gajaḥ skandhe bila ākhuśca dhāvati / naraḥ śīghratarādeva karmaṇaḥ kaḥ palāyate //
analyzed: sarpaḥ kūpe gajaḥ skandhe bile ākhuḥ ca dhāvati naraḥ śīghratarāt eva karmaṇaḥ kaḥ palāyate

original: nālpā bhavati sadvidyā dīyamānāpi vardhate / kūpasthamiva pānīyaṃ bhavatyeva bahūdakam //
analyzed: na alpā bhavati sat vidyā dīyamānā api vardhate kūpa stham iva pānīyam bhavati eva bahu udakam

original: yer'thā dharmeṇa te satyā ye 'dharmeṇa gatāḥ śriyaḥ / dharmārtho ca mahāṃlloke tatsmṛtvā hyarthakāraṇāt //
analyzed: yerthāḥ dharmeṇa te satyāḥ ye dharmeṇa gatāḥ śriyaḥ ca mahān loke tat smṛtvā hi artha kāraṇāt

original: annārtho yāni duḥ khāni karoti kṛpaṇo janaḥ / tānyeva yadi dharmārtho na bhūyaḥ kleśabhājanam //
analyzed: anna arthaḥ yāni duḥ khāni karoti kṛpaṇaḥ janaḥ tāni eva yadi dharma arthaḥ na bhūyas kleśa bhājanam

original: sarveṣāmeva śaucānāmannaśaucaṃ viśiṣyate / yo 'nnārthaiḥ śuciḥ śaucānna mṛdā vāriṇā śuciḥ //
analyzed: sarveṣām eva śaucānām anna śaucam viśiṣyate yaḥ nna arthaiḥ śuciḥ śaucāt na mṛdā vāriṇā śuciḥ

original: satyaṃ śaucaṃ manaḥ śaucaṃ śaucamindriyanigrahaḥ / sarvabhūte dayā śaucaṃ jalaśaucañca pañcamam //
analyzed: satyam śaucam manaḥ śaucam śaucam indriya nigrahaḥ sarva bhūte dayā śaucam jala śaucam ca pañcamam

original: yasya satyañca śaucañca tasya svargo na durlabhaḥ / satyaṃ hi vacanaṃ yasya so 'śvamedhādviśiṣyate //
analyzed: yasya satyam ca śaucam ca tasya svargaḥ na durlabhaḥ satyam hi vacanam yasya śvamedhāt viśiṣyate

original: mṛttikānāṃ sahasreṇa codakānāṃ śatena hi / na śudhyati durācāro bhāvopahatacetanaḥ //
analyzed: mṛttikānām sahasreṇa ca udakānām śatena hi na śudhyati durācāraḥ bhāva upahata cetanaḥ

original: yasya hastau ca pādau ca manaścaiva susaṃyatam / vidyā tapaśca kīrtiśca sa tīrthaphalamaśnute //
analyzed: yasya hastau ca pādau ca manaḥ ca eva su saṃyatam vidyā tapaḥ ca kīrtiḥ ca sa tīrtha phalam aśnute

original: na prahṛṣyati saṃmānairnāvamānaiḥ prakupyati / na kruddhaḥ paruṣaṃ brūyādetatsādhostu lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: na prahṛṣyati saṃmānaiḥ na avamānaiḥ prakupyati na kruddhaḥ paruṣam brūyāt etat sādhoḥ tu lakṣaṇam

original: daridrasya manuṣyasya prājñasya madhurasya ca / kāle śrutvā hitaṃ vākyaṃ na kaścitparituṣyati //
analyzed: daridrasya manuṣyasya prājñasya madhurasya ca kāle śrutvā hitam vākyam na kaścid parituṣyati

original: na mantrabalavīryeṇa prajñayā pauruṣeṇa ca / alabhyaṃ labhyate martyaistatra kā parivedanā //
analyzed: na mantra bala vīryeṇa prajñayā pauruṣeṇa ca  alabhyam labhyate martyaiḥ tatra kā parivedanā

original: ayācito mayā labdho punarmatpreṣaṇādgataḥ / yatrāgatastatra gatastatra kā parivedanā //
analyzed: a yācitaḥ mayā labdho punar mad preṣaṇāt gataḥ yatra āgataḥ tatra gataḥ tatra kā parivedanā

original: ekavṛkṣe sadā rātrau nānāpakṣisamāgamaḥ / prabhāte 'nyadiśo yānti kā tatra parivedanā //
analyzed: eka vṛkṣe sadā rātrau nānā pakṣi samāgamaḥ prabhāte yānti kā tatra parivedanā

original: ekasārthaprayātānā sarveṣāntatra gāminām / yastvekastvarito yāti kā tatra parivedanā //
analyzed: eka sārtha prayātānām sarveṣām tatra gāminām  yaḥ tu ekaḥ tvaritaḥ yāti kā tatra parivedanā

original: avyaktādīni bhūtāni vyaktamadhyāni śaunaka / avyaktanidhanānyenava kā tatra parivedanā //
analyzed: avyakta ādīni bhūtāni vyakta madhyāni śaunaka kā tatra parivedanā

original: nāprāptakālo mriyate viddhaḥ śaraśatairapi / kuśāgreṇa tu saṃspṛṣṭaṃ prāptakālo na jīvati //
analyzed: na aprāpta kālaḥ mriyate viddhaḥ śara śataiḥ api kuśa agreṇa tu saṃspṛṣṭam prāpta kālaḥ na jīvati

original: labdhavyānyeva labhate gantavyānyeva gacchati / prāptavyānyeva prāpnāti duḥ khāni ca sukhāni ca //
analyzed: labdhavyāni eva labhate gantavyāni eva gacchati prāptavyāni eva prāpnāti duḥ khāni ca sukhāni ca

original: tattatprāpnoti puruṣaḥ ki pralāpaiḥ kariṣyati / ācodyamānāni yathā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca / svakālaṃ nātivartante tathā karma purākṛtam //
analyzed: tat tat prāpnoti puruṣaḥ ki pralāpaiḥ kariṣyati ācodyamānāni yathā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca sva kālam na ativartante tathā karma purā kṛtam

original: śīlaṃ kulaṃ naiva na caiva vidyā jñānaṃ guṇā naiva na bījaśuddhiḥ / bhāgyāni pūrvaṃ tapasārjitāni kāle phalantyasya yathaiva vṛkṣāḥ //
analyzed: śīlam kulam na eva na ca eva vidyā jñānam guṇāḥ na eva na bīja śuddhiḥ bhāgyāni pūrvam tapasā arjitāni kāle phalanti asya yathā eva vṛkṣāḥ

original: tatra mṛtyuryatra hantā tatra śrīryatra sampadaḥ / tatra tatra svayaṃ yāti preryamāṇaḥ svakarmabhiḥ //
analyzed: tatra mṛtyuḥ yatra hantā tatra śrīḥ yatra sampadaḥ tatra tatra svayam yāti preryamāṇaḥ sva karmabhiḥ

original: bhūtapūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ karma kartāramanutiṣṭhati / yathā dhenusahasreṣu vatso vindanti mātaram //
analyzed: bhūta pūrvam kṛtam karma kartāram anutiṣṭhati yathā dhenu sahasreṣu vatsaḥ vindanti mātaram

original: evaṃ pūrvakṛtaṃ karma kartāramanutiṣṭhāti / sukṛtaṃ bhuṅkṣva cātmīyaṃ mūḍha kiṃ paritapyase //
analyzed: evam pūrva kṛtam karma kartāram anutiṣṭhāti sukṛtam bhuṅkṣva ca ātmīyam mūḍha kim paritapyase

original: yathā pūrvakṛtaṃ karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham / tathā janmāntare tadvai kartā ramanugacchati //
analyzed: yathā pūrva kṛtam karma śubham vā yadi vā aśubham tathā janmāntare tat vai kartāram anugacchati

original: nīcaḥ sarṣapamātrāṇi paracchidrāṇi paśyati / ātmano balivamātrāṇi paśyannapi na paśyati //
analyzed: nīcaḥ sarṣapa mātrāṇi para chidrāṇi paśyati ātmanaḥ paśyan api na paśyati

original: rāgadveṣādiyuktānāṃ na sukhaṃ kutraciddvija / vicārya khalu paśyāmi tatsukhaṃ yatra nirvṛtiḥ //
analyzed: rāga dveṣa ādi yuktānām na sukham kutracid dvija vicārya khalu paśyāmi tat sukham yatra nirvṛtiḥ

original: yatra sneho bhayaṃ tatra sneho duḥ khasya bhājanam / snehamūlāni duḥ khāni tasmistyakte mahatsukham //
analyzed: yatra snehaḥ bhayam tatra snehaḥ duḥkhasya bhājanam sneha mūlāni duḥ khāni tasmin tyakte mahat sukham

original: śarīramevāyatanaṃ duḥ khasya ca sukhasya ca / jīvitañca śarīrañca jātyaiva saha jāyate //
analyzed: śarīram eva āyatanam duḥ khasya ca sukhasya ca jīvitam ca śarīram ca jātyā eva saha jāyate

original: sarvaṃ paravaśaṃ duḥ khaṃ sarva mātmavaśaṃ sukham / etadvidyātsamāsena lakṣaṇaṃ sukhaduḥ khayoḥ //
analyzed: sarvam para vaśam duḥkham sarvam ātma vaśam sukham etat vidyāt samāsena lakṣaṇam sukha duḥkhayoḥ

original: sukhasyānantaraṃ duḥ khaṃ duḥ khasyānantaraṃ sukham / śukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cakravatparivartate //
analyzed: sukhasya anantaram duḥkham duḥkhasya anantaram sukham śukham duḥkham manuṣyāṇām cakra vat parivartate

original: yadgataṃ tadatikrāntaṃ yadi syāttacca dūrataḥ / vartamānena varteta na sa śokena bādhyate //
analyzed: yat gatam tat atikrāntam yadi syāt tat ca dūratas vartamānena varteta na sa śokena bādhyate

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre trayośottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nīti sāre trayośottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 114
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / na kaścitkasyacinmitraṃ na kaścitkasyacidripuḥ / kāraṇādeva jāyante mitrāṇi ripavastathā //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca na kaścid kasyacid mitram na kaścid kasyacid ripuḥ  kāraṇāt eva jāyante mitrāṇi ripavaḥ tathā
