original: śokatrāṇaṃ bhayatrāṇaṃ prītiviśvāsabhājanam / kena ratnāṃmadaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ mitramityakṣaradvayam //
analyzed: śoka trāṇam bhaya trāṇam prīti viśvāsa bhājanam kena sṛṣṭam mitram iti akṣara dvayam

original: sakṛduccaritaṃ yena harirityakṣaradvayam / baddhaḥ parikarastena mokṣāya gamanaṃ prati //
analyzed: sakṛt uccaritam yena hariḥ iti akṣara dvayam baddhaḥ parikaraḥ tena mokṣāya gamanam prati

original: na mātari na dāreṣu na sodarye na cātmaje / viśvāsastādṛśaḥ puṃsāṃ yādṛṅmitre svabhāvaje //
analyzed: na mātari na dāreṣu na sodarye na ca ātmaje viśvāsaḥ tādṛśaḥ puṃsām yādṛś mitre svabhāva je

original: yadicchecchāśvatīṃ prītiṃ trīndoṣānparivarjayet / dyutamarthaprayogañca parokṣe dāradarśanam //
analyzed: yat icchet śāśvatīm prītim trīn doṣān parivarjayet dyutam artha prayogam ca parokṣe dāra darśanam

original: mātrā svastrā duhitrā vā na viviktāsano vaset / balavānindriyagrāmo vidvāṃsamapi karṣati //
analyzed: mātrā svastrā duhitrā vā na vivikta āsanaḥ vaset  balavān indriya grāmaḥ vidvāṃsam api karṣati

original: viparītaratiḥ kāmaḥ svāyateṣu na vidyate / yathopāyo vadho daṇḍastathaiva hyanu vartate //
analyzed: viparīta ratiḥ kāmaḥ su āyateṣu na vidyate yathā upāyaḥ vadhaḥ daṇḍaḥ tathā eva hi anu vartate

original: api kalpānilasyaiva turagasya mahodadheḥ / śakyate prasaro boddhuṃ na hyaraktasye catasaḥ //
analyzed: api kalpa anilasya eva turagasya mahā udadheḥ śakyate prasaraḥ boddhum na hi a raktasye catasaḥ

original: kṣaṇo nāsti raho nāsti na sti prārthayitā janaḥ / tena śaunaka nārīṇāṃ satītvamupajāyate //
analyzed: kṣaṇaḥ na asti rahaḥ na asti na sti prārthayitā janaḥ tena śaunaka nārīṇām satī tvam upajāyate

original: eka vai sevate nityamanyaścetapi rocate / puruṣāṇāmalābhena nārī caiva pativratā //
analyzed: vai sevate nityam anyaḥ rocate puruṣāṇām alābhena nārī ca eva pativratā

original: jananī yāni kurute rahasyaṃ madanāturā / sutaistāni na cintyāni śīlavipratipattibhiḥ //
analyzed: jananī yāni kurute rahasyam madana āturā sutaiḥ tāni na cintyāni śīla vipratipattibhiḥ

original: parādhīnā nidrā paradṛdayakṛtyānusaraṇaṃ sadā helā hāsyaṃ niyatamapi śokena rahitam / paṇe nyastaḥ kāyo viṭajanakhurairdāritagalo bahūtkaṇṭhavṛtirjagati gaṇikrāyā bahumataḥ //
analyzed: para adhīnā nidrā para dṛdaya kṛtyā anusaraṇam sadā helā hāsyam niyatam api śokena rahitam paṇe nyastaḥ kāyaḥ viṭa jana khuraiḥ dārita galaḥ bahu utkaṇṭha vṛtiḥ jagati bahu mataḥ

original: agnirāpaḥ striyo mūrkhāḥ sarpā rājakulāni ca / nityaṃ paropasevyāni sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ //
analyzed: agniḥ āpaḥ striyaḥ mūrkhāḥ sarpāḥ rāja kulāni ca  nityam para upasevyāni sadyas prāṇa harāṇi ṣaḍ

original: kiṃ citraṃ yadi veda (śabda)
analyzed: kim citram yadi veda śabda

original: śāstrakuśalo vipro bhavetpaṇḍitaḥ kiṃ citraṃ yadi daṇḍanītikuśalo rājā bhaveddhārmikaḥ / kiṃ citraṃ yadi rūpayauvanavatī sādhvī bhavetkāminī taccitraṃ yadi nirdhano 'pi puruṣaḥ pāpaṃ na kuryātkracit //
analyzed: śāstra kuśalaḥ vipraḥ bhavet paṇḍitaḥ kim citram yadi daṇḍa nīti kuśalaḥ rājā bhavet dhārmikaḥ kim citram yadi rūpa yauvanavatī sādhvī bhavet kāminī tat citram yadi puruṣaḥ pāpam na kuryāt kracid

original: nātmacchidraṃ pare dadyādvidyācchidraṃ parasya ca / gūhetkūrma ivāṅgāni parabhāvañca lakṣayet //
analyzed: na ātma chidram pare dadyāt vidyāt chidram parasya ca gūhet kūrmaḥ iva aṅgāni para bhāvam ca lakṣayet

original: pātālatalavā sinya uccaprākārasaṃsthitāḥ / yadi no cikurodbhedāllabhyante kaiḥ striyo na hi //
analyzed: pātāla tala vā sinyaḥ ucca prākāra saṃsthitāḥ yadi no cikura udbhedāt labhyante kaiḥ striyaḥ na hi

original: samadharmā hi marmajñastīkṣṇaḥ svajanakaṇṭakaḥ / na tathā bādhate śatruḥ kṛtavairo bahiḥ sthitaḥ //
analyzed: sama dharmā hi marma jñaḥ tīkṣṇaḥ sva jana kaṇṭakaḥ  na tathā bādhate śatruḥ kṛta vairaḥ bahis sthitaḥ

original: sa paṇḍito yo hyanuñjayedvai miṣṭena bālaṃ viniyena śiṣṭam / arthena nārīṃ tapasā hi devānsarvāṃśca lokāṃśca susaṃgraheṇa //
analyzed: sa paṇḍitaḥ yaḥ miṣṭena bālam śiṣṭam  arthena nārīm tapasā hi devān sarvān ca lokān ca su saṃgraheṇa

original: chalena mitraṃ kaluṣeṇa dharmaṃ paropatāpena samṛddhibhāvanam / sukhena vidyāṃ puruṣeṇa nārīṃ vāñchanti vai ye na ca paṇḍitāste //
analyzed: chalena mitram kaluṣeṇa dharmam para upatāpena samṛddhi bhāvanam sukhena vidyām puruṣeṇa nārīm vāñchanti vai ye na ca paṇḍitāḥ te

original: phalārtho phalinaṃ vṛkṣaṃ yaśchindyāddurmatirnaraḥ / niṣphalaṃ tasya vai kāryāṃ mahādoṣamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: phalinam vṛkṣam yaḥ chindyāt durmatiḥ naraḥ niṣphalam tasya vai kāryām mahā doṣam avāpnuyāt

original: sadhano hi tapasvī ca dūrato vai kṛtaśramaḥ / madyapa strī satītyevaṃ vipra na śraddadhāmyaham //
analyzed: sa dhanaḥ hi tapasvī ca dūratas vai kṛta śramaḥ madyapa strī satī iti evam vipra na śraddadhāmi aham

original: na viśvasedaviśvaste mitrasyāpi na viśvaset / kadācitkupitaṃ mitraṃ sarvaṃ guhyaṃ prakāśayet //
analyzed: na viśvaset aviśvaste mitrasya api na viśvaset  kadācid kupitam mitram sarvam guhyam prakāśayet

original: sarvabhūteṣu viśvāsaḥ sarvabhūteṣu sāttvikaḥ / svabāvamātmanā gūhedetatsādhorhi lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: sarva bhūteṣu viśvāsaḥ sarva bhūteṣu sāttvikaḥ svabāvam ātmanā gūhet etat sādhoḥ hi lakṣaṇam

original: yasminkasminkṛte kārye kartāramanuvartate / sarvathā vartamāno 'pi dhairyabuddhintu kārayet //
analyzed: yasmin kasmin kṛte kārye kartāram anuvartate sarvathā vartamānaḥ kārayet

original: vṛddhāḥ striyo navaṃ madyaṃ śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ trimūlakam / rātrau dadhi divā svapnaṃ vidvānṣaṭ parivarjayet //
analyzed: vṛddhāḥ striyaḥ navam madyam śuṣkam māṃsam tri mūlakam rātrau dadhi divā svapnam vidvān ṣaḍ parivarjayet

original: viṣaṃ goṣṭhī daridrasya vṛddhasya taruṇī viṣam / viṣaṃ kuśikṣitā vidyā ajīrṇe bhojanaṃ viṣam //
analyzed: viṣam goṣṭhī daridrasya vṛddhasya taruṇī viṣam viṣam kuśikṣitā vidyā ajīrṇe bhojanam viṣam

original: priyaṃ gānamakuṇṭhasya nīcasyoccāsanaṃ priyam / priyaṃ dānaṃ daridrasya bhūnaścataruṇī priyā //
analyzed: priyam gānam akuṇṭhasya nīcasya ucca āsanam priyam priyam dānam daridrasya priyā

original: atyambupānaṃ kaṭhināśanañca dhātukṣayovegavidhāraṇañca / divāśayo jāgaraṇañca rātrau ṣaḍbhirnarāṇāṃ nivasanti rogāḥ //
analyzed: ati ambu pānam kaṭhina aśanam ca dhātu kṣayaḥ vega vidhāraṇam ca divā āśayaḥ jāgaraṇam ca rātrau ṣaḍbhiḥ narāṇām nivasanti rogāḥ

original: bālātapaścāpyatimaithunañca śmaśānadhūmaḥ karatāpanañca / rajasvalāvatkranirīkṣaṇañca sudīrghamāyurnanu karṣayecca //
analyzed: bāla ātapaḥ ca api ati maithunam ca śmaśāna dhūmaḥ kara tāpanam ca rajasvalā vatkra nirīkṣaṇam ca su dīrgham āyuḥ nanu karṣayet ca

original: śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ striyo vṛddhā bālārkastaruṇaṃ dadhi / prabhāte maithunaṃ nidrā sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ //
analyzed: śuṣkam māṃsam striyaḥ vṛddhāḥ bāla arkaḥ taruṇam dadhi prabhāte maithunam nidrā sadyas prāṇa harāṇi ṣaḍ

original: sadyaḥ pakraghṛtaṃ drākṣā bālā strī kṣīrabhojanam / uṣṇodakaṃ tarucchāyā sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ //
analyzed: sadyas pakra ghṛtam drākṣā bālā strī kṣīra bhojanam uṣṇa udakam taru chāyā sadyas prāṇa harāṇi ṣaḍ

original: kūpādakaṃ vaṭacchāyā nārīṇāñca payodharaḥ / śītakāle bhaveduṣṇamuṣṇakāle ca śītalam //
analyzed: kūpādakam vaṭa chāyā nārīṇām ca payodharaḥ śīta kāle bhavet uṣṇam uṣṇa kāle ca śītalam

original: trayo balakarāḥ sadyo bālābhyaṅgasubhojanam / trayo balaharāḥ sadyo hyadhvā ve maithunaṃ jvaraḥ //
analyzed: trayaḥ bala karāḥ sadyas bāla abhyaṅga su bhojanam trayaḥ bala harāḥ sadyas hi adhvā maithunam jvaraḥ

original: śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ payo nityaṃ bhāryāmitraiḥ sahaiva tu / na bhāktavyaṃ nṛpaiḥ sārdhaṃ viyogaṃ kurute kṣaṇāt //
analyzed: śuṣkam māṃsam payaḥ nityam bhāryā mitraiḥ saha eva tu na bhāktavyam nṛpaiḥ sārdham viyogam kurute kṣaṇāt

original: kucelina dantamalopadhāriṇaṃ bahvāśinaṃ niṣṭhuravākyabhāṣiṇam / sūryodaye hyastamaye 'pi śāyinaṃ vimuñcati śrīrapi cakrapāṇinam //
analyzed: danta mala upadhāriṇam bahu āśinam niṣṭhura vākya bhāṣiṇam sūrya udaye hi astamaye śāyinam vimuñcati śrīḥ api cakrapāṇinam

original: nityaṃ chedastṛṇānaṃ dharaṇivilakhanaṃ pādayoścāpamārṣṭiḥ dantānāmapyaśaucaṃ malinavasanatā rūkṣatā mūrdhajānām / dve sadhye cāpi nidrā vivasanaśayanaṃ grāsahāsātirekaḥ svāṅge pīṭhe ca vādyaṃ nidhanamupanayetkeśavasyāpi lakṣmīm //
analyzed: nityam chedaḥ tṛṇānam dharaṇi vilakhanam pādayoḥ ca apamārṣṭiḥ dantānām api aśaucam malina vasana tā rūkṣa tā mūrdhajānām dve sadhye ca api nidrā vivasana śayanam grāsa hāsa atirekaḥ sva aṅge pīṭhe ca vādyam nidhanam upanayet keśavasya api lakṣmīm

original: śiraḥ sudhautaṃ caraṇau sumārjitau varāṅganāsevanamalpabhojanam / anagnaśāyitvamaparvamaithunaṃ cirapranaṣṭāṃ śriyamānayanti ṣaṭ //
analyzed: śiraḥ su dhautam caraṇau su mārjitau vara aṅganā sevanam alpa bhojanam anagna śāyi tvam aparva maithunam cira pranaṣṭām śriyam ānayanti ṣaḍ

original: yasya kasya tu puṣpasya pāṇāḍarasya viśeṣataḥ / śirasā dhāryamāṇasya hyalakṣmīḥ pratihanyate //
analyzed: yasya kasya tu puṣpasya viśeṣataḥ śirasā dhāryamāṇasya hi alakṣmīḥ pratihanyate

original: dīpasya paścimā chāyā chāyā śayyāsanasya ca / rajakasya tu yattīrthalakṣmīstatra tiṣṭhati //
analyzed: dīpasya paścimā chāyā chāyā śayyā āsanasya ca rajakasya tu yat tīrtha lakṣmīḥ tatra tiṣṭhati

original: bālātapaḥ pretadhūmaḥ strī vṛddhā taruṇaṃ dadhi / āyuṣkāmo na seveta tathā saṃmārjanīrajaḥ //
analyzed: bāla ātapaḥ pretadhūmaḥ strī vṛddhā taruṇam dadhi āyuṣkāmaḥ na seveta tathā saṃmārjanī rajaḥ

original: gajāśvarathadhānyānāṃ gavāñcaiva rajaḥ śubham / aśubhaṃ ca vijānīyātkharoṣṭrajāvikeṣu ca //
analyzed: gaja aśva ratha dhānyānām gavām ca eva rajaḥ śubham aśubham ca vijānīyāt khara uṣṭra ja āvikeṣu ca

original: gavāṃ rajo dhānyarajaḥ putrasyāṅgabhavaṃ rajaḥ / etadrajo mahāśastaṃ mahāpātakanāśanam //
analyzed: gavām rajaḥ dhānya rajaḥ putrasya aṅga bhavam rajaḥ etat rajaḥ mahā śastam mahāpātaka nāśanam

original: ajārajaḥ khararajo yattu saṃmārjanīrajaḥ / etadrajo mahāpāpaṃ mahākilbiṣakārakam //
analyzed: ajā rajaḥ khara rajaḥ yat tu saṃmārjanī rajaḥ etat rajaḥ mahā pāpam mahā kilbiṣa kārakam

original: śūrpavāto nakhāgrāmbu snānavastramṛjodakam / keśāmbu mārjanīreṇurhanti puṇyaṃ purā kṛtam //
analyzed: śūrpa vātaḥ nakha agra ambu snāna vastra mṛjā udakam keśa ambu mārjanī reṇuḥ hanti puṇyam purā kṛtam

original: viprayorvipravahnyośca dampatyoḥ svāminostathā / antareṇa na gantavyaṃ hayasya vṛṣabhasya ca //
analyzed: viprayoḥ vipra vahnyoḥ ca dampatyoḥ svāminoḥ tathā antareṇa na gantavyam hayasya vṛṣabhasya ca

original: strīṣu rājāgnisarpeṣu svādhyāye śatrusevane / bhogāsvādeṣu viśvāsaṃ kaḥ prājñaḥ kartumarhati //
analyzed: strīṣu rāja agni sarpeṣu svādhyāye śatru sevane bhoga āsvādeṣu viśvāsam kaḥ prājñaḥ kartum arhati

original: na viśvasedaviśvastaṃ viśvastaṃ viśvastaṃ nātiviśvaset / viśvāsādbhayamutpannaṃ mūlādapi nikṛntati //
analyzed: na viśvaset aviśvastam viśvastam viśvastam na ati viśvaset  viśvāsāt bhayam utpannam mūlāt api nikṛntati

original: vairiṇā saha sandhāya viśvasto yadi tiṣṭhati / sa vṛkṣāgre prasupto hi patitaḥ pratibudhyate //
analyzed: vairiṇā saha sandhāya viśvastaḥ yadi tiṣṭhati sa vṛkṣa agre prasuptaḥ hi patitaḥ pratibudhyate

original: nātyantaṃ mṛdunā bhāvyaṃ nātyantaṃ kūrakarmaṇā / mṛdunaiva mṛduṃ hanti dāruṇenaiva dāruṇam //
analyzed: na atyantam mṛdunā bhāvyam na atyantam kūra karmaṇā mṛdunā eva mṛdum hanti dāruṇena eva dāruṇam

original: nātyantaṃ saralairbhāvyaṃ nātyantaṃ mṛdunā tathā / saralāstatra chidyante kubjāstiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ //
analyzed: na atyantam saralaiḥ bhāvyam na atyantam mṛdunā tathā saralāḥ tatra chidyante kubjāḥ tiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ

original: namanti phalino vṛkṣā namanti guṇino janāḥ / śuṣkavṛkṣāśca mūrkhāśca bhidyante na namanti ca //
analyzed: namanti phalinaḥ vṛkṣāḥ namanti guṇinaḥ janāḥ śuṣka vṛkṣāḥ ca mūrkhāḥ ca bhidyante na namanti ca

original: aprārthitāni duḥ khāni yathaivāyānti yānti ca / mārjāra iva lumpeta tathā prārthayitāra naraḥ //
analyzed: a prārthitāni duḥ khāni yathā eva āyānti yānti ca mārjāraḥ iva lumpeta tathā naraḥ

original: pūrvaṃ paścāccarantyārye sadaiva bahusampadaḥ / viparītamanārye ca yathecchasi tathā cara //
analyzed: pūrvam paścāt caranti ārye sadā eva bahu sampadaḥ viparītam anārye ca yathā icchasi tathā cara

original: ṣaṭkarṇo bhidyate mantraścatuḥ karṇaścadhāryate / dvikarṇasya tu mantrasya brahmāpyanta na budhyate //
analyzed: ṣaṣ karṇaḥ bhidyate mantraḥ catuḥ karṇaḥ ca dhāryate  dvi karṇasya tu mantrasya na budhyate

original: tayā gavā kiṃ kriyate yā na dogdhrī na garbhiṇī / kor'tha putreṇa jātena yo na vidvānna dhārmikaḥ //
analyzed: tayā gavā kim kriyate yā na dogdhrī na garbhiṇī  putreṇa jātena yaḥ na vidvān na dhārmikaḥ

original: ekenāpi suputreṇa vidyāyuktena dhīmatā / kulaṃ puruṣasiṃhena candreṇa gaganaṃ yathā //
analyzed: ekena api su putreṇa vidyā yuktena dhīmatā kulam puruṣa siṃhena candreṇa gaganam yathā

original: ekenāpi suvṛkṣeṇa puṣpitena sugandhinā / vanaṃ suvāsitaṃ sarvaṃ suputreṇa kulaṃ yathā //
analyzed: ekena api su vṛkṣeṇa puṣpitena su gandhinā vanam su vāsitam sarvam su putreṇa kulam yathā

original: eko hi guṇavānputro nirguṇena śatena kim / candro hanti tamāṃsyeko na ca jyotiḥ sahasrakam //
analyzed: ekaḥ hi guṇavān putraḥ nirguṇena śatena kim candraḥ hanti tamāṃsi ekaḥ na ca jyotiḥ sahasrakam

original: lālayetpañca varṣāṇi daśa varṣāṇi tāḍayet / prāpte tu ṣoḍaśe varṣe putraṃ mitravadācaret //
analyzed: lālayet pañca varṣāṇi daśa varṣāṇi tāḍayet prāpte tu ṣoḍaśe varṣe putram mitra vat ācaret

original: jāyamāno hareddārān vardhamāno hareddhanam / mriyamāṇo haretprāṇānnāsti putrasamo ripuḥ //
analyzed: jāyamānaḥ haret dārān vardhamānaḥ haret dhanam  mriyamāṇaḥ haret prāṇān na asti putra samaḥ ripuḥ

original: kecinmṛgamukhā vyāghrāḥ kecidvyāghramukhā mṛgāḥ / tatsvarūpapahijñāne hyaviśvāsaḥ padepade //
analyzed: kecid mṛga mukhāḥ vyāghrāḥ kecid vyāghra mukhāḥ mṛgāḥ hi aviśvāsaḥ pade pade

original: ekaḥ kṣamāvatāṃ doṣo dvitīyo nopapadyate / yadenaṃ kṣamayā yuktamaśaktaṃ manyate janaḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ kṣamāvatām doṣaḥ dvitīyaḥ nā upapadyate yat enam kṣamayā yuktam aśaktam manyate janaḥ

original: etadevānumanyeta bhogā hi kṣaṇabhaṅginaḥ / snigdheṣu ca vidagdhasya matayo vai hyanākulāḥ //
analyzed: etat eva anumanyeta bhogāḥ hi kṣaṇa bhaṅginaḥ snigdheṣu ca vidagdhasya matayaḥ vai hi an ākulāḥ

original: jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛsamo bhrātā mṛte pitari śaunaka / sarveṣāṃ sa pitā hi syātsarveṣāmanupālakaḥ //
analyzed: jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛ samaḥ bhrātā mṛte pitari śaunaka sarveṣām sa pitā hi syāt sarveṣām anupālakaḥ

original: kaniṣṭheṣu ca sarveṣu samatvenānuvartate / samāpabhogajīveṣu yathaivaṃ tanayeṣu ca //
analyzed: kaniṣṭheṣu ca sarveṣu sama tvena anuvartate sama apabhoga jīveṣu yathā evam tanayeṣu ca

original: bahūnāmalpasārāṇāṃ samavāyo hi dāruṇaḥ / tṛṇairāveṣṭitā rajjustayā nāgo 'pi badhyate //
analyzed: bahūnām alpa sārāṇām samavāyaḥ hi dāruṇaḥ tṛṇaiḥ āveṣṭitā rajjuḥ tayā badhyate

original: apahṛtya parasvaṃ hi yastu dānaṃ prayacchati / sa dātā narakaṃ yāti yasyārthāstasya tatphalam //
analyzed: apahṛtya para svam hi yaḥ tu dānam prayacchati sa dātā narakam yāti yasya arthāḥ tasya tat phalam

original: devadravyavināśena brahmasvaharaṇena ca / kulānyakulatāṃ yānti brāhmaṇātikrameṇa ca //
analyzed: deva dravya vināśena brahma sva haraṇena ca kulāni akula tām yānti brāhmaṇa atikrameṇa ca

original: brahmaghne ca surāpe ca core bhagnavrate tathā / niṣkṛtirvihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ //
analyzed: brahma ghne ca surā pe ca core bhagna vrate tathā niṣkṛtiḥ vihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nā asti niṣkṛtiḥ

original: nāśranti pitaro devāḥ kṣudrasya vṛṣalīpateḥ / bhāryājitasya nāśranti yasyāścopapatirgṛhe //
analyzed: pitaraḥ devāḥ kṣudrasya vṛṣalī pateḥ  bhāryā jitasya yasyāḥ ca upapatiḥ gṛhe

original: akṛjajñamanāryañca dīrdharoṣamanārjavam / caturo viddhi cāṇḍālāñjātyā jāyeta pañcamaḥ //
analyzed: dīrdha roṣam anārjavam  / caturaḥ viddhi cāṇḍālān jātyā jāyeta pañcamaḥ

original: nopekṣitavyo durbaddhi śatruralpo 'pyavajñayā / vahniralpo 'pyasaṃhāryaḥ kurute bhasmasājjagat //
analyzed: na upekṣitavyaḥ śatruḥ alpaḥ pi avajñayā vahniḥ alpaḥ pi asaṃhāryaḥ kurute bhasmasāt jagat

original: nave vayasi yaḥ śāntaḥ sa śānta iti me matiḥ / dhātuṣu kṣīyamāṇeṣu śamaḥ kasya na jāyate //
analyzed: nave vayasi yaḥ śāntaḥ sa śāntaḥ iti me matiḥ dhātuṣu kṣīyamāṇeṣu śamaḥ kasya na jāyate

original: panthāna iva viprendra sarvasādhāraṇāḥ śriyaḥ / madīyā iti matvā vai na hi harṣayuto bhavet //
analyzed: panthānaḥ iva vipra indra sarva sādhāraṇāḥ śriyaḥ madīyāḥ iti matvā vai na hi harṣa yutaḥ bhavet

original: cittāyattaṃ dhātuvaśyaṃ śarīraṃ citte naṣṭe dhātavo yānti nāśam / tasmāccittaṃ sarvadā rakṣaṇīyaṃ svasthe citte dhātavaḥ sambhavanti //
analyzed: citta āyattam dhātu vaśyam śarīram citte naṣṭe dhātavaḥ yānti nāśam tasmāt cittam sarvadā rakṣaṇīyam svasthe citte dhātavaḥ sambhavanti

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre caturdaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nīti sāre caturdaśottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 115
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / kumāryāṃ ca kumitraṃ ca kurājānaṃ kuputrakam / kukanyāṃ ca kudeśaṃ ca dūrataḥ parivarjayet //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca kumāryām ca ku mitram ca ku rājānam ku putrakam  ku kanyām ca ku deśam ca dūratas parivarjayet

original: dharmaḥ pravrajitastapaḥ pracalitaṃ satyaṃ ca dūraṃ gataṃ pṛthvī vandhyaphalā janāḥ kapaṭino laulye sthitā brāhmaṇāḥ / martyāḥ strīvaśagāḥ striyaśca capalā nīcā janā unnatāḥ hā kaṣṭaṃ khalujīvitaṃ kaliyuge dhanyā janā ye mṛtāḥ //
analyzed: dharmaḥ pravrajitaḥ tapaḥ pracalitam satyam ca dūram gatam pṛthvī vandhya phalā janāḥ kapaṭinaḥ laulye sthitāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ martyāḥ strī vaśa gāḥ striyaḥ ca capalāḥ nīcāḥ janāḥ unnatāḥ hā kaṣṭam khalu jīvitam kali yuge dhanyāḥ janāḥ ye mṛtāḥ

original: dhanyāste ye na paśyanti deśabhaṅgaṃ kulakṣayam / paracittagatān dārānputraṃ kuvyasane sthitam //
analyzed: dhanyāḥ te ye na paśyanti deśa bhaṅgam kula kṣayam para citta gatān dārān putram ku vyasane sthitam

original: kuputre nirvṛtirnāsti kubhāryāyāṃ kuto ratiḥ / sumitra nāsti viśvāsaḥ kurājye nāsti jīvitam //
analyzed: ku putre nirvṛtiḥ nā asti ku bhāryāyām kutas ratiḥ sumitra nā asti viśvāsaḥ ku rājye nā asti jīvitam

original: parānnaṃ ca parasvaṃ ca paraśayyāḥ parastriyaḥ / paraveśmani vāsaśca śakrādapi harecchriyam //
analyzed: para annam ca para svam ca para śayyāḥ para striyaḥ para veśmani vāsaḥ ca śakrāt api haret śriyam

original: ālāpādgātrasaṃsparśātsaṃsargātsaha bhojanāt / āsanācchayanādyānātpāpaṃ saṃkramate nṛṇām //
analyzed: ālāpāt gātra saṃsparśāt saṃsargāt saha bhojanāt āsanāt śayanāt yānāt pāpam saṃkramate nṛṇām

original: striyo naśyanti rūpeṇa tapaḥ krodhana naśyati / gāvo dvarapracāreṇa śūdrānnena dvijottamaḥ //
analyzed: striyaḥ naśyanti rūpeṇa tapaḥ naśyati  gāvaḥ śūdra annena dvijottamaḥ

original: āsanādekaśayyāyāṃ bojanātpaṅktisaṅkarāt / tataḥ saṃkramate pāpaṃ ghaṭāddhaṭa ivodakam //
analyzed: āsanāt eka śayyāyām bojanāt paṅkti saṅkarāt tatas saṃkramate pāpam ghaṭāt dhaṭe iva udakam

original: lālane bahavo doṣāstāḍane bahavo guṇāḥ / tasmācchiṣyaṃ ca putraṃ ca tāḍayenna tu lālayet //
analyzed: lālane bahavaḥ doṣāḥ tāḍane bahavaḥ guṇāḥ tasmāt śiṣyam ca putram ca tāḍayet na tu lālayet

original: adhvā jarā dehavatāṃ parvatānāṃ jalaṃ jarā / asaṃbhogaśca nārīṇāṃ vastrāṇāmātapo jarā //
analyzed: adhvā jarā dehavatām parvatānām jalam jarā asaṃbhogaḥ ca nārīṇām vastrāṇām ātapaḥ jarā

original: adhamāḥ kalimicchanti sandhimicchati madhyamāḥ / uttamā mānamicchanti māno hi mahatāṃ dhanam //
analyzed: adhamāḥ kalim icchanti sandhim icchati madhyamāḥ uttamāḥ mānam icchanti mānaḥ hi mahatām dhanam

original: māno hi mūlamarthasya māne sati dhanena kim / prabhraṣṭamānadarpasya kiṃ dhanena kimāyuṣā //
analyzed: mānaḥ hi mūlam arthasya māne sati dhanena kim prabhraṣṭa māna darpasya kim dhanena kim āyuṣā

original: adhamā dhanamicchanti dhanamānau hi madhyamāḥ / uttamā mānamicchanti māno hi mahatāṃ dhanam //
analyzed: adhamāḥ dhanam icchanti dhana mānau hi madhyamāḥ uttamāḥ mānam icchanti mānaḥ hi mahatām dhanam

original: vane 'pi siṃhā na namanti kaṃ ca bubhu kṣitā māṃsanirīkṣaṇaṃ ca / dhanairvihīnāḥ sukuleṣu jātā na nīcakarmāṇi samārabhante //
analyzed: vane pi siṃhāḥ na namanti kam ca kṣitāḥ māṃsa nirīkṣaṇam ca  dhanaiḥ vihīnāḥ su kuleṣu jātāḥ na nīca karmāṇi samārabhante

original: nābhiṣeko na saṃskāraḥ siṃhasya kriyate vane / nityamūrjitasattvasya svayameva mṛgendratā //
analyzed: na abhiṣekaḥ na saṃskāraḥ siṃhasya kriyate vane nityam ūrjita sattvasya svayam eva mṛgendra tā

original: vaṇikpramādī bhṛkaśca mānī bhikṣurvilāsī hyadhanaśca kāmī / varāṅganā cāpriyavādinī ca na te ca karmāṇi samārabhante //
analyzed: vaṇij pramādī mānī bhikṣuḥ vilāsī hi adhanaḥ ca kāmī vara aṅganā ca apriya vādinī ca na te ca karmāṇi samārabhante

original: dātā daridraḥ kṛpaṇor'thayuktaḥ puttro 'vidheyaḥ kujanasya sevā / paropakāreṣu narasya mṛtyuḥ prajāyate duścaritāni pañca //
analyzed: dātā daridraḥ kṛpaṇa artha yuktaḥ puttraḥ vidheyaḥ ku janasya sevā para upakāreṣu narasya mṛtyuḥ prajāyate duścaritāni pañca

original: kāntāviyogaḥ svajanāpamānaṃ ṛṇasya śeṣaḥ kujanasya sevā / dāridrayābhāvādvimukhāśca mitrā vināgninā pañca dahanti tīvrāḥ //
analyzed: kāntā viyogaḥ sva jana apamānam ṛṇasya śeṣaḥ ku janasya sevā dāridrayā abhāvāt vimukhāḥ ca mitrāḥ vinā agninā pañca dahanti tīvrāḥ

original: cintāsahasreṣu ca teṣu madhye cintāścatasro 'pyasidhāratulyāḥ / nīcāpamānaṃ kṣudhitaṃ kalatraṃ bhāryā viraktā sahajoparodhaḥ //
analyzed: cintā sahasreṣu ca teṣu madhye cintāḥ catasraḥ pi asi dhāra tulyāḥ nīca apamānam kṣudhitam kalatram bhāryā viraktā sahaja uparodhaḥ

original: vaśyaśca purtrer'tha karī ca vidyā arogitā sajjanasaṅgatiśca / iṣṭā ca bhāryā vaśavartinī ca duḥ khasya mūloddharaṇāni pañca //
analyzed: vaśyaḥ ca karī ca vidyā arogi tā sat jana saṅgatiḥ ca iṣṭā ca bhāryā vaśa vartinī ca duḥ khasya mūla uddharaṇāni pañca

original: kuraṅgamātaṅgapataṅgaṃbhṛga mīnā hatāḥ pañcabireva pañca / ekaḥ pramāthī sa kathaṃ na ghātyo yaḥ sevate pañcabhireva pañca //
analyzed: mīnāḥ hatāḥ pañcabhiḥ eva pañca  / ekaḥ pramāthī sa katham na ghātyaḥ yaḥ sevate pañcabhiḥ eva pañca

original: adhīraḥ karkaśaḥ stabdhaḥ kucelaḥ svayamāgataḥ / pañca viprā na pūjyante bṛhaspatisamā api //
analyzed: adhīraḥ karkaśaḥ stabdhaḥ ku celaḥ svayam āgataḥ pañca viprāḥ na pūjyante bṛhaspati samāḥ api

original: āyuḥ karma ca vittaṃ ca vidyā nidhanameva ca / pañcaitāni vivicyante jāyamānasya dehinaḥ //
analyzed: āyuḥ karma ca vittam ca vidyā nidhanam eva ca pañca etāni vivicyante jāyamānasya dehinaḥ

original: parvatārohaṇe toye gokule duṣṭanigrahe / patitasya samutthāne śastāḥ pañca (hyete)
analyzed: parvata ārohaṇe toye gokule duṣṭa nigrahe patitasya samutthāne śastāḥ pañca hi ete

original: guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: abhracchāyā khale prītiḥ paranārīṣu saṃgatiḥ / pañcaite hyasthirā bhāvā yauvanāni dhanāni ca //
analyzed: abhra chāyā khale prītiḥ para nārīṣu saṃgatiḥ pañca ete hi asthirāḥ bhāvāḥ yauvanāni dhanāni ca

original: asthiraṃ jīvitaṃ loke asthiraṃ dhanayauvanam / asthiraṃ puttradārādyaṃ dharmaḥ kīrtiryaśaḥ sthiram //
analyzed: asthiram jīvitam loke asthiram dhana yauvanam asthiram puttra dāra ādyam dharmaḥ kīrtiḥ yaśaḥ sthiram

original: śata jīvitamatyalpaṃ rātristasyārdhahāriṇī / vyādhiśokajarāyāsairardhaṃ tadapi niṣphalam //
analyzed: śata jīvitam ati alpam rātriḥ tasya ardha hāriṇī vyādhi śoka jarā āyāsaiḥ ardham tat api niṣphalam

original: āyurvarṣaśataṃ nṛṇāṃ parimitaṃ rātrau tadardhaṃ gataṃ tasyārdhasthitakiñcidardhamadhikaṃ bālyasya kāle gatam / kiñcidvandhuviyogaduḥ khamaraṇairbhūpālasevāgataṃ śeṣaṃ vāritaraṅgagarbhacapalaṃ mānena kiṃ māninām //
analyzed: āyuḥ varṣa śatam nṛṇām parimitam rātrau tad ardham gatam tasya ardha sthita kiñcid ardham adhikam bālyasya kāle gatam kiñcid vandhu viyoga duḥ kha maraṇaiḥ bhūpāla sevā gatam śeṣam vāri taraṅga garbha capalam mānena kim māninām

original: ahorātramayo loke jarārūpeṇa saṃcaret / mṛtyurgrasati bhūtāni pavanaṃ pannago yathā //
analyzed: ahorātra mayaḥ loke jarā rūpeṇa saṃcaret mṛtyuḥ grasati bhūtāni pavanam pannagaḥ yathā

original: gacchatastiṣṭhato vāpi jāgrataḥ svapato na cet / sarvasattvahitārthāya paśoriva viceṣṭitam //
analyzed: gacchataḥ tiṣṭhataḥ vā api jāgrataḥ svapataḥ na ced sarva sattva hita arthāya paśoḥ iva viceṣṭitam

original: ahitahitavicāraśūnyabuddheḥ śrutisamaye bahubhirvitarkitasya / udarabharaṇamātratuṣṭabuddheḥ puruṣapaśośca paśośca ko viśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: ahita hita vicāra śūnya buddheḥ śruti samaye bahubhiḥ vitarkitasya udara bharaṇa mātra tuṣṭa buddheḥ puruṣa paśoḥ ca paśoḥ ca kaḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: śaurye tapasi dāne ca yasya na prathitaṃ yaśaḥ / vidyāyāmarthalābhe vā māturuccāra eva saḥ //
analyzed: śaurye tapasi dāne ca yasya na prathitam yaśaḥ vidyāyām artha lābhe vā mātuḥ uccāre eva saḥ

original: yajjīvyate kṣaṇamapi prathitaṃ manuṣyairvijñānavikramayaśobhirabhagnamānaiḥ / tannāma jīvitamiti pravadanti tajjñāḥ kāko 'pi jīvati ciraṃ ca baliṃ ca bhuṅkte //
analyzed: yat jīvyate kṣaṇam api prathitam manuṣyaiḥ vijñāna vikrama yaśobhiḥ abhagna mānaiḥ  tat nāma jīvitam iti pravadanti tad jñāḥ jīvati ciram ca balim ca bhuṅkte

original: kiṃ jīvitena dhanamānavivarjitena mitreṇa kiṃ bhavati bhītisaśaṅkitena / siṃhavrataṃ carata gacchata mā viṣādaṃ kāko 'pi jīvati ciraṃ ca baliṃ ca bhuṅkte //
analyzed: kim jīvitena dhana māna vivarjitena mitreṇa kim bhavati bhīti sa śaṅkitena siṃha vratam carata gacchata mā viṣādam jīvati ciram ca balim ca bhuṅkte

original: yo vātmanīha na gurau na ca bhṛtyavarge dīne dayāṃ na kurute na ca mitrakārye / kiṃ tasya jīvitaphalenamanuṣyaloke kāko 'pi jīvati ciraṃ ca baliṃ ca bhuṅkte //
analyzed: yaḥ vā ātmani iha na gurau na ca bhṛtya varge dīne dayām na kurute na ca mitra kārye kim tasya jīvita phalena manuṣya loke jīvati ciram ca balim ca bhuṅkte

original: yasya trivargaśūnyāni dinānyāyānti yānti ca / sa lauhakārabhastreva śvasannapi na jīvati //
analyzed: yasya trivarga śūnyāni dināni āyānti yānti ca sa lauhakāra bhastrā iva śvasan api na jīvati

original: svādhīnavṛtteḥ sāphalyaṃ na parādhīnavartitā / ye parādhīnakarmāṇo jīvanto 'pi ca te mṛtāḥ //
analyzed: svādhīna vṛtteḥ sāphalyam na para adhīna varti tā  ye para adhīna karmāṇaḥ ca te mṛtāḥ

original: su(sva) pūrā vai kāpuruṣāḥ su(sva)
analyzed: susva pūrāḥ vai kāpuruṣāḥ susva

original: pūro mūṣikāñjaliḥ / asantuṣṭaḥ kāpuruṣaḥ svalpakenāpi tuṣyati //
analyzed: pūraḥ mūṣika añjaliḥ asantuṣṭaḥ kāpuruṣaḥ su alpakena api tuṣyati

original: abhracchāyā tṛṇādagnirnocasevā patho jalam / veśyārāgaḥ khale prītiḥ ṣaḍete budvudopamāḥ //
analyzed: abhra chāyā tṛṇāt agniḥ noca sevā pathaḥ jalam veśyā rāgaḥ khale prītiḥ ṣaṭ ete budvuda upamāḥ

original: vācā vihitasārthena loko na ca sukhāyate / jīvitaṃ mānamūlaṃ hi māne mlāne kutaḥ sukham? //
analyzed: vācā vihita sārthena lokaḥ na ca sukhāyate jīvitam māna mūlam hi māne mlāne kutas sukham

original: abalasya balaṃ rājā bālasya ruditaṃ balam / balaṃ mūrkhasya maunaṃ hi taskarasyānṛtaṃ balam //
analyzed: abalasya balam rājā bālasya ruditam balam balam mūrkhasya maunam hi taskarasya anṛtam balam

original: yathāyathā hi puruṣaḥ śāstraṃ samadhigacchati / tathātathāsya medhā syādvijñānaṃ cāsya rocate //
analyzed: yathā yathā hi puruṣaḥ śāstram samadhigacchati tathā tathā asya medhā syāt vijñānam ca asya rocate

original: yathāyathā hi puruṣaḥ kalyāṇe kurute matim / tathātathā hi sarvatra śliṣyate lokasupriyaḥ //
analyzed: yathā yathā hi puruṣaḥ kalyāṇe kurute matim tathā tathā hi sarvatra śliṣyate loka su priyaḥ

original: lobhapramādaviśvāsaiḥ puruṣo naśyati tribhiḥ / tasmāllobho na kartavyaḥ pramādo nona viśvaset //
analyzed: lobha pramāda viśvāsaiḥ puruṣaḥ naśyati tribhiḥ tasmāt lobhaḥ na kartavyaḥ pramādaḥ viśvaset

original: tāvadbhayasya bhetavyaṃ yāvadbhayamanāgatam / utpanne tu bhaye tīvre sthātavyaṃ vai hyabhītavat //
analyzed: tāvat bhayasya bhetavyam yāvat bhayam anāgatam  utpanne tu bhaye tīvre sthātavyam vai hi abhīta vat

original: ṛṇaśeṣaṃ cāgniśeṣaṃ vyādhiśeṣaṃ tathaiva ca / punaḥ punaḥ pravardhante tasmāccheṣaṃ na kārayet //
analyzed: ṛṇa śeṣam ca agni śeṣam vyādhi śeṣam tathā eva ca punar punar pravardhante tasmāt śeṣam na kārayet

original: kṛte pratikṛtaṃ kuryāddhiṃsite pratihiṃsitam / na tatra doṣaṃ paśyāmi duṣṭe doṣaṃ samācaret //
analyzed: kṛte pratikṛtam kuryāt hiṃsite pratihiṃsitam  na tatra doṣam paśyāmi duṣṭe doṣam samācaret

original: parokṣe kāryahantāraṃ pratyakṣe priyavādinam / varjayettādṛśaṃ mitraṃ māyāmayamariṃ tathā //
analyzed: parokṣe kārya hantāram pratyakṣe priya vādinam varjayet tādṛśam mitram māyā mayam arim tathā

original: durjanasya hi saṃgena sujano 'pi vinaśyati / prasannamapi pānīyaṃ kardamaiḥ kaluṣīkṛtam //
analyzed: durjanasya hi saṃgena vinaśyati prasannam api pānīyam kardamaiḥ kaluṣīkṛtam

original: sa bhuṅkte sadvijo bhuṅkte samaśeṣanirūpaṇam / tasmātsarvaprayatnena dvijaḥ pūjyaḥ prayatnataḥ //
analyzed: sa bhuṅkte sa dvijaḥ bhuṅkte sama śeṣa nirūpaṇam tasmāt sarva prayatnena dvijaḥ pūjyaḥ prayatnataḥ

original: tadbhujyate yaddvijabhuktaśeṣaṃ sa buddhimānyo na karoti pāpam / tatsauhṛdaṃ yakriyate parokṣe dambhairvinā yaḥ kriyate sa dharmaḥ //
analyzed: tat bhujyate yat dvija bhukta śeṣam sa buddhimān yaḥ na karoti pāpam tat sauhṛdam parokṣe dambhaiḥ vinā yaḥ kriyate sa dharmaḥ

original: na sā sabhā yatra na santi vṛddhāḥ vṛddhā na te ye na vadanti dharmam / dharmaḥ sa no yatra na satyamasti naitatsatyaṃ yacchalenānuviddham //
analyzed: na sā sabhā yatra na santi vṛddhāḥ vṛddhāḥ na te ye na vadanti dharmam dharmaḥ sa no yatra na satyam asti na etat satyam yat chalena anuviddham

original: brāhmaṇo 'pi manuṣyāṇāmādityaścaiva tejasām / śiro 'pi sarvagātrāṇāṃ vratānāṃ satyamuttamam //
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ pi manuṣyāṇām ādityaḥ ca eva tejasām śiraḥ pi sarva gātrāṇām vratānām satyam uttamam

original: tanmaṅgalaṃ yatra manaḥ prasannaṃ tajjīvanaṃ yanna parasya sevā / tadarjitaṃ yatsvajanena bhuktaṃ tadgarjitaṃ yatsamare ripūṇām //
analyzed: tat maṅgalam yatra manaḥ prasannam tat jīvanam yat na parasya sevā  tat arjitam yat sva janena bhuktam tat garjitam yat samare ripūṇām

original: sā strīyā na madaṃ kuryātsa sukhī tṛṣṇayojjhitaḥ / tanmitraṃ yatra viśvāsaḥ puruṣaḥ sa jitendriyaḥ //
analyzed: sā strīyā na madam kuryāt sa sukhī tṛṣṇayā ujjhitaḥ tat mitram yatra viśvāsaḥ puruṣaḥ sa jita indriyaḥ

original: tatra muktādarasneho viluptaṃ yatra sauhṛdam / tadeva kevalaṃ ślaghyaṃ yasyātmā kriyate stutau //
analyzed: tatra mukta ādara snehaḥ viluptam yatra sauhṛdam  tat eva kevalam ślaghyam yasya ātmā kriyate stutau

original: nadīnāmagnihotrāṇāṃ bhāratasya kalasya ca / mūlānveṣo na kartavyo mūlāddoṣo na hīyate //
analyzed: nadīnām agni hotrāṇām bhāratasya kalasya ca  mūla anveṣaḥ na kartavyaḥ mūlāt doṣaḥ na hīyate

original: lavaṇajalāntā nadyaḥ strībhedāntaṃ ca maithunam / ṣaiśunyaṃ janavārtāntaṃ vittaṃ duḥ khatrayāntakam //
analyzed: lavaṇajala antāḥ nadyaḥ strī bheda antam ca maithunam ṣaiśunyam jana vārttā antam vittam duḥ kha traya antakam

original: rājyaśrīrbrahmaśāpāntā pāpāntaṃ brahmavarcasam / ācāntaṃ ghoṣavāsāntaṃ kulasyāntaṃ striyā prabho (bhuḥ) //
analyzed: rājya śrīḥ brahma śāpa antā pāpa antam brahmavarcasam ācāntam ghoṣa vāsa antam kulasya antam striyā prabho bhuḥ

original: sarve kṣayāntā nilayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ / saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam //
analyzed: sarve kṣaya antāḥ nilayāḥ patana antāḥ samucchrayāḥ saṃyogāḥ viprayoga antāḥ maraṇa antam hi jīvitam

original: yadīcchetpunarāgantuṃ nātidūramanuvrajet / udakāntānnivarteta snigdhavarṇācca pādapāt //
analyzed: yadi icchet punar āgantum na ati dūram anuvrajet  udaka antāt nivarteta snigdha varṇāt ca pādapāt

original: anāyake na vastavyaṃ na caiva bahunāyake / strīnāyake na vastavyaṃ vastavyaṃ bālanāyake //
analyzed: anāyake na vastavyam na ca eva bahu nāyake  strī nāyake na vastavyam vastavyam bāla nāyake

original: pitā rakṣati kaumāre bhattā rakṣati yauvane / putrastu sthavire kāle na strī svātantryamarhati //
analyzed: pitā rakṣati kaumāre bhattā rakṣati yauvane  putraḥ tu sthavire kāle na strī svātantryam arhati

original: tyajedvandhyāmaṣṭame 'bde navame tu mṛtaprijām / ekādaśe strījananīṃ sadyaścāpriyāvādinīm //
analyzed: tyajet vandhyām aṣṭame bde navame tu mṛta pri jām  / ekādaśe strī jananīm sadyas ca apriya avādinīm

original: anarthitvānmanuṣyāṇāṃ bhiyā parijanasya ca / arthādapetamaryādāstrayastiṣṭhanti bhartṛṣu //
analyzed: an arthi tvāt manuṣyāṇām bhiyā parijanasya ca  arthāt apeta maryādāḥ trayaḥ tiṣṭhanti bhartṛṣu

original: aśvaṃ śrāntaṃ gajaṃ mattaṃ gāvaḥ prathamasūtikāḥ / anūdake ca maṇḍūkānprājño dūreṇa varjayet //
analyzed: aśvam śrāntam gajam mattam gāvaḥ prathama sūtikāḥ anūdake ca maṇḍūkān prājñaḥ dūreṇa varjayet

original: arthāturāṇāṃ na suhṛnna bandhuḥ kāmāturāṇāṃ na bhayaṃ na lajjā / cintāturāṇāṃ na sukhaṃ na nidrā kṣudhāturāṇāṃ na balaṃ na tejaḥ //
analyzed: artha āturāṇām na suhṛd na bandhuḥ kāma āturāṇām na bhayam na lajjā cintā āturāṇām na sukham na nidrā kṣudhā āturāṇām na balam na tejaḥ

original: kuto nidrā daridrasya parapreṣyavarasya ca / paranārīprasaktasya paradravyaharasya ca //
analyzed: kutas nidrā daridrasya para preṣya varasya ca para nārī prasaktasya para dravya harasya ca

original: sukhaṃ svapityanṛṇavānvyādhimuktaśca yo naraḥ / sāvakāśastu vai bhuṅkte yastu dārairna saṅgataḥ //
analyzed: sukham svapiti anṛṇavān vyādhi muktaḥ ca yaḥ naraḥ sa avakāśaḥ tu vai bhuṅkte yaḥ tu dāraiḥ na saṅgataḥ

original: ambhasaḥ parimāṇe unnataṃ kamalaṃ bhavet / svasvāminā balavatā bhṛtyo bhavati garvitaḥ //
analyzed: ambhasaḥ parimāṇe unnatam kamalam bhavet sva svāminā balavatā bhṛtyaḥ bhavati garvitaḥ

original: sthānasthitasya padmasya mitre varuṇabhāskarau / sthānacyutasya tasyaiva kledaśoṣaṇakārakau //
analyzed: sthāna sthitasya padmasya mitre varuṇa bhāskarau sthāna cyutasya tasya eva kleda śoṣaṇa kārakau

original: ye padasthasya mittrāṇi te tasya riputāṃ gatāḥ / bhānoḥ padme jale prītiḥ sthaloddharaṇaśoṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: ye pada sthasya mittrāṇi te tasya ripu tām gatāḥ bhānoḥ padme jale prītiḥ sthala uddharaṇa śoṣaṇaḥ

original: sthānasthitāni pūjyante pūjyante ca pade sthitāḥ / sthānabhraṣṭā na pūjyante keśā dantā nakhā narāḥ //
analyzed: sthāna sthitāni pūjyante pūjyante ca pade sthitāḥ sthāna bhraṣṭāḥ na pūjyante keśāḥ dantāḥ nakhāḥ narāḥ

original: ācāraḥ kulamākhyati deśamākhyāti bhāṣitam / sambhramaḥ snehamākhyāti vapurākhyāti bhojanam //
analyzed: ācāraḥ kulam ākhyati deśam ākhyāti bhāṣitam sambhramaḥ sneham ākhyāti vapuḥ ākhyāti bhojanam

original: vṛthā vṛṣṭiḥ samudrasya vṛthā tṛptasya bhojanam / vṛthā dānaṃ samṛddhasya nīcasya sukṛtaṃ vathā //
analyzed: vṛthā vṛṣṭiḥ samudrasya vṛthā tṛptasya bhojanam vṛthā dānam samṛddhasya nīcasya sukṛtam vathā

original: dūrastho 'pi samīpastho yo yasya hṛdaye sthitaḥ / hṛdayādapi niṣkrāntaḥ samīpastho 'pi dūrataḥ //
analyzed: dūra sthaḥ pi samīpa sthaḥ yaḥ yasya hṛdaye sthitaḥ hṛdayāt api niṣkrāntaḥ samīpa sthaḥ pi dūratas

original: mukhabhaṅgaḥ svaro dīno gātrasvedo mahadbhayam / maraṇe yāni cihnāni tāni cihnāni yācake //
analyzed: mukha bhaṅgaḥ svaraḥ dīnaḥ gātra svedaḥ mahat bhayam maraṇe yāni cihnāni tāni cihnāni yācake

original: kubjasya kīṭaghātasya vātānniṣkāsitasya ca / śikhare vasatastasya varaṃ janma na yācitam //
analyzed: kubjasya kīṭa ghātasya vātāt niṣkāsitasya ca śikhare vasataḥ tasya varam janma na yācitam

original: jagatpatirhi yācitvā viṣṇurvāmanatāṃ yataḥ / kānyo 'dhikatarastasya yor'tho yāti na lāghavam //
analyzed: jagatpatiḥ hi yācitvā viṣṇuḥ vāmana tām yatas  dhikataraḥ tasya yaḥ ṛthaḥ yāti na lāghavam

original: mātā śatruḥ pitā vairī bālā yena na pāṭhitāḥ / sabhāmadhye na śobhante haṃsamadhye bakāyathā //
analyzed: mātā śatruḥ pitā vairī bālāḥ yena na pāṭhitāḥ sabhā madhye na śobhante haṃsa madhye baka yathā

original: vidyā nāma kurūparūpamadhikaṃ vidyātiguptaṃ dhanaṃ vidyā sādhukarī janapriyakarī vidyā gurūṇāṃ guruḥ / vidyā bandhujanārtināśanakarī vidyā paraṃ daivataṃ vidyā rājasu pūjitā hi manujo vidyavihīnaḥ paśuḥ //
analyzed: vidyā nāma ku rūpa rūpam adhikam vidyā ati guptam dhanam vidyā sādhu karī jana priya karī vidyā gurūṇām guruḥ vidyā bandhu jana ārti nāśana karī vidyā param daivatam vidyā rājasu pūjitā hi manujaḥ vidyā vihīnaḥ paśuḥ

original: gṛhe cābhyantare dravyaṃ lagnaṃ caiva tu dṛśyate / aśeṣaṃ haraṇīyaṃ ca vidyā na hriyate paraiḥ //
analyzed: gṛhe ca abhyantare dravyam lagnam ca eva tu dṛśyate aśeṣam haraṇīyam ca vidyā na hriyate paraiḥ

original: śaunakīyaṃ nītisāraṃ viṣṇuḥ sarvatratāni ca / kathayāmāsa vaipūrvaṃ tatra śuśrāva śaṅkaraḥ / śaṅkarādaśṛṇodvyāso vyāsādasmābhireva ca //
analyzed: śaunakīyam nīti sāram viṣṇuḥ sarvatra tāni ca kathayāmāsa vaipūrvam tatra śuśrāva śaṅkaraḥ śaṅkarāt aśṛṇot vyāsaḥ vyāsāt asmābhiḥ eva ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śaunakoktanītisārādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcadaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe śaunakoktanītisārādivarṇanam nāma pañcadaśottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 116
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / vratāni vyāsa vakṣyāmi hariryaiḥ sarvado bhavet / sarvamāsarkṣatithiṣu vāreṣu harirarcitaḥ //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca vratāni vyāsa vakṣyāmi hariḥ yaiḥ sarva daḥ bhavet sarva māsa ṛkṣa tithiṣu vāreṣu hariḥ arcitaḥ

original: ekabhaktena naktena upavāsaphalādinā / dadāti dhanadhānyādi putrarājyajayādikam //
analyzed: eka bhaktena naktena upavāsa phala ādinā dadāti dhana dhānya ādi putra rājya jaya ādikam

original: vaiśvānaraḥ pratipadi kuberaḥ pūjitor'thadaḥ / poṣya brahmo pratipadyarcitaḥ śristathāśvinī //
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ pratipadi kuberaḥ pūjita ūrtha daḥ poṣya brahmo pratipadi arcitaḥ śriḥ tathā aśvinī

original: dvitīyāyāṃ yamo lakṣmīnārāyaṇa ihārthadaḥ / tṛtīyāyāṃ tridevāśca gaurīvighneśaśaṅkarāḥ //
analyzed: dvitīyāyām yamaḥ lakṣmī nārāyaṇaḥ iha artha daḥ tṛtīyāyām tri devāḥ ca gaurī vighneśa śaṅkarāḥ

original: caturthyāṃ ca caturvyūhaḥ pañcamyāmarcito hariḥ / kārtikeyo raviḥ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ saptamyāṃ bhāskaror'thadaḥ //
analyzed: caturthyām ca catur vyūhaḥ pañcamyām arcitaḥ hariḥ kārtikeyaḥ raviḥ ṣaṣṭhyām saptamyām bhāskara ūrtha daḥ

original: durgāṣṭamyāṃ navamyāṃ ca mātaro 'tha diśor'thadāḥ / daśamyāṃ ca yamaścandra ekādaśyāmṛṣīnyajet //
analyzed: durgā aṣṭamyām navamyām ca diśaḥ ṛtha dāḥ daśamyām ca yamaḥ candraḥ ekādaśyām ṛṣīn yajet

original: dvādaśyāṃ ca hariḥ kāmastrayodaśyāṃ maheśvaraḥ / caturdaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ brahmā ca pitaror'thadāḥ //
analyzed: dvādaśyām ca hariḥ kāmaḥ trayodaśyām maheśvaraḥ caturdaśyām pañcadaśyām brahmā ca pitaraḥ ṛtha dāḥ

original: amāvāsyāṃ pūjanīyā vārā vai bhāskarādayaḥ / nakṣatrāṇi ca yogāśca pūjitāḥ sarvadāyakāḥ //
analyzed: amāvāsyām pūjanīyāḥ vārāḥ vai bhāskara ādayaḥ nakṣatrāṇi ca yogāḥ ca pūjitāḥ sarva dāyakāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe tithyādivratavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe tithyādivratavarṇanam nāma ṣoḍaśottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 117
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / mārgaśīrṣe site pakṣe vyāsāṃnaṅgatrayodaśī / mallikājaṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ dhutūraiḥ pūjayecchivam //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca mārgaśīrṣe site pakṣe mallikā jam dantakāṣṭham dhutūraiḥ pūjayet śivam

original: anaṅgāyeti naivedyaṃ madhaprāśyātha pauṣake / yogeśvaraṃ pūjayecca bilvapatraiḥ kadambajam / dantakāṣṭhaṃ candanādi naivedyaṃ kṛsarādikam //
analyzed: anaṅgāya iti naivedyam pauṣake  yogeśvaram pūjayet ca bilva patraiḥ kadamba jam dantakāṣṭham candana ādi naivedyam kṛsara ādikam

original: māghe naṭeśvarāyārcya kundairmauktikamālayā / plakṣeṇa dantakāṣṭhaṃ ca naivedyaṃ pūrikā mune //
analyzed: māghe naṭeśvarāya arcya kundaiḥ mauktika mālayā plakṣeṇa dantakāṣṭham ca naivedyam pūrikā mune

original: vīreśvaraṃ phālgune tu pūjayettu marūbakaiḥ / śarkarāśākamaṇḍāśca cūtajaṃ dantadhāvanam //
analyzed: vīreśvaram phālgune tu pūjayet tu marū bakaiḥ śarkarā śākam aṇḍāḥ ca cūta jam dantadhāvanam

original: caitre yajetsu rūpāya karpūraṃ prāśayenniśi / dantadhāvanāṭajaṃ naivedyaṃ śaṣkulīṃ dadet //
analyzed: caitre yajet su rūpāya karpūram prāśayet niśi naivedyam śaṣkulīm dadet

original: pūjā damanakaḥ śambhorveśākhe 'śokrapuṣpakaiḥ / mahārūpāya naivedyaṃ guḍabhaktaṃ puṭṭabaram //
analyzed: pūjā damanakaḥ śambhoḥ veśākhe śokra puṣpakaiḥ mahārūpāya naivedyam guḍa bhaktam puṭṭabaram

original: dantakāṣṭhaṃ prāśayecca dadejjatīphalaṃ tathā / pradyumnaṃ pūjayejjyeṣṭhe campakairbilvajaṃ daśet //
analyzed: dantakāṣṭham prāśayet ca dadet jatī phalam tathā pradyumnam pūjayet jyeṣṭhe campakaiḥ bilva jam daśet

original: lavagārā tathā ṣaḍhi umāmadati śāsanaḥ? / aguruṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ ca tamapāmārgakairyajet //
analyzed: lava gārā tathā umām adati śāsanaḥ agurum dantakāṣṭham ca tam apāmārgakaiḥ yajet

original: śrāvaṇe karavīraṃ ca śambhave śūlapāṇaye / gandhāśano ghṛtādyaiśca karavīrajaśodhanam //
analyzed: śrāvaṇe karavīram ca śambhave śūlapāṇaye gandha aśanaḥ ghṛta ādyaiḥ ca karavīra ja śodhanam

original: sadyojātaṃ bhādrapade bakulaiḥ pūpakairyajet / gandharvāśo madanakamāśvine ca surādhipam //
analyzed: sadyojātam bhādrapade bakulaiḥ pūpakaiḥ yajet gandharva āśaḥ madanakam āśvine ca surādhipam

original: campakaiḥ svarṇavā (dhār)
analyzed: campakaiḥ svarṇavā

original: yādo jinmodakasaṃpradaḥ / khādiraṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ ca kārtike rudramarcayet //
analyzed: yādaḥ jinma udaka saṃpradaḥ khādiram dantakāṣṭham ca kārtike rudram arcayet

original: badaryā dantakāṣṭhaṃ ca madano daśamāśanaḥ / kṣīraśākapradaḥ padmairabdante śivamarcayet //
analyzed: badaryāḥ dantakāṣṭham ca madanaḥ daśama aśanaḥ kṣīra śāka pradaḥ padmaiḥ śivam arcayet

original: ratimuktamanaṅgaṃ ca svarṇamaṇḍalasaṃsthitam / gandhādyairdaśasāhasraṃ tilavrīhyādi homayet //
analyzed: rati muktam anaṅgam ca svarṇa maṇḍala saṃsthitam gandha ādyaiḥ daśa sāhasram tila vrīhi ādi homayet

original: jāgaraṃ gītavaditraṃ prabhita'bhyārcya vedayet / dvijāya śayyāṃ pātraṃ ca chatraṃ vastramupānahau //
analyzed: jāgaram gītavaditram vedayet dvijāya śayyām pātram ca chatram vastram upānahau

original: gāṃ dvijaṃ bhojayedbhaktyā kṛtakṛtyo bhavennaraḥ / etadudyāpanaṃ sarvaṃ vrateṣu dhyepamīdṛśam / phalañca śrīsutārogyasaubhāgyasvargataṃ bhavet //
analyzed: gām dvijam bhojayet bhaktyā kṛtakṛtyaḥ bhavet naraḥ etat udyāpanam sarvam vrateṣu phalam ca śrī suta ārogya saubhāgya svargatam bhavet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe 'naṅgatrayodaśīvrataṃ nāma saptadaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe naṅgatrayodaśīvratam nāma saptadaśottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 118
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / vrataṃ kaivalyaśamanamakhaṇḍadvādaśīṃ vade / māgaśīrṣe site pakṣe gavyāśī samupoṣitaḥ //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca vratam kaivalya śamanam akhaṇḍadvādaśīm vade māgaśīrṣe site pakṣe gavya āśī samupoṣitaḥ

original: dvādaśyāṃ pūjaye dviṣṇuṃ dadyānmāsacatuṣṭayam / pañcavrīhiyutaṃ pātraṃ viprāyedamudāharet //
analyzed: dvādaśyām dviṣṇum dadyāt māsa catuṣṭayam  pañca vrīhi yutam pātram viprāya idam udāharet

original: saptajanmani he viṣṇo yanmayā hi vrataṃ kṛtam / bhagavaṃstvatprasādena tadakhaṇḍamihāstu me //
analyzed: sapta janmani he viṣṇo yat mayā hi vratam kṛtam bhagavan tvad prasādena tat akhaṇḍam iha astu me

original: yathākhaṇḍaṃ jagatsarvaṃ tvameva puruṣottama / tathākhilānyakhaṇḍāni vritāni mama santi vai //
analyzed: yathā khaṇḍam jagat sarvam tvam eva puruṣottama tathā akhilāni akhaṇḍāni mama santi vai

original: saktupātrāṇi caitrādau śrāvaṇādau ghṛtānvitān / vratakṛdvatapūrṇastu strīputrasvargabhāgbhavet //
analyzed: saktu pātrāṇi caitra ādau śrāvaṇa ādau ghṛta anvitān strī putra svarga bhāj bhavet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe 'khaṇḍadvādaśīvratakathanaṃnāmāṣṭādaśottara śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe khaṇḍadvādaśīvratakathanaṃnāmā aṣṭādaśottara śatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 119
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / agastyārghyavrataṃ vakṣye bhuktimuktipradāyakam / aprāpte bhāskare kanyāṃ sati bhāge tribhirdinaiḥ //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca agastyārghya vratam vakṣye bhukti mukti pradāyakam aprāpte bhāskare kanyām sati bhāge tribhiḥ dinaiḥ

original: arghyaṃ dadyādagastyāya mūrtiṃ saṃpūjya vai mune / / kāśapuṣpamayīṃ kumbhe pradoṣe kṛtajāgaraḥ //
analyzed: arghyam dadyāt agastyāya mūrtim saṃpūjya vai mune kāśa puṣpa mayīm kumbhe pradoṣe kṛta jāgaraḥ

original: dadhyakṣatādyaiḥ saṃpūjya upoṣya phalapuṣpakaiḥ / pañcavarṇasamāyuktaṃ hemaraupyasamanvitam //
analyzed: dadhi akṣata ādyaiḥ saṃpūjya upoṣya phala puṣpakaiḥ pañca varṇa samāyuktam hema raupya samanvitam

original: saptadhānyayutaṃ pātraṃ dadhicandanacarcitam / agastyaḥ khanamāneti mantreṇārghyaṃ pridāpayet //
analyzed: saptadhānya yutam pātram dadhi candana carcitam agastyaḥ khanamāna iti mantreṇa arghyam

original: khāsapuṣpapratīkāśa agnimārutasambhava / / mitrāvāruṇayoḥ puttro kumbhayone namo 'stu te //
analyzed: agni māruta sambhava mitra vāruṇayoḥ kumbha yone namaḥ stu te

original: śūdrastryādiranenaiva tyajeddhānyaṃ phalaṃ rasam / dadyāddvijātaye kumbhaṃ sahiraṇyaṃ sadakṣiṇam / bhojayecca dvijānsapta varṣaṃ kṛtvā tu sarvabhāk //
analyzed: śūdra strī ādiḥ anena eva tyajet dhānyam phalam rasam  dadyāt dvijātaye kumbham sa hiraṇyam sa dakṣiṇam bhojayet ca dvijān sapta varṣam kṛtvā tu sarva bhāj

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe 'gastyārghyavrataṃ nāmakonaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe gastyārghyavratam nāmaka ūnaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 120
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / rambhātṛtīyāṃ vakṣya ca saubhagyaśrīsutādidām / mārgaśīrṣesite pakṣe tṛtīyāyāmupoṣitaḥ //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca rambhātṛtīyām vakṣya ca saubhagya śrī suta ādi dām  mārgaśīrṣe site pakṣe tṛtīyāyām upoṣitaḥ

original: gaurīṃ yajedvilvapatraiḥ kuśodakakarastataḥ / kadambādau girisutāṃ pauṣe marubakairyajet //
analyzed: gaurīm yajet vilva patraiḥ kuśa udaka karaḥ tatas kadamba ādau girisutām pauṣe maru bakaiḥ yajet

original: karpūrādaḥ kṛsarado mallikādantakāṣṭhakṛt / māghesubhadrāṃ kalhārairghṛtāśo maṇḍakapradaḥ //
gītīmayaṃ tantakāṣṭhaṃ phālgune gomatīṃ yajet / kundaiḥ kṛtvā dantakāṣṭhaṃ jīvāśaḥ śaṣkulīpradaḥ //
analyzed: tantakāṣṭham phālgune gomatīm yajet kundaiḥ kṛtvā dantakāṣṭham jīva āśaḥ śaṣkulī pradaḥ

original: viśālākṣīṃ damanakaiścaitre ca kṛsarapradaḥ / dadhiprāśo dantakāṣṭhaṃ tagaraṃ śrīmukhīṃ yajet //
analyzed: viśālākṣīm damanakaiḥ caitre ca kṛsara pradaḥ dadhi prāśaḥ dantakāṣṭham tagaram śrīmukhīm yajet

original: vaiśākhe karṇikāraiśca aśokāśo vaṭapradaḥ / jyeṣṭhe nārāyaṇīmarcecchatapatraiśca khaṇḍadaḥ / lavaṅgāśo bhavedeva āṣāḍhe mādhavīṃ yajet //
analyzed: vaiśākhe karṇikāraiḥ ca aśoka āśaḥ vaṭa pradaḥ jyeṣṭhe nārāyaṇīm arcet śatapatraiḥ ca khaṇḍa daḥ lavaṅga āśaḥ bhavet eva āṣāḍhe mādhavīm yajet

original: tilāśo bilvapatraiśca kṣīrānnavaṭakapradaḥ / audumbaraṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ tagaryāḥ śrāvaṇe śriyam //
analyzed: tila āśaḥ bilva patraiḥ ca kṣīra anna vaṭaka pradaḥ audumbaram dantakāṣṭham tagaryāḥ śrāvaṇe śriyam

original: dantakāṣṭhaṃ mallikāyā kṣīrado hyuttamāṃ yajet / padmairyajedbhādrapade śṛṅgadāśo gṛḍādidaḥ //
analyzed: dantakāṣṭham kṣīra daḥ hi uttamām yajet padmaiḥ yajet bhādrapade

original: rājaputrīṃ cāśvayuje japāpuṣpaiśca jīrakam / prāśayenniśi naivedyaiḥ kṛsaraiḥ kārtike yajet //
analyzed: rājaputrīm ca āśvayuje japā puṣpaiḥ ca jīrakam prāśayet niśi naivedyaiḥ kṛsaraiḥ kārtike yajet

original: jātīpuṣpaiḥ padmajāṃ ca pañcagavyāśano yajet / ghṛtodanaṃ ca varṣānte sapatnīkāndvijānyajet //
analyzed: jātī puṣpaiḥ padmajām ca pañcagavya aśanaḥ yajet ghṛtodanam ca varṣa ante sa patnīkān dvijān yajet

original: umāmaheśvaraṃ pūjya pradadyācca guḍādikam / vastracchatrasuvarṇādyaiḥ rātrau ca kṛtajāgaraḥ / gītavādyairdadatpratargavādyaṃ sarvamānpuyāt //
analyzed: umāmaheśvaram pūjya pradadyāt ca guḍa ādikam vastra chatra suvarṇa ādyaiḥ rātrau ca kṛta jāgaraḥ gīta vādyaiḥ dadat pratar gavādyam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rambhātṛtīyāvrataṃ nāma viṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe rambhātṛtīyāvratam nāma viṃśatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 121
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / cāturmāsyavratānyūce ekādaśyāṃ samācaret / āṣāḍhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vā sarveṇaharimarcyaca //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca cāturmāsya vratāni ūce ekādaśyām samācaret āṣāḍhyām paurṇamāsyām vā sarveṇa harim arcya ca

original: idaṃ vrataṃ mayā deva gṛhītaṃ puratastava / nirvighnaṃ siddhimāpnotu prasanne tvayi keśava //
analyzed: idam vratam mayā deva gṛhītam puratas tava  nirvighnam siddhim āpnotu prasanne tvayi keśava

original: gṛhīte 'sminvrate deva yadyapūrṇe mriyāmyaham / tanme bhavatu sampūrṇaṃ tvatprasādājjanārdana //
analyzed: gṛhīte smin vrate deva yadi apūrṇe mriyāmi aham tat me bhavatu sampūrṇam tvad prasādāt janārdana

original: evamabhyarcya gṛhṇīyādvratārcanajapādikam / sarvāghaṃ ca kṣayaṃ yāti cikīrṣedyo harervratam //
analyzed: evam abhyarcya gṛhṇīyāt vrata arcana japa ādikam sarva agham ca kṣayam yāti cikīrṣet yaḥ hareḥ vratam

original: snātvāyobhyacya gṛhṇīyādvratārcanajapādikam / snātvā yaccaturo māsānekabhaktena pūjayet / viṣṇuṃ sa yāti viṣṇorva lokaṃ malavivarjitam //
analyzed: gṛhṇīyāt vrata arcana japa ādikam  snātvā yat caturaḥ māsān eka bhaktena pūjayet viṣṇum sa yāti lokam mala vivarjitam

original: madyamāṃsasurātyagī vedaviddharipūjanāt / tailavarji viṣṇulokaṃ viṣṇubhākkṛcchrapādakṛt //
analyzed: veda vid hari pūjanāt taila varji viṣṇu lokam viṣṇu bhāj kṛcchra pāda kṛt

original: ekarātropavāsācca devo vaimāniko bhavet / śvetadvīpaṃ trirātrāttu vrajetṣaṣṭhānnakṛnnaraḥ //
analyzed: eka rātra upavāsāt ca devaḥ vaimānikaḥ bhavet śvetadvīpam tri rātrāt tu vrajet ṣaṣṭha anna kṛt naraḥ

original: cāndrāyaṇāddharerdhāma labhenmuktimayācitām / prājāpatyaṃ viṣṇulokaṃ parākavratakṛddharim //
analyzed: cāndrāyaṇāt hareḥ dhāma labhet muktim a yācitām prājāpatyam viṣṇu lokam parāka vrata kṛt harim

original: saktuyāvakabhikṣāśī payodadhighṛtāśanaḥ / gomūtrayāvakāhāraḥ pañcagavyakṛtāśanaḥ / śākamalaphalādyāśī rasavarjo ca viṣṇubhāk //
analyzed: saktu yāvaka bhikṣā āśī payaḥ dadhi ghṛta aśanaḥ go mūtra yāvaka āhāraḥ pañcagavya kṛta aśanaḥ śāka mala phala ādi āśī ca viṣṇu bhāj

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe cāturmāsyavratanirūpaṇaṃ nāmakāvaśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe cāturmāsyavratanirūpaṇam dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 122
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / vrataṃ māsopavāsākhyaṃ sarvotkṛṣṭaṃ vadāmite / vānaprastho yatirnārī kuryānmāsopavāsakam //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca vratam māsopavāsa ākhyam sarva utkṛṣṭam vadāmi te vānaprasthaḥ yatiḥ nārī kuryāt māsopavāsakam

original: āśvinasya site pakṣe ekādaśyāmupoṣitaḥ / vratametattu gṛhṇīyādyāvattriṃśaddināni tu //
analyzed: āśvinasya site pakṣe ekādaśyām upoṣitaḥ vratam etat tu gṛhṇīyāt yāvat triṃśat dināni tu

original: adyaprabhṛtyahaṃ viṣṇo yāvadutthānakaṃ tava / arcayetvāmanaśraṃstu dināni triṃśadeva tu //
analyzed: adya prabhṛti aham viṣṇo yāvat utthānakam tava  dināni triṃśat eva tu

original: kārtikāśvinayorviṣṇo dvādaśyoḥ śuklayoraham / mriyeyadyantarāle tu vratabhaṅgo na me bhavet //
analyzed: kārtika āśvinayoḥ viṣṇo dvādaśyoḥ śuklayoḥ aham

original: hariṃ yajottriṣavaṇasnāyī gandhādibhirvratī / gātrābhyaṅgaṃ gandhalepaṃ devatāyatane tyajet //
analyzed: harim yaja uttriṣavaṇa snāyī gandha ādibhiḥ vratī gātra abhyaṅgam gandha lepam devatāyatane tyajet

original: dvādaśyāmatha saṃpūjya pradadyāddvijabhojanam / tataśca pāraṇaṃ kuryāddharermāsopavāsakṛt //
analyzed: dvādaśyām atha saṃpūjya pradadyāt dvija bhojanam tatas ca pāraṇam kuryāt hareḥ māsopavāsa kṛt

original: dugdhādiprāśanaṃ kuryādvratastho mūrchito 'ntarā / dugdhādyairna vrataṃ naśyedbhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: dugdha ādi prāśanam kuryāt vrata sthaḥ mūrchitaḥ ntarā dugdha ādyaiḥ na vratam naśyet bhukti muktim avāpnuyāt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe māsopavāsavrataṃ nāma dvāviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe māsopavāsavratam nāma dvāviṃśatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 123
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / vratāni kārtike vakṣye snātvā viṣṇuṃ prapūjayet / ekabhaktena naktena māsaṃ vāyācitena vā //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca vratāni kārtike vakṣye snātvā viṣṇum prapūjayet eka bhaktena naktena māsam vā a yācitena vā

original: dugdhaśākaphalādyairvā upavāsena vā punaḥ / sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ prāptakāmo hariṃ vrajet //
analyzed: dugdha śāka phala ādyaiḥ vā upavāsena vā punar sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ prāpta kāmaḥ harim vrajet

original: sadā harervrataṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tataḥ syāddakṣiṇāyane / cāturmāsye tatastasmātkārtike bhīṣmapañcakam //
analyzed: sadā hareḥ vratam śreṣṭham tatas syāt dakṣiṇāyane cāturmāsye tatas tasmāt kārtike bhīṣmapañcakam

original: tataḥ śreṣṭhavrataṃ śuklasyaikādaśyāṃ samācaret / snātvā trikālaṃ pitrādīnyavādyairarcayeddharim //
analyzed: tatas śreṣṭha vratam śuklasya ekādaśyām samācaret snātvā tri kālam pitṛ ādīn yava ādyaiḥ arcayet harim

original: yajenmaunī ghṛtādyaiśca pañcagavyena vāribhiḥ / snāpayitvātha karpūramukhaiścaivānulepayet //
analyzed: yajet maunī ghṛta ādyaiḥ ca pañcagavyena vāribhiḥ snāpayitvā atha karpūra mukhaiḥ ca eva anulepayet

original: ghṛtāktaguggulairdhūpaṃ dvijaḥ pañcadinaṃ dahet / naivadyaṃ paramānnaṃ tu japedaṣṭottaraṃ śatam //
analyzed: ghṛta akta guggulaiḥ dhūpam dvijaḥ pañca dinam dahet naivadyam paramānnam tu japet aṣṭa uttaram śatam

original: oṃ namo vāsudevāya ghṛtavrīhitilādikam / aṣṭākṣareṇa mantreṇa svāhāntena tu homayet //
analyzed: om namaḥ vāsudevāya ghṛta vrīhi tila ādikam aṣṭa akṣareṇa mantreṇa svāhā antena tu homayet

original: prathame 'hni hareḥ pādau yajetpadmairdvitayika / bilvapatrairjānudeśaṃ nābhi gandhena cāpare //
analyzed: prathame hni hareḥ pādau yajet padmaiḥ bilva patraiḥ jānu deśam nābhi gandhena ca apare

original: skandhā bilvajavābhiśca pañcame 'hni śiror'cayat / mālatyā bhūmiśāyī syādgomayaṃ prāśayetkramāt //
analyzed: skandhāḥ bilva javābhiḥ ca pañcame hni mālatyāḥ bhūmi śāyī syāt gomayam prāśayet kramāt

original: gomūtraṃ ca dadhi kṣīraṃ pañcame pañcagavyakam / naktaṃ kuryātpañcadaśyāṃ vratī syādbhuktimuktibhāk //
analyzed: go mūtram ca dadhi kṣīram pañcame pañcagavyakam  naktam kuryāt pañcadaśyām vratī syāt bhukti mukti bhāj

original: ekādaśīvrataṃ nityaṃ tatkuryātpakṣayordvayoḥ / aghaughanarakaṃ hanyātsarvadaṃ viṣṇulokadam //
analyzed: ekādaśīvratam nityam tat kuryāt pakṣayoḥ dvayoḥ agha ogha narakam hanyāt sarva dam viṣṇu loka dam

original: ekādaśī dvādaśī ca niśānte ca trayodaśī / nityamekādaśī yatra tatra sannihito hariḥ //
analyzed: ekādaśī dvādaśī ca niśā ante ca trayodaśī nityam ekādaśī yatra tatra sannihitaḥ hariḥ

original: daśamyekādaśī yatra tatrasthāścāsurādayaḥ / dvādaśyāṃ pāraṇa kuryātsūtake mṛtake caret //
analyzed: daśamī ekādaśī yatra tatra sthāḥ ca asura ādayaḥ  dvādaśyām kuryāt sūtake mṛtake caret

original: caturdaśīṃ pratipadaṃ pūrvamiśrāmupāvaset / paurṇamāsyā mamāvāsyāṃ pratipanmiśritāṃ mune //
analyzed: caturdaśīm pratipadam pūrva miśrām upāvaset paurṇamāsyāḥ mamāvāsyām pratipad miśritām mune

original: dvitīyāṃ tṛtīyāmiśrāṃ tṛtīyāñcāpyupāvaset / caturthyā saṅgatāṃ nityaṃ caturthoñcanayā yutām / pañcamīṃṣaṣṭhyasaṃyuktāṃ ṣaṣṭhyā yuktāñca saptamīm //
analyzed: dvitīyām tṛtīyā miśrām tṛtīyām ca api upāvaset  caturthyā saṅga tām nityam yutām  pañcamīm ṣaṣṭhī a saṃyuktām ṣaṣṭhyā yuktām ca saptamīm

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhīṣmapañcakādivrataṃ nāma trayoviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe bhīṣmapañcakādivratam nāma trayoviṃśatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 124
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / śivarātrivrataṃ vakṣye kathāṃ vai sarvakāmadām / yathā ca gaurī bhūteśaṃ pṛcchati sma paraṃ vratam //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca  śivarātri vratam vakṣye kathām vai sarva kāma dām  yathā ca gaurī bhūteśam pṛcchati sma param vratam

original: īśvarauvāca / māghaphālgunayormadhye kṛṣṇā yā tu caturdaśī / tasyāṃ jāgaraṇādrudraḥ pūjito bhuktimuktidaḥ //
analyzed: īśvaraḥ uvāca māgha phālgunayoḥ madhye kṛṣṇā yā tu caturdaśī tasyām jāgaraṇāt rudraḥ pūjitaḥ bhukti mukti daḥ

original: kāmayukto haraḥ pūjyo dvādaśyāmi keśavaḥ / upoṣitaiḥ pūjitaḥ sannarakāttarayattathā //
analyzed: kāma yuktaḥ haraḥ pūjyaḥ keśavaḥ upoṣitaiḥ pūjitaḥ san narakāt tarayat tathā

original: niṣādaścarbude rājā pāpī sundarasenakaḥ / sa kukruraiḥ samāyukto mṛgānhantuṃ vanaṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: niṣādaḥ ca ṛbude rājā pāpī sundarasenakaḥ sa kukruraiḥ samāyuktaḥ mṛgān hantum vanam gataḥ

original: mṛgādi kamasaṃprāpya kṣutpipāsārdito girau / rātrau taḍāgatīreṣu nikuñje jāgradāsthitaḥ //
analyzed: mṛga ādi kam a saṃprāpya kṣudh pipāsā arditaḥ girau rātrau taḍāga tīreṣu nikuñje jāgrat āsthitaḥ

original: tatrāsti liṅgaṃ svaṃ rakṣañcharīraṃ cākṣipattataḥ / parṇāni cāpatanmūrdhni liṅgasyaiva na jānataḥ //
analyzed: tatra asti liṅgam svam rakṣan śarīram ca akṣipat tatas parṇāni ca apatat mūrdhni liṅgasya eva na jānataḥ

original: tena dhūlinirodhāya kṣiptaṃ nīraṃ ca liṅgake / śaraḥ pramādenaikastu pracyutaḥ karapallavāt //
analyzed: tena dhūli nirodhāya kṣiptam nīram ca liṅgake  śaraḥ pramādena ekaḥ tu pracyutaḥ karapallavāt

original: jānubhyāmavanīṃ gatvā liṅgaṃ spṭaṣṭvā gṛhītavān / evaṃ snānaṃ sparśanaṃ ca pūjanaṃ jāgaro 'bhavat //
analyzed: jānubhyām avanīm gatvā liṅgam spṭaṣṭvā gṛhītavān evam snānam sparśanam ca pūjanam jāgaraḥ bhavat

original: prātargṛhāgato bhāryādattānnaṃ bhuktavānsa ca / kāle mṛto yamabhaṭaiḥ pāśairbaddhvā tu nīyate //
analyzed: prātar gṛha āgataḥ bhāryā datta annam bhuktavān sa ca kāle mṛtaḥ yama bhaṭaiḥ pāśaiḥ baddhvā tu nīyate

original: tadā mama gaṇairyuddhe jitvā muktīkṛtaḥ sa ca / kukkureṇa sahaivābhūdgaṇo matpārśvago 'malaḥ //
analyzed: tadā mama gaṇaiḥ yuddhe jitvā muktīkṛtaḥ sa ca kukkureṇa saha evā abhūt gaṇaḥ mad pārśva gaḥ malaḥ

original: evamajñānataḥ puṇyañjñānātpuṇyamathākṣayam / trayodaśyāṃ śivaṃ pūjya kuryātta niyamaṃ vratī //
analyzed: evam ajñānataḥ puṇyan jñānāt puṇyam atha akṣayam trayodaśyām śivam pūjya niyamam vratī

original: prātardeva / caturdaśyāṃ jāgariṣyāmyahaṃ niśi / pūjāṃ dānaṃ tapo homaṃ kariṣyāmyātmaśaktitaḥ //
analyzed: prātar deva caturdaśyām jāgariṣyāmi aham niśi pūjām dānam tapaḥ homam kariṣyāmi ātma śaktitaḥ

original: caturdaśyāṃ nirāhāro bhūtvā śambho pare 'hani / bhokṣye 'haṃ bhuktimuktyarthaṃ śaraṇaṃ me bhaveśvara //
analyzed: caturdaśyām nirāhāraḥ bhūtvā śambho pare hani bhokṣye ham bhukti mukti artham śaraṇam me bhava īśvara

original: pañcagavyāmṛtaiḥ snāpya tatkāle guruṃ śritaḥ / oṃ namo namaḥ śivāya gandhādyaḥ pūjayeddharam //
analyzed: pañcagavya amṛtaiḥ snāpya tad kāle gurum śritaḥ om namaḥ namaḥ śivāya gandha ādyaḥ pūjayet haram

original: tilataṇḍulavrīhīṃśca juhuyātsaghṛtaṃ carum / hutvā pūrṇāhutiṃ dattvā śṛṇuyādgītasatkathām //
analyzed: tila taṇḍula vrīhīn ca juhuyāt sa ghṛtam carum hutvā pūrṇāhutim dattvā śṛṇuyāt gīta sat kathām

original: ardharātre triyāme ca caturthe ca punayarjat / mūlamantraṃ tathā japtvā prabhāte tu kṣamāpayet //
analyzed: ardharātre tri yāme ca caturthe ca mūlamantram tathā japtvā prabhāte tu kṣamāpayet

original: avighnena vrataṃ deva / tvatprasadānmayārcitam / kṣamasva jagatāṃ nātha / trailokyādhipate hara / //
analyzed: avighnena vratam deva tvad prasadāt mayā arcitam kṣamasva jagatām nātha trailokya adhipate hara

original: yanmayādya kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ yadrudrasya niveditam / tvatprasādānmayā deva / vratamadya samāpitam //
analyzed: yat mayā adya kṛtam puṇyam yat rudrasya niveditam  tvad prasādāt mayā deva vratam adya samāpitam

original: prasanno bhava me śrīman gṛhaṃ prati ca gamyatām / tvadālokanamātreṇa pavitro 'smi na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: prasannaḥ bhava me śrīman gṛham prati ca gamyatām tvad ālokana mātreṇa pavitraḥ smi na saṃśayaḥ

original: bhojayeddhyānaniṣṭhāṃśca vastracchatrādikaṃ dadet / devādideva bhūteśa lokānugrahakāraka //
analyzed: bhojayet dhyāna niṣṭhān ca vastra chatra ādikam dadet  deva ādideva bhūteśa loka anugraha kāraka

original: yanmayā śraddhayā dattaṃ prīyatāṃ tena me prabhuḥ / iti kṣamāpya ca vratī kuryādvādaśavārṣikam //
analyzed: yat mayā śraddhayā dattam prīyatām tena me prabhuḥ iti kṣamāpya ca vratī kuryāḥ dvādaśa vārṣikam

original: kīrtiśrīputrarājyādi prāpya śaivaṃ puraṃ vrajet / dvādaśeṣvapi māseṣu prakuryādiha jāgaram //
analyzed: kīrti śrī putra rājya ādi prāpya śaivam puram vrajet  dvādaśeṣu api māseṣu prakuryāt iha jāgaram

original: vratī dvādaśa saṃbhojya dīpadaḥ svargamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: vratī dvādaśa saṃbhojya dīpa daḥ svargam āpnuyāt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śivarātrivrataṃ nāma caturviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe śivarātrivratam nāma caturviṃśatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 125
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: pitāmaha uvāca / māndhātā cakravartyāsīdupoṣyaikādaśīṃ nṛpaḥ / ekādaśyāṃ na bhuñjīta pakṣayorubhayārapi //
analyzed: pitāmahaḥ uvāca māndhātā cakravartī āsīt upoṣya ekādaśīm nṛpaḥ ekādaśyām na bhuñjīta pakṣayoḥ ubhayār api

original: daśamyekādaśīmiśrā gāndhāryā samupoṣitā / tasyāḥ putraśataṃ naṣṭaṃ tasmāttāṃ parivarjayet //
analyzed: daśamī ekādaśī miśrā gāndhāryā samupoṣitā tasyāḥ putra śatam naṣṭam tasmāt tām parivarjayet

original: dvādaśyekādaśī yatra tatra sannihito hariḥ / daśamyekādaśī yatra tatra sannihito 'suraḥ / bahuvākyavirodhena sandeho jāyate yadā //
analyzed: dvādaśī ekādaśī yatra tatra sannihitaḥ hariḥ daśamī ekādaśī yatra tatra sannihitaḥ suraḥ bahu vākya virodhena sandehaḥ jāyate yadā

original: dvādaśī tu tadā grāhyā trayodaśyāntu pāraṇam / ekādaśī kalāpisyādupoṣyā dvādaśī tathā //
analyzed: dvādaśī tu tadā grāhyā trayodaśyām tu pāraṇam ekādaśī kalā api syāt upoṣyā dvādaśī tathā

original: ekādaśī dvādaśī ca viśeṣeṇa trayodaśī / trimiśrā sā tithirgrāhyā sarvapāpaharā śubhā //
analyzed: ekādaśī dvādaśī ca viśeṣeṇa trayodaśī tri miśrā sā tithiḥ grāhyā sarva pāpa harā śubhā

original: ekādaśīmupoṣyaivadvādaśīma thavā dvija / / trimiśrāṃ caiva kurvīta na daśamyā yutāṃ kracit //
analyzed: ekādaśīm upoṣya eva dvādaśīm dvija    tri miśrām ca eva kurvīta na daśamyā yutām kracid

original: rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kurvanpurāṇaśravaṇaṃ nṛpaḥ / gadādharaṃ pūjayaṃśca upoṣyaikā daśīdvayam / rukmāṅgado yayau mokṣamanye caikādaśīvratam //
analyzed: rātrau jāgaraṇam kurvan purāṇa śravaṇam nṛpaḥ gadādharam pūjayan ca upoṣya ekā daśī dvayam rukmāṅgadaḥ yayau mokṣam anye ca ekādaśīvratam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekādaśīmāhātmyaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ekādaśīmāhātmyam nāma pañcaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 126
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / yenārcanena vai loko jagāma paramāṃ gatim / tamarcanaṃ pravakṣyāmi bhuktimuktikaraṃ param //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca  yena arcanena vai lokaḥ jagāma paramām gatim  tam arcanam pravakṣyāmi bhukti mukti karam param

original: sāmānyamaṇḍalaṃ nyasya dhātāraṃ dvāradeśataḥ / vidhātāraṃ tathā gaṅgāṃ yamunāṃ ca mahānadīm //
analyzed: sāmānya maṇḍalam nyasya dhātāram dvāra deśataḥ vidhātāram tathā gaṅgām yamunām ca mahā nadīm

original: dvāraśriyaṃ ca daṇḍaṃ ca pracaṇḍaṃ vāstupūruṣam / madhye cādhāraśaktiṃ ca kūrmaṃ cānantamarcayet //
analyzed: dvāra śriyam ca daṇḍam ca pracaṇḍam vāstu pūruṣam madhye ca ādhāra śaktim ca kūrmam ca anantam arcayet

original: bhūmiṃ dharmaṃ tathā jñānaṃ vairagyaiśvaryameva ca / adharmādīṃśca caturaḥ kandaṃ nālaṃ ca paṅkajam //
analyzed: bhūmim dharmam tathā jñānam vairagya aiśvaryam eva ca adharma ādīn ca caturaḥ kandam nālam ca paṅkajam

original: karṇikāṃ kesaraṃ sattvaṃ rājasaṃ tāmasaṃ guṇam / suryādimaṇḍalānyeva vimalādyāśca śaktayaḥ //
analyzed: karṇikām kesaram sattvam rājasam tāmasam guṇam surya ādi maṇḍalāni eva vimalā ādyāḥ ca śaktayaḥ

original: durgāṃ gaṇaṃ sarasvatīṃ kṣetrapālaṃ ca koṇake / āsanaṃ mūrtimabhyarcya vāsudevaṃ balaṃ smaran //
analyzed: durgām gaṇam sarasvatīm kṣetrapālam ca koṇake āsanam mūrtim abhyarcya vāsudevam balam smaran

original: aniruddhaṃ mahātmānaṃ nārāyaṇamathārcayet / hṛdayādīni cāṅgāni śaṅkhādīnyāyudhāni ca //
analyzed: aniruddham mahātmānam nārāyaṇam atha arcayet hṛdaya ādīni ca aṅgāni śaṅkha ādīni āyudhāni ca

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 127
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / māghamāse śuklapakṣe sūryarkṣeṇa yutā purā / ekādaśī tathā caikā bhīmena samupoṣitā //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca māgha māse śukla pakṣe sūrya ṛkṣeṇa yutā purā ekādaśī tathā ca ekā bhīmena samupoṣitā

original: āścarya tu vrataṃ kṛtvā pitṝṇāmanṛṇo 'bhavat / bhīmadvādaśī vikhyātā prāṇināṃ puṇyavardhinī //
analyzed: āścarya tu vratam kṛtvā pitṝṇām anṛṇaḥ bhavat bhīmadvādaśī vikhyātā prāṇinām puṇya vardhinī

original: nakṣatreṇa vināpyeṣā brahmahatyādi nāśayet / vinihanti mahāpāpaṃ kunṛpo viṣayaṃ yathā //
analyzed: nakṣatreṇa vinā api eṣā brahmahatyā ādi nāśayet vinihanti mahā pāpam ku nṛpaḥ viṣayam yathā

original: kuputtrastu kulaṃ yadvatkubhāryā ca patiṃ yathā / adharmaṃ ca yathā dharmaḥ kumantrī ca yathā nṛpam //
analyzed: ku puttraḥ tu kulam yadvat ku bhāryā ca patim yathā adharmam ca yathā dharmaḥ ku mantrī ca yathā nṛpam

original: ajñānena yathā jñānaṃ śaucamāśaucakaṃ yathā / aśraddhayā yathā śraddhā satyañcaivānṛtairyathā //
analyzed: ajñānena yathā jñānam śaucam āśaucakam yathā aśraddhayā yathā śraddhā satyam ca eva anṛtaiḥ yathā

original: himaṃ yathoṣṇamāhanyādanarthaṃ cārthasaṃcayaḥ / yathā prakartināddānaṃ tapo vai vismayādyathā //
analyzed: himam yathā uṣṇam āhanyāt anartham ca artha saṃcayaḥ yathā tapaḥ vai vismayāt yathā

original: aśikṣayā yathā putro gāvo dūragatairyathā / krodhena ca yathā śāntiryathā vittamavaddhanāt //
analyzed: aśikṣayā yathā putraḥ gāvaḥ dūra gataiḥ yathā krodhena ca yathā śāntiḥ yathā vittama vat dhanāt

original: jñānenaiyathā vidyā niṣkāmena yathā phalam / tathaiva pāpanāśāya prokteyaṃ dvādaśī śubhā //
analyzed: vidyā niṣkāmena yathā phalam  tathā eva pāpa nāśāya proktā iyam dvādaśī śubhā

original: brahmahatyā surā pāna steyaṃ gurvaṅganāgamaḥ / yugapattuprajātānihanti tripuṣkaram //
analyzed: brahma hatyā surā pāna steyam guru aṅganā āgamaḥ yugapad tu prajātān nihanti tripuṣkaram

original: na cāpi naimiṣaṃ kṣetraṃ kurukṣetraṃ prabhāsakam / kālindī yamunā gaṅgā na caiva na sarasvatī //
analyzed: na ca api naimiṣam kṣetram kurukṣetram prabhāsakam kālindī yamunā gaṅgā na ca eva na sarasvatī

original: caiva sarvatīrthāni ekādaśyāḥ samāni hi / na dānaṃ na japo homo na cānyatsukṛtaṃ kracit //
analyzed: ca eva sarva tīrthāni ekādaśyāḥ samāni hi na dānam na japaḥ homaḥ na ca anyat su kṛtam kracid

original: ekataḥ pṛthivīdānamekato harivāsaraḥ / tato 'pyekā mahāpuṇyā iyamekādaśī varā //
analyzed: ekatas pṛthivī dānam ekatas hari vāsaraḥ pi ekā mahā puṇyā iyam ekādaśī varā

original: asminvarāhapuruṣaṃ kṛtvā devaṃ tu hāṭakam / ghaṭopari nave pātre kṛtvā vai tāmrabhājane //
analyzed: asmin varāhapuruṣam kṛtvā devam tu hāṭakam ghaṭa upari nave pātre kṛtvā vai tāmra bhājane

original: sarvabījabhṛte viprāḥ sitavastrāvagaṇṭhite / sahiraṇyapradīpādyaiḥ kṛtvā pūjāṃ prayatnanaḥ //
analyzed: sarva bīja bhṛte viprāḥ sita vastra avagaṇṭhite sa hiraṇya pradīpa ādyaiḥ kṛtvā pūjām prayatnanaḥ

original: varāhāya namaḥ pādau kroḍākṛtaye namaḥ kaṭim / nābhiṃ gaṃbhīraghoṣayā uraḥ śrīvatsadhāriṇe //
analyzed: varāhāya namaḥ pādau kroḍa ākṛtaye namaḥ kaṭim nābhim gaṃbhīra ghoṣayā uraḥ śrīvatsa dhāriṇe

original: bāhuṃ sahasraśirase grīvāṃ sarveśvarāya ca / mukhaṃ sarvātmane pūjyaṃ lalāṭaṃ prabhavāya ca //
analyzed: bāhum sahasra śirase grīvām sarveśvarāya ca  mukham sarvātmane pūjyam lalāṭam prabhavāya ca

original: keśāḥ śatamayūkhāya pūjyā devasya cakriṇaḥ / vidhinā pūjayitvā tu kṛtvā jāgaraṇaṃ niśi //
analyzed: keśāḥ śatamayūkhāya pūjyāḥ devasya cakriṇaḥ vidhinā pūjayitvā tu kṛtvā jāgaraṇam niśi

original: śrutvā purāṇaṃ devasya māhātmyapratipādakam / prātarviprāya dattvā ca yācakāya śubhāya tat //
analyzed: śrutvā purāṇam devasya māhātmya pratipādakam  prātar viprāya dattvā ca yācakāya śubhāya tat

original: kanakakroḍasahitaṃ sannivedya paricchadam / paścāttu pāraṇaṃ kuryānnātitṛptaḥ sakṛdvrataḥ //
analyzed: kanaka kroḍa sahitam san nivedya paricchadam paścāt tu pāraṇam kuryāt na atitṛptaḥ sakṛt vrataḥ

original: evaṃ kṛtvā naro vidyānna bhūya stanapo bhavet / upoṣyaikādaśīṃ puṇyāṃ mucyate vai ṛṇatrayāt / mano 'bhilaṣitāvāptiḥ kṛtvā sarvavratādikam //
analyzed: evam kṛtvā naraḥ vidyāt na bhūyas stanapaḥ bhavet  upoṣya ekādaśīm puṇyām mucyate vai ṛṇa trayāt manaḥ bhilaṣita avāptiḥ kṛtvā sarva vrata ādikam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekādaśīmāhātmyaṃ nāma saptaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ekādaśīmāhātmyam nāma saptaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 128
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / vratāni vyāsa vakṣyāmi yaistuṣṭaḥ sarvado hariḥ / śāstrodito hi niyamo vrataṃ tacca tapo matam //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca vratāni vyāsa vakṣyāmi yaiḥ tuṣṭaḥ sarva daḥ hariḥ śāstra uditaḥ hi niyamaḥ vratam tat ca tapaḥ matam

original: niyamāstu viśeṣāḥ syuḥ vratasyāsya damādayaḥ / nityaṃ triṣavaṇaṃ snāyādadhaḥ śayī jitendriyaḥ //
analyzed: niyamāḥ tu viśeṣāḥ syuḥ vratasya asya dama ādayaḥ nityam triṣavaṇam snāyāt adhas śayī jita indriyaḥ

original: strīśūdrapatitānāṃ tu varjayedabhibhāṣaṇam / pavitrāṇi ca pañcaiva juhuyāccaiva śaktitaḥ //
analyzed: strī śūdra patitānām tu varjayet abhibhāṣaṇam pavitrāṇi ca pañca eva juhuyāt ca eva śaktitas

original: kṛcchrāṇyetāni sarvāṇi caretsukṛtavānnaraḥ / keśānāṃ rakṣaṇārthaṃ tu dviguṇaṃ vratamācaret //
analyzed: kṛcchrāṇi etāni sarvāṇi caret su kṛtavān naraḥ keśānām rakṣaṇa artham tu dviguṇam vratam ācaret

original: kāṃsyaṃ māṣaṃ masūraṃ cacaṇakaṃ koradūṣakam / śākaṃ madhu parānnaṃ ca varjayedupavāsavān //
analyzed: kāṃsyam māṣam masūram śākam madhu para annam ca varjayet upavāsavān

original: puṣpālaṅkāravastrāṇi dhūpagandhānulepanam / upavāsena duṣyettu dantadhāvanamañjanam //
analyzed: puṣpa alaṅkāra vastrāṇi dhūpa gandha anulepanam upavāsena duṣyet tu dantadhāvanam añjanam

original: dantakāṣṭhaṃ pañcagavyaṃ kṛtvā prātarvrataṃ caret / asakṛjjalapānācca tāmbūlasya ca bhakṣaṇāt //
analyzed: dantakāṣṭham pañcagavyam kṛtvā prātar vratam caret asakṛt jala pānāt ca tāmbūlasya ca bhakṣaṇāt

original: upavāsaḥ praduṣyeta divāsvapnā kṣamaithunāt / kṣamā satyaṃ dayā dānaṃ śaucamindriyanigrahaḥ //
analyzed: upavāsaḥ praduṣyeta kṣamā satyam dayā dānam śaucam indriya nigrahaḥ

original: devapūjāgnihavane santoṣosteyameva ca / sarvavrateṣvayaṃ dharmaḥ sāmānyo daśadhāsmṛtaḥ //
analyzed: deva pūjā agni havane santoṣaḥ usteyam eva ca sarva vrateṣu ayam dharmaḥ sāmānyaḥ daśadhā smṛtaḥ

original: nakṣatradarśanānnaktamanaktaṃ niśi bhojanam / gomūtraṃ ca pala dadyādardhāṅguṣṭhaṃ tu gomayam //
analyzed: nakṣatra darśanāt naktam anaktam niśi bhojanam  go mūtram ca dadyāt ardha aṅguṣṭham tu gomayam

original: kṣīraṃ saptapalaṃ dadyāddadhnaścaiva palatrayam / ghṛtamekaphalaṃ dadyātpalamekaṃ kuśodakam //
analyzed: kṣīram sapta palam dadyāt dadhnaḥ ca eva pala trayam ghṛtam eka phalam dadyāt palam ekam kuśa udakam

original: gāyattryā caiva gandheti āpyāyasva dṛ dadhigrahaḥ / tejo 'sīti ca devasya brahmakūrcavrataṃ caret //
analyzed: gāyattryā ca eva gandha iti āpyāyasva dadhi grahaḥ ca devasya brahmakūrca vratam caret

original: agnyādhānaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ tu yajñadānavratāni ca / vedavratavṛṣotsargacūḍākaraṇamekhalāḥ //
analyzed: agni ādhānam pratiṣṭhām tu yajña dāna vratāni ca veda vrata vṛṣotsarga cūḍākaraṇa mekhalāḥ

original: māṅgalyamabhiṣekaṃ ca malamāse vivarjayat / darśāddarśasya cāndraḥ syāttriṃśāhobhistu sāvanaḥ //
analyzed: māṅgalyam abhiṣekam ca malamāse vivarjayat  darśāt darśasya cāndraḥ syāt triṃśa ahobhiḥ tu sāvanaḥ

original: ravisaṃkramaṇātsauro nākṣatraḥ saptaviṃśatiḥ / sauro māso vivāhāya yajñādau sāvanasthitiḥ //
analyzed: ravi saṃkramaṇāt sauraḥ nākṣatraḥ saptaviṃśatiḥ sauraḥ māsaḥ vivāhāya yajña ādau sāvana sthitiḥ

original: yugmāgniyugabhūtāni ṣaṇmunyorvasurandhrayoḥ / rudreṇa dvādaśī yuktā caturdaśyātha pūrṇimā //
analyzed: yugma agni yuga bhūtāni ṣaṣ munyoḥ vasu randhrayoḥ  rudreṇa dvādaśī yuktā caturdaśyā atha pūrṇimā

original: pratipadyapyamāvāsyā tithyormasyaṃ mahāphalam / etadvyastaṃ mahāghoraṃ hanti puṇyaṃ purā kṛtam //
analyzed: pratipadi api amāvāsyā mahā phalam etat vyastam mahā ghoram hanti puṇyam purā kṛtam

original: prārabdhatapasā strīṇāṃ rajo hanyādvrataṃ na hi / anyairdānādikaṃ kuryātkāyikaṃ svayameva ca //
analyzed: prārabdha tapasā strīṇām rajaḥ hanyāt vratam na hi anyaiḥ dāna ādikam kuryāt kāyikam svayam eva ca

original: krodhātpramādāllobhādvā vratabhaṅgo bhavedyadi / dinatrayaṃ na bhuñjīta śiraso muṇḍanaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: krodhāt pramādāt lobhāt vā vrata bhaṅgaḥ bhavet yadi dina trayam na bhuñjīta śirasaḥ muṇḍanam bhavet

original: asāmarthye śarīrasya putrādīnkārayedvratam / vratasthaṃ mūrchitaṃ vipraṃ jalādīnyanupāyayet //
analyzed: asāmarthye śarīrasya putra ādīn kārayet vratam  vrata stham mūrchitam vipram jala ādīni anupāyayet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vrataparibhāṣā nāmāṣṭāviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vrataparibhāṣā nāma aṣṭāviṃśatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 129
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / vakṣye pratipadādīni vratāni vyāsa śṛṇvatha / vāśvānarapadaṃ yāti śikhivratamidaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca vakṣye pratipad ādīni vratāni vyāsa śṛṇu atha vāśvānara padam yāti śikhivratam idam smṛtam

original: pratipadyekabhaktāśī samāpte kapilāpradaḥ / caitrādau kārayeccaiva brahmapūjāṃ yathāvidhi / gandhapuṣpārcanairdānairmālyādyaiśca manoramaiḥ //
analyzed: pratipadi eka bhakta āśī samāpte kapilā pradaḥ caitra ādau kārayet ca eva brahma pūjām yathāvidhi gandha puṣpa arcanaiḥ dānaiḥ mālya ādyaiḥ ca manoramaiḥ

original: sahomaiḥ pūjayeddevaṃ sarvānkāmānavāpnuyāt / kārtike ta site 'ṣṭamyāṃ puṣpahārī ca vatsaram //
analyzed: saha umaiḥ pūjayet devam sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt  kārtike site ṣṭamyām puṣpa hārī ca vatsaram

original: puṣpādidātā rūpeṇa rūpabhāgī bhavennaraḥ / kṛṣṇapakṣe tṛtīyāyāṃ śrāvaṇe śrīdharaṃ śriyā //
analyzed: puṣpa ādi dātā rūpeṇa rūpa bhāgī bhavet naraḥ kṛṣṇa pakṣe tṛtīyāyām śrāvaṇe śrīdharam śriyā

original: yajedaśūnyaśayyāyāṃ phalaṃ dadyāddvijātaye / śayyāṃ dattvā prārthayecca śrīdharāya namaḥ śriyai //
analyzed: yajet a śūnya śayyāyām phalam dadyāt dvijātaye śayyām dattvā prārthayet ca śrīdharāya namaḥ śriyai

original: umāṃśivaṃ hutāśaṃ ca tṛtīyāyāṃ ca pūjayet / haviṣyamanna naivedya deya damanakaṃ tathā //
analyzed: umāṃśivam hutāśam ca tṛtīyāyām ca pūjayet haviṣyamanna naivedya deya damanakam tathā

original: caitrādau phalamāpnoti umayā me prabhāṣitam / phālgunāditṛtīyāyāṃ lavaṇaṃ yastu varjayet //
analyzed: caitra ādau phalam āpnoti umayā me prabhāṣitam phālguna ādi tṛtīyāyām lavaṇam yaḥ tu varjayet

original: samāpte śayanaṃ dadyādgṛhaṃ copaskarānvitam / saṃpūjya vipramithanaṃ bhavānī prīyatāmiti //
analyzed: samāpte śayanam dadyāt gṛham ca upaskara anvitam saṃpūjya bhavānī prīyatām iti

original: gaurīloke vasennityaṃ saubhāgyakaramuttamam / gaurī kālī umā bhadrā durgā kāntiḥ sarasvatī //
analyzed: gaurī loke vaset nityam saubhāgya karam uttamam gaurī kālī umā bhadrā durgā kāntiḥ sarasvatī

original: maṅgalā vaiṣṇavī lakṣmīḥ śivā nārāyaṇī kramāt / mārgetṛtīyāmārabhya aviyogādimāpnuyāt //
analyzed: maṅgalā vaiṣṇavī lakṣmīḥ śivā nārāyaṇī kramāt mārge tṛtīyām ārabhya aviyoga ādim āpnuyāt

original: caturthyāṃ sitamāghādau nirāhāro vratānvitaḥ / dattvā tilāṃstu viprāya svayaṃ bhuṅkte tilodakam //
analyzed: caturthyām sita māgha ādau nirāhāraḥ vrata anvitaḥ dattvā tilān tu viprāya svayam bhuṅkte tila udakam

original: varṣadvaye samāptiśca nirvighnādiṃ samāpnuyāt / gaḥ svāhā mūlamantro 'yaṃ praṇavena samanvitaḥ //
analyzed: varṣa dvaye samāptiḥ ca nirvighna ādim samāpnuyāt gaḥ svāhā mūlamantraḥ yam praṇavena samanvitaḥ

original: glaiṃ glāṃhṛdaye gāṃ gīṃ hūṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ śiraḥ śikhā / gūṃ varma goṃ ca gaiṃ netraṃ goṃ ca āvāhanādiṣu //
analyzed: glaiṃ glāṃ hṛdaye gām gīṃ hūm hrīṃ hrīṃ śiraḥ śikhā gūṃ varma goṃ ca gaiṃ netram goṃ ca āvāhana ādiṣu

original: āgaccholkāya ganandholkaḥ puṣpolko dhūpakolkakaḥ / dīpolkāya maholkāya baliścātha visa (mār) janam //
analyzed: āgaccha ulkāya puṣpa ulkaḥ dhūpaka ulkakaḥ  dīpa ulkāya mahā ulkāya baliḥ ca atha janam

original: sidedholkāya ca gāyattrī (tra)
analyzed: sidedha ulkāya ca gāyatrī tra

original: nyāsoṃguṣṭhādirīritaḥ / oṃ mahākarṇāya vidmahe--vakratuṇḍāya dhīmahi--tanno dantiḥ pracodayāt //
analyzed: nyāsa uṃguṣṭha ādiḥ īritaḥ om mahākarṇāya vidmahe vakratuṇḍāya dhīmahi tat naḥ dantiḥ pracodayāt

original: pūjayottilahomaiśca ete pūjyā gaṇāstathā / gaṇāya gaṇapataye svāhā kūṣmāṇḍakāya ca //
analyzed: pūjaya uttila homaiḥ ca ete pūjyāḥ gaṇāḥ tathā gaṇāya gaṇapataye svāhā kūṣmāṇḍakāya ca

original: amogholkāyaikadantāya tripurāntakarūpiṇe / oṃ śyāma (va) dantavikarālāsyāhavepāya vai namaḥ //
analyzed: amogha ulkāya ekadantāya tripurāntaka rūpiṇe om vai namaḥ

original: padmadaṃṣṭāya svāhānte mudrā vai nartanaṃ gaṇe / hastatālaśca hasanaṃ saubhāgyādiphalaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: padma daṃṣṭāya svāhā ante mudrā vai nartanam gaṇe hasta tālaḥ ca hasanam saubhāgya ādi phalam bhavet

original: mārgaśīrṣe tathā śuklacaturthyāṃ pūjayedgaṇa / abdaṃ prāpnoti vidyāśrīkīrtyāyuḥ putrasantatim //
analyzed: mārgaśīrṣe tathā śukla caturthyām pūjayet gaṇa abdam prāpnoti vidyā śrī kīrti āyuḥ putra santatim

original: somavāre caturthyāṃ ca samupoṣyārcayedgaṇam / japañjuhvatsmaranvidyā svargaṃ nirvāṇatāṃ vrajet //
analyzed: somavāre caturthyām ca samupoṣya arcayet gaṇam japan juhvat smaran vidyā svargam nirvāṇa tām vrajet

original: yajecchuklacaturthyāṃ yaḥ khaṇḍalaḍḍukamoda (maṇḍa) kaiḥ / vighnācanena sarvānsa kāmānsaubhāgyamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: yajet śukla caturthyām yaḥ sarvān sa kāmān saubhāgyam āpnuyāt

original: putrādikaṃ damanakairdamanākhyā caturthyapi / āṃ gaṇapataye namaḥ caturthyantaṃ yajedgaṇam //
analyzed: putra ādikam damanakaiḥ damana ākhyā caturthī api ām gaṇapataye namaḥ caturthī antam yajet gaṇam

original: māse tu yasminkasmiṃścijjuhuyādvā japetsmaret / sarvānkāmānavāpnoti sarvavighnavināśanam //
analyzed: māse tu yasmin kasmiṃścid juhuyāt vā japet smaret sarvān kāmān avāpnoti sarva vighna vināśanam

original: vināyakaṃ mūrtikādyaṃ yajedebhiśca nāmabhiḥ / so 'pi sadgatimāpnoti svargamokṣasukhāni ca //
analyzed: vināyakam mūrtika ādyam yajet ebhiḥ ca nāmabhiḥ saḥ sat gatim āpnoti svarga mokṣa sukhāni ca

original: gaṇapūjyo vakratuṇḍa ekadaṃṣṭrī triyambakaḥ / nīlagrīvo lambodaro vikaṭo vighnarājakaḥ //
dhūmravarṇo bhālacandro daśamasta vināyakaḥ / gaṇapatirhastimukho dvādaśāre yajedgaṇam //
analyzed: dhūmravarṇaḥ bhālacandraḥ vināyakaḥ gaṇapatiḥ hastimukhaḥ dvādaśāre yajet gaṇam

original: pṛthak samastaṃ madhāvī sarvānkāmāna vāpnuyāt / śrāvaṇe cāśvine bhādre pañcamyāṃ kāttika śubhe //
analyzed: pṛthak samastam sarvān kāmān vāpnuyāt  śrāvaṇe ca āśvine bhādre pañcamyām śubhe

original: vāsukistakṣakaścaiva kālīyo maṇibhadrakaḥ / airāvato dhṛtarāṣṭaḥ karkoṭakadhanañjayau //
analyzed: vāsukiḥ takṣakaḥ ca eva kālīyaḥ maṇibhadrakaḥ airāvataḥ dhṛtarāṣṭaḥ karkoṭaka dhanañjayau

original: ghṛtādyaiḥ snāpitā hyete āyurārogyasampadaḥ / anantaṃ vāsukiṃ śaṅkhaṃ padmaṃ kambalameva ca //
