analyzed: ghṛta ādyaiḥ snāpitāḥ hi ete āyuḥ ārogya sampadaḥ anantam vāsukim śaṅkham padmam kambalam eva ca

original: tathā karkāṭakaṃ nāgaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca śaṅkhakam / kālīyaṃ takṣakaṃ caiva piṅgalaṃ māsimāsi ca //
analyzed: tathā karkāṭakam nāgam dhṛtarāṣṭram ca śaṅkhakam kālīyam takṣakam ca eva piṅgalam māsi māsi ca

original: yajedbhādrasite nāgānaṣṭau muktiṃ divaṃ vrajet / dvārasyobhayato lekhyāḥ śrāvaṇe tu site yajet //
analyzed: yajet bhādra site nāgān aṣṭau muktim divam vrajet  dvārasya ubhayatas lekhyāḥ śrāvaṇe tu site yajet

original: pañcamyāṃ pūjayennāgānanantāndyānmahoragān / kṣīraṃ sarpiśca naivedyaṃ deyaṃ sarvaviṣāpaham / nāgā abhayahastāśca daṣṭoddhārātu pañcamī //
analyzed: pañcamyām pūjayet nāgān anantān dyān mahoragān  kṣīram sarpiḥ ca naivedyam deyam sarva viṣa apaham nāgāḥ abhaya hastāḥ ca daṣṭa uddhārāḥ tu pañcamī

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe daṣṭoddhārapañcamavritaṃ nāmaikonatriṃśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma ekonatriṃśottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 130
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / evaṃ bhādrapade māsi kārtikeyaṃ prapūyet / snānadānādikaṃ sarvamasyāmakṣayyamucyate //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca evam bhādrapade māsi kārtikeyam prapūyet snāna dāna ādikam sarvam asyām akṣayyam ucyate

original: saptamyāṃ prāśayeccapi bhojyaṃ viprānraviṃ yajet / oṃ khakholkāyamṛtatvaṃ (tantaṃ)
analyzed: saptamyām prāśayet ca api bhojyam viprān ravim yajet om tantam

original: priyasaṅgamo bhava sada svāhā //
analyzed: priya saṅgamaḥ bhava sada svāhā

original: aṣṭamyāṃ pāraṇaṃ kuryānmarīcaṃ prāśya svargabhāk
analyzed: aṣṭamyām pāraṇam kuryāt marīcam prāśya svarga bhāj

original: saptamyāṃ niyataḥ snātvā pūjayitvā divākaram //
analyzed: saptamyām niyataḥ snātvā pūjayitvā divākaram

original: dadyātphalāni viprebhyo mārtaṇḍaḥ prīyatāmiti / kharjūraṃ nārikelaṃ vā prāśayenmātuluṅgakam //
analyzed: dadyāt phalāni viprebhyaḥ mārtaṇḍaḥ prīyatām iti kharjūram nārikelam vā prāśayet mātuluṅgakam

original: sarve bhavantu saphalā mama kāmāḥ samantataḥ / (iti phalasaptamī)
analyzed: sarve bhavantu saphalāḥ mama kāmāḥ samantataḥ iti phala saptamī

original: saṃpūjya devaṃ saptamyāṃ pāyasenātha bhojayet //
analyzed: saṃpūjya devam saptamyām pāyasena atha bhojayet

original: viprāṃśca dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā svayaṃ cātha payaḥ pibet / bhakṣyaṃ coṣyaṃ tathā lehyaṃ odanaṃ ceti kīrtitam //
analyzed: viprān ca dakṣiṇām dattvā svayam ca atha payaḥ pibet bhakṣyam coṣyam tathā lehyam odanam ca iti kīrtitam

original: dhanaputrādikāmastu tyajedetadanodanaḥ
analyzed: dhana putra ādi kāmaḥ tu tyajet etat anodanaḥ

original: vāyvāśī vijayetkṣucca kuryādvijayasaptamīm / adyādarkaṃ ca kāmecchurupavāse tarenmadam //
analyzed: vāyu āśī vijayet kṣudh ca kuryāt vijayasaptamīm adyāt arkam ca kāma icchuḥ upavāse taret madam

original: godhūmamāṣayavaṣaṣṭikakāṃsyapātraṃ pāṣāṇapiṣṭamadhumaiṣunamadyamāṃsam / abhyañjanāñjanatilāṃśca vivarjayedyaḥ tasyeṣitaṃ bhavati saptasu saptamīṣu //
analyzed: godhūma māṣa yava ṣaṣṭika kāṃsya pātram abhyañjana añjana tilān ca vivarjayet yaḥ bhavati saptasu saptamīṣu

original: (iti vijayasaptamīvratam) / iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe saptamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma triṃśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti vijayasaptamīvratam iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe saptamīvratanirūpaṇam nāma triṃśottaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 131
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / brahman bhādrapade māsi śuklāṣṭamyāmupoṣitaḥ / dūrvāṃ saurīṃ gaṇeśaṃ ca phalapuṣpaiḥ śivaṃ yajet //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca brahman bhādrapade māsi śukla aṣṭamyām upoṣitaḥ dūrvām saurīm gaṇeśam ca phala puṣpaiḥ śivam yajet

original: phalavrīhyādibhiḥ sarvaiḥ śambhavenamaḥ śivāya ca / tvaṃ dūrve 'mṛjanmāsi hyaṣṭamī sarvakāmabhāk //
analyzed: phala vrīhi ādibhiḥ sarvaiḥ śambhave namaḥ śivāya ca tvam dūrve mṛjan māsi hi aṣṭamī sarva kāma bhāj

original: anagnipakramaśrīyānmucyate brahmahatyayā / (iti dūrvāṣṭamīvratam) / kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ ca rohiṇyāmardharātrer'canaṃ hareḥ //
analyzed: mucyate brahma hatyayā iti dūrvāṣṭamīvratam kṛṣṇa aṣṭamyām ca rohiṇyām ardharātra ircanam hareḥ

original: kāryā viddhāpi saptamyā hanti pāpaṃ trijanmanaḥ / upoṣitor'cayenmantraistithi bhānte ca pāraṇam //
analyzed: kāryā viddhā api saptamyā hanti pāpam tri janmanaḥ  upoṣitā urcayet mantraiḥ tithi bha ante ca pāraṇam

original: yogāya yogapataye yogeśvarāya yogasambhavāya govindāya namonamaḥ / (snānamantraḥ( yajñāya yajñeśvarāya yajñapataye govindāya namonamaḥ //
analyzed: yogāya yogapataye yogeśvarāya yogasambhavāya govindāya namaḥ namaḥ snāna mantraḥ yajñāya yajñeśvarāya yajñapataye govindāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: (arcanadṛ)--viśvāya viśveśvarāya viśvapataye govindāya namonamaḥ / (śayanadṛ)--sarvāya sarveśvarāya sarvetāya sarvasambhavāya govindāya namonamaḥ //
analyzed: arcana dṛ viśvāya viśveśvarāya viśvapataye govindāya namaḥ namaḥ śayana dṛ sarvāya sarveśvarāya sarvetāya sarvasambhavāya govindāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: sthaṇḍile pūjayeddevaṃ sacandrāṃ rohiṇīṃ tathā / śaṅkhe toyaṃ samādāya sapuṣpaphalacandanam //
analyzed: sthaṇḍile pūjayet devam sa candrām rohiṇīm tathā śaṅkhe toyam samādāya sa puṣpa phala candanam

original: jānubhyāmavanīṃ gatvā candrāyārghyaṃ nivedayet / kṣirodārṇavasaṃbhūta / atrinetrasamudbhava / //
analyzed: jānubhyām avanīm gatvā candrāya arghyam nivedayet kṣiroda arṇava saṃbhūta atri netra samudbhava

original: gṛhāṇārghyaṃ śaśāṅkeśa (maṃ)
analyzed: gṛhāṇa arghyam śaśāṅka īśa maṃ

original: rohiṇyā sahito mama / śriyai ca vasude vāya nandāya ca balāya ca //
analyzed: rohiṇyā sahitaḥ mama  śriyai ca vasu de vāya nandāya ca balāya ca

original: yaśodāyai tato dadyādarghyaṃ phalasamanvitam / anantaṃ (ghaṃ)
analyzed: yaśodāyai tatas dadyāt arghyam phala samanvitam anantam ghaṃ

original: vāmanaṃ śauriṃ vaikuṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam //
analyzed: vāmanam śaurim vaikuṣṭham puruṣottamam

original: vāsudevaṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ mādhavaṃ madhusūdanam / varāhaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ nṛsiṃhaṃ daityasūdanam //
analyzed: vāsudevam hṛṣīkeśam mādhavam madhusūdanam varāham puṇḍarīkākṣam nṛsiṃham daitya sūdanam

original: dāmodaraṃ padmanābhaṃ keśavaṃ gāruḍadhvajam / govindamacyutaṃ devamanantama parājitam //
analyzed: dāmodaram padmanābham keśavam gāruḍa dhvajam govindam acyutam devam anantama parājitam

original: adhokṣajaṃ jagadvījaṃ sargasthityantakāraṇam / anādinidhanaṃ viṣṇuṃ trilokeśaṃ trivikramam //
analyzed: adhokṣajam jagadvījam sarga sthiti anta kāraṇam an ādi nidhanam viṣṇum triloka īśam trivikramam

original: nārāyaṇaṃ caturbāhuṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam / pītambaradharaṃ divyaṃ vanamālāvibhūṣitam //
analyzed: nārāyaṇam catur bāhum śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam pīta ambara dharam divyam vanamālā vibhūṣitam

original: śrīvatsāṅkaṃ jagaddhāma śrīpatiṃ śrīdharaṃ harim / yaṃ devaṃ devakī devī vasudevādajījanat //
analyzed: śrīvatsa aṅkam jagat dhāma śrīpatim śrīdharam harim yam devam devakī devī vasudevāt ajījanat

original: bhaumasya brahmaṇo guptyai tasmai brahmātmane namaḥ / nāmānyetāni saṃkīrtya gatyarthaṃ prārthayetpunaḥ //
analyzed: bhaumasya brahmaṇaḥ guptyai tasmai brahma ātmane namaḥ nāmāni etāni saṃkīrtya gati artham prārthayet punar

original: trāhi māṃ devadeveśa / hare / saṃsārasāgarāt / trāhi māṃ sarvapāpaghna / duḥ khaśokārṇavātprabho / //
analyzed: trāhi mām devadeveśa hare saṃsāra sāgarāt trāhi mām sarva pāpa ghna duḥkha śoka arṇavāt prabho

original: devakīnandana / śrīśa / hare / saṃsārasāgarāt / durvṛttāṃstrāyase viṣṇo / ye smaranti sakṛtsakṛt //
analyzed: devakīnandana śrīśa hare saṃsāra sāgarāt durvṛttān trāyase viṣṇo ye smaranti sakṛt sakṛt

original: so 'haṃ devātidurvṛttastrāhi māṃ śokasāgarāt / puṣkarākṣa / nimagno 'haṃ mahtayajñānasāgare //
analyzed: saḥ ham deva ati durvṛttaḥ trāhi mām śoka sāgarāt puṣkarākṣa nimagnaḥ ham mahta yajñāna sāgare

original: trāhi māṃ devadeveśa / tvāmṛte 'nyo na rakṣitā / svajanma vāsudevāpa gobrāhmaṇahitāya ca //
analyzed: trāhi mām devadeveśa tvām ṛte nyaḥ na rakṣitā sva janma vāsudeva apa go brāhmaṇa hitāya ca

original: jagaddhitāya kṛṣṇāya govindāya namonamaḥ / śāntirastu śivaṃ cāstu dhanavikhyātirājyabhāk //
analyzed: jagat hitāya kṛṣṇāya govindāya namaḥ namaḥ śāntiḥ astu śivam ca astu dhana vikhyāti rājya bhāj

original: (iti kṛṣṇāṣṭamīvratam) / iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kṛṣṇāṣṭamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nā maikatriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti kṛṣṇāṣṭamīvratam iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe kṛṣṇāṣṭamīvratanirūpaṇam nā mā ekatriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 132
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / naktāśī tvaṣṭamīṃ yāvadvarṣānte caiva dhenudaḥ / paurandarapadaṃ yāti sadgativratamucyate / //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca nakta āśī tu aṣṭamīm yāvat varṣa ante ca eva dhenu daḥ paurandara padam yāti sat gati vratam ucyate  /

original: śuklāṣṭabhyāṃ pauṣamāse mahārudreti sādhu vai / matprītaye kṛtaṃ devi śathasāhasrikaṃ phalam //
analyzed: śukla aṣṭabhyām pauṣa māse mahārudra iti sādhu vai mad prītaye kṛtam devi śatha sāhasrikam phalam

original: aṣṭamī budhavāreṇa pakṣayorubhayoryadā / bhaviṣyati tadā tasyāṃ vratametatkathā parā //
analyzed: aṣṭamī budhavāreṇa pakṣayoḥ ubhayoḥ yadā bhaviṣyati tadā tasyām vratam etad kathā parā

original: tasyāṃ niyamakartāro na syuḥ khaṇḍitasampadaḥ / taṇḍulasyāṣṭamuṣṭīnāṃ varjayitvāṅgulidvayam //
analyzed: tasyām niyama kartāraḥ na syuḥ khaṇḍita sampadaḥ taṇḍulasya aṣṭa muṣṭīnām varjayitvā aṅguli dvayam

original: bhaktaṃ sadbhaktiśraddhābhyāṃ muktikāmī hi mānavaḥ / āmra patrapuṭe kṛtvā yo bhuḍkte kuśavoṣṭite //
analyzed: bhaktam sat bhakti śraddhābhyām mukti kāmī hi mānavaḥ

original: kalambikāmlikopetaṃ kāmyaṃ tasya phalaṃ bhave (labhe) t / budhaṃ pañcopacāreṇa pūjayitvā jalāśaye //
analyzed: kalambikā amlikā upetam kāmyam tasya phalam bhave labhe  budham pañca upacāreṇa pūjayitvā jalāśaye

original: śaktito dakṣiṇaṃ dadyātkarkarīṃ taṇḍulānvitām / buṃ budhāyeti bījaṃ syātsvāhāntaḥ kamalādikaḥ //
analyzed: śaktitas dakṣiṇam dadyāt karkarīm taṇḍula anvitām bum budhāya iti bījam syāt svāhā antaḥ kamala ādikaḥ

original: bāṇacāpadharaṃśyāmaṃ dale cāṅgani madhyataḥ / budhāṣṭamīkathā puṇyā śrotavyā kṛtibhirdhruvam //
analyzed: bāṇa cāpa dharam śyāmam dale ca aṅgani madhyatas budha aṣṭamī kathā puṇyā śrotavyā kṛtibhiḥ dhruvam

original: pure pāṭaliputrākhye vīro nāma dvijottamaḥ / rambhā bhāryā tasya cāsītkauśikaḥ putra uttamaḥ //
analyzed: pure pāṭaliputra ākhye vīraḥ nāma dvijottamaḥ rambhā bhāryā tasya ca āsīt kauśikaḥ putraḥ uttamaḥ

original: duhitā vijayānāmnī va (dha)
analyzed: duhitā vijayā nāmnī va dha

original: napālo vṛṣo 'bhavat / gṛhītvā kauśikastaṃ ca grīṣme gaṅgāṃ gato 'ramat //
analyzed: napālaḥ vṛṣaḥ bhavat gṛhītvā kauśikaḥ tam ca grīṣme gaṅgām gataḥ ramat

original: gopālakairvṛṣaścauraiḥ krīḍāsthopahṛto balāt / gaṅgātaḥ sa ca utthāya vanaṃ babhrāma duḥ khitaḥ //
analyzed: gopālakaiḥ vṛṣaḥ cauraiḥ krīḍā stha upahṛtaḥ balāt gaṅgātaḥ sa ca utthāya vanam babhrāma duḥ khitaḥ

original: jalārthaṃ vijayā cāgādbhrā(nmā)
analyzed: jala artham vijayā ca agāt bhrānmā

original: trā sārdhaṃ ca sāpyagāt / pipāsito mṛṇālārtho āgato 'tha sarovaram //
analyzed: sārdham ca sā api agāt pipāsitaḥ mṛṇāla arthaḥ āgataḥ sarovaram

original: divyastrīṇāṃ ca pūjādīndṛṣṭvā cāpyatha vismitaḥ / sa tā gatvā yayāce 'nnaṃ sānujo 'haṃ bubhukṣitaḥ //
analyzed: divya strīṇām ca pūjā ādīn dṛṣṭvā ca api atha vismitaḥ sa tāḥ gatvā yayāce nnam sa anujaḥ ham bubhukṣitaḥ

original: striyo 'bruvanvrataṃ kartuṃ dāsyāmaśca kuru vratam / patnyarthaṃ dhanapānā (lār)
analyzed: striyaḥ bruvan vratam kartum dāsyāmaḥ ca kuru vratam patnī artham

original: thaṃ pūjayāmāsaturbudham //
analyzed: tham pūjayāmāsatuḥ budham

original: puṭadvayaṃ gṛhītvānnaṃ bubhujāte pradattakam / striyo gatāstau dhanadau dhanapānamapaśyatām //
analyzed: puṭa dvayam gṛhītvā annam bubhujāte pradattakam striyaḥ gatāḥ tau dhanadau dhana pānam apaśyatām

original: caurairdattaṃ gṛhītvātha pradoṣe prāptavān gṛham / vīraṃ ca duḥ khitaṃ natvā rātrau supto yathāsukham //
analyzed: cauraiḥ dattam gṛhītvā atha pradoṣe prāptavān gṛham  vīram ca duḥ khitam natvā rātrau suptaḥ yathāsukham

original: kanyāṃ ca yuvatīṃ dṛṣṭvā kasmai deyā sutā mayā / yamāyetyabravīdduḥ khātsācārādvratasatphalāt //
analyzed: kanyām ca yuvatīm dṛṣṭvā kasmai deyā sutā mayā yamāya iti abravīt duḥ khāt sa ācārāt vrata sat phalāt

original: svargaṃ gatau ca pitarau vrataṃ rājyāya kau śikaḥ / cakre 'yodhyāmahārājyaṃ dattvā ca bhaginīṃ yame //
analyzed: svargam gatau ca pitarau vratam rājyāya kau śikaḥ cakre yodhyā mahā rājyam dattvā ca bhaginīm yame

original: yamo 'pi vijayāmāha gṛhasthā bhava me pure / noddhāṭayānyatragate yame sā na tathākarot / apaśyanmātaraṃ svāṃ sā pāśayātanayā sthitām //
analyzed: yamaḥ pi vijayām āha gṛhasthā bhava me pure  na uddhāṭaya anyatra gate yame sā na tathā akarot apaśyat mātaram svām sā pāśa yātanayā sthitām

original: athodvignā kośikoktaṃ jñātvā muktipradaṃ vratam / cakre ca sā tato muktā mātā tasmāccaredvratam //
analyzed: athā udvignā kośikā uktam jñātvā mukti pradam vratam cakre ca sā tatas muktā mātā tasmāt caret vratam

original: vtapuṇyaprabhāveṇa svargaṃ gatvāvasatsukham //
analyzed: svargam gatvā avasat sukham

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe budhāṣṭamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvātriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe budhāṣṭamīvratanirūpaṇam nāma dvātriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 133
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / aśokakalikā hyaṣṭau ye pibanti punarvasau / caitre māsi sitāṣṭamyāṃ na te śokamavāpnuyuḥ //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca aśoka kalikāḥ hi aṣṭau ye pibanti punarvasau caitre māsi sita aṣṭamyām na te śokam avāpnuyuḥ

original: tvāmaśoka / harābhīṣṭa / madhumāsasamudbhava / pibāmi śokasantapto māmaśokaṃ sadā kuru //
analyzed: tvām aśoka hara abhīṣṭa madhu māsa samudbhava pibāmi śoka santaptaḥ mām aśokam sadā kuru

original: (ityaśokāṣṭamīvratam) / brahmovāca / śuklāṣṭamyāmāśvayuje uttarāṣāḍhayā yutā / sā mahānavamītyuktā snānadānādi cākṣayam //
analyzed: iti aśokāṣṭamīvratam brahmā uvāca śukla aṣṭamyām āśvayuje uttarāṣāḍhayā yutā sā mahānavamī iti uktā snāna dāna ādi ca akṣayam

original: navamī kevalā cāpi durgāṃ caiva tu pūjayet / mahāvrataṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ śaṅkarādyairanuṣṭhitam //
analyzed: navamī kevalā ca api durgām ca eva tu pūjayet mahā vratam mahā puṇyam śaṅkara ādyaiḥ anuṣṭhitam

original: ayācitādi ṣaṣṭhyādau rājā śatrujayāyā ca / japahomasamāyuktaḥ kanyāṃ vā bhojayetsadā //
analyzed: a yācita ādi ṣaṣṭhī ādau rājā ca japa homa samāyuktaḥ kanyām vā bhojayet sadā

original: durgedurge rakṣiṇi svāhā mantro 'yaṃ pūjanādiṣu / dīrghākārādimātrābhirnava devyo namo 'ntikāḥ //
analyzed: durge durge rakṣiṇi svāhā mantraḥ yam pūjana ādiṣu dīrgha ākāra ādi mātrābhiḥ nava devyaḥ namaḥ ntikāḥ

original: ṣaḍbhiḥ padairnamaḥ svāhā vaṣaḍādihṛdādikam / aṅguṣṭhādikaniṣṭhāntaṃ nyasya vai pṛjayecchivām //
analyzed: ṣaḍbhiḥ padaiḥ namaḥ svāhā vaṣaṭ ādi hṛd ādikam aṅguṣṭha ādi kaniṣṭhā antam nyasya vai pṛjayet śivām

original: aṣṭamyāṃ nava gehāni dārujānyekameva vā / tasmindevī prakartavyā haimī vārājatāpi vā //
analyzed: aṣṭamyām nava gehāni dāru jāni ekam eva vā tasmin devī prakartavyā haimī vā arājatā api vā

original: śūle khaṅge pustake vā paṭe vā maṇḍale (pe) yajet / kapālaṃ kheṭakaṃ ghaṇṭāṃ darpaṇaṃ tarjanīṃ dhanaḥ //
analyzed: śūle khaṅge pustake vā paṭe vā maṇḍale yajet kapālam kheṭakam ghaṇṭām darpaṇam tarjanīm dhanaḥ

original: dhvajaṃ ḍamarukaṃ pāśaṃ vāmahasteṣu bibhratī / śaktiṃ ca mudgaraṃ śūlaṃ vajraṃ khaṅgaṃ tathāṅkuśam //
analyzed: dhvajam ḍamarukam pāśam vāma hasteṣu bibhratī śaktim ca mudgaram śūlam vajram khaṅgam tathā aṅkuśam

original: śaraṃ cakraṃ śalākāṃ ca durgāmāyudhasaṃyutām / śeṣāḥ ṣoḍaśahastāṃ syurañjanaṃ ḍamaruṃ vinā //
analyzed: śaram cakram śalākām ca durgām āyudha saṃyutām  śeṣāḥ ṣoḍaśa hastām syuḥ añjanam ḍamarum vinā

original: rudracaṇḍā pracaṇḍā ca caṇḍogrā caṇḍanāyikā / caṇḍā caṇḍavatī caiva caṇḍarūpāticaṇḍikā //
analyzed: rudracaṇḍā pracaṇḍā ca caṇḍogrā caṇḍanāyikā caṇḍā caṇḍavatī ca eva caṇḍarūpā aticaṇḍikā

original: navamī cogracaṇḍā ca madhyamāgniprabhākṛtiḥ / rocanā tvaruṇā kṛṣṇā nīlaṃ dhūmrā ca śukrakā //
analyzed: navamī ca ugracaṇḍā ca madhyamā agni prabhā ākṛtiḥ rocanā tu aruṇā kṛṣṇā nīlam dhūmrā ca śukrakā

original: pātā ca pāṇḍurā proktā ālīḍhaṃ haritaṃ tathā / ma (mā) hiṣo 'sya sa khaḍgāgraprakacagrahamuṣṭikaḥ //
analyzed: ca pāṇḍurā proktā ālīḍham haritam tathā sa khaḍga agra prakaca graha muṣṭikaḥ

original: japtvā daśākṣarīṃ vidyāṃ nāsau kenāpi badhyate / pañca (ñcā) daśāṅgulaṃ khaḍgaṃ triśūlaṃ ca tato yajet / liṅgasyāṃ pūjayedvāpi pāduke 'tha jale 'pi vā //
analyzed: japtvā daśākṣarīm vidyām na asau kena api badhyate  daśa aṅgulam khaḍgam triśūlam ca tatas yajet pūjayet vā api pāduke jale vā

original: vicitrāṃ rakṣayetpūjāmaṣṭamyāmupavāsayet / pañcābdaṃ mahiṣaṃ bastaṃ rātriśeṣe ca ghātayet //
analyzed: vicitrām rakṣayet pūjām aṣṭamyām upavāsayet pañca abdam mahiṣam bastam rātri śeṣe ca ghātayet

original: vidhivatkālikālīti taduttharudhirādikam / nerṛtyāṃ pūtanāṃ caiva vāyavyāṃ pāparākṣasīm //
analyzed: vidhivat kāli kāli iti tad uttha rudhira ādikam nerṛtyām pūtanām ca eva vāyavyām pāpa rākṣasīm

original: dadyāccarakyai caiśānyāmāgneyyāṃ ca vidārikām //
analyzed: dadyāt carakyai ca aiśānyām āgneyyām ca vidārikām

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe mahānavamīvrataṃ nāma trayastriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe mahānavamīvratam nāma trayastriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 134
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

analyzed: brahmā uvāca mahākauśika mantraḥ ca kathyate mahā phalaḥ

original: (mahākauśikamantraḥ)
analyzed: mahākauśika mantraḥ

original: -oṃ mahākauśikāya namaḥ / oṃ hūṃ hūṃ prasphura lala lala kulva kulva culva culva khalla khalla mulva mulva
analyzed: om mahākauśikāya namaḥ om hūm hūm prasphura lala lala kulva kulva culva culva khalla khalla mulva mulva

original: gulva gulva tulva pulla pulla dhalva dhulva dhuma dhuma dhamadhama māraya māraya
analyzed: gulva gulva tulva pulla pulla dhalva dhulva dhuma dhuma dhama dhama māraya māraya

original: dhakadhaka vajñāpayajñāpaya vidārayavidāraya kampakampa kampayakampaya pūrayapūraya
analyzed: dhaka dhaka vajñāpaya jñāpaya vidāraya vidāraya kampa kampa kampaya kampaya pūraya pūraya

original: āveśayāveśaya oṃ hrīṃ oṃ hrīṃ haṃ vaṃ vaṃ huṃ taṭataṭa madamada hrīṃ oṃ hūṃ nairṛtāyā
analyzed: āveśaya āveśaya om hrīṃ om hrīṃ haṃ vaṃ vaṃ hum taṭa taṭa mada mada hrīṃ om

original: namaḥ nirṛtaye dātavyam / mahākauśikamantreṇa mantritaṃ balimarpayet //
analyzed: namaḥ nirṛtaye dātavyam mahākauśika mantreṇa mantritam balim arpayet

original: tasyāgrato nṛpaḥ snāyācchatraṃ kṛtvā ca paiṣṭikam / khaḍgena ghātayitvā tu dadyātskandaviśākhayoḥ //
analyzed: tasya agratas nṛpaḥ snāyāt chatram kṛtvā ca paiṣṭikam khaḍgena ghātayitvā tu dadyāt skanda viśākhayoḥ

original: mātṝṇāṃ caiva devīnāṃ pūjā kāryā tathā niśi / brahmāṇī caiva māheśī kaumārī vaiṣṇavī tathā //
analyzed: mātṝṇām ca eva devīnām pūjā kāryā tathā niśi brahmāṇī ca eva māheśī kaumārī vaiṣṇavī tathā

original: vārāhī caiva māhendrī cāmuṇḍā caṇḍikā tathā / jayantī maṅgalā kālī bhadrakālī kapālinī //
analyzed: vārāhī ca eva māhendrī cāmuṇḍā caṇḍikā tathā jayantī maṅgalā kālī bhadrakālī kapālinī

original: durgā kṣamā śivā dhātrī svāhā svadhā namo 'stu te / kṣīrādyaiḥ snāpayeddevīṃ kanyakāḥ pramadāstathā //
analyzed: durgā kṣamā śivā dhātrī svāhā svadhā namaḥ stu te kṣīra ādyaiḥ snāpayet devīm kanyakāḥ pramadāḥ tathā

original: dvijātī (dī) natha pāṣaṇḍānannadānena pūjayet / dhvajapatrapatākādyai rathayātrāsu vastrakaiḥ / mahānavamyāṃ pūjeyaṃ jayarājyādidāyikā //
analyzed: pāṣaṇḍān anna dānena pūjayet  dhvaja patra patākā ādyaiḥ ratha yātrāsu vastrakaiḥ mahānavamyām pūjā iyam jaya rājya ādi dāyikā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe mahānavamyāṃ mahākauśikamantrakṛtyādivivaraṇaṃ nāma catustriṃśaduttaraśatatamo
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe mahānavamyām mahākauśikamantrakṛtyādivivaraṇam nāma catustriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 135
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / navamyāmāśvine śukle ekabhaktena pūjayet / devīṃ vipraṃllakṣamekañjapedvīraṃ vratī naraḥ //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca navamyām āśvine śukle eka bhaktena pūjayet devīm devīm vipran lakṣam ekan japet vīram vratī naraḥ

original: (ti vīranavamīvratam) / brahmovāca / caitre śuklanavamyāṃ ca devīṃ damanakairyajet / āyurārogyasaubhāgyaṃ śatrubhiścāparājitaḥ //
analyzed: vīra navamīvratam  brahmā uvāca caitre śukla navamyām ca devīm damanakaiḥ yajet āyuḥ ārogya saubhāgyam śatrubhiḥ ca aparājitaḥ

original: (iti damanakanavamīvratam) / brahmovāca / daśamyāmekabhaktāśī samānte daśadhenudaḥ / diśaśca kāñcanīrdattvā brahmāṇḍādhipatirbhavet //
analyzed: iti damanakanavamīvratam  brahmā uvāca daśamyām eka bhakta āśī samā ante daśa dhenu daḥ  diśaḥ ca kāñcanīḥ dattvā brahmāṇḍa adhipatiḥ bhavet

original: (iti digdaśamīvratam)
analyzed: iti diś daśamīvratam

original: brahmovāca / ekādaśyāmṛṣipūjā kāryā sarvopakārikā / dhanavānputravāṃścānte ṛṣiloke mahīyate //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca ekādaśyām ṛṣi pūjā kāryā sarva upakārikā  dhanavān putravān ca ante ṛṣi loke mahīyate

original: marīciratryaṃ girasau pulasatyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ / pracetāśca vasiṣṭhaśca bhṛgurnārada eva ca //
analyzed: marīciḥ atryam girasau pulasatyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ pracetāḥ ca vasiṣṭhaḥ ca bhṛguḥ nāradaḥ eva ca

original: caitrādau kārayetpūjāṃ mālyaiśca damanodbhavaiḥ / aśokākhyāṣṭamīproktā vīrākhyā navamītathā //
analyzed: caitra ādau kārayet pūjām mālyaiḥ ca damana udbhavaiḥ aśoka ākhyā aṣṭamī proktā vīra ākhyā navamī tathā

original: damanākhyā digdaśamī navamyekādaśī tathā //
analyzed: damana ākhyā diś daśamī navamī ekādaśī tathā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ṛṣyekādaśīvrataṃ nāma pañcatriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ṛṣyekādaśīvratam nāma pañcatriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 136
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / śravaṇadvādaśoṃ vakṣye bhuktimuktipradāyinīm / ekādaśī dvādaśī ca śravaṇena ca saṃyutā //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca śravaṇadvādaśīm vakṣye bhukti mukti pradāyinīm ekādaśī dvādaśī ca śravaṇena ca saṃyutā

original: vijayā sā tithiḥ proktā haripūjādi cākṣayam / eka bhaktena naktena tathaivāyācitena ca //
analyzed: vijayā sā tithiḥ proktā hari pūjā ādi ca akṣayam

original: upavāsena bhaikṣyeṇa naivādbādaśiko bhavet / kāsyaṃ māṃsaṃ tathā kṣaudraṃ lobhaṃ vitathabhāṣaṇam //
analyzed: upavāsena bhaikṣyeṇa bhavet kāsyam māṃsam tathā kṣaudram lobham vitatha bhāṣaṇam

original: vyāyāmaṃ ca vyavāyaṃ ca divāsvapnamathāñjanam / śilāṣiṣṭaṃ masūraṃ ca dvādaśyāṃ varjayennaraḥ //
analyzed: vyāyāmam ca vyavāyam ca divāsvapnam atha añjanam śilā ṣiṣṭam masūram ca dvādaśyām varjayet naraḥ

original: māsī bhādrapade śuklā dvādaśī śravaṇānvitā / mahatī dvādaśī jñeyā upavāse mahāphalā //
saṃgama saritāṃ snānaṃ budhayuktā mahāphalā / kuṃbhe saratne sajale yajetsvarṇaṃ tu vāmanam //
analyzed: saṃgama saritām snānam budha yuktā mahā phalā kuṃbhe sa ratne sa jale yajet svarṇam tu vāmanam

original: sitavastrayugacchannaṃ chatropānadyugānvitam / oṃ namo vāsudevāya śiraḥ saṃpūjayettataḥ //
analyzed: sita vastra yuga channam chatra upānah yuga anvitam om namaḥ vāsudevāya śiraḥ saṃpūjayet tatas

original: śrīdharāya mukhaṃ tadvatkaṇṭhaṃ kṛṣṇāya vai namaḥ / namaḥ śrīpataye vakṣo bhujau sarvāstradhāriṇe //
analyzed: śrīdharāya mukham tadvat kaṇṭham kṛṣṇāya vai namaḥ namaḥ śrīpataye vakṣaḥ bhujau sarva astra dhāriṇe

original: vyāpakāya namaḥ kukṣau keśavāyodaraṃ budhaḥ / trailokyapataye meḍhraṃ jaṅghe sarvabhṛte namaḥ //
analyzed: vyāpakāya namaḥ kukṣau keśavāya udaram budhaḥ trailokya pataye meḍhram jaṅghe sarva bhṛte namaḥ

original: sarvātmane namaḥ pādau naivedyaṃ ghṛtapāyasam / kumbhāṃśca modakāndadyājjāgaraṃ kārayenniśi //
analyzed: sarvātmane namaḥ pādau naivedyam ghṛta pāyasam kumbhān ca modakān dadyāt jāgaram kārayet niśi

original: snātvācāntor'cayitvā tu kṛtapuṣpāñjalirvadet / namonamaste govinda budha śravaṇasaṃjñaka / //
analyzed: snātvā ācāntā urcayitvā tu kṛta puṣpa añjaliḥ vadet namaḥ namaḥ te govinda budha śravaṇa saṃjñaka  /

original: aghaughasaṃkṣayaṃ kṛtvā sarvasaukhyaprado bhava / prīyatāṃ devadeveśo viprebhyaḥ kalaśāndadet / nadyastīre 'yaḥ vā kuryātsarvānkāmānavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: agha ogha saṃkṣayam kṛtvā sarva saukhya pradaḥ bhava prīyatām devadeveśaḥ viprebhyaḥ kalaśān dadet nadyaḥ tīre yaḥ vā kuryāt sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śravaṇadvādaśīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe śravaṇadvādaśīvratanirūpaṇam nāma ṣaṭtriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 137
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / kāmadevatrayodaśyāṃ pūjyo damanakādibhiḥ / ratiprītisamāyukto hyasoko maṇibhūṣitaḥ //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca kāmadeva trayodaśyām pūjyaḥ damanaka ādibhiḥ rati prīti samāyuktaḥ hi asokaḥ maṇi bhūṣitaḥ

original: (iti madanakatrayodaśīvratam) / caturdaśyāṃ tathāṣṭabhyāṃ pakṣyoḥ śuklakṛṣṇayoḥ / yo 'bdamekaṃ na bhuñjīta muktibhāk śivapūjanāt //
analyzed: iti madanaka trayodaśīvratam  caturdaśyām tathā aṣṭabhyām pakṣyoḥ śukla kṛṣṇayoḥ yaḥ bdam ekam na bhuñjīta mukti bhāj śiva pūjanāt

original: (iti śivacaturdaśyaṣṭamīvratam) / trirātropoṣito dadyātkārtikyāṃ bhavanaṃ śubham / sūryalokamavāpnoti dhāmavratamidaṃ śubham //
analyzed: iti śiva caturdaśī aṣṭamīvratam  tri rātra upoṣitaḥ dadyāt kārtikyām bhavanam śubham sūrya lokam avāpnoti dhāma vratam idam śubham

original: amāvasyāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca dattaṃ jalāditadakṣayam / naktābhyāśī vāranāmnā yajanvārāṇi sarvabhāk //
analyzed: amāvasyām pitṝṇām ca dattam jalāt itat akṣayam nakta abhyāśī vāranāmnā yajan vārāṇi sarva bhāj

original: (iti vāravratāni) / dvādaśarkṣāṇi viprarṣe / pratimāsaṃ tu yāni vai / tannāmnānte 'tacyutaṃ teṣu samyak saṃpūjayennaraḥ //
analyzed: iti vāravratāni dvādaśa ṛkṣāṇi viprarṣe pratimāsam tu yāni vai tad nāmnā ante tad cyutam teṣu samyak saṃpūjayet naraḥ

original: keśavaṃ mārgaśīrṣe tu ityādau kṛtikādike (kā) / ghṛtahomaścaturmāsaṃ kṛsarañca nivedayet //
analyzed: keśavam mārgaśīrṣe tu ityādau kṛtikā ādike kā ghṛta homaḥ catur māsam kṛsaram ca nivedayet

original: āṣāḍhādau pāyasaṃ tu viprāṃstenaiva bhojayet / pañcāvyajalasnānanaivedyairnaktamācaret //
analyzed: āṣāḍha ādau pāyasam tu viprān tena eva bhojayet pañcāvya jala snāna naivedyaiḥ naktam ācaret

original: arvāgvisarjanāddravyaṃ naivedyaṃ sarvamucyate / visarjite jagannāthe nirmālyaṃ bhavati kṣaṇāt //
analyzed: arvāk visarjanāt dravyam naivedyam sarvam ucyate visarjite jagannāthe nirmālyam bhavati kṣaṇāt

original: pāñcarātravido mukhyā naivedyaṃ bhuñjate svayam / evaṃ saṃvatsarasyānte viśeṣeṇa prapūjayet //
analyzed: pāñcarātra vidaḥ mukhyāḥ naivedyam bhuñjate svayam evam saṃvatsarasya ante viśeṣeṇa prapūjayet

original: namonamaste 'cyuta / saṃkṣayo 'stu pāpasya vṛddhiṃ samupaitu puṇyam / aiśvaryavittādi sadākṣayaṃ me tathāstu me santatirakṣayaiva //
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ te cyuta saṃkṣayaḥ stu pāpasya vṛddhim samupaitu puṇyam aiśvarya vitta ādi sadā akṣayam me tathā astu me santatiḥ akṣayā eva

original: yathācyuta / tvaṃ parataḥ parasmātsa brahmabhūtaḥ parataḥ parasmāt / tathācyutaṃ me kuru vāñchitaṃ sadā mayā kṛtaṃ pāpaharāprameya //
analyzed: yathā acyuta tvam paratas parasmāt sa brahma bhūtaḥ paratas parasmāt  tathā acyutam me kuru vāñchitam sadā mayā kṛtam pāpa hara aprameya

original: acyutānanta / govinda / prasīda yadabhīpsitam / tadakṣayamameyātmankuruṣva puruṣottama //
analyzed: acyuta ananta govinda prasīda yat abhīpsitam tat akṣayam ameya ātman kuruṣva puruṣottama

original: kuryādvai sapta varṣāṇi āyuḥ śrīsadgatīrnaraḥ / upoṣyaikādaśībdamaṣṭamīṃ ca caturdaśīm //
analyzed: kuryāt vai sapta varṣāṇi āyuḥ śrī sat gatīḥ naraḥ upoṣya ekādaśī ibdam aṣṭamīm ca caturdaśīm

original: saptamīṃ pūjayedviṣṇuṃ durgāṃ śambuṃ raviṃ kramāt / teṣāṃ lokaṃ samāpnoti sarvakāmāṃśca nirmalaḥ //
analyzed: saptamīm pūjayet viṣṇum durgām śambum ravim kramāt teṣām lokam samāpnoti sarva kāmān ca nirmalaḥ

original: ekabhaktena naktena tathaivāyācitena ca / upavāsena śākādyaiḥ pūjayantasarvadevatāḥ //
analyzed: eka bhaktena naktena tathā eva a yācitena ca upavāsena śāka ādyaiḥ pūjayanta sarva devatāḥ

original: sarvaḥ sarvāsu tithiṣu bhuktiṃ muktimavāpnuyāt / dhanado 'gniḥ pratipadi nāsatyo dastra arcitaḥ //
analyzed: sarvaḥ sarvāsu tithiṣu bhuktim muktim avāpnuyāt dhanadaḥ gniḥ pratipadi nāsatyaḥ dastra arcitaḥ

original: śrīryamaśca dvitīyāyāṃ pañcamyā pārvatī śriyā / nāgāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kārtikeyaḥ saptamyāṃ bhāskaror'thadaḥ //
analyzed: śrīḥ yamaḥ ca dvitīyāyām pañcamyā pārvatī śriyā nāgāḥ ṣaṣṭhyām kārtikeyaḥ saptamyām bhāskara ūrtha daḥ

original: durgāṣṭamyāṃ mātaraśca navamyāmatha takṣakaḥ / indro daśamyāṃ dhanada ekādaśyāṃ munīśvarāḥ //
analyzed: durgā aṣṭamyām mātaraḥ ca navamyām atha takṣakaḥ indraḥ daśamyām dhanadaḥ ekādaśyām muni īśvarāḥ

original: dvādaśyāṃ ca hariḥ kāmastrayodaśyāṃ maheśvaraḥ / caturdaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ brahmā ca pitaro 'pare //
analyzed: dvādaśyām ca hariḥ kāmaḥ trayodaśyām maheśvaraḥ caturdaśyām pañcadaśyām brahmā ca pitaraḥ pare

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe tithivāranakṣatrādivratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe tithivāranakṣatrādivratanirūpaṇam nāma saptatriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 138
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: (iti vratāni samāptāni) / hariruvāca / rājñāṃ vaṃśānpravakṣyāmi vaṃśānucaritāni ca / viṣṇunābhyabjato brahmā dakṣo 'ṅguṣṭhācca tasya vai //
analyzed: iti vratāni samāptāni hariḥ uvāca rājñām vaṃśān pravakṣyāmi vaṃśānucaritāni ca viṣṇu nābhi abjataḥ brahmā dakṣaḥ ṅguṣṭhāt ca tasya vai

original: tato 'pitarvivasvāṃśca tataḥ sūnurvivasvataḥ manurikṣvākuśaryātī nṛgo dhṛṣṭaḥ praṣadhrakaḥ //
analyzed: pitar vivasvān ca tatas sūnuḥ vivasvataḥ manuḥ ikṣvāku śaryātī nṛgaḥ dhṛṣṭaḥ praṣadhrakaḥ

original: nariṣyantaśca nābhāgo diṣṭaḥ śaśaka eva ca / manorāsīdilā kanyā sudyumno 'sya suto 'bhavat //
analyzed: nariṣyantaḥ ca nābhāgaḥ diṣṭaḥ śaśakaḥ eva ca  manoḥ āsīt ilā kanyā sudyumnaḥ sya sutaḥ bhavat

original: ilāyāṃ tu budhājjāto rājā rudra purūravāḥ / sutāstrayaśca sudyumnādutkalo vinato gayaḥ //
analyzed: ilāyām tu budhāt jātaḥ rājā rudra purūravāḥ sutāḥ trayaḥ ca sudyumnāt utkalaḥ vinataḥ gayaḥ

original: abhṛcchradro govadhāttu pṛṣadhrastu manoḥ sutaḥ / karūṣātkṣattriyā jātā kārūṣā iti viśrutāḥ //
analyzed: abhṛcchradraḥ go vadhāt tu pṛṣadhraḥ tu manoḥ sutaḥ karūṣāt kṣattriyā jātā kārūṣāḥ iti viśrutāḥ

original: diṣṭaputrastu nābhāgo vaiśyātāmagamatsa ca / tasmādbhalandanaḥ putro vatsaprītirbhalandanāt //
analyzed: diṣṭa putraḥ tu nābhāgaḥ vaiśyā tām agamat sa ca tasmāt bhalandanaḥ putraḥ vatsaprītiḥ bhalandanāt

original: tataḥ pāṃśuḥ khanitro 'bhūdbhūpastasmāttataḥ kṣupaḥ / kṣupādviṃśo 'bhavatputro viṃśājjāto viviṃśakaḥ //
analyzed: tatas pāṃśuḥ khanitraḥ bhūt bhūpaḥ tasmāt tatas kṣupaḥ kṣupāt viṃśaḥ bhavat putraḥ viṃśāt jātaḥ viviṃśakaḥ

original: viviṃśācca khanīnetro vibhūtistatsutaḥ smṛtaḥ / karandhamo vibhūtestu tato jāto 'pyavikṣitaḥ //
analyzed: viviṃśāt ca khanīnetraḥ vibhūtiḥ tad sutaḥ smṛtaḥ karandhamaḥ vibhūteḥ tu tatas jātaḥ pi avikṣitaḥ

original: marutto 'vikṣitasyāpi nariṣyantastataḥ smṛtaḥ / nariṣyantāttamo jātastatobhūdrājavardhanaḥ //
analyzed: maruttaḥ vikṣitasya api nariṣyantaḥ tatas smṛtaḥ nariṣyantāt tamaḥ jātaḥ tatas bhūt rājavardhanaḥ

original: rājavardhātsudhṛtiśca naro 'bhūtsudhṛteḥ sutaḥ / narācca kevalaḥ putraḥ kevalāddhundhumānapi //
analyzed: rājavardhāt sudhṛtiḥ ca naraḥ bhūt sudhṛteḥ sutaḥ narāt ca kevalaḥ putraḥ kevalāt dhundhumān api

original: dhundhumato vegavāṃśca budho vegavataḥ sutaḥ / tṛṇabindurbudhājjātaḥ kānyā cailavilā tathā //
analyzed: dhundhumataḥ vegavān ca budhaḥ vegavataḥ sutaḥ tṛṇabinduḥ budhāt jātaḥ tathā

original: viśālaṃ janayāmāsa tṛṇabindostvalambusā / viśālāddhemacandro 'bhūddhema candrācca candrakaḥ //
analyzed: viśālam janayāmāsa tṛṇabindoḥ tu alambusā viśālāt hemacandraḥ bhūt hema candrāt ca candrakaḥ

original: dhūmrāśvaścaiva candrāttu dhūmrāśvātsṛñjayastathā / sañjayātsahadevo 'bhūtkṛśāśvastatsuto 'bhavat //
analyzed: dhūmrāśvaḥ ca eva candrāt tu dhūmrāśvāt sṛñjayaḥ tathā sañjayāt sahadevaḥ bhūt kṛśāśvaḥ tad sutaḥ bhavat

original: kṛśāśvātsomadattastutato 'bhūjjanamejayaḥ / tatputraśca sumantiśca ete vaiśālakā nṛpāḥ //
analyzed: kṛśāśvāt somadattaḥ tu tatas bhūt janamejayaḥ tad putraḥ ca sumantiḥ ca ete vaiśālakāḥ nṛpāḥ

original: śaryātestu sukanyābūtsā bhāryā cyavanasya tu / ananto nāma śāryate ranantādrevato 'bhavat //
analyzed: śaryāteḥ tu bhāryā cyavanasya tu anantaḥ nāma śāryate ranantāt revataḥ bhavat

original: raivato revatasyāpi raivatādrevatī sutā / dhṛṣṭasya dhārṣṭar (ta)
analyzed: raivataḥ revatasya api raivatāt revatī sutā dhṛṣṭasya dhārṣṭar ta

original: kaṃ kṣetraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ (śyakaṃ)
analyzed: kam kṣetram vaiṣṇavam śyakam

original: tadvabhūva ha //
analyzed: tat vabhūva ha

original: nābhāgaputro neṣṭho hyambarīṣo 'pi tatsutaḥ / ambarīṣādvirūpo 'bhūtpṛṣadaśvo virūpataḥ //
analyzed: nābhāga putraḥ neṣṭhaḥ tad sutaḥ ambarīṣāt virūpaḥ bhūt pṛṣadaśvaḥ virūpataḥ

original: rathīnaraśca tatputro vāsudevaparāyaṇaḥ / ikṣvākostu trayaḥ putrāḥ vikukṣinimidaṇḍakāḥ //
analyzed: rathīnaraḥ ca tad putraḥ vāsudeva parāyaṇaḥ ikṣvākoḥ tu trayaḥ putrāḥ vikukṣi nimi daṇḍakāḥ

original: ikṣvākujo vikukṣistu śaśādaḥ śaśabhakṣaṇāt / purañjayaḥ śaśādācca kakutsthākhyo 'bhavatsutaḥ //
analyzed: ikṣvāku jaḥ vikukṣiḥ tu śaśādaḥ śaśa bhakṣaṇāt purañjayaḥ śaśādāt ca kakutstha ākhyaḥ bhavat sutaḥ

original: anenāstu kakutsathācca pṛthuḥ putrastvanenasaḥ / viśvarātaḥ pṛthoḥ putra ārdre 'bhūdviśvarātataḥ //
analyzed: anenāḥ tu kakutsathāt ca pṛthuḥ putraḥ tu anenasaḥ viśvarātaḥ pṛthoḥ putraḥ ārdre bhūt viśvarātataḥ

original: yuvanāśvo 'bhavaccārdrācchāvasto yuvanāśvataḥ / bṛhadaśvastuśāvastāttatputraḥ kuvalāśvakaḥ //
analyzed: yuvanāśvaḥ bhavat ca ārdrāt śāvastaḥ yuvanāśvataḥ bṛhadaśvaḥ tu śāvastāt tad putraḥ kuvalāśvakaḥ

original: dhundhumāro hi vikyāto dṛḍhaśvaścatato 'bhavat / candrāśvaḥ kapilāśvaśca haryaśvaśca dṛḍhaśvataḥ //
analyzed: dhundhumāraḥ hi vikyātaḥ dṛḍhaśvaḥ catataḥ bhavat candrāśvaḥ kapilāśvaḥ ca haryaśvaḥ ca dṛḍhaśvataḥ

original: haryaśvācca nikumbo 'bhūddhitāśvaśca nikumbhataḥ / pūjāśvaśca hitāśvācca tatsato yuvanāśvakaḥ //
analyzed: haryaśvāt ca nikumbaḥ bhūt hitāśvaḥ ca nikumbhataḥ pūjāśvaḥ ca hitāśvāt ca tad sataḥ yuvanāśvakaḥ

original: yuvanāśvācca māndhātā bindumatyāstato 'bhavat / mucukundo 'mbarīṣaśca purukutsastrayaḥ sutāḥ //
analyzed: yuvanāśvāt ca māndhātā bindumatyāḥ tatas bhavat mucukundaḥ mbarīṣaḥ ca purukutsaḥ trayaḥ sutāḥ

original: pañcāśatkanyakāścaiva bhāryāstāḥ saubharermuneḥ / yuvanāśvo 'mbarīṣācca harito yuvanāśvataḥ //
analyzed: pañcāśat kanyakāḥ ca eva bhāryāḥ tāḥ saubhareḥ muneḥ yuvanāśvaḥ mbarīṣāt ca haritaḥ yuvanāśvataḥ

original: purukutsānnarmadāyāṃ trasadasyurabūtsutaḥ / anaraṇyastato jāto haryaśvo 'pyanaraṇyataḥ //
analyzed: purukutsāt narmadāyām trasadasyuḥ abūt sutaḥ anaraṇyaḥ tatas jātaḥ haryaśvaḥ pi anaraṇyataḥ

original: tatputro 'bhūdvasumanāstridhanvā tasya cātmajaḥ / trayyāruṇastasya putrastasta satyarataḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: tad putraḥ bhūt vasumanāḥ tridhanvā tasya ca ātmajaḥ trayyāruṇaḥ tasya putraḥ satyarataḥ sutaḥ

original: yastriśaṅkuḥ samākhyāto hariścandro 'bhavattataḥ / hariścandrādrohitāśvo harito rohitāśvataḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ triśaṅkuḥ samākhyātaḥ hariścandraḥ bhavat tatas hariścandrāt rohitāśvaḥ haritaḥ rohitāśvataḥ

original: haritasya sutaścañcuścañcośca vijayaḥ sutaḥ / vijayādruruko jajñe rurukāttu vṛkaḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: haritasya sutaḥ cañcuḥ cañcoḥ ca vijayaḥ sutaḥ vijayāt rurukaḥ jajñe rurukāt tu vṛkaḥ sutaḥ

original: vṛkādbāhurnṛpo 'bhūcca bāhostu sagaraḥ smṛtaḥ / ṣaṣṭiḥ putra sahasrāṇi sumatyāṃ sagarāddhara //
analyzed: vṛkāt bāhuḥ nṛpaḥ bhūt ca bāhoḥ tu sagaraḥ smṛtaḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ putra sahasrāṇi sumatyām sagarāt hara

original: keśinyāmeka evāsāvasamañjasasaṃjñakaḥ //
analyzed: keśinyām ekaḥ eva asau asamañjasa saṃjñakaḥ

original: tasyāṃśumānsuto vidvāndilīpastatsuto 'bhavat / bhagīratho dilīpācca yo gaṅgāmānayadbhuvam //
analyzed: tasya aṃśumān sutaḥ vidvān dilīpaḥ tad sutaḥ bhavat  bhagīrathaḥ dilīpāt ca yaḥ gaṅgām ānayat bhuvam

original: śruto bhagīrathasuto nābhagaśca śrutātkila / nābhāgādambarīṣo 'bhūtsindudvīpo 'mbarīṣataḥ //
analyzed: śrutaḥ bhagīratha sutaḥ nābhagaḥ ca śrutāt kila nābhāgāt ambarīṣaḥ bhūt sindudvīpaḥ mbarīṣataḥ

original: sindudvīpasyāyutāyurṛtuparṇastadātmajaḥ / ṛtuṣarṇātsarvakāmaḥ sudāso 'bhūttadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: sindudvīpasya ayutāyūḥ ṛtuparṇaḥ tad ātmajaḥ ṛtuṣarṇāt sarvakāmaḥ sudāsaḥ bhūt tad ātmajaḥ

original: sudāsasya ca saudāso nāmnā mitrasahaḥ smṛtaḥ / kalmāṣa pādasaṃjñaśca damayantyāṃ tadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: sudāsasya ca saudāsaḥ nāmnā mitrasahaḥ smṛtaḥ kalmāṣa pāda saṃjñaḥ ca damayantyām tad ātmajaḥ

original: aśvakākhyo 'bhavatputro hyaśvakānmūla(nmṛccha) ko 'bhavat / tato daśaratho rājā tasya cailavilaḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: aśvaka ākhyaḥ bhavat putraḥ hi aśvakāt mūlan mṛccha kaḥ bhavat tatas daśarathaḥ rājā tasya ca ailavilaḥ sutaḥ

original: tasya viśvasahaḥ putraḥ khaṭvāṅgaśca tadātmajaḥ / khaṭvāṅgaddīrghabāhuśca dīrghabāhorhyajaḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: tasya viśvasahaḥ putraḥ khaṭvāṅgaḥ ca tad ātmajaḥ khaṭvāṅgat dīrghabāhuḥ ca dīrghabāhoḥ hi ajaḥ sutaḥ

original: tasya puttro daśarathaścatvārastatsutāḥ smṛtāḥ / rāmalakṣmaṇaśatrughnabharatāśca mahābalāḥ //
analyzed: tasya puttraḥ daśarathaḥ catvāraḥ tad sutāḥ smṛtāḥ rāma lakṣmaṇa śatrughna bharatāḥ ca mahā balāḥ

original: rāmātkuśalavau jātau bharatāttārkṣapuṣkarau / citrāṅgadaścandraketurlakṣmaṇātsaṃbabhūvatuḥ //
analyzed: rāmāt kuśa lavau jātau bharatāt tārkṣa puṣkarau citrāṅgadaḥ candraketuḥ lakṣmaṇāt saṃbabhūvatuḥ

original: subāhuśūrasenau ca śatrughnātsaṃbabhūvatuḥ / kuśasya cātithiḥ putro niṣadho hyatitheḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: subāhu śūrasenau ca śatrughnāt saṃbabhūvatuḥ kuśasya ca atithiḥ putraḥ niṣadhaḥ hi atitheḥ sutaḥ

original: niṣadhasya nalaḥ putro nalasya ca nabhāḥ smṛtaḥ / nabhasaḥ puṇḍarīkastukṣemadhanvā tadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: niṣadhasya nalaḥ putraḥ nalasya ca nabhāḥ smṛtaḥ nabhasaḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ tu kṣemadhanvā tad ātmajaḥ

original: devānīkastasya putro devānīkādahīnakaḥ / ahīnakādrururyajñe pāriyātro ruroḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: devānīkaḥ tasya putraḥ devānīkāt ahīnakaḥ ahīnakāt ruruḥ yajñe pāriyātraḥ ruroḥ sutaḥ

original: pāriyātrāddalo yajñe dala putraśchalaḥ smṛtaḥ / chalādukthastato hyukthādvajranābhastato gaṇaḥ //
analyzed: pāriyātrāt dalaḥ yajñe dala putraḥ chalaḥ smṛtaḥ chalāt ukthaḥ tatas hi ukthāt vajranābhaḥ tatas gaṇaḥ

original: uṣitāśvo gaṇājjajñe tato viśvasaho 'bhavat / hiraṇyanābhastatputrastatputraḥ puṣpakaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: uṣitāśvaḥ gaṇāt jajñe tatas viśvasahaḥ bhavat  hiraṇyanābhaḥ tad putraḥ tad putraḥ puṣpakaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: dhruvasandhirabhūtpuṣpāddhruvasandheḥ sudarśanaḥ / sudarśanādagnivarṇaḥ padmavaṇo 'gnivarṇataḥ //
analyzed: dhruvasandhiḥ abhūt puṣpāt dhruvasandheḥ sudarśanaḥ sudarśanāt agnivarṇaḥ padmavaṇaḥ gnivarṇataḥ

original: śīghrastu padmavarṇāttu śīghrātputro marustvabhūt / maroḥ prasuśrutaḥ putrastasya codāvasuḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: śīghraḥ tu padmavarṇāt tu śīghrāt putraḥ maruḥ tu abhūt maroḥ prasuśrutaḥ putraḥ tasya ca udāvasuḥ sutaḥ

original: udāvasornandivardhanaḥ suketurnandivardhanāt / suketordevarāto 'bhūdvṛhadukthastataḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: udāvasoḥ nandivardhanaḥ suketuḥ nandivardhanāt  suketoḥ devarātaḥ bhūt vṛhadukthaḥ tatas sutaḥ

original: bṛhadukthānmahāvīryaḥ sudhṛtistasya cātmajaḥ / sudhṛterdhṛṣṭaketuśca haryaśvo dhṛṣṭaketutaḥ //
analyzed: bṛhadukthāt mahā vīryaḥ sudhṛtiḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ sudhṛteḥ dhṛṣṭaketuḥ ca haryaśvaḥ dhṛṣṭaketutaḥ

original: haryaśvāttu marurjāto maroḥ pratīndhako 'bhavat / pratīndhakātkṛtiratho devamīḍhastadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: haryaśvāt tu maruḥ jātaḥ maroḥ pratīndhakaḥ bhavat pratīndhakāt kṛtirathaḥ devamīḍhaḥ tad ātmajaḥ

original: vibudho devamīḍhāttu vibudhāttu mahādhṛtiḥ / mahādhṛteḥ kīrtirāto mahāromā tadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: vibudhaḥ devamīḍhāt tu vibudhāt tu mahādhṛtiḥ mahādhṛteḥ kīrtirātaḥ mahāromā tad ātmajaḥ

original: mahāromṇaḥ svarṇaromā hrasvaromā tadātmajaḥ / sīradhvajo hrasvaromṇaḥ tasya sītābhavatsutā //
analyzed: mahāromṇaḥ svarṇaromā hrasvaromā tad ātmajaḥ sīradhvajaḥ hrasvaromṇaḥ tasya sītā bhavat sutā

original: bhrātā kuśadhvajastasya sīradhvajāttu bhānumān / śatadyumno bhānumataḥ śatadyumnācchuciḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: bhrātā kuśadhvajaḥ tasya sīradhvajāt tu bhānumān śatadyumnaḥ bhānumataḥ śatadyumnāt śuciḥ smṛtaḥ

original: ūrjanāmā śuceḥ putraḥ sanadvājastadātmajaḥ / sanadvājātkulirjāto 'nañjanastu kuleḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: ūrja nāmā śuceḥ putraḥ sanadvājaḥ tad ātmajaḥ sanadvājāt kuliḥ jātaḥ nañjanaḥ tu kuleḥ sutaḥ

original: anañjanācca kulajittasyāpi cādhinemikaḥ / śrutāyustasya putro 'bhūtsupārśvaśca tadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: anañjanāt ca kulajit tasya api ca adhinemikaḥ śrutāyuḥ tasya putraḥ bhūt supārśvaḥ ca tad ātmajaḥ

original: supārśvātsṛṃjayo jātaḥ kṣemāriḥ sṛjayātsamṛtaḥ / kṣemāri tastvanenāśca tasya rāmarathaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: supārśvāt sṛṃjayaḥ jātaḥ kṣemāriḥ sṛjayāt samṛtaḥ

original: satyaratho rāmarathāttasmādupaguruḥ smṛtaḥ / upagurorupaguptaḥ svāgataścopaguptataḥ //
analyzed: satyarathaḥ rāmarathāt tasmāt upaguruḥ smṛtaḥ upaguroḥ upaguptaḥ svāgataḥ ca upaguptataḥ

original: svanaraḥ svāgatājjajñe suvarcāstasya cātmajaḥ / suvarcasaḥ supārśvastu suśrutaśca supārśvataḥ //
analyzed: svanaraḥ svāgatāt jajñe suvarcāḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ suvarcasaḥ supārśvaḥ tu suśrutaḥ ca supārśvataḥ

original: jayastu suśrutājjajñe jayāttu vijayo 'bhavat / vijayasya ṛtaḥ putraḥ ṛtasya sunayaḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: jayaḥ tu suśrutāt jajñe jayāt tu vijayaḥ bhavat vijayasya ṛtaḥ putraḥ ṛtasya sunayaḥ sutaḥ

original: sunayādvītahavyastu vītahavyāddhatiḥ smṛtaḥ / bahulāśvo dhṛteḥ putro bahulāśvātkṛtiḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: sunayāt vītahavyaḥ tu vītahavyāt hatiḥ smṛtaḥ bahulāśvaḥ dhṛteḥ putraḥ bahulāśvāt kṛtiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: janakasya dvaye vaṃśe ukto yogasamāśrayaḥ //
analyzed: janakasya dvaye vaṃśe uktaḥ yoga samāśrayaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryavaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe sūryavaṃśavarṇanam nāma aṣṭatriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 139
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / sūryasya kathito vaṃśaḥ somavaṃśaṃ śṛṇuṣva me / nārāyaṇasuto brahmā brahmaṇo 'treḥ samudbhavaḥ //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca sūryasya kathitaḥ vaṃśaḥ soma vaṃśam śṛṇuṣva me nārāyaṇa sutaḥ brahmā treḥ samudbhavaḥ

original: atreḥ somastasya bhāryā tārā suraguroḥ priyā / somāttarā budhaṃ jajñe budhaputraḥ purūravāḥ //
analyzed: atreḥ somaḥ tasya bhāryā tārā suraguroḥ priyā somāttarā budham jajñe budha putraḥ purūravāḥ

original: budhaputrādathorvaśyāṃ ṣaṭ putrāstu śrutātmakaḥ / viśvāvasuḥ śatāyuśca āyurdhomānamāvasuḥ //
analyzed: budha putrāt atha urvaśyām ṣaṭ putrāḥ tu śrutātmakaḥ viśvāvasuḥ śatāyuḥ ca āyuḥ dhāḥ māna amāvasuḥ

original: amāvasorbhomanāmā bhīmaputraśca kāñcanaḥ / kāñcanasya suhotro 'bhūjjahruścābhūtsuhotrataḥ //
analyzed: amāvasoḥ bhoma nāmā bhīma putraḥ ca kāñcanaḥ kāñcanasya suhotraḥ bhūt jahruḥ ca abhūt suhotrataḥ

original: jahnoḥ sumanturabhavatsumantorapajāpakaḥ / balākāśvastasya putro balākāśvāt kuśaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: jahnoḥ sumantuḥ abhavat sumantoḥ apajāpakaḥ balākāśvaḥ tasya putraḥ balākāśvāt kuśaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: kuśāśvaḥ kuśanābhaścāmūrtarayo vasuḥ kuśāt / gādhiḥ kuśāśvātsaṃjajñe viśvāmitrastadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: kuśāśvaḥ kuśanābhaḥ ca amūrtarayaḥ vasuḥ kuśāt gādhiḥ kuśāśvāt saṃjajñe viśvāmitraḥ tad ātmajaḥ

original: kanyā satyavatī dattā ṛcīkāya dvijāya sā / ṛcīkājjamadāgniśca rāmastasyābhavatsutaḥ //
analyzed: kanyā satyavatī dattā ṛcīkāya dvijāya sā ṛcīkāt jamadāgniḥ ca rāmaḥ tasya abhavat sutaḥ

original: viśvāmitrāddevarātamaducchandādayaḥ sutāḥ / āyuṣo nahuṣastasmādanenā rajirambhakau //
analyzed: viśvāmitrāt sutāḥ āyuṣaḥ nahuṣaḥ tasmāt anenāḥ raji rambhakau

original: kṣattravṛddhaḥ kṣattravṛddhātsuhotraścābhavannṛpaḥ / kāśyakāśaugṛtsamadaḥ suhotrādabhavaṃstrayaḥ //
analyzed: kṣattravṛddhaḥ kṣattravṛddhāt suhotraḥ ca abhavat nṛpaḥ kāśya kāśau gṛtsamadaḥ suhotrāt abhavan trayaḥ

original: gṛtsamadācchauna ko 'bhūtkāśyāddīrghatamāstathā / vaidyo dhanvantaristasmātketumāṃśca tadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: gṛtsamadāt śauna kaḥ bhūt kāśyāt dīrghatamāḥ tathā vaidyaḥ dhanvantariḥ tasmāt ketumān ca tad ātmajaḥ

original: bhīmarathaḥ ketumato divodāsastadātmajaḥ / divodāsātpratardanaḥ śatrujitso 'tra viśrutaḥ //
analyzed: bhīmarathaḥ ketumataḥ divodāsaḥ tad ātmajaḥ divodāsāt pratardanaḥ śatrujit saḥ tra viśrutaḥ

original: ṛtadhvajastasya putro hyalarkaśca ṛtadhvajāt / alarkātsannatirjajñe sunītaḥ sannateḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: ṛtadhvajaḥ tasya putraḥ hi alarkaḥ ca ṛtadhvajāt  alarkāt sannatiḥ jajñe sunītaḥ sannateḥ sutaḥ

original: satyaketuḥ sunītasya satyaketorvibhuḥ sutaḥ / vibhostu suvibhuḥ putraḥ suvibhoḥ sukumārakaḥ //
analyzed: satyaketuḥ sunītasya satyaketoḥ vibhuḥ sutaḥ vibhoḥ tu suvibhuḥ putraḥ suvibhoḥ sukumārakaḥ

original: sukumārāddhṛṣṭaketurvotihotrastadātmajaḥ / vītihotrasya bhargo 'bhūdbhargabhūmistadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: sukumārāt dhṛṣṭaketuḥ votihotraḥ tad ātmajaḥ vītihotrasya bhargaḥ bhūt bhargabhūmiḥ tad ātmajaḥ

original: vaiṣṇavāḥ syurmahātmāna ityete kāśayo nṛpāḥ / pañcaputraśatānyāsanrajeḥ śakreṇa saṃhṛtāḥ //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavāḥ syuḥ mahātmānaḥ iti ete kāśayaḥ nṛpāḥ pañca putra śatāni āsan rajeḥ śakreṇa saṃhṛtāḥ

original: pratikṣattraḥ kṣattravṛddhātsaṃjayaśca ta dātmajaḥ / vijayaḥ saṃjayasyāpi vijayasya kṛtaḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: pratikṣattraḥ kṣattravṛddhāt saṃjayaḥ ca tad ātmajaḥ vijayaḥ saṃjayasya api vijayasya kṛtaḥ sutaḥ

original: kṛtādvṛṣadhanaścābhūtsahadevastadātmajaḥ / sahadevādadīno 'bhūjjayatseno 'pyadīnataḥ //
analyzed: kṛtāt vṛṣadhanaḥ ca abhūt sahadevaḥ tad ātmajaḥ sahadevāt adīnaḥ bhūt jayatsenaḥ u pi adīnataḥ

original: jayatsenātsaṃkṛtiśca kṣattradharmā ca saṃkṛteḥ / yatiryayātiḥ saṃyātirayātirvikṛtiḥ kramāt //
analyzed: jayatsenāt saṃkṛtiḥ ca kṣattradharmā ca saṃkṛteḥ yatiḥ yayātiḥ saṃyātiḥ ayātiḥ vikṛtiḥ kramāt

original: nahuṣasya sutāḥ khyātā yayāternṛpatestathā / yaduṃ ca turvasuṃ caiva devayānī vyajāyata //
analyzed: nahuṣasya sutāḥ khyātāḥ yayāteḥ nṛpateḥ tathā yadum ca turvasum ca eva devayānī vyajāyata

original: druhyuṃ cānuṃ ca pūruñca śarmiṣṭhā vārṣapārvaṇī / sahasrajītkroṣṭumanā raghuścaiva yadoḥ sutāḥ //
analyzed: druhyum ca anum ca pūrum ca śarmiṣṭhā vārṣapārvaṇī sahasrajīt kroṣṭumanāḥ raghuḥ ca eva yadoḥ sutāḥ

original: sahasrajitaḥ śatajittasmādvai hayahaihayau / anaraṇyo hayātputro dharmo haihayato 'bhavat //
analyzed: sahasrajitaḥ śatajit tasmāt vai haya haihayau anaraṇyaḥ hayāt putraḥ dharmaḥ haihayataḥ bhavat

original: dharmasya dharmanetro 'būtkuntirvai dharmanetrataḥ / kunterbabhūta sāhañjirmahiṣmāṃśca tadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: dharmasya dharmanetraḥ būt kuntiḥ vai dharmanetrataḥ kunteḥ babhūta sāhañjiḥ mahiṣmān ca tad ātmajaḥ

original: bhadraśreṇyastasya puttro bhadraśreṇayasya durdamaḥ / dhanako durdamāccaiva kṛtavīryaśca jānakiḥ //
analyzed: bhadraśreṇyaḥ tasya puttraḥ bhadraśreṇayasya durdamaḥ dhanakaḥ durdamāt ca eva kṛtavīryaḥ ca jānakiḥ

original: kṛtāgniḥ kṛtakarmā ca kṛtaujāḥ sumahābalaḥ / kṛtavīryādarjuno 'bhūdarjunācchūrasenakaḥ //
analyzed: kṛtāgniḥ kṛtakarmā ca kṛtaujāḥ su mahā balaḥ kṛtavīryāt arjunaḥ bhūt arjunāt śūrasenakaḥ

original: jayadhvajo madhuḥ śūro vṛṣaṇaḥ pañca savratāḥ / jayadhvajāttālajaṅgho bharatastālajaṅgataḥ //
analyzed: jayadhvajaḥ madhuḥ śūraḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ pañca savratāḥ jayadhvajāt tālajaṅghaḥ bharataḥ tālajaṅgataḥ

original: vṛṣaṇasya madhuḥ puttro madhorvṛṣṇyādivaṃśakaḥ / kroṣṭorvijajñivānputtra āhistasya mahātmanaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣaṇasya madhuḥ puttraḥ madhoḥ vṛṣṇi ādi vaṃśakaḥ  kroṣṭoḥ vijajñivān puttraḥ āhiḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ

original: āheruśaṅkuḥ saṃjajñetasya citrarathaḥ sataḥ / śaśabinduścitrarathātpatnyo lakṣañca tasya ha //
analyzed: saṃjajñe tasya citrarathaḥ sataḥ śaśabinduḥ citrarathāt patnyaḥ lakṣaḥ ca tasya ha

original: daśalakṣañca putrāṇāṃ pṛthukīrtyādayo varāḥ / pṛthukīrtiḥ pṛthujayaḥ pṛthudānaḥ pṛthuśravāḥ //
analyzed: daśa lakṣam ca putrāṇām pṛthukīrti ādayaḥ varāḥ pṛthukīrtiḥ pṛthujayaḥ pṛthudānaḥ pṛthuśravāḥ

original: pṛthuśravaso 'bhūttama uśanāstamaso 'bhavat / tatputraḥ śitagurnāma śrīrukmakavacastataḥ //
analyzed: pṛthuśravasaḥ bhūttamaḥ uśanāḥ tamasaḥ bhavat tad putraḥ śitaguḥ nāma śrī rukmakavacaḥ tatas

original: rukmaśca pṛthurukmaśca jyāmaghaḥ pālito hariḥ / śrīrukmakavacasyaite vidarbho jyāmaghāttathā //
analyzed: rukmaḥ ca pṛthurukmaḥ ca jyāmaghaḥ pālitaḥ hariḥ śrī rukmakavacasya ete vidarbhaḥ jyāmaghāt tathā

original: bhāryāyāñcaiva śaibyāyāṃ vidarbhātkrathakauśikau / romapādo romapādādbabhrurbabhrordhṛtistathā //
analyzed: bhāryāyām ca eva śaibyāyām vidarbhāt kratha kauśikau romapādaḥ romapādāt babhruḥ babhroḥ dhṛtiḥ tathā

original: kauśikasya ṛciḥ putraḥ tataścaidyo nṛpaḥ kila / kuntiḥ kilāsya putro 'bhūtkuntervṛṣṇiḥ sutaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: kauśikasya ṛciḥ putraḥ tatas caidyaḥ nṛpaḥ kila kuntiḥ kila asya putraḥ bhūt kunteḥ vṛṣṇiḥ sutaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: vṛṣṇeśca nivṛtiḥ putro daśārhe nivṛtestathā / daśārhasya suto vyomā jīmūtaśca tadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣṇeḥ ca nivṛtiḥ putraḥ daśārhe nivṛteḥ tathā daśārhasya sutaḥ vyomā jīmūtaḥ ca tad ātmajaḥ

original: jīmūtādvikṛtirjajñe tato bhīmaratho 'bhavat / tato madhuratho jajñe śakunistasya cātmajaḥ //
analyzed: jīmūtāt vikṛtiḥ jajñe tatas bhīmarathaḥ bhavat tatas madhurathaḥ jajñe śakuniḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ

original: karambhiḥ śakuneḥ putrastasya vai devavānsmṛtaḥ / devakṣattro devanato devakṣattrānmadhuḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: karambhiḥ śakuneḥ putraḥ tasya vai devavān smṛtaḥ devakṣattraḥ devanataḥ devakṣattrāt madhuḥ smṛtaḥ

original: kuruvaṃśo madhoḥ putro hyanuśca kuruvaṃśataḥ / puruhotro hyanoḥ putro hyaṃśuśca puruhotrataḥ //
analyzed: kuruvaṃśaḥ madhoḥ putraḥ hi anuḥ ca kuruvaṃśataḥ puruhotraḥ hi anoḥ putraḥ hi aṃśuḥ ca puruhotrataḥ

original: sattvaśrutaḥ sutaścāṃśostato vai sāttvato nṛpaḥ / bhajino bhajamānaśca sātvatādandhakaḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: sattvaśrutaḥ sutaḥ ca aṃśoḥ tatas vai sāttvataḥ nṛpaḥ bhajinaḥ bhajamānaḥ ca sātvatāt andhakaḥ sutaḥ

original: mahābhojo vṛṣṇi divyāvanyo devāvṛdho 'bhavat / nimivṛṣṇī bhajamānādayutājittathaiva ca //
analyzed: mahābhojaḥ vṛṣṇi divyau anyaḥ devāvṛdhaḥ bhavat nimi vṛṣṇī bhajamānāt ayutājit tathā eva ca

original: śatajicca sahasrājidbabhrurdevo bṛhaspatiḥ / mahābhojāttu bhojo 'bhūttadvṛṣṇeśca sumitrakaḥ //
analyzed: śatajit ca sahasrājit babhruḥ devaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ mahābhojāt tu bhojaḥ bhūt tad vṛṣṇeḥ ca sumitrakaḥ

original: svadhājitsaṃjñakastasmādanamitrāśinī tathā / anamitrasya nighno 'bhūnnighnācchatrājito 'bhavat //
analyzed: svadhājit saṃjñakaḥ tasmāt anamitra āśinī tathā anamitrasya nighnaḥ bhūt nighnāt chatrājitaḥ bhavat

original: prasenaścāparaḥ khyāto hyanamitrācchibistathā / śibestu satyakaḥ putraḥ satyakātsātyakistathā //
analyzed: prasenaḥ ca aparaḥ khyātaḥ hi anamitrāt śibiḥ tathā śibeḥ tu satyakaḥ putraḥ satyakāt sātyakiḥ tathā

original: sātyakeḥ sañjayaḥ putraḥ kuliścaiva tadātmajaḥ / kuleryugandharaḥ putraste śaibeyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: sātyakeḥ sañjayaḥ putraḥ kuliḥ ca eva tad ātmajaḥ kuleḥ yugandharaḥ putraḥ te śaibeyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: anamitrānvaye vṛṣṇiḥ śvaphalkaścitrakaḥ sutaḥ / śvaphalkāccaivagāndinyāmakrūro vaiṣṇavo 'bhavat //
analyzed: anamitra anvaye vṛṣṇiḥ śvaphalkaḥ citrakaḥ sutaḥ śvaphalkāt ca eva gāndinyām akrūraḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ bhavat

original: upamadgurathākrūrāddevadyotastataḥ sutaḥ / devavānupadevaśca hyakrūrasya sutau smṛtau //
analyzed: upamadguḥ atha akrūrāt devadyotaḥ tatas sutaḥ devavān upadevaḥ ca hi akrūrasya sutau smṛtau

original: pṛthurvipṛthuścitrasya tvandhakasya śuciḥ smṛtaḥ / kukuro bhajamānasya tathā kambalabarhiṣaḥ //
analyzed: pṛthuḥ vipṛthuḥ citrasya tu andhakasya śuciḥ smṛtaḥ kukuraḥ bhajamānasya tathā kambalabarhiṣaḥ

original: dhṛṣṭastu kukurājjajñe tasmātkāpotaromakaḥ / tadātmajo vilomā ca vilomnastumburuḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: dhṛṣṭaḥ tu kukurāt jajñe tasmāt kāpotaromakaḥ tad ātmajaḥ vilomā ca vilomnaḥ tumburuḥ sutaḥ

original: tasmāccadundubhirjajñe punarvasurataḥ smṛtaḥ / tasyāhukaścāhukī ca kanyā caivāhukasya tu //
analyzed: tasmāt ca dundubhiḥ jajñe punarvasuḥ atas smṛtaḥ tasya āhukaḥ ca āhukī ca kanyā ca eva āhukasya tu

original: devakaścograsenaśca devakāddevakī tvabhūt / vṛkadevopadevāca sahadevā surakṣitā //
analyzed: devakaḥ ca ugrasenaḥ ca devakāt devakī tu abhūt vṛkadeva upadevāḥ ca sahadevā surakṣitā

original: śrīdevī śāntidevī ca vasudeva uvāha tāḥ / devavānupadevaśca sahadevāsutau smṛtau //
analyzed: śrīdevī śāntidevī ca vasudevaḥ uvāha tāḥ devavān upadevaḥ ca sahadevā sutau smṛtau

original: ugrasenasya kaṃso 'bhūtsunāmā ca vaṭādayaḥ / vidūratho bhajamānācchūraścābhūdvidūrathāt //
analyzed: ugrasenasya kaṃsaḥ bhūt sunāmā ca vaṭa ādayaḥ vidūrathaḥ bhajamānāt śūraḥ ca abhūt vidūrathāt

original: vidūrathasutasyātha sūrasyāpi śamī sutaḥ / pratikṣattraśca śaminaḥ svayambhojastadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: vidūratha sutasya atha sūrasya api śamī sutaḥ pratikṣattraḥ ca śaminaḥ svayambhojaḥ tad ātmajaḥ

original: hṛdikaśca svayambhojātkṛtavarmā tadātmajaḥ / devaḥ śatadhanuścaiva śūrādvai devamīḍhuṣaḥ //
analyzed: hṛdikaḥ ca svayambhojāt kṛtavarmā tad ātmajaḥ devaḥ śatadhanuḥ ca eva śūrāt vai devamīḍhuṣaḥ

original: daśa putrā māriṣāyāṃ vasudevādayo 'bhavan / pṛthā ca śrutadevī ca śrutakīrtiḥ śrutaśravāḥ //
analyzed: daśa putrāḥ māriṣāyām vasudeva ādayaḥ bhavan pṛthā ca śrutadevī ca śrutakīrtiḥ śrutaśravāḥ

original: rājādhidevo śūrācca pṛthāṃ kunteḥ sutāmadāt / sā dattā kuntinā pāṇḍostasyāṃ dharmānilendrakaiḥ //
analyzed: śūrāt ca pṛthām kunteḥ sutām adāt sā dattā kuntinā pāṇḍoḥ tasyām dharma anila indrakaiḥ

original: yudhiṣṭhiro bhīmapārtho nakulaḥ sahadevakaḥ / mādrayāṃ nāsatyadastrābhyāṃ kuntyāṃ karṇaḥ purābhavat //
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ bhīma pārthaḥ nakulaḥ sahadevakaḥ mādrayām kuntyām karṇaḥ purā bhavat

original: śrutadevyāṃ dantavakro jajñe vai yuddhadurmadaḥ / santardanādayaḥ pañca śrutakīrtyāñca kaikayāt //
analyzed: śrutadevyām dantavakraḥ jajñe vai yuddha durmadaḥ santardana ādayaḥ pañca śrutakīrtyām ca kaikayāt

original: rājādhidevyāṃ jajñāte vindaścaivānuvindakaḥ / śrutaśravā damaghoṣātprajajñe śiśupālakam //
analyzed: rājādhidevyām jajñāte vindaḥ ca eva anuvindakaḥ śrutaśravāḥ damaghoṣāt prajajñe śiśupālakam

original: pauravī rohīṇā bhāryā madirānakadundubheḥ / devakīpramukhā bhadrā rohiṇyāṃ balabhadrakaḥ //
analyzed: pauravī rohīṇā bhāryā madirā ānakadundubheḥ devakī pramukhā bhadrā rohiṇyām balabhadrakaḥ

original: sāraṇādyāḥ śaṭhaścaiva revatyāṃ balabhadrataḥ / niśaṭhaścolmuko jāto devakyāṃ ṣaṭ ca jajñire //
analyzed: sāraṇa ādyāḥ śaṭhaḥ ca eva revatyām balabhadrataḥ niśaṭhaḥ ca ulmukaḥ jātaḥ devakyām ṣaṭ ca jajñire

original: kīrtimāṃśca suṣeṇaśca hyudāryo bhadrasenakaḥ / ṛjudāso bhadradevaḥ kaṃsa evāvadhīcca tān //
analyzed: kīrtimān ca suṣeṇaḥ ca bhadrasenakaḥ ṛjudāsaḥ bhadradevaḥ kaṃsaḥ evā avadhīt ca tān

original: saṃkarṣaṇaḥ saptamo 'bhūdaṣṭamaḥ kṛṣṇa eva ca / ṣoḍaśastrīsahasrāṇi bhāryāṇāñcābhavanhareḥ //
analyzed: saṃkarṣaṇaḥ saptamaḥ bhūt aṣṭamaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ eva ca ṣoḍaśa strī sahasrāṇi bhāryāṇām ca abhavan hareḥ

original: rukmiṇī satyabhāmā ca lakṣmaṇā cāruhāsinī / śreṣṭhā jāmbavatī cāṣṭau jajñire tāḥ sutānbahūn //
analyzed: rukmiṇī satyabhāmā ca lakṣmaṇā cāruhāsinī śreṣṭhā jāmbavatī ca aṣṭau jajñire tāḥ sutān bahūn

original: pradyumnaścārudeṣṇaśca pradhānāḥ sāmba eva ca / pradyumnādaniruddho 'bhūtkakudminyāṃ mahābalaḥ //
analyzed: pradyumnaḥ cārudeṣṇaḥ ca pradhānāḥ sāmbaḥ eva ca pradyumnāt aniruddhaḥ bhūt kakudminyām mahā balaḥ

original: aniruddhātsubhadrāyāṃ vajro nāma nṛpo 'bhavat / pratibāhurvajrasutaścārustasya suto 'bhavat //
analyzed: aniruddhāt subhadrāyām vajraḥ nāma nṛpaḥ bhavat pratibāhuḥ vajra sutaḥ cāruḥ tasya sutaḥ bhavat

original: vahnistu turvasorvaṃśe vahnerbhargo 'bhavatsutaḥ / bhargādbhānurabhūtputro bhānoḥ putraḥ karandhamaḥ //
analyzed: vahniḥ tu turvasoḥ vaṃśe vahneḥ bhargaḥ bhavat sutaḥ bhargāt bhānuḥ abhūt putraḥ bhānoḥ putraḥ karandhamaḥ

original: karandhamasya maruto druhyorvaṃśaṃ nibodha me / drahyostu tanayaḥ seturāraddhaśca tadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: karandhamasya marutaḥ druhyoḥ vaṃśam nibodha me  drahyoḥ tu tanayaḥ setuḥ āraddhaḥ ca tad ātmajaḥ

original: āraddhasyaiva gāndha ro gharmo gāndhārato 'bhavat / ghṛtastu gharmaputro 'bhūddurgamaśca ghṛsya tu //
analyzed: āraddhasya eva gāndha raḥ gharmaḥ gāndhārataḥ bhavat ghṛtaḥ tu gharma putraḥ bhūt durgamaḥ ca tu

original: pracetā durgamasyaiva anorvaṃśaṃ śṛṇuṣva me / anoḥ sabhānaraḥ putrastasmā kālañjayo 'bhavat //
analyzed: pracetāḥ durgamasya eva anoḥ vaṃśam śṛṇuṣva me anoḥ sabhānaraḥ putraḥ tasmā kālañjayaḥ bhavat

original: kālañjayātsṛñjayo 'bhūtsṛñjayāttu puruñjayaḥ / janamejayastu tatputro mahāśālastadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: kālañjayāt sṛñjayaḥ bhūt sṛñjayāt tu puruñjayaḥ janamejayaḥ tu tad putraḥ mahāśālaḥ tad ātmajaḥ

original: mahāmanā mahāśāladuśīnara iha smṛtaḥ / aśīnarācchibirjajñe vṛṣadarbhaḥ śiveḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: mahāmanāḥ mahāśālat uśīnaraḥ iha smṛtaḥ aśīnarāt śibiḥ jajñe vṛṣadarbhaḥ śiveḥ sutaḥ

original: mahāmanojāttitikṣoḥ putro 'bhūcca ruṣadrathaḥ / hemo ruṣadrathājjajñe sutapā hemato 'bhavat //
analyzed: mahāmanaḥ jāt titikṣoḥ putraḥ bhūt ca ruṣadrathaḥ hemaḥ ruṣadrathāt jajñe sutapāḥ hemataḥ bhavat

original: baliḥ sutapaso jajñe hyaṅgavaṅgakaliṅgakāḥ / andhaḥ paiṇḍraśca bāleyā hyanapānastathāṅgataḥ //
analyzed: baliḥ sutapasaḥ jajñe hi aṅga vaṅga kaliṅgakāḥ  andhaḥ paiṇḍraḥ ca bāleyāḥ hi anapānaḥ tathā aṅgataḥ

original: anapānāddivirathastato dharmaratho 'bhavat / romapādo dharmarathāccaturaṅgastadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: anapānāt divirathaḥ tatas dharmarathaḥ bhavat  romapādaḥ dharmarathāt caturaṅgaḥ tad ātmajaḥ

original: pṛthulākṣastasya putraścampo 'bhūtpṛthulākṣataḥ / campaputraśca haryaṅgastasya bhadrarathaḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: pṛthulākṣaḥ tasya putraḥ campaḥ bhūt pṛthulākṣataḥ  campa putraḥ ca haryaṅgaḥ tasya bhadrarathaḥ sutaḥ

original: bṛhatkarmā sutastasya bṛhadbhānustato 'bhavat / buhanmanā bṛhādbhānostasya putro jayadrathaḥ //
analyzed: bṛhatkarmā sutaḥ tasya bṛhadbhānuḥ tatas bhavat buhanmanāḥ bṛhādbhānoḥ tasya putraḥ jayadrathaḥ

original: jayajrathasya vijayo vijayasya dhṛtiḥ sutaḥ / dhṛterdhṛvrataḥ putraḥ satyadharmā dhṛtavratāt //
analyzed: jayajrathasya vijayaḥ vijayasya dhṛtiḥ sutaḥ dhṛteḥ dhṛvrataḥ putraḥ satyadharmā dhṛtavratāt

original: tasya putrastvadhirathaḥ karṇastasya suto 'bhavat //
analyzed: tasya putraḥ tu adhirathaḥ karṇaḥ tasya sutaḥ bhavat

original: vṛrṣasenastu karṇasya puruvaṃśyāñchaṇuṣva me //
analyzed: vṛrṣasenaḥ tu karṇasya puru vaṃśyān śaṇuṣva me

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahupārāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe candravaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāmaikonacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahupārāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe candravaṃśavarṇanam nāma ekonacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 140
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / janamejayaḥ puroścābhūnnamasyurjanamejayāt / tasya putraścābhayadaḥ sudyuścābhayadādabhūt //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca janamejayaḥ puroḥ ca abhūt namasyuḥ janamejayāt  tasya putraḥ ca abhayadaḥ sudyuḥ ca abhayadāt abhūt

original: sudyorbahugatiḥ putraḥ saṃjātistasya cātmajaḥ / vatsajātiśca sañjāteḥ raudrāśvaśca tadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: sudyoḥ bahugatiḥ putraḥ saṃjātiḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ vatsajātiḥ ca sañjāteḥ raudrāśvaḥ ca tad ātmajaḥ

original: ṛteyuḥ sthaṇḍileyuśca kakṣeyuśca kṛteyukaḥ / jaleyuḥ santateyuśca rodrāśvasya sutā varāḥ //
analyzed: ṛteyuḥ sthaṇḍileyuḥ ca kakṣeyuḥ ca kṛteyukaḥ  jaleyuḥ santateyuḥ ca rodrāśvasya sutāḥ varāḥ

original: ratināra ṛteyośca tasya pratirathaḥ sutaḥ / tasya medhātithiḥ putrastatputraścainilaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: ratināraḥ ṛteyoḥ ca tasya pratirathaḥ sutaḥ tasya medhātithiḥ putraḥ tad putraḥ ca ainilaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: ainilasya tu duṣyanto bharatastasya cātmajaḥ / śakuntalāyāṃ saṃjajñe vitatho bharatādabhūt //
analyzed: ainilasya tu duṣyantaḥ bharataḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ śakuntalāyām saṃjajñe vitathaḥ bharatāt abhūt

original: vitathasya suto manyurmanyoścaiva naraḥ smṛtaḥ / narasya saṃkṛtiḥ putro gargo vai saṃkṛteḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: vitathasya sutaḥ manyuḥ manyoḥ ca eva naraḥ smṛtaḥ narasya saṃkṛtiḥ putraḥ gargaḥ vai saṃkṛteḥ sutaḥ

original: gargādamanyuḥ putro vai śiniḥ putro vyajāyata / manyuputrānmahāvīryātsuto 'bhavadurukṣayaḥ //
analyzed: gargāt amanyuḥ putraḥ vai śiniḥ putraḥ vyajāyata manyu putrāt mahā vīryāt sutaḥ bhavat uru kṣayaḥ

original: urukṣayāttrayyāruṇirvyūhakṣatrācca manyujāt / suhotrastasya hastī ca ajamīḍhadvimīḍhakau //
analyzed: urukṣayāt trayyāruṇiḥ vyūhakṣatrāt ca manyujāt suhotraḥ tasya hastī ca ajamīḍha dvimīḍhakau

original: hastinaḥ purumīḍhaśca kaṇvo 'bhūdajamīḍhataḥ / kaṇvānmedhātithirjajñe yataḥ kāṇvāyanā dvijāḥ //
analyzed: hastinaḥ purumīḍhaḥ ca kaṇvaḥ bhūt ajamīḍhataḥ kaṇvāt medhātithiḥ jajñe yatas kāṇvāyanāḥ dvijāḥ

original: ajamīḍhādvṛhadiṣustatputraśca bṛhaddhanuḥ / bṛhatkarmā tasya putrastasya putro jayadrathaḥ //
analyzed: ajamīḍhāt vṛhadiṣuḥ tad putraḥ ca bṛhaddhanuḥ bṛhatkarmā tasya putraḥ tasya putraḥ jayadrathaḥ

original: jayadrathādviśvajicca senajicca tadātmajaḥ / rucirāśvaḥ senajitaḥ pṛthusenastadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: jayadrathāt viśvajit ca senajit ca tad ātmajaḥ rucirāśvaḥ senajitaḥ pṛthusenaḥ tad ātmajaḥ

original: pārastu pṛthusenasya pārāddvīpo 'bhavannṛpaḥ / nṛpasya sṛmaraḥ putraḥ sukṛtiśca pṛthoḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: pāraḥ tu pṛthusenasya pārāt dvīpaḥ bhavat nṛpaḥ nṛpasya sṛmaraḥ putraḥ sukṛtiḥ ca pṛthoḥ sutaḥ

original: vibhrājaḥ sukṛteḥ putro vibhrājādaśvaho 'bhavat / kṛtyāṃ tasmādbrahmadatto viṣvaksenastadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: vibhrājaḥ sukṛteḥ putraḥ vibhrājāt aśvahaḥ bhavat kṛtyām tasmāt brahmadattaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ tad ātmajaḥ

original: yavīnaro dvimīḍhasya dhṛtimāṃśca yavīnarāt / dhatimataḥ satyadhṛtirdṛḍhanemistadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: yavīnaraḥ dvimīḍhasya dhṛtimān ca yavīnarāt dhatimataḥ satyadhṛtiḥ dṛḍhanemiḥ tad ātmajaḥ

original: dṛḍhanemeḥ supārśvo 'bhūt supārśvātsannatistathā / kṛstu sannateḥ putraḥ kṛtādugrāyudho 'bhavat //
analyzed: dṛḍhanemeḥ supārśvaḥ bhūt supārśvāt sannatiḥ tathā kṛḥ tu sannateḥ putraḥ kṛtāt ugrāyudhaḥ bhavat

original: ugrāyudhācca kṣemyau'bhūtsudhīrastu tadātmajaḥ / purañjayaḥ sudhīrācca tasya putro vidūrathaḥ //
analyzed: ugrāyudhāt ca kṣemyaubhūt sudhīraḥ tu tad ātmajaḥ purañjayaḥ sudhīrāt ca tasya putraḥ vidūrathaḥ

original: ajamīḍhānnalinyāñca nīlo nāma nṛpo 'bhavat / nīlācchāntirabhūtputraḥ suśāntistasya cātmajaḥ //
analyzed: ajamīḍhāt nalinyām ca nīlaḥ nāma nṛpaḥ bhavat  nīlāt śāntiḥ abhūt putraḥ suśāntiḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ

original: suśānteśca pururjāto hyarkastasya suto 'bhavat / arkasya caiva haryaśvo haryaśvānmukulo 'bhavat //
analyzed: suśānteḥ ca puruḥ jātaḥ hi arkaḥ tasya sutaḥ bhavat arkasya ca eva haryaśvaḥ haryaśvāt mukulaḥ bhavat

original: yavīnaro bṛhadbhānuḥ kampillaḥ sṛñjayastathā / pāñcālānmukulājjajñe śaradvānvaiṣṇavo mahān //
analyzed: yavīnaraḥ bṛhadbhānuḥ kampillaḥ sṛñjayaḥ tathā pāñcālāt mukulāt jajñe śaradvān vaiṣṇavaḥ mahān

original: divodāso dvitīyo 'sya hyahalyāyāṃ śaradvataḥ / śatānando 'bhavatputrastasya satyadhṛtiḥ sataḥ //
analyzed: divodāsaḥ dvitīyaḥ sya hi ahalyāyām śaradvataḥ  śatānandaḥ bhavat putraḥ tasya satyadhṛtiḥ sataḥ

original: kṛpaḥ kṛpī satyadhṛterurvaśyāṃ vīryahānitaḥ / droṇapatnī kṛpī jajñe aśvatthāmānamuttamam //
analyzed: kṛpaḥ kṛpī satyadhṛteḥ urvaśyām vīrya hānitaḥ  droṇa patnī kṛpī jajñe aśvatthāmānam uttamam

original: divodāsānmitrayuśca mitrayoścyavano 'bhavat / sudāsaścyavanājjajñe saudāsastasya jātmajaḥ //
analyzed: divodāsāt mitrayuḥ ca mitrayoḥ cyavanaḥ bhavat sudāsaḥ cyavanāt jajñe saudāsaḥ tasya jātmajaḥ

original: sahadevastasya putraḥ sahadevāttu somakaḥ / jantustu somakājjajñe pṛṣataścāparo mahān //
analyzed: sahadevaḥ tasya putraḥ sahadevāt tu somakaḥ jantuḥ tu somakāt jajñe pṛṣataḥ ca aparaḥ mahān

original: pṛṣatāddrupado jajñe dhṛṣṭadyumnastato 'bhavat / dhṛṣṭadyumnāddhṛṣṭaketurṛkṣo 'bhūtajamīḍhataḥ //
analyzed: pṛṣatāt drupadaḥ jajñe dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ tatas bhavat  dhṛṣṭadyumnāt dhṛṣṭaketuḥ ṛkṣaḥ bhūtajamīḍhataḥ

original: ṛkṣātsaṃvaraṇo jajñe kuruḥ saṃvaraṇādabhūt / sudhanuśca pīkṣicca jahnuścaiva kuroḥ sutāḥ //
analyzed: ṛkṣāt saṃvaraṇaḥ jajñe kuruḥ saṃvaraṇāt abhūt sudhanuḥ ca pīkṣit ca jahnuḥ ca eva kuroḥ sutāḥ

original: sudhanuṣaḥ suhotro 'bhūccyavano 'bhūtsuhotrataḥ / cyavanātkṛtako jajñe tathoparicaro vasuḥ //
analyzed: sudhanuṣaḥ suhotraḥ bhūt cyavanaḥ bhūt suhotrataḥ  cyavanāt kṛtakaḥ jajñe tathā uparicaraḥ vasuḥ

original: bṛhadrathaśca pratyagraḥ satyādyāśca vasoḥ sutāḥ / bṛhadrathātkuśāgraśca kuśāgrādṛṣabho 'bhavat //
analyzed: bṛhadrathaḥ ca pratyagraḥ satya ādyāḥ ca vasoḥ sutāḥ bṛhadrathāt kuśāgraḥ ca kuśāgrāt ṛṣabhaḥ bhavat

original: ṛṣabhātpuṣpavāṃstasmājjajñe satyahito nṛpaḥ / satyahitātsudhanvābhūjjahruścava sudhanvanaḥ //
analyzed: ṛṣabhāt puṣpavān tasmāt jajñe satyahitaḥ nṛpaḥ satyahitāt sudhanvā abhūt jahruḥ ca vai sudhanvanaḥ

original: bṛhadrathājjarāsandhaḥ sahadevastadātmajaḥ / sahadevācca ca somāpiḥ somāpeḥ śrutavānsutaḥ //
analyzed: bṛhadrathāt jarāsandhaḥ sahadevaḥ tad ātmajaḥ sahadevāt ca ca somāpiḥ somāpeḥ śrutavān sutaḥ

original: bhīmasenograsenau ca śrutaseno 'parājitaḥ / janamejayastathānyo 'bhūjjahnostu suratho 'bhavat //
analyzed: bhīmasena ugrasenau ca parājitaḥ janamejayaḥ tathā anyaḥ bhūt jahnoḥ tu surathaḥ bhavat

original: vidūrathastu surathātsārvabhaumo vidūrathāt / jayasenaḥ sārvabhaumādāvadhītastadātmajaḥ //
analyzed: vidūrathaḥ tu surathāt sārvabhaumaḥ vidūrathāt jayasenaḥ sārvabhauma ādau adhītaḥ tad ātmajaḥ

original: ayutāyustasya putrastasya cākrodhanaḥ sutaḥ / akrodhanasyātithiśca ṛkṣo 'bhūdatitheḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: ayutāyuḥ tasya putraḥ tasya ca akrodhanaḥ sutaḥ akrodhanasya atithiḥ ca ṛkṣaḥ bhūt atitheḥ sutaḥ

original: ṛkṣācca bhīmaseno 'bhūddilīpo bhīmasenataḥ / pratīpo 'bhūddilīpācca devāpistu pratīpataḥ //
analyzed: ṛkṣāt ca bhīmasenaḥ bhūddilīpaḥ bhīmasenataḥ pratīpaḥ bhūddilīpāt ca devāpiḥ tu pratīpataḥ

original: śantanuścaiva bāhlīkastrayaste bhrātaro nṛpāḥ / bāhlīkātsomadatto 'bhūdbhūrirbhūriśravāstataḥ //
analyzed: śantanuḥ ca eva bāhlīkaḥ trayaḥ te bhrātaraḥ nṛpāḥ bāhlīkāt somadattaḥ bhūt bhūriḥ bhūriśravāḥ tatas

original: śalaśca śantanorbhoṣmo gaṅgāyāṃ dhārmiko mahān / citrāṅgadavicitrau tu satyavatyāntu śantanoḥ //
analyzed: śalaḥ ca śantanoḥ bhoṣmaḥ gaṅgāyām dhārmikaḥ mahān citrāṅgada vicitrau tu satyavatyān tu śantanoḥ

original: bhārye vicitravīryasya tvambikāmbālike tayoḥ / dhṛrāṣṭraṃ ca pāṇḍuñca taddāsyāṃ vidurantathā //
analyzed: bhārye vicitravīryasya tu ambikā ambālike tayoḥ  dhṛrāṣṭram ca pāṇḍum ca tad dāsyām viduram tathā

original: vyāsa utpādayāmāsa gāndhāgī dhṛtarāṣṭrataḥ / śataputraṃ duryodhanādyaṃ pāṇḍoḥ pañca prajajñire //
analyzed: vyāsaḥ utpādayāmāsa gāndhāgī dhṛtarāṣṭrataḥ śata putram duryodhana ādyam pāṇḍoḥ pañca prajajñire

original: pratibindhyaḥ śrutasomaḥ śrutakīrtistathārjunāt / śatānīkaḥ śrutakarmā draupadyāṃ pañca vai kramāt //
analyzed: pratibindhyaḥ śrutasomaḥ śrutakīrtiḥ tathā arjunāt śatānīkaḥ śrutakarmā draupadyām pañca vai kramāt

original: yaudheyī ca hiḍimbā ca kauśī caiva subhadrikā / vijayā vai reṇumatī pañcabhyastu sutāḥ kramāt //
analyzed: yaudheyī ca hiḍimbā ca kauśī ca eva subhadrikā vijayā vai reṇumatī pañcabhyaḥ tu sutāḥ kramāt

original: devako ghacotkacaśca hyabhimanyuśca sarvagaḥ / suhotro niramitraśca parīkṣidabhimanyujaḥ //
analyzed: devakaḥ ghaca utkacaḥ ca hi abhimanyuḥ ca sarvagaḥ suhotraḥ niramitraḥ ca parīkṣit abhimanyu jaḥ

original: janamejayo 'sya tato bhaviṣyāṃśca nṛpāñchṛṇu //
analyzed: janamejayaḥ sya tatas bhaviṣyān ca nṛpān śṛṇu

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe candravaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma catvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe candravaṃśavarṇanam nāma catvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 141
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / śatānīko hyaśvamedhadattaścāpyadhisomakaḥ / kṛṣṇo 'niruddhaścāpyuṣṇastataścitraratho nṛpaḥ //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca  śatānīkaḥ hi aśvamedhadattaḥ ca api adhisomakaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ niruddhaḥ ca api uṣṇaḥ tatas citrarathaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: śucidratho vṛṣṇimāṃśca supeṇaśca sunīthakaḥ / nṛcakṣuśca mukhābāṇaḥ medhāvī ca nṛpañjayaḥ //
analyzed: śucidrathaḥ vṛṣṇimān ca supeṇaḥ ca sunīthakaḥ nṛcakṣuḥ ca mukhābāṇaḥ medhāvī ca nṛpañjayaḥ

original: pāriplavaśca munayo medhāvī ca nṛpañjayaḥ / bṛhadratho haristigmo śatānīkaḥ sudānakaḥ //
analyzed: pāriplavaḥ ca munayaḥ medhāvī ca nṛpañjayaḥ bṛhadrathaḥ hariḥ tigmaḥ śatānīkaḥ sudānakaḥ

original: udāno 'hninaraścaiva daṇḍapāṇirnimittakaḥ / kṣemakaśca tataḥ śūdraḥ pitā pūrvastataḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: udānaḥ daṇḍapāṇiḥ nimittakaḥ kṣemakaḥ ca tatas śūdraḥ pitā pūrvaḥ tatas sutaḥ

original: bṛhadbalāstu kathayante nṛpoścaikṣvākuvaṃśajāḥ / bṛhadbalādurukṣayo vatsavyūhastataḥ paraḥ //
analyzed: bṛhat balāḥ tu kathayante nṛpoḥ ca aikṣvāku vaṃśa jāḥ bṛhadbalāt uru kṣayaḥ vatsavyūhaḥ tatas paraḥ

original: vatsavyūhāttataḥ sūryaḥ sahadevastadātmajaḥ / bṛhadaśvo bhānurathaḥ pratīcyaśca pratītakaḥ / manudevaḥ sunakṣatraḥ kinnaraścāntarikṣakaḥ //
analyzed: vatsavyūhāt tatas sūryaḥ sahadevaḥ tad ātmajaḥ bṛhadaśvaḥ bhānurathaḥ pratīcyaḥ ca pratītakaḥ manudevaḥ sunakṣatraḥ kinnaraḥ ca antarikṣakaḥ

original: suparṇaḥ kṛtajiccaiva bṛhadbhrājaśca dhārmikaḥ / kṛtañjayo dhanañjayaḥ saṃjayaḥ śākya eva ca //
analyzed: suparṇaḥ kṛtajit ca eva bṛhadbhrājaḥ ca dhārmikaḥ kṛtañjayaḥ dhanañjayaḥ saṃjayaḥ śākyaḥ eva ca

original: śuddhodano bāhulaśca senajitkṣudrakastathā / sumitraḥ kuḍavaścātaḥ sumitrānmāgadhāñchaṇu //
analyzed: śuddhodanaḥ bāhulaḥ ca senajit kṣudrakaḥ tathā sumitraḥ kuḍavaḥ ca atas sumitrāt māgadhān śaṇu

original: jarāsandhaḥ sahadevaḥ somāpiśca śrutaśravāḥ / ayutāyurniramitraḥ sukṣatro bahukarmakaḥ //
analyzed: jarāsandhaḥ sahadevaḥ somāpiḥ ca śrutaśravāḥ ayutāyuḥ niramitraḥ sukṣatraḥ bahukarmakaḥ

original: śrutañjayaḥ senajicca bhūriścaiva śucistathā / kṣemyaśca suvrato dharmaḥ śmaśrulo dṛḍhasenakaḥ //
analyzed: śrutañjayaḥ senajit ca bhūriḥ ca eva śuciḥ tathā kṣemyaḥ ca suvrataḥ dharmaḥ śmaśrulaḥ dṛḍhasenakaḥ

original: sumatiḥ subalo nīto satyajidviśvajittathā / iṣuñjayaśca ityete nṛpā bārhadrathāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: sumatiḥ subalaḥ satyajit viśvajit tathā  iṣuñjayaḥ ca iti ete nṛpāḥ bārhadrathāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: adharmiṣṭhāśca śūdrāśca bhaviṣyanti nṛpāstataḥ / svargādikṛddhi bhagavānsākṣānnārāyaṇo 'vyayaḥ //
analyzed: adharmiṣṭhāḥ ca śūdrāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti nṛpāḥ tatas svarga ādi kṛt hi bhagavān sākṣāt nārāyaṇaḥ vyayaḥ

original: naimittikaḥ prākṛtikastathaivātyantiko layaḥ / yāti bhūḥ pralayaṃ cāpsu hyāpastejasi pāvakaḥ //
analyzed: naimittikaḥ prākṛtikaḥ tathā eva ātyantikaḥ layaḥ yāti bhūḥ pralayam ca apsu hi āpaḥ tejasi pāvakaḥ

original: vāyau vāyuśca viyati tvākāśau yātyahaṅkṛtau / ahaṃ buddhau matirjove jīvo 'vyakte tadātmani //
analyzed: vāyau vāyuḥ ca viyati tu ākāśau yāti ahaṅkṛtau aham buddhau matiḥ jīvaḥ vyakte tad ātmani

original: ātmā pareśvaro viṣṇureko nārāyaṇo naraḥ / avināśyaparaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsvargādi nāśi hi //
analyzed: ātmā para īśvaraḥ viṣṇuḥ ekaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ naraḥ avināśya param sarvam jagat svarga ādi hi

original: nṛpādayo gatā nāśamataḥ pāpaṃ vivarjayet / dharmaṃ kuryātsthiraṃ yena pāpaṃ hitvā hariṃ vrajet //
analyzed: nṛpa ādayaḥ gatāḥ nāśam atas pāpam vivarjayet  dharmam kuryāt sthiram yena pāpam hitvā harim vrajet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhaviṣya rājavaṃśa dṛ nāmaikacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma ekacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 142
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / viṃśādīnpālayāmāsa hyavatīrṇo hariḥ prabhuḥ / daityadharmasya nāśārthaṃ vedadharmādiguptaye //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca viṃśa ādīn pālayāmāsa hi avatīrṇaḥ hariḥ prabhuḥ daitya dharmasya nāśa artham veda dharma ādi guptaye

original: matsyādikasvarūpeṇa tvavatāraṃ karotyajaḥ / matsyo bhūtvā hayagrīvaṃ daityaṃ hatvājikaṇṭakam //
analyzed: matsya ādika svarūpeṇa tu avatāram karoti ajaḥ matsyaḥ bhūtvā hayagrīvam daityam hatvā āji kaṇṭakam

original: vedānānīya manvādīnpālayāmāsa keśavaḥ / mandaraṃ dhārayāmāsa kūrmo bhūtvā hitāya ca //
analyzed: vedān ānīya manu ādīn pālayāmāsa keśavaḥ mandaram dhārayāmāsa kūrmaḥ bhūtvā hitāya ca

original: kṣīrodamathane vai dyo devo dhanvantarirhyarbhūt / bibhratkamaṇḍaluṃ pūrṇamamṛtena samutthitaḥ //
analyzed: kṣīroda mathane vai dyaḥ devaḥ dhanvantariḥ hi arbhūt  bibhrat kamaṇḍalum pūrṇam amṛtena samutthitaḥ

original: āyurvedamathāṣṭāṅgaṃ suśrutāya sa uktavān / amṛtaṃ pāyayāmāsa strīrūpī ca surānhariḥ //
analyzed: āyurvedam atha aṣṭāṅgam suśrutāya saḥ uktavān amṛtam pāyayāmāsa strī rūpī ca surān hariḥ

original: avatīrṇo varāho 'tha hiraṇyākṣaṃ jaghāna ha / pṛthivīṃ dhārayāmāsa pālayāmāsa devatāḥ //
analyzed: avatīrṇaḥ hiraṇyākṣam jaghāna ha pṛthivīm dhārayāmāsa pālayāmāsa devatāḥ

original: narasiṃho 'vartorṇo 'tha hiraṇyakaśipuṃripum / daityānnihatavānvedadharmādīnabhyapālayat //
analyzed: narasiṃhaḥ hiraṇyakaśipum ripum  daityān nihatavān veda dharma ādīn abhyapālayat

original: tataḥ paraśurāmo 'bhūjjamadagnerjagatprabhuḥ / triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivīṃ cakre niḥ kṣattriyāṃ hariḥ //
analyzed: tatas paraśurāmaḥ bhūt jamadagneḥ jagatprabhuḥ tris sapta kṛtvas pṛthivīm cakre niḥ kṣattriyām hariḥ

original: kārtavīryaṃ jaghānājau kaśyapāya mahīṃ dadau / yāgaṃ kṛtvā mahābāhurmahendre parvate sthitaḥ //
analyzed: kārtavīryam jaghāna ājau kaśyapāya mahīm dadau yāgam kṛtvā mahābāhuḥ mahendre parvate sthitaḥ

original: tato rāmo bhaviṣṇuśca caturdhā duṣṭarmadanaḥ / putro daśarathājjajñe rāmaśca bharato 'nujaḥ //
analyzed: tatas rāmaḥ bhaviṣṇuḥ ca caturdhā putraḥ daśarathāt jajñe rāmaḥ ca bharataḥ nujaḥ

original: lakṣmaṇaścātha śatrughno rāmabhāryā ca jānakī / rāmaśca pitṛsatyārthaṃ mātṛbhyo hitamācaran //
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ ca atha śatrughnaḥ rāma bhāryā ca jānakī rāmaḥ ca pitṛ satya artham mātṛbhyaḥ hitam ācaran

original: śṛṅgaveraṃ citrakūṭaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyamāgataḥ / nāsāṃ śūrpaṇakhāyāśca cchittvātha kharadūṣaṇam //
analyzed: śṛṅgaveram citrakūṭam daṇḍaka araṇyam āgataḥ nāsām śūrpaṇakhāyāḥ ca chittvā atha khara dūṣaṇam

original: hatvā sa rākṣasaṃ sītāpahārirajanīcaram / rāvaṇaṃ cānujaṃ tasya laṅkāpuryāṃ vibhīṣaṇam //
analyzed: hatvā sa rākṣasam sītā apahāri rajanīcaram rāvaṇam ca anujam tasya laṅkā puryām vibhīṣaṇam

original: rakṣorājye ca saṃsthāpya sugrīvanumanmukhaiḥ / āruhya puṣpakaṃ sārdhaṃ sītayā patibhaktayā //
analyzed: rakṣaḥ rājye ca saṃsthāpya āruhya puṣpakam sārdham sītayā pati bhaktayā

original: lakṣmaṇenānukūlena hyayodhyāṃ svapurīṃ gataḥ / rājyaṃ cakāra devādīnpālayāmāsa sa prajāḥ //
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena anukūlena hi ayodhyām sva purīm gataḥ rājyam cakāra deva ādīn pālayāmāsa sa prajāḥ

original: dharmasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ cakre hyaśvamedhādikānkratūn / sā mahīpatinā reme rāmeṇaiva yathāsukham //
analyzed: dharma saṃrakṣaṇam cakre hi aśvamedha ādikān kratūn sā mahīpatinā reme rāmeṇa eva yathāsukham

original: rāvaṇasya gṛhe sītā sthitā bheje na rāvaṇam / karmaṇā manasā vācā sā gatā rāghavaṃ sadā //
analyzed: rāvaṇasya gṛhe sītā sthitā bheje na rāvaṇam karmaṇā manasā vācā sā gatā rāghavam sadā

original: pativratā tu sā sītā hyanasūyā yathaiva tu / pativratāyā māhātmyaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ kathayāmyaham //
analyzed: pativratā tu sā sītā hi anasūyā yathā eva tu pativratāyāḥ māhātmyam śṛṇu tvam kathayāmi aham

original: kauśiko brāhmaṇaḥ kuṣṭhī pratiṣṭhāne 'bhavatpurā / taṃ tathā vyādhitaṃ bhāryā patiṃ devamivārcayat //
analyzed: kauśikaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ kuṣṭhī pratiṣṭhāne bhavat purā tam tathā vyādhitam bhāryā patim devam iva arcayat

original: nirbhartsitāpi bhartāraṃ tamamanyata daivatam / bhartroktā sānayadveśyāṃ śulkamādāya cādhikam //
analyzed: nirbhartsitā api bhartāram tam amanyata daivatam  bhartrā uktā sā anayat veśyām śulkam ādāya ca adhikam

original: pathi sūle tadā protamacauraṃ cauraśaṅkayā / māṇḍavyamatiduḥ khārtamandhakāre 'tha sa dvijaḥ //
analyzed: pathi sūle tadā protam acauram caura śaṅkayā māṇḍavyam ati dus kha ārtam andhakāre sa dvijaḥ

original: patnīskandhasamārūḍhaścālayāmāsa kauśikaḥ / pādāvamarśaṇatkruddho māṇḍavyastamuvāca ha //
analyzed: patnī skandha samārūḍhaḥ cālayāmāsa kauśikaḥ pāda avamarśaṇat kruddhaḥ māṇḍavyaḥ tam uvāca ha

original: sūryodaye mṛtistasya yenāhaṃ cālitaḥ padā / tacchrutvā prāha tadbhāryā sūryo nodayameṣyati //
analyzed: sūrya udaye mṛtiḥ tasya yena aham cālitaḥ padā  tat śrutvā prāha tad bhāryā sūryaḥ nā udayam eṣyati

original: tataḥ sūryodayābhāvāda bhavatsatataṃ niśā / bahūnyabdapramāṇāni tato devā bhayaṃ yayuḥ //
analyzed: tatas sūrya udaya abhāvāt bhavat satatam niśā bahūni abda pramāṇāni tatas devāḥ bhayam yayuḥ

original: brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ jagmustāmūce padmasambhavaḥ / praśāmyate tejasaiva tapastejastvanena vai //
analyzed: brahmāṇam śaraṇam jagmuḥ tām ūce padmasambhavaḥ praśāmyate tejasā eva tapaḥ tejaḥ tu anena vai

original: pativratāyā māhātmyānnodgacchati divākaraḥ / tasya cānudayāddhānirmartyānāṃ bhavatāṃ tathā //
analyzed: pativratāyāḥ māhātmyāt na udgacchati divākaraḥ tasya ca anudayāt hāniḥ martyānām bhavatām tathā

original: tasmātpativratāmatreranasūyāṃ tapasvinīm / prasādayata vai patnīṃ bhānorudayakāmyayā //
analyzed: tasmāt pativratām atreḥ anasūyām tapasvinīm  prasādayata vai patnīm bhānoḥ udaya kāmyayā

original: taiḥ sā prasāditā gatvā hyanasūyā pativratā / kṛtvādityodayaṃ sā ca taṃ bhartāramajīvayat / pativratānasūyāyāḥ sītābhūdadhikā kila //
analyzed: taiḥ sā prasāditā gatvā hi anasūyā pativratā  kṛtvā āditya udayam sā ca tam bhartāram ajīvayat pativratā anasūyāyāḥ sītā abhūt adhikā kila

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe daśāvatāradṛ nāma dvicatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma dvicatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 143
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / rāmāyaṇamato vakṣye śrutaṃ pāpavināśanam / viṣṇunābhyabjato brahmā marīcistatsuto 'bhavat //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca rāmāyaṇam atas vakṣye śrutam pāpa vināśanam viṣṇu nābhi abjataḥ brahmā marīciḥ tad sutaḥ bhavat

original: marīceḥ kaśyapastasmādravistasmānmanuḥ smṛtaḥ / manorikṣvākurasyābhūdvaṃśe rājā raghuḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ tasmāt raviḥ tasmāt manuḥ smṛtaḥ manoḥ ikṣvākuḥ asya abhūt vaṃśe rājā raghuḥ smṛtaḥ

original: raghorajastato jāto rājā daśaratho balī / tasya putrāstu catvāro mahābalaparākramāḥ //
analyzed: raghoḥ ajaḥ tatas jātaḥ rājā daśarathaḥ balī tasya putrāḥ tu catvāraḥ mahā bala parākramāḥ

original: kausalyāyāma bhūdrāmo bharataḥ kaikayīsutaḥ / sutau lakṣmaṇaśakṣughnau sumitrāyāṃ babhūvatuḥ //
analyzed: kausalyāyāma bhūdrāmaḥ bharataḥ kaikayī sutaḥ sutau lakṣmaṇa śakṣughnau sumitrāyām babhūvatuḥ

original: rāmo bhaktaḥ piturmāturviśvāmitrādavāptavān / astragrāmaṃ tato yakṣīṃ tāṭakāṃ prajaghāna ha //
analyzed: rāmaḥ bhaktaḥ pituḥ mātuḥ viśvāmitrāt avāptavān astra grāmam tatas yakṣīm tāṭakām prajaghāna ha

original: viśāvamitrasya yajñe vai subāhuṃ nyavadhīdbalī / janakasya kratuṃ gatvā upayeme 'tha jānakīm //
analyzed: viśau amitrasya yajñe vai subāhum nyavadhīt balī janakasya kratum gatvā upayeme tha jānakīm

original: ūrmilāṃ lakṣmaṇo vīro bharato māṇḍavīṃ sutām / śatrughno vai kīrtimatīṃ kuśadhvajasute ubhe //
