analyzed: ūrmilām lakṣmaṇaḥ vīraḥ bharataḥ māṇḍavīm sutām  śatrughnaḥ vai kīrtimatīm kuśadhvaja sute ubhe

original: pitrādibhirayodhyāyāṃ gatvā rāmādayaḥ sthitāḥ / yudhājitaṃ mātulañca śatrughnabharatau gatau //
analyzed: pitṛ ādibhiḥ ayodhyāyām gatvā rāma ādayaḥ sthitāḥ yudhājitam mātulam ca śatrughna bharatau gatau

original: gatayornṛpavaryo 'sau rājyaṃ dātuṃ samudyataḥ / sa rāmāya tatputrāya kaikeyyā prārthitastadā //
analyzed: gatayoḥ nṛpa varyo sau rājyam dātum samudyataḥ sa rāmāya tad putrāya kaikeyyā prārthitaḥ tadā

original: caturdaśasamāvāso vanerāmasya vāñchitaḥ / rāmaḥ pitṛhitārthañca lakṣmaṇena ca sītayā //
analyzed: caturdaśa samā vāsaḥ vanerāmasya vāñchitaḥ rāmaḥ pitṛ hita artham ca lakṣmaṇena ca sītayā

original: rājyañca tṛṇavattyaktvā śṛṅgaverapuraṃ gataḥ / rathaṃ tyaktvā prayāgañca citrakūṭagiriṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: rājyam ca tṛṇa vat tyaktvā śṛṅgavera puram gataḥ ratham tyaktvā prayāgam ca citrakūṭa girim gataḥ

original: rāmasya tu viyogena rājā svargaṃ samāśritaḥ / saṃskṛtya bharataścāgādrāmamāha balānvitaḥ //
analyzed: rāmasya tu viyogena rājā svargam samāśritaḥ saṃskṛtya bharataḥ ca agāt rāmam āha bala anvitaḥ

original: ayodhyāntu samāgatya rājyaṃ kuru mahāmate / sa naicchatpāduke dattvā rājyāya bharatāya tu //
analyzed: ayodhyām tu samāgatya rājyam kuru mahāmate sa na aicchat pāduke dattvā rājyāya bharatāya tu

original: visarjito 'tha bharato rāmarājyamapālayat / nandigrāme sthito bhakto hyayodhyāṃ nāviśadvratī //
analyzed: bharataḥ rāma rājyam apālayat nandigrāme sthitaḥ bhaktaḥ hi ayodhyām na aviśat vratī

original: rāmo 'pi citrakūṭācca hyatrerāśramamāyayau / natvā sutīkṣṇaṃ cāgastyaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyamāgataḥ //
analyzed: rāmaḥ pi citrakūṭāt ca hi atreḥ āśramam āyayau natvā sutīkṣṇam ca agastyam daṇḍaka araṇyam āgataḥ

original: tatra śūrpaṇakhā nāma rākṣasī cāttumāgatā / nikṛtya karṇo nāse ca rāmeṇāthāpavāritā //
analyzed: tatra śūrpaṇakhā nāma rākṣasī ca attum āgatā nikṛtya karṇaḥ nāse ca rāmeṇa atha apavāritā

original: tatpreritaḥ kharaścāgāddūṣaṇastriśirāstathā / caturdaśasahasreṇa rakṣasāntu balena ca //
analyzed: tad preritaḥ kharaḥ ca agāt dūṣaṇaḥ triśirāḥ tathā caturdaśa sahasreṇa balena ca

original: rāmo 'pi preṣayāmāsa bāṇairyamapurañca tān / rākṣasyā prerito 'bhyāgādrāvaṇo haraṇāya hi //
analyzed: rāmaḥ pi preṣayāmāsa bāṇaiḥ yama puram ca tān rākṣasyā preritaḥ bhyāgāt rāvaṇaḥ haraṇāya hi

original: mṛgarūpaṃ sa mārīcaṃ kṛtvāgre 'tha tridaṇḍadhṛk / sītayā prerito rāmo mārīcaṃ nijaghāna ha //
analyzed: mṛga rūpam sa mārīcam kṛtvā agre sītayā preritaḥ rāmaḥ mārīcam nijaghāna ha

original: mriyamāṇaḥ sa ca prāha hā sīte / lakṣmaṇoti ca / sītokto lakṣmaṇo 'thāgādrāmaścānudadarśa tam //
analyzed: mriyamāṇaḥ sa ca prāha hā sīte lakṣmaṇa iti ca sītā uktaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ thā agāt rāmaḥ ca anudadarśa tam

original: uvāca rākṣasī māyā nūnaṃ sītā hṛteti saḥ / rāvaṇo 'ntaramāsādya hyaṅkenādāya jānakīm //
analyzed: uvāca rākṣasī māyā nūnam sītā hṛtā iti saḥ rāvaṇaḥ ntaram āsādya hi aṅkena ādāya jānakīm

original: jaṭāyuṣaṃ vinirbhidya yayau laṅkāṃ tato balī / aśokavṛkṣacchāyāyāṃ rakṣitāṃ tāmadhārayat //
analyzed: jaṭāyuṣam vinirbhidya yayau laṅkām tatas balī aśoka vṛkṣa chāyāyām rakṣitām tām adhārayat

original: āgatya rāmaḥ sūnyāñca parṇaśālāṃ dadarśa ha / śokaṃ kṛtvātha jānakyā mārgaṇaṃ kṛtavānprabhuḥ //
analyzed: āgatya rāmaḥ sūnyām ca parṇa śālām dadarśa ha śokam kṛtvā atha jānakyā mārgaṇam kṛtavān prabhuḥ

original: jaṭāyuṣañca saṃskṛtya tadukto dakṣiṇāṃ diśam / gatvā sakhyaṃ tataścakre sugrīveṇa ca rāghavaḥ //
analyzed: jaṭāyuṣan ca saṃskṛtya tad uktaḥ dakṣiṇām diśam gatvā sakhyam tatas cakre sugrīveṇa ca rāghavaḥ

original: sapta tālānvinirbhidya śareṇānataparvaṇā / vālinañca vinirbhidya kiṣkindhāyāṃ harīśvaram //
analyzed: sapta tālān vinirbhidya śareṇa ānata parvaṇā vālinam ca vinirbhidya kiṣkindhāyām hari īśvaram

original: sugrīvaṃ kṛtavānrāma ṛśyamūke svayaṃ sthitaḥ / sugrīvaḥ preṣayāmāsa vānarānparvatopamān //
analyzed: sugrīvam kṛtavān rāmaḥ ṛśyamūke svayam sthitaḥ sugrīvaḥ preṣayāmāsa vānarān parvata upamān

original: sītāyā mārgaṇaṃ kartuṃ pūrvādyāśāsu sotsavān / pratīcīmuttarāṃ prācīṃ diśaṃ gatvā samāgatāḥ //
analyzed: sītāyāḥ mārgaṇam kartum pūrva ādi āśāsu sa utsavān pratīcīm uttarām prācīm diśam gatvā samāgatāḥ

original: dakṣiṇāntu diśaṃ ye ca mārgayanto 'tha jānakīm / vanāni parvatāndvīpānnadīnāṃ pulināni ca //
analyzed: dakṣiṇām tu diśam ye ca mārgayantaḥ jānakīm  vanāni parvatān dvīpān nadīnām pulināni ca

original: jānakīnte hyapaśyanto maraṇe kṛtaniścayāḥ / sampātivacanājjñātvā hanūmānkapikuñjaraḥ //
analyzed: jānakī ante hi apaśyantaḥ maraṇe kṛta niścayāḥ sampāti vacanāt jñātvā hanūmān kapi kuñjaraḥ

original: śatayojanavistīrṇaṃ pupluve makarālayam / apaśyajjānakīṃ tatra hyaśokavanikāsthitām //
analyzed: śata yojana vistīrṇam pupluve makara ālayam apaśyat jānakīm tatra hi aśoka vanikā sthitām

original: bhartsitāṃ rākṣasībhiśca rāvaṇena ca rakṣasā / bhava bhāryeti vadatā cintayantīñca rāghavam //
analyzed: bhartsitām rākṣasībhiḥ ca rāvaṇena ca rakṣasā bhava bhāryā iti vadatā cintayantīm ca rāghavam

original: aṅgulīyaṃ kapirdattvā sītāṃ kauśalyamabravīt / rāmasya tasya dūto 'haṃ śokaṃ mā kuru maithili //
analyzed: aṅgulīyam kapiḥ dattvā sītām kauśalyam abravīt rāmasya tasya dūtaḥ ham śokam mā kuru maithili

original: svābhijñānañca me dehi yena rāmaḥ smariṣyati / tacchrutvā pradadau sītā veṇīratnaṃ hanūmate //
analyzed: sva abhijñānam ca me dehi yena rāmaḥ smariṣyati tat śrutvā pradadau sītā veṇī ratnam hanūmate

original: yathā rāmo nayecchīghraṃ tathā vācyaṃ tvayā kape / tathetyuktvā tu hanumānvanaṃ divyaṃ babhañja ha //
analyzed: yathā rāmaḥ nayet śīghram tathā vācyam tvayā kape tathā iti uktvā tu hanumān vanam divyam babhañja ha

original: hatvākṣaṃ rākṣasāṃścānyānbandhanaṃ svayamāgataḥ / sarvairindrajito bāṇairdṛṣṭvā rāvaṇamabravīt //
analyzed: hatvā akṣam rākṣasān ca anyān bandhanam svayam āgataḥ sarvaiḥ indrajitaḥ bāṇaiḥ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam abravīt

original: rāmadūto 'smi hanumāndehi rāmāya maithilīm / etacchrutvā prakupito dīpayāmāsa pucchakam //
analyzed: rāma dūtaḥ smi hanumān dehi rāmāya maithilīm  etat śrutvā prakupitaḥ dīpayāmāsa pucchakam

original: kapirjvalitalāṅgūlo laṅkāṃ dehe' mahābalaḥ / dagdhvā laṅkāṃ samāyāto rāmapārśvaṃ sa vānaraḥ //
analyzed: kapiḥ jvalita lāṅgūlaḥ laṅkām dehe mahā balaḥ dagdhvā laṅkām samāyātaḥ rāma pārśvam sa vānaraḥ

original: jagdhvā phalaṃ madhuvane dṛṣṭā sītatyavedayat / veṇīratnañca rāmāya rāmo laṅkāpurrī yayau //
analyzed: jagdhvā phalam madhuvane dṛṣṭā sītā iti avedayat veṇī ratnam ca rāmāya rāmaḥ laṅkā purrī yayau

original: sasugrīvaḥ sa hanumānsāṃgadaśca salakṣmaṇaḥ / vibhīṣaṇo 'pi samprāptaḥ śaraṇaṃ rāghavaṃ prati //
analyzed: sa sugrīvaḥ sa hanumān sa aṃgadaḥ ca sa lakṣmaṇaḥ vibhīṣaṇaḥ samprāptaḥ śaraṇam rāghavam prati

original: laṅkaiśvaryeṣvabhyaṣiñcadrāmastaṃ rāvaṇānujam / rāmo nalena setuñca kṛtvābdhau cottatāra tam //
analyzed: laṅkā aiśvaryeṣu abhyaṣiñcat rāmaḥ tam rāvaṇa anujam rāmaḥ nalena setum ca kṛtvā abdhau ca uttatāra tam

original: suvelāvasthitaścaiva purīṃ laṅkāṃ dadarśaha / atha te vānarā vīrā nīlāṅgadanalādayaḥ //
analyzed: suvela avasthitaḥ ca eva purīm laṅkām dadarśa ha  atha te vānarāḥ vīrāḥ nīla aṅgada nala ādayaḥ

original: dhūmradhūmrākṣavīrendrā jāmbavatpramukhāstadā / maindadvividamukhyāste purīṃ laṅkāṃ babhañjire //
analyzed: dhūmra dhūmrākṣa vīra indrāḥ jāmbavat pramukhāḥ tadā mainda dvivida mukhyāḥ te purīm laṅkām babhañjire

original: rākṣasāṃśca mahākāyānkālāñjanacayopamān / rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇo hatvā sakapiḥ sarvarākṣasān //
analyzed: rākṣasān ca mahā kāyān kāla añjana caya upamān rāmaḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ hatvā sa kapiḥ sarva rākṣasān

original: vidyujjihvañca dhūmrākṣaṃ devāntakanarānta kau / mahodaramahāpārśvāvatikāyaṃ mahābalam //
analyzed: vidyujjihvam ca dhūmrākṣam devāntaka narānta kau mahodara mahāpārśvau atikāyam mahā balam

original: kumbhaṃ nikumbhaṃ mattañca makarākṣaṃ hyakampanam / prahastaṃ vīramunmattaṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam //
analyzed: kumbham nikumbham mattam ca makarākṣam hi akampanam prahastam vīram unmattam kumbhakarṇam mahā balam

original: rāvaṇiṃ lakṣmaṇo 'cchinta hyastrādyai rāghavo balī / nikṛtya bāhucakrāṇi rāvaṇantu nyapātayan //
analyzed: rāvaṇim lakṣmaṇo chinta hi astra ādyaiḥ rāghavaḥ balī nikṛtya bāhu cakrāṇi nyapātayan

original: sītāṃ śuddhāṃ gṛhītvātha vimāne puṣpake sthitaḥ / savānaraḥ samāyāto hyayodhyāṃ pravarāṃ purīm //
analyzed: sītām śuddhām gṛhītvā atha vimāne puṣpake sthitaḥ sa vānaraḥ samāyātaḥ hi ayodhyām pravarām purīm

original: tatra rājyaṃ cakārātha puttravatpālayanprajāḥ / daśāśvamedhānāhṛtya gayāśirasi pātanam //
analyzed: tatra rājyam cakāra atha puttra vat pālayan prajāḥ daśa aśvamedhān āhṛtya gayāśirasi pātanam

original: piṇḍānāṃ vidhivatkṛtvā dattvā dānāni rāghavaḥ / putrau kuśalavau dṛṣṭvā tau ca rājye 'bhyaṣecayat //
analyzed: piṇḍānām vidhivat kṛtvā dattvā dānāni rāghavaḥ putrau kuśa lavau dṛṣṭvā tau ca rājye bhyaṣecayat

original: ekādaśasahasrāṇi rāmo rājyamakārayat / śatrughno lavaṇaṃ jaghne śailūṣaṃ bhatastataḥ //
analyzed: ekādaśa sahasrāṇi rāmaḥ rājyam akārayat śatrughnaḥ lavaṇam jaghne śailūṣam bhataḥ tatas

original: agastyādīnmunīnnatvā śrutvotpattiñca rakṣasām / svargaṃ gato janaiḥ sārdhamayodhyāsthaiḥ kṛtārthakaḥ //
analyzed: agastya ādīn munīn natvā śrutvā utpattim ca rakṣasām svargam gataḥ janaiḥ sārdham ayodhyā sthaiḥ kṛtārthakaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rāmāyaṇavarṇanaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe rāmāyaṇavarṇanam nāma tricatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 144
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / harivaṃśaṃ pravakṣyāmi kṛṣṇamāhātmyamuttamam / vasudevāttu devakyāṃ vāsudevo balo 'bhavat //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca harivaṃśam pravakṣyāmi kṛṣṇa māhātmyam uttamam vasudevāt tu devakyām vāsudevaḥ balaḥ bhavat

original: dharmādirakṣaṇārthāya hyadharmādivinaṣṭaye / kṛṣṇaḥ pītvā stanau gāḍhaṃ pūtanāmanayatkṣayam //
analyzed: dharma ādi rakṣaṇa arthāya hi adharma ādi vinaṣṭaye kṛṣṇaḥ pītvā stanau gāḍham pūtanām anayat kṣayam

original: śakaṭaḥ parivṛtto 'tha bhagnau ca yamalārjunau / damitaḥ kāliyo nāgo dhenuko vinipātitaḥ //
analyzed: śakaṭaḥ bhagnau ca yamala arjunau damitaḥ kāliyaḥ nāgaḥ dhenukaḥ vinipātitaḥ

original: dhṛto govardhanaḥ śaila indreṇa paripūjitaḥ / bhārāvataraṇaṃ cakre pratijñāṃ kṛtavānhariḥ //
analyzed: dhṛtaḥ govardhanaḥ śailaḥ indreṇa paripūjitaḥ bhāra avataraṇam cakre pratijñām kṛtavān hariḥ

original: rakṣaṇāyārjunādeśca hyariṣṭādirnipātitaḥ / keśī vinihato daityo gopādyāḥ paritoṣitāḥ //
analyzed: rakṣaṇāya arjuna ādeḥ ca hi ariṣṭa ādiḥ nipātitaḥ keśī vinihataḥ daityaḥ gopa ādyāḥ paritoṣitāḥ

original: cāṇūro muṣṭiko mallaḥ kaṃso mañcānnipātitaḥ / rukmiṇīsatyabhāmādyāḥ hyaṣṭau patnyo hareḥ parāḥ //
analyzed: cāṇūraḥ muṣṭikaḥ mallaḥ kaṃsaḥ mañcāt nipātitaḥ rukmiṇī satyabhāmā ādyāḥ hi aṣṭau patnyaḥ hareḥ parāḥ

original: ṣoḍhaśa strīsahasrāṇi hyanyānyāsa mahātmanaḥ / tāsāṃ putrāśca pautrādyāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ //
analyzed: ṣoḍhaśa strī sahasrāṇi hi anyāni āsa mahātmanaḥ tāsām putrāḥ ca pautra ādyāḥ sahasraśas

original: rukmiṇyāñcaiva pradyumno nyavadhīcchaṃbarañca yaḥ / tasya putro 'niruddho 'bhūduṣābāṇasutāpatiḥ //
analyzed: rukmiṇyām ca eva pradyumnaḥ nyavadhīt śaṃbaran ca yaḥ tasya putraḥ niruddhaḥ bhūduṣābāṇa sutāpatiḥ

original: hariśakarayoryatra mahāyuddhaṃ babhūva ha / bāṇabāhusahasrañca cchinnaṃ bāhudvayaṃ hyabhūt //
analyzed: mahā yuddham babhūva ha bāṇa bāhu sahasrañca chinnam bāhu dvayam hi abhūt

original: narako nihato yena pārijātaṃ jahāra yaḥ / balaśca śisupālaśca hataśca dvividaḥ kapiḥ //
analyzed: narakaḥ nihataḥ yena pārijātam jahāra yaḥ balaḥ ca śisupālaḥ ca hataḥ ca dvividaḥ kapiḥ

original: aniruddhādabhūdvajraḥ sa ca rājā gate harau / sandīpaniṃ guruñcakre saputrañca cakāra saḥ / mathurāyāṃ cograsenaṃ pālanaṃ ca divaukasām //
analyzed: aniruddhāt abhūt vajraḥ sa ca rājā gate harau sandīpanim gurun cakre sa putram ca cakāra saḥ  mathurāyām ca ugrasenam pālanam ca divaukasām

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe harivaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma catuścātvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe harivaṃśavarṇanam nāma catuścātvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 145
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / bhārataṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi bhārāvataraṇaṃ bhuvaḥ / cakre kṛṣṇo yudhyamānaḥ pāṇḍavādinimittataḥ //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca bhāratam saṃpravakṣyāmi bhāra avataraṇam bhuvaḥ  cakre kṛṣṇaḥ yudhyamānaḥ pāṇḍava ādi nimittataḥ

original: viṣṇunābhyabjato brahmā brahmaputro 'triratritaḥ / somastato budhastasmādilāyāṃ ca purūravāḥ //
analyzed: viṣṇu nābhi abjataḥ brahmā tris atritaḥ somaḥ tatas budhaḥ tasmāt ilāyām ca purūravāḥ

original: tasyāyustatra vaṃśe 'bhūdyayātirbharataḥ kuruḥ / śantanustasya vaṃśe 'bhūdgaṅgāyāṃ śantanoḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: tasya āyuḥ tatra vaṃśe bhūt yayātiḥ bharataḥ kuruḥ śantanuḥ tasya vaṃśe bhūt gaṅgāyām śantanoḥ sutaḥ

original: bhīṣmaḥ sarvaguṇaiyukto brahmavaivartapāragaḥ //
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ sarva guṇaiḥ yuktaḥ brahmavaivarta pāragaḥ

original: śantanoḥ satyavatyāṃ ca dvau putrau saṃbabhūvatuḥ / citrāṅgadantu gandharvaḥ putraṃ citrāṅgado 'vadhīt //
analyzed: śantanoḥ satyavatyām ca dvau putrau saṃbabhūvatuḥ gandharvaḥ putram citrāṅgadaḥ vadhīt

original: anyo vicitravīryo 'bhūtkāśīrājasutāpatiḥ / vicitravīrye svaryāte vyāsāttatkṣetrato 'bhavat //
analyzed: anyaḥ vicitravīryaḥ bhūt kāśī rāja sutā patiḥ vicitravīrye svaryāte vyāsāt tad kṣetrataḥ bhavat

original: dhṛtarāṣṭo 'mbikāputraḥ pāṇḍurāmbālikāsutaḥ / bhujiṣyāyāntu viduro gāndhāryāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrataḥ //
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭaḥ mbikā putraḥ pāṇḍura ambālikā sutaḥ bhujiṣyāyāntu viduraḥ gāndhāryām dhṛtarāṣṭrataḥ

original: duryodhanapradhānāstu śatasaṃkhyā mahābalāḥ / pāṇḍoḥ kuntyāñca mādyāṃ ca pañca putrāḥ prajajñire //
analyzed: duryodhana pradhānāḥ tu śata saṃkhyāḥ mahā balāḥ pāṇḍoḥ kuntyām ca mādyām ca pañca putrāḥ prajajñire

original: yudhiṣṭhiro bhīmaseno hyarjuno nakulastathā / sahadevaśca pañcaite mahābalaparākramāḥ //
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ bhīmasenaḥ hi arjunaḥ nakulaḥ tathā sahadevaḥ ca pañca ete mahā bala parākramāḥ

original: kurupāṇḍavayorvairaṃ daivayo gādbabhūva ha / duryodhanenādhīreṇa pāṇḍavāḥ samupadrutāḥ //
analyzed: kuru pāṇḍavayoḥ vairam daiva yo gāt babhūva ha  duryodhanena adhīreṇa pāṇḍavāḥ samupadrutāḥ

original: dagdhā jatugṛhe vīrāste muktāḥ svadhiyāmalāḥ //
analyzed: dagdhāḥ jatu gṛhe vīrāḥ te muktāḥ sva dhiyā amalāḥ

original: tatastadekacakrāyāṃ brāhmaṇasya niveśane / viviśuste mahātmāno nihatya bakarākṣasam //
analyzed: tatas tat ekacakrāyām brāhmaṇasya niveśane viviśuḥ te mahātmānaḥ nihatya baka rākṣasam

original: tataḥ pāñcālaviṣayedraupadyāste svayaṃvaram / vijñāya vīryaśulkāntāṃ pāṇḍavā upayemire //
analyzed: tatas pāñcāla viṣaye draupadyāḥ te svayaṃvaram vijñāya vīrya śulka antām pāṇḍavāḥ upayemire

original: droṇabhīṣmānumatyā tu dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ samānayat / ardvarājyaṃ tataḥ prāptā indraprasthe purottame //
analyzed: droṇa bhīṣma anumatyā tu dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ samānayat  ardva rājyam tatas prāptāḥ indraprasthe pura uttame

original: rājasūyantataścakruḥ sabhāṃ kṛtvā yatavratāḥ / arjuno dvāravatyāntu subhadrāṃ prāptavānpriyām / vāsudevasya bhaginīmanumatyā muradviṣaḥ //
analyzed: rājasūyan tatas cakruḥ sabhām kṛtvā yata vratāḥ  arjunaḥ dvāravatyām tu subhadrām prāptavān priyām  vāsudevasya bhaginīm anumatyā muradviṣaḥ

original: nandighoṣaṃ rathaṃ divyamagnerghanuranuttamam / gāṇḍīvaṃ nāma taddivyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam / akṣayānsāyakāṃścaiva tathābhedyañca daṃśanam //
analyzed: nandighoṣam ratham divyam agneḥ ghanuḥ anuttamam  gāṇḍīvam nāma tat divyam triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam akṣayān sāyakān ca eva tathā abhedyam ca daṃśanam

original: sa tena dhanuṣā vīraḥ pāṇḍavo jātavedasam / kṛṣṇadvitīyo bībhatsuratarpayata vīryavān //
analyzed: sa tena dhanuṣā vīraḥ pāṇḍavaḥ jātavedasam kṛṣṇa dvitīyaḥ bībhatsuḥ atarpayata vīryavān

original: nṛpāndigvijaye jitvā ratnānyādāya vai dadau / yudhiṣṭhirāya mahate bhrātre nītivide mudā //
analyzed: nṛpān digvijaye jitvā ratnāni ādāya vai dadau yudhiṣṭhirāya mahate bhrātre nīti vide mudā

original: yudhiṣṭhiro 'pi dharmātmā bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritaḥ / jito duryodhanenaiva māyādyūtena pāpinā / karṇaduḥ śāsanamate sthitena śakunermate //
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ pi dharma ātmā bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritaḥ jitaḥ duryodhanena eva māyā dyūtena pāpinā sthitena śakuneḥ mate

original: atha dvādaśa varṣāṇi vane tepurmahattapaḥ / sadhaumyā draupadīṣaṣṭhā munivṛndābhisaṃvṛtāḥ //
analyzed: atha dvādaśa varṣāṇi vane tepuḥ mahat tapaḥ sa dhaumyāḥ draupadī ṣaṣṭhāḥ muni vṛnda abhisaṃvṛtāḥ

original: yayurvirāṭanagaraṃ guptarūpeṇa saṃśritāḥ / varṣamekaṃ mahāprājñā gograhāttamapālayan //
analyzed: yayuḥ virāṭa nagaram gupta rūpeṇa saṃśritāḥ varṣam ekam mahā prājñāḥ gograhāt tam apālayan

original: tate yātāḥ svakaṃ rāṣṭraṃ prārthayāmāsurādṛtāḥ / pañcagrāmānardharājyādvīrā duryodhanaṃ nṛpam //
analyzed: tate yātāḥ svakam rāṣṭram prārthayāmāsuḥ ādṛtāḥ pañca grāmān ardha rājyāt vīrāḥ duryodhanam nṛpam

original: nāptavantaḥ kurukṣetre yuddhañcakrurbalānvitāḥ / akṣauhiṇībhirdivyābhiḥ saptabhiḥ parivāritāḥ //
analyzed: na āptavantaḥ kurukṣetre yuddhañcakruḥ bala anvitāḥ akṣauhiṇībhiḥ divyābhiḥ saptabhiḥ parivāritāḥ

original: ekādaśabhirudyuktā yuktā duryodhanādayaḥ / āsīdyuddhaṃ saṃkulaṃ ca devāsuraraṇopamam //
analyzed: ekādaśabhiḥ udyuktāḥ yuktāḥ duryodhana ādayaḥ āsīt yuddham saṃkulam ca deva asura raṇa upamam

original: bhīṣmaḥ senāpatirabhūdādau dauryodhane bale / pāṇḍavānāṃ śikhaṇḍī ca tayoryuddhaṃ babhūva ha / śastrāśastri mahāghoraṃ dhasarātraṃ śarāśari //
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ senāpatiḥ abhūt ādau dauryodhane bale pāṇḍavānām śikhaṇḍī ca tayoḥ yuddham babhūva ha śastrāśastri mahā ghoram dhasarātram śarāśari

original: śikhaṇḍyarjunabāṇaiśca bhīṣmaḥ śaraśataiścitaḥ / uttarāyaṇamāvīkṣya dhyātvā devaṃ gadādharam //
analyzed: śikhaṇḍi arjuna bāṇaiḥ ca bhīṣmaḥ śara śataiḥ citaḥ  uttarāyaṇam ā vīkṣya dhyātvā devam gadādharam

original: uktvā dharmānbahuvidhāṃstarpayitvā pitṝnbahūn / ānande tu pade līno vimale muktakilbiṣe //
analyzed: uktvā dharmān bahuvidhān tarpayitvā pitṝn bahūn  ānande tu pade līnaḥ vimale mukta kilbiṣe

original: tato droṇo yayau yoddhuṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnena bīryavān / dināni pañca tadyuddhamāsītparamadāruṇam //
analyzed: tatas droṇaḥ yayau yoddhum dhṛṣṭadyumnena bīryavān  dināni pañca tat yuddham āsīt parama dāruṇam

original: yatra te pṛthivīpālā hatāḥ pārthena saṃgare / śokasāgaramāsādya droṇo 'pi svargamāptavān //
analyzed: yatra te pṛthivīpālāḥ hatāḥ pārthena saṃgare śoka sāgaram āsādya droṇaḥ pi svargam āptavān

original: tataḥ karṇā yayau yoddhumarjunena mihātmanā / dinadvayaṃ mahāyuddhaṃ kṛtvā pārthāstrasāgare / nimagnaḥ sūryalokantu tataḥ prāpa sa vīryavān //
analyzed: tatas karṇāḥ yayau yoddhum arjunena miha ātmanā  dina dvayam mahā yuddham kṛtvā pārtha astra sāgare nimagnaḥ sūrya lokam tu tatas prāpa sa vīryavān

original: tataḥ śalyo yayau yoddhuṃ dharmarājena dhīmatā / dinārdhena hataḥ śalyo bāṇairjvalanasannibhaiḥ //
analyzed: tatas śalyaḥ yayau yoddhum dharmarājena dhīmatā dina ardhena hataḥ śalyaḥ bāṇaiḥ jvalana sannibhaiḥ

original: duryodhano 'tha vegena gadāmādāya vīryavān / abhyadhāvata vai bhībhaṃ kālāntakayamopamaḥ //
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ tha vegena gadām ādāya vīryavān abhyadhāvata vai bhībham kāla antaka yama upamaḥ

original: atha bhīmena vīreṇa gadayā vinipātitaḥ / aśvatthāmā gato drauṇiḥ suptasainyaṃ tato niśi //
analyzed: atha bhīmena vīreṇa gadayā vinipātitaḥ aśvatthāmā gataḥ drauṇiḥ supta sainyam tatas niśi

original: jaghāna bāhuvīryeṇa piturvadhamanusmaran / dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ jaghānātha draupadeyāṃśca vīryavān //
analyzed: jaghāna bāhu vīryeṇa pituḥ vadham anusmaran dhṛṣṭadyumnam jaghāna atha draupadeyān ca vīryavān

original: draupadyāṃ rudyamānāyāmaśvatthāmnaḥ śiromaṇim / aiṣikāstreṇa taṃ jitvā jagrāhārjuna uttamam //
analyzed: draupadyām rudyamānāyām aśvatthāmnaḥ śiromaṇim aiṣika astreṇa tam jitvā jagrāha arjunaḥ uttamam

original: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ samāśvāsya strījanaṃ śokasaṃkulam / snātvā santarpya devāṃśca pitṝnatha pitāmahān //
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ samāśvāsya strī janam śoka saṃkulam snātvā santarpya devān ca pitṝn atha pitāmahān

original: āśvāsito 'tha bhīṣmeṇa rājyañcaivākaronmahat / viṣṇumīje 'śvamedhena vidhivaddakṣiṇāvatā //
analyzed: āśvāsitaḥ tha bhīṣmeṇa rājyañca eva akarot mahat viṣṇum īje śvamedhena vidhivat dakṣiṇāvatā

original: rājye parīkṣitaṃ sthāpya yādavānāṃ vināśanam / śrutvā tu mausale rājā japtvā nāmasahasrakam //
analyzed: rājye parīkṣitam sthāpya yādavānām vināśanam  śrutvā tu mausale rājā japtvā nāma sahasrakam

original: viṣṇoḥ svargaṃ jagāmātha bhīmādyairbhrātṛbhiryutaḥ / vāsudevaḥ punarbuddha-saṃmohāya suradviṣām //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ svargam jagāma atha bhīma ādyaiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ yutaḥ vāsudevaḥ punar buddha saṃmohāya suradviṣām

original: kalkirviṣṇuśca bhavitā śaṃbhalagrāmake punaḥ / aśvārūḍho 'khilāṃllokāṃstadā bhasmīkariṣyati //
analyzed: kalkiḥ viṣṇuḥ ca bhavitā śaṃbhala grāmake punar aśvārūḍhaḥ khilān lokān tadā bhasmīkariṣyati

original: devādīnāṃ rakṣaṇāya hyadharmahāraṇāya ca / duṣṭānāñca vadhārthāya hyavatāraṃ karoti ca //
analyzed: deva ādīnām rakṣaṇāya hi adharma hāraṇāya ca duṣṭānām ca vadha arthāya hi avatāram karoti ca

original: yathā dhanvantarirvaṃśe jātaḥ kṣīrodamanthane / devādīnāṃ jīvanāya hyāyurvedamuvāca ha //
analyzed: yathā dhanvantariḥ vaṃśe jātaḥ kṣīroda manthane deva ādīnām jīvanāya hi āyurvedam uvāca ha

original: viśvāmitrasutāyaiva śuśrutāya mahātmane / bhāratāṃścāvatārāṃśca śrutvā svargaṃ vrajennaraḥ //
analyzed: viśvāmitra sutāya eva śuśrutāya mahātmane bhāratān ca avatārān ca śrutvā svargam vrajet naraḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhāratādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe bhāratādivarṇanam nāma pañcacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 146
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / sarvaroganidānañca vakṣye suśruta tattvataḥ / ātreyādyairmunivarairyathā pūrvamudīritam //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca sarvaroganidānam ca vakṣye suśruta tattvataḥ  ātreya ādyaiḥ muni varaiḥ yathā pūrvam udīritam

original: rogaḥ pāpmā jvaro vyādhirvikāro duṣṭa āmayaḥ / yakṣmātaṅkagadā bādhāḥ śabdāḥ paryāyavācinaḥ //
analyzed: rogaḥ pāpmā jvaraḥ vyādhiḥ vikāraḥ duṣṭaḥ āmayaḥ yakṣma ātaṅka gadāḥ bādhāḥ śabdāḥ paryāya vācinaḥ

original: nidānaṃ pūrvarūpāṇi rūpāṇyupaśayastathā / saṃprāptiścaiti vijñānaṃ rogāṇāṃ pañcadhā smṛtam //
analyzed: nidānam pūrvarūpāṇi rūpāṇi upaśayaḥ tathā saṃprāptiḥ ca eti vijñānam rogāṇām pañcadhā smṛtam

original: nimittahetvāyatanapratyayotthānakāraṇaiḥ / nidānamāhuḥ paryāyaiḥ prāgrūpaṃ yena lakṣyate //
analyzed: nimitta hetu āyatana pratyaya utthāna kāraṇaiḥ nidānam āhuḥ paryāyaiḥ prāgrūpam yena lakṣyate

original: utpitsurāmayo doṣaviśeṣeṇānadhiṣṭhitaḥ / liṅgamavyaktamalpatvādvyādhīnāṃ tadyathāyatham //
analyzed: utpitsuḥ āmayaḥ doṣa viśeṣeṇa anadhiṣṭhitaḥ liṅgam avyaktam alpa tvāt vyādhīnām tat yathāyatham

original: tadeva vyaktatāṃ yātaṃ rūpamityabhidhīyate / saṃsthānāṃ vyañjanaṃ liṅgaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cihnamākṛtiḥ //
analyzed: tat eva vyakta tām yātam rūpam iti abhidhīyate saṃsthānām vyañjanam liṅgam lakṣaṇam cihnam ākṛtiḥ

original: hetuvyādhiviparyastaviparyastārthakāriṇām / auṣadhānnavihārāṇāmupayogaṃ sukhāvaham //
analyzed: hetu vyādhi viparyasta viparyasta artha kāriṇām auṣadha anna vihārāṇām upayogam sukha āvaham

original: vidyādupaśayaṃ vyādheḥ sa hi sātmyamiti smṛtaḥ / viparīto 'nupaśayo vyādhyasātmyetisaṃjñitaḥ //
analyzed: vidyāt upaśayam vyādheḥ sa hi sātmyam iti smṛtaḥ viparītaḥ nu paśayaḥ vyādhi asātmya iti saṃjñitaḥ

original: yathā duṣṭena doṣeṇa yathā cānuvisarpatā / nirvṛttirāmayasyāsau saṃprāptirabhidhīyate //
analyzed: yathā duṣṭena doṣeṇa yathā ca anuvisarpatā nirvṛttiḥ āmayasya asau saṃprāptiḥ abhidhīyate

original: saṃkhyāvikalpaprādhānyabalakālaviśeṣataḥ / sā bhidyate yathātraiva vakṣyante 'ṣṭau jvarā iti //
analyzed: saṃkhyā vikalpa prādhānya bala kāla viśeṣataḥ sā bhidyate yathā atra eva vakṣyante ṣṭau jvarāḥ iti

original: doṣāṇāṃ samavetānāṃ vikalpośāṃśakalpanā / svātantryapāratantryābhyāṃ vyādheḥ prādhānyamādiśet //
analyzed: doṣāṇām samavetānām vikalpa uśa aṃśa kalpanā svātantrya pāratantryābhyām vyādheḥ prādhānyam ādiśet

original: hetvādikārtsnyāvayavairbalābalaviśeṣaṣaṇam / naktandinārdhabhuktāṃśairvyādhikālo yathāmalam //
analyzed: hetu ādi kārtsnya avayavaiḥ bala abala viśeṣa ṣaṇam naktandina ardha bhukta aṃśaiḥ vyādhi kālaḥ yathāmalam

original: iti prokto nidānārthaḥ sa vyāsenopadekṣyate / sarveṣāmeva rogāṇāṃ nidānaṃ kupitā malāḥ //
analyzed: iti proktaḥ nidāna arthaḥ sa vyāsena upadekṣyate sarveṣām eva rogāṇām nidānam kupitāḥ malāḥ

original: tatprakopasya tu proktaṃ vividhāhitasevanam / ahitastrividho yogastrayāṇāṃ prāgudāhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tad prakopasya tu proktam vividha ahita sevanam ahitaḥ trividhaḥ yogaḥ trayāṇām prāk udāhṛtaḥ

original: tiktoṣaṇakaṣāyāmlarūkṣāpramitayojanaiḥ / dhāvanodīraṇaniśājāgarātyuccabhāṣaṇaiḥ //
analyzed: tikta ūṣaṇa kaṣāya amla rūkṣa apramita yojanaiḥ dhāvana udīraṇa niśā jāgara ati ucca bhāṣaṇaiḥ

original: kriyābhiyogabīśokacintāvyāyāmamaithunaiḥ / grīṣmāhorātrabhuktyante prakupyati samīraṇaḥ //
analyzed: kriyā abhiyoga bī śoka cintā vyāyāma maithunaiḥ grīṣma ahar rātra bhukti ante prakupyati samīraṇaḥ

original: pittaṃ kaṭvālatīkṣṇoṣṇakaṭukrodhavidāhibhiḥ / śaranmadhyāhnarātryardhavidāhasamayeṣu ca //
analyzed: pittam kaṭu āla tīkṣṇa uṣṇa kaṭu krodha vidāhibhiḥ śarad madhyāhna rātri ardha vidāha samayeṣu ca

original: svādvamlalavaṇasnigdhagurvabhiṣyandiśītalaiḥ / āsyāsvapnasukhājīrṇadivāsvapnādibṛṃhaṇaiḥ //
pricchardanādyayogena bhuktānnasyāpyajīrṇake / pūrvāhne pūrvarātre ca śleṣmā vakṣyāmi saṅkarān //
analyzed: pricchardana ādya yogena bhukta annasya api ajīrṇake pūrvāhne pūrvarātre ca śleṣmā vakṣyāmi saṅkarān

original: miśrībhāvātsamastānāṃ sannipātastathā punaḥ / saṃkīrṇājīrṇaviṣamaviruddhādyaśanādibhiḥ //
analyzed: miśrībhāvāt samastānām sannipātaḥ tathā punar saṃkīrṇa ajīrṇa viṣama viruddha ādi aśana ādibhiḥ

original: vyāpannamadyapānīyaśuṣkaśākāmamūlakaiḥ / piṇyākamṛtyavasarapūtiśuṣkakṛśamiṣaiḥ //
analyzed: vyāpanna madya pānīya śuṣka śāka āma mūlakaiḥ piṇyāka mṛti avasara pūti śuṣka kṛśa miṣaiḥ

original: doṣatrayakaraistaistaistathānnaparivartataḥ / dhātorduṣṭātpuro vātāddvigrahāveśaviplavāt //
analyzed: doṣatraya karaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ tathā anna parivartataḥ dhātoḥ duṣṭāt puras vātāt dvi graha āveśa viplavāt

original: duṣṭāmānnairatiślaiṣmagrahairjanmarkṣapīḍanāt / mithyāyogācca vividhātpāpānāñca niṣevaṇāt / strīṇāṃ prasavavaiṣamyāttathā mithyopacārataḥ //
analyzed: duṣṭa āma annaiḥ ati ślaiṣma grahaiḥ janma ṛkṣa pīḍanāt mithyāyogāt ca vividhāt pāpānām ca niṣevaṇāt strīṇām prasava vaiṣamyāt tathā mithyā upacārataḥ

original: pratirogamiti kruddhā rogavidhyanugāminaḥ / rasāyanaṃ prapadyāśu doṣā dehe vikurvate //
analyzed: pratirogam iti kruddhāḥ roga vidhi anugāminaḥ rasāyanam prapadya āśu doṣāḥ dehe vikurvate

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe sarvaroganidānaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākye ācāra kāṇḍe sarvaroganidānam nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 147
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / vakṣye jvaranidānaṃ hi sarvajvaravibuddhaye / jvaro rogapatiḥ pāpmā mṛtyurājo 'śano 'ntakaḥ / kruddhadakṣādhvaradhvaṃsirudrordhvanayanodbhavaḥ //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca vakṣye jvaranidānam hi sarva jvara vibuddhaye jvaraḥ roga patiḥ pāpmā mṛtyu rājaḥ śanaḥ ntakaḥ kruddha dakṣa adhvara dhvaṃsi rudra ūrdhvanayana udbhavaḥ

original: tatsantāpo mohamayaḥ santāpātmāpacārajaḥ / vividhairnāmabhiḥ krūro nānāyoniṣu vartate //
analyzed: tad santāpaḥ moha mayaḥ santāpa ātma apacāra jaḥ vividhaiḥ nāmabhiḥ krūraḥ nānā yoniṣu vartate

original: pākalo gajeṣvabhitāpo vājiṣvalarkaḥ kukrureṣu / indramado jaladeṣvapsu nīlikā jyotiroṣadhīṣu bhūmyāmūṣaro nāma //
analyzed: pākalaḥ gajeṣu abhitāpaḥ vājiṣu alarkaḥ kukrureṣu  indramadaḥ jaladeṣu apsu nīlikā jyotiḥ oṣadhīṣu bhūmyām ūṣaraḥ nāma

original: hṛllāsaśchardanaṃ kāsaḥ staṃbhaḥ śaitya tvagādiṣu / aṅgeṣu ca samudbhūtāḥ piḍakāśca kaphodbhave //
analyzed: hṛllāsaḥ chardanam kāsaḥ staṃbhaḥ tvac ādiṣu aṅgeṣu ca samudbhūtāḥ piḍakāḥ ca kapha udbhave

original: kāle yathāsvaṃ sarveṣāṃ pravṛttirvṛddhireva vā / nidānoktonupaśayo viparītopaśāyitā //
analyzed: kāle yathāsvam sarveṣām pravṛttiḥ vṛddhiḥ eva vā nidāna uktaḥ anupaśayaḥ viparīta upaśāyi tā

original: aruciścāvipākaśca staṃbhamālasyameva ca / hṛddāhaśca vipākaśca tandrā cālasyameva ca / vastirvimardāvanayā doṣāṇāmapravartanam //
analyzed: aruciḥ ca avipākaḥ ca staṃbham ālasyam eva ca  hṛd dāhaḥ ca vipākaḥ ca tandrā ca ālasyam eva ca vastiḥ doṣāṇām apravartanam

original: lālāpraseko hṛllāsaḥ kṣunnāśo rasadaṃ mukham / svacchamuṣṇagurutvañca gātrāṇāṃ bahumūtratā / na vijīrṇaṃ na ca mlānirjvarasyāmasya lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: lālā prasekaḥ hṛllāsaḥ kṣudh nāśaḥ rasa dam mukham svaccham uṣṇa guru tvam ca gātrāṇām bahu mūtra tā  na vijīrṇam na ca mlāniḥ jvarasya āmasya lakṣaṇam

original: kṣutkṣāmatā laghutvaṃ ca gātrāṇāṃ jvaramārdavam / doṣapravṛttiraṣṭāhānnirāmajvaralakṣaṇam //
analyzed: kṣudh kṣāma tā laghu tvam ca gātrāṇām jvara mārdavam doṣa pravṛttiḥ aṣṭa ahāt nirāma jvara lakṣaṇam

original: yathā svaliṅgaṃ saṃsarge jvarasaṃsargajo 'pi vā / śirortimūrchāvamidehadāhakaṇṭhāsyaśoṣāruciparvabhedāḥ / unnidratā saṃbhramaromaharṣā jṛṃbhātivāktvaṃ pavanātsapittāt //
analyzed: yathā sva liṅgam saṃsarge vā  śiraḥ ṛti mūrchā vami deha dāha kaṇṭha āsya śoṣa aruci parva bhedāḥ unnidra tā saṃbhrama romaharṣāḥ jṛṃbhā ati vāc tvam pavanāt sa pittāt

original: tāpahānyaruciparvaśirorukṣṭhīvanaśvasanakāsavivarṇāḥ / śītajāḍyatimirabhramitandrāśleṣmavātajanitajvaraliṅgam //
analyzed: tāpa hāni aruci parva śiraḥ ru ṣṭhīvana śvasana kāsa vivarṇāḥ śīta jāḍya timira bhrami tandrā śleṣma vāta janita jvara liṅgam

original: śītastambhasvedadāhāvyavasthāstṛṣṇā kāsaḥ śleṣmapittapravṛttiḥ / mohastandrāliptatiktāsyatā ca jñeyaṃ rūpaṃ śleṣmapittajvarasya //
analyzed: śīta stambha sveda dāha avyavasthāḥ tṛṣṇā kāsaḥ śleṣma pitta pravṛttiḥ mohaḥ tandrā lipta tikta āsya tā ca jñeyam rūpam śleṣma pitta jvarasya

original: sarvajo lakṣaṇaiḥ sarvairdāho 'tra ca muhurmuhuḥ / taducchītaṃ mahā nidrā divā jāgaraṇaṃ niśi //
analyzed: sarvajaḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ dāhaḥ ca muhur muhur

original: sadā vā naiva vā nidrā mahāsvedo hi naiva vā / gītanartanahāsyādiḥ prakṛtehāpravartanam //
analyzed: sadā vā nā eva vā nidrā mahā svedaḥ hi nā eva vā gīta nartana hāsya ādiḥ prakṛta īhā pravartanam

original: sāśruṇī kaluṣe rakte bhugne lulitapakṣmaṇī / akṣiṇī piṇḍikāpārśvaśiraḥ parvāsthirugbhramaḥ //
analyzed: sa aśruṇī kaluṣe rakte bhugne lulita pakṣmaṇī akṣiṇī piṇḍikā pārśva śiraḥ parva asthi ruj bhramaḥ

original: sasvanau sarujau karṇau mahāśītau hi naiva vā / paridagdhā kharā jihvā gurustrastāṅgasandhitā //
analyzed: sa svanau sa rujau karṇau mahā śītau hi nā eva vā paridagdhā kharā jihvā guruḥ trasta aṅga sandhi tā

original: ṣṭhīvanaṃ raktapittasya loṭhanaṃ śiraso 'titṛṭ / koṣṭhānāṃ śyāvaraktānāṃ maṇḍalānāṃ ca darśanam //
analyzed: ṣṭhīvanam rakta pittasya loṭhanam śirasaḥ titṛṣ koṣṭhānām śyāva raktānām maṇḍalānām ca darśanam

original: hṛdvyathā malaṃsasargaḥ pravṛttirvālpaśo 'ti vā / snigdhāsyatā balabhraṃśaḥ svarasādaḥ pralāpitaḥ //
analyzed: hṛd vyathā vā snigdha āsya tā bala bhraṃśaḥ svara sādaḥ

original: doṣapākaściraṃ tandrā pratataṃ kaṇṭhakūjanam / sannipātamabhinyāsaṃ taṃ brūyācca hataujasam //
analyzed: doṣa pākaḥ ciram tandrā pratatam kaṇṭha kūjanam sannipātam abhinyāsam tam brūyāt ca hata ojasam

original: vāyunā kaṇṭharuddhena pittamantaḥ supīḍitam / vyavāyitvācca saukhyācca bahirmargaṃ prapadyate / tena hāridranetratvaṃ sannipātodbhavejvare //
analyzed: vāyunā kaṇṭha ruddhena pittam antar su pīḍitam vyavāyi tvāt ca saukhyāt ca bahis margam prapadyate tena hāridra netra tvam sannipāta udbhave jvare

original: doṣe vivṛddhe naṣṭe 'gnau sarvasaṃpūrṇalakṣaṇaḥ / sānnipātajvaro 'sādhyaḥ kṛcchrasādhyastato 'nyathā //
analyzed: doṣe vivṛddhe naṣṭe gnau sarva saṃpūrṇa lakṣaṇaḥ sānnipāta jvaraḥ sādhyaḥ kṛcchra sādhyaḥ tatas nyathā

original: anyatra sannipātotthaṃ yatra pittaṃ pṛthaksthitam / tvaci koṣṭhe ca vā dāhaṃ vidadhāti puro 'nu vā //
analyzed: anyatra sannipāta uttham yatra pittam pṛthak sthitam tvaci koṣṭhe ca vā dāham vidadhāti puras nu vā

original: tadvadvātakaphe śītaṃ dāhādirdustarastayoḥ / śītādau tatra pittena kaphe syānditaśoṣite //
analyzed: tadvat vāta kaphe śītam dāha ādiḥ dustaraḥ tayoḥ  śīta ādau tatra pittena kaphe

original: pitte śānte 'tha vai mūrchā madastṛṣṇā ca jāyate / dāhādau punaranteṣu tandrālasye vamiḥ kramāt //
analyzed: pitte śānte vai mūrchā madaḥ tṛṣṇā ca jāyate dāha ādau punar anteṣu tandrā ālasye vamiḥ kramāt

original: āganturabhigātābhiṣaṅgaśāpābhicārataḥ / caturdhā tu kṛtaḥ svedo dāhādyairabhighātajaḥ //
analyzed: āgantuḥ abhigāta abhiṣaṅga śāpa abhicārataḥ  caturdhā tu kṛtaḥ svedaḥ dāha ādyaiḥ abhighāta jaḥ

original: śramācca tasminpavanaḥ prāyo raktaṃ pradūṣayan / savyathāśokavaivarṇyaṃ sarujaṃ kurute jvaram //
analyzed: śramāt ca tasmin pavanaḥ prāyas raktam pradūṣayan sa vyathā śoka vaivarṇyam sa rujam kurute jvaram

original: grahāveśauṣadhiviṣakrodhabhīśokakāmajaḥ //
abhiṣaṅgagraho 'pyasminnakasmādvāsarodane / oṣadhīgandhaje mūrchā śirorugvamathuḥ kṣayaḥ //
analyzed: abhiṣaṅga grahaḥ pi asmin akasmāt vāsa rodane oṣadhī gandha je mūrchā śiraḥ ruj vamathuḥ kṣayaḥ

original: viṣānmūrchātisāraśca śyāvatā dāhakṛdbhramaḥ / krodhātkampaḥ śirorukca pralāpo bhayaśokaje //
analyzed: viṣāt mūrchā atisāraḥ ca śyāva tā dāha kṛt bhramaḥ krodhāt kampaḥ śiraḥ ruj ca pralāpaḥ bhaya śoka je

original: kāmādbhramo 'rucirdāho hrīnidrādhīdhṛtikṣayāḥ / grahādau sannipātasya rūpādau marutastayoḥ //
analyzed: kāmāt bhramaḥ ruciḥ dāhaḥ hrī nidrā dhī dhṛti kṣayāḥ graha ādau sannipātasya rūpa ādau marutaḥ tayoḥ

original: kopātkope 'pi pittasya yau tu śāpābhicārajau / sannipātajvarau ghorau tāvasahyatamau matau //
analyzed: kopāt kope pittasya yau tu śāpa abhicāra jau sannipāta jvarau ghorau tau asahyatamau matau

original: tantrā bhicārikairmantrairdūyamānañca tapyate / pūrvañcaitastato dehastato visphoṭadigbhramaiḥ //
analyzed: tantra ābhicārikaiḥ mantraiḥ dūyamānam ca tapyate pūrvam ca etaḥ tatas dehaḥ tatas visphoṭa digbhramaiḥ

original: sadāhamūrchāgrastasya pratyahaṃ vardhate jvaraḥ / iti jvaro 'ṣṭadhā dṛṣṭaḥ samāsāddvibidhastu saḥ //
analyzed: sa dāha mūrchā grastasya pratyaham vardhate jvaraḥ iti jvaraḥ ṣṭadhā dṛṣṭaḥ samāsāt dvibidhaḥ tu saḥ

original: śārīro mānasaḥ saumyastīkṣṇoṃntarbahirāśrayaḥ / prākṛto vaikṛtaḥ sādhyo 'sādhyaḥ sāmo nirāmakaḥ //
analyzed: śārīraḥ mānasaḥ saumyaḥ tīkṣṇaḥ ūm antar bahis āśrayaḥ prākṛtaḥ vaikṛtaḥ sādhyaḥ sādhyaḥ sāmaḥ nirāmakaḥ

original: pūrvaṃ śarire śarīre tāpo manasi mānase / pavanairyogavāhitvācchītaṃ śleṣmayute bhavet //
analyzed: pūrvam śarīre tāpaḥ manasi mānase pavanaiḥ yogavāhi tvāt śītam śleṣma yute bhavet

original: dāhaḥ pittayute miśraṃ miśre 'ntaḥ saṃśraye punaḥ / jvare 'dhikaṃ vikārāḥ syurantaḥ kṣobho malagrahaḥ //
analyzed: dāhaḥ pitta yute miśram miśre ntar saṃśraye punar jvare dhikam vikārāḥ syuḥ antar kṣobhaḥ mala grahaḥ

original: bahireva bahirvege tāpo 'pi ca sa sādhitaḥ / varṣāśaradvasanteṣu vātādyaiḥ prakṛtaḥ kramāt //
analyzed: bahis eva bahis vege ca sa sādhitaḥ varṣā śarad vasanteṣu vāta ādyaiḥ prakṛtaḥ kramāt

original: vaikṛto 'nyaḥ sa duḥ sādhyaḥ prāyaśca prākṛto 'nilāt / varṣāsu māruto duṣṭaḥ pittaśleṣmānvitaṃ jvaram //
analyzed: vaikṛtaḥ sa sādhyaḥ prāyas ca prākṛtaḥ nilāt  varṣāsu mārutaḥ duṣṭaḥ pitta śleṣma anvitam jvaram

original: kuryācca pittaṃ śaradi tasya cānucaraḥ kaphaḥ / tatprakṛtyā visargācca tatra nānaśanādbhayam //
analyzed: kuryāt ca pittam śaradi tasya ca anucaraḥ kaphaḥ tad prakṛtyā visargāt ca tatra na anaśanāt bhayam

original: kapho vasante tamapi vātapittaṃ bhavedanu / balavatsvalpadoṣeṣu jvaraḥ sādhyo 'nupadravaḥ //
analyzed: kaphaḥ vasante tam api vātapittam bhavet anu balavatsu alpa doṣeṣu jvaraḥ sādhyaḥ nupadravaḥ

original: sarvathā vikṛtijñāne prāgasādhya udāhṛtaḥ / jvaropadravatīkṣṇatvaṃ mandāgnirbahumūtratā //
analyzed: sarvathā vikṛti jñāne prāk asādhyaḥ udāhṛtaḥ jvara upadrava tīkṣṇa tvam manda agniḥ bahu mūtra tā

original: na pravṛttirna vijīrṇā na kṣutsāmajvarākṛtiḥ / jvaravego 'dhikastṛṣṇā pralāpaḥ śvasanaṃ bhramaḥ //
analyzed: na pravṛttiḥ na vijīrṇā na kṣudh sāma jvara ākṛtiḥ jvara vegaḥ dhikaḥ tṛṣṇā pralāpaḥ śvasanam bhramaḥ

original: malapravṛttirutkleśaḥ pacyamānasya lakṣaṇam / jīrṇatāmaviparyāsātsaptarātraṃ ca laṅghanam //
analyzed: mala pravṛttiḥ utkleśaḥ pacyamānasya lakṣaṇam jīrṇa tām aviparyāsāt sapta rātram ca laṅghanam

original: jvaraḥ pañcavidhaḥ prokto malakālabalābalāt / prāyaśaḥ sannipātena bhūyasāmupadiśyate //
analyzed: jvaraḥ pañcavidhaḥ proktaḥ mala kāla bala abalāt prāyaśas sannipātena bhūyasām upadiśyate

original: santataḥ satato 'nyedyustṛtīyakacaturthakau / dhātumūtraśakṛdvāhisnota sāṃ vyāpino malāḥ //
analyzed: santataḥ satataḥ nyedyus tṛtīyaka caturthakau dhātu mūtra śakṛt vāhi snota sām vyāpinaḥ malāḥ

original: tāpayantastanuṃ sarvāṃ tulyadṛṣṭyādivardhitāḥ / balino guravastasyāviśeṣeṇa rasāśritāḥ //
analyzed: tāpayantaḥ tanum sarvām tulya dṛṣṭi ādi vardhitāḥ balinaḥ guravaḥ tasya aviśeṣeṇa rasa āśritāḥ

original: satataṃ niṣpratidvandvājvaraṃ kuryuḥ suduḥ saham / malaṃ jvaroṣṇadhātūnvā sa śīghraṃ kṣapayettataḥ //
analyzed: satatam niṣpratidvandvā jvaram kuryuḥ su duḥ saham malam jvara uṣṇa dhātūn vā sa śīghram kṣapayet tatas

original: sarvākāraṃ rasādīnāṃ śuddhyāsuddhyāpi vā kramāt / vātapittakaphaiḥ saptada śadvādaśavāsarāt //
analyzed: sarva ākāram rasa ādīnām śuddhyā asuddhyā api vā kramāt vāta pitta kaphaiḥ saptada śa dvādaśa vāsarāt

original: prāyo 'nuyāti maryādāṃ mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca / ityagniveśasya mataṃ hārītasya punaḥ smṛtiḥ //
analyzed: prāyas nuyāti maryādām mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca iti agniveśasya matam hārītasya punar smṛtiḥ

original: dviguṇā saptamī yā ca navamyekādaśī tathā / eṣā tridoṣamaryādā mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca //
analyzed: dviguṇā saptamī yā ca navamī ekādaśī tathā eṣā tridoṣa maryādā mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca

original: śuddhyāśuddhyā jvaraḥ kālaṃ dīrghamapyatra vartate / kṛśānāṃ vyādhiyuktānāṃ mithyāhārādisevinām //
analyzed: śuddhyā aśuddhyā jvaraḥ kālam dīrgham api atra vartate kṛśānām vyādhi yuktānām mithyā āhāra ādi sevinām

original: alpo 'pi doṣo duṣṭyāderlabdhvānyatamato balam / sa pratyanīko viṣamaṃ yasmādvṛddhikṣayānvitaḥ //
analyzed: alpaḥ pi doṣaḥ duṣṭi ādeḥ labdhvā anyatamataḥ balam sa pratyanīkaḥ viṣamam yasmāt vṛddhi kṣaya anvitaḥ

original: savikṣepo jvaraṃ kuryādviṣamakṣayavṛddhibhāk / doṣaḥ pravartate teṣāṃ sve kāle jvarayanbalī //
analyzed: sa vikṣepaḥ jvaram kuryāt viṣama kṣaya vṛddhi bhāj  doṣaḥ pravartate teṣām sve kāle jvarayan balī

original: nivartate punaścaiva pratyanīkabalābalaḥ / kṣīṇadoṣo jvaraḥ sūkṣmo rasādiṣveva līyate //
analyzed: nivartate punar ca eva pratyanīka bala abalaḥ kṣīṇa doṣaḥ jvaraḥ sūkṣmaḥ rasa ādiṣu eva līyate

original: līnatvātkārśyavaivarṇyajāḍyādīnāṃ dadhāti saḥ / āsannavikṛtāsyatvātsrotasāṃ rasavāhinām //
analyzed: līna tvāt kārśya vaivarṇya jāḍya ādīnām dadhāti saḥ āsanna vikṛta āsya tvāt srotasām rasa vāhinām

original: āśu sarvasya vapuṣo vyāptidoṣo na jāyate / santaḥ satatastena viparīto viparyayāt //
analyzed: āśu sarvasya vapuṣaḥ vyāpti doṣaḥ na jāyate santaḥ satataḥ tena viparītaḥ viparyayāt

original: viṣamo viṣamārambhaḥ kṣapākālena saṅgavān / doṣo raktāśrayaḥ prāyaḥ karoti santataṃ jvaram //
analyzed: viṣamaḥ viṣama ārambhaḥ kṣapā kālena saṅgavān doṣaḥ rakta āśrayaḥ prāyas karoti santatam jvaram

original: ahorātrasya sandhau syātsakṛdanyedyurāśritaḥ / tasminmāṃsavahā nāḍī medonāḍī tṛtīyake //
analyzed: ahar rātrasya sandhau syāt sakṛt anyedyus āśritaḥ tasmin māṃsa vahā nāḍī medaḥ nāḍī tṛtīyake

original: grāhī pittānilānmūrdhnastrikasya kaphapittataḥ / sapṛṣṭhasyānilakaphātsa caikāhāntaraḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: grāhī pitta anilān mūrdhnaḥ trikasya kapha pittataḥ sa pṛṣṭhasya anila kaphāt sa ca eka aha antaraḥ smṛtaḥ

original: caturthako malairmedomajjāsthyanyatare sthitaḥ / majjāstha eva hyaparaḥ prabhāvamanudarśayet //
analyzed: caturthakaḥ malaiḥ medaḥ majja asthi anyatare sthitaḥ majjā sthaḥ eva hi aparaḥ prabhāvam anudarśayet

original: dvidhā kaphoṇijaṅghābhyāṃ sa pūrvaṃ śirasānilāt / asthimajjorupagataścaturthakaviparyayaḥ //
analyzed: dvidhā kaphoṇi jaṅghābhyām sa pūrvam śirasā anilāt

original: tridhā tryahaṃ jvarayati dinamekantu muñcati / balā balena doṣaṇāmanyaceṣṭādijanmanām //
analyzed: tridhā tri aham jvarayati dinam ekam tu muñcati balāḥ balena doṣaṇām anya ceṣṭā ādi janmanām

original: pakrānāmaviparyāsātsaptarātrañca laṅghayet / jvaraḥ syānmanasastadvatkarmaṇaśca tadātadā //
analyzed: pakrānām aviparyāsāt sapta rātram ca laṅghayet jvaraḥ syāt manasaḥ tadvat karmaṇaḥ ca tadā tadā

original: gambhīradhātucāritvātsannipātena sambhavāt / tulyocchrayācca doṣāṇāṃ duścikitsyaścaturthakaḥ //
analyzed: gambhīra dhātu cāri tvāt sannipātena sambhavāt tulya ucchrayāt ca doṣāṇām duścikitsyaḥ caturthakaḥ

original: sūkṣāmātsūkṣmajvareṣveṣu dūraddūratareṣu ca / doṣo raktādimārgeṣu śanairalpaścireṇa yat //
analyzed: ca  /

original: yāti dehañca nāśeṣaṃ santāpādīnkarotyataḥ / kramo yatnena vicchinnaḥ satāpo lakṣyate jvaraḥ //
analyzed: yāti deham ca na aśeṣam santāpa ādīn karoti atas kramaḥ yatnena vicchinnaḥ sa tāpaḥ lakṣyate jvaraḥ

original: viṣamo viṣamārambhaḥ kṣapākālānusāravān / yathottaraṃ mandagatirmandaśaktiryathāyatham //
analyzed: viṣamaḥ viṣama ārambhaḥ kṣapā kāla anusāravān yathottaram manda gatiḥ manda śaktiḥ yathāyatham

original: kālenāpnoti sadṛśānsa rasādīṃstathātathā / doṣo jvarayati kruddhaścirācciratareṇa ca //
analyzed: kālena āpnoti sadṛśān sa rasa ādīn tathā tathā doṣaḥ jvarayati kruddhaḥ cirāt ciratareṇa ca

original: bhūmau sthitaṃ jalaiḥ siktaṃ kālaṃ naiva pratīkṣate / aṅkurāya yathā bījaṃ doṣabījaṃ bhavettathā //
analyzed: bhūmau sthitam jalaiḥ siktam kālam na eva pratīkṣate aṅkurāya yathā bījam doṣa bījam bhavet tathā

original: vegaṃ kṛtvāviṣaṃ yadvadāśaye nayate balam / kupyatyāptabalaṃ bhūyaḥ kāladoṣaviṣantathā //
analyzed: vegam kṛtvā aviṣam yadvat āśaye nayate balam kupyati āpta balam bhūyas kāla doṣa viṣam tathā

original: evaṃ jvarāḥ pravartante viṣamāḥ satatādayaḥ / utkleśo gauravaṃ dainyaṃ bhaṅgo 'ṅgānāṃ vijṛmbhaṇam //
analyzed: evam jvarāḥ pravartante viṣamāḥ satata ādayaḥ utkleśaḥ gauravam dainyam bhaṅgaḥ uṅgānām vijṛmbhaṇam

original: arocako vamiḥ śvāsaḥ sarvasminrasage jvare / raktaniṣṭhīvanaṃ tṛṣṇā rūkṣoṣṇaṃ pīḍakodyamaḥ //
analyzed: arocakaḥ vamiḥ śvāsaḥ sarvasmin rasa ge jvare rakta niṣṭhīvanam tṛṣṇā rūkṣa uṣṇam pīḍaka udyamaḥ

original: dāharāgabhramamadapralāpo raktasaṃśrite / tṛḍglāniḥ spṛṣṭavarcaskamantardāho bhramastamaḥ //
analyzed: dāha rāga bhrama mada pralāpaḥ rakta saṃśrite tṛṣ glāniḥ spṛṣṭa varcaskam antar dāhaḥ bhramaḥ tamaḥ

original: daurgandhyaṃ gātravikṣepo māṃsasthe medasi sthite / svedo 'titṛṣṇā vamanaṃ daurgandhyaṃ vā sahiṣṇutā //
analyzed: daurgandhyam gātra vikṣepaḥ māṃsa sthe medasi sthite

original: pralāpo glānirarucirasthige tvasthibhedanam / doṣapravṛttirudbodhaḥ śvāsāṃgakṣepakūjanam //
analyzed: pralāpaḥ glāniḥ aruciḥ asthi ge tu asthi bhedanam doṣa pravṛttiḥ udbodhaḥ śvāsa aṃga kṣepa kūjanam

original: antardāho bahiḥ śaityaṃ śvāso hikkā hi majjame / tamaso darśanaṃ marmacchedanaṃ stabdhameḍhratā //
analyzed: antar dāhaḥ bahis śaityam śvāsaḥ hikkā hi tamasaḥ darśanam marma chedanam stabdha meḍhra tā

original: śukrapravṛttau mṛtyustu jāyate śukrasaṃśraye / uttarottaraduḥ sādhyāḥ pañcānye tu viparyaye //
analyzed: śukra pravṛttau mṛtyuḥ tu jāyate śukra saṃśraye uttarottara duḥ sādhyāḥ pañca anye tu viparyaye

original: pralimpanniva gātrāṇi śleṣmaṇā gauraveṇa ca / mandajvarapralāpastu saśītaḥ syātpralepakaḥ //
analyzed: pralimpan iva gātrāṇi śleṣmaṇā gauraveṇa ca  manda jvara pralāpaḥ tu sa śītaḥ syāt pralepakaḥ

original: nityaṃ mandajvaro rūkṣaḥ śītakṛcchreṇa gacchati / stabdhāṅgaḥ śleṣmabhūyiṣṭho bhavedaṅgabalāśakaḥ //
analyzed: nityam manda jvaraḥ rūkṣaḥ śīta kṛcchreṇa gacchati stabdha aṅgaḥ śleṣma bhūyiṣṭhaḥ bhavet aṅga bala āśakaḥ

original: haridrābhedavarṇābhastadvallepaṃ pramehati / sa vai hāridrako nāma jvarabhedo 'ntakaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: haridrā bheda varṇa ābhaḥ tadvat lepam pramehati sa vai hāridrakaḥ nāma jvara bhedaḥ ntakaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: kaphavātau samau yatra hīnapittasya dehinaḥ / tīkṣṇo 'tha vā divā mando jāyate rātrijo jvaraḥ //
analyzed: kapha vātau samau yatra hīna pittasya dehinaḥ  tīkṣṇaḥ vā divā mandaḥ jāyate rātri jaḥ jvaraḥ

original: divākarārpitabale vyāyāmācca viśoṣite / śarīre niyataṃ vātājjvaraḥ syātpaurvarātrikaḥ //
analyzed: divākara arpita bale vyāyāmāt ca viśoṣite śarīre niyatam vātāt jvaraḥ syāt paurvarātrikaḥ

original: āmāśaye yadātmasthe śleṣmapitte hyadhaḥ sthite / tadardhaṃ śītalaṃ dehe hyardhaṃ coṣṇaṃ prajāyate //
analyzed: āmāśaye yat ātma sthe śleṣma pitte hi adhas sthite tad ardham śītalam dehe hi ardham ca uṣṇam prajāyate

original: kāye pittaṃ yadā nyastaṃ śleṣmā cānte vyavasthitaḥ / uṣṇatvaṃ tena dehasya śītatvaṃ karapādayoḥ //
analyzed: kāye pittam yadā nyastam śleṣmā ca ante vyavasthitaḥ uṣṇa tvam tena dehasya śīta tvam kara pādayoḥ

original: rasaraktāśrayaḥ sādhyo māṃsa medogataśca yaḥ / asthimajjāgataḥ kṛcchrastaistaiḥ svāṅgairhataprabhaḥ //
analyzed: rasa rakta āśrayaḥ sādhyaḥ māṃsa medaḥ gataḥ ca yaḥ asthi majjā gataḥ kṛcchraḥ taiḥ taiḥ sva aṅgaiḥ hata prabhaḥ

original: visaṃjño jravegārtaḥ sakrodha iva vīkṣate / sadoṣamuṣṇañca sadā śakṛnmuñcati vegavat //
analyzed: visaṃjñaḥ sa krodhaḥ iva vīkṣate sa doṣam uṣṇam ca sadā śakṛt muñcati vegavat

original: deho laghurvyapagataklamamohatāpaḥ pāko mukhe karaṇasauṣṭhavamavyathatvam / svedaḥ kṣuvaḥ prakṛtiyogimano 'nnalipsā kaṇḍūśca mūrdhni vigatjvaralakṣaṇāni //
analyzed: dehaḥ laghuḥ vyapagata klama moha tāpaḥ pākaḥ mukhe karaṇa sauṣṭhavam avyatha tvam svedaḥ kṣuvaḥ prakṛti yogi manaḥ nna lipsā kaṇḍūḥ ca mūrdhni vigat jvara lakṣaṇāni

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jvaranidānādikaṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe jvaranidānādikam nāma saptacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 148
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / athāto raktapittasya nidānaṃ pravadāmyaham / bhṛśoṣṇatiktakaṭvamlalavaṇādividāhibhiḥ //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca atha atas raktapittasya nidānam pravadāmi aham bhṛśa uṣṇa tikta kaṭu amla lavaṇa ādi vidāhibhiḥ

original: kodravoddālakaiścānyaistaduktairati sevitaiḥ / kupitaṃ paittikaiḥ pittaṃ dravaṃ raktañca mūrchati //
analyzed: kodrava uddālakaiḥ ca anyaiḥ tad uktaiḥ ati sevitaiḥ kupitam paittikaiḥ pittam dravam raktam ca mūrchati

original: tairmithastulyarūpatvamāgamya vyāpnuvaṃstanum / pittaraktasya vikṛteḥ saṃsargāddaṣaṇādapi //
analyzed: taiḥ mithas tulya rūpa tvam āgamya vyāpnuvan tanum  pittaraktasya vikṛteḥ saṃsargāt daṣaṇāt api

original: gandhavarṇānuvṛtteṣu raktena vyapadiśyate / prabhavatyasṛjaḥ sthānātplīhato yakṛtaśca saḥ //
analyzed: gandha varṇa anuvṛtteṣu raktena vyapadiśyate prabhavati asṛjaḥ sthānāt plīhataḥ yakṛtaḥ ca saḥ

original: śirogurutvamaruciḥ śītecchā dhūmako 'mlakaḥ / chardhitaśchardibai bhatsyaṃ kāsaḥ śvāso bhramaḥ klamaḥ //
analyzed: śiraḥ guru tvam aruciḥ śīta icchā dhūmakaḥ mlakaḥ chardhitaḥ bhatsyam kāsaḥ śvāsaḥ bhramaḥ klamaḥ

original: lohito na hito matsyagandhāsyātvañca vijvare / raktahāridraharitavarṇatā nayanādiṣu //
analyzed: lohitaḥ na hitaḥ vijvare rakta hāridra harita varṇa tā nayana ādiṣu

original: nīlalohita pītānāṃ varṇānāmavivecanam / svapne inmādadharmitvaṃ bhavatyasminbhaviṣyati //
analyzed: nīlalohita pītānām varṇānām avivecanam svapne bhavati asmin bhaviṣyati

original: urdhvaṃ nāsākṣikarṇāsyairmeḍhrayonigudairadhaḥ / kupitaṃ romakūpaiśca samastaistatpravartate //
analyzed: urdhvam nāsā akṣi karṇa āsyaiḥ meḍhra yoni gudaiḥ adhas kupitam romakūpaiḥ ca samastaiḥ tat pravartate

original: ūrdhvaṃ sādhyaṃ kaphādyasmāttadvirecanasādhitam / bahvauṣadhāni pittasya vireko hi varauṣadham //
analyzed: ūrdhvam sādhyam kaphāt yasmāt tat virecana sādhitam bahu auṣadhāni pittasya virekaḥ hi vara auṣadham

original: anubandhī kapho yatra tatra tasyāpi śuddhikṛt / kaṣāyāḥ svādavo yasya viśuddhau śleṣmalā hitāḥ //
analyzed: anubandhī kaphaḥ yatra tatra tasya api śuddhi kṛt kaṣāyāḥ svādavaḥ yasya viśuddhau śleṣmalāḥ hitāḥ

original: kaṭutiktakaṣāyā vā ye nisargātkaphāvahāḥ / adho yāpyañca nāyuṣmāṃstatpracchardanasādhakam //
analyzed: kaṭu tikta kaṣāyāḥ vā ye nisargāt kapha āvahāḥ adhas na āyuṣmān tat pracchardana sādhakam

original: alpauṣadhañca pittasya vamanaṃ nāvamauṣadham / anubandhi balaṃ yasya śāntapittanarasya ca //
analyzed: alpa auṣadham ca pittasya vamanam anubandhi balam yasya śānta pitta narasya ca

original: kaṣāyaśca hitastasya madhurā eva kevalam / kaphamārutasaṃspṛṣṭamasādhyamupanāmanam //
analyzed: kaṣāyaḥ ca hitaḥ tasya madhurāḥ eva kevalam kapha māruta saṃspṛṣṭam asādhyam upanāmanam

original: asahyaṃ pratilomatvādasādhyādauṣadhasya ca / na hi saṃśodhanaṃ kiñcidasya ca pratilominaḥ //
analyzed: asahyam pratiloma tvāt asādhyāt auṣadhasya ca na hi saṃśodhanam kiñcid asya ca pratilominaḥ

original: śodhanaṃ pratilomañca raktapitte 'bhisarjitam / evamevopaśamanaṃ saṃśodhanamiheṣyate //
analyzed: śodhanam pratilomam ca raktapitte bhisarjitam  evam eva upaśamanam saṃśodhanam iha iṣyate

original: saṃsṛṣṭeṣu hi doṣeṣu sarvathā chardanaṃ hitam / tatra doṣo 'tra gamanaṃ śivāstra iva lakṣyate //
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭeṣu hi doṣeṣu sarvathā chardanam hitam tatra gamanam śiva astraḥ iva lakṣyate

original: upadravāśca vikṛtiṃ phalatasteṣu sādhitam //
analyzed: upadravāḥ ca vikṛtim phalataḥ teṣu sādhitam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe raktapittanidānaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe raktapittanidānam nāma aṣṭacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 149
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / āśukārī yataḥ kāsaḥ sa evātaḥ pravakṣyate / pañca kāsāḥ smṛtā vātapittaśleṣmakṣatakṣayaiḥ //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca āśukārī yatas kāsaḥ saḥ eva atas pravakṣyate pañca kāsāḥ smṛtāḥ vāta pitta śleṣma kṣata kṣayaiḥ

original: kṣayāyopekṣitāḥ sarve balinaścottarottaram / teṣāṃ bhaviṣyatāṃ rūpaṃ kaṇṭhe kaṇḍūrarocakaḥ //
analyzed: kṣayāya upekṣitāḥ sarve balinaḥ ca uttarottaram teṣām bhaviṣyatām rūpam kaṇṭhe kaṇḍūḥ arocakaḥ

original: śuṣkakarṇāsyakaṇṭhatvaṃ tatrādhovihito 'nilaḥ / ūrdhvaṃ pravṛttaḥ prāpyo rastasminkaṇṭhe ca saṃsṛjan //
analyzed: śuṣka karṇa āsya kaṇṭha tvam tatra adhas vihitaḥ nilaḥ ūrdhvam pravṛttaḥ prāpyaḥ raḥ tasmin kaṇṭhe ca saṃsṛjan

original: śirāsrotāṃsi saṃpūrya tato 'ṅgānyutkṣipanti ca / kṣipannivākṣiṇī kliṣṭasvaraḥ pārśve ca pīḍayan //
analyzed: śirā srotāṃsi saṃpūrya tatas ṅgāni utkṣipanti ca kṣipan iva akṣiṇī kliṣṭa svaraḥ pārśve ca pīḍayan

original: pravartate savakreṇa bhinnakāṃsyopamadhvaniḥ / hṛtpārśveruśiraḥ śūlamohakṣobhasvarakṣayān //
analyzed: pravartate sa vakreṇa bhinna kāṃsya upama dhvaniḥ śūla moha kṣobha svara kṣayān

original: karoti śuṣkakāsañca mahāvegarujāsvanam / soṃgaharṣo kaphaṃ śuṣkaṃ kṛchrānmuktvālpatāṃ vrajet //
analyzed: karoti śuṣka kāsam ca mahā vega rujā svanam kapham śuṣkam kṛchrāt muktvā alpa tām vrajet

original: pittātpītākṣikatvaṃ ca tiktāsyatvaṃ jvaro bhramaḥ / pittāsṛgvamanaṃ tṛṣṇā vaisvaryaṃ dhūmako madaḥ //
analyzed: pittāt pīta ākṣika tvam ca tikta āsya tvam jvaraḥ bhramaḥ pitta asṛj vamanam tṛṣṇā vaisvaryam dhūmakaḥ madaḥ

original: pratataṃ kāsavege ca jyotiṣāmiva darśanam / kaphāduro 'lparuṅmūrdhi hṛdayaṃ stimite guru //
analyzed: pratatam kāsa vege ca jyotiṣām iva darśanam kaphāt uraḥ lpa ruj mūrdhi hṛdayam stimite guru

original: kaṇṭhe pralepamadajaṃ pīnasacchardyarocakāḥ / romaharṣo dhanasnigdhaṃśleṣmaṇāñca pravartanam //
analyzed: kaṇṭhe pralepa mada jam pīnasa chardi arocakāḥ roma harṣaḥ pravartanam

original: yuddhādyaiḥ sāhasaistaistaiḥ sevitairayathābalam / upasyantaḥ kṣato vāyuḥ pittenānugato balī //
analyzed: yuddha ādyaiḥ sāhasaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ sevitaiḥ ayathābalam kṣataḥ vāyuḥ pittena anugataḥ balī

original: kupitaḥ kurute kāsaṃ kaphaṃ tena saśoṇitam / pītaṃ śyāvañca śuṣkañca grathitaṃ kupitaṃ bahu //
analyzed: kupitaḥ kurute kāsam kapham tena sa śoṇitam pītam śyāvam ca śuṣkam ca grathitam kupitam bahu

original: ṣṭhīvetkaṇṭhena rujatā vibhinnenaiva corasā / sūcībhiriva tīkṣṇābhistudyamānena śūlinā //
analyzed: ṣṭhīvet kaṇṭhena rujatā vibhinnena eva ca urasā sūcībhiḥ iva tīkṣṇābhiḥ tudyamānena śūlinā

original: duḥ khasparśena śūlena bhedapīḍāhitāpinā / parvabhedajvaraśvāsatṛṣṇāvaisvaryakampavān //
analyzed: duḥ kha sparśena śūlena parva bheda jvara śvāsa tṛṣṇā vaisvarya kampavān

original: pārāvata ivotkūjanpārśvaśūlī tato 'sya ca / kaphādyairvamanaṃ paktibalavarṇañca hīyate //
analyzed: pārāvataḥ iva utkūjan pārśva śūlī ca  kapha ādyaiḥ vamanam hīyate

original: kṣīṇasya sāsṛṅmūtratvaṃ śvāsapṛṣṭakaṭigrahaḥ / ṣāyupradhānāḥ kupitā dhāvato rājayakṣmaṇaḥ //
analyzed: kṣīṇasya sa asṛj mūtra tvam śvāsa pṛṣṭa kaṭi grahaḥ ṣāyu pradhānāḥ kupitāḥ dhāvataḥ rājayakṣmaṇaḥ

original: karvanti yakṣmāyatane kāsaṃ ṣṭhīvatkaphaṃ tataḥ / pūtipūyopamaṃ vītaṃ miśraṃ haritalohitam //
analyzed: karvanti yakṣma āyatane kāsam ṣṭhīvat kapham tatas pūti pūya upamam vītam miśram harita lohitam

original: supyate tudyata iva hṛdayaṃ pacatīva ca / akasmāduṣṇaśītecchā bahvāśitvaṃ balakṣayaḥ //
analyzed: supyate tudyate iva hṛdayam pacati iva ca akasmāt uṣṇa śīta icchā bahu āśi tvam bala kṣayaḥ

original: snigdhaprasannavakratvaṃ śrīmaddarśananetratā / tato 'sya kṣayarūpāṇi sarvāṇyāvirbhavanti ca //
analyzed: snigdha prasanna vakra tvam śrīmat darśana netra tā kṣaya rūpāṇi sarvāṇi āvirbhavanti ca

original: ityeṣa kṣayajaḥ kāsa kṣīṇānāṃ dehanāśanaḥ / yāpyau vā balināṃ tadvatkṣatajo 'pi navau tu tau //
analyzed: iti eṣa kṣaya jaḥ kāsa kṣīṇānām deha nāśanaḥ yāpyau vā balinām navau tu tau

original: sidhyetāmapi sāmarthyātsādhyādau ca pṛthakkramaḥ / miśrā yāpyāśca ye sarve jarasaḥ sthavirasya ca //
analyzed: sidhyetām api sāmarthyāt sādhya ādau ca pṛthak kramaḥ miśrāḥ yāpyāḥ ca ye sarve jarasaḥ sthavirasya ca

original: kāsaśvāsakṣayacchardisvarasādādayo gadāḥ / bhavantyupekṣayā yasmāttasmāttāstvarayā jayet //
analyzed: kāsa śvāsa kṣaya chardi sva rasāda ādayaḥ gadāḥ bhavanti upekṣayā yasmāt tasmāt tāḥ tvarayā jayet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kāsanidānā nāmaikonapañcāśaduttaraśatatamodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma ekonapañcāśaduttaraśatatamaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 150
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / athātaḥ śvāsarogasya nidānaṃ pravadāmyaham / kāsavṛddhyā bhavecchvāsaḥ pūrvairvā doṣakopanaiḥ //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca atha atas śvāsa rogasya nidānam pravadāmi aham kāsa vṛddhyā bhavet śvāsaḥ pūrvaiḥ vā doṣa kopanaiḥ

original: āmātisāravamathuviṣapāṇḍujvarairapi / rajodhūmānilairmarmaghātādapi himāmbunā //
analyzed: āmātisāra vamathu viṣa pāṇḍu jvaraiḥ api rajaḥ dhūma anilaiḥ marma ghātāt api hima ambunā

original: kṣudrakastamakaśchinno mahānūrdhvaśca pañcamaḥ / kaphoparuddhagamanapavano viṣvagāsthitaḥ //
analyzed: kṣudrakaḥ tamakaḥ chinnaḥ mahān ūrdhvaḥ ca pañcamaḥ kapha uparuddha gamana pavanaḥ viṣvak āsthitaḥ

original: prāṇodakānnavāhīni duṣṭasrotāṃsi dūṣayan / uraḥ sthaḥ kurute śvāsamāmāśayasamudbhavam //
analyzed: prāṇa udaka anna vāhīni duṣṭa srotāṃsi dūṣayan uraḥ sthaḥ kurute śvāsam āmāśaya samudbhavam

original: prāgrūpaṃ tasya hṛtpārśvaśūlaṃ prāṇavilomatā / ānāhaḥ śaṅkhabhedaśca tatrāyāso 'tibhojanaiḥ //
analyzed: prāgrūpam tasya hṛd pārśva śūlam prāṇa viloma tā  ānāhaḥ śaṅkhabhedaḥ ca tatra āyāsaḥ ti bhojanaiḥ

original: preritaḥ prerayankṣudraṃ svayaṃ sa samalaṃ marut / pratilomaṃ śirā gacchedudīrya pavanaḥ kapham //
analyzed: preritaḥ prerayan kṣudram svayam sa sa malam marut pratilomam sirāḥ gacchet udīrya pavanaḥ kapham

original: parigṛhyaśirogrīvamuraḥ pārśve ca pīḍayan / kāsaṃ ghurghurakaṃ mohamarucimpīnasaṃ bhṛśam //
analyzed: parigṛhya śiraḥ grīvam uraḥ pārśve ca pīḍayan kāsam ghurghurakam moham arucim pīnasam bhṛśam

original: karoti tīvravegañca śvāsaṃ prāṇopatāpinam / pratāmyettasya vegenaṣṭhīvanānte kṣaṇaṃ sukhī //
analyzed: karoti tīvra vegam ca śvāsam prāṇa upatāpinam pratāmyet tasya vegena ṣṭhīvana ante kṣaṇam sukhī

original: kṛcchrācchayānaḥ śvasiti niṣaṇṇaḥ svāsthyamarhati / ucchritākṣo lalāṭena svidyatā bhṛśamārtimān //
analyzed: kṛcchrāt śayānaḥ śvasiti niṣaṇṇaḥ svāsthyam arhati ucchrita akṣaḥ lalāṭena svidyatā bhṛśam ārtimān

original: viśuṣkāsyo muhuḥ śvāsaḥ kāṅkṣatyuṣṇaṃ savepathuḥ / meghāmbuśītaprāgvātaiḥ śleṣmalaiśca vivardhate //
analyzed: viśuṣka āsyaḥ muhur śvāsaḥ kāṅkṣati uṣṇam sa vepathuḥ megha ambu śīta prāc vātaiḥ śleṣmalaiḥ ca vivardhate

original: sa yāpyastamakaḥ sādhyo narasya balino bhavet / jvaramūrchāvataḥ sītairna śāmyetprathamastu saḥ //
analyzed: sa yāpyaḥ tamakaḥ sādhyaḥ narasya balinaḥ bhavet jvara mūrchāvataḥ sītā aiḥ na śāmyet prathamaḥ tu saḥ

original: kāsaśvasitavacchīrṇamarmacchedarujārditaḥ / sasvedamūrchaḥ sānāho bastidāhavibodhavān //
analyzed: kāsa śvasita vat śīrṇa marma cheda rujā arditaḥ sa sveda mūrchaḥ sa ānāhaḥ vasti dāha vibodhavān

original: adhodṛṣṭiḥ śutākṣastu snihyadraktaikalocanaḥ / śuṣkāsyaḥ pralapandīno naṣṭacchāyo vicetanaḥ //
analyzed: adhas dṛṣṭiḥ snihyat rakta eka locanaḥ śuṣka āsyaḥ pralapan dīnaḥ naṣṭa chāyaḥ vicetanaḥ

original: mahātāmahatā dīno nādena śvasiti krathan / uddhūyamānaḥ saṃrabdho mattarṣabha ivāniśam //
analyzed: dīnaḥ nādena śvasiti uddhūyamānaḥ saṃrabdhaḥ matta ṛṣabhaḥ iva aniśam

original: pranaṣṭajñānavijñāno vibhrāntanayanānanaḥ / netre samākṣipanbaddhamūtravarcā viśīrṇavāk //
analyzed: pranaṣṭa jñāna vijñānaḥ vibhrānta nayana ānanaḥ netre samākṣipan baddha mūtra varcāḥ viśīrṇa vāc

original: śuṣkakaṇṭho muhuścaiva karṇaśaṅkhāśiro 'tiruk / yo dīrghamucchvasityūrdhvaṃ na ca pratyāharatyadhaḥ //
analyzed: śuṣka kaṇṭhaḥ muhur ca eva yaḥ dīrgham ucchvasiti ūrdhvam na ca pratyāharati adhas

original: śleṣmāvṛtamukhaśrotraḥ kruddhagandhavahārditaḥ / ūrdhvaṃ samīkṣate bhrāntamakṣiṇī paritaḥ kṣipan //
analyzed: śleṣma āvṛta mukha śrotraḥ kruddha gandhavaha arditaḥ ūrdhvam samīkṣate bhrāntam akṣiṇī paritas kṣipan

original: marmasu cchidyamāneṣu paridevī niruddhavāk / ete sidhyeyuravyaktāḥ vyaktāḥ prāṇaharā dhruvam //
analyzed: marmasu chidyamāneṣu paridevī niruddha vāc  ete sidhyeyuḥ avyaktāḥ vyaktāḥ prāṇa harāḥ dhruvam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śvāsanidānā nāma pañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma pañcāśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 151
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / hikrāroganidānañca vakṣye suśruta / tacchṛṇu / śvāsaikahetuḥ prāgrūpaṃ saṃkhyā prakṛtisaṃśrayā //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca hikrā roga nidānam ca vakṣye suśruta tat śṛṇu śvāsa eka hetuḥ prāgrūpam saṃkhyā prakṛti saṃśrayā

original: hikrā bhakṣyodbhavā kṣudrā yamalā mahatīti ca / gambhīrā ca maruttatra tvarayāyuktisevitaiḥ //
analyzed: hikrā bhakṣya udbhavā kṣudrā yamalā mahatī iti ca gambhīrā ca marut tatra tvarayā ayukti sevitaiḥ

original: rūkṣatīkṣṇakharāśāntairannapānaiḥ prapīḍitaḥ / karoti hikrāṃ śvasanaḥ mandaśabdāṃ kṣudhānugām //
analyzed: rūkṣa tīkṣṇa khara aśāntaiḥ anna pānaiḥ prapīḍitaḥ karoti hikrām śvasanaḥ manda śabdām kṣudhā anugām

original: samaṃ sandhyānnapānena yā prayāti ca sānnajā / āyāsātpavanaḥ kruddhaḥ kṣudrāṃ hikrāṃ pravartayet //
analyzed: samam sandhyā anna pānena yā prayāti ca sa anna jā āyāsāt pavanaḥ kruddhaḥ kṣudrām hikrām pravartayet

original: jatrumūlātparisṛtā mandavegavantī hi sā / vṛddhimāyāsato yāti bhuktamātre ca mārdabam //
analyzed: jatru mūlāt parisṛtā manda vegavantī hi sā  vṛddhim āyāsataḥ yāti bhukta mātre ca mārdabam

original: cireṇa yamalairvegairyā hikrā saṃpravartate / pariṇāmānmukhe vṛddhiṃ pariṇāme ca gacchati //
analyzed: cireṇa yamalaiḥ vegaiḥ yā hikrā saṃpravartate pariṇāmāt mukhe vṛddhim pariṇāme ca gacchati

original: kampayantī śiro grīvāṃ yamalāṃ tāṃ vinirdiśet / pralāpacchardyatīsāranetraviplutajṛmbhitā //
analyzed: kampayantī śiraḥ grīvām yamalām tām vinirdiśet pralāpa chardi atīsāra netra vipluta jṛmbhi tā

original: yamalā veginī hikrā pariṇāmavatī ca sā / dhvastabhrūśaṅkhayugmasya śrutiviplutacakṣuṣaḥ //
analyzed: yamalā veginī hikrā pariṇāmavatī ca sā  dhvasta bhrū śaṅkha yugmasya śruti vipluta cakṣuṣaḥ

original: stambhayantī tanuṃ vācaṃ smṛtiṃ saṃjñāṃ ca muñcatī / tudantī mārgamāṇasya kurvatī marmaghaṭṭanam //
analyzed: stambhayantī tanum vācam smṛtim saṃjñām ca muñcatī tudantī mārgamāṇasya kurvatī marma ghaṭṭanam

original: pṛṣṭhato namanaṃ sārṣyaṃ mahāhikrā pravartate / mahāśūlā mahāśabdā mahāvegā mahābalā //
analyzed: pṛṣṭhatas namanam sārṣyam mahāhikrā pravartate mahā śūlā mahā śabdā mahā vegā mahā balā

original: pakrāśayācca nābhervā pūrvavatsā pravartate //
analyzed: pakrāśayāt ca nābheḥ vā pūrvavat sā pravartate

original: tadrūpā sā mahatkuryāñjṛmbhaṇāṃ gaprasāraṇam / gambhīreṇa nidānena gambhīrā tu susādhayet //
analyzed: tad rūpā sā mahat kuryāt jṛmbhaṇām ga prasāraṇam  gambhīreṇa nidānena gambhīrā tu susādhayet

original: ādye dve varjayedanye sarvaliṅgāṃ ca veginīm / sarvasya saṃcitāmasya sthavirasya vyavāyinaḥ //
analyzed: ādye dve varjayet anye sarva liṅgām ca veginīm sarvasya saṃcita āmasya sthavirasya vyavāyinaḥ

original: vyādhibhiḥ kṣīṇadehasya bhaktacchedakṛśasya ca / sarve 'pi rogā nāśāya na tvevaṃ śāghrakāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: vyādhibhiḥ kṣīṇa dehasya bhakta cheda kṛśasya ca sarve rogāḥ nāśāya na tu evam śāghrakāriṇaḥ

original: hikrāśvāsau yathā tau hi mṛtyukāle kṛtālayau //
analyzed: hikrā śvāsau yathā tau hi mṛtyu kāle kṛta ālayau

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe hikrānidānā nāmaikapañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma ekapañcāśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 152
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / athāto yakṣmarogasya nidānaṃ pravadāmyaham / anekarogānugato bahurogapurogamaḥ //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca atha atas yakṣma rogasya nidānam pravadāmi aham aneka roga anugataḥ bahu roga purogamaḥ

original: rājayakṣmā kṣayaḥ śoṣo rogarāḍiti kathyate / nakṣatrāṇāṃ dvijānāñca rājño 'bhūdyadayaṃ purā //
analyzed: rājayakṣmā kṣayaḥ śoṣaḥ   iti kathyate nakṣatrāṇām dvijānām ca rājñaḥ bhūt yat ayam purā

original: yacca rājā ca yakṣmā ca rājayakṣmā tato mataḥ / dehauṣadhakṣayakṛteḥ kṣayastatsambhavācca saḥ //
analyzed: yat ca rājā ca yakṣmā ca rājayakṣmā tatas mataḥ deha auṣadha kṣaya kṛteḥ kṣayaḥ tad sambhavāt ca saḥ

original: rasādiśoṣaṇācchoṣo rogarāḍiti rājavat / sāhasaṃ vegasaṃrodhaḥ śukraujaḥ snehasaṃkṣayaḥ //
analyzed: rasa ādi śoṣaṇāt śoṣaḥ   iti rāja vat sāhasam vega saṃrodhaḥ śukra ojaḥ sneha saṃkṣayaḥ

original: annapānavidhityāgaścatvārastasyahetavaḥ / tairudīrṇo 'nilaḥ pittaṃ vyarthaṃ codīrya sarvataḥ //
analyzed: anna pāna vidhi tyāgaḥ catvāraḥ tasya hetavaḥ taiḥ udīrṇaḥ nilaḥ pittam vyartham ca udīrya sarvatas

original: śarirasandhimāviśya tāḥ śirāḥ pratipīḍayan / mukhāni srotasāṃ ruddhvā tathaivātivisṛjya vā //
analyzed: tāḥ sirāḥ pratipīḍayan mukhāni srotasām ruddhvā tathā eva ati visṛjya vā

original: madhyamūrdhvamadhastiryagavyathāṃ sañjanayeddhṛdaḥ / rūpaṃ bhaviṣyatastasya pratiśyāyo bhṛśaṃ jvaraḥ //
analyzed: madhyam ūrdhvam adhas tiryak avyathām sañjanayet hṛdaḥ  rūpam bhaviṣyataḥ tasya pratiśyāyaḥ bhṛśam jvaraḥ

original: praseko mukhamādhuryaṃ mārdavaṃ vahnide hayoḥ / laulyabhāvo 'nnapānādau śucāvaśucivīkṣaṇam //
analyzed: prasekaḥ mukha mādhuryam mārdavam vahni de hayoḥ  laulya bhāvaḥ nna pāna ādau śucau aśuci vīkṣaṇam

original: makṣikātṛṇakeśādipātaḥ prāyo 'nnapānayoḥ / hṛllāsaśchardirarucirasnāte 'pi balakṣayaḥ //
analyzed: makṣikā tṛṇa keśa ādi pātaḥ prāyas nna pānayoḥ hṛllāsaḥ chardiḥ aruciḥ asnāte bala kṣayaḥ

original: pāṇyoruvakṣaḥ pādāsyakukṣyakṣṇoratiśuklatā / bāhvoḥ pratodo jihvāyāḥ kāye baibhatsyadarśanam //
analyzed: pāṇi oru vakṣaḥ pāda āsya kukṣi akṣṇoḥ ati śukla tā bāhvoḥ pratodaḥ jihvāyāḥ kāye baibhatsya darśanam

original: strīmadyamāṃsapriyatā ghṛṇitā mūrdhaguṇṭhanam / nakhakeśāsthivṛddhiśca svapne cābhibhavo bhavet //
analyzed: strī madya māṃsa priya tā ghṛṇi tā mūrdha guṇṭhanam nakha keśa asthi vṛddhiḥ ca svapne ca abhibhavaḥ bhavet

original: patanaṃ kṛkalāsāhikapiśvāpadapakṣibhiḥ / keśāsthituṣabhasmāditarau samadhirohaṇam //
analyzed: patanam kṛkalāsa ahi kapi śvāpada pakṣibhiḥ keśa asthi tuṣa bhasma ādi tarau samadhirohaṇam

original: śūnyānāṃ grāmadeśānāṃ darśanaṃ śuṣyato 'mbhasaḥ / jyotirdivi davāgnīnāṃ jvalatāṃ ca mahīruhām //
analyzed: śūnyānām grāma deśānām darśanam śuṣyataḥ mbhasaḥ jyotiḥ divi dava agnīnām jvalatām ca mahīruhām

original: pīnasaśvāsakāsaṃ ca svaramūrdharujo 'ruciḥ / ūrdhvaniḥ śvāsasaṃśoṣāvadhaśchardiśca koṣṭhage //
analyzed: pīnasa śvāsa kāsam ca svara mūrdha rujaḥ ruciḥ ūrdhvaniḥ śvāsa saṃśoṣau adhas chardiḥ ca koṣṭha ge

original: sthite pārśve ca rugbodhe sandhisthe bhavati jvaraḥ / rūpāṇyaikādaśaitāni jāyante rājayakṣmaṇaḥ //
analyzed: sthite pārśve ca ruj bodhe sandhi sthe bhavati jvaraḥ rūpāṇi aikādaśa etāni jāyante rājayakṣmaṇaḥ

original: teṣāmupadravānvidyātkaṇṭhadhvaṃsakarī rujāḥ / jṛmbhāṅgamardaniṣṭhīvavahnimāndyāsyapūtitā //
analyzed: teṣām upadravān vidyāt kaṇṭha dhvaṃsa karīḥ rujāḥ jṛmbhā aṅgamarda niṣṭhīva vahni māndya āsya pūti tā

original: tatra vātācchiraḥ pārśvaśūlanaṃ sāṃgamardanam / kaṇṭharodhaḥ svarabhraṃśaḥ pittātpādāṃsapāṇiṣu //
analyzed: tatra vātāt śiraḥ pārśva śūlanam sa aṃga mardanam kaṇṭha rodhaḥ svara bhraṃśaḥ pittāt pāda aṃsa pāṇiṣu

original: dāho 'tisāro 'sṛk chardirmukhagandho jvaro madaḥ / kaphādarocakacchardikāsā ardhvāṃ gagauravam //
analyzed: dāhaḥ sṛj chardiḥ mukha gandhaḥ jvaraḥ madaḥ kaphāt arocaka chardi kāsāḥ ga gauravam

original: prasekaḥ pīnasaḥ śvāsaḥ svarabhedo 'lpavahnitā / doṣairmandānalatvena śothalepakapholbaṇaiḥ //
analyzed: prasekaḥ pīnasaḥ śvāsaḥ svarabhedaḥ lpa vahni tā  doṣaiḥ manda anala tvena śotha lepa kapha ulbaṇaiḥ

original: srotomukheṣu ruddheṣu dhātuṣu svalpakeṣu ca / vidāho manasaḥ sthāne bhavantyanye hyupadravāḥ //
analyzed: srotaḥ mukheṣu ruddheṣu dhātuṣu su alpakeṣu ca vidāhaḥ manasaḥ sthāne bhavanti anye hi upadravāḥ

original: pacyate koṣṭha evānnamamlayuktai rasairyutam / prāyo 'sya kṣayabhāgānāṃ naivānnaṃ cāṅgapuṣṭaye //
analyzed: pacyate koṣṭhe eva annam amla yuktaiḥ rasaiḥ yutam kṣaya bhāgānām na eva annam ca aṅga puṣṭaye

original: raso hyasya na raktāya māṃsāya kurute tu tat / upaṣṭabdhaḥ samantācca kevalaṃ vartate kṣayī //
analyzed: rasaḥ hi asya na raktāya māṃsāya kurute tu tat upaṣṭabdhaḥ samantāt ca kevalam vartate kṣayī

original: liṅgeṣvalpeṣvatikṣīṇaṃ vyādhau ṣaṭkaraṇakṣayam / varjayetsādhayedeva sarveṣvapi tato 'nyathā //
analyzed: liṅgeṣu alpeṣu ati kṣīṇam vyādhau ṣaṣ karaṇa kṣayam varjayet sādhayet eva sarveṣu api tatas nyathā

original: doṣairvyastaiḥ samastaiśca kṣayātsarvasya medasaḥ / svarabhedo bhavettasya kṣāmo rūkṣaścalaḥ svaraḥ //
analyzed: doṣaiḥ vyastaiḥ samastaiḥ ca kṣayāt sarvasya medasaḥ svarabhedaḥ bhavet tasya kṣāmaḥ rūkṣaḥ calaḥ svaraḥ

original: śukavarṇābhakaṇṭhatvaṃ snigdhoṣṇopaśamo 'nilāt / pittāttālugale dāhaḥ śoṣo bhavati santatam //
analyzed: śuka varṇa ābha kaṇṭha tvam snigdha uṣṇa upaśamaḥ nilāt pittāt tālu gale dāhaḥ śoṣaḥ bhavati santatam

original: limpanniva kaphaiḥ kaṇṭhaṃ mukhaṃ ghuraghurāyate / svayaṃ viruddhaiḥ sarvaistu sarvāliṅgaiḥ kṣayo bhavet //
analyzed: limpan iva kaphaiḥ kaṇṭham mukham ghuraghurāyate svayam viruddhaiḥ sarvaiḥ tu sarva aliṅgaiḥ kṣayaḥ bhavet

original: dhūmāyatīva cātyarthamudeti śleṣmalakṣaṇam / kṛcchrasādhyāḥ kṣayāścātra sarvairalpañca varjayet //
analyzed: dhūmāyati iva ca atyartham udeti śleṣma lakṣaṇam kṛcchra sādhyāḥ kṣayāḥ ca atra sarvaiḥ alpam ca varjayet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yakṣmanidānā nāma dvipañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma dvipañcāśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 153 / dhanvantarirudāca / arocakanidānte vakṣye 'haṃ suśrutādhunā / arocako bhaveddoṣairjihvāhṛdayasaṃśrayaiḥ //
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam   dhanvantariḥ udāca arocaka nidānte vakṣye haṃ suśrutaiḥ adhunā arocakaḥ bhavet doṣaiḥ jihvā hṛdaya saṃśrayaiḥ

original: sannipātena manasaḥ santāpena ca pañcamaḥ / kaṣāyatiktamadhuraṃ vātādiṣu mukhaṃ kramāt //
analyzed: sannipātena manasaḥ santāpena ca pañcamaḥ kaṣāya tikta madhuram vāta ādiṣu mukham kramāt

original: sarvaṃ vītarasaṃ śokakrodhādiṣu yathā manaḥ / chardidoṣaiḥ pṛthaksarvairduṣṭairanyaiśca pañcamaḥ //
analyzed: sarvam vīta rasam śoka krodha ādiṣu yathā manaḥ chardi doṣaiḥ pṛthak sarvaiḥ duṣṭaiḥ anyaiḥ ca pañcamaḥ

original: udāno 'dhikṛtāndoṣānsarvaṃ sandhyarhamasyati / āśu kleśo 'sya lāvaṇyaprasekārucayaḥ kramāt //
analyzed: udānaḥ dhi kṛtān doṣān sarvam sandhi arham asyati āśu lāvaṇya praseka arucayaḥ kramāt

original: nābhipṛṣṭhaṃ rujatyāśu pārśve cāhāramutkṣipet / tato vicchrinnalpālpakaṣāyaṃ phenilaṃ vamet //
analyzed: nābhi pṛṣṭham rujati āśu pārśve ca āhāram utkṣipet tatas phenilam vamet

original: śabdodgarayutaḥ kṛcchramanukṛcchreṇa vegavat / kāsāsyaśoṣakaṃ vātātsvarapīḍāsamanvitam //
analyzed: śabda udgara yutaḥ kṛcchram anu kṛcchreṇa vegavat kāsa āsya śoṣakam vātāt svara pīḍā samanvitam

original: pittātkṣārodakanibhaṃ dhūmraṃ haritapītakam / sāsṛgamlaṃ kaṭutiktaṃ tṛṇmūrchādāhapākavat //
analyzed: pittāt kṣāra udaka nibham dhūmram harita pītakam sa asṛj amlam kaṭu tiktam tṛṣ mūrchā dāha pākavat

original: kaphātsnigdhaṃ ghanaṃ pītaṃ śleṣmatastu samākṣikam / madhuraṃ lavaṇaṃ bhūri prasaktaṃ lomaharṣaṇam //
analyzed: kaphāt snigdham ghanam pītam śleṣmataḥ tu sa mākṣikam madhuram lavaṇam bhūri prasaktam loma harṣaṇam

original: makhaśvayathumādhuryatandrāhṛllāsakāsavān / sarvairliṅgaiḥ samāpannastyājyo bhavati sarvathā //
analyzed: makha śvayathu mādhurya tandrā hṛllāsa kāsavān sarvaiḥ liṅgaiḥ samāpannaḥ tyājyaḥ bhavati sarvathā

original: sarvaṃ yasya ca vidviṣṭaṃ darśanaśravaṇādibhiḥ / vātādinaiva saṃkruddhakṛmiduṣṭānnaje gade / śūlavepatuhṛllāso viśeṣātkṛmije bhavet //
analyzed: sarvam yasya ca vidviṣṭam darśana śravaṇa ādibhiḥ vāta ādinā eva saṃkruddha kṛmi duṣṭa anna je gade śūla vepatu hṛllāsaḥ viśeṣāt kṛmi je bhavet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe 'rocakanidānā nāma tripañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma tripañcāśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 154
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / hṛdrogādinidānaṃ te vakṣye 'haṃ suśrutādhunā / kṛmihṛdrogaliṅgaiśca smṛtāḥ pañca tu hṛdgatāḥ //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca hṛd roga ādi nidānam te vakṣye ham suśruta adhunā kṛmi hṛd roga liṅgaiḥ ca smṛtāḥ pañca tu hṛd gatāḥ

original: vātena śūnyātātyarthaṃ bhujyate rorudīti ca / bhidyate śuṣyate stabdhaṃ hṛdayaṃ śūnyatā bhramaḥ //
analyzed: vātena śūnyātā atyartham bhujyate rorudīti ca bhidyate śuṣyate stabdham hṛdayam śūnya tā bhramaḥ

original: akasmāddīnatā śoko bhayaṃ śabde 'saiṣṇutā / vepathurvepanānmohaḥ śvāsarodho 'lpanidratā //
analyzed: akasmāt dīna tā śokaḥ bhayam śabde sa aiṣṇu tā  vepathuḥ vepanāt mohaḥ śvāsa rodhaḥ lpanidra tā

original: pittāttṛṣṇā śramo dāho svedo 'mlakaphajaḥ kramaḥ / chardanaṃ hyamlapittasya dhūmakalpitako jvaraḥ //
analyzed: pittāt tṛṣṇā śramaḥ dāhaḥ svedaḥ mla kapha jaḥ kramaḥ chardanam hi amla pittasya dhūma kalpitakaḥ jvaraḥ

original: śleṣmaṇā hṛdayaṃ stabdhaṃ bhārikaṃ sāśmagarbhavat / kāsāsthisādaniṣṭhīvanidrālasyārucijvarāḥ //
analyzed: śleṣmaṇā hṛdayam stabdham bhārikam sa aśma garbha vat kāsa asthi sāda niṣṭhīva nidrā ālasya aruci jvarāḥ

original: hṛdroge hi tribhirdeṣaiḥ kṛmibhiḥ śyāvanetratā / tamaḥ praveśo hṛllāsaḥ śothaḥ kaṇḍūḥ kaphastrutiḥ //
analyzed: hṛd roge hi tribhiḥ deṣaiḥ kṛmibhiḥ śyāva netra tā tamaḥ praveśaḥ hṛllāsaḥ śothaḥ kaṇḍūḥ kaphaḥ trutiḥ

original: hṛdayaṃ satataṃ cātra krakaceneva dīryate / cikitsadāmayaṃ (raṃ)
analyzed: hṛdayam satatam ca atra krakacena iva dīryate cikitsa dāmayam raṃ

original: ghoraṃ tacchīghraṃ śīghramāriṇam //
analyzed: ghoram tat śīghram śīghra māriṇam

original: vātātpittātkaphāttṛṣṇā sannipātādbalakṣayaḥ / ṣaṣṭhī syādupasargācca vātapitte ca kāraṇam //
analyzed: vātāt pittāt kaphāt tṛṣṇā sannipātāt bala kṣayaḥ ṣaṣṭhī syāt upasargāt ca vāta pitte ca kāraṇam

original: sarveṣu tatprakopo hi samyagdhātupraśoṣaṇāt / sarvadehabhrāmotkampatāpahṛddāhamohakṛt //
analyzed: sarveṣu tad prakopaḥ hi samyak dhātu praśoṣaṇāt sarva deha bhrāma utkampa tāpa hṛd dāha moha kṛt

original: jihvāmūlagalaklomatālutoyavahāḥ śirāḥ / saṃśoṣya tṛṣṇā jāyante tāsāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: jihvā mūla gala kloma tālu toya vahāḥ sirāḥ saṃśoṣya tṛṣṇāḥ jāyante tāsām sāmānya lakṣaṇam

original: mukhaśoṣo jalātṛptirannadveṣaḥ svarakṣayaḥ / kaṇṭhoṣṭhatālukārkaśyājjihvāniṣkramaṇe klamaḥ //
analyzed: mukha śoṣaḥ jala atṛptiḥ anna dveṣaḥ svara kṣayaḥ kaṇṭha uṣṭha tālu kārkaśyāt jihvā niṣkramaṇe klamaḥ

original: pralāpaścittavibhraṃśo hyudgarāḍhyastathāmayaḥ / mārutātkṣāmatādainyaṃ śaṅkhabhe (to)
analyzed: pralāpaḥ citta vibhraṃśaḥ hi udgara āḍhyaḥ tathā āmayaḥ mārutāt kṣāma tā dainyam śaṅkha bhe

original: daḥ śiraubhramaḥ //
analyzed: daḥ śiraubhramaḥ

original: gandhājñānāsyavairasyaśrutinidrābalakṣayāḥ / śītāmlaphenavṛddhiśca pittānmūrchāsyatiktatā //
analyzed: gandha ajñāna āsya vairasya śruti nidrā bala kṣayāḥ śīta amla phena vṛddhiḥ ca pittāt mūrchā āsya tikta tā

original: raktekṣaṇatvaṃ satataṃ śoṣo dāho 'tidhūmakaḥ / kapho rasādvikupitastoyavāhiṣu mārutaḥ //
analyzed: rakta īkṣaṇa tvam satatam śoṣaḥ dāhaḥ ti dhūmakaḥ kaphaḥ rasāḥ dvi kupitaḥ toya vāhiṣu mārutaḥ

original: srotastu sakaphaṃ tena paṅkavacchoṣyate tataḥ / śūkairivācitaḥ kaṇṭho nidrā madhuravakratā //
analyzed: srotaḥ tu sa kapham tena paṅka vat śoṣyate tatas śūkaiḥ iva ācitaḥ kaṇṭhaḥ nidrā madhura vakra tā

original: ādhmānaṃ śiraso jāḍyaṃ staimityacchardyarocakam / ālasyamavipākañca yaḥ sa syātsarvalakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: ādhmānam śirasaḥ jāḍyam staimitya chardi arocakam ālasyam avipākam ca yaḥ sa syāt sarva lakṣaṇaḥ

original: āmodbhavācca raktasya saṃrodhādvātapittatā / uṣṇākrāntasya sahasā śītāmbho bhajatastṛṣā //
analyzed: āma udbhavāt ca raktasya saṃrodhāt vāta pitta tā  uṣṇa ākrāntasya sahasā śīta ambhaḥ bhajataḥ tṛṣā

original: uṣṇādūrdhvaṃ gataḥ koṣṭhaṃ kuryādvai pittajaivasā / yā ca pānātipānotthā tīkṣṇāgre snehapākajā //
analyzed: uṣṇāt ūrdhvam gataḥ koṣṭham kuryāt vai pitta jā evasā  yā ca pāna atipāna utthā tīkṣṇa agre sneha pāka jā

original: snigdhakaṭvamlalavaṇabhojanena kaphodbhavā / tṛṣṇārasakṣayoktena lakṣaṇena kṣayātmikā //
analyzed: snigdha kaṭu amla lavaṇa bhojanena kapha udbhavā tṛṣṇā rasa kṣaya uktena lakṣaṇena kṣaya ātmikā

original: śoṣamohajvarādyanyadīrgharogopasargataḥ / yā tṛṣṇā jāyate tīvrā sopasargātmikā smṛtā //
analyzed: śoṣa moha jvara ādi anya dīrgha roga upasargataḥ yā tṛṣṇā jāyate tīvrā sa upasarga ātmikā smṛtā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe āmlapittanidānā nāma catuḥ pañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nāma catuḥ pañcāśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 155
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / vakṣye madātyayādeśca nidānaṃ munibhāṣitam / tīkṣṇāmlarūkṣasūkṣmāmlavyavāyāsukaraṃ laghu //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca vakṣye madātyaya ādeḥ ca nidānam muni bhāṣitam tīkṣṇa amla rūkṣa sūkṣma amla vyavāya asukaram laghu

original: vikāśi viśadaṃ madyaṃ medaso 'smādviparyayaḥ / tīkṣṇodayāśca divyuktāścittopaplavino guṇāḥ //
analyzed: vikāśi viśadam madyam medasaḥ smāt viparyayaḥ tīkṣṇa udayāḥ ca divi uktāḥ citta upaplavinaḥ guṇāḥ

original: jīvitāntāḥ prajāyante viṣeṇotkarṣavartinā / tīkṣṇādibhirguṇairmadyaṃ māndyadīnojaso guṇān //
analyzed: jīvita antāḥ prajāyante viṣeṇa utkarṣa vartinā tīkṣṇa ādibhiḥ guṇaiḥ madyam guṇān

original: daśabhirguṇaiḥ saṃkṣomyaṃ ceto nayati cākriyam / ādye made dvitīye 'pi prama (mo)
analyzed: daśabhiḥ guṇaiḥ saṃkṣomyam cetaḥ nayati ca akriyam ādye made dvitīye

original: dāyatane sthitaḥ //
analyzed: dāyatane sthitaḥ

original: durvikalpahato mūḍhaḥ sukhamityabhimucyate / madhyamottamayoḥ sandhiṃ prāpya rājāsano madaḥ //
analyzed: durvikalpa hataḥ mūḍhaḥ sukham iti abhimucyate madhyama uttamayoḥ sandhim prāpya rāja āsanaḥ madaḥ

original: niraṅkuśa iva vyālo na kiñcinnācarettataḥ / iyaṃ bhūmiravācyānāṃ dauḥ śīlasyedamāspadam //
analyzed: niraṅkuśaḥ iva vyālaḥ na kiñcid nā ācaret tatas iyam bhūmiḥ avācyānām dauḥ śīlasya idam āspadam

original: eko 'yaṃ bahumārgāyāḥ durgar (ma)
analyzed: ekaḥ yam bahu mārgāyāḥ

original: terdarśakaḥ param / niśceṣṭaḥ sannavākśete tṛtīye 'tra made sthitaḥ //
analyzed: param niśceṣṭaḥ san avāk śete tṛtīye made sthitaḥ

original: maraṇādapi pāpātmā gataḥ pāpatarāṃ daśām / dharmādharmaṃ sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ mānānarthaṃ hitāhitam //
analyzed: maraṇāt api pāpa ātmā gataḥ pāpatarām daśām dharma adharmam sukham duḥ kham māna anartham hita ahitam

original: na veda śīkamohārtaṃ śoṣa (ka)
analyzed: na veda śīka moha ārtam śoṣa ka

original: mohādisaṃyutaḥ / sonmādabhramamūrchāyāṃ sāpasmāraḥ patatyadhaḥ //
analyzed: moha ādi saṃyutaḥ sa unmāda bhrama mūrchāyām sa apasmāraḥ patati adhas

original: nāti mādyanti balinaḥ kṛtāhārā mahāśanāḥ / vātātpittātkaphātsarvairbhavedrogo madātyayaḥ //
analyzed: na ati mādyanti balinaḥ kṛta āhārāḥ mahā aśanāḥ vātāt pittāt kaphāt sarvaiḥ bhavet rogaḥ madātyayaḥ

original: sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ teṣāṃ pramoho hṛdayavyathā / vibhedaṃ prasabhaṃ tṛṣṇā saumyo glānirjvaro 'ruciḥ //
analyzed: sāmānya lakṣaṇam teṣām pramohaḥ hṛdaya vyathā vibhedam prasabham tṛṣṇā saumyaḥ glāniḥ jvaraḥ ruciḥ

original: purovibandhastimiraṃ kāsaḥ śvāsaḥ prajāgaraḥ / svedo 'timātraṃ viṣṭambhaḥ śvayathuścittavibhramaḥ //
analyzed: puras vibandhaḥ timiram kāsaḥ śvāsaḥ prajāgaraḥ viṣṭambhaḥ śvayathuḥ citta vibhramaḥ

original: svapnenevābhibhavati na coktaśca sa bhāṣateḥ / pittāddāhajvaraḥ svedo moho nityaṃ ca vibhramaḥ //
analyzed: svapnena iva abhibhavati na ca uktaḥ ca sa pittāt dāha jvaraḥ svedaḥ mohaḥ nityam ca vibhramaḥ

original: śleṣmaṇaśchardirhṛllāso nidrā codaragauravam / sarvaje sarvaliṅgatvaṃ jñātvā madyaṃ pibettu yaḥ //
analyzed: śleṣmaṇaḥ chardiḥ hṛllāsaḥ nidrā ca udara gauravam sarvaje sarva liṅga tvam jñātvā madyam pibet tu yaḥ

original: sahasā ruciraṃ cānyataradhvaṃsakaśoṣiṇau / bhavetāṃ?mārutātkaṣṭādbhavetta sya viśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: sahasā ruciram ca anyatara dhvaṃsaka śoṣiṇau bhavetām mārutāt kaṣṭāt bhavet viśeṣataḥ

original: dhvaṃsakaśleṣmaniṣṭhivāḥ kaṇṭhaśoṣo 'tinidratā / śabdāsahatvaṃ taccittavikṣepo 'ṅge hi vātaruk //
analyzed: dhvaṃsaka śleṣma niṣṭhivāḥ kaṇṭha śoṣaḥ tinidra tā śabda asaha tvam tad citta vikṣepaḥ ṅge hi vāta ruj

original: hṛtkaṇṭharogaḥ saṃmohaḥ śvāsatṛṣṇāvamijvarāḥ / nivartedyastu madyebhyo jitātmā buddhipūrvakṛt //
analyzed: hṛd kaṇṭha rogaḥ saṃmohaḥ śvāsa tṛṣṇā vami jvarāḥ nivartet yaḥ tu madyebhyaḥ jita ātmā buddhi pūrva kṛt

original: vikāraiḥ kliśyate jātu na sa śarīramānasaḥ / rajomohahitāhārapāsya syustrayo gadāḥ //
analyzed: vikāraiḥ kliśyate jātu na sa śarīra mānasaḥ syuḥ trayaḥ gadāḥ

original: vasāsṛkkledanāvāhisrotorodhaḥ sudbhavāḥ / madamūrchāpasaṃnyāsā yathottarabalodbhavāḥ //
analyzed: vasā asṛj kledana āvāhi srotaḥ rodhaḥ mada mūrchā apasaṃnyāsāḥ yathottara bala udbhavāḥ

original: mado 'tra doṣaiḥ sarvaistu raktamadyaviṣairapi / śaktyānantyādgatābhāsaścalaśchalitaveṣṭitaḥ //
