analyzed: doṣaiḥ sarvaiḥ tu rakta madya viṣaiḥ api  śakti ānantyāt gata ābhāsaḥ calaḥ chalita veṣṭitaḥ

original: rūkṣaśyāmāruṇatanurmadye vātodbhave bhavet / pittena krodhano raktapītābhaḥ kalahapriyaḥ //
analyzed: rūkṣa śyāma aruṇa tanuḥ madye vāta udbhave bhavet pittena krodhanaḥ rakta pīta ābhaḥ kalaha priyaḥ

original: svapne 'sambaddhavākyādiḥ kaphāddhyānaparo hi saḥ / sarvotthasannipātena raktastambhāṅgadūṣaṇam //
analyzed: svapne sambaddha vākya ādiḥ kaphāt dhyāna paraḥ hi saḥ sarva uttha sannipātena rakta stambha aṅga dūṣaṇam

original: pittaliṅgatvamādyena vikṛtehā svarājñatā / visatkampotinidrā ca sarvebhyo 'bhyadhikaṃ śramaḥ //
analyzed: pitta liṅga tvam ādyena vikṛta īhā svara ajña tā ca sarvebhyaḥ bhyadhikam śramaḥ

original: lakṣayellakṣaṇotkarṣādvātādīñchoṇitādiṣu / aruṇaṃ nīlakṛṣṇaṃ vā sampraviśyanviśettamaḥ //
analyzed: lakṣayet lakṣaṇa utkarṣāt vāta ādīn śoṇita ādiṣu aruṇam nīla kṛṣṇam vā sampraviśyan viśet tamaḥ

original: śīghraṃ ca pratibudhyeta hṛtpīḍā vepathurbhramaḥ / kāsaḥ śyāvāruṇā cchāyā mūrchāyāṃ mārutātmakaḥ //
analyzed: śīghram ca pratibudhyeta hṛd pīḍā vepathuḥ bhramaḥ kāsaḥ śyāva aruṇā chāyā mūrchāyām māruta ātmakaḥ

original: pittena raktaṃ pītaṃ vā nabhaḥ paśyanviśettamaḥ / vibudhyeta ca sasvedo dāhatṛṣṇopapīḍitaḥ //
analyzed: pittena raktam pītam vā nabhaḥ paśyan viśet tamaḥ vibudhyeta ca sa svedaḥ dāha tṛṣṇā upapīḍitaḥ

analyzed: bhinna vat pīta nīla ābhaḥ rakta nīla ākula īkṣaṇaḥ kaphena megha saṃkāśam paśyati ākāśam āviśet

original: tamaścirācca budhye hṛduraḥ suprasekavān / gurubhistimitai (rai)
analyzed: tamaḥ cirāt ca hṛd uraḥ su prasekavān gurubhiḥ timitaiḥ

original: raṅge rājadharmāvabandhān (vat) //
analyzed: raṅge rāja dharma avabandhān vat

original: sarvākṛtistribhirdeṣairapasmāra ivāparaḥ / pātayatyāśu niśceṣṭaṃ vinā bībhatsaceṣṭitaiḥ //
analyzed: sarva ākṛtiḥ tribhiḥ deṣaiḥ apasmāraḥ iva aparaḥ pātayati āśu niśceṣṭam vinā bībhatsa ceṣṭitaiḥ

original: doṣaistu madamūrchāyāṃ kṛtavegeṣu dehinām / svayamevopaśāmyanti saṃnyāsenauṣadhairnivā //
analyzed: doṣaiḥ tu mada mūrchāyām kṛta vegeṣu dehinām svayam eva upaśāmyanti saṃnyāsena auṣadhaiḥ

original: vāgdehamanasāṃ ceṣṭāmākṣipyātibalābalāḥ / sasanyāsaṃ nipatitāḥ prāṇāghātanasaṃśrayāḥ //
analyzed: vāc deha manasām ceṣṭām ākṣipya ati balābalāḥ sa sanyāsam nipatitāḥ prāṇa āghātana saṃśrayāḥ

original: bhavanti tena puruṣāḥ kāṣṭhabhūtā mṛtopamāḥ / mriyeta śīghraṃ śīghraṃ ceccikitsā na prayujyate //

analyzed: agādhe grāha bahule salila oghe iva arṇave saṃnyāse vinimajjantam naram āśu nivartayet

original: madamānaroṣatoṣa pravṛttibhiritastataḥ / yuktāyuktaṃ ca samaṃ yuktiṃ yuṅkte na madyena //
analyzed: mada māna roṣa toṣa pravṛttibhiḥ itas tatas yukta ayuktam ca samam yuktim yuṅkte na madyena

original: balakāsadeśapātraṃ prakṛtisahatāmathavā vayāṃsi? / pravibhajjyāttanurūpaṃ pibati tataḥ pibatyamṛta //
analyzed: bala kāsa deśa pātram prakṛti saha tām athavā vayāṃsi pravibhajjyāt tanu rūpam pibati tatas pibati amṛta

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe madātyayādinidānaṃ nāma pañcapañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe madātyayādinidānam nāma pañcapañcāśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 156
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / athārśasāṃ nidānaṃ ca vyākhyāsyami ca suśruta / / sarvadā prāṇināṃ māṃse kīlakāḥ prabhavanti ye //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca atha arśasām nidānam ca vyākhyāsyami ca suśruta    sarvadā prāṇinām māṃse kīlakāḥ prabhavanti ye

original: arśāṃsi tasmāducyante gudamārganirodhanāt / doṣastvaṅmāṃsamedāṃsi sandūṣya vividhākṛtīn //
analyzed: arśāṃsi tasmāt ucyante guda mārga nirodhanāt  doṣaḥ tvac māṃsa medāṃsi san dūṣya vividha ākṛtīn

original: māṃsāṃkurānapānādau kurvantyarśāṃsi tāñjaguḥ / sahajanmāntarotthena bhedo dvedhā samāsataḥ //
analyzed: māṃsa aṃkurān apāna ādau kurvanti arśāṃsi tān jaguḥ saha janma antara utthena bhedaḥ dvedhā samāsatas

original: śuṣkāgrāvāvibhedāśca gudasthānānusaṃśrayāḥ / ardhapañcāṅgulistasmiṃstisro 'ghyardhāṅgulisthitāḥ //
analyzed: śuṣka agra avāvi bhedāḥ ca guda sthāna anusaṃśrayāḥ ardha pañca aṅguliḥ tasmin tisraḥ ghi ardha aṅguli sthitāḥ

original: bālyapravāhiṇī tāsāmantramadhye visarjinī / bāhyāsaṃvaraṇe tasyā gudādau bahiraṅgule //
sārdhāṅgulapramāṇena romāṇyatra tataḥ param / tatra hetuḥ sahotthānāṃ bālye bījopataptatā //
analyzed: sārdha aṅgula pramāṇena romāṇi atra tatas param tatra hetuḥ sahotthānām bālye bīja upatapta tā

original: arśasāṃ bījasṛṣṭistu mātāpitrapacārataḥ / devatānāṃ prakope hi sānnipātasya cānyataḥ //
analyzed: arśasām bīja sṛṣṭiḥ tu mātā pitṛ apacārataḥ devatānām prakope hi sānnipātasya ca anyatas

original: asādhyā evamākhyātāḥ sarve rogāḥ kulodbhavāḥ / sahajāni viśeṣeṇa rūkṣadurdarśanāni tu //
analyzed: asādhyāḥ evam ākhyātāḥ sarve rogāḥ kula udbhavāḥ sahajāni viśeṣeṇa rūkṣa durdarśanāni tu

original: antarmukhāni pāṇḍūni dāruṇopadravāṇi ca / yojyāni ca pṛthogdoṣasaṃsarganicayātsvataḥ //
analyzed: antar mukhāni pāṇḍūni dāruṇa upadravāṇi ca yojyāni ca pṛthā uddoṣa saṃsarga nicayāt svatas

original: agnau male 'tinicite punaścāyaṃ (ti)
analyzed: agnau male tinicite punar ca ayam ti

original: vyavāyataḥ / pānasaṃkṣobhaviṣamakaṭhinakṣudrakāśanāt //
analyzed: vyavāyataḥ pāna saṃkṣobha viṣama kaṭhina kṣudraka aśanāt

original: bastinetragalauṣṭhotthatalabhedādighaṭṭanāt / bhṛśaśītāmbusaṃsparśapratatātipravāhaṇāt //
analyzed: vasti netra gala oṣṭha uttha tala bheda ādi ghaṭṭanāt bhṛśa śīta ambu saṃsparśa pratata ati pravāhaṇāt

original: gatamūtraśakṛdvegadhāraṇāttadudīraṇāt / jugupsātīsārameva grahaṇī so 'pyupadravaḥ //
analyzed: gata mūtra śakṛt vega dhāraṇāt tad udīraṇāt jugupsā atīsāram eva grahaṇī sā u pi upadravaḥ

original: karṣaṇādviṣamādeścaceṣṭābhyo yoṣitāṃ punaḥ / āmagarbhaprapatanādgarbhavṛddhiprapīḍanāt //
analyzed: karṣaṇāt viṣama ādeḥ ca ceṣṭābhyaḥ yoṣitām punar āmagarbha prapatanāt garbha vṛddhi prapīḍanāt

analyzed: īdṛśaiḥ ca aparaiḥ vāyuḥ apānaḥ kupitaḥ male pāyoḥ valīṣu pūrṇa mūrtiṣu

original: jāyanter'śāṃsitu tatpūrvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vahnimandatā / viṣṭambhaḥ sāsthisadanaṃ piṇḍi (ṣṭa)
analyzed: tat pūrvam lakṣaṇam vahni manda tā viṣṭambhaḥ sa asthi sadanam

original: kodveṣṭanaṃ bhramaḥ //
analyzed: kā udveṣṭanam bhramaḥ

analyzed: sāndra utthaḥ netrayoḥ śothaḥ vā grahaḥ mārutaḥ puratas mūḍhaḥ prāyas nābheḥ adhas caran

original: prabhūtamūtramalpā viḍaśraddhā dhūmrakoṣṭhakaḥ / śiraḥ pṛṣṭhorasāṃ śūlamālasyaṃ bhinnavarcasam //
analyzed: prabhūta mūtram alpā viṣ aśraddhā dhūmra koṣṭhakaḥ śiraḥ pṛṣṭha urasām śūlam ālasyam bhinna varcasam

original: indriyārtheṣu laulyaṃ ca krodho duḥ khopacārataḥ / āśaṅkā grahaṇī śothaḥ pāṇḍugulmodareṣu ca //
analyzed: indriya artheṣu laulyam ca krodhaḥ duḥ kha upacārataḥ āśaṅkā grahaṇī śothaḥ pāṇḍu gulmodareṣu ca

original: etānyeva vivardhante jāteṣvahatanāmasu / nivartamāno māno hi tairadhomārgarodhataḥ //
analyzed: etāni eva vivardhante jāteṣu ahata nāmasu nivartamānaḥ mānaḥ hi taiḥ adhas mārga rodhataḥ

original: kṣobhayedanilānanyān sarvendriyaśarīgān / tathā mūtraśakṛtpittakaphānvāyuśca śoṣayan //
analyzed: kṣobhayet anilān anyān sarva indriya śarīgān  tathā mūtra śakṛt pitta kaphān vāyuḥ ca śoṣayan

original: muṣṇātyagniṃ tataḥ sarve bhavanti prāyaśor'śasaḥ / kṛśo bhṛśaṃ hatotsāho dīnaḥ kṣāmo 'tha niṣprabhaḥ //
analyzed: muṣṇāti agnim tatas sarve bhavanti prāyaśas ūrśasaḥ kṛśaḥ bhṛśam hata utsāhaḥ dīnaḥ niṣprabhaḥ

original: asārī vigatacchāyo jantudagdha ivadruma / kṛcchrairugradravairgrasto yakṣmoktairmarmapīḍanaiḥ //
analyzed: asārī vigata chāyaḥ jantu dagdhaḥ iva druma kṛcchraiḥ ugra dravaiḥ grastaḥ yakṣma uktaiḥ marma pīḍanaiḥ

original: tathā kāśapipāsāsyavairasyaśvāsapīnasaiḥ / klamāṅgabhaṅgavamathukṣavathuśvayathujvaraiḥ //
analyzed: tathā kāśa pipāsā āsya vairasya śvāsa pīnasaiḥ klama aṅga bhaṅga vamathu kṣavathu śvayathu jvaraiḥ

original: klaibyabādhiryastaimityaśarkarāparipīḍitaḥ / kṣāmo bhinnasvaro dhyāyanmuhuḥ ṣṭhīvannarocakī //
analyzed: klaibya bādhirya staimitya śarkarā paripīḍitaḥ kṣāmaḥ bhinna svaraḥ dhyāyan muhur ṣṭhīvan arocakī

original: sarvaparvāsthihṛnnābhīpāyuvaṅkṣaṇaśūlavān / gudenastravatā pittaṃ balākodarasannibham //
analyzed: sarva parva asthi hṛd nābhī pāyu vaṅkṣaṇa śūlavān gudena astravatā pittam balākā udara sannibham

original: viśuṣkaṃ caiva muktāgraṃ pakvāmaṃ cāntarāntaram / pāṇḍupittaṃ haridrāktaṃ picchilaṃ copaveśyate //
analyzed: viśuṣkam ca eva mukta agram pakva āmam ca antara antaram pāṇḍu pittam haridrā aktam picchilam ca upaveśyate

original: gudāṅkurā bahvanilāḥ śuṣkāścimacimānvitāḥ / pīnāṅgārāruṇāḥ stabdhā viṣamāḥ paruṣākarāḥ //
analyzed: gudāṅkurāḥ bahu anilāḥ śuṣkāḥ cimacima anvitāḥ pīna aṅgāra aruṇāḥ stabdhāḥ viṣamāḥ paruṣa ākarāḥ

original: mitho visadṛśa vakrāstīkṣṇā visphuṭi(ri) tānanāḥ / śimbīkharjṛrakarkandhūkārpāsaphalasannibhāḥ //
analyzed: mithas śimbī kharjṛra karkandhū kārpāsa phala sannibhāḥ

original: kecitkadambapuṣpābhāḥ kecitsiddhārthakopamāḥ / śiraḥ pārśvāṃsajaṅghoruvaṅkṣaṇādyadhikavyathāḥ //
analyzed: kecid kadamba puṣpa ābhāḥ kecid siddhārthaka upamāḥ śiraḥ pārśva aṃsa jaṅghā ūru vaṅkṣaṇa ādi adhika vyathāḥ

original: kṣavathūdgāraviṣṭambhahṛdgahārocakapradāḥ / kāsaśvāsāgnivaiṣamyakarṇanādabhramāvahāḥ //
analyzed: kṣavathu udgāra viṣṭambha hṛd gaha arocaka pradāḥ kāsa śvāsa agni vaiṣamya karṇa nāda bhrama āvahāḥ

original: tairārto grathitaṃ stokaṃ saśabdaṃ sapravāhikam / rukphenapicchānugataṃ vibaddhamupaveśyate //
analyzed: taiḥ ārtaḥ grathitam stokam sa śabdam sa pravāhikam ruj phena picchā anugatam vibaddham upaveśyate

original: kṛṣṇatvagbaddhaviṇmūtranetravaktraśca jāyate / gulmaplīhodarāṣṭhīlāsaṃbhavastasya caiva hi //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa tvac baddha viṣ mūtra netra vaktraḥ ca jāyate gulma plīhodara aṣṭhīlā saṃbhavaḥ tasya ca eva hi

original: pittottarā nīlamukhā raktapītāsitaprabhāḥ / tanvagrastrāviṇo viśrāstanavo mṛdavaḥ ślathāḥ //
analyzed: pitta uttarāḥ nīla mukhāḥ rakta pīta asita prabhāḥ tanu agra strāviṇaḥ mṛdavaḥ ślathāḥ

original: śukajihvā yakṛtkhaṇḍajalaukāvaktrasannibhāḥ / dāhaśo (ṣa) kajvarasvedatṛṇmūrchārucimohadāḥ //
analyzed: śuka jihvāḥ yakṛt khaṇḍa jalaukā vaktra sannibhāḥ

original: soṣmāṇo dravanīloṣṇapītaraktāmavarcasaḥ / yavamadhyā haritpītahāridratvaṅnakhādayaḥ //
analyzed: sa ūṣmāṇaḥ drava nīla uṣṇa pīta rakta āma varcasaḥ yava madhyāḥ harit pīta hāridra tvac nakha ādayaḥ

original: śleṣmolbaṇā mahāmūlā ghanā mandarujaḥ sitāḥ / utsannopacitasnigdhastabdhavṛttagurusthirāḥ //
analyzed: śleṣma ulbaṇāḥ mahā mūlāḥ ghanāḥ manda rujaḥ sitāḥ utsanna upacita snigdha stabdha vṛtta guru sthirāḥ

original: picchilāḥ stimitāḥ ślakṣṇāḥ kaṇḍvāḍhyāḥ sparśanapriyāḥ / karīrapanasāsthyābhāstathā gostanasannibhāḥ //
analyzed: picchilāḥ stimitāḥ ślakṣṇāḥ kaṇḍva āḍhyāḥ sparśana priyāḥ karīra panasa asthi ābhāḥ tathā gostana sannibhāḥ

original: vaṅkṣaṇānāhinaḥ puyubastinābhivikartanāḥ / sakāśaśvāsahṛllāsaprasekārucipīnasāḥ //
analyzed: vaṅkṣaṇa ānāhinaḥ puyu vasti nābhi vikartanāḥ sakāśa śvāsa hṛllāsa praseka aruci pīnasāḥ

original: mahakṛcchraśirojāḍyaśiśirakṣārakāriṇaḥ / klaibyāgnimārdavacchardyatīsārādivikāradāḥ //
vasābhasakaphaprājyapurīṣāsṛkpravāhikāḥ / na stravanti na bhidyante pāṇḍusnigdhatvagādayaḥ //
analyzed: vasā ābha sa kapha prājya purīṣa asṛj pravāhikāḥ na stravanti na bhidyante pāṇḍu snigdha tvac ādayaḥ

original: saṃsṛṣṭaliṅgat saṃsarganicayātsarvalakṣaṇāḥ / raktolbaṇā gude kīlāḥ pītākṛtisamanvitāḥ //
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭa liṅgat saṃsarga nicayāt sarva lakṣaṇāḥ rakta ulbaṇāḥ gude kīlāḥ pīta ākṛti samanvitāḥ

original: vaṭaprasehasadṛśāḥ guñjāvidrumasannibhāḥ / te 'tyarthaṃ duṣṭamuṣṇaṃ ca gāḍhaviṣṭaṃbhapīḍitāḥ //
analyzed: vaṭa praseha sadṛśāḥ guñjā vidruma sannibhāḥ te tyartham duṣṭam uṣṇam ca gāḍha viṣṭaṃbha pīḍitāḥ

original: stravanti sahasā raktaṃ tasya cātipravṛttitaḥ / kekābhaḥ pīḍyate duḥ khaiḥ śoṇitakṣayasambhavaiḥ //
analyzed: stravanti sahasā raktam tasya ca atipravṛttitaḥ kekā ābhaḥ pīḍyate duḥ khaiḥ śoṇita kṣaya sambhavaiḥ

original: hīnavarṇabalotsāho hataujāḥ kaluṣendriyaḥ / mudgakodravajaṃbīrakarīracaṇakādibhiḥ //
analyzed: hīna varṇa bala utsāhaḥ hata ojāḥ kaluṣa indriyaḥ mudga kodrava jaṃbīra karīra caṇaka ādibhiḥ

original: rūkṣaiḥ saṃgrāhibhirvāyurviṭsthāne kupito balī / adhovahāni srotāṃsi saṃrudhyādhaḥ praśoṣayan //
analyzed: rūkṣaiḥ saṃgrāhibhiḥ vāyuḥ viṣ sthāne kupitaḥ balī adhas vahāni srotāṃsi saṃrudhya adhas praśoṣayan

original: purīṣaṃ vātaviṣṇūtrasaṃgaṃ kurvīta dāruṇam? / tena tīvrā rujā koṣṭhapṛṣṭhahṛtpārśvagā bhavet //
analyzed: purīṣam kurvīta dāruṇam tena tīvrā rujā koṣṭha pṛṣṭha hṛd pārśva gā bhavet

original: ādhmānamudare viṣṭhā hṛllāsaparikartane / bastau ca sutarāṃ śūlo gaṇḍaśvayathusaṃbhavaḥ //
analyzed: ādhmānam udare viṣṭhā hṛllāsa parikartane vastau ca sutarām śūlaḥ gaṇḍa śvayathu saṃbhavaḥ

original: pavanasyordhvagāmitvāttataśchardyarucijvarāḥ / hṛdrogagrahaṇīdoṣamūtrasaṃgapravāhikāḥ //
analyzed: pavanasya ūrdhva gāmi tvāt tatas chardi aruci jvarāḥ hṛd roga grahaṇī doṣa mūtra saṃga pravāhikāḥ

original: bādhiryātiśiraḥ śvāsaśirorukkāśapīnasāḥ? / manovikārastṛṭśvāsapittagulmodarādayaḥ //
analyzed: bādhirya atiśiraḥ śvāsa śiraḥ ruj kāśa pīnasāḥ manaḥ vikāraḥ tṛṣ śvāsa pitta gulmodara ādayaḥ

original: ete ca vātajā rogā jāyante bhṛśadāruṇāḥ / durnāmāmṛtyūdāvartaparamo 'yamupadravaḥ //
analyzed: ete ca vāta jāḥ rogāḥ jāyante bhṛśa dāruṇāḥ durnāma amṛtyu udāvarta paramaḥ yam upadravaḥ

original: vātābhibhūtakoṣṭhānāṃ tairvināpi vijāyate / sahajāni tu doṣāṇi yāni cābhyantare valau //
analyzed: vāta abhibhūta koṣṭhānām taiḥ vinā api vijāyate sahajāni tu doṣāṇi yāni ca abhyantare valau

original: sthitāni tānyasādhyāni yāpyante 'gnibalādibhiḥ / dvandvajāni dvitīyāyāṃ valā yānyāśritāni ca //
analyzed: sthitāni tāni asādhyāni yāpyante gni bala ādibhiḥ dvandva jāni dvitīyāyām valā yāni āśritāni ca

original: kṛcchrasādhyāni tānyāhuḥ parisaṃvatsarāṇi ca / bāhyāyāṃ tu valau jātānyekadoṣolbaṇāni ca //
analyzed: kṛcchra sādhyāni tāni āhuḥ parisaṃvatsarāṇi ca  bāhyāyām tu valau jātāni eka doṣa ulbaṇāni ca

original: arśāṃsi sukhasādhyāni na cirotpattikāni ca / meḍhrādiṣvapi vakṣyante yathāsvaṃ nābhijāni tu //
analyzed: arśāṃsi sukha sādhyāni na cira utpattikāni ca meḍhra ādiṣu api vakṣyante yathāsvam nābhi jāni tu

original: gaṇḍūpadasya rūpāṇi picchilāni mṛdūni ca / vyāno gṛhītvā śleṣmāṇaṃ karotyarśastvaco bahiḥ //
analyzed: gaṇḍūpadasya rūpāṇi picchilāni mṛdūni ca  vyānaḥ gṛhītvā śleṣmāṇam karoti arśaḥ tvacaḥ bahis

original: kīlopamaṃ sthirakharaṃ carmakīlaṃ ca tadviduḥ / vātena todaḥ pāruṣyaṃ pittādasitavaktratā //
analyzed: kīla upamam sthira kharam carmakīlam ca tat viduḥ vātena todaḥ pāruṣyam pittāt asita vaktra tā

original: śleṣmaṇaḥ snigdhatā tasya grathitatvaṃ savarṇatā / arśasāṃ praśame yatnamāśu kurvīta buddhimān / tānyāśu hi gadandhā (kār)
analyzed: śleṣmaṇaḥ snigdha tā tasya grathita tvam savarṇa tā  arśasām praśame yatnam āśu kurvīta buddhimān tāni āśu hi

original: yya kuryurbaddhagudodaram //
analyzed: kuryuḥ baddha guda udaram

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍer'śonidānā nāma ṣaṭpañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍerśonidānā nāma ṣaṭpañcāśaduttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 157
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / atīsāragrahaṇyośca nidānaṃ vacmi suśruta / doṣairvyastaiḥ samastaiśca bhayācchokācca ṣaḍvidhaḥ //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca atīsāra grahaṇyoḥ ca nidānam vacmi suśruta doṣaiḥ vyastaiḥ samastaiḥ ca bhayāt śokāt ca ṣaḍvidhaḥ

original: atīsāraḥ sa sutarāṃ jāyate 'tyambupānataḥ / viśuṣkānnavasāsnehatilapiṣṭavirūḍhakaiḥ //
analyzed: atīsāraḥ sa sutarām jāyate viśuṣka anna vasā sneha tila piṣṭa virūḍhakaiḥ

original: madyarūkṣātimātrādirasātisnehavibhramāt / kṛmighoṣavirodhācca tadvidheḥ kupitānilaḥ //
analyzed: madya rūkṣa atimātra ādi rasa atisneha vibhramāt kṛmi ghoṣa virodhāt ca tad vidheḥ kupita anilaḥ

original: vistraṃsayatyadhovātaṃ hatvā tenaiva cānalam / vyāpāryānnaśakṛtkoṣṭhapurīṣadravatādayaḥ //
analyzed: vistraṃsayati adhovātam hatvā tena eva ca analam vyāpārya anna śakṛt koṣṭha purīṣa drava tā ādayaḥ

original: prakalpate 'tīsārasya lakṣaṇaṃ tasya bhāvinaḥ / bhedo hṛdgudakoṣṭheṣu gātrasvedo malagrahaḥ //
analyzed: prakalpate tīsārasya lakṣaṇam tasya bhāvinaḥ bhedaḥ hṛd guda koṣṭheṣu gātra svedaḥ mala grahaḥ

original: ādhmānamavipākaśca tatra vātena vijvaram / alpālpaṃ śabdaśūnyāḍhyaṃ viru (ba)
analyzed: ādhmānam avipākaḥ ca tatra vātena vijvaram alpa alpam śabda śūnya āḍhyam

original: ddhamupaveśyate //
analyzed: ddham upaveśyate

original: rūkṣaṃ saphenamacchaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ va muhurmuhuḥ / tathādagdhagadābhāsaṃ picchilaṃ parikartayan //
analyzed: rūkṣam sa phenam accham ca gṛhītam muhur muhur tathā ādagdha gadā ābhāsam picchilam parikartayan

original: saśuṣkabhraṣṭapāyuśca hṛṣṭaromā viniśvasan / pittena pītamaśitaṃ hāridraṃ śādvalaprabham //
analyzed: sa śuṣka bhraṣṭa pāyuḥ ca hṛṣṭa romā viniśvasan pittena pītam aśitam hāridram śādvala prabham

original: saraktamatidurgandhaṃ tṛṇmūrchāsvedadāhavān / saśūlapāyusantāpapākavāñchleṣmaṇā ghanam //
analyzed: sa raktam ati durgandham tṛṣ mūrchā sveda dāhavān sa śūla pāyu santāpa pākavān śleṣmaṇā ghanam

original: picchilaṃ tatrānusāramalpālpaṃ sapravāhikam / saromaharpaḥ sekleśo gurubastigudodaraḥ //
analyzed: picchilam tatra anusāram alpa alpam sa pravāhikam sa roma harpaḥ guru vasti guda udaraḥ

original: kṛte 'pyakṛtasaṅgaśca sarvātmā sarvalakṣaṇaḥ / bhayena kṣubhite citte śāyite drāvayetsa (ccha) kṛt //
analyzed: kṛte pi akṛta saṅgaḥ ca sarvātmā sarva lakṣaṇaḥ bhayena kṣubhite citte śāyite drāvayet sa ccha kṛt

original: vāyustato nivāryeta kṣipramuṣṇaṃ dravaṃ plavam / vātapitte samaṃ liṅgamāhustadvacca śokataḥ //
analyzed: vāyuḥ tatas nivāryeta kṣipram uṣṇam dravam plavam vāta pitte samam liṅgam āhuḥ tadvat ca śokataḥ

original: atīsāraḥ samāsena dvedhā sāmo nirāmakaḥ / sāsṛgjātaṃ rasadrogo gauravādapsu muñcati? / śakṛddurgandhamāṭopaviṣṭambhārtiprasekinaḥ //
analyzed: atīsāraḥ samāsena dvedhā sāmaḥ nirāmakaḥ sa asṛj jātam gauravāt apsu muñcati śakṛt durgandham āṭopa viṣṭambha ārti prasekinaḥ

original: viparīto nirāmastu kaphātko 'pi na majjati / atīsāreṣu yo nāti yatnavān grahaṇīgadaḥ //
analyzed: viparītaḥ nirāmaḥ tu kaphāt kaḥ pi na majjati atīsāreṣu yaḥ na ati yatnavān grahaṇī gadaḥ

original: tasya syādagninirvāṇakāryairatyarthasañcitaiḥ / sāmaṃ śakṛnnirāmaṃ vā jīrṇaṃ yenātisāryate //
analyzed: tasya syāt agni nirvāṇa kāryaiḥ atyartha sañcitaiḥ sāmam śakṛt nirāmam vā jīrṇam yena atisāryate

original: so 'tisāro 'tisaraṇā dāśukārīḥ svabhāvataḥ / sāmaṃśīrṇamajīrṇena jīrṇe pakvaṃ tu naiva ca //
analyzed: saḥ tisāraḥ tisaraṇāḥ dāśukārīḥ svabhāvataḥ

original: cirakṛd grahaṇīdoṣaḥ sañcayāṃścopaveśayet / akasmādvārasurvedhamakasmātsandhinīmuhuḥ? / sa caturdhā pṛthagdoṣaiḥ sannipātācca jāyate //
analyzed: cira kṛt grahaṇī doṣaḥ sañcayān ca upaveśayet akasmāt vārasuḥ vedham akasmāt sandhinī muhur  sa caturdhā pṛthak doṣaiḥ sannipātāt ca jāyate

original: prāgrūpāṅgasya sadanaṃ cirātpavana alpakaḥ / praseko vaktravairasyamarucistṛṭśramobhramaḥ //
analyzed: prāgrūpa aṅgasya sadanam cirāt pavana alpakaḥ prasekaḥ vaktra vairasyam aruciḥ tṛṣ śramaḥ bhramaḥ

original: āba (na) ddhodaratā chardiḥ karṇake 'pyanukūjakam / sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ kārśyaṃ vamaka stamako jvaraḥ //
analyzed: chardiḥ karṇake pi anukūjakam  sāmānya lakṣaṇam kārśyam jvaraḥ

original: mūrchā śiroruviṣṭambhaḥ śvayathuḥ karapādayoḥ / tandrānilāttāluśoṣastimiraṃ karṇayoḥ svanaḥ //
analyzed: mūrchā sirā ūru viṣṭambhaḥ śvayathuḥ kara pādayoḥ tandrā anilāt tāluśoṣaḥ timiram karṇayoḥ svanaḥ

original: pārśvoruvaṅkṣaṇagrīvārujā tīkṣṇaviṣūcikā / rugṇeṣu vṛddhiḥ sarvaṣu kṣuttṛṣṇāparihartrikā //
analyzed: pārśva ūru vaṅkṣaṇa grīvā rujā tīkṣṇa viṣūcikā rugṇeṣu vṛddhiḥ sarvaṣu kṣudh tṛṣṇā parihartrikā

original: jīrṇejīryati cādhmānaṃ bhukte svāsthyaṃ samaśnute / vātāddhṛdrogagulmārśaḥplīhapāṇḍuraśaṅkitāḥ //
analyzed: jīrṇe jīryati ca ādhmānam bhukte svāsthyam samaśnute vātāt hṛd roga gulma arśaḥ plīha pāṇḍura śaṅkitāḥ

original: cirādduḥ khaṃ dravaṃ śuṣkaṃ tundāraṃ śabdaphenavat / punaḥ punaḥ sṛjedvarcaṃ pāyurucchvāsakāsavān //
analyzed: cirāt dus kham dravam śuṣkam tundāram śabda phenavat  punar punar sṛjet varcam pāyuḥ ucchvāsa kāsavān

original: pītena pītanīlābhaṃ pītābhaṃ sṛjati dravam / pūtyamlodgārahṛtkaṇṭhadāhārucitṛḍarditaḥ //
analyzed: pītena pīta nīla ābham pīta ābham sṛjati dravam pūti amla udgāra hṛd kaṇṭha dāha aruci tṛṣ arditaḥ

original: śleṣmaṇā pacyate duḥkhe manaśchardirarocakaḥ / āsyopadāhaniṣṭhīvakāsahṛllāsapīnasāḥ //
analyzed: śleṣmaṇā pacyate duḥkhe manaḥ chardiḥ arocakaḥ āsya upadāha niṣṭhīva kāsa hṛllāsa pīnasāḥ

original: hṛdayaṃ manyate styānamudaraṃ stimitaṃ guru / udgāro duṣṭamadhuraḥ sadanaṃ sapraharṣaṇam //
analyzed: hṛdayam manyate styānam udaram stimitam guru udgāraḥ duṣṭa madhuraḥ sadanam sa praharṣaṇam

original: sambhinnaśleṣmasaṃśliṣṭagurucāmlaiḥ (varcaḥ)
pravartacam / akṛśasyāpi daurbalyaṃ sarvaje sarvadarśanam //
analyzed: a kṛśasya api daurbalyam sarvaje sarva darśanam

original: vibhāge 'ṅgasya ye proktā pipāsādyāstrayo malāḥ / te 'pyasya grahaṇīdoṣāḥ samanteṣvasti kāraṇam //
analyzed: vibhāge ṅgasya ye proktā pipāsā ādyāḥ trayaḥ malāḥ te pi asya grahaṇīdoṣāḥ samanteṣu asti kāraṇam

original: vātavyādhyaśmarīkuṣṭhamehodarabhagandaram / arśāṃsi grahaṇītyaṣṭau mahārogāḥ sudustarāḥ //
analyzed: vāta vyādhi aśmarī kuṣṭha meha udara bhagandaram arśāṃsi grahaṇī iti aṣṭau mahārogāḥ su dustarāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍetisāranidāna nāma saptañcāśaduttaraśatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍa itisāranidāna nāma saptañcāśaduttaraśatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 158
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / athāto mūtraghātasya nidānaṃ śṛṇu suśruta / bastibastiśiromeḍhrakaṭīvṛṣaṇapāyu ca //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca atha atas mūtraghātasya nidānam śṛṇu suśruta basti bastiśiraḥ meḍhra kaṭī vṛṣaṇa pāyu ca

original: ekasaṃvahanāḥ proktā gudāsthivivarāśrayāḥ / adhomukho 'pi bastirhi mūtravāhiśirāmukhaiḥ //
analyzed: eka saṃvahanāḥ proktāḥ guda asthi vivara āśrayāḥ vastiḥ hi mūtra vāhi sirā mukhaiḥ

original: pārśvebhyaḥ pūryate ślakṣṇai (sūkṣmaiḥ)
analyzed: pārśvebhyaḥ pūryate ślakṣṇaiḥ sūkṣmaiḥ

original: syandamānairanāratam / taistaireva praviśyaivandoṣānkuvanti viṃśatim //
analyzed: syandamānaiḥ anāratam taiḥ taiḥ eva praviśya evam doṣān kuvanti viṃśatim

original: mūtrāghātaḥ pramehaśca kṛcchrānmarma samāśrayet / bastivaṅkṣaṇameḍhrārtiyuktolpālpaṃ muhurmuhuḥ //
analyzed: mūtrāghātaḥ pramehaḥ ca kṛcchrāt marma samāśrayet  basti vaṅkṣaṇa meḍhra ārti yukta ulpa alpam muhur muhur

original: mūtrāṇyāvātaje kṛcchrapītte pītaṃ sadāharuk / raktaṃ vā kaphajo bastimeḍhragauravaśothavān //
analyzed: mūtrāṇi ā vāta je pītam sa dāha ruj raktam vā kapha jaḥ basti meḍhra gaurava śothavān

original: sapicchaṃ saniruddhaṃ ca sarvaiḥ sarvātmakaṃ malaiḥ / yadā vāyurmukhaṃ bastervyāvartya pāriśoṣayan //
analyzed: sa piccham sa niruddham ca sarvaiḥ sarva ātmakam malaiḥ yadā vāyuḥ mukham basteḥ vyāvartya pāriśoṣayan

original: mūtraṃ sapittaṃ sakaphaṃ saśukraṃ vā tadā kramāt / saṃjāyate 'śmarī ghorā pittaṃ goriva rocanā //
analyzed: mūtram sa pittam sa kapham sa śukram vā tadā kramāt saṃjāyate śmarī ghorā pittam goḥ iva rocanā

original: śleṣmāśrayā ca sarvā syādathāsyāḥ pūrvalakṣaṇam / bastyādhmānaṃ tadāsannadeśohi parito 'tiruk //
analyzed: śleṣma āśrayā ca sarvā syāt atha asyāḥ pūrvalakṣaṇam  vasti ādhmānam tad āsanna deśaḥ hi paritas ti ruj

original: bastau ca mūtrasaṅgitvaṃ mūtrakṛcchraṃ jvaro 'ruciḥ / sāmānyaliṅgaṃ ruṅnābhisīvanībastimūrdhasu //
analyzed: vastau ca mūtra saṅgi tvam mūtrakṛcchram jvaraḥ ruciḥ sāmānya liṅgam ruj nābhi sīvanī vasti mūrdhasu

original: vistīrṇavā saṃ mūtraṃ syāttathā mārganirodhane / baddhaṃ baddhvā sukhaṃ mehedacchaṃ gomedakopamam //
analyzed: mūtram syāt tathā mārga nirodhane baddham baddhvā sukham mehet accham gomedaka upamam

original: tatsaṃkṣobhādbhavetsāsṛṅmāṃsamadhvani rugbhavet / tatra bātābhisṛtyārtodantān khādati vepate //
analyzed: tad saṃkṣobhāt bhavet sa asṛk māṃsam adhvani ruj bhavet tatra bāta abhisṛtya ārta udantān khādati vepate

original: gṛhṇāti mehanaṃ nābhiṃ pīḍayatyatilakṣaṇam / sānilaṃ muñcati śakṛnmuhurmehati binduśaḥ //
analyzed: gṛhṇāti mehanam nābhim pīḍayati ati lakṣaṇam sa anilam muñcati śakṛt muhur mehati binduśaḥ

original: śyāmarūkṣāśmarī cāsya syāccitā kaṇṭakairiva / pittena dahyate bastiḥ pacyamāna ivoṣṇavān //
analyzed: śyāma rūkṣā aśmarī ca asya syāt citā kaṇṭakaiḥ iva pittena dahyate vastiḥ pacyamānaḥ iva uṣṇavān

original: bhallātakāsthisaṃsthānā raktā pītā sitāśmarā / bastirnistudyata iva śleṣmaṇā śītalo guruḥ //
analyzed: bhallātaka asthi saṃsthānā raktā pītā sitā aśmarā vastiḥ nistudyate iva śleṣmaṇā śītalaḥ guruḥ

original: aśmarī mahatī ślakṣṇā madhuvarṇātha vā sitā / etā bhavanti bālanāṃ teṣāmeva ca bhūyasām //
analyzed: aśmarī mahatī ślakṣṇā madhu varṇā atha vā sitā etāḥ bhavanti bālanām teṣām eva ca bhūyasām

original: āśayopacayālpatvādgahaṇāharaṇe sukhī / sukrāśmarī tu mahatī jāyate śukradhāraṇāt //
analyzed: āśaya upacaya alpa tvāt gahaṇa āharaṇe sukhī sukra aśmarī tu mahatī jāyate śukra dhāraṇāt

original: sthānacyutamabhuktaṃ vā aṇḍayorantare 'nilaḥ / śoṣayatyupasaṃgṛhya śukraṃ tacchukramaśmarī //

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 160
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / nidānaṃ vidradhervakṣye gulmasya śṛṇu śuśruta / / bhuktaiḥ paryuṣitātyuṣṇaśuṣkarūkṣavidāhibhiḥ //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca nidānam vidradheḥ vakṣye gulmasya śṛṇu śuśruta

original: jihmaśayyāviceṣṭābhistaistaiścāsṛkpradūṣaṇaiḥ / duṣṭasatvaṅmāṃsamedo 'sthimadāmṛṣṭodarāśrayaḥ //
analyzed: jihma śayyā viceṣṭābhiḥ taiḥ taiḥ ca asṛj pradūṣaṇaiḥ duṣṭa sa tvak māṃsa medaḥ sthi mada amṛṣṭa udara āśrayaḥ

original: yaḥ śotho bahirantaśca mahāśūlo mahārujaḥ / vṛttaḥ syādāyato yo vā smṛto rogaḥ sa vidradhiḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ śothaḥ bahis antar ca mahā śūlaḥ mahā rujaḥ vṛttaḥ syāt āyataḥ yaḥ vā smṛtaḥ rogaḥ sa vidradhiḥ

original: doṣaiḥ pṛthaksamuditaiḥ śoṇitena stratena ca / vahate tatra tatrāṅge dāruṇe grathito 'strutaḥ //
analyzed: doṣaiḥ pṛthak samuditaiḥ śoṇitena ca  vahate tatra tatra aṅge dāruṇe

original: antarā dāruṇaścaiva gambhīro gulmavardhanaḥ / valmīkavatsamutstrāvī hyagnimāndyañca jāyate //
analyzed: antarā dāruṇaḥ ca eva gambhīraḥ gulma vardhanaḥ valmīka vat samutstrāvī hi agnimāndyam ca jāyate

original: nābhibastiyakṛtplīhaklomahṛtkukṣivaṅkṣaṇi / hṛdaye vepamāne tu tatratatrātitīvraruk //
analyzed: nābhi vasti yakṛt plīha kloma hṛd kukṣi vaṅkṣaṇi hṛdaye vepamāne tu tatra tatra ati tīvra ruj

original: śyāmāruṇaśirotthānapāko viṣamasaṃsthitiḥ / saṃjñācchedabhramānāhasyandasarpaṇaśabdavān //
analyzed: śyāma aruṇa sirā utthāna pākaḥ viṣama saṃsthitiḥ saṃjñā cheda bhrama ānāha syanda sarpaṇa śabdavān

original: raktatāmrāsitaḥ pittāttṛṇmohajvaradāhavān / kṣiptotthānaprapākaśca pāṇḍuḥ kaṇḍūyutaḥ kaphāt //
analyzed: rakta tāmra asitaḥ pittāt tṛṣ moha jvara dāhavān kṣipta utthāna prapākaḥ ca pāṇḍuḥ kaṇḍū yutaḥ kaphāt

original: saṃkleśaśītakastambhajṛmbhārocakagauravāḥ / cirotthāno 'vipākaśca saṃkīrṇaḥ sannipātajaḥ //
analyzed: saṃkleśa śītaka stambha jṛmbhā arocaka gauravāḥ cira utthānaḥ vipākaḥ ca saṃkīrṇaḥ sannipāta jaḥ

original: sāmarthyāccātra viḍbhedo bāhyābhyantaralakṣaṇam / kṛṣṇasphoṭāvṛtaśyāmastīvradāharujājvaraḥ //
analyzed: sāmarthyāt ca atra viḍbhedaḥ bāhya abhyantara lakṣaṇam kṛṣṇa sphoṭa āvṛta śyāmaḥ tīvra dāha rujā jvaraḥ

original: pittaliṅgo 'sṛjā bāhye strīṇāmeva tathāntaram / śastrādyairabhighātottharaktaiśca rogakāraṇam //
analyzed: bāhye strīṇām eva tathā antaram  śastra ādyaiḥ abhighāta uttha raktaiḥ ca roga kāraṇam

original: kṣatottho vāyunā kṣiptaḥ sa raktaḥ pittamīrayan / pittāsṛglakṣaṇaṃ kuryādvidradhiṃ bhūryupadravam //
analyzed: kṣata utthaḥ vāyunā kṣiptaḥ sa raktaḥ pittam īrayan pitta asṛj lakṣaṇam kuryāt vidradhim bhūri upadravam

original: tenopadravabhedaśca smṛto 'dhiṣṭhānabhedataḥ / nābhau hi dhmātaṃ cedbastau mūtrakṛcchrañcajāyate //
analyzed: tena upadrava bhedaḥ ca smṛtaḥ dhiṣṭhāna bhedataḥ nābhau hi dhmātam ced vastau mūtrakṛcchram ca jāyate

original: śvāsapraśvāsarodhaśca plīhāyāmatitṛṭ param / galarodhaśca klomni syātsarvāṅgaprarujā hṛdi //
analyzed: śvāsa praśvāsa rodhaḥ ca param gala rodhaḥ ca klomni syāt sarva aṅga prarujāḥ hṛdi

original: pramohastamakaḥ kāsau hṛdayoddhaṭṭanantathā / kukṣipārśvāntare caiva kukṣau doṣopajanma ca //
analyzed: pramohaḥ tamakaḥ kāsau hṛdaya uddhaṭṭanam tathā kukṣi pārśva antare ca eva kukṣau doṣa upajanma ca

original: tathā cedūrusandhau ca vaṅkṣaṇe kaṭipṛṣṭhayoḥ / pārśvayośca vyathā pāyau pavanasya nirodhanam //
analyzed: tathā ced ūru sandhau ca vaṅkṣaṇe kaṭi pṛṣṭhayoḥ pārśvayoḥ ca vyathā pāyau pavanasya nirodhanam

original: āmapakvavidagdhatvaṃ teṣāṃ śothavadādiśet / nābherūrdhvamukhātpakvātpradravantyapare gudāt //
analyzed: āma pakva vidagdha tvam teṣām śotha vat ādiśet nābheḥ ūrdhva mukhāt pakvāt pradravanti apare gudāt

original: gudāstanābhije vidyāddoṣakledoccavidradhau / kurute svādhiṣṭhānasya vivartaṃ sannipātajaḥ //
analyzed: vidyāt doṣa kleda ucca vidradhau  kurute sva adhiṣṭhānasya vivartam sannipāta jaḥ

original: pakvo hi nābhivastistho bhinno 'ntarbahireva vā / pākaścāntaḥ pravṛddhasya kṣīṇasyopadravārditaḥ //
analyzed: pakvaḥ hi nābhi vasti sthaḥ bhinnaḥ ntar bahis eva vā pākaḥ ca antar pravṛddhasya kṣīṇasya upadrava arditaḥ

original: vidradhiśca bhavettatra pāpānāṃ pāpayoṣitām / mṛte tu garbhage caiva sambhavecchvayatharghanaḥ //
analyzed: vidradhiḥ ca bhavet tatra pāpānām pāpa yoṣitām mṛte tu garbha ge ca eva sambhavet śvayathaḥ ghanaḥ

original: stane samatthe duḥkhaṃ vā bāhyavidradhilakṣaṇam / nārīṇāṃ sūkṣmaraktatvātkanyāyāntu na jāyate //
analyzed: stane duḥkham vā bāhya vidradhi lakṣaṇam nārīṇām sūkṣma rakta tvāt kanyāyām tu na jāyate

original: kruddho ruddhagatirvāyuḥ śephamūlakaro?hi saḥ / muṣkavaṅkṣaṇataḥ prāpya phalakoṣātivāhinīm //
analyzed: kruddhaḥ ruddha gatiḥ vāyuḥ śepha mūlaka rohi saḥ muṣka vaṅkṣaṇataḥ prāpya phalakoṣa ati vāhinīm

original: āpīḍya dhamanīvṛddhiṃ karoti phalakoṣayoḥ / doṣo medaḥsu tatrāste savṛddhiḥ saptadhā gadaḥ //
analyzed: āpīḍya dhamanī vṛddhim karoti phalakoṣayoḥ  doṣaḥ medaḥsu tatra āste sa vṛddhiḥ saptadhā gadaḥ

original: mūtrantayorapyanilādbāhye vābhyantare tathā / vātapūrṇaḥ kharasparśo rūkṣo vātācca dāhakṛt //
analyzed: mūtra antayoḥ api anilāt bāhye vā abhyantare tathā vāta pūrṇaḥ khara sparśaḥ rūkṣaḥ vātāt ca dāha kṛt

original: pakvodumbarasaṅkāśaḥ pittāddāhoṣmapākavān / kaphāttīvro guruḥ snigdhaḥ kaṇḍūmānkaṭhino 'lparuk //
analyzed: pakva udumbara saṅkāśaḥ pittāt dāha ūṣma pākavān kaphāt tīvraḥ guruḥ snigdhaḥ kaṇḍūmān kaṭhinaḥ lpa ruj

original: kṛṣṇaḥ sphoṭāvṛtaḥ piṇḍoṃ vṛddhiliṅgaśca raktataḥ / kaphavanmedasāṃ vṛddhirmṛdutālaphalopamaḥ //
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ sphoṭa āvṛtaḥ vṛddhi liṅgaḥ ca raktataḥ kapha vat medasām vṛddhiḥ mṛdutāla phala upamaḥ

original: mūtradhāraṇaśīlasya mūtrajastatra gacchataḥ / alobhaḥ pūrṇadhṛtimānkṣobhaṃ yāti saranmṛdu //
analyzed: mūtra dhāraṇa śīlasya mūtra jaḥ tatra gacchataḥ alobhaḥ pūrṇa dhṛtimān kṣobham yāti saran mṛdu

original: mūtrakṛcchramadhastācca valayaḥ phalakoṣayoḥ / vātakopibhisahāraiḥ śītatoyāvagāhanaiḥ //
analyzed: mūtrakṛcchram adhastāt ca valayaḥ phalakoṣayoḥ  śīta toya avagāhanaiḥ

original: viṇmūtradhāraṇāccaiva viṣamāṅgaviceṣṭanaiḥ / kṣobhitaiḥ kṣobhitaujāśca kṣīṇāntardehino yadā //
analyzed: viṣ mūtra dhāraṇāt ca eva viṣama aṅga viceṣṭanaiḥ kṣobhitaiḥ kṣobhita ojāḥ ca kṣīṇa antar dehinaḥ yadā

original: pavano viguṇībhūya śoṇitaṃ tadadhonayet / kuryāttatkṣaṇasandhistho granthyābhaḥ śvayathustadā //
analyzed: pavanaḥ viguṇībhūya śoṇitam tat adhas nayet  kuryāt tad kṣaṇa sandhi sthaḥ granthi ābhaḥ śvayathuḥ tadā

original: upekṣyamāṇasya ca gulmavṛddhimādhmānarugvai vividhāśca rogāḥ / supīḍito 'ntaḥ svanavān prayāti pradhmāpayanneti punaśca mūrdhni //
analyzed: upekṣyamāṇasya ca gulma vṛddhim ādhmāna ruj vai vividhāḥ ca rogāḥ su pīḍitaḥ ntar svanavān prayāti pradhmāpayan eti punar ca mūrdhni

original: raktavṛddhirasādhye 'yaṃ vātavṛddhisamākṛtiḥ / rūkṣakṛṣṇāruṇaśirā ūrṇāvṛtagavākṣavat //
analyzed: rakta vṛddhiḥ asādhye yam vāta vṛddhi sama ākṛtiḥ rūkṣa kṛṣṇa aruṇa sirāḥ ūrṇā āvṛta gavākṣa vat

original: vāto 'ṣṭadhā pṛthadauṣaiḥ saṃspṛṣṭairnicayaṃ gataḥ / ārtavasya ca doṣeṇa nārīṇāṃ jāyate 'ṣṭamaḥ //
analyzed: vātaḥ ṣṭadhā saṃspṛṣṭaiḥ nicayam gataḥ ārtavasya ca doṣeṇa nārīṇām jāyate ṣṭamaḥ

original: jvaramūrchātisāraiśca vamanādyaiśca karmabhiḥ / karśito balavānyāti śītārtaśca bubhukṣitaḥ //
analyzed: jvara mūrchā atisāraiḥ ca vamana ādyaiḥ ca karmabhiḥ karśitaḥ balavān yāti śīta ārtaḥ ca bubhukṣitaḥ

original: yaḥ pibatyannapānāni laṅghanaplāvanādikam / sevate hīnasaṃjñābhirarditaḥ samudīrayan //
analyzed: yaḥ pibati anna pānāni laṅghana plāvana ādikam sevate hīna saṃjñābhiḥ arditaḥ samudīrayan

original: snehasvedāvanabhyasya śoṣaṇaṃ vā niṣevayet / śuddho vā suddhihānirvā bhajeta spandanāni vā //
analyzed: sneha svedau an abhyasya śoṣaṇam vā niṣevayet śuddhaḥ vā suddhi hāniḥ vā bhajeta spandanāni vā

original: vātolbaṇāstasya malāḥ pṛthakcaiva hi te 'thavā / sarvo raktayuto vātāddehasnoto 'nusāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: vāta ulbaṇāḥ tasya malāḥ pṛthak ca eva hi te sarvaḥ rakta yutaḥ vātāt deha snotaḥ anusāriṇaḥ

original: ūrdhvādhomārgamāvṛtya vāyuḥ śūlaṃ karoti vai / sparśopalabhyaṃ gulmotthamuṣṇaṃ granthisvarūpiṇam //
analyzed: ūrdhva adhas mārgam āvṛtya vāyuḥ śūlam karoti vai sparśa upalabhyam gulma uttham uṣṇam granthi svarūpiṇam

original: karṣaṇātkaphaviḍghātairmārgasyāvaraṇena vā / vāyuḥ kṛtāśrayaḥ koṣṭhe raukṣyātkāṭhinyamāgataḥ //
analyzed: karṣaṇāt kapha viṣ ghātaiḥ mārgasya āvaraṇena vā vāyuḥ kṛta āśrayaḥ koṣṭhe raukṣyāt kāṭhinyam āgataḥ

original: svatantraḥ svāśraye duṣṭaḥ paratantraḥ parāśraye / tataḥ piṇḍakavacchleṣmā malasaṃsṛṣṭa eva ca //
analyzed: svatantraḥ sva āśraye duṣṭaḥ paratantraḥ para āśraye tatas piṇḍaka vat śleṣmā mala saṃsṛṣṭaḥ eva ca

original: gulama ityucyate bastinābhihṛtpārśvasaṃśrayaḥ / vātajanye śiraḥ śūlajvara plīhāntrakūjanam //
analyzed: gulamaḥ iti ucyate vasti nābhi hṛd pārśva saṃśrayaḥ vāta janye śiraḥ śūla jvara plīha antra kūjanam

original: vedhaḥ sūcyeva viḍbhraṃśaḥ kṛcchre mūtraṃ pravartate / gātre mukhe pade śothaḥ hyagnimāndyaṃ tathaiva ca //
analyzed: vedhaḥ sūcyā iva viṣ bhraṃśaḥ kṛcchre mūtram pravartate gātre mukhe pade śothaḥ hi agnimāndyam tathā eva ca

original: rūkṣakṛṣṇatvagāditvaṃ calatvādanilasyaca / anirūpitasaṃsthāno vividhāñjanayedvyathām //
analyzed: rūkṣa kṛṣṇa tvac ādi tvam cala tvāt anilasya ca anirūpita saṃsthānaḥ vividhān janayet vyathām

original: pipīlikāvyāpta iva gulmaḥ sphurati nudyate / pittāddāhāmlakau mūrchā viḍbhedaḥ svedatṛḍjvarāḥ //
analyzed: pipīlikā vyāptaḥ iva gulmaḥ sphurati nudyate pittāt dāha amlakau mūrchā viḍbhedaḥ sveda tṛṣ jvarāḥ

original: hāridrayaṃ sarvagātreṣu gulmācchothasya darśanam / hīyate dīpyate śleṣmā svasthānaṃ dahatīvaca //
analyzed: sarva gātreṣu gulmāt śothasya darśanam hīyate dīpyate śleṣmā sva sthānam dahati iva ca

original: kaphātstaimityamaruciḥ sadanaṃ śirasi jvaraḥ / pīnasālasyahṛllāsau śuklakṛṣṇatvagāditā //
analyzed: kaphāt staimityam aruciḥ sadanam śirasi jvaraḥ pīnasa ālasya hṛllāsau śukla kṛṣṇa tvac ādi tā

original: gulmo gabhīraḥ kaṭhino gururgarbhasthabālavat / svasthānasthā adhāvantastata evātra mārakāḥ //
analyzed: gulmaḥ gabhīraḥ kaṭhinaḥ guruḥ garbha stha bāla vat  sva sthāna sthāḥ adhāvantaḥ tatas eva atra mārakāḥ

original: prāyastu yattaddvandvotthā gulmāḥ saṃsṛṣṭamaithunāḥ / sarvajastīvrarugdāhaḥ śīghrapākī ghanonnataḥ //
analyzed: prāyas tu yat tat dvandva utthāḥ gulmāḥ saṃsṛṣṭa maithunāḥ sarvajaḥ tīvra ruj dāhaḥ śīghra pākī ghana unnataḥ

original: so 'sādhyo raktagulmastu striyā eva prajāyate / ṛtau yā caiva śūlārtā yati vā yonirogiṇī //
analyzed: saḥ sādhyaḥ rakta gulmaḥ tu striyāḥ eva prajāyate ṛtau yā ca eva śūla ārtā yati vā yoni rogiṇī

original: sevate vānilāṃśca strī kruddhastasyāḥ samīraṇaḥ / nirudhyātyārtavaṃ yonyāṃ pratimāsaṃ vyavasthitam //
analyzed: sevate vā anilān ca strī kruddhaḥ tasyāḥ samīraṇaḥ nirudhya ati ārtavam yonyām pratimāsam vyavasthitam

original: sukṣau karoti tadgarbhe liṅgamāviṣkaroti ca / hṛllāsadauhṛdastanyadarśanaṃ kāmacāritā //
analyzed: karoti tad garbhe liṅgam āviṣkaroti ca hṛllāsa dauhṛda stanya darśanam kāma cāri tā

original: krameṇa vāyoḥ saṃsargātpittaṃ yoniṣu sañcayam / raktasya kurute tasyā vātapittoktagulmajān //
analyzed: krameṇa vāyoḥ saṃsargāt pittam yoniṣu sañcayam raktasya kurute tasyāḥ vāta pitta ukta gulma jān

original: garbhāśaye ca sutarāṃ śūlāṃścaivāsṛgāśraye / yonistrāvaśca daurgandhyaṃ bhūyaḥ syandanavedane //
analyzed: garbhāśaye ca sutarām śūlān ca eva asṛj āśraye yoni strāvaḥ ca daurgandhyam bhūyas syandana vedane

original: kadāpi garbhavadgulmaḥ sarve te ratisambhavāḥ / pākañcireṇa bhajate naidhate vidradhiḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: kadāpi garbha vat gulmaḥ sarve te rati sambhavāḥ pākam cireṇa bhajate na edhate vidradhiḥ punar

original: pacyate śīghramatyarthaṃ duṣṭaraktāśrayastu saḥ / ataḥ śīghraṃ vidāhitvādvadradhiḥ so 'bhīdhīyate //
analyzed: pacyate śīghram atyartham duṣṭa rakta āśrayaḥ tu saḥ atas śīghram vidāhitvāt vadradhiḥ saḥ bhīdhīyate

original: gulmāntāraśraye bastidāhaśca plīhavedanā / agnivarṇabalabhraṃśo vegānāṃ vā pravartanam //
analyzed: gulma antāra śraye basti dāhaḥ ca plīha vedanā agni varṇa bala bhraṃśaḥ vegānām vā pravartanam

original: ato viparyaye bāhyakoṣṭhāṅgeṣu ca nātiruk / vaivarṇyamatha vā kāso bahirunnatatādhikam //
analyzed: atas viparyaye bāhya koṣṭha aṅgeṣu ca na ati ruj vaivarṇyam atha vā kāsaḥ bahis unnata tā adhikam

original: sāṭopamatyugrarujamādhmānamudare bhṛśam / ūrdhvādho vātarodhena tamānāhaṃ pracakṣate //
analyzed: sa āṭopam ati ugra rujam ādhmānam udare bhṛśam ūrdhva adhas vāta rodhena tam ānāham pracakṣate

original: dhanaścāṣṭhyupamo granthilo 'ṣṭhīlātu samunnatā / samastāliṅgasaṃyuktaḥ pratyaṣṭhīlā tadākṛtiḥ //
analyzed: granthilaḥ ṣṭhīlā tu samunnatā samasta āliṅga saṃyuktaḥ pratyaṣṭhīlā tad ākṛtiḥ

original: pakvaśayodbhavo 'pyevaṃ vāyustīvrarujāśrayāt / udgārabāhulyapurīṣabandhatṛptyakṣamatvāntravikūjanāni //
analyzed: pakva śaya udbhavaḥ pi evam vāyuḥ tīvra rujā āśrayāt udgāra bāhulya purīṣa bandha tṛpti akṣama tva antra vikūjanāni

original: ācopamādhmānamapaktiśaktiḥ āsannagulmasya bhavecca cihnam //
analyzed: āca upama ādhmānam apakti śaktiḥ āsanna gulmasya bhavet ca cihnam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vidradhigulmanidāna nāma ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vidradhigulmanidāna nāma ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 161
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / udarāṇāṃ nidānañca vakṣye suśruta tacchṛṇu / rogāḥ sarve 'pi mandāgnau sutarāmudarāṇi tu //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca  udarāṇām nidānam ca vakṣye suśruta tat śṛṇu rogāḥ sarve manda agnau sutarām udarāṇi tu

original: anīrṇāmayāścāpyanye jāyante malasaṃcayāt / ūrdhvādho vāyavo ruddhvā vyākulāvipravāhiṇī? //
analyzed: anīrṇa āmayāḥ ca api anye jāyante mala saṃcayāt ūrdhva adhas vāyavaḥ ruddhvā

original: prāṇānapānānsaṃdūṣya kuryustānmāṃsasandhigān / ādhmāpya kukṣimudaramaṣṭadhā te ca bhedataḥ //
analyzed: prāṇān apānān saṃdūṣya kuryuḥ tān māṃsa sandhi gān  ādhmāpya kukṣim udaram aṣṭadhā te ca bhedataḥ

original: pṛthagdoṣaiḥ samastauśca plīhavaṅkṣakṣatodakaiḥ / tenārtāḥ śuṣkatālvoṣṭhāḥ sarvapādakarodarāḥ //
analyzed: pṛthak doṣaiḥ samastauḥ ca tena ārtāḥ śuṣka tālu oṣṭhāḥ sarva pāda kara udarāḥ

original: naṣṭaceṣṭabalāhārāḥ kṛtapradhmāt kukṣayaḥ / puruṣāḥ syuḥ pretarūpā bhāvinastasya lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: naṣṭa ceṣṭa bala āhārāḥ kukṣayaḥ puruṣāḥ syuḥ preta rūpāḥ bhāvinaḥ tasya lakṣaṇam

original: kṣunnāśo 'rucivatsarvaṃ savidāhañca pacyate / jīrṇānnaṃ yo na jānāti so 'pathyaṃ sevatenaraḥ //
analyzed: kṣudh nāśaḥ ruci vat sarvam sa vidāham ca pacyate jīrṇa annam yaḥ na jānāti saḥ pathyam sevate naraḥ

original: kṣīyate balamaṅgasya śvasityalpo 'viceṣṭitaḥ / viṣayāvṛttibuddhiśca śokaśoṣādayo 'pica //
analyzed: kṣīyate balam aṅgasya śvasiti alpaḥ viceṣṭitaḥ viṣaya āvṛtti buddhiḥ ca śoka śoṣa ādayaḥ pica

original: rugbastisandhau satataṃ laghvalpabhojanairapi / jarājīrṇo balabhraṃśo bhavejjaṭhararogiṇaḥ //
analyzed: ruj vasti sandhau satatam laghu alpa bhojanaiḥ api jarā jīrṇaḥ bala bhraṃśaḥ bhavet jaṭhara rogiṇaḥ

original: svatantratandrālasatā malasargo 'lpavahnitā / dāhaḥ śvayathurādhmānamantre salilasambhave //
sarvatra toye maraṇaṃ śocanaṃ tatra niṣphalam / gavākṣavacchirājālairudaraṃ guḍguḍāyate //
analyzed: sarvatra toye maraṇam śocanam tatra niṣphalam gavākṣa vat sirā jālaiḥ udaram guḍguḍāyate

original: nābhimantraśca viṣṭabhya vegaṃ kṛtvā praṇaśyati / mārute hṛtkaṭīnābhipāyuvaṅkṣaṇavedanāḥ //
analyzed: nābhi mantraḥ ca viṣṭabhya vegam kṛtvā praṇaśyati mārute hṛd kaṭī nābhi pāyu vaṅkṣaṇa vedanāḥ

original: saśabdo niḥ saredvāyurvahate mūtramalpakam / nātimātraṃ bhavellaulyaṃ narasya virasaṃ mukham //
analyzed: sa śabdaḥ niḥ saret vāyuḥ vahate mūtram alpakam  na atimātram bhavet laulyam narasya virasam mukham

original: tatravātodare śothaḥ pāṇipānmukhakukṣiṣu / kurkṣipārśvodarakaṭīpṛṣṭharukparvabhadanam //
analyzed: tatra vāta udare śothaḥ pāṇi pād mukha kukṣiṣu

original: śuṣkakāsāṅgamardādhogurutāmalasaṃgrahaḥ / śyāmāruṇatvagāditvaṃ mukhe ca rasavaddhitā //
analyzed: śuṣka kāsa aṅgamarda adhas guru tā mala saṃgrahaḥ śyāma aruṇa tvac ādi tvam mukhe ca rasa vat hitā

original: satodabhedamudaraṃ nīlakṛṣṇaśirātatam / ādhmātamudare śabdamadbhutaṃ vā karoti saḥ //
analyzed: sa toda bhedam udaram nīla kṛṣṇa sirā tatam ādhmātam udare śabdam adbhutam vā karoti saḥ

original: vāyuścātra sarukcchabdaṃ vidhatte sarvathā gatim / pittodare jvaro mūrchā dāhitvaṃ kaṭukāsyatā //
analyzed: vāyuḥ ca atra sa ruj śabdam vidhatte sarvathā gatim  pitta udare jvaraḥ mūrchā dāhi tvam kaṭuka āsya tā

original: bhramotisāraḥ pītatvaṃ tvagādāvudaraṃ harit / pītatāmraśirāditvaṃ sasvedaṃ soṣma dahyate //
analyzed: bhrama utisāraḥ pīta tvam tvac ādau udaram harit pīta tāmra sirā ādi tvam sa svedam soṣma dahyate

original: dhūmāyate mṛdusparśaṃ kṣaiprapākaṃ pradūyate / śleṣmodareṣu sadanaṃ svedaśvayathugauravam //
analyzed: dhūmāyate mṛdu sparśam kṣaipra pākam pradūyate śleṣma udareṣu sadanam sveda śvayathu gauravam

original: nidrā kleśo 'ruciḥ śvāsaḥ kāśaḥ śuklatvagāditā / udaraṃ timiraṃ snigdhaṃ śuklakṛṣṇaśirāvṛtam //
analyzed: nidrā kleśaḥ ruciḥ śvāsaḥ kāśaḥ śukla tvac ādi tā  udaram timiram snigdham śukla kṛṣṇa sirā vṛtam

original: nīrātivṛddhau kaṭhinaṃ śītasparśaṃ guru sthiram / tridoṣakopane taistaistridoṣajīnaitarmalaiḥ //
analyzed: nīra ati vṛddhau kaṭhinam śīta sparśam guru sthiram tridoṣa kopane taiḥ taiḥ tridoṣa jīnaiḥ etarmalaiḥ

original: sarvadūṣaṇaduṣṭāśca saraktāḥ sañcitā malāḥ / koṣṭhaṃ prāpya vikurvāṇāḥ śoṣamūrchābhramānvitam //
analyzed: sarva dūṣaṇa duṣṭāḥ ca sa raktāḥ sañcitāḥ malāḥ koṣṭham prāpya vikurvāṇāḥ śoṣa mūrchā bhrama anvitam

original: kuryustriliṅgamudaraṃ śīghrapākaṃ sudāruṇam / vardhate tacca sutarāṃ śītavātapradarśane //
analyzed: kuryuḥ tri liṅgam udaram śīghra pākam su dāruṇam vardhate tat ca sutarām śīta vāta pradarśane

original: atyaśanācca saṃkṣobhādyānapānādiceṣṭhitaiḥ / avihitaiśca pānādyairvamanavyādhikarṣaṇaiḥ //
analyzed: ati aśanāt ca saṃkṣobhāt yāna pāna ādi ceṣṭhitaiḥ a vihitaiḥ ca pāna ādyaiḥ vamana vyādhi karṣaṇaiḥ

original: vāmapārśvāsthitaḥ plīhā tyutasthāno vivardhate / śoṇitādvā rasādibhyo vivṛddho janayedvyathām //
analyzed: vāma pārśva āsthitaḥ plīhā vivardhate  śoṇitāt vā rasa ādibhyaḥ vivṛddhaḥ janayet vyathām

original: so 'ṣṭhīlā cātikaṭhinaḥ pronnataḥ kūrmapṛṣṭhavat? / krameṇa vardhamānaśca kukṣau vyātatimāharet //
analyzed: ca ati kaṭhinaḥ pronnataḥ kūrma pṛṣṭha vat krameṇa vardhamānaḥ ca kukṣau vyātatim āharet

original: śvāsakāsapipāsāsyavairasyādhmānakajvaraiḥ / pāṇḍutvamūrchācharditvagdāhamohaiśca saṃyutaḥ //
analyzed: śvāsa kāsa pipāsā āsya vairasya ādhmānaka jvaraiḥ pāṇḍu tva mūrchā chardi tvac dāha mohaiḥ ca saṃyutaḥ

original: aruṇābhaṃ vicitrābhaṃ nīlahāridrarājitam / udāvartena cānāhamohatṛḍdgahanajvaraiḥ //
analyzed: aruṇa ābham vicitra ābham nīla hāridra rājitam udāvartena ca ānāha moha tṛṣ dgahana jvaraiḥ

original: gauravārucikāṭhinyairvighātabhramasaṃkramāt / plīhavaddakṣiṇātpārśvātkuryādyakṛdapi cyutam //
analyzed: gaurava aruci kāṭhinyaiḥ vighāta bhrama saṃkramāt plīha vat dakṣiṇāt pārśvāt kuryāt yakṛt api cyutam

original: pakve bhūte yakṛti ca sadā baddhamalo gude / durnāmabhirudāvartairanyairvā pīḍito bhavet //
analyzed: pakve bhūte yakṛti ca sadā baddha malaḥ gude durnāmabhiḥ udāvartaiḥ anyaiḥ vā pīḍitaḥ bhavet

original: varcaḥ pittakaphānbaddhānkaroti kupito 'nilaḥ / apāno jaṭhare tena saṃruddho jvararukkaraḥ //
analyzed: varcaḥ pitta kaphān baddhān karoti kupitaḥ nilaḥ apānaḥ jaṭhare tena saṃruddhaḥ jvara ruj karaḥ

original: kāśaśvāsorusadganaṃ śiroruṅnābhipārśvaruk / malāsaṃgo 'ruciśchardirudare malamārutaḥ //
analyzed: śiraḥ ruj nābhi pārśva ruj mala asaṃgaḥ ruciḥ chardiḥ udare mala mārutaḥ

original: sthiranīlāruṇaśirājālairudaramāvṛtam / nābherupari ca prāyo gopucchākṛti jāyate //
analyzed: sthira nīla aruṇa sirā jālaiḥ udaram āvṛtam nābheḥ upari ca prāyas go puccha ākṛti jāyate

original: asthyādiśalyai ranyaiśca viddhe caivodare tathā / pacyate yakṛtādiśca tacchidraiśca saranbahiḥ //
analyzed: asthi ādi śalyaiḥ viddhe ca eva udare tathā pacyate yakṛt ādiḥ ca tad chidraiḥ ca saran bahis

original: āma eva gudāheti tato 'lpālpaḥ śakṛdrasaḥ / sa syādvikṛtagandho 'pi picchilaḥ pītalohitaḥ //
analyzed: āmaḥ eva tatas lpa alpaḥ śakṛt rasaḥ sa syāt vikṛta gandhaḥ picchilaḥ pīta lohitaḥ

original: śeṣaścāpūrya jaṭharaṃ ghoramārabhate tataḥ / vardhate tadadho nābherāśu caiti jalātmatām //
analyzed: śeṣaḥ ca āpūrya jaṭharam ghoram ārabhate tatas vardhate tad adhas nābheḥ āśu ca eti jala ātma tām

original: udrikte doṣarūpe ca vyāpte ca śvāsatṛṭbhramaiḥ / chidrodaramidaṃ prāhuḥ paristrāvīti cāpare //
analyzed: udrikte doṣa rūpe ca vyāpte ca śvāsa tṛṣ bhramaiḥ chidrodaram idam prāhuḥ paristrāvi iti ca apare

original: pravṛttasnehapānādeḥ sahasāpathyasevinaḥ / atyambupānānmandāgneḥ kṣīṇasyātikṛśasya ca //
analyzed: pravṛtta sneha pāna ādeḥ sahasā apathya sevinaḥ ati ambu pānāt manda agneḥ kṣīṇasya ati kṛśasya ca

original: ruddhaḥ svamārgādanilaḥ kaphaśca jalamūrchitaḥ / vardhate tu tadevāmbu tanmātrādvindurāśitaḥ //
analyzed: ruddhaḥ sva mārgāt anilaḥ kaphaḥ ca jala mūrchitaḥ vardhate tu tat eva ambu tad mātrāt vindu rāśitaḥ

original: tatkopādudaraṃ tṛṣṇāgudasnutirujānvitam / kāśaśvāsāruciyutaṃ nānāvarṇāśirātatam //
analyzed: tad kopāt udaram tṛṣṇā guda snuti rujā anvitam kāśa śvāsa aruci yutam nānā varṇa āśiḥ ātatam

original: toyapūrṇānmṛdusparśātsadṛśakṣobhavepathu / bakodaraṃ sthiraṃsnigdhaṃ nāḍīmāvṛtya jāyate //
analyzed: toya pūrṇāt mṛdu sparśāt sadṛśa kṣobha vepathu baka udaram sthiram snigdham nāḍīm āvṛtya jāyate

original: upekṣāyāñca sarveṣāṃ svasthānāṃ paricālitāḥ / pākā dravā dravīkuryuḥ sandhisrotomukhānyapi //
analyzed: upekṣāyām ca sarveṣām svasthānām paricālitāḥ pākāḥ dravāḥ dravīkuryuḥ sandhi srotaḥ mukhāni api

original: svede caiva tu saṃruddhe mūrchitāścāntarasthitāḥ / tadevodaramāpūrya kuryādudarāmayam //
analyzed: svede ca eva tu saṃruddhe mūrchitāḥ ca antara sthitāḥ tat eva udaram āpūrya kuryāt udarāmayam

original: gurūdaraṃ sthitaṃ vṛttamāhatañca na śabdakṛt / hīnabalaṃ tathā ghoraṃ nāḍyāṃ spṛṣṭañca sapati //
analyzed: guru udaram sthitam vṛttam āhatam ca na śabda kṛt hīna balam tathā ghoram nāḍyām spṛṣṭam ca sapati

original: śirāntardhānamudare sarvalakṣaṇamucyate / vātapittakaphaplīhasannipātodakodaram //
analyzed: sirā antardhānam udare sarva lakṣaṇam ucyate vāta pitta kapha plīha sannipāta udaka udaram

original: pakṣācca jātasalilaṃ viṣṭambhopadravānvitam / janmanaivodaraṃ sarvaṃ prāyaḥ kṛcchratamaṃ matam //
analyzed: pakṣāt ca jāta salilam viṣṭambha upadrava anvitam janmanā eva udaram sarvam prāyas kṛcchratamam matam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇme pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇme pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ekaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 162
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / pāṇḍuśothanidānañca śṛṇu suśrata vacmi te / pittapradhānāḥ kupitā yathoktaiḥ kopanairmalāḥ //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca pāṇḍu śotha nidānam ca śṛṇu suśrata vacmi te pitta pradhānāḥ kupitāḥ yathā uktaiḥ kopanaiḥ malāḥ

original: natrānilena balinā kṣiptākṣiptaṃ yadi sthitam / dhamanīrdaśamīḥ prāpya vyāpnuvansakalāṃ tanum //
analyzed: balinā kṣipta ākṣiptam yadi sthitam dhamanīḥ daśamīḥ prāpya vyāpnuvan sakalām tanum

original: tvagasṛkchleṣmamāṃsāni pradūṣyanrasamāśritam / tvaṅmāṃsayostu kurute tvaci varṇān pṛthagvidhān //
analyzed: tvak asṛj śleṣma māṃsāni pradūṣyan rasam āśritam tvak māṃsayoḥ tu kurute tvaci varṇān pṛthagvidhān

original: svayaṃ haridrā hāridraṃ pāṇḍutvaṃ teṣu cādhikam / yāto 'yaṃ prahatedugraḥ sa rogastena gauravam //
analyzed: svayam haridrā hāridram pāṇḍu tvam teṣu ca adhikam yātaḥ yam sa rogaḥ tena gauravam

original: dhātūnāṃ sparśaśaithilyamāmajaśca guṇakṣayaḥ / tato 'lparaktamedo 'sthiniḥ sāraḥ syācchlathendriyaḥ //
analyzed: dhātūnām sparśa śaithilyam āma jaḥ ca guṇa kṣayaḥ tatas lpa rakta medaḥ sthiniḥ sāraḥ syāt ślatha indriyaḥ

original: śīryamāṇairivāṅgaistu dravatā hṛdayena ca / śūlokṣikūṭavadane staimityaṃ tatra lālayā //
analyzed: śīryamāṇaiḥ iva aṅgaiḥ tu dravatā hṛdayena ca  śūla ukṣikūṭa vadane staimityam tatra lālayā

original: hīnatṛṭ śiśiradveṣī śīrṇalobho hatānalaḥ / mandaśaktirjvarī śvāsī karṇaśūlī tathā bhramī //
analyzed: hīna tṛṣ śiśira dveṣī śīrṇa lobhaḥ hata analaḥ manda śaktiḥ jvarī śvāsī karṇa śūlī tathā bhramī

original: sa pañcadhā pṛthagdoṣaiḥ samastairmṛttikādanāt / prāgrūpamasya hṛdayaspandanaṃ rūkṣatā tvaci //
analyzed: sa pañcadhā pṛthak doṣaiḥ samastaiḥ mṛttikā adanāt  prāgrūpam asya hṛdaya spandanam rūkṣa tā tvaci

original: aruciḥ pītamūtratvaṃ svedābhāvo 'lpamṛtratā / medaḥ samānilāttatra gāḍharukkledagātratā //
analyzed: aruciḥ pīta mūtra tvam sveda abhāvaḥ lpa mṛtra tā medaḥ sama anilāt tatra gāḍha ruj kleda gātra tā

original: kṛṣṇekṣaṇaṃ kṛṣṇaśirānakhaviṇmūtranetratā / śotho nāsāsyavairasyaṃ viṭśoṣaḥ pārśvamūrchanā //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa īkṣaṇam kṛṣṇa sirā nakha viṣ mūtra netra tā  śothaḥ nāsā āsya vairasyam viṣ śoṣaḥ pārśva mūrchanā

original: pitte haritapittābhaḥ śirādiṣu jvarastamaḥ / tṛṭśoṣamūrchādaurgandhyaṃ śītecchā kaṭuvakratā //
analyzed: pitte harita pitta ābhaḥ sirā ādiṣu jvaraḥ tamaḥ tṛṣ śoṣa mūrchā daurgandhyam śīta icchā kaṭu vakra tā

original: viḍbhedaścāmlako dāhaḥ kaphācca hṛdayārdratā / tandrā lavaṇavakratvaṃ romaharṣaḥ svarakṣayaḥ //
analyzed: viḍbhedaḥ ca amlakaḥ dāhaḥ kaphāt ca hṛdaya ārdra tā tandrā lavaṇa vakra tvam roma harṣaḥ svara kṣayaḥ

original: kāśaśchardiśca nicayānnaṣṭaliṅgo 'tiduḥ sahaḥ / utkṛṣṭenilapittābhyā kaṭurvā madhuraḥ kaphaḥ //
analyzed: kāśaḥ chardiḥ ca nicayāt naṣṭa liṅgaḥ sahaḥ

original: dūṣayitvā vasādīṃśca raukṣyādraktavimokṣaṇam / srotasāṃ saṃkṣayaṃ kuryādanurudhya ca pūrvavat //
analyzed: dūṣayitvā vasā ādīn ca raukṣyāt rakta vimokṣaṇam srotasām saṃkṣayam kuryāt anurudhya ca pūrvavat

original: pāṇḍurogekṣayejāte nābhipādāsyamehanam / purīṣaṃ kṛmivanmuñcedbhinnaṃ sāstraṃ kaphānvitam //
analyzed: pāṇḍu roga īkṣaye jāte nābhi pāda āsya mehanam purīṣam kṛmi vat muñcet bhinnam sa astram kapha anvitam

original: yaḥ pittarogī seveta pittalaṃ tasya kāmalam / koṣṭhaśā khodgataṃ pittaṃ dagdhvāsṛṅmāṃsamāharet //
analyzed: yaḥ pitta rogī seveta pittalam tasya kāmalam koṣṭha śā kha udgatam pittam dagdhvā asṛj māṃsam āharet

original: hāridramūtranetratvaṃ mukhaṃ raktaṃ śakṛttathā / dāhī vipākatṛṣṇāvān bhekābho durbalendriyaḥ //
analyzed: hāridra mūtra netra tvam mukham raktam śakṛt tathā dāhī vipāka tṛṣṇāvān bheka ābhaḥ durbala indriyaḥ

original: bhavetpittānugaḥ śothaḥ pāṇḍurogāvṛtasya ca / upekṣayā ca śothādyāḥ sakṛcchrāḥ kumbhakāmalāḥ //
analyzed: bhavet pitta anugaḥ śothaḥ pāṇḍu roga āvṛtasya ca upekṣayā ca śotha ādyāḥ sa kṛcchrāḥ kumbhakāmalāḥ

original: haritaśyāmapittatve pāṇḍurogo yadā bhavet / vātapitte bhramastṛṣṇā strīṣu harṣo mṛdujvaraḥ //
analyzed: harita śyāma pitta tve pāṇḍu rogaḥ yadā bhavet vāta pitte bhramaḥ tṛṣṇā strīṣu harṣaḥ mṛdu jvaraḥ

original: tandrā vā cānalabhraṃśastaṃ vadanti halīmakam / ālasyañcātibhavati teṣāṃ pūrvamupadravaḥ //
analyzed: tandrā vā ca anala bhraṃśaḥ tam vadanti halīmakam ālasyam ca ati bhavati teṣām pūrvam upadravaḥ

original: śothaḥ pradhānaḥ kathitaḥ sa evāto nigadyate / pittaraktakaphānvāyurduṣṭo duṣṭānbahiḥ śirāḥ //
analyzed: śothaḥ pradhānaḥ kathitaḥ saḥ eva atas nigadyate pitta rakta kaphān vāyuḥ duṣṭaḥ duṣṭān bahis sirāḥ

original: nītvā ruddhagatistairhi kuryāttvaṅmāṃsasaṃśrayam / utsedhaṃ saṃhataṃ śothaṃ tamāhurnicayādataḥ //
analyzed: nītvā ruddha gatiḥ taiḥ hi kuryāt tvac māṃsa saṃśrayam  utsedham saṃhatam śotham tam āhuḥ nicayāt atas

original: sarvahetuviśaṣaistu rūpabhedānnavātmakam / doṣaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ sarvairabhighātādviṣādapi //
analyzed: sarva hetu viśaṣaiḥ tu rūpa bhedāt nava ātmakam doṣaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ sarvaiḥ abhighātāt viṣāt api

original: tadeva nīyamānantu sarvāṅge kāmajambhavet / pṛthūnnatāgragrathitairviśeṣaiśca tridhā viduḥ //
analyzed: tat eva nīyamānam tu sarva aṅge kāma jam bhavet pṛthu unnata agra grathitaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ ca tridhā viduḥ

original: sāmānyahetuḥ śothānāṃ doṣajāto viśeṣataḥ / vyādhiḥ karmopavāsādikṣīṇasya bhavati drutam //
analyzed: sāmānya hetuḥ śothānām doṣa jātaḥ viśeṣataḥ vyādhiḥ karma upavāsa ādi kṣīṇasya bhavati drutam

original: atimātraṃ yadāsevedgurumatyantaśītalam / lavaṇakṣāratīkṣṇāmlaśākāmbusvapnajāgaram //
analyzed: atimātram yadā sevet gurum atyanta śītalam  lavaṇa kṣāra tīkṣṇa amla śāka ambu svapna jāgaram

original: rodho vegasya vallūramajīrṇaśramamaithunam / pacyate mārgagamanaṃ yānena kṣobhiṇāpi vā //
analyzed: rodhaḥ vegasya vallūram ajīrṇa śrama maithunam pacyate mārga gamanam yānena kṣobhiṇā api vā

original: śvāsakāsātisārārśojaṭharapradarajvarāḥ / viṣṭambhālasyakacchardihikkāpāṇḍuvisarpakam //
analyzed: śvāsa kāsa atisāra arśaḥ jaṭhara pradara jvarāḥ viṣṭambha ālasyaka chardi hikkā pāṇḍu visarpakam

original: ūrdhvaśothamadho bastau madhye kurvanti madhyagāḥ / sarvāṅgagaḥ sarvagataḥ pratyapratyageti tadāśrayaḥ //
analyzed: ūrdhva śotham adhas vastau madhye kurvanti madhya gāḥ sarva aṅga gaḥ sarva gataḥ tad āśrayaḥ

original: tatpūrvarūpaṃ kṣavathuḥ śirāyāmaṅgagauravam / vātācchothaścalo rūkṣaḥ khararomāruṇo 'sitaḥ //
analyzed: tad pūrvarūpam kṣavathuḥ sirāyām aṅga gauravam  vātāt śothaḥ calaḥ rūkṣaḥ khara roma aruṇaḥ sitaḥ

original: śaṅkhabastyantraśophartimedobhedāḥ prasuptitā / vātottānaḥ klamaḥ śīghramunnametpīḍitāṃ tanum //
analyzed: śaṅkha vasti antra śopha ṛti medaḥ bhedāḥ prasupti tā vāta uttānaḥ klamaḥ śīghram unnamet pīḍitām tanum

original: sigdhastu mardanaiḥ śāmyedrātrāvalpo divā mahān / tvaksarṣapavilipte ca tasmiṃścimicimāyate //
analyzed: sigdhaḥ tu mardanaiḥ śāmyet rātrau alpaḥ divā mahān tvac sarṣapa vilipte ca tasmin cimicimāyate

original: pītaraktāsiṃtābhāsaḥ pittajātaśca śoṣakṛt / śīghraṃ nāsau vā praśamenmadhye prāgdahate tanum //
analyzed: pitta jātaḥ ca śoṣa kṛt śīghram na asau vā praśamet madhye prāk dahate tanum

original: satṛṭdāhajvarasvedo bhramaklodamadabhramāḥ / sābhilāṣī śakṛdbhedo gandhaḥ sparśasaho mṛduḥ //
analyzed: sa tṛṣ dāha jvara svedaḥ sa abhilāṣī śakṛdbhedaḥ gandhaḥ sparśa sahaḥ mṛduḥ

original: kaṇḍūmānpāṇḍuromā tvakkaṭhinaḥ śītalo guruḥ / snigdhaḥślakṣṇaḥ sthiraḥ śūlo nidrācchardyagnimāndyakṛt //
analyzed: kaṇḍūmān pāṇḍu romā tvac kaṭhinaḥ śītalaḥ guruḥ snigdhaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ sthiraḥ śūlaḥ nidrā chardi agni māndya kṛt

original: āghātena ca śastrādicchedabhedakṣatādibhiḥ / himānilairdadhyanilairbhallātakapikacchajaiḥ //
analyzed: āghātena ca śastra ādi cheda bheda kṣata ādibhiḥ hima anilaiḥ dadhi anilaiḥ bhallāta kapikaccha jaiḥ

original: rasaiḥ śuṣkaiśca saṃsparśācchvayathuḥ syādvisarpavān / bhṛśoṣmā lohitābhāsaḥ prāyaśaḥ pittalakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: rasaiḥ śuṣkaiḥ ca saṃsparśāt śvayathuḥ syāt visarpavān bhṛśa ūṣmā lohita ābhāsaḥ prāyaśas pitta lakṣaṇaḥ

original: viṣajaḥ saviṣaprāṇiparisarpaṇamūtraṇāt / daṃṣṭrādantanakhāghātādaviṣaprāṇināmapi //
analyzed: viṣa jaḥ sa viṣa prāṇi parisarpaṇa mūtraṇāt daṃṣṭrā danta nakha āghātāt aviṣa prāṇinām api

original: viṇmūtraśukropahatamalavadvastusaṃṅkarāt / viṣavṛkṣānilasparśādgarayogāvacūrṇanāt //
analyzed: viṣ mūtra śukra upahata malavat vastu saṃṅkarāt viṣa vṛkṣa anila sparśāt gara yoga avacūrṇanāt

original: mṛduścalo 'valambī ca śīghro dāharujākaraḥ / navo 'nupadravaḥ śothaḥ sādhyo 'sādhyaḥ pureritaḥ //
analyzed: mṛduḥ calaḥ valambī ca śīghraḥ dāha rujā karaḥ navaḥ śothaḥ sādhyaḥ sādhyaḥ purā īritaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pāṇḍusothanidānaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe pāṇḍusothanidānam nāma dviṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 163
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantīraruvāca / visarpādinidānante vakṣye suśruta tacchṛṇu / syādvisarpo vighātāttu doṣairduṣṭaiśca śothavat //
analyzed: dhanvantīraḥ uvāca visarpa ādi nidāna ante vakṣye suśruta tat śṛṇu syāt visarpaḥ vighātāt tu doṣaiḥ duṣṭaiḥ ca śotha vat

original: adhiṣṭhānañca taṃ prāhurbāhyaṃ tatra bhayācchramāt / yathāttarañca duḥ sādhyastatra doṣo yathāyatham //
analyzed: adhiṣṭhānam ca tam prāhuḥ bāhyam tatra bhayāt śramāt sādhyaḥ tatra doṣaḥ yathāyatham

original: prakopanaiḥ prakupitā viśeṣeṇa vidāhibhiḥ / dehe śīghraṃ viśantīha te 'ntare hi sthitā bahiḥ //
analyzed: prakopanaiḥ prakupitāḥ viśeṣeṇa vidāhibhiḥ dehe śīghram viśanti iha te ntare hi sthitāḥ bahis

original: tṛṣṇābhiyogādvegānāṃ viṣamācca pravartanāt / āśu cāgnibalabhraṃśādato bāhyaṃ visarpayet //
analyzed: tṛṣṇā abhiyogāt vegānām viṣamāt ca pravartanāt āśu ca agni bala bhraṃśāt atas bāhyam visarpayet

original: tatra vātātsa vīsarpo vātajvarasamavyathaḥ / śothasphuraṇanistodabhedāyāsārtiharṣavān //
analyzed: tatra vātāt sa vīsarpaḥ vāta jvara sama vyathaḥ śotha sphuraṇa nistoda bheda āyāsa ārti harṣavān

original: pittāddrutagatiḥ pittajvaraliṅgo 'tilohitaḥ / kaphātkaṇḍūyutaḥ snigdhaḥ kaphajvarasamānaruk //
analyzed: pittāt druta gatiḥ pitta jvara liṅgaḥ ti lohitaḥ kaphāt kaṇḍū yutaḥ snigdhaḥ kapha jvara samāna ruj

original: sannipātasamutthāśca sarvaliṅgasamanvitāḥ / svadoṣaliṅgaiścīyante sarvaiḥ sphoṭairupekṣitāḥ / te 'pi svedānvimuñcati bibhrato vraṇalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: sannipāta samutthāḥ ca sarva liṅga samanvitāḥ sva doṣa liṅgaiḥ cīyante sarvaiḥ sphoṭaiḥ upekṣitāḥ te svedān vimuñcati bibhrataḥ vraṇa lakṣaṇam

original: vātapittājjvaracchardimūrchātīsāratṛḍbhramaiḥ / ganthibhedāgnisadanatamakārocakairyutaḥ //
analyzed: vāta pittāt jvara chardi mūrchā atīsāra tṛṣ bhramaiḥ ganthi bheda agni sadana tamaka arocakaiḥ yutaḥ

original: karoti sarvamaṅgañca dīptāṅgārāvakīrṇavat / yaṃyaṃ deśaṃ visarpaśca visarpati bhavetsasaḥ //
analyzed: karoti sarvam aṅgam ca dīpta aṅgāra avakīrṇa vat yaṃ yam deśam visarpaḥ ca visarpati bhavet sasaḥ

original: śāntāṅgārāsito nīlo rakto vāsu ca cīyate / agnidagdha iva sphoṭaiḥ śīghragatvāddrutaṃ sa ca //
analyzed: śānta aṅgāra asitaḥ nīlaḥ raktaḥ ca cīyate agni dagdhaḥ iva sphoṭaiḥ śīghra ga tvāt drutam sa ca

original: marmānusārī vīsarpaḥ syādvāto 'tibalastataḥ / vyathate 'ṅgaṃ haretsaṃjñāṃ nidrāñca śvāsamīrayet //
analyzed: marma anusārī vīsarpaḥ syāt vātaḥ ti balaḥ tatas vyathate ṅgam haret saṃjñām nidrām ca śvāsam īrayet

original: hikkāñca sa gato 'vasthāmīdṛśīṃ labhate naraḥ / kvacinmarmāratigrasto bhūmiśayyāsanādiṣu //
analyzed: hikkām ca sa gataḥ vasthām īdṛśīm labhate naraḥ kvacid marma arati grastaḥ bhūmi śayyā āsana ādiṣu

original: ceṣṭamānastataḥ kliṣṭo manodehapramohavān / duṣprabodho 'śnute nidrāṃ so 'gnivīsarpa ucyate //
analyzed: ceṣṭamānaḥ tatas kliṣṭaḥ manaḥ deha pramohavān duṣprabodhaḥ śnute nidrām saḥ gnivīsarpaḥ ucyate

original: kaphena ruddhaḥ pavano bhittvātaṃ bahudhā kapham / raktaṃ vā vṛddharaktasya tvakchirāsnāyumāṃsagam //
analyzed: kaphena ruddhaḥ pavanaḥ bahudhā kapham raktam vā vṛddha raktasya tvac sirā snāyu māṃsa gam

original: dūṣayitvā tu dīrghānuvṛttasthūlakharātmikām / granthīnāṃ kurute mālāṃ saraktāntīvrarugjvarām //
analyzed: dūṣayitvā tu dīrgha anuvṛtta sthūla khara ātmikām granthīnām kurute mālām sa raktān tīvra ruj jvarām

original: śvāsakāsātisārāsyaśoṣahikkāvamibhramaiḥ / mohavaivarṇyamūrchāṅgabhaṅgagnisadanairyutām / ityayaṃ granthivīsarpaḥ kaphamārutakopajaḥ //
analyzed: śvāsa kāsa atisāra āsya śoṣa hikkā vami bhramaiḥ moha vaivarṇya mūrchā aṅga bhaṅga agni sadanaiḥ yutām iti ayam granthivīsarpaḥ kapha māruta kopa jaḥ

original: kaphapittājjvaraḥ stambho nidrā tandrā śirorujā / aṅgāvasādavikṣeṃpau pralāpārocakabhramāḥ //
analyzed: kapha pittāt jvaraḥ stambhaḥ nidrā tandrā śiraḥ rujā aṅga avasāda vikṣeṃpau pralāpa arocaka bhramāḥ

original: mūrchāgnihānirbhedo 'sthnāṃ pipāsendriyagauravam / āmopaveśanaṃ lepaḥ srotasāṃ sa ca sarpati //
analyzed: mūrchā agni hāniḥ bhedaḥ sthnām pipāsā indriya gauravam āma upaveśanam lepaḥ srotasām sa ca sarpati

original: prāyeṇāmāśayaṃ gṛhṇannekadeśaṃ na cātiruk / pīḍakairavakīrṇo 'tipītalohitapāṇḍuraiḥ //
analyzed: prāyeṇa āmāśayam gṛhṇan eka deśam na ca ati ruj pīḍakaiḥ avakīrṇaḥ ti pīta lohita pāṇḍuraiḥ

original: snidhno 'sito mecakābho malinaḥ śothavānguruḥ / gambhīrapākaḥ prāyoṣmaspṛṣṭaḥ klinnoṃ'vadīryate //
analyzed: snidhnaḥ sitaḥ mecaka ābhaḥ malinaḥ śothavān guruḥ gambhīra pākaḥ prāya ūṣma spṛṣṭaḥ klinna uṃ vat īryate

original: pakvavacchīrṇamāṃsaśca spaṣṭasnāyuśirāgaṇaḥ / sarvago lakṣaṇaiḥ sarveḥ sarvagatvaksamarpaṇaḥ / śavagandhī ca vīsarpaḥ kardamākhyamuśanti tam //
analyzed: pakva vat śīrṇa māṃsaḥ ca spaṣṭa snāyu sirā gaṇaḥ sarvagaḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ sarveḥ sarva ga tvac samarpaṇaḥ śava gandhī ca vīsarpaḥ kardama ākhyam uśanti tam

original: bāhyahetoḥ kṣatātkruddhvaḥ saraktaṃ pittamīrayan / vīsarpaṃ mārutaḥ kuryātkulatthasadṛśaiścitam //
analyzed: bāhya hetoḥ kṣatāt sa raktam pittam īrayan  vīsarpam mārutaḥ kuryāt kulattha sadṛśaiḥ citam

original: sphoṭaiḥ śothajvararujādāhāḍhyaṃ śyāvaśoṇitam / pathagdoṣaistrayaḥ sādhyā dvandvajāścānupadravāḥ //
analyzed: sphoṭaiḥ śotha jvara rujā dāha āḍhyam śyāva śoṇitam pathak doṣaiḥ trayaḥ sādhyāḥ dvandva jāḥ ca anupadravāḥ

original: asādhyāḥ kṛtasarvotthāḥ sarve cākrāntamarmaṇaḥ / śīrṇasnāyuśirāmāṃsāḥ klinnāścaśavagandhayaḥ //
analyzed: asādhyāḥ kṛta sarva utthāḥ sarve ca ākrānta marmaṇaḥ śīrṇa snāyu sirā māṃsāḥ klinnāḥ ca śava gandhayaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vīsarpanidānaṃ nāma tripaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vīsarpanidānam nāma tripaṣṭyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 164
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / mithyāhāravihāreṇa viśeṣeṇa virodhinā / sādhunindāvadhādyuddhaharaṇādyaiśca sevitaiḥ //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca mithyā āhāra vihāreṇa viśeṣeṇa virodhinā sādhu nindā vadhāt yuddha haraṇa ādyaiḥ ca sevitaiḥ

original: pāpmabhiḥ karmabhiḥ sadyaḥ prāktanaiḥ preritāmalāḥ / śirāḥ prapadya tairyuktāstvagvasāraktamāmiṣam //
analyzed: pāpmabhiḥ karmabhiḥ sadyas prāktanaiḥ prerita amalāḥ sirāḥ prapadya taiḥ yuktāḥ tvac vasā raktam āmiṣam

original: dūṣayanti ca saṃśoṣya niścarantastato bahiḥ / tvacaḥ kurvānti vaivarṇyaṃ śiṣṭāḥ kuṣṭhamuśantitam //
analyzed: dūṣayanti ca saṃśoṣya niścarantaḥ tatas bahis tvacaḥ kurvānti vaivarṇyam śiṣṭāḥ kuṣṭham uśanti tam

original: kālenopekṣitaṃ yatsyātsarvaṃ koṣṭhāni tadvapuḥ / prapadya dhātūnbāhyāntaḥ sarvānsaṃkledya cāvahet //
analyzed: kālena upekṣitam yat syāt sarvam koṣṭhāni tat vapuḥ prapadya dhātūn bāhya antar sarvān saṃkledya ca āvahet

original: sasvedakledasaṅkocānkṛmīn sūkṣmāṃścadāruṇān / lomatvaksnāyudhamanīrākrāmati yathākramam //
analyzed: sa sveda kleda saṅkocān kṛmīn sūkṣmān ca dāruṇān loma tvak snāyu dhamanīḥ ākrāmati yathākramam

original: bhasmācchāditavatkuryādbāhyaṃ kuṣṭhamudāhṛtam / kuṣṭhāni saptadhā doṣaiḥ pṛthagdvandvaiḥ samāgataiḥ //
analyzed: bhasma ācchādita vat kuryāt bāhyam kuṣṭham udāhṛtam  kuṣṭhāni saptadhā doṣaiḥ pṛthak dvandvaiḥ samāgataiḥ

original: sarveṣvapi tridoṣeṣu vyapadeśo 'dhikastataḥ / vātena kuṣṭhaṃ kāpālaṃ pittenaudumbaraṃ kaphāt //
analyzed: sarveṣu api tridoṣeṣu vyapadeśaḥ dhikaḥ tatas vātena kuṣṭham kāpālam pittena audumbaram kaphāt

original: maṇḍalākhyaṃ vicarco ca ṛṣyākhyaṃ vātapittajam / carmaikakuṣṭhaṃ kiṭimaṃ sidhmālasavipādikāḥ //
analyzed: maṇḍala ākhyam vicarco ca ṛṣi ākhyam vāta pitta jam carma ekakuṣṭham kiṭimam sidhma alasa vipādikāḥ

original: vātaśleṣmodbhavāḥ śleṣmapittāddadrūśatāruṣī / puṇḍarīkaṃ savisphoṭaṃ pāmā carmadalaṃ tathā //
analyzed: vāta śleṣma udbhavāḥ śleṣma pittāt dadrū śatāruṣī puṇḍarīkam sa visphoṭam pāmā carmadalam tathā

original: sarvebhyaḥ kākaṇaṃ pūrvatrikaṃ dadru sakākaṇam / puṇḍarīkaryajihve ca mahākuṣṭhāni sapta tu //
analyzed: sarvebhyaḥ kākaṇam pūrva trikam dadru sa kākaṇam puṇḍarīkarī ajihve ca mahākuṣṭhāni sapta tu

original: atiślakṣṇakharasparśasvedāsvedavivarṇatāḥ / dāhaḥ kaṇḍūstvaci svāpastodaḥ koconnatistamaḥ //
analyzed: ati ślakṣṇa khara sparśa sveda asveda vivarṇa tāḥ  dāhaḥ kaṇḍūḥ tvaci svāpaḥ todaḥ koca unnatiḥ tamaḥ

original: vraṇānāmadhikaṃ śūlaṃ śīghrotpattiścirasthitiḥ / rūḍhānāmapi rūkṣatvaṃ nimitte 'lpe 'tikopanam //
analyzed: vraṇānām adhikam śūlam śīghra utpattiḥ cira sthitiḥ rūḍhānām api rūkṣa tvam nimitte lpe tikopanam

original: romaharṣo 'sṛjaḥ kārṣṇyaṃ kuṣṭhalakṣaṇamagrajam / kṛṣṇāruṇakapālābhaṃ yadrūkṣaṃ paruṣaṃ tanu //
analyzed: sṛjaḥ kārṣṇyam kuṣṭha lakṣaṇam agra jam  kṛṣṇa aruṇa kapāla ābham yat rūkṣam paruṣam tanu

original: vistṛtākṛtiparyastandūṣitairlomabhiścitam / kāpālaṃ todabahulaṃ tatkuṣṭhaṃ viṣamaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: vistṛta ākṛti paryastan dūṣitaiḥ lomabhiḥ citam  kāpālam toda bahulam tat kuṣṭham viṣamam smṛtam

original: udumbaraphalābhāsaṃ kuṣṭhamaudumbaraṃ vadet / vartulaṃ bahulaketyuktaṃ dāharujādhikam //
analyzed: udumbara phala ābhāsam kuṣṭham audumbaram vadet  vartulam dāha rujā adhikam

original: asaṃcchannamadaraṇaṃ kṛmivatsyādudumbaram / sthiraṃ satyānaṃ guru snigdhaṃ śvetaraktaṃ malānvitam //
analyzed: asaṃcchannam adaraṇam kṛmi vat syāt udumbaram sthiram guru snigdham śveta raktam mala anvitam

original: anyonyasaktapucchūnabahukaṇḍūsnutikṛmi / ślakṣṇapītābhāsaṃyuktaṃ maṇḍalaṃ parikīrtitam //
analyzed: anyonya sakta pucchūna bahu kaṇḍū snuti kṛmi ślakṣṇa pīta ābhā saṃyuktam maṇḍalam parikīrtitam

original: sakaṇḍūpiṭikā śyāvā sakledā ca vicarcikā / paruṣantatraraktāntamantaḥ śyāmaṃ samunnatam //
analyzed: sa kaṇḍū piṭikā śyāvā sa kledā ca vicarcikā

original: ṛṣyajihvākṛtiproktaṃ ṛṣyajihvaṃ bahukrimi / hasticarmakharasparśaṃ carmākhyaṃ kuṣṭhamucyate //
analyzed: ṛṣya jihvā ākṛti proktam ṛṣyajihvam bahu krimi hasti carma khara sparśam carma ākhyam kuṣṭham ucyate

original: asvedañcamatsyaśalkasannibhaṃ kiṭimaṃ punaḥ / rūkṣāgnivarṇaṃ duḥ sparśaṃ kaṇḍūmatparuṣāsitam //
analyzed: asvedañca matsya śalka sannibham kiṭimam punar rūkṣa agni varṇam duḥ sparśam kaṇḍūmat paruṣa asitam

original: antā rūkṣaṃ bahiḥ snigdhamantarghṛṣṭaṃ rajaḥ kiret / ślakṣṇasparśaṃ tanu snigdhaṃ svacchamasvedapuṣpavat //
analyzed: antar rūkṣam bahis snigdham antar ghṛṣṭam rajaḥ kiret ślakṣṇa sparśam tanu snigdham svaccham asveda puṣpavat

original: prāyeṇa cordhvakārśyañca kuṇḍaiḥ kaṇḍūparaiścitam / raktairalaṃśukā pāṇipāde kuryādvipādikā //
analyzed: prāyeṇa ca ūrdhva kārśyam ca kuṇḍaiḥ kaṇḍū paraiḥ citam pāṇi pāde kuryāt vipādikā

original: tīvrārtiṃ gāḍhakaṇḍūñca sarāgapiḍikācitam / dīrghapratānadūrvāvadatasīkusumacchavi //
analyzed: tīvra ārtim gāḍha kaṇḍūm ca sa rāga piḍikā citam dīrgha pratāna dūrvāvat atasī kusuma chavi

original: ucchūnamaṇḍalo dadruḥ kaṇḍūmāniti kathyate / sthūlamūlaṃ sadāhārti raktastrāvaṃ bahuvraṇam //
analyzed: ucchūna maṇḍalaḥ dadruḥ kaṇḍūmān iti kathyate sthūla mūlam sa dāha ārti rakta strāvam bahu vraṇam

original: sādahakakledarujaṃ prāyaśaḥ sarvajanma ca / raktāktamaṇḍalaṃ pāṇḍu kaṇḍūdāharujānvitam //
analyzed: prāyaśas sarva janma ca rakta akta maṇḍalam pāṇḍu kaṇḍū dāha rujā anvitam

original: sotsedhamācitaṃ raktaiḥ kañjaparṇamivāmbubhiḥ / puṇḍarīkaṃ bhavettaddhi citaṃ sphoṭaiḥ sitāruṇaiḥ //
analyzed: sa utsedham ācitam raktaiḥ kañja parṇam iva ambuṣu  puṇḍarīkam bhavet tat hi citam sphoṭaiḥ sita aruṇaiḥ

original: visphoṭapiṭikā pāmā kaṇḍūkledarujānvitāḥ / sūkṣmā śyāmāruṇā rūkṣā prāyaḥ sphikpāṇikūrpare //
analyzed: visphoṭa piṭikā pāmā kaṇḍū kleda rujā anvitāḥ sūkṣmā śyāma aruṇā rūkṣā prāyas sphic pāṇi kūrpare

original: sasphoṭasaṃsparśasahaṃ kaṇḍūraktātidāhavat / raktadalaṃ carmadalaṃ kākaṇaṃ tīvradāharuk //
analyzed: sa sphoṭa saṃsparśa saham kaṇḍū rakta ati dāhavat raktadalam carmadalam kākaṇam tīvra dāha ruj

original: pūrvaraktañca kṛṣṇañca kākaṇaṃ triphalopamam / kṛṣṇaliṅgairyutaiḥ sarvaiḥ svasvakāraṇato bhavet //
analyzed: pūrva raktam ca kṛṣṇam ca kākaṇam triphalā upamam kṛṣṇa liṅgaiḥ yutaiḥ sarvaiḥ sva sva kāraṇataḥ bhavet

original: doṣabhedāya vihitairādiśelliṅgakarmabhiḥ / kuṣṭhasvadoṣānugataṃ sarvadoṣagataṃ tyajet //
analyzed: doṣa bhedāya vihitaiḥ ādiśet liṅga karmabhiḥ kuṣṭha sva doṣa anugatam sarva doṣa gatam tyajet

original: kuṣṭhoktaṃ yacca yaccāsthimajjāśukrasamāśrayam / kṛcchraṃ medomatañcaiva yāpyaṃ snāpvāsthimāṃsagam //
analyzed: kuṣṭha uktam yat ca yat ca asthi majjā śukra samāśrayam kṛcchram medaḥ matam ca eva yāpyam snāpvā asthi māṃsa gam

original: akṛcchraṃ kaphavātotthaṃ tvaggataṃ tvamalañca yat / tatra tvaci sthite kaṣṭhe kāye vaivarṇyarūkṣātā //
analyzed: akṛcchram kapha vāta uttham tvac gatam tu amalam ca yat tatra tvaci sthite kaṣṭhe kāye vaivarṇya rūkṣa tā

original: svedatāpaśvayathavaḥ śoṇite piśite punaḥ / pāṇipādāśritāḥ sphoṭāḥ kleśātsandhiṣu cādhikam //
analyzed: sveda tāpa śvayathavaḥ śoṇite piśite punar pāṇi pāda āśritāḥ sphoṭāḥ kleśāt sandhiṣu ca adhikam

original: doṣasyābhīkṣṇayogena dalanaṃ syācca medasi / nātisaṃjñāsti majjāsthinetravegasvarakṣyaḥ //
analyzed: doṣasya abhīkṣṇa yogena dalanam syāt ca medasi na ati saṃjñā asti majja asthi netra vega svarakṣyaḥ

original: kṣate ca krimibhiḥ śukre svadārāpatyabādhanam / yathāpūrvāṇi sarvāṇi svaliṅgāni mṛgādiṣu //
analyzed: kṣate ca krimibhiḥ śukre sva dāra apatya bādhanam yathāpūrvāṇi sarvāṇi sva liṅgāni mṛga ādiṣu

original: kaṣṭhaikasambhavaṃ śvitraṃ kilāsaṃ dāruṇaṃ bhavet / nirdiṣṭamaparistrāvi tridhātūdbhavasaṃśrayam //
analyzed: kaṣṭha eka sambhavam śvitram kilāsam dāruṇam bhavet nirdiṣṭam aparistrāvi tridhātu udbhava saṃśrayam

original: vātādrūkṣāruṇaṃ pittāttāmraṃ kamalapatravat / sadāhaṃ romavidhvaṃsi kaphācchvetaṃ ghana guru //
analyzed: vātāt rūkṣa aruṇam pittāt tāmram kamala patra vat sa dāham roma vidhvaṃsi kaphāt śvetam ghana guru

original: sakaṇḍūraṃ kramādraktamāṃsamedaḥ su cādiśet / varṇenaivedṛgubhayaṃ kṛcchraṃ taccottarottaram //
analyzed: sa kaṇḍūram kramāt rakta māṃsa medaḥ ca ādiśet varṇena eva īdṛś ubhayam kṛcchram tat ca uttarottaram

original: aśuklaromabahulamasaṃśliṣṭaṃ mitho navam / anagnidagdhajaṃ sādhyaṃ śvitraṃ varjyamato 'nyathā //
analyzed: aśukla roma bahulam asaṃśliṣṭam mithas navam anagni dagdha jam sādhyam śvitram varjyam atas nyathā

original: guhyapāṇitalauṣṭheṣu jātamapyacirantaram / varjanīyaṃ viśeṣeṇa kilāsaṃ siddhimicchitā //
analyzed: guhya pāṇi tala oṣṭheṣu jātam api acirantaram varjanīyam viśeṣeṇa kilāsam siddhim icchitā

original: sparśaikāhārasaṃgādisevanātprāyaśo gadāḥ / ekaśayyāsanāccaiva vastramālyānulepanāt //
analyzed: sparśa eka āhāra saṃga ādi sevanāt prāyaśas gadāḥ eka śayyā āsanāt ca eva vastra mālya anulepanāt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kuṣṭharoganidāna nāma catuḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe kuṣṭharoganidāna nāma catuḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 165
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / krimayaśca dvidhā proktā bāhyabhyantarabhedataḥ / bahirmalakaphāsṛgviṭjanmabhedāccaturvidhāḥ //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca krimayaḥ ca dvidhā proktāḥ bāhi abhyantara bhedataḥ bahis mala kapha asṛj viṣ janma bhedāt caturvidhāḥ

original: nāmato viṃśatividhā bāhyāstatra malodbhavāḥ / tilapramāṇasaṃsthānavarṇāḥ keśāmbarāśrayāḥ //
analyzed: nāmataḥ viṃśatividhāḥ bāhyāḥ tatra mala udbhavāḥ tila pramāṇa saṃsthāna varṇāḥ keśa ambara āśrayāḥ

original: bahupādāśca sūkṣmāśca yūkā likṣāśca nāmataḥ / dvidhā te koṣṭhapiḍikāḥ kaṇḍūgaṇḍānprakurvate //
analyzed: bahu pādāḥ ca sūkṣmāḥ ca yūkāḥ likṣāḥ ca nāmataḥ dvidhā te koṣṭha piḍikāḥ kaṇḍū gaṇḍān prakurvate

original: kuṣṭhaikahetavo 'ntarjāḥ śleṣmajā bāhyasambhavāḥ / madhurānnaguḍakṣīradadhimatsyanavaudanaiḥ //
analyzed: kuṣṭha eka hetavaḥ ntar jāḥ śleṣma jāḥ bāhya sambhavāḥ madhura anna guḍa kṣīra dadhi matsya nava odanaiḥ

original: kaphādāmāśaye jātā vṛddhāḥ sarpanti sarvataḥ / pṛthubradhnanibhāḥ kecitkecidgaṇḍūpadopamāḥ //
analyzed: kaphāt āmāśaye jātāḥ vṛddhāḥ sarpanti sarvatas pṛthu bradhna nibhāḥ kecid kecid gaṇḍūpada upamāḥ

original: rūḍhadhānyāṅkurākārāstanudīrghāstathāṇavaḥ / śvetāstāmrāvabhāsāśca nāmataḥ saptadhā tu te //
analyzed: rūḍha dhānya aṅkura ākārāḥ tanu dīrghāḥ tathā aṇavaḥ śvetāḥ tāmra avabhāsāḥ ca nāmataḥ saptadhā tu te

original: antrādā udarāveṣṭā hṛdayādā mahāgudāḥ / cyuravo darbhakusumāḥ sugandhāste ca kurvate //
analyzed: antrādāḥ udarāveṣṭāḥ hṛdayādāḥ mahāgudāḥ cyuravaḥ darbhakusumāḥ sugandhāḥ te ca kurvate

original: hṛllāsamāsyaśravaṇamavipākamarocakam / mūrchācchardijvarānāhakārśyakṣavathupīnasān //
analyzed: hṛllāsam āsya śravaṇam avipākam arocakam mūrchā chardi jvara ānāha kārśya kṣavathu pīnasān

original: raktavāhiśirāsthānaraktajā jantavo 'ṇavaḥ / apādā vṛttatāmrāśca saukṣmyātkecidadarśanāḥ //
analyzed: rakta vāhi sirā sthāna rakta jāḥ jantavaḥ apādāḥ vṛtta tāmrāḥ ca saukṣmyāt kecid adarśanāḥ

original: keśādā romavidhvaṃsā romadvīpā udumbarāḥ / ṣaṭte kuṣṭhaikakarmāṇaḥ sahasaurasamātaraḥ //
analyzed: keśādāḥ romavidhvaṃsāḥ romadvīpāḥ udumbarāḥ ṣaṭ te kuṣṭha eka karmāṇaḥ sahasā aurasa mātaraḥ

original: pakvāśaye purīṣotthā jāyante 'thovisarpiṇaḥ / vṛddhāste syurbhaveyuśca te yadāmāśayonmukhāḥ //
analyzed: pakvāśaye purīṣa utthāḥ jāyante vṛddhāḥ te syuḥ bhaveyuḥ ca te yadā āmāśaya unmukhāḥ

original: tadāsyodgāraniḥ śvāmaviḍgandhānuvidhāyinaḥ / pṛthuvṛttatanusthūlāḥ śyāvapītasitāsitāḥ //
analyzed: tadā asya udgāra niḥ śvāma viṣ gandha anuvidhāyinaḥ pṛthu vṛtta tanu sthūlāḥ śyāva pīta sita asitāḥ

original: te pañcanāmnā krimayaḥ kakerukamakerukāḥ / sausurādāḥ saśūlākhyā lelihā janayanti hi //
analyzed: te pañca nāmnā krimayaḥ kakeruka makerukāḥ sausurādāḥ sa śūla ākhyāḥ lelihāḥ janayanti hi

original: vaṅbhedaśūlaviṣṭambhakārśyapāruṣyapāṇḍutāḥ / romaharṣāgnisadanaṃ gudakaṇḍūṃrvimārgagāḥ //
analyzed: vak bheda śūla viṣṭambha kārśya pāruṣya pāṇḍutāḥ roma harṣa agni sadanam guda kaṇḍūṃr vimārga gāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kriminidānaṃ nāma pañcaṣaṣṭhyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe kriminidānam nāma pañcaṣaṣṭhyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 166
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / vātavyādhinidānaṃ te vakṣye suśruta tacchṛṇu / sarvathānarthakathane vighna eva ca kāraṇam //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca vātavyādhi nidānam te vakṣye suśruta tat śṛṇu sarvathā anartha kathane vighnaḥ eva ca kāraṇam

original: adṛṣṭaduṣṭapavanaśarīramaviśeṣataḥ / sa viśvakarmā viśvātmā viśvarūpaḥ prajāpatiḥ //
analyzed: adṛṣṭa duṣṭa pavana śarīram aviśeṣataḥ sa viśva karmā viśva ātmā viśva rūpaḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: sraṣṭā dhātā vibhurviṣṇuḥ saṃhartā mṛtyurantakaḥ / tadvaduktaṃ ca yatnena yatitavyamataḥ sadā //
analyzed: sraṣṭā dhātā vibhuḥ viṣṇuḥ saṃhartā mṛtyuḥ antakaḥ tadvat uktam ca yatnena yatitavyam atas sadā

original: tasyokte doṣavijñāne karma prākṛtavaikṛtam / samāsavyāsato doṣabhedānāmavadhārya ca //
analyzed: tasya ukte doṣa vijñāne karma prākṛta vaikṛtam samāsa vyāsataḥ doṣa bhedānām avadhārya ca

original: pratyekaṃ pañcadhā vīro vyāpāraśceha vaikṛtaḥ / tasyocyate vibhāgena sanidānaṃ salakṣaṇam //
analyzed: pratyekam pañcadhā vīraḥ vyāpāraḥ ca iha vaikṛtaḥ tasya ucyate vibhāgena sa nidānam sa lakṣaṇam

original: dhātukṣayakarairvāyuḥ kruddho nātiniṣevyate / catuḥ snoto 'vakāśeṣu bhūyastānyeva pūrayet //
analyzed: dhātu kṣaya karaiḥ vāyuḥ kruddhaḥ na ati niṣevyate  catuḥ snotaḥ vakāśeṣu bhūyas tāni eva pūrayet

original: tebhyastu doṣapūrṇebhyaḥ pracchādya vivaraṃ tataḥ / tava vāyuḥ sakṛtkruddhaḥ śūlānāhāntrakūjanam //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ tu doṣa pūrṇebhyaḥ pracchādya vivaram tatas tava vāyuḥ sakṛt kruddhaḥ śūla ānāha antra kūjanam

original: malarodhaṃ svarabhraṃśaṃ dṛṣṭipṛṣṭhakaṭigraham / karotyeva punaḥ kāye kṛcchrānanyānupadravān //
analyzed: mala rodham svara bhraṃśam dṛṣṭi pṛṣṭha kaṭi graham karoti eva punar kāye kṛcchrān anyān upadravān

original: āmāśayotthavamathuśvāsakāsaviṣūcikāḥ / kaṇḍūparodhagharmādivyādhīnūrdhvañca nābhitaḥ //
analyzed: āmāśaya uttha vamathu śvāsa kāsa viṣūcikāḥ kaṇḍū uparodha gharma ādi vyādhīn ūrdhvañca nābhitaḥ

original: śrotrādīndriyabādhāṃ ca tvaci sphoṭanarūkṣatām / cakretīvrarujāśvāsagarāmayavivarṇatāḥ //
analyzed: śrotra ādi indriya bādhām ca tvaci sphoṭana rūkṣa tām

original: antrasyāntañca viṣṭambhamaruciṃ kṛśatāṃ bhramam / māṃsamedogatagranthiṃ carmādāvupakarkaśam //
analyzed: antrasya antar ca viṣṭambham arucim kṛśa tām bhramam māṃsa medaḥ gata granthim carma ādau upakarkaśam

original: gurvaṅgantudyate 'tyarthaṃ daṇḍamuṣṭihataṃ yathā / asthisthaḥ sakthisandhyasthiśūlaṃ tīvrañca lakṣayet //
analyzed: guru aṅgan tudyate tyartham daṇḍa muṣṭi hatam yathā asthi sthaḥ sakthi sandhi asthi śūlam tīvram ca lakṣayet

original: majjastho 'sthiṣu cāsthairyamasvapnaṃ yattadā rujām / śukrasya śīghramutsaṅgasargānvikṛtimeva vā //
analyzed: ca asthairyam asvapnam yat tadā rujām  śukrasya śīghram utsaṅga sargān vikṛtim eva vā

original: tattadgarbhasthaśukrasthaḥ śirasyādhmānariktātā / tatra sthānasthitaḥ kuryāt kruddhaḥ śvayathukṛcchratām //
analyzed: tad tad garbha stha śukra sthaḥ tatra sthāna sthitaḥ kuryāt kruddhaḥ śvayathu kṛcchra tām

original: jalapūrṇadṛtisparśaṃ śoṣaṃ sandhigato 'nilaḥ / sarvāṅgasaṃśrayastodabhedasphuraṇabhañjanam //
analyzed: jala pūrṇa dṛti sparśam śoṣam sandhi gataḥ nilaḥ sarva aṅga saṃśrayaḥ toda bheda sphuraṇa bhañjanam

original: stambhanākṣepaṇaṃ svapnaḥ sandhibhañjanakampanam / yadā tu dhamanīḥ sarvāḥ kruddho 'bhyeti muhurmuhuḥ / tadāṅgamākṣipatyeṣa vyādhirākṣepaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: stambhana ākṣepaṇam svapnaḥ sandhi bhañjana kampanam  yadā tu dhamanīḥ sarvāḥ kruddhaḥ bhyeti muhur muhur  tadā aṅgam ākṣipati eṣa vyādhiḥ ākṣepaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: adhaḥ pratihato vāyurvrajedūrdhvaṃ yadā punaḥ / tadāvaṣṭabhya hṛdayaṃ śiraḥ śaṅkhau ca pīḍayet //
analyzed: adhas pratihataḥ vāyuḥ vrajet ūrdhvam yadā punar tadā avaṣṭabhya hṛdayam śiraḥ śaṅkhau ca pīḍayet

original: sakṣipetparito gātraṃ hanuṃ vā cāsya nāmayat / kṛcchrāducchvasitaṃ cāpi nimīlannayanadvayam //
analyzed: sa kṣipet paritas gātram hanum vā ca asya nāmayat kṛcchrāt ucchvasitam ca api nimīlat nayana dvayam

original: kapota iva kūjecca niḥ saṃgaḥ sopatantrakaḥ / sa eva vāmanāsāyāṃ yuktastu marutā hṛdi //
analyzed: kapotaḥ iva kūjet ca niḥ saṃgaḥ sa upatantrakaḥ saḥ eva vāma nāsāyām yuktaḥ tu marutā hṛdi

original: prāpnoti ca muhuḥ svāsthyaṃ muhurasvāsthyavānbhavet / abhighātasamutthaśca duścikitsyatamo mataḥ //
analyzed: prāpnoti ca muhur svāsthyam muhur asvāsthyavān bhavet abhighāta samutthaḥ ca duścikitsyatamaḥ mataḥ

original: svedastambhaṃ tadā tasya vāyuśchinnatanuryadā / vyāpnoti sakalaṃ dehaṃ yatra cāyāmyate punaḥ //
analyzed: sveda stambham tadā tasya vāyuḥ chinna tanuḥ yadā vyāpnoti sakalam deham yatra ca āyāmyate punar

original: antardhāntugataścaiva vegastambhaṃ ca netrayoḥ / karoti jṛmbhāṃ sadanaṃ daśanānāṃ hatodyamam //
