analyzed: antardhā antu gataḥ ca eva vega stambham ca netrayoḥ karoti jṛmbhām sadanam daśanānām hata udyamam

original: pārśvayorvedanāṃ bāhyāṃ hanupṛṣṭhasirograham / dehasya bahirāyāmaṃ pṛṣṭhato hṛdaye śiraḥ //
analyzed: pārśvayoḥ vedanām bāhyām hanu pṛṣṭha siraḥ graham dehasya bahis āyāmam pṛṣṭhatas hṛdaye śiraḥ

original: uraścotkṣipyate tatra skandho vā nāmyate tadā / danteṣvāsye ca vaivarṇyaṃ hyasvedastatra gātrataḥ //
analyzed: uraḥ ca utkṣipyate tatra skandhaḥ vā nāmyate tadā danteṣu āsye ca vaivarṇyam hi asvedaḥ tatra gātrataḥ

original: bāhyāyāmaṃ hanustambhaṃ bravate vātarogiṇam / viṇmūtramasṛjaṃ prāpya sasamīrasamīraṇāḥ? //
analyzed: bāhyāyāmam hanustambham bravate vāta rogiṇam viṣ mūtram asṛjam prāpya sa samīra samīraṇāḥ

original: āyacchanti tanordeṣāḥ sarvamāpādamastakam / tiṣṭhataḥ pāṇḍumātrasya vraṇāyāmaḥ suvardhitaḥ //
analyzed: āyacchanti sarvam āpādamastakam  tiṣṭhataḥ pāṇḍu mātrasya vraṇāyāmaḥ su vardhitaḥ

original: gātravege bhavetsvāsthyaṃ sarveṣvākṣepaṇena tat / jihvāvilekhanāduṣṇabhakṣaṇādatimānataḥ //
analyzed: gātra vege bhavet svāsthyam sarveṣu ākṣepaṇena tat jihvā vilekhanāt uṣṇa bhakṣaṇāt ati mānataḥ

original: kupito hanumūlasthaḥ stambhayitvānilo hanum / karoti vivṛtāsyatvamathavā saṃvṛtāsyatām //
analyzed: kupitaḥ hanu mūla sthaḥ stambhayitvā anilaḥ hanum  karoti vivṛta āsya tvam athavā saṃvṛta āsya tām

original: hanastambhaḥ sa tena syātkṛcchrāccarvaṇabhāṣaṇam / vāgvādinī śirāstambho jihvāṃ stambhayate 'nilaḥ //
analyzed: hanastambhaḥ sa tena syāt kṛcchrāt carvaṇa bhāṣaṇam vāgvādinī sirā stambhaḥ jihvām stambhayate nilaḥ

original: jihvāstambhaḥ sa tenānnapānavākyeṣvanīśatā / śirasā bhāraharaṇādatihāsyaprabhāṣaṇāt //
analyzed: jihvāstambhaḥ sa tena anna pāna vākyeṣu anīśa tā śirasā bhāra haraṇāt ati hāsya prabhāṣaṇāt

original: viṣamādupadhānācca kaṭhinānāṃ ca carvaṇāt / vāyurvivardhate taiśca vātūlairūrdhvamāsthitaḥ //
analyzed: viṣamāt upadhānāt ca kaṭhinānām ca carvaṇāt vāyuḥ vivardhate taiḥ ca vātūlaiḥ ūrdhvam āsthitaḥ

original: vakrīkaroti vaktraṃ ca hyuccairhasitamīkṣitam / tato 'sya kurute mṛdvīṃ vākśaktiṃ stabdhanetratām //
analyzed: vakrīkaroti vaktram ca hi uccais hasitam īkṣitam

original: dantacālaṃ svarabhraṃśaḥ śrutihānīkṣitagrahau / gandhājñānaṃ smṛtidhvaṃsastrāsaḥ śvāsaśca jāyate //
analyzed: danta cālam svara bhraṃśaḥ śruti hāni īkṣita grahau gandha ajñānam smṛti dhvaṃsaḥ trāsaḥ śvāsaḥ ca jāyate

original: niṣṭhīvaḥ pārśvatodaśca hyekasyākṣṇo nimīlanam / jatrorūrdhvaṃ rujastīvrāḥ śarīrārdhadharo 'pi vā //
analyzed: niṣṭhīvaḥ pārśva todaḥ ca hi ekasya akṣṇaḥ nimīlanam jatroḥ ūrdhvam rujaḥ tīvrāḥ vā

original: tamāhurarditaṃ kecidekāṅgamatha cāpare / raktamāśritya ca śirāḥ kuryānmūrdhadharāḥ śirāḥ? //
analyzed: tam āhuḥ arditam kecid ekāṅgam atha ca apare raktam āśritya ca sirāḥ kuryāt mūrdha dharāḥ sirāḥ

original: rūkṣaḥ savedanaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ so 'sādhyaḥ syācchirograhaḥ / tanuṃ gṛhītvā vāyuśca snāyustathaiva ca //
analyzed: rūkṣaḥ sa vedanaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ saḥ sādhyaḥ syāt śiraḥ grahaḥ tanum gṛhītvā vāyuḥ ca snāyuḥ tathā eva ca

original: pakṣamanyataraṃ hanti pakṣāghātaḥ sa ucyate / kṛtsnasya kāyasyārdhaṃ syādakarmaṇyamacetanam //
analyzed: pakṣam anyataram hanti pakṣāghātaḥ saḥ ucyate kṛtsnasya kāyasya ardham syāt akarmaṇyam acetanam

original: ekāṅgarogatāṃ kecidanye kakṣarujāṃ viduḥ / sarvāṅgarodhaḥ stambhaśca sarvakāyāśrite 'nile //
analyzed: ekāṅgaroga tām kecid anye kakṣarujām viduḥ sarva aṅga rodhaḥ stambhaḥ ca sarva kāya āśrite nile

original: śuddhavātakṛtaḥ pakṣaḥ kṛcchrasādhyatamo mataḥ / kṛcchraścānyena saṃsṛṣṭo vivṛddhaḥ kṣayahetukaḥ //
analyzed: śuddha vāta kṛtaḥ pakṣaḥ kṛcchra sādhyatamaḥ mataḥ kṛcchraḥ ca anyena saṃsṛṣṭaḥ vivṛddhaḥ kṣaya hetukaḥ

original: āmabaddhāyanaḥ kuryātsaṃstabhyāṅgaṃ kaphānvitaḥ / asādhya eva sarvo hi bhaveddaṇḍāpatānakaḥ //
analyzed: āma baddha ayanaḥ kuryāt saṃstabhya aṅgam kapha anvitaḥ asādhyaḥ eva sarvaḥ hi bhavet daṇḍāpatānakaḥ

original: aṃsamūlotthito vāyuḥ śirāḥ saṃkucya tatragaḥ / bahiḥ prasyanditaharaṃ janayatyeva bāhukam //
analyzed: aṃsa mūla utthitaḥ vāyuḥ śirāḥ saṃkucya tatra gaḥ bahis prasyandita haram janayati eva bāhukam

original: talaṃ pratyaṅgulīnāṃ yaḥ kaṇḍarā bāhupṛṣṭhataḥ / bāhvoḥ karmakṣayakarī vipūcī veti socyate //
analyzed: talam pratyaṅgulīnām yaḥ kaṇḍarā bāhu pṛṣṭhataḥ bāhvoḥ karma kṣaya karī vipūcī vā iti sā ucyate

original: vāyuḥ kaṭyāśritaḥ sakthnaḥ kaṇḍarāmākṣaipedyadā / tadā khañjo bhavejjantuḥ paṅguḥ sakthnordvayorvadhāt //
analyzed: vāyuḥ kaṭi āśritaḥ sakthnaḥ kaṇḍarām ākṣaipet yadā tadā khañjaḥ bhavet jantuḥ paṅguḥ sakthnoḥ dvayoḥ vadhāt

original: kampate gamanārambhe khañjanniva ca gacchati / kalāyakhañjaṃ taṃ vidyānmuktasandhiprabandhanam //
analyzed: kampate gamana ārambhe khañjan iva ca gacchati kalāyakhañjam tam vidyāt mukta sandhi prabandhanam

original: śītoṣṇadravasaṃsuṣkagurusnigdhaiśca sevitaiḥ / jīrṇājīrṇe tathāyāsakṣobhasnigdhaprajāgaraiḥ //
analyzed: śīta uṣṇa drava saṃsuṣka guru snigdhaiḥ ca sevitaiḥ jīrṇa ajīrṇe tathā āyāsa kṣobha snigdha prajāgaraiḥ

original: śleṣmabhedaḥ samaye paramatyarthasaṃcitam / abhibhūyetaraṃ doṣaṃ śarīraṃ pratipadyate //
analyzed: śleṣma bhedaḥ samaye param atyartha saṃcitam abhibhūya itaram doṣam śarīram pratipadyate

original: sakthyasthīni prapūryāntaḥ śleṣmaṇā stambhitena tat / tadāsthi snāti tenorostathā śītānilena tu //
analyzed: sakthi asthīni prapūrya antar śleṣmaṇā stambhitena tat tadā asthi snāti tena ūroḥ tathā śīta anilena tu

original: śyāmāṅgamaṅgastaimityatandrāmūrchārucijvaraiḥ / tamūrustambhamityāha bāhyavātamathāpare //
analyzed: śyāmā aṅgam aṅga staimitya tandrā mūrchā aruci jvaraiḥ tam ūrustambham iti āha bāhyavātam atha apare

original: vātaśoṇitasaṃśotho jānumadhye mahārujaḥ / jñeyaḥ kroṣṭukaśīrṣastu sthūlakroṣṭukaśīrṣavat //
analyzed: vāta śoṇita saṃśothaḥ jānu madhye mahā rujaḥ jñeyaḥ kroṣṭukaśīrṣaḥ tu sthūla kroṣṭuka śīrṣa vat

original: rukpādaviṣamanyaste śramādvā jāyate yadā / vātena gulphamākṣitya tamāhurvātakaṇṭakam //
analyzed: ruj pāda viṣama nyaste śramāt vā jāyate yadā vātena gulpham ākṣitya tam āhuḥ vātakaṇṭakam

original: pārṣṇipratyaṅgulīnābhau kaṇṭhe vā mārutārdite / satikṣepaṃ nigṛhṇāti gṛdhrasīṃ tāṃ pracakṣate //
analyzed: pārṣṇi pratyaṅgulī nābhau kaṇṭhe vā māruta ardite sa ti kṣepam nigṛhṇāti gṛdhrasīm tām pracakṣate

original: hṛṣyete caraṇau yasya bhavetāṃ cāpi suptakau / pādaharṣaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ kaphamārutakopajaḥ //
analyzed: hṛṣyete caraṇau yasya bhavetām ca api suptakau pādaharṣaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ kapha māruta kopa jaḥ

original: pādayoḥ kurute dāhaṃ pittāsṛksahito 'nilaḥ / viśeṣataścaṅkramataḥ pādadāhaṃ tamādiśet //
analyzed: pādayoḥ kurute dāham pitta asṛj sahitaḥ nilaḥ viśeṣataḥ caṅkramataḥ pādadāham tam ādiśet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vātavyādhinidānaṃ nāma ṣaṭūṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vātavyādhinidānam nāma ṣaṭūṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 167
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantarīruvāca / vātaraktanidānaṃ te vakṣye suśruta tacchṛṇu / viruddhādhyaśanakrodhadivāsvapnaprajāgaraiḥ //
analyzed: dhanvantarīḥ uvāca vātarakta nidānam te vakṣye suśruta tat śṛṇu viruddha adhyaśana krodha divāsvapna prajāgaraiḥ

original: prāyaśaḥ sukumārāṇāṃ mithyāhāravihāriṇām / sthūlānāṃ sukhināṃ cāpi kupyate vātaśoṇitam //
analyzed: prāyaśas su kumārāṇām mithyā āhāra vihāriṇām sthūlānām sukhinām ca api kupyate vāta śoṇitam

original: agnighātādaśuddheśca nṛṇāmasṛji dūṣite / vātalaiḥ śītalairvāyurvṛddhaḥ kruddho vimārgagaḥ //
analyzed: agni ghātāt aśuddheḥ ca nṛṇām asṛji dūṣite vātalaiḥ śītalaiḥ vāyuḥ vṛddhaḥ kruddhaḥ vimārga gaḥ

original: tādṛśaivāsṛjā ruddhaḥ prāktadaiva pradūṣayet / tathā vāto gude pīḍāṃ balāsaṃ vātaśoṇitam //
analyzed: tādṛśā eva asṛjā ruddhaḥ prāk tadā eva pradūṣayet tathā vātaḥ gude pīḍām balāsam vātaśoṇitam

original: saṃstabhya janayetpūrvaṃ paścātsarvatra dhāvati / viśeṣādvamanādyaiśca pralambastasya lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: saṃstabhya janayet pūrvam paścāt sarvatra dhāvati viśeṣāt vamana ādyaiḥ ca pralambaḥ tasya lakṣaṇam

original: bhaviṣyataḥ kuṣṭhasamaṃ tathā sāmbudasaṃjñakam / jānujaṅghorukaṭyaṃsahastapādāṅgasandhiṣu //
analyzed: bhaviṣyataḥ kuṣṭha samam tathā sa ambuda saṃjñakam jānu jaṅghā ūru kaṭi aṃsa hasta pāda aṅga sandhiṣu

original: kaṇḍūsphuraṇanistodabhedagauravasuptatāḥ / bhūtvā bhūtvā praśāmyanti muhurāvirbhavanti ca //
analyzed: kaṇḍū sphuraṇa nistoda bheda gaurava supta tāḥ bhūtvā bhūtvā praśāmyanti muhur āvirbhavanti ca

original: pādayormūlamāsthāya kadāciddhastayorapi / ākhoriva vilaṃ kruddhaḥ kṛtsnaṃ dehaṃ bidhāvati //
analyzed: pādayoḥ mūlam āsthāya kadācid hastayoḥ api  ākhoḥ iva vilam kruddhaḥ kṛtsnam deham bidhāvati

original: tvaṅmāṃsāśrayamattānaṃ tatpūrvaṃ jāyate tataḥ / kālāntareṇa gambhīraṃ sarvadhātūnabhidravet //
analyzed: tat pūrvam jāyate tatas kāla antareṇa gambhīram sarva dhātūn abhidravet

original: kaṭyādisaṃyatasthāne tvaktāmraśyāvalohitāḥ / śvayathurgrathitaḥ pākaḥ sa vāyuścāsthimajjasu //
analyzed: kaṭi ādi saṃyata sthāne tvac tāmra śyāva lohitāḥ śvayathuḥ grathitaḥ pākaḥ sa vāyuḥ ca asthi majjasu

original: chindanniva caratyantaścakīkurvaṃśca vegavān / karoti khañjaṃ paṅguṃ vā śarīraṃ sarvataścaran //
analyzed: chindan iva carati antar cakīkurvan ca vegavān  karoti khañjam paṅgum vā śarīram sarvatas caran

original: vātādhike 'dhikaṃ tatra śūlasphuraṇabhañjanam / śothasya raukṣyaṃ kṛṣṇatvaṃ śyāvatāvṛddhihānayaḥ //
analyzed: vāta adhike dhikam tatra śūla sphuraṇa bhañjanam śothasya raukṣyam kṛṣṇa tvam śyāva tā vṛddhi hānayaḥ

original: dhamanyaṅgulisandhīnāṃ saṃkocoṅgagraho tiruk / śītadveṣānupaśayau stambhavepathusuptayaḥ //
analyzed: dhamani aṅguli sandhīnām saṃkoca uṅga grahau ti ruj śīta dveṣa anupaśayau stambha vepathu suptayaḥ

original: rakte śotho 'tiruktodastāmrāścimicimāyate / snigdharūkṣaiḥ samaṃ naiti kaṇḍukledasamanvitaḥ //
analyzed: rakte snigdha rūkṣaiḥ samam na eti kaṇḍu kleda samanvitaḥ

original: pitte vidāhaḥ saṃmohaḥ svādo mūrchā madastṛṣā / sparśāsahatvaṃ rugrāvaḥ śoṣaḥ pāko bhṛśoṣmatā //
analyzed: pitte vidāhaḥ saṃmohaḥ svādaḥ mūrchā madaḥ tṛṣā sparśa asaha tvam ruj rāvaḥ śoṣaḥ pākaḥ bhṛśa ūṣma tā

original: kaphe staimityagurutā suptisnigdhatvaśītatā / kaṇḍūrmandā ca rugdbandvaṃ sarvaliṅgañca saṃkarāt //
analyzed: kaphe staimitya guru tā supti snigdha tva śīta tā kaṇḍūḥ mandā ca ruj dbandvam sarva liṅgam ca saṃkarāt

original: ekadoṣañca saṃsādhyaṃ yāpyañcaiva dvidoṣajam / tridoṣajantyajedāśu raktapittaṃ sudāruṇam //
analyzed: eka doṣam ca saṃsādhyam yāpyam ca eva dvi doṣa jam  tri doṣa jan tyajet āśu raktapittam su dāruṇam

original: raktamaṅge nihantyāśu śākhāsandhiṣu mārutaḥ / niveśyānyonyamāvārya vedanābhirharatyasūn //
analyzed: raktam aṅge nihanti āśu śākhā sandhiṣu mārutaḥ niveśya anyonyam āvārya vedanābhiḥ harati asūn

original: vāyau pañcātmake prāṇe raukṣyāccāpalyalaṅghanaiḥ / atyāhārābhighātācca vegodīraṇacāraṇaiḥ //
analyzed: vāyau pañca ātmake prāṇe raukṣyāt cāpalya laṅghanaiḥ ati āhāra abhighātāt ca vega udīraṇa cāraṇaiḥ

original: kupitaścakṣurādīnāmupaghātaṃ prakalpayet / pīnaso dāhatṛṭkāsaśvāsādiścaiva jāyate //
analyzed: kupitaḥ cakṣuḥ ādīnām upaghātam prakalpayet pīnasaḥ dāha tṛṣ kāsa śvāsa ādiḥ ca eva jāyate

original: kaṇṭharodhomalabhraṃśacchardyarocakapīnasān / kuryācca galagaṇḍadīṃstañjatrumūrdhvasaṃśrayaḥ //
analyzed: kaṇṭha rodhaḥ mala bhraṃśa chardi arocaka pīnasān kuryāt ca galagaṇḍa dīn tat jatrum ūrdhva saṃśrayaḥ

original: vyāno 'tigamanasnānakrīḍāviṣayacoṣṭitaiḥ / viruddharūkṣabhīharṣaviṣādādyaiśca dūṣitaḥ //
analyzed: viruddha rūkṣa bhī harṣa viṣāda ādyaiḥ ca dūṣitaḥ

original: puṃstvotsāhabalabhraṃśaśokacittaplavajvarān / sarvākārādinistodaromaharṣaṃ suṣuptatām //
analyzed: puṃstva utsāha bala bhraṃśa śoka citta plava jvarān sarva ākāra ādi nistoda roma harṣam suṣupta tām

original: kuṣṭhaṃ visarpamanyacca kuryāt sarvāṅgasādanam / samāno viṣamājīrṇaśītasaṅkīrṇabhojanaiḥ //
analyzed: kuṣṭham visarpam anyat ca kuryāt sarva aṅga sādanam samānaḥ viṣama ajīrṇa śīta saṅkīrṇa bhojanaiḥ

original: karotyakālaśayanajāgarādyaiśca dūṣitaḥ / śūlagulmagrahaṇyādīnyakṛtkāmāśrayāngadān //
analyzed: karoti akāla śayana jāgara ādyaiḥ ca dūṣitaḥ śūla gulma grahaṇī ādīn yakṛt kāma āśrayān gadān

original: apāno rūkṣagurvannavegāghātātivāhanaiḥ / yānapānasamutthānacaṅkramaiścātisevitaiḥ //
analyzed: apānaḥ rūkṣa guru anna vega āghāta ati vāhanaiḥ yāna pāna samutthāna caṅkramaiḥ ca atisevitaiḥ

original: kupitaḥ kurute rogānkṛtsnān pakvāśayāśrayān / mūtrasukrapradoṣārśogudabhraṃśādikānbahūn //
analyzed: kupitaḥ kurute rogān kṛtsnān pakvāśaya āśrayān mūtra sukra pradoṣa arśaḥ gudabhraṃśa ādikān bahūn

original: sarvāṅgamātataṃ sāmaṃ tandrāstaimityagauravaiḥ / snigdhatvādbodha kālasya śaityaśothāgnihānayaḥ //
analyzed: sarva aṅgam ātatam sāmam tandrā staimitya gauravaiḥ snigdha tvāt bodha kālasya śaitya śotha agni hānayaḥ

original: kaṇḍūrūkṣātināśena tadvidhopaśamena ca / muktiṃ vidyānnirāmaṃ taṃ tandrādīnāṃ viparyayāt //
analyzed: kaṇḍū rūkṣa ati nāśena tadvidha upaśamena ca muktim vidyāt nirāmam tam tandrā ādīnām viparyayāt

original: vāyorāvaraṇaṃ vāto bahubhedaṃ pracakṣate / pittaliṅgāvṛte dāhastṛṣṇā śūlaṃ bhramastamaḥ //
analyzed: vāyoḥ āvaraṇam vātaḥ bahu bhedam pracakṣate pitta liṅga āvṛte dāhaḥ tṛṣṇā śūlam bhramaḥ tamaḥ

original: kaṭukoṣṇāmlalavaṇairvidāhaśītakāmatā / śaityagauravaśūlāgnikaṭvājyapayaso 'dhikam //
analyzed: kaṭuka uṣṇa amla lavaṇaiḥ vidāha śīta kāma tā  śaitya gaurava śūla agni kaṭu ājya payasaḥ dhikam

original: laṅghanāyāsarūkṣoṣṇakāmatā ca kaphāvṛte / kaphāvṛte 'ṅgamardaḥ syāddhṛllāso gurutāruciḥ //
analyzed: laṅghana āyāsa rūkṣa uṣṇa kāma tā ca kapha āvṛte kapha āvṛte ṅgamardaḥ syāt hṛllāsaḥ gurutā aruciḥ

original: raktavṛte sadāhārtistavaṅmāṃsāśrayajā bhṛśam / bhavetsarāgaḥ śvayathurjāyante maṇḍalāni ca //
analyzed: rakta vṛte sa dāha ārtiḥ tavak māṃsa āśraya jā bhṛśam bhavet sa rāgaḥ śvayathuḥ jāyante maṇḍalāni ca

original: śotho māṃsena kaṭhino hṛllāsapiṭikāstathā / harṣaḥ pipīlikānāṃ ca saṃcāra iva jāyate / calalagrano mṛduḥ śītaḥ śotho gātreṣu rocakaḥ //
analyzed: śothaḥ māṃsena kaṭhinaḥ hṛllāsa piṭikāḥ tathā harṣaḥ pipīlikānām ca saṃcāraḥ iva jāyate mṛduḥ śītaḥ śothaḥ gātreṣu rocakaḥ

original: āḍhyavāta iva jñeyaḥ sa kṛcchro medasāvataḥ / sparśa ācchāditetyuṣṇaśītalaśca tvanāvṛte / majjāvṛte tu viṣamaṃ jṛmbhaṇaṃ pariveṣṭanam //
analyzed: āḍhyavāte iva jñeyaḥ sa kṛcchraḥ sparśaḥ ācchādita iti uṣṇa śītalaḥ ca tu anāvṛte majja āvṛte tu viṣamam jṛmbhaṇam pariveṣṭanam

original: śūlañca paḍyimānaśca pāṇibhyāṃ labhate sukham / śukrāvṛte tu śothe vai cātivego na vidyate //
analyzed: śūlam ca paḍyimānaḥ ca pāṇibhyām labhate sukham śukra āvṛte tu śothe vai ca ativegaḥ na vidyate

original: bhukte kukṣau rujā jīrṇe nikṛttirbhavati dhruvam / mūtrāpravṛttirādhmānaṃ bastermūtrāvṛte bhavet //
analyzed: bhukte kukṣau rujā jīrṇe dhruvam mūtra apravṛttiḥ ādhmānam vasteḥ mūtra āvṛte bhavet

original: chidrāvṛte vibandho 'tha svasthānaṃ parikṛnta ti / patatyāśu jvarākrānto mūrchāṃ ca labhate naraḥ //
analyzed: sva sthānam parikṛnta ti  patati āśu jvara ākrāntaḥ mūrchām ca labhate naraḥ

original: sakṛt pīḍitamanyena duṣṭaṃ śukraṃ cirātsṛjet / sarvadhātvāvṛte vāyau śroṇivaṅkṣaṇapṛṣṭharuk //
analyzed: sakṛt pīḍitam anyena duṣṭam śukram cirāt sṛjet sarva dhātu āvṛte vāyau śroṇi vaṅkṣaṇa pṛṣṭha ruj

original: vilome mārute caiva hṛdayaṃ paripīḍyate / bhramo mūrchā rujā dāhaḥ pittena prāṇa āvṛte //
analyzed: vilome mārute ca eva hṛdayam paripīḍyate bhramaḥ mūrchā rujā dāhaḥ pittena prāṇe āvṛte

original: rujā tandrā svarabhraṃśo dāho vyāne tu sarvaśaḥ / kramoṃ gaceṣṭābhaṅgaśca santāpaḥ sahavedanaḥ //
analyzed: rujā tandrā svara bhraṃśaḥ dāhaḥ vyāne tu sarvaśas krama om ga ceṣṭā bhaṅgaḥ ca santāpaḥ saha vedanaḥ

original: samāna ūṣmopahatiḥ sasvedoparatiḥ sutṛṭ / dāhaśca syādapāne tu male hāridravarṇatā //
analyzed: samāne ūṣma upahatiḥ sa sveda uparatiḥ su tṛṣ dāhaḥ ca syāt apāne tu male hāridra varṇa tā

original: rajovṛddhistāpanañca tathā cānāhamehanam / śleṣmaṇā prāvṛte prāṇe nādaḥ snoto 'varodhanam //
analyzed: rajaḥ vṛddhiḥ tāpanam ca tathā ca ānāha mehanam śleṣmaṇā prāvṛte prāṇe nādaḥ snotaḥ varodhanam

original: ṣṭhīvanañcaiva sasvedaśvāsaniḥ śvāsasaṃgrahaḥ / udāne gurugātratvamarucirvāksvaragrahaḥ //
analyzed: ṣṭhīvanam ca eva sa sveda śvāsa niḥ śvāsa saṃgrahaḥ udāne guru gātra tvam aruciḥ vāc svara grahaḥ

original: balavarṇapraṇāśaścā pāne parvāsthisaṃgrahaḥ / gurutāṅgeṣu sarveṣu sthūlatvañcāgataṃ bhṛśam //
analyzed: bala varṇa praṇāśaḥ ca pāne parva asthi saṃgrahaḥ guru tā aṅgeṣu sarveṣu sthūla tvañca āgatam bhṛśam

original: samāne 'tikriyājñatvamasvedo mandavahnitā / apāne sakalaṃ mūtraṃ śakṛtaḥ syātpravartanam? //
analyzed: samāne ti kriyā jña tvam asvedaḥ manda vahni tā  apāne sakalam mūtram śakṛtaḥ syāt pravartanam

original: iti dvāviṃśatividhaṃ vātaraktāmayaṃ viduḥ / prāṇādayastathānyo 'nyaṃ samākrāntā yathākramam //
analyzed: iti dvāviṃśatividham vātarakta āmayam viduḥ prāṇa ādayaḥ tathā anyaḥ samākrāntāḥ yathākramam

original: sarve 'pi viṃśatividhaṃ vidyādāvaraṇañca yat / hṛllāsocchvāsasaṃrodhaḥ pratiśyāyaḥ śirograhaḥ //
analyzed: sarve viṃśatividham vidyāt āvaraṇam ca yat hṛllāsa ucchvāsa saṃrodhaḥ pratiśyāyaḥ śiraḥ grahaḥ

original: hṛdrogo mukhaśoṣaśca prāṇenāpāna āvṛte / udānenāvṛte prāṇe bhaveddhai balasaṃkṣayaḥ //
analyzed: hṛd rogaḥ mukha śoṣaḥ ca prāṇena apāne āvṛte udānena āvṛte prāṇe bala saṃkṣayaḥ

original: vicāraṇena vibhajetsarvamāvaraṇaṃ bhiṣak / sthānānyapekṣya vātānāṃ vṛrdhihāniṃ ca karmaṇām //
analyzed: vicāraṇena vibhajet sarvam āvaraṇam bhiṣak sthānāni apekṣya vātānām vṛrdhi hānim ca karmaṇām

original: prāṇādīnāñca pañcānāṃ pittamāvaraṇaṃ mithaḥ / pittādīnāmāvasatirmiśrāṇāṃ miśritaiśca taiḥ //
analyzed: prāṇa ādīnām ca pañcānām pittam āvaraṇam mithas pitta ādīnām āvasatiḥ miśrāṇām miśritaiḥ ca taiḥ

original: miśraiḥ pittādibhistadvanmiśrāṇyapitvanekadhā / tāṃllakṣayedavahito yathāsvaṃ lakṣaṇodayāt //
analyzed: miśraiḥ pitta ādibhiḥ tadvat miśrāṇi api tu anekadhā tān lakṣayet avahitaḥ yathāsvam lakṣaṇa udayāt

original: śanaiḥ śanaiścopaśayāndṛḍhānapi muhurmuhuḥ / viśeṣājjīvitaṃ prāṇa udāno balamucyate / syāttayoḥ pīḍanāddhanirāyuṣañca balasya ca //
analyzed: śanais śanais ca upaśayān dṛḍhān api muhur muhur  viśeṣāt jīvitam prāṇaḥ udānaḥ balam ucyate syāt tayoḥ balasya ca

original: āvṛtā vāyavo 'jñātā jñātā vā sthānavicyutāḥ / prayatnenāpi duḥ sādhyā bhaveyurvānupadravāḥ //
analyzed: āvṛtāḥ vāyavaḥ jñātāḥ jñātāḥ vā sthāna vicyutāḥ prayatnena api dus sādhyāḥ bhaveyuḥ vā anupadravāḥ

original: vidradhiplīhahṛdrogagulmāgnisadanādayaḥ / bhavantyupadravāsteṣāmāvṛtānāmupekṣayā //
analyzed: vidradhi plīha hṛd roga gulma agni sadana ādayaḥ bhavanti upadravāḥ teṣām āvṛtānām upekṣayā

original: nidānaṃ suśruta / mayā ātreyoktaṃ samīritam / sarvarogavivekāya narādyāyuḥ pravṛddhaye //
analyzed: nidānam suśruta mayā ātreya uktam samīritam sarva roga vivekāya nara ādi āyuḥ pravṛddhaye

original: evaṃ vijñāya rogādīṃścikitsāmatha vai caret / triphalā sarvarogaghnī madhvājyaguḍasaṃyutā //
analyzed: evam vijñāya roga ādīn cikitsām atha vai caret triphalā sarva roga ghnī madhu ājya guḍa saṃyutā

original: savyoṣā triphalā vāpi sarvarogapramardinī / śatāvarīguḍūcyagniviḍaṅgena yutāthavā //
analyzed: sa vyoṣā triphalā vā api sarva roga pramardinī śatāvarī guḍūcī agni viḍaṅgena yutā athavā

original: śatāvarī guḍūcyagniḥ śuṇṭhīmūṣalikā balā / punarnavā ca bṛhatī nirguṇḍī nimbapatrakam //
bhṛṅgarājaścāmalakaṃ vāsakastadrasena vā / bhāvitā triphalā saptavāramekhamathāpivā //
analyzed: bhṛṅgarājaḥ ca āmalakam vāsakaḥ tad rasena vā bhāvitā triphalā sapta vāram ekham atha api vā

original: pūrvoktaśca yathālābhayuktaiścūrṇañca modakaḥ / vaṭikā ghṛtatailaṃ vā kaṣāyo śoṣaroganut / palaṃ palārdhakaṃ vāpi karṣaṃ karṣārdhameva vā //
analyzed: pūrva uktaḥ ca yathā lābha yuktaiḥ cūrṇam ca modakaḥ vaṭikā ghṛta tailam vā śoṣa roga nud  palam pala ardhakam vā api karṣam karṣa ardham eva vā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vātaraktani saptaṣaṣṭyādhikaśatatamodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe saptaṣaṣṭyādhikaśatatamaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 168
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: nidānaṃ samāptam / dhanvantariruvāca / sarvarogaharaṃ siddhaṃ yogasāraṃ vadāmyaham / śṛṇu suśrutaṃ saṃkṣepātprāṇināṃ jīvahetave //
analyzed: nidānam samāptam dhanvantariḥ uvāca sarva roga haram siddham yogasāram vadāmi aham śṛṇu suśrutam saṃkṣepāt prāṇinām jīva hetave

original: kaṣāyakaṭutiktāmlarūkṣāhārādibhojanāt / cintāvyavayavyāyāmabhayaśokaprajāgarāt //
analyzed: kaṣāya kaṭu tikta amla rūkṣa āhāra ādi bhojanāt cintā vyavaya vyāyāma bhaya śoka prajāgarāt

original: uccairbhāṣātibhārācca karmayogātikarṣaṇāt / vāyuḥ kupyati parjanye jīrṇānne dinasaṃkṣaye //
analyzed: uccais bhāṣā ati bhārāt ca karma yoga atikarṣaṇāt vāyuḥ kupyati parjanye jīrṇa anne dina saṃkṣaye

original: uṣṇāmla lavaṇakṣārakaṭukājīrṇabhojanāt / tīkṣṇātapāgnisantāpamadyakrodhaniṣevaṇāt //
analyzed: uṣṇa amla lavaṇa kṣāra kaṭuka ajīrṇa bhojanāt tīkṣṇa ātapa agni santāpa madya krodha niṣevaṇāt

original: vidāhakāle bhuktasya madhyāhne jaladātyaye / grīṣmakāler'ddharātre 'pi pittaṃ kupyati dehinaḥ //
analyzed: vidāha kāle bhuktasya madhyāhne jalada atyaye grīṣma kāla īrddharātre pi pittam kupyati dehinaḥ

original: svādvamlalavaṇasnigdhaguruśītātibhojanāt / navānnapicchilānūpamāṃsādeḥ sevanādapi //
analyzed: svādu amla lavaṇa snigdha guru śīta ati bhojanāt nava anna picchila ānūpa māṃsa ādeḥ sevanāt api

original: avyāyāma divāsvapnaśayyāsanasukhādibhiḥ / kaphapradoṣo bhukte ca vasante ca prakupyati //
analyzed: avyāyāma divāsvapna śayyā āsana sukha ādibhiḥ kapha pradoṣaḥ bhukte ca vasante ca prakupyati

original: dehapāruṣyasaṃkocatodaviṣṭambhakādayaḥ / tathā ca suptā romaharṣastambhanaśoṣaṇam //
analyzed: deha pāruṣya saṃkoca toda viṣṭambhaka ādayaḥ tathā ca suptāḥ romaharṣa stambhana śoṣaṇam

original: śyāmatvamaṅgaviśleṣabalamāyāsavardhanam / vāyorliṅgāni tairyuktaṃ rogaṃ vātātmakaṃ vadet //
analyzed: śyāma tvam aṅga viśleṣa balam āyāsa vardhanam  vāyoḥ liṅgāni taiḥ yuktam rogam vāta ātmakam vadet

original: dāhoṣmapādasaṃkledakoparāgapariśramāḥ / kaṭvamlaśavavaigandhyasvedamūrchātitṛṭbhramāḥ //
analyzed: dāha ūṣma pāda saṃkledaka uparāga pariśramāḥ kaṭu amla śava vaigandhya sveda mūrchā ati tṛṣ bhramāḥ

original: hāridraṃ haritatvañca pittaliṅgānvitairnaraḥ / dehe snigdhatvamādhuryacirakāritvabandhanam //
analyzed: hāridram harita tvam ca pitta liṅga anvitaiḥ naraḥ dehe snigdha tva mādhurya cirakāri tva bandhanam

original: staimityatṛptisaṅghātaśothaśatilagauravam / kaṇḍūnidrābhiyogaśca lakṣaṇaṃ kaphasambhavam //
analyzed: staimitya tṛpti saṅghāta śotha śatila gauravam kaṇḍū nidrā abhiyogaḥ ca lakṣaṇam kapha sambhavam

original: hetulakṣaṇasaṃsargādvidyādvyādhiṃ dvidoṣajam / sarvahetusamutpannaṃ triliṅgaṃ sānnipātikam //
analyzed: hetu lakṣaṇa saṃsargāt vidyāt vyādhim dvi doṣa jam sarva hetu samutpannam tri liṅgam sānnipātikam

original: doṣadhātumalādhāro dehināṃ deha ucyate / teṣāṃ samatvamārogyaṃ kṣayavṛddherviparyayaḥ //
analyzed: doṣa dhātu mala ādhāraḥ dehinām dehaḥ ucyate teṣām sama tvam ārogyam kṣaya vṛddheḥ viparyayaḥ

original: vasāsṛṅmāṃsamedo 'sthimajjāśukrāṇi dhātavaḥ / vātapittakaphā doṣā viṇmūtrādyā malāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: vasā asṛj māṃsa medaḥ sthi majjā śukrāṇi dhātavaḥ vāta pitta kaphāḥ doṣāḥ viṣ mūtra ādyāḥ malāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: vāyuḥ śīto laghuḥ sūkṣmaḥ svaranāśīsthiro balī / pittamamlakaṭūṣṇañcāpaṅktī rogakāraṇam //
analyzed: vāyuḥ śītaḥ laghuḥ sūkṣmaḥ svara nāśī sthiraḥ balī pittam amla kaṭu uṣṇam ca apaṅktiḥ roga kāraṇam

original: madhuro lavaṇaḥ snigdho guruḥ śleṣamātipicchilaḥ / gudaśroṇyāśrayo vāyuḥ pittaṃ pakvāśayasthitam //
analyzed: madhuraḥ lavaṇaḥ snigdhaḥ guruḥ śleṣamā ati picchilaḥ guda śroṇi āśrayaḥ vāyuḥ pittam pakvāśaya sthitam

original: kaphasyāmāśayasthānaṃ kaṇṭho vā mūrdhasandhayaḥ / kaṭutiktakaṣāyāśca kopayanti samīraṇam //
analyzed: kaphasya āmāśaya sthānam kaṇṭhaḥ vā mūrdha sandhayaḥ kaṭu tikta kaṣāyāḥ ca kopayanti samīraṇam

original: kaṭvamlalavaṇāḥ pittaṃ svādūṣṇalavaṇāḥ kapham / eta eva viparyastāḥ śamāyaiṣāṃ prayojitāḥ / bhavanti rogiṇāṃ śāntyai svasthāne sukhahetavaḥ //
analyzed: kaṭu amla lavaṇāḥ pittam svādu uṣṇa lavaṇāḥ kapham ete eva viparyastāḥ śamāya eṣām prayojitāḥ bhavanti rogiṇām śāntyai sva sthāne sukha hetavaḥ

original: cakṣuṣyo madhuro jñeyo rasadhātuvivahddhanaḥ / amlottaro manohṛdyaṃ tathā dīpanapācanam //
analyzed: cakṣuṣyaḥ madhuraḥ jñeyaḥ amla uttaraḥ manaḥ hṛdyam tathā dīpana pācanam

original: dīpanojvaratṛṣṇāghnastiktaḥ śodhanaśoṣaṇaḥ / pittalo lekhana stambhī kaṣāyo grāhiśoṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: dīpanaḥ jvara tṛṣṇā ghnaḥ tiktaḥ śodhana śoṣaṇaḥ pittalaḥ lekhana stambhī kaṣāyaḥ grāhi śoṣaṇaḥ

original: rasavīryavipākānāmāśrayaṃ dravyamuttamam / rasapākāntarasthāyi sarvadravyāśrayaṃ drutam //
analyzed: rasa vīrya vipākānām āśrayam dravyam uttamam rasa pāka antara sthāyi sarva dravya āśrayam drutam

original: śītoṣṇaṃ lavaṇaṃ vīryamatha vā śaktiriṣyate / rasānāṃ dvividhaḥ pāko kaṭureva ca //
analyzed: śīta uṣṇam lavaṇam vīryam atha vā śaktiḥ iṣyate rasānām dvividhaḥ kaṭuḥ eva ca

original: bhiṣagbheṣajarogārtaparicārakasampadaḥ / cikitsāṅgānicatvāri viparītānyasiddhaye //
analyzed: bhiṣaj bheṣaja roga ārta paricāraka sampadaḥ cikitsā aṅgāni catvāri viparītāni asiddhaye

original: deśakālavayovahnisāmyaprakṛtibheṣajam / dehasattvabalavyādhīnbuddhvā karma samācaret //
analyzed: deśa kāla vayaḥ vahni sāmya prakṛti bheṣajam deha sattva bala vyādhīn buddhvā karma samācaret

original: bahūdakanago 'nūpaḥ kaphamārutakopavān / jāṅgalo 'paraśākhī ca raktapittagadottaraḥ //
analyzed: bahu udaka nagaḥ nūpaḥ kapha māruta kopavān jāṅgalaḥ para śākhī ca rakta pitta gada uttaraḥ

original: saṃsṛṣṭalakṣaṇopeto deśaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ smṛtaḥ / bāla ā ṣoḍaśānmadhyaḥ saptatervṛddha ucyate //
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭa lakṣaṇa upetaḥ deśaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ smṛtaḥ bālaḥ ṣoḍaśāt madhyaḥ saptateḥ vṛddhaḥ ucyate

original: kaphapittānilāḥ prāyo yathākramamudīritāḥ / kṣārāgniśastrarahitā kṣīṇe pravayasi kriyāḥ //
analyzed: kapha pitta anilāḥ prāyas yathākramam udīritāḥ kṣāra agni śastra rahitā kṣīṇe pravayasi kriyāḥ

original: kṛśasya vṛṃhaṇaṃ kāryaṃsthūladehasya karṣaṇam / rakṣaṇaṃ madhyakāyasya dehabhedāstrayo matāḥ //
analyzed: kṛśasya vṛṃhaṇam kāryam sthūla dehasya karṣaṇam rakṣaṇam madhya kāyasya deha bhedāḥ trayaḥ matāḥ

original: sthairyavyāyāmasantoṣairboddhavyaṃ yatnato balam / avikārī mahotsāho mahāsāhasiko naraḥ //
analyzed: sthairya vyāyāma santoṣaiḥ boddhavyam yatnataḥ balam avikārī mahā utsāhaḥ mahā sāhasikaḥ naraḥ

original: pānāhārādayo yasya viruddhāḥ prakṛterapi / śvasukhāyopakalpyante tatsāmyamiti kathyate //
analyzed: pāna āhāra ādayaḥ yasya viruddhāḥ prakṛteḥ api śva sukhāya upakalpyante tat sāmyam iti kathyate

original: garbhiṇyāḥ ślaiṣmikairbhakṣyaiḥ ślaiṣmiko jāyate naraḥ / vātalaiḥ pittalaistadvatsamadhāturhitāśanāt //
analyzed: garbhiṇyāḥ ślaiṣmikaiḥ bhakṣyaiḥ ślaiṣmikaḥ jāyate naraḥ vātalaiḥ pittalaiḥ tadvat sama dhātuḥ hita aśanāt

original: kṛśo rūkṣo 'lpakeśaśca calacitto naraḥ sthitaḥ / bahuvākyarataḥ svapnevātaprakṛtiko naraḥ //
analyzed: kṛśaḥ rūkṣaḥ lpa keśaḥ ca cala cittaḥ naraḥ sthitaḥ bahu vākya rataḥ svapnevāta prakṛtikaḥ naraḥ

original: akālapalito gauraḥ prasvedī kopano budhaḥ / svapne 'pi dīptimatprekṣī pittaprakṛtirucyate //
analyzed: akāla palitaḥ gauraḥ prasvedī kopanaḥ budhaḥ svapne dīptimat prekṣī pitta prakṛtiḥ ucyate

original: sthiracittaḥ svaraḥ sūkṣmaḥ prasannaḥ snigdhamūrdhajaḥ / svapne jalaśilālokī śleṣma prakṛtiko naraḥ //
analyzed: sthira cittaḥ svaraḥ sūkṣmaḥ prasannaḥ snigdha mūrdhajaḥ svapne jala śilā ālokī śleṣma prakṛtikaḥ naraḥ

original: saṃmiśralakṣaṇairjñeyo dvitridoṣānvayo naraḥ / doṣasyetarasadbhāve 'pyadhikā prakṛtiḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: saṃmiśra lakṣaṇaiḥ jñeyaḥ dvi tri doṣa anvayaḥ naraḥ doṣasya itara sadbhāve pi adhikā prakṛtiḥ smṛtāḥ

original: mandastīkṣṇo 'tha viṣamaḥ samaścaiti caturvidhāḥ / kaphapittānilādhikyāttatsāmyājjāṭharo 'nalaḥ //
analyzed: mandaḥ tīkṣṇaḥ viṣamaḥ samaḥ ca eti caturvidhāḥ kapha pitta anila ādhikyāt tad sāmyāt jāṭharaḥ nalaḥ

original: samasya pālanaṃ kāryaṃ viṣame vātanigrahaḥ / tīkṣṇe pittapratīkāro mande śleṣmaviśodhanam //
analyzed: samasya pālanam kāryam viṣame vāta nigrahaḥ tīkṣṇe pitta pratīkāraḥ mande śleṣma viśodhanam

original: prabhavaḥ sarvarogāṇāmajīrṇaṃ cāgnināśanam / āmāmlarasaviṣṭambha lakṣaṇantaccaturvidham //
analyzed: prabhavaḥ sarva rogāṇām ajīrṇam ca agni nāśanam āma amla rasa viṣṭambha lakṣaṇam tat caturvidham

original: āmādviṣūcikā caiva hṛdālasyādayastathā / vacālavaṇatoyena chardanaṃ tatra kārayet //
analyzed: āmāt viṣūcikā ca eva hṛd ālasya ādayaḥ tathā vacā lavaṇa toyena chardanam tatra kārayet

original: śukrābhāvo bhramo mūrchā tarṣo 'mlātsaṃpravartate / apakvaṃ tatra śītāmbupānaṃ vātaniṣevaṇam //
analyzed: śukra abhāvaḥ bhramaḥ mūrchā tarṣaḥ mlāt saṃpravartate apakvam tatra śīta ambu pānam vāta niṣevaṇam

original: gātrabhaṅgaṃ śirojāḍyaṃ bhaktadoṣādayo gadān / tasminsvāpo divā kāryolaṅghanaṃ ca vivarjanam //
analyzed: gātra bhaṅgam śiraḥ jāḍyam bhakta doṣa ādayaḥ gadān tasmin svāpaḥ divā kāryaḥ laṅghanam ca vivarjanam

original: śūlagulmau ca viṇmūtrasthānaviṣṭambhasūcakau / vidheyaṃ svedanaṃ tatra pānīyaṃ lavaṇodakam //
analyzed: śūla gulmau ca viṣ mūtra sthāna viṣṭambha sūcakau vidheyam svedanam tatra pānīyam lavaṇa udakam

original: āmamamlaṃ ca viṣṭabdhaṃ kaphapittānilaiḥ kramāt / ālipya jaṭharaṃ prājño hiṅgutryūṣaṇasaindhavaiḥ //
analyzed: āmam amlam ca viṣṭabdham kapha pitta anilaiḥ kramāt ālipya jaṭharam prājñaḥ hiṅgu tryūṣaṇa saindhavaiḥ

original: divāsvapnaṃ prakurvīta sarvājīrṇavināśanam / ahitānnai rogarāśirahitānnaṃ tatastyajet //
analyzed: divāsvapnam prakurvīta sarva ajīrṇa vināśanam ahita annaiḥ roga rāśiḥ ahita annam tatas tyajet

original: uṣṇāmbu vānupānaṃ ca mākṣikaiḥ pācanaṃ bhavet / karīradadhimatsyaiśca prāyaḥ kṣīraṃ virudhyate //
analyzed: uṣṇa ambu vā anupānam ca mākṣikaiḥ pācanam bhavet karīra dadhi matsyaiḥ ca prāyas kṣīram virudhyate

original: bilvaḥ śoṇā ca gambhārī pāṭalā gaṇikārikā / dīpanaṃ kaphavātaghnaṃ pañcamūlamidaṃ mahat //
analyzed: bilvaḥ śoṇā ca gambhārī pāṭalā gaṇikārikā  dīpanam kapha vāta ghnam pañcamūlam idam mahat

original: śālaparṇo pṛśriparṇo bṛhatīdvayagokṣuram / vātapittaharaṃ vṛṣyaṃ kanīyaḥ pañcamūlakam //
ubhayaṃ daśasūlaṃ syātsannipātajvarāpaham / kāse śvāse ca tandrāyāṃ pārśvaśūle ca śasyate //
analyzed: ubhayam daśa sūlam syāt sannipāta jvara apaham kāse śvāse ca tandrāyām pārśva śūle ca śasyate

original: etaistailāni sarpoṣi pralepādalakāṃ jayet / kvāthāccaturguṇaṃ vāri pādasthaṃ syāccaturguṇam //
analyzed: etaiḥ tailāni pralepāt alakām jayet kvāthāt caturguṇam vāri pāda stham syāt caturguṇam

original: snehañca tatsamaṃ kṣīraṃ kalkaśca snehapādakaḥ / saṃvartitauṣadhaiḥ pāko bastau pāne bhavetsamaḥ / kharo 'bhyaṅge mṛdurnasye pāko 'pi saṃprakalpayet //
analyzed: snehaḥ ca tad samam kṣīram kalkaḥ ca sneha pādakaḥ saṃvartita auṣadhaiḥ pākaḥ vastau pāne bhavet samaḥ kharaḥ bhyaṅge mṛduḥ nasye saṃprakalpayet

original: sthūladehandriyāścintyā prakṛtiryā tvadhiṣṭhitā / ārogyamiti taṃ vidyādāyuṣmantamupācaret //
analyzed: sthūla deha indriyāḥ cintyā prakṛtiḥ yā tu adhiṣṭhitā ārogyam iti tam vidyāt āyuṣmantam upācaret

original: yo gṛhṇātīndriyairarthānviparītānsa mṛtyubhāk / bhiṣaṅmitragurudveṣī priyārātiśca yo bhavet //
analyzed: yaḥ gṛhṇāti indriyaiḥ arthān viparītān sa mṛtyu bhāj bhiṣaj mitra guru dveṣī priya arātiḥ ca yaḥ bhavet

original: gulphajānulalāṭaṃ ca hanurgaṇḍastathaiva ca / bhraṣṭaṃ sthānacyutaṃ yasya sa jahātyacirādasūn //
analyzed: gulpha jānu lalāṭam ca hanuḥ gaṇḍaḥ tathā eva ca bhraṣṭam sthāna cyutam yasya sa jahāti acirāt asūn

original: vāmākṣimajjanaṃ jihvā śyāmā nāsā vikāriṇī / kṛṣṇau sthānacyutau coṣṭhau kṛṣṇāsyaṃ yasyataṃ tyajet //
analyzed: vāma akṣi majjanam jihvā śyāmā nāsā vikāriṇī kṛṣṇau sthāna cyutau ca uṣṭhau kṛṣṇa āsyam tyajet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidyakaśāstraparibhāṣā nāmāṣṭaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vaidyakaśāstraparibhāṣā nāma aṣṭaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 169
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / hitāhitavikekāya anupānavidhiṃ bruve / raktaśāli tridoṣaghnaṃ tṛṣṇāmedonivārakam //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca hita ahita vikekāya anupāna vidhim bruve raktaśāli tridoṣa ghnam tṛṣṇā medaḥ nivārakam

original: mahāśāli paraṃ vṛṣyaṃ kalamaḥ śleṣmapittahā / śītto gurustridoṣaghnaḥ prāyaśo gauraṣaṣṭikaḥ //
analyzed: mahāśāli param vṛṣyam kalamaḥ śleṣma pitta hā  śīttaḥ guruḥ tridoṣa ghnaḥ prāyaśas gaura ṣaṣṭikaḥ

original: śyāmākaḥ śoṣaṇo rūkṣo vātalaḥ śleṣmapittahā / tadvatpriyaṅgunīvārakoradūṣāḥ prakīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: śyāmākaḥ śoṣaṇaḥ rūkṣaḥ vātalaḥ śleṣma pitta hā tadvat priyaṅgu nīvāra koradūṣāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: bahuvāraḥ sakṛcchītaḥ śleṣmapittaharo yavaḥ / vṛṣyaḥ śīto guruḥ svādurgodhūmo vātanāśanaḥ //
analyzed: bahuvāraḥ sakṛcchītaḥ śleṣma pitta haraḥ yavaḥ vṛṣyaḥ śītaḥ guruḥ svāduḥ godhūmaḥ vāta nāśanaḥ

original: kaphapittāstrajinmudgaḥ kaṣāyo madhurolaghuḥ / māṣo bahubalo vṛṣyaḥ pittaśleṣmaharo guruḥ //
analyzed: kapha pitta astra jit mudgaḥ kaṣāyaḥ madhuraḥ laghuḥ māṣaḥ bahu balaḥ vṛṣyaḥ pitta śleṣma haraḥ guruḥ

original: avṛṣyaḥ śleṣmapittaghno rājamāṣo 'nilārtinut / kulatthaḥ śvāsahikkāhṛtkaphagulmānilāpahaḥ //
raktapittajvaronmātho śīto grāhī makuṣṭhakaḥ / puṃstvāsṛkkaphapittaghnaścaṇako vātalaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: śītaḥ grāhī makuṣṭhakaḥ puṃstva asṛj kapha pitta ghnaḥ caṇakaḥ vātalaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: masūro madhuraḥ śīva saṃgrahī kaphapittahā / tadvatsarvaguṇāḍhyaśca kalāyaścātivātalaḥ //
analyzed: masūraḥ madhuraḥ saṃgrahī kapha pitta hā  tadvat sarva guṇa āḍhyaḥ ca kalāyaḥ ca ati vātalaḥ

original: āgkī kaphapittaghno śukralā ca tathā smṛtā / atasī pittalā jñeyā siddhārthaḥ kaphavātajit //
analyzed: śukralā ca tathā smṛtā atasī pittalā jñeyā siddhārthaḥ kapha vāta jit

original: sakṣāramadhurasnigdho baloṣṇapittakṛttilaḥ / balaghnā rūkṣalāḥ śītā vividhāḥ sasyajātayaḥ //
analyzed: sa kṣāra madhura snigdhaḥ bala uṣṇa pitta kṛt tilaḥ bala ghnāḥ rūkṣalāḥ śītāḥ vividhāḥ sasya jātayaḥ

original: citrakeṅgudinālīkāḥ pippalīmadhuśigravaḥ / cavyācaraṇanirguṇḍītarkārīkāśamardakāḥ //
analyzed: citraka iṅgudi nālīkāḥ pippalī madhuśigravaḥ cavya ācaraṇa nirguṇḍī tarkārī kāśa mardakāḥ

original: sabilvāḥ kaphapittaghnāḥ krimighnā laghudīpakāḥ / varṣābhūmārkarau vātakaphaghnau doṣanāśanau //
analyzed: sa bilvāḥ kapha pitta ghnāḥ krimi ghnāḥ laghu dīpakāḥ varṣābhū mārkarau vāta kapha ghnau doṣa nāśanau

original: tiktarasaḥ syāderaṇḍaḥ kākamācī tridoṣahṛt / cāṅgerī kaphavātaghnī sarṣapaḥ sarvadoṣadam //
tadvadeva ca kausmasumbhaṃ rājikā vātapittalā / nāḍīcaḥ kaphapittaghnaḥ cucurmadhuraśītalaḥ //
analyzed: tadvat eva ca kausmasumbham rājikā vāta pittalā nāḍīcaḥ kapha pitta ghnaḥ cucuḥ madhura śītalaḥ

original: doṣaghnaṃ padmapatrañca tripuṭaṃ vātakṛtparam / sakṣāraḥ sarvadoṣaghno vāstuko rocanaḥ paraḥ //
analyzed: doṣaghnam padmapatram ca tripuṭam vāta kṛt param sa kṣāraḥ sarva doṣa ghnaḥ vāstukaḥ rocanaḥ paraḥ

original: taṇḍukīyovipaharaḥ pālaṅkyāśca tathāpare / mūlakaṃ doṣakṛcchāmaṃ svinnaṃ vātakaphāpadam //
analyzed: taṇḍukī yovipa haraḥ pālaṅkyāḥ ca tathā apare mūlakam doṣa kṛt śāmam svinnam vāta kapha āpadam

original: sarvadoṣaharaṃ hyadyaṃ kaṇṭhyaṃ tatpakvamiṣyate / karkoṭakaṃ savārtākaṃ padolaṃ kāravellakam //
analyzed: sarva doṣa haram hi adyam kaṇṭhyam tat pakvam iṣyate karkoṭakam sa vārtākam kāravellakam

original: kuṣṭhamehajvaraśvāsakāsapittakaphāpaham / sarvadoṣaharaṃ hṛdyaṃ kūṣmāṇḍaṃ bastiśodhanam //
kaliṅgālābunī pittanāśinī vātakāriṇī / trapuṣorvāruke vātaśleṣmale pittavāraṇe //
vṛkṣāmlaṃ kaphavātaghnaṃ jambīraṃ kaphavātanut / vātaghnaṃ dāḍimaṃ grāhi nāgaraṅgaphalaṃ guru //
keśaraṃ mātuluṅgaṃ ca dīpanaṃ kaphavātanut / vātapittaharo māṣastvaksnigdhoṣṇānilāpahaḥ //
analyzed: keśaram mātuluṅgam ca dīpanam kapha vāta nud  vāta pitta haraḥ māṣaḥ tvac snigdha uṣṇa anila apahaḥ

original: saramāmalakaṃ vṛṣyaṃ madhuraṃ hṛdyamamlakṛt / bhuktaprarocakā puṇyā harītakyamṛtopamā //
analyzed: saram āmalakam vṛṣyam madhuram hṛdyam amla kṛt  bhukta prarocakā puṇyā harītakī amṛta upamā

original: straṃsanī kaphavātaghnī hyakṣastadvattridoṣajit / vātaśleṣmaharaṃ tvamlaṃ straṃsanaṃ tintiḍīphalam //
analyzed: straṃsanī kapha vāta ghnī hi akṣaḥ tadvat tridoṣa jit  vāta śleṣma haram tu amlam straṃsanam tintiḍīphalam

original: doṣalaṃ lakucaṃ svādu bakulaṃ kaphavātajit / gulmavātakaphaśvāsakāsaghnaṃ bījapūrakam //
kapitthaṃ grāhi doṣaghnaṃ pakvaṃ guru viṣāpaham / kaphapittakaraṃ bālamāpūrṇaṃ pittavardhanam //
analyzed: kapittham grāhi doṣa ghnam pakvam guru viṣa apaham kapha pitta karam bālam āpūrṇam pitta vardhanam

original: pakvāmraṃ vātakṛnmāṃsaśukravarṇabalapradam / vātaghnaṃ kaphapittaghnaṃ grāhi viṣṭambhi jāmbavam //
tindukaṃ kaphavātaghnaṃ badaraṃ vātapittahṛt / viṣṭambhi vātalaṃ bilvaṃ priyālaṃ pavanāpaham //
analyzed: tindukam kapha vāta ghnam badaram vāta pitta hṛt viṣṭambhi vātalam bilvam priyālam pavana apaham

original: rājādanaphalaṃ mocaṃ panasaṃ nārikelajam / śukramāṃsakarāṇyāhuḥ svādusnigdhagurūṇi ca //
analyzed: rājādana phalam mocam panasam nārikela jam  śukra māṃsa karāṇi āhuḥ svādu snigdha gurūṇi ca

original: drākṣāmadhūkakharjūraṃ kuṅkumaṃ vātaraktajit / māgadhī madhurā pakvā śvāsapittaharā parā //
ārdrakaṃ rocakaṃ vṛṣyaṃ dīpanaṃ kaphavātahṛt / śuṇṭhīmaricapippalyaḥ kaphavātajito matāḥ //
analyzed: ārdrakam rocakam vṛṣyam dīpanam kapha vāta hṛt śuṇṭhī marica pippalyaḥ kapha vāta jitaḥ matāḥ

original: avṛṣyaṃ maricaṃ vidyāditi vaidyakasaṃmatam / gulmaśūlavibandhaghnaṃ hiṅguvātakaphāpaham //
analyzed: avṛṣyam maricam vidyāt iti vaidyaka saṃmatam gulma śūla vibandha ghnam hiṅgu vāta kapha apaham

original: yavānīdhanyakājājyaḥ vātaśleṣmanudaḥ param / cakṣuṣyaṃ saindhavaṃ vṛṣyaṃ tridoṣaśamanaṃ smṛtam //
sauvarcalaṃ vibandhaghnamuṣṇaṃ hṛcchūlanāśanam / uṣṇaṃ śūlaharaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ viḍaṅgaṃ vātanāśanam //
analyzed: sauvarcalam vibandha ghnam uṣṇam hṛd śūla nāśanam uṣṇam śūla haram tīkṣṇam viḍaṅgam vāta nāśanam

original: romakaṃ vātalaṃ svādu rocanaṃ kledanaṃ guru / hṛtpāṇḍugalarogaghnaṃ yavakṣāro 'gnidīpanaḥ //
analyzed: romakam vātalam svādu rocanam kledanam guru hṛd pāṇḍu gala roga ghnam yavakṣāraḥ agni dīpanaḥ

original: dahano dīpanastīkṣṇaḥ sarjikṣāro vidāraṇaḥ / doṣaghnaṃ nābhasaṃ vārilaghu hṛdyaṃ viṣāpaham //
analyzed: dahanaḥ dīpanaḥ tīkṣṇaḥ sarjikṣāraḥ vidāraṇaḥ doṣa ghnam nābhasam vāri laghu hṛdyam viṣa apaham

original: nādeyaṃ vātalaṃ rūkṣaṃ sārasaṃ madura laghu / vātaśleṣmaharaṃ vārpyaṃ tāḍāgaṃ vātalaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: nādeyam vātalam rūkṣam sārasam madura laghu vāta śleṣma haram vārpyam tāḍāgam vātalam smṛtam

original: raucyamagnikaraṃ rūkṣaṃ kaphaghnaṃlaghu nairjharam / dīpanaṃ pittalaṃ kaupamaudbhidaṃ pittanāśanam //
analyzed: raucyam agni karam rūkṣam kapha ghnam laghu nairjharam dīpanam pittalam kaupam audbhidam pitta nāśanam

original: divārkakiraṇairjuṣṭaṃ rātrau caivenduraśmibhiḥ / sarvadoṣavinirmuktaṃ tattulyaṃ gaganāmbunā //
analyzed: divā arka kiraṇaiḥ juṣṭam rātrau ca eva indu raśmibhiḥ sarva doṣa vinirmuktam tat tulyam gaganāmbunā

original: uṣṇaṃ vāri jvaraśvāsamedo 'nilakaphāpaham / śṛtaṃ śītatridoṣaghnamuṣitaṃ tacca doṣalam //
analyzed: uṣṇam vāri jvara śvāsa medaḥ nila kapha apaham śṛtam śīta tridoṣa ghnam uṣitam tat ca doṣalam

original: gokṣīraṃ vātapittagnaṃ snigdhaṃ gururasāyanam / gavyādgurutaraṃ snigdhaṃ māhiṣ vahnināśanam //
analyzed: go kṣīram vāta pitta gnam snigdham guru rasāyanam gavyāt gurutaram snigdham māhiḥ vahni nāśanam

original: chāgaṃ raktātisāraghnaṃ kāsaśvāsakaphāpaham / cakṣuṣyaṃ jīvanaṃ strīṇāṃ raktapitte canāvanam //
analyzed: chāgam rakta atisāra ghnam kāsa śvāsa kapha apaham cakṣuṣyam jīvanam strīṇām raktapitte

original: paraṃ vātaharaṃ vṛṣyaṃ pittaśleṣmakaraṃ dadhi / doṣaghnaṃ manthajātantu mastu srotoviśodhanam //
analyzed: param vāta haram vṛṣyam pitta śleṣma karam dadhi doṣa ghnam mantha jā tantu mastu srotaḥ viśodhanam

original: grahaṇyarśo 'rditārtighnaṃ navanītaṃ navoddhṛtam / vikārāśca kilāṭādyā guravaḥ kuṣṭhahetavaḥ //
analyzed: grahaṇi arśaḥ ṛdita ārti ghnam navanītam navoddhṛtam  vikārāḥ ca kilāṭa ādyāḥ guravaḥ kuṣṭha hetavaḥ

original: paraṃ grahaṇīśothārśaḥ pāṇḍvatīsāragulmanut / tridoṣaśamanaṃ takraṃ kathitaṃ pūrvasūribhiḥ //
vṛṣyañca madhuraṃ sarpirvātapittakaphāpaham / gavyaṃ medhyañca cākṣuṣyaṃ saṃskārācca tridoṣajit //
analyzed: vṛṣyam ca madhuram sarpiḥ vāta pitta kapha apaham gavyam medhyam ca cākṣuṣyam saṃskārāt ca tridoṣa jit

original: apasmāragadonmādamūrchāghnaṃ saṃskṛtaṅghṛtam / ajādīnāñca sarpoṣi vidyādgokṣīrasadguṇaiḥ / kaphavātaharaṃ mūtraṃ sarvakrimiviṣāpaham //
analyzed: apasmāra gada unmāda mūrchā ghnam saṃskṛtam ghṛtam  aja ādīnām ca vidyāt go kṣīra sat guṇaiḥ  kapha vāta haram mūtram sarva krimi viṣa apaham

original: pāṇḍutvodarakuṣṭhārśaḥ śothagulmapramehanut / vātaśleṣmaharaṃ balyaṃ tailaṃ kaśyaṃ tilodbhavam //
sārṣapaṃ kṛmipāṇḍughnaṃ kaphamedo 'nilāpaham / kṣaumaṃ tailamacakṣuṣyaṃ pittahṛdvātanāśanam //
analyzed: sārṣapam kṛmi pāṇḍu ghnam kapha medaḥ nila apaham kṣaumam tailam acakṣuṣyam pitta hṛt vāta nāśanam

original: akṣajaṃ kaphapittaghnaṃ keśyaṃ tvakśrotratarpaṇam / tridoṣaghnaṃ madhu proktaṃ vātalañca prakīrtitam //
analyzed: akṣajam kapha pitta ghnam keśyam tvac śrotra tarpaṇam tridoṣa ghnam madhu proktam vātalam ca prakīrtitam

original: hikkāśvāsakṛmicchardimehatṛṣṇāviṣāmaham / ikṣavoraktapittaghno balyā vṛṣyāḥ kaphapradāḥ //
analyzed: hikkā śvāsa kṛmi chardi meha tṛṣṇā viṣām aham ikṣavaḥ raktapitta ghnaḥ balyāḥ vṛṣyāḥ kapha pradāḥ

original: phāṇitaṃ pittalaṃ tavriṃ surā matsyaṇḍikā laghuḥ / khaṇḍaṃ vṛṣyaṃ tathā snigdhaṃ svādvasṛkpittavātajit //
vātapittaharo rūkṣo vātaghnaḥ kaphakṛdguḍaḥ / sa pittaghnaḥ paraḥ pathyaḥ purāṇo 'sṛkprasādanaḥ //
analyzed: vāta pitta haraḥ rūkṣaḥ vāta ghnaḥ kapha kṛt guḍaḥ sa pitta ghnaḥ paraḥ pathyaḥ purāṇaḥ sṛj prasādanaḥ

original: raktipittaharā vṛṣyā sasnehā gaḍaśarkarā / sarvapittakaraṃ madyamamlatvātkaphavātajit //
analyzed: rakti pitta harā vṛṣyā sa snehā gaḍaśarkarā sarva pitta karam madyam amla tvāt kapha vāta jit

original: raktapittakarāstīkṣṇāstathā sauvīrajātayaḥ / pācano dīpanaḥ pathyo maṇḍaḥ syādbhṛṣṭataṇḍulaḥ //
analyzed: rakta pitta karāḥ tīkṣṇāḥ tathā sauvīra jātayaḥ pācanaḥ dīpanaḥ pathyaḥ maṇḍaḥ syāt bhṛṣṭa taṇḍulaḥ

original: vātānulomanī laghvī peyā vastiviśodhanī / satakradāḍimavyoṣā saguḍā madhupippalī //
analyzed: vāta anulomanī laghvī peyā vasti viśodhanī sa takra dāḍima vyoṣā sa guḍā madhu pippalī

original: intīyaṃ sukṛtā peyā kāsaśvā sapravāhikāḥ / pāyasaḥ kaphakṛdbalyaḥ kṛśarā vātanāśinī //
analyzed: inti iyam su kṛtā peyā sa pravāhikāḥ pāyasaḥ kapha kṛt balyaḥ kṛsarā vāta nāśinī

original: sudhautaḥ prastrutaḥ snigdhaḥ sukhoṣṇo laghurocanaḥ / kandamūlaphalehaiḥ sādhito bṛṃhaṇoguruḥ //
analyzed: su dhautaḥ prastrutaḥ snigdhaḥ sukha uṣṇaḥ laghu rocanaḥ kanda mūla phala īhaiḥ sādhitaḥ bṛṃhaṇa uguruḥ

original: īṣaduṣṇasevanācca laghuḥ sūpaḥ susādhitaḥ / svinna niṣpīḍitaṃ śākaṃ hitaṃ snehādisaṃskṛtam //
analyzed: īṣat uṣṇa sevanāt ca laghuḥ sūpaḥ su sādhitaḥ svinna niṣpīḍitam śākam hitam sneha ādi saṃskṛtam

original: dāḍimāmalakairyūṣo vahnikṛdvātapittahā / śvāsakāsapratiśyāyakaphaghno malakaiḥ kṛtaḥ //
analyzed: dāḍima āmalakaiḥ yūṣaḥ vahni kṛt vāta pitta hā śvāsa kāsa pratiśyāya kapha ghnaḥ malakaiḥ kṛtaḥ

original: yavakolakulatthānāṃ yūṣaḥ kaṇṭhyo 'nilāpahaḥ / mudgāmalakajo grāhī śleṣmapittavināśanaḥ //
analyzed: yava kola kulatthānām yūṣaḥ kaṇṭhyaḥ nila apahaḥ mudga āmalaka jaḥ grāhī śleṣma pitta vināśanaḥ

original: saguḍaṃ dadhi vātaghnaṃ saktavo rūkṣavātulāḥ / ghṛtapūrṇo 'gnikārī syādvṛṣyā gurvo ca śaṣkulī //
analyzed: sa guḍam dadhi vāta ghnam saktavaḥ rūkṣa vātulāḥ ghṛta pūrṇaḥ gni kārī syāt vṛṣyā ca śaṣkulī

original: bṛṃhaṇāḥ sāmiṣā bhakṣyapiṣṭa kā gukhaḥ smṛtāḥ / tailasiddhāśca dṛṣṭighnāstoyasvinnāśca durjarāḥ //
analyzed: bṛṃhaṇāḥ sa āmiṣāḥ smṛtāḥ taila siddhāḥ ca dṛṣṭi ghnāḥ toya svinnāḥ ca durjarāḥ

original: atyuṣṇā maṇḍakāḥ pathyāḥ śītalā gukho matāḥ / anupānañca pānīyaṃ śramatṛṣṇādināśanam //
analyzed: ati uṣṇāḥ maṇḍakāḥ pathyāḥ śītalāḥ matāḥ anupānam ca pānīyam śrama tṛṣṇā ādi nāśanam

original: annapānādinā rakṣā kṛtsyādrogavarjitaḥ / anuṣṇaḥ śikhikaṇṭhābho viṣañcaiva vivarṇakṛt //
analyzed: anna pāna ādinā rakṣā kṛt syāt roga varjitaḥ anuṣṇaḥ śikhi kaṇṭha ābhaḥ viṣam ca eva vivarṇa kṛt

original: gandhasparśarasāstīvrābhoktuśca syānmanovyathā / āghrāṇe cākṣirogaḥ syādasādhyaśca bhiṣagvaraiḥ / vepathurjṛmbhaṇādyaṃ syādviṣasyaitattu lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: gandha sparśa rasāḥ tīvrāḥ bhoktuḥ ca syāt manaḥ vyathā āghrāṇe ca akṣi rogaḥ syāt asādhyaḥ ca bhiṣaj varaiḥ vepathuḥ jṛmbhaṇa ādyam syāt viṣasya etat tu lakṣaṇam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe anupānādividhikathanaṃ nāmaikonasaptatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe anupānādividhikathanam nāma ekonasaptatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 170
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / jvaro 'ṣṭadhā pṛthagdvandvasaṃghātāgantujaḥ smṛtaḥ / mustaparpaṭakośīracandanodīcyanāgaraiḥ / śṛtaśītaṃ jalaṃ dadyātpipāsājvaraśāntaye //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca jvaraḥ ṣṭadhā pṛthak dvandva saṃghāta āgantu jaḥ smṛtaḥ mustā parpaṭaka uśīra candana udīcya nāgaraiḥ śṛtaśītam jalam dadyāt pipāsā jvara śāntaye

original: nāgaraṃ devakāṣṭhañca dhānyākaṃ bṛhatīdvayam / dadyātpācanakaṃ pūrvaṃ jvaritāya jvarāpaham //
analyzed: nāgaram devakāṣṭham ca dhānyākam bṛhatī dvayam dadyāt pācanakam pūrvam jvaritāya jvara apaham

original: āragvadhābhayāmustātiktāgranthikanirmitaḥ / kaṣāyaḥ pācanaḥ sāme saśūle ca jvarehitaḥ //
madhūkasārasindhūtthavacoṣaṇakaṇāḥ samāḥ / ślakṣṇaṃ piṣṭvāmbhasā nasyaṃ kuryātsaṃjñāprabodhanam //
trivṛdviśālātriphalākaṭukāragvadhaiḥ kṛtaḥ / sakṣāro bhedanaḥ kvāthaḥ peyaḥ sarvajvarāpahaḥ //
analyzed: trivṛt viśālā triphalā kaṭukā āragvadhaiḥ kṛtaḥ sa kṣāraḥ bhedanaḥ kvāthaḥ peyaḥ sarva jvara apahaḥ

original: mahauṣadhāmṛtāmustacandanośīradhānyakaiḥ / kvāthastṛtīyakaṃ hanti śarkarāmadhuyojitaḥ //
apāmagajaṭākaṭyāṃ lohitaiḥ saptatantubhiḥ / baddhvā vāre ravernūnaṃ jvaraṃ hanti tṛtīyakam //
analyzed: apāmaga jaṭā kaṭyām lohitaiḥ sapta tantubhiḥ baddhvā vāre raveḥ nūnam jvaram hanti tṛtīyakam

original: gaṅgāyā uttare kūle aputrastāpaso mṛtaḥ / tasmai tilodakaṃ dadyānmuñcatyaikāhiko jvaraḥ //
analyzed: gaṅgāyāḥ uttare kūle aputraḥ tāpasaḥ mṛtaḥ tasmai tila udakam dadyāt muñcati aikāhikaḥ jvaraḥ

original: guḍūcyāḥ kvāthakalkābhyāṃ viphalāvāsakasya ca / mṛdvīkāyā balāyāśca siddhāḥ snehā jvaracchidaḥ //
analyzed: guḍūcyāḥ kvātha kalkābhyām viphalā vāsakasya ca mṛdvīkāyāḥ balāyāḥ ca siddhāḥ snehāḥ jvara chidaḥ

original: dhātrīśivākaṇāvahnikvāthaḥ sarvajvarāntakaḥ / jvarātisāraharaṇamauṣadhaṃ pravadāmyatha //
pṛśriparṇobalāvilvanāgarotpaladhānyakaiḥ / pāṭhendrayavabhūnimbamustaparpaṭakaiḥ śṛtāḥ / jyantyāmamatīsāraṃ sajvaraṃ samahauṣadhāḥ //
analyzed: pṛśriparṇaḥ ubalā vilva nāgara utpala dhānyakaiḥ pāṭhā indrayava bhūnimba mustā parpaṭakaiḥ śṛtāḥ jyanti āmam atīsāram sa jvaram sa mahauṣadhāḥ

original: nāgarātiviṣāmustabhūnimbāmṛtavatsakaiḥ / sarvajvaraharaḥ kvathaḥ sarvātīsāranāśanaḥ //
mustaparpaṭakadivyaśṛṅgaveraśṛtaṃ payaḥ / śālaparṇo pṛśriparṇo bṛhatī kaṇṭakārikā //
analyzed: mustā parpaṭaka divyaśṛṅga vera śṛtam payaḥ śālaparṇo pṛśriparṇaḥ bṛhatī kaṇṭakārikā

original: balāśvadaṃṣṭrābilvādi pāṭhānāgaradhānyakam / etadāhārasaṃyoge hitaṃ sarvātisāriṇām //
analyzed: balā aśvadaṃṣṭrā bilva ādi pāṭhā nāgara dhānyakam etat āhāra saṃyoge hitam sarva atisāriṇām

original: bilvacūtāsthikvāthaśca khaṇḍaṃ madhvatisāranut / atisāre hitā tadvatkuṭajatvakkaṇāyutā //
analyzed: bilva cūta asthi kvāthaḥ ca khaṇḍam madhu atisāra nud atisāre hitā tadvat kuṭaja tvac kaṇā yutā

original: vatsakātiviṣāviśvakaṇākandakaṣāyakaḥ / prayuktaścāmaśūlāḍhye hyatīsāre saśoṇita //
cikitsātha grahaṇyāstugrahaṇī cāgrināśinī / citrakākvāthaklakābhyāṃ grahaṇīghnaṃ kṣṛtaṃ haviḥ / gulmaśothodaraplīhaśūlārśoghnaṃ pradīpanam //
analyzed: cikitsā atha grahaṇyāḥ tu grahaṇī ca agrināśinī citrakā kvātha klakābhyām grahaṇī ghnam kṣṛtam haviḥ gulma śotha udara plīha śūla arśaḥ ghnam pradīpanam

original: sauvarcalaṃ saindhavañca viḍaṅgaudbhidameva ca / sāmudreṇa samaṃ pañcalavaṇānyatra yojayet //
analyzed: sauvarcalam saindhavam ca viḍaṅga audbhidam eva ca sāmudreṇa samam pañcalavaṇāni atra yojayet

original: bheṣajaṃ śastrakṣārāgnyastridhā vai cārśasāṃ haram / viddhi taccārśasoghnantu yaddhi takraṃ navoddhṛtam //
analyzed: bheṣajam śastra kṣāra agnyaḥ tridhā vai ca arśasām haram viddhi tat ca arśasā ghnantu yat hi takram nava uddhṛtam

original: guḍūṭīṃ pippalīyuktāmabhayāṃ ghṛtabharjitām / trivṛdarśovināśārthaṃ bhakṣayedamlaloṇikām //
analyzed: guḍūṭīm pippalī yuktām abhayām ghṛta bharjitām trivṛt arśaḥ vināśa artham bhakṣayet amla loṇikām

original: tilekṣurasasaṃyogaścārśaḥ kuṣṭha vināśanaḥ / pañcakolaṃ samaricaṃ satryūṣaṇamathāgnikṛt //
analyzed: tila ikṣu rasa saṃyogaḥ ca arśaḥ kuṣṭha vināśanaḥ pañcakolam sa maricam sa tryūṣaṇam atha agni kṛt

original: harītakī bhakṣyamāṇā nāgeraṇa guḍena vā / saindhavopahitā vāpi sātatyenāgnidīpanī //
analyzed: harītakī bhakṣyamāṇā guḍena vā saindhava upahitā vā api sātatyena agni dīpanī

original: phalatrikāmṛtāsātiktābhūnimbanimbajaḥ / kvāthaḥ kṣaudrayuto hanyātpāṇḍurogaṃ sakāmalam //
trivṛcca triphalā śyāmā pippalī śarkaga madhu / modakaḥ sannipātānto raktapittajvarāpahaḥ //
analyzed: trivṛt ca triphalā śyāmā pippalī śarkaga madhu modakaḥ sannipāta antaḥ raktapitta jvara apahaḥ

original: vāsāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmāśāyāṃ jīvitasya ca / raktapittī kṣayī kāsī kimarthamavasīdati //
analyzed: vāsāyām vidyamānāyām āśāyām jīvitasya ca raktapittī kṣayī kāsī kimartham avasīdati

original: āṭarūpakamṛdvīkāpathyākvāthaḥ saśarkaraḥ / kṣaudrāḍhyaḥ kāsaniḥ śvāsaraktapittanibarhaṇaḥ //
vāsārasaḥ khaṇḍamadhuyutaḥ pīto 'tharaktajit / sallakībadarījambupriyālāmrārjunaṃ dhavaḥ / pītaṃ kṣīrañca madhvāḍhyaṃ pṛthakchoṇitavāraṇam //
analyzed: vāsā rasaḥ khaṇḍa madhu yutaḥ sallakī badarī jambu priyā lāmra arjunam dhavaḥ pītam kṣīram ca madhu āḍhyam pṛthak śoṇita vāraṇam

original: samūlaphalapatrāyā nirguṇḍyāḥ svarasairghṛtam / siddhaṃ pītvā kṣayakṣīṇī nirvyādirbhāti devavat //
analyzed: sa mūla phala patrāyāḥ nirguṇḍyāḥ svarasaiḥ ghṛtam siddham pītvā kṣaya kṣīṇī nirvyādiḥ bhāti deva vat

original: harītakī kaṇā śuṇṭhī maricaṃ guḍasaṃyutam / kāsaghno modakaḥ proktastṛṣṇārocakanāśanaḥ //
analyzed: harītakī kaṇā śuṇṭhī maricam guḍa saṃyutam kāsa ghnaḥ modakaḥ proktaḥ tṛṣṇā arocaka nāśanaḥ

original: kaṇṭakāriguḍūcībhyāṃ pṛthaktriṃśatpale rase / prasthaṃ siddhaṃ ghṛtaṃ syācca kāsanudvahnidāpanam //
kṛṣṇā dhātrī śitā śuṇṭhī hakkāghnī madhusaṃyutā / hikkāśvāsī pivedbhārṅgo saviśvāmuṣṇavāriṇā //
analyzed: kṛṣṇā dhātrī śitā śuṇṭhī hakkāghnī madhu saṃyutā hikkā śvāsī pivet bhārṅgo sa viśvām uṣṇa vāriṇā

original: tailāktaṃ svarabhede vā khādiraṃ dhārayenmukhe / pathyāṃ pippalikāyuktāṃ saṃyuktāṃ nāgareṇa vā //
analyzed: taila aktam svarabhede vā khādiram dhārayet mukhe pathyām pippalikā yuktām saṃyuktām nāgareṇa vā

original: viḍaṅgatrilācūrṇaṃ chardihṛnmadhunā saha / āmrajambūkaṣāyaṃ vā pibonmākṣikasaṃyutam //
chardi sarvāṃ praṇudati tṛṣṇāñcaivāpakarṣati / triphalā bhramamūrchāhṛtpītā sā madhunāpi vā //
analyzed: chardi sarvām praṇudati tṛṣṇām ca eva apakarṣati triphalā bhrama mūrchā hṛt pītā sā madhunā api vā

original: pañcagavyaṃ hitaṃ pānādapasmāragrahādinut / kūṣmāṇḍakaraso vājyaṃ sayaṣṭikaṃ tadarthakṛt //
brāhmīrasavacākuṣṭhaśaṅkhapuṣpībhireva ca / purāṇaṃ sevyamunmādagrahāpasmāradghṛnutam //
analyzed: brāhmī rasa vacā kuṣṭha śaṅkhapuṣpībhiḥ eva ca purāṇam sevyam unmāda graha apasmāra dhṛnutam

original: aśvagandhākaṣāye ca kalke kṣīre caturguṇe / ghṛtapakvantu vātaghnaṃ vṛṣyaṃ māṃ sāya putrakṛt //
analyzed: aśvagandhā kaṣāye ca kalke kṣīre caturguṇe ghṛta pakvantu vāta ghnam vṛṣyam mām sāya putra kṛt

original: nīlīmuṇḍīrikācūrṇaṃ madhusarpiḥ samanvitam / chinnākvāthaṃ pibanhanti vātaraktaṃ sudustaram //
saguḍāḥ pañca pathyāśca kuṣṭārśovātasādanāḥ / gaḍacīsvarasaṃ kalkaṃ cūrṇaṃ vā kvāthameva vā //
analyzed: sa guḍāḥ pañca pathyāḥ ca kuṣṭa arśaḥ vāta sādanāḥ gaḍacī svarasam kalkam cūrṇam vā kvātham eva vā

original: vātaraktāntakaṃ kālāguḍūcīkvāthakalkataḥ / kuṣṭhavraṇādiśamanaṃ śṛtamājyaṃ sadugdhakam //
triphalāguggulurvātaraktamūrchāpahārakaḥ / ūrustambhavināśāya gomūtreṇa ca gugguluḥ //
analyzed: triphalā gugguluḥ vāta rakta mūrchā apahārakaḥ ūrustambha vināśāya go mūtreṇa ca gugguluḥ

original: śuṇṭhīgokṣurakakvāthaḥ sāmavātārtiśūlanut / daśamūlāmṛtairaṇḍarāsnānāgaradārubhiḥ //
kvātho hanti māhaśothaṃ marīcaguḍasaṃyutaḥ / kāsaghno modakaḥ proktastṛṣṇārocakanāśanaḥ //
analyzed: kvāthaḥ hanti māha śotham marīca guḍa saṃyutaḥ kāsa ghnaḥ modakaḥ proktaḥ tṛṣṇā arocaka nāśanaḥ

original: kaṇṭakāriguḍūcībhyāṃ pṛthak triṃśatpale rase / prasthasiddhaṃ ghṛtañcaiva kāsanuddhṛdi dīpanaḥ //
analyzed: kaṇṭakārī guḍūcībhyām pṛthak triṃśat pale rase prastha siddham ghṛtam ca eva kāsa nud hṛdi dīpanaḥ

original: kṛṣṇādhātrīsitāśuṇṭhīmarīcasaindhavānvitaḥ / kvātha eraṇḍatailena sāmaṃ hantyanilaṃ gurum //
balā punarnavairaṇḍabṛhatīdvayagokṣuraiḥ / sahiṅgulavarṇa pītaṃ vātaśūlavimardanam //
triphalānimbayaṣṭīkakaṭukāragvadhaiḥ śṛtam / pāyayenmadhunā miśraṃ dāhaśūlopaśāntaye //
analyzed: triphalā nimba yaṣṭīka kaṭukā āragvadhaiḥ śṛtam pāyayet madhunā miśram dāha śūla upaśāntaye

original: triphalāpaḥ sayaṣṭīkāḥ pariṇāmārtināśanāḥ / gomūtraśuddhamaṇḍūraṃ triphalācūrṇasaṃyutam / vilihanmadhusarpirbhyāṃ śūlaṃ hanti tridoṣajam //
analyzed: triphalā paḥ sa yaṣṭīkāḥ pariṇāma ārti nāśanāḥ go mūtra śuddha maṇḍūram triphalā cūrṇa saṃyutam vilihat madhu sarpirbhyām śūlam hanti tridoṣa jam

original: trivṛtkṛṣṇāharītakyo dvicatuṣpañcabhāgikāḥ / guṭikā guḍatulyāstā viḍvibandhagadāpahāḥ //
analyzed: trivṛt kṛṣṇā harītakyaḥ dvi catur pañca bhāgikāḥ guṭikāḥ guḍa tulyāḥ tāḥ viṣ vibandha gada apahāḥ

original: harītakīyavakṣārapippalītrivṛtastathā / ghṛtaiścūrṇamidaṃ peyamudāvartāvināśanam //
analyzed: harītakī yavakṣāra pippalī trivṛtaḥ tathā ghṛtaiḥ cūrṇam idam peyam udāvarta avināśanam

original: trivṛddharītakīśyāmāḥ snuhīkṣīreṇa bhāvitāḥ / vaṭikā mūtrapītāstāḥ śreṣṭāścānāhabhedikāḥ //
analyzed: trivṛt harītakī śyāmāḥ snuhī kṣīreṇa bhāvitāḥ vaṭikāḥ mūtra pītāḥ tāḥ śreṣṭāḥ ca ānāha bhedikāḥ

original: pathyākṣavātryokadvicaturbhāga rugardanāḥ / śatavaryasṛtābhṛṅgasindhuvārādibhāvitāḥ //

analyzed: dadhi takram kāñjikam ca lakucam ca amlave tasam amlaḥ loṇaḥ śuṇṭhī yuktaḥ jāraṇaḥ pācanaḥ rasaḥ

original: mārgarodhī mārdavakṛtsa ekaḥ pariṣevitaḥ / gātrakaṇḍūkoṣṭhaśothavaivarṇyaṃ janayedrasaḥ / raktavātaṃ pittaraktaṃ puṃstvendriyarujādikam //

original: vyoṣaśigrūmūlakaṃ devadāru ca kuṣṭhakam / laśunaṃ valgujī phalaṃ mustāguggululāṅgalī //
