original: nāsāśirāraktakarṣānnaśyecchaṃśakara jihvikā / rasaḥ śirīṣabījānāṃ haridrāyāścaturguṇaḥ //
analyzed: nāsā śirā rakta karṣāt naśyet śaṃśa kara jihvikā rasaḥ śirīṣa bījānām haridrāyāḥ caturguṇaḥ

original: tena pakvena bhūteśa nasyaṃ mastakaroganut / galarogā vinaśyanti nasyamātreṇa tatkṣaṇāt //
analyzed: tena pakvena bhūteśa nasyam mastaka roga nud  gala rogāḥ vinaśyanti nasya mātreṇa tad kṣaṇāt

original: dantakīṭavināśaḥ myādguñjāmūlasya carvaṇāt / kākajaṅghāsnuhīnīlīkavāyo madhumojitaḥ //
analyzed: dantakīṭa vināśaḥ myāt guñjā mūlasya carvaṇāt kākajaṅghā snuhī nīlī kavāyaḥ madhu mojitaḥ

original: dantākrāntāndantajāṃśca kṛmīnnāśayate śiva / ghataṃ karkaṭapādena dugdhonmiśreṇa sādhitam //
analyzed: danta ākrāntān danta jān ca kṛmīn nāśayate śiva karkaṭapādena dugdha unmiśreṇa sādhitam

original: tena cāmyaṅgitādantāḥ kuryuḥ kaṭakaṭānna hi / liptvā karkaṭapādena kevalenāthavāśiva //
analyzed: tena cāmī aṅgitā dantāḥ kuryuḥ kaṭakaṭān na hi liptvā karkaṭa pādena kevalena athavā aśiva

original: trisaptāhaṃ vāḥ piṣṭāni jyotiṣmatyāḥ phalāni hi / śuklābhayāmajjalepāddantasyāṅkakalaṅkanut //
analyzed: tri sapta aham vār piṣṭāni jyotiṣmatyāḥ phalāni hi śuklā abhayā majja lepāt dantasya aṅka kalaṅka nud

original: lodhrakuṅkumamañjiṣṭhālohakā leyakāni ca / yavataṇḍulametaiśca yaṣṭī madhusamanvitaiḥ //
analyzed: lodhra kuṅkuma mañjiṣṭhā lohakāḥ leyakāni ca yava taṇḍulam etaiḥ ca yaṣṭī madhu samanvitaiḥ

original: vāripiṣṭairvaktralepaḥ strīṇāṃ śobhanavaktrakṛt / dvibhāgaṃ chāgadugdhena tailaprasthaṃ tu sādhitam //
analyzed: vāri piṣṭaiḥ vaktra lepaḥ strīṇām śobhana vaktra kṛt  dvi bhāgam chāga dugdhena taila prastham tu sādhitam

original: raktavandanamañjiṣṭhālakṣāṇāṃ karṣakeṇa vā / yaṣṭīmadhukuṅkumābhyāṃ saptāhānmukhakāntikṛt //
analyzed: rakta vandana mañjiṣṭhā alakṣāṇām karṣakeṇa vā yaṣṭī madhu kuṅkumābhyām sapta ahāt mukha kānti kṛt

original: śuṇṭhīpippalicūrṇaṃ tu guḍūcī kaṇṭakārikā / ebhiśca kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ cāgniṃ karoti vai //
analyzed: śuṇṭhī pippali cūrṇam tu guḍūcī kaṇṭakārikā ebhiḥ ca kvathitam vāri pītam ca agnim karoti vai

original: vātaśūlakṣayaṃ caiva kageti prathameśvara / karañjaparpaṭośīraṃ bahatī kaṭurohiṇī //
analyzed: vāta śūla kṣayam ca eva kagā iti prathama īśvara karañja parpaṭa uśīram bahatī kaṭurohiṇī

original: gokṣuraṃ kvathitaṃ tvabhirvāri pītaṃ śramāpahan / dāhaṃ pittaṃ jvaraṃ śoṣaṃ mūrchāṃ caiva kṣayaṃ nayet //
analyzed: gokṣuram kvathitam tu abhiḥ vāri pītam śrama apahan dāham pittam jvaram śoṣam mūrchām ca eva kṣayam nayet

original: madhvājyapippalīcūrṇaṃ kvathitaṃ kṣīrasaṃyutam / pītaṃ hṛdrogakāsasya viṣamajvaranudbhavet //
kvāthaupadhīnāṃ sarvāsāṃ karṣārdhaṃ grāhyameva ca / vayo 'nurūyato jñeyo viśeṣo vṛṣabhadhvaja //
analyzed: kvātha aupadhīnām sarvāsām karṣa ardham grāhyam eva ca vayaḥ jñeyaḥ viśeṣaḥ vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: dugdhaṃ pītaṃ tu saṃyuktaṃ gopurīṣarasena ca / viṣamajvaranutsyācca kākajandhārasastathā //
analyzed: dugdham pītam tu saṃyuktam go purīṣa rasena ca viṣamajvara nud syāt ca kākajandhā rasaḥ tathā

original: maśuṇṭhi kvathitaṃ kṣīgmajāyā jvaranudbhavet / yaṣṭīmadhukamustaṃ ca saindhavaṃ bṛhatīphalam //
etairnasvapridānācca nidrā syātpurupasya ca / marīcapradhvaśvalālānasyānnidrā bhavecchiva //
analyzed: etaiḥ nidrā syāt purupasya ca bhavet śiva

original: mūlaṃ tu kākajaṅghāyā nidrākṛtsyācchirasthitam / siddhaṃ tailaṃ kāñjikena tathā sarjarasena ca //
analyzed: mūlam tu kākajaṅghāyāḥ nidrā kṛt syāt śira sthitam siddham tailam kāñjikena tathā sarja rasena ca

original: śītodakasamāyuktaṃ lepātsantāpanāśanam / śoṇitajvaradāhebhyo jātasantāpanuttathā //
analyzed: śīta udaka samāyuktam lepāt santāpa nāśanam śoṇita jvara dāhebhyaḥ jāta santāpa nud tathā

original: śṛkaśaivālamanthaśca śuṇṭhīpāpāṇabhedakam / śauvāñjanaṃ gokṣuraṃ vā varuṇacchannameva ca //
analyzed: śṛka śaivāla manthaḥ ca śuṇṭhī pāpāṇabhedakam śauvāñjanam gokṣuram vā varuṇa channam eva ca

original: saubhāñjanasya mūlaṃ ca etaiḥ kvathitavāri ca / dattvā hiṅguyavakṣāraṃ pītaṃ vātavināśanam //
analyzed: saubhāñjanasya mūlam ca etaiḥ kvathita vāri ca dattvā hiṅgu yavakṣāram pītam vāta vināśanam

original: pippalī pippalīmūlaṃ tathā bhallātakaṃ śiva / vāryetaiḥ kvathitaṃ pītaṃ varaśūlāpahārakṛt //
analyzed: pippalī pippalī mūlam tathā bhallātakam śiva vāri etaiḥ kvathitam pītam vara śūla apahāra kṛt

original: aśvagandhāmūlakābhyāṃ siddhā valmīkamṛttikā / etayā mardanādrudra ūrustambhaḥ praśāmyati //
analyzed: aśvagandhā mūlakābhyām siddhā valmīka mṛttikā etayā mardanāt rudraḥ ūrustambhaḥ praśāmyati

original: bṛhatīkasya vai mūlaṃ saṃpiṣṭamudakena ca / pītaṃ saṃghātavātasya vipāṭanakṛdeva ca //
analyzed: bṛhatīkasya vai mūlam saṃpiṣṭam udakena ca  pītam saṃghāta vātasya vipāṭana kṛt eva ca

original: pītaṃ takreṇa mūlaṃ ca ārdrasya tagarasya ca / haret jhiñjinīvātaṃ?
analyzed: pītam takreṇa mūlam ca ārdrasya tagarasya ca haret jhiñjinī vātam

original: vai vṛkṣamindrāśaniryathā //
analyzed: vai vṛkṣam indra aśaniḥ yathā

original: asthisaṃhāramekena bhaktena saha vāditam / patiṃ māṃsarasenāpi vātanuccāsthibhaṅganut //
analyzed: asthisaṃhāram ekena bhaktena saha vāditam patim māṃsa rasena api vāta nud ca asthi bhaṅga nud

original: ghṛtaliptaṃ saśuṣkaṃ ca chāgīkṣīreṇa saṃyutam / tallopātpādayārnaṃśyetsakṣepye cātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: ghṛta liptam sa śuṣkam ca chāgī kṣīreṇa saṃyutam tad lopāt pāda yāḥ naṃśyet sa kṣepye ca atra saṃśayaḥ

original: madhvājyasaindhavaṃ sikthaṃ guḍakairikaguggulaiḥ / sasarjarasasphuṭitaḥ klomaśuddhiśca lepanāt //
analyzed: madhu ājya saindhavam siktham guḍa kairika guggulaiḥ sa sarjarasa sphuṭitaḥ kloma śuddhiḥ ca lepanāt

original: kaṭutailena lipto vai vidhūmāgnau pratāpitaḥ / mṛttikārakhāditaḥ pādaḥ samaḥ syādvṛṣabhadhvaja //
analyzed: kaṭutailena liptaḥ vai vidhūma agnau pratāpitaḥ mṛttikāra khāditaḥ pādaḥ samaḥ syāt vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: sarjarasāḥ sikthakaṃ ca jīrakaṃ ca harītakī / utsādhitaghṛtābhyaṅgo hyagnidagdhavyathāpanut //
analyzed: sarjarasāḥ sikthakam ca jīrakam ca harītakī utsādhita ghṛta abhyaṅgaḥ hi agni dagdha vyathā

original: tilatailaṃ cāgnidagdhaṃ yavabhasmasamanvitam / agnidagdhavraṇaṃ naśyedbrahuśaḥ kṛtalepataḥ //
analyzed: tila tailam ca agni dagdham yava bhasma samanvitam agni dagdha vraṇam naśyet brahuśas kṛta lepataḥ

original: navanītaṃ māhiṣaṃ ca dagdhapiṣṭatilāni ca / sabhallākaṃ vraṇaṃ naśyeddhṛcchūlaṃ nasyalepanāt //
analyzed: navanītam māhiṣam ca dagdha piṣṭa tilāni ca sa bhallākam vraṇam naśyet hṛd śūlam nasya lepanāt

original: karpūragavyasarpirbhyāṃ prahāraḥ pūrito hara / śastrodbhavaḥ sabaddhaśca śuklavarṇena śaṅkara / / pākaṃ ca vedanāṃ caiva saṃspṛśedvṛṣabhadhvaja //
analyzed: karpūra gavya sarpirbhyām prahāraḥ pūritaḥ hara  śastra udbhavaḥ sa baddhaḥ ca śukla varṇena śaṅkara   pākam ca vedanām ca eva saṃspṛśet vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: āmra (tasya) mūlarasenaiva śastraghātaḥ prapūritaḥ / ḍhaukate śastraghātābhyāṃ nirvraṇo ghṛpūritaḥ //
analyzed: āmra tasya mūla rasena eva śastra ghātaḥ prapūritaḥ ḍhaukate śastra ghātābhyām nirvraṇaḥ ghṛ pūritaḥ

original: śarapuṅkhā lajjālukā pāṭhā caiṣāṃ tu mūlakam / jalapiṣṭaṃ tasya lepācchastraghātaḥ praśāmyati //
analyzed: śarapuṅkhā lajjālukā pāṭhā ca eṣām tu mūlakam jala piṣṭam tasya lepāt śastra ghātaḥ praśāmyati

original: mūlaṃ ca kākajaṅghāyāstrirātreṇaiva śoṣitaḥ / pākapūtiṃ vedanāṃ ca hanti vai rohito vraṇe //
analyzed: mūlam ca kākajaṅghāyāḥ tri rātreṇa eva śoṣitaḥ pāka pūtim vedanām ca hanti vai rohitaḥ vraṇe

original: sajalaṃ tilatailaṃ ca apāmārgasya mūlakam / tatsekadānānnaśyecca prahārodbhavavedanā //
analyzed: sa jalam tila tailam ca apāmārgasya mūlakam tad seka dānāt naśyet ca prahāra udbhava vedanā

original: abhayāṃ saindhavaṃ śuṇṭhīmetatpiṣṭvodakena tu / bhakṣayitvā hyajīrṇasya nāśo bhavati śaṅkara / //
analyzed: abhayām saindhavam śuṇṭhīm etat piṣṭvā udakena tu bhakṣayitvā hi ajīrṇasya nāśaḥ bhavati śaṅkara

original: kaṭibaddhaṃ nimbamūlamakṣisūlaharaṃ bhavet / śaṇamūlaṃ satāmbūlaṃ dagdhamindriyakasya (lpa) hṛt //
analyzed: kaṭi baddham nimba mūlam akṣi sūla haram bhavet śaṇa mūlam sa tāmbūlam dagdham indriyakasya

original: annasvinnaharidrā ca śvetasarṣapamūlakam / bījāni mātuluṅgasya eṣāmudvartanaṃ samam / saptarātraprayogeṇa śubhadehakaraṃ bhavet //
analyzed: anna svinna haridrā ca śvetasarṣapa mūlakam bījāni mātuluṅgasya eṣām udvartanam samam sapta rātra prayogeṇa śubha deha karam bhavet

original: śvetāparājitāpatraṃ nimbapatrarasena tu / nasyadānāḍḍākinīnāṃ mātṝṇāṃ brahmarakṣasām / mokṣaḥ syānmadhusāreṇa nasyācca vṛṣabhadhvaja //
analyzed: śvetāparājitā patram nimba patra rasena tu nasya dānāt ḍākinīnām mātṝṇām brahmarakṣasām mokṣaḥ syāt madhusāreṇa nasyāt ca vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: mūlaṃ śvetajayantyāśca puṣyarkṣe tu samāhṛtam / śvetāparājitārkasya citrakasya ca mūlakam / kṛtvā tu vaṭikāṃ nārī tilakena vaśī bhavet //
analyzed: mūlam śveta jayantyāḥ ca puṣya ṛkṣe tu samāhṛtam śveta aparājitā arkasya citrakasya ca mūlakam kṛtvā tu vaṭikām nārī tilakena vaśī bhavet

original: pippalīlohacūrṇaṃ tu śuṇṭhīścāmalakāni ca / samāni rudra jānīyātsaindhavaṃ madhuśarkarā //
analyzed: pippalī loha cūrṇam tu śuṇṭhīḥ ca āmalakāni ca samāni rudra jānīyāt saindhavam madhuśarkarā

original: udumbarapramāṇena saptāhaṃ bhakṣaṇātsamam / pumāṃśca balavānsa syājjīvedvarṣaśatadvayam / oṃ ṭha ṭha ṭha iti sarvavaśyaprayogeṣu prayuktaḥ sarvakāmakṛt //
analyzed: udumbara pramāṇena sapta aham bhakṣaṇāt samam pumān ca balavān sa syāt jīvet varṣa śata dvayam om ṭha ṭha ṭha iti sarva vaśya prayogeṣu prayuktaḥ sarva kāma kṛt

original: saṃgṛhya vidvānkākasya nilayaṃ pradahecca tat / citāgnau bhasma tacchatrordattaṃ śirasi śaṅkara //
analyzed: saṃgṛhya vidvān kākasya nilayam pradahet ca tat citā agnau bhasma tat śatroḥ dattam śirasi śaṅkara

original: tamuccāṭayate rudra śṛṇu tadyogamuttamam / niḥ kṣiptaṃ ca purīṣaṃ vai vanamūṣikacarmaṇi //
analyzed: tam uccāṭayate rudra śṛṇu tad yogam uttamam niḥ kṣiptam ca purīṣam vai vanamūṣika carmaṇi

original: kaṭitantunibaddhaṃ vai kuryānmalanirodhanam / kṛṣṇakākasya raktena yasya nāma pralipya ca //
analyzed: kaṭi tantu nibaddham vai kuryāt mala nirodhanam  kṛṣṇa kākasya raktena yasya nāma pralipya ca

original: cyutadale madhyamadhye tato niḥ kṣipyate hara / / sa khādyate kākavṛndairnārī puruṣa eva ca //
analyzed: cyutadale madhya madhye tatas niḥ kṣipyate hara      sa khādyate kāka vṛndaiḥ nārī puruṣaḥ eva ca

original: śarkarāmadhvajākṣīraṃ tilagokṣurakaṃ samam / sa śatruṃ nāśayedrudra / uccāṭitamidaṃ hara / //
analyzed: śarkarā madhvajā kṣīram tila gokṣurakam samam sa śatrum nāśayet rudraḥ uccāṭitam idam hara

original: ulūkakṛṣṇakākasya bilvasyātha samicchatam / rudhireṇa samāyuktaṃ yayornāmnā tu hūyate / tayormadhye mahāvairaṃ bhavennāstyatra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: ulūka kṛṣṇa kākasya bilvasya atha samicchatam  rudhireṇa samāyuktam yayoḥ nāmnā tu hūyate tayoḥ madhye mahā vairam bhavet na asti atra saṃśayaḥ

original: bhāvitaṃ ṛkṣadugdhena matsyasya rohitasya ca / māṃsaṃ tatsādhitaṃ tailaṃ tadabhyaṅgācca roganut / candanodakanasyāttu romotthānaṃ bhavetpunaḥ //
analyzed: bhāvitam ṛkṣa dugdhena matsyasya rohitasya ca  māṃsam tad sādhitam tailam tad abhyaṅgāt ca roga nud candana udaka nasyāt tu roma utthānam bhavet punar

original: haste lāṅgalikākandaṃ gṛhītaṃ tena lepitam / śarīraṃ yena sa pumānvṛddherdarpaṃ vyapohati //
analyzed: haste lāṅgalikā kandam gṛhītam tena lepitam śarīram yena sa pumān vṛddheḥ darpam vyapohati

original: mayūrarudhireṇaiva jīvaṃ saṃharate śiva / jvalatāṃ tu bhujaṅgānāṃ bilasthānāmapīśvara //
analyzed: mayūra rudhireṇa eva jīvam saṃharate śiva  jvalatām tu bhujaṅgānām bila sthānām api īśvara

original: dehaścitāgnau dagdhaśca sarpasyājagarasya hi / tadbhasma saṃmukhe kṣiptaṃ śatraṇāṃ bhaṅgakṛdbhavet //
analyzed: dehaḥ citā agnau dagdhaḥ ca sarpasya ajagarasya hi tad bhasma saṃmukhe kṣiptam śatraṇām bhaṅga kṛt bhavet

original: mantreṇānena tatkṣiptaṃ mahābhaṅgakaraṃ ripoḥ / oṃ ṭha ṭha ṭha cāhīhicāhīhi svāhā / oṃ udaraṃ pāhihi pāhihisvāhā //
analyzed: mantreṇa anena tat kṣiptam mahā bhaṅga karam ripoḥ  om ṭha ṭha ṭha svāhā om udaram pāhihi pāhihi svāhā

original: sudarśanāyā malaṃ tu puṣyarkṣe tu samāhṛtam / niḥ kṣiptaṃ gṛhamadhye tu bhujaṅgā varjayanti tat //
analyzed: sudarśanāyāḥ malam tu puṣya ṛkṣe tu samāhṛtam niḥ kṣiptam gṛha madhye tu bhujaṅgāḥ varjayanti tat

original: arkamūlena raviṇā arkāgnijvalitā śiva / yuktā siddhārthatailena vartirmārgāhināśinī //
analyzed: arka mūlena raviṇā arka agni jvalitā śiva yuktā siddhārtha tailena vartiḥ mārga ahi nāśinī

original: mārjārapalalaṃ viṣṭhā haritālaṃ ca bhāvitam / chāga mūtreṇa tallipto mūṣiko mūṣikānharet //
analyzed: mārjāra palalam viṣṭhā haritālam ca bhāvitam chāga mūtreṇa tad liptaḥ mūṣikaḥ mūṣikān haret

original: mukto hi mandire rudra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / viphalārjunapuṣpāṇi bhallātakaśirīṣakam //
analyzed: muktaḥ hi mandire rudra na atra kāryā vicāraṇā viphala arjuna puṣpāṇi bhallātaka śirīṣakam

original: lākṣā sarjarasaścaiva viḍaṅgaścaiva gugguluḥ / etairdhūpo makṣikāṇāṃ maśakāṇāṃ vināśanaḥ //
analyzed: lākṣā sarjarasaḥ ca eva viḍaṅgaḥ ca eva gugguluḥ etaiḥ dhūpaḥ makṣikāṇām maśakāṇām vināśanaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe netrāñjanādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptasaptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe netrāñjanādinirūpaṇam nāma saptasaptatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 178
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / brahmadaṇḍīvacākuṣṭhaṃ priyaṅgarnāgakeśaram / dadyāttāmbūlasaṃyuktaṃ strīṇāṃ mantreṇa tadvaśam / oṃ nārāyaṇyai svāhā //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca brahmadaṇḍī vacā kuṣṭham priyaṅguḥ nāgakeśaram  dadyāt tāmbūla saṃyuktam strīṇām mantreṇa tad vaśam om nārāyaṇyai svāhā

original: tāmbūlaṃ yasya dīyeta sa vaśī syātsumantrataḥ / oṃ hariḥ hariḥ svāhā //
analyzed: tāmbūlam yasya dīyeta sa vaśī syāt su mantrataḥ om hariḥ hariḥ svāhā

original: godantaṃ haritālañca saṃyuktaṃ kākajihvayā / cūrṇokṛtya yasya śire dīyate sa vaśī bhavet / śvetasarṣapanirmālyaṃ yadgṛhe tadvināśakṛt //
analyzed: godantam haritālam ca saṃyuktam kākajihvayā yasya dīyate sa vaśī bhavet śveta sarṣapa nirmālyam yat gṛhe tad vināśa kṛt

original: vaibhī takaṃ śākhoṭakaṃ mūlaṃ patreṇa saṃyutam / sthāpyate yadgṛhadvāre tatra vai kalaho bhavet //
analyzed: vaibhī takam śākhoṭakam mūlam patreṇa saṃyutam sthāpyate yat gṛha dvāre tatra vai kalahaḥ bhavet

original: khañjarīṭasya māṃsaṃ tu madhunā saha peṣayet / ṛtukāleyonilepātpuruṣo dāsatāmiyāt //
analyzed: khañjarīṭasya māṃsam tu madhunā saha peṣayet ṛtu kāleyaḥ nilepāt puruṣaḥ dāsa tām iyāt

original: aguruṃ gugguluṃ caiva nīlotpalasamanvitam / guḍena dhūpayitvā tu rājadvāre priyo bhavet //
analyzed: agurum guggulum ca eva nīlotpala samanvitam guḍena dhūpayitvā tu rājadvāre priyaḥ bhavet

original: śvetāpa rājitāmūlaṃ piṣṭaṃ rocanayā yutam / yaṃ paśyettilakenaiva vaśī karyānnṛpālaye //
analyzed: rājitā mūlam piṣṭam rocanayā yutam yam paśyet tilakena eva vaśī nṛpa ālaye

original: kākajaṅghā vacā kuṣṭhaṃ nimbapatraṃ sukuṅkumam / ātmaraktasamāyuktaṃ vaśī bhavati mānavaḥ //
āraṇyasya biḍālasya gṛhitvā rudhiraṃ śubham / karañjataile tadbhāvyaṃ rudrāgnau kajjalaṃ tataḥ / pātayetpadmapatreṇa hādṛśyaḥ syāttadañjanāt //
analyzed: āraṇyasya biḍālasya gṛhitvā rudhiram śubham karañja taile tat bhāvyam rudra agnau kajjalam tatas pātayet padma patreṇa ha adṛśyaḥ syāt tad añjanāt

original: oṃ namaḥ khaḍgavajrapāṇaye mahāyakṣasenāpataye svāhā / oṃ rudraṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ varaśaktā tvaritāvidyā / oṃ mātaraḥ stambhayasvāhā / sahasraṃ parijapyāttu vidyeyaṃ cauravāriṇī / mahāsugandhikāmūlaṃ śukraṃ stambhetkaṭau sthitam //
analyzed: om namaḥ khaḍga vajrapāṇaye mahā yakṣa senāpataye svāhā om rudram     vara śaktā tvaritā vidyā om mātaraḥ stambhaya svāhā sahasram parijapyāt tu vidyā iyam caura vāriṇī mahāsugandhikā mūlam śukram stambhet kaṭau sthitam  /

original: oṃ namaḥ sarvasattvebhyo namaḥ siddhiṃ kuru kuru svāhā / saptābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā karavīrasya puṣpakam / strīṇāmagre bhrāmayacca kṣaṇādvai sā vaśe bhavet //
analyzed: om namaḥ sarva sattvebhyaḥ namaḥ siddhim kuru kuru svāhā sapta abhimantritam kṛtvā karavīrasya puṣpakam strīṇām agre bhrāmayat ca kṣaṇāt vai sā vaśe bhavet

original: brahmadaṇḍīṃ vacāṃ patraṃ madhunā saha peṣayet / aṅgalepācca vanitā nānyaṃ bhartāramicchati //
analyzed: brahmadaṇḍīm vacām patram madhunā saha peṣayet aṅga lepāt ca vanitā na anyam bhartāram icchati

original: brahmadaṇḍīśikhā vaktre kṣiptā śukrasya stambhanam / mūlaṃ jayantyā vaktrasthaṃ vyavahāre jayapradam //
analyzed: brahmadaṇḍī śikhā vaktre kṣiptā śukrasya stambhanam mūlam jayantyāḥ vaktra stham vyavahāre jaya pradam

original: bhṛṅgarājasya mūlaṃ tu piṣṭaṃ śukreṇa saṃyutam / akṣiṇī cāñjayitvā tu vaśī karyānnaraṃ kila //
analyzed: bhṛṅgarājasya mūlam tu piṣṭam śukreṇa saṃyutam akṣiṇī ca añjayitvā tu vaśī kila

original: aparājitāśikhāntu nīlotpalasamanvitām / tāmbūlena pra (dānā)
analyzed: nīlotpala samanvitām tāmbūlena pra dānā

original: dadyācca vaśīkaraṇamuttamam //
analyzed: dadyāt ca vaśīkaraṇam uttamam

original: aṅguṣṭhe ca pade gulphe jānau ca jaghane tathā / nābhau vakṣasi kukṣau ca kakṣe kaṇṭhe kapolake //
analyzed: aṅguṣṭhe ca pade gulphe jānau ca jaghane tathā nābhau vakṣasi kukṣau ca kakṣe kaṇṭhe kapolake

original: oṣṭhe netre lalāṭe ca mūrdhni candrakalāḥ sthitāḥ / strīṇāṃ pakṣe site kṛṣṇe ūrdhvādhaḥ saṃsthitā nṛṇām //
analyzed: oṣṭhe netre lalāṭe ca mūrdhni candra kalāḥ sthitāḥ strīṇām pakṣe site kṛṣṇe ūrdhva adhas saṃsthitāḥ nṛṇām

original: vāmāṅge dakṣiṇāṅge ca kramādrudra dravādikṛt / catuḥ ṣaṣṭi kalāḥ proktāḥ kāmaśāstre vaśīkarāḥ / āliṅganādyā nārīṇāṃ kamārīṇāṃ vaśīkarāḥ //
analyzed: vāma aṅge dakṣiṇa aṅge ca kramāt rudra drava ādi kṛt  catur ṣaṣṭi kalāḥ proktāḥ kāmaśāstre vaśīkarāḥ āliṅgana ādyāḥ nārīṇām kamārīṇām vaśīkarāḥ

original: rocanāgandhupuṣpāṇi nimbapuṣpaṃ priyaṅgavaḥ / kuṅkamaṃ candanañcaiva tilakena jagadvaśet //
analyzed: rocanā gandhu puṣpāṇi nimba puṣpam priyaṅgavaḥ kuṅkamam candanam ca eva tilakena

original: oṃ hrīṃ gauri devi saubhāgyaṃ putravaśādi dehi me / oṃ hrīṃ lakṣmi / devi saubhāgyaṃ sarvaṃ trailokyamohanam //
analyzed: om   gauri devi saubhāgyam putra vaśa ādi dehi me  om   lakṣmi devi saubhāgyam sarvam trailokya mohanam

original: sagandhasya haridrāyāḥ kuṅkamānāṃ ca lepataḥ / vaśayedrudra dhūpaśca tathāpuṣpasugandhayoḥ //
analyzed: sa gandhasya haridrāyāḥ kuṅkamānām ca lepataḥ vaśayet rudra dhūpaḥ ca tathā puṣpa sugandhayoḥ

original: durālabhā vacā kuṣṭhaṃ kuṅkumañca śatāvarī / tilatailena saṃyuktaṃ yonilepādvaśī naraḥ //
analyzed: durālabhā vacā kuṣṭham kuṅkumam ca śatāvarī tila tailena saṃyuktam yoni lepāt vaśī naraḥ

original: nimbakāṣṭhasya dhūmena dhūpayitvā bhagaṃ vadhūḥ / subhagāsyātsāti rudra patirdāso bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: nimba kāṣṭhasya dhūmena dhūpayitvā bhagam vadhūḥ subhagā āsyāt sā ati rudra patiḥ dāsaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: māhiṣaṃ navanītañca kaṣṭañca madhuyaṣṭikā / saubhāgyaṃ bhagalepātsyāt patirdāso bhavettathā //
analyzed: māhiṣam navanītam ca kaṣṭam ca madhuyaṣṭikā saubhāgyam bhaga lepāt syāt patiḥ dāsaḥ bhavet tathā

original: madhuyaṣṭiśca gokṣīraṃ tathā ca kaṇṭakārikā / etāni samabhāgāni pibeduṣṇena vāriṇā / caturbhāgāvaśeṣeṇa garbhasambhavamuttamam //
analyzed: madhuyaṣṭiḥ ca go kṣīram tathā ca kaṇṭakārikā  etāni sama bhāgāni pibet uṣṇena vāriṇā catur bhāga avaśeṣeṇa garbha sambhavam uttamam

original: mātuluṅgasya bījāni kṣīreṇa saha bhāvayet / tatpītvā labhate garbhaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: mātuluṅgasya bījāni kṣīreṇa saha bhāvayet tat pītvā labhate garbham na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: mātuluṅgasya bījāni mūlānyeraṇḍakasya ca / ghṛtena saha saṃyojya pāyayetputrakākṣiṇī //
analyzed: mātuluṅgasya bījāni mūlāni eraṇḍakasya ca ghṛtena saha saṃyojya pāyayet putraka akṣiṇī

original: paśvagandhā mṛta dugdha kvathitaṃ mutrakārakam / palāśasya tu bījāni kṣaudreṇa saha peṣayet / rajasvalā tu pītvā syātmuṣpagarbhavivarjitā //
analyzed: paśvagandhā mṛta dugdha kvathitam mutrakārakam palāśasya tu bījāni kṣaudreṇa saha peṣayet rajasvalā tu pītvā syāt muṣpa garbha vivarjitā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe hyaṣṭasaptatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe hi aṣṭasaptatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 179
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / haritālaṃ yavakṣāṃraṃ patrāṅgaṃ raktacandanam / jātihiṅgulakaṃ lākṣāṃ paktvā dantānpralepayet //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca haritālam yavakṣāṃram pattra aṅgam raktacandanam jāti hiṅgulakam lākṣām paktvā dantān pralepayet

original: harītakīkaṣāyeṇa mṛṣṭvā dantānpralepayet / dantāḥ syurlohitāḥ puṃsaḥ śvetā rudra na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: harītakī kaṣāyeṇa mṛṣṭvā dantān pralepayet  dantāḥ syuḥ lohitāḥ puṃsaḥ śvetāḥ rudra na saṃśayaḥ

original: mūlakaṃ svidya mandāgnau rasaṃ tasya prapūrayet / karṇayoḥ pūraṇāttena karṇastrāvo vinaśyati //
analyzed: mūlakam svidya manda agnau rasam tasya prapūrayet karṇayoḥ pūraṇāt tena karṇa strāvaḥ vinaśyati

original: arkapatraṃ gṛhītvā tu mandāgnau tāpayecchanaiḥ / niṣpīḍya pūrayetkarṇau karṇaśūlaṃ vinaśyati //
analyzed: arka patram gṛhītvā tu manda agnau tāpayet śanais niṣpīḍya pūrayet karṇau karṇa śūlam vinaśyati

original: priyaṅgumadhukā caiva dhātakyutpalapāṅktibhiḥ / mañjiṣṭhā lodhralākṣābhiḥ kapitthasvarasena ca / pacettailaṃ tathā strīṇāṃ naśyetkledaḥ prapūraṇāt //
analyzed: priyaṅgu madhukā ca eva dhātakī utpala pāṅktibhiḥ mañjiṣṭhā lodhra lākṣābhiḥ kapittha svarasena ca pacet tailam tathā strīṇām naśyet kledaḥ prapūraṇāt

original: śuṣkamūlakaśuṇṭhīnāṃ kṣāro hiṅgumahauṣadham / satapuṣpāvacā kuṣṭhaṃ dāru śigra rasāñjanam //
sauvarcalaṃ yavakṣāraṃ tathā sarjakasaindhavam / tathā granthirviḍaṃ mustaṃ madhuyuktaṃ caturguṇam //
analyzed: sauvarcalam yavakṣāram tathā sarjaka saindhavam tathā granthiḥ viḍam mustam madhu yuktam caturguṇam

original: mātuluṃ garasastadvatkadalyāśca raso hi taiḥ / pakvatailaṃ haredāśu strāvādīṃśca na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: mātuluṃ ga rasaḥ tadvat kadalyāḥ ca rasaḥ hi taiḥ pakva tailam haret āśu strāva ādīn ca na saṃśayaḥ

original: karṇayoḥ kṛmināśaḥ syātkaṭutailasya pūraṇāt / haridrā nimbapatrāṇi pippalyo maricāni ca //
analyzed: karṇayoḥ kṛmi nāśaḥ syāt kaṭutailasya pūraṇāt haridrā nimba patrāṇi pippalyaḥ maricāni ca

original: viḍaṅgabhadraṃ mustañca saptamaṃ viśvabheṣajam / gomūtreṇa ca piṣṭvaiva kṛtvā ca vaṭikāṃ hara / / ajīrṇahṛdbhaveccaikaṃ dvayaṃ viṣūcikāpaham //
analyzed: viḍaṅga bhadram mustam ca saptamam viśvabheṣajam  go mūtreṇa ca piṣṭvā eva kṛtvā ca vaṭikām hara   ajīrṇa hṛt bhavet ca ekam dvayam viṣūcikā apaham

original: paṭolaṃ madhunā hanti gomūtreṇa tathābudam / eṣā ca śaṅkarī vartiḥ sarvanetrāmayā pahā //
analyzed: paṭolam madhunā hanti go mūtreṇa tathā abudam eṣā ca śaṅkarī vartiḥ sarva netra āmayā pahā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekonāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ekonāśītyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 180
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / vacā māṃsī ca bilvañca tagaraṃ padmakesaram / nāgapuṣpaṃ priyaṅguñca samabhāgāni cūrṇayet / anena dhūpito martyaḥ kāmavadvicarenmahīm //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca vacā māṃsī ca bilvam ca tagaram padma kesaram  nāgapuṣpam priyaṅgum ca sama bhāgāni cūrṇayet anena dhūpitaḥ martyaḥ kāma vat vicaret mahīm

original: karpūraṃ devadāruñca madhunā saha yojayet / liṅgalepācca tenaiva vaśīkuryātstriyaṃ kila //
analyzed: karpūram devadārun ca madhunā saha yojayet  liṅga lepāt ca tena eva vaśīkuryāt striyam kila

original: maithunaṃ puruṣo gacchedgṛhṇīyātsvakamindriyam / vāmahastena vāmañca hastaṃ liṃpettu yatstriyāḥ / āliptā strī vaśaṃ yāti nānyaṃ puruṣamicchati //
analyzed: maithunam puruṣaḥ gacchet gṛhṇīyāt svakam indriyam vāma hastena vāmam ca hastam liṃpet tu yat striyāḥ āliptā strī vaśam yāti na anyam puruṣam icchati

original: oṃ raktacāmuṇḍe amukaṃ me vaśamānaya ānaya oṃ hrīṃ hraiṃ hraḥ phaṭ / imaṃ japtvāyutaṃ mantraṃ tilakena ca śaṅkara / / gorocanāsaṃyutena svaraktena vaśī bhavet //
analyzed: om raktacāmuṇḍe amukam me vaśam ānaya ānaya om        phaṭ imam japtvā ayutam mantram tilakena ca śaṅkara    gorocanā saṃyutena sva raktena vaśī bhavet

original: saindhavaṃ kṛṣṇalavaṇaṃ sauvīraṃ matsyapittakam / madhu sarpiḥ sitāyuktaṃ strīṇāṃ tadbhagalepanāt //
yaḥ pumānmaithunaṃ gacchennānyāṃ nārīṃ gamiṣyati / śaṅkapuṣpī vacā māṃsī soma rājī ca phalgukam //
analyzed: yaḥ pumān maithunam gacchet na anyām nārīm gamiṣyati śaṅkapuṣpī vacā māṃsī soma rājī ca phalgukam

original: māhiṣaṃ navanītañca tvakīkṛtya bhiṣagvaraḥ / samūlāni sa patrāṇi kṣīreṇājyena peṣayet //
analyzed: māhiṣam navanītañca tvakīkṛtya bhiṣaj varaḥ sa mūlāni sa patrāṇi kṣīreṇa ājyena peṣayet

original: guṭikāṃ śodhitāṃ kṛtvā nārīyonyā praveśayet / daśavāraṃ prasūtāpi punaḥ kanyā bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: guṭikām śodhitām kṛtvā nārī yonyā praveśayet daśa vāram prasūtā api punar kanyā bhaviṣyati

original: sarṣapāśca vacā caiva madanasya phalāni ca / mārjāraviṣṭhā dhattura strīkeśena samanvitaḥ //
analyzed: sarṣapāḥ ca vacā ca eva madanasya phalāni ca mārjāra viṣṭhā strī keśena samanvitaḥ

original: cāturthikaharo dhūpo ḍākinījvaranāśakaḥ / arjunasya ca puṣpāṇi bhallātakaviḍaṅgake //
balā caiva sarjarasaṃ sauvīrasarṣapāstathā / sarpayūkāmakṣikāṇāṃ dhūmo maśakanāśanaḥ //
analyzed: balā ca eva sarjarasam sauvīra sarṣapāḥ tathā sarpa yūka makṣikāṇām dhūmaḥ maśaka nāśanaḥ

original: bhūtalāyāśca cūrṇena stambhaḥ syādyonipūraṇāt / tena lepanato yonau bhagastambhastu jāyate //
analyzed: bhūtalāyāḥ ca cūrṇena stambhaḥ syāt yoni pūraṇāt tena lepanataḥ yonau bhaga stambhaḥ tu jāyate

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe aśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe aśītyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 181
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / tāmbūlañca ghṛtaṃ kṣaudraṃ lavaṇaṃ tāmrabhājane / tathā payaḥ samāyuktaṃ cakṣuḥ śūlaharaṃ param //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca tāmbūlam ca ghṛtam kṣaudram lavaṇam tāmra bhājane tathā payaḥ samāyuktam cakṣuḥ śūla haram param

original: harītakī vacā kuṣṭhaṃ vyoṣaṃ hiṅgu manaḥ śilā / kāse śvāse ca hikkāyāṃ lihyātkṣaudraṃ ghṛplutam //
analyzed: harītakī vacā kuṣṭham vyoṣam hiṅgu manaḥ śilā kāse śvāse ca hikkāyām lihyāt kṣaudram ghṛ plutam

original: pippalītriphalācūrṇaṃ madhunā lehayennaraḥ / naśyate pīnasaḥ kāsaḥ śvāsaśca balavattaraḥ //
analyzed: pippalī triphalā cūrṇam madhunā lehayet naraḥ naśyate pīnasaḥ kāsaḥ śvāsaḥ ca balavattaraḥ

original: samūlacitrakaṃ bhasmapippalīcūrṇakaṃ lihet / śvāsaṃ kāsañca hikkāñca madhumiśraṃ vṛṣadhvaja / //
analyzed: sa mūla citrakam bhasma pippalī cūrṇakam lihet śvāsam kāsam ca hikkām ca madhu miśram vṛṣadhvaja

original: nīlotpalaṃ śarkarā ca madhukaṃ padmakaṃ samam / taṇḍulodakasaṃmiśraṃ praśamedraktavikriyāḥ //
analyzed: nīlotpalam śarkarā ca madhukam padmakam samam taṇḍula udaka saṃmiśram praśamet rakta vikriyāḥ

original: śuṇṭhī ca śarkarā caiva tathā kṣaudreṇa saṃyutā / kokilasvara eva syādguṭikā bhuktimātrataḥ //
analyzed: śuṇṭhī ca śarkarā ca eva tathā kṣaudreṇa saṃyutā kokilasvaraḥ eva syāt guṭikā bhukti mātrataḥ

original: haritālaṃ śaṅkhacūrṇaṃ kadalīdalabhasmanā / etaddravyeṇa codvartya lomaśātanamuttamam //
analyzed: haritālam śaṅkha cūrṇam kadalī dala bhasmanā etat dravyeṇa ca udvartya loma śātanam uttamam

original: lavaṇaṃ haritālañca tumbinyāśca phalāni ca / lākṣārasasamāyuktaṃ lomaśātanamuttam //
analyzed: lavaṇam haritālam ca tumbinyāḥ ca phalāni ca lākṣā rasa samāyuktam loma śātanam uttam

original: sudhā ca haritālañca śaṅkhabhasma manaḥ śilā / saindhavena sahaikatra chāgamūtreṇa peṣayet //
analyzed: sudhā ca haritālam ca śaṅkha bhasma manaḥ śilā saindhavena saha ekatra chāga mūtreṇa peṣayet

original: tatkṣaṇodvartanādeva lomaśātanamuttamam / śaṅkhamāmalakaṃ patraṃ dhātakyāḥ kusumāni ca //
analyzed: tad kṣaṇa udvartanāt eva loma śātanam uttamam śaṅkham āmalakam patram dhātakyāḥ kusumāni ca

original: piṣṭvā tatpayasā sārdhaṃ saptāhaṃ dhārayenmukhe / snigdhāḥ śvetāśca dantāśca bhavanti vimalaprabhāḥ //
analyzed: piṣṭvā tad payasā sārdham sapta aham dhārayet mukhe snigdhāḥ śvetāḥ ca dantāḥ ca bhavanti vimala prabhāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ekāśītyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 182
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / śaradgrīṣmavasanteṣu prāyaśo dadhi garhitam / hemante śiśire caiva varṣāsu dadhi śasyate //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca śarad grīṣma vasanteṣu prāyaśas dadhi garhitam hemante śiśire ca eva varṣāsu dadhi śasyate

original: bhukte tu śarkarā pītā navanītena buddhikṛt / guḍasya tu purāṇasya palamekantu bhakṣayet / strīsahasrañca saṃgacchetpumānbalayuto hara / //
analyzed: bhukte tu śarkarā pītā navanītena buddhi kṛt  guḍasya tu purāṇasya palam ekam tu bhakṣayet strī sahasram ca saṃgacchet pumān bala yutaḥ hara  /

original: kuṣṭhaṃ saṃcūrṇitaṃ kṛtvā ghṛtamākṣikasaṃyutam / bhakṣayetsvapnavelāyāṃ balīpalitanāśanam //
atasīmāṣagodhūmacūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tu pippalī / ghṛtena lepayedgatramobhiḥ sārdhaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ / kandarpasadṛśo martyo nityaṃ bhavati śaṅkara / //
analyzed: atasī māṣa godhūma cūrṇam kṛtvā tu pippalī ghṛtena lepayet gatra mobhiḥ sārdham vicakṣaṇaḥ kandarpa sadṛśaḥ martyaḥ nityam bhavati śaṅkara  /

original: yavāstilāśvagandhā ca muśalī saralā guḍam / ebhiśca racitāṃ jagdhvā taruṇo balavānbhavet //
analyzed: yavāḥ tila aśvagandhā ca muśalī saralāḥ guḍam ebhiḥ ca racitām jagdhvā taruṇaḥ balavān bhavet

original: hiṅgu sauvarcalaṃ śuṇṭhīṃ pītvā tu kvathitodakaiḥ / pariṇāmākhyaśūlañca ajīrṇañcaiva naśyati //
analyzed: hiṅgu sauvarcalam śuṇṭhīm pītvā tu kvathita udakaiḥ pariṇāma ākhya śūlam ca ajīrṇam ca eva naśyati

original: dhātakīṃ somarājīñca kṣīreṇa saha peṣayet / durbalaśca bhavetsthūlo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: dhātakīm somarājīm ca kṣīreṇa saha peṣayet durbalaḥ ca bhavet sthūlaḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: śarkarāmadhusaṃyuktaṃ navanītaṃ balī lihet / kṣīrāśī ca kṣayī puṣṭiṃ medhāñcaivātulāṃ vrajet //
analyzed: śarkarā madhu saṃyuktam navanītam balī lihet kṣīra āśī ca kṣayī puṣṭim medhām ca eva atulām vrajet

original: kulīracūrṇaṃ sakṣīraṃ pītañca kṣayareganut / bhallātakaṃ viḍaṅgañca yavakṣārañca saindhavam //
analyzed: kulīra cūrṇam sa kṣīram pītam ca kṣaya rega nud bhallātakam viḍaṅgam ca yavakṣāram ca saindhavam

original: manaḥ śilā śaṅkhacūrṇaṃ tailapakvaṃ tathaiva ca / lomāni śātayatyeva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: manaḥ śilā śaṅkha cūrṇam taila pakvam tathā eva ca lomāni śātayati eva na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: mālūrasya rasaṃ gṛhya jalaukāṃ tatra peṣayet / hastau saṃlepayettena tvagnistambhanamuttamam //
analyzed: mālūrasya rasam gṛhya jalaukām tatra peṣayet hastau saṃlepayet tena tu agni stambhanam uttamam

original: śālmalīrasamādāya kharamūtre nidhāya tam / agnayādau vikṣipettena hyagnistambhanamuttamam //
analyzed: śālmalī rasam ādāya khara mūtre nidhāya tam agnaye ādau vikṣipet tena hi agni stambhanam uttamam

original: vāyasyā udaraṃ gṛhya maṇḍūkavasayā saha / guṭikāṃ kārayettena tato 'gnau saṃkṣaipetsudhīḥ / evametatprayogeṇa hyagnistambhanamuttamam //
analyzed: vāyasyāḥ udaram gṛhya maṇḍūka vasayā saha guṭikām kārayet tena tatas gnau saṃkṣaipet sudhīḥ evam etad prayogeṇa hi agni stambhanam uttamam

original: muṇḍītvakca vacā mustaṃ maricaṃ tagaraṃ tathā / carvitvā ca tvimaṃ sadyo jihvayā jvalanaṃ lihet //
analyzed: muṇḍī tvac ca vacā mustam maricam tagaram tathā carvitvā ca tu imam sadyas jihvayā jvalanam lihet

original: gorocanāṃ bhṛṅgarājaṃ cūrṇokṛtyaghṛtaṃ samam / divyāmbhasaḥ stambhanaṃ syānmantreṇānena vai tathā / oṃ agnistambhanaṃ kuru kuru //
oṃ namo bhagavate jalaṃ stambhaya saṃ saṃ saṃ keka kekaḥ caracara / jalastambhanamantro 'yaṃ jalaṃ stambhayate śiva / //
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate jalam stambhaya saṃ saṃ saṃ keka kekaḥ cara cara jala stambhana mantraḥ yam jalam stambhayate śiva

original: gṛdhrāsthiñca gavāsthiñca tathā nirmālyameva ca / areryo nikhaneddvāre pañcatvamu payāti saḥ //
analyzed: gṛdhra asthim ca gavā asthim ca tathā nirmālyam eva ca areḥ yaḥ nikhanet dvāre pañcatvam u payāti saḥ

original: pañcaraktāni puṣpāṇi pṛthagjātyā samālabhet / kuṅkumena samāyuktamātmaraktasamanvitam //
analyzed: pañca raktāni puṣpāṇi pṛthak jātyā samālabhet kuṅkumena samāyuktam ātma rakta samanvitam

original: puṣpeṇa tu samaṃ piṣṭvā rocanāyāḥ palaikataḥ / striyā puṃsā kṛto rudra / tilako 'yaṃ vaśīkaraḥ //
analyzed: puṣpeṇa tu samam piṣṭvā rocanāyāḥ pala ekataḥ striyā puṃsā kṛtaḥ rudra tilakaḥ yam vaśīkaraḥ

original: brahmadaṇḍī tu puṣyeṇa bhakṣye pāne vaśīkaraḥ / yaṣṭi madhu palaikena pakvamuṣṇodakaṃ pibet //
analyzed: brahmadaṇḍī tu puṣyeṇa bhakṣye pāne vaśīkaraḥ yaṣṭi madhu pala ekena pakvam uṣṇa udakam pibet

original: viṣṭambhikāñca hṛcchūlaṃ haratyeva maheśvara / / oṃ hrūṃ jaḥ / mantro 'yaṃ harate rudra / sarvavṛścikajaṃ viṣam //
analyzed: viṣṭambhikān ca hṛd śūlam harati eva maheśvara   om   jaḥ mantraḥ yam harate rudra sarva vṛścika jam viṣam

original: pippalī navanītañca śṛṅgaveraṃ ca saindhavam / maricaṃ dadhi kuṣṭhañca nasye pāne viṣaṃ haret //
analyzed: pippalī navanītam ca śṛṅgaveram ca saindhavam maricam dadhi kuṣṭham ca nasye pāne viṣam haret

original: triphalārdrakakuṣṭhaṃ ca candanaṃ ghṛtasaṃyutam / etatpānācca lepācca viṣanāśo bhavecchiva / //
analyzed: triphalā ārdraka kuṣṭham ca candanam ghṛta saṃyutam etad pānāt ca lepāt ca viṣa nāśaḥ bhavet śiva

original: pārāvatasya cākṣīṇi haritālaṃ manaḥ śilā / etadyogādviṣaṃ hanti vainateya ivoragān //
analyzed: pārāvatasya ca akṣīṇi haritālam manaḥ śilā etad yogāt viṣam hanti vainateyaḥ iva uragān

original: saindhavaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ caiva dadhimadhvājyasaṃyutam / vṛścikasya viṣaṃ hanti lepo 'yaṃ vṛṣabhadhvaja / //
analyzed: saindhavam tryūṣaṇam ca eva dadhi madhu ājya saṃyutam vṛścikasya viṣam hanti lepaḥ yam vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: brahmadaṇḍītilānkvāthya cūrṇaṃ trikaṭukaṃ pibet / nāśayedrudra / gulmāni niruddhaṃ raktameva ca //
analyzed: brahmadaṇḍī tilān kvāthya cūrṇam trikaṭukam pibet nāśayet rudra gulmāni niruddham raktam eva ca

original: pītvā kṣīraṃ kṣaudrayutaṃ nāśayedasṛjaḥ strutim / āṭarūpakamūlena bhagaṃ nābhiṃ ca lepayet / sukhaṃ prasūyate nārī nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: pītvā kṣīram kṣaudra yutam nāśayet asṛjaḥ strutim āṭarūpaka mūlena bhagam nābhim ca lepayet sukham prasūyate nārī na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: śarkarāṃ madhusaṃyuktāṃ pītvā taṇḍulavāriṇā / raktātisāraśamanaṃ bhavatīti vṛṣadhvaja / //
analyzed: śarkarām madhu saṃyuktām pītvā taṇḍula vāriṇā rakta atisāra śamanam bhavati iti vṛṣadhvaja

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dvyāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe dvyāśītyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 183
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / maricaṃ śṛṅgaveraṃ ca kuṭajatvacameva ca / pānācca grahaṇī naśyecchaśāṅkāṅkitaśekhara / //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca maricam śṛṅgaveram ca kuṭaja tvacam eva ca pānāt ca grahaṇī naśyet śaśāṅka aṅkita śekhara  /

original: pippalī pippalīmūlaṃ maricaṃ tagaraṃ vacā / devadārurasaṃ pāṭhāṃ kṣīreṇa saha peṣayet //
anenaiva prayogeṇa hyatisāro vinaśyati / marīcatilapuṣpābhyā mañjanaṃ kāmalāpaham //
analyzed: anena eva prayogeṇa hi atisāraḥ vinaśyati marīca tila puṣpābhyām añjanam kāmalā apaham

original: harītakī samaguḍā madhunā saha yojitā / virecanakarī rudra / bhavatīti na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: harītakī sama guḍā madhunā saha yojitā virecana karī rudra bhavati iti na saṃśayaḥ

original: triphalā citrakaṃ citraṃ tathā kaṭukarohiṇī / urustambhaharaṃ hyetaduttamantu virecanam //
analyzed: triphalā citrakam citram tathā kaṭukarohiṇī uru stambha haram hi etat uttaman tu virecanam

original: harītakī śṛṅgaveraṃ devadāru ca candanam / kvāthayecchāgadugdhena apāmārgasya mūlakam / ūrustambhaṃ jayantyā vā saptarātreṇa nāśayet //
analyzed: harītakī śṛṅgaveram devadāru ca candanam kvāthayet chāga dugdhena apāmārgasya mūlakam ūrustambham jayantyā vā sapta rātreṇa nāśayet

original: anantāśṛṅgaverasya sūkṣmacūrṇāni kārayet / guggulaṃ guḍatulyaṃ ca guṭikāmupayujyaca / vāyuḥ snāyugataṃ caiva agnimāndyaṃ ca nāśayet //
analyzed: anantā śṛṅgaverasya sūkṣma cūrṇāni kārayet guggulam guḍa tulyam ca guṭikām upayujya ca vāyuḥ snāyu gatam ca eva agni māndyam ca nāśayet

original: saṅkhapuṣpīntu puṣpeṇa samuddhṛtya sapatrikām / samūlāṃ chāgadugdhena apasmāraharaṃ pibet //
analyzed: saṅkhapuṣpīm tu puṣpeṇa samuddhṛtya sa patrikām sa mūlām chāga dugdhena apasmāra haram pibet

original: aśvagandhābhaye caiva udakena samaṃ pibet / raktapittaṃ vinaśyettu nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: aśvagandhā abhaye ca eva udakena samam pibet raktapittam vinaśyet tu na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: harītakīkuṣṭhacūrṇaṃ kṛtvā āsyaṃ ca pūrayet / śītaṃ pītvātha pānīyaṃ sarvacchardinivāraṇam //
analyzed: kṛtvā   ca pūrayet   pītvā atha

original: gaḍūcīpadmakāriṣṭadhānyākaṃ raktacaṃndanam / pittaśleṣmajvaracchardidāhatṛṣṇāghnamagnikṛt / oṃ huṃ nama iti //
analyzed: gaḍūcī padmaka ariṣṭa dhānyākam raktacaṃndanam pitta śleṣma jvara chardi dāha tṛṣṇā ghnam agni kṛt  om hum namaḥ iti

original: śrotre baddhvā śaṅkhapuṣpīṃ jvaraṃ mantreṇa vai haret / oṃ jambhinī stambhinī mohaya sarvavyādhīnme vajreṇa ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ sarvavyādhīnme vajreṇa phaṭ iti //
analyzed: śrotre baddhvā śaṅkhapuṣpīm jvaram mantreṇa vai haret om jambhinī stambhinī mohaya sarva vyādhīn me vajreṇa ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ sarva vyādhīn me vajreṇa phaṭ iti

original: puṣpamaṣṭaśataṃ japtvā haste dattvā nakhaṃ spṛśet / cāturthiko jvaro rudra anye caiva jvarāstathā //
analyzed: puṣpam aṣṭaśatam japtvā haste dattvā nakham spṛśet  cāturthikaḥ jvaraḥ rudra anye ca eva jvarāḥ tathā

original: jmbūphalaṃ haridrā ca sarpasyaiva tu kañcukam / sarvajvarāṇāṃ dhūpo 'yaṃ haraścāturthikasya ca //
analyzed: jmbū phalam haridrā ca sarpasya eva tu kañcukam sarva jvarāṇām dhūpaḥ yam haraḥ cāturthikasya ca

original: karavīraṃ bhṛṅgapatraṃ lavaṇaṃ kuṣṭhakarkaṭe / caturguṇena mūtreṇa pacettailaṃ harecca tat / pāmāṃ vicarcikāṃ kuṣṭhamabhyaṅgāddhi vraṇāni vai //
analyzed: karavīram bhṛṅga patram lavaṇam kuṣṭha karkaṭe caturguṇena mūtreṇa pacet tailam haret ca tat pāmām vicarcikām kuṣṭham abhyaṅgāt hi vraṇāni vai

original: pippalīmadhupānācca tathā madhurabhojanāt / plīhā vinaśyate rudra tathā sūraṇasevanāt //
analyzed: pippalī madhu pānāt ca tathā madhura bhojanāt plīhā vinaśyate rudra tathā sūraṇa sevanāt

original: pippalīñca haridrāñca gomūtreṇa samanvitām / prakṣipecca gudadvāre arśāṃsi vinivārayet //
analyzed: pippalīm ca haridrām ca go mūtreṇa samanvitām prakṣipet ca guda dvāre arśāṃsi vinivārayet

original: ajādugdhamārdrakañca pītaṃ plīhādināśanam / saindhavañca viḍaṅgāni somarājī tu sarṣapāḥ //
analyzed: ajā dugdham ārdrakam ca pītam plīha ādi nāśanam saindhavam ca viḍaṅgāni somarājī tu sarṣapāḥ

original: rajanī dve viṣañcaiva gomūtreṇaiva peṣayet / kuṣṭhanāśaśca tallepānnimbapatrādinā tathā //
analyzed: rajanī dve viṣam ca eva go mūtreṇa eva peṣayet kuṣṭha nāśaḥ ca tad lepāt nimba patra ādinā tathā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe tryaśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe tryaśītyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 184
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / rajanīkadalīkṣāralepaḥ sidhmavināśanaḥ / kuṣṭhasya bhāgamekantu pathyābhāgadvayaṃ tathā / uṣṇodakena saṃpīya kaṭiśūlavināśanam //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca rajanī kadalī kṣāra lepaḥ sidhma vināśanaḥ kuṣṭhasya bhāgam ekam tu pathyā bhāga dvayam tathā uṣṇa udakena saṃpīya kaṭiśūla vināśanam

original: abhayā navanītañca śarkarāpippalīyutam / pānādarśoharaṃ syācca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: abhayā navanītam ca śarkarā pippalī yutam pāna ādarśaḥ haram syāt ca na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: āṭarūṣakapatreṇa ghṛtaṃ mṛdvagninā pacet / cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tu lepo 'yaṃ arśarogaharaḥ paraḥ //
analyzed: āṭarūṣaka patreṇa ghṛtam mṛdu agninā pacet cūrṇam kṛtvā tu lepaḥ yam arśaḥ roga haraḥ paraḥ

original: guggulutriphalāyuktaṃ pītvā naśyedbhagandaram / ajājīśṛṅgaverañca dathā maṇḍaṃ vipācayet //
analyzed: guggulu triphalā yuktam pītvā naśyet bhagaṃdaram

original: lavaṇena tu saṃyuktaṃ mūtrakṛcchravināśanam / yavakṣāraṃ śarkarā ca mūtrakṛcchravināśakṛt //
analyzed: lavaṇena tu saṃyuktam mūtrakṛcchra vināśanam yavakṣāram śarkarā ca mūtrakṛcchra vināśa kṛt

original: citāgniḥ khañjarīṭasya viṣṭhā pheno hayasya ca / saubhāñjanaṃ vāsanetraṃ nara etaistu dhūpitaḥ / adṛśyastridaśaiḥ sarvaiḥ kiṃ punarmānavaiḥ śiva //
analyzed: citā agniḥ khañjarīṭasya viṣṭhā phenaḥ hayasya ca  saubhāñjanam vāsa netram naraḥ etaiḥ tu dhūpitaḥ adṛśyaḥ tridaśaiḥ sarvaiḥ kim punar mānavaiḥ śiva

original: tilatailaṃ yavāndagdhvā maṣīṃ kṛtvā tu lepayet / tenaiva saha tailena agnidagdhaḥ sukhī bhavet //
analyzed: tila tailam yavān dagdhvā maṣīm kṛtvā tu lepayet tena eva saha tailena agni dagdhaḥ sukhī bhavet

original: lajjāloḥ śarapuṅkhāyā lepaḥ sājyo 'gnināśanaḥ / oṃ namo bhagavate ṭha ṭha chindhi chindhi jvalanaṃ prajvalitaṃ nāśaya nāśaya huṃ phaṭ //
analyzed: lajjāloḥ śarapuṅkhāyāḥ lepaḥ sa ājyaḥ agni nāśanaḥ om namaḥ bhagavate ṭha ṭha chindhi chindhi jvalanam prajvalitam nāśaya nāśaya hum phaṭ

original: kare baddhaṃ tu nirguṇḍyā mūlaṃ jvaraharaṃ drutam / mūlañca śvetaguñjāyāḥ kṛtvā tatsaptakhaṇḍakam //
analyzed: kare baddham tu nirguṇḍyāḥ mūlam jvara haram drutam mūlam ca śveta guñjāyāḥ kṛtvā tat sapta khaṇḍakam

original: haste badhvā nāśayecca arśāṃsyeva na saṃśayaḥ / viṣṇukrāntājamūtreṇa cauravyāghnādirakṣaṇam //
analyzed: haste badhvā nāśayet ca arśāṃsi eva na saṃśayaḥ viṣṇukrānta aja mūtreṇa caura vyāghna ādi rakṣaṇam

original: brahmadaṇḍyāstu mūlāni sarvakarmāṇi kārayet / triphalāyāstu cūrṇaṃ hi sājyaṃ kuṣṭhavināśanam //
analyzed: brahmadaṇḍyāḥ tu mūlāni sarva karmāṇi kārayet triphalāyāḥ tu cūrṇam hi sa ājyam kuṣṭha vināśanam

original: ājyaṃ punarnavābilvaiḥ pippalībhi sādhitam / hareddhakkāṃ śvāsakāsau pītaṃ strīṇāñca garbhakṛt //
analyzed: ājyam punarnavā bilvaiḥ sādhitam haret hakkām śvāsa kāsau pītam strīṇām ca garbha kṛt

original: bhakṣayedvā narībījaṃ payasājyena pācitam / ghṛtaśarkarayā yuktaṃ śukraḥ syādakṣayastataḥ //
analyzed: bhakṣayet vā narī bījam payasā ājyena pācitam ghṛta śarkarayā yuktam śukraḥ syāt akṣayaḥ tatas

original: viḍaṅgaṃ madhukaṃ pāṭhāṃ māṃsīṃ sarjarasaṃ tathā / rahidrāṃ triphalāñcaiva mapāmārgaṃ manaḥ śilām //
analyzed: viḍaṅgam madhukam pāṭhām māṃsīm sarjarasam tathā rahidrām triphalām ca eva mapāmārgam manaḥ śilām

original: udumbaraṃ dhātakīñca tilatailena paṣeyet / yoniṃ liṅgaṃ ca mrakṣeta strīpusoḥ syātpriyaṃ mithaḥ //
analyzed: udumbaram dhātakīn ca tila tailena paṣeyet yonim liṅgam ca strī pusoḥ syāt priyam mithas

original: namaste īśavaradāya ākarṣiṇi vikarṣiṇi mugdhe svāhā iti / yonilaṅgasya tailena śaṅkara mlakṣaṇāttataḥ //

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 186
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: gorakṣakarkaṭīmūlaṃ piṣṭaṃ śītodakena ca / pītaṃ dinatrayeṇaiva nāśayedrudra śarkarām //
piṣṭvā vai mālatīmūlaṃ grīṣmakāle samāhitam / sādhitaṃ chāgadugdhena patiṃ śarkasyānvitam / harenmūtranirodhañca haredvai pāṇḍuśarkarām //
analyzed: piṣṭvā vai mālatī mūlam grīṣma kāle samāhitam sādhitam chāga dugdhena patim śarkasya anvitam haret mūtra nirodham ca haret vai pāṇḍu śarkarām

original: dvijayaṣṭyāśca vai mūlaṃ piṣṭaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā / gaṇḍamālāṃ harellepādasādhyaṃ galagaṇḍakam //
analyzed: dvija yaṣṭyāḥ ca vai mūlam piṣṭam taṇḍula vāriṇā gaṇḍamālām haret lepāt asādhyam galagaṇḍakam

original: rasāñjanaṃ harītakyāścūrṇaṃ tenaiva guṇṭhanāt / nāśayetpuruṣo vyādhīnnātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: rasāñjanam harītakyāḥ cūrṇam tena eva guṇṭhanāt nāśayet puruṣaḥ vyādhīn na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: karavīramūlalepādvai lepātpūgaphalasya ca / puṃvyādhirnaśyate rudra yogamanyaṃ vadāmyaham //
analyzed: karavīra mūla lepāt vai lepāt pūga phalasya ca  puṃs vyādhiḥ naśyate rudra yogam anyam vadāmi aham

original: dantīmūlaṃ haridrā ca citrakaṃ tasya lepanāt / bhagandaravināśaḥ syādanyaṃ yogaṃ vadāmyaham / jalaukājagdharaktañca bhagandaramumāpate //
analyzed: dantī mūlam haridrā ca citrakam tasya lepanāt bhagandara vināśaḥ syāt anyam yogam vadāmi aham jalaukā jagdha raktam ca bhagandaram umāpate

original: triphalājalaghṛṣṭañca mārjārāsthi vilepitam / tato na prastravedraktaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: triphalā jala ghṛṣṭam ca mārjāra asthi vilepitam tatas na prastravet raktam na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: haridrānekavārañca snuhīkṣīreṇa bhāvitā / vaṭikār'śovināśāya tallepādvṛṣabhadhvaja / ghoṣāphalaṃ saindhavañca piṣṭvā cārśoharaṃ param //
analyzed: haridrā aneka vāram ca snuhī kṣīreṇa bhāvitā vaṭikā arśaḥ vināśāya tad lepāt vṛṣabhadhvaja ghoṣā phalam saindhavam ca piṣṭvā ca arśaḥ haram param

original: gavyājyaṃ sādhitaṃ pītaṃ palāśakṣāravāriṇā / triguṇena trikaṭukaṃ arśāṃsi kṣapayecchiva //
analyzed: gavya ājyam sādhitam pītam palāśa kṣāra vāriṇā triguṇena trikaṭukam arśāṃsi kṣapayet śiva

original: bilvasya ca phalaṃ dagdhaṃ raktārśaḥ pravināśanam / jagdhavā kṛṣṇatilāneva navanītayutānapi //
analyzed: bilvasya ca phalam dagdham rakta arśaḥ pravināśanam jagdhavā kṛṣṇa tilān eva navanīta yutān api

original: śuṇṭhīcūrṇaṃ yavakṣārayuktaṃ tulyaguḍānvitam / agnivṛddhiṃ karotyeva pratyūṣe vṛṣabhadhvaja //
analyzed: karoti eva

original: śuṇṭhyā ca kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ cāgniṃ karoti vai / harītakīṃ saindhavañca citrakaṃ rudra pippalī //
analyzed: śuṇṭhyā ca kvathitam vāri pītam ca agnim karoti vai harītakīm saindhavam ca citrakam rudra pippalī

original: cūrṇamuṣṇodakenaiṣāṃ pītaṃ cātikṣudhākaram / sājyaṃ sūkaramāṃsaṃ vai pītaṃ cātikṣudhākaram //
analyzed: cūrṇam uṣṇa udakena eṣām pītam ca ati kṣudhā karam sa ājyam sūkara māṃsam vai pītam ca ati kṣudhā karam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ṣaḍaśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ṣaḍaśītyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 187
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / hastikarṇapalāśasya patrāṇi?
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca hastikarṇa palāśasya patrāṇi

original: cūrṇayeddhara / sarvarogavinirmuktaṃ cūrṇaṃ palaśataṃ śiva //
analyzed: cūrṇayet hara sarva roga vinirmuktam cūrṇam pala śatam śiva

original: sakṣīraṃ bhakṣītaṃ kuryātsaptāhena vṛṣadhvaja / naraṃ śrutidharaṃ rudra mṛgendragativikramam //
analyzed: sa kṣīram bhakṣītam kuryāt sapta ahena vṛṣadhvaja naram śruti dharam rudra mṛgendra gati vikramam

original: padmarāgapratīkāśaṃyuktaṃ daśaśatāyuṣā / ṣoḍaśābdākṛtiṃ rudra satataṃ dugdhabhojanāt //
analyzed: padmarāga pratīkāśam yuktam daśa śata āyuṣā ṣoḍaśa abda ākṛtim rudra satatam dugdha bhojanāt

original: madhusarpiḥsamāyuktaṃ dugdhamāyuṣkaraṃ bhavet / tajjagdhaṃ madhunā sārdhaṃ daśavarṣa sahasriṇam //
analyzed: madhu sarpiḥ samāyuktam dugdham āyuṣkaram bhavet tat jagdham madhunā sārdham daśa varṣa sahasriṇam

original: kuryānnaraṃ śrutidharaṃ pramadājanavallabham / dadhnā nityaṃ bhakṣitantu vajradehakaraṃ bhavet //
analyzed: kuryāt naram śruti dharam pramadā jana vallabham dadhnā nityam bhakṣitantu vajra deha karam bhavet

original: keśarājisamāyuktaṃ naraṃ varṣasahasriṇam / tacca kāñjikasaṃyuktaṃ naraṃ kuryācca bhakṣitam //
analyzed: keśa rāji samāyuktam naram varṣa sahasriṇam tat ca kāñjika saṃyuktam naram kuryāt ca bhakṣitam

original: śatavarṣaṃ divyadehaṃ valīpalitavarjitam / jagdhaṃ triphalayā kṣaudraṃ cakṣuṣmantaṃ karoti vai //
analyzed: śata varṣam divya deham valī palita varjitam jagdham triphalayā kṣaudram cakṣuṣmantam karoti vai

original: andhaḥ paśyettu cūrṇasya sājyasyaiva tu bhakṣaṇāt / mahiṣīkṣīrasaṃyuktastallepaḥ kṛṣṇakeśakṛt //
analyzed: andhaḥ paśyet tu cūrṇasya sa ājyasya eva tu bhakṣaṇāt mahiṣī kṣīra saṃyuktaḥ tad lepaḥ kṛṣṇa keśa kṛt

original: khalvāṭasya ca vai keśā bhavanti vṛṣabhadhvaja / tailayuktena cūrṇena valīpalitanāśanam //
analyzed: khalvāṭasya ca vai keśāḥ bhavanti vṛṣabhadhvaja taila yuktena cūrṇena valī palita nāśanam

original: tadudvartanamātreṇa sarvarāgaḥ pramucyate / sacchāgakṣīracūrṇena dṛṣṭiḥ syānmāsato 'ñjanāt //
analyzed: tad udvartana mātreṇa sarva rāgaḥ pramucyate sa chāga kṣīra cūrṇena dṛṣṭiḥ syāt māsataḥ ñjanāt

original: palāśasya ca bījāni śrāvaṇe vituṣāṇi ca / gṛhītvā navanītena teṣāṃ cūrṇaṃ ca bhakṣayet //
analyzed: palāśasya ca bījāni śrāvaṇe vituṣāṇi ca gṛhītvā navanītena teṣām cūrṇam ca bhakṣayet

original: karṣārdhamekaṃ seveta natvā nityaṃ hariṃ prabhum / purāṇaṣaṣṭidhānyasya pathyamambu pibanhara / jīvedvarṣasahasrāṇi valīpalitavarjitaḥ //
analyzed: karṣa ardham ekam seveta natvā nityam harim prabhum  purāṇa ṣaṣṭi dhānyasya pathyam ambu piban hara jīvet varṣa sahasrāṇi valī palita varjitaḥ

original: bhṛṅgarājasya vai mūlaṃ puṣyarkṣe tu samāhṛtam / vidhāya tasya cūrṇaṃ vai sasauvīrañca bhakṣayetaṃ //
analyzed: bhṛṅgarājasya vai mūlam puṣya ṛkṣe tu samāhṛtam vidhāya tasya cūrṇam vai sa sauvīram ca bhakṣayetam

original: māsamātraprayogeṇa valīpalitavarjitaḥ / śatāni pañca jīvecca naro nāgabalo bhavet / bhavecchrutidharo rudra puṣyarkṣe caiva bhakṣaṇāt //
analyzed: māsa mātra prayogeṇa valī palita varjitaḥ śatāni pañca jīvet ca naraḥ nāga balaḥ bhavet  bhavet śruti dharaḥ rudra puṣya ṛkṣe ca eva bhakṣaṇāt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe āyuṣkarayogodṛsaptāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 188
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / nirvraṇaḥ syātpūyaṃhīno prahāro ghṛpūritaḥ / apāmārgasya vai mūlaṃ hastābhyāñca vimarditam / tadrasena prahārasya raktastrāvo na pūraṇāt //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca nirvraṇaḥ syāt pūyaṃhīnaḥ prahāraḥ ghṛ pūritaḥ apāmārgasya vai mūlam hastābhyām ca vimarditam tad rasena prahārasya raktaḥ trāvaḥ na pūraṇāt

original: rudra lāṅgalikāmūlaṃ cekṣudarbhastathaiva ca / tena vraṇamukhaṃ liptaṃ śalyaṃ niḥ sa rati vraṇāt / cirakālapraviṣṭo 'pi tena mārgeṇa śaṅkara //
analyzed: rudra lāṅgalikā mūlam ca ikṣu darbhaḥ tathā eva ca tena vraṇa mukham liptam śalyam vraṇāt  cira kāla praviṣṭaḥ tena mārgeṇa śaṅkara

original: bālamūlaṃ meṣaśṛṅgīmūlaṃ vā vārigharṣitam / tena liptaṃ ciraṃ jātaṃ vraṇaṃ nāḍyāḥ praśāmyati //
analyzed: bāla mūlam meṣaśṛṅgī mūlam vā vāri gharṣitam tena liptam ciram jātam vraṇam nāḍyāḥ praśāmyati

original: jagdhaṃ māhiṣapadhnā ca yuktaṃ kodravabhaktakam / hiṅgumūlasya vai cūrṇaṃ dattaṃ nāḍīvraṇāpaham //
analyzed: jagdham māhiṣa padhnā ca yuktam kodrava bhaktakam hiṅgu mūlasya vai cūrṇam dattam nāḍī vraṇa apaham

original: brahmayaṣṭiphalaṃ piṣṭaṃ vāriṇā tenalepitam / tena ghṛṣṭaṃ raktadoṣaḥ praṇaśyati na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: brahmayaṣṭi phalam piṣṭam vāriṇā tena lepitam tena ghṛṣṭam rakta doṣaḥ praṇaśyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: yavabhasma viḍaṅgañca gandhapāṣāṇameva ca / śuṇṭhireṣāñcaiva cūrṇaṃ bhvitaṃ rudhireṇavai //
analyzed: yava bhasma viḍaṅgam ca gandhapāṣāṇam eva ca cūrṇam

original: kṛkalāsasya talliptaṃ vidradhiṃ nāśayecchiva / saubhāñjanasya bījāni tvatasīmasinā saha //
analyzed: kṛkalāsasya tat liptam vidradhim nāśayet śiva saubhāñjanasya bījāni tu atasīm asinā saha

original: saurasarṣapayuktāni sarvāṇyetāni śaṅkara / piṣṭānyanamlatakreṇa granthikaṃ nāśayeddhi vai //
analyzed: saurasarṣapa yuktāni sarvāṇi etāni śaṅkara piṣṭāni anamla takreṇa granthikam nāśayet hi vai

original: śvetāparājitāmūlaṃ piṣṭaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā / tena nasyapradānātsyādbhūtavṛndasya vidravaḥ //
analyzed: śvetāparājitā mūlam piṣṭam taṇḍula vāriṇā tena nasya pradānāt syāt bhūta vṛndasya vidravaḥ

original: agastyapuṣpanasyaṃ vai samarīcaṃ tu śūlahṛt / bhujaṅgacarma vai hiṅgu nimbapatraṃ tathā yavāḥ / gaurasarṣama ebhiḥ syāllepo bhūtaharaḥ śiva //
analyzed: agastya puṣpa nasyam vai sa marīcam tu śūla hṛt  bhujaṅga carma vai hiṅgu nimba patram tathā yavāḥ gaurasarṣamaḥ ebhiḥ syāt lepaḥ bhūta haraḥ śiva

original: gorocanā marīcāni pippalī saindhavaṃ madhu / añjanaṃ kṛtamebhiḥ syādgrahabhūtaharaṃ śiva //
analyzed: gorocanā marīcāni pippalī saindhavam madhu añjanam kṛtam ebhiḥ syāt graha bhūta haram śiva

original: guggulūlūkapucchābhyāṃ dhūpo grahaharo bhavet / cāturthikajvarairmukto kṛṣṇavastrāvaguṇṭhitaḥ //
analyzed: guggulu ulūka pucchābhyām dhūpaḥ graha haraḥ bhavet cāturthika jvaraiḥ muktaḥ kṛṣṇa vastra avaguṇṭhitaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vraṇāci dṛmāṣṭāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vraṇāci dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 189
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / śvetāparājitāpuṣparasenākṣṇośca pūraṇe / paṭalaṃ nāśamāyāti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca śveta aparājitā puṣpa raseṇa akṣṇoḥ ca pūraṇe paṭalam nāśam āyāti na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: mūlaṃ gokṣurakasyaiva carvitvā nīlalohita / dantakīṭavyathā naśyetsurāsuravimardan //
analyzed: mūlam gokṣurakasya eva carvitvā nīlalohita dantakīṭa vyathā naśyet sura asura vimardan

original: nārī puṣpādine pītvā gokṣīreṇopavāsataḥ / śvetārkasya tu vai mūlaṃ tasyāstadgulmaśūlanut //
analyzed: nārī puṣpādine pītvā go kṣīreṇa upavāsataḥ  śvetārkasya tu vai mūlam tasyāḥ tat gulma śūla nud

original: śvetārkapuṣpaṃ vidhinā gṛhītaṃ pūrvamantritam / ṛtuśuddhā ca lalanā kaṭau baddhvā prasūyate //
analyzed: śveta arka puṣpam vidhinā gṛhītam pūrva mantritam ṛtu śuddhā ca lalanā kaṭau baddhvā prasūyate

original: hastabaddhaṃ palāśasya apāmārgasya vā hara / mūlaṃ sarvajvaraharaṃ bhūtapretādinudbhavet //
analyzed: hasta baddham palāśasya apāmārgasya vā hara mūlam sarva jvara haram bhūta preta ādi nud bhavet

original: pītaṃ vṛścikamūlañca prātaḥ paryuṣitāmbunā / sārdhaṃ vināśayeddāhajvarañca parameśvara //
analyzed: pītam vṛścika mūlam ca prātar paryuṣita ambunā sārdham vināśayet dāha jvaram ca parameśvara

original: śikhāyāñcaiva tadbaddhaṃ bhavedaikāhikāhinut / pītaṃ paryuṣitādbhiśca bhavetsarvaviṣāpahṛt //
analyzed: śikhāyām ca eva tat baddham bhavet aikāhika ahi nud pītam paryuṣita adbhiḥ ca bhavet sarva viṣa apahṛt

original: yasya lajjālukāmūlaṃ dīyate ca svaretasā / sārdhaṃ sa vairaṃ saṃyāti pumānstrī vā na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: yasya lajjā alukā mūlam dīyate ca sva retasā sārdham sa vairam saṃyāti pumān strī vā na saṃśayaḥ

original: piṣṭvā gavyaghṛtenaiva pāṭhāmūlaṃ pibettu yaḥ / sarvaṃ viṣaṃ vinaśyecca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: piṣṭvā gavya ghṛtena eva pāṭhā mūlam pibet tu yaḥ sarvam viṣam vinaśyet ca na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: mūlaṃ paryuṣitodena śirīṣasya yathā tathā / raktacitrakamūlasya rasasya bharaṇāddhara / karṇayoḥ kāmalāvyādhināśaḥ syānnātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: mūlam paryuṣita udena śirīṣasya yathā tathā rakta citraka mūlasya rasasya bharaṇāt hara karṇayoḥ kāmalā vyādhi nāśaḥ syāt na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: śvetakokilākṣamūlaṃ chāgīkṣīreṇa saṃyutam / trisaptāhena vai pītaṃ kṣayarogaṃ kṣayaṃ nayet //
nārikelasya vai puṣpaṃ chāgakṣīreṇa saṃyutam / pibecca trividhastasya raktavāto vinaśyati //
analyzed: nārikelasya vai puṣpam chāga kṣīreṇa saṃyutam pibet ca trividhaḥ tasya rakta vātaḥ vinaśyati

original: kuryātsudarśanāmūlaṃ mālyena susamāhṛtam / kaṇṭhabaddha tryāhikādigrahabhūtavināśanam //
analyzed: kuryāt sudarśanā mūlam mālyena su samāhṛtam

original: puṣpaṃ dhavalaguñjāyā gṛhītaṃ mūlameva ca / mukhe tu nihitaṃ rudra harennānāviṣaṃ bahu //
analyzed: puṣpam dhavalaguñjāyāḥ gṛhītam mūlam eva ca mukhe tu nihitam rudra haret nānā viṣam bahu

original: haste baddhaṃ kāṇḍayuktaṃ kaṇṭhe baddhaṃ grahādihṛt / kṛṣṇāyāntu caturdaśyāṃ kaṭibaddhaṃ samāhṛtam / siṃhādiśvāpadādbhītiṃ harecca nīlalohita //
analyzed: haste baddham kāṇḍa yuktam kaṇṭhe baddham graha ādi hṛt  kṛṣṇāyān tu caturdaśyām kaṭi baddham samāhṛtam siṃha ādi śvāpadāt bhītim haret ca nīlalohita

original: viṣṇukrāntāmūlamīśa karṇabaddhantu dhārayet / paṭṭasūtreṇa bhūteśa makarādibhayaṃ na vai //
analyzed: viṣṇukrāntā mūlam īśa karṇa baddhan tu dhārayet paṭṭasūtreṇa bhūteśa makara ādi bhayam na vai

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekonanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ekonanavatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 190
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / aparājitāyā mūlañca gomūtreṇa samanvitam / pītañcāśu haratyeva gaṇḍamālāṃ na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca  aparājitāyāḥ mūlam ca go mūtreṇa samanvitam pītam ca āśu harati eva gaṇḍamālām na saṃśayaḥ

original: athendravāruṇīmūlaṃ vidhinā pītamīśvara / jiṅgiṇyairaṇḍakaṃ rudra śūkaśimbyā samanvitam / śītodakañca tatryastaṃ bāhugrīvāvyathāṃ haret //
analyzed: atha indravāruṇī mūlam vidhinā pītam īśvara jiṅgiṇyā eraṇḍakam rudra śūkaśimbyā samanvitam śīta udakam ca bāhu grīvā vyathām haret

original: māhiṣaṃ navanītañca aśvagandhā ca pippalī / vacā kuṣṭhadvayaṃ lepo liṅgasrotastanārtihṛt //
analyzed: māhiṣam navanītam ca aśvagandhā ca pippalī vacā kuṣṭha dvayam lepaḥ liṅga srota stana ārti hṛt

original: kuṣṭhanāgabalācūrṇaṃ navanītasamanvitam / tallepo yuvatīnāñca kuryādvṛttojakau śubhau //
analyzed: kuṣṭha nāgabalā cūrṇam navanīta samanvitam tad lepaḥ yuvatīnām ca kuryāt vṛtta ojakau śubhau

original: indravāruṇikāmūlaṃ yasya nāmnā sudūrataḥ / niḥ kṣipyate samutpāṭya tasya plīhā vinaśyati //
analyzed: indravāruṇikā mūlam yasya nāmnā su dūratas niḥ kṣipyate samutpāṭya tasya plīhā vinaśyati

original: punarnavāyāḥ śuklāyā mūlaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā / pītaṃ vidradhinutsyācca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: punarnavāyāḥ śuklāyāḥ mūlam taṇḍula vāriṇā pītam vidradhi nud syāt ca na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: kadalīdalakṣārantu pānīyena prasādhitam / tasyādanādvinaśyanti udaravyādhayo 'khilāḥ //
analyzed: kadalī dala kṣāram tu pānīyena prasādhitam tasya adanāt vinaśyanti udara vyādhayaḥ khilāḥ

original: kadalyā mūlamādāya guḍājyena samanvitam / agninā sādhitaṃ jagdhamudarasthakrimīnharet //
analyzed: kadalyāḥ mūlam ādāya guḍa ājyena samanvitam agninā sādhitam jagdham udara stha krimīn haret

original: nityaṃ nimbadalānāñca cūrṇamāmalakasya ca / pratyūṣe bhakṣayeccaiva tasya kuṣṭhaṃ vinaśyati //
analyzed: nityam nimba dalānām ca cūrṇam āmalakasya ca pratyūṣe bhakṣayet ca eva tasya kuṣṭham vinaśyati

original: harītakīviḍaṅgañca haridrā sitasarṣapāḥ / somarājasya mūlāni karañjasya ca raundhavam / gomūtrapiṣṭānyetāni kuṣṭharogaharāṇi vai //
analyzed: harītakī viḍaṅgam ca haridrā sita sarṣapāḥ somarājasya mūlāni karañjasya ca raundhavam go mūtra piṣṭāni etāni kuṣṭha roga harāṇi vai

original: ekaśca triphalābhāgastathā bhāgadvayaṃ śivā / somarājasya bījānāṃ jagdhaṃ pathyena dadrunut //
analyzed: ekaḥ ca triphalā bhāgaḥ tathā bhāga dvayam śivā somarājasya bījānām jagdham pathyena dadru nud

original: amlatakraṃ sagomūtraṃ kvathitaṃ lavaṇānvitam / kāṃsyaghṛṣṭaṃ kharaṃ lepātkuṣṭhadadruvināśanam //
analyzed: amla takram sa go mūtram kvathitam lavaṇa anvitam kāṃsya ghṛṣṭam kharam lepāt kuṣṭha dadru vināśanam

original: haridrā haritālaśca dūrvāgomūtrasaindhavam / ayaṃ lepo hanti dadruṃ pāmānaṃ ca garaṃ tathā //
analyzed: haridrā haritālaḥ ca dūrvā go mūtra saindhavam ayam lepaḥ hanti dadrum pāmānam ca garam tathā

original: soma rājasya bījāni navanītayutāni ca / madhunāsvāditāni syuḥ śuklakuṣṭhaharāṇi vai / takrānnapānato rudra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: soma rājasya bījāni navanīta yutāni ca madhunā āsvāditāni syuḥ śukla kuṣṭha harāṇi vai takra anna pānataḥ rudra na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: śvetāparā jitāmūlaṃ vartitaṃ cāsya vāriṇā / tallepo rudra māsena śuklakuṣṭhavināśanaḥ //
analyzed: śvetāparā jitā mūlam vartitam ca asya vāriṇā tad lepaḥ rudra māsena śukla kuṣṭha vināśanaḥ

original: māhiṣaṃ navanītañca sindūraṃ samarīcakam / pāmā vilepanānnaśyeddur nāmā vṛṣabhadhvaja //
analyzed: māhiṣam navanītam ca sindūram sa marīcakam pāmā vilepanāt naśyet dus nāmā vṛṣabhadhvaja

original: viśuṣkagāmbhārīmūlaṃ pakvaṃ kṣīreṇa saṃyutam / bhakṣitaṃ śuklapittasya vināśakaramīśvara //
analyzed: viśuṣka gāmbhārī mūlam pakvam kṣīreṇa saṃyutam bhakṣitam śuklapittasya vināśa karam īśvara

original: mūlakasya tu bījāni hyapā mārgarasena vai / piṣṭāni tena lepena sidhmakaṃ rudra naśyati //
analyzed: mūlakasya tu bījāni hi apā mārga rasena vai piṣṭāni tena lepena sidhmakam rudra naśyati

original: kadalīkṣārasaṃyuktaharidrā sidhmakāpahā / rambhāpāmārgayoḥ kṣāra eraṇḍena vimiśritaḥ / tadabhyaṅgānmahādeva / sadyaḥ sidhma vinaśyati //
kūṣmāṇḍanālakṣāraśca sagomūtraśca tattvataḥ / jalapiṣṭā haridrā ca siddhā mandānalenahi //
analyzed: kūṣmāṇḍa nāla kṣāraḥ ca sa go mūtraḥ ca tattvataḥ jala piṣṭā haridrā ca siddhā manda analena hi

original: māhiṣeṇa purīṣeṇa veṣṭitā vṛṣabhadhvaja / asyā udvartanaṃ kuryādaṅgasauṣṭhavamīśvara //
analyzed: māhiṣeṇa purīṣeṇa veṣṭitā vṛṣabhadhvaja asyāḥ udvartanam kuryāt aṅga sauṣṭhavam īśvara

original: tilasarṣapasaṃyuktaṃ haridrādvayakuṣṭhakam / tenodvartitadehaḥ syāddurgandhaḥ surabhiḥ pumān //
analyzed: tila sarṣapa saṃyuktam haridrā dvaya kuṣṭhakam tena udvartita dehaḥ syāt durgandhaḥ surabhiḥ pumān

original: manoharaścānudinaṃ dūrvāṇāṃ kākajaṅghāyā / arjunasya tu puṣpāṇi jambūpatrayutāni ca / salodhrāṇi ca tallepo dehadurgandhatāṃ haret //
analyzed: manoharaḥ ca anudinam dūrvāṇām kākajaṅghāyāḥ arjunasya tu puṣpāṇi jambū patra yutāni ca sa lodhrāṇi ca tad lepaḥ deha durgandha tām haret

original: yuktaṃ lodhrabhavairnoraiścūrṇantu kanakasya ca / tenodvartitadehasya na syādgrīṣmaprabādhikā //
analyzed: yuktam lodhra bhavaiḥ noraiḥ cūrṇam tu kanakasya ca  tena udvartita dehasya na syāt grīṣma prabādhikā

original: dugdhenoṣasi sekaśca gharmadoṣaśca naśyati / kākajaṅghodvartanantu hyaṅgarāgakaraṃ bhavet //
analyzed: dugdhena uṣasi sekaḥ ca gharma doṣaḥ ca naśyati kākajaṅgha udvartanam tu hi aṅga rāga karam bhavet

original: madhuyaṣṭī śarkarā ca vāsakasya raso madhu / etatpītaṃ raktapittakāmalāpāṇḍuroganut //
raktapittaṃ haretpīto vāsakasya raso madhu / prātaḥ kāle toyapānātpīnasaṃ dāruṇaṃ haret //
analyzed: raktapittam haret pītaḥ vāsakasya rasaḥ madhu prātar kāle toya pānāt pīnasam dāruṇam haret

original: bibhītakasya vai cūrṇaṃ pippalyāḥ saindhavasya ca / pītaṃ sakāñjikaṃ hanti svarabhedaṃ maheśvara //
analyzed: bibhītakasya vai cūrṇam pippalyāḥ saindhavasya ca pītam sa kāñjikam hanti svarabhedam maheśvara

original: cūrṇamāmalakaṃ sevyaṃ pītaṃ gavyapayo 'nvitam / manaḥ śilā balāmūlaṃ kolapaṇa ca gugguluḥ //
analyzed: cūrṇam āmalakam sevyam pītam gavya payaḥ nvitam manaḥ śilā balā mūlam ca gugguluḥ

original: jātipatraṃ kolapatraṃ tathā caiva manaḥ śilā / ebhiścaiva kṛtā vartirbadaryagnau maheśvara / dhūmapānaṃ kāsaharaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: jāti patram kola patram tathā ca eva manaḥ śilā ebhiḥ ca eva kṛtā vartiḥ badarī agnau maheśvara dhūma pānam kāsa haram na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: triphalāpippalīcūrṇaṃ bhakṣitaṃ madhunāyutam / bhojanādau hi samadhu pipāsājva(tva)
analyzed: triphalā pippalī cūrṇam bhakṣitam madhunā ayutam bhojana ādau hi

original: ritaṃ haret //
analyzed: ritam haret

original: bilvamūlañca samadhuguḍūcīkvathitaṃ jalam / pītaṃ harecca trivadhaṃ chardiṃ naivātrasaṃśayaḥ / pītā dūrvā chardinutsyātpiṣṭātaṇḍulavāriṇā //
analyzed: bilva mūlam ca sa madhu guḍūcī kvathitam jalam pītam haret ca tri vadham chardim na eva atra saṃśayaḥ pītā dūrvā chardi nud syāt piṣṭa ātaṇḍula vāriṇā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe navatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 191
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / punarnavāyā mūlañca śvetaṃ puṣye samāhṛtam / vāri pītaṃ tasya pārśva bhavaneṣu na pannagāḥ //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca punarnavāyāḥ mūlam ca śvetam puṣye samāhṛtam  vāri pītam tasya pārśva bhavaneṣu na pannagāḥ

original: tārkṣyamūrtiṃ vahedyo vai bhallūkadantanirmitām / sa pannagairna dṛśyeta yāvajjīvaṃ vṛṣadhvaja //
analyzed: tārkṣya mūrtim vahet yaḥ vai bhallūka danta nirmitām sa pannagaiḥ na dṛśyeta yāvajjīvam vṛṣadhvaja

original: pibecchalmalimūlaṃ yaḥ puṣyarkṣe rudra vāriṇā / tasminnapāstadaśanā nāgāḥ syurnātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: pibet śalmali mūlam yaḥ puṣya ṛkṣe rudra vāriṇā tasmin apāsta daśanāḥ nāgāḥ syuḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: puṣye lajjālukāmūle hastabaddhe tu pannagān / gṛhṇīyāllepato vāpi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: puṣye lajjālukā mūle hasta baddhe tu pannagān gṛhṇīyāt lepataḥ vā api na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: puṣyeśvetārkamūlantu pītaṃ śītena vāriṇā / naśyetu daṃśakaviṣaṃ karavīrādijaṃ viṣam //
analyzed: puṣye śveta arka mūlantu pītam śītena vāriṇā naśyetu daṃśaka viṣam karavīra ādi jam viṣam

original: mahākālasya vai mūlaṃ piṣṭaṃ tatkāñjikena vai / voḍrāṇāṃ ḍuṇḍubhānāṃ ca tallopo harate viṣam //
analyzed: mahākālasya vai mūlam piṣṭam tat kāñjikena vai voḍrāṇām ḍuṇḍubhānām ca tad lopaḥ harate viṣam

original: taṇḍulīyakamūlaṃ ca piṣṭaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā / ghṛtena saha pītantu haretsarvāviṣāṇi ca //
analyzed: taṇḍulīyaka mūlam ca piṣṭam taṇḍula vāriṇā ghṛtena saha haret sarva aviṣāṇi ca

original: nīlīlajjālukāmūlaṃ piṣṭaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā / pītaṃ taddaṃśakaviṣaṃ naśyedekena vobhayoḥ //
analyzed: nīlī lajjālukā mūlam piṣṭam taṇḍula vāriṇā pītam tat daṃśaka viṣam naśyet ekena vā ubhayoḥ

original: kūṣmāṇḍakasya svarasaḥ saguḍaḥ sahaśarkaraḥ / pītaḥ sadugdho hanyācca daṃśakasyaviṣaṃ ca vai //
analyzed: kūṣmāṇḍakasya svarasaḥ sa guḍaḥ saha śarkaraḥ pītaḥ sa dugdhaḥ hanyāt ca daṃśakasya viṣam ca vai

original: tathā kodravamūlasya mohasya hara eva ca / yaṣṭīmadhusamāyuktā tathā pītā ca śarkarā //
analyzed: tathā kodrava mūlasya mohasya haraḥ eva ca yaṣṭīmadhu samāyuktā tathā pītā ca śarkarā

original: sadugdhā ca trirātreṇa mūṣakānāṃ viṣaṃ haret / culukatrayapānācca vāriṇaḥ śītalasya vai //
analyzed: sa dugdhā ca tri rātreṇa mūṣakānām viṣam haret culuka traya pānāt ca vāriṇaḥ śītalasya vai

original: tāmbūladagdhamukhasya lālāstrāvo vinaśyati / ghṛtaṃ saśarkaraṃ ṣītvā madyapānamado na vai //
analyzed: tāmbūla dagdha mukhasya lālā strāvaḥ vinaśyati ghṛtam sa śarkaram ṣītvā madya pāna madaḥ na vai

original: kṛṣṇāṅkolasya mūlena pītaṃ sukvathitaṃ jalam / tato naśyadgaraviṣaṃ trirātreṇa maheśvara //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa aṅkolasya mūlena pītam su kvathitam jalam tatas naśyat gara viṣam tri rātreṇa maheśvara

original: uṣṇaṃ gavyaghṛtaṃ caiva saindhavena samanvitam / nāśayettanmahādeva vedanāṃ vṛścikodbhavām //
analyzed: uṣṇam gavya ghṛtam ca eva saindhavena samanvitam nāśayet tat mahādeva vedanām vṛścika udbhavām

original: kusubhaṃ kaṅkumañcaiva haritālaṃ manaḥ śilā / karañjaṃ piṣitaṃ caiva hyarkamūlaṃ ca śaṅkara //
analyzed: kusubham kaṅkumam ca eva haritālam manaḥ śilā karañjam piṣitam ca eva hi arka mūlam ca śaṅkara

original: viṣaṃnṛṇāṃ vinaśyettu eteṣāṃ bhakṣaṇācchiva / dīpatailapradānācca daṃśairākīṭajaiḥ śiva / kharjūrakaviṣaṃ naśyettadā vai nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: viṣam nṛṇām vinaśyet tu eteṣām bhakṣaṇāt śiva dīpa taila pradānāt ca daṃśaiḥ ākīṭa jaiḥ śiva kharjūraka viṣam naśyet tadā vai na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: daṃśasthānaṃ vṛścikasya śuṇṭhī tagarasaṃyutā / naśyenmadhumakṣikāyā eteṣāṃ lepato viṣam //
analyzed: daṃśa sthānam vṛścikasya śuṇṭhī tagara saṃyutā naśyet madhumakṣikāyāḥ eteṣām lepataḥ viṣam

original: śatapuṣpā saindhavañca sājyaṃ vā tena lepayet / śirīṣasya tu bījaṃvai siddha kṣīreṇa gharṣitam //
analyzed: śatapuṣpā saindhavañca sa ājyam vā tena lepayet śirīṣasya tu bījam vai siddha kṣīreṇa gharṣitam

original: tallepena mahādeva naśyetkukkurajaṃ viṣam / jvalitāgnirvāriseko tathā dardurajaṃ viṣam //
analyzed: tad lepena mahādeva naśyet kukkura jam viṣam  tathā dardura jam viṣam

original: dhattūrakarasonmiśraṃ kṣīrādyaguḍapānataḥ / śūnāṃ viṣaṃ vinaśyettu śaśāṅkāṅkitaśekhara //
analyzed: dhattūraka rasa unmiśram kṣīra ādya guḍa pānataḥ śūnām viṣam vinaśyet tu śaśāṅka aṅkita śekhara

original: vaṭanimbaśamīnāñca valkalaiḥ kvathitaṃ jalam / tatsekānmukhadantānāṃ naśyedvai viṣavedanā //
analyzed: vaṭa nimba śamīnām ca valkalaiḥ kvathitam jalam tad sekāt mukha dantānām naśyet vai viṣa vedanā

original: lepanāddevadārośca gairikasya ca lepanāt / nāgeśvaro daridre dve tathā mañjiṣṭhakā hara / ebhirlepādvinaśyettu lūtāviṣamumāpate //
analyzed: lepanāt devadāroḥ ca gairikasya ca lepanāt nāgeśvaraḥ daridre dve tathā mañjiṣṭhakāḥ hara ebhiḥ lepāt vinaśyet tu lūtā viṣam umāpate

original: karañjasya tu bījāni varuṇacchadameva ca / tilāśca sarṣapā hanyurviṣaṃ vai nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: karañjasya tu bījāni varuṇacchadam eva ca tilāḥ ca sarṣapāḥ hanyuḥ viṣam vai na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: ghṛtaṃ kumārīpatraṃ vai dattaṃ salavaṇaṃ hara / turaṅgamaśarīrāṇāṃ kaṇḍūrnaśyeddaśāhataḥ //
analyzed: ghṛtam kumārī patram vai dattam sa lavaṇam hara turaṅgama śarīrāṇām kaṇḍūḥ naśyet daśa ahataḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ekanavatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 192
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / citrakasyāṣṭabhāgāśca śūraṇasya ca ṣoḍaśa / śuṇṭhyā bhāgāśca catvāro maricānāṃ dvayaṃ tathā //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca citrakasya aṣṭa bhāgāḥ ca śūraṇasya ca ṣoḍaśa śuṇṭhyāḥ bhāgāḥ ca catvāraḥ maricānām dvayam tathā

original: tritayaṃ pippalīmūlaṃ viḍaṅgānāṃ catuṣṭayam / aṣṭau muśalikābhāgāstriphalāyāścatuṣṭayam / dviguṇena guḍenaiṣāṃ modakāniha kārayet //
analyzed: tritayam pippalī mūlam viḍaṅgānām catuṣṭayam aṣṭau muśalikā bhāgāḥ triphalāyāḥ catuṣṭayam dviguṇena guḍena eṣām modakān iha kārayet

original: tadbhakṣaṇamajīrṇaṃ hi pāṇḍurogañja kāmalam / atīsārāṃśca mandāgniṃ plīhāñcaiva nivārayet //
analyzed: tad bhakṣaṇam ajīrṇam hi kāmalam atīsārān ca manda agnim plīhān ca eva nivārayet

original: bilvāgnimanthaḥ śyonākapāṭalāpāribhadrakam / prasāraṇyaśvagandhā ca bṛhatī kaṇṭakārikā //
balā cātibalā rāsnā śvadaṃṣṭrā ca punarnavā / eraṇḍaḥ śārivā parṇo guḍūcī kapikacchukā //
analyzed: balā ca atibalā rāsnā śvadaṃṣṭrā ca punarnavā eraṇḍaḥ śārivā parṇaḥ guḍūcī kapikacchukā

original: eṣāṃ daśapalānbhāgānkvāthayetsalile 'male / tena pādāvaśeṣeṇa tailapātre vipācayet //
analyzed: eṣām daśa palān bhāgān kvāthayet salile male tena pāda avaśeṣeṇa taila pātre vipācayet

original: ājaṃ vā yadi gavyaṃ kṣīraṃ dattvā caturguṇam / śatāvarīṃ saindhavañca tailatulyaṃ pradāpayet //
analyzed: ājam vā yadi gavyam kṣīram dattvā caturguṇam śatāvarīm saindhavam ca taila tulyam pradāpayet

original: dravyāṇiyāni peṣyāṇi tāni vakṣyāmi tacchṛṇu / śatapuṣpā devadārurbalā parṇo vacāguru //
analyzed: dravyāṇi yāni peṣyāṇi tāni vakṣyāmi tat śṛṇu śatapuṣpā devadāruḥ balā parṇaḥ vacā aguru

original: kuṣṭhaṃ māṃsī saindhavañca palamekaṃ punarnavā / pāne nasye tathābhyaṅge tailametatpradāpayet //
analyzed: kuṣṭham māṃsī saindhavam ca palam ekam punarnavā pāne nasye tathā abhyaṅge tailam etat pradāpayet

original: hṛcchūlaṃ pārśvaśūlañca gaṇḍamālāñca nāśayet / apasmāraṃ vātaraktaṃ vapuṣmāṃśca pumānbhavet //
analyzed: hṛd śūlam pārśva śūlam ca gaṇḍamālām ca nāśayet apasmāram vātaraktam vapuṣmān ca pumān bhavet

original: garbhamaśvatarī vindyātkiṃ punarmānuṣī hara / aśvānāṃ vātabhagnānāṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ nṛṇāṃ tathā / tailametatprayoktavyaṃ sarvavātavikāriṇām //
analyzed: garbham aśvatarī vindyāt kim punar mānuṣī hara  aśvānām vāta bhagnānām kuñjarāṇām nṛṇām tathā tailam etat prayoktavyam sarva vāta vikāriṇām

original: hiṅgutumburuśuṇṭhībhiḥ siddhaṃ tailantu sārṣapam / etaddhi puraṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ karṇaśūlāpahaṃ param //
analyzed: hiṅgu tumburu śuṇṭhībhiḥ siddham tailam tu sārṣapam etat hi puraṇam śreṣṭham karṇa śūla apaham param

original: śuṣkamūlakaśuṇṭhīnāṃ kṣāro hiṅgulanāgaram / takraṃ caturguṇaṃ dadyāttailametadvipācayet //
analyzed: śuṣka mūlaka śuṇṭhīnām kṣāraḥ hiṅgula nāgaram takram caturguṇam dadyāt tailam etat vipācayet

original: bādhiryaṃ karṇaśūlañca pūyastrāvañca karṇayoḥ / krimayaśca vinaśyanti tailasyāsya prapūraṇāt //
analyzed: bādhiryam karṇa śūlam ca pūya strāvam ca karṇayoḥ krimayaḥ ca vinaśyanti tailasya asya prapūraṇāt

original: śuṣkamūlakaśuṇṭhīnāṃ kṣāro hiṅgulanāgaram / śatapuṣpā vacā kuṣṭhaṃ dāruśigrurasāñjanam //
sauvarcalaṃ yavakṣāraṃ sāmudraṃ saindhavaṃ tathā / granthikaṃ viḍamustaṃ ca madhu śuktaṃ caturguṇam //
analyzed: sauvarcalam yavakṣāram sāmudram saindhavam tathā granthikam viḍa mustam ca madhu śuktam caturguṇam

original: mātuluṅgarasaścaiva kadalīrasa eva ca / tailamebhirvipaktavyaṃ karṇaśūlāpahaṃ param //
analyzed: mātuluṅga rasaḥ ca eva kadalī rasaḥ eva ca tailam ebhiḥ vipaktavyam karṇa śūla apaham param

original: bādhiryaṃ karṇanādaśca pūyastrāvaśca dāruṇam / pūraṇādasya tailasya krimayaḥ karṇayorhara //
analyzed: bādhiryam karṇa nādaḥ ca pūya strāvaḥ ca dāruṇam pūraṇādasya tailasya krimayaḥ karṇayoḥ hara

original: sadyo vināśamāyānti śaśāṅkakṛtaśekhara / kṣāratailamidaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mukhadantamalāpaham //
analyzed: sadyas vināśam āyānti śaśāṅka kṛta śekhara kṣāratailam idam śreṣṭham mukha danta mala apaham

original: candanaṃ kuṅkumaṃ māṃsī karpūraṃ jātipatrikā / jātīkaṅkolapūgānāṃ lavaṅgasya phalāni ca //
analyzed: candanam kuṅkumam māṃsī karpūram jātipatrikā jātī kaṅkola pūgānām lavaṅgasya phalāni ca

original: agurūṇi ca kastūrī kuṣṭhaṃ tagarapādikā / gorocanā priyaṅguśca balā caiva tathā nakhī //
analyzed: agurūṇi ca kastūrī kuṣṭham tagara pādikā gorocanā priyaṅguḥ ca balā ca eva tathā nakhī

original: saralaṃ saptaparṇaṃ ca lākṣā cāmalakī tathā / tathā tu padmakaṃ caiva hyetaistailaṃ prasādhayet //
analyzed: saralam saptaparṇam ca lākṣā ca āmalakī tathā tathā tu padmakam ca eva hi etaiḥ tailam prasādhayet

original: prasvedamaladurgandhakaṇḍū kuṣṭhaharaṃ param / gacchati strīśataṃ rudra bandhyāpi labhate sutam //
analyzed: prasveda mala durgandha kaṇḍū kuṣṭha haram param gacchati strī śatam rudra bandhyā api labhate sutam

original: yavānī citrakaṃ dhānyaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ jīrakaṃ tathā / sauvarcalaṃ viḍagañca pippalīmūlarājikam //
analyzed: yavānī citrakam dhānyam tryūṣaṇam jīrakam tathā sauvarcalam viḍagam ca pippalī mūla rājikam

original: ebhiḥ pacedraghṛtaprasthaṃ jalaprasthāṣṭasaṃyutam / tathār'śogulmaśvayathuṃ hanti vahniṃ karoti vai //
analyzed: ebhiḥ pacet raghṛta prastham jala prastha aṣṭa saṃyutam tathā arśaḥ gulma śvayathum hanti vahnim karoti vai

original: maricaṃ trivṛtaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ haritālaṃ manaḥ śilā / devadāru haridre dve kuṣṭhaṃ māṃsī ca candanam //
analyzed: maricam trivṛtam kuṣṭham haritālam manaḥ śilā devadāru haridre dve kuṣṭham māṃsī ca candanam

original: viśālā karavīrañca arkakṣīraṃ śakṛdrasaḥ / eṣāñca kārṣiko bhāgo viṣasyārdhapalaṃ bhavett //
analyzed: viśālā karavīram ca arka kṣīram śakṛt rasaḥ eṣām ca kārṣikaḥ bhāgaḥ viṣasya ardha palam bhavet

original: prasthaṃ saṭukatailasya gomūtre 'ṣṭaguṇe pacet / mṛtpātre lohapātre vā śanairmṛdvagninā pacet //
analyzed: prastham saṭuka tailasya go mūtre ṣṭaguṇe pacet mṛd pātre loha pātre vā śanais mṛdu agninā pacet

original: pāmā vicarcikā caiva dadrurvisphocakānica / abhyaṅgena praṇaśyanti komalatvañca jāyate //
analyzed: pāmā vicarcikā ca eva dadruḥ visphocakāni ca abhyaṅgena praṇaśyanti komala tvam ca jāyate

original: prabhūtānyapi śvitrāṇi tailenānena mardayet / cirotthitamapi śvitraṃ vinaṣṭaṃ tatkṣaṇādbhavet //
analyzed: prabhūtāni api śvitrāṇi tailena anena mardayet cira utthitam api śvitram vinaṣṭam tad kṣaṇāt bhavet

original: paṭolapatraṃ kaṭukā mañjiṣṭhā śārivā niśā / jātīśamīnimbapatraṃ madhukaṃ kvathitaṃ ghṛtam //
ebhirlepātsayurarujo vraṇā vistrāviṇaḥ śiva / śaṅkhapuṣpī vacā somo brāhmī brahmasuvarcalāḥ //
analyzed: ebhiḥ lepāt sayuḥ arujaḥ vraṇāḥ vistrāviṇaḥ śiva śaṅkhapuṣpī vacā somaḥ brāhmī brahmasuvarcalāḥ

original: abhayā ca guḍūcī ca āṭarūṣakavākucī / etairakṣasamairbhāgairghṛtaprasthaṃ vipācayet //
analyzed: abhayā ca guḍūcī ca āṭarūṣaka vākucī etaiḥ akṣa samaiḥ bhāgaiḥ ghṛta prastham vipācayet

original: kaṇṭakāryā rasaprasthaṃ kṣīraprasthasamanvitam / etadbrāhmīghṛtaṃ nāma smṛtimedhākaraṃ param //
agnimantho vacā vāsā pippalī madhu saindhavam / saptarātraprayogeṇa kinnarairiva gīyate //
analyzed: agnimanthaḥ vacā vāsā pippalī madhu saindhavam sapta rātra prayogeṇa kinnaraiḥ iva gīyate

original: apāmārgaḥ guḍūcī ca vacā kuṣṭhaṃ śatāvarī / śaṅkhapuṣpābhayā sājyaṃ viḍaṅgaṃ bhakṣitaṃ samam / tribhirdinairnaraṃ kuryādgranthāṣṭaśatadhāriṇam //
analyzed: apāmārgaḥ guḍūcī ca vacā kuṣṭham śatāvarī śaṅkhapuṣpa abhayā sa ājyam viḍaṅgam bhakṣitam samam tribhiḥ dinaiḥ naram kuryāt grantha aṣṭaśata dhāriṇam

original: adbhirvā payasājyena māsamekantu sevitā / vacā karyānnaraṃ prājñaṃ śrutidhāraṇasaṃyutam //
analyzed: adbhiḥ vā payasā ājyena māsam ekam tu sevitā vacā karyāt naram prājñam śruti dhāraṇa saṃyutam

original: candrasūryagrahe pītaṃ palamekaṃ payo 'nvitam / vacāyāstatkṣaṇaṃ kuryānmahāprajñāyutaṃ naram //
analyzed: candra sūrya grahe pītam palam ekam payaḥ nvitam vacāyāḥ tad kṣaṇam kuryāt mahā prajñā yutam naram

original: bhūnimbanimbatriphalāparpaṭaiśca śṛtaṃ jalam / paṭolīmustakābhyāñca vāsakena ca nāśayet //
analyzed: bhūnimba nimba triphalā parpaṭaiḥ ca śṛtam jalam paṭolī mustakābhyām ca vāsakena ca nāśayet

original: visphoṭakāni raktañca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / katakasya phalaṃ śaṅkhaṃ saindhavaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ vacā //
analyzed: visphoṭakāni raktam ca na atra kāryā vicāraṇā katakasya phalam śaṅkham saindhavam tryūṣaṇam vacā

original: phenī rasāñjanaṃ kṣaudraṃ viḍaṅgāni manaḥ śilā / eṣāṃ vartirhanti kācaṃ timiraṃ paṭalaṃ tathā //
analyzed: phenī rasāñjanam kṣaudram viḍaṅgāni manaḥ śilā      hanti

original: prasthadvayaṃ māṣakasya kvāthaśca droṇamambhasām / caturbhāgāvaśeṣeṇa tailaprasthaṃ vipācayet //
analyzed: prastha dvayam māṣakasya kvāthaḥ ca droṇam ambhasām catur bhāga avaśeṣeṇa taila prastham vipācayet

original: kāñjikasyāḍhakaṃ dattvā piṣṭānyetāni dāpayet / punarnavā gokṣurakaṃ saindhavaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ vacā //
analyzed: kāñjikasya āḍhakam dattvā piṣṭāni etāni dāpayet punarnavā gokṣurakam saindhavam tryūṣaṇam vacā

original: lavaṇaṃ suradāruśca mañjiṣṭhā kaṇṭakārikā / nasyātpānāddharatyeva karṇaśūlaṃ sudāruṇam //
analyzed: lavaṇam suradāruḥ ca mañjiṣṭhā kaṇṭakārikā nasyāt pānāt harati eva karṇa śūlam su dāruṇam

original: bādhiryaṃ sarvarogāṃśca hyabhyaṅgācca maheśvara / paladvayaṃ saindhavañca śuṇṭhī citrakapañcakam //
analyzed: bādhiryam sarva rogān ca hi abhyaṅgāt ca maheśvara pala dvayam saindhavam ca śuṇṭhī citraka pañcakam

original: sauvīrapañcaprasthaṃ ca tailaprasthaṃ pacettataḥ / asṛgdarasvaraplīhāsarvavātavikāranut //
analyzed: sauvīra pañca prastham ca taila prastham pacet tatas asṛgdara svara plīha asarva vāta vikāra nud

original: udumbaraṃ vaṭaṃ plakṣaṃ jambūdvayamathārjunam / pippalī ca kadambañca palāśaṃ lodhratindukam //
analyzed: udumbaram vaṭam plakṣam jambu dvayam atha arjunam pippalī ca kadambam ca palāśam lodhra tindukam

original: madhūkamāmrasarjañca badaraṃ padmakeśaram / śirīṣabījaṅkatakametatkvāthena sādhitam / tailaṃ hanti vraṇāṃllepāccirakālabhavānapi //
analyzed: madhūkam āmra sarjan ca badaram padma kesaram  śirīṣa bījaṅkatakam etat kvāthena sādhitam tailam hanti vraṇān lepāt cira kāla bhavān api

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dvinavatyadhika śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe dvinavatyadhika śatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 193
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / palāṇḍujīrake kuṣṭhamaśvagandhājamodakam / vacā trikaṭukañcaiva lavaṇaṃ cūrṇamuttamam //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca palāṇḍu jīrake kuṣṭham aśvagandhā ajamodakam  vacā trikaṭukam ca eva lavaṇam cūrṇam uttamam

original: brāhmīrasairbhāvitañca sarpirmadhusamanvitam / saptāhaṃ bhakṣitaṃ kuryānnirmalāñca matiṃ parām //
analyzed: brāhmī rasaiḥ bhāvitam ca sarpiḥ madhu samanvitam sapta aham bhakṣitam kuryāt nirmalām ca matim parām

original: siddhārthakaṃ vacā hiṅgu karañjaṃ devadāru ca / mañjiṣṭhā triphalā viśvaṃ śirīṣo rajanīdvayam //
analyzed: siddhārthakam vacā hiṅgu karañjam devadāru ca mañjiṣṭhā triphalā viśvam śirīṣaḥ rajanī dvayam

original: priyaṅgunimbatrikraṭu gomūtreṇaiva gharṣitam / nasayamālepanañcaiva tathā codvartanaṃ hitam //
