analyzed: priyaṅgu nimba trikraṭu go mūtreṇa eva gharṣitam nasayam ālepanam ca eva tathā ca udvartanam hitam

original: apasmāraviṣonmādaśoṣālakṣmījvarāpaham / bhūtebhyaścabhayaṃ hanti rājadvāreṣu yojanāt //
analyzed: apasmāra viṣa unmāda śoṣa alakṣmī jvara apaham bhūtebhyaḥ ca bhayam hanti rāja dvāreṣu yojanāt

original: nimbaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ haridre dve śigru sarṣapajaṃ tathā / devadāru paṭolañca dhānyaṃ takreṇa gharṣitam //
analyzed: nimbam kuṣṭham haridre dve śigru sarṣapa jam tathā devadāru paṭolam ca dhānyam takreṇa gharṣitam

original: dehaṃ tailākta gātraṃ vai nayedudvartanena ca / pāmāḥ kuṣṭhāni naśyeyuḥ kaṇḍūṃ hanti ca niścitam //
analyzed: deham taila akta gātram vai nayet udvartanena ca pāmāḥ kuṣṭhāni naśyeyuḥ kaṇḍūm hanti ca niścitam

original: sāmudraṃ saindhavaṃ kṣāro rājikā lavaṇaṃ viḍam / kaṭuloharajaścaivaṃ trivṛtsūraṇakaṃ samam / dadhigomūtrapayasā mandapāvakapācitam //
analyzed: sāmudram saindhavam kṣāraḥ rājikā lavaṇam viḍam kaṭuloha rajaḥ ca evam trivṛt sūraṇakam samam dadhi go mūtra payasā manda pāvaka pācitam

original: balāgnivardhakaṃ cūrṇaṃ pibeduṣṇena vāriṇā / jīrṇe 'jīrṇe tu bhuñjati māṃsyādighṛtamuttamam //
analyzed: balā agni vardhakam cūrṇam pibet uṣṇena vāriṇā jīrṇe jīrṇe tu bhuñjati māṃsya ādi ghṛtam uttamam

original: nābhiśūlaṃ mūtraśūlaṃ gulmaplīhabhavañca yat / sarvaśūlaharaṃ cūrṇaṃ jaṭharānaladīpanam / pariṇāmasamutthasya śūlasya ca hitaṃ param //
analyzed: nābhi śūlam mūtra śūlam gulma plīha bhavan ca yat sarva śūla haram cūrṇam jaṭhara anala dīpanam pariṇāma samutthasya śūlasya ca hitam param

original: abhayāmalakaṃ drākṣā pippalī kaṇṭakārikā / śṛṅgī punarnavā śuṇṭhī jagdhā kāsaṃ nihanti vai //
abhayāmalakaṃ drākṣā pāṭhā caiva vibhītakam / śarkarāyā samaṃ caiva jagdhaṃ jvaraharaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: abhayā āmalakam drākṣā pāṭhā ca eva vibhītakam  śarkarāyā samam ca eva jagdham jvara haram bhavet

original: triphalā badaraṃ drākṣā pippalī ca virekakṛt / harītakī soṣṇānīralavaṇañca virekakṛt //
analyzed: triphalā badaram drākṣā pippalī ca vireka kṛt harītakī sa uṣṇā nīra lavaṇam ca vireka kṛt

original: kūrmamatsyāśvamahiṣagośṛgālāśca vānarāḥ / viḍālabarhikākāśca varāholūkakukkuṭāḥ //
analyzed: kūrma matsya aśva mahiṣa go śṛgālāḥ ca vānarāḥ viḍāla barhi kākāḥ ca varāha ulūka kukkuṭāḥ

original: haṃsa eṣāñca viṇmūtraṃ māṃsaṃ vā roma śoṇitam / dhūpaṃ dadyājjvarārtebhya unmattebhyaśca śāntaye //
analyzed: haṃsaḥ eṣām ca viṣ mūtram māṃsam vā roma śoṇitam  dhūpam dadyāt jvara ārtebhyaḥ unmattebhyaḥ ca śāntaye

original: etānyauṣadhajātāni kathitāni umāpate / nighnanti tāśca rogāṃśca vṛkṣamindrāśaniryathā //
analyzed: etāni auṣadha jātāni kathitāni umāpate nighnanti tāḥ ca rogān ca vṛkṣam indra aśaniḥ yathā

original: auṣadhaṃbhagavānviṣṇuḥ saṃsmṛto roganudbhavet / dhyāto 'rcitaḥ stuto vāpi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: auṣadham bhagavān viṣṇuḥ saṃsmṛtaḥ dhyātaḥ arcitaḥ stutaḥ vā api na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe trinavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe trinavatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 194
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / sarvavyādhiharaṃ vakṣye vaiṣṇavaṃ kavacaṃ śubham / yena rakṣā kṛtā śambhordaityānkṣapayataḥ purā //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca sarva vyādhi haram vakṣye vaiṣṇavam kavacam śubham yena rakṣā kṛtā śambhoḥ daityān kṣapayataḥ purā

original: praṇamya devamīśānamajaṃ nityamanāmayam / devaṃ sarveśvaraṃ viṣṇuṃ sarvavyāpinamavyayam //
analyzed: praṇamya devam īśānam ajam nityam anāmayam  devam sarveśvaram viṣṇum sarva vyāpinam avyayam

original: badhnāmyahaṃ pratisaraṃ namaskṛtya janārdanam / amoghāpratimaṃ sarvaṃ sarvaduḥ khanivāraṇam //
analyzed: badhnāmi aham pratisaram namaskṛtya janārdanam amogha apratimam sarvam sarva duḥ kha nivāraṇam

original: viṣṇurmāmagrataḥ pātu kṛṣṇo rakṣatu pṛṣṭhataḥ / harirme rakṣatu śiro hṛdayañca janārdanaḥ //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ mām agratas pātu kṛṣṇaḥ rakṣatu pṛṣṭhatas hariḥ me rakṣatu śiraḥ hṛdayam ca janārdanaḥ

original: mano mama hṛṣīkeśo jihvāṃ rakṣatu keśavaḥ / prātu netre vāsudevaḥ śrotre saṅkarṣaṇo vibhuḥ //
analyzed: manaḥ mama hṛṣīkeśaḥ jihvām rakṣatu keśavaḥ prātu netre vāsudevaḥ śrotre saṅkarṣaṇaḥ vibhuḥ

original: pradyumnaḥ pātu me ghrāṇamaniruddhastu carma ca / vanamālī galasyāntaṃ śrīvatso rakṣatāmadhaḥ //
analyzed: pradyumnaḥ pātu me ghrāṇam aniruddhaḥ tu carma ca vanamālī galasya antam śrīvatsaḥ rakṣatām adhas

original: pārśvaṃ rakṣatu me cakraṃ vāmaṃ daityanivāraṇam / dakṣiṇantu gadā devī sarvāsuranivāriṇī //
analyzed: pārśvam rakṣatu me cakram vāmam daitya nivāraṇam dakṣiṇantu gadā devī sarva asura nivāriṇī

original: udaraṃ musalaṃ pātu pṛṣṭhaṃ me pātu lāṅgalam / ūrdhvaṃ rakṣatu me śārṅgaṃ jaṅghe rakṣatu nandakaḥ //
analyzed: udaram musalam pātu pṛṣṭham me pātu lāṅgalam  ūrdhvam rakṣatu me śārṅgam jaṅghe rakṣatu nandakaḥ

original: pārṣṇo rakṣatu śaṅkhaśca padmaṃ me caraṇāvubhau / sarvakāryārthasiddhyarthaṃ pātu māṃ garuḍaḥ sadā //
analyzed: rakṣatu śaṅkhaḥ ca padmam me caraṇau ubhau sarva kārya artha siddhi artham pātu mām garuḍaḥ sadā

original: varāho rakṣatu jale viṣameṣu ca vāmanaḥ / aṭavyāṃ narasiṃhaśca sarvataḥ pātu keśavaḥ //
analyzed: varāhaḥ rakṣatu jale viṣameṣu ca vāmanaḥ aṭavyām narasiṃhaḥ ca sarvatas pātu keśavaḥ

original: hiraṇyagarbho bhagavānhiraṇyaṃ me prayacchatu / sāṃkhyācāryastu kapilo dhātusāmyaṃ karotu me //
analyzed: hiraṇyagarbhaḥ bhagavān hiraṇyam me prayacchatu sāṃkhya ācāryaḥ tu kapilaḥ dhātu sāmyam karotu me

original: śvetadvīpanivāsī ca śvetadvīpaṃ nayatvajaḥ / sarvānsūdayatāṃ śatrūnmadhukaiṭabhamardanaḥ //
analyzed: śvetadvīpa nivāsī ca śvetadvīpam nayatu ajaḥ sarvān sūdayatām śatrūn madhu kaiṭabha mardanaḥ

original: sadākarṣatu viṣṇuśca kilbiṣaṃ mama vigrahāt / haṃso matsyastathā kūrmaḥ pātu māṃ sarvatodiśam //
analyzed: sadā ākarṣatu viṣṇuḥ ca kilbiṣam mama vigrahāt haṃsaḥ matsyaḥ tathā kūrmaḥ pātu mām sarvatodiśam

original: trivikramastu me devaḥ sarvapāpāni kṛntatu / tathā nārāyaṇo devo buddhiṃ pālayatāṃ mama //
analyzed: trivikramaḥ tu me devaḥ sarva pāpāni kṛntatu tathā nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ buddhim pālayatām mama

original: śeṣo me nirmalaṃ jñānaṃ karotvajñānanāśanam / vaḍavāmukho nāśayatāṃ kalmaṣaṃ yatkṛtaṃ mayā //
analyzed: śeṣaḥ me nirmalam jñānam karotu ajñāna nāśanam vaḍavāmukhaḥ nāśayatām kalmaṣam yat kṛtam mayā

original: padbhyāṃ dadātu paramaṃ sukhaṃ mūrdhni mama prabhuḥ / dattātreyaḥ prakurutāṃ saputrapaśubāndhavam //
analyzed: padbhyām dadātu paramam sukham mūrdhni mama prabhuḥ dattātreyaḥ prakurutām sa putra paśu bāndhavam

original: sarvānarīnnāśayatu rāmaḥ paraśunā mama / rakṣoghnastu daśarathiḥ pātu nityaṃ mahābhujaḥ //
analyzed: sarvān arīn nāśayatu rāmaḥ paraśunā mama rakṣaḥ ghnaḥ tu daśarathiḥ pātu nityam mahā bhujaḥ

original: śatrīnhalena me hanyādrāmo yādavanandanaḥ / pralambakeśicāṇūrapūtanākaṃsanāśanaḥ / kṛṣṇasya yo bālabhāvaḥ sa me kāmānprayacchatu //
analyzed: śatrīn halena me hanyāt rāmaḥ yādava nandanaḥ pralamba keśi cāṇūra pūtanā kaṃsa nāśanaḥ kṛṣṇasya yaḥ bāla bhāvaḥ sa me kāmān prayacchatu

original: andhakāratamoghoraṃ puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṣiṅgalam / paśyāmi bhayasantrastaḥ pāśahastamivāntakam //
analyzed: andhakāra tamaḥ ghoram puruṣam kṛṣṇa ṣiṅgalam paśyāmi bhaya santrastaḥ pāśa hastam iva antakam

original: tato 'haṃ puṇḍarīkākṣamacyutaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ / dhanyo 'haṃ nirbhayo nityaṃ yasya me bhagavānhariḥ //
analyzed: tatas ham puṇḍarīkākṣam acyutam śaraṇam gataḥ dhanyaḥ ham nirbhayaḥ nityam yasya me bhagavān hariḥ

original: dhyātvā nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ sarvopadravanāśanam / vaiṣṇavaṃ kavacaṃ baddhvā vicarāmi mahītale //
analyzed: dhyātvā nārāyaṇam devam sarva upadrava nāśanam vaiṣṇavam kavacam baddhvā vicarāmi mahī tale

original: apradhṛṣyo 'smi bhūtānāṃ sarvadevamayo hyaham / smaraṇāddevadevasya viṣṇoramitatejasaḥ //
analyzed: apradhṛṣyaḥ smi bhūtānām sarva deva mayaḥ hi aham smaraṇāt devadevasya viṣṇoḥ amita tejasaḥ

original: siddhirbhavatu me nityaṃ yathāmantramudāhṛtam / yo māṃ paśyati cakṣurbhyāṃ yañcaḥ paśyāmi cakṣuṣā / sarveṣāṃ pāpaduṣṭānāṃ viṣṇurbadhnātu cakṣuṣī //
analyzed: siddhiḥ bhavatu me nityam yathāmantram udāhṛtam  yaḥ mām paśyati cakṣurbhyām yañcaḥ paśyāmi cakṣuṣā  sarveṣām pāpa duṣṭānām viṣṇuḥ badhnātu cakṣuṣī

original: vāsudevasya yaccakraṃ tasya cakrasya ye tvarāḥ / te hi cchindantu pāpānme mama hiṃsantu hiṃsakān //
analyzed: vāsudevasya yat cakram tasya cakrasya ye tvarāḥ te hi chindantu pāpān me mama hiṃsantu hiṃsakān

original: rākṣaseṣu piśāceṣu kāntāreṣvaṭavīṣu ca / vivāde rājamārgeṣu dyūteṣu kalaheṣu ca //
analyzed: rākṣaseṣu piśāceṣu kāntāreṣu aṭavīṣu ca vivāde rājamārgeṣu dyūteṣu kalaheṣu ca

original: nadīsantāraṇe ghore saṃprāpte prāṇasaṃśaye / agnicauranipāteṣu sarvagrahanivāraṇe //
analyzed: nadī santāraṇe ghore saṃprāpte prāṇa saṃśaye agni caura nipāteṣu sarva graha nivāraṇe

original: vidyutsarpaviṣodvege roge vai vighnasaṅkaṭe / japyametajjapennityaṃ śarīre bhayamāgate //
analyzed: vidyut sarpa viṣa udvege roge vai vighna saṅkaṭe japyam etat japet nityam śarīre bhayam āgate

original: ayaṃ bhagavato mantro mantrāṇāṃ paramo mahān / vikhyātaṃ kavacaṃ guhyaṃ sarpapāpapraṇāśanam / svamāyākṛtinirmāṇaṃ kalpāntagahanaṃ mahat //
analyzed: ayam bhagavataḥ mantraḥ mantrāṇām paramaḥ mahān vikhyātam kavacam guhyam sarpa pāpa praṇāśanam sva māyā ākṛti nirmāṇam kalpa anta gahanam mahat

original: anādyanta / jagadbīja / padmanābha / namo 'stu te / oṃ kālāya svāhā / oṃ kālapuruṣāya svāhā / oṃ kṛṣṇāya svāhā / oṃ kṛṣṇarūpāya svāhā / oṃ caṇḍāya svāhā / oṃ caṇḍarūpāya svāhā / oṃ pracaṇḍāya svāhā / oṃ pracaṇarūpāya svāhā / oṃ sarvāya svāhā / oṃ sarvarūpāya svāhā / oṃ namo bhuvaneśāya trilokadhātre iha viṭi siviṭi siviṭi svāhā/
analyzed: anādi anta jagadbīja padmanābha namaḥ stu te om kālāya svāhā om kālapuruṣāya svāhā om kṛṣṇāya svāhā om kṛṣṇa rūpāya svāhā om caṇḍāya svāhā om caṇḍa rūpāya svāhā om pracaṇḍāya svāhā om pracaṇa rūpāya svāhā om sarvāya svāhā om sarva rūpāya svāhā om namaḥ bhuvaneśāya triloka dhātre iha viṭi siviṭi siviṭi svāhā

original: oṃ namaḥ ayokhetaye ye ye saṃjñāpaya
analyzed: om namaḥ ayokhetaye ye ye saṃjñāpaya

original: daityadānavayakṣarākṣasabhūtapiśācakūṣmāṇḍāntāpasmārakacchardanaduddharrāṇāmekāhikadvyāhikatryāhikacāturthikamauhūrtikadinajvararātrijvarasandhyājvarasarvajvarādīnāṃ
analyzed: daitya dānava yakṣa rākṣasa bhūta piśāca kūṣmāṇḍa anta apasmāraka chardana duddharrāṇām ekāhika dvyāhika tryāhika cāturthika mauhūrtika dina jvara rātri jvara sandhyā jvara sarva jvara ādīnām

original: lūtākīṭakaṇṭakapūtanābhujaṅgasthāvarajaṅgamaviṣādī nāmidaṃ śarīraṃ mama pathyaṃ tvaṃ
analyzed: lūtā kīṭa kaṇṭaka pūtanā bhujaṅga sthāvara jaṅgama viṣādī nām idam śarīram mama pathyam tvam

original: kuru sphuṭa sphuṭa sphuṭa prakoṭa laphaṭa vikaṭadaṃṣṭra pūrvato rakṣatu oṃ hai hai
analyzed: kuru sphuṭa sphuṭa sphuṭa prakoṭa laphaṭa vikaṭa daṃṣṭra pūrvatas rakṣatu om hai hai

original: hai hai dinakarasahasrakālasamāhato jaya paścimato rakṣa oṃ nivi nivi pradīptajvalanajvālākāra
analyzed: hai hai dinakara sahasra kāla samāhataḥ jaya paścimatas rakṣa om nivi nivi pradīpta jvalana jvālā ākāra

original: mahākapila uttarato rakṣa oṃ vili vili mili mili garuḍi garuḍi gaurīgāndhārīviṣamohaviṣamaviṣamāṃ
analyzed: mahākapile uttaratas rakṣa om vili vili mili mili garuḍi garuḍi gaurī gāndhārī viṣa moha viṣama viṣamām

original: mahohayatu svāhā dakṣiṇato rakṣa māṃ paśya sarvabhūtabhayopadravebhyo rakṣa rakṣa
analyzed: svāhā dakṣiṇatas rakṣa mām paśya sarva bhūta bhaya upadravebhyaḥ rakṣa rakṣa

original: jaya jaya vijaya tena hīyate riputrāsāhaṅkṛtavādyato bhayanudabhayato 'bhayaṃ diśatucyutaṃ / tadudaramakhilaṃ viśantu yugaparivartasahasrasaṃkhyeyo 'staṃhaṃsamiva praviśanti raśmayaḥ / vāsudevasaṅkarṣaṇapradyumnāścāniruddhakaḥ / sarvajvarānmamaghnantu viṣṇurnārāyaṇo hariḥ //
analyzed: jaya jaya vijaya tena hīyate ripu trāsa ahaṅkṛta vādyataḥ bhaya nuda bhayataḥ bhayam diśatu cyutam tat udaram akhilam viśantu tat udaram akhilam viśantu praviśanti raśmayaḥ vāsudeva saṅkarṣaṇa pradyumnāḥ ca aniruddhakaḥ sarva jvarān mama ghnantu viṣṇuḥ nārāyaṇaḥ hariḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaiṣṇavakavacakathanaṃ nāma caturnavatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vaiṣṇavakavacakathanam nāma caturnavatyuttaraśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 195
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / salvakāmapradāṃ vidyāṃ saptarātreṇa tāṃ śṛṇu / namastubhyaṃ bhagavate vāsudevāya dhīmahi //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca salva kāma pradām vidyām sapta rātreṇa tām śṛṇu namaḥ tubhyam bhagavate vāsudevāya dhīmahi

original: pradyumnāyāniruddhāya namaḥ saṅgarṣaṇāya ca / namo vijñānamātrāya paramānandamūrtaye //
analyzed: pradyumnāya aniruddhāya namaḥ saṅgarṣaṇāya ca  namaḥ vijñānamātrāya paramānanda mūrtaye

original: ātmārāmāya śāntāya nivṛttadvaitadṛṣṭaye / tvadrūpāṇi ca sarvāṇi tasmāttubhyaṃ namo namaḥ //
analyzed: ātma ārāmāya śāntāya nivṛtta dvaita dṛṣṭaye tvad rūpāṇi ca sarvāṇi tasmāt tubhyam namaḥ namaḥ

original: hṛṣīkeśāya mahate namaste 'nantamūrtaye / yasminnidaṃ yataścaitattiṣṭhatyagre 'pi jāyate //
analyzed: hṛṣīkeśāya mahate namaḥ te nanta mūrtaye yasmin idam yatas ca etat tiṣṭhati agre jāyate

original: mṛnmayīṃ vahasi kṣoṇīṃ tasmai te brahmaṇe namaḥ / yanna spṛśanti na viduḥ manobuddhīndriyāsavaḥ / antarbahistvaṃ carasi vyomatulyaṃ namāmyaham //
analyzed: mṛd mayīm vahasi kṣoṇīm tasmai te brahmaṇe namaḥ yat na spṛśanti na viduḥ manaḥ buddhi indriya asavaḥ antar bahis tvam carasi vyoma tulyam namāmi aham

original: oṃ namo bhagavate mahāpurāṣāya mahābhūtapataye sakalasattvabhāvivrīḍanikarakamalareṇūtpalanibhadharmākhyavidyayā?
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate mahāpurāṣāya mahābhūta pataye sakala sattva bhāvi vrīḍa nikara kamala reṇu utpala nibha dharma ākhya vidyayā

original: caraṇāravindayugala parameṣṭhin namaste / avāpa vidyādharatāṃ citraketośca vidyayā //
analyzed: caraṇa aravinda yugala parameṣṭhin namaḥ te  avāpa vidyādhara tām citraketoḥ ca vidyayā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe pañcanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākye ācāra kāṇḍe pañcanavatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 196
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / avāpa japtvā cendratvaṃ viṣṇudharmākhyavidyayā / sarvāñchatrūnvinirjitya tāñca vakṣye maheśvara //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca avāpa japtvā ca indra tvam viṣṇudharma ākhya vidyayā sarvān śatrūn vinirjitya tān ca vakṣye maheśvara

original: pādayorjānunorūrvorudare hṛdyathorasi / mukhe śirasyānupūrvamoṅkā rādīni vinyaset //
analyzed: pādayoḥ jānunoḥ ūrvoḥ udare hṛdi atha urasi mukhe śirasi anupūrvam oṅkāḥ ra ādīni vinyaset

original: namo nārāyaṇāyeti viparyāsamathāpi ca / karanyāsaṃ tataḥ kuryāddvādakṣaravidyayā //
analyzed: namaḥ nārāyaṇāya iti viparyāsam atha api ca kara nyāsam tatas kuryāt dvādakṣara vidyayā

original: praṇavādiyakārāntamaṅgulyaṃ guṣṭhaparvasu / nyaseddhṛdaya oṅkāraṃ manuṃ mūrdhni samastakam //
analyzed: praṇava ādi yakāra antam aṅgulyam guṣṭha parvasu nyaset hṛdaye oṅkāram manum mūrdhni samastakam

original: oṅkārantu bhruvormadhye śikānetrādimūrdhataḥ / oṃ viṣṇave iti imaṃ mantranyāsamudīrayet //
analyzed: oṅkāram tu bhruvoḥ madhye śikā netra ādi mūrdhataḥ om viṣṇave iti imam mantra nyāsam udīrayet

original: ātmānaṃ paramaṃ dhyāyeccheṣaṃ yacchaktibhiryutam / mama rakṣāṃ hariḥ kuryānmatsyamūrtirjale 'vatu //
analyzed: ātmānam paramam dhyāyet śeṣam yat śaktibhiḥ yutam mama rakṣām hariḥ kuryāt matsya mūrtiḥ jale vatu

original: trivikramastathākāśe sthale rakṣatu vāmanaḥ / aṭavyāṃ narasiṃhastu rāmo rakṣatu parvate //
analyzed: trivikramaḥ tathā ākāśe sthale rakṣatu vāmanaḥ aṭavyām narasiṃhaḥ tu rāmaḥ rakṣatu parvate

original: bhūmau rakṣatu vārāhau vyomni nārāyaṇo 'vatu / karmabandhācca kapilo datto rogācca rakṣatu //
analyzed: bhūmau rakṣatu vārāhau vyomni nārāyaṇaḥ vatu karma bandhāt ca kapilaḥ dattaḥ rogāt ca rakṣatu

original: hayagrīvo devatābhyaḥ kumāro makaradhvajāt / nārado 'nyārcanāddevaḥ kūrmo vai nairṛte sadā //
analyzed: hayagrīvaḥ devatābhyaḥ kumāraḥ makaradhvajāt  nāradaḥ kūrmaḥ vai nairṛte sadā

original: dhanvantīraścāpathyācca nāgaḥ krodhavaśātkila / yajño rogātsamastācca vyāso 'jñānācca rakṣatu //
analyzed: dhanvantīraḥ ca apathyāt ca nāgaḥ krodha vaśāt kila yajñaḥ rogāt samastāt ca vyāsaḥ jñānāt ca rakṣatu

original: buddhaḥ pāṣaṇḍasaṃghātātkalkī rakṣatu kalmaṣāt / pāyānmadhyandine viṣṇuḥ prātarnārāyaṇo 'vatu //
analyzed: buddhaḥ pāṣaṇḍa saṃghātāt kalkī rakṣatu kalmaṣāt  pāyāt madhyandine viṣṇuḥ prātar nārāyaṇaḥ vatu

original: madhuhā cāparāhne ca sāyaṃ rakṣatu mādhavaḥ / hṛṣīkeśaḥ pradoṣe 'vyātpratyūṣe 'vyājjanārdanaḥ //
analyzed: madhu hā ca aparāhne ca sāyam rakṣatu mādhavaḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ pradoṣe vyāt pratyūṣe vyāt janārdanaḥ

original: śrīdharo 'vyādardharātre padmanābho niśīthake / cakrakaumodakībāṇā ghnantu śatrūṃśca rākṣasān //
analyzed: śrīdharaḥ vyāt ardharātre padmanābhaḥ niśīthake  cakra kaumodakī bāṇāḥ ghnantu śatrūn ca rākṣasān

original: śaṅkhaḥ padmaṃ ca śatrubhyaḥ śārṅgaṃ vai garuḍastathā / buddhīndriyamanaḥ prāṇānpāntu pārśvavibhūṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: śaṅkhaḥ padmam ca śatrubhyaḥ śārṅgam vai garuḍaḥ tathā buddhīndriya manaḥ prāṇān pāntu pārśva vibhūṣaṇaḥ

original: śeṣaḥ sarpasvarūpaśca sadā sarvatra pātu mām / vidikṣu dikṣu ca sadā nārasiṃhaśca rakṣatu //
analyzed: śeṣaḥ sarpa sva rūpaḥ ca sadā sarvatra pātu mām vidikṣu dikṣu ca sadā nārasiṃhaḥ ca rakṣatu

original: etaddhārayamāṇaśca yaṃ yaṃ paśyati cakṣuṣā / sa vaśī syādvipāpmā ca rogamukto divaṃ vrajet //
analyzed: etat dhārayamāṇaḥ ca yam yam paśyati cakṣuṣā sa vaśī syāt vipāpmā ca roga muktaḥ divam vrajet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ṣaṇṇavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ṣaṇṇavatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 197
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / gāruḍaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi garuḍena hyudīritam / kaśyapāya sumitreṇa viṣahṛdyena gāruḍaḥ //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca gāruḍam saṃpravakṣyāmi garuḍena hi udīritam kaśyapāya sumitreṇa viṣa hṛdyena gāruḍaḥ

original: pṛthivyāpastathā tejo vāyurākāśamevaca / kṣityādiṣveva vargāśca hyete vai maṇḍalādhipāḥ //
analyzed: pṛthivī apaḥ tathā tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam eva ca kṣiti ādiṣu eva vargāḥ ca hi ete vai maṇḍala adhipāḥ

original: pañcatattve sthitā devāḥ prāpyante viṣṇusevakaiḥ / dīrghasvaravibhinnāśca napuṃsakavivarjitāḥ //
analyzed: pañcatattve sthitāḥ devāḥ prāpyante viṣṇu sevakaiḥ dīrgha svara vibhinnāḥ ca napuṃsaka vivarjitāḥ

original: saṣaḍaṅgaḥ śivaḥ prokto hṛcchiraśca śikhā kramāt / kavacaṃ netramastraṃ syānnyāsaḥ svasthalasaṃsthitiḥ //
analyzed: sa ṣaṣ aṅgaḥ śivaḥ proktaḥ hṛd śiraḥ ca śikhā kramāt kavacam netram astram syāt nyāsaḥ sva sthala saṃsthitiḥ

original: sarvasiddhipradasyānte kālavahnira dho 'nilaḥ / ṣaṣṭhasvarasamāyuktamardhendusaṃyutaṃ param //
analyzed: sarva siddhi pradasya ante kāla vahniḥ a dhas nilaḥ ṣaṣṭha svara samāyuktam ardhendu saṃyutam param

original: parāparavibhinnāśca śivasyordhvādha īritāḥ / repheṇāṅgeṣu sarvatra nyāsaṃ kuryādyathāvidhi //
analyzed: parāpara vibhinnāḥ ca śivasya ūrdhva adhas īritāḥ repheṇa aṅgeṣu sarvatra nyāsam kuryāt yathāvidhi

original: hṛdi pāṇitale dehe karṇe netre karoti ca / japāttu sarvasiddhiḥ syāccaturvaktrasamāyutām //
analyzed: hṛdi pāṇi tale dehe karṇe netre karoti ca japāt tu sarva siddhiḥ syāt caturvaktra samāyutām

original: caturaśrāṃ suvistāraṃ pītavarṇāntu cintayet / pṛthivīṃ cendradevatyāṃ madhye varuṇamaṇḍalam //
analyzed: caturaśrām su vistāram pīta varṇām tu cintayet pṛthivīm ca indra devatyām madhye varuṇa maṇḍalam

original: madhye padmaṃ tathāyuktamardhacandraṃ suśītalam / indranīladyutiṃ saumyamathavāgneyamaṇḍalam //
analyzed: madhye padmam tathā ayuktam ardhacandram su śītalam indranīla dyutim saumyam athavā āgneya maṇḍalam

original: trikoṇaṃ svasthikairyuktaṃ jvālāmā lānalaṃ smaret / bhinnāñjananibhākāraṃ svavṛttaṃ bindubhūṣitam //
analyzed: trikoṇam svasthikaiḥ yuktam smaret bhinnāñjana nibha ākāram sva vṛttam bindu bhūṣitam

original: kṣīrormisadṛśākāraṃ śuddhasphaṭikavarcasam / plāvayantaṃ jagatsarvaṃ vyomāmṛtamanuṃsmaret //
analyzed: kṣīra ūrmi sadṛśa ākāram śuddha sphaṭika varcasam plāvayantam jagat sarvam vyoma amṛtam anuṃsmaret

original: vāsukiḥ śaṅkhapālaśca sthitau pārthivamaṇḍale / karkoṭaḥ padmanābhaśca vāruṇe tau vyavasthitau //
analyzed: vāsukiḥ śaṅkhapālaḥ ca sthitau pārthiva maṇḍale karkoṭaḥ padmanābhaḥ ca vāruṇe tau vyavasthitau

original: āgneye cāpi kulikastakṣaścaiva mahābjakau / vāyumaṇḍalasaṃsthau ca pañca bhūtāni vinyaset //
analyzed: āgneye ca api kulikaḥ takṣaḥ ca eva mahā abjakau vāyu maṇḍala saṃsthau ca pañca bhūtāni vinyaset

original: aṅguṣṭhādikaniṣṭhāntamanulomavilomataḥ / parvasandhiṣu ca nyasyā jayā ca vijayā tathā //
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha ādi kaniṣṭhā antam anuloma vilomataḥ parva sandhiṣu ca nyasyā jayā ca vijayā tathā

original: āsyādisvapurasthāne nyasyācchivapaḍaṅgakam / kaniṣṭhādau hṛdādau ca śikhāyāṃ karayornyaset //
analyzed: āsya ādi sva pura sthāne nyasyāt śiva paṣ aṅgakam kaniṣṭhā ādau hṛd ādau ca śikhāyām karayoḥ nyaset

original: vyāpakantu tatvapūrvaṃ kramādaṅguliparvasu / bhūtānāñca punarnyāsaḥ śivāṅgāni tathaiva ca //
analyzed: vyāpakam tu kramāt aṅguli parvasu bhūtānām ca punar nyāsaḥ śiva aṅgāni tathā eva ca

original: praṇavādinamaścānte nāmnaiva ca samanvitaḥ / sarvamantreṣu kathito vidhiḥ sthāpanapūjane //
analyzed: praṇava ādi namaḥ ca ante nāmnā eva ca samanvitaḥ sarva mantreṣu kathitaḥ vidhiḥ sthāpana pūjane

original: ādyākṣaraṃ tannāmnaśca mantro 'yaṃ parikīrtitaḥ / aṣṭānāṃ nāgajātīnāṃ mantraḥ sānnidhyakārakaḥ //
analyzed: ādya akṣaram tad nāmnaḥ ca mantraḥ yam parikīrtitaḥ aṣṭānām nāga jātīnām mantraḥ sānnidhya kārakaḥ

original: oṃ svāhā kramaśaścaiva pañcabhūtapurogatam / eṣa sākṣādbhavettārkṣyaḥ sarvakarmaprasādhakaḥ //
analyzed: om svāhā kramaśas ca eva pañcabhūta purogatam eṣa sākṣāt bhavet tārkṣyaḥ sarva karma prasādhakaḥ

original: karanyāsaṃ svaraiḥ kṛtvā śarīre tu punarnyaset / jvalantaṃ cintayetprāṇamātmasaṃśuddhikārakam //
analyzed: kara nyāsam svaraiḥ kṛtvā śarīre tu punar nyaset jvalantam cintayet prāṇam ātma saṃśuddhi kārakam

original: bījantu cintayetpaścādvarṣāntamamṛtātmakam / evañcāpyāyanaṃ kṛtvā mūrdhni sañcintya cātmanaḥ //
analyzed: bījam tu cintayet paścāt varṣa antam amṛta ātmakam evam ca āpyāyanam kṛtvā mūrdhni sañcintya ca ātmanaḥ

original: pṛthivīṃ pādayordadyāttaptakāñcanasaprabhām / aśeṣabhuvanākīrṇāṃ lokapālasamanvitām //
analyzed: pṛthivīm pādayoḥ dadyāt tapta kāñcana saprabhām aśeṣa bhuvana ākīrṇām lokapāla samanvitām

original: etāṃ bhagavatīṃ pṛthvīṃ svadehe vinyased budhaḥ / śyāmavarṇamayaṃ dhyāyetpṛthivīdviguṇaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: etām bhagavatīm pṛthvīm sva dehe vinyaset budhaḥ śyāma varṇa mayam dhyāyet pṛthivī dviguṇam bhavet

original: jvālāmālākulaṃ dīptamābrahmabhuvanāntakam / nābhigrīvāntare nyasya trikoṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ raveḥ //
analyzed: jvālā mālā ākulam dīptam ābrahma bhuvana antakam nābhi grīvā antare nyasya trikoṇam maṇḍalam raveḥ

original: bhinnāñjananibhākāraṃ nikhilaṃ vyāpya saṃsthitam / ātmamūrtisthitaṃ dhyāyedvāyavyaṃ tīkṣṇamaṇḍalam //
analyzed: bhinnāñjana nibha ākāram nikhilam vyāpya saṃsthitam ātma mūrti sthitam dhyāyet vāyavyam tīkṣṇa maṇḍalam

original: sikhopari sthitaṃ divyaṃ śuddhasphaṭikavarcasam / apramāṇamahāvyomavyāpakaṃ cāmṛtopamam //
analyzed: sikhā upari sthitam divyam śuddha sphaṭika varcasam apramāṇa mahā vyoma vyāpakam ca amṛta upamam

original: bhūtanyāsaṃ purā kṛtvā nāgānāñca yathākramam / lakārāntā binduyutā mantrā bhūtakrameṇa tu //
analyzed: bhūtanyāsam purā kṛtvā nāgānām ca yathākramam  lakāra antāḥ bindu yutāḥ mantrāḥ bhūta krameṇa tu

original: śivabījaṃ tato dadyāttato dhyāyecca maṇḍalam / yoyasya kramākhyāto maṇḍalasya vicakṣaṇaḥ / tasya taccintayedvarṇaṃ karmakāle vidhānavit //
analyzed: śivabījam tatas dadyāt tatas dhyāyet ca maṇḍalam  yaḥ yasya krama ākhyātaḥ maṇḍalasya vicakṣaṇaḥ tasya tat cintayet varṇam karma kāle vidhāna vid

original: pādapakṣaistathā cañcatkṛṣṇanāgairvibhūṣitam / tārkṣyaṃ dhyāyettato nityaṃ viṣe sthāvarajaṅgame //
analyzed: pāda pakṣaiḥ tathā cañcat kṛṣṇa nāgaiḥ vibhūṣitam tārkṣyam dhyāyet tatas nityam viṣe sthāvara jaṅgame

original: grahabhūtapiśāce ca ḍākinīyakṣarākṣase / nāgairviveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā svadehe vinyasecchivam //
analyzed: graha bhūta piśāce ca ḍākinī yakṣa rākṣase nāgaiḥ viveṣṭitam kṛtvā sva dehe vinyaset śivam

original: dvidhā nyāsaḥ samākhyāto nāgānāṃ caiva bhūtayoḥ / evaṃ dhyātvā karma kuryādātmatattvādikaṃ kramāt //
analyzed: dvidhā nyāsaḥ samākhyātaḥ nāgānām ca eva bhūtayoḥ  evam dhyātvā karma kuryāt ātma tattva ādikam kramāt

original: tritattvaṃ pratham dattvā sivatattvaṃ tataḥ param / yathā dehe tathā deve aṅgulīnāṃ ca parvasu //
analyzed: tri tattvam pratham dattvā sivatattvam tatas param yathā dehe tathā deve aṅgulīnām ca parvasu

original: dehe nyāsaṃ purā kṛtvā hyanulomavilomataḥ / kandaṃ nālaṃ tathā padmaṃ dharmaṃ jñānādimeva ca //
analyzed: dehe nyāsam purā kṛtvā hi anuloma vilomataḥ  kandam nālam tathā padmam dharmam jñāna ādim eva ca

original: dvitīyasvarasambhinnaṃ vargāntena tu pūjayet / śaumiti karṇikāmadhye mūrdhni repheṇa saṃyutam //
analyzed: dvitīya svara sambhinnam varga antena tu pūjayet śaum iti karṇikā madhye mūrdhni repheṇa saṃyutam

original: akacaṭatapayaśā vargāḥ pūrvādike nyaset / patrāntakesarānte tu dvau dvau pūrvādikau tathā //
analyzed: aka ca ṭa ta pa ya śāḥ vargāḥ pūrva ādike nyaset patra anta kesara ante tu dvau dvau pūrva ādikau tathā

original: keśare tu svarānnyasyādīśāntānṣoḍaśārcayet / vāmādyāḥ śaktayaḥ proktāstritattvantu tato nyaset //
analyzed: kesare tu svarān nyasyāt īśa antān ṣoḍaśa arcayet vāmā ādyāḥ śaktayaḥ proktāḥ tri tattvam tu tatas nyaset

original: āvāhayettato mardhni śivamaṅgaṃ tataḥ param / karṇikāyāṃ nyaseddevaṃ sāṃgaṃ tatra puraḥ saram //
analyzed: āvāhayet tatas mardhni śivam aṅgam tatas param karṇikāyām nyaset devam sa aṃgam tatra puras saram

original: pṛtivī paścime patre āpaścottarasaṃsthitāḥ / tejastu dakṣiṇe patre vāyuṃ pūrveṇa pūjayet //
analyzed: pṛtivī paścime patre āpaḥ ca uttara saṃsthitāḥ tejaḥ tu dakṣiṇe patre vāyum pūrveṇa pūjayet

original: svabījaṃ mūrtirūpantu prāguktaṃ pārakalpayet / yaṃ vāyumūlaṃ nairṛtye rephastvanalasaṃsthitaḥ //
analyzed: sva bījam mūrti rūpan tu prāc uktam pāra kalpayet yam vāyu mūlam nairṛtye rephaḥ tu anala saṃsthitaḥ

original: vaṃ ca tvīśe sadā pūjya oṃ hṛdisthañca pūjayet / tanmātrānbhūtamātrāṃstānbahireva prapūjayet //
analyzed: vaṃ ca tu īśe sadā pūjya om hṛdisthan ca pūjayet tanmātrān bhūtamātrān tān bahis eva prapūjayet

original: śivāṅgāni tataḥ paścāddhyātvā saṃpūjayettataḥ / āgneyyāṃ hṛdayaṃ pūjya śira īśānagocare //
analyzed: śiva aṅgāni tatas paścāt dhyātvā saṃpūjayet tatas āgneyyām hṛdayam pūjya śiraḥ īśāna gocare

original: nairṛtye tu śikhāṃ dadyādvāyavyāṃ kavacaṃ nyaset / astrantu bāhyato dadyānnetramuttarasaṃsthitam //
analyzed: nairṛtye tu śikhām dadyāt vāyavyām kavacam nyaset  astram tu bāhyatas dadyāt netram uttara saṃsthitam

original: patrāgre karṇikagre tu bījāni paripūjayet / anantādikulīrāntā aṣṭau nāgāḥ kramātsthitāḥ //
analyzed: patra agre karṇika agre tu bījāni paripūjayet ananta ādi kulīra antāḥ aṣṭau nāgāḥ kramāt sthitāḥ

original: pūrvādikakrameṇaiva tvīśaparyantameva ca / pūjayecca sadā mantrī vidhānena pṛthakpṛthak //
analyzed: pūrva ādika krameṇa eva tu īśa paryantam eva ca pūjayet ca sadā mantrī vidhānena pṛthak pṛthak

original: hṛdi padme vidhānena śilādau dattamaṇḍale / etatkāryaṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ nityanaimittike 'pi ca //
analyzed: hṛdi padme vidhānena śilā ādau datta maṇḍale etat kāryam samuddiṣṭam nitya naimittike ca

original: ātmānaṃ cintayennityaṃ kāmarūpaṃ manoharam / plāvayantaṃ jagatsarvaṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārakārakam //
analyzed: ātmānam cintayet nityam kāma rūpam manoharam  plāvayantam jagat sarvam sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kārakam

original: jvālāmālābhiruddīptaṃ ābrahmabhuvanāntakam / daśabāhuṃ caturvaktraṃ piṅgākṣaṃ śūlapāṇinam //
analyzed: jvālā mālābhiḥ uddīptam ā brahma bhuvana antakam daśa bāhum caturvaktram piṅga akṣam śūlapāṇinam

original: daṃṣṭrākarālamatyugraṃ trinetraṃ śaśiśekharam / bhairavantu smaretsiddhyai garuḍaṃ sarvakarmasu //
analyzed: daṃṣṭrā karālam ati ugram trinetram śaśiśekharam bhairavam tu smaret siddhyai garuḍam sarva karmasu

original: nāgānāṃ nāśanārthāya garuḍaṃ bhīmabhīṣaṇam / pādau pātālaṃ saṃsthau ca diśaḥ pakṣāstu saṃśritāḥ //
analyzed: nāgānām nāśana arthāya garuḍam bhīma bhīṣaṇam pādau pātālam saṃsthau ca diśaḥ pakṣāḥ tu saṃśritāḥ

original: sapta svargā urasi ca brahmāṇḍaṃ kaṇṭhamāśritam / pūrvādīśānaparyantaṃ śirastasya vicintayet //
analyzed: sapta svargāḥ urasi ca brahmāṇḍam kaṇṭham āśritam pūrva ādi īśāna paryantam śiraḥ tasya vicintayet

original: sadāśivaśikhāntasthaṃ śaktitritayameva ca / parātparaṃ śivaṃ sākṣāttārkṣyaṃ bhuvananāyakam //
analyzed: sadāśiva śikhā anta stham śakti tritayam eva ca parātparam śivam sākṣāt tārkṣyam bhuvana nāyakam

original: trinetramugrarūpañca viṣanāgakṣayaṅkaram / grasanaṃ bhīmavaktraṃ ca garuḍaṃ mantravigraham //
analyzed: trinetram ugra rūpam ca viṣa nāga kṣayaṅkaram grasanam bhīma vaktram ca garuḍam mantra vigraham

original: kālāgnimiva dīptaṃ ca cintayetsarvakarmasu / evaṃ nyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā yadyanmanasi cintayet //
analyzed: kālāgnim iva dīptam ca cintayet sarva karmasu evam nyāsa vidhim kṛtvā yat yat manasi cintayet

original: tattadeva bhavetsādhyaṃ naro vai garuḍāyate / pretā bhūtāstathā yakṣā nāgā gandharvarākṣasāḥ / darśanāttasya naśyanti jvarāścāturthikādayaḥ //
analyzed: tat tat eva bhavet sādhyam naraḥ vai garuḍāyate pretāḥ bhūtāḥ tathā yakṣāḥ nāgāḥ gandharva rākṣasāḥ darśanāt tasya naśyanti jvarāḥ cāturthika ādayaḥ

original: dhanvantariruvāca / evaṃ sa garuḍaṃ proce garuḍaḥ kaśyapāya ca / maheśvaro yathā gaurīṃ prāha vidyāṃ tathā śṛṇu //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca  evam sa garuḍam proce garuḍaḥ kaśyapāya ca  maheśvaraḥ yathā gaurīm prāha vidyām tathā śṛṇu

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe saptanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe saptanavatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 198
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: bhairava uvāca / nityaklinnāmatho vakṣye tripurāṃ bhuktimuktidām / oṃ hrīṃ āgaccha devi aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ rekhākāraṇam / oṃ hrīṃ kledinī bhaṃ namaḥ madanakṣobhiṇā tathā / ai yaṃ yaṃ krīṃ vā guṇarekhayā hrīṃ madanāntare ca / aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ ca nirañjanā vāgati madanāntarekhe khanetrāvalīti ca / vegavati mahāpretāsanāya ca pūjayet / oṃ hrīṃ kraiṃ naiṃ kraiṃ nityaṃ madadrave krīṃ namaḥ / aiṃ hrīṃ tripurāyai namaḥ / oṃ hrīṃ krīṃ paścimavaktraṃ oṃ aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ ca tathottaram / aiṃ hrīṃ dakṣiṇamūrdhvaṃvaktraṃ tu paścimam / oṃ hrīṃ pāśāya krīṃ aṅkuśāya aiṃ kapālāya namaḥ / ādyaṃ bhayaṃ aiṃ hrīṃ ca tathā śiraḥ tathā śikhāyai kavace / aiṃ hrīṃ krīṃ astrāyaphaṭ //
analyzed: bhairavaḥ uvāca nityaklinnām atho vakṣye tripurām bhukti mukti dām om hrīṃ āgaccha devi aim hrīṃ hrīṃ rekhā kāraṇam om hrīṃ kledinī bhaṃ namaḥ madana kṣobhiṇā tathā ai yaṃ yaṃ krīṃ vā guṇa rekhayā hrīṃ madana antare ca aim hrīṃ hrīṃ ca nirañjanā madana anta rekhe kha netra āvaliḥ iti ca vegavati mahā preta āsanāya ca pūjayet om hrīṃ kraiṃ naiṃ kraiṃ nityam mada drave krīṃ namaḥ aim hrīṃ tripurāyai namaḥ om hrīṃ tripurā

original: pūrve kāmarūpāya asitāṅgāya bhairavāya namo brahmāṇyai / dakṣiṇe cai kandāya vai namaḥ rurubhaivāya māheśvaryā vā āvāhayet //
analyzed: pūrve kāmarūpāya asita aṅgāya bhairavāya namaḥ brahmāṇyai dakṣiṇe kandāya vai namaḥ māheśvaryā vā āvāhayet

original: tathā paścime caṇḍāya vai namaḥ / kaumāryai cottare colkāya krodhāya namaḥ vaiṣṇavyai //
analyzed: tathā paścime caṇḍāya vai namaḥ kaumāryai ca uttare ca ulkāya krodhāya namaḥ vaiṣṇavyai

original: agnikoṇe aghorāyonmattabhairavāyeti vārāhyai / rakṣaḥ koṇe sārāya kapāline bhairavāya māherndyai //
analyzed: agni koṇe aghorāya unmattabhairavāya iti vārāhyai rakṣaḥ koṇe sārāya kapāline bhairavāya māherndyai

original: vāyukoṇe jālandharāya bhīṣaṇāya bhairavāya cāmuṇḍāyai / īśakoṇake vaṭukāya saṃhārañcaṇḍikāñca prapūjayet //
analyzed: vāyu koṇe jālandharāya bhīṣaṇāya bhairavāya cāmuṇḍāyai īśa koṇake vaṭukāya saṃhāran caṇḍikām ca prapūjayet

original: ratiprītikāmadevānpañcabāṇānyajedatha / dhyānārcanājjapyahomāddevī siddhā ca sarvadā //
analyzed: rati prīti kāma devān pañcabāṇān yajet atha dhyāna arcanāt japya homāt devī siddhā ca sarvadā

original: nityā ca tripurā vyādhiṃ hanyājjvālāmukhīkramāt / jvālāmukhīkramaṃ vakṣye sā pūjyā madhyataḥ śubhā //
analyzed: nityā ca tripurā vyādhim hanyāt jvālāmukhī kramāt  jvālāmukhī kramam vakṣye sā pūjyā madhyatas śubhā

original: nityāruṇā madanāturā mahāmohā prakṛtyapi / mahendrāṇī ca kalanākarṣiṇī bhāratī tathā //
analyzed: nityāruṇā madanāturā mahāmohā prakṛtiḥ api mahendrāṇī ca kalanākarṣiṇī bhāratī tathā

original: brahmāṇī caiva māheśī kaumārī vaiṣṇavī tathā / vārāhī caiva māhendrī cāmuṇḍā cāparājitā //
analyzed: brahmāṇī ca eva māheśī kaumārī vaiṣṇavī tathā vārāhī ca eva māhendrī cāmuṇḍā ca aparājitā

original: vijayā cājitā caivamohinī tvaritā tathā / stambhinī jṛmbhiṇī pūjyā kālikā padmabāhyataḥ / jvālāmukhīkramaṃ cārcedviṣādiharaṇaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: vijayā ca ajitā ca eva mohinī tvaritā tathā stambhinī jṛmbhiṇī pūjyā kālikā padma bāhyatas jvālāmukhī kramam ca arcet viṣa ādi haraṇam bhavet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe aṣṭanavatyadhikaśatatamodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe aṣṭanavatyadhikaśatatamaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 199
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: bhairava uvāca / atha cūḍāmaṇiṃ vakṣye śubhāśubhaviśuddhaye / sūryaṃ devīṃ gaṇaṃ soma smṛtvā tu vilikhennaraḥ //
analyzed: bhairavaḥ uvāca atha cūḍāmaṇim vakṣye śubha aśubha viśuddhaye sūryam devīm gaṇam soma smṛtvā tu vilikhet naraḥ

original: trirekhā gomūrtrikābhā athavā praśravākyataḥ / diśasthānaprasūto vā dhvajādīngaṇayetkramāt //
analyzed: tri rekhā go mūrtrikā ābhā athavā praśra vākyataḥ diśa sthāna prasūtaḥ vā dhvaja ādīn gaṇayet kramāt

original: dhvajo dhūmo 'tha siṃhaśca śvā vṛṣaḥ kharadantinau / dhvāṅkṣaśca aṣṭamo jñeyo nāma mantraiśca tānnyaset //
analyzed: siṃhaḥ ca śvā vṛṣaḥ khara dantinau dhvāṅkṣaḥ ca aṣṭamaḥ jñeyaḥ nāma mantraiḥ ca tān nyaset

original: dhvajasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājyacintādhanādikam / dhvajasthāne sthito dhūmro dhātucintā ca lābhakṛt //
analyzed: dhvaja sthāne dhvajam dṛṣṭvā rājya cintā dhana ādikam dhvaja sthāne sthitaḥ dhūmraḥ dhātu cintā ca lābha kṛt

original: dhvajasthāne sthite siṃhe dhanalābhādikaṃ bhavet / sthite śunidhvajasthāne dāsīcintāsukhādikam //
analyzed: dhvaja sthāne sthite siṃhe dhana lābha ādikam bhavet sthite śuni dhvaja sthāne dāsī cintā sukha ādikam

original: dhvajasthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānacintā ca lābhakam / dhvajasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥ khakleśādikaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: dhvaja sthāne vṛṣam dṛṣṭvā sthāna cintā ca lābhakam dhvaja sthāne kharam dṛṣṭvā duḥ kha kleśa ādikam bhavet

original: dhvajasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānacintājayādikam / dhvajasthāne tathā dhvāṅkṣe kleśacintā dhanakṣayaḥ //
analyzed: dhvaja sthāne gajam dṛṣṭvā sthāna cintā jaya ādikam  dhvaja sthāne tathā dhvāṅkṣe kleśa cintā dhana kṣayaḥ

original: dhūmrasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvaṃ duḥ khaṃ tato dhanam / dhūmre dhūmraṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā kaliduḥ khādikaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: dhūmra sthāne dhvajam dṛṣṭvā pūrvam duḥ kham tatas dhanam  dhūmre dhūmram tathā dṛṣṭvā kali duḥ kha ādikam bhavet

original: dhūmrasthāne sthite siṃhe manaścintādhanādikam / dhūmrasthāne śuni sthite jayalābhādikaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: dhūmra sthāne sthite siṃhe manaḥ cintā dhana ādikam dhūmra sthāne śuni sthite jaya lābha ādikam bhavet

original: dhūmrasthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā nārīgo 'śvadhanādikam / dhūmrasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā vyādhiścāpi dhanakṣayaḥ //
analyzed: dhūmra sthāne vṛṣam dṛṣṭvā śvadhana ādikam  dhūmra sthāne kharam dṛṣṭvā vyādhiḥ ca api dhana kṣayaḥ

original: dhūmrasthāne gaje dṛṣṭe rājyalābhajayādikam / dhūmrasthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe dhanarājyavināśanam //
analyzed: dhūmrasthāne gaje dṛṣṭe rājya lābha jaya ādikam dhūmrasthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe dhana rājya vināśanam

original: siṃhasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājyalābhādi nirdiśet / siṃhasthāne sthite dhūmre kanyāprāptirdhanādikam //
analyzed: siṃhasthāne dhvajam dṛṣṭvā rājya lābha ādi nirdiśet siṃhasthāne sthite dhūmre kanyā prāptiḥ dhana ādikam

original: siṃhasthāne sthite siṃhe jayo mitrasamāgamaḥ / kauleyake siṃhagate strīcintā grāmalābhakam //
analyzed: siṃha sthāne sthite siṃhe jayaḥ mitra samāgamaḥ kauleyake siṃha gate strī cintā grāma lābhakam

original: siṃha sthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā gṛhakṣetrārthalābhakam / siṃhasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā grāmasvāmitvameva ca //
analyzed: siṃha sthāne vṛṣam dṛṣṭvā gṛha kṣetra artha lābhakam siṃha sthāne gajam dṛṣṭvā grāma svāmi tvam eva ca

original: siṃhasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā ārogyāyuḥ sukhādikam / siṃhasthānesthite dhvāṅkṣe kanyādhānyaguṇādikam //
analyzed: siṃha sthāne gajam dṛṣṭvā ārogya āyuḥ sukha ādikam siṃha sthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe kanyā dhānya guṇa ādikam

original: śunaḥ sthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānacintāsukhādikam / śunaḥ sthāne sthite dhūmre kalahaṃ kāryanāśanam //
analyzed: śunaḥ sthāne dhvajam dṛṣṭvā sthāna cintā sukha ādikam śunaḥ sthāne sthite dhūmre kalaham kārya nāśanam

original: śunaḥ sthāna sthite siṃhe kāryāsiddhirbhaviṣyati / sthite śuni śunaḥ sthāne dhananāśo bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: śunaḥ sthāna sthite siṃhe kārya asiddhiḥ bhaviṣyati sthite śuni śunaḥ sthāne dhana nāśaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: śunaḥ sthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā rogī rogādvi mucyate / śunaḥ sthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā kalahasya bhayaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: śunaḥ sthāne vṛṣam dṛṣṭvā rogī rogāt vi mucyate śunaḥ sthāne kharam dṛṣṭvā kalahasya bhayam bhavet

original: śunaḥ sthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā putrabhāryāsamāgamaḥ / śvasthāne ca sthite dhvāṅkṣe pīḍāsyātkulanāśanam //
analyzed: śunaḥ sthāne gajam dṛṣṭvā putra bhāryā samāgamaḥ śva sthāne ca sthite dhvāṅkṣe pīḍā asyāt kula nāśanam

original: vṛṣasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājapūjāsukhādikam / vṛṣasthāne sthite dhūmre rājapūjāsukhādikam //
analyzed: vṛṣa sthāne dhvajam dṛṣṭvā rāja pūjā sukha ādikam vṛṣa sthāne sthite dhūmre rāja pūjā sukha ādikam

original: vṛṣasthāne sthite siṃhe saubhāgyañca dhanādikam / sthite śuni vṛṣasthāne balaśrīkāma īritaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣa sthāne sthite siṃhe saubhāgyam ca dhana ādikam sthite śuni vṛṣa sthāne bala śrī kāmaḥ īritaḥ

original: vṛṣasthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā kīrtituṣṭisukhādikam / vṛṣasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahālābhādikaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: vṛṣa sthāne vṛṣam dṛṣṭvā kīrti tuṣṭi sukha ādikam vṛṣa sthāne kharam dṛṣṭvā mahā lābha ādikam bhavet

original: vṛṣasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā strīgajādisamāgamaḥ / vṛṣasthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe sthānamānasamāgamaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣa sthāne gajam dṛṣṭvā strī gaja ādi samāgamaḥ vṛṣa sthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe sthāna māna samāgamaḥ

original: kharasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā rogaśokādikaṃ bhavet / kharasthāne sthite dhūmre taskarādibhayaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: khara sthāne dhvajam dṛṣṭvā roga śoka ādikam bhavet khara sthāne sthite dhūmre taskara ādi bhayam bhavet

original: kharasthāne sthite siṃhe pūjāśrīvijayādikam / sthite śunikharasthāne santāpadhananāśanam //
analyzed: khara sthāne sthite siṃhe pūjā śrī vijaya ādikam sthite śuni khara sthāne santāpa dhana nāśanam

original: kharasthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sukhaṃ priyasamāgamaḥ / kharasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥ khīpīḍādi nirdiśet //
analyzed: khara sthāne vṛṣam dṛṣṭvā sukham priya samāgamaḥ khara sthāne kharam dṛṣṭvā duḥ khī pīḍā ādi nirdiśet

original: kharasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā sukhaputtrādikaṃ bhavet / kharasthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe kalaho vyādhireva ca //
analyzed: khara sthāne gajam dṛṣṭvā sukha puttra ādikam bhavet khara sthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe kalahaḥ vyādhiḥ eva ca

original: gajasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā strījayaśrīsukhādikam / gajasthānesthite dhūmre dhanadhānyasamāgamaḥ //
analyzed: gaja sthāne dhvajam dṛṣṭvā strī jaya śrī sukha ādikam gaja sthāne sthite dhūmre dhana dhānya samāgamaḥ

original: gajasthāne sthite siṃhe jayasiddhisamāgamaḥ / sthite śuni gajasthāne ārogyaṃ sukhasampadaḥ //
analyzed: gaja sthāne sthite siṃhe jaya siddhi samāgamaḥ sthite śuni gaja sthāne ārogyam sukha sampadaḥ

original: gajasthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājamānadhanādikam / gajasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvaṃ duḥ khaṃ tataḥ sukham //
analyzed: gaja sthāne vṛṣam dṛṣṭvā rājamāna dhana ādikam gaja sthāne kharam dṛṣṭvā pūrvam duḥ kham tatas sukham

original: gajasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣetradhānyasukhādikam / gajasthānesthite dhvāṅkṣe dhanadhānyasamāgamaḥ //
analyzed: gaja sthāne gajam dṛṣṭvā kṣetra dhānya sukha ādikam gaja sthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe dhana dhānya samāgamaḥ

original: dhvāṅkṣasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāryanāśo bhaviṣyati / dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite dhūmre kaliduḥ khaṃ gamiṣyati //
analyzed: dhvāṅkṣa sthāne dhvajam dṛṣṭvā kārya nāśaḥ bhaviṣyati dhvāṅkṣa sthāne sthite dhūmre kaliduḥ kham gamiṣyati

original: dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite siṃhe vigraho duḥ khameva ca / dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite śvāne gṛhabhaṅgabhayādikam //
analyzed: dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite siṃhe vigrahaḥ duḥ kham eva ca dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite śvāne gṛha bhaṅga bhaya ādikam

original: dhvāṅkṣasthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānabhraṃśabhayādikam / dhvāṅkṣasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhananāśaparājayau //
analyzed: dhvāṅkṣa sthāne vṛṣam dṛṣṭvā sthāna bhraṃśa bhaya ādikam dhvāṅkṣa sthāne kharam dṛṣṭvā dhana nāśa parājayau

original: dhvāṅkṣasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhanakīrtyādikaṃ bhavet / dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe videśagamanādikam //
analyzed: dhvāṅkṣa sthāne gajam dṛṣṭvā dhana kīrti ādikam bhavet dhvāṅkṣa sthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe videśa gamana ādikam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe navanavatyadhikaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 200
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: bhairava uvāca / vakṣye vāyujayaṃ devi jayā jayavideśakam / vāyvagnijalaśakrākhyaṃ maṅgalānāñcatuṣṭayam //
analyzed: bhairavaḥ uvāca vakṣye vāyujayam devi jayā jayavideśakam vāyu agni jala śakra ākhyam maṅgalānām catuṣṭayam

original: vāmadakṣiṇasaṃsthaśca vāyuśca bahulo bhavet / ūrdhvavāhī bhavedagniradhastu varuṇo bhavet //
analyzed: vāma dakṣiṇa saṃsthaḥ ca vāyuḥ ca bahulaḥ bhavet ūrdhva vāhī bhavet agniḥ adhas tu varuṇaḥ bhavet

original: mahendro madhyasaṃsthastu śuklapakṣe tu vāmagaḥ / kṛṣṇapakṣe dakṣiṇaga udayasya tryahantryaham //
analyzed: mahendraḥ madhya saṃsthaḥ tu śuklapakṣe tu vāma gaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣe dakṣiṇa gaḥ udayasya tri ahan tri aham

original: vahetpratipadādye ca viparīte bhavennatiḥ / udayaḥ sūryamārgeṇa candreṇāstamayo yadi //
analyzed: vahet pratipad ādye ca viparīte bhavet natiḥ udayaḥ sūrya mārgeṇa candreṇa astamayaḥ yadi

original: vardhante guṇasaṃghātā anyathā vighnamaucitam / saṃkrāntyaḥ ṣoḍaśaproktā divā rātrau varānane //
analyzed: vardhante guṇa saṃghātāḥ anyathā vighnam aucitam saṃkrāntyaḥ ṣoḍaśa proktāḥ divā rātrau varānane

original: yadā ca saṃkramedvāyurardhārdhaprahare sthitaḥ / svāsthyāhānistadā jñeyā vāyurbhramati dehiṣu //
analyzed: yadā ca saṃkramet vāyuḥ ardha ardha prahare sthitaḥ svāsthyā hāniḥ tadā jñeyā vāyuḥ bhramati dehiṣu

original: dakṣiṇe ca puṭe vāyurhito bhojanamaithune / khaḍgahasto jayedyuddhe ripūnkāmasamanvitaḥ //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe ca puṭe vāyuḥ hitaḥ bhojana maithune khaḍga hastaḥ jayet yuddhe ripūn kāma samanvitaḥ

original: vāmeva gamanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvakāryeṣu bhūṣitam / vāyurvahati tatrasthaḥ praśro bhūtasya śobhanaḥ //
analyzed: vāmā iva gamanam śreṣṭham sarva kāryeṣu bhūṣitam vāyuḥ vahati tatrasthaḥ praśraḥ bhūtasya śobhanaḥ

original: māhendre vāruṇe vāte ko 'pi doṣo na jāyate / anāvṛṣṭirdakṣavāhe vṛṣṭiḥ syādvāmavāhake //
analyzed: māhendre vāruṇe vāte kaḥ pi doṣaḥ na jāyate anāvṛṣṭiḥ dakṣa vāhe vṛṣṭiḥ syāt vāma vāhake

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe dviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 201
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: dhanvantariruvāca / hayāyurvedamākhyāsye hayaṃ sarvārthalakṣaṇam / kākatuṇḍaḥ kṛṣṇajihvo vṛkṣāsyaścoṣṇatālukaḥ //
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ uvāca hayāyurvedam ākhyāsye hayam sarva artha lakṣaṇam kākatuṇḍaḥ kṛṣṇa jihvaḥ vṛkṣa āsyaḥ ca uṣṇa tālukaḥ

original: karālo hīnadantaśca śṛṅgī viraladantakaḥ / ekāṇḍaścaiva jātāṇḍaḥ kañcukī dvikhurī stanī //
analyzed: karālaḥ hīna dantaḥ ca śṛṅgī virala dantakaḥ eka aṇḍaḥ ca eva jāta aṇḍaḥ kañcukī dvi khurī stanī

original: mārjārapādo vyāghrābhaḥ kuṣṭhavidradhisannibhaḥ / yamajo vāmanaścaiva mārjāraḥ kapilocanaḥ //
analyzed: mārjārapādaḥ vyāghra ābhaḥ kuṣṭha vidradhi sannibhaḥ yama jaḥ vāmanaḥ ca eva mārjāraḥ kapi locanaḥ

original: etaddoṣī hayastyājya uttamo 'śvasturuṣkajaḥ / madhyamaḥ pañcahastaśca kanīyāṃśca trihastakaḥ //
analyzed: etad doṣī hayaḥ tyājyaḥ śvas turuṣka jaḥ  madhyamaḥ pañca hastaḥ ca kanīyān ca tri hastakaḥ

original: asaṃhatā ye ca vāhā hrasvakarṇāstathaiva ca / śabalābhāḥ prabhāveṣu na dīnāścirajīvinaḥ //
analyzed: asaṃhatāḥ ye ca vāhāḥ hrasva karṇāḥ tathā eva ca śabala ābhāḥ prabhāveṣu na dīnāḥ cira jīvinaḥ

original: revantapūjanāddhomādrakṣyāśca dvijabhājenāt / saralaṃ nimbapatrāṇi guggulaṃ sarṣapānghṛtam? //
analyzed: revanta pūjanāt homāt rakṣyāḥ ca saralam nimba patrāṇi guggulam sarṣapān ghṛtam

original: tilañcaiva vacāṃ higuṃ badhnīyādvājino gale / āgantujaṃ doṣajantu vraṇaṃ dvividhamīritam //
analyzed: tilam ca eva vacām higum badhnīyāt vājinaḥ gale āgantu jam doṣa jantu vraṇam dvividham īritam

original: cirapākaṃ vātajantu śleṣmajaṃ kṣiprapākakam? / kaṇṭhadāhātmakaṃ pittācchoṇitānmandavedanam //
analyzed: cira pākam vāta jantu śleṣma jam kṣipra pākakam kaṇṭha dāha ātmakam pittāt śoṇitāt manda vedanam

original: āgantujantu śastrādyairduṣṭavraṇaviśodhanam / eraṇḍamūlaṃ dviniśaṃ citrakaṃ viśvabheṣajam //
analyzed: āgantu jantu śastra ādyaiḥ duṣṭavraṇa viśodhanam eraṇḍa mūlam dvi niśam citrakam viśvabheṣajam

original: rasonaṃ saindhavaṃ vāpi takrakāñjikapoṣitam / tilasaktukapiṇḍikā dadhiyuktā sasaindhavā / nimbapatrayutaṃ piṇḍaṃ vraṇaśodhanaropaṇam //
paṭolaṃ nimbapatrañca vacā citrakameva ca / pippalīśṛṅgaverañca cūrṇamekatra kārayet //
analyzed: paṭolam nimba patram ca vacā citrakam eva ca cūrṇam ekatra kārayet

original: etatpānātkrimiśleṣmamandānilavināśanam / nimbapatraṃ paṭo lañca triphalā khadiraṃ tathā //
analyzed: etad pānāt krimi śleṣma manda anila vināśanam  nimba patram paṭaḥ lañca triphalā khadiram tathā

original: kvāthayitvā tato vāhaṃ sṛtaraktaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ / tryahameva pridātavyaṃ hayakuṣṭhopaśāntaye //
analyzed: kvāthayitvā tatas vā aham sṛta raktam vicakṣaṇaḥ tri aham eva haya kuṣṭha upaśāntaye

original: savraṇeṣu ca kuṣṭheṣu tailaṃ sarṣapajaṃ hitam / laśunādikaṣāyaśca pānabhuktyupaśāntaye //
analyzed: sa vraṇeṣu ca kuṣṭheṣu tailam sarṣapa jam hitam laśunādi kaṣāyaḥ ca pāna bhukti upaśāntaye

original: mātuluṅgarasopetaṃ māṃsīnāṃ rasakena vā / sadyo dadyāttatra nasyamanyairvātaiḥ susaṃyutaiḥ //
analyzed: mātuluṅga rasa upetam māṃsīnām rasakena vā sadyas dadyāt tatra nasyam anyaiḥ vātaiḥ su saṃyutaiḥ

original: paladvayaṃ prathame 'hni ekaikapalavṛddhitaḥ / yāvaddināni pūrṇāni palānyaṣṭādaśottame //
analyzed: pala dvayam prathame hni ekaika pala vṛddhitaḥ yāvat dināni pūrṇāni palāni aṣṭādaśa uttame

original: adhame 'ṣṭapalāni syurmadhyame syuścaturdaśa / śarannidāghayornaivadeyaṃ naiva tu dāpayet //
analyzed: adhame ṣṭa palāni syuḥ madhyame syuḥ caturdaśa śarad nidāghayoḥ na eva deyam na eva tu dāpayet

original: tailena vātike roge śarkarājyapayonvitaiḥ / kaṭutailaiḥ kaphe vyoṣaiḥ pitte catriphalāmbubhiḥ //
analyzed: tailena vātike roge śarkarā ājya payaḥ nvitaiḥ kaṭutailaiḥ kaphe vyoṣaiḥ pitte ca triphalā ambubhiḥ

original: śāliṣaṣṭikadugdhāśī hayo hina jugupsitaḥ / pakvajambūnibho hemavarṇo 'śvo na jugupsitaḥ //
analyzed: śāli ṣaṣṭika dugdha āśī hayaḥ jugupsitaḥ pakva jambu nibhaḥ śvas na jugupsitaḥ

original: ardhapraharaṇe dhurye gugguluṃ prāśayeddhayam / bhojayetpāyasaṃ dugdhaṃ satvaraṃ susthiro hayaḥ //
analyzed: ardha praharaṇe dhurye guggulum prāśayet hayam bhojayet pāyasam dugdham sa tvaram su sthiraḥ hayaḥ

original: vikāre bhojane dugdhaṃ śālyannaṃ vātale dadet / karṣamāṃsarasaiḥ pitte madhumudgarasājyakaiḥ //
analyzed: vikāre bhojane dugdham śāli annam vātale dadet karṣa māṃsa rasaiḥ pitte madhu mudga rasa ājyakaiḥ

original: kaphe mudgānkulatthānvā kaṭutiktānkaphe haye / bādhirye vyādhite grāse tridoṣādau tu gugguluḥ //
analyzed: kaphe mudgān kulatthān vā kaṭu tiktān kaphe haye bādhirye vyādhite grāse tridoṣa ādau tu gugguluḥ

original: ghāsairdūrvā sarvaroge prathame 'hni palaṃ dadet / vivardhayettataḥ karṣamekāhni palapañcakam //
analyzed: ghāsaiḥ dūrvā sarva roge prathame hni palam dadet vivardhayet tatas karṣam eka ahni pala pañcakam

original: pāne ca bhojane caiva aśītipalakaṃ param / madhye ṣaṣṭiścādhameṣu catvāriṃśacca bhogiṣu //
analyzed: pāne ca bhojane ca eva aśīti palakam param madhye ṣaṣṭiḥ ca adhameṣu catvāriṃśat ca bhogiṣu

original: vraṇe kuṣṭheṣu khañjeṣu triphalākvāthasaṃyutam / mandāgnau śotharoge ca gavāṃ mūtreṇa yojitam //
analyzed: vraṇe kuṣṭheṣu khañjeṣu triphalā kvātha saṃyutam manda agnau śotha roge ca gavām mūtreṇa yojitam

original: vātapitte vraṇe vyādhau gokṣīraṃ ghṛtasaṃyutam / deyaṃ kṛśānāṃ puṣṭyarthaṃ māṃsairyuktaṃ ca bhojanam //
analyzed: vāta pitte vraṇe vyādhau go kṣīram ghṛta saṃyutam deyam kṛśānām puṣṭi artham māṃsaiḥ yuktam ca bhojanam

original: supiṣṭāyāḥ pradātavyaṃ guḍūcyāḥ palapañcakam / prabhāte ghṛtasaṃyuktaṃ śaradgīṣme ca vājinām //
analyzed: supiṣṭāyāḥ pradātavyam guḍūcyāḥ pala pañcakam prabhāte ghṛta saṃyuktam śarad gīṣme ca vājinām

original: rogaghnaṃ puṣṭidaṃ cāpi balatejovivardhanam / tadevāśvāyadātavyaṃ kṣīrayuktamathāpi vā //
analyzed: roga ghnam puṣṭi dam ca api bala tejaḥ vivardhanam tat eva aśvāya dātavyam kṣīra yuktam atha api vā

original: guḍūcīkalpayogena śatāvaryaśvagandhayoḥ / catvāri trīṇi madhyasya jaghanyasya palāni hi //
analyzed: guḍūcī kalpa yogena śatāvarī aśvagandhayoḥ  catvāri trīṇi madhyasya jaghanyasya palāni hi

original: akasmādyatra vāhānāmekarūpaṃ yadā bhavet / mriyate ca yadā kṣipramupasargaṃ tamādiśet //
analyzed: akasmāt yatra vāhānām eka rūpam yadā bhavet mriyate ca yadā kṣipram upasargam tam ādiśet

original: homādyai rakṣayā viprabhojanairbalikarmaṇā / śāntyopasargaśāntiḥ syāddharītakyādikalpataḥ //
analyzed: homa ādyaiḥ rakṣayā vipra bhojanaiḥ bali karmaṇā śāntyā upasarga śāntiḥ syāt harītakyādi kalpataḥ

original: harītakī gavāṃ mūtraistailena lavaṇānvitā / ādau pañca tataḥ pañca vṛddhyā pūrṇaśatāvadhi / uttamā ca śataṃ mātrāstvaśītiḥ ṣaṣṭireva vā //
analyzed: harītakī gavām mūtraiḥ tailena lavaṇa anvitā ādau pañca tatas pañca vṛddhyā pūrṇa śata avadhi uttamā ca śatam mātrāḥ tu aśītiḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ eva vā

original: gajāyurvedamākhyāsye uktāḥ kalpā gaje hitāḥ / gaje caturguṇā mātrāstābhirgajarugardanaḥ //
analyzed: gajāyurvedam ākhyāsye uktāḥ kalpāḥ gaje hitāḥ gaje caturguṇāḥ mātrāḥ tābhiḥ gaja ruj ardanaḥ

original: gajo pasargavyādhīnāṃ śamanaṃ śāntikarma ca / pūjayitvā surānviprānratnairgāṃ kapilāṃ dadet //
analyzed: śamanam śānti karma ca pūjayitvā surān viprān ratnaiḥ gām kapilām dadet

original: dantidantadvaye mālāṃ nibandhīyādupoṣitaḥ / mantreṇa mantritānvaidyairvacāsiddhārthakāṃstathā //
analyzed: danti danta dvaye mālām nibandhīyāt upoṣitaḥ mantreṇa mantritān vaidyaiḥ vacā siddhārthakān tathā

original: sūryādiśivadurgāśrīviṣṇvarcā rakṣayedgajam / baliṃ dadyācca bhūtebhyaḥ snāpayecca caturghaṭaiḥ //
analyzed: sūrya ādi śiva durgā śrī viṣṇu arcā rakṣayet gajam balim dadyāt ca bhūtebhyaḥ snāpayet ca catur ghaṭaiḥ

original: bhojanaṃ mantritaṃ dadyādbhasmanoddhūnayedgajamam / bhūtarakṣā śubhā medhyā vāraṇaṃ rakṣayetsadā //
analyzed: bhojanam mantritam dadyāt bhasmanā uddhūnayet gajamam  bhūta rakṣā śubhā medhyā vāraṇam rakṣayet sadā

original: triphalāpañcakole ca daśamūlaṃ viḍaṅgakam / śatāvarīguḍūcī ca nimbavāsakakiṃśukāḥ //
analyzed: triphalā pañcakole ca daśamūlam viḍaṅgakam śatāvarī guḍūcī ca nimba vāsaka kiṃśukāḥ

original: gajarogavināśāya hito rūkṣaḥ kaṣāyakaḥ / āyurvedadvayoktānāmuktaṃ saṃkṣepasārataḥ //
analyzed: gaja roga vināśāya hitaḥ rūkṣaḥ kaṣāyakaḥ āyurveda dvaya uktānām uktam saṃkṣepa sārataḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gajāśvāyurvedanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe gajāśvāyurvedanirūpaṇam nāma ekādhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 202
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / ekaṃ punarnavāmūlamapāmārgasya vā śiva / sarasaṃ yoniniḥ kṣiptaṃ varāṅgasya vyathāṃ haret / prasūtivedanāñcaiva taruṇīnāṃ vyathāṃ haret //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca  ekam punarnavā mūlam apāmārgasya vā śiva sa rasam yoni niḥ kṣiptam varāṅgasya vyathām haret  prasūti vedanām ca eva taruṇīnām vyathām haret

original: bhūmi kūṣmāṇḍamūlaṃ vai śālicūrṇamathāpi vā / saptāhaṃ dugdhapītaṃ syātstrīṇāṃ bahupayaskaram //
analyzed: bhūmi kūṣmāṇḍa mūlam vai śāli cūrṇam atha api vā sapta aham dugdha pītam syāt strīṇām bahu payaskaram

original: rudrendravāruṇīmulaṃ lepātstrīstanavedanā / naśyeta ghṛtapakvā ca kāryāvaśyantu polikā //
analyzed: rudra indravāruṇī mulam lepāt strī stana vedanā naśyeta ghṛta pakvā ca

original: bhakṣitā sā maheśāna yoniśūlaṃ vināśayet / pralepitā kāravellamūlenaiva vinirgatā //
analyzed: bhakṣitā sā maheśāna yoni śūlam vināśayet pralepitā kāravella mūlena eva vinirgatā

original: yoniḥ praveśamāyāti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / nīlīpaṭolamūlāni sājyāni tilavāriṇā //
analyzed: yoniḥ praveśam āyāti na atra kāryā vicāraṇā nīlī paṭola mūlāni sa ājyāni tila vāriṇā

original: piṣṭānyeṣāṃ pralepo vai jvālāgardabharāganat / pāṭhāmūlaṃ rudra pītaṃ piṣṭaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā //
analyzed: piṣṭāni eṣām pralepaḥ vai jvālā gardabha rāganat  pāṭhā mūlam rudra pītam piṣṭam taṇḍula vāriṇā

original: pāparogaharaṃ syācca kuṣṭhapānaṃ tathaiva ca / vāsyodakañca samadhu pītamantargatasya vai //
analyzed: pāpa roga haram syāt ca kuṣṭha pānam tathā eva ca vāsya udakam ca sa madhu pītam antargatasya vai

original: pāparogasya santāpanivṛktiṃ kurute śiva / ghṛtatulyā rudra lākṣā pītā kṣīreṇa vai saha //
analyzed: pāpa rogasya santāpa nivṛktim kurute śiva ghṛta tulyā rudra lākṣā pītā kṣīreṇa vai saha

original: pradaraṃ harate rogaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / dvijayaṣṭī trikaṭukaṃ cūrṇaṃ pītaṃ harecchiva //
analyzed: pradaram harate rogam na atra kāryā vicāraṇā dvijayaṣṭī trikaṭukam cūrṇam pītam haret śiva

original: tilakvāthena saṃyuktaṃ raktagulmaṃ striyā hara / kusumasya nibaddhañca taruṇīnāṃ maheśvara //
analyzed: tila kvāthena saṃyuktam rakta gulmam striyāḥ hara kusumasya nibaddham ca taruṇīnām maheśvara

original: raktotpalasya vai kandaṃ-śarkarātilasaṃyutam / pītaṃ saśarkaraṃ strīṇāṃ dhārayedgarbhapātanam //
analyzed: raktotpalasya vai kandam śarkarā tila saṃyutam pītam sa śarkaram strīṇām dhārayet garbha pātanam

original: raktastrāvasya nāśaḥ syācchītodakaniṣevaṇāt / pītantu kāñjika rudra kvathitaṃ śarapuṅkhayā //
analyzed: rakta strāvasya nāśaḥ syāt śīta udaka niṣevaṇāt pītantu kāñjika rudra kvathitam śarapuṅkhayā

original: hiṅgustraindhavasaṃyuktaṃ śīghraṃ strīṇāṃ prasūtikṛt / mātuluṅgasya vai mūlaṃ kaṭibaddhaṃ prasūtikṛt //
analyzed: hiṅguḥ traindhava saṃyuktam śīghram strīṇām prasūti kṛt mātuluṅgasya vai mūlam kaṭi baddham prasūti kṛt

original: apāmārgasya vai mūle garbhavatyāstu nāmataḥ / utpāṭyamāne sakale puttraḥ syādānyathā sutā //
analyzed: apāmārgasya vai mūle garbhavatyāḥ tu nāmataḥ utpāṭyamāne sakale puttraḥ syāt ā anyathā sutā

original: apāmārgasya vai mūle nārīṇāṃ śirasi sthite / garbhaśūlaṃ vinaśyeta nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: apāmārgasya vai mūle nārīṇām śirasi sthite garbha śūlam vinaśyeta na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: karpūra-madanaphala-madhukaiḥ pūritaḥ śiva / yoniḥ subhā syādvṛddhāyā yuvatyāḥ kiṃ punarhara //
analyzed: karpūra madana phala madhukaiḥ pūritaḥ śiva yoniḥ subhā syāt vṛddhāyāḥ yuvatyāḥ kim punar hara

original: yasya bālasya tilakaḥ kṛto gaurocanākhyayā / śarkarā-kuṣṭhapānañca dattaṃ sa syācca nirbhayaḥ / viṣa-bhūta-grahādibhyo vyādhibhyo bālakaḥ śiva //
analyzed: yasya bālasya tilakaḥ kṛtaḥ gaurocanā ākhyayā śarkarā kuṣṭha pānam ca dattam sa syāt ca nirbhayaḥ viṣa bhūta graha ādibhyaḥ vyādhibhyaḥ bālakaḥ śiva

original: śaṅkha-nābhi-vacā-kuṣṭha-lohānāṃ dhāraṇaṃ sadā / bālānāmupasargebhyo rudra rakṣākaraṃ bhavet //
analyzed: śaṅkhanābhi vacā kuṣṭha lohānām dhāraṇam sadā bālānām upasargebhyaḥ rudra rakṣā karam bhavet

original: palāśacūrṇaṃ samadhu gavyājyāmalakānvitam / saviḍaṅgaṃ pītamātraṃ naraṃ kuryānmahāmatim //
analyzed: palāśa cūrṇam sa madhu gavya ājya āmalaka anvitam sa viḍaṅgam pīta mātram naram kuryāt mahāmatim

original: māsaikena mahādeva jarā-maraṇavarjitaḥ //
analyzed: māsa ekena mahādeva jarā maraṇa varjitaḥ

original: palāśabījaṃ saghṛtaṃ tila-madhvanvitaṃ samam / saptāhaṃ bhakṣitaṃ rudra jarāṃ nayati saṃkṣayam //
rudrāmalakacūrṇaṃ vai madhu-taila ghṛtānvitam / jagdhvā māsaṃ yuvā syācca naro vāgīśvarī bhavet //
analyzed: rudra āmalaka cūrṇam vai ghṛta anvitam jagdhvā māsam yuvā syāt ca naraḥ vāc īśvarī bhavet

original: śivāmalakacūrṇaṃ vai madhunā udakena vā / balāni kuryānnāsāyāḥ pratyūṣe bhakṣitaṃ śiva //
analyzed: śiva āmalaka cūrṇam vai madhunā udakena vā balāni kuryāt nāsāyāḥ pratyūṣe bhakṣitam śiva

original: kuṣṭhacūrṇaṃ sājya-madhu prātarjagdhvā bhavennaraḥ / sākṣātsurabhideho vai jīvedvarṣasahasrakam //
analyzed: kuṣṭha cūrṇam sa ājya madhu prātar jagdhvā bhavet naraḥ sākṣāt surabhi dehaḥ vai jīvet varṣa sahasrakam

original: māṣasya vidalānye vituṣāṇi maheśvara / ghṛtabhāvitaśuṣkāṇi payasā sādhitāni vai //
analyzed: māṣasya vidalāni ye vituṣāṇi maheśvara ghṛta bhāvita śuṣkāṇi payasā sādhitāni vai

original: samādhvājyapayobhiśca bhakṣayitvā ca kāmayet / strīṇāṃ śataṃ mahādeva tatkṣaṇānnātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: sa mādhu ājya payobhiḥ ca bhakṣayitvā ca kāmayet strīṇām śatam mahādeva tad kṣaṇāt na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: rasaścairaṇḍatailena gandhakena śubho bhavet / trikālodakasaṃghuṣṭo balakṛdbhakṣaṇādbhavet //
analyzed: rasaḥ ca eraṇḍa tailena gandhakena śubhaḥ bhavet trikāla udaka saṃghuṣṭaḥ bala kṛt bhakṣaṇāt bhavet

original: dugdhaṃ vituṣamāṣaiśca śimbābījaiśca sādhitam / apāmārgasya tailena pītaṃ strīśatakāmakṛt //
analyzed: dugdham vituṣa māṣaiḥ ca śimbā bījaiḥ ca sādhitam apāmārgasya tailena pītam strī śata kāma kṛt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nānāvidhoṣadhaprayogānirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvyuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nānāvidhoṣadhaprayogānirūpaṇam nāma dvyuttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 203
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / yā gaurdveṣṭiṃ svakaṃ vatsaṃ tasyā deyaṃ svakaṃ payaḥ / lavaṇena samāyuktaṃ tasyā vatsaḥ priyo bhavet //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca yā gauḥ dveṣṭim svakam vatsam tasyāḥ deyam svakam payaḥ lavaṇena samāyuktam tasyāḥ vatsaḥ priyaḥ bhavet

original: śuno 'sthi kaṇṭhabaddhaṃ hi mahiṣāṇāṃ gavā tathā / kṛmijālaṃ pātayati sakalaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: śunaḥ sthi kaṇṭha baddham hi mahiṣāṇām gavā tathā kṛmi jālam pātayati sakalam na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: gojaṅganābhipātaḥ syādguñjāmūlasya bhakṣaṇāt //
analyzed: gojaṅganā abhipātaḥ syāt guñjā mūlasya bhakṣaṇāt

original: varuṇaphalasyarasaṃ kareṇa mathitaṃ śiva / catuṣpāda-dvipadayoḥ kṛmijālaṃ nipātayet //
analyzed: varuṇa phalasya rasam kareṇa mathitam śiva catuṣpāda dvipadayoḥ kṛmi jālam nipātayet

original: vraṇañca śamayedrudra jayāyāḥ pūraṇāt tathā / gajamūtrasya vai pānaṃ go-mahiṣyupasarganut //
analyzed: vraṇam ca śamayet rudra jayāyāḥ pūraṇāt tathā gaja mūtrasya vai pānam go mahiṣī upasarga nud

original: samasūra śālibījaṃ pītaṃ takreṇa gharṣitam / kṣīre go-mahīṣasyaiva goḥ puṃsaśca hitaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: sa masūrī śāli bījam pītam takreṇa gharṣitam kṣīre go mahīṣasya eva goḥ puṃsaḥ ca hitam bhavet

original: patrañca śarapuṅkhāyā dattaṃ salavaṇaṃ śiva / vārisphoṭaṃ hayānāñca kesarāṇāṃ vināśayet //
analyzed: patram ca śarapuṅkhāyāḥ dattam sa lavaṇam śiva vāri sphoṭam hayānām ca kesarāṇām vināśayet

original: ghṛtakumārīpatrameva dattaṃ salakṣaṇaṃ hara / turagama-kesarāṇāṃ kaṇḍūnaṃśyenna saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: ghṛta kumārī patram eva dattam sa lakṣaṇam hara turagama kesarāṇām kaṇḍūn aṃśyet na saṃśayaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nānauṣadhaprayoganirūpaṇaṃ nāma tryuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nānauṣadhaprayoganirūpaṇam nāma tryuttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 204
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / evaṃ dhanvantariḥ prāha suśrutāyaca vaidyakam / ata nāmāni vakṣyāmi oṣadhīnāṃ samāsataḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca evam dhanvantariḥ prāha suśrutāya ca vaidyakam nāmāni vakṣyāmi oṣadhīnām samāsatas

original: sthirā vidārigandhā ca śālapaṇyaśumatyapi / lāṅgalī kalasī caiva kroṣṭupucchā guhā matā //
analyzed: sthirā vidārigandhā ca śālapaṇī aśumatī api lāṅgalī kalasī ca eva kroṣṭupucchā guhā matā

original: punarnavātha parṣābhūḥ kaṭhilyā kāruṇā tathā / eraṇḍaścoruvūkaḥ syādāmardo vardhamānakaḥ //
analyzed: punarnavā atha parṣābhūḥ kaṭhilyā kāruṇā tathā eraṇḍaḥ ca uruvūkaḥ syāt āmardaḥ vardhamānakaḥ

original: jhaṣā nāgabalā jñeyā śvadaṃṣṭrā gokṣuro mataḥ / śatāvarī varā bhīru pīvarīndīvarī varī //
vyāghrī tu bṛhatī kṛṣṇā haṃsapādī madhustravā / dhāmanī kaṇṭakārī syātkṣudrā siṃhī nidigdhikā //
analyzed: vyāghrī tu bṛhatī kṛṣṇā haṃsapādī madhustravā dhāmanī kaṇṭakārī syāt kṣudrā siṃhī nidigdhikā

original: vṛścikā tryamṛtā kālī viṣaghnī sarpadaṃṣṭrikā / markaṭī cātmaguptā syādārṣeyī kapikacchukā //
mudgaparṇo kṣudrasahā māṣaparṇo mahāsahā / tyajā parā ca mahā jñeyā daṇḍayonyaṅkasaṃjñayā / nyagrodhastu vaṭo jñeyaḥ aśvatthaḥ kapilo mataḥ //
analyzed: kṣudrasahā māṣaparṇaḥ mahāsahā  tyajā parā ca mahā jñeyā daṇḍayoni aṅka saṃjñayā nyagrodhaḥ tu vaṭaḥ jñeyaḥ aśvatthaḥ kapilaḥ mataḥ

original: plakṣo 'tha gardabhāṇḍaḥ syātparkaṭī ca kapītanaḥ / pārthastu kakubho dhanvi vijñeyor'junanāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: plakṣaḥ gardabhāṇḍaḥ syāt parkaṭī ca kapītanaḥ pārthaḥ tu kakubhaḥ dhanvi vijñeyā ūrjuna nāmabhiḥ

original: nandīvṛkṣaḥ prarohī syātpuṣṭikārīti cocyate / vañjulo vetaso jñeyo bhallātaścāpyaruṣkaraḥ //

analyzed: tṛtīyā jalajambūḥ syāt nādeyī sā ca kīrtitā kaṇā kṛṣṇā upakuñcī ca śauṇḍī māgadhikā iti ca

original: kathitā pippalī tajjñaistanmūlaṃ granthikaṃ smṛtam / ūṣaṇaṃ maricaṃ jñeyaṃ śuṇṭhī viśvaṃ mahauṣadham //
analyzed: kathitā pippalī tad jñaiḥ tad mūlam granthikam smṛtam

original: vyoṣaṃ kaṭutrayaṃ vidyāttryūṣaṇaṃ tacca kīrtyate / lāṅgalī halinī ca syāccheyasī gaja pippalī //
analyzed: vyoṣam kaṭutrayam vidyāt tryūṣaṇam tat ca kīrtyate lāṅgalī halinī ca syāt śeyasī gaja pippalī

original: trāyantī trāyamāṇā syādutsāyā suvahā smṛtā / citrakaḥ syācchikhī vahniragnisaṃjñābhirucyate //
analyzed: trāyantī trāyamāṇā syāt utsāyā suvahā smṛtā citrakaḥ syāt śikhī vahniḥ agni saṃjñābhiḥ ucyate

original: ṣaḍgranthogrā vacā jñeyā śvetā haimavatīti ca / kuṭajo vṛkṣakaḥ śakro vatsako girimāllikā //

analyzed: lakṣayet

original: elā ca bahulā proktā sūkṣmailā ca tathā truṭiḥ / padmā bhārṅgo tathā kāñjī jñeyā brāhmaṇayaṣṭikā //
analyzed: elā ca bahulā proktā sūkṣmailā ca tathā truṭiḥ padmā bhārṅgo tathā kāñjī jñeyā brāhmaṇayaṣṭikā

original: mūrvā madhurasā jñeyā tejanī tiktavallikā / mahānimbo bṛhannimbo dīpyakaḥ syādyavānikā //
viḍaṅgaṃ krimaśatruḥ syādrāmaṭhaṃ hiṅgurucyate / ajājī jīrakaṃ jñeyā kāravī copakuñcikā //
analyzed: viḍaṅgam krimaśatruḥ syāt rāmaṭham hiṅguḥ ucyate ajājī jīrakam jñeyā kāravī ca upakuñcikā

original: vijñeyā kaṭukā tiktā tathā kaṭukarohiṇī / tagaraṃ syānnataṃ vakraṃ cocaṃ tvacavarāṅgakam //
analyzed: vijñeyā kaṭukā tiktā tathā kaṭukarohiṇī tagaram syāt natam vakram cocam tvaca varāṅgakam

original: udīcyaṃ bālakaṃ proktaṃ hrīberaṃ cāmbunāmabhiḥ / patrakaṃ dalasaṃjñābhiścārakaṃ taskarāhvayam //
analyzed: udīcyam bālakam proktam hrīberam ca ambu nāmabhiḥ patrakam dala saṃjñābhiḥ cārakam taskara āhvayam

original: hemābhaṃ nāgasaṃjñābhirnāgakeśara ucyate / asṛkkuṅkumamākhyātaṃ tathā kāśmīrabāhlikam //
analyzed: hema ābham nāga saṃjñābhiḥ nāgakeśaraḥ ucyate  asṛk kuṅkumam ākhyātam tathā kāśmīra bāhlikam

original: ayo lohaṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ yaugikairlohanāmabhiḥ / puraṃ kuṭanaṭaṃ vidyānmahiṣākṣaḥ palaṅkaṣā //
analyzed: ayaḥ loham samuddiṣṭam yaugikaiḥ loha nāmabhiḥ puram kuṭanaṭam vidyāt mahiṣākṣaḥ palaṅkaṣā

original: kāśmarī kaṭphalā jñeyā śrīparṇo ceti kīrtitā / śallakī gajabhakṣyā ca patrī ca surabhī stravaḥ //
dhātrīmāmalakīṃ vidyādakṣaścaiva vibhītakaḥ / pathyābhayā ca vijñeyā pūtanā ca harītakī //
analyzed: dhātrīm āmalakīm vidyāt akṣaḥ ca eva vibhītakaḥ pathyā abhayā ca vijñeyā pūtanā ca harītakī

original: triphalā phalamevoktā tacca jñeyaṃ phalatrikam / udakīryo dīrghavṛntaḥ karañjaśceti kīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: triphalā phalam evā uktā tat ca jñeyam phalatrikam udakīryaḥ dīrghavṛntaḥ karañjaḥ ca iti kīrtitaḥ

original: yaṣṭī yaṣṭyāhvayaṃ proktaṃ madukaṃ madhuyaṣṭikā / dhātakī tāmraparṇo syātsamaṅgā kuñjarā matā //
sitaṃ malayajaṃ śītaṃ gośīrṣaṃ sitacandanam / vidyādraktaṃ candanaṃ ca dvitīyaṃ raktacandanam //
analyzed: sitam malayajam śītam gośīrṣam sitacandanam vidyāt raktam candanam ca dvitīyam raktacandanam

original: kākolī ca smṛtā vīrā vayasyā cārkapuṣpikā / śṛṅgī karkaṭaśṛṅgī ca mahāghoṣā ca kīrtitā //
analyzed: kākolī ca smṛtā vīrā vayasyā ca arkapuṣpikā śṛṅgī karkaṭaśṛṅgī ca mahāghoṣā ca kīrtitā

original: tugākṣīrī śubhā vāṃśī vijñeyā vaṃśalocanā / mṛdvikā ca smṛtā drākṣā tathā gostanikā matā //
syāduśīraṃ mṛṇālañca sevyaṃ lāmajjakaṃ tathā / sārañca gopavallī ca gopī bhadrā ca kathyate //
analyzed: syāt uśīram mṛṇālam ca sevyam lāmajjakam tathā sāram ca gopavallī ca gopī bhadrā ca kathyate

original: dantī kaṭaṅkaṭerī ca jñeyā dāruniśeti ca / haridrā rajanī proktā pītikā rātrināmikā //

pāṣāṇabhedako 'riṣṭo hyasmabhitkuṭṭabhedakaḥ / ghaṇṭākaḥ śuṣkako jñeyo vaco 'tha sūcako mataḥ //
analyzed: pāṣāṇabhedakaḥ riṣṭaḥ hi asmabhid kuṭṭabhedakaḥ ghaṇṭākaḥ śuṣkakaḥ jñeyaḥ sūcakaḥ mataḥ

original: suraso bījakaścaiva pītaśālo 'bhidhīyeta / vajravṛkṣo mahāvṛkṣaḥ snuhī snukca sudhā guḍā //
analyzed: surasaḥ bījakaḥ ca eva pītaśālaḥ bhidhīyeta vajravṛkṣaḥ mahāvṛkṣaḥ snuhī snuh ca sudhā guḍā

original: tulasīṃ surasāṃ vidyādupastheti ca kathyate / kuṭherako 'pyarjunakaḥ parṇo saugandhiparṇikraḥ //
analyzed: tulasīm surasām vidyāt upasthā iti ca kathyate

original: nīlaśca sindhuvāraśca nirguṇḍīti sugandhikā / jñeyā sugandhiparṇoti vāsantī kulajeti ca //
analyzed: nīlaḥ ca sindhuvāraḥ ca nirguṇḍī iti sugandhikā jñeyā sugandhiparṇā uti vāsantī kulajā iti ca

original: kālīyakaṃ pītakāṣṭhaṃ katakākhyaḥ punaḥ smṛtaḥ / gāyatrīkhadiro jñeyastadbhedaḥ kandaro mataḥ //
indī varaṃ kuvalayaṃ padmaṃ nīlotpalaṃ smṛtam / saugandhikaṃ śatadalamabjaṃ kamalamucyate //
analyzed: indī varam kuvalayam padmam nīlotpalam smṛtam saugandhikam śatadalam abjam kamalam ucyate

original: ajavarṇo bhavedūrjo vājikarṇo 'śvakarṇakaḥ / śleṣmāntakastathā śelurbahuvāraśca kathyate //
analyzed: ajavarṇaḥ bhavet ūrjaḥ vājikarṇo śvakarṇakaḥ śleṣmāntakaḥ tathā śeluḥ bahuvāraḥ ca kathyate

original: sunandakaḥ kakudbhadraṃ chatrākī chatrasaṃjñakā / kabarī kumbhako dhṛṣṭaḥ kṣudvidho dhanakṛttathā //
analyzed: sunandakaḥ kakud bhadram chatrākī chatra saṃjñakā kabarī kumbhakaḥ dhṛṣṭaḥ kṣudvidhaḥ dhanakṛt tathā

original: kṛṣṇārjakaḥ karālaśca kālamānaḥ prakīrtitaḥ / prācī balā nadīkrāntā kākajaṅghātha vāyasī //
jñeyā mūṣikaparṇo tu bhramantī cākhuparṇikā / viṣamuṣṭirdrāvaṇañca keśamuṣṭirudāhṛtā //
analyzed: jñeyā tu bhramantī ca ākhuparṇikā  viṣamuṣṭiḥ drāvaṇam ca keśamuṣṭiḥ udāhṛtā

original: kiṃlihīṃ kaṭukīṃ vidyādantakaścāmlavetasaḥ / aśvatthā bahupatrā ca vijñeyā cāmalakyapi //
analyzed: kiṃlihīm kaṭukīm vidyāt antakaḥ ca amlavetasaḥ aśvatthā bahupatrā ca vijñeyā ca āmalakī api

original: arūṣakraṃ patra śūkaṃ kṣīrī rājādanaṃ matam / mahāpatraṃ dāḍimaṃ ca tameva karakaṃ vadet //
analyzed: arūṣakram patra śūkam kṣīrī rājādanam matam mahāpatram dāḍimam ca tam eva karakam vadet

original: masūrī vidalī śaṣpā kālindīti nirucyate / kaṇṭakākhyā mahāśyāmā vṛkṣapādīti vakṣyate //

analyzed: vidyā kuntī nikumbhī ca tribhaṅgī tripuṭī trivṛt saptalā yavatiktā ca carmā carmakasā iti ca

original: śaṅkhinī sukumārī ca tiktākṣī cākṣipīlukam / gavākṣī cāmṛtā śvetā girikarṇo gavādinī //
analyzed: śaṅkhinī sukumārī ca tiktākṣī ca akṣipīlukam gavākṣī ca amṛtā śvetā girikarṇaḥ gavādinī

original: kāmpillako 'tha raktāṅgo guṇḍā rocaniketi ca / hemakṣīrī smṛtā pītā gaurī vai kāladugdhikā //

analyzed: gāṅgerukī nāgabalā viśālā ca indravāruṇī tārkṣyam śailam nīla varṇam añjanam ca rasāñjanam

original: niryāso yaśca śālmalyāḥ sa mocarasasaṃjñakaḥ / pratyakpuṣpī kharī jñeyā apāmārgo mayūrakaḥ //
analyzed: niryāsaḥ yaḥ ca śālmalyāḥ sa mocarasa saṃjñakaḥ pratyakpuṣpī kharī jñeyā apāmārgaḥ mayūrakaḥ

original: siṃhāsyavṛṣavāsākamāṭarūṣakamādiśet / jīvako jīvaśākaśca karburañca śaṭīṃ viduḥ //
analyzed: siṃhāsya vṛṣa vāsākam āṭarūṣakam ādiśet  jīvakaḥ jīvaśākaḥ ca karburan ca śaṭīm viduḥ

original: kaṭphalaṃ somavṛkṣaḥ syādagnigandhā sugandhikā / śatāṅgaṃ śatapuṣpā ca miṃsirmadhurikāmatā //

analyzed: jñeyam puṣkaramūlam ca puṣkaram puṣkarāhvayam  dhanvayāsaḥ ca durālabhā

original: vākucī somarājī ca somavallīti kīrtitā / mārkavaḥ keśarājaśca bhṛṅgarājo nigadyate //
analyzed: vākucī somarājī ca somavallī iti kīrtitā mārkavaḥ keśarājaḥ ca bhṛṅgarājaḥ nigadyate

original: proktastveḍagajastajjñaiścakramardakasaṃjñakhaḥ / suraṅgītagaraḥ snāyuḥ kalanāśā tu vāyasī //
analyzed: proktaḥ tu eḍagajaḥ tajjñaiḥ cakramardaka saṃjñā khaḥ suraṅgītagaraḥ snāyuḥ kalanāśā tu vāyasī

original: mahākālaḥ smṛto belastaṇḍulīyo ghanastanaḥ / ikṣvākustiktatumbī syāttiktālaburnigadyate //
dhāmārgavo 'tha koṣātakyatha yāminī / vidyātkośatakībhedaṃ kṛtabhedanasaṃjñakā //
analyzed: koṣātakī atha yāminī  vidyāt kośatakībhedam kṛtabhedana saṃjñakā

original: tathā jīmūtakākhyā ca khuḍḍāko devatāḍakaḥ / gṛdhranakhī gṛdhranakhī hiṅgukākādanī matā //
analyzed: tathā jīmūtaka ākhyā ca khuḍḍākaḥ devatāḍakaḥ gṛdhranakhī gṛdhranakhī hiṅgukākādanī matā

original: aśvāriścaiva boddhavyaḥ karavīro 'śvamārakaḥ / sindhuḥ saindhavasindhūtthamaṇimanthamudāhṛtam //
analyzed: aśvāriḥ ca eva boddhavyaḥ karavīraḥ śvamārakaḥ sindhuḥ saindhava sindhūttha maṇimantham udāhṛtam

original: kṣāro yavāgrajaścaiva yavakṣāro 'bhidhīyate / sarjikā sarjikākṣāro dvitīyaḥ parikīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: kṣāraḥ yavāgrajaḥ ca eva yavakṣāraḥ bhidhīyate sarjikā sarjikākṣāraḥ dvitīyaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: kāśīśaṃ puṣpakāśīśaṃ vijñeyaṃ nettrabheṣajam / dhātukāśīśakāśī ca saṃjñeyaṃ tacca kīrtitam //
analyzed: kāsīśam puṣpakāsīśam vijñeyam nettrabheṣajam dhātukāsīsakāśī ca saṃjñā iyam tat ca kīrtitam

original: saurāṣṭrī mṛttikākṣāraṃ kākṣī vai paṅkaparpaṭī / vidyātsamākṣikaṃ dhātu tāpyaṃ tāpyutthasambhavam //
śilā manaḥ śilā jñeyā nepālī kulaṭīti ca / ālaṃ manastālakaṃ vā haritālaṃ vinirdiśet //
analyzed: śilā manaḥ śilā jñeyā nepālī kulaṭī iti ca ālam manaḥ tālakam vā haritālam vinirdiśet

original: gandhako gandhapāṣāṇo rasaḥ pārada ucyate / tāmramaudumbaraṃ śulbaṃ vidyānmlecchamukhaṃ tathā //
analyzed: gandhakaḥ gandhapāṣāṇaḥ rasaḥ pāradaḥ ucyate tāmram audumbaram śulbam vidyāt mlecchamukham tathā

original: adrisārastvayastīkṣṇaṃ lohakañcāpi kathyate / mākṣikaṃ madhu ca kṣaudraṃ tacca puṣparasaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: adrisāraḥ tu ayaḥ tīkṣṇam lohakam ca api kathyate mākṣikam madhu ca kṣaudram tat ca puṣparasam smṛtam

original: jyeṣṭhantu sodakaṃ tatsyātkāñjikantu suvīrakam / sītā sitopalā caiva matsyaṇḍīśarkarā smṛtā //
analyzed: jyeṣṭham tu sodakam tat syāt kāñjikam tu suvīrakam  sītā sitopalā ca eva matsyaṇḍīśarkarā smṛtā

original: tvagelāpatrakaistulyaistrisugandhi trijātakam / nāgakeśarasaṃyuktaṃ taccaturjātamiṣyate //
analyzed: tvac elā patrakaiḥ tulyaiḥ trisugandhi trijātakam nāgakeśara saṃyuktam tat caturjātam iṣyate

original: pippalī pippalīmūlaṃ cavyacitrakanāgaraiḥ / kathitaṃ pañcakolañca kolakaṃ kolasaṃjñayā //
analyzed: pippalī pippalīmūlam cavya citraka nāgaraiḥ kathitam pañcakolam ca kolakam kola saṃjñayā

original: priyaṅguḥ kaṅgukā jñeyā koradūṣaśca kodravaḥ / tripuṭaḥ puṭasaṃjñaśca kalāpo laṅgako mataḥ //
satīno vartulaścaiva veṇuścāpi prakīrtitaḥ / picukaṃ pitalaṃ cākṣaṃ biḍālapadakaṃ tathā //
analyzed: satīnaḥ vartulaḥ ca eva veṇuḥ ca api prakīrtitaḥ picukam pitalam ca akṣam biḍālapadakam tathā

original: vidyātkarṣaṃ tathā cāpi suvarṇaṃ kavalagraham / palārdhaṃ śuktimicchanti tathāṣṭaumāṣakāstviti //
analyzed: vidyāt karṣam tathā ca api suvarṇam kavalagraham pala ardham śuktim icchanti tathā aṣṭaumāṣakāḥ tu iti

original: palaṃ bilvañca muṣṭiḥ syāddve pale prasṛtiṃ vadet / añjaliṃ kuḍavañcaiva vidyātpalacatuṣṭayam //
analyzed: palam bilvam ca muṣṭiḥ syāt dve pale prasṛtim vadet añjalim kuḍavam ca eva vidyāt pala catuṣṭayam

original: aṣṭamānaṃ palānyaṣṭau tacca mānamiti smṛtam / caturbhiḥ kuḍavaiḥ prastha prasthāścatvāra āḍhakaḥ //
analyzed: aṣṭa mānam palāni aṣṭau tat ca mānam iti smṛtam caturbhiḥ kuḍavaiḥ prastha prasthāḥ catvāraḥ āḍhakaḥ

original: kāśapātrañca saṃprokto droṇaścacaturāḍhake / tulā palaśataṃ proktaṃ bhāgo viṃśatpalaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: kāśa pātram ca saṃproktaḥ droṇaḥ ca catur āḍhake tulā pala śatam proktam bhāgaḥ viṃśat palaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: mānamevaṃ vidhaṃ proktaṃ prasthadravyeṣu paṇḍitaiḥ / dravadravyeṣu coddiṣṭaṃ dviguṇaṃ parikīrtitam //
analyzed: mānam evaṃvidham proktam prastha dravyeṣu paṇḍitaiḥ drava dravyeṣu ca uddiṣṭam dviguṇam parikīrtitam

original: bhadradāru devakāṣṭhaṃ dāru syāddevadārukam / kuṣṭhamāmayamākhyātaṃ māṃsīñca naladaṃśanam //
analyzed: bhadradāru devakāṣṭham dāru syāt devadārukam kuṣṭham āmayam ākhyātam māṃsīn ca nala daṃśanam

original: śaṅkhaḥ śuktinakhaḥ śaṅkho vyāghro vyāghranakhaḥ smṛtaḥ / puraṃ palaṅkaṣaṃ vidyānmahiṣākṣañca gugguluḥ //
analyzed: śaṅkhaḥ śuktinakhaḥ śaṅkhaḥ vyāghraḥ vyāghranakhaḥ smṛtaḥ puram palaṅkaṣam vidyāt mahiṣākṣam ca gugguluḥ

original: raso gandharaso bole sarjaḥ sarjaraso mataḥ / priyaṅguḥ phalinī śyāmā gaurī kānteti cocyate //
karañjau naktamālaḥ syātpūtikaścirabilvakaḥ / śigruḥ śobhāñjano nāma jñānamānaśca kīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: karañjau naktamālaḥ syāt pūtikaḥ cirabilvakaḥ  śigruḥ śobhāñjanaḥ nāma jñānamānaḥ ca kīrtitaḥ

original: jayā jayantī śaraṇī nirguṇḍī sindhuvārakaḥ / moraṭā pīluparṇo ca tuṇḍī syāttuṇḍikerikā //
madano gālavo bodho ghoṭā ghoṭī ca kathyate / caturaṅgula sampāko vyādhighātābhisaṃjñakaḥ //
analyzed: madanaḥ gālavaḥ bodhaḥ ghoṭā ghoṭī ca kathyate catur aṅgula sampākaḥ vyādhi ghāta abhisaṃjñakaḥ

original: vidyādāragvadhaṃ rājavṛkṣaṃ raivatasaṃjñakam / dantī kākendutiktā syātkaṇṭakī ca vikaṅkataḥ //
analyzed: vidyāt āragvadham rājavṛkṣam raivata saṃjñakam  dantī kāka indu tiktā syāt kaṇṭakī ca vikaṅkataḥ

original: nimbo 'riṣṭaḥ samākhyātaḥ paṭolaṃ kolakaṃ viduḥ / vayasthā ca viśalyā ca cchinnā chinnaruhā matā //
analyzed: nimbaḥ riṣṭaḥ samākhyātaḥ paṭolam kolakam viduḥ vayasthā ca viśalyā ca chinnā chinnaruhā matā

original: vaśā dantyamṛtā ceti guḍūcīnāmasaṃgrahaḥ / kirātatiktakaścaiva bhūnimbaḥ kāṇḍatiktakaḥ //
analyzed: vaśā dantī amṛtā ca iti guḍūcī nāma saṃgrahaḥ kirātatiktakaḥ ca eva bhūnimbaḥ kāṇḍatiktakaḥ

original: sūta uvāca / nāmānyetāni ca hare vanyānāṃ bheṣajāṃ tathā / ato vyākaraṇaṃ vakṣye kumāroktañca śaunaka //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca nāmāni etāni ca hare vanyānām bheṣajām tathā atas vyākaraṇam vakṣye kumāra uktam ca śaunaka

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe caturattaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe caturattaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 205
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: kumāra uvāca / atha vyākaraṇaṃ vakṣye kātyāyana samāsataḥ / siddhaśabdavivekāya bālavyutpattihetave //
analyzed: kumāraḥ uvāca atha vyākaraṇam vakṣye kātyāyana samāsatas siddha śabda vivekāya bāla vyutpatti hetave

original: suptiṅantaṃ padaṃ khyātaṃ supaḥ sapta vibhaktayaḥ / svaujasaḥ prathamā proktā sā prātipadikātmake //
analyzed: sup tiṅ antam padam khyātam supaḥ sapta vibhaktayaḥ svaujasaḥ prathamā proktā sā prātipadika ātmake

original: sambodhane ca liṅgādāvukte karmaṇi kartari / arthavatprātipadikaṃ dhātupratyayavarjitam //
analyzed: sambodhane ca liṅga ādau ukte karmaṇi kartari arthavat prātipadikam dhātu pratyaya varjitam

original: amauśaso dvitīyā syāttatkarma kriyate ca yat / dvitīyā karmaṇi proktāntarāntareṇa saṃyute //
analyzed: dvitīyā syāt tat karma kriyate ca yat dvitīyā karmaṇi proktā antara antareṇa saṃyute

original: ṭābhyāṃbhisastṛtīyā syātkaraṇe kartarīritā / yena kriyate karaṇaṃ tatkartā yaḥ karoti saḥ //
analyzed: ṭābhyām bhisaḥ tṛtīyā syāt karaṇe kartar īritā yena kriyate karaṇam tad kartā yaḥ karoti saḥ

original: ṅebhyāṃbhyasaścaturtho syātsampradāne ca kārake / yasmai ditsā dhārayate rocate sampradānakam //
analyzed: ṅe bhyām bhyasaḥ caturthaḥ syāt sampradāne ca kārake  yasmai ditsā dhārayate rocate sampradānakam

original: pañcamī syānṅasibhyāṃbhyohyapādāne ca kārake / yato 'paiti samādatte upādatte bhayaṃ yataḥ //
analyzed: pañcamī syāt ṅasi bhyām bhyohi apādāne ca kārake yatas u paiti samādatte upādatte bhayam yatas

original: ṅasosāmaśca ṣaṣṭhī syātsvāmisambandhamukhyake / ṅayoḥ supo vai saptamī syātsā cādhikaraṇe bhavet //
analyzed: ṅas os āmaḥ ca ṣaṣṭhī syāt svāmi sambandha mukhyake ṅayoḥ supaḥ vai saptamī syāt sā ca adhikaraṇe bhavet

original: ādhāraścādhikaraṇaṃ rakṣārthānāṃ prayogataḥ / īpsitaṃ cānīpsitaṃ yattadapādānakaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: ādhāraḥ ca adhikaraṇam rakṣā arthānām prayogataḥ īpsitam ca anīpsitam yat tat apādānakam smṛtam

original: pañcamī paryupāṅyoge itararte 'nyadiṅmukhe / enayoge dvitīyā syātkarmapravacanīyakaiḥ //
analyzed: pañcamī pari upāṅ yoge itara ṛte nya diś mukhe ena yoge dvitīyā syāt karmapravacanīyakaiḥ

original: vīpsetthambhāvacihne 'bhirbhāgenaiva paripratī / anureṣu sahārthe ca hīne 'nūpaśca kathyate //
analyzed: vīpsā itthambhāva cihne bhiḥ bhāgena eva pari pratī anureṣu saha arthe ca hīne nūpaḥ ca kathyate

original: dvitīyā ca caturtho syācceṣṭāyāṃ gatikarmaṇi / aprāṇe hi vibhaktī dbe manyakarmaṇyanādare //
analyzed: dvitīyā ca syāt ceṣṭāyām gati karmaṇi a prāṇe hi vibhaktī dbe manya karmaṇi anādare

original: namaḥ svastisvadhāsvāhālaṃvaṣaḍyoga īritā / caturtho caiva tādarthye tumarthādbhāvavācinaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ svasti svadhā svāhā alam vaṣaṭ yogaḥ īritā ca eva tādarthye tumun arthāt bhāva vācinaḥ

original: tṛtīyā sahayoge syātkutsiteṅge viśeṣaṇe / kāle bhāve saptamī syādetairyoge 'piṣaṣṭhyati //
analyzed: tṛtīyā saha yoge syāt kutsita iṅge viśeṣaṇe kāle bhāve saptamī syāt etaiḥ yoge

original: svāmīśvarādhipatibhiḥ sākṣidāyādaprasūtaiḥ / nirdhāraṇe dve vibhakto ṣaṣṭhī hetuprayogake //
analyzed: svāmi īśvara adhipatibhiḥ sākṣi dāyāda prasūtaiḥ nirdhāraṇe dve ṣaṣṭhī hetu prayogake

original: smṛtyarthakarmaṇi tathā karoteḥ pratiyatnake / hiṃsārthānāṃ prayoge ca kṛti karmaṇi kartari //
analyzed: smṛti artha karmaṇi tathā karoteḥ pratiyatnake hiṃsā arthānām prayoge ca kṛti karmaṇi kartari

original: na kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ṣaṣṭhī niṣṭhayoḥ prātipadike / dvividhaṃ prātipadikaṃ nāma dhātustathaiva ca //
analyzed: na kartṛ karmaṇoḥ ṣaṣṭhī niṣṭhayoḥ prātipadike  dvividham prātipadikam nāma dhātuḥ tathā eva ca

original: bhūvāndibhyastiṅo laḥ syāllakārā daśa vai smṛtāḥ / tiptasūjhi prathamo madhyaḥ sipthasthottamapūruṣaḥ //
analyzed: bhū vāndibhyaḥ tiṅaḥ laḥ syāt lakārāḥ daśa vai smṛtāḥ prathamaḥ madhyaḥ

original: mibvasmastu parasmai hi padānāṃ cātmanepadam / tātāñjha prathamo madhya sthāsāthāndhvamathottamaḥ //
analyzed: mip vas mas tu parasmai hi padānām ca ātmanepadam

original: ādeśā iḍbahimahi dhātutotha ṇijādivat / nāmni prayujyamāne 'pi prathamaḥ puruṣo bhavet //
analyzed: ādeśāḥ dhātu taḥ tha ṇic ādi vat nāmni prayujyamāne pi prathamaḥ puruṣaḥ bhavet

original: madhyamo yuṣmadi prokta uttamaḥ puruṣo 'smadi / bhūvādyā dhātavaḥ proktāḥ sanādyantāstathā tataḥ //
