analyzed: madhyamaḥ yuṣmadi proktaḥ uttamaḥ bhū ādyāḥ dhātavaḥ proktāḥ san ādi antāḥ tathā tatas

original: laḍīrito vartamāne smenātīte ca dhātutaḥ / bhūte 'nadyatane laṅvā loḍādyāśiṣi dhātutaḥ //
analyzed: laṭ ī r itaḥ vartamāne smena atīte ca dhātutaḥ bhūte na adyatane laṅ vā loṭ ādi āśiṣi dhātutaḥ

original: vidhyādāvevānumato loḍvācyo mantraṇe bhavet / nimantraṇādhīṣṭasaṃpraśre prārthaneṣu tathāśiṣi //
analyzed: vidhi ādau eva anumataḥ loṭ vācyaḥ mantraṇe bhavet nimantraṇa adhīṣṭa saṃpraśre prārthaneṣu tathā āśiṣi

original: liṅatīte parokṣe syālliḍ bhūte ḷḍ bhaviṣyati / syādanadyatane tadvadbhaviṣyati tu dhātutaḥ //
analyzed: liṅ atīte parokṣe syāt liṭ bhūte ḷṭ bhaviṣyati syāt anadyatane tadvat bhaviṣyati tu dhātutaḥ

original: dātorḷṅ kriyātipattau liṅarthe leṭ prakīrtitaḥ / kṛtastriṣvapi vartante bhāve karmaṇi kartari //
analyzed: dātoḥ ḷṅ kriyā atipattau liṅ arthe leṭ prakīrtitaḥ kṛtaḥ triṣu api vartante bhāve karmaṇi kartari

original: sadṛśāstavyatā ṇyadyadanīyāśca tṛjādayaḥ //
analyzed: sadṛśāḥ tavyatāḥ ṇyat yadanīyāḥ ca tṛc ādayaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vyākaraṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vyākaraṇanirūpaṇam nāma pañcottaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 206
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / siddhodāharaṇaṃ vakṣye saṃhitādipuraḥ saram / viprāḥ svasāgatā vīdaṃ suttamaṃ syātpitṝṣabhaḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca siddha udāharaṇam vakṣye saṃhitā ādi puras saram viprāḥ svasā āgatāḥ vi idam suttamam syāt pitṛ ṛṣabhaḥ

original: ḷkāro viśrutā sevaṃ lāṅgalīṣā manīpayā / gaṅgodakaṃ tavalkāra ṛṇārṇaṃ prārṇamityapi //
analyzed: ḷkāraḥ viśrutā sā ivam lāṅgalīṣā manīpayā gaṅgā udakam ṛṇārṇam prārṇam iti api

original: śītārtaśca tavalkāraḥ saindrī saukāra ityapi / vadhvāsanañca pitrartho lanubandho naye jayet //
analyzed: śītārtaḥ ca tavalkāraḥ saindrī saukāraḥ iti api vadhvāsanam ca pitrarthaḥ naye jayet

original: nāyako lavaṇaṃ gāvasta ete na ta īśvarāḥ / devīgṛhamatho atra a avehi paṭū imau //
analyzed: nāyakaḥ lavaṇam gāvaḥ te ete na te īśvarāḥ devī gṛham atho atra a avehi paṭū imau

original: amī aśvāḥ ṣaḍasyeti tanna vāk ṣaḍdalāni ca / taccarettallu nātīti tajjalaṃ tacchmaśānakam //
analyzed: amī aśvāḥ ṣaṭ asya iti tat na vāc ṣaṣ dalāni ca  tat caret tat lu na ati iti tat jalam tat śmaśānakam

original: sugannatra pacannatra bhavāṃśchādayatīti ca / bhavājjhanatkaraścaiva bhavāṃstarati saṃsmṛtam //
analyzed: sugan atra pacan atra bhavān chādayati iti ca bhavān jhanatkaraḥ ca eva bhavān tarati saṃsmṛtam

original: bhavāṃllikhati tāñcakre bhavāñśete 'pyanīdṛśaḥ / bhavāṇḍīnaṃ tvantarasi tvaṅkaroṣi sadārcanam //
analyzed: bhavān likhati tān cakre bhavān śete pi anīdṛśaḥ bhavān ḍīnam tu antar asi tvam karoṣi sadā arcanam

original: kaścaretkaṣṭakāreṇa ka kuryātka phale sthitaḥ / kaḥśete caiva kaḥṣaṇḍaḥ kasko yāti ca gauravam //
analyzed: kaḥ caret kaṣṭa kāreṇa ka kuryāt ka phale sthitaḥ kaḥ śete ca eva kaḥ ṣaṇḍaḥ kaskaḥ yāti ca gauravam

original: ka ihātra ka evāhurdevā āhuśca bho vraja / svabhūrviṣṇurvrajati ca gīṣpatiścaiva dhūrpatiḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ iha atra kaḥ eva āhuḥ devāḥ āhuḥ ca bho vraja sva bhūḥ viṣṇuḥ vrajati ca gīṣpatiḥ ca eva dhūrpatiḥ

original: asmāneṣa vrajetsasyādṛksāma sa ca gacchati / kuṭīcchāyā tathā chāyā sandhayo 'nye tathedṛśāḥ //
analyzed: asmān eṣa vrajet sa syādṛś sāma sa ca gacchati kuṭī chāyā tathā chāyā sandhayaḥ nye tathā īdṛśāḥ

original: samāsāḥ ṣaṭ samākhyātāḥ sa dvijaḥ karmadhārayaḥ / dvigustrivedī grāmaśca ayaṃ tatpuruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: samāsāḥ ṣaṭ samākhyātāḥ sa dvijaḥ karmadhārayaḥ dviguḥ tri vedī grāmaḥ ca ayam tatpuruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: tatkṛtaśca tadarthaśca vṛkabhītiśca yaddhanam / jñānadakṣeṇa tattvajño bahuvrīhirathāvyayī //
analyzed: tad kṛtaḥ ca tad arthaḥ ca vṛka bhītiḥ ca yat dhanam jñāna dakṣeṇa tattva jñaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ atha avyayī

original: bhāvo 'dhistri yathoktaṃ tu dvandvo devarṣimānavāḥ / taddhitāḥ pāṇḍavaḥ śaivo brāhayaṃ ca brahmatādayaḥ //
analyzed: bhāvaḥ dhiḥ tri yathoktam tu dvandvaḥ deva ṛṣi mānavāḥ tad hitāḥ pāṇḍavaḥ śaivaḥ ca

original: devāgnisakhipatyaṃśukroṣṭusvāyambhuvaḥ pitā / nā praśastāścarā gaurglaurabajantāśca puṃsyapi //
analyzed: deva agni sakhi pati aṃśu kroṣṭu svāyambhuvaḥ pitā nā praśastāḥ carāḥ gauḥ glauḥ apa jantāḥ ca puṃsi api

original: halantaścāśvayukkṣmābhuṅmarutkravyānmṛgāvidhaḥ / ātmā rājā yuvā panthāḥ pūṣabrahmahaṇau halī //
analyzed: ha l antaḥ ca aśvayuj kṣmābhuj marut kravyād mṛgāvidhaḥ ātmā rājā yuvā panthāḥ pūṣa brahma haṇau halī

original: viḍve dhā uśanānaḍvānmadhuliṭ kāṣṭhataṭ tathā / banavāryasthivastūni jagatsāmāhanī tathā //
analyzed: viś ve dhāḥ uśanā anaḍvān madhulih kāṣṭha tat tathā bana vāri asthi vastūni jagat sāma ahanī tathā

original: karmasarpirvapusteja ajjhalantā napuṃsake / jāyā jarā nadī lakṣmīḥ śrīstrībhūmirvadhūrapi //
analyzed: karma sarpiḥ vapuḥ tejaḥ at jha l antāḥ napuṃsake jāyā jarā nadī lakṣmīḥ śrī strī bhūmiḥ vadhūḥ api

original: bhrūḥ punarbhūstathā dhenuḥ svasā mātā ca nau striyaḥ / vāksragdiṅmutkrudhaḥ prāyo yuvatiḥ kukubhastathā //
analyzed: bhrūḥ punarbhūḥ tathā dhenuḥ svasā mātā ca nauḥ striyaḥ vāc sraj diś mud krudhaḥ prāyas yuvatiḥ kukubhaḥ tathā

original: dyodivau prāvṛṣaścaiva sumāna uṣṇigastriyām / guṇadravyakriyāyogātstrīliṅgāṃśca vadāmi te //
analyzed: prāvṛṣaḥ ca eva sumānaḥ uṣṇih astriyām  guṇa dravya kriyā yogāt strī liṅgān ca vadāmi te

original: śuklakīlālapāścaiva śuciśca grāmaṇīḥ sudhīḥ / paṭuḥ kamalabhūḥ kartā sumato bahavaḥ sunauḥ //
analyzed: śukla kīlāla pāḥ ca eva śuciḥ ca grāmaṇīḥ sudhīḥ paṭuḥ kamalabhūḥ kartā sumataḥ bahavaḥ

original: satyā nāgnyastathā puṃso hyabhakṣayata dīrghapāt / sarvaviśvobha ye cobhau ekonyānyatarāṇi ca //
analyzed: satyāḥ na agnyaḥ tathā puṃsaḥ hi abhakṣayata dīrghapād

original: ḍataro ḍatamo nemastvaḥ samo 'tha simetarau / pūrvaścaivādharaścaiva dakṣiṇaścottarāvarau //
analyzed: ḍataraḥ ḍatamaḥ nemastvaḥ samaḥ tha simetarau pūrvaḥ ca eva adharaḥ ca eva dakṣiṇaḥ ca uttara avarau

original: paraścāntaramapyetadyattyatkimadasastvidam / yuṣmadasmattatprathamacaramālpatayārdhakāḥ //
analyzed: paraḥ ca antaram api etat yat tyad kim adasaḥ tu idam yuṣmad asmat tad prathama carama alpa tayā ardhakāḥ

original: tathā katipayo dvau cetyevaṃ sarvādayastathā / śṛṇotyādyā juhotiśca jahātiśca dadhātyapi //
analyzed: tathā katipayaḥ dvau ca iti evam sarva ādayaḥ tathā śṛṇoti ādyāḥ juhotiḥ ca jahātiḥ ca dadhāti api

original: dīpyatiḥ stūyatiścaiva puttrīyati dhanīyati / truṭyati mriyate caiva cicīṣati ninīṣati //
analyzed: dīpyatiḥ stūyatiḥ ca eva puttrīyati dhanīyati  truṭyati mriyate ca eva cicīṣati ninīṣati

original: sarve tiṣṭhanti sarvasmai sarvasmātsarvanto gataḥ / sarveṣāṃ caiva sarvasminnevaṃ viśvādayastathā //
analyzed: sarve tiṣṭhanti sarvasmai sarvasmāt sarvantaḥ gataḥ sarveṣām ca eva sarvasmin evam viśva ādayaḥ tathā

original: pūrve pūrvāśca pūrvasmātpūrvasminpūrva īritaḥ / sūta uvāca / suptiṅantuṃ siddharūpaṃ nāmamātreṇa darśitam / kātyāyanaḥ kumārāttu śrutvā vistaramabravīt //
analyzed: pūrve pūrvāḥ ca pūrvasmāt pūrvasmin pūrvaḥ īritaḥ sūtaḥ uvāca siddha rūpam nāma mātreṇa darśitam  kātyāyanaḥ kumārāt tu śrutvā vistaram abravīt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamān- ācāradṛ nāma ṣaḍuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe nāma ṣaṣ uttara dviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 207
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / vāsudevaṃ guruṃ natvā gaṇaṃ śambhuṃ sarasvatīm / mātrāvarṇaprabhedena cchando vakṣye 'lpabuddhaye //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca vāsudevam gurum natvā gaṇam śambhum sarasvatīm mātrā varṇa prabhedena chandaḥ vakṣye lpabuddhaye

original: sarvādimadhyāntagalau mnau bhyau jrau stau trikā gaṇāḥ / āryā catuṣkalādyantasarvamadhye caturgaṇāḥ //
analyzed: sarva ādi madhya anta galau m nau bhyau j rau s tau trikāḥ gaṇāḥ āryā catuṣkala ādi anta sarva madhye catur gaṇāḥ

original: vyañjanānto visargāntau dīrgho yuktaparo guruḥ / sānusvāraśca pādānto vā ityukto dvimātrakaḥ //
analyzed: vyañjana antaḥ visarga antau dīrghaḥ yukta paraḥ guruḥ sa anusvāraḥ ca pāda antaḥ vā iti uktaḥ dvi mātrakaḥ

original: yadā nāpi kramaṃ yoge laghutāpi kvacidguroḥ / ślokacāryādisaṃjñā syādyatirvicchedasaṃjñikā //
analyzed: yadā nā api kramam yoge laghu tā api kvacid guroḥ śloka cāri ādi saṃjñā syāt yatiḥ viccheda saṃjñikā

original: jñeyaḥ pādaśca turyāṃśo yuk samaṃ viṣamantvayuk / samamardhasamaṃ vṛttaṃ viṣamañca tṛtīyakam //
analyzed: jñeyaḥ pādaḥ ca turya aṃśaḥ yuj samam viṣamam tu ayuj samam ardhasamam vṛttam viṣamam ca tṛtīyakam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe chandaḥ śāstrechandaḥsaṃjñāparibhāṣānirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe chandaḥ śāstrechandaḥsaṃjñāparibhāṣānirūpaṇam nāma saptottaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 208
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / āryālakṣma tvaṣṭa gaṇāḥ sadā jo viṣame na hi / ṣaṣṭhe jo nlau vāpi bhavet padaṃ ṣaṣṭhe dvitīyalāt //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca ārya alakṣma tu aṣṭa gaṇāḥ sadā viṣame na hi ṣaṣṭhe vā api bhavet padam ṣaṣṭhe dvitīya lāt

original: āditaḥ saptame hrasvā dvitīyārdhe śare tataḥ / trigaṇāṅghriśca pathyā syādvipulā vahnilaṅghanāt //
analyzed: āditas saptame hrasvā dvitīya ardhe śare tatas trigaṇa aṅghriḥ ca pathyā syāt vipulā vahni laṅghanāt

original: gmadhye dvituryau jau capalā mukhapūrvādicāpalā / dvitīyārdhe sajaghanā āryājāteśca lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: dvi turyau jau capalā mukha pūrva ādi cāpalā dvitīya ardhe sa jaghanā āryā jāteḥ ca lakṣaṇam

original: āryā prathamārdhalakṣma gītiḥ syācceddaladvaye / upagītirdvitīyārdhādudgītirvyatyayādbhavet //
analyzed: āryā prathama ardha lakṣma gītiḥ syāt ced dala dvaye upagītiḥ dvitīya ardhāt udgītiḥ vyatyayāt bhavet

original: āryāgītiścāntagururgotijāteśca lakṣaṇam / ṣaṭ kalā viṣame cetsyuḥ same 'ṣṭau na nirantarāḥ / samā parāśritā na syādvaitālīye ralau guruḥ //
analyzed: āryā gītiḥ ca anta guruḥ goti jāteḥ ca lakṣaṇam ṣaḍ kalāḥ viṣame ced syuḥ same ṣṭau na nirantarāḥ samā para āśritā na syāt vaitālīye ralau guruḥ

original: anter yau pūrvavadidamaupacchandasikaṃ matam //
analyzed: anteḥ yau pūrvavat idam aupacchandasikam matam

original: bhādgau syādāpātalikā jñeyātho dakṣiṇāntikā / parāśrito dvitīyo laḥ pādeṣu nikhileṣvapi //
analyzed: syāt āpātalikā jñeyā atho dakṣiṇāntikā parāśritaḥ dvitīyaḥ laḥ pādeṣu nikhileṣu api

original: udīcyavṛttirasame prācyavṛttistu yugmake / sapañcamaścaturthāṃśe yugapattau pravṛttakam //
analyzed: udīcya vṛttiḥ asame prācya vṛttiḥ tu yugmake sa pañcamaḥ caturtha aṃśe yuga pattau pravṛttakam

original: udīcyādyaṅghrisaṃyogādyugmapādaikapādikā / cāruhāsinyayugmāṅghrau vaitālīyasya saṃgrahaḥ //
analyzed: udīcya ādi aṅghri saṃyogāt yugma pāda eka pādikā cāru hāsinī ayugma aṅghrau vaitālīyasya saṃgrahaḥ

original: vaktraṃ nādyānnasau syātāṃ caturthādyagaṇo bhavet / pathyāvaktraṃ jena same viparītādiranyathā //
analyzed: vaktram syātām caturtha ādya gaṇaḥ bhavet pathyā vaktram jena same viparīta ādiḥ anyathā

original: usame naśca capalā vipulā laghusaptamā / nikhile vā saitavasya mrau ntau cābdhestatpūrvakau //
analyzed: naḥ ca capalāḥ vipulāḥ laghu saptamāḥ nikhile vā saitavasya m rau n tau ca abdheḥ tad pūrvakau

original: ṣoḍaśalo 'caladhṛtirmātrāsamakamucyate //
analyzed: cala dhṛtiḥ mātrāsamakam ucyate

original: navamalastathā go 'ntyaḥ jo nlauvāthāmbudheryathā / viślokaḥ syāttaccatuṣkadviguṇādvānavāsikā //
analyzed: navamalaḥ tathā gaḥ ntyaḥ jaḥ nlau vā atha ambudheḥ yathā  viślokaḥ syāt tad catuṣka dviguṇāt vānavāsikā

original: bāṇāṣṭanavakeṣu syāllaścitrā ṣoḍaśātmikā / samamātrāsamādiṣṭaṃ padākulakamīritam //
analyzed: bāṇa aṣṭa navakeṣu syāt laḥ citrā ṣoḍaśa ātmikā sama mātrā samādiṣṭam padākulakam īritam

original: vṛttamātrā vinā varṇairlā varṇā gurubhirvinā / guruvo lairdale nityaṃ pramāṇamiti niścitam //
analyzed: vṛtta mātrāḥ vinā varṇaiḥ lāḥ varṇāḥ gurubhiḥ vinā guruvaḥ laiḥ dale nityam pramāṇam iti niścitam

original: aṣṭāviṃśātilā gantā prathamārdhe dvitīyake / triṃśadasyāṃ śikhā gantā khañjātadvyatyayādbhavet //
analyzed: aṣṭāviṃśā tilāḥ gantā prathama ardhe dvitīyake triṃśat asyām śikhāḥ gantā khañ jāta dvyatyayāt bhavet

original: ṣoḍaśānaṅgakrīḍā gā dvātriṃśaccarame ca lāḥ / saptaviṃśātilā gantā dalayo rucirā dvayoḥ //
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa anaṅga krīḍāḥ gāḥ dvātriṃśat carame ca lāḥ saptaviṃśā tilāḥ gantā dalayoḥ rucirāḥ dvayoḥ

original: mātrāvṛttāni coktāni varṇavṛttāni vacmi vai //
analyzed: mātrā vṛttāni ca uktāni varṇa vṛttāni vacmi vai

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe chandaḥ śāstre āryāvṛttādichandolakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe chandaḥ śāstre āryāvṛttādichandolakṣaṇanirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭottaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 209
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / śrīrukthā gena sā jñeyā utyukthā strī gurudvayam / mo nārī ro mṛgī madhyā magau kanyā pratiṣṭhayā //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca śrīḥ ukthā sā jñeyā uti ukthā strī guru dvayam nārī raḥ mṛgī madhyā ma gau kanyā pratiṣṭhayā

original: bho gau paṅktiḥ suprātiṣṭhā tanumadhyā tayau smṛtā / nayābhyāṃ bālalalitā gāyatrīcchanda eva hi //
analyzed: bho gau paṅktiḥ suprātiṣṭhā tanumadhyā smṛtā nayābhyām bālalalitā gāyatrī chandaḥ eva hi

original: masagairmadalekhā syāduṣṇikchandaḥ smṛtaṃ budhaiḥ / bhau gau citrapadā khyātā vidyunmālā mamau gagau //
analyzed: masagaiḥ madalekhā syāt uṣṇih chandaḥ smṛtam budhaiḥ bhau gau citrapadā khyātā vidyunmālā

original: māṇavakaṃ bhāttalagā mnau gau haṃsarutaṃ smṛtam / samānikā rajagalā jaralā gaḥ pramāṇikā / ābhyāmanyadvitānaṃ syādanuṣṭupchanda īritam //
analyzed: māṇavakam bhāt talagā m nau gau haṃsarutam smṛtam samānikā rajagalā jaralā gaḥ pramāṇikā ābhyām anyat vitānam syāt anuṣṭubh chandaḥ īritam

original: ranasaiḥ syāddhalamukhī nau maḥ śiśubhṛtā bhavet / bṛhatīchanda ityuktaṃ smau jagau sa virājitam //
analyzed: syāt halamukhī nau maḥ śiśubhṛtā bhavet bṛhatī chandaḥ iti uktam smau jagau sa virājitam

original: paṇavaṃ syānmanayagairmayūrasāriṇī bhavet / rajābhyāñca ragābhyāñca rukmavatī bhamau sagau //
analyzed: paṇavam syāt mana ya gaiḥ mayūrasāriṇī bhavet rajābhyām ca ragābhyām ca rukmavatī bha mau sa gau

original: mattā mabhasagairyuktā narajā go manoramā / paṅkticchandaḥ samākhyātaṃ jasatā gāvupasthitam //
analyzed: mattā nara jā gauḥ manoramā paṅkti chandaḥ samākhyātam jasatā gauḥ upasthitam

original: tau jo gāvindravajrā syājjatajgā gupapūrvikā //
analyzed: tau jaḥ gauḥ indravajrā syāt jatajgā gupa pūrvikā

original: upajātayo 'nyādyantāḥ sumukhī najajā lagau / bhabhabhā gau dodhakaṃ syācchālinī matatā gagau //
analyzed: upajātayaḥ ni ādi antāḥ sumukhī na ja jāḥ lagau bha bha bhāḥ gau dodhakam syāt śālinī mata tāḥ ga gau

original: abdhilokaiśca vicchedo vātorṃmo mamatā gagau / śrīrbhatau nanagāḥ proktā pañcabhiḥ ṣaḍūbhireva ca //
analyzed: abdhi lokaiḥ ca vicchedaḥ vāta ūrṃmaḥ mamatā ga gau  / na nagāḥ proktā pañcabhiḥ ca

original: maganā no go bhramaravilāsitamudāhṛtam / rathoddhatār nau ralagāḥ svāgatā ranabhā gagau //
analyzed: no gaḥ bhramaravilāsitam udāhṛtam  rathoddhatāḥ nau ra lagāḥ svāgatāḥ ra na bhāḥ ga gau

original: vṛttā nanau sagau gaḥ syānnau ralau gaḥ samadrikā / rajarā lgau śyenikā syājjasatā gau śikhaṇḍitam / triṣṭupchandaḥ samākhyātaṃ piṅgalena mahātmanā //
analyzed: vṛttā na nau sa gau gaḥ syāt nau ra lau gaḥ samadrikā  rajarā l gau śyenikā syāt jasatā gau śikhaṇḍitam  triṣṭubh chandaḥ samākhyātam piṅgalena mahātmanā

original: ranau bhasau candravartma vaṃśasthaṃ syājjatau jarau / tato jarāvindravaṃśā vedasaistoṭakaṃ smṛtam / nbhau bhrau drutavilambitaṃ puṭaśca syānnanau mayau //
analyzed: ra nau bha sau candravartma vaṃśastham syāt ja tau jarau tatas jarau indravaṃśā vedasaiḥ toṭakam smṛtam  n bhau bhrau druta vilambitam puṭaḥ ca syāt na nau ma yau

original: vasuvedaiśca viratirmuditavadanā tviyam / nanararaiḥ samākhyātā nayanā yastathā bhavet //
analyzed: vasu vedaiḥ ca viratiḥ mudita vadanā tu iyam samākhyātā nayanā yaḥ tathā bhavet

original: sā tu kusumavicitrā jaloddhatagatī rasaiḥ / jasau jasau ca pādeṣu catūraiḥ stragviṇī matā //
analyzed: sā tu kusuma vicitrā jala uddhata gatī rasaiḥ ca pādeṣu catūraiḥ stragviṇī matā

original: bhujaṅgaprayātaṃ vṛttaṃ catubhiryaiḥ prakīrtitam / prayaṃvadā nabhajraiśca maṇimālā tayau tayau //
analyzed: bhujaṅgaprayātam vṛttam catubhiḥ yaiḥ prakīrtitam prayaṃvadā nabha jraiḥ ca maṇimālā tayau tayau

original: guhavaktraiśca sannidrā lalitā syāttabhau jarau / pramitākṣarā sajasasairujjvalā tu nanau bharau //
analyzed: guha vaktraiḥ ca sannidrā lalitā syāt ta bhau jarau pramitā akṣarā sa ja sa saiḥ ujjvalā tu nanau bha rau

original: mamau yayau vaiśvadevī pañcāśvaiśca yatirbhavet / mabhau samau jaladharamālābdhyantyairyatibhavet //
analyzed: yayau vaiśvadevī pañca aśvaiḥ ca yatiḥ bhavet samau jaladhara mālā abdhi antyaiḥ yatiḥ bhavet

original: nau tatau gaḥ kṣamāvṛttaṃ turagaiśca rasairyatiḥ / praharṣiṇī manau jrau gā vahnibhirdaśabhiryatiḥ //
analyzed: nau tatau gaḥ kṣamā vṛttam turagaiḥ ca rasaiḥ yatiḥ praharṣiṇī manau j rau gāḥ vahnibhiḥ daśabhiḥ yatiḥ

original: jabhau sajau go rucirā caturbhiśca grahairyatiḥ / mattamayūraṃ matayāḥ sagau devagrahairyatiḥ //
analyzed: jabhau sa jau gauḥ rucirā caturbhiḥ ca grahaiḥ yatiḥ matta mayūram mata yāḥ sa gauḥ deva grahaiḥ yatiḥ

original: mañjubhāṣiṇī sajsā jgau sunandinī sajasā magau / nanau tatau candrikā gaḥ saptabhiśca rasairyatiḥ //
analyzed: mañjubhāṣiṇī sa jsā j gau sunandinī sa jasā ma gau na nau ta tau candrikā gaḥ saptabhiḥ ca rasaiḥ yatiḥ

original: asambādhā matanasā gagau bāṇagrahairyatiḥ / nanarāḥ so ladhuguruḥ svaraiḥ proktāparājitā //
analyzed: asambādhāḥ ma ta nasāḥ ga gau bāṇa grahaiḥ yatiḥ na na rāḥ saḥ la dhu guruḥ svaraiḥ proktā aparājitā

original: nanau bhanau praharaṇakalikeyaṃ lagau tathā / vasantatilakā siṃhonnatā tabhjā jagau guruḥ //
analyzed: na nau bha nau praharaṇa kalikā iyam la gau tathā vasantatilakā siṃhonnatā jagau guruḥ

original: bhajau sanau gagāvinduvadanātha sukeśaram / naranā ralagāḥ pāde śarkarī pratipāditā //
analyzed: bhajau sanau gagau indu vadanā atha sukeśaram  nara nāḥ ra lagāḥ pāde śarkarī pratipāditā

original: caturdaśalaghuḥ syācca śreṣṭhā śaśikalā sagā / rasagrahayatiḥ sraksrā vasuśailayatistathā //
analyzed: caturdaśa laghuḥ syāt ca śreṣṭhā śaśi kalā sa gā rasagraha yatiḥ sraksrā vasu śaila yatiḥ tathā

original: syānmaṇiguṇanikaro mālinī nanamā yayau / vasusvarayatiḥ syācca najau bhajrāḥ prabhadrakam //
analyzed: syāt maṇi guṇa nikaraḥ mālinī nanamā yayau vasu svara yatiḥ syāt ca na jau bhajrāḥ prabhadrakam

original: elā sayau nanau yaḥsyāccitralekhāsvarāṣṭakaiḥ / marau mayau yaśca bhavedukteyamati śarkarī //
analyzed: elā sa yau na nau yaḥ syāt citralekhā svara aṣṭakaiḥ ma rau ma yau yaḥ ca bhavet uktā iyam ati śarkarī

original: svarātkhaṃ vṛṣabhagajajṛmbhitaṃ bhrananā nagau / najabhajarā vāṇinī gaḥ piṅgalenāṣṭirīritā //
analyzed: svarāt kham vṛṣabha gaja jṛmbhitam bhra nanāḥ nagau naja bhaja rāḥ vāṇinī gaḥ piṅgalena aṣṭiḥ īritā

original: rasarudraiḥ śikhariṇī yamau nasabhalā guruḥ / vasugrayatiḥ pṛthvī jasau jasayalā guruḥ //
daśasvarairvaṃśapatrapatitaṃ bhraunnabhā lagau / ṣaḍvedāśvaiśca hariṇī nasamā rasalā guruḥ //
analyzed: daśa svaraiḥ vaṃśa patra patitam bhraut nabhāḥ lagau ṣaṣ veda aśvaiḥ ca hariṇī na samā rasalā guruḥ

original: mandākrāntabdhiṣaḍnagairmabhanāstatagā guruḥ / nardaṭakaṃ najabhajā jalau go yatireva ca //
analyzed: guruḥ nardaṭakam na ja bha jāḥ jalau gaḥ yatiḥ eva ca

original: saptartvabdhiḥ kokilakamatyaṣṭiḥ syācca pūrvavat / bhūtartvaśvaiḥ kusumitalatā mtau nyau yayau dhṛtiḥ //
analyzed: sapta ṛtu abdhiḥ kokilakam atyaṣṭiḥ syāt ca pūrvavat bhūta ṛtu aśvaiḥ kusumita latā m tau nyau yayau dhṛtiḥ

original: rasartvaśvairyamau nsau rau meghavisphūrjitā ragau / śārdūlavikrīḍitaṃ maḥ sūryaśvaiḥ sajsatāstagau //
analyzed: rasa ṛtu aśvaiḥ yamau nsau rau megha visphūrjitāḥ ragau śārdūla vikrīḍitam maḥ sūrya śvaiḥ

original: chando hyatidhṛtiḥ proktamata ūrdhvaṃ kṛtirbhavet / saptāśvartuḥ suvadanā bhrau manau yabhalā guruḥ //
analyzed: chandaḥ hi atidhṛtiḥ proktam atas ūrdhvam kṛtiḥ bhavet saptāśva ṛtuḥ suvadanā bhrau manau yabhalā guruḥ

original: vṛttaṃ rajau rajau pāde rajau go laḥ kṛtirbhavet / trisaptakaiḥ snagdharā syātprakṛtirmnabhanaistriyaiḥ //
analyzed: vṛttam rajau rajau pāde rajau gaḥ laḥ kṛtiḥ bhavet tri saptakaiḥ snagdharā syāt prakṛtiḥ

original: digarkairbhadrakaṃ bhrau nrau naranā go yathākṛtiḥ / najau bhaśvāśvalalitaṃ jabhau jabhalagā bhavet //
analyzed: diś arkaiḥ bhadrakam bhrau nrau nara nāḥ gaḥ yathā ākṛtiḥ na jau bha śva aśva lalitam ja bhau ja bha lagā bhavet

original: mattākrīḍañcāṣṭabāṇadaśakairmau tanau nanau / nalau guruśca vikṛtiśchinnā saṃkṛtirucyate //
analyzed: matta ākrīḍan ca aṣṭa bāṇa daśakaiḥ mau tanau nanau nalau guruḥ ca vikṛtiḥ chinnā saṃkṛtiḥ ucyate

original: pañcāśvārkairbhatau tanvī nasabhā bhanayā gaṇāḥ / krauñcapadā bāṇaśaravasuśailairbhamau sabhau //
analyzed: tanvī na sabhāḥ bha nayāḥ gaṇāḥ krauñcapadāḥ bāṇa śara vasu śailaiḥ bha mau sabhau

original: nau nau go 'tikṛtiḥ proktā cchando hyutkṛtirucyate / vasvīśāśvairmamatanaiḥ syādbhujaṅgavijṛmbhitam //
analyzed: nau nau go tikṛtiḥ proktā chandaḥ hi utkṛtiḥ ucyate vasvīśā aśvaiḥ mamatanaiḥ syāt bhujaṅga vijṛmbhitam

original: nanarasairlagayuktaiśca apavāhākhyakaṃ yatiḥ / guhaiḥ ṣaḍbhī rasairbāṇairmonāḥ ṣaṭsagagā gaṇāḥ //
analyzed: na na rasaiḥ laga yuktaiḥ ca apavāha ākhyakam yatiḥ guhaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ rasaiḥ bāṇaiḥ monāḥ ṣaṣ sa ga gāḥ gaṇāḥ

original: caṇḍavṛttiprapāto 'sau daṇḍako nau tato 'garaḥ / raphevṛddhāntakādasya vyālajīmūtakādayaḥ //
analyzed: caṇḍavṛtti prapātau sau daṇḍakaḥ nau tatas garaḥ vyāla jīmūtaka ādayaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe samavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma navottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe samavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇam nāma navottaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 210
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / sasasalagāśca viṣame pāde yadyupacitrakam / same bhau bhagagāḥ syuśca drutamadhyā bhabhau bhagau //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca sa sa sa la gāḥ ca viṣame pāde yadi upacitrakam same bhau bhaga gāḥ syuḥ ca druta madhyāḥ bha bhau bha gau

original: gaḥ pāde viṣame 'nyatra najau jyau ca gaṇau smṛtau //
analyzed: gaḥ pāde viṣame ni atra na jau jyau ca gaṇau smṛtau

original: viṣame vegavatī sā gaḥ same bhau bho gagau gaṇāḥ / pāde 'same tajau ro gaḥ same masau jagau garuḥ / bhavedbhadravirāṭ ketumatī tu viṣame sajau //
analyzed: viṣame vegavatī sā gaḥ same bhau bho gagau gaṇāḥ pāde same ta jau raḥ gaḥ same ma sau ja gau garuḥ bhavet bhadra virāj ketumatī tu viṣame sa jau

original: sagau same bhrau nagagā ākhyānakī tvathāsame / tau jo gagau same pāde jatajā gurukadvayam //
analyzed: sa gau same bhrau na ga gāḥ ākhyānakī tu atha asame tau jaḥ ga gau same pāde jata jāḥ guruka dvayam

original: viparītākhyānakaṃ syādviṣame jastajau gagau / tatau jagau same gaḥ syāt piṅgalena hyudāhṛtam //
analyzed: viparīta ākhyānakam syāt viṣame jaḥ ta jau ga gau tatau ja gau same gaḥ syāt piṅgalena hi udāhṛtam

original: pāde 'tha viṣame caiva puṣpitāgrā nanau rayau / same najau jarau gaśca vaitālīyaṃ vadanti hi / vṛttañcāparavaktrākhyamaupacchandasikaṃ param //
analyzed: pāde viṣame ca eva puṣpita agrāḥ na nau ra yau same na jau ja rau gaḥ ca vaitālīyam vadanti hi vṛttam ca aparavaktra ākhyam aupacchandasikam param

original: vāṅmatī rajarā yaḥ syādayugme jarajā ragau //
analyzed: vāṅmatī rajarā yaḥ syāt ayugme jarajāḥ ragau

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍer'ddhasamavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācārakāṇḍerddhasamavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇam nāma daśottaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 211
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / prathamo 'ṣṭākṣaraiḥ pādo dvitīyo dvādaśākṣaraiḥ / tṛtīyaḥ ṣoḍaśārṇaiśca viṃśadvarṇaiścaturthakaḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca prathamaḥ ṣṭa akṣaraiḥ pādaḥ dvitīyaḥ dvādaśa akṣaraiḥ tṛtīyaḥ ṣoḍaśa arṇaiḥ ca viṃśat varṇaiḥ caturthakaḥ

original: sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ padacaturūrdhvābhiradhasya hi //
analyzed: sāmānya lakṣaṇam pada catur ūrdhvābhiḥ adhasya hi

original: āpīḍaḥ sarvalaḥ proktaḥ pūrvapādāntagadvayaḥ //
dvitīye 'ṣṭākṣaraiḥ pāde kalikā prathamer'kaje / lavalī syāttṛtīye 'tha pūrvavaccāṣṭa kākṣare / proktā cāmṛtadhāreyaṃ caturaṣṭākṣare sati //
analyzed: dvitīye ṣṭa akṣaraiḥ pāde kalikā prathamā irka je lavalī syāt tṛtīye pūrvavat ca aṣṭa proktā ca amṛtadhārā iyam catur aṣṭa akṣare sati

original: (iti padacaturūrdhvaprakaraṇam) / sajau salau ca prathame nasajā go dvitīyake / tṛtīye bhanabhā gaśca caturthe sajasā jagau //
analyzed: iti pada catur ūrdhva prakaraṇam sa jau sa lau ca prathame na sa jāḥ gaḥ dvitīyake tṛtīye bha na bhāḥ gaḥ ca caturthe sa ja sā ja gau

original: pūrvavatsyātsaurabhakaṃ tṛtīye 'ghrau ranau bhagau / lalitañcādgatāvatsyātṛtīyeṃ'ghrau nanau sasau //
analyzed: pūrvavat syāt saurabhakam tṛtīye ghrau ra nau bha gau na nau sa sau

original: (ityudgatāprakaraṇam) / upasthitapracupitaṃ prathame 'ghrau masau jabhau / gau dvitīye sanajarā gastṛtīye nanau ca saḥ / nau najau yaścaturthe syāccheṣa pādāśca pūrvavat //
analyzed: iti udgatā prakaraṇam upasthita pracupitam prathame ghrau ma sau ja bhau gau dvitīye sa na ja rāḥ gaḥ tṛtīye na nau ca saḥ nau na jau yaḥ caturthe syāt śeṣa pādāḥ ca pūrvavat

original: tṛtīrye 'ghrau viśeṣaśca vṛttaṃ syānnau sanau nasau //
analyzed: tṛtīrye ghrau viśeṣaḥ ca vṛttam syāt nau sanau nasau

original: ārṣabhaṃ tajarāḥ pāde tṛtīye 'nyacca pūrvavat / pūrvavatprathamaṃ śeṣe tajrāḥ śuddhavirāḍbhavet //
analyzed: ārṣabham pāde tṛtīye pūrvavat pūrvavat prathamam śeṣe śuddha virāj bhavet

original: (ityupasthitapracupitaprakaraṇam) / viṣamākṣarapādaṃ vā pañcaṣaṭkādi yāvakam / chando 'tra noktā gātheti daśadharṃmādivadbhavet //
analyzed: iti upasthita pracupita prakaraṇam viṣama akṣara pādam vā pañca ṣaṭka ādi yāvakam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣamavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādaśottaradviśaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣamavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇam nāma ekādaśottaradviśaśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 212
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / prastāra ādyago 'tho laḥ paratulyo 'tha pūrvagaḥ / naṣṭamadhye sameṃ'ke laḥ same 'rdhe viṣame guruḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca prastāraḥ ādya gaḥ laḥ para tulyaḥ pūrva gaḥ  naṣṭa madhye sama iṃke laḥ same ṛdhe viṣame guruḥ

original: pratilomaguṇaṃ lādyaṃ dviruddiṣṭaka ekanut //
analyzed: pratiloma guṇam lādyam dvis uddiṣṭakaḥ eka nud

original: saṃkhyā dvirardhe rūpe tu śūnyaṃ śūnye dvirīritam / tāvadardhe tadguṇitaṃ dvirdvyūnantu tadantataḥ //
analyzed: saṃkhyā dvis ardhe rūpe tu śūnyam śūnye dvis īritam tāvat ardhe tat guṇitam dvis dvi ūnantu tat antatas

original: pare pūrṇaṃ pare pūrṇaṃ meruḥ prastārato bhavet //
analyzed: pare pūrṇam pare pūrṇam meruḥ prastārataḥ bhavet

original: lagasaṃkhyā vṛttasaṃkhyā cādyāṅgulamathordhvataḥ / saṃkhyaiva dviguṇaikonācchandaḥ sāro 'yamīritaḥ //
analyzed: laga saṃkhyā vṛtta saṃkhyā ca ādyā aṅgulam atha ūrdhvatas saṃkhyā eva sāraḥ yam īritaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamān- ācā- chandolakṣaṇaṃ nāma dvādaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe chandolakṣaṇam nāma dvādaśa uttara dviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 213
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / hareḥ śrutvābravīdbrahmā yathā vyāsāya śaunaka / brāhmaṇādisamācāraṃ sarvadaṃ te tathā vade //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca hareḥ śrutvā abravīt brahmā yathā vyāsāya śaunaka brāhmaṇa ādi samācāram sarva dam te tathā vade

original: śrutismṛtī tu vijñāya śrautaṃ karma samācaret / śrautaṃ karma na ceduktaṃ tadā smārtaṃ samācaret //
analyzed: śruti smṛtī tu vijñāya śrautam karma samācaret  śrautam karma na ced uktam tadā smārtam samācaret

original: tatrāpyaśaktaḥ karaṇe sadācāraṃ caredvudhaḥ / śrutismṛtī ha viprāṇāṃ locane karmadarśane //
analyzed: tatra api aśaktaḥ karaṇe sat ācāram caret vudhaḥ śruti smṛtī ha viprāṇām locane karma darśane

original: śrutyuktaḥ paramo dharmaḥ smṛtiśāstragato 'paraḥ / siṣṭācāreṇa saṃprāptastrayo dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ //
analyzed: śruti uktaḥ paramaḥ dharmaḥ smṛti śāstra gataḥ paraḥ siṣṭa ācāreṇa saṃprāptaḥ trayaḥ dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ

original: satyaṃ dānaṃ dayālobho vidyejyā pūjanaṃ damaḥ / aṣṭau tāni pavitrāṇi śiṣṭācārasya lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: satyam dānam dayā alobhaḥ vidyā ijyā pūjanam damaḥ aṣṭau tāni pavitrāṇi śiṣṭa ācārasya lakṣaṇam

original: tejomayāni pūrveṣāṃ śarīrāṇīndriyāṇi ca / na lipyate pātakena padmapatramivāmbhasā //
analyzed: tejaḥ mayāni pūrveṣām śarīrāṇi indriyāṇi ca  na lipyate pātakena padma patram iva ambhasā

original: nivāsamukhyā varṇānāṃ dharmācārāḥ prakīrtitāḥ / satyaṃ yajñastapo dānametaddharmasya lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: nivāsa mukhyāḥ varṇānām dharma ācārāḥ prakīrtitāḥ satyam yajñaḥ tapaḥ dānam etat dharmasya lakṣaṇam

original: adattasyānupādānaṃ dānamadhyayanaṃ japaḥ / vidyā vittaṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ kule janma tvarogitā //
analyzed: adattasya anupādānam dānam adhyayanam japaḥ vidyā vittam tapaḥ śaucam kule janma tu arogi tā

original: saṃsārocchittihetuśca dharmādeva pravartate / dharmātsukhaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca jñānānmokṣo 'dhigamyate //
analyzed: saṃsāra ucchitti hetuḥ ca dharmāt eva pravartate dharmāt sukham ca jñānam ca jñānāt mokṣaḥ dhigamyate

original: ijyādhyayanadānāni yathāśāstraṃ sanātanaḥ / brahmakṣattriyavaiśyānāṃ sāmānyo dharma ucyate //
analyzed: ijyā adhyayana dānāni yathāśāstram sanātanaḥ brahma kṣattriya vaiśyānām sāmānyaḥ dharmaḥ ucyate

original: yājanādhyayane śuddhe viśuddhācca pratigrahaḥ / vṛttitrayamidaṃ prāhurmunayaḥ śreṣṭhavarṇinaḥ //
analyzed: yājana adhyayane śuddhe viśuddhāt ca pratigrahaḥ vṛtti trayam idam prāhuḥ munayaḥ śreṣṭha varṇinaḥ

original: śastreṇājīvanaṃ rājño bhūtānāñcābhirakṣaṇam / pāśupālyaṃ kṛṣiḥ paṇyaṃ vaiśyasyājīvanaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: śastreṇa ājīvanam rājñaḥ bhūtānām ca abhirakṣaṇam pāśupālyam kṛṣiḥ paṇyam vaiśyasya ājīvanam smṛtam

original: śūdrasya dvijaśuśrūṣā dvijānāmanupūrvaśaḥ / gurau vāso 'gniśuśrūṣā svādhyāyo brahmacāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: śūdrasya dvija śuśrūṣā dvijānām anupūrvaśas gurau vāsaḥ gni śuśrūṣā svādhyāyaḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: triḥ snātā snāpitā bhaikṣyaṃ gurau prāṇāntikī sthitiḥ / samekhalo jaṭī daṇḍī muṇḍī vā gurusaṃśrayaḥ //
analyzed: tris snātā snāpitā bhaikṣyam gurau prāṇāntikī sthitiḥ sa mekhalaḥ jaṭī daṇḍī muṇḍī vā guru saṃśrayaḥ

original: agnihotropacaraṇaṃ jīvanaṃ ca svakarmabhiḥ / dharmadāreṣu kalpeta parvavarjaṃ ratikriyāḥ //
analyzed: agnihotra upacaraṇam jīvanam ca sva karmabhiḥ dharma dāreṣu kalpeta parva varjam rati kriyāḥ

original: devapitratitibhyaśca pūjādiṣvanukalpanam / śrutismṛtyarthasaṃsthānaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ gṛhamedhinaḥ //
analyzed: deva pitṛ atitibhyaḥ ca pūjā ādiṣu anukalpanam śruti smṛti artha saṃsthānam dharmaḥ yam gṛhamedhinaḥ

original: jaṭitvamagnihotratvaṃ bhūśayyājinadhāraṇam / vane vāsaḥ payomūlanīvāraphalavṛttitā //
analyzed: jaṭi tvam agnihotra tvam bhū śayyā ajina dhāraṇam vane vāsaḥ payaḥ mūla nīvāra phala vṛtti tā

original: pratiṣiddhānnivṛttiśca triḥ snānaṃ vratadhāritā / devatātithipūjā ca dharmo 'yaṃ vanavāsinaḥ //
analyzed: pratiṣiddhāt nivṛttiḥ ca tris snānam vrata dhāri tā  devatā atithi pūjā ca dharmaḥ yam vanavāsinaḥ

original: sarvārambhaparityāgo bhikṣānnaṃ vṛkṣamūlatā / niṣparigrahatādrohaḥ samatā sarvajantuṣu //
analyzed: sarva ārambha parityāgaḥ bhikṣā annam vṛkṣa mūla tā niṣparigraha tā drohaḥ sama tā sarva jantuṣu

original: priyāpriyapariṣvaṅgesukhaduḥ khādhikāritā / sabāhyābhyantare śaucaṃ vāgyamo dhyānacāritā //
sarvaidriyasamāhāro dhāraṇādhyānanityatā / bhāvasaṃśuddhiretyeṣa parivrāḍdharma ucyate //
analyzed: sarva aidriya samāhāraḥ dhāraṇā dhyāna nityatā bhāva saṃśuddhiḥ eti eṣa parivrāj dharmaḥ ucyate

original: ahiṃsā sūnṛtā vāṇī satyaśauce kṣamā dayā / varṇināṃ liṅgināṃ caiva sāmānyo dharma ucyate //
analyzed: ahiṃsā sūnṛtā vāṇī satya śauce kṣamā dayā varṇinām liṅginām ca eva sāmānyaḥ dharmaḥ ucyate

original: yathoktakāriṇaḥ sarve prayānti paramāṃ gatim / ā bodhātsvapanaṃ yāvat gṛhidharmaṃ ca vacmi te //
analyzed: yathā ukta kāriṇaḥ sarve prayānti paramām gatim ā bodhāt svapanam yāvat gṛhi dharmam ca vacmi te

original: brāhme muhūrte budhyeta dharmārthau cānucintayet / kāyakleśāṃśca tanmūlānvedatattvārthameva ca //
analyzed: brāhme muhūrte budhyeta dharma arthau ca anucintayet kāya kleśān ca tad mūlān veda tattva artham eva ca

original: śarvaryante samutthāya kṛtaśaucaḥ samāhitaḥ / snātvā sandhyāmupāsīta sarvakālamatandritaḥ //
analyzed: śarvarī ante samutthāya kṛta śaucaḥ samāhitaḥ snātvā sandhyām upāsīta sarvakālam atandritaḥ

original: prātaḥ sandhyāmupā sīta dantadhāvanapūrvikām / ubhe mūtrapurīṣe ca divā kuryādudaṅmukhaḥ //
analyzed: prātar sandhyām upā sīta danta dhāvana pūrvikām ubhe mūtra purīṣe ca divā kuryāt udak mukhaḥ

original: rātrau ca dakṣiṇe kuryādubhe sandhye yathā divā / chāyāyāmandhakāre vā rātrau vāhani vā dvijaḥ //
analyzed: rātrau ca dakṣiṇe kuryāt ubhe sandhye yathā divā chāyāyām andhakāre vā rātrau vā ahani vā dvijaḥ

original: yathā tu samukhaḥ kuryātprāṇabādhābhayeṣu ca / gomayāṅgāravalmīkaphālākṛṣṭe śubhe //
analyzed: yathā tu samukhaḥ kuryāt prāṇa bādhā bhayeṣu ca gomaya aṅgāra valmīka phāla ākṛṣṭe śubhe

original: mārgopajīvyacchāyāsu na mūtraṃ ca purīṣakam / antarjalāddevagṛhādvalmīkānmūṣikasthalāt //
analyzed: mārga upajīvya chāyāsu na mūtram ca purīṣakam antar jalāt devagṛhāt valmīkāt mūṣika sthalāt

original: pareṣāṃ śaucaśiṣṭācca śmaśānācca mṛdaṃ tyajet / ekāṃ liṅge mṛdaṃ dadyādvāma haste mṛdaṃ dvidhā //
analyzed: pareṣām śauca śiṣṭāt ca śmaśānāt ca mṛdam tyajet ekām liṅge mṛdam dadyāt vāma haste mṛdam dvidhā

original: ubhayordve ca dātavye mūtraśaucaṃ pracakṣate / ekāṃ liṅge gude tistrastathā vāmakare daśa //
analyzed: ubhayoḥ dve ca dātavye mūtra śaucam pracakṣate ekām liṅge gude tistraḥ tathā vāma kare daśa

original: pañca pāde daśaikasminkarayoḥ saptamṛttikāḥ / ardhaprasṛtimātrā tu prathamā mṛttikā smṛtā //
analyzed: pañca pāde daśa ekasmin karayoḥ sapta mṛttikāḥ ardha prasṛti mātrā tu prathamā mṛttikā smṛtā

original: dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā ca tadardhā parikīrtitā / upaviṣṭastu viṇmūtraṃ kartuṃ yastu na vindati //
analyzed: dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā ca tad ardhā parikīrtitā upaviṣṭaḥ tu viṣ mūtram kartum yaḥ tu na vindati

original: sa kuryādardhaśaucaṃ tu svasya śaucasya sarvadā / divā śaucasya rātryardhaṃ yadvā pādo vidhīyate //
analyzed: sa kuryāt ardha śaucam tu svasya śaucasya sarvadā  divā śaucasya rātri ardham yat vā pādaḥ vidhīyate

original: svasthasya tu yathoddiṣṭamārtaḥ kuryādyathābalam / vasā śukramasṛṅ majjā lālā viṇmūtrakarṇaviṭ //
analyzed: svasthasya tu yathoddiṣṭam ārtaḥ kuryāt yathābalam vasā śukram asṛk majjā lālā viṣ mūtra karṇa viṣ

original: śleṣmāśradūṣikā svedo dvādaśaite nṛṇāṃ malāḥ / manyeta yāvatā śuddhiṃ tāvacchaucaṃ samācaret //
analyzed: śleṣmā śradūṣikā svedaḥ dvādaśā ete nṛṇām malāḥ manyeta yāvatā śuddhim tāvat śaucam samācaret

original: pramāṇaṃ śaucasaṃkhyāyā nādiṣṭairavaśiṣyate / śaucaṃ tu dvividhaṃ proktaṃ bāhyamābhyantaraṃ tathā //
analyzed: pramāṇam śauca saṃkhyāyāḥ na ādiṣṭaiḥ avaśiṣyate śaucam tu dvividham proktam bāhyam ābhyantaram tathā

original: mṛjjalābhyāṃ smṛtaṃ bāhyaṃ bhāvaśuddhirathāntaram / trirācāmedapaḥ pūrvaṃ dviḥ pramṛjyāttato mukham //
analyzed: mṛd jalābhyām smṛtam bāhyam bhāvaśuddhiḥ atha antaram tris ācāmet apaḥ pūrvam dvis pramṛjyāt tatas mukham

original: saṃmṛjyāṅguṣṭhamūlena tribhirāsyamupaspṛśet / aṅguṣṭhena pradeśinyā ghrāṇaṃ paścādanantaram //
analyzed: saṃmṛjya aṅguṣṭha mūlena tribhiḥ āsyam upaspṛśet  aṅguṣṭhena pradeśinyā ghrāṇam paścāt anantaram

original: aṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyāṃ ca cakṣuḥ śrotre punaḥ punaḥ / kaniṣṭhāṅgaṣṭhayornābhiṃ hṛdayaṃ tu talena vai //
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha anāmikābhyām ca cakṣuḥ śrotre punar punar kaniṣṭhā aṅgaṣṭhayoḥ nābhim hṛdayam tu talena vai

original: sarvābhistu śiraḥ paścādbāhū cāgreṇa saṃspṛśet / ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni triḥ paṭhanprīṇayetkramāt //
analyzed: sarvābhiḥ tu śiraḥ paścāt bāhū ca agreṇa saṃspṛśet ṛcaḥ yajūṃṣi sāmāni tris paṭhan prīṇayet kramāt

original: atharvāṅgirasau pūrvaṃ dviḥ pramārṣṭyatha tansukham / itihāsapurāṇāni vedāṅgāni vedāṅgāni yathākramam //
analyzed: atharva aṅgirasau pūrvam dvis pramārṣṭi atha tat sukham itihāsa purāṇāni vedāṅgāni vedāṅgāni yathākramam

original: khaṃ mukhe nāsike vāyuṃ netre sūryaṃ śrutī (tīrdi) diśaḥ / prāṇagranthimatho nābhiṃ brahmāṇaṃ hṛdaye spṛśet //
analyzed: kham mukhe nāsike vāyum netre sūryam śrutī diśaḥ  prāṇagranthim atho nābhim brahmāṇam hṛdaye spṛśet

original: rudraṃ mūrdhnā samālabhya prīṇātyatha śikhāmṛṣīn / bāhū yamendravaruṇakuberavasudhānalān //
analyzed: rudram mūrdhnā samālabhya prīṇāti atha śikhām ṛṣīn bāhū yama indra varuṇa kubera vasudhā analān

original: abhyukṣya caraṇau viṣṇumindraṃ viṣṇu karadvayam / agnirvāyuśca sūryendugirayo 'ṅguliparvasu //
analyzed: abhyukṣya caraṇau viṣṇum indram viṣṇu kara dvayam agniḥ vāyuḥ ca sūrya indu girayaḥ ṅguli parvasu

original: gaṅgādyāḥ saritastāsu yā rekhāḥ karamadhyagāḥ / uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte śaucaṃ kṛtvā yathārthavat //
analyzed: gaṅgā ādyāḥ saritaḥ tāsu yāḥ rekhāḥ kara madhya gāḥ uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte śaucam kṛtvā yathārtha vat

original: tataḥ snānarṃ pkurvīta dantadhāvanapūrvakam / mukhe paryuṣite nityaṃ bhavatyaprayato naraḥ //
analyzed: tatas danta dhāvana pūrvakam mukhe paryuṣite nityam bhavati aprayataḥ naraḥ

original: tasmātsarvaprayatnena kuryādvai dantaghāvanam / kadambabilvakhadirakaravīravaṭārjunāḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena kuryāt vai danta ghāvanam kadamba bilva khadira karavīra vaṭa arjunāḥ

original: yūthī ca bṛhatī jātī karañjārkātimuktakāḥ / jambūmadhūkā pāmārgaśirīṣodumbarāsanāḥ //
analyzed: yūthī ca bṛhatī jātī karañja arka atimuktakāḥ jambū madhūkā pāmārga śirīṣa udumbara asanāḥ

original: kṣīrikaṇṭakivṛkṣādyāḥ praśastā dantadhāvane / kaṭutiktakaṣāyāśca dhanārogyasukhapradāḥ //
analyzed: kṣīri kaṇṭaki vṛkṣa ādyāḥ praśastāḥ danta dhāvane kaṭu tikta kaṣāyāḥ ca dhana ārogya sukha pradāḥ

original: prakṣālya bhuktvā ca śucau deśe tyaktvā tadācāmet / amāyāṃ ca tathā ṣaṣṭhyāṃ navamyāṃ pratipadyapi //
analyzed: prakṣālya bhuktvā ca śucau deśe tyaktvā tat ācāmet amāyām ca tathā ṣaṣṭhyām navamyām pratipadi api

original: varjayeddantakāṣṭhantu tathaivārkasya vāsare / abhāve danta kāṣṭhasya niṣiddhāyāṃ tathā tithau //
analyzed: varjayet dantakāṣṭham tu tathā eva arkasya vāsare abhāve danta kāṣṭhasya niṣiddhāyām tathā tithau

original: aṣāṃ dvādaśagaṇḍūṣaiḥ kurvīta mukhaśodhanam / prātaḥ snānaṃ praśaṃsanti dṛṣṭādṛṣṭakaraṃ hitam //
analyzed: dvādaśa gaṇḍūṣaiḥ kurvīta mukha śodhanam  prātar snānam praśaṃsanti dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa karam hitam

original: sarvamar hati śuddhātmā prātaḥ snāyī japādikam / atyantamalinaḥ kāyo navacchidrasamanvitaḥ //
analyzed: śuddha ātmā prātar snāyī japa ādikam atyanta malinaḥ kāyaḥ nava chidra samanvitaḥ

original: stravatyeṣa divā rātrau prātaḥ snānaṃ viśodhanam / manaḥ prasādajananaṃ rūpasaubhāgyavardhanam //
analyzed: stravati eṣa divā rātrau prātar snānam viśodhanam manaḥ prasāda jananam rūpa saubhāgya vardhanam

original: śokaduḥ khapraśamanaṃ gaṅgāsnānavadācaret / adya haste tu nakṣatre daśamyāṃ jyeṣṭhake site //
analyzed: śoka duḥ kha praśamanam gaṅgā snāna vat ācaret adya haste tu nakṣatre daśamyām jyeṣṭhake site

original: daśapāpa harāyāṃ ca adatvā dānakalmaṣam / viruddhācaraṇaṃ hiṃsā paradāropasevanam //
analyzed: daśapāpa harāyām ca a da tvā dāna kalmaṣam viruddha ācaraṇam hiṃsā paradāra upasevanam

original: pāruṣyānṛtapaiśunyamasambaddhābhibhāṣaṇam / paradravyābhidhānaṃ ca manasāniṣṭacintanam //
analyzed: pāruṣya anṛta paiśunyam asambaddha abhibhāṣaṇam para dravya abhidhānam ca manasā aniṣṭa cintanam

original: etaddaśāghaghātārthaṃ gaṅgāsnānaṃ karomyaham / prātaḥ saṃkṣepataḥ snānaṃ vānaprasthagṛhasthayoḥ //
analyzed: etat daśa agha ghāta artham gaṅgā snānam karomi aham prātar saṃkṣepataḥ snānam vānaprastha gṛhasthayoḥ

original: yatestriṣavaṇaṃ snānaṃ sakṛtta brahmacāriṇaḥ / ācamya tīrthamāvāhya snāyātsmṛtvāvyayaṃ harim //
analyzed: yateḥ triṣavaṇam snānam brahmacāriṇaḥ  ācamya tīrtham āvāhya snāyāt smṛtvā avyayam harim

original: tisraḥ koṭyastu vijñeyā mandehā nāma rākṣasāḥ / udayantaṃ durātmānaḥ sūryamicchanti khāditum //
analyzed: tisraḥ koṭyaḥ tu vijñeyāḥ mandehāḥ nāma rākṣasāḥ udayantam durātmānaḥ sūryam icchanti khāditum

original: sa hanti sūryaṃ sandhyāyāṃ nopāstiṃ kurute tu yaḥ / dahanti mantrapūtena toyenānalarūpiṇā //
analyzed: sa hanti sūryam sandhyāyām na upāstim kurute tu yaḥ dahanti mantra pūtena toyena anala rūpiṇā

original: ahorātrasya yaḥ sandhiḥ sā sandhyā bhavatīti ha / dvināḍikā bhavetsandhyā yāvadbhavati darśanam //
analyzed: ahar rātrasya yaḥ sandhiḥ sā sandhyā bhavati iti ha dvi nāḍikā bhavet sandhyā yāvat bhavati darśanam

original: gandhyākarmāvasāne tu svayaṃ homo vidhīyate / svayaṃ homaphalaṃ yattu tadanyena na jāyate //
analyzed: gandhyā karma avasāne tu svayam homaḥ vidhīyate svayam homa phalam yat tu tat anyena na jāyate

original: ṛtvikputro gururbhrātā bhāgineyo 'tha viṭpatiḥ / ebhireva hutaṃ yattu taddhutaṃ svayameva hi //
analyzed: ṛtvij putraḥ guruḥ bhrātā bhāgineyaḥ viṭpatiḥ ebhiḥ eva hutam yat tu tat hutam svayam eva hi

original: brahmā vai gārhapatyāgnirdakṣaṇāgnistrilocanaḥ / viṣṇurāhavanīyāgniḥ kumāraḥ satya ucyate //
analyzed: brahmā vai gārhapatya agniḥ dakṣaṇa agniḥ tri locanaḥ viṣṇuḥ āhavanīya agniḥ kumāraḥ satyaḥ ucyate

original: kṛtvā homaṃ yathākālaṃ saurānmantrāñjapettataḥ / samāhitātmā sāvitrīṃ praṇavaṃ ca yathoditam //
analyzed: kṛtvā homam yathākālam saurān mantrān japet tatas samāhita ātmā sāvitrīm praṇavam ca yathā uditam

original: praṇave nityayuktasya vyāhṛtīṣu ca saptasu / tripadāyāṃ ca sāvitryāṃ na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit //
analyzed: praṇave nitya yuktasya vyāhṛtīṣu ca saptasu tripadāyām ca sāvitryām na bhayam vidyate kvacid

original: gāyattrīṃ yo japennityaṃ kalyamutthāya mānavaḥ / lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatramivāmbhasā //
analyzed: gāyattrīm yaḥ japet nityam kalyam utthāya mānavaḥ  lipyate na sa pāpena padma patram iva ambhasā

original: śvetavarṇā samuddiṣṭā kauśaiyavasanā tathā / akṣasūtradharā devī padmāsanagatā śubhā //
analyzed: śveta varṇā samuddiṣṭā kauśaiya vasanā tathā akṣa sūtra dharā devī padmāsana gatā śubhā

original: āvāhya yajupānena tejo 'sīti vidhānataḥ / etadyajuḥ purā daivairdṛṣṭidarśanakāṅkṣibhiḥ //
analyzed: āvāhya yaju pānena vidhānataḥ etat yajuḥ purā daivaiḥ dṛṣṭi darśana kāṅkṣibhiḥ

original: ādityamaṇḍalāntaḥ sthāṃ brahmalokasthitāmapi / tatrāvāhya japitvāto namaskārādvisarjayet //
analyzed: āditya maṇḍala antar sthām brahma loka sthitām api tatra āvāhya japitvā atas namaskārāt visarjayet

original: pūrvāhna eva kurvīta devatānāṃ ca pūjanam / na viṣṇoḥ paramo devastasmāttaṃ pūjayetsadā //
analyzed: pūrvāhne eva kurvīta devatānām ca pūjanam na viṣṇoḥ paramaḥ devaḥ tasmāt tam pūjayet sadā

original: brahmaviṣṇuśivāndevānna pṛthagbhāvayetsudhīḥ / loke 'sminmaṅgalānyaṣṭau brāhmaṇo gaurhutāśanaḥ //
analyzed: brahma viṣṇu śivān devān na pṛthak bhāvayet sudhīḥ  loke smin maṅgalāni aṣṭau brāhmaṇaḥ gauḥ hutāśanaḥ

original: hiraṇyaṃ sarpirāditya āpo rājā tathāṣṭamaḥ / etāni satataṃ paśyedarcayecca pradakṣiṇam //
analyzed: hiraṇyam sarpiḥ ādityaḥ āpaḥ rājā tathā aṣṭamaḥ etāni satatam paśyet arcayet ca pradakṣiṇam

original: vedasyādhyayanaṃ pūrvaṃ vicārobhyasanaṃ japaḥ / taddānaṃ caiva śiṣyabhyo vedābhyāso hi pañcadhā //
analyzed: vedasya adhyayanam pūrvam vicāraḥ abhyasanam japaḥ tad dānam ca eva śiṣyabhyaḥ veda abhyāsaḥ hi pañcadhā

original: vedārthaṃ yajñaśāstrāṇi dharmaśāstrāṇi caiva hi / mūlyena lekhayitvā yo dadyādyāti sa vaidikam //
analyzed: veda artham yajña śāstrāṇi dharma śāstrāṇi ca eva hi mūlyena lekhayitvā yaḥ dadyāt yāti sa vaidikam

original: itihā sapurāṇāni likhitvāyaḥ prayacchati / brahmadānasamaṃ puṇyaṃ prāpnoti dviguṇīkṛtam //
analyzed: itihā sa purāṇāni likhitvā ayaḥ prayacchati brahma dāna samam puṇyam prāpnoti dviguṇīkṛtam

original: mṛtīye ca tathā bhāge poṣyavargārthasādhanam / mātā pitā gururbhrātā prajā dīnāḥ samāśritāḥ //
analyzed: mṛtīye ca tathā bhāge poṣya varga artha sādhanam mātā pitā guruḥ bhrātā prajāḥ dīnāḥ samāśritāḥ

original: abhyāgato 'tithiścāgniḥ poṣyavargā udāhṛtaḥ / bharaṇaṃ poṣyavargasya praśastaṃ svargasādhanam //
analyzed: tithiḥ ca agniḥ poṣya vargāḥ udāhṛtaḥ bharaṇam poṣya vargasya praśastam svarga sādhanam

original: bharaṇaṃ poṣya vargasya tasmādyatnena kārayet / sa jīvati varaścaiko bahubhiryopajīvyati //
analyzed: bharaṇam poṣya vargasya tasmāt yatnena kārayet sa jīvati varaḥ ca ekaḥ bahubhiḥ yā upajīvyati

original: jīvanto mṛtakāstvanye puruṣāḥ svodarambharāḥ / svakīyodarapūrtiśca kukkurasyāpi vidyate //
analyzed: jīvantaḥ mṛtakāḥ tu anye puruṣāḥ sva udarambharāḥ svakīya udara pūrtiḥ ca kukkurasya api vidyate

original: arthebhyo 'pi vivṛddhebhyaḥ sambhūtebhyastatastataḥ / kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pravartante parvatebhya ivāpagāḥ //
analyzed: arthebhyaḥ pi vivṛddhebhyaḥ sambhūtebhyaḥ tatas tatas  kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pravartante parvatebhyaḥ iva āpagāḥ

original: sarvaratnākarā bhūmirdhānyāni paśavaḥ striyaḥ / arthasya kāryayogitvādartha ityabhidhīyate //
analyzed: sarva ratna ākarā bhūmiḥ dhānyāni paśavaḥ striyaḥ arthasya kārya yogi tvāt arthaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: adroheṇaiva bhūtānāmalpadroheṇa vā punaḥ / yā vṛttistāṃ samāsthāya vipro jīvedanāpadi //
analyzed: adroheṇa eva bhūtānām alpa droheṇa vā punar yā vṛttiḥ tām samāsthāya vipraḥ jīvet anāpadi

original: dhanaṃ tu trividhaṃ jñeyaṃ śuklaṃ śabalameva ca / kṛṣṇaṃ ca tasya vijñeyo vibhāgaḥ saptadhā pṛthak //
analyzed: dhanam tu trividham jñeyam śuklam śabalam eva ca kṛṣṇam ca tasya vijñeyaḥ vibhāgaḥ saptadhā pṛthak

original: kramāyattaṃ prītidattaṃ prāptaṃ ca saha bhāryayā / aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāṃ varṇānāṃ trividhaṃ dhanam //
analyzed: krama āyattam prītidattam prāptam ca saha bhāryayā aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣām varṇānām trividham dhanam

original: vaiśeṣikaṃ dhanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇasya trilakṣaṇam / yājanādhyāpane nityaṃ viśuddhaśca (ddhācca)
analyzed: vaiśeṣikam dhanam dṛṣṭam brāhmaṇasya tri lakṣaṇam yājana adhyāpane nityam viśuddhaḥ ca ddhāt ca

original: pratigrahaḥ //
analyzed: pratigrahaḥ

original: trividhaṃ kṣatriyasyāpi prāhurvaiśeṣikaṃ dhanam / śuddhārthaṃ labdhakarajaṃ daṇḍāptaṃ jayajaṃ tathā //
analyzed: trividham kṣatriyasya api prāhuḥ vaiśeṣikam dhanam śuddha artham labdha kara jam daṇḍa āptam jaya jam tathā

original: vaiśeṣikaṃ dhanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vaiśyasyāpi vilakṣaṇam / kṛṣigorakṣavāṇijyaṃ śūdrasyaibhyastvanugrahāt //
analyzed: vaiśeṣikam dhanam dṛṣṭam vaiśyasya api vilakṣaṇam kṛṣi gorakṣa vāṇijyam śūdrasya ebhyaḥ tu anugrahāt

original: kusīdakṛṣivāṇijyaṃ prakurvīta svayaṃ param (kṛtam) / āpatkāle svayaṃ kurvannainasā yujyate dvijaḥ //
analyzed: kusīda kṛṣi vāṇijyam prakurvīta svayam param kṛtam  āpad kāle svayam kurvan na enasā yujyate dvijaḥ

original: bahavo vartanopāyā ṛṣibhiḥ parikīrtitāḥ / sarveṣāmapi caivaiṣāṃ kusīdamadhikaṃ viduḥ //
analyzed: bahavaḥ vartana upāyāḥ ṛṣibhiḥ parikīrtitāḥ sarveṣām api ca eva eṣām kusīdam adhikam viduḥ

original: anāvṛṣṭyā rājabhayānmūṣikādyairupadravaiḥ / kṛṣyādike bhavedbādhā sā kusīde na vidyate //
analyzed: anāvṛṣṭyāḥ rāja bhayāt mūṣika ādyaiḥ upadravaiḥ kṛṣi ādike bhavet bādhā sā kusīde na vidyate

original: śuklapakṣe tathā kṛṣṇe rajanyāṃ divasepi vā / uṣṇe varṣati śīte vā vardhanaṃ na nivartate //
analyzed: śuklapakṣe tathā kṛṣṇe rajanyām divase pi vā uṣṇe varṣati śīte vā vardhanam na nivartate

original: deśaṃ gatānāṃ yā vṛddhirnānāpaṇyopajīvinām / kusīdaṃ kurvataḥ samyak saṃsthitasyaiva jāyate //
analyzed: deśam gatānām yā vṛddhiḥ nānā paṇya upajīvinām kusīdam kurvataḥ samyak saṃsthitasya eva jāyate

original: labdhalābhaḥ pitṝndevānbrāhmaṇāṃścaiva pūjayet / te tṛptāstasya taddoṣaṃ śamayanti na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: labdha lābhaḥ pitṝn devān brāhmaṇān ca eva pūjayet te tṛptāḥ tasya tad doṣam śamayanti na saṃśayaḥ

original: vaṇikkusīdaṃ dadyādyo vastraṃ gāṅkāñcanādikam / kṛṣīvalo 'nnapānādiyānaśayyāsanāni ca //
analyzed: vaṇij kusīdam dadyāt yaḥ vastram gāṅ kāñcana ādikam kṛṣīvalaḥ nna pāna ādi yāna śayyā āsanāni ca

original: rājabhyo viṃśatiṃ dattvā paśusvarṇādikaṃ śatam / pādenāsya ca yāvakyaṃ kuryātsaṃcayamātmavān //
analyzed: rājabhyaḥ viṃśatim dattvā paśu svarṇa ādikam śatam pādena asya ca yāvakyam kuryāt saṃcayam ātmavān

original: ardhena cātmabharaṇaṃ nityanaimittikāṃnvitam / pādaṃ cetyarthayāmasya mūlabhūtaṃ vivardhayet //
analyzed: ardhena ca ātma bharaṇam nitya naimittika aṃnvitam pādam ca iti artha yāmasya mūla bhūtam vivardhayet

original: vidyā śilpaṃ bhūtiḥ sevā gorakṣā vipaṇiḥ kṛṣiḥ / vṛttirbhaikṣyaṃ kusīdaṃ ca daśa jīvanahetavaḥ //
analyzed: vidyā śilpam bhūtiḥ sevā gorakṣā vipaṇiḥ kṛṣiḥ vṛttiḥ bhaikṣyam kusīdam ca daśa jīvana hetavaḥ

original: pratigrahārjitā vipre kṣatriye śastranirjitā / vaiśye nyāyārjitāḥ svārthāḥ śūdre śuśrūṣayārjitāḥ //
analyzed: pratigraha arjitāḥ vipre kṣatriye śastra nirjitāḥ vaiśye nyāya arjitāḥ sva arthāḥ śūdre śuśrūṣayā arjitāḥ

original: nadī bahūdakā śākamṛtparṇāni samitkuśāḥ / āgneyo brahmaghoṣaśca viprāṇāṃ dhanamuttamam //
analyzed: nadī bahu udakā śāka mṛd parṇāni samidh kuśāḥ āgneyaḥ brahmaghoṣaḥ ca viprāṇām dhanam uttamam

original: ayācitopapanne tu nāsti doṣaḥ pratigrahe / amṛtaṃ tadvidurdevāstasmāttannaiva varjayet //
analyzed: a yācita upapanne tu na asti doṣaḥ pratigrahe  amṛtam tat viduḥ devāḥ tasmāt tat na eva varjayet

original: gurudravyāṃścaujjihīrṣurarciṣyande vatātithīn / sarvataḥ pratigṛhṇīyānna tuṣyettu svayaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: guru dravyān ca aujjihīrṣuḥ arciṣyande vatā atithīn  sarvatas pratigṛhṇīyāt na tuṣyet tu svayam tatas

original: sādhutaḥ pratigṛhṇīyādatha vāsādhuto dvijaḥ / guṇavānalpadoṣaśca nirguṇo hi nimajjati //
analyzed: sādhutaḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt atha vā a sādhutaḥ dvijaḥ guṇavān alpa doṣaḥ ca nirguṇaḥ hi nimajjati

original: evaṃ tvakṣavṛttyā vā kṛtvā bharaṇamātmanaḥ / kuryādviśuddhiṃ parataḥ prāyaścittaṃ dvijottamaḥ //
analyzed: evam tu akṣa vṛttyā vā kṛtvā bharaṇam ātmanaḥ  kuryāt viśuddhim paratas prāyaścittam dvijottamaḥ

original: caturthe ca tathā bhāge snānārthaṃ mṛda māharet / tilapuṣpakuśādīni snānaṃ cākṛtrime jale //
analyzed: caturthe ca tathā bhāge snāna artham mṛdam āharet tila puṣpa kuśa ādīni snānam ca akṛtrime jale

original: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ kriyāṅgaṃ malakarṣaṇam / mārjanācamāvagāhāścāṣṭasnānaṃ prakīrtitam //
analyzed: nityam naimittikam kāmyam kriyā aṅgam mala karṣaṇam mārjana ācamā avagāhāḥ ca aṣṭasnānam prakīrtitam

original: asnātastu pumānnārhe japāgnihavanādiṣu / prātaḥ snānaṃ tadarthaṃ tu nityasnānaṃ prakīrtitam //
analyzed: asnātaḥ tu pumān na arhe japa agni havana ādiṣu prātar snānam tad artham tu nitya snānam prakīrtitam

original: cāṇḍālaśavaviṣṭhādyānspṛṣṭvā snānaṃ rajasvalām / snānārhastu yadā snāti snānaṃ naimittikaṃ hi tat //
analyzed: cāṇḍāla śava viṣṭhā ādyān spṛṣṭvā snānam rajasvalām snāna arhaḥ tu yadā snāti snānam naimittikam hi tat

original: puṣyasnānādikaṃ snānaṃ daivajñavidhicoditam / taddhi kāmyaṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ nākāmastatprayojayet //
analyzed: puṣya snāna ādikam snānam daivajña vidhi coditam tat hi kāmyam samuddiṣṭam na akāmaḥ tat prayojayet

original: japtukāmaḥ pavitrāṇi arciṣyandevatātithīn / snānaṃ samācaredyastu kriyāṅgaṃ tacca kīrtitam //
analyzed: japtu kāmaḥ pavitrāṇi arciṣyan devatā atithīn snānam samācaret yaḥ tu kriyā aṅgam tat ca kīrtitam

original: malāpakarṣaṇārthāya pravṛttistatra nānyathā / saraḥ sudevakhāteṣu tīrtheṣu ca nadīṣu ca //
analyzed: mala apakarṣaṇa arthāya pravṛttiḥ tatra na anyathā saraḥ sudeva khāteṣu tīrtheṣu ca nadīṣu ca

original: snānameva kriyā yasmātkriyāsnānamataḥ param / adbhirgātrāṇi śudhyanti tīrthasnānātphalaṃ labhet //
analyzed: snānam eva kriyā yasmāt kriyā snānam atas param adbhiḥ gātrāṇi śudhyanti tīrtha snānāt phalam labhet

original: mārjanānmajjanairmantraiḥ pāpamāśu praṇaśyati / nityaṃ naimittikaṃ cāpi kriyāṅgaṃ malakarṣaṇam //
analyzed: mārjanāt majjanaiḥ mantraiḥ pāpam āśu praṇaśyati nityam naimittikam ca api kriyā aṅgam mala karṣaṇam

original: tīrthābhāve tu kartavyamuṣṇodakaparodakaiḥ / bhūmiṣṭhāduddhṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ tataḥ prastravaṇodakam //
analyzed: tīrtha abhāve tu kartavyam uṣṇa udaka para udakaiḥ  bhūmiṣṭhāt uddhṛtam puṇyam tatas prastravaṇa udakam

original: tato 'pi sārasaṃ puṇyaṃ tasmānnādeyamucyate / tīrthatoyaṃ tataḥ puṇyaṃ gāgaṃ puṇyaṃ tu sarvataḥ //
analyzed: sārasam puṇyam tasmāt na ādeyam ucyate  tīrtha toyam tatas puṇyam gāgam puṇyam tu sarvatas

original: gāgaṃ payaḥ punātyāśu pāpamāmaraṇāntikam / gayāyāṃ ca kurukṣetre yattoyaṃ samupasthitam //
analyzed: gāgam payaḥ punāti āśu pāpam āmaraṇāntikam  gayāyām ca kurukṣetre yat toyam samupasthitam

original: tasmāttu gāṅgamaparaṃ jānīyāttoyamuttamam / putrajanmani yogeṣu tathā saṃkramaṇe raveḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt tu gāṅgam aparam jānīyāt toyam uttamam putra janmani yogeṣu tathā saṃkramaṇe raveḥ

original: rāhośca darśane snānaṃ praśastaṃ niśi nānyathā / uṣasyuṣasi yatsnānaṃ sandhyāyāmudite ravau //
analyzed: rāhoḥ ca darśane snānam praśastam niśi na anyathā uṣasi uṣasi yat snānam sandhyāyām udite ravau

original: prājāpatyena tattulyaṃ mahāpātakanāśanam / yatphalaṃ dvādaśābdāni prājāpatye kṛte bhavet //
analyzed: prājāpatyena tat tulyam mahāpātaka nāśanam yat phalam dvādaśa abdāni prājāpatye kṛte bhavet

original: prātaḥ snāyī tadāpnoti varṣeṇa śraddhayānvitaḥ / ya icchedvipulān bhogāṃścandrasūryagrahopamān //
analyzed: prātar snāyī tat āpnoti varṣeṇa śraddhayā anvitaḥ yaḥ icchet vipulān bhogān candra sūrya graha upamān

original: prātaḥ snāyī bhavennityaṃ māsau dvau māghaphālgunau / yastu māghaṃ samāsādya prātaḥ snāyī haviṣyabhuk //
analyzed: prātar snāyī bhavet nityam māsau dvau māgha phālgunau yaḥ tu māgham samāsādya prātar snāyī haviṣya bhuj

original: itipāpaṃ mahāghoraṃ māsādeva vyapohati / mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vāpi bhrātaraṃ suhṛdaṃ gurum //
analyzed: iti pāpam mahā ghoram māsāt eva vyapohati mātaram pitaram vā api bhrātaram suhṛdam gurum

original: yamuddiśya nimajjeta dvādaśāṃśaṃ labhettu saḥ / tuṣyatyāmalakairviṣṇurekādaśyā viśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: yam uddiśya nimajjeta dvādaśa aṃśam labhet tu saḥ tuṣyati āmalakaiḥ viṣṇuḥ ekādaśyā viśeṣataḥ

original: śrīkāmaḥ sarvadā snānaṃ kurvotāmalakairnaraḥ / santāpaḥ kīrtiralpāyurdhanaṃ nidhanameva ca //
analyzed: śrī kāmaḥ sarvadā snānam santāpaḥ kīrtiḥ alpa āyuḥ dhanam nidhanam eva ca

original: ārogyaṃ sarvakāmāptirabhyaṅgādbhāskarādiṣu / upoṣitasya vratinaḥ kṛttakeśasya nāpitaiḥ //
analyzed: ārogyam sarva kāma āptiḥ abhyaṅgāt bhāskara ādiṣu upoṣitasya vratinaḥ kṛtta keśasya nāpitaiḥ

original: tāvacchrīstiṣṭhati prītā yāvattailaṃ na saṃspṛśet / evaṃ snātvā pitṝndevānmanuṣyāṃstarpayennaraḥ //
analyzed: tāvat śrīḥ tiṣṭhati prītā yāvat tailam na saṃspṛśet  evam snātvā pitṝn devān manuṣyān tarpayet naraḥ

original: nābhimātre jale sthitvā cintayedūrjamānasaḥ / āgacchantu me pitara imaṃ gṛhṇantvapoñjalim //
analyzed: nābhi mātre jale sthitvā cintayet ūrja mānasaḥ  āgacchantu me pitaraḥ imam gṛhṇantu apoñjalim

original: trīṃstrīnevāñjalīndadyādākāśe dakṣiṇe tathā / vasitvā vasanaṃ śuṣkaṃ sthalasthā starṇabarhiṣi //
analyzed: trīn trīn eva añjalīn dadyāt ākāśe dakṣiṇe tathā vasitvā vasanam śuṣkam sthala sthā starṇa barhiṣi

original: vidhijñāstarpaṇaṃ kuryurna pātre tu kadācana / yadapāṃ krūramāṃsāttu yadamedhyaṃ tu kiñcana //
analyzed: vidhi jñāḥ tarpaṇam kuryuḥ na pātre tu kadācana yat apām krūra māṃsāt tu yat amedhyam tu kiñcana

original: aśāntaṃ malinaṃ yacca tatsarvamapagacchatu / gṛhītvānena mantreṇa toyaṃ savyena pāṇinā //
analyzed: aśāntam malinam yat ca tat sarvam apagacchatu gṛhītvā anena mantreṇa toyam savyena pāṇinā

original: prakṣipoddiśi nairṛtyāṃ rakṣo 'pahataye tu tat / niṣiddhabhakṣaṇādyattu pāpādyacca pratigrahāt //
analyzed: prakṣipa uddiśi nairṛtyām rakṣaḥ upahataye tu tat niṣiddha bhakṣaṇāt yat tu pāpāt yat ca pratigrahāt

original: duṣkṛtaṃ yacca me kiñcidbāṅmanaḥ kāyakarmabhiḥ / punātu me tadindrastu varuṇaḥ sabṛhaspatiḥ //
analyzed: duṣkṛtam yat ca me kiñcid bāc manaḥ kāya karmabhiḥ punātu me tat indraḥ tu varuṇaḥ sa bṛhaspatiḥ

original: savitā ca bhagaścaiva munayaḥ sanakādayaḥ / ābrahmastambaparyantaṃ jagattṛpyatviti bruvan //
analyzed: savitā ca bhagaḥ ca eva munayaḥ sanaka ādayaḥ ā brahmastamba paryantam jagat tṛpyatu iti bruvan

original: kṣipedabañjalīṃstrīstu kurvansaṃkṣepatarpaṇam / surāṇāmarcanaṃ kuryādbrahmā dīnāmamatsarī //
analyzed: kṣipet abañjalīn trīḥ tu kurvan saṃkṣepa tarpaṇam surāṇām arcanam kuryāt brahmā dīnām amatsarī

original: brāhmavaiṣṇavaraudraiśca sāvitrairmaitravāruṇaiḥ / talliṅgairarcayenmantraiḥ sarvadevānnamasya ca //
analyzed: brāhma vaiṣṇava raudraiḥ ca sāvitraiḥ maitra vāruṇaiḥ tad liṅgaiḥ arcayet mantraiḥ sarva devān namasya ca

original: namaskāreṇa puṣpāṇi vinyasettu pṛthakpṛthak / sarvadevamayaṃ viṣṇuṃ bhāskaraṃ cāpyathārcayet //
analyzed: namaskāreṇa puṣpāṇi vinyaset tu pṛthak pṛthak sarva deva mayam viṣṇum bhāskaram ca api atha arcayet

original: dadyātpuruṣasūktena yaḥ puṣpāṇyapa eva vā / arcitaṃ syājjagādidaṃ tena sarvaṃ carācaram //
analyzed: dadyāt puruṣasūktena yaḥ puṣpāṇi apaḥ eva vā arcitam syāt jagāt idam tena sarvam carācaram

original: anyaiśca tāntrikairmantraiḥ pūjayecca janārdanam / ādāvarghyaṃ pradātavyaṃ tataḥ paścādvilepanam //
analyzed: anyaiḥ ca tāntrikaiḥ mantraiḥ pūjayet ca janārdanam  ādau arghyam pradātavyam tatas paścāt vilepanam

original: tataḥ puṣpāñjaliṃ dhūpamu pahāraphalāni ca / snānamantarjale caiva mārjanācamanaṃ tathā //
analyzed: tatas puṣpa añjalim dhūpam u pahāra phalāni ca snānam antar jale ca eva mārjana ācamanam tathā

original: jalābhimantraṇaṃ yacca tīrthasya parikalpayet / aghamarṣaṇasūktena trivāraṃ tveva nityaśaḥ //
analyzed: jala abhimantraṇam yat ca tīrthasya parikalpayet aghamarṣaṇa sūktena tri vāram tu eva nityaśas

original: snāne caritamityetatsamuddiṣṭaṃ mahātmabhiḥ / brahmakṣatraviśāṃ caiva mantravatsnānamiṣyate //
analyzed: snāne caritam iti etat samuddiṣṭam mahātmabhiḥ brahma kṣatra viśām ca eva mantravat snānam iṣyate

original: tūṣṇīmeva tu śūdrasya sanamaskārakaṃ smṛtam / adhyāpanaṃ brahmayajñaḥ pitṛyajñastu tarpaṇam //
analyzed: tūṣṇīm eva tu śūdrasya sa namaskārakam smṛtam adhyāpanam brahmayajñaḥ pitṛ yajñaḥ tu tarpaṇam

original: homo daivī balirbhauto na yajño 'tithipūjanam / gavā goṣṭhe daśaguṇaṃ agnyagāre śatādhikam //
analyzed: homaḥ daivī baliḥ bhautaḥ na tithi pūjanam gavā goṣṭhe daśaguṇam agnyagāre śata adhikam

original: siddhakṣetreṣu tīrtheṣu devatāyataneṣu ca / sahasraśatakoṭīnāmanantaṃ viṣṇusannidhau //
analyzed: siddha kṣetreṣu tīrtheṣu devatāyataneṣu ca sahasra śata koṭīnām anantam viṣṇu sannidhau

original: pañcame ca tathā bhāge saṃvibhāgo yathārthataḥ / pitṛde vamanuṣyāṇāṃ koṭīnāṃ copadiśyate //
analyzed: pañcame ca tathā bhāge saṃvibhāgaḥ yathārthataḥ pitṛ de va manuṣyāṇām koṭīnām ca upadiśyate

original: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pradāyāgra yaḥ suhṛdbhiḥ sahāśnute / sa pretya labhate svargamannadānaṃ samācaran //
analyzed: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pradāya agra yaḥ suhṛdbhiḥ saha aśnute sa pretya labhate svargam anna dānam samācaran

original: pūrvaṃ madhuramaśrīyāllavaṇāmlau ca madhyataḥ / kaṭutiktakaṣāyāṃśca payaścaiva tathāntataḥ //
analyzed: pūrvam madhuram aśrīyāt lavaṇa amlau ca madhyatas kaṭu tikta kaṣāyān ca payaḥ ca eva tathā antatas

original: śākaṃ ca rātrau bhūmiṣṭhamatyantaṃ ca vivarjayet / nacaikarasasevāyāṃ prasajjeta kadācana //
analyzed: śākam ca rātrau bhūmiṣṭham atyantam ca vivarjayet na ca eka rasa sevāyām prasajjeta kadācana

original: samṛtaṃ brāhmaṇasyānnaṃ kṣatriyānnaṃ payaḥ smṛtam / vaiśyasya cānnamevānnaṃ śūdrānnaṃ rudhiraṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: samṛtam brāhmaṇasya annam kṣatriya annam payaḥ smṛtam vaiśyasya ca annam eva annam śūdra annam rudhiram smṛtam

original: amāvāsī vasedatra ekahāyanameva vā //
analyzed: amāvāsī vaset atra eka hāyanam eva vā

original: tatra śrīścaiva lakṣmīśca vasate nātra saṃśayaḥ / udare gārhapatyāgniḥ pṛṣṭhadeśe tu dakṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: tatra śrīḥ ca eva lakṣmīḥ ca vasate na atra saṃśayaḥ udare gārhapatya agniḥ pṛṣṭha deśe tu dakṣiṇaḥ

original: āsye cāhavanīyo 'gniḥ satyaḥ parva ca mūrdhani / yaḥ pañcāgnīnimānveda āhitāgniḥ sa ucyate //
analyzed: āsye ca āhavanīyaḥ gniḥ satyaḥ parva ca mūrdhani yaḥ pañca agnīn imān veda āhitāgniḥ saḥ ucyate

original: śariramāpaḥ somaṃ ca vividhaṃ cānnamucyate / prāṇo hyagnistathādityastribhoktā eka eva tu //
analyzed: somam ca vividham ca annam ucyate prāṇaḥ hi agniḥ tathā ādityaḥ tri bhā uktā ekaḥ eva tu

original: annaṃ balāya me bhūmerapāmagnyanilasya ca / bhavatyetatpariṇatau mamāpyavyāhataṃ sukham //
analyzed: annam balāya me bhūmeḥ apām agni anilasya ca bhavati etat pariṇatau mama api avyāhatam sukham

original: hastena parimārjyātha kuryāttāmbūlabhakṣaṇam / śravaṇaṃ cetihāsasya tatkuryātsusamāhitaḥ //
analyzed: hastena parimārjya atha kuryāt tāmbūla bhakṣaṇam śravaṇam ca itihāsasya tat kuryāt su samāhitaḥ

original: itihāsapurāṇādyaiḥ ṣaṣṭhasaptamakenayet / tataḥ sandhyāmupāsīta snātvā vai paścimāṃ naraḥ //
analyzed: itihāsa purāṇa ādyaiḥ tatas sandhyām upāsīta snātvā vai paścimām naraḥ

original: etadvā divase proktamanuṣṭhānaṃ mayā dvija / ācāraṃ yaḥ paṭhedvidvāñchṛṇuyātsa divaṃvrajet / ācārādirdharmakartā keśavo hi smṛto dvija //
analyzed: etat vā divase proktam anuṣṭhānam mayā dvija ācāram yaḥ paṭhet vidvān śṛṇuyāt sa divam vrajet  ācāra ādiḥ dharma kartā keśavaḥ hi smṛtaḥ dvija

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pañcottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe pañcottaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 214
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / atha snānavidhiṃ vakṣye snānamūlā kriyā yataḥ / mṛdgomayatilāndarbhānpuṣpāṇi surabhīṇi ca //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca atha snāna vidhim vakṣye snāna mūlā kriyā yatas mṛd gomaya tilān darbhān puṣpāṇi surabhīṇi ca

original: āharetsnānakāle ca snānārtho prayataḥ śuciḥ / gandhodakāntaṃ vivikte (dhaṃ)
analyzed: āharet snāna kāle ca prayataḥ śuciḥ gandha udaka antam vivikte

original: sthāpayettānyatha kṣitau //
analyzed: sthāpayet tāni atha kṣitau

original: tridhā kṛtvā mṛdaṃ tāṃ tu gomayaṃ ca vicakṣaṇaḥ / adbhirmṛdbhiśca caraṇau prakṣālyātha karau tathā //
analyzed: tridhā kṛtvā mṛdam tām tu gomayam ca vicakṣaṇaḥ adbhiḥ mṛdbhiḥ ca caraṇau prakṣālya atha karau tathā

original: upavītī baddhaśikhaḥ samyagācamya vāgyataḥ / uruṃ rājetyṛcā toyamupasthāya pradakṣiṇam //
analyzed: upavītī baddha śikhaḥ samyak ācamya vāgyataḥ urum rājā iti ṛcā toyam upasthāya pradakṣiṇam

original: āvartayettadudakaṃ ye te śatamititryṛcā //
analyzed: āvartayet tat udakam ye te śatam iti tryṛcā

original: oṃ uruṃ hi rājā varuṇaścakāra sūryāya panthānamanveta vā / pratidhātā ca vaktārastāhṛdayāvipaścit / namo 'gnyaruṇāyā bhiṣṭutovaruṇasya pāśaḥ / varuṇāya namaḥ //
analyzed: om urum hi rājā varuṇaḥ cakāra sūryāya panthānam anveta vā  pratidhātā ca vaktāraḥ tā hṛdayau vipaścit  namaḥ gni aruṇāyāḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ varuṇasya pāśaḥ varuṇāya namaḥ

original: oṃ ye te śataṃ varuṇaye sahasraṃ yajñiyāḥ pāśā vitatā mahāntaḥ / tebhirno adya savitota viṣṇurviśve muñcantu marutaḥ svarkāḥ svāhā / sumitriyāna ityabañjalimākṛtyottareṇa toyaṃ paścādvirājya caiva viniḥ kṣipet / oṃ sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santu / durmitriyāstasmai santu yo 'smāndveṣṭi yañca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ //
analyzed: om ye te śatam varuṇaye sahasram yajñiyāḥ pāśāḥ vitatāḥ mahāntaḥ tebhiḥ naḥ adya savitā uta viṣṇuḥ viśve muñcantu marutaḥ su arkāḥ svāhā su mitriyānaḥ iti ap añjalim ākṛtya uttareṇa toyam paścāt virājya ca eva viniḥ kṣipet  om su mitriyāḥ naḥ āpaḥ oṣadhayaḥ santu durmitriyāḥ tasmai santu yaḥ smān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ

original: pādau kaṭiṃ caiva pūrvaṃ mṛdbhistribhistribhiḥ / prakṣālya hastā vācamya namaskṛtya jalaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: pādau kaṭim ca eva pūrvam mṛdbhiḥ tribhiḥ tribhiḥ prakṣālya hastāḥ vā ācamya namaskṛtya jalam tatas

original: oṃ idaṃ viṣṇurvicakrame tredhā nidhe padam samūḍhamasya pāṃsure / mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ paścādācāmetprayato 'pi san //
analyzed: om idam viṣṇuḥ vicakrame tredhā nidhe padam samūḍham asya pāṃsure mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ paścāt ācāmet prayataḥ san

original: mārjayedvai mṛdāṅgāni idaṃ viṣṇuriti tvṛcā / bhāskarābhimukho majjedāpo asmānitityṛcā //
analyzed: mārjayet vai mṛdā aṅgāni idam viṣṇuḥ iti tu ṛcā bhāskara abhimukhaḥ majjet āpaḥ asmān iti tyṛcā

original: oṃ āpo asmānmātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena no ghṛtaṣvaḥ punantu / viśvaṃ hi ripraṃ pravahanti devīrudidābhyaḥ śucirāpūta emi //
analyzed: om āpaḥ asmān mātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena naḥ ghṛtaṣvaḥ punantu viśvam hi ripram pravahanti śuciḥ āpūtaḥ emi

original: tato 'vṛghṛṣya pātrāṇi nimajyonmajya vai śanaiḥ / gomayena vilipyātha mānastoka ityṛcā //
analyzed: tatas pātrāṇi nimajya unmajjya vai śanais gomayena vilipya atha māna stokaḥ iti ṛcā

original: oṃ mānastoke tanaye mā na āyuṣi mā no goṣu mā no aśveṣu rīriṣaḥ / mā no vīrānrudrabhāmino 'badhīrhaviṣmantaḥ sadamitvā havāmahe //
analyzed: om māna stoke tanaye mā naḥ āyuṣi mā naḥ goṣu mā naḥ aśveṣu rīriṣaḥ mā naḥ vīrān rudra bhāminaḥ badhīḥ haviṣmantaḥ sadam itvā havāmahe

original: tato 'bhiṣiñcenmantraistu varuṇaistu yathākramam / imaṃme varuṇe dvābhyāṃ tvannaḥ satvanna ityapi //
analyzed: tatas bhiṣiñcet mantraiḥ tu varuṇaiḥ tu yathākramam imam me varuṇe dvābhyām tvad naḥ satu annaḥ iti api

original: āpo tvantumasīti ca muñcantvavabhṛteti ca / oṃ imaṃme varuṇa śrudhīhavamadyā ca mṛḍayatvā mavasyurācake //
analyzed: āpaḥ tvantum asi iti ca muñcantu avabhṛta iti ca om imam me varuṇa śrudhi ihavam adya ca mṛḍayatvā mavasyuḥ ācake

original: oṃ tattvayāmi brahmaṇā vandamānastadāśāste yajamāno havirbhiḥ / aheḍamāno varuṇeha bodhyuruśaṃ samāna āyuḥ pramoṣīḥ / oṃ tvanno agne varuṇasya vidvāndevasya heḍo avayāsisīṣṭhāḥ / yajiṣṭho vahnitamaḥ śośucāno viśvā dveṣāṃsipramumugdhyasmatsvāhā / oṃ sa tvanno agnevamo bhavatī nediṣṭho asyā uṣasovyuṣṭau / avayakṣvano varuṇaṃ rarāṇo vīhimṛḍīkaṃ suhavo na edhi / oṃ āpo nauṣadhi hiṃsārdhamno rājastato varuṇo nomuñcā yadāharaghnyā iti varuṇeti śapārmahe tato varuṇa no muñca / oṃ uduttamaṃ varuṇa pāśamasmadavādhamaṃ vimadhyamaṃśrathāya / athāvayamādityavrate tavānāgaso aditaye syāma / muñcantumāmapyathādvaruṇasya tvat / aho yamasya patnīmānaḥ sarvasmādeva kilbiṣāt / avabhṛthanicaṃ punarvicerusi nityaṃ prannaḥ / avadevairdevakṛtā manoyāsi samavatyai kṛtaṃ puṣpācchā devadhīmalpāhī //
analyzed: om brahmaṇā vandamānaḥ tat āśāste yajamānaḥ havirbhiḥ a heḍamānaḥ varuṇa iha bodhi uruśam samānaḥ āyuḥ pramoṣīḥ om tvat naḥ agne varuṇasya vidvān devasya heḍaḥ avayāsisīṣṭhāḥ yajiṣṭhaḥ vahnitamaḥ śośucānaḥ viśvā dveṣāṃsi pramumugdhi asmat svāhā om sa tvat naḥ agne vamaḥ bhavatī nediṣṭhaḥ asyāḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭau avayakṣvanaḥ varuṇam rarāṇaḥ vīhi mṛḍīkam su havaḥ naḥ edhi  om āpaḥ na oṣadhi r

original: abhiṣicya tathātmānaṃ nimajyācamya vai punaḥ / darbheṇa pāyayenmantrairaliṅgaiḥ pāvanairimaiḥ //
analyzed: abhiṣicya tathā ātmānam nimajya ācamya vai punar darbheṇa pāyayet mantraiḥ aliṅgaiḥ pāvanaiḥ imaiḥ

original: āpohiṣṭheti tisṛbhiridamāpo haviṣmatīḥ / devīrāpa iti dvābhyāṃ āpodevā iti tryṛcā //
analyzed: āpohiṣṭhā iti tisṛbhiḥ idam āpaḥ haviṣmatīḥ devīḥ āpaḥ iti dvābhyām āpaḥ devāḥ iti tryṛcā

original: drupadādiva iti ca śanno devīrapāṃ rasaḥ / āpo devo pāvamānyaḥ punantvādyā ṛco nava //
analyzed: drupadāt iva iti ca śat naḥ devīḥ apām rasaḥ āpaḥ pāvamānyaḥ punantu adyāḥ ṛcaḥ nava

original: citpatirmeti ca śanaiḥ plāvyātmanaṃ samāhitaḥ / hiraṇyavarṇā iti ca pāvamānyastathā parāḥ //
analyzed: citpatiḥ mā iti ca śanais plāvya ātmanam samāhitaḥ hiraṇyavarṇāḥ iti ca pāvamānyaḥ tathā parāḥ

original: taratsāmā śuddhavatyaḥ pavitrāṇi ca śaktitaḥ / vāruṇyā bahavaḥ puṇyāḥ śaktitaḥ saṃprayojayet //
analyzed: taratsāmā śuddhavatyaḥ pavitrāṇi ca śaktitas vāruṇyāḥ bahavaḥ puṇyāḥ śaktitas saṃprayojayet

original: oṃ kāreṇa vyāhṛtibhirgāyatryā ca samanvitaḥ / ādāvante ca kurvīta abhiṣekaṃ yathākramam //
analyzed: om kāreṇa vyāhṛtibhiḥ gāyatryā ca samanvitaḥ ādau ante ca kurvīta abhiṣekam yathākramam

original: jalamadhyasthitasyaiva mārjanaṃ tu vidhīyate / antarjale japenmantraṃ triḥ kṛtvā cāghamarṣaṇam //
analyzed: jala madhya sthitasya eva mārjanam tu vidhīyate antar jale japet mantram tris kṛtvā ca aghamarṣaṇam

original: drupadādyāstrirāvartedayaṃ gauriti ca tryṛcam / anyāṃścaiva tu mantrānvā smṛtidṛṣṭānsamāhitaḥ //
analyzed: drupada ādyāḥ tris āvartet ayam gauḥ iti ca tryṛcam anyān ca eva tu mantrān vā smṛti dṛṣṭān samāhitaḥ

original: savyāhṛtiṃ sapraṇavāṃ gāyatrīṃ vā japedbudhaḥ āvartayedvā praṇavaṃ smaredvā viṣṇamavyayam //
analyzed: sa vyāhṛtim sa praṇavām gāyatrīm vā japet budhaḥ āvartayet vā praṇavam smaret vā

original: viṣṇorāyatanaṃ tvāpaḥ sa evāppatirucyate / tasyaivaṃ tanavastvetāstasmāttaṃ hyapsu saṃsmaret //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ āyatanam tu āpaḥ saḥ eva appatiḥ ucyate tasya evam tanavaḥ tu etāḥ tasmāt tam hi apsu saṃsmaret

original: tadviṣṇoriti mantreṇa nimajyāpsu punaḥ punaḥ / gāyattrī vaiṣṇavī hyeṣā viṣṇoḥ saṃsmaraṇāya vai //
analyzed: tat viṣṇoḥ iti mantreṇa nimajya apsu punar punar gāyattrī vaiṣṇavī hi eṣā viṣṇoḥ saṃsmaraṇāya vai

original: oṃ idamāpapravahatā svaṃ malaṃ kṣālalohitam / yathātvahotrāmṛtaṃ yacca śophe abhīṣaṇam //
analyzed: om svam malam kṣāla lohitam yathā tva hotrā amṛtam yat ca śophe abhīṣaṇam

original: āpo mā tasmādenasaḥ pāvamānaśca muñcatu iviṣmato vimā āpohaviṣmān āvirāsati / haviṣmān deva asuro haviṣmān astu sūryaḥ /  devīrāpo apā patnyā yaśca ūrmirhaviṣyaḥ indriyavānmādityantanaḥ taṃ devebhyo devatā dābhuśukralebhyasteṣāṃ bhāgakarṣivasisamudrasya dakṣiṇyāgrayāsimenāpograrbhiraśmatamodhoḥ
analyzed: āpaḥ mā tasmāt enasaḥ pāvamānaḥ ca muñcatu iviṣmataḥ āpaḥ haviṣmān āvirāsati haviṣmān deva asuraḥ haviṣmān astu sūryaḥ    devīḥ apaḥ apā patnyā yaḥ ca ūrmiḥ haviṣyaḥ indriyavān mā aditi antanaḥ tam devebhyaḥ devatā dābhu śukralebhyaḥ teṣām bhāga karṣi vasi samudrasya dakṣiṇya agra yā asi menāpa ugra raśma tamodhoḥ

original: āpo devī madhumatīragṛhṇantu hyannatī rājasvatilāḥ /  yābhirmitrāvaruṇasya siñcayābhirindramanayatyanna vātī vadrupadāṃ śanno devī apāmasṛgdvayasaṃsūrye santaṃ samāhitaṃ apāṃrasasya yo rasya yo  #
analyzed: āpaḥ devīḥ madhumatīḥ agṛhṇantu hi annatīḥ rājasvatilāḥ  / yābhiḥ mitrāvaruṇasya siñca yābhiḥ indram anayati anna vātī vadru padām śat naḥ devī apām asṛj dvaya saṃsūrye santam samāhitam apām rasasya yaḥ rasya yaḥ

original: gṛhṇāsyuttamam /
analyzed: gṛhṇāsi uttamam

original: āpo devīrupasūrya madhumatīvayasyāya prajābhyaḥ tāsā māsthānātvarjihatāmoṣadhayaḥ sapippalāḥ / punantu mā pitaraḥ saumyāsaḥ punantvanāpi pitā sahasāḥ pavitreṇa gatāyuṣā / punantu mā pitāmahāḥ punantu prapitāmahāḥ / pavitreṇa gatāyuṣā viśvamāyurvyaśravaiḥ / agna āyūṃṣi parasatmācarorjamiṣañca tvace vāvasvatvacchūnām / punantu mā devajanāḥ punantu manasā dhiyaḥ / punantu viśvā bhūtāni jātavedaḥ / punīhi mā / pavitreṇa punīhi mā śukreṇa deva dīdyat / agne kratvā kratūṃranu / yatte pavitramarciṣyagne vitatamantarā brahmā tena punātu mā / pavamānaḥ suvarjanaḥ / pavitreṇa vicarṣaṇiḥ / yaḥ potā sa punātu mā / ubhābhyāṃ deva savitaḥ / pavitreṇa savena ca / idaṃ brahmapunīmahe / vaiśvadevīḥ punatī devyā gṛbhnāsyāmisāvakṣyastānnovīta pūjyāḥ / tayāmadantaḥ sadhamādeṣu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām / citpa tirmā punātvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ / tasya te pavitrapūtasya yatkāmaḥ / praṇitacchakeyaṃ devo vākpatirmā savitā tvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ / tasya te pavitrapate / pavitrapūtasya catkāmaḥ / punastacchakeyaṃ dyupatiṃ ayaṃ gauḥ pṛśrirakramīsadaśaśataṃ mātaraṃ punaḥ pitarañca prayasmaḥ / devo mā savitā punātvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ / tasya te pavitrapate pavitrapūtasya yatkāmaḥ punātacchakeyam? / oṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ / divīva cakṣurātatam //
analyzed: āpaḥ devīḥ upasūrya madhumatī vayasyāya prajābhyaḥ tāsām mā āsthānā tvar jihatām oṣadhayaḥ sa pippalāḥ punantu mā pitaraḥ saumyāsaḥ punantu anāpi pitā sahasāḥ pavitreṇa gata āyuṣā punantu mā pitāmahāḥ punantu prapitāmahāḥ pavitreṇa gata āyuṣā viśvam āyuḥ vyaśravaiḥ agne āyūṃṣi parasatmā ācara ūrjam iṣan ca tvace punantu mā deva janāḥ punantu manasā dhiyaḥ punantu viśvā bhūtāni jātavedaḥ punīhi mā pavitreṇa punīhi

original: snātvaivaṃ vāsasī dhaute acchinne paridhāya ca / prakṣālya ca mṛdādbhiśca hastau prakṣālya vai tadā //
analyzed: snātvā evam vāsasī dhaute acchinne paridhāya ca prakṣālya ca mṛdā adbhiḥ ca hastau prakṣālya vai tadā

original: ācānte punārācāmenmantreṇa snānabhojane / drupadāṃ ca trirāvartya tathā caivāghamarṣaṇam //
analyzed: ācānte punar ācāmet mantreṇa snāna bhojane drupadām ca tris āvartya tathā ca eva aghamarṣaṇam

original: ācamyāplāvya cātmānaṃ trirācamyaśanerasūn / athopatiṣṭedādityaṃ mūrdhni puṣpānvitāñjaliḥ //
analyzed: ācamya āplāvya ca ātmānam tris ācamya aśaneḥ asūn atha upatiṣṭet ādityam mūrdhni puṣpa anvita añjaliḥ

original: prakṣipyodakamaddhūya udutyaṃ citramityapi / taccakṣurdeva iti ca haṃsaḥ śuciṣadityapi //
analyzed: prakṣipya udakam addhūya udutyam citram iti api tat cakṣuḥ devaḥ iti ca haṃsaḥ śuciṣad iti api

original: etāñjapedūrdhvabāhuḥ sūryamīkṣya samāhitaḥ / gāyattrīṃ ca tathā śaktyā upasthāya divākaram //
analyzed: etān japet ūrdhva bāhuḥ sūryam īkṣya samāhitaḥ gāyattrīm ca tathā śaktyā upasthāya divākaram

original: vibhrāḍityanuvākena sūktena puruṣasya ca / śivasaṅkalpena ca tathā maṇḍalabrāhmaṇena ca //
analyzed: vibhrāj iti anuvākena sūktena puruṣasya ca śivasaṅkalpena ca tathā maṇḍalabrāhmaṇena ca

original: divākīrtyā tathā cānyaiḥ saurairmantraiśca śaktitaḥ / japayajñastu kartavyaḥ sarvadevapraṇītakaiḥ //
analyzed: divākīrtyā tathā ca anyaiḥ sauraiḥ mantraiḥ ca śaktitaḥ japa yajñaḥ tu kartavyaḥ sarva deva praṇītakaiḥ

original: adhyātmavidyāṃ vidhivajjapedvā japasiddhaye / savyaṃ kṛtvā trirācamya śriyaṃ medhāṃ dhṛtiṃ kṣitim //
analyzed: adhyātma vidyām vidhivat japet vā japa siddhaye savyam kṛtvā tris ācamya śriyam medhām dhṛtim kṣitim

original: vācaṃ vāgīśvarīṃ puṣṭiṃ tuṣṭiñca paritarpayet / umāmarundhatīṃ caiva śacīṃ mātarameva ca //
analyzed: vācam vāgīśvarīm puṣṭim tuṣṭim ca paritarpayet  umām arundhatīm ca eva śacīm mātaram eva ca

original: jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ caiva sāvitrīṃ śāntimeva ca / svāhāṃ svadhāṃ dhṛtiṃ caiva tathaivāditimuttamām //
analyzed: jayām ca vijayām ca eva sāvitrīm śāntim eva ca svāhām svadhām dhṛtim ca eva tathā eva aditim uttamām

analyzed: ṛṣi patnīḥ ca kanyāḥ ca tarpayet kāmya devatāḥ sarva maṅgala kāmaḥ tu tarpayet sarva maṅgalām

analyzed: ā brahmastamba paryantam jagat tṛpyatu idam bruvan kṣipet apaḥ ñjalīn trīn ca kurvan kāṅkṣeta tarpaṇam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe snānavidhivivaraṇaṃ nāma caturdaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe snānavidhivivaraṇam nāma caturdaśottaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

analyzed: om modāḥ tṛpyantām om pramodāḥ tṛpyantām om sumukhāḥ tṛpyantām om durmukhāḥ tṛpyantām om vighnāḥ tṛpyantām om vighna kartāraḥ tṛpyantām om chandāṃsi tṛpyantām om vedāḥ tṛpyantām om oṣadhayaḥ tṛpyantām om sanātanaḥ tṛpyatām om itara ācāryāḥ tṛpyantām om saṃvatsaraḥ sa avayavaḥ tṛpyatām om devāḥ tṛpyantām om apsarasaḥ tṛpyantām om deva andhakāḥ tṛpyantām om sāgaraḥ tṛpyantām om nāgāḥ tṛpyantām om parva

original: dadhnāya namaḥ / nīlāya namaḥ / parameṣṭhine namaḥ / vṛkodarāya namaḥ / citrāya namaḥ / citraguptāya namaḥ //
analyzed: dadhnāya namaḥ nīlāya namaḥ parameṣṭhine namaḥ vṛkodarāya namaḥ citrāya namaḥ citraguptāya namaḥ

original: brahmādistambaparyantaṃ jagattṛpyatu / oṃ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ / oṃ pitāmahebhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ / oṃ prapitāmahebhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ / oṃ mātṛbhyaḥ svadhānamaḥ / oṃ pitāmahībhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ / oṃ prapitāmahībhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ / oṃ mātāmahebhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ / oṃ pramātāmahebhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ / oṃ vṛddhapramātāmahebhyaḥ svadhānamaḥ tṛpyatāmiti / udīratāmavara utparāso unmadhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ / asuṃya īyuravṛkā ṛtajñāsteno 'vantupitarohaveṣu / gotroccāraṇena prathamāñjaliḥ pituḥ / oṃ aṅgiraso naḥ pitarodṛ- / atharvāṇobhṛgavaḥdṛ - / teṣāṃ vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyānāṃ api bhadre saumanase syāma / oṃ āyantu naḥ pitaraḥ saumyāsogniṣvāttāḥ pathibhirdevayānaiḥ / asminyajñe svadhayā madanto 'dhibruvantu te 'vantvasmān //
analyzed: brahma ādi stamba paryantam jagat tṛpyatu om pitṛbhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ om pitāmahebhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ om prapitāmahebhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ om mātṛbhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ om pitāmahībhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ om prapitāmahībhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ om mātāmahebhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ om pramātāmahebhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ om vṛddhapramātāmahebhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ tṛpyatām iti udīratām avare ud parāsaḥ un madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ asuṃye īyuḥ avṛttāḥ asuṃy

original: oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ kīlālaṃ parisnutaṃ svadhā stha tarpayata me pitṝn / oṃ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ / oṃ pitāmahebhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ / oṃ prapitāmahebhyaḥ svadhāna namaḥ / oṃ mātāmahebhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ / oṃ pramātāmahebhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ / oṃ vṛddhapramātāmahebhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ / pitāmahasyadṛ / oṃ akṣanpitaro amīmadanta pitaro amī tṛpyantaḥ pitaraḥ śuṃ(sva)
analyzed: om ūrjam vahantīḥ amṛtam ghṛtam payaḥ kīlālam parisnutam svadhā stha tarpayata me pitṝn om pitṛbhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ om pitāmahebhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ om prapitāmahebhyaḥ svadhāna namaḥ om mātāmahebhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ om pramātāmahebhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ om vṛddhapramātāmahebhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ om akṣan pitaraḥ amīmadanta pitaraḥ amī tṛpyantaḥ pitaraḥ śuṃsva

original: dhadhvaṃ pibeha pitaro 'pi vānatrayāṃśca viśrayāṃśca bhavanapavitratvā rathapati te jātavedāḥ svadhābhiryajñaṃ sukṛtaṃ jupasva? / oṃ ṇaduvātā ṛtāyate madhu kṣaranti sindhavaḥ / mādhvīrnaḥ santvoṣadhīrmadhunaktamutoṣaso madhumatpārthivaṃ rajaḥ / madhu dyaurastu naḥ pitā madhu mānno vanaspatirmadhubhām astu sūryo mādhvīrgāvo bhavantu naḥ //
analyzed: dhadhvam piba iha pitaraḥ pi bhavana pavitra tvā rathapati te jātavedāḥ svadhābhiḥ yajñam su kṛtam jupasva  om ṛtāyate madhu kṣaranti sindhavaḥ mādhvīḥ naḥ santu oṣadhīḥ madhu naktam uta uṣasaḥ madhumat pārthivam rajaḥ madhu dyauḥ astu naḥ pitā madhu mā naḥ vanaspatiḥ madhu bhām astu sūryaḥ mādhvīḥ gāvaḥ bhavantu naḥ

original: prapitāmahasyāñjalidānam /  oṃ namo vaḥ pitaro rasāya namo vaḥ pitaraḥ śuṣmāya namo vaḥ pitaro jīvāya namo vaḥ pitaraḥ svadhāyai namo vaḥ pitaro ghorāya namo vaḥ pitaro  #
analyzed: prapitāmahasya añjali dānam   om namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ rasāya namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ śuṣmāya namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ jīvāya namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ svadhāyai namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ ghorāya namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ

original: manyave /
analyzed: manyave

original: namo vaḥ pitaro gṛhānna pitaro dattaḥ / namo vaḥ pitaro dadhme tadvaḥ pitaro vāsaḥ / mātāmahānāṃ trirañjalidṛ / tato mātrādīnāndṛ //
analyzed: namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ gṛhān na pitaraḥ dattaḥ namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ dadhme tat vaḥ pitaraḥ vāsaḥ mātāmahānām tris añjali dṛ tatas mātrā ādīnām dṛ

original: ye cāsmākaṃ kule jātā aputrā gotriṇo mṛtāḥ / te tṛpyantu mayā dattaṃ vastraniṣpīḍanodakam //
analyzed: ye ca asmākam kule jātāḥ aputrāḥ gotriṇaḥ mṛtāḥ te tṛpyantu mayā dattam vastra niṣpīḍana udakam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe devāditarpaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañjadaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe devāditarpaṇanirūpaṇam nāma pañjadaśottaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 216
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / vaiśvadevaṃ pravakṣyāmi homalakṣaṇamuttamam / prajvālya cāgniṃ paryukṣya-oṃ kraṣyādamagniṃ prahiṇomi dūraṃ yamarājyaṃ gacchatu ripravāhaḥ / ihaivāyamitaro jātavedā devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānat / oṃ pāvaka vaiśvānara idamāsanaṃ araṇīgarbhasaṃskṛtatejorūpa mahābrahman muhūrtāstriṣu vaiśvānaraṃ pratibodhayāmi / oṃ vaiśvānare na ubhayaṃ āprayātu parāvataḥ agnirna svadyutīrūpapṛṣṭho divi pṛṣṭho
