analyzed: brahmā uvāca vaiśvadevam pravakṣyāmi homa lakṣaṇam uttamam prajvālya ca agnim paryukṣya om kraṣyādam agnim prahiṇomi dūram yama rājyam gacchatu ripra vāhaḥ iha eva ayam itaraḥ jātavedāḥ devebhyaḥ havyam vahatu prajānat om pāvaka vaiśvānaraḥ idam āsanam araṇī garbha saṃskṛta tejaḥ rūpa mahā brahman muhūrtāḥ triṣu vaiśvānaram pratibodhayāmi om vaiśvānare naḥ ubhayam āprayātu parāvataḥ agniḥ na sva dyuti rūpa pṛṣṭhaḥ divi pṛṣṭ

original: 'śvi pṛthivyāṃ pṛṣṭhā vivevā oṣadhīcāviveśa vaiśvānaraḥ sahasā pṛṣṭho 'gniḥ namo
analyzed: śvi pṛthivyām pṛṣṭhā viveva oṣadhīcā āviveśa vaiśvānaraḥ sahasā pṛṣṭhaḥ gniḥ namaḥ

original: divya sa ṣaṣṭhāṃ naktam //
analyzed: divya sa ṣaṣṭhām naktam

original: oṃ prajāpataye svāhā / oṃ somāya svāhā / oṃ bṛhaspataye svāhā / oṃ agniṣomābhyāṃ svāhā / oṃ indrāgnibhyāṃ svāhā / oṃ dyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ svāhā / oṃ indrāya svāhā / oṃ viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ svāhā / oṃ brahmaṇe svāhā / oṃ adbhyaḥ svāhā / oṃ oṣadhivanaspatibhyaḥ svāhā / oṃ grahyāya svāhā / oṃ devadevatābhyaḥ svāhā / oṃ indrāya svāhā / oṃ indrapuruṣebhyaḥ svāhā / oṃ yamāya svāhā / oṃ yamapuruṣāya svāhā / oṃ sarvebhyo bhūtebhyo divācāribhyaḥ svāhā / oṃ vasudhāpitṛbhyaḥ svāhā / oṃ ye bhūtā pracaranti dīnāca nimihanto bhuvanasya madhye / tebhyo baliṃ puṣṭikāmo dadāmi mayi puṣṭiṃ puṣṭipatirdadātu / oṃ ācāṇḍālapatirdadātu ācāṇḍālapatitavāyasebhyaḥ //
analyzed: om prajāpataye svāhā om somāya svāhā om bṛhaspataye svāhā om agniṣomābhyām svāhā om indra agnibhyām svāhā om dyāvāpṛthivībhyām svāhā om indrāya svāhā om viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ svāhā om brahmaṇe svāhā om adbhyaḥ svāhā om oṣadhi vanaspatibhyaḥ svāhā om grahyāya svāhā om deva devatābhyaḥ svāhā om indrāya svāhā om indra puruṣebhyaḥ svāhā om yamāya svāhā om yama puruṣāya svāhā om sarvebhyaḥ puruṣāya svāhā om sarvebhyaḥ puruṣāy

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaiśvadevanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe vaiśvadevanirūpaṇam nāma ṣoḍaśottaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 217
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / atha sandhyāvidhaṃ vakṣye dvijātīnāṃ samāsataḥ / apavitraḥ pavitro vā sarvāvasthāṃ gato 'pi vā //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca atha sandhyā vidham vakṣye dvijātīnām samāsatas apavitraḥ pavitraḥ vā sarva avasthām vā

original: yaḥ smaretpuṇḍarīkākṣaṃ sa bāhyābhyantaraḥ śuciḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ smaret puṇḍarīkākṣam sa bāhya abhyantaraḥ śuciḥ

original: gāyattrīcchando viśvāmitra ṛṣistripāt / samudrāḥ kukṣiścandrādityau locanau / agnirmukham / viṣṇurhṛdayam / brahmarudrau śiraḥ / rudraḥ śikhā / upanaya ne viniyogaḥ / oṃ bhūḥ pāde / bhuvaḥ jānuti / svaḥ hṛdaye / mahaḥ śirasi / janaḥ śikhāyām / tapaḥ kaṇṭhe / satyaṃ lalāṭe / oṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ / oṃ bhūḥ śirase svāhā / oṃ bhuvaḥ śikhāyai vauṣaṭ / oṃ svaḥ kavacāya huṃ / oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ astrāya phaṭ //
analyzed: gāyatrī chandaḥ viśvāmitraḥ ṛṣiḥ tripād samudrāḥ kukṣiḥ candra ādityau locanau agniḥ mukham viṣṇuḥ hṛdayam brahma rudrau śiraḥ rudraḥ śikhā upanaya ne viniyogaḥ om bhūḥ pāde bhuvaḥ jānuti svar hṛdaye mahaḥ śirasi janaḥ śikhāyām tapaḥ kaṇṭhe satyam lalāṭe om hṛdayāya namaḥ om bhūḥ śirase svāhā om bhuvaḥ śikhāyai vauṣaṭ om svar kavacāya hum om bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar astrāya phaṭ

original: oṃ bhūḥ oṃ bhuvaḥ oṃ svaḥ oṃ mahaḥ oṃ janaḥ oṃ tapaḥ oṃ satyaṃ tatstripadā / oṃ āpo jyo 'tī raso 'mṛtaṃ brahma bhūrbhuvaḥ svarom / oṃ sūryaścetyādi / oṃ āpaḥ punantvityādi / oṃ agniścetyādi //
analyzed: om bhūḥ om bhuvaḥ om svar om mahaḥ om janaḥ om tapaḥ om satyam tat tripadā om apaḥ jyo tiḥ rasaḥ mṛtam brahma bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar om om sūryaḥ ca ityādi  om apaḥ punantu ityādi om agniḥ ca ityādi

original: oṃ āyātu varade devi / pūrvāhne brahmadevatā / gāyattrī nāma yā sandhyā raktāṅgī raktavāsasā / varahaṃsasamārūḍhā śrīmatpuṣkarasaṃsthitā //
analyzed: om āyātu vara de devi pūrvāhne brahma devatā gāyattrī nāma yā sandhyā rakta aṅgā rakta vāsasā vara haṃsa samārūḍhā śrīmat puṣkara saṃsthitā

original: kamaṇḍaludharā śāntā akṣamālāvidhāriṇī / āyātu varadā devī madhyāhne śvetarūpiṇī //
analyzed: kamaṇḍalu dharā śāntā akṣamālā vidhāriṇī āyātu vara dā devī madhyāhne śveta rūpiṇī

original: māheśvarī ca sāvitrī śuklavastrādimaṇḍitā / vṛṣaskandhasamārūḍhā triśūlavaradhāriṇī //
analyzed: māheśvarī ca sāvitrī śukla vastra ādi maṇḍitā vṛṣa skandha samārūḍhā triśūla vara dhāriṇī

original: āyātu varadā devī aparāhne sarasvatī / atasīkusumaprakhyā vaiṣṇavī garuḍāsanā //
analyzed: āyātu vara dā devī aparāhne sarasvatī atasī kusuma prakhyā vaiṣṇavī garuḍa āsanā

original: pītavastrā śaṅkhacakragadāpadmasamanvitā / śvetavarṇā samuddiṣṭā ravimaṇḍalasaṃsthitā //
analyzed: pīta vastrā śaṅkha cakra gadā padma samanvitā śveta varṇā samuddiṣṭā ravi maṇḍala saṃsthitā

original: śvetapadmasanāsīnā śvetapuṣpopaśobhitā / oṃ āpo hiṣṭhā mayo bhuvastā na urje dadhāta naḥ //
analyzed: śveta padma sanāsīnā śveta puṣpa upaśobhitā om āpaḥ hiṣṭhāḥ mayaḥ bhuvaḥ tāḥ naḥ urje dadhāta naḥ

original: maheraṇāya cakṣuse / oṃ yo vaḥ śivatamo rasaḥ / tasya bhājayeteha naḥ / aśatīriva mātaraḥ / oṃ tasmā araṅgamāma vo yasya kṣayāya jinvatha / āpo jana yathā ca naḥ / oṃ sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santu oṃ durmitriyāstasmai santu yo 'smān dveṣṭi yañca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ / oṃ drupadādivamumucānaḥ svinnaḥ snāto malādiva / pūtaṃ pavitreṇevājyamāpaḥ śundhantu mainasaḥ / oṃ ṛtaṃ ca satyaṃ cābhīddhāttapaso 'dhyajāyata / tatorātryajāyata / tataḥ samudror'ṇavaḥ samudrādarṇavādadhisaṃvatsaro ajāyata / ahaurātrāṇi vidadhadviśvasya miṣato vaśī / sūryācandramasau dhātā yathāpūrvamakalpayat / divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣamatho svaḥ //
analyzed: maheraṇāya cakṣuse  om yaḥ vaḥ śivatamaḥ rasaḥ tasya bhājayeta iha naḥ aśatīḥ iva mātaraḥ om tasmai vaḥ yasya kṣayāya jinvatha āpaḥ jana yathā ca naḥ om su mitriyāḥ naḥ āpaḥ oṣadhayaḥ santu om durmitriyāḥ tasmai santu smān dveṣṭi yat ca vayam dviṣmaḥ om drupadāt iva mumucānaḥ svinnaḥ snātaḥ malāt iva pūtam pavitreṇa iva ājyam āpaḥ śundhantu mā enasaḥ om ṛtam ca satyam ca abhīddhāt tapasaḥ dhī ajāyata tatas rātrī ajāy

original: gāyattryā viśvāmitra ṛṣirgāyattrīchandaḥ / savitā devatā jape viniyogaḥ / oṃ udutyaṃ jātavedasaṃ devaṃ vahanti ketavaḥ / dṛśe viśvāya sūryam / oṃ citraṃ devānāmudagādanīkaṃ cakṣurmitrasya varuṇasyāgneḥ / āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatastasthuṣaśca / oṃ taccakṣardevahitaṃ purastācchukramuccarat / paśyema śaradaḥ śataṃ jīvema śaradaḥ śatam / śṛṇuyāma śaradaḥ śatam / oṃ viśvataścakṣuruta viśvatomukhoviśvato bāhuruta viśvataspāt / saṃbāhubhyāṃ dhamati saṃpatraidyārvābhūmī janayandeva ekaḥ / devā gātuvido nāṅgavidvānādbhamitamanasaspata imaṃ devayajñaṃ svāhā vātedhāḥ japet //
analyzed: gāyattryāḥ viśvāmitraḥ ṛṣiḥ gāyattrī chandaḥ savitā devatā jape viniyogaḥ om udutyam jātavedasam devam vahanti ketavaḥ dṛśe viśvāya sūryam  om citram devānām udagāt anīkam cakṣuḥ mitrasya varuṇasya agneḥ āprāḥ dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣam sūryaḥ ātmā jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ ca  om tat cakṣaḥ deva hitam purastāt śukram uccarat paśyema śaradaḥ śatam jīvema śaradaḥ śatam śṛṇuyāma śaradaḥ śatam om viśvatas cakṣuḥ uta viśvatom

original: uttare śikhare jāte bhūmyāṃ parvatavāsinī / brahmaṇā samanujñātā gaccha devi / yathāsukham //
analyzed: uttare śikhare jāte bhūmyām parvatavāsinī brahmaṇā samanujñātā gaccha devi yathāsukham

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sandhyāvidhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptadaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe sandhyāvidhinirūpaṇam nāma saptadaśottaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 218
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / vyāsa / śrāddhamahaṃ vakṣye bhuktimuktipradaṃ nṛṇām / pūrvaṃ nimantrayedviprānviśeṣādbrahmacāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca vyāsa śrāddham aham vakṣye bhukti mukti pradam nṛṇām pūrvam nimantrayet viprān viśeṣāt brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: pradakṣiṇopavītena devānvāmopavītinā / pitṝnnimantrayetpādau kṣālayedvākyamantrataḥ //
analyzed: pradakṣiṇa upavītena devān vāma upavītinā pitṝn nimantrayet pādau kṣālayet vākya mantrataḥ

original: oṃ svāgataṃ bhavadbhiriti praśraḥ /  oṃ susvāgatāmiti tairukte oṃ viśvebhyo devebhya etatpādodakamarghyaṃ svāheti devabrāhmaṇapādayordevatīrthenābhugnakuśasahitajaladānam //
analyzed: om svāgatam bhavadbhiḥ iti om su svāgatām iti taiḥ ukte om viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ etat pāda udakam arghyam svāhā iti deva brāhmaṇa pādayoḥ deva tīrthena ābhugna kuśa sahita jala dānam

original: tato dakṣiṇā bhimukhena vāmopavītenāmukagotrebhyo asmatpitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahebhyo
analyzed: tatas dakṣiṇa abhimukhena vāma upavītena amuka gotrebhyaḥ asmad pitṛ pitāmaha prapitāmahebhyaḥ

original: yathānāmaśarmabhya etatpādodakamarghyaṃ svadheti pitrādibrāhmaṇapādayoḥ pitṛtīrthena
analyzed: yathā nāma śarmabhyaḥ etat pāda udakam arghyam svadhā iti pitṛ ādi brāhmaṇa pādayoḥ pitṛtīrthena

original: ābhugnakuśakusumasahitajaladānam //
analyzed: ābhugna kuśa kusuma sahita jala dānam

original: evaṃ mātāmahādibhyaḥ / etadācamanīyaṃ svāhā svadheti brāhmaṇahaste eṣavor'ghya iti brāhmaṇahaste puṣpadānam //
analyzed: evam mātāmaha ādibhyaḥ etat ācamanīyam svāhā svadhā iti brāhmaṇa haste iti brāhmaṇa haste puṣpa dānam

original: oṃ siddhamidamāsanam iha siddhamityabhidhāya oṃ bhūḥ oṃ bhuvaḥ oṃ svaḥ oṃ mahaḥ oṃ janaḥ oṃ tapaḥ oṃ satyamiti saptavyāhṛtibhiḥ pūrvamukhandevabrāhmaṇopaveśanam
analyzed: om siddham idam āsanam iha siddham iti abhidhāya om bhūḥ om bhuvaḥ om svar om mahaḥ om janaḥ om tapaḥ om satyam iti sapta vyāhṛtibhiḥ pūrva mukhan deva brāhmaṇa upaveśanam

original: uttaradiṅmukhaṃpitṛbrāhmayoṇopaveśanam / oṃ devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaśca mahāyogibhya eva ca / namaḥ svadhāyai svāhāyai nityameva bhavantute iti trirjapet //
analyzed: uttara diś mukham pitṛ brāhma yoṇa upaveśanam om devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ ca mahāyogibhyaḥ eva ca namaḥ svadhāyai svāhāyai nityam eva bhavantu te iti tris japet

original: oṃ adyāsmindeśe amukamāse amukarāśiṅgate savitaryamukatithāvamukagotrāṇāmasmatpitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahānāṃ yathānāmaśarmaṇāṃ viśvedevapūrvakandṛśrāddhaṃ  #
analyzed: om adya asmin deśe amuka māse amuka rāśiṅgate savitari amuka tithau amuka gotrāṇām asmad pitṛ pitāmaha prapitāmahānām yathā nāma śarmaṇām viśvedeva pūrvakandṛ śrāddham

original: kariṣye /
analyzed: kariṣye

original: oṃ viśvebhyo devabhyaḥ svāhā oṃ viśvedevānāvāhayiṣye / āvāhayetyukte oṃ viśvedevāḥ sa āgata śṛṇutām imaṃ havam / edaṃ barhirniṣīdata oṃ viśvedevāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ ivaṃ me ye antarikṣe ya upadyaviṣṭa / ye agnijihvā uta vā yajatrā āsadyāsminbarhiṣi mādayadhvam / oṃ oṣadhayaḥ saṃvadante somena saha rājñā / yasmai kṛṇoti brāhmaṇastaṃ rājanpārayāmasi / oṃ āgacchantu mahābhāgā viśvedevā mahābalāḥ / ye atra vihitāḥ śrāddhe sāvadhānā bhavantu te / oṃ apahatāsurā rakṣāṃsi vediṣada iti tritriryavavikiraṇam //
analyzed: om viśvebhyaḥ devabhyaḥ svāhā om viśvedevān āvāhayiṣye āvāhaya iti ukte om viśvedevāḥ saḥ āgata śṛṇutām imam havam ā idam barhiḥ niṣīdata om viśvedevāḥ śṛṇuta imam me ye antarikṣe yaḥ ye agni jihvāḥ uta vā yajatrāḥ āsadya asmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam om oṣadhayaḥ saṃvadante somena saha rājñā yasmai kṛṇoti brāhmaṇaḥ tam rājan pārayāmasi om āgacchantu mahābhāgāḥ viśvedevāḥ mahā balāḥ ye atra vihitāḥ śrāddha pratipa

original: oṃ pātramahaṃ kariṣye / oṃ karuṣvetyanujñātaḥ kṛtvā pātre pavitraniṣevaṇam //
analyzed: om pātram aham kariṣye om karuṣva iti anujñātaḥ kṛtvā pātre pavitra niṣevaṇam

original: oṃ śanno devīrabhiṣṭaya āpo bhavantu pītaye / śaṃyorabhistravantu na iti pātre jaladānam / oṃ yavo 'si yavayāsmadveṣo yavayārātīriti yavadānam / gandhadvārāṃ durādharṣāṃ nityapuṣṭāṃ karīṣiṇīm / īśvarīṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tā (tvā)
analyzed: om śat naḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye āpaḥ bhavantu pītaye śaṃyos abhistravantu naḥ iti pātre jala dānam om yavaḥ si yavaya asmad veṣaḥ yavaya arātīḥ iti yava dānam gandha dvārām durādharṣām nitya puṣṭām karīṣiṇīm īśvarīm sarva bhūtānām tāḥ tvā

original: mihopahvaye śriyamiti gandhadānam / oṃ yā divyā āpaḥ payasā saṃbabhūvuryā antarikṣauta pārthavīryāḥ / hiraṇyavarṇā yajñiyāstāna āpaḥ śivāḥ śaṃ syonā suhavā bhavantu / eṣor'gho nama iti brāhmaṇahaste jalaṃ dattvānenaiva pātreṇa pavitragrahaṇaṃ kṛtvā saṃstravaṃ pavitraṃ ca brāhmaṇapārśve dadyāt / tataḥ prathamapātre saṃstravajalaṃ saṃsthāpya kuśopari ūrdhvamukhaṃ sthāpanaṃ kuryat / tadupari kuśadānam //
analyzed: mihā upahvaye śriyam iti gandha dānam om yāḥ divyāḥ āpaḥ payasā saṃbabhūvuḥ yāḥ pārtha vīryāḥ  hiraṇya varṇāḥ āpaḥ śivāḥ śam syonā su havāḥ bhavantu namaḥ iti brāhmaṇa haste jalam dattvā anena eva pātreṇa pavitra grahaṇam kṛtvā saṃstravam pavitram ca brāhmaṇa pārśve dadyāt tatas prathama pātre saṃstrava jalam saṃsthāpya kuśa upari ūrdhva mukham sthāpanam kuryat tad upari kuśa dānam  /

original: viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ etāni gandhapuṣpadhūpadīpavāso yugayajño pavītāni namaḥ / gandhādidānamacchidramastu / astviti brāhmaṇaprativacanam //
analyzed: viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ etāni gandha puṣpa dhūpa dīpa vāsaḥ yuga yajña upavītāni namaḥ gandha ādi dānam acchidram astu  astu iti brāhmaṇa prativacanam

original: tataḥ pitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahānāṃ mātāmahapramātāmahavṛddhapramātāmahānāṃ sapatnīkānāṃ śrāddhamahaṃ kariṣye iti anujñāvacanam / kuruṣveti brāhmaṇairukte / oṃ devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaśca- ititrirjapet //
analyzed: tatas pitṛ pitāmaha prapitāmahānām mātāmaha pramātāmaha vṛddha pramātāmahānām sa patnīkānām śrāddham aham kariṣye iti anujñā vacanam kuruṣva iti brāhmaṇaiḥ ukte  om devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ ca iti tris japet

original: oṃ amukagotrebyo 'smatpitṛpitāmahebhyo yathānāmaśarmabhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ idamāsanaṃ svadhā iti brāhmaṇavāme āsanadānam / oṃ pitṝnāvāhayiṣye / oṃ / āvāhayetyukte oṃ uśantastvā nidhīmahyuśantaḥ samidhīmahi / uśannu śata āvaha pitṝnhaviṣe uttave / oṃ āyantu naḥ pitaraḥ saumyāso 'gniṣvāttāḥ pathibhirdevayānaiḥ / asminyajñe svadhayā madanto 'dhibruvantu tevantvasmān ityāvāhanam / oṃ apahatā surā rakṣāṃsi vediṣadaḥ iti tilavikiraṇam / pūrvavaktrameṇa sthāpitapātreṣūdakadānam / oṃ tilo 'si somadevatyo gosavo devanirmitaḥ / pratnamadbhiḥ pṛktaḥ svadhayā pitṝṃllokānprīṇīhi naḥ svāhā iti tiladānam //
analyzed: om smat pitṛ pitāmahebhyaḥ yathā nāma śarmabhyaḥ sa patnīkebhyaḥ idam āsanam svadhā iti brāhmaṇa vāme āsana dānam om pitṝn āvāhayiṣye om āvāhaya iti ukte om uśantaḥ tvā nidhīmahi uśantaḥ samidhīmahi uśan u śate āvaha pitṝn haviṣe uttave om āyantu naḥ pitaraḥ saumyāsaḥ gniṣvāttāḥ pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ asmin yajñe svadhayā madantaḥ dhi bruvantu iti āvāhanam om apahatā surāḥ rakṣāṃsi vediṣadaḥ iti tila vikiraṇam

original: gandhapuṣpe hastābhyāṃ dattvā pitṛpātramutthāpya yā divyeti paṭhitvā amukagotrāsmatpitaḥ / amukadevaśarman / sapatnīka / eṣa te 'rghyaḥ svadhā / apavitraṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā vāmapārśve dakṣiṇe kuśopari oṃ pitṛbhyaḥ sthānamasītyadhomukhapātrasthāpanam //
analyzed: gandha puṣpe hastābhyām dattvā pitṛpātram utthāpya yā divyā iti paṭhitvā amuka gotrā asmad pitar amuka deva śarman sa patnīkaḥ eṣa te rghyaḥ svadhā a pavitram pātram gṛhītvā vāma pārśve dakṣiṇe kuśa upari om pitṛbhyaḥ sthānam asi iti adhomukha pātra sthāpanam

original: oṃ śundhantāṃ lokāḥ pitṛsadanāḥ pitṛsadanamasi / adhomukhapāttrasparśanam /  amukagotrebhyo 'smatpitṛpitāmaha prapitāmahebhyaḥ sapatnīkebhya etāni gandhapuṣpadhūpadīpavāsoguṇasottarīyayajñopavītāni vaḥ svadhā pitṛtīrthena  #
analyzed: om śundhantām lokāḥ pitṛ sadanāḥ pitṛ sadanam asi adhomukha pāttra sparśanam    amuka gotrebhyaḥ smat pitṛ pitāmaha prapitāmahebhyaḥ sa patnīkebhyaḥ etāni gandha puṣpa dhūpa dīpa vāsaḥ guṇa sa uttarīya yajñopavītāni vaḥ svadhā pitṛtīrthena  /

original: gandhādidānam /
analyzed: gandha ādi dānam

original: gandhādidānamakṣayyamastu / saṃkalpasiddhirastu / brāhmaṇavacanam / evaṃ mātāmahādīnāmanujñāpanādikarma / oṃ yādivyetibhūmisaṃmārjanam / tato ghṛtāktamannaṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇopavītī pitṛbrāhmaṇam oṃ agnau karaṇamahaṃ kariṣye / oṃ kuruṣveti tenokte oṃ agnaye kavyavāhanāya svāhā iti āhutidvayaṃ devabrāhmaṇahaste
analyzed: gandha ādi dānam akṣayyam astu saṃkalpa siddhiḥ astu brāhmaṇa vacanam evam mātāmaha ādīnām anujñāpana ādi karma om yā divyā iti bhūmi saṃmārjanam tatas ghṛta aktam annam gṛhītvā dakṣiṇa upavītī pitṛ brāhmaṇam om agnau karaṇam aham kariṣye om kuruṣva iti tena ukte om agnaye kavyavāhanāya svāhā iti āhuti dvayam deva brāhmaṇa haste

original: dattvā avaśiṣṭānnaṃ piṇḍārthaṃ sthāpayitvā aparamardhaṃ pitrādipātre mātāmahādipātre
analyzed: dattvā avaśiṣṭa annam piṇḍa artham sthāpayitvā aparam ardham pitṛ ādi pātre mātāmaha ādi pātre

original: ca niḥ kṣipet //
analyzed: ca niḥ kṣipet

original: pātramudrādi nidhāya kuśaṃ dattvā adhomukhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā oṃ pṛthivīte pātraṃ dyaurapidhānaṃ brāhmaṇasya mukhe amṛte amṛtaṃ  #
analyzed: pātra mudrā ādi nidhāya kuśam dattvā adhomukhābhyām pāṇibhyām pātram gṛhītvā om pṛthivi ite pātram dyauḥ apidhānam brāhmaṇasya mukhe amṛte amṛtam

original: juhomi svāhā pātrābhimantraṇam /
analyzed: juhomi svāhā pātra abhimantraṇam

original: idaṃ viṣṇurvicakrame tredhā nidadhe padam / samūḍhamasya pāṃsure / viṣṇo havyaṃrakṣasva ityannamadhye adhomukhadvijāṅguṣṭhaniveśanam //
analyzed: idam viṣṇuḥ vicakrame tredhā nidadhe padam samūḍham asya pāṃsure viṣṇo havyam rakṣasva iti anna madhye adhomukha dvija aṅguṣṭha niveśanam

original: apahateti triryavavikiraṇam / oṃ nihanmi sarvaṃ yadamedhyavadbhaveddhatāśca sarve 'suradānavā mayā / rakṣāṃsi yakṣāḥ sapiśācasaṅghā hatā mayā yātudhānāśca sarve iti siddhārthavikiraṇam //
analyzed: apahata iti tris yava vikiraṇam om nihanmi sarvam yat amedhya vat bhavet hatāḥ ca sarve sura dānavāḥ mayā rakṣāṃsi yakṣāḥ sa piśāca saṅghāḥ hatāḥ mayā yātudhānāḥ ca sarve iti siddhārtha vikiraṇam

original: tato dhūrilocanasaṃjñakebhyodavebhya etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ svāheti vārikuśādyairanusaṅkalpanam / oṃ annamidamakṣayyamastu oṃ saṃṅkalpasiddhirastu //
analyzed: tatas dhūrilocana saṃjñakebhyaḥ davebhyaḥ etat annam sa ghṛtam sa pānīyam sa vyañjanam svāhā iti vāri kuśa ādyaiḥ anusaṅkalpanam om annam idam akṣayyam astu om saṃṅkalpa siddhiḥ astu

original: tato viparītopavītena savyañjanaṃ saghṛtamannaṃ pitrādi brāhmaṇapātre nidhāya tadupari
analyzed: tatas viparīta upavītena sa vyañjanam sa ghṛtam annam pitṛ ādi brāhmaṇa pātre nidhāya tad upari

original: bhūmisaṃlagnakuśaṃ dattvā oṃ pṛthivī te pātraṃ iti mantreṇa uttānābhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā
analyzed: bhūmi saṃlagna kuśam dattvā om pṛthivī te pātram iti mantreṇa uttānābhyām pātram gṛhītvā

original: oṃ idaṃ viṣṇorityannopari uttānaṃ dvijāṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet / oṃ apahateti tilavikiraṇam /  bhūmipātitavāmajānuḥ amukagotrebhyaḥ asmatpitṛpitāmahebhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ svadhā
analyzed: om idam viṣṇoḥ iti anna upari uttānam dvija aṅguṣṭham niveśayet  om apahata iti tila vikiraṇam bhūmi pātita vāma jānuḥ amuka gotrebhyaḥ asmat pitṛ pitāmahebhyaḥ sa patnīkebhyaḥ etat annam sa ghṛtam sa pānīyam sa vyañjanam pratiṣiddha varjitam svadhā

original: annaṃ saṅkalpya oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛta payaḥ kīlālaṃ paristrutaṃ svadhāstu tarpayata me pitaram / dakṣiṇāmukhavaridhāratyāgaḥ //
analyzed: annam saṅkalpya om ūrjam vahantīḥ amṛtam ghṛta payaḥ kīlālam paristrutam svadhā astu tarpayata me pitaram dakṣiṇā mukha vari dhāra tyāgaḥ

original: oṃ śrāddhamidamacchidramastu oṃ saṅkalpasiddharastu / oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svastatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhargodevasya dhīmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt
analyzed: om śrāddham idam acchidram astu om saṅkalpa siddhaḥ astu om bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar tat savituḥ vareṇyam bhargaḥ devasya dhīmahi dhiyaḥ yaḥ naḥ pracodayāt

original: iti visajayitvā oṃ madhuvātā ṛtāyate madhukṣarantu sindhavaḥ mādhvīrnaḥ santvoṣadhīrmadhunaktamutoṣaso
analyzed: iti visajayitvā om madhuvātāḥ ṛtāyate madhu kṣarantu sindhavaḥ mādhvīḥ naḥ santu oṣadhīḥ madhu naktam uta uṣasaḥ

original: madhutpārthivaṃ rajaḥ / madhudyaurastu naḥ pitā madhumānno vanaspatiḥ madhumānastu sūryo mādhvīrgāvo bhavantu naḥ / madhu madhu madhu iti japaḥ //
analyzed: madhut pārthivam rajaḥ madhut yauḥ astu naḥ pitā madhumān naḥ vanaspatiḥ madhumān astu sūryaḥ mādhvīḥ gāvaḥ bhavantu naḥ madhu madhu madhu iti japaḥ

original: yathāsukhaṃ vāgyatā juṣadhvam iti brūyāt / buktavatsu saptavyādhādikaṃ pitṛstotraṃ japet / tacca-saptavyādhā daśārṇeṣu mṛgāḥ kālañjare girau / cakravākāḥ śarādvīpe haṃsāḥ sarasi mānase //
analyzed: yathāsukham vāgyatāḥ juṣadhvam iti brūyāt buktavatsu saptavyādha ādikam pitṛstotram japet tat ca saptavyādhāḥ daśārṇeṣu mṛgāḥ kālañjare girau cakravākāḥ śarādvīpe haṃsāḥ sarasi mānase

original: te 'bhijātāḥ kurukṣetre brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ / prasthitā dūramadhvānaṃ yūyaṃ kimavasīdatha //
analyzed: te bhijātāḥ kurukṣetre brāhmaṇāḥ vedapāragāḥ prasthitāḥ dūram adhvānam yūyam kim avasīdatha

original: tatastṛpyasva dakṣiṇābhimukho vāmopavītī tadutsṛṣṭāgrataḥ / oṃ agnidagdhāśca ye jīvā ye 'pyadagdhāḥ kule mama / bhūmau dattena tṛpyantu tṛptā yāntu parāṅgatim / iti bhūmau kuśopari saghṛtamannaṃ jalaplutaṃ vikiret //
analyzed: tatas tṛpyasva dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ vāma upavītī tad utsṛṣṭa agratas om agni dagdhāḥ ca ye jīvāḥ ye pi adagdhāḥ kule mama  bhūmau dattena tṛpyantu tṛptāḥ yāntu parāṅgatim iti bhūmau kuśa upari sa ghṛtam annam jala plutam vikiret

original: tato brāhmaṇakrameṇa jalagaṇḍūṣaṃ dattvā pūrvavatsavyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvātetitryṛcaṃ japtvā oṃ rucitaṃ bhavadbhiriti devabrāhmaṇapraśraḥ
analyzed: tatas brāhmaṇa krameṇa jala gaṇḍūṣam dattvā pūrvavat sa vyāhṛtikām gāyattrīm madhuvāta iti tryṛcam japtvā om rucitam bhavadbhiḥ iti deva brāhmaṇa praśraḥ

original: surucitamiti tenokte oṃ śeṣamannamiti praśraḥ / iṣṭaiḥ saha bhojanam / pitrādibrāhmaṇaṃ vāmopavītena oṃ tṛptāḥ stha iti praśraḥ / oṃ tṛptāḥ sma iti tenokte bhūmyabhyukṣaṇaṃ maṇḍalacatuṣkoṇaṃ ti lavikiraṇam //
analyzed: su rucitam iti tena ukte om śeṣam annam iti praśraḥ iṣṭaiḥ saha bhojanam pitṛ ādi brāhmaṇam vāma upavītena om tṛptāḥ stha iti praśraḥ om tṛptāḥ smaḥ iti tena ukte bhūmi abhyukṣaṇam maṇḍala catuṣkoṇam lavi kiraṇam

original: oṃ amukagotra / asmatpitaḥ / amukadevadarśan / sapatnīka / etatte piṇḍāsanaṃ svadhā / itthaṃ rekhāmadhye pitāmahāya khavyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvāteti trarjapannannaṃ sājyaṃ piṇḍaṃ kṛtvā kuśopari amukagotra asmatpitaḥ / amukadevaśraman / sapatnīka eṣa piṇḍaste svadhā / itthaṃ rekhāmadhye pitāmahāya / tataḥ savyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvāteti trirjaṃpanpiṇḍavikiraṇaṃ piṇḍāntike / oṃ lepabhujaḥ prīyantamiti staraṇkuśeṣu hastamārjanaṃ prakṣālitapiṇḍodakena oṃ amukagotra / asmatpitaḥ / amukaśarman sapatnīka etatte jalamavanekṣva ye cātratvāmanujāśca tvāmanu tasmai tesvadheti pitṛpiṇḍasecanam / piṇḍapātramadhomukhaṃ kṛtvā baddhāñjaliḥ oṃ pitaro mādayadhvaṃ yathābhāgamāvṛṣāyadhvamiti japet / apaḥ spṛṣṭvā vāmena parāvṛttya udaṅmukhaḥ prāṇāṃstriḥ saṃyamya ṣaḍbhya ṛtubhyo namaḥ iti japaḥ //
analyzed: om amuka gotra asmad pitar amuka deva darśan sa patnīka etat te piṇḍa āsanam svadhā ittham rekhā madhye pitāmahāya kha vyāhṛtikām gāyattrīm madhu vāta iti tras japan annam sa ājyam piṇḍam kṛtvā kuśa upari amuka gotra asmad pitar amuka deva śraman sa patnīkaḥ eṣa piṇḍaḥ te svadhā ittham rekhā madhye pitāmahāya tatas sa vyāhṛtikām gāyattrīm madhu vāta iti tris jaṃpan piṇḍa vikiraṇam piṇḍa antike om lepabhujaḥ prīyantam iti staraṇ kuśeṣu pr

original: vāmenaiva parāvṛtya puṣpadānam / akṣatañcāriṣṭañcāstu me puṇyaṃ śāntipuṣṭidṛ / dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ amī madantaḥ pitaro yathābhāgamāvṛṣāyiṣata iti japaḥ / vāsaḥ śithilīkṛtvāñjaliṃ kṛtvā oṃ namo vaḥ pitaro namo vaḥ iti japaḥ / gṛhānnaḥ pitaro datta iti gṛhavīkṣaṇam / tataḥ sadā vaḥ pitaro dveṣma iti vīkṣya etadvaḥ pitaro vāsa ityuccārya amukagotra etatte vāsaḥ svadhā iti sūtradānam / vāmena pāṇinā udakapātraṃ gṛhītvā ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ ityādi piṇḍopari dhārātyāgaḥ //
analyzed: vāmena eva parāvṛtya puṣpa dānam akṣatam ca ariṣṭam ca astu me puṇyam śānti puṣṭi dṛ dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ amī madantaḥ pitaraḥ yathābhāgam āvṛṣāyiṣata iti japaḥ vāsaḥ śithilīkṛtvā añjalim kṛtvā om namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ namaḥ vaḥ iti japaḥ gṛhān naḥ pitaraḥ datta iti gṛha vīkṣaṇam tatas sadā vaḥ pitaraḥ dveṣmaḥ iti vīkṣya etat vaḥ pitaraḥ vāsaḥ iti uccārya amuka gotraḥ etat te vāsaḥ svadhā iti sūtra dānam

original: pūrvasthāpitapātraśeṣodakaiḥ pratyekaṃ piṇḍasecanaṃ-piṇḍamāvāhya gandhādidānaṃ-piṇḍopari
analyzed: pūrva sthāpita pātra śeṣa udakaiḥ pratyekam piṇḍa secanam piṇḍam āvāhya gandha ādi dānam piṇḍa upari

original: kuśapatrañca dattvā oṃ akṣannamīmadantahya va priyā adhūṣata astoṣatasvabhānavo viprā naviṣṭhayāmatī / yo jānvindra te harīti trirjapaḥ //
analyzed: kuśa patram ca dattvā om vaḥ priyāḥ adhūṣata viprāḥ naviṣṭhayā amatī yaḥ jānū indra te harī iti tris japaḥ

original: oṃ itthaṃ mātāmahādibrāhmaṇānāmācamanam / oṃ susuprokṣitamastviti bhūmyabhyukṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā / oṃ apāṃ madhye sthitā devāḥ sarvamapsu pratiṣṭhitam / brāhmaṇasya kare nyastāḥ śivā āpo bhavantu naḥ / śivā āpaḥ santviti brāhmaṇahaste jaladānam / lakṣmīrvasatipuṣpeṣu lakṣmīrvasati puṣkare / lakṣmīrvasati goṣṭheṣu saumanasyaṃ sadāstu te / saumanasyamastviti puṣpadānam / akṣataṃ cāstu me puṇyaṃ śāntiḥ puṣṭirdhṛtiśca me / yadyacchreyaskaraṃ loke tattadastu sadā mama / oṃ akṣatañcāriṣṭañcāstu iti yavataṇḍuladānam //
analyzed: om ittham mātāmaha ādi brāhmaṇānām ācamanam om su su prokṣitam astu iti bhūmi abhyukṣaṇam kṛtvā om apām madhye sthitāḥ devāḥ sarvam apsu pratiṣṭhitam brāhmaṇasya kare nyastāḥ śivāḥ āpaḥ bhavantu naḥ śivāḥ āpaḥ santu iti brāhmaṇa haste jala dānam lakṣmīḥ vasati puṣpeṣu lakṣmīḥ vasati puṣkare lakṣmīḥ vasati goṣṭheṣu saumanasyam sadā astu te saumanasyam astu iti puṣpa dānam akṣatam ca astu me puṇyam śāntiḥ puṣṭi

original: amukagotrāṇāmasmatpitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahānāṃ sapatnīkānāmidamannapānādikamakṣayyamastviti pitrādibrāhmaṇahaste tilajaladānam / astviti brāhmaṇo vadet / etanmātāmahādīnāmakṣayyamāśiṣaḥ / oṃ aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu gotraṃ no vardhatāṃ--dātāro no 'bhivardhantāṃ vedāḥ santatireva ca / śraddhā ca no mā vyagamadbahudeyañca no 'stviti / annañca no bahu bhavedatithīṃśca labhemahi / yācitāraśca naḥ santu mā ca yāciṣma kañcana / etāḥ satyāśiṣaḥ santu //
analyzed: amuka gotrāṇām asmad pitṛ pitāmaha prapitāmahānām sa patnīkānām idam anna pāna ādikam akṣayyam astu iti pitṛ ādi brāhmaṇa haste tila jala dānam astu iti brāhmaṇaḥ vadet etat mātāmaha ādīnām akṣayyam āśiṣaḥ om aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu gotram naḥ vardhatām dātāraḥ naḥ bhivardhantām vedāḥ santatiḥ eva ca śraddhā ca naḥ mā vyagamat bahu deyam ca naḥ stu iti annam ca naḥ bahu bhavet atithīn ca labhemahi yācitāraḥ ca naḥ santu mā ca yāc

original: saumanasyamastu / astvityukte pradattapiṇḍasthāne arghyārthapavitramocanam /  kuśapavitraṃ gṛhītvātena kuśena pitrādibrāhmaṇaṃ spṛṣṭvā svadhāṃ vācayiṣye-oṃ vācyatāṃ-oṃ pitṛpitāmahebhyo yathānāmaśarmabhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ  #
analyzed: saumanasyam astu astu iti ukte pradatta piṇḍa sthāne arghya artha pavitra mocanam kuśa pavitram gṛhītvā atena kuśena pitṛ ādi brāhmaṇam spṛṣṭvā svadhām vācayiṣye om vācyatām om pitṛ pitāmahebhyaḥ yathā nāma śarmabhyaḥ sa patnīkebhyaḥ  /

original: svadhocyatām /
analyzed: svadhā ucyatām

original: astusvadhā ityukte ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtamiti piṇḍopari vāridhārāṃ dadyāt //
analyzed: astu svadhā iti ukte ūrjam vahantīḥ amṛtam ghṛtam iti piṇḍa upari vāri dhārām dadyāt

original: tataḥ oṃ viśvedevā asminyajñe prīyantā--devabrāhmaṇahaste yavodakadānam / oṃ prīyantāmiti tenokte oṃ devatābhya iti trirjapet //
analyzed: tatas om viśvedevāḥ asmin yajñe prīyantā deva brāhmaṇa haste yava udaka dānam om prīyantām iti tena ukte om devatābhyaḥ iti tris japet

original: adhomukhaḥ piṇḍapātrāṇi cālayitvā ācamya dakṣiṇopavītī pūrvābhimukhaḥ oṃ amukagotrāya
analyzed: adhomukhaḥ piṇḍa pātrāṇi cālayitvā ācamya dakṣiṇa upavītī pūrva abhimukhaḥ om amuka gotrāya

original: amukadevaśarmaṇe brāhmaṇāya sapatnīkāya śrāddhapratiṣṭhārthadakṣiṇāmetadrajataṃ tubhyamahaṃ
analyzed: amuka deva śarmaṇe brāhmaṇāya sa patnīkāya śrāddha pratiṣṭhā artha dakṣiṇām etat rajatam tubhyam aham

original: sampradade iti dakṣiṇāṃ dadyāt / iti devūbrāhmaṇāya dakṣiṇādānam //
analyzed: sampradade iti dakṣiṇām dadyāt iti devū brāhmaṇāya dakṣiṇā dānam

original: tataḥ pitṛbrāhmaṇe piṇḍāḥ sampannā iti praśraḥ /  susampannā iti piṇḍe kṣīradhārāṃ dattvā piṇḍacālanaṃ atithibrāhmaṇe piṇḍapātramuttānaṃ kṛtvā oṃ vāje vāje vata vājino no dhaneṣu viprā amṛtā  #
analyzed: tatas pitṛ brāhmaṇe piṇḍāḥ sampannāḥ iti su sampannāḥ iti piṇḍe kṣīra dhārām dattvā piṇḍa cālanam atithi brāhmaṇe piṇḍa pātram uttānam kṛtvā om vāje vāje vata vājinaḥ naḥ dhaneṣu viprāḥ amṛtāḥ

original: ṛtajñāḥ /
analyzed: ṛta jñāḥ

original: asyamadhvaḥ pibata mādayadhvaṃ tṛptā yāta pathibhirdevayānairiti piṇḍā divisarjanaṃ-āmāvājasya
analyzed: pibata mādayadhvam tṛptāḥ yāta pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ iti piṇḍāḥ di visarjanam ā amāvājasya

original: prasavo jagamyādeme dyāvāpṛthivī viśvarūpe āmāgantāṃ pitarā cāmā somo 'mṛtatvena gamyāt / iti devavisarjanam / oṃ abhigamyatāmiti pitṛbrāhmaṇavisarjanam / brāhmaṇairanudgatasya nivartanam / gavādiṣu piṇḍapratipādanamiti śeṣaḥ //
analyzed: prasavaḥ jagamyāt eme dyāvāpṛthivī viśva rūpe āmā agantām pitarā ca āmā somaḥ mṛta tvena gamyāt iti deva visarjanam om abhigamyatām iti pitṛ brāhmaṇa visarjanam brāhmaṇaiḥ anudgatasya nivartanam go ādiṣu piṇḍa pratipādanam iti śeṣaḥ

original: ayaṃ śrāddhavidhiḥ proktaḥ paṭhitaḥ pāpanāśanaḥ / anena vidhinā śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ vai yatra kutracit //
analyzed: ayam śrāddha vidhiḥ proktaḥ paṭhitaḥ pāpa nāśanaḥ anena vidhinā śrāddham kṛtam vai yatra kutracid

original: akṣayā syātpitṝṇāñca svargaprāptirdhruvā tathā / ityuktaṃ pārvaṇaṃ śrāddhaṃ pitṝṇāṃ brahmalokadam //
analyzed: akṣayā syāt pitṝṇām ca svarga prāptiḥ dhruvā tathā iti uktam pārvaṇam śrāddham pitṝṇām brahma loka dam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pārvaṇaśrāddhakathanaṃ nāmāṣṭradaśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe pārvaṇaśrāddhakathanam nāma aṣṭradaśādhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 219
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / nityaśrāddhaṃ pravakṣyāmi pūrvavattadviśeṣavat / oṃ amukagotrāṇāmasmatpitṛpitāmahānāṃ amukaśarmaṇāṃ sapatnīkānāṃ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsvahaṃ kariṣye / āsanādikamatra syādviśvedevāvivarjitam //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca nitya śrāddham pravakṣyāmi pūrvavat tad viśeṣavat  om amuka gotrāṇām asmad pitṛ pitāmahānām amuka śarmaṇām sa patnīkānām śrāddham siddha annena yuṣmāsu aham kariṣye  / āsana ādikam atra syāt viśvedevā vivarjitam  /

original: vṛddhiśrāddhaṃ pravakṣyāmi pūrvavattadviśeṣakam /  jātaputramukhadarśanādau vṛddhi śrāddhaṃ pūrvābhimukheṣu dakṣiṇopavītiṣu sayavabadarakuśairdevatīrthena namaskārāntena dakṣiṇopacāreṇa kartavyam
analyzed: vṛddhiśrāddham pravakṣyāmi pūrvavat tad viśeṣakam jāta putra mukha darśana ādau śrāddham pūrva abhimukheṣu dakṣiṇa upavītiṣu sa yava badara kuśaiḥ deva tīrthena namaskāra antena dakṣiṇa upacāreṇa kartavyam

original: dakṣiṇajānu gṛhītvā adyāsmadīyāmukavṛddhau amukagātrāṇāmasmatprapitāmahīpitāmahīmātṝṇāmamukadevīnāmamukagotrāṇāṃ
analyzed: dakṣiṇa jānu gṛhītvā adya asmadīya amuka vṛddhau amuka gātrāṇām asmad prapitāmahī pitāmahī mātṝṇām amuka devīnām amuka gotrāṇām

original: śrāddhe kartavye vasusatyasaṃjñakānāṃ viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnenayuṣmāsu
analyzed: śrāddhe kartavye vasusatya saṃjñakānām viśveṣām devānām śrāddham siddha annena yuṣmāsu

original: mayā kartavyamiti devabrāhmaṇāmantraṇam / oṃ kariṣyasīti tenokta itthamevāparadevabrāhmaṇāmantraṇam //
analyzed: mayā kartavyam iti deva brāhmaṇa āmantraṇam om kariṣyasi iti tena uktaḥ ittham eva apara deva brāhmaṇa āmantraṇam

original: tataḥ amukavṛddhau amukagotrāyā matprapitāmahyā amukadevyā nāndīmukhyāḥ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsu mayā kartavyamiti prapitāmahībrāhmaṇāmantraṇam
analyzed: tatas amuka vṛddhau amuka gotrāyāḥ mad prapitāmahyāḥ amuka devyāḥ nāndīmukhyāḥ śrāddham siddha annena yuṣmāsu mayā kartavyam iti prapitāmahī brāhmaṇa āmantraṇam

original: kariṣyāmīti tenokte itthameva pramātāmahyādibrāhmāṇamantraṇam //
analyzed: kariṣyāmi iti tena ukte ittham eva pramātāmahī ādi brāhmāṇa mantraṇam

original: devapitṛsarvadevabrāhmaṇaṃ śrāddhakaraṇānujñāpanam / āsane oṃ viśvedevāsa āgata śṛṇutāma imaṃrṭha ivam / taṃ barhirniṣīdata / oṃ viśvedevāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ ivaṃ ye me antarikṣe ya udadyaviṣṭa / pe agnijihvā utavā yadatrā āsādyāsminbarhiṣi mādayadhvam / oṃ āgacchantu iti viśvedevāvāhanaṃ-gandhādidānam / acchidrāvadhāraṇavācanam //
analyzed: deva pitṛ sarva deva brāhmaṇam śrāddha karaṇa anujñāpanam āsane om viśvedevāsaḥ āgata śṛṇutāmaḥ imaṃrṭhaḥ ivam tam barhiḥ niṣīdata om viśvedevāḥ śṛṇuta imam ivam ye me antarikṣe yaḥ udadyaviṣṭa āsādya asmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam om āgacchantu iti viśvedeva āvāhanam gandha ādi dānam acchidra avadhāraṇa vācanam

original: tataḥ prapitāmahīprabhṛtīnāmanujñāpanamāsanadānaṃ gandhādidānañca acchidrāvadhāraṇavācanam / itthaṃ pitāmahyāḥ mātuḥ / tataḥ prapitāmahādīnāṃ anujñāpanam / āsanamāvāhanaṅgandhādidānaṃ-vṛddhapramātāmahādīnāmanujñāpanādikaraṇam / oṃ vasusatyasaṃjñakebhyo devebhya etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ savadaraṃ sadadhi pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ nama iti annasaṅkalpanam / oṃ amukagotre / matpitāmahamukadevi nāndīmukhi / etadannaṃ sabadaraṃ sadadhi namaḥ / evaṃ mātāmahaprabhātāmahebhyaḥ //
analyzed: tatas prapitāmahī prabhṛtīnām anujñāpanam āsana dānam gandha ādi dānam ca acchidra avadhāraṇa vācanam ittham pitāmahyāḥ mātuḥ tatas prapitāmaha ādīnām anujñāpanam āsanam āvāhanam gandha ādi dānam vṛddhapramātāmaha ādīnām anujñāpana ādi karaṇam om vasu satya saṃjñakebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ etat annam sa ghṛtam sa pānīyam sa vyañjanam sa vadaram sa dadhi pratiṣiddha varjitam namaḥ iti anna saṅkalpanam om amuka gotre mad pitāmaha muka devi nāndīmukhi

original: ekoddiṣṭaṃ puro 'vaśyaṃ tadviśeṣaṃ vade śṛṇu / prathamaṃ nimantraṇaṃ pādaprakṣālanam āsanam / adya amukagotrasya matpituramukadevaśarmaṇaḥ pratisāṃvatsarikamekoddiṣṭaśrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsvahaṃ kariṣye / śrāddhakaraṇānujñāpanam āsanaṃ gandhādidānam annānukalpanam / japyaṃ nivītī / uttarābhimukhībhūyātithiśrāddhaṃ kuryāt //
analyzed: ekoddiṣṭam puras vaśyam tad viśeṣam vade śṛṇu prathamam nimantraṇam pāda prakṣālanam āsanam adya amuka gotrasya mad pituḥ amuka deva śarmaṇaḥ pratisāṃvatsarikam ekoddiṣṭa śrāddham siddha annena yuṣmāsu aham kariṣye śrāddha karaṇa anujñāpanam āsanam gandha ādi dānam anna anukalpanam japyam nivītī uttara abhimukhībhūya atithi śrāddham kuryāt

original: tatasmṛptiṃ jñātvā dakṣiṇābhimukhīvāmopavītī ucchiṣṭasamīpe agnidagdhā iti annavikiraṇam / amukagotramatpitaramukadevaśarmannetatte jalamavanenikṣva ye cātra tvāmanuyāśca tvāmanutasmai te svadhā iti rekhopari vāridhārādānam / śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
analyzed: jñātvā dakṣiṇa abhimukhī vāma upavītī ucchiṣṭa samīpe agni dagdhāḥ iti anna vikiraṇam amuka gotra mad pitar amuka deva śarman etat te jalam avanenikṣva ye ca atra tvām anu yāḥ ca tvām anu tasmai te svadhā iti rekhā upari vāri dhārā dānam śeṣam pūrvavat

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekonaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ekonaviṃśādhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 220
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ vakṣye pūrṇe 'bde tatkṣaye 'hani / kṛtaṃ samyagyathākāle pretādeḥ pitṛlokadam //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca sapiṇḍīkaraṇam vakṣye pūrṇe bde tad kṣaye hani kṛtam samyak yathā kāle preta ādeḥ pitṛ loka dam

original: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kuryādaparāhne tu pūrvavat / pitāmahādibrāhmaṇanimantraṇam / oṃ purūravārdravasaṃjñakebhyo devebhya etadāsanaṃ namaḥ / vāmapārśve cāsanadānam / āvāhanam / tataḥ pitāmahaprapitāmahavṛddhaprapitāmahānāṃ sapatnīkānāṃ śrāddhamahaṃ kariṣye ityanujñāgrahaṇaṃ-pātratrayakaraṇaṃ-pātropari
analyzed: sapiṇḍīkaraṇam kuryāt aparāhne tu pūrvavat pitāmaha ādi brāhmaṇa nimantraṇam om purūrava ārdrava saṃjñakebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ etat āsanam namaḥ vāma pārśve ca āsana dānam āvāhanam tatas pitāmaha prapitāmaha vṛddhaprapitāmahānām sa patnīkānām śrāddham aham kariṣye iti anujñā grahaṇam pātra traya karaṇam pātra upari

original: kuśaṃ dattvā pātrāntareṇa pidhāya acchidrāvadhāraṇāntaṃ parisamāpya tathaiva piturapi
analyzed: kuśam dattvā pātra antareṇa pidhāya acchidra avadhāraṇa antam parisamāpya tathā eva pituḥ api

original: sapatnīkasya pretapadāntanāmnā śrāddhakaraṇānujñāpanaṃ devapātrācchidrāvadhāraṇam //
analyzed: sa patnīkasya preta pada anta nāmnā śrāddha karaṇa anujñāpanam deva pātra acchidra avadhāraṇam

original: tatparisamāpya pitāmahaprapitāmahavṛddhaprapitāmahakrameṇa pātrāṇāṃ manāk cālanam / uddhāṭanaṃ kṛtvā--oṃ ye samānāḥ samanasaḥ pitaro yamarājye / teṣāṃ lokaḥ svadhā namo yajño deveṣu kalpatām / oṃ ye samānāḥ samanaso jīvā jīveṣu māmakāḥ / teṣāṃ śrīrmayi kalpatāmasmin loke śataṃ samāḥ /  etanmantradvayena pitṛpātrodakaṃ pitāmahaprapitāmahapātre vṛddhaprapitāmahapātraṃ parityajya pitāmahaprapitāmahayorudakaṃ pavitrañca pitṛpātre  #
analyzed: tat parisamāpya pitāmaha prapitāmaha vṛddha prapitāmaha krameṇa pātrāṇām manāk cālanam uddhāṭanam kṛtvā om ye samānāḥ samanasaḥ pitaraḥ yama rājye teṣām lokaḥ svadhā namaḥ yajñaḥ deveṣu kalpatām om ye samānāḥ samanasaḥ jīvāḥ jīveṣu māmakāḥ teṣām śrīḥ mayi kalpatām asmin loke śatam samāḥ  / etad mantra dvayena pitṛpātra udakam pitāmaha prapitāmaha pātre vṛddha prapitāmaha pātram parityajya pitāmaha prapitāmahayoḥ udakam p

original: kṣipet //
analyzed: kṣipet

original: tataḥ pitṛbrāhmaṇahaste pātrasthapavitradānam / pātrasthapuṣpeṇa śirasaḥ karapādārcanaṃ brāhmaṇahaste 'nya jaladānaṃ--hastābhyāṃ
analyzed: tatas pitṛ brāhmaṇa haste pātra stha pavitra dānam pātra stha puṣpeṇa śirasaḥ kara pāda arcanam brāhmaṇa haste jala dānam hastābhyām

original: pātramutthāpya oṃ yā divyeti paṭhitvā oṃ amukagotra matpitāmaha amukadevaśarman sapatnīka
analyzed: pātram utthāpya om yā divyā iti paṭhitvā om amuka gotra mad pitāmaha amuka deva śarman sa patnīka

original: eṣa te arghyaḥ svadhā / pitṛpātreṇaiva pitāmahabrāhmaṇahaste stokamarghyodakaṃ sapavitraṅgṛhītvāstokamudakaṃ
analyzed: eṣa te arghyaḥ svadhā pitṛpātreṇa eva pitāmaha brāhmaṇa haste stokam arghya udakam sa pavitram gṛhītvā a stokam udakam

original: piṇḍasecanārthaṃ pātrāntareṇa pidhāya pitṛbrāhmaṇavāmapārśva dakṣiṇāgrakuśopari pitṛbhyaḥ
analyzed: piṇḍa secana artham pātra antareṇa pidhāya pitṛ brāhmaṇa vāma pārśva dakṣiṇa agra kuśa upari pitṛbhyaḥ

original: stānamasīti adhomukhapātrasthapanam //
analyzed: stānam asi iti adhomukha pātra sthapanam

original: pitāmahaprapitāmahavṛddhaprapitāmahebhyo gandhādidānamagnaukaraṇam / avaśiṣṭānnaṃ prapitāmahādipātre kṣipet / pitāmahapātrābhimantraṇaparyantakrameṇa samāpyāpi brāhmaṇapātrābhimantraṇam / aṅguṣṭhaniveśanaṃ tilavikaraṇaṃ kṛtvā amukagotra etatte annaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ
analyzed: pitāmaha prapitāmaha vṛddha prapitāmahebhyaḥ gandha ādi dānam agnaukaraṇam avaśiṣṭa annam prapitāmaha ādi pātre kṣipet pitāmaha pātra abhimantraṇa paryanta krameṇa samāpya api brāhmaṇa pātra abhimantraṇam aṅguṣṭha niveśanam tila vikaraṇam kṛtvā amuka gotra etat te annam sa ghṛtam sa pānīyam

original: savyañjanaṃ pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ ye cātra tvā manuyāśca tvāmanu tasmai te svadhā iti //
analyzed: sa vyañjanam pratiṣiddha varjitam ye ca atra tvā manuyāḥ ca tvām anu tasmai te svadhā iti

original: tato devaprabhṛtibhya apośānaṃ dadyāt / atithiprāptau atidhiśrāddhaṃ kuryāt / asminnavasare vikiraṇam / pitāmāhadau praśraṃ kṛtvā pitṛbrāhmaṇam oṃ svaditaṃ bhavadbhiriti praśraḥ / oṃ amukagotra matpitaḥ amukaśarman sapatnīka eṣa te piṇḍo ye cātratvāmanuyāśca tvāmanu tasmai svadheti piṇḍapātramacchidramastu /  tataḥ saṅkalpa siddhivācanaṃ samāpya piṇḍaṃ dvidhā kṛtvā ye samānāḥ sumanasa iti mantradvayaṃ paṭhitvā pitāmahavṛddhaprapitāmahapātreṣu kṣipet
analyzed: tatas deva prabhṛtibhyaḥ apośānam dadyāt atithi prāptau atidhiśrāddham kuryāt asmin avasare vikiraṇam pitāmaha hadau praśram kṛtvā pitṛ brāhmaṇam om svaditam bhavadbhiḥ iti praśraḥ om amuka gotra mad pitar amuka śarman sa patnīkaḥ eṣa te piṇḍaḥ ye ca atra tvām anu yāḥ ca tvām anu tasmai svadhā iti piṇḍa pātram acchidram astu  / tatas saṅkalpa siddhivācanam samāpya piṇḍam dvidhā kṛtvā ye samānāḥ sumanasaḥ iti mantra dvayam paṭhitvā pit

original: piṇḍeṣu gandhādikaṃ dattvā piṇḍacālanam / atithibrāhmaṇe svaditādipraśraḥ / brāhmaṇānāmācamanam / bhuktikrameṇa tāmbūladānam / suprokṣitamastu śivā āpaḥ santu--vṛddhaprapitāmahakrameṇa brāhmaṇahaste jaladānam / gotrasyākṣayyamastu pitṛbrāhmaṇahaste upatiṣṭatāmiti satijaladānam //
analyzed: piṇḍeṣu gandha ādikam dattvā piṇḍa cālanam atithi brāhmaṇe brāhmaṇānām ācamanam bhukti krameṇa tāmbūla dānam su prokṣitam astu śivāḥ āpaḥ santu vṛddhaprapitāmaha krameṇa brāhmaṇa haste jala dānam gotrasya akṣayyam astu pitṛ brāhmaṇa haste upatiṣṭatām iti sati jala dānam

original: aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu astvityukte svadhāṃ vācayiṇya iti pitāmāhadibrāhmaṇānujñāpanam //
analyzed: aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu astu iti ukte svadhām vācayiṇyaḥ iti pitāmāhadi brāhmaṇa anujñāpanam

original: oṃ vācyatāṃ ityukte oṃ pitāmahādibhyaḥ svadhocyatām / astu svadhetyukte pitṛbrāhmaṇa pitṛbhyaḥ svadhocyatāmiti / astu svadhetyukte oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīriti dakṣiṇābhimukhavāridhārātyāgaḥ / oṃ viśvedevā asmin yajñe prīyantāmiti devabrāhmaṇahaste oṃ yavodakadānam / oṃ devatābhya iti trirjapaḥ //
analyzed: om vācyatām iti ukte om pitāmaha ādibhyaḥ svadhā ucyatām astu svadhā iti ukte pitṛ brāhmaṇa pitṛbhyaḥ svadhā ucyatām iti astu svadhā iti ukte om ūrjam vahantīḥ iti dakṣiṇa abhimukha vāri dhārā tyāgaḥ om viśvedevāḥ asmin yajñe prīyantām iti deva brāhmaṇa haste om yava udaka dānam om devatābhyaḥ iti tris japaḥ

original: piṇḍapātrāṇi cālayitvā ācamya pitāmahādibhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā tataḥ pitṛ brāhmaṇāya āśiṣo me pradīyantāmityāśīḥ prārthanam / pratigṛhyatāmityukte dātāro no 'bhivardhantāmiti pātramuttānaṃ kṛtvā vāje vājedṛvisarjanam / abhiraṇyatāmiti pitṛbrāhmaṇavisarjanam //
analyzed: piṇḍa pātrāṇi cālayitvā ācamya pitāmaha ādibhyaḥ dakṣiṇām dattvā tatas pitṛ brāhmaṇāya āśiṣaḥ me pradīyantām iti āśīḥ prārthanam pratigṛhyatām iti ukte dātāraḥ naḥ bhivardhantām iti pātram uttānam kṛtvā vāje vājedṛ visarjanam abhiraṇyatām iti pitṛ brāhmaṇa visarjanam

original: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaśrāddhaṃ vyāsaproktaṃ mayā tava / śrāddhaṃ viṣṇuḥ śrāddhakartā phalaṃ śrāddhādikaṃ hariḥ //
analyzed: sapiṇḍīkaraṇa śrāddham vyāsa proktam mayā tava śrāddham viṣṇuḥ śrāddha kartā phalam śrāddha ādikam hariḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrāddhānuṣṭhānaṃ nāmaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe śrāddhānuṣṭhānam nāma viṃśa adhika dviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 221
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahāmovāca / dharmasāramahaṃ vakṣye saṃkṣepācchuṇu śaṅkara / bhuktimuktipradaṃ sūkṣmaṃ sarvapāpavināśanam //
analyzed: brahāmā uvāca dharma sāram aham vakṣye saṃkṣepāt śuṇu śaṅkara bhukti mukti pradam sūkṣmam sarva pāpa vināśanam

original: śrutaṃ dharmaṃ balaṃ dhairyaṃ sukhamutsāhameva ca / śoko harati vai nṝṇāṃ tasmācchokaṃ parityajet //
analyzed: śrutam dharmam balam dhairyam sukham utsāham eva ca śokaḥ harati vai nṝṇām tasmāt śokam parityajet

original: karmadārāḥ karmalokāḥ karmasambandhibāndhavāḥ / karmāṇi prerayantīha puruṣaṃ sukhaduḥ khayoḥ //
analyzed: karma dārāḥ karma lokāḥ karma sambandhi bāndhavāḥ karmāṇi prerayanti iha puruṣam sukha duḥ khayoḥ

original: dāname paro dharmo dānātsarvamavāpyate / dānāḥtsvargaśca rājyañca dadyāddanaṃ tato naraḥ //
analyzed: paraḥ dharmaḥ dānāt sarvam avāpyate dānāt svargaḥ ca rājyam ca dadyāt danam tatas naraḥ

original: ekato dānamevāhuḥ samagravaradakṣiṇam / ekato bhayabhītasya prāṇinaḥ prāṇarakṣaṇam //
analyzed: ekatas dānam eva āhuḥ samagra vara dakṣiṇam ekatas bhaya bhītasya prāṇinaḥ prāṇa rakṣaṇam

original: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa yajñaiḥ snānena vā punaḥ / dharmasya nāśakā ye ca te vai nirayagāminaḥ //
analyzed: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa yajñaiḥ snānena vā punar dharmasya nāśakāḥ ye ca te vai niraya gāminaḥ

original: ye ca homajapasnānadevatārcanatatparāḥ / satyakṣamādayāyuktāste narāḥ svargagāminaḥ //
analyzed: ye ca homa japa snāna devatā arcana tatparāḥ satya kṣamā dayā yuktāḥ te narāḥ svarga gāminaḥ

original: na dātā sukhaduḥ khānāṃ na ca hartāsti kaścana / bhuñjate svakṛtānyeva duḥ khāni ca sukhāni ca //
analyzed: na dātā sukha duḥ khānām na ca hartā asti kaścana bhuñjate sva kṛtāni eva duḥ khāni ca sukhāni ca

original: dharmārthaṃ jīvitaṃ yeṣāṃ durgāṇyatitaranti te / santuṣṭaḥ ko na śaknoti phalamūlaiśca vartitum //
analyzed: dharma artham jīvitam yeṣām durgāṇi atitaranti te santuṣṭaḥ kaḥ na śaknoti phala mūlaiḥ ca vartitum

original: sarva eva hi saukhyena saṅkaṭānyavagāhate / idameva hi lobhasya kāryaṃ syā datiduṣkaram //
analyzed: sarve eva hi saukhyena saṅkaṭāni avagāhate idam eva hi lobhasya kāryam syāḥ dati duṣkaram

original: lobhātkrodhaḥ prabhavati lobhāddrohaḥ pravartate / lobhānmohaśca māyā ca māno matsara eva ca //
analyzed: lobhāt krodhaḥ prabhavati lobhāt drohaḥ pravartate  lobhāt mohaḥ ca māyā ca mānaḥ matsaraḥ eva ca

original: rāgadveṣānṛtakrodhalomamohamadojjhitaḥ / yaḥ sa śāntaḥ paraṃ lokaṃ yāti pāpavivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: rāga dveṣa anṛta krodha loma moha mada ujjhitaḥ yaḥ sa śāntaḥ param lokam yāti pāpa vivarjitaḥ

original: devatā munayo nāgā gandharvā guhyakā hara / dhārmikaṃ pūjayantīha na dhanāḍhyaṃ na kāminam //
analyzed: devatāḥ munayaḥ nāgāḥ gandharvāḥ guhyakāḥ hara dhārmikam pūjayanti iha na dhana āḍhyam na kāminam

original: anantabalavīryeṇa prajñayā pauruṣeṇa vā / alabhyaṃ labhate martyastatra kā parivedanā //
analyzed: ananta bala vīryeṇa prajñayā pauruṣeṇa vā alabhyam labhate martyaḥ tatra kā parivedanā

original: sarvasattvadayālutvaṃ sarvendriyavinigrahaḥ / sarvatrānityabuddhitvaṃ śreyaḥ paramidaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: sarva sattva dayālu tvam sarva indriya vinigrahaḥ sarvatra anitya buddhi tvam śreyaḥ param idam smṛtam

original: paśyannivāgrato mṛtyuṃ yo dharmaṃ nācarennaraḥ / ajāgalastanasyeva tasya janma nirarthakam //
analyzed: paśyan iva agratas mṛtyum yaḥ dharmam na ācaret naraḥ ajāgala stanasya iva tasya janma nirarthakam

original: bhrūṇahā brahmahā goghnaḥ pitṛhā gurutalpagaḥ / bhūmiṃ sarvaguṇopetāṃ dattvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate //
analyzed: bhrūṇa hā brahma hā go ghnaḥ pitṛ hā gurutalpa gaḥ bhūmim sarva guṇa upetām dattvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: na godānātparaṃ dānaṃ kiñcidastīti me matiḥ / yā gaurnyāyārjitā dattā kṛtsnaṃ tārayate kulam //
analyzed: na go dānāt param dānam kiñcid asti iti me matiḥ yā gauḥ nyāya arjitā dattā kṛtsnam tārayate kulam

original: nānnadānātparaṃ dānaṃ kiñcidasti vṛṣadhvaja / / annena dhāryate sarvaṃ carācaramidaṃ jagat //
analyzed: na anna dānāt param dānam kiñcid asti vṛṣadhvaja   annena dhāryate sarvam carācaram idam jagat

original: kanyādānaṃ vṛṣotsargastīrthasevā śrutaṃ tathā / hastyaśvarathadānāni maṇiratnavasundharāḥ //
analyzed: kanyā dānam vṛṣotsargaḥ tīrtha sevā śrutam tathā hasti aśva ratha dānāni maṇi ratna vasundharāḥ

original: annadānasya sarvāṇi kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm / annātprāṇā balaṃ tejaścānnādvīryaṃ dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ //
analyzed: anna dānasya sarvāṇi kalām na arhanti ṣoḍaśīm annāt prāṇāḥ balam tejaḥ ca annāt vīryam dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ

original: kūpavāpītaḍāgādīnārāmāṃścaiva kārayet / trisaptakulamuddhṛtya viṣṇuloke mahīyate //
analyzed: kūpa vāpī taḍāga ādīn ārāmān ca eva kārayet tri sapta kulam uddhṛtya viṣṇu loke mahīyate

original: sādhūnāṃ darśanaṃ puṇyaṃ tīrthādapi viśiṣyate / kālena tīrthaṃ phalati sadyaḥ sādhusamāgamaḥ //
analyzed: sādhūnām darśanam puṇyam tīrthāt api viśiṣyate kālena tīrtham phalati sadyas sādhu samāgamaḥ

original: satyaṃ damastapaḥ śaucaṃ santoṣaśca kṣamārjavam / jñānaṃ śamo dayā dānameṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ //
analyzed: satyam damaḥ tapaḥ śaucam santoṣaḥ ca kṣamā ārjavam jñānam śamaḥ dayā dānam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dharmasārakathanaṃ nāmaikaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe dharmasārakathanam nāma ekaviṃśa adhika dviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 222
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / prāyaścittādi vakṣye 'haṃ narakaughavimardanam / makṣikā vipruṣo nārī bhuvi toyaṃ hutāśanaḥ / mārjāro nakulaścaiva śucīnyetāni nityaśaḥ //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca prāyaścitta ādi vakṣye ham naraka ogha vimardanam makṣikāḥ vipruṣaḥ nārī bhuvi toyam hutāśanaḥ mārjāraḥ nakulaḥ ca eva śucīni etāni nityaśas

original: yaḥ śūdrocchiṣṭasaṃspṛṣṭaṃ pramādādbhakṣayeddvijaḥ / ahorātroṣito bhūtvā pañcagavyena śudhyati //
analyzed: yaḥ śūdra ucchiṣṭa saṃspṛṣṭam pramādāt bhakṣayet dvijaḥ ahorātra uṣitaḥ bhūtvā pañcagavyena śudhyati

original: vipro vipreṇa saṃspṛṣṭa ucchiṣṭena kadācana / snānaṃ japyañca kartavyaṃ dinasyānte ca bhojanam //
analyzed: vipraḥ vipreṇa saṃspṛṣṭaḥ ucchiṣṭena kadācana snānam japyam ca kartavyam dinasya ante ca bhojanam

original: annaṃ samakṣikākeśaṃ śudhyedvāntena tatkṣaṇāt / yaśca pāṇitale bhuṅkte aṅgulyā bāhunā ca yaḥ //
analyzed: annam sa makṣikā keśam śudhyet vāntena tad kṣaṇāt yaḥ ca pāṇi tale bhuṅkte aṅgulyā bāhunā ca yaḥ

original: ahorātreṇa śudhyeta pibedyadi na vāryuta / pītaśeṣantu yattoyaṃ vāmahastena madyavat //
analyzed: ahorātreṇa śudhyeta pibet yadi na vāri uta pīta śeṣam tu yat toyam vāma hastena madya vat

original: carmamadhyagataṃ toyamaśuci syānna tatpibet / antyajātiravijñāto nivasedyasya veśmani //
analyzed: carma madhya gatam toyam aśuci syāt na tat pibet antya jātiḥ avijñātaḥ nivaset yasya veśmani

original: cāndrāyaṇaṃ parākaṃ vā dvijātīnāṃ viśodhanam / prājāpatyantu śūdrasya paścājjñāte tathāpare //
analyzed: cāndrāyaṇam parākam vā dvijātīnām viśodhanam prājāpatyam tu śūdrasya paścāt jñāte tathā apare

original: yastatra bhuṅkte pakvānnaṃ kṛcchrārdhaṃ tasya dāpayet / teṣāmapi ca yo bhuṅkte kṛcchrapādo vidhīyate //
analyzed: yaḥ tatra bhuṅkte pakva annam kṛcchra ardham tasya dāpayet teṣām api ca yaḥ bhuṅkte kṛcchra pādaḥ vidhīyate

original: rajakānāñca śailū ṣaveṇucarmopajīvinām / etadannañca yo bhuṅkte dvijaścāndrāyaṇaṃ caret //
analyzed: rajakānām ca etat annam ca yaḥ bhuṅkte dvijaḥ cāndrāyaṇam caret

original: cāṇḍālakūpabhāṇḍeṣu ajñānāccetpibejjalam / kuryātsāntapanaṃ viprastadardhañca viśaḥ smṛtam //
analyzed: cāṇḍāla kūpa bhāṇḍeṣu ajñānāt ced pibet jalam  kuryāt sāntapanam vipraḥ tad ardham ca viśaḥ smṛtam

original: pādaṃ śūdrasya dātavyamajñānādantyaveśmani / prāyaścittaṃ trikṛcchraṃ syātparākamantyajāgatau //
analyzed: pādam śūdrasya dātavyam ajñānāt antyaveśmani  prāyaścittam trikṛcchram syāt parākam antya jāgatau

original: antyajocchiṣṭabhukcchudhyeddvijaścāndrāyaṇena ca / cāṇḍālannaṃ yadā bhuṅkte pramādādaindavañcaret //
analyzed: antyaja ucchiṣṭa bhuj śudhyet dvijaḥ cāndrāyaṇena ca cāṇḍāla annam yadā bhuṅkte pramādāt aindavan caret

original: kṣattrajātiḥ sāntapanaṃ ṣaḍdvirātraṃ pare tathā / ekavṛkṣa tu caṇḍālaḥ pramādādbrāhmaṇo yadi / phalaṃ bhakṣayate tatra ahorātreṇa śudhyati //
analyzed: kṣattra jātiḥ sāntapanam ṣaṣ dvi rātram pare tathā tu caṇḍālaḥ pramādāt brāhmaṇaḥ yadi phalam bhakṣayate tatra ahorātreṇa śudhyati

original: bhuktvopaviṣṭo 'nācāntaścaṇḍālaṃ yadi saṃspṛśet / gāyattryaṣṭasahasrantu drupadāṃ vā śataṃ japet //
analyzed: bhuktvā upaviṣṭaḥ na ācāntaḥ caṇḍālam yadi saṃspṛśet gāyatrī aṣṭa sahasram tu drupadām vā śatam japet

original: cāṇḍālaśvapacairvāpi viṇmūtre tu kṛte dvijāḥ / prāyaścittaṃ trirātraṃ syātparākaścāntyajāgatau //
analyzed: cāṇḍāla śvapacaiḥ vā api viṣ mūtre tu kṛte dvijāḥ prāyaścittam tri rātram syāt parākaḥ ca antya jāgatau

original: akāmataḥ striyo gatvā parākastatra sādhakaḥ / antyajātiprasūtasya prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate //
analyzed: akāmatas striyaḥ gatvā parākaḥ tatra sādhakaḥ antya jāti prasūtasya prāyaścittam na vidyate

original: madyādiduṣṭabhāṇḍeṣu yādapaḥ pibati dvijaḥ / kṛcchrapādena śudhyedvai punaḥ saṃskārakarmaṇā //
analyzed: madya ādi duṣṭa bhāṇḍeṣu yādapaḥ pibati dvijaḥ kṛcchra pādena śudhyet vai punar saṃskāra karmaṇā

original: ye pratyavasitā viprā vajrāgnipavanādiṣu / annapānādi saṃgṛhya cikīrṣanti gṛhāntaram //
analyzed: ye pratyavasitāḥ viprāḥ vajra agni pavana ādiṣu anna pāna ādi saṃgṛhya cikīrṣanti gṛha antaram

original: cārayettrīṇi kṛcchāṇi trīṇi cāndrāyaṇāni vai / jātakarmādisaṃskāraṃ vasiṣṭho munirabravīt //
analyzed: cārayet trīṇi kṛcchāṇi trīṇi cāndrāyaṇāni vai jātakarma ādi saṃskāram vasiṣṭhaḥ muniḥ abravīt

original: prājāpatyādibhirdraṣṭā strī śudhyettu dvibhojanāt / ucchiṣṭocchiṣṭasaṃspṛṣṭaṃśunā śūdreṇa vā dvijaḥ //
analyzed: prājāpatya ādibhiḥ draṣṭā strī śudhyet tu dvi bhojanāt ucchiṣṭa ucchiṣṭa saṃspṛṣṭa aṃśunā śūdreṇa vā dvijaḥ

original: upoṣya rajanīmekāṃ pañcagavyena śudhyati / varṇabāhyena saṃspṛṣṭaḥ pañcarātreṇa vai tadā //
analyzed: upoṣya rajanīm ekām pañcagavyena śudhyati varṇa bāhyena saṃspṛṣṭaḥ pañca rātreṇa vai tadā

original: aduṣṭāḥ santatā dhārāḥ vātoddhūtāśca reṇavaḥ / striyo bālāśca vṛddhāśca na duṣyanti kadācana //
analyzed: aduṣṭāḥ santatāḥ dhārāḥ vāta uddhūtāḥ ca reṇavaḥ striyaḥ bālāḥ ca vṛddhāḥ ca na duṣyanti kadācana

original: nityamāsyaṃ śuci strīṇāṃ śakuntaiḥ pātitaṃ phalam / prastrave ca śucirvatsaḥ śvā mṛgagrahaṇe śuciḥ //
analyzed: nityam āsyam śuci strīṇām śakuntaiḥ pātitam phalam prastrave ca śuciḥ vatsaḥ śvā mṛga grahaṇe śuciḥ

original: udake codakasthaṃ tu sthaleṣu sthalajaṃ śuci / pādau sthāpyau ca tatraiva ācāntaḥ śucitāmiyāt //
analyzed: udake ca udaka stham tu sthaleṣu sthala jam śuci pādau sthāpyau ca tatra eva ācāntaḥ śuci tām iyāt

original: śudhyettadbhasmanā kāṃsyaṃ surayā yanna lipyate / mūtreṇa surayā miśraṃ tapanaiḥ khalu śudhyati //
analyzed: śudhyet tat bhasmanā kāṃsyam surayā yat na lipyate mūtreṇa surayā miśram tapanaiḥ khalu śudhyati

original: gavāghrātāni kāṃsyāni śūdrocchiṣṭāni yāni ca / kākaśvāpahatānyeva śudhyanti daśa bhasmanā //
analyzed: gavā āghrātāni kāṃsyāni śūdra ucchiṣṭāni yāni ca kāka śvāpahatāni eva śudhyanti daśa bhasmanā

original: śūdrabhājanabhoktā yaḥ pañcagavyaṃ tryupoṣitaḥ / ucchiṣṭaṃ spṛśate vipraḥ śvasūdraścāparādhikaḥ //
analyzed: śūdra bhājana bhoktā yaḥ pañcagavyam tri upoṣitaḥ ucchiṣṭam spṛśate vipraḥ śva sūdraḥ ca apara adhikaḥ

original: upoṣitaḥ pañcagavyācchudhyetspṛṣṭvā rajasvalām / anudakeṣu deśeṣu coravyāghrākule pathi //
analyzed: upoṣitaḥ pañcagavyāt śudhyet spṛṣṭvā rajasvalām anudakeṣu deśeṣu cora vyāghra ākule pathi

original: kṛtvā mūtrapurīṣantu dravyahasto na duṣyati / bhūmauniḥ kṣaipya taddravyaṃ śaucaṃ kṛtvā samāhitaḥ //
analyzed: kṛtvā dravya hastaḥ na duṣyati bhū mauniḥ kṣaipya tat dravyam śaucam kṛtvā samāhitaḥ

original: āranālaṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ takrantu kṛsarañca yat / śūdrādapi ca tadgāhyaṃ māṃsaṃ madhu tathāntyajāt //
analyzed: āranālam dadhi kṣīram takram tu kṛsaram ca yat  śūdrāt api ca tat gāhyam māṃsam madhu tathā antyajāt

original: gauḍīṃ paiṣṭīñca mādhvīkaṃ viprādiryaḥ surāṃ pibet / surāṃ pibandvijaḥ śudhyedagnivarṇāṃ surāṃ piban //
analyzed: gauḍīm paiṣṭīm ca mādhvīkam vipra ādiḥ yaḥ surām pibet surām piban dvijaḥ śudhyet agni varṇām surām piban

original: vipraḥ pañcaśataṃ japyaṃ gāyatryāḥ kṣatriyasya ca śataṃ vipraśca bhuktvānnaṃ pānapātreṇa sūtake //
analyzed: vipraḥ pañcaśatam japyam gāyatryāḥ kṣatriyasya ca śatam vipraḥ ca bhuktvā annam pāna pātreṇa sūtake

original: śucirvipro daśāhena kṣattriyo dvādaśāhataḥ / vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśāhana śūdro māsena śudhyati //
analyzed: śuciḥ vipraḥ daśa ahena kṣattriyaḥ dvādaśa ahataḥ vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśa ahana śūdraḥ māsena śudhyati

original: rājñāṃ yuddheṣu yajñādau deśāntaragateṣu ca / bāle prete māsike ca sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate //
analyzed: rājñām yuddheṣu yajña ādau deśa antara gateṣu ca bāle prete māsike ca sadyas śaucam vidhīyate

original: avivāhā tathā kanyā dvijo mauñjīvivarjitaḥ / jatadantaśca bālaśca kumārī ca trivarṣikā //
analyzed: avivāhā tathā kanyā dvijaḥ mauñjī vivarjitaḥ jata dantaḥ ca bālaḥ ca kumārī ca tri varṣikā

original: teṣāṃ śuddhistrirātreṇa garbhastrāve trirātribhiḥ / sūtāyāṃ māsatulyāśca caturthe 'hni rajasvalā //
analyzed: teṣām śuddhiḥ tri rātreṇa garbha strāve tri rātribhiḥ sūtāyām māsa tulyāḥ ca caturthe hni rajasvalā

original: durbhikṣe rāṣṭrasaṃpate sūtake mṛtakepi vā / niyamāśca na duṣyanti dānadharmaparāstathā //
analyzed: durbhikṣe rāṣṭra saṃpate sūtake mṛtake api vā niyamāḥ ca na duṣyanti dāna dharma parāḥ tathā

original: dakṣikāle vivāhādau devadvijanimantrite / pūrvasaṃkalpite vāpi nāśaucaṃ mṛtasūtake //
analyzed: dakṣi kāle vivāha ādau deva dvija nimantrite pūrva saṃkalpite vā api na āśaucam mṛta sūtake

original: prasūtapatnīsaṃsparśādaśuciḥ syāttathā dvijaḥ / agnayo yatra hūyante vedo vā yatra paṭhyate //
analyzed: prasūta patnī saṃsparśāt aśuciḥ syāt tathā dvijaḥ agnayaḥ yatra hūyante vedaḥ vā yatra paṭhyate

original: satataṃ vaiśvadevā di na teṣāṃ sūtakaṃ bhavet / aśuddhe ca gṛhe bhukte trirātrācchudhyati dvijaḥ //
analyzed: satatam na teṣām sūtakam bhavet aśuddhe ca gṛhe bhukte tri rātrāt śudhyati dvijaḥ

original: brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā caiva rajasvalā / anyonyasparśanāttatra brāhmaṇī tu trirātrataḥ //
analyzed: brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā ca eva rajasvalā anyonya sparśanāt tatra brāhmaṇī tu tri rātrataḥ

original: dvirātrataḥ kṣatriyā ca śuddhā vaiśyā hyupoṣitā / śūdrā snānena śudhyettu droṇārthaṃ na visarjayet //
analyzed: dvi rātrataḥ kṣatriyā ca śuddhā vaiśyā hi upoṣitā śūdrā snānena śudhyet tu droṇa artham na visarjayet

original: kākaśvānopanī tantu annaṃ bāhyantu tattyajet / suvarṇādbhaiḥ samabhyukṣya hutāśe ca pratāpayet //
analyzed: tantu annam tat tyajet suvarṇa adbhaiḥ samabhyukṣya hutāśe ca pratāpayet

original: kūpe ca patitāndṛṣṭvā śvaśṛgālau ca markaṭam / tatkūpasyodakaṃ pītvā śudhyedviprastribhirdinaiḥ / kṣatriyo 'hardvayenaiva vaiśyo vaikāhataḥ param //
analyzed: kūpe ca patitān dṛṣṭvā śva śṛgālau ca markaṭam tad kūpasya udakam pītvā śudhyet vipraḥ tribhiḥ dinaiḥ kṣatriyaḥ har dvayena eva vaiśyaḥ vā ekāhataḥ param

original: asthi carma malaṃ vāpi mūṣikāṃ yadi kūpataḥ / uddhṛtya codakaṃ pañca gavyācchuddhyettu śodhitam //
analyzed: asthi carma malam vā api mūṣikām yadi kūpataḥ  uddhṛtya ca udakam pañca gavyāt śuddhyet tu śodhitam

original: taḍāge puṣkariṇyādau bhasmādiṃ pātayettathā / ṣaṭkumbhānapa utddhṛya pañcagavyena śudhyati //
analyzed: taḍāge puṣkariṇī ādau bhasma ādim pātayet tathā ṣaṭ kumbhān apaḥ utddhṛya pañcagavyena śudhyati

original: strīrajaḥ patitaṃ madhye triṃśatkumbhānsamuddharet / agamyāgamanaṃ kṛtvā madyagomāṃsabhakṣaṇam //
analyzed: strī rajaḥ patitam madhye triṃśat kumbhān samuddharet  agamyā gamanam kṛtvā madya go māṃsa bhakṣaṇam

original: śudhye ccāndrāyaṇādvipraḥ prājāpatyena bhūmipaḥ / vaiśyaḥ sāntapanācchūdraḥ pañcāhobhirviśudhyati //
analyzed: śudhye cāndrāyaṇāt vipraḥ prājāpatyena bhūmipaḥ  vaiśyaḥ sāntapanāt śūdraḥ pañca ahobhiḥ viśudhyati

original: prāyaścitte kṛte dadyādgavāṃ brāhmaṇabhojanam / krīḍāyāṃ śayanīyādau nīlīvastraṃ na duṣyati //
analyzed: prāyaścitte kṛte dadyāt gavām brāhmaṇa bhojanam krīḍāyām śayanīya ādau nīlī vastram na duṣyati

original: nīlīvastraṃ na spṛśecca nīlī ca nirayaṃ brajet / vrahmaghnaśca surāpaśca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ //
analyzed: nīlī vastram na spṛśet ca nīlī ca nirayam brajet  vrahma ghnaḥ ca surāpaḥ ca steyī ca gurutalpa gaḥ

original: ṛkṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśudhyante tatsaṃyogī ca pañcamaḥ / tato dhenuśataṃ dadyādbrāhmaṇānāntu bhojanam //
analyzed: ṛkṣam dṛṣṭvā viśudhyante tad saṃyogī ca pañcamaḥ tatas dhenu śatam dadyāt brāhmaṇānām tu bhojanam

original: brahmahā dvādaśābdāni kuṭīṃ kṛtvā vane vaset / nyasyedātmānamagnau vā susamiddhe surāpakaḥ //
analyzed: brahma hā dvādaśa abdāni kuṭīm kṛtvā vane vaset nyasyet ātmānam agnau vā su samiddhe surāpakaḥ

original: steyī sarvaṃ vedavide brāhmaṇāyopapādayet / vṛṣamekaṃ sahasraṃ gāṃ dadyācca gurutalpagaḥ //
analyzed: steyī sarvam veda vide brāhmaṇāya upapādayet vṛṣam ekam sahasram gām dadyāt ca gurutalpa gaḥ

original: kṛtapāpaścaredrodhe dvau pādau bandhayanpaśoḥ / sarvakṛcchraṃ nipānesyātkāntāre gṛhadāhataḥ //
analyzed: kṛta pāpaḥ caret rodhe dvau pādau bandhayan paśoḥ  sarvakṛcchram nipāne syāt kāntāre gṛha dāhataḥ

original: kaṇṭhābharaṇadoṣeṇa kṛcchrapādaṃ mṛte gavi / asthibhaṅgaṃ gavāṃ kṛtvā śṛṅgabhaṅgamathāpi vā //
analyzed: kaṇṭha ābharaṇa doṣeṇa kṛcchra pādam mṛte gavi asthi bhaṅgam gavām kṛtvā śṛṅga bhaṅgam atha api vā

original: tvagbhedaṃ pucchanāśe vā māsārdhaṃ yāvakaṃ pibet / sarvaṃ hastyaśvaśastrādyairniścayaṃ kṛcchrameva tu //
analyzed: tvac bhedam puccha nāśe vā māsa ardham yāvakam pibet sarvam hasti aśva śastra ādyaiḥ niścayam kṛcchram eva tu

original: ajñānātprāśya viṇmūtraṃ surāsaṃspṛṣṭameva ca / punaḥ saṃskāramāyānti trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ //
analyzed: ajñānāt prāśya viṣ mūtram surā saṃspṛṣṭam eva ca punar saṃskāram āyānti trayaḥ varṇāḥ dvijātayaḥ

original: vapanaṃ mekhlā daṇḍo bhaikṣyacaryāvratāni ca / nivartante dvijātīnāṃ punaḥ saṃskārakarmaṇi //
analyzed: vapanam mekhlā daṇḍaḥ bhaikṣya caryā vratāni ca nivartante dvijātīnām punar saṃskāra karmaṇi

original: āmamāṃsaṃ ghṛtaṃ kṣaudraṃ snehaśca kālasambhavāḥ / antyabhāṇḍasthitāḥ sarve niṣkrāntāḥ śucayaḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: āma māṃsam ghṛtam kṣaudram snehaḥ ca kāla sambhavāḥ antya bhāṇḍa sthitāḥ sarve niṣkrāntāḥ śucayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: tailādighṛtamādhvīkaṃ paṇyadravyaṃ dravastathā / ekabhaktaṃ kramānnaktaṃ ekaikāhamayācitam / upavāsaḥ pādakṛcchraṃ kṛcchārdhadviguṇaṃ hi yat //
analyzed: taila ādi ghṛta mādhvīkam paṇya dravyam dravaḥ tathā eka bhaktam kramāt naktam eka eka aham a yācitam upavāsaḥ pādakṛcchram kṛccha ardha dviguṇam hi yat

original: prājāpatyantu tatsyācca sarvapātakanāśanam / kṛcchraṃ saptopavāsaiśca mahāsāntapanaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: prājāpatyantu tat syāt ca sarva pātaka nāśanam kṛcchram sapta upavāsaiḥ ca mahāsāntapanam smṛtam

original: tryahamuṣṇaṃ pibecchāpaḥ tryahamuṣṇaṃ payaḥ pibet / tryamuṣṇaṃ pibetsarpistaptakṛcchramaghāpaham //
analyzed: tri aham uṣṇam pibet śāpaḥ tri aham uṣṇam payaḥ pibet    uṣṇam pibet sarpiḥ taptakṛcchram agha apaham

original: dvādaśāhopavāsena parākaḥ sarvapāpahā / ekaikaṃ vardhayetpiṇḍaṃ śukle kṛṣṇe ca hrāsayet //
analyzed: dvādaśa aha upavāsena parākaḥ sarva pāpa hā ekaikam vardhayet piṇḍam śukle kṛṣṇe ca hrāsayet

original: payaḥ kāñcanavarṇāyāḥ śvetavarṇaṃ ca gomayam / gomūtraṃ tāmravarṇāyā nīlavarṇabhavaṃ ghṛtam //
analyzed: payaḥ kāñcana varṇāyāḥ śveta varṇam ca gomayam go mūtram tāmra varṇāyāḥ nīla varṇa bhavam ghṛtam

original: dadhi syātkṛṣṇavarṇāyā darbhodakasamāyutam / gomūtramāṣakāṇyaṣṭau gomayasya catuṣṭayam //
analyzed: dadhi syāt kṛṣṇa varṇāyāḥ darbha udaka samāyutam go mūtra māṣakāṇi aṣṭau gomayasya catuṣṭayam

original: kṣīrasya dvādaśa proktā dadhnastu daśa ucyate / ghṛtasya māṣakāḥ pañca pañcagavyaṃ malāpaham //
analyzed: kṣīrasya dvādaśa proktāḥ dadhnaḥ tu daśa ucyate ghṛtasya māṣakāḥ pañca pañcagavyam mala apaham

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prāyaścitakathanaṃ nāma dvāviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe prāyaścitakathanam nāma dvāviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 223
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca munibhiścaritā dharmā bhaktyā vyāsa mayoditāḥ / yairviṣṇustuṣyate caiva sūryādiparicāraṇāt //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca munibhiḥ caritāḥ dharmāḥ bhaktyā vyāsa mayā uditāḥ  yaiḥ viṣṇuḥ tuṣyate ca eva sūrya ādi paricāraṇāt

original: tarpaṇena ca homena sandhyāyā vandanena ca / prāpyate bhagavān viṣṇurdharmakāmārthamokṣadaḥ //
analyzed: tarpaṇena ca homena sandhyāyāḥ vandanena ca  prāpyate bhagavān viṣṇuḥ dharma kāma artha mokṣa daḥ

original: dharmo hi bhagavānviṣṇuḥ pūjī viṣṇostu tarpaṇam / homaḥ sandhyā tathā dhyānaṃ dhāraṇā sakalaṃ hariḥ //
analyzed: dharmaḥ hi bhagavān viṣṇuḥ pūjī viṣṇoḥ tu tarpaṇam homaḥ sandhyā tathā dhyānam dhāraṇā sakalam hariḥ

original: sūca uvāca / pralayaṃ jagato vakṣye tatsarvaṃ śṛṇu śaunaka / caturyugasahasrantu kalpaikābjadinaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: sūcaḥ uvāca pralayam jagataḥ vakṣye tat sarvam śṛṇu śaunaka caturyuga sahasram tu kalpa eka abja dinam smṛtam

original: kṛtatretādvāparādiyugāvasthā nibodhame / kṛte dharmaścatuṣpācca satyaṃ dānaṃ tapo dayā //
analyzed: kṛta tretā dvāpara ādi yuga avasthāḥ nibodhame  kṛte dharmaḥ catuṣpād ca satyam dānam tapaḥ dayā

original: dharmapātā hariśceti santuṣṭā jñānino narāḥ / caturvaṃṣarsahasrāṇi narā jīvanti vai tadā //
analyzed: dharma pātā hariḥ ca iti santuṣṭāḥ jñāninaḥ narāḥ catur vaṃṣar sahasrāṇi narāḥ jīvanti vai tadā

original: kṛtānte kṣattriyairviprā viṭśūdrāśca jitā dvijaiḥ / śūraścātibalo viṣṇū rakṣāṃsi ca jaghāna ha //
analyzed: kṛtānte kṣattriyaiḥ viprāḥ viś śūdrāḥ ca jitāḥ dvijaiḥ śūraḥ ca ati balaḥ viṣṇuḥ rakṣāṃsi ca jaghāna ha

original: tretāyuge tripāddharmaḥ satyadānadayātmakaḥ / narā yajñaparāstasmiṃstathā kṣatrodbhavaṃ jagat //
analyzed: tretā yuge tripād dharmaḥ satya dāna dayā ātmakaḥ narāḥ yajña parāḥ tasmin tathā kṣatra udbhavam jagat

original: rakto harirnaraiḥ pūjyo narā daśaśatāyuṣaḥ / tatra viṣṇurbhomarathaḥ kṣatriyā rākṣasānahan //
analyzed: raktaḥ hariḥ naraiḥ pūjyaḥ narāḥ daśa śata āyuṣaḥ tatra viṣṇuḥ bhoma rathaḥ kṣatriyāḥ rākṣasān ahan

original: dvipādavigro dharmaḥ pītāñcācyute gate / catuḥ śatāyuṣo lokā dvijakṣatrodbhavāḥ prajāḥ //
analyzed: dvi pāda vigraḥ dharmaḥ pītān ca acyute gate catuḥ śata āyuṣaḥ lokāḥ dvija kṣatra udbhavāḥ prajāḥ

original: tatra dṛṣṭvālpabuddhīṃśca viṣṇurvyāsasvarūpadhṛk / tadekantu yajurvedaṃ?
analyzed: tatra dṛṣṭvā alpabuddhīn ca viṣṇuḥ vyāsa sva rūpa dhṛk tat ekam tu yajurvedam

original: caturdhā vyabhajatpunaḥ //
analyzed: caturdhā vyabhajat punar

original: śiṣyānadhyāpayāmāsa samastāṃstānnibodha me / ṛgvedamatha pailant sāmavedañca jaiminim //
analyzed: śiṣyān adhyāpayāmāsa samastān tān nibodha me  ṛgvedam atha sāmavedam ca jaiminim

original: atharvāṇaṃ sumantuntu yajurvedaṃ mahāmunim / vaiśampāyanamaṅgantu purāṇaṃ sūtameva ca / aṣṭādaśapurāṇāni yair vedyo harireva hi //
analyzed: atharvāṇam sumantun tu yajurvedam mahā munim  vaiśampāyanam aṅgantu purāṇam sūtam eva ca  aṣṭādaśa purāṇāni yaiḥ vedyaḥ hariḥ eva hi

original: sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca / vaṃśānucaritaccaiva purāṇaṃ pañcalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: sargaḥ ca pratisargaḥ ca vaṃśaḥ manvantarāṇi ca vaṃśānucaritat ca eva purāṇam pañca lakṣaṇam

original: brāhmaṃ pādmaṃ vaiṣṇavañca śaivaṃ bhāgavatantathā / bhaviṣyannāradīyañcaskāndaṃ liṅgaṃ varāhakam //
analyzed: brāhmam pādmam vaiṣṇavam ca śaivam bhāgavatam tathā bhaviṣyat nāradīyam ca skāndam liṅgam varāhakam

original: mārkaṇḍeyaṃ tathāgneyaṃ brahmavaivartameva ca / kaurmaṃ mātsyaṃ gāruḍañca vāyavīyamanantaram / aṣṭādaśasamuddiṣṭaṃ brahmāṇḍamiti saṃjñitam //
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyam tathā āgneyam brahmavaivartam eva ca kaurmam mātsyam gāruḍam ca vāyavīyam anantaram aṣṭādaśa samuddiṣṭam brahmāṇḍam iti saṃjñitam

original: anyānyupapurāṇāni munibhiḥ kathitāni tu / ādyaṃ sanatkumāroktaṃ nārasiṃhamathāparam //
analyzed: anyāni upapurāṇāni munibhiḥ kathitāni tu ādyam sanatkumāra uktam nārasiṃham atha aparam

original: tṛtīyaṃ skāndamuddiṣṭaṃ kumāreṇa tu bhāṣitam / caturthaṃ śivadharmākhyaṃ syānnandīśvarabhāṣitam //
analyzed: tṛtīyam skāndam uddiṣṭam kumāreṇa tu bhāṣitam caturtham śivadharma ākhyam syāt nandīśvara bhāṣitam

original: durvāsasoktamāścaryaṃ nāradoktamataḥ param / kāpilaṃ vāmanañcaiva tathaivośanaseritam //
analyzed: durvāsasā uktam āścaryam nārada uktam atas param kāpilam vāmanam ca eva tathā eva uśanasā īritam

original: brahmāṇḍaṃ vāruṇañcātha kālikāhvayameva ca / māheśvaraṃ tathā sāmbamevaṃ sarvārthasañcayam / parāśaroktamaparaṃ mārīcaṃ bhārgavāhvayam //
analyzed: brahmāṇḍam vāruṇam ca atha kālikā āhvayam eva ca māheśvaram tathā sāmbam evam sarva artha sañcayam parāśara uktam aparam mārīcam bhārgava āhvayam

original: purāṇaṃ dharmaśāstrañca vedāstvaṅgāni yanmune / nyāyaḥ śaunaka mīmāṃsā āyurvedārthaśāstrakam / gāndharvaśca dhanurvedo vidyā hyaṣṭādaśasmṛtāḥ //
analyzed: purāṇam dharma śāstrañca vedāḥ tu aṅgāni yat mune nyāyaḥ śaunaka mīmāṃsā āyurveda arthaśāstrakam gāndharvaḥ ca dhanurvedaḥ vidyāḥ hi aṣṭādaśa smṛtāḥ

original: dvāparāntena ca harirgurubhāramapāharat / ekapādasthite dharme kṛṣṇatvañcācyute gate //
analyzed: dvāpara antena ca hariḥ guru bhāram apāharat eka pāda sthite dharme kṛṣṇa tvam ca acyute gate

original: janāstadā durācārā bhaviṣyanti ca nirdayāḥ / sattvaṃ rajastama iti dṛśyante puruṣe guṇāḥ / kālasañcoditāste 'pi parivartanta ātmani //
analyzed: janāḥ tadā durācārāḥ bhaviṣyanti ca nirdayāḥ sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti dṛśyante puruṣe guṇāḥ kāla sañcoditāḥ te pi parivartante ātmani

original: prabhūtañca yadā sattvaṃ mano burdhondriyāṇi ca / tadā kṛtayugaṃ vidyājjñāne tapasi yadratiḥ //
analyzed: prabhūtam ca yadā sattvam manaḥ ca tadā kṛta yugam vidyāt jñāne tapasi yat ratiḥ

original: yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu śaktiryaśasi dehinām / tadā tretā rajobhūtiriti jānīhiśaunaka //
analyzed: yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu śaktiḥ yaśasi dehinām  tadā tretā rajaḥ bhūtiḥ iti jānīhi śaunaka

original: yadā lobhastvasantoṣo māno dambhaśca matsaraḥ / karmaṇāñcāpi kāmyānāṃ dvāparaṃ tadrajastamaḥ //
analyzed: yadā lobhaḥ tu asantoṣaḥ mānaḥ dambhaḥ ca matsaraḥ karmaṇām ca api kāmyānām dvāparam tat rajaḥ tamaḥ

original: yadā sadānṛtaṃ nandrā nidrā hiṃsādisādhanam / śokamohau bhayaṃ dainyaṃ sa kalistamasi smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: yadā sadā anṛtam nandrā nidrā hiṃsā ādi sādhanam śoka mohau bhayam dainyam sa kaliḥ tamasi smṛtaḥ

original: yasmiñjanāḥ kāminaḥ syuḥ śaśvatkaṭukabhāṣiṇaḥ / dasyūtkṛṣṭā janapadāvedāḥ pāṣaṇḍadūṣitāḥ //
analyzed: yasmin janāḥ kāminaḥ syuḥ śaśvat kaṭuka bhāṣiṇaḥ dasyu utkṛṣṭāḥ pāṣaṇḍa dūṣitāḥ

original: rājānaśca prajābhikṣāḥ śiśrodaraparājitāḥ / avratā vaṭacavo 'śaucā bhikṣavaśca kuṭumbinaḥ //
analyzed: rājānaḥ ca prajā bhikṣāḥ śiśrodara parājitāḥ avratāḥ śaucāḥ bhikṣavaḥ ca kuṭumbinaḥ

original: tapasvinogrāmavāsāḥ nyāsino hyarthalolupāḥ / hrasvakāyā mahāhārāścaurāste sādhavaḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: nyāsinaḥ hi artha lolupāḥ hrasva kāyāḥ mahā āhārāḥ caurāḥ te sādhavaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: tyakṣyanti bhṛtyāśca patiṃ tāpasastyakṣyati vratam / śūdrāḥ pratigrahiṣyanti vaiśyā vrataparāyaṇaḥ //
analyzed: tyakṣyanti bhṛtyāḥ ca patim tāpasaḥ tyakṣyati vratam śūdrāḥ pratigrahiṣyanti vaiśyāḥ vrata parāyaṇaḥ

original: udvignāḥ santi ca janāḥ piśācasadṛśāḥ prajāḥ / anyāyabhojanenāgnidevatātithipūjanam //
analyzed: udvignāḥ santi ca janāḥ piśāca sadṛśāḥ prajāḥ anyāya bhojanena agni devatā atithi pūjanam

original: kariṣyenti kalau prāpte na ca pitryodakakriyām / strīparāśca janāḥ sarve śūdraprāyāśca śaunaka //
analyzed: kariṣyenti kalau prāpte na ca pitrya udakakriyām strī parāḥ ca janāḥ sarve śūdra prāyāḥ ca śaunaka

original: bahuprajālpabhāgyāśca bhaviṣyanti kalau striyaḥ / śiraḥ kaṇḍūyanaparā ājñāṃ bhetsyanti bhartsitāḥ //
analyzed: bahu prajā alpabhāgyāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti kalau striyaḥ śiraḥ kaṇḍūyana parāḥ ājñām bhetsyanti bhartsitāḥ

original: viṣṇuṃ na pūjayiṣyanti pāṣaṇḍopahatā janāḥ / kalerdeṣanidherviprā asti hyeko mahāguṇaḥ //
analyzed: viṣṇum na pūjayiṣyanti pāṣaṇḍa upahatāḥ janāḥ kaleḥ deṣa nidheḥ viprāḥ asti hi ekaḥ mahā guṇaḥ

original: kīrtanādeva kṛṣṇasya mahābandhaṃ parityajet / kṛte yadyyāyato viṣṇuṃ tretāyāṃ japataḥ phalam //
analyzed: kīrtanāt eva kṛṣṇasya mahābandham parityajet kṛte viṣṇum tretāyām japataḥ phalam

original: dvāpare paricaryāyāṃ kalau taddharikīrtanāt / tasmāddhyeyo harirnityaṃ geyaḥ pūjyaśca śaunaka //
analyzed: dvāpare paricaryāyām kalau tad hari kīrtanāt  tasmāt dhyeyaḥ hariḥ nityam geyaḥ pūjyaḥ ca śaunaka

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yugadharmakathanaṃ nāma trayoviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe yugadharmakathanam nāma trayoviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 224
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / caturyugasahasrānte brāhmo naimittiko layaḥ / anāvṛṣṭiśca kalpānte jāyate śatavārṣikī //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca caturyuga sahasra ante brāhmaḥ naimittikaḥ layaḥ anāvṛṣṭiḥ ca kalpa ante jāyate śata vārṣikī

original: utiṣṭhanti tadā raudrā divi sapta divākarāḥ / te tu pītvā jalaṃ sarvaṃ śoṣayanti jagattrayam //
analyzed: utiṣṭhanti tadā raudrāḥ divi sapta divākarāḥ te tu pītvā jalam sarvam śoṣayanti jagattrayam

original: bhūrbhuvaḥ svarmaharlokaṃ carācaraṃ janastathā / viṣṇuśca rudro bhūtvāsau pātālāni dahatyadhaḥ //
analyzed: bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar mahar lokam carācaram janaḥ tathā viṣṇuḥ ca rudraḥ bhūtvā asau pātālāni dahati adhas

original: viṣṇurdahettrilokañci mukhānmeghān sṛjatyalam / varṣante vai varṣaśataṃ nānāvarṇā mahāghanāḥ //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ dahet trilokam ci mukhāt meghān sṛjati alam varṣante vai varṣa śatam nānā varṇāḥ mahā ghanāḥ

original: viṣṇurūpaḥśataṃ vāti varṣāṇāṃ vāyurūrjitaḥ / viṣṇure kārṇavī bhūte varṣe brahmasvarūpadhṛk / śete 'nantāsane viṣṇurnaṣṭe sthāvarajaṅgame //
analyzed: viṣṇu rūpaḥ śatam vāti varṣāṇām vāyuḥ ūrjitaḥ viṣṇuḥ bhūte varṣe brahma sva rūpa dhṛk śete nanta āsane viṣṇuḥ naṣṭe sthāvara jaṅgame

original: suptvā varṣasahasraṃ sa jagadbhūyo 'sṛjaddhariḥ / atha prākṛtikaṃ vakṣye pralayaṃ śṛṇu śaunaka //
analyzed: suptvā varṣa sahasram sa jagat bhūyas sṛjat hariḥ atha prākṛtikam vakṣye pralayam śṛṇu śaunaka

original: pūrṇe saṃvatsaraśate saṃhṛtya sakalaṃ jagat / brahmāṇaṃ nyasya dehe hi mukto yogabalairhariḥ //
analyzed: pūrṇe saṃvatsara śate saṃhṛtya sakalam jagat  brahmāṇam nyasya dehe hi muktaḥ yoga balaiḥ hariḥ

original: ye gatā brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ te 'pi yānti paraṃ padam / anāvṛṣṭyarkasampannā āsanmeghāstathā dvija / śataṃ varṣāṇi varṣadbhirmedhairaṇḍaṃ prapūryate //
analyzed: ye gatāḥ brahmaṇaḥ sthānam te yānti param padam  anāvṛṣṭi arka sampannāḥ āsan meghāḥ tathā dvija śatam varṣāṇi varṣadbhiḥ medhaiḥ aṇḍam prapūryate

original: antargatena toyena bhinnamaṇḍaṃ jagatpateḥ / pūrṇe brahmāyuṣi gate bhidyate 'mbhasi līyate //
analyzed: antargatena toyena bhinna maṇḍam jagatpateḥ  pūrṇe brahma āyuṣi gate bhidyate mbhasi līyate

original: evaṃ sā jagadādhārā toye corvo pralīyate / āpastejasi līyante tejo vāyau pralīyate //
analyzed: evam sā jagat ādhārā toye ca urvaḥ pralīyate  āpaḥ tejasi līyante tejaḥ vāyau pralīyate

original: vāyuḥ khe khañca bhūtādau viśate ca tadā mahān / mahānprapadyate 'vyaktaṃ prakṛtiḥ puruṣe pare //
analyzed: vāyuḥ khe khan ca bhūtādau viśate ca tadā mahān mahān prapadyate vyaktam prakṛtiḥ puruṣe pare

original: śatavarṣaṃ hariḥ śete sṛjatyatha dinagame / avyaktādikrameṇaiva vyaktībhūtaṃ carācaram //
analyzed: śata varṣam hariḥ śete sṛjati atha dina game avyakta ādi krameṇa eva vyaktībhūtam carācaram

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe naimittikapralayonāma caturviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe naimittikapralayaḥ nāma caturviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 225
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / ādhyātmikāditāpāṃstrīñjñātva saṃsrācakravit / utpannajñānavairāgyaḥ prāpnotyātyantikaṃ layam //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca ādhyātmika ādi tāpān trīn jñātvā saṃsrā cakra vid utpanna jñāna vairāgyaḥ prāpnoti ātyantikam layam

original: saṃsāracakraṃ vakṣye 'hamādābutkrāntikālataḥ / yadvinā puruṣārtho na līnaḥ syātparamātmani //
analyzed: saṃsāra cakram vakṣye ham ādau utkrānti kālataḥ  yat vinā puruṣa arthaḥ na līnaḥ syāt paramātmani

original: ūrdhvavāsī narastyaktvā dehamanyatprapadyate / nīyatedvādaśāhena yamasya yamapūruṣaiḥ //
analyzed: ūrdhva vāsī naraḥ tyaktvā deham anyat prapadyate  nīyate dvādaśa ahena yamasya yama pūruṣaiḥ

original: tatra yadvāndhavāstoyaṃ prayacchanti tilaiḥ saha / yacca piṇḍaṃ prayacchanti yamaloke tadaśnute //
analyzed: tatra yat vāndhavāḥ toyam prayacchanti tilaiḥ saha yat ca piṇḍam prayacchanti yama loke tat aśnute

original: gataśca narakaṃ pāpātsvargaṃ yāti svapuṇyataḥ / pāpakṛdyāti narakaṃ puṇyakṛdyāti vai divam //
analyzed: gataḥ ca narakam pāpāt svargam yāti sva puṇyataḥ pāpa kṛt yāti narakam puṇya kṛt yāti vai divam

original: svargācca narakāttyaktaḥ strīṇāṃ garbhe bhavatyapi / nābhibhūtañca tasyaiva yāti bījadvayaṃ hi tat //
analyzed: svargāt ca narakāt tyaktaḥ strīṇām garbhe bhavati api nābhi bhūtam ca tasya eva yāti bīja dvayam hi tat

original: kalalaṃ budbrudamayaṃ tataḥ śoṇitameva ca / peśyāḥ palasamo 'ṇḍaḥ syādaṅkuraṃ tata ucyate //
analyzed: kalalam budbruda mayam tatas śoṇitam eva ca peśyāḥ pala samaḥ ṇḍaḥ syāt aṅkuram tatas ucyate

original: upāṅgānyaṅgulīnetranāsāsyaśravaṇāni ca / āvahaṃ yāti cāṅgebhyastatparantu nakhādikam //
analyzed: upāṅgāni aṅgulī netra nāsā āsya śravaṇāni ca āvaham yāti ca aṅgebhyaḥ tat paran tu nakha ādikam

original: tvaco romāṇi jāyante keśāścaiva tataḥ param / naraścādhomukhaḥ sthitvā daśame ca saḥ jāyate //
analyzed: tvacaḥ romāṇi jāyante keśāḥ ca eva tatas param naraḥ ca adhomukhaḥ sthitvā daśame ca saḥ jāyate

original: tatastu vaiṣṇavī māyā vṛṇotyatyantamohinī / bālatvaṃ tvatha kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ vṛddhatāmapi //
analyzed: tatas tu vaiṣṇavī māyā vṛṇoti atyanta mohinī bāla tvam tu atha kaumāram yauvanam vṛddha tām api

original: tataśca maraṇaṃ tattaddharmāmāpnoti mānavaḥ / evaṃ saṃsāracakre 'smin bhrāmyate ghaṭīyantravat //
analyzed: tatas ca maraṇam tad tad dharmām āpnoti mānavaḥ evam saṃsāra cakre smin bhrāmyate ghaṭīyantra vat

original: narakātpratimuktastu pāpayoniṣu jāyate / patitātpratigṛhyātha adhoyoniṃ vrajedbudhaḥ //
analyzed: narakāt pratimuktaḥ tu pāpa yoniṣu jāyate patitāt pratigṛhya atha adhas yonim vrajet budhaḥ

original: narakātpratimuktastu kṛmirbhavati yācakaḥ / upādhyāyavyalīkaṃ tu kṛtvā śvā bhavati dvija //
analyzed: narakāt pratimuktaḥ tu kṛmiḥ bhavati yācakaḥ upādhyāya vyalīkam tu kṛtvā śvā bhavati dvija

original: tajjāyāṃ manasā vāñchaṃstaddravyaṃ vāpyasaṃśayam / gardabhojāyate janturmitrasyaivāpamānakṛt //
analyzed: tad jāyām manasā vāñchan tat dravyam vā api asaṃśayam gardabhaḥ jāyate jantuḥ mitrasya eva apamāna kṛt

original: pitarau pīḍayitvā tu kacchapatvañca jāyate / bhurtuḥ piṇḍamupāśvasto vañjayitvā tameva yaḥ //
analyzed: pitarau pīḍayitvā tu kacchapa tvañca jāyate bhurtuḥ piṇḍam upāśvastaḥ vañjayitvā tam eva yaḥ

original: so 'pi mohasamāpanno jāyate vānaro mṛtaḥ / nyāsāpahartā narakādvimukto jāyate kṛmiḥ //
analyzed: saḥ pi moha samāpannaḥ jāyate vānaraḥ mṛtaḥ nyāsa apahartā narakāt vimuktaḥ jāyate kṛmiḥ

original: asūyakaśca narakānmukto bhavati rākṣasaḥ / viśvāsahartā ca naro mīnayonau prajāyate //
analyzed: asūyakaḥ ca narakāt muktaḥ bhavati rākṣasaḥ viśvāsa hartā ca naraḥ mīna yonau prajāyate

original: yavadhānyāni saṃhṛtya jāyate mūṣako mṛtaḥ / paradārābhimarśāttu vṛko ghoro 'bhijāyate //
analyzed: yava dhānyāni saṃhṛtya jāyate mūṣakaḥ mṛtaḥ paradāra abhimarśāt tu vṛkaḥ ghoraḥ bhijāyate

original: bhrātṛbhāryāprasaṃgena kokilo jāyate naraḥ / gurvādibhāryāgamanācchūkaro jāyate naraḥ //
analyzed: bhrātṛ bhāryā prasaṃgena kokilaḥ jāyate naraḥ guru ādi bhāryā gamanāt śūkaraḥ jāyate naraḥ

original: yajñadānavivāhānāṃ vighnakartā bhavetkṛmiḥ / devatāpitṛviprāṇāmadattvā yo 'nnamaśnute //
analyzed: yajña dāna vivāhānām vighna kartā bhavet kṛmiḥ devatā pitṛ viprāṇām a dattvā yaḥ nnam aśnute

original: pramukto narakādvāpi vāyasaḥ sanprajāyate / jyeṣṭhabhrātrapamānācca krauñcayonau prajāyate //
analyzed: pramuktaḥ narakāt vā api vāyasaḥ san prajāyate jyeṣṭha bhrātṛ apamānāt ca krauñca yonau prajāyate

original: śūdrastu brāhmaṇīṃ gatvā kṛmiyonau prajāyate / tasyāmapatyamutpādya kāṣṭhāntaḥ kaṭīko bhavet //
analyzed: śūdraḥ tu brāhmaṇīm gatvā kṛmi yonau prajāyate tasyām apatyam utpādya kāṣṭha antar kaṭīkaḥ bhavet

original: kṛtaghnaḥ kṛmikaḥ kīṭaḥ pataṅgo vṛścikastathā / aśastraṃ puruṣaṃ hartā naraḥ sañjāyate kharaḥ //
analyzed: kṛtaghnaḥ kṛmikaḥ kīṭaḥ pataṅgaḥ vṛścikaḥ tathā aśastram puruṣam hartā naraḥ sañjāyate kharaḥ

original: kṛmiḥ strīvadhakartā ca bālahantā ca jāyate / bhojanañcorayitvā tu makṣikā jāyate naraḥ //
analyzed: kṛmiḥ strī vadha kartā ca bāla hantā ca jāyate bhojanam corayitvā tu makṣikā jāyate naraḥ

original: hṛtvājyañcaiva mārjārastilahṛccaiva mūṣakaḥ / ghṛtaṃ hṛtvā ca nakulaḥ kāko madbhuramāmiṣam //
analyzed: hṛtvā ājyam ca eva mārjāraḥ tila hṛt ca eva mūṣakaḥ ghṛtam hṛtvā ca nakulaḥ kākaḥ madbhuram āmiṣam

original: madhu hṛtvā naro daṃśa-pūpaṃ hṛtvā pipīlikaḥ / apo hṛtvā tu pāpātmā vāyasaḥ samprajāyate //
analyzed: madhu hṛtvā naraḥ daṃśa pūpam hṛtvā pipīlikaḥ apaḥ hṛtvā tu pāpa ātmā vāyasaḥ samprajāyate

original: hṛte kāṣṭhe ca hārītaḥ kapoto vā prajāyate / hṛtvā tu kāñcanaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛmiyonau prajāyate //
