analyzed: hṛte kāṣṭhe ca hārītaḥ kapotaḥ vā prajāyate hṛtvā tu kāñcanam bhāṇḍam kṛmi yonau prajāyate

original: kārpāsike hṛte krauñco vahrihartā bakastathā / mayūro varṇakaṃ hṛtvā śākapatrañca jāyate //
analyzed: kārpāsike hṛte krauñcaḥ vahri hartā bakaḥ tathā mayūraḥ varṇakam hṛtvā śāka patram ca jāyate

original: jīvañjīvakatāṃ yāti raktavastvapahṛnnaraḥ / chuchundariḥ śubhāngandhāñchaśaṃ hṛtvā śaśo bhavet //
analyzed: jīvañjīvaka tām yāti rakta vastu apahṛt naraḥ chuchundariḥ śubhān gandhān śaśam hṛtvā śaśaḥ bhavet

original: ṣaṇḍāḥ kalāpaharaṇe kāṣṭhahṛttṛṇakīṭakaḥ / puṣpaṃ hṛtvā daridrastu paṅguryācakahṛnnaraḥ //
analyzed: ṣaṇḍāḥ kalā apaharaṇe kāṣṭha hṛt tṛṇa kīṭakaḥ puṣpam hṛtvā daridraḥ tu paṅguḥ yācaka hṛt naraḥ

original: śākahartā ca hārītastoyahartā ca cātakaḥ / gṛhahṛnnarakāngatvā rauravādīnsudāruṇān //
analyzed: śāka hartā ca hārītaḥ toya hartā ca cātakaḥ gṛha hṛt narakān gatvā raurava ādīn su dāruṇān

original: tṛṇagulmalatāvallītvagghārī tarutāṃ vrajet / eṣa eva kramo dṛṣṭo gosuvarṇādihāriṇām //
analyzed: tṛṇa gulma latā vallī tvac hārī taru tām vrajet eṣaḥ eva kramaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ go suvarṇa ādi hāriṇām

original: vidyāpahārī mūkaḥ syādgatvā ca narakānbahan / asamiddhe hute cāgnau mandāgniḥ khalu jāyate //
analyzed: vidyā apahārī mūkaḥ syāt gatvā ca narakān bahan a samiddhe hute ca agnau manda agniḥ khalu jāyate

original: paranindā kṛtaghnatvaṃ parasīmābhighātanam / naiṣṭhuryaṃ nirghṛṇatvañca paradāropasevanam //
analyzed: para nindā kṛtaghna tvam para sīma abhighātanam naiṣṭhuryam nirghṛṇa tvam ca para dāra upasevanam

original: parasvaharaṇāśaucaṃ devatānāṃ ca kutsanam / nikṛtya bandhanaṃ nṝṇāṃ kārpaṇyañca nṛṇāṃ vadhaḥ / upalakṣaṇādvijānīyānmuktānāṃ narakādanu //
analyzed: para sva haraṇa āśaucam devatānām ca kutsanam nikṛtya bandhanam nṝṇām kārpaṇyam ca nṛṇām vadhaḥ upalakṣaṇāt vijānīyāt muktānām narakāt anu

original: dayā bhūteṣu saṃvādaḥ paralokaṃ prati kriyā / satyaṃ hitārthamuktiśca vedaprāmāṇyadarśanam //
analyzed: dayā bhūteṣu saṃvādaḥ para lokam prati kriyā satyam hita artha muktiḥ ca veda prāmāṇya darśanam

original: gurudevarṣisiddharṣisevanaṃ sādhusaṃyamaḥ / satkriyāṣvasanaṃ maitrī svargasya lakṣaṇaṃ viduḥ / aṣṭāṅgayogavijñānātprāpnotyātyantikaṃ phalam //
analyzed: guru deva ṛṣi siddha ṛṣi sevanam sādhu saṃyamaḥ satkriyā ṣvasanam maitrī svargasya lakṣaṇam viduḥ aṣṭāṅga yoga vijñānāt prāpnoti ātyantikam phalam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karmavipākādikathanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe karmavipākādikathanam nāma pañcaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 226
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca vakṣye sāṅgaṃ mahāyogaṃ bhuktimuktikaraṃ param / sarvapāpapraśamanaṃ bhaktyānupaṭhitaṃ śṛṇu //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca vakṣye sa aṅgam mahā yogam bhukti mukti karam param sarva pāpa praśamanam bhaktyā anupaṭhitam śṛṇu

original: mameti mūlaṃ duḥ khasya na mameti nivartanam / dattātreyo hyalarkāya imamāha mahāmatiḥ //
analyzed: mama iti mūlam duḥ khasya na mama iti nivartanam dattātreyaḥ hi alarkāya imam āha mahāmatiḥ

original: ahamityaṅkurotpanno mameti skandhavānmahān / gṛhakṣetrāṇi śākhāśca yatra dārābhipallavaḥ //
analyzed: aham iti aṅkura utpannaḥ mama iti skandhavān mahān gṛha kṣetrāṇi śākhāḥ ca yatra dāra abhipallavaḥ

original: dhanadhānye mahāpatre pāpamūlo 'tidurgamaḥ / vidhivatsukhaśāntyarthaṃ jāto 'jñānamahātaruḥ //
analyzed: dhana dhānye mahā patre pāpa mūlaḥ ti durgamaḥ vidhivat sukha śānti artham jātaḥ jñāna mahā taruḥ

original: chinno vidyākuṭhāreṇa te gatā layamīśvare / prāpya brahmarasaṃ pītaṃ nīrajaskamakaṇṭakam //
analyzed: chinnaḥ vidyā kuṭhāreṇa te gatāḥ layam īśvare prāpya brahma rasam pītam nīrajaskam akaṇṭakam

original: prāpnuvanti parāḥ prājñāḥ sukhanirvṛtimeva ca / mūrtendriyalayaṃ nūnaṃ na tvaṃ rājan na cāpyaham //
analyzed: prāpnuvanti parāḥ prājñāḥ sukha nirvṛtim eva ca mūrta indriya layam nūnam na tvam rājan na ca api aham

original: na tanmātrādikaṃ vācā naivāntaḥ karaṇaṃ tathā / kaṃ vā paśyasi rājendra pradhānamidamāvayoḥ //
analyzed: na tanmātra ādikam vācā na eva antar karaṇam tathā kam vā paśyasi rāja indra pradhānam idam āvayoḥ

original: mṛtaḥ pare 'hni kṣetrajñaḥ saṃjāto 'yaṃ guṇātmakaḥ / ekatve 'pi pṛthagbhāvastathā kṣetrātmano nṛpa //
analyzed: mṛtaḥ pare hni kṣetrajñaḥ saṃjātaḥ yam guṇa ātmakaḥ ekatve pi pṛthagbhāvaḥ tathā kṣetra ātmanaḥ nṛpa

original: jñānapūrvaviyogo 'sau jñāne naṣṭe ca yoginaḥ / sā muktirbrahmaṇā caikya manaikyaṃ prākṛtairguṇaiḥ //
analyzed: jñāna pūrva viyogaḥ jñāne naṣṭe ca yoginaḥ sā muktiḥ brahmaṇā prākṛtaiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: tadgṛhaṃ yatra vasati tadbhojyaṃ yena jīvati / yanmuktaye tadevoktaṃ jñānājñāne na cānyathā //
analyzed: tad gṛham yatra vasati tat bhojyam yena jīvati yat muktaye tat eva uktam jñāna ajñāne na ca anyathā

original: upabhogena puṇyānā mapuṇyānāñca pārthiva / kartavyānāñca nityānāṃ kṣayantvakaraṇāttathā //
analyzed: upabhogena puṇyānām apuṇyānām ca pārthiva  kartavyānām ca nityānām kṣaya ntu akaraṇāt tathā

original: ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ brahmacaryāparigrahau / yamāḥ pañcātha niyamāḥ śaucaṃ dvividhamīritam //
analyzed: ahiṃsā satyam asteyam brahmacarya aparigrahau yamāḥ pañca atha niyamāḥ śaucam dvividham īritam

original: santoṣastapasā śāntirvāsudevārcanaṃ damaḥ / āsana padmakādyuktaṃ prāṇāyāmo marujjayaḥ //
analyzed: santoṣaḥ tapasā śāntiḥ vāsudeva arcanam damaḥ āsana padmaka ādi uktam prāṇāyāmaḥ marut jayaḥ

original: pratyekaṃ trividhaḥ so 'pi pūrakumbhakarecakaiḥ / laghuryo daśamātrastu dviguṇaḥ sa tu madhyamaḥ //
analyzed: pratyekam trividhaḥ saḥ pi pūra kumbhaka recakaiḥ  laghuḥ yaḥ daśa mātraḥ tu dviguṇaḥ sa tu madhyamaḥ

original: triguṇābhistu mātrābhiruttamaḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ / japadhyānayutau garbho viparītastvarbhakaḥ //
analyzed: triguṇābhiḥ tu mātrābhiḥ uttamaḥ saḥ udāhṛtaḥ japa dhyāna yutau garbhaḥ viparītaḥ tu arbhakaḥ

original: prathame najayetsvapnaṃ madhyamena ca vepathum / vipākaṃ hi tṛtīyena jātāndoṣāstvanukramāt //
analyzed: prathame na jayet svapnam madhyamena ca vepathum  vipākam hi tṛtīyena jātān doṣāḥ tu anukramāt

original: āsanasthantuyuñjīta kṛtvā ca praṇavaṃ hṛdī / pārṣṇibhyāṃ liṅgavṛṣaṇau sparśannakāgramānasaḥ //
analyzed: āsana sthantu yuñjīta kṛtvā ca praṇavam hṛdī pārṣṇibhyām liṅga vṛṣaṇau sparśan akāgra mānasaḥ

original: rajasā tamaso vṛttiṃ sattvena rajasastathā / nirudhya niścalo bhūtvā sthito yuñjīta yogavit //
analyzed: rajasā tamasaḥ vṛttim sattvena rajasaḥ tathā nirudhya niścalaḥ bhūtvā sthitaḥ yuñjīta yoga vid

original: indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyaḥ prāṇādīnamna eva ca / nigṛhya samavāyena pratyāhāra mupakramet //
analyzed: indriyāṇi indriyārthebhyaḥ prāṇa ādīn amnaḥ eva ca nigṛhya samavāyena pratyāhāram upakramet

original: prāṇāyāmā daśāṣṭau ca dhāraṇā sā vidhīyate / dve dhāraṇe smṛto yogo yogibhistattvadarśibhiḥ //
analyzed: prāṇāyāmāḥ daśa aṣṭau ca dhāraṇā sā vidhīyate dve dhāraṇe smṛtaḥ yogaḥ yogibhiḥ tattva darśibhiḥ

original: prāṅnāḍyāṃ hṛdaye cātra tṛtīyā ca tathorasi / kaṇṭhe mukhe nā sikāgre netre bhrūmadhyamūrdhasu //
analyzed: prāc nāḍyām hṛdaye ca atra tṛtīyā ca tathā urasi kaṇṭhe mukhe nā sikā agre netre bhrū madhya mūrdhasu

original: kiñcittasmātparasmiṃśca dhāraṇā daśadhā smṛtā / daśaitā dhāraṇāḥ prāpya prāpnotyakṣararūpatām //
analyzed: kiñcid tasmāt parasmin ca dhāraṇā daśadhā smṛtā daśa etāḥ dhāraṇāḥ prāpya prāpnoti akṣara rūpa tām

original: yathāgniragnau saṃkṣiptastathātmā paramātmani / brahmarūpaṃ mahāpuṇyamomityekākṣaraṃ japet //
analyzed: yathā agniḥ agnau saṃkṣiptaḥ tathā ātmā paramātmani brahma rūpam mahā puṇyam om iti ekākṣaram japet

original: akāraśca tathokāro makāraścākṣaratrayam / etāstistrastato mātrāḥ sattvarājasatāmasāḥ //
analyzed: akāraḥ ca tathā ukāraḥ makāraḥ ca akṣara trayam etāḥ tistraḥ tatas mātrāḥ sattva rājasa tāmasāḥ

original: nirguṇā yogigamyādyārdhamātrā parā sthitā / gāndhārīti ca vijñeyā gāndhārasvarasaṃśrayā / ityetadakṣaraṃ brahma paramoṅkārasaṃjñitam //
analyzed: nirguṇā yogi gamyā ādya ardha mātrā parā sthitā gāndhārī iti ca vijñeyā gāndhāra svara saṃśrayā iti etat akṣaram brahma parama uṅkāra saṃjñitam

original: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ sthūladehavivarjitam / ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirjarāmaraṇavarjitam //
analyzed: aham brahma param jyotiḥ sthūla deha vivarjitam aham brahma param jyotiḥ jarā maraṇa varjitam

original: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ pṛthivyā malavarjitam / ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirvāyvākāśavivarjitam //
analyzed: aham brahma param jyotiḥ pṛthivyāḥ mala varjitam aham brahma param jyotiḥ vāyu ākāśa vivarjitam

original: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ sūkṣmadehavivarjitam / ahaṃ brahmaparaṃ jyotiḥ sthānāsthānavivarjitam //
analyzed: aham brahma param jyotiḥ sūkṣma deha vivarjitam aham brahma param jyotiḥ sthāna asthāna vivarjitam

original: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirgandhamātravivarjitam / ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ śrotratvakparivarjitam //
analyzed: aham brahma param jyotiḥ gandha mātra vivarjitam aham brahma param jyotiḥ śrotra tvac parivarjitam

original: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirjihvāghrāṇavivarjitam / ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ prāṇāpānavivarjitam //
analyzed: aham brahma param jyotiḥ jihvā ghrāṇa vivarjitam aham brahma param jyotiḥ prāṇa apāna vivarjitam

original: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirvyānodānavivarjitam / ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirajñānaparivarjitam //
analyzed: aham brahma param jyotiḥ vyāna udāna vivarjitam aham brahma param jyotiḥ ajñāna parivarjitam

original: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotisturīyaṃ paramaṃ padam / dehendriyamanobuddhiprāṇāhaṅkāravarjitam //
analyzed: aham brahma param jyotiḥ turīyam paramam padam deha indriya manaḥ buddhi prāṇa ahaṅkāra varjitam

original: nityaśuddhabuddhaṃmuktamahāmānandamadvayam / ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirjñānarūpo vimuktaye //
analyzed: nitya śuddha buddhaṃmukta mahā mānandam advayam aham brahma param jyotiḥ jñāna rūpaḥ vimuktaye

original: sūta uvāca / ityaṣṭāṅgo mayā yoga uktaḥ śaunaka muktidaḥ / nityanaimittikaṃ gatvā layaṃ prākṛtabandhanāḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca iti aṣṭa aṅgaḥ mayā yogaḥ uktaḥ śaunaka mukti daḥ nityanaimittikam gatvā layam prākṛta bandhanāḥ

original: utpadyante hi saṃsāre naikaṃ yātvā parātmanām / vimucyate vimuktaśca jñānādajñānamohitaḥ //
analyzed: utpadyante hi saṃsāre na ekam yātvā parātmanām  vimucyate vimuktaḥ ca jñānāt ajñāna mohitaḥ

original: tato naṃ mriyate duḥ khī na rogī na ca vandhavān / na pāpairyujyate yogī narake na vipacyate //
analyzed: tatas nam mriyate duḥ khī na rogī na ca vandhavān na pāpaiḥ yujyate yogī narake na vipacyate

original: garbhavāse sa no duḥ khī sa syānnārāyaṇo 'vyayaḥ / bhaktyā tvananyayā labhyo bhagavānbhuktimuktidaḥ //
analyzed: garbha vāse sa naḥ duḥ khī sa syāt nārāyaṇaḥ vyayaḥ bhaktyā tu ananyayā labhyaḥ bhagavān bhukti mukti daḥ

original: dhyānena pūjayā japyaiḥ samyak stotrairyatavrataiḥ / yajñairdānaiścittaśuddhistayā jñānañca labhyate //
analyzed: dhyānena pūjayā japyaiḥ samyak stotraiḥ yata vrataiḥ yajñaiḥ dānaiḥ citta śuddhiḥ tayā jñānam ca labhyate

original: praṇavādikamantraiśca japyairmuktiṃ gatā dvijāḥ / indro 'pi paramaṃ sthānaṃ gandharvāpsaraso varāḥ //
analyzed: praṇava ādika mantraiḥ ca japyaiḥ muktim gatāḥ dvijāḥ paramam sthānam gandharva apsarasaḥ varāḥ

original: prāptā devāśca devatvaṃ munitvaṃ munayo gatāḥ / gandharvatvañca gandharvā rājatvañca nṛpādayaḥ //
analyzed: prāptāḥ devāḥ ca deva tvam muni tvam munayaḥ gatāḥ gandharva tvam ca gandharvāḥ rāja tvam ca nṛpa ādayaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍeṣṭāṅgayogakathanaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍeṣṭāṅgayogakathanam nāma ṣaḍviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 227
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / viṣṇubhaktiṃ pravakṣyāmi yayā sarvamavāpyate / yathā bhaktyā haristuṣyettathā nānyena kenacit //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca viṣṇu bhaktim pravakṣyāmi yayā sarvam avāpyate yathā bhaktyā hariḥ tuṣyet tathā na anyena kenacid

original: mahataḥ śreyaso mūlaṃ prasavaḥ puṇyasantateḥ / jīvitasya phalaṃ svādu niyataṃ smaraṇaṃ hareḥ //
analyzed: mahataḥ śreyasaḥ mūlam prasavaḥ puṇya santateḥ  jīvitasya phalam svādu niyatam smaraṇam hareḥ

original: tasmātsevā budhaiḥ proktā bhaktisādhanabhūyasī / te bhaktā lokanāthasya nāmakarmādikīrtane //
analyzed: tasmāt sevā budhaiḥ proktā bhakti sādhana bhūyasī te bhaktāḥ lokanāthasya nāma karma ādi kīrtane

original: muñcantyaśrūṇi saṃharṣādye prahṛṣṭanūruhāḥ / jagaddhāturmaheśasya divyājñācaraṇā vayam //
analyzed: muñcanti aśrūṇi saṃharṣāt ye prahṛṣṭa nūruhāḥ jagaddhātuḥ maheśasya divya ājñā caraṇāḥ vayam

original: iha nityakriyāḥ kuryuḥ snigdhā ye vaiṣṇavāstu te / brahmākṣaraṃ na śṛṇvanvai tayā bhagavateritam //
analyzed: iha nityakriyāḥ kuryuḥ snigdhāḥ ye vaiṣṇavāḥ tu te brahmākṣaram na śṛṇvan vai tayā bhagavatā īritam

original: praṇāmapūrvakaṃ bhaktyā yo vadedvaiṣṇavo hi saḥ / tadbhaktajanavātsalyaṃ pūjanaṃ cānumodanam //
analyzed: praṇāma pūrvakam bhaktyā yaḥ vadet vaiṣṇavaḥ hi saḥ tad bhakta jana vātsalyam pūjanam ca anumodanam

original: tatkathāśravaṇe prītiraśrunetrāṅgavikriyāḥ / yena sarvātmanā viṣṇau bhaktyā bhāvo niveśitaḥ //
analyzed: tad kathā śravaṇe prītiḥ aśru netra aṅga vikriyāḥ yena sarva ātmanā viṣṇau bhaktyā bhāvaḥ niveśitaḥ

original: viprebhyaśca kṛtātmatvānmahābhāgavato hi saḥ / viśvopakaraṇaṃ nityaṃ tadarthaṃ saṅgavarjanam / svayamabhyarcanañcaiva yo viṣṇuñcopajīvati //
analyzed: viprebhyaḥ ca kṛtātma tvāt mahā bhāgavataḥ hi saḥ  viśva upakaraṇam nityam tad artham saṅga varjanam svayam abhyarcanam ca eva yaḥ viṣṇum ca upajīvati

original: bhaktiraṣṭavidhā hyeṣā yasminmleccho 'pi vartate / sa viprendro muniḥ śrīmānsa yāti paramāṃ gatim //
analyzed: bhaktiḥ aṣṭavidhā hi eṣā vartate sa vipra indraḥ muniḥ śrīmān sa yāti paramām gatim

original: tasmai deyaṃ tato grāhyaṃ sa ca pūjyo yathā hariḥ / smṛtaḥ saṃbhāṣito vāpi pūjito vā dvijottamaḥ / punāti bhagavadbhaktaścaṇḍālo 'pi yadṛcchayā //
analyzed: tasmai deyam tatas grāhyam sa ca pūjyaḥ yathā hariḥ smṛtaḥ saṃbhāṣitaḥ vā api pūjitaḥ vā dvijottamaḥ punāti bhagavat bhaktaḥ caṇḍālaḥ pi yadṛcchayā

original: dayāṃ kuru prapannāya tavāsmīti ca yo vadet / abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dadyādetad vrataṃ hareḥ //
analyzed: dayām kuru prapannāya tava asmi iti ca yaḥ vadet abhayam sarva bhūtebhyaḥ dadyāt etat vratam hareḥ

original: mantrajāpisahasrebhyaḥ sarvavedāntapāragaḥ / sarvavedāntavitkoṭyāṃ viṣṇubhakto viśiṣyate //
analyzed: mantra jāpi sahasrebhyaḥ sarva vedānta pāragaḥ sarva vedānta vid koṭyām viṣṇu bhaktaḥ viśiṣyate

original: ekāntinaḥ svavapuṣā gacchanti paramaṃ padam / ekāntena samo viṣṇustasmādeṣāṃ parāyaṇaḥ //
analyzed: ekāntinaḥ sva vapuṣā gacchanti paramam padam  ekāntena samaḥ viṣṇuḥ tasmāt eṣām parāyaṇaḥ

original: yasmādekāntinaḥ proktāstadbhāgavatacetasaḥ / priyāṇāmapi sarveṣāṃ devadevasya supriyaḥ //
analyzed: yasmāt ekāntinaḥ proktāḥ tad bhāgavata cetasaḥ  priyāṇām api sarveṣām devadevasya su priyaḥ

original: āpatsvapi sadā bhasya bhaktiravyabhicāriṇā / yā prītiradhikā viṣṇorviṣayeṣvanapāyinī //
analyzed: āpatsu api sadā bhasya bhaktiḥ avyabhicāriṇā yā prītiḥ adhikā viṣṇoḥ viṣayeṣu anapāyinī

original: viṣṇuṃ saṃsmarataḥ sā me hṛdayānnopasarpati / dṛḍhabhakto 'pi vedādisarvaśāstrārthapāragaḥ //
analyzed: viṣṇum saṃsmarataḥ sā me hṛdayāt na upasarpati veda ādi sarva śāstra artha pāragaḥ

original: yo na sarveśvare bhaktastaṃ vidyātpuruṣādhamam / nādhītavedaśāstro 'pi na kṛto 'dhvarasambhavaḥ / yo bhaktiṃ vahate viṣṇau tena sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: yaḥ na sarveśvare bhaktaḥ tam vidyāt puruṣa adhamam  na adhīta veda śāstraḥ na kṛtaḥ dhvara sambhavaḥ yaḥ bhaktim vahate viṣṇau tena sarvam kṛtam bhavet

original: yajvānaḥ kratumukhyānāṃ vedānāṃ pāragā api / na tāṃ yānti gatiṃ bhaktā yāṃ yānti munisattamāḥ //
analyzed: yajvānaḥ kratu mukhyānām vedānām pāragāḥ api na tām yānti gatim bhaktāḥ yām yānti muni sattamāḥ

original: yaḥ kaścidvaiṣṇavo loke mithyācāro 'pyanāśramī / punāti sakalāṃllokānsahasrāṃśurivoditaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid vaiṣṇavaḥ loke mithyā ācāraḥ api anāśramī punāti sakalān lokān sahasrāṃśuḥ iva uditaḥ

original: ye nṛśaṃsā durātmānaḥ pāpācararatāstathā / te 'pi yānti paraṃ sthānaṃ nārāyaṇaparāyaṇāḥ //
analyzed: ye nṛśaṃsāḥ durātmānaḥ pāpa ācara ratāḥ tathā te yānti param sthānam nārāyaṇa parāyaṇāḥ

original: dṛḍhā janārdane bhaktiryadaivāvyabhicāriṇī / tadā kiyatsvargasukhaṃ saiva nirvāṇahetukā //
analyzed: dṛḍhā janārdane bhaktiḥ yadā eva avyabhicāriṇī tadā kiyat svarga sukham sā eva nirvāṇa hetukā

original: bhrāmyatāṃ tatra saṃsāre narāṇāṃ kurmadurgame / hastāvalambane hyekaṃ yena tuṣyejjanārdanaḥ / na śṛṇoti guṇāndivyāndevadevasya cakriṇaḥ / sa maro badhiro jñeyaḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: bhrāmyatām tatra saṃsāre narāṇām kurma durgame  hasta avalambane hi ekam yena tuṣyet janārdanaḥ  na śṛṇoti guṇān divyān devadevasya cakriṇaḥ  sa maraḥ badhiraḥ jñeyaḥ sarva dharma bahiṣkṛtaḥ

original: nāmni saṃkīrtite viṣṇoryasya puṃso na jāyate / śarīraṃ pulakodbhāsi tadbhavetkuṇapopamam //
analyzed: nāmni saṃkīrtite viṣṇoḥ yasya puṃsaḥ na jāyate śarīram pulaka udbhāsi tat bhavet kuṇapa upamam

original: yasminbhaktirdvijaśreṣṭha muktirapyacirādbhavet / niviṣṭamanasāṃ puṃsāṃ sarvathā vṛjinakṣayaḥ //
analyzed: yasmin bhaktiḥ dvijaśreṣṭha muktiḥ api acirāt bhavet niviṣṭa manasām puṃsām sarvathā vṛjina kṣayaḥ

original: svapuruṣamabhivīkṣya pāśahastaṃ vadati yamaḥ kila tasya karṇamūle / parihara madhusūdanaprāpannanprabhurahamanyanṛṇāṃ na vaiṣṇavānām //
analyzed: sva puruṣam abhivīkṣya pāśa hastam vadati yamaḥ kila tasya karṇa mūle parihara madhusūdana prāpan an prabhuḥ aham anya nṛṇām na vaiṣṇavānām

original: api cetsudurācāro bhajate māmananyabhāk / sādhureva sa mantavyaḥ samyagavyavasito hi saḥ //
analyzed: api ced su durācāraḥ bhajate mām an anya bhāj sādhuḥ eva sa mantavyaḥ samyak avyavasitaḥ hi saḥ

original: kṣipraṃ bhavati dharmātmā śaśvacchāntiṃ sa gacchati / viprendra pratijānīhi viṣṇubhakto na naśyati //
analyzed: kṣipram bhavati dharma ātmā śaśvat śāntim sa gacchati vipra indra pratijānīhi viṣṇu bhaktaḥ na naśyati

original: dharmārthakāmaḥ kiṃ tasya muktistasya kare sthitā / samastajagatāṃ mūlaṃ yasya bhaktiḥ sthirā harau //
analyzed: dharma artha kāmaḥ kim tasya muktiḥ tasya kare sthitā samasta jagatām mūlam yasya bhaktiḥ sthirā harau

original: daivī hyeṣā guṇamayī harermāyā duratyayā / tameva ye prapadyante māyāmetāṃ taranti te //
analyzed: daivī hi eṣā guṇa mayī hareḥ māyā duratyayā tam eva ye prapadyante māyām etām taranti te

original: kiṃ yajñārādhane puṃsā śiṣyate harimedhasām / bhaktyaivārādhyate viṣṇurnānyattatropakārakam //
analyzed: kim yajña ārādhane puṃsā śiṣyate harimedhasām  bhaktyā eva ārādhyate viṣṇuḥ na anyat tatra upakārakam

original: na dānairvividhairdattaiḥ puṣpairnaivānulepanaiḥ / toṣameti mahātmāsau yathā bhaktyā janārdanaḥ //
analyzed: na dānaiḥ vividhaiḥ dattaiḥ puṣpaiḥ na eva anulepanaiḥ  toṣam eti mahātmā asau yathā bhaktyā janārdanaḥ

original: saṃsāraviṣavṛkṣasya dve phale hyamṛtopame / kadācitkeśave bhaktistadbhaktairvā samāgamaḥ //
analyzed: saṃsāra viṣa vṛkṣasya dve phale hi amṛta upame  kadācid keśave bhaktiḥ tad bhaktaiḥ vā samāgamaḥ

original: patreṣu puṣpeṣu phaleṣu toyeṣvakaṣṭalabhyeṣu sadaiva satsu / bhaktyaikalabhye puruṣe purāṇe muktyaikalābhe kriyate prayatnaḥ //
analyzed: patreṣu puṣpeṣu phaleṣu toyeṣu akaṣṭa labhyeṣu sadā eva satsu bhaktyā eka labhye puruṣe purāṇe muktyā eka lābhe kriyate prayatnaḥ

original: āsphoṭayanti pitaraḥ pranṛtyanti pitāmāhaḥ / vaiṣṇavosmatkule jātaḥ sa naḥ santārayiṣyati //
analyzed: āsphoṭayanti pitaraḥ pranṛtyanti pitāmā āha vaiṣṇavaḥ usmad kule jātaḥ sa naḥ santārayiṣyati

original: ajñāninaḥ sukhare samadhikṣipanto yatpāpino 'pi śiśupālasuyodhanādyāḥ / muktiṃ gatāḥ smaraṇamātravidhūtapāpāḥ kaḥ saṃśayaḥ paramabhaktimatāṃ janānām //
analyzed: ajñāninaḥ sukhare samadhikṣipantaḥ yat pāpinaḥ śiśupāla suyodhana ādyāḥ muktim gatāḥ smaraṇa mātra vidhūta pāpāḥ kaḥ saṃśayaḥ parama bhaktimatām janānām

original: śaramaṃ taṃ prapannā ye dhyānayogavivarjitāḥ / te 'pi mṛtyumatikramya yānti tadvaiṣṇavaṃ padam //
analyzed: śaramam tam prapannāḥ ye dhyāna yoga vivarjitāḥ te mṛtyum atikramya yānti tat vaiṣṇavam padam

original: bhavodbhavakleśaśatairhatastathā paribhramannindriyarandhrakairhayaiḥ / niyamyatāṃ mādhava / me manohayastvadaṅghriśaṅkau dṛḍhabhaktibandhane //
analyzed: bhava udbhava kleśa śataiḥ hataḥ tathā paribhraman indriya randhrakaiḥ hayaiḥ niyamyatām mādhava me manohayaḥ tvad aṅghri śaṅkau dṛḍha bhakti bandhane

original: viṣṇureva paraṃ brahma tribhedamiha paṭhyate / vedasiddhāntamārgeṣu tanna jānanti mohitāḥ //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ eva param brahma tri bhedam iha paṭhyate veda siddhānta mārgeṣu tat na jānanti mohitāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhagavadbhaktivivaraṇaṃ nāma saptaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe bhagavadbhaktivivaraṇam nāma saptaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 228
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūtauvāca / muktihetumanādyantamajamavyayamakṣayam / yo namet sarvalokasya namasyo jāyate naraḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca mukti hetum anādi antam ajam avyayam akṣayam yaḥ namet sarva lokasya namasyaḥ jāyate naraḥ

original: viṣṇumānandamadvaitaṃ vijñānaṃ sarvagaṃ prabhum / praṇamāmi sadā bhaktyā cetasā hṛdayālayam //
analyzed: viṣṇum ānandam advaitam vijñānam sarvagam prabhum praṇamāmi sadā bhaktyā cetasā hṛdaya ālayam

original: yo 'ntastiṣṭhannaśeṣasya paśyatīśaḥ śubhāśubham / taṃ sarvasākṣiṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ namasye parameśvaram //
analyzed: yaḥ ntar tiṣṭhan aśeṣasya paśyati īśaḥ śubha aśubham  tam sarvasākṣiṇam viṣṇum namasye parameśvaram

original: śaktenāpi namaskāraḥ prayuktaścakrapāṇaye / saṃsāratṛṇavargāṇāmudvejanakaro hi saḥ //
analyzed: śaktena api namaskāraḥ prayuktaḥ cakrapāṇaye saṃsāra tṛṇa vargāṇām udvejana karaḥ hi saḥ

original: kṛṣṇe sphurajjaladharodaracārukṛṣṇe lokādhikārapuruṣe paramaprameye / eko hi bhāvaguṇamātradṛḍhapraṇāmaḥ sadyaḥ śvapākamapi sādhayituṃ saśaktaḥ //
analyzed: kṛṣṇe sphurat jaladhara udara cāru kṛṣṇe loka adhikāra puruṣe parama prameye ekaḥ hi bhāva guṇa mātra dṛḍha praṇāmaḥ sadyas śvapākam api sādhayitum sa śaktaḥ

original: praṇamya daṇḍabadbhūmau namaskāreṇa yor'cayet / sa yāṃ gatimavāpnoti na tāṃ kratuśatairapi //
analyzed: praṇamya daṇḍa bat bhūmau namaskāreṇa yā urcayet sa yām gatim avāpnoti na tām kratu śataiḥ api

original: durgasaṃsārakāntārākūpāre 'pi pradhāvatām / ekaḥ kṛṣṇe namaskāro muktyā tāṃstārayiṣyati //
analyzed: durga saṃsāra kāntāra ākūpāre pi pradhāvatām ekaḥ kṛṣṇe namaskāraḥ muktyā tān tārayiṣyati

original: āsīno vā śayāno vātiṣṭhan vā yatra tatra vā / namo nārāyaṇāyeti mantraikaśaraṇo bhavet //
analyzed: āsīnaḥ vā śayānaḥ vā a tiṣṭhan vā yatra tatra vā namaḥ nārāyaṇāya iti mantra eka śaraṇaḥ bhavet

original: nārāyaṇeti śabdo 'sti vāgasti vaśavartinī / tathāpi narake mūḍhāḥ patantīti kimadbhutam //
analyzed: nārāyaṇa iti śabdaḥ sti vāc asti vaśa vartinī tathā api narake mūḍhāḥ patanti iti kim adbhutam

original: caturmukho vā yadi koṭivaktro bhavennaraḥ kopi viśuddhacetāḥ / sa vai guṇānāmayutaikadeśaṃ vadenna vā devavarasya viṣṇoḥ //
analyzed: caturmukhaḥ vā yadi koṭivaktraḥ bhavet naraḥ kaḥ api viśuddha cetāḥ sa vai guṇānām ayuta eka deśam vadet na vā deva varasya viṣṇoḥ

original: vyāsādyā munayaḥ sarve stuvanto madhusūdanam / matikṣayānnivartante na govindaguṇakṣayāt //
analyzed: vyāsa ādyāḥ munayaḥ sarve stuvantaḥ madhusūdanam mati kṣayāt nivartante na govinda guṇa kṣayāt

original: avaśenāpi yannāmni kīrtite sarvapātakaiḥ / pumān vimucyate sadyaḥ siṃhatrasto mṛgā yathā / baddhaḥ parikarastena mokṣāya gamanaṃ prati //
analyzed: avaśena api yad nāmni kīrtite sarva pātakaiḥ pumān vimucyate sadyas siṃha trastaḥ mṛgāḥ yathā  baddhaḥ parikaraḥ tena mokṣāya gamanam prati

original: svapne 'pi nāma spṛśato 'pi puṃsaḥ kṣayaṃ karotyakṣayapāparāśim / pratyakṣataḥ kiṃ punaratra puṃsā prakīrtite nāmni janārdanasya //
analyzed: svapne pi nāma puṃsaḥ kṣayam karoti akṣaya pāpa rāśim pratyakṣataḥ kim punar atra puṃsā prakīrtite nāmni janārdanasya

original: namaḥ kṛṣṇācyutānantavāsudevetyudīritam / yairbhāvabhāvitairviprana te yamapuraṃ yayuḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ kṛṣṇa acyuta ananta vāsudeva iti udīritam  yaiḥ bhāva bhāvitaiḥ vipra na te yama puram yayuḥ

original: kṣayo bhavedyathā vahnestamaso bhāskarodaye / tathaiva kaluṣaughasya nāmasaṃkīrtanāddhareḥ //
analyzed: kṣayaḥ bhavet yathā vahneḥ tamasaḥ bhāskara udaye tathā eva kaluṣa oghasya nāma saṃkīrtanāt hareḥ

original: kva nākapṛṣṭhagamanaṃ punarāyāti na kṣayam / gacchatāṃ dūramadhvānaṃ kṛṣṇamūrchitacetasām //
analyzed: kva nāka pṛṣṭha gamanam punar āyāti na kṣayam  gacchatām dūram adhvānam kṛṣṇa mūrchita cetasām

original: pātheyaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣanāmasaṃkīrtanaṃ hareḥ / saṃsārasarpasaṃdaṣṭaviṣaceṣṭaikabheṣajam / kṛṣṇeti vaiṣṇavaṃ kṣāntaṃ japtvā mukto bhavennaraḥ //
analyzed: pātheyam puṇḍarīkākṣa nāma saṃkīrtanam hareḥ saṃsāra sarpa saṃdaṣṭa viṣa ceṣṭā eka bheṣajam kṛṣṇa iti vaiṣṇavam kṣāntam japtvā muktaḥ bhavet naraḥ

original: dhyāyan kṛte japenmantraistretāyāṃ dvāparer'cayan / yadāpnoti tadāpnoti tadāpnoti kalau saṃsmṛtyakeśavam //
analyzed: dhyāyan kṛte japet mantraiḥ tretāyām dvāpara īrcayan yat āpnoti tat āpnoti tat āpnoti kalau saṃsmṛtya keśavam

original: jihvāgre vartate yasya harirityakṣaradvayam / saṃsārasāgaraṃ tīrtvā sa gacchedvaiṣṇavaṃ padam //
analyzed: jihvā agre vartate yasya hariḥ iti akṣara dvayam saṃsāra sāgaram tīrtvā sa gacchet vaiṣṇavam padam

original: vijñātaduṣkṛtisahasrasamāvṛto 'piśreyaḥ parantu pariśuddhima bhīpsamānaḥ / spapnāntare na hi punaśca bhavaṃ sa paśyennārāyaṇastutikathāparamo manuṣyaḥ //
analyzed: vijñāta duṣkṛti sahasra samāvṛtaḥ spapna antare na hi punar ca bhavam sa paśyet nārāyaṇa stuti kathā paramaḥ manuṣyaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇubhaktivivaraṇaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśatyuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣṇubhaktivivaraṇam nāma aṣṭāviṃśatyuttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 229
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / aśeṣalokanāthasya sāramārādhanaṃ hareḥ / dadyātu puruṣasūkteṇa yaḥ puṣpāṇyapa eva ca //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca aśeṣa loka nāthasya sāram ārādhanam hareḥ  dadyātu puruṣasūkteṇa yaḥ puṣpāṇi apaḥ eva ca

original: arcitaṃ syājjagadidaṃ tena sarvaṃ carācaram / yo na pūjayate viṣṇuṃ taṃ vidyādbrahmaghātakam //
analyzed: arcitam syāt jagat idam tena sarvam carācaram yaḥ na pūjayate viṣṇum tam vidyāt brahma ghātakam

original: yataḥ pravṛttirbhūtānāṃ yena sarvamidaṃ tatam / taṃ yo na dhyāyate viṣṇuṃ sa viṣṭhāyāṃ krimirbhavet //
analyzed: yatas pravṛttiḥ bhūtānām yena sarvam idam tatam  tam yaḥ na dhyāyate viṣṇum sa viṣṭhāyām krimiḥ bhavet

original: narake pacyamānastu yamena paribhāṣitaḥ / kintvayā nārcito devaḥ keśavaḥ kleśanāśanaḥ //
analyzed: narake pacyamānaḥ tu yamena paribhāṣitaḥ kin tvayā nā arcitaḥ devaḥ keśavaḥ kleśa nāśanaḥ

original: udakenāpyabhāvena dravyāṇāmarcitaḥ prabhuḥ / yo dadāti svakaṃ lokaṃ sa tvayā kiṃ na cārcitaḥ //
analyzed: udakena api abhāvena dravyāṇām arcitaḥ prabhuḥ yaḥ dadāti svakam lokam sa tvayā kim na ca arcitaḥ

original: na tatkaroti sā mātā na pitā nāpi bāndhavaḥ / yatkaroti hṛṣīkeśaḥ santuṣṭaḥ śraddhayārcitaḥ //
analyzed: na tat karoti sā mātā na pitā na api bāndhavaḥ yat karoti hṛṣīkeśaḥ santuṣṭaḥ śraddhayā arcitaḥ

original: varṇāśramācāravatā puruṣeṇa paraḥ pumān / viṣṇurārādhyate panthā nānyastattoṣakārakaḥ //
analyzed: varṇa āśrama ācāravatā puruṣeṇa paraḥ pumān viṣṇuḥ ārādhyate panthāḥ nā anyaḥ tad toṣa kārakaḥ

original: na dānairvividhairdattairna puṣpairnānulepanaiḥ / toṣameti mahātmāsau yathā bhaktyā janārdanaḥ //
analyzed: na dānaiḥ vividhaiḥ dattaiḥ na puṣpaiḥ na anulepanaiḥ  toṣam eti mahātmā asau yathā bhaktyā janārdanaḥ

original: sampadaiśvaryamāhātmyaiḥ santatyā na ca karmaṇā / vimuktaiścaikatā labhyā mūlamārādhanaṃ hareḥ //
analyzed: sampad aiśvarya māhātmyaiḥ santatyā na ca karmaṇā vimuktaiḥ ca eka tā labhyā mūlam ārādhanam hareḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupūjānirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonatriśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣṇupūjānirūpaṇam nāma ekonatriśaduttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 230
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / ālokya sarvaśāstrāṇi vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ / idamekaṃ suniṣpannaṃ dhyeyo nārāyaṇaḥ sadā //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca  ālokya sarva śāstrāṇi vicārya ca punar punar idam ekam su niṣpannam dhyeyaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ sadā

original: kiṃ tasya dānaiḥ kintīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kimadhvaraiḥ / yo nityaṃ dhyāyate devaṃ nārāyaṇamananyadhīḥ //
analyzed: kim tasya dānaiḥ kim tīrthaiḥ kim tapobhiḥ kim adhvaraiḥ  yaḥ nityam dhyāyate devam nārāyaṇam an anya dhīḥ

original: ṣaṣṭistīrthasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭistīrthaśatāni ca / nārāyaṇapraṇāmasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭiḥ tīrtha sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭiḥ tīrtha śatāni ca nārāyaṇa praṇāmasya kalām na arhanti ṣoḍaśīm

original: prayaścittānyaśeṣāṇi tapaḥ karmāṇi yāni vai / viddhi teṣāmaśeṣāṇāṃ kṛṣṇānusmaraṇaṃ param //
analyzed: prayaścittāni aśeṣāṇi tapaḥ karmāṇi yāni vai viddhi teṣām aśeṣāṇām kṛṣṇa anusmaraṇam param

original: kṛtapāpe 'nuraktiśca yasya puṃsaḥ prajāyate / prāyaścittantu tasyaikaṃ hareḥ saṃsmaraṇaṃ param //
analyzed: kṛta pāpe nuraktiḥ ca yasya puṃsaḥ prajāyate prāyaścittam tu tasya ekam hareḥ saṃsmaraṇam param

original: muhūrtamapi yo dhyāyennārāyaṇamatandritaḥ / so 'pi svargatimāpnoti kiṃ punastatparāyaṇaḥ //
analyzed: muhūrtam api yaḥ dhyāyet nārāyaṇam atandritaḥ saḥ svar gatim āpnoti kim punar tad parāyaṇaḥ

original: jāgratsvapnasuṣupteṣu yogasthasya ca yoginaḥ / yā kācinmanaso vṛttiḥ sā bhavatyacyutāśrayāt //
analyzed: jāgrat svapna suṣupteṣu yoga sthasya ca yoginaḥ yā kācid manasaḥ vṛttiḥ sā bhavati acyuta āśrayāt

original: uttiṣṭhannipatanviṣṇuṃ pralapanviviśaṃstathā / bhuñjañjāgracca govindaṃ mādhavaṃ yaśca saṃsmaret //
analyzed: uttiṣṭhan nipatan viṣṇum pralapan viviśan tathā bhuñjan jāgrat ca govindam mādhavam yaḥ ca saṃsmaret

original: svesve karmaṇyabhirataḥ kuryāccittaṃ janārdane / eṣā śāstrānusāroktiḥ kimanyairbahubhāṣitaiḥ //
analyzed: sve sve karmaṇi abhirataḥ kuryāt cittam janārdane  eṣā śāstra anusāra uktiḥ kim anyaiḥ bahu bhāṣitaiḥ

original: dhyānameva paro dharmo dhyānameva paraṃ tapaḥ / dhyānameva paraṃ śaucaṃ tasmāddhyānaparo bhavet //
analyzed: dhyānam eva paraḥ dharmaḥ dhyānam eva param tapaḥ  dhyānam eva param śaucam tasmāt dhyāna paraḥ bhavet

original: nāsti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ dhtheyaṃ tapo nānaśanātparam / tasmātpradhānamatroktaṃ vāsudevasya cintanam //
analyzed: na asti viṣṇoḥ param tapaḥ na anaśanāt param  tasmāt pradhānam atra uktam vāsudevasya cintanam

original: yaddurlabhaṃ paraṃ prāpyaṃ manaso yanna gocaram / tadapyaprārthitaṃ dhyāto dadāti madhusūdanaḥ //
analyzed: yat durlabham param prāpyam manasaḥ yat na gocaram  tat api a prārthitam dhyātaḥ dadāti madhusūdanaḥ

original: pramādātkurvatāṃ karma pracyavetādhvareṣu yat / smaraṇādeva tadviṣṇoḥ saṃpūrṇaṃ syāditi śrutiḥ //
analyzed: pramādāt kurvatām karma pracyaveta adhvareṣu yat  smaraṇāt eva tat viṣṇoḥ saṃpūrṇam syāt iti śrutiḥ

original: dhyānena sadṛśo nāsti śodhanaṃ pāpakarmaṇām / āgāmidehahetūnāṃ dāhako yogapāvakaḥ //
analyzed: dhyānena sadṛśaḥ nā asti śodhanam pāpa karmaṇām āgāmi deha hetūnām dāhakaḥ yoga pāvakaḥ

original: viniṣpannasamādhistu muktimatraiva janmani / prāpnoti yogī yogāgnidagdhakarmā ca yo 'cirāt //
analyzed: viniṣpanna samādhiḥ tu muktim atrā eva janmani prāpnoti yogī yoga agni dagdha karmā ca cirāt

original: yathāgnirudyataśikhaḥ kakṣaṃ dahati vānilaḥ / tathā cittasthite viṣṇau yoginā sarvakilbiṣam //
analyzed: yathā agniḥ udyata śikhaḥ kakṣam dahati vā anilaḥ tathā citta sthite viṣṇau yoginā sarva kilbiṣam

original: yathāgniyogātkanakamamalaṃ saṃprajāyate / saṃpluṣṭo vāsudevena manuṣyāṇāṃ sadā malaḥ //
analyzed: yathā agni yogāt kanakam amalam saṃprajāyate saṃpluṣṭaḥ vāsudevena manuṣyāṇām sadā malaḥ

original: gaṅgāsnānasahasreṣu puṣkarasnānakoṭiṣu / yatpāpaṃ nilayayāti smṛte naśyati taddharau //
analyzed: gaṅgā snāna sahasreṣu puṣkara snāna koṭiṣu yat pāpam nilayayā ati smṛte naśyati tat harau

original: prāṇāyāmasahasnaistu yatpāpaṃ naśyati dhruvam / kṣaṇamātreṇa tatpāpaṃ harerdhyānātpraṇaśyati //
analyzed: prāṇāyāma sahasnaiḥ tu yat pāpam naśyati dhruvam kṣaṇa mātreṇa tat pāpam hareḥ dhyānāt praṇaśyati

original: kaliprabhāvādduṣṭoktiḥ pāṣaṇḍānāṃ tathoktayaḥ / na krāmenmānasaṃ tasya yasya cetasi keśavaḥ //
analyzed: kali prabhāvāt duṣṭa uktiḥ pāṣaṇḍānām tathā uktayaḥ na krāmet mānasam tasya yasya cetasi keśavaḥ

original: sā tithistadahorātraṃ sa yogaḥ sa ca candramāḥ / lagnaṃ tadeva vikhyātaṃ yatra saṃsmaryate hariḥ //
analyzed: sā tithiḥ tat ahorātram sa yogaḥ sa ca candramāḥ lagnam tat eva vikhyātam yatra saṃsmaryate hariḥ

original: sā hānistanmahacchidraṃ sā cārthajaḍamūkatā / canmuhūrtaṃ kṣaṇo vāpi vāsudevo na cintyate //
analyzed: sā hāniḥ tat mahat chidram sā ca artha jaḍa mūka tā cat muhūrtam kṣaṇaḥ vā api vāsudevaḥ na cintyate

original: kalau kṛta yugaṃ tasya kalistasya kṛte yuge / hṛdi no yasya govindo yasya cetasi nācyutaḥ //
analyzed: kalau kṛta yugam tasya kaliḥ tasya kṛte yuge  hṛdi naḥ yasya govindaḥ yasya cetasi na acyutaḥ

original: yasyāgratastathā pṛṣṭhe gacchatastiṣṭhato 'pi vā / govinde niyataṃ cetaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ sadaiva saḥ //
analyzed: yasya agratas tathā pṛṣṭhe gacchataḥ tiṣṭhataḥ vā govinde niyatam cetaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ sadā eva saḥ

original: vāsudeve mano yasya japahomārcanādiṣu / tasyāntarāyo maitreya vevendratvādikaṃ phalam //
analyzed: vāsudeve manaḥ yasya japa homa arcana ādiṣu tasya antarāyaḥ maitreya vā iva indra tva ādikam phalam

original: asaṃtyajya ca gārhasthayaṃ sa taptvā ca mahattapaḥ / chinatti pauruṣīṃ māyāṃ keśavārpitamānasaḥ //
analyzed: a saṃtyajya ca sa taptvā ca mahat tapaḥ chinatti pauruṣīm māyām keśava arpita mānasaḥ

original: kṣamāṃ kurvanti kruddheṣu dayāṃ mūrkheṣu mānavāḥ / mudañca dharmaśīleṣu govinde hṛdayasthite //
analyzed: kṣamām kurvanti kruddheṣu dayām mūrkheṣu mānavāḥ mudan ca dharma śīleṣu govinde hṛdaya sthite

original: dhyāyennārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ snānadānādikarmasu / prāyaściteteṣu sarveṣu duṣkṛteṣu viśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: dhyāyet nārāyaṇam devam snāna dāna ādi karmasu prāyaścitā iteṣu sarveṣu duṣkṛteṣu viśeṣataḥ

original: lābhasteṣāṃ jayasteṣāṃ kutasteṣāṃ parābhavaḥ / yeṣāmindīvaraśyāmo hṛdayastho janārdanaḥ //
analyzed: lābhaḥ teṣām jayaḥ teṣām kutas teṣām parābhavaḥ  yeṣām indīvara śyāmaḥ hṛdaya sthaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: kīṭapakṣigaṇānāñca harau saṃnyastacetasām / ūrdhvā hyeva gatiścāsti kiṃ punarjñānināṃ nṛṇām //
analyzed: kīṭa pakṣi gaṇānām ca harau saṃnyasta cetasām ūrdhvā hi eva gatiḥ ca asti kim punar jñāninām nṛṇām

original: vāsudevatarucchāyā nātiśītātitāpadā / narakadvāraśamanī sā kimarthaṃ na sevyate //
analyzed: vāsudeva taru chāyā na ati śītā ati tāpa dā naraka dvāra śamanī sā kimartham na sevyate

original: na ca durvāsasaḥ śāpo rājyañcāpi śacīpateḥ / hantuṃ samarthaṃ hi sakhe hṛtkṛte madhusūdane //
analyzed: na ca durvāsasaḥ śāpaḥ rājyam ca api śacīpateḥ  hantum samartham hi sakhe hṛd kṛte madhusūdane

original: vadatastiṣṭhato 'nyadvā svecchayā karma kurvataḥ / nāpayāti yadā cintā siddhāṃ manyeta dhāraṇām //
analyzed: vadataḥ tiṣṭhataḥ nyat vā sva icchayā karma kurvataḥ na apayāti yadā cintā siddhām manyeta dhāraṇām

original: dhyeyaḥ sadā savitṛmaṇḍalamadhyavarto nārāyaṇaḥ sarasijāsanasanniviṣṭaḥ / keyūravānmakarakuṇḍalavānkirīṭī hārī hiraṇmayavapurdhṛtaśaṅkhacakraḥ //
analyzed: dhyeyaḥ sadā savitṛ maṇḍala madhya vartaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ sarasija āsana sanniviṣṭaḥ keyūravān makara kuṇḍalavān kirīṭī hārī hiraṇmaya vapuḥ dhṛta śaṅkha cakraḥ

original: na hi dhyānena sadṛśaṃ pavitramiha vidyate / śvapacānnāni bhuñjāno pāpī naivātra lipyate //
analyzed: na hi dhyānena sadṛśam pavitram iha vidyate  śvapaca annāni na eva atra lipyate

original: sadā cittaṃ samāsaktaṃ jantorviṣayagocare / yadi nārāyaṇe 'pyevaṃ ko na mucyeta bandhanāt //
analyzed: sadā cittam samāsaktam jantoḥ viṣaya gocare yadi nārāyaṇe pi evam kaḥ na mucyeta bandhanāt

original: sūta uvāca / viṣṇubhaktiryasya citte kaṃ vā jīvo nametsadā / sa tārayati cātmānaṃ tadaiva duritārṇavāt //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca viṣṇu bhaktiḥ yasya citte kam vā jīvaḥ namet sadā sa tārayati ca ātmānam tadā eva durita arṇavāt

original: tañjñānaṃ yatra govindaḥ sā kathā yatra kāśavaḥ / tatkarma yattadarthāya kimanyairbahubhāṣitaiḥ //
analyzed: tat jñānam yatra govindaḥ sā kathā yatra kāśavaḥ tat karma yat tad arthāya kim anyaiḥ bahu bhāṣitaiḥ

original: sā jihvā yā hariṃ stauti taccittaṃ yattadarpitam / tāveva kevalau ślāghyau yau tatpūjākarau karau //
analyzed: sā jihvā yā harim stauti tat cittam yat tad arpitam tau eva kevalau ślāghyau yau tad pūjā karau karau

original: praṇāmamīśasya śiraḥ phalaṃ vidustadarcanaṃ pāṇiphalaṃ divaukasaḥ / manaḥ phalaṃ tadguṇakarmacintanaṃ vacastu govindaguṇastutiḥ phalam //
analyzed: praṇāmam īśasya śiraḥ phalam viduḥ tad arcanam pāṇi phalam divaukasaḥ manaḥ phalam tad guṇa karma cintanam vacaḥ tu govinda guṇa stutiḥ phalam

original: merumandaramātro 'pi rāśiḥ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ / keśavasmaraṇādeva tasya sarvaṃ vinaśyati //
analyzed: meru mandara mātraḥ pi rāśiḥ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ keśava smaraṇāt eva tasya sarvam vinaśyati

original: yatkiñcitkurute karma puruṣaḥ sādhvasādhu vā / sarvaṃ nārāyaṇe nyasya kurvannapi na limpati //
analyzed: yat kiñcid kurute karma puruṣaḥ sādhu asādhu vā sarvam nārāyaṇe nyasya kurvan api na limpati

original: tṛṇādicaturāsyāntaṃ bhūtagrāmaṃ caturvidham / carācaraṃ jagatsarvaṃ prasuptaṃ māyayā tava //
analyzed: tṛṇa ādi catur āsya antam bhūta grāmam caturvidham carācaram jagat sarvam prasuptam māyayā tava

original: yasminnyastamatirna yāti narakaṃ svargo 'pi yaccintane vighno yatra navā viśetkathamapi brāhmo 'piloko 'lpakaḥ / muktiñcetasi saṃsthito jaḍadhiyāṃ puṃsāṃ dadātyavyayaḥ kiñcitraṃ yadayaṃ prayāti vilayaṃ tatrācyute kīrtite //
analyzed: yasmin nyasta matiḥ na yāti narakam yad cintane vighnaḥ yatra viśet katham api muktim cetasi saṃsthitaḥ jaḍa dhiyām puṃsām dadāti avyayaḥ kiñcitram yat ayam prayāti vilayam tatra acyute kīrtite

original: agnikāryaṃ japaḥ snānaṃ viṣṇordhyānañca pūjanam / gantuṃ duḥ khodadheḥ kuryurye ca tatra naranti te //
analyzed: agni kāryam japaḥ snānam viṣṇoḥ dhyānam ca pūjanam gantum duḥ kha udadheḥ kuryuḥ ye ca tatra te

original: rāṣṭrasya śaraṇaṃ rājā pitaro bālakasya ca / dharmaśca sarvamartyānāṃ sarvasya śaraṇaṃ hariḥ //
analyzed: rāṣṭrasya śaraṇam rājā pitaraḥ bālakasya ca  dharmaḥ ca sarva martyānām sarvasya śaraṇam hariḥ

original: ye namanti jagadyoniṃ vāsudevaṃ sanātanam / na yebhyo vidyate tīrthamadhikaṃ munisattam //
analyzed: ye namanti jagadyonim vāsudevam sanātanam  na yebhyaḥ vidyate tīrtham adhikam muni sattam

original: anargharatnapūjāñca kuryātsvādhyāyameva ca / tamevoddiśya govindaṃ dhyāyannityamatandritaḥ //
analyzed: anargha ratna pūjām ca kuryāt svādhyāyam eva ca tam eva uddiśya govindam dhyāyan nityam atandritaḥ

original: śūdraṃ vā bhagavadbhaktaṃ niṣādaṃ śvapacaṃ tathā / dvijajāti samaṃmanyo na yāti narakaṃ naraḥ //
analyzed: śūdram vā bhagavat bhaktam niṣādam śvapacam tathā dvija jāti samaṃmanyaḥ na yāti narakam naraḥ

original: ādareṇa sadā stauti dhanavantaṃ dhanecchayā / tathā viśvasya kartāraṃ ko na mucyeta bandhanāt //
analyzed: ādareṇa sadā stauti dhanavantam dhana icchayā tathā viśvasya kartāram kaḥ na mucyeta bandhanāt

original: yathā prāptavano vahnirdahatyārdramapīndhanam / tathāvidhaḥ sthito viṣṇuryogināṃ sarvakilviṣam //
analyzed: yathā prāpta vanaḥ vahniḥ dahati ārdram api indhanam  tathāvidhaḥ sthitaḥ viṣṇuḥ yoginām sarva kilviṣam

original: ādīptaṃ parvataṃ yadvannāśrayanti mṛgādayaḥ / tadvatpāpani sarvāṇi yogābhyāsarataṃ naram //
analyzed: ādīptam parvatam yadvat na āśrayanti mṛga ādayaḥ sarvāṇi yoga abhyāsa ratam naram

original: yasya yāvāṃśca viśvāsastasya siddhistu tāvatī / etavāneva kṛṣṇasya prabhāvaḥ parimīyate //
analyzed: yasya yāvān ca viśvāsaḥ tasya siddhiḥ tu tāvatī etavān eva kṛṣṇasya prabhāvaḥ parimīyate

original: vidveṣādapi govindaṃ damaghoṣātmajaḥ smaran / śiśupālo gatastattvaṃ kiṃ punastatparāyaṇaḥ //
analyzed: vidveṣāt api govindam damaghoṣa ātmajaḥ smaran śiśupālaḥ gataḥ tattvam kim punar tad parāyaṇaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇumahātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma triṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe viṣṇumahātmyavarṇanam nāma triṃśaduttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 231
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / nārasiṃhastutiṃ vakṣye śivoktaṃ śaunakādhunā / pūrvaṃ mātṛgaṇāḥ sarve śaṅkaraṃ vākyamabruvan //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca nārasiṃha stutim vakṣye śiva uktam śaunaka adhunā pūrvam mātṛ gaṇāḥ sarve śaṅkaram vākyam abruvan

original: bhagavan bhakṣayiṣyāmaḥ sadevāsuramānuṣam / tvatprasādājjagatsarvaṃ tadanujñātumarhasi //
analyzed: bhagavan bhakṣayiṣyāmaḥ sa deva asura mānuṣam tvad prasādāt jagat sarvam tat anujñātum arhasi

original: śaṅkarauvāca / bhavatībhiḥ prajāḥ sarvā rakṣaṇīyā na saṃśayaḥ / tasmāḍvorataraprāyaṃ manaḥ śīghraṃ nivartyatām //
analyzed: śaṅkaraḥ uvāca bhavatībhiḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ rakṣaṇīyāḥ na saṃśayaḥ manaḥ śīghram nivartyatām

original: ityevaṃ śaṅkareṇoktamanādṛtya tu tadvacaḥ / bhakṣayāmāsuravyagrāstrailokyaṃ sacarācaram //
analyzed: iti evam śaṅkareṇa uktam an ādṛtya tu tat vacaḥ bhakṣayāmāsuḥ avyagrāḥ trailokyam sa carācaram

original: trailokye bhakṣyamāṇe tu tadā mātṛgaṇena vai / nṛsiṃharūpiṇaṃ devaṃ pradadhyau bhagavāñchivaḥ //
analyzed: trailokye bhakṣyamāṇe tu tadā mātṛ gaṇena vai nṛsiṃha rūpiṇam devam pradadhyau bhagavān śivaḥ

original: anādinidhanaṃ devaṃ sarvabhūtabhavodbhavam / vidyujjihvaṃ mahādaṃṣṭraṃ sphuratkesaramālinam //
analyzed: an ādi nidhanam devam sarva bhūta bhava udbhavam vidyut jihvam mahā daṃṣṭram sphurat kesara mālinam

original: ratnāṅgadaṃ samukuṭaṃ hemakesarabhūṣitam / khoṇisūtreṇa mahatā kāñcanena virājitam //
analyzed: ratna aṅgadam sa mukuṭam hema kesara bhūṣitam khoṇi sūtreṇa mahatā kāñcanena virājitam

original: nīlotpaladalaśyāmaṃ ratnanūpurabhūṣitam / tejasākrāntasakalabrahmāṇḍodaramaṇḍapam //
analyzed: nīlotpala dala śyāmam ratna nūpura bhūṣitam tejasā ākrānta sakala brahmāṇḍa udara maṇḍapam

original: āvartasadṛśākāraiḥ saṃyuktaṃ deharomabhiḥ / sarvapuṣpairyojitāñca dhārayaṃśca mahāstrajam //
analyzed: āvarta sadṛśa ākāraiḥ saṃyuktam deha romabhiḥ sarva puṣpaiḥ yojitān ca dhārayan ca mahā astra jam

original: sa dhyātamātro bhagavānpradadau tasya darśanam / yādṛśena rūpeṇa dhyāto rudraistu bhaktitaḥ //
analyzed: sa dhyāta mātraḥ bhagavān pradadau tasya darśanam yādṛśena rūpeṇa dhyātaḥ rudraiḥ tu bhaktitaḥ

original: tādṛśenaiva rūpeṇa durnirīkṣyeṇa daivataiḥ / praṇipatya tu deveśaṃ tadā tuṣṭāva śaṅkaraḥ //
analyzed: tādṛśena eva rūpeṇa durnirīkṣyeṇa daivataiḥ praṇipatya tu deveśam tadā tuṣṭāva śaṅkaraḥ

original: śaṅkara uvāca / namaste 'sta jagannātha narasiṃhavapurdhara / daityeśvarendrasaṃhārinakhaśuktivirājita //
analyzed: śaṅkaraḥ uvāca namaḥ te sta jagannātha narasiṃha vapuḥ dhara daitya īśvara indra saṃhāri nakha śukti virājita

original: nakhamaṇḍalasabhinnahemapiṅgalavigraha / namo 'stu padmanābhāya śobhanāya jagadguro / kalpāntāmbhodanirghoṣa sūryakoṭisamaprabha //
analyzed: nakha maṇḍala sabhinna hema piṅgala vigraha namaḥ stu padmanābhāya śobhanāya jagadguro kalpa anta ambhoda nirghoṣa sūrya koṭi sama prabha

original: sahasrayamasaṃtrāsa sahasrendraparākrama / hasastradhanadasphīta sahasracaraṇātmaka //
analyzed: sahasra yama saṃtrāsa sahasra indra parākrama sahasra caraṇa ātmaka

original: sahasracandapratima / sahasrāṃśuharikrama / sahasrarudratejaska sahasrabrahmasaṃstuta //
sahasrarudrasaṃjapta sahasrākṣanirīkṣaṇa / sahasrajanmamathana sahasrabandhanamocana //
analyzed: sahasra rudra saṃjapta sahasrākṣa nirīkṣaṇa sahasra janma mathana sahasra bandhana mocana

original: sahasravāyuvegākṣa sahasrājñakṛpākara / stutvaivaṃ devadeveśaṃ nṛsiṃhavapuṣaṃ harim / vijñāpayāmāsa punarvinayāvanataḥ śivaḥ //
analyzed: sahasra vāyu vega akṣa sahasra ajña kṛpā kara  stutvā evam devadeveśam nṛsiṃha   harim vijñāpayāmāsa punar vinaya avanataḥ śivaḥ

original: andhakasya vināśāya yā sṛṣṭā mātaro mayā / anādṛtya tu madvākyaṃ bhakṣyantvadbhutāḥ prajāḥ //
analyzed: andhakasya vināśāya yāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ mātaraḥ mayā an ādṛtya tu mad vākyam bhakṣyantu adbhutāḥ prajāḥ

original: sṛṣṭvā tāśca na śakto 'haṃ saṃhartumaparājitaḥ / pūrvaṃ kṛtvā kathaṃ tāsāṃ vināśamabhirocaye //
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā tāḥ ca na śaktaḥ ham saṃhartum aparājitaḥ pūrvam kṛtvā katham tāsām vināśam abhirocaye

original: evamuktaḥ sa rudreṇa narasihavapurhariḥ / sahasrahevīrjihvāgrāttadā vāgīśvaro hariḥ //
analyzed: evam uktaḥ sa rudreṇa narasiha vapuḥ hariḥ sahasra hevīḥ jihvā agrāt tadā vāgīśvaraḥ hariḥ

original: tathā suragaṇānsarvānraudrānmātṛgaṇānvibhuḥ / saṃhṛtya jagataḥ śarma kṛtvā cāntardadhe hariḥ //
analyzed: tathā sura gaṇān sarvān raudrān mātṛ gaṇān vibhuḥ saṃhṛtya jagataḥ śarma kṛtvā ca antardadhe hariḥ

original: nārasiṃhamidaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhenniyatendriyaḥ / manorathapradastasya rudrasyeva na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: nārasiṃham idam stotram yaḥ paṭhet niyata indriyaḥ manoratha pradaḥ tasya rudrasya iva na saṃśayaḥ

original: dhyāyennṛsiṃhaṃ taruṇārkanetraṃ sidāmbujātaṃ jvalitāgnivatkram / anādimadhyāntamaja purāṇaṃ parāpareśaṃ jagatāṃ nidhānam //
analyzed: dhyāyet nṛsiṃham taruṇa arka netram sidā ambu jātam jvalita agni vatkram an ādi madhya antam aja purāṇam para apara īśam jagatām nidhānam

original: japedidaṃ santataduḥ khajālaṃ jahāti nīhāramivāṃśumālī / samātṛvargasya karoti mūrtiṃ yadā tadā tiṣṭhati tatsamīpe //
analyzed: japet idam santata dus kha jālam jahāti nīhāram iva aṃśumālī sa mātṛ vargasya karoti mūrtim yadā tadā tiṣṭhati tad samīpe

original: deveśvarasyāpi nṛsiṃhamūrteḥ pūjāṃ vidhātuṃ tripurāntakārī / prasādya taṃ devavaraṃ sa labdhvā avyājjaganmātṛgaṇebhya eva ca //
analyzed: deveśvarasya api nṛsiṃha mūrteḥ pūjām vidhātum tripurāntakārī prasādya tam deva varam sa labdhvā avyāt jaganmātṛ gaṇebhyaḥ eva ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nṛsiṃhastotraṃ nāmaikatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe nṛsiṃhastotram nāma ekatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 232
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / kulāmṛtaṃ pravakṣyāmi stotraṃ yattu haro 'bravīt / pṛṣṭaḥ śrīnāradenaiva nāradāya tathā śṛṇu //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca kula amṛtam pravakṣyāmi stotram yat tu haraḥ bravīt pṛṣṭaḥ śrī nāradena eva nāradāya tathā śṛṇu

original: nārada uvāca / yaḥ saṃkāre sadā dvandvaiḥ kāmakrodhaiḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ / śabdādiviṣayairbaddhaḥ pīḍyamānaḥ sa durmatiḥ //
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca yaḥ saṃkāre sadā dvandvaiḥ kāma krodhaiḥ śubha aśubhaiḥ śabda ādi viṣayaiḥ baddhaḥ pīḍyamānaḥ sa durmatiḥ

original: kṣaṇaṃ vimucyate janturmṛtyusaṃsārasāgarāt / bhagavañchrotumicchāmi tvatto hi tripurāntaka //
analyzed: kṣaṇam vimucyate jantuḥ mṛtyu saṃsāra sāgarāt  bhagavan śrotum icchāmi tvattaḥ hi tripurāntaka

original: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā nāradasya trilocanaḥ / uvāca tamṛṣiṃ śambhuḥ prasannavadano haraḥ //
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā nāradasya trilocanaḥ uvāca tam ṛṣim śambhuḥ prasanna vadanaḥ haraḥ

original: maheśvara uvāca / jñānāmṛtaṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ rahasyamṛṣisattama / vakṣyāmi śṛṇu duḥ khaghnaṃ bhavabandhabhayāmaham //
analyzed: maheśvaraḥ uvāca jñāna amṛtam param guhyam rahasyam ṛṣi sattama vakṣyāmi śṛṇu duḥkha ghnam bhava bandha bhayām aham

original: tṛṇādi caturāsyāntaṃ bhūtagrāmaṃ caturvidham / carācaraṃ jagatsarvaṃ prasuptaṃ yasya māyayā //
analyzed: tṛṇa ādi catur āsya antam bhūta grāmam caturvidham carācaram jagat sarvam prasuptam yasya māyayā

original: tasya viṣṇo prisādena yadi kaścitprabudhyate / sa nistarati saṃsāraṃ devānāmapi dustaram //
analyzed: tasya viṣṇo prisādena yadi kaścid prabudhyate sa nistarati saṃsāram devānām api dustaram

original: bhogaiśvaryamadonmattastatattvajñānaparāṅmukhaḥ / putradārakuṭumbeṣu mattāḥ sīdantijantavaḥ //
analyzed: bhoga aiśvarya mada unmattaḥ ta tattva jñāna parāṅmukhaḥ putra dāra kuṭumbeṣu mattāḥ sīdanti jantavaḥ

original: sarva ekārṇave magnā jīrṇā vanagajā iva / yastvānanaṃ nibadhnāti durmatiḥ kośakāravat //
analyzed: sarve ekārṇave magnāḥ jīrṇāḥ vana gajāḥ iva  yaḥ tu ānanam nibadhnāti durmatiḥ kośakāra vat

original: tasya muktiṃ na paśyāmi janmakoṭiśatairapi / tasmānnārada sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ devamavyayam / ārādhayetsadā samyagadhyāyedviṣṇuṃ mudānvitaḥ //
analyzed: tasya muktim na paśyāmi janma koṭi śataiḥ api  tasmāt nārada sarveṣām devānām devam avyayam  ārādhayet sadā samyak adhyāyet viṣṇum mudā anvitaḥ

original: yastu viśvamanādyantamajamātmani saṃsthitam / sarvajñamacalaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyetsamucyate //
analyzed: yaḥ tu viśvam anādi antam ajam ātmani saṃsthitam sarvajñam acalam viṣṇum sadā dhyāyet samucyate

original: devaṃ garbhocitaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate / aśirīraṃ vidhātāraṃ sarvajñānamanoratim / acalaṃ sarvagaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate //
analyzed: devam garbha ucitam viṣṇum sadā dhyāyan vimucyate  aśirīram vidhātāram sarva jñāna manoratim acalam sarva gam viṣṇum sadā dhyāyan vimucyate

original: nirvikalpaṃ nirābhāsaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ nirāmayam / vāsudevaṃ guruṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate //
analyzed: nirvikalpam nirābhāsam niṣprapañcam nirāmayam vāsudevam gurum viṣṇum sadā dhyāyan vimucyate

original: sarvātmakañca vai yāvadātmacaitanyarūpakam / śubhamekākṣaraṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate //
analyzed: sarva ātmakam ca vai yāvat ātma caitanya rūpakam śubham ekākṣaram viṣṇum sadā dhyāyan vimucyate

original: vākyātītaṃ trikālajñaṃ viśveśaṃ lokasākṣiṇam / sarvasmāduttamaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate //
analyzed: vākya atītam tri kāla jñam viśveśam lokasākṣiṇam sarvasmāt uttamam viṣṇum sadā dhyāyan vimucyate

original: brahmādidevagandharvairmunibhiḥ siddhacāraṇaiḥ / yogibhiḥ sevitaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate //
analyzed: brahma ādi deva gandharvaiḥ munibhiḥ siddha cāraṇaiḥ yogibhiḥ sevitam viṣṇum sadā dhyāyan vimucyate

original: saṃsārabandhanāmuktimicchaṃlloko hyaśeṣataḥ / stutvaivaṃ varadaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate //
analyzed: saṃsāra bandhanā muktim icchan lokaḥ hi aśeṣatas stutvā evam vara dam viṣṇum sadā dhyāyan vimucyate

original: saṃsārabandhanātko 'pi muktimicchansamāhitaḥ / anantamavyayaṃ devaṃ viṣṇaṃ viśvapratiṣṭhitam / viśveśvaramajaṃ viṣṇuṃ saṃdā dhyāyanvimucyate //
analyzed: saṃsāra bandhanāt kaḥ pi muktim icchan samāhitaḥ anantam avyayam devam viṣṇam viśva pratiṣṭhitam  viśveśvaram ajam viṣṇum dhyāyan vimucyate

original: sūta uvāca / nāradena purā pṛṣṭa evaṃ sa vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ / yettena tasmai vyākhyātaṃ tanmayā kathitaṃ tava //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca nāradena purā pṛṣṭaḥ evam sa vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ ye tena tasmai vyākhyātam tat mayā kathitam tava

original: tameva satatandhyāyannirvyayaṃ brahma niṣkalam / avāpsyasi dhruvaṃ tāta / śāśvataṃ padamavyayam //
analyzed: tam eva satatan dhyāyan nirvyayam brahma niṣkalam avāpsyasi dhruvam tāta śāśvatam padam avyayam

original: aśvamedhasahasrāṇi vājapeyaśatāni ca / kṣaṇamekāgracittasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm //
analyzed: aśvamedha sahasrāṇi vājapeya śatāni ca kṣaṇam ekāgra cittasya kalām na arhanti ṣoḍaśīm

original: śrutvā suraṛṣirviṣṇoḥ prādhānyamidamīśvarāt / sa viṣṇuṃ samyagārādhya siddhaḥ padamavāptavān //
analyzed: śrutvā sura ṛṣiḥ viṣṇoḥ prādhānyam idam īśvarāt  sa viṣṇum samyak ārādhya siddhaḥ padam avāptavān

original: yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvā pi nityameva stavottamam / koṭijanmakṛtaṃ pāpamapi tasya praṇaśyati //
analyzed: yaḥ paṭhet śṛṇuyāt vā nityam eva stava uttamam  koṭi janma kṛtam pāpam api tasya praṇaśyati

original: viṣṇoḥ stavamidaṃ divyaṃ mahādevena kīrtitam / prayatnādyaḥ paṭhennitya mamṛtatvaṃ sa gacchati //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ stavam idam divyam mahādevena kīrtitam prayatnāt yaḥ paṭhet nityam mamṛta tvam sa gacchati

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe kulāmṛtastotraṃ nāma dvātriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe kulāmṛtastotram nāma dvātriṃśaduttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 233
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / stotraṃ tatsaṃ pravakṣyāmi mārkaṇḍeyana bhāṣitam / dāmodaraṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca stotram tat sam pravakṣyāmi mārkaṇḍeyana bhāṣitam  dāmodaram smi kim naḥ mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati

original: śaṅkhacakradharaṃ devaṃ vyaktarūpiṇamavyayam / adho 'kṣajaṃ prapannosmi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati //
analyzed: śaṅkha cakra dharam devam vyakta rūpiṇam avyayam adho kṣajam prapannaḥ asmi kim naḥ mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati

original: varāhaṃ vāmanaṃ viṣṇuṃ nārasiṃhaṃ janārdanam / mādhavaṃ ca prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati //
analyzed: varāham vāmanam viṣṇum nārasiṃham janārdanam mādhavam ca smi kim naḥ mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati

original: puruṣaṃ puṣkarakṣetrabījaṃ puṇyaṃ jagatpatim / lokanāthaṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati //
analyzed: puruṣam puṣkara kṣetra bījam puṇyam jagatpatim  lokanātham smi kim naḥ mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati

original: sahasraśirasaṃ devaṃ vyaktāvyaktaṃ sanātanam / mahāyogaṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati //
analyzed: sahasra śirasam devam vyakta avyaktam sanātanam mahā yogam smi kim naḥ mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati

original: bhūtātmānaṃ mahātmānaṃ yajñayonimayonijam / viśvarūpaṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mūtyuḥ kariṣyati //
analyzed: bhūtātmānam mahātmānam yajñayonim ayonijam viśvarūpam prapanno smi kim naḥ mūtyuḥ kariṣyati

original: ityudīritamākarṇya stotraṃ tasya mahātmanuḥ / apayātastato mṛtyurviṣṇudūtaiḥ prapīḍitaḥ //
analyzed: iti udīritam ākarṇya stotram tasya mahā tmanuḥ apayātaḥ tatas mṛtyuḥ viṣṇu dūtaiḥ prapīḍitaḥ

original: iti tena jito mṛtyurmārkaṇḍeyena dhīmatā / prasanne puṇḍarīkākṣe nṛsiṃhe nāstidurlabham //
analyzed: iti tena jitaḥ mṛtyuḥ mārkaṇḍeyena dhīmatā prasanne puṇḍarīkākṣe nṛsiṃhe nāsti durlabham

original: mṛtyvaṣṭakamidaṃ puṇyaṃ mṛtyupraśamanaṃ śubham / mārkaṇḍeyahitārthāya svayaṃ viṣṇuruvāca ha //
analyzed: mṛtyu aṣṭakam idam puṇyam mṛtyu praśamanam śubham mārkaṇḍeya hita arthāya svayam viṣṇuḥ uvāca ha

original: idaṃ yaḥ paṭhate bhaktyā trikālaṃ niyataṃ śuciḥ / nākāle tasya mṛtyuḥ syānnarasyācyutacetasaḥ //
analyzed: idam yaḥ paṭhate bhaktyā tri kālam niyatam śuciḥ na akāle tasya mṛtyuḥ syāt narasya acyuta cetasaḥ

original: hṛtpadmamadhye puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ śāśvatamaprameyam / vicintya sūryādatirājamānaṃ mṛtyuṃ sa yogi jitavāṃstathaiva //
analyzed: hṛd padma madhye puruṣam purāṇam nārāyaṇam śāśvatam aprameyam  vicintya sūryāt atirājamānam mṛtyum sa yogi jitavān tathā eva

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe mārkaṇḍeyakṛtaṃ mṛtyvaṣṭakastotraṃ nāma trayastriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe mārkaṇḍeyakṛtam mṛtyvaṣṭakastotram nāma trayastriṃśat uttara dviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 234
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / vakṣye 'hamacyutastotraṃ śṛṇu śaunaka sarvadam / brahmā pṛṣṭo nāradāya yathovāca tathā param //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca vakṣye ham acyuta stotram śṛṇu śaunaka sarva dam  brahmā pṛṣṭaḥ nāradāya yathā uvāca tathā param

original: nārada uvāca / yathākṣayo 'vyayo viṣṇuḥ stotavyo varado mayā / pratyahaṃ cārcanākāle tathā tvaṃ vaktumarhasi //
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca yathā akṣayaḥ vyayaḥ viṣṇuḥ stotavyaḥ vara daḥ mayā pratyaham ca arcanā kāle tathā tvam vaktum arhasi

original: te dhanyāste sujanmānaste hi sarvasukhapradāḥ / saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ teṣāṃ ye stuvanti sadācyutam //
analyzed: te dhanyāḥ te su janmānaḥ te hi sarva sukha pradāḥ saphalam jīvitam teṣām ye stuvanti sadā acyutam

original: brahmovāca / mune stotraṃ pravakṣyāmiḥ vāsudevasya muktidam / śṛṇu yena stutaḥ samyak pūjākāle prasīdati //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca mune stotram pravakṣyāmiḥ vāsudevasya mukti dam śṛṇu yena stutaḥ samyak pūjā kāle prasīdati

original: oṃ namo (bhagavateḥ vāsudevāca namaḥ sarvāpahāriṇe / namo viśuddhadehāya namo jñānasvarūpiṇe //
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavateḥ vāsudevāt ca namaḥ sarva apahāriṇe namaḥ viśuddha dehāya namaḥ jñāna svarūpiṇe

original: namaḥ sarvasureśāya namaḥ śrīvatsadhāriṇe / namaścarmāsihastāya namaḥ paṅkajamāline //
analyzed: namaḥ sarva sureśāya namaḥ śrīvatsa dhāriṇe namaḥ carma asi hastāya namaḥ paṅkaja māline

original: namo viśvapratiṣṭhāya namaḥ pītāmbarāya ca / namo nṛsiṃharūpāya vaikuṇṭhāya namonamaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ viśva pratiṣṭhāya namaḥ pītāmbarāya ca namaḥ nṛsiṃha rūpāya vaikuṇṭhāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: namaḥ paṅkajanābhāya namaḥ kṣīrodaśāyine / namaḥ sahasraśīrṣāya namo nāgāṅgaśāyine //
analyzed: namaḥ paṅkajanābhāya namaḥ kṣīroda śāyine namaḥ sahasra śīrṣāya namaḥ nāga aṅga śāyine

original: namaḥ paraśuhastāya namaḥ kṣattrāntakāriṇe / namaḥ satyapratijñāya hyajitāya namonamaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ paraśu hastāya namaḥ kṣattra anta kāriṇe namaḥ satya pratijñāya hi ajitāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: namastrai lokyanāthāya namaścakradhāraya ca / namaḥ śivāya sūkṣmāya purāṇāya namonamaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ trai lokya nāthāya namaḥ cakra dhāraya ca  namaḥ śivāya sūkṣmāya purāṇāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: namo vāmanarūpāya balirājyāpahāriṇe / namo yajñavarāhāya govindāya namonamaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ vāmana rūpāya bali rājya apahāriṇe namaḥ yajñavarāhāya govindāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: namaste paramānanda namaste paramākṣara / namaste jñānasadbhāva namaste jñānadāyaka //
analyzed: namaḥ te parama ānanda namaḥ te parama akṣara namaḥ te jñāna sadbhāva namaḥ te jñāna dāyaka

original: namaste paramādvaita namaste puruṣottama / namaste viśvakṛddeva namaste viśvabhāvana //
analyzed: namaḥ te parama advaita namaḥ te puruṣottama  namaḥ te viśvakṛt deva namaḥ te viśvabhāvana

original: namaste stādviśvanātha namasteḥ viśvakāraṇa / namaste madhudaityaghna namaste rāvaṇāntaka //
analyzed: namaḥ te stād viśvanātha namaḥ teḥ viśvakāraṇa namaḥ te madhu daitya ghna namaḥ te rāvaṇa antaka

original: namaste kaṃsakeśighna namaste kaiṭabhārdana / namaste śatapatrākṣa namaste garuḍadhvaja //
analyzed: namaḥ te kaṃsa keśi ghna namaḥ te kaiṭabha ardana namaḥ te śatapattra akṣa namaḥ te garuḍadhvaja

original: namaste kālanemighna namaste garuḍāsana / namaste devakīputra namaste vṛṣṇinandana //
analyzed: namaḥ te kālanemi ghna namaḥ te garuḍa āsana namaḥ te devakīputra namaḥ te vṛṣṇi nandana

original: namaste rukmiṇīkānta namaste ditinandana / namaste gokulāvāsa namaste gokulapriya //
analyzed: namaḥ te rukmiṇī kānta namaḥ te diti nandana namaḥ te go kula āvāsa namaḥ te go kula priya

original: jaya gopavapuḥ kṛṣṇa jaya gopījanapriya / jaya govardhanādhāra jaya gokulavardhana //
analyzed: jaya gopa vapuḥ kṛṣṇa jaya gopī jana priya jaya govardhana ādhāra jaya gokula vardhana

original: jaya rāvaṇavīraghna jaya cāṇūranāśana / jaya vṛṣṇikuloddyota jaya kālīyamardana //
analyzed: jaya rāvaṇa vīra ghna jaya cāṇūra nāśana jaya vṛṣṇi kula uddyota jaya kālīya mardana

original: jaya satya jagatsākṣin jaya sarvārthasādhaka / jaya vedāntavidvedya jaya sarvada mādhava //
analyzed: jaya satya jagatsākṣin jaya sarva artha sādhaka  jaya vedānta vid vedya jaya sarva da mādhava

original: jaya sarvāśrayāvyakta jaya sarvaga mādhava / jaya sūkṣma cidāndana jaya cittanirañjana //
analyzed: jaya sarva āśraya avyakta jaya sarvaga mādhava jaya sūkṣma cit āndana jaya citta nirañjana

original: jayaste 'stu nirālamba jaya śānta sanātana / jaya nātha jagatpuṣṭa (tpūjya)
analyzed: jayaḥ te stu nirālamba jaya śānta sanātana jaya nātha jagat puṣṭa t pūjya

original: jaya viṣṇo namo 'stūte //
analyzed: jaya viṣṇo namaḥ stūte

original: tvaṃ gurustvaṃ hare śiṣyastvaṃ dīkṣāmantramaṇḍalam / tvaṃ nyāsamudrāsamayāstvaṃ ca puṣpādisādhanam //
analyzed: tvam guruḥ tvam hare śiṣyaḥ tvam dīkṣā mantra maṇḍalam tvam nyāsa mudrā samayāḥ tvam ca puṣpa ādi sādhanam

original: tvamādhārastvaṃ hyanantastvaṃ kūrmaḥstvaṃ dharāmbujam / dharmajñānādayastvaṃ hi vedimaṇḍalaśaktayaḥ //
analyzed: tvam ādhāraḥ tvam hi anantaḥ tvam kūrmaḥ tvam dharā ambujam dharma jñāna ādayaḥ tvam hi vedi maṇḍala śaktayaḥ

original: tvaṃ prabho chalabhṛdrāmastvaṃ punaḥ sa kharāntakaḥ / tvaṃ brahmarṣiścadevastvaṃ viṣṇuḥ satyaparākramaḥ //
analyzed: tvam prabho chalabhṛt rāmaḥ tvam punar sa khara antakaḥ tvam brahmarṣiḥ ca devaḥ tvam viṣṇuḥ satya parākramaḥ

original: tvaṃ nṛsiṃhaḥ parānando varāhastvaṃ dharādharaḥ / tvaṃ suparṇastathā cakraṃ tvaṃ gadā śaṅkha eva ca //
analyzed: tvam nṛsiṃhaḥ parānandaḥ varāhaḥ tvam dharādharaḥ tvam suparṇaḥ tathā cakram tvam gadā śaṅkhaḥ eva ca

original: tvaṃ śrīḥ prabho tvaṃ muṣṭisatvaṃ tvaṃ mālā deva śāvatī / śrīvatsaḥ kaustubhastvaṃ hi śārṅgo tvaṃ ca tatheṣudhiḥ //
analyzed: tvam śrīḥ prabho tvam muṣṭi sattvam tvam mālā deva śāvatī śrīvatsaḥ kaustubhaḥ tvam hi tvam ca tathā iṣudhiḥ

original: tvaṃ khaḍgacarmaṇā sārdhaṃ tvaṃ dikpālāstathā prabho / tvaṃ vedhāstvaṃ vidhātā ca tvaṃ yamastvaṃ hutāśanaḥ //
analyzed: tvam khaḍga carmaṇā sārdham tvam dikpālāḥ tathā prabho tvam vedhāḥ tvam vidhātā ca tvam yamaḥ tvam hutāśanaḥ

original: tvaṃ dhaneśastvamīśānastvamindrastvamapāṃpatiḥ / tvaṃ rakṣo 'dhipatiḥ sādhyastvaṃ vāyustvaṃ niśākaraḥ //
analyzed: tvam dhaneśaḥ tvam īśānaḥ tvam indraḥ tvam apāṃpatiḥ tvam rakṣaḥ dhipatiḥ sādhyaḥ tvam vāyuḥ tvam niśākaraḥ

original: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau tvaṃ marudgaṇāḥ / tvaṃ daityā dānavā nāgāstvaṃ yakṣā rākṣasāḥ khagāḥ //
analyzed: ādityāḥ vasavaḥ rudrāḥ aśvinau tvam marut gaṇāḥ tvam daityāḥ dānavāḥ nāgāḥ tvam yakṣāḥ rākṣasāḥ khagāḥ

original: gandharvāpyarasaḥ siddhāḥ pitarastvaṃ mahāmarāḥ / bhūtāni viṣayastvaṃ hi tvamavyaktendriyāṇi ca //
analyzed: gandharva apya rasaḥ siddhāḥ pitaraḥ tvam mahā amarāḥ bhūtāni viṣayaḥ tvam hi tvam avyakta indriyāṇi ca

original: manobuddhirahaṅkāraḥ kṣetrajñastvaṃ hṛdīśvaraḥ / tvaṃ yajñastvaṃ vaṣaṭkārastvamoṅkāraḥ samitkuśāḥ //
analyzed: manaḥ buddhiḥ ahaṅkāraḥ kṣetrajñaḥ tvam hṛdi īśvaraḥ tvam yajñaḥ tvam vaṣaṭkāraḥ tvam oṅkāraḥ samidh kuśāḥ

original: tvaṃ vedī tvaṃ hare dīkṣā tvaṃ yūpastvaṃ hutāśanaḥ / tvaṃ patnī tvaṃ puroḍāśastvaṃ śālā strukca tvaṃ stuvaḥ //
analyzed: tvam vedī tvam hare dīkṣā tvam yūpaḥ tvam hutāśanaḥ tvam patnī tvam puroḍāśaḥ tvam śālā struc ca tvam stuvaḥ

original: grāvāṇaḥ sakalaṃ tvaṃ hi sadasyāstvaṃ sadākṣiṇaḥ / tvaṃ sūrpādistvaṃ ca brahmā musalolūkhale dhruvam //
analyzed: grāvāṇaḥ sakalam tvam hi sadasyāḥ tvam sa dākṣiṇaḥ tvam sūrpa ādiḥ tvam ca brahmā musala ulūkhale dhruvam

original: tvaṃ hotā yajamānastvaṃ tvaṃ dhānyaṃ paśuyājakaḥ / tvamadhvaryustvamudgātā tvaṃ yajñaḥ puruṣottamaḥ //
analyzed: tvam hotā yajamānaḥ tvam tvam dhānyam paśu yājakaḥ  tvam adhvaryuḥ tvam udgātā tvam yajñaḥ puruṣa uttamaḥ

original: dikpātālamahi vyoma dyaustvaṃ nakṣatrakārakaḥ / devatiryaṅmanuṣyeṣu jagadetaccarācaram //
analyzed: diś pātālam ahi vyoma dyauḥ tvam nakṣatra kārakaḥ deva tiryak manuṣyeṣu jagat etat carācaram

original: yatkiñciddṛśyate deva brahmāṇḍamakhilaṃ jagat / tava rūpamidaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭyarthaṃ saṃprakāśitam //
analyzed: yat kiñcid dṛśyate deva brahmāṇḍam akhilam jagat tava rūpam idam sarvam dṛṣṭi artham saṃprakāśitam

original: nāthayante paraṃ brahma daiverapi durāsadam / kastañjānāti vimalaṃ yogagamyamatīndriyam //
analyzed: nāthayante param brahma daiveḥ api durāsadam  kaḥ tat jānāti vimalam yoga gamyam atīndriyam

original: akṣayaṃ puruṣaṃ nityamavyaktamajamavyayam / pralayotpattirahitaṃ sarvavyāpinamīśvaram //
analyzed: akṣayam puruṣam nityam avyaktam ajam avyayam pralaya utpatti rahitam sarva vyāpinam īśvaram

original: sarvajñaṃ nirguṇaṃ śuddhamānandamajaraṃ param / bodharūpaṃ dhruvaṃ śāntaṃ pūrṇamadvaitamakṣayam //
analyzed: sarvajñam nirguṇam śuddham ānandam ajaram param bodha rūpam dhruvam śāntam pūrṇam advaitam akṣayam

original: avatāreṣu yā mūrtirvidūre deva dṛśyate / paraṃ bhāvaṃmajānantastvāṃ bhajanti divaukasaḥ //
analyzed: avatāreṣu yā mūrtiḥ vidūre deva dṛśyate param bhāvaṃm a jānantaḥ tvām bhajanti divaukasaḥ

original: kathaṃ tvāmīdṛśaṃ sūkṣmaṃ śaknomi puruṣottama / arādhayitumīśāna manogamyamagocaram //
analyzed: katham tvām īdṛśam sūkṣmam śaknomi puruṣottama arādhayitum īśāna manaḥ gamyam agocaram

original: iha yanmaṇḍale nātha pūjyate vidhivatkramaiḥ / puṣpadhūpādibhiryatra tatra sarvā vibhūtayaḥ //
analyzed: iha yat maṇḍale nātha pūjyate vidhivat kramaiḥ puṣpa dhūpa ādibhiḥ yatra tatra sarvāḥ vibhūtayaḥ

original: saṃkarṣaṇādibhedena tava yat pūjitā mayā / kṣantumarhasi tatsarvaṃ yatkṛtaṃ na kṛtaṃ mayā //
analyzed: saṃkarṣaṇa ādi bhedena tava yat pūjitāḥ mayā kṣantum arhasi tat sarvam yat kṛtam na kṛtam mayā

original: na śaknomi vibho samyakkartuṃ pūjāṃ yathoditām / yatkṛtaṃ japahomādi asādhyaṃ puruṣottama //
analyzed: na śaknomi vibho samyak kartum pūjām yathā uditām  yat kṛtam japa homa ādi asādhyam puruṣottama

original: viniṣpādayituṃ bhaktyā ata stvāṃ kṣamayāmyaham / divā rātrau ca sandhyāyāṃ sarvāvasthāsu ceṣṭataḥ //
analyzed: viniṣpādayitum bhaktyā atas tvām kṣamayāmi aham divā rātrau ca sandhyāyām sarva avasthāsu ceṣṭataḥ

original: acalā tu hare / bhaktistavāṅghriyugale mama / śarire na (ṇa)
analyzed: acalā tu hare bhaktiḥ tava aṅghri yugale mama na na

original: tathā prītirna ca dharmādikeṣu ca //
analyzed: tathā prītiḥ na ca dharma ādikeṣu ca

original: yathā tvayi jagannātha prītiṃrātyantikī mama / kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ karma svargamokṣādisādhanam //
analyzed: yathā tvayi jagannātha mama kim tena na kṛtam karma svarga mokṣa ādi sādhanam

original: yasya viṣṇau dṛḍhā bhaktiḥ sarvakāmaphalaprade / pūjāṃ kartuṃ tathā stotraṃ kaḥ śaknoti tavācyuta //
analyzed: yasya viṣṇau dṛḍhā bhaktiḥ sarva kāma phala prade  pūjām kartum tathā stotram kaḥ śaknoti tava acyuta

original: stutaṃ tu pūjitaṃ me 'dya tatkṣamasva namo 'stu te / iti cakradhārastotraṃ mayā samyagudāhṛtam / stauhi viṣṇuṃ mune bhaktyā yadīcchasi paraṃ padam //
analyzed: stutam tu pūjitam me dya tat kṣamasva namaḥ stu te  iti cakradhāra stotram mayā samyak udāhṛtam stauhi viṣṇum mune bhaktyā yadi icchasi param padam

original: stotreṇānena yaḥ stauti pūjākāle jagadghurum //
analyzed: stotreṇa anena yaḥ stauti pūjā kāle jagat ghurum

original: acirāllabhate mokṣaṃ chitvā saṃsārabandhanam / anyo 'pi yo japedbhaktyā trisandhyaṃ niyataḥ śuciḥ //
analyzed: acirāt labhate mokṣam chitvā saṃsāra bandhanam

original: idaṃ stotraṃ mune so 'pi sarvakāmamavāpnuyāt / putrārtho labhate putrānbaddho mucyate bandhanāt //
analyzed: idam stotram mune sarva kāmam avāpnuyāt  putra arthaḥ labhate putrān baddhaḥ mucyate bandhanāt

original: rogādvimucyate rāgī labhate nirdhano dhanam / vidyārtho labhate vidyāṃ bhagyaṃ kīrti ca vindati //
analyzed: rogāt vimucyate rāgī labhate nirdhanaḥ dhanam vidyā arthaḥ labhate vidyām bhagyam kīrti ca vindati

original: jāti smaratvaṃ medhāvī yadyadicchati cetasā / sa dhanyaḥ sarvavitprājñaḥsa sādhuḥ sarvakarmakṛt //
analyzed: medhāvī yat yat icchati cetasā sa dhanyaḥ sarva vid prājñaḥ sa sādhuḥ sarva karma kṛt

original: sa satyavākūchucirdātā yaḥ stauti puruṣottamam / asaṃbhāṣyā hi te sarve sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtāḥ //
analyzed: sa satya vāc ūcuciḥ dātā yaḥ stauti puruṣottamam a saṃbhāṣyāḥ hi te sarve sarva dharma bahiṣkṛtāḥ

original: yeṣāṃ pravartane nāsti harimuddiśya satkriyā / na śuddhaṃ vidyate tasya mano vākca durātmanaḥ //
analyzed: yeṣām pravartane nā asti harim uddiśya satkriyā na śuddham vidyate tasya manaḥ vāc ca durātmanaḥ

original: yasya sarvārthade viṣṇau bhaktirnāvyabhicāriṇī / ārādhya vidhivaddevaṃ hariṃ sarvasukhapradam //
analyzed: yasya sarva artha de viṣṇau bhaktiḥ na avyabhicāriṇī  ārādhya vidhivat devam harim sarva sukha pradam

original: prāpnoti puruṣaḥ samyagyadyatprārthayate phalam / karma kāmādikaṃ sarvaṃ śraddhadhānaḥ surottamaḥ / asurādivapuḥ siddhairdeyate yasya nāntaram //
analyzed: prāpnoti puruṣaḥ samyak yat yat prārthayate phalam  karma kāma ādikam sarvam sura uttamaḥ asura ādi vapuḥ siddhaiḥ deyate yasya na antaram

original: sakalamunibhirādyaścintyate yo hi śuddho nikhilahṛdi niviṣṭo vetti yaḥ sarvasākṣī / tamajamamṛtamīśaṃ vāsudevaṃ nato 'smi bhayamaraṇavihīnaṃ nityamānandarūpam //
analyzed: sakala munibhiḥ ādyaḥ cintyate yaḥ hi śuddhaḥ nikhila hṛdi niviṣṭaḥ vetti yaḥ sarva sākṣī tam ajam amṛtam īśam vāsudevam nataḥ smi bhaya maraṇa vihīnam nityam ānanda rūpam

original: nikhilabhuvana nāthaṃ śāśvataṃ suprasannaṃ tvativimalaviśuddhaṃ nirguṇaṃ bhavapuṣpaiḥ / sukhamuditasamastaṃ pūjayāmyātmabhāvaṃ viśatu hṛdayapadme sarvasākṣī cidātmā //
analyzed: nikhila bhuvana nātham śāśvatam su prasannam tu ati vimala viśuddham nirguṇam bhava puṣpaiḥ sukham udita samastam pūjayāmi ātma bhāvam viśatu hṛdaya padme sarva sākṣī cit ātmā

original: evaṃ mayoktaṃ paramaprabhāvamādyantahīnasya parasya viṣṇoḥ / tasmādvicintyaḥ parameśvaro 'sau vimuktikāmena nareṇa samyak //
analyzed: evam mayā uktam parama prabhāvam ādi anta hīnasya parasya viṣṇoḥ tasmāt vicintyaḥ parameśvaraḥ sau vimukti kāmena nareṇa samyak

original: bodhasvarūpaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇamādityavarṇaṃ vimalaṃ viśuddham / sañcintya viṣṇuṃ paramadvitīyaṃ kastatra yogī na laṃya prayāti //
analyzed: bodha sva rūpam puruṣam purāṇam āditya varṇam vimalam viśuddham sañcintya viṣṇum parama dvitīyam kaḥ tatra yogī na prayāti

original: imaṃ stavaṃ yaḥ satataṃ manuṣyaḥ paṭhecca tadvatprayataḥ praśāntaḥ / sa dhūtapāpmā vitataprabhāvaḥ prayāti lokaṃ vitataṃ murāreḥ //
analyzed: imam stavam yaḥ satatam manuṣyaḥ paṭhet ca tadvat prayataḥ praśāntaḥ sa dhūta pāpmā vitata prabhāvaḥ prayāti lokam vitatam murāreḥ

original: yaḥ prārthayatyarthamaśeṣasaukhyaṃ dharmaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca tathaiva mokṣam / sa sarvamutsṛjya paraṃ purāṇaṃ prayāti viṣṇuṃ śaraṇaṃ vareṇyam //
analyzed: yaḥ prārthayati artham aśeṣa saukhyam dharmam ca kāmam ca tathā eva mokṣam sa sarvam utsṛjya param purāṇam prayāti viṣṇum śaraṇam vareṇyam

original: vibhuṃ prabhuṃ viśvadharaṃ viśuddhamaśeṣasaṃsāravināśahetum / yo vāsudevaṃ vimalaṃ prapannaḥ sa mokṣamāpnoti vimuktasaṅgaḥ //
analyzed: vibhum prabhum viśvadharam viśuddham aśeṣa saṃsāra vināśa hetum  yaḥ vāsudevam vimalam prapannaḥ sa mokṣam āpnoti vimukta saṅgaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe 'cyutastotraṃ nāma catustriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe cyutastotram nāma catustriṃśaduttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 235
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca vedāntasāṅkhyasiddhāntabrahmajñānaṃ vadāmyaham / ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirviṣṇurityeva cintayan //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca vedānta sāṅkhya siddhānta brahma jñānam vadāmi aham aham brahma param jyotiḥ viṣṇuḥ iti eva cintayan

original: sūrye hṛdvyomni vahnau ca jyotirekaṃ tridhā sthitam / yathā sarpiḥ śīrasthaṃ gavāṃ na kurute balam //
analyzed: sūrye hṛd vyomni vahnau ca jyotiḥ ekam tridhā sthitam yathā sarpiḥ śīra stham gavām na kurute balam

original: nirgataṃ karmasaṃyuktaṃ dattaṃ tāsāṃ mahā balam / tathā viṣṇuḥ śarīrastho na karoti hitaṃ naṇām //
analyzed: nirgatam karma saṃyuktam dattam tāsām mahā balam tathā viṣṇuḥ śarīra sthaḥ na karoti hitam

original: vinārādhanayā devaḥ sarvagaḥ parameśvaraḥ / ārurukṣumatīnāṃ tu karmajñānamudāhṛtam //
analyzed: vinā ārādhanayā devaḥ sarva gaḥ parameśvaraḥ  ārurukṣu matīnām tu karma jñānam udāhṛtam

original: ārūḍhayogavṛkṣāṇāṃ jñānaṃ tyāgaṃ paraṃ matam / jñātumicchati śabdādīnrāgo dveṣo 'tha jāyate //
analyzed: ārūḍha yogavṛkṣāṇām jñānam tyāgam param matam jñātum icchati śabda ādīn rāgaḥ dveṣaḥ jāyate

original: lobho mohaḥ krodha etairyuktaḥ pāpaṃ naraścaret / hastāvupasthamudaraṃ vākcaturtho catuṣṭayam //
analyzed: lobhaḥ mohaḥ krodhaḥ etaiḥ yuktaḥ pāpam naraḥ caret hastau upastham udaram vāc caturthaḥ catuṣṭayam

original: etatsusaṃyataṃ yasya sa vipraḥ kathyate budhaiḥ (dhaḥ) / paravittaṃ na gṛhṇāti na hiṃsāṃ kurute tathā //
analyzed: etat su saṃyatam yasya sa vipraḥ kathyate budhaiḥ para vittam na gṛhṇāti na hiṃsām kurute tathā

original: nākṣakrīḍārato yastu hastau tasya susaṃyatau / parastrīvarjanaratastasyopasthaṃ susaṃyatam //
analyzed: na akṣa krīḍā rataḥ yaḥ tu hastau tasya su saṃyatau para strī varjana rataḥ tasya upastham su saṃyatam

original: alolupamidaṃ bhuṅkte jaṭharaṃ tasya saṃyatam / satyaṃ hitaṃ mitaṃ brūte yasmādvāktasya saṃyatā //
analyzed: a lolupam idam bhuṅkte jaṭharam tasya saṃyatam satyam hitam mitam brūte yasmāt vāc tasya saṃyatā

original: yasya saṃyatānyetāni tasya kiṃ tapasādhvaraiḥ / aikyaṃ yadbuddhimanasorindriyāṇāṃ ca sarvadā //
analyzed: yasya saṃyatāni etāni tasya kim tapasā adhvaraiḥ aikyam yat buddhi manasoḥ indriyāṇām ca sarvadā

original: sabījaṃ vāpi nirbojaṃ dhyānametatprakīrtitam / bhruvormadhye sthitāṃ buddhiṃ viṣayeṣu yunakti yaḥ //
analyzed: sa bījam vā api nirbojam dhyānam etat prakīrtitam bhruvoḥ madhye sthitām buddhim viṣayeṣu yunakti yaḥ

original: handriyāṇāmuparame manasi hyavyavasthite //
analyzed: ha indriyāṇām uparame manasi hi avyavasthite

original: svapnānpaśyatyasau jīvo bāhyānābhyantarānatha / jīvo jāgradavasthāyāmevamāhurvipāścitaḥ //
analyzed: svapnān paśyati asau jīvaḥ bāhyān ābhyantarān atha jīvaḥ jāgrat avasthāyām evam āhuḥ vipāścitaḥ

original: hṛdi sthitaḥ sa tamasā mohito na smaratyapi / yadā tasya kuto veti suṣuptiriti kathyate //
analyzed: hṛdi sthitaḥ sa tamasā mohitaḥ na smarati api yadā tasya kutas vā iti suṣuptiḥ iti kathyate

original: jāgrato yasya no tandrā na moho na bhramastathā / utpadyate na jānāti śabdārthaviṣayānvaśī //
analyzed: jāgrataḥ yasya no tandrā na mohaḥ na bhramaḥ tathā utpadyate na jānāti śabda artha viṣayān vaśī

original: indriyāṇi samāhṛtya viṣayebhyo manastathā / buddhyāhaṅkāramapi ca prakṛtyā buddhimeva ca //
analyzed: indriyāṇi samāhṛtya viṣayebhyaḥ manaḥ tathā buddhyā ahaṅkāram api ca prakṛtyā buddhim eva ca

original: saṃyamya prakṛtiṃ cāpi cicchaktyā kevale sthitaḥ / paśyatyātmāni cātmānamātmanātmaprakāśakam //
analyzed: saṃyamya prakṛtim ca api cicchaktyā kevale sthitaḥ paśyati ātmāni ca ātmānam ātmanā ātma prakāśakam

original: cidrūpamamṛtaṃ śuddhaṃ niṣkriyaṃ vyāpakaṃ śivam / turīyāyāmavasthāyāmāsthito 'sau na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: cit rūpam amṛtam śuddham niṣkriyam vyāpakam śivam turīyāyām avasthāyām āsthitaḥ sau na saṃśayaḥ

original: śabdādayo guṇāḥ pañca sattvādyāśca guṇāstrayaḥ / puryaṣṭakasya padmasya patrāṇyaṣṭau ca tāni hi //
analyzed: śabda ādayaḥ guṇāḥ pañca sattva ādyāḥ ca guṇāḥ trayaḥ puryaṣṭakasya padmasya patrāṇi aṣṭau ca tāni hi

original: sāmyāvasthā guṇakṛtā prakṛtistatra karṇikā / karṇikāyāṃ sthito devo dehī cidrūpa eva hi //
analyzed: sāmya avasthā guṇa kṛtā prakṛtiḥ tatra karṇikā karṇikāyām sthitaḥ devaḥ dehī cit rūpaḥ eva hi

original: puryaṣṭakaṃ parityajya prakṛtiñca guṇātmikām / yadā yāti tadā jīvo yāti muktiṃ na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: puryaṣṭakam parityajya prakṛtiñca guṇa ātmikām yadā yāti tadā jīvaḥ yāti muktim na saṃśayaḥ

original: prāṇāyāmo japaścaiva pratyāhāro 'tha dhāraṇā / dhyānaṃ samādhirityete ṣaḍ yogasya prasādhakāḥ //
analyzed: prāṇāyāmaḥ japaḥ ca eva dhāraṇā dhyānam samādhiḥ iti ete ṣaṭ yogasya prasādhakāḥ

original: pāpakṣaye devatānāṃ prītirindriyasaṃyamaḥ / japadhyānayuto garbho viparītastvagarbhakaḥ //
analyzed: pāpa kṣaye devatānām prītiḥ indriya saṃyamaḥ japa dhyāna yutaḥ garbhaḥ viparītaḥ tu agarbhakaḥ

original: ṣaṭtriṃśanmātrakaḥ śreṣṭhaścaturviṃśatimātrakaḥ / madhyo dvādaśamātrastu oṅkāraṃ satataṃ japet //
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśat mātrakaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ caturviṃśati mātrakaḥ madhyaḥ dvādaśa mātraḥ tu oṅkāram satatam japet

original: vācake praṇave jñāte vācyaṃ brahma prasīdati / (oṃnamo viṣṇave)
analyzed: vācake praṇave jñāte vācyam brahma prasīdati om namaḥ viṣṇave

original: .ṣaṣṭhākṣaraśca japtavyo gāyattrī dvādaśākṣarī //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭha akṣaraḥ ca japtavyaḥ gāyattrī dvādaśa akṣarī

original: sarveṣāmindriyāṇāṃ tu pravṛtirviṣayeṣu ca / nivṛttirmanasastasyāḥ pratyāhāraḥ prakīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: sarveṣām indriyāṇām tu pravṛtiḥ viṣayeṣu ca  nivṛttiḥ manasaḥ tasyāḥ pratyāhāraḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyaḥ samāhṛtya hito hi saḥ / sahasā saha buddhyā ca pratyāhāreṣu saṃsthitaḥ //
analyzed: indriyāṇi indriya arthebhyaḥ samāhṛtya hitaḥ hi saḥ sahasā saha buddhyā ca pratyāhāreṣu saṃsthitaḥ

original: prāṇāyāmairdvādaśabhiryāvatkālaḥkṛto bhavet / yastāvatkālaparyantaṃ mano brahmaṇi dhārayet //
analyzed: prāṇāyāmaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ yāvat kālaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavet  yaḥ tāvat kāla paryantam manaḥ brahmaṇi dhārayet

original: tasyaiva brahmaṇā proktaṃ dhyānaṃ dvādaśa dhāraṇāḥ / tuṣyeta niyato yuktaḥ samādhiḥ so 'bhīdhīyate //
analyzed: tasya eva brahmaṇā proktam dhyānam dvādaśa dhāraṇāḥ tuṣyeta niyataḥ yuktaḥ samādhiḥ saḥ bhīdhīyate

original: dhyāyanna calate yasya manobhidhyāyato bhṛśam //
analyzed: dhyāyan na calate yasya manaḥ abhidhyāyataḥ bhṛśam

original: prāpyāvadhikṛtaṃ kālaṃ yāvatsā dhāraṇā smṛtā / dhyeye saktaṃ mano yasya dhyeyamevānupaśyati //
analyzed: prāpyau adhikṛtam kālam yāvat sā dhāraṇā smṛtā dhyeye saktam manaḥ yasya dhyeyam eva anupaśyati

original: nānyaṃ padārthaṃ jānāti dhyānametatprakīrtitam / dhyeye mano niścalatāṃ yāti dhyeyaṃ vicintayan //
analyzed: na anyam padārtham jānāti dhyānam etat prakīrtitam dhyeye manaḥ niścala tām yāti dhyeyam vicintayan

original: yattaddhyānaṃ paraṃ proktaṃ munibhirdhyānacintakaiḥ / dhyeyameva hi sarvatra dhyātā tanmayatāṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: yat tat dhyānam param proktam munibhiḥ dhyāna cintakaiḥ dhyeyam eva hi sarvatra dhyātā tad maya tām gataḥ

original: paśyati dvaitarahitaṃ samādhiḥ so 'bhidhīyate / manaḥ saṅkalparahitamindriyārthānna cintayet //
analyzed: paśyati dvaita rahitam samādhiḥ saḥ abhidhīyate manaḥ saṅkalpa rahitam indriyārthān na cintayet

original: yasya brahmaṇi saṃlīnaṃ samādhisthaṃ tadocyate / dhyāyataḥ paramātmānamātmasthaṃ yasya yoginaḥ //
analyzed: yasya brahmaṇi saṃlīnam samādhi stham tadā ucyate dhyāyataḥ paramātmānam ātma stham yasya yoginaḥ

original: manastanmayatāṃ yāti samādhisthaḥ sa kīrtitaḥ / cittasya sthiratā bhrāntirdairmanasyaṃ pramādatā //
analyzed: manaḥ tanmaya tām yāti samādhi sthaḥ sa kīrtitaḥ cittasya sthira tā bhrāntiḥ dairmanasyam pramāda tā

original: yogināṃ kathitā doṣā yogavighnapravartakāḥ / sthityarthaṃ manasaḥ sarvaṃ sthūlarūpaṃ vicintayet //
analyzed: yoginām kathitāḥ doṣāḥ yoga vighna pravartakāḥ sthiti artham manasaḥ sarvam sthūla rūpam vicintayet

original: tadvrataṃ niścalībhūtaṃ sūyyasthaṃ sthiratāṃ vrajet / na vinā paramātmānaṃ kiñcijjagati vidyate //
analyzed: tat vratam niścalībhūtam sūyya stham sthiratām vrajet  na vinā paramātmānam kiñcid jagati vidyate

original: viśvarūpaṃ tamevaikamiti jñātvā vimuñcati / oṅkāraṃ paramaṃ brahma dhyāyedabjasthitaṃ vibhum //
analyzed: viśva rūpam tam eva ekam iti jñātvā vimuñcati oṅkāram paramam brahma dhyāyet abja sthitam vibhum

original: kṣetrakṣetrajñarahitaṃ japenmātrātrayānvitam / hṛdi sañcintayetpūrvaṃ pradhānaṃ tasya copari //
analyzed: kṣetra kṣetrajña rahitam japet mātrā traya anvitam hṛdi sañcintayet pūrvam pradhānam tasya ca upari

original: tamo rajastathā sattvaṃ maṇḍalatritayaṃ kramāt / kṛṣṇaraktasitaṃ tasminpuruṣaṃ jīvasaṃjñitam //
analyzed: tamaḥ rajaḥ tathā sattvam maṇḍala tritayam kramāt kṛṣṇa rakta sitam tasmin puruṣam jīva saṃjñitam

original: tasyopari guṇaiśvaryamaṣṭapatraṃ saroruham / jñānaṃ tu karṇikā tatra vijñānaṃ kesarāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: tasya upari guṇa aiśvaryam aṣṭa patram saroruham  jñānam tu karṇikā tatra vijñānam kesarāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: vairāgyanālaṃ tatkando vaiṣṇavo dharma uttamaḥ / karṇikāyāṃ sthitaṃ tatra jīvavanniścalaṃ vibhu //
analyzed: vairāgya nālam tat kandaḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ dharmaḥ uttamaḥ karṇikāyām sthitam tatra jīva vat niścalam vibhu

original: dhyāyedurasi saṃyuktamoṅkāraṃ muktisādhakam / dhyāyanyadi tyajetprāṇānyāti brahma svasannidhim //
analyzed: dhyāyet urasi saṃyuktam oṅkāram mukti sādhakam  dhyāyan yadi tyajet prāṇān yāti brahma sva sannidhim

original: hariṃ saṃsthāpya dehābje dhyāyanyo gī ca bhaktibhāk / ātmānamātmanā kecitpaśyanti dhyānacakṣuṣaḥ //
analyzed: harim saṃsthāpya deha abje dhyāyan yaḥ gī ca bhakti bhāj ātmānam ātmanā kecid paśyanti dhyāna cakṣuṣaḥ

original: sāṃkhyabuddhyā tathaivānye yogenānye tu yoginaḥ / brahmaprakāśakaṃ jñānaṃ bhavabandhavibhedanam //
analyzed: sāṃkhya buddhyā tathā eva anye yogena anye tu yoginaḥ brahma prakāśakam jñānam bhava bandha vibhedanam

original: tatraikacittatāyogo muktido nātra saṃśayaḥ / jitendriyātmakaraṇo jñānadṛpto hi yo bhavet //
