analyzed: tatra ekacitta tā yogaḥ mukti daḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ jita indriya ātma karaṇaḥ jñāna dṛptaḥ hi yaḥ bhavet

original: sa muktaḥ kathyate yogī paramātmanyavasthitaḥ / āsanasthānavidhayo na yogasya prasādhakāḥ //
analyzed: sa muktaḥ kathyate yogī parama ātmani avasthitaḥ āsana sthāna vidhayaḥ na yogasya prasādhakāḥ

original: vilambajanakāḥ sarve vistarāḥ parikīrtitāḥ / śiśupālaḥ siddhimāpa smaraṇābhyāsagauravāt //
analyzed: vilamba janakāḥ sarve vistarāḥ parikīrtitāḥ śiśupālaḥ siddhim āpa smaraṇa abhyāsa gauravāt

original: yogābhyāsaṃ prakurvantaḥ pasyantyātmānamātmanā / sarvabhūteṣu kāruṇyaṃ vidveṣaṃ viṣayeṣu ca //
analyzed: yoga abhyāsam prakurvantaḥ pasyanti ātmānam ātmanā sarva bhūteṣu kāruṇyam vidveṣam viṣayeṣu ca

original: guptaśiśrodarādiśca kurvanyogī vimucyate / indriyairindriyārthāṃstu na jānāti naro yadā //
analyzed: gupta śiśrodara ādiḥ ca kurvan yogī vimucyate indriyaiḥ indriya arthān tu na jānāti naraḥ yadā

original: kāṣṭhavadbrahmasaṃlīno yogī muktastadā bhavet / sarvavarṇāḥ śriyaḥ sarvāḥ kṛtvā pāpāni bhasmasāt //
analyzed: kāṣṭha vat brahma saṃlīnaḥ yogī muktaḥ tadā bhavet sarva varṇāḥ śriyaḥ sarvāḥ kṛtvā pāpāni bhasmasāt

original: dhyānāgninā ca medhāvī labhate paramāṃ gatim / manthanāddṛśyate hyagnistadvaddhyānena vai hariḥ //
analyzed: dhyāna agninā ca medhāvī labhate paramām gatim manthanāt dṛśyate hi agniḥ tadvat dhyānena vai hariḥ

original: brahmātmanoryadaikatvaṃ sa yogaścottamottamaḥ / bāhyarūpairna muktistu cāntasthaiḥ syādyamādibhiḥ //
analyzed: brahma ātmanoḥ yadā aikatvam sa yogaḥ ca uttamottamaḥ bāhya rūpaiḥ na muktiḥ tu ca anta sthaiḥ syāt yama ādibhiḥ

original: sāṅkhyajñānena yogena vedāntaśravaṇena ca / pratyakṣatātmano yā hi sā muktirabhidhīyate / anātmanyātmarūpatvamasataḥ satsvarūpatā //
analyzed: sāṅkhya jñānena yogena vedānta śravaṇena ca pratyakṣa tā ātmanaḥ yā hi sā muktiḥ abhidhīyate anātmani ātma rūpa tvam asataḥ sat sva rūpa tā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe brahmavijñānasvarūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe brahmavijñānasvarūpaṇam nāma pañcatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 236
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / ātmajñānaṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu nārada tattvataḥ / advaitaṃ sāṅkhyamityāhuryogastatraikacittatā //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca  ātma jñānam pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu nārada tattvataḥ advaitam sāṅkhyam iti āhuḥ yogaḥ tatra ekacitta tā

original: advaitayogasampannāste mucyante 'tibandhanāt / atītārabdhamāgāmi karma naśyati bodhataḥ //
analyzed: advaita yoga sampannāḥ te mucyante tibandhanāt  atīta ārabdham āgāmi karma naśyati bodhataḥ

original: sadvicārakuṭhāreṇa cchinnasaṃsārapādapaḥ / jñānavairāgyatīrthena labhate vaiṣṇavaṃ padam //
jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaṃ ca māyā tripuramucyate / atraivāntargataṃ sarvaṃ śāśvate nādvaye pade //
analyzed: jāgrat svapna suṣuptam ca māyā tripuram ucyate atrā eva antargatam sarvam śāśvate na advaye pade

original: nāmarūpakriyāhīnaṃ sarvaṃ tatparamaṃ padam / jagatkṛtveśvaro 'nantaṃ svayamatra praviṣṭavān //
analyzed: nāma rūpa kriyā hīnam sarvam tat paramam padam jagat kṛtvā īśvaraḥ nantam svayam atra praviṣṭavān

original: vedāhametaṃ puruṣaṃ cidrūpaṃ tamasaḥ param / so 'hamasmīti mokṣāya nānyaḥ panthā vimuktaye //
analyzed: veda aham etam puruṣam cit rūpam tamasaḥ param saḥ ham asmi iti mokṣāya na anyaḥ panthāḥ vimuktaye

original: śravaṇaṃ mananaṃ dhyānaṃ jñānānāṃ caiva sādhanam / yajñadānatapastīrthavedairmuktirna labhyate //
analyzed: śravaṇam mananam dhyānam jñānānām ca eva sādhanam yajña dāna tapaḥ tīrtha vedaiḥ muktiḥ na labhyate

original: tyāgena kenaciddhyānapūjākarmādibhiryathā / dvividhaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti ca //
analyzed: tyāgena kenacid dhyāna pūjā karma ādibhiḥ yathā dvividham veda vacanam kuru karma tyaja iti ca

original: yajñādayo vimuktānāṃ niṣkāmānāṃ vimuktaye / antaḥ karaṇaśuddhyarthamūcurevātra kecana //
analyzed: yajña ādayaḥ vimuktānām niṣkāmānām vimuktaye antar karaṇa śuddhi artham ūcuḥ eva atra kecana

original: ekena janmanā jñānanmuktirna dvaitabhāvinām / yogabhraṣṭāḥ kuyogāśca viprā yogikulodbhavāḥ //
analyzed: ekena janmanā jñānat muktiḥ na dvaita bhāvinām yoga bhraṣṭāḥ kuyogāḥ ca viprāḥ yogi kula udbhavāḥ

original: karmaṇā badhyate janturjñānānmukto bhavādbhavet / ātmajñānantvāśrayedvai ajñānaṃ yadato 'nyathā //
analyzed: karmaṇā badhyate jantuḥ jñānāt muktaḥ bhavāt bhavet  ātma jñānam tu āśrayet vai ajñānam yat atas nyathā

original: yadā sarve vimucyante kāmā yesyahṛdi sthitāḥ / tadāmṛtatvamāpnoti jīvanneva na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: yadā sarve vimucyante kāmāḥ sthitāḥ tadā amṛta tvam āpnoti jīvan eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: vyāpakatvātkathaṃ yāti ko yāti kva sa yāti ca / anantatvānnadeśo 'sti amūrtitvādgatiḥ kutaḥ //
analyzed: vyāpaka tvāt katham yāti kaḥ yāti kva sa yāti ca ananta tvāt na deśaḥ sti amūrti tvāt gatiḥ kutas

original: advayatvānna ko 'pyasti bodhatvājjaḍatā kutaḥ / ekoddiṣṭaṃ yadanyasya mativāggatisaṃsthiti (m) //
analyzed: advaya tvāt na bodha tvāt jaḍa tā kutas ekoddiṣṭam yat anyasya mati vāc gati saṃsthiti

original: kathamākāśakalpasya gatirāgatisaṃsthiti / jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaṃ ca māyayā parikalpitam //
analyzed: katham ākāśa kalpasya gatiḥ āgati saṃsthiti jāgrat svapna suṣuptam ca māyayā parikalpitam

original: vastu taijasakaṃ prājñe yattu puṇyamakhaṇḍakam / yathā te priyātmā naḥ sarveṣāṃ ca tathā priyaḥ //
analyzed: vastu taijasakam prājñe yat tu puṇyam akhaṇḍakam yathā te priya ātmā naḥ sarveṣām ca tathā priyaḥ

original: bodhamārge yathā cittaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca tathā mate / sarvadā sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvasya ca mahāmune //
analyzed: bodha mārge yathā cittam sarveṣām ca tathā mate  sarvadā sarva bhūtānām sarvasya ca mahā mune

original: nāhamatrātmavijñānaṃ tasmātpūrṇaṃ nirantaram / jāgratsvapnaṃ tathā vṛttaṃ sauṣuptasukhameva ca //
analyzed: na aham atra ātma vijñānam tasmāt pūrṇam nirantaram jāgrat svapnam tathā vṛttam sauṣupta sukham eva ca

original: smaraṇaṃ vismṛtārthasya nāsti cetkasya jāyate / satyamastu tathā vāṇu aśarīraṃ paraṃ tathā //
analyzed: smaraṇam vismṛta arthasya na asti ced kasya jāyate satyam astu tathā vā aṇu aśarīram param tathā

original: nāsti cetsukhaduḥ khānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vedanaṃ katham / sadā sarvatra sarvajñaḥ sarvasya hṛdaye na yet //
analyzed: na asti ced sukha duḥ khānām sarveṣām vedanam katham sadā sarvatra sarvajñaḥ sarvasya hṛdaye na yet

original: sākṣibhūtaḥ samāśritya ko jānāti viceṣṭitam / satya jñānānanta bhinnaṃ syānnasatyaṃ jñānataḥ pṛthak //
analyzed: sākṣi bhūtaḥ samāśritya kaḥ jānāti viceṣṭitam satya jñāna ananta bhinnam syāt na satyam jñānataḥ pṛthak

original: nānantyātpṛthagānandaṃ nāpyamānandataḥ pṛthak / tvameva paramaṃ brahma satyajñānādilakṣaṇam //
analyzed: na ānantyāt pṛthak ānandam pṛthak tvam eva paramam brahma satya jñāna ādi lakṣaṇam

original: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ tattvaṃ jñātvā tvakhilavidbhavet / yathaikamṛnmaye jñāte sarvametaccarācaram //
analyzed: aham brahma param tattvam jñātvā tu akhila vid bhavet yathā eka mṛd maye jñāte sarvam etat carācaram

original: yathaikahemamaṇinā sarvaṃ hemamayaṃ bhavet / jñānaṃ tathaivamīśena jñānināpyakhilaṃ jagat //
analyzed: yathā eka hema maṇinā sarvam hema mayam bhavet jñānam tathā evam īśena jñāninā api akhilam jagat

original: yathāndhakāradoṣeṇa rajjuḥ samyaṅnadṛśyate / yathā saṃmohadoṣeṇa cātmā samyaṅnadṛśyate //
analyzed: yathā andhakāra doṣeṇa rajjuḥ samyak na dṛśyate yathā saṃmoha doṣeṇa ca ātmā samyak na dṛśyate

original: sarpadhārādibhirbhedarainyathā vastukalpanam / vyomādinā sarūpādyairanyathātmā prakalpyate //
analyzed: sarpa dhārā ādibhiḥ bhedaraiḥ nyathā vastu kalpanam  vyoma ādinā sarūpa ādyaiḥ anyathā ātmā prakalpyate

original: pratyakṣamapi yaddravyandurdarśamiti bhāṣate / vyomādinā sarūpādyairanyathā kalpitaistathā //
analyzed: pratyakṣam api yat dravyan durdarśam iti bhāṣate vyoma ādinā sarūpa ādyaiḥ anyathā kalpitaiḥ tathā

original: tathā hi rajjururagaḥ śuktiḥ kārajataṃ yathā / mṛgatṛṣṇāpathāyāmbhastṛptiṃ viṣṇo tathā jagat //
analyzed: tathā hi rajjuḥ uragaḥ śuktiḥ kārajatam yathā mṛgatṛṣṇā pathāya ambhaḥ tṛptim viṣṇo tathā jagat

original: hāhiṣṇodvijā kathi dbhohamitidṛ / grahanāśātpunardhyāyanbrāhmaṇyaṃ manyate yathā //
analyzed: kathi graha nāśāt punar dhyāyan brāhmaṇyam manyate yathā

original: māyāviṣṭastathā jīvo dehohamiti manyate / māyānāśātpunaḥ svīyarūpaṃ brahmāsmi manyate //
analyzed: māyā āviṣṭaḥ tathā jīvaḥ dehaḥ uham iti manyate māyā nāśāt punar svīya rūpam brahma asmi manyate

original: grahanāśādyathā mānyajanokrūramavekṣate / svarūpadarśanāccāyaṃ māyā nāśantayā vinā //
analyzed: graha nāśāt yathā mānya jana ukrūram avekṣate sva rūpa darśanāt ca ayam māyā vinā

original: anāditvaṃ samaṃ dvābhyāṃ svarūpaṃ tadvilakṣaṇam / ekaḥ satyaṃ tathā bhāgī vicāreṇa paraṃ mṛṣā //
analyzed: anādi tvam samam dvābhyām svarūpam tad vilakṣaṇam ekaḥ satyam tathā bhāgī vicāreṇa param mṛṣā

original: ajopi hi sakṛtpretya saṃbhavāmyātmamāyayā / māyecchayā dvidhā sa syātpatiḥ patnī sukhaṃ jagat //
analyzed: ajaḥ api hi sakṛt pretya saṃbhavāmi ātma māyayā māyā icchayā dvidhā sa syāt patiḥ patnī sukham jagat

original: aṣṭāviṃśatibhedaistu traiguṇyaṃ vidyate pṛthak / caturaśītirlakṣyante naranāryākṛtīni ca //
analyzed: aṣṭāviṃśati bhedaiḥ tu traiguṇyam vidyate pṛthak caturaśītiḥ lakṣyante nara nārī ākṛtīni ca

original: eṣuviśvaṃ prabhavati khaṇḍajaṃ māyayā yathā / ādāvante ca santyete nāmarūpakriyādayaḥ //
analyzed: eṣu viśvam prabhavati khaṇḍa jam māyayā yathā ādau ante ca santi ete nāma rūpa kriyā ādayaḥ

original: sattāvakalpanaṃ kāle na santi paramārthataḥ / yathā rathādayaḥ svapne santo naiva ca satyataḥ //
analyzed: sattau akalpanam kāle na santi paramārthataḥ yathā ratha ādayaḥ svapne santaḥ nā eva ca satyataḥ

original: tathā jāgradavasthāyāṃ bhūtāni na tu sannidhau / dvairūpyaṃ māyayā yāti jāgratsvapnapadajña (kṣa) yoḥ //
analyzed: tathā jāgrat avasthāyām bhūtāni na tu sannidhau  dvairūpyam māyayā yāti jāgrat svapna pada jña yoḥ

original: evametatparaṃ brahma svapnajāgratpadadvaye / suṣuptamacalaṃ rūpamadvayaṃ padamucyate //
analyzed: evam etat param brahma svapna jāgrat pada dvaye suṣuptam acalam rūpam advayam padam ucyate

original: māyāvicārasiddhaiva vicāreṇa vilīyate / āpātarahitā sāpi kalpanā kālavartinī //
analyzed: māyā vicāra siddhā eva vicāreṇa vilīyate āpāta rahitā sā api kalpanā kāla vartinī

original: evaṃ tasyā (dātyā)
analyzed: evam tasyāḥ dātyā

original: tmanādityaṃ siddhamekasya satyajā / satostitvaṃ vasātitvādastitvāsatyatāṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: tmanā ādityam siddham ekasya satya jā sataḥ ustitvam tatas

original: jñānaṃ tatopyananto naḥ pūrṇontaḥ śukamātmanā / na nityabhāvājjātohamakṛtvādamṛtosmyaham / dīpavaddhṛdaye jyotirahaṃ brahmāsmi muktaye //
analyzed: jñānam tatas api anantaḥ naḥ pūrṇaḥ antar śukam ātmanā  na nitya bhāvāt jātaḥ ham a kṛtvāt amṛtaḥ smi aham dīpa vat hṛdaye jyotiḥ aham brahmā asmi muktaye

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ātmajñānasvarūpavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe ātmajñānasvarūpavarṇanam nāma ṣaṭtriṃśaduttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 237
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrībagavānuvāca / gītāsāraṃ pravakṣyāmi arjunāyoditaṃ purā / aṣṭāṅgayogayuktātmā sarvavedāntapāragaḥ //
analyzed: śrī bagavān uvāca  gītā sāram pravakṣyāmi arjunāya uditam purā aṣṭāṅga yoga yukta ātmā sarva vedānta pāragaḥ

original: ātmalābhaḥ paro nānya atmadehādivarjitaḥ / hīnarūpādidehāntaḥ karaṇatvādilocanaḥ //
analyzed: ātma lābhaḥ paraḥ na anyaḥ hīna rūpa ādi deha antaḥ karaṇa tva ādi locanaḥ

original: bijñānarahitaḥ prāṇaḥ suṣuptau hi pratīyate / nāhamātmā ca duḥ khādisaṃsārādisamanvayāt //
analyzed: vijñāna rahitaḥ prāṇaḥ suṣuptau hi pratīyate na aham ātmā ca dus kha ādi saṃsāra ādi samanvayāt

original: vidhūma iva dīptārcirādīpta (ditya)
analyzed: vidhūmaḥ iva dīpta arciḥ ādīpta ditya

original: iva dīptimān / vaidyuto 'gnirivākāśe hṛtsaṅge ātmanātmani //
analyzed: iva dīptimān vaidyutaḥ gniḥ iva ākāśe hṛd saṅge ātmanā ātmani

original: śrotrādīni na paśyanti svaṃsvamātmānamātmanā / sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśo ca kṣetrajñastāni paśyanti //
analyzed: śrotra ādīni na paśyanti svam svam ātmānam ātmanā sarvajñaḥ ca kṣetrajñaḥ tāni paśyanti

original: yadā prakāśate hyātmā paṭe dīpo jvalanniva / jñānamutpadyate puṃsāṃ kṣayātpāpasya karmaṇaḥ //
analyzed: yadā prakāśate hi ātmā paṭe dīpaḥ jvalan iva jñānam utpadyate puṃsām kṣayāt pāpasya karmaṇaḥ

original: yathādarśatalaprakhye paśyatyātmānamātmani / indriyāṇīndriyārthāṃśca mahābhūtāni pañcakam //
analyzed: yathā ādarśa tala prakhye paśyati ātmānam ātmani indriyāṇi indriya arthān ca mahābhūtāni pañcakam

original: manobuddhirahaṅkāramavyaktaṃ puruṣaṃ tathā / prasaṃkhyāya paraṃvyāpto vimukto bandhavairbhavet //
analyzed: manaḥ buddhiḥ ahaṅkāram avyaktam puruṣam tathā prasaṃkhyāya param vyāptaḥ vimuktaḥ bandhavaiḥ bhavet

original: indriyagrāmamakhilaṃ manasābhiniveśya ca / manaścaivāpyahaṅkāre pratiṣṭhāpya ca pāṇḍava //
analyzed: indriya grāmam akhilam manasā abhiniveśya ca manaḥ ca eva api ahaṅkāre pratiṣṭhāpya ca pāṇḍava

original: ahaṃ kāraṃ tathā buddhau buddhiṃ ca prakṛtāvapi / prakṛtiṃ puruṣe sthāpya puruṣaṃ brahmaṇi nyaset //
analyzed: aham kāram tathā buddhau buddhim ca prakṛtau api prakṛtim puruṣe sthāpya puruṣam brahmaṇi nyaset

original: ahaṃ bahma paraṃ jyotiḥ prasaṃkhyāya vimucyate / navadvāramidaṃ gehaṃ tisṛṇāṃ?
analyzed: aham param jyotiḥ prasaṃkhyāya vimucyate nava dvāram idam geham tisṛṇām

original: pañcasākṣikam //
analyzed: pañca sākṣikam

original: kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhitaṃ vidvānyo veda sa varaḥ kaviḥ / aśvamedhasahasrāṇi vājapeyaśatāni ca / jñānayajñasya sarvāṇi kalāṃ nārhanti ṣocśīm //
analyzed: kṣetrajña adhiṣṭhitam vidvān yaḥ veda sa varaḥ kaviḥ aśvamedha sahasrāṇi vājapeya śatāni ca jñāna yajñasya sarvāṇi kalām na arhanti ṣocśīm

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrīmadbhagavadgītāsāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe śrīmadbhagavadgītāsāranirūpaṇam nāma saptatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 238
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / yamaśca niyama.pārtha āsanaṃ prāṇasaṃyamaḥ / pratyāhārastathā dhyānaṃ dhāraṇārjuna saptamī //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca  yamaḥ ca niyama pārthaḥ āsanam prāṇasaṃyamaḥ pratyāhāraḥ tathā dhyānam dhāraṇā arjuna saptamī

original: samādhiriti cāṣṭāṅgo yoga ukto vimuktaye / karmaṇā manasā vācā sarvabhūteṣu sarvadā //
analyzed: samādhiḥ iti ca aṣṭa aṅgaḥ yogaḥ uktaḥ vimuktaye karmaṇā manasā vācā sarva bhūteṣu sarvadā

original: hiṃsāvirāmako dharmo hyāhiṃsā paramaṃ sukham / vidhinā yā bhaveddhiṃsā sā tvahiṃsā prakīrtitā //
analyzed: hiṃsā virāmakaḥ dharmaḥ hi āhiṃsā paramam sukham vidhinā yā bhavet hiṃsā sā tu ahiṃsā prakīrtitā

original: satyaṃ brūyātpriyaṃ brūyānna brūyātsatyamapriyam / priyaṃ ca nānṛtaṃ brūyādeṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ //
analyzed: satyam brūyāt priyam brūyāt na brūyāt satyam apriyam  priyam ca na anṛtam brūyāt eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: yaccadravyāpaharaṇaṃ cauryādvātha balena vā / steyaṃ tasyānācaraṇamasteyaṃ dharmasādhanam //
analyzed: yat ca dravya apaharaṇam cauryāt vā atha balena vā steyam tasya anācaraṇam asteyam dharma sādhanam

original: karmaṇā manasā vācā sarvāvasthāsu sarvadā / sarvatra maithunatyāgaṃ brahmacaryaṃ pracakṣate //
analyzed: karmaṇā manasā vācā sarva avasthāsu sarvadā sarvatra maithuna tyāgam brahmacaryam pracakṣate

original: dravyāṇāmapyanādānamāpatsvapi tathecchayā / aparigrahamityāhustaṃ prayatnena varjayet //
analyzed: dravyāṇām api anādānam āpatsu api tathā icchayā aparigraham iti āhuḥ tam prayatnena varjayet

original: dvidhā śaucaṃ mṛjjalābhyāṃ bāhya bhāvādathāntarāt / yadṛcchālābhatastuṣṭiḥ santoṣaḥ sukhalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: dvidhā śaucam mṛd jalābhyām bāhya bhāvāt atha antarāt yadṛcchā lābhataḥ tuṣṭiḥ santoṣaḥ sukha lakṣaṇam

original: manasaścaindriyāṇāṃ ca aikāgryaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ / śarīraśoṣaṇaṃ vāpi kṛcchracāndrāyaṇādibhiḥ //
analyzed: manasaḥ ca aindriyāṇām ca aikāgryam paramam tapaḥ śarīra śoṣaṇam vā api kṛcchra cāndrāyaṇa ādibhiḥ

original: vedāntaśatarudrīyapraṇavādijapa budhāḥ / sattvaśuddhikaraṃ puṃsāṃ svādhyāyaṃ paricakṣate //
analyzed: budhāḥ sattva śuddhi karam puṃsām svādhyāyam paricakṣate

original: stutismaraṇapūjādivāṅmanaḥ kāyakarmabhiḥ / aniścalā harau bhaktiretadīśvaracintanam / āsanaṃ svastikaṃ proktaṃ padmamardhāsanaṃ tathā //
analyzed: stuti smaraṇa pūjā ādi vāc manaḥ kāya karmabhiḥ aniścalā harau bhaktiḥ etat īśvara cintanam  āsanam svastikam proktam padmam ardhāsanam tathā

original: prāṇaḥ svadehajo vāyurāyāmastannirodhanam / indriyāṇāṃ vicaratāṃ viṣayeṣu tvasatsviva //
analyzed: prāṇaḥ sva deha jaḥ vāyuḥ āyāmaḥ tad nirodhanam indriyāṇām vicaratām viṣayeṣu tu asatsu iva

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 239
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: brahmovāca / brahmagītāṃ pravakṣyāmi yajjñātvā mucyate bhavān / ahaṃbrahmāsmi vākyotthajñānānmokṣo bhavennaṇām //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca brahmagītām pravakṣyāmi yat jñātvā mucyate bhavān  aham brahmā asmi vākya uttha jñānāt mokṣaḥ

original: vākyajñānaṃ bhavejjñānādahaṃbrahma padārthayoḥ / padadvayārthau dvividhau vācyau lakṣyau smatau budhaiḥ //
analyzed: vākya jñānam bhavet jñānāt aham brahma padārthayoḥ  pada dvaya arthau dvividhau vācyau lakṣyau smatau budhaiḥ

original: vākyavācyaśca śabalo lakṣyaḥ śudvaḥ prakīrtitaḥ / prāṇapiṇḍātmakoḥ yanacetasāmatulaṃ na yatu? //
analyzed: vākya vācyaḥ ca śabalaḥ lakṣyaḥ śudvaḥ prakīrtitaḥ na yatu

original: tathā vedairavāgrūpamahaṃśabdena sevyate / pratyagrūnaṃ tvadvitīyamahaṃśabdena manyate //
analyzed: tathā vedaiḥ avāk rūpam aham śabdena sevyate pratyak rūnam tu advitīyam aham śabdena manyate

original: avyayānandacaitanyaṃ parokṣasahitaṃ param / prāṇapiṇḍātmako yotha sa dvitīyavibhāgakaḥ //
analyzed: avyaya ānanda caitanyam parokṣa sahitam param prāṇa piṇḍa ātmakaḥ sa dvitīya vibhāgakaḥ

original: pārokṣyeprekṣaṇo hyatra bhāgo lakṣyeta vāhamā / tathā brahmapadenaiva prāṇapiṇḍātmakāraṇām //
analyzed: hi atra bhāgaḥ lakṣyeta vā ahamā tathā brahma padena eva prāṇa piṇḍa ātma kāraṇām

original: niṣṭhā parokṣatā ceti parityāgena vakṣyate / advayānandacaitanyaṃ pratyagbrahmapadena tu //
analyzed: niṣṭhā parokṣa tā ca iti parityāgena vakṣyate advaya ānanda caitanyam pratyak brahma padena tu

original: advayānandacaitanyaṃ lakṣayitvā sthitasya ca / brahmāhamasmyahaṃ brahma cāhaṃbrahmapadārthayoḥ //
analyzed: advaya ānanda caitanyam lakṣayitvā sthitasya ca brahma aham asmi aham brahma ca aham brahma padārthayoḥ

original: ahaṃbrahmāsmivākyācca svanubhūtiphalārthakam / aikyajñānaṃ tu hi bhavedvedāntāddūrato dhruvam //
analyzed: aham brahma asmi vākyāt ca su anubhūti phala arthakam aikya jñānam tu hi bhavet vedāntāt dūratas dhruvam

original: jñānādajñānakāryasya nivṛttyā muktiraikyataḥ //
analyzed: jñānāt ajñāna kāryasya nivṛttyā muktiḥ aikyataḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe brahmagītāsāravarṇanaṃ nāmaikonacatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśa ākhye ācāra kāṇḍe brahmagītāsāravarṇanam nāma ekonacatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 239
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / sannapi brahma tasmātkhaṃ marutkhācca tato 'nalaḥ //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca san api brahma tasmāt kham marut khāt ca tatas nalaḥ

original: agnerāpastataḥ pṛthvī prapañcākṛtisūtikā / tataḥ saptadaśaṃ liṅgaṃ pañcakarmendriyāṇi ca //
analyzed: agneḥ āpaḥ tatas pṛthvī prapañca ākṛti sūtikā tatas saptadaśam liṅgam pañcakarma indriyāṇi ca

original: vākpāṇipādaṃ pāyuścāpyupasthamatha dhīndriyam / śrotraṃ tvakcakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇaṃ syātpañca vāyavaḥ //
analyzed: vāc pāṇi pādam pāyuḥ ca api upastham atha dhīndriyam  śrotram tvac cakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇam syāt pañca vāyavaḥ

original: prāṇopānaḥ samānaśca vyānastūdāna eva ca / manontaḥ karaṇaṃ dhīśca syānmanaḥ saṃśayātmakam //
analyzed: prāṇa upānaḥ samānaḥ ca vyānaḥ tu udānaḥ eva ca manaḥ antaḥ karaṇam dhīḥ ca syāt manaḥ saṃśaya ātmakam

original: buddhirniścayarūpā tu etatsūkṣmasvarūpakam / hiraṇyagarbhamātmīyasūtraṃ tatkāryāliṅgakam //
analyzed: buddhiḥ niścaya rūpā tu etat sūkṣma svarūpakam hiraṇyagarbham ātmīya sūtram tad kārya āliṅgakam

original: pañcīkṛtāni bhūtāni hyapañcīkṛtabhūtataḥ / pañcīkṛtebhyo bhūtebhyo brahmāṇḍaṃ samajāyata //
analyzed: pañcīkṛtāni bhūtāni hi a pañcīkṛta bhūtataḥ pañcīkṛtebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ brahmāṇḍam samajāyata

original: lokaprasiddhaṃ sthūlākhyaṃ śarīraṃ caraṇādimat / pañcīkṛtāni bhūtāni tatkāryaṃ tatsthameva ca //
analyzed: loka prasiddham sthūla ākhyam śarīram caraṇa ādimat pañcīkṛtāni bhūtāni tat kāryam tad stham eva ca

original: sarvaṃ śarīrajātaṃ ca prāṇināṃ sthūlamīritam / tridhāhri paramātmasthaṃ śarīraṃ procyate budhaiḥ //
analyzed: sarvam śarīra jātam ca prāṇinām sthūlam īritam tridhā ahri paramātma stham śarīram procyate budhaiḥ

original: dehadvayābhigāmī ca tvamatho jīva ekataḥ / svabhedavākyādbrahmaiva praviṣṭaṃ dehayordvayoḥ //
analyzed: deha dvaya abhigāmī ca tvam atho jīvaḥ ekatas sva bheda vākyāt brahma eva praviṣṭam dehayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: jalārkvavadvadaravajjīvaḥ prāṇādidhāraṇaḥ / jāgratsvapnasuṣuptīnāṃ sākṣī jīvaḥ sa ca smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: jala arkva vat vadara vat jīvaḥ prāṇa ādi dhāraṇaḥ jāgrat svapna suṣuptīnām sākṣī jīvaḥ sa ca smṛtaḥ

original: jāgratsvapnasuṣuptyākhyairvyātiriktaśca nirguṇaḥ / nirgātāvayavosaṃgo nityaśuddhasvabhāvakaḥ //
analyzed: jāgrat svapna suṣupti ākhyaiḥ vyātiriktaḥ ca nirguṇaḥ nitya śuddha svabhāvakaḥ

original: paramātmaiva yajjāgratsvapnādyairyastridhā mataḥ / antaḥ karaṇarāśeścaivāntaḥ karaṇaḥsthitaḥ //
analyzed: paramātmā eva yat jāgrat svapna ādyaiḥ yaḥ tridhā mataḥ antar karaṇa rāśeḥ ca eva antar karaṇaḥ sthitaḥ

original: jāgratsvapnasuṣuptīśca paśyato vikṛtiḥ sadā / phalakriyākārakayorjāgradādīnvadāmyaham //
analyzed: jāgrat svapna suṣuptīḥ ca paśyataḥ vikṛtiḥ sadā phala kriyā kārakayoḥ jāgrat ādīn vadāmi aham

original: indriyairatha vijñānaṃ jāgratsthānamudīritam / jāgratsaṃskārasaṃbhūtapratyayo viṣayārthinaḥ //
analyzed: indriyaiḥ atha vijñānam jāgrat sthānam udīritam jāgrat saṃskāra saṃbhūta pratyayaḥ viṣaya arthinaḥ

original: svapnaṃ suṣuptiḥ karaṇopasaṃghāte dhiyaḥ (pa) sthita (ti) / brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇāvasthāyāṃ sthitiḥ kālakātmanā //
analyzed: svapnam suṣuptiḥ karaṇa upasaṃghāte dhiyaḥ brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇa avasthāyām sthitiḥ kālaka ātmanā

original: kramatokramato jīvo jāgradādi sa paśyati / samādhyāraṃbhakāle tu pūrvamevāvadhārayet //
analyzed: kramatas kramatas jīvaḥ jāgrat ādi sa paśyati samādhi āraṃbha kāle tu pūrvam eva avadhārayet

original: mumukṣāvatha saṃjāte antaḥ karaṇakevale / vilāpayetkṣetrajātaṃ tatkṣetraṃ pariśeṣayet //
analyzed: mumukṣau atha saṃjāte antar karaṇa kevale vilāpayet kṣetra jātam tat kṣetram pariśeṣayet

original: pañcīkṛtebhyo bhūtebhyo bhāṇḍādi vyatiriktakam / yathā mṛdo ghaṭo bhinno nāsti tatkāryatastathā //
analyzed: pañcīkṛtebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ bhāṇḍa ādi vyatiriktakam yathā mṛdaḥ ghaṭaḥ bhinnaḥ na asti tad kāryataḥ tathā

original: pañcīkṛtāni bhūtāni apañcīkṛtabhūtataḥ / śaṃsaṃti vyatirekeṇa śiṣṭāḥ sūkṣmaśarīrakam //
analyzed: pañcīkṛtāni bhūtāni a pañcīkṛta bhūtataḥ śaṃsaṃti vyatirekeṇa śiṣṭāḥ sūkṣmaśarīrakam

original: apañcīkṛtabhūtebhyo na liṅgaṃ vyatiriktakam / pṛthvyādhāraṃ vinā nāsti vinā nāsti ca tena sā //
analyzed: a pañcīkṛta bhūtebhyaḥ na liṅgam vyatiriktakam pṛthvī ādhāram vinā nā asti vinā nā asti ca tena sā

original: tejaśca vāyunā nāsti vāyuḥ khena vinā na hi / yadbrahmaṇā ca khaṃ nāsti śuddha brahma vinā ca kham //
analyzed: tejaḥ ca vāyunā na asti vāyuḥ khena vinā na hi yat brahmaṇā ca kham na asti śuddha brahma vinā ca kham

original: śuddhabhāvastadā jāgratsvapnādīnāmasaṃbhavaḥ / jīvatvavarjitaḥ prāptātmacaitanyānurūpataḥ //
analyzed: śuddha bhāvaḥ tadā jāgrat svapna ādīnām asaṃbhavaḥ jīva tva varjitaḥ prāpta ātma caitanya anurūpataḥ

original: nityaṃ śuddhaṃ buddhamuktaṃ satyaṃ brahmādvitīyakam / tattvaṃpadāntau śiṣṭau ca tatkāro brahmavācakaḥ //
analyzed: nityam śuddham buddham uktam satyam brahma advitīyakam tattvam pada antau śiṣṭau ca tad kāraḥ brahma vācakaḥ

original: ukāraśca akāraśca makāroyamṛgadvayaḥ / brahmāhamasmyahaṃ brahmajñānamajñānavardhanam //
analyzed: ukāraḥ ca akāraḥ ca makāraḥ yad ṛga dvayaḥ brahma aham asmi aham brahma jñānam ajñāna vardhanam

original: ayamātmā paraṃ jyotiścinnāmānandarūpakaḥ / satyaṃ jñānamanataṃ hi tvamasīti śrutīritam //
analyzed: ayam ātmā param jyotiḥ cit nāma ānanda rūpakaḥ satyam jñānam anatam hi tvam asi iti śruti īritam

original: ahaṃ brahmāsmi nirlepamahaṃ brahmāsmi sarvagam / yosāvādityapuruṣasosāvahamanādimat / gītāsāror'junāyokto yena brahmaṇi vai layaḥ //
analyzed: aham brahma asmi nirlepam aham brahma asmi sarvagam  yaḥ usau āditya puruṣa saḥ usau aham anādimat  gītā sāraḥ ūrjunāya uktaḥ yena brahmaṇi vai layaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe brahmagītāsāro nāmekonacatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathama aṃśe ācāra kāṇḍe brahmagītāsāraḥ nāma ekonacatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 240
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: hariruvāca / purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ rudra proktaṃ sāraṃ mayātava / brahmādīnāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ ca bhuktimuktipradāyakam //
analyzed: hariḥ uvāca purāṇam gāruḍam rudra proktam sāram mayā atava  brahma ādīnām śṛṇvatām ca bhukti mukti pradāyakam

original: vidyākīrtiprabhālakṣmījayārogyādikārakam / yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādrudra sarvavitsa divaṃ vrajet //
analyzed: vidyā kīrti prabhā alakṣmī jaya ārogya ādi kārakam yaḥ paṭhet śṛṇuyāt rudra sarva vid sa divam vrajet

original: brahmovāca / iti vyāsa mayā viṣṇoḥ purāṇaṃ muktidaṃ śrutam / vyāsa uvāca / śrutvaitadgāruḍaṃ puṇyaṃ brahmāsmānityuvāca ha //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca iti vyāsa mayā viṣṇoḥ purāṇam mukti dam śrutam  vyāsaḥ uvāca śrutvā etat gāruḍam puṇyam brahmā asmān iti uvāca ha

original: dakṣanārada mukhyādin brahma dhyānhariṃ gataḥ / mayāpi tubhyaṃ sūtena purāṇaṃ kathitaṃ param //
analyzed: dakṣa nārada mukhya ādin brahma dhyān harim gataḥ mayā api tubhyam sūtena purāṇam kathitam param

original: yacchrutvā sarvavitprāptakāmo brahma phalaṃ bhavet / viṣṇuḥ sāratamaṃprāha garuḍaṃ gāruḍaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: yat śrutvā sarva vid prāpta kāmaḥ brahma phalam bhavet viṣṇuḥ sāratamam prāha garuḍam gāruḍam tatas

original: mahāsāraṃ dharmakāmadhanamokṣādidāyakam / sūta uvāca / śaunaka pravaraṃ proktaṃ purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava //
analyzed: mahā sāram dharma kāma dhana mokṣa ādi dāyakam sūtaḥ uvāca śaunaka pravaram proktam purāṇam gāruḍam tava

original: yadabravītpurā vyāsaḥ sāraṃ māṃ gāruḍeritam / vyāsaḥ śrutvā brahmaṇaśca purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ śubham / devaṃ dhyāyanvedamekaṃ caturdhā vyabhajaddhariḥ //
analyzed: yat abravīt purā vyāsaḥ sāram mām gāruḍa īritam  vyāsaḥ śrutvā brahmaṇaḥ ca purāṇam gāruḍam śubham  devam dhyāyan vedam ekam caturdhā vyabhajat hariḥ

original: aṣṭādaśapurāṇāni tāni māṃ prāha vai śukaḥ / idaṃ tu gāruḍaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mayā te śaunakeritam //
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa purāṇāni tāni mām prāha vai śukaḥ idam tu gāruḍam śreṣṭham mayā te śaunaka īritam

original: munīnāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ madhye pṛcchataḥ sarvavācakam / yaḥ paṭhecchaṇuyādvāpi śrāvayedvā samāhitaḥ //
analyzed: munīnām śṛṇvatām madhye pṛcchataḥ sarva vācakam  yaḥ paṭhet śaṇuyāt vā api śrāvayet vā samāhitaḥ

original: saṃlikhellekhayedvāpi dhārayetpustake nanu / dharmārtho prāpnuyāddharmarthārtho cārthamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: saṃlikhet lekhayet vā api dhārayet pustake nanu

original: kāmā navāpnuyātkāmī mokṣārtho mokṣamāpnuyāt / yadyadicchati tatsarvaṃ gāruḍaśravaṇāllabhet //
analyzed: kāmāḥ na vāpnuyāt kāmī mokṣa arthaḥ mokṣam āpnuyāt yat yat icchati tat sarvam gāruḍa śravaṇāt labhet

original: brāhmaṇo vedapārasya gantā syānnātra saṃśayaḥ / kṣattriyo kṣattriyasyāpi rakṣitā bhavatīha ca //
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ vedapārasya gantā syāt na atra saṃśayaḥ kṣattriyaḥ kṣattriyasya api rakṣitā bhavati iha ca

original: nānyasya śravaṇaṃ hi syātpurāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam / vadedyadi sa mūḍhātmā kīrtihānimavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: na anyasya śravaṇam hi syāt purāṇam veda saṃmitam  vadet yadi sa mūḍha ātmā kīrti hānim avāpnuyāt

original: anyasmai ca vadedvidvān brāhmaṇontarito ya di / brāhmaṇāntaritai sarvaiḥ śrotavyaṃ gāruḍaṃ tvidama //
analyzed: anyasmai ca vadet vidvān sarvaiḥ śrotavyam gāruḍam tu idam

original: yathā viṣṇustathā tārkṣyastārkṣyastotrāddhariḥ stutaḥ / gāruḍaṃ vasurājaśca śrutvā sarvamavāpa ha //
analyzed: yathā viṣṇuḥ tathā tārkṣyaḥ tārkṣya stotrāt hariḥ stutaḥ gāruḍam vasu rājaḥ ca śrutvā sarvam avāpa ha

original: varuruvāca / namasyāmi mahābāhuṃ khagedra harivāhanam / viṣṇordhvasaṃsthānaṃ vitrāsitamahāsuram //
analyzed: varuḥ uvāca namasyāmi mahā bāhum khagedra harivāhanam viṣṇu ūrdhva saṃsthānam vitrāsita mahā asuram

original: namaste nāgadarpaghna vinatānandavardhana / supakṣapāta niddabha dīnadaityanirīkṣita //
analyzed: namaḥ te nāga darpa ghna vinatā ānanda vardhana su pakṣapāta niddabha dīna daitya nirīkṣita

original: parasparasya śāpena supratīkavibhāvasū / gajakacchapatāṃ prāptau bhrātaraucaiva saṃyutau //
analyzed: parasparasya śāpena supratīka vibhāvasū gaja kacchapatām prāptau bhrātarau ca eva saṃyutau

original: yaducchritau yojanāni jastaddviguṇāyataḥ / kūrmastriyojanotsodhā śatayojanavamaḍalaḥ //
analyzed: yad ucchritau yojanāni jaḥ tad dviguṇa āyataḥ kūrmaḥ tri yojana utsodhā śata yojana vama ḍalaḥ

original: na khādyau tau tvayānīcau caturbhujau ca pakṣipa? / parasparakṛtācchāpadoṣācca parimocitau //
analyzed: na khādyau tau tvayā anīcau catur bhujau ca pakṣipa paraspara kṛtāt śāpa doṣāt ca parimocitau

original: niṣādadeśasvādena devaṃ brūsmāniditam? / viṣādīśastato muktastatrāpi brāhmaṇastvayā //
analyzed: niṣāda deśa svādena devam viṣādīśaḥ tatas muktaḥ tatra api brāhmaṇaḥ tvayā

original: vaṭārohiṇavṛkṣasya yojanānāṃ śatāyutā / śākhā bhinnā tvayā yatra vālakhilyāḥ samāsthitāḥ //
analyzed: vaṭārohiṇa vṛkṣasya yojanānām śata āyu tā śākhā bhinnā tvayā yatra vālakhilyāḥ samāsthitāḥ

original: tvayā yatnakṛtā kṛtvānakhasthau gajakacchapau / nabhaspapinirālaṃbe sarvataḥ parivāritau //
analyzed: tvayā yatna kṛtā kṛtvā nakha sthau gaja kacchapau nabhaspapi nirālaṃbe sarvatas parivāritau

original: tvayā jitā raṇe devāḥ sarve śakrapurogamāḥ / āhṛtaṃ tatpurā somaṃ vāhniṃ nirvāpya kāśyape //
analyzed: tvayā jitāḥ raṇe devāḥ sarve śakra purogamāḥ āhṛtam tat purā somam vā ahnim nirvāpya kāśyape

original: nāgau dṛṣṭiviṣau kṛtvā rajasā tu vicakṣuṣau / tīkṣṇāgreṇa na sā bhaṅktvāvikravetau manohataḥ? //
analyzed: nāgau dṛṣṭiviṣau kṛtvā rajasā tu vicakṣuṣau tīkṣṇa agreṇa na sā manohataḥ

original: āhṛtyāpi tvayā somaṃ nītameva na bhaktitaḥ / tena viṣṇordhvajasthānaṃ vāhanatvaṃ gato hyasi //
analyzed: āhṛtya api tvayā somam nītam eva na bhaktitaḥ tena viṣṇoḥ dhvaja sthānam vāhana tvam gataḥ hi asi

original: tvayā niḥ kṣipya darbheṣu somaṃ nāgāśca vañcitāḥ / jahāra cāmṛtaṃ pātraṃ śīghraṃ vai brahmasūdana //
analyzed: tvayā niḥ kṣipya darbheṣu somam nāgāḥ ca vañcitāḥ jahāra ca amṛtam pātram śīghram vai brahmasūdana

original: yatra jihvādvidhābhūtāḥ pannagānāṃ dvijottama / vinatā mocitā dāsyātkadvā pūrvajitā raṇe //
analyzed: yatra jihvā dvidhā bhūtāḥ pannagānām dvijottama vinatā mocitā dāsyāt kad vā pūrva jitā raṇe

original: uccaiḥ śravāḥ sa kiṃvarṇaḥ śukla ityeva bhāṣate / kṛṣṇavarṇamahaṃ manye pūrvadṛṣṭamuvāca ha //
analyzed: uccais śravāḥ sa kiṃvarṇaḥ śuklaḥ iti eva bhāṣate kṛṣṇa varṇam aham manye pūrva dṛṣṭam uvāca ha

original: tvayā vajrapahāreṇa pakṣamuktaṃ purā svataḥ? / dadhīcavajraśakrāṇāṃ māturarthāya nānyathā //
analyzed: tvayā vajra apahāreṇa pakṣam uktam purā svatas dadhīca vajra śakrāṇām mātuḥ arthāya nā anyathā

original: tasya pakṣasya devendro yadānītaṃ hi dṛṣṭavān / tadā tava suparṇoti nāma sthānaṃ jagattraye //
analyzed: tasya pakṣasya deva indraḥ yadā ānītam hi dṛṣṭavān tadā tava nāma sthānam jagattraye

original: dhyānamātrādvinaśyettu viṣaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam / paṭhedvā śṛṇuyādyaśca bhuktiṃ muktimavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: dhyāna mātrāt vinaśyet tu viṣam sthāvara jaṅgamam paṭhet vā śṛṇuyāt yaḥ ca bhuktim muktim avāpnuyāt

original: sūta uvāca / vasurājo gāruḍaṃ vai śrutvā sarvamavāptavān / garuḍo bhagavānviṣṇudhyāṃyansarvavāptavān //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca vasu rājaḥ gāruḍam vai śrutvā sarvam avāptavān garuḍaḥ bhagavān viṣṇu dhyāṃyan sarva avāptavān

original: taduktaṃ gāruḍaṃ puṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ yaḥ paṭhennaraḥ / sarvakāmamavāpyātha prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim //
analyzed: tat uktam gāruḍam puṇyam purāṇam yaḥ paṭhet naraḥ sarva kāmam avāpya atha prāpnoti paramām gatim

original: ślokapādaṃ paṭhitvā ca sarvapāpakṣayo bhavet / yasyedaṃ vartate geha tasya sarvaṃ bhavediha //
analyzed: śloka pādam paṭhitvā ca sarva pāpa kṣayaḥ bhavet yasya idam vartate tasya sarvam bhavet iha

original: gāruḍaṃ yasya haste tu tasya hastagato nayaḥ / yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādetadbhuktiṃ muktiṃ samāpnuyāt //
analyzed: gāruḍam yasya haste tu tasya hasta gataḥ nayaḥ yaḥ paṭhet śṛṇuyāt etat bhuktim muktim samāpnuyāt

original: dharmārthakāmamokṣāṃśca prāpnuyācchravaṇāditaḥ / putrārtho labhate putrān kāmārtho kāmamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: dharma artha kāma mokṣān ca prāpnuyāt śravaṇa āditas putra arthaḥ labhate putrān kāma arthaḥ kāmam āpnuyāt

original: vidyārtho labhate vidyāṃ jayārtho labhate jayam / brahmahatyādinā pāpī pāpaśuddhimavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: vidyā arthaḥ labhate vidyām jaya arthaḥ labhate jayam brahmahatyā ādinā pāpī pāpa śuddhim avāpnuyāt

original: vandhyāpi labhate puttraṃ kanyā vindati satpatim / kṣemārtho labhate kṣemaṃ bogārtho bogamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: vandhyā api labhate puttram kanyā vindati sat patim kṣema arthaḥ labhate kṣemam boga arthaḥ bogam āpnuyāt

original: maṅgalārtho maṅgalāni guṇārtho guṇamāpnuyāt / kāvyārtho ca kavitvaṃ ca sārārtho sāramāpnuyāt //
analyzed: maṅgala arthaḥ maṅgalāni guṇa arthaḥ guṇam āpnuyāt  ca kavi tvam ca sāra arthaḥ sāram āpnuyāt

original: jñānārtho labhate jñānaṃ sarvasaṃsāramardanam / idaṃ svastyayanaṃ dhanyaṃ gāruḍaṃ garuḍeritam //
analyzed: jñāna arthaḥ labhate jñānam sarva saṃsāra mardanam idam svastyayanam dhanyam gāruḍam garuḍa īritam

original: nākāle maraṇaṃ tasya ślokamekaṃ tu yaḥ paṭhet / ślokārdhapaṭhanādasya duṣṭaśatrukṣayo dhruvam //
analyzed: na akāle maraṇam tasya ślokam ekam tu yaḥ paṭhet śloka ardha paṭhanāt asya duṣṭa śatru kṣayaḥ dhruvam

original: sūtācchrutvā śaunakastunaumiṣe munibhiḥ kratau / ahaṃ braheti saṃdhyāyanmuktobhūdgaruḍadhvajāt //
analyzed: sūtāt śrutvā munibhiḥ kratau aham brahā iti saṃdhyāyan muktaḥ bhūt garuḍadhvajāt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe garuḍapurāṇamāhātmyaṃ nāma catvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrva khaṇḍe prathama aṃśe ācāra kāṇḍe garuḍapurāṇamāhātmyam nāma catvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śubhaṃ bhūyāt / iti śrīgāruḍe prathamāṃśa ācārakāṇḍaḥ samāptaḥ / śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam
analyzed: śubham bhūyāt iti śrī gāruḍe prathama aṃśe ācāra kāṇḍaḥ samāptaḥ śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ / tatrādime dvitīyāṃśe pretakāṇḍo dharmakāṇḍanāmārabhyate / oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya / nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam / devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayamudīrayet //
analyzed: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ tatra ādime dvitīya aṃśe pretakāṇḍaḥ dharma kāṇḍa nāmā ārabhyate  om namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam devīm sarasvatīm ca eva tatas jayam udīrayet

original: dharmandṛḍhabaddhamūlo vedaskandhaḥ purāṇaśākhāḍhyaḥ / kratukusumo mokṣaphalo madhusūdanapādapo jayati //
analyzed: dharman dṛḍha baddha mūlaḥ veda skandhaḥ purāṇa śākhā āḍhyaḥ kratu kusumaḥ mokṣa phalaḥ madhusūdana pādapaḥ jayati

original: naimiṣe 'nimiṣakṣetre śaunakādyā munīśvarāḥ / karmaṇāmantare sūtaṃ svāsīnamidamabruvan //
analyzed: naimiṣe nimiṣa kṣetre śaunaka ādyāḥ muni īśvarāḥ karmaṇām antare sūtam su āsīnam idam abruvan

original: sūta jānāsi sakalaṃ vastu vyāsaprasādataḥ / tena naḥ sandihānānāṃ sandehaṃ chettumarhasi //
analyzed: sūta jānāsi sakalam vastu vyāsa prasādataḥ tena naḥ sandihānānām sandeham chettum arhasi

original: yathā tṛṇajalauketi nyāyamā śritya kañcana / dehino 'nyatanuprāptiṃ kecittvevaṃ vadanti hi //
analyzed: yathā tṛṇajalaukā iti nyāyam ā śritya kañcana dehinaḥ kecid tu evam vadanti hi

original: kecitpunaryātanānāṃ yāmīnāmupabhogataḥ / paścāddehāntaraprāptiṃ vadanti kimu tatrasat //
analyzed: kecid punar yātanānām yāmīnām upabhogataḥ paścāt deha antara prāptim vadanti kimu tatra sat

original: sūta uvāca / sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahābhāgāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ bhavatāṃ punaḥ / sandeho nopapadyeta lokārthaṃ kila pṛcchatām //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca sādhu pṛṣṭam mahābhāgāḥ śṛṇudhvam bhavatām punar sandehaḥ na upapadyeta loka artham kila pṛcchatām

original: tadahaṃ kṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvādadvārakaṃ dvijāḥ / apākariṣye sandehaṃ bhavatāṃ bhāvitātmanām //
analyzed: tat aham kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāda dvārakam dvijāḥ apākariṣye sandeham bhavatām bhāvitātmanām

original: namaḥ kṛṣṇāya munaye ya enaṃ samupāśritāḥ / añjastaranti saṃsārasāgaraṃ kunadīmiva //
analyzed: namaḥ kṛṣṇāya munaye ye enam samupāśritāḥ añjas taranti saṃsāra sāgaram ku nadīm iva

original: ekadā vainateyasya lokānāṃ lokanaspṛhā / babhūva so 'tha babhrāma teṣu nāma harergṛṇan //
analyzed: ekadā vainateyasya lokānām lokana spṛhā babhūva babhrāma teṣu nāma hareḥ gṛṇan

original: sa pātālaṃ bhuvaṃ svargaṃ bhrāntvālabdhaśamāśayaḥ / lokaduḥ khenātiduḥ khī punarvaikuṇṭhamāgamat //
analyzed: sa pātālam bhuvam svargam bhrāntvā a labdha śama āśayaḥ loka duḥ khena ati duḥ khī punar vaikuṇṭham āgamat

original: na rajo na tamaścaiva sattvaṃ tābhyāṃ ca miśritam / yatra pravartate naiva sattvameva pravartate //
analyzed: na rajaḥ na tamaḥ ca eva sattvam tābhyām ca miśritam yatra pravartate na eva sattvam eva pravartate

original: na yatra māyā nāśaśca na cai rāgādayo malāḥ / śyāmāvadātāḥ surucaḥ śatapatravilocanāḥ //
analyzed: na yatra māyā nāśaḥ ca na rāga ādayaḥ malāḥ śyāma avadātāḥ su rucaḥ śatapatra vilocanāḥ

original: surāsurārcitā yatra gaṇā viṣṇoḥ supeśasaḥ / piśaṅgavastrābhāraṇā maṇiyuṅniṣkabhūṣitāḥ //
analyzed: sura asura arcitāḥ yatra gaṇāḥ viṣṇoḥ supeśasaḥ piśaṅga vastra ābhāraṇāḥ maṇi yuj niṣka bhūṣitāḥ

original: caturbhujāḥ kuṇḍalino maulino mālinastathā / bhrājiṣṇubhirvimānānāṃ paṅkibhirye mahātmanām //
analyzed: catur bhujāḥ kuṇḍalinaḥ maulinaḥ mālinaḥ tathā bhrājiṣṇubhiḥ vimānānām paṅkibhiḥ ye mahātmanām

original: dyotante dyotamānānāṃ pramadānāṃ ca paṅktibhiḥ / śrīryatra nānāvibhavairhareḥ pādau mudārcati //
analyzed: dyotante dyotamānānām pramadānām ca paṅktibhiḥ  śrīḥ yatra nānā vibhavaiḥ hareḥ pādau mudā arcati

original: hariṃ gāyati dolāsthaṃ gīyamānālibhiḥ svayam / dadarśa śrīhariṃ tatra śrīpatiṃ sātvatāṃ patim //
analyzed: harim gāyati dolā stham gīyamāna ālibhiḥ svayam  dadarśa śrī harim tatra śrīpatim sātvatām patim

original: jagatpatiṃ yajñapatiṃ pārṣadaiḥ pariṣevitam / sunandanandaprabalārhaṇamukhyairnirantaram //
analyzed: jagatpatim yajñapatim pārṣadaiḥ pariṣevitam sunanda nanda prabala arhaṇa mukhyaiḥ nirantaram

original: bhṛtyaprasādasumukhamāyatāruṇalocanam / kirīṭinaṃ kuṇḍalinaṃ śriyā vakṣasi lakṣitam //
analyzed: bhṛtya prasāda su mukham āyata aruṇa locanam kirīṭinam kuṇḍalinam śriyā vakṣasi lakṣitam

original: pītāṃśukaṃ caturbāhuṃ prasannahasitānanam / abhyarhaṇāsanāsīnaṃ tābhiḥ śaktibhirāvṛtam //
analyzed: pīta aṃśukam catur bāhum prasanna hasita ānanam abhyarhaṇa āsana āsīnam tābhiḥ śaktibhiḥ āvṛtam

original: pradhānapuruṣābhyāṃ ca mahatā cāhamā tathā / ekādaśondriyaiścaiva pañcabhūtaistathaiva ca //
analyzed: pradhāna puruṣābhyām ca mahatā ca ahamā tathā ekādaśa indriyaiḥ ca eva pañcabhūtaiḥ tathā eva ca

original: svarūperamamāṇaṃ tamīśvaraṃ vinatāsutaḥ / taddarśanāhlādayutasvānto hṛṣyattanūruhaḥ //
analyzed: tam īśvaram vinatā sutaḥ tad darśana āhlāda yuta svāntaḥ hṛṣyat tanūruhaḥ

original: locanābhyāmaśru muñcanpremamagno nanāma ha / namāgataṃ nataṃ svīya vāhanaṃ viṣṇurabravīt / bhūmiḥ kā laṅghitā pakṣiṃstvayeyantamanehasam //
analyzed: locanābhyām aśru muñcan prema magnaḥ nanāma ha  nama āgatam natam svīya vāhanam viṣṇuḥ abravīt bhūmiḥ kā laṅghitā pakṣin tvayā iyantam anehasam  /

original: garuḍa uvāca / tava prasādādvaikuṇṭha trailokyaṃ sacarācaram //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca tava prasādāt vaikuṇṭha trailokyam sacarācaram

original: mayā vilokitaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsthāvarajaṅgamam / bhūrlokātsatyaparyantaṃ puraṃ yāmyaṃ vinā prabho //
analyzed: mayā vilokitam sarvam jagat sthāvara jaṅgamam bhūrlokāt satya paryantam puram yāmyam vinā prabho

original: bhūrlokaḥ sarvalokānāṃ pracuraḥ sarvajantuṣu / mānuṣyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ bhuktimuktyālayaṃ śubham //
analyzed: bhūḥ lokaḥ sarva lokānām pracuraḥ sarva jantuṣu mānuṣyam sarva bhūtānām bhukti mukti ālayam śubham

original: ataḥ sukṛtināṃ loko na bhūto na bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: atas su kṛtinām lokaḥ na bhūtaḥ na bhaviṣyati

original: gāyanti devāḥ kila gītakāni dhanyāstu ye bhāratabhūmibhāge / svargāpavargasya phalārjanāya bhavanti bhūyaḥ puruṣāḥ suratvāt //
analyzed: gāyanti devāḥ kila gītakāni dhanyāḥ tu ye bhārata bhūmi bhāge svarga apavargasya phala arjanāya bhavanti bhūyas puruṣāḥ sura tvāt

original: pretaḥ kaukṣipyate kasmātpañcaratnaṃ mukhe katham / adhastāccālitā darbhāḥ pādau yāmyāṃ vyavasthitau //
analyzed: pretaḥ kasmāt pañcaratnam mukhe katham adhastāt cālitāḥ darbhāḥ pādau yāmyām vyavasthitau

original: kimarthaṃ putrapautrāśca tasya tiṣṭhanti cāgrataḥ / kimarthaṃ dīyate dānaṃ godānamapi keśava //
analyzed: kimartham putra pautrāḥ ca tasya tiṣṭhanti ca agratas kimartham dīyate dānam go dānam api keśava

original: bandhumitrāṇyamitrāśca kṣamāpayanti tatkatham / tilālohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca karpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā //
analyzed: bandhu mitrāṇi amitrāḥ ca kṣamāpayanti tat katham tilāloham hiraṇyam ca karpāsam lavaṇam tathā

original: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāvo dīyante kenahetunā / kathaṃ hi mriyate janturmṛto vai kutra gacchati //
analyzed: saptadhānyam kṣitiḥ gāvaḥ dīyante kena hetunā katham hi mriyate jantuḥ mṛtaḥ vai kutra gacchati

original: ativāhaśarīraṃ ca kathaṃ hi śrayate tadā / śavaṃ skandhe vahetputro agnidātā ca pautrakaḥ //
analyzed: ativāha śarīram ca katham hi śrayate tadā śavam skandhe vahet putraḥ agni dātā ca pautrakaḥ

original: ājyenābhyañjanaṃ kasmātkuta ekāhutikriyā / vasundharā kimarthaṃ ca kutaḥ strīśabdakīrtanam //
analyzed: ājyena abhyañjanam kasmāt kutas eka āhuti kriyā vasundharā kimartham ca kutas strī śabda kīrtanam

original: yamasūktaṃ kimarthaṃ ca udīcyā diśamāharet / pānīyamekavastreṇa sūryabimbanirīkṣaṇam //
analyzed: yama sūktam kimartham ca udīcyāḥ diśam āharet pānīyam eka vastreṇa sūrya bimba nirīkṣaṇam

original: yavasarṣapadūrvāstu pāṣāṇe nimbapatrakam / vastraṃ naraśca nārī ca vidadhyādadharottaram //
analyzed: yava sarṣapa dūrvāḥ tu pāṣāṇe nimba patrakam vastram naraḥ ca nārī ca vidadhyāt adhara uttaram

original: annādyaṃ gṛhamāgatya na bhoktavyaṃ janaiḥ saha / navakāṃścaiva piṇḍāṃśca kimarthaṃ dadate sutāḥ //
analyzed: annādyam gṛham āgatya na bhoktavyam janaiḥ saha navakān ca eva piṇḍān ca kimartham dadate sutāḥ

original: kimarthaṃ catvare dugdhaṃ yātre pakve ca mṛnmaye / kāṣṭhatrayaṃ gaṇābaddhaṃ kṛtvā rātrau catuṣpathe //
analyzed: kimartham catvare dugdham yātre pakve ca mṛd maye kāṣṭha trayam gaṇa ābaddham kṛtvā rātrau catuṣpathe

original: niśāyāṃ dīyate dīpo yāvadabdaṃ dinedina / dāhodakaṃ kimarthaṃ ca kimarthaṃ ca janaiḥ saha //
analyzed: niśāyām dīyate dīpaḥ yāvat abdam dinedina dāha udakam kimartham ca kimartham ca janaiḥ saha

original: bhagavannāti vāhaśca nava piṇḍāḥ pradāpayet / kathaṃ deyaṃ pitṛbhyaśca vāhasyāvāhanaṃ katham //
analyzed: bhagavan na ati vāhaḥ ca nava piṇḍāḥ pradāpayet katham deyam pitṛbhyaḥ ca vāhasya āvāhanam katham

original: idañcetkriyate deva kasmātpiṇḍaṃ pradāpayet / kiṃ tatpradīyate tasya piṇḍadānādyanantaram //
analyzed: idam ced kriyate deva kasmāt piṇḍam pradāpayet  kim tat pradīyate tasya piṇḍa dāna ādi anantaram

original: asthisañcayanaṃ caiva ghaṭasphoṭaṃ tathaiva ca / dvitīye 'hni kutaḥ snānaṃ caturthe sāgnike dvije //
analyzed: asthisañcayanam ca eva ghaṭasphoṭam tathā eva ca dvitīye hni kutas snānam caturthe sa agnike dvije

original: daśame kiṃ malasnānaṃ kāryaṃ sarvajanaiḥ saha / kasmāttailodvartanaṃ ca skandhavāhagṛhaṃ nayet //
analyzed: daśame kim mala snānam kāryam sarva janaiḥ saha kasmāt taila udvartanam ca skandhavāha gṛham nayet

original: tailodvartanakaṃ cāpi dadhuḥ sthūlajalāśaye / daśame 'hani yatpiṇḍaṃ taddadyā dāmiṣeṇa tu //
analyzed: taila udvartanakam ca api sthūla jalāśaye daśame hani yat piṇḍam tat dadyāḥ dāmiṣeṇa tu

original: piṇāñcaikādaśe kasmādvṛṣotsargādipūrvakam / bhājanopānahau cchatraṃ vāsāṃsi tvaṅgulīyakam //
analyzed: kasmāt vṛṣotsarga ādi pūrvakam bhājana upānahau chatram vāsāṃsi tu aṅgulīyakam

original: trayodaśe 'hni deyaṃ syātpadadānaṃ kimarthakam / śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśaitāni abdaṃ yāvatkuto ghaṭaḥ //
analyzed: trayodaśe hni deyam syāt pada dānam kimarthakam  śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa etāni abdam yāvat kutas ghaṭaḥ

original: annādyenodakenaiva ṣaṣṭyādhikaśatatrayam / dinedine ca dātavyaṃ ghaṭānnaṃ pretatṛptaye //
analyzed: annādyena udakena eva ṣaṣṭyā adhika śata trayam dine dine ca dātavyam ghaṭa annam preta tṛptaye

original: prāpte kāle vai mriyate anityā mānavāḥ prabho //
analyzed: prāpte kāle vai mriyate anityāḥ mānavāḥ prabho

original: chidraṃ tu naiva paśyāmi kuto jīvaḥ sa nirgataḥ / kuto gacchanti bhūtāni pṛthivyāpo manastathā / tejo vadasva me nātha vāyurākāśameva ca //
analyzed: chidram tu nā eva paśyāmi kutas jīvaḥ sa nirgataḥ kutas gacchanti bhūtāni pṛthivī apaḥ manaḥ tathā  tejaḥ vadasva me nātha vāyuḥ ākāśam eva ca

original: kutaḥ karmendriyāṇīha pañcabuddhīndriyāṇi ca / vāyavaścaiva pañcaite kathaṃ gacchanti cātyayam //
analyzed: kutas karmendriyāṇi iha pañca buddhīndriyāṇi ca  vāyavaḥ ca eva pañca ete katham gacchanti ca atyayam

original: lobhamohādayaḥ pañca śarīre caiva taskarāḥ / tṛṣṇā kāmo hyahaṅkāraḥ kuto yānti janārdanā //
analyzed: lobha moha ādayaḥ pañca śarīre ca eva taskarāḥ tṛṣṇā kāmaḥ hi ahaṅkāraḥ kutas yānti janārdanā

original: puṇyaṃ vāpyathavāpuṇyaṃ yatkiñcitsukṛtaṃ tathā / naṣṭe dehe kuto yānti dānāni vividhāni ca //
analyzed: puṇyam vā api athavā apuṇyam yat kiñcid sukṛtam tathā naṣṭe dehe kutas yānti dānāni vividhāni ca

original: sapiṇḍanaṃ kimarthaṃ ca pūrṇe saṃvatsare 'pi vā / pretasya melanaṃ keṣāṃ kiṃvidhaṃ tatra kārayet //
analyzed: sapiṇḍanam kimartham ca pūrṇe saṃvatsare vā pretasya melanam keṣām kiṃvidham tatra kārayet

original: mūrchanātpananādvāpi vipattiryadi jāyate / ye dagdhā ye tvadagdhāśca patitā ye narā bhuvi //
analyzed: mūrchanāt pananāt vā api vipattiḥ yadi jāyate ye dagdhāḥ ye tu adagdhāḥ ca patitāḥ ye narāḥ bhuvi

original: yāni cānyāni bhūtāni teṣāmante bhavecca kim / pāpino ye durācārā ye cānye gatabuddhayaḥ //
analyzed: yāni ca anyāni bhūtāni teṣām ante bhavet ca kim pāpinaḥ ye durācārāḥ ye ca anye gatabuddhayaḥ

original: ātmaghātī brahmahā ca steyī viśvāsaghātakaḥ / kapilāyāḥ pibecchūdro yaḥ paṭhedidamakṣaram //
analyzed: ātma ghātī brahma hā ca steyī viśvāsa ghātakaḥ kapilāyāḥ pibet śūdraḥ yaḥ paṭhet idam akṣaram

original: dhārayedbrahmasūtraṃ vā kā gatistasya mādhava / śūdrasya brāhmaṇī bhāryā saṃgṛhītā yadā bhavet //
analyzed: dhārayet brahmasūtram vā kā gatiḥ tasya mādhava śūdrasya brāhmaṇī bhāryā saṃgṛhītā yadā bhavet

original: bhīto 'haṃ pāpinastasmāttanme vada jagatprabho / anyacca śṛṇu viśvātmanmayā kautukinā rayāt //
analyzed: bhītaḥ ham pāpinaḥ tasmāt tat me vada jagatprabho anyat ca śṛṇu viśvātman mayā kautukinā rayāt

original: lokāṃllokayatā loke jagāhe viśvamaṇḍalam / tatrājani janāndṛṣṭvā duḥ kheṣveva nimajjataḥ //
analyzed: lokān lokayatā loke jagāhe viśva maṇḍalam tatra ajani janān dṛṣṭvā duḥ kheṣu eva nimajjataḥ

original: svānte me durdharā pīḍā tatpīḍāto garīyasī / tridive ditijātebhyo bhūmau mṛtyurugādibhiḥ //
analyzed: svānte me durdharā pīḍā tad pīḍātaḥ garīyasī tridive diti jātebhyaḥ bhūmau mṛtyu ruj ādibhiḥ

original: iṣṭavastuviyo gaiśca pātāle māmakaṃ bhayam / evaṃ na nirbhayaṃ sthānamanyadīśa bhavatpadāt //
analyzed: iṣṭa vastu viyaḥ gaiḥ ca pātāle māmakam bhayam evam na nirbhayam sthānam anyat īśa bhavat padāt

original: asatyaṃ svapnamāyāvatkālena kavalīkṛtam / tatrāpi bhārate varṣe bahuduḥ khasya bhāginaḥ //
analyzed: asatyam svapna māyā vat kālena kavalīkṛtam tatra api bhārate varṣe bahu duḥ khasya bhāginaḥ

original: janā dṛṣṭā mayā rāgadveṣamohādiviplutāḥ / kecidandhāḥ kekarākṣāskhaladvācastu paṅgavaḥ //
analyzed: janāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ mayā rāga dveṣa moha ādi viplutāḥ kecid andhāḥ kekara akṣā skhalat vācaḥ tu paṅgavaḥ

original: khañjāḥ kāṇāśca badhirā mūkāḥ kuṣṭhāśca lomaśāḥ / nānārogaparītāśca khapuṣpāccābhimāninaḥ //
analyzed: khañjāḥ kāṇāḥ ca badhirāḥ mūkāḥ kuṣṭhāḥ ca lomaśāḥ nānā roga parītāḥ ca khapuṣpāt ca abhimāninaḥ

original: teṣāṃ doṣasya vaicitryaṃ mṛtyorgocaratāmapi / dṛṣṭvā prasumanāḥ prāptaḥ ko mṛtyuścitratā katham //
analyzed: teṣām doṣasya vaicitryam mṛtyoḥ gocara tām api dṛṣṭvā prasumanāḥ prāptaḥ kaḥ mṛtyuḥ citra tā katham

original: mṛtiryasya vidhānena maraṇādapyanantaram / vidhinābdakriyā yasya na sa durgatimāpnuyāt //
analyzed: mṛtiḥ yasya vidhānena maraṇāt api anantaram vidhinā abda kriyā yasya na sa durgatim āpnuyāt

original: ṛṣibhyastu mayā pūrvamiti sāmānyataḥ śrutam / jñānāya taddviśeṣasya pṛcchāmīdamiti prabho //
analyzed: ṛṣibhyaḥ tu mayā pūrvam iti sāmānyatas śrutam jñānāya tat dviśeṣasya pṛcchāmi idam iti prabho

original: mriyamāṇasya kiṃ kṛtyaṃ kiṃ dānaṃ vāsavānuja / vāhamṛtyorantarāle ko vidhirdahanasya ca //
analyzed: mriyamāṇasya kim kṛtyam kim dānam vāsava anuja vāha mṛtyoḥ antarāle kaḥ vidhiḥ dahanasya ca

original: sadyo vilambato vā kiṃ dehamanyaṃ prapadyate / saṃyamanyāṃ kramyamāṇamāvarṣaṃ kā mṛtikriyā //
analyzed: sadyas vilambataḥ vā kim deham anyam prapadyate saṃyamanyām kramyamāṇam āvarṣam kā mṛti kriyā

original: prāyaścittaṃ durmateḥ kiṃ pañcakādimṛtasya ca / prasādaṃ kuru me mohaṃ chettumarhasyaśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: prāyaścittam durmateḥ kim pañcaka ādi mṛtasya ca prasādam kuru me moham chettum arhasi aśeṣatas

original: sarvamantemayā pṛṣṭaṃ brūhi lokahitāya vai //
analyzed: pṛṣṭam brūhi loka hitāya vai

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśākhye dharmakāṇḍe (pretakhaṇḍe)
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśa ākhye dharma kāṇḍe pretakhaṇḍe

original: śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde praśraprapañco nāma prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde praśraprapañcaḥ nāma prathamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 2
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhadra mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai / śṛṇuṣvāvahito bhūtvā sarvamevaurdhvadaihikam //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca sādhu pṛṣṭam tvayā bhadra mānuṣāṇām hitāya vai śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ bhūtvā sarvam eva aurdhvadaihikam

original: samyagvibhedarahitaṃ śrutismṛtisamuddhṛtam / yanna dṛṣṭaṃ suraiḥ sendrairyogibhiryogacintakaiḥ //
analyzed: samyak vibheda rahitam śruti smṛti samuddhṛtam yat na dṛṣṭam suraiḥ sa indraiḥ yogibhiḥ yoga cintakaiḥ

original: guhyadguhyataraṃ tacca nākhyātaṃ kasyacitkvacit / bhaktastvaṃ hi mahābhāga vainateyaṃ bravīmi te //
analyzed: guhyat guhyataram tat ca na ākhyātam kasyacid kvacid  bhaktaḥ tvam hi mahābhāga vainateyam bravīmi te

original: aputrasya gatirnāstu svargo naiva ca naiva ca / yena kenāpyupāyena kāryaṃ janma sutasya hi //
analyzed: aputrasya gatiḥ nā astu svargaḥ nā eva ca nā eva ca yena kena api upāyena kāryam janma sutasya hi

original: tārayennarakātputtro yadi mokṣo na vidyate / skandhaḥ putreṇa kartavyo hyagnidātā ca pautrakaḥ //
analyzed: tārayet narakāt puttraḥ yadi mokṣaḥ na vidyate skandhaḥ putreṇa kartavyaḥ hi agni dātā ca pautrakaḥ

original: tiladarbhaiśca bhūmyāṃ vai kuṭī ṛtumatī bhavet / pañca ratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati //
analyzed: tila darbhaiḥ ca bhūmyām vai kuṭī ṛtumatī bhavet  pañca ratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati

original: yadā puṣpaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ hi kva tadā garbhadhāraṇam / ādarācca tato bhūmau yena garbhaṃ pradhāryate //
analyzed: yadā puṣpam pranaṣṭam hi kva tadā garbha dhāraṇam ādarāt ca tatas bhūmau yena garbham pradhāryate

original: lepyā tu gomayairbhūmistilāndarbhānviniḥ kṣipet / tasyāmevāturo muktaḥ sarvaṃ dahati kilbiṣam //
analyzed: lepyā tu gomayaiḥ bhūmiḥ tilān darbhān viniḥ kṣipet tasyām eva āturaḥ muktaḥ sarvam dahati kilbiṣam

original: darbhatūlī nayetsvargamāturasya na saṃśayaḥ / darbhāṃstatra kṣipedvātha tūlīgendukamadhyataḥ //
analyzed: darbha tūlī nayet svargam āturasya na saṃśayaḥ darbhān tatra kṣipet vā atha tūlī ga induka madhyatas

original: sarvatra vasudhāpūtā yatra lepo na vidyate / yatra lepaḥ sthitastatra punarlepena śudhyati //
analyzed: sarvatra vasudhā pūtāḥ yatra lepaḥ na vidyate yatra lepaḥ sthitaḥ tatra punar lepena śudhyati

original: yātudhānāḥ piśācāśca rākṣasāḥ krūrakarmiṇaḥ / alepaṃ hyāturaṃ muktaṃ viśantyete viyonayaḥ //
analyzed: yātudhānāḥ piśācāḥ ca rākṣasāḥ krūra karmiṇaḥ alepam hi āturam muktam viśanti ete viyonayaḥ

original: nityahomastathā śrāddhaṃ pādaśaucaṃ dvije tathā / maṇḍalena vinā bhūmyāmāturo mucyate na hi //
analyzed: nitya homaḥ tathā śrāddham pāda śaucam dvije tathā maṇḍalena vinā bhūmyām āturaḥ mucyate na hi

original: brahmā viṣṇuśca rudraśca śrīrhutāśastathaiva ca / maṇḍale copatiṣṭhanti tasmātkurvīta maṇḍalam //
analyzed: brahmā viṣṇuḥ ca rudraḥ ca śrīḥ hutāśaḥ tathā eva ca maṇḍale ca upatiṣṭhanti tasmāt kurvīta maṇḍalam

original: anyathā mriyate vālo vṛddhastārkṣyayuvāthavā / yonyantaraṃ na gacchetsa krīḍate vāyunā saha //
analyzed: anyathā mriyate vālaḥ vṛddhaḥ tārkṣya yuvā athavā yoni antaram na gacchet sa krīḍate vāyunā saha

original: miśritaṃ lohitāmiśraṃ tadevaṃ janma jīyate / tasyaiva vāyubhūtasya na śrāddhaṃ nodakakriyā //
analyzed: miśritam lohita amiśram tat evam janma jīyate tasya eva vāyu bhūtasya na śrāddham na udakakriyā

original: mama svedasamudbhūtāstilāstārkṣya pavitrakāḥ / asurā dānavā daityā vidravanti tilaistathā //
analyzed: mama sveda samudbhūtāḥ tilāḥ tārkṣya pavitrakāḥ asurāḥ dānavāḥ daityāḥ vidravanti tilaiḥ tathā

original: tilāḥ śvetāstilā kṛṣṇāstilā gomūtrasaṃnnibhāḥ / dahantu te me pāpāni śarīreṇa kṛtāni vai //
analyzed: tilāḥ śvetāḥ tilā kṛṣṇāḥ tilāḥ go mūtra saṃnnibhāḥ dahantu te me pāpāni śarīreṇa kṛtāni vai

original: eka eva tilo datto hemadroṇatilaiḥ samaḥ / tarpaṇe dānahomeṣu datto bhavati cākṣayaḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ eva tilaḥ dattaḥ hema droṇa tilaiḥ samaḥ tarpaṇe dāna homeṣu dattaḥ bhavati ca akṣayaḥ

original: darbhā romasamudbhūtāstilāḥ svedeṣu nānyathā / devatā dānavāstṛptāḥ śrāddhena pitarastathā //
analyzed: darbhāḥ roma samudbhūtāḥ tilāḥ svedeṣu na anyathā devatāḥ dānavāḥ tṛptāḥ śrāddhena pitaraḥ tathā

original: prayogavidhinā brahmā viśvaṃ cāpyupajīvanām / apasavyādito brahmā pitaro devadevatāḥ //
analyzed: prayoga vidhinā brahmā viśvam ca api upajīvanām  apasavya āditas brahmā pitaraḥ deva devatāḥ

original: tena te pitarastṛptā apasavye kṛte sati / darbhamūle sthito brahmā madhye devo janārdanaḥ //
analyzed: tena te pitaraḥ tṛptāḥ apasavye kṛte sati darbha mūle sthitaḥ brahmā madhye devaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: darbhāgre śaṅkaraṃ vidyāttrayo devāḥ kuśe smṛtāḥ / viprā mantrāḥ kaśā vahnistulasī ca khageśvara //
analyzed: darbha agre śaṅkaram vidyāt trayaḥ devāḥ kuśe smṛtāḥ viprāḥ mantrāḥ kaśāḥ vahniḥ tulasī ca khageśvara

original: naite nirmālyatāṃ yānti kriyamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ / tulasī brāhmaṇā gāvo viṣṇurekādaśī khaga //
analyzed: na ete nirmālya tām yānti kriyamāṇāḥ punar punar tulasī brāhmaṇāḥ gāvaḥ viṣṇuḥ ekādaśī khaga

original: pañca pravahaṇānye bhavābdhau majjatāṃ nṛṇām / viṣṇurekādaśī gītā tulasī vipradhenavaḥ //
analyzed: pañca pravahaṇāni ye bhava abdhau majjatām nṛṇām viṣṇuḥ ekādaśī gītā tulasī vipra dhenavaḥ

original: asāre durgasaṃsāre ṣaṭpadī muktidāyinī / tilāḥ pavitramatulaṃ darbhāścāpi tulasyatha //
analyzed: asāre durga saṃsāre ṣaṭpadī mukti dāyinī  tilāḥ pavitram atulam darbhāḥ ca api tulasī atha

original: nivārayanti caitāni durgatiṃ yāntamāturam / hastābhyāmuddhareddarbhāṃstoyena prokṣayedbhuvi //
analyzed: nivārayanti ca etāni durgatim yāntam āturam  hastābhyām uddharet darbhān toyena prokṣayet bhuvi

original: mṛtyukāle kṣipeddarbhānkarayorāturasya ca / darbhaistu kṣipyate yo 'sau darbhaistu pariveṣṭitaḥ //
analyzed: mṛtyu kāle kṣipet darbhān karayoḥ āturasya ca  darbhaiḥ tu kṣipyate darbhaiḥ tu pariveṣṭitaḥ

original: viṣṇuloke sa vai yāti mantrahīno 'pi mānavaḥ / tūlīṃ kṛtvā kṛtau pādau saṃsthitau kṣitipṛṣṭhataḥ //
analyzed: viṣṇu loke sa vai yāti mantra hīnaḥ mānavaḥ tūlīm kṛtvā kṛtau pādau saṃsthitau kṣiti pṛṣṭhatas

original: prāyāścittaṃ viśuddhāgnau saṃsāre 'sārasāgare / gomayenopalimpettu darbhāstaraṇasaṃsthite //
analyzed: prāyāścittam viśuddha agnau saṃsāre sāra sāgare gomayena upalimpet tu darbha āstaraṇa saṃsthite

original: yane dattena dānena sarvaṃ pāpaṃ vyapohati / lavaṇaṃ tadrasaṃ divyaṃ sarvakāmapradaṃ nṛṇām //
yasmādannarasāḥ sarve notkaṭā lavaṇaṃ vinā / pitṝṇāṃ ca priyaṃ bhavyaṃ tasmātsvargapradaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: yasmāt anna rasāḥ sarve na utkaṭāḥ lavaṇam vinā pitṝṇām ca priyam bhavyam tasmāt svarga pradam bhavet

original: viṣṇudehasamudbhūto yato 'yaṃ lavaṇo rasaḥ / etatsalavaṇaṃ dānaṃ tena śaṃsanti yoginaḥ //
analyzed: viṣṇu deha samudbhūtaḥ yatas yam lavaṇaḥ rasaḥ etat sa lavaṇam dānam tena śaṃsanti yoginaḥ

original: brāhmaṇakṣattriyaviśāṃ strīṇāṃ śūdrajanasya ca / āturasya yadā prāṇā na yānti vasudhātale //
analyzed: brāhmaṇa kṣattriya viśām strīṇām śūdra janasya ca āturasya yadā prāṇāḥ na yānti vasudhā tale

original: lavaṇaṃ tu tadā deyaṃ dvārasyodvāṭanaṃ divaḥ / anyacca śṛṇu pakṣīndra mṛtyo rūpaṃ prapañcataḥ //
analyzed: lavaṇam tu tadā deyam dvārasya udvāṭanam divaḥ  anyat ca śṛṇu pakṣi indra mṛtyoḥ rūpam prapañcataḥ

original: yasya kālena no yāyādviyogaḥ prāṇadehayoḥ / prāṇinaśca svasamaye mṛtyuratyantavismṛtiḥ //
analyzed: yasya kālena no yāyāt viyogaḥ prāṇa dehayoḥ  prāṇinaḥ ca sva samaye mṛtyuḥ atyanta vismṛtiḥ

original: yathā vāyurjaladharānvikarṣati yatastataḥ / tadvajjaladavattārkṣya kālasyaiva vaśānugāḥ //
analyzed: yathā vāyuḥ jaladharān vikarṣati yatas tatas tadvat jalada vat tārkṣya kālasya eva vaśa anugāḥ

original: sāttvikā rājasāścaiva tāmasā ye ca kecana / bhāvāḥ kālātmakāḥ sarve pravartante hi jantuṣu //
analyzed: sāttvikāḥ rājasāḥ ca eva tāmasāḥ ye ca kecana bhāvāḥ kāla ātmakāḥ sarve pravartante hi jantuṣu

original: ādityaścandramāḥ śambhurāpo vāyuḥ śatakratuḥ / agniḥ khaṃ pṛthivī mitra oṣadhyo vasavastathā //
analyzed: ādityaḥ candramāḥ śambhuḥ āpaḥ vāyuḥ śatakratuḥ agniḥ kham pṛthivī mitraḥ oṣadhyaḥ vasavaḥ tathā

original: saritaḥ sāgarāścaiva bhāvābhāvau ca sarpahan / sarve kālena sṛjyante saṃkṣipyante yathā punaḥ //
analyzed: saritaḥ sāgarāḥ ca eva bhāva abhāvau ca sarpa han sarve kālena sṛjyante saṃkṣipyante yathā punar

original: kālena saṃhriyante ca nṛnaṃ mṛtyāvupasthite / daivayogāttdā vyādhiḥ kaścidutpadyate khaga //
analyzed: kālena saṃhriyante ca mṛtyau upasthite  vyādhiḥ kaścid utpadyate khaga

original: vaikalyamindriyāṇāṃ ca balau joraṃhasāṃ bhavet / yugapadvaścikakoṭiśūkadaṃśo bhavedyadi //
analyzed: vaikalyam indriyāṇām ca balau jaḥ raṃhasām bhavet yugapad vaścika koṭi śūka daṃśaḥ bhavet yadi

original: tadānumīyate tena pīḍā mṛtyubhavā khaga / tataḥ kṣaṇena caitanye vikale jaḍatāṃ gate //
analyzed: tadā anumīyate tena pīḍā mṛtyu bhavā khaga tatas kṣaṇena caitanye vikale jaḍa tām gate

original: pricālyante tataḥ prāṇā yāmyairnikaṭavartibhiḥ / bībhatsaṃ tu tadā rūpaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairbhavet //
analyzed: pricālyante tatas prāṇāḥ yāmyaiḥ nikaṭa vartibhiḥ  bībhatsam tu tadā rūpam prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭha gataiḥ bhavet

original: phemudgirate so 'tha mukhaṃ lālākulaṃ bhavet / aṅguṣṭhamātrapuruṣo hāhā kurvaṃstatastanoḥ //
analyzed: mukham lālā ākulam bhavet  aṅguṣṭha mātra puruṣaḥ hāhā kurvan tatas tanoḥ

original: tadaiva nīyate dvatairyāmyairvokṣansvakaṃ gṛham / bhūya eva hite tāta mṛtyukāladaśāmimām //
analyzed: tadā eva nīyate dvataiḥ yāmyaiḥ vokṣan svakam gṛham bhūyas eva hite tāta mṛtyu kāla daśām imām

original: aṣmā prakupitaḥ kāye tīvravāyusamīritaḥ / bhinatti marmasthānāni dīpyamāno nirindhanaḥ //
analyzed: aṣmā prakupitaḥ kāye tīvra vāyu samīritaḥ bhinatti marma sthānāni dīpyamānaḥ nirindhanaḥ

original: udāno nāma pavanastataścordhvaṃ pravartate / bhaktānāmabubhukṣāṇāmadhogatinirodhakṛt //
analyzed: udānaḥ nāma pavanaḥ tatas ca ūrdhvam pravartate bhaktānām abubhukṣāṇām adhogati nirodha kṛt

original: yairnānṛtāni coktāni prītibhedaḥ kṛto na ca / āstikaḥ śraddadhānaśca sa sukhaṃ mṛtyumṛcchati //
analyzed: yaiḥ nā anṛtāni ca uktāni prīti bhedaḥ kṛtaḥ na ca āstikaḥ śraddadhānaḥ ca sa sukham mṛtyum ṛcchati

original: yo na kāmānna saṃraṃbhānna dveṣāddharmamutsṛjet / yathoktakārī saumyaśca sa sukhaṃ mṛtyumṛcchati //
analyzed: yaḥ na kāmāt na saṃraṃbhāt na dveṣāt dharmam utsṛjet  yathā ukta kārī saumyaḥ ca sa sukham mṛtyum ṛcchati

original: mohajñānapradātāraḥ prāpnuvanti mahattamaḥ / kūṭasākṣī mṛṣāvādī ye ca viśvāsaghātakāḥ //
analyzed: moha jñāna pradātāraḥ prāpnuvanti mahattamaḥ kūṭa sākṣī mṛṣāvādī ye ca viśvāsa ghātakāḥ

original: te mohaṃ mṛtyumṛcchanti tathā ye vedanindakāḥ / vibhīṣakāḥ pūtigandhā yaṣṭimudgarapāṇayaḥ //
analyzed: te moham mṛtyum ṛcchanti tathā ye veda nindakāḥ vibhīṣakāḥ pūti gandhāḥ yaṣṭi mudgara pāṇayaḥ

original: āgacchanti durātmāno yamasya puruṣāstadā / prāpte tvīdṛkpathe ghore jāyate tasya vepathuḥ //
analyzed: āgacchanti durātmānaḥ yamasya puruṣāḥ tadā prāpte tu īdṛś pathe ghore jāyate tasya vepathuḥ

original: krandatyavirataṃ so 'pi pitṛmātṛsutānapi / sāsya vāgasphuṭā yatnenaikavarṇā vibhāsate //
analyzed: krandati aviratam saḥ pi pitṛ mātṛ sutān api sā asya vāc asphuṭā yatnena eka varṇā vibhāsate

original: dṛṣṭirvai bhrāmyate trāsācchvāsācchuṣyati cānanam / sa tato vedanāviṣṭastaccharīraṃ vimuñcati //
analyzed: dṛṣṭiḥ vai bhrāmyate trāsāt śvāsāt śuṣyati ca ānanam sa tatas vedanā āviṣṭaḥ tat śarīram vimuñcati

original: aspṛśyaṃ kutsanīyaṃ ca tatkṣaṇādeva jāyate / uktaṃ mṛtyoḥ svarūpaṃ tu prasaṅgādanyadapyatha //
analyzed: aspṛśyam kutsanīyam ca tad kṣaṇāt eva jāyate uktam mṛtyoḥ svarūpam tu prasaṅgāt anyat api atha

original: vaicitryasyottaraṃ praśre dvitīyasya vadāmi te / karmaṇāṃ prāktanānāṃ tu tadasattvenaṃ bhadetaḥ //
analyzed: vaicitryasya uttaram praśre dvitīyasya vadāmi te karmaṇām prāktanānām tu bhadā itas

original: bhavedbhogasya vaicitryaṃ bhrāmyatāṃ prāṇināmiha / devatvamasuratvaṃ ca yakṣatvādisukhapradam //
analyzed: bhavet bhogasya vaicitryam bhrāmyatām prāṇinām iha deva tvam asura tvam ca yakṣa tva ādi sukha pradam

original: mānuṣatvaṃ paśutvaṃ ca pakṣitvādyatiduḥ khadam / karmaṇāṃ tāratamyena bhavatīha khageśvara //
analyzed: mānuṣa tvam paśu tvam ca pakṣi tva ādi ati duḥkha dam karmaṇām tāratamyena bhavati iha khageśvara

original: atra te kīrtayiṣyāmi vipākaṃ karmaṇāmaham / vaicitryasya spuṭatvāyayairjovaḥ saṃsaratyayam //
analyzed: atra te kīrtayiṣyāmi vipākam karmaṇām aham vaicitryasya spuṭa tva āyayaiḥ jovaḥ saṃsarati ayam

original: mahāpātakajānghorānnarakānprāpya dāruṇān / karmakṣayātprajāyante mahāpātakinaḥ kṣitau //
analyzed: mahāpātaka jān ghorān narakān prāpya dāruṇān karma kṣayāt prajāyante mahāpātakinaḥ kṣitau

original: jāyante lakṣaṇairyaistutāni me śṛṇu sattama / mṛgāśvasūkaroṣṭrāṇāṃ brahmahā yonimṛcchati //
analyzed: jāyante lakṣaṇaiḥ yaiḥ tu tāni me śṛṇu sattama mṛga aśva sūkara uṣṭrāṇām brahma hā yonim ṛcchati

original: kṛmikīṭapataṅgatvaṃ svarṇahārī samāpnuyāt / tṛṇagulmatātvaṃ ca kramaśo gurutalpagaḥ //
analyzed: kṛmi kīṭa pataṅga tvam svarṇa hārī samāpnuyāt tṛṇa gulma tā tvam ca kramaśas guru talpa gaḥ

original: brahmahā kṣayarogī syātsurāpaḥ śyāvadantakaḥ / hemahārī tu kunakhī duścarmā gurutalpagaḥ //
analyzed: brahma hā kṣaya rogī syāt surā paḥ śyāva dantakaḥ hema hārī tu kunakhī duścarmā guru talpa gaḥ

original: yo yena saṃvasatyeṣāṃ sa talliṅgo 'bhijāyate / saṃvatsareṇa patati patitena sahācaran //
analyzed: yaḥ yena saṃvasati eṣām sa tad liṅgaḥ abhijāyate saṃvatsareṇa patati patitena saha ācaran

original: saṃlāpasparśaniḥ śvāsasahayānāśanāsanāt / yājanādhyāpanādyaunātpāpaṃ saṃkramate nṛṇām //
analyzed: saṃlāpa sparśa niḥ śvāsa saha yāna aśana āsanāt yājana adhyāpanāt yaunāt pāpam saṃkramate nṛṇām

original: gatvā dārānpareṣāñca brahmasvamapahṛtya ca / araṇye nirjane deśe jāyate brahmarākṣasaḥ //
analyzed: gatvā dārān pareṣām ca brahma svam apahṛtya ca araṇye nirjane deśe jāyate brahmarākṣasaḥ

original: hīnajātau prajāyeta ratnānāmapahārakaḥ / patraṃ ca śākhino hṛtvā gandhāṃśchucchundarī pumān //
analyzed: hīna jātau prajāyeta ratnānām apahārakaḥ patram ca śākhinaḥ hṛtvā gandhān chucchundarī pumān

original: mūṣako dhānyahārī syādyānamuṣṭraḥ phalaṃ kapiḥ / nirmantrabhojanātkāko gṛdhro hṛtvā hyupaskaram //
analyzed: mūṣakaḥ dhānya hārī syāt yānam uṣṭraḥ phalam kapiḥ nirmantra bhojanāt kākaḥ gṛdhraḥ hṛtvā hi upaskaram

original: madhudaṃśaḥ phalaṃ gṛdhro gāṃ godhāgniṃ bakastathā / syācchvetakuṣṭhī strīvastra hyarucī rasahārakaḥ //
analyzed: madhudaṃśaḥ phalam gṛdhraḥ gām godhā agnim bakaḥ tathā syāt śveta kuṣṭhī hi arucī rasa hārakaḥ

original: kāṃsyahārī tu haṃsaḥ syātparasvasya ca hārakaḥ / apasmārī gurorhantā krūrakṛdvāmano bhavet //
analyzed: kāṃsya hārī tu haṃsaḥ syāt para svasya ca hārakaḥ apasmārī guroḥ hantā krūra kṛt vāmanaḥ bhavet

original: dharmapatnīṃ tyajañchabdavedhī prāṇī bhavetkṣitau / devaviprasvāpahārī pāṇḍuraḥ paramāṃsabhuk //
analyzed: dharmapatnīm tyajan śabdavedhī prāṇī bhavet kṣitau deva vipra sva apahārī pāṇḍuraḥ para māṃsa bhuj

original: bhakṣyābhakṣyo gaṇḍamālī mahārogī prajāyate / nyāsāpahārī kāṇaḥ syāstrījīvaḥ khañjako bhavet //
analyzed: bhakṣya abhakṣyaḥ gaṇḍamālī mahā rogī prajāyate nyāsa apahārī kāṇaḥ syā strī jīvaḥ khañjakaḥ bhavet

original: kaumāradāratyāgī ca durbhago 'thai kamiṣṭabhuk / vātagulmī viprayoṣidgāmī vā jambuko bhavet //
analyzed: kaumāra dāra tyāgī ca kamiṣṭa bhuj vāta gulmī vipra yoṣit gāmī vā jambukaḥ bhavet

original: śayyāhartā kṣapaṇakaḥ pataṅgo vastrahārakaḥ / mātsaryādapi jātyandho kapālī dīpahārakaḥ //
analyzed: śayyā hartā kṣapaṇakaḥ pataṅgaḥ vastra hārakaḥ mātsaryāt api kapālī dīpa hārakaḥ

original: kauśiko mitrahantā ca kṣayī pitrādinindakaḥ / skhaladvāganṛtavādī kūṭasākṣī jalodarī //
analyzed: kauśikaḥ mitra hantā ca kṣayī pitṛ ādi nindakaḥ skhalat vāc anṛta vādī kūṭa sākṣī jalodarī

original: maśakaḥ so 'tha cachinnoṣṭho vivāhe vighnakṛdbhavet / syādvātha vṛṣalaḥ so 'yaṃ catvare vai viṇmūtrakṛt //
analyzed: maśakaḥ vivāhe vighna kṛt bhavet syāt vā atha vṛṣalaḥ saḥ yam catvare vai viṣ mūtra kṛt

original: mūtrakṛcchrī dūṣakastu kanyāyāḥ klībatāmiyāt / dvīpī syādvedavikretā varāho 'yājyayājakaḥ //
analyzed: mūtrakṛcchrī dūṣakaḥ tu kanyāyāḥ klība tām iyāt dvīpī syāt veda vikretā varāhaḥ yājya yājakaḥ

original: yatastato 'śranmārjāro khadyoto vahadāhakaḥ / kṛmiḥ paryuṣitādaḥ syānmatsarī bhramaro bhavet //
analyzed: khadyotaḥ vaha dāhakaḥ  kṛmiḥ paryuṣitādaḥ syāt matsarī bhramaraḥ bhavet

original: agnyutsādī tu kuṣṭhī syādadattā'dānato vṛṣaḥ / sarpo gohārako 'nnasya hārakaḥ syādajīrṇavān //
analyzed: agni utsādī tu kuṣṭhī syāt adatta ādānataḥ vṛṣaḥ sarpaḥ go hārakaḥ nnasya hārakaḥ syāt ajīrṇavān

original: jalahārī tu matsyaḥ syātkṣīrahārī balākikā / annaṃ paryuṣitaṃ vipre pradadatkubjatāṃ vrajet //
analyzed: jala hārī tu matsyaḥ syāt kṣīra hārī balākikā annam paryuṣitam vipre pradadat kubja tām vrajet

original: phalāni harate yastu santatirmriyate khaga / adattvā bhakṣyamaśrāti hyanapatyo bhavennaraḥ //
analyzed: phalāni harate yaḥ tu santatiḥ mriyate khaga a dattvā bhakṣyam a śrāti hi anapatyaḥ bhavet naraḥ

original: pravajyāgamanādrājan bhavenmarupiśācakaḥ / cātako jalahartā syājjanmāndhaḥ puṃstakaṃ haran //
analyzed: pravajyā gamanāt rājan bhavet maru piśācakaḥ  cātakaḥ jala hartā syāt janmāndhaḥ puṃstakam haran

original: pratiśrutya dvijebhyor'thamadadajjambuko bhavet / parivādādijātīnāṃ labhate kācchapīṃ tanum //
analyzed: pratiśrutya dvijebhyaḥ ṛtham adadat jambukaḥ bhavet parivāda ādi jātīnām labhate kācchapīm tanum

original: durbhagaḥ phalavikretā vṛkaśca vṛṣalīpatiḥ / mārjāro 'gniṃ padā spṛṣṭvā rogavānparamāṃsabhuk //
analyzed: durbhagaḥ phala vikretā vṛkaḥ ca vṛṣalī patiḥ mārjāraḥ gnim padā spṛṣṭvā rogavān para māṃsa bhuj

original: jalaprastravaṇaṃ yastu bhindyānmatsyo bhavennaraḥ / hareḥ kathāṃ na śṛṇvanti ye na sādhujanastavam //
analyzed: jala prastravaṇam yaḥ tu bhindyāt matsyaḥ bhavet naraḥ hareḥ kathām na śṛṇvanti ye na sādhu jana stavam

original: tānnarānkarṇamūlo 'yaṃ vyāpnuyānnetarāñjanān / parasyānanasaṃsthaṃ yo grāsaṃ hari mandadhīḥ //
analyzed: tān narān karṇa mūlaḥ yam vyāpnuyāt na itarān janān  parasya ānana saṃstham yaḥ grāsam hari manda dhīḥ

original: devopakaraṇānyenaṃ gaṇḍamālinamīhate / dambhenācarate dharmaṃ gajacarmā bhavettu saḥ //
analyzed: deva upakaraṇāni enam gaṇḍamālinam īhate dambhena ācarate dharmam gajacarmā bhavet tu saḥ

original: śiro 'rtipramukhā rogā yānti viśvāsaghātakam / liṅgapīḍī śivasvaṃ ca śivanirmālyameva ca //
analyzed: śiraḥ ṛti pramukhāḥ rogāḥ yānti viśvāsa ghātakam liṅga pīḍī śiva svam ca śiva nirmālyam eva ca

original: striyo 'pyanena mārgeṇa hṛtvā doṣamavāpnuyuḥ / eteṣāmeva jantūnāṃ bhāryātvamupajāyate //
analyzed: striyaḥ api anena mārgeṇa hṛtvā doṣam avāpnuyuḥ eteṣām eva jantūnām bhāryā tvam upajāyate

original: bhogānte narakasyaitatsarvamityavadhāraya / khagha pradarśyametattu mayoktaṃ te samāsataḥ / dravyaprakārā hi yathā tathaiva prāṇijātayaḥ //
analyzed: bhoga ante narakasya etat sarvam iti avadhāraya khagha pradarśyam etat tu mayā uktam te samāsatas dravya prakārāḥ hi yathā tathā eva prāṇi jātayaḥ

original: evaṃ vicitrairnijakarmabhirnṛṇāṃ sukhasya duḥ khasya ca janmanāmapi / vaicitryamuktaṃ śubhakarmataḥ śubhaṃ tathāśubhāccāśubhamīrayanti //
analyzed: evam vicitraiḥ nija karmabhiḥ nṛṇām sukhasya duḥ khasya ca janmanām api vaicitryam uktam śubha karmataḥ śubham tathā aśubhāt ca aśubham īrayanti

original: etatte sarvaṃmākhyātaṃ yatpṛṣṭo 'hamiha tvayā //
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam yat pṛṣṭaḥ ham iha tvayā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pratakā(kha)
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe

original: ṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde aurdhvadehikavidhikarmavipākayorvarṇanaṃ nāma dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: ṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde aurdhvadehikavidhikarmavipākayorvarṇanam nāma dvitīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 3
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sūta uvāca / evamutsāhitaḥ pakṣī svarūpaṃ nirayasya tu / papracchanarakāṇyevaṃ śrutvā cotkūlitāntaraḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca evam utsāhitaḥ pakṣī sva rūpam nirayasya tu papraccha narakāṇi evam śrutvā ca utkūlita antaraḥ

original: garuḍa uvāca / narakāṇāṃ svarūpaṃ me vada yeṣu vikarmiṇaḥ / pātyante duḥ khabhūyiṣṭhāsteṣāṃ bhedāṃśca kīrtaya //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca narakāṇām svarūpam me vada yeṣu vikarmiṇaḥ pātyante duḥkha bhūyiṣṭhāḥ teṣām bhedān ca kīrtaya

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / narakāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi vartante hyaruṇānuja / śakyaṃ vistarato naiva vaktuṃ prādhānyato bruve //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca narakāṇām sahasrāṇi vartante hi aruṇānuja śakyam vistarataḥ nā eva vaktum prādhānyataḥ bruve

original: rauravaṃ nāma narakaṃ mukhyaṃ tadvainibodha me / raurave kūṭasākṣī tu yāti yaścānṛtī naraḥ //
analyzed: rauravam nāma narakam mukhyam tat vai nibodha me raurave kūṭa sākṣī tu yāti yaḥ ca anṛtī naraḥ

original: yojanānāṃ sahasre dve rauravo hi pramāṇataḥ / jānumātrapramāṇaṃ tu tatra gartaṃ sudustaram //
analyzed: yojanānām sahasre dve rauravaḥ hi pramāṇataḥ jānu mātra pramāṇam tu tatra gartam su dustaram

original: tatrāṅgāracayaughena kṛtaṃ taddharaṇīsamam / tatrāgninā sutīvreṇa tāpitāṅgārabhūminā //
analyzed: tatra aṅgāra caya oghena kṛtam tat haraṇī samam tatra agninā su tīvreṇa tāpita aṅgāra bhūminā

original: tanmadhye pāpakarmāṇaṃ vimuñcanti yamānugāḥ / sa dahyamānastīvreṇa vahninā paridhāvati //
analyzed: tad madhye pāpa karmāṇam vimuñcanti yama anugāḥ sa dahyamānaḥ tīvreṇa vahninā paridhāvati

original: padepade ca pādo 'sya sphuṭyate śīryate punaḥ / ahorātreṇoddharaṇaṃ pādanyāsena gacchati //
analyzed: pade pade ca sphuṭyate śīryate punar ahorātreṇa uddharaṇam pāda nyāsena gacchati

original: evaṃ sahasraṃ vistīrṇaṃ yojanānāṃ vimucyate / tato 'nyatpāpaśuddhyarthaṃ tādṛṅnirayamṛcchati //
analyzed: evam sahasram vistīrṇam yojanānām vimucyate tatas tādṛś nirayam ṛcchati

original: rauravaste samākhyātaḥ prathamo narako mayā / mahārauravasaṃjñaṃ tu śṛṇuṣva narakaṃ khaga //
analyzed: rauravaḥ te samākhyātaḥ prathamaḥ narakaḥ mayā mahāraurava saṃjñam tu śṛṇuṣva narakam khaga

original: yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi santi pañca samantataḥ / tatra tāmramayī bhūmiradhastasyā hutāśanaḥ //
analyzed: yojanānām sahasrāṇi santi pañca samantataḥ tatra tāmra mayī bhūmiḥ adhas tasyāḥ hutāśanaḥ

original: tayā tapantyā sā sarvā prodyadvidyutsamaprabhā / vibhāvyate mahāraudrā pāpināṃ darśanādiṣu //
analyzed: tayā tapantyā sā sarvā prodyat vidyut sama prabhā vibhāvyate mahā raudrā pāpinām darśana ādiṣu

original: tasyāṃ baddhakarābhyāṃ ca padbhyāṃ caiva yamānugaiḥ / mucyate pāpakṛnmadhye luṇṭhamānaḥ sa gacchati //
analyzed: tasyām baddha karābhyām ca padbhyām ca eva yama anugaiḥ mucyate pāpa kṛt madhye luṇṭhamānaḥ sa gacchati

original: kākairbakairvṛkolūkairmaśakairvṛścikaistathā / bhakṣyamāṇaistathā raudrairgato mārge vikṛṣyate //
analyzed: kākaiḥ bakaiḥ vṛka ulūkaiḥ maśakaiḥ vṛścikaiḥ tathā bhakṣyamāṇaiḥ tathā raudraiḥ gataḥ mārge vikṛṣyate

original: dahyamāno gatamatirbhrāntastāteti cākulaḥ / vadatyasakṛdudvagno na śāntimadhigacchati //
analyzed: dahyamānaḥ gata matiḥ bhrāntaḥ tāta iti ca ākulaḥ vadati asakṛt udvagnaḥ na śāntim adhigacchati

original: evaṃ tasmānnarairmokṣastvatikrāntairavāpyate / varṣāyutāyutaiḥ pāpaṃ yaiḥ kṛtaṃ duṣṭabuddhibhiḥ //
analyzed: evam tasmāt naraiḥ mokṣaḥ tu atikrāntaiḥ avāpyate varṣā yuta ayutaiḥ pāpam yaiḥ kṛtam duṣṭa buddhibhiḥ

original: tathānyastu tato nāma so 'tiśītaḥ svabhāvataḥ / mahārauravavaddīrghastathāndhatamasā vṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tathā anyaḥ tu tatas nāma saḥ tiśītaḥ svabhāvataḥ mahāraurava vat dīrghaḥ tathā andhatamasā vṛtaḥ

original: śītārtāstatra badhyante narāstamasi dāruṇe / parasparaṃ samāsādya parirabhyāśrayanti te //
analyzed: śīta ārtāḥ tatra badhyante narāḥ tamasi dāruṇe parasparam samāsādya parirabhya āśrayanti te

original: dantāsteṣāṃ ca bhajyante śītārtiparikampitāḥ / kṣutṛṣātibalāḥ pakṣinnatha tatrāpyupadavāḥ //
analyzed: dantāḥ teṣām ca bhajyante śīta ārti parikampitāḥ kṣu tṛṣā ati balāḥ pakṣin atha tatra api upadavāḥ

original: himakhaṇḍavaho vāyubhinattyasthīni dāruṇaḥ / majjāsṛgasthigalitamaśrantyatra kṣudhānvitāḥ //
analyzed: hima khaṇḍa vahaḥ vāyu bhinatti asthīni dāruṇaḥ majja asṛj asthi galitam aśranti atra kṣudhā anvitāḥ

original: āliṅgyamānā bhrāmyante parasparasamāgame / evaṃ tatrāpi sumahānkleśastamasi mānavaiḥ //
analyzed: āliṅgyamānāḥ bhrāmyante paraspara samāgame  evam tatra api su mahān kleśaḥ tamasi mānavaiḥ

original: prāpyate śakuniśreṣṭha yo bahūkṛtasañcayaḥ / nikṛntana iti khyātastato 'nyo narakottamaḥ //
analyzed: prāpyate śakuni śreṣṭha yaḥ bahūkṛta sañcayaḥ nikṛntanaḥ iti khyātaḥ tatas nyaḥ naraka uttamaḥ

original: kulālacakrāṇi tatra bhrāmyantyavirataṃ khaga / teṣvāpāṣye nikṛṣyante kālasūtreṇa mānavāḥ //
analyzed: kulāla cakrāṇi tatra bhrāmyanti aviratam khaga nikṛṣyante kālasūtreṇa mānavāḥ

original: yamānumāṅgulisthena āpādatalamastakam / na caiṣāṃ jīvitabhraṃśo jāyate pakṣisattama //
analyzed: āpādatalamastakam na ca eṣām jīvita bhraṃśaḥ jāyate pakṣi sattama

original: chinnāni teṣāṃ śataśaḥ khaṇḍānyaikyaṃ vrajanti hi / evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi bhrāmyante pāpakarmiṇaḥ //
analyzed: chinnāni teṣām śataśas khaṇḍāni aikyam vrajanti hi evam varṣa sahasrāṇi bhrāmyante pāpa karmiṇaḥ

original: tāvadyāvadaśeṣaṃ ca tatpāpaṃ saṃkṣayaṃ gatam / aprātaṣṭhaṃ ca narakaṃ śṛṇuṣva gadato mama //
analyzed: tāvat yāvat aśeṣam ca tat pāpam saṃkṣayam gatam aprātaṣṭham ca narakam śṛṇuṣva gadataḥ mama

original: tatrasthairnārakairduḥ khamasahyamanubhūyate / tānyeva tatra cakrāṇi ghaṭīyantrāṇi cānyataḥ //
analyzed: tatrasthaiḥ nārakaiḥ duḥ kham asahyam anubhūyate tāni eva tatra cakrāṇi ghaṭīyantrāṇi ca anyatas

original: duḥ khasya hetubhūtāni pāpakarmakṛtāṃ nṛṇām / cakreṣvāropitāḥ kecidbhāmyante tatra mānavāḥ //
analyzed: duḥ khasya hetu bhūtāni pāpa karma kṛtām nṛṇām cakreṣu āropitāḥ kecid bhāmyante tatra mānavāḥ

original: yāvadvarṣasahasrāṇi na teṣāṃ sthitirantarā / ghaṭīyantreṣu badvā ye baddhā toyavaṭī yathā //
analyzed: yāvat varṣa sahasrāṇi na teṣām sthitiḥ antarā ghaṭīyantreṣu ye baddhā toya vaṭī yathā

original: bhrāmyante mānavā raktamudgirantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ / antrairmukhaviniṣkrāntairnetrairantrāvalambibhaiḥ //
analyzed: bhrāmyante mānavāḥ raktam udgirantaḥ punar punar antraiḥ mukha viniṣkrāntaiḥ netraiḥ antra avalambi bhaiḥ

original: duḥ khāni prāpnuvantīha yānyasahyāni jantubhiḥ / asipatravanaṃ nāma narakaṃ śṛṇu cāparam //
analyzed: duḥ khāni prāpnuvanti iha yāni asahyāni jantubhiḥ asipatravanam nāma narakam śṛṇu ca aparam

original: yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ yo jvalatyagnyāśṛtāvaniḥ / saptatīvrakarāścaiṇḍaryatra tīvra sudāruṇe //
analyzed: yojanānām sahasram yaḥ jvalati agni āśṛta avaniḥ sapta tīvra karāḥ ca aiṇḍarī atra tīvra su dāruṇe

original: pratapanti sadā tatra prāṇino narakaukasaḥ / tanmadhye caraṇaṃ śītasnigdhapatraṃ vibhāṣyate //
analyzed: pratapanti sadā tatra prāṇinaḥ naraka okasaḥ tad madhye caraṇam śīta snigdha patram vibhāṣyate

original: patrāṇi yatra khaṇḍāni phalānāṃ pakṣisattama / śvānaśca tatra subalāścarantyāmiṣabhojanāḥ //
analyzed: patrāṇi yatra khaṇḍāni phalānām pakṣi sattama  śvānaḥ ca tatra su balāḥ caranti āmiṣa bhojanāḥ

original: mahāvaktrā mahādaṃṣṭrā vyāghrā iva mahābalāḥ / tataśca vanamālokya śiśiracchāyamagrataḥ //
analyzed: mahā vaktrāḥ mahā daṃṣṭrāḥ vyāghrāḥ iva mahā balāḥ tatas ca vanam ālokya śiśira chāyam agratas

original: prayānti prāṇinastatra kṣuttāpaparipīḍitāḥ / mātarbhrātastāta iti krandamānāḥ suduḥ khitāḥ //
analyzed: prayānti prāṇinaḥ tatra kṣudh tāpa paripīḍitāḥ mātar bhrātar tāta iti krandamānāḥ su duḥ khitāḥ

original: dahyamānāṅghriyugalā dharaṇisthena vahninā / teṣāṃ gatānāṃ tatrāpi ati śītiḥ samīraṇaḥ //
analyzed: dahyamāna aṅghri yugalāḥ dharaṇi sthena vahninā teṣām gatānām tatra api ati śītiḥ samīraṇaḥ

original: pravāti tena pātyante teṣāṃ khaḍgāstathopari / chinnāḥ patanti te bhūmau jvalatpāvakasaṃcaye //
analyzed: pravāti tena pātyante teṣām khaḍgāḥ tathā upari chinnāḥ patanti te bhūmau jvalat pāvaka saṃcaye

original: lelihyamāne cānyatra taptāśeṣamahītale / sārameyāśca te śīghraṃ śātayanti śarīrataḥ //
analyzed: lelihyamāne ca anyatra tapta aśeṣa mahī tale sārameyāḥ ca te śīghram śātayanti śarīrataḥ

original: teṣāṃ khaṇḍānyanekāni rudatāmatibhīṣaṇe / asipatravanaṃ tāta mayaitatparikīrtitam //
analyzed: teṣām khaṇḍāni anekāni rudatām ati bhīṣaṇe asipatravanam tāta mayā etat parikīrtitam

original: ataḥ paraṃ bhīmataraṃ taptakuṃbhaṃ nibodha me / samantatastaptakumbhā vahnijvālāsamanvitāḥ //
analyzed: atas param bhīmataram tapta kuṃbham nibodha me samantataḥ tapta kumbhāḥ vahni jvālā samanvitāḥ

original: jvaladagnicayāstaptatailāyaścūrṇapūritāḥ / eṣu duṣkṛtakarmāṇo yāmyaiḥ kṣiptā hyadhomukhāḥ //
analyzed: jvalat agni cayāḥ tapta taila ayaḥ cūrṇa pūritāḥ eṣu duṣkṛta karmāṇaḥ yāmyaiḥ kṣiptāḥ hi adhomukhāḥ

original: kvāthyante visphuṭadgātrā galanmajjājalānvitāḥ / sphuṭatkapālenatrāsthicchidyamānā vibhīṣaṇaiḥ //
analyzed: kvāthyante visphuṭat gātrāḥ galat majjā jala anvitāḥ sphuṭat kapālena tra asthi chidyamānāḥ vibhīṣaṇaiḥ

original: gṛdhrairutpāṭya mucyante punasteṣveva vegitaiḥ / punaścimacimāyante tailanaikyaṃ vrajanti ca //
analyzed: gṛdhraiḥ utpāṭya mucyante punar teṣu eva vegitaiḥ punar cimacimāyante taila naikyam vrajanti ca

original: dravībhūtaiḥ śirogātraiḥ snāyumāṃsatvagāsthibhiḥ / tato yāmyairnarairāśu darvyāghaṭṭanaghaṭṭitāḥ //
analyzed: dravībhūtaiḥ śiraḥ gātraiḥ snāyu māṃsa tvac āsthibhiḥ tatas yāmyaiḥ naraiḥ āśu darvyā āghaṭṭana ghaṭṭitāḥ

original: kṛtāvarte mahātaile kvāthyante pāpakarmiṇaḥ / eṣa te vistareṇoktastaptakumbho mayā khaga //
analyzed: kṛta āvarte mahātaile kvāthyante pāpa karmiṇaḥ eṣa te vistareṇa uktaḥ taptakumbhaḥ mayā khaga

original: ādimo rauravaḥ prokto mahārauravako 'paraḥ / atiśītastṛtīyastu caturtho hi nikṛntanaḥ //
analyzed: ādimaḥ rauravaḥ proktaḥ paraḥ atiśītaḥ tṛtīyaḥ tu caturthaḥ hi nikṛntanaḥ
