original: apratiṣṭhaḥ pañcamaḥ syādasipatravano 'paraḥ / saptamastaptakumbhastu saptaite narakā matāḥ //
analyzed: apratiṣṭhaḥ pañcamaḥ syāt asipatravano paraḥ saptamaḥ taptakumbhaḥ tu saptā ete narakāḥ matāḥ

original: śrūyantenyānyapi tathā narakāṇi narādhamāḥ / karmaṇāṃ tāratamyena teṣuteṣu patanti hi //
analyzed: tathā narakāṇi nara adhamāḥ karmaṇām tāratamyena teṣu teṣu patanti hi

original: tathā hi narako rodhaḥ śūkarastāla eva ca / taptakumbho mahājvālaḥ śabalo 'tha vimohanaḥ //
analyzed: tathā hi narakaḥ rodhaḥ śūkaraḥ tālaḥ eva ca taptakumbhaḥ mahājvālaḥ vimohanaḥ

original: krimiśca krimabhakṣaśca lālābhakṣo viṣañjanaḥ / adhaḥ śirāḥ pūyavaho rudhirāndhaśca viḍrabhujaḥ //
analyzed: krimiḥ ca krimabhakṣaḥ ca lālābhakṣaḥ viṣañjanaḥ adhas śirāḥ pūyavahaḥ rudhirāndhaḥ ca viḍrabhujaḥ

original: tathā vaitaraṇī sū (mū)
analyzed: tathā vaitaraṇī

original: masipatravanaṃ tathā / agnijvālo mahāghoraḥ sandaṃśo vāpyabhojanaḥ //
analyzed: masipatravanam tathā agni jvālaḥ mahā ghoraḥ sandaṃśaḥ vā api abhojanaḥ

original: tamaśca kālasūtraṃ ca lohaścāpyabhidastathā / apratiṣṭho 'pyavīciśca narakā evamādayaḥ //
analyzed: tamaḥ ca kālasūtram ca lohaḥ ca api abhidaḥ tathā apratiṣṭhaḥ u pi avīciḥ ca narakāḥ evamādayaḥ

original: tāmasā narakāḥ sarve yamasya viṣaye sthitāḥ / yeṣu duṣkṛtakarmāṇaḥ patanti hi pṛthakpṛthak //
analyzed: tāmasāḥ narakāḥ sarve yamasya viṣaye sthitāḥ yeṣu duṣkṛta karmāṇaḥ patanti hi pṛthak pṛthak

original: bhūmeradhastātte sarve rauravādyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ / rogho goghno bhrūṇahā ca agnidātā naraḥ patet //
analyzed: bhūmeḥ adhastāt te sarve raurava ādyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ roghaḥ go ghnaḥ bhrūṇa hā ca agni dātā naraḥ patet

original: sūkare brahmahā majjetsurāpaḥ svarṇataskaraḥ / tāle patetkṣattrahantā hatvā vaiśyaṃ ca durgatiḥ //
analyzed: sūkare brahma hā majjet surā paḥ svarṇa taskaraḥ tāle patet kṣattra hantā hatvā vaiśyam ca durgatiḥ

original: brahmahatyāṃ ca yaḥ kuryādyaśca syādgurutalpagaḥ / svasṛgāmī taptakumbhī tathā rājabhaṭo 'nṛtī //
analyzed: brahmahatyām ca yaḥ kuryāt yaḥ ca syāt guru talpa gaḥ svasṛ gāmī taptakumbhī tathā rāja bhaṭaḥ nṛtī

original: taptalohaiśca vikretā tathā bandhanarakṣitā / mādhvī vikrayakartāṃ ca yastu bhaktaṃ parityajet //
analyzed: tapta lohaiḥ ca vikretā tathā bandhana rakṣitā mādhvī vikraya kartām ca yaḥ tu bhaktam parityajet

original: mahājvālī duhitaraṃ snuṣāṃ gacchati yastu vai / vedo vikrīyate yaiśca vedaṃ dūṣayate tu yaḥ //
analyzed: mahājvālī duhitaram snuṣām gacchati yaḥ tu vai vedaḥ vikrīyate yaiḥ ca vedam dūṣayate tu yaḥ

original: guruṃ caivāvamanyante vākśaraistāḍayanti ca / agamyāgāmī ca naro narakaṃ śabalaṃ vrajet //
analyzed: gurum ca eva avamanyante vāc śaraiḥ tāḍayanti ca  agamyā gāmī ca naraḥ narakam śabalam vrajet

original: vimohe patate śūre maryādāṃ yo bhinatti vai / duriṣṭaṃ kurute yastu kṛmibhakṣaṃ prapadyate //
analyzed: vimohe patate śūre maryādām yaḥ bhinatti vai duriṣṭam kurute yaḥ tu kṛmi bhakṣam prapadyate

original: devabrāhmaṇavidveṣṭā lālābhakṣe patatyapi / kuṇḍakartā kulālaśca nyāsahartā cikitsakaḥ //
analyzed: deva brāhmaṇa vidveṣṭā lālābhakṣe patati api kuṇḍa kartā kulālaḥ ca nyāsa hartā cikitsakaḥ

original: ārāmeṣvagnidātā ca ete yānti viṣañjane / asatpratigrahī yastu tathaivāyājyayājakaḥ //
analyzed: ārāmeṣu agni dātā ca ete yānti viṣañjane asat pratigrahī yaḥ tu tathā eva a yājya yājakaḥ

original: na kṣattrairjovate yastu naro gacchedadhomukham / kṣīraṃ surāṃ ca māsaṃ lākṣāṃ gandhaṃ rasaṃ tilān //
analyzed: na kṣattraiḥ jovate yaḥ tu naraḥ gacchet adhomukham kṣīram surām ca māsam lākṣām gandham rasam tilān

original: evamādīni vikrīṇan ghore pūyavahe patet / yaḥ kukkuṭānnibadhnāti mārjārān sūkarāṃśca tān / pakṣiṇaśca mṛgāṃśchā gānso 'pyevaṃ narakaṃ vrajet //
analyzed: evamādīni vikrīṇan ghore pūya vahe patet  yaḥ kukkuṭān nibadhnāti mārjārān sūkarān ca tān pakṣiṇaḥ ca mṛgān chā gān saḥ pi evam narakam vrajet

original: ājāviko māhiṣikastathā cakrī dhvajī ca yaḥ / raṅgopajīviko vipraḥ śākunirgrāmayājakaḥ //
analyzed: ājāvikaḥ māhiṣikaḥ tathā cakrī dhvajī ca yaḥ raṅga upajīvikaḥ vipraḥ śākuniḥ grāmayājakaḥ

original: agāradāhī garadaḥ kuṇḍāśī somavikrayī / surāpo māṃsabhakṣī ca tathā ca paśughātakaḥ //
analyzed: agāra dāhī garadaḥ kuṇḍāśī soma vikrayī surā paḥ māṃsa bhakṣī ca tathā ca paśu ghātakaḥ

original: rudhirāndhe patantyete patantyete evamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ / upaviṣṭantvekapaṅktyāṃ viṣaṃ sambhojayanti ye //
analyzed: rudhirāndhe patanti ete patanti ete evam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: patanti niraye ghore viḍbhuje nātra saṃśayaḥ / madhugrāho vaitaraṇīmākrośī mūtrasaṃjñake //
analyzed: patanti niraye ghore viḍbhuje na atra saṃśayaḥ madhu grāhaḥ vaitaraṇīm ākrośī mūtra saṃjñake

original: asipatravane 'saucī krodhanaśca etedapi / agnijvālāṃ mṛgavyādho bhojyate yatra vāyasaiḥ //
analyzed: asipatravane saucī krodhanaḥ ca agni jvālām mṛgavyādhaḥ bhojyate yatra vāyasaiḥ

original: ijyāyāṃ vratalopācca sandaṃśe narake patet / skandante yadi vā svapne yatino brahmacāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: ijyāyām vrata lopāt ca sandaṃśe narake patet skandante yadi vā svapne yatinaḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: putrairadhyāpitā ye ca putrairājñāpitāśca ye / te sarve narakaṃ yānti nirayaṃ cāpyabhojanam //
analyzed: putraiḥ adhyāpitāḥ ye ca putraiḥ ājñāpitāḥ ca ye te sarve narakam yānti nirayam ca api abhojanam

original: varṇāśramaviruddhāni krodhaharṣasamanvitāḥ / karmāṇi ye tu kurvanti sarve nirayavāsinaḥ //
analyzed: varṇa āśrama viruddhāni krodha harṣa samanvitāḥ karmāṇi ye tu kurvanti sarve niraya vāsinaḥ

original: upariṣṭātsthito ghora uṣṇātmā rauravo mahān / sudāruṇaḥ suśītātmā tasyā dhastāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: upariṣṭāt sthitaḥ ghoraḥ uṣṇa ātmā rauravaḥ mahān su dāruṇaḥ su śīta ātmā tasyāḥ dhaḥ tāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: evamādikrameṇaiva sarve 'dho 'dhaḥ paristhitāḥ / duḥ khotkarṣaśca sarveṣu karmasvapi nimittataḥ //
analyzed: evamādi krameṇa eva sarve dhaḥ dhaḥ paristhitāḥ duḥ kha utkarṣaḥ ca sarveṣu karmasu api nimittataḥ

original: sukhotkarṣaśca sarvatra dharmasyehanimitataḥ / paśyantinarakāndevā hyadhovaktrānsudāruṇān //
analyzed: sukha utkarṣaḥ ca sarvatra dharmasya iha nimitataḥ paśyanti narakān devāḥ hi adhas vaktrān su dāruṇān

original: nārakāścāpi te devānsarvānpaśyanti ūrdhvagān / etānyānyāni śataśo narakāṇi viyadgate //
analyzed: nārakāḥ ca api te devān sarvān paśyanti ūrdhva gān etāni ānyāni śataśas narakāṇi viyat gate

original: dinedine tu narake pacyate dahyatenyataḥ / śīryate bhidyate 'nyatra cūryate klidyatenyataḥ //
analyzed: dine dine tu narake pacyate dahyate nyatas śīryate bhidyate nyatra cūryate klidyate nyatas

original: kvathyate dīpyate 'nyatra tathā vātahato 'nyataḥ / ekaṃ dinaṃ varṣaśatapramāṇaṃ narake bhavet //
analyzed: kvathyate dīpyate nyatra tathā vāta hataḥ nyatas ekam dinam varṣa śata pramāṇam narake bhavet

original: tataḥ sarveṣu nistīrṇaḥ pāpī tiryaktvamaśnate / kṛmikīṭapataṅgeṣu sthāvaraikaśapheṣu ca //
analyzed: tatas sarveṣu nistīrṇaḥ pāpī tiryaktvam aśnate  kṛmi kīṭa pataṅgeṣu sthāvara ekaśapheṣu ca

original: gatvā vanagajāḍhyeṣu goṣvaṣu tathaiva ca / kharo 'śvo 'śvataro gauraḥ śarabhaścamarī tathā //
analyzed: gatvā vana gaja āḍhyeṣu tathā eva ca

original: ete caikaśaphāḥ ṣaṭ ca śṛṇu pañcanakhānataḥ / anyāsu bahupāpāsu duḥ khadāsu ca yo niṣu //
analyzed: ete ca ekaśaphāḥ ṣaṭ ca śṛṇu anyāsu bahu pāpāsu dus kha dāsu

original: mānuṣyaṃ prāpyate kubjo kutsito vāmano 'pi vā / caṇḍālapukkasādyāsu narayoniṣu jāyate //
analyzed: mānuṣyam prāpyate vā caṇḍāla pukkasa ādyāsu nara yoniṣu jāyate

original: muhurgarbhe vasantyeva mriyante ca muhurmuhuḥ / avaśiṣṭena pāpena puṇyena ca samanvitaḥ //
analyzed: muhur garbhe vasanti eva mriyante ca muhur muhur  avaśiṣṭena pāpena puṇyena ca samanvitaḥ

original: tataścārohiṇīṃ yoniṃ śūdravaiśyanṛpādikam / vipradevendratāṃ cāpi kadācidadhirohati //
analyzed: tatas ca ārohiṇīm yonim śūdra vaiśya nṛpa ādikam vipra deva indra tām ca api kadācid adhirohati

original: evaṃ tu pāpakarmāṇo nirayeṣu patantyadhaḥ / yathā puṇyakṛto yānti tanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu //
analyzed: evam tu pāpa karmāṇaḥ nirayeṣu patanti adhas yathā puṇya kṛtaḥ yānti tat me nigadataḥ śṛṇu

original: te yamena vinirdiṣṭāṃ yoniṃ puṇyagatiṃ narāḥ / pragītagandharvagaṇā nṛtyotsavasamākulāḥ //
analyzed: te yamena vinirdiṣṭām yonim puṇya gatim narāḥ pragīta gandharva gaṇāḥ nṛtya utsava samākulāḥ

original: hāranūpuramādhuryaiḥ śobhitānyamalāni tu / prayāntyāśu vimānāni divyagandhasragujjvalāḥ //
analyzed: hāra nūpura mādhuryaiḥ śobhitāni amalāni tu prayānti āśu vimānāni divya gandha sraj ujjvalāḥ

original: tasmācca pracyutā rājñāmanyeṣāṃ ca mahātmanām / jāyante nīrujāṃ gehe sa dvṛttipīrapālakāḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt ca pracyutāḥ rājñām anyeṣām ca mahātmanām jāyante nīrujām gehe sa dvṛtti pīra pālakāḥ

original: bhogānsamprāpnuvantyugrāṃstato yāntyūrdhvamanyathā / avarohiṇīṃ samprāpya pūrvavadyanti mānavāḥ //
analyzed: bhogān samprāpnuvanti ugrān tatas yānti ūrdhvam anyathā  avarohiṇīm samprāpya pūrvavat yanti mānavāḥ

original: jātasya mṛtyuloke vai prāṇino maraṇaṃ dhruvam / pāpiṣṭhānāmadomārgājjīvo niṣkramate dhruvam //
analyzed: jātasya mṛtyu loke vai prāṇinaḥ maraṇam dhruvam pāpiṣṭhānām adaḥ mārgāt jīvaḥ niṣkramate dhruvam

original: pṛthivyāṃ līyate pṛthvī āpaścaiva tathāpsu ca / tejastejasi līyate samīre ca samīraṇaḥ //
analyzed: pṛthivyām līyate pṛthvī āpaḥ ca eva tathā apsu ca tejaḥ tejasi līyate samīre ca samīraṇaḥ

original: ākāśe ca tathākāśaṃ sarvavyāpi niśākare / tatra kāmastathā krodhaḥ kāye pañcendriyāṇi ca //
analyzed: ākāśe ca tathā ākāśam sarva vyāpi niśākare tatra kāmaḥ tathā krodhaḥ kāye pañca indriyāṇi ca

original: ete tārkṣya samākhyātā dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ / kāmaḥ krodho hyahaṅkāro manastatraiva nāyakaḥ //
analyzed: ete tārkṣya samākhyātāḥ dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ kāmaḥ krodhaḥ hi ahaṅkāraḥ manaḥ tatra eva nāyakaḥ

original: saṃhāraścaiva kālo 'sau puṇyapāpena saṃyutaḥ / pañcendriyasamāyuktaḥ sakalairvibudhaiḥ saha //
analyzed: saṃhāraḥ ca eva sau puṇya pāpena saṃyutaḥ pañca indriya samāyuktaḥ sakalaiḥ vibudhaiḥ saha

original: praviśetsa nave dehe pṛhe daradhe guhī yathā / śarīre ye samāsīnāḥ sarve vai sapta dhātavaḥ //
analyzed: praviśet sa nave dehe pṛhe daradhe guhī yathā śarīre ye samāsīnāḥ sarve vai sapta dhātavaḥ

original: ṣāṭkauśiko hyayaṃ kāyaḥ sarve vātāśca dehinām / mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ tadyogādye cānye vyādhayastathā //
analyzed: ṣāṭkauśikaḥ hi ayam kāyaḥ sarve vātāḥ ca dehinām mūtram purīṣam tad yogāt ye ca anye vyādhayaḥ tathā

original: pittaṃ śleṣmā tathā majjā māṃsaṃ vai meda eva ca / asthi śukraṃ tathā snāyurdehena saha dahyati //
analyzed: pittam śleṣmā tathā majjā māṃsam vai medaḥ eva ca asthi śukram tathā snāyuḥ dehena saha dahyati

original: eṣa te kathitastārkṣya vināsaḥ sarvadehinam / kathayāmi punasteṣāṃ śarīraṃ ca yathā bhavet //
analyzed: eṣa te kathitaḥ tārkṣya vināsaḥ sarva dehinam kathayāmi punar teṣām śarīram ca yathā bhavet

original: ekastambaṃsnāyubaddhaṃ sthūṇātrayavibhūṣaṇam / indriyaiśca samāyuktaṃ navadvāraṃ śarīrakam //
analyzed: eka stambaṃ snāyu baddham sthūṇā traya vibhūṣaṇam indriyaiḥ ca samāyuktam nava dvāram śarīrakam

original: viṣayaiśca samākrāntaṃ kāmakrodhasamākulam / rāgadveṣasamākīrṇaṃ tṛṣṇādurgamataskaram //
analyzed: viṣayaiḥ ca samākrāntam kāma krodha samākulam rāga dveṣa samākīrṇam tṛṣṇā durgama taskaram

original: lobhajālaparicchinnaṃ mohavastreṇa veṣṭitam / subaddhaṃ māyayā caitallobhenādhiṣṭhitaṃ puram //
analyzed: lobha jāla paricchinnam moha vastreṇa veṣṭitam su baddham māyayā ca etat lobhena adhiṣṭhitam puram

original: etadguṇasamākīrṇaṃ śarīraṃ sarvadehinām / ātmānaṃ ye na jānanti te narāḥ paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: etad guṇa samākīrṇam śarīram sarva dehinām ātmānam ye na jānanti te narāḥ paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: evameva samākhyātaṃ śarīraṃ te caturvidham / caturaśītilakṣāṇi nirmitā yonayaḥ purā //
analyzed: evam eva samākhyātam śarīram te caturvidham caturaśīti lakṣāṇi nirmitāḥ yonayaḥ purā

original: udbhijjāḥ svedajāścaiva aṇḍajāśca jarāyujāḥ / etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ nirayasya prapañcataḥ //
analyzed: udbhid jāḥ sveda jāḥ ca eva aṇḍa jāḥ ca jarāyu jāḥ etat te sarvam ākhyātam nirayasya prapañcataḥ

original: athayāmi kramaprāptaṃ praṣṭu vā vartate spṛhā //
analyzed: athayāmi krama prāptam praṣṭu vā vartate spṛhā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dharmakāṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde narakatatpraveśanirgamanādivarṇanaṃ nāma tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dharmakāṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde narakatatpraveśanirgamanādivarṇanam nāma tṛtīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 4
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / jñānato 'jñānato vāpiyannaraiḥ kaluṣaṃ kṛtam / tasya pāpasya śuddhyarthaṃ vidheyā niṣkṛtirnaraiḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca jñānataḥ jñānataḥ vā api yat naraiḥ kaluṣam kṛtam tasya pāpasya śuddhi artham vidheyā niṣkṛtiḥ naraiḥ

original: bhasmādisnānadaśakamādau kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ / yathāśakti ṣaḍabdādipratyāmnāyāccaredapi //
analyzed: bhasma ādi snāna daśakam ādau kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ yathāśakti ṣaṣ abda ādi pratyāmnāyāt caret api

original: tadardhaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā tadardhārdhamathāpi vā / yathāśaktyā tataḥ kuryāddaśa dānāni vai śṛṇu //
analyzed: tad ardham vā tad ardham vā tad ardha ardham atha api vā yathāśaktyā tatas kuryāt daśa dānāni vai śṛṇu

original: gobhūtilahiraṇyājyavāsodhanyaguḍāstathā / rajataṃ lavaṇaṃ caiva dānāni daśa vai viduḥ //
analyzed: go bhū tila hiraṇya ājya vāsaḥ dhanya guḍāḥ tathā rajatam lavaṇam ca eva dānāni daśa vai viduḥ

original: prāyaścitte tvāgatā ye tebhyo dadyānnaro daśa / tato yamadvārapathe pūyaśoṇitasaṃkule //
analyzed: prāyaścitte tu āgatāḥ ye tebhyaḥ dadyāt naraḥ daśa tatas yama dvāra pathe pūya śoṇita saṃkule

original: nadīṃ vaitaraṇīṃ tartuṃ dadyādvaitaraṇīṃ ca gām / kṛṣṇastanī sakṛṣṇāṅgī sā vai vaitaraṇī smṛtā //
analyzed: nadīm vaitaraṇīm tartum dadyāt vaitaraṇīm ca gām kṛṣṇa stanī sa kṛṣṇa aṅgī sā vai vaitaraṇī smṛtā

original: tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca karpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā / saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: tilāḥ loham hiraṇyam ca karpāsam lavaṇam tathā saptadhānyam kṣitiḥ gāvaḥ ekaikam pāvanam smṛtam

original: etānyaṣṭau mahādānānyuttamāya dvijātaye / ātureṇa tu deyāni padarūpāṇi me śṛṇu //
analyzed: etāni aṣṭau mahā dānāni uttamāya dvijātaye ātureṇa tu deyāni pada rūpāṇi me śṛṇu

original: chatro pānahavastrāṇi mudrikā ca kamaṇḍaluḥ / āsanaṃ bhājanaṃ padaṃ cāṣṭavidhaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: chatraḥ u pānaha vastrāṇi mudrikā ca kamaṇḍaluḥ āsanam bhājanam padam ca aṣṭavidham smṛtam

original: tilāpātraṃ sarpiḥ pātraṃ śayyā sopaskarā tathā / etatsarvaṃ pradātavyaṃ yadiṣṭaṃ cātmano 'pi tat //
analyzed: tila apātram sarpiḥ pātram śayyā sa upaskarā tathā etat sarvam pradātavyam yat iṣṭam ca ātmanaḥ pi tat

original: aśvo rathaśca mahīṣī vyañjanaṃ vastrameva ca / brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pradātavyaṃ brahmapūrvamapi svayam //
analyzed: aśvaḥ rathaḥ ca mahī iṣī vyañjanam vastram eva ca brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pradātavyam brahma pūrvam api svayam

original: dānā nyanyānyapi khaga tarpayetsvīyaśaktitaḥ / prāyāścittaṃ kṛtaṃ yena daśa dānānyapi kṣitau //
analyzed: dānā ni anyāni api khaga tarpayet svīya śaktitaḥ prāyāḥ cittam kṛtam yena daśa dānāni api kṣitau

original: dānaṃ gorvaitaraṇyāśca dānānyaṣṭau tathāpi vā / tilapātraṃ sarpiḥ pātraṃ śayyādānaṃ tathaiva ca //
analyzed: dānam goḥ vaitaraṇyāḥ ca dānāni aṣṭau tathā api vā tila pātram sarpiḥ pātram śayyā dānam tathā eva ca

original: padadānaṃ ca vidhivannāsau nirayagarbhagaḥ / svātantryeṇāpi lavaṇadānamicchanti sūrayaḥ //
analyzed: pada dānam ca vidhivat na asau niraya garbha gaḥ svātantryeṇa api lavaṇa dānam icchanti sūrayaḥ

original: viṣṇudehasamutpanno yato 'yaṃ lavaṇo rasaḥ / āturasya yadā prāṇā na yānti vasudhātale //
analyzed: viṣṇu deha samutpannaḥ yatas yam lavaṇaḥ rasaḥ āturasya yadā prāṇāḥ na yānti vasudhā tale

original: lavaṇaṃ ca tadā deyaṃ dvārasyodvāṭanaṃ divaḥ / yānikāni ca dānāni svayaṃ dattāni mānavaiḥ //
analyzed: lavaṇam ca tadā deyam dvārasya udvāṭanam divaḥ  yānikāni ca dānāni svayam dattāni mānavaiḥ

original: tānitāni ca sarvāṇi upatiṣṭhanti cāgrataḥ / prāyaścittaṃ kṛtaṃ yena sāṅgaṃ khaga sa vai pumān //
analyzed: tāni tāni ca sarvāṇi upatiṣṭhanti ca agratas prāyaścittam kṛtam yena sa aṅgam khaga sa vai pumān

original: pāpāni bhasmasātkṛtvā svargaloke mahīyate / amṛtaṃ tu gavāṃ kṣīraṃ yataḥ patagasattam //
analyzed: pāpāni bhasmasātkṛtvā svarga loke mahīyate  amṛtam tu gavām kṣīram yatas pataga sattam

original: tasmāddadāti yo dhenumamṛtatvaṃ sa gacchati / dānānyaṣṭau tu dattvā vai gandharvanilaye vaset //
analyzed: tasmāt dadāti yaḥ dhenum amṛta tvam sa gacchati dānāni aṣṭau tu dattvā vai gandharvanilaye vaset

original: ālayastatra raudre hi dahyate yena mānavaḥ / chatradānena succhāyā jāyate pathi tuṣṭidā //
analyzed: ālayaḥ tatra raudre hi dahyate yena mānavaḥ chatra dānena su chāyā jāyate pathi tuṣṭi dā

original: asipatravanaṃ dhāramatikrāmati vai sukham / aśvārūḍhaśca vrajati dadate yadyupānahau //
analyzed: asipatravanam dhāram atikrāmati vai sukham aśva ārūḍhaḥ ca vrajati dadate yadi upānahau

original: bhojanāsanadānena sukhaṃ mārge bhunakti vai / pradeśe nirjale dātā sukhī syādvai kamaṇḍaloḥ //
analyzed: bhojana āsana dānena sukham mārge bhunakti vai pradeśe nirjale dātā sukhī syāt vai kamaṇḍaloḥ

original: yamadūtā mahāraudrāḥ karālāḥ kṛṣṇapiṅgalāḥ / na pīḍayanti dākṣiṇyādvastrābharaṇadānataḥ //
analyzed: yama dūtāḥ mahā raudrāḥ karālāḥ kṛṣṇa piṅgalāḥ na pīḍayanti dākṣiṇyāt vastra ābharaṇa dānataḥ

original: tilapātraṃ tu viprāya dattaṃ patraratha dhruvam / nāśayettrividhaṃ ṣāpaṃ vāṅmanaḥ kāyasambhavam //
analyzed: tila pātram tu viprāya dattam patraratha dhruvam nāśayet trividham ṣāpam vāc manaḥ kāya sambhavam

original: ghṛtapātrapradāne rudraloke vasennaraḥ / sarvopaskarasaṃyuktāṃ śayyāṃ dattvā dvijātaye //
analyzed: ghṛta pātra pradāne rudra loke vaset naraḥ sarva upaskara saṃyuktām śayyām dattvā dvijātaye

original: nānāpsarobhirākīrṇaṃ vimānamadhirohati / ṣaṣṭivarṣasahasrāṇi krīḍitvā śakramandire //
analyzed: nānā apsarobhiḥ ākīrṇam vimānam adhirohati ṣaṣṭi varṣa sahasrāṇi krīḍitvā śakra mandire

original: indralokātparibhraṣṭa iha loke nṛpo bhavet / sarvopaskaraṇopetaṃ yuvānaṃ doṣavarjitam //
analyzed: indra lokāt paribhraṣṭaḥ iha loke nṛpaḥ bhavet sarva upaskaraṇa upetam yuvānam doṣa varjitam

original: yo 'śvaṃ dadāti viprāya svargaloke ca tiṣṭhati / yāvanti romāṇi haye bhavanti hi khageśvara //
analyzed: yaḥ śvam dadāti viprāya svarga loke ca tiṣṭhati yāvanti romāṇi haye bhavanti hi khageśvara

original: tāvato rājitāṃllokānāpnuvanti hi puṣkalān / caturbhisturagairyuktaṃ sarvopakaraṇairyutam //
analyzed: tāvataḥ rājitān lokān āpnuvanti hi puṣkalān  caturbhiḥ turagaiḥ yuktam sarva upakaraṇaiḥ yutam

original: rathaṃ dvijātaye dattvā rājasūyaphalaṃ labht //
analyzed: ratham dvijātaye dattvā rājasūya phalam

original: dugdhādhikāṃ ca mahiṣīṃ navameghavarṇāṃ santuṣṭatarṇakavalīṃ jaghanābhirāmām / dattvā suvarṇatilakāṃ dvijapuṅgavāya lokodayaṃ sa jayatīti kimatra citram //
analyzed: dugdha adhikām ca mahiṣīm nava megha varṇām santuṣṭa tarṇa kavalīm jaghana abhirāmām dattvā suvarṇa tilakām dvija puṅgavāya loka udayam sa jayati iti kim atra citram

original: tālavṛntasya dānena vāyunā vījyate pathi / kāntiyuk subhagaḥ śrīmān bhavatyambaradānataḥ //
analyzed: tālavṛntasya dānena vāyunā vījyate pathi kānti yuj subhagaḥ śrīmān bhavati ambara dānataḥ

original: rasānnopaskarayutaṃ gṛhaṃ viprāya yor'payet / na hīyate tasya vaṃśaḥ svargaṃ prāpnotyanuttamam //
analyzed: rasa anna upaskara yutam gṛham viprāya yā ūrpayet na hīyate tasya vaṃśaḥ svargam prāpnoti anuttamam

original: bhavatyatra khagaśreṣṭha phalagaukhalāghavam / śraddhāśraddhāvibhedena dānagauravalāghavāt //
analyzed: bhavati atra khaga śreṣṭha śraddhā śraddhā vibhedena dāna gaurava lāghavāt

original: tato yenāmbudānāni kṛtānyatra rasāstathā / tadā khaga tathāhlādamāpadi pratipadyate //
analyzed: tatas yena ambu dānāni kṛtāni atra rasāḥ tathā tadā khaga tathā āhlādam āpadi pratipadyate

original: annāni yena dattāni śraddhāpūtena cetasā / so 'pi tṛptimavāpnoti vināpyannena vai tadā //
analyzed: annāni yena dattāni śraddhā pūtena cetasā  saḥ u pi tṛptim avāpnoti vinā api annena vai tadā

original: āsanne maraṇe kuryātsaṃnyāsaṃ cedvidhānataḥ / āvarteta punarnāsau brahmabhūyāya kalpate //
analyzed: āsanne maraṇe kuryāt saṃnyāsam ced vidhānataḥ  āvarteta punar na asau brahma bhūyāya kalpate

original: āsannamaraṇo matyaścettīrthaṃ pratinayite / tīrthaprāptau bhavenmuktirmriyate yadi mārgagaḥ / padepade kratusamaṃ bhavettasya na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: āsanna maraṇaḥ matyaḥ ced tīrtham tīrtha prāptau bhavet muktiḥ mriyate yadi mārga gaḥ pade pade kratu samam bhavet tasya na saṃśayaḥ

original: gṛhṇīyāccedanaśanaṃ vrataṃ vidhivadāgate / mṛtyau na so 'pi saṃsāre bhūyaḥ paryaṭati dvija //
analyzed: gṛhṇīyāt ced anaśanam vratam vidhivat āgate mṛtyau na saḥ saṃsāre bhūyas paryaṭati dvija

original: kiṃ dānamiti turyasya praśnasyottaramīritam / dāhamṛtyorantare kimitipraśnottaraṃ śṛṇu //
analyzed: kim dānam iti turyasya praśnasya uttaram īritam dāha mṛtyoḥ antare kim iti praśna uttaram śṛṇu

original: gataprāṇaṃ tato jñātvā snātvā putrādirāśu tam / śavaṃ jalena śuddhena kṣālayedavicārayan //
analyzed: gata prāṇam tatas jñātvā snātvā putra ādiḥ āśu tam śavam jalena śuddhena kṣālayet avicārayan

original: paridhāpyāhate vastre candanaiḥ prokṣayettanum / tato mṛtasya sthāne vai ekoddiṣṭaṃ samācaret //
analyzed: paridhāpya ahate vastre candanaiḥ prokṣayet tanum tatas mṛtasya sthāne vai ekoddiṣṭam samācaret

original: prayogapūrvaṃ dāhasya yogyatādiryathā bhavet / āṃsanaṃ prākṣaṇa ca syānna syādetaccatuṣṭayam //
analyzed: prayoga pūrvam dāhasya yogyatā ādiḥ yathā bhavet āṃsanam ca syāt na syāt etat catuṣṭayam

original: āvāhanārcana caiva pāntrālambhāvagāhane / bhaveddānānnasaṅkalpaḥ piṇḍadānaṃ sadā bhavet //
analyzed: āvāhana arcana ca eva bhavet dāna anna saṅkalpaḥ piṇḍa dānam sadā bhavet

original: padārthapañcakaṃ na syādrekhā pratyavanejanam / dadyādakṣayyamudakaṃ na syādetattrayaṃ punaḥ //
analyzed: padārtha pañcakam na syāt rekhā pratyavanejanam dadyāt akṣayyam udakam na syāt etat trayam punar

original: svadhāvācanamāśīśca tilakaṃ ca khagottama / ghaṭaṃ dadyātsamāṣānnaṃ dadyāllohasya dakṣiṇām //
analyzed: svadhāvācanam āśīḥ ca tilakam ca khaga uttama ghaṭam dadyāt sa māṣa annam dadyāt lohasya dakṣiṇām

original: piṇḍasya cālanaṃ proktaṃ naiva proktamidaṃ trikam / pracchādanavisargau ca svastivācanakaṃ tathā //
analyzed: piṇḍasya cālanam proktam na eva proktam idam trikam pracchādana visargau ca svastivācanakam tathā

original: eṣu ṣaṭsu vidhiḥ proktaḥ śrāddheṣu malineṣu te / ṣaḍeva maraṇasthāne dvāri cātvarike tathā //
analyzed: eṣu ṣaṭsu vidhiḥ proktaḥ śrāddheṣu malineṣu te ṣaṣ eva maraṇa sthāne dvāri cātvarike tathā

original: viśrāme kāṣṭhacayane tathā sañcayane khaga / mṛtisthāne śavo nāma bhūmistuṣyati devatā //
analyzed: viśrāme kāṣṭha cayane tathā sañcayane khaga mṛti sthāne śavaḥ nāma bhūmiḥ tuṣyati devatā

original: pāntho dvāri bhavettena prītā syādvāstudevatā / catvare khecarastena tuṣyedbhṛtādidevatā //
analyzed: pānthaḥ dvāri bhavet tena prītā syāt vāstu devatā  catvare khecaraḥ tena tuṣyet bhṛta ādi devatā

original: viśrāme bhūtasaṃjño 'yaṃ tuṣṭastena diśo daśa / citāyāṃ sādhaka iti sañcitau preta ucyate //
analyzed: viśrāme bhūta saṃjñaḥ yam tuṣṭaḥ tena diśaḥ daśa citāyām sādhakaḥ iti sañcitau pretaḥ ucyate

original: tiladarbhaghṛtedhāṃsi gṛhītvā tu sutādayaḥ / gāthāṃ yamasya sūktaṃ vāpyadhīyānā vrajanti hi //
analyzed: tila darbha ghṛta idhāṃsi gṛhītvā tu suta ādayaḥ gāthām yamasya sūktam vā api adhīyānāḥ vrajanti hi

original: aharaharnīyamāno gāmaśvaṃ puruṣaṃ vṛṣam / vaivasvato na tṛpyeta surayā tviva durmatiḥ //
analyzed: ahar ahar nīyamānaḥ gām aśvam puruṣam vṛṣam vaivasvataḥ na tṛpyeta surayā tu iva durmatiḥ

original: imāṃ gāthamapeteti sūktaṃ vā pathi saṃpaṭhet / dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśyaraṇyaṃ vrajeyuḥ sarvabāndhavāḥ //
analyzed: imām gātham apeta iti sūktam vā pathi saṃpaṭhet dakṣiṇasyām diśi araṇyam vrajeyuḥ sarva bāndhavāḥ

original: pathi śrāddhadvayaṃ kuryātpūrvoktavidhinā khaga / tataḥ śanairbhūtale vai dakṣiṇāśirasaṃ śavam //
analyzed: pathi śrāddha dvayam kuryāt pūrva ukta vidhinā khaga tatas śanais bhū tale vai dakṣiṇāśirasam śavam

original: sthāpayitvā citābhūmau pūrvoktaṃ śrāddhamācaret / tṛṇakāṣṭhatilājyādi svayaṃ ninyuḥ sutādayaḥ //
analyzed: sthāpayitvā citā bhūmau pūrva uktam śrāddham ācaret tṛṇa kāṣṭha tila ājya ādi svayam ninyuḥ suta ādayaḥ

original: śūdrānītaiḥ kṛtaṃ karma sarvaṃ bhavati niṣphalam / prācīnāvītinā bhāvyaṃ dakṣiṇābhimukena ca //
analyzed: śūdra ānītaiḥ kṛtam karma sarvam bhavati niṣphalam prācīnāvītinā bhāvyam dakṣiṇa abhimukena ca

original: vedī tatra prakartavyā yathāśāstramathāṇḍaja / pratevastraṃ dvidhā kṛtvārdhena taṃ chādayettataḥ //
analyzed: vedī tatra prakartavyā yathāśāstram atha aṇḍaja dvidhā kṛtvā ardhena tam chādayet tatas

original: ardhaṃ śmaśānavāsārthaṃ bhūmāveva viniḥ kṣipet / tataḥ pūrvoktavidhinā piṇḍaṃ pretakare nyaset //
analyzed: ardham śmaśāna vāsa artham bhūmau eva kṣipet tatas pūrva ukta vidhinā piṇḍam preta kare nyaset

original: ājyenābhyañjanaṃ kāryaṃ sarvāṅgeṣu śavasya ca / dāhamṛtyorantarāle vidhiḥ piṇḍasya taṃ śṛṇu //
analyzed: ājyena abhyañjanam kāryam sarva aṅgeṣu śavasya ca  dāha mṛtyoḥ antarāle vidhiḥ piṇḍasya tam śṛṇu

original: pūrvoktaiḥ pañcabhiḥ piṇḍaiḥ śavasyāhutiyogyatā / anyathā copaghātācca rākṣasādyā bhavanti hi //
analyzed: pūrva uktaiḥ pañcabhiḥ piṇḍaiḥ śavasya āhuti yogyatā anyathā ca upaghātāt ca rākṣasa ādyāḥ bhavanti hi

original: saṃmṛjya copalipyātha ullikhyoddhṛtya vedikām / abhyukṣyopasamādhāya vahniṃ tatra vidhānataḥ //
analyzed: saṃmṛjya ca upalipya atha ullikhya uddhṛtya vedikām abhyukṣya upasamādhāya vahnim tatra vidhānataḥ

original: puṣpākṣataiśca saṃpūjya devaṃ kravyādasaṃjñakam / śrautena tu vidhānena hyāhitāgniṃ dahedvudhaḥ //
analyzed: puṣpa akṣataiḥ ca saṃpūjya devam kravyāda saṃjñakam śrautena tu vidhānena hi āhitāgnim dahet vudhaḥ

original: caṇḍālāgniṃ citāgniṃ ca patitāgniṃ parityajet / tvaṃ bhūtakṛjjagadyonistvaṃ lokaparipālakaḥ //
analyzed: caṇḍāla agnim citā agnim ca patita agnim parityajet tvam bhūta kṛt jagat yoniḥ tvam loka paripālakaḥ

original: upasaṃhara tasmāttvamenaṃ svargaṃ nayāmṛtam / iti kravyādamabhyarcya śarīrāhutimācaret //
analyzed: upasaṃhara tasmāt tvam enam svargam naya amṛtam iti kravyādam abhyarcya śarīra āhutim ācaret

original: ardhadagdhe tathā dehe dadyādājyāhutiṃ tataḥ / asmāttvamadhijāto 'si tvadayaṃ jāyatāṃ punaḥ //
analyzed: ardha dagdhe tathā dehe dadyāt ājya āhutim tatas asmāt tvam adhijātaḥ si tvat ayam jāyatām punar

original: asau svargāya lokāya svāhetyuktvā tu nāmataḥ / evamājyāhutiṃ dattvā tilamiśrāṃ samantrakam //
analyzed: asau svargāya lokāya svāhā iti uktvā tu nāmataḥ evam ājya āhutim dattvā tila miśrām sa mantrakam

original: roditavyaṃ tato gāḍhamevaṃ tasya sukhaṃ bhavet / dāhasyānantaraṃ tatra kṛtvā sañcayanikriyām //
analyzed: roditavyam tatas gāḍham evam tasya sukham bhavet dāhasya anantaram tatra kṛtvā sañcaya nikriyām

original: pretapiṇḍaṃ pradadyācca dāhārtiśamanaṃ khaga / tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛktvā citāprasthānavīkṣakāḥ //
analyzed: preta piṇḍam pradadyāt ca dāha ārti śamanam khaga tatas pradakṣiṇam citā prasthāna vīkṣakāḥ

original: kaniṣṭhapūrvāḥ snānārthaṃ gaccheyuḥ sūktajāpakāḥ / tato jālasamīpe tu gatvā prakṣālya cāṃśukam //
analyzed: kaniṣṭha pūrvāḥ snāna artham gaccheyuḥ sūkta jāpakāḥ tatas jāla samīpe tu gatvā prakṣālya ca aṃśukam

original: paridhāya punastacca brṛyustaṃ puruṣaṃ prati / udakaṃ tu kariṣyāmaḥ sacailaṃ puruṣāstataḥ //
analyzed: paridhāya punar tat ca brṛyuḥ tam puruṣam prati  udakam tu kariṣyāmaḥ sa cailam puruṣāḥ tatas

original: kurudhvamityeva vadecchatavarṣāvare mṛte / putrādyā vṛddhapūrvāste ekavastrāḥ śikhāṃ vinā //
analyzed: kurudhvam iti eva vadet śata varṣa avare mṛte putra ādyāḥ vṛddha pūrvāḥ te eka vastrāḥ śikhām vinā

original: prācīnāvītinaḥ sarve viśeyurmaunino jalam / apanaḥ śośucadaghamanena pitṛdiṅmukhāḥ //
analyzed: prācīnāvītinaḥ sarve viśeyuḥ mauninaḥ jalam apanaḥ śośucat agham anena pitṛ diṅmukhāḥ

original: jalāvaghaṭṭanaṃ cava na kuryuḥ snānakārakāḥ / tatastaṭe samāgatya śikhāṃ baddhvā ṛjūn kuśān //
analyzed: jala avaghaṭṭanam na kuryuḥ snāna kārakāḥ tatas taṭe samāgatya śikhām baddhvā ṛjūn kuśān

original: dakṣiṇāgrahastayostu kṛtvātha satilaṃ jalam / ādāyāñjalinā yāmyāṃ duḥ khī paitṛkatīrthataḥ //
analyzed: dakṣiṇa agra hastayoḥ tu kṛtvā atha sa tilam jalam ādāya añjalinā yāmyām duḥ khī paitṛka tīrthataḥ

original: ekavāraṃ trivāraṃ vā daśavāramathāpi vā / bhūmāvaśmani vā sarve kṣipeyurvāgyatāḥ khaga //
analyzed: eka vāram tri vāram vā daśa vāram atha api vā bhūmau aśmani vā sarve kṣipeyuḥ vāgyatāḥ khaga

original: tṛpyantu tṛpyatāṃ vāpi tarpayāmyupatiṣṭhatām / pretaitadamukagotretyukteṣvevaṃ samuccaret //
analyzed: tṛpyantu tṛpyatām vā api tarpayāmi upatiṣṭhatām preta etat amuka gotra iti ukteṣu evam samuccaret

original: jalāñjalau kṛte paścādvidheyaṃ dantadhāvanam / tyajanti gotriṇaḥ sarve dināni nava kāśyapa //
analyzed: jala añjalau kṛte paścāt vidheyam dantadhāvanam tyajanti gotriṇaḥ sarve dināni nava kāśyapa

original: tata uttīryodakādvai vastrāṇi paridhāya ca / snānavastraṃ sakṛtpīḍya viśeyuḥ śucibhūtale //
analyzed: tatas uttīrya udakāt vai vastrāṇi paridhāya ca snāna vastram sakṛt pīḍya viśeyuḥ śuci bhū tale

original: aśrupātaṃ na kurvīta dattvā dāhajalāñjalim / śleṣmāśru bāndhavairmuktaṃ preto bhuṅkte yato 'vaśaḥ //
analyzed: aśru pātam na kurvīta dattvā dāha jala añjalim śleṣma aśru bāndhavaiḥ muktam pretaḥ bhuṅkte yatas vaśaḥ

original: ato na roditavyaṃ hi kriyāḥ kāryāḥ svaśaktitaḥ / tatasteṣūpaviṣṭeṣu purāṇajñaḥ sukṛtsvakaḥ //
analyzed: atas na roditavyam hi kriyāḥ kāryāḥ sva śaktitaḥ tatas teṣu upaviṣṭeṣu purāṇa jñaḥ sukṛt svakaḥ

original: śokāpanodaṃ kurvīta saṃsārānityatāṃ bruvan / mānuṣye kadalīstanbhe asāre sāramārgaṇam //
analyzed: śoka apanodam kurvīta saṃsāra anitya tām bruvan mānuṣye kadalī stanbhe asāre sāra mārgaṇam

original: karoti yaḥ sa saṃmūḍho jalabudvadrasannibhe / pañcadhā saṃbhṛtaḥ kāyo yadi pañcatvamāgataḥ //
analyzed: karoti yaḥ sa saṃmūḍhaḥ jala budh vat rasannibhe pañcadhā saṃbhṛtaḥ kāyaḥ yadi pañcatvam āgataḥ

original: karmabhiḥ svaśarīrotthaistatra kā paridevanā / gantrī vasumatī nāśamudadhirdaivatāni ca //
analyzed: karmabhiḥ sva śarīra utthaiḥ tatra kā paridevanā gantrī vasumatī nāśam udadhiḥ daivatāni ca

original: phenaprakhyaḥ kathaṃ nāśaṃ martyaloko na yāsyati / evaṃ saṃśrāvayettatra mṛduśādvalasaṃsthitān //
analyzed: phena prakhyaḥ katham nāśam martya lokaḥ na yāsyati  / evam saṃśrāvayet tatra mṛdu śādvala saṃsthitān

original: te 'yi saṃśrutya gaccheyurgṛhaṃ bālapuraḥ sarāḥ / vidaśya rnibapatrāṇi niyatā dvāri veśmanaḥ //
analyzed: te saṃśrutya gaccheyuḥ gṛham bāla puras sarāḥ  vidaśya niyatāḥ dvāri veśmanaḥ

original: ācamya vahnisalilaṃ gomayaṃ gaurasarṣapān / dūrvāpravālaṃ vṛṣabhamanyadapyatha maṅgalam //
analyzed: ācamya vahni salilam gomayam gaurasarṣapān dūrvā pravālam vṛṣabham anyat api atha maṅgalam

original: praviśeyuḥ samālabhya kṛtvāśmani padaṃ śanaiḥ / śrautena tu vidhānena āhitāgniṃ dehadvadhaḥ //
analyzed: praviśeyuḥ samālabhya kṛtvā aśmani padam śanais śrautena tu vidhānena āhitāgnim deha dvadhaḥ

original: ūnadvivarṣaṃ nikhanenna kuryādudakaṃ tataḥ / yoṣitpativratā yā syādbhartāraṃ yānugacchati //
analyzed: ūna dvi varṣam nikhanet na kuryāt udakam tatas yoṣit pativratā yā syāt bhartāram yā anugacchati

original: prayoga pūrvaṃ bhartāraṃ namaskṛtyāruheccitim / citibhraṣṭā tu yā mohātsā prājāpatyamācaret //
analyzed: prayoga pūrvam bhartāram namaskṛtya āruhet citim  citi bhraṣṭā tu yā mohāt sā prājāpatyam ācaret

original: tisraḥ koṭyordhakoṭī ya yāni lomāni mānuṣe / tāvatkālaṃ vasetsvarge bhartāraṃ yānugacchati //
analyzed: tisraḥ yāni lomāni mānuṣe  tāvatkālam vaset svarge bhartāram yā anugacchati

original: vyālagrāhī yathā vyālaṃ bilāduddharate balāt / tadvaduddhṛtya sā nārī tenaiva saha modate //
analyzed: vyāla grāhī yathā vyālam bilāt uddharate balāt tadvat uddhṛtya sā nārī tena eva saha modate

original: tatra sā bhartṛparamā stūyamānāpsarogaṇaiḥ / krīḍate patinā sārdhaṃ yāvadindrāścaturdaśa //
analyzed: tatra sā bhartṛ paramā stūyamānā apsaraḥ gaṇaiḥ krīḍate patinā sārdham yāvat indrāḥ caturdaśa

original: brahmaghno vā kṛghno vā mittrighno vā bhavetpatiḥ / punātyavidhavā nārī tamādāya mṛtā tu yā //
analyzed: brahma ghnaḥ vā kṛ ghnaḥ vā mittri ghnaḥ vā bhavet patiḥ punāti avidhavā nārī tam ādāya mṛtā tu yā

original: mṛte bhartari yā nārī samāroheddhutāśanam / sārandhatīsamācārā svargaloke mahīyate //
analyzed: mṛte bhartari yā nārī samārohet hutāśanam sā arandhatī sama ācārā svarga loke mahīyate

original: yāvaccāgnau mṛte patyau strī nātmānaṃ pradāhayet / tāvanna mucyate sā hi strīśarīrātkathañcana //
analyzed: yāvat ca agnau mṛte patyau strī na ātmānam pradāhayet tāvat na mucyate sā hi strī śarīrāt kathañcana

original: mātṛkaṃ paitṛkaṃ caiva yatra caiva pradīyate / kulatrayaṃ punātyeṣā bhartāraṃ yānugacchati //
analyzed: mātṛkam paitṛkam ca eva yatra ca eva pradīyate kula trayam punāti eṣā bhartāram yā anugacchati

original: ārtārte mudite hṛṣṭā proṣite malinā kṛśā / mṛte mriyeta yā patyau sā strī jñeyā pativratā //
analyzed: ārtā ārte mudite hṛṣṭā proṣite malinā kṛśā mṛte mriyeta yā patyau sā strī jñeyā pativratā

original: pṛthak citāṃ samāruhya na priyā gantumarhati / kṣattriyādyāḥ savarṇāśca āroheyurapīha tāḥ //
analyzed: pṛthak citām samāruhya na priyā gantum arhati kṣattriya ādyāḥ savarṇāḥ ca āroheyuḥ api iha tāḥ

original: cāṇḍālīmavadhiṃ kṛtvā brāhmaṇītaḥ samo vidhiḥ / agarbhiṇīnāṃ sarvāsāmabālatākme(kā)nāmapi //
analyzed: cāṇḍālīm avadhim kṛtvā brāhmaṇītaḥ samaḥ vidhiḥ a garbhiṇīnām sarvāsām a bāla tākma ekānām api

original: dahanasya vidhiḥ proktaḥ sāmānyena mayā khaga / viśeṣamapi tasyāsya kañcitkiṃ śrotumicchati //
analyzed: dahanasya vidhiḥ proktaḥ sāmānyena mayā khaga viśeṣam api tasya asya kañcid kim śrotum icchati

original: garuḍa uvāca / proṣite tu mṛte svāminyasthnināśamupeyuṣi / kathaṃ dāhaḥ prakartavyastanme vada jagatpate //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca proṣite tu mṛte svāmini asthni nāśam upeyuṣi katham dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ tat me vada jagatpate

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / asthīni cenna labhyante proṣitasya narasya ca / teṣāñca hi gatisthānaṃ vidhānaṃ kathayāmyaham //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca asthīni ced na labhyante proṣitasya narasya ca  teṣām ca hi gati sthānam vidhānam kathayāmi aham

original: śṛṇu tārkṣya paraṃ gopyaṃ patyurdurmaraṇeṣu yat / laṅghanairye mṛtā jīvāṃ daṃṣṭribhiścābhighātitāḥ //
analyzed: śṛṇu tārkṣya param gopyam patyuḥ durmaraṇeṣu yat  laṅghanaiḥ ye mṛtāḥ jīvām daṃṣṭribhiḥ ca abhighātitāḥ

original: kaṇṭhagrahe vilagnānāṃ kṣīṇānāṃ tuṇḍaghātinām / viṣāgnivṛṣaviprebhyo viṣūcyā cātmaghātakāḥ //
analyzed: kaṇṭha grahe vilagnānām kṣīṇānām tuṇḍa ghātinām viṣa agni vṛṣa viprebhyaḥ viṣūcyā ca ātma ghātakāḥ

original: patanodbandhanajalairmṛtānāṃ śṛṇu saṃsthitim / sarpavyāghraiḥ śṛṅgibhiśca upasargopalodakaiḥ //
analyzed: patana udbandhana jalaiḥ mṛtānām śṛṇu saṃsthitim sarpa vyāghraiḥ śṛṅgibhiḥ ca upasarga upala udakaiḥ

original: brāhmaṇaiḥ śvāpadaiścaiva patanairvṛkṣavaidyutaiḥ / nakhairlohairgireḥ pātairbhittipātairbhṛgostathā //
analyzed: brāhmaṇaiḥ śvāpadaiḥ ca eva patanaiḥ vṛkṣa vaidyutaiḥ nakhaiḥ lohaiḥ gireḥ pātaiḥ bhitti pātaiḥ bhṛgoḥ tathā

original: kaṭvāyāmantarikṣe ca cauracāṇḍālatastathā / udakyāśunakīśūdrarajakādivibhūṣitāḥ //
analyzed: kaṭvāyām antarikṣe ca caura cāṇḍālataḥ tathā udakyā śunakī śūdra rajaka ādi vibhūṣitāḥ

original: ūrdhvocachiṣṭādharocchiṣṭobhayocchiṣṭāstu ye mṛtāḥ / śastraghātairmṛtā ye cāsyaśvaspṛṣṭāstathaiva ca //
analyzed: ūrdhva ucachiṣṭa adhara ucchiṣṭa ubhaya ucchiṣṭāḥ tu ye mṛtāḥ śastra ghātaiḥ mṛtāḥ ye ca asi aśva spṛṣṭāḥ tathā eva ca

original: tattu durmaraṇaṃ jñeyaṃ yacca jātaṃ vidhaiṃ vinā / tena pāpena narakān bhuktvā pretatvabhāginaḥ //
analyzed: tat tu durmaraṇam jñeyam yat ca jātam vidhaiṃ vinā tena pāpena narakān bhuktvā preta tva bhāginaḥ

original: na teṣāṃ kārayeddāhaṃ sūtakaṃ nodakakriyām / na vidhānaṃ mṛtādyañca na kuryā daurdhvadaihikam //
analyzed: na teṣām kārayet dāham sūtakam na udakakriyām na vidhānam mṛta ādyam ca na kuryāḥ daurdhvadaihikam

original: na piṇḍadānaṃ kartavyaṃ pramādāccetkaroti hi / nopatiṣṭhati tatsarvamantarikṣe vinaśyati //
analyzed: na piṇḍa dānam kartavyam pramādāt ced karoti hi na upatiṣṭhati tat sarvam antarikṣe vinaśyati

original: atastasya sutaiḥ pauttraiḥ sapiṇḍaiḥ śubhamicchubhiḥ / nārāyaṇabaliḥ kāryo lokagarhābhiyā khaga //
analyzed: atas tasya sutaiḥ pauttraiḥ sapiṇḍaiḥ śubham icchubhiḥ nārāyaṇa baliḥ kāryaḥ loka garhā bhiyā khaga

original: tathā teṣāṃ bhavecchaucaṃ nānyathetyabravīdyamaḥ / kṛte nārāyaṇabalāvaurdhvadehikayogyatā //
analyzed: tathā teṣām bhavet śaucam na anyathā iti abravīt yamaḥ kṛte nārāyaṇa balau aurdhvadehika yogyatā

original: tasya suddhikaraṃ karma tadbhavenna tadanyathā / nārāyaṇabaliṃ samyak tīrthe sarvaṃ prakpayet //
analyzed: tasya suddhi karam karma tat bhavet na tat anyathā nārāyaṇa balim samyak tīrthe sarvam

original: kṛṣṇāgre kārayedbiprairyena pūto bhavennaraḥ / pūrvantu tarpaṇaṃ kāryaṃ vipraiḥ paurāṇavaidikaiḥ //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa agre kārayet bipraiḥ yena pūtaḥ bhavet naraḥ pūrvam tu tarpaṇam kāryam vipraiḥ paurāṇa vaidikaiḥ

original: sarvauṣadhyakṣatairmiśrairviṣṇumuddiśya tarpayet / kāryaṃ puruṣasūktena mantrairvā vaiṣṇavairapi //
analyzed: sarva oṣadhi akṣataiḥ miśraiḥ viṣṇum uddiśya tarpayet kāryam puruṣasūktena mantraiḥ vā vaiṣṇavaiḥ api

original: dakṣiṇābhimukho bhūtvā pretaṃ viṣṇumiti smaran / anādinidhano devaḥ śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ //
analyzed: dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ bhūtvā pretam viṣṇum iti smaran an ādi nidhanaḥ devaḥ śaṅkha cakra gadā dharaḥ

original: akṣayaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ pretamokṣaprado bhava / tarpaṇasyāvasāne syādvītarāgo vimatsaraḥ //
analyzed: akṣayaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ preta mokṣa pradaḥ bhava tarpaṇasya avasāne syāt vīta rāgaḥ vimatsaraḥ

original: jitendriyamanā bhūtvā śuciṣmāndharmatatparaḥ / bhaktyā tatra prakurvīta śrāddhānyekādaśaiva tu //
analyzed: jita indriya manāḥ bhūtvā śuciṣmān dharma tatparaḥ bhaktyā tatra prakurvīta śrāddhāni ekādaśa eva tu

original: sarvakarmavidhāne ekaikāgre samāhitaḥ / toyavrīhiyavāndadyādgodhūmāṃśca priyaṅgavaḥ //
analyzed: sarva karma vidhāne ekaika agre samāhitaḥ toya vrīhi yavān dadyāt godhūmān ca priyaṅgavaḥ

original: haviṣyānnaṃ śubhaṃ mudrāṃ chatroṣṇīṣe ca dāpayet / dāpayetsarvasaṃsyāni kṣīraṃ kṣaudrasamānvitam //
analyzed: haviṣya annam śubham mudrām chatra uṣṇīṣe ca dāpayet dāpayet sarva saṃsyāni kṣīram kṣaudra sama anvitam

original: vastropānahasaṃyuktaṃ dadyādaṣṭavidhaṃ padam / dpayetsarvapāpebhyo na kuryātpaṅktivañcanam //
analyzed: vastra upānaha saṃyuktam dadyāt aṣṭavidham padam

original: bhūmau sthiteṣu piṇḍeṣu gandhapuṣpākṣatānvitam / dātavyaṃ sarvaṃviprebhyo vedaśāstravidhānataḥ //
analyzed: bhūmau sthiteṣu piṇḍeṣu gandha puṣpa akṣata anvitam dātavyam sarvam viprebhyaḥ veda śāstra vidhānataḥ

original: śaṅkhe khaḍge 'tha vā tāmre tarpaṇañca pṛthakpṛthak / dhyānadhāraṇasaṃyukto jānubhyāmavanīṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: śaṅkhe khaḍge vā tāmre tarpaṇam ca pṛthak pṛthak dhyāna dhāraṇa saṃyuktaḥ jānubhyām avanīm gataḥ

original: ṛcā vai dāpayedarghamarghoddiṣṭaṃ pṛthakpṛthak / brahmā viṣṇuśca rudraśca yamaḥ pretaśca pañcamaḥ //
analyzed: ṛcā vai dāpayet argham argha uddiṣṭam pṛthak pṛthak brahmā viṣṇuḥ ca rudraḥ ca yamaḥ pretaḥ ca pañcamaḥ

original: pṛthakkumbhe tataḥ sthāpyāḥ pañcaratnasamanvitāḥ / vastrayajñopavītāni pṛthaṅmudgāḥ padāni ca //
analyzed: pṛthak kumbhe tatas sthāpyāḥ pañcaratna samanvitāḥ vastra yajñopavītāni pṛthak mudgāḥ padāni ca

original: pañca śrāddhāni kurvīta devatānāṃ yathāvidhi / jaladhārāṃ tataḥ kuryātpiṇḍepiṇḍe pṛthakpṛthak //
analyzed: pañca śrāddhāni kurvīta devatānām yathāvidhi  jala dhārām tatas kuryāt piṇḍe piṇḍe pṛthak pṛthak

original: śaṅkhe vā tāmrapātre vā alābhe mṛnmaye pi vā / tilodakaṃ samādāya sarvoṣadhimasanvitam //
analyzed: śaṅkhe vā tāmra pātre vā alābhe mṛd maye vā tila udakam samādāya sarva oṣadhim asanvitam

original: tāmrapātraṃ tilaiḥ pūrṇaṃ sahiraṇyaṃ sadakṣiṇam / dadyādbrāhmaṇamukhyāya padadānaṃ tathaica //
analyzed: tāmra pātram tilaiḥ pūrṇam sa hiraṇyam sa dakṣiṇam dadyāt brāhmaṇa mukhyāya padadānam

original: yamoddeśetilāṃllauhaṃ tato dadyācca dakṣiṇām / evaṃ viṣṇubaliṃ dattvā yathāśaktyā vidhānataḥ //
analyzed: yama uddeśe tilān lauham tatas dadyāt ca dakṣiṇām evam viṣṇu balim dattvā yathāśaktyā vidhānataḥ

original: samuddharati tatkṣipraṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇa nāgadaṃśānmṛto yastu viśeṣastantu me śṛṇu //
analyzed: samuddharati tat kṣipram na atra kāryā vicāraṇa nāga daṃśāt mṛtaḥ yaḥ tu viśeṣaḥ tantu me śṛṇu

original: suvarṇabhāraniṣpannaṃ nāgaṃ kṛtvā tathaiva gām / viprāya dattvā vidhivatpiturānṛṇyamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: suvarṇa bhāra niṣpannam nāgam kṛtvā tathā eva gām viprāya dattvā vidhivat pituḥ ānṛṇyam āpnuyāt

original: evaṃ sarpabaliṃ dattvā sarpadoṣādvimucyate / paścātputtalakaṃ kāryaṃ sarvoṣadhisamanvitam //
analyzed: evam sarpa balim dattvā sarpa doṣāt vimucyate paścāt puttalakam kāryam sarva oṣadhi samanvitam

original: palāśasya ca vṛntānāṃ vibhāgaṃ śṛṇu kāśyapa / kṛṣṇājinaṃ samāstīrya kuśaiśca puruṣākṛtim //
analyzed: palāśasya ca vṛntānām vibhāgam śṛṇu kāśyapa kṛṣṇājinam samāstīrya kuśaiḥ ca puruṣa ākṛtim

original: śatatrayeṇa ṣaṣṭyā ca vṛntaiḥ prokto 'sthisañcayaḥ / vinyasya tāni vṛntāni aṅgeṣveṣu pṛthak pṛthak //
analyzed: śata trayeṇa ṣaṣṭyā ca vṛntaiḥ proktaḥ sthi sañcayaḥ vinyasya tāni vṛntāni aṅgeṣu eṣu pṛthak pṛthak

original: catvāriṃśacchirobhāge grīvāyāṃ daśa vinyaset / viṃśatyuraḥ sthale dadyādviṃśatiñjaṭhare tathā //
analyzed: catvāriṃśat śiraḥ bhāge grīvāyām daśa vinyaset viṃśati uraḥ sthale dadyāt viṃśatim jaṭhare tathā

original: bāhudvaye śataṃ dadyātkaṭideśe ca viṃśatim / ūrudvaye śatañcāpi triṃśajjaṅghādvaye nyaset //
analyzed: bāhu dvaye śatam dadyāt kaṭi deśe ca viṃśatim ūru dvaye śatam ca api triṃśat jaṅghā dvaye nyaset

original: dadyāccatuṣṭayaṃ śiśne ṣaḍ dadyādvṛṣāṇadvaye / daśa pādāṅgulībhāge evamasthīni vinyaset //
analyzed: dadyāt catuṣṭayam śiśne ṣaḍ dadyāt vṛṣāṇa dvaye daśa pāda aṅgulī bhāge evam asthīni vinyaset

original: nārikelaṃ śiraḥ sthāneṃ tumbaṃ dadyācca tāluke / pañcaratnaṃ mukhe dadyājjihvāyāṃ kadalīphalam //
analyzed: nārikelam śiraḥ tumbam dadyāt ca tāluke pañcaratnam mukhe dadyāt jihvāyām kadalī phalam

original: antreṣu nālikaṃ tadyādvālukāṅghrāṇe eva ca / vasāyāṃ mṛttikāṃ dadyāddharitālamanaḥ śilāḥ //
analyzed: antreṣu nālikam tat yāt vālukā aṅghrāṇe eva ca vasāyām mṛttikām dadyāt haritāla manaḥ śilāḥ

original: pāradaṃ retasaḥ sthāne purīṣe pittalaṃ tathā / manaḥ śilā tathā gātre tilapakvantu sandhiṣu //
analyzed: pāradam retasaḥ sthāne purīṣe pittalam tathā manaḥ śilā tathā gātre tila pakvantu sandhiṣu

original: yavapiṣṭaṃ yathā māṃse madhu śoṇitameva ca / keśeṣu ca jaṭājūṭaṃ tvacāyāñca mṛgatvacam //
analyzed: yava piṣṭam yathā māṃse madhu śoṇitam eva ca keśeṣu ca jaṭā jūṭam tvacāyām ca mṛga tvacam

original: karṇayostālapatrañca stanayoścaiva guñjikāḥ / nāsāyāṃ śatapatrañca kamalaṃ nābhimaṇḍale //
analyzed: karṇayoḥ tālapatram ca stanayoḥ ca eva guñjikāḥ nāsāyām śatapatram ca kamalam nābhi maṇḍale

original: vṛntākaṃ vṛṣaṇadvandve liṅge syādgṛñjanaṃ śubham / ghṛtaṃ nābhyāṃ pradeyaṃ syātkau pīne ca trapusmṛtam //
analyzed: vṛntākam vṛṣaṇa dvandve liṅge syāt gṛñjanam śubham ghṛtam nābhyām pradeyam syāt kau pīne ca trapu smṛtam

original: mauktikaṃ stanayormūrdhni kuṅkumeva vilepanam / karpūrāgurudhūpaiśca śubhairmālyaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ //
analyzed: mauktikam stanayoḥ mūrdhni kuṅkuma iva vilepanam karpūra aguru dhūpaiḥ ca śubhaiḥ mālyaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ

original: paridhānaṃ paṭṭasūtraṃhṛdaye caiva vinyaset / ṛddhivṛddhī bhujau dvau ca cakṣurbhyāñca kapardakam //
analyzed: paridhānam paṭṭasūtram hṛdaye ca eva vinyaset ṛddhi vṛddhī bhujau dvau ca cakṣurbhyām ca kapardakam

original: danteṣu dāḍimībījānyaṅgulīṣu ca campakam / sindūraṃ netrakoṇe ca tāmbūlādyupahārakam //
analyzed: danteṣu dāḍimī bījāni aṅgulīṣu ca campakam sindūram netra koṇe ca tāmbūla ādi upahārakam

original: sarvauṣadiyutaṃ pretaṃ kṛtvā pūjāṃ yathoditām / sāgnike cāpi vidhinā yajñapātraṃ nyasyetkramāt //
analyzed: sarva oṣadhi yutam pretam kṛtvā pūjām yathā uditām sa agnike ca api vidhinā yajña pātram nyasyet kramāt

original: striyaḥ punantu ma śira imaṃ me varuṇena ca / pretasya pāvanaṃ kṛtvā śālagrāmaśilodakaiḥ //
analyzed: striyaḥ punantu me śiraḥ imam me varuṇena ca pretasya pāvanam kṛtvā śālagrāma śilā udakaiḥ

original: viṣṇumuddiśya dātavyā suśīlā gauḥ payasvinī / tilā lauhaṃ hiraṇyañca karpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā //
analyzed: viṣṇum uddiśya dātavyā su śīlā gauḥ payasvinī tilāḥ lauham hiraṇyam ca karpāsam lavaṇam tathā

original: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam / tilapātraṃ tato dadyātpadadānaṃ tathaiva ca //
analyzed: saptadhānyam kṣitiḥ gāvaḥ ekaikam pāvanam smṛtam tila pātram tatas dadyāt pada dānam tathā eva ca

original: kartavyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ śrāddhaṃ pretamuktyarthamātmanaḥ / pretamokṣaṃ tataḥ kuryāddhṛdi viṣṇuṃ prakalpyaca //
analyzed: kartavyam vaiṣṇavam śrāddham preta mukti artham ātmanaḥ preta mokṣam tatas kuryāt hṛdi viṣṇum prakalpya ca

original: evaṃ puttalakaṃ kṛtvā dāhayedvidhipūrvakam / tacchruddhaye tu saṃskartā putrādirniṣkṛtiṃ caret //
analyzed: evam puttalakam kṛtvā dāhayet vidhi pūrvakam tad śruddhaye tu saṃskartā putra ādiḥ niṣkṛtim caret

original: trīnkṛcchrānṣaḍdvādaśa ca tathā pañcadaśāpi ca / prāyaścittanimittānusāreṇa vipravatsmṛtaḥ //
analyzed: trīn kṛcchrān ṣaṭ dvādaśa ca tathā pañcadaśa api ca prāyaścitta nimitta anusāreṇa vipra vat smṛtaḥ

original: aśaktau gohiraṇyādi pratyāmnāyaṃ caredapi / ātmano 'nadhikāritve śuddhimevaṃ caredvundhaḥ //
analyzed: aśaktau go hiraṇya ādi pratyāmnāyam caret api ātmanaḥ na adhikāri tve śuddhim evam caret vundhaḥ

original: aśuddhena tu yaddattamuddiśyāśuddhimeva ca / nopatiṣṭhati tatsarvamantarikṣe vinaśyati //
analyzed: aśuddhena tu yat dattam uddiśya aśuddhim eva ca na upatiṣṭhati tat sarvam antarikṣe vinaśyati

original: śuddhiṃ sampādya kartavyaṃ dahanādyaurdhvadehikam / akṛtvā niṣkṛtiṃ yastu kurute dahanādikam //
analyzed: śuddhim sampādya kartavyam dahana ādi aurdhvadehikam  a kṛtvā niṣkṛtim yaḥ tu kurute dahana ādikam

original: matipūrvamamatyā ca kramāttaniṣkṛtiṃ śṛṇu / kṛtvāgnimudakaṃ snānaṃ sparśanaṃ vahanaṃ kathām //
analyzed: mati pūrvam amatyā ca kramāt tad niṣkṛtim śṛṇu kṛtvā agnim udakam snānam sparśanam vahanam kathām

original: rajjucchedāśrupātañca taptakṛcchreṇa śudhyati / eṣāmanyatamaṃ pretaṃ yo vahettu dehata vā //
analyzed: rajju cheda aśru pātam ca taptakṛcchreṇa śudhyati eṣām anyatamam pretam yaḥ vahet tu vā

original: kaṭodakakriyāṃ kṛtvā kṛcchra sāntapanaṃ caret / nimitte laghuni svalpaṃ mahanmahati kalpayet //
analyzed: kaṭa udakakriyām kṛtvā kṛcchra sāntapanam caret nimitte laghuni svalpam mahat mahati kalpayet

original: garuḍa uvāca / kṛcchrasya taptakṛcchrasya tathā sāntapanasya ca / lakṣaṇaṃ brūhi me svāmiṃstrayāṇāmapi suvrata //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca kṛcchrasya taptakṛcchrasya tathā sāntapanasya ca  lakṣaṇam brūhi me svāmin trayāṇām api suvrata

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / tryahaṃ prātastryahaṃ sāyaṃ tryahamadyādayācitam / upavāsastryahañcaiva eṣa kṛcchra udāhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca tri aham prātar tri aham sāyam tri aham adyāt a yācitam  upavāsaḥ tri aham ca eva eṣa kṛcchraḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: taptakṣīraghṛtāmbūnāmekaikaṃ pratyahaṃ pibet / ekarātropavāsaśca taptakṛcchra udāhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tapta kṣīra ghṛta ambūnām ekaikam pratyaham pibet eka rātra upavāsaḥ ca taptakṛcchraḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakam / jagdhvā pare 'hnyupavasetkṛcchraṃ sāntapanañcaran //
analyzed: go mūtram gomayam kṣīram dadhi sarpiḥ kuśa udakam jagdhvā pare hni upavaset kṛcchram sāntapanam caran

original: mayā te 'yaṃ samākhyāto durmṛtasya vidhiḥ khaga / tadā mṛtaṃ vijānīyāddīpanirvāṇamāgataḥ //
analyzed: mayā te yam samākhyātaḥ durmṛtasya vidhiḥ khaga tadā mṛtam vijānīyāt dīpa nirvāṇam āgataḥ

original: agnidāhaṃ tataḥ kuryātsūtakañca dinatrayam / daśāhaṃ gartapiṇāḍañca kartavyaṃ pretapūrvakam //
analyzed: agnidāham tatas kuryāt sūtakam ca dina trayam  daśa aham garta piṇāḍam ca kartavyam preta pūrvakam

original: evaṃ vidhiṃ tataḥ kuryāttataḥ pretaśca muktibhāk / mṛtabhrāntyā pratikṛteḥ kṛte dāhe sa vai yadi //
analyzed: evam vidhim tatas kuryāt tatas pretaḥ ca mukti bhāj mṛta bhrāntyā pratikṛteḥ kṛte dāhe sa vai yadi

original: āyāti tena kartavyaṃ majjanaṃ ghṛkuṇḍake / jātakarmādisaṃskārāḥ kartavyāḥ punareva tu //
analyzed: tena kartavyam majjanam ghṛkuṇḍake jātakarma ādi saṃskārāḥ kartavyāḥ punar eva tu

original: ūḍhāmeva svakāṃ bhāryāmudvahedvidhivatpumān / varṣe pañcadaśe pakṣin dvādaśe vā gate sati //
analyzed: ūḍhām eva svakām bhāryām udvahet vidhivat pumān varṣe pañcadaśe pakṣin dvādaśe vā gate sati

original: ajñātasya proṣitasya kṛtvā pratikṛtiṃ dahet / rajasvalāsūtikayorviśeṣaṃ maraṇe śṛṇu //
analyzed: ajñātasya proṣitasya kṛtvā pratikṛtim dahet rajasvalā sūtikayoḥ viśeṣam maraṇe śṛṇu

original: sūtikāyāṃ mṛtāyāntu evaṃ kurvanti yājñikāḥ / kumbhe salilamādāya pañcagavyaṃ tathaiva ca //
analyzed: sūtikāyām mṛtāyāntu evam kurvanti yājñikāḥ kumbhe salilam ādāya pañcagavyam tathā eva ca

original: puṇyābhirabhimantryāpo vācā śuddhiṃ labhettataḥ / śatasūrpodakenādau snāpayitvā yathāvidhi //
analyzed: puṇyābhiḥ abhimantrya apaḥ vācā śuddhim labhet tatas śata sūrpa udakena ādau snāpayitvā yathāvidhi

original: tenaiva snāpayitvā tu dāhaṃ kuryātsvageśvara / pañcabhiḥ snāpayitvā tu gavyaiḥ pretāṃ rajasvalām //
analyzed: tena eva snāpayitvā tu dāham kuryāt svageśvara pañcabhiḥ snāpayitvā tu gavyaiḥ pretām rajasvalām

original: vastrāntarākṛtiṃ kṛtvā dāhayedvidhipūrvakam / mṛtasya pañcake dāhavidhiṃ vacmi śṛṇuṣva me //
analyzed: vastra antara ākṛtim kṛtvā dāhayet vidhi pūrvakam mṛtasya pañcake dāha vidhim vacmi śṛṇuṣva me

original: ādau kṛtvā dhaniṣṭhārdhametannakṣatrapañcakam / revatyantaṃ sadā dūṣyamaśubhaṃ sarvadā bhavet //
analyzed: ādau kṛtvā dhaniṣṭhā ardham etat nakṣatra pañcakam  revatī antam sadā dūṣyam aśubham sarvadā bhavet

original: dāhastatra na kartavyo viṣādaḥ sarvajantuṣu / na jalaṃ dīyate teṣu aśubhaṃ sarvadā bhavet //
analyzed: dāhaḥ tatra na kartavyaḥ viṣādaḥ sarva jantuṣu na jalam dīyate teṣu aśubham sarvadā bhavet

original: pañcakānantaraṃ sarvaṃ kāryaṃ kartavyamanyathā / puttrāṇāṃ gotriṇāṃ tasya santāpo 'pyupajāyate //
analyzed: pañcaka anantaram sarvam kāryam kartavyam anyathā puttrāṇām gotriṇām tasya santāpaḥ upi upajāyate

original: gṛhe hānirbhavatyeva ṛkṣeṣveṣu mṛtasya ca / atha vā ṛkṣamadye ca dāhastu vidhipūrvakaḥ //
analyzed: gṛhe hāniḥ bhavati eva ṛkṣeṣu eṣu mṛtasya ca  atha vā ṛkṣa madye ca dāhaḥ tu vidhi pūrvakaḥ

original: kriyate mānuṣāṇāntu sa vā āhutipūrvakaḥ / viprairvidhirataḥ kāryo mantraistu vidhipūrvakam //
analyzed: kriyate mānuṣāṇām tu sa vai āhuti pūrvakaḥ vipraiḥ vidhiḥ atas kāryaḥ mantraiḥ tu vidhi pūrvakam

original: śavasthānasamīpe tu kṣeptavyāḥ puttalāstataḥ / darbhakḷptāstu catvāra ṛkṣamantrābhimantritāḥ //
analyzed: śava sthāna samīpe tu kṣeptavyāḥ puttalāḥ tatas darbha kḷptāḥ tu catvāraḥ ṛkṣa mantra abhimantritāḥ

original: tato dāhaḥ prakartavyastaiśca puttalakaiḥ saha / sūtakānte tadā puttraiḥ kāryaṃ śāntikapauṣṭikam //
analyzed: tatas dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ taiḥ ca puttalakaiḥ saha sūtaka ante tadā puttraiḥ kāryam śāntika pauṣṭikam

original: pañcakeṣu mṛto yo 'sau na satiṃ labhate naraḥ / tilān gāñca suvarṇañca tamuddiśya ghṛtaṃ dadet //
analyzed: pañcakeṣu mṛtaḥ sau na satim labhate naraḥ tilān gān ca suvarṇam ca tam uddiśya ghṛtam dadet

original: viprāṇāṃ dāpayeddānaṃ sarvavighnavināśanam / bhojanopānahaucchattraṃ hemamudrā ca vāsasī //
analyzed: viprāṇām dāpayet dānam sarva vighna vināśanam bhojana upānahau chattram hema mudrā ca vāsasī

original: dakṣiṇā dīyate vipre pātakasya pramocanaḥ / mayāte 'yaṃ samākhyāto vidhiḥ pañcaharaḥ sthitaḥ / saṃyaminyāṃ yathāyānaṃ yathāvarṣaṃ mṛtakriyā //
analyzed: dakṣiṇā dīyate vipre pātakasya pramocanaḥ yam samākhyātaḥ vidhiḥ pañca haraḥ sthitaḥ saṃyaminyām yathāyānam yathāvarṣam mṛta kriyā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dahanavidhikṛcchralakṣaṇadagdhāgamanarajasvalāmaraṇavidhipañcakamaraṇaprāyaścittanirūpaṇaṃ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde dahana vidhi kṛcchra lakṣaṇa dagdha āgamana rajasvalā maraṇa vidhi pañcaka maraṇa prāyaścitta nirūpaṇam

original: nāma caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nāma caturthaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 5
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / evaṃ dagdhvā naraṃ pretaṃ snātvā kṛtvā tilodakam / agrataḥ strījano gacchedvrajeyuḥ pṛṣṭhato narāḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca evam dagdhvā naram pretam snātvā kṛtvā tila udakam agratas strī janaḥ gacchet vrajeyuḥ pṛṣṭhatas narāḥ

original: prāśayennimbapatrāṇi rudanto nāmapūrvakam / vidhātavyaṃ cācamanaṃ pāṣāṇopari saṃsthite //
analyzed: prāśayet nimba patrāṇi rudantaḥ nāma pūrvakam vidhātavyam ca ācamanam pāṣāṇa upari saṃsthite

original: te praviśya gṛhaṃ sarve sutādyāśca sapiṇḍakāḥ / bhaveyurdaśarātraṃ vai yata āśaucakaṃ khaga //
analyzed: te praviśya gṛham sarve suta ādyāḥ ca sapiṇḍakāḥ bhaveyuḥ daśa rātram vai yatas āśaucakam khaga

original: krītalabdhāśanāḥ sarve svapeyuste pṛthakpṛthak / akṣāralavaṇānnāḥ syurnimajjeyuśca te tryaham //
analyzed: krīta labdha aśanāḥ sarve svapeyuḥ te pṛthak pṛthak a kṣāra lavaṇa annāḥ syuḥ nimajjeyuḥ ca te tri aham

original: amāṃsabhojanāścādhaḥ śayīranbrahmacāriṇaḥ / parasparaṃ na saṃspṛṣṭā dānādhyayanavarjitāḥ //
analyzed: a māṃsa bhojanāḥ ca adhas śayīran brahmacāriṇaḥ parasparam na saṃspṛṣṭāḥ dāna adhyayana varjitāḥ

original: malināścādhomukhāśca dīnā bhogavivarjitāḥ / aṅgasaṃvāhanaṃ keśamārjanaṃ varjayanti te //
analyzed: malināḥ ca adhomukhāḥ ca dīnāḥ bhoga vivarjitāḥ aṅga saṃvāhanam keśa mārjanam varjayanti te

original: mṛnmaye patraje vāpi bhuñjīraṃste ca bhājane / uvāsantu te kuryurekāhamatha vā tryaham //
analyzed: mṛd maye patra je vā api bhuñjīran te ca bhājane  te kuryuḥ ekāham atha vā tri aham

original: garuḍa uvāca / āśaucina iti proktamāśaucasya ca vai prabho / lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ kiyatkālaṃ bhāvyaṃ vā tadyutairnaraiḥ //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca āśaucinaḥ iti proktam āśaucasya ca vai prabho lakṣaṇam kim kiyatkālam bhāvyam vā tad yutaiḥ naraiḥ

original: śṛkṛṣṇa uvāca / apanodyantvidaṃ kālādibhirāśu niṣedhakṛt / piṇḍādhyayanadānādeḥ puṅgato 'tiśayo hi tat //
analyzed: uvāca apanodyantu idam kāla ādibhiḥ āśu niṣedha kṛt piṇḍa adhyayana dāna ādeḥ tiśayaḥ hi tat

original: daśāhaṃ śāvamāśaucaṃ sapiṇḍeṣu vidhīyate / janane 'pyevameva syānnipuṇaṃ śuddhimicchatām //
analyzed: daśa aham śāvam āśaucam sapiṇḍeṣu vidhīyate janane pi evam eva syāt nipuṇam śuddhim icchatām

original: janmanyekodakānāntutrirātrācchuddhiriṣyate / śāvasya śeṣācchudhyanti tryahādudakadāyinaḥ //
analyzed: janmani eka udakānām tu tri rātrāt śuddhiḥ iṣyate śāvasya śeṣāt śudhyanti tri ahāt udaka dāyinaḥ

original: ādantajananatsadya ā caulānnaiśikī smṛtā / trirātramā vratādeśāddaśarātramataḥ param //
analyzed: ā danta jananat sadyas ā caulāt naiśikī smṛtā tri rātram ā vrata ādeśāt daśa rātram atas param

original: āśaucaṃ te samākhyātaṃ saṃkṣepātprakṛtaṃ bruve / jalaṃ tridivamākāśe sthāpyaṃ kṣīrañca mṛnmaye //
analyzed: āśaucam te samākhyātam saṃkṣepāt prakṛtam bruve jalam tridivam ākāśe sthāpyam kṣīram ca mṛd maye

original: atra snāhi pibātreti mantreṇānena kāśyapa / kāṣṭhatraye guṇairbaddhe prītyai rātrau catuṣpathe //
analyzed: atra snāhi piba atra iti mantreṇa anena kāśyapa kāṣṭha traye guṇaiḥ baddhe prītyai rātrau catuṣpathe

original: prathame 'hni tṛtīye vā saptame navame tathā / asthisaṃcayanaṃ kāryaṃ dine tadgotrajaiḥ saha //
analyzed: prathame hni tṛtīye vā saptame navame tathā asthisaṃcayanam kāryam dine tad gotra jaiḥ saha

original: tadūrdhvamaṅgasaṃsparśaḥ sapiṇḍānāṃ vidhīyate / yogyāḥ sarvakriyāṇāṃ ca samānasalilāstathā //
analyzed: tad ūrdhvam aṅga saṃsparśaḥ sapiṇḍānām vidhīyate yogyāḥ sarva kriyāṇām ca samāna salilāḥ tathā

original: pretapiṇḍaṃ bahirdadyāddarbhamātravivarjitam / prāgudīcyāṃ caruṃ kṛtvā snātvā prayatamānasaḥ //
analyzed: preta piṇḍam bahis dadyāt darbha mātra vivarjitam prāc udīcyām carum kṛtvā snātvā prayata mānasaḥ

original: bhūmāvasaṃskṛtānāṃ ca saṃskṛtānāṃ kuśeṣu ca / navabhirdivasaiḥ piṇḍānnava dadyātsamāhitaḥ //
analyzed: bhūmau asaṃskṛtānām ca saṃskṛtānām kuśeṣu ca navabhiḥ divasaiḥ piṇḍān nava dadyāt samāhitaḥ

original: daśamaṃ piṇḍamutsṛjya rātriśeṣe śucirbhavet / asagotraḥ sagotro vā yadi strī yati vā pumān //
analyzed: daśamam piṇḍam utsṛjya rātri śeṣe śuciḥ bhavet asagotraḥ sagotraḥ vā yadi strī yati vā pumān

original: prathame 'hani yo dadyātsa daśāhaṃ samāpayet / śālinā saktubhirvāpi śākairvāpyatha nirvapet //
analyzed: prathame hani yaḥ dadyāt sa daśa aham samāpayet śālinā saktubhiḥ vā api śākaiḥ vā api atha nirvapet

original: prathame 'hani yaddravyaṃ tadeva syāddaśāhikam / yāvadāśaucamekaikasyāñjalerdānamucyate //
analyzed: prathame hani yat dravyam tat eva syāt daśāhikam yāvadāśaucam ekaikasya añjaleḥ dānam ucyate

original: yadvā yasmindine dānaṃ tasmiṃstaddinasaṃkhyayā / daśāhe 'ñjalayaḥ pakṣinpañcāśadantime //
analyzed: yat vā yasmin dine dānam tasmin tad dina saṃkhyayā daśa ahe ñjalayaḥ pakṣin pañcāśat antime

original: dvivṛddhyā vā bhavetpakṣinnañjalīnāṃ śataṃ punaḥ / yadāhi tryahamāśaucaṃ tadā vāñjalayo daśa //
analyzed: dvi vṛddhyā vā bhavet pakṣin añjalīnām śatam punar yadā hi tri aham āśaucam tadā vā añjalayaḥ daśa

original: trayo 'ñjalaya evaṃ tu prathame 'hanivai tadā / catvārastu dvitīye 'hni tṛtīye syustrayastathā //
analyzed: trayaḥ ñjalayaḥ evam tu prathame tadā  catvāraḥ tu dvitīye hni tṛtīye syuḥ trayaḥ tathā

original: śatāñjali yadā pakṣinnādye triṃśattadāhani / catvāriṃśaddvitīye 'hni triṃśadahni tṛtīyake //
analyzed: śata añjali yadā pakṣin ādye triṃśat tadā ahani catvāriṃśat dvitīye hni triṃśat ahni tṛtīyake

original: evaṃ jalasyāñjalayo vibhājyāḥ pakṣayordvayoḥ / sarveṣu pitṛkāryeṣu putro mukyo 'dhikāravān //
analyzed: evam jalasya añjalayaḥ vibhājyāḥ pakṣayoḥ dvayoḥ sarveṣu pitṛ kāryeṣu putraḥ mukyaḥ dhikāravān

original: piṇḍaprasekastūṣṇīñca puṣpadhūpādikaṃ tathā / daśame 'hani samprāpte snānaṃ grāmādvahiścaret //
analyzed: piṇḍa prasekaḥ tūṣṇīm ca puṣpa dhūpa ādikam tathā daśame hani samprāpte snānam grāmāt vahis caret

original: tatra tyājyāni vāsāṃsi keśaśmaśrunakhāni ca / vipraḥ śudhyatyapaḥ spṛṣṭvā kṣattriyo vāhanaṃ tathā //
analyzed: tatra tyājyāni vāsāṃsi keśa śmaśru nakhāni ca vipraḥ śudhyati apaḥ spṛṣṭvā kṣattriyaḥ vāhanam tathā

original: vaiśyaḥ pratodaṃ raśmīnvā śūdro yaṣṭiṃ kṛtakriyaḥ / mṛtādalpavayobhiśca sapiṇḍaiḥ parivāpanam //
analyzed: vaiśyaḥ pratodam raśmīn vā śūdraḥ yaṣṭim kṛta kriyaḥ mṛtāt alpa vayobhiḥ ca sapiṇḍaiḥ parivāpanam

original: kāryantu ṣoḍaśī ṣaḍbhiḥ piṇḍairdaśabhiraiva ca / prathamā malinā hyetairādaśāhaṃ mṛterbhavet //
analyzed: kāryam tu ṣoḍaśī ṣaḍbhiḥ piṇḍaiḥ daśabhiḥ ā eva ca prathamā malinā hi etaiḥ ādaśa aham mṛteḥ bhavet

original: dināni daśa yānṣiṇḍānkurvantyatra sutādayaḥ / pratyahaṃ te vibhajyante caturbhāgaiḥ khagottama //
analyzed: dināni daśa yān siṇḍān kurvanti atra suta ādayaḥ pratyaham te vibhajyante catur bhāgaiḥ khaga uttama

original: bhāgadvayena dehaḥ syāttṛtīyena yamānugāḥ / tṛpyanti hi caturthena svayamapyupajīvati //
analyzed: bhāga dvayena dehaḥ syāt tṛtīyena yama anugāḥ tṛpyanti hi caturthena svayam api upajīvati

original: ahorātraistu navabhirdeho niṣpattimāpnuyāt / śirastvādyena piṇḍena pretasya kriyate tathā //
analyzed: ahorātraiḥ tu navabhiḥ dehaḥ niṣpattim āpnuyāt śiraḥ tu ādyena piṇḍena pretasya kriyate tathā

original: dvitīyena tu karṇākṣināsikaṃ tu samāsataḥ / galāṃsabhujavakṣaśca tṛtīyena tathā kramāt //
analyzed: dvitīyena tu karṇa akṣi nāsikam tu samāsatas gala aṃsa bhuja vakṣaḥ ca tṛtīyena tathā kramāt

original: caturthena ca piṇḍena nābhiliṅgagudaṃ tathā / jānujaṅghaṃ tathā pādau pañcamena tu sarvadā //
analyzed: caturthena ca piṇḍena nābhi liṅga gudam tathā jānu jaṅgham tathā pādau pañcamena tu sarvadā

original: sarvamarmāṇi ṣaṣṭhena saptamena tu nāḍayaḥ / dantalomānyaṣṭamena vīryantu navamena ca //
analyzed: sarva marmāṇi ṣaṣṭhena saptamena tu nāḍayaḥ danta lomāni aṣṭamena navamena ca

original: daśamena tu pūrṇatvaṃ tṛptatā kṣudviparyayaḥ / madhyamāṃ ṣoḍaśīṃ vacmi vainateya śṛṇuṣva me //
analyzed: daśamena tu pūrṇa tvam tṛpta tā kṣudh viparyayaḥ madhyamām ṣoḍaśīm vacmi vainateya śṛṇuṣva me

original: viṣṇavādiviṣṇuparyantānyekādaśa tathā khaga / śrāddhāni pañca devānāmityeṣāṃ madhyaṣīḍaśī //
analyzed: viṣṇava ādi viṣṇu paryantāni ekādaśa tathā khaga śrāddhāni pañca devānām iti eṣām madhyaṣīḍaśī

original: nimittaṃ durmatiṃ kṛtvā yadi nārāyaṇo baliḥ / ekādaśāhe kartavyo vṛṣotsargo 'pi tatra vai //
analyzed: nimittam durmatim kṛtvā yadi nārāyaṇaḥ baliḥ ekādaśa ahe kartavyaḥ tatra vai

original: ekādaśāhe pretasya yasyātsṛjyeta no vṛṣaḥ / pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tasya dattaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi //
analyzed: ekādaśa ahe pretasya naḥ vṛṣaḥ preta tvam su sthiram tasya dattaiḥ śrāddha śataiḥ api

original: akṛtvā yadvṛṣotsargaṃ kṛtaṃ vai piṇḍapātanam / niṣphalaṃ sakalaṃ vidyātpramītāya na tadbhavet //
analyzed: a kṛtvā yat vṛṣotsargam kṛtam vai piṇḍapātanam  niṣphalam sakalam vidyāt pramītāya na tat bhavet

original: vṛṣotsargādṛte nānyatkiñcidasti mahītale / putraḥ patnyatha dauhitraḥ pitā vā duhitātha vā //
analyzed: vṛṣotsargāt ṛte na anyat kiñcid asti mahī tale putraḥ patnī atha dauhitraḥ pitā vā duhitā atha vā

original: mṛtādanantaraṃ tasya dhruvaṃ kāryo vṛṣotsavaḥ / caturvatsatarīyukto yasyotsṛjyeta vā vṛṣaḥ //
analyzed: mṛtāt anantaram tasya dhruvam kāryaḥ vṛṣotsavaḥ catur vatsatarī yuktaḥ yasya utsṛjyeta vā vṛṣaḥ

original: alaṅkṛto vidhānena pretatvaṃ tasya no bhavet / ekādaśe 'hni samprāpte vṛṣālābho bhavedyadi //
analyzed: alaṅkṛtaḥ vidhānena preta tvam tasya naḥ bhavet ekādaśe hni samprāpte vṛṣā lābhaḥ bhavet yadi

original: darbhaiḥ piṣṭaistu sampādya taṃ vṛṣaṃ mocayedvudhaḥ / vṛṣotsarjanavelāyāṃ vṛṣābhāva (lābha)
analyzed: darbhaiḥ piṣṭaiḥ tu sampādya tam vṛṣam mocayet vudhaḥ vṛṣotsarjana velāyām vṛṣa abhāva lābha

original: kathañcana //
analyzed: kathañcana

original: mṛttikābhistu darbhairvā vṛṣaṃ kṛtvā vimocayet / yadiṣṭaṃ jīvatastasya dadyādekādaśe 'hani //
analyzed: mṛttikābhiḥ tu darbhaiḥ vā vṛṣam kṛtvā vimocayet  yat iṣṭam jīvataḥ tasya dadyāt ekādaśe hani

original: mṛtamuddiśya dātavyaṃ śayyādhenvādikaṃ tathā / viprānbahūn bhojayīta pretasya kṣudviśāntaye //
analyzed: mṛtam uddiśya dātavyam śayyā dhenu ādikam tathā viprān bahūn bhojayīta pretasya kṣudh viśāntaye

original: tṛtīyāṃ ṣoḍaśīṃ vacmi vainateya śṛṇuṣva tām / dvādaśa pratimāsyāni ādyaṃ ṣāṇmāsikaṃ tathā //
analyzed: tṛtīyām ṣoḍaśīm vacmi vainateya śṛṇuṣva tām dvādaśa pratimāsyāni ādyam ṣāṇmāsikam tathā

original: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ caiva tṛtīyā ṣoḍaśī matā / dvādaśāhe tripakṣe ca ṣaṇmāse māsike 'bdike //
analyzed: sapiṇḍīkaraṇam ca eva tṛtīyā ṣoḍaśī matā dvādaśa ahe tri pakṣe ca ṣaṣ māse māsike bdike

original: tṛtīyāṃ ṣoḍaśīmenāṃ vadanti matabhedataḥ / yasyaitā ni na dattāni pretaśrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa //
analyzed: tṛtīyām ṣoḍaśīm enām vadanti mata bhedataḥ yasya etā ni na dattāni preta śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa

original: piśācatvaṃ sthiraṃ tasya dattaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi / ekādaśe dvādaśe vā dine ādyaṃ prakīrtitam //
analyzed: piśāca tvam sthiram tasya dattaiḥ śrāddha śataiḥ api ekādaśe dvādaśe vā dine ādyam prakīrtitam

original: māsādau pratimāsañca śuddhaṃ mṛtatithau khaga / ekenāhnā tribhirvāpi hīneṣu vinatāsuta //
analyzed: māsa ādau pratimāsam ca śuddham mṛta tithau khaga ekena ahnā tribhiḥ vā api hīneṣu vinatā suta

original: māsaṣaṇmāsavarṣeṣu tripakṣeṣu bhavanti hi / śrāddhānyathasyātsāpiṇḍyaṃ pūrṇe varṣe tadardhake //
analyzed: māsa ṣaṣ māsa varṣeṣu tri pakṣeṣu bhavanti hi śrāddhāni atha asyāt sāpiṇḍyam pūrṇe varṣe tad ardhake

original: tripakṣe 'bhyudaye vāpi dvādaśāhe 'tha vā nṛṇām / ānantyātkuladharmāṇāṃ puṃsāñcaivāyuṣaḥ kṣayāt //
analyzed: tri pakṣe bhyudaye vā api dvādaśa ahe vā nṛṇām ānantyāt kula dharmāṇām puṃsām ca eva āyuṣaḥ kṣayāt

original: asthiratvāccharīrasya dvādaśāhe praśasyate / sapiṇḍīkaraṇeṣvevaṃ vidhiṃ pakṣīndra me śṛṇu //
analyzed: asthira tvāt śarīrasya dvādaśa ahe praśasyate sapiṇḍīkaraṇeṣu evam vidhim pakṣi indra me śṛṇu

original: ekoddiṣṭavidhānena kāryaṃ tadapi kāśyapa / tilagandhodakairyuktaṃ kuryātpātracatuṣṭayam //
analyzed: ekoddiṣṭa vidhānena kāryam tat api kāśyapa tila gandha udakaiḥ yuktam kuryāt pātra catuṣṭayam

original: pātraṃ pretasya tatraikaṃ pitryaṃ pātratrayaṃ tathā / secayetpitṛpātreṣu pretapātraṃ khaga triṣu //
analyzed: pātram pretasya tatra ekam pitryam pātra trayam tathā secayet pitṛpātreṣu pretapātram khaga triṣu

original: caturo nirvapetpiṇḍānpūrvanteṣu samāpayet / tataḥ prabhṛti vai pretaḥ pitṛsāmānyamaśnute //
analyzed: caturaḥ nirvapet piṇḍān pūrva anteṣu samāpayet tatas prabhṛti vai pretaḥ pitṛ sāmānyam aśnute

original: tataḥ pitṛtvamāpanne tasminprete khageśvara / śrāddhadharmairaśeṣaistu tatpūrvānarcayetpitṝn //
analyzed: tatas pitṛ tvam āpanne tasmin prete khageśvara śrāddha dharmaiḥ aśeṣaiḥ tu tad pūrvān arcayet pitṝn

original: ekacityārohaṇe ca ekāhni maraṇe tathā / sāpiṇḍyantu striyā nāsti mṛte bhartuḥ striyo bhavet //
analyzed: ekaciti ārohaṇe ca eka ahni maraṇe tathā sāpiṇḍyam tu striyāḥ na asti mṛte bhartuḥ striyaḥ bhavet

original: pākaikyamatha kālaikyaṃ kartraikyañca bhavetkhaga / śrāddhādau saha dāhe ca patipatnyorna saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: pāka aikyam atha kāla aikyam kartṛ aikyam ca bhavet khaga śrāddha ādau saha dāhe ca pati patnyoḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: bharturmṛtatitheranyatithau citimathāruhet / tāṃmṛtāhani tu samprāpte pṛthak piṇḍena yojayet //
analyzed: bhartuḥ mṛta titheḥ anya tithau citim atha āruhet tām mṛta ahani tu samprāpte pṛthak piṇḍena yojayet

original: pratyabdañca yugapattu samāpayet //
analyzed: pratyabdam ca yugapad tu samāpayet

original: yasya saṃvatsarādarvāk sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ bhavet / māsikañcodakumbhañca deyaṃ tasyāpi vatsaram //
analyzed: yasya saṃvatsarāt arvāk sapiṇḍīkaraṇam bhavet māsikam ca uda kumbham ca deyam tasya api vatsaram

original: navaśrāddhaṃ sapiṇḍatvaṃ śrāddhānyapi ca ṣoḍaśa / ekenaiva tu kāryāṇi saṃvibhaktadhaneṣvapi //
analyzed: navaśrāddham sapiṇḍa tvam śrāddhāni api ca ṣoḍaśa ekena eva tu kāryāṇi saṃvibhakta dhaneṣu api

original: pitāmahībhiḥ sāpiṇḍyaṃ tathā mātāmahaiḥ saha / uktaṃ bhartrāpi sāpiṇḍyaṃ striyā veṣayabhedataḥ //
analyzed: pitāmahībhiḥ sāpiṇḍyam tathā mātāmahaiḥ saha uktam bhartrā api sāpiṇḍyam striyāḥ veṣa ya bhedataḥ

original: navaśrāddhasya te kālaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇu kāśyapa / maraṇāhni mṛtisthāne śrāddhaṃ pakṣinprakalpayet //
analyzed: navaśrāddhasya te kālam vakṣyāmi śṛṇu kāśyapa maraṇa ahni mṛti sthāne śrāddham pakṣin prakalpayet

original: dvitīyañca tato mārge viśrāmo yatra kāritaḥ / tataḥ sañcayanasthāne tṛtīyaṃ śrāddhamucyate //
analyzed: dvitīyam ca tatas mārge viśrāmaḥ yatra kāritaḥ tatas sañcayana sthāne tṛtīyam śrāddham ucyate

original: pañcame saptame tadvadaṣṭame navame tathā / daśamaikādaśe caiva nava śrāddhāni vai khaga //
analyzed: pañcame saptame tadvat aṣṭame navame tathā daśama ekādaśe ca eva nava śrāddhāni vai khaga

original: śrāddhāni nava caitāni tṛtīyā ṣoḍaśī smṛtā / ekoddiṣṭavidhānena kāryāṇi manujaistathā //
analyzed: śrāddhāni nava ca etāni tṛtīyā ṣoḍaśī smṛtā ekoddiṣṭa vidhānena kāryāṇi manujaiḥ tathā

original: prathame 'hni tṛtīye vā pañcame saptame tathā / navamaikādaśe caiva navaśrāddhaṃ prakīrtitam //
analyzed: prathame hni tṛtīye vā pañcame saptame tathā navama ekādaśe ca eva navaśrāddham prakīrtitam

original: ucyante ṣaḍimānīha nava syurapi yāgetaḥ / uktāni te mayā tāni ṛṣīṇāṃ matabhedataḥ //
analyzed: ucyante ṣaḍ imāni iha nava syuḥ api yāga itas uktāni te mayā tāni ṛṣīṇām mata bhedataḥ

original: rūḍhipakṣo mamābhīṣṭo yogaḥ kaiścidiheṣyate / ādye dvitīye dātavyastathaivaikaṃ pavitrakam //
analyzed: rūḍhi pakṣaḥ mama abhīṣṭaḥ yogaḥ kaiścid iha iṣyate ādye dvitīye dātavyaḥ tathā eva ekam pavitrakam

original: pretāya piṇḍo dātavyo bhuktavatsu dvijātiṣu / praśrastatrābhiraṇyeti yajamānadvijanmanā //
analyzed: pretāya piṇḍaḥ dātavyaḥ bhuktavatsu dvijātiṣu yajamāna dvijanmanā

original: akṣayyamamukasyeti vaktavyaṃ viratau tathā / ekoddiṣṭaṃ me nibodha cetthamāvatsaraṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: akṣayyam amukasya iti vaktavyam viratau tathā ekoddiṣṭam me nibodha ca ittham āvatsaram smṛtam

original: sapiṇḍīkaraṇādūrdhvaṃ yāni śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa / ekoddiṣṭavidhānena caredvā pārvaṇādṛte //
analyzed: sapiṇḍīkaraṇāt ūrdhvam yāni śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa ekoddiṣṭa vidhānena caret vā pārvaṇāt ṛte

original: pratyabdaṃ yo yathā kuryāttathā kuryātsa tānyapi / ekādaśe dvādaśe 'hni preto bhuṅkte dinadvayam //
analyzed: pratyabdam yaḥ yathā kuryāt tathā kuryāt sa tāni api ekādaśe dvādaśe hni pretaḥ bhuṅkte dina dvayam

original: yoṣitaḥ puruṣasyāpi piṇḍaṃ preteti nirvapet / sāpiṇḍye tu kṛte tasya pretaśabdo nivartate //
analyzed: yoṣitaḥ puruṣasya api piṇḍam preta iti nirvapet sāpiṇḍye tu kṛte tasya preta śabdaḥ nivartate

original: dīpadānaṃ prakartavyamāvarṣantu gṛhādbahiḥ / annaṃ dīpo jalaṃ vastramanyadvādīyate ca yat //
analyzed: dīpa dānam prakartavyam āvarṣantu gṛhāt bahis annam dīpaḥ jalam vastram anyat vā ādīyate ca yat

original: tṛptidaṃ pretaśabdena sapiṇḍīkaraṇāvadhi / abdakṛtyaṃ mayoktante samāsādvinatāsuta //
analyzed: tṛpti dam preta śabdena sapiṇḍīkaraṇa avadhi abda kṛtyam mayā ukta ante samāsāt vinatā suta

original: vaivasvatagṛhe yānaṃ yathā tattu nibodhameḥ / trayodaśe 'hni śravaṇākarmaṇonantarantu saḥ //
analyzed: vaivasvata gṛhe yānam yathā tat tu trayodaśe hni saḥ

original: tvaggṛhītāhivattārkṣya gṛhīto yamakiṅkaraiḥ / tasminmārge vrajatyeko gṛhīta iva markaṭaḥ //
analyzed: tvac gṛhīta ahi vat tārkṣya gṛhītaḥ yama kiṅkaraiḥ tasmin mārge vrajati ekaḥ gṛhītaḥ iva markaṭaḥ

original: vāyvagrasārivadrūpaṃ dehamanyatprapadyate / tatpiṇḍajaṃ pātanārthamanyattu pitṛsambhavam //
analyzed: vāyu agra sāri vat rūpam deham anyat prapadyate tat piṇḍa jam pātana artham anyat tu pitṛ sambhavam

original: tatpramāṇavayo 'vasthāsaṃsthānāṃ pragbhavo yathā / ṣaḍaśīti sahasrāṇi yojanānāṃ pramāṇataḥ //
analyzed: tad pramāṇa vayaḥ vasthā saṃsthānām pragbhavaḥ yathā ṣaṣ aśīti sahasrāṇi yojanānām pramāṇataḥ

original: adhvāntarāliko jñeyo yamamānuṣalokayoḥ / sādhikārdhakrośayutaṃ yojanānāṃ śatadvayam //
analyzed: adhva antarālikaḥ jñeyaḥ yama mānuṣa lokayoḥ sādhika ardha krośa yutam yojanānām śata dvayam

original: catvāriṃ śattathā sapta pratyahaṃ yāti tatra saḥ / aṣṭācatvāriṃśatā ca traiṃśatā divasairiti //
analyzed: catvāriṃśat tathā sapta pratyaham yāti tatra saḥ aṣṭācatvāriṃśatā ca traiṃśatā divasaiḥ iti

original: vaivasvatapuraṃ yāti kṛṣyamāṇo yamānugaiḥ / evaṃ krameṇa yātabye mārge pāparataistu yat //
analyzed: vaivasvata puram yāti kṛṣyamāṇaḥ yama anugaiḥ  evam krameṇa yātabye mārge pāpa rataiḥ tu yat

original: jāyate saprapañcaṃ tacchṛṇu tvamaruṇānuja / trayodaśadine dattaḥ pāśairbaddhvātidāruṇaiḥ //
analyzed: jāyate sa prapañcam tat śṛṇu tvam aruṇānuja trayodaśa dine dattaḥ pāśaiḥ baddhvā ati dāruṇaiḥ

original: yamasyāṅkuśahasto vai bhṛkuṭīkuṭilānanaḥ / daṇḍaprahārasambhrāntaḥ kṛṣyate dakṣiṇāṃ diśam //
analyzed: yamasya aṅkuśa hastaḥ vai bhṛkuṭī kuṭila ānanaḥ daṇḍa prahāra sambhrāntaḥ kṛṣyate dakṣiṇām diśam

original: kuśakaṇṭakavalmīkaśaṅkupāṣāṇakarkaśe / tathā pradīptajvalane kvacicchvabhraśatotkaṭe //
analyzed: kuśa kaṇṭaka valmīka śaṅku pāṣāṇa karkaśe tathā pradīpta jvalane kvacid śvabhra śata utkaṭe

original: pradīptādityatapte ca dahyamānaḥ sadaṃśake / kṛṣyate yamadūtaiśca śivāvannādabhīṣaṇaiḥ //
analyzed: pradīpta āditya tapte ca dahyamānaḥ sa daṃśake kṛṣyate yamadūtaiḥ ca śivā vat nāda bhīṣaṇaiḥ

original: prayātiḥ dāruṇe mārge pāpakarmā yamālaye / kalevare dahyamāne mahāntaṃ kṣayamṛcchati //
analyzed: prayātiḥ dāruṇe mārge pāpa karmā yama ālaye kalevare dahyamāne mahāntam kṣayam ṛcchati

original: bhakṣyamāṇe tathaivāṅge bhidyamāne ca dāruṇam / chidyamāne cirataraṃ janturduḥ khamavāpnute //
analyzed: bhakṣyamāṇe tathā eva aṅge bhidyamāne ca dāruṇam chidyamāne cirataram jantuḥ duḥ kham avāpnute

original: svena karmavi pākena dehāntaragato 'pi san / purāṇi ṣoḍaśāmuṣmanmārge tāni ca me śṛṇu //
analyzed: svena pākena deha antara gataḥ san purāṇi ṣoḍaśa amuṣmat mārge tāni ca me śṛṇu

original: yāmyaṃ sauripuraṃ nagedvabhavanaṃ gandharvaśailāgamau krauñcaṃ krūrapuraṃ vicitrabhavanaṃ bahvāpadaṃ duḥ khadam / nānākrandapuraṃ sutaptabhavanaṃ raudraṃ payovarṣaṇaṃ śītāḍhyaṃ bahubhītiṣoḍaśapurāṇyetānyadṛṣṭani te //
analyzed: yāmyam sauri puram nagedva bhavanam gandharva śaila āgamau krauñcam krūra puram vicitra bhavanam bahu āpadam duḥ kha dam nānā ākranda puram sutapta bhavanam raudram payaḥ varṣaṇam śīta āḍhyam bahu bhīti ṣoḍaśa purāṇi etāni adṛṣṭani te

original: tatra yāmya puraṃ gacchanputraputreti ca bruvan / hāheti krandate nityaṃ svakṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ smaran //
analyzed: tatra yāmya puram gacchan putra putra iti ca bruvan hāhā iti krandate nityam sva kṛtam duṣkṛtam smaran

original: aṣṭādaśodine tārkṣya tatpura prāpnuyādasau / puṣpabhadrā nadī yatra nyagrodhaḥ priyadarśanaḥ //
analyzed: tārkṣya tat pura prāpnuyāt asau puṣpabhadrā nadī yatra nyagrodhaḥ priya darśanaḥ

original: viśrāmecchāṃ karotyatra kārayanti na te bhaṭāḥ / kṣitau dattaṃ sutaistasya snehādvā kṛpayā tathā //
analyzed: viśrāma icchām karoti atra kārayanti na te bhaṭāḥ kṣitau dattam sutaiḥ tasya snehāt vā kṛpayā tathā

original: māsikaṃ piṇḍamaśnāti tataḥ sauripuraṃ vrajet / vrajannevaṃ pralapate mudgarāhatipīḍitaḥ //
analyzed: māsikam piṇḍam aśnāti tatas sauri puram vrajet  vrajan evam pralapate mudgara āhati pīḍitaḥ

original: jalāśayo naiva kṛto mayā tadā manuṣyatṛptyai paśupakṣitṛptaya / gotṛptihetorna ca gocaraḥ kṛtaḥ śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam //
analyzed: jalāśayaḥ nā eva kṛtaḥ mayā tadā manuṣya tṛptyai paśu pakṣi tṛptaye go tṛpti hetoḥ na ca gocaraḥ kṛtaḥ śarīra he nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: tatra nāmnā tu rājāsau jaṅgamaḥ kāmarūpadhṛk / bhayāt taddarśanājjātādbhuṅkte piṇḍaṃ sa śaṅkitaḥ //
analyzed: tatra nāmnā tu rājā asau jaṅgamaḥ kāma rūpa dhṛk  bhayāt tad darśanāt jātāt bhuṅkte piṇḍam sa śaṅkitaḥ

original: tripakṣe jalasaṃyuktaṃ kṣitau dattaṃ tato vrajet / vrajannevaṃ pralapate khaḍgāghātaprapīḍitaḥ //
analyzed: tri pakṣe jala saṃyuktam kṣitau dattam tatas vrajet vrajan evam pralapate khaḍga āghāta prapīḍitaḥ

original: na nityadānaṃ na gavāhnikaṃ kṛtaṃ pustaṃ ca dattaṃ na hi vedaśāstrayoḥ / purāṇadṛṣṭo na hi sevito 'dhvā śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam //
analyzed: na nitya dānam na gavāhnikam kṛtam pustam ca dattam na hi veda śāstrayoḥ  purāṇa dṛṣṭaḥ na hi sevitaḥ śarīra he nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: nagendranagaraṃ gatvā bhuktvā cānnaṃ tathāvidham / māsi dvitīye yaddattaṃ bāndhavaistu tato vrajet //
analyzed: naga indra nagaram gatvā bhuktvā ca annam tathāvidham māsi dvitīye yat dattam bāndhavaiḥ tu tatas vrajet

original: vrajannevaṃ pralapate kṛpāṇatsarutāḍitaḥ / parādhānamabhūtsarvaṃmama mūrkhaśiromaṇeḥ //
analyzed: vrajan evam pralapate kṛpāṇa tsaru tāḍitaḥ parādhānam abhūt sarvam mama mūrkha śiromaṇeḥ

original: mahatā puṇyayogena mānuṣyaṃ labdhavānaham / tṛtīye māsi samprāpte gandharvanagare śubham //
analyzed: mahatā puṇya yogena mānuṣyam labdhavān aham tṛtīye māsi samprāpte gandharvanagare śubham

original: tṛtīyamāsikaṃ piṇḍaṃ tatra bhuktvā brajatyasau / vrajannevaṃ vilapate tadagreṇāhataḥ pathi //
analyzed: tṛtīya māsikam piṇḍam tatra bhuktvā brajati asau vrajan evam vilapate tad agreṇa āhataḥ pathi

original: mayā na dattaṃ na hutaṃ hutāśane tapo na taptaṃ himaśailagahvare / na sevitaṃ gāṅgamaho mahājalaṃ śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam //
analyzed: mayā na dattam na hutam hutāśane tapaḥ na taptam himaśaila gahvare  na sevitam gāṅgam aho mahā jalam śarīra he nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: turye śailāgamaṃ māsi prāpnuyāttatra varṣaṇam / tasyopari bhavetpakṣinpāṣāṇānāṃ nirantaram //
analyzed: turye śaila āgamam māsi prāpnuyāt tatra varṣaṇam tasya upari bhavet pakṣin pāṣāṇānām nirantaram

original: caturthamāsikaṃ śrāddhaṃ bhuktvā tatra prasarpati / sa patanneva vilapanpāṣāṇādyatipīḍitaḥ //
analyzed: caturthamāsikam śrāddham bhuktvā tatra prasarpati sa patan eva vilapan pāṣāṇa ādi atipīḍitaḥ

original: na jñānamārgo na ca yogamārgo na karmamārgo na ca bhaktimārgaḥ / na sādhusaṅgātkimapi śrutaṃ mayā śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam //
analyzed: na jñāna mārgaḥ na ca yoga mārgaḥ na karma mārgaḥ na ca bhakti mārgaḥ na sādhu saṅgāt kim api śrutam mayā śarīra he nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: tataḥ krūrapura māsi pañcame yāti kāśyapa / bhuvi dattaṃ piṇḍajalaṃ bhuktvā krūrapuraṃ vrajet //
analyzed: tatas krūrapura māsi pañcame yāti kāśyapa bhuvi dattam piṇḍa jalam bhuktvā krūrapuram vrajet

original: vrajannevaṃ vilapate paṭṭiśaiḥ pātitaḥ pathi / hā mātarhāpitarbhrātaḥ sutā hā hā mama striyaḥ //
analyzed: vrajan evam vilapate paṭṭiśaiḥ pātitaḥ pathi hā mātar hā pitar bhrātar sutāḥ hā hā mama striyaḥ

original: yuṣmābhirnopadiṣṭo 'hamavasthāṃ prāpta īdṛśīm / evaṃ lālapyamānaṃ te yamadūtā vadantihi //
analyzed: yuṣmābhiḥ na upadiṣṭaḥ ham avasthām prāptaḥ īdṛśīm  evam lālapyamānam te yamadūtāḥ vadanti hi

original: kva mātā kva pitā mūḍha kva jāyā kva sutaḥ suhṛt / svakarmopārjite bhuṅkṣvaṃ mūrkha yātāściraṃ pathi //
analyzed: kva mātā kva pitā mūḍha kva jāyā kva sutaḥ suhṛd sva karma upārjite bhuṅkṣvam mūrkha yātāḥ ciram pathi

original: jānāsi śambalamalaṃ balamadhvagānāṃ no 'śambalaḥ prayatate paralokagatyai / gantavyamasti tava niścitameva tena mārgeṇa yena na bhavet krayavikrayo 'pi //
analyzed: jānāsi śambala malam balam adhvagānām no śambalaḥ prayatate para loka gatyai gantavyam asti tava niścitam eva tena mārgeṇa yena na bhavet

original: ūnaṣāṇmāsike krauñce bhuktvā piṇḍantu sodakam / ghaṭīmātrantu viśramya vicitranagaraṃ vrajet //
analyzed: ūna ṣāṇmāsike krauñce bhuktvā piṇḍam tu sa udakam ghaṭī mātram tu viśramya vicitra nagaram vrajet

original: vrajannevaṃ vilapate śūlāgreṇa vidāritaḥ //
analyzed: vrajan evam vilapate śūla agreṇa vidāritaḥ

original: kutra yāmi na hi gāmi jīvitaṃ hā mṛtasya maraṇaṃ punarna vai / itthameva vilapan prayātyasau yātanārhadhṛtavigrahaḥ pati //
analyzed: kutra yāmi na hi gāmi jīvitam hā mṛtasya maraṇam punar na vai ittham eva vilapan prayāti asau yātanā arha dhṛta vigrahaḥ pati

original: vicitranagare tatra vicitro nāma pārithivaḥ / tatra ṣaṇmāsapiṇḍena tṛptaḥ san vrajate puraḥ //
analyzed: vicitra nagare tatra vicitraḥ nāma pārithivaḥ tatra ṣaṣ māsa piṇḍena tṛptaḥ san vrajate puras

original: vrajannevaṃ vilapate prāsāgreṇa prapīḍitaḥ //
analyzed: vrajan evam vilapate prāsa agreṇa prapīḍitaḥ

original: mātā bhrātā pitā putraḥ ko 'pi me vartate na vā / yo māmuddharate pāpaṃ patantaṃ duḥ khasāgare //
analyzed: mātā bhrātā pitā putraḥ kaḥ pi me vartate na vā yaḥ mām uddharate pāpam patantam duḥkha sāgare

original: vrajatastatra mārge tu tatra vaitaraṇī śubhā / śatayojanavistīrṇā pūyaśoṇitasaṃkulā //
analyzed: vrajataḥ tatra mārge tu tatra vaitaraṇī śubhā śata yojana vistīrṇā pūya śoṇita saṃkulā

original: āyāti tatra dṛśyante nāvikā dhīvarādayaḥ / te vadanti pradattā gauryadi vaitaraṇī tvayā / nāvamenāṃ samāroha sukenottara vai nadīm //
analyzed: āyāti tatra dṛśyante nāvikāḥ dhīvara ādayaḥ te vadanti pradattā gauḥ yadi vaitaraṇī tvayā nāvam enām samāroha vai nadīm

original: tatra yena pradattā gauḥ sa sukhenaiva tāṃ taret / adāyī tatra ghṛṣyeta karagrāhantu nāvikaiḥ //
analyzed: tatra yena pradattā gauḥ sa sukhena eva tām taret  a dāyī tatra ghṛṣyeta kara grāhan tu nāvikaiḥ

original: ukhaiḥ kākairbakolūkaistīkṣṇatuṇḍairvitudyate / manujānāṃ hitaṃ dānamante vaitaraṇī khaga //
analyzed: ukhaiḥ kākaiḥ baka ulūkaiḥ tīkṣṇa tuṇḍaiḥ vitudyate manujānām hitam dānam ante vaitaraṇī khaga

original: dattā pāpaṃ dahet sarvaṃ mama lokantu sā nayet / maptame māsi samprāpte puraṃ bahvāpadaṃ mṛtaḥ //
analyzed: dattā pāpam dahet sarvam mama lokam tu sā nayet maptame māsi samprāpte puram bahu āpadam mṛtaḥ

original: vrajettu sodakaṃ bhuktvā piṇḍaṃ vai saptamāsikam / vrajannevaṃ vilapate parighāhatipīḍitaḥ //
analyzed: vrajet tu sa udakam bhuktvā piṇḍam vai sapta māsikam vrajan evam vilapate parigha āhati pīḍitaḥ

original: na dattaṃ na hutaṃ taptaṃ na snātaṃ na kṛtaṃ hitam / yādṛśaṃ caritaṃ karma mūḍhātman bhuṅkṣva tādṛśam //
analyzed: na dattam na hutam taptam na snātam na kṛtam hitam yādṛśam caritam karma mūḍha ātman bhuṅkṣva tādṛśam
