original: māsyaṣṭame duḥ khade tu pare bhuktvātha sodakam / piṇḍaṃ prayātsayau tārkṣya nānākrandapuraṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: māsi aṣṭame duḥ kha de tu parasmin bhuktvā atha sa udakam piṇḍam prayāt sa yau tārkṣya nānā ākranda puram tatas

original: prayāṇe ca pravadate musalāghātapīḍitaḥ / kva jāyācaṭulaiścāṭupaṭubhirvacanairmama //
analyzed: prayāṇe ca pravadate musala āghāta pīḍitaḥ kva jāyā caṭulaiḥ cāṭu paṭubhiḥ vacanaiḥ mama

original: bhojanaṃ bhallabhallībhirmusalaiśca kva māraṇam / navame māsi dattaṃ vai nānākrandapure tataḥ //
analyzed: bhojanam bhallabhallībhiḥ musalaiḥ ca kva māraṇam navame māsi dattam vai nānā ākranda pure tatas

original: piṇḍamaśrāti karuṇaṃ nānākrandān karotyapi / daśame māsi dattaṃ vai sutaptabhavanaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: karuṇam nānā ākrandān karoti api daśame māsi dattam vai sutapta bhavanam tatas

original: sarannevaṃ vilapate halāhatihataḥ pathi / kva sūnupeśalakaraiḥ pādasaṃvāhanaṃ mama //
analyzed: saran evam vilapate halāhati hataḥ pathi kva sūnu peśala karaiḥ pāda saṃvāhanam mama

original: kva dūtavajrapratimakairmatpadakarṣaṇam / daśame māsi piṇḍādi tatra bhuktvā prasarpati //
analyzed: kva dūta vajra pratimakaiḥ mad pada karṣaṇam daśame māsi piṇḍa ādi tatra bhuktvā prasarpati

original: māse caikādaśe pūrṇe puraṃ raudraṃ sa gacchati / gacchanneva vilapate yathā pṛṣṭhe prapīḍitaḥ //
analyzed: māse ca ekādaśe pūrṇe puram raudram sa gacchati gacchan eva vilapate yathā pṛṣṭhe prapīḍitaḥ

original: kvāhaṃ satūlīśayane parivartan kṣaṇe kṣaṇe / bhaṭahastabhraṣṭayaṣṭikṛṣṭapṛṣṭhaḥ kva vā punaḥ //
analyzed: kva aham sa tūlī śayane parivartan kṣaṇe kṣaṇe bhaṭa hasta bhraṣṭa yaṣṭi kṛṣṭa pṛṣṭhaḥ kva vā punar

original: kṣitau dattañca piṇḍādi bhuktvā tatra tato vrajet / payovarṣaṇamityetannāmakaṃ puramaṇḍaja //
analyzed: kṣitau dattam ca piṇḍa ādi bhuktvā tatra tatas vrajet payovarṣaṇam iti etat nāmakam puram aṇḍaja

original: vrajannevaṃ vilapate kuṭhārairmūrdhni tāḍitaḥ / kva bhṛtyakomalakarairgandhatailāvasecanam //
analyzed: vrajan evam vilapate kuṭhāraiḥ mūrdhni tāḍitaḥ kva bhṛtya komala karaiḥ gandha taila avasecanam

original: kva kīnāśānugaiḥ krodhātkuṭhāraiḥ śirasi vyathā / ūnābdikañca yacchrāddhaṃ tatra bhuṅkte suduḥ khitaḥ //
analyzed: kva kīnāśa anugaiḥ krodhāt kuṭhāraiḥ śirasi vyathā ūna ābdikam ca yat śrāddham tatra bhuṅkte su duḥ khitaḥ

original: saṃpūrṇe tu tato varṣe śītāḍhyaṃ nagaraṃ vrajet / gacchannevaṃ churikayā cchinnajihvastu roditi //
analyzed: saṃpūrṇe tu tatas varṣe śīta āḍhyam nagaram vrajet  gacchan evam churikayā chinna jihvaḥ tu roditi

original: priyālāpaiḥ kva ca sasamadhuratvasya varṇanam / uktamātre 'sipatrādijihvācchedaḥ kva caiva hi //
analyzed: priya ālāpaiḥ kva ca sa sa madhura tvasya varṇanam ukta mātre si patra ādi jihvā chedaḥ kva ca eva hi

original: vārṣikaṃ piṇḍadānādi bhuktvā tatra prasarpati / bahubhītikaraṃ tattat piṇḍajaṃ devamāsthitaḥ //
analyzed: vārṣikam piṇḍa dāna ādi bhuktvā tatra prasarpati bahu bhīti karam tat tat piṇḍa jam devam āsthitaḥ

original: prakāśayati pāppānamātmānañca vinindati / yoṣidapyevametasmin mārge vai paridevati //
analyzed: prakāśayati pāppānam ātmānam ca vinindati yoṣit api evam etasmin mārge vai paridevati

original: tato yāmyaṃ nātidūre nagaraṃ sa hi gacchati / catvāriṃśadyojanāni caturyuktānivistṛtam //
analyzed: tatas yāmyam na atidūre nagaram sa hi gacchati catvāriṃśat yojanāni catur yukta ani vistṛtam

original: trayodaśa pratīhārāḥ śravaṇā nāma tatra vai / śravaṇākarmatastuṣyantyanyathā krodhamāpnuyuḥ //
analyzed: trayodaśa pratīhārāḥ śravaṇāḥ nāma tatra vai śravaṇā karmataḥ tuṣyanti anyathā krodham āpnuyuḥ

original: tatastatrāśu raktākṣaṃ bhinnāñjanacayopamam / mṛtyukālāntakādīnāṃ madhye paśyati vai yamam //
analyzed: tatas tatra āśu rakta akṣam bhinnāñjana caya upamam mṛtyu kāla antaka ādīnām madhye paśyati vai yamam

original: daṃṣṭrākarālavadanaṃ bhṛkuṭīdāruṇākṛtim / virūpairbhoṣaṇairvaktrairvṛtaṃ vyādhiśataiḥ prabhum //
analyzed: daṃṣṭrā karāla vadanam bhṛkuṭī dāruṇa ākṛtim virūpaiḥ bhoṣaṇaiḥ vaktraiḥ vṛtam vyādhi śataiḥ prabhum

original: daṇḍāsaktamahābāhuṃ pāśahastaṃ subhairavam / tannirdiṣṭāṃ tato janturgatiṃ yāti śubhāśubhām //
analyzed: daṇḍa āsakta mahā bāhum pāśa hastam su bhairavam tad nirdiṣṭām tatas jantuḥ gatim yāti śubha aśubhām

original: pāpī pāpāṃ gatiṃ yāti yathā te kathitaṃ purā / chatropānahadātāro ye ca veśmapradāyakāḥ //
analyzed: pāpī pāpām gatim yāti yathā te kathitam purā chatra upānaha dātāraḥ ye ca veśma pradāyakāḥ

original: ye tu puṇyakṛtastatra te paśyanti yamaṃ tadā / saumyākṛtiṃ kuṇḍalinaṃ maulimantaṃ dhṛtaśriyam //
analyzed: ye tu puṇya kṛtaḥ tatra te paśyanti yamam tadā saumya ākṛtim kuṇḍalinam maulimantam dhṛta śriyam

original: ekādaśe dvādaśe hi ṣaṇmāse ābdike tathā / viprān bahūn bhojayet tatra yanmahatī kṣudhā //
analyzed: ekādaśe dvādaśe hi ṣaṣ māse ābdike tathā viprān bahūn bhojayet tatra yat mahatī kṣudhā

original: jīvan putrakalatrādipradiṣṭamitaraiḥ khaga / yo na sādhayati svārthamevaṃ paścāddhikhidyate //
analyzed: jīvan putra kalatra ādi pradiṣṭam itaraiḥ khaga yaḥ na sādhayati sva artham evam paścāt hi khidyate

original: etat te sarvamākhyātaṃ saṃyaminyāṃ yathāgati / proktamāvarṣakṛtyaṃ te kimanyacchrotumicchasi //
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam saṃyaminyām yathāgati proktam āvarṣa kṛtyam te kim anyat śrotum icchasi

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde varṣakṛtyayamalokamārgayātanādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde varṣakṛtyayamalokamārgayātanādinirūpaṇam nāma

original: pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: pañcamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 6
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / api sādhanayuktasya tīrthadānaratasya ca / akṛte tu vṛṣotsarge paralokagatirna hi //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca api sādhana yuktasya tīrtha dāna ratasya ca a kṛte tu vṛṣotsarge para loka gatiḥ na hi

original: tasmāt kṛṣṇa vṛṣotsargaḥ kartavya iti me śrutam / kiṃ phalaṃ vṛṣayajñasya purā kena kṛto hare //
analyzed: tasmāt kṛṣṇa vṛṣotsargaḥ kartavyaḥ iti me śrutam kim phalam vṛṣa yajñasya purā kena kṛtaḥ hare

original: anaḍvān kīdṛśaḥ proktaḥ kasmin kāle viśeṣataḥ / ko vidhistasya nirdiṣṭaḥ sarvaṃ me kṛpayā vada //
analyzed: anaḍvān kīdṛśaḥ proktaḥ kasmin kāle viśeṣataḥ kaḥ vidhiḥ tasya nirdiṣṭaḥ sarvam me kṛpayā vada

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / itihāsaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ pravakṣyāmi khageśvara / brahmaputreṇa yat proktaṃ rājānaṃ vīravāhanam //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca itihāsam mahā puṇyam pravakṣyāmi khageśvara brahma putreṇa yat proktam rājānam vīravāhanam

original: virādhanagare rājā vīravāhananāmakaḥ / dharmātmā satyasandhaśca vadānyo vipratuṣṭikṛt //
analyzed: virādha nagare rājā vīravāhana nāmakaḥ dharma ātmā satya sandhaḥ ca vadānyaḥ vipratuṣṭi kṛt

original: sa kadācidvanaṃ vīro mahātmākheṭakaṃ gataḥ / kiñcit praṣṭumanāstārkṣya vasiṣṭhasyāśramaṃ yayau //
analyzed: sa kadācid vanam vīraḥ mahātmā ākheṭakam gataḥ kiñcid praṣṭu manāḥ tārkṣya vasiṣṭhasya āśramam yayau

original: namaskṛtya muniṃ tatra kṛtāsanaparigrahaḥ / paśrayāvanato rājā papraccha ṛṣisaṃsadi //
analyzed: namaskṛtya munim tatra kṛta āsana parigrahaḥ paśraya avanataḥ rājā papraccha ṛṣi saṃsadi

original: rājovāca / mune mayā kṛto dharmo yathāśakti prayatnataḥ / yamasya śāsanaṃ śrutvā bibhemi nitarāṃ hṛdi //
analyzed: rājā uvāca mune mayā kṛtaḥ dharmaḥ yathāśakti prayatnataḥ yamasya śāsanam śrutvā bibhemi nitarām hṛdi

original: yamañca yamadūtāṃśca nirayān ghoradarśanān / na paśyāmi mahābhāga tathā vada dayānidhe //
analyzed: yaman ca yama dūtān ca nirayān ghora darśanān na paśyāmi mahābhāga tathā vada dayānidhe

original: vasiṣṭha uvāca / dharmā bahuvidhā rājan varṇyante śāstrakovidaiḥ / sūkṣmatvānna vijānanti karmamārgavimohitāḥ //
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ uvāca dharmāḥ bahuvidhāḥ rājan varṇyante śāstra kovidaiḥ sūkṣma tvāt na vijānanti karma mārga vimohitāḥ

original: dānaṃ tīrthaṃ tapo yajñāḥ saṃnyāsaḥ paitṛko mahaḥ / dharmeṣu gṛhyamāṇeṣu vṛṣotsargo viśeṣitaḥ //
analyzed: dānam tīrtham tapaḥ yajñāḥ saṃnyāsaḥ paitṛkaḥ mahaḥ dharmeṣu gṛhyamāṇeṣu vṛṣotsargaḥ viśeṣitaḥ

original: eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yadyeko 'pi gayāṃ vrajet / yajeta vāśvamedhena nīlaṃ vā vṛṣamutsṛjet //
analyzed: eṣṭavyāḥ bahavaḥ putrāḥ yadi ekaḥ gayām vrajet yajeta vā aśvamedhena nīlam vā vṛṣam utsṛjet

original: brahmahatyādipāpāni jñānājñānakṛtāni ca / nīlodvāhena śudhyettu samudraplavanena vā //
analyzed: brahmahatyā ādi pāpāni jñāna ajñāna kṛtāni ca nīla udvāhena śudhyet tu samudra plavanena vā

original: ekādaśāhe rājendra yasya notsūjyate vṛṣaḥ / pretatvaṃ niścalaṃ tasya kṛtaiḥ śrāddhaistu kiṃ bhavet //
analyzed: ekādaśa ahe rāja indra yasya na utsūjyate vṛṣaḥ preta tvam niścalam tasya kṛtaiḥ śrāddhaiḥ tu kim bhavet

original: yathākathañcit kartavyastīrthe vā pattane 'tha vā / vṛṣayajñaiḥ pramucyate nānyathā sādhanaiḥ khaga //
analyzed: yathā kathañcid kartavyaḥ tīrthe vā pattane vā vṛṣa yajñaiḥ pramucyate na anyathā sādhanaiḥ

original: vṛṣabhaṃ pañcakalyāṇaṃ yuvānaṃ kṛṣṇakaṃbalam / goyūthamadhye nitarāṃ vicarantaṃ vidhānataḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣabham pañcakalyāṇam yuvānam kṛṣṇa kaṃbalam  go yūtha madhye nitarām vicarantam vidhānataḥ

original: catasṛbhirvatsakābhirdvābhyāñcaivaikayā khaga / vivāhya maṅgaladravyairmantravattaṃ samutsṛjet //
analyzed: catasṛbhiḥ vatsakābhiḥ dvābhyām ca eva ekayā khaga vivāhya maṅgala dravyaiḥ mantravat tam samutsṛjet

original: iha ratīti ṣaḍṛgbhirhemaṃ kuryādvibhāvasoḥ / kārtikyāṃ māghavaiśākhyāṃ saṃkrame pātaparvasu //
analyzed: iha ratī iti ṣaṣ ṛgbhiḥ hemam kuryāt vibhāvasoḥ kārtikyām māgha vaiśākhyām saṃkrame pāta parvasu

original: tīrthe pitryekṣayāhe ca viśeṣeṇa praśasyate / lohito yastu varṇena mukhe pucche ca pāṇḍuraḥ //
analyzed: tīrthe pitrya ikṣaya ahe ca viśeṣeṇa praśasyate  lohitaḥ yaḥ tu varṇena mukhe pucche ca pāṇḍuraḥ

original: pītaḥ khuraviṣāṇeṣu sa nīlo vṛṣa ucyate / śvetavarṇo bhavedvipro lohitaḥ kṣattra ucyate //
analyzed: pītaḥ khura viṣāṇeṣu sa nīlaḥ vṛṣaḥ ucyate  śveta varṇaḥ bhavet vipraḥ lohitaḥ kṣattraḥ ucyate

original: pītavarṇo bhavedvaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ smṛto budhaiḥ / yathāvarṇaṃ samuddiṣṭo varṇeṣu brāhmaṇādiṣu //
analyzed: pīta varṇaḥ bhavet vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ smṛtaḥ budhaiḥ yathāvarṇam samuddiṣṭaḥ varṇeṣu brāhmaṇa ādiṣu

original: atha vā raktavarṇastu sarveṣāmeva śasyate / pitā pitāmahaścaiva tathaiva prapitāmahaḥ //
analyzed: atha vā rakta varṇaḥ tu sarveṣām eva śasyate pitā pitāmahaḥ ca eva tathā eva prapitāmahaḥ

original: āśāsate sutaṃ jātaṃ vṛṣotsargaṃ kariṣyati / dharmastvaṃ vṛṣarūpeṇa jagadānandadāyakaḥ //
analyzed: āśāsate sutam jātam vṛṣotsargam kariṣyati dharmaḥ tvam vṛṣa rūpeṇa jagat ānanda dāyakaḥ

original: aṣṭamūrteradhiṣṭhānamataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me / gaṅgāyamunayoḥ peyamantarvedi tṛṇaṃ cara //
analyzed: aṣṭamūrteḥ adhiṣṭhānam atas śāntim prayaccha me gaṅgā yamunayoḥ peyam antarvedi tṛṇam cara

original: dharmarājasya purato vācyaṃ me sukṛtaṃ vṛṣa / dakṣiṇāṃse triśūlāṅkaṃ vāmorau cakracihnitam //
analyzed: dharmarājasya puratas vācyam me sukṛtam vṛṣa dakṣiṇa aṃse triśūla aṅkam vāma ūrau cakra cihnitam

original: iti saṃprārthya vṛṣabhaṃ gandhapuṣpākṣatādibhiḥ / vṛṣaṃ tatsatarīyuktaṃ pūjayitvā samutsṛjet //
analyzed: iti saṃprārthya vṛṣabham gandha puṣpa akṣata ādibhiḥ vṛṣam tad satarī yuktam pūjayitvā samutsṛjet

original: tasmādrājan vidhānena vṛṣotsargaṃ samācara / bahusādhanayuktasya nānyathā sadgatistava //
analyzed: tasmāt rājan vidhānena vṛṣotsargam samācara bahu sādhana yuktasya na anyathā sat gatiḥ tava

original: āsīttretāyuge pūrvaṃ videhanagare nṛpa / brāhmaṇo dharmavatseti svakarmanirataḥ sudhīḥ //
analyzed: āsīt tretā yuge pūrvam videha nagare nṛpa brāhmaṇaḥ dharmavatsa iti sva karma nirataḥ sudhīḥ

original: viṣṇubhakto 'titejasvī yathālābhena tuṣṭikṛt / pitṛparvaṇi saṃprāpte kuśāryo kānanaṃ yayau //
analyzed: viṣṇu bhaktaḥ ti tejasvī yathā lābhena tuṣṭi kṛt pitṛparvaṇi saṃprāpte kuśāryaḥ kānanam yayau

original: aṭannitastatastatra cinvan kuśapalāśakam / sahasopetya puruṣāścātvāraścārudarśanāḥ //
analyzed: aṭan itas tatas tatra cinvan kuśa palāśakam sahasā upetya puruṣāḥ cātvāraḥ cāru darśanāḥ

original: vibhrāntamanasaṃ gṛhya pratyagjagmurvihāyasā / bahuvṛkṣasamākīrṇaṃ giridurgabhayānakam //
analyzed: vibhrānta manasam gṛhya pratyak jagmuḥ vihāyasā bahu vṛkṣa samākīrṇam giri durga bhayānakam

original: vanādvanāntaraṃ ninyurnadīnadasamākulam / sa tatra nagaraṃ rājan dadarśa bahuvistaram //
analyzed: vanāt vana antaram ninyuḥ nadīnada samākulam  sa tatra nagaram rājan dadarśa bahu vistaram

original: gopuradvāraracitaṃ saudhaprāsādamaṇḍitam / catvarāpaṇapaṇyādinaranārīsamākulam //
analyzed: gopura dvāra racitam saudha prāsāda maṇḍitam catvara āpaṇa paṇya ādi nara nārī samākulam

original: tūryadvandvābhinirghoṣavīṇāpaṭahanāditam / kāṃścitkṣudhārditāndīnānmalinānvigataujasaḥ //
analyzed: tūrya dvandva abhinirghoṣa vīṇā paṭaha nāditam kāṃścid kṣudhā arditān dīnān malinān vigata ojasaḥ

original: tato 'tituṣṭānmalinānvastrakhaṇḍasamāvṛtān / agrato hṛṣṭapuṣṭāṃśca svarṇavastropaśobhitān //
analyzed: ti tuṣṭān malinān vastra khaṇḍa samāvṛtān agratas hṛṣṭa puṣṭān ca svarṇa vastra upaśobhitān

original: tato 'pi surasaṃkāśānsa dṛṣṭvā vismito 'bhavat / kiṃ svapna uta māyā vai madīyo mānaso bhramaḥ //
analyzed: tatas sura saṃkāśān sa dṛṣṭvā vismitaḥ bhavat kim svapnaḥ uta māyā vai madīyaḥ mānasaḥ bhramaḥ

original: sandihānaṃ dvijaṃ ninyuḥ puruṣā rājasannidhim / sataddadarśa viprastu svarṇaprāsādamandire //
analyzed: sandihānam dvijam ninyuḥ puruṣāḥ rāja sannidhim sa tat dadarśa vipraḥ tu svarṇa prāsāda mandire

original: siṃhāsanaṃmahādivyaṃ chatracāmaravījitam / tatropa viṣṭaṃ rājānaṃ kirīṭakanakojjvalam //
analyzed: siṃhāsanam mahā divyam chatra cāmara vījitam tatra upa viṣṭam rājānam kirīṭa kanaka ujjvalam

original: mahatyā ca śriyā yuktaṃ stūyamānaṃ suvandibhiḥ / rājāpi dṛṣṭvā taṃ vipraṃ pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ //
analyzed: mahatyā ca śriyā yuktam stūyamānam su vandibhiḥ  rājā api dṛṣṭvā tam vipram pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: pūjayāmāsa vidhivanmadhuparkāsa nādibhiḥ / santuṣṭamanasaṃ devamastauṣītparayā mudā //
analyzed: pūjayāmāsa vidhivat madhuparka āsa nādibhiḥ santuṣṭa manasam devam astauṣīt parayā mudā

original: adya me saphalaṃ janma pāvitañca kulaṃ prabho / viṣṇubhaktasya dharmasya yatte dṛggocaraṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: adya me saphalam janma pāvitam ca kulam prabho viṣṇu bhaktasya dharmasya yat te dṛś gocaram gataḥ

original: natvā stutvā bahuvidhamuvācānuvasannṛpaḥ / yataḥ samāgato devaḥ punastatraiva nīyatām //
analyzed: natvā stutvā bahuvidham uvāca anuvasan nṛpaḥ yatas samāgataḥ devaḥ punar tatra eva nīyatām

original: iti śrutvā vaco rājñaḥ papraccha dvijapuṅgavaḥ / brāhmaṇa uvāca / ko 'yaṃ deśa- kuto lokā uttamā madhyamādhamāḥ //
analyzed: iti śrutvā vacaḥ rājñaḥ papraccha dvija puṅgavaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca kaḥ yam deśa kutas lokāḥ uttamāḥ madhyama adhamāḥ

original: kena puṇyena tu bhavānpārameṣṭyavibhūṣitaḥ / kimarthamahamānītaḥ punastatraiva nīyate //
analyzed: kena puṇyena tu bhavān pārameṣṭya vibhūṣitaḥ kimartham aham ānītaḥ punar tatra eva nīyate

original: apūrvamiva paśyāmi sarvaṃ svapnagato yathā / rājovāca / svadharmanirato yastu haribhaktirataḥ sadā //
analyzed: apūrvam iva paśyāmi sarvam svapna gataḥ yathā rājā uvāca svadharma nirataḥ yaḥ tu hari bhakti rataḥ sadā

original: virakta indriyārthebhyaḥ sa me pūjyo na saṃśayaḥ / tīrthayātrāparo nityaṃ vṛṣotsargaviśeṣavit //
analyzed: viraktaḥ indriya arthebhyaḥ sa me pūjyaḥ na saṃśayaḥ tīrtha yātrā paraḥ nityam vṛṣotsarga viśeṣa vid

original: satyadānaparo yastu sa namasyo divaukasām / darśanārthamihānītaḥ pūjārhaśca parantapa //
analyzed: satya dāna paraḥ yaḥ tu sa namasyaḥ divaukasām  darśana artham iha ānītaḥ pūjā arhaḥ ca parantapa

original: anugṛhāṇa māṃ deva kṣamasva mama sāhasam / ityuktvā darśayāmāsa mantriṇāṃ saṃjñayā bhruvaḥ //
analyzed: anugṛhāṇa mām deva kṣamasva mama sāhasam iti uktvā darśayāmāsa mantriṇām saṃjñayā bhruvaḥ

original: vadiṣyati samagraṃ te svayaṃ vaktuṃ na sāmpratam / sāmantaḥ sarvavedajño jñātvā hārdaṃ nṛpasya ca //
analyzed: vadiṣyati samagram te svayam vaktum na sāmpratam sāmantaḥ sarva veda jñaḥ jñātvā hārdam nṛpasya ca

original: vipaściduvāca / pūrvajanmani vaiśyo 'yaṃ viśvambhara iti śrutaḥ / virādhanagare vipra dvijadevavibhūṣite //
analyzed: vipaścit uvāca pūrva janmani vaiśyaḥ yam viśvambharaḥ iti śrutaḥ virādha nagare vipra dvija deva vibhūṣite

original: vaiśyavṛttyā sadā jīvankuṭumbaparipālakaḥ / gavāṃ śuśrūṣako nityaṃ brāhmaṇānāñca pūjakaḥ //
analyzed: vaiśya vṛttyā sadā jīvan kuṭumba paripālakaḥ gavām śuśrūṣakaḥ nityam brāhmaṇānām ca pūjakaḥ

original: pātradānaparo nityamātitheyāgnisevakaḥ / gārhasthyaṃ vidhivaccakre bhāryayā satyamedhayā //
analyzed: pātra dāna paraḥ nityam ātitheyī agni sevakaḥ  gārhasthyam vidhivat cakre bhāryayā satyamedhayā

original: smārtena lokānajayacchrautena ta havirbhujaḥ / kadācidbandhubhiḥ sākaṃ kṛtvā tīrthāni bhūriśaḥ //
analyzed: smārtena lokān ajayat śrautena havirbhujaḥ  kadācid bandhubhiḥ sākam kṛtvā tīrthāni bhūriśas

original: yāvadāyāti sadanaṃ dṛṣṭavālloṃmaśaṃ pathi / daṇḍavatpraṇipatyāśu kṛtāñjalipuṭaṃ sthitam //
analyzed: yāvat āyāti sadanam dṛṣṭavān loṃmaśam pathi daṇḍa vat praṇipatya āśu kṛta añjali puṭam sthitam

original: papraccha vinayopetaṃ karuṇāvārivāridhiḥ / ṛṣiruvāca / kuta āgamyate sādho brāhmaṇairbandhubhiryutaḥ //
analyzed: papraccha vinaya upetam karuṇā vāri vāridhiḥ ṛṣiḥ uvāca kutas āgamyate sādho brāhmaṇaiḥ bandhubhiḥ yutaḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ dharmanilayaṃ praklinnaṃ mānasaṃ mama / viśvambhara uvāca / śīryamāṇaṃ śarīraṃ hi jñātvā mṛtyuṃ puraḥ sthitam //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tvām dharma nilayam praklinnam mānasam mama viśvambharaḥ uvāca śīryamāṇam śarīram hi jñātvā mṛtyum puras sthitam

original: bharyayā dharmacāriṇyā tīrthayātrāṃ vinirgataḥ / kṛtvā tīrthāni vidhivadviśrāṇya vipulaṃ vasu //
analyzed: bharyayā dharma cāriṇyā tīrtha yātrām vinirgataḥ kṛtvā tīrthāni vidhivat viśrāṇya vipulam vasu

original: yāvadbrajāmyahaṃ veśma bhavān dṛṣṭipathaṃ gataḥ / lomaśa uvāca / tīrthāni santi bhūrīṇi varṣai'smin bhārate śubhe //
analyzed: yāvat brajāmi aham veśma bhavān dṛṣṭi patham gataḥ  lomaśaḥ uvāca tīrthāni santi bhūrīṇi varṣaiḥ smin bhārate śubhe

original: yattvayā hyupacīrṇāni tāni sarvāṇi me vada / vaiśya uvāca / gaṅgā ca sūrya tanayā mahāpuṇyā sarasvatī //
analyzed: yat tvayā hi upacīrṇāni tāni sarvāṇi me vada vaiśyaḥ uvāca gaṅgā ca sūrya tanayā mahā puṇyā sarasvatī

original: daśāśvamedhairayajadyatra brahmā sureśvaraḥ / tīrtharājastataḥ kāśī mahādevo dayānidhiḥ //
analyzed: daśa aśvamedhaiḥ ayajat yatra brahmā sureśvaraḥ tīrtha rājaḥ tatas kāśī mahādevaḥ dayā nidhiḥ

original: mṛtānāṃ yatra jantūnāṃ karṇe japati tārakam / pulahasyāśramaṃ puṇyaṃ phalgutīrthañca gaṇḍakī //
analyzed: mṛtānām yatra jantūnām karṇe japati tārakam pulahasya āśramam puṇyam phalgutīrtham ca gaṇḍakī

original: cakratīrthaṃ naimiṣañca śivatīrthamanantakam / gopratārakanāgeśamayodhyābindusaṃjñitam //
analyzed: cakratīrtham naimiṣam ca śivatīrtham anantakam gopratāraka nāgeśam ayodhyā bindu saṃjñitam

original: yatrāsta muktidaḥ sākṣādrāmo rājīvalocanaḥ / āgneyaṃ vāyukauberaṃ kaumāraṃ bhūruhāṃ punaḥ //
analyzed: yatra āsta mukti daḥ sākṣāt rāmaḥ rājīva locanaḥ  āgneyam vāyu kauberam kaumāram bhūruhām punar

original: saukaraṃ mathurā yatra nityaṃ sannihato hariḥ / puṣkaraṃ satyatīrthañca jvālatīrthaṃ dineśvaram //
analyzed: saukaram mathurā yatra nityam san nihataḥ hariḥ puṣkaram satyatīrtham ca jvālatīrtham dineśvaram

original: indratīrthaṃ kurukṣetraṃ yatra prācī sarasvatī / tāpī payoṣṇī nirvindhyā malayaḥ kṛṣṇaveṇikā //
analyzed: indratīrtham kurukṣetram yatra prācī sarasvatī tāpī payoṣṇī nirvindhyā malayaḥ kṛṣṇaveṇikā

original: godāvarī daṇḍakañca tāmracūḍaṃ sadodakam / dyāvābhūmīśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā śrīśailaḥ parvateśvaraḥ //
analyzed: godāvarī daṇḍakam ca tāmracūḍam sadā udakam  dyāvābhūmīśvaram dṛṣṭvā śrīśailaḥ parvata īśvaraḥ

original: asaṃkhyaliṅgatīrthāni yatra santi sadā mune / veṅkaṭādrau mahātejāḥ śrīraṅgākhyaḥ svayaṃ hariḥ //
analyzed: asaṃkhya liṅga tīrthāni yatra santi sadā mune veṅkaṭa adrau mahā tejāḥ śrī raṅga ākhyaḥ svayam hariḥ

original: veṅkaṭī nāma tatraiva devī mahiṣamardinī / candratīrthaṃ bhadravaṭaḥ kāverīkuṭilācalau //
analyzed: veṅkaṭī nāma tatra eva devī mahiṣamardinī candratīrtham bhadravaṭaḥ kāverī kuṭila acalau

original: avaṭodā tāmraparṇo trikṛṭaḥ kollako giriḥ / vāsiṣṭhaṃ brahmatīrthañca jñānatīrthaṃ mahodadhiḥ //
analyzed: avaṭodā tāmraparṇo trikṛṭaḥ kollakaḥ giriḥ vāsiṣṭham brahmatīrtham ca jñānatīrtham mahā udadhiḥ

original: hṛṣīkeśaṃ virājañca viśālaṃ nīlaparvataḥ / bhīmakūṭaḥ śvetagirī rudratīrthamumāvanam //
analyzed: hṛṣīkeśam virājan ca viśālam nīlaparvataḥ bhīmakūṭaḥ śvetagiriḥ rudratīrtham umāvanam

original: avāpa girijā devī tapasā yatra śaṅkaram / vāruṇaṃ sūryatīrthañca haṃsatīrthaṃ mahodayam //
analyzed: avāpa girijā devī tapasā yatra śaṅkaram  vāruṇam sūryatīrtham ca haṃsatīrtham mahodayam

original: nimajjya yatra kākolā rājahaṃsatvamāyayuḥ / asuro yatra devatvamavāpa snānamātrataḥ //
analyzed: nimajjya yatra kākolāḥ rājahaṃsa tvam āyayuḥ asuraḥ yatra deva tvam avāpa snāna mātrataḥ

original: viśvarūpaṃ vanditīrthaṃ ratneśaḥ kuhakācalaḥ / naranārāyaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā mucyate pāpakoṭibhiḥ //
sarasvatīdṛṣadvatyau narmadā śarmadā nṛṇām / nīlakaṇṭhaṃ mahākālaṃ puṇyaṃ cāmarakaṇṭakam //
analyzed: sarasvatī dṛṣadvatyau narmadā śarma dā nṛṇām nīlakaṇṭham mahākālam puṇyam ca amarakaṇṭakam

original: candrabhāgā vetravatī vīrabhadraṃ gaṇeśvaram / gokarṇaṃ bilvatīrthañca karmakuṇḍaṃ satārakam //
analyzed: candrabhāgā vetravatī vīrabhadram gaṇeśvaram gokarṇam bilva tīrtham ca karmakuṇḍam sa tārakam

original: snānamātreṇa yatrāśu mucyate karmabandhanāt / anyānyapi ca tīrthāni kṛtāni kṛpayā tava //
analyzed: snāna mātreṇa yatra āśu mucyate karma bandhanāt  anyāni api ca tīrthāni kṛtāni kṛpayā tava

original: utpadyate śubhā buddhiḥ sādhūnāṃ yadanugrahaḥ / ekataḥ sarvatīrthāni karuṇāḥ sādhavo 'nyataḥ //
analyzed: utpadyate śubhā buddhiḥ sādhūnām yat anugrahaḥ ekatas sarva tīrthāni karuṇāḥ sādhavaḥ nyatas

original: anugrahāya bhūtānāṃ caranti caritavratāḥ / tvaṃ guruḥ sarvarṇānāṃ vidyayā vayasādhikaḥ //
analyzed: anugrahāya bhūtānām caranti carita vratāḥ tvam guruḥ sarva ṛṇānām vidyayā vayasā adhikaḥ

original: ataḥ pṛcchāmyahaṃ kiñcidādhibhūtaṃ cirantanam / kiṃ kuryāṃ kaṃ nu pṛcche 'haṃ mano me 'ticalaṃ mune //
analyzed: atas pṛcchāmi aham kiñcid ādhibhūtam cirantanam kim kuryām kam nu pṛcche haṃ manaḥ me ticalam mune

original: niḥ spṛhaṃ brahmaviṣaye viṣayeṣvatilālasam / manāgapi na sahate virahaṃ timiraṃ bruvat //
analyzed: niḥ spṛham brahma viṣaye viṣayeṣu ati lālasam manāk api na sahate viraham timiram bruvat

original: mohitaṃ vividhairbhāvaiḥ karmaṇāṃ kṣetramuttamam / śāntiṃ yathā samāyāti sampannamiva bhūsura //
analyzed: mohitam vividhaiḥ bhāvaiḥ karmaṇām kṣetram uttamam  śāntim yathā samāyāti sampannam iva bhūsura

original: vivekapravaṇaṃ śuddhaṃ yathā syātkṛpayā vada / ṛṣiruvāca / manastu prabalaṃ nityaṃ savikāraṃ svabhāvataḥ //
analyzed: viveka pravaṇam śuddham yathā syāt kṛpayā vada ṛṣiḥ uvāca manaḥ tu prabalam nityam sa vikāram svabhāvataḥ

original: vaśaṃ nayanti kariṇaṃ pramattamapi hastipāḥ / tathāpi sādhusaṅgatyā sādhanairapyatandritaḥ //
analyzed: vaśam nayanti kariṇam pramattam api hastipāḥ tathā api sādhu saṅgatyā sādhanaiḥ api atandritaḥ

original: tīvreṇa bhaktiyogena vicāreṇa vaśaṃ nayet / itihāsaṃ pravakṣyāmi tava pratyayakārakam //
analyzed: tīvreṇa bhakti yogena vicāreṇa vaśam nayet itihāsam pravakṣyāmi tava pratyaya kārakam

original: nārado 'kathayanmahyaṃ svavṛttagatajanmanaḥ / nārada uvāca / kasyaciddvijamukhyasya dāsīputtraḥ purā mune //
analyzed: kathayan mahyam sva vṛtta gata janmanaḥ  nāradaḥ uvāca kasyacid dvijamukhyasya dāsī puttraḥ purā mune

original: śikṣito bālabhāve 'pi pāṭhito nitarāmaham / tatrāpi saṅgatirjātā mahatāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām //
analyzed: śikṣitaḥ bāla bhāve pi pāṭhitaḥ nitarām aham tatra api saṅgatiḥ jātā mahatām puṇya karmaṇām

original: prāvṛṭkāle mama gṛhe sthitānāṃ bhāgyayogataḥ / śuśrūṣaṇānuvṛttyā ca praśrayeṇa damena ca //
analyzed: prāvṛṣ kāle mama gṛhe sthitānām bhāgya yogataḥ śuśrūṣaṇa anuvṛttyā ca praśrayeṇa damena ca

original: santoṣaṃ paramaṃ prāpya kṛpayā tvidamabruvan / manīṣā nirmalā yena jātā mama śubhārthinī //
analyzed: santoṣam paramam prāpya kṛpayā tu idam abruvan manīṣā nirmalā yena jātā mama śubha arthinī

original: yayā viṣṇumayaṃ sarvamtmanyeva dadṛśivān / munaya ūcuḥ / śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyā mo hitāya tava bālaka //
analyzed: yayā viṣṇu mayam sarva ātmani eva dadṛśivān munayaḥ ūcuḥ śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāḥ mā u hitāya tava bālaka

original: yena vai dhriyamāṇena ihāmutra sukhaṃ bhavet / devatiryaṅmanuṣyāśca saṃsāre vividhā janāḥ //
analyzed: yena vai dhriyamāṇena iha amutra sukham bhavet deva tiryak manuṣyāḥ ca saṃsāre vividhāḥ janāḥ

original: nibaddhāḥ karmapaśaiste bhuñjan bhogān pṛthagvidhān / devatvaṃ yāti sattvena rajasā ca manuṣyatām //
analyzed: nibaddhāḥ karma paśaiḥ te bhuñjan bhogān pṛthagvidhān deva tvam yāti sattvena rajasā ca manuṣya tām

original: tiryaktvaṃ tamasā janturvāsanānugato 'budhaḥ / māturlabdhvā punarjanma mriyate ca punaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: tiryaktvam tamasā jantuḥ vāsanā anugataḥ budhaḥ mātuḥ labdhvā punarjanma mriyate ca punar punar

original: evaṃ gatvā hyasaṃkhyātā yonīstāḥ karmabhūrapi / mānuṣyaṃ durlabhaṃ labdhvā kadāciddaivayogataḥ //
analyzed: evam gatvā hi asaṃkhyātāḥ yonīḥ tāḥ karma bhūḥ api mānuṣyam durlabham labdhvā kadācid daivayogataḥ

original: anugraheṇa mahatāṃ hariṃ jñātvā vimucyate / rogagrāhaṃ mohajālamapāraṃ bhavasāgaram //
analyzed: anugraheṇa mahatām harim jñātvā vimucyate roga grāham moha jālam apāram bhava sāgaram

original: na paśyāmi titīrṣoranyad rāmasmaraṇaṃ vinā / navanīyaṃ yathā dadhno jyotiḥ kāṣṭhādapi kvacit //
analyzed: na paśyāmi titīrṣoḥ anyat rāma smaraṇam vinā navanīyam yathā dadhnaḥ jyotiḥ kāṣṭhāt api kvacid

original: manthanaiḥ sādhanairevaṃ paraṃ jñātvā sukhī bhavet / ātmā nityo 'vyayaḥ satyaḥ sarvagaḥ sarvabhṛnmahān //
analyzed: manthanaiḥ sādhanaiḥ evam param jñātvā sukhī bhavet ātmā nityaḥ vyayaḥ satyaḥ sarva gaḥ sarva bhṛt mahān

original: aprameyaḥ svayañjyotiragrāhyo manasāpi yaḥ / saccidānandarūpo 'sau sarvaprāṇihṛdi sthitaḥ //
analyzed: aprameyaḥ svayan jyotiḥ agrāhyaḥ manasā api yaḥ saccidānanda rūpaḥ sau sarva prāṇi hṛdi sthitaḥ

original: vinaśyatsvapi bhāveṣu na vinaśyati karhicit / ākāśaḥ sarvabhūteṣu sthitastejojale tathā //
analyzed: vinaśyatsu api bhāveṣu na vinaśyati karhicit ākāśaḥ sarva bhūteṣu sthitaḥ tejaḥ jale tathā

original: ātmā sarvatra nirlepaḥ pārthiveṣu yathānilaḥ / bhaktānukampī bhagavān sādhūnāṃ rakṣaṇāya ca //
analyzed: ātmā sarvatra nirlepaḥ pārthiveṣu yathā anilaḥ bhakta anukampī bhagavān sādhūnām rakṣaṇāya ca

original: āvirbhavati lokeṣuguṇīvājñaiḥ pratīyate / evaṃvivekatvayā yo buddhyā saṃśīlayeddhṛdi //
analyzed: āvirbhavati loka iṣu guṇī iva ajñaiḥ pratīyate evam viveka tvayā yaḥ buddhyā saṃśīlayet hṛdi

original: bhaktiyogena santuṣṭa ātmānaṃ darśayedajaḥ / tataḥ kṛtārtho bhavati sadā sarvatra niḥ spṛhaḥ //
analyzed: bhakti yogena santuṣṭaḥ ātmānam darśayet ajaḥ tatas kṛtārthaḥ bhavati sadā sarvatra niḥ spṛhaḥ

original: ato 'haṅkāramutsṛjya sānubandhe kalevare / caredasaṃgo lokeṣu svapnaprāyeṣu nirmamaḥ //
analyzed: atas haṅkāram utsṛjya sānubandhe kalevare  caret asaṃgaḥ lokeṣu svapna prāyeṣu nirmamaḥ

original: kva svapne niyataṃ dhairyamindrajāle kva satyatā / kva nityatā śaranmeghe kva vā satyaṃ kalevare //
analyzed: kva svapne niyatam dhairyam indrajāle kva satya tā  kva nitya tā śarad meghe kva vā satyam kalevare

original: avidyākarmajanitaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ carā caram / jñātvācāravaśī yogī tataḥ siddhimavāpsyasi //
analyzed: avidyā karma janitam dṛśyamānam carā caram jñātvā ācāra vaśī yogī tatas siddhim avāpsyasi

original: ityuktvā te gatāḥ sarve sādhavo dīnavatsalāḥ / so 'haṃ taduktamārgeṇa tathaivācaramanvaham //
analyzed: iti uktvā te gatāḥ sarve sādhavaḥ dīna vatsalāḥ saḥ ham tad ukta mārgeṇa tathā eva acaram anvaham

original: tato 'cireṇātmanīdaṃ dṛṣṭavānahamadbhutam / jyotirmayaṃ sadānandaṃ śaracchītāṃśunirmalam //
analyzed: cireṇa ātmani idam dṛṣṭavān aham adbhutam jyotiḥ mayam sadānandam śarad śītāṃśu nirmalam

original: niṣicya sukhasandohairmāṃ kṛtvādhikasaspṛham / antarhitaṃ mahatejo yathā saudāminī divi //
analyzed: niṣicya sukha sandohaiḥ mām kṛtvā adhika sa spṛham antarhitam mahā tejaḥ yathā saudāminī divi

original: bhaktyā tadeva manasi bhāvayannahamadbhutam / kāle kalevaraṃ tyaktvā gatavān harimavyayam //
analyzed: bhaktyā tat eva manasi bhāvayan aham adbhutam kāle kalevaram tyaktvā gatavān harim avyayam

original: tasyecchayā punarbrahman brahmaṇo me 'bhavajjaniḥ / anugrahādbhagavatastriṣu lokeṣu niḥ spṛhaḥ //
analyzed: tasya icchayā punar brahman brahmaṇaḥ me bhavat janiḥ anugrahāt bhagavataḥ triṣu lokeṣu niḥ spṛhaḥ

original: āpīḍayan muhurvoṇāṃ gāyamānaścarāmyaham / ityuktvā me svānubhavaṃ yayau yādṛcchiko muniḥ //
analyzed: āpīḍayan muhur voṇām gāyamānaḥ carāmi aham iti uktvā me sva anubhavam yayau yādṛcchikaḥ muniḥ

original: mamāpi paramāścaryaṃ santoṣaśca mahānabhūt / ataste sādhusaṅgatyā bhaktyā ca paramātmanaḥ //
analyzed: mama api parama āścaryam santoṣaḥ ca mahān abhūt atas te sādhu saṅgatyā bhaktyā ca paramātmanaḥ

original: viśuddhaṃ nirmalaṃ śāntaṃ mano nirvṛtimeṣyati / anekajanmajanitaṃ pātakaṃ sādhusaṃgame //
analyzed: viśuddham nirmalam śāntam manaḥ nirvṛtim eṣyati aneka janma janitam pātakam sādhu saṃgame

original: kṣipraṃ naśyati dharmajña jalānāṃ śarado yathā / vaiśya uvāca / pītvā te vākyapīyūṣaṃ svāntaṃ me śāntimāgamat //
analyzed: kṣipram naśyati dharma jña jalānām śaradaḥ yathā  vaiśyaḥ uvāca pītvā te vākya pīyūṣam svāntam me śāntim āgamat

original: sarvatīrthaphalaṃ me 'dhya sañjātaṃ tava darśanāt / iti śrutvā vacastasya provāca ṛpisattamaḥ //
analyzed: sarva tīrtha phalam me dhya sañjātam tava darśanāt iti śrutvā vacaḥ tasya provāca ṛpi sattamaḥ

original: lomaśa uvāca / hitāya tava rājendra trivargaphalamicchataḥ / yattvayā sukṛtaṃ bhūrivṛṣotsargaṃ vinā kṛtam //
analyzed: lomaśaḥ uvāca hitāya tava rāja indra trivarga phalam icchataḥ yat tvayā su kṛtam bhūri vṛṣotsargam vinā kṛtam

original: manye 'kiñcatkaraṃ sarvaṃ nīhārasalilaṃ yathā / vṛṣotsargasamaṃ kiñcit sādhanaṃ na mahītale //
analyzed: manye kiñcatkaram sarvam nīhāra salilam yathā vṛṣotsarga samam kiñcid sādhanam na mahī tale

original: anāyāsena gacchanti gatiṃ te puṇyakarmaṇām / vṛṣotsargaḥ kṛto yena aśvamedhasya yājakaḥ //
analyzed: anāyāsena gacchanti gatim te puṇya karmaṇām vṛṣotsargaḥ kṛtaḥ yena aśvamedhasya yājakaḥ

original: ubhau samau mayā dṛṣṭau divyau tau śakrasannidhau / atastvaṃ puṣkaraṃ gatvā vṛṣotsargaṃ vidhāya ca //
analyzed: ubhau samau mayā dṛṣṭau divyau tau śakra sannidhau  atas tvam puṣkaram gatvā vṛṣotsargam vidhāya ca

original: tato yāhi gṛhaṃ sādho yena sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet / vipaściduvāca / tataḥ sa punarāgatya kārtikyāṃ puṣkare vare //
analyzed: tatas yāhi gṛham sādho yena sarvam kṛtam bhavet  vipaścit uvāca tatas sa punar āgatya kārtikyām puṣkare vare

original: varāharūpī bhagavān yatrāste yajñapūrakaḥ / cakāra vidhivat sarvaṃ yudkamṛṣisattamaiḥ //
analyzed: varāha rūpī bhagavān yatra āste yajñapūrakaḥ  cakāra vidhivat sarvam yudkam ṛṣi sattamaiḥ

original: gatāni bahutīrthāni tato lomaśasaṃgatiḥ / tato 'dhikataraṃ jātaṃ puṇyaṃ nīlavivāhajam //
analyzed: gatāni bahu tīrthāni tatas lomaśa saṃgatiḥ tatas dhikataram jātam puṇyam nīla vivāha jam

original: sabhuktvā viṣayān divyān vimānavaramāśritaḥ / tena rājakule janma vīrasenasya dharmataḥ //
analyzed: sa bhuktvā viṣayān divyān vimāna varam āśritaḥ tena rāja kule janma vīrasenasya dharmataḥ

original: vīrapañcānanākhyātañcaturvargaikasādhakam / prakurvato vṛṣotsargaṃ tatra ye paricārakāḥ //
analyzed: vīra pañcānana ākhyātam caturvarga eka sādhakam prakurvataḥ vṛṣotsargam tatra ye paricārakāḥ

original: divyarūpābhavan spṛṣṭā gopucchodakaśīkaraiḥ / surūpāḥ puṣṭavapuṣaḥ paśyanto dūrasaṃsthitāḥ //
analyzed: divya rūpāḥ abhavan spṛṣṭāḥ go puccha udaka śīkaraiḥ surūpāḥ puṣṭa vapuṣaḥ paśyantaḥ dūra saṃsthitāḥ

original: tato dūratarā ye ca dṛśyante malinā janāḥ / durbhagā malinā rūkṣāḥ kṛśā vigatavāsasaḥ //
analyzed: tatas dūratarāḥ ye ca dṛśyante malināḥ janāḥ durbhagāḥ malināḥ rūkṣāḥ kṛśāḥ vigata vāsasaḥ

original: vṛṣayajñamapaśyanto ye cāsūyāṃ prakurvate / sarvaṃ niveditaṃ rājñaścaritaṃ pūrvajanmanaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣa yajñam apaśyantaḥ ye ca asūyām prakurvate sarvam niveditam rājñaḥ caritam pūrva janmanaḥ

original: dharmyaṃ vicitramākhyānaṃ śrutaṃ me yat parāśarāt / atastvaṃ svagṛhaṃ gaccha kṛpāṃ kṛtvā mamopari //
analyzed: dharmyam vicitram ākhyānam śrutam me yat parāśarāt  atas tvam sva gṛham gaccha kṛpām kṛtvā mama upari

original: śrutvā vipaścidvākyaṃ sa vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ / gṛhaṃ jagāma vipro 'sau prāpito rājasevakaiḥ //
analyzed: śrutvā vipaścit vākyam sa vismayam paramam gataḥ gṛham jagāma vipro sau prāpitaḥ rāja sevakaiḥ

original: vasiṣṭha uvāca / tasmādrājan vṛṣotsargaṃ variṣṭhaṃ sarvakarmaṇām / samācara vidhānena yadi bhīto yamādapi //
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ uvāca tasmāt rājan vṛṣotsargam variṣṭham sarva karmaṇām samācara vidhānena yadi bhītaḥ yamāt api

original: vṛṣotsargasamaṃ kiñcit sādhanaṃ nadivaḥ param / mayā dharmarahasyaṃ te kathitaṃ rājasattama //
analyzed: vṛṣotsarga samam kiñcid sādhanam nadivaḥ param mayā dharma rahasyam te kathitam rāja sattama

original: patiputravatī nārī bharturagre mṛtā yadi / vṛṣotsargaṃ na kurvīta gāṃ dadyācca payasviḥ nīm //
analyzed: pati putravatī nārī bhartuḥ agre mṛtā yadi vṛṣotsargam na kurvīta gām dadyāt ca payasviḥ

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / śrutvā vākyaṃ vasiṣṭhasya rājā madhupurīṃ gataḥ / cakāra vidhivat sarvaṃ vṛṣotsargamahaṃ khaga //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca  śrutvā vākyam vasiṣṭhasya rājā madhupurīm gataḥ cakāra vidhivat sarvam vṛṣotsargam aham khaga

original: gṛhaṃ gatvā sa ātmānaṃ kṛtakṛtyamamanyata / kālena nidhanaṃ prāpto nīto vaivasvatānugaiḥ //
analyzed: gṛham gatvā saḥ ātmānam kṛtakṛtyam amanyata kālena nidhanam prāptaḥ nītaḥ vaivasvata anugaiḥ

original: sa kālanagaraṃ hitvā gato dūrataraṃ pathi / śrāddhadevapuraṃ kutretyevaṃ dūtānapṛcchata //
analyzed: sa kālanagaram hitvā gataḥ dūrataram pathi śrāddhadeva puram kutra iti evam dūtān apṛcchata

original: pāpino yatra pātyante yāmyai pāpaviśuddhaye / yatra devaḥ sa dharmādharmavicetanaḥ //
analyzed: pāpinaḥ yatra pātyante yāmyai pāpa viśuddhaye yatra devaḥ sa dharma adharma vicetanaḥ

original: gataṃ pāpapuraṃ tattu na draṣṭavyaṃ bhavādṛśaiḥ / agre dṛṣṭvā dharmarājamūcuste paramādarāt //
analyzed: gatam pāpa puram tat tu na draṣṭavyam bhavādṛśaiḥ agre dṛṣṭvā dharmarājam ūcuḥ te parama ādarāt

original: divyarūpastadā devo devagandharvasaṃyutaḥ / ātmānaṃ darśayā māsa tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ //
analyzed: divya rūpaḥ tadā devaḥ deva gandharva saṃyutaḥ ātmānam darśaya māsa tasya rājñaḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: praṇamya daṇḍavadrājā kṛtāñjaliḥ puraḥ sthitaḥ / tuṣṭāva bahudhā devaṃ harṣapuritamānasaḥ //
analyzed: praṇamya daṇḍa vat rājā kṛtāñjaliḥ puras sthitaḥ tuṣṭāva bahudhā devam harṣa purita mānasaḥ

original: dharmarājo 'pi rājānaṃ praśasyedamuvāca ha / nīyatāṃ devalokāya yatra bhogāḥ supuṣkalāḥ //
analyzed: dharmarājaḥ u pi rājānam praśasya idam uvāca ha  nīyatām deva lokāya yatra bhogāḥ su puṣkalāḥ

original: tadvīravāhanaḥ śrutvā papracchasamavartinam / na jāne kena puṇyena svargaṃ nayasi māṃ vibho //
analyzed: tat vīravāhanaḥ śrutvā papraccha samavartinam  na jāne kena puṇyena svargam nayasi mām vibho

original: dharmarāja uvāca / tvayā kṛtāni puṇyāni dānaṃ yajñāḥ savistarāḥ / mathurāyāṃ vṛṣotsargo vasiṣṭhavacanāt kila //
analyzed: dharmarājaḥ uvāca tvayā kṛtāni puṇyāni dānam yajñāḥ sa vistarāḥ mathurāyām vṛṣotsargaḥ vasiṣṭha vacanāt kila

original: dharmaḥ svalpo 'pi nṛpate yadi samyagupāsitaḥ / dvijadevaprasādena sa yāti bahuvistaram //
analyzed: dharmaḥ su alpaḥ api nṛpate yadi samyak upāsitaḥ dvijadeva prasādena sa yāti bahu vistaram

original: ityuktvā yamunābhrātā kṣaṇādantardhimāyayau / vīrabāhurdivaṃ gatvā devaiḥ saha mumoda ha //
analyzed: iti uktvā yamunā bhrātā kṣaṇāt antardhim āyayau vīrabāhuḥ divam gatvā devaiḥ saha mumoda ha

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / mayā te kathitaṃ pakṣin vṛṣayajñaḥ suvistaraḥ / prāṇināṃ karmanirhāraṃ śrutvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca mayā te kathitam pakṣin vṛṣa yajñaḥ su vistaraḥ prāṇinām karma nirhāram śrutvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvidṛ dhadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde vṛṣotsargamāhātmyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvidṛ dhadṛ pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde vṛṣotsargamāhātmyanirūpaṇam nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 7
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / śrutaṃ me mahādākhyānaṃ vṛṣotsargaphalaṃ hare / punaranyāṃ kathāṃ brūhi yatra te mahimādbhutaḥ //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca śrutam me mahāt ākhyānam vṛṣotsarga phalam hare punar anyām kathām brūhi yatra te mahimā adbhutaḥ

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / ahaṃ te kathayāmyadya saṃvādaṃ paramādbhutam / santaptakasya ca pretaistadrūpajñāpanāya vai //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca aham te kathayāmi adya saṃvādam parama adbhutam santaptakasya ca pretaiḥ tad rūpa jñāpanāya vai

original: vipraḥ santaptakaḥ kaścit tapasādagdhakilbiṣaḥ / saṃsārāsāratāṃ jñātvāraṇyaṣveva cacāra ha //
analyzed: vipraḥ santaptakaḥ kaścid tapasā adagdha kilbiṣaḥ saṃsāra asāra tām jñātvā araṇya ṣu eva cacāra ha

original: vaikhānasamunivrātaiḥ prāṇipātakṛtekṣaṇaḥ / sa kadācit tīrthayātrāmuddiśya smāṭatidvijaḥ //
analyzed: vaikhānasa muni vrātaiḥ prāṇi pāta kṛta īkṣaṇaḥ sa kadācid tīrtha yātrām uddiśya sma aṭati dvijaḥ

original: pratyākṛṣṭendriyatvācca bahirvṛttinirodhakaḥ / saṃskāramātragamano mārgabhraṣṭo babhūva ha //
analyzed: pratyākṛṣṭa indriya tvāt ca bahis vṛtti nirodhakaḥ saṃskāra mātra gamanaḥ mārga bhraṣṭaḥ babhūva ha

original: calannevaṃ snānakāle madhyāhne 'thābhilāṣukaḥ / jalasyonmīlya nayane diśaḥ sarvā nyabhīlayat //
analyzed: calan evam snāna kāle madhyāhne thā abhilāṣukaḥ jalasya unmīlya nayane diśaḥ sarvāḥ

original: sa dadarśa tadā gulmairvorudvṛkṣaśataiścitam / tvaksāraiḥ śākhiśākhābhiḥ saṃkulaṃ gahanaṃvanam //
analyzed: sa dadarśa tadā gulmaiḥ vorudh vṛkṣa śataiḥ citam tvac sāraiḥ śākhi śākhābhiḥ saṃkulam gahanam vanam

original: tatra tālāstamālāśca priyālāḥ panasāstathā / śrīparṇo śālaśākhoṭasyandanāstindukāstathā //
analyzed: tatra tālāḥ tamālāḥ ca priyālāḥ panasāḥ tathā śrīparṇo śāla śākhā uṭa syandanāḥ tindukāḥ tathā

original: sarjārjunāmrātakāśca śleṣmā takabhibhītakau / picumardaściñciṇī ca karkandhūkarṇikārakāḥ //
analyzed: sarja arjuna āmrātakāḥ ca śleṣmā taka bhibhītakau picumardaḥ ciñciṇī ca karkandhū karṇikārakāḥ

original: ete cānye ca bahavo vṛkṣāsteṣu na dṛśyate / pakṣiṇāmapi vai panthā manuṣyasya kutaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: ete ca anye ca bahavaḥ vṛkṣāḥ teṣu na dṛśyate pakṣiṇām api vai panthāḥ manuṣyasya kutas punar

original: tasmin vane mahāghore siṃhavyāghrasamākule / tarakṣugavayairṛkṣairmahiṣaiśca niṣevite //
analyzed: tasmin vane mahā ghore siṃha vyāghra samākule tarakṣu gavayaiḥ ṛkṣaiḥ mahiṣaiḥ ca niṣevite

original: kuñja rairurubhirnāgairmarkaṭaiśca tathāmṛgaiḥ / śvāpadaiśca tathā cānyaiḥ piśācai rākṣasairvṛte //
analyzed: kuñja raiḥ urubhiḥ nāgaiḥ markaṭaiḥ ca tathā mṛgaiḥ śvāpadaiḥ ca tathā ca anyaiḥ piśācaiḥ rākṣasaiḥ vṛte

original: santaptako dvijaḥ kiñcidbhayasantrastamānasaḥ / kāndiśīkaḥ samabhavaḍh yadbhaviṣyo yayau punaḥ //
analyzed: santaptakaḥ dvijaḥ kiñcid bhaya santrasta mānasaḥ kāndiśīkaḥ yadbhaviṣyaḥ yayau punar

original: jhaṅkāreṣu ca jhillīnāṃ ghūkānāṃ ghūtkṛteṣvapi / dattakarṇaḥ kunīlāṅgaścacāla padapañcakam //
analyzed: jhaṅkāreṣu ca jhillīnām ghūkānām ghūtkṛteṣu api datta karṇaḥ ku nīla aṅgaḥ cacāla pada pañcakam

original: sa tatra vaṭavṛkṣāgre snāyuvaddhaṃ śavaṃ tathā / dadarśa tadbhujaścaiva pañca pretān sudāruṇām //
analyzed: sa tatra vaṭa vṛkṣa agre snāyu vaddham śavam tathā dadarśa tad bhujaḥ ca eva pañca pretān su dāruṇām

original: śirāsthicarmaśeṣāṅgān pṛṣṭhalagnodarān khaga / tyaktānnāsikayā netrakūpapātabhayādiva //
analyzed: śira asthi carma śeṣa aṅgān pṛṣṭha lagna udarān khaga tyaktān nāsikayā netra kūpa pāta bhayāt iva

original: sūcīkrakakacakavrātaghātapātitakīkasān / vasāktanavamastiṣkasvādanityamahotsavān //
analyzed: sūcī kraka kacaka vrātaghāta pātita kīkasān

original: raṇatkoṭimahādaṃṣṭrānasthigranthyavaghaṭṭitān / tāndṛṣṭvā trastahṛdayo gatimākuñcya saṃsthitaḥ //
analyzed: raṇat koṭi mahā daṃṣṭrān asthi granthi avaghaṭṭitān tān dṛṣṭvā trasta hṛdayaḥ gatim ākuñcya saṃsthitaḥ

original: te vilokyāgataṃ vipramaṭavīṃ janavarjitām / ahaṃ pūrvamahaṃ pūrvaṃ yāmītyāktvā pradudruvuḥ //
analyzed: te vilokya āgatam vipram aṭavīm jana varjitām aham pūrvam aham pūrvam yāmi iti āktvā pradudruvuḥ

original: teṣu dvaudvāvagṛhṇītāmasya hastāvathāpare / dvaudvau pādāvagṛhṇītāṃ mūrdhānaṃ pañcamo 'grahīt //
analyzed: teṣu dvau dvau agṛhṇītām asya hastau atha apare dvau dvau pādau agṛhṇītām mūrdhānam pañcamaḥ grahīt

original: svajātyucitavākyena sphuṭavarṇavatābruvan / ahaṃ jakṣāmyahaṃ bhakṣāmīti karṣaṇatatparāḥ //
analyzed: sva jāti ucita vākyena sphuṭa varṇavatā abruvan aham jakṣāmi aham bhakṣāmi iti karṣaṇa tatparāḥ

original: sahasaiva sahaivāmuṃ gṛhātvā vyagamanviyam / kiyatsthitaṃ baṭau māṃsaṃ kriyannetinyabhālayan //
analyzed: sahasā eva saha eva amum gṛhātvā vyagaman viyam kiyat sthitam baṭau māṃsam

original: te 'paśyannijadaṃṣṭrāyaḥ pāṭitāntramimaṃ śavam / avatīrya tato vyomno gṛhītvā caraṇaiḥ //
analyzed: te paśyat nija daṃṣṭra ayaḥ pāṭita antram imam śavam avatīrya tatas vyomnaḥ gṛhītvā caraṇaiḥ

original: svakhaṇḍitaśarīrantu punarvyomaiva cakramuḥ / sa nīyamānamātmānaṃ vilokya viyati dvijaḥ //
analyzed: sva khaṇḍita śarīran tu punar vyoma eva cakramuḥ sa nīyamānam ātmānam vilokya viyati dvijaḥ

original: jagāma manasā māṃ sa śaraṇaṃ bhayavihvalaḥ / namaścakre cakradharaṃ cetasā cinmayaṃ samam //
analyzed: jagāma manasā mām sa śaraṇam bhaya vihvalaḥ namaḥ cakre cakradharam cetasā cit mayam samam

original: vakraṃ nakraṃ cakrapātena dūre kṛtvā hṛtvā tasya duḥ khaṃ mukundaḥ / mātaṅgaṃ yo 'mūmucannakravaktrātpāśaṃso 'sau karmaṇāṃ me lunātu //
analyzed: vakram nakram cakra pātena dūre kṛtvā hṛtvā tasya duḥ kham mukundaḥ mātaṅgam yaḥ mūmucat nakra vaktrāt pāśaṃsaḥ sau karmaṇām me lunātu

original: ruddhāñśuddhān bhūpatīnmāgadhena bhīmenainaṃ ghātayitvā murāriḥ / nirbaddhānyo bhargayajñāya muktaścakro me 'sau karmapāśaṃ lunātu //
analyzed: ruddhān śuddhān bhūpatīn māgadhena bhīmena enam ghātayitvā murāriḥ nirbaddha anyaḥ bharga yajñāya muktaḥ cakraḥ me sau karma pāśam lunātu

original: manasaivaiha māmastautstūyamāno 'hamutthitaḥ / agacchaṃ sahasā tatra yatra pretaiḥ sa nīyate //
analyzed: manasā eva eha mām astaut stūyamānaḥ ham utthitaḥ agaccham sahasā tatra yatra pretaiḥ sa nīyate

original: dṛṣṭvā tairnoyamānantu kautukaṃ me 'bhavatkhaga / papraccha na kiyantaṃ vai kālaṃ tānpṛṣṭhato 'nvagām //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā taiḥ na uya mānantu kautukam me bhavat khaga papraccha na kiyantam vai kālam tān pṛṣṭhatas nvagām

original: mama sannidhimātreṇa dvijātiṃ tañca sarpahan / tatkālaṃ śivikāsuptabhūpālasukhamāviśat //
analyzed: mama sannidhi mātreṇa dvijātim tam ca sarpa han tad kālam śivikā supta bhūpāla sukham āviśat

original: maṇibhadrāstato meruṃ gacchandṛṣṭo mayā pathi / nikocyākṣi svapārśvaṃ sa nīto vai yakṣarāṇmayā //
analyzed: maṇibhadrāḥ tatas merum gacchan dṛṣṭaḥ mayā pathi nikocya akṣi sva pārśvam sa nītaḥ vai yakṣa rāj mayā

original: tamavocaṃ mahāyakṣaṃ tvaṃ hi pratibhaṭo bhava / pretānnāśaya tadbhūyaḥ śavañca hara tadgatam //
analyzed: tam avocam mahā yakṣam tvam hi pratibhaṭaḥ bhava pretān nāśaya tat bhūyas śavam ca hara tad gatam

original: ityuktaḥ sa mahāghoraṃ kṛtvā roṣaṃ suduḥ saham / jagrāha pretarūpaṃ tatpretānāmapi duḥ khadam //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa mahā ghoram kṛtvā roṣam su duḥsaham jagrāha preta rūpam tat pretānām api duḥ kha dam

original: sa vivṛtya svakau bāhū sṛkkiṇī parilelihan / bhedayannuruvātena pretāṃstānsaṃmukho yayau //
analyzed: sa vivṛtya svakau bāhū sṛkkiṇī parilelihan bhedayan uru vātena pretān tān saṃmukhaḥ yayau

original: bāhubhyāṃ dvau dvau ca padbhyāṃ mūrdhnaikaṃ ca samāharat / pretānathāpi sahasā jaghāna dṛḍhamuṣṭinā //
analyzed: bāhubhyām dvau dvau ca padbhyām mūrdhnā ekam ca samāharat pretān atha api sahasā jaghāna dṛḍhamuṣṭinā

original: te vivarṇamukhāḥ sarve taṃ dvijañca śavaṃ tathā / ekaikaṃ hastapādaiśca gṛhītvā yuddhamārabhan //
analyzed: te vivarṇa mukhāḥ sarve tam dvijam ca śavam tathā ekaikam hasta pādaiḥ ca gṛhītvā yuddham ārabhan

original: te nakhaistalaghātaiśca pādaghātaistathaiva ca / daṃṣṭrāghātaiśca sarve tamekaṃ pretaṃ vyadārayan //
analyzed: te nakhaiḥ tala ghātaiḥ ca pāda ghātaiḥ tathā eva ca daṃṣṭrā ghātaiḥ ca sarve tam ekam pretam vyadārayan

original: teṣāṃ prahārānviphalānkṛtvā saṃprati tānatha / jīvaṃ na tu śavaṃ teṣāṃ jahre prāṇamivāntakaḥ //
analyzed: teṣām prahārān viphalān kṛtvā saṃprati tān atha jīvam na tu śavam teṣām jahre prāṇam iva antakaḥ

original: hṛtamātre śave te tu pāriyātre girau dvijam / muktvādhamātre pramuditā ekaṃ pretaṃ sudāruṇāḥ //
analyzed: hṛta mātre śave te tu pāriyātre girau dvijam muktvā adhamātre pramuditāḥ ekam pretam su dāruṇāḥ

original: sa vāyugamanaḥ pretaḥ prāptastaiḥ kṣaṇamātrataḥ / adṛśyatāṃ yayau te 'tha hatāśā vipramāgaman //
analyzed: sa vāyugamanaḥ pretaḥ prāptaḥ taiḥ kṣaṇa mātrataḥ adṛśya tām yayau te hata āśāḥ vipram āgaman

original: prārabdhamātre viprasya pāṭane tatra parvate / mama sthānasya viprasya mahimneva ca tatkṣaṇe //
analyzed: prārabdha mātre viprasya pāṭane tatra parvate mama sthānasya viprasya mahimnā iva ca tad kṣaṇe

original: sadyaḥ smṛtiḥ samutpannā teṣāṃ pūrvasya janmanaḥ / vipraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyadvijarṣabhamathābruvan //
analyzed: sadyas smṛtiḥ samutpannā teṣām pūrvasya janmanaḥ  vipram pradakṣiṇīkṛtya dvijarṣabham atha abruvan

original: adya naḥ kṣantumarhe 'sītyuktvā te suradāmbhikāḥ / gireriva parāvartaṃ samudrasyeva śoṣaṇam //
analyzed: adya naḥ kṣantum arhe sīti uktvā te sura dāmbhikāḥ gireḥ iva parāvartam samudrasya iva śoṣaṇam

original: teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvāpṛcchatkeyūyamityatha / kiṃ māyā kimu vā svapna utāho cittavibhramaḥ //
analyzed: teṣām tat vacanam śrutvā apṛcchat keyūyam iti atha kim māyā kimu vā svapnaḥ uta aho citta vibhramaḥ

original: pretā ūcuḥ / avehi tattvamevaitatpretā vai karmajā vayam / brāhmaṇa uvāca / kiṃnāmānaḥ kimācārāḥ kathañcemāṃ daśāṃ gatāḥ //
analyzed: pretāḥ ūcuḥ avehi tattvam eva etat pretāḥ vai karma jāḥ vayam brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca kiṃnāmānaḥ kimācārāḥ kathañca imām daśām gatāḥ

original: avinītāḥ kathaṃ pūrvaṃ vinītāḥ sāmprataṃ katham / pretā ūcuḥ / śṛṇu viprendra vakṣyāmaḥ praśrānāmanupūrvaśaḥ //
analyzed: avinītāḥ katham pūrvam vinītāḥ sāmpratam katham  pretāḥ ūcuḥ śṛṇu vipra indra vakṣyāmaḥ praśrānām anupūrvaśas

original: uttarāṇi mahāyogiṃstvaddarśanagatāṃhasaḥ / ahaṃ paryuṣito nāmnā eṣa sūcīmukhaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: uttarāṇi mahā yogin tvad darśana gata aṃhasaḥ aham paryuṣitaḥ nāmnā eṣa sūcīmukhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: tṛtīyaḥ śīghragasturyorodhako lekhakaḥ paraḥ / brāhmaṇa uvāca / pretānāṃ karmajātānāṃ kuto nāma nirarthakam //
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ śīghra gaḥ turyaḥ rodhakaḥ lekhakaḥ paraḥ brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca pretānām karma jātānām kutas nāma nirarthakam

original: niruktimeṣāṃ nāmnāṃ vai pretā vadata mā ciram / śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / evamuktāstu vipreṇa pṛthaguttaramabruvan //
analyzed: niruktim eṣām nāmnām vai pretāḥ vadata mā ciram  śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca evam uktāḥ tu vipreṇa pṛthak uttaram abruvan

original: paryuṣita uvāca / kadācicchrāddhakāle vai mayā vipro nimantritaḥ //
analyzed: paryuṣitaḥ uvāca kadācid śrāddha kāle vai mayā vipraḥ nimantritaḥ

original: sa ca kṛtvā vilambena vṛddho madgṛhamāgataḥ / akṛtaśrāddhakarmāhaṃ taṃ pākaṃ bhuktavān kṣudhā //
analyzed: sa ca kṛtvā vilambena vṛddhaḥ mad gṛham āgataḥ a kṛta śrāddha karmā aham tam pākam bhuktavān kṣudhā

original: adadāmannamākṛṣya vipre paryuṣitaṃ kiyat / tasmāt pāpānmṛtaḥ pāpo yoniṃ vai kutsitāṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: adadām annam ākṛṣya vipre paryuṣitam kiyat  tasmāt pāpāt mṛtaḥ pāpaḥ yonim vai kutsitām gataḥ

original: yataḥ paryuṣitaṃ dattaṃ tataḥ paryuṣitaḥ smṛtaḥ / sūcīmukha uvāca / kadācidbrāhmaṇī kācittīrthaṃ bhadravaṭaṃ yayau //
analyzed: yatas paryuṣitam dattam tatas paryuṣitaḥ smṛtaḥ sūcīmukhaḥ uvāca kadācid brāhmaṇī kācid tīrtham bhadravaṭam yayau

original: pañcavarṣasutā vṛddhā putramātraikajīvitā / ahaṃ kṣattriyadāyādastasyā rodhamakāriṣam //
analyzed: pañca varṣa sutā vṛddhā putra mātra eka jīvitā aham kṣattriya dāyādaḥ tasyāḥ rodham akāriṣam

original: vane tu vijane tatra pāpādhvagagatiṃ gataḥ / tasyāḥ savastraṃ pātheyaṃ tatsūnorvasanāni ca //
analyzed: vane tu vijane tatra pāpa adhvaga gatim gataḥ tasyāḥ sa vastram pātheyam tad sūnoḥ vasanāni ca

original: gṛhītāni mayā vipra śirasyāpīḍya muṣṭinā / tṛṣārtastatkṣaṇaṃ bālaḥ pātrasaṃsthaṃ jalaṃpiban //
analyzed: gṛhītāni mayā vipra śirasi āpīḍya muṣṭinā tṛṣā ārtaḥ tad kṣaṇam bālaḥ pātra saṃstham jalam piban

original: tāvanmātrodake deśe mayā huṅkṛtya vāritaḥ / mayātha sakalaṃ pītaṃ jalaṃ pātrāttṛṣāvatā //
analyzed: tāvat mātra udake deśe mayā huṅkṛtya vāritaḥ mayā atha sakalam pītam jalam pātrāt tṛṣāvatā

original: bālo 'pi bhayasantrastaḥ pipāsurvyasurāpatat / putraśokānmṛtā mātā kūpe prāsya nijaṃ vapuḥ //
analyzed: bālaḥ pi bhaya santrastaḥ pipāsuḥ vyasuḥ āpatat putra śokāt mṛtā mātā kūpe prāsya nijam vapuḥ

original: etasmātpātakādvipra pretatvaṃ prāptavānaham / sūcyagraprāyavivaramukhaḥ parvatadehavān //
analyzed: etasmāt pātakāt vipra preta tvam prāptavān aham sūci agra prāya vivara mukhaḥ parvata dehavān

original: yadyapi prāpnuyāṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhakṣituntu na śakyate / mayā kṣudhānalenāpi jvalatāsyaṃ nikocitam //
analyzed: yadi api prāpnuyām bhakṣyam bhakṣitum tu na śakyate mayā kṣudhā analena api jvalatā āsyam nikocitam

original: ata āsye tu vivaraṃ sūcyagreṇa samaṃmama / etasmātkāraṇādvipre nāmnā sūcīmukho 'smyaham //
analyzed: atas āsye tu vivaram sūci agreṇa samam mama etasmāt kāraṇāt vipre nāmnā sūcīmukhaḥ smi aham

original: śīghraga uvāca / purāhaṃ vaiśyajātīyaḥ sākaṃ sakhyā ca kenacit / vāṇijyaṃ kartumagamaṃ deśamanyaṃ mahādhanaḥ //
analyzed: śīghragaḥ uvāca purā aham vaiśya jātīyaḥ sākam sakhyā ca kenacid  vāṇijyam kartum agamam deśam anyam mahādhanaḥ

original: mitraṃ ca me bahudhanaṃ tasya lobho mahāṃstataḥ / jāto 'pyadṛṣṭavaimukhyānme naṣṭaṃ mūlamapyuta //
analyzed: mitram ca me bahu dhanam tasya lobhaḥ mahān tatas jātaḥ u pi adṛṣṭa vaimukhyāt me naṣṭam mūlam api uta

original: tatastasmāttu niṣkrāntāvāvāṃ nāvātha nimnagām / mārgagāṃ tartumārabdhau lohitāyati bhāskare //
analyzed: tatas tasmāt tu niṣkrāntau āvām nāvā atha nimnagām  mārga gām tartum ārabdhau lohitāyati bhāskare

original: sakhā sa ca madutsaṅge suṣvāpādhvaklamākulaḥ / abhūttadāti pāpasya krūrā matiratīva me //
analyzed: sakhā sa ca mad utsaṅge suṣvāpa adhva klama ākulaḥ abhūt tadā ati pāpasya krūrā matiḥ atīva me

original: tamutsaṅgagataṃ sūre naṣṭe pūre 'kṣipaṃ tadā / katkṛtyaṃ kurvato nāvi lokaistu jñātameva na //
analyzed: tam utsaṅga gatam sūre naṣṭe pūre kṣipam tadā katkṛtyam kurvataḥ nāvi lokaiḥ tu jñātam eva na

original: tasya yadvastu tatsarvaṃ maṇimuktādikāñcanam / ādāya śīgragastasmāddeśātsvagṛhamāgataḥ //
analyzed: tasya yat vastu tat sarvam maṇi muktā ādi kāñcanam ādāya śīgragaḥ tasmāt deśāt sva gṛham āgataḥ

original: tatsarvaṃ svagṛhe muktvā tasya patnyai nyavedayam / dasyubhirme hato bhrātā dhanamācchidya vai pathi //
analyzed: tat sarvam sva gṛhe muktvā tasya patnyai nyavedayam dasyubhiḥ me hataḥ bhrātā dhanam ācchidya vai pathi

original: prajāvati pradruto 'haṃ mā rodītyevamabravam / śokārtā sāpi tatkālaṃ mamatvaṃ gṛhabandhuṣu //
analyzed: prajāvati pradrutaḥ ham mā rodi iti evam abravam śoka ārtā sā api tad kālam mamatvam gṛha bandhuṣu

original: tyaktvā cāti priyānprāṇāñjuhāvāgnau yathāvidhi / tato niṣkaṇṭakaṃ taddhi vīkṣya hṛṣṭo gato gṛham //
analyzed: tyaktvā ca ati priyān prāṇān juhāva agnau yathāvidhi tatas niṣkaṇṭakam tat hi vīkṣya hṛṣṭaḥ gataḥ gṛham

original: abhuñjaṃ sarvamāgatya yāvajjīvaṃ tu taddhanam / mitraṃ pūre hi niḥ kṣipya yadahaṃ śīghramāgataḥ //
analyzed: abhuñjam sarvam āgatya yāvajjīvam tu tat dhanam mitram pūre hi niḥ kṣipya yat aham śīghram āgataḥ

original: etasmātkāraṇātpretaḥ śīghrago 'haṃ tu nāmataḥ / rodhaka uvāca / ahantu śūdrajātīyaḥ purābhūvaṃ munīśvara //
analyzed: etasmāt kāraṇāt pretaḥ śīghragaḥ ham tu nāmataḥ rodhakaḥ uvāca ahantu śūdra jātīyaḥ purā abhūvam muni īśvara

original: rājaprasādāptamahāśatagrāmādhikāravān / vṛddhau me pitarāvāstāṃ laghurekaḥ sahodaraḥ //
analyzed: rāja prasāda āpta mahā śata grāma adhikāravān vṛddhau me pitarau āstām laghuḥ ekaḥ sahodaraḥ

original: śīghraṃ sa ca mayā bhrātā lubdhenaikaḥ pṛthakkṛtaḥ / āptavānparamaṃ duḥkhaṃ sonnavastravivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: śīghram sa ca mayā bhrātā lubdhena ekaḥ pṛthakkṛtaḥ āptavān paramam duḥkham sa unna vastra vivarjitaḥ

original: adattāṃ pitarau cchannaṃ kiñcitkiñcittu tasya ca / tasmai pitṛbhyāṃ yaddattamāptebhyastanmayā śrutam //
analyzed: adattām pitarau channam kiñcid kiñcid tu tasya ca  tasmai pitṛbhyām yat dattam āptebhyaḥ tat mayā śrutam

original: tatsarvaṃ tattvato jñātvā pitro rodhamakārayam / śūnyamandira ekasminbaddhvā tu nigaḍairdṛḍhaiḥ //
analyzed: tat sarvam tattvataḥ jñātvā pitraḥ rodham akārayam śūnya mandire ekasmin baddhvā tu nigaḍaiḥ dṛḍhaiḥ

original: tatastau jahatuḥ prāṇānduḥ khitau viṣapānataḥ / sosau bālo 'pi babhrāma pitṛbhyāṃ rahito dvija //
analyzed: tatas tau jahatuḥ prāṇān duḥ khitau viṣa pānataḥ saḥ asau bālaḥ babhrāma pitṛbhyām rahitaḥ dvija

original: puraḥ pattanakharvācān kheṭānapi mṛtaḥ kṣudhā / etasmātpātakādvipra mṛtaḥ pretatvamāgataḥ //
analyzed: puras kheṭān api mṛtaḥ kṣudhā etasmāt pātakāt vipra mṛtaḥ preta tvam āgataḥ

original: ruddhau tu pitarau yasmānnāmnāhaṃ rodhakastataḥ / lekhaka uvāca / ahaṃ vipra purābhūvamavantyāṃ dvijalasattamaḥ //
analyzed: ruddhau tu pitarau yasmāt nāmnā aham rodhakaḥ tatas  lekhakaḥ uvāca aham vipra purā abhūvam avantyām dvija la sattamaḥ

original: bhadrasya rājño devānāṃ pūjane 'dhikṛto hyaham / bahvyastu pratimāstatra babhūvurbahunāmikāḥ //
analyzed: bhadrasya rājñaḥ devānām pūjane dhikṛtaḥ hi aham bahvyaḥ tu pratimāḥ tatra babhūvuḥ bahu nāmikāḥ

original: hemnastadaṅgeṣu bahu ratnajātaṃ babhūva ha / tāsāṃ me kurvataḥ pūjāṃ pāpā matirajāyata //
analyzed: hemnaḥ tad aṅgeṣu bahu ratna jātam babhūva ha tāsām me kurvataḥ pūjām pāpā matiḥ ajāyata

original: akhilaṃ tīkṣṇalohena tāsāmaṅgaṃ viśīrya ca / ullekhanañca ratnānāṃ netrādibhyaḥ kṛtaṃ mayā //
analyzed: akhilam tīkṣṇalohena tāsām aṅgam viśīrya ca ullekhanam ca ratnānām netra ādibhyaḥ kṛtam mayā

original: tathākṛtānyathāṅgāni pratimānāṃ nirīkṣya ca / netrāṇi ca viratnāni nṛpaścukrodha vahnivat //
analyzed: tathākṛtāni atha aṅgāni pratimānām nirīkṣya ca netrāṇi ca viratnāni nṛpaḥ cukrodha vahni vat

original: pratijajñe nṛpaḥ paścādeṣa brāhmaṇapuṅgavaḥ / ābhyo ratnaṃ suvarṇañca hṛtaṃ yena bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: pratijajñe nṛpaḥ paścāt eṣa brāhmaṇa puṅgavaḥ ābhyaḥ ratnam suvarṇam ca hṛtam yena bhaviṣyati

original: jñātaśca sa hi me vadhyo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ / ahaṃ tatsakalaṃ jñātvā rātrāvasidharo gṛham //
analyzed: jñātaḥ ca sa hi me vadhyaḥ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ aham tat sakalam jñātvā rātrau asi dharaḥ gṛham

original: rājñaḥ praviśya rājānaṃ paśumāramamārayam / gṛhītvātha maṇīn svarṇaṃ niśīthe 'haṃ gato 'nyataḥ //
analyzed: rājñaḥ praviśya rājānam paśumāram amārayam gṛhītvā atha maṇīn svarṇam niśīthe haṃ gataḥ nyatas

original: vyāghreṇa mahātāraṇye nakhaṭaṅkairviṭaṅkitaḥ / lekhanātpratimāyā yanmayā lohena kartitam //
analyzed: vyāghreṇa mahā tāraṇye nakha ṭaṅkaiḥ viṭaṅkitaḥ lekhanāt pratimāyāḥ yat mayā lohena kartitam

original: etasmātpātakātpreto lekhako nāmato 'smyaham / āsīnnarakabhogānte naḥ pretatvamidaṃ dvija //
analyzed: etasmāt pātakāt pretaḥ lekhakaḥ smi aham āsīt naraka bhoga ante naḥ preta tvam idam dvija

original: brāhmaṇa uvāca / saṃjñāstādṛśya ākhyātā yathaitā bhavatā daśāḥ / vadantvācāramātraṃ me pretā āhāramapyuta //
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca saṃjñāḥ tādṛśyaḥ ākhyātāḥ yathā etāḥ bhavatā daśāḥ vadantu ācāra mātram me pretāḥ āhāram api uta

original: pretā ūcuḥ / vedamārgānusaraṇaṃ lajjā dharmo damaḥ kṣamā / dhṛtirjñānaṃ naiva yatra vayaṃ tatra vasāmahe //
analyzed: pretāḥ ūcuḥ veda mārga anusaraṇam lajjā dharmaḥ damaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ jñānam na eva yatra vayam tatra vasāmahe

original: tasya pīḍāṃ vapaṃ kurmo naiva śrāddhaṃ na tarpaṇam / yasya gehe tadaṅgāttu māṃsañca rudhiraṃ kramāt //
analyzed: tasya pīḍām vapam kurmaḥ na eva śrāddham na tarpaṇam yasya gehe tad aṅgāt tu māṃsam ca rudhiram kramāt

original: jakṣāmaśca pibāmaśca ukta ācāra eṣa naḥ / śṛṇu cāhāramasmākaṃ sarvalokavigarhitam //
analyzed: jakṣāmaḥ ca pibāmaḥ ca uktaḥ ācāraḥ eṣa naḥ śṛṇu ca āhāram asmākam sarva loka vigarhitam

original: dṛṣṭastvayā ca kiñcidvai brūmojñātaṃ tvayānagha / vamanaṃ viḍū dūṣikā ca śleṣmā mūtrāśruṇī tathā //
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ tvayā ca kiñcid vai brūmaḥ jñātam tvayā anagha vamanam dūṣikā ca śleṣmā mūtra aśruṇī tathā

original: etadbhakṣyañca pānañca mā pṛcchātaḥ paraṃ dvija / lajjā no jāyate svāminnāhāraṃ vadatāṃ svakam //
analyzed: etat bhakṣyam ca pānam ca mā pṛccha atas param dvija lajjā naḥ jāyate svāmin āhāram vadatām svakam

original: ajñānāstāmasā mandā kāndiśīkā vayaṃ vibho / akasmājjanmanāṃ vipra smṛtiḥ prāptā tu paurvikī //
analyzed: ajñānāḥ tāmasāḥ mandā kāndiśīkāḥ vayam vibho akasmāt janmanām vipra smṛtiḥ prāptā tu paurvikī

original: vinītatvāvinītatve jānīmo naiva naḥ prabho / śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / evaṃ vadatsu preteṣu tathā śrutavati dvije //
analyzed: vinīta tva avinīta tve jānīmaḥ nā eva naḥ prabho  śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca  evam vadatsu preteṣu tathā śrutavati dvije

original: adarśayamahaṃ rūpaṃ tadā tārkṣyedameva vai / sa tu dṛṣṭvā dvijaśreṣṭho hṛdgataṃ puruṣaṃ puraḥ //
analyzed: adarśayam aham rūpam tadā tārkṣya idam eva vai sa tu dṛṣṭvā dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ hṛd gatam puruṣam puras

original: stotraistuṣṭāva pakṣīśa daṇḍavatpraṇanāma mām / te 'pi tepustataḥ pretā āścaryotphullacakṣuṣaḥ //
analyzed: stotraiḥ tuṣṭāva pakṣi īśa daṇḍa vat praṇanāma mām te tepuḥ tatas pretāḥ āścarya utphulla cakṣuṣaḥ

original: praṇayena skhaladvācaḥ khaga nocuḥ kimapyuta / rajasā goracittānāṃ tamasā mūḍhacetasām / kṛpayā yaḥ samuddhāraṃ kuruṣe vai namo 'sta te //
analyzed: praṇayena skhalat vācaḥ khaga nā ūcuḥ kim api uta rajasā goḥ acittānām tamasā mūḍha cetasām kṛpayā yaḥ samuddhāram kuruṣe vai namaḥ sta te

original: evaṃ dvijātau bruvati prabhū taprabhaiśca mukhyāṃbaracāriyuktaiḥ / tadā madicchāprabhavairvimānaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ samantādruruce giriḥ saḥ //
analyzed: evam dvijātau bruvati tad prabhaiḥ ca mukhya aṃbara cāri yuktaiḥ tadā mad icchā prabhavaiḥ vimānaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ samantāt ruruce giriḥ saḥ

original: itthaṃ vimānena madīyalokaṃ gato dvijaraso 'pyatha pañcamistaiḥ / pretā yayuḥ svargamagaṇyapuṇyaṃ satsaṅgasaṃsargavaśātsuparṇam //
analyzed: ittham vimānena madīya lokam gataḥ dvijarasaḥ pi atha pañcamiḥ taiḥ pretāḥ yayuḥ svargam agaṇya puṇyam sat saṅga saṃsarga vaśāt suparṇam

original: pretāḥ saṃgavaśena nākamavansantaptako brāhmaṇo viṣvaksana iti prasiddhavibhavo nāmnā gaṇe me 'bhavat / etatte sakalaṃ mayā nigāditaṃ yaścaitadutkīrtayedyaścedaṃ śṛṇuyānna so 'pi puruṣaḥ pretatvamāpnoti hi //
analyzed: pretāḥ saṃga vaśena nākam avan santaptakaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ viṣvaksanaḥ iti prasiddha vibhavaḥ nāmnā gaṇe me bhavat etat te sakalam mayā nigāditam yaḥ ca etat utkīrtayet yaḥ ca idam śṛṇuyāt na saḥ pi puruṣaḥ preta tvam āpnoti hi

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretakalpe pañcapretopākhyānaṃ nāma saptamo 'dyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde pretakalpe pañcapretopākhyānam nāma saptamaḥ dyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 8
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / svāminkasyādhikāro 'tra sarva evaurdhvadehike / kriyāḥ katividhāḥ proktā vadaitatsarvameva me //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca svāmin kasya adhikāraḥ sarve eva aurdhvadehike  kriyāḥ katividhāḥ proktāḥ vada etat sarvam eva me

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / putraḥ pautraḥ prapautro vā tadbhrātā bhrātṛsantatiḥ / sapiṇḍasantatirvāpi kriyārhāḥ khaga jñātayaḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca putraḥ pautraḥ prapautraḥ vā tad bhrātā bhrātṛ santatiḥ sapiṇḍa santatiḥ vā api kriyā arhāḥ khaga jñātayaḥ

original: teṣāmabhāve sarveṣāṃ samānodakasantatiḥ / kuladvaye 'pi cocchinne strībhiḥ kāryāḥ kriyāḥ khaga //
analyzed: teṣām abhāve sarveṣām samāna udaka santatiḥ kula dvaye ca ucchinne strībhiḥ kāryāḥ kriyāḥ khaga

original: icchayocchinnabandhaśca kārayedavanīpatiḥ / pūrvāḥ kriyā madhyamāśca tathā caivottarāḥ kriyāḥ //
analyzed: icchayā ucchinna bandhaḥ ca kārayet avanīpatiḥ pūrvāḥ kriyāḥ madhyamāḥ ca tathā ca eva uttarāḥ kriyāḥ

original: pratisaṃvatsaraṃ pakṣinnekoddiṣṭavidhānataḥ / śrāddhaṃ tatra prakartavyaṃ phalaṃ tasya śṛṇuṣva me //
analyzed: pratisaṃvatsaram pakṣin ekoddiṣṭa vidhānataḥ  śrāddham tatra prakartavyam phalam tasya śṛṇuṣva me

original: brahmendrarudranāsatyasūryāgnivasumārutān / viśvedevānpitṛ gaṇānvayāṃsi manujānpaśūn //
analyzed: brahma indra rudra nāsatya sūrya agni vasu mārutān viśvedevān pitṛ gaṇān vayāṃsi manujān paśūn

original: sarīsṛpānmātṛgaṇānyaccānyadbhūtasaṃjñitam / śrāddhaṃ śraddhānvitaḥ kurvanprīṇayatyakhilaṃ jagat //
analyzed: sarīsṛpān mātṛ gaṇān yat ca anyat bhūta saṃjñitam  śrāddham śraddhā anvitaḥ kurvan prīṇayati akhilam jagat

original: te tṛptāstarpayantyenaṃ putradāradhanaistathā / adhikāraḥ kriyābhedaḥ samāsātte nirūpitaḥ //
analyzed: te tṛptāḥ tarpayanti enam putra dāra dhanaiḥ tathā adhikāraḥ kriyā bhedaḥ samāsāt te nirūpitaḥ

original: garuḍa uvāca / ukteṣveko 'pi cenna syādadhikārī surottama / kartavyaṃ kiṃ tadā viṣṇo puruṣeṇa vijānatā //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca  ukteṣu ekaḥ ced na syāt adhikārī surottama  kartavyam kim tadā viṣṇo puruṣeṇa vijānatā

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / adhikāro yadā nāsti yadi nāsti ca niścayaḥ / jīvite sati jīvāya dadyācchrāddhaṃsvayaṃ naraḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca adhikāraḥ yadā na asti yadi na asti ca niścayaḥ jīvite sati jīvāya dadyāt śrāddham svayam naraḥ

original: kṛtopavāsaḥ susnātaḥ kṛṣṇāsaṅgaḥ samāhitaḥ / kartāramatha bhoktāraṃ viṣṇuṃ sarveśvaraṃ yajet //
analyzed: kṛta upavāsaḥ su snātaḥ kṛṣṇa āsaṅgaḥ samāhitaḥ kartāram atha bhoktāram viṣṇum sarva īśvaram yajet

original: sadakṣiṇāśca satilāstistraśca jaladhenavaḥ / nivedayetpitṛbhyaśca svadheti susamāhitaḥ //
analyzed: sa dakṣiṇāḥ ca sa tilāḥ tistraḥ ca jaladhenavaḥ nivedayet pitṛbhyaḥ ca svadhā iti su samāhitaḥ

original: agnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā nama iti smaran / somāyatvā pitṛmate svadhā nama iti smaran //
analyzed: agnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā namaḥ iti smaran soma āyatvā pitṛmate svadhā namaḥ iti smaran

original: dakṣiṇena tu dadyācca tṛtīyāṃ dakṣiṇāyutām / yamāyāṅgirase cātha svadhā nama iti smaran //
analyzed: dakṣiṇena tu dadyāt ca tṛtīyām dakṣiṇā yutām yamāya aṅgirase ca atha svadhā namaḥ iti smaran

original: tayormadhye tu niḥ kṣipya viprānsaṃmantrya bho jayet / prathamāmuttare nyasya dvitīyāṃ dakṣiṇe nyaset //
analyzed: tayoḥ madhye tu niḥ kṣipya viprān saṃmantrya bho jayet prathamām uttare nyasya dvitīyām dakṣiṇe nyaset

original: madhye tṛtīyāṃ vinyasya paścādāvāhanādikam / āvāhanādinā pūrvaṃ viśvedevānprapūjyaca //
analyzed: madhye tṛtīyām vinyasya paścāt āvāhana ādikam āvāhana ādinā pūrvam viśvedevān prapūjya ca

original: vasubhyastvāmahaṃ vipra rudrebhyastvāmahaṃ tataḥ / sūryebhyastvāmahaṃ vipra bhojayāmīti tānvadet //
analyzed: vasubhyaḥ tvām aham vipra rudrebhyaḥ tvām aham tatas sūryebhyaḥ tvām aham vipra bhojayāmi iti tān vadet

original: āvāhanādikaṃ śeṣaṃ kuryācca pitṛśeṣavat / sāmyāṃ dhenuṃ tato dadyādvasūddeśaṃ dvijāya tu //
analyzed: āvāhana ādikam śeṣam kuryāt ca pitṛ śeṣa vat  sāmyām dhenum tatas dadyāt vasu uddeśam dvijāya tu

original: āgneyyāṃ cātha raudrāya yāmyāṃ sūryadvijāya tu / viśvebhyaścātha devebhyastilapātraṃ nivedayet //
analyzed: āgneyyām ca atha raudrāya yāmyām sūrya dvijāya tu viśvebhyaḥ ca atha devebhyaḥ tila pātram nivedayet

original: svastītyeva tathākṣayyaṃ jalaṃ dattvātha tāndvijān / visarjayetsmaranviṣṇuṃ devamaṣṭākṣaraṃ vibhum //
analyzed: svasti iti eva tathā akṣayyam jalam dattvā atha tān dvijān visarjayet smaran viṣṇum devam aṣṭa akṣaram vibhum

original: tataḥ kāmaṃ kuleśānīṃ śivaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ smaret / caturdaśyāṃ tato gacchedyathāprāptāṃ saridvarām //
analyzed: tatas kāmam kuleśānīm śivam nārāyaṇam smaret  caturdaśyām tatas gacchet yathāprāptām saridvarām

original: vastrāṇi lohakhaṇḍāni jitaṃ ta iti saṃjapan / dakṣiṇābhimukho vahniṃ jvālayettatra ca svayam //
analyzed: vastrāṇi loha khaṇḍāni jitam te iti saṃjapan dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ vahnim jvālayet tatra ca svayam

original: pañcāśatā kuśairbrāhmīṃ kṛtvā pratikṛtiṃ dahet / hutvā śmāśānikaṃ homaṃ pūrṇāhutyantameva hi //
analyzed: pañcāśatā kuśaiḥ brāhmīm kṛtvā pratikṛtim dahet hutvā śmāśānikam homam pūrṇāhuti antam eva hi

original: niragrimatha vā bhūmiṃ yamaṃ rudrañca saṃsmaret / hutvā prādhānike sthāne paścādāvāhayecca tam //
analyzed: niragrim atha vā bhūmim yamam rudran ca saṃsmaret hutvā prādhānike sthāne paścāt āvāhayet ca tam

original: śrapayeccāparaṃ vahnau mudgamiśraṃ caruṃ tataḥ / tilataṇḍulamiśrañca dvitīyaṃ sapavitrakam //
analyzed: śrapayet ca aparam vahnau mudga miśram carum tatas tila taṇḍula miśram ca dvitīyam sa pavitrakam

original: oṃ pṛthivyai namastubhyamiti caikaṃ nivedayet / oṃ yamāya namaśceti dvitīyaṃ tadanantaram //
analyzed: om pṛthivyai namaḥ tubhyam iti ca ekam nivedayet om yamāya namaḥ ca iti dvitīyam tad anantaram

original: oṃ namaścātha rudrāya śmāśānapataye namaḥ / tato dīpte samiddhe 'gnau bhūmau prakṛtidāruṇe //
analyzed: om namaḥ ca atha rudrāya śma āśāna pataye namaḥ tatas dīpte samiddhe gnau bhūmau prakṛti dāruṇe

original: saptabhyo yamasaṃjñebhyo dadyātsapta jalāñjalīn / yamāya dharmarājāya mṛtyave cāntakāya ca //
analyzed: saptabhyaḥ yama saṃjñebhyaḥ dadyāt sapta jala añjalīn yamāya dharmarājāya mṛtyave ca antakāya ca

original: vaivasvatāya kālāya sarvaprāṇaharāya ca / svadhākāranamaskārapraṇavaiḥ saha saptadhā //
analyzed: vaivasvatāya kālāya sarva prāṇa harāya ca svadhākāra namaskāra praṇavaiḥ saha saptadhā

original: amukāmukagautraitattubhyamastu tilodakam / pradadyāddaśa piṇḍāṃstu arghapuṣpasamanvitān //
analyzed: amuka āmuka gautra etat tubhyam astu tila udakam pradadyāt daśa piṇḍān tu arghapuṣpa samanvitān

original: dhūpo dīpo balirgandhaḥ sarveṣāmastu cākṣayaḥ / daśa piṇḍāṃstu dāndattvā viṣṇoḥ saumyaṃ mukhaṃ smaret //
analyzed: dhūpaḥ dīpaḥ baliḥ gandhaḥ sarveṣām astu ca akṣayaḥ daśa piṇḍān tu dān dattvā viṣṇoḥ saumyam mukham smaret

original: kuryācca māsikaṃ māsi sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ tataḥ / āśaucānte tataḥ kuryādātmano vā marasya tu //
analyzed: kuryāt ca māsikam māsi sapiṇḍīkaraṇam tatas āśauca ante tatas kuryāt ātmanaḥ vā marasya tu

original: kuryādasthiratāṃ jñātvā śaktyārogyadhanāyuṣam / etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ jīvacchrāddhaṃ mayā khaga //
analyzed: kuryāt asthira tām jñātvā śakti ārogya dhana āyuṣam etat te sarvam ākhyātam jīvacchrāddham mayā khaga

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇa garuḍasaṃvāde śrāddhakartrātmaśrāddhayornirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭamo
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde śrāddhakartrātmaśrāddhayornirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭamaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 9
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / uktamādyāṃ kriyāṃ yāvannṛpo 'pītitvayānagha / kasyacitkenacidrājñā kimādyā sā kṛtā purā //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca uktam ādyām kriyām yāvat nṛpo pīti tvayā anagha kasyacid kenacid rājñā kimādyā sā kṛtā purā

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / suparṇa śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathā rājñā kriyā kṛtā / āsīt kṛtayuge rājā vāṅgo vai babhruvāhanaḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca suparṇa śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathā rājñā kriyā kṛtā  āsīt kṛta yuge rājā vāṅgaḥ vai babhruvāhanaḥ

original: pṛthivyāścaturantāyā goptā pakṣīndra dharmataḥ / caturbhāgāṃ bhuvaṃ kṛtsnāṃ sa bhuṅke vasudhādhipaḥ //
analyzed: pṛthivyāḥ catur antāyāḥ goptā pakṣi indra dharmataḥ catur bhāgām bhuvam kṛtsnām sa bhuṅke vasudhādhipaḥ

original: na pāpakṛtkaścidāsīttasminrājyaṃ praśāsati / nāsīccaurabhayaṃ tārkṣya na kṣudrabhayameva hi //
analyzed: na pāpa kṛt kaścid āsīt tasmin rājyam praśāsati na āsīt caura bhayam tārkṣya na kṣudra bhayam eva hi

original: nāsīdvyādhibhayañcāpi tasmiñjanapadeśvare / svadharme remire cāsīttejasā bhāskaropamaḥ //
analyzed: na āsīt vyādhi bhayam ca api tasmin janapada īśvare svadharme remire ca āsīt tejasā bhāskara upamaḥ

original: akṣubdhatver'calasamaḥ sahiṣṇutve dharāsamaḥ / sa kadācinmahābāhuḥ prabhūtabalavāhanaḥ //
analyzed: akṣubdha tveḥ ṛcala samaḥ sahiṣṇu tve dharā samaḥ sa kadācid mahā bāhuḥ prabhūta bala vāhanaḥ

original: vanaṃ jagāma gahanaṃ hayānāñca śatairvṛtaḥ / siṃhanādaiśca yodhānāṃ śaṅkhadundubhiniḥ svanaiḥ //
analyzed: vanam jagāma gahanam hayānām ca śataiḥ vṛtaḥ siṃhanādaiḥ ca yodhānām śaṅkha dundubhi niḥ svanaiḥ

original: āsītkilakilāśabdastasmin gacchatī pārthive / tatratatra ca viprendraiḥ stūyamānaḥ samantataḥ //
analyzed: āsīt kilakilā śabdaḥ tasmin gacchatī pārthive tatra tatra ca vipra indraiḥ stūyamānaḥ samantataḥ

original: niryayau parayā prītyā vanaṃ mṛgajighāṃsayā / sa gacchandadṛśe dhīmānnandanapratimaṃ vanam //
analyzed: niryayau parayā prītyā vanam mṛga jighāṃsayā sa gacchan dadṛśe dhīmān nandana pratimam vanam

original: bilvārkakhadirākīrṇaṃ kapitthadhvajasaṃyutam / viṣamaiḥ parvataiścaiva sarvataśca samanvitam //
analyzed: bilva arka khadira ākīrṇam kapittha dhvaja saṃyutam viṣamaiḥ parvataiḥ ca eva sarvatas ca samanvitam

original: nirjalaṃ nirmanuṣyañca bahuyojanamāyatam / mṛgasiṃhairmahāghorainyaiścāpi vanecaraiḥ //
analyzed: nirjalam nirmanuṣyam ca bahu yojanam āyatam mṛga siṃhaiḥ mahā ghoraiḥ yaiḥ ca api vanecaraiḥ

original: tadvanaṃ manuja vyāghraḥ sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ / līlayā loḍayāmāsa sūdayanvividhānmṛgān //
analyzed: tat vanam manuja vyāghraḥ sa bhṛtya bala vāhanaḥ līlayā loḍayāmāsa sūdayan vividhān mṛgān

original: mṛgasya kasyacitkukṣiṃ tato vivyādha bhūmipaḥ / rājā mṛgaprasaṅgena tamanu prāviśadvanam //
analyzed: mṛgasya kasyacid kukṣim tatas vivyādha bhūmipaḥ rājā mṛga prasaṅgena tam anu prāviśat vanam

original: ekākī vai hṛtabalaḥ kṣutpripāsāsamanvitaḥ / sa vanasyāntamāsādya mahaccāraṇyamāsadat //
analyzed: ekākī vai hṛta balaḥ kṣudh pripāsā samanvitaḥ sa vanasya antam āsādya mahat ca araṇyam āsadat

original: tṛṣayā parayāviṣṭo 'nviṣyajjalamitastataḥ / sa dūrātpūracakrāhvaṃ haṃsasārasanāditaiḥ //
analyzed: tṛṣayā parayā āviṣṭaḥ nviṣyat jalam itas tatas sa dūrāt pūra cakra āhvam haṃsa sārasa nāditaiḥ

original: sūcitaṃ sara āgatya sāśva eva vyagāhata / padmānāñca parāgeṇa utpalānāṃ rajena ca //
analyzed: sūcitam saraḥ āgatya sa aśvaḥ eva vyagāhata padmānām ca parāgeṇa utpalānām rajena ca

original: sugandhamamalaṃ śītaṃ pītvāmbho nirjagāma ha / mārgaśramapariśrāntastaḍāgataṭamaṇḍapam //
analyzed: sugandham amalam śītam pītvā ambhaḥ nirjagāma ha mārga śrama pariśrāntaḥ taḍāga taṭa maṇḍapam

original: nyagrodhaṃ vīkṣya tasyāśu jaṭāsvaśvaṃ babandha ha / sa tatrāstaramāstīrya kheṭakānupadhāya ca //
analyzed: nyagrodham vīkṣya tasya āśu jaṭāsu aśvam babandha ha sa tatra āstaram āstīrya kheṭakān upadhāya ca

original: sūṣvāpa vāyunā tatra sevyāmātastadā kṣaṇam / kṣaṇaṃ supte nṛpe tatra preto vai pretavāhanaḥ //
analyzed: sūṣvāpa vāyunā tatra sevyā mātar tadā kṣaṇam kṣaṇam supte nṛpe tatra pretaḥ vai pretavāhanaḥ

original: kaścidatrājagāmātha yuktaḥ pretaśatena ca / asthicarmaśirāśeṣaśarīraḥ parivibhraman //
analyzed: kaścid atrā ājagāma atha yuktaḥ preta śatena ca asthi carma śirā śeṣa śarīraḥ parivibhraman

original: bhakṣyaṃpeyaṃ mārgamāṇo na badhnāti dhṛtiṃ kvacit / tamapūrvaṃ nṛpo dṛṣṭvākarodastraṃ śarāsane //
analyzed: bhakṣyaṃ peyam mārgamāṇaḥ na badhnāti dhṛtim kvacid  tam apūrvam nṛpaḥ dṛṣṭvā akarot astram śarāsane

original: dṛṣṭvā so 'pi ciraṃ bhūpaṃ tasthau sthāṇupivāgrataḥ / tamavasthitamālokya rājā prāptakutūhalaḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā saḥ ciram bhūpam tasthau tam avasthitam ālokya rājā prāpta kutūhalaḥ

original: papraccha tañca ko 'sīti kuto vā vikṛtiṃ gataḥ / preta uvāca / pretabhāvo mayā tyakto gatiṃ prāpto 'ramyahaṃ parām //
analyzed: papraccha tam ca kaḥ si iti kutas vā vikṛtim gataḥ pretaḥ uvāca preta bhāvaḥ mayā tyaktaḥ gatim prāptaḥ ramī aham parām

original: tvatsaṃyogānmahābāho nāsti dhanyataro mayā / babhruvāhana uvāca / kimetatdipine ghore sarvatrātibhayānake //
analyzed: tvad saṃyogāt mahā bāho na asti dhanyataraḥ mayā  babhruvāhanaḥ uvāca kim etat dipine ghore sarvatra ati bhayānake

original: dodhūyamāne vātena vātyārūpeṇa koṇapa / pataṅgā maśakāḥ kṣudrāḥ kavandhāśca śirāṃsi ca //
analyzed: dodhūyamāne vātena vātyārūpeṇa koṇapa pataṅgāḥ maśakāḥ kṣudrāḥ kabandhāḥ ca śirāṃsi ca

original: matsyāḥ kūrmāḥ kṛkalāsā vṛścikā bhramarāhayaḥ / adhomukhordhvapādāste krandamānāḥ sudāruṇam //
analyzed: matsyāḥ kūrmāḥ kṛkalāsāḥ vṛścikāḥ bhramara ahayaḥ adhomukha ūrdhva pādāḥ te krandamānāḥ su dāruṇam

original: pravānti vāyavo rūkṣā jvalanto vidyudagnayaḥ / itastato bhramantīva vāyunā tṛṇasantatiḥ //
analyzed: pravānti vāyavaḥ rūkṣāḥ jvalantaḥ vidyut agnayaḥ itas tatas bhramanti iva vāyunā tṛṇa santatiḥ

original: dṛśyante vividhā jīvā nāgāśca śalabhavrajāḥ / śrūyante bahudhā rāvā na dṛśyante kvacitkvacit //
analyzed: dṛśyante vividhāḥ jīvāḥ nāgāḥ ca śalabha vrajāḥ śrūyante bahudhā rāvāḥ na dṛśyante kvacid kvacid

original: dṛṣṭvedaṃ vikṛtaṃ sarvaṃ vepate hṛdayaṃmama / prate uvāca / yeṣāṃ naivāgnisaṃskāro na śrāddhaṃ nodakakriyāḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā idam vikṛtam sarvam vepate hṛdayam mama  uvāca yeṣām na eva agni saṃskāraḥ na śrāddham na udakakriyāḥ

original: ṣaṭ piṇḍā daśa gātrāṇi sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ na hi / viśvāsaghātino ye ca surāpāḥ svarṇahāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: ṣaṭ piṇḍāḥ daśa gātrāṇi sapiṇḍīkaraṇam na hi viśvāsa ghātinaḥ ye ca surā pāḥ svarṇa hāriṇaḥ

original: mṛtā durmaraṇādye ca ye cāsūyāparā janāḥ / prāyaścittavihīnā ye agamyāgamane ratāḥ //
analyzed: mṛtāḥ durmaraṇa ādye ca ye ca asūyā parāḥ janāḥ prāyaścitta vihīnāḥ ye agamyā gamane ratāḥ

original: karmabhirbhrāmyamāṇāste prāṇinaḥ svakṛtairiha / durlabhāhārapānīyā dṛśyante pīḍitā bhṛśam //
analyzed: karmabhiḥ bhrāmyamāṇāḥ te prāṇinaḥ sva kṛtaiḥ iha durlabha āhāra pānīyāḥ dṛśyante pīḍitāḥ bhṛśam

original: eteṣāṃ kṛpayā rājaṃstvaṃ kuruṣvaurdhvadehikam / yeṣāṃ na mātā na pitā na putro na ca bāndhavāḥ //
analyzed: eteṣām kṛpayā rājan tvam kuruṣva aurdhvadehikam  yeṣām na mātā na pitā na putraḥ na ca bāndhavāḥ

original: teṣā rājā svayaṃ kuryātkarmāṇi tu yato nṛpaḥ / ātmanaśca śubhaṃ karma kartavyaṃ pāralaukikam //
analyzed: rājā svayam kuryāt karmāṇi tu yatas nṛpaḥ ātmanaḥ ca śubham karma kartavyam pāralaukikam

original: vimuktaḥ sarvaduḥ khebhyo yenāñjo durgātiṃ taret / bhrātaraḥ kasya ke putrāstriyo 'pi svārthakovidāḥ //
analyzed: vimuktaḥ sarva duḥ khebhyaḥ yena añjas durgātim taret bhrātaraḥ kasya ke sva artha kovidāḥ

original: na kāryasteṣu viśrambha svakṛtaṃ bhujyateyataḥ / gṛheṣvarthā nivarnttante śmaśāne caiva bāndhavāḥ //
analyzed: na kāryaḥ teṣu viśrambha sva kṛtam bhujyate iyatas gṛheṣu arthāḥ nivarnttante śmaśāne ca eva bāndhavāḥ

original: śarīraṃ kāṣṭhāmādatte pāpaṃ puṇyaṃ saha vrajet / tasmādāśu tvayā samyagātmanaḥ śreya icchatā //
analyzed: śarīram kāṣṭhām ādatte pāpam puṇyam saha vrajet  tasmāt āśu tvayā samyak ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ icchatā

original: asthireṇa śarīreṇa kartavyañcaurdhvadohikam / rājovāca / kṛśarūpaḥ karālākṣastvaṃ preta iva lakṣyase //
analyzed: asthireṇa śarīreṇa kartavyam ca aurdhvadohikam  rājā uvāca kṛśa rūpaḥ karāla akṣaḥ tvam pretaḥ iva lakṣyase

original: kathayasvaḥ mama prītyā pretarāja yathātatham / tathā pṛṣṭaḥ sa vai rājñā uvāca sakalaṃ svakam //
analyzed: kathayasvaḥ mama prītyā pretarāja yathātatham  tathā pṛṣṭaḥ sa vai rājñā uvāca sakalam svakam

original: preta uvāca / kathayāmi nṛpaśreṣṭha sarvamevāditastava / pretatve kāraṇaṃ śrutvā dayāṃ kartumihārhasi //
analyzed: pretaḥ uvāca kathayāmi nṛpa śreṣṭha sarvam eva āditas tava  preta tve kāraṇam śrutvā dayām kartum iha arhasi

original: vaidiśaṃ nāma nagaraṃ sarvasampatsukhāvaham / nānājanapadākīrṇaṃ nānāratnasamākulam //
analyzed: vaidiśam nāma nagaram sarva sampad sukha āvaham nānā janapada ākīrṇam nānā ratna samākulam

original: nānāpuṣpavanākīrṇaṃ nānāpuṇyajanāvṛtam / tatrāhaṃ nyavasaṃ bhūpa devārcanarataḥ sadā //
analyzed: nānā puṣpa vana ākīrṇam nānā puṇyajana āvṛtam tatra aham nyavasam bhūpa deva arcana rataḥ sadā

original: vaiśyajātiḥ sudevo 'haṃ nāmnā viditamastu te / havyena tarpitā devāḥ kavyena pitaro mayā //
analyzed: vaiśya jātiḥ sudevaḥ ham nāmnā viditam astu te havyena tarpitāḥ devāḥ kavyena pitaraḥ mayā

original: vividhairdānayogaiśca viprāḥ santarpitā mayā / āhāraśca vihāraśca mayā vai suniveśitaḥ //
analyzed: vividhaiḥ dāna yogaiḥ ca viprāḥ santarpitāḥ mayā āhāraḥ ca vihāraḥ ca mayā vai su niveśitaḥ

original: dīnānāthaviśiṣṭebhyo mayā dattamanekadhā / tatsarvaṃ niṣphalaṃ jātaṃ mama daivādupāgatam //
analyzed: dīna anātha viśiṣṭebhyaḥ mayā dattam anekadhā tat sarvam niṣphalam jātam mama daivāt upāgatam

original: na me 'sti santatistāta na suhṛnna ca bāndhavāḥ / na ca mitraṃ hitastādṛgyaḥ kuryādaurdhvadaihikam //
analyzed: na me sti santatiḥ tāta na suhṛd na ca bāndhavāḥ na ca mitram hitaḥ tādṛś yaḥ kuryāt aurdhvadaihikam

original: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tena mama jātaṃ nṛpottama / ekādaśaṃ tripakṣañca ṣāṇmāsikamathābdikam //
analyzed: preta tvam su sthiram tena mama jātam nṛpa uttama ekādaśam tri pakṣam ca ṣāṇmāsikam atha ābdikam

original: pratimāsyāni cānyā ni hyevaṃ śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa / yasyaitāni na dīyante pretaśrāddhāni bhūpate //
analyzed: pratimāsyāni ca anyāḥ hi evam śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa yasya etāni na dīyante preta śrāddhāni bhūpate

original: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tasyaḥ dattaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi / evaṃ jñātvā mahārāja pretatvāduddharasva mām //
analyzed: preta tvam su sthiram tasyaḥ dattaiḥ śrāddha śataiḥ api evam jñātvā mahā rāja preta tvāt uddharasva mām

original: varṇānāñcaiva sarveṣāṃ rājā bandhurihocyate / tanmāṃ tāraya rājendra maṇiratnaṃ dadāmi te //
analyzed: varṇānām ca eva sarveṣām rājā bandhuḥ iha ucyate tat mām tāraya rāja indra maṇi ratnam dadāmi te

original: yathā mama śubhāvāptirbhavennṛpavarottama / tathā kāryaṃ mahīpāla dayāṃ kṛtvā mayi prabho //
analyzed: yathā mama śubha avāptiḥ bhavet nṛpa vara uttama tathā kāryam mahīpāla dayām kṛtvā mayi prabho

original: sapiṇḍairvā sagotrairvā niṣṭurairna kṛto hime / vṛṣotsargastato duṣṭaṃ pretatvaṃ prāptavānaham //
analyzed: sapiṇḍaiḥ vā sagotraiḥ vā niṣṭuraiḥ na kṛtaḥ hime vṛṣotsargaḥ tatas duṣṭam preta tvam prāptavān aham

original: kṣuttṛṣāviṣṭadehaśca bhakṣyaṃ pānaṃ na cāpnuyām / ato vikṛtireṣā vai kṛśātvādiramāṃsakā //
analyzed: kṣudh tṛṣā āviṣṭa dehaḥ ca bhakṣyam pānam na ca āpnuyām atas vikṛtiḥ eṣā vai kṛśā tva ādiḥ amāṃsakā

original: kṣuttṛḍjanyaṃ mahāduḥ khamanubhavāmi punaḥ punaḥ / akalyāṇaṃ hi pretatvaṃ vṛṣotsargaṃ vinā kṛtam //
analyzed: kṣut tṛṣ janyam mahā duḥ kham anubhavāmi punar punar akalyāṇam hi preta tvam vṛṣotsargam vinā kṛtam

original: tasmādrājandayāsindho prārthayāmi tavāgrataḥ / rājovāca / vartate matkule preta iti jñeyaṃ kathaṃ naraiḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt rājan dayā sindho prārthayāmi tava agratas  rājā uvāca vartate mad kule pretaḥ iti jñeyam katham naraiḥ

original: tanmamācakṣva hi preta pretatvānmucyate katham / preta uvāca / liṅgena pīḍayā preto 'numātavyo naraiḥ sadā //
analyzed: tat mama ācakṣva hi preta preta tvāt mucyate katham pretaḥ uvāca  liṅgena pīḍayā pretaḥ naraiḥ sadā

original: vakṣyāmi pīḍāstā rājanyā vai pretakṛtā bhuvi / ṛtuḥ syādaphalaḥ strīṇāṃ yadā vaṃśo na vardhate //
analyzed: vakṣyāmi pīḍāḥ tāḥ rājanyāḥ vai preta kṛtāḥ bhuvi  ṛtuḥ syāt aphalaḥ strīṇām yadā vaṃśaḥ na vardhate

original: miyante cālpavayasaḥ sā pīḍā petasambhavā / akasmādvṛttiharaṇamapratiṣṭhā janeṣu vai //
analyzed: ca alpa vayasaḥ sā pīḍā peta sambhavā akasmāt vṛtti haraṇam apratiṣṭhā janeṣu vai

original: akasmādgahadāhaḥ syātsā pīḍā pretasambhavā / svagehe kalaho nityaṃ syācca mithyābhiśaṃsanapa //
analyzed: akasmāt gaha dāhaḥ syāt sā pīḍā preta sambhavā sva gehe kalahaḥ nityam syāt ca mithyā abhiśaṃsana pa

original: gajayakṣmādisambhūtiḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā / api svayaṃ dhanaṃ muktaṃ prayatnādanave pathi //
analyzed: gaja yakṣma ādi sambhūtiḥ sā pīḍā preta sambhavā api svayam dhanam muktam prayatnāt anave pathi
