original: naiva labhyeta naśyetaḥ sā pīḍā pretasaṃmavā / suvṛṣṭau kṛṣināśaḥ syādvāṇijyādvṛttināśanam //
analyzed: nā eva labhyeta naśya itas sā pīḍā preta saṃmavā su vṛṣṭau kṛṣi nāśaḥ syāt vāṇijyāt vṛtti nāśanam

original: kalatraṃ patikūlaṃ syātsā pīḍā pretasambhavā / evantu pīḍayā rājanpretajñānaṃ bhavennṛṇām //
analyzed: kalatram pati kūlam syāt sā pīḍā preta sambhavā evam tu pīḍayā rājan preta jñānam bhavet nṛṇām

original: vṛṣotsargo yadi bhavetpretatvānmucyate tadā / tasmānnapa tvamapyevaṃ vṛṣotsargaṃ kuru prabho //
analyzed: vṛṣotsargaḥ yadi bhavet preta tvāt mucyate tadā tasmānnapa tvam api evam vṛṣotsargam kuru prabho

original: māmuddiśya nṛpe 'pyatrādhikāro 'tyanukampayā / rājaputro hataḥ kaścinmayaivāptastato mayā //
analyzed: mām uddiśya nṛpe ti anukampayā  rāja putraḥ hataḥ kaścid mayā eva āptaḥ tatas mayā

original: kuruṣva tvaṃ gṛhītvā me taddhanena vṛṣotsavam / kārtikyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vā'śvayuṅmadhye 'thavā nṛpa //
analyzed: kuruṣva tvam gṛhītvā me tat dhanena vṛṣotsavam kārtikyām paurṇamāsyām vā āśvayuj madhye nṛpa

original: revatīyuktadivase kṛṣīṣṭhā me vṛṣotsavam / puṇyānviprānsamāhūya vahniṃ sthāpya vidhānataḥ //
analyzed: revatī yukta divase kṛṣīṣṭhāḥ me vṛṣotsavam puṇyān viprān samāhūya vahnim sthāpya vidhānataḥ

original: mantrairhemastathā kāryaḥ ṣaḍbhirnṛpa vidhānataḥ / bahūnviprān bhojayethāstadratnāptadhanena vai / evaṃ kṛte mahīpāla mama muktirbhaviṣyati //
analyzed: mantraiḥ hemaḥ tathā kāryaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ nṛpa vidhānataḥ  bahūn viprān bhojayethāḥ tad ratna āpta dhanena vai  evam kṛte mahīpāla mama muktiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / tatheti pratijagrāha maṇiṃ rājā tataḥ khaga //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca tathā iti pratijagrāha maṇim rājā tatas khaga

original: kriyādhikārastasyaiva yo dhanagrāhako bhavet / kurvatostu tayorvārtāmevaṃ pretamahīkṣitoḥ //
analyzed: kriyā adhikāraḥ tasya eva yaḥ dhana grāhakaḥ bhavet  kurvatoḥ tu tayoḥ vārtām evam preta mahīkṣitoḥ

original: jhaṇatkārastu ghaṇṭānāṃ bherīṇāṃ bhāṅkṛtistathā / jātastadā rājasenā caturaṅgā samāpatat //
analyzed: jhaṇatkāraḥ tu ghaṇṭānām bherīṇām bhāṅkṛtiḥ tathā jātaḥ tadā rāja senā caturaṅgā samāpatat

original: tasyāmāgatamātrāyāṃ pretaścādṛśyatāṃ gataḥ / tasmādvanādviniḥ sṛtya rājāpi puramāgamat //
analyzed: tasyām āgata mātrāyām pretaḥ ca adṛśya tām gataḥ tasmāt vanāt viniḥ sṛtya rājā api puram āgamat

original: sa kārtikyāṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ pretamuddiśya saṃvyadhāt / vṛṣotsargaṃ vidhānena tanmaṇyāptadhanena ca //
analyzed: sa kārtikyām pūrṇimāyām pretam uddiśya saṃvyadhāt vṛṣotsargam vidhānena tad maṇi āpta dhanena ca

original: preto 'pyayaṃ sapadilabdhasuvarṇadehaḥ karmānta āgata iti praṇanāma bhūpam / deva tvadīyamahimāyamiti stuvan sa yāto divaṃ garuḍa bhūpatinā kṛtajñaḥ //
analyzed: pretaḥ pi ayam sapadi labdha suvarṇa dehaḥ karmānte āgataḥ iti praṇanāma bhūpam deva tvadīya mahimā ayam iti stuvan sa yātaḥ divam garuḍa bhūpatinā kṛtajñaḥ

original: etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ yathā bhūpatināpi saḥ / uddhṛtaḥ pretabhāvādvai kimanyacchrotumicchasi //
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam yathā bhūpatinā api saḥ uddhṛtaḥ preta bhāvāt vai kim anyat śrotum icchasi

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde rājakṛtavṛṣotsargakriyādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma navamo
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde rājakṛtavṛṣotsargakriyādinirūpaṇam nāma navamaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 10
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / sapiṇḍīkaraṇa jāte ābdike ca svakarmabhiḥ / devatvaṃ vā manuṣyatvaṃ pakṣitvaṃ vāpnuyurnarāḥ //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca sapiṇḍīkaraṇa jāte ābdike ca sva karmabhiḥ deva tvam vā manuṣya tvam pakṣi tvam vā āpnuyuḥ narāḥ

original: teṣāṃ vibhinnāhārāṇāṃ śrāddhaṃ vai tṛptidaṃ katham / yadapyanyairdvijairbhuktaṃ hūyate yadi vānale //
analyzed: teṣām vibhinna āhārāṇām śrāddham vai tṛpti dam katham yat api anyaiḥ dvijaiḥ bhuktam hūyate yadi vā anale

original: śubhāśubhātmakaiḥ pretastaddattaṃ bhujyate katham / śrāddhasyāvaśyakatvantu āmāvāsyādiṣu śrutam //
analyzed: śubha aśubha ātmakaiḥ pretaḥ tat dattam bhujyate katham śrāddhasya āvaśyaka tvam tu āmāvāsya ādiṣu śrutam

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / pretānāṃ śṛṇu pakṣīndra yathā śrāddhantu tṛptidam / devo yadapi jāto 'yaṃ manuṣyaḥ karmayogataḥ //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca pretānām śṛṇu pakṣi indra yathā śrāddham tu tṛpti dam devaḥ yat api jātaḥ yam manuṣyaḥ karma yogataḥ

original: tasyānnamamṛtaṃ bhūtvā devatve 'pyanuyāti ca / gāndhavye bhogarūpeṇa paśutve ca tṛṇaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: tasya annam amṛtam bhūtvā deva tve pi anuyāti ca gāndhavye bhoga rūpeṇa paśu tve ca tṛṇam bhavet

original: śrāddhaṃ hi vāyurūpeṇa nāgatve 'pyanugacchati / phalaṃ bhavati pakṣitve rākṣaseṣu tathāmiṣam //
analyzed: śrāddham hi vāyu rūpeṇa nāga tve pi anugacchati phalam bhavati pakṣi tve rākṣaseṣu tathā āmiṣam

original: dānavatve tathā māṃsaṃ pretatverudhiraṃ tathā / manuṣyatve 'nnapānādi bālye bhogaraso bhavet //
analyzed: dānava tve tathā māṃsam preta tve rudhiram tathā manuṣya tve nna pāna ādi bālye bhoga rasaḥ bhavet

original: garuḍa uvāca / kathaṃ kavyāni dattāni havyāni ca janairiha / gacchanti pitṛlokaṃ vā prāpakaḥ ko 'tra gadyate //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca katham kavyāni dattāni havyāni ca janaiḥ iha gacchanti pitṛ lokam vā prāpakaḥ gadyate

original: mṛtānāmapi jantūnāṃ śrāddhamāpyāyanaṃ yadi / nirvāṇasya pradīpasya tailaṃ saṃvardhayecchikhām //
analyzed: mṛtānām api jantūnām śrāddham āpyāyanam yadi nirvāṇasya pradīpasya tailam saṃvardhayet śikhām

original: mṛtāśca puruṣāḥ svāmin svakarmajanitāṃ gatim / gāhantaḥ ke kathaṃ svasya sutasya śreya āpnuyuḥ //
analyzed: mṛtāḥ ca puruṣāḥ svāmin sva karma janitām gatim gāhantaḥ ke katham svasya sutasya śreyaḥ āpnuyuḥ

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / śruteḥ pratyakṣatastārkṣya prāmāṇyaṃ balavattaram / śrutyā tuḥ bodhitārthasya pīyūṣatvādirūpatā //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca śruteḥ pratyakṣatas tārkṣya prāmāṇyam balavattaram śrutyā tuḥ bodhita arthasya pīyūṣa tva ādi rūpa tā

original: nāmagotraṃ pitṝṇāṃ vai prāpakaṃ havyakavyayoḥ / śrāddhasya mantrāstadvattu prāpakāścaiva bhaktitaḥ //
analyzed: nāma gotram pitṝṇām vai prāpakam havya kavyayoḥ  śrāddhasya mantrāḥ tadvat tu prāpakāḥ ca eva bhaktitaḥ

original: acetanāni caitāni prāpayanti kathantviti / suparṇa nāvagantavyaṃ prāpakaṃ vacmi te 'param //
analyzed: acetanāni ca etāni prāpayanti kathantu iti suparṇa na avagantavyam prāpakam vacmi te param

original: agniṣvāttādayasteṣā mādhipatye vyavasthitāḥ / kāle nyāyāgataṃ pātre vidhinā pratipāditam //
analyzed: agniṣvātta ādayaḥ teṣām mādhipatye vyavasthitāḥ kāle nyāya āgatam pātre vidhinā pratipāditam

original: annaṃ nayanti tatraite janturyatrāvatiṣṭhate / nāma gotrañca mantrāśca dattamannaṃ nayanti te //
analyzed: annam nayanti tatra ete jantuḥ yatra avatiṣṭhate nāma gotram ca mantrāḥ ca dattam annam nayanti te

original: api yoniśataṃ prāptāṃstāṃstṛptirupatiṣṭhati / teṣāṃ lokāntarasthānāṃ vividhairnāmagotrakaiḥ //
analyzed: api yoni śatam prāptān tān tṛptiḥ upatiṣṭhati teṣām loka antara sthānām vividhaiḥ nāma gotrakaiḥ

original: apasavyaṃ kṣitau darbhe dattāḥ piṇḍāstrayastu vai / yānti tāṃstarpayantyevaṃ pretasthānasthitānpitṝn //
analyzed: apasavyam kṣitau darbhe dattāḥ piṇḍāḥ trayaḥ tu vai yānti tān tarpayanti evam preta sthāna sthitān pitṝn

original: aprāptayātanāsthānāḥ śreṣṭhā ye bhuvi pañcadhā / nānārūpāstu jātā ye tiryagyonyādijātiṣu //
analyzed: aprāpta yātanā sthānāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ ye bhuvi pañcadhā nānā rūpāḥ tu jātāḥ ye tiryagyoni ādi jātiṣu

original: yadāhārā bhavantyete pitaro yatra yoniṣu / tāsutāsu tadāhāraḥ śrāddhā avatiṣṭhati //
analyzed: yad āhārāḥ bhavanti ete pitaraḥ yatra yoniṣu tāsu tāsu tad āhāraḥ śrāddhāḥ avatiṣṭhati

original: yathā goṣu pranaṣṭāsu vatso vindati mātaram / tathānnaṃ nayate vipra janturyatrāvatiṣṭhate //
analyzed: yathā goṣu pranaṣṭāsu vatsaḥ vindati mātaram  tathā annam nayate vipra jantuḥ yatra avatiṣṭhate

original: pitaraḥ śrāddhamoktāro viśverdevaiḥ sadā saha / ete śrāddhaṃ sadā bhuktvā pitṝnsantarpayantyataḥ //
analyzed: pitaraḥ śrāddha moktāraḥ viśveḥ devaiḥ sadā saha ete śrāddham sadā bhuktvā pitṝn santarpayanti atas

original: vasurudrāditisutāḥ pitaraḥ śrāddhadevatāḥ / prīṇayāte manuṣyāṇāṃ pitṝñśrāddheṣu tarpitāḥ //
analyzed: vasu rudrāt iti sutāḥ pitaraḥ śrāddhadevatāḥ prīṇayāte manuṣyāṇām pitṝn śrāddheṣu tarpitāḥ

original: ātmānaṃ gurviṇī garbhamapi prīṇāti vai yathā / dohadena tathā devāḥ śrāddhaiḥ svāṃśca pitṝnnṛṇām //
analyzed: ātmānam gurviṇī garbham api prīṇāti vai yathā dohadena tathā devāḥ śrāddhaiḥ svān ca pitṝn nṛṇām

original: hṛṣyanti pitaraḥ śrutvā śrāddhakālamupasthitam / anyonyaṃ manasā dhyātvā sampatanti manojavam //
analyzed: hṛṣyanti pitaraḥ śrutvā śrāddha kālam upasthitam anyonyam manasā dhyātvā sampatanti manojavam

original: brāhmaṇaiḥ saha cāśranti pitaro hyantarikṣagāḥ / vāyubhūtāśca tiṣṭhanti bhuktvā yānti parāṃ gatim //
analyzed: brāhmaṇaiḥ saha pitaraḥ hi antarikṣa gāḥ  vāyu bhūtāḥ ca tiṣṭhanti bhuktvā yānti parām gatim

original: nimantritāstu ye viprāḥ śrāddhapūrvadineḥ khaga / praviśya pitarasteṣu bhuktvā yānti svamālayam //
analyzed: nimantritāḥ tu ye viprāḥ śrāddha pūrva dineḥ khaga praviśya pitaraḥ teṣu bhuktvā yānti svam ālayam

original: śrāddhakartrā tu yadyekaḥ śrāddhe vipro nimantritaḥ / udarasthaḥ pitā tasya vāmapārśve pitāmahaḥ //
analyzed: śrāddha kartrā tu yadi ekaḥ śrāddhe vipraḥ nimantritaḥ udara sthaḥ pitā tasya vāma pārśve pitāmahaḥ

original: prapitāmaho dakṣiṇataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ piṇḍabhakṣakaḥ / śrāddhakāle yamaḥ pretānpitṝṃścāpi yamālayāt //
analyzed: prapitāmahaḥ dakṣiṇatas pṛṣṭhatas piṇḍa bhakṣakaḥ śrāddha kāle yamaḥ pretān pitṝn ca api yama ālayāt

original: visarjayati mānuṣye nirayasthāṃśca kāśyapa / kṣudhārtāḥ kīrtayantaśca duṣkṛtañca svayaṅkṛtam //
analyzed: visarjayati mānuṣye niraya sthān ca kāśyapa kṣudhā ārtāḥ kīrtayantaḥ ca duṣkṛtam ca svayaṅkṛtam

original: kāṅkṣanti putrapautrebhyaḥ pāyasaṃ madhusaṃyutam / tasmāttāṃstatra vidhinā tarpayetpāyasena tu //
analyzed: kāṅkṣanti putra pautrebhyaḥ pāyasam madhu saṃyutam  tasmāt tān tatra vidhinā tarpayet pāyasena tu

original: garuḍa uvāca / svāminkenāpi te dṛṣṭā āgatāḥ pitaro dvija / lokādamuṣmādāgatya bhuñjanto bhuvi mānada //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca svāmin kena api te dṛṣṭāḥ āgatāḥ pitaraḥ dvija lokāt amuṣmāt āgatya bhuñjantaḥ bhuvi mānada

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / garutmañchṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathā dṛṣṭāstu sītayā / pitaro vipradehe vai śvaśurādyāstrayaḥ kvacit //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca garutman śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathā dṛṣṭāḥ tu sītayā pitaraḥ vipra dehe vai śvaśura ādyāḥ trayaḥ kvacid

original: gṛhītvā piturājñāṃ vai rāmo vanamupāgamat / tataḥ puṣkarayātrārthaṃ rāmo 'yātsītayā saha //
analyzed: gṛhītvā pituḥ ājñām vai rāmaḥ vanam upāgamat tatas puṣkara yātrā artham rāmaḥ yāt sītayā saha

original: tīrthaṃ cāpi samāgatya śrāddhaṃ prārabdha vāṃstu saḥ / phalaṃ pakvantu jānakyā siddhaṃ rāme niveditam //
analyzed: tīrtham ca api samāgatya śrāddham saḥ  phalam jānakyā siddham rāme niveditam

original: snātapriyoktavākyāttu susnātā namapālayat / nabhomadhyagate sūrye kāle kutupa āgate //
analyzed: snāta priya ukta vākyāt tu su snātā nam apālayat nabhaḥ madhya gate sūrye kāle kutupe āgate

original: ayātā ṛḥṣayaḥ sarve ye rāmeṇa nimantritāḥ / tānmunīnāgatāndṛṣṭvā vaidehī janakātmakā //
analyzed: a yātāḥ ṛḥṣayaḥ sarve ye rāmeṇa nimantritāḥ tān munīn āgatān dṛṣṭvā vaidehī janaka ātmakā

original: rāmājñayānnamādāya pariveṣṭumupāgatā / apāsarpattato dūre vipramadhye tu saṃsthitā //
analyzed: rāma ājñayā annam ādāya pariveṣṭum upāgatā apāsarpat tatas dūre vipra madhye tu saṃsthitā

original: gulmairācchādya cātmānaṃ nigūḍhaṃ sā sthitā tadā / ekānte tu tadā sītāṃ jñātvā rāghavanandanaḥ //
analyzed: gulmaiḥ ācchādya ca ātmānam nigūḍham sā sthitā tadā ekānte tu tadā sītām jñātvā rāghava nandanaḥ

original: vimṛśya suciraṃ kālamidaṃ kimiti satvaram / kiñcitkvacidgatā sādhvī trapāyāḥ kāraṇena hi //
analyzed: vimṛśya su ciram kālam idam kim iti satvaram kiñcid kvacid gatā sādhvī trapāyāḥ kāraṇena hi

original: kiṃ vā na bhojayanviprānsī tāmanveṣayāmyaham / vimṛśannevamevaṃ sa svayaṃ viprānabhojayat //
analyzed: kim vā na bhojayan viprān sī tām anveṣayāmi aham vimṛśan evam evam sa svayam viprān abhojayat

original: gateṣu dvijamukhyeṣu priyāṃ rāmo 'bravīdidam / kathaṃ talāsu līnā tvaṃ munīndṛṣṭvā samāgatān //
analyzed: gateṣu dvijamukhyeṣu priyām rāmaḥ bravīt idam katham talāsu līnā tvam munīn dṛṣṭvā samāgatān

original: tatsarvaṃ mama tanvaṅgi kāraṇaṃ vada mā ciram / evamuktā tadā bhartrā sītā sādhomukhī sthitā / muñcantī cāśrusaṃghātaṃ rāghavaṃ vākyamabravīt //
analyzed: tat sarvam mama tanvaṅgi kāraṇam vada mā ciram evam uktā tadā bhartrā sītā sā adhomukhī sthitā muñcantī ca aśru saṃghātam rāghavam vākyam abravīt

original: sītovāca / śṛṇu tvaṃ nātha yaddṛṣṭamāścaryamiha yādṛśam //
analyzed: sītā uvāca śṛṇu tvam nātha yat dṛṣṭam āścaryam iha yādṛśam

original: pitā tava mayā dṛṣṭo brāhmaṇāgre tu rāghavaḥ / sarvābharaṇasaṃyuktodvau cānyau ca tathāvidhau //
analyzed: pitā tava mayā dṛṣṭaḥ brāhmaṇa agre tu rāghavaḥ sarva ābharaṇa saṃyuktaḥ dvau ca anyau ca tathāvidhau

original: dṛṣṭvā tvatpitarañcāhamapakrāntā tavāntikāt / valkalājinasaṃvītā kathaṃ rājñaḥ puraḥ prabho //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tvad pitaran ca aham apakrāntā tava antikāt valkala ajina saṃvītā katham rājñaḥ puras prabho

original: bhavāmi ripuvīraghna satyametaduhāhṛtam / svahastena kathaṃ deyaṃ rājñe vā bhojanaṃ mayā //
analyzed: bhavāmi ripu vīra ghna satyam etat uha āhṛtam sva hastena katham deyam rājñe vā bhojanam mayā

original: dāsānāmapi ye dāsā nopabhuñjanti karhicit / tṛṇapātre kathaṃ tasmai annaṃ dātuṃ hi śakruyām //
analyzed: dāsānām api ye dāsāḥ na upabhuñjanti karhicit tṛṇa pātre katham tasmai annam dātum hi śakruyām

original: yāhaṃ rājñā purā dṛṣṭā sarvābharaṇabhūṣitā / sā svedamaladigdhāṅgī kathaṃ yāsyāmi bhūpatim / apakṛṣṭāsmi tenāhaṃ trapayā raghunandana / śrībhāgavānuvāca //
analyzed: yā aham rājñā purā dṛṣṭā sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitā  sā sveda mala digdha aṅgī katham yāsyāmi bhūpatim apakṛṣṭā asmi tena aham trapayā raghunandana śrī bhāgavān uvāca

original: iti śrutvā priyāvākyaṃ rāmo vismitamānasaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrutvā priyā vākyam rāmaḥ vismita mānasaḥ

original: āścaryamiti tajjñātvā tadā svasthānamāgamat / sītayā pitaro dṛṣṭā yathā tatte niveditam //
analyzed: āścaryam iti tat jñātvā tadā sva sthānam āgamat sītayā pitaraḥ dṛṣṭāḥ yathā tat te niveditam

original: aparaṃ śrāddhamāhātmyaṃ kiñcicchṛṇu samāsataḥ / amāvasyādine prāpte gṛhadvāre samāsthitāḥ //
analyzed: aparam śrāddha māhātmyam kiñcid śṛṇu samāsatas amāvasyā dine prāpte gṛha dvāre samāsthitāḥ

original: vāyubhūtāḥ pravāñchanti śrāddhaṃ pitṛgaṇā nṛṇām / yāvadastamayaṃ bhānoḥ kṣutpipāsāsamākulāḥ //
analyzed: vāyu bhūtāḥ pravāñchanti śrāddham pitṛ gaṇāḥ nṛṇām yāvat astamayam bhānoḥ kṣudh pipāsā samākulāḥ

original: tataścāstaṃ gate sūrye nirāśā duḥ khasaṃyutāḥ / niḥ śvasantaściraṃ yānti garhayantastu vaṃśajam //
analyzed: tatas ca astam gate sūrye nirāśāḥ duḥ kha saṃyutāḥ niḥ śvasantaḥ ciram yānti garhayantaḥ tu vaṃśajam

original: tasmācchrāddhaṃ prayatnena amāyāṃ kartumarhati / yadi śrāddhaṃ prakurvanti putrādyāstasya bāndhavāḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt śrāddham prayatnena amāyām kartum arhati yadi śrāddham prakurvanti putra ādyāḥ tasya bāndhavāḥ

original: uddhṛtā ye gayāśrāddhe brahmalokañca taiḥ saha / bhajante kṣutpipāsā vā na teṣāṃ jāyate kvacit //
analyzed: uddhṛtāḥ ye gayā śrāddhe brahma lokam ca taiḥ saha bhajante kṣudh pipāsā vā na teṣām jāyate kvacid

original: tasmācchrāddhaṃ prayatnena samyakkuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ / tasmācchrāddhaṃ caredbhaktyā śākairapi yathāvidhi //
analyzed: tasmāt śrāddham prayatnena samyak kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ tasmāt śrāddham caret bhaktyā śākaiḥ api yathāvidhi

original: kurvīta samaye śrāddhaṃ kule kaścinna sīdati / āyuḥ putrānyaśaḥ svargaṃ kīrtiṃ puṣṭiṃ balaṃ śriyam //
analyzed: kurvīta samaye śrāddham kule kaścid na sīdati āyuḥ putrān yaśaḥ svargam kīrtim puṣṭim balam śriyam

original: paśūnsāraivyaṃ dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ prāpnuyātpitṛpūjanāt / devakāryādapi sadā pitṛkāryaṃ viśiṣyate //
analyzed: paśūn sāraivyam dhanam dhānyam prāpnuyāt pitṛ pūjanāt  deva kāryāt api sadā pitṛ kāryam viśiṣyate

original: devatābhyaḥ pitṝṇāṃ hi pūrvamāpyāyanaṃ śubham / ye yajanti pitṝndevānbrāhmaṇāṃśca hutāśanam //
analyzed: devatābhyaḥ pitṝṇām hi pūrvam āpyāyanam śubham ye yajanti pitṝn devān brāhmaṇān ca hutāśanam

original: sarvabhūtāntarātmānaṃ māmeva hi yajanti te / smārtena vidhinā śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā svavibhavocitam //
analyzed: sarva bhūta antarātmānam mām eva hi yajanti te smārtena vidhinā śrāddham kṛtvā sva vibhava ucitam

original: ābrāhmastambaparyantaṃ jagatprīṇāti mānavaḥ / annaprakiraṇaṃ yattu manuṣyaiḥ kriyate bhuvi //
analyzed: ā brāhma stamba paryantam jagat prīṇāti mānavaḥ anna prakiraṇam yat tu manuṣyaiḥ kriyate bhuvi

original: tena tuptimupāyānti ye piśācatvamāgatāḥ / yaccāmbuḥ snānavastrebhyo bhūmau patati khecara //
analyzed: tena tuptim upāyānti ye piśāca tvam āgatāḥ yat ca ambuḥ snāna vastrebhyaḥ bhūmau patati khecara

original: tena ye tarutāṃ prāptāsteṣāṃ tṛptiḥ prajāyate / yāni gandhāmbūni caiva patanti dharaṇītale //
analyzed: tena ye taru tām prāptāḥ teṣām tṛptiḥ prajāyate yāni gandha ambūni ca eva patanti dharaṇī tale

original: tena cāpyāyanaṃ teṣāṃ ye devatvamupāgatāḥ / ye cāpi svakulādbāhyāḥ kriyāyogyā hyasaṃskṛtāḥ //
analyzed: tena ca āpyāyanam teṣām ye deva tvam upāgatāḥ ye ca api sva kulāt bāhyāḥ kriyā yogyāḥ hi asaṃskṛtāḥ

original: vipannāste tu vikirasaṃmārjanajalāśinaḥ / bhuktvā cācamanaṃ yacca jalaṃ yaccāhni sevitam //
analyzed: vipannāḥ te tu vikira saṃmārjana jala āśinaḥ bhuktvā ca ācamanam yat ca jalam yat ca ahni sevitam

original: brāhmaṇānāṃ tathaivānyattena tṛptiṃ prayānti vai / piśācatvamanuprāptāḥ kṛmikīṭatvameva ye //
analyzed: brāhmaṇānām tathā eva anyat tena tṛptim prayānti vai piśāca tvam anuprāptāḥ kṛmi kīṭa tvam eva ye

original: uddhṛteṣvannapiṇḍeṣu bhuvi ye cānnakāṅkṣiṇaḥ / tairevāpyāyanaṃ teṣāṃ ye manuṣyatvamāgatāḥ //
analyzed: uddhṛteṣu anna piṇḍeṣu bhuvi ye ca anna kāṅkṣiṇaḥ taiḥ eva āpyāyanam teṣām ye manuṣya tvam āgatāḥ

original: evaṃ vai kriyamāṇānāṃ teṣāṃ caiva dvijanmanām / kaścijjalānnavikṣepaḥ śucirucchiṣṭa eva vā //
analyzed: evam vai kriyamāṇānām teṣām ca eva dvijanmanām kaścid jala anna vikṣepaḥ śuciḥ ucchiṣṭaḥ eva vā

original: tenānnena kule teṣāṃ ye vai jātyantaraṃ gatāḥ / bhavatyāpyāyanaṃ teṣāṃ samyak śrāddhe kṛte sati //
analyzed: tena annena kule teṣām ye vai jāti antaram gatāḥ bhavati āpyāyanam teṣām samyak śrāddhe kṛte sati

original: anyāyopārjitairdravyairyacchrāddhaṃ kriyate naraiḥ / takṛpyanti tena caṇḍālāḥ pukkasādyupayoniṣu //
analyzed: anyāya upārjitaiḥ dravyaiḥ yat śrāddham kriyate naraiḥ tena caṇḍālāḥ pukkasa ādi upayoniṣu

original: evaṃ saṃprāpyate pakṣin yaddattamiha bāndhavaiḥ / śrāddhaṃ kurvadbhirannāmvuśākaistṛptirhi jāyate //
analyzed: evam saṃprāpyate pakṣin yat dattam iha bāndhavaiḥ śrāddham kurvadbhiḥ anna amvu śākaiḥ tṛptiḥ hi jāyate

original: etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi / sadyo dehāntaraprāptirvilaṃbenāvanītale //
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam yat mām tvam paripṛcchasi sadyas deha antara prāptiḥ vilaṃbena avanī tale

original: pṛṣṭavānasi tatte 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi samāsataḥ / sadyo vilambatañcaivobhayathāpi kalevaram //
analyzed: pṛṣṭavān asi tat te ham pravakṣyāmi samāsatas sadyas kalevaram

original: yato hi martyaḥ prāpnoti tadviśeṣañca me śṛṇu / adhūmakajyotirivāṅguṣṭhamātraḥ pumāṃstataḥ //
analyzed: yatas hi martyaḥ prāpnoti tad viśeṣam ca me śṛṇu adhūmaka jyotiḥ iva aṅguṣṭha mātraḥ pumān tatas

original: dehamekaṃ sadya eva vāyavīyaṃ prapadyate / yathā nṛṇajalaukā hi paścatpādaṃ tadoddharet //
analyzed: deham ekam sadyas eva vāyavīyam prapadyate  yathā nṛṇa jalaukāḥ hi paścat pādam tadā uddharet

original: sthitiragryasya pādasya yadā jātā dṛḍhā bhavet / evaṃ dehī pūrvadehaṃ samutsṛjati taṃ yadā //
analyzed: sthitiḥ agryasya pādasya yadā jātā dṛḍhā bhavet  evam dehī pūrva deham samutsṛjati tam yadā

original: bhogārthamagre syāddeho vāyavīya upasthitaḥ / viṣayagrāhakaṃ yadvanmriyamāṇasya cendriyam //
analyzed: bhoga artham agre syāt dehaḥ vāyavīyaḥ upasthitaḥ viṣaya grāhakam yadvat mriyamāṇasya ca indriyam

original: nirvyāpāraṃ tacca dehe vāyunaiva sa gacchati / śarīraṃ yadavāpnoti taccāpyutkvamyati svayam //
analyzed: nirvyāpāram tat ca dehe vāyunā eva sa gacchati śarīram yat avāpnoti tat ca api utkvamyati svayam

original: gṛhītvā svaṃ viniryāti jīvo garbha īvāśayāt / utkrāmantaṃ sthitaṃ vāpi bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam //
analyzed: gṛhītvā svam viniryāti jīvaḥ garbhaḥ īva āśayāt  utkrāmantam sthitam vā api bhuñjānam vā guṇa anvitam

original: vimūḍhā nānupaśyanti paśyanti jñānacakṣuṣaḥ / ātivāhikamityevaṃ vāyavīyaṃ vadanti hi //
analyzed: vimūḍhāḥ na anupaśyanti paśyanti jñāna cakṣuṣaḥ ātivāhikam iti evam vāyavīyam vadanti hi

original: evaṃ tu yātudhānānāṃ tameva ca vadanti hi / suparṇa īdṛśo deho nṛṇāṃ bhavati piṇḍajaḥ //
analyzed: evam tu yātudhānānām tam eva ca vadanti hi suparṇaḥ īdṛśaḥ dehaḥ nṛṇām bhavati piṇḍa jaḥ

original: putrādibhiḥ kṛtāścetsyuḥ piṇḍā daśa daśāhikāḥ / piṇḍajena tu dehena vāyujaścaikatāṃ vrajet //
analyzed: putra ādibhiḥ kṛtāḥ ced syuḥ piṇḍāḥ daśa daśa āhikāḥ piṇḍa jena tu dehena vāyu jaḥ ca eka tām vrajet

original: piṇḍajo yadi naiva syādvāyujor'hati yātanām / dehino 'sminyathā dehe kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ jarā / tathā dehāntaraprāptiḥ pakṣīndretyavadhāraya //
analyzed: piṇḍajaḥ yadi nā eva syāt vāyu joḥ hati yātanām smin yathā dehe kaumāram yauvanam jarā tathā deha antara prāptiḥ pakṣi indra iti avadhāraya

original: vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya navāni gṛhṇāti naroparāṇi / tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇānyanyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī //
analyzed: vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya navāni gṛhṇāti nara uparāṇi tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇāni anyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī

original: nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ / na cainaṃ kledayantyāpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ //
analyzed: na enam chindanti śastrāṇi na enam dahati pāvakaḥ na ca enam kledayanti āpaḥ na śoṣayati mārutaḥ

original: vāyavīyāṃ tanuṃ yāti sadya ityuktameva te / prāptirvilaṃbato yasya taṃ dehaṃ khalu me śṛṇu //
analyzed: vāyavīyām tanum yāti sadyas iti uktam eva te prāptiḥ vilaṃbataḥ yasya tam deham khalu me śṛṇu

original: kvacidvilaṃbato dehaṃ piṇḍajaṃ sa samāpnuyāt / atho gato yāmyalokaṃ svīyakarmānusārataḥ //
analyzed: kvacid vilaṃbataḥ deham piṇḍa jam sa samāpnuyāt atho gataḥ yāmya lokam svīya karma anusārataḥ

original: citraguptasyavākyena nirayāṇi bhunakti saḥ / yātanāḥsamavāpyātha paśupakṣyādikīṃ tanum //
analyzed: citraguptasya vākyena nirayāṇi bhunakti saḥ yātanāḥ samavāpya atha paśu pakṣi ādikīm tanum

original: yā gṛhṇāti naraḥ sā syānmohena mamatāspadam / śubhāśubhaṃ karmaphalaṃ bhuktvā mucyate mānavaḥ //
analyzed: yā gṛhṇāti naraḥ sā syāt mohena mamatā āspadam śubha aśubham karma phalam bhuktvā mucyate mānavaḥ

original: garuḍa uvāca / tīrtvā duḥ khabhavāmbhodhiṃ bhavantaṃ kathamāpnuyāt / bahupātakayukto 'pi tadvadasva dayānidhe //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca tīrtvā duḥ kha bhava ambhodhim bhavantam katham āpnuyāt bahu pātaka yuktaḥ tat vadasva dayā nidhe

original: bhūyo duḥ khasya saṃsargo narasya na bhavedyathā / brūhi śuśrūṣamāṇasya pṛcchato me ramāpate //
analyzed: bhūyas duḥ khasya saṃsargaḥ narasya na bhavet yathā brūhi śuśrūṣamāṇasya pṛcchataḥ me ramāpate

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / svesve karmaṇyabhirataḥ saṃsiddhiṃ labhate naraḥ / svakarmanirataḥ siddhiṃ yathā vindati tacchṛṇu //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca sve sve karmaṇi abhirataḥ saṃsiddhim labhate naraḥ sva karma nirataḥ siddhim yathā vindati tat śṛṇu

original: karmavibhraṣṭakāluṣyo vāsudevānucintayā / buddhyā viśuddhayā yukto dhṛtyātmānaṃ niyamya ca //
analyzed: karma vibhraṣṭa kāluṣyaḥ vāsudeva anucintayā buddhyā viśuddhayā yuktaḥ dhṛtya ātmānam niyamya ca

original: śabdādīnviṣayāṃstyaktvā rāgadveṣau vyudasya ca / viraktasevī labdhvāśī yatavākkāyamānasaḥ //
analyzed: śabda ādīn viṣayān tyaktvā rāga dveṣau vyudasya ca virakta sevī labdhvā āśī yata vāc kāya mānasaḥ

original: dhyānayogaparo nityaṃ vairagyaṃ samupāśritaḥ / ahaṅkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ parigraham //
analyzed: dhyāna yoga paraḥ nityam vairagyam samupāśritaḥ ahaṅkāram balam darpam kāmam krodham parigraham

original: vimucya nirmamaḥ śānto brahmabhūyāya kalpate / ataḥ paraṃ nṛṇāṃ kṛtyaṃ nāsti kaśyapanandana //
analyzed: vimucya nirmamaḥ śāntaḥ brahma bhūyāya kalpate  atas param nṛṇām kṛtyam na asti kaśyapa nandana

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpu- uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛdharmadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde śrāddhasya tṛptidatvādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahā pu uttara khaṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde śrāddhasya tṛptidatvādinirūpaṇam nāma daśamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 11
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / mānuṣatvaṃ labhetkasmānmṛtyumāpnoti tatkatham / mriyate kaḥ suraśreṣṭha dehamāśritya kutracit //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca mānuṣa tvam labhet kasmāt mṛtyum āpnoti tat katham mriyate kaḥ suraśreṣṭha deham āśritya kutracid

original: indriyāṇi kuto yānti hyaspṛśyaḥ sa kathaṃ bhavet / kva karmāṇi kṛtānīha kathaṃ bhuṅkte prasarpati //
analyzed: indriyāṇi kutas yānti hi aspṛśyaḥ sa katham bhavet kva karmāṇi kṛtāni iha katham bhuṅkte prasarpati

original: prasādaṃ kuru me mohaṃ chettumarhasyaśeṣataḥ / kāśyapo 'haṃ suraśreṣṭha vinatāgarbha saṃbhavaḥ / yamalokaṃ kathaṃ yānti viṣṇulokaṃ ca mānavāḥ //
analyzed: prasādam kuru me moham chettum arhasi aśeṣatas kāśyapaḥ ham suraśreṣṭha vinatā garbha saṃbhavaḥ yama lokam katham yānti viṣṇu lokam ca mānavāḥ

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / parasya yoṣitaṃ hṛtvā brahmasvamapahṛtya ca //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca parasya yoṣitam hṛtvā brahma svam apahṛtya ca

original: araṇye nirjane deśe jāyate brahmarākṣasaḥ / hīnajātau prajāyeta ratnānāmapahārakaḥ //
analyzed: araṇye nirjane deśe jāyate brahmarākṣasaḥ hīna jātau prajāyeta ratnānām apahārakaḥ

original: yaṃyaṃ kāmamabhidhyāyetsa talliṅgo 'bhijāyate / nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ //
analyzed: yam yam kāmam abhidhyāyet sa tad liṅgaḥ bhijāyate na enam chindanti śastrāṇi na enam dahati pāvakaḥ

original: na cainaṃ kledayantyāpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ / vāk cakṣurnāsikā karṇau gudaṃ mūtrasya sañcaraḥ //
analyzed: na ca enam kledayanti āpaḥ na śoṣayati mārutaḥ vāc cakṣuḥ nāsikā karṇau gudam mūtrasya sañcaraḥ

original: aṇḍajādikajantūnāṃ chidrāṇyetāni sarvaśaḥ / ānābhermūrdhaparyantamūrdhvacchidrāṇi cāṣṭa vai //
analyzed: aṇḍaja ādika jantūnām chidrāṇi etāni sarvaśas ānābheḥ mūrdha paryantam ūrdhva chidrāṇi ca aṣṭa vai

original: santaḥ sukṛtino martyā ūrdhvacchidreṇa yānti vai / mṛtāhe vārṣikaṃ yāvadyathoktavidhinā khaga //
analyzed: santaḥ su kṛtinaḥ martyāḥ ūrdhva chidreṇa yānti vai mṛtāhe vārṣikam yāvat yathā ukta vidhinā khaga

original: kuryātsarvāṇi karmāṇi nirdhano 'pi hi mānavaḥ / dehe yatra vasejjantustatra bhuṅkte śubhāśubham //
analyzed: kuryāt sarvāṇi karmāṇi hi mānavaḥ  dehe yatra vaset jantuḥ tatra bhuṅkte śubha aśubham

original: manovākkāyajāndoṣāṃstathāṃ bhuṅkte khageśvara / mṛtaḥ sa sukhamāpnoti māyāpāśairna badhyate / pāśabaddho naro yastu vikarmanirato bhavet //
analyzed: manaḥ vāc kāya jān doṣān bhuṅkte khageśvara mṛtaḥ sa sukham āpnoti māyā pāśaiḥ na badhyate pāśa baddhaḥ naraḥ yaḥ tu vikarma nirataḥ bhavet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāhe ūrdhvādhogatijñāpakotkramaṇadvāranirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādaśo
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāhe ūrdhvādhogatijñāpakotkramaṇadvāranirūpaṇam nāma ekādaśaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 12
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / evaṃ te kathitastārkṣya jīvitasya vinarṇayaḥ / mānuṣāṇāṃ hitārthāya pretatvavinivṛttaye //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca evam te kathitaḥ tārkṣya jīvitasya vinā ṛṇayaḥ mānuṣāṇām hita arthāya preta tva vinivṛttaye

original: caturaśītilakṣāṇi caturbhedāśca jantavaḥ / aṇḍajāḥ svedajāścaiva udbhijjāśca jārāyujāḥ //
analyzed: caturaśīti lakṣāṇi catur bhedāḥ ca jantavaḥ aṇḍa jāḥ sveda jāḥ ca eva udbhid jāḥ ca jārāyu jāḥ

original: ekaviṃśatilakṣāṇi aṇḍajāḥ parikīrtitāḥ / svedajāśca tathā proktā udbhijjāśca krameṇa tu //
analyzed: ekaviṃśati lakṣāṇi aṇḍa jāḥ parikīrtitāḥ sveda jāḥ ca tathā proktāḥ udbhid jāḥ ca krameṇa tu

original: jarāyujāstathā proktā manuṣyādyāstathā pare / sarveṣāmeva jantūnāṃ mānuṣatvaṃ hi durlabham //
analyzed: jarāyu jāḥ tathā proktāḥ manuṣya ādyāḥ tathā pare sarveṣām eva jantūnām mānuṣa tvam hi durlabham

original: pañcendriyanidhānatvaṃ mahāpuṇyairavāpyate / brāhmaṇāḥ kṣattriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāstatparajātayaḥ //
analyzed: pañca indriya nidhāna tvam mahā puṇyaiḥ avāpyate brāhmaṇāḥ kṣattriyāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ tad para jātayaḥ

original: rajakaścarmakāraśca naṭo buruḍa eva ca / kaivartamedabhillāśca saptaite hyantyajāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: rajakaḥ carmakāraḥ ca naṭaḥ buruḍaḥ eva ca kaivarta medabhillāḥ ca sapta ete hi antyajāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: mlecchatumbavibhedena jātibhedāstvanekaśaḥ / jantūnāmeva sarveṣāṃ jātibhedāḥ sahasraśaḥ //
analyzed: mleccha tumba vibhedena jāti bhedāḥ tu anekaśas jantūnām eva sarveṣām jāti bhedāḥ sahasraśas

original: jantūnāmeva sarveṣāṃ bhedāścaiva sahasraśaḥ / āhāro maithunaṃ nidrā bhayaṃ krodhastathaiva ca //
analyzed: jantūnām eva sarveṣām bhedāḥ ca eva sahasraśas āhāraḥ maithunam nidrā bhayam krodhaḥ tathā eva ca

original: sarveṣā meva jantūnāṃ viveko durlabhaḥ paraḥ / ekapādādirūpeṇa dehabhedāstvanekaśaḥ //
analyzed: sarveṣām eva jantūnām vivekaḥ durlabhaḥ paraḥ eka pāda ādi rūpeṇa deha bhedāḥ tu anekaśas

original: kṛṣṇasāro mṛgo yatra dharmadaśaḥ sa ucyate / brahmādyā devatāḥ sarvāstatra tiṣṭhanti sarvaśaḥ //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa sāraḥ mṛgaḥ yatra dharma daśaḥ saḥ ucyate  brahma ādyāḥ devatāḥ sarvāḥ tatra tiṣṭhanti sarvaśas

original: bhūtānāṃ prāṇinaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ prāṇināṃ matijīvinaḥ / matimatsu narāḥ śreṣṭhā nareṣu brāhmaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: bhūtānām prāṇinaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ prāṇinām mati jīvinaḥ matimatsu narāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ nareṣu brāhmaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: mānuṣyaṃ yaḥ samāsādya svargamekṣaikasādhakam / tayorna sādhayedekaṃ tenātmā vañcito dhruvam //
analyzed: mānuṣyam yaḥ samāsādya svargam ekṣā eka sādhakam  tayoḥ na sādhayet ekam tena ātmā vañcitaḥ dhruvam

original: icchati śatī sahasraṃ sahasrī lakṣamīhate kartum / lakṣādhipatī rājyaṃ rājāpi sakalāṃ dharāṃ labdhum //
analyzed: icchati śatī sahasram sahasrī lakṣam īhate kartum lakṣa adhipatiḥ rājyam rājā api sakalām dharām labdhum

original: cakradharo 'pi suratvaṃ surabhāve sakalasurapatirbhavitum / surapatirūrdhvagatitvaṃ tathāpi nanivartate tṛṣṇā //
analyzed: sura tvam sura bhāve sakala surapatiḥ bhavitum surapatiḥ ūrdhva gati tvam tathā api tṛṣṇā

original: tṛṣṇayā cābhibhūtastu narakaṃ pratipadyate / tṛṣṇāmuktāstu ye kecitsvargavāsaṃ labhanti te //
analyzed: tṛṣṇayā ca abhibhūtaḥ tu narakam pratipadyate tṛṣṇā muktāḥ tu ye kecid svarga vāsam labhanti te

original: ātmādhīnaḥ pumāṃlloke sukhī bhavati niścitam / śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaśca tadguṇāḥ //
analyzed: ātma adhīnaḥ pumān loke sukhī bhavati niścitam śabdaḥ sparśaḥ ca rūpam ca rasaḥ gandhaḥ ca tad guṇāḥ

original: tathā ca viṣayādhīno duḥ khī bhavati niścitam //
analyzed: tathā ca viṣaya adhīnaḥ duḥ khī bhavati niścitam

original: kuraṅgamatāṅgapataṅgabhṛṅgamīnā hatāḥ pañcabhireva pañca / ekaḥ pramādī sa kathaṃ na hanyate yaḥ sevate pañcabhireva pañca //
analyzed: kuraṅga matāṅga pataṅga bhṛṅga mīnāḥ hatāḥ pañcabhiḥ eva pañca ekaḥ pramādī sa katham na hanyate yaḥ sevate pañcabhiḥ eva pañca

original: pitṛmātṛmayo bālye yauvane dayitāmayaḥ / putrapautramayaścānte mūḍho nātmamayaḥ kvacit //
analyzed: pitṛ mātṛ mayaḥ bālye yauvane dayitā mayaḥ putra pautra mayaḥ ca ante mūḍhaḥ na ātma mayaḥ kvacid

original: lohadārumayaiḥ pāśaiḥ pumānbaddho vimucyate / putradāramayaiḥ pāśairnaiva baddho vimucyate //
analyzed: loha dāru mayaiḥ pāśaiḥ pumān baddhaḥ vimucyate putra dāra mayaiḥ pāśaiḥ na eva baddhaḥ vimucyate

original: ekaḥ karoti pāpāni phalaṃ bhuṅkte mahājanaḥ / bhoktāro viprayujyante kartā doṣeṇa lipyate //
analyzed: ekaḥ karoti pāpāni phalam bhuṅkte mahājanaḥ bhoktāraḥ viprayujyante kartā doṣeṇa lipyate

original: ko 'pi mṛtyuṃ na jayati bālo vṛddho yuvāpi vā / sukhaduḥ khādiko vāpi punarāyāti yāti ca //
analyzed: mṛtyum na jayati bālaḥ vṛddhaḥ yuvā api vā sukha duḥ kha ādikaḥ vā api punar āyāti yāti ca

original: sarveṣāṃ paśyatāmeva mṛtaḥ sarvaṃ parityajet / ekaḥ prajāyate jantureka eva pralīyate //
analyzed: sarveṣām paśyatām eva mṛtaḥ sarvam parityajet  ekaḥ prajāyate jantuḥ ekaḥ eva pralīyate

original: eko 'pi bhuṅkte sukṛtameka eva ca duṣkṛtam / mṛtaṃ śarīramutsṛjya kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamaṅkṣitau //
analyzed: ekaḥ pi bhuṅkte sukṛtam ekaḥ eva ca duṣkṛtam mṛtam śarīram utsṛjya kāṣṭha loṣṭa samaṅkṣitau

original: bāndhavā vimukhā yānti dharmastamanugacchati / gṛheṣvarthā nivartante śmaśānānmitrabāndhavāḥ //
analyzed: bāndhavāḥ vimukhāḥ yānti dharmaḥ tam anugacchati gṛheṣu arthāḥ nivartante śmaśānāt mitra bāndhavāḥ

original: śarīraṃ vahnirādatte sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vrajet / śarīraṃ vahninā dagdhaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ saha sthitam //
analyzed: śarīram vahniḥ ādatte sukṛtam duṣkṛtam vrajet śarīram vahninā dagdham puṇyam pāpam saha sthitam

original: śubhaṃ vā yadi vā pāpaṃ bhuṅkte sarvatra mānavaḥ / yadanastamite sūrye na dattaṃ dhanamarthinām //
analyzed: śubham vā yadi vā pāpam bhuṅkte sarvatra mānavaḥ yat an astamite sūrye na dattam dhanam arthinām

original: na jāne tasya tadvittaṃ prātaḥ kasya bhaviṣyati / rāraṭīti dhanaṃ tasya ko me bhartā bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: na jāne tasya tat vittam prātar kasya bhaviṣyati rāraṭīti dhanam tasya kaḥ me bhartā bhaviṣyati

original: na dattaṃ dvijamukhyebhyaḥ paropakṛtaye tathā / pūrvajanmakṛtātpuṇyādyallabdhaṃ bahu cālpakam //
analyzed: na dattam dvijamukhyebhyaḥ para upakṛtaye tathā pūrva janma kṛtāt puṇyāt yat labdham bahu ca alpakam

original: tadīdṛśaṃ parijñāya dharmārthe dīyate dhanam / dhanena dhāryate dharmaḥ śraddhāpūtena cetasā //
analyzed: tat īdṛśam parijñāya dharma arthe dīyate dhanam dhanena dhāryate dharmaḥ śraddhā pūtena cetasā

original: śraddhāvirahito dharmo nehāmutra ca tatphalam / dharmācca jāyate hyartho dharmātkāmo 'pi jāyate //
analyzed: śraddhā virahitaḥ dharmaḥ na iha amutra ca tad phalam dharmāt ca jāyate hi arthaḥ dharmāt kāmaḥ jāyate

original: dharma evāpavargāya tasmāddharmaṃ samācaret / śraddhayā sādhyate dharmo bahubhirnārtharāśibhiḥ //
analyzed: dharmaḥ eva apavargāya tasmāt dharmam samācaret  śraddhayā sādhyate dharmaḥ bahubhiḥ na artha rāśibhiḥ

original: akiñcanā hi munayaḥ śraddhāvanto divaṃ gatāḥ / aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapastaptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat / asadityucyate pakṣinpretya ceha na tatphalam //
analyzed: akiñcanāḥ hi munayaḥ śraddhāvantaḥ divam gatāḥ aśraddhayā hutam dattam tapaḥ taptam kṛtam ca yat  asat iti ucyate pakṣin pretya ca iha na tat phalam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakādṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde mṛtasya dharmamātrānuyāyitvanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvādaśo
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde mṛtasya dharmamātrānuyāyitvanirūpaṇam nāma dvādaśaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 13
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / karmaṇā kena deveśa pretatvaṃ naiva jāyate / pṛthivyāṃ sarvajantūnāṃ tad brūhi parameśvara //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca karmaṇā kena deveśa preta tvam na eva jāyate pṛthivyām sarva jantūnām tat brūhi parameśvara

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / atha vakṣyāmi saṃkṣepātkṣayāhādaurdhvadaihikam / kvahastenaiva kartavyaṃ mokṣakāmaistu mānavaiḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca atha vakṣyāmi saṃkṣepāt kṣaya ahāt aurdhvadaihikam  kvahastena eva kartavyam mokṣa kāmaiḥ tu mānavaiḥ

original: strīṇāmapi viśeṣeṇa pañcavarṣādhike śiśau / vṛṣotsargādikaṃ karma pretatvavinivṛttaye / vṛṣotsargādṛte nānyatkiñcidasti mahītale //
analyzed: strīṇām api viśeṣeṇa pañca varṣa adhike śiśau vṛṣotsarga ādikam karma preta tva vinivṛttaye vṛṣotsargāt ṛte na anyat kiñcid asti mahī tale

original: jīvanvāpi mṛto vāpi vṛṣotsargaṃ karoti yaḥ / pretatvaṃ na bhavettasya vinā dānamakhavrataiḥ //
analyzed: jīvan vā api mṛtaḥ vā api vṛṣotsargam karoti yaḥ preta tvam na bhavet tasya vinā dāna makha vrataiḥ

original: garuḍa uvāca / kasminkāle vṛṣotsargaṃ jīvanvāpi mṛto 'pi vā / kuryātsuravaraśreṣṭha brūhi me madhusūdana //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca kasmin kāle vṛṣotsargam jīvan vā api vā  kuryāt sura vara śreṣṭha brūhi me madhusūdana

original: kiṃ phalaṃ tu bhavedante kṛtaiḥ śrāddhaistu ṣoḍaśaiḥ //
analyzed: kim phalam tu bhavet ante kṛtaiḥ śrāddhaiḥ tu ṣoḍaśaiḥ

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / akṛtvā tu vṛṣotsargaṃ kurute piṇḍapātanam / nopatiṣṭhati tacchreyo dātuḥ pretasya niṣphalam //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca  a kṛtvā tu vṛṣotsargam kurute piṇḍapātanam  na upatiṣṭhati tat śreyaḥ dātuḥ pretasya niṣphalam

original: ekādaśāhe pretasya yasya notsṛjyate vṛṣaḥ / pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tasya dattaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi //
analyzed: ekādaśa ahe pretasya yasya nā utsṛjyate vṛṣaḥ preta tvam su sthiram tasya dattaiḥ śrāddha śataiḥ api

original: garuḍa uvāca / sarpāddhi prāptamṛtyūnāmagnidāhādi na kriyā / jalena śṛṅgiṇā vāpi śastrādyairmriyate yadi //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca sarpāt hi prāpta mṛtyūnām agni dāha ādi na kriyā jalena śṛṅgiṇā vā api śastra ādyaiḥ mriyate yadi

original: asanmṛtyumṛtānāṃ ca kathaṃ śuddhirbhavatprabho / etanme saṃśayaṃ deva cchettumarhasyaśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: asat mṛtyu mṛtānām ca katham śuddhiḥ bhavat prabho etat me saṃśayam deva chettum arhasi aśeṣatas

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / ṣaṇmāsairbrāhmaṇaḥ śudhyedyugme sārdhe tu bāhujaḥ / sārdhamāsena vaiśyastu śūdro māsena śudhyati //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca ṣaṣ māsaiḥ brāhmaṇaḥ śudhyet yugme sārdhe tu bāhujaḥ sārdha māsena vaiśyaḥ tu śūdraḥ māsena śudhyati

original: dattvā dānānyaśeṣāṇi sutīrthe mriyate yadi / brahmacārī śucirbhūtvā na sa yātīha durgatim //
analyzed: dattvā dānāni aśeṣāṇi su tīrthe mriyate yadi brahmacārī śuciḥ bhūtvā na sa yāti iha durgatim

original: vṛṣotsargādikaṃ kṛtvā yatidharmaṃ samācaret / yatitve mṛtyumāpnoti sa gacchedbrahmaśākhvatam //
analyzed: vṛṣotsarga ādikam kṛtvā yati dharmam samācaret  yati tve mṛtyum āpnoti sa gacchet brahmaśākhvatam

original: vikarma kurute yastu śiṣṭācāravivarjitaḥ / vṛṣotsargādikaṃ kṛtvā na gacchedyamaśāsanam //
analyzed: vikarma kurute yaḥ tu śiṣṭa ācāra vivarjitaḥ vṛṣotsarga ādikam kṛtvā na gacchet yama śāsanam

original: puttro vā sodaro vāpi pautro bandhujanastathā / gotriṇaścārthabhāgī ca mṛte kuryād vṛṣotsavam //
analyzed: puttraḥ vā sodaraḥ vā api pautraḥ bandhu janaḥ tathā gotriṇaḥ ca artha bhāgī ca mṛte kuryāt vṛṣotsavam

original: putrābhāve tu patnī syāddauhittro duhītāpi vā / puttreṣu vidyamāneṣu vṛṣaṃ nānyena kārayet //
analyzed: putra abhāve tu patnī syāt dauhittraḥ duhītā api vā puttreṣu vidyamāneṣu vṛṣam na anyena kārayet

original: garuḍa uvāca / puttrā yasya na vidyante narā nāryaḥ sureśvara / etanme saṃśayaṃ deva cchetumarhasyaśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca puttrāḥ yasya na vidyante narāḥ nāryaḥ sureśvara etat me saṃśayam deva chetum arhasi aśeṣatas

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / aputtrasya gatirnāsti svargo naiva ca naiva ca / tasmātkenāpyupāyena puttrasya jananaṃ caret //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca aputtrasya gatiḥ nā asti svargaḥ nā eva ca nā eva ca  tasmāt kena api upāyena puttrasya jananam caret

original: yāni kāni ca dānāni svayaṃ dattāni mānavaiḥ / tānitāni ca sarvāṇi tūpatiṣṭhanti cāgrataḥ //
analyzed: yāni kāni ca dānāni svayam dattāni mānavaiḥ tāni tāni ca sarvāṇi tu upatiṣṭhanti ca agratas

original: vyañjanāni vicitrāṇi bhakṣyabhojyāni yāni ca / svahastena pradattāni dehānte cākṣayaṃ phalam //
analyzed: vyañjanāni vicitrāṇi bhakṣya bhojyāni yāni ca sva hastena pradattāni dehānte ca akṣayam phalam

original: gobhūhiraṇyavāsāṃsi bhojanāni pādani ca / yatrayatra vasejjantustatratatropatiṣṭhati //
analyzed: go bhū hiraṇya vāsāṃsi bhojanāni pādani ca  yatra yatra vaset jantuḥ tatra tatra upatiṣṭhati

original: yāvatsvasthaṃ śarīraṃ hi tāvaddharmaṃ samācaret / asvasthaḥ preritaścānyairnākiñcitkartumarhati //
analyzed: yāvat svastham śarīram hi tāvat dharmam samācaret  asvasthaḥ preritaḥ ca anyaiḥ na akiñcitkartum arhati

original: jīvato 'pi mṛtasyeha na bhūtaṃ caurdhvadaihikam / vāyubhūtaḥ kṣudhāviṣṭo bhramate ca divāniśam //
analyzed: jīvataḥ pi mṛtasya iha na bhūtam ca aurdhvadaihikam  vāyu bhūtaḥ kṣudhā āviṣṭaḥ bhramate ca divāniśam

original: kṛmiḥ kīṭaḥ pataṅgo vā jāyate mriyate punaḥ / asadgarbhe bhavetso 'pi jātaḥ sadyo vinaśyati //
analyzed: kṛmiḥ kīṭaḥ pataṅgaḥ vā jāyate mriyate punar asat garbhe bhavet saḥ jātaḥ sadyas vinaśyati

original: yāvatsvasthamidaṃ śarīramarujaṃ yāvajjarā dūrato yāvaccendriyaśaktirapratihatā yāvatkṣayo nāyuṣaḥ / ātmaśreyasi tāvadeva viduṣā kāryaḥ prayatno mahānsandīpte bhavane tu kūpakhananaṃ pratyudyamaḥ kīdṛśaḥ //
analyzed: yāvat svastham idam śarīram arujam yāvat jarā dūratas yāvat ca indriya śaktiḥ apratihatā yāvat kṣayaḥ na āyuṣaḥ ātma śreyasi tāvat eva viduṣā kāryaḥ prayatnaḥ mahān sandīpte bhavane tu kūpa khananam pratyudyamaḥ kīdṛśaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde vṛṣotsargadānadharmaputrādipraśaṃsanaṃ nāma trayodaśo
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde vṛṣotsargadānadharmaputrādipraśaṃsanam nāma trayodaśaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 14
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / ārtena mriyamāṇena yaddattaṃ tatphalaṃ vada / svasthāvasthena dattena vidhihīnena vā vibho //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca  ārtena mriyamāṇena yat dattam tad phalam vada svastha avasthena dattena vidhi hīnena vā vibho

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / ekā gauḥ svasthacittasya hyāturasya ca gośatam / sahasraṃ mriyamāṇasya dattaṃ vittavivarjitam //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca  ekā gauḥ svastha cittasya hi āturasya ca go śatam sahasram mriyamāṇasya dattam vitta vivarjitam

original: mṛtasyaiva punarlakṣaṃ vidhipūtaṃ ca tatsamam / tīrthapātrasamāyogādekā gaurlakṣapuṇyadā //
analyzed: mṛtasya eva punar lakṣam vidhi pūtam ca tat samam tīrtha pātra samāyogāt ekā gauḥ lakṣa puṇya dā

original: pātre datte khagaśreṣṭha ahanyahani vardhate / dāturdānamapāpāya jñānināṃ ca pratigrahaḥ //
analyzed: pātre datte khaga śreṣṭha ahani ahani vardhate dātuḥ dānam apāpāya jñāninām ca pratigrahaḥ

original: viṣaśītāpaho mantravahniḥ kiṃ doṣabhājanam / dātavyaṃ pratyahaṃ pātre nimitteṣu viśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: viṣa śīta apahaḥ mantra vahniḥ kim doṣa bhājanam dātavyam pratyaham pātre nimitteṣu viśeṣataḥ

original: nāpātre viduṣā kiñcidātmanaḥ śreya icchatā / apātre jātu gaurdattā dātāraṃ narakaṃ nayet //
analyzed: na apātre viduṣā kiñcid ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ icchatā apātre jātu gauḥ dattā dātāram narakam nayet

original: kulaikaviṃśatiyutaṃ grahītāraṃ ca pātayet / dehāntaraṃ pariprāpya svahastena kṛtaṃ ca yat //
analyzed: kula ekaviṃśati yutam grahītāram ca pātayet deha antaram pariprāpya sva hastena kṛtam ca yat

original: dhanaṃ bhūmigataṃ yadvatsvahastena niveśitam / tadvatphalamavāpnoti hyahaṃ vacmi khageśvara //
analyzed: dhanam bhūmi gatam yadvat sva hastena niveśitam tadvat phalam avāpnoti hi aham vacmi khageśvara

original: aputro 'pi viśeṣeṇa kriyāṃ caivāndhvadauhikīm / prakuryānmokṣakāmaśca nirdhanaśca viśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: aputraḥ viśeṣeṇa kriyām ca eva andhvadauhikīm prakuryāt mokṣa kāmaḥ ca nirdhanaḥ ca viśeṣataḥ

original: svalpenāpi hi vittena svayaṃ hastena yatkṛtam / akṣayaṃ yāti tatsarvaṃ yathājyaṃ ca hutāśane //
analyzed: su alpena api hi vittena svayam hastena yat kṛtam akṣayam yāti tat sarvam yathā ājyam ca hutāśane

original: ekā caikasya dātavyā śayyā kanyā payasvinī / sā vikrītā vā dahatyāsaptamaṃ kulam //
analyzed: ekā ca ekasya dātavyā śayyā kanyā payasvinī sā vikrītā vā dahati āsaptamam kulam

original: tasmātsarvaṃ prakurvīta cañcale jīvite sati / gṛhītadānapātheyaḥ sukhaṃ yāti mahādhvani //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvam prakurvīta cañcale jīvite sati gṛhīta dāna pātheyaḥ sukham yāti mahā adhvani

original: anyathā kliśyate jantuḥ pātheyarahitaḥ pathi / evaṃ jñātvā khagaśreṣṭha vṛṣayajñaṃ samācaret //
analyzed: anyathā kliśyate jantuḥ pātheya rahitaḥ pathi  evam jñātvā khaga śreṣṭha vṛṣa yajñam samācaret

original: akṛtvā mriyate yastu aputro naiva muktibhāk / aputro 'pi hi yaḥ kuryātsukhaṃ yāti mahāpathe //
analyzed: a kṛtvā mriyate yaḥ tu aputraḥ na eva mukti bhāj hi yaḥ kuryāt sukham yāti mahāpathe

original: agnihotrādhibhiryajñairdānaiśca vividhairapi / na tāṃ gatimavāpnoti vṛṣotsargeṇa yā gatiḥ //
analyzed: agnihotra ādhibhiḥ yajñaiḥ dānaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ api na tām gatim avāpnoti vṛṣotsargeṇa yā gatiḥ

original: yajñānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ vṛṣayajñastathottamaḥ / tasmātsarvaprayatnena vṛṣayajñaṃ samācaret //
analyzed: yajñānām ca eva sarveṣām vṛṣa yajñaḥ tathā uttamaḥ tasmāt sarva prayatnena vṛṣa yajñam samācaret

original: garuḍa uvāca / kathayasva prasādena kṣayāhaṃ caurdhvadaihikam / kasminkāle tithau kasyāṃ vidhinā kena tadbhavet //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca kathayasva prasādena kṣaya aham ca aurdhvadaihikam kasmin kāle tithau kasyām vidhinā kena tat bhavet

original: kṛtvā kiṃ phalamāpnoti etanme vada sāmpratam / tvatprasādena govinda mukte bhavati mānavaḥ //
analyzed: kṛtvā kim phalam āpnoti etat me vada sāmpratam tvad prasādena govinda mukte bhavati mānavaḥ

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / kārtikādiṣu māseṣu yāmyāyatagate ravau / śuklapakṣe tathā pakṣindvādaśyāditithau śubhe //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca kārtika ādiṣu māseṣu yāmya āyata gate ravau śukla pakṣe tathā śubhe

original: śubhe lagne muhūrte vā śucau deśe samāhitaḥ / brāhmaṇaṃ tu samāhūya vidhijñaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: śubhe lagne muhūrte vā śucau deśe samāhitaḥ brāhmaṇam tu samāhūya vidhi jñam śubha lakṣaṇam

original: japahomaistathā dānaiḥ kuryāddahesya śodhanam / puṇye 'bhijitsunakṣatre grahāndevānsamarcayet //
analyzed: japa homaiḥ tathā dānaiḥ kuryāt dahesya śodhanam  puṇye bhijit su nakṣatre grahān devān samarcayet

original: homaṃ kuryādyathāśakti mantraiśca vividhairapi / grahāṇāṃ sthāpanaṃ kuryātpūrvaṃ caiva khageśvara //
analyzed: homam kuryāt yathāśakti mantraiḥ ca vividhaiḥ api grahāṇām sthāpanam kuryāt pūrvam ca eva khageśvara

original: mātṝṇāṃ pūjanaṃ kāryaṃ vasordhārāṃ ca pātayet / vahniṃ saṃsthāpya tatraiva pūrṇaṃ homaṃ tu kārayet //
analyzed: mātṝṇām pūjanam kāryam vasordhārām ca pātayet vahnim saṃsthāpya tatra eva pūrṇam homam tu kārayet

original: śālagrāmaṃ ca saṃsthāpya vaiṣṇavaṃ śrāddhamācaret / vṛṣaṃ sampūjya tatraiva vastrālaṅkārabhūṣaṇaiḥ //
analyzed: śālagrāmam ca saṃsthāpya vaiṣṇavam śrāddham ācaret vṛṣam sampūjya tatra eva vastra alaṅkāra bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: catasro vatsataryaśca pūrvaṃ samadhivāsayet / pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ kuryāddhomānte ca visarjanam //
analyzed: catasraḥ vatsataryaḥ ca pūrvam samadhivāsayet pradakṣiṇam tatas kuryāt homa ante ca visarjanam

original: imaṃ mantraṃ samuccārya uttarābhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ / dharma tvaṃ vṛṣarūpeṇa brahmaṇā nirmitaḥ purā //
analyzed: imam mantram samuccārya uttara abhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ dharma tvam vṛṣa rūpeṇa brahmaṇā nirmitaḥ purā

original: tavotsargaprabhāvānmāmuddharasvabhavārṇāvāt / abiṣicya śubhairmantraiḥ pāvanairvidhipūrvakam //
analyzed: tava utsarga prabhāvāt mām uddhara sva bhava arṇāvāt

original: tanakrīḍantimantreṇa vṛṣotsargaṃ tu kārayet / abhiṣiñcettato nīlaṃ rudrakumbho dakena tu //
analyzed: tana krīḍanti mantreṇa vṛṣotsargam tu kārayet abhiṣiñcet tatas nīlam rudra kumbhaḥ dakena tu

original: nābhimūle samāsthāya tadambu mūrdhani nyaset / anna (ātma) śrāddhaṃ tataḥ kuryāddadyāddānaṃ dvijottame //
analyzed: nābhimūle samāsthāya tad ambu mūrdhani nyaset anna ātma śrāddham tatas kuryāt dadyāt dānam dvijottame

original: udakecaiva gantavyaṃ jalaṃ tatra pradāpayet / yadiṣṭaṃ jīvatastvāsīttacca dadyātsvaśaktitaḥ //
analyzed: udake ca eva gantavyam jalam tatra pradāpayet yat iṣṭam jīvataḥ tu āsīt tat ca dadyāt sva śaktitaḥ

original: nyūnaṃ saṃpūrṇatāṃ yāti vṛṣotsarge kṛte sati / sutṛpto dustare mārge mṛto yāti na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: nyūnam saṃpūrṇa tām yāti vṛṣotsarge kṛte sati su tṛptaḥ dustare mārge mṛtaḥ yāti na saṃśayaḥ

original: yamalokaṃ na paśyanti sadā dānaratā narāḥ / yāvanna dīyate jantoḥ śrāddhaṃ caikādaśāhikam //
analyzed: yama lokam na paśyanti sadā dāna ratāḥ narāḥ yāvat na dīyate jantoḥ śrāddham ca aikādaśāhikam

original: svadattaṃ paradattaṃ vā nehāmutropatiṣṭhati / trayodaśā tathā sapta pañca trīṇī krameṇa tu //
analyzed: sva dattam para dattam vā na iha amutra upatiṣṭhati trayodaśā tathā sapta pañca trīṇī krameṇa tu

original: padadānāni kurvīta śraddhābhaktisamanvitaḥ / tilapātrāṇi kurvīta sapta pañca yathākramam //
analyzed: padadānāni kurvīta śraddhā bhakti samanvitaḥ tila pātrāṇi kurvīta sapta pañca yathākramam

original: brāhmaṇān bhojayetpaścādekāṃ gāṃ ca pradāpayet / vṛṣaṃ hi śannodevīti vedoktavidhinā tataḥ //
analyzed: brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt ekām gām ca pradāpayet vṛṣam hi veda ukta vidhinā tatas

original: catasṛbhirvatsatarībhiḥ pariṇayanamācaret / vāme cakraṃ pradātavyaṃ triśūlaṃ dakṣiṇe tathā //
analyzed: catasṛbhiḥ vatsatarībhiḥ pariṇayanam ācaret  vāme cakram pradātavyam triśūlam dakṣiṇe tathā

original: mūlyaṃ dadyād vṛṣasyāpi taṃ vṛṣaṃ ca visarjayet / ekoddiṣṭavidhānena svāhākāreṇa vuddhimān //
analyzed: mūlyam dadyāt vṛṣasya api tam vṛṣam ca visarjayet ekoddiṣṭa vidhānena svāhākāreṇa vuddhimān

original: kuryādekādaśāhaṃ ca dvādaśāhaṃ ca yatnataḥ / sapiṇḍīkaraṇādarvākkuryācchrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa //
analyzed: kuryāt ekādaśa aham ca dvādaśa aham ca yatnataḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇāt arvāk kuryāt śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa

original: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu padadānāni dāpayet / kāposopari saṃsthāpya tāmrapātre tathācyutam //
analyzed: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu padadānāni dāpayet kāposa upari saṃsthāpya tāmra pātre tathā acyutam

original: vastreṇācchādya tatrasthamarghaṃ dadyācchubhaiḥ phalaiḥ / nāvamikṣumayīṃ kṛtvā paṭṭasūtreṇa veṣṭayet //
analyzed: vastreṇa ācchādya tatrastham argham dadyāt śubhaiḥ phalaiḥ nāvam ikṣu mayīm kṛtvā paṭṭasūtreṇa veṣṭayet

original: kāṃsyapātre ghṛtaṃ sthāpya vaitaraṇyā nimittataḥ / nāvārohaṇaṃ kuryātpūjayedgaruḍadhvajam //
analyzed: kāṃsya pātre ghṛtam sthāpya vaitaraṇyāḥ nimittataḥ nāvārohaṇam kuryāt pūjayet garuḍadhvajam

original: ātmavittānusāreṇa tacca dānamanantakam / bhavasāgaramagnānāṃ śokatāpārtiduḥ khinām //
analyzed: ātma vitta anusāreṇa tat ca dānam anantakam bhava sāgara magnānām śoka tāpa ārti duḥ khinām

original: dharmaplavavihīnānāṃ tārako hi janārdanaḥ / tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā //
analyzed: dharma plava vihīnānām tārakaḥ hi janārdanaḥ  tilāḥ loham hiraṇyam ca kārpāsam lavaṇam tathā

original: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāvo hyekaikaṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam / tilapātrāṇi kurvīta śayyādānaṃ ca dāpayet //
analyzed: saptadhānyam kṣitiḥ gāvaḥ hi ekaikam pāvanam smṛtam tila pātrāṇi kurvīta śayyā dānam ca dāpayet

original: dīnānāthaviśiṣṭebhyo dadyācchaktyā ca dakṣiṇām / evaṃ yaḥ kurute tārkṣya putravānapyaputravān //
analyzed: dīna anātha viśiṣṭebhyaḥ dadyāt śaktyā ca dakṣiṇām evam yaḥ kurute tārkṣya putravān api aputravān

original: sa siddhiṃ samavāpnoti yathā te brahmacāriṇaḥ / nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kuryādyāvajjīvati mānavaḥ //
analyzed: sa siddhim samavāpnoti yathā te brahmacāriṇaḥ nityam naimittikam kuryāt yāvat jīvati mānavaḥ

original: yaḥ kaścitkriyate dharmastatphalaṃ cākṣayaṃ bhavet / tīrthayātrāvratādīnāṃ śrāddhaṃ saṃvatsarasya hi //
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid kriyate dharmaḥ tad phalam ca akṣayam bhavet tīrtha yātrā vrata ādīnām śrāddham saṃvatsarasya hi

original: devatānāṃ gurūṇāṃ ca mātāpitrostathaiva ca / puṇyaṃ deyaṃ prayatnena pratyahaṃ vardhate khaga //
analyzed: devatānām gurūṇām ca mātā pitroḥ tathā eva ca puṇyam deyam prayatnena pratyaham vardhate khaga

original: asminyajñeḥ hiyaḥ kaścidbhūridānaṃ prayacchati / tattasya cākṣayaṃ sarvaṃ vedikāyāṃ yathā kila //
analyzed: asmin kaścid bhūri dānam prayacchati tat tasya ca akṣayam sarvam vedikāyām yathā kila

original: yathā pūjyatamā loke yatayo brahmacāriṇaḥ / tathaiva pratipūjyante loke sarve ca nityaśaḥ //
analyzed: yathā pūjyatamāḥ loke yatayaḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ tathā eva pratipūjyante loke sarve ca nityaśas

original: varado 'haṃ sadā tasya caturvaktrastathā haraḥ / te yānti paramāṃllokāniti satyaṃ vaco mama //
analyzed: vara daḥ ham sadā tasya caturvaktraḥ tathā haraḥ te yānti paramān lokān iti satyam vacaḥ mama

original: utsṛṣṭo vṛṣabho yatra pibatyapo jalāśaye / śṛṅgeṇālikhate vāpi bhūmiṃ nityaṃ praharṣitaḥ //
analyzed: utsṛṣṭaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ yatra pibati apaḥ jalāśaye  śṛṅgeṇa ālikhate vā api bhūmim nityam praharṣitaḥ

original: pitṝṇāmannapānaṃ ca prabhūtamupatiṣṭhati / paurṇamāsyāmamāyāṃ vā tilapātrāṇi dāpayet //
analyzed: pitṝṇām anna pānam ca prabhūtam upatiṣṭhati paurṇamāsyām amāyām vā tila pātrāṇi dāpayet

original: saṃkrāntīnāṃ sahasrāṇi sūryaparvaśatāni ca / dattvā yatphalamāpnoti tadvai nīlavisarjane //
analyzed: saṃkrāntīnām sahasrāṇi sūryaparva śatāni ca dattvā yat phalam āpnoti tat vai nīla visarjane

original: vatsataryaḥ pradātavyā brāhmaṇebhyaḥ padāni ca / tilapātrāṇi deyāni śivabhaktadvijeṣu ca //
analyzed: vatsataryaḥ pradātavyāḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ padāni ca tila pātrāṇi deyāni śiva bhakta dvijeṣu ca

original: umāmaheśvaraṃ caikaṃ paridhāpya pridāpayet / atasīpuṣpasaṅkāśaṃ pītavāsasamacyutam //
analyzed: umāmaheśvaram ca ekam paridhāpya atasī puṣpa saṅkāśam pīta vāsasam acyutam

original: ye namasyanti govindaṃ na teṣāṃ vidyate bhayam / pretatvānmokṣamicchanto ye kariṣyanti satkriyām //
analyzed: ye namasyanti govindam na teṣām vidyate bhayam preta tvāt mokṣam icchantaḥ ye kariṣyanti satkriyām

original: yāsyanti te parāṃllokāniti satyaṃ vaco mama / etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ mayā caivordhvadaihikam //
analyzed: yāsyanti te parān lokān iti satyam vacaḥ mama etat te sarvam ākhyātam mayā ca eva ūrdhvadaihikam

original: yacchrutvā sarvapāpebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ / śrutvā mahātmyamatulaṃ garuḍo harṣamāgataḥ / mānuṣāṇāṃ hitārthāya punaḥ prapacchakeśavam //
analyzed: yat śrutvā sarva pāpebhyaḥ mucyate na atra saṃśayaḥ  śrutvā mahātmyam atulam garuḍaḥ harṣam āgataḥ mānuṣāṇām hita arthāya punar prapaccha keśavam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde godānavṛṣotsargadaśadānabhūridānādinirūpaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde go dāna vṛṣotsarga daśa dāna bhūri dāna ādi nirūpaṇam

original: nāma caturdaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nāma caturdaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 15
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / bagavanbrūhi me sarvaṃ yamalokasya nirṇayam / jantoḥ prayāṇamārabhya māhātmyaṃ vartmavistaram //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca bagavan brūhi me sarvam yama lokasya nirṇayam jantoḥ prayāṇam ārabhya māhātmyam vartma vistaram

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / śṛṇu tārkṣya pravakṣyāmi yamamārgasya nirṇayam / prayāṇakāni sarvāṇi nagarāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca  śṛṇu tārkṣya pravakṣyāmi yama mārgasya nirṇayam prayāṇakāni sarvāṇi nagarāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa

original: ṣāḍaśītisahasrāṇi yojanānāṃ pramāṇataḥ / yamalokasya cordhvaṃ vai antarā mānuṣasya ca //
analyzed: ṣāḍaśīti sahasrāṇi yojanānām pramāṇataḥ yama lokasya ca ūrdhvam vai antarā mānuṣasya ca

original: kukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vāpi bhuktvā loke yathārjitam / karmayogādyadā kaścidvyādhirutpadyate khaga //
analyzed: kukṛtam duṣkṛtam vā api bhuktvā loke yathā arjitam karma yogāt yadā kaścid vyādhiḥ utpadyate khaga

original: nimittamātraṃ sarveṣāṃ kṛtakarmānusārataḥ / yasya yo vihito mṛtyuḥ sa taṃ dhruvamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: nimitta mātram sarveṣām kṛta karma anusārataḥ yasya yaḥ vihitaḥ mṛtyuḥ sa tam dhruvam avāpnuyāt

original: karmayogādyadā dehī muñcatyatra nijaṃ vapuḥ / tadā bhūmigataṃ kuryādgomayenopalipya ca //
analyzed: karma yogāt yadā dehī muñcati atra nijam vapuḥ tadā bhūmi gatam kuryāt gomayena upalipya ca

original: tilāndarbhānvikīryātha mukhe svarṇaṃ viniḥ kṣipet / tulasīṃsannidhau kṛtvā śālagrāmaśilāṃ tathā //
analyzed: tilān darbhān vikīrya atha mukhe svarṇam viniḥ kṣipet tulasīm sannidhau kṛtvā śālagrāma śilām tathā

original: setu (evaṃ) sāmādisūktaistu maraṇaṃ muktidāyakam / śalākāsvarṇavikṣapaiḥ prataprāṇigṛheṣuca //
analyzed: evam sāma ādi sūktaiḥ tu maraṇam mukti dāyakam śalākā svarṇa vikṣapaiḥ

original: ekā vaktre tu dātavyā ghrāṇayugme tathā punaḥ / akṣṇośca karṇayoścaiva dvedve deye yathākramam //
analyzed: ekā vaktre tu dātavyā ghrāṇa yugme tathā punar akṣṇoḥ ca karṇayoḥ ca eva dve dve deye yathākramam

original: atha liṅge tathā caikā tvekāṃ brahmāṇḍakekṣipet / karayugme ca kaṇṭhe ca tulasīṃ ca pradāpayet //
analyzed: atha liṅge tathā ca ekā tu ekām brahmāṇḍaka īkṣipet kara yugme ca kaṇṭhe ca tulasīm ca pradāpayet

original: vastrayugmaṃ ca dātavyaṃ kaṅkumaiścākṣatairyajet / puṣpamālāyutaṃ kuryādanyadvāreṇa sannayet //
analyzed: vastra yugmam ca dātavyam kaṅkumaiḥ ca akṣataiḥ yajet puṣpa mālā yutam kuryāt anya dvāreṇa san nayet

original: putrastu bāndhavaiḥ sārdhaṃ viprastu puravāsibhiḥ / pituḥ pretaṃ svayaṃ putraḥ skandhamāropya bāndhavaiḥ //
analyzed: putraḥ tu bāndhavaiḥ sārdham vipraḥ tu pura vāsibhiḥ pituḥ pretam svayam putraḥ skandham āropya bāndhavaiḥ

original: gatvā śmaśānadeśe tu prāḍmukhaścottarāmukham / adagdhapūrvā yā bhūmiścitāṃ tatraiva kārayet //
analyzed: gatvā śmaśāna deśe tu prāc mukhaḥ ca uttarā mukham a dagdha pūrvā yā bhūmiḥ citām tatra eva kārayet

original: śrīkhaṇḍatulasīkāṣṭhasamitpālāśasaṃbhṛtām / vikalendriyasaṅghāte caitanye jaḍatāṃ gate //
analyzed: śrīkhaṇḍa tulasī kāṣṭha samidh pālāśa saṃbhṛtām vikala indriya saṅghāte caitanye jaḍa tām gate

original: pracalanti tataḥ prāṇā yāmyairnikaṭavartibhiḥ / ekībhūtaṃ jagatpaśyeddaivī dṛṣṭiḥ prajāyate //
analyzed: pracalanti tatas prāṇāḥ yāmyaiḥ nikaṭa vartibhiḥ  ekībhūtam jagat paśyet daivī dṛṣṭiḥ prajāyate

original: bībhatsaṃ dāruṇaṃ rūpaṃ praṇaiḥ kaṇṭhaṃ samāśritaiḥ / phenamudgirate kopi mukhaṃ lālākulaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: bībhatsam dāruṇam rūpam kaṇṭham samāśritaiḥ phenam udgirate kopi mukham lālā ākulam bhavet

original: durātmānaśca tāḍyante kiṅkaraiḥ pāśabandhanaiḥ / sukhena kṛtinastatra nīyante nākanāyakaiḥ //
analyzed: durātmānaḥ ca tāḍyante kiṅkaraiḥ pāśa bandhanaiḥ sukhena kṛtinaḥ tatra nīyante nāka nāyakaiḥ

original: duḥ khena pāpino yānti yamamārge ca durgame / yamaścaturbhujo bhūtvā śaṅkhacakragadādibhṛt //
analyzed: duḥ khena pāpinaḥ yānti yama mārge ca durgame yamaḥ catur bhujaḥ bhūtvā śaṅkha cakra gadā ādi bhṛt

original: puṇyakarmaratānsamyak śubhānmitravadācaret / āhūya pāpinaḥ sarvānyamo daṇḍena rajjayet //
analyzed: puṇya karma ratān samyak śubhān mitra vat ācaret  āhūya pāpinaḥ sarvān yamaḥ daṇḍena rajjayet

original: pralayāmbudanirghoṣastvañjanādrisamaprabhaḥ / mahiṣastho durārādhyo vidyuttejaḥ samadyutiḥ //
analyzed: pralaya ambuda nirghoṣaḥ tu añjana adri sama prabhaḥ mahiṣa sthaḥ durārādhyaḥ vidyut tejaḥ sama dyutiḥ

original: yojanatrayavistāradeho raudro 'tibhīṣaṇaḥ / lohadaṇḍadharo bhīmaḥ pāśapāṇirdurākṛtiḥ //
analyzed: yojana traya vistāra dehaḥ raudraḥ ti bhīṣaṇaḥ loha daṇḍa dharaḥ bhīmaḥ pāśa pāṇiḥ durākṛtiḥ

original: vakranetro 'tibhayado darśanaṃ yāti pāpinām / aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo hāhā kurvan kalevarāt //
analyzed: vakra netraḥ ti bhaya daḥ darśanam yāti pāpinām aṅguṣṭha mātraḥ puruṣaḥ hāhā kurvan kalevarāt

original: tadaiva nīyate dūtairyāmyairvokṣansvakaṃ gṛham / nirviceṣṭaṃ śarīraṃ tu prāṇairmuktaṃ jugupsitam //
analyzed: tadā eva nīyate dūtaiḥ yāmyaiḥ vā ukṣan svakam gṛham nirviceṣṭam śarīram tu prāṇaiḥ muktam jugupsitam

original: aspṛśyaṃ jāyate tūrṇaṃ durgandhaṃ sarvaninditam / tridhāvasthā hi dehasya kṛmiviḍmasmasaṃjñitā //
analyzed: aspṛśyam jāyate tūrṇam durgandham sarva ninditam tridhā avasthā hi dehasya kṛmi viṣ masma saṃjñitā

original: ko garvaḥ kriyate tārkṣya kṣaṇavidhvaṃsibhirnaraiḥ / dānaṃ vittādṛtā vācaḥ kīrtidharmau tathāyuṣaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ garvaḥ kriyate tārkṣya kṣaṇa vidhvaṃsibhiḥ naraiḥ dānam vitta ādṛtāḥ vācaḥ kīrti dharmau tathā āyuṣaḥ

original: paropakaraṇaṃ kāyādasataḥ sāramuddhṛtam / tasyaivaṃ nīyamānasya dūtāḥ santarjayanti hi //
analyzed: para upakaraṇam kāyāt asataḥ sāram uddhṛtam tasya evam nīyamānasya dūtāḥ santarjayanti hi

original: darśayanto bhayaṃ tīvraṃ narakāya punaḥ punaḥ / śīghraṃ pracala duṣṭātman gato 'sitvaṃ yamālaye //
analyzed: darśayantaḥ bhayam tīvram narakāya punar punar  śīghram pracala duṣṭa ātman gataḥ si tvam yama ālaye

original: kuṃbhīpākādinarakāṃstvāṃ neṣyāmaśca mā ciram / evaṃ vācastadā śṛṇvanbandhūnāṃ ruditaṃ tathā //
analyzed: kuṃbhīpāka ādi narakān tvām neṣyāmaḥ ca mā ciram evam vācaḥ tadā śṛṇvan bandhūnām ruditam tathā

original: uccairhāheti vilapannīyate yamakiṅkaraiḥ / sthāne śrāddhaṃ prakurvīta tathā cekādaśe 'hani //
analyzed: uccais hāhā iti vilapan nīyate yama kiṅkaraiḥ sthāne śrāddham prakurvīta tathā ca ikādaśe hani

original: mṛsyotkrāntisamayātṣaṭ piṇḍānkramaśo dadet / mṛtasthāne tathā dvāre catvare tārkṣya kāraṇāt //
analyzed: mṛsya utkrānti samayāt ṣaṭ piṇḍān kramaśas dadet mṛta sthāne tathā dvāre catvare tārkṣya kāraṇāt

original: viśrāme kāṣṭhacayane tathā sañcayane ca ṣaṭ / śṛṇu tatkāraṇaṃ tārkṣya ṣaṭ piṇḍaparikalpane //
analyzed: viśrāme kāṣṭha cayane tathā sañcayane ca ṣaṣ śṛṇu tad kāraṇam tārkṣya ṣaṣ piṇḍa parikalpane

original: mṛtasthāne śavo nāma tena nāmnā pradīyate / tena dattena tṛpyanti gṛhavāstvadhidevatāḥ //
analyzed: mṛtasthāne śavaḥ nāma tena nāmnā pradīyate tena dattena tṛpyanti gṛha vāstu adhidevatāḥ

original: tena bhūmirbhavettuṣṭātadadhiṣṭhātṛdevatā / dvāre tu piṇḍaṃ deyaṃ ca pānthamityabhidhāya tu //
analyzed: tena bhūmiḥ bhavet tuṣṭā tad adhiṣṭhātṛ devatā dvāre tu piṇḍam deyam ca pāntham iti abhidhāya tu

original: dattena tena prīṇanti dvārasthā gṛhadevatāḥ / catvare khecaro nāma tamuddiśya pradāpayet //
analyzed: dattena tena prīṇanti dvāra sthāḥ gṛha devatāḥ catvare khecaraḥ nāma tam uddiśya pradāpayet

original: na copaghātaṃ kurvanti bhūtādyā devayonayaḥ / viśrāme bhūtasaṃjño 'yaṃ tena tatra pradāpayet //
analyzed: na ca upaghātam kurvanti bhūta ādyāḥ devayonayaḥ viśrāme bhūta saṃjñaḥ yam tena tatra pradāpayet

original: piśācā rākṣasā yakṣā ye cānye diśi vāsinaḥ / tasya hotavyadehasyanaivāyogyatvakārakāḥ //
analyzed: piśācāḥ rākṣasāḥ yakṣāḥ ye ca anye diśi vāsinaḥ tasya

original: citāpiṇḍhaprabhṛtitaḥ pretatvamupajāyate / citāyāṃ sādhakaṃ nāma vadantyeke khageśvara //
analyzed: citā piṇḍha prabhṛtitas preta tvam upajāyate citāyām sādhakam nāma vadanti eke khageśvara

original: kecittaṃ pretamevāhuryathā kalpavido budhāḥ / tadādi tatratatrāpi pretanāmnā pradīyate //
analyzed: kecid tam pretam eva āhuḥ yathā kalpa vidaḥ budhāḥ tad ādi tatra tatra api preta nāmnā pradīyate

original: ityevaṃ pañcabhiḥ piṇḍaiḥ śavasyāhutiyogyatā / anyathā copaghātāya pūrvoktāste bhavanti hi //
analyzed: iti evam pañcabhiḥ piṇḍaiḥ śavasya āhuti yogyatā anyathā ca upaghātāya pūrva uktāḥ te bhavanti hi

original: utkrāme prathamaṃ piṇḍaṃ tathā cārdhapayepi ca / citāyāṃ tu tṛtīyaṃ syāttrayaḥ piṇḍāśca kalpitāḥ //
analyzed: utkrāme prathamam piṇḍam tathā ca citāyām tu tṛtīyam syāt trayaḥ piṇḍāḥ ca kalpitāḥ

original: vidhātā prathame piṇḍe dvitīye garuḍadhvajaḥ / tṛtīye yamadūtāśca prayogaḥ parikīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: vidhātā prathame piṇḍe dvitīye garuḍadhvajaḥ tṛtīye yamadūtāḥ ca prayogaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: datte tṛtīye piṇḍe 'smindehadoṣaiḥ pramucyate / ādhārabhūtajīvaścajvalanairjvālayeccitām //
analyzed: datte tṛtīye piṇḍe smin deha doṣaiḥ pramucyate  ādhāra bhūta jīvaḥ ca jvalanaiḥ jvālayet citām

original: saṃmṛjya copalipyātha ullikhyoddhṛtya vedikām / abhyukṣyopasamādhāya vahniṃ tatraḥ vidhānataḥ //
analyzed: saṃmṛjya ca upalipya atha ullikhya uddhṛtya vedikām abhyukṣya upasamādhāya vahnim tatras vidhānataḥ

original: puṣpākṣataiśca sampūjya devaṃ kravyādasaṃjñakam / tvaṃ bhūtakṛjjagadyone tvaṃ lokaparipālakaḥ //
analyzed: puṣpa akṣataiḥ ca sampūjya devam kravyāda saṃjñakam tvam bhūta kṛt jagat yone tvam loka paripālakaḥ

original: upasaṃhārakastasmādenaṃ svargaṃ mṛtaṃ naya / iti kravyādamabhyarcya śarīrāhutimācaret //
analyzed: upasaṃhārakaḥ tasmāt enam svargam mṛtam naya iti kravyādam abhyarcya śarīra āhutim ācaret

original: ardhadagdhe tathā dehe dadyādājyāhutiṃ tataḥ / lomabhyaḥ svotivākyena kuryāddhomaṃ yathāvidhi //
analyzed: ardha dagdhe tathā dehe dadyāt ājya āhutim tatas  lomabhyaḥ svoti vākyena kuryāt homam yathāvidhi

original: citāmāropya taṃ pretaṃ hunedājyāhutiṃ tataḥ / yamāya cāntakāyeti mṛtyave brahmaṇe tathā //
analyzed: citām āropya tam pretam hunet ājya āhutim tatas  yamāya ca antakāya iti mṛtyave brahmaṇe tathā

original: jātavedomuke deyā ekā pretamukhe tathā / ūrdhvaṃ tu jvālayedvahniṃ pūrvabhāge citāṃ punaḥ //
analyzed: jātavedaḥ muke deyā ekā preta mukhe tathā  ūrdhvam tu jvālayet vahnim pūrva bhāge citām punar

original: asmāttvamadhijātosi tvadayaṃ jāyatāṃ punaḥ / asau svargāya lokāya svāhā jvalati pāvakaḥ //
analyzed: asmāt tvam adhijātaḥ asi tvat ayam jāyatām punar asau svargāya lokāya svāhā jvalati pāvakaḥ

original: evamājyāhutiṃ dattvā tilamiśrāṃ samantrakām / tato dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ putreṇa kila niścitam //
analyzed: evam ājya āhutim dattvā tila miśrām sa mantrakām tatas dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ putreṇa kila niścitam

original: roditavyaṃ tato gāḍhamevaṃ tasya sukhaṃ bhavet / dāhasyānantaraṃ tatra kṛtvā sañcayanakriyām //
analyzed: roditavyam tatas gāḍham evam tasya sukham bhavet dāhasya anantaram tatra kṛtvā sañcayana kriyām

original: pretapiṇḍaṃ pradadyācca dāhārtiśamanaṃ khaga / tāvadbhūtāḥ pratīkṣante taṃ pretaṃ bāndhavārthinam //
analyzed: preta piṇḍam pradadyāt ca dāha ārti śamanam khaga tāvat bhūtāḥ pratīkṣante tam pretam bāndhava arthinam

original: dāhasyānantaraṃ kāryaṃ putraiḥ snānaṃ sacailakam / tilodakaṃ tato dadyānnāmagotreṇa tiṣṭhatu //
analyzed: dāhasya anantaram kāryam putraiḥ snānam sa cailakam tila udakam tatas dadyāt nāma gotreṇa tiṣṭhatu

original: tato janapadaiḥ sarvairdātavyā karatālikā / viṣṇurviṣṇuriti brūyādguṇaiḥ pretamudīrayet //
analyzed: tatas janapadaiḥ sarvaiḥ dātavyā karatālikā viṣṇuḥ viṣṇuḥ iti brūyāt guṇaiḥ pretam udīrayet

original: janāḥ sarve samāstasya gṛhamāgatya sarvaśaḥ / dvārasya dakṣiṇe bhāge gomayaṃ gaurasarṣapān //
analyzed: janāḥ sarve samāḥ tasya gṛham āgatya sarvaśas dvārasya dakṣiṇe bhāge gomayam gaurasarṣapān

original: nidhāya varuṇaṃ devamantardhāya svaveśmani / bhakṣayennimbapatrāṇi ghṛtaṃ prāśya gṛhaṃ vrajet //
analyzed: nidhāya varuṇam devam antardhāya sva veśmani bhakṣayet nimba patrāṇi ghṛtam prāśya gṛham vrajet

original: keciddugdhena siñcanti citāsthānaṃ khageśvara / aśrupātaṃ na kurvīta dadyādasmai jalāñjalīn //
analyzed: kecid dugdhena siñcanti citā sthānam khageśvara aśru pātam na kurvīta dadyāt asmai jala añjalīn

original: śleṣmāśru bāndhavairmuktaṃ preto bhuṅkte yato 'vaśaḥ / ato na roditavyaṃ hi kriyāḥ kāryāḥ svaśaktitaḥ //
analyzed: śleṣma aśru bāndhavaiḥ muktam pretaḥ bhuṅkte yatas vaśaḥ atas na roditavyam hi kriyāḥ kāryāḥ sva śaktitaḥ

original: dugdhaṃ ca mṛnmaye pātre toyaṃ dadyāddinatrayam / sūrye cāstaṃ gate tārkṣya valabhyāṃ catvare 'pi vā //
analyzed: dugdham ca mṛd maye pātre toyam dadyāt dina trayam sūrye ca astam gate tārkṣya valabhyām catvare vā

original: baddhaḥ saṃmūḍhahṛdayo dehamicchankṛtānugaḥ / śmaśānaṃ catvaraṃ gehaṃ vīkṣanyāmyaiḥ sa nīyate //
analyzed: baddhaḥ saṃmūḍha hṛdayaḥ deham icchan kṛta anugaḥ śmaśānam catvaram geham vīkṣan yāmyaiḥ sa nīyate

original: garte piṇḍā daśāhaṃ ca dātavyāśca dinedine / jalāñjalīḥ pradātavyāḥ pretamuddiśya nityaśaḥ //
analyzed: garte piṇḍāḥ daśa aham ca dātavyāḥ ca dine dine jala añjalīḥ pradātavyāḥ pretam uddiśya nityaśas

original: tāvadvṛddhiśca kartavyā yāvatpiṇḍaṃ daśāhikam / puttreṇa hi kriyā kāryā bhāryayā tadabhāvataḥ //
analyzed: tāvat vṛddhiḥ ca kartavyā yāvat piṇḍam daśāhikam  puttreṇa hi kriyā kāryā bhāryayā tad abhāvataḥ

original: tadabhāve ca śiṣyeṇa tadabhāve sahodaraḥ / śmaśāne cānyatīrthe vā jalaṃ piṇḍaṃ ca dāpayet //
analyzed: tad abhāve ca śiṣyeṇa tad abhāve sahodaraḥ śmaśāne ca anya tīrthe vā jalam piṇḍam ca dāpayet

original: odanāni ca saktūṃśca śākamūlaphalādinā / prathame 'hani yaddadyāttaddadyāduttare 'hani //
analyzed: odanāni ca saktūn ca śāka mūla phala ādinā prathame hani yat dadyāt tat dadyāt uttare hani

original: dināni daśa piṇḍāṃśca kurvantyatra sutādayaḥ / pratyahaṃ te vibhajyante caturbhāgāḥ khageśvara //
analyzed: dināni daśa piṇḍān ca kurvanti atra suta ādayaḥ pratyaham te vibhajyante catur bhāgāḥ khageśvara

original: bhāgadvayaṃ tu dehārthaṃ prītidaṃ bhūtapañcake / tṛtīyaṃ yamadūtānāṃ caturthaṃ copajīvyati //
analyzed: bhāga dvayam tu deha artham prīti dam bhūta pañcake tṛtīyam yamadūtānām caturtham ca upajīvyati

original: ahorātraistu navabhiḥ preto niṣpattimāpnuyāt / jantorniṣpannadehasya daśame valavatkṣudhā //
analyzed: ahorātraiḥ tu navabhiḥ pretaḥ niṣpattim āpnuyāt jantoḥ niṣpanna dehasya daśame valavat kṣudhā

original: na vidhirnaiva mantraśca na svadhāvāhanāśiṣaḥ / nāma gotraṃ samuccārya yaddattaṃ taddaśāhikam //
analyzed: na vidhiḥ nā eva mantraḥ ca na svadhā vāhana āśiṣaḥ nāma gotram samuccārya yat dattam tat daśāhikam

original: dagdhe dehe punardehamevamutpadyate khaga / prathame 'hani yaḥ piṇḍastena mūrdhā prajāyate //
analyzed: dagdhe dehe punar deham evam utpadyate khaga prathame hani yaḥ piṇḍaḥ tena mūrdhā prajāyate

original: grīvā skandhau dvitīye ca tṛtīye hṛdayaṃ bhavet / caturthena bhavetpṛṣṭhaṃ pañcame nābhireva ca //
analyzed: grīvā skandhau dvitīye ca tṛtīye hṛdayam bhavet caturthena bhavet pṛṣṭham pañcame nābhiḥ eva ca

original: ṣaṭ saptame kaṭī guhyamṛrū cāpyaṣṭame tathā / tālū pādau ca navame daśame 'hni kṣudhā bhavet //
analyzed: ṣaṭ saptame kaṭī guhya mṛrū ca api aṣṭame tathā tālū pādau ca navame daśame hni kṣudhā bhavet

original: dehaṃ prāptaḥ kṣudhāviṣṭo gṛhe dvāre ca tiṣṭhati / daśame 'hani yaḥ piṇḍastaṃ dadyādāmiṣeṇa tu //
analyzed: deham prāptaḥ kṣudhā āviṣṭaḥ gṛhe dvāre ca tiṣṭhati daśame hani yaḥ piṇḍaḥ tam dadyāt āmiṣeṇa tu

original: yato dehe samutpanne preto 'tīva kṣudhānvitaḥ / atastvāmiṣabāhyena kṣudhā tasya na naśyati //
analyzed: yatas dehe samutpanne tīva kṣudhā anvitaḥ atas tu āmiṣa bāhyena kṣudhā tasya na naśyati

original: ekādaśe dvādaśāhe preto bhuṅkte dinadvayam / yoṣitaḥ puruṣāsyāpi pretaśabdaṃ samuccaret //
analyzed: ekādaśe dvādaśa ahe pretaḥ bhuṅkte dina dvayam yoṣitaḥ puruṣāsyā api pretaśabdam samuccaret

original: dīpamannaṃ jalaṃ vastraṃ yatkiñcidvastu dīyate / pretaśabdena taddeyaṃ mṛsyānandadāyakam //
analyzed: dīpam annam jalam vastram yat kiñcid vastu dīyate preta śabdena tat deyam mṛsi ānanda dāyakam

original: trayodaśe 'hni sa preto nīyate ca mahāpathe / piṇḍajaṃ dehamāśritya divā naktaṃ bubhukṣitaḥ //
analyzed: trayodaśe hni sa pretaḥ nīyate ca mahāpathe piṇḍa jam deham āśritya divā naktam bubhukṣitaḥ

original: śītoṣṇaśaṅkukravyādavahnimārgastu pāpinām / kṣudhā tṛṣṇātmikā caiva savva saumyaṃ kṛtātmanām //
analyzed: śīta uṣṇa śaṅku kravyāda vahni mārgaḥ tu pāpinām kṣudhā tṛṣṇā ātmikā ca eva saumyam kṛtātmanām

original: mārge caitāni duḥ khāni asipatravanānvite / kṣutpipāsārdito nityaṃ yamadṛtaiḥ prapīḍitaḥ //
analyzed: mārge ca etāni duḥ khāni asipatravana anvite kṣudh pipāsā arditaḥ nityam yama dṛtaiḥ prapīḍitaḥ

original: ahanyahani vai preto yojanānāṃ śatadvayam / catvāriṃśattathā sapta ahorātreṇa gacchati //
analyzed: ahani ahani vai pretaḥ yojanānām śata dvayam catvāriṃśat tathā sapta ahorātreṇa gacchati

original: gṛhīto yamapāśaiśca hāheti rudite tu saḥ / svagṛhaṃ tu parityajya yāmyaṃ puramanuvrajet //
analyzed: gṛhītaḥ yama pāśaiḥ ca hāhā iti rudite tu saḥ sva gṛham tu parityajya yāmyam puram anuvrajet

original: krameṇa yāti sa pretaḥ puraṃ yāmyaṃ śubhāśubham / atītya tānitānyeva mārge puravarāṇi ca //
analyzed: krameṇa yāti sa pretaḥ puram yāmyam śubha aśubham atītya tāni tāni eva mārge pura varāṇi ca

original: yāmyaṃ sauripuraṃ nagendrabhavanaṃ gandharvaśailāgamau / kroñcaṃ krūrapuraṃ vicitrabhavanaṃ bahvāpadaṃ duḥ khadam //
analyzed: yāmyam sauri puram naga indra bhavanam gandharva śaila āgamau kroñcam krūra puram vicitra bhavanam bahu āpadam duḥ kha dam

original: nānākrandapuraṃ sutaprabhavanaṃ raudraṃ payovarṣaṇaṃ śītāḍhyaṃ bahudharmabhītabhavanaṃ yāmyaṃ puraṃ cāgrataḥ //
analyzed: nānā ākranda puram suta prabhavanam raudram payaḥ varṣaṇam śīta āḍhyam bahu dharma bhīta bhavanam yāmyam puram ca agratas

original: trayodaśe 'hni sa preto gṛhīto yamakiṅkaraiḥ / tasminmārge brajatyeko gṛhīta iva markaṭaḥ //
analyzed: trayodaśe hni sa pretaḥ gṛhītaḥ yama kiṅkaraiḥ tasmin mārge brajati ekaḥ gṛhītaḥ iva markaṭaḥ

original: tathava sa vrajanmārge putraputreti ca bruvan / hāheti krandate nityaṃ kīdṛśaṃ tu mayā kṛtam //
analyzed: sa vrajan mārge putra putra iti ca bruvan hāhā iti krandate nityam kīdṛśam tu mayā kṛtam

original: mānuṣyaṃ labhyate kasmāditi brūte prasarpati / mahatā puṇyayogena mānuṣyaṃ janma labhyate //
analyzed: mānuṣyam labhyate kasmāt iti brūte prasarpati mahatā puṇya yogena mānuṣyam janma labhyate

original: na tatprāpya pradattaṃ hi yācakebhyaḥ svakaṃ dhanam / parādhīnaṃ tadabhavaditi brūte (rauti)
analyzed: na tat prāpya pradattam hi yācakebhyaḥ svakam dhanam para adhīnam tat abhavat iti brūte rauti

original: sagadgadaḥ //
analyzed: sa gadgadaḥ

original: kiṅkaraiḥ pīḍyate 'tyarthaṃ smarate pūrvadaihikam //
analyzed: kiṅkaraiḥ pīḍyate tyartham smarate pūrvadaihikam

original: sukhasya duḥ khasya na kopi dātā paro dadātīti kubuddhireṣā / purā kṛtaṃ karma sadaiva bhujyate dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
analyzed: sukhasya duḥ khasya na kaḥ api dātā paraḥ dadāti iti ku buddhiḥ eṣā purā kṛtam karma sadā eva bhujyate dehin kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: mayā na dattaṃ na hutaṃ hutāśane tapo na taptaṃ himaśailagahvare / na sevitaṃ gāṅgamaho mahājalaṃ dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
analyzed: mayā na dattam na hutam hutāśane tapaḥ na taptam himaśaila gahvare  na sevitam gāṅgam aho mahā jalam dehin kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: na nityadānaṃ na gāvāhnikaṃ kṛtaṃ na vedadānaṃ na ca śāstrapustakam / purā nadṛṣṭaṃ na ca sevito 'dhvā dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
analyzed: na nitya dānam na gāvāhnikam kṛtam na veda dānam na ca śāstra pustakam purā na dṛṣṭam na ca sevitaḥ dhvā dehin kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: jalāśayo naiva kṛto hi nirjale manuṣyahetoḥ paśupakṣihetave / gotṛptihetorna kṛtaṃ hi gocaraṃ dehinkvacinnastara yattvayā kṛtam //
analyzed: jalāśayaḥ nā eva kṛtaḥ hi nirjale manuṣya hetoḥ paśu pakṣi hetave  go tṛpti hetoḥ na kṛtam hi gocaram dehin kvacid naḥ tara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: mayā na bhuktaṃ patisaṅgasaukhyaṃ vahnipraveśo na kṛto mṛte sati / tasminmṛte tadvratapālanaṃ vā dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
analyzed: mayā na bhuktam pati saṅga saukhyam vahnipraveśaḥ na kṛtaḥ mṛte sati tasmin mṛte tad vrata pālanam vā dehin kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: māsopavāsairna viśoṣitaṃ vapuścāndrāyaṇairvā niyamaiśca saṃhataiḥ / nārīśarīraṃ bahuduḥ khabhājanaṃ labdhaṃ mayā pūrvakṛtairvikarmabhiḥ //
analyzed: māsopavāsaiḥ na viśoṣitam vapuḥ cāndrāyaṇaiḥ vā niyamaiḥ ca saṃhataiḥ nārī śarīram bahu duḥ kha bhājanam labdham mayā pūrva kṛtaiḥ vikarmabhiḥ

original: uktāni vācyāni mayā narāṇāmataḥ śṛṇuṣvāvahito 'pi pakṣin / strīṇāṃ śarīraṃ pratilabhya dehī bravīti karmāṇi kṛtāni pūrvam //
analyzed: uktāni vācyāni mayā narāṇām atas pakṣin  strīṇām śarīram pratilabhya dehī bravīti karmāṇi kṛtāni pūrvam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde yamalokavistāratanmāhātmyatadyānanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcadaśo
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde yamalokavistāratanmāhātmyatadyānanirūpaṇam nāma pañcadaśaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 16
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / evaṃ vilapatastasya pretasyaivaṃ khageśvara / krandamānasya nitarāṃ pīḍitasya ca kiṅkaraiḥ //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca evam vilapataḥ tasya pretasya evam khageśvara krandamānasya nitarām pīḍitasya ca kiṅkaraiḥ

original: saptadaśa dinānyeko vāyumārge vikṛṣyate / aṣṭādaśe tvahorātre pūrvaṃ yāmyapuraṃ vrajet //
analyzed: saptadaśa dināni ekaḥ vāyumārge vikṛṣyate aṣṭādaśe tu ahorātre pūrvam yāmya puram vrajet

original: tasminpuravare ramye pretānāṃ ca gaṇo mahān / puṣpabhadrā nadī tatranyagrodhaḥ priyadarśanaḥ //
analyzed: tasmin pura vare ramye pretānām ca gaṇaḥ mahān puṣpabhadrā nadī tatra nyagrodhaḥ priya darśanaḥ

original: pure sa tatra viśrāmaṃ prāpyate yamakiṅkaraiḥ / jāyāputrādikaṃ saukhyaṃ smarettatra suduḥ khitaḥ //
analyzed: pure sa tatra viśrāmam prāpyate yama kiṅkaraiḥ  jāyā putra ādikam saukhyam smaret tatra su duḥ khitaḥ

original: rudate karuṇairvākyai stṛṣārtaḥ śramapīḍitaḥ / svadhanaṃ svakalatrāṇi gṛhaṃ putrāḥ sukhāni ca //
analyzed: rudate karuṇaiḥ vākyaiḥ stṛṣā ārtaḥ śrama pīḍitaḥ sva dhanam sva kalatrāṇi gṛham putrāḥ sukhāni ca

original: bhṛtyamitrāṇi cānyacca sarvaṃ śocati vai tadā / kṣudhārtasya pure tasminkiṅkaraistasya cocyate //
analyzed: bhṛtya mitrāṇi ca anyat ca sarvam śocati vai tadā kṣudhā ārtasya pure tasmin kiṅkaraiḥ tasya ca ucyate

original: kiṅkarā ūcuḥ / kva dhanaṃ kva sutā jāyā kva gṛhaṃ kva tvamīdṛśaḥ / svakarmopārjitaṃ bhuṅkṣva ciraṃ gaccha mahāpathe //
analyzed: kiṅkarāḥ ūcuḥ kva dhanam kva sutā jāyā kva gṛham kva tvam īdṛśaḥ sva karma upārjitam bhuṅkṣva ciram gaccha mahāpathe

original: jānāsi śaṃbalavaśaṃ balamadhvagānāṃ no śaṃbalaḥ prayatate paralokapāntha / gantavyamasti tava niścitameva tena mārgeṇa yatra bhavataḥ krayavikrayau na //
analyzed: jānāsi śaṃbala vaśam balam adhvagānām no śaṃbalaḥ prayatate para loka pāntha gantavyam asti tava niścitam eva tena mārgeṇa yatra bhavataḥ kraya vikrayau na

original: yamadūtoditaṃ vākyaṃ pakṣinnaivaṃ tvayā śrutam / evamuktastataḥ sarvairhanyamānaḥ sa mudgaraiḥ //
analyzed: yama dūta uditam vākyam pakṣin na evam tvayā śrutam  evam uktaḥ tatas sarvaiḥ hanyamānaḥ sa mudgaraiḥ

original: atra dattaṃ sutaiḥ pātre (traiḥ)
analyzed: atra dattam sutaiḥ

original: snehādvā kṛpayātha vā / māsikaṃ piṇḍamaśrāti tataḥ sauripuraṃ vrajet //
analyzed: snehāt vā kṛpayā atha vā tatas sauri puram vrajet

original: tatra nāmnā tu rājā vai jaṅgamaḥ kālarūpadhṛk / taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhayabhītastu viśrāme kurute matim //
analyzed: tatra nāmnā tu rājā vai jaṅgamaḥ kāla rūpadhṛk tam dṛṣṭvā bhaya bhītaḥ tu viśrāme kurute matim

original: udakaṃ cānnasaṃyuktaṃ bhuṅkte tasminpure gataḥ / traipakṣike tu yaddattaṃ tatpuraṃ sa vyatikramet //
analyzed: udakam ca anna saṃyuktam bhuṅkte tasmin pure gataḥ traipakṣike tu yat dattam tat puram sa vyatikramet

original: nagendranagare ramye preto yāti divāniśam / gacchanvanāni raudrāṇi dṛṣṭvā krandati tatra saḥ //
analyzed: naga indra nagare ramye pretaḥ yāti divāniśam gacchan vanāni raudrāṇi dṛṣṭvā krandati tatra saḥ

original: bhīṣaṇaiḥ kliśyamānastu rudate ca punaḥ punaḥ / māsadvayāvasāne tu tatpuraṃ so 'tigacchati //
analyzed: bhīṣaṇaiḥ kliśyamānaḥ tu rudate ca punar punar māsa dvaya avasāne tu tat puram

original: bhuktvā cānnaṃ jalaṃ pītvā yaddattaṃ vāndhavairiha / kliśyamānastataḥ pāśairnoyate yamakiṅkaraiḥ //
analyzed: bhuktvā ca annam jalam pītvā yat dattam vāndhavaiḥ iha  kliśyamānaḥ tatas pāśaiḥ na uyate yama kiṅkaraiḥ

original: tṛtīye māsi samprāpte gandharvanagaraṃ śubham / tṛtīyaṃ māsikaṃ bhuktvā tatra gacchatyasau puraḥ //
analyzed: tṛtīye māsi samprāpte gandharvanagaram śubham tṛtīyam māsikam bhuktvā tatra gacchati asau puras

original: śailāgamaṃ caturthe sa māse prāpnoti vai puram / pāṣāṇāstatra varṣanti pretasyopari saṃsthitāḥ //
analyzed: śailāgamam caturthe sa māse prāpnoti vai puram pāṣāṇāḥ tatra varṣanti pretasya upari saṃsthitāḥ

original: caturthamāsike śrāddhaṃ bhukte tatra sukhī bhavet //
analyzed: caturthamāsike śrāddham bhukte tatra sukhī bhavet

original: tato yāti puraṃ pretaḥ krūraṃ māse tu pañcame / iha dattaṃ sutairbhuṅkte preto vai tatpure sthitaḥ / ṣaṣṭhe māsi tataḥ preto yāti krauñcābidhaṃ puram //
analyzed: tatas yāti puram pretaḥ krūram māse tu pañcame  iha dattam sutaiḥ bhuṅkte pretaḥ vai tad pure sthitaḥ ṣaṣṭhe māsi tatas pretaḥ yāti krauñcābidham puram

original: tatra dattena piṇḍena śrāddhenāpyāyitaḥ pure / muhūrtārdhaṃ tu viśramya kampamānaḥ suduḥ khitaḥ //
analyzed: tatra dattena piṇḍena śrāddhena āpyāyitaḥ pure muhūrta ardham tu viśramya kampamānaḥ su duḥ khitaḥ

original: tatpuraṃ sa vyatikramya tarjito yamakiṅkaraiḥ / prayāti citranagaraṃ vicitro yatra pārthivaḥ //
