analyzed: tat puram sa vyatikramya tarjitaḥ yama kiṅkaraiḥ prayāti citra nagaram vicitraḥ yatra pārthivaḥ

original: yamasyaivānujaḥ sauriryatra rājyaṃ praśāsti hi / māsaistu pañcabhiḥ sārdhairūpaṣāṇmāsikaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: yamasya eva anujaḥ sauriḥ yatra rājyam praśāsti hi māsaiḥ tu pañcabhiḥ sārdhaiḥ ūpa ṣāṇmāsikam bhavet

original: ūnaṣāṇmāsikaṃ tatra bhuṅkte yāmyasamāhataḥ / mārge punaḥ punastasya bubhukṣā pīḍayatyalam //
analyzed: ūna ṣāṇmāsikam tatra bhuṅkte yāmya samāhataḥ mārge punar punar tasya bubhukṣā pīḍayati alam

original: santiṣṭhate mṛte ko 'pi madīyaḥ sutabāndhavaḥ / saukhyaṃ yo me janayati patataḥ śokasāgare //
analyzed: santiṣṭhate mṛte kaḥ pi madīyaḥ suta bāndhavaḥ saukhyam yaḥ me janayati patataḥ śoka sāgare

original: evaṃ mārge vilapati vāryamāṇaśca kiṅkaraiḥ / āyānti saṃmukhāstatra kaivartāstu sahasraśaḥ //
analyzed: evam mārge vilapati vāryamāṇaḥ ca kiṅkaraiḥ  āyānti saṃmukhāḥ tatra kaivartāḥ tu sahasraśas

original: vayaṃ te tartukāmāya mahāvaitaraṇīṃ nadīm / śatayojanavistīrṇāṃ pūyaśoṇitasaṃkulām //
analyzed: vayam te tartu kāmāya mahāvaitaraṇīm nadīm śata yojana vistīrṇām pūya śoṇita saṃkulām

original: nānājhaṣasamākīrṇāṃ nānāpakṣigaṇairvṛtām / vayaṃ tvāṃ tārayiṣyāmaḥ sukheneti vadanti te //
analyzed: nānā jhaṣa samākīrṇām nānā pakṣi gaṇaiḥ vṛtām vayam tvām tārayiṣyāmaḥ sukhena iti vadanti te

original: antaraṃ dehi bho pāntha bahulā cedrucistava / tena tatra pradattā gaustayā nāvā prasarpati / manujānāṃ hitaṃ dānamante vaitaraṇī smṛtā //
analyzed: antaram dehi bho pāntha bahulā ced ruciḥ tava  tena tatra pradattā gauḥ tayā nāvā prasarpati manujānām hitam dānam ante vaitaraṇī smṛtā

original: parāpāpaṃ dahetsarvaṃ viṣṇulokaṃ ca sā nayet / na dattā cetkhagaśreṣṭha tāṃ sametya samajjati //
analyzed: parā pāpam dahet sarvam viṣṇu lokam ca sā nayet na dattā ced khaga śreṣṭha tām sametya samajjati

original: svasthāvasthe śarīre 'tra vaitaraṇyā vrataṃ caret / deyā ca viduṣe dhenustāṃ nadīṃ tartumicchatā //
analyzed: svastha avasthe śarīre vaitaraṇyāḥ vratam caret deyā ca viduṣe dhenuḥ tām nadīm tartum icchatā

original: avadanmajjamānastu nindatyātmānamātmanā / pātheyārthaṃ mayā kiñcinna pradattaṃ dvijāyaca //
analyzed: avadat majjamānaḥ tu nindati ātmānam ātmanā pātheya artham mayā kiñcid na pradattam

original: na dattaṃ na hutaṃ japtaṃ na snātaṃ na kṛtaṃ stutam / yādṛśaṃ karma caritaṃ mūḍha bhuṅkṣveti tādṛśam //
analyzed: na dattam na hutam japtam na snātam na kṛtam stutam yādṛśam karma caritam mūḍha bhuṅkṣva iti tādṛśam

original: tadaiva hṛdi saṃmūḍhastāḍito bhāṣate bhaṭaiḥ / vaitaraṇyāḥ parataṭe bhuṅkte dattaṃ ghaṭādikam //
analyzed: tadā eva hṛdi saṃmūḍhaḥ tāḍitaḥ bhāṣate bhaṭaiḥ vaitaraṇyāḥ para taṭe bhuṅkte dattam ghaṭa ādikam

original: ūnaṣāṇmāsikaśrāddhaṃ bhuktvā gacchati cāgrataḥ / tārkṣya tatra viśeṣeṇa bhojayīta dvijāñchubhān //
analyzed: ūna ṣāṇmāsika śrāddham bhuktvā gacchati ca agratas tārkṣya tatra viśeṣeṇa bhojayīta dvijān śubhān

original: catvāriṃśattathā sapta yojanāni śatadvayam / prayāti pratyahaṃ tārkṣya ahorātreṇa karśitaḥ //
analyzed: catvāriṃśat tathā sapta yojanāni śata dvayam prayāti pratyaham tārkṣya ahorātreṇa karśitaḥ

original: saptame māsi samprāpte puraṃ bahvāpadaṃ vrajet / tatra bhuktva pradattaṃ yacchrāddhaṃ saptamamāsikam //
analyzed: saptame māsi samprāpte puram bahu āpadam vrajet tatra bhuktvā pradattam yat śrāddham saptamamāsikam

original: aṣṭame māsi samprāpte nānākrandapuraṃ vrajet / nānākrandagaṇāndṛṣṭvā krandamānānsudāruṇam //
analyzed: aṣṭame māsi samprāpte nānā ākranda puram vrajet nānā ākranda gaṇān dṛṣṭvā krandamānān su dāruṇam

original: svayaṃ ca śūnyahṛdayaḥ samākrandati duḥ khitaḥ / tanmāsikaṃ ca yacchrāddhaṃ bhuktvā tatra sukhī bhavet //
analyzed: svayam ca śūnya hṛdayaḥ samākrandati duḥ khitaḥ tat māsikam ca yat śrāddham bhuktvā tatra sukhī bhavet

original: vihāya tatpuraṃ preto yāti taptapuraṃ prati / sutaptanagaraṃ prāpya navame māsi so 'śnute / dvijabhojyaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ kṛtaṃ śrāddhaṃ sutena yat //
analyzed: vihāya tat puram pretaḥ yāti tapta puram prati  sutapta nagaram prāpya navame māsi saḥ śnute dvija bhojyam piṇḍa dānam kṛtam śrāddham sutena yat

original: māsi vai daśame prāpte raudraṃ sthānaṃ sa gacchati / daśame māsi yaddattaṃ tadbhuktvā ca prayāti saḥ //
analyzed: māsi vai daśame prāpte raudram sthānam sa gacchati daśame māsi yat dattam tat bhuktvā ca prayāti saḥ

original: daśaikamāsikaṃ bhuktvā payovarṣaṇamṛcchati / meghāstatra pravarṣanti pretānāṃ duḥ khadāyakāḥ //
analyzed: daśa aikamāsikam bhuktvā payaḥ varṣaṇam ṛcchati meghāḥ tatra pravarṣanti pretānām duḥkha dāyakāḥ

original: (tataḥ pracalito poto bahurghamatṛṣārditaḥ) / dvādaśe māsi yacchrāddhaṃ tatra bhuṅkte suduḥ śitaḥ //
analyzed: tatas potaḥ bahu rghama tṛṣā arditaḥ dvādaśe māsi yat śrāddham tatra bhuṅkte su dus śitaḥ

original: kiñcinnyūne tato varṣe sārdhe caikādaśe 'tha vā / yāti śītapuraṃ tatra śītaṃ yatrātiduḥ khadam //
analyzed: kiñcid nyūne tatas varṣe sa ardhe ca ekādaśe vā yāti śītapuram tatra śītam yatra ati duḥkha dam

original: śītārtaḥ kṣudhitaḥ so 'tha vīkṣate hi diśo daśa / tiṣṭhettu bāndhavaḥ ko 'pi yo me duḥkhaṃ vyapohati //
analyzed: śīta ārtaḥ kṣudhitaḥ vīkṣate hi diśaḥ daśa  tiṣṭhet tu bāndhavaḥ yaḥ me duḥkham vyapohati

original: kiṅkarāstaṃ vadantyevaṃ kva te puṇyaṃ hi tādṛśam / śrutvā teṣāṃ tu tadvākyaṃ hā daiva iti bhāṣate //
analyzed: kiṅkarāḥ tam vadanti evam kva te puṇyam hi tādṛśam śrutvā teṣām tu tat vākyam hā daivaḥ iti bhāṣate

original: daivaṃ hi pūrvasukṛtaṃ tanmayā naiva sañcitam / evaṃ sañcintya bahuśo dhairyamālambate punaḥ //
analyzed: daivam hi pūrva su kṛtam tat mayā nā eva sañcitam evam sañcintya bahuśas dhairyam ālambate punar

original: catvāriṃśadyojanāni caturyuktāni vai tataḥ / dharmarājapuraṃ ramyaṃ gandharvāpsarākulam //
analyzed: catvāriṃśat yojanāni catur yuktāni vai tatas dharmarāja puram ramyam gandharva apsarā ākulam

original: caturaśītilakṣaiśca mūrtāmūrtairadhiṣṭhitam / trayodaśa pratīhārā dharmarājapure sthitāḥ //
analyzed: caturaśīti lakṣaiḥ ca mūrta amūrtaiḥ adhiṣṭhitam trayodaśa pratīhārāḥ dharmarāja pure sthitāḥ

original: śubhāśubhaṃ tu yatkarma te vicārya punaḥ punaḥ / śravaṇā brahmaṇaḥ putrā manuṣyāṇāṃ ca ceṣṭitam / kathayanti tadā loke pūjitāḥ pūjitāḥ svayam //
analyzed: śubha aśubham tu yat karma te vicārya punar punar śravaṇāḥ brahmaṇaḥ putrāḥ manuṣyāṇām ca ceṣṭitam kathayanti tadā loke pūjitāḥ pūjitāḥ svayam

original: naraistuṣṭaiśca puṣṭaiśca yatproktaṃ ca kṛtaṃ ca yat / sarvamāvedayanti sma citragupte yame ca tat //
analyzed: naraiḥ tuṣṭaiḥ ca puṣṭaiḥ ca yat proktam ca kṛtam ca yat  sarvam āvedayanti sma citragupte yame ca tat

original: dūrācchravaṇavijñānā dūrāddarśanagocarāḥ / evañceṣṭāstu te hyaṣṭau svarbhūpātālacāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: dūrāt śravaṇa vijñānāḥ dūrāt darśana gocarāḥ evañceṣṭāḥ tu te hi aṣṭau svar bhū pātāla cāriṇaḥ

original: teṣāṃ patnyastathai vogrā śravaṇyaḥ pṛthagāhvayāḥ / evaṃ teṣāṃ śaktirasti yartye martyādhikāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: teṣām patnyaḥ tathā vā ugrā śravaṇyaḥ pṛthak āhvayāḥ evam teṣām śaktiḥ asti yartye martya adhikāriṇaḥ

original: vratairdānaistavairyaśca pūjayediha mānavaḥ / jāyante tasya te saumyāḥ sukhamṛtyupradāyinaḥ //
analyzed: vrataiḥ dānaiḥ tavaiḥ yaḥ ca pūjayet iha mānavaḥ jāyante tasya te saumyāḥ sukha mṛtyu pradāyinaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretayātrādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde pretayātrādinirūpaṇam nāma ṣoḍaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamāhāpurāṇam- 17
garuḍa uvāca / eko me saṃśayo deva hṛdaye samprabādhate / śramaṇāḥ kasya putrāśca kathaṃ yamapure sthitāḥ //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca  ekaḥ me saṃśayaḥ deva hṛdaye samprabādhate śramaṇāḥ kasya putrāḥ ca katham yama pure sthitāḥ

original: mānuṣaiśca kṛtaṃ karma kasmājjānanti te prabho / kathaṃ śṛṇvanti te sarve kasmājjñānaṃ samāgatam //
analyzed: mānuṣaiḥ ca kṛtam karma kasmāt jānanti te prabho katham śṛṇvanti te sarve kasmāt jñānam samāgatam

original: kutra bhuñjanti deveśa krathayasva prasādataḥ / pakṣirājavacaḥ śrutvā bhagavānvākyamabravīt //
analyzed: kutra bhuñjanti deveśa krathayasva prasādataḥ  pakṣirāja vacaḥ śrutvā bhagavān vākyam abravīt

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / śṛṇuṣva vacanaṃ satyaṃ sarveṣāṃ saukhyadāyakam / tadahaṃ kathayiṣyāmi śravaṇānāṃ viceṣṭitam //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca śṛṇuṣva vacanam satyam sarveṣām saukhya dāyakam  tat aham kathayiṣyāmi śravaṇānām viceṣṭitam

original: ekībhūtaṃ yadā sarvaṃ jagatsthāvarajaṅgamam / kṣīrodasāgare pūrvaṃ mayi supte jagatpatau //
analyzed: ekībhūtam yadā sarvam jagat sthāvara jaṅgamam kṣīroda sāgare pūrvam mayi supte jagatpatau

original: nābhisthojastapastepe varṣāṇi subahūnyapi / ekībhūtaṃ jagatsṛṣṭaṃ bhūtagrāmacaturvidham //
analyzed: nābhi stha ujaḥ tapaḥ tepe varṣāṇi su bahūni api ekībhūtam jagat sṛṣṭam bhūta grāma caturvidham

original: brahmaṇā nirmitaṃ pūrvaṃ viṣṇunā pālitaṃ tadā / rudraḥ saṃhāramūrtiśca nirmito brahmaṇā tataḥ //
analyzed: brahmaṇā nirmitam pūrvam viṣṇunā pālitam tadā rudraḥ saṃhāra mūrtiḥ ca nirmitaḥ brahmaṇā tatas

original: vāyuḥ sarvagataḥ sṛṣṭaḥ sūryastejobhivṛddhimān / dharmarājastataḥ sṛṣṭaścitraguptena saṃyuta) //
analyzed: vāyuḥ sarva gataḥ sṛṣṭaḥ sūryaḥ tejobhiḥ vṛddhimān  dharmarājaḥ tatas sṛṣṭaḥ citraguptena saṃyuta

original: sṛṣṭvaitadādikaṃ sarvaṃ tapastepe tu padmajaḥ / gatāni bahuvarṣāṇi brahmaṇo nābhipaṅkaje //
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā etat ādikam sarvam tapaḥ tepe tu padmajaḥ gatāni bahu varṣāṇi brahmaṇaḥ nābhi paṅkaje

original: yoyo hi nirmitaḥ pūrvaṃ tattatkarma samācaret / kasmiṃścitsamaye tatra brahmā lokasamanvitaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ hi nirmitaḥ pūrvam tad tad karma samācaret kasmiṃścid samaye tatra brahmā loka samanvitaḥ

original: rudro viṣṇustathā dharmaḥ śāsayanti vasundharām / na jānīmo vayaṃ kiñcillokakṛtyamihocyatām //
analyzed: rudraḥ viṣṇuḥ tathā dharmaḥ śāsayanti vasundharām  na jānīmaḥ vayam kiñcid loka kṛtyam iha ucyatām

original: iti cintāparāḥ sarve devā vimamṛśustadā / saṃcintya brahmaṇo mantraṃ vibudhaiḥ preritastadā //
analyzed: iti cintā parāḥ sarve devāḥ vimamṛśuḥ tadā saṃcintya brahmaṇaḥ mantram vibudhaiḥ preritaḥ tadā

original: gṛhītvā puṣpapatrāṇi sosṛjaddvādaśātmajān / tejorāśīnviśālākṣānbrahmaṇo vacanāttu te //
analyzed: gṛhītvā puṣpa patrāṇi saḥ usṛjat dvādaśa ātmajān tejaḥ rāśīn viśāla akṣān brahmaṇaḥ vacanāt tu te

original: yoyaṃ vadati lokesmiñchubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham / prāpayanti tataḥ śīghraṃ brahmaṇaḥ karṇagocaram //
analyzed: yaḥ uyam vadati loke ismin śubham vā yadi vā aśubham prāpayanti tatas śīghram brahmaṇaḥ karṇa gocaram

original: dūrācchravaṇavijñānaṃ dūrāddarśanagocaram / sarve śṛṇvanti yatpakṣiṃstenaiva śravaṇā matāḥ //
analyzed: dūrāt śravaṇa vijñānam dūrāt darśana gocaram  sarve śṛṇvanti yat pakṣin tena eva śravaṇāḥ matāḥ

original: sthitvā caiva tathākāśe jantūnāṃ ceṣṭitaṃ ca yat / tajjñātvā dharmarājāgre mṛtyukāle vadanti ca //
analyzed: sthitvā ca eva tathā ākāśe jantūnām ceṣṭitam ca yat tat jñātvā dharmarāja agre mṛtyu kāle vadanti ca

original: dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca kathayanti te / eko hi dharmamārgaśca dvitīyaścārthamārgakaḥ //
analyzed: dharmam ca artham ca kāmam ca mokṣam ca kathayanti te ekaḥ hi dharma mārgaḥ ca dvitīyaḥ ca artha mārgakaḥ

original: aparaḥ kāmamārgaśca mokṣamārgaścaturthakaḥ / uttamā dhamamārgeṇa vainateya prayānti hi //
analyzed: aparaḥ kāma mārgaḥ ca mokṣa mārgaḥ caturthakaḥ uttamāḥ dhama mārgeṇa vainateya prayānti hi

original: arthadātā vimānaistu aśvaiḥ kāmapradāyakaḥ / haṃsayuktavimānaiśca mokṣākāṅkṣī visarpati //
analyzed: artha dātā vimānaiḥ tu aśvaiḥ kāma pradāyakaḥ haṃsa yukta vimānaiḥ ca mokṣa ākāṅkṣī visarpati

original: itaraḥ pādacāreṇa tvasipatravanāni ca / pāṣāṇaiḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ kliṣṭaḥ pāśabaddho 'tha yāti vai //
analyzed: itaraḥ pāda cāreṇa tu asipatravanāni ca pāṣāṇaiḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ kliṣṭaḥ pāśa baddhaḥ yāti vai

original: yaḥ kaścinmānuṣe loke śravaṇānpūjayediha / vardhanyā jalapātrema pakvānnaparipūrṇayā //
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid mānuṣe loke śravaṇān pūjayet iha vardhanyā jala pātrā ima pakva anna paripūrṇayā

original: śravaṇānpūjayettatra mayā saha khageśvara / tasyāhaṃ tatpradāsyāmi yatsurairapi durlabham //
analyzed: śravaṇān pūjayet tatra mayā saha khageśvara tasya aham tat pradāsyāmi yat suraiḥ api durlabham

original: saṃbhojya brāhmaṇān bhaktyā tvekādaśa śubhāñchucīn / dvādaśaṃ sakalatraṃ ca mama prītyai prapūjayet //
analyzed: saṃbhojya brāhmaṇān bhaktyā tu ekādaśa śubhān śucīn dvādaśam sa kalatram ca mama prītyai prapūjayet

original: devaiḥ sarvaiśca saṃpūjya svargaṃ yānti sukhepsayā / taiḥ pūjitairaha tuṣṭaścitraguptena dharmarāṭ //
analyzed: devaiḥ sarvaiḥ ca saṃpūjya svargam yānti sukha īpsayā taiḥ pūjitaiḥ aha tuṣṭaḥ citraguptena dharmarāj

original: taistuṣṭairmatpuraṃ yānti lokā dharmapārāyaṇāḥ / śravaṇānāṃ ca māhātmyamutpattiṃ ceṣṭitaṃ śubham //
analyzed: taiḥ tuṣṭaiḥ mad puram yānti lokāḥ dharma pārāyaṇāḥ śravaṇānām ca māhātmyam utpattim ceṣṭitam śubham

original: śṛṇoti pakṣiśārdūla sa ca pāpairna lipyate / iha loke sukhaṃ bhuktvā svargaloke mahīyate //
analyzed: śṛṇoti pakṣi śārdūla sa ca pāpaiḥ na lipyate iha loke sukham bhuktvā svarga loke mahīyate

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretaklape śravaṇamahātmyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptadaso 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretaklape śravaṇamahātmyanirūpaṇam nāma saptadasaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 18
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / śravaṇānāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā kṣaṇaṃ dhyātvā punastataḥ / yatkṛtaṃ tu manuṣyaiścapuṇyaṃ pāpamaharniśam //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca śravaṇānām vacaḥ śrutvā kṣaṇam dhyātvā punar tatas yat kṛtam tu manuṣyaiḥ ca puṇyam pāpam aharniśam

original: tatsarvaṃ ca parijñāya citragupto nivedayet / citraguptastataḥ sarvaṃ karma tasmai vadatyatha //
analyzed: tat sarvam ca parijñāya citraguptaḥ nivedayet  citraguptaḥ tatas sarvam karma tasmai vadati atha

original: vācaiva yatkṛtaṃ karma kṛtaṃ caiva tu kāyikam / mānasaṃ ca tathā karma kṛtaṃ bhuṅkte śubhāśubham //
analyzed: vācā eva yat kṛtam karma kṛtam ca eva tu kāyikam mānasam ca tathā karma kṛtam bhuṅkte śubha aśubham

original: evaṃ te kathitastārkṣya pretamārgasya nirṇayaḥ / viśrānti dāni sarvāṇi sthānāni kathitāni te //
analyzed: evam te kathitaḥ tārkṣya preta mārgasya nirṇayaḥ sarvāṇi sthānāni kathitāni te

original: tamuddiśya dadātyannaṃ sukhaṃ yāti mahādhvani / divā rātrau tamuddiśya sthāne dīpaprado bhavet //
analyzed: tam uddiśya dadāti annam sukham yāti mahā adhvani  divā rātrau tam uddiśya sthāne dīpa pradaḥ bhavet

original: andhakāre mahāghore śvapūrṇe lakṣyavarjite / dīpte 'dhvani ca te yānti dīpo dattaśca yairnaraiḥ //
analyzed: andhakāre mahā ghore śva pūrṇe lakṣya varjite dīpte dhvani ca te yānti dīpaḥ dattaḥ ca yaiḥ naraiḥ

original: kārtike ca caturdaśyāṃ dīpadānaṃ sukhāya vai / atha vakṣyāmi saṃkṣepādyamamārgasya niṣkṛtim //
analyzed: kārtike ca caturdaśyām dīpa dānam sukhāya vai atha vakṣyāmi saṃkṣepāt yama mārgasya niṣkṛtim

original: vṛṣotsargasya puṇyena pitṛlokaṃ sa gacchati / ekādaśāhapiṇḍena śuddhadeho bhavettataḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣotsargasya puṇyena pitṛ lokam sa gacchati ekādaśa aha piṇḍena śuddha dehaḥ bhavet tatas

original: udakumbhapradānena kiṅkarāstṛptimāpnuyuḥ //
analyzed: uda kumbha pradānena kiṅkarāḥ tṛptim āpnuyuḥ

original: śayyādānādbimānastho yāti svargeṣu mānavaḥ / tadahni dīyate sarvaṃ dvādaśāhe viśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: śayyā dānāt bimāna sthaḥ yāti svargeṣu mānavaḥ tat ahni dīyate sarvam dvādaśa ahe viśeṣataḥ

original: padāni sarvavastūni variṣṭhāni trayodaśe / yo dadāti mṛtasyeha jīvannapyātmahetave //
analyzed: padāni sarva vastūni variṣṭhāni trayodaśe  yaḥ dadāti mṛtasya iha jīvan api ātma hetave

original: tadāśrito mahāmārge vainateya sa gacchati / eka evāsti sarvatre vyavahāraḥ khagādhipa //
analyzed: tad āśritaḥ mahā mārge vainateya sa gacchati ekaḥ eva asti sarvatre vyavahāraḥ khagādhipa

original: uttamādhamamadhyānāṃ tattadāvarjanaṃ bhavet / yāvadbhāgyaṃ bhavedyasya tāvanmārge 'tiricyate //
analyzed: uttama adhama madhyānām tat tat āvarjanam bhavet yāvat bhāgyam bhavet yasya tāvat mārge tiricyate

original: svayaṃ svasyena yaddattaṃ tattatrādhikaroti tam / mṛte yadbāndhavairdattaṃ tadāśritya sukhī bhavet //
analyzed: svayam svasyena yat dattam tat tatra adhikaroti tam mṛte yat bāndhavaiḥ dattam tat āśritya sukhī bhavet

original: garuḍa uvāca / kasmātpadāni deyāni kiṃvidhāni trayodaśa / dīyate kasya deveśa tadvadasva yathātatham //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca kasmāt padāni deyāni kiṃvidhāni trayodaśa  dīyate kasya deveśa tat vadasva yathātatham

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / chattropānahavastrāṇi mudrikā ca kamaṇḍaluḥ / āsanaṃ bhājanaṃ caiva padaṃ saptavidhaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca chattra upānaha vastrāṇi mudrikā ca kamaṇḍaluḥ āsanam bhājanam ca eva padam saptavidham smṛtam

original: ātapastatra yo raudro dahyate yena mānavaḥ / chatradānena succhāyā jāyate pretatuṣṭidā //
analyzed: ātapaḥ tatra yaḥ raudraḥ dahyate yena mānavaḥ chatra dānena succhāyā jāyate preta tuṣṭi dā

original: asipatravanaṃ ghoraṃ so 'tikrāmati vai dhruvam / aśvārūḍhāśca gacchanti dadate ya upānahau //
analyzed: asipatravanam ghoram saḥ tikrāmati vai dhruvam aśva ārūḍhāḥ ca gacchanti dadate yaḥ upānahau

original: āsane svāgate (bhojane)
analyzed: āsane svāgate bhojane

original: caiva dattaṃ tasmai dvijāyate / sukhena bhuṅkte sa pretaḥ pathi gacchañchanaiḥ śanaiḥ //
analyzed: ca eva dattam tasmai dvijāyate sukhena bhuṅkte sa pretaḥ pathi gacchan śanais śanais

original: bahudharmasamākīrṇe nirvāte toyavarjite / kamaṇḍalupradānena sukhī bhavati niścitam //
analyzed: bahu dharma samākīrṇe nirvāte toya varjite kamaṇḍalu pradānena sukhī bhavati niścitam

original: mṛtoddeśena yo dadyādudapātraṃ tu tāmrajam / prapādānasahasrasya tatphalaṃ so 'śnute dhruvam //
analyzed: mṛta uddeśena yaḥ dadyāt uda pātram tu tāmra jam prapā dāna sahasrasya tat phalam saḥ śnute dhruvam

original: yamadūtā mahāraudrāḥ karālāḥ kṛṣṇapiṅgalāḥ / na pīḍayanti dākṣiṇyādvastrābhāraṇadānataḥ //
analyzed: yama dūtāḥ mahā raudrāḥ karālāḥ kṛṣṇa piṅgalāḥ na pīḍayanti dākṣiṇyāt vastra ābhāraṇa dānataḥ

original: sāyudhā dhāvamānāśca na mārge dṛṣṭigocarāḥ / prayānti yamadūtāste mudrikāyāḥ pradānataḥ //
analyzed: sa āyudhāḥ dhāvamānāḥ ca na mārge dṛṣṭi gocarāḥ prayānti yamadūtāḥ te mudrikāyāḥ pradānataḥ

original: bhājanāsanadānena āmānnabhojanena ca / ājyayajñopavītābhyāṃ padaṃ sampūrṇatāṃ vrajet //
analyzed: bhājana āsana dānena āma anna bhojanena ca ājya yajñopavītābhyām padam sampūrṇa tām vrajet

original: evaṃ mārge gacchamānastṛṣārtaḥ śramapīḍitaḥ / mahiṣīratha (dugdha)
analyzed: evam mārge gacchamānaḥ tṛṣā ārtaḥ śrama pīḍitaḥ mahiṣī ratha dugdha

original: dānācca sukhī bhavati niścitam //
analyzed: dānāt ca sukhī bhavati niścitam

original: garuḍa uvāca / mṛtoddeśena yatkiñciddīyate svagṛhe vibho / sa gacchati mahāmārge taddattaṃ kena gṛhyate //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca mṛta uddeśena yat kiñcid dīyate sva gṛhe vibho sa gacchati mahā mārge tat dattam kena gṛhyate

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / gṛhṇāti varuṇo dānaṃ mama haste prayacchati / ahaṃ ca bhāskare deve bhāskarātso 'śnute sukham //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca gṛhṇāti varuṇaḥ dānam mama haste prayacchati aham ca bhāskare deve bhāskarāt saḥ śnute sukham

original: vikarmaṇaḥ prabhāveṇa vaṃśacchede kṣitāviha / sarve te narakaṃ yānti yāvatpāpasya saṃkṣayaḥ //
analyzed: vikarmaṇaḥ prabhāveṇa vaṃśa chede kṣitau iha sarve te narakam yānti yāvat pāpasya saṃkṣayaḥ

original: kasmiṃścitsamaye pūrṇe mahiṣāsanasaṃsthitaḥ / narakānvīkṣya dharmātmā nānākrandasamākulān //
analyzed: kasmiṃścid samaye pūrṇe mahiṣa āsana saṃsthitaḥ narakān vīkṣya dharma ātmā nānā ākranda samākulān

original: caturaśītilakṣāṇāṃ narakāṇāṃ sa īśvaraḥ / teṣāṃ madhye śreṣṭhatamā ghorā yā ekaviṃśatiḥ //
analyzed: caturaśīti lakṣāṇām narakāṇām saḥ īśvaraḥ teṣām madhye śreṣṭhatamāḥ ghorāḥ yāḥ ekaviṃśatiḥ

original: tāmistraṃ lohaśaṅkuśca mahārauravaśālmalī / rauravaṃ kuḍvalaṃ kālasūtrakaṃ pūtimṛtikā //
analyzed: tāmistram lohaśaṅkuḥ ca mahārauravaśālmalī rauravam kuḍvalam kālasūtrakam pūtimṛtikā

original: saṅghātaṃ lohatodaṃ ca saviṣaṃ sampratāpanam / mahānarakakālolaḥ sajīvanamahāpathaḥ //
analyzed: saṅghātam loha todam ca sa viṣam sampratāpanam mahā naraka kālolaḥ sa jīvana mahā pathaḥ

original: avīcirandhatā mistraḥ kumbhopākastathaiva ca / asipatravanaṃ caiva patanaścaikaviṃśatiḥ //
analyzed: avīciḥ andhatā mistraḥ kumbhopākaḥ tathā eva ca asipatravanam ca eva patanaḥ ca ekaviṃśatiḥ

original: yeṣāṃ tu narake ghore bahvabdāni gatāni vai / santātarnaiva vidyate dūtatvaṃ te tu (pretya) yānti hi //
analyzed: yeṣām tu narake ghore bahu abdāni gatāni vai santātar nā eva vidyate dūta tvam te tu pretya yānti hi

original: yamena preṣitāste vai mānuṣasya mṛtasya tu / dinedine pragṛhṇanti dattamannādyapānakam //
analyzed: yamena preṣitāḥ te vai mānuṣasya mṛtasya tu dine dine pragṛhṇanti dattam annādya pānakam

original: pretasyaiva viluṇṭhanti madhye mārge bubhukṣitāḥ / māsānte bhojanaṃ piṇḍameke yacchanti tatra vai //
analyzed: pretasya eva viluṇṭhanti madhye mārge bubhukṣitāḥ māsa ante bhojanam piṇḍam eke yacchanti tatra vai

original: tṛptiṃ prayānti te sarve pratyahaṃ caiva vatsaram / evamādikṛtaiḥ puṇyaiḥ kramātsauripuraṃ vrajet //
analyzed: tṛptim prayānti te sarve pratyaham ca eva vatsaram evamādi kṛtaiḥ puṇyaiḥ kramāt sauri puram vrajet

original: tataḥ saṃvatsarasyānte pratyāsanne yamālaye / bahubhītakare preto hastamātraṃ samutsṛjet //
analyzed: tatas saṃvatsarasya ante pratyāsanne yama ālaye bahu bhīta kare pretaḥ hasta mātram samutsṛjet

original: divasairdaśabhirjātaṃ taṃ dehaṃ daśapiṇḍajam / jāmadagnyasyeva rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā tejaḥ prasarpati //
analyzed: divasaiḥ daśabhiḥ jātam tam deham daśa piṇḍa jam jāmadagnyasya iva rāmam dṛṣṭvā tejaḥ prasarpati

original: karmajaṃ dehamāśritya pūrvadehaṃ samutsajet / aṅguṣṭhamātro vāyuśca śamīpatraṃsamāruhet //
analyzed: karma jam deham āśritya pūrva deham samutsajet  aṅguṣṭha mātraḥ vāyuḥ ca śamī patraṃsam āruhet

original: vrajaṃstiṣṭhanpadaikena yathaivaikena gacchati / yathā tṛṇajalaukeva dehī karmānugo 'vaśaḥ //
analyzed: vrajan tiṣṭhan padā ekena yathā eva ekena gacchati yathā tṛṇa jalaukā iva dehī karma anugaḥ vaśaḥ

original: vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya navāni gṛhṇāti naro 'parāṇi / tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇānyanyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī //
analyzed: vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya navāni gṛhṇāti naraḥ parāṇi tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇāni anyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmadṛpretadṛśrīkṛṣṇagaruḍa saṃvāde vṛṣotsarganānādānaphalayamalokagamanakarmajadehaprāptinirūpaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma dṛ preta dṛ śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde vṛṣotsarga nānā dāna phala yama loka gamana karma ja deha prāpti nirūpaṇam

original: nāmāṣṭādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nāma aṣṭādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 19
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / vāyubhūtaḥ kṣadhāviṣṭaḥ karmajaṃ dehamāśritaḥ / te dehaṃ sa samāsādya yamena saha gacchati //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca vāyu bhūtaḥ kṣadhā āviṣṭaḥ karma jam deham āśritaḥ te deham sa samāsādya yamena saha gacchati

original: citraguptapuraṃ tatra yojanānāṃ tu viṃśatiḥ / kāyasthāstatra paśyanti pāpapuṇyāni sarvaśaḥ //
analyzed: citragupta puram tatra yojanānām tu viṃśatiḥ kāyasthāḥ tatra paśyanti pāpa puṇyāni sarvaśas

original: mahādāneṣudatteṣu gatastatra sukhī bhavet / yojanānāṃ caturviṃśatpuraṃ vaivasvataṃ śubham //
analyzed: mahā dāna iṣu datteṣu gataḥ tatra sukhī bhavet yojanānām caturviṃśat puram vaivasvatam śubham

original: lohaṃ lavaṇakārpāsaṃ tilapātraṃ ca yairnaraiḥ / dattaṃ tenaiva tṛpyanti yamasya puracāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: loham lavaṇa kārpāsam tila pātram ca yaiḥ naraiḥ dattam tena eva tṛpyanti yamasya pura cāriṇaḥ

original: gatvā ca tatra te sarve pratīhāraṃ vadanti hi / dharmadhvajapratīhārastatra tiṣṭhati sarvadā //
analyzed: gatvā ca tatra te sarve pratīhāram vadanti hi dharma dhvaja pratīhāraḥ tatra tiṣṭhati sarvadā

original: saptadhānyasya dānena prīto dharmadhvajo bhavet / tatra gatvā pratīhāro brūte tasya śubhāśubham //
analyzed: saptadhānyasya dānena prītaḥ dharma dhvajaḥ bhavet tatra gatvā pratīhāraḥ brūte tasya śubha aśubham

original: dharmarājasya yadrūpaṃ santaḥ sukṛtino janāḥ / paśyanti ca durātmāno yamarūpaṃ subhīṣaṇam //
analyzed: dharmarājasya yat rūpam santaḥ sukṛtinaḥ janāḥ paśyanti ca durātmānaḥ yama rūpam su bhīṣaṇam

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhayabhītastu hāheti vadate janaḥ / kṛtaṃ dānaṃ ca yairmartyaisteṣāṃ nāsti bhayaṃ kvacit //
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā bhaya bhītaḥ tu hāhā iti vadate janaḥ kṛtam dānam ca yaiḥ martyaiḥ teṣām nā asti bhayam kvacid

original: prāptaṃ sukṛtinaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānācca lati sūryajaḥ / eṣa me maṇḍalaṃ bhittvā brahmalokaṃ prayāsyati //
analyzed: prāptam su kṛtinam dṛṣṭvā sthānāt ca lati sūryajaḥ eṣa me maṇḍalam bhittvā brahma lokam prayāsyati

original: dānena sulabho dharmo yamamārgaḥ sukhāvahaḥ / eṣa mārgo viśālo 'tra na kenāpya nugamyate / dānapuṇyaṃ vinā vatsa na gaccheddharmamandiram //
analyzed: dānena sulabhaḥ dharmaḥ yama mārgaḥ sukha āvahaḥ  eṣa mārgaḥ na kena api a nugamyate  dāna puṇyam vinā vatsa na gacchet dharma mandiram

original: tasminmārge tu raudre vai bhīṣaṇā yamakiṅkarāḥ / ekaikasya purasyāgre tiṣṭhatyekasahasrakam //
analyzed: tasmin mārge tu raudre vai bhīṣaṇāḥ yama kiṅkarāḥ ekaikasya purasya agre tiṣṭhati eka sahasrakam

original: pacanti pāpinaṃ prāpya udake yātanākarāḥ / gṛhṇanti māsamāsānte pādaśeṣaṃ tu tadbhavet //
analyzed: pacanti pāpinam prāpya udake yātanā karāḥ gṛhṇanti māsa māsa ante pāda śeṣam tu tat bhavet

original: aurdhvadaihikadānāni yairna dattāni kāśyapa / mahākaṣṭena te yānti tasmāddeyāni śaktitaḥ / adattvā paśuvadyānti gṛhīto vandhabandhanaiḥ //
analyzed: aurdhvadaihika dānāni yaiḥ na dattāni kāśyapa mahā kaṣṭena te yānti tasmāt deyāni śaktitaḥ a dattvā paśu vat yānti gṛhītaḥ vandha bandhanaiḥ

original: evaṃ kṛtena sampaśyetsa naraḥ bhūtakarmaṇā / daivikīṃ paitṛkīṃ yoniṃ mānuṣīṃ vātha nārakīm //
analyzed: evam kṛtena sampaśyet sa naraḥ bhūtakarmaṇā daivikīm paitṛkīm yonim mānuṣīm vā atha nārakīm

original: dharmarājasya vacanānmuktirbhavati vā tataḥ / mānuṣyaṃ tattvataḥ prāpya sa puttraḥ puttratāṃ vrajet //
analyzed: dharmarājasya vacanāt muktiḥ bhavati vā tatas mānuṣyam tattvataḥ prāpya sa puttraḥ puttra tām vrajet

original: yathāyathā kṛtaṃ karma tāntāṃ yoniṃ vrajennaraḥ / tattathaiva ca bhuñjāno vicaretsarvalokagaḥ //
analyzed: yathā yathā kṛtam karma tāntām yonim vrajet naraḥ tat tathā eva ca bhuñjānaḥ vicaret sarva loka gaḥ

original: aśāśvataṃ parijñāya sarvalokottaraṃ sukham / yadā bhavati mānuṣyaṃ tadā dharmaṃ samācaret //
analyzed: aśāśvatam parijñāya sarva loka uttaram sukham yadā bhavati mānuṣyam tadā dharmam samācaret

original: kṛmayo bhasma viṣṭhā vā dehānāṃ prakṛtiḥ sadā / andhakūpe mahāraudre dīpahastaḥ pātettu vai //
analyzed: kṛmayaḥ bhasma viṣṭhāḥ vā dehānām prakṛtiḥ sadā andhakūpe mahā raudre dīpa hastaḥ pātet tu vai

original: mahāpuṇyaprabhāveṇa mānuṣyaṃ janma labhyate / yastatprāpya careddharmaṃ sa gacchetparamāṃ gatim //
analyzed: mahā puṇya prabhāveṇa mānuṣyam janma labhyate yaḥ tat prāpya caret dharmam sa gacchet paramām gatim

original: api jānanvṛthā dharmaṃ duḥ khamāyāti yāti ca //
analyzed: api jānan vṛthā dharmam duḥ kham āyāti yāti ca

original: jātīśatena labhate kila mānuṣatvaṃ tatrāpi durlabhataraṃ khaga bho dvijatvam / yastatra pālayati lālayati vratāni tasyāmṛtaṃ bhavati hastagataṃ prasādāt //
analyzed: jātī śatena labhate kila mānuṣa tvam tatra api durlabhataram khaga bho dvija tvam yaḥ tatra pālayati lālayati vratāni tasya amṛtam bhavati hasta gatam prasādāt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde

original: yamamandirapraveśatadājñālabdhamanuṣyādi dehāṃntaraprāptinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: yama mandirapraveśatad ājñā labdha manuṣya ādi dehāṃntaraprāptinirūpaṇam nāma ekonaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 20
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / ye kecitpretarūpeṇa kutra vāsaṃ labhanti te / pretalokādvinirmuktāḥ kathaṃ kutra vrajanti te //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca  ye kecid preta rūpeṇa kutra vāsam labhanti te preta lokāt vinirmuktāḥ katham kutra vrajanti te

original: caturyuktāśīti lakṣairnarakaiḥ paryupāsitāḥ / yamena rakṣitāstatra bhūtaiścaiva sahasraśaḥ //
analyzed: catur yukta aśīti lakṣaiḥ narakaiḥ paryupāsitāḥ yamena rakṣitāḥ tatra bhūtaiḥ ca eva sahasraśas

original: vicaranti kathaṃ loke narakācca vinirgatāḥ / garuḍodīritaṃ śrutvā lakṣmīnātho 'bravīdidam //
analyzed: vicaranti katham loke narakāt ca vinirgatāḥ garuḍa udīritam śrutvā lakṣmīnāthaḥ bravīt idam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / pakṣirāja śṛṇuṣva tvaṃ yatra pretāścaranti vai / parārthadāragrahaṇāccha (ba)
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca pakṣirāja śṛṇuṣva tvam yatra pretāḥ caranti vai para artha dāra grahaṇāt śa ba

original: lāddrohānniśācarāḥ //
analyzed: lāt drohāt niśācarāḥ

original: tathaiva sarvapāpiṣṭhaḥ svātmajānveṣaṇe ratāḥ / vicarantyaśarīrāste kṣuptipāsārditā bhṛśam //
analyzed: tathā eva sarva pāpiṣṭhaḥ sva ātmaja anveṣaṇe ratāḥ vicaranti aśarīrāḥ te kṣupti pāsā arditāḥ bhṛśam

original: bandīgṛhavi nirmuktā yebhyo naśyanti jantavaḥ / te vyavasyanti ca pretā vadhopāyaṃ ca bandhuṣu //
analyzed: nirmuktāḥ yebhyaḥ naśyanti jantavaḥ te vyavasyanti ca pretāḥ vadha upāyam ca bandhuṣu

original: pitṛdvadārāṇi rundhanti tanmārgocchedakāstathā / pitṛbhā gānvigṛhṇanti pānthebhyastaskarā iva //
analyzed: pitṛ dva dārāṇi rundhanti tad mārga ucchedakāḥ tathā pitṛ bhās gān vigṛhṇanti pānthebhyaḥ taskarāḥ iva

original: svaṃ veśma punarāgatya mitrasthāne viśanti te / tatra sthitā nirīkṣante rogaśokādibandhanāḥ //
analyzed: svam veśma punar āgatya mitra sthāne viśanti te tatra sthitāḥ nirīkṣante roga śoka ādi bandhanāḥ

original: pīḍayanti jvarībhūya ekāntaramiṣeṇa tu / tṛtīyakajvarā bhūtvā śītavātādipīḍayā //
analyzed: pīḍayanti jvarībhūya eka antara miṣeṇa tu tṛtīyaka jvarāḥ bhūtvā śīta vāta ādi pīḍayā

original: anyāṃśca vividhānrogāñchiro 'rtiṃ ca viṣūcikām / cinta yanti sadā teṣāmucchiṣṭādisthalasthitāḥ //
analyzed: anyān ca vividhān rogān śiraḥ ca viṣūcikām

original: ātmajānāṃ chalāllokā bhūtasaṅghaiśca rakṣitāḥ / pibanti te ca pānīyaṃ bhojanocchiṣṭayojitam //
analyzed: ātmajānām chalāt lokāḥ bhūta saṅghaiḥ ca rakṣitāḥ pibanti te ca pānīyam bhojana ucchiṣṭa yojitam

original: evaṃ pretāḥ pravartante nānādoṣairvikarmiṇaḥ //
analyzed: evam pretāḥ pravartante nānā doṣaiḥ vikarmiṇaḥ

original: garuḍa uvāca / kathaṃ kurvanti te pretāḥ kena rūpeṇa kasya kim / jñāyate kena vidhinā jalpanti na vadanti vā //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca katham kurvanti te pretāḥ kena rūpeṇa kasya kim jñāyate kena vidhinā jalpanti na vadanti vā

original: enaṃ chindhi manomohaṃ mama cedicchasi priyam / kalikāle hṛṣīkeśa pretatvaṃ jāyate bahu //
analyzed: enam chindhi manaḥ moham mama ced icchasi priyam kali kāle hṛṣīkeśa preta tvam jāyate bahu

original: śrīviṣṇuruvāca / svakulaṃ pīḍayetpetaḥ paracchidreṇa pīḍayet / jīvansa dṛśyate snehī mṛto duṣṭatvamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca sva kulam pīḍayet petaḥ para chidreṇa pīḍayet  jīvan sa dṛśyate snehī mṛtaḥ duṣṭa tvam āpnuyāt

original: rudrajāpī dharmarato devatātithipūjakaḥ / satyavāk priyavādī ca na pretaiḥ sa hi pīḍyate //
analyzed: rudra jāpī dharma rataḥ devatā atithi pūjakaḥ satya vāc priya vādī ca na pretaiḥ sa hi pīḍyate

original: sarvakriyāparibhraṣṭo nāstiko dharmanindakaḥ / asatyavādanirato naraḥ pretaiḥ sa pīḍyate / kalau pretatvamāpnoti tārkṣyāśuddhakriyāparaḥ //
analyzed: sarva kriyā paribhraṣṭaḥ nāstikaḥ dharma nindakaḥ asatya vāda nirataḥ naraḥ pretaiḥ sa pīḍyate kalau preta tvam āpnoti tārkṣya aśuddha kriyā paraḥ

original: kṛtādau dvāparānte ca na preto naiva pīḍanam / bahūnāmekajātānāmekaḥ saukhyaṃ samaśnute //
analyzed: kṛta ādau dvāpara ante ca na pretaḥ na eva pīḍanam bahūnām eka jātānām ekaḥ saukhyam samaśnute

original: eko duṣkṛtakarmā ca ekaḥ santatimāñjanaḥ / ekaḥ sampīḍyate pretairekaḥ sutadhanānvitaḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ duṣkṛta karmā ca ekaḥ santatimān janaḥ ekaḥ sampīḍyate pretaiḥ ekaḥ suta dhana anvitaḥ

original: ekasya putranāśaḥ syādeko duhitṛmān bhavet / virodho bandhubhiḥ sārdhaṃ pretadoṣeṇa kāśyapa //
analyzed: ekasya putra nāśaḥ syāt ekaḥ duhitṛmān bhavet  virodhaḥ bandhubhiḥ sārdham preta doṣeṇa kāśyapa

original: santatirdṛśyate naiva samutpannā vinaśyati / paśudravyavināśaśca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā //
analyzed: santatiḥ dṛśyate nā eva samutpannā vinaśyati paśu dravya vināśaḥ ca sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: prakṛteḥ parivartaḥ syādvidveṣaḥ saha bandhubhiḥ / akasmādvyasanaprāptiḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā //
analyzed: prakṛteḥ parivartaḥ syāt vidveṣaḥ saha bandhubhiḥ akasmāt vyasana prāptiḥ sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: nāstikyaṃ vṛttilopaśca mahālobhastathaiva ca / syāddhantakalaho nityaṃ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā //
analyzed: nāstikyam vṛtti lopaḥ ca mahā lobhaḥ tathā eva ca syāt hanta kalahaḥ nityam sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: pitṛmātṛnihantā ca devabrāhmaṇanindakaḥ / ityādoṣamavāpnoti sā pīḍā pretasambhavā //
analyzed: pitṛ mātṛ nihantā ca deva brāhmaṇa nindakaḥ iti ādoṣam avāpnoti sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: nityakarmaviniṃmukto japahomavivarjitaḥ / paradravyāṇāṃ ca hartā sā pīḍā pretasambhavā //
analyzed: nityakarma viniṃmuktaḥ japa homa vivarjitaḥ para dravyāṇām ca hartā sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: suvṛṣṭau kṛṣināśaśca vyavahāro vinaśyati / loke kalahakārī ca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā //
analyzed: su vṛṣṭau kṛṣi nāśaḥ ca vyavahāraḥ vinaśyati loke kalahakārī ca sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: mārge jaṅgamyamānaṃ taṃ pīḍayedvātamaṇḍalī / pretapīḍā tu sā jñeyā satyaṃsatyaṃ khageśvara //
analyzed: mārge jaṅgamyamānam tam pīḍayet vātamaṇḍalī pretapīḍā tu sā jñeyā satyam satyam khageśvara

original: hīnajātyā ca sambandho hīnakarma karoti yaḥ / adharme ramate nityaṃ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā //
analyzed: hīna jātyā ca sambandhaḥ hīna karma karoti yaḥ adharme ramate nityam sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: vyasanairdravyanāśaḥ syādupakrāntaṃ vinaśyati / caurāgnirājabhirhāniḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā //
analyzed: vyasanaiḥ dravya nāśaḥ syāt upakrāntam vinaśyati caura agni rājabhiḥ hāniḥ sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: mahārogopalabdhiśca bālakānāṃ ca pīḍanam / jāyā saṃpīḍhyate yacca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā //
analyzed: mahā roga upalabdhiḥ ca bālakānām ca pīḍanam jāyā saṃpīḍhyate yat ca sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: śrutismṛtipurāṇeṣu dharmaśāstrasamudbhave / abhāvo jāyate dharme sā pīḍā pretasambhavā //
analyzed: śruti smṛti purāṇeṣu dharma śāstra samudbhave abhāvaḥ jāyate dharme sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: devatīrthadvijānāṃ tu nindāṃyaḥ kurute naraḥ / pratyakṣaṃ vā parokṣaṃ vā sā pīḍā pretasambhavā //
analyzed: deva tīrtha dvijānām tu nindām yaḥ kurute naraḥ pratyakṣam vā parokṣam vā sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: svavṛttiharaṇaṃ yacca svapratiṣṭhāhatistathā / vaṃśacchedaḥ nadṛśyeta pretadoṣādvinānyathā //
analyzed: sva vṛtti haraṇam yat ca sva pratiṣṭhā hatiḥ tathā vaṃśa chedaḥ na dṛśyeta preta doṣāt vinā anyathā

original: strīṇāṃ garbhavināśaḥ syānna puṣpaṃ dṛśyate tathā / bālānāṃ maraṇaṃ yatra sā pīḍā pretasambhavā //
analyzed: strīṇām garbha vināśaḥ syāt na puṣpam dṛśyate tathā bālānām maraṇam yatra sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: bhāvaśuddhyā na kurute śrāddhaṃ sāṃvatsarādikam / svayameva na kurvīta sā pīḍā pretasambhavā //
analyzed: bhāva śuddhyā na kurute śrāddham sāṃvatsara ādikam svayam eva na kurvīta sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: tīrthe gattvā parāsaktaḥ svakṛtyaṃ ca parityajet / dharmakārye na sampattiḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā //
analyzed: tīrthe parāsaktaḥ sva kṛtyam ca parityajet dharma kārye na sampattiḥ sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: dampatyoḥ kalahaścaiva bhojane kopasaṃyutaḥ / paradrohe matiścaiva sā pīḍā pretasaṃbhavā //
analyzed: dampatyoḥ kalahaḥ ca eva bhojane kopa saṃyutaḥ para drohe matiḥ ca eva sā pīḍā preta saṃbhavā

original: puṣpaṃ yatra na dṛśyena phalaṃ tathā / viraho bhāryayā yatra sā pīḍā pretasagbhavā //
analyzed: puṣpam yatra na dṛśyena phalam tathā virahaḥ bhāryayā yatra sā pīḍā

original: yeṣāṃ vai jāyate cihnaṃ sadoccāṭaparaṃ nṛṇām / svakṣetre niṣphalaṃ tejaḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā //
analyzed: yeṣām vai jāyate cihnam sadā uccāṭa param nṛṇām sva kṣetre niṣphalam tejaḥ sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: svagotraghātakaścaiva hanti śatrumivātmajam / na prītirnāpi saukhyaṃ ca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā //
analyzed: sva gotra ghātakaḥ ca eva hanti śatrum iva ātmajam na prītiḥ nā api saukhyam ca sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: pitṛvākyaṃ na kurute svapatnīṃ ca na sevate / sadā krūramatirvyagraḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā //
analyzed: pitṛ vākyam na kurute sva patnīm ca na sevate sadā krūra matiḥ vyagraḥ sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: vikarmā jāyate preto hyavidhikriyayā tathā / tatkāladuṣṭasaṃsargādvṛṣotsargādṛte tathā //
analyzed: vikarmā jāyate pretaḥ hi avidhi kriyayā tathā tad kāla duṣṭa saṃsargāt vṛṣotsargāt ṛte tathā

original: dṛṣṭagṛtyuvaśādvāpi adagdhavapuṣastathā / pretatvaṃ jāyate tārkṣya pīḍyante yena jantavaḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭa gṛtyu vaśāt vā api adagdha vapuṣaḥ tathā preta tvam jāyate tārkṣya pīḍyante yena jantavaḥ

original: evaṃ jñātvā khagaśreṣṭha pretamuktiṃ samācaret / yo vai na manyate pretānmṛtaḥ pretatvamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: evam jñātvā khaga śreṣṭha preta muktim samācaret  yaḥ vai na manyate pretān mṛtaḥ preta tvam āpnuyāt

original: pretadoṣaḥ kule yasya sukhaṃ tasya na vidyate / matiḥ prītī ratirbuddhirlakṣmīḥ pañcavināśanam //
analyzed: preta doṣaḥ kule yasya sukham tasya na vidyate matiḥ prītiḥ ratiḥ buddhiḥ lakṣmīḥ pañca vināśanam

original: tṛtīye pañcame puṃsi vaṃśacchedo hi jāyate / daridro nirdhanaścaiva pāpakarmā bhavebhave //
analyzed: tṛtīye pañcame puṃsi vaṃśa chedaḥ hi jāyate daridraḥ nirdhanaḥ ca eva pāpa karmā bhavebhave

original: ye kecitpetarūpā vikṛtamukhadṛśo raudrarūpāḥ karālā manyante naiva gotraṃ sutaduhitṛpitṝn bhrātṛjāyāṃ vadhūṃ vā / kṛtvā kāmyaṃ ca rūpaṃ sukhagatirahitā bhāṣamāṇā yatheṣṭaṃ hā kaṣṭaṃ bhoktukāmā vidhivaśapatitāḥ saṃsmaranti svapākam //
analyzed: ye kecid peta rūpāḥ vikṛta mukha dṛśaḥ raudra rūpāḥ karālāḥ manyante na eva gotram suta duhitṛ pitṝn bhrātṛ jāyām vadhūm vā kṛtvā kāmyam ca rūpam sukha gati rahitāḥ bhāṣamāṇāḥ yatheṣṭam hā kaṣṭam bhoktu kāmāḥ vidhi vaśa patitāḥ saṃsmaranti sva pākam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pratakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretāvāsatadbādhāprakāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma viṃśo
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe prata kalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde pretāvāsatadbādhāprakāranirūpaṇam nāma viṃśaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 21
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / muktiṃ yānti kathaṃ pretāstadahaṃ praṣṭumutsukaḥ / yanmuktau ca manuṣyāṇāṃ na pīḍā jāyate punaḥ //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca muktim yānti katham pretāḥ tat aham praṣṭum utsukaḥ yat muktau ca manuṣyāṇām na pīḍā jāyate punar

original: etaiśca lakṣaṇairdeva pīḍoktā pretajā tvayā / teṣāṃ kadā bhavenmuktiḥ pretatvaṃ na kathaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: etaiḥ ca lakṣaṇaiḥ deva pīḍā uktā preta jā tvayā teṣām kadā bhavet muktiḥ preta tvam na katham bhavet

original: pretatve hi pramāṇaṃ ca kati varṣāṇi saṃkhyayā / ciraṃ pretatvamāpannaḥ kathaṃ muktimavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: preta tve hi pramāṇam ca kati varṣāṇi saṃkhyayā ciram preta tvam āpannaḥ katham muktim avāpnuyāt

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / muktiṃ prāyanti te pretāstadahaṃ kathayāmi te / yadaiva manujo 'vaiti mama pīḍā kṛtā tviyam //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca muktim prāyanti te pretāḥ tat aham kathayāmi te yadā eva manujaḥ vā eti mama pīḍā kṛtā tu iyam

original: pṛcchārthaṃ hitamanvicchandai vajñe vinivadayet / svapne dṛṣṭaḥ śubho vṛkṣaḥ phalitaścūtacampakaḥ //
analyzed: pṛcchā artham hitam anvicchan daiḥ vajñe vinivadayet svapne dṛṣṭaḥ śubhaḥ vṛkṣaḥ phalitaḥ cūta campakaḥ

original: vipro vā vṛṣabho devo bhramate tīrthago yadi / evaṃ dṛṣṭo yadā svapno mṛtaḥ ko 'pisvagotrajaḥ //
analyzed: vipraḥ vā vṛṣabhaḥ devaḥ bhramate tīrtha gaḥ yadi evam dṛṣṭaḥ yadā svapnaḥ mṛtaḥ

original: svapne satyaṃ parijñāya dṛṣṭaṃ pretaprabhāvataḥ / adbhutāni pradṛśyante pretadoṣādviniścitam //
analyzed: svapne satyam parijñāya dṛṣṭam preta prabhāvataḥ adbhutāni pradṛśyante preta doṣāt viniścitam

original: tīrthasnāne matiryāvaccittaṃ dharmaparāyaṇam / dharmāpāyaṃ prakurute pretapīḍā tadā vrajet //
analyzed: tīrtha snāne matiḥ yāvat cittam dharma parāyaṇam dharma apāyam prakurute preta pīḍā tadā vrajet

original: tadā tatra vināśāya cittabhaṅgaṃ karoti sā / śreyāṃsi bahuvighnāni sambhavanti padepade //
analyzed: tadā tatra vināśāya citta bhaṅgam karoti sā śreyāṃsi bahu vighnāni sambhavanti pade pade

original: aśreyasi pravṛtti ca prerayanti punaḥ punaḥ / uccāṭanaṃ ca krūratvaṃ sarvaṃ pretakṛtaṃ khaga //
analyzed: aśreyasi pravṛtti ca prerayanti punar punar uccāṭanam ca krūra tvam sarvam preta kṛtam khaga

original: sarvavighnāni santyajya muktyupāyaṃ karoti yaḥ / tasya karmaphalaṃ sādhu pretavṛttiśca śāśvatī //
analyzed: sarva vighnāni santyajya mukti upāyam karoti yaḥ tasya karma phalam sādhu preta vṛttiḥ ca śāśvatī

original: sa bhavettena muktastu dattaṃ śreyaskaraṃ param / svayaṃ tṛpyati bhoḥ pakṣinyasyoddeśena dīyate //
analyzed: sa bhavet tena muktaḥ tu dattam śreyaskaram param svayam tṛpyati bhoḥ pakṣin yasya uddeśena dīyate

original: śṛṇu satyamidaṃ tārkṣya yaddadāti bhunakti saḥ / ātmānaṃ śreyasā yuñjyātpretastṛptiṃ ciraṃ vrajet //
analyzed: śṛṇu satyam idam tārkṣya yat dadāti bhunakti saḥ  ātmānam śreyasā yuñjyāt pretaḥ tṛptim ciram vrajet

original: te tṛptāḥ śubhamicchanti nijabandhuṣu sarvadā / ajñātayastu ye duṣṭāḥ pīḍayanti svavaṃśajān //
analyzed: te tṛptāḥ śubham icchanti nija bandhuṣu sarvadā ajñātayaḥ tu ye duṣṭāḥ pīḍayanti sva vaṃśa jān

original: nivārayanti tṛptāste jāyamānānukampakāḥ / paścātte muktimāyanti kāle prāpte svaputrataḥ / sadā bandhuṣu yacchanti vṛddhimṛddhiṃ khagādhipa //
analyzed: nivārayanti tṛptāḥ te jāyamāna anukampakāḥ  paścāt te muktim āyanti kāle prāpte sva putrataḥ sadā bandhuṣu yacchanti vṛddhim ṛddhim khagādhipa

original: darśanādbhāṣaṇādyastu ceṣṭātaḥ pīḍanādgatim / na prāpayati mūḍhātmā pretaśāpaiḥ sa lipyate //
analyzed: darśanāt bhāṣaṇāt yaḥ tu ceṣṭātaḥ pīḍanāt gatim na prāpayati mūḍha ātmā preta śāpaiḥ sa lipyate

original: aputrako 'paśuścaiva daridro vyādhitastathā / vṛttihīnaśca hīnaśca bhavejjanmanijanmani //
analyzed: paśuḥ ca eva daridraḥ vyādhitaḥ tathā vṛtti hīnaḥ ca hīnaḥ ca bhavet janmani janmani

original: evaṃ bruvanti te pretāḥ punaryābhyaṃ samāśritāḥ / tatrasthānāṃ bhavenmuktiḥ svakāle karmasaṃkṣaye //
analyzed: evam bruvanti te pretāḥ punar yābhyam samāśritāḥ tatrasthānām bhavet muktiḥ sva kāle karma saṃkṣaye

original: garuḍa uvāca / nāma gotraṃ na dṛśyeta pratītirnaiva jāyate / kecidvadanti daivajñāḥ pīḍāṃ pretasamudbhavām //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca nāma gotram na dṛśyeta pratītiḥ na eva jāyate kecid vadanti daivajñāḥ pīḍām preta samudbhavām

original: na svapnaścaiṣṭitaṃ naiva darśanaṃ na kadācana / kiṃ kartavyaṃ suraśreṣṭha tatra me brūhi niścitam //
analyzed: na svapnaḥ ca eṣṭitam na eva darśanam na kadācana  kim kartavyam suraśreṣṭha tatra me brūhi niścitam

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / satyaṃ vāpyanṛtaṃ vāpi vadanti kṣitidevatāḥ / tadā sañcintya hṛdaye satyametaddvijeritam //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca satyam vā api anṛtam vā api vadanti kṣitidevatāḥ tadā sañcintya hṛdaye satyam etat dvija īritam

original: bhāvabhaktiṃ puraskṛtya pitṛbhaktiparāyaṇaḥ / kṛtvā kṛṣṇabaliṃ caiva puraścaraṇa pūrvakam //
analyzed: bhāva bhaktim puraskṛtya pitṛ bhakti parāyaṇaḥ kṛtvā kṛṣṇa balim ca eva puraścaraṇa pūrvakam

original: japahomaistathā dānaiḥ prakuryāddehasodhanam / kṛtena tena vighnāni vinaśyanti khageśvara //
analyzed: japa homaiḥ tathā dānaiḥ prakuryāt deha sodhanam  kṛtena tena vighnāni vinaśyanti khageśvara

original: bhūtapretapiśācairvā sa cedanyaiḥ prapīḍyate / pitruddeśena vai kuryānnārāyaṇabaliṃ tadā / vimuktaḥ sarvapīḍābhya iti satyaṃ vaco mama //
analyzed: bhūta preta piśācaiḥ vā sa ced anyaiḥ prapīḍyate pitṛ uddeśena vai kuryāt nārāyaṇa balim tadā  vimuktaḥ sarva pīḍābhyaḥ iti satyam vacaḥ mama

original: pitṛpīḍā bhavedyatra kṛtyairanyairna mucyate / tasmātsarvaprayatnena pitṛbhaktiparo bhavet //
analyzed: pitṛ pīḍā bhavet yatra kṛtyaiḥ anyaiḥ na mucyate tasmāt sarva prayatnena pitṛ bhakti paraḥ bhavet

original: navame daśame varṣe pikṣuddeśena vai pumān / gāyattrīmayutaṃ japtvā daśāṃśena ca homayet //
analyzed: navame daśame varṣe pikṣu deśena vai pumān gāyattrīm ayutam japtvā daśa aṃśena ca homayet

original: kṛtvā kṛṣṇabaliṃ pūrvaṃ vṛṣotsargādikāḥ kriyāḥ / sarvopadravahīnastu sarvasaukhyamavāpnuyāt / uttamaṃ lokamāpnoti jñātiprādhānyameva ca //
analyzed: kṛtvā kṛṣṇa balim pūrvam vṛṣotsarga ādikāḥ kriyāḥ sarva upadrava hīnaḥ tu sarva saukhyam avāpnuyāt  uttamam lokam āpnoti jñāti prādhānyam eva ca

original: pitṛmā tṛsamaṃ loke nāstyanyaddaivataṃ param / tasmātsarvaprayatnena pūjayetpitarau sadā //
analyzed: pitṛmā tṛ samam loke na asti anyat daivatam param  tasmāt sarva prayatnena pūjayet pitarau sadā

original: hitānāmupadeṣṭā hi pratyakṣaṃ daivataṃ pitā / anyā yā devatā loke na dehaprabhavo hi tāḥ //
analyzed: hitānām upadeṣṭā hi pratyakṣam daivatam pitā  anyāḥ yāḥ devatāḥ loke na deha prabhavaḥ hi tāḥ

original: śarīrameva jantūnāṃ svargamokṣaikasādhanam / deho datto hi yenaivaṃ ko 'nyaḥ pūjyatamastataḥ //
analyzed: śarīram eva jantūnām svarga mokṣa eka sādhanam dehaḥ dattaḥ hi yena evam kaḥ nyaḥ pūjyatamaḥ tatas

original: iti sañcintyahṛdaye pakṣinyadyatprayacchati / tatsarvamātmanā bhuṅkte dānaṃ vedavido viduḥ //
analyzed: iti sañcintya hṛdaye pakṣin yat yat prayacchati tat sarvam ātmanā bhuṅkte dānam veda vidaḥ viduḥ

original: punnāmanarakādyasmātpitaraṃ trāyate sutaḥ / tasmātputtra iti prokta iha cāpi paratra ca //
analyzed: punnāma narakāt yasmāt pitaram trāyate sutaḥ tasmāt puttraḥ iti proktaḥ iha ca api paratra ca

original: apamṛtyumṛtau syātāṃ pitarau kasyacitkhaga / vratatīrthāvivāhādiśrāddhaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ tyajet //
analyzed: apamṛtyu mṛtau syātām pitarau kasyacid khaga vrata tīrtha avivāha ādi śrāddham saṃvatsaram tyajet

original: svapnādhyāyamimaṃ yastu preta liṅganidarśakam / yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi pretacihnaṃ na paśyati //
analyzed: svapnādhyāyam imam yaḥ tu preta liṅga nidarśakam  yaḥ paṭhet śṛṇuyāt vā api preta cihnam na paśyati

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakādṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde svapnādhyāyo nāmaikaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde svapnādhyāyaḥ nāma ekaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 22
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / sambhavanti kathaṃ pretāḥ kena teṣāṃ gatirbhavet / kīdṛkteṣāṃ bhavedrūpaṃ bhojanaṃ kiṃ bhavetprabho //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca sambhavanti katham pretāḥ kena teṣām gatiḥ bhavet kīdṛś teṣām bhavet rūpam bhojanam kim bhavet prabho

original: suprītāste kathaṃ pretāḥ kva tiṣṭhanti sureśvara / prasannaḥ kṛpayā deva praśramenaṃ vadasva me //
analyzed: su prītāḥ te katham pretāḥ kva tiṣṭhanti sureśvara prasannaḥ kṛpayā deva praśram enam vadasva me

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / pāpakarmaratā ye vai pūrvakarmavaśānugāḥ / jāyante te mṛtāḥ pretāstāñchṛṇuṣva vadāmyaham //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca pāpa karma ratāḥ ye vai pūrva karma vaśa anugāḥ jāyante te mṛtāḥ pretāḥ tān śṛṇuṣva vadāmi aham

original: vāpīkūpataḍāgāṃśca ārāmaṃ suramandiram / prapāṃ sadma suvṛkṣāṃśca tathā bhojanaśālikāḥ //
analyzed: vāpī kūpa taḍāgān ca ārāmam sura mandiram prapām sadma su vṛkṣān ca tathā bhojana śālikāḥ

original: pitṛpaitāmahaṃ dharmaṃ kikrīṇāti sa pāpabhāk / mṛtaḥ pretatvamāpnoti yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam //
analyzed: pitṛpaitāmaham dharmam sa pāpa bhāj mṛtaḥ preta tvam āpnoti yāvat ābhūtasaṃplavam

original: gocaraṃ grāmasīmāṃ taḍāgārāmagahvaram / karṣayanti ca ye lobhātpretāste vai bhavanti hi //
analyzed: gocaram grāma sīmām taḍāga ārāma gahvaram karṣayanti ca ye lobhāt pretāḥ te vai bhavanti hi

original: caṇḍālādudakātsarpādbrāhmaṇādbaidyutāgnitaḥ / daṃṣṭribhyaśca paśubhyaśca maraṇaṃ pāpakarmiṇām //
analyzed: caṇḍālāt udakāt sarpāt brāhmaṇāt baidyuta agnitaḥ daṃṣṭribhyaḥ ca paśubhyaḥ ca maraṇam pāpa karmiṇām

original: udbandhanamṛtā ye ca viṣaśastrahatāśca ye / ātmopaghātino ye ca viṣūcyādihatāstathā //
analyzed: udbandhana mṛtāḥ ye ca viṣa śastra hatāḥ ca ye  ātma upaghātinaḥ ye ca viṣūcī ādi hatāḥ tathā

original: mahārogairmṛtā ye ca pāparogaiśca dasyubhiḥ / asaṃskṛtapramītā ye vihitācāravarjitāḥ //
analyzed: mahā rogaiḥ mṛtāḥ ye ca pāpa rogaiḥ ca dasyubhiḥ a saṃskṛta pramītāḥ ye vihita ācāra varjitāḥ

original: vṛṣotsargādiluptāścaluptamāsikapiṇḍakāḥ / yasyānayati śūdrogniṃ tṛṇakāṣṭhahavīṃṣi saḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣotsarga ādi luptāḥ ca lupta māsika piṇḍakāḥ yasya ānayati śūdraḥ ugnim tṛṇa kāṣṭha havīṃṣi saḥ

original: patanātparvatānāṃ ca bhittipātena ye mṛtāḥ / rajasvalādidoṣaiśca na ca bhūmau matāśca ye //
analyzed: patanāt parvatānām ca bhitti pātena ye mṛtāḥ rajasvalā ādi doṣaiḥ ca na ca bhūmau matāḥ ca ye

original: antarikṣe mṛtā ye ca viṣṇusmaraṇavarjitāḥ / sūtakaiḥ śvādisaṃparkaiḥ pretabhāvā iha kṣitau //
analyzed: antarikṣe mṛtāḥ ye ca viṣṇu smaraṇa varjitāḥ sūtakaiḥ śva ādi saṃparkaiḥ preta bhāvāḥ iha kṣitau

original: evamādibhiranyaiśca kumṛtyuvaśagāśca ye / te sarve pretayonisthā vicaranti marusthale //
analyzed: evamādibhiḥ anyaiḥ ca kumṛtyu vaśagāḥ ca ye te sarve preta yoni sthāḥ vicaranti maru sthale

original: mātaraṃ bhaginīṃ bhāryāṃ snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ tathā / adṛṣṭadoṣāṃ tyajati sa preto jāyatedhruvam //
analyzed: mātaram bhaginīm bhāryām snuṣām duhitaram tathā adṛṣṭa doṣām tyajati sa pretaḥ jāyate dhruvam

original: bhrātṛdhrugbrahmahā goghnaḥ surāpo gurutalpagaḥ / hemakṣaumaharastārkṣya sa vai pretatvamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: bhrātṛ druh brahma hā go ghnaḥ surā paḥ gurutalpa gaḥ hema kṣauma haraḥ tārkṣya sa vai preta tvam āpnuyāt

original: nyāsāpahartā mitradhruk paradāraratastathā / viśvāsaghātī krūrastu sa preto jāyate dhruvam //
analyzed: nyāsa apahartā para dāra rataḥ tathā viśvāsa ghātī krūraḥ tu sa pretaḥ jāyate dhruvam

original: kulamārgāṃśca santyajya paradharmaratastathā / vidyāvṛttavihīnaśca sa preto jāyatedhruvam //
analyzed: kula mārgān ca santyajya para dharma rataḥ tathā vidyā vṛtta vihīnaḥ ca sa pretaḥ jāyate dhruvam

original: atraivodāharantīmamitihāsaṃ purātanam / yudhiṣṭhirasya saṃvādaṃ bhīṣmeṇa saha suvrata / tadahaṃ kathayiṣyāmi yacchrutvā saukhyamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: atra eva udāharanti imam itihāsam purātanam yudhiṣṭhirasya saṃvādam bhīṣmeṇa saha suvrata tat aham kathayiṣyāmi yat śrutvā saukhyam āpnuyāt

original: yudhiṣṭhira uvāca / kena karmavipākena pretatvamupajāyate / kena vā mucyate kasmāttanme brūhi pitāmaha / yacchrutvā na punarmohamevaṃ yāsyā mi suvrata //
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca kena karma vipākena preta tvam upajāyate kena vā mucyate kasmāt tat me brūhi pitāmaha yat śrutvā na punar moham evam yāsyāmi suvrata

original: bhīṣma uvāca / yenaiva jāyate preto yenaiva sa vimucyate / prāpnoti narakaṃ ghoraṃ dustaraṃ daivatairapi //
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ uvāca yena eva jāyate pretaḥ yena eva sa vimucyate prāpnoti narakam ghoram dustaram daivataiḥ api

original: satataṃ śravaṇādyasya puṇyaśravaṇakīrtanāt / mānavā vipramucyante āpannāḥ pretayoniṣu //
analyzed: satatam śravaṇa ādyasya puṇya śravaṇa kīrtanāt mānavāḥ vipramucyante āpannāḥ preta yoniṣu

original: śrūyate hi purā vatsa brāhmaṇaḥ śaṃsitavrataḥ / nāmnā santaptakaḥ khyāta stapor'the vanamāśritaḥ //
analyzed: śrūyate hi purā vatsa brāhmaṇaḥ śaṃsita vrataḥ nāmnā santaptakaḥ khyātaḥ stapaḥ rthe vanam āśritaḥ

original: svādhyāyayukto homena yo (yā)
analyzed: svādhyāya yuktaḥ homena yaḥ yā

original: gayukto dayānvitaḥ / yajansa sakalānyajñānyuktyā kālaṃ ca vikṣipan //
analyzed: ga yuktaḥ dayā anvitaḥ yajan sa sakalān yajñān yuktyā kālam ca vikṣipan

original: brahāmacaryasamāyukto yuktastapasi mārdave / paralokabhayopetaḥ satyaśaucaiśca nirmalaḥ //
analyzed: brahā āmacarya samāyuktaḥ yuktaḥ tapasi mārdave para loka bhaya upetaḥ satya śaucaiḥ ca nirmalaḥ

original: yukto 'hi guruvākyena yuktaścātithipūjane / ātmayoge sadodyuktaḥ sarvadvandvavivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: yuktaḥ hi guru vākyena yuktaḥ ca atithi pūjane ātma yoge sadā udyuktaḥ sarva dvandva vivarjitaḥ

original: yogābhyāse sadā yuktaḥ saṃsāravijigīṣayā / evaṃvṛttaḥ sadācāro mokṣakāṅkṣī jitendriyaḥ //
analyzed: yoga abhyāse sadā yuktaḥ saṃsāra vijigīṣayā evaṃvṛttaḥ sat ācāraḥ mokṣa kāṅkṣī jita indriyaḥ

original: bahūnyabdāni vijane vane tasya gatāni vai / tasya buddhistato jātā tīrthānugamanaṃ prati //
analyzed: bahūni abdāni vijane vane tasya gatāni vai tasya buddhiḥ tatas jātā tīrtha anugamanam prati

original: puṇyaistīrthajalaireva śoṣayiṣye kalevaram / sa tīrthetvaritaṃ snātvā tapasvī bhāskarodaye / kṛtajāpyanamaskāro hyadhvānaṃ pratyapadyata //
analyzed: puṇyaiḥ tīrtha jalaiḥ eva śoṣayiṣye kalevaram  sa tīrtha itvaritam snātvā tapasvī bhāskara udaye kṛta jāpya namaskāraḥ hi adhvānam pratyapadyata

original: ekasmindivase vipro mārgabhraṣṭo mahātapāḥ / dadarśādhvani gacchansa pañca pretān sudāruṇān //
analyzed: ekasmin divase vipraḥ mārga bhraṣṭaḥ mahā tapāḥ dadarśa adhvani gacchan sa pañca pretān su dāruṇān

original: araṇye nirjane deśe saṃkaṭe vṛkṣavarjite / pañcaitānvikṛtākārāndṛṣṭvā vai ghoradarśanān / īṣatsantrastahṛdayo 'tiṣṭhadunmīlya locane //
analyzed: araṇye nirjane deśe saṃkaṭe vṛkṣa varjite  pañca etān vikṛta ākārān dṛṣṭvā vai ghora darśanān īṣat santrasta hṛdayaḥ tiṣṭhat unmīlya locane

original: avalambya tato dhairyaṃ bhayamutsṛjya dūrataḥ / papraccha madhurābhāṣī ke yūyaṃ vikṛtānanāḥ //
analyzed: avalambya tatas dhairyam bhayam utsṛjya dūratas papraccha madhura ābhāṣī ke yūyam vikṛta ānanāḥ

original: kiñcāśubhaṃ kṛtaṃ karma yena prāptāḥ stha vaikṛtam / kathaṃ vā caikataḥ karma prasthitāḥ kutra niścitam //
analyzed: kiñca aśubham kṛtam karma yena prāptāḥ stha vaikṛtam katham vā ca ekatas karma prasthitāḥ kutra niścitam

original: pretarāja uvāca / svaiḥ svaistu karmabhiḥ prāptaṃ pretatvaṃ hi dvijottama / paradroharatāḥ sarve pāpamṛtyuvaśaṃ gatāḥ //
analyzed: pretarājaḥ uvāca svaiḥ svaiḥ tu karmabhiḥ prāptam preta tvam hi dvijottama para droha ratāḥ sarve pāpa mṛtyu vaśam gatāḥ

original: kṣutpipāsārditā nityaṃ pretatvaṃ samupāgatāḥ / hatavākyā hataśrīkā hata saṃjñā vicetasaḥ //
analyzed: kṣudh pipāsā arditāḥ nityam preta tvam samupāgatāḥ hata vākyāḥ hata śrīkāḥ hata saṃjñāḥ vicetasaḥ

original: na jānīmo diśaṃ tāta vidiśaṃ cātiduḥ khitāḥ / kva nu gacchāmahe mūḍhāḥ piśācāḥ karmajā vayam //
analyzed: na jānīmaḥ diśam tāta vidiśam ca ati duḥkhitāḥ kva nu gacchāmahe mūḍhāḥ piśācāḥ karma jāḥ vayam

original: na mātā na pitāsmākaṃ pretatvaṃ karmabhiḥ svakaiḥ / prāptāḥ sma sahasā jātaduḥ khodvegasamākulam //
analyzed: na mātā na pitā asmākam preta tvam karmabhiḥ svakaiḥ prāptāḥ sma sahasā jāta duḥ kha udvega samākulam

original: darśanena ca te brahmanmuditāpyāyitā vayam / muhūrtantiṣṭha vakṣyāmi vṛttāntaṃ sarvamāditaḥ //
analyzed: darśanena ca te brahman mudita āpyāyitāḥ vayam muhūrtam tiṣṭha vakṣyāmi vṛttāntam sarvam āditas

original: ahaṃ paryuṣito nāma eṣa sūcīmukhastathā / śīghrago rogha (ha)
analyzed: aham paryuṣitaḥ nāma eṣa sūcīmukhaḥ tathā ha

original: kaścaiva pañcamo lekhakaḥ smatṛtaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ ca eva pañcamaḥ lekhakaḥ smatṛtaḥ

original: evaṃ nāmnā ca sarve vai saṃprāptāḥ pretatāṃ vayam / brāhmaṇa uvāca / pretānāṃ karmajātānāṃ kathaṃ vai nāmasambhavaḥ / kiñcitkāraṇamudiśya yena brūyāḥ svanāmakān //
analyzed: evam nāmnā ca sarve vai saṃprāptāḥ preta tām vayam  brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca pretānām karma jātānām katham vai nāma sambhavaḥ kiñcid kāraṇam udiśya yena brūyāḥ sva nāmakān

original: pretarāja uvāca / mayā svādu sadā bhuktaṃ dattaṃ paryuṣitaṃ dvija //
analyzed: pretarājaḥ uvāca mayā svādu sadā bhuktam dattam paryuṣitam dvija

original: śīghraṃ gacchati vipreṇa yācitaḥ kṣudhitena vai / etatkāraṇamuddiśya nāma paryuṣitaṃ mama //
analyzed: śīghram gacchati vipreṇa yācitaḥ kṣudhitena vai etat kāraṇam uddiśya nāma paryuṣitam mama

original: śīghraṃ gacchati vipreṇa yācitaḥ kṣudhitena vai / etatkāraṇamuddiśya śīghrago 'yaṃ dvijottama //
analyzed: śīghram gacchati vipreṇa yācitaḥ kṣudhitena vai etat kāraṇam uddiśya śīghra gaḥ yam dvijottama

original: sūcitā bahavo 'nena viprā annādhikāṅkṣayā / etatkāraṇamuddiśya eṣa sūcimukhaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: sūcitāḥ bahavaḥ nena viprāḥ anna adhikāṅkṣayā etad kāraṇam uddiśya eṣa sūcimukhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: ekākī miṣṭamaśrāti poṣyavargamṛte sadā / brāhmaṇānāmabhāvena rodha (ha)
analyzed: ekākī poṣya vargam ṛte sadā brāhmaṇānām abhāvena rodha ha

original: kastena cocyate //
analyzed: kaḥ tena ca ucyate

original: purāyaṃ maunamāsthāya yācito vilikhedbhuvam / tena karmavipākena lekhako nāma cocyate //
analyzed: purā ayam maunam āsthāya yācitaḥ vilikhet bhuvam tena karma vipākena lekhakaḥ nāma ca ucyate

original: pretatvaṃ karmabhāvena prāptaṃ nāmāni ca dvija / meṣānano lekhako 'yaṃ rodha (ha)
analyzed: preta tvam karma bhāvena prāptam nāmāni ca dvija meṣa ānanaḥ lekhakaḥ yam rodha ha

original: kaḥ parvatānanaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ parvata ānanaḥ

original: śīghragaḥ puśuvaktraśca sūcakaḥ sūcivaktravān / duḥkhitā nitarāṃ svaminpaśya rūpaviparyayam //
analyzed: śīghragaḥ puśuvaktraḥ ca sūcakaḥ sūcivaktravān duḥkhitā nitarām svamin paśya rūpa viparyayam

original: kṛtvā māyāmayaṃ rūpaṃ vicarāmo mahītale / sarve ca vikṛtākārā lamboṣṭhā vikṛtānanāḥ //
analyzed: kṛtvā māyā mayam rūpam vicarāmaḥ mahī tale sarve ca vikṛta ākārāḥ lamba uṣṭhāḥ vikṛta ānanāḥ

original: bṛhaccharīriṇo raudrā jātāḥ svenaiva karmaṇā / etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ pretatve kāraṇaṃ mayā //
analyzed: bṛhat śarīriṇaḥ raudrāḥ jātāḥ svena eva karmaṇā etat te sarvam ākhyātam preta tve kāraṇam mayā

original: jñānino 'pi vayaṃ sarve jātāḥ sma tava darśanāt / yatra te śravaṇe śraddhā tatpṛccha kathayāmi te //
analyzed: jñāninaḥ pi vayam sarve jātāḥ sma tava darśanāt  yatra te śravaṇe śraddhā tat pṛccha kathayāmi te

original: brāhmaṇa uvāca / ye jīvā bhuvi jīvanti sarve 'pyāhāramūlakāḥ / yuṣmākamapicāhāraṃ śrotumicchāmi tattvataḥ //
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca ye jīvāḥ bhuvi jīvanti sarve pi āhāra mūlakāḥ yuṣmākam api ca āhāram śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ

original: pretā ūcuḥ / yadi te śravaṇe śraddhā āhārāṇāṃ dvijottama / asmākaṃ tu mahībhāga śṛṇutvaṃ susamāhitaḥ //
analyzed: pretāḥ ūcuḥ yadi te śravaṇe śraddhā āhārāṇām dvijottama asmākam tu mahībhāga śṛṇutvam su samāhitaḥ

original: brāhmaṇa uvāca / kathayantu mahāpretā āhāraṃ ca pṛthakpṛthak / ityuktāṃ brāhmaṇenemamūcuḥ pretāḥ pṛthakapṛthak //
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca kathayantu mahāpretāḥ āhāram ca pṛthak pṛthak iti uktām brāhmaṇena imam ūcuḥ pretāḥ pṛthak pṛthak

original: pretā ūcuḥ / śṛṇu cāhāramasmākaṃ sarvasattbavigarhitam / yacchrutvā garhase brahman bhūyobhūyaśca garhitam //
analyzed: pretāḥ ūcuḥ śṛṇu ca āhāram asmākam sarva sattba vigarhitam yat śrutvā garhase brahman bhūyas bhūyas ca garhitam

original: śleṣmamūtrapurīṣotthaṃ śarīrāṇāṃ malaiḥ saha / ucchiṣṭaiścaiva cānyaiśca pretānāṃ bhojanaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: śleṣma mūtra purīṣa uttham śarīrāṇām malaiḥ saha ucchiṣṭaiḥ ca eva ca anyaiḥ ca pretānām bhojanam bhavet

original: gṛhāṇi cāpyaśaucāni prakīrṇopaskarāṇi ca / malināni prasūtāni pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai //
analyzed: gṛhāṇi ca api aśaucāni prakīrṇa upaskarāṇi ca  malināni prasūtāni pretāḥ bhuñjanti tatra vai

original: nāsti satyaṃ gṛhe yatra na śaucaṃ na ca saṃyamaḥ / patitairdasyubhiḥ saṅgaḥ pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai //
analyzed: na asti satyam gṛhe yatra na śaucam na ca saṃyamaḥ patitaiḥ dasyubhiḥ saṅgaḥ pretāḥ bhuñjanti tatra vai

original: balimantravihīnāni homahīnāni yāni ca / svādhyāya vratahīnāni pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai //
analyzed: bali mantra vihīnāni homa hīnāni yāni ca svādhyāya vrata hīnāni pretāḥ bhuñjanti tatra vai

original: na lajjā na ca maryādā yadātra strījito gṛhī / guravo yatra pūjyā na pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai //
analyzed: na lajjā na ca maryādā yadā atra strī jitaḥ gṛhī guravaḥ yatra pūjyāḥ na pretāḥ bhuñjanti tatra vai

original: yatra lobhastathā krodho nidrā śoko bhayaṃ madaḥ / ālasyaṃ kalaho nityaṃ pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai //
analyzed: yatra lobhaḥ tathā krodhaḥ nidrā śokaḥ bhayam madaḥ ālasyam kalahaḥ nityam pretāḥ bhuñjanti tatra vai

original: bhartṛhīnā ca yā nārī paravīryaṃ niṣevate / bījaṃ mūtrasamāyurkta pretā bhuñjanti tattu vai //
analyzed: bhartṛ hīnā ca yā nārī para vīryam niṣevate  bījam pretāḥ bhuñjanti tat tu vai

original: lajjā me jāyate tāta vadato bhojanaṃ svakam / yatstrīrajo yonigataṃ pretā bhuñjanti tattu vai //
analyzed: lajjā me jāyate tāta vadataḥ bhojanam svakam yat strī rajaḥ yoni gatam pretāḥ bhuñjanti tat tu vai

original: nirviṇṇāḥ pretabhāvena pṛcchāmi tvāṃ dṛḍhavrata / yathā na bhavitā pretastanme vada tapodhana / nityaṃ mṛtyurvaraṃ jantoḥ pretatvaṃ mā bhavetkvacit //
analyzed: nirviṇṇāḥ preta bhāvena pṛcchāmi tvām dṛḍha vrata yathā na bhavitā pretaḥ tat me vada tapodhana nityam mṛtyuḥ varam jantoḥ preta tvam mā bhavet kvacid

original: brāhmaṇa uvāca / upavāsaparo nityaṃ kṛcchracāndrāyaṇe rataḥ / vrataiśca vividhaiḥ pūto na preto jāyate naraḥ //
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca  upavāsa paraḥ nityam kṛcchra cāndrāyaṇe rataḥ vrataiḥ ca vividhaiḥ pūtaḥ na pretaḥ jāyate naraḥ

original: ekādaśyāṃ vrataṃ kurvañjāgareṇa samanvitam / aparaiḥ sukṛtaiḥ pūto na preto na preto jāyate naraḥ //
analyzed: ekādaśyām vratam kurvan jāgareṇa samanvitam aparaiḥ sukṛtaiḥ pūtaḥ na pretaḥ na pretaḥ jāyate naraḥ

original: iṣṭvā vai vāśvamedhādīndadyāddānāni yo naraḥ / ārāmodyānavāpyādeḥ prapāyāścaiva kārakaḥ //
analyzed: iṣṭvā vai vā aśvamedha ādīn dadyāt dānāni yaḥ naraḥ ārāma udyāna vāpī ādeḥ prapāyāḥ ca eva kārakaḥ

original: kumārīṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ tu vivāhayati śaktitaḥ / vidyādo 'bhayadaścaiva na preto jāyate naraḥ //
analyzed: kumārīm brāhmaṇānām tu vivāhayati śaktitas vidyā daḥ bhaya daḥ ca eva na pretaḥ jāyate naraḥ

original: śūdrānnena tu bhuktena jaṭharasthena yo mṛtaḥ / durmṛtyunā mṛto yaśca sa preto jāyate naraḥ //
analyzed: śūdra annena tu bhuktena jaṭhara sthena yaḥ mṛtaḥ durmṛtyunā mṛtaḥ yaḥ ca sa pretaḥ jāyate naraḥ

original: ayājyayājakaścaiva yājyānāṃ ca vivarjakaḥ / kārubhiśca rato nityaṃ sa preto jāyate naraḥ //
analyzed: a yājya yājakaḥ ca eva yājyānām ca vivarjakaḥ kārubhiḥ ca rataḥ nityam sa pretaḥ jāyate naraḥ

original: kṛtvā madyapasamparkaṃ madyapastrīniṣevaṇam / ajñānādbhakṣayanmāṃsaṃ sa preto jāyate naraḥ //
analyzed: kṛtvā madyapa samparkam madyapa strī niṣevaṇam ajñānāt bhakṣayan māṃsam sa pretaḥ jāyate naraḥ

original: devadravyaṃ ca brahmasvaṃ gurudravyaṃ tathaiva ca / kanyāṃ dadāti śulkena sa preto jāyate naraḥ //
analyzed: deva dravyam ca brahma svam guru dravyam tathā eva ca kanyām dadāti śulkena sa pretaḥ jāyate naraḥ

original: mātaraṃ bhaginīṃ bhāryāṃ snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ tathāḥ / adṛṣṭadoṣāstyajati sa preto jādṛ //
analyzed: mātaram bhaginīm bhāryām snuṣām duhitaram adṛṣṭa doṣāḥ tyajati sa pretaḥ

original: nyāsāpahartā mitradhrukparadārarataḥ sadā / viśvāsaghātī kūṭaśca sa predṛ //
analyzed: nyāsa apahartā sadā viśvāsa ghātī kūṭaḥ ca sa

original: bhrātṛdhrugbrahmahā goghnaḥ surāpo gurutalpagaḥ / kulamārgaṃ parityajya hyanṛtoktau sadā rataḥ / hartā hemnaśca bhūmeśca sa predṛ //
analyzed: bhrātṛ druh brahma hā go ghnaḥ surā paḥ gurutalpa gaḥ kula mārgam parityajya hi anṛta uktau sadā rataḥ hartā hemnaḥ ca bhūmeḥ ca sa

original: bhīṣma uvāca / evaṃ bruvati vai vipre ākāśe dundubhisvanaḥ / apatatpuṣpavarṣaṃ ca devarmuktaṃ dvijopari //
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ uvāca evam bruvati vai vipre ākāśe dundubhi svanaḥ apatat puṣpa varṣam ca dvija upari

original: pañca devavimānāni pretānāmāgatāni vai / svargaṃ gatā vimānaiste divyaiḥ saṃpṛcchya taṃ munim //
analyzed: pañca deva vimānāni pretānām āgatāni vai svargam gatāḥ vimānaiḥ te divyaiḥ saṃpṛcchya tam munim

original: jñānaṃ viprasya sambhāṣātpuṇyasaṃkīrtanena ca / pretāḥ pāpavinirmuktāḥ paraṃ padamavāpnuyuḥ //
analyzed: jñānam viprasya sambhāṣāt puṇya saṃkīrtanena ca pretāḥ pāpa vinirmuktāḥ param padam avāpnuyuḥ

original: sūta uvāca / idamākhyānakaṃ śrutvā kampito 'śvatthapatravat / mānuṣāṇāṃ hitārthāya garuḍaḥ pṛṣṭavānpunaḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca idam ākhyānakam śrutvā śvattha patra vat  mānuṣāṇām hita arthāya garuḍaḥ pṛṣṭavān punar

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe bhīṣma yudhiṣṭhirasaṃvāde pretatvotpattitanmuktipeñcapretopākhyāna  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe preta kalpe bhīṣma yudhiṣṭhira saṃvāde

original: nirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nirūpaṇam nāma dvāviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 23
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / kiṅkiṃ kurvanti vai pretāḥ piśācatvevyavasthitāḥ / vadanti vā kadācitkiṃ tadvadasva sureśvara //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca kim kim kurvanti vai pretāḥ piśāca tve vyavasthitāḥ vadanti vā kadācid kim tat vadasva sureśvara

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / teṣāṃ svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi cihnaṃ svapnaṃ yathātatham / kṣutpipāsārditāste vai praviśeyuḥ svaveśmani //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca teṣām svarūpam vakṣyāmi cihnam svapnam yathātatham kṣudh pipāsā arditāḥ te vai praviśeyuḥ sva veśmani

original: pratiṣṭhā vāyudeheṣu śayānāṃstu svavaṃśajān / tatra yacchanti liṅgāni darśayanti khageśvara //
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāḥ vāyu deheṣu śayānān tu sva vaṃśa jān tatra yacchanti liṅgāni darśayanti khageśvara

original: svaputrasvakalatrāṇi svabandhuntatra gacchati / hayo gajo vṛṣo martyodṛśyate vikṛtānanaḥ //
analyzed: sva putra sva kalatrāṇi sva bandhun tatra gacchati hayaḥ gajaḥ vṛṣaḥ martyaḥ dṛśyate vikṛta ānanaḥ

original: śayānaṃ viparītaṃ tu ātmānaṃ ca viparyayam / utthitaḥ paśyati yastu tadvindyātpretanirmitam //
analyzed: śayānam viparītam tu ātmānam ca viparyayam  utthitaḥ paśyati yaḥ tu tat vindyāt preta nirmitam

original: svapne narau hi nigaḍairbadhyate bahudhā yadi / annaṃ ca yācate svapne kuveṣaḥ pūrvajo mṛtaḥ //
analyzed: svapne narau hi nigaḍaiḥ badhyate bahudhā yadi annam ca yācate svapne ku veṣaḥ pūrvajaḥ mṛtaḥ

original: svapne yo bhujyamānasya gṛhītvānnaṃ palāyate / ātmanastu paro vāpi tṛṣārtastu jalaṃ pibet //
analyzed: svapne yaḥ bhujyamānasya gṛhītvā annam palāyate ātmanaḥ tu paraḥ vā api tṛṣā ārtaḥ tu jalam pibet

original: vṛṣabhārohaṇaṃ svapne vṛṣabhaiḥ saha gacchati / utpatya gaganaṃ yāti tīrthe yāti kṣudhāturaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣabha ārohaṇam svapne vṛṣabhaiḥ saha gacchati utpatya gaganam yāti tīrthe yāti kṣudhā āturaḥ

original: svavācā vadate yastu govṛṣadvijāvājiṣu / liṅge gaje tathā deve bhūte prete niśācare //
analyzed: sva vācā vadate yaḥ tu go vṛṣa dvijā vājiṣu  liṅge gaje tathā deve bhūte prete niśācare

original: svapnamadhye tu pakṣīndra pretaliṅgānyanekadhā / svakalatraṃ svabandhuṃ vā svasutaṃ svapatiṃ vibhum / vidyamānaṃ mṛtaṃ paśyetpretadoṣeṇa niścitam //
analyzed: svapna madhye tu pakṣi indra preta liṅgāni anekadhā sva kalatram sva bandhum vā sva sutam sva patim vibhum  vidyamānam mṛtam paśyet preta doṣeṇa niścitam

original: yācate yaḥ paraṃ svapne kṣuttṛḍbhyāṃ ca pariplutaḥ / tīrthe gatvā dahetpiṇḍānpretadauṣairna saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: yācate yaḥ param svapne kṣudh tṛḍbhyām ca pariplutaḥ tīrthe gatvā dahet piṇḍān preta dauṣaiḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: nirgacchedvā gṛhādvāpi svapne putrastathā paśuḥ / pitā bhrātā kalatraṃ ca pretadoṣaistu paśyati //
analyzed: nirgacchet vā gṛhāt vā api svapne putraḥ tathā paśuḥ pitā bhrātā kalatram ca preta doṣaiḥ tu paśyati

original: cihnānyetāni pakṣīndra prāyaścittaṃ nivedayet / kṛtvā snānaṃ gṛhe tīrthe śrīvṛkṣe tarpaṇaṃ jalaiḥ //
analyzed: cihnāni etāni pakṣi indra prāyaścittam nivedayet kṛtvā snānam gṛhe tīrthe śrīvṛkṣe tarpaṇam jalaiḥ

original: kṛṣṇadhānyāni pūjāṃ ca pradadyādvedapārage / homaṃ kuryādyathāśakti sampūrṇaṃ vācayetsudhīḥ //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa dhānyāni pūjām ca pradadyāt vedapārage homam kuryāt yathāśakti sampūrṇam vācayet sudhīḥ

original: etaddhi śraddhayā yastu pretaliṅganidarśanam / paṭhate śṛṇute vāpi pretacihnaṃ vinaśyati //
analyzed: etat hi śraddhayā yaḥ tu preta liṅga nidarśanam paṭhate śṛṇute vā api preta cihnam vinaśyati

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretakṛtitaduktitaccihnatadvimuktyupāyanirūpaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde preta kṛti tad ukti tad cihna tad vimukti upāya nirūpaṇam

original: nāma trayoviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nāma trayoviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 24
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / nākāle mriyate kaściditi vedānuśāsanam / kasmānmṛtyumavāpnoti rājā vā śrotriyopi vā //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca na akāle mriyate kaścid iti veda anuśāsanam kasmāt mṛtyum avāpnoti rājā vā śrotriyaḥ api vā

original: yaduktaṃ brāhmaṇā pūrvamanṛtaṃ taddhi dṛśyate / vedairuktaṃ tu yadvākyaṃ śataṃ jīvati mānuṣe //
analyzed: yat uktam brāhmaṇā pūrvam anṛtam tat hi dṛśyate vedaiḥ uktam tu yat vākyam śatam jīvati mānuṣe

original: jīvanti mānuṣe loke sarve varṇā dvijātayaḥ / antyajāmlecchajāścaiva khaṇḍe bhāratasaṃjñake //
analyzed: jīvanti mānuṣe loke sarve varṇāḥ dvijātayaḥ antyaja a mleccha jāḥ ca eva khaṇḍe bhārata saṃjñake

original: na dṛśyate kalau tacca kasmāddeva samādiśa / (ādhānānmṛtyumāpnoti bālo vā sthaviro yubā //
analyzed: na dṛśyate kalau tat ca kasmāt deva samādiśa ādhānāt mṛtyum āpnoti bālaḥ vā sthaviraḥ

original: sadhano nirdhano vāpi sukumāraḥ surūpavān / avidvāṃścaiva vidvāṃśca brāhmaṇastvitaro janaḥ //
analyzed: sa dhanaḥ nirdhanaḥ vā api su kumāraḥ su rūpavān  a vidvān ca eva vidvān ca brāhmaṇaḥ tu itaraḥ janaḥ

original: taporato yogaśīlo mahājñānī ca yo naraḥ / sarvajñānarataḥ śrīmāndharmātmātulavikramaḥ //
analyzed: tapaḥ rataḥ yoga śīlaḥ mahā jñānī ca yaḥ naraḥ sarva jñāna rataḥ śrīmān dharma ātmā atula vikramaḥ

original: sarvametadaśaṣeṇa jāyate vasudhātale / kasmānmṛtyumavāpnoti rājā vā śrotriyo 'pi vā //
analyzed: sarvam etat aśaṣeṇa jāyate vasudhā tale  kasmāt mṛtyum avāpnoti rājā vā vā

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / sādhusādhu mahāprājña yastvaṃ bhakto 'si me priyaḥ / śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ guhyaṃ nānādeśavināśanam //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca sādhu sādhu mahā prājña yaḥ tvam si me priyaḥ śrūyatām vacanam guhyam nānā deśa vināśanam

original: vidhātṛvihito mṛtyuḥ śīghramādāya gacchati / tato vakṣyāmi pakṣīndra kāśyapeya mahādyute //
analyzed: vidhātṛ vihitaḥ mṛtyuḥ śīghram ādāya gacchati tatas vakṣyāmi pakṣi indra kāśyapeya mahā dyute

original: mānuṣaḥ śatajīvīti purā vedena bhāṣitam / vikarmaṇaḥ prabhāveṇa śīghraṃ cāpi vinaśyati //
analyzed: mānuṣaḥ śata jīvī iti purā vedena bhāṣitam vikarmaṇaḥ prabhāveṇa śīghram ca api vinaśyati

original: vedānabhyasanenaiva kulācāraṃ na sevate / ālasyātkarmaṇāṃ tyāgo niṣiddhe 'pyādaraḥ sadā //
analyzed: veda anabhyasanena eva kula ācāram na sevate  ālasyāt karmaṇām tyāgaḥ niṣiddhe pi ādaraḥ sadā

original: yatra tatra gṛhe 'śrāti parakṣetraratastathā / etairanyairmahādoṣairjāyate cāyuṣaḥ kṣayaḥ //
analyzed: yatra tatra gṛhe para kṣetra rataḥ tathā etaiḥ anyaiḥ mahā doṣaiḥ jāyate ca āyuṣaḥ kṣayaḥ

original: aśraddadhānamaśuciṃ nāstikaṃ tyaktamaṅgalam / paradrohānṛtaraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ yata (ma)
analyzed: aśraddadhānam aśucim nāstikam tyakta maṅgalam para droha anṛtaram brāhmaṇam yata ma

original: mandiram //
analyzed: mandiram

original: arakṣitāraṃ rājānaṃ nityaṃ dharmavivarjitam / krūraṃ vyasaninaṃ mūrkhaṃ vedavādabahiṣkṛtam / prajāpīḍanakartāraṃ rājānaṃ yamaśāsanam //
analyzed: arakṣitāram rājānam nityam dharma vivarjitam krūram vyasaninam mūrkham veda vāda bahiṣkṛtam prajā pīḍana kartāram rājānam yama śāsanam

original: prāpayanti vaśaṃ mṛtyostato yāti ca yātanām / svakarmāṇi parityajya mukhyavṛttāni yāni ca //
analyzed: prāpayanti vaśam mṛtyoḥ tatas yāti ca yātanām sva karmāṇi parityajya mukhya vṛttāni yāni ca

original: parakarmarato nityaṃ yamalokaṃ sa gacchati / śūdraḥ karotiḥ yatkiñcidvijaśuśrūṣaṇaṃ vinā //
analyzed: para karma rataḥ nityam yama lokam sa gacchati śūdraḥ yat kiñcid vija śuśrūṣaṇam vinā

original: uttamādhamamadhye vā yamaloke sa pacyate / snānaṃ dānaṃ japo homo svādhyāyo davartāccanam //
analyzed: uttama adhama madhye vā yama loke sa pacyate snānam dānam japaḥ svādhyāyaḥ

original: yasmindine na sevyante sa vṛthā divaso nṛṇām / anityamadhruvaṃ dehamanādhāraṃ rasodbhavam //
analyzed: yasmin dine na sevyante sa vṛthā divasaḥ nṛṇām anityam adhruvam deham anādhāram rasa udbhavam

original: annodakamaye dehe guṇānetānvadāmyaham / yatprātaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ sāyaṃ nūnamannaṃ vinaśyati //
analyzed: anna udaka maye dehe guṇān etān vadāmi aham yat prātar saṃskṛtam sāyam nūnam annam vinaśyati

original: tadīyarasasampuṣṭakāye kā bata nityatā / gataṃ jñātvā tu pakṣīndra vapurardhaṃ svakarmabhiḥ //
analyzed: tadīya rasa sampuṣṭa kāye kā bata nityatā gatam jñātvā tu pakṣi indra vapuḥ ardham sva karmabhiḥ

original: naraḥ pāpavināśāya kurvīta paramauṣadham / dehaḥ kimannadātuḥ svinniṣekturmātureva vā //
analyzed: naraḥ pāpa vināśāya kurvīta parama auṣadham dehaḥ kim anna dātuḥ svid niṣektuḥ mātuḥ eva vā

original: ubhayorvā prabhorvāpi bālanogneḥ śuno 'pi vā / kastatra paramo yajñaḥ kṛmiviḍbhasmasaṃjñake //
analyzed: ubhayoḥ vā prabhoḥ vā api vā kaḥ tatra paramaḥ yajñaḥ kṛmi viṣ bhasma saṃjñake

original: kartavyaḥ paramo yatnaḥ pātakasya vināśane / anekabhavasambhūtaṃ pātakaṃ tu tridhā kṛtam //
analyzed: kartavyaḥ paramaḥ yatnaḥ pātakasya vināśane aneka bhava sambhūtam pātakam tu tridhā kṛtam

original: yadā prāpnoti mānuṣyaṃ tadā sarvaṃ tapatyapi / sarvajanmāni saṃsmṛtya viṣādī kṛtacetanaḥ //
analyzed: yadā prāpnoti mānuṣyam tadā sarvam tapati api sarva janmāni saṃsmṛtya viṣādī kṛta cetanaḥ

original: avekṣya garbhavāsāṃśca karmajā gatayastathā / mānuṣodaravāsī cettadā bhavati pātakī //
analyzed: avekṣya garbha vāsān ca karma jāḥ gatayaḥ tathā mānuṣodara vāsī ced tadā bhavati pātakī

original: aṇḍajādiṣu bhūteṣu yatrayatra prasarpati / ādhayo vyādhayaḥ kleśā jarārūpaviparyayaḥ //
analyzed: aṇḍaja ādiṣu bhūteṣu yatra yatra prasarpati ādhayaḥ vyādhayaḥ kleśāḥ jarā rūpa viparyayaḥ

original: garbhavāsādvinirmuktastvajñānatimirāvṛtaḥ / na jānātiḥ khagaśreṣṭha bālabhāvaṃ samāśritaḥ //
analyzed: garbha vāsāt vinirmuktaḥ tu ajñāna timira āvṛtaḥ na khaga śreṣṭha bāla bhāvam samāśritaḥ

original: yauvane timirāndhaśca yaḥ paśyati sa muktibhāk / ādhānānmṛtyumāpnoti bālo vā sthaviro yuvā //
analyzed: yauvane timira andhaḥ ca yaḥ paśyati sa mukti bhāj ādhānāt mṛtyum āpnoti bālaḥ vā sthaviraḥ yuvā

original: sadhano nirdhanaścaiva sukumāraḥ kurūpavān / avidvāṃścaiva vidvāṃśca brāhmaṇāstvitaro janaḥ //
analyzed: sa dhanaḥ nirdhanaḥ ca eva su kumāraḥ ku rūpavān  a vidvān ca eva vidvān ca brāhmaṇāḥ tu itaraḥ janaḥ

original: taporato yogaśīlo mahājñānī ca yo naraḥ / mahādānarataḥ śrīmāndharmātmātulavikramaḥ / vinā mānupadehaṃ tu sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ na vindati //
analyzed: tapaḥ rataḥ yoga śīlaḥ mahā jñānī ca yaḥ naraḥ mahā dāna rataḥ śrīmān dharma ātmā atula vikramaḥ vinā mānupa deham tu sukham duḥ kham na vindati

original: prākṛtaiḥ karmapāśaistu mṛtyumāpnoti mānavaḥ / ādhānātpañca varṣāṇi svalpapāpairvipacyate //
analyzed: prākṛtaiḥ karma pāśaiḥ tu mṛtyum āpnoti mānavaḥ ādhānāt pañca varṣāṇi su alpa pāpaiḥ vipacyate

original: pañcavarṣādhiko bhūtvā mahāpāpairvipacyate / yoniṃ pūrayate yasmānmṛto 'pyāyāti yāti ca //
analyzed: pañca varṣa adhikaḥ bhūtvā mahā pāpaiḥ vipacyate yonim pūrayate yasmāt mṛtaḥ pyāyāti yāti ca

original: mṛto dānaprabhāveṇa jīvanmartyaściraṃ bhuvi / sūta uvāca / iti kṛṣṇavacaḥ śrutvā garuḍo vākyamabravīt //
analyzed: mṛtaḥ dāna prabhāveṇa jīvan martyaḥ ciram bhuvi  sūtaḥ uvāca iti kṛṣṇa vacaḥ śrutvā garuḍaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: garuḍa uvāca / mṛte bāle kathaṃ kuryātpiṇḍadānādikāḥ kriyāḥ / garbheṣu ca vipannānāmācūḍākaraṇācchiśoḥ //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca mṛte bāle katham kuryāt piṇḍa dāna ādikāḥ kriyāḥ garbheṣu ca vipannānām ācūḍākaraṇāt śiśoḥ

original: kathaṃ kiṃ kena dātavyaṃ mṛtānte ko vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ / garuḍoktamiti śrutvā viṣṇurvākyamathābravīt //
analyzed: katham kim kena dātavyam mṛta ante kaḥ vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ garuḍa uktam iti śrutvā viṣṇuḥ vākyam athā bravīt

original: śrīviṣṇuruvāca / yadi garbho vipadyate stravate vāpi yoṣitaḥ / yāvanmāsaṃ sthito garbhastāvaddinamaśaucakam //
analyzed: śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca yadi garbhaḥ vipadyate vā api yoṣitaḥ  yāvat māsam sthitaḥ garbhaḥ tāvat dinam aśaucakam

original: tasya kiñcinna kartavyamātmanaḥ śreya icchatā / tato jāte vipanne tu ā cūḍākaraṇācchiśoḥ //
analyzed: tasya kiñcid na kartavyam ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ icchatā tatas jāte vipanne tu ā cūḍākaraṇāt śiśoḥ

original: dugdhaṃ bhojyaṃ tāśakti bālānāṃ ca pradīyate / ā cūḍātpañcavarṣe tu dehadāho vidhīyate //
analyzed: dugdham bhojyam bālānām ca pradīyate

original: dugdhaṃ tasya pradeyaṃ syādbālānāṃ bhojanaṃ śubham / pañcavarṣādhike prete svajātivihitāni ca //
analyzed: dugdham tasya pradeyam syāt bālānām bhojanam śubham pañca varṣa adhike prete sva jāti vihitāni ca

original: kuryātkarmāṇi sarvāṇi codakumbhādi pāyasam / dātavyaṃ tu khagaśreṣṭha ṛṇasambandhakastu saḥ //
analyzed: kuryāt karmāṇi sarvāṇi ca udakumbha ādi pāyasam dātavyam tu khaga śreṣṭhaḥ ṛṇa sambandhakaḥ tu saḥ

original: jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyurdhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca / kartavyaṃ pakṣiśārdūla punardehakṣayāya vai //
analyzed: jātasya hi dhruvaḥ mṛtyuḥ dhruvam janma mṛtasya ca kartavyam pakṣi śārdūla punar deha kṣayāya vai

original: tasmai yadrocate deyamadattvā nirdhane kule / svalpāyurnirdhano bhūtvā ratibhaktivivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: tasmai yat rocate deyam a dattvā nirdhane kule su alpa āyuḥ nirdhanaḥ bhūtvā rati bhakti vivarjitaḥ

original: punarjanmāpnuyānmartyastasmāddeyamṛte śiśoḥ / purāṇe gīyate gāthā sarvathā pratibhāti me //
analyzed: punarjanma āpnuyāt martyaḥ tasmāt deyam ṛte śiśoḥ  purāṇe gīyate gāthā sarvathā pratibhāti me

original: miṣṭānnaṃ bhojanaṃ deyaṃ dāne śaktistu durlabhā / bhojye bhojanaśaktiśca ratiśaktirvarastriyaḥ //
analyzed: miṣṭānnam bhojanam deyam dāne śaktiḥ tu durlabhā bhojye bhojana śaktiḥ ca rati śaktiḥ vara striyaḥ

original: vibhave dānaśaktiśca nālpasya tapasaḥ phalam / dānādbhogānavāpnoti saukhyaṃ tīrthasya sevanāt / subhāṣaṇānmṛto yastu sa vidvāndharmavittamaḥ //
analyzed: vibhave dāna śaktiḥ ca na alpasya tapasaḥ phalam  dānāt bhogān avāpnoti saukhyam tīrthasya sevanāt  subhāṣaṇāt mṛtaḥ yaḥ tu sa vidvān dharma vittamaḥ

original: adattadānācca bhaveddaridro daridrabhāvācca karotipāpam / pāpaprabhāvānnarakaṃ prayāti punardaridraḥ punareva pāpī //
analyzed: a datta dānāt ca bhavet daridraḥ daridra bhāvāt ca karoti pāpam pāpa prabhāvāt narakam prayāti punar daridraḥ punar eva pāpī

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśākhye dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'lpāyurmaraṇahe tubālāntyeṣṭyornirūpaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśa ākhye dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde lpa āyuḥ maraṇa he tu bāla antyeṣṭyoḥ nirūpaṇam

original: nāma caturviśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nāma caturviśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 25
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīviṣṇuruvāca / ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi puruṣastrī vinirṇayam / jīvanvāpi mṛto vāpi pañcavarṣādhiko 'pi vā //
analyzed: śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca atas param pravakṣyāmi puruṣa strī vinirṇayam jīvan vā api mṛtaḥ vā api vā

original: pūrṇe tu pañcame varṣe pumāṃścaiva pratiṣṭhitaḥ / sarvaindriyāṇi jānāti rūpārūpaviparyayau //
analyzed: pūrṇe tu pañcame varṣe pumān ca eva pratiṣṭhitaḥ sarva aindriyāṇi jānāti rūpa arūpa viparyayau

original: pūrvakarmavipākena prāṇināṃ vadhabandhanam / viprādīnantyajānsarvānpāpaṃ mārayati dhruvam //
analyzed: pūrva karma vipākena prāṇinām vadha bandhanam  vipra ādīn antyajān sarvān pāpam mārayati dhruvam

original: garbhe naṣṭe kriyā nāsti dugdhaṃ deyaṃ mṛte śiśau / paraṃ ca pāyasaṃ kṣīraṃ dadyādvalavipattitaḥ //
analyzed: garbhe naṣṭe kriyā nā asti dugdham deyam mṛte śiśau param ca pāyasam kṣīram dadyāt vala vipattitaḥ

original: ekādaśāhaṃ dvādaśāhaṃ vṛṣaṃ vṛṣavidhiṃ vinā / mahādānavihīnaṃ ca kumāre kṛtyamādiśet //
analyzed: ekādaśa aham dvādaśa aham vṛṣam vṛṣa vidhim vinā mahādāna vihīnam ca kumāre kṛtyam ādiśet

original: kumārāṇāṃ caiva bālānāṃ bhojanaṃ vastraveṣṭanam / bāle vā taruṇe vṛddhe ghaṭo bhavati vai mṛte //
