analyzed: kumārāṇām ca eva bālānām bhojanam vastra veṣṭanam bāle vā taruṇe vṛddhe ghaṭaḥ bhavati vai mṛte

original: bhūmau viniḥ kṣipedbālaṃ dvimāsonaṃ dvivārṣikam / tataḥ paraṃ khagaśreṣṭha dehadāho vidhoyate //
analyzed: bhūmau kṣipet bālam dvi māsa ūnam dvi vārṣikam tatas param khaga śreṣṭha deha dāhaḥ vidhoyate

original: śiśurā dantajananādbālaḥ syādyāvadāśikham / kathyate sarvaśāstreṣu kumāro mauñjibandhanāt //
analyzed: śiśuḥ ā danta jananāt bālaḥ syāt yāvat āśikham kathyate sarva śāstreṣu kumāraḥ mauñjibandhanāt

original: śūdrādīnāṃ kathaṃ kuryātsaṃśayo mauñjivarjanāt / garbhācca navamaṃ hitvā śiśurāmāsaṣoḍaśam //
analyzed: śūdra ādīnām katham kuryāt saṃśayaḥ mauñji varjanāt garbhāt ca navamam hitvā śiśuḥ āmāsa ṣoḍaśam

original: bālaścātha parañjñeya āmāsasaptaviṃśati / ā pañca varṣātkaumāraḥ paugaṇḍo navahāṃyanaḥ //
analyzed: bālaḥ ca atha ā māsa saptaviṃśati ā pañca varṣāt kaumāraḥ paugaṇḍaḥ nava hāṃyanaḥ

original: kiśoraḥ ṣoḍaśābdaḥ syāttato yauvanamādiśet / mṛto 'pi pañcame varṣe avṛtaḥ savṛto 'pi vā //
analyzed: kiśoraḥ ṣoḍaśa abdaḥ syāt tatas yauvanam ādiśet pañcame varṣe a vṛtaḥ vā

original: pūrvoktameva kartavyamīhate daśapiṇḍakam / svalpakarmaprasaṅgācca svalpādviṣayabandhanāt //
analyzed: pūrva uktam eva kartavyam īhate daśa piṇḍakam su alpa karma prasaṅgāt ca su alpāt viṣaya bandhanāt

original: svalṣādvapuṣi vastrācca kriyāṃ svalpāmapīcchati / yāvadupacayo janturyāvadviṣayaveṣṭitaḥ //
analyzed: su alṣāt vapuṣi vastrāt ca kriyām su alpām api icchati yāvat upacayaḥ jantuḥ yāvat viṣaya veṣṭitaḥ

original: yadyadyasyopajīvyaṃ syāttattaddeyamihecchati / brahmabījodbhavāḥ putrā devarṣoṇāṃ ca vallabhāḥ //
analyzed: yat yat yasya upajīvyam syāt tat tat deyam iha icchati brahma bīja udbhavāḥ putrāḥ deva ṛṣīṇām ca vallabhāḥ

original: yamena yamadūtaiśca śāsyante niścitaṃ khaga / bālo vṛddho yubā vāpi ghaṭamicchanti dehinaḥ //
analyzed: yamena yama dūtaiḥ ca śāsyante niścitam khaga bālaḥ vṛddhaḥ vā api ghaṭam icchanti dehinaḥ

original: sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ sadā vetti dehī vai sarvagastviha / parityajya tadātmānaṃ jīrṇāṃ tvacamivoragaḥ //
analyzed: sukham duḥ kham sadā vetti dehī vai sarvagaḥ tu iha parityajya tad ātmānam jīrṇām tvacam iva uragaḥ

original: aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo vāyubhṛtaḥ kṣudhānvitaḥ / tasmāddeyāni dānāni mṛte bāle suniścitam //
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha mātraḥ puruṣaḥ vāyu bhṛtaḥ kṣudhā anvitaḥ tasmāt deyāni dānāni mṛte bāle su niścitam

original: janmataḥ pañca varṣāṇi bhuṅkte dattamasaṃskṛtam / pañcavarṣādhike bāle vipattiryadi jāyate //
analyzed: janmataḥ pañca varṣāṇi bhuṅkte dattam asaṃskṛtam pañca varṣa adhike bāle vipattiḥ yadi jāyate

original: vṛṣotsargādikaṃ karma sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ vinā / dvādaśe hani samprāpte kuryācchrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa //
analyzed: vṛṣotsarga ādikam karma sapiṇḍīkaraṇam vinā dvādaśe hani samprāpte kuryāt śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa

original: pāyasena guḍenāpi piṇḍāndadyādyathākramam / udakumbhapradānaṃ ca pada (upa)
analyzed: pāyasena guḍena api piṇḍān dadyāt yathākramam udakumbha pradānam ca pade upa

original: dānāni yāni ca //
analyzed: dānāni yāni ca

original: bhojanāni dvije dadyānmahādānādi śaktitaḥ / dīpadānādi yatkiñcitpañcavarṣādhike sadā //
analyzed: bhojanāni dvije dadyāt mahā dāna ādi śaktitaḥ dīpa dāna ādi yat kiñcid pañca varṣa adhike sadā

original: kartavyaṃ ca khagaśreṣṭha vratātprāk pretatṛptaye / yadā nakriyate sarvaṃ mudgalatvaṃ sa gacchati //
analyzed: kartavyam ca khaga śreṣṭha vratāt prāk preta tṛptaye yadā na kriyate sarvam mudgala tvam sa gacchati

original: vratātprāṅgeva deyaṃ tu tataḥ pitṛgaṇasya ca / svāhākāreṇa vai kuryādekoddiṣṭāni ṣoḍaśa //
analyzed: vratāt prāṅk eva deyam tu tatas pitṛ gaṇasya ca svāhākāreṇa vai kuryāt ekoddiṣṭāni ṣoḍaśa

original: ṛjudarbhaistilaiḥ śuklaiḥ prācīnāvīti niścitam / apasavyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ kṛte yānti parāṃ gatim //
analyzed: ṛju darbhaiḥ tilaiḥ śuklaiḥ prācīnāvīti niścitam apasavyam ca kartavyam kṛte yānti parām gatim

original: punaścirāyuṣo bhūtvā jāyante svakule dhruvam / sarvasaukhyapradaḥ putraḥ pitroḥ prītivivardhanaḥ //
analyzed: punar cira āyuṣaḥ bhūtvā jāyante sva kule dhruvam sarva saukhya pradaḥ putraḥ pitroḥ prīti vivardhanaḥ

original: ākāśamekaṃ hi yathā candrādityau yathaikataḥ / ghaṭādiṣu pṛthak sarvaṃ paśya rūpaṃ ca tatsamam //
analyzed: ākāśam ekam hi yathā candra ādityau yathā ekatas ghaṭa ādiṣu pṛthak sarvam paśya rūpam ca tad samam

original: ātmā tathaiva sarveṣu puttreṣu vicaretsadā / yā yasya prakṛtiḥ pūrvaṃ śukraśoṇitasaṅgame //
analyzed: ātmā tathā eva sarveṣu puttreṣu vicaret sadā yā yasya prakṛtiḥ pūrvam śukra śoṇita saṅgame

original: sā (sa) tena bhāvayogena puttrāstatkarmakāriṇaḥ / pitṛrūpaṃ samādāya kasyacijjāyate sutaḥ //
analyzed: sā sa tena bhāva yogena puttrāḥ tad karma kāriṇaḥ pitṛ rūpam samādāya kasyacid jāyate sutaḥ

original: pitṛtaḥ ko 'pi rūpāḍhyo guṇajño dānatatparaḥ / sadṛśaḥ ko 'pi loke 'sminna bhūto na bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: pitṛtaḥ kaḥ pi rūpa āḍhyaḥ guṇa jñaḥ dāna tatparaḥ sadṛśaḥ kaḥ pi loke smin na bhūtaḥ na bhaviṣyati

original: andhādandho na bhavati mūkānmūko na jāyate / badhirādbadhiro naiva vidyāvānviduṣo na hi / anurūpā na dṛśyante madīyaṃ vacanaṃ śṛṇu //
analyzed: andhāt andhaḥ na bhavati mūkāt mūkaḥ na jāyate badhirāt badhiraḥ nā eva vidyāvān viduṣaḥ na hi anurūpāḥ na dṛśyante madīyam vacanam śṛṇu

original: garuḍa uvāca / aurasakṣetrajādyāśca puttrā daśavidhāḥ smṛtāḥ / saṃgṛhītaḥ suto yastu dāsīputtraśca tena kim //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca aurasa kṣetraja ādyāḥ ca puttrāḥ daśavidhāḥ smṛtāḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ sutaḥ yaḥ tu dāsī puttraḥ ca tena kim

original: kāṅkāṃ gatimavāpnoti jāyo mṛtyuvaśaṃ gataḥ / bhavenna duhitā yasya na dauhitro na vā sutaḥ //
analyzed: kāṅkām gatim avāpnoti jāyaḥ mṛtyu vaśam gataḥ bhavet na duhitā yasya na dauhitraḥ na vā sutaḥ

original: śrāddhaṃ tasya kathaṃ kāryaṃ vidhinā kena tadbhavet / śrībhagavānuvāca / mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu putrasya mucyate paitṛkādṛṇāt //
analyzed: śrāddham tasya katham kāryam vidhinā kena tat bhavet  śrī bhagavān uvāca mukham dṛṣṭvā tu putrasya mucyate paitṛkāt ṛṇāt

original: pauttrasya darśanājjanturmucyate caḥ ṛṇatrayāt / lokānantyaṃ divaḥ prāptiḥ puttrapauttra prapauttrakaiḥ //
analyzed: pauttrasya darśanāt jantuḥ mucyate caḥ ṛṇa trayāt loka ānantyam divaḥ prāptiḥ puttra pauttra prapauttrakaiḥ

original: anyakṣetrodbhavādyā ye bhuktimātrapradāḥ sutāḥ / kurvīta pārvaṇaṃ śrāddhamāraiso vidhivatsutaḥ //
analyzed: anya kṣetra udbhava ādyāḥ ye bhukti mātra pradāḥ sutāḥ kurvīta pārvaṇam śrāddham āraisaḥ vidhivat sutaḥ

original: kurvantyanye sutāḥ śrāddhame koddiṣṭaṃ na pārvaṇam / brāhmoḍhājastūnnayati saṃgṛhītastvadho nayet / śrāddhaṃ sāṃvatsaraṃ kurvañjāyate narakāya vai //
analyzed: kurvanti anye sutāḥ śrāddham e koddiṣṭam na pārvaṇam  brāhma ūḍhā jaḥ tu unnayati saṃgṛhītaḥ tu adhas nayet  śrāddham sāṃvatsaram kurvan jāyate narakāya vai

original: sarvadānāni deyāni hyanna dānādṛte khaga / saṃgṛhītaḥ sutaḥ kuryādekoddiṣṭaṃ na pārvaṇam //
analyzed: sarva dānāni deyāni hi anna dānāt ṛte khaga saṃgṛhītaḥ sutaḥ kuryāt ekoddiṣṭam na pārvaṇam

original: pratyabdaṃ pitṛmātṛbhyāṃ śrāddhaṃ dattvā na lipyate / ekoddiṣṭaṃ parityajya pārvaṇaṃ kurute yadi //
analyzed: pratyabdam pitṛ mātṛbhyām śrāddham dattvā na lipyate ekoddiṣṭam parityajya pārvaṇam kurute yadi

original: ātmānaṃ ca pitṝṃścaiva sa nayedyamamandiram / saṃgṛhītastu yaḥ keciddāsīputtrādayaśca ye //
analyzed: ātmānam ca pitṝn ca eva sa nayet yama mandiram saṃgṛhītaḥ tu yaḥ kecid dāsī puttra ādayaḥ ca ye

original: tīrthe kuryuḥ pitṛśrāddhaṃ dānaṃ (māsaṃ)
analyzed: tīrthe kuryuḥ pitṛ śrāddham dānam māsam

original: dadyurdvijanmane / saṃgṛhītasuto bhūtvā pākaṃ vā yaḥ prayacchati //
analyzed: dadyuḥ dvijanmane saṃgṛhīta sutaḥ bhūtvā pākam vā yaḥ prayacchati

original: vṛthā śrāddhaṃ vijānīyācchūdrānnena yathā dvijaḥ / na prīṇayati tacchrāddhaṃ pitāmahamukhānpitṝn / evaṃ jñātvā svagaśreṣṭha hīnajātīnsutāṃstyajet //
analyzed: vṛthā śrāddham vijānīyāt śūdra annena yathā dvijaḥ na prīṇayati tat śrāddham pitāmaha mukhān pitṝn  evam jñātvā svaga śreṣṭha hīna jātīn sutān tyajet

original: (brāhmaṇyāṃ brāhmaṇājjātaścāṇḍālādadhamaḥ smṛtaḥ ) / yastu pravrajitājjāto brāhmaṇyāṃ śūdrataśca yaḥ //
analyzed: brāhmaṇyām brāhmaṇāt jātaḥ cāṇḍālāt adhamaḥ smṛtaḥ yaḥ tu pravrajitāt jātaḥ brāhmaṇyām śūdrataḥ ca yaḥ

original: dvāvetau viddhi cāṇḍālau sagotrādyastu jāyate / svaryātivihitānputraḥ samutpādya khageśvara //
analyzed: dvau etau viddhi cāṇḍālau sagotrāt yaḥ tu jāyate svaryāti vihitān putraḥ samutpādya khageśvara

original: taiḥ suvṛttaiḥ sukhaṃ prāpyaṃ kuvṛttairnarakaṃ vrajet / hīnajātisamudbhūtaiḥ suvṛttaiḥ sukhamedhate //
analyzed: taiḥ su vṛttaiḥ sukham prāpyam ku vṛttaiḥ narakam vrajet  hīna jāti samudbhūtaiḥ su vṛttaiḥ sukham edhate

original: kalikaluṣavimuktaḥ pūjitaḥ siddhasaṅghairamaracamaramālāvījyamāno 'psarobhiḥ / pitṛśatamapi bandhūnputtrapauttraprapauttrānapi narakanimagnānuddharedeka eva //
analyzed: kali kaluṣa vimuktaḥ pūjitaḥ siddha saṅghaiḥ amara camara mālā vījyamānaḥ u psarobhiḥ pitṛ śatam api bandhūn puttra pauttra prapauttrān api naraka nimagnān uddharet ekaḥ eva

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dhamakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasavāde mṛtabālāntyeṣṭibhinnābhinnasutakṛtāntyeṣṭyorvarṇanaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dhama kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa savāde mṛta bāla antyeṣṭi bhinna abhinna suta kṛta antyeṣṭyoḥ varṇanam

original: nāma pañcaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nāma pañcaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamāhapurāṇam- 26
garuḍa uvāca / satyaṃ brūhi suraśreṣṭha kṛpāṃ kṛtvā mayi prabho / mṛtānāṃ caiva jantūnāṃ kadā kuryātsapiṇḍanam //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca satyam brūhi suraśreṣṭha kṛpām kṛtvā mayi prabho mṛtānām ca eva jantūnām kadā kuryāt sapiṇḍanam

original: sapiṇḍatve kuto yānti asapiṇḍe kuto gatiḥ / kenaiva sahapiṇḍatvaṃ strīpusorvaktumarhasi //
analyzed: sapiṇḍa tve kutas yānti asapiṇḍe kutas gatiḥ kena eva sahapiṇḍatvam strī pusoḥ vaktum arhasi

original: strīpumāṃśau sahaikatvaṃ pāpnutaḥ kathamuttamam / jīvedbhartari nārīṇāṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kutaḥ //
analyzed: strī pumāṃśau saha eka tvam pāpnutaḥ katham uttamam jīvet bhartari nārīṇām sapiṇḍīkaraṇam kutas

original: bhartṛlokaṃ kathaṃ yānti svargalokaṃ sureśvara / agnyārohe kathaṃ śrāddhaṃ vṛṣotsargaḥ kathaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: bhartṛ lokam katham yānti svarga lokam sureśvara agnyārohe katham śrāddham vṛṣotsargaḥ katham bhavet

original: ghaṭadānaṃ kathaṃ kāryaṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇe kṛte / kathayasva prasādena hītāya jagatāṃ prabho //
analyzed: ghaṭa dānam katham kāryam sapiṇḍīkaraṇe kṛte  kathayasva prasādena hītāya jagatām prabho

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / yathāvatkathayiṣyāmi sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ khaga / varṣaṃ yāvatkhagaśreṣṭha yadācarati mānavaḥ //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca yathāvat kathayiṣyāmi sapiṇḍīkaraṇam khaga varṣam yāvat khaga śreṣṭha yat ācarati mānavaḥ

original: sapiṇḍane tato vṛtte pitṛlokaṃ sa gacchati / tasmātputtreṇa kartavyaṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ pituḥ //
analyzed: sapiṇḍane tatas vṛtte pitṛ lokam sa gacchati tasmāt puttreṇa kartavyam sapiṇḍīkaraṇam pituḥ

original: saṃvatsare tu sampūrṇe kuryātpiṇḍa praveśanam / piṇḍapraveśavidhanā tasya nityaṃ mṛtāhnikam //
analyzed: saṃvatsare tu sampūrṇe kuryāt piṇḍa praveśanam

original: niścitaṃ pakṣiśārdūla varṣānte piṇḍamelanam / sahapiṇḍe kṛte pretastato yāti parāṃ gatim / tannāma samparityajya tataḥ pitṛgaṇo bhavet //
analyzed: niścitam pakṣi śārdūla varṣa ante piṇḍa melanam saha piṇḍe kṛte pretaḥ tatas yāti parām gatim tad nāma samparityajya tatas pitṛ gaṇaḥ bhavet

original: tripakṣe vāpi ṣaṇmāse melayetprapitāmahaiḥ / jñātvā vṛddhivivāhādi svagotravihitāni ca //
analyzed: tri pakṣe vā api ṣaṣ māse melayet prapitāmahaiḥ jñātvā vṛddhi vivāha ādi sva gotra vihitāni ca

original: vivāhaṃ naiva kurvīta mṛte ca gṛhamedhini / bhikṣurbhikṣāṃ na gṛhṇāti yāvatkuryātsapiṇḍanam //
analyzed: vivāham na eva kurvīta mṛte ca gṛhamedhini bhikṣuḥ bhikṣām na gṛhṇāti yāvat kuryāt sapiṇḍanam

original: svagotre 'pyaśucistāvadyāvatpiṇḍaṃ na melayet / melanātpretaśabdastu nivarteta khageśvara //
analyzed: sva gotre pi aśuciḥ tāvat yāvat piṇḍam na melayet melanāt preta śabdaḥ tu nivarteta khageśvara

original: ānantyātkuladharmāṇāṃ puṃsāñcaivāyuṣaḥ kṣayāt / asthiratvāccharīrasya dvādaśāhaḥ praśasyate //
analyzed: ānantyāt kula dharmāṇām puṃsām ca eva āyuṣaḥ kṣayāt asthira tvāt śarīrasya dvādaśa ahaḥ praśasyate

original: niragnikaḥ sāgniko vā dvādaśāhe sapiṇḍayet //
analyzed: niragnikaḥ sa agnikaḥ vā dvādaśa ahe sapiṇḍayet

original: dvādaśāhe tripakṣe vā ṣaṇmāse vatsare 'pi vā / sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ proktamṛṣibhistattvadarśibhiḥ //
analyzed: dvādaśa ahe tri pakṣe vā ṣaṣ māse vatsare vā sapiṇḍīkaraṇam proktam ṛṣibhiḥ tattva darśibhiḥ

original: saputtrasya na kartavyamekoddiṣṭaṃ kadācana / sapiṇḍīkaraṇādūrdhvaṃ yatrayatra pradīyate //
analyzed: sa puttrasya na kartavyam ekoddiṣṭam kadācana sapiṇḍīkaraṇāt ūrdhvam yatra yatra pradīyate

original: tatratatra trayaṃ kāryamanyathā pitṛghātakaḥ / tribhiḥ kuryādaśaktaśca pārvaṇaṃ muninoditam //
analyzed: tatra tatra trayam kāryam anyathā pitṛ ghātakaḥ tribhiḥ kuryāt aśaktaḥ ca pārvaṇam muninā uditam

original: taddine taddine kuryātpitāmahamukhānyataḥ / ajñānāddinamāsānāṃ tasmātpārvaṇamiṣyate //
analyzed: tad dine tad dine kuryāt pitāmaha mukhāni atas ajñānāt dina māsānām tasmāt pārvaṇam iṣyate

original: anutpannaśarīrasya na dānaṃ pitṛbhiḥ saha / etaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śrāddhaiḥ preto muktastu jāyate //
analyzed: anutpanna śarīrasya na dānam pitṛbhiḥ saha etaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śrāddhaiḥ pretaḥ muktaḥ tu jāyate

original: aputtrasya sapiṇḍatvaṃ naiva kuryātstriyo 'pi vā / yāvajjīva ca sadbhatryā na kuryātsahapiṇḍatām //
analyzed: aputtrasya sapiṇḍa tvam na eva kuryāt vā yāvat jīva ca na kuryāt sahapiṇḍatām

original: brāhmādiṣu vivāheṣu yā vadhūriha saṃskṛtā / bhartṛgotreṇa kartavyāstasyāḥ piṇḍodakakriyāḥ //
analyzed: brāhma ādiṣu vivāheṣu yā vadhūḥ iha saṃskṛtā bhartṛ gotreṇa kartavyāḥ tasyāḥ piṇḍa udaka kriyāḥ

original: āsurādivivā heṣu yā vyūḍhā kanyakā bhavet / tasyāstu pitṛgotreṇa kuryātpiṇḍodakakriyāḥ //
analyzed: yā vyūḍhā kanyakā bhavet tasyāḥ tu pitṛ gotreṇa kuryāt piṇḍa udaka kriyāḥ

original: pituḥ puttreṇa kartavyaṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ sadā / puttrābhāve tu patnī syātpatnyabhāve sahodaraḥ //
analyzed: pituḥ puttreṇa kartavyam sapiṇḍīkaraṇam sadā puttra abhāve tu patnī syāt patnī abhāve sahodaraḥ

original: bhrātā vā bhrātṛputtro vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣya eva vā / sapiṇḍanakriyāṃ kṛtvā kuryānnāndīmukhaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: bhrātā vā bhrātṛ puttraḥ vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣyaḥ eva vā sapiṇḍana kriyām kṛtvā kuryāt nāndīmukham tatas

original: jyeṣṭhasyaiva kaniṣṭhena bhrātṛputtreṇa bhāryayā / sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ putrahīne nare khaga //
analyzed: jyeṣṭhasya eva kaniṣṭhena bhrātṛ puttreṇa bhāryayā sapiṇḍīkaraṇam kāryam putra hīne nare khaga

original: bhrātṝṇāmekajātānāmekaścetputravān bhavet / sarvete tena putreṇa putriṇo manurabravīt //
analyzed: bhrātṝṇām ekajātānām ekaḥ ced putravān bhavet sarve ete tena putreṇa putriṇaḥ manuḥ abravīt

original: sarveṣāṃ putrahīnānāṃ patnī kuryātsapiṇḍanam / ṛtvijā kārayedvāpi purohitamathāpi vā //
analyzed: sarveṣām putra hīnānām patnī kuryāt sapiṇḍanam ṛtvijā kārayet vā api purohitam atha api vā

original: kṛtacūḍopanītaśca pituḥ śrāddhaṃ samācaret / uccārayetsvadhākāraṃ na tu vedākṣarāṇyasau //
analyzed: kṛtacūḍa upanītaḥ ca pituḥ śrāddham samācaret  uccārayet svadhākāram na tu veda akṣarāṇi asau

original: bhartrādibhistribhiḥ kāryaṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ striyāḥ / pitṛvyabhrātṛputreṇa sodareṇa kanīyasā //
analyzed: bhartṛ ādibhiḥ tribhiḥ kāryam sapiṇḍīkaraṇam striyāḥ pitṛvya bhrātṛ putreṇa sodareṇa kanīyasā

original: arvāk saṃvatsarātsandhau pūrṇe saṃvatsare 'pi vā / ye sapiṇḍīkṛtāḥ pretāsteṣāṃ na syātpṛthak kriyā //
analyzed: arvāk saṃvatsarāt sandhau pūrṇe saṃvatsare vā ye sapiṇḍīkṛtāḥ pretāḥ teṣām na syāt pṛthak kriyā

original: sapiṇḍane kṛte vatsa pṛthaktvaṃ tu vigarhitam / yastu kuryātpṛthak piṇḍaṃ pitṛhā so 'bhijāyate //
analyzed: sapiṇḍane kṛte vatsa pṛthaktvam tu vigarhitam yaḥ tu kuryāt pṛthak piṇḍam pitṛ hā saḥ

original: sapiṇḍīkaraṇe vṛtte pṛthaktvaṃ nopapadyate / pṛthak piṇḍe kṛte paścātpunaḥ kuryātsapiṇḍanam //
analyzed: sapiṇḍīkaraṇe vṛtte pṛthaktvam na upapadyate pṛthak piṇḍe kṛte paścāt punar kuryāt sapiṇḍanam

original: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā ekoddiṣṭaṃ karoti yaḥ / ātmānaṃ ca tathā pretaṃ sa nayeddamaśāsanam //
analyzed: sapiṇḍīkaraṇam kṛtvā ekoddiṣṭam karoti yaḥ ātmānam ca tathā pretam sa nayet dama śāsanam

original: varṣaṃ yāvaktriyā kāryā nāmagotreṇa dhīmatā / ghaṭādi bhojanaṃ nityaṃ padadānāni yāni ca / sapiṇḍīkaraṇe vṛtte ekasyaiva tu dāpayet //
analyzed: varṣam kāryā nāma gotreṇa dhīmatā ghaṭa ādi bhojanam nityam pada dānāni yāni ca sapiṇḍīkaraṇe vṛtte ekasya eva tu dāpayet

original: annaṃ pānīyasahitaṃ saṃkhyāṃ kṛtvābdikasya ca / dātavyaṃ brāhmaṇe pakṣiñjalapūrṇaghaṭādikam //
analyzed: annam pānīya sahitam saṃkhyām kṛtvā ābdikasya ca  dātavyam brāhmaṇe pakṣin jala pūrṇa ghaṭa ādikam

original: piṇḍānte tasya sakalā varṣavṛttiḥ svaśaktitaḥ / divyadeho vimānasthaḥ sukhaṃ yāti yamālayam //
analyzed: piṇḍa ante tasya sakalā varṣa vṛttiḥ sva śaktitaḥ divya dehaḥ vimāna sthaḥ sukham yāti yama ālayam

original: jīvamāne ca pitari na hi puttre sapiṇḍatā / strīṇāṃ sapiṇḍanaṃ nāsti tathā bhartari jīvati //
analyzed: jīvamāne ca pitari na hi puttre sapiṇḍa tā strīṇām sapiṇḍanam na asti tathā bhartari jīvati

original: hutāśaṃ yā samārūḍhā caturthe 'hni pativratā / tasyā bhartṛdine kāryaṃ vṛṣotsargādikaṃ ca yat //
analyzed: hutāśam yā samārūḍhā caturthe hni pativratā tasyāḥ bhartṛ dine kāryam vṛṣotsarga ādikam ca yat

original: puttrikā patigotrā syādadhastātputrajanmanaḥ / putrotpatteḥ parastātsā pitṛgotraṃ vrajetpunaḥ //
analyzed: puttrikā pati gotrā syāt adhastāt putra janmanaḥ  putra utpatteḥ parastāt sā pitṛ gotram vrajet punar

original: patipatnyoḥ sadaikatvaṃ hutāśaṃ yādhirohati / putreṇaiva pṛthak śrāddhaṃ kṣayākhye tasya vāsare //
analyzed: pati patnyoḥ sadā eka tvam hutāśam yā adhirohati putreṇa eva pṛthak śrāddham kṣaya ākhye tasya vāsare

original: aputtrau cenmṛtau syātāmekacityāṃ same 'hani / pṛthak śrāddhāni kurvīta sāpiḍyaṃ patinā saha //
analyzed: aputtrau ced mṛtau syātām ekacityām same hani pṛthak śrāddhāni kurvīta sāpiḍyam patinā saha

original: pṛthakpṛthak ca piṇḍena dampatī patinā saha / na lipyate mahādoṣairetatsatyaṃ vaco mama //
analyzed: pṛthak pṛthak ca piṇḍena dampatī patinā saha  na lipyate mahā doṣaiḥ etat satyam vacaḥ mama

original: ekacityāṃ samārūḍhau dampatī nidhanaṃ gatau / ekapākaṃ prakurvīta piṇḍāndadyātpṛthakpṛthak //
analyzed: ekacityām samārūḍhau dampatī nidhanam gatau  eka pākam prakurvīta piṇḍān dadyāt pṛthak pṛthak

original: ekādaśe vṛṣotsargaṃ pretaśrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa / ghaṭādipadadānāni mahādānāni yāni ca / varṣaṃ yāvatpṛthakkuryātpretastṛptiṃ vrajecciram //
analyzed: ekādaśe vṛṣotsargam preta śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa ghaṭa ādi pada dānāni mahā dānāni yāni ca varṣam yāvat pṛthakkuryāt pretaḥ tṛptim vrajet ciram

original: ekagotre mṛtānāṃ tu striyā vā puruṣasya vā / sthaṇḍilaṃ caikataḥ kuryāddhomaṃ kuryātpṛthakpṛthak //
analyzed: eka gotre mṛtānām tu striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā sthaṇḍilam ca ekatas kuryāt homam kuryāt pṛthak pṛthak

original: ekādaśe 'hni yacchrāddhaṃ pṛthak piṇḍāśca bhojanam / pākairena patistrīṇāmanyeṣāṃ ca vigarhitam //
analyzed: ekādaśe hni yat śrāddham pṛthak piṇḍāḥ ca bhojanam pākaiḥ ena pati strīṇām anyeṣām ca vigarhitam

original: ekenaiva tu pākena śrāddhāni kurute sutaḥ / ekaṃ tu vikiraṃ kuryātpiṇḍāndadyadbahūnapi / tīrthe cāparapakṣe vā candrasūryagrahe 'pi vā //
analyzed: ekena eva tu pākena śrāddhāni kurute sutaḥ ekam tu vikiram kuryāt piṇḍān dadyat bahūn api  tīrthe ca aparapakṣe vā candra sūrya grahe vā

original: nārī bhartāramāsādya kuṇapaṃ dahate yadā / agnirdahati gātrāṇi ātmānaṃ naiva pīḍayet //
analyzed: nārī bhartāram āsādya kuṇapam dahate yadā agniḥ dahati gātrāṇi ātmānam na eva pīḍayet

original: dahyate dhmāyamānānāṃ dhātūnāṃ hi yathā malam / tathā nārī daheddehaṃ hutāśe hyamṛtopame //
analyzed: dahyate dhmāyamānānām dhātūnām hi yathā malam tathā nārī dahet deham hutāśe hi amṛta upame

original: divyādau divyadehastu śuddho bhavati pūruṣaḥ / taptatailena lohena vahninā naiva dahyate //
analyzed: divya ādau divya dehaḥ tu śuddhaḥ bhavati pūruṣaḥ tapta tailena lohena vahninā na eva dahyate

original: tathā sā patisaṃyuktā dahyate na kadācana / antarātmā mṛte tasminmṛto 'pyekatvamāgataḥ //
analyzed: tathā sā pati saṃyuktā dahyate na kadācana antarātmā mṛte tasmin mṛtaḥ pi ekatvam āgataḥ

original: bhartṛsaṃgaṃ parityajya anyatra mriyate yadi / bhartṛlokaṃ na sā yāti yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam //
analyzed: bhartṛ saṃgam parityajya anyatra mriyate yadi bhartṛ lokam na sā yāti yāvat ābhūtasaṃplavam

original: lakṣmīyutānparityajya mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā / mṛtaṃ patimanuvrajya sā ciraṃ sukhamedhate //
analyzed: lakṣmī yutān parityajya mātaram pitaram tathā mṛtam patim anuvrajya sā ciram sukham edhate

original: divyavarṣapramāṇena tisraḥ koṭyor'ddhakoṭayaḥ / tāvatkālaṃ vasetsvarge nakṣatraiḥ saha sarvadā //
analyzed: divya varṣa pramāṇena tisraḥ koṭyā ūrddha koṭayaḥ tāvatkālam vaset svarge nakṣatraiḥ saha sarvadā

original: tadante carate loke kule bhavati bhoginām / sā hi labdhamahāprītirbhartrā saha pativratā //
analyzed: tad ante carate loke kule bhavati bhoginām sā hi labdha mahā prītiḥ bhartrā saha pativratā

original: evaṃ na kurute nārī dharmoḍhā patisaṃgamam / janmajanmani duḥ khārtāduḥ śīlāpriyavādinī //
analyzed: evam na kurute nārī dharma ūḍhā pati saṃgamam janma janmani dus kha ārta adus śīla apriya vādinī

original: valgulī gṛhasodhā vā godhā vā dvimukhī bhavet / svabhartāraṃ parityajya parapuṃsonuvartinī //
analyzed: valgulī gṛhasodhā vā godhā vā dvi mukhī bhavet sva bhartāram parityajya para puṃsaḥ anuvartinī

original: tasmātsarvaprayatnena svapatiṃ strī niṣevate / manasā karmaṇā vācā mṛtaṃ jīvantameva vā //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena sva patim strī niṣevate manasā karmaṇā vācā mṛtam jīvantam eva vā

original: jīvamāne mṛte vāpi kilbiṣaṃ kurute tu yā / sa ca vaidhavyamāpnoti janmajanmani durbhagā //
analyzed: jīvamāne mṛte vā api kilbiṣam kurute tu yā sa ca vaidhavyam āpnoti janma janmani durbhagā

original: yaddevebhyo yatpitṛbhyaḥ śraddhayaiva pradīyate / tatphalaṃ bhartṛpūjātaḥ kuryādbhartrarcanaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: yat devebhyaḥ yat pitṛbhyaḥ śraddhayā eva pradīyate tat phalam bhartṛ pūjātaḥ kuryāt bhartṛ arcanam tatas

original: evaṃ kṛte khagaśreṣṭha pitṛloke ciraṃ vaset / yāvadādityacandrau ca tāvaddevasamā divi //
analyzed: evam kṛte khaga śreṣṭha pitṛ loke ciram vaset yāvat āditya candrau ca tāvat deva samāḥ divi

original: punaścirāyuṣo bhūttvā jāyante vipule kule / pativratā yathā nārī bhartṛduḥkhaṃ na vindati //
analyzed: punar cira āyuṣaḥ jāyante vipule kule pativratā yathā nārī bhartṛ duḥkham na vindati

original: sarvametaddhi kathitaṃ mayā tava khageśvara / viśeṣaṃ kathayiṣyāmi mṛtasyaiva sukhapradam //
analyzed: sarvam etat hi kathitam mayā tava khageśvara viśeṣam kathayiṣyāmi mṛtasya eva sukha pradam

original: dvādaśāhe kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ varṣaṃ yāvatsapiṇḍanam / punaḥ kuryātsadā nityaṃ ghaṭānnaṃ pratimāsikam //
analyzed: dvādaśa ahe kṛtam sarvam varṣam yāvat sapiṇḍanam  punar kuryāt sadā nityam ghaṭānnam pratimāsikam

original: kṛtasya karaṇaṃ nāsti pretakāryādṛte khaga / yaḥ karoti naraḥ kaścitkṛt pūrvaṃ vinaśyati //
analyzed: kṛtasya karaṇam nā asti pretakāryāt ṛte khaga yaḥ karoti naraḥ kaścid kṛt pūrvam vinaśyati

original: mṛtasyaiva punaḥ kuryātpreto 'kṣayyamavāpnuyāt / pratimāsaṃ ghaṭā deyā sodanā jalapūritāḥ //
analyzed: mṛtasya eva punar kuryāt preto kṣayyam avāpnuyāt  pratimāsam ghaṭā deyā sodanāḥ jala pūritāḥ

original: arvākca vṛddheḥ karaṇācca tārkṣya sapiṇḍanaṃ yaḥ kurute hi putraḥ / tathāpi māsaṃ pratipiṇḍamekamannaṃ ca kumbhaṃ sajalaṃ ca dadyāt //
analyzed: arvāk ca vṛddheḥ karaṇāt ca tārkṣya sapiṇḍanam yaḥ kurute hi putraḥ tathā api māsam pratipiṇḍam ekam annam ca kumbham sa jalam ca dadyāt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍedvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretakalpe sapiṇḍananirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde pretakalpe sapiṇḍananirūpaṇam nāma ṣaḍviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 27
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: tārkṣya uvāca / kathaṃ pretā vasantyatra kīdṛgrūpā bhavanti te / mahāpretāḥ piśācāśca kaiḥkaiḥ karmaphalairvibho / sarveṣāmanukampārthaṃ brūhi me madhusūdana //
analyzed: tārkṣyaḥ uvāca katham pretāḥ vasanti atra kīdṛś rūpāḥ bhavanti te mahāpretāḥ piśācāḥ ca kaiḥ kaiḥ karma phalaiḥ vibho sarveṣām anukampā artham brūhi me madhusūdana

original: pretatvānmucyate yena dānena ca śubhe na ca / tanme kathaya deveśa mama cedicchasi priyam //
analyzed: preta tvāt mucyate yena dānena ca śubhe na ca  tat me kathaya deveśa mama ced icchasi priyam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā tārkṣya mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai / śṛṇucāvahito bhūtvā yadvacmi pretalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca sādhu pṛṣṭam tvayā tārkṣya mānuṣāṇām hitāya vai śṛṇuca avahitaḥ bhūtvā yat vacmi preta lakṣaṇam

original: guhyadguhyataraṃ hyetannākhyeyaṃ yasya kasyacit / bhaktastvaṃ hi mahābāho tena te kathayāmyaham //
analyzed: guhyat guhyataram hi etat na ākhyeyam yasya kasyacid bhaktaḥ tvam hi mahā bāho tena te kathayāmi aham

original: purā tretāyuge tāta rājāsīdbabhruvāhanaḥ / mahodayapure ramye dharmaniṣṭho mahābalaḥ //
analyzed: purā tretā yuge tāta rājā āsīt babhruvāhanaḥ mahodaya pure ramye dharma niṣṭhaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: yajvā dānapatiḥ śrīmānbrahmaṇyaḥ sādhusaṃmataḥ / śīlācāraguṇopeto dayādākṣiṇyasaṃyutaḥ //
analyzed: yajvā dānapatiḥ śrīmān brahmaṇyaḥ sādhu saṃmataḥ śīla ācāra guṇa upetaḥ dayā dākṣiṇya saṃyutaḥ

original: prajāḥ pālayate nityaṃ putrāniva mahābalaḥ / kṣattradharmarato nityaṃ sa daṇḍyāndaṇḍayannṛpaḥ //
analyzed: prajāḥ pālayate nityam putrān iva mahā balaḥ kṣattra dharma rataḥ nityam sa daṇḍyān daṇḍayan nṛpaḥ

original: sa kadācinmahābāhuḥ sasainyomṛgayāṃ gataḥ / vanaṃ viveśa gahanaṃ nānāvṛkṣasamanvitam //
analyzed: sa kadācid mahā bāhuḥ sa sainyaḥ mṛgayām gataḥ vanam viveśa gahanam nānā vṛkṣa samanvitam

original: śārdūlaśatasaṃjuṣṭaṃ nānāpakṣinināditam / vanamadhye tadā rājā mṛgaṃ dūrādapaśyata //
analyzed: śārdūla śata saṃjuṣṭam nānā pakṣi nināditam vana madhye tadā rājā mṛgam dūrāt apaśyata

original: tena viddho mṛgo 'tīva bāṇena sudṛḍhena ca / bāṇamādāya taṃ tasya sa vane 'darśanaṃ yayau //
analyzed: tena viddhaḥ tīva bāṇena su dṛḍhena ca bāṇam ādāya tam tasya sa vane darśanam yayau

original: kakṣe tacchoṇitastrāvātsa rājānujagāma tam / tato mṛgaprasaṅgena vanamanyadviveśa saḥ //
analyzed: kakṣe tad śoṇitaḥ trāvāt sa rājā anujagāma tam tatas mṛga prasaṅgena vanam anyat viveśa saḥ

original: kṣutkṣāmakaṇṭho nṛpatiḥ śramasantāpamūrchitaḥ / jalasthānaṃ samāsādya sāśva evāvagāhata //
analyzed: kṣudh kṣāma kaṇṭhaḥ nṛpatiḥ śrama santāpa mūrchitaḥ jala sthānam samāsādya sa aśvaḥ eva avagāhata

original: pītvā tadu dakaṃ śītaṃ padmagandhādhivāsitam / tata uttīrya salilādvimalādbabhruvāhanaḥ //
analyzed: pītvā tat u dakam śītam padma gandha adhivāsitam  tatas uttīrya salilāt vimalāt babhruvāhanaḥ

original: nyagrodhavṛkṣamāsādya śītacchāyaṃ manoharam / mahāviṭapinaṃ hṛdyaṃ pakṣisaṅghātanāditam //
analyzed: nyagrodha vṛkṣam āsādya śīta chāyam manoharam mahā viṭapinam hṛdyam pakṣi saṅghāta nāditam

original: vanasya tasya sarvasya ketubhūtamivocchritam / taṃ mahātarumāsādya niṣasāda mahīpatiḥ //
analyzed: vanasya tasya sarvasya ketu bhūtam iva ucchritam tam mahā tarum āsādya niṣasāda mahīpatiḥ

original: atha pretaṃ dadarśāsau kṣuttṛṣṇāvyākulendriyam / utkacaṃ malinaṃ kubjaṃ (rūkṣaṃ)
analyzed: atha pretam dadarśa asau kṣudh tṛṣṇā vyākula indriyam utkacam malinam kubjam rūkṣam

original: nirmāṃsaṃ bhīmadarśanam //
analyzed: nirmāṃsam bhīma darśanam

original: snāyubaddhāsthicaraṇaṃ dhāvamānamitastataḥ / anyaiśca bahubhiḥ pretaiḥ samantātparivāritam //
analyzed: snāyu baddha asthi caraṇam dhāvamānam itas tatas anyaiḥ ca bahubhiḥ pretaiḥ samantāt parivāritam

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vikṛtaṃ ghoraṃ vismito babhruvāhanaḥ / preto 'pi dṛṣṭvā tāṃ ghorāmaṭavīmāgataṃ nṛpam //
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā vikṛtam ghoram vismitaḥ babhruvāhanaḥ dṛṣṭvā tām ghorām aṭavīm āgatam nṛpam

original: tadā hṛṣṭamanā bhūtvā tasyāntikamupāgataḥ / abravītsa tadā tārkṣya pretarājo nṛpaṃ vacaḥ //
analyzed: tadā hṛṣṭa manāḥ bhūtvā tasya antikam upāgataḥ abravīt sa tadā tārkṣya pretarājaḥ nṛpam vacaḥ

original: pretabhāvo mayā tyaktaḥ prāpto 'smi paramāṃ gatim / tvatsaṃyogānmahābāho nāstidhanyataro mama //
analyzed: preta bhāvaḥ mayā tyaktaḥ prāptaḥ smi paramām gatim tvad saṃyogāt mahā bāho na asti dhanyataraḥ mama

original: nṛpatiruvāca / kṛṣṇavarṇaḥ karālāsyastvaṃ preta iva lakṣyase / kathayasva mama prītyā yathaivaṃ cāsi tattvataḥ //
analyzed: nṛpatiḥ uvāca kṛṣṇa varṇaḥ karāla āsyaḥ tvam pretaḥ iva lakṣyase kathayasva mama prītyā yathā evam ca asi tattvataḥ

original: tathā pṛṣṭaḥ sa vai rājñā provāca sakalaṃ svakam //
analyzed: tathā pṛṣṭaḥ sa vai rājñā provāca sakalam svakam

original: preta uvāca / kathayāmi nṛpaśreṣṭha sarvamevāditastava / pretatve kāraṇaṃ śrutvā dayāṃ kartuṃ mamārhasi //
analyzed: pretaḥ uvāca kathayāmi nṛpa śreṣṭha sarvam eva āditas tava  preta tve kāraṇam śrutvā dayām kartum mama arhasi

original: vaidiśaṃ nāma nagaraṃ sarvasampatsamanvitam / nānājanapadākīrṇaṃ nānāratnasamākulam / nānāpuṇyasamāyuktaṃ nānāvṛkṣasamākulam //
analyzed: vaidiśam nāma nagaram sarva sampad samanvitam nānā janapada ākīrṇam nānā ratna samākulam nānā puṇya samāyuktam nānā vṛkṣa samākulam

original: tatrāhaṃ nyavasaṃ bhūyo devārcanarataḥ sadā / vaiśyo jātyā sudevo 'haṃ nāmnā viditamastu te //
analyzed: tatra aham nyavasam bhūyas deva arcana rataḥ sadā vaiśyaḥ jātyā sudevaḥ ham nāmnā viditam astu te

original: havyena tarpitā devāḥ kavyena pitarastathā / vividhairdānayogaiśca viprāḥ santarpitā mayā //
analyzed: havyena tarpitāḥ devāḥ kavyena pitaraḥ tathā  vividhaiḥ dāna yogaiḥ ca viprāḥ santarpitāḥ mayā

original: āvāhāśca vivāhāśca mayā vai suniveśitāḥ / dīnānāthaviśiṣṭebhyo mayā dattamanekadhā //
analyzed: āvāhāḥ ca vivāhāḥ ca mayā vai su niveśitāḥ dīna anātha viśiṣṭebhyaḥ mayā dattam anekadhā

original: tatsarvaṃ viphalaṃ tāta mama daivādupāgatam / yathā me niṣphalaṃ jātaṃ sukṛtaṃ tadvadāmi te //
analyzed: tat sarvam viphalam tāta mama daivāt upāgatam yathā me niṣphalam jātam sukṛtam tat vadāmi te

original: na me 'sti santatistāta na suhṛnna ca bāndhavaḥ / na ca mitraṃ hi me tādṛgyaḥ kuryādaurdhvadaihikam //
analyzed: na me sti santatiḥ tāta na suhṛd na ca bāndhavaḥ na ca mitram hi me tādṛś yaḥ kuryāt aurdhvadaihikam

original: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tena mama jātaṃ nṛpottama / ekādaśaṃ tripakṣaṃ ca ṣāṇmāsikamathābdikam / pratimāsyāni cānyāni evaṃ śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa //
analyzed: preta tvam su sthiram tena mama jātam nṛpa uttama ekādaśam tri pakṣam ca ṣāṇmāsikam atha ābdikam pratimāsyāni ca anyāni evam śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa

original: yasyaitāni na dīyante pretaśrāddhāni bhūpate / pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tasya dattaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi //
analyzed: yasya etāni na dīyante preta śrāddhāni bhūpate preta tvam su sthiram tasya dattaiḥ śrāddha śataiḥ api

original: evaṃ jñātvā mahārāja pretatvāduddharasva mām / varṇānāṃ cāpi sarveṣāṃ rājā bandhurihocyate //
analyzed: evam jñātvā mahā rāja preta tvāt uddharasva mām varṇānām ca api sarveṣām rājā bandhuḥ iha ucyate

original: tanmāṃ tāraya rājendra maṇiratnaṃ dadāmi te / yathā mama śubhāvāptirbhavennṛpavarottama //
analyzed: tat mām tāraya rāja indra maṇi ratnam dadāmi te yathā mama śubha avāptiḥ bhavet nṛpa vara uttama

original: tathā kāryaṃ mahābāho kṛpā yadi mayīṣyate / ātmanaśca kuru kṣipraṃ sarvamevaurdhvedaihikam //
analyzed: tathā kāryam mahā bāho kṛpā yadi mayi iṣyate ātmanaḥ ca kuru kṣipram sarvam eva aurdhvedaihikam

original: nṛpatiruvāca / kathaṃ pretā bhavantīha kṛtairapyaurdhvadaihikaiḥ / piśācāśca bhavantīha karmabhiḥ kaiśca tadvada //
analyzed: nṛpatiḥ uvāca katham pretāḥ bhavanti iha kṛtaiḥ api aurdhvadaihikaiḥ piśācāḥ ca bhavanti iha karmabhiḥ kaiḥ ca tat vada

original: preta uvāca / devadravyaṃ ca brahmasvaṃ strībāladhanasañcayam / ye haranti nṛpaśreṣṭha pretayoniṃ vrajanti te //
analyzed: pretaḥ uvāca  deva dravyam ca brahma svam strī bāla dhana sañcayam ye haranti nṛpa śreṣṭha preta yonim vrajanti te

original: tāpasīṃ ca sagotrāṃ ca agamyāṃ ye bhajanti hi / bhavanti te mahāpretā ambujāni haranti ye //
analyzed: tāpasīm ca sagotrām ca agamyām ye bhajanti hi bhavanti te mahāpretāḥ ambujāni haranti ye

original: pravālavajrahartāro ye ca vastrāpahārakāḥ / tathā hiraṇyahartāraḥ saṃyuge 'sanmukhāgatāḥ //
analyzed: pravāla vajra hartāraḥ ye ca vastra apahārakāḥ tathā hiraṇya hartāraḥ saṃyuge sat mukha āgatāḥ

original: kṛtaghnā nāstikā raudrāstathā sāhasikā narāḥ / pañcayajñavinirmuktā mahādānaratāśca ye //
analyzed: kṛtaghnāḥ nāstikāḥ raudrāḥ tathā sāhasikāḥ narāḥ pañcayajña vinirmuktāḥ mahā dāna ratāḥ ca ye

original: svāmidrohakarā mitrabrāhmadrohakarāśca ye / tīrthapāpakarā rājañjāyante pretayonayaḥ / evamādyā mahārāja jāyante pretayonayaḥ //
analyzed: svāmi droha karāḥ mitra brāhma droha karāḥ ca ye tīrtha pāpa karāḥ rājan jāyante preta yonayaḥ evamādyāḥ mahā rāja jāyante preta yonayaḥ

original: rājovāca / kathaṃ muktā bhavantīha pretatvāttvaṃ ca te 'pi ca / kathaṃ cāpi mayā kāryamaurdhvadaihikamātmanaḥ / vidhinā kena tatkāryaṃ sarvametadvadasva me //
analyzed: rājā uvāca katham muktāḥ bhavanti iha preta tvāt tvam ca te ca  katham ca api mayā kāryam aurdhvadaihikam ātmanaḥ  vidhinā kena tat kāryam sarvam etat vadasva me

original: preta uvāca / śṛṇu rājendra saṃkṣepādvidhiṃ nārāyaṇātmakam / sacchāstraśravaṇaṃ viṣṇoḥ pūjā sajjanasaṃgatiḥ //
analyzed: pretaḥ uvāca śṛṇu rāja indra saṃkṣepāt vidhim nārāyaṇa ātmakam sat śāstra śravaṇam viṣṇoḥ pūjā sat jana saṃgatiḥ

original: pretayonivināśāya bhavantīti mayā śrutam / ato vakṣyāmi te viṣṇupūjāṃ pretatvanāśinīm //
analyzed: preta yoni vināśāya bhavanti iti mayā śrutam atas vakṣyāmi te viṣṇu pūjām preta tva nāśinīm

original: suvarṇadvayamāhṛtya mūrtiṃ bhūpa prakalpayet / nārāyaṇasya devasya sarvābharaṇabhūṣitām //
analyzed: suvarṇa dvayam āhṛtya mūrtim bhūpa prakalpayet nārāyaṇasya devasya sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitām

original: pītavastrayugācchannāṃ candanāgurucarcitām / snāpayedvividhaistoyairadhivāsya yajettataḥ //
analyzed: pīta vastra yuga ācchannām candana aguru carcitām snāpayet vividhaiḥ toyaiḥ adhivāsya yajet tatas

original: pūrve tu śrīdharaṃ devaṃ dakṣiṇe madhusūdanam / paścime vānamaṃ devamuttare ca gadādharam //
analyzed: pūrve tu śrīdharam devam dakṣiṇe madhusūdanam paścime vānamam devam uttare ca gadādharam

original: madhye pitāmahaṃ pūjya tathā devaṃ maheśvaram / pūjayecca vidhānena gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ pṛthak //
analyzed: madhye pitāmaham pūjya tathā devam maheśvaram pūjayet ca vidhānena gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ pṛthak

original: tataḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya agnau santarpya devatāḥ / ghṛtena dadhnā kṣīreṇa viśvāndevāṃstathā nṛpa //
analyzed: tatas pradakṣiṇīkṛtya agnau santarpya devatāḥ ghṛtena dadhnā kṣīreṇa viśvān devān tathā nṛpa

original: tataḥ snāto vinītātmā yajamānaḥ samāhitaḥ / nārāyaṇāgre vidhivatsvakriyāmaurdhvadaihikīm //
analyzed: tatas snātaḥ vinīta ātmā yajamānaḥ samāhitaḥ nārāyaṇa agre vidhivat sva kriyām aurdhvadaihikīm

original: ārabheta vinītātmā krodhalobhavivarjitaḥ / śrāddhāni kuryātsarvāṇi vṛṣasyotsarjanaṃ tathā //
analyzed: ārabheta vinīta ātmā krodha lobha vivarjitaḥ  śrāddhāni kuryāt sarvāṇi vṛṣasya utsarjanam tathā

original: trayodaśānāṃ viprāṇāṃ vastracchatrāṇyupānahau / aṅgulīyakamuktāni bhājanāsanabhojanaiḥ //
analyzed: trayodaśānām viprāṇām vastra chatrāṇi upānahau aṅgulīyaka muktāni bhājana āsana bhojanaiḥ

original: sānnāśca sodakā deyā ghaṭāḥ pretahitāya vai / śayyādānamatho dattvā ghaṭaṃ pretasya nirvapet //
analyzed: sa annāḥ ca sa udakāḥ deyāḥ ghaṭāḥ preta hitāya vai śayyā dānam atho dattvā ghaṭam pretasya nirvapet

original: nārāyaṇeti sannāma saṃpuṭasthaṃ samarcayet / evaṃ kṛtvātha vidhivacchubhāśubhaphalaṃ labhet //
analyzed: nārāyaṇa iti sat nāma saṃpuṭa stham samarcayet evam kṛtvā atha vidhivat śubha aśubha phalam labhet

original: rājovāca / kathaṃ pretaghaṭaṃ kuryāddadyātkena vidhānataḥ / brūhi sarvānukampārthaṃ ghaṭaṃ pretavimuktidam //
analyzed: rājā uvāca katham preta ghaṭam kuryāt dadyāt kena vidhānataḥ  brūhi sarva anukampā artham ghaṭam preta vimukti dam

original: preta uvāca / sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahārāja kathayāmi nibodha te / pretatvaṃ na bhavedyena dānena sudṛḍhena ca //
analyzed: pretaḥ uvāca sādhu pṛṣṭam mahā rāja kathayāmi nibodha te preta tvam na bhavet yena dānena su dṛḍhena ca

original: dānaṃ pretaghaṭaṃ nāma sarvāśubhavināśanam / durlabhaṃ sarvalokānāṃ durgatikṣayakārakam //
analyzed: dānam pretaghaṭam nāma sarva aśubha vināśanam durlabham sarva lokānām durgati kṣaya kārakam

original: santaptahāṭakamayaṃ tu ghaṭaṃ vidhāya brahmośakeśavayutaṃ saha lokapālaiḥ / kṣīrājyapūrṇavivaraṃ praṇipatya bhaktyā viprāya dehi tava dānaśataiḥ kimanyaiḥ //
analyzed: santapta hāṭaka mayam tu ghaṭam vidhāya brahma uśa keśava yutam saha lokapālaiḥ kṣīra ājya pūrṇa vivaram praṇipatya bhaktyā viprāya dehi tava dāna śataiḥ kim anyaiḥ

original: brahmā madhye tathā viṣṇuḥ śaṅkaraḥ śaṅkaro 'vyayaḥ / prācyādiṣu ca tatkaṇṭhe lokapālānkrameṇa tu //
analyzed: brahmā madhye tathā viṣṇuḥ śaṅkaraḥ śaṅkaraḥ vyayaḥ prācya ādiṣu ca tad kaṇṭhe lokapālān krameṇa tu

original: sampūjya vidhivadrājandhūpaiḥ kusumacandanaiḥ / tato dugdhājyasahitaṃ ghaṭaṃ deyaṃ hiraṇmayam //
analyzed: sampūjya vidhivat rājan dhūpaiḥ kusuma candanaiḥ tatas dugdha ājya sahitam ghaṭam deyam hiraṇmayam

original: sarvadānādhikañcaitanmahāpātakanāśanam / kartavyaṃ śraddhayā rājanpretatvavinivṛttaye //
analyzed: sarva dāna adhikam ca etat mahāpātaka nāśanam kartavyam śraddhayā rājan preta tva vinivṛttaye

original: śrībhāgavānuvāca / evaṃ saṃjalṣatastasya pretena niyatātmanaḥ / senājagāmānupadaṃ hastyaśvarathasaṃkulā //
analyzed: śrī bhāgavān uvāca  evam saṃjalṣataḥ tasya pretena niyata ātmanaḥ senā ājagāma anupadam hasti aśva ratha saṃkulā

original: tato bale samāyāte dattvā rājñe mahāmaṇim / namaskṛtya punaḥ prārthya preto 'darśanamīyivān //
analyzed: tatas bale samāyāte dattvā rājñe mahā maṇim namaskṛtya punar prārthya pretaḥ darśanam īyivān

original: tasmādvanādviniṣkramya rājāpi svapuraṃ yayau / svapuraṃ sa samāsādya sarvaṃ tatpretabhāṣitam //
analyzed: tasmāt vanāt viniṣkramya rājā api sva puram yayau sva puram sa samāsādya sarvam tat preta bhāṣitam

original: cakāra vidhivatpakṣinnaurdhvadehādikaṃ vidhim / tasya puṇyapradānena preto mukto divaṃ yayau //
analyzed: cakāra vidhivat pakṣin aurdhvadeha ādikam vidhim tasya puṇya pradānena pretaḥ muktaḥ divam yayau

original: śrāddhena paradattena gataḥ preto 'pi sadgatim / kiṃ punaḥ putradattena pitā yātīti cātbhutam //
analyzed: śrāddhena para dattena gataḥ sat gatim  kim punar putra dattena pitā yāti iti ca atbhutam

original: itihāsamimaṃ puṇyaṃ śṛṇoti śrāvayecca yaḥ / na tau pretatvamāyātaḥ pāpācārayutāvapi //
analyzed: itihāsam imam puṇyam śṛṇoti śrāvayet ca yaḥ na tau preta tvam āyātaḥ pāpa ācāra yutau api

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde babhruvāhanapretasaṃvāde pretatvahetutannivṛttyupāyanirūpaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde babhruvāhana preta saṃvāde preta tva hetu tad nivṛtti upāya nirūpaṇam

original: nāma saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nāma saptaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 28
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / sarvepāmanukampārthaṃ brūhi me madhusūdana / pretatvānmucyate yena dānena sukṛtena vā //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca sarvepām anukampā artham brūhi me madhusūdana preta tvāt mucyate yena dānena sukṛtena vā

original: śṛkṛṣṇa uvāca / śṛṇu dānaṃ pravakṣyāmi sarvāśu bhavināśanam / santaptahāṭakamayaṃ ghaṭakaṃ vidhāya brahmeśakeśavayutaṃ saha lokapālaiḥ / kṣīrājyapūrṇaviviraṃ praṇipatya bhaktyā viprāya dehi tava dānaśataiḥ kimanyaiḥ //
analyzed: uvāca  śṛṇu dānam pravakṣyāmi sarva āśu bhavi nāśanam santapta hāṭaka mayam ghaṭakam vidhāya brahma īśa keśava yutam saha lokapālaiḥ kṣīra ājya pūrṇa viviram praṇipatya bhaktyā viprāya dehi tava dāna śataiḥ kim anyaiḥ

original: garuḍa uvāca / kimetkathitaṃ deva vistareṇa vadasva me / āmuṣmikīṃ krīyāṃ deva utkrāntisamayādanu //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca kim et kathitam deva vistareṇa vadasva me  āmuṣmikīm krīyām devaḥ utkrānti samayāt anu

original: saṃsāre sādhu me nātha brūhi kṛtyaṃ janārdana / yathā kāryā naraiḥ samyak kriyā caivaurdhvadaihikī //
analyzed: saṃsāre sādhu me nātha brūhi kṛtyam janārdana  yathā kāryā naraiḥ samyak kriyā ca eva aurdhvadaihikī

original: kathaṃ pretā mahākāyā raudrarūpā bhayānakāḥ / kambhavanti suraśreṣṭha karmabhiḥ kaiḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ //
analyzed: katham pretāḥ mahā kāyāḥ raudra rūpāḥ bhayānakāḥ suraśreṣṭha karmabhiḥ kaiḥ śubha aśubhaiḥ

original: piśācāḥ sambhavantīha kasyedaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam / tanme kathaya deveśa ahamicchāmi veditum //
analyzed: piśācāḥ sambhavanti iha kasya idam karmaṇaḥ phalam tat me kathaya deveśa aham icchāmi veditum

original: bhūmyāṃ prakṣipyate kasmātpañcaratnaṃ kuto mukhe / adhastācca tilā darbhāḥ pādau yāmyāṃ vyavasthitāḥ //
analyzed: bhūmyām prakṣipyate kasmāt pañcaratnam kutas mukhe adhastāt ca tilāḥ darbhāḥ pādau yāmyām vyavasthitāḥ

original: kimarthaṃ maṇḍalaṃ bhūmau gomayenopalipyate / kimarthaṃ smaryate viṣṇuḥ viṣṇusūktañca paṭhyate //
analyzed: kimartham maṇḍalam bhūmau gomayena upalipyate kimartham smaryate viṣṇuḥ viṣṇusūktam ca paṭhyate

original: kimarthaṃ putraputrāśca tasya tiṣṭhanti cāgrataḥ / kimarthaṃ dīpadānañca kimarthaṃ viṣṇupūjanam //
analyzed: kimartham putra putrāḥ ca tasya tiṣṭhanti ca agratas kimartham dīpa dānam ca kimartham viṣṇu pūjanam

original: kimarthamāturo dānaṃ dadāti dvijapuṅgave / bandhūnmitrāṇyamitrāṃśca kṣamāpayati tatkatham //
analyzed: kimartham āturaḥ dānam dadāti dvija puṅgave bandhūn mitrāṇi amitrān ca kṣamāpayati tat katham

original: tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā / saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāvo dīyate kena he tunā //
analyzed: tilāḥ loham hiraṇyam ca kārpāsam lavaṇam tathā saptadhānyam kṣitiḥ gāvaḥ dīyate kena he tunā

original: kathaṃ ca mriyate janturmṛtasya ca kuto gatiḥ / ativāhaśarīraṃ ca kathaṃ viśramate tadā //
analyzed: katham ca mriyate jantuḥ mṛtasya ca kutas gatiḥ ativāha śarīram ca katham viśramate tadā

original: śaṃva skandhe vahetputro vahnidātā ca pautrakaḥ / kimarthaṃ deva deveśa ājyenābhyañjanaṃ kutaḥ //
analyzed: skandhe vahet putraḥ vahni dātā ca pautrakaḥ kimartham deva deveśaḥ ājyena abhyañjanam kutas

original: yamasūktaṃ kimarthaṃ ca udīcīṃ diśamāharet / pānīyamekavastreṇa sūryabimbanirīkṣaṇam //
analyzed: yama sūktam kimartham ca udīcīm diśam āharet pānīyam eka vastreṇa sūrya bimba nirīkṣaṇam

original: yavasarṣapadūrvāścapāṣāṇe nimbacarvaṇam / vastraṃ naraśca nārī ca vidadhyādadharottaram //
analyzed: yava sarṣapa dūrvā āśca pāṣāṇe nimba carvaṇam vastram naraḥ ca nārī ca vidadhyāt adhara uttaram

original: annādyaṃ gṛhamāgatya bhoktavyaṃ gotribhiḥ saha / navakāni ca piṇḍāni kimarthaṃ vitaretsutaḥ //
analyzed: annādyam gṛham āgatya bhoktavyam gotribhiḥ saha navakāni ca piṇḍāni kimartham vitaret sutaḥ

original: kimarthaṃ catvare dugdhaṃ pātre pakve ca mṛnmaye / kāṣṭhatrayaṃ guṇe baddhvā kṛtvā rātrau catuṣpathe //
analyzed: kimartham catvare dugdham pātre pakve ca mṛd maye kāṣṭha trayam guṇe baddhvā kṛtvā rātrau catuṣpathe

original: niśāyāṃ dīyate dīpo yāvadabdaṃ dinedine / dāhodakaṃ kimarthaṃ ca saṃvādaḥ svajanaiḥ saha //
analyzed: niśāyām dīyate dīpaḥ yāvat abdam dine dine  dāha udakam kimartham ca saṃvādaḥ sva janaiḥ saha

original: bhagavannativāhasya navapiṇḍaistu kiṃ bhavet / kathaṃ devapitṛbhyaśca vāhasyāvāhanaṃ katham / idaṃ ca kriyate deva kasmātpiṇḍaṃ pradāpayet //
analyzed: bhagavan ativāhasya nava piṇḍaiḥ tu kim bhavet katham deva pitṛbhyaḥ ca vāhasya āvāhanam katham idam ca kriyate deva kasmāt piṇḍam pradāpayet

original: kiṃ tatpradīyate tasya piṇḍadānādanantaram / asthisañcayanaṃ caiva śayyādānaṃ kimarthakam //
analyzed: kim tat pradīyate tasya piṇḍa dānāt anantaram asthisañcayanam ca eva śayyā dānam kimarthakam

original: dvitīye 'hni kutaḥ snānaṃ caturthe sāgnike dvije / daśame kiṃ malasnānaṃ kāryaṃ sarvajanaiḥ saha //
analyzed: dvitīye hni kutas snānam caturthe sa agnike dvije daśame kim mala snānam kāryam sarva janaiḥ saha

original: kasmāttailodvartanaṃ ca skandhavāhān gṛhaṃ nayet / taiḥ samudvartanaṃ cāpi dadyuḥ sthalajalāśraye //
analyzed: kasmāt taila udvartanam ca skandhavāhān gṛham nayet taiḥ samudvartanam ca api dadyuḥ sthala jala āśraye

original: deśame 'hani yaḥ piṇḍastaṃ dadyādāmiṣeṇa tu / piṇḍaṃ caikādaśe kasmād vṛṣotsargaḥ kathaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: deśame hani yaḥ piṇḍaḥ tam dadyāt āmiṣeṇa tu piṇḍam ca ekādaśe kasmāt vṛṣotsargaḥ katham bhavet

original: śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśaitāni abdaṃ yāvatkuto vada / annādicodakenaiva ṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatrayam //
analyzed: śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa etāni abdam yāvat kutas vada anna ādi ca udakena eva ṣaṣṭi adhika śata trayam

original: dinedine ca dātavyaṃ ghaṭānnaṃ pretatṛptaye / prāpte kāle ca mriyate anityo mānavaḥ prabho //
analyzed: dine dine ca dātavyam ghaṭa annam preta tṛptaye prāpte kāle ca mriyate anityaḥ mānavaḥ prabho

original: chidraṃ tu naiva paśyāmi kuto jīvaḥ sa nirgataḥ / kuto gacchanti bhūtāni pṛthivyāpo manastathā //
analyzed: chidram tu nā eva paśyāmi kutas jīvaḥ sa nirgataḥ kutas gacchanti bhūtāni pṛthivī apaḥ manaḥ tathā

original: tejo vadasva me nātha vāyurākāśameva ca / vāyavaścaiva pañcaite kathaṃ gacchanti cāptaye //
analyzed: tejaḥ vadasva me nātha vāyuḥ ākāśam eva ca  vāyavaḥ ca eva pañca ete katham gacchanti ca āptaye

original: lobhamohādayaḥ pañca śarīre caiva taskarāḥ / tṛṣṇā kāmo 'pyahaṅkāraḥ kuto yānti janārdana //
analyzed: lobha moha ādayaḥ pañca śarīre ca eva taskarāḥ tṛṣṇā kāmaḥ pi ahaṅkāraḥ kutas yānti janārdana

original: puṇyaṃ vāpyatha vāpuṇyaṃ yatkiñcitsukṛtaṃ tathā / naṣṭe dehe kuto yānti dānāni vividhāni ca //
analyzed: puṇyam vā api atha vā apuṇyam yat kiñcid sukṛtam tathā naṣṭe dehe kutas yānti dānāni vividhāni ca

original: sapiṇḍanaṃ kimarthaṃ ca pūrṇe saṃvatsare 'pi vā / pretasya melanaṃ sārdhaṃ kaiḥ samaṃ tatra ko vidhiḥ //
analyzed: sapiṇḍanam kimartham ca pūrṇe saṃvatsare vā pretasya melanam sārdham kaiḥ samam tatra kaḥ vidhiḥ

original: ye dagdhā ye tvadagdhāśca patitā ye narābhuvi / yāni cānyāni bhūtāni teṣāmante bhavecca kim //
analyzed: ye dagdhāḥ ye tu adagdhāḥ ca patitāḥ ye nara abhuvi yāni ca anyāni bhūtāni teṣām ante bhavet ca kim

original: pāpino ye durācārā mudgalatvaṃ ca ye gatāḥ / ātmaghātī brahmahā ca steyī viśvāsaghātakaḥ //
analyzed: pāpinaḥ ye durācārāḥ mudgala tvam ca ye gatāḥ ātma ghātī brahma hā ca steyī viśvāsa ghātakaḥ

original: kapilāṃ yaḥ pibecchūdro yaḥ paṭhedvaidikākṣaram / dhārayedvā brahmasūtraṃ kā gatistasya mādhava //
analyzed: kapilām yaḥ pibet śūdraḥ yaḥ paṭhet vaidika akṣaram dhārayet vā brahmasūtram kā gatiḥ tasya mādhava

original: viprasya brāhmaṇī bhāryā saṃgṛhī tā yadā bhavet / tasmātpāpācca bhīto 'haṃ tanme vada jagatpate / sarvametanmayā pṛṣṭo vada lokahitāya vai //
analyzed: viprasya brāhmaṇī bhāryā saṃgṛhī tā yadā bhavet tasmāt pāpāt ca bhītaḥ ham tat me vada jagatpate sarvam etat mayā pṛṣṭaḥ vada loka hitāya vai

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde aurdhvadahikakarmakālakriyamāṇanānādānādiphalapraśranirūpaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde aurdhvadahika karma kāla kriyamāṇa nānā dāna ādi phala praśra nirūpaṇam

original: nāmāṣṭāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nāma aṣṭāviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 29
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhadra mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai / śṛṇuṣvāvahito bhūtvā sarvamevaurdhvadaihikam //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca sādhu pṛṣṭam tvayā bhadra mānuṣāṇām hitāya vai śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ bhūtvā sarvam eva aurdhvadaihikam

original: kamyagvibhedarahitaṃ śrutismṛtisamuddhṛtam / yanna dṛṣṭaṃ suraiḥ sendrairyogibhiryogacintakaiḥ //
analyzed: kamyak vibheda rahitam śruti smṛti samuddhṛtam yat na dṛṣṭam suraiḥ sa indraiḥ yogibhiḥ yoga cintakaiḥ

original: guhyādguhyataraṃ vatsa nākhyātaṃ kasyacitkvacit / bhaktastvaṃ hi mahābhāga sarvaṃ te kathayāmyaham //
analyzed: guhyāt guhyataram vatsa na ākhyātam kasyacid kvacid  bhaktaḥ tvam hi mahābhāga sarvam te kathayāmi aham

original: aputrasya gatirnāsti svargo naiva ca naiva ca / yena kenāpyupāyena kāryaṃ janma sutasya ca //
analyzed: aputrasya gatiḥ nā asti svargaḥ nā eva ca nā eva ca yena kena api upāyena kāryam janma sutasya ca

original: tārayennarakātputro yadi mokṣo na vidyate / dāhaḥ putreṇa kartavyo deyaḥ pautreṇa pāvakaḥ //
analyzed: tārayet narakāt putraḥ yadi mokṣaḥ na vidyate  dāhaḥ putreṇa kartavyaḥ deyaḥ pautreṇa pāvakaḥ

original: tilairdarbhaiśca bhūmyāṃ vai kuṭī dhātumatī bhavet / pañcaratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati //
analyzed: tilaiḥ darbhaiḥ ca bhūmyām vai kuṭī dhātumatī bhavet pañcaratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati

original: lipyāttu gomayairbhūmiṃ tilāndarbhāṃśca niḥ kṣipet / tasyāmevāturo muktaḥ sarvaṃ dahati pātakam //
analyzed: lipyāt tu gomayaiḥ bhūmim tilān darbhān ca niḥ kṣipet tasyām eva āturaḥ muktaḥ sarvam dahati pātakam

original: darbhamūlīnayetsvargaṃ saṃsthitaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ / darbhāṃstatra hi ye bhūmyāṃ tilayuktāna saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: darbha mūlī nayet svargam saṃsthitam na atra saṃśayaḥ darbhān tatra hi ye bhūmyām saṃśayaḥ

original: sarvatra vasudhā pūtā yatra lepo na vidyate / yatra lepaḥ sthitastatra punarlepena śudhyati //
analyzed: sarvatra vasudhā pūtā yatra lepaḥ na vidyate yatra lepaḥ sthitaḥ tatra punar lepena śudhyati

original: yātudhānāḥ piśācāśca rākṣasāḥ krūrakarmiṇaḥ / alipte āturaṃ muktaṃ viśantyete na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: yātudhānāḥ piśācāḥ ca rākṣasāḥ krūra karmiṇaḥ alipte āturam muktam viśanti ete na saṃśayaḥ

original: nityahomaṃ tathā śrāddhaṃ viprāṇāṃ pādaśodhanam / maṇḍalena vinā bhūmyāṃ kurvantyetacca niṣphalam //
analyzed: nitya homam tathā śrāddham viprāṇām pāda śodhanam maṇḍalena vinā bhūmyām kurvanti etat ca niṣphalam

original: āturo mucyate naiva maṇḍalena vinā bhuvi / brahmā rudraśca viṣṇuśca śrīrhutāśana eva ca / maṇḍale copatiṣṭhantastasmātkurvīta maṇḍalam //
analyzed: āturaḥ mucyate nā eva maṇḍalena vinā bhuvi  brahmā rudraḥ ca viṣṇuḥ ca śrīḥ hutāśanaḥ eva ca maṇḍale ca upatiṣṭhantaḥ tasmāt kurvīta maṇḍalam

original: anyathā mriyate yastu bālo vṛddho yuvāpi vā / yonyantaraṃ sa vai gacchetkrīḍate vāyunā saha //
analyzed: anyathā mriyate yaḥ tu bālaḥ vṛddhaḥ yuvā api vā yoni antaram sa vai gacchet krīḍate vāyunā saha

original: miśritaṃ lohatāmraṃ tu tathaiva janma jāyate / tasmaivaṃ vāyubhūtasya na śrāddhaṃ nodaka kriyā //
analyzed: miśritam loha tāmram tu tathā eva janma jāyate vāyu bhūtasya na śrāddham na udaka kriyā

original: mama svedasamudbhūtāstilāstārkṣya pavitrakāḥ / asurā dānavā daityāstṛpyanti tiladānataḥ //
analyzed: mama sveda samudbhūtāḥ tilāḥ tārkṣya pavitrakāḥ asurāḥ dānavāḥ daityāḥ tṛpyanti tila dānataḥ

original: tilāḥ śvetāstilāḥ kṛṣṇāstilā gomūtrasannibhāḥ / te me dahantu pāṣāni śarīreṇa kṛtāni ca //
analyzed: tilāḥ śvetāḥ tilāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ tilāḥ go mūtra sannibhāḥ te me dahantu śarīreṇa kṛtāni ca

original: eka eva tiladroṇo hemadroṇatilaiḥ samaḥ / tarpaṇe dānahome ca datto bhavati cākṣayaḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ eva tila droṇaḥ hema droṇa tilaiḥ samaḥ tarpaṇe dāna home ca dattaḥ bhavati ca akṣayaḥ

original: darbhā mallomasambhūtāstilāḥ svedasamudbhavāḥ / tṛptāḥ syurdevatā dānaiḥ śrāddhena pitarastathā / prayogavidhinā brahmā viśvañcāpyupajīvanāt //
analyzed: darbhāḥ mad loma sambhūtāḥ tilāḥ sveda samudbhavāḥ tṛptāḥ syuḥ devatāḥ dānaiḥ śrāddhena pitaraḥ tathā prayoga vidhinā brahmā

original: savyayajñopavītena brahmādyāstṛptimānpuyuḥ / apasavyena tṛpyanti pitaro dividevatāḥ //
analyzed: savya yajñopavītena brahma ādyāḥ tṛptimān puyuḥ apasavyena tṛpyanti pitaraḥ divi devatāḥ

original: apasavyādito brahmā darbhamadhye tu keśavaḥ / darbhāgre śaṅkaraṃ vidyāttrayo devāḥ kuśe sthitāḥ //
analyzed: apasavya āditas brahmā darbha madhye tu keśavaḥ darbha agre śaṅkaram vidyāt trayaḥ devāḥ kuśe sthitāḥ

original: viprā mantrāḥ kuśā vahnistulasī ca khageśvara / naite nirmālyatāṃ yānti kriyamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: viprāḥ mantrāḥ kuśāḥ vahniḥ tulasī ca khageśvara na ete nirmālya tām yānti kriyamāṇāḥ punar punar

original: kuśāḥ piṇḍeṣu nirmālyāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ pretabhojane / mantrāḥ śūdreṣu patitāścitāyāśca hutāśanaḥ //
analyzed: kuśāḥ piṇḍeṣu nirmālyāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ preta bhojane mantrāḥ śūdreṣu patitāḥ citāyāḥ ca hutāśanaḥ

original: tulasī brāhmaṇā gāvo viṣṇurekādaśī khaga / pañca pravahaṇānyeva bhavābdhau majjatāṃ satām //
analyzed: tulasī brāhmaṇāḥ gāvaḥ viṣṇuḥ ekādaśī khaga pañca pravahaṇāni eva bhava abdhau majjatām satām

original: viṣṇurekādaśī gītā tulasīvipradhenavaḥ / apāre durgasaṃkāre ṣaṭpadī muktidāyinī //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ ekādaśī gītā tulasī vipra dhenavaḥ apāre durga saṃkāre ṣaṭpadī mukti dāyinī

original: tilāḥ pavitrāstrividhā darbhāśca tulasīdālam / nivārayanti caitāni durgatiṃ yāntamāturam //
analyzed: tilāḥ pavitrāḥ trividhāḥ darbhāḥ ca tulasī dālam nivārayanti ca etāni durgatim yāntam āturam

original: hastābhyāmuddhṛtairdarbhaistoyena prokṣayedbhuvam / mṛtyukāle kṣipeddarbhānāturasya karadvaye //
analyzed: hastābhyām uddhṛtaiḥ darbhaiḥ toyena prokṣayet bhuvam mṛtyu kāle kṣipet darbhān āturasya kara dvaye

original: darbheṣu kṣipyate yo 'sau dabhastu pariveṣṭitaḥ / viṣṇulokaṃ sa vai yāti mantrahīno 'pi mānavaḥ //
analyzed: darbheṣu kṣipyate saḥ dabhaḥ tu pariveṣṭitaḥ viṣṇu lokam sa vai yāti mantra hīnaḥ mānavaḥ

original: darbhamūlīgato bhūmau darbhapāṇistu yo mṛtaḥ / prāyaścittaviśuddho 'sau saṃsārepārasāgare //
analyzed: darbha mūlī gataḥ bhūmau darbha pāṇiḥ tu yaḥ mṛtaḥ prāyaścitta viśuddhaḥ sau saṃsāre pāra sāgare

original: gomayenopalipte tu darbhasyāstaraṇe sthitaḥ / tatra dattena dānena sarvaṃ pāpaṃ vyapohati //
analyzed: gomayena upalipte tu darbhasya āstaraṇe sthitaḥ tatra dattena dānena sarvam pāpam vyapohati

original: lavaṇaṃ tadrasaṃ divyaṃ sarvakāmapradaṃ nṛṇām / yasmādannarasāḥ sarve notkaṭā lavaṇaṃ vinā //
analyzed: lavaṇam tad rasam divyam sarva kāma pradam nṛṇām yasmāt anna rasāḥ sarve na utkaṭāḥ lavaṇam vinā

original: pitṝṇāṃ ca priyaṃ bhavyaṃ tasmātsvargapradaṃ bhavet / viṣṇudehasamudbhūto yato 'yaṃ lavaṇo rasaḥ //
analyzed: pitṝṇām ca priyam bhavyam tasmāt svarga pradam bhavet viṣṇu deha samudbhūtaḥ yatas yam lavaṇaḥ rasaḥ

original: viśeṣāllavaṇaṃ dānaṃ tena śaṃsanti yoginaḥ / brāhmaṇa kṣattriyaviśāṃ strīṇāṃ śūdrajanasya ca //
analyzed: viśeṣāt lavaṇam dānam tena śaṃsanti yoginaḥ brāhmaṇa kṣattriya viśām strīṇām śūdra janasya ca

original: āturāṇāṃ yadā prāṇāḥ prayānti vasudhātale / lavaṇaṃ tu tadā deyaṃ dbārasyoddhāṭanaṃ divaḥ //
analyzed: āturāṇām yadā prāṇāḥ prayānti vasudhā tale  lavaṇam tu tadā deyam dbārasya uddhāṭanam divaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe pretakalpe dharmakāṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde

original: aurdhvadehikakarmaṇi putradarbhatilatulasīgobhūlepatāmrapātradānā dīnāmāvaśyakatvanirūpaṇaṃ
analyzed: aurdhvadehika karmaṇi putra darbha tila tulasī go bhū lepa tāmra pātra dāna ādīnām āvaśyaka tva nirūpaṇam

original: nāmaikonatriśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nāma ekonatriśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 30
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / śṛṇu tārkṣya paraṃ guhyaṃ dānānāṃ dānamuttamam / paramaṃ sarvadānānāṃ paraṃ gopyaṃ divaukasām //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca  śṛṇu tārkṣya param guhyam dānānām dānam uttamam paramam sarva dānānām param gopyam divaukasām

original: deyamekaṃ mahādānaṃ kārpāsaṃ cottamottamam / yena dattena prīyante bhūrbhuvaḥ svariti kramāt //
analyzed: deyam ekam mahādānam kārpāsam ca uttamottamam yena dattena prīyante bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar iti kramāt

original: brahmādyā devatāḥ sarvāḥ kāryācca prītimāpnuyuḥ / deyametanmahādānaṃ pretoddharaṇahetave //
analyzed: brahma ādyāḥ devatāḥ sarvāḥ kāryāt ca prītim āpnuyuḥ deyam etat mahā dānam preta uddharaṇa hetave

original: ciraṃ vasedrudraloke tato rājā bhavediha / rūpavānsubhago vāgmī śrīmānatula vikramaḥ / yamalokaṃ vinirjitya svargaṃ tākṣya sa gacchati //
analyzed: ciram vaset rudra loke tatas rājā bhavet iha rūpavān subhagaḥ vāgmī śrīmān atula vikramaḥ yama lokam vinirjitya svargam sa gacchati

original: gāṃ tilāṃśca kṣitaṃ hema yo dadāti dvijanmane / tasya janmārjirta pāpaṃ tatkṣaṇādevanaśyati //
analyzed: gām tilān ca kṣitam hema yaḥ dadāti dvijanmane tasya pāpam tad kṣaṇāt eva naśyati

original: tilā gāvo mahādānaṃ mahāpātakanāśanam / taddvayaṃ dīyate vipre nānyavarṇe kadācana //
analyzed: tilāḥ gāvaḥ mahā dānam mahāpātaka nāśanam tat dvayam dīyate vipre na anya varṇe kadācana

original: kalpitaṃ dīyate dānaṃ tilā gāvaścamedinī / anyeṣu naiva varṇeṣu poṣyavarge kadācana //
analyzed: kalpitam dīyate dānam tilāḥ gāvaḥ ca medinī anyeṣu nā eva varṇeṣu poṣya varge kadācana

original: poṣyavarge tathā strīṣu dānaṃ deyamakalpitam / āture voparāge ca dvayaṃ dānaṃ viśiṣyate / āture dīyate dānaṃ tatkāle copatiṣṭhati //
analyzed: poṣya varge tathā strīṣu dānam deyam akalpitam  āture vā uparāge ca dvayam dānam viśiṣyate āture dīyate dānam tad kāle ca upatiṣṭhati

original: jīvatastu punardattamupatiṣṭhatyasaṃskṛtam / satyaṃsatyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ yaddattaṃ vikalendriye //
analyzed: jīvataḥ tu punar dattam upatiṣṭhati asaṃskṛtam satyam satyam punar satyam yat dattam vikala indriye

original: yaccānu modate putrastacca dānamanantakam / ato dadyāt sa putro vā yāvajjīvatsasau ciram / ativāhastathā preto bhogāṃśca labhate yataḥ //
analyzed: yat ca anu modate putraḥ tat ca dānam anantakam  atas dadyāt sa putraḥ vā yāvat jīvat sa sau ciram ativāhaḥ tathā pretaḥ bhogān ca labhate yatas

original: asvasthā turakāle tu dehapāte kṣitisthite / dehe tathātivāhasya parataḥ prīṇanaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: asvasthā tura kāle tu dehapāte kṣiti sthite dehe tathā ativāhasya paratas prīṇanam bhavet

original: paṅgāvandhe ca kāṇe ca hyardhonmīlitalocane / tileṣu darbhānsaṃstīrya dānamuktaṃ tadakṣayam //
analyzed: paṅgau andhe ca kāṇe ca hi ardha unmīlita locane tileṣu darbhān saṃstīrya dānam uktam tat akṣayam

original: tilā lauhaṃ hiraṇyañca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā / saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: tilāḥ lauham hiraṇyam ca kārpāsam lavaṇam tathā saptadhānyam kṣitiḥ gāvaḥ ekaikam pāvanam smṛtam

original: lohadānādyamastuṣyeddharma rājastilārpaṇāt / lavaṇe dīyamāne tu na bhayaṃ vidyate yamāt //
analyzed: loha dānāt yamaḥ tuṣyet dharma rājaḥ tila arpaṇāt lavaṇe dīyamāne tu na bhayam vidyate yamāt

original: karpāsasya tu dānena na bhūtebhyo bhayaṃ bhavet / tārayanti naraṃ gāvastrividhāścaiva pātakāt //
analyzed: karpāsasya tu dānena na bhūtebhyaḥ bhayam bhavet tārayanti naram gāvaḥ trividhāḥ ca eva pātakāt

original: hemadānātsukhaṃ svarge bhūmidānānnṛpo bhavet / hemabhūmipradānācca na pīḍā narake bhavet //
analyzed: hema dānāt sukham svarge bhūmi dānāt nṛpaḥ bhavet hema bhūmi pradānāt ca na pīḍā narake bhavet

original: sarve 'pi yamadūtāśca yamarūpā vibhīṣaṇāḥ / sarve te varadā yānti saptadhānyena prīṇitāḥ //
analyzed: sarve yama dūtāḥ ca yama rūpāḥ vibhīṣaṇāḥ sarve te vara dāḥ yānti saptadhānyena prīṇitāḥ

original: viṣṇoḥ smaraṇamātreṇa prāpyate paramā gatiḥ / etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ martyairyā gatirāpyate //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ smaraṇa mātreṇa prāpyate paramā gatiḥ  etat te sarvam ākhyātam martyaiḥ yā gatiḥ āpyate

original: tasmāt putraṃ praśaṃsanti dadāti piturājñayā / bhūmiṣṭhaṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā hyardhonmīlitalocanam //
analyzed: tasmāt putram praśaṃsanti dadāti pituḥ ājñayā bhūmiṣṭham pitaram dṛṣṭvā hi ardha unmīlita locanam

original: tasmin kāle suto yastu sarvadānāni dāpayet / gayāśrāddhādviśiṣyeta sa putraḥ kulanandanaḥ //
analyzed: tasmin kāle sutaḥ yaḥ tu sarva dānāni dāpayet gayā śrāddhāt viśiṣyeta sa putraḥ kula nandanaḥ

original: svasthānāccalitaścāsau vikalasya pitustadā / putrairyatnena kartavyā pitaraṃ tārayanti te //
analyzed: sva sthānāt calitaḥ ca asau vikalasya pituḥ tadā putraiḥ yatnena kartavyā pitaram tārayanti te

original: kiṃ dattairbahubhirdānaiḥ piturantyeṣṭimācaret / aśvamedho mahāyajñaḥ kalāṃ nārhati ṣoḍaśīm //
analyzed: kim dattaiḥ bahubhiḥ dānaiḥ pituḥ antyeṣṭim ācaret  aśvamedhaḥ mahā yajñaḥ kalām na arhati ṣoḍaśīm

original: dharmātmā sa nu putro vaidevairapi supūjyate / dāpayedyastu dānāni hyāturaṃ pitaraṃ bhuvi //
analyzed: dharma ātmā sa nu putraḥ vaidevaiḥ api su pūjyate dāpayet yaḥ tu dānāni hi āturam pitaram bhuvi

original: lohadānañca dātavyaṃ bhūmiyuktena pāṇinā / yamaṃ bhīmañca nāpnoti na gacchet tasya veśmani //
analyzed: loha dānam ca dātavyam bhūmi yuktena pāṇinā yamam bhīmam ca na āpnoti na gacchet tasya veśmani

original: kuṭhāro musalo daṇḍaḥ khaḍgaśca cchurikā tathā / etāni yamahasteṣu dṛśyāni pāpakarmiṇām //
analyzed: kuṭhāraḥ musalaḥ daṇḍaḥ khaḍgaḥ ca churikā tathā etāni yama hasteṣu dṛśyāni pāpa karmiṇām

original: tasmāllohasya dānantu brāhmaṇāyāturo dadet / yamāyudhānāṃ santuṣṭyai dānametadudāhṛtam //
analyzed: tasmāt lohasya dānam tu brāhmaṇāya āturaḥ dadet yama āyudhānām santuṣṭyai dānam etat udāhṛtam

original: garbhasthāḥ śiśavo ye ca yuvānaḥ sthavirāstathā / ebhirdānaviśeṣaistu nirdaheyuḥ svapātakam //
analyzed: garbha sthāḥ śiśavaḥ ye ca yuvānaḥ sthavirāḥ tathā ebhiḥ dāna viśeṣaiḥ tu nirdaheyuḥ sva pātakam

original: churiṇaḥ śyāmaśabalau ṣaṇḍāmarkā udumbarāḥ / śabalā śyāmadūtā ye lohadānena prīṇitāḥ //
analyzed: churiṇaḥ śyāma śabalau ṣaṇḍāmarkāḥ udumbarāḥ śabalā śyāmadūtāḥ ye loha dānena prīṇitāḥ

original: putrāḥ pautrāstathā bandhuḥ sagotrāḥ suhahṛdastathā / dadate nāture dānaṃ brahmaghnaistu samā hi te //
analyzed: putrāḥ pautrāḥ tathā bandhuḥ sagotrāḥ suha hṛdaḥ tathā dadate na āture dānam brahma ghnaiḥ tu samāḥ hi te

original: pañcatve bhūmiyuktasya śṛṇu tasya ca yā gatiḥ / ativāhaḥ punaḥ pretovarṣordhvaṃ sukṛtaṃ labhet //
analyzed: pañcatve bhūmi yuktasya śṛṇu tasya ca yā gatiḥ ativāhaḥ punar sukṛtam labhet

original: agnitrayaṃ trayo lokāstrayo vedāstrayo 'marāḥ / kālatrayaṃ trisandhyaṃ ca trayo varṇāstriśaktayaḥ //
analyzed: agni trayam trayaḥ lokāḥ trayaḥ vedāḥ trayaḥ marāḥ kāla trayam tri sandhyam ca trayaḥ varṇāḥ tri śaktayaḥ

original: pādādūrdhvaṃ kaṭiṃ yāvat tāvadbrahyādhitiṣṭhati / grīvāṃ yāvaddharirnābheḥ śarīre manujasya ca //
analyzed: pādāt ūrdhvam kaṭim yāvat tāvat brahyā adhitiṣṭhati grīvām yāvat hariḥ nābheḥ śarīre manujasya ca

original: mastake tiṣṭhatīśāno vyaktāvyakto maheśvaraḥ / ekamūrtestrayo bhāgā brahmā viṣṇuheśvarāḥ //
analyzed: mastake tiṣṭhati īśānaḥ vyakta avyaktaḥ maheśvaraḥ eka mūrteḥ trayaḥ bhāgāḥ brahmā

original: ahaṃ prāṇaḥ śarīrastho bhūtagrāmacatuṣṭaye / dharmādharme matiṃ dadyāt sukhaduḥkhe kṛtākṛte //
analyzed: aham prāṇaḥ śarīra sthaḥ bhūta grāma catuṣṭaye dharma adharme matim dadyāt sukha duḥkhe kṛta akṛte

original: jantorvuddhiṃ samāsthāya pūrvamarmādhivāsitām / ahameva tathā jīvānprerayāmi ca karmasu / svargaṃ ca narakaṃ mokṣaṃ prayānti prāṇino dhruvam //
analyzed: jantoḥ vuddhim samāsthāya pūrva marma adhivāsitām  aham eva tathā jīvān prerayāmi ca karmasu svargam ca narakam mokṣam prayānti prāṇinaḥ dhruvam

original: svargasthaṃ narakasthaṃ vā śrāddhe vāpyāyanaṃ bhavet / tasmācchrāddhāni kurvīta trividhāni vicakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: svarga stham naraka stham vā śrāddhe vā āpyāyanam bhavet tasmāt śrāddhāni kurvīta trividhāni vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: matsyaṃ karmaṃ ca vārāhaṃ nārasiṃhañca vāmanam / rāmaṃ rāmaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca buddhaṃ caiva sakalkinam / etāni daśa nāmāni smartavyāni sadā budhaiḥ //
analyzed: matsyam karmam ca vārāham nārasiṃham ca vāmanam  rāmam rāmam ca kṛṣṇam ca buddham ca eva sa kalkinam etāni daśa nāmāni smartavyāni sadā budhaiḥ

original: svargaṃ jīvāḥ sukhaṃ yānti cyutāḥ svargācca mānavāḥ / labdhvā sukhaṃ ca vittaṃ ca dayādākṣiṇyasaṃyutāḥ / putrapautrairdhanairāḍhyā jīveyuḥ śaradāṃ śatam //
analyzed: svargam jīvāḥ sukham yānti cyutāḥ svargāt ca mānavāḥ  labdhvā sukham ca vittam ca dayā dākṣiṇya saṃyutāḥ putra pautraiḥ dhanaiḥ āḍhyāḥ jīveyuḥ śaradām śatam

original: āture ca dadeddānaṃ viṣṇupūjāñca kārayet / aṣṭākṣaraṃ tathā mantraṃ japedvā dvādaśākṣaram //
analyzed: āture ca dadet dānam viṣṇu pūjām ca kārayet  aṣṭa akṣaram tathā mantram japet vā dvādaśa akṣaram

original: pūjayecchuklapuṣpaiśca naivedyairghṛtapācitaiḥ / tathā gandhaiśca dhūpaiśca śrutismṛtimanūditaiḥ //
analyzed: pūjayet śukla puṣpaiḥ ca naivedyaiḥ ghṛta pācitaiḥ tathā gandhaiḥ ca dhūpaiḥ ca śruti smṛti manūditaiḥ

original: viṣṇurmātā pitā viṣṇurviṣṇuḥ svajanabāndhavāḥ / yatra viṣṇuṃ na paśyāmi tena vāsena kiṃ mama //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ mātā pitā viṣṇuḥ viṣṇuḥ sva jana bāndhavāḥ yatra viṣṇum na paśyāmi tena vāsena kim mama

original: jale viṣṇuḥ sthale viṣṇurviṣṇuḥ parvatamastake / jvālāmālākule viṣṇuḥ sarvaṃ viṣṇumayaṃ jagat //
analyzed: jale viṣṇuḥ sthale viṣṇuḥ viṣṇuḥ parvata mastake jvālā mālā kule viṣṇuḥ sarvam viṣṇu mayam jagat

original: vayamāpo vayaṃ pṛthvī vayaṃ darbhā vayaṃ tilāḥ / vayaṃ gāvo vayaṃ rājā vayaṃ vāyurvayaṃ prajāḥ //
analyzed: vayam āpaḥ vayam pṛthvī vayam darbhāḥ vayam tilāḥ vayam gāvaḥ vayam rājā vayam vāyuḥ vayam prajāḥ

original: vayaṃ hema vayaṃ dhānyaṃ vayaṃ madhu vayaṃ ghṛtam / vayaṃ viprā vayaṃ devā vayaṃ śambhuśca bhūrbhuvaḥ //
analyzed: vayam hema vayam dhānyam vayam madhu vayam ghṛtam vayam viprāḥ vayam devāḥ vayam śambhuḥ ca bhūḥ bhuvaḥ

original: ahaṃ dātā ahaṃ grāhī ahaṃ yajvā ahaṃ kratuḥ / ahaṃ hartā ahaṃ dharmo ahaṃ pṛthvī hyahaṃ jalam //
analyzed: aham dātā aham grāhī aham yajvā aham kratuḥ aham hartā aham dharmaḥ aham pṛthvī hi aham jalam

original: dharmādharme matiṃ dadyāṃ karmabhistu śubhāśubhaiḥ / yat karma kriyate kvāpi pūrvajanmārjitaṃ khaga //
analyzed: dharma adharme matim dadyām karmabhiḥ tu śubha aśubhaiḥ yat karma kriyate kvāpi pūrva janma arjitam khaga

original: dharme matimahaṃ dadyāmadharme 'pyahameva ca / yātanāṃ kurute so 'pi dharme muktiṃ dadāmyaham //
analyzed: dharme matim aham dadyām adharme pi aham eva ca yātanām kurute dharme muktim dadāmi aham

original: manujānāṃ hitā tārkṣya ante vaitaraṇī smṛtā / tayāvamatya pāpaughaṃ viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati //
analyzed: manujānām hitā tārkṣya ante vaitaraṇī smṛtā tayā avamatya pāpa ogham viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati

original: bālatve yacca kaumāre yacca pariṇatau ca yat / sarvāvamthākṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yacca janmāntareṣvapi //
analyzed: bāla tve yat ca kaumāre yat ca pariṇatau ca yat sarva avamthā kṛtam pāpam yat ca janmāntareṣu api

original: yanniśāyāṃ tathā prātaryanmadhyāhnāparāhnayoḥ / sandhyayoryat kṛtaṃ karma karmaṇā manasā girā //
analyzed: yat niśāyām tathā prātar yat madhyāhna aparāhnayoḥ sandhyayoḥ yat kṛtam karma karmaṇā manasā girā

original: dattvā varāṃ sakṛdapi kapilāṃ sarvakāmikām / uddharedantakāle sa ātmānaṃ pāpasañcayāt //
analyzed: dattvā varām sakṛt api kapilām sarvakāmikām  uddharet antakāle saḥ ātmānam pāpa sañcayāt

original: gāvo mamāgrataḥ santu pṛṣṭhataḥ pārśvatastathā / gāvo me hṛdaye santu gavāṃ madhye vasāmyaham //
analyzed: gāvaḥ mama agratas santu pṛṣṭhatas pārśvatas tathā gāvaḥ me hṛdaye santu gavām madhye vasāmi aham

original: yā lakṣmīḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yā ca deve vyavasthitā / dhenurūpeṇa sā devī mama pāpaṃ vyapohatu //
analyzed: yā lakṣmīḥ sarva bhūtānām yā ca deve vyavasthitā dhenu rūpeṇa sā devī mama pāpam vyapohatu

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde nānādānanirūpaṇaṃ nāma triṃso 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde nānādānanirūpaṇam nāma triṃsaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 31
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīviṣṇuruvāca / ye narāḥ pāpasaṃyuktāste gacchanti yamālayam / nṛṇāṃ matsākṣikaṃ dattamanantaphaladaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca ye narāḥ pāpa saṃyuktāḥ te gacchanti yama ālayam nṛṇām mad sākṣikam dattam ananta phala dam bhavet

original: yāvadrajaḥ pramāṇābdaṃsvarge tiṣṭhati bhūmidaḥ / aśvārūḍhāśca te yānti dadate ye hyupānahau //
analyzed: yāvat rajaḥ pramāṇa abdam svarge tiṣṭhati bhūmi daḥ aśva ārūḍhāḥ ca te yānti dadate ye hi upānahau

original: ātape śramayogena na dahyante ca kutracit / chattradānena vai pretā vicaranti sukhaṃ pathi //
analyzed: ātape śrama yogena na dahyante ca kutracid  chattra dānena vai pretāḥ vicaranti sukham pathi

original: yamuddiśya dadātyannaṃ tena cāpyāyito bhavet //
analyzed: yam uddiśya dadāti annam tena ca āpyāyitaḥ bhavet

original: andhakāre mahāghore amūrte lakṣyavarjite / uddyotenaiva te yānti dīpadānena mānavāḥ //
analyzed: andhakāre mahā ghore amūrte lakṣya varjite  uddyotena eva te yānti dīpa dānena mānavāḥ

original: āśvine kartike vāpi māghe mṛtatithāvapi / caturdaśyāñca dīyeta dīpadānaṃ sukhāya vai //
analyzed: āśvine kartike vā api māghe mṛta tithau api caturdaśyām ca dīyeta dīpa dānam sukhāya vai

original: pratyahañca pradātavyaṃ mārge suviṣame naraiḥ / yāvat saṃvatsaraṃ vāpi pretasya sukhalipsayā //
analyzed: pratyaham ca pradātavyam mārge su viṣame naraiḥ yāvat saṃvatsaram vā api pretasya sukha lipsayā

original: kule dyotati śuddhātmā prakāśatvaṃ sa gacchati / jyotirmayo 'sau pūjyo 'sau dīpadānaprado naraḥ //
analyzed: kule dyotati śuddha ātmā prakāśa tvam sa gacchati  dīpa dāna pradaḥ naraḥ

original: prāṅmukhodaṅmukhaṃ dīpaṃ devāgāre dvijātaye / kuryādyāmyamukhaṃ pitre adbhiḥ saṅkalpya susthiram //
analyzed: prāc mukha udak mukham dīpam devāgāre dvijātaye kuryāt yāmya mukham pitre adbhiḥ saṅkalpya su sthiram

original: sarvopahārayuktāni padānyatra trayodaśa / yo dadāti mṛtasyeha jīvannapyātmahetave / sa gacchati mahāmārge mahākaṣṭavivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: sarva upahāra yuktāni padāni atra trayodaśa  yaḥ dadāti mṛtasya iha jīvan api ātma hetave sa gacchati mahā mārge mahā kaṣṭa vivarjitaḥ

original: āsanaṃ bhājanaṃ bhojyaṃ dīyate yaddvijāyate / sukhe na bhuñjamānastu dena gacchatyalaṃ pathi //
analyzed: āsanam bhājanam bhojyam dīyate yat dvijāyate sukhe na bhuñjamānaḥ tu gacchati alam pathi

original: kamaṇḍalupradānena tṛṣitaḥ pibate jalam //
analyzed: kamaṇḍalu pradānena tṛṣitaḥ pibate jalam

original: bhājanaṃ vastradānañca kusumañcāṅgulīyakam / ekādaśā he dātavyaṃ pretoddharaṇahetave //
analyzed: bhājanam vastra dānam ca kusumam ca aṅgulīyakam

original: trayodaśa padānītthaṃ pretasya śubhamicchatā / dātavyāni yathāśaktyā preto 'sau prīṇito bhavet //
analyzed: trayodaśa padāni ittham pretasya śubham icchatā dātavyāni yathāśaktyā prīṇitaḥ bhavet

original: bhojanā ni tilāṃścaiva udakumbhāṃstrayodaśa / mudrikāṃ vastrayugmañca tayā yāti parāṃ gatim //
analyzed: tilān ca eva uda kumbhān trayodaśa mudrikām vastra yugmam ca tayā yāti parām gatim

original: yo 'śvaṃ nāvaṃ gajaṃ vāpi brāhmaṇe pratipādayet / sa mahimno 'nusāreṇa tattatsukhamupāśnute //
analyzed: yaḥ śvam nāvam gajam vā api brāhmaṇe pratipādayet sa mahimnaḥ nusāreṇa tat tat sukham upāśnute

original: nānālokān vicarati mahiṣīñca dadāti yaḥ / yamaputtrasya yā mātā mahiṣī sugatipradā //
analyzed: nānā lokān vicarati mahiṣīn ca dadāti yaḥ yama puttrasya yā mātā mahiṣī sugati pradā

original: tāmbūlaṃ kusumaṃ deyaṃ yāmyānāṃ harṣavardhanam / tena samprīṇitāḥ sarve tasmin kleśaṃ na kurvate //
analyzed: tāmbūlam kusumam deyam yāmyānām harṣa vardhanam  tena samprīṇitāḥ sarve tasmin kleśam na kurvate

original: go-bhū-tila-hiraṇyāni dānānyāhuḥ svaśaktitaḥ //
analyzed: go bhū tila hiraṇyāni dānāni āhuḥ sva śaktitaḥ

original: mṛtoddeśena yo yadyājjalapātrañca mṛnmayam / udapātrasahasrasya phalamāpnoti mānavaḥ //
analyzed: mṛta uddeśena yaḥ yat yāt jala pātrañca mṛd mayam uda pātra sahasrasya phalam āpnoti mānavaḥ

original: yamadūtā mahāraudrāḥ karālāḥ kṛṣṇapiṅgalāḥ / na bhīṣayanti taṃ yāmyā vastradāne kṛte sati //
analyzed: yama dūtāḥ mahā raudrāḥ karālāḥ kṛṣṇa piṅgalāḥ na bhīṣayanti tam yāmyāḥ vastra dāne kṛte sati

original: mārge hi gacchamānastu tṛṣṇārtaḥ śramapīḍitaḥ / ghaṭānnadānayogena sukhī bhavati niścitam //
analyzed: mārge hi gacchamānaḥ tu tṛṣṇā ārtaḥ śrama pīḍitaḥ ghaṭa anna dāna yogena sukhī bhavati niścitam

original: śayyā dakṣiṇayā yuktā āyudhāmbarasaṃyutā / haimaśrīpatinā yuktā deyā viprāya śarmaṇe / tathā pretatvamukto 'sau modate saha daivataiḥ //
analyzed: śayyā dakṣiṇayā yuktā āyudha ambara saṃyutā haima śrīpatinā yuktā deyā viprāya śarmaṇe tathā preta tva muktaḥ sau modate saha daivataiḥ

original: etat te kathitaṃ tārkṣya dānamantyeṣṭikarmajam / adhunā kathayiṣye 'hamanyadehapraveśanam //
analyzed: etat te kathitam tārkṣya dānam antyeṣṭi karma jam adhunā kathayiṣye hamanya deha praveśanam

original: jātasya mṛtyuloke vai prāṇino maraṇaṃ dhruvam / mṛtiḥ kuryāt svadharmeṇa yāsyataśca parantapa //
analyzed: jātasya mṛtyu loke vai prāṇinaḥ maraṇam dhruvam mṛtiḥ kuryāt svadharmeṇa yāsyataḥ ca parantapa

original: pūrvakāle mṛtānāñca prāṇināñca khageśvara / sūkṣmobhūtvā tvasau vāyurnirgacchatyāsyamaṇḍalāt //
analyzed: pūrva kāle mṛtānām ca prāṇinām ca khageśvara sūkṣmaḥ bhūtvā tu asau vāyuḥ nirgacchati āsya maṇḍalāt

original: navadvārai romabhiśca janānāṃ tālurandhrake / pāpiṣṭhānāmapānena jīvo niṣkrāmati dhruvam //
analyzed: nava dvāraiḥ romabhiḥ ca janānām tālu randhrake  pāpiṣṭhānām apānena jīvaḥ niṣkrāmati dhruvam

original: śarīrañca patet paścānnirgate marutīśvare / vātāhataḥ patatyeva nirādhāro yathā drumaḥ //
analyzed: śarīram ca patet paścāt nirgate maruti īśvare  vāta āhataḥ patati eva nirādhāraḥ yathā drumaḥ

original: pṛthivyāṃ līyate pṛthvī āpaścaiva tathāpsu ca / tejastejasi līyate samīraṇaḥ samīraṇe / ākāśe ca tathā kāśaḥ sarvavyāpī ca śaṅkare //
analyzed: pṛthivyām līyate pṛthvī āpaḥ ca eva tathā apsu ca tejaḥ tejasi līyate samīraṇaḥ samīraṇe ākāśe ca tathā kāśaḥ sarvavyāpī ca śaṅkare

original: tatra kāmastathā krodhaḥ kāye pañcendriyāṇi ca / ete tārkṣya samākhyātā dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ //
analyzed: tatra kāmaḥ tathā krodhaḥ kāye pañca indriyāṇi ca ete tārkṣya samākhyātāḥ dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ

original: kāmaḥ krodho hyahaṅkāro manastatraiva nāyakaḥ / saṃhārakaśca kālo 'yaṃ puṇyapāpasamanvitaḥ //
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ hi ahaṅkāraḥ manaḥ tatra eva nāyakaḥ saṃhārakaḥ ca kālaḥ yam puṇya pāpa samanvitaḥ

original: jagataśca svarūpantu nirmitaṃ svena karmaṇā / punardehāntaraṃ yāti sukṛtairduṣkṛtairnaraḥ //
analyzed: jagataḥ ca sva rūpam tu nirmitam svena karmaṇā punar deha antaram yāti sukṛtaiḥ duṣkṛtaiḥ naraḥ

original: pañcendriyasamāyuktaṃ sakalairviṣyaiḥ saha / praviśet sa navaṃ dehaṃ gṛhe dagdhe yathā gṛhī //
analyzed: pañca indriya samāyuktam sakalaiḥ viṣyaiḥ saha praviśet sa navam deham gṛhe dagdhe yathā gṛhī

original: śarīre ye samāsīnā sambhavet sarvadhātavaḥ / ṣāṭkauśiko hyayaṃ kāyo mātā pitrośca dhātavaḥ //
analyzed: śarīre ye samāsīnā sambhavet sarva dhātavaḥ ṣāṭkauśikaḥ hi ayam kāyaḥ mātā pitroḥ ca dhātavaḥ

original: sambhaveyustathā tārkṣya sarve vātāśca dehinām / mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ tadyogā ye cānye vyādhayastathā //
analyzed: sambhaveyuḥ tathā tārkṣya sarve vātāḥ ca dehinām mūtram purīṣam tad yogāḥ ye ca anye vyādhayaḥ tathā

original: asthi śukraṃ tathā snāyuḥ dehena saha dahyate / eṣa te kathitastārkṣya vināśaḥ sarvadehinām //
analyzed: asthi śukram tathā snāyuḥ dehena saha dahyate eṣa te kathitaḥ tārkṣya vināśaḥ sarva dehinām

original: kathayāmi punasteṣāṃ śarīrañca yathā bhavet / ekastambhaṃ snāyubaddhaṃ sthūṇādvayasamuddhṛtam //
analyzed: kathayāmi punar teṣām śarīram ca yathā bhavet eka stambham snāyu baddham sthūṇā dvaya samuddhṛtam

original: indriyaiśca samāyuktaṃ navadvāraṃ śarīrakam / viṣayaiśca samākrāntaṃ kāma-krodhasamākulam //
analyzed: indriyaiḥ ca samāyuktam nava dvāram śarīrakam viṣayaiḥ ca samākrāntam kāma krodha samākulam

original: rāga-dveṣasamākīrṇaṃ tṛṣṇādurgasudustaram / lobhajālasamāyuktaṃ puraṃ puruṣasaṃjñitam //
analyzed: rāga dveṣa samākīrṇam tṛṣṇā durga su dustaram  lobha jāla samāyuktam puram puruṣa saṃjñitam

original: etadguṇasamāyuktaṃ śarīraṃ sarvadehinām / tiṣṭhanti devatāḥ sarvā bhuvanāni caturdaśa //
analyzed: etad guṇa samāyuktam śarīram sarva dehinām tiṣṭhanti devatāḥ sarvāḥ bhuvanāni caturdaśa

original: ātmānaṃ ye na jānanti te narāḥ paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ / evametanmayākhyātaṃ śarīraṃ te caturvidham //
analyzed: ātmānam ye na jānanti te narāḥ paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ evam etat mayā ākhyātam śarīram te caturvidham

original: caturaśītilakṣāṇi nirmitā yonayaḥ purā / udbhijjāḥ svedajāścaiva aṇḍajāśca jarāyujāḥ //
analyzed: caturaśīti lakṣāṇi nirmitāḥ yonayaḥ purā udbhid jāḥ sveda jāḥ ca eva aṇḍa jāḥ ca jarāyu jāḥ

original: etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ yatpṛṣṭohaṃ tvayānagha //
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam yat pṛṣṭaḥ aham tvayā anagha

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dānapha lānyadehapraveśādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmai katriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde dānapha lānyadehapraveśādinirūpaṇam nāma e katriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 32
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: tārkṣya uvāca / kathamutpadyate janturbhūtagrāme caturvidhe / tvacā raktaṃ tathā māṃsaṃ medo majjāsthi jīvitam //
analyzed: tārkṣyaḥ uvāca katham utpadyate jantuḥ bhūta grāme caturvidhe tvacā raktam tathā māṃsam medaḥ majja asthi jīvitam

original: pādau pāṇī tathā guhyaṃ jihvā-keśa-nakhāḥ śiraḥ / sandhimārgāśca bahuśo rekhā naikavidhāstathā //
analyzed: pādau pāṇī tathā guhyam jihvā keśa nakhāḥ śiraḥ sandhi mārgāḥ ca bahuśas rekhāḥ nā ekavidhāḥ tathā

original: kāmaḥ krodho bhayaṃ lajjā mano harṣaḥ sukhāsukham / citritaṃ chidritañcāpi nānājālena veṣṭitam //
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ bhayam lajjā manaḥ harṣaḥ sukha asukham citritam chidritam ca api nānā jālena veṣṭitam

original: indrajālamidaṃ manye saṃsāre 'sārasāgare / kartā ko 'tra hṛṣīkeśa saṃsāre duḥ khasaṃkule //
analyzed: indrajālam idam manye saṃsāre sāra sāgare kartā kaḥ tra hṛṣīkeśa saṃsāre duḥkha saṃkule

original: śrīviṣṇuruvāca / kathayāmi paraṃ gopyaṃ kośasyāsya vinirṇayam / yasya vijñānamātreṇa sarvajñatvaṃ prajyate //
analyzed: śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca kathayāmi param gopyam kośasya asya vinirṇayam yasya vijñāna mātreṇa sarvajña tvam prajyate

original: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā loke sadayaṃ jīvakāraṇam / vainateya śṛṇuṣva tvamekāgrakṛtamānasaḥ //
analyzed: sādhu pṛṣṭam tvayā loke sa dayam jīva kāraṇam vainateya śṛṇuṣva tvam ekāgra kṛta mānasaḥ

original: ṛtukāle ca nārīṇāṃ varjyaṃ dinacatuṣṭayam / yatastasmin brahmahatyāṃ purā vṛtrasamutthitām //
analyzed: ṛtu kāle ca nārīṇām varjyam dina catuṣṭayam yatas tasmin brahmahatyām purā vṛtra samutthitām

original: brahmā śakrāt samuttārya caturthāṃśena dattavān / tāvannālokyate vaktraṃ pāpaṃ yāvadvapuḥ sthitam //
analyzed: brahmā śakrāt samuttārya caturtha aṃśena dattavān tāvat na ālokyate vaktram pāpam yāvat vapuḥ sthitam

original: prathame 'hani cāṇḍālī dvitīye brahmaghātinī / tṛtīye rajakī jñeyā caturthe 'hani śudhyati //
analyzed: prathame hani cāṇḍālī dvitīye brahma ghātinī tṛtīye rajakī jñeyā caturthe hani śudhyati

original: saptāhāt pitṛdevānāṃ bhavedyogyā kṛtārcane / saptāhamadhye yo garbhastatsaṃmbhūtirmalimlucā //
analyzed: sapta ahāt pitṛ devānām bhavet yogyā kṛta arcane sapta aha madhye yaḥ garbhaḥ tad saṃmbhūtiḥ malimlucā

original: niṣakasamaye pitroryādṛk cittavikalpanā / tādṛggarbhasamutpattirjāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: niṣaka samaye pitroḥ yādṛś citta vikalpanā tādṛś garbha samutpattiḥ jāyate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: yugmāsu puttrā jāyante striyo 'yugmāsu rātriṣu / pūrvasaptamamutsṛjya tasmādyugmāsu saṃviśet //
analyzed: yugmāsu puttrāḥ jāyante striyaḥ yugmāsu rātriṣu pūrva saptamam utsṛjya tasmāt yugmāsu saṃviśet

original: ṣoḍaśarturniśāḥ strīṇāṃ sāmānyāt samudāhṛtaḥ / yā caturdaśamī rātrirgarbhastiṣṭhati tatra cet //
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa ṛtuḥ niśāḥ strīṇām sāmānyāt samudāhṛtaḥ yā caturdaśamī rātriḥ garbhaḥ tiṣṭhati tatra ced

original: guṇabhāgyanidhiḥ putrastatra jāyeta dhārmikaḥ / sā niśā tatra sāmānyairna labhyeta khagādhipa //
analyzed: guṇa bhāgya nidhiḥ putraḥ tatra jāyeta dhārmikaḥ sā niśā tatra sāmānyaiḥ na labhyeta khagādhipa

original: prāyaśaḥ sambhavatyatra garbhastvaṣṭāhamadhyataḥ / pañcame 'hani nārīṇāṃ kāryaṃ mādhuryabhojanam //
analyzed: prāyaśas sambhavati atra garbhaḥ tu aṣṭa aha madhyatas pañcame hani nārīṇām kāryam mādhurya bhojanam

original: kaṭukṣārañca tīkṣṇañca tyājyamuṣṇañca dūrataḥ / tatkṣetramoṣadhīpātraṃ bījañcāpyamṛtāyitam //
