analyzed: kaṭu kṣāram ca tīkṣṇam ca tyājyam uṣṇam ca dūratas tad kṣetram oṣadhī pātram bījam ca api amṛtāyitam

original: tasminnuptvā naraḥ svāmī samyak phalamavāpnuyāt / tasyāścaivātapo varjya śītalaṃ kevalaṃ caret //
analyzed: tasmin uptvā naraḥ svāmī samyak phalam avāpnuyāt tasyāḥ ca eva ātapaḥ varjya śītalam kevalam caret

original: tāmbūlapuṣpaśrīkhaṇḍaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ śucivastrabhṛt / dharmamādāya manasi sutalpaṃ saṃviśet pumān //
analyzed: tāmbūla puṣpa śrīkhaṇḍaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ śuci vastra bhṛt dharmam ādāya manasi sutalpam saṃviśet pumān

original: niṣekasamaye yādṛṅnaracittavikalpanā / tādṛksvabhāvasambhūtirjanturviśati kukṣigaḥ //
analyzed: niṣeka samaye yādṛś nara citta vikalpanā  tādṛś svabhāva sambhūtiḥ jantuḥ viśati kukṣi gaḥ

original: śukrasoṇitasaṃyoge piṇḍotpattiḥ prajāyate / vardhate jaṭhare jantustārāpatirivāmbare //
analyzed: śukra soṇita saṃyoge piṇḍa utpattiḥ prajāyate vardhate jaṭhare jantuḥ tārāpatiḥ iva ambare

original: caitanyaṃ bījarūpaṃ hi śukre nityaṃ vyavasthitam / kāmaścittañca śukrañca yadā hyekatvamāpnuyuḥ //
analyzed: caitanyam bīja rūpam hi śukre nityam vyavasthitam kāmaḥ cittam ca śukram ca yadā hi eka tvam āpnuyuḥ

original: tadā drāvamavāpnoti yoṣāgarbhāśaye naraḥ / raktādhikye bhavennārī śukrādhikye bhavet pumān //
analyzed: tadā drāvam avāpnoti yoṣā garbhāśaye naraḥ rakta ādhikye bhavet nārī śukra ādhikye bhavet pumān

original: śukrasoṇitayo sāmye garbhāḥ ṣaṇḍatvamāpnuyuḥ / ahorātreṇa kalilaṃ budvadaṃ pañcabhidinaiḥ //
analyzed: śukra soṇitayoḥ sāmye garbhāḥ ṣaṇḍa tvam āpnuyuḥ ahorātreṇa kalilam pañcabhiḥ dinaiḥ

original: caturdaśe bhavenmāṃsaṃ miśradhātusamanvitam / ghanaṃ māṃsañca viṃśāhe garbhastho vardhate kramāt //
analyzed: caturdaśe bhavet māṃsam miśra dhātu samanvitam ghanam māṃsam ca viṃśa ahe garbha sthaḥ vardhate kramāt

original: pañcaviṃśatime cāhni balaṃ puṣṭiśca jāyate / tathā māse tu sampūrṇe pañcatattvaṃ nidhārayet //
analyzed: pañcaviṃśatime ca ahni balam puṣṭiḥ ca jāyate tathā māse tu sampūrṇe pañcatattvam nidhārayet

original: māsadvaye tu sañjāte tvacā medaśca jāyate / majjāsthīni tribhirmāsaiḥ keśāṅgulyaścaturthake //
analyzed: māsa dvaye tu sañjāte tvacā medaḥ ca jāyate majja asthīni tribhiḥ māsaiḥ keśa aṅgulyaḥ caturthake

original: karṇau ca nāsike vakṣo jāyeran māsi pañcame / kaṇṭharandhrodaraṃ ṣaṣṭhe guhyādirmāsi saptame //
analyzed: karṇau ca nāsike vakṣaḥ jāyeran māsi pañcame kaṇṭha randhra udaram ṣaṣṭhe guhya ādiḥ māsi saptame

original: aṅgapratyaṅgasampūrṇo garbho māsairathāṣṭabhiḥ / aṣṭame calate jīvo dhātrīgarbhe punaḥ punaḥ / navamemāsi samprāpte garbhasthaujau dṛḍhaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: aṅga pratyaṅga sampūrṇaḥ garbhaḥ māsaiḥ atha aṣṭabhiḥ aṣṭame calate jīvaḥ dhātrī garbhe punar punar navame māsi samprāpte garbha stha ojau dṛḍham bhavet

original: cikitsā jāyate tasya garbhavāsaparikṣaye / nārī vātha naro vātha napuṃstvaṃ vābhijāyate //
analyzed: cikitsā jāyate tasya garbha vāsa parikṣaye nārī vā atha naraḥ vā atha napuṃstvam vā abhijāyate

original: śaktitrayaṃ viśālākṣaṃ ṣāṭkauśikasamāyutam / pañcendriyasamopetaṃ daśanāḍīvibhūṣitam //
analyzed: śakti trayam viśāla akṣam ṣāṭkauśika samāyutam pañca indriya samopetam daśa nāḍī vibhūṣitam

original: daśaprāṇaguṇopetaṃ yo jānāti sa yogavit / majjāsthiśukramāṃsāni roma raktaṃ balaṃ tathā //
analyzed: daśa prāṇa guṇa upetam yaḥ jānāti sa yoga vid majja asthi śukra māṃsāni roma raktam balam tathā

original: ṣāṭkauśikamidaṃ piṇḍaṃ syājjantoḥ pāñcabhautikam / navame daśame māsi jāyate pāñcabhautikaḥ //
analyzed: ṣāṭkauśikam idam piṇḍam syāt jantoḥ pāñcabhautikam navame daśame māsi jāyate pāñcabhautikaḥ

original: sūtivātaiḥ samākṛṣṭaḥ pīḍayā vihvalīkṛtaḥ / puṣṭo nāḍyāḥ suṣumṇāyā yoṣidgarbhasthitastvaran //
analyzed: sūtivātaiḥ samākṛṣṭaḥ pīḍayā vihvalīkṛtaḥ puṣṭaḥ nāḍyāḥ suṣumṇāyāḥ yoṣit garbha sthitaḥ tvaran

original: kṣitirvāri havirbhoktā pavanākāśameva ca / ebhirbhūtaiḥ pīḍitastu nibaddhaḥ snāyubandhanaiḥ //
analyzed: kṣitiḥ vāri haviḥ bhoktā pavana ākāśam eva ca ebhiḥ bhūtaiḥ pīḍitaḥ tu nibaddhaḥ snāyu bandhanaiḥ

original: mūlabhūtā ime proktāḥ sapta nāḍyantare sthitāḥ / tvacāsthināḍyo romāṇi māṃsañcaivātra pañcamam //
analyzed: mūla bhūtāḥ ime proktāḥ sapta nāḍī antare sthitāḥ tvacā asthi nāḍyaḥ romāṇi māṃsam ca eva atra pañcamam

original: ete pañca guṇāḥ proktā mayā bhūmeḥ khageśvara / yathā pañca guṇāścāpastathā tacchṛṇu kāśyapa //
analyzed: ete pañca guṇāḥ proktāḥ mayā bhūmeḥ khageśvara yathā pañca guṇāḥ ca apaḥ tathā tat śṛṇu kāśyapa

original: lālā mūtraṃ tathā śukraṃ majjāra raktañca pañcamam / āpaḥ pañcaguṇāḥ proktā jñātavyāste prayatnataḥ //
analyzed: lālā mūtram tathā śukram majjāra raktam ca pañcamam āpaḥ pañca guṇāḥ proktāḥ jñātavyāḥ te prayatnataḥ

original: kṣudhā tṛṣā tathā nidrā ālasyaṃ kāntireva ca / tejaḥ pañcaguṇaṃ proktaṃ tārkṣya sarvatrayogibhiḥ //
analyzed: kṣudhā tṛṣā tathā nidrā ālasyam kāntiḥ eva ca tejaḥ pañcaguṇam proktam tārkṣya sarvatra yogibhiḥ

original: rāgadveṣau tathā lajjā bhayaṃ mohastathaiva ca / ityetat kathitaṃ tārkṣya vāyujaṃ guṇapañcakam //
analyzed: rāga dveṣau tathā lajjā bhayam mohaḥ tathā eva ca iti etat kathitam tārkṣya vāyu jam guṇa pañcakam

original: ākuñcanaṃ dhāvanañca laṅghanañca prasāraṇam / nirodhaḥ pañcamaḥ prokto vāyoḥ pañca guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: ākuñcanam dhāvanam ca laṅghanam ca prasāraṇam nirodhaḥ pañcamaḥ proktaḥ vāyoḥ pañca guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: ghoṣaścintā ca gāmbhīryaṃ śravaṇaṃ satyasaṃkramaḥ / ākāśasya guṇāḥ pañca jñāta vyāstārkṣya yatnataḥ //
analyzed: ghoṣaḥ cintā ca gāmbhīryam śravaṇam satya saṃkramaḥ ākāśasya guṇāḥ pañca jñāta vyās tārkṣya yatnataḥ

original: śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsā buddhīndriyāṇi ca / pāṇī pādau gudaṃ prāk ca guhyaṃ karmendriyāṇi ca //
analyzed: śrotram tvac cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsā buddhīndriyāṇi ca pāṇī pādau gudam prāk ca guhyam karmendriyāṇi ca

original: iḍāca piṅgalā caiva suṣumṇā ca tṛtīyakā / gāndhārī gajajihvā ca pūṣā caiva yasā tathā //
analyzed: iḍā ca piṅgalā ca eva suṣumṇā ca tṛtīyakā gāndhārī gajajihvā ca pūṣā ca eva yasā tathā

original: alamvuśā kuhūścaiva śaṅkhinī daśamī smṛtā / piṇḍa madhye sthitā hyetāḥ pradhānā daśa nāḍayaḥ //
analyzed: alamvuśā kuhūḥ ca eva śaṅkhinī daśamī smṛtā piṇḍa madhye sthitā hi etāḥ pradhānāḥ daśa nāḍayaḥ

original: prāṇāpānau samānaśca udāno vyāna eva ca / nāgaḥ kūrmaśca kṛkaro devadatto dhanañjayaḥ //
analyzed: prāṇa apānau samānaḥ ca udānaḥ vyānaḥ eva ca nāgaḥ kūrmaḥ ca kṛkaraḥ devadattaḥ dhanañjayaḥ

original: ityete vāyavaḥ proktā daśa deheṣu susthitāḥ / kevalaṃ bhuktamannañca puṣṭidaṃ sarvadehinām //
analyzed: iti ete vāyavaḥ proktāḥ daśa deheṣu susthitāḥ kevalam bhuktam annam ca puṣṭi dam sarva dehinām

original: nayate prāṇado vāyuḥ śarīre sarvasandhiṣu / āhāro bhuktamātrastu vāyunā kriyate dvidhā //
analyzed: nayate prāṇa daḥ vāyuḥ śarīre sarva sandhiṣu āhāraḥ bhukta mātraḥ tu vāyunā kriyate dvidhā

original: sa praviśya guhe samyak pṛthagannaṃ pṛthagjalam / ūrdhvamagnerjalaṃ kṛtvā tadannañca jalopari //
analyzed: sa praviśya guhe samyak pṛthak annam pṛthak jalam  ūrdhvam agneḥ jalam kṛtvā tat annam ca jala upari

original: agneścādhaḥ svayaṃ prāṇastamagniñca dhamecchanaiḥ / vāyunā dhamyamāno 'gniḥ pṛthakkiṭṭaṃ pṛthagrasam //
analyzed: agneḥ ca adhas svayam prāṇaḥ tam agnin ca dhamet śanais vāyunā dhamyamānaḥ gniḥ pṛthak kiṭṭam pṛthak rasam

original: malairdvādaśabhiḥ kiṭṭaṃ bhinnaṃ dehāt pṛthagbhavet / karṇākṣināsikā jihvā dantanābhivapurgudam //
analyzed: malaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ kiṭṭam bhinnam dehāt pṛthak bhavet karṇa akṣi nāsikāḥ jihvā danta nābhi vapuḥ gudam

original: nakhā malāśrayā hyete viṇmūtrañcetyanantakam / śukraśoṇitasaṃyogādetat ṣāṭkauśikaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: nakhāḥ mala āśrayāḥ hi ete viṣ mūtram ca iti anantakam śukra śoṇita saṃyogāt etat ṣāṭkauśikam smṛtam

original: romṇāṃ koṭyastathā tisro 'pyardhakoṭi samanvitāḥ / dvātriṃśaddaśanāḥ proktāḥ sāmānyādvinatāsuta //
analyzed: koṭyaḥ tathā tisraḥ samanvitāḥ  dvātriṃśat daśanāḥ proktāḥ sāmānyāt vinatā suta

original: sapta lakṣāṇi keśāḥ syurnakhāḥ proktāstu viṃśatiḥ / māṃsaṃ palasahasraikaṃ sāmānyāddehasaṃsthitam //
analyzed: sapta lakṣāṇi keśāḥ syuḥ nakhāḥ proktāḥ tu viṃśatiḥ māṃsam pala sahasra ekam sāmānyāt deha saṃsthitam

original: raktaṃ palaśataṃ tārkṣyaṃ buddhameva purātanaiḥ / palāni daśa medaśca tvacā caiva tu tatsamā //
analyzed: raktam pala śatam tārkṣyam buddham eva purātanaiḥ palāni daśa medaḥ ca tvacā ca eva tu tad samā

original: paladvādaśakaṃ majjā mahāraktaṃ palatrayam / śukraṃ dvikuḍavaṃ jñeyaṃ śoṇitaṃ kuḍavaṃ smṛtam //
śleṣmāṇaśca ṣaḍūrdhvañca viṇmūtraṃ tatpramāṇataḥ / asthnāṃ hi hyadhikaṃ proktaṃ ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatrayāt //
analyzed: śleṣmāṇaḥ ca ṣaṭ ūrdhvam ca viṣ mūtram tad pramāṇataḥ asthnām hi hi adhikam proktam ṣaṣṭi uttara śata trayāt

original: evaṃ piṇḍaḥ samākhyāto vaibhavaṃ sampracakṣmahe / sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ bhayaṃ kṣemaṃ karmaṇaiva hi prāpyate //
analyzed: evam piṇḍaḥ samākhyātaḥ vaibhavam sampracakṣmahe sukham duḥ kham bhayam kṣemam karmaṇā eva hi prāpyate

original: adhomukhaṃ cordhvapādaṃ garbhādvāyuḥ prakarṣati / tale tu karayornyasya vardhate jānupārśvayoḥ //
analyzed: adhomukham ca ūrdhva pādam garbhāt vāyuḥ prakarṣati tale tu karayoḥ nyasya vardhate jānu pārśvayoḥ

original: aṅguṣṭhau copari nyastau jānvāretha karāṅgulī / jānupṛṣṭhe tathā netre jānumadhye ca nāsikā //
analyzed: aṅguṣṭhau ca upari nyastau kara aṅgulī jānu pṛṣṭhe tathā netre jānu madhye ca nāsikā

original: evaṃ vṛddhiṃ kramādyāti jantuḥ strīgarbhasaṃsthitaḥ / kāṭhinyamasthīnyāyānti bhuktapītena jīvati //
analyzed: evam vṛddhim kramāt yāti jantuḥ strī garbha saṃsthitaḥ kāṭhinyam asthīni āyānti bhukta pītena jīvati

original: nāḍī vāpyāyanī nāma nābhyāṃ tatra nibadhyate / strīṇāṃ tathāntrasuṣire sa nibaddhaḥ prajāyate //
analyzed: nāḍī vāpyāyanī nāma nābhyām tatra nibadhyate strīṇām tathā antra suṣire sa nibaddhaḥ prajāyate

original: krāmanti bhuktapītāni strīṇāṃ garbhodare tathā / tairāpyāyitadeho 'sau janturvṛddhimupaiti ca //
analyzed: krāmanti bhukta pītāni strīṇām garbha udare tathā taiḥ āpyāyita dehaḥ sau jantuḥ vṛddhim upaiti ca

original: smṛtyastatra prayāntyasya bahvyaḥ saṃsārabhūtayaḥ / tato nirvedamāyāti pīḍyamāna itastataḥ //
analyzed: smṛtyaḥ tatra prayānti asya bahvyaḥ saṃsāra bhūtayaḥ tatas nirvedam āyāti pīḍyamānaḥ itas tatas

original: punarnaivaṃ kariṣyāmi bhuktamātra ihodarāt / tathātathā yatiṣyāmi garbhaṃ nāpnomyahaṃ yathā //
analyzed: punar na evam kariṣyāmi bhukta mātraḥ iha udarāt tathā tathā yatiṣyāmi garbham na āpnomi aham yathā

original: iti sañcintayañjīvo smṛtvā janmaśatāni vai / yāni pūrvānubhūtāni devabhūtātmajāni vai //
analyzed: iti sañcintayan jīvaḥ smṛtvā janma śatāni vai yāni pūrva anubhūtāni deva bhūta ātmajāni vai

original: tataḥ kālakramājjantuḥ parivartyatvadhomukhaḥ / navame daśame vāpi māsi saṃjāyate tataḥ //
analyzed: tatas kāla kramāt jantuḥ parivartyatu adhomukhaḥ navame daśame vā api māsi saṃjāyate tatas

original: niṣkramyamāṇo vātena prājāpatyena pīḍyate / niṣkramate ca vilapaṃstadā duḥkhanipīḍitaḥ //
analyzed: niṣkramyamāṇaḥ vātena prājāpatyena pīḍyate niṣkramate ca vilapan tadā duḥkha nipīḍitaḥ

original: niṣkrāmaṃścodarānmūrchāmasahyāṃ pratipadyate / prāpnoti cetanāṃ cāsau vāyusparśasukhānvitaḥ //
analyzed: niṣkrāman ca udarāt mūrchām asahyām pratipadyate prāpnoti cetanām ca asau vāyu sparśa sukha anvitaḥ

original: tatastaṃ vaiṣṇavī māyā samāskandati mohinī / tayā vimohitātmāsau jñānabhraṃśamavāpnute //
analyzed: tatas tam vaiṣṇavī māyā samāskandati mohinī tayā vimohita ātmā asau jñāna bhraṃśam avāpnute

original: bhraṣṭajñānaṃ bālabhāve tato jantuḥ prapadyate / tataḥ kaumārakāvasthāṃ yauvanaṃ vṛddhatāmapi //
analyzed: bhraṣṭa jñānam bāla bhāve tatas jantuḥ prapadyate tatas kaumāraka avasthām yauvanam vṛddha tām api

original: punaśca tadvanmaraṇaṃ janma prāpnoti mānavaḥ / tataḥ saṃsāracakre 'smin bhrāmyate ghaṭayantravat //
analyzed: punar ca tadvat maraṇam janma prāpnoti mānavaḥ tatas saṃsāra cakre smin bhrāmyate ghaṭa yantra vat

original: kadācitsvargamāpnoti kadācinnirayaṃ naraḥ / svargaṃ ca nirayaṃ caiva svakarmaphalamaśnute //
analyzed: kadācid svargam āpnoti kadācid nirayam naraḥ svargam ca nirayam ca eva sva karma phalam aśnute

original: kadācidbhuktakarmā ca bhuvaṃ svalpena gacchati / svarloke narake caiva bhuktaprāye dvijottamāḥ //
analyzed: kadācid bhukta karmā ca bhuvam su alpena gacchati svar loke narake ca eva bhukta prāye dvijottamāḥ

original: narakeṣu mahadduḥkhametadyatsvargavāsinaḥ / dṛśyate nātra modante pātyamānāstu nārakaiḥ //
analyzed: narakeṣu mahat duḥkham etat yat svarga vāsinaḥ dṛśyate na atra modante pātyamānāḥ tu nārakaiḥ

original: svarge 'pi duḥ khamatulaṃ yadārohaṇakālataḥ / prabhṛtyahaṃ patiṣyāmītyetanmanasi vartate //
analyzed: svarge duḥ kham atulam yad ārohaṇa kālataḥ prabhṛti aham patiṣyāmi iti etat manasi vartate

original: nāra kāṃścaiva samprekṣya mahadduḥ khamavāpyate / evaṃ gatimahaṃ gantetyaharniśamanirvṛtaḥ //
analyzed: nāra kān ca eva samprekṣya mahat duḥ kham avāpyate evam gatim aham gantā iti aharniśam anirvṛtaḥ

original: garbhavāse mahadduḥ khaṃ jāyamānasya yonijam / jātasya bālabhāve 'pi vṛddhatve duḥkhameva ca //
analyzed: garbha vāse mahat duḥ kham jāyamānasya yoni jam  jātasya bāla bhāve vṛddha tve duḥkham eva ca

original: kāmerṣyākrodhasambandhādyauvane 'pi ca duḥ saham / duḥsvapnaṃ yā vṛddhatā ca maraṇe duḥ khamutkaṭam //
analyzed: kāma īrṣyā krodha sambandhāt yauvane ca duḥ saham duḥsvapnam yā vṛddha tā ca maraṇe duḥ kham utkaṭam

original: kṛṣyamāṇaśca yāmyaiḥ sa narake 'pi ca yātyadhaḥ / punaśca garbhājjanma syānmaraṇaṃ duṣkaraṃ tathā //
analyzed: kṛṣyamāṇaḥ ca yāmyaiḥ sa narake ca yāti adhas punar ca garbhāt janma syāt maraṇam duṣkaram tathā

original: evaṃ saṃsāracakre 'smijjantavo ghaṭayantravat / bhrāmyante prāktanairbadhairbaddhā vidhyanti cāsakṛt //
analyzed: evam saṃsāra cakre smit jantavaḥ ghaṭa yantra vat bhrāmyante prāktanaiḥ badhaiḥ baddhāḥ vidhyanti ca asakṛt

original: nāsti pakṣinsukhaṃ kiñcitkṣetre duḥ khaśatākule / vinatāsuta mokṣāya yatitavyaṃ tato naraiḥ //
analyzed: nā asti pakṣin sukham kiñcid kṣetre duḥ kha śata ākule vinatā suta mokṣāya yatitavyam tatas naraiḥ

original: etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ yathā garbhasya saṃsthitiḥ / kathayāmi kramapraśraṃ pṛṣṭaṃ vā vartate spṛhā //
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam yathā garbhasya saṃsthitiḥ kathayāmi kramapraśram pṛṣṭam vā vartate spṛhā

original: garuḍa uvāca / madhye kṛtamahāpraśradvayasyāptaṃ mayottaram / praśrasyāpi tṛtīyasya uttaraṃ ca vidhīyatām //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca madhye kṛta mahā praśra dvayasya āptam mayā uttaram praśrasya api tṛtīyasya uttaram ca vidhīyatām

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / mriyamāṇasya kiṃ kṛtyamiti tvaṃ pṛṣṭavānasi / śṛṇu tatrottaraṃ tūktaṃ kathayāmi samāsataḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca  mriyamāṇasya kim kṛtyam iti tvam pṛṣṭavān asi śṛṇu tatra uttaram tu uktam kathayāmi samāsatas

original: āsannamaraṇaṃ jñātvā puruṣaṃ snāpayettataḥ / gomūtragomayasumṛttīrthodakakuśodakaiḥ //
analyzed: āsannamaraṇam jñātvā puruṣam snāpayet tatas go mūtra gomaya su mṛd tīrtha udaka kuśa udakaiḥ

original: vāsasī paridhāryātha dhaute tu śuci nī śubhe / darbhāṇyādau samāstīrya dakṣiṇāgrānvikīrya ca //
analyzed: vāsasī paridhārya atha dhaute tu śuci nī śubhe darbhāṇi ādau samāstīrya dakṣiṇa agrān vikīrya ca

original: tilān gomayaliptāyāṃ bhūmau tatra niveśayet //
analyzed: tilān gomaya liptāyām bhūmau tatra niveśayet

original: prāgudakśirasaṃ vāpi mukhe svarṇaṃ viniḥ kṣepet / śālagrāmaśilā tatra tulasī ca khageśvara //
analyzed: prāc udak śirasam vā api mukhe svarṇam kṣepet śālagrāma śilā tatra tulasī ca khageśvara

original: vidheyā sannidhau sarpirdīpaṃ prajvālayetpunaḥ / namo bhagavate vāsudevāyeti japastathā //
analyzed: vidheyā sannidhau sarpiḥ dīpam prajvālayet punar  namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya iti japaḥ tathā

original: ādau tu praṇavaṃ kṛtvā pūjādāne tataḥ smṛte / samabhyarcya hṛṣīkeśaṃ puṣpadhūpādibhistataḥ //
analyzed: ādau tu praṇavam kṛtvā pūjā dāne tatas smṛte samabhyarcya hṛṣīkeśam puṣpa dhūpa ādibhiḥ tatas

original: praṇipātaiḥ stavaiḥ puṇyairdhyā nayogena pūjayet / dattvā dānaṃ ca viprebhyo dīnānāthebhya eva ca //
analyzed: praṇipātaiḥ stavaiḥ puṇyaiḥ dhyā na yogena pūjayet dattvā dānam ca viprebhyaḥ dīna anāthebhyaḥ eva ca

original: puttre mitre kalatre ca kṣetradhānyadhanādiṣu / nivartayenmamatvaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ pādau hṛdi smaran //
analyzed: puttre mitre kalatre ca kṣetra dhānya dhana ādiṣu nivartayet mamatvam ca viṣṇoḥ pādau hṛdi smaran

original: uccaiḥ puruṣasūktaṃ ca yadi śreṣṭhāpadastadā / puttrādyāḥ prapaṭheyuste mriyamāṇe nije jane //
analyzed: uccais puruṣasūktam ca yadi śreṣṭha āpadaḥ tadā puttra ādyāḥ prapaṭheyuḥ te mriyamāṇe nije jane

original: etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ kṛtyaṃ mṛtyāvupasthite / phalamapyasya kṛtsnasya samāsātte vadāmyaham //
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam kṛtyam mṛtyau upasthite phalam api asya kṛtsnasya samāsāt te vadāmi aham

original: snānena śucitāprāptirapāvitryahṛtistataḥ / tato viṣṇoḥ smṛtistasya jñānātsarvaphalapradā //
analyzed: snānena śuci tā prāptiḥ apāvitrya hṛtiḥ tatas tatas viṣṇoḥ smṛtiḥ tasya jñānāt sarva phala pradā

original: darbhatūlī nayetsvargamāturaṃ tu na saṃśayaḥ / tilairdarbhaiśca niḥ kṣiptaiḥ snānaṃ kratumayaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: darbha tūlī nayet svargam āturam tu na saṃśayaḥ tilaiḥ darbhaiḥ ca niḥ kṣiptaiḥ snānam kratu mayam bhavet

original: brahmā viṣṇuśca rudraśca śrīrhutāśastathaiva ca / maṇḍale copatiṣṭhanti tasmātkurvīta maṇḍalam //
analyzed: brahmā viṣṇuḥ ca rudraḥ ca śrīḥ hutāśaḥ tathā eva ca maṇḍale ca upatiṣṭhanti tasmāt kurvīta maṇḍalam

original: prāgudagvā kṛteneha śirasā lokamuttamam / vrajate yadi pāpasyālpatvaṃ puṃso bhavetkhaga //
analyzed: prāk udak vā kṛtena iha śirasā lokam uttamam vrajate yadi pāpasya alpa tvam puṃsaḥ bhavet khaga

original: pañcaratne mukhe mukte jive jñānaṃ prarohati / tulasī brāhmaṇā gāvo viṣṇurekādaśī khaga //
analyzed: pañcaratne mukhe mukte jive jñānam prarohati tulasī brāhmaṇāḥ gāvaḥ viṣṇuḥ ekādaśī khaga

original: pañca pravahaṇānyeva bhavābdhau majjatāṃ nṛṇām / viṣṇurekādaśī gītā tulasī vipradhenavaḥ //
analyzed: pañca pravahaṇāni eva bhava abdhau majjatām nṛṇām viṣṇuḥ ekādaśī gītā tulasī vipra dhenavaḥ

original: asāre durgasaṃsāre ṣaṭpadī bhaktidāyinī / namo bhagavate vāsudevāyeti japannaraḥ //
analyzed: asāre durga saṃsāre ṣaṭpadī bhakti dāyinī namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya iti japan naraḥ

original: oṅkārapūrvaṃ sāyujyaṃ prāpnuyānnātra saṃśayaḥ / pūjayāpi ca mallokaprāptirārāddivaṃ vrajet //
analyzed: oṅkāra pūrvam sāyujyam prāpnuyāt na atra saṃśayaḥ pūjayā api ca mad loka prāptiḥ ārāt divam vrajet

original: bandhābhāve mamatvetu jñānaṃ puruṣasūktataḥ / yasyayasyādhikatvaṃ tu sādhaneṣveṣu kāśyapa //
analyzed: bandha abhāve mamatve tu jñānam puruṣasūktataḥ  yasya yasya adhika tvam tu sādhaneṣu eṣu kāśyapa

original: tattatphalasyāpyādhikyaṃ bhavatītyavadhāraya / dātavyāni yathāśaktyā prīto 'sau sarvadā bhavet //
analyzed: tad tad phalasya api ādhikyam bhavati iti avadhāraya dātavyāni yathāśaktyā sarvadā bhavet

original: etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ snānādiṣu phalaṃ mayā / brahmāṇḍe ye guṇāḥ santi śarīre te vyavasthitāḥ //
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam snāna ādiṣu phalam mayā brahmāṇḍe ye guṇāḥ santi śarīre te vyavasthitāḥ

original: pātālabhūdharā lokāstathānye dvīpasāgarāḥ / ādityādigrahāḥ sarve piṇḍamadhye vyavasthitāḥ //
analyzed: pātāla bhūdharāḥ lokāḥ tathā anye dvīpa sāgarāḥ āditya ādi grahāḥ sarve piṇḍa madhye vyavasthitāḥ

original: pādādhastu talaṃ jñeyaṃ pādordhvaṃ vitalaṃ tathā / jānubhyāṃ sutalaṃ viddhi sakthideśe mahātalam //
analyzed: pāda adhas tu talam jñeyam pāda ūrdhvam vitalam tathā jānubhyām sutalam viddhi sakthi deśe mahātalam

original: tathā talātalañcorau guhyadeśe rasātalam / pātālaṃ kaṭisaṃsthantu pādādau lakṣayedbudhaḥ //
analyzed: tathā talātalam ca ūrau guhya deśe rasātalam pātālam kaṭi saṃstham tu pāda ādau lakṣayet budhaḥ

original: bhūrlokaṃ nābhimadhye tu bhuvarlokaṃ tadūrdhvataḥ / svargalokaṃ hṛdaye vidyāt kaṇṭhadeśe mahastathā //
analyzed: bhūrlokam nābhi madhye tu bhuvarlokam tad ūrdhvatas svarga lokam hṛdaye vidyāt kaṇṭha deśe mahar tathā

original: janalokaṃ vaktradeśe tapolokaṃ lalāṭake / satyalokaṃ mahārandhre bhuvanāni caturdaśa //
analyzed: janalokam vaktra deśe tapolokam lalāṭake satyalokam mahārandhre bhuvanāni caturdaśa

original: trikoṇe saṃsthito meruradhaḥ koṇe ca mandaraḥ / dakṣiṇe ceva kailāso vāmabhāge himācalaḥ //
analyzed: trikoṇe saṃsthitaḥ meruḥ adhas koṇe ca mandaraḥ dakṣiṇe ca iva kailāsaḥ vāma bhāge himācalaḥ

original: niṣadhaścordhvabhāge ca dakṣiṇe gandhamādanaḥ / malayo (ramaṇo)
analyzed: niṣadhaḥ ca ūrdhva bhāge ca dakṣiṇe gandhamādanaḥ malayaḥ ramaṇaḥ

original: vāmarekhāyāṃ saptaite kulaparvatāḥ //
analyzed: vāma rekhāyām saptā ete kulaparvatāḥ

original: asthisthāne sthito jambūḥ śāko majjāsu saṃsthitaḥ / kuśadvīpaḥ sthito māṃse krauñcadvīpaḥ śirāsthitaḥ //
analyzed: asthi sthāne sthitaḥ jambūḥ śākaḥ majjāsu saṃsthitaḥ kuśadvīpaḥ sthitaḥ māṃse krauñcadvīpaḥ śirā sthitaḥ

original: tvacāyāṃ śālmalidvāpo plakṣaḥ romṇāṃ ca sañcaye / nakhasthaḥ puṣkaradvīpaḥ sāgarāstadanantaram //
analyzed: tvacāyām plakṣaḥ romṇām ca sañcaye nakhasthaḥ puṣkaradvīpaḥ sāgarāḥ tad anantaram

original: kṣārodaśca tathā mūtre kṣāre kṣīrodasāgaraḥ / surodadhiśca śleṣmasthaḥ majjāyāṃ ghṛtasāgaraḥ //
analyzed: kṣārodaḥ ca tathā mūtre kṣāre kṣīroda sāgaraḥ surā udadhiḥ ca śleṣma sthaḥ majjāyām ghṛta sāgaraḥ

original: rasodadhiṃ rase vidyācchoṇite dadhisagaram / svādulaṃ lambikāsthāne garbhodaṃ śukrasaṃsthitam //
analyzed: rasa udadhim rase vidyāt śoṇite dadhisagaram svādulam lambikā sthāne garbhodam śukra saṃsthitam

original: nādacakre sthitaḥ sūryo binducakre ca candramāḥ / locanasthaḥ kujo jñeyo hṛdaye ca budhaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: nādacakre sthitaḥ sūryaḥ binducakre ca candramāḥ locana sthaḥ kujaḥ jñeyaḥ hṛdaye ca budhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: viṣṇusthāne guruṃ vidyācchrukre śukro vyavasthitaḥ / nābhisthāne sthito mando mukhe rāhuḥ sthitaḥ sadā //
analyzed: viṣṇu sthāne gurum vidyāt śrukre śukraḥ vyavasthitaḥ nābhi sthāne sthitaḥ mandaḥ mukhe rāhuḥ sthitaḥ sadā

original: pāyu (da) sthāne sthitaḥ ketuḥ śarīre grahamaṇḍalam / vibhaktañca samākhyātamāpādatalamastakam //
analyzed: pāyu da sthāne sthitaḥ ketuḥ śarīre graha maṇḍalam vibhaktam ca samākhyātam āpādatalamastakam

original: utpannā ye hi saṃsāre mriyante te na saṃśayaḥ / bubhukṣā ca tṛṣā raudrā dāhodbhūtā ca mūrchanā //
analyzed: utpannāḥ ye hi saṃsāre mriyante te na saṃśayaḥ bubhukṣā ca tṛṣā raudrā dāha udbhūtā ca mūrchanā

original: yatra pīḍāstvimā raudrāstā vai vṛścikadaṃśajāḥ / vināśaḥ pūrṇakāle ca jāyate sarvadehinām //
analyzed: yatra pīḍāḥ tu imāḥ raudrāḥ tāḥ vai vṛścika daṃśa jāḥ vināśaḥ pūrṇa kāle ca jāyate sarva dehinām

original: agre agre hi dhāvanti yamalokagatasyavai / taptavālukamadhyena prajvaladvahnimadhyataḥ //
analyzed: agre agre hi dhāvanti yama loka gatasya vai tapta vāluka madhyena prajvalat vahni madhyataḥ

original: keśagrāhaiḥ samākrāntā nīyante yamakiṅkaraiḥ / pāpiṣṭhāstvadhamāstārkṣya dayādharmavivirjitāḥ //
analyzed: keśa grāhaiḥ samākrāntāḥ nīyante yama kiṅkaraiḥ  pāpiṣṭhāḥ tu adhamāḥ tārkṣya dayā dharma vivirjitāḥ

original: yamaloke vasantyete kuṭyāṃ janma na vidyate / evaṃ sañjāyate tārkṣya martye jantuḥ svakarmabhiḥ //
analyzed: yama loke vasanti ete kuṭyām janma na vidyate  / evam sañjāyate tārkṣya martye jantuḥ sva karmabhiḥ

original: utpannā ye hi saṃsāre mriyante te na saṃśayaḥ / āyuḥ karma ca vittañca vidyā nidhanameva ca //
analyzed: utpannāḥ ye hi saṃsāre mriyante te na saṃśayaḥ āyuḥ karma ca vittam ca vidyā nidhanam eva ca

original: pañcaitāni hi sṛjyante garbhasthasyaiva dehinaḥ / karmaṇā jāyate jantuḥ karmaṇaiva pralīyate //
analyzed: pañca etāni hi sṛjyante garbha sthasya eva dehinaḥ karmaṇā jāyate jantuḥ karmaṇā eva pralīyate

original: sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ bhayaṃ kṣemaṃ karmaṇaivābhipadyate / adhomukhaṃ cordhvapādaṃ garbhādvāyuḥ prakarṣati //
analyzed: sukham duḥ kham bhayam kṣemam karmaṇā eva abhipadyate adhomukham ca ūrdhva pādam garbhāt vāyuḥ prakarṣati

original: janmato vaiṣṇavī māyā saṃmohayati satvaram / svakarmakṛtasambandho janturjanma prapadyate //
analyzed: janmataḥ vaiṣṇavī māyā saṃmohayati satvaram sva karma kṛta sambandhaḥ jantuḥ janma prapadyate

original: sukṛtāduttamo bhogabhogyavān sukule bhavet / yathāyathā duṣkṛtaṃ tat kule hīne prajāyate //
analyzed: sukṛtāt uttamaḥ bhoga bhogyavān su kule bhavet yathā yathā duṣkṛtam tat kule hīne prajāyate

original: daridro vyādhito mūrkhaḥ pāpakṛdduḥ khabhājanam / ataḥ paraṃ kimarthaṃ te kathayāmi khageśvara //
analyzed: daridraḥ vyādhitaḥ mūrkhaḥ pāpa kṛt duḥkha bhājanam atas param kimartham te kathayāmi khageśvara

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dharmadṛpretadṛśrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde jantūtpattitadgadhātvādivibhāgabhuvanādivibhāgavarṇanaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dharmadṛ pretadṛ śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde

original: nāma dvātriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nāma dvātriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 33
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / utpattilakṣaṇaṃ jantoḥ kathitaṃ mayi puttrake / yamalokaḥ kiyanmātrastrailokye sacarācare / vistaraṃ tasya me brūhi adhvā caiva kiyān smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca  utpatti lakṣaṇam jantoḥ kathitam mayi puttrake yama lokaḥ kiyat mātraḥ trailokye sa carācare vistaram tasya me brūhi adhvā ca eva kiyān smṛtaḥ

original: kaiśca pāpaiḥ kṛtairdeva kena vā śubhakarmaṇā / gacchanti mānavāstatra kathayasva viśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: kaiḥ ca pāpaiḥ kṛtaiḥ deva kena vā śubha karmaṇā  gacchanti mānavāḥ tatra kathayasva viśeṣataḥ

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / ṣaṭaśītisahasrāṇi yojanānāṃ pramāṇataḥ / yamalokasya cādhvānamantarā mānuṣasya ca //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca ṣaṭaśīti sahasrāṇi yojanānām pramāṇataḥ yama lokasya ca adhvānam antarā mānuṣasya ca

original: dhmātatāmramivātapto jvaladdurgo mahāpathaḥ / tatra gacchanti pāpiṣṭhā mānavā mūḍhacetasaḥ //
analyzed: dhmāta tāmram iva ātaptaḥ jvalat durgaḥ mahāpathaḥ tatra gacchanti pāpiṣṭhāḥ mānavāḥ mūḍha cetasaḥ

original: kaṇṭakāśca sutīkṣṇā vai vividhā ghoradarśanāḥ / taistuvālukṣitirvyāptā hutāśaśca tatholbaṇaḥ //
analyzed: kaṇṭakāḥ ca su tīkṣṇāḥ vai vividhāḥ ghora darśanāḥ taiḥ tuvālu kṣitiḥ vyāptā hutāśaḥ ca tathā ulbaṇaḥ

original: vṛkṣacchāyā na tatrāsti yatra viśramate naraḥ / gṛhītaḥ kālapāśaiśca kṛtaiḥ karmabhirulbaṇaiḥ //
analyzed: vṛkṣa chāyā na tatra asti yatra viśramate naraḥ gṛhītaḥ kāla pāśaiḥ ca kṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ ulbaṇaiḥ

original: tasmin mārge na cānnādyaṃ yena prāṇān prapoṣayet / na jalaṃ dṛśyate tatra tṛṣā yena vilīyate //
analyzed: tasmin mārge na ca annādyam yena prāṇān prapoṣayet na jalam dṛśyate tatra tṛṣā yena vilīyate

original: kṣudhayā pīḍito yāti tṛṣṇayā ca mahāpathe / śītena kampate kvāpi yamamārge 'tidurgame //
analyzed: kṣudhayā pīḍitaḥ yāti tṛṣṇayā ca mahāpathe  śītena kampate kvāpi yama mārge ti durgame

original: yadyasya yādṛśaṃ pāpaṃ sa panthāstasya tādṛśaḥ / sudīnāḥ kṛpaṇā mūḍhā duḥ khairvyāptāstaranti tam //
analyzed: yat yasya yādṛśam pāpam sa panthāḥ tasya tādṛśaḥ su dīnāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ mūḍhāḥ duḥ khaiḥ vyāptāḥ taranti tam

original: rudanti dāruṇaṃ kecit keciddrohaṃ vadanti ca / ātmakarmakṛtairdeṣaiḥ pacyamānā muhurmuhuḥ //
analyzed: rudanti dāruṇam kecid kecid droham vadanti ca ātma karma kṛtaiḥ deṣaiḥ pacyamānāḥ muhur muhur

original: īdṛgvidhaḥ sa vai panthā vijñeyo dāruṇaḥ khaga / vitṛṣṇā ye narā loke sukhaṃ tasmin vrajanti te //
analyzed: īdṛgvidhaḥ sa vai panthāḥ vijñeyaḥ dāruṇaḥ khaga vitṛṣṇāḥ ye narāḥ loke sukham tasmin vrajanti te

original: yāniyāni ca dānāni dattāni bhuvi mānavaiḥ / tānitānyupatiṣṭhanti yamaloke puraḥ pathi //
analyzed: yāni yāni ca dānāni dattāni bhuvi mānavaiḥ tāni tāni upatiṣṭhanti yama loke puras pathi

original: pāpino nopatiṣṭhanti dāhaśrāddhajalāñjali / bhramanti vāyubhūtāste ye kṣudrāḥ pāpakarmiṇaḥ //
analyzed: pāpinaḥ na upatiṣṭhanti dāha śrāddha jala añjali bhramanti vāyu bhūtāḥ te ye kṣudrāḥ pāpa karmiṇaḥ

original: īdṛśaṃ vartma tadraudraṃ kathitaṃ tava suvrata / punaśca kathayiṣyāmi yamamārgasya yā sthitiḥ //
analyzed: īdṛśam vartma tat raudram kathitam tava suvrata punar ca kathayiṣyāmi yama mārgasya yā sthitiḥ

original: yāmyanairṛtayormadhye puraṃ vaivasvatasya tu / sarvaṃ vajramayaṃ divyamabhedyaṃ tat surāsuraiḥ //
analyzed: yāmya nairṛtayoḥ madhye puram vaivasvatasya tu sarvam vajra mayam divyam abhedyam tat sura asuraiḥ

original: caturaśraṃ caturdvāraṃ saptaprākāratoraṇam / svayaṃ tiṣṭhati vai yasyāṃ yamo dūtaiḥ samanvitaḥ //
analyzed: caturaśram catur dvāram sapta prākāra toraṇam svayam tiṣṭhati vai yasyām yamaḥ dūtaiḥ samanvitaḥ

original: yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ vai pramāṇena taducyate / sarvaratnamayaṃ divyaṃ vidyujjvālārkataijasam //
analyzed: yojanānām sahasram vai pramāṇena tat ucyate sarva ratna mayam divyam vidyut jvālā arka taijasam

original: tadguhaṃ dharmarājasya vistīrṇaṃ kāñcanaprabham / yojanānāṃ pañcaśatapramāṇena samucchritam //
analyzed: tat guham dharmarājasya vistīrṇam kāñcana prabham yojanānām pañca śata pramāṇena samucchritam

original: vṛtaṃ stambhasahasraistu vaidūryamaṇimaṇḍitam / muktājālagavākṣaṃ ca patākāśatabhūṣitam //
analyzed: vṛtam stambha sahasraiḥ tu vaidūrya maṇi maṇḍitam muktā jāla gavākṣam ca patākā śata bhūṣitam

original: ghaṇṭāśataninādāḍhyaṃ toraṇānāṃ śatairvṛtam / evamādibhiranyaiśca bhūṣaṇairbhūṣitaṃ sadā //
analyzed: ghaṇṭā śata nināda āḍhyam toraṇānām śataiḥ vṛtam evamādibhiḥ anyaiḥ ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ bhūṣitam sadā

original: tatrastho bhagavān dharma āsane tu same śubhe / daśayo janavistīrṇe nīlajīmūtasannibhe //
analyzed: tatrasthaḥ bhagavān dharmaḥ āsane tu same śubhe daśayaḥ jana vistīrṇe nīla jīmūta sannibhe

original: dharmajño dharmaśīlaśca dharmayukto hito yamaḥ / bhayadaḥ pāpayuktānāṃ dhārmikāṇāṃ sukhapradaḥ //
analyzed: dharma jñaḥ dharma śīlaḥ ca dharma yuktaḥ hitaḥ yamaḥ bhaya daḥ pāpa yuktānām dhārmikāṇām sukha pradaḥ

original: mandamāru tasaṃyogairutsavairvividhaistathā / vyākhyānairvividhairyuktaḥ śaṅkhavāditraniḥ svanaiḥ //
analyzed: manda māru ta saṃyogaiḥ utsavaiḥ vividhaiḥ tathā vyākhyānaiḥ vividhaiḥ yuktaḥ śaṅkha vāditra niḥ svanaiḥ

original: puramadhyapraveśe tu citraguptasya vai gṛham / pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyānāṃ yojanānāṃ suvistaram //
analyzed: pura madhya praveśe tu citraguptasya vai gṛham pañcaviṃśati saṃkhyānām yojanānām su vistaram

original: daśocchritaṃ mahādivyaṃ lohaprākāravoṣṭitam / pratolīśatasaṃcāraṃ patatākāśataśobhitam //
analyzed: daśa ucchritam mahā divyam loha prākāra voṣṭitam pratolī śata saṃcāram patatākā śata śobhitam

original: dīpikāśatasaṅkīrṇaṃ gītadhvanisamākulam / vicitracitrakuśalaiścitraguptasya vai gṛham //
analyzed: dīpikā śata saṅkīrṇam gīta dhvani samākulam vicitra citra kuśalaiḥ citraguptasya vai gṛham

original: maṇimuktāmaye divye āsane paramādbhute / tatrastho gaṇayatyāyurmānuṣeṣvitareṣu ca //
analyzed: maṇi muktā maye divye āsane parama adbhute tatrasthaḥ gaṇayati āyuḥ mānuṣeṣu itareṣu ca

original: na muhyati kadācit sa sukṛte duṣkṛte 'pi vā / yadyenopārjitaṃ yāvat tāvadvai vetti tasya tat //
analyzed: na muhyati kadācid sa sukṛte duṣkṛte vā yat yena upārjitam yāvat tāvat vai vetti tasya tat

original: daśāṣṭadoṣarahitaṃ kṛta karma likhatyasau / citraguptālayāt ācyāṃ jvarasyāsti mahāgṛham //
analyzed: daśa aṣṭa doṣa rahitam likhati asau citragupta ālayāt ācyām jvarasya asti mahā gṛham

original: dakṣiṇe cāpi śūlasya latāvisphoṭakasya ca / paścime kāla pāśasya ajīrṇasyārucestathā //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe ca api śūlasya latā visphoṭakasya ca paścime kāla pāśasya ajīrṇasya aruceḥ tathā

original: madhyapīṭhottare jñeyo tathā cānyā viṣacikā / aiśanyāṃ vai śiro 'rtiśca āgneyyāñcaiva mṛkatā //
analyzed: madhya pīṭha uttare tathā ca anyā viṣa cikā aiśanyām vai śiraḥ ṛtiḥ ca āgneyyām ca eva mṛka tā

original: atisāraśca nairṛtyāṃ vāyavyāṃ dāhasaṃjñakaḥ / ebhiḥ parivṛto nityaṃ citraguptaḥ sa tiṣṭhati //
analyzed: atisāraḥ ca nairṛtyām vāyavyām dāha saṃjñakaḥ ebhiḥ parivṛtaḥ nityam citraguptaḥ sa tiṣṭhati

original: yat karma kurute kaścittat sarvaṃ vilakhatyasau / dharmarājagṛhadvāri dūtāstārkṣya tathā niśi / tiṣṭhanti pāpakarmāṇaḥ pacyamānā narādhamāḥ //
analyzed: yat karma kurute kaścid tat sarvam vilakhati asau dharmarāja gṛha dvāri dūtāḥ tārkṣya tathā niśi tiṣṭhanti pāpa karmāṇaḥ pacyamānāḥ nara adhamāḥ

original: yamadūtairmahāpāśairhanyamānāśca mudgaraiḥ / vadhyante vividhaiḥ pāpaiḥ pūrvakarmakṛtairnarāḥ //
analyzed: yamadūtaiḥ mahā pāśaiḥ hanyamānāḥ ca mudgaraiḥ  vadhyante vividhaiḥ pāpaiḥ pūrva karma kṛtaiḥ narāḥ

original: nānāprahāraṇāgraiśca nānāyantraistathā pare / chidyante pāpakarmāṇaḥ krakacaiḥ kāṣṭhavaddvidhā //
analyzed: nānā prahāraṇa agraiḥ ca nānā yantraiḥ tathā pare chidyante pāpa karmāṇaḥ krakacaiḥ kāṣṭha vat dvidhā

original: anye jvaladbhiraṅgārairveṣṭitāḥ parito bhṛśam / pūrvakarmavipākena dhmāyante lohapiṇḍavat //
analyzed: anye jvaladbhiḥ aṅgāraiḥ veṣṭitāḥ paritas bhṛśam pūrva karma vipākena dhmāyante loha piṇḍa vat

original: kṣiptvānye ca dharāpṛṣṭhe kuṭhāreṇāvakartitāḥ / krandamānāśca dṛśyante pūrvakarmavipākataḥ //
analyzed: kṣiptvā anye ca dharā pṛṣṭhe kuṭhāreṇa avakartitāḥ krandamānāḥ ca dṛśyante pūrva karma vipākataḥ

original: kecidguḍamayaiḥ pākaistailapākaistathā pare / pīḍyante yamadūtaiśca pāpiṣṭhāḥ subhṛśaṃ narāḥ //
analyzed: kecid guḍa mayaiḥ pākaiḥ taila pākaiḥ tathā pare pīḍyante yamadūtaiḥ ca pāpiṣṭhāḥ su bhṛśam narāḥ

original: kṣaṇāhni prārthayantyanye dehidehīti koṭiśaḥ / yamaloke mayā dṛṣṭā mamasvaṃ bhakṣitaṃ tvayā //
analyzed: kṣaṇa ahni prārthayanti anye dehi dehi iti koṭiśas yama loke mayā dṛṣṭā mama svam bhakṣitam tvayā

original: ityevaṃ bahuśastārkṣya narakāḥ pāpināṃ smṛtāḥ / karmabhirbahubhiḥ proktaiḥ sarvaśāstreṣu bhāṣitaiḥ / dānopakāraṃ vakṣyāmi yathā tatra sukhaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: iti evam bahuśas tārkṣya narakāḥ pāpinām smṛtāḥ karmabhiḥ bahubhiḥ proktaiḥ sarva śāstreṣu bhāṣitaiḥ dāna upakāram vakṣyāmi yathā tatra sukham bhavet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pratakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde yamalokavistṛtidṛvarṇanaṃ nāma trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharmakāṇḍe prata kalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde yamalokavistṛtidṛvarṇanam nāma trayastriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 34
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / śṛṇu tārkṣya yathānyāyaṃ dharmādharmsya lakṣaṇam / sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ nṝṇāmagre dhāvati dhāvatām //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca śṛṇu tārkṣya yathānyāyam dharma adharmsya lakṣaṇam sukṛtam duṣkṛtam nṝṇām agre dhāvati dhāvatām

original: kṛte tapaḥ praśaṃsanti tretāyāṃ jñānasādhanam / dvāpare yajñadāne ca dānamekaṃ kalau yuge //
analyzed: kṛte tapaḥ praśaṃsanti tretāyām jñāna sādhanam dvāpare yajña dāne ca dānam ekam kalau yuge

original: gṛhasthānāṃ smṛto dharma uttamānāṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ / iṣṭāpūrte svaśaktyā hi kurvatāṃ nāsti pātakam //
analyzed: gṛhasthānām smṛtaḥ dharmaḥ uttamānām vicakṣaṇaiḥ iṣṭāpūrte sva śaktyā hi kurvatām na asti pātakam

original: vṛkṣastu ropito yena khanikūpajalāśayāḥ / yamamārge sukhaṃ tasya vrajato nitarāṃ bhavet //
analyzed: vṛkṣaḥ tu ropitaḥ yena khani kūpa jalāśayāḥ yama mārge sukham tasya vrajataḥ nitarām bhavet

original: agnitāpapradātāre yaiḥ śītapīḍite dvije / tapyamānāḥ sukhaṃ yānti sarva kāmaiḥ prapūritāḥ //
analyzed: agni tāpa pradātāre yaiḥ śīta pīḍite dvije tapyamānāḥ sukham yānti sarva kāmaiḥ prapūritāḥ

original: suvarṇamaṇimuktādi vastrāṇyābharaṇāni ca / tena sarvamidaṃ dattaṃ yena dattā vasundharā //
analyzed: suvarṇa maṇi muktā ādi vastrāṇi ābharaṇāni ca tena sarvam idam dattam yena dattā vasundharā

original: yāniyāni ca bhūtāni dattāni bhuvi mānavaiḥ / yamalokapathe tāni tiṣṭhantyeṣāṃ samīpataḥ //
analyzed: yāni yāni ca bhūtāni dattāni bhuvi mānavaiḥ yama loka pathe tāni tiṣṭhanti eṣām samīpatas

original: vyañjanāni vicitrāṇi bhakṣyabhojyāni yāni ca / dadāti vidhinā putra prete tadu patiṣṭhati //
analyzed: vyañjanāni vicitrāṇi bhakṣya bhojyāni yāni ca dadāti vidhinā putra prete tat u patiṣṭhati

original: ātmā vai putranāmāsti putrastrātā yamālaye / tārayet pitaraṃ ghorāt tena puttraḥ pravakṣyate //
analyzed: ātmā vai putra nāmā asti putraḥ trātā yama ālaye tārayet pitaram ghorāt tena puttraḥ pravakṣyate

original: ato deyañca putreṇa śrāddhamājī vitāvadhi / ativāhastadā preto bhogān vai labhate hi saḥ //
analyzed: atas deyam ca putreṇa śrāddham ājī ativāhaḥ tadā pretaḥ bhogān vai labhate hi saḥ

original: dahyamānasya pretasya svajanairyo jalāñjaliḥ / dīyate pretarūpo 'sau prīto yāti yamālaye //
analyzed: dahyamānasya pretasya sva janaiḥ yaḥ jala añjaliḥ dīyate sau prītaḥ yāti yama ālaye

original: apakve mṛnmaye pātre dugdhaṃ dattaṃ dinatrayam / kāṣṭhatrayaṃ guṇairbaddhvā prītyai rātrau catuṣpathe //
analyzed: apakve mṛd maye pātre dugdham dattam dina trayam kāṣṭha trayam guṇaiḥ baddhvā prītyai rātrau catuṣpathe

original: prathame 'hni dvitīye ca tṛtīye ca tathā khaga / ākāśasthaṃ pibeddugdhaṃ preto vāyuvapurdharaḥ //
analyzed: prathame hni dvitīye ca tṛtīye ca tathā khagaḥ ākāśa stham pibet dugdham pretaḥ vāyu vapuḥ dharaḥ

original: caturthe sañcayaḥ kāryaḥ caturthe?
analyzed: caturthe sañcayaḥ kāryaḥ caturthe

original: vāpi sāgnike / asthisañcayanaṃ kāryaṃ dadyādāpāñjaliṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: vā api sa agnike asthisañcayanam kāryam dadyāt āpāñjalim tatas

original: na pūrvāhne na madhyāhne nāparāhne na sandhiṣu / yāte prathamayāme tu dadyādāpajalāñjaṃlīn //
analyzed: na pūrvāhne na madhyāhne na aparāhne na sandhiṣu yāte prathama yāme tu dadyāt āpa jala añjaṃlīn

original: puttreṇa datte te sarve gotriṇo hitabāndhavāḥ / svajātyaiḥ parajātyaiśca deyo nadyāṃ jalāñjaliḥ //
analyzed: puttreṇa datte te sarve gotriṇaḥ hita bāndhavāḥ sva jātyaiḥ para jātyaiḥ ca deyaḥ nadyām jala añjaliḥ

original: gantavyaṃ naiva vipreṇa dātuṃ śīghraṃ jalāñjalim / nivṛttāśca yadā nāryo lokācāraḥ sadābhavet //
analyzed: gantavyam nā eva vipreṇa dātum śīghram jala añjalim nivṛttāḥ ca yadā nāryaḥ loka ācāraḥ sadā bhavet

original: pañcatvañca gate śūdre yaḥ kāṣṭhaṃ nayate citām / anuvrajedyadā viprastrirātramaśucirbhavet //
analyzed: pañcatvam ca gate śūdre yaḥ kāṣṭham nayate citām  anuvrajet yadā vipraḥ tri rātram aśuciḥ bhavet

original: trirātre ca tataḥ pūrṇe nadīṃ gacchet samudragām / prāṇāyāmaśataṃ kṛtvā ghṛtaṃ prāśya viśudhyati //
analyzed: tri rātre ca tatas pūrṇe nadīm gacchet samudra gām prāṇāyāma śatam kṛtvā ghṛtam prāśya viśudhyati

original: śūdro gacchati sarvatra vaiśyastriṣu dvayoḥ paraḥ / gacchati svīyavarṇeṣu dātuṃ prete jalāñjalim //
analyzed: śūdraḥ gacchati sarvatra vaiśyaḥ triṣu dvayoḥ paraḥ gacchati svīya varṇeṣu dātum prete jala añjalim

original: datte jalāñjalau paścādvidadhyāddantadhāvanam / tyajanti gotriṇaḥ sarve dināni nava kāśyapa //
analyzed: datte jala añjalau paścāt vidadhyāt dantadhāvanam tyajanti gotriṇaḥ sarve dināni nava kāśyapa

original: jalāñjaliṃ tathā dātuṃ gacchanti dvijasattamāḥ / yatra sthāne mṛto yastu adhvanyapi gṛhe 'pi vā / viśleṣastu tataḥ sthānānna kvacidvihito budhaiḥ //
analyzed: jala añjalim tathā dātum gacchanti dvijasattamāḥ yatra sthāne mṛtaḥ yaḥ tu adhvani api gṛhe vā  viśleṣaḥ tu tatas sthānāt na kvacid vihitaḥ budhaiḥ

original: strījanaścāgrato gacchet pṛṣṭhato navasañcayaḥ / ācamanaṃ vidhātavyaṃ pāṣāṇopari saṃsthitaiḥ //
analyzed: strī janaḥ ca agratas gacchet pṛṣṭhatas nava sañcayaḥ ācamanam vidhātavyam pāṣāṇa upari saṃsthitaiḥ

original: yavāṃśca sarṣapān dūrvāḥ pūrṇapātre vilokayet / prāśayennimbapatrāṇi snehasnānaṃ samācaret //
analyzed: yavān ca sarṣapān dūrvāḥ pūrṇa pātre vilokayet prāśayet nimba patrāṇi sneha snānam samācaret

original: gotribhirna ca kartavyaṃ gṛhānnañca na bhojayet / bhuñjīta mṛnmaye pātre uttānañca vivarjayet //
analyzed: gotribhiḥ na ca kartavyam gṛha annam ca na bhojayet bhuñjīta mṛd maye pātre uttānam ca vivarjayet

original: mṛtakasya guṇā grāhyā yamagāthāṃ samudgiret / śubhāśubhe ca dhyātavye pūrvakarmopasañcite //
analyzed: mṛtakasya guṇāḥ grāhyāḥ yama gāthām samudgiret  śubha aśubhe ca dhyātavye pūrva karma upasañcite

original: labdhenaiva ca dehena bhuṅkte sukṛtaduṣkṛte / vāyurūpo bhramatyeva vāyurūrdhvaṃ sa gacchati //
analyzed: labdhena eva ca dehena bhuṅkte sukṛta duṣkṛte vāyu rūpaḥ bhramati eva vāyuḥ ūrdhvam sa gacchati

original: daśāhakarmakriyayā kuṭī niṣpādyate dhruvam / navakaiḥ ṣoḍaśaśrāddhaiḥ prayāti hi kuṭīṃ naraḥ //
analyzed: daśa aha karma kriyayā kuṭī niṣpādyate dhruvam navakaiḥ ṣoḍaśa śrāddhaiḥ prayāti hi kuṭīm naraḥ

original: tilairdarbhaiśca bhūmyāṃ vai kuṭī dhātumayī bhavet / pañca ratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati //
analyzed: tilaiḥ darbhaiḥ ca bhūmyām vai kuṭī dhātu mayī bhavet pañca ratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati

original: yadā puṣpaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ hi tadā garbhaṃ na dhārayet / ādarācca tato bhūmau tiladarbhānviniḥ kṣipet //
analyzed: yadā puṣpam pranaṣṭam hi tadā garbham na dhārayet ādarāt ca tatas bhūmau tila darbhān viniḥ kṣipet

original: paśutve sthāvaratve ca yatra kvāpi sa jāyate / tatraiva janturutpannaḥ śrāddhaṃ tatropatiṣṭhati //
analyzed: paśu tve sthāvara tve ca yatra kvāpi sa jāyate tatra eva jantuḥ utpannaḥ śrāddham tatra upatiṣṭhati

original: dhanvinā lakṣyamuddiśya mukto bāṇastadāpnuyāt / yathā śrāddhaṃ yamuddiśya kṛtaṃ tasyopatiṣṭhati //
analyzed: dhanvinā lakṣyam uddiśya muktaḥ bāṇaḥ tat āpnuyāt yathā śrāddham yam uddiśya kṛtam tasya upatiṣṭhati

original: yāvannotpādito dehastāvacchrāddhairna prīṇanam / kṣudhāvibhramamāpanno daśāhena ca tarpitaḥ //
analyzed: yāvat na utpāditaḥ dehaḥ tāvat śrāddhaiḥ na prīṇanam kṣudhā vibhramam āpannaḥ daśa ahena ca tarpitaḥ

original: piṇḍadānaṃ na yasyābhūdākāśe bhramate tu saḥ / dinatrayaṃ vasaṃstoye agnāvapi dinatrayam / ākāśe vasate trīṇi dinamekantu vāsake //
analyzed: piṇḍa dānam na yasya abhūt ākāśe bhramate tu saḥ dina trayam vasan toye agnau api dina trayam ākāśe vasate trīṇi dinam ekam tu vāsake

original: dagdhe dehe ca vahnau ca jalenaiva tu tarpitaḥ / snehasnānaṃ jalenaiva pūpakaiḥ kṛśarairgṛhe //
analyzed: dagdhe dehe ca vahnau ca jalena eva tu tarpitaḥ sneha snānam jalena eva pūpakaiḥ kṛsaraiḥ gṛhe

original: prathame 'hni tṛtīye ca pañcame saptame 'pi vā / navamaikādaśe caiva śrāddhaṃ navakamucyate //
analyzed: prathame hni tṛtīye ca pañcame saptame vā navama ekādaśe ca eva śrāddham navakam ucyate

original: gṛhadvāre śmaśāne vā tīrthe devālaye 'pi vā / yatrādyo dīyate piṇḍastatra sarvān samāpayet //
analyzed: gṛha dvāre śmaśāne vā tīrthe devālaye vā yatra ādyaḥ dīyate piṇḍaḥ tatra sarvān samāpayet

original: ekādaśāhe yacchrāddhaṃ tat sāmānyamudāhṛtam / caturṇāmekavarṇānāṃ śuddhyarthaṃ snānamucyate //
analyzed: ekādaśa ahe yat śrāddham tat sāmānyam udāhṛtam caturṇām eka varṇānām śuddhi artham snānam ucyate

original: kṛtvā caikādaśāhañca punaḥ snātvā śucirbhavet / dadyādviprāya yaḥ śayyāṃ yathoktaṃ pretamokṣadām //
analyzed: kṛtvā ca ekādaśa ahar ca punar snātvā śuciḥ bhavet  dadyāt viprāya yaḥ śayyām yathoktam preta mokṣa dām

original: na bhavet yadā sa gotro paro 'pi vidhimācaret / bhāryā vā puruṣaḥ kaścit tuṣṭaśca kurute striyaḥ //
analyzed: na bhavet yadā vidhim ācaret bhāryā vā puruṣaḥ kaścid tuṣṭaḥ ca kurute striyaḥ

original: prathame 'hani yaḥ piṇḍo dīyate vidhipūrvakam / annādyena ca tenaiva sarvaśrāddhāni kārayet //
analyzed: prathame hani yaḥ piṇḍaḥ dīyate vidhi pūrvakam annādyena ca tena eva sarva śrāddhāni kārayet

original: amantraṃ kārayecchrāddhaṃ daśāhaṃ nāmagotrataḥ / śrāddhaṃ kṛtantu yairvastraistāni tyaktvā gṛhaṃ viśet //
analyzed: amantram kārayet śrāddham daśa aham nāma gotrataḥ śrāddham yaiḥ vastraiḥ tāni tyaktvā gṛham viśet

original: asagotraḥ sagotro vā yadi strī yadi vā pumān / prathame 'hani yaḥ kuryāt sa daśāhaṃ samāpayet //
analyzed: asagotraḥ sagotraḥ vā yadi strī yadi vā pumān prathame hani yaḥ kuryāt sa daśa aham samāpayet

original: jīvasya daśabhiḥ piṇḍairdeho niṣpādyate dhruvam / vṛddhiśca daśabhirmāsairgarbhasthasya yathā bhavet //
analyzed: jīvasya daśabhiḥ piṇḍaiḥ dehaḥ niṣpādyate dhruvam vṛddhiḥ ca daśabhiḥ māsaiḥ garbha sthasya yathā bhavet

original: āśaucaṃ yāvadetasya tāvat piṇḍodakakriyā / caturṇāmapi varṇānāmeṣa eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: āśaucam yāvat etasya tāvat piṇḍa udaka kriyā caturṇām api varṇānām eṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: yatra trirātramāśaucaṃ tatrādau trīn pradāpayet / caturastu dvitīye 'hni tṛtīye trīṃśtathaiva ca //
analyzed: yatra tri rātram āśaucam tatra ādau trīn pradāpayet caturaḥ tu dvitīye hni tṛtīye trīn tathā eva ca

original: pṛthak śarāvayordadyādekāhaṃ kṣīramambu ca / ekoddiṣṭantu vai śrāddhaṃ caturthe 'hani kārayet //
analyzed: pṛthak śarāvayoḥ dadyāt eka aham kṣīram ambu ca  ekoddiṣṭam tu vai śrāddham caturthe hani kārayet

original: prathame 'hani yaḥ piṇḍastena mūrdhā prajāyate / cakṣuḥ śrotrañca nāsā ca dvitīye 'hni prajāyate //
analyzed: prathame hani yaḥ piṇḍaḥ tena mūrdhā prajāyate cakṣuḥ śrotram ca nāsā ca dvitīye hni prajāyate

original: gaṇḍau vaktraṃ tathā grīvā tṛtīye 'hani jāyate / hṛdayaṃ kukṣirudaraṃ caturthe tadvadeva hi //
analyzed: gaṇḍau vaktram tathā grīvā tṛtīye hani jāyate hṛdayam kukṣiḥ udaram caturthe tadvat eva hi

original: kaṭipṛṣṭhaṃ gudañcāpi pañcame 'hani jāyate / ṣaṣṭhe ūrū ca vijñeye saptame gulphasambhavaḥ //
analyzed: kaṭi pṛṣṭham gudam ca api pañcame hani jāyate ṣaṣṭhe ūrū ca vijñeye saptame gulpha sambhavaḥ

original: aṣṭame divase prāpte jaṅghe ca bhavato 'ṇḍaja / pādau ca navame jñeyau daśame balavatkṣudhā //
analyzed: aṣṭame divase prāpte jaṅghe ca bhavataḥ ṇḍaja pādau ca navame jñeyau daśame balavat kṣudhā

original: ekādaśāhe yaḥ piṇḍastaṃ dadyādāmiṣeṇa tu / siddhānnaṃ tasya dātavyaṃ kṛśarāḥ pūpakāḥ payaḥ / prakṣālya vipracaraṇāvarghyaṃ dhūpañca dīpakram //
analyzed: ekādaśa ahe yaḥ piṇḍaḥ tam dadyāt āmiṣeṇa tu siddha annam tasya dātavyam kṛśarāḥ pūpakāḥ payaḥ prakṣālya vipracaraṇau arghyam dhūpam ca dīpakram

original: dvādaśa pratimāsyāni śrāddhānyaikādaśe tathā / tripakṣañcāpi ṣaṇmāse dve śrāddhāni ca ṣoḍaśa //
analyzed: dvādaśa pratimāsyāni śrāddhāni aikādaśe tathā tri pakṣam ca api ṣaṣ māse dve śrāddhāni ca ṣoḍaśa

original: prati māsaṃ pradātavyaṃ mṛtāhe yā tithirbhavet / sa māsaḥ prathamo jñeya iti vedavido viduḥ //
analyzed: prati māsam pradātavyam mṛtāhe yā tithiḥ bhavet sa māsaḥ prathamaḥ jñeyaḥ iti veda vidaḥ viduḥ

original: śavahaste ca yacchrāddhaṃ mṛtisthāne dvijāsane / tadeva prathamaṃ śrāddhaṃ tat syādekādaśe 'hani //
analyzed: śava haste ca yat śrāddham mṛti sthāne dvija āsane tat eva prathamam śrāddham tat syāt ekādaśe hani

original: sā tithirmāsike śrāddhe mṛto yasmin dine naraḥ / riktayośca tripakṣe ca sā tithirnādriyeta vai //
analyzed: sā tithiḥ māsike śrāddhe mṛtaḥ yasmin dine naraḥ riktayoḥ ca tri pakṣe ca sā tithiḥ na ādriyeta vai

original: paurṇamāsyāṃ mṛto yo 'sau caturthī tasya conakā / caturthyāntu mṛto yastu navamī tasya conakā //
analyzed: paurṇamāsyām mṛtaḥ sau caturthī tasya ca unakā caturthyām tu mṛtaḥ yaḥ tu navamī tasya ca unakā

original: navamyāñca mṛto yaśca riktā tasya caturdaśī / etā riktāśca vijñeyā antyeṣṭau kuśalena ca //
analyzed: navamyām ca mṛtaḥ yaḥ ca riktā tasya caturdaśī etāḥ riktāḥ ca vijñeyāḥ antyeṣṭau kuśalena ca

original: ekādaśāhe yacchrāddhaṃ navakaṃ tat prakīrtitam / catuṣpathe tyajedannaṃ punaḥ snānaṃ samācaret //
analyzed: ekādaśa ahe yat śrāddham navakam tat prakīrtitam catuṣpathe tyajet annam punar snānam samācaret

original: ekādaśāhādārabhya ghaṭasyānnaṃ jalānvitam / dinedine ca dātavyamabdaṃ yāvaddvijottame //
analyzed: ekādaśa ahāt ārabhya ghaṭasya annam jala anvitam dine dine ca dātavyam abdam yāvat dvijottame

original: mānuṣasya śarīre tu vidyate hyasthisañcayaḥ / tatsaṃkhyaḥ sarvadeheṣu ṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatrayam //
analyzed: mānuṣasya śarīre tu vidyate hi asthi sañcayaḥ tad saṃkhyaḥ sarva deheṣu ṣaṣṭi adhika śata trayam

original: udakumbhena puṣṭāni tānyasthīni bhavanti hi / etasmāddīyate kumbhaḥ prītiḥ pretasya jāyate //
analyzed: uda kumbhena puṣṭāni tāni asthīni bhavanti hi etasmāt dīyate kumbhaḥ prītiḥ pretasya jāyate

original: yasmin dine mṛto janturaṭavyāṃ viṣame 'pi vā / yadā tadā bhaveddāhaḥ sūtakaṃ mṛtavāsarāt //
analyzed: yasmin dine mṛtaḥ jantuḥ aṭavyām viṣame vā yadā tadā bhavet dāhaḥ sūtakam mṛta vāsarāt

original: tilapātraṃ tathānnādyaṃ gandhadhapādikañca yat / ekādaśāhe dātavyaṃ tena śūddho dvijo bhavet //
analyzed: tila pātram tathā annādyam yat ekādaśa ahe dātavyam tena śūddhaḥ dvijaḥ bhavet

original: kṣattriyo dvādaśāhe tu vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśe tathā / śuddhiḥ śūdrasya māsena mṛtake jātasūtake //
analyzed: kṣattriyaḥ dvādaśa ahe tu vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśe tathā śuddhiḥ śūdrasya māsena mṛtake jāta sūtake

original: māsatraye trirātraṃ syāt ṣaṇmāsena tu pakṣiṇī / ahaḥ saṃvatsarādarbvāk pūrṇe dattvodakaṃ śuciḥ / anenaivā nusāreṇa śuddhiḥ syāt sārvavarṇikī //
analyzed: māsa traye tri rātram syāt ṣaṣ māsena tu pakṣiṇī ahar saṃvatsarāt arbuda vāk pūrṇe dattvā udakam śuciḥ anena eva anusāreṇa śuddhiḥ syāt sārvavarṇikī

original: ekādaśāhaprabhṛti purataḥ prativatsaram / viśvedevāṃstu sampūjya piṇḍamekañca nirvapet //
analyzed: ekādaśa aha prabhṛti puratas prativatsaram viśvedevān tu sampūjya piṇḍam ekam ca nirvapet

original: yathā tārāgaṇāḥ sarve cchādyante raviraśmibhiḥ / evaṃ pracchādyate sarvaṃ na preto bhavati kvacit //
analyzed: yathā tārā gaṇāḥ sarve chādyante ravi raśmibhiḥ evam pracchādyate sarvam na pretaḥ bhavati kvacid

original: śayyādānaṃ praśaṃsanti sarvadaiva dvijottamāḥ / anityaṃ jīvanaṃ ysamāt paścāt ko nu pradāsyati //
analyzed: śayyā dānam praśaṃsanti sarvadā eva dvijottamāḥ anityam jīvanam ysamāt paścāt kaḥ nu pradāsyati

original: tāvadvandhuḥ pitā tāvadyāvajjīvati mānavaḥ / mṛte mṛta iti jñātvā kṣaṇāt sneho nivartate //
analyzed: tāvat vandhuḥ pitā tāvat yāvat jīvati mānavaḥ mṛte mṛtaḥ iti jñātvā kṣaṇāt snehaḥ nivartate

original: ātmaiva hyātmano bandhurevaṃ jñātvā muhurmuhuḥ / jīvannapīti sañcintya svīyaṃ hitamanustamaret //
analyzed: ātmā eva hi ātmanaḥ bandhuḥ evam jñātvā muhur muhur jīvan api iti sañcintya svīyam hita manuḥ tam aret

original: mṛtānāṃ kaḥ suto dadyāddvijeśayyāṃ satūlikām / evaṃ jānannidaṃ sarvaṃ svahastenaiva dāpayet //
analyzed: mṛtānām kaḥ sutaḥ dadyāt dvijeśayyām sa tūlikām  evam jānan idam sarvam sva hastena eva dāpayet

original: tasmācchayyāṃ samāsādya sāradārumaryo dṛḍhām / dantādirucirāṃ ramyāṃ hemapaṭṭai ralaṅkṛtām / tasyāṃ saṃsthāpya haimañca hariṃ lakṣmyā samanvitam //
analyzed: tasmāt śayyām samāsādya sāradāru maryaḥ dṛḍhām danta ādi rucirām ramyām hema paṭṭaiḥ ralaṅkṛtām tasyām saṃsthāpya haimam ca harim lakṣmyā samanvitam

original: ghṛtapūrṇañca kalaśaṃ parikalpayet / vijñeyo garuḍa prītyai sa nidrākalaśo budhaiḥ //
analyzed: ghṛta pūrṇam ca kalaśam parikalpayet  vijñeyaḥ garuḍa prītyai sa nidrākalaśaḥ budhaiḥ

original: tāmbūlakuṅkumakṣodakarpūrāgurucandanam / dīpikopānahacchatracāmarāsanabhājanam //
analyzed: tāmbūla kuṅkuma kṣoda karpūra aguru candanam dīpikā upānaha chatra cāmara āsana bhājanam

original: pārśveṣu sthāpayecchaktyā saptadhānyāni caivahi / śayanasthasya bhavati yaccānyadupakārakam //
analyzed: pārśveṣu sthāpayet śaktyā saptadhānyāni ca eva hi śayana sthasya bhavati yat ca anyat upakārakam

original: bhṛṅgārakarakādarśaṃ pañcavarṇaṃ vitānakam / śayyāmevaṃvidhāṃ kṛtvā brāhmaṇāya nivedayet //
analyzed: bhṛṅgāra karaka ādarśam pañca varṇam vitānakam śayyām evaṃvidhām kṛtvā brāhmaṇāya nivedayet

original: sapatnīkāya sampūjya svarlokasukhadāyinīm / vastraiḥ suśobhanaiḥ pūjya cailakaṃ paridhāpayet //
analyzed: sa patnīkāya sampūjya svarloka sukha dāyinīm vastraiḥ su śobhanaiḥ pūjya cailakam paridhāpayet

original: karṇakaṇṭhāṅgulībāhubhūṣaṇaiścitrabhūṣaṇaiḥ / gṛhopakaraṇairyuktaṃ gṛhaṃ dhenvā samanvitam //
analyzed: karṇa kaṇṭha aṅgulī bāhu bhūṣaṇaiḥ citra bhūṣaṇaiḥ gṛha upakaraṇaiḥ yuktam gṛham dhenvā samanvitam

original: tator'ghaḥ sampradātavyaḥ pañcaratnaphalākṣataiḥ //
analyzed: sampradātavyaḥ pañcaratna phala akṣataiḥ

original: yathā na kṛṣṇaśayanaṃ śūnyaṃ sāgarakanyayā / śayyā mamāpyaśūnyāstu tathā janmanijanmani //
analyzed: yathā na kṛṣṇa śayanam śūnyam sāgarakanyayā śayyā mama api a śūnyā astu tathā janmani janmani

original: dattvaivaṃ talpamamalaṃ kṣamāpya ca visarjayet / tathā caikādaśāhe tu vidhireṣa prakīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: dattvā evam talpam amalam kṣamāpya ca visarjayet tathā ca ekādaśa ahe tu vidhiḥ eṣa prakīrtitaḥ

original: dadāti yo hi dharmārthe bāndhavo bāndhave mṛte / viśeṣamatra pakṣe tu kathyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu //
analyzed: dadāti yaḥ hi dharma arthe bāndhavaḥ bāndhave mṛte viśeṣam atra pakṣe tu kathyamānam mayā śṛṇu

original: upayuktañca tasyāsīt yat kiñcit svagṛhe purā / tasya yadgātrasaṃ lagnaṃ vastraṃ bhājanavāhanam / yadabhīṣṭañca tasyāsīt tat sarvaṃ parikalpayet //
analyzed: upayuktam ca tasya āsīt yat kiñcid sva gṛhe purā tasya yat gātra sam lagnam vastram bhājana vāhanam yat abhīṣṭam ca tasya āsīt tat sarvam parikalpayet

original: sthāpayet puruṣaṃ haimaṃ śayyopari śubhaṃ budhaḥ / pūjayitvā pradātavyā mṛtaśayyā yathoditā //
analyzed: sthāpayet puruṣam haimam śayyā upari śubham budhaḥ pūjayitvā pradātavyā mṛtaśayyā yathā uditā

original: purandaragṛhe sarvaṃ sūryaputrālaye tathā / upatiṣṭhet sukhaṃ jantoḥ śayyādānaprabhāvataḥ //
analyzed: purandara gṛhe sarvam sūryaputra ālaye tathā upatiṣṭhet sukham jantoḥ śayyā dāna prabhāvataḥ

original: pīḍayanti na taṃ yāmyāḥ puruṣā bhīṣaṇānanāḥ / na gharmeṇa na śītena bādhyate sa naraḥ kvacit //
analyzed: pīḍayanti na tam yāmyāḥ puruṣāḥ bhīṣaṇa ānanāḥ na gharmeṇa na śītena bādhyate sa naraḥ kvacid

original: śayyādānaprabhāveṇa preto mucyate bandhanāt / apiḥ pāpasamāyuktaḥ svargalokaṃ sa gacchati //
analyzed: śayyā dāna prabhāveṇa pretaḥ mucyate bandhanāt apiḥ pāpa samāyuktaḥ svarga lokam sa gacchati

original: vimānavaramārūḍhaḥ sevyamāno 'psarogaṇaiḥ / ābhūtasaṃplavaṃ yāvat tiṣṭhet pātakavarjitaḥ //
analyzed: vimāna varam ārūḍhaḥ psaraḥ gaṇaiḥ  ābhūtasaṃplavam yāvat tiṣṭhet pātaka varjitaḥ

original: navakaṃ ṣoḍaśaśrāddhaṃ śayyā sāṃvatsaraṃ tathā / bharturyā kurute nārī tasyāḥ śreyo hyanantakam //
analyzed: navakam ṣoḍaśa śrāddham śayyā sāṃvatsaram tathā bhartuḥ yā kurute nārī tasyāḥ śreyaḥ hi anantakam

original: upakārāya sā bharturjīvantī na mṛtā tathā / uddharejjīvamānā sā satī satyavatī priyam //
analyzed: upakārāya sā bhartuḥ jīvantī na mṛtā tathā  uddharet jīvamānā sā satī satyavatī priyam

original: striyā dadhyannaśayane hemakuṅkumamañjanam / vastrabhūṣā tathā śayyā sarvametaddhi dāpayet //
analyzed: striyāḥ dadhi anna śayane hema kuṅkumam añjanam vastra bhūṣā tathā śayyā sarvam etat hi dāpayet

original: upakārakaraṃ strīṇāṃ yadbhavodiha kiñcana / bhūṣaṇaṃ gātralagnañca vastu bhogyādikañca yat //
analyzed: upakāra karam strīṇām kiñcana  / bhūṣaṇam gātra lagnam ca vastu bhogya ādikañca yat

original: tat sarvaṃ melayitvā tu svesve sthāne niyojayet / pūjayellokapālāṃśca grahān devīṃ vināyakam //
analyzed: tat sarvam melayitvā tu sve sve sthāne niyojayet pūjayet lokapālān ca grahān devīm vināyakam

original: tataḥ śuklāmbaradharo gṛhītakusumāñjaliḥ / imamuccārayenmantraṃ viprasya purato budhaḥ //
analyzed: tatas śukla ambara dharaḥ gṛhīta kusuma añjaliḥ imam uccārayet mantram viprasya puratas budhaḥ

original: pretasya pratimā hyeṣā sarvopakaraṇairyutā / sarvaratnasamāyuktā tava vipraniveditā //
analyzed: pretasya pratimā hi eṣā sarva upakaraṇaiḥ yutā sarva ratna samāyuktā tava vipra niveditā

original: ātmā śambhuḥ śivā gaurī śakraḥ suragaṇaiḥ saha / tasmācchayyāpradānena saiṣa ātmā prasīdatu //
analyzed: ātmā śambhuḥ śivā gaurī śakraḥ sura gaṇaiḥ saha tasmāt śayyā pradānena sā eṣa ātmā prasīdatu

original: ācāryāya pradātavyā brāhmaṇāya kuṭumbine / gṛhīte brāhmaṇastatra ko 'dāditi ca kīrtayet //
analyzed: ācāryāya pradātavyāḥ brāhmaṇāya kuṭumbine gṛhīte brāhmaṇaḥ tatra kaḥ dāt iti ca kīrtayet

original: tataḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya praṇipatya visarjayet / vidhinānena vai pakṣin dānamekasya dāpayet //
analyzed: tatas pradakṣiṇīkṛtya praṇipatya visarjayet  vidhinā anena vai pakṣin dānam ekasya dāpayet

original: bahubhyo na pradeyāni gaurgṛhaṃ śayanaṃ striyaḥ / vibhaktadakṣiṇā hyete dātāraṃ pātayanti hi //
analyzed: bahubhyaḥ na pradeyāni gauḥ gṛham śayanam striyaḥ vibhakta dakṣiṇāḥ hi ete dātāram pātayanti hi

original: evaṃ yo vitaret tārkṣya śṛṇu tasya ca yat phalam / sāgraṃ varṣaśataṃ divyaṃ svargaloke mahīyate //
analyzed: evam yaḥ vitaret tārkṣya śṛṇu tasya ca yat phalam sāgram varṣa śatam divyam svarga loke mahīyate

original: yat puṇyantu vyatīpāte kārtikyāmayanadvaye / dvārakāyāntu yat puṇyaṃ candrasūryagrahe tathā //
analyzed: yat vyatīpāte kārtikyām ayana dvaye dvārakāyām tu yat puṇyam candra sūrya grahe tathā

original: prayāge naimiṣe yacca kurukṣetre tarthābude / gaṅgāyāṃ yamunāyāñca sindhusāgarasaṃgame //
analyzed: prayāge naimiṣe yat ca kurukṣetre tarthābude gaṅgāyām yamunāyām ca sindhu sāgara saṃgame

original: teṣu yaddīyate dānaṃ tasmādapyadhikantvidam / etacchayyāpradānasya nāpnoti ṣoḍaśīṃ kalām //
analyzed: teṣu yat dīyate dānam tasmāt api adhikam tu idam etat śayyā pradānasya na āpnoti ṣoḍaśīm kalām

original: yatrāsau jāyate prāṇī bhuṅkte tatraiva tat phalam / karmakṣaye kṣitau yāti mānuṣaḥ śubhadarśanaḥ //
analyzed: yatra asau jāyate prāṇī bhuṅkte tatra eva tat phalam karma kṣaye kṣitau yāti mānuṣaḥ śubha darśanaḥ

original: mahādhanī ca dharmajñaḥ sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ / punaḥ sa yāti vaikuṇṭhaṃ mṛto 'sau narapuṅgavaḥ //
analyzed: mahā dhanī ca dharma jñaḥ sarva śāstra viśāradaḥ punar sa yāti vaikuṇṭham nara puṅgavaḥ

original: divyaṃ vimānamāruhya apsarobhiḥ samāvṛtaḥ / aho 'sau havyakavyeṣu pitṛbhiḥ saha modate //
analyzed: divyam vimānam āruhya apsarobhiḥ samāvṛtaḥ aho sau havya kavyeṣu pitṛbhiḥ saha modate

original: aṣṭakāsu kṛtaṃ śrāddhamamāvāsyādine tathā / maghāsu pitṛparvāṇi yāniyāni ca teṣu ca //
analyzed: aṣṭakāsu kṛtam śrāddham amāvāsyā dine tathā maghāsu pitṛparvāṇi yāni yāni ca teṣu ca

original: śṛṇu tārkṣya yathānyāyaṃ pretatve pitaro yadi / nopatiṣṭhanti śrāddhāni sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ vinā //
analyzed: śṛṇu tārkṣya yathānyāyam preta tve pitaraḥ yadi na upatiṣṭhanti śrāddhāni sapiṇḍīkaraṇam vinā

original: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ pūrṇe varṣe na saṃśayaḥ / ādyantu śavaśuddhyarthaṃ kṛtvā caivākṣa ṣoḍaśīm //
analyzed: sapiṇḍīkaraṇam kāryam pūrṇe varṣe na saṃśayaḥ śava śuddhi artham kṛtvā ca eva akṣa ṣoḍaśīm

original: pitṛpāṅktiviśurdhyaṃ śatārdhena? tu yojayet / vṛddhiṃ prāpyāgrataḥ kuryācchūdrasya svacchayaiva hi //
analyzed: śatārdhena tu yojayet vṛddhim prāpya agratas kuryāt śūdrasya svacchayā eva hi

original: sāmprataṃ sāgnike kāryaṃ dvādaśāhe sapiṇḍanam / na cāsau kurute yāvat preta eva sa vahnimān / dvādaśāhe tataḥ kāryaṃ sāgnikena sapiṇḍanam //
analyzed: sāmpratam sa agnike kāryam dvādaśa ahe sapiṇḍanam na ca asau kurute yāvat pretaḥ eva sa vahnimān dvādaśa ahe tatas kāryam sa agnikena sapiṇḍanam

original: asthipokṣe gayāśrāddhaṃ śrāddhañcāparapakṣikam / abdamadhye na kurvīta sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ vinā //
analyzed: asthipokṣe gayāśrāddham śrāddham ca āparapakṣikam abda madhye na kurvīta sapiṇḍīkaraṇam vinā

original: sapatnyo yadi bahvyaḥ syurekā putravatī bhavet / sarvāstāḥ putravatyaḥ syustenaikenātmajena hi //
analyzed: sapatnyaḥ yadi bahvyaḥ syuḥ ekā putravatī bhavet sarvāḥ tāḥ putravatyaḥ syuḥ tena ekena ātmajena hi

original: nāsapiṇḍognimān putraḥ pitṛyajñaṃ samācaret / samācārādbhavet pāpī pitṛhā cāpi jāyate //
analyzed: na asapiṇḍa agnimān putraḥ pitṛ yajñam samācaret samācārāt bhavet pāpī pitṛ hā ca api jāyate

original: mṛte bhartari yā nārī prāṇāṃścaiva parityajet / bhartraiva hi samaṃ tasyāḥ prakurvīta sapiṇḍanam //
analyzed: mṛte bhartari yā nārī prāṇān ca eva parityajet bhartrā eva hi samam tasyāḥ prakurvīta sapiṇḍanam

original: asthānikāpi yā vyūḍhā vaiśyā vā kṣattriyāpi vā / yāḥ patnyo vai pituḥ kaścit kuryāt putraḥ sapiṇḍanam //
analyzed: asthānikā api yā vyūḍhā vaiśyā vā kṣattriyā api vā yāḥ patnyaḥ vai pituḥ kaścid kuryāt putraḥ sapiṇḍanam

original: vipreṇaiva yadā śūdrā pariṇītā pramādataḥ / ekoddiṣṭantu tacchrāddha sā tu tenaiva yujyate //
analyzed: vipreṇa eva yadā śūdrā pariṇītā pramādataḥ ekoddiṣṭam tu tat śrāddha sā tu tena eva yujyate

original: anye tu daśa ye putrā jātā varṇa catuṣṭaye / te tāsutāsu yoktvayāḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇe sadā //
analyzed: anye tu daśa ye putrāḥ jātā varṇa catuṣṭaye te sapiṇḍīkaraṇe sadā

original: anvaṣṭakāsu yacchrāddha yacchrāddhaṃ vṛddhihetukam / pituḥ pṛthak pradāvyaṃ striyāḥ piṇḍaṃ sapiṇḍane //
analyzed: anvaṣṭakāsu yat śrāddha yat śrāddham vṛddhi hetukam pituḥ pṛthak pradāvyam striyāḥ piṇḍam sapiṇḍane

original: pitāmahyā samaṃ mātuḥ pituḥ sahapitāmahaiḥ / sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryamiti tārkṣya mataṃ mama //
analyzed: pitāmahyā samam mātuḥ pituḥ saha pitāmahaiḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇam kāryam iti tārkṣya matam mama

original: aputrāyāṃ mṛtāyāṃ tu patiḥ kuryāt sapiṇḍanam / mātrāditisṛbhiḥ sārdhamevaṃ dharmeṇa yojayet //
analyzed: aputrāyām mṛtāyām tu patiḥ kuryāt sapiṇḍanam mātrāt itisṛbhiḥ sārdham evam dharmeṇa yojayet

original: putro nāsti na bhartā ca strīṇāṃ tārkṣya sapiṇḍanam / kārayedvṛddhisamaye bhrātṛdāyādadevaraiḥ //
analyzed: putraḥ nā asti na bhartā ca strīṇām tārkṣya sapiṇḍanam kārayet vṛddhi samaye bhrātṛ dāyāda devaraiḥ

original: patiputravihīnānāṃ gotrī nāsti na devaraḥ / ekoddiṣṭena dātavyaṃ pareṇa saha bhrātṛbhiḥ //
analyzed: pati putra vihīnānām gotrī na asti na devaraḥ ekoddiṣṭena dātavyam pareṇa saha bhrātṛbhiḥ

original: ajñānādvighnato vāpi na kṛtañcet sapiṇḍanam / navakaṃ ṣoḍaśaśrāddhamābdikaṃ kārayet tataḥ //
analyzed: ajñānāt vighnataḥ vā api na kṛtam ced sapiṇḍanam navakam ṣoḍaśaśrāddham ābdikam kārayet tatas

original: adāhe na ca kartavyaṃ sadāhe kārayedbudhaḥ / darbhaputtalakaṃ kṛtvā vahninā dāhayecchavam //
analyzed: adāhe na ca kartavyam sa dāhe kārayet budhaḥ darbha puttalakam kṛtvā vahninā dāhayet śavam

original: pituḥ putreṇa kartavyaṃ na kurbvīta pitā sute / atisnehānna kartavyaṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ sate //
analyzed: pituḥ putreṇa kartavyam na kurbvīta pitā sute  atisnehāt na kartavyam sapiṇḍīkaraṇam sate

original: bahavo 'pi yadā putrā vidhimekaḥ samācaret / navaśrāddhaṃ sapiṇḍatvaṃ śrāddhānyanyāni ṣoḍaśa //
analyzed: bahavaḥ yadā putrāḥ vidhim ekaḥ samācaret navaśrāddham sapiṇḍa tvam śrāddhāni anyāni ṣoḍaśa

original: ekenaiva tu kāryāṃṇi avibhaktadhaneṣvapi / antyeṣṭiṃ kurute hyeko munibhaiḥ samudāhṛtam //
analyzed: ekena eva tu kāryāṃṇi avibhakta dhaneṣu api antyeṣṭim kurute hi ekaḥ muni bhaiḥ samudāhṛtam

original: vibhaktaiśca pṛthak kāryā kriyā sāṃvatsarādikā / ekaikena ca kartavyā putreṇa ca svayaṃsvayam //
analyzed: vibhaktaiḥ ca pṛthak kāryā kriyā sāṃvatsara ādikā ekaikena ca kartavyā putreṇa ca svayam svayam

original: yasyaitāni na dattāni pretaśrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa / piśācatvaṃsthiraṃ tasya kṛtaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi //
analyzed: yasya etāni na dattāni preta śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa piśāca tvam sthiram tasya kṛtaiḥ śrāddha śataiḥ api

original: bhrātā vā bhrātṛputro vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣya eva vā / sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kuryāt putrahīne khageśvara //
analyzed: bhrātā vā bhrātṛ putraḥ vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣyaḥ eva vā sapiṇḍīkaraṇam kuryāt putra hīne khageśvara

original: sarveṣāṃ putrahīnānāṃ patrī kuryāt sapiṇḍanam / ṛtvijaṃ karāyedvātha purohitamathāpi vā //
analyzed: sarveṣām putra hīnānām patrī kuryāt sapiṇḍanam ṛtvijam karāyet vā atha purohitam atha api vā

original: mṛte pitaryabdamadhye hyuparāgo yadā bhavet / pārvaṇaṃ na sutaiḥ kāryaṃ śrāddhaṃ nāndīmukhaṃ na ca //
analyzed: mṛte pitari abda madhye hi uparāgaḥ yadā bhavet pārvaṇam na sutaiḥ kāryam śrāddham nāndīmukham na ca

original: tīrthaśrāddhaṃ gayāśrāddhaṃ śrāddhamanyacca paitṛkam / abdamadhye na kurvīta mahāguruvipattiṣu //
analyzed: tīrtha śrāddham gayā śrāddham śrāddham anyat ca paitṛkam abda madhye na kurvīta mahā guru vipattiṣu

original: yamake ca gajacchāyāmanvādiṣu yugādiṣu / pitṛpiṇḍo na dātavyaḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ vinā //
analyzed: yamake ca gajacchāyā manu ādiṣu yuga ādiṣu pitṛ piṇḍaḥ na dātavyaḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇam vinā

original: yajñapuruṣasya yaddānaṃ devādīnāñca yat tathā / apūrṇe 'pyabdamadhyepi kartavyamiti ke ca na //
analyzed: yajñapuruṣasya yat dānam deva ādīnām ca yat tathā apūrṇe pi abda madhye pi kartavyam iti ke ca na

original: pitṛbhyopi hi yaddattamarghapiṇḍavivarjitam / kartavyaṃ tacca vai sarvameṣa eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: pitṛbhyaḥ api hi yat dattam argha piṇḍa vivarjitam kartavyam tat ca vai sarvam eṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: devānāṃ pitaro devā pitṝṇāmṛṣayastathā / ṛṣīṇāṃ pitaro devāḥ pitā jayati tena vai //
analyzed: devānām pitaraḥ devāḥ pitṝṇām ṛṣayaḥ tathā ṛṣīṇām pitaraḥ devāḥ pitā jayati tena vai

original: pitṛdevamanuṣyāṇāṃ yajñanatho vibhurbhavet / yajñanāthasya yaddattaṃ taddattaṃ sarvadehinām //
analyzed: pitṛ deva manuṣyāṇām yajñanathaḥ vibhuḥ bhavet yajñanāthasya yat dattam tat dattam sarva dehinām

original: mṛte pitaryabdamadhye yaḥ śrāddhaṃ kārayet sutaḥ / saptajanmakṛtā dharmāt hīyate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: mṛte pitari abda madhye yaḥ śrāddham kārayet sutaḥ sapta janma kṛtā dharmāt hīyate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: pretībhūtāstu pitaro luptapiṇḍodakakriyāḥ / bhramanti vāyunā sarve kṣuttṛḍbhyāṃ paripīḍitāḥ //
analyzed: pretībhūtāḥ tu pitaraḥ lupta piṇḍa udaka kriyāḥ bhramanti vāyunā sarve kṣudh tṛḍbhyām paripīḍitāḥ

original: pitari pretatāpanne lupyate paitṛkī kriyā / atha māturvipattiḥ syāt pitṛkāryaṃ na lupyate //
analyzed: pitari preta tā āpanne lupyate paitṛkī kriyā atha mātuḥ vipattiḥ syāt pitṛ kāryam na lupyate

original: mṛtā mātā pitā tiṣṭhejjīvantī ca pitāmahī / sapiṇḍanantu kartavyaṃ pitāmahyā sahaiva tu //
analyzed: mṛtā mātā pitā tiṣṭhet jīvantī ca pitāmahī sapiṇḍanam tu kartavyam pitāmahyā saha eva tu

original: satyaṃsatyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama / na piṇḍo milito yeṣāṃ mṛtānāntu nṛṇāṃ bhuvi //
analyzed: satyam satyam punar satyam śrūyatām vacanam mama na piṇḍaḥ militaḥ yeṣām mṛtānām tu nṛṇām bhuvi

original: upatiṣṭhenna ve teṣāṃ putrairdattamanekadhā / hantakārastaduddeśe śrāddhaṃ naiva jalāñjaliḥ //
analyzed: upatiṣṭhet na teṣām putraiḥ dattam anekadhā hantakāraḥ tad uddeśe śrāddham na eva jala añjaliḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde aurdhvadehikādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde aurdhvadehikādinirūpaṇam nāma catustriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 35
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: tarkṣya uvāca / aparaṃ mama sandehaṃ kathayasva janārdana / puruṣasya ca kasyāpi matā pañcatvamāgatā //
analyzed: tarkṣyaḥ uvāca aparam mama sandeham kathayasva janārdana puruṣasya ca kasya api matā pañcatvam āgatā

original: pitāmahī jīvati ca tathā ca prapitāmahī / vṛddhaprapitāmahī tadvanmātṛsaktaḥ pitā tathā //
analyzed: pitāmahī jīvati ca tathā ca prapitāmahī vṛddhaprapitāmahī tadvat mātṛ saktaḥ pitā tathā

original: pramātāmahaśca tathā vṛddhapramātāmahastathā / kena sā melyate mātā etat kathaya me prabho //
analyzed: pramātāmahaḥ ca tathā vṛddhapramātāmahaḥ tathā  kena sā melyate mātā etat kathaya me prabho

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / punaruktaṃ pravakṣyāmi sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ khaga / umā lakṣmīśca sāvitrītyatābhirmelayeddhruvam //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca punar uktam pravakṣyāmi sapiṇḍīkaraṇam khaga umā lakṣmīḥ ca sāvitrī iti atābhiḥ melayet dhruvam

original: trayaḥ piṇḍabhujo jñeyāstyajākāśca trayaḥ smṛtāḥ / trayaḥ piṇḍānulepāśca daśamaḥ paṅktisaṃnnidhaḥ //
analyzed: trayaḥ piṇḍa bhujaḥ jñeyāḥ tyajākāḥ ca trayaḥ smṛtāḥ trayaḥ piṇḍa anulepāḥ ca daśamaḥ paṅkti saṃnnidhaḥ

original: ityete puruṣāḥ khyātāḥ pitṛmātṛkuleṣu ca / tārayedyajamānastu daśa pūrvān daśāvarān //
analyzed: iti ete puruṣāḥ khyātāḥ pitṛ mātṛ kuleṣu ca  tārayet yajamānaḥ tu daśa pūrvān daśa avarān

original: sapiṇḍaḥ sa bhavedādau sapiṇḍīkaraṇe kṛte / antyastu tyājako jñeyo yo vṛddhaprapitāmahaḥ //
analyzed: sapiṇḍaḥ sa bhavet ādau sapiṇḍīkaraṇe kṛte antyaḥ tu tyājakaḥ jñeyaḥ yaḥ vṛddhaprapitāmahaḥ

original: antimastyājako jñeyo lepakaḥ prathamo bhavet / lepakastvantimo yastu sa bhavet paṅktisannidhaḥ //
analyzed: antimaḥ tyājakaḥ jñeyaḥ lepakaḥ prathamaḥ bhavet lepakaḥ tu antimaḥ yaḥ tu sa bhavet paṅkti sannidhaḥ

original: yajamāno bhavedeko daśa pṛrtve daśāvare / ityete pitaro jñeyā ekaviṃśati saṃkhyakāḥ //
analyzed: yajamānaḥ bhavet ekaḥ daśa daśa avare iti ete pitaraḥ jñeyāḥ ekaviṃśati saṃkhyakāḥ

original: vidhinā kurute yastu saṃsāre śrāddhamuttamam / jāyate 'tra na sandehaḥ śṛṇu tasyāpi yat phalam //
analyzed: vidhinā kurute yaḥ tu saṃsāre śrāddham uttamam jāyate na sandehaḥ śṛṇu tasya api yat phalam

original: pitā dadāti puttrān vai vicchinnasantatiḥ khaga / homadātā bhavetsopi yastasya prapitāmahaḥ //
analyzed: pitā dadāti puttrān vai vicchinna santatiḥ khaga homa dātā bhavet saḥ api yaḥ tasya prapitāmahaḥ

original: kṛte śrāddhe guṇā hyete pitṝṇāṃ tapeṇe smṛtāḥ / dadyādvipulamannādyaṃ vṛddhastu prapitāmahaḥ //
analyzed: kṛte śrāddhe guṇāḥ hi ete pitṝṇām smṛtāḥ dadyāt vipulam annādyam vṛddhaḥ tu prapitāmahaḥ

original: yasya puṃsaśca martye vai vicchinnā santatiḥ khaga / sa vasennarake ghore paṅke magnaḥ karī yathā //
analyzed: yasya puṃsaḥ ca martye vai vicchinnā santatiḥ khaga sa vaset narake ghore paṅke magnaḥ karī yathā

original: yonyantareṣu jāyate yatra vṛkṣasarīsṛpāḥ / na santatiṃ vinā so 'tra mucyate narakāddhruvam //
analyzed: yoni antareṣu jāyate yatra vṛkṣa sarīsṛpāḥ  na santatim vinā mucyate narakāt dhruvam

original: ācāryastasya śiṣyo vā yo dūre 'pi hi gātrejaḥ / nārāyaṇabaliṃ kuryāt tasyāddeśena bhaktitaḥ //
analyzed: ācāryaḥ tasya śiṣyaḥ vā yaḥ dūre hi gātra ījaḥ nārāyaṇa balim kuryāt bhaktitaḥ

original: viśuddhaḥ sarvapāpebhyo muktaḥ sa narakāddhruvam / nivasennākaloke ca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: viśuddhaḥ sarva pāpebhyaḥ muktaḥ sa narakāt dhruvam nivaset nāka loke ca na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: ādau kṛtvā dhaniṣṭhāñca etannakṣatrapañcakam / revatyantaṃ sadā dūṣyamaśubhaṃ sarvadā bhavet //
analyzed: ādau kṛtvā dhaniṣṭhān ca etat nakṣatra pañcakam revatī antam sadā dūṣyam aśubham sarvadā bhavet

original: dāha (bali) statra na kartavyo vipradisarvajātiṣu / dīyate na jalaṃ tatra aśubhaṃ jāyate dhruvam / lokayātrā na kartavyā duḥ khārtaḥ svajano yadi //
analyzed: dāha baliḥ tatra na kartavyaḥ dīyate na jalam tatra aśubham jāyate dhruvam lokayātrā na kartavyā dus kha ārtaḥ sva janaḥ yadi

original: pañcakānantaraṃ tasya kartavyaṃ sarvamanyathā / putrāṇāṃ gotriṇāṃ tasya santāpo 'pyupajāyate //
analyzed: pañcaka anantaram tasya kartavyam sarvam anyathā putrāṇām gotriṇām tasya santāpaḥ upi upajāyate

original: gṛhe hānirbhavettasya ṛkṣeṣveṣu mṛtaśca yaḥ / athavā ṛkṣamadhye 'pi dāhastasya vidhīyate //
analyzed: gṛhe hāniḥ bhavet tasya ṛkṣeṣu eṣu mṛtaḥ ca yaḥ athavā ṛkṣa madhye dāhaḥ tasya vidhīyate

original: kriyate mānuṣāṇāntu sadya āhutikāraṇāt / sadyāhutikaraṃ puṇyaṃ tīrthe taddāha uttamaḥ //
analyzed: kriyate mānuṣāṇām tu sadyas āhuti kāraṇāt sadyas āhuti karam puṇyam tīrthe tad dāhaḥ uttamaḥ

original: viprairniyamataḥ kāryaḥ samantro vidhipūrvakaḥ / śavasya ca samīpe tu kṣipyante puttalāstataḥ //
analyzed: vipraiḥ niyamatas kāryaḥ sa mantraḥ vidhi pūrvakaḥ śavasya ca samīpe tu kṣipyante puttalāḥ tatas

original: darbhamayāśca catvāro viprā mantrābhimantritāḥ / tato dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ taiśca puttalakaiḥ saha //
analyzed: darbha mayāḥ ca catvāraḥ viprāḥ mantra abhimantritāḥ tatas dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ taiḥ ca puttalakaiḥ saha

original: sūtakānte tataḥ putraḥ kuryācchāntikamuttamam //
analyzed: sūtaka ante tatas putraḥ kuryāt śāntikam uttamam

original: pañcakeṣu mṛto yo 'sau na gatiṃ labhate naraḥ / tilān gāśca suvarṇaṃ ca tamuddiśya ghṛtaṃ dadet //
analyzed: pañcakeṣu mṛtaḥ sau na gatim labhate naraḥ tilān gāḥ ca suvarṇam ca tam uddiśya ghṛtam dadet

original: viprāṇāṃ dīyate dānaṃ sarvopadravanāśanam / sūtakānte ca satputraiḥ sa preto labhate gatim //
analyzed: viprāṇām dīyate dānam sarva upadrava nāśanam sūtaka ante ca sat putraiḥ sa pretaḥ labhate gatim

original: bhājanopānahau cchatraṃ hemamudrāca vāsasī / dakṣiṇā dīyate vipra sarvapātakamocanī //
analyzed: bhājana upānahau chatram hema mudrā ca vāsasī dakṣiṇā dīyate vipra sarva pātaka mocanī

original: bālavṛddhāturāṇāñca mṛtānāṃ pañcakeṣu hi / vidhānaṃ yo na kurvīta vighnastasya prajāyate //
analyzed: bāla vṛddha āturāṇām ca mṛtānām pañcakeṣu hi vidhānam yaḥ na kurvīta vighnaḥ tasya prajāyate

original: aṣṭādaśaiva vastūni pretaśrāddhe vivarjayet / āśiṣo dviguṇān darbhān praṇavān naikapiṇḍatām //
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa eva vastūni preta śrāddhe vivarjayet āśiṣaḥ dviguṇān darbhān praṇavān na eka piṇḍa tām

original: agnaukaraṇamucchiṣṭaṃ śrāddhaṃ vai vaiśvadaivikam / vikiraṃ ca svadhākāraṃ pitṛśabdaṃ na coccaret //
analyzed: agnaukaraṇam ucchiṣṭam śrāddham vai vaiśvadaivikam vikiram ca svadhākāram pitṛ śabdam na ca uccaret

original: anuśabdaṃ na kurvīta nāvāhanamatholmukam / āsīmāntaṃ na kurvīta pradakṣiṇavisarjanam //
analyzed: anuśabdam na kurvīta na āvāhanam atha ulmukam  āsīmāntam na kurvīta pradakṣiṇa visarjanam

original: na kuryāt tilahomañca dvijaḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ tathā / na kuryādvaiśvadevaṃ cetkartā gacchatyadhogatim //
analyzed: na kuryāt tila homan ca dvijaḥ pūrṇāhutim tathā na kuryāt vaiśvadevam ced kartā gacchati adhogatim

original: malinaśrāddhasaṃjñānaṃ pūrvaṣoḍaśakaṃ tathā / sthāne dvāre cārdhamārge citāyāṃ śavahastake //
analyzed: malina śrāddha saṃjñānam pūrva ṣoḍaśakam tathā sthāne dvāre ca ardha mārge citāyām śava hastake

original: śmaśānavāsibhūtebhyaḥ pañcamaṃ prativeśyakam / ṣaṣṭhaṃ sañcayane proktaṃ daśa piṇḍā daśāhikāḥ / śrāddhaṣoḍaṣakañcaitat prathamaṃ parikīrtitam //
analyzed: śmaśāna vāsi bhūtebhyaḥ pañcamam prativeśyakam ṣaṣṭham sañcayane proktam daśa piṇḍāḥ daśa āhikāḥ śrāddha ṣoḍaṣakam ca etat prathamam parikīrtitam

original: anyacca ṣoḍaśaṃ madhye dvitīyaṃ tārkṣya me śṛṇu / kartavyānīha vidhinā śrāddhānyekādaśaiva tu //
analyzed: anyat ca ṣoḍaśam madhye dvitīyam tārkṣya me śṛṇu kartavyāni iha vidhinā śrāddhāni ekādaśa eva tu

original: brahmaviṣṇuśivādyañca tathānyacchrāddhapañcakam / evaṃ ṣoḍaśakaṃ prāhuretat tattvavido janāḥ //
analyzed: brahma viṣṇu śiva ādyam ca tathā anyat śrāddha pañcakam evam ṣoḍaśakam prāhuḥ etat tattva vidaḥ janāḥ

original: dvādaśa pratimāsyāni śrāddhamekādaśe tathā / tripakṣasambhavañcaiva dve rikte khaga ṣoḍaśa //
analyzed: dvādaśa pratimāsyāni śrāddham ekādaśe tathā tri pakṣa sambhavam ca eva dve rikte khaga ṣoḍaśa

original: ādyaṃ śavaviśuddhyarthaṃ kṛtvānyacca triṣoḍaśam / pitṛpāṅktiviśuddhyarthaṃ śatāddhaiṃna tu yojayet //
analyzed: ādyam śava viśuddhi artham kṛtvā anyat ca tri ṣoḍaśam pitṛ pāṅkti viśuddhi artham tu yojayet

original: śatārdhena vihīno yo militaḥ paṅktibhāṅna hi / catvāriṃśat tathaivāṣṭaśrāddhaṃ pretatvanāśanam //
analyzed: śatārdhena vihīnaḥ yaḥ militaḥ paṅkti bhāj na hi catvāriṃśat tathā eva aṣṭa śrāddham preta tva nāśanam

original: sakṛdūnaśatārdhena sambhavet paṅktisannidhaḥ / melanīyaḥ śatārdhena sandhiḥ śrāddhena tattvataḥ //
analyzed: sakṛt ūna śata ardhena sambhavet paṅkti sannidhaḥ  melanīyaḥ śata ardhena sandhiḥ śrāddhena tattvataḥ

original: (atha śavāvidhiḥ) / śavasya śibikāyāṃ karacaraṇabandhanaṃ tatra kartavyam / evaṃ cenna vidhānaṃ vidhīyate tatpiśācaparibhavanam //
analyzed: atha śavā vidhiḥ śavasya śibikāyām kara caraṇa bandhanam tatra kartavyam evam ced na vidhānam vidhīyate tat piśāca paribhavanam

original: saṃjāyate rajanyāñca śavanirgamane rāṣṭraṃ bhayaśūnyam / śavaṃ na muñceta mucyate cet duḥ sparśāddurgatirbhavet //
analyzed: saṃjāyate rajanyāt ca śava nirgamane rāṣṭram bhaya śūnyam śavam na muñceta mucyate ced duḥ sparśāt durgatiḥ bhavet

original: grāmamadhye sthite prete śrute bhuṅkte yadṛcchayā / tadannaṃ māṃsavajjñeyaṃ tattoyaṃ rudhiropamam //
analyzed: grāma madhye sthite prete śrute bhuṅkte yadṛcchayā tat annam māṃsa vat jñeyam tat toyam rudhira upamam

original: tāmbūlaṃ dantakāṣṭhañca bhojanaṃ ṛtusevanam / grāmamadhye sthite prete varjayet piṇḍapātanam //
analyzed: tāmbūlam dantakāṣṭham ca bhojanam ṛtu sevanam grāma madhye sthite prete varjayet piṇḍapātanam

original: snānaṃ dānaṃ japo homastarpaṇaṃ surapūjanam / grāmamadhye sthite prete śuddhyarthaṃ jñātidharmataḥ //
analyzed: snānam dānam japaḥ homaḥ tarpaṇam sura pūjanam grāma madhye sthite prete śuddhi artham jñāti dharmataḥ

original: jñātisambandhināmevaṃ vyavahāraḥ khageśvara / vilupya jñātidharmañca pretapāpena lipyate //
analyzed: jñāti sambandhinām evam vyavahāraḥ khageśvara vilupya jñāti dharmam ca preta pāpena lipyate

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dhadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde sapiṇḍanaśavavidhyornirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde sapiṇḍanaśavavidhyornirūpaṇam nāma pañcatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 36
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: tārkṣyauvāca / kasmādanaśanaṃ puṇyamakṣayyagatidāyakam / svagṛhantu parityajya tīrthe vai mriyate yadi //
analyzed: tārkṣyā uvāca kasmāt anaśanam puṇyam akṣayya gati dāyakam sva gṛham tu parityajya tīrthe vai mriyate yadi

original: aprāpya tīrthaṃ mriyate gṛhe vā mṛtyu māgataḥ / būtvā kuṭīcaro yastu sa kāṃ gatimavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: a prāpya tīrtham mriyate gṛhe vā mṛtyu mā āgataḥ būtvā kuṭī caraḥ yaḥ tu sa kām gatim avāpnuyāt

original: saṃnyāsaṃ kurute yastu tīrthe vāpi gṛhe 'pi vā / kathaṃ tasya prakartavyamaprāptanidhane 'pi vā //
analyzed: saṃnyāsam kurute yaḥ tu tīrthe vā api gṛhe vā  katham tasya prakartavyam aprāpta nidhane vā

original: niyame cet kṛte deva cittabhaṅgo hi jāyate / kena tasya bhavet siddhiḥ kṛtenāpyakṛtena vā //
analyzed: niyame ced kṛte deva citta bhaṅgaḥ hi jāyate kena tasya bhavet siddhiḥ kṛtena api akṛtena vā

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / kṛtvā niraśanaṃ yo vai mṛtyumāpnoti ko 'pi cet / mānupīṃ tanumutsṛjya mama tulyo virājate //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca kṛtvā niraśanam yaḥ vai mṛtyum āpnoti kaḥ ced mānupīm tanum utsṛjya mama tulyaḥ virājate

original: yāvantyahāni jīvet vrate niraśane kṛte / kratubhistāni tulyāni samagravadakṣiṇaiḥ //
analyzed: yāvanti ahāni jīvet vrate niraśane kṛte kratubhiḥ tāni tulyāni samagra vat akṣiṇaiḥ

original: tīrthe gṛhe vā saṃnyāsaṃ nītvā cenmriyate yadi / pratyahaṃ labhate so 'pi pūrvoktaṃ dviguṇaṃ phalam //
analyzed: tīrthe gṛhe vā saṃnyāsam nītvā ced mriyate yadi pratyaham labhate pūrva uktam dviguṇam phalam

original: mahārogopapattau ca gṛhīte 'naśane kṛte / punarna jāyate rogo devavaddhi virājate //
analyzed: mahā roga upapattau ca gṛhīte naśane kṛte punar na jāyate rogaḥ deva vat hi virājate

original: ya āturaḥ san sannyāsaṃ gṛhṇāti yadi mānavaḥ / punarna jāyate bhūmau saṃsāre duḥ khasāgare //
analyzed: yaḥ āturaḥ san sannyāsam gṛhṇāti yadi mānavaḥ punar na jāyate bhūmau saṃsāre duḥ kha sāgare

original: ahanyahani dātavyaṃ brāhmaṇānāñca bhojanam / tilapātraṃ yathāśakti dīpadānaṃ surārcanam //
analyzed: ahani ahani dātavyam brāhmaṇānām ca bhojanam tila pātram yathāśakti dīpa dānam sura arcanam

original: evaṃ vṛttasya dahyante pāpānyuccāvacāni ca / mṛto muktimavāpnoti yathā sarve maharṣayaḥ //
analyzed: evam vṛttasya dahyante pāpāni uccāvacāni ca  mṛtaḥ muktim avāpnoti yathā sarve mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: tasmādanaśanaṃ nṝṇāṃ vaikuṇṭhapadadāyakam / tasmāt svasthe cottare vā sādhayenmokṣalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: tasmāt anaśanam nṝṇām vaikuṇṭha pada dāyakam  tasmāt svasthe ca uttare vā sādhayet mokṣa lakṣaṇam

original: puttradravyādi santyajya tīrthaṃ vrajati yo naraḥ / brahmādyā devatāstasya bhaveyustuṣṭipuṣṭidāḥ //
analyzed: puttra dravya ādi santyajya tīrtham vrajati yaḥ naraḥ brahma ādyāḥ devatāḥ tasya bhaveyuḥ tuṣṭi puṣṭi dāḥ

original: yastīrthasaṃmukho bhūtvā vrate hyanaśane kṛte / cenmriyetāntarāle 'pi ṛṣīṇāṃ maṇḍale vaset //
analyzed: yaḥ tīrtha saṃmukhaḥ bhūtvā vrate hi anaśane kṛte ced mriyeta antarāle ṛṣīṇām maṇḍale vaset

original: vrataṃ niraśana kṛtvā svagṛhe 'pi mṛto yadi / svakulāni parityajya ekākī vicareddivi //
analyzed: vratam kṛtvā sva gṛhe mṛtaḥ yadi sva kulāni parityajya ekākī vicaret divi

original: annañcaiva tathā toyaṃ parityajya naro yadi / pītamatpādatoyaśca na punarjāyate kṣitau //
analyzed: annam ca eva tathā toyam parityajya naraḥ yadi pīta mad pāda toyaḥ ca na punar jāyate kṣitau

original: kṛttyāsīnantattīrthagataṃ rakṣanti vanadevatāḥ / yamadūtā viśeṣeṇa na yāmyāstasya pārśvagāḥ //
analyzed: kṛtti āsīnam tad tīrtha gatam rakṣanti vana devatāḥ yamadūtāḥ viśeṣeṇa na yāmyāḥ tasya pārśva gāḥ

original: tīrthasevī naro yastu sarvakilbiṣavarjitaḥ / tatra mriyate dahyeta tattīrthaphalabhāgbhavet //
analyzed: tīrtha sevī naraḥ yaḥ tu sarva kilbiṣa varjitaḥ tatra mriyate dahyeta tad tīrtha phala bhāj bhavet

original: sevite 'pi sadā tathi hyanyatra mriyate yadi / śubhe deśe kule dhīmān sa bhavedvedaviddvijaḥ //
analyzed: sevite sadā hi anyatra mriyate yadi śubhe deśe kule dhīmān sa bhavet veda vid dvijaḥ
