original: kṛtvā niraśanaṃ tārkṣya punarjīvati mānavaḥ / brāhmaṇān sa samāhūya sarvasvaṃ yat parityajet //
analyzed: kṛtvā niraśanam tārkṣya punar jīvati mānavaḥ brāhmaṇān sa samāhūya sarva svam yat parityajet

original: cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret kṛtsnamanujñātaśca tairdvijaiḥ / anṛtaṃ na vadet paścāddharmameva samācaret //
analyzed: cāndrāyaṇam caret kṛtsnam anujñātaḥ ca taiḥ dvijaiḥ anṛtam na vadet paścāt dharmam eva samācaret

original: tīrthe gatvā ca yaḥ ko 'pi punarāyāti vai gṛham / anujñātaḥ sa vai vipraiḥ prāyaścittamathācaret //
analyzed: tīrthe gatvā ca yaḥ punar āyāti vai gṛham anujñātaḥ sa vai vipraiḥ prāyaścittam atha ācaret

original: dattvā vā svarṇadānāni go-mahī-gaja-vājinaḥ / tīrthaṃ yadi labhed yastu mṛtyukāle sa bhāgyavān //
analyzed: dattvā vā svarṇa dānāni go mahī gaja vājinaḥ tīrtham yadi labhet yaḥ tu mṛtyu kāle sa bhāgyavān

original: gṛhāt pracalitastīrthaṃ maraṇe samupasthite / padepade tu godānaṃ yadi hiṃsā na jāyate //
analyzed: gṛhāt pracalitaḥ tīrtham maraṇe samupasthite pade pade tu go dānam yadi hiṃsā na jāyate

original: gṛhe tu yat kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tīrthasnānena śudhyati / kurute tatra pāpañcedvajralepasamaṃ hi tat //
analyzed: gṛhe tu yat kṛtam pāpam tīrtha snānena śudhyati kurute tatra pāpam ced vajra lepa samam hi tat

original: kliśyet sa nātra sandeho yāvaccandrārkatārakam / tatra dattāni dānāni jāyante cākṣayāṇi vai //
analyzed: kliśyet sa na atra sandehaḥ yāvat candra arka tārakam tatra dattāni dānāni jāyante ca akṣayāṇi vai

original: āture sati dātavyaṃ nirdhanairapi mānavaiḥ / gāvastilā hiraṇyañca saptadhānyaṃ viśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: āture sati dātavyam nirdhanaiḥ api mānavaiḥ gāvaḥ tilāḥ hiraṇyam ca saptadhānyam viśeṣataḥ

original: dānavantaṃ naraṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭāḥ sarve divaukasaḥ / ṛṣibhiḥ saha dharmaṇa citraguptena sarvadā //
analyzed: dānavantam naram dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭāḥ sarve divaukasaḥ ṛṣibhiḥ saha dharmaṇa citraguptena sarvadā

original: ātmāyattaṃ dhanaṃ yāvat tāvadvipre samarpayet / parādhīnaṃ mṛte sarvaṃ kṛpayā kaḥ pradāsyati //
analyzed: ātma āyattam dhanam yāvat tāvat vipre samarpayet para adhīnam mṛte sarvam kṛpayā kaḥ pradāsyati

original: pitruddeśena yaḥ puttrairdhanaṃ viprakare 'rpitam / ātmānaṃ sadhanaṃ tena cakre putraprapautrakaiḥ //
analyzed: pitṛ uddeśena yaḥ puttraiḥ dhanam vipra kare rpitam ātmānam sa dhanam tena cakre putra prapautrakaiḥ

original: pituḥ śataguṇaṃ dattaṃ sahasraṃ māturucyate / bhaginyā śatasāhasraṃ sodarye dattamakṣayam //
analyzed: pituḥ śataguṇam dattam sahasram mātuḥ ucyate bhaginyā śata sāhasram sodarye dattam akṣayam

original: yadi lobhānna yacchanti pramādānmohato 'pi vā / mṛtāḥ śocanti te sarve kadaryāḥ pāpinastviti //
analyzed: yadi lobhāt na yacchanti pramādāt mohataḥ vā mṛtāḥ śocanti te sarve kadaryāḥ pāpinaḥ tu iti

original: atikleśena labdhasya prakṛtyā cañcalasya ca / gatirekaiva vittasya dānamanyā vipattayaḥ //
analyzed: ati kleśena labdhasya prakṛtyā cañcalasya ca gatiḥ ekā eva vittasya dānam anyāḥ vipattayaḥ

original: mṛtyuḥ śarīgoptāraṃ vasurakṣaṃ vasundharā / duścāriṇīva hasati svapatiṃ putravatsalam //
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ śarī goptāram vasu rakṣam vasundharā duścāriṇī iva hasati sva patim putra vatsalam

original: udāse dhārmikaḥ saumyaḥ prāpyāpi vipulaṃ dhanam / tṛṇavanmanyate tārkṣya ātmānaṃ vittamapyatha //
analyzed: udāse dhārmikaḥ saumyaḥ prāpya api vipulam dhanam tṛṇa vat manyate tārkṣyaḥ ātmānam vittam api atha

original: na caivopadravāstasya mohajālo na caiva hi / mṛtyukāle na ca bhayaṃ yamadūtasamudbhavam //
analyzed: na ca eva upadravāḥ tasya moha jālaḥ na ca eva hi mṛtyu kāle na ca bhayam yama dūta samudbhavam

original: samāḥ sahasrāṇi ca sapta vai jale daśaikamagnau pavane ca ṣoḍaśa / mahāhave paṣṭiraśītirgogṛhe anāśake kāśyapa cākṣayā gatiḥ //
analyzed: samāḥ sahasrāṇi ca sapta vai jale daśa ekam agnau pavane ca ṣoḍaśa mahā āhave paṣṭiḥ aśītiḥ go gṛhe anāśake kāśyapa ca akṣayā gatiḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'naśanamṛta gatinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde naśanamṛta gatinirūpaṇam nāma ṣaṭtriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 37
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: tārkṣya uvāca / udakumbhapradānaṃ me kathayasva yathātatham / vidhinā kena kartavyā kṛtireṣā janārdana //
analyzed: tārkṣyaḥ uvāca uda kumbha pradānam me kathayasva yathātatham vidhinā kena kartavyā kṛtiḥ eṣā janārdana

original: kiṃlakṣaṇāḥ kena pūrṇāḥ kasya deyā janārdana / kasmin kāle pradātavyā pretatṛptiprasādhakāḥ //
analyzed: kiṃlakṣaṇāḥ kena pūrṇāḥ kasya deyāḥ janārdana kasmin kāle pradātavyā preta tṛpti prasādhakāḥ

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / satyaṃ punaḥ pravakṣyāmi udakumbhapradānakam / pretoddeśena dātavyā annapānīyasaṃyutāḥ / viśeṣeṇa mahāpakṣin pretamuktipradāyakāḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca satyam punar pravakṣyāmi udakumbha pradānakam preta uddeśena dātavyāḥ anna pānīya saṃyutāḥ viśeṣeṇa mahā pakṣin preta mukti pradāyakāḥ

original: dvādaśāhe ca paṇmāse traipakṣe vāpi vatsare / udakumbhāḥ pradātavyā mārge tasya sukhāya vai //
analyzed: dvādaśa ahe ca paṣ māse traipakṣe vā api vatsare  uda kumbhāḥ pradātavyāḥ mārge tasya sukhāya vai

original: ahanyahani dātavyā udakumbhāstilairyutāḥ / sulipte bhūmibhāge tu pakkānnajalapūritāḥ //
analyzed: ahani ahani dātavyāḥ uda kumbhāḥ tilaiḥ yutāḥ su lipte bhūmi bhāge tu pakka anna jala pūritāḥ

original: pretasya tatra dātavyaṃ bhājanañca yadṛcchayā / suprītastena dattena preto yāmyaiḥ sa gacchati //
analyzed: pretasya tatra dātavyam bhājanam ca yadṛcchayā su prītaḥ tena dattena pretaḥ yāmyaiḥ sa gacchati

original: dvādaśāhe viśeṣeṇa udakambhān pradāpayet / vidhinā tatra saṅkalpaya ghaṭān dvādaśasaṃkhyakān //
analyzed: dvādaśa ahe viśeṣeṇa uda kambhān pradāpayet vidhinā tatra saṅkalpaya ghaṭān dvādaśa saṃkhyakān

original: ekāṣi bardhanī tatra pakvānnaphalapūritā / viṣṇumuddiśya dātavyā saṃkalpya brāhmaṇe śubhe //
analyzed: bardhanī tatra pakva anna phala pūritā viṣṇum uddiśya dātavyā saṃkalpya brāhmaṇe śubhe

original: eko vai dharmarājāya tena tuṣṭena muktibhāk / citraguptāya caikaṃ tu gatastatra sukhī bhavet //
analyzed: ekaḥ vai dharmarājāya tena tuṣṭena mukti bhāj citraguptāya ca ekam tu gataḥ tatra sukhī bhavet

original: ṣoḍaśādyāḥ pradātavyā māṣānnajalapūritāḥ //
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa ādyāḥ pradātavyāḥ māṣa anna jala pūritāḥ

original: uktrāntiśrāddhamārabhya śrāddhaṣoḍaṣoḍaśakasya tu / ṣoḍaśabrāhmaṇānāntu ekaikaṃ vinivadayet //
analyzed: uktra antiśrāddham ārabhya śrāddha ṣoḍa ṣoḍaśakasya tu ṣoḍaśa brāhmaṇānām tu ekaikam vinivadayet

original: ekādaśāhātprabhṛti deyo nityaṃ dṛḍhāhvayaḥ / pakvānnajalapūrṇo hi yāvat saṃvatsaraṃ dinam //
analyzed: ekādaśa ahāt prabhṛti deyaḥ nityam dṛḍha āhvayaḥ pakva anna jala pūrṇaḥ hi yāvat saṃvatsaram dinam

original: jalapātrāṇi vṛddhāni dattānighaṭakāni ca / ekā vai vardhanī tatra tasyāṃ pātrantu vaṃśajam //
analyzed: jala pātrāṇi vṛddhāni ca ekā vai vardhanī tatra tasyām pātram tu vaṃśa jam

original: vastreṇācchādayet tāntu pūjayitvā sugandhibhiḥ / brāhmaṇebhyo viśeṣeṇa jalapūrṇāni dāpayet //
analyzed: vastreṇa ācchādayet tān tu pūjayitvā sugandhibhiḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ viśeṣeṇa jala pūrṇāni dāpayet

original: ahanyahani saṅkalpya vidhipūrvaṃ khageśvara / brāhmaṇāya kulīnāya vedavṛttayutāya ca //
analyzed: ahani ahani saṅkalpya vidhi pūrvam khageśvara brāhmaṇāya kulīnāya veda vṛtta yutāya ca

original: vidyāvṛttavate deyaṃ mūrkhe tanna kadācana / samartho vedavṛttāḍhyastāraṇe taraṇe 'pi ca //
analyzed: vidyā vṛttavate deyam mūrkhe tat na kadācana samarthaḥ veda vṛtta āḍhyaḥ tāraṇe taraṇe ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe dharmakāṇḍe sodakumbhaśrāddhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīya aṃśe pretakalpe dharma kāṇḍe sodakumbhaśrāddhanirūpaṇam nāma saptatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 38
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: tārkṣya uvāca / dānatīrthārthitaṃ mokṣaṃ svargañca vada me prabho / kena mokṣamavāpnoti kena svarge vasecciram //
analyzed: tārkṣyaḥ uvāca dāna tīrtha arthitam mokṣam svargam ca vada me prabho kena mokṣam avāpnoti kena svarge vaset ciram

original: kena gacchati tejastu svarlokāt satyalokataḥ / mānuṣyaṃ kena labhate narakeśu nimajjati //
analyzed: kena gacchati tejaḥ tu svarlokāt satyalokataḥ mānuṣyam kena labhate nimajjati

original: etanme vadaniścitya bhaktānāṃ mokṣadāyaka / brūhi kasmin mṛte svarge punarjanma na vidyate //
analyzed: etat me vata a niścitya bhaktānām mokṣa dāyaka brūhi kasmin mṛte svarge punarjanma na vidyate

original: śrīviṣṇuruvāca / mānuṣyaṃ bhārate varṣe trayodaśasu jātiṣu //
analyzed: śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca mānuṣyam bhārate varṣe trayodaśasu jātiṣu

original: tat prāpya mriyate kṣetre punarjanma na vidyate / ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśī kāñcī avantikā //
analyzed: tat prāpya mriyate kṣetre punarjanma na vidyate ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśī kāñcī avantikā

original: purī dvāravatī jñeyā saptaitā mokṣadāyikāḥ / sannyastamiti yo bruyāt prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi //
analyzed: purī dvāravatī jñeyā saptā etāḥ mokṣa dāyikāḥ sannyastam iti yaḥ bruyāt prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭha gataiḥ api

original: mṛto viṣṇupuraṃ yāti na punarjāyate kṣitau / sakṛduccaritaṃ yena harirityakṣaradvayam //
analyzed: mṛtaḥ viṣṇu puram yāti na punar jāyate kṣitau sakṛt uccaritam yena hariḥ iti akṣara dvayam

original: baddhaḥ parikarastena mokṣāya gamanaṃ prati / kṛṣṇakṛṣṇeti kṛṣṇeti yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ //
analyzed: baddhaḥ parikaraḥ tena mokṣāya gamanam prati kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa iti kṛṣṇa iti yaḥ mām smarati nityaśas

original: jala bhittvā yathā padmaṃ narakāduddharāmyaham / śālagrāmajilā yatra yatra dvāravatī śilā //
analyzed: bhittvā yathā padmam narakāt uddharāmi aham śālagrāma jilā yatra yatra dvāravatī śilā

original: ubhayoḥ saṅgamo yatra muktistatra na saṃśayaḥ / śālagrāmaśilā yatra pāpadoṣakṣayāvahā //
analyzed: ubhayoḥ saṅgamaḥ yatra muktiḥ tatra na saṃśayaḥ śālagrāma śilā yatra pāpa doṣa kṣaya āvahā

original: tatsannidhānamaraṇānmuktirjantoḥ suniścatā / ropaṇāt pālanāt sekāddhyānasparśanakīrtanāt / tulasī dahate pāpaṃ nṛṇāṃ janmārjitaṃ khaga //
analyzed: tad sannidhāna maraṇāt muktiḥ jantoḥ su niścatā  ropaṇāt pālanāt sekāt dhyāna sparśana kīrtanāt tulasī dahate pāpam nṛṇām janma arjitam khaga

original: jñānahṛde satyajale rāgadveṣamalāpahe / yaḥ snāto mānase tīrthe na sa lipyeta pātakaiḥ //
analyzed: jñāna hṛde satya jale rāga dveṣa mala apahe yaḥ snātaḥ mānase tīrthe na sa lipyeta pātakaiḥ

original: na kāṣṭhe vidyate devo na śilāyāṃ kadācana / bhāve hi vidyate devastasmādbhāvaṃ samācaret //
analyzed: na kāṣṭhe vidyate devaḥ na śilāyām kadācana  bhāve hi vidyate devaḥ tasmāt bhāvam samācaret

original: prātaḥ prātaḥ prapaśyanti narmadāṃ matsyaghātinaḥ / na te śivapurīṃ yānti cittavṛttirgarīyasī //
analyzed: prātar prātar prapaśyanti narmadām matsya ghātinaḥ  na te śiva purīm yānti cittavṛttiḥ garīyasī

original: yādṛk cittapratītiḥ syāt tādṛk karmaphalaṃ nṛṇām / paralokagatistādṛka sūcīsūtravicāravat //
analyzed: yādṛś citta pratītiḥ syāt tādṛś karma phalam nṛṇām

original: brāhmaṇārthe gavārthe ca strīṇāṃ balavadheṣu ca / prāṇatyāgaparo yastu sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: brāhmaṇa arthe gavā arthe ca strīṇām bala vadheṣu ca prāṇatyāga paraḥ yaḥ tu sa vai mokṣam avāpnuyāt

original: anāśake mṛtau yastu sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt / anāśake mṛto yastu sa muktaḥ sarvabandhanaiḥ //
analyzed: anāśake mṛtau yaḥ tu sa vai mokṣam avāpnuyāt anāśake mṛtaḥ yaḥ tu sa muktaḥ sarva bandhanaiḥ

original: dattvā dānāni viprebhyastato mokṣamavāpnuyāt / ete vai mokṣamārgāśca svargamārgāstathaiva ca //
analyzed: dattvā dānāni viprebhyaḥ tatas mokṣam avāpnuyāt  ete vai mokṣa mārgāḥ ca svarga mārgāḥ tathā eva ca

original: gograhe deśavidhvaṃse maraṇaṃ raṇatīrthayoḥ / uttamādhamamadhyasya bādhyamānasya dehinaḥ / ātmānaṃ tatra santyajya svargavāsaṃ labhecciram //
analyzed: gograhe deśa vidhvaṃse maraṇam raṇa tīrthayoḥ  uttama adhama madhyasya bādhyamānasya dehinaḥ  ātmānam tatra santyajya svarga vāsam labhet ciram

original: jīvitaṃ maraṇañcaiva dvayaṃ śikṣeta paṇḍitaḥ / jīvitaṃ dānabhogābhyāṃ maraṇaṃ raṇatīrthayoḥ //
analyzed: jīvitam maraṇam ca eva dvayam śikṣeta paṇḍitaḥ jīvitam dāna bhogābhyām maraṇam raṇa tīrthayoḥ

original: harikṣetre kurukṣetre bhṛgukṣetre tathaiva ca / prabhāse śrīsthale caiva arbude ca tripuṣkare //
analyzed: harikṣetre kurukṣetre bhṛgukṣetre tathā eva ca prabhāse śrīsthale ca eva arbude ca tripuṣkare

original: bhūteśvare mṛto yastu svarge vasati mānavaḥ / brahmaṇo divasaṃ yāvat tataḥ patati bhūtale //
analyzed: bhūteśvare mṛtaḥ yaḥ tu svarge vasati mānavaḥ brahmaṇaḥ divasam yāvat tatas patati bhū tale

original: varṣavṛttintu yo dadyādbrāhmaṇe doṣavarjite / sarvaṃ kalaṃ sa muddhṛtya svargaloke mahīyate //
analyzed: varṣa vṛttim tu yaḥ dadyāt brāhmaṇe doṣa varjite sarvam kalam sa m uddhṛtya svarga loke mahīyate

original: kanyāṃ vivāhayedyastu brāhmaṇaṃ vedapāragam / indraloke vaset so 'pi svakulaiḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ //
analyzed: kanyām vivāhayet yaḥ tu brāhmaṇam vedapāragam indra loke vaset saḥ sva kulaiḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ

original: mahādānāni datvā ca narastatphalamāmuyāt //
analyzed: mahā dānāni da tvā ca naraḥ tat phalam āmuyāt

original: vāpī kūpataḍāgānāmārāmasurasadmanām / jīrṇoddhāraṃ prakurvāṇaḥ pūrvakartuḥ phalaṃ labhet / jīrṇoddhāreṇa vā teṣāṃ tat puṇyaṃ dviguṇaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: vāpī kūpa taḍāgānām ārāma surasadmanām  jīrṇa uddhāram prakurvāṇaḥ pūrva kartuḥ phalam labhet jīrṇa uddhāreṇa vā teṣām tat puṇyam dviguṇam bhavet

original: śītavā tātapaharamapi parṇakuṭīrakam / kṛtvā viprāya viduṣe pradadāti kuṭumbine //
analyzed: tāta paharam api parṇa kuṭīrakam kṛtvā viprāya viduṣe pradadāti kuṭumbine

original: tisraḥ koṭyordhakoṭī ca naraḥ svarge mahīyate //
analyzed: tisraḥ ca naraḥ svarge mahīyate

original: yā strī savarṇā saṃśubā mṛtaṃ patimanuvrajet / sā mṛtā svargamāpnoti varṣāṇāṃ romasaṃkhyatā //
analyzed: yā strī savarṇā saṃśubā mṛtam patim anuvrajet sā mṛtā svargam āpnoti varṣāṇām roma saṃkhya tā

original: putrapautrādikaṃ tyaktvā svapatiṃ yānugacchati / svargaṃ labhetāṃ tau cobhau divyastrībhiralaṅkṛtau //
analyzed: putra pautra ādikam tyaktvā sva patim yā anugacchati svargam labhetām tau ca ubhau divya strībhiḥ alaṅkṛtau

original: kṛtvā pāpānyanekāni bhartṛdrohamatiḥ sadā / prakṣālayati sarvāṇi yā svaṃ patimanuvrajet //
analyzed: kṛtvā pāpāni anekāni bhartṛ droha matiḥ sadā prakṣālayati sarvāṇi yā svam patim anuvrajet

original: mahāpāpasamācāro bhartā cedduṣkṛtī bhavet / tasyāpyanuvratā nārī nārāyet sarvakilbiṣam //
analyzed: mahā pāpa samācāraḥ bhartā ced duṣkṛtī bhavet tasya api anuvratā nārī na ārāyet sarva kilbiṣam

original: grāsamātraṃ niyamato nityadānaṃ karoti yaḥ / catuścāmarasaṃyuktavimānenādhigacchati //
analyzed: grāsa mātram niyamataḥ nitya dānam karoti yaḥ catur cāmara saṃyukta vimānena adhigacchati

original: yat kṛtaṃ hi manuṣyeṇa pāpamāmaraṇāntikam / tat sarvaṃ nāśamāyāti varṣavṛttipradānataḥ //
analyzed: yat kṛtam hi manuṣyeṇa pāpam āmaraṇāntikam tat sarvam nāśam āyāti varṣa vṛtti pradānataḥ

original: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ baviṣyañca pāpaṃ janmatrayārjitam / pakṣālayati tat sarvaṃ viprakanyopanāyanāt //
analyzed: bhūtam bhavyam baviṣyat ca pāpam janma traya arjitam pakṣālayati tat sarvam vipra kanyā upanāyanāt

original: daśakūpasamā vāpi daśavāpīsamaṃ saraḥ / saro bhirdaśabhistulyā yā prapā nirjale vane //
analyzed: daśa kūpa samā vā api daśa vāpī samam saraḥ sarobhiḥ daśabhiḥ tulyā yā prapā nirjale vane

original: yā vāpī nirjale deśe yaddānaṃ nirdhane dvije / prāṇināṃ yo dayāṃ dhatte sa bhavennākanāyakaḥ //
analyzed: yā vāpī nirjale deśe yat dānam nirdhane dvije prāṇinām yaḥ dayām dhatte sa bhavet nākanāyakaḥ

original: evamādibhiranyaiśca sukṛtaiḥ svargabhāgbhavet / sa tat sarvaṃ phalaṃ prāpya pratiṣṭhāṃ paramāṃ labhet //
analyzed: evamādibhiḥ anyaiḥ ca sukṛtaiḥ svarga bhāj bhavet sa tat sarvam phalam prāpya pratiṣṭhām paramām labhet

original: phalgu kāryaṃ parityajya satataṃ dharmavān bhavet / dānaṃ damo dayā ceti sārametat trayaṃ bhuvi //
analyzed: phalgu kāryam parityajya satatam dharmavān bhavet dānam damaḥ dayā ca iti sāram etat trayam bhuvi

original: dānaṃ sādhordaridrasya śūnyaliṅgasya pūjanam / anāthapretasaṃskāraḥ koṭiyajñaphalapradaḥ //
analyzed: dānam sādhoḥ daridrasya śūnya liṅgasya pūjanam anātha preta saṃskāraḥ koṭi yajña phala pradaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttamalokagatyāgatimokṣamānuṣyahetunirūpaṇaṃ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde uttama loka gati āgati mokṣa mānuṣya hetu nirūpaṇam

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 39
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: tārkṣya uvāca / sūtakānāṃ vidhiṃ brūhi dayāṃ kṛtvā mayiprabho / vivekāya hi cittasya mānavānāṃ hitāya ca //
analyzed: tārkṣyaḥ uvāca sūtakānām vidhim brūhi dayām kṛtvā mayi prabho vivekāya hi cittasya mānavānām hitāya ca

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / mṛte janmanī pakṣīndra sūtakaṃ syāccaturvidham / caturṇāmapi varṇānāṃ sāmānyate vivarjitam //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca mṛte janmanī pakṣi indra sūtakam syāt caturvidham caturṇām api varṇānām sāmānyate vivarjitam

original: ubhayatra daśāhāni kulasyānnaṃ vivarjiyet / dānaṃ pratigraho homaḥ svādhyāyaśca nivartate //
analyzed: ubhayatra daśa ahāni kulasya annam dānam pratigrahaḥ homaḥ svādhyāyaḥ ca nivartate

original: deśaṃ kālaṃ tathātmānaṃ dravyaṃ dravyaprayājanam / upapattiṃvmavasthāñca jñātvāṃ karma samācaret //
analyzed: deśam kālam tathā ātmānam dravyam dravya prayājanam

original: guhāvahnipravese ca deśāntaramṛteṣu ca / snānaṃ sacelaṃ kartavyaṃ sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate //
analyzed: guhā vahni pravese ca deśa antara mṛteṣu ca snānam sa celam kartavyam sadyas śaucam vidhīyate

original: āmagarbhāśca ye jīvā ye ca garbhādviniḥ sṛtāḥ / na teṣāmagnisaṃskāro nāśaucaṃ nodakakriyā //
analyzed: āmagarbhāḥ ca ye jīvāḥ ye ca garbhāt viniḥ sṛtāḥ na teṣām agni saṃskāraḥ na āśaucam na udakakriyā

original: śilpinaḥ kāravo vaidyā dāsīdāsāstathaiva ca / rājānaḥ śrotiyāścaiva sadyaḥ śaucāḥ prakīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: śilpinaḥ kāravaḥ vaidyāḥ dāsī dāsāḥ tathā eva ca rājānaḥ śrotiyāḥ ca eva sadyas śaucāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: satrī ca (vratī)
analyzed: satrī ca vratī

original: mantrapūtaśca āhitāgnirnṛpastathā / eteṣāṃ sūtakaṃ nāsti yasya cecchanti pārthivāḥ //
analyzed: mantra pūtaḥ ca āhitāgniḥ nṛpaḥ tathā eteṣām sūtakam na asti yasya ca icchanti pārthivāḥ

original: prasave ca sapiṇḍānāṃ na kuryāt saṅkaraṃ dvijaḥ / daśāhācchrudhyate mātā avagāhya pitā śuciḥ //
analyzed: prasave ca sapiṇḍānām na kuryāt saṅkaram dvijaḥ daśa ahāt śrudhyate mātā avagāhya pitā śuciḥ

original: vivāhotsavayajñeṣu antarā mṛtasūtake / pūrvasaṅkalpitaṃ vittaṃ bhojyaṃ tanmanurabravīt //
analyzed: vivāha utsava yajñeṣu antarā mṛta sūtake pūrva saṅkalpitam vittam bhojyam tat manuḥ abravīt

original: sarveṣāmevamāśaucaṃ mātāpitrostu sūtakam / sūkataṃ māturevasyādupaspṛśya pitā śuciḥ //
analyzed: sarveṣām evam āśaucam mātā pitroḥ tu sūtakam sūkatam mātuḥ eva syāt upaspṛśya pitā śuciḥ

original: antardaśāhe syātāñcet punarmaraṇajanmanī / tāvat syādaśucirvipro yāvat tat syādanirdaśam //
analyzed: antar daśa ahe syātām ced punar maraṇa janmanī tāvat syāt aśuciḥ vipraḥ yāvat tat syāt anirdaśam

original: udite niyame dāne ārte vipre nivedayet / tathaiva ṛṣibhiḥ proktaṃ yathākālaṃ na duṣyati //
analyzed: udite niyame dāne ārte vipre nivedayet tathā eva ṛṣibhiḥ proktam yathākālam na duṣyati

original: mṛnmayena tu pātreṇa tilairmiśrajalaiḥ saha / mṛttikayā tathānte ca naraḥ snātvā śucirbhavet //
analyzed: mṛd mayena tu pātreṇa tilaiḥ miśra jalaiḥ saha mṛttikayā tathā ante ca naraḥ snātvā śuciḥ bhavet

original: dānaṃ pariṣade dadyāt suvarṇaṃ govṛṣaṃ dvije / kṣattriyo dviguṇaṃ caiva vaiśyastu triguṇaṃ tathā //
analyzed: dānam pariṣade dadyāt suvarṇam go vṛṣam dvije kṣattriyaḥ dviguṇam ca eva vaiśyaḥ tu triguṇam tathā

original: caturguṇantu śūdreṇa dātavyaṃ brāhmaṇe dhanam / eva manukrameṇaiva cāturvarṇyaṃ viśudhyati //
analyzed: caturguṇam tu śūdreṇa dātavyam brāhmaṇe dhanam eva manukrameṇa eva cāturvarṇyam viśudhyati

original: saptāṣṭamāntarai śīrṇe gṛhyasaṃskāravarjite / ahastu sūtakaṃ tasya tvabdānāṃ saṃkhyayā smṛtam //
analyzed: sapta aṣṭama antaraiḥ śīrṇe gṛhya saṃskāra varjite ahar tu sūtakam tasya tu abdānām saṃkhyayā smṛtam

original: brāhmaṇārthe vipannā ye nārīṇāṃ gograheṣu ca / āhaveṣu vipannānāmekarāttramaśaucakam //
analyzed: brāhmaṇa arthe vipannāḥ ye nārīṇām gograheṣu ca āhaveṣu vipannānām eka rāttram aśaucakam

original: na teṣāmaśubhaṃ kiñcidviprāṇāṃ śubhakarmaṇi / anāthapretasaṃskāraṃ ye kurvantu narottamaḥ //
analyzed: na teṣām aśubham kiñcid viprāṇām śubha karmaṇi anātha preta saṃskāram ye kurvantu nara uttamaḥ

original: na teṣāmaśubhaṅkiñcidvipreṇa sahakāriṇā / jalāvagāhanātteṣāṃ sadyaḥ śuddhirudāhṛtā //
analyzed: na teṣām aśubham kiñcid vipreṇa sahakāriṇā jala avagāhanāt teṣām sadyas śuddhiḥ udāhṛtā

original: vinivṛttā yadā śūdrā udakāntamupasthitāḥ / tadāvipreṇadraṣṭavyā iti vedavidoviduḥ //
analyzed: vinivṛttāḥ yadā śūdrāḥ udaka antam upasthitāḥ tadā a vipreṇa draṣṭavyāḥ iti veda vidaḥ viduḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dhadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde sūtakakālādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmai konacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde sūtakakālādinirūpaṇam nāma e konacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 40
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: tārkṣya uvāca / bhagavanbrāhmaṇāḥ kecidapamṛtyuvaśaṃ gatāḥ / kathaṃ teṣāṃ bhavenmārgaḥ kiṃ sthānaṃ kā gatirbhavet //
analyzed: tārkṣyaḥ uvāca bhagavan brāhmaṇāḥ kecid apamṛtyu vaśam gatāḥ katham teṣām bhavet mārgaḥ kim sthānam kā gatiḥ bhavet

original: kiñca yuktaṃ bhavetteṣāṃ vidhānaṃ vāpi kīdṛśam / tadahaṃ śrotumicchāmi brūhi me madhusūdana //
analyzed: kiñca yuktam bhavet teṣām vidhānam vā api kīdṛśam tat aham śrotum icchāmi brūhi me madhusūdana

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / pretībhūtādvijātīnāṃ sambhūte mṛtyuvaikṛte / teṣāṃ mārgagatisthānaṃ vidhānaṃ kathayāmyaham //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca pretībhūtāḥ dvijātīnām sambhūte mṛtyu vaikṛte teṣām mārga gati sthānam vidhānam kathayāmi aham

original: śṛṇu tārkṣya paraṃ gopyaṃ jāte durmaraṇe sati / laṅghanairye mṛtā viprā daṃṣṭribhiścābhighātitāḥ //
analyzed: śṛṇu tārkṣya param gopyam jāte durmaraṇe sati laṅghanaiḥ ye mṛtāḥ viprāḥ daṃṣṭribhiḥ ca abhighātitāḥ

original: kaṇṭhagrāha vimagnānāṃ kṣīṇānāṃ tuṇḍaghātinām / viṣāgnivṛṣaviprebhyo viṣūcyā cātmaghātakāḥ //
analyzed: kaṇṭhagrāha vimagnānām kṣīṇānām tuṇḍa ghātinām viṣa agni vṛṣa viprebhyaḥ viṣūcyā ca ātma ghātakāḥ

original: patanodvandhanajalairmṛtānāṃ śṛṇu saṃsthitim / yānti te narakeghore ye ca mlecchādibhirhatāḥ //
analyzed: patana udvandhana jalaiḥ mṛtānām śṛṇu saṃsthitim yānti te narake ghore ye ca mleccha ādibhiḥ hatāḥ

original: śvaśṛgālādisaṃspṛṣṭā adagdhāḥ kṛmisaṃṅkulāḥ / ullaṅghitā mṛtā ye ca mahārogaiśca pīḍitāḥ //
analyzed: śva śṛgāla ādi saṃspṛṣṭāḥ adagdhāḥ kṛmi saṃṅkulāḥ ullaṅghitāḥ mṛtāḥ ye ca mahā rogaiḥ ca pīḍitāḥ

original: abhisastāstathāvyaṅgā ye ca pāpānnapoṣitāḥ / caṇḍālādudakātsarpādbrāhmaṇādvaidyutāgnitaḥ //
analyzed: abhisastāḥ tathā avyaṅgāḥ ye ca pāpa anna poṣitāḥ caṇḍālāt udakāt sarpāt brāhmaṇāt vaidyuta agnitaḥ

original: daṣṭribhyaśca paśubhyaśca vṛkṣādipatanānmṛtāḥ / udakyāmūtakīśūdrārajakīsaṅgadūṣitāḥ //
analyzed: daṣṭribhyaḥ ca paśubhyaḥ ca vṛkṣa ādi patanāt mṛtāḥ udakyā mūtakī śūdrā rajakī saṅga dūṣitāḥ

original: tena pāpena narakānmuktāḥ pretatvabhāginaḥ / na teṣāṃ kārayeddāhaṃ sūtakaṃ nodakakriyām //
analyzed: tena pāpena narakāt muktāḥ preta tva bhāginaḥ na teṣām kārayet dāham sūtakam na udakakriyām

original: na vidhānaṃ mṛtādyaṃ ca na kuryādaurdhvadaihikam / teṣāṃ tārkṣya prakurvīta nārāyaṇabalikriyām //
analyzed: na vidhānam mṛta ādyam ca na kuryāt aurdhvadaihikam teṣām tārkṣya prakurvīta nārāyaṇa bali kriyām

original: sarvalokahitārthāya śṛṇu pāpabhayāpahām / ṣaṇmāsaṃ brāhmaṇe dāhastrimāsaṃ kṣattriye mataḥ //
analyzed: sarva loka hita arthāya śṛṇu pāpa bhaya apahām ṣaṣ māsam brāhmaṇe dāhaḥ tri māsam kṣattriye mataḥ

original: sārdha māsaṃ tu vaiśyasya sadyaḥ śūdre vidhīyate / gaṅgāyāṃ yamunāyāñca naimiṣe puṣkare 'tha ca //
analyzed: sārdha māsam tu vaiśyasya sadyas śūdre vidhīyate gaṅgāyām yamunāyām ca naimiṣe puṣkare ca

original: taḍāge jalūpūrṇe vā hrade vā vimalodake / vāpyāṃ kūpe gavāṃ goṣṭhe gṛhe vā pratimālaye //
analyzed: taḍāge jalūpūrṇe vā hrade vā vimala udake vāpyām kūpe gavām goṣṭhe gṛhe vā pratimā ālaye

original: kṛṣṇāgre kārayedvipra baliṃ nārāyaṇāhvayam / pretāya tarpaṇaṃ kāryaṃ mantraiḥ paurāṇavaidikaiḥ //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa agre kārayet vipra balim nārāyaṇa āhvayam pretāya tarpaṇam kāryam mantraiḥ paurāṇa vaidikaiḥ

original: sarvauṣadhyakṣatairmiśrairviṣṇumuddiśya tarpayet / kāryaṃ puruṣasūktena mantrairvā vaiṣṇavairapi //
analyzed: sarva oṣadhi akṣataiḥ miśraiḥ viṣṇum uddiśya tarpayet kāryam puruṣasūktena mantraiḥ vā vaiṣṇavaiḥ api

original: dakṣiṇābhimukho bhūtvā pretaṃ viṣṇuriti smaret / anādinidhano devaḥ śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ //
analyzed: dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ bhūtvā pretam viṣṇuḥ iti smaret an ādi nidhanaḥ devaḥ śaṅkha cakra gadā dharaḥ

original: avyayaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ pretamokṣaprado bhavet / tarpaṇasyāvasāne ca vītarāgo vimatsaraḥ //
analyzed: avyayaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ preta mokṣa pradaḥ bhavet tarpaṇasya avasāne ca vīta rāgaḥ vimatsaraḥ

original: jitendriyamanā bhūtvā śucipmāndharmatatparaḥ / dānadharmarataḥ śāntaḥ praṇamya vāgyataḥ śuciḥ //
analyzed: jita indriya manāḥ bhūtvā śucipmān dharma tatparaḥ dāna dharma rataḥ śāntaḥ praṇamya vāgyataḥ śuciḥ

original: yajamāno bhabettatra śucirvandhusamanvitaḥ / bhaktyā tatra prakurvīta śrāddhatyekādaśaiva tu //
analyzed: yajamānaḥ bhabet tatra śuciḥ vandhu samanvitaḥ bhaktyā tatra prakurvīta tu

original: sarvakarmavipākena ekaikāgre samāhitaḥ / toyavrīhiyavān ṣaṣṭyā godhūmāṃśca priyaṅgukān //
analyzed: sarva karma vipākena ekaika agre samāhitaḥ toya vrīhi yavān ṣaṣṭyā godhūmān ca priyaṅgukān

original: haviṣyānnaṃ śubhaṃ mudrāṃ chatroṣṇīṣe ca calekam / dāpayetsarvasasyāni kṣīrakṣaudrayutāni ca //
analyzed: haviṣya annam śubham mudrām chatra uṣṇīṣe ca calekam dāpayet sarva sasyāni kṣīra kṣaudra yutāni ca

original: vastropānahasaṃyuktaṃ dadyādaṣṭavidhaṃ padam / dāpayetsarvaviprebhyo na kuryātpaṅktibandhanam //
analyzed: vastra upānaha saṃyuktam dadyāt aṣṭavidham padam  dāpayet sarva viprebhyaḥ na kuryāt paṅktibandhanam

original: bhūmau sthiteṣu piṇḍeṣu gandhapuṣpākṣatānvitam / śaṅkhapātre tathā tāmre tarpaṇañca pṛthakpṛthak //
analyzed: bhūmau sthiteṣu piṇḍeṣu gandha puṣpa akṣata anvitam śaṅkha pātre tathā tāmre tarpaṇam ca pṛthak pṛthak

original: dhyānadhāraṇasaṃyukto jānubhyāmavaniṃ gataḥ / dātavyaṃ sarvaviprebhyo vedaśāstravidhānataḥ //
analyzed: dhyāna dhāraṇa saṃyuktaḥ jānubhyām avanim gataḥ dātavyam sarva viprebhyaḥ veda śāstra vidhānataḥ

original: ṛcā vai dāpayedarghyamekoddiṣṭe pṛthakpṛthak / āpodevīrmadhumatīrādipīṭhe prakalpitam //
analyzed: ṛcā vai dāpayet arghyam ekoddiṣṭe pṛthak pṛthak āpaḥ devīḥ madhumatīḥ ādi pīṭhe prakalpitam

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'si dvitīyer'ghaṃ nivedayet / yenāpāvakacakṣuṣā tṛtīye ca kasalpitam //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ si dvitīye ṛgham nivedayet yena a pāvaka cakṣuṣā tṛtīye ca

original: ye devāsaścaturthe tu samudraṃ gaccha pañcame / agnirjyoti stathā ṣaṣṭhe hiraṇyagarbhaḥ saptame //
analyzed: ye devāsaḥ caturthe tu samudram gaccha pañcame  agniḥ jyotiḥ tathā ṣaṣṭhe hiraṇyagarbhaḥ saptame

original: yamāya tvāṣṭame jñeyaṃ yajjagrannavame tathā / taśame yāḥ phalinīti piṇḍe caikādaśe tataḥ //
analyzed: yamāya tvā aṣṭame jñeyam yat jagrat navame tathā yāḥ phalinī iti piṇḍe ca ekādaśe tatas

original: bhadraṃ karṇebhiriti ca kuryātpiṇḍavisarjanam / kṛtvaikādaśadevatyaṃ śrāddhaṃ kuryātpare 'hani //
analyzed: bhadram karṇebhiḥ iti ca kuryāt piṇḍa visarjanam kṛtvā ekādaśa devatyam śrāddham kuryāt pare hani

original: viprānāvāhayetpañca caturvedaviśāradān / vidyāśīlaguṇopetānsva kīyāñchīlasattamān / abyaṅgānsapraśastāṃśca na t varjyānkadācana //
analyzed: viprān āvāhayet pañca catur veda viśāradān vidyā śīla guṇa upetān sva kīyān śīla sattamān  abyaṅgān sa praśastān ca na t varjyān kadācana

original: viṣṇuḥ svarṇamayaḥ kāryo rudastāmramayastathā / brahmā rūpyamayastadvadyamo lohamayo bhavet //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ svarṇa mayaḥ kāryaḥ rudaḥ tāmra mayaḥ tathā brahmā rūpya mayaḥ tadvat yamaḥ loha mayaḥ bhavet

original: sīsakaṃ tu bhavetpretaṃ tvatha vā darbhakaṃ tathā / śannodevīti mantreṇa govindaṃ paścime nyaset //
analyzed: sīsakam tu bhavet pretam tu atha vā darbhakam tathā mantreṇa govindam paścime nyaset

original: agna āyāhīti rudramuttaratraiva vinyaset / agnimīḷeti mantreṇa pūrveṇaiva prajāpatim //
analyzed: agne āyāhi iti rudram uttaratra eva vinyaset agnim īḍa iti mantreṇa pūrveṇa eva prajāpatim

original: iṣetvorjoti mantreṇa dakṣiṇe sthāpayedyamam / madhye maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā sthāpyo darbhamayo naraḥ //
analyzed: mantreṇa dakṣiṇe sthāpayet yamam madhye maṇḍalakam kṛtvā sthāpyaḥ darbha mayaḥ naraḥ

original: brahmā viṣṇustathā rudro yamaḥ pretaśca pañcamaḥ / pṛthakkumbhe tataḥ sthāpyāḥ pañcaratnasamanvitāḥ //
analyzed: brahmā viṣṇuḥ tathā rudraḥ yamaḥ pretaḥ ca pañcamaḥ pṛthak kumbhe tatas sthāpyāḥ pañcaratna samanvitāḥ

original: vastrayajñopavītāni pṛthaṅmudrāparāṇi ca / japaṃ karyātpṛthaktatra brahmādau devatāsu ca //
analyzed: vastra yajñopavītāni pṛthak mudrā parāṇi ca japam karyāt pṛthak tatra brahma ādau devatāsu ca

original: pañca śrāddhāni kurvīta devatānāṃ yathāvidhi / jaladhārāṃ tato dadyatpīṭhepīṭhe pṛthakpṛthak //
analyzed: pañca śrāddhāni kurvīta devatānām yathāvidhi jala dhārām tatas dadyat pīṭhe pīṭhe pṛthak pṛthak

original: śaṅkhe vā tāmrapātre vā alābhe mṛnmaye 'pi vā / tilodakaṃ samādāya sarvauṣadhisamanvitam //
analyzed: śaṅkhe vā tāmra pātre vā alābhe mṛd maye vā tila udakam samādāya sarva oṣadhi samanvitam

original: āsanopānahau cchatraṃ mudrikā ca kamaṇḍaluḥ / bhājanaṃ bhājanādhāraṃ vastrāṇyaṣṭavidhaṃ padam //
analyzed: āsana upānahau chatram mudrikā ca kamaṇḍaluḥ bhājanam bhājana ādhāram vastrāṇi aṣṭavidham padam

original: tāmrapātraṃ tilaiḥ pūrṇaṃ sahiraṇyaṃ sadakṣiṇam / dadyādbrāhmaṇamukhyāya vidhiyuktaṃ khageśvara //
analyzed: tāmra pātram tilaiḥ pūrṇam sa hiraṇyam sa dakṣiṇam dadyāt brāhmaṇa mukhyāya vidhi yuktam khageśvara

original: ṛgvedapārage dadyājjātasasyāṃ vasundharām / yajurvedamaye vipre gāñca dadyātpayasvinīm //
analyzed: ṛgveda pārage dadyāt jāta sasyām vasundharām  yajurveda maye vipre gān ca dadyāt payasvinīm

original: sāmagāya śivoddeśātpradadyātkaladhautakam / yamoddeśāttilāṃllohaṃ tato dadyācca dakṣiṇām //
analyzed: sāmagāya śiva uddeśāt pradadyāt kaladhautakam yama uddeśāt tilān loham tatas dadyāt ca dakṣiṇām

original: paścātputtalakaṃ kāryaṃ sarvauṣadhisamanvitam / palāśasya ca vṛntānāṃ vibhāgaṃ śṛṇu kāśyapa //
analyzed: paścāt puttalakam kāryam sarva oṣadhi samanvitam palāśasya ca vṛntānām vibhāgam śṛṇu kāśyapa

original: kṛṣṇājinaṃ samāstīrya kuśaiśca puruṣākṛtim / śatatrayeṇa ṣaṣṭyā ca vṛntaiḥ prokto 'sthisañcayaḥ //
analyzed: kṛṣṇājinam samāstīrya kuśaiḥ ca puruṣa ākṛtim śata trayeṇa ṣaṣṭyā ca vṛntaiḥ proktaḥ sthi sañcayaḥ

original: vinyasya tāni vṛntāni aṅgeṣveṣu pṛthakpṛthak / catvāriṃśacchirodeśe grīvāyāṃ daśa vinyaset //
analyzed: vinyasya tāni vṛntāni aṅgeṣu eṣu pṛthak pṛthak catvāriṃśat śiraḥ deśe grīvāyām daśa vinyaset

original: viṃśatyuraḥ sthale dadyādviṃśatiṃ jaṭhare 'pi ca / bāhuyugme śataṃ dadyātkaṭi deśe ca viṃśatim //
analyzed: viṃśati uraḥ sthale dadyāt viṃśatim jaṭhare ca bāhu yugme śatam dadyāt kaṭi deśe ca viṃśatim

original: ūrudvaye śatañcāpi triṃśajjaṅghādvaye nyaset / dadyāccatuṣṭayaṃ śiśre ṣaḍ dadyād vṛṣaṇadvaye / daśa pādāṅgulībhāge evamasthīni vinyaset //
analyzed: ūru dvaye śatam ca api triṃśat jaṅghā dvaye nyaset dadyāt catuṣṭayam ṣaṣ dadyāt vṛṣaṇa dvaye daśa pāda aṅgulī bhāge evam asthīni vinyaset

original: nārikelaṃ śiraḥ sthāne tumbaṃ dadyācca tāluke / pañcaratnaṃ mukhe dadyājjihvāyāṃ kadalīphalam //
analyzed: nārikelam śiraḥ sthāne tumbam dadyāt ca tāluke pañcaratnam mukhe dadyāt jihvāyām kadalī phalam

original: antreṣu nālakaṃ dadyādbālakaṃ prāṇa eva ca / vasāyīṃ medakaṃ dadyādgomūtreṇa tu mūtrakam //
analyzed: antreṣu nālakam dadyāt bālakam prāṇe eva ca vasāyīm medakam dadyāt go mūtreṇa tu mūtrakam

original: gandhakaṃ dhātavo deyo haritālaṃ manaḥ śilā / retaḥ sthāne pāradañca purīṣe pittalaṃ tathā //
analyzed: gandhakam dhātavaḥ deyaḥ haritālam manaḥ śilā retaḥ sthāne pāradam ca purīṣe pittalam tathā

original: manaḥ śilāṃ tathā gātre tilakalkañca sandhiṣu / yavapiṣṭaṃ tathā māṃse madhu vai kṣaudrameva ca //
analyzed: manaḥ śilām tathā gātre tila kalkam ca sandhiṣu yava piṣṭam tathā māṃse madhu vai kṣaudram eva ca

original: keśeṣu vai vaṭajaṭātvaci dadyānmṛgatvacam / karṇayostālapattrañca stanayoścaiva guñjikāḥ //
analyzed: keśeṣu vai vaṭa jaṭā tvaci dadyāt mṛga tvacam karṇayoḥ tālapattram ca stanayoḥ ca eva guñjikāḥ

original: nāsāyāṃ śatapattraṃ ca kamalaṃ nābhimaṇḍale / vṛntākaṃ vṛṣaṇadvandve liṅge syādgṛñjanaṃ śubham //
analyzed: nāsāyām śatapattram ca kamalam nābhi maṇḍale vṛntākam vṛṣaṇa dvandve liṅge syāt gṛñjanam śubham

original: ghṛtaṃ nābhyāṃ pradeyaṃ syātkaupīne ca trapu smṛtam / mauktikaṃ stanayormūrdhni kuṅkumena vilepanam //
analyzed: ghṛtam nābhyām pradeyam syāt kaupīne ca trapu smṛtam mauktikam stanayoḥ mūrdhni kuṅkumena vilepanam

original: karpūrāgurudhūpaiśca śubhairmālyaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ / paridhānaṃ paṭṭasūtraṃ hṛdaye rukmakaṃ nyaset //
analyzed: karpūra aguru dhūpaiḥ ca śubhaiḥ mālyaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ paridhānam paṭṭasūtram hṛdaye rukmakam nyaset

original: ṛddhivṛddhī bhujau dvau ca cakṣuṣośca kapardakau / sindūraṃ netrakoṇe ca tāmbūlādyupahārakaiḥ //
analyzed: ṛddhi vṛddhī bhujau dvau ca cakṣuṣoḥ ca kapardakau sindūram netra koṇe ca tāmbūla ādi upahārakaiḥ

original: sarvauṣadhiyutaṃ pretaṃ kṛtvā pūjā yathoditā / sāgnike (kaiścā)
analyzed: sarva oṣadhi yutam pretam kṛtvā pūjā yathā uditā sa agnike kaiḥ ca

original: cāpi vidhinā yajñapātraṃ nyasetkramāt //
analyzed: ca api vidhinā yajña pātram nyaset kramāt

original: śirome śrīriti ṛcā punantu varuṇeti ca / pretasya pāvanaṃ kṛtvā śāliśālaśilodakaiḥ //
analyzed: śiraḥ me śrīḥ iti ṛcā punantu varuṇa iti ca pretasya pāvanam kṛtvā śāli śāla śila udakaiḥ

original: viṣṇumuddiśya dātavyā suśīlāgauḥ payasvinī //
analyzed: viṣṇum uddiśya dātavyā suśīlā gauḥ payasvinī

original: (tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā / saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pānaṃ samṛtam //
analyzed: tilāḥ loham hiraṇyam ca kārpāsam lavaṇam tathā saptadhānyam kṣitiḥ gāvaḥ ekaikam pānam samṛtam

original: tilapātraṃ tato dattvā padadānaṃ tathaiva ca //
analyzed: tila pātram tatas dattvā pada dānam tathā eva ca

original: mahādānāni deyāni tilapātraṃ tatheti ca / tato vaitaraṇī deyā sarvābharaṇabhūṣitā //
analyzed: mahā dānāni deyāni tila pātram tathā iti ca tatas vaitaraṇī deyā sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitā

original: kartavyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ śrāddhaṃ pretamuktyartha mātmavān / pretaṃmokṣaṃ tataḥ kuryāddhṛdi viṣṇuṃ prakalpya ca //
analyzed: kartavyam vaiṣṇavam śrāddham preta mukti artham mā ātmavān pretaṃmokṣam tatas kuryāt hṛdi viṣṇum prakalpya ca

original: oṃ viṣṇuriti saṃsmṛtya pretaṃ tanmṛtyumeva ca / agnidāhaṃ tataḥ kuryātsūtakantu dinatrayam //
analyzed: om viṣṇuḥ iti saṃsmṛtya pretam tad mṛtyum eva ca agni dāham tatas kuryāt sūtakam tu dina trayam

original: daśāhakartrā piṇḍāśca kartavyāḥ pretabhuktaye / sarvaṃ varṣavidhiṃ kuryādevaṃ pretaśca muktibhāk //
analyzed: daśa aha kartrā piṇḍāḥ ca kartavyāḥ preta bhuktaye sarvam varṣa vidhim kuryāt evam pretaḥ ca mukti bhāj

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'pamṛtyau sukhaduḥ khalābhālābhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde sukhaduḥ khalābhālābhanirūpaṇam nāma

original: catvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: catvāriṃśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 41
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīviṣṇuruvāca / vṛṣotsargaṃ prakurvīta vidhipūrvaṃ khageśvara / kārtikādiṣu māseṣu paurṇamāsyāṃ śubhe dine //
analyzed: śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca vṛṣotsargam prakurvīta vidhi pūrvam khageśvara kārtika ādiṣu māseṣu paurṇamāsyām śubhe dine

original: vivāhotsarjanaṃ śrāddhaṃ nāndīmukhamupakramet / kuryādbhuvaśca saṃskārānagnisthāpanameva ca //
analyzed: vivāha utsarjanam śrāddham nāndīmukham upakramet  kuryāt bhuvaḥ ca saṃskārān agni sthāpanam eva ca

original: vāpyāṃ kūpe gavāṃ goṣṭhe sthāpyāgniṃ vidhivattataḥ / vivāhavidhinā sarvaṃ kuryādbrāhmaṇavācanam //
analyzed: vāpyām kūpe gavām goṣṭhe sthāpya agnim vidhivat tatas vivāha vidhinā sarvam kuryāt brāhmaṇa vācanam

original: pātrāsādanaṃ śrapaṇamupayamanakuśādikam / puryukṣaṇānte homaṃ ca karyā dvai brāhmaṇena tu //
analyzed: pātra āsādanam śrapaṇam upayamana kuśa ādikam puryukṣaṇa ante homam ca brāhmaṇena tu

original: āghārāvājyabhāgau ca cakṣuṣī ca pradā payet / prathame 'hariti mantreṇa hotavyāśca ṣaḍāhutīḥ (tayaḥ) //
analyzed: āghārau ājyabhāgau ca cakṣuṣī ca pradā payet prathame hariti mantreṇa hotavyāḥ ca ṣaḍ āhutīḥ tayaḥ

original: āghārāvājyabhāgau tu pāyasenāṅgadevatāḥ / agnaye rudrāya śarvāya paśupataye ugrāya śivāya / bhavāya mahādevāyeśānāya yamāya ca //
analyzed: āghārau ājyabhāgau tu pāyasena aṅga devatāḥ agnaye rudrāya śarvāya paśupataye ugrāya śivāya bhavāya mahādevāya īśānāya yamāya ca

original: piṣṭakena sakṛddhomaṃ pūṣāgā iti mantrataḥ / ubhayoḥ sviṣṭikūddhomaścaruṇā pāyasena ca //
analyzed: piṣṭakena sakṛt homam pūṣā āgāḥ iti mantrataḥ ubhayoḥ su iṣṭikūddhomaḥ caruṇā pāyasena ca

original: prathamaṃ vyāhṛtihomaḥ prāyaścittaṃ prajāpatiḥ / saṃstravaprāśanaṃ kuryātpraṇītāparimokṣaṇam //
analyzed: prathamam vyāhṛti homaḥ prāyaścittam prajāpatiḥ saṃstrava prāśanam kuryāt praṇītā parimokṣaṇam

original: pavitrapratipattiśca brāhmaṇe dakṣaiṇā tataḥ / ṣaḍaṅgarudrajāpyena proto mokṣamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: pavitra pratipattiḥ ca brāhmaṇe dakṣa eṇā tatas ṣaṣ aṅga rudra jāpyena protaḥ mokṣam avāpnuyāt

original: ekavarṇaṃ vṛṣañcaiva sakṛdvatsatarīṃ khaga / snāpayitvā tataḥ kuryātsarvālaṅkārabhūṣitam //
analyzed: eka varṇam vṛṣan ca eva sakṛt vatsatarīm khaga  snāpayitvā tatas kuryāt sarva alaṅkāra bhūṣitam

original: pratiṣṭhāpya ca tadyugmaṃ preto mokṣamavāpnuyāt / puccheca tarpaṇaṃ kāryamucchrite mantrapūrvakam / brāhmaṇān bhojayetpaścāddakṣiṇābhiśca toṣayet //
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpya ca tat yugmam pretaḥ mokṣam avāpnuyāt  pucche ca tarpaṇam kāryam ucchrite mantra pūrvakam brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt dakṣiṇābhiḥ ca toṣayet

original: tataḥ śrāddhaṃ samuddiṣṭamekoddiṣṭaṃ yathāvidhi / jalamannaṃ tathā deyaṃ pretoddharaṇahetave //
analyzed: tatas śrāddham samuddiṣṭam ekoddiṣṭam yathāvidhi jalam annam tathā deyam preta uddharaṇa hetave

original: dvādaśāhe tataḥ kuryānmāsemāse pṛthakpathak / evaṃ vidhiḥ samāyuktaḥ pretamokṣe karoti hi //
analyzed: dvādaśa ahe tatas kuryāt māse māse pṛthak pathak  evam vidhiḥ samāyuktaḥ preta mokṣe karoti hi

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde vṛṣotsarganirūpaṇaṃ nāmai kacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde vṛṣotsarganirūpaṇam nāma ekacatvāriṃśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 42
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīviṣṇuruvāca / yathā dhenusahasreṣu vatso vindati mātaram / tathā pūrvakṛtaṃ karma kartāramanugacchati //
analyzed: śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca yathā dhenu sahasreṣu vatsaḥ vindati mātaram tathā pūrva kṛtam karma kartāram anugacchati

original: ādityo varuṇo viṣṇurbrahmā somo hutāśanaḥ / śūlapāṇiśca bhagavānabhinandati bhūmidam //
analyzed: ādityaḥ varuṇaḥ viṣṇuḥ brahmā somaḥ hutāśanaḥ śūlapāṇiḥ ca bhagavān abhinandati bhūmi dam

original: nāsti bhamisamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti bhamisamo nidhiḥ / nāsti satyasamo dharmo nānṛtātpātakaṃ param //
analyzed: na asti bhami samam dānam na asti bhami samaḥ nidhiḥ na asti satya samaḥ dharmaḥ na anṛtāt pātakam param

original: agnerapatyaṃ prathamaṃ suvarṇaṃ bhūrvaiṣṇavī sūryasutāśca gāvaḥ / lokatrayaṃ tena bhavetpradattaṃ yaḥ kāñcanaṃ gāṃ ca mahīṃ ca dadyāt //
analyzed: agneḥ apatyam prathamam suvarṇam bhūḥ vaiṣṇavī sūrya sutāḥ ca gāvaḥ lokatrayam tena bhavet pradattam yaḥ kāñcanam gām ca mahīm ca dadyāt

original: trīṇyāhuratidānāni gāvaḥ pṛthvī sarasvatī / narakāduddharantyete japapūjanahomataḥ //
analyzed: trīṇi āhuḥ atidānāni gāvaḥ pṛthvī sarasvatī narakāt uddharanti ete japa pūjana homataḥ

original: kṛtvā bahūni pāpāni raudrāṇi vipulāni ca / api gocarmamātreṇa bhūmidānena śudhyati //
analyzed: kṛtvā bahūni pāpāni raudrāṇi vipulāni ca  api gocarma mātreṇa bhūmi dānena śudhyati

original: harantamapi lobhena nirudhyainaṃ nivārayet / sa yāti narake ghore yastaṃ na parirakṣati //
analyzed: harantam api lobhena nirudhya enam nivārayet sa yāti narake ghore yaḥ tam na parirakṣati

original: akartavyaṃ na kartavyaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi / kartavyameva kartavyamiti dharmavido viduḥ //
analyzed: akartavyam na kartavyam prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭha gataiḥ api kartavyam eva kartavyam iti dharma vidaḥ viduḥ

original: ākārapravartane pāpaṃ gosahasravadhaiḥsamam / vṛtticchede tathā vṛtteḥ karaṇaṃ lakṣadhenukam //
analyzed: ākāra pravartane pāpam go sahasra vadhaiḥ samam vṛtti chede tathā vṛtteḥ karaṇam lakṣadhenukam

original: varamekāpyapahṛtā na tu dattaṃ gavāṃ śatam / ekāṃ hṛtvā śataṃ dattvā na tena samatā bhavet //
analyzed: varam ekā api apahṛtā na tu dattam gavām śatam  ekām hṛtvā śatam dattvā na tena sama tā bhavet

original: svayameva tu yo dattvā svayameva prabādhate / sa pāpī narakaṃ yāti yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam //
analyzed: svayam eva tu yaḥ dattvā svayam eva prabādhate sa pāpī narakam yāti yāvat ābhūtasaṃplavam

original: na cāśvamedhena tathā vidhivaddakṣiṇāvatā / avṛttikarśite dīne brāhmaṇe gakṣite yathā //
analyzed: na ca aśvamedhena tathā vidhivat dakṣiṇāvatā avṛtti karśite dīne brāhmaṇe yathā

original: na tadbhavati vedeṣu yajñe subahudakṣiṇe / yatpuṇyaṃ durbale traste brāhmaṇe parirakṣite //
analyzed: na tat bhavati vedeṣu yajñe su bahu dakṣiṇe yat puṇyam durbale traste brāhmaṇe parirakṣite

original: brahmasvaiścasupuṣṭāni vāhanāni balāni ca / yuddhakāle viśīryante saikatāḥ setavo yathā //
analyzed: brahma svaiḥ ca su puṣṭāni vāhanāni balāni ca  yuddha kāle viśīryante saikatāḥ setavaḥ yathā

original: svadattāṃ paradattāṃ vā yo harecca vasundharām / ṣaṣṭivarṣasahasrāṇi viṣṭhāyāṃ jāyate kṛmiḥ //
analyzed: sva dattām para dattām vā yaḥ haret ca vasundharām ṣaṣṭi varṣa sahasrāṇi viṣṭhāyām jāyate kṛmiḥ

original: brahmasvaṃ praṇayādbhuktaṃ dahatyāsaptamaṃ kulam / tadeva cauryarūpeṇa dahatyācandratārakam //
analyzed: brahma svam praṇayāt bhuktam dahati āsaptamam kulam tat eva caurya rūpeṇa dahati ācandratārakam

original: lohacūrṇāśmacūrṇāni kadācijjarayetpumān / brahmasvantriṣu lokeṣu kaḥ pumāñjarayiṣyati //
analyzed: loha cūrṇa aśma cūrṇāni kadācid jarayet pumān  brahmasvant triṣu lokeṣu kaḥ pumān jarayiṣyati

original: devadravyavināśena brahmasvaharaṇena ca / kulānyakulatāṃ yānti brāhmaṇātikrameṇa ca //
analyzed: deva dravya vināśena brahma sva haraṇena ca kulāni akula tām yānti brāhmaṇa atikrameṇa ca

original: brāhmaṇāti kramo nāsti vipre vidyāvivarjite / jvalantamagnimutsṛjya na hi bhasmani hūyate //
analyzed: brāhmaṇa ati kramaḥ na asti vipre vidyā vivarjite jvalantam agnim utsṛjya na hi bhasmani hūyate

original: saṃkrāntau yāni dānāni havyakavyāni yāni ca / saptakalpakṣayaṃ yāvaddadātyarkaḥ punaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: saṃkrāntau yāni dānāni havya kavyāni yāni ca sapta kalpa kṣayam yāvat dadāti arkaḥ punar punar

original: pratigrahādhyāpanayājaneṣu pratigrahaṃ sveṣṭatamaṃ vadanti / pratigrahācchrudhyati jāpyahomaṃ na yājanaṃ karma punanti vedāḥ //
analyzed: pratigraha adhyāpana yājaneṣu pratigraham sveṣṭatamam vadanti pratigrahāt śrudhyati jāpya homam na yājanam karma punanti vedāḥ

original: sadā jāpī sadā homī parapākavivarjitaḥ / ratnapūrṇāmapi mahīṃ pratigṛhṇanna lipyate //
analyzed: sadā jāpī sadā homī para pāka vivarjitaḥ ratna pūrṇām api mahīm pratigṛhṇan na lipyate

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde bhūdānādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde bhūdānādinirūpaṇam nāma dvicatvāriṃśatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 43
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīviṣṇuruvāca / jalāgnibandhanabhraṣṭā pravrajyānāśakacyutāḥ / aindavābhyāṃ viśudhyanti dattvā dhenuṃ tathā vṛṣam //
analyzed: śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca jala agni bandhana bhraṣṭā pravrajyā anāśaka cyutāḥ aindavābhyām viśudhyanti dattvā dhenum tathā vṛṣam

original: ūnadvādaśavarṣasya caturvarṣādhikasya ca / prāyaścittaṃ carenmātā pitā vānyo 'pi bāndhavaḥ //
analyzed: ūna dvādaśa varṣasya catur varṣa adhikasya ca prāyaścittam caret mātā pitā bāndhavaḥ

original: ato bālanarasyāpi nāparādho na pātakam / rājadaṇḍo na tasyāsti prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate //
analyzed: atas bāla narasya api na aparādhaḥ na pātakam rāja daṇḍaḥ na tasya asti prāyaścittam na vidyate

original: raktasya darśane daṣṭe āturā strī bhaved yadi / caturthe 'hni padādīṃśca tyaktvā snātvā viśudhyati //
analyzed: raktasya darśane daṣṭe āturā strī bhavet yadi caturthe hni pada ādīn ca tyaktvā snātvā viśudhyati

original: āture snāna utpanne daśakṛtvo hyanāturaḥ / snātvāsnātvāspṛśedenaṃ tataḥ śudhyet sa āturaḥ //
analyzed: āture snāne utpanne daśa kṛtvas hi anāturaḥ snātvā a snātvā spṛśet enam tatas śudhyet saḥ āturaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde śuddhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde śuddhinirūpaṇam nāma tricatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 44
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīviṣṇuruvāca / svecchayā tārkṣya maraṇaṃ śṛṅgidaṃṣṭrisarīsṛpaḥ / cāṇḍālādyātmaghātaiśca viṣādyaistāḍanaistathā //
analyzed: śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca sva icchayā tārkṣya maraṇam śṛṅgi daṃṣṭri sarīsṛpaḥ  cāṇḍāla ādi ātmaghātaiḥ ca viṣa ādyaiḥ tāḍanaiḥ tathā

original: jalāgnipātavātaiśca nirāhārādibhistathā / yeṣāmeva bhavenmṛtyuḥ proktāste pāpakarmiṇaḥ //
analyzed: jala agni pāta vātaiḥ ca nirāhāra ādibhiḥ tathā yeṣām eva bhavet mṛtyuḥ proktāḥ te pāpa karmiṇaḥ

original: pāṣaḍyanāśramāścaiva mahāpātakinastathā / striyaśca vyabhicāriṇya ārūḍhapatitāstathā //
analyzed: pāṣaḍya nāśramāḥ ca eva mahāpātakinaḥ tathā striyaḥ ca vyabhicāriṇyaḥ ārūḍha patitāḥ tathā

original: na teṣāṃ syānnava śrāddhaṃ na saṃskāraḥ sapiṇḍanam / śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśoktāni na bhavanti ca tānyapi //
analyzed: na teṣām syāt nava śrāddham na saṃskāraḥ sapiṇḍanam  śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa uktāni na bhavanti ca tāni api

original: vetanaṃ yat kṣipedapsu gṛhyāgniśca catuṣpathe / pātrāṇinirdahedagnau sāgnike pāpakarmaṇi //
analyzed: vetanam yat kṣipet apsu gṛhya agniḥ ca catuṣpathe pātrāṇi nirdahet agnau sa agnike pāpa karmaṇi

original: pūrṇe saṃvatsare teṣāmitthaṃ kāryaṃ dayālubhiḥ / ekādaśīṃ samāsādya śuklapakṣe ca kāśyapa //
analyzed: pūrṇe saṃvatsare teṣām ittham kāryam dayālubhiḥ ekādaśīm samāsādya śukla pakṣe ca kāśyapa

original: viṣṇuṃ yamaṃ ca sampūjya gandhapuṣpākṣatādibhiḥ / daśa piṇḍān ghṛtāktāṃśca darbheṣu madhusaṃyutān //
analyzed: viṣṇum yamam ca sampūjya gandha puṣpa akṣata ādibhiḥ daśa piṇḍān ghṛta aktān ca darbheṣu madhu saṃyutān

original: yajñopavīti satilān dhyāyan viṣṇuṃ yamaṃ tathā / dakṣiṇābhimukhastūṣṇīmekaikaṃ nirvapet tutān //
analyzed: yajña upavīti sa tilān dhyāyan viṣṇum yamam tathā dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ tūṣṇīm ekaikam nirvapet tutān

original: uddhṛtya miśritān paścāt tīrthe 'bhmaḥ su viniḥ kṣipet / kṣipan saṃkīrtayennāma gotraṃ ca mṛtakasya ca //
analyzed: uddhṛtya miśritān paścāt tīrthe kṣipet  kṣipan saṃkīrtayet nāma gotram ca mṛtakasya ca

original: punarapyarcayedviṣṇuṃ yamaṃ kusumacandanaiḥ / dhūpadīpaiḥ sanaivedyairbhakṣyabhojyasamanvitaiḥ //
analyzed: punar api arcayet viṣṇum yamam kusuma candanaiḥ dhūpa dīpaiḥ sa naivedyaiḥ bhakṣya bhojya samanvitaiḥ

original: tasminnupavasedahni viprāṃśceva nimantrayet / kulavidyātapoyuktān sādhuśīlasamanvitān //
analyzed: tasmin upavaset ahni viprān ca iva nimantrayet kula vidyā tapaḥ yuktān sādhu śīla samanvitān

original: nava saptāthavā pañca svasāmarthyānusārataḥ / apare 'hani madhyāhne yamaṃ viṣṇuṃ tathārcayet //
analyzed: nava sapta athavā pañca sva sāmarthya anusārataḥ apare hani madhyāhne yamam viṣṇum tathā arcayet

original: udaṅmukhāṃstathā viprāṃstān samyagupaveśayet / āvāhanārghadānādau viṣṇuṃ yamasamanvitam //
analyzed: udak mukhān tathā viprān tān samyak upaveśayet āvāhana argha dāna ādau viṣṇum yama samanvitam

original: yajñopavītī kurvīta pretanāma prakīrtayet / pretaṃ yamaṃ ca viṣṇuṃ ca smaran śrāddhaṃ samāpayet //
analyzed: yajña upavītī kurvīta preta nāma prakīrtayet pretam yamam ca viṣṇum ca smaran śrāddham samāpayet

original: anyebhyaścāpi sarvebhyaḥ piṇḍadānārthamuddharet / pṛthagvā daśa piṇḍāṃśca pañca dadyāt krameṇa tu //
analyzed: anyebhyaḥ ca api sarvebhyaḥ piṇḍa dāna artham uddharet pṛthak vā daśa piṇḍān ca pañca dadyāt krameṇa tu

original: prathamaṃ viṣṇave dadyādbrahmaṇe ca śivāya ca / sabhṛtyāya śivāyātha pretāyāpi ca pañcamam //
analyzed: prathamam viṣṇave dadyāt brahmaṇe ca śivāya ca sa bhṛtyāya śivāya atha pretāya api ca pañcamam

original: nāma gotraṃ smaret tasya viṣṇuśabdaṃ prakīrtayet / namaskāraśiraskantu pañcamaṃ piṇḍamuddharet //
analyzed: nāma gotram smaret tasya viṣṇu śabdam prakīrtayet namaskāra śiraskam tu pañcamam piṇḍam uddharet

original: gobhūmipiṇḍadānādyaiḥ śaktyā pretaṃ smaraṃśca tam / tilaistilāṃstu viprāṇāṃ darbhayukteṣu pāṇiṣu //
analyzed: go bhūmi piṇḍa dāna ādyaiḥ śaktyā pretam smaran ca tam tilaiḥ tilān tu viprāṇām darbha yukteṣu pāṇiṣu

original: dadyādannaṃ dvijānāṃ ca tāmbūlaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ tathā / evaṃ śiṣṭatamaṃ vipraṃ hariṇyena prapūjayet //
analyzed: dadyāt annam dvijānām ca tāmbūlam dakṣiṇām tathā evam śiṣṭatamam vipram hariṇyena prapūjayet

original: nāma gotraṃ smaran dadyādviṣṇuprītostviti bruvan / anuvrajya dvijān paścāt tyaktāmbho dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ //
analyzed: nāma gotram smaran dadyāt viṣṇu prītostu iti bruvan anuvrajya dvijān paścāt tyakta ambhaḥ dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ

original: kīrtayannāmagotre tu bhuvi prītostviti kṣipet / mitrabandhujanaiḥ sārdhaṃ śeṣaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ / pratisaṃvatsarādi syādekoddiṣṭavidhānataḥ //
analyzed: kīrtayan nāma gotre tu bhuvi prītostu iti kṣipet mitra bandhu janaiḥ sārdham śeṣam bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ prati saṃvatsara ādi syāt ekoddiṣṭa vidhānataḥ

original: evaṃ kṛte gamiṣyanti svarlokaṃ pāpakarmiṇaḥ / sapiṇḍīkaraṇādau tu kṛte caivāpnuvantite //
analyzed: evam kṛte gamiṣyanti svar lokam pāpa karmiṇaḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇa ādau tu kṛte ca eva āpnuvanti te

original: atha kaścit pramādena mriyate hyudakādibhiḥ / saṃsārapramukhastasya sarvaṃ kuryādyathāvidhi //
analyzed: atha kaścid pramādena mriyate hi udaka ādibhiḥ saṃsāra pramukhaḥ tasya sarvam kuryāt yathāvidhi

original: pramādādicchayā martyo na gacchetsarpasaṃmukhaḥ / pakṣayorubhayornāgaṃ pañcamīṣu prapūjayet //
analyzed: pramādāt icchayā martyaḥ na gacchet sarpa saṃmukhaḥ pakṣayoḥ ubhayoḥ nāgam pañcamīṣu prapūjayet

original: kuryāt piṣṭamayīṃ lekhāṃ nāgānāmākṛtiṃ bhuvi / arcayet tāṃ sitaiḥ puṣpaiḥ sugandhaiścandanenaca //
analyzed: kuryāt piṣṭa mayīm lekhām nāgānām ākṛtim bhuvi  arcayet tām sitaiḥ puṣpaiḥ sugandhaiḥ candanena ca

original: pradadyāddhūpadīpantu taṇḍulāṃśca sitān kṣipet / āmapiṣṭaṃ tathaivānnaṃ kṣīrañca vinivedayet //
analyzed: pradadyāt dhūpa dīpam tu taṇḍulān ca sitān kṣipet āma piṣṭam tathā eva annam kṣīram ca vinivedayet

original: upasthāya vadedevaṃ muñcan mudrāṃśukāni ca / madhuraṃ taddine 'śrīyāddevaśrāddhaṃ samāpayet //
analyzed: upasthāya vadet evam muñcan mudrā aṃśukāni ca madhuram tad dine śrīyāt deva śrāddham samāpayet

original: sauvarṇaṃ śaktito nāgaṃ tato dadyāddvijottame / dhenuṃ dattvā tato brūyāt prīyatāṃ nāgarāḍiti //
analyzed: sauvarṇam śaktitas nāgam tatas dadyāt dvijottame dhenum dattvā tatas brūyāt prīyatām nāga rāj iti

original: yathāvibhavyaṃ kurvīta karmāṇyanyāni pūrvavat / svaśākhoktavidhānena itthaṃ kuryādyathātatham / pretatvānmocayet tāṃstu svargamārgaṃ nayet ca //
analyzed: yathā vibhavyam kurvīta karmāṇi anyāni pūrvavat sva śākhā ukta vidhānena ittham kuryāt yathātatham preta tvāt mocayet tān tu svarga mārgam nayet ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśākhye dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde durmaraṇe kāryākāryakriyādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśa ākhye dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde durmaraṇe kāryākāryakriyādinirūpaṇam nāma

original: catuścatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: catuścatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 45
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīviṣṇuruvāca / pratyabdaṃ śrāddhamevaṃ te kathayāmi khageśvara / pratyabdaṃ pārvaṇenaiva kuryātāṃ kṣetrajorasau //
analyzed: śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca pratyabdam śrāddham evam te kathayāmi khageśvara pratyabdam pārvaṇena eva kuryātām kṣetraja urasau

original: vidhinācetarairevamekoddiṣṭaṃ na pārvaṇam //
analyzed: vidhinā ca itaraiḥ evam ekoddiṣṭam na pārvaṇam

original: anagneśca sutau syātāmanagnī kṣetrajorasau / ekoddiṣṭaṃ na kuryātāṃ pratyabdaṃ tau tu pārvaṇam //
analyzed: anagneḥ ca sutau syātām anagnī kṣetraja urasau ekoddiṣṭam na kuryātām pratyabdam tau tu pārvaṇam

original: yadā tvanyataraḥ sāgniḥ putro vāpyathavā pitā / pratyabdaṃ pārvaṇaṃ tatra kuryātāṃ kṣetrajaurasau //
analyzed: yadā tu anyataraḥ sa agniḥ putraḥ vā api athavā pitā pratyabdam pārvaṇam tatra kuryātām kṣetraja aurasau

original: anagnayaḥ sāgnayo vā putrā vā pitaro 'pi vā / ekoddiṣṭaṃ sutaiḥ kāryaṃ kṣayāha iti kecana //
analyzed: anagnayaḥ sa agnayaḥ vā putrāḥ vā pitaraḥ vā ekoddiṣṭam sutaiḥ kāryam kṣaya ahe iti kecana

original: darśakāle kṣayo yasya pretapakṣe 'tha vā punaḥ / pratyabdaṃ pārvaṇaṃ kāryaṃ tasya sarvaiḥ sutairapi //
analyzed: darśa kāle kṣayaḥ yasya pretapakṣe vā punar pratyabdam pārvaṇam kāryam tasya sarvaiḥ sutaiḥ api

original: ekoddiṣṭamaputrāṇāṃ puṃsāṃ syādyopitāmapi / ekoddiṣṭe kuśā grāhyāḥ samūlā yajñakarmaṇi / bahirlūnāḥ sakṛllanāḥ śrāddhaṃ vṛddhimṛte sadā //
analyzed: ekoddiṣṭam aputrāṇām puṃsām syāt yopitām api  ekoddiṣṭe kuśāḥ grāhyāḥ sa mūlāḥ yajña karmaṇi bahis lūnāḥ sakṛt lanāḥ śrāddham vṛddhim ṛte sadā

original: kartavye pārvaṇe śrāddhe āśaucaṃ yadi jāyate / āśaucāvagame kuryācchrāddhaṃ hi tadanantaram //
analyzed: kartavye pārvaṇe śrāddhe āśaucam yadi jāyate āśauca avagame kuryāt śrāddham hi tad anantaram

original: ekoddiṣṭe tu samprāpte yadi vighnaḥ prajāyate / māsenyasmin tithau tasyāṃ kuryācchrāddhaṃ tadaiva hi //
analyzed: ekoddiṣṭe tu samprāpte yadi vighnaḥ prajāyate māsenyasmin tithau tasyām kuryāt śrāddham tadā eva hi

original: tūṣṇīṃ śrāddhāntu śūdrasya bhāryāyāstatsutasya ca / kanyāyāśca dvijātīnāmanupetadvijasya ca //
analyzed: tūṣṇīm śrāddhān tu śūdrasya bhāryāyāḥ tad sutasya ca kanyāyāḥ ca dvijātīnām anupeta dvijasya ca

original: ekakāle gatā sūnāṃ bahūnāmatha vā dvayoḥ / tantreṇa śrapaṇaṃ kuryācchrāddhaṃ kuryāt pṛthakpṛthak //
analyzed: eka kāle gatā sūnām bahūnām atha vā dvayoḥ tantreṇa śrapaṇam kuryāt śrāddham kuryāt pṛthak pṛthak

original: dadyāt pūrvaṃ mṛtasyādau dvitīyasya tataḥ punaḥ / tṛtīyasya tataḥ kuryāt saṃnipāte tvayaṃ vidhiḥ (kramaḥ) //
analyzed: dadyāt pūrvam mṛtasya ādau dvitīyasya tatas punar tṛtīyasya tatas kuryāt saṃnipāte tu ayam vidhiḥ kramaḥ

original: pratyabdamevaṃ yaḥ kuryādyathātathamatandritaḥ / tārayitvā pitṝn sarvān prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim //
analyzed: pratyabdam evam yaḥ kuryāt yathātatham atandritaḥ tārayitvā pitṝn sarvān prāpnoti paramām gatim

original: na jñāyate mṛtāhaścet prasthānadinameva ca / māsaścet syāt parijñātastaddarśe syānmṛtāhikam //
analyzed: na jñāyate mṛtāhaḥ ced prasthāna dinam eva ca māsaḥ ced syāt parijñātaḥ tad darśe syāt mṛtāhikam

original: yadā māso na vijñāto vijñātaṃ dinameva ca / tadā mārgaśire māsi māghe vā taddinaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: yadā māsaḥ na vijñātaḥ vijñātam dinam eva ca tadā mārgaśire māsi māghe vā tat dinam bhavet

original: dinamāsāvavijñātau maraṇasya yadā punaḥ / prasthānadinamāsau tu grāhyau śrāddhe mayoditau //
analyzed: dina māsau avijñātau maraṇasya yadā punar prasthāna dina māsau tu grāhyau śrāddhe mayā uditau

original: prasthānasyāpi na jñātau dinamāsau yadā punaḥ / mṛtavārtāśrutau grāhyau pūrvaproktakrameṇa tu //
analyzed: prasthānasya api na jñātau dina māsau yadā punar mṛta vārtā śrutau grāhyau pūrva prokta krameṇa tu

original: pravāsamantareṇāpi syātāṃ tau vismṛtau yadā / tadānīmapi tau grāhyau pūrvavat tu mṛtāhike //
analyzed: pravāsam antareṇa api syātām tau vismṛtau yadā tadānīm api tau grāhyau pūrvavat tu mṛtāhike

original: gṛhasthe proṣite yacca kaścittu mriyate gṛhe / āsaucāpagame yatra prārabdhe śrāddhakarmaṇi //
analyzed: gṛhasthe proṣite yat ca kaścid tu mriyate gṛhe  āsauca apagame yatra prārabdhe śrāddha karmaṇi

original: pratyāgataścejjānāti tatra vṛttaṃ gṛhī tathā / āśaucaṃ gṛhiṇasteṣāṃ na dravyādestadā bhavet //
analyzed: pratyāgataḥ ced jānāti tatra vṛttam gṛhī tathā āśaucam gṛhiṇaḥ teṣām na dravya ādeḥ tadā bhavet

original: putrādinā yadārabdhaṃ śrāddhaṃ tattvena vākhilam / samāpanīyaṃ tatrāpi śrāddhaṃ gṛhītu dūrataḥ //
analyzed: putra ādinā yat ārabdham śrāddham tattvena vā akhilam samāpanīyam tatra api śrāddham dūratas

original: dātrā boktrā ca na jñātaṃ sūtakaṃ mṛtakaṃ tathā / ubhayorapi taddoṣaṃ nāropayati karhicit //
analyzed: dātrā boktrā ca na jñātam sūtakam mṛtakam tathā ubhayoḥ api tad doṣam na āropayati karhicit

original: yadā tvanyatarajñātaṃ sūtakaṃ mṛtakaṃ tathā / bhoktureva tadā doṣo nānyo dātā praduṣyati //
analyzed: yadā tu anyatara jñātam sūtakam mṛtakam tathā bhoktuḥ eva tadā doṣaḥ na anyaḥ dātā praduṣyati

original: ityuktena prakāreṇa yaḥ kuryānmṛtavāsaram / avijñātamṛtāhasya satataṃ tārayatyasau //
analyzed: iti uktena prakāreṇa yaḥ kuryāt mṛta vāsaram a vijñāta mṛta ahasya satatam tārayati asau

original: nityaśrāddhe 'tha gandhādyairdvijānabhyarcya bhaktitaḥ / sarvān pitṛgaṇān samyak sahaivoddiśya yojayet //
analyzed: nitya śrāddhe gandha ādyaiḥ dvijān abhyarcya bhaktitaḥ sarvān pitṛ gaṇān samyak saha eva uddiśya yojayet

original: āvāhanaṃ svadhākāro piṇḍāgnaukaraṇādikam / brahmacaryādiniyamā viśvadevāstathaiva ca //
analyzed: āvāhanam svadhākāraḥ piṇḍa agnaukaraṇa ādikam brahmacarya ādi niyamāḥ viśva devāḥ tathā eva ca

original: nityaśrāddhe tyajedetān bhojyamannaṃ prakalpayet / dattvā tu dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā namaskārairvisarjayet //
analyzed: nitya śrāddhe tyajet etān bhojyam annam prakalpayet  dattvā tu dakṣiṇām śaktyā namaskāraiḥ visarjayet

original: devānuddiśya viśvādīn yaddadyāddvijabhojanam / tannityaśrāddhavat kāryaṃ devaśrāddhaṃ taducyate //
analyzed: devān uddiśya viśva ādīn yat dadyāt dvija bhojanam  tat nitya śrāddha vat kāryam devaśrāddham tat ucyate

original: mātṛśrāddhantu pūrveṇa karmādau paitṛkaṃ tathā / uttare 'hani vṛddhau syānmātāmahagaṇasya tu //
analyzed: mātṛ śrāddham tu pūrveṇa karma ādau paitṛkam tathā uttare hani vṛddhau syāt mātāmaha gaṇasya tu

original: śrāddhatrayaṃ prakurrvīta vaiśvadevantutāntrikam //
analyzed: śrāddha trayam prakurrvīta

original: mātṛbhyaḥ kalpayetpūrvaṃ pitṛbhyastadanantaram / mātāmahebhyaśca tathā dadyāditthaṃ krameṇa tu //
analyzed: mātṛbhyaḥ kalpayet pūrvam pitṛbhyaḥ tad anantaram mātāmahebhyaḥ ca tathā dadyāt ittham krameṇa tu

original: mātṛśrāddhe tu viprāṇāmabhāve sukulodgatāḥ / patiputrānvitāḥ sādhvyo yoṣito 'ṣṭau ca bhāvayet //
analyzed: mātṛ śrāddhe tu viprāṇām abhāve su kula udgatāḥ pati putra anvitāḥ sādhvyaḥ ca bhāvayet

original: iṣṭāpūrtādike śrāddhaṃ kuryādābhyudayaṃ tathā / utpātādinimitteṣu nitya śrāddhavadeva tu //
analyzed: iṣṭāpūrta ādike śrāddham kuryāt ābhyudayam tathā utpāta ādi nimitteṣu nitya śrāddha vat eva tu

original: nityaṃ daivañca vṛddhiñca kāmyaṃ naimittikaṃ tathā / śrāddhānyuktaprakāreṇa kurvan siddhimavāpnuyāt / iti te kathitaṃ tārkṣya kimanyatparipṛcchasi //
analyzed: nityam daivam ca vṛddhim ca kāmyam naimittikam tathā śrāddhāni ukta prakāreṇa kurvan siddhim avāpnuyāt iti te kathitam tārkṣya kim anyat paripṛcchasi

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pratyābdikādiśrāddhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśo
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde pratyābdikādiśrāddhanirūpaṇam nāma pañcacatvāriṃśaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 46
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: tārkṣya uvāca / sukṛtasya prabhāveṇa svargo nānāvidho naṇām / bhogāḥ saukhyāti rūpañca balaṃ buddhaiḥ parākramaḥ //
analyzed: tārkṣyaḥ uvāca sukṛtasya prabhāveṇa svargaḥ nānāvidhaḥ bhogāḥ rūpam ca balam buddhaiḥ parākramaḥ

original: satyaṃ puṇyavatāṃ deva jāyate 'tra paratra ca / satyaṃsatyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ vedavākyaṃ na cānyathā //
analyzed: satyam puṇyavatām deva jāyate paratra ca satyam satyam punar satyam veda vākyam na ca anyathā

original: dharmo jayati nādharmaḥ satyaṃ jayāte nānṛtam / kṣamā jayati na krodho viṣṇurjayati nāsuraḥ //
analyzed: dharmaḥ jayati na adharmaḥ satyam jayāte na anṛtam kṣamā jayati na krodhaḥ viṣṇuḥ jayati na asuraḥ

original: tadvatsatyaṃ mayā jñātaṃ sukṛtācchobhanaṃ bhavet / yatotkṛṣṭatamaṃ puṇyaṃ tathotkṛṣṭataronaraḥ //
analyzed: tadvat satyam mayā jñātam sukṛtāt śobhanam bhavet yatas utkṛṣṭatamam puṇyam tathā utkṛṣṭataraḥ naraḥ

original: evantu śrotumicchāmi jāyante pāpino yathā / yena karmavipākena yathā niyamabhāgbhavet //
analyzed: evam tu śrotum icchāmi jāyante pāpinaḥ yathā  yena karma vipākena yathā niyama bhāj bhavet

original: yāṃyāṃ yonimavāpnoti yathārūpaśca jāyate / tanme vada suraśreṣṭha samāsenāpi kāṅkṣitam //
analyzed: yām yām yonim avāpnoti yathārūpaḥ ca jāyate tat me vada suraśreṣṭha samāsena api kāṅkṣitam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / śubhāśubhaphalaistārkṣya bhuktabhogā narāstviha / jāyante lakṣaṇairyaistutāni me śṛṇu kāśyapa //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca śubha aśubha phalaiḥ tārkṣya bhukta bhogāḥ narāḥ tu iha jāyante lakṣaṇaiḥ yebhiḥ tu tāni me śṛṇu kāśyapa

original: gururātmavatāṃ śāstā rājā śāstā durātmanām / iha pracchannapāpānāṃ śāstā vaivasvato yamaḥ //
analyzed: guruḥ ātmavatām śāstā rājā śāstā durātmanām iha pracchanna pāpānām śāstā vaivasvataḥ yamaḥ

original: prāyaścitteṣvacīrṇeṣu yamalokā hyanekadhā / yātanābhirvimuktā ye yānti te jīvasantatīm //
analyzed: prāyaścitteṣu a cīrṇeṣu yama lokāḥ hi anekadhā yātanābhiḥ vimuktāḥ ye yānti te jīva santatīm

original: gatvā mānuṣabhāve tu pāpacihnā bhavanti te / tānyahaṃ tava cihnāni kathayiṣye khagottama //
analyzed: gatvā mānuṣa bhāve tu pāpa cihnāḥ bhavanti te tāni aham tava cihnāni kathayiṣye khaga uttama

original: soḍhvā vai yātanāḥ sarvā gatvā vaivasvatakṣayam / nistīrṇayātanāste tu lokamāyānti cihnitāḥ //
analyzed: soḍhvā vai yātanāḥ sarvāḥ gatvā vaivasvata kṣayam nistīrṇa yātanāḥ te tu lokam āyānti cihnitāḥ

original: gadgado 'natavādī syānmūkaścaiva gavānṛte / brahmahā jāyate kuṣṭhī śyāvadantaśca madyapaḥ //
analyzed: gadgadaḥ nata vādī syāt mūkaḥ ca eva gavānṛte  brahma hā jāyate kuṣṭhī śyāva dantaḥ ca madyapaḥ

original: kunakhī svarṇaharaṇādduścarmā gurutalpagaḥ / saṃyogī hīnayoniḥ syāddaridro 'dattadānataḥ //
analyzed: kunakhī svarṇa haraṇāt duścarmā guru talpa gaḥ saṃyogī hīna yoniḥ syāt daridraḥ datta dānataḥ

original: ayājyayājako yāti grāhamasūkaratāṃ dvijaḥ / kharo vai bahuyājī syātkāko nirmantrabhojanāt //
analyzed: a yājya yājakaḥ yāti grāham a sūkara tām dvijaḥ kharaḥ vai bahu yājī syāt kākaḥ nirmantra bhojanāt

original: aparīkṣitabhoktāro vyāghrāḥ syurnirjane vane / bahutarjako mārjaraḥ khadyotaḥ kakṣadāhakaḥ //
analyzed: aparīkṣita bhoktāraḥ vyāghrāḥ syuḥ nirjane vane bahu tarjakaḥ mārjaraḥ khadyotaḥ kakṣa dāhakaḥ

original: pātre vidyāpradātā yo balīvardo bhavettasaḥ / annaṃ paryuṣitaṃ vipre pradadatkukkaro bhavet //
analyzed: pātre vidyā pradātā yaḥ balīvardaḥ bhavet tasaḥ annam paryuṣitam vipre pradadat kukkaraḥ bhavet

original: mātsaryādapi jātyandho janmāndhaḥ pustakaṃ haran / phalānyāharato 'patyaṃ mriyate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: mātsaryāt api jātyandhaḥ janmāndhaḥ pustakam haran mriyate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: mṛto vānaratāṃ yāti tanmukho gaṇḍavān bhavet / adattvā bhakṣyamaśrāti anapatyo bhavettu saḥ //
analyzed: mṛtaḥ vānara tām yāti tad mukhaḥ gaṇḍavān bhavet a dattvā bhakṣyam a śrāti anapatyaḥ bhavet tu saḥ

original: haranvastraṃ bhavedgodhā garadaḥ pavanāśanaḥ / pravajyāgamanādrājan bhavenmarupiśācakaḥ //
analyzed: haran vastram bhavet godhā garadaḥ pavanāśanaḥ pravajyā gamanāt rājan bhavet maru piśācakaḥ

original: cātako jalahartā syāddhānyahartā ca mūṣikaḥ / aprāptayauvanāṃ sevan bhavetsarpa iti śrutiḥ //
analyzed: cātakaḥ jala hartā syāt dhānya hartā ca mūṣikaḥ aprāpta yauvanām sevan bhavet sarpaḥ iti śrutiḥ

original: gurudārābhilāṣī ca kṛkalāso bhaveddhruvam / jalaprastravaṇaṃ yastu bhindyānmatsyo bhavennaraḥ //
analyzed: guru dāra abhilāṣī ca kṛkalāsaḥ bhavet dhruvam jala prastravaṇam yaḥ tu bhindyāt matsyaḥ bhavet naraḥ

original: avikreyakrayāccaiva bako gṛdhro bhavennaraḥ / ayonigo vṛko hi syādulūkaḥ krayavañcanāt //
analyzed: avikreya krayāt ca eva bakaḥ gṛdhraḥ bhavet naraḥ ayoni gaḥ vṛkaḥ hi syāt ulūkaḥ kraya vañcanāt

original: mṛtasyaikādaśāhe tu bhuñjānaścābhijāyate / pratiśrutya dvijebhyor'thamadadajjambuko bhavet //
analyzed: mṛtasya ekādaśa ahe tu bhuñjānaḥ ca abhijāyate pratiśrutya dvijebhyaḥ ṛtham adadat jambukaḥ bhavet

original: rājñariṃ gatvā bhaveddaṃṣṭrī taskaro viṅvarāhakaḥ / śārivā phalavikretā vṛṣaśca vṛṣalīpatiḥ //
analyzed: rājñ arim gatvā bhavet daṃṣṭrī taskaraḥ viṅvarāhakaḥ śārivā phala vikretā vṛṣaḥ ca vṛṣalī patiḥ

original: mārjaro 'gniṃ padā spṛṣṭvā rogavānparamāṃsabhuk / udakyāgamanātṣaṇḍo durgandhaśca sugandhahṛt //
analyzed: mārjaraḥ gnim padā spṛṣṭvā rogavān para māṃsa bhuj udakyā gamanāt ṣaṇḍaḥ durgandhaḥ ca sugandha hṛt

original: yadvā tadvāpi pārakyaṃ svalpaṃ vā harate bahu / hṛtvā vai yonimāpnoti tiraścāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: yat vā tat vā api pārakyam su alpam vā harate bahu hṛtvā vai yonim āpnoti tiraścām na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: evamādīni cihnāni anyānyapi khageśvara / svakarmavitatānyeva?
analyzed: evamādīni cihnāni anyāni api khageśvara sva karma vitatāni eva

original: dṛśyante yaistu mānavaiḥ //
analyzed: dṛśyante yaiḥ tu mānavaiḥ

original: evaṃ duṣkṛtakarmā hi bhuktvā ca narakānkramāt / jāyate karmaśeṣeṇa uktāsvetāsu yoniṣu //
analyzed: evam duṣkṛta karmā hi bhuktvā ca narakān kramāt jāyate karma śeṣeṇa uktāsu etāsu yoniṣu

original: tato janmaśataṃ martye sarvajantuṣu kāśyapa / jāyate nātra sandehaḥ samībhūte śubhāśubhe //
analyzed: tatas janma śatam martye sarva jantuṣu kāśyapa jāyate na atra sandehaḥ samībhūte śubha aśubhe

original: strīpuṃsayo prasaṅgena niruddhe śukrasoṇite / samupetaḥ pañcabhūtairjāyate pāñcabhautikaḥ //
analyzed: strīpuṃsayoḥ prasaṅgena niruddhe śukra soṇite samupetaḥ pañcabhūtaiḥ jāyate pāñcabhautikaḥ

original: indriyāṇi manaḥ prāṇā jñānamāyuḥ sukhaṃ dhṛtiḥ / dhāraṇā preraṇaṃ duḥ khaṃ mithyāhaṅkāra eva ca //
analyzed: indriyāṇi manaḥ prāṇāḥ jñānam āyuḥ sukham dhṛtiḥ dhāraṇā preraṇam duḥ kham mithyā ahaṅkāraḥ eva ca

original: prayatākṛtivarṇastu rāgadveṣau bhavābhavau / tasyedamātmanaḥ sarvamanāderādimicchataḥ //
analyzed: prayata ākṛti varṇaḥ tu rāga dveṣau bhava abhavau tasya idam ātmanaḥ sarvam anādeḥ ādim icchataḥ

original: svakarma baddhasya tadā garbhavṛddhirbhavediti / purā yathā mayā proktaṃ tava jantorhi lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: sva karma baddhasya tadā garbha vṛddhiḥ bhavet iti purā yathā mayā proktam tava jantoḥ hi lakṣaṇam

original: evaṃ pravartitaṃ cakraṃ bhūtagrāme caturvidhe / samutpattirvināśaśca jāyate tārkṣya dehinām //
analyzed: evam pravartitam cakram bhūta grāme caturvidhe samutpattiḥ vināśaḥ ca jāyate tārkṣya dehinām

original: svadharmeṇaivordhvagatiradharmeṇāpyadhogatiḥ / jāyate sarvavarṇānāṃ svadharmacalanāt khaga //
analyzed: svadharmeṇa evā ūrdhva gatiḥ adharmeṇa api adhogatiḥ jāyate sarva varṇānām svadharma calanāt khaga

original: devatve mānuṣatve ca dānabhogādikāḥ kriyāḥ / yā dṛśyante vainateya tatsarvaṃ karmajaṃ phalam //
analyzed: deva tve mānuṣa tve ca dāna bhoga ādikāḥ kriyāḥ yāḥ dṛśyante vainateya tat sarvam karma jam phalam

original: akarmavihite ghore kāmakrodhārjite 'śubhe / patedvai narake bhūyo tasyottāro na vidyate //
analyzed: akarma vihite ghore kāma krodha arjite śubhe patet vai narake bhūyo tasya uttāraḥ na vidyate

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe jīvasya śubhāśubhagatinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe jīvasya śubhāśubhagatinirūpaṇam nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 47
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / bhagavandevadeveśa kṛpayā parayā vada / dānaṃ dānasya māhātmyaṃ vaitaraṇyāḥ pramāṇakam //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca bhagavan devadeveśa kṛpayā parayā vada dānam dānasya māhātmyam vaitaraṇyāḥ pramāṇakam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / yā sā vaitaraṇī nāma yamamārge mahāsarit / agādhā dustarā pāpairdṛṣṭamātrā bhayāvahā //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca  yā sā vaitaraṇī nāma yama mārge mahā sarit agādhā dustarā pāpaiḥ dṛṣṭa mātrā bhaya āvahā

original: pūyaśoṇitatoyāḍhyā māṃsakardamasakuṃlā / pāpinañcāgatāndṛṣṭvā nānābhayasamāvṛtā //
analyzed: pūya śoṇita toya āḍhyā pāpinaṃ ca āgatān dṛṣṭvā nānā bhaya samāvṛtā

original: kvāthyate satvaraṃ toyaṃ pātramadhye ghṛtaṃ yathā / krimibhiḥ saṅkulaṃ pūyaṃ vajratuṇḍaiḥ samāvṛtam //
analyzed: kvāthyate satvaram toyam pātra madhye ghṛtam yathā krimibhiḥ saṅkulam pūyam vajratuṇḍaiḥ samāvṛtam

original: śiśumāraiśca makarairvajrakartarikāyutaiḥ / anyaiśca jalajīvaiśca hiṃsakairmāṃsabhedibhiḥ //
analyzed: śiśumāraiḥ ca makaraiḥ vajra kartarikā yutaiḥ anyaiḥ ca jala jīvaiḥ ca hiṃsakaiḥ māṃsa bhedibhiḥ

original: udyānti dvādaśādityāḥ pralayānte tathā hi te / tapanti tatra vai martyāḥ kranda mānāstu pāpinaḥ //
analyzed: udyānti dvādaśa ādityāḥ pralaya ante tathā hi te tapanti tatra vai martyāḥ kranda mānāḥ tu pāpinaḥ

original: hā bhrātaḥ putra tāteti pralapanti muhurmuhuḥ / vicaranti nimajjanti glāniṃ gacchanti jantavaḥ //
analyzed: hā bhrātar putra tāta iti pralapanti muhur muhur vicaranti nimajjanti glānim gacchanti jantavaḥ

original: caturvidhaiḥ prāṇigaṇairdṛṣṭā vyāptā mahānadī / taranti gopradānena tvanyathā ca patanti te //
analyzed: caturvidhaiḥ prāṇi gaṇaiḥ dṛṣṭā vyāptā mahā nadī taranti go pradānena tu anyathā ca patanti te

original: māṃ narā ye 'vamanyante cācāryaṃ gurumeva ca / vṛddhānanyāṃścāpi mūḍhāsteṣāṃ vāsastu tatra vai //
analyzed: mām narāḥ ye vamanyante ca ācāryam gurum eva ca  vṛddhān anyān ca api mūḍhāḥ teṣām vāsaḥ tu tatra vai

original: pativratāṃ sādhuśīlāmūḍhāṃ dharmeṣu niścalām / parityajanti ye mūḍhāsteṣāṃ vāsastu santatam //
analyzed: pativratām sādhu śīlām ūḍhām dharmeṣu niścalām parityajanti ye mūḍhāḥ teṣām vāsaḥ tu santatam

original: viśvāsapratipannānāṃ svāmimitratapasvinām / strībālavikalādīnāṃ vadhaṃ kṛtvā patanti hi / pacyante tatra madhye tu krandamānāstu pāpinaḥ //
analyzed: viśvāsa pratipannānām svāmi mitra tapasvinām strī bāla vikala ādīnām vadham kṛtvā patanti hi pacyante tatra madhye tu krandamānāḥ tu pāpinaḥ

original: śāntaṃ bubhukṣitaṃ vipraṃyo vighnāyopasarpati / krimibhirbhakṣyate tatra yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam //
analyzed: śāntam bubhukṣitam vighnāya upasarpati krimibhiḥ bhakṣyate tatra yāvat ābhūtasaṃplavam

original: brāhmaṇāya pratīśrutya yamārthaṃ na dadāti tam / āhūya nāsti yo brūyāttasya vāsastu tatra vai //
analyzed: brāhmaṇāya pratīśrutya yama artham na dadāti tam āhūya na asti yaḥ brūyāt tasya vāsaḥ tu tatra vai

original: agnido garadaścaiva kūṭasākṣī ca madyapaḥ / yajñavidhvaṃsakaścaiva rājñīgāmī ca paiśunaḥ //
analyzed: agnidaḥ gara daḥ ca eva kūṭa sākṣī ca madyapaḥ yajña vidhvaṃsakaḥ ca eva rājñī gāmī ca paiśunaḥ

original: kathābhaṅgakaraścaiva svayandattā pahārakaḥ / kṣetrasetuvibhedī ca paradārapradharṣakaḥ //
analyzed: kathā bhaṅga karaḥ ca eva svayandattā pahārakaḥ kṣetra setu vibhedī ca para dāra pradharṣakaḥ

original: brāhmaṇo rasavikretā tathā yo vṛṣalīpatiḥ / godhanasya tṛṣārtasya vāpyā bhedaṃ karoti yaḥ //
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ rasa vikretā tathā yaḥ vṛṣalī patiḥ go dhanasya tṛṣā ārtasya vāpyāḥ bhedam karoti yaḥ

original: kanyāvidūṣakaścaiva dānaṃ dattvānutāpakaḥ / śūbadrastu kapilāpāyī brāhmaṇo māṃsabhojanaḥ //
analyzed: kanyā vidūṣakaḥ ca eva dānam dattvā anutāpakaḥ śūbadraḥ tu kapila apāyī brāhmaṇaḥ māṃsa bhojanaḥ

original: ete vasanti satataṃ mā vicāraṃ kṛthāḥ kvacit / kṛpaṇo nāstikaḥ kṣudraḥ sa tasyāṃ nivasetkhaga //
analyzed: ete vasanti satatam mā vicāram kṛthāḥ kvacid kṛpaṇaḥ nāstikaḥ kṣudraḥ sa tasyām nivaset khaga

original: sadāmarṣo sadā krodhī nijavākyapramāṇakṛt / paroktyucchedako nityaṃ vaitaraṇyā vasecciram //
analyzed: sadā amarṣaḥ sadā krodhī nija vākya pramāṇa kṛt para ukti ucchedakaḥ nityam vaitaraṇyāḥ vaset ciram

original: yastvahaṅkāravānpāpī svavikatthanakārakaḥ / kṛtaghno garbhasantāpī vaitaraṇyāṃ sa majjati //
analyzed: yaḥ tu ahaṅkāravān pāpī sva vikatthana kārakaḥ kṛtaghnaḥ garbha santāpī vaitaraṇyām sa majjati

original: kadāpi bhāgyayogena taraṇecchā bhavedyadi / sānukūlā bhavedyena tadākarṇaya kāśyapa //
analyzed: kadāpi bhāgya yogena taraṇa icchā bhavet yadi sā anukūlā bhavet yena tat ākarṇaya kāśyapa

original: ayane viṣuve puṇye vyatīpāte dinodaye / candrasūryoparāge vā saṃkrāntau darśavāsare //
analyzed: ayane viṣuve puṇye vyatīpāte dina udaye candra sūrya uparāge vā saṃkrāntau darśa vāsare

original: anyeṣu puṇyakāleṣu dīyate dānamuttamam / yadā tadā bhavedvāpi śrāddhā dānaṃ prati dhruvam //
analyzed: anyeṣu puṇya kāleṣu dīyate dānam uttamam yadā tadā bhavet vā api śrāddhāḥ dānam prati dhruvam

original: tadaiba dānakālaḥ syādyataḥ sampattirasthirā / anityāni śarīrāṇi vibhavo naiva śāśvataḥ //
analyzed: tadā eba dāna kālaḥ syāt yatas sampattiḥ asthirā anityāni śarīrāṇi vibhavaḥ nā eva śāśvataḥ

original: nityaṃ sannihito mṛtyuḥ kartavyo dharmasaṃgahaḥ / kṛṣṇāṃ vā pāṭalāṃ vāpi kuryādvaitaraṇīṃ śubhām //
analyzed: nityam sannihitaḥ mṛtyuḥ kartavyaḥ dharma saṃgahaḥ kṛṣṇām vā pāṭalām vā api kuryāt vaitaraṇīm śubhām

original: svarṇaśṛṅgīṃ raupyakhurāṃ kāṃsyapātropadohanīm / kṛṣṇavastrayugācchannāṃ saptadhānyasamanvitām //
analyzed: svarṇa śṛṅgīm raupya khurām kāṃsya pātra upadohanīm kṛṣṇa vastra yuga ācchannām saptadhānya samanvitām

original: kārpāsadroṇaśikhare āsīnaṃ tāmrabhājane / yamaṃ haimaṃ prakurvīta lohadaṇḍasamanvitam / ikṣudaṇḍamayaṃ baddhvā plavaṃ sudṛḍhabandhanaiḥ //
analyzed: kārpāsa droṇa śikhare āsīnam tāmra bhājane yamam haimam prakurvīta loha daṇḍa samanvitam ikṣu daṇḍa mayam baddhvā plavam su dṛḍha bandhanaiḥ

original: uḍupopari tāṃ dhenuṃ sūryadehasamudbhavām / kṛtvā prakalpayedvipraśchatropānahasaṃyutam //
analyzed: uḍupa upari tām dhenum sūrya deha samudbhavām kṛtvā prakalpayet vipraḥ chatra upānaha saṃyutam

original: aṅgulīyakavāsāṃsi brāhmaṇāya nivedayet / imamuccārayenmantraṃ saṃgṛhya sajalānkuśān //
analyzed: aṅgulīyaka vāsāṃsi brāhmaṇāya nivedayet imam uccārayet mantram saṃgṛhya sa jalān kuśān

original: yamadvāre mahāghore śrutvā vaitaraṇīṃ tadīm / tartukāmo dadāmyenāṃ tubhyaṃ vaitaraṇīṃ namaḥ //
analyzed: yama dvāre mahā ghore śrutvā vaitaraṇīm tadīm tartu kāmaḥ dadāmi enām tubhyam vaitaraṇīm namaḥ

original: gāvo me agrataḥ santu gāvo me santu pārśvataḥ / gāvo me hṛdaye santu gavāṃ madhye vasāmyaham //
analyzed: gāvaḥ me agratas santu gāvaḥ me santu pārśvatas gāvaḥ me hṛdaye santu gavām madhye vasāmi aham

original: viṣṇurūpa dvijaśreṣṭha māmuddhara mahīsura / sadakṣiṇā mayā dattā tubhyaṃ vaitaraṇīnamaḥ //
analyzed: viṣṇu rūpa dvijaśreṣṭha mām uddhara mahīsura sa dakṣiṇā mayā dattā tubhyam vaitaraṇī namaḥ

original: dharmarājañca sarveśaṃ vaitaraṇyākhyadhenukām / sarvaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya brāhmaṇāya nivedayet //
analyzed: dharmarājam ca sarva īśam vaitaraṇī ākhya dhenukām sarvam pradakṣiṇīkṛtya brāhmaṇāya nivedayet

original: pucchaṃ saṃgṛhya dhenvāśca agre kṛtvā tu vai vdijam / dhenuke tvaṃ pratīkṣasva yamadvāre mahābhaye //
analyzed: puccham saṃgṛhya dhenvāḥ ca agre kṛtvā tu vai dhenuke tvam pratīkṣasva yama dvāre mahā bhaye

original: uttāraṇāya deveśi vaitaraṇye namo 'stu te / anuvrajettu gacchantaṃ sarvaṃ tasya gṛhaṃ nayet //
analyzed: uttāraṇāya deveśi vaitaraṇye namaḥ stu te  anuvrajet tu gacchantam sarvam tasya gṛham nayet

original: evaṃ kṛte vainateya sā saritsutarā bhavet / sarvānkāmānavāpnoti yo dadyādbhuvi mānavaḥ //
analyzed: evam kṛte vainateya sā sarit sutarā bhavet sarvān kāmān avāpnoti yaḥ dadyāt bhuvi mānavaḥ

original: sukṛtasya prabhāveṇa sukhañceha paratra ca / svasthe sahasraguṇitamāture śatasaṃmitam //
analyzed: sukṛtasya prabhāveṇa sukham ca iha paratra ca svasthe sahasra guṇitam āture śata saṃmitam

original: mṛtasyaiva tu yaddānaṃ parokṣe tatsamaṃ smṛtam / svahastena tato deyaṃ mṛte kaḥ kasya dāsyatī //
analyzed: mṛtasya eva tu yat dānam parokṣe tad samam smṛtam sva hastena tatas deyam mṛte kaḥ kasya dāsyatī

original: dānadharmavihīnānāṃ kṛpaṇairjīvetakṣitaiḥ / asthireṇa śarīreṇa sthiraṃ karma samācaret //
analyzed: dāna dharma vihīnānām kṛpaṇaiḥ jīveta kṣitaiḥ asthireṇa śarīreṇa sthiram karma samācaret

original: avaśyameva yāsyanti prāṇāḥ prāghuṇi (ghūrṇi) kā iva //
analyzed: avaśyam eva yāsyanti prāṇāḥ prāghuṇi ghūrṇi kāḥ iva

original: itīdamuktaṃ tava pakṣirāja viḍambanaṃ jantugaṇasya sarvam / pretasya mokṣāya tadauddhvandaihikaṃ hitāya lokasya carecchubhāya tu //
analyzed: iti idam uktam tava pakṣirāja viḍambanam jantu gaṇasya sarvam pretasya mokṣāya tat auddhvandaihikam hitāya lokasya caret śubhāya tu

original: sūta uvāca / evaṃ viprāḥ samāddiṣṭo viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā / garuḍa pretacaritaṃ śrutvā santuṣṭimāgataḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca evam viprāḥ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā garuḍa preta caritam śrutvā santuṣṭim āgataḥ

original: vratatīrthādikaṃ sarvaṃ punaḥ papraccha keśavam / dhyātvā manasi sarveśaṃ sarvakāraṇakāraṇam //
analyzed: vrata tīrtha ādikam sarvam punar papraccha keśavam dhyātvā manasi sarva īśam sarva kāraṇa kāraṇam

original: ṛṣayaḥ sarvamevaitajjantūnāṃ prabhavādikam / maraṇaṃ janma ca tathā pretatvañcaurdhvadaihikam //
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ sarvam eva etat jantūnām prabhava ādikam maraṇam janma ca tathā preta tvam ca aurdhvadaihikam

original: mayā proktaṃ vai muktyai nidānaṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ / lābhasteṣāṃ jayasteṣāṃ kutasteṣāṃ parājayaḥ / yeṣāmindīvaraśyāmo hṛdayastho janārdanaḥ //
analyzed: mayā proktam vai muktyai nidānam ca eva sarvaśas  lābhaḥ teṣām jayaḥ teṣām kutas teṣām parājayaḥ  yeṣām indīvara śyāmaḥ hṛdaya sthaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: dharmo jayati nādharmaḥ satyaṃ jayati nānṛtam / kṣamā jayati na krodho viṣṇurjayati nāsurāḥ //
analyzed: dharmaḥ jayati na adharmaḥ satyam jayati na anṛtam kṣamā jayati na krodhaḥ viṣṇuḥ jayati na asurāḥ

original: viṣṇurmātā pitā viṣṇurviṣṇuḥ svajanabāndhavāḥ / yeṣāmeva sthirā buddhirna teṣāṃ durgatirbhavet //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ mātā pitā viṣṇuḥ viṣṇuḥ sva jana bāndhavāḥ yeṣām eva sthirā buddhiḥ na teṣām durgatiḥ bhavet

original: maṅgalaṃ bhagavānviṣṇurmaṅgalaṃ garuḍadhvajaḥ / maṅgalaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣo maṅgalāyatanaṃ hariḥ //
analyzed: maṅgalam bhagavān viṣṇuḥ maṅgalam garuḍadhvajaḥ maṅgalam puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ maṅgala āyatanam hariḥ

original: harirbhāgīrathī viprā viprā bhāgīrathī hariḥ / bhāgīrathī harirviprāḥ sārametajjagattraye //
analyzed: hariḥ bhāgīrathī viprāḥ viprāḥ bhāgīrathī hariḥ bhāgīrathī hariḥ viprāḥ sāram etat jagattraye

original: iti sūtamukhodgīrṇāṃ sarvaśāstrārthamaṇḍitām / vaiṣṇaviṃ vāksudhāṃ pītvā ṛṣayastuṣṭimāyayuḥ //
analyzed: iti sūta mukha udgīrṇām sarva śāstra artha maṇḍitām vaiṣṇavim vāc sudhām pītvā ṛṣayaḥ tuṣṭim āyayuḥ

original: praśaśaṃsustathānyonyaṃ sūtaṃ sarvārthadarśinam / praharṣamatulaṃ prāpurmunayaḥ śaunakādayaḥ //
analyzed: praśaśaṃsuḥ tathā anyonyam sūtam sarva artha darśinam praharṣam atulam prāpuḥ munayaḥ śaunaka ādayaḥ

original: apavitraḥ pavitro vā sarvāvasthāṃ gatopi vā / yaḥ smaretpuṇḍarīkākṣaṃ sa bāhyābhyantaraṃ śuciḥ //
analyzed: apavitraḥ pavitraḥ vā sarva avasthām gataḥ api vā yaḥ smaret puṇḍarīkākṣam sa bāhya abhyantaram śuciḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpu- uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dharmakādṛpretadṛśrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde karmavipākādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
