analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahā pu uttara khaṇḍe karmavipākādinirūpaṇam nāma saptacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 48
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: tārkṣya uvāca / ye martyaloke nivasanti mānavāste sarvajātau nidhanaṃ prayānti / kāle svakīye nijapuṇyasaṃkhyayā vadanti lāka kathasva tanme //
analyzed: tārkṣyaḥ uvāca ye martya loke nivasanti mānavāḥ te sarva jātau nidhanam prayānti kāle svakīye nija puṇya saṃkhyayā vadanti lāka kathasva tat me

original: gacchanti mārgeṇa sudustareṇa vidhātṛniṣpāditavartmani sthitāḥ / kenaiva puṇyena mudaṃ prayānti tiṣṭhanti kenaiva kulaṃ balaṃ vayaḥ //
analyzed: gacchanti mārgeṇa su dustareṇa vidhātṛ niṣpādita vartmani sthitāḥ kena eva puṇyena mudam prayānti tiṣṭhanti kena eva kulam balam vayaḥ

original: sūta uvāca / śrutvātha devo garuḍaṃ tvavocat smṛtvā vapuḥ karmabhayañca rūpam / sṛṣṭā dharā yena carācaraṃ jagatsa yena śastā vihito yamo vibhuḥ //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca  śrutvā atha devaḥ garuḍam tu avocat smṛtvā vapuḥ karma bhayam ca rūpam  sṛṣṭā dharā yena carācaram jagat sa yena śastā vihitaḥ yamaḥ vibhuḥ

original: śrībhagavānuvāca / dharmārthakāmaṃ ciramokṣasañcayamanyaṃ dvitīyaṃ yamamārgagāminām / praviśyacāṅguṣṭhasame sa tatra vai taṃ prāpya dehaṃ svamandiram? //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca dharma artha kāmam cira mokṣa sañcayam anyam dvitīyam yama mārga gāminām praviśya ca aṅguṣṭha same sa tatra vai tam prāpya deham sva mandiram

original: gṛhītapāśo rudate punaḥ punardeśe supuṇye dvija dehasaṃsthitaḥ / devendrapūjā pitṛdevatṛptidaṃ mohānna ceṣṭaṃ na ca puttrasantatiḥ //
analyzed: gṛhīta pāśaḥ rudate punar punar deśe su puṇye dvija deha saṃsthitaḥ deva indra pūjā pitṛ deva tṛpti dam mohāt na ca iṣṭam na ca puttra santatiḥ

original: na me 'sti bandhuryamamārgagāmino mayā na kṛtyaṃ dvijadehalipsayā / samprāpya vipratvamatīva durlabhaṃ nādhītavānvedapurāṇasaṃhitāḥ / prāptaṃ suratnaṃ karasaṃsthitaṃ gataṃ dehankvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
analyzed: na me sti bandhuḥ yama mārga gāminaḥ mayā na kṛtyam dvija deha lipsayā samprāpya vipra tvam atīva durlabham na adhītavān veda purāṇa saṃhitāḥ prāptam su ratnam kara saṃsthitam gatam dehan kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: yaḥ kṣattriyo bāhubalena saṃyuge lalāṭadeśādrudhiraṃ mukhe papau / tatsomapānaṃ hi kṛtaṃ mahāmakhe jīvanmṛtaḥ so 'pi hi yāti muktik //
analyzed: yaḥ kṣattriyaḥ bāhu balena saṃyuge lalāṭa deśāt rudhiram mukhe papau tat soma pānam hi kṛtam mahā makhe jīvanmṛtaḥ saḥ hi yāti

original: sthānānyanekāni kṛtāni tāni pītānyanekānyapi garhitāni / śastraṃ gṛhītvā samare ripūṇāṃ yaḥ saṃmukhaṃ yāti sa muktapāpaḥ //
analyzed: sthānāni anekāni kṛtāni tāni pītāni anekāni api garhitāni śastram gṛhītvā samare ripūṇām yaḥ saṃmukham yāti sa mukta pāpaḥ

original: kṣattrānvayo vāpi viśonvayo vā śūdrānvayo vāpi hi nīcavarṇaḥ / saṃgrāmadevadvijabālaghātī strīvṛddhahā dīnatapasvihantā //
analyzed: kṣattra anvayaḥ vā api viśaḥ anvayaḥ vā śūdra anvayaḥ vā api hi nīca varṇaḥ saṃgrāma deva dvija bāla ghātī strī vṛddha hā dīna tapasvi hantā

original: upadruteṣveṣu parāṅmukho yaḥ syustasya devāḥ sakalāḥ parāṅmukhāḥ / tilodakaṃ naiva pibanti pūrve hutaṃ na gṛhṇāti hutāśanopi tat //
analyzed: upadruteṣu eṣu parāṅmukhaḥ yaḥ syuḥ tasya devāḥ sakalāḥ parāṅmukhāḥ tila udakam na eva pibanti pūrve hutam na gṛhṇāti hutāśanaḥ upi tat

original: dveṣādbhayādvā samare samāgate śastraṃ gṛhītvā parasainyasaṃmukhaḥ / na yāti pakṣīndra mṛśca paścātkṣāttraṃ balaṃ tasya gataṃ tathaiva / dvijāya dattvā kanakaṃ mahīmimāṃ bhūyaḥ sa paścādbhavatīha loke //
analyzed: dveṣāt bhayāt vā samare samāgate śastram gṛhītvā para sainya saṃmukhaḥ na yāti pakṣi indra mṛśca paścāt kṣāttram balam tasya gatam tathā eva dvijāya dattvā kanakam mahīm imām bhūyas sa paścāt bhavati iha loke

original: dānaṃ pradattaṃ grahaṇe dvijendre snānaṃ kṛtaṃ tena sadā sutīrthe / gatvā gayāyāṃ pitṛpiṇḍadānaṃ kṛtaṃ sadā yo mriyate tu yuddhe //
analyzed: dānam pradattam grahaṇe dvijendre snānam kṛtam tena sadā su tīrthe gatvā gayāyām pitṛ piṇḍa dānam kṛtam sadā yaḥ mriyate tu yuddhe

original: yaḥ kṣāttradehantu vihāya śocate raṇāṅgaṇe svāmivadhe ca gograhe / strībālaghāte pathi sārthahetave mayā svakośaṃ na hataṃ na pātitam //
analyzed: yaḥ vihāya śocate raṇa aṅgaṇe svāmi vadhe ca gograhe strī bāla ghāte pathi sārtha hetave mayā sva kośam na hatam na pātitam

original: vaiśyaḥ svakarmāṇi viśocate tadā gṛhītapāśo na mayāpi sañcitam / satyaṃ na coktaṃ kraya vikrayeṇa mohādvimūḍhena kuṭumbahetave //
analyzed: vaiśyaḥ sva karmāṇi viśocate tadā gṛhīta pāśaḥ na mayā api sañcitam satyam na ca uktam kraya vikrayeṇa mohāt vimūḍhena kuṭumba hetave

original: śūdraṃ vapuḥ prāpya yaśaskaraṃ sadā dānaṃ dvijebhyo na kṛtaṃ dvijārcanam / cdṛdadyatdadvaḍḍha ḍhaddhadṛthr dadṛdhḍḍhathrḍaḍḍhaddha
analyzed: śūdram vapuḥ prāpya yaśaskaram sadā dānam dvijebhyaḥ na kṛtam dvija arcanam

original: jalāśayo naiva kṛto dharātale asaṃskṛto vipravaro na saṃskṛtaḥ //
analyzed: jalāśayaḥ na eva kṛtaḥ dharā tale a saṃskṛtaḥ vipra varaḥ na saṃskṛtaḥ

original: tyaktvā svakarmāṇi madena susthitaṃ mayā sutīrthe svavapurna cojjhitam / dharmorjito naiva na devapūjanaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā caiva vimuktihetave //
analyzed: tyaktvā sva karmāṇi madena susthitam mayā su tīrthe sva vapuḥ na ca ujjhitam dharma ūrjitaḥ nā eva na deva pūjanam kṛtam mayā ca eva vimukti hetave

original: dehaṃ samāsādya tathaiva piṇḍajaṃ varṇāṃstathaivāntyajamlecchasaṃjñitān / marunmayaṃ dehamime viśanti naivehamānāḥ pathi dharmasaṃkule //
analyzed: deham samāsādya tathā eva piṇḍa jam varṇān tathā eva antya ja mleccha saṃjñitān marut mayam deham ime viśanti na eva īhamānāḥ pathi dharma saṃkule

original: parasparaṃ dharmakṛntaṃ svakīyaṃ sampādya lakṣyaṃ pathi sañcarantsvam / pakṣīndra vākyāni śṛṇuṣva tāni manoramāṇi pravadanti yāni //
analyzed: parasparam dharma kṛntam svakīyam sampādya lakṣyam pathi sañcaran svam pakṣi indra vākyāni śṛṇuṣva tāni manoramāṇi pravadanti yāni

original: sārā hi lokeṣu bhavettrilokī dvīpeṣu sarveṣu ca jambukākhyam / deśeṣu sarveṣvapi devadeśaḥ jīveṣu sarveṣu manuṣya eva //
analyzed: sārā hi lokeṣu bhavet trilokī dvīpeṣu sarveṣu ca jambuka ākhyam deśeṣu sarveṣu api deva deśaḥ jīveṣu sarveṣu manuṣyaḥ eva

original: varṇāśca catvāra iha praśastāḥ varṇeṣu dharmiṣṭhanarāḥ praśastāḥ / dharmeṇa saukhyaṃ samupaiti sarvaṃ jñānaṃ samāpnoti mahāpathe sthitaḥ //
analyzed: varṇāḥ ca catvāraḥ iha praśastāḥ varṇeṣu dharmiṣṭha narāḥ praśastāḥ dharmeṇa saukhyam samupaiti sarvam jñānam samāpnoti mahāpathe sthitaḥ

original: dehaṃ parityajya yadā gatāyuḥ pakṣin sthito 'haṃ kṛmikīṭasaṃsthitaḥ / sarīsṛpo 'haṃ maśako vinirmitaścatuṣpado 'haṃ vanasūkaro 'ham //
analyzed: deham parityajya yadā gata āyuḥ pakṣin sthitaḥ ham kṛmi kīṭa saṃsthitaḥ sarīsṛpaḥ ham maśakaḥ vinirmitaḥ catuṣpadaḥ ham vana sūkaraḥ ham

original: sarvaṃ vijānāti hi garbhasaṃsthito jātaśca sadyastadidañca vismaret / yaccintitaṃ garbhasamāgatena vai bālo yuvā vṛddhavayā babhūva //
analyzed: sarvam vijānāti hi garbha saṃsthitaḥ jātaḥ ca sadyas tat idam ca vismaret  yat cintitam garbha samāgatena vai bālaḥ yuvā vṛddha vayāḥ babhūva

original: mohādvināṣṭaṃ yadi garbhacintitaṃ smṛtaṃ punarmṛtyugate cadehe / tasminpranaṣṭe hṛdi cintitaṃ gataṃ smṛtaṃ punargarbhagate ca dehe //
analyzed: mohāt vināṣṭam yadi garbha cintitam smṛtam punar mṛtyu gate ca dehe tasmin pranaṣṭe hṛdi cintitam gatam smṛtam punar garbha gate ca dehe

original: tasminpranaṣṭe hṛdi cintitaṃ punarmayā svakośe paravañcanaṃ kṛtam / dyūtaiśchalenāpi ca cauryavṛttyā dharmaṃ vyatikramya śarīrarakṣaṇe //
analyzed: tasmin pranaṣṭe hṛdi cintitam punar mayā sva kośe para vañcanam kṛtam dyūtaiḥ chalena api ca caurya vṛttyā dharmam vyatikramya śarīra rakṣaṇe

original: kṛcchreṇa lakṣmīḥ samupārjitā svayaṃ mayā na bhuktaṃ manasepsitaṃ dhanam / tāmbūlamannaṃ madhuraṃ sagorasaṃ dattvāgnidevātithibandhuvarge //
analyzed: kṛcchreṇa lakṣmīḥ samupārjitā svayam mayā na bhuktam manasā īpsitam dhanam tāmbūlam annam madhuram sa gorasam dattvā agni deva atithi bandhu varge

original: somagrahe sūryasamāgamepi vā na sevitaṃ tīrthavariṣṭhamuttamam / kośaṃ svakīyaṃ malamūtrapūritaṃ dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
analyzed: soma grahe sūrya samāgame api vā na sevitam tīrtha variṣṭham uttamam  kośam svakīyam mala mūtra pūritam dehin kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: mayā na dṛṣṭā na natā na pūjitā traivikramī mūrtiriha sthitā bhuvi / prabhāsanātho na ca bhaktisaṃstuto dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
analyzed: mayā na dṛṣṭā na natā na pūjitā traivikramī mūrtiḥ iha sthitā bhuvi prabhāsa nāthaḥ na ca bhakti saṃstutaḥ dehin kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: gatvā variṣṭhe bhuvi tīrthasannidhau dhanaṃ na dattaṃ viduṣāṃ kare mayā / āplutya dehaṃ vidhinā dvije gurau dihinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
analyzed: gatvā variṣṭhe bhuvi tīrtha sannidhau dhanam na dattam viduṣām kare mayā āplutya deham vidhinā dvije gurau dihin kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: na mātṛpūjā na ca viṣṇuśaṅkarau gaṇeśacaṇaḍyau na ca bhāskaro 'pi vā / yañcopacārairbaliyuktacandanairdehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
analyzed: na mātṛ pūjā na ca viṣṇu śaṅkarau gaṇeśa caṇaḍyau na ca vā

original: labdhā mayā mānavadevatopamā mohādgatā sarvamidañca pārthiva / gatiṃ na vīkṣeta sa vai vimūḍhadhīrdehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
analyzed: labdhā mayā mānava devatā upamā mohāt gatā sarvam idam ca pārthiva gatim na vīkṣeta sa vai vimūḍha dhīḥ dehin kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: etāni pakṣinmanasā vicintya vākyāni dharmārthayaśaskarāṇi / muktiṃ samāyānti manuṣyaloke vasanti ye dharmaratāḥ sudeśe //
analyzed: etāni pakṣin manasā vicintya vākyāni dharma artha yaśaskarāṇi muktim samāyānti manuṣya loke vasanti ye dharma ratāḥ su deśe

original: iti bruvāṇairyamadhūtavargairvihanyate kālamayaiśca mudgaraiḥ / hā daiva hā daiva iti smaran vai dhanaṃ na dattaṃ svayamarjitaṃ yat //
analyzed: iti bruvāṇaiḥ yama dhūta vargaiḥ vihanyate kāla mayaiḥ ca mudgaraiḥ hā daiva hā daiva iti smaran vai dhanam na dattam svayam arjitam yat

original: na bhūmidānaṃ na ca gopradānaṃ na vāridānaṃ na ca vastradānam / phalaṃ satāmbūlavilepanaṃ vā tvayā na dattaṃ bhuvi śocase katham //
analyzed: na bhūmi dānam na ca go pradānam na vāri dānam na ca vastra dānam phalam sa tāmbūla vilepanam vā tvayā na dattam bhuvi śocase katham

original: pitā mṛtaste ca pitāmahaḥ sā yayā dhṛto vāpyudare svakīye / mṛto 'pyasau bandhujanaḥ samasto dṛṣṭaṃ tvayā sarvamidaṃ gatāyaḥ //
analyzed: pitā mṛtaḥ te ca pitāmahaḥ sā yayā dhṛtaḥ vā api udare svakīye mṛtaḥ pi asau bandhu janaḥ samastaḥ dṛṣṭam tvayā sarvam idam gata ayaḥ

original: kośaṃ tvadīyaṃ jvalitañca vahninā puttrairgṛhīto dhanadhānya sañcayaḥ / subhāṣitaṃ dharmacayaṃ kṛtañca yattadeva gacchettava pṛṣṭhasaṃstham //
analyzed: kośam tvadīyam jvalitam ca vahninā puttraiḥ gṛhītaḥ dhana dhānya sañcayaḥ su bhāṣitam dharma cayam kṛtam ca yat tat eva gacchet tava pṛṣṭha saṃstham

original: na dṛśyate ko 'pi mṛtaḥ samāgato rājā yatirvā dvijapuṅgavo 'pi vā / yo vai mṛtaḥ sāhasikaḥ sa martyako nāśaṃ yo 'pi dharātale sthitaḥ //
analyzed: na dṛśyate kaḥ pi mṛtaḥ samāgataḥ rājā yatiḥ vā dvija puṅgavaḥ pi vā  yaḥ vai mṛtaḥ sāhasikaḥ sa martyakaḥ nāśam dharā tale sthitaḥ

original: evaṃ gaṇāste bruvate sakinnarā dhairyaṃ samālambya vipādapūritaḥ / śrutvā gaṇānāṃ vacanaṃ mahādbhutaṃ bravīti pakṣīndra manuṣyatāṃ gataḥ //
analyzed: evam gaṇāḥ te bruvate sa kinnarāḥ dhairyam samālambya vipāda pūritaḥ śrutvā gaṇānām vacanam mahā adbhutam bravīti pakṣi indra manuṣya tām gataḥ

original: dānaprabhāveṇa vimānasaṃsthito dharmaḥ pitā mātṛdayānurūpiṇī / vāṇī kalatraṃ madhurārthabhāṣiṇī snānaṃ sutīrthe ca subandhavargaḥ //
analyzed: dāna prabhāveṇa vimāna saṃsthitaḥ dharmaḥ pitā mātṛ dayā anurūpiṇī vāṇī kalatram madhura artha bhāṣiṇī snānam su tīrthe ca su bandha vargaḥ

original: karārpitaṃ yatsukṛtaṃ samastaṃ svargastadā syāttava kiṅkaropamaḥ / yo dharmavān prāpsyati so 'tisaukhyaṃ pāpī samastaṃ vividhañca duḥkham //
analyzed: kara arpitam yat sukṛtam samastam svargaḥ tadā syāt tava kiṅkara upamaḥ yaḥ dharmavān prāpsyati saḥ ti saukhyam samastam vividham ca duḥkham

original: yo dharmaśīlo jitamānaroṣo vidyāvinīto na paropatāpī / svadāratuṣṭaḥ paradāradūraḥsa vai naro no bhuvi vandanīyaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ dharma śīlaḥ jita māna roṣaḥ vidyā vinītaḥ na para upatāpī sva dāra tuṣṭaḥ para dāra dūraḥ sa vai naraḥ naḥ bhuvi vandanīyaḥ

original: miṣṭānnadātā caritāgnihotro vedāntaviccandrasahasrajīvī / māsopavāsī ca pativratā caṣaḍ jīvaloke mama vandanīyāḥ //
analyzed: miṣṭānna dātā caritā agnihotraḥ vedānta vid candra sahasra jīvī māsa upavāsī ca pativratā ca ṣaṣ jīva loke mama vandanīyāḥ

original: evaṃ samācārayuto naro 'pi vāpīṃ sakūpāṃ sajalaṃ taḍāgam / prapāśubhaṃ hṛdgṛhadevamandiraṃ kṛtaṃ nareṇaiva sa dharmauttamaḥ //
analyzed: evam samācāra yutaḥ vāpīm sa kūpām sa jalam taḍāgam prapā śubham hṛd gṛha deva mandiram kṛtam nareṇa eva sa dharma uttamaḥ

original: varṣāśanaṃ vedavide ca dattaṃ kanyāvivāhastvṛṇamocanaṃ dvije / bhūmiḥ sukṛṣṭāpi tṛṣārtihetostadevametaṃ sukṛtat samastam //
analyzed: varṣa aśanam veda vide ca dattam kanyā vivāhaḥ tu ṛṇamocanam dvije bhūmiḥ su kṛṣṭā api tṛṣā ārti hetoḥ tat evam etam samastam

original: adhyāyamenaṃ sukṛtasya sāraṃ śṛṇoti gāyatyapi bhāvaśuddhyā / sa vai kulīnaḥ sa ca dharmayukto viśvālayaṃ yāti paraṃ sa nūnam //
analyzed: adhyāyam enam su kṛtasya sāram śṛṇoti gāyati api bhāva śuddhyā sa vai kulīnaḥ sa ca dharma yuktaḥ viśva ālayam yāti param sa nūnam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde manuṣyasya sukhaduḥ khaprāpakadharmādharmanirūpaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde manuṣyasya sukha duḥ kha prāpaka dharma adharma nirūpaṇam

original: nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nāma aṣṭacatvāriṃśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 49
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / śrutā mayā dayāsindho hyajñānājjīvasaṃsṛtiḥ / adhunā śrotumicchāmi mokṣopāyaṃ sanātanam //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca  śrutā mayā dayā sindho hi ajñānāt jīva saṃsṛtiḥ adhunā śrotum icchāmi mokṣa upāyam sanātanam

original: bhagavandevadeveśa śaraṇāgatavatsala / asāre ghorasaṃsāre sarvaduḥ khamalīmase //
analyzed: bhagavan devadeveśa śaraṇa āgata vatsala asāre ghora saṃsāre sarva duḥ kha malīmase

original: nānāvidhaśarīrasthā anantā jīvarāśayaḥ / jāyante ca mriyante ca teṣāmanto na vidyate //
analyzed: nānāvidha śarīra sthāḥ anantāḥ jīva rāśayaḥ jāyante ca mriyante ca teṣām antaḥ na vidyate

original: sadā duḥ khāturā eva na sakhī vidyate kkacit / kenopāyena mokṣeśa mucyante vada me prabho //
analyzed: sadā duḥ kha āturā eva na sakhī vidyate kkacid kena upāyena mokṣa īśa mucyante vada me prabho

original: śrībhagavānubāca / śṛṇu tārkṣya pravakṣyāmi yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi / yasya śravaṇamātreṇa saṃsārānmucyate naraḥ //
analyzed: śrī bhagavān ubāca  śṛṇu tārkṣya pravakṣyāmi yat mām tvam paripṛcchasi yasya śravaṇa mātreṇa saṃsārāt mucyate naraḥ

original: asti devaḥ parabrahmasvarūpo niṣkalaḥ śivaḥ / sarvajñaḥ sarvakartā ca sarveśo nirmalo 'dvayaḥ //
analyzed: asti devaḥ para brahma svarūpaḥ niṣkalaḥ śivaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarva kartā ca sarva īśaḥ nirmalaḥ dvayaḥ

original: svayañjyotiranādyanto nirvikāraḥ parātparaḥ / nirguṇaḥ saccidānandastadaṃśā jīvasaṃjñakāḥ //
analyzed: svayañjyotiḥ anādi antaḥ nirvikāraḥ parātparaḥ nirguṇaḥ saccidānandaḥ tad aṃśāḥ jīva saṃjñakāḥ

original: anādyavidyopahatā yathāgnau visphuliṅgakāḥ / dehādyupādhisambhinnāste karmabhiranādibhiḥ //
analyzed: anādya vidyā upahatāḥ yathā agnau visphuliṅgakāḥ deha ādi upādhi sambhinnāḥ te karmabhiḥ anādibhiḥ

original: sukhaduḥ khapradaiḥ puṇyapārūpairniyantritāḥ / tattajjātiyutaṃ dehamāyurbhogañca karmajam //
analyzed: sukha duḥ kha pradaiḥ tad tad jāti yutam deham āyuḥ bhogam ca karma jam

original: pratijanma prapadyante teṣāmapi paraṃ punaḥ / sasūkṣmaliṅgaśarīramāmokṣādakṣaraṃ khaga //
analyzed: pratijanma prapadyante teṣām api param punar sa sūkṣma liṅga śarīram ā mokṣāt akṣaram khaga

original: sthāvarāḥ kṛmayaścājāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ paśavo nagaḥ / dhārmikāstridaśāstadvanmokṣiṇaśca yathākramam //
analyzed: sthāvarāḥ kṛmayaḥ ca ajāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ paśavaḥ nagaḥ  dhārmikāḥ tridaśāḥ tadvat mokṣiṇaḥ ca yathākramam

original: caturvidhaśarīrāṇi dhṛtvā muktvā sahasraśaḥ / sukṛtānmā navo bhūtvā jñānī cenmokṣamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: caturvidha śarīrāṇi dhṛtvā muktvā sahasraśas sukṛtāt mā navaḥ bhūtvā jñānī ced mokṣam āpnuyāt

original: caturaśītilakṣeṣu śarīreṣu śarīriṇām / na mānuṣaṃ vinānyatra tattvajñānantu labhyate //
analyzed: caturaśīti lakṣeṣu śarīreṣu śarīriṇām na mānuṣam vinā anyatra tattva jñānan tu labhyate

original: atra janmasahasrāṇāṃ sahasrairapi koṭibhiḥ / kadācillabhate janturmānuṣyaṃ puṇyasañcayāt //
analyzed: atra janma sahasrāṇām sahasraiḥ api koṭibhiḥ kadācid labhate jantuḥ mānuṣyam puṇya sañcayāt

original: sopānabhūtaṃ mokṣasya mānuṣyaṃ prāpya durlabham / yastāra yati nātmānaṃ tasmātpāpataro 'tra kaḥ //
analyzed: sopāna bhūtam mokṣasya mānuṣyam prāpya durlabham  yaḥ tāra yati nā ātmānam tasmāt pāpataraḥ kaḥ

original: naraḥ prāpyetarajjanma labdhvā cendriyasauṣṭhavam / na vettyātmahitaṃ yastu sa bhavedbrahmaghātakaḥ //
analyzed: naraḥ prāpya itarat janma labdhvā ca indriya sauṣṭhavam  na vetti ātma hitam yaḥ tu sa bhavet brahma ghātakaḥ

original: vinā dehena kasyāpi puruṣārtho na vidyate / tasmāddehaṃ dhanaṃ rakṣetpuṇyakarmāṇi sādhayet //
analyzed: vinā dehena kasya api puruṣa arthaḥ na vidyate tasmāt deham dhanam rakṣet puṇya karmāṇi sādhayet

original: rakṣeccasarvadātmānamātmā sarbvasya bhājanam / rakṣaṇe yatnamātiṣṭhejjīvan bhadrāṇi paśyati //
analyzed: rakṣet ca sarvadā ātmānam ātmā sarvvasya bhājanam rakṣaṇe yatnam ātiṣṭhet jīvan bhadrāṇi paśyati

original: punargrāmaḥ punaḥ kṣetra punarvittaṃ punargṛham / punaḥ śubhāśubhaṃ karma na śarīraṃ punaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: punar grāmaḥ punar kṣetra punar vittam punar gṛham punar śubha aśubham karma na śarīram punar punar

original: śarīrarakṣaṇopāyāḥ kri yante sarvadā budhaiḥ / necchanti ca punastyāgamapi kuṣṭhādirogiṇaḥ //
analyzed: śarīra rakṣaṇa upāyāḥ sarvadā budhaiḥ na icchanti ca punar tyāgam api kuṣṭha ādi rogiṇaḥ

original: tadgopitaṃ syāddharmārthaṃ dharmo jñānārthameva ca / jñānaṃ tu dhyānayogārthamacirātpravimucyate //
analyzed: tat gopitam syāt dharma artham dharmaḥ jñāna artham eva ca jñānam tu dhyāna yoga artham acirāt pravimucyate

original: ātmaiva yadi nātmānamahītebhyo nivārayet / ko 'nyo hitakarastasmādātmānaṃ sukhayiṣyati //
analyzed: ātmā eva yadi na ātmānam ahītebhyaḥ nivārayet kaḥ nyaḥ hita karaḥ tasmāt ātmānam sukhayiṣyati

original: ihaiva narakavyādheścikitsāṃ na karoti yaḥ / gatvā nirauṣadhaṃ deśaṃ vyādhimthaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati //
analyzed: iha eva naraka vyādheḥ cikitsām na karoti yaḥ gatvā nirauṣadham deśam kim kariṣyati

original: vyāghrīvāste jarā cāyuryāti bhinnaghaṭāmbuvat / nighnanti ripuvadrogāstasmācchreyaḥ samabhyaseta //
analyzed: vyāghrī vā āste jarā ca āyuḥ yāti bhinna ghaṭa ambu vat  nighnanti ripu vat rogāḥ tasmāt śreyaḥ samabhyaseta

original: yāvannāśrayate duḥ khaṃ yāvannāyānti cāpadaḥ / yāvannendriyavaikalyaṃ tāvacchreyaḥ samabhyaset //
analyzed: yāvat na āśrayate duḥ kham yāvat na āyānti ca āpadaḥ yāvat na indriya vaikalyam tāvat śreyaḥ samabhyaset

original: yāvattiṣṭhati deho 'yaṃ tāvattattvaṃ samabhyaset / sandīptakośabhavane kūpaṃ khanati durmatiḥ //
analyzed: yāvat tiṣṭhati dehaḥ yam tāvat tattvam samabhyaset sandīpta kośa bhavane kūpam khanati durmatiḥ

original: kālo na jñāyate nānākāryaiḥ saṃsārasambhavaiḥ / sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jano hanta na vetti hitamātmanaḥ //
analyzed: kālaḥ na jñāyate nānā kāryaiḥ saṃsāra sambhavaiḥ sukham duḥkham janaḥ hanta na vetti hitam ātmanaḥ

original: jātānārtānmṛtānāpadbhaṣṭāndṛṣṭvā ca duḥ khitān / loko mohasurāṃ pītvā na bibheti kadācana //
analyzed: jātān ārtān mṛtān āpad bhaṣṭān dṛṣṭvā ca duḥ khitān lokaḥ moha surām pītvā na bibheti kadācana

original: sampadaḥ svapnasaṃkāśā yauvanaṃ kusumopamam / taḍiccapalamāyuṣyaṃ kasya syājjānato dhṛtiḥ //
analyzed: sampadaḥ svapna saṃkāśāḥ yauvanam kusuma upamam taḍit capalam āyuṣyam kasya syāt jānataḥ dhṛtiḥ

original: śataṃ jīvitamatyalpaṃ nidrālasyaistadardhakam / bālyarogajarāduḥ khairalpaṃ tadapi niṣphalam //
analyzed: śatam jīvitam ati alpam nidrā ālasyaiḥ tad ardhakam bālya roga jarā duḥkhaiḥ alpam tat api niṣphalam

original: prārabdhavye nirudyogī jāgartavye prasuptakaḥ / viśvastaśca bhayasthāne hā naraḥ ko na hanyate //
analyzed: prārabdhavye nirudyogī jāgartavye prasuptakaḥ viśvastaḥ ca bhaya sthāne hā naraḥ kaḥ na hanyate

original: toyaphenasame dehe jīvenākramya saṃsthite / anityāprayasavāse katha tiṣṭhati nirbhayaḥ //
analyzed: toya phena same dehe jīvena ākramya saṃsthite  anitya aprayasa vāse tiṣṭhati nirbhayaḥ

original: ahite hitasaṃjñaḥ syādadhruve dhruvasaṃjñakaḥ / anarthe cārthavijñānaḥ svamarthaṃ yo na vetti saḥ //
analyzed: ahite hita saṃjñaḥ syāt adhruve dhruva saṃjñakaḥ anarthe ca artha vijñānaḥ svam artham yaḥ na vetti saḥ

original: paśyannapi praskhalati śṛṇvannapi na budhyati / paṭhannapi na jānāti devamāyāvimohitaḥ //
analyzed: paśyan api praskhalati śṛṇvan api na budhyati paṭhan api na jānāti deva māyā vimohitaḥ

original: tannimajjajjagadidaṃ gambhīre kālasāgare / mṛtyurogajarāgrāhairna kaścidapi budhyate //
analyzed: tat nimajjat jagat idam gambhīre kāla sāgare mṛtyu roga jarā grāhaiḥ na kaścid api budhyate

original: pratikṣaṇabhayaṃ kālaḥ kṣīyamāṇo na lakṣyate / āmakuṃbha ivāṃbhaḥ stho viśīrṇo na vibhāvyate //
analyzed: pratikṣaṇa bhayam kālaḥ kṣīyamāṇaḥ na lakṣyate āma kuṃbhaḥ iva aṃbhaḥ sthaḥ viśīrṇaḥ na vibhāvyate

original: yujyate veṣṭanaṃ vāyorākāśasya ca khaṇḍanam / grathanañca taraṅgāṇāmāsthā nāyuṣi yujyate //
analyzed: yujyate veṣṭanam vāyoḥ ākāśasya ca khaṇḍanam grathanañca taraṅgāṇām āsthā na āyuṣi yujyate

original: pṛthivī dahyate yena meruścāpi viśīryate / śuṣyate sāgarajalaṃ śarīrasya ca kā kathā //
analyzed: pṛthivī dahyate yena meruḥ ca api viśīryate  śuṣyate sāgara jalam śarīrasya ca kā kathā

original: apatyaṃ me kalatraṃ me dhanaṃ me bāndhavāśca me / jalpantamiti martyājaṃ hanti kālavṛko balāt //
analyzed: apatyam me kalatram me dhanam me bāndhavāḥ ca me jalpantam iti martya ajam hanti kālavṛkaḥ balāt

original: idaṃ kṛtamidaṃ kāryamidamanyatkṛtākṛtam / evamīhāsamāyuktaṃ kṛtāntaḥ kurute vaśam //
analyzed: idam kṛtam idam kāryam idam anyat kṛtākṛtam  evam īhā samāyuktam kṛtāntaḥ kurute vaśam

original: śvaḥ kāryamadya kurvīta pūrvāhne cāparāhnikam / na hi mṛtyuḥ pratīkṣeta kṛtaṃ vāpyatha vākṛtam //
analyzed: śvas kāryam adya kurvīta pūrvāhne ca āparāhnikam  na hi mṛtyuḥ pratīkṣeta kṛtam vā api atha vā akṛtam

original: jarādarśitapanthānaṃ pracaṇḍavyādhisainikam / adhiṣṭhito mṛtyuśatruṃ trātāraṃ kiṃ na paśyati //
analyzed: jarā darśita panthānam pracaṇḍa vyādhi sainikam adhiṣṭhitaḥ mṛtyu śatrum trātāram kim na paśyati

original: tṛṣṇāsūcīvinirbhinnaṃ siktaṃ viṣayasarpiṣā / rāgadveṣānale pakvaṃ mṛtyuraśrāti mānavam //
analyzed: tṛṣṇā sūcī vinirbhinnam siktam viṣaya sarpiṣā rāga dveṣa anale pakvam mṛtyuḥ aśrāti mānavam

original: bālāṃśca yauvanasthāṃśca vṛddhāna garbhagatānapi / sarvānāviśate mṛtyurevambhūmidaṃ jagat //
analyzed: bālān ca yauvana sthān ca garbha gatān api sarvān āviśate mṛtyuḥ evambhūmi idam jagat

original: svadehamapi jīvo 'yaṃ muktvā yāti yamālayam / strīmātṛpitṛputtrādisambandhaḥ kena hetunā //
analyzed: sva deham api jīvaḥ yam muktvā yāti yama ālayam strī mātṛ pitṛ puttra ādi sambandhaḥ kena hetunā

original: duḥ khamūlaṃ hi saṃsāraḥ sa yasyāsti sa duḥ khitaḥ / tasya tyāgaḥ kṛto yena sa sukhī nāparaḥ kvacit //
analyzed: duḥ kha mūlam hi saṃsāraḥ sa yasya asti sa duḥ khitaḥ tasya tyāgaḥ kṛtaḥ yena sa sukhī na aparaḥ kvacid

original: prabhavaṃ sarvaduḥ khānāmālayaṃ sakalāpadām / āśrayaṃ sarvapāpānāṃ saṃsāraṃ varjayetkṣaṇāt //
analyzed: prabhavam sarva duḥ khānām ālayam sakala āpadām āśrayam sarva pāpānām saṃsāram varjayet kṣaṇāt

original: lohadārumayaiḥ pāśaiḥ pumānbaddho vimucyate / puttradāramayaiḥ pāśairmucyate na kadācana //
analyzed: loha dāru mayaiḥ pāśaiḥ pumān baddhaḥ vimucyate puttra dāra mayaiḥ pāśaiḥ mucyate na kadācana

original: yāvataḥ kurute jantuḥ sambandhānmanasaḥ priyān / tāvanto 'sya nikhanyante hṛdaye śokaśaṅkavaḥ //
analyzed: yāvataḥ kurute jantuḥ sambandhān manasaḥ priyān  tāvantaḥ sya nikhanyante hṛdaye śoka śaṅkavaḥ

original: vañcitāśeṣavittaistairnityaṃ loko vināśitaḥ / hā hanta viṣayāhārairdehasthondriyataskaraiḥ //
analyzed: vañcita aśeṣa vittaiḥ taiḥ nityam lokaḥ vināśitaḥ hā hanta viṣaya āhāraiḥ deha stha indriya taskaraiḥ

original: māṃsalubdho yathā matsyo lohaśaṅkuṃ na paśyati / sukhalubdhastathā dehī yamavādhāṃ na paśyati //
analyzed: māṃsa lubdhaḥ yathā matsyaḥ loha śaṅkum na paśyati sukha lubdhaḥ tathā dehī yam avādhām na paśyati

original: hitāhitaṃ na jānanto nityamunmārgagāminaḥ / kukṣipūraṇaniṣṭhā ye te narā nārakāḥ khaga //
analyzed: hita ahitam na jānantaḥ nityam unmārga gāminaḥ kukṣi pūraṇa niṣṭhāḥ ye te narāḥ nārakāḥ khaga

original: nidrābhīmaithunāhārāḥ sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ samāḥ / jñānavānmānavaḥ prokto jñānahīnaḥ paśuḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: nidrā bhī maithuna āhārāḥ sarveṣām prāṇinām samāḥ jñānavān mānavaḥ proktaḥ jñāna hīnaḥ paśuḥ smṛtaḥ

original: prabhāte malamūttrābhyāṃ kṣuttṛḍbhyāṃ madhyage ravau / rātrau madananidrābhyāṃ bādhyante mūḍhamānavāḥ //
analyzed: prabhāte mala mūttrābhyām kṣudh tṛḍbhyām madhya ge ravau rātrau madana nidrābhyām bādhyante mūḍha mānavāḥ

original: svadehadhanadārādiniratāḥ sarvajantavaḥ / jāyante ca mriyante ca hā hantājñānamohitāḥ //
analyzed: sva deha dhana dāra ādi niratāḥ sarva jantavaḥ jāyante ca mriyante ca hā hanta ajñāna mohitāḥ

original: tasmātsaṅgaḥ sadā tyājyaḥ sacettyaktuṃ na śakyate / mahadbhiḥ saha kartavyaḥ santaḥ saṅgasya bheṣajam //
analyzed: tasmāt saṅgaḥ sadā tyājyaḥ saced tyaktum na śakyate mahadbhiḥ saha kartavyaḥ santaḥ saṅgasya bheṣajam

original: satsaṅgaśca vivekaśca nirmalaṃ nayanadvayam / yasya nāsti naraḥ so 'ndhaḥ kathaṃ na syādamārgagaḥ //
analyzed: sat saṅgaḥ ca vivekaḥ ca nirmalam nayana dvayam yasya nā asti naraḥ saḥ ndhaḥ katham na syāt amārga gaḥ

original: svasvavarṇāśramācāraniratāḥ sarvamānavāḥ / na jānanti paraṃ dharmaṃ vṛthā naśyanti dāmbhikāḥ //
analyzed: sva sva varṇa āśrama ācāra niratāḥ sarva mānavāḥ na jānanti param dharmam vṛthā naśyanti dāmbhikāḥ

original: kimāyāsaparāḥ kecidvratacaryādisaṃyutāḥ / ajñānasaṃvṛtātmānaḥ sañcaranti pracārakāḥ //
analyzed: kim āyāsa parāḥ kecid vrata caryā ādi saṃyutāḥ ajñāna saṃvṛta ātmānaḥ sañcaranti pracārakāḥ

original: nāmamātreṇa santuṣṭāḥ karmakāṇḍaratā narāḥ / mantroccāraṇahomādyairbhrāmitāḥ kratuvistaraiḥ //
analyzed: nāma mātreṇa santuṣṭāḥ karmakāṇḍa ratāḥ narāḥ mantra uccāraṇa homa ādyaiḥ bhrāmitāḥ kratu vistaraiḥ

original: ekabhuktopavāsādyairniyamaiḥ kāyaśoṣaṇaiḥ / mūḍhāḥ parokṣamicchanti mama māyāvimohitāḥ //
analyzed: eka bhukta upavāsa ādyaiḥ niyamaiḥ kāya śoṣaṇaiḥ mūḍhāḥ parokṣam icchanti mama māyā vimohitāḥ

original: dehadaṇḍanamātreṇa kā muktiravivekinām / valmīkatāḍanādeva mṛtaḥ kinnu mahoragaḥ //
analyzed: deha daṇḍana mātreṇa kā muktiḥ avivekinām valmīka tāḍanāt eva mṛtaḥ kin nu mahā uragaḥ

original: jaṭābhārājinairyuktā dāmbhikā veṣadhāriṇaḥ / bhramanti jñānivalloke bhrāmayanti janānapi //
analyzed: jaṭā bhāra ajinaiḥ yuktāḥ dāmbhikāḥ veṣa dhāriṇaḥ bhramanti jñāni vat loke bhrāmayanti janān api

original: saṃsārajasukhāsaktaṃ brahmajño 'smītivādinam / karmabrahmobhayabhraṣṭaṃ taṃ tyajedantyajaṃ yathā //
analyzed: saṃsāra ja sukha āsaktam brahma jñaḥ smi iti vādinam karma brahma ubhaya bhraṣṭam tam tyajet antyajam yathā

original: gṛhāraṇyasamā loke gatavrīḍā digambarāḥ / caranti gardabhādyāśca viraktāste bhavanti kim //
analyzed: gṛha araṇya samāḥ loke gata vrīḍāḥ digambarāḥ caranti gardabha ādyāḥ ca viraktāḥ te bhavanti kim

original: mṛdbhasmoddhūlanādeva muktāḥ syuryadi mānavāḥ / mṛdbhasmavāsī nityaṃ śvā sa kiṃ mukto bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: mṛd bhasma uddhūlanāt eva muktāḥ syuḥ yadi mānavāḥ mṛd bhasma vāsī nityam śvā sa kim muktaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tṛṇaparṇodakāhārāḥ satataṃ vanavāsinaḥ / jambūkākhumṛgādyāśca tāpasāste bhavanti kim //
analyzed: tṛṇa parṇa udaka āhārāḥ satatam vana vāsinaḥ jambūka ākhu mṛga ādyāḥ ca tāpasāḥ te bhavanti kim

original: ājanmamaraṇāntañca gaṅgāditaṭinīsthitāḥ / maṇḍūkamatsyapramukhā yoginaste bhavanti kim //
analyzed: ājanma maraṇa antam ca gaṅgā ādi taṭinī sthitāḥ maṇḍūka matsya pramukhāḥ yoginaḥ te bhavanti kim

original: pārāvatāḥ śilāhārāḥ kadācidapi cātakāḥ / na pibanti mahītoyaṃ vratinaste bhavanti kim //
analyzed: pārāvatāḥ śilā āhārāḥ kadācid api cātakāḥ na pibanti mahī toyam vratinaḥ te bhavanti kim

original: tasmānnityādikaṃ karma lokarañjanakārakam / mokṣasya kāraṇaṃ sākṣātattvajñāna khageśvara //
analyzed: tasmāt nitya ādikam karma loka rañjana kārakam mokṣasya kāraṇam sākṣāt tattva jñāna khageśvara

original: ṣarḍśanamahākūpe patitāḥ paśavaḥ khaga / paramārthaṃ na jānanti paśupāśaniyantritāḥ //
analyzed: ṣarḍūna mahā kūpe patitāḥ paśavaḥ khaga parama artham na jānanti paśu pāśa niyantritāḥ

original: vedaśāstrārṇavairgherairuhyamānā itastataḥ / ṣaḍūrminigrahagrastāstiṣṭhanti hi kutārkikāḥ //
analyzed: veda śāstra arṇavaiḥ gheraiḥ uhyamānāḥ itas tatas ṣaḍūrmi nigraha grastāḥ tiṣṭhanti hi ku tārkikāḥ

original: vedāgamapurāṇajñaḥ paramārthaṃ na vetti yaḥ / viḍambakasya tasyaiva tatsarvaṃ kākabhāṣitam //
analyzed: veda āgama purāṇa jñaḥ parama artham na vetti yaḥ viḍambakasya tasya eva tat sarvam kāka bhāṣitam

original: idaṃ jñānamidaṃ jñeyamiti cintāsamākulāḥ / paṭhantyaharniśaṃ śāstraṃ paratattvaparāṅmukhāḥ //
analyzed: idam jñānam idam jñeyam iti cintā samākulāḥ paṭhanti aharniśam śāstram para tattva parāṅmukhāḥ

original: vākyacchandonibandhena kāvyālaṅkāraśobhitāḥ / cintayā duḥkhitā mūḍhāstiṣṭhanti vyākulendriyāḥ //
analyzed: vākya chandaḥ nibandhena kāvya alaṅkāra śobhitāḥ cintayā duḥkhitāḥ mūḍhāḥ tiṣṭhanti vyākula indriyāḥ

original: anyathā paramaṃ tattvaṃ janāḥ kliśyanti cānyathā / anyathā śāstrasadbhāvo vyākhyāṃ kurvanti cānyathā //
analyzed: anyathā paramam tattvam janāḥ kliśyanti ca anyathā anyathā śāstra sadbhāvaḥ vyākhyām kurvanti ca anyathā

original: kathayantyuvanmanībhāvaṃ svayaṃ nānubhavanti ca / ahaṅkārastāḥ kecidupadeśādivārjitāḥ //
analyzed: svayam na anubhavanti ca ahaṅkāraḥ tāḥ kecid upadeśāt iva arjitāḥ

original: paṭhanti vedaśāstrāṇi bodhayanti parasparam / na jānanti paraṃ tattvaṃ darvī pākarasaṃ yathā //
analyzed: paṭhanti veda śāstrāṇi bodhayanti parasparam  na jānanti param tattvam darvī pāka rasam yathā

original: śiro vahati puṣpāṇi gandhaṃ jānāti nāsikā / paṭhanti vedaśāstrāṇi durlabho bhāvabodhakaḥ //
analyzed: śiraḥ vahati puṣpāṇi gandham jānāti nāsikā paṭhanti veda śāstrāṇi durlabhaḥ bhāva bodhakaḥ

original: tattvamātmasthamajñātvā mūḍhaḥ śāstreṣu muhyati / gopaḥ kakṣāgate cchāge kūpaṃ paśyati durmatiḥ //
analyzed: tattvam ātma stham a jñātvā mūḍhaḥ śāstreṣu muhyati gopaḥ kakṣa gate chāge kūpam paśyati durmatiḥ

original: saṃsāramohanāśāya śābdabodho na hi kṣamaḥ / na nivarteta timiraṃ kadāciddīpavārtayā //
analyzed: saṃsāra moha nāśāya śābda bodhaḥ na hi kṣamaḥ na nivarteta timiram kadācid dīpa vārtayā

original: prajñāhīnasya paṭhanaṃ yathāndhasya ca darpaṇam / ataḥ prajñāvatāṃ śāstraṃ tattvajñānasya lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: prajñā hīnasya paṭhanam yathā andhasya ca darpaṇam atas prajñāvatām śāstram tattva jñānasya lakṣaṇam

original: idaṃ jñānamidaṃ jñeyaṃ sarvantu śrotumicchati / divyavarṣasahasrācca śāstrāntaṃ naiva gacchati //
analyzed: idam jñānam idam jñeyam sarvan tu śrotum icchati divya varṣa sahasrāt ca śāstra antam na eva gacchati

original: anekāni ca śāstrāṇi svalpāyurvighnakoṭayaḥ / tasmātsāraṃ vijānīyātkṣīraṃ haṃsa ivāmbhasi //
analyzed: anekāni ca śāstrāṇi su alpa āyuḥ vighna koṭayaḥ tasmāt sāram vijānīyāt kṣīram haṃsaḥ iva ambhasi

original: abhyasya vedaśāstrāṇi tattvaṃ jñātvātha budbhimān / palālamiva dhānyārthī sarvaśāstrāṇi santyajet //
analyzed: abhyasya veda śāstrāṇi tattvam jñātvā atha budbhimān palālam iva dhānya arthī sarva śāstrāṇi santyajet

original: yathāmṛtena tṛptasya nāhāreṇa prayojanam / tattvajñasya tathā tārkṣya na śāstreṇa prayojanam //
analyzed: yathā amṛtena tṛptasya na āhāreṇa prayojanam tattva jñasya tathā tārkṣya na śāstreṇa prayojanam

original: na vedādhyayanānmuktirna śāstrapaṭhanādapi / jñānādeva hi kaivalyaṃ nānyathā vinatātmajaḥ //
analyzed: na veda adhyayanāt muktiḥ na śāstra paṭhanāt api jñānāt eva hi kaivalyam na anyathā vinatā ātmajaḥ

original: nāśramaḥ kāraṇaṃ mukterdarśanāni na kāraṇam / tathaiva sarvakarmāṇi jñānameva hi kāraṇam //
analyzed: na āśramaḥ kāraṇam mukteḥ darśanāni na kāraṇam tathā eva sarva karmāṇi jñānam eva hi kāraṇam

original: muktidā guruvāgekā vidyāḥ sarvā viḍambikāḥ / śāstrabhārasahasreṣu hyekaṃ sañjīvanaṃ param //
analyzed: mukti dāḥ guru vāc ekā vidyāḥ sarvāḥ viḍambikāḥ śāstra bhāra sahasreṣu hi ekam sañjīvanam param

original: advaitaṃ hi śivaṃ proktaṃ kriyayāparivarjitam / guruvaktreṇa labhyeta nādhītāgamakoṭibhiḥ //
analyzed: advaitam hi śivam proktam kriyayā a parivarjitam  guru vaktreṇa labhyeta na adhīta āgama koṭibhiḥ

original: āgamoktaṃ vivekotthaṃ dvidhā jñānaṃ pracakṣate / śabdavrahmāgamamayaṃ paraṃ brahma vivekajam //
analyzed: āgama uktam viveka uttham dvidhā jñānam pracakṣate śabdavrahma āgama mayam param brahma viveka jam

original: advaitaṃ kecidicchanti dvaitamicchanti cāpare / samaṃ tattvaṃ na jānanti dvaitāddvaitavivarjitam //
analyzed: advaitam kecid icchanti dvaitam icchanti ca apare samam tattvam na jānanti dvaitāt dvaita vivarjitam

original: dve pade bandhamokṣāya namameti mameti ca / mameti badhyate janturnamameti pramucyate //
analyzed: dve pade bandha mokṣāya namama iti mama iti ca mama iti badhyate jantuḥ namama iti pramucyate

original: tatkarma yanna bandhāya sā vidyā yā vimuktidā / āyāsāyāparaṃ karma vidyānyā śilpanaipuṇam //
analyzed: tat karma yat na bandhāya sā vidyā yā vimukti dā āyāsāya aparam karma vidyā anyā śilpa naipuṇam

original: yāvatkarmāṇi dīpyante yāvatsaṃsāravāsanā / yāvadindriyacāpalyaṃ tāvattattvakathā kutaḥ //
analyzed: yāvat karmāṇi dīpyante yāvat saṃsāra vāsanā yāvat indriya cāpalyam tāvat tattva kathā kutas

original: yāvaddehābhimānaśca mamatā yāvadeva hi / yāvatprayatnavego 'sti yāvatsaṃkalpakalpanā //
analyzed: yāvat deha abhimānaḥ ca mamatā yāvat eva hi yāvat saṃkalpa kalpanā

original: yāvanno manasaḥ sthairyaṃ na yāvacchāstracintanam / yāvanna gurukāruṇyaṃ tāvattattvakathā kutaḥ //
analyzed: yāvat naḥ manasaḥ sthairyam na yāvat śāstra cintanam yāvat na guru kāruṇyam tāvat tattva kathā kutas

original: tāvattapo vrataṃ tīrthaṃ japahomārcanādikam / vedaśāstrāgamakathā yāvattattvaṃ na vindati //
analyzed: tāvat tapaḥ vratam tīrtham japa homa arcana ādikam veda śāstra āgama kathāḥ yāvat tattvam na vindati

original: tasmātsarvaprayatnena sarvāvasthāsu sarvadā / tattvaniṣṭho bhavettārkṣya yadīcchenmokṣamātmanaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prayatnena sarva avasthāsu sarvadā tattva niṣṭhaḥ bhavet tārkṣya yadi icchet mokṣam ātmanaḥ

original: dharmajñānaprasūnasya svargamokṣaphalasya ca / tāpatrayādisantaptaśchāyāṃ mokṣataroḥ śrayet //
analyzed: dharma jñāna prasūnasya svarga mokṣa phalasya ca tāpa traya ādi santaptaḥ chāyām mokṣa taroḥ śrayet

original: tasmājjñānenātmatattvaṃ vijñeyaṃ śrīgurormukhāt / sukhena mucyate janturghorasaṃsārabandhanāt //
analyzed: tasmāt jñānena ātma tattvam vijñeyam śrī guroḥ mukhāt sukhena mucyate jantuḥ ghora saṃsāra bandhanāt

original: tattvajñasyāntimaṃ kṛtyaṃ śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te 'dhunā / yena mokṣamavāpnoti brahma nirvāṇasaṃjñakam //
analyzed: tattva jñasya antimam kṛtyam śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te dhunā yena mokṣam avāpnoti brahma nirvāṇa saṃjñakam

original: antakāle tu puruṣa āgate gatasādhvasaḥ / chindyādasaṃgaśastreṇa spṛhāṃ dehe 'nu yā ca tam //
analyzed: antakāle tu puruṣaḥ āgate gata sādhvasaḥ chindyāt asaṃga śastreṇa spṛhām dehe nu yā ca tam

original: gṛhātpravrājito dhīraḥ puṇyatīrthajalāplutaḥ / śucau vivikta āsīno vidhivatkalpitāsane //
analyzed: gṛhāt pravrājitaḥ dhīraḥ puṇya tīrtha jala āplutaḥ śucau viviktaḥ āsīnaḥ vidhivat kalpita āsane

original: abhyasenmanasā śuddhaṃ trivṛdbrahmākṣaraṃ param / mano yaṣchejjitaśvāso brahma bījamavismaran //
analyzed: abhyaset manasā śuddham trivṛt brahma akṣaram param manaḥ yaṣchet jita śvāsaḥ brahma bījam a vismaran

original: niyacchedviṣayebhyo 'kṣānmanasā buddhi sārathiḥ / manaḥ karmabhirākṣiptaṃ śubhārthe dhārayeddhiyā //
analyzed: niyacchet viṣayebhyaḥ sārathiḥ manaḥ karmabhiḥ ākṣiptam śubha arthe dhārayet dhiyā

original: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma brahmāhaṃ paramaṃ padam / evaṃ samīkṣya cātmānamātmanyādhāya niṣkale //
analyzed: aham brahma param dhāma brahma aham paramam padam  evam samīkṣya ca ātmānam ātmani ādhāya niṣkale

original: omityekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharanmāmanusmaran / yaḥ prayāti tyajandehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim //
analyzed: om iti ekākṣaram brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran yaḥ prayāti tyajan deham sa yāti paramām gatim

original: na yatra dāmbhikā yānti jñānavairāgyavarjitāḥ / sudhiyastāṃ gatiṃ yānti tānahaṃ kathayāmi te //
analyzed: na yatra dāmbhikāḥ yānti jñāna vairāgya varjitāḥ sudhiyaḥ tām gatim yānti tān aham kathayāmi te

original: nirmānamohā jitasaṃgadoṣā adhyātmanityā vinivṛttakāmāḥ / dvandvairvimuktāḥ sukhaduḥ khasaṃjñairgacchantyamūḍhāḥ padamavyayaṃ tat //
analyzed: nirmāna mohāḥ jita saṃga doṣāḥ adhyātma nityāḥ vinivṛtta kāmāḥ  dvandvaiḥ vimuktāḥ sukha duḥ kha saṃjñaiḥ gacchanti amūḍhāḥ padam avyayam tat

original: jñānahrade satyajale rāgadveṣamalāpahe / yaḥ snāti mānase tīrthe sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: jñāna hrade satya jale rāga dveṣa mala apahe yaḥ snāti mānase tīrthe sa vai mokṣam avāpnuyāt

original: prauḍhavairāgyamāsthāya bhajate māmananyabhāk / pūrṇadṛṣṭiḥ prasannātmā sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: prauḍha vairāgyam āsthāya bhajate mām an anya bhāj pūrṇa dṛṣṭiḥ prasanna ātmā sa vai mokṣam avāpnuyāt

original: tyaktvā gṛhaṃ ca yastīrthe nivasenmaraṇotsukaḥ / muktikṣetreṣu mriyate sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: tyaktvā gṛham ca yaḥ tīrthe nivaset maraṇa utsukaḥ mukti kṣetreṣu mriyate sa vai mokṣam avāpnuyāt

original: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśī kāñcī avantika / purī dvāravatī jñeyāḥ saptaitā mokṣadāyikāḥ //
analyzed: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśī kāñcī avantika purī dvāravatī jñeyāḥ saptā etāḥ mokṣa dāyikāḥ

original: iti te kathitaṃ tārkṣya mokṣadharmaṃ sanātanam / jñānavairāgyasahitaṃ śrutvā mokṣamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: iti te kathitam tārkṣya mokṣa dharmam sanātanam jñāna vairāgya sahitam śrutvā mokṣam avāpnuyāt

original: mokṣaṃ gacchanti tattvajñā dhārmikāḥ svargatiṃ narāḥ / pāpino durgatiṃ yānti saṃsaranti khagādayaḥ //
analyzed: mokṣam gacchanti tattva jñāḥ dhārmikāḥ svar gatim narāḥ pāpinaḥ durgatim yānti saṃsaranti khaga ādayaḥ

original: sūta uvāca / svapraśrottararāddhāntamevaṃ bhagavato mukhāt / śrutvā hṛṣṭatanustārkṣyo nanāma jagadīśvaram //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca sva praśra uttara rāddhāntam evam bhagavataḥ mukhāt  śrutvā hṛṣṭa tanuḥ tārkṣyaḥ nanāma jagat īśvaram

original: sandeho me mahānnaṣṭo bhavadvākyavirocanāt / ityuktvā viṣṇumāmantrya sa gataḥ kaśyapāśramam //
analyzed: sandehaḥ me mahān naṣṭaḥ bhavat vākya virocanāt iti uktvā viṣṇum āmantrya sa gataḥ kaśyapa āśramam

original: sadyo dehāntaraṃ yāti yathā yāti vilambataḥ / anayorubhayoścaiva na virodhastathaiva vaḥ //
analyzed: sadyas deha antaram yāti yathā yāti vilambataḥ anayoḥ ubhayoḥ ca eva na virodhaḥ tathā eva vaḥ

original: sarvamākhyātavāṃstāta śruto bhagavato yathā / mārīco 'pi mudaṃ lebhe śrutvā vākyaṃ ramāpateḥ //
analyzed: sarvam ākhyātavān tāta śrutaḥ bhagavataḥ yathā mārīcaḥ pi mudam lebhe śrutvā vākyam ramāpateḥ

original: apākṛtastu sandeho brāhmaṇā bhavatāṃ mayā / uktaṃ suparṇasaṃjñantu purāṇaṃ paramādbhutam //
analyzed: apākṛtaḥ tu sandehaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ bhavatām mayā uktam suparṇa saṃjñam tu purāṇam parama adbhutam

original: idamāpa harestārkṣyastārkṣyādāpa tato bhṛguḥ / bhṛgorvasiṣṭhaḥ saṃprāpa vāmadevastataḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: idam āpa hareḥ tārkṣyaḥ tārkṣyāt āpa tatas bhṛguḥ bhṛgoḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ saṃprāpa vāmadevaḥ tatas punar

original: parāśaramuniḥ prāpa tasmādvyāsastato hyaham / mayā tu bhavatāṃ proktaṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ hareridam //
analyzed: parāśara muniḥ prāpa tasmāt vyāsaḥ tatas hi aham mayā tu bhavatām proktam param guhyam hareḥ idam

original: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyānmartyo yo vāpyabhidadhāti ca / ihāmutra ca loke sa sarvatra sukhamāpnuyāt //
analyzed: yaḥ idam śṛṇuyāt martyaḥ yaḥ vā api abhidadhāti ca iha amutra ca loke sa sarvatra sukham āpnuyāt

original: vrajataḥ saṃyamanyāṃ yadduḥ khamatra nirūpitam / asya śravaṇataḥ puṇyaṃ tanmukto jāyate tataḥ //
analyzed: vrajataḥ saṃyamanyām yat duḥkham atra nirūpitam asya śravaṇataḥ puṇyam tad muktaḥ jāyate tatas

original: atroktakarmapākādiśravaṇācca nṛṇāmiha / vairāgyamāvahedyasmāttasmācchrotavyameva ca //
analyzed: atra ukta karma pāka ādi śravaṇāt ca nṛṇām iha vairāgyam āvahet yasmāt tasmāt śrotavyam eva ca

original: bhajata jitahṛṣīkāḥ kṛṣṇamenaṃ munīśaṃ samajani bata yasmādgīḥ sudhāsāradhārā / pṛṣatamapi yadīyaṃ varṇarūpaṃ nipīya śrutipuṭaculukena prāpnuyādātmanaikyam //
analyzed: bhajata jita hṛṣīkāḥ kṛṣṇam enam muni īśam samajani bata yasmāt gīḥ sudhā sāra dhārā pṛṣatam api yadi iyam varṇa rūpam nipīya śruti puṭa culukena prāpnuyāt ātmanā aikyam

original: vyāsa uvāca / iti sūtamukhodgīrṇāṃsarvaśāstrārthamaṇḍitām / vaiṣṇavīṃ vāksudhāṃ pītvā ṛṣayastuṣṭimāyayuḥ //
analyzed: vyāsaḥ uvāca iti sūta mukha udgīrṇām sarva śāstra artha maṇḍitām vaiṣṇavīm vāc sudhām pītvā ṛṣayaḥ tuṣṭim āyayuḥ

original: praśaśaṃsustathānyonyaṃ sūtaṃ sarvārthadarśinam / praharṣamatulaṃ prāpurmunayaḥ śaunakādayaḥ //
analyzed: praśaśaṃsuḥ tathā anyonyam sūtam sarva artha darśinam praharṣam atulam prāpuḥ munayaḥ śaunaka ādayaḥ

original: iti harivacanāni sūtavācā khagapatisaṃśayabhedakāni yāni / sa munirapi niśamya śaunakendro bahutaramānayati sma cātmani svam //
analyzed: iti hari vacanāni sūta vācā khaga pati saṃśaya bhedakāni yāni sa muniḥ api niśamya śaunaka indraḥ bahutaram ānayati sma ca ātmani svam

original: apūjayaṃste munayastadānīmudākhāgbhirmuhureva sūtam / dhanyo 'si sūta tvamihetyudairayanvyasarjayaṃstaṃ ca nivartite 'dhvare //
analyzed: apūjayan te munayaḥ tadānīm udākhāgbhiḥ muhur eva sūtam dhanyaḥ si sūta tvam iha iti udairayan vyasarjayan tam ca nivartite dhvare

original: purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ pāpanāśanam //
analyzed: purāṇam gāruḍam puṇyam pavitram pāpa nāśanam

original: śṛṇvatāṃ kāmanāpūraṃ śrotavyaṃ sarvadaiva hi //
analyzed: śṛṇvatām kāmanā pūram śrotavyam sarvadā eva hi

original: śrutvā dānāni deyāni vācakāyākhilāni ca / pūrvoktaśayanādīni nānyathā saphalaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: śrutvā dānāni deyāni vācakāya akhilāni ca pūrva ukta śayana ādīni na anyathā saphalam bhavet

original: purāṇaṃ pūjayetpūrvaṃ vācakaṃ tadanantaram / vastrālaṅkāragodānairdakṣiṇābhiśca sādaram //
analyzed: purāṇam pūjayet pūrvam vācakam tad anantaram vastra alaṅkāra godānaiḥ dakṣiṇābhiḥ ca sādaram

original: annadānairhemadānairbhamidānaiśca bhūribhiḥ / pūjayedvācakaṃ bhaktyā bahupuṇyaphalāptaye //
analyzed: anna dānaiḥ hema dānaiḥ bhami dānaiḥ ca bhūribhiḥ pūjayet vācakam bhaktyā bahu puṇya phala āptaye

original: yaścedaṃ śṛṇuyānmartyo yathāpi parikīrtayet / vihāya yātanāṃ ghorāṃ dhūtapāpo divaṃ vrajet //
analyzed: yaḥ ca idam śṛṇuyāt martyaḥ yathā api parikīrtayet  vihāya yātanām ghorām dhūta pāpaḥ divam vrajet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe mokṣopāyanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe mokṣopāyanirūpaṇam nāma ekonapañcāśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyo dharmakāṇḍaḥ samāptaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyaḥ dharmakāṇḍaḥ samāptaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam

śrīgaṇeśāyanamaḥ / śrīlakṣmīnṛsiṃhāya namaḥ / śrīdattātreyāya namaḥ / śrīvedavyāsāya namaḥ / śrīhayagrīvāya namaḥ / atha gāruḍe brahmakāṇḍastṛtīya ārabhyate / oṃ mallānāmaśanirnṛṇāṃ naravaraḥ strīṇāṃ smaro mūrtimān gopānāṃ svajano 'satāṃ kṣitibhṛtāṃ śāstā svapitroḥ śiśuḥ / mṛtyurbhojapatervidhātṛvihita stattvaṃ paraṃ yogināṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ ca patiḥ sadaiva śuśubhe raṅge 'cyutaḥ sāgrajaḥ //
analyzed: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ śrī lakṣmī nṛsiṃhāya namaḥ śrīdattātreyāya namaḥ śrī vedavyāsāya namaḥ śrī hayagrīvāya namaḥ atha gāruḍe brahmakāṇḍaḥ tṛtīyaḥ ārabhyate om mallānām aśaniḥ nṛṇām nara varaḥ strīṇām smaraḥ mūrtimān gopānām sva jano satām kṣitibhṛtām śāstā sva pitroḥ śiśuḥ mṛtyuḥ bhoja pateḥ vidhātṛ vihitaḥ stattvam param yoginām vṛṣṇīnām ca patiḥ sadā eva śuśubhe raṅge cyutaḥ sāgrajaḥ

original: namo nārāyaṇāyeti tasmai vai mūlarūpiṇe / namaskṛtya pravakṣyāmi nārāyaṇakathāmimām //
analyzed: namaḥ nārāyaṇāya iti tasmai vai mūla rūpiṇe namaskṛtya pravakṣyāmi nārāyaṇa kathām imām

original: śaunakādyā mahātmāno hyṛṣayo brahmavādinaḥ / naimiṣākhye mahāpuṇye tapastepurmahattaram //
analyzed: śaunaka ādyāḥ mahātmānaḥ hi ṛṣayaḥ brahma vādinaḥ naimiṣa ākhye mahā puṇye tapaḥ tepuḥ mahattaram

original: jitendriyā jitāhārāḥ saṃtaḥ satyaparāyaṇāḥ / yajantaḥ parayā bhaktyā viṣṇumādyaṃ jagadgurum //
analyzed: jita indriyāḥ jita āhārāḥ saṃtaḥ satya parāyaṇāḥ yajantaḥ parayā bhaktyā viṣṇum ādyam jagadgurum

original: gṛṇantaḥ paramaṃ brahma jagaccakṣurmahaujasaḥ / sarvaśāstrārthatattvajñāstepurnaimiṣa kānane //
analyzed: gṛṇantaḥ paramam brahma jagaccakṣuḥ mahā ojasaḥ sarva śāstra artha tattva jñāḥ tepuḥ naimiṣa kānane

original: yajñairyajñapatiṃ kecijjñānairjñānātmakaṃ param / kecitparamayā bhaktyā nārāyaṇamapūjayan //
analyzed: yajñaiḥ yajñapatim kecid jñānaiḥ jñāna ātmakam param kecid paramayā bhaktyā nārāyaṇam apūjayan

original: ekadā tu mahātmānaḥ samājaṃ cakruruttamāḥ / dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāmupāyaṃ jñātumicchavaḥ //
analyzed: ekadā tu mahātmānaḥ samājam cakruḥ uttamāḥ dharma artha kāma mokṣāṇām upāyam jñātum icchavaḥ

original: ṣadviṃśatisahasrāṇi munīnāmūrdhvaretasām / teṣāṃ śiṣyapraśiṣyāṇāṃ saṃkhyā vaktuṃ na śaṅkyate //
analyzed: ṣadviṃśati sahasrāṇi munīnām ūrdhvaretasām teṣām śiṣya praśiṣyāṇām saṃkhyā vaktum na śaṅkyate

original: munayo bhāvitātmāno militāste mahojasaḥ / lokānugrahakartāro vītarāgā vimatsarāḥ //
analyzed: munayaḥ bhāvitātmānaḥ militāḥ te mahā ojasaḥ loka anugraha kartāraḥ vīta rāgāḥ vimatsarāḥ

original: kathaṃ harau manuṣyāṇāṃ bhaktiravyabhicāriṇī / kena sidhyettu sakalaṃ karma trividhamātmanaḥ //
analyzed: katham harau manuṣyāṇām bhaktiḥ avyabhicāriṇī  kena sidhyet tu sakalam karma trividham ātmanaḥ

original: ityevaṃ praṣṭumātmānamudyatānprekṣya śaunakaḥ / sāṃja lirvākyamāha sma vinayāvanataḥ sudhīḥ //
analyzed: iti evam praṣṭum ātmānam udyatān prekṣya śaunakaḥ sa aṃja liḥ vākyam āha sma vinaya avanataḥ sudhīḥ

original: śaunaka uvāca / āste siddhāśrame puṇye sūtaḥ paurāṇikottamaḥ / sa etadakhilaṃ vetti vyāsaśiṣyo yatīśvaraḥ //
analyzed: śaunakaḥ uvāca  āste siddhāśrame puṇye sūtaḥ paurāṇika uttamaḥ saḥ etat akhilam vetti vyāsa śiṣyaḥ yati īśvaraḥ

original: tasmāttameva pṛcchāma ityevaṃ śaunako muniḥ / atha te ṛṣayo jagmuḥ puṇyaṃ siddhāśramaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt tam eva pṛcchāmaḥ iti evam śaunakaḥ muniḥ atha te ṛṣayaḥ jagmuḥ puṇyam siddhāśramam tatas

original: papracchuste sukhāsīnaṃ naimiṣāraṇyavāsinaḥ / ṛṣaya ūcuḥ / vayaṃ tvatithayaḥ prāptāstvātitheyosi suvrata //
analyzed: papracchuḥ te sukha āsīnam naimiṣa araṇya vāsinaḥ ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ vayam tu atithayaḥ prāptāḥ tu ātitheyī usi suvrata

original: snānadānopacāreṇa pūjayitvā yathāvidhi / kena viṣṇuḥ prasannaḥ syātsa kathaṃ pūjyate naraiḥ //
analyzed: snāna dāna upacāreṇa pūjayitvā yathāvidhi kena viṣṇuḥ prasannaḥ syāt sa katham pūjyate naraiḥ

original: muktisādhanabhūtaṃ ca brūhi tattvavinirṇayam / sūta uvāca / śṛṇudhvamṛṣyaḥ sarve hariṃ tattvavinirṇayam //
analyzed: mukti sādhana bhūtam ca brūhi tattva vinirṇayam sūtaḥ uvāca śṛṇudhvam ṛṣyaḥ sarve harim tattva vinirṇayam

original: natvā viṣṇuṃ śriyaṃ vāyuṃ bhāratīṃ śeṣasaṃjñakam / dvaipāyanaṃ guruṃ kṛṣṇaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāmati //
analyzed: natvā viṣṇum śriyam vāyum bhāratīm śeṣa saṃjñakam dvaipāyanam gurum kṛṣṇam pravakṣyāmi yathāmati

original: nāsti nārāyaṇasamaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati / etena satyavākyena sarvārthānsādhayāmyaham //
analyzed: na asti nārāyaṇa samam na bhūtam na bhaviṣyati etena satya vākyena sarva arthān sādhayāmi aham

original: śaunaka uvāca / kimarthaṃ namanaṃ viṣṇorgranthādau munisattama / kartavyaṃ brūhi me brahmankṛpayā mama suvrata //
analyzed: śaunakaḥ uvāca kim artham namanam viṣṇoḥ grantha ādau muni sattama kartavyam brūhi me brahman kṛpayā mama suvrata

original: tataḥ śriyaṃ tato vāyuṃ bhāratīṃ ca tataḥ param / ante vyāsaṃ kimarthaṃ ca tvaṃ namaskṛtavānasi / sūtasūta mahābhāga brūhi kāraṇamatra ca //
analyzed: tatas śriyam tatas vāyum bhāratīm ca tatas param ante vyāsam kimartham ca tvam namaskṛtavān asi sūta sūta mahābhāga brūhi kāraṇam atra ca

original: sūta uvāca / ādau vandyaḥ sarvavedaikavedyo vede śāstre setihāse purāṇe / sattāṃ prāyo viṣṇurevaika eva prakāśate 'to namya eko harirhi //
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca ādau vandyaḥ sarva veda eka vedyaḥ vede śāstre sa itihāse purāṇe sattām prāyas viṣṇuḥ eva ekaḥ eva prakāśate namyaḥ ekaḥ hariḥ hi

original: sarvatra mukhyastvadhikonyatopi sa eva namyo na ca śaṅkarādyāḥ / namanti ye 'vinayācchaṅkaraṃ tu vināyakaṃ caṇḍikāṃ reṇukāṃ ca //
analyzed: sarvatra mukhyaḥ tu adhikaḥ anyatas api saḥ eva namyaḥ na ca śaṅkara ādyāḥ namanti ye vinayāt śaṅkaram tu vināyakam caṇḍikām reṇukām ca

original: tathā sūryaṃ bhairavaṃ mātāraśva tathā vāṇīṃ girijāṃ vai śriyaṃ ca / sarvepi te vaiṣṇavā naiva loke na tadbhaktā veti cāryā vadanti //
analyzed: tathā sūryam bhairavam tathā vāṇīm girijām vai śriyam ca sarve api te vaiṣṇavāḥ na eva loke na tad bhaktāḥ vā iti ca āryāḥ vadanti

original: na pārthikyānnamanaṃ kāryameva prīṇanti naitā devatāḥ pūjanena / pūjāṃ gṛhītvā devatāścaiva sarvāḥ kiñciddatvā phaladānena tāṃśca //
analyzed: na pārthikyāt namanam kāryam eva prīṇanti na etāḥ devatāḥ pūjanena pūjām gṛhītvā devatāḥ ca eva sarvāḥ kiñcid datvā phala dānena tān ca

original: saṃtarpya tuṣṭaiḥ svamanonu sārāttaiḥ kāritāṃ kāmyapūjāṃ tathaiva / nivedayitvā paradevatāyāṃ viṣṇau harau śrīpuruṣādivandye //
analyzed: saṃtarpya tuṣṭaiḥ sva manaḥ nu sārāt taiḥ kāritām kāmya pūjām tathā eva nivedayitvā para devatāyām viṣṇau harau śrī puruṣa ādi vandye

original: ihāparatrāpi sukhetarāṇi dāsyanti paścādadharaṃ vai tamaśca / ato hyete naiva pūjyā na namyā mokṣecchubhirbrāhmaṇādyairdvijendra //
analyzed: iha aparatra api sukhetarāṇi dāsyanti paścāt adharam vai tamaḥ ca  atas hi ete nā eva pūjyāḥ na namyāḥ mokṣa icchubhiḥ brāhmaṇa ādyaiḥ dvijendra

original: tathaiva sarvāśramibhiśca nityaṃ mahāvipattāvapi vipravaryāḥ / śrīkāmya yā ye tu bhajanti nityaṃ śrībrahmarudredrayamādidevān //
analyzed: tathā eva sarva āśramibhiḥ ca nityam mahā vipattau api vipra varyāḥ śrī kāmya yāḥ ye tu bhajanti nityam śrī brahma rudra idra yama ādi devān

original: iheva bhuñjanti mahacca duḥ khaṃ mahāpadaḥ kuṣṭhabhagandarādīn / namanti ye 'vaiṣṇavānbrahmarudravāyu pratīkānnaiva te viṣṇubhaktāḥ //
analyzed: iha iva bhuñjanti mahat ca duḥ kham mahā padaḥ kuṣṭha bhagaṃdara ādīn namanti ye vaiṣṇavān brahma rudra vāyu pratīkān na eva te viṣṇu bhaktāḥ

original: abhiprāyaṃ tvatra vakṣye munīndrāḥ paraṃ gopyaṃ hṛdi dhāryaṃ hi taddhi / vāyoḥ pratīkaṃ pūjyameveha viprā na brahmarudrādipratīkameva //
analyzed: abhiprāyam tu atra vakṣye muni indrāḥ param gopyam hṛdi dhāryam hi tat hi vāyoḥ pratīkam pūjyam evā iha viprāḥ na brahma rudra ādi pratīkam eva

original: pūjākāle devadevasya viṣṇorvāyoḥ pratīkaṃ yogyabhāge nidhāya / antargataṃ tasya vāyorhariṃ ca lakṣmīpatiṃ pūjayitvā hi samyak //
analyzed: pūjā kāle devadevasya viṣṇoḥ vāyoḥ pratīkam yogya bhāge nidhāya antargatam tasya vāyoḥ harim ca lakṣmīpatim pūjayitvā hi samyak

original: paścādvāyoḥ supratīkaṃ ca samyaṅ nirmālyaśeṣeṇa hareḥ samarcayet / pṛthakca sragdhūpavilepanādipūjāṃ prakurvanti ca ye vimūḍhaḥ //
analyzed: paścāt vāyoḥ supratīkam ca samyak nirmālya śeṣeṇa hareḥ samarcayet pṛthak ca sraj dhūpa vilepana ādi pūjām prakurvanti ca ye vimūḍhaḥ

original: teṣāṃ duḥ khamiha loke paratra bhaviṣyate nātra vicāryamasti / prāyaścittaṃ svasti viprāḥ kathañcittatkurvantu smaraṇaṃ nāma viṣṇoḥ //
analyzed: teṣām duḥ kham iha loke paratra bhaviṣyate na atra vicāryam asti prāyaścittam svasti viprāḥ kathañcid tat kurvantu smaraṇam nāma viṣṇoḥ

original: pāṣaṇḍarudrādikasaṃ pratiṣṭhitānharervāyoḥ śaṅkarasya pratīkān / namanti ye phalabuddhyā vibhūḍhāsteṣāṃ phalaṃ śāśvataṃ duḥ khameva //
analyzed: pratiṣṭhitān hareḥ vāyoḥ śaṅkarasya pratīkān namanti ye phala buddhyā vibhūḍhāḥ teṣām phalam śāśvatam duḥ kham eva

original: vāyoḥ pratīkaṃ yadi vipravaryaiḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ cennamanaṃ hi kāryam / naivedyaśeṣeṇa hareśca viṣṇoḥ pūjā kṛtā cenna hi doṣaleśaḥ //
analyzed: vāyoḥ pratīkam yadi vipra varyaiḥ pratiṣṭhitam ced namanam hi kāryam naivedya śeṣeṇa hareḥ ca viṣṇoḥ pūjā kṛtā ced na hi doṣa leśaḥ

original: gururhi mukhyo hanumajjanirmahānrāmāṅghribhakto hanumānsadaiva / evaṃ viditvā paramaṃ hariṃ ca putraṃ punarmukhyadevasya vāyoḥ //
analyzed: guruḥ hi mukhyaḥ hanumat janiḥ mahān rāma aṅghri bhaktaḥ hanumān sadā eva evam viditvā paramam harim ca putram punar mukhya devasya vāyoḥ

original: namaskāro nānyathā vipravaryā ādhīyatāṃ hṛdi sarvai rahasyamam / ye vaiṣṇavā vaiṣṇa vadāsabhṛtyāḥ sarvepi te sarvadā viṣṇumeva //
analyzed: namaskāraḥ na anyathā vipra varyāḥ ādhīyatām hṛdi sarvaiḥ rahasyamam ye vaiṣṇavāḥ vaiṣṇa va dāsa bhṛtyāḥ sarve api te sarvadā viṣṇum eva

original: namanti ye vai pratipādayanti tathaiva puṇyāni ca sāttvikāni / namanti ye vāsudevaṃ hariṃ ca samyak svaśaktyā pratipādayanti //
analyzed: namanti ye vai pratipādayanti tathā eva puṇyāni ca sāttvikāni namanti ye vāsudevam harim ca samyak sva śaktyā pratipādayanti

original: pravṛttimārgeṇa na pūjayanti hyāpatkāle paradaivaṃ tadanyam / te vaiṣṇavā vaiṣṇavadāsabhṛtyā anye ca sarve 'vaiṣṇavamātrakāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: pravṛtti mārgeṇa na pūjayanti hi āpad kāle para daivam tad anyam te vaiṣṇavāḥ vaiṣṇava dāsa bhṛtyāḥ anye ca sarve vaiṣṇava mātrakāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: upakramairupasaṃhārasya liṅgairhariṃ guruṃ hyantareṇaiva yānti / tānevāhuḥ satpurāṇāni viprāḥ kalau yuge nābhyasūyanti sarve //
analyzed: upakramaiḥ upasaṃhārasya liṅgaiḥ harim gurum hi antareṇa eva yānti tān eva āhuḥ sat purāṇāni viprāḥ kalau yuge na abhyasūyanti sarve

original: yato hitānye pratipādayanti pravṛttidharmānsvasvavarṇānurūpān / ato hyasūyanti sadā vimūḍhāḥ kalau hi viprāḥ pracurā hi tepi //
analyzed: yatas hitāni ye pratipādayanti pravṛtti dharmān sva sva varṇa anurūpān atas hi asūyanti sadā vimūḍhāḥ kalau hi viprāḥ pracurāḥ hi te pi

original: na cāsti viṣṇoḥ sadṛśaṃ ca daivataṃ na cāsti vāyoḥ sadṛśo guruśca / na cāsti tīrthaṃ sadṛśaṃ viṣṇupadyāḥ na viṣṇubhaktena samosti bhaktaḥ //
analyzed: na ca asti viṣṇoḥ sadṛśam ca daivatam na ca asti vāyoḥ sadṛśaḥ guruḥ ca  na ca asti tīrtham sadṛśam viṣṇupadyāḥ na viṣṇu bhaktena samaḥ asti bhaktaḥ

original: anyāni viṣṇoḥ pratipādakāni sarvāṇi te sāttvikānīti cāhuḥ / śrāvyāṇi tānyeva manuṣyaloke śrāvyāṇi nānyāni ca duḥ khadāni //
analyzed: anyāni viṣṇoḥ pratipādakāni sarvāṇi te sāttvikāni iti ca āhuḥ śrāvyāṇi tāni eva manuṣya loke śrāvyāṇi na anyāni ca duḥ kha dāni

original: kalau yuge sarva purāṇamadhye trīṇyeva mukhyāni haripriyāṇi / mukhyaṃ purāṇaṃ hi kalau nṛṇāṃ ca śreyaskaraṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇam //
analyzed: kalau yuge purāṇa madhye trīṇi eva mukhyāni hari priyāṇi mukhyam purāṇam hi kalau nṛṇām ca śreyaskaram bhāgavatam purāṇam

original: pūrvaṃ hi sṛṣṭiḥ pratipādyate tra yato hyato bhāgavataṃ paraṃ smṛtam / yasminpurāṇe kathayanti sṛṣṭiṃ hyādau viṣṇorbrahmarudrādikānām //
analyzed: pūrvam hi sṛṣṭiḥ pratipādyate yatas hi atas bhāgavatam param smṛtam  yasmin purāṇe kathayanti sṛṣṭim hi ādau viṣṇoḥ brahma rudra ādikānām

original: nānārthamevaṃ kathayanti vipra nīcoccarūpaṃ jñānamāhurmahāntaḥ / tenaiva siddhaṃ pravadanti sarvaṃ hyataḥ paraṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇam //
analyzed: nānā artham evam kathayanti vipra nīca ucca rūpam jñānam āhuḥ mahāntaḥ tena eva siddham pravadanti sarvam hi atas param bhāgavatam purāṇam

original: tataḥ paraṃ viṣṇupurāṇamāhustataḥ paraṃ gāruḍasaṃjñakaṃ ca / trīṇyeva mukhyā ni kalau nṛṇāṃ tu tathā viśeṣo gāruḍe kiñcidasti //
analyzed: tatas param viṣṇupurāṇam āhuḥ tatas param gāruḍa saṃjñakam ca trīṇi eva mukhyā kalau nṛṇām tu tathā viśeṣaḥ gāruḍe kiñcid asti

original: śṛṇudhvaṃ vai taṃ viśeṣaṃ ca viprāstryaṃśairyuktaṃ gāruḍākhyaṃ purāṇam / ādyāṃśaṃ vai karmakāṇḍaṃ vadanti dvitīyāṃśaṃ dharmakāṇḍaṃ tamāhuḥ //
analyzed: śṛṇudhvam vai tam viśeṣam ca viprāḥ tri aṃśaiḥ yuktam gāruḍa ākhyam purāṇam ādya aṃśam vai karmakāṇḍam vadanti dvitīya aṃśam dharmakāṇḍam tam āhuḥ

original: tṛtīyāṃśaṃ brahmakāṇḍaṃ vadanti teṣāṃ madhye tvantimoyaṃ variṣṭhaḥ / tṛtīyāṃśaśravaṇātpuṇyamāhustulyaṃ puṇyaṃ bhāgavatasya viprāḥ //
analyzed: tṛtīya aṃśam brahmakāṇḍam vadanti teṣām madhye variṣṭhaḥ tṛtīya aṃśa śravaṇāt puṇyam āhuḥ tulyam puṇyam bhāgavatasya viprāḥ

original: tṛtīyāṃśe paṭhite vedatulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavennātra vicāryamasti / tṛtīyāṃśaśravaṇādeva viprāḥ phalaṃ proktaṃ paṭhatopyarthamevam //
analyzed: tṛtīya aṃśe paṭhite veda tulyam phalam bhavet na atra vicāryam asti tṛtīya aṃśa śravaṇāt eva viprāḥ phalam proktam paṭhataḥ api artham evam

original: tṛtīyāṃśaśravaṇādarthataśca puṇyaṃ cāhuḥ paṭhato vai daśāṃśam / tato varaṃ matsyapurāṇamāhustato varaṃ kūrmapūrāṇamāhuḥ //
analyzed: tṛtīya aṃśa śravaṇāt arthataḥ ca puṇyam ca āhuḥ paṭhataḥ vai daśa aṃśam tatas varam matsyapurāṇam āhuḥ tatas varam kūrmapūrāṇam āhuḥ

original: tathaiva vai vāyupurāṇamāhustrīṇyeva cāhuḥ sāttvikānīti loke / tatrāpi kiñcidveditavyaṃ bhavecca purāṇaṣaṭke sattvarūpe munīndrāḥ //
analyzed: tathā eva vai vāyupurāṇam āhuḥ trīṇi eva ca āhuḥ sāttvikāni iti loke tatra api kiñcid veditavyam bhavet ca purāṇa ṣaṭke sattva rūpe muni indrāḥ

original: sattvādhame mātsyakaurme tathāhurvāyu cāhuḥ sāttvikaṃ madhyamaṃ ca / viṣṇoḥ purāṇaṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ sattvottamaṃ gāruḍaṃ cāhurāryāḥ //
analyzed: sattva adhame mātsya kaurme tathā āhuḥ vāyu ca āhuḥ sāttvikam madhyamam ca viṣṇoḥ purāṇam bhāgavatam purāṇam sattva uttamam gāruḍam ca āhuḥ āryāḥ

original: skāndaṃ pādmaṃ vāmanaṃ vai varāhaṃ tathāgreyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ parvasṛṣṭau / etānyāhū rājasānīti viprāstatraikadeśaḥ sāttvikastāmasaśca //
analyzed: skāndam pādmam vāmanam vai varāham tathā āgreyam bhaviṣyam parva sṛṣṭau etāni āhuḥ rājasāni iti viprāḥ tatra eka deśaḥ sāttvikaḥ tāmasaḥ ca

original: rajaḥ prācuryādrājasānīti ca huḥ śrāvyāṇi naitāni mumukṣubhiḥ sadā / teṣāṃ madhye sāttvikāṃśāśca saṃti teṣāṃ śrutergāruḍīyaṃ phalaṃ ca //
analyzed: rajaḥ prācuryāt rājasāni iti ca huḥ śrāvyāṇi na etāni mumukṣubhiḥ sadā teṣām madhye sāttvika aṃśāḥ ca saṃti teṣām śruteḥ gāruḍīyam phalam ca

original: brahmāṇḍalaiṅgye brahmavaivartakaṃ vai mārkaṃṇḍeyaṃ brāhmamādityakaṃ ca / etānyā hustāmasānīti viprāstatraikadeśaḥ sāttviko rājasaśca //
analyzed: brahmāṇḍa laiṅgye brahmavaivartakam vai mārkaṃṇḍeyam brāhmam ādityakam ca etāni ā huḥ tāmasāni iti viprāḥ tatra eka deśaḥ sāttvikaḥ rājasaḥ ca

original: śrāvyāṇi naitāni manuṣyaloke tattvecchubhistāmasānītyato hi / teṣu sthitāḥ sāttvikāṃśā munīndrāsteṣāṃ śrutirgāruḍaikāṅghritulyā //
analyzed: śrāvyāṇi nā etāni manuṣya loke tattva icchubhiḥ tāmasāni iti atas hi teṣu sthitāḥ sāttvika aṃśāḥ muni indrāḥ teṣām śrutiḥ gāruḍa eka aṅghri tulyā

original: alpānyupapurāṇāni vadantyaṣṭādaśāni ca / viṣṇudharmotaraṃ caiva tantraṃ bhāgavataṃ tathā //
analyzed: alpāni upapurāṇāni vadanti aṣṭādaśāni ca ca eva tantram bhāgavatam tathā

original: tattvasāraṃ nārasiṃhaṃ vāyuproktaṃ tathaiva ca / tathā haṃsapurāṇaṃ ca ṣaḍetāni munīśvarāḥ //
analyzed: tattva sāram nārasiṃham vāyu proktam tathā eva ca tathā haṃsapurāṇam ca ṣaḍ etāni muni īśvarāḥ

original: sāttvikānyeva jānīdhvaṃ prāyaśo nātra saṃśayaḥ / eteṣāṃ śravaṇādeva gāruḍārdhaphalaṃ śrutam //
analyzed: sāttvikāni eva jānīdhvam prāyaśas na atra saṃśayaḥ eteṣām śravaṇāt eva gāruḍa ardha phalam śrutam

original: bhaviṣyottaranāmānaṃ bṛhannāradameva ca / yamanāradasaṃvādaṃ laghunāradameva ca //
analyzed: bhaviṣya uttara nāmānam bṛhat nāradam eva ca  yama nārada saṃvādam laghu nāradam eva ca

original: vināyakapurāṇaṃ ca bṛhadbrahmāṇḍameva ca / etāni rājasānyāhuḥ śravaṇādbhuktaruttamā //
analyzed: vināyakapurāṇam ca bṛhat brahmāṇḍam eva ca etāni rājasāni āhuḥ śravaṇāt bhuktaḥ uttamā

original: gāruḍātpādatulyaṃ ca phalaṃ cāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ / purāṇaṃ bhāgavataṃ śaivaṃ nandiproktaṃ tathaiva ca //
analyzed: gāruḍāt pāda tulyam ca phalam ca āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ purāṇam bhāgavatam śaivam nandi proktam tathā eva ca

original: pāśupatyaṃ raiṇukaṃ ca bhairavaṃ ca tathaiva ca / etāni tāmasānyāhurharitattvārthavedinaḥ //
analyzed: pāśupatyam raiṇukam ca bhairavam ca tathā eva ca etāni tāmasāni āhuḥ hari tattva artha vedinaḥ

original: eteṣāṃ śravaṇādviprāgāruḍāṅghyardhmeva ca / sarveṣvapi purāṇeṣu śreṣṭhaṃ bhāgavataṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: eteṣām śravaṇāt viprāḥ gāruḍa aṅghi ardhma iva ca sarveṣu api purāṇeṣu śreṣṭham bhāgavatam smṛtam

original: vedaistulya sama pāṭhe śravaṇe ca tadardhakam / arthataḥ śravaṇe cāsya puṇyaṃ daśaguṇaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: vedaiḥ tulya sama pāṭhe śravaṇe ca tad ardhakam arthataḥ śravaṇe ca asya puṇyam daśaguṇam smṛtam

original: vaktuḥ syāddviguṇaṃ puṇyaṃ vyākhyātuśca tathādhikam / anantavedaiḥsāmyamāhurmahāntaḥ bhārānmahattvādbhāratasyāpi viprāḥ //
analyzed: vaktuḥ syāt dviguṇam puṇyam vyākhyātuḥ ca tathā adhikam ananta vedaiḥ sāmyam āhuḥ mahāntaḥ bhārāt mahat tvāt bhāratasya api viprāḥ

original: vedobhyosya tvarthataścādhikatvaṃ vadanti bai viṣṇurahasyavedinaḥ //
analyzed: vedobhyaḥ asya tu arthataḥ ca adhika tvam vadanti bai viṣṇu rahasya vedinaḥ

original: tatra śreṣṭhāṃ gītikāmāhurāryāstathaiva viṣṇornāmasāhasraka ca / tayostatra śravaṇādbhāratasya daśādhikaṃ phalamāhurmahāntaḥ //
analyzed: tatra śreṣṭhām gītikām āhuḥ āryāḥ tathā eva ca  tayoḥ tatra śravaṇāt bhāratasya daśa adhikam phalam āhuḥ mahāntaḥ

original: daityāḥ sarva viprakuleṣu bhūtvā kṛte yuge bhārate ṣaṭsahasryām / niṣkāsya kāṃścinnavanirmitānāṃ niveśanaṃ tatra kurvanti nityam //
analyzed: daityāḥ sarva vipra kuleṣu bhūtvā kṛte yuge bhārate ṣaṣ sahasryām niṣkāsya kāṃścid nava nirmitānām niveśanam tatra kurvanti nityam

original: matvā hariṃ bhagavānvyāsarūpī cakre tadā bhāgavataṃ purāṇam / tathā samākhyāya ca vaiṣṇavaṃ tattataḥ paraṃ gāruḍākhyaṃ sa cakre //
analyzed: matvā harim bhagavān vyāsa rūpī cakre tadā bhāgavatam purāṇam tathā samākhyāya ca vaiṣṇavam tat tatas param gāruḍa ākhyam sa cakre

original: ato hi gāruḍaṃ mukhyaṃ purāṇaṃ śāstrasaṃmatam / gāruḍena samaṃ nāsti viṣṇudharmapradarśane //
analyzed: atas hi gāruḍam mukhyam purāṇam śāstra saṃmatam gāruḍena samam nā asti viṣṇu dharma pradarśane

original: yathā surāṇāṃ pravaro janārdano yathāyudhānāṃ pravaraḥ sudarśanam / yathāśvamedhaḥ pravaraḥ kratūnāṃ chinneṣu bhakteṣu tathaiva rudraḥ //
analyzed: yathā surāṇām pravaraḥ janārdanaḥ yathā āyudhānām pravaraḥ sudarśanam  yathā aśvamedhaḥ pravaraḥ kratūnām chinneṣu bhakteṣu tathā eva rudraḥ

original: nadīṣu gaṅgā jalajeṣu padmamacchinnabhakteṣu tathaiva vāyuḥ / tathā purāṇeṣu ca gāruḍaṃ ca mukhyaṃ tadāhurharitattvadarśane //
analyzed: nadīṣu gaṅgā jala jeṣu padmam acchinna bhakteṣu tathā eva vāyuḥ tathā purāṇeṣu ca gāruḍam ca mukhyam tat āhuḥ hari tattva darśane

original: gāruḍākhyapurāṇe tu pratipādyo hariḥ smṛtaḥ / ato harirnamaskāryo gamyo yogyo hariḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: gāruḍa ākhya purāṇe tu pratipādyaḥ hariḥ smṛtaḥ atas hariḥ namaskāryaḥ gamyaḥ yogyaḥ hariḥ smṛtaḥ

original: bhāgyātmakatvācchrīdevyā namanaṃ nadanu smṛtam / paro narottamo vā sa sādhakeśopi ca smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: bhāgya ātmaka tvāt śrī devyāḥ namanam smṛtam paraḥ narottamaḥ vā sa sādhakeśaḥ api ca smṛtaḥ

original: ato namyo vāyurapi purāṇādau dvijottamāḥ / bhāratī vākyarūpatvānnamyā vāyoranantaram //
analyzed: atas namyaḥ vāyuḥ api purāṇa ādau dvijottamāḥ bhāratī vākya rūpa tvāt namyā vāyoḥ anantaram

original: upasādhako naraḥ prokto yatotastadanantaram / namya ityacyate sadbhistāratamyena sarvadā //
analyzed: upasādhakaḥ naraḥ proktaḥ yatas utas tad anantaram  namyaḥ iti acyate sadbhiḥ tāratamyena sarvadā

original: ato vyāsaṃ namaskuryādgranthakartṛtvahetutaḥ / śaunaka uvāca / vyāsasya namanaṃ hyante kathaṃ kāryaṃ mahātmanaḥ //
analyzed: atas vyāsam namaskuryāt grantha kartṛ tva hetutaḥ  śaunakaḥ uvāca vyāsasya namanam hi ante katham kāryam mahātmanaḥ

original: ante ca vandane tasya kāraṇaṃ brūhi suvrata / sūta uvāca / viṣṇoranantaraṃ vyāsanamanaṃ mukhyameva hi //
analyzed: ante ca vandane tasya kāraṇam brūhi suvrata sūtaḥ uvāca viṣṇoḥ anantaram vyāsa namanam mukhyam eva hi

original: harireva yato vyāso vācyacakrasvarūpakaḥ / vyāso naiva samatvena prokto bhagavato hareḥ //
analyzed: hariḥ eva yatas vyāsaḥ vācya cakra svarūpakaḥ vyāsaḥ nā eva sama tvena proktaḥ bhagavataḥ hareḥ

original: tatrāpi kāraṇaṃ vakṣye sādareṇa munīśvarāḥ / vyāsastu kaścana ṛṣiḥ purāṇe tāmase smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tatra api kāraṇam vakṣye sādareṇa muni īśvarāḥ vyāsaḥ tu kaścana ṛṣiḥ purāṇe tāmase smṛtaḥ

original: iti jñānā valaṃbena daityā daityānugaiḥ samāḥ / praviśanti hyandhatama iti tvante namaskṛtaḥ //
analyzed: iti jñānāḥ valaṃbena daityāḥ daitya anugaiḥ samāḥ praviśanti hi andhatamaḥ iti tu ante namaskṛtaḥ

original: yadidaṃ paramaṃ gopyaṃ hṛdi dhāryaṃ na saṃśayaḥ / parāṇāṃ namyamevoktaṃ pratipādyaṃ yatotra hi //
analyzed: yat idam paramam gopyam hṛdi dhāryam na saṃśayaḥ parāṇām namyam eva uktam pratipādyam yatas utra hi

original: samāsavyāsabhāvāddhi parāṇāṃ tatpratīyate / vāstavaṃ taṃ na jānīyurupajīvyo yato hariḥ //
analyzed: samāsa vyāsa bhāvāt hi parāṇām tat pratīyate vāstavam tam na jānīyuḥ upajīvyaḥ yatas hariḥ

original: harirvyāsastveka eva vyāsastu harivatsmṛtaḥ / upajīvyatadīśatve tayoreva na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: hariḥ vyāsaḥ tu ekaḥ eva vyāsaḥ tu hari vat smṛtaḥ upajīvya tad īśa tve tayoḥ eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: īśakoṭipraviṣṭatvācchriyaḥ svāmitvamīritam / trayāṇāmupajīvyatvātsevyatvātsvāmitā smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: īśa koṭi praviṣṭa tvāt śriyaḥ svāmi tvam īritam trayāṇām upajīvya tvāt sevya tvāt svāmi tā smṛtāḥ

original: vāyvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ ca sevyatvātsevyatā smṛtā / bhūbhāraharaṇe viṣṇoḥ pradhānāṅgaṃ hi mārutiḥ //
analyzed: vāyu ādīnām trayāṇām ca sevya tvāt sevya tā smṛtā bhū bhāra haraṇe viṣṇoḥ pradhāna aṅgam hi mārutiḥ

original: vākyarūpā bhāratī tu dvitīyāṅgaṃ hi sā smṛtā / tṛtīyāṅga hareḥ śeṣo na namyāḥ sāmyato hareḥ //
analyzed: vākya rūpā bhāratī tu dvitīya aṅgam hi sā smṛtā tṛtīya aṅga hareḥ śeṣaḥ na namyāḥ sāmyataḥ hareḥ

original: pratipādyā mukhyatayā namyā eva samīritāḥ / avāntarāśca vāyvādyā na namyāstena te smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: pratipādyāḥ mukhya tayā namyāḥ eva samīritāḥ avāntarāḥ ca vāyu ādyāḥ na namyāḥ tena te smṛtāḥ

original: bhīṣmadroṇādināmāni bhīmādiṣveva mukhyataḥ / vācakāni yato nityaṃ tannamyāste munīśvarāḥ //
analyzed: bhīṣma droṇa ādi nāmāni bhīma ādiṣu eva mukhyatas vācakāni yatas nityam tat namyāḥ te muni īśvarāḥ

original: parāṇāmeva namyatvaṃ pratipādyatvameva hi / etatsarvaṃ mayākhyātaṃ kimanyacchrotumicchatha //
analyzed: parāṇām eva namya tvam pratipādya tvam eva hi etat sarvam mayā ākhyātam kim anyat śrotum icchatha

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe sūtaśaunakasaṃvāde uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe sāttvikādipurāṇavibhāganamyānamyadevavibhāgādiviṣayanirūpaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe sūta śaunaka saṃvāde uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe sāttvika ādi purāṇa vibhāga namya anamya deva vibhāga ādi viṣaya nirūpaṇam

original: nāma prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nāma prathamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 2
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīśaunaka uvāca / kathaṃ sasarja bhagavāṃstattattattvābhimāninaḥ / sṛṣṭikramaṃ na jānāmi devānāṃ hyantaraṃ mune //
analyzed: śrī śaunakaḥ uvāca katham sasarja bhagavān tad tad tattva abhimāninaḥ sṛṣṭi kramam na jānāmi devānām hi antaram mune

original: śaunakenaiva muktastu sūto vacanamabravīt / śūta uvāca / samyagvyavasitā buddhistava brahmarṣisattama //
analyzed: śaunakena eva muktaḥ tu sūtaḥ vacanam abravīt  śūtaḥ uvāca samyak vyavasitā buddhiḥ tava brahmarṣi sattama

original: evameva kṛtaḥ praśro harau tu garuḍena vai / yaduktavānharistasmaitadvakṣyāmi tavānagha / garuḍa uvāca / sṛṣṭiṃ vrūhi mahābhāga saccidānandavigraha //
analyzed: evam eva kṛtaḥ praśraḥ harau tu garuḍena vai yat uktavān hariḥ tasmai etat vakṣyāmi tava anagha garuḍaḥ uvāca sṛṣṭim vrūhi mahābhāga saccidānanda vigraha

original: sṛṣṭau jñāte tavotkarṣo jñātaprāyo bhaviṣyati / brahmādīnāṃ tāratamyajñānaṃ mama bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: sṛṣṭau jñāte tava utkarṣaḥ jñāta prāyaḥ bhaviṣyati brahma ādīnām tāratamya jñānam mama bhaviṣyati

original: mokṣopāyamyaḥ sa vokta mitatarattasya sādhanam / garuḍenaiva muktastu kṛṣṇo vacanamabravīt //
analyzed: mokṣa upāya myaḥ sa vā ukta mitatarat tasya sādhanam garuḍena eva muktaḥ tu kṛṣṇaḥ vacanam abravīt

original: śṛkṛṣṇa uvāca mūlarūpe hyato jñeyo viṣṇutvādviṣṇuravyayaḥ //
analyzed: uvāca mūla rūpe hi atas jñeyaḥ viṣṇu tvāt viṣṇuḥ avyayaḥ

original: avatāramidaṃ proktaṃ pūrṇatvādeva suvrata / aneko hyekatāṃ prāpya saṃśete pralayāya vai //
analyzed: avatāram idam proktam pūrṇa tvāt eva suvrata anekaḥ hi ekatām prāpya saṃśete pralayāya vai

original: tatrāpi ca viśeṣosti jñātavyaṃ tatvameva saḥ //
analyzed: tatra api ca viśeṣaḥ usti jñātavyam tattvam eva saḥ

original: bhedena darśanādvāpi bhedābhedena darśanāt / viṣṇorguṇānāṃ rūpāṇāṃ tadaṅgānāṃ sukhādinām / tatraiva daśanādvāpi kṣiprameva tamo vrajet //
analyzed: bhedena darśanāt vā api bheda abhedena darśanāt  viṣṇoḥ guṇānām rūpāṇām tad aṅgānām sukha ādinām tatra eva daśanāt vā api kṣipram eva tamaḥ vrajet

original: puruṣāntaramārabhya kalpitā ye dvijottama / harirūpāstu te jñeyā ekībhūtā hi tena te //
analyzed: puruṣa antaram ārabhya kalpitāḥ ye dvijottama hari rūpāḥ tu te jñeyāḥ ekībhūtāḥ hi tena te

original: praleya samanuprāpte jīvāḥ sa yānti māmakāḥ / virājṛpe hareḥ saṃti tadā te ca hyanekadhā //
analyzed: praleya samanuprāpte jīvāḥ sa yānti māmakāḥ virājṛpe hareḥ saṃti tadā te ca hi anekadhā

original: ekībhāvaṃ prāpnuvanti mūlena pralaye dvija / biṃbena tu svayaṃ viṣṇurekībhāvaṃ vrajedyadi //
analyzed: ekībhāvam prāpnuvanti mūlena pralaye dvija biṃbena tu svayam viṣṇuḥ ekībhāvam vrajet yadi

original: pratibiṃbaḥ kathaṃ jīvo bhavennārāyaṇasya ca / tadadhīnastatsadṛśo harerjīvo na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: pratibiṃbaḥ katham jīvaḥ bhavet nārāyaṇasya ca tad adhīnaḥ tad sadṛśaḥ hareḥ jīvaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: pratibiṃbasya śabdārtho hyayamevamudāhṛtaḥ / tasmācca biṃbarūpāṇāmekībhāvaṃ na cintayet //
analyzed: pratibiṃbasya śabda arthaḥ hi ayam evam udāhṛtaḥ tasmāt ca biṃba rūpāṇām ekībhāvam na cintayet

original: kṛṣṇarāmādivaccaiva tvekī bhāvo vivakṣitaḥ / biṃbānāṃ mūlarūpasya bhedo nātra vivakṣitaḥ //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa rāma ādi vat ca eva tu ekī bhāvaḥ vivakṣitaḥ biṃbānām mūla rūpasya bhedaḥ na atra vivakṣitaḥ

original: tatrāpi ca viśeṣosti jñātavyastattvamicchubhiḥ / ekāṃśena tu biṃbaistu caikībhāvaṃ vrajanti te //
analyzed: tatra api ca viśeṣaḥ usti jñātavyaḥ tattvam icchubhiḥ eka aṃśena tu biṃbaiḥ tu ca ekībhāvam vrajanti te

original: ekāṃśena tu jīvatve saṃsthitā nātra saṃśayaḥ / biṃbamūlaṃ na jānanti te janā hyasurāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: eka aṃśena tu jīva tve saṃsthitāḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ biṃba mūlam na jānanti te janāḥ hi asurāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: eka eva hariḥ pūrvaṃ hyavidyāvaśataḥ svayam / aneko bhavati hyārādādarśapratirbibavat //
analyzed: ekaḥ eva hariḥ pūrvam hi avidyā vaśataḥ svayam anekaḥ bhavati hi ārāt ādarśa pratiḥ biba vat

original: evaṃ vadanti ye mūḍhā stepi yāntyadharaṃ tamaḥ / upādhirdvividhaḥ proktaḥ svarūpo bāhya eva ca //
analyzed: evam vadanti ye mūḍhāḥ yānti adharam tamaḥ  upādhiḥ dvividhaḥ proktaḥ svarūpaḥ bāhyaḥ eva ca

original: bāhyopādhirlaye yāti muktāvanyasya saṃśthitiḥ / sarvopādhivi nāśe hi pratibiṃbaḥ kathaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: bāhya upādhiḥ laye yāti muktau anyasya saṃśthitiḥ sarva upādhi vi nāśe hi pratibiṃbaḥ katham bhavet

original: cidrūpākhyo hyupādhistu mokṣe yepyadhikāriṇaḥ / duḥ kharūpo hyupādhistu tamaso yedhikāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: cit rūpa ākhyaḥ hi upādhiḥ tu mokṣe ye api adhikāriṇaḥ duḥ kha rūpaḥ hi upādhiḥ tu tamasaḥ

original: miśrarūpo hyupādhistu nityasaṃsāriṇāṃ mataḥ / bāhyopādhirliṅgadehaḥ sarveṣāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: miśra rūpaḥ hi upādhiḥ tu nitya saṃsāriṇām mataḥ bāhya upādhiḥ liṅga dehaḥ sarveṣām na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: daityāḥ duḥ khāyate yasmāttasmāduḥ khī hariḥ svayam / tattadduḥ khasvarūpatvāddaityānāṃ biṃbarūpakaḥ //
analyzed: daityāḥ duḥ khāyate yasmāt tasmāt duḥkhī hariḥ svayam tad tad duḥkha svarūpa tvāt daityānām biṃba rūpakaḥ

original: daityasthitānāṃ biṃbānāṃ mūlarūpasya vai prabhoḥ / parasparaṃ tathā bhedaṃ hyantaraṃ vā na cintayet //
analyzed: daitya sthitānām biṃbānām mūla rūpasya vai prabhoḥ parasparam tathā bhedam hi antaram vā na cintayet

original: śrībhūdurgādirūpāṇāṃ tathā sītādirūpiṇām / anyonyaṃ nāṇumātraṃ ca bhedo bāhyāntarepi ca //
analyzed: śrī bhū durgā ādi rūpāṇām tathā sītā ādi rūpiṇām anyonyam na aṇu mātram ca bhedaḥ bāhya antare pi ca

original: cintanīyaḥ kathamapi jñātvā yāntyadharaṃ tamaḥ / pratibiṃbasthito biṃbaḥ strīrūpo hyasti sarvadā //
analyzed: cintanīyaḥ katham api jñātvā yānti adharam tamaḥ pratibiṃba sthitaḥ biṃbaḥ strī rūpaḥ hi asti sarvadā

original: pralaye samanuprāpte lakṣmyā saha khagottama / ekībhāvaṃ nāpnuvanti viṃbena saha saṃsthitāḥ //
analyzed: pralaye samanuprāpte lakṣmyā saha khaga uttame ekībhāvam na āpnuvanti viṃbena saha saṃsthitāḥ

original: biṃvasthitānāṃ rūpāṇāṃ lakṣmyāśca vinatāsuta / bhedastu nāṇumātraṃ ca śaṅkanīyaḥ kathañcana //
analyzed: rūpāṇām lakṣmyāḥ ca vinatā suta bhedaḥ tu na aṇu mātram ca śaṅkanīyaḥ kathañcana

original: yadā hi śete pralayārṇave vibhurjīvāṃśca sarvānudare niveśya / muktāṃśca brahmendramarudgaṇādīnprātpavyamuktīṃśca sutau?
analyzed: yadā hi śete pralaya arṇave vibhuḥ jīvān ca sarvān udare niveśya muktān ca brahma indra marut gaṇa ādīn sutau

original: ca saṃsthitān //
analyzed: ca saṃsthitān

original: prāptāndhakūpādisamastajīvāṃstathaiva prāptavyakalīnathāparān / tathaiva nityaṃ sṛtisaṃsthitāñjanānacetanānṛkṣarūpādijīvān //
analyzed: prāpta andhakūpa ādi samasta jīvān tathā eva prāptavya kalīn atha aparān tathā eva nityam sṛti saṃsthitān janān acetana an ṛkṣa rūpa ādi jīvān

original: evaṃ janāñjaṭhare saṃnidhāya samyakūśete hyaṃbhasi vai sa kalpe / lakṣmīstu sā sarvavedātmikā ca bhaktyā harau nityasaṃvardhitāpi //
analyzed: evam janān jaṭhare saṃnidhāya hi aṃbhasi vai sa kalpe lakṣmīḥ tu sā sarva veda ātmikā ca bhaktyā harau nitya saṃvardhitā api

original: atyādaraṃ darśayatīva sā tu īḍe viṣṇuṃ bhaktisaṃvardhitāpi / ceṣṭādirūpeṇa tadā na kiñcidāsīdvinā viṣṇumatha śriyaṃ ca //
analyzed: atyādaram darśayati iva sā tu īḍe viṣṇum bhakti saṃvardhitā api ceṣṭā ādi rūpeṇa tadā na kiñcid āsīt vinā viṣṇum atha śriyam ca

original: paryaṅkarūpeṇa vabhūva devī vāsasvarūpeṇa ramā vireje / sarvaṃ ramā saiva tadaiva cāsītsaikā devī bahurūpā babhāṣe //
analyzed: paryaṅka rūpeṇa vabhūva devī vāsa sva rūpeṇa ramā vireje sarvam ramā sā eva tadā eva ca āsīt sā ekā devī bahu rūpā babhāṣe

original: tvamutkṛṣṭaḥ sarvadevottamatvānna tvatsamaḥ kaścidevādhiko vā / tvaṃ brahma eko na caturmukhaśca nāhaṃ rudro na bṛhaspatiśca //
analyzed: tvam utkṛṣṭaḥ sarva deva uttama tvāt na tvad samaḥ kaścid eva adhikaḥ vā tvam brahma ekaḥ na caturmukhaḥ ca na aham rudraḥ na bṛhaspatiḥ ca

original: viṣṇāveva brahmaśabdo hi mukhyo hyanyeṣvamukhyo brahmarudrādikeṣu / anantaguṇapūrṇatvādbrahmeti harirucyate //
analyzed: viṣṇau eva brahma śabdaḥ hi mukhyaḥ hi anyeṣu amukhyaḥ brahma rudra ādikeṣu ananta guṇa pūrṇa tvāt brahmā iti hariḥ ucyate

original: guṇādipūrṇatābhāvānnānye brahmetyudāhṛtāḥ / deśānantyaṃ guṇataḥ kālato vā nāstyānantyaṃ kvāpi deśe ca kāle //
analyzed: guṇa ādi pūrṇa tā bhāvāt na anye brahma iti udāhṛtāḥ deśa ānantyam guṇataḥ kālataḥ vā na asti ānantyam kvāpi deśe ca kāle

original: yadā nantyaṃ kimu vaktavyamatra guṇānantyaṃ nāsti brahmādikeṣu / yadyapyahaṃ deśataḥ kālataśca samastadā vāsudevena sārdham //
analyzed: yadā nantyam kimu vaktavyam atra guṇa ānantyam nā asti brahma ādikeṣu yadi api aham deśataḥ kālataḥ ca samaḥ tadā vāsudevena sārdham

original: tathāpi me guṇato nāstyanantaṃ tato dharmā guṇatonantataśca / saṃti śrutāvaviruddhāśca deve cintyā hyacintyā bahudhā te hyanantāḥ //
analyzed: tathā api me guṇataḥ na asti anantam tatas dharmāḥ guṇataḥ nantataḥ ca saṃti śrutau aviruddhāḥ ca deve cintyāḥ hi acintyāḥ bahudhā te hi anantāḥ

original: ato guṇāṃstava devasya viṣṇo stotuṃ sadā smo na hareḥ kadāpi / nāhaṃ na keśau na ca gīrna rudro na dakṣakanyā na ca menakāsutā //
analyzed: atas guṇān tava devasya viṣṇoḥ stotum sadā smaḥ na hareḥ kadāpi  na aham na keśau na ca gīḥ na rudraḥ na dakṣa kanyā na ca menakā sutā

original: na vai biḍaujā na ca vā pulomajā na cedhmavāho na yamo na cānyaḥ / na nārado nāpi bhṛgurvasiṣṭho na vighnapo nāpi balyādayaśca //
analyzed: na vai biḍaujāḥ na ca vā pulomajāḥ na ca idhmavāhaḥ na yamaḥ na ca anyaḥ na nāradaḥ na api bhṛguḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ na vighnapaḥ na api bali ādayaḥ ca

original: na vai virāṭo nāpi bhīmaḥ śaniśca na puṣkaro na kaśerustathaiva / na kinnarāḥ pitaro naiva devā gandharvamukhyā nāpi vā tuṣyasaṃjñāḥ //
analyzed: na vai virāṭaḥ na api bhīmaḥ śaniḥ ca na puṣkaraḥ na kaśeruḥ tathā eva na kinnarāḥ pitaraḥ na eva devāḥ gandharva mukhyāḥ na api vā tuṣya saṃjñāḥ

original: na vai kṣitīśā na ca mānuṣāśca viṣṇorna jānanti kimatra cānye / mattodhamaḥ kociguṇena brahmā samo hi tasya brahmaṇo mātariśva //
analyzed: na vai kṣitīśāḥ na ca mānuṣāḥ ca viṣṇoḥ na jānanti kim atra ca anye mattaḥ dhamaḥ koci guṇena brahmā samaḥ hi tasya brahmaṇaḥ mātariśva

original: tau vai virāge haribhaktibhāve dhṛtistitiprāṇabaleṣuyoge / buddhau samānau saṃsṛtau mokṣakāle parasparādhārasamanvitau ca //
analyzed: tau vai virāge hari bhakti bhāve dhṛti stiti prāṇa bala iṣu yoge  buddhau samānau saṃsṛtau mokṣa kāle paraspara ādhāra samanvitau ca

original: annābhimānaṃ brahma cāhurmurāriṃ jīvābhimānaṃ vāyumāhurmahāntaḥ / na śaktosau brahmadevo vivastuṃ vāyuṃ vinā saṃsṛtāveva nityam //
analyzed: anna abhimānam brahma ca āhuḥ murārim jīva abhimānam vāyum āhuḥ mahāntaḥ na śakta asau brahma devaḥ vivastum vāyum vinā saṃsṛtau eva nityam

original: na taṃ vinā mātariśvā ca vastumanyonyamāptiḥ kālato nyūnatā ca / yadā mahattattvani yāmakobhūdbrahmāṇḍāntasthūlasṛṣṭau mahātmā //
analyzed: na tam vinā mātariśvā ca vastum anyonyam āptiḥ kālataḥ nyūna tā ca  yadā mahat tattvani yāmakaḥ bhūt brahmāṇḍa anta sthūla sṛṣṭau mahātmā

original: tadā vāyurnāśakadvai mahātmā bāhye sṛṣṭau kālabhedena cāsti / sarasvatī bhāratī brahmaṇastu saṃvatsarānantaraṃ saṃbabhūva //
analyzed: tadā vāyuḥ na aśakat vai mahātmā bāhye sṛṣṭau kāla bhedena ca asti sarasvatī bhāratī brahmaṇaḥ tu saṃvatsara anantaram saṃbabhūva

original: yadā daśābdāḥ samatītā mahātmā tadā vāyuḥ samabhūllokapūjyaḥ / kiñcinnyūnatvaṃ sthūlasṛṣṭau mahātmannaitāvatā vānayoḥ saumyahāniḥ //
analyzed: yadā daśa abdāḥ samatītāḥ mahātmā tadā vāyuḥ samabhūt loka pūjyaḥ kiñcid nyūna tvam sthūla sṛṣṭau mahātman na etāvatā vā anayoḥ saumya hāniḥ

original: sarasvatī vatsarātsaṃbabhūva hyanantaraṃ brahmaṇo janmakālāt / giraḥ sakāśātkālato nyūnatāsti vāyostadā hyadhamattve kṣatiḥ kā //
analyzed: sarasvatī vatsarāt saṃbabhūva hi anantaram brahmaṇaḥ janma kālāt  giraḥ sakāśāt kālataḥ nyūna tā asti vāyoḥ tadā hi adhamat tve kṣatiḥ kā

original: vāyoranantaraṃ vāṇī hyabhūtsaṃvatsarātparam / yāvatpaścājjanistāvatpūrvadehakṣayo bhavet //
analyzed: vāyoḥ anantaram vāṇī hi abhūt saṃvatsarāt param yāvat paścāt janiḥ tāvat pūrva deha kṣayaḥ bhavet

original: śeṣastvindro rudra ete trayaśca samā hyete jñānabalādikeṣvapi tathāpi teṣāṃ kālato nyūnatāsti kālopi teṣāṃ dvivyesahasravarṣam //
analyzed: śeṣaḥ tu indraḥ rudraḥ ete trayaḥ ca samāḥ hi ete jñāna bala ādikeṣu api tathā api teṣām kālataḥ nyūna tā asti kālaḥ api teṣām

original: anantarudro brahmavāyū yathā vā tathā jñeyo naiva hāniḥ svarūpe / sthūlasya sṛṣṭau bāhyasṛṣṭau mahātmankālānnyūnatvaṃ sa mayā naiva cintyaḥ //
analyzed: ananta rudraḥ brahma vāyū yathā vā tathā jñeyaḥ nā eva hāniḥ svarūpe sthūlasya sṛṣṭau bāhya sṛṣṭau mahātman kālāt nyūna tvam sa mayā nā eva cintyaḥ

original: teṣāṃ sakāśādvāruṇī pārvatī ca sauparṇīnāmnī tistra etā mahātman / daśābdebhyonantaraṃ saṃbabhūvuḥ sarasvatī bhāratīvacca bodhyā //
analyzed: teṣām sakāśāt vāruṇī pārvatī ca sauparṇī nāmnī tistraḥ etāḥ mahātman daśa abdebhyaḥ anantaram saṃbabhūvuḥ sarasvatī bhāratī vat ca bodhyā
