original: indro varo rudrabhāryādikebhya evaṃ jñānaṃ sarvadā dehyamandam / evaṃ jñānaṃ yasya bhavecca loke sa vai jñānī vedavedyaḥ sa eva //
analyzed: indraḥ varaḥ rudra bhāryā ādikebhyaḥ evam jñānam sarvadā dehi amandam evam jñānam yasya bhavet ca loke sa vai jñānī veda vedyaḥ saḥ eva

original: na vai jñānītyantaraṃ yo na veda sa vedavādī na ca vedapāṭhakaḥ //
analyzed: na vai jñānī iti antaram yaḥ na veda sa veda vādī na ca veda pāṭhakaḥ

original: vedākṣarāṇi yāvanti paṭhitāni dvijātibhiḥ / tāvanti harināmāni priyāṇi ca hareḥsadā //
analyzed: veda akṣarāṇi yāvanti paṭhitāni dvijātibhiḥ tāvanti hari nāmāni priyāṇi ca hareḥ sadā

original: mama svāmī harirnityaṃ dāsohaṃ sarvadā hareḥ / brahmādyā devatāḥ sarvā guravo me yathākramam //
analyzed: mama svāmī hariḥ nityam dāsaḥ ham sarvadā hareḥ  brahma ādyāḥ devatāḥ sarvāḥ guravaḥ me yathākramam

original: eteṣāṃ ca hariḥ svāmī vede sarvatra gīyate / evaṃ jānaṃstu yo vedānsaṃpaṭhetsa dvijottamaḥ //
analyzed: eteṣām ca hariḥ svāmī vede sarvatra gīyate evam jānan tu yaḥ vedān saṃpaṭhet sa dvijottamaḥ

original: sa vedapāṭhako jñeyastadanye vedavādinaḥ / vedabhārabharākrāntaḥ sa vai brāhmaṇagardabhaḥ //
analyzed: sa veda pāṭhakaḥ jñeyaḥ tad anye veda vādinaḥ  veda bhāra bhara ākrāntaḥ sa vai brāhmaṇagardabhaḥ

original: jñānābhimānī vedamānī ubhau tu parasparaṃ hyūcatuḥ sarvadaiva / jalaṃ vedo yatra vāso murārerācāryāṇāṃ saṃgadoṣāddvijānām //
analyzed: jñāna abhimānī veda mānī ubhau tu parasparam hi ūcatuḥ sarvadā eva jalam vedaḥ yatra vāsaḥ murāreḥ ācāryāṇām saṃga doṣāt dvijānām

original: mahāparādhāḥ saṃti loke mahātmansahasraśaḥ śataśaḥ koṭiśaśca / hariśca tānkṣamate sarvadaiva nāmatrayasmaraṇādvai kupāluḥ //
analyzed: mahā aparādhāḥ saṃti loke mahātman sahasraśas śataśas koṭiśas ca hariḥ ca tān kṣamate sarvadā eva nāma traya smaraṇāt vai kupāluḥ

original: sarvāparādhādrahitaṃ dānamānairyuktaṃ sadā tāratamyācca hīnam / dṛṣṭvāparādhaṃ tasya viṣṇurmahātmā hāhākāraṃ kurute krodhabuddhyā //
analyzed: sarva aparādhāt rahitam dāna mānaiḥ yuktam sadā tāratamyāt ca hīnam dṛṣṭvā aparādham tasya viṣṇuḥ mahātmā hāhākāram kurute krodha buddhyā

original: uttiṣṭha govinda suvedavedya sovyātkṛtākhyo mayi samyak prasīda / bho keśavottiṣṭha sukhasvarūpa sṛṣṭau vyaye vartayituṃ samarthaḥ //
analyzed: uttiṣṭha govinda su veda vedya mayi samyak prasīda bho keśava uttiṣṭha sukha svarūpa sṛṣṭau vyaye vartayitum samarthaḥ

original: sṛṣṭvā brahmāṇaṃ prerayetpūjyasṛṣṭau sṛṣṭvā rudraṃ prerayetsaṃhṛtau ca / prāptavyayogyānbrahmaśeṣādidevāndṛṣṭvādṛṣṭvā dehi mokṣaṃ ca samyak //
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā brahmāṇam prerayet pūjya sṛṣṭau sṛṣṭvā rudram prerayet saṃhṛtau ca  prāptavya yogyān brahmaśeṣa ādi devān dṛṣṭvā a dṛṣṭvā dehi mokṣam ca samyak

original: hare murāre svāpahīnādya tiṣṭha kalpā dikānantarajñāna (raṃ buddhi) (jāna) hīnāt / samyag dṛṣṭvā karmadṛṣṭyā mahātmallaṃbdhaṃ tamo dāhi duḥ khasvarūpam //
analyzed: hare murāre svāpa hīna adya tiṣṭha hīnāt  samyak dṛṣṭvā karma dṛṣṭyā mahātmal laṃbdham tamaḥ dāhi duḥ kha svarūpam

original: daityādikānduḥ khamatīnha yasmāttamasyandhesarvadā citsvarūpī / tasmādāhurduḥ svarūpī haristvaṃ duḥ khasvarūpāttvaṃ ca duḥ khī hare tvam //
analyzed: daitya ādikān duḥ kha matīn ha yasmāt tamasi andhe sarvadā cit svarūpī tasmāt āhuḥ dus svarūpī hariḥ tvam dus kha svarūpāt tvam ca dus khī hare tvam

original: uttiṣṭha nārāyaṇa vāsudeva hyuttiṣṭha kṛṣṇācyuta mādhaveti / uttiṣṭha vaikuṇṭha dayārdramūrte uttiṣṭha lakṣmīśa namonamaste //
analyzed: uttiṣṭha nārāyaṇa vāsudeva hi uttiṣṭha kṛṣṇa acyuta mādhava iti  uttiṣṭha vaikuṇṭha dayā ārdra mūrte uttiṣṭha lakṣmīśa namaḥ namaḥ te

original: uttiṣṭha madhveśa sarasvatīśa uttiṣṭha rudreśa tathāṃbikeśa / uttiṣṭha candreśa tathā śacīśa vipreśa bhakteśa gaveśa nityam //
analyzed: uttiṣṭha madhveśa sarasvatī īśa uttiṣṭha rudra īśa tathā aṃbikā īśa uttiṣṭha candra īśa tathā śacīśa vipra īśa bhakta īśa gaveśa nityam

original: śāstrapriyottiṣṭha ṛci priyastvaṃ yajuḥ priyottiṣṭha nidānamūrte / sāmapriyastvaṃ ca tathā murāre atharvavedapriya sarvadā tvam //
analyzed: śāstra priya uttiṣṭha ṛci priyaḥ tvam yajuḥ priya uttiṣṭha nidāna mūrte sāma priyaḥ tvam ca tathā murāre atharvaveda priya sarvadā tvam

original: gadyapriyastvaṃ ca purāṇamūrte stutipriyottiṣṭha vicitramūrte / sugāyanaprītikarastvameva hyutiṣṭha śīghraṃ kamalā patistvam //
analyzed: gadya priyaḥ tvam ca purāṇa mūrte stuti priya uttiṣṭha vicitra mūrte sugāyana prīti karaḥ tvam eva hi utiṣṭha śīghram kamalā patiḥ tvam

original: evaṃ stuto viṣṇurajaḥ purāṇo hyatitvarāvānutthito nityabaddhaḥ //
analyzed: evam stutaḥ viṣṇuḥ ajaḥ purāṇaḥ hi ati tvarāvān utthitaḥ nitya baddhaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe kṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe brahmāviṣṇumaheśvarādidevatātāramyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe brahmāviṣṇumaheśvarādidevatātāramyanirūpaṇam nāma dvitīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 3
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / babhūvecchā mama devasya viṣṇoḥ sraṣṭuṃ sṛjyānmokṣayogyāṃśca moktum / icchāśaktiḥ sarvadaivāsti viṣṇostathāpi tadvyāharaṇaṃ ca laukikam //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca  babhūva icchā mama devasya viṣṇoḥ sraṣṭum sṛjyān mokṣa yogyān ca moktum icchā śaktiḥ sarvadā eva asti viṣṇoḥ tathā api tad vyāharaṇam ca laukikam

original: tadā harirjagṛhe laukikaṃ ca tamaḥ pānaṃ tena rūpeṇa cakre / tadrūpamāhuḥ prākṛtaṃ vai tadajñā hyandhaṃ tamaḥ praviśantyeva sarve //
analyzed: tadā hariḥ jagṛhe laukikam ca tamaḥ pānam tena rūpeṇa cakre tat rūpam āhuḥ prākṛtam vai tat ajñāḥ hi andham tamaḥ praviśanti eva sarve

original: avatārā mahāviṣṇoḥ sarve pūrṇāḥ prakīrtitāḥ / pūrṇaṃ ca tatparaṃ rūpaṃ pūrṇātpūrṇāḥ samudgatāḥ //
analyzed: avatārāḥ mahā viṣṇoḥ sarve pūrṇāḥ prakīrtitāḥ pūrṇam ca tat param rūpam pūrṇāt pūrṇāḥ samudgatāḥ

original: parāvaratvaṃ teṣāṃ tu vyaktimātraviśeṣataḥ / na deśakālasāmarthyātpārāvaryaṃ kathañcana //
analyzed: parāvara tvam teṣām tu vyakti mātra viśeṣataḥ na deśa kāla sāmarthyāt pārāvaryam kathañcana

original: pūrvarūpaṃ ca pūrṇaṃ ca pūrṇaṃ padavitāragam? / rūpaṃ tadātmanyādāya pūrṇamevāvaśiṣyate //
analyzed: pūrvarūpam ca pūrṇam ca pūrṇam padavī tāragam rūpam tat ātmani ādāya pūrṇam eva avaśiṣyate

original: laukikavyavahāroyaṃ bhūbhārakṣapaṇādikaḥ / tasya dṛrṣṭi vinā nānyo layaḥ kṛṣṇādinā kvacit //
analyzed: laukika vyavahāraḥ ayam bhū bhāra kṣapaṇa ādikaḥ tasya dṛrṣṭi vinā na anyaḥ layaḥ kṛṣṇa ādinā kvacid

original: tattve pīḍā na kartavyā tayā duḥ khāni vindati / atyantapīḍanāttasya rogastasya na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: tattve pīḍā na kartavyā tayā duḥkhāni vindati atyanta pīḍanāt tasya rogaḥ tasya na saṃśayaḥ

original: jñātavyāṃśe tu pīḍā tu kartavyā guruṇā saha / tamantevāsinaṃ cāhuḥ sa eva cu guruḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: jñātavya aṃśe tu pīḍā tu kartavyā guruṇā saha tam antevāsinam ca āhuḥ saḥ eva guruḥ smṛtaḥ

original: ye kurvanti harestattvavicāraṃ tu parasparam / tāveva guruśiṣyau tu vinatānandasaṃyuta //
analyzed: ye kurvanti hareḥ tattva vicāram tu parasparam tau eva guru śiṣyau tu vinatā ānanda saṃyuta

original: guruṇāpi samaṃ hāsyaṃ kartavyaṃ kuṭilaṃ vinā / harṣāmarṣayutaḥ śiṣyo guruḥ kauṭilyasaṃyutaḥ //
analyzed: guruṇā api samam hāsyam kartavyam kuṭilam vinā harṣa amarṣa yutaḥ śiṣyaḥ guruḥ kauṭilya saṃyutaḥ

original: ubhau tau nirayaṃ yāto yāvadācandratārakam / sākṣāddhariḥ puruṣaḥ piṅgalākṣaḥ svamāyāyāṃ guṇamayyāṃ mahātmā / svapauruṣeṇaiva sumaṅgalena adhāttu vīryaṃ bhagavānvīryavāṃśca //
analyzed: ubhau tau nirayam yātaḥ yāvat ācandratārakam sākṣāt hariḥ puruṣaḥ piṅgala akṣaḥ sva māyāyām guṇa mayyām mahātmā sva pauruṣeṇa eva su maṅgalena adhāt tu vīryam bhagavān vīryavān ca

original: garuḍa uvāca / vīryasvarūpaṃ brūhi me vāsudeva vīrye tvadīye saṃśayo me vibhāti / kiṃ vīryamīśasya svarūpabhūtaṃ kiṃ vā vibhinnaṃ vada sādhu vetsi //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca vīrya svarūpam brūhi me vāsudeva vīrye tvadīye saṃśayaḥ me vibhāti kim vīryam īśasya sva rūpa bhūtam kim vā vibhinnam vada sādhu vetsi

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / yadvīryamādhatta hariḥ svayaṃ prabhurmāyābhidhāyāṃ vinatātanūja / tadvīryamāhurnṛhareḥ svarūpaṃ vipaścito niścitatattvadarśinaḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca yat vīryam ādhatta hariḥ svayam prabhuḥ māyā abhidhāyām vinatā tanūja tat vīryam āhuḥ nṛhareḥ svarūpam vipaścitaḥ niścita tattva darśinaḥ

original: bhinnaṃ tadāhuḥ prākṛtameva cāhuḥ svanābhipadmādikavacca bodhyam / naitāvatā jñānarūpasya viṣṇorna vīryahāniriti cintanīyam //
analyzed: bhinnam tat āhuḥ prākṛtam eva ca āhuḥ sva nābhi padma ādika vat ca bodhyam na etāvatā jñāna rūpasya viṣṇoḥ na vīrya hāniḥ iti cintanīyam

original: vīryasvarūpī bhagavānvā sudevaḥ sarvatra deśepi ca sarvakāle / sarvārthavānyadi na syātkhagendra tarhīśvaraḥ puruṣo naiva sa syāt //
analyzed: vīrya svarūpī bhagavān vā sudevaḥ sarvatra deśe pi ca sarva kāle sarva arthavān yadi na syāt khaga indra tarhi īśvaraḥ puruṣaḥ nā eva sa syāt

original: acintyavīryaiścintyavīryairdvirūpaḥ strīrūpamekaṃ puruṣaṃ tathā param / ubhe rūpe vīryavatī khagendra tayorabhedaścintanīyo hi samyakū //
analyzed: acintya vīryaiḥ cintya vīryaiḥ dvi rūpaḥ strī rūpam ekam puruṣam tathā param ubhe rūpe vīryavatī khaga indra tayoḥ abhedaḥ cintanīyaḥ hi samyak

original: strīrūpavānyadi na syātkhargedrastrīṇāṃ kathaṃ pratibiṃbatvameva //
analyzed: strī rūpavān yadi na syāt kharga idra strīṇām katham pratibiṃba tvam eva

original: strīrūpamasmādbrahmajaṃ (dvāstavaṃ)
analyzed: strī rūpam asmāt brahma jam dvāstavam

original: cintanīyaṃ svarūpametannānyathā cintanīyam / strīrūpavannaiva vicintanīyaṃ napuṃsakaṃ tbasya janyaṃ hi viddhi //
analyzed: cintanīyam sva rūpam etat na anyathā cintanīyam  strī rūpa vat na eva vicintanīyam napuṃsakam tu asya janyam hi viddhi

original: napuṃsakaṃ navaiva svarūpabhūtamato harau nāsti vicintanīyam / strībiṃbabhūte harirūpe khagendra śrīrūpamastīti vicintanīyam //
analyzed: napuṃsakam navā eva sva rūpa bhūtam atas harau nā asti vicintanīyam strī biṃba bhūte hari rūpe khaga indra śrī rūpam asti iti vicintanīyam

original: garuḍa uvāca / striyā striyaśca saṃyogaṃ vyarthamahurmanīṣiṇaḥ / strīrūpabhūte viṃbe tu strīrūpāḥ santi sarvadā //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca striyā striyaḥ ca saṃyogam vyartham ahuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ strī rūpa bhūte viṃbe tu strī rūpāḥ santi sarvadā

original: sthitau tatra nimittaṃ ca brūhi kṛṣṇa mama prabho //
analyzed: sthitau tatra nimittam ca brūhi kṛṣṇa mama prabho

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / strībiṃbabhūtastrīrūpe lakṣmīrna syātkhageśvara / nityāviyoginī devī kathaṃ syātparamātmanaḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca strī biṃba bhūta strī rūpe lakṣmīḥ na syāt khageśvara nitya aviyoginī devī katham syāt paramātmanaḥ

original: hareranantarūpāṇāṃ strīrūpāṇāṃ khageśvara / anantānantarūpeṇa nityaṃ śuśrūṣaṇe ratā //
analyzed: hareḥ ananta rūpāṇām strī rūpāṇām khageśvara ananta ananta rūpeṇa nityam śuśrūṣaṇe ratā

original: ato lakṣmyā viyogastu śaṅkanīyaḥ kathañcana / nārāyaṇo nāma hariḥ svatantraḥ śriyā vinā nāsti kadāpi tārkṣya / harermukundasya padāravinde śuśrūṣamāṇā paramādareṇa //
analyzed: atas lakṣmyāḥ viyogaḥ tu śaṅkanīyaḥ kathañcana nārāyaṇaḥ nāma hariḥ svatantraḥ śriyā vinā nā asti kadāpi tārkṣya hareḥ mukundasya pada aravinde śuśrūṣamāṇā parama ādareṇa

original: hariṃ vinā śrīrapi deśakāle nāstīti mokṣecchubhireva vedyam / yasyāmadhādvīryamanukṣaṇaṃ ca sā māmikā cendrajālā tmiketi //
analyzed: harim vinā śrīḥ api deśa kāle nā asti iti mokṣa icchubhiḥ eva vedyam yasyām adhāt vīryam anukṣaṇam ca sā māmikā ca indrajālā tmikā iti

original: vadanti ye asurā mūḍharūpā adhaṃmataḥ praviśantyeva sarve / māyā nāma prakṛtistvemāhuḥ susūkṣmarūpā na tu cendrajālikā //
analyzed: vadanti ye asurāḥ mūḍha rūpāḥ a dhaṃmataḥ praviśanti eva sarve māyā nāma prakṛtiḥ tu emā āhuḥ su sūkṣma rūpā na tu ca indrajālikā

original: tasyābhimānaḥ śrīriti veditavyo vīryādhānaṃ tatra teṣāṃ ca melaḥ / kāryonmukhaṃ melanaṃ cāhurāryā ito rūpaṃ nāhurāyyāśca viṣṇoḥ //
analyzed: tasya abhimānaḥ śrīḥ iti veditavyaḥ vīrya ādhānam tatra teṣām ca melaḥ kārya unmukham melanam ca āhuḥ āryāḥ itas rūpam na āhuḥ āyyāḥ ca viṣṇoḥ

original: sānādi nityā satyarūpā ca viṣṇormithyā rūpā sā kathaṃ syātkhagendra / satyā tanuḥ prakṛtestannigūḍhā satyatvamāhurvyavahārārtharūpam //
analyzed: sā anādi nityā satya rūpā ca viṣṇoḥ mithyā rūpā sā katham syāt khagendra satyā tanuḥ prakṛteḥ tad nigūḍhā satya tvam āhuḥ vyavahāra artha rūpam

original: vyavahārarūpā satyatā cetprakṛtyāstadā kathaṃ syādyadanādibhūtā / anādinityā yadi na syātkhagendra suśūkṣmarūpeṇa na kāraṇaṃ syāt //
analyzed: vyavahāra rūpā satyatā ced prakṛtyāḥ tadā katham syāt yat anādi bhūtā anādi nityā yadi na syāt khagendra su śūkṣma rūpeṇa na kāraṇam syāt

original: sūkṣmeṇa rūpeṇa ca kāraṇaṃ syāt tarhi prapañcasya ca kāraṇaṃ vada / avidyāyā vaśato viṣṇureva nānārūpairdṛśyate viṣṇureva //
analyzed: sūkṣmeṇa rūpeṇa ca kāraṇam syāt tarhi prapañcasya ca kāraṇam vada avidyāyāḥ vaśataḥ viṣṇuḥ eva nānā rūpaiḥ dṛśyate viṣṇuḥ eva

original: śāstrajñānānnāśameti hyavidyā na saṃśayo hariṇā caikyameti / evaṃ brūṣe yadi vādatkhagendra vakṣyehaṃ te tatra yuktiṃ śṛṇu tvam //
analyzed: śāstra jñānāt nāśam eti hi avidyā na saṃśayaḥ hariṇā ca aikyam eti evam brūṣe yadi vādat khaga indra vakṣye iham te tatra yuktim śṛṇu tvam

original: sarvajñarūpasya hi me murāreḥ kathaṃ harerghaṭate hyajñatā ca / sūrye yathā tamo nāsti tathā nārāyaṇe harau / ajñānaṃ nāsti pakṣīdra kathaṃ tatvaṃ bravīṣyaho //
analyzed: sarvajña rūpasya hi me murāreḥ katham hareḥ ghaṭate hi ajña tā ca sūrye yathā tamaḥ na asti tathā nārāyaṇe harau ajñānam nā asti katham bravīṣi aho

original: ato nāhaṃ brāhmaṇastvādikālādupādhisaṃbandhavaśādajñatācet / sarvajñosau kutra pakṣīndra viṣṇuralpajñajīvo jñānaśūnyaśca kutra //
analyzed: atas na aham brāhmaṇaḥ tu ādi kālāt upādhi saṃbandha vaśāt ajña tā ced sarvajñaḥ asau kutra pakṣi indra viṣṇuḥ alpa jña jīvaḥ jñāna śūnyaḥ ca kutra

original: viruddhayoścānayoḥ sarvadaiva kathaṃ caikyaṃ saṃvādiṣyanti vedāḥ / deśe kāle sarvadā dduḥ khahīno jagatkartā pūrṇaśaktiḥ sadaiva //
analyzed: viruddhayoḥ ca anayoḥ sarvadā eva katham ca aikyam saṃvādiṣyanti vedāḥ deśe kāle sarvadā kha hīnaḥ jagatkartā pūrṇa śaktiḥ sadā eva

original: jīvaḥ sadā svalpakartāsti pūrṇaḥ saṃsārarūpe duḥ kharūpe ca nityam / viruddhayoścānayoraikyamāhurīśasya māyāvaśato māyinaśca //
analyzed: jīvaḥ sadā su alpa kartā asti pūrṇaḥ saṃsāra rūpe duḥ kha rūpe ca nityam viruddhayoḥ ca anayoḥ aikyam āhuḥ īśasya māyā vaśataḥ māyinaḥ ca

original: ye vaiṣṇavā vaiṣṇavadāsavaśyāsteṣāṃ drohaṃ sarvadā saṃcaredyaḥ / hariprītistena bhavenna nityamānandavṛddhistena bhavenna muktau //
analyzed: ye vaiṣṇavāḥ vaiṣṇava dāsa vaśyāḥ teṣām droham sarvadā saṃcaret yaḥ hari prītiḥ tena bhavet na nityam ānanda vṛddhiḥ tena bhavet na muktau

original: māyī sadā māyibhṛtyastathāpi bhedajñānānnindyate kāryate ca / tenāpi teṣāṃ duḥ khavṛddhirbhavecca hyadhaṃ tamaḥ punarāvṛttihīnam //
analyzed: māyī sadā māyi bhṛtyaḥ tathā api bheda jñānāt nindyate kāryate ca tena api teṣām duḥ kha vṛddhiḥ bhavet ca hi adham tamaḥ punarāvṛtti hīnam

original: khagendrātaḥ prakṛtiḥ sūkṣmarūpā sā nityā sā satyabhūtā sadaiva / evaṃ svayaṃ kālavāyvādikānāṃ parā (ramā)
analyzed: khagendrātaḥ prakṛtiḥ sūkṣma rūpā sā nityā sā satya bhūtā sadā eva evam svayam kāla vāyu ādikānām parā ramā

original: ṇavaḥ satyarūpāśca santi //
analyzed: ṇavaḥ satya rūpāḥ ca santi

original: parā (māṇū)nāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ veditavyaṃ jñānecchubhirnānyathā veditavyam / padārthānāṃ pārthivānāṃ khagendra viśeṣāṇāṃ caramākhyo viśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: parā māṇūnām lakṣaṇam veditavyam jñāna icchubhiḥ na anyathā veditavyam padārthānām pārthivānām khaga indra viśeṣāṇām carama ākhyaḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: sa evaḥ syātparamāṇurdvijendra yontyovi (va)
analyzed: saḥ evaḥ syāt paramāṇuḥ dvijendra va

original: śeṣovayavaśca sa smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: śeṣaḥ uvayavaḥ ca sa smṛtaḥ

original: garuḍa uvāca / he kṛṣṇa he mādhava sāttvatāṃ pate padārthānāṃ caramāṃśaḥ parāṇu //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca he kṛṣṇa he mādhava sāttvatām pate padārthānām carama aṃśaḥ para aṇu

original: iti proktaṃ tatra me saṃśayosti yontyo viśeṣaḥ sa tu nāṃśayuktaḥ / yo hyaṃśayukto na tu soṃtyo viśeṣa evaṃ mamābhāti vacastu tathyam //
analyzed: iti proktam tatra me saṃśayaḥ asti yaḥ antyaḥ viśeṣaḥ sa tu na aṃśa yuktaḥ yaḥ hi aṃśa yuktaḥ na tu saḥ antyaḥ viśeṣaḥ evam mama ābhāti vacaḥ tu tathyam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / ya eva loke saṃsthitā mānuṣāstu viśeṣāṇāṃ darśane śaktiyuktāḥ / tathāpi te yasya cāṃśitvameva viśeṣaṃ vai naiva draṣṭuṃ samarthāḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca ye eva loke saṃsthitāḥ mānuṣāḥ tu viśeṣāṇām darśane śakti yuktāḥ tathā api te yasya ca aṃśi tvam eva viśeṣam vai nā eva draṣṭum samarthāḥ

original: tamevāhuścaramāṃśaṃ viśeṣaṃ ye caivamāhurmunayastena cānye / ye kāṇādā gautamādyāḥ khagendra niraṃśakaṃ paramāṇuṃ vadanti //
analyzed: tam eva āhuḥ carama aṃśam viśeṣam ye ca evam āhuḥ munayaḥ tena ca anye ye kāṇādāḥ gautama ādyāḥ khaga indra niraṃśakam paramāṇum vadanti

original: anantāṃśaiḥ saṃyutatvepi tāṃśca niraṃśino bhrāntidṛṣṭyā vadanti / tasmātparā (ramā)
analyzed: ananta aṃśaiḥ saṃyuta tve pi tān ca niraṃśinaḥ bhrānti dṛṣṭyā vadanti tasmāt parā ramā

original: ṇoḥ paramāṇutvamasti tadaṃśānāṃ vinatāgarbhajāta //
analyzed: ṇoḥ paramāṇu tvam asti tad aṃśānām vinatā garbha jāta

original: parā (ramā) ṇūnāmekadeśe khagendra tanno saṃti prāṇināṃ rāśayaśca / pratyekaśa saṃti rūpā hareśca hyataśca tatparamāṇoraṇīyaḥ //
analyzed: parā ṇūnām eka deśe khaga indra tat no saṃti prāṇinām rāśayaḥ ca pratyekaśa saṃti rūpāḥ hareḥ ca hi atas ca tat paramāṇoḥ aṇīyaḥ

original: yo vā tvaṇīyānparamasya viṣṇoḥ sa eva rūpo mahato mahīyān / teṣāmanyonyaṃ na viśeṣosti kaścidacintyarūpe ca vicintanīyaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ vā tu aṇīyān paramasya viṣṇoḥ saḥ eva rūpaḥ mahataḥ mahīyān teṣām anyonyam na viśeṣaḥ usti kaścid acintya rūpe ca vicintanīyaḥ

original: kālakoṭivihīnatvaṃ kālānantyaṃ vidurbudhāḥ / deśakoṭivihīnatvaṃ deśānantyaṃ vidurbudhāḥ //
analyzed: kāla koṭi vihīna tvam kāla ānantyam viduḥ budhāḥ deśa koṭi vihīna tvam deśa ānantyam viduḥ budhāḥ

original: guṇānāmaprameyatve guṇānantyaṃ vidurbudhāḥ / ānantyaṃ trividhaṃ nityaṃ harernānyasya kasyacit //
analyzed: guṇānām aprameya tve guṇa ānantyam viduḥ budhāḥ ānantyam trividham nityam hareḥ na anyasya kasyacid

original: tasya sarvasvarūpeṣu cānantyaṃ tu trilakṣaṇam / tathāpi deśatastasya paricchedopi yujyate //
analyzed: tasya sarva svarūpeṣu ca ānantyam tu tri lakṣaṇam tathā api deśataḥ tasya paricchedaḥ api yujyate

original: paricchedastathā vyāpterekarūpepi yujyate / tasyācintyādbhutaiśvaryaṃ vyavahārārthameva ca //
analyzed: paricchedaḥ tathā vyāpteḥ eka rūpe api yujyate tasya acintya adbhuta aiśvaryam vyavahāra artham eva ca

original: guṇataḥ kālataścaiva paricchedo na kutracit / vyāptatvaṃ deśato hyasti sarvabhūteṣu yadyāpi //
analyzed: guṇataḥ kālataḥ ca eva paricchedaḥ na kutracid vyāpta tvam deśataḥ hi asti sarva bhūteṣu yadi ā api

original: na ca bhedaḥ kvacittasya hyaṇumātrepi yujyate / tathāpi vidyateṇutvaṃ tasmādaiśvaryayogataḥ //
analyzed: na ca bhedaḥ kvacid tasya hi aṇu mātre api yujyate tathā api vidyate iṇu tvam tasmāt aiśvarya yogataḥ

original: tasmādviddhyavatārārthaṃ vyāptatvaṃ cāpi bhaṇyate / yattasya vyāpakaṃ rūpaṃ paraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ viduḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt viddhi avatāra artham vyāpta tvam ca api bhaṇyate yat tasya vyāpakam rūpam param nārāyaṇam viduḥ

original: ataśca paramāṇūnāṃ pārthivā'nantyavādinām / bhedaḥ parasparaṃ jñeyastatheśasya mahātmanaḥ //
analyzed: atas ca paramāṇūnām pārthiva ānantya vādinām bhedaḥ parasparam jñeyaḥ tathā īśasya mahātmanaḥ

original: jaḍeśayorjaḍānāṃ ca jīvānāṃ ca parasparam / tathaiva jaḍajīvānāṃ nityaṃ bhedo jaḍeśayoḥ //
analyzed: jaḍa īśayoḥ jaḍānām ca jīvānām ca parasparam tathā eva jaḍa jīvānām nityam bhedaḥ jaḍa īśayoḥ

original: pañca bhedā ime nityaṃ sarvāvasthāsu sarvaśaḥ / etādṛśyāṃ tu māyāyāṃ vīryamādhatta vīryavān //
analyzed: pañca bhedāḥ ime nityam sarva avasthāsu sarvaśas  etādṛśyām tu māyāyām vīryam ādhatta vīryavān

original: puruṣākhyo haristasmāttriguṇānasṛjatprabhuḥ //
analyzed: puruṣa ākhyaḥ hariḥ tasmāt triguṇān asṛjat prabhuḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhagavadvīryasvarūpatadādhānadvārakaguṇatraya sṛṣṭijaḍeśabhedādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhagavat vīryasvarūpatadādhānadvārakaguṇatrayasṛṣṭijaḍeśabhedādinirūpaṇam nāma tṛtīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 4
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / yathā sasarja bhagavāṃstrīn guṇānprakṛtestadā / lakṣmīstrirūpā saṃbhūtā śrīrbhūrdurgoti saṃjñitā //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca yathā sasarja bhagavān trīn guṇān prakṛteḥ tadā  lakṣmīḥ tri rūpā saṃbhūtā śrīḥ bhūḥ durgā iti saṃjñitā

original: sattvābhimāninī śrīstu bhūrdevī rajamāninī / tamobhimāninī durgā hyevamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: sattva abhimāninī śrīḥ tu bhūḥ devī raja māninī tamaḥ abhimāninī durgā hi evam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: antaraṃ na vijānīyādrūpāṇāṃ ca parasparam / guṇānāṃ caiva saṃbandhāddurgādīnāṃ khageśvara //
analyzed: antaram na vijānīyāt rūpāṇām ca parasparam guṇānām ca eva saṃbandhāt durga ādīnām khageśvara

original: antaraṃ ye vijānanti te yāntyandhantamaḥ param / puruṣastu trirūpobhūdviṣṇurbrahmā bhavetisaḥ //
analyzed: antaram ye vijānanti te yānti andhantamaḥ param puruṣaḥ tu tri rūpaḥ bhūt viṣṇuḥ brahmā bhava iti saḥ

original: sattvena lokānvardhayituṃ viṣṇuḥ sākṣāddhariḥ svayam / sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ ca rajasā brahmaṇi prāviśaddhariḥ //
analyzed: sattvena lokān vardhayitum viṣṇuḥ sākṣāt hariḥ svayam sṛṣṭim kartum ca rajasā brahmaṇi prāviśat hariḥ

original: ādyo brahmā sa vijñeyo na tu sākṣāddhariḥ svayam / tamasāpi samānhantuṃ rudre ca prāviśaddhariḥ //
analyzed: ādyaḥ brahmā sa vijñeyaḥ na tu sākṣāt hariḥ svayam tamasā api samān hantum rudre ca prāviśat hariḥ

original: rudre sthito rudrasaṃjño na rudrastu hariḥ svayam / viṣṇureva hariḥ sākṣāttāvubhauna harī smṛtau //
analyzed: rudre sthitaḥ rudra saṃjñaḥ na rudraḥ tu hariḥ svayam viṣṇuḥ eva hariḥ sākṣāt tau ubhau na harī smṛtau

original: āviṣṭarūpau vijñeyau brahmarudrābhidhāyakau / evaṃ jñātvā mokṣameti nānyathā tu kathañcana //
analyzed: āviṣṭa rūpau vijñeyau brahma rudra abhidhāyakau evam jñātvā mokṣam eti na anyathā tu kathañcana

original: viṣṇubrahmādirūpāṇāmaikyaṃ jānanti ye dvijāḥ / te yānti narakaṃ ghoraṃ punarāvṛttivarjitam //
analyzed: viṣṇu brahma ādi rūpāṇām aikyam jānanti ye dvijāḥ te yānti narakam ghoram punarāvṛtti varjitam

original: guṇatrayaṃ praviṣṭastu puruṣo hariravyayaḥ / kāryonmukhaṃ yathā bhūyātkṣobhayāmāsa vai tathā //
analyzed: guṇatrayam praviṣṭaḥ tu puruṣaḥ hariḥ avyayaḥ kārya unmukham yathā bhūyāt kṣobhayāmāsa vai tathā

original: jātakṣobhādbhagavato mahānāsīdguṇatrayāt / guṇatraye vidyamānādbhāgādeva na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: jāta kṣobhāt bhagavataḥ mahān āsīt guṇatrayāt  guṇatraye vidyamānāt bhāgāt eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: mahato brahmavāyū ca jajñāte khābhimāninau / tasya saṃvatsarātpaścādyamalau saṃbabhūvatuḥ //
analyzed: mahataḥ brahma vāyū ca jajñāte kha abhimāninau tasya saṃvatsarāt paścāt yamalau saṃbabhūvatuḥ

original: rajaḥ pradhānaṃ yattatvaṃ mahattattavamitīritam / sargaṃ tvimaṃ vijānīyādguṇavaiṣamyanāmakam //
analyzed: rajaḥ pradhānam mahat tattavam iti īritam  sargam tu imam vijānīyāt guṇa vaiṣamya nāmakam

original: garuḍa uvāca / mahattattavasvarūpasya jñānārthaṃ devakīsuta / tvayoktā guṇavaiṣamyanāmikā sṛṣṭiruttamā //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca mahat tattava svarūpasya jñāna artham devakī suta tvayā uktā guṇa vaiṣamya nāmikā sṛṣṭiḥ uttamā

original: guṇavaiṣamyaśabdārthaṃ mama brūhi mahāprabho / śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / guṇavaiṣamyaśabdārthajñāpanāya khageśvara //
analyzed: guṇa vaiṣamya śabda artham mama brūhi mahā prabho śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca guṇa vaiṣamya śabda artha jñāpanāya khageśvara

original: apikṣitaṃ ca tatrādau guṇasāmyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ / samyagjñāpayituṃ tatra khādau tāvatsvageśvara //
analyzed: apikṣitam ca tatra ādau guṇa sāmyam na saṃśayaḥ samyak jñāpayitum tatra kha ādau tāvat svaga īśvara

original: rāśibhūtaṃ guṇānāṃ tu darśayiṣye sthitiṃ ca vai / rāśībhūtasya tasamaḥ sakāśādvinatāsuta //
analyzed: rāśi bhūtam guṇānām tu darśayiṣye sthitim ca vai rāśībhūtasya tasamaḥ sakāśāt vinatā suta

original: rāśībhūtaṃ rajo jñeyandviguṇaṃ tattu nānyathā / rāśībhūtasya rajasaḥ sakāśādvinatāsuta //
analyzed: rāśībhūtam rajaḥ jñeyat dviguṇam tat tu na anyathā rāśībhūtasya rajasaḥ sakāśāt vinatā suta

original: rāśībhūtaṃ tathā sattvaṃ dviguṇaṃ samudāhṛtam / mūlaprakṛtijā hyete na mūlā prakṛtiḥ smṛtā //
analyzed: rāśībhūtam tathā sattvam dviguṇam samudāhṛtam mūlaprakṛti jāḥ hi ete na mūlā prakṛtiḥ smṛtā

original: yataḥ prakṛtirūpāṇāṃ paricchedo na vidyate / ataḥ prakṛtijā jñeyā na mūlāste khageśvara //
analyzed: yatas prakṛti rūpāṇām paricchedaḥ na vidyate atas prakṛti jāḥ jñeyāḥ na mūlāḥ te khageśvara

original: evaṃ tava guṇānāñca parimāṇaṃ khageśvara / uktaṃ svarūpaṃ teṣāṃ tu tava samyak khageśvara //
analyzed: evam tava guṇānām ca parimāṇam khageśvara uktam svarūpam teṣām tu tava samyak khageśvara

original: tatra rāśitraye sattvaṃ kevalaṃ samudāhṛtam / rajastamobhyāṃ garuḍa hyavimiśraṃ hyatastu tat //
analyzed: tatra rāśi traye sattvam kevalam samudāhṛtam rajaḥ tamobhyām garuḍa hi avimiśram hi atas tu tat

original: kevalaṃ sattvamityuktaṃ na tu śreṣṭhatvataḥ prabho / sṛṣṭikāle kevalaṃ syātpralaye miśritaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: kevalam sattvam iti uktam na tu śreṣṭha tvataḥ prabho sṛṣṭi kāle kevalam syāt pralaye miśritam bhavet

original: sarvadāpyavimiśraṃ ca sattvarāśiṃ khageśvara / sarvadāpi vimiśraṃ ca sattvarāśiṃ dvijottama //
analyzed: sarvadā api avimiśram ca sattva rāśim khageśvara sarvadā api vimiśram ca sattva rāśim dvijottama

original: ye vijānanti te sarve viśanti hyadharaṃ tamaḥ / rajastamoguṇau vīndra itarābhyāṃ vimiśritau //
analyzed: ye vijānanti te sarve viśanti hi adharam tamaḥ rajaḥ tamaḥ guṇau vi indraḥ itarābhyām vimiśritau

original: sṛṣṭau pralayakālepi miśrāveva khageśvara / rāśibhūtepi rajasi rajobhāgācchatādhikam //
analyzed: sṛṣṭau pralaya kāle api miśrau eva khageśvara rāśi bhūte pi rajasi rajaḥ bhāgāt śata adhikam

original: sattvaṃ ca miśritaṃ jñeyaṃ nānyathā pakṣisattama / rajasaḥ śatabhāgānāṃ madhye tu vinatāsuta //
analyzed: sattvam ca miśritam jñeyam na anyathā pakṣi sattama rajasaḥ śata bhāgānām madhye tu vinatā suta

original: ya eko bhāga uddiṣṭastāvatparimitaṃ tamaḥ / rāśibhūtepi rajasi miśritaṃ parikīrtitam //
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ bhāgaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ tāvat parimitam tamaḥ rāśi bhūte api rajasi miśritam parikīrtitam

original: rajorāśisthitistvevaṃ tāta vyāptaṃ tamoguṇaiḥ / rāśibhūtepi tamasi sattvaṃ ca vinatāsuta //
analyzed: rajaḥ rāśi sthitiḥ tu evam tāta vyāptam tamaḥ guṇaiḥ rāśi bhūte api tamasi sattvam ca vinatā suta

original: tamaḥ sakāśādgaruḍa daśabhāgādhikena ca / miśritaṃ bhavatītyevaṃ jñātavyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: tamaḥ sakāśāt garuḍa daśa bhāga adhikena ca miśritam bhavati iti evam jñātavyam na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: tamaso daśabhāgānāṃ madhye tu vinatāsuta / ya eko bhāga uddiṣṭastāvatparimitaṃ rajaḥ //
analyzed: tamasaḥ daśa bhāgānām madhye tu vinatā suta yaḥ ekaḥ bhāgaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ tāvat parimitam rajaḥ

original: rāśibhūtepi tamasi miśritaṃ bhavati dhruvam / tamorāśisthitistvevaṃ jñātavyā pakṣisattama //
analyzed: rāśi bhūte api tamasi miśritam bhavati dhruvam tamaḥ rāśi sthitiḥ tu evam jñātavyā pakṣi sattama

original: garuḍa uvāca / raśibhūtepi rajasi rāśibhūte tamasyapi / sattvāṃśā hyadhikāḥ saṃtītyevamuktaṃ mayānagha //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca raśi bhūte api rajasi rāśi bhūte tamasi api sattva aṃśāḥ hi adhikāḥ saṃti iti evam uktam mayā anagha

original: tatra me saṃśayo hyasti śṛṇu tvaṃ sāttvatāṃ pate / yadrāśyāṃ yadrā śibhāgā hyadhikāḥ saṃti yāvatā //
analyzed: tatra me saṃśayaḥ hi asti śṛṇu tvam sāttvatām pate yad rāśyām yad rā śi bhāgāḥ hi adhikāḥ saṃti yāvatā

original: tāvatā vyavahāraḥ syātkṣīranīramiva prabho / śrutvā sa garuḍenoktaṃ bhagavānpuruṣottamaḥ //
analyzed: tāvatā vyavahāraḥ syāt kṣīra nīram iva prabho śrutvā sa garuḍena uktam bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ

original: uvāca para maprītyā saṃstuvan garuḍaṃ hariḥ / śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / rajorāśyā tamorāśyā sattvarāśyadhikā sadā //
analyzed: uvāca para ma prītyā saṃstuvan garuḍam hariḥ  śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca rajaḥ rāśyā tamaḥ rāśyā sattva rāśī adhikā sadā

original: miśritaṃ cāpi pakṣīndra na sattavamiti kīrtyate / rajorāśistamorāśirityevaṃ vibudhā viduḥ //
analyzed: miśritam ca api pakṣi indra na sattavam iti kīrtyate rajaḥ rāśiḥ tamaḥ rāśiḥ iti evam vibudhāḥ viduḥ

original: viṣaṃ tu carudugdhasthaṃ viṣamityucyate yathā / evaṃ mayoktā garuḍa guṇānāṃ nijasaṃsthitiḥ //
analyzed: viṣam tu caru dugdha stham viṣam iti ucyate yathā evam mayā uktā garuḍa guṇānām nija saṃsthitiḥ

original: sāmyāvasthāṃ guṇānāṃ ca śṛṇvidānīṃ khageśvara / rāśīkṛtācca rajasaḥ janyaṃ yacca kageśvara //
analyzed: sāmya avasthām guṇānām ca śṛṇu idānīm khageśvara rāśīkṛtāt ca rajasaḥ janyam yat ca kageśvara

original: mahattattve praviṣṭaṃ ca yadrajaḥ parikīrtitam / pralaye samanuprāpte mahattattve sthitaṃ rajaḥ //
analyzed: mahat tattve praviṣṭam ca yat rajaḥ parikīrtitam pralaye samanuprāpte mahat tattve sthitam rajaḥ

original: dvādaśāṃśena tu hyaddhā vibhaktaṃ bhavatiṃ prabho / rāśībhūte hi sattve tu daśabhāgena miśritam //
analyzed: dvādaśa aṃśena tu hi addhā vibhaktam bhavatim prabho rāśībhūte hi sattve tu daśa bhāgena miśritam

original: samyak bhavati pakṣīndra tathaikāṃśena cāṇḍaja / tamorāśyā miśritaṃ ca bhavatyeva na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: samyak bhavati pakṣi indra tathā eka aṃśena ca aṇḍa ja tamaḥ rāśyā miśritam ca bhavati eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: anyenaikena bhāgena rajorāśyā khageśvara / miśritaṃ bhavatītyevaṃ jñātavyaṃ nānyathā kvacit //
analyzed: anyena ekena bhāgena rajaḥ rāśyā khageśvara miśritam bhavati iti evam jñātavyam na anyathā kvacid

original: guṇatrayepi bhagavānmahattattvasya cāṇḍaja / evaṃ layastu jñātavyo hṛdi tattvārthavodibhiḥ //
analyzed: guṇatraye api bhagavān mahat tattvasya ca aṇḍa jaḥ evam layaḥ tu jñātavyaḥ hṛdi tattva artha vodibhiḥ

original: evaṃ guṇatrayāṇāṃ ca miśritattvātkhageśvara / guṇasāmyamiti prāhurevaṃ jānīhi vai khaga //
analyzed: evam guṇa trayāṇām ca miśri tattvāt khageśvara guṇa sāmyam iti prāhuḥ evam jānīhi vai khaga

original: anyathā ye vijānanti te yānti hyadharaṃ tamaḥ / garuḍa uvāca / rāśīkṛtaguṇānāṃ ca trayāṇāṃ parameśvara //
analyzed: anyathā ye vijānanti te yānti hi adharam tamaḥ  garuḍaḥ uvāca  rāśīkṛta guṇānām ca trayāṇām parameśvara

original: viśālānāṃ paraṃ brahmanpralaye guṇasāmyatā / kathaṃ brūhi mahābhāga etattattvaṃ samāsataḥ //
analyzed: viśālānām param brahman pralaye guṇa sāmyatā  katham brūhi mahābhāga etat tattvam samāsatas

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / rāśībhūtaguṇānāṃ tu trayaṇāmapi sattama / tadā vimiśritatvena hyavasthānaṃ vidurbudhāḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca rāśībhūta guṇānām tu trayaṇām api sattama tadā vimiśrita tvena hi avasthānam viduḥ budhāḥ

original: idānīṃ guṇavaiṣamyaṃ śṛṇu samyaṅ mama priya / sṛṣṭikāle tu saṃprāpte yatpūrvaṃ pralaye khaga //
analyzed: idānīm guṇa vaiṣamyam śṛṇu samyak mama priya sṛṣṭi kāle tu saṃprāpte yat pūrvam pralaye khaga

original: daśabhāgaiśca sattve tu miśritaṃ yadra jastathā / tamasyapyekabhāgena praviṣṭaṃ yattu tadrajaḥ //
analyzed: daśa bhāgaiḥ ca sattve tu miśritam yat ra jaḥ tathā tamasi api eka bhāgena praviṣṭam yat tu tat rajaḥ

original: rajasyapyekabhāgena praviṣṭaṃ yacca tadrajaḥ / evaṃ dvādaśabhāgaiśca praviṣṭaṃ sarvaśo rajaḥ //
analyzed: rajasi api eka bhāgena praviṣṭam yat ca tat rajaḥ evam dvādaśa bhāgaiḥ ca praviṣṭam sarvaśas rajaḥ

original: sattvastairdaśabhāgaiśca tathaikena rajoṃśinā / evamekādaśairbhāgaistamasthāṃśena vai vdija //
analyzed: sattvaḥ taiḥ daśa bhāgaiḥ ca tathā ekena rajaḥ oṃśinā evam ekādaśaiḥ bhāgaiḥ tamastha aṃśena vai

original: miśritaṃ bhavati hyaddhā mahattattvaṃ tadā smṛtam / etadanyo viśeṣaśca mantadhyo vinatāsuta //
analyzed: miśritam bhavati hi addhā mahat tattvam tadā smṛtam  etad anyaḥ viśeṣaḥ ca mantadhyaḥ vinatā suta

original: ekāṃśastāmaso jñeyo mahattattve na saṃśayaḥ / evaṃ trayodaśairbhāgairmiśritaṃ tacca sattama //
analyzed: eka aṃśaḥ tāmasaḥ jñeyaḥ mahat tattve na saṃśayaḥ evam trayodaśaiḥ bhāgaiḥ miśritam tat ca sattama

original: evametadvijānīyānnānyathā tu kathañcana / garuḍa uvāca / caturmukhācchrutaṃ pūrvaṃ bhagavansāttvatāṃ pate //
analyzed: evam etat vijānīyāt na anyathā tu kathañcana garuḍaḥ uvāca caturmukhāt śrutam pūrvam bhagavan sāttvatām pate

original: caturbhāgātsamutpannaṃ mahattattvamiti prabho / tatraikāṃśastamaḥ proktaḥ tribhāgo raja eva ca //
analyzed: catur bhāgāt samutpannam mahat tattvam iti prabho tatra eka aṃśaḥ tamaḥ proktaḥ tri bhāgaḥ rajaḥ eva ca

original: tadāhurbrahmaṇo rūpaṃ guṇavaiṣamyanāmakam / caturbhāgātmakaṃ proktaṃ mahattattvaṃ śrutaṃ mayā //
analyzed: tat āhuḥ brahmaṇaḥ rūpam guṇa vaiṣamya nāmakam  catur bhāga ātmakam proktam mahat tattvam śrutam mayā

original: trayodaśāṃśaiḥ saṃbhūtamiti proktaṃ tvayānagha / tadetatsaṃśayaṃ chindhi kṛpālo bhaktavatsala //
analyzed: trayodaśa aṃśaiḥ saṃbhūtam iti proktam tvayā anagha tat etat saṃśayam chindhi kṛpālaḥ bhakta vatsala

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / brahmoktamya mayoktasya vivādo nāsti sarvathā / mūlasattve miśritaṃ ca daśabhāgena yadrajaḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca mayā uktasya vivādaḥ na asti sarvathā mūla sattve miśritam ca daśa bhāgena yat rajaḥ

original: tatsarvaṃ ca militvaiva tveko bhāgastu kīrtitaḥ / mūle rajasi yaccokto rajobhāgaḥ khageśvara //
analyzed: tat sarvam ca militvā eva tu ekaḥ bhāgaḥ tu kīrtitaḥ mūle rajasi yat ca uktaḥ rajaḥ bhāgaḥ khageśvara

original: bhāge dvitīye vijñeyastadrajo nātra saṃśayaḥ / mūle tamasi yaccokto rajobhāgastathaiva ca //
analyzed: bhāge dvitīye vijñeyaḥ tat rajaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ mūle tamasi yat ca uktaḥ rajaḥ bhāgaḥ tathā eva ca

original: tṛtīyabhāgo vijñeyo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / tathā mūle ca tamasi hyeko bhāgastamaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tṛtīya bhāgaḥ vijñeyaḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā tathā mūle ca tamasi hi ekaḥ bhāgaḥ tamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: evaṃ tribhāgo rajasaḥ ekāṃśastamasaḥ smṛtaḥ / tadāhurbrahmaṇo dehaṃ guṇavaiṣamyanāmakam //
analyzed: evam tri bhāgaḥ rajasaḥ eka aṃśaḥ tamasaḥ smṛtaḥ tat āhuḥ brahmaṇaḥ deham guṇa vaiṣamya nāmakam

original: garuḍa uvāca / mahattattvasya catvāro bhāgāsteṣu rajastrayaḥ / tamasastveka eveti tvayoktaṃ garuḍadhvaja //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca mahat tattvasya catvāraḥ bhāgāḥ teṣu rajaḥ trayaḥ tamasaḥ tu ekaḥ eva iti tvayā uktam garuḍadhvaja

original: rajobhāgātmako dehoḥ brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ / iti pratīyate brahmanvacanāttava mādhava //
analyzed: rajaḥ bhāga ātmakaḥ brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ iti pratīyate brahman vacanāt tava mādhava

original: śuddhasattvātmako deho brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ / evaṃ hi śrūyate kṛṣṇa saṃśayo metra bādhate //
analyzed: śuddha sattva ātmakaḥ dehaḥ brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ  evam hi śrūyate kṛṣṇa saṃśayaḥ mā itra bādhate

original: tamevaṃ saṃśayaṃ chindhi yaddhi tacchrotumarhati / śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / tribhāgabhūte rajasi tathā dvādaśadhāpi ca //
analyzed: tam evam saṃśayam chindhi yat hi tat śrotum arhati  śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca tri bhāga bhūte rajasi tathā dvādaśadhā api ca

original: rajasopekṣayā sattvaṃ daśāṃśādhikameva ca / praviṣṭamastīti khaga jñātavyaṃ tacchaṇu dvija //
analyzed: rajasā upekṣayā sattvam daśa aṃśa adhikam eva ca praviṣṭam asti iti khaga jñātavyam tat śaṇu dvija

original: tamasopekṣayā sattvaṃ daśāṃśādhikameva vai / praviṣṭamastīti khaga vaktavyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: tamasā upekṣayā sattvam daśa aṃśa adhikam eva vai praviṣṭam asti iti khaga vaktavyam na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: tamasopekṣayā tatra tama ekādaśaṃ smṛtam / ekāṃśastu rajo jñeyamevamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ / evaṃ ca militānbhāgānvakṣye śṛṇu mahāmate //
analyzed: tamasā upekṣayā tatra tamaḥ ekādaśam smṛtam eka aṃśaḥ tu rajaḥ jñeyam evam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ evam ca militān bhāgān vakṣye śṛṇu mahāmate

original: mahattattvasamutpattā upādānaṃ khageśvara / trayodaśāṃśā vijñeyā dvādaśāśaṃ rajaḥ smṛtam //
analyzed: mahat tattva samutpattā upādānam khageśvara trayodaśa aṃśāḥ vijñeyāḥ dvādaśa āśam rajaḥ smṛtam

original: ekāṃśastamaso jñeyastatra bhāgāñchṛṇu dvijā / ādau tu dvādaśāṃśeṣu bhāgānvakṣyāmi tacchṛṇu //
analyzed: eka aṃśaḥ tamasaḥ jñeyaḥ tatra bhāgān śṛṇu dvijāḥ ādau tu dvādaśa aṃśeṣu bhāgān vakṣyāmi tat śṛṇu

original: ekāṃśastamaso jñeyastaddaśāṃ śādhikaṃ rajaḥ / tacchatāṃśādhikaṃ sattvamevamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: eka aṃśaḥ tamasaḥ jñeyaḥ tad daśām śa adhikam rajaḥ tad śata aṃśa adhikam sattvam evam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: ekāṃśatamasi hyevaṃ vibhāgāñchṛṇu sattama / ekāṃśastu rajo jñeyastamo hyekā daśādhikam //
analyzed: eka aṃśa tamasi hi evam vibhāgān śṛṇu sattama eka aṃśaḥ tu rajaḥ jñeyaḥ tamaḥ hi ekā daśa adhikam

original: tamobhāgāstu vijñeyāstaddaśāṃśādhikaḥ smṛtaḥ / sattvabhāga iti jñeyo mahattattve khageśvara //
analyzed: tamaḥ bhāgāḥ tu vijñeyāḥ tad daśa aṃśa adhikaḥ smṛtaḥ sattva bhāgaḥ iti jñeyaḥ mahat tattve khageśvara

original: sattvāṃśo bahulo yasmācchuddhasattvaṃ caturmukhaḥ / utpattirmahataścoktā evaṃ ca vinatāsuta //
analyzed: sattva aṃśaḥ bahulaḥ yasmāt śuddhasattvam caturmukhaḥ utpattiḥ mahataḥ ca uktā evam ca vinatā suta

original: tajjñānānmokṣamāpnoti nānyathā tu kathañcana //
analyzed: tad jñānāt mokṣam āpnoti na anyathā tu kathañcana

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe kṛṣṇa garuḍasaṃvāde tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe guṇavaiṣamyabhedabrahmadehasvarūpaguṇasāmyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturtho
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe guṇavaiṣamyabhedabrahmadehasvarūpaguṇasāmyanirūpaṇam nāma caturthaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 5
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: etādṛśe mahattattve lakṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam / praviveśa mahābhāga kṣobhayāmāsa vai hariḥ //
analyzed: etādṛśe mahat tattve lakṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam praviveśa mahābhāga kṣobhayāmāsa vai hariḥ

original: ahantattvamabhūttasmājjñānadravyakriyātmakam / ahaṅkārasamutpattāvekāṃśastamasi smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: ahar tattvam abhūt tasmāt jñāna dravya kriyā ātmakam ahaṅkāra samutpattau eka aṃśaḥ tamasi smṛtaḥ

original: taddaśāṃśādhikarajastaddaśāṃśādhikaṃ prabho / sattvamityucyate sadbhirhyetadātmā tvahaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: tad daśa aṃśa adhika rajaḥ tad daśa aṃśa adhikam prabho sattvam iti ucyate sadbhiḥ hi etad ātmā tu aham smṛtam

original: ahantattvābhimānī tu ādau śeṣo babhūvaha / sahasrābdācca paścāttau jātau khagaharau dvija //
analyzed: ahar tattva abhimānī tu ādau śeṣaḥ babhūva ha sahasra abdāt ca paścāt tau jātau khaga harau dvija

original: ahantattve khaga hyeṣu praviṣṭo hariravyayaḥ / kṣobhayāmāsa bhagavāllaṅkṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam //
analyzed: ahar tattve khaga hi eṣu praviṣṭaḥ hariḥ avyayaḥ kṣobhayāmāsa bhagavān laṅkṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam

original: vaikārikastāmasaśca taijasaścetyahaṃ tridhā / tridhā babhūva rudropi yatasteṣāṃ niyāmakaḥ //
analyzed: vaikārikaḥ tāmasaḥ ca taijasaḥ ca iti aham tridhā tridhā babhūva rudraḥ api yatas teṣām niyāmakaḥ

original: vaikārikasthito rudro vaikārika iti smṛtaḥ / tāmase tu sthito rudrastāmaso hyabhidhīyate //
analyzed: vaikārika sthitaḥ rudraḥ vaikārikaḥ iti smṛtaḥ tāmase tu sthitaḥ rudraḥ tāmasaḥ hi abhidhīyate

original: taijase tu sthito rudro loke vai taijasaḥ smṛtaḥ / taijase tu hyahantattve lakṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam //
analyzed: taijase tu sthitaḥ rudraḥ loke vai taijasaḥ smṛtaḥ taijase tu hi ahar tattve lakṣmyā saha hariḥ svayam

original: viśitvā kṣobhayāmāsa tadāsau daśadhā tvabhūt / śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇameva ca //
analyzed: viśitvā kṣobhayāmāsa tadā asau daśadhā tu abhūt śrotram cakṣuḥ sparśanam ca rasanam ghrāṇam eva ca

original: vākpāṇipādaṃ pāyuśca upastheti daśa smṛtāḥ / vaikārike hyahantattve praviśya kṣobhayaddhariḥ //
analyzed: vāc pāṇi pādam pāyuḥ ca upasthā iti daśa smṛtāḥ vaikārike hi ahar tattve praviśya kṣobhayat hariḥ

original: mahattattvādimā adāvindriyāṇāṃ ca devatāḥ / ekādaśavidhā āsankrameṇa tu khageśvara //
analyzed: mahat tattva ādimāḥ adau indriyāṇām ca devatāḥ ekādaśavidhāḥ āsan krameṇa tu khageśvara

original: manobhimāni nī hyādau vāruṇī tvabhavattadā / anantaraṃ ca sauparṇī gaurojāpi tathaiva ca //
analyzed: nī hi ādau vāruṇī tu abhavat tadā anantaram ca sauparṇī gaurojā api tathā eva ca

original: śeṣādanantarāstāsāṃ daśavarṣādanaṃram / utpattiriti vijñeyaṃ krameṇa tu khageśvara //
analyzed: śeṣāt anantarāḥ tāsām utpattiḥ iti vijñeyam krameṇa tu khageśvara

original: manobhimānināvanyāvindrakāmau prajajñatuḥ / tārkṣya hyanantarau jñeyau muktau saṃsāra eva ca //
analyzed: manaḥ abhimāninau anyau indra kāmau prajajñatuḥ tārkṣya hi anantarau jñeyau muktau saṃsāre eva ca

original: tatastvagātmā hyabhavatsohaṃ kārika īritaḥ / tataḥ pāṇyātmakāścaiva jajñire pakṣisattama //
analyzed: tatas tvac ātmā hi abhavat saḥ ham kārikaḥ īritaḥ tatas pāṇi ātmakāḥ ca eva jajñire pakṣi sattama

original: śacī ratiścāniruddhastathā svāyaṃbhuvo manuḥ / bṛhaspatistathā dakṣa ete pāṇyātmakāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: śacī ratiḥ ca aniruddhaḥ tathā svāyaṃbhuvaḥ manuḥ bṛhaspatiḥ tathā dakṣaḥ ete pāṇi ātmakāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: dakṣasyānantaraṃ jajñe pravāho nāma cāṇḍaja / sa evoktaścātiṃvāho yāpayatyātmacoditaḥ //
analyzed: dakṣasya anantaram jajñe pravāhaḥ nāma ca aṇḍaja saḥ eva uktaḥ ca atiṃvāhaḥ yāpayati ātma coditaḥ

original: hastādanantaraṃ jñeyo na tu śacyādivatsmṛtaḥ / tatobhavanmahābhāga cakṣuridriyamātmanaḥ //
analyzed: hastāt anantaram jñeyaḥ na tu śacī ādi vat smṛtaḥ tatas bhavat mahābhāga cakṣuḥ idriyam ātmanaḥ

original: svāyaṃbhuvamanorbhāryā śatarūpā yamastathā / candrasūryau tu cattvāraścakṣurindriyamāninaḥ //
analyzed: svāyaṃbhuva manoḥ bhāryā śatarūpā yamaḥ tathā candra sūryau tu cattvāraḥ cakṣuḥ indriya māninaḥ

original: candraḥ śrotrābhimānīti tathā jñeyaḥ khageśvara / jihvendriyātmā varuṇaḥ sūryasyānantarobhavat //
analyzed: candraḥ śrotra abhimānī iti tathā jñeyaḥ khageśvara jihvā indriya ātmā varuṇaḥ sūryasya anantaraḥ bhavat

original: vāgindriyābhimāninyo hyabhavanvaruṇādanu / dakṣapatnī prasūtiśca bhṛguragnistarthava ca //
analyzed: vāc indriya abhimāninyaḥ hi abhavan varuṇāt anu dakṣa patnī prasūtiḥ ca bhṛguḥ agniḥ ca

original: tatra vaite mahātmāno vāgindriyaniyāmakāḥ / ye kravyādādayaścoktāstenantattvaniyāmakāḥ //
analyzed: tatra vā ete mahātmānaḥ vāc indriya niyāmakāḥ ye kravyāda ādayaḥ ca uktāḥ tenantattva niyāmakāḥ

original: sāmyatvācca tathaivoktirna tu tattvābhimānitaḥ / upasthamānino vīndra babhūvustadanantaram //
analyzed: sāmya tvāt ca tathā evā uktiḥ na tu tattva abhimānitaḥ  upastha māninaḥ vi indra babhūvuḥ tad anantaram

original: viśvāmitro vasiṣṭotrirmarīciḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ / pulastyoṅgirasaścaiva tathā vaivasvato manuḥ //
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ vasiṣṭha utriḥ marīciḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ pulastya uṅgirasaḥ ca eva tathā vaivasvataḥ manuḥ

original: manvādayonantasaṃkhyā upasthātmāna īritāḥ / pāyośca mānino vīndra jajñire tadanantaram //
analyzed: manu ādayaḥ ananta saṃkhyāḥ upastha ātmānaḥ īritāḥ pāyoḥ ca māninaḥ vīndra jajñire tad anantaram

original: sūryeṣu dvādaśasveko mitrastārā guroḥ priyā / koṇādhipo nirṛtiśca pravahapriyā //
analyzed: sūryeṣu dvādaśasu ekaḥ mitraḥ tārā guroḥ priyā koṇa adhipaḥ nirṛtiḥ ca pravaha priyā

original: cattvāra ete pakṣīndra vāyutattvābhimāninaḥ / ghrāṇābhimāninaḥ sarve jajñire dvijasattama //
analyzed: cattvāraḥ ete pakṣi indra vāyu tattva abhimāninaḥ ghrāṇa abhimāninaḥ sarve jajñire dvijasattama

original: viṣvavaseno vāyuputrau hyaśvinau gaṇapastathā / vittapaḥ sapta vasava ukto hyāgnistathāṣṭamaḥ //
analyzed: viṣvavasenaḥ vāyuputrau hi aśvinau gaṇapaḥ tathā vittapaḥ sapta vasavaḥ uktaḥ

original: satyānāṃ śṛṇu nāmāni droṇaḥ prāṇo dhruvastathā / arke doṣastathā vaskaḥ saptamastu vibhāvasuḥ //
analyzed: satyānām śṛṇu nāmāni droṇaḥ prāṇaḥ dhruvaḥ tathā arke doṣaḥ tathā vaskaḥ saptamaḥ tu vibhāvasuḥ

original: daśarudrāstathā jñeyā mūlarudro bhavaḥ smṛtaḥ / daśa rudrasya nāmāni śṛṇuṣva dvijasattama //
analyzed: daśa rudrāḥ tathā jñeyāḥ mūlarudraḥ bhavaḥ smṛtaḥ daśa rudrasya nāmāni śṛṇuṣva dvijasattama

original: raivanteyastathā bhīmo vāmadevo vṛṣākapiḥ / ajaikapādahirvudhnyo bahurūpo mahāniti //
analyzed: raivanteyaḥ tathā bhīmaḥ vāmadevaḥ vṛṣākapiḥ ajaikapād ahirvudhnyaḥ bahu rūpaḥ mahān iti

original: daśa rudrā iti proktāḥ ṣaḍādityāñchṛṇu dvija / urukramastathā śakro vivasvānvaruṇastathā //
analyzed: daśa rudrāḥ iti proktāḥ ṣaṭ ādityān śṛṇu dvija urukramaḥ tathā śakraḥ vivasvān varuṇaḥ tathā

original: parjanyotibāhureta uktāḥ pūrvaṃ dvijottama / parjanyavyatiriktāstu pañcaivoktā na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: parjanya utibāhuḥ ete uktāḥ pūrvam dvijottama parjanya vyatiriktāḥ tu pañca eva uktāḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: gaṅgāsamastu parjanya iti coktaḥ khageśvara / savitā hyaryamā dhātā pūṣā tvaṣṭā tathā bhagaḥ //
analyzed: gaṅgā samaḥ tu parjanyaḥ iti ca uktaḥ khageśvara savitā hi aryamā dhātā pūṣā tvaṣṭā tathā bhagaḥ

original: catvāriṃśattathā sapta mahataḥ parikīrtitāḥ / dvāvuktāviti vijñeyo pravahotivahastathā //
analyzed: catvāriṃśat tathā sapta mahataḥ parikīrtitāḥ dvau uktau iti pravahaḥ ūtivahaḥ tathā

original: tathā daśavidhā jñeyā viśvedevāḥ khageśvara / śṛṇu nāmāni teṣāṃ tu purūravārdravasaṃjñakau //
analyzed: tathā daśavidhāḥ jñeyāḥ viśvedevāḥ khageśvara śṛṇu nāmāni teṣām tu purūravā ārdrava saṃjñakau

original: dhūrilocanasaṃjñau dvau kratudakṣetisaṃjñakau / dvau satyavasusaṃjñau ca kāmakālakasaṃjñakau //
analyzed: dhūrilocana saṃjñau dvau kratu dakṣa iti saṃjñakau dvau satyavasu saṃjñau ca kāma kālaka saṃjñakau

original: evaṃ daśavidhā jñeyā viśvedevāḥ prakīrtitāḥ / tathā ṛbhugaṇaścoktastathā ca pitarastrayaḥ //
analyzed: evam daśavidhāḥ jñeyāḥ viśvedevāḥ prakīrtitāḥ tathā ṛbhu gaṇaḥ ca uktaḥ tathā ca pitaraḥ trayaḥ

original: dyāvā pṛthivyau vijñeyau ete ca ṣaḍaśītayaḥ / devāḥ prajajñire sarve nāsikadriyamāninaḥ //
analyzed: dyāvā pṛthivyau vijñeyau ete ca ṣaḍaśītayaḥ devāḥ prajajñire sarve nāsikadriya māninaḥ

original: ākāśasyābhimānī tu gaṇapaḥ sudāhṛtaḥ / ubhayatrābhi mānīti jñeyaṃ tattvārthavedibhiḥ //
analyzed: ākāśasya abhimānī tu gaṇapaḥ sudāhṛtaḥ ubhayatra abhi mānī iti jñeyam tattva artha vedibhiḥ

original: viṣvaksenaṃ vinā sarve jayādyā viṣṇupārṣadāḥ / abhavansamahīnāśca viṣvaksenādanantaram //
analyzed: viṣvaksenam vinā sarve jaya ādyāḥ viṣṇu pārṣadāḥ abhavan sama hīnāḥ ca viṣvaksenāt anantaram

original: etepi nāsikāyāśca avāntaraniyāmakāḥ / ataste tattvamānibhyo hyavarāste prakīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: ete api nāsikāyāḥ ca avāntara niyāmakāḥ atas te tattva mānibhyaḥ hi avarāḥ te prakīrtitāḥ

original: sparśatattvābhimānī tu apānaścetyudāhṛtaḥ / rūpābhimānī saṃjajñe vyāno nāma mahānprabho //
analyzed: sparśa tattva abhimānī tu apānaḥ ca iti udāhṛtaḥ rūpa abhimānī saṃjajñe vyānaḥ nāma mahān prabho

original: rasātmaka udānaśca samāno gandhanāmakaḥ / apāṃ nāthāśca catvāro marutaḥ parikīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: rasa ātmakaḥ udānaḥ ca samānaḥ gandha nāmakaḥ apām nāthāḥ ca catvāraḥ marutaḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: jayādyanantarānvakṣye samutpannānkhageśvara / pradhānāgre prathamajaḥ pāvakaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: jaya ādi anantarān vakṣye samutpannān khageśvara pradhāna agre prathama jaḥ pāvakaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ

original: bhṛgormaharṣeḥ putraśca cyavanaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ / bṛhaspateśca putrastu utathyaḥ parikīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: bhṛgoḥ mahā ṛṣeḥ putraḥ ca cyavanaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ bṛhaspateḥ ca putraḥ tu utathyaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: raivataścākṣuṣaścaiva tathā svārociṣaḥ smṛtaḥ / uttamo brahmasāvarṇī rudrasāvarṇireva ca //
analyzed: raivataḥ cākṣuṣaḥ ca eva tathā svārociṣaḥ smṛtaḥ uttamaḥ brahmasāvarṇī rudrasāvarṇiḥ eva ca

original: devasāvarṇisāvarṇirindrasāvarṇirevaca / tathaiva dakṣasāvarṇirdharmabhāvarṇireva ca //
analyzed: devasāvarṇi sāvarṇiḥ indrasāvarṇiḥ eva ca tathā eva dakṣasāvarṇiḥ dharmabhāvarṇiḥ eva ca

original: ekādaśavidhā hyevaṃ manavaḥ parikīrtitāḥ / pitṝṇāṃ saptakaṃ caivetyādyāḥ saṃjajñire khaga //
analyzed: ekādaśavidhāḥ hi evam manavaḥ parikīrtitāḥ pitṝṇām saptakam ca eva ityādyāḥ saṃjajñire khaga

original: tadanantaramutpannāstebhyo nīcāḥ śṛṇu dvija / varuṇasya patnī gaṅgā parjanyākhyo vibhāvasuḥ //
analyzed: tad anantaram utpannāḥ tebhyaḥ nīcāḥ śṛṇu dvija varuṇasya patnī gaṅgā parjanya ākhyaḥ vibhāvasuḥ

original: yamabhāryā śyāmalā tu hyaniruddhapriyā virāṭ / brahmāṇḍamāninī saiva hyuṣānāmnā suśabditā //
analyzed: yama bhāryā śyāmalā tu hi aniruddha priyā virāj brahmāṇḍa māninī sā eva hi uṣā nāmnā su śabditā

original: rohiṇī candrabhāryoktā sūryabhāryā tu saṃjñakā / etā gaṅgādiṣaṭūsaṃkhyā jajñire vinatāsuta //
analyzed: rohiṇī candra bhāryā uktā sūrya bhāryā tu saṃjñakā etāḥ jajñire vinatā suta

original: gaṅgādyanantaraṃ jajñe svāhā vai mantradevatā / svāhānāmāgnibhāryoktā gaṅgādibhyodhamā śrutā //
analyzed: gaṅgā ādi anantaram jajñe svāhā vai mantra devatā svāhā nāmā agni bhāryā uktā gaṅgā ādibhyaḥ adhamā śrutā

original: svāhānantarajo jñeyo jñānātmā budhanāmakaḥ / budhastu candraputro yaḥ svāhāyā adhamaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: svāhā anantara jaḥ jñeyaḥ jñānātmā budha nāmakaḥ budhaḥ tu candra putraḥ yaḥ svāhāyāḥ adhamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: uṣā nāma tathā jajñe budhasyānantaraṃ khaga / uṣānāmā bhimānī tu hyaśvibhāryā prakīrtitā //
analyzed: uṣāḥ nāma tathā jajñe budhasya anantaram khaga uṣā nāmā abhimānī tu hi aśvi bhāryā prakīrtitā

original: budhādhamā sā vijñeyā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / tataḥ śanaiścaro jajñe pṛthivyātmeti viśrutaḥ //
analyzed: budha adhamā sā vijñeyā na atra kāryā vicāraṇā tatas śanaiścaraḥ jajñe pṛthivyātmā iti viśrutaḥ

original: uṣādhamastu vijñeyastato jajñetha puṣkaraḥ / karmābhimānī vijñeyaḥ śanaiścara itīritaḥ //
analyzed: uṣādhamaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ tatas puṣkaraḥ karma abhimānī vijñeyaḥ śanaiścaraḥ iti īritaḥ

original: tattvābhimānino devānevaṃ sṛṣṭvā hariḥ svayam / praviveśa sa deveśastattveṣu ramayā sahā //
analyzed: tattva abhimāninaḥ devān evam sṛṣṭvā hariḥ svayam praviveśa sa deveśaḥ tattveṣu ramayā sahā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe tattvābhimāni devatotpattitattāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe tattvābhimāni devatotpattitattāratamyanirūpaṇam nāma pañcamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 6
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / tatratatra sthitāstattve tattattattvābhimāninaḥ / svesve hyāyatane svāṅge tadarthaṃ ca khageśvara //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca tatra tatra sthitāḥ tattve tad tad tattva abhimāninaḥ sve sve hi āyatane sva aṅge tad artham ca khageśvara

original: hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ samyak stotuṃ samupacakrire / cintyācintyaguṇe viṣṇau viruddhāḥ saṃti sadguṇāḥ //
analyzed: harim nārāyaṇam samyak stotum samupacakrire cintya acintya guṇe viṣṇau viruddhāḥ saṃti sat guṇāḥ

original: ekaikaśohyanantāste tadguṇānāṃ stutau mama / kva śaktiriti buddhyā sā vrīḍayāvanatābravīt //
analyzed: ekaikaśas hi anantāḥ te tad guṇānām stutau mama kva śaktiḥ iti buddhyā sā vrīḍayā avanatā bravīt

original: śrīruvāca / natāsmi te nātha padāravindaṃ na veda cānyaccaraṇādṛte tava / tvayīśvare saṃti guṇāḥ śrutāstu tathāśrutāḥ saṃti ca devadeva //
analyzed: śrīḥ uvāca natā asmi te nātha pada aravindam na veda ca anyat caraṇāt ṛte tava  tvayi īśvare saṃti guṇāḥ śrutāḥ tu tathā śrutāḥ saṃti ca devadeva

original: samyak sṛṣṭaṃ svāyatanaṃ ca datvā govinda dāmodara māṃ ca pāhi / stutyā madīyaśca sukhakapūrṇaḥ priyo jano nāsti tathā tvadanyaḥ //
analyzed: samyak sṛṣṭam sva āyatanam ca da tvā govinda dāmodara mām ca pāhi stutyā madīyaḥ ca sukhaka pūrṇaḥ priyaḥ janaḥ nā asti tathā tvad anyaḥ

original: brahmovāca / lakṣmīpate sarvajagannivāsa tvaṃ jñānasiṃdhuḥ kva ca viśvamūrte / ahaṃ kva cājñastava vai śaktirasti hyajñohaṃ vai hyalpaśaktirmamāsti //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca lakṣmīpate sarva jagat nivāsa tvam jñāna siṃdhuḥ kva ca viśvamūrte aham kva ca ajñaḥ tava vai śaktiḥ asti hi ajñaḥ ham vai hi alpa śaktiḥ mama asti

original: lakṣmyāścaiva jñānavairāgyabhakti hyatyalpamaddhā mayi sarvadaiva / tava prasādādasti jagannivāsa tatra svāmitvaṃ nāsti viṣṇo sadaiva //
analyzed: lakṣmyāḥ ca eva jñāna vairāgya bhakti hi ati alpam addhā mayi sarvadā eva tava prasādāt asti jagannivāsa tatra svāmi tvam na asti viṣṇo sadā eva

original: na dehi tvaṃ sarvadā me murāre ahaṃmamatvaṃ prāpyametāvadeva / gamyajñānaṃ yogyaguṇe rameśa pramādo vā nāstināstyadya nitya //
analyzed: na dehi tvam sarvadā me murāre ahaṃmamatvam prāpyam etāvat eva gamya jñānam yogya guṇe rama īśa pramādaḥ vā na asti nā asti adya nitya

original: tanme hṛṣīkāṇi patantyasatpathe padāravinde tu patantu sarvadā / lakṣmyā hyahaṃ koṭiguṇena hīnaḥ stotuṃ sāmarthyaṃ nāsti me suprasīda //
analyzed: tat me hṛṣīkāṇi patanti asat pathe pada aravinde tu patantu sarvadā lakṣmyā hi aham koṭi guṇena hīnaḥ stotum sāmarthyam nā asti me su prasīda

original: iti stavaṃ viṣṇuguṇānvidhātā tārkṣyasthitaḥ prāñjalistasya cāgre / tadā vāyurdevadevo mahātmā dṛṣṭvā viṣṇu bhaktisaṃvardhitātmā //
analyzed: iti stavam viṣṇu guṇān vidhātā tārkṣya sthitaḥ prāñjaliḥ tasya ca agre tadā vāyuḥ devadevaḥ mahātmā dṛṣṭvā viṣṇu bhakti saṃvardhita ātmā

original: snahottharāvaḥ skhalitākṣarastaṃ muñcankaṇānprāñjalirābabhāṣe / vāyuruvāca / ete hi devāstava bhṛtyabhūtāḥ padāravindaṃ paramaṃ sudurlabham //
analyzed: snaha uttha rāvaḥ skhalita akṣaraḥ tam muñcan kaṇān prāñjaliḥ ābabhāṣe  vāyuḥ uvāca ete hi devāḥ tava bhṛtya bhūtāḥ pada aravindam paramam su durlabham

original: caturvidhānpuruṣārthānrameśa saṃprārthaye tacca sadāpi deva / dṛṣṭvā hareḥ saiva māyaiva tāvatsukāraṇaṃ kiñcidanyanna cāsti //
analyzed: caturvidhān puruṣa arthān rama īśa saṃprārthaye tat ca sadā api deva dṛṣṭvā hareḥ sā eva māyā eva tāvat su kāraṇam kiñcid anyat na ca asti

original: ato nāhaṃ pradayopi bhūman bhavatpadāṃbhojaniṣavaṇotsukaḥ / lokasya kṛṣṇādvimukhasya karmaṇā apuṇyaśīlasya suduḥ khitasya //
analyzed: atas na aham bhūman bhavat pada aṃbhoja niṣavaṇa utsukaḥ lokasya kṛṣṇāt vimukhasya karmaṇā apuṇya śīlasya su duḥ khitasya

original: anugrahārthaṃ ca tavāvatāro nānyaśca kiñcitpuruṣārthastaveśa / gobhūsurāṇāṃ ca mahīruhāṇāṃ tathā surāṇāṃ pravarāvatāraiḥ //
analyzed: anugraha artham ca tava avatāraḥ na anyaḥ ca kiñcid puruṣa arthaḥ tava īśa go bhū surāṇām ca mahīruhāṇām tathā surāṇām pravara avatāraiḥ

original: kṣemopakārāṇi ca vāsudeva krīḍanvidhatte na ca kiñcidanyat / mano na tṛpyatyapi śaṃsatāṃ naḥ sukarmamauleścaritāmṛtāni //
analyzed: kṣema upakārāṇi ca vāsudeva krīḍan vidhatte na ca kiñcid anyat manaḥ na tṛpyati api śaṃsatām naḥ sukarma mauleḥ carita amṛtāni

original: acchinnabhaktasya hi me mukunda sadā bhaktiṃ dehi pādāravinde / sadā tadevāstu na kiñcidanyadyatra tvamāsīḥ puruṣe devadeva //
analyzed: acchinna bhaktasya hi me mukunda sadā bhaktim dehi pāda aravinde sadā tat eva astu na kiñcid anyat yatra tvam āsīḥ puruṣe devadeva

original: ahaṃ ca tatrāsmi tava prasādādyatrāsmyahaṃ tatra bhavānmahāprabho / vyaṃsirmameyaṃ ca śarīramadhye caturmukhaścaiva na caitatadanyaiḥ //
analyzed: aham ca tatra asmi tava prasādāt yatra asmi aham tatra bhavān mahā prabho vyaṃsiḥ mama iyam ca śarīra madhye catur mukhaḥ ca eva na ca etat tad anyaiḥ

original: madīyanidrā tava vandanaṃ prabho madīyayāmācaraṇaṃ pradakṣiṇam / madīyavyākhyāharaṇaṃ stutiḥ syādevaṃ viditvā ca samarpayāmi //
analyzed: madīya nidrā tava vandanam prabho madīyayāma ācaraṇam pradakṣiṇam madīya vyākhyā haraṇam stutiḥ syāt evam viditvā ca samarpayāmi

original: madbrṛddhiyogyaṃ ca padārthajātaṃ dṛṣṭvā hareḥ pratimā eva tacca / itthaṃ matvāhaṃ sarvadā devadeva tatrasthitānharirūpān bhajiṣye //
analyzed: mad brṛddhi yogyam ca padārtha jātam dṛṣṭvā hareḥ pratimāḥ eva tat ca ittham matvā aham sarvadā devadeva tatra sthitān hari rūpān bhajiṣye

original: yaccandanaṃ yattu puṣpaṃ ca dhūpaṃ vastraṃ ca yadbhakṣyabhojyādikaṃ ca / etatsarvaṃ viṣṇuprītyarthamevetyetadvrataṃ sarvadā vai kariṣye //
analyzed: yat candanam yat tu puṣpam ca dhūpam vastram ca yat bhakṣya bhojya ādikam ca etat sarvam viṣṇu prīti artham eva iti etat vratam sarvadā vai kariṣye

original: avaiṣṇavāndūṣayiṣye sadāhaṃ sadvaiṣṇavānpā (llāṃ)
analyzed: avaiṣṇavān dūṣayiṣye sadā aham sat vaiṣṇavān pā llāṃ

original: layiṣye murāre / viṣṇudruhāṃ chedayiṣye ca jihvāṃ tacchṛṇvatāṃ pūrayiṣye trapūlkāḥ //
analyzed: layiṣye murāre viṣṇu druhām chedayiṣye ca jihvām tad śṛṇvatām pūrayiṣye trapūlkāḥ

original: etādṛśī śaktirmamāsti deva tava prasādādbra linopi viṣṇo / athāpi nāhaṃ stavane samarthaḥ lakṣmyā hyahaṃ koṭiguṇairvihīnaḥ //
analyzed: etādṛśī śaktiḥ mama asti deva tava prasādāt viṣṇo atha api na aham stavane samarthaḥ lakṣmyā hi aham koṭi guṇaiḥ vihīnaḥ

original: etatstotraṃ hyarthayeccaiva yā naḥ tatra prītirhyakṣayā me sadā syāt / stotraṃ hyetatpāṭhayantīha loke te vaiṣṇavāste ca haripriyāśca //
analyzed: etat stotram hi arthayet ca eva yā naḥ tatra prītiḥ hi akṣayā me sadā syāt stotram hi etat pāṭhayanti iha loke te vaiṣṇavāḥ te ca hari priyāḥ ca

original: kurvanti ye paṭhanaṃ nityameva samarpayiṣyati sadā harau ca / teṣāṃ hariḥ prīyate keśavolaṃ harau prasanne kimalabhyamasti //
analyzed: kurvanti ye paṭhanam nityam eva samarpayiṣyati sadā harau ca teṣām hariḥ prīyate harau prasanne kim alabhyam asti

original: evaṃ stutvā valadevo mahātmā tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ prāñjaliragrato hareḥ / sarasvatyuvāca / ko vā rasajño bhagavan murāre hare guṇastavanātkīrtanādvā //
analyzed: evam stutvā valadevaḥ mahātmā tūṣṇīm sthitaḥ prāñjaliḥ agratas hareḥ sarasvatī uvāca  kaḥ vā rasajñaḥ bhagavat murāre hare guṇa stavanāt kīrtanāt vā

original: alaṃbuddhiṃ prāpnuyāddevadeva brahmādibhiḥ sarvadā stūyamāna / yaḥ karṇanāḍīṃ puruṣasya yāto bhavapradāṃ deharatiṃ chinatti //
analyzed: alaṃbuddhim prāpnuyāt devadeva brahma ādibhiḥ sarvadā stūyamāna yaḥ karṇa nāḍīm puruṣasya yā atas bhava pradām deha ratim chinatti

original: na kevalaṃ deharatiṃ chinattyasadgṛhakṣetrabhāryāsuteṣu nityam / paśvādirūpeṣu dhanādikeṣu anarghyaratneṣu priyaṃ chinātti //
analyzed: na kevalam deha ratim chinatti asat gṛha kṣetra bhāryā suteṣu nityam paśu ādi rūpeṣu dhana ādikeṣu anarghya ratneṣu priyam

original: anaṃ tavedapratipāditopi lakṣmīrna vai veda tava svarūpam / caturmukho naiva veda na vāyurasau na vettīti kimatra citram //
analyzed: tava id apratipāditaḥ api lakṣmīḥ na vai veda tava svarūpam caturmukhaḥ nā eva veda na vāyuḥ asau na vetti iti kim atra citram

original: etādṛśasya stavane kvāsti śaktirmama prabho brahmavāyvoḥ sakāśāt / śatairguṇaiḥ sarvadā nyūnatāsti ato hare dayayā māṃ ca pāhi //
analyzed: etādṛśasya stavane kva asti śaktiḥ mama prabho brahma vāyvoḥ sakāśāt śataiḥ guṇaiḥ sarvadā nyūna tā asti atas hare dayayā mām ca pāhi

original: evaṃ stutvā hariṃ sā tu tūṣṇīmāsa khagaśvara / bhāratī tu tadā stotuṃ hariṃ samupacakrame //
analyzed: evam stutvā harim sā tu tūṣṇīm āsa khagaśvara bhāratī tu tadā stotum harim samupacakrame

original: bhāratyuvāca / brahmeśa lakṣmīśa hare murāre guṇāṃstava śraddadhānasya nityam / tathā stuvantosya vivardhamānāṃ matiṃ ca nityaṃ viṣayeṣvasatsu //
analyzed: bhāratī uvāca brahma īśa lakṣmīśa hare murāre guṇān tava śraddadhānasya nityam tathā stuvantaḥ asya vivardhamānām matim ca nityam viṣayeṣu asatsu

original: kurvanti vairāgyamamutra loke tataḥ paraṃ bhaktidṛḍhāṃ tathaiva / tataḥ paraṃ caiva hareḥ prasannatāṃ kurvanti nityaṃ tava devadeva //
analyzed: kurvanti vairāgyam amutra loke tatas param bhakti dṛḍhām tathā eva tatas param ca eva hareḥ prasanna tām kurvanti nityam tava devadeva

original: tenāparokṣaṃ ca bhavecca tasya ato guṇānāṃ stavane ca me ratiḥ / sā tu prajātā puruṣasya nityaṃ saṃsāraduḥ khaṃ tu tadācchinatti //
analyzed: tena aparokṣam ca bhavet ca tasya atas guṇānām stavane ca me ratiḥ sā tu prajātā puruṣasya nityam saṃsāra duḥ kham tu tat ācchinatti

original: vicchinnaduḥ khasya tadādhikāriṇa ānandarūpākhyaphalaṃ dadāti / harerguṇānastuvatāṃ ca pāpaṃ teṣāṃ hi puṇyaṃ ca tathā kṣiṇoti //
analyzed: vicchinna duḥ khasya tadā adhikāriṇaḥ ānanda rūpa ākhya phalam dadāti hareḥ guṇān astuvatām ca pāpam teṣām hi puṇyam ca tathā kṣiṇoti

original: evaṃ viditvā paramo gururmama vāyurdayālurmama vallabhaśca / harerguṇānsarvaguṇaprasārānmamaiva yogyānsukhamukhyabhūtān //
analyzed: evam viditvā paramaḥ guruḥ mama vāyuḥ dayāluḥ mama vallabhaḥ ca hareḥ guṇān sarva guṇa prasārān mama eva yogyān sukha mukhya bhūtān

original: uddhṛtya puṇyebhya ivārtabandhuḥ śivaśca no druhyati puṇyakīrtim / tava prasādācca śriyaḥ prasādādvāyoḥ prasādācca mamāsti nityam //
analyzed: uddhṛtya puṇyebhyaḥ iva ārta bandhuḥ śivaḥ ca naḥ druhyati puṇya kīrtim tava prasādāt ca śriyaḥ prasādāt vāyoḥ prasādāt ca mama asti nityam

original: yadyatkarotyeva sadaiva vāyustattatkarotyeva sadaiva nityam / vāyorvirodhaṃ na karoti devaḥ sa tadvirodhaṃ ca karoti nityam //
analyzed: yat yat karoti eva sadā eva vāyuḥ tat tat karoti eva sadā eva nityam vāyoḥ virodham na karoti devaḥ sa tad virodham ca karoti nityam

original: harervirodhaṃ na karoti vāyurvāyorvirodhaṃ na karoti viṣṇuḥ / vāyoḥ prasādānmamanāsti kiñcidatānabhāvaśca tava prasādāt //
analyzed: hareḥ virodham na karoti vāyuḥ vāyoḥ virodham na karoti viṣṇuḥ vāyoḥ prasādāt mamanā asti kiñcid atāna bhāvaḥ ca tava prasādāt

original: yathaiva mūlaṃ ca tathāvatāre duḥ khādikaṃ nāsti samīraṇasya / vāyustathānye ca ubhau mukundastathāvatāreṣu na duḥ kharūpau //
analyzed: yathā eva mūlam ca tathā avatāre duḥ kha ādikam na asti samīraṇasya vāyuḥ tathā anye ca ubhau mukundaḥ tathā avatāreṣu na duḥ kha rūpau

original: aśaktavaddṛśyate vāyudevaḥ yugānusārāṃllokadharmāṃstu rakṣan / narāvatāre tatra deve murāre hyaśaktatā neti vicaṃ tanīyam //
analyzed: aśakta vat dṛśyate vāyudevaḥ yuga anusārān loka dharmān tu rakṣan nara avatāre tatra deve murāre hi aśakta tā na iti

original: avatārarūpe yamaduḥ khādikaṃ ca na cintanīyaṃ jñānibhirdevadeva / ahaṃ kadācitsukhanāśapradeśe daityāṃstathā mārayituṃ gatosmi //
analyzed: avatāra rūpe yama duḥkha ādikam ca na cintanīyam jñānibhiḥ devadeva aham kadācid sukha nāśa pradeśe daityān tathā mārayitum gataḥ asmi

original: naitāvatā mama vāyośca nityaṃ duḥ khātanaṃ naiva saṃcitanīyam / etādṛśohaṃ stavanenu kāsti śaktirguṇānāṃ madhusūdana prabho / vāyoḥ sakāśācca guṇena hīnā saṃsārarūpe muktarūpe ca deva //
analyzed: na etāvatā mama vāyoḥ ca nityam duḥ khātanam na eva saṃcitanīyam etādṛśā uham kā asti śaktiḥ guṇānām madhusūdana prabho vāyoḥ sakāśāt ca guṇena hīnā saṃsāra rūpe mukta rūpe ca deva

original: evaṃ stutvā bhāratī tu tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara / tadanantarajaḥ śeṣaḥ prāñjaliḥ prāha keśavam //
analyzed: evam stutvā bhāratī tu tūṣṇīm āsa khageśvara tad anantara jaḥ śeṣaḥ prāñjaliḥ prāha keśavam

original: śeṣa uvāca / nāhaṃ ca jāne tava pādamūlaṃ rudro na vetti garuḍo na veda / ahaṃ vāṇyāḥ śataguṇāṃśahīno dattvā hyāyatanaṃ pāhi māṃ vāsudeva //
analyzed: śeṣaḥ uvāca na aham ca jāne tava pāda mūlam rudraḥ na vetti garuḍaḥ na veda  aham vāṇyāḥ śataguṇa aṃśa hīnaḥ dattvā hi āyatanam pāhi mām vāsudeva

original: evaṃ stutvā saśeṣastu tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara / tadanantarajo vīśaḥ stotuṃ samupacakrame //
analyzed: evam stutvā sa śeṣaḥ tu tūṣṇīm āsa khageśvara tad anantara jaḥ vīśaḥ stotum samupacakrame

original: garuḍa uvāca / tava padoḥ stutiṃ kiṃ karomyahaṃ mama padāṃbuje hyarpitaṃ manaḥ / kathamahaṃ mukhe pakṣiyonijaḥ kathamevaṅguṇā nīḍituṃ kṣamaḥ //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca tava padoḥ stutim kim karomi aham mama pada aṃbuje hi arpitam manaḥ katham aham mukhe pakṣi yoni jaḥ katham evam guṇāḥ nīḍitum kṣamaḥ

original: evaṃ stutvā tu garuḍastūṣṇīmāsa nayānvitaḥ / tadanantarajo rudrastotuṃ samupacakrame //
analyzed: evam stutvā tu garuḍaḥ tūṣṇīm āsa naya anvitaḥ tad anantara jaḥ rudraḥ stotum samupacakrame

original: rudra uvāca / yā vai taveśa bhagavanna vidāma bhūman bhaktirmamāstu śivapādasarojamūle / channāpi sā nanu sadā na mamāsti deva tenādruhaṃ tava viruddhamataḥ karomi //
analyzed: rudraḥ uvāca yāḥ vai tava īśa bhagavan na vidāma bhūman bhaktiḥ mama astu śiva pāda saroja mūle  channā api sā nanu sadā na mama asti deva tena adruham tava viruddham atas karomi

original: sarvānna buddhisahitasya hare murāre kā śaktirasti vacane mama mūḍhabuddheḥ / vāṇyā sadā śataguṇena vihīnamenaṃ māṃ pāhi ceśa mama cāyatanaṃ ca dattvā //
analyzed: sarvān na buddhi sahitasya hare murāre kā śaktiḥ asti vacane mama mūḍha buddheḥ  vāṇyā sadā śataguṇena vihīnam enam mām pāhi ca īśa mama ca āyatanam ca dattvā

original: evaṃ stutvā sa rudrastu tūṣṇīmāsa dvijottamaḥ / śeṣānantarajā devī vāruṇī vākyamabravīt //
analyzed: evam stutvā sa rudraḥ tu tūṣṇīm āsa dvijottamaḥ śeṣa anantara jā devī vāruṇī vākyam abravīt

original: vāruṇyuvāca / lakṣmīpate brahmapate manoḥ pategiraḥ pate rudrapate nṛṇāṃ pate / guṇāṃstava stotumahaṃ samarthā na pārvatī nāpi suparṇapatnī //
analyzed: vāruṇī uvāca lakṣmīpate brahma pate manoḥ pate giraḥ pate rudra pate nṛṇām pate guṇān tava stotum aham samarthā na pārvatī nā api suparṇa patnī

original: śeṣādahaṃ daśaguṇairvihīnā māṃ pāhi nityaṃ jagatāmadhīśa //
analyzed: śeṣāt aham daśaguṇaiḥ vihīnā mām pāhi nityam jagatām adhīśa

original: evaṃ stutvā vāruṇī tu tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara / tadanantarajā brāhmī sauparṇī hyupacakrame //
analyzed: evam stutvā vāruṇī tu tūṣṇīm āsa khageśvara tad anantara jā brāhmī sauparṇī hi upacakrame

original: sauparṇyuvāca / stotuṃ guṇāṃstava hare jagadī śavācā śrotuṃ hare tava kathāṃ śravaṇe na śaktiḥ / yastattvanuṃ smarati deva tava svarūpaṃ ko vai nu veda bhuvi taṃ bhagavatpadārtham //
analyzed: sauparṇī uvāca stotum guṇān tava hare jagadī śa vācā śrotum hare tava kathām śravaṇe na śaktiḥ yaḥ tat tvanum smarati deva tava sva rūpam kaḥ vai nu veda bhuvi tam bhagavat padārtham

original: ato guṇastavane nāsti śaktirvīndrāhadaṃ daśaguṇairavarā ca nityam //
analyzed: atas guṇa stavane nā asti śaktiḥ vi indra ahadam daśaguṇaiḥ avarā ca nityam

original: evaṃ stutvā tu sauparṇī tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara / rudrānantarajā stotuṃ girijā tūpacakrame //
analyzed: evam stutvā tu sauparṇī tūṣṇīm āsa khageśvara rudra anantara jā stotum girijā tu upacakrame

original: pārvatyuvāca govinda nārāyaṇa vāsudeva tvayā hi me kiñcidapi prayojanam / nāstyeva svāminna ca nāma vācā saubhāgyarūpaḥ sarvadā eka eva //
analyzed: pārvatī uvāca govinda nārāyaṇa vāsudeva tvayā hi me kiñcid api prayojanam na asti eva svāmin na ca nāma vācā saubhāgya rūpaḥ sarvadā ekaḥ eva

original: nārāyaṇeti tava nāma ca ekameva vairāgyabhaktivibhave paramaṃ samarthām / asaṃkhyabrahmādikahatyanāśāne gurvaṅganākoṭivināśane ca //
analyzed: nārāyaṇa iti tava nāma ca ekam eva vairāgya bhakti vibhave paramam samarthām asaṃkhya brahma ādika hatya nāśāne guru aṅganā koṭi vināśane ca

original: nāmādhikāriṇī cāhaṃ guṇānāṃ ca mahāprabho / stavane nāsti me śaktī rudrāddaśaguṇairaham //
analyzed: nāma adhikāriṇī ca aham guṇānām ca mahā prabho stavane nā asti me śaktī rudrāt daśaguṇaiḥ aham

original: avarā ca sadāsmyeva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / evaṃ stutvā sā girijā stūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara //
analyzed: avarā ca sadā asmi eva na atra kāryā vicāraṇā evam stutvā sā girijā stūṣṇīm āsa khageśvara

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttara- tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe tattvābhimānitattaddevatākṛtaviṣṇustutitattaddevatātāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde uttara tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe

original: nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 7
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / pārvatyānantarotpanna indro vacanamabravīt / indra uvāca / tava svarūpaṃ hṛdi saṃvijānan samutsukaḥ syātstavane yastu mūḍhaḥ / ajānataḥ stavanaṃ devadeva tadevāhurhelanaṃ cakrapāṇe //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca pārvatyā anantara utpannaḥ indraḥ vacanam abravīt indraḥ uvāca tava sva rūpam hṛdi saṃvijānan samutsukaḥ syāt stavane yaḥ tu mūḍhaḥ a jānataḥ stavanam devadeva tat eva āhuḥ helanam cakrapāṇe

original: tathāpi tadvai tava nāma pūrvaṃ bhavettadā puṇyakaraṃ bhavediti / rudrādi kānāṃ stavane nāsti śaktistadā vaktavyaṃ mama nāstīti kiṃ vā //
analyzed: tathā api tat vai tava nāma pūrvam bhavet tadā puṇya karam bhavet iti rudra ādi kānām stavane na asti śaktiḥ tadā vaktavyam mama nā asti iti kim vā

original: guṇāṃśato daśabhī rudrato vai sadā nyūno matsamaḥ kāmadevaḥ / jñāne bale samatā sarvadāsti tathāḥ kāmaḥ kiṃ ca dūtaḥ sadaiva //
analyzed: guṇa aṃśataḥ daśabhiḥ rudrataḥ vai sadā nyūnaḥ mad samaḥ kāmadevaḥ jñāne bale sama tā sarvadā asti kāmaḥ kim ca dūtaḥ sadā eva

original: evaṃ stutvā devadevo hariṃ ca tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ prāñjalirnamrabhūrdhā / tadanantarajo brahmā ahaṅkārika ūcivān //
analyzed: evam stutvā devadevaḥ harim ca tūṣṇīm sthitaḥ prāñjaliḥ namra bhūrdhā tad anantara jaḥ brahmā ahaṅkārikaḥ ūcivān

original: ahaṅkārika uvāca / namaste gaṇapūrṇāya namaste jñānamūrtaye / namo 'jñānavidūrāya brahmaṇenaṃ tamūrtaye //
analyzed: ahaṅkārikaḥ uvāca namaḥ te gaṇa pūrṇāya namaḥ te jñāna mūrtaye namaḥ jñāna vidūrāya

original: indrādahaṃ daśaguṇaiḥ sarvadā nyūna ukto na jani tvāṃ sarvadā hyaprameya / tathāpi māṃ pāhi jagadguro tvaṃ dattvā divyaṃ hyāyatanaṃ ca viṣṇo //
analyzed: indrāt aham daśaguṇaiḥ sarvadā nyūnaḥ uktaḥ na tvām sarvadā hi aprameya tathā api mām pāhi jagadguro tvam dattvā divyam hi āyatanam ca viṣṇo

original: āhaṅkārika evaṃ tu stutvā tūṣṇīṃbabhūva ha / tadanantarajā stotuṃ śacī vacanamabravīt //
analyzed: āhaṅkārikaḥ evam tu stutvā tūṣṇīṃbabhūva ha tad anantara jā stotum śacī vacanam abravīt

original: śacyuvāca / saṃcintayāmi aniśaṃ tava pādapadmaṃ vajrāṅkuśadhvajasaroruhalāñchanāḍhyam / vāgīśvarairapi sadā manasāpi dhartuṃ no śakyamīśa tava pādarajaḥ smarāmi //
analyzed: śacī uvāca saṃcintayāmi aniśam tava pāda padmam vajra aṅkuśa dhvaja saroruha lāñchana āḍhyam vāc īśvaraiḥ api sadā manasā api dhartum no śakyam īśa tava pāda rajaḥ smarāmi

original: āhaṅkārikaprāṇācca guṇaiśca daśabhiḥ sadā / nyūnabhūtāṃ ca māṃ pāhi kṛpālo bhaktavatsala //
analyzed: āhaṅkārika prāṇāt ca guṇaiḥ ca daśabhiḥ sadā nyūna bhūtām ca mām pāhi kṛpālaḥ bhakta vatsala

original: evaṃ stutvā śacī devī tūṣṇīṃ bhagavatī hyabhūt / tadanantarajā stotuṃ ratiḥ samupacakrame //
analyzed: evam stutvā śacī devī tūṣṇīm bhagavatī hi abhūt tad anantara jā stotum ratiḥ samupacakrame

original: ratiruvāca / saṃcintayāmi nṛharervadanāravindaṃ bhṛtyānukaṃpitadhiyā hi gṛhītamūrtim / yacchrīniketamajarudraramādikaiśca saṃlālitaṃ kuṭilaṅkuntalavṛndajuṣṭam //
analyzed: ratiḥ uvāca saṃcintayāmi nṛhareḥ vadana aravindam bhṛtya anukaṃpita dhiyā hi gṛhīta mūrtim yat śrīniketam aja rudra rama ādikaiḥ ca saṃlālitam kuṭi laṅkuntala vṛnda juṣṭam

original: etādṛśaṃ tava mukhaṃ nuvituṃ na śaktiḥ śacyā samāpi bhagavanparipāhi nityam / kṛtvā stutiṃ ratiriyaṃ paramādareṇa tūṣṇīṃ sthitā bhagavataśca samīpa eva //
analyzed: etādṛśam tava mukham nuvitum na śaktiḥ śacyā samāpi bhagavan paripāhi nityam kṛtvā stutim ratiḥ iyam parama ādareṇa tūṣṇīm sthitā bhagavataḥ ca samīpe eva

original: ratyanantarajo dakṣaḥ stotuṃ samupacakrame //
analyzed: rati anantara jaḥ dakṣaḥ stotum samupacakrame

original: dakṣa uvāca / saṃcintaye bhagavataścaraṇodatīrthaṃ bhaktyā hyajena pariṣiktamajādivandyam / yacchaucaniḥ sṛtamajapravarāvatāraṃ gaṅgākhyatīrthamabhavatsaritāṃ variṣṭham //
analyzed: dakṣaḥ uvāca saṃcintaye bhagavataḥ caraṇa uda tīrtham bhaktyā hi ajena pariṣiktam aja ādi vandyam  yat śauca niḥ sṛtam aja pravara avatāram gaṅgā ākhya tīrtham abhavat saritām variṣṭham

original: rudropi tenava vidhṛtena jaṭākalāpapūtena pādarajasā hyaśivaḥ śivobhūt / etādṛśaṃ te caraṇaṃ karuṇeśa viṣṇo stotuṃ śaktirmama nāsti kṛpāvatāra / ratyā samaḥ śrutigato na gatosmi mokṣametādṛśaṃ ca paripāhi nidānamūrte //
analyzed: rudraḥ api vidhṛtena jaṭā kalāpa pūtena pāda rajasā hi aśivaḥ śivaḥ bhūt  etādṛśam te caraṇam karuṇa īśa viṣṇo stotum śaktiḥ mama nā asti kṛpā avatāra ratyā samaḥ śruti gataḥ na gataḥ asmi mokṣam etādṛśam ca paripāhi nidāna mūrte

original: evaṃ stutvā sa dakṣastu tūṣṇī meva babhūva ha / tadanantarajaḥ stotuṃ bṛhaspatirupākramīt //
analyzed: evam stutvā sa dakṣaḥ tu tūṣṇīm eva babhūva ha tad anantara jaḥ stotum bṛhaspatiḥ upākramīt

original: bṛhaspatiruvāca / saṃcintayāmi satataṃ tava cānanābjaṃ tvaṃ dehi duṣṭaviṣayeṣu viraktimīśa //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ uvāca saṃcintayāmi satatam tava ca ānana abjam tvam dehi duṣṭa viṣayeṣu viraktim īśa

original: eteṣu śaktiryadi vai sa jīvo kartā ca bhoktā ca sadā ca dātā / yoṣāṃ ca putrasuhṛdau ca paśūṃśca sarvamevaṃ vinaśyati yato hi tadāśu chindhi //
analyzed: eteṣu śaktiḥ yadi vai sa kartā ca bhoktā ca sadā ca dātā  yoṣām ca putra suhṛdau ca paśūn ca sarvam evam vinaśyati yatas hi tat āśu chindhi

original: saṃsāracakrabhramaṇenaiva deva saṃsāraduḥ khamanubhūyehāgatosmi / śaktirna cāsti navane mama devadeva satyā samaṃ ca satataṃ paripāhi nityam //
analyzed: saṃsāra cakra bhramaṇena eva deva saṃsāra duḥ kham anubhūya iha āgataḥ asmi śaktiḥ na ca asti navane mama devadeva satyā samam ca satatam paripāhi nityam

original: evaṃ śrutvā ca paramaṃ tūṣṇīmeva sthito muniḥ / tadanantarajastotuṃ hyaniruddhopacakrame //
analyzed: evam śrutvā ca paramam tūṣṇīm eva sthitaḥ muniḥ tad anantara jaḥ stotum hi aniruddha upacakrame

original: aniruddha uvāca / evaṃ harestava kathāṃ rasikāṃ vihāya strīṇāṃ bhage ca vadane parimuhya nityam / viṣṭhāntrapūritabile rasiko hi nityaṃ sthāyī ca sūkaravadeva vimūḍhabuddhiḥ //
analyzed: aniruddhaḥ uvāca evam hareḥ tava kathām rasikām vihāya strīṇām bhage ca vadane parimuhya nityam viṣṭhā antra pūrita bile rasikaḥ hi nityam sthāyī ca sūkara vat eva vimūḍha buddhiḥ

original: majjāsthipittakapharaphalādipūrṇe carmāntraveṣṭitamukhe patitaṃ ha pītam / āsvādane mama ca pāpagatermurāre māyābalaṃ tava vibho paramaṃ nimittam //
analyzed: majja asthi pitta kaphara phala ādi pūrṇe carma antra veṣṭita mukhe patitam ha pītam āsvādane mama ca pāpa gateḥ murāre māyā balam tava vibho paramam nimittam

original: saṃsāracakre bhramataśca nityaṃ suduḥ kharūpe sukhaleśavarjite / malaṃ vamantaṃ navabhiśca dvāraiḥ śarīramāruhya sumūḍhabuddhiḥ //
analyzed: saṃsāra cakre bhramataḥ ca nityam su duḥ kha rūpe sukha leśa varjite  malam vamantam navabhiḥ ca dvāraiḥ śarīram āruhya su mūḍha buddhiḥ

original: namāmi nityaṃ tava tatkathāmṛtaṃ vihāyadeva śrutimūlanāśanam / kuṭuṃbapoṣaṃ ca sadā ca kurvandānādyakurvannivasan gṛhe ca //
analyzed: namāmi nityam tava tat kathā amṛtam vihāyat eva śruti mūla nāśanam kuṭuṃba poṣam ca sadā ca kurvan dānādi akurvan nivasan gṛhe ca

original: dūre ca saṃsāramalaṃ tvidaṃ kuru dehi hyado divyakathāmṛtaṃ sadā / etādṛśohaṃ tava sadguṇaughaṃ stotuṃ samartho nāsmi śacīsamaśca //
analyzed: dūre ca saṃsāra malam tu idam kuru dehi hi adaḥ divya kathā amṛtam sadā etādṛśaḥ ham tava sat guṇa ogham stotum samarthaḥ na asmi śacī samaḥ ca

original: evaṃ stutvāniruddhastu tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara / tadanantarajaḥ stotraṃ manaḥ svāyaṃbhuvobravīt //
analyzed: evam stutvā aniruddhaḥ tu tūṣṇīm āsa khageśvara tad anantara jaḥ stotram manaḥ svāyaṃbhuvaḥ bravīt

original: svāyaṃbhuva uvāca / stotuṃ hyanupraviśatopi na garbhaduḥ khaṃ tasmādahaṃ paramapūjyapadaṃ gataste //
analyzed: svāyaṃbhuvaḥ uvāca stotum hi anupraviśataḥ api na garbha duḥ kham tasmāt aham parama pūjya padam gataḥ te

original: manorbhāryā mānavī ca yamaḥ saṃyaminīpatiḥ / diśābhimānī candrastu sūryaścakṣurniyāmakaḥ / parasparasamā hyete muktvā saṃsārameva ca //
analyzed: manoḥ bhāryā mānavī ca yamaḥ saṃyaminī patiḥ diśā abhimānī candraḥ tu sūryaḥ cakṣuḥ niyāmakaḥ paraspara samāḥ hi ete muktvā saṃsāram eva ca

original: pravāhādviguṇonaścetyevaṃ jānīhi cāṇḍaja / sūryānantarajaḥ stotuṃ varuṇaḥ saṃpracakrame //
analyzed: pravāhāt viguṇa ūnaḥ ca iti evam jānīhi ca aṇḍaja sūrya anantara jaḥ stotum varuṇaḥ saṃpracakrame

original: varuṇa uvāca / tvadvicchayā racite dehagehe puttre kalatrepi dhane dravyajātau / mamāhamityalpadhiyā ca mūḍhā saṃsāraduḥ khe vinimajjanti sarve //
analyzed: varuṇaḥ uvāca tvad vicchayā racite deha gehe puttre kalatre api dhane dravya jātau mama aham iti alpa dhiyā ca mūḍhā saṃsāra duḥ khe vinimajjanti sarve

original: ato hare tādṛśīṃ me kubuddhiṃ vināśya me dehi te pādadāsyam / ahaṃ manoḥ pādapādārdhabhūtaguṇena hīnaḥ sarvadā vai murāre //
analyzed: atas hare tādṛśīm me ku buddhim vināśya me dehi te pāda dāsyam aham manoḥ pāda pāda ardha bhūta guṇena hīnaḥ sarvadā vai murāre

original: evaṃ stutvā tu varuṇaḥ prāñjaliḥ samupasthitaḥ / varuṇānantarotpanno nārado hyastuvaddharim //
analyzed: evam stutvā tu varuṇaḥ prāñjaliḥ samupasthitaḥ varuṇa anantara utpannaḥ nāradaḥ hi astuvat harim

original: nārada uvāca / yannāmadheyaśravaṇānukīrtanātsvādvanyatattvaṃ mama nāsti viṣṇo / punīhyataścaiva parovarāyānyajjihvāgre vartate nāma tasya //
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca yad nāmadheya śravaṇa anukīrtanāt svādu anya tattvam mama nā asti viṣṇo punīhi atas ca eva paras varāya anyat jihvā agre vartate nāma tasya

original: yajjihvāgre harināmaiva nāsti sa brāhmaṇo naiva sa eva gokharaḥ / ahaṃ na jāne ca tava svarūpaṃ nyūno hyahaṃ varuṇātsarvadaiva //
analyzed: yat jihvā agre hari nāmā eva nā asti sa brāhmaṇaḥ nā eva saḥ eva go kharaḥ aham na jāne ca tava sva rūpam nyūnaḥ hi aham varuṇāt sarvadā eva

original: evaṃ stutvā nārado vai khagendrastūṣṇīmabhūddevadevasya cāgre / yo nāradānantaraṃ saṃbabhūva bhṛgurmahātmā stotumupapracakrame //
analyzed: evam stutvā nāradaḥ vai khaga indraḥ tūṣṇīm abhūt devadevasya ca agre yaḥ nārada anantaram saṃbabhūva bhṛguḥ mahātmā stotum upapracakrame

original: bhṛguruvāca / kimāsanaṃ te garuḍāsanāya kiṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ kaustubhabhūṣaṇāya / lakṣmīkalatrāya kimasti deyaṃ vāgīśa kiṃ te vacanīyamasti / ato na jāne tava sadguṇāṃśca hyahaṃ sadā varuṇā tpādahīnaḥ //
analyzed: bhṛguḥ uvāca kim āsanam te garuḍa āsanāya kim bhūṣaṇam kaustubha bhūṣaṇāya lakṣmī kalatrāya kim asti deyam vāgīśa kim te vacanīyam asti atas na jāne tava sat guṇān ca hi aham sadā varuṇaiḥ pāda hīnaḥ

original: evaṃ stutvā hariṃ devaṃ bhṛgustūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha / tadanantarajo hyagnirastāvītpuruṣottamam //
analyzed: evam stutvā harim devam bhṛguḥ tūṣṇīm babhūva ha tad anantara jaḥ hi agniḥ astāvīt puruṣottamam

original: agniruvāca / yattejasāhaṃ susamiddhatejā havyaṃ vahāmyadhvare ājyasiktam //
analyzed: agniḥ uvāca yad tejasā aham su samiddha tejāḥ havyam vahāmi adhvare ājya siktam

original: yattejasāhaṃ jaṭhare saṃpraviśya pacannannaṃ sarvadā pūrṇaśaktiḥ / ato na jāne tava sadguṇāṃśca bhṛgorahaṃ sarvadaivaṃ samosmi //
analyzed: yad tejasā aham jaṭhare saṃpraviśya pacan annam sarvadā pūrṇa śaktiḥ atas na jāne tava sat guṇān ca bhṛgoḥ aham sarvadā evam samaḥ asmi

original: tadanantarajā stotuṃ prasūtirupacakrame //
analyzed: tad anantara jā stotum prasūtiḥ upacakrame

original: prasūtiruvāca / yannāmārthavicāraṇepimunayo muhyati vai sarvadā tvadbhītā api devatā hyavirataṃ strībhiḥ sahaiva sthitāḥ / māndhātṛdhruvanāradāśca bhṛgavo vaivasvatādyākhilāḥ premṇā vai praṇamāmyahaṃ hitakṛte tasmai namo viṣṇave //
analyzed: prasūtiḥ uvāca yad nāma artha vicāraṇepi munayaḥ muhyati vai sarvadā tvad bhītāḥ api devatāḥ hi aviratam strībhiḥ saha eva sthitāḥ māndhātṛ dhruva nāradāḥ ca bhṛgavaḥ vaivasvata ādya akhilāḥ premṇā vai praṇamāmi aham hita kṛte tasmai namaḥ viṣṇave

original: ato na jāne tava sadguṇānsadā evaṃ vidhā kā mama śaktirasti / stutvā hyevaṃ prasūtistu tūṣṇīmāsītkhageśvara //
analyzed: atas na jāne tava sat guṇān sadā evaṃ vidhā kā mama śaktiḥ asti stutvā hi evam prasūtiḥ tu tūṣṇīm āsīt khageśvara

original: agnirvāgātmako brahmaputro bhṛgu ṛṣistathā / tadbhāryā vai prasūtistu traya ete samāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: agniḥ vāc ātmakaḥ brahma putraḥ bhṛguḥ ṛṣiḥ tathā tad bhāryā vai prasūtiḥ tu trayaḥ ete samāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: varuṇātpādahīnāśca pravahādviguṇādhamāḥ / dakṣācchatāvarā jñeyā mitrāttu dviguṇādhikāḥ //
analyzed: varuṇāt pāda hīnāḥ ca pravahāt viguṇa adhamāḥ dakṣāt śata avarāḥ jñeyāḥ mitrāt tu dviguṇa adhikāḥ

original: prasūtyanantaraṃ jāto vasiṣṭho brahmanandanaḥ / vinayāvanato bhūtvā stotuṃ samupacakrame //
analyzed: prasūti anantaram jātaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ brahma nandanaḥ vinaya avanataḥ bhūtvā stotum samupacakrame

original: vasiṣṭha uvāca / namostu tasmai puruṣāya vedhase namonamo 'sadvṛjinacchide namaḥ / namonamo svāṅgabhavāya nityaṃ natosmi henātha tavāṅghripaṅkajam //
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ uvāca namaḥ astu tasmai puruṣāya vedhase namaḥ namaḥ sat vṛjina chide namaḥ namaḥ namaḥ namaḥ namaḥ atha tava aṅghri paṅkajam

original: māṃ pāhi nityaṃ bhagavanvāsudeva hyagnerahaṃ sarvadā nyūna eva / mitrādahaṃ sarvadā kiñcidūnaḥ stutvā deva sobhavattatra tūṣṇīm //
analyzed: mām pāhi nityam bhagavan vāsudeva hi agneḥ aham sarvadā nyūnaḥ eva mitrāt aham sarvadā kiñcid ūnaḥ stutvā deva saḥ bhavat tatra tūṣṇīm

original: yo vasiṣṭhānantarajo marīcirbrahmanandanaḥ / harintuṣṭāva parayā bhaktyā nārāyaṇaṃ gurum //
analyzed: yaḥ vasiṣṭha anantara jaḥ marīciḥ brahma nandanaḥ harin tuṣṭāva parayā bhaktyā nārāyaṇam gurum
