original: marīciruvāca / devena cāhaṃ hatadhīrbhavanaprasaṅgātsarvāśubhopagamanādvimukhedriyaśca / kurve ca nityaṃ sukhaleśalavādinā tvaddaraṃ manastvaśubhakarma samācarīṣye //
analyzed: marīciḥ uvāca devena ca aham hata dhīḥ bhavana prasaṅgāt sarva aśubha upagamanāt vimukha idriyaḥ ca kurve ca nityam sukha leśa lava ādinā tvad daram manaḥ tu aśubha karma samācarīṣye

original: etādṛśohaṃ bhagavānanantaḥ sadā vasiṣṭhasya samāna eva //
analyzed: etādṛśaḥ uham bhagavān anantaḥ sadā vasiṣṭhasya samānaḥ eva

original: evaṃ stutvā marīcistu tūṣṇīmāsa tadā khaga / tadatantarajohyatrirastāvītprāñjalirharim //
analyzed: evam stutvā marīciḥ tu tūṣṇīm āsa tadā khaga

original: āvirbhavajjagatprabhavāyāvatīrṇaṃ tadrakṣaṇārthamanavadyañca tathāvyayāya / tattvārthamūlamavikāri tava svarūpaṃ hyānandasāramata eva vikāraśūnyam //
analyzed: āvirbhavat jagat prabhavāya avatīrṇam tad rakṣaṇa artham anavadyam ca tathā avyayāya tattvārtha mūlam avikāri tava svarūpam hi ānanda sāram atas eva vikāra śūnyam

original: traiguṇyaśūnyamakhileṣu ca saṃvibhaktaṃ tatra praviśya bhagavanna hi paśyatīva / ato marārestava sadguṇāṃśca stotuṃ na śakromi marīcetulyaḥ //
analyzed: traiguṇya śūnyam akhileṣu ca saṃvibhaktam tatra praviśya bhagavan na hi paśyati iva atas marāreḥ tava sat guṇān ca stotum na śakromi marīci tulyaḥ

original: evaṃ stutvā hyatrirapitūṣṇīmāsa tadā khaga / tadanantarajaḥ stotumaṅgirā vākyamabravīt //
analyzed: evam stutvā hi atriḥ api tūṣṇīm āsa tadā khaga tad anantara jaḥ stotum aṅgirāḥ vākyam abravīt

original: aṅgirā uvāca / draṣṭuṃ na śakromi tava svarūpaṃ hyanantabāhūdaramastakaṃ ca / anantasāhasrakirīṭajuṣṭaṃ mahārhanānābharaṇaiśca śobhitam / etādṛśaṃ rūpamanantapāraṃ stotuṃ hyaśaktastu samosmi cātreḥ //
analyzed: aṅgirāḥ uvāca draṣṭum na śakromi tava sva rūpam hi ananta bāhu udara mastakam ca  ananta sāhasra kirīṭa juṣṭam mahārha nānā ābharaṇaiḥ ca śobhitam etādṛśam rūpam ananta pāram stotum hi aśaktaḥ tu samaḥ asmi ca atreḥ

original: evaṃ stutvā hyaṅgirāśca tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara / tadanantarajaḥ stotuṃ pulastyo vākyamavravīt //
analyzed: evam stutvā hi aṅgirāḥ ca tūṣṇīm āsa khageśvara tad anantara jaḥ stotum pulastyaḥ vākyam avravīt

original: pulastya uvāca / yo vā haristu bhagavānsa (sva)
analyzed: pulastyaḥ uvāca yaḥ vā hariḥ tu bhagavān sa sva

original: upāsakānāṃ saṃdarśayedbhuvanamaṅgalamaṅgalaṃ ca / (laśca) yasmai namo bhagavate purupāya tubhyaṃ yo vāvitā nirayabhāgagamaprasaṅge //
analyzed: upāsakānām saṃdarśayet bhuvana maṅgala maṅgalam ca laḥ ca yasmai namaḥ bhagavate purupāya tubhyam yaḥ niraya bhāga gama prasaṅge

original: etādṛśāṃstava guṇānnavituṃ na śaktaṃ māṃ pāhi bhagavansadṛśo hyaṅgirasā ca //
analyzed: etādṛśān tava guṇān navitum na śaktam mām pāhi bhagavan sadṛśaḥ hi aṅgirasā ca

original: evaṃ stutvā pulastyopi stūṣṇīmeva vabhūva ha / tadanantarajaḥ stotuṃ pulaho vākyamabravīt //
analyzed: evam stutvā pulastyaḥ api stūṣṇīm eva vabhūva ha tad anantara jaḥ stotum pulahaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: pulaha uvāca / niṣkāmarūparihitasya samarpitaṃ ca snānāvarottamapayaḥ phalapuṣpabhojyam / ārādhanaṃ bhagavatastava satkriyāśca vyarthaṃ bhavediti vadanti mahānubhāvāḥ //
analyzed: pulahaḥ uvāca niṣkāma rūpa rihitasya samarpitam ca snāna avara uttama payaḥ phala puṣpa bhojyam ārādhanam bhagavataḥ tava satkriyāḥ ca vyartham bhavet iti vadanti mahā anubhāvāḥ

original: tasmai sadā bhagavate praṇamāmi nityaṃ niṣkāmayā tava samarpaṇamātravuddhyā / vaikuṇṭhanātha bhagavanstavane na śaktiḥ sohaṃ pulasatyasadṛśosmi na saṃśayotra //
analyzed: tasmai sadā bhagavate praṇamāmi nityam niṣkāmayā tava samarpaṇa mātra vuddhyā vaikuṇṭha nātha bhagavan stavane na śaktiḥ saḥ ham pula satya sadṛśaḥ asmi na

original: evaṃ stutvā tu pulahastūṣṇīmāsa tadā khaga / tadanantarajaḥ stotuṃ kratuḥ samupacakrame //
analyzed: evam stutvā tu pulahaḥ tūṣṇīm āsa tadā khaga tad anantara jaḥ stotum kratuḥ samupacakrame

original: kraturuvāca / prāṇaprayāṇasamaye bhagavaṃstavaiva nāmāni saṃsṛtijaduḥ khavināśakāni / yenaikajanmaśamalaṃ sahasaiva hitvā saṃyāti muktimamalāṃ tamahaṃ prapadye //
analyzed: kratuḥ uvāca prāṇa prayāṇa samaye bhagavan tava eva nāmāni saṃsṛti ja duḥkha vināśakāni yena eka janma śamalam sahasā eva hitvā saṃyāti muktim amalām tam aham prapadye

original: ye bhaktyā vivaśā viṣṇo nāmamātraikadajalpakāḥ / tepi muktiṃ prayāntyāśu kimuta dhyāyinaḥ sadā //
analyzed: ye bhaktyā vivaśāḥ viṣṇo te api muktim prayānti āśu kim uta dhyāyinaḥ sadā

original: evaṃ stutvā kraturapi tūṣṇīmāsa khageśvara / tadanantarajaḥ stotuṃ manurvaivasvatobravīt //
analyzed: evam stutvā kratuḥ api tūṣṇīm āsa khageśvara tad anantara jaḥ stotum manuḥ vaivasvataḥ bravīt

original: vaivalasvata uvāca / sohaṃ hi karmakaraṇe nirataḥ sadaiva strīṇāṃ bhoge ca nirataśca gude pramattaḥ / jihvendriye ca niratastava darśane ca samyagvirāgasahitaḥ paramo dareṇa //
analyzed: vaivalasvataḥ uvāca saḥ ham hi karma karaṇe nirataḥ sadā eva strīṇām bhoge ca nirataḥ ca gude pramattaḥ jihvā indriye ca nirataḥ tava darśane ca samyak virāga sahitaḥ paramaḥ dareṇa

original: māṃsāsthimajjarudhiraiḥ sahite ca dehe bhaktiṃ sadaiva bhagavannapi taskare ca / gurvagnibāḍabagavādiṣu satsu duḥ khātsamyagviraktimupayāmi sahasva nityam //
analyzed: māṃsa asthi majja rudhiraiḥ sahite ca dehe bhaktim sadā eva bhagavan api taskare ca guru agni bāḍaba gava ādiṣu satsu duḥ khāt samyak viraktim upayāmi sahasva nityam

original: lokānuvādaśravaṇe paramā ca śaktirnārāyaṇasya namane na ca mesti śaktiḥ / lokānuyānakaraṇe paramā ca śaktiḥ kṣetrādimārgagamane paramā hyaśaktiḥ //
analyzed: loka anuvāda śravaṇe paramā ca śaktiḥ nārāyaṇasya namane na ca me asti śaktiḥ loka anuyāna karaṇe paramā ca śaktiḥ kṣetra ādi mārga gamane paramā hi aśaktiḥ

original: vaiśyādikeṣu dhanikeṣu parā ca śaktiḥ sadbrāhmaṇeṣvapi na śaktiraho murāre //
analyzed: vaiśya ādikeṣu dhanikeṣu parā ca śaktiḥ sat brāhmaṇeṣu api na śaktiḥ aho murāre

original: vaivasvatamanurdevaṃ stutvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha / tadanantarajaḥ stotuṃ viśvāmitropacakrame //
analyzed: vaivasvata manuḥ devam stutvā tūṣṇīm babhūva ha tad anantara jaḥ stotum viśvāmitra upacakrame

original: viśvāmitra uvāca / na dhyāte caraṇāṃbuje bhagavato saṃdhyāpi nānuṣṭhitā jñānadvārakapāṭapāṭanapaṭurdharmopinopārjitaḥ / antarvyāphamalābhighātakaraṇe paṭvī śrutā te kathā no deva śravaṇena pāhi bhagavanmāmatritulyaṃ sadā //
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ uvāca na dhyāte caraṇa aṃbuje bhagavataḥ saṃdhyā api nā anuṣṭhitā jñāna dvāra kapāṭa pāṭana paṭuḥ dharmopinā upārjitaḥ antar vyāpha mala abhighāta karaṇe paṭvī śrutā te kathā naḥ deva śravaṇena pāhi bhagavat mām atri tulyam sadā

original: viśvāmitraṛṣistvevaṃ stutvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha / bhṛgunāradakṣāṃśca vihāya brahmaputrakāḥ //
analyzed: viśvāmitra ṛṣiḥ tu evam stutvā tūṣṇīm babhūva ha bhṛgu nārada kṣān ca vihāya brahma putrakāḥ

original: saptasaṃkhyā vasiṣṭhādyā viśvāmitrastathaiva ca / vaivasvatamanustvete parasparasamāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: sapta saṃkhyāḥ vasiṣṭha ādyāḥ viśvāmitraḥ tathā eva ca vaivasvata manuḥ tu ete paraspara samāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: vahnerapyavarā nityaṃ kiñcinmitrādguṇādhikāḥ / tadanantajastotraṃ vakṣye śṛṇu khageśvara //
analyzed: vahneḥ api avarāḥ nityam kiñcid mitrāt guṇa adhikāḥ tad ananta ja stotram vakṣye śṛṇu khageśvara

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe kṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde devādistutitattattāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde devādistutitattattāratamyanirūpaṇam nāma saptamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 8
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: kratoranantaraṃ jāto mitro (śro)
analyzed: kratoḥ anantaram jātaḥ

original: nāma khageśvara / nārāyaṇaṃ jagadyoniṃ stotuṃ samupacakrame //
analyzed: nāma khageśvara nārāyaṇam jagadyonim stotum samupacakrame

original: mitra uvāca / natosmyajñastvaccaraṇāravindaṃ bhavacchidaṃ svastyayanaṃ bhavacchide / veda svayaṃ bhagavānvāsudevo nāhaṃ nāgnirna tridevā munīndrāḥ //
analyzed: mitraḥ uvāca nataḥ asmi ajñaḥ tvad caraṇa aravindam bhavat chidam svastyayanam bhavat chide  / veda svayam bhagavān vāsudevaḥ na aham na agniḥ na tridevāḥ muni indrāḥ

original: athāpare bhāgavatapradhānā yadā na jānīyurathāpare kutaḥ / māṃ pāhi nityaṃ paratopyadhīśa viśvāmitrānnyūna eveti nityam / ahaṃ parjanyārdviguṇa eva nityamato mama stavane nāsti śaktiḥ //
analyzed: atha apare bhāgavata pradhānāḥ yadā na jānīyuḥ atha apare kutas mām pāhi nityam paratas api adhīśa viśvāmitrāt nyūnaḥ eva iti nityam aham parjanyāt dviguṇaḥ eva nityam atas mama stavane na asti śaktiḥ

original: evaṃ stutvā hariṃ mitrastūṣṇīmāsa tadā khaga / tadanantarajā tārā stotuṃ samupacakrame //
analyzed: evam stutvā harim mitraḥ tūṣṇīm āsa tadā khaga tad anantara jā tārā stotum samupacakrame

original: tārovāca
analyzed: tārā uvāca

original: ananyena tu bhāvena bhaktiṃ kurvanti ye dṛḍhām / tvatkṛte tyaktakarmāṇastyaktasvajanabāndhavāḥ //
analyzed: ananyena tu bhāvena bhaktim kurvanti ye dṛḍhām tvad kṛte tyakta karmāṇaḥ tyakta sva jana bāndhavāḥ

original: tvadāśrayāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā (dṛṣṭvā)
analyzed: tvad āśrayām kathām śrutvā dṛṣṭvā

original: śṛṇvanti kathayanti ca / tathaite sādhavo viṣṇo sarvasaṃgavivarjitāḥ //
analyzed: śṛṇvanti kathayanti ca tathā ete sādhavaḥ viṣṇo sarva saṃga vivarjitāḥ

original: tanmadhye patitāṃ pāhi sadā mitrasamāṃ prabho / tārānantarajaḥ prāha nirṛtiśca khageśvara //
analyzed: tad madhye patitām pāhi sadā mitra samām prabho tārā anantara jaḥ prāha nirṛtiḥ ca khageśvara

original: nirṛtiruvāca / yogena tvayyarpitayā ca bhaktyā saṃyānti lokāḥ paramāṃ gatiṃ ca / āsevayā sarvaguṇādhikānāṃ jñānena vairāgyayutenadave //
analyzed: nirṛtiḥ uvāca yogena tvayi arpitayā ca bhaktyā saṃyānti lokāḥ paramām gatim ca  āsevayā sarva guṇa adhikānām jñānena

original: cittasya nigraheṇaiva viṣṇoryānti paraṃ padam / ato māṃ pāhi dayayā sadā tārāsamaṃ prabho / tadanantarajā stotuṃ prāvahī taṃ pracakrame //
analyzed: cittasya nigraheṇa eva viṣṇoḥ yānti param padam  atas mām pāhi dayayā sadā tārā samam prabho tad anantara jā stotum prāvahī tam pracakrame

original: pravāhyuvāca / sutāḥ prasaṃgena bhavanti vīryāttava prasādātparamāḥ sampadaśca / yā hyuttamaślokarasāyanāḥ kathāstatsevanādāstvapavargavartmani //
analyzed: pravāhī uvāca sutāḥ prasaṃgena bhavanti vīryāt tava prasādāt paramāḥ sampadaḥ ca  yāḥ hi uttamaśloka rasāyanāḥ kathāḥ tad sevanāt āstu apavarga vartmani

original: bhaktirbhavetsarvadā devadeva sadāpyahaṃ nirṛteḥ sāmyameva / saharbhāṣyakomitraḥ tkayītāraḥ prakīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: bhaktiḥ bhavet sarvadā devadeva sadā api aham nirṛteḥ sāmyam eva saharbhāṣyakaḥ mitraḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: koṇādhipo nirṛtiśca prāvahī pravahapriyā / catvāra ete parjanyāttriguṇāḥ parikīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: koṇādhipaḥ nirṛtiḥ ca prāvahī pravahapriyā catvāraḥ ete parjanyāt triguṇāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: tadanantarajānvakṣye tāñchṛṇu tvaṃ khageśvara / pravāhabhāryānantarajo viṣvaksenothapārṣadaḥ / vāyuputro mahābhāgaḥ hariṃ stotuṃ pracakrame //
analyzed: tad anantara jān vakṣye tān śṛṇu tvam khageśvara pravāha bhāryā anantara jaḥ vāyuputraḥ mahābhāgaḥ harim stotum pracakrame

original: viṣvaksena uvāca / bhagavānmokṣadaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pūrṇānando sadāyadi / yadi syātparamā bhaktirhya parokṣatvasādhanā //
analyzed: viṣvaksenaḥ uvāca bhagavān mokṣa daḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sadā yadi yadi syāt paramā bhaktiḥ hi parokṣa tva sādhanā

original: tathā svagurumārabhya brahmānteṣu ca sādhuṣu / tadyogyatānusāreṇa bhaktirniṣkapaṭā yadi //
analyzed: tathā sva gurum ārabhya brahma anteṣu ca sādhuṣu tad yogyatā anusāreṇa bhaktiḥ niṣkapaṭā yadi

original: tulasyādiṣu jīveṣu yadi syātprītiraṇḍaja / saṃsmṛtiśca tadā nāśī bhūyādeva na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: tulasī ādiṣu jīveṣu yadi syāt prītiraṇḍaja saṃsmṛtiḥ ca tadā nāśī bhūyāt eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: evaṃ stuttvā mahābhāgo viṣvakse no mahāprabho / tūṣṇīṃ babhūva garuḍa prāñjalirnamrakandharaḥ / mitrādahaṃ nyūna eva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: evam stuttvā mahābhāgaḥ viṣvakse naḥ mahā prabho tūṣṇīm babhūva garuḍa prāñjaliḥ namra kandharaḥ mitrāt aham nyūnaḥ eva na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: iti śrīgā- ma- u- tṛ- dha- viṣṇustutirdevatāramyādi- aṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti viṣṇustutiḥ devatā ramyā ādi aṣṭamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 9
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīgaruḍa uvāca / ajānajasvarūpaṃ ca brūhi kṛṣṇa mahāmate / tadanyāṃśca krameṇeva vaktuṃ kṛṣṇa tvamarhasi //
analyzed: śrī garuḍaḥ uvāca ajān aja svarūpam ca brūhi kṛṣṇa mahāmate tad anyān ca krameṇa iva vaktum kṛṣṇa tvam arhasi

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / ajānākhyā devatāstu tattaddevakule bhavāḥ / ajānadevatāstā hi tebhyogyāḥ karmadevatāḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca ajāna ākhyāḥ devatāḥ tu tad tad devakule bhavāḥ ajāna devatāḥ tāḥ hi tebhyogyāḥ karma devatāḥ

original: virādhaścārudeṣṇaśca tathā citrarathastathā / dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ kiśoraśca hūhūrhāhāstathaiva ca //
analyzed: virādhaḥ cārudeṣṇaḥ ca tathā citrarathaḥ tathā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ kiśoraḥ ca hūhūḥ hāhāḥ tathā eva ca

original: vidyādharaścograseno viśvāvasuparāvasū / citrasenaśca gopālo balaḥ pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: vidyādharaḥ ca ugrasenaḥ viśvāvasu parāvasū citrasenaḥ ca gopālaḥ balaḥ pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ

original: evamādyaśca gandharvāḥ śatasaṃkhyāḥ khageśvara / ajānajasamā jñeyā muktau saṃsāra eva ca //
analyzed: evamādyaḥ ca gandharvāḥ śata saṃkhyāḥ khageśvara aja anaja samāḥ jñeyāḥ muktau saṃsāre eva ca

original: ajñānajāstu me devāḥ karmajebhyaḥ śatāvarāḥ / ghṛtācī menakā raṃbhā urvaśī ca tilottamā //
analyzed: ajñāna jāḥ tu me devāḥ karma jebhyaḥ śata avarāḥ ghṛtācī menakā raṃbhā urvaśī ca tilottamā

original: suketuḥ śabarī caiva mañjughoṣā ca piṅgalā / ityādikaṃ yakṣaratnaṃ saha saṃparikīrtitam //
analyzed: suketuḥ śabarī ca eva mañjughoṣā ca piṅgalā iti ādikam yakṣa ratnam saha saṃparikīrtitam

original: ajānajasamā hyete karmajebhyaḥ śatāvarāḥ / viśvāmitro vasiṣṭhaśca nāradaścyavanastathā //
analyzed: aja ana ja samāḥ hi ete karma jebhyaḥ śata avarāḥ viśvāmitraḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ ca nāradaḥ cyavanaḥ tathā

original: utathyaśca muniścaitāndrājapitvā khageśvara / ṛṣayaśca mahātmāno hyajānajasamāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: utathyaḥ ca muniḥ ca etān drā japitvā khaga īśvaraḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca mahātmānaḥ hi aja anaja samāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: śatarciḥ kaśyapo jñeyo madhyamaśca parāśaraḥ / pāvamānyaḥ pragāthaśca kṣudrasūktaśca devalaḥ //
analyzed: śatarciḥ kaśyapaḥ jñeyaḥ madhyamaḥ ca parāśaraḥ pāvamānyaḥ pragāthaḥ ca kṣudrasūktaḥ ca devalaḥ

original: gṛtsamado hyāsuriśca bharadvājotha mudgalaḥ / uddālako hyṛ śṛṅgaḥ śaṅkhaḥ satyavratastathā //
analyzed: gṛtsamadaḥ hi āsuriḥ ca bharadvājaḥ utha mudgalaḥ uddālakaḥ śaṅkhaḥ satyavrataḥ tathā

original: suyajñaścaiva bābhravyo māṇḍūkaścaiva bāṣkalaḥ / dharmācāryastathāgastyo dālbhyo dārḍhyacyutastathā //
analyzed: suyajñaḥ ca eva bābhravyaḥ māṇḍūkaḥ ca eva bāṣkalaḥ dharmācāryaḥ tathā agastyaḥ dālbhyaḥ dārḍhyacyutaḥ tathā

original: kavaṣo haritaḥ kaṇvo virūpo musalastathā / viṣṇuvṛddhaśca ātreyaḥ śrīvatso vatsaletyapi //
analyzed: kavaṣaḥ haritaḥ kaṇvaḥ virūpaḥ musalaḥ tathā viṣṇuvṛddhaḥ ca ātreyaḥ śrīvatsaḥ vatsala iti api

original: bhārgavaścāpnavānaśca māṇḍūkeyastathaiva / maṇḍkaścaiva jābacaliḥ vītihavyastathaiva ca //
analyzed: bhārgavaḥ ca āpnavānaḥ ca māṇḍūkeyaḥ tathā eva maṇḍkaḥ ca eva jābacaliḥ vītihavyaḥ tathā eva ca

original: gṛtsamadaḥ śaunakaśca ityādyā ṛṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ / eteṣāṃ śravaṇādeva hariḥ prīṇāti sarvadā //
analyzed: gṛtsamadaḥ śaunakaḥ ca ityādyāḥ ṛṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ eteṣām śravaṇāt eva hariḥ prīṇāti sarvadā

original: bruve dvyaṣṭasahasraṃ ca śṛṇu tārkṣya mama striyaḥ / agniputrāstu yaddvyaṣṭasahasrañca mama striyaḥ / ajānajasamā hyetā (te)
analyzed: bruve dvi aṣṭa sahasram ca śṛṇu tārkṣya mama striyaḥ agni putrāḥ tu yat dvi aṣṭa sahasram ca mama striyaḥ aja anaja samāḥ hi etā te

original: nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: tvaṣṭuḥ putrī kaśerūśca tāsāṃ madhye guṇādhikā / tadanantarajānvakṣye śṛṇu samyak khageśvara //
analyzed: tvaṣṭuḥ putrī kaśerūḥ ca tāsām madhye guṇa adhikā tad anantara jā anvakṣye śṛṇu samyak khageśvara

original: ājānebhyastu pitaraḥ saptabhyonye śatāvarāḥ / tathādhikā hi pitara iti vedavidāṃ matam //
analyzed: ājānebhyaḥ tu pitaraḥ saptabhyaḥ nye śata avarāḥ tathā adhikāḥ hi pitaraḥ iti veda vidām matam

original: tadanantarājānvakṣye śṛṇu tvaṃ dvijasattama / aṣṭābhyo devagandharvā aṣṭottaraśataṃ vinā //
analyzed: tad ananta rājā anvakṣye śṛṇu tvam dvijasattama aṣṭābhyaḥ devagandharvāḥ aṣṭottaraśatam vinā

original: tebhyaḥ śataguṇānandā devapreṣyāstu mukhyataḥ / svamukeneva devaiśca ājñāpyāḥ sarvadā gaṇāḥ //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ śataguṇa ānandāḥ deva preṣyāḥ tu mukhyatas devaiḥ ca ājñāpyāḥ sarvadā gaṇāḥ

original: ākhyātā devagandharvāstebhyaste ca śatāvarāḥ / tebhyastu kṣitipā jñeyā avarāśca śatairguṇaiḥ //
analyzed: ākhyātāḥ deva gandharvāḥ tebhyaḥ te ca śata avarāḥ tebhyaḥ tu kṣitipāḥ jñeyāḥ avarāḥ ca śataiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: tebhyaḥ śataguṇājñeyā mānuṣeṣūttamā gaṇāḥ / evaṃ prāsaṃgikānuktvā prakṛtaṃ hyanusarāmyaham / evaṃ brahmādayo devā lakṣmyādyā api sarvaśaḥ //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ śataguṇāḥ jñeyāḥ mānuṣeṣu uttamāḥ gaṇāḥ  evam prāsaṃgikān uktvā prakṛtam hi anusarāmi aham evam brahma ādayaḥ devāḥ lakṣmī ādyāḥ api sarvaśas

original: stutvā tūṣṇīṃ sthitāḥ sarve prāñjalīkṛtya bho dvija //
analyzed: stutvā tūṣṇīm sthitāḥ sarve prāñjalīkṛtya bho dvija

original: iti stutaśca deveśo bhagavān hariravyayaḥ / teṣāmāyatanaṃ dātuṃ manasā samacintayat //
analyzed: iti stutaḥ ca deveśaḥ bhagavān hariḥ avyayaḥ teṣām āyatanam dātum manasā samacintayat

original: idaṃ pavitramārogyaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpapraṇāśanam / hariprasādajanakaṃ svarūpasukhasādhanam //
analyzed: idam pavitram ārogyam puṇyam pāpa praṇāśanam hari prasāda janakam sva rūpa sukha sādhanam

original: idaṃ tu stavanaṃ viprā na paṭhantīha mānavāḥ / na śṛṇvanti ca ye nityaṃ te sarve caiva māyinaḥ //
analyzed: idam tu stavanam viprāḥ na paṭhanti iha mānavāḥ na śṛṇvanti ca ye nityam te sarve ca eva māyinaḥ

original: nasmarantontaraṃ nityaṃ ye bhuñjanti narādhamāḥ / tairbhuktā satataṃ viṣṭhā sadā krimiśatairyutā //
analyzed: na smarantaḥ ntaram nityam ye bhuñjanti nara adhamāḥ taiḥ bhuktā satatam viṣṭhā sadā krimi śataiḥ yutā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe tṛtī- utta- brahmakāṇḍe devakṛtaviṣṇustutidevatātāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma navamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe brahmakāṇḍe devakṛtaviṣṇustutidevatātāratamyanirūpaṇam nāma navamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 10
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / devairevaṃ stuto viṣṇurbhagavānsāttvatāṃ patiḥ / kīdṛśaṃ hyāśrayaṃ dattvaiṣāṃ viveśa mahāprabhuḥ //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca devaiḥ evam stutaḥ viṣṇuḥ bhagavān sāttvatām patiḥ kīdṛśam hi āśrayam dattvā eṣām viveśa mahā prabhuḥ

original: etadveditumicchāmi kṛṣṇakṛṣṇa mahāprabho / samyag brūhi dayālo tvaṃ yadi macchrotramarhati //
analyzed: etat veditum icchāmi kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā prabho samyak brūhi dayālo tvam yadi mad śrotram arhati

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / teṣu tattveṣu bhagavānsa viveśa mahāprabhuḥ / kṣobhayāmāsa bhagavān saṃbandhavidhuro hariḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca teṣu tattveṣu bhagavān sa viveśa mahā prabhuḥ kṣobhayāmāsa bhagavān saṃbandha vidhuraḥ hariḥ

original: adau sasarja bhagavān brahmāṇḍaṃ kana kātmakam / pañcāśatkoṭivistīrṇaṃ yojanānāṃ samantataḥ //
analyzed: adau sasarja bhagavān brahmāṇḍam kana ka ātmakam pañcāśat koṭi vistīrṇam yojanānām samantataḥ

original: tadūrdhvamaṇvavayavastāvānkanakarūpakaḥ / vartate tata ūrdhvaṃ tu pañcāśatkoṭibhūtalam //
analyzed: tad ūrdhvam aṇu avayavaḥ tāvān kanaka rūpakaḥ vartate tatas ūrdhvam tu pañcāśat koṭi bhū talam

original: evaṃ koṭiśataṃ tasyāvayavaḥ parikīrtitaḥ / tataśca saptāvaraṇaiḥ samatātparidhīkṛtam //
analyzed: evam koṭi śatam tasya avayavaḥ parikīrtitaḥ tatas ca sapta āvaraṇaiḥ sama tāt paridhīkṛtam

original: kabandhāvaraṇaṃ hyādyaṃ koṭyā daśasahasrakam / dvitīyā varaṇaṃ jñeyaṃ pāvakasya mahātmanaḥ //
analyzed: kabandha āvaraṇam hi ādyam koṭyā daśa sahasrakam dvitīyā varaṇam jñeyam pāvakasya mahātmanaḥ

original: apāṃ daśaguṇairyuktaṃ samantātparidhī (khī) kṛtam / tṛtīyāvaraṇaṃ jñeyaṃ harasyaiva mahātmanaḥ //
analyzed: apām daśaguṇaiḥ yuktam samantāt paridhī khī kṛtam tṛtīya āvaraṇam jñeyam harasya eva mahātmanaḥ

original: daśādhikaṃ pāvakācca samantātparivāritam / caturthāvaraṇaṃ jñeyaṃ nabhasopi mahāprabho //
analyzed: daśa adhikam pāvakāt ca samantāt parivāritam caturtha āvaraṇam jñeyam nabhasaḥ api mahā prabho

original: harāddaśaguṇairevaṃ samantātparivāritam / pañcamāvaraṇaṃ jñeyamahaṅkārākhyamevaca //
analyzed: harāt daśaguṇaiḥ evam samantāt parivāritam pañcama āvaraṇam jñeyam ahaṅkāra ākhyam eva ca

original: vyomno daśaguṇairevaṃ samantātparivāri tam / ṣaṣṭhamāvaraṇaṃ proktaṃ mahattattvaṃ khageśvara //
analyzed: vyomnaḥ daśaguṇaiḥ evam samantāt parivāri tam ṣaṣṭham āvaraṇam proktam mahat tattvam khageśvara

original: ahaṅkārāddaśaguṇaṃ samantātparivāritam / saptamāvaraṇaṃ proktaṃ triguṇāvaraṇaṃ prabho //
analyzed: ahaṅkārāt daśaguṇam samantāt parivāritam saptama āvaraṇam proktam triguṇa āvaraṇam prabho

original: mahattattvāddaśaguṇairadhikaṃ parikīrtitam / mahattattvānantaraṃ ca tamo hyāvaraṇaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: mahat tattvāt daśaguṇaiḥ adhikam parikīrtitam mahat tattva anantaram ca tamaḥ hi āvaraṇam smṛtam

original: mahattattvātpañcaguṇairadhikaṃ parikīrtitam / tasmācca dviguṇaṃ jñeyaṃrajo hyāvaraṇaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: mahat tattvāt pañcaguṇaiḥ adhikam parikīrtitam tasmāt ca dviguṇam jñeyam rajaḥ hi āvaraṇam smṛtam

original: tataśca dviguṇaṃ jñeyaṃ sattvāvaraṇamuttamam / trayaścaivaṃ militvā tu ekāvaraṇamīritam //
analyzed: tatas ca dviguṇam jñeyam sattva āvaraṇam uttamam trayaḥ ca evam militvā tu eka āvaraṇam īritam

original: avyākṛtākhyamākāśaṃ tadanantaramīritam / maryādārahitaścaivaṃ tatrāste hariravyayaḥ //
analyzed: avyākṛta ākhyam ākāśam tat anantaram īritam maryādā rahitaḥ ca evam tatra āste hariḥ avyayaḥ

original: aṣṭamāvaraṇaṃ vyomnoraṃ tarā virajā nadī / pañcayojanavistīrṇā samantātparīdhīkṛtā //
analyzed: aṣṭama āvaraṇam tarā virajā nadī pañca yojana vistīrṇā samantāt parīdhīkṛtā

original: asti puṇyatamā jñeyā lokasaṃsāranāśinī / evaṃ caturmukhenaiva tadā hṛṣyaṃ ti cāṇḍaja //
analyzed: asti puṇyatamā jñeyā loka saṃsāra nāśinī evam caturmukhena eva tadā ca aṇḍaja

original: te sarve virajānadyāṃ samyak snātvā visarjya ca / liṅgadehaṃ tataḥ paścānmokṣaṃ vindanti te hareḥ //
analyzed: te sarve virajā nadyām samyak snātvā visarjya ca liṅga deham tatas paścāt mokṣam vindanti te hareḥ

original: aparokṣadṛśāmevaṃ brahmaṇā saha gāminām / virajātaraṇaṃ viddhi nānyeṣāṃ vinatāsuta //
analyzed: a parokṣa dṛśām evam brahmaṇā saha gāminām virajā taraṇam viddhi na anyeṣām vinatā suta

original: aparokṣadṛśāṃ brahmanvyāsādīnāṃ khageśvara / virajātaraṇaṃ nāsti bhoktavyatvācca karmaṇaḥ //
analyzed: aparokṣa dṛśām brahman vyāsa ādīnām khageśvara virajā taraṇam nā asti bhoktavya tvāt ca karmaṇaḥ

original: viriñcenaiva sākaṃ tu kalpesminnadhikāriṇām / teṣāṃ tu niyamenaiva sarvaprārabdhasaṃkṣayaḥ //
analyzed: viriñcena eva sākam tu kalpe smin adhikāriṇām teṣām tu niyamena eva sarva prārabdha saṃkṣayaḥ

original: bhavatyevaṃ na saṃdeho nānyeṣāṃ sarvasaṃkṣayaḥ / atastu virajātaraṇaṃ teṣāmeva bhavetpaṭo //
analyzed: bhavati evam na saṃdehaḥ na anyeṣām sarva saṃkṣayaḥ atas tu virajā taraṇam teṣām eva bhavet paṭaḥ

original: virajātaraṇaṃ nāsti teṣāṃ ta (tayosta)
analyzed: virajā taraṇam na asti teṣām ta tayoḥ ta

original: tsaṃgināṃ tathā / sarvārabdhakṣayo nāsti yatasteṣāṃ khagādhipa //
analyzed: tsaṃginām tathā sarva ārabdha kṣayaḥ nā asti yatas teṣām khaga adhipa

original: ataśca sarvathā nāsti virajātaraṇaṃ prabho / pralaye virajānadyā layo nāsti khageśvara //
analyzed: atas ca sarvathā nā asti virajā taraṇam prabho pralaye virajā nadyāḥ layaḥ nā asti khageśvara

original: lakṣmyātmikā tu sā jñeyā liṅgadehavidāriṇī / brahmatvayogyā ṛjavo nāma devāḥ prakīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: lakṣmī ātmikā tu sā jñeyā liṅga deha vidāriṇī brahma tva yogyāḥ ṛjavaḥ nāma devāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: tepi pratyekaśaḥ saṃti hyanantāśca pṛthaggaṇāḥ / pṛthakpṛthak ca taiḥ sākaṃ mokṣayogyāḥ khageśvara //
analyzed: te api pratyekaśaḥ saṃti hi anantāḥ ca pṛthak gaṇāḥ pṛthak pṛthak ca taiḥ sākam mokṣa yogyāḥ khageśvara

original: jīvāḥ saṃti hyaneke ca pratikalpe sṛjanti te / dvātriṃśallakṣaṇaiḥ samyagyuktā vāyutvayogyakāḥ //
analyzed: jīvāḥ saṃti hi aneke ca pratikalpe sṛjanti te dvātriṃśat lakṣaṇaiḥ samyak yuktāḥ vāyu tva yogyakāḥ

original: aṣṭāviṃśallakṣaṇaiśca girīśapadayoginaḥ / caturviṃśatimārabhyāṣoḍaśācca surāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: aṣṭāviṃśat lakṣaṇaiḥ ca girīśa pada yoginaḥ caturviṃśatim ārabhya ṣoḍaśāt ca surāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: aṣṭakā ṛṣayaḥ proktāstadūnāścakravartinaḥ / śatajanma samārabhya brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ //
analyzed: aṣṭakāḥ ṛṣayaḥ proktāḥ tad ūnāḥ cakravartinaḥ  śata janma samārabhya brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: aparokṣamiti proktaṃ tathā hyārabdhasaṃkṣayaḥ / ekena śatakalpena vāyutvaṃ yāti bho dvija //
analyzed: aparokṣam iti proktam tathā hi ārabdha saṃkṣayaḥ ekena śata kalpena vāyu tvam yāti bho dvija

original: śatajanmani brahmatvaṃ yāti paścāddhareḥ padam / catvāriṃśadbrahmakalpaṃ samārabhya khageśvara //
analyzed: śata janmani brahma tvam yāti paścāt hareḥ padam  catvāriṃśat brahma kalpam samārabhya khageśvara

original: rudrasyāpyāparokṣyaṃ syāttathā prārabdhasaṃkṣayaḥ / ekacatvāriṃśakalpe śeṣatvaṃ yāti suvrata //
analyzed: rudrasya api āparokṣyam syāt tathā prārabdha saṃkṣayaḥ ekacatvāriṃśa kalpe śeṣa tvam yāti suvrata

original: brahmaṇā saha mokṣaṃ ca yāti samyaṅ na cānyathā / kalpaviṃśatimārabhya brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ //
analyzed: brahmaṇā saha mokṣam ca yāti samyak na ca anyathā kalpa viṃśatim ārabhya brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: indrasyāpyāparokṣyaṃ syāttathā prārabdhasaṃkṣayaḥ / brahmaṇaiva sahāyāti hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ param //
analyzed: indrasya api āparokṣyam syāt tathā prārabdha saṃkṣayaḥ brahmaṇā eva saha āyāti harim nārāyaṇam param

original: garuḍa uvāca / pañcāśītibrahmakalpaṃ samārabhya mahāprabho / rudrasyāpyāparokṣyaṃ syāttathā prārabdhasaṃkṣayaḥ //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca pañcāśīti brahmakalpam samārabhya mahā prabho rudrasya api āparokṣyam syāt tathā prārabdha saṃkṣayaḥ

original: iti śrutaṃ mayā brahmanbrahmaṇoktaṃ hareḥ priyāt / itthaṃ tvayoktaṃ śrīkṛṣṇa saṃśayobādhate mama //
analyzed: iti śrutam mayā brahman brahmaṇā uktam hareḥ priyāt ittham tvayā uktam śrī kṛṣṇa saṃśayaḥ bādhate mama

original: ato me saṃśayaṃ chindhi yathā na syāttathā punaḥ / iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā kṛṣṇo vacanamabravīt //
analyzed: atas me saṃśayam chindhi yathā na syāt tathā punar iti tat vacanam śrutvā kṛṣṇaḥ vacanam abravīt

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / brahmoktasya mayoktasya vivādo nāsti sarvathā / saṃdehastvajñadṛṣṭīnāṃ jñānināṃ nāsti sarvathā //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca brahma uktasya mayā uktasya vivādaḥ na asti sarvathā saṃdehaḥ tu ajña dṛṣṭīnām jñāninām na asti sarvathā

original: aśītihyaṣṭakā proktā aṣṭapañca khageśvara / catvāriṃśadbrahmakalpa evaṃ prāha caturmukhaḥ //
analyzed: aśīti hi aṣṭakā proktā aṣṭa pañca khageśvara catvāriṃśat brahma kalpaḥ evam prāha caturmukhaḥ

original: tattvānāṃ bahugopyatvāttathoktaṃ brahmaṇā purā / abhiprāyastvevameva jñātavyo nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: tattvānām bahu gopya tvāt tathā uktam brahmaṇā purā abhiprāyaḥ tu evam eva jñātavyaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: pañcā śītibrahmakalpaṃ ye vijānanti bho dvija / tendhaṃ tamaḥ praviśanti satyaṃsatyaṃ mayoditam //
analyzed: ye vijānanti bho dvija tad indham tamaḥ praviśanti satyam satyam mayā uditam

original: virajānantaraṃ vipraṃ tathā vyākṛtamaṃbaram / anantapāraṃ tadapi lakṣmīstasyābhimāninī //
analyzed: virajā anantaram vipram tathā vyākṛtam aṃbaram ananta pāram tat api lakṣmīḥ tasya abhimāninī

original: saṃkhyānugaṇanaṃ nāma yasya nāsti mahāprabho / na dānaṃ jātiproktaṃ sarvadā nāsti saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: saṃkhyā anugaṇanam nāma yasya nā asti mahā prabho na dānam jāti proktam sarvadā nā asti saṃśayaḥ

original: aṇḍābhimānī brahmā tu virāḍākhyo hyabhūttadā / evaṃ mataṃ sa nirmāya bhagavānharikhyayaḥ //
analyzed: aṇḍa abhimānī brahmā tu virāṭ ākhyaḥ hi abhūt tadā evam matam sa nirmāya bhagavān hari khyayaḥ

original: viśeṣāttatra garuḍa devaistattvābhimānibhiḥ / adhaścordhvaṃ tadākramya haristiṣṭhati sarvadā //
analyzed: viśeṣāt tatra garuḍa devaiḥ tattva abhimānibhiḥ adhas ca ūrdhvam tat ākramya hariḥ tiṣṭhati sarvadā

original: evaṃ prākṛtasargoktirvaikṛtaṃ śṛṇu pakṣirāṭ //
analyzed: evam prākṛta sarga uktiḥ vaikṛtam śṛṇu pakṣirāj

original: garuḍa uvāca / sṛṣṭiruktā tvayā pūrvaṃ śrutā samyaṅ mayā hare //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca sṛṣṭiḥ uktā tvayā pūrvam śrutā samyak mayā hare

original: kiṃ nāma prākṛtaṃ jñeyaṃ tathā kiṃ vaikṛtaṃ prabho / etadvistīrya me brūhi śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me //
analyzed: kim nāma prākṛtam jñeyam tathā kim vaikṛtam prabho etat vistīrya me brūhi śrotum kautūhalam hi me

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / avyaktādyāḥ pṛthivyantā aṇḍācca bahirudbhavāḥ / te sarve prākṛtāḥ proktāsteṣāṃ jñānādvimacyate //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca avyakta ādyāḥ pṛthivī antāḥ aṇḍāt ca bahis udbhavāḥ te sarve prākṛtāḥ proktāḥ teṣām jñānāt vimacyate

original: brahmāḍaṃ vikṛtaṃ jñeyaṃ brahmāṇḍāntaḥ khageśvara / yā sṛṣṭirucyate sadbhiḥ saivoktā vikṛteti ca //
analyzed: brahmāḍam vikṛtam jñeyam brahmāṇḍa antar khageśvara yā sṛṣṭiḥ ucyate sadbhiḥ sā eva uktā vikṛtā iti ca

original: sṛṣṭiśca pralayaścaiva saṃsāro bhaktireva ca / devatā ṛṣimukhyāśca lokā bhūrādayastathā //
analyzed: sṛṣṭiḥ ca pralayaḥ ca eva saṃsāraḥ bhaktiḥ eva ca devatāḥ ṛṣi mukhyāḥ ca lokāḥ bhūḥ ādayaḥ tathā

original: anādyanantakālīnāḥ sarvadaikaprakārakāḥ / jagatpravāhaḥ satyo 'yaṃ naiva mithyā kathañcana //
analyzed: anādi ananta kālīnāḥ sarvadā eka prakārakāḥ jagat pravāhaḥ satyaḥ yam nā eva mithyā kathañcana

original: yattvetadanyathā brūyuḥ sarvahantāra eva te / jagatpravāhaḥ satyo 'yaṃ harisevetisāthā //
analyzed: yat tu etat anyathā brūyuḥ sarva hantāraḥ eva te jagat pravāhaḥ satyaḥ yam

original: satyaṃ satyaṃ punaḥ satyamuddhatya bhujamutyate / vedācchāstraṃ paraṃ nāsti na devaḥ keśavātparaḥ //
analyzed: satyam satyam punar satyam uddhatya bhujam utyate  vedāt śāstram param nā asti na devaḥ keśavāt paraḥ

original: sarvotkṛṣṭaṃ keśavaṃ ca vihāyānyamupāsate / teṣāmandhaṃ tamo jñeyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ garuṇāmapi //
analyzed: sarva utkṛṣṭam keśavam ca vihāya anyam upāsate teṣām andham tamaḥ jñeyam pitṝṇām garuṇām api

original: idānīṃ śṛṇu pakṣīndra vaikṛtaṃ sargamuttamam / samyagjānāti yo loke sa yāti paramaṃ padam //
analyzed: idānīm śṛṇu pakṣi indra vaikṛtam sargam uttamam samyak jānāti yaḥ loke sa yāti paramam padam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe brahmāṇḍādivaikṛtaikadeśaprākṛtasṛṣṭinirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśamo
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde dvitīya aṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe brahmāṇḍādivaikṛtaikadeśaprākṛtasṛṣṭinirūpaṇam nāma daśamaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 11
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / puruṣākhyo hariḥ sākṣādbhagavānpuruṣottamaḥ / śiśyetvaṇḍodaka viṣṇurnṛṇāṃ sāhasravatsaram / lakṣmīścodakarūpeṇa śayyārūpeṇa bhoṇḍajā //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca puruṣa ākhyaḥ hariḥ sākṣāt bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ  śiśyet aṇḍa udaka viṣṇuḥ nṛṇām sāhasra vatsaram  lakṣmīḥ ca udaka rūpeṇa śayyā rūpeṇa bhoṇḍa jā

original: vidyā taraṅgarūpeṇa vāyurūpeṇa bhoṇḍaja //
analyzed: vidyā taraṅga rūpeṇa vāyu rūpeṇa bhoṇḍaja

original: tamorūpeṇa saivāsī nnānyadāsītkathañcana / asīdgarbhodake caiva nānyadāsītkathañcana //
analyzed: tamaḥ rūpeṇa sā eva āsīt na anyat āsīt kathañcana  asīt garbha udake ca eva na anyat āsīt kathañcana

original: lakṣmīstuṣṭāva ca hariṃ garbhode pakṣisattama / lakṣmīdharābhyāṃ rūpābhyāṃ prakṛtirhariṇā tathā //
analyzed: lakṣmīḥ tuṣṭāva ca harim garbhode pakṣi sattama lakṣmī dharābhyām rūpābhyām prakṛtiḥ hariṇā tathā

original: śeta śrutisvarūpeṇa stauti garbhodake harim / nārāyaṇa namaste 'stu śṛṇu vijñāpanaṃ mama //
analyzed: śeta śruti svarūpeṇa stauti garbha udake harim nārāyaṇa namaḥ te stu śṛṇu vijñāpanam mama

original: ajāṃ jahi mahābhāga yogyānāṃ muktimāvaha / ajā tu prakṛtiḥ proktā cāparā prakṛtiḥ parā //
analyzed: ajām jahi mahābhāga yogyānām muktim āvaha ajā tu prakṛtiḥ proktā ca aparā prakṛtiḥ parā

original: śatatovarā tu brahmāṇī brahmapatnī varānanā / umā śacyavarā tasyā avarāḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: tu brahmāṇī brahma patnī varānanā umā śacī avarā tasyāḥ avarāḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ

original: etāsāṃ hananaṃ naiva prārthayāmaḥ sadā hare / asti pratinṛṣu brahma prakṛtī dve vyavasthite //
analyzed: etāsām hananam nā eva prārthayāmaḥ sadā hare asti prati nṛṣu brahma prakṛtī dve vyavasthite

original: ekā tu nityasaṃsārā tvajaśabdābhidhāyikā / dvitīyā tu tamo 'pohyā ajaśabdābhidhāyikā //
analyzed: ekā tu nitya saṃsārā tu aja śabda abhidhāyikā dvitīyā tu aja śabda abhidhāyikā

original: ata eva tvaje jyeṣṭhe iti loke prakīrtite / sukhaduḥ khapradā caiva aparā duḥ khadaiva tu //
analyzed: atas eva tu aje jyeṣṭhe iti loke prakīrtite sukha duḥ kha pradā ca eva aparā duḥ kha dā eva tu

original: mokṣādhikāriṇāmeva jñānaiśvaryādayo gaṇāḥ / teṣāmācchādikā hokā tamoṅgā sā prakīrtitā //
analyzed: mokṣa adhikāriṇām eva jñāna aiśvarya ādayaḥ gaṇāḥ teṣām ācchādikā hokā tamoṅgā sā prakīrtitā

original: jīvaṃ prati mahāviṣṇuṃ pāhyācchādayati prabho / sā parā prakṛtirjñeyā paramācchādikā smṛtā //
analyzed: jīvam prati mahā viṣṇum pāhi ācchādayati prabho sā parā prakṛtiḥ jñeyā paramā ācchādikā smṛtā

original: evaṃ sā paramā duṣṭā hokā tamoṅgā tu prakīrtitā / jīvavargeṣveva khaga brahmādernāsti sā kvacit //
analyzed: evam sā paramā duṣṭā hokā tamoṅgā tu prakīrtitā jīva vargeṣu eva khaga brahma ādeḥ nā asti sā kvacid

original: piśācavatsamuddiṣṭā jīvasyetyadhikāriṇaḥ / prerikā tu tayordevyo stvahamādyā sukhātmikā //
analyzed: piśāca vat samuddiṣṭāḥ jīvasya iti adhikāriṇaḥ prerikā tu tayoḥ devyoḥ stu aham ādyā sukha ātmikā

original: tatra viṣṇo mahābhāga saguṇācchādako hitaḥ / paramācchādikāṃ duṣṭāṃ vyāmucyaiva mahāprabho //
analyzed: tatra viṣṇo mahābhāga sa guṇa ācchādakaḥ hitaḥ parama ācchādikām duṣṭām vyāmucya eva mahā prabho

original: mokṣaṃ dehi mahādeva tvadbhaktānāṃ mahāprabho / paramācchādikā hyasmānnitya saṃsāriṇo yataḥ //
analyzed: mokṣam dehi mahādeva tvad bhaktānām mahā prabho parama ācchādikāḥ hi asmān nitya saṃsāriṇaḥ yatas

original: ata eva ca nityatvāttasmāttadapasāraṇam / kuru deva mahābhāga iti vijñāyatāṃ mama //
analyzed: atas eva ca nitya tvāt tasmāt tad apasāraṇam kuru deva mahābhāgaḥ iti vijñāyatām mama

original: evaṃ stuto hariḥ kṛṣṇo suprabuddho 'pi sarbadā / udvuddhavanmahā viṣṇurabhūdajñaparīkṣayā //
analyzed: evam stutaḥ hariḥ kṛṣṇaḥ su prabuddhaḥ sarbadā  udvuddha vat mahā viṣṇuḥ abhūt ajña parīkṣayā

original: tasya nābherabhūtpadmaṃ sauvarṇaṃ bhuvanāśrayam / tatprākṛtaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ bhūdevī tvabhimāninī //
analyzed: tasya nābheḥ abhūt padmam sauvarṇam bhuvana āśrayam tat prākṛtam ca vijñeyam bhūdevī tu abhimāninī

original: anantasūryavaccaiva prakāśakaramīritam / cidānandamayo viṣṇustasmādbhinno na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: ananta sūrya vat ca eva prakāśa karam īritam cit ānanda mayaḥ viṣṇuḥ tasmāt bhinnaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: viṣṇoḥ svarūpabhūtaṃ ca ye vijānanti te narāḥ / te yānti hyadharaṃ lokaṃ tathā tatsaṃgisaṃginaḥ //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ sva rūpa bhūtam ca ye vijānanti te narāḥ te yānti hi adharam lokam tathā tad saṃgi saṃginaḥ

original: kirīṭādikavaccaiva jñātavyaṃ ca khageśvara / kirīṭādyā api harerdvidhā saṃti na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: kirīṭa ādika vat ca eva jñātavyam ca khageśvara kirīṭa ādyāḥ api hareḥ dvidhā saṃti na saṃśayaḥ

original: svarūpā hyasvarūpāśca svasvarūpani darśane / gṛhītā iti vijñeyā na svarūpāḥ khageśvara //
analyzed: sva rūpāḥ hi asva rūpāḥ ca darśane  gṛhītāḥ iti vijñeyāḥ na sva rūpāḥ khageśvara

original: bhmāṇḍaṃ hyasṛjattatra sarvalokavidhāyakam / pralaye muktihīnaśca supta ityucyate budhaḥ //
analyzed: bhmāṇḍam hi asṛjat tatra sarva loka vidhāyakam pralaye mukti hīnaḥ ca suptaḥ iti ucyate budhaḥ

original: tasya samivastrivaṃ ca na jñātavyā khageśvara / pralayopi mahābhāga brahmavāyvorna cāsti hi //
analyzed: ca na jñātavyā khageśvara pralayaḥ api mahābhāga brahma vāyvoḥ na ca asti hi

original: vṛttirūpaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ pādyārghyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ / indriyāṇāmuparatiḥ suptirityucyate budhaiḥ //
analyzed: vṛtti rūpam param jñānam pādya arghyam na atra saṃśayaḥ indriyāṇām uparatiḥ suptiḥ iti ucyate budhaiḥ

original: brahmavāyvośca pāsagni vāstavaṃ syātkhageśvara / kathaṃ tarhi tayorvarte hyavilatyatvamucyate //
analyzed: brahma vāyvoḥ ca vāstavam syāt khageśvara katham tarhi tayoḥ varte

original: tasmāttadvāstavaṃ nāsti brahmavāyvoḥ khageśvara / svapnāvasthāyāḥ sadṛśī hyavasthā suptisaṃjñikā //
analyzed: tasmāt tat vāstavam nā asti brahma vāyvoḥ khageśvara svapna avasthāyāḥ sadṛśī hi avasthā supti saṃjñikā

original: brahmaṇyamukhyayā vṛttyā hyastītyevaṃ nibodha me / ato na vāstavamidamaṅgīkāryaṃ khageśvara //
analyzed: brahmaṇya mukhyayā vṛttyā hi asti iti evam nibodha me  atas na vāstavam idam aṅgīkāryam khageśvara

original: vāstavaṃ ye vijānanti teṣāṃ nityaṃ dhanaṃ tapaḥ / śrīgaruḍa uvāca / suptistvajñānakāryatvātsuptirnāstītyudīritā //
analyzed: vāstavam ye vijānanti teṣām nityam dhanam tapaḥ  śrī garuḍaḥ uvāca suptiḥ tu ajñāna kārya tvāt suptiḥ na asti iti udīritā

original: yadā hi kāraṇaṃ cāsti tadā kāryamiti prabho / ityabhiprāyagarbheṇa tvaṃ samādhāsya te yadi //
analyzed: yadā hi kāraṇam ca asti tadā kāryam iti prabho iti abhiprāya garbheṇa tvam samādhāsya te yadi

original: tarhi tasya mahābhāga kathaṃ brūhi bhayādikam / bhayādikaṃ hyastu nāma kā vāsmākaṃ kṣatirbhavet //
analyzed: tarhi tasya mahābhāga katham brūhi bhaya ādikam bhaya ādikam hi astu nāma kā vā asmākam kṣatiḥ bhavet

original: evamuktastu govindobravīttatrāpi kāraṇam / bhayaṃ tvajñānakāryaṃ syātkāryākāraṇamatra hi //
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu govindaḥ bravīt tatra api kāraṇam bhayam tu ajñāna kāryam syāt kārya akāraṇam atra hi

original: prīyate matvā brahma tasmātsuptiśca tatra hi / ajñādikaṃ yadi brahma tasya na syātkathañcana //
analyzed: prīyate matvā brahma tasmāt suptiḥ ca tatra hi ajña ādikam yadi brahma tasya na syāt kathañcana

original: kathaṃ sukhī pradṛśyeta na kathañcitkariṣyati / kathaṃ vā muktiparyantaṃ jñānavyaktirvadasva me //
analyzed: katham sukhī pradṛśyeta na kathañcid kariṣyati katham vā mukti paryantam jñāna vyaktiḥ vadasva me

original: yadyajñānaṃ tasya satyaṃ na syāttarhi mahāprabho / atyādarātkathaṃ brahmañchravaṇaṃ kurute vada //
analyzed: yadi ajñānam tasya satyam na syāt tarhi mahā prabho atyādarāt katham brahman śravaṇam kurute vada

original: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā kṛṣṇo vacanamabravīt / bhayaṃ ca vāstavaṃ tasya na jānīhi mahāmate //
analyzed: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā kṛṣṇaḥ vacanam abravīt bhayam ca vāstavam tasya na jānīhi mahāmate

original: dṛśyate madbhayaṃ tasya hariprītyarthameva ca / bhayākāmavatīvānamuvāstavamīritam //
analyzed: dṛśyate mad bhayam tasya hari prīti artham eva ca

original: prāptaprābdhaleśasta tasya nāsti khageśvara / duḥ khājñānādikaṃ kiñcitkathaṃ tasmin bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: tasya nā asti khageśvara duḥ kha ajñāna ādikam kiñcid katham tasmin bhaviṣyati

original: viṣṇorājñānusāreṇa bhayāyānukarotyasau / tena prīṇāti ca haristasya nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ ājñā anusāreṇa bhayāya anukaroti asau tena prīṇāti ca hariḥ tasya na asti atra saṃśayaḥ

original: śṛṇoti satataṃ brahmā na cintyāttāvatājñatā / kadāciddṛśyate brahmā duḥ khī na ca khageśvara //
analyzed: śṛṇoti satatam brahmā na kadācid dṛśyate brahmā duḥ khī na ca khageśvara

original: yadbrahma ca na jānīyāddhariprītyarthameva ca / duḥ khivaddṛśyate brahmā ājñānāṃ mohanāya ca //
analyzed: yat brahma ca na jānīyāt hari prīti artham eva ca duḥ khi vat dṛśyate brahmā ājñānām mohanāya ca

original: yogyatāmanatikramya yāvajjñānaṃ ca tiṣṭhati / brahmaṇastāvadevāsti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: yogyatām an atikramya yāvat jñānam ca tiṣṭhati brahmaṇaḥ tāvat eva asti na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: jñānasya vyaktatā nāma vidyamānasya cādarāt / jñānasyāsādanaṃ caiva jñānavyaktiriti smṛtā //
analyzed: jñānasya vyakta tā nāma vidyamānasya ca ādarāt jñānasya āsādanam ca eva jñāna vyaktiḥ iti smṛtā

original: ato jñānādikaṃ nāsti brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ / padmāddhiraṇma yājjāto brahmā tu caturānanaḥ //
analyzed: atas jñāna ādikam nā asti brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ padmāt hiraṇma yāt jātaḥ brahmā tu caturānanaḥ

original: sarvadā'locanāyuktastena svālocanaṃ kṛtam / ajñānāṃ mohanārthāya hariprītyarthameva ca //
analyzed: sarvadā ālocanā yuktaḥ tena sva ālocanam kṛtam ajñānām mohana arthāya hari prīti artham eva ca

original: saṃkalpopi tathaivāsti na hyajñānātkṛtastathā / ko vā māṃ sṛṣṭavānatra iti hyālocya sa prabhuḥ //
analyzed: saṃkalpaḥ api tathā evā asti na hi ajñānāt kṛtaḥ tathā  kaḥ vā mām sṛṣṭavān atra iti hi ālocya sa prabhuḥ

original: taṃ vicārayituṃ brahmā padmanāḍīṃ viveśa ha //
analyzed: tam vicārayitum brahmā padma nāḍīm viveśa ha

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛthṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'jñānahetunirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe śrī kṛthṇa garuḍa saṃvāde jñānahetunirūpaṇam nāma ekādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 12
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / nāḍīṃ samāviśya mahānubhāvaḥ śrīviṣṇubhakto tvatha puṣkarasthaḥ / vicārayāmāsa guruṃ svamūlaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ nirguṇamadvitīyam //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca nāḍīm samāviśya mahā anubhāvaḥ tu atha puṣkara sthaḥ vicārayāmāsa gurum sva mūlam nārāyaṇam nirguṇam advitīyam

original: etāvatā haribhaktasya tasyāpyacchinnabhaktasya caturmukhasya / vicārakāle ca vicintanīyo hyajñānaleśastu khageśvareśvara //
analyzed: etāvatā hari bhaktasya tasya api acchinna bhaktasya caturmukhasya vicāra kāle ca vicintanīyaḥ hi ajñāna leśaḥ tu khageśvara īśvara

original: yathāsti viṣṇormanaḥ saṅkalpa eva tathaiva sopi prakaroti nityam / ālocane tasya sadāsti bhūmansvayogyatāmanatikramya caiva //
analyzed: yathā asti viṣṇoḥ manaḥ saṅkalpaḥ eva tathā eva saḥ api prakaroti nityam ālocane tasya sadā asti bhūman sva yogyatām an atikramya ca eva

original: hareḥ svarūpe ca tathā prapañcaḥ svasminsvarūpe ca khagasti jñānam / yathāpi nityaṃ paricāravāri ca ajñātavaddṛśyate viṣṇunā ca //
analyzed: hareḥ svarūpe ca tathā prapañcaḥ svasmin svarūpe ca khagaḥ asti jñānam yathā api nityam paricāra vāri ca ajñāta vat dṛśyate viṣṇunā ca

original: hareḥ prītyarthaṃ kurute sau kadāccittatrāpi kaścidviśeṣo 'sti vīndra / śṛṇuṣva samyaṅnigṛhītacitto yathā provāca sa vijānāti devaḥ //
analyzed: hareḥ prīti artham kurute sau kadāccid tatra api kaścid viśeṣaḥ sti vi indra śṛṇuṣva samyak nigṛhīta cittaḥ yathā provāca sa vijānāti devaḥ

original: sadā tvadoṣaṃ praviśeṣeśca muktavedāstathā vā pavijānanti nityam / tasya svarūpaṃ na tathā hariṃ ca svayogyatāmanatikramya vedhāḥ //
analyzed: sadā tu adoṣam mukta vedāḥ tathā vā nityam  tasya sva rūpam na tathā harim ca sva yogya tām an atikramya vedhāḥ

original: hareḥ svarūpaṃ na vijānāti sarvaṃ svayo gyarūpaṃ sarvadā vetti viṣṇoḥ / tatrājñānaṃ nāsti kiñciddvijendra yāvatsvarūpaṃ ca tathaiva lakṣmyāḥ //
analyzed: hareḥ sva rūpam na vijānāti sarvam svayo gya rūpam sarvadā vetti viṣṇoḥ  tatra ajñānam na asti kiñcid dvijendra yāvat sva rūpam ca tathā eva lakṣmyāḥ

original: vedhā na jānāti kutastadanye tayoḥ svarūpaṃna vijānāti sarvam / tathāpi vedānekadeśena veda jānāti lakṣmīrharirūpaṃ ca yāvat //
analyzed: vedhāḥ na jānāti kutas tad anye tayoḥ svarūpam na vijānāti sarvam tathā api vedān eka deśena veda jānāti lakṣmīḥ hari rūpam ca yāvat

original: tāvanna jānāti vidhiḥ khagendra jñāne vidhātuśca svayogyabhūte / ato viriñcasya na cintanīyo hyajñānaleśaḥ kvāpi deśe ca kāle //
analyzed: tāvat na jānāti vidhiḥ khaga indra jñāne vidhātuḥ ca sva yogya bhūte  atas viriñcasya na cintanīyaḥ hi ajñāna leśaḥ kvāpi deśe ca kāle

original: nāḍīṃ samāviśya tadā viriñco na veda nārāyaṇamekavacca / tadā śṛṇottaṃ kamalāsanaṃ prabhustapastapa dvyakṣaraṃ sādareṇa //
analyzed: nāḍīm samāviśya tadā viriñcaḥ na veda nārāyaṇam eka vat ca tadā śṛṇot tam kamalāsanam prabhuḥ tapaḥ tapa dvi akṣaram sa ādareṇa

original: abhiprāyaṃ tasya samyagvidittvā tapaḥ kuru tvaṃ harituṣṭyarthameva / tapo 'karoddharipādaika niṣṭho hareḥ prītyarthaṃ divyasahasravarṣam //
analyzed: abhiprāyam tasya samyak vidittvā tapaḥ kuru tvam hari tuṣṭi artham eva tapo karot hari pāda eka niṣṭhaḥ hareḥ prīti artham divya sahasra varṣam

original: tato hariḥ prādurāsītkhagendra varaṃ dātuṃ bhaktavarasya divyam / sadā viṣṇuṃ devadevo dadarśa caturbhujaṃ taṃ jalajāyatākṣam //
analyzed: tatas hariḥ prādurāsīt khaga indra varam dātum bhakta varasya divyam sadā viṣṇum devadevaḥ dadarśa catur bhujam tam jala jāyata akṣam

original: śrīvatsalakṣmaṃ galaśobhikaustubhaṃ saṃpaśyantaṃ suprasannārdradṛṣṭyā / dṛṣṭvā hariṃ brahma nārāyaṇaṃ ca puraḥ sthitaṃ bhaktavaśyaṃ dayālum //
analyzed: śrīvatsa lakṣmam gala śobhi kaustubham saṃpaśyantam su prasanna ārdra dṛṣṭyā dṛṣṭvā harim brahma nārāyaṇam ca puras sthitam bhakta vaśyam dayālum

original: samarcayāmāsa mahāvibhūtyā bhaktyā hareḥ pādatīrthaṃ dadhāra / astaunmahābhāgavatapradhāno hariṃ guruṃ bhaktivivardhitātmā //
analyzed: samarcayāmāsa mahā vibhūtyā bhaktyā hareḥ pāda tīrtham dadhāra astaut mahābhāgavata pradhānaḥ harim gurum bhakti vivardhita ātmā

original: brahmovāca / rameśa lokeśa jagannivāsa tava svarūpaṃ na vijānāti devī / tava prasādātsuvijānāti devī guṇānvedoktānsarvadā vīndra sarvān //
analyzed: brahmā uvāca rama īśa lokeśa jagannivāsa tava sva rūpam na vijānāti devī tava prasādāt su vijānāti devī guṇān veda uktān sarvadā vīndra sarvān

original: tathāpi sā na vijānāti devī sākalyenāśeṣitaḥ sadguṇāṃśca / yadyapyanuktaṃ pañcabhirnāsti vedaistathāpi deve 'tra viśeṣa āste //
analyzed: tathā api sā na vijānāti devī sākalyena aśeṣitaḥ sat guṇān ca yadi api anuktam pañcabhiḥ na asti vedaiḥ tathā api deve viśeṣaḥ āste

original: tattvecchavaḥ pravijānanti nityaṃ vede sūktānkvāpyanuktāṃśca sarvān / ādau jānantyatra vedā murāre ṛgādayaḥ suṣṭhu catvāra eva //
analyzed: tattva icchavaḥ pravijānanti nityam vede sūktān kvāpi anuktān ca sarvān  ādau jānanti atra vedāḥ murāre ṛk ādayaḥ suṣṭhu catvāraḥ eva

original: vedā hyete vedayantīti deva tathā purāṇaṃ bhārataṃ pañcarātram / kramādito vicintya sā viṣṇuguṇānsvayogyānsadā vijānāti ramāpi devī //
analyzed: vedāḥ hi ete vedayanti iti deva tathā purāṇam bhāratam pañcarātram kramāt itas vicintya sā viṣṇu guṇān sva yogyān sadā vijānāti ramā api devī

original: viśeṣato hyuktaguṇā nṛgādiṣu svayogyabhūtānsaṃvijānāti devī / sāmānyataḥ pravijānāti devī harerguṇānna viśeṣācca nityam //
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ hi ukta guṇā nṛga ādiṣu sva yogya bhūtān saṃvijānāti devī sāmānyatas pravijānāti devī hareḥ guṇān na viśeṣāt ca nityam

original: ahaṃ vijānāmi ramāpra sādāttava prasādācca guṇānsadaiva / svayogyabhūtāñchrutipūktān guṇāṃśca kāṃścidvijānāti harerna kaścit //
analyzed: aham vijānāmi ramā pra sādāt tava prasādāt ca guṇān sadā eva sva yogya bhūtān śrutipu uktān guṇān ca kāṃścid vijānāti hareḥ na kaścid

original: tava prasādācca mama prasādātkālāntare tāṃśca jānāti śeṣaḥ / duṣkarmaleśānna tirohitān guṇānyāneva pūrvaṃ viditān svayogyān //
analyzed: tava prasādāt ca mama prasādāt kāla antare tān ca jānāti śeṣaḥ duṣkarma leśāt na tirohitān guṇān yān eva pūrvam viditān sva yogyān

original: tāneva jñātvā punareva śeṣastiro hitāṃllabdhaguṇastataḥ smṛtaḥ / sadā svayogyāṃśca harerguṇāṃśca umāpatiścāpi tava prasādāt //
analyzed: tān eva jñātvā punar eva śeṣaḥ tiras hitān labdha guṇaḥ tatas smṛtaḥ sadā sva yogyān ca hareḥ guṇān ca umāpatiḥ ca api tava prasādāt

original: yadā vijānāti hare murāre aprāptalabdheti tadocyate haraḥ / mamāpi lokaṃ ca yadā murāre tadā vijānāti tava svarūpam //
analyzed: yadā vijānāti hare murāre aprāpta labdhā iti tadā ucyate haraḥ mama api lokam ca yadā murāre tadā vijānāti tava svarūpam

original: govinda nityāvyaya citsupūrṇa tava prasādānnāsti śateṣu tanmamayeye hi devāśca śarīradhāriṇaste jñānahīnā viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāḥ //
analyzed: govinda nitya avyaya cit su pūrṇa tava prasādāt na asti śateṣu tat mama yeye hi devāḥ ca śarīra dhāriṇaḥ te jñāna hīnāḥ viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāḥ

original: yeye devā viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāstete devā bahirarthabhāvāḥ / yeye devā bahirarthabhāvā mokṣā danye pralapantaḥ sadaiva //
analyzed: ye ye devāḥ viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāḥ te ite devāḥ bahirartha bhāvāḥ ye ye devāḥ bahirartha bhāvāḥ mokṣāḥ danye pralapantaḥ sadā eva

original: tava svarūpe ca jagatsvarūpe tavāsamānaṃ nāsti viṣṇo sadaiva / yatastava prākṛto nāsti deho yato jñānaṃ nāsti nāstye va nityam //
analyzed: tava sva rūpe ca jagat sva rūpe tava asamānam nā asti viṣṇo sadā eva yatas tava prākṛtaḥ nā asti dehaḥ yatas jñānam nā asti nityam

original: pūrṇānandajñānadeho 'pi nityaṃ sadā śarīrī bhāṣyate bhaktimadbhiḥ / yatastava prākṛto nāsti deho hyatopi nityamaśarīrīti ca smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: nityam sadā śarīrī bhāṣyate bhaktimadbhiḥ yatas tava prākṛtaḥ nā asti dehaḥ hi atas api nityam aśarīrī iti ca smṛtaḥ

original: nato 'haṃ sarvadāsmiñśarīre 'haṃmametyabhimānena śūnyaḥ / atto 'pyahaṃ tvaśarīrī sadaiva tathaiva nityaṃ bahirarthaiśca śūnyaḥ //
analyzed: nataḥ ham sarvadā asmin śarīre ham mama iti abhimānena śūnyaḥ attaḥ pi aham tu aśarīrī sadā eva tathā eva nityam bahis arthaiḥ ca śūnyaḥ

original: svabhogabhāryāsatyalokādibhogaḥ svayogyabhogo vastramālyādibhogaḥ / ete hi sarve bahirarthasaṃjñakāḥ naisargakāmāḥ sarvadā me hi viṣṇo //
analyzed: sva bhoga bhāryā satya loka ādi bhogaḥ sva yogya bhogaḥ vastra mālya ādi bhogaḥ ete hi sarve bahis artha saṃjñakāḥ naisarga kāmāḥ sarvadā me hi viṣṇo

original: tathāpyahaṃ kāmahīno hi nityaṃ rudrādayaḥ kāmavanto yatotaḥ / śarīriṇaste bahirarthabhāvā ajñānavanto 'pi ca saṃsmṛtāḥ khaga //
analyzed: tathā api aham kāma hīnaḥ hi nityam rudra ādayaḥ kāmavantaḥ yatas utas śarīriṇaḥ te bahirartha bhāvāḥ ajñānavantaḥ ca saṃsmṛtāḥ khaga

original: svadārabhoge kevalāṃ prītimevaṃ harerevaṃ sarvadāhaṃ karoti / stambāstrādīndhāriyiṣye sadaiva viṣṇoḥ prītyarthaṃ naiva gātrārthameva //
analyzed: sva dāra bhoge kevalām prītim evam hareḥ evam sarvadā aham karoti stamba astra ādīn dhāriyiṣye sadā eva viṣṇoḥ prīti artham na eva gātra artham eva

original: nityānandādanyakāmo na mesti ataḥ sadā bahirarthaiśca śūnyaḥ / mamāpi bhāryā bahirarthaśūnyā amūḍhabhāvā mūḍhavatīva dṛśyate //
analyzed: nitya ānandāt anya kāmaḥ na me sti atas sadā bahis arthaiḥ ca śūnyaḥ mama api bhāryā bahis artha śūnyā amūḍha bhāvā mūḍhavatī iva dṛśyate

original: amūḍhabhūtā jñānināṃ sarvadaiva tathājñānāṃ jñānahīneti bhāti / yāvajjñānaṃ cāsti me vāstudeva tāvajjñānaṃ vāsudevasya cāsti //
analyzed: amūḍha bhūtā jñāninām sarvadā eva tathā ajñānām jñāna hīnā iti bhāti yāvat jñānam ca asti me vāstudeva tāvat jñānam vāsudevasya ca asti

original: yāvajjñānaṃ vāsudevasya cāsti tāvajjñānaṃ jñānavatāmṛjūnām / krameṇaivājñānināṃ vānṛjūnāmaspaṣṭarūpo jñānagato viśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: yāvat jñānam vāsudevasya ca asti tāvat jñānam jñānavatām ṛjūnām krameṇa eva ajñāninām vā anṛjūnām aspaṣṭa rūpaḥ jñāna gataḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: sauriprakāśe ca yathaiva darśanaṃ tathā mama jñānagato viśeṣaḥ / dīpaprakāśe ca yathaiva darśanaṃ tathā jñānaṃ vāsudevasya cāsti //
analyzed: sauri prakāśe ca yathā eva darśanam tathā mama jñāna gataḥ viśeṣaḥ dīpa prakāśe ca yathā eva darśanam tathā jñānam vāsudevasya ca asti

original: aspaṣṭaparūpā nyūnatā hyasti vāyau tathā jñānaṃ naiva saṃcintanīyam / etādṛśī jñānaśaktirmurārervāyvādīnāṃ mokṣaparyantamasti //
analyzed: nyūna tā hi asti vāyau tathā jñānam na eva saṃcintanīyam etādṛśī jñānaśaktiḥ murāreḥ vāyu ādīnām mokṣa paryantam asti

original: jñānaṃ tvṛjūnāṃ mokṣakāle pipañcavāyvādīnāṃ pralayenādrādīrna / vāyormama pralaye sṛṣṭikāle tathā gāyatryā nāstināstyeva mohaḥ //
analyzed: jñānam tu ṛjūnām mokṣa kāle pipañca vāyu ādīnām pralayena adrādīḥ na vāyoḥ mama pralaye sṛṣṭi kāle tathā gāyatryāḥ na asti na asti eva mohaḥ

original: gāyatrīvadbhāratyā devadeva jñātavyamevaṃ haritattvavedibhiḥ / mamājñānaṃ dṛśyate yatra kutra daityādīnāṃ mohanārtha sadaiva //
analyzed: gāyatrī vat bhāratyā devadeva jñātavyam evam hari tattva vedibhiḥ mama ajñānam dṛśyate yatra kutra daitya ādīnām mohana artha sadā eva

original: tena prītirdevadevasya viṣṇarbhaviṣyatītyeva viniścitātmā / praśrādikaṃ tvajñavatsarvadaivaṃ kariṣyehaṃ mohanāyādhamānām //
analyzed: tena prītiḥ devadevasya viṣṇar bhaviṣyati iti eva viniścita ātmā tu ajña vat sarvadā evam kariṣye iham mohanāya adhamānām

original: sūryodaye nāsti yathā tamaśca tathājñānaṃ nāstināstyeva deva / karomyahaṃ śravaṇaṃ sarvadaiva hariprītyarthaṃ niścatārthaṃ satāṃ hi //
analyzed: sūrya udaye nā asti yathā tamaḥ ca tathā ajñānam nā asti nā asti eva deva karomi aham śravaṇam sarvadā eva hari prīti artham niścata artham satām hi

original: śatajanmagatānāṃ tvanṛjūnāṃ pūrvameva tu / aparokṣābhāva eva hyajñānaṃ samudīritam //
analyzed: śata janma gatānām tu anṛjūnām pūrvam eva tu aparokṣa abhāvaḥ eva hi ajñānam samudīritam

original: aparokṣānantaraṃ tu nāstyajñānaṃ na saṃśayaḥ / śatajanmasu deveśa aparokṣeṇa sarvadā //
analyzed: aparokṣa anantaram tu na asti ajñānam na saṃśayaḥ śata janmasu deveśa aparokṣeṇa sarvadā

original: pūrṇajñānaṃ mamāstyeva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / śatajanmasu pūrvaṃ tu parokṣeṇa mama prabho //
analyzed: pūrṇa jñānam mama asti eva na atra kāryā vicāraṇā śata janmasu pūrvam tu parokṣeṇa mama prabho

original: pūrṇaṃ jñānaṃ sadāpyastītyevamāhurmaharṣayaḥ / saṃjñājanmagatāyāśca sarasvatyā mahāprabho //
analyzed: pūrṇam jñānam sadā api asti iti evam āhuḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ saṃjñā janma gatāyāḥ ca sarasvatyāḥ mahā prabho

original: nājñānaṃ cintanīyaṃ hi brahmayvośca deva hi / atra kaścidviśeṣosti jñātavyastatvamicchubhiḥ //
analyzed: na ajñānam cintanīyam hi deva hi

original: avatāreṣu bhāratyāḥ kadācijjñānapūrvakam / sarvadā jñānarūpā sā sarvaduḥ khavivarjitā //
analyzed: avatāreṣu bhāratyāḥ kadācid jñāna pūrvakam sarvadā jñāna rūpā sā sarva duḥ kha vivarjitā

original: daityānāṃ mohanārthāya aṃśe duḥ khīva dṛśyate / tasyā duḥ khādikaṃ kiñcinnāstināstyeva sarvathā //
analyzed: daityānām mohana arthāya aṃśe duḥ khī iva dṛśyate tasyāḥ duḥ kha ādikam kiñcid na asti na asti eva sarvathā

original: aparokṣatirobhāva īṣatkāle pradṛśyate / tāvanmātreṇa vājñānaṃ tasyāṃ naivāhitaṃ ca yat //
analyzed: aparokṣa tirobhāvaḥ īṣat kāle pradṛśyate tāvat mātreṇa vā ajñānam tasyām na eva āhitam ca yat

original: mūlarūpe tu nāstyeva bhāratyā jñānavismṛtiḥ / bhāratyāstu yathā nāsti sarasvatyāstu kiṃ punaḥ //
analyzed: mūla rūpe tu na asti eva bhāratyāḥ jñāna vismṛtiḥ bhāratyāḥ tu yathā na asti sarasvatyāḥ tu kim punar

original: aṃśāvataraṇaṃ nāsti sarasvatyāḥ kadācana / aṃśāvataraṇaṃ nāsti mamāpi madhusūdana //
analyzed: aṃśāvataraṇam na asti sarasvatyāḥ kadācana aṃśāvataraṇam na asti mama api madhusūdana

original: tathaiva jñānamastyeva harernārāyaṇasya ca / vāyoraṃśāvatārosti yathā mūle tathaiva ca //
analyzed: tathā eva jñānam asti eva hareḥ nārāyaṇasya ca vāyoḥ aṃśa avatāraḥ usti yathā mūle tathā eva ca

original: balajñānā dikaṃ sarvaṃ cintanīyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ / tathāpi vāyau dṛśyante balajñānādivyaktayaḥ //
analyzed: bala jñānā ā dikam sarvam cintanīyam na saṃśayaḥ tathā api vāyau dṛśyante bala jñāna ādi vyaktayaḥ

original: avatāreṣu vāyostu samyak śaktyātmanāsti hi / aparokṣatirobhāvau nāṃśāvataraṇeṣvapi //
analyzed: avatāreṣu vāyoḥ tu samyak śakti ātmanā asti hi aparokṣa tirobhāvau na aṃśa avataraṇeṣu api

original: balajñānādikaṃ yāvanmūlarūpe pradṛśyate / tretāyugasvarūpe ca na darśayati tādṛśam //
analyzed: bala jñāna ādikam yāvat mūla rūpe pradṛśyate tretā yuga sva rūpe ca na darśayati tādṛśam

original: tretāyugasvarūpe ca yādṛk cādarśayatprabho / dvāparasthe svarūpe tattaddarśayati tādṛśam / tretāyugasvarūpe ca yādṛk cādarśayatprabho //
analyzed: tretā yuga sva rūpe ca yādṛś ca adarśayat prabho dvāpara sthe sva rūpe tat tat darśayati tādṛśam tretā yuga sva rūpe ca yādṛś ca adarśayat prabho

original: dvāparasthe vāyurūpe yādṛgvā darśayatprabhuḥ / vāyuḥ kaliyuge rūpe taddarśayati tādṛśam //
analyzed: dvāpara sthe vāyu rūpe yādṛś vā darśayat prabhuḥ vāyuḥ kali yuge rūpe tat darśayati tādṛśam

original: tathā darśayate vāyurdaityānāṃ mohanāya ca / avatāreṣu vāyośca antaraṃ ye viduḥ prabho //
analyzed: tathā darśayate vāyuḥ daityānām mohanāya ca avatāreṣu vāyoḥ ca antaram ye viduḥ prabho

original: te 'dhaṃ tamaḥ praviśante te daityā na ca te surāḥ / vāyāvapyantaraṃ nāsti haritattvavinirṇaye //
analyzed: te dhaṃ tamaḥ praviśante te daityāḥ na ca te surāḥ vāyau api antaram na asti hari tattva vinirṇaye

original: nindāṃ kurvanti ye viṣṇorjihvāchedaṃ karomyaham / tadarthameva vāyośca avatāraḥ sadā bhuvi //
analyzed: nindām kurvanti ye viṣṇoḥ jihvā chedam karomi aham tad artham eva vāyoḥ ca avatāraḥ sadā bhuvi

original: guṇapūrṇasya viṣṇostu nirguṇatvavicintanam / jātānandādipūrṇāṅkhyaṃ sohamityādicintanam //
analyzed: guṇa pūrṇasya viṣṇoḥ tu nirguṇa tva vicintanam jāta ānanda ādi pūrṇa āṅkhyam saḥ ham ityādi cintanam

original: cidānandātmake dehe utpattyādivicintanam / acchedyābhedyagātreṣu cchedabhedādicintanam //
devyā nityāviyoginyā viyogādivicintanam / kleśaśokādiśūnyasya hareḥ kleśādicintanam //
analyzed: devyāḥ nitya aviyoginyāḥ viyoga ādi vicintanam kleśa śoka ādi śūnyasya hareḥ kleśa ādi cintanam

original: vyāsarāmādirūpeṣvanṛṣivipratvacintanam / kṛṣṇarāmādirūpeṣu antarasya vicintanam //
analyzed: vyāsa rāma ādi rūpeṣu an ṛṣi vipra tva cintanam kṛṣṇa rāma ādi rūpeṣu antarasya vicintanam

original: rāmakṛṣṇādirūpeṣu antarasya vicintanam / rāmakṛṣṇādirūpeṣu parājayavicintanam //
analyzed: rāma kṛṣṇa ādi rūpeṣu antarasya vicintanam rāma kṛṣṇa ādi rūpeṣu parājaya vicintanam

original: santānārthaṃ tu kṛṣṇe na śivapūjādicintanam / rāmeṇa duḥ khayuktena liṅgasya sthāpanaṃ kṛtam //
analyzed: santāna artham tu kṛṣṇe na śiva pūjā ādi cintanam rāmeṇa duḥ kha yuktena liṅgasya sthāpanam kṛtam

original: pañcadhātumaye kṛṣṇe harirūpavicintanam / svayaṃ vyaktasthale cāpi cidā nandatvakalpanam //
analyzed: pañca dhātu maye kṛṣṇe hari rūpa vicintanam svayam vyakta sthale ca api citā nanda tva kalpanam

original: pitṛmātṛdvijātīnāṃ harirūpatvacintanam / asvatantreṇa rudreṇa hareraikyadicintanam //
analyzed: pitṛ mātṛ dvijātīnām hari rūpa tva cintanam asvatantreṇa rudreṇa hareḥ aikya di cintanam

original: viṣṇoḥ sūryeṇa sākaṃ ca abhedā divicintanam / sarvottamaḥ sūrya eva viṣṇvādyāstasya kiṅkarāḥ //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ sūryeṇa sākam ca abhedāḥ divicintanam sarva uttamaḥ sūryaḥ eva viṣṇu ādyāḥ tasya kiṅkarāḥ

original: ityādicintanaṃ doṣo harinindeti cocyate / asvayaṃ vyaktiliṅgeṣu aśvatthatulasīṣu ca //
analyzed: ityādi cintanam doṣaḥ hari nindā iti ca ucyate asvayam vyakti liṅgeṣu aśvattha tulasīṣu ca

original: śālagrāmaṃ vihāyaiva namanaṃ ye prakurvate / te sarve harinindāyāmavikāriṇa eva hi //
analyzed: śālagrāmam vihāya eva namanam ye prakurvate te sarve hari nindāyām avikāriṇaḥ eva hi

original: mokṣādhikāriṇo ye tu ajñānātparameśvaram / pārthakyanayanaṃ yeṣu kurvanti yarhi vā prabho //
analyzed: mokṣa adhikāriṇaḥ ye tu ajñānāt parameśvaram pārthakya nayanam yeṣu kurvanti yarhi vā prabho

original: tarhi teṣāṃ hi kāleṣu duḥ khaṃ yāti na saṃśayaḥ / ataḥ prārthakyanayanaṃ ye kurvantyeṣu sarvadā //
analyzed: tarhi teṣām hi kāleṣu duḥ kham yāti na saṃśayaḥ atas prārthakya nayanam ye kurvanti eṣu sarvadā

original: te sarve tvabudhā jñeyā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / asvayaṃvyaktaliṅgeṣu namanaṃ ye prakurvate //
analyzed: te sarve tu abudhāḥ jñeyāḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā asvayam vyakta liṅgeṣu namanam ye prakurvate

original: te sarve hyasurā jñeyā nānyathā tu kathañcana / vihāya śūnyamaśvatthaṃ namanaṃ ye prakurvate //
analyzed: te sarve hi asurāḥ jñeyāḥ na anyathā tu kathañcana vihāya śūnyam aśvattham namanam ye prakurvate

original: dvimāsahīnāṃ tulasīmaprasūtāṃ ca gāṃ navām / te sarve hyasurā jñeyā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: dvi māsa hīnām tulasīm aprasūtām ca gām navām te sarve hi asurāḥ jñeyāḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: gulmādyāśca manuṣyāntāste jñeyā brahmabāhavaḥ / asmacchatāyuḥ paryantameka eva kaliḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: gulma ādyāḥ ca manuṣya antāḥ te jñeyāḥ brahma bāhavaḥ asmad śata āyuḥ paryantam ekaḥ eva kaliḥ smṛtaḥ

original: kalau saṃti kalpamānaṃ kalerante saṃti ca / tasmindine brahmarūpe gacchanti ca tamontikam //
analyzed: kalau saṃti kalpamānam kaleḥ ante saṃti ca tasmin dine brahma rūpe gacchanti ca tamaḥ ntikam

original: tatra sthitvā lokamārgaṃ pratīkṣante na saṃśayaḥ / sādhakairviṣṇukāryāṇāṃ vāyudāsaiḥ prapīḍitāḥ //
analyzed: tatra sthitvā loka mārgam pratīkṣante na saṃśayaḥ sādhakaiḥ viṣṇu kāryāṇām vāyudāsaiḥ prapīḍitāḥ

original: śatavarṣānantaraṃ ca sarveṣāṃ kalinā saha / vāyorgadāprahāreṇa liṅgabhaṅgo bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: śata varṣa anantaram ca sarveṣām kalinā saha vāyoḥ gadā prahāreṇa liṅga bhaṅgaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tamondhaṃ praviśantyete tāratamyena sarvaśaḥ / tamasyandhepi saṃsāre nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: tamaḥ undham praviśanti ete tāratamyena sarvaśas tamasi andhe api saṃsāre na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: sarveṣāmuttamonte yaḥ kalireva na saṃśayaḥ / dūṣako viṣṇubhaktānāṃ tatsamo nāsti sarvadā //
analyzed: sarveṣām uttamaḥ ante yaḥ kaliḥ eva na saṃśayaḥ dūṣakaḥ viṣṇu bhaktānām tad samaḥ nā asti sarvadā

original: saṃsāre vāndhatamasi sarvatra haridūṣakaḥ / mithyādāne jñānabuddhirduḥ khe ca sukhabuddhimān //
analyzed: saṃsāre vā andha tamasi sarvatra hari dūṣakaḥ mithyā dāne jñāna buddhiḥ duḥ khe ca sukha buddhimān

original: tasmātkalisamo loke śivabhakto na kutracit / duryodhanaḥ sa evokto duḥ khānantyasvarūpavān //
analyzed: tasmāt kali samaḥ loke śiva bhaktaḥ na kutracid  duryodhanaḥ saḥ eva uktaḥ duḥ kha ānantya sva rūpavān

original: tasmācchataguṇāṃśena kalibhāryā tu sarvadā / alakṣmīriti vikhyātā sā loke mantharā smṛtā //
analyzed: tasmāt śataguṇa aṃśena kali bhāryā tu sarvadā alakṣmīḥ iti vikhyātā sā loke mantharā smṛtā

original: tasmāddaśaguṇāṃśono vipracittistu sarvadā / jarāsaṃdhaḥ sa evoktaḥ kālanemistataḥ param //
analyzed: tasmāt daśaguṇa aṃśa ūnaḥ vipracittiḥ tu sarvadā jarāsaṃdhaḥ saḥ eva uktaḥ kālanemiḥ tatas param

original: tasmācchataguṇāṃśonaḥ sa tu kaṃseti viśrutaḥ / tasmātpañcaguṇairhīnau madhukraiṭabhasaṃjñakau //
analyzed: tasmāt śataguṇa aṃśa ūnaḥ sa tu kaṃsa iti viśrutaḥ tasmāt pañcaguṇaiḥ hīnau madhu kraiṭabha saṃjñakau

original: tāveva haṃsahiḍaṃbakau jñeyau tau ca janārdana / vipracittisamo jñeyo bhaumo vai bhūtale smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tau eva haṃsa hiḍaṃbakau jñeyau tau ca janārdana vipracitti samaḥ jñeyaḥ bhaumaḥ vai bhū tale smṛtaḥ

original: tasmādaṣṭa guṇairucyo hariṇyakaśiṣuḥ smṛtaḥ / tasmācca triguṇairhīno hiraṇyākṣo mahāsuraḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt aṣṭa guṇaiḥ ucyaḥ hariṇyakaśiṣuḥ smṛtaḥ tasmāt ca triguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ hiraṇyākṣaḥ mahā asuraḥ

original: maṇimāṃstatsamo jñeyaḥ kiñcidūno bakaḥ smṛtaḥ / tasmādviṃśadguṇairhīnastārakākhyo mahāsuraḥ //
analyzed: maṇimān tad samaḥ jñeyaḥ kiñcid ūnaḥ bakaḥ smṛtaḥ tasmāt viṃśadguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ tāraka ākhyaḥ mahā asuraḥ

original: tasmātṣaḍguṇato hīnaḥ śaṃbaro lokakaṇṭakaḥ / śaṃbarasya samo jñeyaḥ śālvo daityeṣu cādhamaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt ṣaḍguṇataḥ hīnaḥ śaṃbaraḥ loka kaṇṭakaḥ śaṃbarasya samaḥ jñeyaḥ śālvaḥ daityeṣu ca adhamaḥ

original: śaṃbarāttu dviguṇato hiḍiṃbo nyūna ucyate / bāṇastato 'dhamo jñeyaḥ sa tu kīcakanāmataḥ //
analyzed: śaṃbarāt tu dviguṇataḥ hiḍiṃbaḥ nyūnaḥ ucyate bāṇaḥ tatas dhamaḥ jñeyaḥ sa tu kīcaka nāmataḥ

original: dvāpārakhyo mahāhāsobāṇāsurasamaḥ smṛtaḥ / tasmāddaśaguṇairhīno namucidaityasattamaḥ //
analyzed: dvāpā rakhyaḥ mahā hāsaḥ bāṇāsura samaḥ smṛtaḥ tasmāt daśaguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ namuci daitya sattamaḥ

original: namucestusamau jñeyau pāka ilvala ityubhau / tasmāccaturguṇairhīno vātāpirdānavādhamaḥ //
analyzed: namuceḥ tu samau jñeyau pākaḥ ilvalaḥ iti ubhau tasmāt caturguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ vātāpiḥ dānava adhamaḥ

original: tasmātsārdhaguṇairhīno dhenuko nāma daityarāṭ / dhenukādardhaguṇataḥ keśī daityastu cāvaraḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt sārdha guṇaiḥ hīnaḥ dhenukaḥ nāma daitya rāj dhenukāt ardha guṇataḥ keśī daityaḥ tu ca avaraḥ

original: keśīdaityasamo jñeyastṛṇāvarto mahāsuraḥ / tasmāddaśaguṇairhīno haṃso nāmaramāpate //
analyzed: keśī daitya samaḥ jñeyaḥ tṛṇāvartaḥ mahā asuraḥ tasmāt daśaguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ haṃsaḥ nāma ramāpate

original: tririkastu samo jñeyastatsamaḥ paurukasmṛtaḥ / vetaḥ sa eva vijñeyaḥ pūrvajanmani sattama //
analyzed: tririkaḥ tu samaḥ jñeyaḥ tad samaḥ pauruka smṛtaḥ vetaḥ saḥ eva vijñeyaḥ pūrva janmani sattama

original: tasmādekaguṇairhīnau kuṃbhāṇḍakakuparṇakau / duḥ śāsanastu vijñeyo jarāsaṃdhasamaḥ prabho //
analyzed: tasmāt eka guṇaiḥ hīnau kuṃbhāṇḍaka kuparṇakau duḥ śāsanaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ jarāsaṃdha samaḥ prabho

original: kaṃsena tulyo vijñeyo vikarṇo daityasattamaḥ / kuṃbhakarṇācchataguṇairhīnau kradhyeti viśrutaḥ //
analyzed: kaṃsena tulyaḥ vijñeyaḥ vikarṇaḥ daitya sattamaḥ kuṃbhakarṇāt śataguṇaiḥ hīnau kradhyā iti viśrutaḥ

original: tasmācchataguṇairhīnaḥ śatadhanvā mahāsuraḥ / samānastasya vijñeyaḥ karmārirdaityasattamaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt śataguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ śatadhanvā mahā asuraḥ samānaḥ tasya vijñeyaḥ karmāriḥ daitya sattamaḥ

original: kālakeyastu vijñeyaḥ sadā venasamo mataḥ / adhamānāṃ tu daityānāmuttamaiḥ sāmyamucyate //
analyzed: kālakeyaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ sadā vena samaḥ mataḥ adhamānām tu daityānām uttamaiḥ sāmyam ucyate

original: tatrāveśācca vijñeyaṃ devānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ / tasmācchatagurṇaihīnaścittamānasuro mahān //
analyzed: tatra āveśāt ca vijñeyam devānām na atra saṃśayaḥ tasmāt śata gurṇaiḥ hīnaḥ cittamāna suraḥ mahān

original: taccharīrābhimānī tu tasmācchataguṇairvaraḥ / tasmācchataguṇaihīṃno hastamānasuro mahān //
analyzed: tad śarīra abhimānī tu tasmāt śataguṇaiḥ varaḥ tasmāt śataguṇaiḥ hi iṃnaḥ hasta māna suraḥ mahān

original: tasmācchataguṇairhīnaḥ pādamānasuro mahān / netrendriyābhimānī tu tasmācchataguṇo varaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt śataguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ pāda māna suraḥ mahān netra indriya abhimānī tu tasmāt śataguṇaḥ varaḥ

original: cakṣurindriyamānī tu tasmācchataguṇo varaḥ / tasmācchaguṇairhīnaḥ sparśamānasuro mahān //
analyzed: cakṣuḥ indriya mānī tu tasmāt śataguṇaḥ varaḥ tasmāt śaguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ sparśamāna suraḥ mahān

original: tasmācchatagurṇaihīnaścaṇḍamānasuro mahān / tasmācchatagurṇairhīnaḥ śiśramānasuro mahān //
analyzed: tasmāt śata gurṇaiḥ hīnaḥ caṇḍamāna suraḥ mahān tasmāt śata gurṇaiḥ hīnaḥ śiśramāna suraḥ mahān

original: tasmācchataguṇairhīnaḥ karmamānasuraḥ smṛtaḥ / kalpādyaiḥ preritāḥ sarve rudrādyā adhikāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt śataguṇaiḥ hīnaḥ karma māna suraḥ smṛtaḥ kalpa ādyaiḥ preritāḥ sarve rudra ādyāḥ adhikāriṇaḥ

original: kadācitsuviruddhaṃ ca kurvanti tava sattama / kadāpyahaṃ ca vāyuśca viruddhaṃ nācareva bhoḥ //
analyzed: kadācid su viruddham ca kurvanti tava sattama kadāpi aham ca vāyuḥ ca viruddham na ācara iva bhoḥ

original: mūleṣvaṃśāvatāreṣu rudrādīnā mahāprabho / buddhirvinaśyate yasmāttasmācchinnā hi te 'khilāḥ //
analyzed: mūleṣu aṃśa avatāreṣu rudra ādīnām mahā prabho buddhiḥ vinaśyate yasmāt tasmāt chinnāḥ hi te khilāḥ

original: mahīpate ca madbuddhistasmādacchinnasaṃjñikaḥ / etādṛśopyahaṃ deva na ca śaktistu nastave //
analyzed: mahīpate ca mad buddhiḥ tasmāt acchinna saṃjñikaḥ etādṛśaḥ api aham deva na ca śaktiḥ tu nastave

original: mahyamacchinnabhaktāya dayāṃ kuru mahāprabho / iti stutvā hariṃ brahmā sthitaḥ prāñja liragrataḥ //
analyzed: mahyam acchinna bhaktāya dayām kuru mahā prabho iti stutvā harim brahmā sthitaḥ prāñja liḥ agratas

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde brahmastutivarṇanaṃ nāma dvādaśo 'dyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīya aṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde brahmastutivarṇanam nāma dvādaśaḥ dyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 13
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / iti stutaḥ sa bhagavān svapūtreṇa dayānidhiḥ / medhagaṃbhīrayā vācā provāca madhusūdanaḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca iti stutaḥ sa bhagavān sva pūtreṇa dayā nidhiḥ medha gaṃbhīrayā vācā provāca madhusūdanaḥ

original: sṛja brahmannimāndevānmatprasādātkrameṇa ca / yathā vai prākkṣaṇetadvatsṛja sarvaṃ mahāprabho //
analyzed: sṛja brahman imān devān mad prasādāt krameṇa ca  yathā vai prāk kṣaṇe tadvat sṛja sarvam mahā prabho

original: nāsti prayojanaṃ tena tava matprītaye sṛja / evamuktastu hāriṇā brahmā stutvā hariṃ param //
analyzed: nā asti prayojanam tena tava mad prītaye sṛja evam uktaḥ tu hāriṇā brahmā stutvā harim param

original: sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ mano dadhre prīṇayanneva mādhavam / mahattatvātmako brahmā vāyuṃ jīvabhimāninam //
analyzed: sṛṣṭim kartum manaḥ dadhre prīṇayan eva mādhavam mahat tatva ātmakaḥ brahmā vāyum jīva abhimāninam

original: ādau sasarja garuḍa puruṣātmā sa eva ca / tato dakṣiṇahastāttu brahmāṇīṃ bhārantī tathā //
analyzed: ādau sasarja garuḍa puruṣātmā saḥ eva ca tatas dakṣiṇa hastāt tu brahmāṇīm bhārantī tathā

original: asṛjatte mahābhāge avyaktasya niyāmike / vāmahastātsatyaputro mahattatvātmako 'nalaḥ //
analyzed: asṛjat te mahābhāge avyaktasya niyāmike  vāma hastāt satya putraḥ mahat tatva ātmakaḥ nalaḥ

original: brahmaṇo dakṣiṇāddhastādahaṅkārātmako haraḥ / ādau śeṣastato jajñe garuḍatadanantaram //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ dakṣiṇāt hastāt ahaṅkāra ātmakaḥ haraḥ ādau śeṣaḥ tatas jajñe garuḍa tad anantaram

original: tadanantarajo rudraḥ sa evaṃ sṛṣṭavānprabhuḥ / svotpattyanantaraṃ brahmā daśavarṣānmahāprabhuḥ //
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ rudraḥ saḥ evam sṛṣṭavān prabhuḥ sva utpatti anantaram brahmā daśa varṣān mahā prabhuḥ

original: vāyumuttpādrayāmāsa vatsarānantare prabhuḥ / gāyatrīṃ janayāmāsa vāyorutpattyanantaram //
analyzed: vāyum vatsara anantare prabhuḥ gāyatrīm janayāmāsa vāyoḥ utpatti anantaram

original: saṃvatsarānantare tu bhāratīmasṛjatprabhuḥ / bhāratyanantaraṃ śeṃ divyasāhasravatsarāt //
analyzed: saṃvatsara anantare tu bhāratīm asṛjat prabhuḥ bhāratī anantaram śeṃ divya sāhasra vatsarāt

original: anantaraṃ saṃbabhūva garuḍastu tataḥ param / divyasāhasravarṣāttu tathā rudrañca sṛṣṭavān //
analyzed: anantaram saṃbabhūva garuḍaḥ tu tatas param divya sāhasra varṣāt tu tathā rudran ca sṛṣṭavān

original: śeṣasyānantaraṃ devīṃ vāruṇīṃ ca mahāprabhuḥ / daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu hyasṛjatkamalāsanaḥ //
analyzed: śeṣasya anantaram devīm vāruṇīm ca mahā prabhuḥ daśa varṣa anantaram tu hi asṛjat kamalāsanaḥ

original: garuḍānantaraṃ devīṃ sauparṇīmasṛjatprabhuḥ / daśavarṣānantaraṃ ca pārvatīṃ ca tathaiva saḥ //
analyzed: garuḍa anantaram devīm sauparṇīm asṛjat prabhuḥ daśa varṣa anantaram ca pārvatīm ca tathā eva saḥ

original: pārvatyanantaraṃ candraṃ manastattvaniyāmakam / daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu vāsavaṃ hyasṛjattataḥ //
analyzed: pārvatī anantaram candram manaḥ tattva niyāmakam  daśa varṣa anantaram tu vāsavam hi asṛjat tatas

original: abhimānī dakṣiṇasya bāhośca parameṣṭhinaḥ / daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu śacī tāmasṛjatprabhuḥ //
analyzed: abhimānī dakṣiṇasya bāhoḥ ca parameṣṭhinaḥ  daśa varṣa anantaram tu śacī tām asṛjat prabhuḥ

original: indrasyānantaraṃ kāmaṃ triṃśadvarṣādanantaram / asṛjadvāmabāhoścamanastatvābhimāninam //
analyzed: indrasya anantaram kāmam triṃśat varṣāt anantaram asṛjat vāma bāhoḥ camanas tatva abhimāninam

original: tadanantarajāṃ devīṃ daśavarṣādanantaram / ratiṃ sa janayāmāsa kāmabhāryāṃ mahāprabhuḥ //
analyzed: tad anantara jām devīm daśa varṣāt anantaram ratim sa janayāmāsa kāma bhāryām mahā prabhuḥ

original: kāmasyāpyabhimānī tu sa eva parikīrtitaḥ / brahmāhaṅkārikaṃ prāṇaṃ kāryotpatteranantaram //
analyzed: kāmasya api abhimānī tu saḥ eva parikīrtitaḥ brahma āhaṅkārikam prāṇam kārya utpatteḥ anantaram

original: daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu nirmame nāsika tataḥ / tasya bhāryāṃ nāsikasyaḥ pañcavarṣādanantaram //
analyzed: daśa varṣa anantaram tu nirmame tatas tasya bhāryām nāsikasyaḥ pañca varṣāt anantaram

original: nirmame nāsikāṃ vāmāṃ brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ / ahaṅkārādanu brahmā sajñānaṃ ca bṛhaspatim //
analyzed: nirmame nāsikām vāmām brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ ahaṅkārāt anu brahmā sa jñānam ca bṛhaspatim

original: nirmame ca varṣayugmapañcavarṣādanantaram / pañcavarṣānantaraṃ tu tārāṃ bhāryāṃ vinirmame //
analyzed: nirmame ca varṣa yugma pañca varṣāt anantaram pañca varṣa anantaram tu tārām bhāryām vinirmame

original: guroranantaraṃ brahmā pañcaviṃśādanantaram / svāyaṃbhuvaṃ manuṃ caiva nirmame manasā vibhuḥ //
analyzed: guroḥ anantaram brahmā pañcaviṃśāt anantaram svāyaṃbhuvam manum ca eva nirmame manasā vibhuḥ

original: pañcavarṣānantaraṃ tu śatarūpāṃ vinirmame / śatarūpānantaraṃ tu viṃśadvarṣadināntaram //
analyzed: pañca varṣa anantaram tu śatarūpām vinirmame śatarūpā anantaram tu viṃśat varṣa dina antaram

original: dakṣaḥ śiṣyātmako jajñe dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhataḥ prabhoḥ / pañcavarṣānantaraṃ tu vāmāṅguṣṭhāccaturmukhaḥ //
analyzed: dakṣaḥ śiṣya ātmakaḥ jajñe dakṣiṇa aṅguṣṭhataḥ prabhoḥ pañca varṣa anantaram tu vāma aṅguṣṭhāt caturmukhaḥ

original: prasūtimasṛjadbrahmā sṛṣṭyarthaṃ paramādarāt / dakṣasyānantaraṃ brahmā pañcaviṃśādanantaram //
analyzed: prasūtim asṛjat brahmā sṛṣṭi artham parama ādarāt  dakṣasya anantaram brahmā pañcaviṃśāt anantaram

original: nirmame hyaniruddhaṃ ca madhyamāṅguliparvataḥ / pañcavarṣānantaraṃ tu sasarja bhagavānajaḥ //
analyzed: nirmame hi aniruddham ca madhyamāṅguli parvataḥ pañca varṣa anantaram tu sasarja bhagavān ajaḥ

original: virājasaṃjñakāṃ bhāryāṃ madhyamāṅguliparvataḥ / aniruddhānantara tu śatavarṣādanantaram //
analyzed: virāja saṃjñakām bhāryām madhyamāṅguli parvataḥ tu śata varṣāt anantaram

original: nirmame pravahaṃ vāyuṃ kaniṣṭhāṅguliparvataḥ / daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu pravāhīṃ nirmame prabhuḥ //
analyzed: nirmame pravaham vāyum kaniṣṭhā aṅguli parvataḥ daśa varṣa anantaram tu pravāhīm nirmame prabhuḥ

original: kaniṣṭhāṅguliparvācca vāmadevaṃ na saṃśayaḥ / pravahānantaraṃ tabrahmā śatavarṣādanantaram //
analyzed: kaniṣṭhā aṅguli parvāt ca vāmadevam na saṃśayaḥ pravaha anantaram śata varṣāt anantaram

original: yamaṃ vinirmame pṛṣṭhādaṣṭavarṣādanantaram / tadbhāryāṃ śāmalāṃ devīṃ tasmādeva mahāprabhuḥ //
analyzed: yamam vinirmame pṛṣṭhāt aṣṭa varṣāt anantaram tad bhāryām śāmalām devīm tasmāt eva mahā prabhuḥ

original: yamasyānantaraṃ candraṃ triṃśadvarṣādanantaram / asṛjaddakṣiṇācchotrācchotratattvaniyāmakam //
analyzed: yamasya anantaram candram triṃśat varṣāt anantaram asṛjat dakṣiṇāt śotrāt śotra tattva niyāmakam

original: navavarṣānantaraṃ tu rohiṇīsamṛjatprabhuḥ / vāmaśrotrācca garuḍaṃ vāmaśrotrābhimāninam //
analyzed: nava varṣa anantaram tu rohiṇī samṛjat prabhuḥ vāma śrotrāt ca garuḍam vāma śrotra abhimāninam

original: candrasyānantaraṃ sūryaṃ viṃśadvarṣādanantaram / samyagvinirmame brahmā dakṣiṇākṣṇaśca devatām //
analyzed: candrasya anantaram sūryam viṃśat varṣāt anantaram samyak vinirmame brahmā devatām

original: vāmākṣṇo nirmame saṃjñāṃ ṣaḍvarṣānantaraṃ prabhuḥ / sūryasyānantaraṃ brahmā śatavarṣādanantaram //
analyzed: nirmame saṃjñām ṣaṣ varṣa anantaram prabhuḥ sūryasya anantaram brahmā śata varṣāt anantaram

original: rasanendriyācca varuṇaṃ nirmame tasya māninam / viṃśadvarṣānantaraṃ tu tasmādevedriyātprabhuḥ //
analyzed: rasana indriyāt ca varuṇam nirmame tasya māninam viṃśat varṣa anantaram tu tasmāt eva idriyāt prabhuḥ

original: gaṅgāṃ vinirmame brahmā rasanendriyadevatām / varuṇasyānantaraṃ tu daśavarṣādanantaram //
analyzed: gaṅgām vinirmame brahmā rasana indriya devatām varuṇasya anantaram tu daśa varṣāt anantaram

original: utsaṃgānnirmame brahmā nāradaṃ bhagavatpriyam / nāradasyānantaraṃ tu ṣaṣṭivarṣādanantaram //
analyzed: utsaṃgāt nirmame brahmā nāradam bhagavat priyam nāradasya anantaram tu ṣaṣṭi varṣāt anantaram

original: agniṃ vinirmame brahmātvagindriyataḥ prabhuḥ / ato vāgabhimānī saṃ pañcavarṣādanantaram //
analyzed: agnim vinirmame brahmā a tvac indriyataḥ prabhuḥ atas vāc abhimānī sam pañca varṣāt anantaram

original: svāhāṃ vinirmame brahmā tāmāhurmantradevatām / agneranantaraṃ vīndra bhṛguṃ brahmarṣisattamam //
analyzed: svāhām vinirmame brahmā tām āhuḥ mantradevatām  agneḥ anantaram vi indra bhṛgum brahmarṣi sattamam

original: daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu bhruvormadhyādvinirmame / saṃvatsarānantaraṃ tu bhṛgubhāryāṃ vinirmame //
analyzed: daśa varṣa anantaram tu bhruvoḥ madhyāt vinirmame saṃvatsara anantaram tu bhṛgu bhāryām vinirmame

original: bhṛgoranantaraṃ brahmā śatavarṣādanantaram / kaśyapañjanayāmāsa manasā ca svayaṃ prabhuḥ //
analyzed: bhṛgoḥ anantaram brahmā śata varṣāt anantaram kaśyapam janayāmāsa manasā ca svayam prabhuḥ

original: saṃvatsarānantaraṃ tu aditiṃ nirmame prabhuḥ / kaśyapānantaraṃ cātriṃ daśavarṣādanantaram //
analyzed: saṃvatsara anantaram tu aditim nirmame prabhuḥ kaśyapa anantaram ca atrim daśa varṣāt anantaram

original: atreranantaraṃ brahmā daśavarṣādanantaram / ajījanadbharadvājaṃ vasiṣṭha tadanataram //
analyzed: atreḥ anantaram brahmā daśa varṣāt anantaram ajījanat bharadvājam vasiṣṭha tad anataram

original: daśavarṣānantaraṃ tu teṣāṃ bhāryāḥ krameṇa tu / saṃvatsarānantareṇa asṛjatkamalāsanaḥ //
analyzed: daśa varṣa anantaram tu teṣām bhāryāḥ krameṇa tu saṃvatsara anantareṇa asṛjat kamalāsanaḥ

original: vasiṣṭhasyānantaraṃ tu gautamaṃ hyasṛjatprabhuḥ / daśavarṣānantareṇa jamadagniṃ tato 'sṛjat //
analyzed: vasiṣṭhasya anantaram tu gautamam hi asṛjat prabhuḥ daśa varṣa anantareṇa jamadagnim sṛjat

original: daśavarṣānantareṇa manurvaivasvato 'bhavat / manoranantaraṃ jajñe śatavarṣādanantaram //
analyzed: daśa varṣa anantareṇa manuḥ vaivasvataḥ bhavat manoḥ anantaram jajñe śata varṣāt anantaram

original: viṣvakseno mahābhāgo vāyuputro mahābalaḥ / tasmāccaturdaśe varṣe gaṇapo hyabhavadvibhoḥ //
analyzed: viṣvaksenaḥ mahābhāgaḥ vāyuputraḥ mahā balaḥ tasmāt caturdaśe varṣe gaṇapaḥ hi abhavat vibhoḥ

original: tadanantarajo vīndra aṣṭavarṣādanantaram / dhanapo hyabhavattatra tadbhāryā vatsare pare //
analyzed: tad anantara jaḥ vīndra aṣṭa varṣāt anantaram dhanapaḥ hi abhavat tatra tad bhāryā vatsare pare

original: viṣvaksenānantaraṃ tu daśavarṣādanantaram / jayādīnbha gavadbhaktānsṛṣṭavān kamalāsanaḥ //
analyzed: viṣvaksena anantaram tu daśa varṣāt anantaram kamalāsanaḥ

original: jayādyānantaraṃ brahmā vallādyāḥ karmadevatāḥ / śatavarṣānantaraṃ tu sṛṣṭavāñchivavāhanam //
analyzed: jaya ādya anantaram brahmā valla ādyāḥ karma devatāḥ śata varṣa anantaram tu sṛṣṭavān śiva vāhanam

original: karmadevānantaraṃ tu triṃśadvarṣādanantaram / parjanyamasṛjbrahmā mantrayantrābhimāninam //
analyzed: karma deva anantaram tu triṃśat varṣāt anantaram parjanyam asṛj brahmā mantra yantra abhimāninam

original: parjanyānantaraṃ brahmā daśavarṣādanantaram / puṣkaraṃ janayāmāsa karmatattvābhimāninam //
analyzed: parjanya anantaram brahmā daśa varṣāt anantaram puṣkaram janayāmāsa karma tattva abhimāninam

original: evaṃ vinirmame brahmā matprasādātkhageśvara / evaṃ jñātvā mokṣameti nānyathā tu kathañcana //
analyzed: evam vinirmame brahmā mad prasādāt khageśvara evam jñātvā mokṣam eti na anyathā tu kathañcana

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe devotpattinirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe devotpattinirūpaṇam nāma trayodaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 14
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīgaruḍa uvāca / avatārānhare brūhi tathā lakṣmyā divaukasām / guṇānāmantara brūhi śiṣyasya mama savrata //
analyzed: śrī garuḍaḥ uvāca avatārān hare brūhi tathā lakṣmyāḥ divaukasām  guṇānām antara brūhi śiṣyasya mama savrata

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / yo mūlarūpī bhagavānananto brahmādibhiḥ purṇaguṇaḥ svatantraḥ / purātanaḥ pūrṇatanurmadātmā na tādṛśāḥ saṃti kadāpi vīdra //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca yaḥ mūla rūpī bhagavān anantaḥ brahma ādibhiḥ purṇa guṇaḥ svatantraḥ purātanaḥ pūrṇa tanuḥ mad ātmā na tādṛśāḥ saṃti kadāpi

original: pādaśca pūrṇaḥ pādatalaṃ ca pūrṇaṃ nakhāśca pūrṇāḥ kaṭikaṇṭhau ca pūrṇau / ūrū ca pūrṇe udaraṃ ca pūrṇaṃ labdhvāpi pūrṇāñjagṛhe tathāpyuraḥ //
analyzed: pādaḥ ca pūrṇaḥ pāda talam ca pūrṇam nakhāḥ ca pūrṇāḥ kaṭi kaṇṭhau ca pūrṇau ūrū ca pūrṇe udaram ca pūrṇam labdhvā api pūrṇān jagṛhe tathā api uraḥ

original: skandhaḥ supūrṇāḥ sakalāśca bāhavaḥ pūrṇāḥ keśāḥ śmaśrudantāśca pūrṇāḥ / lomāni pūrṇāni tathaiva romakūpāśca pūrṇāstu tathaiva śiśraḥ //
analyzed: skandhaḥ su pūrṇāḥ sakalāḥ ca bāhavaḥ pūrṇāḥ keśāḥ śmaśru dantāḥ ca pūrṇāḥ lomāni pūrṇāni tathā eva romakūpāḥ ca pūrṇāḥ tu tathā eva śiśraḥ

original: aṇḍaśca pūrṇo hyaṇḍaromāṇi kakṣāścakṣuśca śrotre sarva ete ca pūrṇāḥ / kiṃ varṇaye mūlarūpaṃ hareśca yāvadvalaṃ pūrṇaṃ samagradehe //
