analyzed: aṇḍaḥ ca pūrṇaḥ hi aṇḍa romāṇi kakṣāḥ cakṣuḥ ca śrotre sarve ete ca pūrṇāḥ kim varṇaye mūla rūpam hareḥ ca yāvat valam pūrṇam samagra dehe

original: tāvadbralaṃ hyekaromādikeṣu saṃtitvime hi yataḥ sa eva pūrṇaḥ / sa eva tu sarvasya kartā sa eva harthā sa tu sārāṃśabhoktā //
analyzed: tāvat bralam hi eka roma ādikeṣu hi yatas saḥ eva pūrṇaḥ saḥ eva tu sarvasya kartā saḥ eva harthā sa tu sāra aṃśa bhoktā

original: asārāṃśaṃ naiva bhoktā haristu sārānvakṣye śṛṇu pakṣīndra samyak / drākṣekṣusāraṃ nārikelasya sāraṃ cūtasya sāraṃ panasasyāpi sāram //
analyzed: asāra aṃśam nā eva bhoktā hariḥ tu sārān vakṣye śṛṇu pakṣi indra samyak drākṣā ikṣu sāram nārikelasya sāram cūtasya sāram panasasya api sāram

original: nāraṅgasāraṃ kramukasyāpi sāraṃ kharjūrasāraṃ kadalīphalasya / nārāyaṇo bījarūpasya sāraṃ gṛhṇāti nityaṃ bhaktavaryo dayāluḥ //
analyzed: nāraṅga sāram kramukasya api sāram kharjūra sāram kadalī phalasya nārāyaṇaḥ bīja rūpasya sāram gṛhṇāti nityam bhakta varyaḥ dayāluḥ

original: tāmbūlasāraṃ khadirasya sāraṃ puṣpasya sāraṃ candanasyāpi sāram / godhūmasāraṃ yavānāṃ ca sāraṃ māṣasya sāraṃ hareṇośca sāram //
analyzed: tāmbūla sāram khadirasya sāram puṣpasya sāram candanasya api sāram godhūma sāram yavānām ca sāram māṣasya sāram hareṇoḥ ca sāram

original: śuddhaṃ tathā vrīhinīvārasāraṃ śyāmākasāraṃ śuddhadhānyasya sāram //
analyzed: śuddham tathā vrīhi nīvāra sāram śyāmāka sāram śuddha dhānyasya sāram

original: niṣiddhānsarvaśākasya sārāṃstathā nipiddhāllāṃvaṇasvāpi sārān / gṛhṇāti viṣṇuḥ paramādareṇa annasya sāraṃ bhakṣyabhojyasya sāram //
analyzed: niṣiddhān sarva śākasya sārān tathā sārān gṛhṇāti viṣṇuḥ parama ādareṇa annasya sāram bhakṣya bhojyasya sāram

original: sūpasya sāraṃ paramānnasya sāraṃ dugdhasya sāraṃ dadhitakrasya sāram / ghṛtasya sāraṃ rāmaṭhasyāpi sāraṃ gṛhṇāti viṣṇuḥ sarṣapasyāpi sāram //
analyzed: sūpasya sāram paramānnasya sāram dugdhasya sāram dadhi takrasya sāram ghṛtasya sāram rāmaṭhasya api sāram gṛhṇāti viṣṇuḥ sarṣapasya api sāram

original: marīcasāraṃ jīrakasyāpi sāraṃ tathā havirghṛtapakvasya sāram / taileṣu pakvasya ca bharjitasya guḍasya sāraṃ navanītasya sāram //
analyzed: marīca sāram jīrakasya api sāram tathā haviḥ ghṛta pakvasya sāram taileṣu pakvasya ca bharjitasya guḍasya sāram navanītasya sāram

original: lavaṅgasāraṃ śarkarāyāśca sāramityādisārān vāsudevastu bhukte / lakṣmīpatiḥ sarvajagannivā sastasyājñayā vāsudevopi nityam //
analyzed: lavaṅga sāram śarkarāyāḥ ca sāram iti ādi sārān vāsudevaḥ tu bhukte lakṣmīpatiḥ sarva jagat nivā saḥ tasya ājñayā vāsudevaḥ api nityam

original: taccheṣasārānapi cāvanīśo mahātmanoṃśāñchṛṇu śiṣyavarya / evaṃ vimūḍhā vāsudevasya bhaktāḥ kiṃ vaktavyaṃ viṣṇubhaktā hi loke //
analyzed: tad śeṣa sārān api mahātmanaḥ oṃśān śṛṇu śiṣya varya evam vimūḍhāḥ vāsudevasya bhaktāḥ kim vaktavyam viṣṇu bhaktāḥ hi loke

original: kalyāṇāste sārabhoktāra eva naiṣāṃ bhavettena duḥ khābhivṛddhiḥ / bhuñjanti ye vaiśvadevaṃ vihāya duṣṭāṃstānvai bhukticinttāṃśca viddhi //
analyzed: kalyāṇāḥ te sāra bhoktāraḥ eva nā eṣām bhavet tena duḥ kha abhivṛddhiḥ bhuñjanti ye vaiśvadevam vihāya duṣṭān tān vai bhukti cinttān ca viddhi

original: vakṣye viśeṣaṃ vaiśvadeve khagendra gopyaṃ no vadānyatra vidvān / sūryādīnāṃ ye ca dāne ca dadyurvinā vāyorantarasthaṃ hariṃ ca //
analyzed: vakṣye viśeṣam vaiśvadeve khaga indra gopyam naḥ vadāni atra vidvān sūrya ādīnām ye ca dāne ca dadyuḥ vinā vāyoḥ antara stham harim ca

original: te vai sadā sārabhoktāra eva jñeyāstvato viṣṇureko mahātmā / sārāṃśabhoktā na tu sarvasya bhoktā bhunakti sarvaṃ tvaviruddhaśaktiḥ //
analyzed: te vai sadā sāra bhoktāraḥ eva jñeyāḥ tu atas viṣṇuḥ ekaḥ mahātmā sāra aṃśa bhoktā na tu sarvasya bhoktā bhunakti sarvam tu aviruddha śaktiḥ

original: vakṣye ha sārānpunaranyānkhagendra śṛṇuṣva guhyaṃ paramādareṇa / drākṣādayaḥ sarva eva tvasārāḥ kālādiduṣṭā bhāvaduṣṭāḥ padārthāḥ //
analyzed: vakṣye ha sārān punar anyān khaga indra śṛṇuṣva guhyam parama ādareṇa  drākṣā ādayaḥ sarve eva tu asārāḥ kāla ādi duṣṭāḥ bhāva duṣṭāḥ padārthāḥ

original: atipakvānantaraṃ tu tathā dinacatuṣṭaye / asārāḥ kaluṣā jñeyāstathā jaṃbūphalaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: ati pakva anantaram tu tathā dina catuṣṭaye asārāḥ kaluṣāḥ jñeyāḥ tathā jaṃbū phalam smṛtam

original: māsasyānantaraṃ vīndra tvasāraṃ panasaṃ smṛtam / ṣaṇmāsānantaraṃ vīndra kharjūraṃ tiktavatsmṛtam //
analyzed: māsasya anantaram vīndra tu asāram panasam smṛtam ṣaṣ māsa anantaram vīndra kharjūram tikta vat smṛtam

original: ārdraṃ pūtaṃ nārikelaṃ sphoṭanānantaraṃ prabho / ahorātrānantaraṃ tu asāraṃ parikīrtitam //
analyzed: ārdram pūtam nārikelam sphoṭana anantaram prabho ahorātra anantaram tu asāram parikīrtitam

original: śuṣkabhūtaṃ nārikelaṃ khajūraṃ tu yathā tathā / pakṣasyānantaraṃ cūtamasāraṃ parikīrtitam //
analyzed: śuṣka bhūtam nārikelam khajūram tu yathā tathā pakṣasya anantaram cūtam asāram parikīrtitam

original: varṣasyānantaraṃ vīndra pūgīphalamudāhṛtam / ghaṭikānantaraṃ vīndra tāṃbūlaṃ parikīrtitam //
analyzed: varṣasya anantaram vīndra pūgī phalam udāhṛtam ghaṭikā anantaram vīndra tāṃbūlam parikīrtitam

original: yāmasyānantaraṃ cānnaṃ sūpānnaṃ pāyasaṃ tathā / bhakṣyaṃ ca kvathitaṃ vīndra asāraṃ parikīrtitam //
analyzed: yāmasya anantaram ca annam sūpa annam pāyasam tathā bhakṣyam ca kvathitam vīndra asāram parikīrtitam

original: tripakṣānantaraṃ vīndra tailapakvaṃ tathā smṛtam / caturyāmānantaraṃ ca tvasāraṃ ghṛtapakvakam //
analyzed: tri pakṣa anantaram vīndra taila pakvam tathā smṛtam catur yāma anantaram ca tu asāram ghṛta pakvakam

original: triyāmānantaraṃ śākā niḥ sārāḥ parikīrtitāḥ / jaṃbīraṃ śṛṅgabere dhātrī karpūraṃ ca cūtakam //
analyzed: tri yāma anantaram śākāḥ niḥ sārāḥ parikīrtitāḥ jaṃbīram śṛṅgabere dhātrī karpūram ca cūtakam

original: vatsarānantaraṃ vīndra niḥ sāraṃ parikīrtitam / parpaṭaḥ pakṣamātreṇa niḥ sāraḥ parikīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: vatsara anantaram vīndra niḥ sāram parikīrtitam parpaṭaḥ pakṣa mātreṇa niḥ sāraḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: tulasī sarvadā sārā ekādaśyāmapi dvija / ārdrā vāpyathavā śuṣkā sārdrā sāravatī smṛtā //
analyzed: tulasī sarvadā sārā ekādaśyām api dvija ārdrā vā api athavā śuṣkā sārdrā sāravatī smṛtā

original: ekādaśyāṃ tu tulasī sārā grāhyā manīṣibhiḥ / tvacā nāseṃdriyeṇāpi na tu jihvendriyeṇa ca //
analyzed: ekādaśyām tu tulasī sārā grāhyā manīṣibhiḥ tvacā nāsā iṃdriyeṇa api na tu jihvā indriyeṇa ca

original: ekādaśyāṃ harerannaṃ niḥ sāraṃ parikīrtitam / ekādaśyāṃ harestīrthaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ khageśvara //
analyzed: ekādaśyām hareḥ annam niḥ sāram parikīrtitam ekādaśyām hareḥ tīrtham manuṣyāṇām khageśvara

original: ekavāre ca sāraṃ syāddvivāre ca tatodhikam / ekādaśyāṃ mahābhāga tīrthaṃ gandhādimiśritam //
analyzed: eka vāre ca sāram syāt dvi vāre ca tatas adhikam ekādaśyām mahābhāga tīrtham gandha ādi miśritam

original: asāramiti saṃproktaṃ tathā svādūdamiśritam / ekādaśyāṃ hareḥ sāraṃ kṣīraṃ sarpirmadhūdakam //
analyzed: asāram iti saṃproktam tathā svādu uda miśritam ekādaśyām hareḥ sāram kṣīram sarpiḥ madhūdakam

original: niḥ sāraṃ manujendrāṇāmiti vedavidāṃ matam / āṣāḍhamāse garuḍa śāko niḥ sāra ucyate //
analyzed: niḥ sāram manuja indrāṇām iti veda vidām matam āṣāḍha māse garuḍa śākaḥ niḥ sāraḥ ucyate

original: māsi bhādrapade vīndra hyasāraṃ dadhi cocyate / kṣīraṃ tu hyāśvine māse niḥ sāraṃ parikīrtitam //
analyzed: māsi bhādrapade vi indra hi asāram dadhi ca ucyate kṣīram tu hi āśvine māse niḥ sāram parikīrtitam

original: ūrdhvapuṇḍragadāhīnā nāryasāreti gīyate / haribhaktivihīnā ye hyasurāḥ parikīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: ūrdhva puṇḍra gadā hīnā nāryasārā iti gīyate hari bhakti vihīnāḥ ye hi asurāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: harināmavihīnaṃ tu mukhaṃ niḥ sāramucyate / harinaivedyahīnastu pāko niḥ sāra ucyate //
analyzed: hari nāma vihīnam tu mukham niḥ sāram ucyate hari naivedya hīnaḥ tu pākaḥ niḥ sāraḥ ucyate

original: tridinaiścātasīpuṣpaṃ niḥ sāraṃ parikīrtitam / praharaṃ mallikā sāraṃ jātī tu praharārdhakam //
analyzed: tri dinaiḥ ca atasī puṣpam niḥ sāram parikīrtitam praharam mallikā sāram jātī tu prahara ardhakam

original: triyāmaṃ śatapatraṃ syātkaravīramaharniśam / ghaṭikāvadhi sāraṃ syātpārijātaṃ khageśvara //
analyzed: tri yāmam śata patram syāt karavīram aharniśam  ghaṭikā avadhi sāram syāt pārijātam khageśvara

original: trivarṣaṃ kesaraṃ phalga sāramityucyate budhaiḥ / kastūrī daśavarṣaṃ tu karpūraṃ varṣamātrakam //
analyzed: tri varṣam kesaram phalga sāram iti ucyate budhaiḥ kastūrī daśa varṣam tu karpūram varṣa mātrakam

original: sasāramiti saṃproktaṃ candanaṃ sarvadā smṛtam / śuddhanniḥ sārabhūtāṃśca vakṣye śṛṇu khageśvara //
analyzed: sa sāram iti saṃproktam candanam sarvadā smṛtam sāra bhūtān ca vakṣye śṛṇu khageśvara

original: tuṣā medhyā āranālaṃ puṇyakaṃ bhiḥ saṭā tathā / upodvrajī alābūśca bṛhatkośātakī tathā //
analyzed: tuṣā medhyā āranālam puṇyakam saṭā tathā upodvrajī alābūḥ ca bṛhatkośātakī tathā

original: vṛntākaṃ cukraśākaśca bilvamauduṃvaraṃ tathā / palāñjurlaśunaṃ vṛntaṃ kalañjaṃ ca tathā dvijā //
analyzed: vṛntākam cukra śākaḥ ca bilvam auduṃvaram tathā palāñjuḥ laśunam vṛntam kalañjam ca tathā dvijāḥ

original: etatsarvatra kāle ca niḥ sāramiti kīrtitam / ekādaśyāṃ vaiśvadevaṃ śrāddhaṃ tarpaṇameva ca //
analyzed: etat sarvatra kāle ca niḥ sāram iti kīrtitam ekādaśyām vaiśvadevam śrāddham tarpaṇam eva ca

original: mantreṇa pretadahanamasāraṃ parikīrtitam / havirnārāyaṇo devo etāṃśca hyaśubhānra sān //
analyzed: mantreṇa preta dahanam asāram parikīrtitam haviḥ nārāyaṇaḥ etān ca hi aśubhān ra sān

original: na gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti hariḥ svayam / tathāpi sarvaṃ jānāti jīvānāṃ pāpakarmaṇām //
analyzed: na gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti hariḥ svayam tathā api sarvam jānāti jīvānām pāpa karmaṇām

original: āsvādanaṃ kārayati svayaṃ nāsvādate hariḥ / asārabhojanaṃ caiva jīvānāṃ karmajaṃ phalam //
analyzed: āsvādanam kārayati svayam na āsvādate hariḥ asāra bhojanam ca eva jīvānām karma jam phalam

original: amukhyabhojino jīvāḥ kuntyādyā mukhyabhojinaḥ / śubhāni ca pibedviṣṇuraśubhaṃ no pibedvibhuḥ //
analyzed: amukhya bhojinaḥ jīvāḥ kuntī ādyāḥ mukhya bhojinaḥ śubhāni ca pibet viṣṇuḥ aśubham no pibet vibhuḥ

original: ko vadettasya ceṣṭāṃ tu pūrṇānando hariḥ svayam / na tena sadṛśaḥ kopi deśe kāle ca vidyate / tasyāvatārānvakṣyahaṃ śṛṇu pakṣīndrasattama //
analyzed: kaḥ vadet tasya ceṣṭām tu pūrṇānandaḥ hariḥ svayam na tena sadṛśaḥ kaḥ api deśe kāle ca vidyate tasya avatārān vakṣi aham śṛṇu pakṣi indra sattama

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe vaiśvadevārthakasārāsāravastuviveko nāma caturdaśodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe vaiśvadevārthakasārāsāravastuvivekaḥ nāma caturdaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 15
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / athāvatā rānpuruṣākhyo hariśca gato dhyānaṃ kartumīśo mahātmā / prādurbabhūvākhilasadguṇārṇavaḥ sa eva viṣṇuḥ sa ca bījabhūtaḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca atha avatā rān puruṣa ākhyaḥ hariḥ ca gataḥ dhyānam kartum īśaḥ mahātmā prādurbabhūva akhila sat guṇa arṇavaḥ saḥ eva viṣṇuḥ sa ca bīja bhūtaḥ

original: yo bījabhūtaḥ puruṣākhya viṣṇuḥ sa evābhūdvāsudevo mahātmā / sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ puruṣākhyasya vāyormāyākhyāyāṃ mūlarūpo yathā'sa //
analyzed: yaḥ bīja bhūtaḥ puruṣa ākhya viṣṇuḥ saḥ eva abhūt vāsudevaḥ mahātmā sṛṣṭim kartum puruṣa ākhyasya vāyoḥ māyā ākhyāyām mūla rūpaḥ yathā āsa

original: yo vāsudevastu sa eva jātaḥ saṃkarṣaṇākhyo khilasadguṇātmā / sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ sūtrabhūtasya vāyorjayākhyāyaṃ pūrṇasaṃvitparātmā //
analyzed: yaḥ vāsudevaḥ tu saḥ eva jātaḥ saṃkarṣaṇa ākhyaḥ khila sat guṇa ātmā sṛṣṭim kartum sūtra bhūtasya vāyoḥ jaya ākhyā ayam pūrṇa saṃvid parātmā

original: sa evaṃ saṃkarṣaṇanāmadheyaḥ pradyumnanāmā ca sa eva viśrutaḥ / sarasvatībhāratīsarjanārthaṃ sa eva devyā mūlarūpo babhūva //
analyzed: saḥ evam saṃkarṣaṇa nāmadheyaḥ pradyumna nāmā ca saḥ eva viśrutaḥ sarasvatī bhāratī sarjana artham saḥ eva devyāḥ mūla rūpaḥ babhūva

original: sṛṣṭvā yuktaṃ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kalābhirmahattattvaṃ sūkṣmarūpaṃ sa eva / sāhaṅkāraṃ krīḍayāmāsa devaḥ śṛṇu tvaṃ vai ṣoḍaśākhyāḥ kalāśca //
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā yuktam ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kalābhiḥ mahat tattvam sūkṣma rūpam saḥ eva sa ahaṅkāram krīḍayāmāsa devaḥ śṛṇu tvam vai ṣoḍaśa ākhyāḥ kalāḥ ca

original: bhūtāni karmendriyapañcakāni jñānendriyāṇīha tathā manaśca / tato babhūva hyaniruddhasaṃjñako jīvāṃśca saṃgṛhya supūrṇaśaktiḥ //
analyzed: bhūtāni karmendriya pañcakāni jñānendriyāṇi iha tathā manaḥ ca tatas babhūva hi aniruddha saṃjñakaḥ jīvān ca saṃgṛhya su pūrṇa śaktiḥ

original: soyaṃ viriñcyādisamastadevān sthūlena dehena sasarja nāthaḥ / tathā sa viṣṇuḥ puruṣābhidhastu sanatkumāratvamavāpa vīndra //
analyzed: saḥ ayam viriñci ādi samasta devān sthūlena dehena sasarja nāthaḥ tathā sa viṣṇuḥ puruṣa abhidhaḥ tu sanatkumāra tvam avāpa vīndra

original: ananyasādhyaṃ brahmacaryaṃ ca kartuṃ daśendriyāṇāṃ śoṣaṇārthaṃ sadaiva / sanandanādau paṭhitaḥ kumārastasmānnānyo nātra vicāryamasti //
analyzed: an anya sādhyam brahmacaryam ca kartum daśa indriyāṇām śoṣaṇa artham sadā eva sanandana ādau paṭhitaḥ kumāraḥ tasmāt na anyaḥ na atra vicāryam asti

original: sa eva viṣṇuḥ sūkaratvaṃ hyavāpa kṣopaṇīmuddhartuṃ daityavapurnihantum / hiraṇyākṣaṃ sajjanānāṃ khagendra tathā bhūmeḥ sthāpanārthaṃ ca devaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ eva viṣṇuḥ sūkara tvam hi avāpa kṣopaṇīm uddhartum daitya vapuḥ nihantum hiraṇyākṣam sat janānām khaga indra tathā bhūmeḥ sthāpana artham ca devaḥ

original: tato harirmadvidāsatvamāpānṛṣerbhāryāyāṃ yāminyāṃ yo mahātmā / tatrāvatāre pañcarātraṃ samagramupādeṣṭuṃ nāpa dānaṃ svatantraḥ //
analyzed: tatas hariḥ mad vidāsa tvam āpa an ṛṣeḥ bhāryāyām yāminyām yaḥ mahātmā tatra avatāre pañcarātram samagram upādeṣṭum na āpa dānam svatantraḥ

original: sa eva viṣṇuḥ samabhūdbradaryāṃ nārāyaṇākhyaḥ śamalāpahaśca / tapastaptuṃ śikṣayituṃ tvṛṣīṇāṃ tiraskartuṃ hyapsarasāṃ sahasram //
analyzed: saḥ eva viṣṇuḥ samabhūt bradaryām nārāyaṇa ākhyaḥ śamala apahaḥ ca tapaḥ taptum śikṣayitum tu ṛṣīṇām tiraskartum hi apsarasām sahasram

original: tato hariḥ kapilatvaṃ hyavāpya tirohitānkālabalena tattvān / caturviśatiṃ saṃśayaṃ coddhariṣyannupādiśaccāsuraye mahātmā //
analyzed: tatas hariḥ kapila tvam hi avāpya tirohitān kāla balena tattvān caturviśatim saṃśayam ca uddhariṣyan upādiśat ca asuraye mahātmā

original: sa eva dataḥ samabhūdrameśonasūyāyāmatrirūpaḥ parātmā / ānvīkṣikiṃ nāma sutarkavidyāmalarkanāmne pradadāttāṃ mahātmā //
analyzed: saḥ eva dataḥ samabhūt rama īśa unasūyāyām atri rūpaḥ parātmā ānvīkṣikim nāma sutarka vidyām alarka nāmne pradadāt tām mahātmā

original: sa eva vaṃśepyabhavadraveśca ākūtyāṃ yaḥ saccidānandarūpaḥ / svāyaṃbhuvaṃ yattu manvantaraṃ ca devaiḥ sākaṃ pālayāmāsa vīndra //
analyzed: saḥ eva ākūtyām yaḥ saccidānanda rūpaḥ svāyaṃbhuvam yat tu manvantaram ca devaiḥ sākam pālayāmāsa vi indra

original: sa eva viṣṇuḥ sa urukramobhūdāgnīdhraputryāṃ merudevyāṃ ca nābheḥ / vidyāratānāṃ mānināṃ sarvadaivamatyāścaryaṃ darśayituṃ ca vīndra //
analyzed: saḥ eva viṣṇuḥ saḥ urukramaḥ bhūt āgnīdhra putryām merudevyām ca nābheḥ vidyā ratānām māninām sarva daivam ati āścaryam darśayitum ca vi indra

original: tato harirjagṛhe kūrmarūpaṃ surāsurāṇāmudadhiṃ vimathnatām / pṛṣṭhe dhartuṃ mandaraṃ parvataṃ ca brahmāṇḍaṃ vā dhartumīśo mahātmā //
analyzed: tatas hariḥ jagṛhe kūrma rūpam sura asurāṇām udadhim vimathnatām pṛṣṭhe dhartum mandaram parvatam ca brahmāṇḍam vā dhartum īśaḥ mahātmā

original: tato hariḥ prādurabhūnmahātmā dhanvantarirnāma harinmaṇidyutiḥ / apathyadoṣānparihartumeva haste gṛhītvā pūrṇakubhaṃ sudhābhiḥ //
analyzed: tatas hariḥ prādurabhūt mahātmā dhanvantariḥ nāma harit maṇi dyutiḥ apathya doṣān parihartum eva haste gṛhītvā pūrṇa kubham sudhābhiḥ

original: tato harirjagṛhe śrīvapuśca yanmohinīti pravadanti loke / udvṛttānāṃ ditijānāṃ mahātmā samyakteṣāṃ vañcayituṃ harirbalam //
analyzed: tatas hariḥ jagṛhe śrī vapuḥ ca yat mohinī iti pravadanti loke udvṛttānām ditijānām mahātmā samyak teṣām vañcayitum hariḥ balam

original: tato hariḥ prādurabhūnmahātmā nṛsiṃhanāmā bhagavānanantaḥ / daityo hiraṇyakaśipuśca tathorudeśe saṃsthāpitaḥ karajairdāritaśca //
analyzed: tatas hariḥ prādurabhūt mahātmā nṛsiṃha nāmā bhagavān anantaḥ daityaḥ hiraṇyakaśipuḥ ca tathā ūru deśe saṃsthāpitaḥ karajaiḥ dāritaḥ ca

original: tato harirbhagavānvāmanobhūdadityāṃ vai kaśyapāddavadevaḥ / indrāyedaṃ dātukāmaḥ khagendra tadarthaṃ vai pāvituṃ sovituṃ ca //
analyzed: tatas hariḥ bhagavān vāmanaḥ bhūt adityām vai kaśyapāt davadevaḥ indrāya idam dātu kāmaḥ khaga indra tad artham vai pāvitum sovitum ca

original: tato harirjamadagneḥ sutobhūlloke sarve parśurāmaṃ vadanti / brahmadviṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca vīndra bhūmiṃ niḥ kṣatrāṃ kartukāmo maheśaḥ //
analyzed: tatas hariḥ jamadagneḥ sutaḥ bhūt loke sarve parśurāmam vadanti brahma dviṣām kṣatriyāṇām ca vi indra bhūmim niḥ kṣatrām kartu kāmaḥ maheśaḥ

original: tatobhavadvyāsarūpī sa viṣṇuścaturvāraṃ rāghavāsyāpi pūrṇaḥ / parāśarātsatyavatyāṃ babhūva pailādibhirvedabhāgāṃśca kartum //
analyzed: tatobhavat vyāsa rūpī sa viṣṇuḥ catur vāram rāghava asya api pūrṇaḥ parāśarāt satyavatyām babhūva paila ādibhiḥ veda bhāgān ca kartum

original: tato harī raghuvaṃśevatīrṇaḥ kausalyāyāṃ rāghavaḥ sūryavaṃśe / samudrādorvigrahaṃ kartumīśo haṃ tuṃ bhūmyāṃ rāvaṇādīṃśca vīndra //
analyzed: tatas hariḥ raghu vaṃśa ivatīrṇaḥ kausalyāyām rāghavaḥ sūryavaṃśe samudra ādoḥ vigraham kartum īśaḥ ham tum bhūmyām rāvaṇa ādīn ca vīndra

original: tato harirvyāsarūpī babhūva aṣṭāviṃśe dvapare jñānarūpī / parāśarātsatyavatyāṃ mahātmā svayaṃ vedān saṃvibhaktuṃ ca devaḥ //
analyzed: tatas hariḥ vyāsa rūpī babhūva aṣṭāviṃśe dvapare jñāna rūpī parāśarāt satyavatyām mahātmā svayam vedān saṃvibhaktum ca devaḥ

original: tato hariḥ kṛṣṇarūpī babhūva devakyāṃ vai vasudevātsa viṣṇuḥ / kaṃsādīnvai nitarāṃ hantukāmaḥ samyakpātuṃ pāṇḍavāṃścāpi vīndra //
analyzed: tatas hariḥ kṛṣṇa rūpī babhūva devakyām vai vasudevāt sa viṣṇuḥ kaṃsa ādīn vai nitarām hantu kāmaḥ samyak pātum pāṇḍavān ca api vīndra

original: tataḥ kalau saṃpravṛtte haristu saṃmohanārthaṃ cāsurāṇāṃ khagendra / nāmnā buddho kīkaṭeṣu prajāto vedapramāṇaṃ nirākartumeva //
analyzed: tatas kalau saṃpravṛtte hariḥ tu saṃmohana artham ca asurāṇām khaga indra nāmnā buddhaḥ kīkaṭeṣu prajātaḥ veda pramāṇam nirākartum eva

original: tato hariḥ kalkisaṃjñaśca vīndra utpatsyate yugayormadhyasaṃdhau / dasyuprāyānbhūmipānvai nihantuṃ nāmnā harirviṣṇuguptasya gehe //
analyzed: tatas hariḥ kalki saṃjñaḥ ca vīndraḥ utpatsyate yugayoḥ madhya saṃdhau dasyu prāyān bhūmipān vai nihantum nāmnā hariḥ viṣṇuguptasya gehe

original: keśavādyāścaturviṃśatirvai saṃkarṣaṇādayaḥ / viśvādaya sahasraṃ ca parādyā amitāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: keśava ādyāḥ caturviṃśatiḥ vai saṃkarṣaṇa ādayaḥ sahasram ca para ādyāḥ amitāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: avatārā hyasaṃkhyātā viṣṇornārāyaṇasya ca / svayaṃ nārāyaṇāste te nāṇumātraṃ vibhidyate //
analyzed: avatārāḥ hi asaṃkhyātāḥ viṣṇoḥ nārāyaṇasya ca svayam nārāyaṇāḥ te te na aṇu mātram vibhidyate

original: balatorūpataścāpi guṇataśca kathañcana / anantonantaguṇataḥ pūrṇo viṣṇurna cānyathā //
analyzed: balataḥ rūpataḥ ca api guṇataḥ ca kathañcana anantaḥ unanta guṇataḥ pūrṇaḥ viṣṇuḥ na ca anyathā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe viṣṇoravatāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe viṣṇoravatāranirūpaṇam nāma pañcadaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 16
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / mahālakṣmyāḥ svarūpaṃ ca avatārānkhageśvara / śṛṇu samyaṅ mahābhāga tajjñānasya vinirṇayam //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca mahālakṣmyāḥ svarūpam ca avatārān khageśvara śṛṇu samyak mahābhāga tad jñānasya vinirṇayam

original: īśādanyasya jagato hyātmo locana eva tu / viṣayīkurute tatsyājjñānaṃ lakṣmyāḥ prakīrtitam //
analyzed: īśāt anyasya jagataḥ hi ātmaḥ locane eva tu viṣayīkurute tat syāt jñānam lakṣmyāḥ prakīrtitam

original: nityāviyoginī devī haripādaikasaṃśrayā / nityamuktā nityabuddhā mahālakṣmīḥ prakīrtitā //
mūlasya ca harerbhāryā lakṣmīḥ saṃprakīrtitā / puṃso hibhāryā prakṛtiḥ prakṛteścā bhimāninī //
analyzed: mūlasya ca hareḥ bhāryā lakṣmīḥ saṃprakīrtitā puṃsaḥ hi bhāryā prakṛtiḥ prakṛteḥ ca abhimāninī

original: sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ guṇānvīndra puruṣeṇa saha prabho / tamaḥ pānaṃ tathā kartuṃ prakṛtyākhyā tadābhavat //
analyzed: sṛṣṭim kartum guṇān vīndra puruṣeṇa saha prabho tamaḥ pānam tathā kartum prakṛti ākhyā tadā abhavat

original: vāsudevasya bhāryā tu māyā nāmnī prakīrtitā / saṃkarṣaṇasya bhāryā tu jayeti parikīrtitā //
analyzed: vāsudevasya bhāryā tu māyā nāmnī prakīrtitā saṃkarṣaṇasya bhāryā tu jayā iti parikīrtitā

original: aniruddhasya bhāryā tu śāntā nāmnīti kīrtitā / kṛtiḥ pradyumnabhāryāpiṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kartuṃ babhūvaha //
analyzed: aniruddhasya bhāryā tu śāntā nāmnī iti kīrtitā kṛtiḥ pradyumna bhāryā āpim sṛṣṭim kartum babhūvaha

original: viṣṇupatnī kīrtitā ca śrīdevī sattvamāninī / tamobhimāninī durgā kanyaketi prakīrtitā //
analyzed: viṣṇu patnī kīrtitā ca śrī devī sattva māninī tamaḥ abhimāninī durgā kanyakā iti prakīrtitā

original: kṛṣṇāvatāre kanyeva nandaputrānujā hi sā / rajobhimānibhūdevī bhāryā sā sūkarasya ca //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa avatāre kanyā iva nanda putra anujā hi sā rajaḥ abhimāni bhūdevī bhāryā sā sūkarasya ca

original: vedābhimāninī vīndra annapūrṇā prakīrtitā / nārāyaṇasya bhāryā tu lakṣmīrūpā tvajā smṛtā //
analyzed: veda abhimāninī vīndra anna pūrṇā prakīrtitā nārāyaṇasya bhāryā tu lakṣmī rūpā tu ajā smṛtā

original: yajñākhyasya harerbhāryā dakṣiṇā saṃprakīrtitā //
analyzed: yajña ākhyasya hareḥ bhāryā dakṣiṇā saṃprakīrtitā

original: jayantī vṛṣabhasyaiva patnī saṃparikīrtitā / videhaputrī sītā tu rāmabhāryā prakīrtitā //
analyzed: jayantī vṛṣabhasya eva patnī saṃparikīrtitā  videha putrī sītā tu rāma bhāryā prakīrtitā

original: rukmiṇīsatyabhāmā ca bhārye kṛṣṇasya kīrtite / ityādikā hyanantāścāpyāvatārāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ //
analyzed: rukmiṇī satyabhāmā ca bhārye kṛṣṇasya kīrtite iti ādikāḥ hi anantāḥ ca api āvatārāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ

original: ramāyāḥ saṃti viprendra bhedahīnāḥ parasparam / anantānantaguṇakādviṣṇornyūnāḥ prakīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: ramāyāḥ saṃti vipra indra bheda hīnāḥ parasparam ananta ananta guṇakāt viṣṇoḥ nyūnāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: atha brahmā ca vāyuśca śriyaḥ koṭiguṇādhamau / vakṣye ca brahmaṇo rūpaṃ śṛṇu pakṣīndrasattama //
analyzed: atha brahmā ca vāyuḥ ca śriyaḥ koṭi guṇa adhamau vakṣye ca brahmaṇaḥ rūpam śṛṇu pakṣi indra sattama

original: vāsudevātsamutpanno māyāyāṃ ca khageśvara / sa eva puruṣonāma viriñca iti kīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: vāsudevāt samutpannaḥ māyāyām ca khageśvara saḥ eva puruṣaḥ nāma viriñcaḥ iti kīrtitaḥ

original: aniruddhāttu śāntāyāṃ mahattattvatanustvabhūt / tadā mahānviriñceti saṃjñāmāpa khageśvara //
analyzed: aniruddhāt tu śāntāyām mahat tattva tanuḥ tu abhūt tadā mahān viriñca iti saṃjñām āpa khageśvara

original: rajasātra samutpanno māyāyāṃ vāsudevataḥ / vidhisaṃjño viriñcaḥ sa jñātavyaḥ pakṣisattama //
analyzed: rajasā atra samutpannaḥ māyāyām vāsudevataḥ  vidhi saṃjñaḥ viriñcaḥ sa jñātavyaḥ pakṣi sattama

original: brahmāṇḍāntaḥ padmanābho yo jātaḥ kamalāsanaḥ / sa cartumukhasaṃjñāṃ cāpyavāpa khagasattama //
analyzed: brahmāṇḍa antar padmanābhaḥ yaḥ jātaḥ kamalāsanaḥ sa cartumukha saṃjñām ca api avāpa khaga sattama

original: evaṃ catvārirūpāṇi brahmaṇaḥ kīrtitāni ca / vāyornāmāni vakṣyehaṃ śṛṇu pakṣīndrasattama //
analyzed: evam catvāri rūpāṇi brahmaṇaḥ kīrtitāni ca vāyoḥ nāmāni vakṣye iham śṛṇu pakṣi indra sattama

original: saṃkarṣaṇācca garuḍa jayāyāṃ yo vabhūva ha / sa vāyuḥ prathamo jñeyo pradhāna iti kīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: saṃkarṣaṇāt ca garuḍa jayāyām yaḥ vabhūva ha sa vāyuḥ prathamaḥ pradhānaḥ iti kīrtitaḥ

original: lokaceṣṭāpradatvātsa sūtranāmnāpi kīrtitaḥ / badarīsthasya viṣṇośca dhairyeṇa stavanāya saḥ //
analyzed: loka ceṣṭā prada tvāt sa sūtra nāmnā api kīrtitaḥ badarī sthasya viṣṇoḥ ca dhairyeṇa stavanāya saḥ

original: dhṛtirūpaṃ yayau vāyustasmāddhṛtiriti smṛtaḥ / yogyānāṃ haribhaktānāṃ dhṛtirūpeṇa saṃsthitaḥ //
analyzed: dhṛti rūpam yayau vāyuḥ tasmāt dhṛtiḥ iti smṛtaḥ yogyānām hari bhaktānām dhṛti rūpeṇa saṃsthitaḥ

original: yato hṛdi sthito vāyustato vai dhṛtisaṃjñakaḥ / sarveṣāṃ ca dṛdi sthitvā smarate sarvadā harim //
analyzed: yatas hṛdi sthitaḥ vāyuḥ tatas vai dhṛti saṃjñakaḥ sarveṣām ca dṛdi sthitvā smarate sarvadā harim

original: ato vāyuḥsthitirnāma babhūva khagasattama / athavā vāyurevaikaḥ śvetadvīpagataṃ harim //
analyzed: atas vāyuḥsthitiḥ nāma babhūva khaga sattama athavā vāyuḥ eva ekaḥ śvetadvīpa gatam harim

original: sadā smarati vai vīndra atosau smṛtisaṃjñakaḥ / sarveṣāṃ ca hṛdisthitvā jñāto viṣṇorudīraṇāt //
analyzed: sadā smarati vai vi indra atas asau smṛti saṃjñakaḥ sarveṣām ca hṛdi sthitvā jñātaḥ viṣṇoḥ udīraṇāt

original: ato me muktināmābhūdvāyureva na saṃśayaḥ / jñānadvāreṇa bhaktānāṃ muktido madanujñayā //
analyzed: atas me mukti nāmā abhūt vāyuḥ eva na saṃśayaḥ jñāna dvāreṇa bhaktānām mukti daḥ mad anujñayā

original: yato sau vāyurevaiko muktināmā bhūvaha / viṣṇau bhaktiṃ vardhyati bhaktānāṃ hṛdi saṃsthitaḥ //
analyzed: yatas sau vāyuḥ eva ekaḥ mukti nāmā bhūvaha viṣṇau bhaktim vardhyati bhaktānām hṛdi saṃsthitaḥ

original: atosau viṣṇubhaktaśca kīrtito nātra saṃśayaḥ / eṣosau sarvajīvānāṃ cittasaṃjñānameva ca //
analyzed: atas asau viṣṇu bhaktaḥ ca kīrtitaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ eṣā usau sarva jīvānām citta saṃjñānam eva ca

original: cittarūpo yato vāyurataścittamiti smṛtaḥ / prabhuḥ prabhūṇāṃ garuḍa sodarāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ //
analyzed: citta rūpaḥ yatas vāyuḥ atas cittam iti smṛtaḥ prabhuḥ prabhūṇām garuḍa sodarāṇām ca sarvaśas

original: atastu vāyurevaiko mahāprabhuriti smṛtaḥ / sarveṣāṃ ca hṛhi sthitvā balaṃ paśyati sattama //
analyzed: atas tu vāyuḥ eva ekaḥ mahā prabhuḥ iti smṛtaḥ sarveṣām ca hṛhi sthitvā balam paśyati sattama

original: ato balamiti hyākhyāmavāpa vinatāsuta / sarveṣāṃ ca hṛdi sthitvā putrapautrādikairjanaiḥ //
analyzed: atas balam iti hi ākhyām avāpa vinatā suta sarveṣām ca hṛdi sthitvā putra pautra ādikaiḥ janaiḥ

original: yājanaṃ kurute nityamatosau yaṣṭṛsaṃjñakaḥ / anantakalpamārabhya vāyuparyantameva ca //
analyzed: yājanam kurute nityam atas asau yaṣṭṛ saṃjñakaḥ ananta kalpam ārabhya vāyu paryantam eva ca

original: vakratvaṃ nāsti yogasya ṛjuryogya iti smṛtaḥ / yogasya vakratā nāma kāmyatā haripūjane / īśarudrādikānāṃ ca kāmyena haripūjanam //
analyzed: vakra tvam nā asti yogasya ṛjuḥ yogyaḥ iti smṛtaḥ yogasya vakra tā nāma kāmya tā hari pūjane  īśa rudra ādikānām ca kāmyena hari pūjanam

original: kasyacittvatha pakṣīndra hyatastvanṛjavaḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: kasyacid tu atha pakṣi indra hi atas tu anṛjavaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: ṛṣyādīnāṃ ca madhyepi kāmyena haripūjanam / ato na ṛjavo jñeyā manuṣyāṇāṃ ca kā kathā //
analyzed: ṛṣi ādīnām ca madhye pi kāmyena hari pūjanam atas na ṛjavaḥ jñeyāḥ manuṣyāṇām ca kā kathā

original: yāvatkāmyasaparyāṃ vai na jahāti narottamaḥ / tathā ṛṣyādayaścaiva mokṣasya paripanthinīm //
analyzed: yāvat kāmya saparyām vai na jahāti narottamaḥ tathā ṛṣi ādayaḥ ca eva mokṣasya paripanthinīm

original: anādikālamārabhya karmajanyā ca vāsanā / mokṣādhikāriṇaḥ sarve kurvate kasya pūjanam //
analyzed: anādi kālam ārabhya karma janyā ca vāsanā mokṣa adhikāriṇaḥ sarve kurvate kasya pūjanam

original: naṣṭaprāyaṃ ca tatsarvaṃ guroḥ saṃjñānabodhakāt / prāpyayogaṃ samācarya ante mokṣamavāpnuyāt //
analyzed: naṣṭa prāyam ca tat sarvam guroḥ saṃjñāna bodhakāt prāpya yogam samācarya ante mokṣam avāpnuyāt

original: kāmyena pūjanaṃ viṣṇoraiśvaryaṃ pradadāti ca / jñānaṃ ca viparītaṃ syāttena yātyadharaṃ tamaḥ //
analyzed: kāmyena pūjanam viṣṇoḥ aiśvaryam pradadāti ca jñānam ca viparītam syāt tena yāti adharam tamaḥ

original: tadeva viparītaṃ cejjñānāya parikīrtitam / śilāyāṃ viṣṇubuddhistu viṣṇubuddhirdvije tathā //
analyzed: tat eva viparītam ced jñānāya parikīrtitam śilāyām viṣṇu buddhiḥ tu viṣṇu buddhiḥ dvije tathā

original: salile tīrthabuddhistu roṇukāyāṃ tathaiva ca / śive sūrye paṇmukhe ca viṣṇubuddhiḥ khageśvara //
analyzed: salile tīrtha buddhiḥ tu roṇukāyām tathā eva ca śive sūrye paṇmukhe ca viṣṇu buddhiḥ khageśvara

original: ityādyamakhilaṃ jñānaṃ viparītamiti smṛtam / śilādyeṣu ca sarveṣu aikyenava vicintanam //
analyzed: iti ādyam akhilam jñānam viparītam iti smṛtam śilā ādyeṣu ca sarveṣu vicintanam

original: viṣṇubuddhiriti proktaṃ na tu tatrasthavedanam / anādyanantakālepi kāmyena haripūjanam //
analyzed: viṣṇu buddhiḥ iti proktam na tu tatrastha vedanam anādi ananta kāla ipi kāmyena hari pūjanam

original: yato nāsti tato vāyurṛjuryogyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ / anyeṣāṃ sarvadā nāsti ato na ṛjavaḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: yatas nā asti tatas vāyuḥ ṛjuḥ yogyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ anyeṣām sarvadā nā asti atas na ṛjavaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: hariṃ darśayate vāpi aparokṣeṇa sarvadā / mokṣādhikāriṇāṃ kāle ataḥ prajñeti kathyate //
analyzed: harim darśayate vā api aparokṣeṇa sarvadā mokṣa adhikāriṇām kāle atas prajñā iti kathyate

original: parokṣeṇāpi sarveṣāṃ hariṃ darśayate sadā / ato vāyuḥ sadā vīndra jñānamityeva kīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: parokṣeṇa api sarveṣām harim darśayate sadā  atas vāyuḥ sadā vi indra jñānam iti eva kīrtitaḥ

original: hitāhitopadeṣṭṛtvādbhaktānāṃ hṛdaye sthitaḥ / tataśca gurusaṃjñāṃ cāpyavāpa sa ca mārutaḥ //
analyzed: hita ahita upadeṣṭṛ tvāt bhaktānām hṛdaye sthitaḥ tatas ca guru saṃjñām ca api avāpa sa ca mārutaḥ

original: yogināṃ hṛdaye sthitvā sadhyāyati hariṃ param / pārthakyenāpi taṃ dhyāyanmahādhyāteti sa smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: yoginām hṛdaye sthitvā sa dhyāyati harim param pārthakyena api tam dhyāyan mahādhyātā iti sa smṛtaḥ

original: yadyogyatānusāreṇa vijānāti paraṃ harim / rudrādau vidyamānāṃśca guṇāñjānāti sarvadā //
analyzed: yad yogyatā anusāreṇa vijānāti param harim rudra ādau vidyamānān ca guṇān jānāti sarvadā

original: ato vai vijñanāmāsau prokto hi khagasattama / kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tyāgādvirāga iti sa smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: atas vai vijña nāmā asau proktaḥ hi khaga sattama kāmyānām karmaṇām tyāgāt virāgaḥ iti sa smṛtaḥ

original: athavāyogināṃ nityaṃ hṛdi sthitvā sa mārutaḥ / vairāgyaṃ saṃjanayati virāga iti sa smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: athavā ayoginām nityam hṛdi sthitvā sa mārutaḥ vairāgyam saṃjanayati virāgaḥ iti sa smṛtaḥ

original: devānāṃ puṇyapāpābhyāṃ sukhamevottarottaram / tatsukhaṃ tūttareṣāṃ ca vāyuparyantameva ca //
analyzed: devānām puṇya pāpābhyām sukham eva uttarottaram tat sukham tu uttareṣām ca vāyu paryantam eva ca

original: devānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca uttamānāṃ nṛṇāṃ tathā / sukhāṃśaṃ janayedvāyuryatotaḥ sukhasaṃjñakaḥ //
analyzed: devānām ca ṛṣīṇām ca uttamānām nṛṇām tathā sukha aṃśam janayet vāyuḥ yatas utas sukha saṃjñakaḥ

original: bhunakti sarvadā vīdraṃ tatra mukhyastu mārutaḥ / duḥ khaśokādikaṃ kiñciddevānāṃ bhavati prabho //
analyzed: bhunakti sarvadā vīdram tatra mukhyaḥ tu mārutaḥ duḥ kha śoka ādikam kiñcid devānām bhavati prabho

original: taccāsurāveśavaśādityavehi na saṃśayaḥ / tajjīvasya bhavetkiñciddaityānāṃ kramaśo bhavet //
analyzed: tat ca asura āveśa vaśāt iti avehi na saṃśayaḥ tat jīvasya bhavet kiñcid daityānām kramaśas bhavet

original: yataḥ kaliścādhikaḥ syādato duḥ khīti sa smṛtaḥ / daityānāṃ puṇyapāpābhyāṃ duḥ kha mevottarottaram //
analyzed: yatas kaliḥ ca adhikaḥ syāt atas duḥ khī iti sa smṛtaḥ daityānām puṇya pāpābhyām duḥ kha meva uttarottaram

original: tadduḥ khamuttareṣāṃ ca kaliparyantameva ca / bhunakti sarvadā vīndra tataḥ kaliriti smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tat duḥ kham uttareṣām ca kali paryantam eva ca bhunakti sarvadā vi indra tatas kaliḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: sukhaharṣādikaṃ kiṃ ciddaityānāṃ bhavati prabho / devāveśo bhavettasya nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: sukha harṣa ādikam kim cit daityānām bhavati prabho deva āveśaḥ bhavet tasya na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: devānāṃ nirayo nāsti daityānāṃ vinatāsuta / sukhasvarūpaṃ tannāsti viṣayotthamapi dvija //
analyzed: devānām nirayaḥ nā asti daityānām vinatā suta sukha sva rūpam tat nā asti viṣaya uttham api dvija

original: viṣayotthaṃ kiñcidapi devāveśādudīritam / tamo nāstyeva devānāṃ duḥ khaṃ nāsti svarūpataḥ //
analyzed: viṣaya uttham kiñcid api deva āveśāt udīritam tamaḥ na asti eva devānām duḥ kham nā asti svarūpataḥ

original: viṣayotthaṃ mahāduḥ khaṃ devānāṃ nāsti sarvadā / duḥ khaśokādikaṃ kiṃ cidasurāveśato bhavet //
analyzed: viṣaya uttham mahā duḥ kham devānām nā asti sarvadā duḥ kha śoka ādikam kim cit asura āveśataḥ bhavet

original: ataḥ kaliḥ sadā duḥ khī sukhī vāyustu sarvadā / manuṣyāṇā mṛṣīṇāṃ ca sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ khageśvara //
analyzed: atas kaliḥ sadā duḥ khī sukhī vāyuḥ tu sarvadā manuṣyāṇām mṛṣīṇām ca sukham duḥ kham khageśvara

original: bhavettatpuṇyipāpābhyāṃ puṇyabhogī ca mārutaḥ / kaṣṭabhaṅgaḥ kalilayo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: bhavet tat puṇyi pāpābhyām puṇya bhogī ca mārutaḥ kaṣṭa bhaṅgaḥ kali layaḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: prāṇādisukhaparyantā aṃśā ekonaviṃśatiḥ / praviṣṭāḥ saṃti lokeṣu pṛthaksaṃti khageśvara //
analyzed: prāṇa ādi sukha paryantāḥ aṃśāḥ ekonaviṃśatiḥ praviṣṭāḥ saṃti lokeṣu pṛthak saṃti khageśvara

original: mārutarevatārāṃśca śṛṇu pakṣīndrasattama / caturdaśasu candreṣu dvitīyauyo virocanaḥ //
analyzed: māruta revat arān ca śṛṇu pakṣi indra sattama caturdaśasu candreṣu dvitīyauyaḥ virocanaḥ

original: sa vāyuriti saṃprokta indrādīnāṃ khageśvara / haritattveṣu sarveṣu sa viṣvagyāvyatekṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: sa vāyuḥ iti saṃproktaḥ indra ādīnām khageśvara hari tattveṣu sarveṣu sa

original: ato rocananāmāsau marudaṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ rāmāvatāre hanumānrāmakāryārthasādhakaḥ / sa eva bhīmasenastu jāto bhūmyāṃ mahābalaḥ //
analyzed: atas rocana nāmā asau marut aṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ rāma avatāre hanumān rāma kārya artha sādhakaḥ saḥ eva bhīmasenaḥ tu jātaḥ bhūmyām mahā balaḥ

original: kṛṣṇāvatāre vijñeyo marudaṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ //
maṇimānnāma daityastu saṃrākhyo bhaviṣyati / sarveṣāṃ saṃkaraṃ yastu kariṣyati na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: maṇimān nāma daityaḥ tu saṃra ākhyaḥ bhaviṣyati sarveṣām saṃkaram yaḥ tu kariṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: tena saṃkaranāmāsau bhaviṣyati khageśvara / dharmānbhāgavatānsarvānvināśayati sarvathā //
analyzed: tena saṃkara nāmā asau bhaviṣyati khageśvara dharmān bhāgavatān sarvān vināśayati sarvathā

original: tadā bhūmau vāsudevo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ / yajñārthaiḥ sadṛśo yasya nāsti loke caturdaśe //
analyzed: tadā bhūmau vāsudevaḥ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ yajña arthaiḥ sadṛśaḥ yasya na asti loke caturdaśe

original: ataḥ sa prajñayā pūrṇo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ / avatārāstrayo vāyormataṃ bhāgavatābhidham //
analyzed: atas sa prajñayā pūrṇaḥ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ avatārāḥ trayaḥ vāyoḥ matam bhāgavata abhidham

original: sthāpanaṃ duṣṭadamanaṃ dvayameva prayojanam / nānyatprayojanaṃ vāyostathā vairocanātmake //
analyzed: sthāpanam duṣṭa damanam dvayam eva prayojanam na anyat prayojanam vāyoḥ tathā vairocana ātmake

original: avatāratraye vīndra duḥ khaṃ garbhādisaṃbhavam / nāsti nāstyeva vāyostu tathā vairocanādike //
analyzed: avatāra traye vi indra dus kham garbha ādi saṃbhavam na asti na asti eva vāyoḥ tu tathā vairocana ādike

original: śukraśoṇitasaṃbandho hyavatāracatuṣṭaye / nāsti nāstyeva pakṣīndra yato nāstyaśubhaṃ tataḥ //
analyzed: śukra śoṇita saṃbandhaḥ hi avatāra catuṣṭaye na asti na asti eva pakṣi indra yatas na asti aśubham tatas

original: pūrvaṃ garbhaṃ samāśoṣya samaye prabhavasya ca / prādurbhavati deveśī hyavatāracatuṣṭaye //
analyzed: pūrvam garbham samāśoṣya samaye prabhavasya ca prādurbhavati deveśī hi avatāra catuṣṭaye

original: trayoviṃśatirūpāṇāṃ vāyoścaiva khageśvara / rūpairṛjusvarūpaiśca brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ //
analyzed: trayoviṃśati rūpāṇām vāyoḥ ca eva khageśvara rūpaiḥ ṛju svarūpaiḥ ca brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: satyameva na saṃdeho nityānandasukhādiṣu / evameva vijānīyānnānyathā tu kathañcana //
analyzed: satyam eva na saṃdehaḥ nitya ānanda sukha ādiṣu evam eva vijānīyāt na anyathā tu kathañcana

original: etasya śravaṇādeva mokṣaṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥ / tadanantarajānvakṣye śṛṇu pakṣīndrasattama //
analyzed: etasya śravaṇāt eva mokṣam yānti na saṃśayaḥ tad anantara jān vakṣye śṛṇu pakṣi indra sattama

original: kṛtau pradyumnataścaiva samutpanne khageśvara / striyau dve yamale caiva tayormadhye tu yadyikā //
analyzed: kṛtau pradyumnataḥ ca eva samutpanne khageśvara striyau dve yamale ca eva tayoḥ madhye tu yadyikā

original: vāṇītisaṃjñakāṃ vīndra brahmāṇīsaṃjñakāṃ viduḥ / puruṣākhyaviriñcasya bhāryā sāvitrikā matā / caturmukhasya bhāryā tu kīrtitā sā sarasvatī //
analyzed: vāṇī iti saṃjñakām vīndra brahmāṇī saṃjñakām viduḥ puruṣa ākhya viriñcasya bhāryā sāvitrikā matā caturmukhasya bhāryā tu kīrtitā sā sarasvatī

original: evaṃ trirūpaṃ vijñeyaṃ vāṇyāśca khagasattama / vakṣye 'vatārān bhāratyāḥ samāhitamanāḥ śṛṇu //
analyzed: evam trirūpam vijñeyam vāṇyāḥ ca khaga sattama vakṣye vatārān bhāratyāḥ samāhita manāḥ śṛṇu

original: sarvavedābhimānitvātsarvavedātmikā smṛtā / mahādhyātuśca vāyostu bhāryāsā parikīrtitā //
analyzed: sarva veda abhimāni tvāt sarva veda ātmikā smṛtā mahādhyātuḥ ca vāyoḥ tu bhāryā asā parikīrtitā

original: jñānarūpasya vāyostu bhāryā sā parikīrtitā / sadā sukhasvarūpatvādbhāratī tu sukhātmikā //
analyzed: jñāna rūpasya vāyoḥ tu bhāryā sā parikīrtitā sadā sukha sva rūpa tvāt bhāratī tu sukha ātmikā

original: sukhasvarūpa vāyostu bhāryā sā parikīrtitā / gurustu vāyurevoktastasmin bhaktiyutā satī //
analyzed: bhāryā sā parikīrtitā guruḥ tu vāyuḥ eva uktaḥ tasmin bhakti yutā satī

original: tatastu bhāratī nityā gurubhaktiriti smṛtā / mahāgurorhi vāyośca bhāryā vai parikīrtitā //
analyzed: tatas tu bhāratī nityā guru bhaktiḥ iti smṛtā mahā guroḥ hi vāyoḥ ca bhāryā vai parikīrtitā

original: harau snehayutatvācca hariprītiriti smṛtā / dhṛtirūpasya vāyośca bhāryā sā parikīrtitā //
analyzed: harau sneha yuta tvāt ca hariprītiḥ iti smṛtā dhṛti rūpasya vāyoḥ ca bhāryā sā parikīrtitā

original: sarvamantrābhimānitvātsarvamantrātmikā smṛtā / mahāprabhośca vāyośca bhāryā vai sā prakīrtitā //
analyzed: sarva mantra abhimāni tvāt sarva mantra ātmikā smṛtā mahā prabhoḥ ca vāyoḥ ca bhāryā vai sā prakīrtitā

original: bhujyante sarvabhogāstu viṣṇuprītyarthamevaca / atastu bhāratī jñeyā bhujināmnā prakīrtitā //
analyzed: bhujyante sarva bhogāḥ tu viṣṇu prīti artham eva ca atas tu bhāratī jñeyā bhuji nāmnā prakīrtitā

original: citrarūpasya vāyostu bhāryā sā parikīrtitā / rocanendrasya bhāryā ca śraddhākhyā parikīrtitā //
analyzed: citrarūpasya vāyoḥ tu bhāryā sā parikīrtitā rocanā indrasya bhāryā ca śraddhā ākhyā parikīrtitā

original: hanumāṃśca tadā jajñe tretāyāṃ pakṣisattama / tadā śivākhyaviprācca jajñe sā bhāratī smṛtā //
analyzed: hanumān ca tadā jajñe tretāyām pakṣi sattama tadā śiva ākhya viprāt ca jajñe sā bhāratī smṛtā

original: na kevalaṃ bhāratī sāśacyādyaiścaiva saṃyutā / tasminsaṃjanitāḥ sarvāḥ prāpuryogaṃ svabhartṛbhiḥ //
analyzed: na kevalam bhāratī sā a śacī ādyaiḥ ca eva saṃyutā tasmin saṃjanitāḥ sarvāḥ prāpuḥ yogam sva bhartṛbhiḥ

original: anyageti ca vijñeyā kanyā tanmatisaṃjñikā / tretānte saiva pakṣīndra śacyādyaiścaiva saṃyutā //
analyzed: anyagā iti ca vijñeyā kanyā tad mati saṃjñikā tretā ante sā eva pakṣi indra śacī ādyaiḥ ca eva saṃyutā

original: damayantyanalājjātā indraseneti cocyate / nalaṃ nandayate yasmāttasmācca nalanandinī //
analyzed: damayantī analāt jātā indrasenā iti ca ucyate nalam nandayate yasmāt tasmāt ca nalanandinī

original: tatra svabhartṛsaṃyogaṃ naiva cāpa khageśvara / tatrānyagātvaṃ vijñeyaṃ puruṣasthena vāyunā //
analyzed: tatra sva bhartṛ saṃyogam nā eva cāpa khageśvara tatra anya gā tvam vijñeyam puruṣa sthena vāyunā

original: kiñcitkālaṃ tathā sthitvā kanyaiva mṛti māpa sā / śacyādisaṃyutā saiva drupadasya mahātmanaḥ //
analyzed: kiñcid kālam tathā sthitvā kanyā eva mṛti māpa sā  / śacī ādi saṃyutā sā eva drupadasya mahātmanaḥ

original: vedimadhyātsamudbhūtā bhīmasenārthameva ca / tatrānyagātvaṃ nāstyeva yogaśca saha bhartṛbhiḥ //
analyzed: vedi madhyāt samudbhūtā bhīmasena artham eva ca tatra anya gā tvam na asti eva yogaḥ ca saha bhartṛbhiḥ

original: kevalā bhāratī jñeyā kāśirājasya kanyakā / kālī nāmnā tu sā jñeyā bhīmasenapriyā sadā //
analyzed: kevalā bhāratī jñeyā kāśi rājasya kanyakā kālī nāmnā tu sā jñeyā bhīmasena priyā sadā

original: vācyādibhiḥ saṃyutaivadraupadī drupadātmajā / dehaṃ tyaktvāviśiṣṭaiva kāraṭīgrāmasaṃjñakai //
analyzed: vācya ādibhiḥ saṃyutā eva draupadī drupada ātmajā deham tyaktvā a viśiṣṭā eva kāraṭīgrāma saṃjñakaiḥ

original: saṃkarasya gṛhe vīndra bhaviṣyati kalau yuge / vāyostṛtīyarūpārthaṃ sā kanyaiva mṛtiṃ gatā //
analyzed: saṃkarasya gṛhe vīndra bhaviṣyati kalau yuge vāyoḥ tṛtīya rūpa artham sā kanyā eva mṛtim gatā

original: ityādyā vāyubhāryāśca brahmabhāryāśca satama / svabhartṛbhyāṃ ca pakṣīndra guṇaiścaiva śatādhamāḥ //
analyzed: ityādyāḥ vāyu bhāryāḥ ca brahma bhāryāḥ ca satama sva bhartṛbhyām ca pakṣi indra guṇaiḥ ca eva śata adhamāḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe mahālakṣmyavatārādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe mahālakṣmyavatārādinirūpaṇam nāma ṣoḍaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 17
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / caturjanmasu vai kṛṣṇa śacyādyaiḥ saha bhāratī / ekadeha viśiṣṭaiva bhuvi jāteti coktavān //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca catur janmasu vai kṛṣṇa śacī ādyaiḥ saha bhāratī eka deha viśiṣṭā eva bhuvi jātā iti ca uktavān

original: kāraṇaṃ brūhi me brahman śiṣyāya tava suvrata / garuḍenaivamuktastamuvāca madhusūdanaḥ //
analyzed: kāraṇam brūhi me brahman śiṣyāya tava suvrata garuḍena evam uktaḥ tam uvāca madhusūdanaḥ

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / viśiṣṭadehasaṃ prāptau bhāratyāḥ pakṣisattama / vakṣyāmi kāraṇaṃ vīndra sāvadhānamanāḥ śṛṇu //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca viśiṣṭa dehasam prāptau bhāratyāḥ pakṣi sattama vakṣyāmi kāraṇam vi indra sa avadhāna manāḥ śṛṇu

original: purā kṛtayuge vīndra rudrabhāryā ca pārvatī / indrabhāryā śacī devī yama bhāryāca śāmalā //
analyzed: purā kṛta yuge rudra bhāryā ca pārvatī indra bhāryā śacī devī yama bhāryā ca śāmalā

original: aśvibhāryā uṣā devī bhartṛbhiḥ sahitā khaga / brahmalokaṃ yayustatra brahmāṇaṃ dadṛśustadā //
analyzed: aśvi bhāryā uṣāḥ devī bhartṛbhiḥ sahitā khaga brahma lokam yayuḥ tatra brahmāṇam dadṛśuḥ tadā

original: hāvaṃ bhāvaṃ vilāsaṃ ca darśayāmāsurañjasā / dṛṣṭvā tā uddhatā brahmā śaśāpa khagasattama //
analyzed: hāvam bhāvam vilāsam ca darśayāmāsuḥ añjasā dṛṣṭvā tāḥ uddhatāḥ brahmā śaśāpa khaga sattama

original: uddhatāśca yato yūyaṃ mānuṣīṃ yonimāpsyatha / tatra svabhartṛsaṃyogamavāpsyatha khageśvara //
analyzed: uddhatāḥ ca yatas yūyam mānuṣīm yonim āpsyatha tatra sva bhartṛ saṃyogam avāpsyatha khageśvara

original: evaṃ śaptāstu tāḥ sarvā ājagmurmeruparvatam / tatropaviṣṭaṃ brahmāṇaṃ vañcayāmāsurañjasā //
analyzed: evam śaptāḥ tu tāḥ sarvāḥ ājagmuḥ meru parvatam tatra upaviṣṭam brahmāṇam vañcayāmāsuḥ añjasā

original: tūṣṇīmeva sthite vīndra vañcayantyaḥ sthitāḥ punaḥ / tatastūṣṇīṃ sthitaṃ vīndra vañcayāmāsurañjasā //
analyzed: tūṣṇīm eva sthite vīndra vañcayantyaḥ sthitāḥ punar tatas tūṣṇīm sthitam vīndra vañcayāmāsuḥ añjasā

original: trivārānantaraṃ brahmā śaptavāṃstā mahāprabhuḥ / trivāraṃ vañcanaṃ yasmādekavāraṃ ca darśanam //
analyzed: tri vāra anantaram brahmā śaptavān tāḥ mahā prabhuḥ tri vāram vañcanam yasmāt eka vāram ca darśanam

original: kiṃ cāśrutvātaḥ paścāccaturjanmasu bhūtale / ekadehānmānuṣatvaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: kim ca a śrutvā atas paścāt catur janmasu bhū tale eka dehāt mānuṣa tvam bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: dvitīye janmani tathā anyagātvamavāpsyatha / tṛtīye janmani tathā bhartṛsaṃyoga māpsyatha //
analyzed: dvitīye janmani tathā anya gātvam avāpsyatha tṛtīye janmani tathā bhartṛ saṃyoga māpsyatha

original: janmanyādye caturthe ca nānyagātvamavāpsyatha / tathā svabhartṛsaṃyogaṃ nāvāpsyatha ca sarvaśaḥ //
analyzed: janmani ādye caturthe ca nā anya gātvam avāpsyatha tathā sva bhartṛ saṃyogam nā avāpsyatha ca sarvaśas

original: evaṃ śaptāstu tāḥ sarvā brahmaṇā pakṣisattama / tadā vicārayāmāsurmilitvā merumūrdhani //
analyzed: evam śaptāḥ tu tāḥ sarvāḥ brahmaṇā pakṣi sattama tadā vicārayāmāsuḥ militvā meru mūrdhani

original: brahmaśāpastvanirvāya upāyaiḥ śataśopi ca / nīcaiḥ samāgamo nindyastathaiva ca vipattidaḥ //
analyzed: brahma śāpaḥ tu anirvāyaḥ upāyaiḥ śataśas upi ca nīcaiḥ samāgamaḥ nindyaḥ tathā eva ca vipatti daḥ

original: uttamena ca saṃgena daivenāpyarthado bhavet / devānāmuttamo vāyustadarthaṃ saṃgamācaret //
analyzed: uttamena ca saṃgena daivena api artha daḥ bhavet devānām uttamaḥ vāyuḥ tad artham saṃgam ācaret

original: vicāryaivamumādyā bhāratyāḥ sevāṃ tu cakrire / sahasravatsarānte sā bhāratī toṣitābravīt //
analyzed: vicārya evam umā ādyāḥ bhāratyāḥ sevām tu cakrire sahasra vatsara ante sā bhāratī toṣitā abravīt

original: matsevāṃ ca kimarthaṃ vai hyācariṣyanti suvratāḥ / tasyāṃ raktāśca tā devyastvabruvansvacikīrṣitam //
analyzed: mad sevām ca kimartham vai hi ācariṣyanti suvratāḥ tasyām raktāḥ ca tāḥ devyaḥ tu abruvan sva cikīrṣitam

original: purā vayaṃ tu śaptāḥ sma brahmaṇā krodharūpiṇā / ekadehānmānuṣatvamavāpsyatha varāṅganāḥ //
analyzed: purā vayam tu śaptāḥ sma brahmaṇā krodha rūpiṇā eka dehāt mānuṣa tvam avāpsyatha vara aṅganāḥ

original: caturthajanmanyapyevaṃ dvitīye janmani prabho / samāpsyathānyagātvaṃ cetyevaṃ śaptā ha bhāmini //
analyzed: caturtha janmani api evam dvitīye janmani prabho samāpsyatha anya gā tvam ca iti evam śaptā ha bhāmini

original: asmākaṃ vāyunā devenānyagātvaṃ na doṣabhāk / atastvayaikadehatvamicchāmo devi janmasu //
analyzed: asmākam vāyunā devena anya gā tvam na doṣa bhāj atas tvayā eka deha tvam icchāmaḥ devi janmasu

original: hatyuktā tābhiratha ca tathaityuktvā dvijottama / sā pārvatyādibhiryuktā bhāratītyabhavadbhuvi //
analyzed: hati uktā tābhiḥ atha ca tathā eti uktvā dvijottama sā pārvatī ādibhiḥ yuktā bhāratī iti abhavat bhuvi

original: śivanāmno dvijasyaiva gṛhe sā tu kumārikā / karmaikyārthaṃ tapaścakreḥ viṣṇośca śivasaṃjñinaḥ //
analyzed: śiva nāmnaḥ dvijasya eva gṛhe sā tu kumārikā karma aikya artham tapaḥ cakreḥ viṣṇoḥ ca śiva saṃjñinaḥ

original: tapasā toṣitā viṣṇuḥ śiva saṃjño mahāprabhuḥ / varaṃ prādāttṛtīyesminkṛṣṇajanmani bho striyaḥ //
analyzed: tapasā toṣitā viṣṇuḥ śiva saṃjñaḥ mahā prabhuḥ varam prādāt tṛtīye smin kṛṣṇa janmani bho striyaḥ

original: samyaktvabhartṛsaṃyogo bhaviṣyati vinā bhavam / yatonayā ca pārvatyā preritā eva sarvaśaḥ //
analyzed: samyaktva bhartṛ saṃyogaḥ bhaviṣyati vinā bhavam yatas unayā ca pārvatyā preritāḥ eva sarvaśas

original: vilāsaṃ darśayāmāsa brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ / ataḥ sā pārvātī śreṣṭhā brahmadehe na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: vilāsam darśayāmāsa brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ  atas sā pārvātī śreṣṭhā brahma dehe na saṃśayaḥ

original: kṛṣṇadehepi tasyāstu na bhaviṣyati saṃgamaḥ / anyagātvaṃ dvitīyesminbhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa dehe pi tasyāḥ tu na bhaviṣyati saṃgamaḥ anya gā tvam dvitīye smin bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: rudrāntaḥ stho hariścaiva vahaṃ dattvā striyāṃ prabhuḥ / antardhānaṃ yayau śrīmānsvalokaṃ gatavānabhūt //
analyzed: rudra antar sthaḥ hariḥ ca eva vaham dattvā striyām prabhuḥ antardhānam yayau śrīmān sva lokam gatavān abhūt

original: visṛjya tāśca taṃ dehaṃ babhūvurnalakanyakāḥ / indraseneti saṃjñāṃ ca labdhvā tāśca tapovanam //
analyzed: visṛjya tāḥ ca tam deham babhūvuḥ nala kanyakāḥ indrasenā iti saṃjñām ca labdhvā tāḥ ca tapaḥ vanam

original: yayustatra carantyastā dadṛśurmudgalaṃ tvṛṣim / tasya darśanamātreṇa babhūvuḥ kāmamohitāḥ //
analyzed: yayuḥ tatra carantyaḥ tāḥ dadṛśuḥ mudgalam tu ṛṣim tasya darśana mātreṇa babhūvuḥ kāma mohitāḥ

original: mudgalasyābhimānaṃ hi nāśayitvā ca mārutaḥ / ramayāmāsa tatrasthā bhāratyādivarāṅganāḥ //
analyzed: mudgalasya abhimānam hi nāśayitvā ca mārutaḥ ramayāmāsa tatrasthāḥ bhāratī ādi vara aṅganāḥ

original: taddehena visṛṣṭā sā babhūva draupadīti ca / yasmātsā drupadājjātā tasmātsā draupadī smṛtā //
analyzed: tad dehena visṛṣṭā sā babhūva draupadī iti ca yasmāt sā drupadāt jātā tasmāt sā draupadī smṛtā

original: vedimadhyātsamudbhūtā tasmātsāyonijā smṛtā / kṛṣṇavarṇā yatastasmātsā kṛṣṇā bhūtale smṛtā //
analyzed: vedi madhyāt samudbhūtā tasmāt sā ayonijā smṛtā kṛṣṇa varṇā yatas tasmāt sā kṛṣṇā bhū tale smṛtā

original: kṛṣṇādehapi bhāratyā abhimānaḥ sadā smṛtaḥ / śacyāderabhimānastu tasmindehe kadācana //
analyzed: bhāratyāḥ abhimānaḥ sadā smṛtaḥ śacī ādeḥ abhimānaḥ tu tasmin dehe kadācana

original: yasyāḥ svabhartṛsaṃyogakāle ca khagasattama / abhimānastadaiva syāttasyā eva na cānyathā //
analyzed: yasyāḥ sva bhartṛ saṃyoga kāle ca khaga sattama abhimānaḥ tadā eva syāt tasyāḥ eva na ca anyathā

original: etāsāṃ ramaṇe kāle umāyāḥ pakṣisattama / abhimānaśca nāstyeva svāpa eva ratāḥ sadā //
analyzed: etāsām ramaṇe kāle umāyāḥ pakṣi sattama abhimānaḥ ca na asti eva svāpe eva ratāḥ sadā

original: pārthasya ramaṇe kāle draupadyāśca kalevare / bhāratyāśca tathā śacyā abhimānadvayaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: pārthasya ramaṇe kāle draupadyāḥ ca kalevare  bhāratyāḥ ca tathā śacyāḥ abhimāna dvayam smṛtam

original: umādeḥ śyāma lādeśca abhimānakṣatistadā / sarvāsāṃ svāpa eva syānnātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: abhimāna kṣatiḥ tadā sarvāsām svāpaḥ eva syāt na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: arjunaṃ vīrarūpeṇa praviṣṭo vāyureva ca / bhāratīṃ ramate nityaṃ śāmalāṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ //
analyzed: arjunam vīra rūpeṇa praviṣṭaḥ vāyuḥ eva ca bhāratīm ramate nityam śāmalām ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: suṃdareṇa ca rūpeṇa praviṣṭo nakule marut / ramate bhāratīṃ nityaṃ nakulaścāpyuṣāṃ khaga //
analyzed: suṃdareṇa ca rūpeṇa praviṣṭaḥ nakule marut ramate bhāratīm nityam nakulaḥ ca api uṣām khaga

original: nītirūpeṇa cāviṣṭo sahadeve ca mārutaḥ / draupadīṃ ramate nityaṃ sahadevotpayuṣāṃ khaga //
analyzed: nīti rūpeṇa ca āviṣṭaḥ sahadeve ca mārutaḥ draupadīm ramate nityam khaga

original: śacyādyā draupadīdehe nāpuḥ saṃgaṃ ca mārutaḥ / tāsāmatonyagāmitvaṃ kṛṣṇādehe na cintayet //
analyzed: śacī ādyāḥ draupadī dehe na āpuḥ saṃgam ca mārutaḥ tāsām atonya gāmi tvam kṛṣṇā dehe na cintayet

original: dharmādidehasaṃgaṃ ca bhāratyā naiva cintayet / manujasya ca dehasya tāsāṃ saṃgaṃ cintayet //
analyzed: dharma ādi deha saṃgam ca bhāratyāḥ nā eva cintayet manujasya ca dehasya tāsām saṃgam cintayet

original: aparokṣavatīnāṃ tu tāsāṃ lepo na sarvathā / athavā mudgalasyeva ratikāle khageśvara //
analyzed: aparokṣavatīnām tu tāsām lepaḥ na sarvathā athavā mudgalasya iva rati kāle khageśvara

original: ramaṇaṃ cakrurevaṃ tā ato doṣo na vidyate / ekasmindivase vīndra dharmo vāyuśca tāvubhau //
analyzed: ramaṇam cakruḥ evam tāḥ atas doṣaḥ na vidyate ekasmin divase vi indra dharmaḥ vāyuḥ ca tau ubhau

original: ramaṇaṃ cakratuḥ samyakkṛṣṇādehe 'pi mānada / tathāpyananyāgāmitvaṃ cintanīyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: ramaṇam cakratuḥ samyak kṛṣṇā dehe mānada tathā api ananyāgāmi tvam cintanīyam na saṃśayaḥ

original: surāṇāṃ surabhogyāśca bhogaṃ jānanti devatāḥ / na jānantyeva martyāṃstu teṣu deheṣu te punaḥ //
analyzed: surāṇām sura bhogyāḥ ca bhogam jānanti devatāḥ na jānanti eva martyān tu teṣu deheṣu te punar

original: nīrakṣīravivikaṃ ca haṃso vetti na cāparaḥ / ataḥ svabhartṛsaṃyogaṃ kṛṣṇādehena cintayet kṛṣṇādehenyagāmitvaṃ naiva cintyaṃ khageśvara //
analyzed: nīra kṣīra vivikam ca haṃsaḥ vetti na ca aparaḥ atas sva bhartṛ saṃyogam kṛṣṇā dehena cintayet kṛṣṇā dehenya gāmi tvam na eva cintyam khageśvara

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhāratyā viśiṣṭadeha saṃprāptyai kāraṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe bhāratyāḥ viśiṣṭa deha saṃprāptyai kāraṇanirūpaṇam nāma saptadaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 18
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / athānantarajānvakṣye śṛṇu pakṣīndrasattama / śṛṇu tānsāvadhānena śrutvā tānavadhāraya //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca atha anantara jān vakṣye śṛṇu pakṣi indra sattama śṛṇu tān sa avadhānena śrutvā tān avadhāraya

original: puruṣākhyaviriñcānujātaḥ śeṣo mahābalaḥ / hare ramāyāśca yasya svasminnidrāṃ prakurvataḥ //
analyzed: puruṣa ākhya viriñca anujātaḥ śeṣaḥ mahā balaḥ hare ramāyāḥ ca yasya svasmin nidrām prakurvataḥ

original: śayanārthamabhūdeṣa tena kṛtyaṃ harerna tu / sarvadā haridāsohaṃ sarvadā haripūjakaḥ //
analyzed: śayana artham abhūt eṣa tena kṛtyam hareḥ na tu sarvadā hari dāsaḥ ham sarvadā hari pūjakaḥ

original: hare sadā namāmi tvāṃ bahu janmani janmani / evaṃ buddhā tu garuḍo hyabhūcca śayanaṃ hareḥ //
analyzed: hare sadā namāmi tvām bahu janmani janmani  evam buddhā tu garuḍaḥ hi abhūt ca śayanam hareḥ

original: sūtranāmnastathā vāyoḥ sadāyaṃ vinatāsuta / kālanāmā ca garuḍo vāhanārthaṃ harerabhūt //
analyzed: sūtra nāmnaḥ tathā vāyoḥ sadā ayam vinatā suta kāla nāmā ca garuḍaḥ vāhana artham hareḥ abhūt

original: tato mahattattvatanorviriñcāttu khageśvara / ahaṃ kārātmako rudraḥ samabhūtsovituṃ harim //
analyzed: tatas mahat tattva tanoḥ viriñcāt tu khageśvara aham kārā ātmakaḥ rudraḥ samabhūt sovitum harim

original: traya ete mahābhāga parasparasamāḥ smṛtāḥ / gāyatrībhāratībhyāṃ te trayaḥ śataguṇā varāḥ //
analyzed: trayaḥ ete mahābhāga paraspara samāḥ smṛtāḥ gāyatrī bhāratībhyām te trayaḥ śataguṇāḥ varāḥ

original: śeṣaḥ sa eva vijñeyo bhakto nārāyaṇasya ca / viṣṇorvāyoranantasya tribhiraṃśairyutaḥ sadā //
analyzed: śeṣaḥ saḥ eva vijñeyaḥ bhaktaḥ nārāyaṇasya ca viṣṇoḥ vāyoḥ anantasya tribhiḥ aṃśaiḥ yutaḥ sadā

original: sumitrāṃśo daśarathājjāto yo lakṣmaṇaḥ khaga / sopi śeṣastu vijñeyo vāyvanantāṃśasaṃyutaḥ //
analyzed: sumitra aṃśaḥ daśarathāt jātaḥ yaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ khaga saḥ api śeṣaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ vāyu ananta aṃśa saṃyutaḥ

original: rāmasya sevāṃ kartuṃ sā sītā bhūmyāṃ khagādhipa / balabhadrastu rohiṇyāṃ vasudevādabhūtkhaga //
analyzed: rāmasya sevām kartum sā sītā bhūmyām khaga adhipa balabhadraḥ tu rohiṇyām vasudevāt abhūt khaga

original: soyamepa tu vijñeyastvaṃśadvayasamanvitaḥ / āviṣṭaḥ śuklakṛṣṇe hariṇā rohiṇīsutaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ yam epa tu vijñeyaḥ tu aṃśa dvaya samanvitaḥ āviṣṭaḥ śukla kṛṣṇe hariṇā rohiṇīsutaḥ

original: traya ete māhābhāgāvatārāḥ phaṇinaḥ smṛtāḥ / na vīndrāsyāvatārosti bhūmyāṃ cājñā tathā hareḥ //
analyzed: trayaḥ ete māhābhāga avatārāḥ phaṇinaḥ smṛtāḥ na vi indra asya avatāraḥ usti bhūmyām ca ājñā tathā hareḥ

original: rudrāvatārānvakṣyehaṃ tāñchṛṇu tvaṃ samāhitaḥ / yohaṅkārātmako rudraḥ sa evābhūtkhageśvara //
analyzed: rudra avatārān vakṣya iham tān śṛṇu tvam samāhitaḥ yaḥ uhaṅkāra ātmakaḥ rudraḥ saḥ eva abhūt khageśvara

original: sadāśiva iti tvākhyāmavāpa sa vināśakaḥ / tamobhimānī sa jñeyastvaśivatvātsadāśivaḥ //
analyzed: sadāśivaḥ iti tu ākhyām avāpa sa vināśakaḥ tamaḥ abhimānī sa jñeyaḥ tu aśiva tvāt sadāśivaḥ

original: kapālamālāmaśivāṃ sadā dhārayate yataḥ / ataḥ sadāśaivo jñeyo na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ //
analyzed: kapāla mālām aśivām sadā dhārayate yatas atas sadāśaivaḥ jñeyaḥ na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ

original: gajājinaṃ cāpavitraṃ yato dhārayate haraḥ / lokānamaṅgalānsarvānharate ca sadā haraḥ //
analyzed: gaja ajinam ca apavitram yatas dhārayate haraḥ lokān amaṅgalān sarvān harate ca sadā haraḥ

original: haryājñayā sadā lokānvipayāsaktacetasaḥ / vimukhānkurute yasmādviṣṇostasmātsadāśivaḥ //
analyzed: hari ājñayā sadā lokān vipaya āsakta cetasaḥ vimukhān kurute yasmāt viṣṇoḥ tasmāt sadāśivaḥ

original: kadācidasurāveśādviruddhaṃ kurute haraḥ / ataḥ sadāśivo jñeyo na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ //
analyzed: kadācid asura āveśāt viruddham kurute haraḥ atas sadāśivaḥ jñeyaḥ na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ

original: soyaṃ śmaśānavasatiṃ kartumaicchadyato haraḥ / ataḥ sadāśivo jñeyo na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ uyam śmaśāna vasatim kartum aicchat yatas haraḥ atas sadāśivaḥ jñeyaḥ na ca bhāgavataḥ śivaḥ

original: daśavarṣaṃ tapaḥ kartuṃ viveśa lavaṇāṃbhasi / ato rudrastapaḥ saṃjñāmavāpa ca khagottama //
analyzed: daśa varṣam tapaḥ kartum viveśa lavaṇāṃbhasi  atas rudraḥ tapaḥ saṃjñām avāpa ca khaga uttama

original: vyāsaputraḥ śukaḥ prokto vāyorāveśasaṃyutaḥ / rudrāvatāro vijñeyo jñānārthamabhavadbhuvi //
analyzed: vyāsa putraḥ śukaḥ proktaḥ vāyoḥ āveśa saṃyutaḥ rudra avatāraḥ vijñeyaḥ jñāna artham abhavat bhuvi

original: atripatnyanusūyāyāṃ jajñe rudro mahātapāḥ / durvāsāstu sa vijñeyo mānabhaṅgāya bhūbhṛtām //
analyzed: atri patnī anusūyāyām jajñe rudraḥ mahā tapāḥ durvāsāḥ tu sa vijñeyaḥ māna bhaṅgāya bhūbhṛtām

original: droṇājjāto drauṇisaṃjño rudra eva prakīrtitaḥ / prārabdhaṃ bhoktukāmosau parapakṣaprakāśakaḥ //
analyzed: droṇāt jātaḥ drauṇi saṃjñaḥ rudraḥ eva prakīrtitaḥ prārabdham bhoktu kāmaḥ asau para pakṣa prakāśakaḥ

original: īśānakoṇe saṃsthito yastu rudro hyavāpa vai vāmadeveti saṃjñām / svavāmabhāge saṃsthitaṃ caiva vāyustaṃ yogyabhaktaṃ sevate sarvadaiva //
analyzed: īśāna koṇe saṃsthitaḥ yaḥ tu rudraḥ hi avāpa vai vāmadeva iti saṃjñām sva vāma bhāge saṃsthitam ca eva vāyuḥ tam yogya bhaktam sevate sarvadā eva

original: ato rudro vāmadeveti saṃjñā mavāpa śiṣṭatvamathottamatvam / kālātmakatvaṃ ca balātmakatvamavāpa rudro na tu suṃdaratvataḥ //
analyzed: atas rudraḥ vāmadeva iti saṃjñā m avāpa śiṣṭa tvam atha uttama tvam kāla ātmaka tvam ca bala ātmaka tvam avāpa rudraḥ na tu suṃdara tvataḥ

original: sadā rudro tripurasthāṃśca daityānviṣṇuduho hantu kāmo mahātmā / aghorarūpaṃ dhṛpavānrudra eva tatastvaghoreti sa āpa saṃjñām //
analyzed: sadā tripura sthān ca daityān viṣṇu duhaḥ hantu kāmaḥ mahātmā aghora rūpam dhṛpavān rudraḥ eva tatas tu aghora iti saḥ āpa saṃjñām

original: sevāṃ kartuṃ tvicchato daityasaṃghānkiñcitkālaṃ tapasā kliśyamānān / varāndātuṃ sadya evābhijātaḥ sadyojātetyeva saṃjñāmavāpa //
analyzed: sevām kartum tu icchataḥ daitya saṃghān kiñcid kālam tapasā kliśyamānān varān dātum sadyas eva abhijātaḥ sadyojāta iti eva saṃjñām avāpa

original: uroḥ putrastu aurvaśca rudra eva prakīrtitaḥ / ityakṛṣṭavācitvādrusturodanavācakaḥ //
analyzed: uroḥ putraḥ tu aurvaḥ ca rudraḥ eva prakīrtitaḥ iti akṛṣṭa vāci tvāt rustu rodana vācakaḥ

original: urū rudro hyataḥ proktastatputraścaurvasaṃjñakaḥ / rudramurvaritaṃ kartumaurvobhūdrudra eva saḥ //
analyzed: uruḥ rudraḥ hi atas proktaḥ tad putraḥ ca aurva saṃjñakaḥ rudram urvaritam kartum aurvaḥ bhūt rudraḥ eva saḥ

original: garuḍa uvāca / rodanaṃ kurute kasmādurusaṃjño hare haraḥ / rudamurvaritaṃ kasmātkurute aurvākārakaḥ //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca rodanam kurute kasmāt uru saṃjñaḥ hare haraḥ rudam urvaritam kasmāt kurute aurvā kārakaḥ

original: etadvistārya mebrūhi pautrāya tava suvrata / ityuktastena sa hariruvāca karuṇānidhiḥ //
analyzed: etat vistārya me brūhi pautrāya tava suvrata iti uktaḥ tena sa hariḥ uvāca karuṇā nidhiḥ

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / dṛṣṭvā svabiṃbaṃ suguṇaistu pūrṇaṃ saṃkarṣaṇākhyaṃ natapādapadm / śrībrahmaśeṣairjiṣṇukāmaistathānyairbhāratyā vai svasti paiścāpi nityam //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca dṛṣṭvā sva biṃbam su guṇaiḥ tu pūrṇam saṃkarṣaṇa ākhyam nata pāda padam  śrī brahma śeṣaiḥ jiṣṇu kāmaiḥ tathā anyaiḥ bhāratyāḥ vai svasti paiḥ ca api nityam

original: dṛṣṭvā hariṃ pulakāṅgastu rudraḥ sabhāṣpacakṣū ruddhakaṇṭhaśca hṛṣṭaḥ / anādyanantabrahmakalpeṣu naiva kṛtaṃ yayā smaraṇaṃ sarvadaiva //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā harim pulaka aṅgaḥ tu rudraḥ sa bhāṣpa cakṣūḥ ruddha kaṇṭhaḥ ca hṛṣṭaḥ anādi ananta brahma kalpeṣu nā eva kṛtam yayā smaraṇam sarvadā eva

original: pādāravinde sunakhairvibhūṣite dṛṣṭe mayā kena puṇyena deva / dṛṣṭvādṛṣṭvā pādapadmaṃ murāreḥ punaḥ punā ruddhakaṇṭho babhūva //
analyzed: pāda aravinde su nakhaiḥ vibhūṣite dṛṣṭe mayā kena puṇyena deva dṛṣṭvā a dṛṣṭvā pāda padmam murāreḥ punar ruddha kaṇṭhaḥ babhūva

original: ruroda rudro bhayakaṃpitāṅgaḥ kathaṃ punardarśanaṃ me prabhoḥ syāt / mukunda nārāyaṇa viśvamūrte vāgindriyeṇa stavanaṃ me kathaṃ syāt //
analyzed: ruroda rudraḥ bhaya kaṃpita aṅgaḥ katham punar darśanam me prabhoḥ syāt mukunda nārāyaṇa viśvamūrte vāc indriyeṇa stavanam me katham syāt

original: maddarśanaṃ sarvadā pāpuyuktaṃ tathā madvāk sarvadā pāpayuktā / maddarśanaṃ sarvadā strīṣu saktamabhūcca te darśanaṃ me hyasaktam //
analyzed: mad darśanam sarvadā tathā mad vāc sarvadā pāpa yuktā mad darśanam sarvadā strīṣu saktam abhūt ca te darśanam me hi asaktam

original: āsaktatā putradārādikānāṃ samyak śaktistavane nāsti viṣṇoḥ / viṣṇustutau nāvakāśosti vāco dṛṣṭohaṃ tvaṃ kena puṇyena deva //
analyzed: āsakta tā putra dāra ādikānām samyak śakti stavane na asti viṣṇoḥ viṣṇu stutau na avakāśaḥ asti vācaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ uham tvam kena puṇyena deva

original: anantakarṇeśa sucandrasaṃjña śrotreṇa nityaṃ na kathā śrutā te / śrutā mayā bahudhā lokavārtā dṛṣṭo mayā tvaṃ kena puṇyena deva //
analyzed: ananta karṇa īśa sucandra saṃjña śrotreṇa nityam na kathā śrutā te  śrutāḥ mayā bahudhā loka vārtāḥ dṛṣṭaḥ mayā tvam kena puṇyena deva

original: dṛṣṭvādṛṣṭvā pādapīṭhaṃ hareśca punaḥ punā ruddhaṅkaṭho babhūva / ruroda rudro bhayakaṃpitāṅgaḥ kathaṃ punaḥ śravaṇaṃ syātkathāyāḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā a dṛṣṭvā pāda pīṭham hareḥ ca punar ruddhaṅkaṭhaḥ babhūva ruroda rudraḥ bhaya kaṃpita aṅgaḥ katham punar śravaṇam syāt kathāyāḥ

original: tvamīśa vaikuṇṭha suvāyusaṃjñastvadarpitaṃ gandhapuṣpādikaṃ ca / sadā na liptaṃ ca bhujairviliptaṃ tanmūtraviṣṭhādimakardamāmbubhiḥ //
analyzed: tvam īśa vaikuṇṭha suvāyu saṃjñaḥ tvad arpitam gandha puṣpa ādikam ca sadā na liptam ca bhujaiḥ viliptam tad mūtra viṣṭhā ādi makardama ambubhiḥ

original: strīṇāṃ kucodaiśca kacodakaiścakakṣodakair gātrajalairmukunda / anarpitairvastragandhādikaiśca dṛṣṭo mayā kena puṇyena deva //
analyzed: strīṇām kuca udaiḥ ca kaca udakaiḥ cakakṣa udakaiḥ gātra jalaiḥ mukunda anarpitaiḥ vastra gandha ādikaiḥ ca dṛṣṭaḥ mayā kena puṇyena deva

original: spṛṣṭvāspṛṣṭvā harinirmālyagandhaṃ punaḥ punā ruddhakaṇṭho babhūva / ruroda rudro bhayakaṃpitāṅgaḥ kathaṃ punaḥ sparśanaṃ syātsadā me //
analyzed: spṛṣṭvā a spṛṣṭvā hari nirmālya gandham punar ruddha kaṇṭhaḥ babhūva ruroda rudraḥ bhaya kaṃpita aṅgaḥ katham punar sparśanam syāt sadā me

original: nṛsiṃha nāsāsthita nāsikeśa mannāsayā kvāpi supadmasaurabham / nāghrātamitthaṃ punarāghrātameva hyanarpitaṃ gandhapuṣpādikaṃ ca //
analyzed: nṛsiṃha nāsā sthita nāsikeśa mad nāsayā kvāpi su padma saurabham na āghrātam ittham punar āghrātam eva hi anarpitam gandha puṣpa ādikam ca

original: sunāsikaṃ suṣṭhudantaṃ murāre dṛṣṭaṃ mukhaṃ kena puṇyena deva / ghrātvā ghrātvā viṣṇunirmālyagandhaṃ punaḥ punā ruddhakaṇṭho babhūva //
analyzed: su nāsikam suṣṭhu dantam murāre dṛṣṭam mukham kena puṇyena deva ghrātvā ghrātvā viṣṇu nirmālya gandham punar ruddha kaṇṭhaḥ babhūva

original: ruroda rudro bhayakaṃpitāṅgo jighrāmi nirmālyamidaṃ kathaṃ te / jihvāsthito jihva saṃjño murāre jihvendriyeṇāpi tathārpitaṃ ca //
analyzed: ruroda rudraḥ bhaya kaṃpita aṅgaḥ jighrāmi nirmālyam idam katham te jihvā sthitaḥ jihva saṃjñaḥ murāre jihvā indriyeṇa api tathā arpitam ca

original: naivedyaśeṣaṃ tulasīvimiśritaṃ viśeṣataḥ pādajalena siktam / yo snāti nityaṃ purato murāreḥ prāpnoti yajñāyutakoṭipuṇyam //
analyzed: naivedya śeṣam tulasī vimiśritam viśeṣataḥ pāda jalena siktam

original: etādṛśaṃ tava naivedyaśeṣaṃ na bhuktaṃ vai sarvadādityarūpam / anarpitaṃ tava devasya viṣṇorbhuktaṃ mayā bahuvāraṃ mukunda //
analyzed: etādṛśam tava naivedya śeṣam na bhuktam vai sarvadā āditya rūpam an arpitam tava devasya viṣṇoḥ bhuktam mayā bahu vāram mukunda

original: pādāravinde nārpitaṃ bhakṣyabhojyaṃ dṛṣṭo mayā kena puṇyena deva / bhuktvābhuktvā harinairavedyajātaṃ sukhaṃ tvadīyaṃ ramayā lālitaṃ ca //
analyzed: pāda aravinde na arpitam bhakṣya bhojyam dṛṣṭaḥ mayā kena puṇyena deva bhuktvā a bhuktvā hari nairavedya jātam sukham tvadīyam ramayā lālitam ca

original: dyubhvāśrayaṃ tava mūrdhānamāhuḥ kirīṭayuktaṃ kuṭilaiḥ kuntalaiśca / anekajanmārjitapuṇyasaṃcayairdṛṣṭaṃ mayā sajjanasaṃgamācca //
analyzed: div bhvā āśrayam tava mūrdhānam āhuḥ kirīṭa yuktam kuṭilaiḥ kuntalaiḥ ca aneka janma arjita puṇya saṃcayaiḥ dṛṣṭam mayā sat jana saṃgamāt ca

original: anekajanmārjitapāpasaṃcayairadarśanaṃ yāsyati devadeva / evaṃ subhaktyā ca ruroda rudro dṛṣṭvā hariṃ survaguṇaiḥ saṃpūrṇam //
analyzed: aneka janma arjita pāpa saṃcayaiḥ adarśanam yāsyati devadeva evam su bhaktyā ca ruroda rudraḥ dṛṣṭvā harim surva guṇaiḥ saṃpūrṇam

original: pādāravindaṃ tava viśvamūrte yogīśvarairhṛdaye saṃgṛhītam / dṛṣṭaṃ mayā dayayā vāsudeva drakṣye kathaṃ punaritthaṃ ruroda //
analyzed: pāda aravindam tava viśvamūrte yogi īśvaraiḥ hṛdaye saṃgṛhītam dṛṣṭam mayā dayayā vāsudeva drakṣye katham punar ittham ruroda

original: dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tvarivale bhavināśiśaṅkhacakrādikaistrijagatāpi ca deva pūrṇam / etādṛśaṃ tvadudaraṃ ca kathaṃ rameśa drakṣye punaḥ punarahaṃ tviti saṃruroda //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam mayā tu ari vale bhavi nāśi śaṅkha cakra ādikaiḥ trijagatā api ca deva pūrṇam etādṛśam tvad udaram ca katham rama īśa drakṣye punar punar aham tu iti saṃruroda

original: ānandapūrṇa nakhapūrṇa sukeśapūrṇa lomādipūrṇa guṇapūrṇa sughoṇapūrṇa / vakṣaḥ sthalaṃ tava vibhostu viśālabhūtaṃ sadbhūṣaṇaṃ vimalakaustubhaśobhi lakṣmyā //
analyzed: ānanda pūrṇa nakha pūrṇa su keśa pūrṇa loma ādi pūrṇa guṇa pūrṇa su ghoṇa pūrṇa vakṣaḥ sthalam tava vibhoḥ tu viśāla bhūtam sat bhūṣaṇam vimala kaustubha śobhi lakṣmyā

original: sukomalaṃ śrītulasyāstathaiva supuṣpitaṃ canda naiścarcitaṃ ca / etādṛśaṃ tava vakṣaḥ sthalaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tava kāruṇyadṛṣṭyā //
analyzed: su komalam śrī tulasyāḥ tathā eva su puṣpitam canda naiḥ carcitam ca etādṛśam tava vakṣaḥ sthalam ca dṛṣṭam mayā tava kāruṇya dṛṣṭyā

original: punaḥ punardarśanaṃ me kathaṃ syādevaṃ rudraḥ sa ca bhaktyā ruroda / atastūrurnāma saṃprāpya rudrastatputrobhūddaurvasaṃjñaḥ sa eva //
analyzed: punar punar darśanam me katham syāt evam rudraḥ sa ca bhaktyā ruroda atas tūruḥ nāma saṃprāpya rudraḥ tad putraḥ bhūt daurva saṃjñaḥ saḥ eva

original: yasmādrudaṃ corvaritaṃ vai cakāra tasmātsa rudrastvaurvasaṃjño babhūva / aurvastu lokānmokṣayogyāṃśca dṛṣṭvā hyatyantaṃ vai viṣayeṣveva niṣṭhān //
analyzed: yasmāt rudam ca urvaritam vai cakāra tasmāt sa rudraḥ tu aurva saṃjñaḥ babhūva aurvaḥ tu lokān mokṣa yogyān ca dṛṣṭvā hi atyantam vai viṣayeṣu eva niṣṭhān

original: stūddaiva caurvo viṣṇupādāravidaṃ smṛtvāsmṛtvā ruddhakaṇṭho babhūva / te pāpiṣṭhāḥ pāparūpānbhajanto dinedine durviṣayānkadindriyaiḥ //
analyzed: caurvaḥ viṣṇu pāda āra vidam smṛtvā a smṛtvā ruddha kaṇṭhaḥ babhūva te pāpiṣṭhāḥ pāpa rūpān bhajantaḥ dine dine durviṣayān kad indriyaiḥ

original: kadā caitānheyabuddhyā vimuñce na jānehaṃ ceti samyag ruroda / ete hi mūrkhā viṣayānarthalabdhyai kurvanti yatnaṃ paramādareṇa //
analyzed: kadā ca etān heya buddhyā vimuñce na jāna iham ca iti samyak ruroda ete hi mūrkhāḥ viṣaya anartha labdhyai kurvanti yatnam parama ādareṇa

original: kadindriyārthaṃ hi dhanādikaṃ ca tyajanti ca sarve viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāḥ / tvanmāyayā mohitānnaṣṭabuddhīnkadā caitānmuñcase viśvamūrte //
analyzed: kad indriya artham hi dhana ādikam ca tyajanti ca sarve viṣayeṣu niṣṭhāḥ tvad māyayā mohitān naṣṭa buddhīn kadā ca etān muñcase viśvamūrte

original: smṛtvāsmṛtvā vāsudevasya māyāṃ ruroda caurvo bhayakaṃpitāṅgaḥ / atīva kaṣṭena ca lokavṛttyā śritā dainyaṃ svīyakāryaṃ vihāya //
analyzed: smṛtvā a smṛtvā vāsudevasya māyām ruroda caurvaḥ bhaya kaṃpita aṅgaḥ atīva kaṣṭena ca loka vṛttyā śritāḥ dainyam svīya kāryam vihāya

original: atīva dainyena dhanādikaṃ ca saṃpādya sarve 'pi supāpaśīlāḥ / kaṣṭārjitaṃ dravyadhanādikaṃ ca tyajanti sarve paśavo vyarthameva //
analyzed: atīva dainyena dhana ādikam ca saṃpādya sarve su pāpa śīlāḥ kaṣṭa arjitam dravya dhana ādikam ca tyajanti sarve paśavaḥ vyartham eva

original: satpātrabhūte viṣṇubuddhyā kadāpi tyajanti naite māyayā vai murāreḥ / eṣāmāyurvyarthamāhurmahāntaḥ kathaṃ naṣṭā iti samyagruroda //
analyzed: sat pātra bhūte viṣṇu buddhyā kadāpi tyajanti na ete māyayā vai murāreḥ eṣām āyuḥ vyartham āhuḥ mahāntaḥ katham naṣṭāḥ iti samyak ruroda

original: eṣāmāyurvyarthamevaṃ gataṃ ca eṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā yauvanaṃ tu dhruvaṃ ca / skandhasthamṛtyurhasate kṛṣṇa viṣṇo taṃ vai na jānanti vimūḍhacetasaḥ //
analyzed: eṣām āyuḥ vyartham evam gatam ca eṣām dṛṣṭvā yauvanam tu dhruvam ca skandha stha mṛtyuḥ hasate kṛṣṇa viṣṇo tam vai na jānanti vimūḍha cetasaḥ

original: gṛhaṃ madīyaṃ śatavarṣaṃ ca jīvetputrā madīyā śavatavarṣaṃ tathaiva / ahaṃ ca jīve śatavarṣaṃ sukhena madīyabhāryāpi sulakṣaṇā'ste //
analyzed: gṛham madīyam śata varṣam ca jīvet putrāḥ madīyā tathā eva aham ca jīve śata varṣam sukhena madīya bhāryā api su lakṣaṇāḥ te

original: gāvaśca me saṃti sadugdhapūrṇā mitrāṇi me saṃti mudā hi yuktāḥ / dāsye sutaṃ vāraṇārthaṃ tu vadhvai putrīṃ vivāhārthamahaṃ dadāmi //
analyzed: gāvaḥ ca me saṃti sa dugdha pūrṇāḥ mitrāṇi me saṃti mudā hi yuktāḥ dāsye sutam vāraṇa artham tu vadhvai putrīm vivāha artham aham dadāmi

original: dāsye cāhaṃ satsu putrīṃ dhanaṃ vā dāsye cāhaṃ dhanikeṣveva nityam / adṛṣṭaśūnyān bhagavānvāsudevo dṛṣṭvādṛṣṭvā hasate sarvadaiva //
analyzed: dāsye ca aham satsu putrīm dhanam vā dāsye ca aham dhanikeṣu eva nityam adṛṣṭa śūnyān bhagavān vāsudevaḥ dṛṣṭvā a dṛṣṭvā hasate sarvadā eva

original: nāhaṃ kariṣye śravaṇaṃ kathāyā madbhāgyanā śaśca bhaviṣyatīti / nāhaṃ hariṃ pūjayiṣye sadaiva putrādināśaśca bhaviṣyatīti //
analyzed: na aham kariṣye śravaṇam kathāyāḥ mad bhāgya nā śaḥ ca bhaviṣyati iti na aham harim pūjayiṣye sadā eva putra ādi nāśaḥ ca bhaviṣyati iti

original: kālekāle diṣṭanāmā haristu phalaprado vāsudevo 'khilasya / etādṛśānmūrkhajanāṃśca dṛṣṭvā ruroda caurvo vāsudevaikaniṣṭhaḥ //
analyzed: kālekāle diṣṭa nāmā hariḥ tu phala pradaḥ khilasya  etādṛśān mūrkha janān ca dṛṣṭvā ruroda caurvaḥ vāsudeva ekaniṣṭhaḥ

original: atastvaurvo rudrarūpī khagendra jānīhi nityaṃ kṛṣṇasuśikṣitārthaḥ / yadā satī dakṣaputrī khagendra dakṣādhvare svaśarīraṃ visṛjya //
analyzed: atas tu aurvaḥ rudra rūpī khaga indra jānīhi nityam kṛṣṇa su śikṣita arthaḥ yadā satī dakṣa putrī khaga indra dakṣa adhvare sva śarīram visṛjya

original: jajñe punarmenakāyāṃ himādrestadā rudrastvaurvasaṃjñā mavāpa / ūrdhvaretā bhavetyuktvā ūrdhvaretā babhūva ha //
analyzed: jajñe punar menakāyām himādreḥ tadā rudraḥ tu aurva saṃjñā m avāpa  ūrdhvaretāḥ bhava iti uktvā ūrdhvaretāḥ babhūva ha

original: pāṇigrāhaṃ rudradevo mahātmā yadā himādreḥ kanyakāyāścakāra / tasyāṃ paraṃ laṃpaṭaḥ saṃbabhūva ato rudraḥ parasaṃjñāmavāpa //
analyzed: pāṇigrāham rudradevaḥ mahātmā yadā himādreḥ kanyakāyāḥ cakāra tasyām param laṃpaṭaḥ saṃbabhūva atas rudraḥ para saṃjñām avāpa

original: sadāśivādyā daśa rudrabhrātaraḥ saumitreyo hauhiṇeyastrayaśca / samā ete mokṣakāle sṛtau ca śatairguṇairnyūnabhūtāśca tābhyām //
analyzed: sadāśiva ādyāḥ daśa rudra bhrātaraḥ saumitreyaḥ hauhiṇeyaḥ trayaḥ ca samāḥ ete mokṣa kāle sṛtau ca śataiḥ guṇaiḥ nyūna bhūtāḥ ca tābhyām

original: garuḍa uvāca / ānandanirṇayaṃ brūhi kṛṣṇa pūrṇadayānighe / nirṇetuṃ jñānināṃ yadvajjñāpanārthaṃ tathā mama //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca  ānanda nirṇayam brūhi kṛṣṇa pūrṇa dayā nighe  nirṇetum jñāninām yadvat jñāpana artham tathā mama

original: brūhi śiṣyāya dayayā uddhartuṃ māṃ ca sarvadā / pūrṇakāmasya te kṛṣṇa kā spṛhā vidyate prabho //
analyzed: brūhi śiṣyāya dayayā uddhartum mām ca sarvadā pūrṇa kāmasya te kṛṣṇa kā spṛhā vidyate prabho

original: evamukto hṛṣīkeśaḥ pakṣīśena mahātmanā / uvāca kṛpayā kṛṣṇaḥ prasannaḥ kamalekṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: evam uktaḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ pakṣīśena mahātmanā uvāca kṛpayā kṛṣṇaḥ prasannaḥ kamala īkṣaṇaḥ

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / gāyatryāśca śatānanda ekānandastu vedhasaḥ etādṛśaḥ śatānando brahmaṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca gāyatryāḥ ca śata ānandaḥ eka ānandaḥ tu vedhasaḥ etādṛśaḥ śata ānandaḥ brahmaṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: śeṣādeśca śatānandaḥ sarasvatyāḥ khagottama / ekānandastu vijñeyo bhāratyā vinatāsuta //
analyzed: śeṣādeḥ ca śatānandaḥ sarasvatyāḥ khaga uttama ekānandaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ bhāratyāḥ vinatā suta

original: evaṃ tu nirṇayo jñeya ānandasya sadā khaga / evamuktaṃ mayā sarvaṃ kimanyacchrotumicchasi //
analyzed: evam tu nirṇayaḥ jñeyaḥ ānandasya sadā khaga evam uktam mayā sarvam kim anyat śrotum icchasi

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe rudrarodanahetvānanantānandatāratamyanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe rudrarodanahetvānanantānandatāratamyanirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭādaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 19
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: garuḍa uvāca / tvayoktaṃ kṛṣṇa govinda rudrācchataguṇādapi / brahmāṇī bhāratī cobhe adhike devasattama //
analyzed: garuḍaḥ uvāca tvayā uktam kṛṣṇa govinda rudrāt śataguṇāt api  brahmāṇī bhāratī ca ubhe adhike deva sattama

original: mayā śrutaṃ viriñcena umāparyantameva ca / anantāṃśairvihīnatvaṃ viriñcoktaṃ surādhipa //
analyzed: mayā śrutam viriñcena umā paryantam eva ca ananta aṃśaiḥ vihīna tvam viriñca uktam surādhipa

original: sahasrāṃśairvihīnatvaṃ tvayoktaṃ kṛṣṇa mādhava / sarveṣāṃ caiva pūrveṣāmavekṣyaiva hare vibho //
analyzed: sahasrāṃśaiḥ vihīna tvam tvayā uktam kṛṣṇa mādhava sarveṣām ca eva pūrveṣām avekṣya eva hare vibho

original: jñānānandabalādīnāṃ vāyuparyantameva ca / sahasrāṃśairvihīnatvaṃ jñānādīnāṃ maheśvara //
analyzed: jñāna ānanda bala ādīnām vāyu paryantam eva ca sahasra aṃśaiḥ vihīna tvam jñāna ādīnām maheśvara

original: nirṇayaṃ brṛhi govinda sarvajñosi na saṃśayaḥ / garuḍenaivamuktastu vāsudevobravīddhruvam //
analyzed: nirṇayam brṛhi govinda sarva jñaḥ asi na saṃśayaḥ  garuḍena evam uktaḥ tu vāsudevaḥ bravīt dhruvam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / ānandāṃśairvihīnatvamapekṣyaiva khagādhipa / uttareṣāmuttareṣāṃ yogādevamiti sphuṭam //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca ānanda aṃśaiḥ vihīna tvam apekṣya eva khagādhipa uttareṣām uttareṣām yogāt evam iti sphuṭam

original: parimāṇe śataguṇe ānande sphuṭatāvaśāt / anantaguṇavattvaṃ ca brahmaṇā samudīritam //
analyzed: parimāṇe śataguṇe ānande sphuṭa tā avaśāt ananta guṇavat tvam ca brahmaṇā samudīritam

original: sahasraguṇitatvaṃ ca vāyunā samudīritam / yathānande tathā jñāne viṣṇau bhaktau balādhike //
analyzed: sahasra guṇita tvam ca vāyunā samudīritam yathā ānande tathā jñāne viṣṇau bhaktau bala adhike

original: sarve guṇaiḥ śataguṇāḥ krameṇoktā nu te 'khilāḥ / bhāratyāśca śataṃ jñānaṃ sukhaṃ bhaktibalādhike //
analyzed: sarve guṇaiḥ śataguṇāḥ krameṇa uktāḥ nu te khilāḥ bhāratyāḥ ca śatam jñānam sukham bhakti bala adhike

original: evaṃ jñānaṃ suvijñeyaṃ mārutestu balādikam / evaṃ jñānaṃ śataṃ jñeyaṃ mārute nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: evam jñānam su vijñeyam māruteḥ tu bala ādikam evam jñānam śatam jñeyam mārute na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: bhāratyāśca śataṃ jñānaṃ balaṃ ca samudāhṛtam / evameva ca vāyośca jñānaṃ caivamiti sphuṭam //
analyzed: bhāratyāḥ ca śatam jñānam balam ca samudāhṛtam evam eva ca vāyoḥ ca jñānam ca evam iti sphuṭam

original: yathā dīpācchataguṇā agnijvālā na dīpavat / sphuṭībhavedyathaivāgnirbahulopi na sūryavat //
analyzed: yathā dīpāt śataguṇā agni jvālā na dīpa vat sphuṭībhavet yathā eva agniḥ bahu lopi na sūrya vat

original: yathaiva sūryāddviguṇaścandro naiva sphuṭībhavet / ānandatāratamyaṃ ca yathoktaṃ tu mayā tava //
analyzed: yathā eva sūryāt dviguṇaḥ candraḥ nā eva sphuṭībhavet ānanda tāratamyam ca yathā uktam tu mayā tava

original: tathaiva jānīhi khaga nānyathā tu kathañcana / ahaṃ vijānāmi mayi sthitān guṇānsarvairviśeṣaiśca khagendra saṃyutān //
analyzed: tathā eva jānīhi khaga na anyathā tu kathañcana aham vijānāmi mayi sthitān guṇān sarvaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ ca khaga indra saṃyutān

original: susūkṣmarūpāṃśca sadā khagendra mayāpyadṛṣṭo nāsti nāstyeva kaścit //
analyzed: su sūkṣma rūpān ca sadā khaga indra mayā api adṛṣṭaḥ na asti na asti eva kaścid

original: sarvāvatāreṣvapi vidyamānaṃ hariṃ vijānāti ramāpi devī //
analyzed: sarva avatāreṣu api vidyamānam harim vijānāti ramā api devī

original: harerguṇānsarvaviśeṣasaṃyutānakhaṇḍarūpānsā vijānāti devī / susūkṣmarūpānsā vijānāti devī brahmādibhyo matprasādādhikaṃ ca //
analyzed: hareḥ guṇān sarva viśeṣa saṃyutān akhaṇḍa rūpān sā vijānāti devī su sūkṣma rūpān sā vijānāti devī brahma ādibhyaḥ mad prasāda adhikam ca

original: svātmasvarūpaṃ pravijānāti devī susūkṣmarūpaṃ suviśeṣaiśca yuktam / svānyaṃ prapañcaṃ pravijānāti lakṣmīstathāpyaśeṣaiḥ suviśeṣaiśca yuktam //
analyzed: sva ātma svarūpam pravijānāti devī su sūkṣma rūpam su viśeṣaiḥ ca yuktam sva anyam prapañcam pravijānāti lakṣmīḥ tathā api aśeṣaiḥ su viśeṣaiḥ ca yuktam

original: brahmāpi paśyetsarvagaṃ vāsudevaṃ vāyvādibhyo hyadhikānsadguṇāṃśca / śrotraṃ na jānāti harerguṇāṃśca susūkṣmarūpāṃśca viśeṣasaṃyutān //
analyzed: brahmā api paśyet sarvagam vāsudevam vāyu ādibhyaḥ hi adhikān sat guṇān ca śrotram na jānāti hareḥ guṇān ca su sūkṣma rūpān ca viśeṣa saṃyutān

original: spaṣṭasvarūpeṇa yathā viduḥ surā muktvā brahmāṇaṃ na tathā tepyamuktāḥ / svātmānamanyacca sadā viśeṣaryuktaṃ vijānāti vidhiśca mārutaḥ //
analyzed: spaṣṭa sva rūpeṇa yathā viduḥ surāḥ muktvā brahmāṇam na tathā te api amuktāḥ sva ātmānam anyat ca sadā viśeṣa ryuktam vijānāti vidhiḥ ca mārutaḥ

original: vāṇī vijānāti harerguṇāṃśca svayaṃbhuvo naiva tāvadviśeṣān / traiguṇyarūpātparataḥ sadaiva paśyedviṣṇuṃ kṛṣṇarūpaṃ khagendra //
analyzed: vāṇī vijānāti hareḥ guṇān ca svayaṃbhuvaḥ nā eva tāvat viśeṣān traiguṇya rūpāt paratas sadā eva paśyet viṣṇum kṛṣṇa rūpam khaga indra

original: śeṣo rudro vīndra etaiśca sarve tamo mātre pravijānanti saṃstham / vāṇīdṛṣṭānsaviśeṣān guṇāṃste jānanti no satyamevoktamaṅga //
analyzed: śeṣaḥ rudraḥ vi indraḥ etaiḥ ca sarve tamaḥ mātre pravijānanti saṃstham vāṇī dṛṣṭān sa viśeṣān guṇān te jānanti no satyam eva uktam aṅga

original: umā suparṇā vāruṇī ceti tisraḥ sahaiva taḥ pravijānanti sustham / harerviśeṣānarudra dṛṣṭānkhagendra jānanti naitāḥ kvāpi deśe ca kāle //
analyzed: umā suparṇā vāruṇī ca iti tisraḥ saha eva taḥ pravijānanti sustham hareḥ viśeṣān arudra dṛṣṭān khaga indra jānanti na etāḥ kvāpi deśe ca kāle

original: indrādayaḥ pravijānanti vīndra ahaṅkāre vyāptarūpaṃ hariṃ ca / dakṣādyā vai buddhitattve sthitaṃ taṃ jānanti te somasūryādayaśca //
analyzed: indra ādayaḥ pravijānanti vi indra ahaṅkāre vyāpta rūpam harim ca  dakṣa ādyāḥ vai buddhi tattve sthitam tam jānanti te soma sūrya ādayaḥ ca

original: viṣṇuṃ hariṃ bhūtatattve sthitaṃ ca ye cānye ca pravijānanti nityam / anye ca paśyanti yathā svayogyamaṇḍāntarasthaṃ harirūpaṃ khagendra //
analyzed: viṣṇum harim bhūtatattve sthitam ca ye ca anye ca pravijānanti nityam anye ca paśyanti yathā sva yogya maṇḍa antara stham hari rūpam khaga indra

original: kecitprapaśyanti hareśca rūpaṃ tvadīyahṛtsthaṃ hṛdi kecitsadaiva / evaṃprakāraṃ pravijānīhi vīndra hyatho śṛṇu tvaṃmama bhāryāḥ ṣaḍetāḥ //
analyzed: kecid prapaśyanti hareḥ ca rūpam tvadīya hṛd stham hṛdi kecid sadā eva evaṃprakāram pravijānīhi vi indra hi atho śṛṇu tvam mama bhāryāḥ ṣaḍ etāḥ

original: rukmiṇyādyāḥ ṣaṇmahiṣyo mamaśrīrnīlā ca yā mama bhāryā khagendra / sarge pūrvasminhavyavāhasya putrī tāstā bhaje sadya evā viśeṣāt //
analyzed: rukmiṇī ādyāḥ ṣaṣ mahiṣyaḥ mamaśrīḥ nīlā ca yā mama bhāryā khaga indra sarge pūrvasmin havyavāhasya putrī tāḥ tāḥ bhaje sadyas evāḥ viśeṣāt

original: kanyaiva sā kṛṣṇapatnī ca kāmāṃstāṃstān bhajenmanasā cintitāṃśca / atīva yatnaṃ kavyavāhaṃ khagendra pitṛṣvekaḥ sarvadā vai cakāra //
analyzed: kanyā eva sā kṛṣṇa patnī ca kāmān tān tān bhajet manasā cintitān ca  atīva yatnam kavya vāham khaga indra pitṛṣu ekaḥ sarvadā vai cakāra

original: tathaiva sā naiva bhartāramāpa yatastu sā kṛṣṇaniṣṭhaikacittā //
analyzed: tathā eva sā nā eva bhartāram āpa yatas tu sā kṛṣṇa niṣṭhā ekacittā

original: tadābravītkavyavāhaśca putrariṃ patiṃ kimarthaṃ necchasi mūḍhabuddhe / tadābravītkavyavāhaṃ ca puttrī hariṃ vinā sarvaguṇopapanne / janmanyasmin bhartṛtā nāsti deva yato bhartā hariravaika eva //
analyzed: tadā abravīt kavyavāhaḥ ca putra arim patim kimartham nā icchasi mūḍha buddhe tadā abravīt kavyavāham ca puttrī harim vinā sarva guṇa upapanne janmani asmin bhartṛ tā nā asti deva yatas bhartā hariḥ ava ekaḥ eva

original: yato loke sustriyaḥ sarva eva saṃdā jñeyā vidhavāste hi nityam / anādi nityaṃ bhuvanaikasāraṃ susuṃdaraṃ mokṣadaṃ kāmadaṃ ca //
analyzed: yatas loke sustriyaḥ sarve eva saṃdāḥ jñeyāḥ vidhavāḥ te hi nityam anādi nityam bhuvana eka sāram su suṃdaram mokṣa dam kāma dam ca

original: etādṛśaṃ na vijānanti yāstu sarvāstā vai vidhavāḥ sarvadaiva / nimittabhūtaṃ bhartṛrūpaṃ ca jīvaṃ daivopetaṃ haribhaktyā vihīnam //
analyzed: etādṛśam na vijānanti yāḥ tu sarvāḥ tāḥ vai vidhavāḥ sarvadā eva nimitta bhūtam bhartṛ rūpam ca jīvam daiva upetam hari bhaktyā vihīnam

original: sukaśmalaṃ navarandhraiḥ stravantaṃ durgandhayuktaṃ sarvadā kutsitaṃ ca / etāḥ dṛśe bhartṛjīve nu tāta prayojanaṃ nāsti kṛṣṇaṃ vihāya //
