original: sarayūphalgukāverīgaṇḍakī kapilā stathā / ityetāśca harerbhaktāḥ saṃti cātraiva bhāmini //
analyzed: sarayū phalgu kāverī gaṇḍakī kapilāḥ iti etāḥ ca hareḥ bhaktāḥ saṃti ca atra eva bhāmini

original: abhiprāyaṃ tatra vakṣye śṛṇu kanye mayā sati / yatra pravartate mārge kathā viṣṇormahātmanaḥ //
analyzed: abhiprāyam tatra vakṣye śṛṇu kanye mayā sati yatra pravartate mārge kathā viṣṇoḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: vartante vaiṣṇavā yatra haritattvārthabodhakāḥ / tatraiva bhaktāḥ sarvepi saṃti viṣṇostathaiva ca //
analyzed: vartante vaiṣṇavāḥ yatra hari tattva artha bodhakāḥ tatra eva bhaktāḥ sarve api saṃti viṣṇoḥ tathā eva ca

original: ye devayātrāṃ paramātmacintayā kurvanti te haribhaktāśca nānye / yato harau parame vaiṣṇavānāṃ sarvaṃ niṣṭhāmeti kṛtyaṃ khagendra //
analyzed: ye deva yātrām paramātma cintayā kurvanti te hari bhaktāḥ ca na anye yatas harau parame vaiṣṇavānām sarvam niṣṭhām eti kṛtyam khaga indra

original: śeṣācalaṃ samāsādya hyannavastrādibhūṣaṇam / yo na dadyādabhaktaḥ sa tataḥ ko nu paraḥ paśuḥ //
analyzed: śeṣa acalam samāsādya hi anna vastra ādi bhūṣaṇam yaḥ na dadyāt abhaktaḥ sa tatas kaḥ nu paraḥ paśuḥ

original: bhaktā hareḥ śrīnivāsācale ca gaṅgādirūpeṇa ca tatratatra / tiṣṭhanti sevārthamurukramasya teṣāṃ pūjā naiva kāryā ca devi //
analyzed: bhaktāḥ hareḥ śrīnivāsa acale ca gaṅgā ādi rūpeṇa ca tatra tatra tiṣṭhanti sevā artham urukramasya teṣām pūjā nā eva kāryā ca devi

original: abhiprāyaṃ tatra vakṣye śṛṇu tvaṃ tatra sthale vastragandhādidhūpaiḥ / purāṇoktā api bhedena pūjyā dṛṣṭvā ca tānvandayetprājña eva //
analyzed: abhiprāyam tatra vakṣye śṛṇu tvam tatra sthale vastra gandha ādi dhūpaiḥ purāṇa uktāḥ api bhedena pūjyāḥ dṛṣṭvā ca tān vandayet prājñaḥ eva

original: sadbrāhmaṇānvandayetpādamūle hastau ca dvau saṃpuṭīkṛtya devi / sāṣṭāṅgarupaṃ vandanaṃ caiva viṣṇoḥ kuryāttathā gurave viṣṇubuddhyā //
analyzed: sat brāhmaṇān vandayet pāda mūle hastau ca dvau saṃpuṭīkṛtya devi sa aṣṭāṅga rupam vandanam ca eva viṣṇoḥ kuryāt tathā gurave viṣṇu buddhyā

original: gaṅgādīnāṃ vandanaṃ kāryameva sāṣṭāṅgaṃ vai tulasīnāṃ tathaiva / aśvatthānāṃ namanaṃ kāryameva gavādīnāṃ namanaṃ mānasena //
analyzed: gaṅgā ādīnām vandanam kāryam eva sa aṣṭāṅgam vai tulasīnām tathā eva aśvatthānām namanam kāryam eva gavā ādīnām namanam mānasena

original: pūjā sadā devadevasya viṣṇoḥ kāryā bhaktyā vaiṣṇavaireva nānyaiḥ / ye nāmakā jñānavantaḥ subhaktāḥ sadaiva kāryā viṣṇupūjā ca kanye //
analyzed: pūjā sadā devadevasya viṣṇoḥ kāryā bhaktyā vaiṣṇavaiḥ eva na anyaiḥ ye nāmakāḥ jñānavantaḥ su bhaktāḥ sadā eva kāryā viṣṇu pūjā ca kanye

original: ye nāmakā jñānavantaḥ subhaktāḥ sadaivaṃ kāryā viṣṇupūjā ca kanye / yenāmakā viṣṇubhaktāḥ sadaiva pūjā viṣṇornaiva kāryātra devi //
analyzed: ye nāmakāḥ jñānavantaḥ su bhaktāḥ sadā evam kāryā viṣṇu pūjā ca kanye yad nāmakāḥ viṣṇu bhaktāḥ sadā eva pūjā viṣṇoḥ na eva kāryā atra devi

original: mohādyo vai pūjayeddevadevaṃ mahādharmādyāti cāndhaṃ tamo vai / brahmādināmāni harerhi devīṃ viṣṇoḥ svanāmāni dadau divaukasām //
analyzed: mohāt yaḥ vai pūjayet devadevam mahā dharmāt yāti ca andham tamaḥ vai brahma ādi nāmāni hareḥ hi devīm viṣṇoḥ sva nāmāni dadau divaukasām

original: nādāddhīraḥ keśavādīni kanye svakaṃ puraṃ pravihāyaiva rājā / evaṃ mayoktaṃ kanyake sarvametadetatparaṃ samyagārohaṇīyam //
analyzed: na adāt dhīraḥ keśava ādīni kanye svakam puram pravihāya eva rājā evam mayā uktam kanyake sarvam etat etat param samyak ārohaṇīyam

original: govinda nārāyaṇa mādhaveti yūyaṃ mayā sarvamārādhitavyam / sarve militvā punarevaṃ khagendra samāruhanvaiṅkaṭādriṃ gṛṇantaḥ //
analyzed: govinda nārāyaṇa mādhava iti yūyam mayā sarvam ārādhitavyam sarve militvā punar evam khaga indra samāruhan vaiṅkaṭādrim gṛṇantaḥ

original: harernāmānyatra pūrvaṃ gṛṇantastvāsvādayantaḥ śrīnivāsasya nāma / draṣṭuṃ sarve śrīnivāsaṃ tathaiva kurvantaste talaśabdaṃ nadantaḥ //
analyzed: hareḥ nāmāni atra pūrvam gṛṇantaḥ tu āsvādayantaḥ śrīnivāsasya nāma draṣṭum sarve śrīnivāsam tathā eva kurvantaḥ te tala śabdam nadantaḥ

original: iti kṛṣṇavacaḥ śrutvā tārkṣyaḥ kṛṣṇamuvācaha kathamāsvādanaṃ cakruretadvistīryame vada / śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / bho śrīnivāsa tava nāmaiva caitannāma svāmī nanu nāmaiva svāmī / yāṃ brahmādyā āśrayantītti yasmāttasmādramā śrīriti nāma cāpa //
analyzed: iti kṛṣṇa vacaḥ śrutvā tārkṣyaḥ kṛṣṇam uvāca ha katham āsvādanam cakruḥ etat vistīrya me vada  śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca bho śrīnivāsa tava nāma eva ca etat nāma svāmī nanu nāma eva svāmī yām brahma ādyāḥ āśrayanti itti yasmāt tasmāt ramā śrīḥ iti nāma ca āpa

original: ramāśrayatvānnitarāṃ sarvadā cetyato hariḥ śrīnivāsābhidhānaḥ / bho śrīnivāseti tu nartayanto romāñcamātrāstalaśabdakāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: ramā āśraya tvāt nitarām sarvadā ca iti atas hariḥ śrīnivāsa abhidhānaḥ bho śrīnivāsa iti tu nartayantaḥ romāñca mātrāḥ tala śabda kāriṇaḥ

original: adyaiva paśyāma harestavāsyaṃ kadā vayaṃ kṛta kṛtyā bhavāmaḥ / bhoḥ keśavādyaiva padāravindaṃ saṃdarśayitvā sudayāṃ kuruṣva //
analyzed: adyā eva paśyāma hareḥ tava āsyam kadā vayam kṛta kṛtyāḥ bhavāmaḥ bhoḥ keśava adya eva pada aravindam saṃdarśayitvā su dayām kuruṣva

original: brahmāṇamāhuśca purāṇamāhuḥ kaśabdavācyaṃ sarvalokeśamāhuḥ / īśaṃ cārhaṃ rudramityeva cāhustatprerakaṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārakārye //
analyzed: brahmāṇam āhuḥ ca purāṇam āhuḥ ka śabda vācyam sarva loka īśam āhuḥ īśam ca arham rudram iti eva ca āhuḥ tad prerakam sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kārye

original: ato hariḥ keśavanāmadheyo bhoḥ keśaveti ca nartayantaḥ / ānandavāpīṃ saṃstravantobhi jagmurnārāyaṇeti pravadanto hi jagmuḥ //
analyzed: atas hariḥ keśava nāmadheyaḥ bhoḥ keśava iti ca nartayantaḥ ānanda vāpīm jagmuḥ nārāyaṇa iti pravadantaḥ hi jagmuḥ

original: ato doṣāstadviruddhā guṇāśca nārāśca teṣāmāśrayatvānmurāriḥ / nārāyaṇeti pravadantīha loke nārānubandhātsarvamuktāḥ khagendra //
analyzed: atas doṣāḥ tad viruddhāḥ guṇāḥ ca nārāḥ ca teṣām āśraya tvāt murāriḥ nārāyaṇa iti pravadanti iha loke nāra anubandhāt sarva muktāḥ khaga indra

original: nārāḥ proktā āśrayatvācca teṣāmatopi nārāyaṇa eva vīndra / muktāśca ye tu prapadaṃnu jagmuraṇḍodakaṃ yasya kaṭākṣamātrāt //
analyzed: nārāḥ proktāḥ āśraya tvāt ca teṣām atas api nārāyaṇaḥ eva vīndra muktāḥ ca ye tu prapadam nu jagmuḥ aṇḍa udakam yasya kaṭākṣa mātrāt

original: yadutpannaṃ tena nārāḥ khagendra teṣāṃ sadāpyāśrayatvācca vīndra / nārāyaṇeti pravadantīha loke hyanantabrahmāṇḍavisarjakatvāt //
analyzed: yat utpannam tena nārāḥ khaga indra teṣām sadā api āśraya tvāt ca vi indra nārāyaṇa iti pravadanti iha loke hi ananta brahmāṇḍa visarjaka tvāt

original: evaṃ nanṛtuḥ pariśaṃsayanto govinda nānyo hi na caiva darśanam / gośabdavācyāstu samastavāco gobhiśca sarvaiḥ pratipādyate yataḥ //
analyzed: evam nanṛtuḥ pariśaṃsayantaḥ govinda nā anyaḥ hi na ca eva darśanam  go śabda vācyāḥ tu samasta vācaḥ gobhiḥ ca sarvaiḥ pratipādyate yatas

original: ato hi govinda iti smṛtaḥ sadā bho vedavedyeti tathā na nanṛtuḥ / ānandabāṣpaiśca samanvitā hi hare murāre tava darśanaṃ hi //
analyzed: atas hi govindaḥ iti smṛtaḥ sadā bho veda vedya iti tathā na nanṛtuḥ ānanda bāṣpaiḥ ca samanvitāḥ hi hare murāre tava darśanam hi

original: dehi prabho vai tavadāsadāsāścaturdaśe bhuvane sarvadāpi / yatastvamevaṃ vasatīti vāsuścātraiva nityaṃ krīḍate sarvadaiva //
analyzed: dehi prabho vai tava dāsa dāsāḥ caturdaśe bhuvane sarvadā api yatas tvam evam vasati iti vāsuḥ ca atrā eva nityam krīḍate sarvadā eva

original: yato devetyevamāhurmahāntastvato hariṃ vāsudeveti cāhuḥ / bho vāsudeveti nanṛtuḥ sarvadaiva bho mādhaveti nanṛtuścaiva sarve //
analyzed: yatas deva iti evam āhuḥ mahāntaḥ tu atas harim vāsudeva iti ca āhuḥ bho vāsudeva iti nanṛtuḥ sarvadā eva bho mādhava iti nanṛtuḥ ca eva sarve

original: lakṣmīpate ceti vadanti sarve dhanīti śabdaḥ svābhivācī yato hi / atopyāryā mādhaveti bruvanti lakṣmīpate pāhi tathaiva bhaktān //
analyzed: lakṣmīpate ca iti vadanti sarve dhanī iti śabdaḥ sva abhivācī yatas hi atas api āryāḥ mādhava iti bruvanti lakṣmīpate pāhi tathā eva bhaktān

original: te vai bruvanto nanṛtuśca jagmurviṣṇo sadāsmānparipāhi nityam / sarvatra yasmādvitatosi tasmādityādināmāni gṛṇanta eva / jagmuśca sarve dadṛśuśca tīrthaṃ bhaktyopetāḥ śrīnivāsaṃ smarantaḥ //
analyzed: te vai bruvantaḥ nanṛtuḥ ca jagmuḥ viṣṇo sadā asmān paripāhi nityam sarvatra yasmāt vitataḥ asi tasmāt ityādi nāmāni gṛṇantaḥ eva jagmuḥ ca sarve dadṛśuḥ ca tīrtham bhaktyā upetāḥ śrīnivāsam smarantaḥ

original: kanyovāca / kiṃ nāmakaṃ tīrthamidaṃ munīndra kiṃ kāryamatra pravadāsmānkṛtīśa / kasmai prasanno bhagavāñchrīnivāsastvasminsutīrthaṃ vada vistareṇa //
analyzed: kanyā uvāca kim nāmakam tīrtham idam muni indra kim kāryam atra pravada asmān kṛtīśa  kasmai prasannaḥ bhagavān śrīnivāsaḥ tu asmin su tīrtham vada vistareṇa

original: jaigīṣavya uvāca / kanye śṛṇu tvaṃ hyabhavatsubuddhimānprahrādasaṃjño haribhaktavaryaḥ / niṣkāmabuddhyā tu yadā jagāma śeṣācalasthaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca draṣṭum //
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ uvāca kanye śṛṇu tvam hi abhavat su buddhimān prahrāda saṃjñaḥ hari bhakta varyaḥ niṣkāma buddhyā tu yadā jagāma śeṣa acala stham śrīnivāsam ca draṣṭum

original: asmiṃsthale daityakumārakānprati hareśca tattvaṃ paripṛṣṭavānprabhuḥ / nṛsiṃharūpaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ bhajasva sudurlabhaṃ mānuṣaṃ janma kanye //
analyzed: asmin sthale daitya kumārakān prati hareḥ ca tattvam paripṛṣṭavān prabhuḥ nṛsiṃha rūpam śrīnivāsam bhajasva su durlabham mānuṣam janma kanye

original: tatrāpi viṣṇornṛhare sutattvaṃ sudurlabhaṃ suṣṭhu yātrā tathaiva / yasyāṃ yātrāyāṃ yatra kutrāpi deśe hareḥ kathā vartate daityavaryāḥ //
analyzed: tatra api viṣṇoḥ nṛhare sutattvam su durlabham suṣṭhu yātrā tathā eva yasyām yātrāyām yatra kutra api deśe hareḥ kathā vartate daitya varyāḥ

original: tatra sthale harirāste sadaiva yato vyāptaḥ sarvato vai nṛsiṃhaḥ / etacchrutvā daityakumārakāste prahlādamūcurbhaktavaryaṃ hareśca //
analyzed: tatra sthale hariḥ āste sadā eva yatas vyāptaḥ sarvatas vai nṛsiṃhaḥ  etat śrutvā daitya kumārakāḥ te prahlādam ūcuḥ bhakta varyam hareḥ ca

original: vyāpto hariścetkathamatra vai sakhe na dṛśyate jalarūpī nṛsiṃhaḥ / sa evamukto dānavānāṃ sutaiśca tuṣṭāva viṣṇuṃ paramādareṇa //
analyzed: vyāptaḥ hariḥ ced katham atra vai sakhe na dṛśyate jala rūpī nṛsiṃhaḥ saḥ evam uktaḥ dānavānām sutaiḥ ca tuṣṭāva viṣṇum parama ādareṇa

original: tava svarūpaṃ mama darśayasva svayogyarūpaṃ dānavānāṃ sutānām / iti stutaḥ śrīnivāso haristu tasminnantarjalarūpaṃ samāyāt //
analyzed: tava sva rūpam mama darśayasva sva yogya rūpam dānavānām sutānām iti stutaḥ śrīnivāsaḥ hariḥ tu tasmin antar jala rūpam samāyāt

original: asminsnānaṃ ye prakurvanti tīrthe teṣāṃ jñānaṃ paramaṃ dṛḍhaṃ syāt / atra snāne mānuṣāṇāṃ ca tāta buddhirna hi syātkalikāle viśeṣāt //
analyzed: asmin snānam ye prakurvanti tīrthe teṣām jñānam paramam dṛḍham syāt atra snāne mānuṣāṇām ca tāta buddhiḥ na hi syāt kali kāle viśeṣāt

original: dattvāṃ varaṃ daityavarāya viṣṇurantardadhe jalapūrṇe sukuṇḍe / adyāpyāste jalamadhye nṛsiṃhaḥ prahlādopi daityakumārakaiḥ saha //
analyzed: dattvā ām varam daitya varāya viṣṇuḥ antardadhe jala pūrṇe sukuṇḍe adya api āste jala madhye nṛsiṃhaḥ prahlādaḥ api daitya kumārakaiḥ saha

original: tasmin sutīrthe paritastatratatra jayeti śabdaḥ śrūyate cāparāhne / idaṃ tīrthaṃ nārasiṃhābhidhaṃ ca kanyesnānaṃ hyatra kāryaṃ manuṣyaiḥ //
analyzed: tasmin su tīrthe paritas tatra tatra jaya iti śabdaḥ śrūyate ca aparāhne idam tīrtham nārasiṃha abhidham ca kanyesnānam hi atra kāryam manuṣyaiḥ

original: snānaṃ kṛtvā tatra tīrthe ca samyagdīpaṃ dattvā dvijavaryāya mukhyam / draṣṭuṃ punaḥ śrīnivāsaṃ prajagmurgovindagovinda iti bruvantaḥ //
analyzed: snānam kṛtvā tatra tīrthe ca samyak dīpam dattvā dvijavaryāya mukhyam draṣṭum punar śrīnivāsam prajagmuḥ govinda govindaḥ iti bruvantaḥ

original: mukhyaprāṇādhiṣṭhitaṃ sthānamāpya apāviśattatra devī hyuvāca / jaigīṣavyaḥ śrīnivāsasya viṣṇoḥ kathaṃ kāryaṃ darśanaṃ tadvadasva //
analyzed: mukhya prāṇa dhiṣṭhitam sthānam āpya apāviśat tatra devī hi uvāca jaigīṣavyaḥ śrīnivāsasya viṣṇoḥ katham kāryam darśanam tat vadasva

original: jaigīṣavyaḥ prāha saṃhṛṣṭacitto bravīmi tantraṃ śṛṇu kanyake tvam / śrutvā mattaḥ kuru sarvaṃ mayoktamādyaṃ dvāraṃ śrīnivāsasya dṛṣṭvā //
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ prāha saṃhṛṣṭa cittaḥ bravīmi tantram śṛṇu kanyake tvam śrutvā mattaḥ kuru sarvam mayā uktam ādyam dvāram śrīnivāsasya dṛṣṭvā

original: aparādhasahasrāṇi kriyante 'harniśaṃ mayā / tāni sarvāṇi me deva kṣamasva puruṣottama //
analyzed: aparādha sahasrāṇi kriyante harniśam mayā tāni sarvāṇi me deva kṣamasva puruṣottama

original: mānasānvācikāndoṣānkāyi kānapi sarvaśaḥ / vaiṣṇavadveṣahetūnme bhasmasātkuru mādhava //
analyzed: mānasān vācikān doṣān kāyi kān api sarvaśas vaiṣṇava dveṣa hetūn me bhasmasātkuru mādhava

original: ādyadvāraṃ śrīnivāsasya devi samyak smaredvijayaṃ vai jayaṃ ca / dakṣādhvare śrīnivāsasya devi caṇḍaṃ pracaṇḍaṃ saṃsmaretsamyageva //
analyzed: ādya dvāram śrīnivāsasya devi samyak smaret vijayam vai jayam ca dakṣa adhvare śrīnivāsasya devi caṇḍam pracaṇḍam saṃsmaret samyak eva

original: pāścātyabhāge śrīnivāsasya devi nandaṃ sunandaṃ saṃsmaredeva bhaktyā / savyadvāre śrīnivāsasya kanye smaretkumudākṣaṃ kumudantameva //
analyzed: pāścātya bhāge śrīnivāsasya devi nandam sunandam saṃsmaret eva bhaktyā savya dvāre śrīnivāsasya kanye smaret kumudākṣam kumudantam eva

original: yaścaiva dehaṃ praviśedbhaktipūrvaṃ kadā drakṣye sādareṇaiva devi / pradakṣiṇadvādaśakaṃ ca kṛtvā pade pade saṃsmarecchrīnivāsam //
analyzed: yaḥ ca eva deham praviśet bhakti pūrvam kadā drakṣye sa ādareṇa eva devi pradakṣiṇa dvādaśakam ca kṛtvā pade pade saṃsmaret śrīnivāsam

original: śrīsvāmitīrthe samyagācamya natvā snātvā natvā bhūvarāhaṃ ca devi / ayudvāraṃ privaśedbhaktipṛrvaṃ govindagovinda itibruvanvai //
analyzed: śrī svāmitīrthe samyak ācamya natvā snātvā natvā bhūvarāham ca devi govinda govindaḥ iti bruvan vai

original: paścāddharernamanaṃ kāryameva sāṣṭāṅgarūpaṃ praviśeddevageham / punarviśedvārataḥ saṃsthitaḥ sa pīṭhasthadevānmānasā cintayīta //
analyzed: paścāt hareḥ namanam kāryam eva sa aṣṭāṅga rūpam praviśet deva geham punar viśet vārataḥ saṃsthitaḥ sa pīṭha stha devān mānasā cintayīta

original: madhye pīṭhaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ ca devī nārāyaṇaṃ praṇametpūrṇameva / devasya savye pīṭhabhāgādvahiśca namaskāryaṃ gurudevāya caiva //
analyzed: madhye pīṭham śrīnivāsam ca devī nārāyaṇam praṇamet pūrṇam eva devasya savye pīṭha bhāgāt vahis ca namaskāryam guru devāya ca eva

original: pīṭhasyāgrāccāpyadhastātpradeśe āgneyakoṇe praṇamedvai khagendra / nairṛtyabhāge vyāsadevāya devi namaskāryo vaiṣṇavaḥ sarvadāpi //
analyzed: pīṭhasya agrāt ca api adhastāt pradeśe āgneya koṇe praṇamet vai khaga indra nairṛtya bhāge vyāsadevāya devi namaskāryaḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ sarvadā api

original: vāyavyakoṇe bhaktipūrvaṃ sudurgāṃ namaskuryādbhaktisaṃvardhitātmā / pīṭhasyordhvaṃ hyagnikoṇeṣu devī dharmādhibhūtāya namo yamāya //
analyzed: vāyavya koṇe bhakti pūrvam su durgām namaskuryāt bhakti saṃvardhita ātmā pīṭhasya ūrdhvam hi agni koṇeṣu devī dharma adhibhūtāya namaḥ yamāya

original: pīṭhasyordhvaṃ nairṛtasyordhvakoṇe jñānādhipaṃ praṇamedvāyudevam / pīṭhasyordhvaṃ vāyukoṇe ca subhrūrvairāgyānāmadhipaṃ caiva rudram //
analyzed: pīṭhasya ūrdhvam nairṛtasya ūrdhva koṇe jñānādhipam praṇamet vāyudevam pīṭhasya ūrdhvam vāyu koṇe ca subhrūḥ vairāgyānām adhipam ca eva rudram

original: pīṭhasyordhvaṃ tvīśakoṇe ca devi aiśvaryāṇāmadhipaṃ cendradevam / pīṭhasya pūrve praṇamennairṛtiṃ ca aryāmṇānāmadhipaṃ cātra devi //
analyzed: pīṭhasya ūrdhvam tu īśa koṇe ca devi aiśvaryāṇām adhipam ca indra devam pīṭhasya pūrve praṇamet nairṛtim ca aryāmṇānām adhipam ca atra devi

original: devasya pīṭhasya ca dakṣiṇe ca durgāṃ namedugrarūpābhidhāṃ ca / pīṭhasya kanye praṇametpaścime vai ārogyāṇā madhipaṃ kāmadevam //
analyzed: devasya pīṭhasya ca dakṣiṇe ca durgām namet ugra rūpa abhidhām ca pīṭhasya kanye praṇamet paścime vai ārogyāṇām adhipam kāmadevam

original: devasya pīṭhasyottare rudradevamanaiśvaryāṇāmadhipaṃ saṃsmarecca / pīṭhasya madhye praṇamedvai varāhaṃ sadā kanye paramaṃ pūruṣākhyam //
analyzed: devasya pīṭhasya uttare rudra devam anaiśvaryāṇām adhipam saṃsmaret ca pīṭhasya madhye praṇamet vai varāham sadā kanye paramam pūruṣa ākhyam

original: tasyopariṣṭācchaktisaṃjñāṃ ca lakṣmīmādhārarūpāṃ praṇameccaiva nityam / tasyopariṣṭādvāyukūrmau namecca tasyopariṣṭāccheṣakūrmau namecca //
analyzed: tasya upariṣṭāt śakti saṃjñām ca lakṣmīm ādhāra rūpām praṇamet ca eva nityam tasya upariṣṭāt vāyu kūrmau namet ca tasya upariṣṭāt śeṣa kūrmau namet ca

original: tasyopariṣṭādabhimāninīṃ bhuvo bhūdevatāṃ praṇameccaiva subhrūḥ / tasyopariṣṭādvaruṇaṃ saṃsmarecca kṣīrodadheradhipaṃ caiva devam //
analyzed: tasya upariṣṭāt abhimāninīm bhuvaḥ bhūdevatām praṇamet ca eva subhrūḥ tasya upariṣṭāt varuṇam saṃsmaret ca kṣīrodadheḥ adhipam ca eva devam

original: tasyopariṣṭātpraṇameccaiva lakṣmīṃ śvetadvīpākhyaṃ kanyake pūjayecca / tasyopariṣṭātpraṇameccaiva lakṣmīṃ mahādivyāṃ maṇḍapasaṃjñakāṃ ca //
analyzed: tasya upariṣṭāt praṇamet ca eva lakṣmīm śvetadvīpā ākhyam kanyake pūjayet ca tasya upariṣṭāt praṇamet ca eva lakṣmīm mahā divyām maṇḍapa saṃjñakām ca

original: pīṭhasya madhye yamasaṃjñāṃ ca lakṣmīṃ samarcayedyamamadhye ca devīm / yamasya devasya ca dakṣiṇe ca sūryaṃ nameddīparūpaṃ ca bhadre //
analyzed: pīṭhasya madhye yama saṃjñām ca lakṣmīm samarcayet yama madhye ca devīm yamasya devasya ca dakṣiṇe ca sūryam namet dīpa rūpam ca bhadre

original: yamasya devasya ca vāmabhāge śriyaṃ nameddīparūpāṃ ca devīm / yamasya devasya tu cāgrabhāge hutāśanaṃ dīparūpaṃ namecca //
analyzed: yamasya devasya ca vāma bhāge śriyam namet dīpa rūpām ca devīm  yamasya devasya tu ca agra bhāge hutāśanam dīpa rūpam namet ca

original: devasyāgre bhūmināmnīṃ namecca tattvābhimānāṃ saṃsmareccaiva nityam / paryaṅkarūpaṃ śrīnivāsasya viṣṇostamobhimānāṃ sannameccaiva durgām //
analyzed: devasya agre bhūmi nāmnīm namet ca tattva abhimānām saṃsmaret ca eva nityam paryaṅka rūpam śrīnivāsasya viṣṇoḥ tamaḥ bhimānām san namet ca eva durgām

original: pūrvādigaṃ pīṭhasopānarūpamātmānamekaṃ praṇamecca devi / dakṣasthadikpīṭhasopānarūpaṃ jñānātmakaṃ praṇameccaiva kanye //
analyzed: pūrvādi gam pīṭha sopāna rūpam ātmānam ekam praṇamet ca devi dakṣa stha diś pīṭha sopāna rūpam jñāna ātmakam praṇamet ca eva kanye

original: padmasya pūrvasthadale ca devi strīrūpākhyaṃ vimalākhyāmimāṃ ca / brahmādidevānpraṇamecca devi āgneyakoṇasthadale śṛṇutvam //
analyzed: padmasya pūrva stha dale ca devi strī rūpa ākhyam vimalā ākhyām imām ca brahma ādi devān praṇamet ca devi āgneya koṇa stha dale śṛṇu tvam

original: utkarṣanāmnīṃ paramāṃ ca devīṃ namedramāṃ brahmavāyū ca śeṣam / dakṣasthapadmasya dalāṣṭake ca nārāyaṇākāraśeṣādikānām //
analyzed: utkarṣa nāmnīm paramām ca devīm namet ramām brahma vāyū ca śeṣam dakṣa stha padmasya dala aṣṭake ca nārāyaṇa ākāra śeṣa ādikānām

original: strīrūpebhyo namanaṃ kāryameva kanye mayā paścimasthe dale ca / gopākhyanārāyaṇabrahmavāyuviprādikānāṃ śeṣarūdrādikānām //
analyzed: strī rūpebhyaḥ namanam kāryam eva kanye mayā paścima sthe dale ca gopa ākhya nārāyaṇa brahma vāyu vipra ādikānām śeṣa rūdra ādikānām

original: strīrūpebhyo namanaṃ kāryameva īśāna koṇasthadaleṣu caiva / īśānanārāyaṇamāviriñcavāyurviyaccheṣasurādikānām //
analyzed: strī rūpebhyaḥ namanam kāryam eva īśāna koṇa stha daleṣu ca eva

original: strīrūpebhyo namanaṃ kāryameva tathaiva padmasya ca madhyabhāge / anugrahākhyā viṣṇulakṣmīśca devī vāyurviyaccheṣarudrādikānām //
analyzed: strī rūpebhyaḥ namanam kāryam eva tathā eva padmasya ca madhya bhāge anugraha ākhyā viṣṇu lakṣmīḥ ca devī vāyuḥ viyat śeṣa rudra ādikānām

original: strīrūpāṇāṃ namanaṃ kāryameva suyogapīṭhasya svarūpa bhūtam / sadā namecchrīmadanantasaṃjñamevaṃ na mecchrīnivāsaṃ ca devam //
analyzed: strī rūpāṇām namanam kāryam eva suyogapīṭhasya bhūtam sadā namet śrīmat ananta saṃjñam evam na met śrīnivāsam ca devam

original: śrīnivāsasya vāme tu lakṣmīṃ ca praṇamedvudhaḥ / śrīnivāsasya savye tu dharāyai praṇamecchubhe //
analyzed: śrīnivāsasya vāme tu lakṣmīm ca praṇamet vudhaḥ śrīnivāsasya savye tu dharāyai praṇamet śubhe

original: pīṭhādvahiḥ pūrvabhāge kṛpolkaṃ praṇamecchubham / maholkaṃ dakṣiṇe caiva vīrolkaṃ paścime namet //
analyzed: pīṭhāt vahis pūrva bhāge kṛpa ulkam praṇamet śubham mahā ulkam dakṣiṇe ca eva vīra ulkam paścime namet

original: uttare ca namaḥ kuryādyulkāya ca mahātmane / caturṣvapi ca koṇeṣu sahasrolkaṃ nametsudhīḥ //
analyzed: uttare ca namaḥ kuryāt yulkāya ca mahātmane caturṣu api ca koṇeṣu sahasra ulkam namet sudhīḥ

original: pūrve tu vāsudevāya namaskuryācca dakṣiṇe / saṃkarṣaṇāya devāya pradyumnāya ca paścime //
analyzed: pūrve tu vāsudevāya namaskuryāt ca dakṣiṇe saṃkarṣaṇāya devāya pradyumnāya ca paścime

original: uttare hyaniruddhyā namaskuryādatandritaḥ / āgneye ca namaskuryātkanye māyāṃ sadā śubhe //
analyzed: uttare hi aniruddhyā namaskuryāt atandritaḥ āgneye ca namaskuryāt kanye māyām sadā śubhe

original: jayāyai ca namaskuryānnairṛtye cāpi vāyave / kṛtye caiva namaskuryādīśānye śāntisaṃjñakām //
analyzed: jayāyai ca namaskuryāt nairṛtye ca api vāyave kṛtye ca eva namaskuryāt īśānye śānti saṃjñakām

original: keśavāya namaḥ pūrve tathā nārāyaṇāya ca / mādhavāya namaskuryānnairṛtye cāpi vāyave //
analyzed: keśavāya namaḥ pūrve tathā nārāyaṇāya ca mādhavāya namaskuryāt nairṛtye ca api vāyave

original: āgneye kanyake nityaṃ bhaktyā tu prayataḥ śubhe / govindāya namaskuryāddakṣiṇe viṣṇave tathā //
analyzed: āgneye kanyake nityam bhaktyā tu prayataḥ śubhe govindāya namaskuryāt dakṣiṇe viṣṇave tathā

original: madhusūdanāya bhoḥ kanye namaskuryāttu nairṛtau / paścime trivikramāya vāmanāya tathaiva ca //
analyzed: madhusūdanāya bhoḥ kanye namaskuryāt tu nairṛtau paścime trivikramāya vāmanāya tathā eva ca

original: viṣṇave śrīdharāyātha namaskuryācca bhāmiti / uttare tu mahākanye hṛṣīkeśāya vai namaḥ //
analyzed: viṣṇave śrīdharāya atha namaskuryāt ca bhām iti  uttare tu mahā kanye hṛṣīkeśāya vai namaḥ

original: tathā vai padmanābhāya namaskuryādatandritaḥ / dāmodarāya caiśānye namaskuryācca bhāmini //
analyzed: tathā vai padmanābhāya namaskuryāt atandritaḥ dāmodarāya ca aiśānye namaskuryāt ca bhāmini

original: caturthāvaraṇe pūrve mahākūrmāya vai namaḥ / varāhāya namaskuryādāgneye kanyake śubhe //
analyzed: caturtha āvaraṇe pūrve mahākūrmāya vai namaḥ varāhāya namaskuryāt āgneye kanyake śubhe

original: dakṣiṇe nārasiṃhāya vāmanāya namonamaḥ / bhārgavāya namaskuryānnairṛtye śuddhacetasā //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe nārasiṃhāya vāmanāya namaḥ namaḥ bhārgavāya namaskuryāt nairṛtye śuddha cetasā

original: paścime mādhavāyātha tathā kṛṣṇāya vai namaḥ / buddhāya ca namaskuryādvāyavye kanyake śubhe //
analyzed: paścime mādhavāya atha tathā kṛṣṇāya vai namaḥ buddhāya ca namaskuryāt vāyavye kanyake śubhe

original: uttare hyulkarūpāya anantāya namostu te / īśānye viśvarūpāya namaskuryādatandritaḥ //
analyzed: uttare hi ulkā rūpāya anantāya namaḥ astu te  īśānye viśvarūpāya namaskuryāt atandritaḥ

original: āgneye vāruṇīṃ caiva gāyatrīṃ caiva nairṛte / vāyavye bhāratīṃ caiva īśānye girijāṃ namet //
analyzed: āgneye vāruṇīm ca eva gāyatrīm ca eva nairṛte vāyavye bhāratīm ca eva īśānye girijām namet

original: girijāṃ vāmabhāge tu sauparṇai caiva saṃnamet / prāgindrāya namaskuryātsāyudhāya tathaiva ca //
analyzed: girijām vāma bhāge tu ca eva saṃnamet  prāk indrāya namaskuryāt sa āyudhāya tathā eva ca

original: sa parigrahāya śrīviṣṇoḥ pārṣadāya namonamaḥ / āgneyetyagnaye tubhyaṃ sāyudhāyeti pūrvavat //
analyzed: sa parigrahāya śrīviṣṇoḥ pārṣadāya namaḥ namaḥ āgneya iti agnaye tubhyam sa āyudhāya iti pūrvavat

original: dakṣiṇe tu yamāyaiva nairṛtyāṃ nirṛtiṃ yajet / paścime varuṇāyaiva vāyavye vāyave namaḥ //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe tu yamāya eva nairṛtyām nirṛtim yajet paścime varuṇāya eva vāyavye vāyave namaḥ

original: uttare ca kuberāya īśānye ca śivāya ca / īśānaśakrayormadhye brahmaṇe sāyudhāya ca //
analyzed: uttare ca kuberāya īśānye ca śivāya ca īśāna śakrayoḥ madhye brahmaṇe sa āyudhāya ca

original: nirṛtyapyatimadhye tu śeṣāya ca namonamaḥ / evaṃ kṛtvā namaskāraṃ praṇamecca punaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: nirṛti apyati madhye tu śeṣāya ca namaḥ namaḥ evam kṛtvā namaskāram praṇamet ca punar punar

original: ityetatsarvamākhyātaṃ vidhipūrvaṃ tu darśanam / itaḥ parantu gantavyaṃ darśanārthaṃ ramāpate //
analyzed: iti etat sarvam ākhyātam vidhi pūrvam tu darśanam itas parantu gantavyam darśana artham ramāpate

original: evamuktvā tu sā devī taiḥ sārdhaṃ tu yayau mudā / yaduktaḥ śrīnivāsasya darśanasya vidhiḥ khaga / kasyacinnaiva vaktavyo gopyatvācca kadācana //
analyzed: evam uktvā tu sā devī taiḥ sārdham tu yayau mudā yat uktaḥ śrīnivāsasya darśanasya vidhiḥ khaga kasyacid nā eva vaktavyaḥ gopya tvāt ca kadācana

original: samāgamo durghaṭa eva vīndra satāṃ ca sattattvavibodhakānām / anekajanmārjitapuṇyasaṃcayādabhūdguroḥ saṃgama eva tasya //
analyzed: samāgamaḥ durghaṭaḥ eva vīndra satām ca sat tattva vibodhakānām aneka janma arjita puṇya saṃcayāt abhūt guroḥ saṃgamaḥ eva tasya

original: payo vikāraṃ ca nijaṃ jahāti śeṣasya śeṣaṃ nalinasya ṣaṅkajam / bhāvaṃ calaṃ paṅkajanābhayogātsatsaṃgayogādaśubhāni na syuḥ //
analyzed: payaḥ vikāram ca nijam jahāti śeṣasya śeṣam nalinasya ṣaṅkajam bhāvam calam paṅkaja nābha yogāt sat saṃga yogāt aśubhāni na syuḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe śrīveṅkaṭeśagiryārohaṇakramatadbhaktatatparvatanāmādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturviśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe śrīveṅkaṭeśagiryārohaṇakramatadbhaktatatparvatanāmādinirūpaṇam nāma caturviśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 25
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: sā dvāradeśe śrīnivāsasya devī svāmipuṣkariṇīṃ dadṛśe kaiśca sārdham / svāminhare śrīnivāseti sā taṃ brahmādīnāṃ tārakaṃ sampradadhyau //
analyzed: sā dvāra deśe śrīnivāsasya devī svāmipuṣkariṇīm dadṛśe kaiḥ ca sārdham svāmin hare śrīnivāsa iti sā tam brahma ādīnām tārakam sampradadhyau

original: devaiḥ sārdhaṃ pālanārthaṃ ca viṣṇurastyeva nityaṃ puṣkariṇyāṃ jaleṣu / ataḥ svāmipuṣkariṇīti cāhustatra snānaṃ kanyakānyāśca cakruḥ //
analyzed: devaiḥ sārdham pālana artham ca viṣṇuḥ asti eva nityam puṣkariṇyām jaleṣu atas svāmipuṣkariṇī iti ca āhuḥ tatra snānam kanyakā anyāḥ ca cakruḥ

original: śucirbhūtvā śrīnivāsaṃ ca devāstuptuṃ viviśuḥ śuddhabhaktyā khagendra / yathopadiṣṭaṃ guruṇā tathaiva cakre kanyāśca sarvaṃ khagendra //
analyzed: śuciḥ bhūtvā śrīnivāsam ca devāḥ tuptum viviśuḥ śuddha bhaktyā khaga indra yathā upadiṣṭam guruṇā tathā eva cakre kanyāḥ ca sarvam khaga indra

original: tadā hariṃ darśayāmāsa tasyai svakaṃ rūpaṃ supratīke supūrṇam / sā kanyakā śrīnivāsasya rūpaṃ dadarśa bhaktyā svamanobhirāmam //
analyzed: tadā harim darśayāmāsa tasyai svakam rūpam supratīke su pūrṇam sā kanyakā śrīnivāsasya rūpam dadarśa bhaktyā sva manobhirāmam

original: suvarṇacitraṃ vasanaṃ vasānaṃ soṣṇīṣakaṃ kañcukaṃ saṃdadhānam //
analyzed: suvarṇa citram vasanam vasānam sa uṣṇīṣakam kañcukam saṃdadhānam

original: mṛgotthamadagandhena surabhīkṛtadiṅmukham / puṇḍarīkaviśālākṣaṃ kaṃbugrīvaṃ mahābhujam //
analyzed: mṛga uttha mada gandhena surabhīkṛta diṅmukham puṇḍarīka viśāla akṣam kaṃbu grīvam mahā bhujam

original: hemayajñopavītāṅgaṃ sākṣātkandarpasannibham / jaganmohanasaindaryaṃ komalāṅgaṃ manoharam //
analyzed: hema yajñopavīta aṅgam sākṣāt kandarpa sannibham jagat mohana saindaryam komala aṅgam manoharam

original: dṛṣṭvā ca kanyā mumude romāñcitasugātrakā //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca kanyā mumude romāñcita su gātrakā

original: taddarśanāhlādapariplutāśayā premṇātha romāśrukulākulekṣaṇā / nanarta devī puratastasya viṣṇoḥ sā dhvastadoṣā paramādareṇa / ānanda māṃ pāhi sukhaṃ ca dattvā mukundā māṃ pāhi vimuktidānāt //
analyzed: tad darśana āhlāda paripluta āśayā premṇā atha roma aśru kula ākula īkṣaṇā nanarta devī puratas tasya viṣṇoḥ sā dhvasta doṣā parama ādareṇa ānanda mām pāhi sukham ca dattvā mukundā mām pāhi vimukti dānāt

original: māṃ pāhi nityaṃ hyaravindanetra prasannadṛṣṭyā karuṇāsudhārdra / govinda govinda suduḥ khitāṃ māṃ jñānādidānena hi pāhi nityam //
analyzed: mām pāhi nityam hi aravinda netra prasanna dṛṣṭyā karuṇā sudhā ārdra govinda govinda su dus khitām mām jñāna ādi dānena hi pāhi nityam

original: janārdana tvaṃ hi suduṣṭasaṃgānkāmādirūpānsatataṃ varjayitvā / hare hare māṃ satataṃ pāhi daityānsamāhṛtya prabalānvighnarūpān //
analyzed: janārdana tvam hi su duṣṭa saṃgān kāma ādi rūpān satatam varjayitvā hare hare mām satatam pāhi daityān samāhṛtya prabalān vighna rūpān

original: rameśa māṃ pāhi caturmukheśa viśveśa māṃ pāhi sarasvatīśa / rameśa māṃ pāhi nidānamūrte vṛndāravṛndairvanditapādapadma //
analyzed: rama īśa mām pāhi caturmukha īśa viśveśa mām pāhi sarasvatī īśa rama īśa mām pāhi nidāna mūrte vṛndāra vṛndaiḥ vandita pāda padma

original: evaṃ tu natvā paramādareṇa tuṣṭāva viṣṇuṃ paramaṃ purāṇam / lakṣmyā sadā ye 'viditā guṇāśca asaṃkhyātāḥ saṃti viṣṇau ca vīśa //
analyzed: evam tu natvā parama ādareṇa tuṣṭāva viṣṇum paramam purāṇam  lakṣmyā sadā ye viditāḥ guṇāḥ ca asaṃkhyātāḥ saṃti viṣṇau ca

original: teṣāṃ sakāśādatibāhulyasaṃkhyā guṇā harau te 'viditā vai ramāyāḥ / ato hare stavane kvāsti śaktistathāpi yatnaṃ stavane te kariṣye //
analyzed: teṣām sakāśāt ati bāhulya saṃkhyāḥ guṇāḥ harau te viditāḥ vai ramāyāḥ atas hare stavane kva asti śaktiḥ tathā api yatnam stavane te kariṣye

original: tava prasādācca ramāprasādādvidhiprasādātbhāratīśaprasādāt / rudraprasādātstavanaṃ te kariṣye tathāpi viṣṇo mayi śāntiṃ kuruṣva //
analyzed: tava prasādāt ca ramā prasādāt vidhi prasādāt bhāratī īśa prasādāt  rudra prasādāt stavanam te kariṣye tathā api viṣṇo mayi śāntim kuruṣva

original: yadi prasannosi mayi tvamīśa tvatpādamūle dehi bhaktiṃ sadaiva / tvaddarśanāddeva śubhāśubhaṃ ca naṣṭaṃ madīyaṃ hyaśubhaṃ ca nityam //
analyzed: yadi prasannaḥ asi mayi tvam īśa tvad pāda mūle dehi bhaktim sadā eva tvad darśanāt deva śubha aśubham ca naṣṭam madīyam hi aśubham ca nityam

original: tvanmāyayā naṣṭamimaṃ ca lokaṃ madena mattaṃ badhiraṃ cāndhabhūtam / aiśvaryayogena ca yo hi mūko jātaḥ sadā dīnāgurvādikeṣu //
analyzed: tvad māyayā naṣṭam imam ca lokam madena mattam badhiram ca andha bhūtam aiśvarya yogena ca yaḥ hi mūkaḥ jātaḥ sadā dīna a guru ādikeṣu

original: mā dehi aiśvaryamanuttamaṃ tvatpādāravindasya viruddhabhūtam / tvaṃ deva me dehi satāṃ ca saṃgaṃ tava svarūpapratipādakānām //
analyzed: mā dehi aiśvaryam anuttamam tvad pāda aravindasya viruddha bhūtam tvam deva me dehi satām ca saṃgam tava sva rūpa pratipādakānām

original: putrādīnāmaihikaṃ vāsudeva dagdhvā ca me dehi pādāravinde / sadvaṣṇave kriyamāṇaṃ ca kopaṃ dagdhvā ca me dehi pādaravinde //
analyzed: putra ādīnām aihikam vāsudeva dagdhvā ca me dehi pāda aravinde sat vaṣṇave kriyamāṇam ca kopam dagdhvā ca me dehi pāda aravinde

original: dravyādike kriyamāṇaṃ ca lobhaṃ dagdhvā vai me dehi pādābjamūle / putrādike kriyamāṇaṃ ca mohaṃ dagdhvā ca me dehi pādābjamūle //
analyzed: dravya ādike kriyamāṇam ca lobham dagdhvā vai me dehi pāda abja mūle putra ādike kriyamāṇam ca moham dagdhvā ca me dehi pāda abja mūle

original: vidyāṃ putraṃ dravyajātaṃ madaṃ ca dagdhvā ca me dehi pādābjamūle / sadvaiṣṇavāsahamānasvarūpaṃ dagdhvā mātsaryaṃ pāhi māṃ veṅkaṭeśa //
analyzed: vidyām putram dravya jātam madam ca dagdhvā ca me dehi pāda abja mūle sat vaiṣṇava asahamāna svarūpam dagdhvā mātsaryam pāhi mām veṅkaṭeśa

original: mantraṃ ca me dehi nidānamūrte yenaiva me syāttava saṃgaśca bhūyaḥ / nānyaṃ vṛṇe tava pādābjasaṃgāttadeva me dehi mama prasannaḥ //
analyzed: mantram ca me dehi nidāna mūrte yena eva me syāt tava saṃgaḥ ca bhūyas na anyam vṛṇe tava pāda abja saṃgāt tat eva me dehi mama prasannaḥ

original: itīritaḥ śrīnivāsaḥ prasanna uvāca devo hyamṛtastravaṃ ca / atraiva kanye prajapasva mantraṃ sugopyarūpaṃ paramādareṇa //
analyzed: iti īritaḥ śrīnivāsaḥ prasannaḥ uvāca devaḥ hi amṛtaḥ travam ca  atrā eva kanye prajapasva mantram su gopya rūpam parama ādareṇa

original: vakṣyāmi mantraṃ paramādareṇa śṛṇvadya bhaktyā paramādareṇa / antaḥ sthamantyaṃ hyādyasaṃyuktameva sabindu tadvatsparśakādyena yuktam //
analyzed: vakṣyāmi mantram parama ādareṇa śṛṇu adya bhaktyā parama ādareṇa antar stham antyam hi ādya saṃyuktam eva sa bindu tadvat sparśaka ādyena yuktam

original: ekārayuktaṃ prathamāntaḥ sthayuktaṃ samatrikoṇe coṣmaṇā saṃyutaṃ ca / takārasaktaṃ svarśamantaḥ sthayuktamādyanta oṃkārasamanvitaṃ ca //
analyzed: ekāra yuktam prathama antar stha yuktam sama trikoṇe ca ūṣmaṇā saṃyutam ca takāra saktam sva rūpam antar stha yuktam ādi ante oṃkāra samanvitam ca

original: anena mantreṇa tavepsitaṃ ca bhaveddhi kanye nāntra vicāryamasti / evaṃ sa uktvā śrīnivāso haristu pratīkavaddarśayāmāsa rūpam //
analyzed: anena mantreṇa tava īpsitam ca bhavet hi kanye na antra vicāryam asti evam saḥ uktvā śrīnivāsaḥ hariḥ tu pratīka vat darśayāmāsa rūpam

original: natvā tu sā śrīnivāsaṃ ca devī uvāsa ha svāmisaraḥ samīpe / tasmindine brāhmaṇādīṃśca sarvānsaṃtarpayāmāsa ca ṣaḍrasānnaiḥ //
analyzed: natvā tu sā śrīnivāsam ca devī uvāsa ha svāmi saraḥ samīpe tasmin dine brāhmaṇa ādīn ca sarvān saṃtarpayāmāsa ca ṣaṣ rasa annaiḥ

original: sāyaṅkāle śrīnivāsasya dṛṣṭvā utsāharūpaiḥ śrīnivāsapratīkaiḥ / sākaṃ bhaktyā saṃpraṇamyātha devī pradakṣiṇaṃ śrīnivāsasya suṣṭhu //
analyzed: sāyaṅkāle śrīnivāsasya dṛṣṭvā utsāha rūpaiḥ śrīnivāsa pratīkaiḥ sākam bhaktyā saṃpraṇamya atha devī pradakṣiṇam śrīnivāsasya suṣṭhu

original: nanarta devī supratīkasya cāgre lajjāṃ tyaktvā jaya deveti coktvā / ānṛttakāle ca hareśca vaktraṃ dṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭyā tu paraṃ nanarta //
analyzed: nanarta devī supratīkasya ca agre lajjām tyaktvā jaya deva iti ca uktvā ānṛtta kāle ca hareḥ ca vaktram dṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭyā tu param nanarta

original: mamādya gātraṃ pāvitaṃ śrīnivāsa mamādya netraṃ saphalaṃ saṃbabhūva / mamādya pādau sārthakau caiva jātau pradakṣiṇaṃ śrīnivāseśa kṛtvā //
analyzed: mama adya gātram pāvitam śrīnivāsa mama adya netram saphalam saṃbabhūva mama adya pādau sārthakau ca eva jātau pradakṣiṇam śrīnivāsa īśa kṛtvā

original: hastau ca me sārthakāvadya jātau agre kṛtvā hastaśabdaṃ murāreḥ / evaṃ vadantī prīṇayantī ca devaṃ jagāmasā stotravacaḥ kadambaiḥ //
analyzed: hastau ca me sārthakau adya jātau agre kṛtvā hasta śabdam murāreḥ  evam vadantī prīṇayantī ca devam jagāmasā stotra vacaḥ kadambaiḥ

original: devāstadā dunduṃbhayo vinedire tanmastake puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ ca cakruḥ / tasminkāle ubhayoḥ pārśvayośca nṛtyaṃ cakrurdevatāvāranāryaḥ //
analyzed: devāḥ tadā dunduṃbhayaḥ vinedire tad mastake puṣpa vṛṣṭim ca cakruḥ tasmin kāle ubhayoḥ pārśvayoḥ ca nṛtyam cakruḥ devatā vāra nāryaḥ

original: tathaiva tāstalaśabdaṃ ca kṛtvā tadā sarvā namanaṃ cāpi cakruḥ / ānandaśaile sarvadā tvitthameva sā sarvadā nartayantī ca vīndra //
analyzed: tathā eva tāḥ tala śabdam ca kṛtvā tadā sarvāḥ namanam ca api cakruḥ ānanda śaile sarvadā tu ittham eva sā sarvadā nartayantī ca vīndra

original: ānandamagnā sāpi devī jagāma svamāśramaṃ jaigiṣavyeṇa sārdham / yātrāmevaṃ ye na kurvanti vīndra teṣāṃ ca sarvaṃ niṣphalaṃ cāhurāryāḥ //
analyzed: ānanda magnā sā api devī jagāma svam āśramam jaigiṣavyeṇa sārdham yātrām evam ye na kurvanti vīndra teṣām ca sarvam niṣphalam ca āhuḥ āryāḥ

original: gatvāśramaṃ jaigiṣavyeṇa sārdhaṃ guruṃ tvapṛcchadveṅkaṭeśasya mantram / mantrasyārthaṃ brūhi me jaigiṣavya mantrāvṛttiṃ kurvatāṃ vai phalāya //
analyzed: gatvā āśramam jaigiṣavyeṇa sārdham gurum tu apṛcchat veṅkaṭeśasya mantram mantrasya artham brūhi me jaigiṣavya mantra āvṛttim kurvatām vai phalāya

original: jaigīṣvya uvāca / śṛṇuṣva bhadre veṅkaṭe śasya nāmnastvarthaṃ śrutvā hṛdaye saṃnidhatsva //
analyzed: jaigīṣvyaḥ uvāca śṛṇuṣva bhadre veṅkaṭe śasya nāmnaḥ tu artham śrutvā hṛdaye saṃnidhatsva

original: viti hyuttamavācī syādyeti jñānamudāhṛtam / kakāraḥ sukhavācī syāṭṭeti cittamudāhṛtam //
analyzed: v iti hi uttama vācī syāt ya iti jñānam udāhṛtam kakāraḥ sukha vācī syāt ṭa iti cittam udāhṛtam

original: īśatvamātmavāci syādevaṃ jñeyaṃ tu kanyake / pūrṇajñānaṃ sukhaṃ vittaṃ vyāptatvādvyaṅkaṭābhidhaḥ //
analyzed: īśa tvam ātma vāci syāt evam jñeyam tu kanyake pūrṇa jñānam sukham vittam vyāpta tvāt vyaṅkaṭa abhidhaḥ

original: vya (ve) mindriyādikaṃ proktaṃ vyaṅgabhūtaṃ harau yataḥ / kaṭaśca samudāyārtho vyaṃ (veṃ)
analyzed: proktam vyaṅga bhūtam harau yatas kaṭaḥ ca samudāya arthaḥ vyaṃ veṃ

original: kaṭaścendriyaughakaḥ //
analyzed: kaṭaḥ ca indriya oghakaḥ

original: svasminprerayate yasmāttasmādvyaṅkaṭanāmakaḥ / viṣaye preṣayennityamato vyaṅkaṭanāmakaḥ //
analyzed: svasmin prerayate yasmāt tasmāt vyaṅkaṭa nāmakaḥ viṣaye preṣayet nityam atas vyaṅkaṭa nāmakaḥ

original: viśiṣṭajñānarūpatvādvyeti muktāḥ sadā smṛtāḥ / muktānāṃ ca samūhastu vyaṅkaṭeti prakīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: viśiṣṭa jñāna rūpa tvāt vyeti muktāḥ sadā smṛtāḥ muktānām ca samūhaḥ tu vyaṅkaṭa iti prakīrtitaḥ

original: sadā muktasamūhānāmīśatvādvyaṅkaṭābhidhaḥ / liṅgadehamato jīvo vyaṅkaṭeti samāhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: sadā mukta samūhānām īśa tvāt vyaṅkaṭa abhidhaḥ liṅga deha mataḥ jīvaḥ vyaṅkaṭa iti samāhṛtaḥ

original: liṅgānāṃ caiva svāmitvādvyaṅkaṭeśeti saṃjñitaḥ / daityānāṃ ca samūhāstu jñānādividhurā yataḥ / ato daityasamūhastu vyaṅkaṭeti prakīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: liṅgānām ca eva svāmi tvāt vyaṅkaṭeśa iti saṃjñitaḥ daityānām ca samūhāḥ tu jñāna ādi vidhurāḥ yatas atas daitya samūhaḥ tu vyaṅkaṭa iti prakīrtitaḥ

original: teṣāṃ saṃharaṇe īśastvato vyaṅkaṭanāmakaḥ / ānandasya viruddhatvātkāmakrodhādayo guṇāḥ //
analyzed: teṣām saṃharaṇe īśaḥ tu atas vyaṅkaṭa nāmakaḥ ānandasya viruddha tvāt kāma krodha ādayaḥ guṇāḥ

original: vyaṅkaṭā iti saṃproktāsteṣāṃ nāśayitā prabhuḥ / atastu vyaṅkaṭeśākhya evaṃ jñātvā japaṃ kuru //
analyzed: vyaṅkaṭāḥ iti saṃproktāḥ teṣām nāśayitā prabhuḥ atas tu vyaṅkaṭeśa ākhye evam jñātvā japam kuru

original: evaṃ vyaṅkaṭāmāhātmyaṃ śrutvā devī khageśvara / nidrāṃ cakāra tatraiva rātrau pitrā sahaiva ca / brāhme muhūrte cotthayi hṛdi sasmāra kanyakā //
analyzed: evam vyaṅkaṭā māhātmyam śrutvā devī khageśvara nidrām cakāra tatra eva rātrau pitrā saha eva ca  brāhme muhūrte hṛdi sasmāra kanyakā

original: (vyaṅkaṭeśasya prātaḥ stutiḥ) / śrīvyaṅkaṭeśaśca nṛsiṃhamūrtiḥ śrīvaradarājaśca varāhamūrtiḥ / śrīraṅgaśāyī ca anantaśāyī kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam //
analyzed: vyaṅkaṭeśasya prātar stutiḥ śrī vyaṅkaṭa īśaḥ ca nṛsiṃha mūrtiḥ śrī varada rājaḥ ca varāha mūrtiḥ śrīraṅgaśāyī ca anantaśāyī kurvantu sarve mama su prabhātam

original: śrīkṛṣṇamūrtiśca gadādharaśca śrīviṣṇupādastu prayāgavāsaḥ / nārāyaṇaḥ śrībadarīnivāsaḥ kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇa mūrtiḥ ca gadādharaḥ ca śrī viṣṇupādaḥ tu prayāga vāsaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ śrī badarī nivāsaḥ kurvantu sarve mama su prabhātam

original: dāmodaro vai trijagannivāsaḥ śrīpāṇḍuraṅgaśca nṛsiṃhadevaḥ / śrīrāmadevaśca amoghavāsaḥ kudṛ //
analyzed: dāmodaraḥ vai trijagannivāsaḥ śrīpāṇḍuḥ aṅgaḥ ca nṛsiṃhadevaḥ śrīrāmadevaḥ ca amoghavāsaḥ

original: śrīdharmaputraśca nṛsiṃhamūrtiḥ śrīpippalasthaśca muhallavāsaḥ / kolānṛsiṃhaḥ śūrpakārastha siṃhaḥ kurvantudṛ //
analyzed: śrī dharmaputraḥ ca nṛsiṃha mūrtiḥ śrīpippala sthaḥ ca muhallavāsaḥ

original: caturmukhaścārusarasvatī ca svabhāratī śarvasuparṇaśeṣāḥ / amāmahedraśca śacīmukhāstāḥ kurvantu dṛ //
analyzed: caturmukhaḥ cārusarasvatī ca sva bhāratī śarva suparṇa śeṣāḥ amā mahedraḥ ca śacī mukhāḥ tāḥ kurvantu

original: dvārāvatī kāśikāvantikā ca prayāgakāñcyau mathurāpurī ca / māyāvatī hastimatī purī ca kurvantu sa dṛ //
analyzed: dvārāvatī kāśikā avantikā ca prayāga kāñcyau mathurā purī ca māyāvatī hastimatī purī ca kurvantu

original: bhāgīrathī caiva sarasvatī ca godāvarī siṃdhukṛṣṇa ca veṇī / kalindakanyā yamunā ca narmadā kurva dṛ //
analyzed: bhāgīrathī ca eva sarasvatī ca godāvarī siṃdhu kṛṣṇa ca veṇī kalindakanyā yamunā ca narmadā

original: vitastikāverisatuṅgabhadrāḥ suvañjarā bhīmarathī vipāśā / sutāmraparṇī ca pinākinī ca ku dṛ //
analyzed: vitasti kāveri satuṅga bhadrāḥ suvañjarā bhīmarathī vipāśā sutāmraparṇī ca pinākinī ca ku dṛ

original: svāmipuṣkariṇī caiva suvarṇamukharī tathā / śrīpāṇḍavī taubaruśca kapilā pāpanāśanī //
analyzed: svāmipuṣkariṇī ca eva suvarṇamukharī tathā śrīpāṇḍavī taubaruḥ ca kapilā pāpanāśanī

original: gururvasiṣṭhaḥ kraturaṅgirāśca manuḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaśca gautamaḥ / raibhyo marīciścyavanaśca dakṣaḥ kurvantu sarve mama suprabhātam //
analyzed: guruḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ kratuḥ aṅgirāḥ ca manuḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ ca gautamaḥ raibhyaḥ marīciḥ cyavanaḥ ca dakṣaḥ kurvantu sarve mama su prabhātam

original: saptārṇavāḥ sapta kulācalāśca dvīpāśca saptopavanāni sapta / bhūrādikāni bhuvanāni sapta kurvantu sa dṛ //
analyzed: sapta arṇavāḥ sapta kula acalāḥ ca dvīpāḥ ca sapta upavanāni sapta bhūḥ ādikāni bhuvanāni sapta kurvantu sa dṛ

original: māndhātrā nahuṣoṃbarīṣasagarau rājā nalo dharmarāṭ prahlādaḥ kraturāḍ vibhīṣaṇagayau vyāso hanūmānapi / aśvatthāma kṛpāvumā drupadajā śrījānakī tārakā mandodaryakhilāḥ prabhātasumahaṃ kurvantu nityaṃ hare //
analyzed: māndhātrā nahuṣa uṃbarīṣa sagarau rājā nalaḥ dharmarāj prahlādaḥ kraturāj vibhīṣaṇa gayau vyāsaḥ hanūmān api aśvatthāma kṛpau umā drupada jā śrī jānakī tārakā mandodarī akhilāḥ prabhāta su maham kurvantu nityam hare

original: aśvatthasya vanāni kiṃ ca tulasīdhātrīvanāni prabho punnāgasya vanāni caṃpakavanānyanyāni puṣpāṇi ca / mandārasya vanāni yāni ca hareḥ saugandhikānyapyaho nityaṃ tāni diśantu matpramuditaṃ śrīveṅkaṭeśa prabho //
analyzed: aśvatthasya vanāni kim ca tulasī dhātrī vanāni prabho punnāgasya vanāni caṃpaka vanāni anyāni puṣpāṇi ca mandārasya vanāni yāni ca hareḥ saugandhikāni api aho nityam tāni diśantu mad pramuditam śrī veṅkaṭa īśa prabho

original: evaṃ smṛtvā śrīnivāsasya devī kṛtvā śaucaṃ jaigiṣavyeṇa sākam / snātuṃ yayau puṣkariṇīṃ hareśca snānaṃ samyak tatra cakāra deśe / samyag japtvā vyaṅkaṭeśasya mantramuvāca sā jaigiṣavyaṃ guruṃ ca //
analyzed: evam smṛtvā śrīnivāsasya devī kṛtvā śaucam jaigiṣavyeṇa sākam snātum yayau puṣkariṇīm hareḥ ca snānam samyak tatra cakāra deśe samyak japtvā vyaṅkaṭa īśasya mantram uvāca sā jaigiṣavyam gurum ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe devī kṛtaveṅkaṭeśadarśanatatstutyādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe devī kṛtaveṅkaṭeśadarśanatatstutyādivarṇanam nāma pañcaviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 26
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: kanyovāca / śrīnivāsaḥ kimarthaṃ vai āgatotra vadasva me / śeṣācalopi kutrā bhūtkadāyātaśca pāpahā / svāmipuṣkariṇī cātra kimarthaṃ hyagatā vada //
analyzed: kanyā uvāca śrīnivāsaḥ kim artham vai āgatā utra vadasva me  śeṣa acalaḥ api kutra bhūt kadā āyātaḥ ca pāpa hā svāmipuṣkariṇī ca atra kim artham hi agatā vada

original: jaigīṣavya uvāca śṛṇu bhadre mahābhāge vyaṅkaṭeśasya cāgamam / āvayordevi pāpāni viṣamaṃ yānti bhāmini //
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ uvāca śṛṇu bhadre mahābhāge vyaṅkaṭa īśasya ca āgamam āvayoḥ devi pāpāni viṣamam yānti bhāmini

original: āsītpurā hiraṇyākṣaḥ kāśyapo ditinandanaḥ / sanakādeśca vāgdaṇḍāddvitīyadvārapālakaḥ //
analyzed: āsīt purā hiraṇyākṣaḥ kāśyapaḥ diti nandanaḥ sanaka ādeḥ ca vāgdaṇḍāt dvitīya dvārapālakaḥ

original: babhūva daityayonau ca devānāṃ kaṇṭako balī / saṃjīvo vijayaḥ prokto haribhakto mahāprabhuḥ //
analyzed: babhūva daitya yonau ca devānām kaṇṭakaḥ balī saṃjīvaḥ vijayaḥ proktaḥ hari bhaktaḥ mahā prabhuḥ

original: hariṇyākṣaḥ svayaṃ daityo haribhaktavidūṣakaḥ / etādṛśo hiraṇyākṣastapastaptuṃ samudyataḥ //
analyzed: hariṇyākṣaḥ svayam daityaḥ hari bhakta vidūṣakaḥ etādṛśaḥ hiraṇyākṣaḥ tapaḥ taptum samudyataḥ

original: tadā mātā ditirdevī hiraṇyākṣamuvāca sā / ditiruvāca / vatsalastvaṃ mahābhāgamā tapasvāṣṭahāyanaḥ //
analyzed: tadā mātā ditiḥ devī hiraṇyākṣam uvāca sā  ditiḥ uvāca vatsalaḥ tvam mahābhāgam ā tapasva aṣṭahāyanaḥ

original: tvaṃ mā dadasva duḥ khaṃ me pālayiṣyati kovidaḥ / kṣaṇamātraṃ na jīvāmi tvāṃ vinā jīvanaṃ na hi //
analyzed: tvam mā dadasva duḥ kham me pālayiṣyati kovidaḥ kṣaṇa mātram na jīvāmi tvām vinā jīvanam na hi

original: mā tapa tvaṃ mahābhāga mama jīvanahetave / evamuktastu mātrā sa vijayovaśatobravīt //
analyzed: mā tapa tvam mahābhāga mama jīvana hetave evam uktaḥ tu mātrā sa vijayaḥ uvaśataḥ bravīt

original: hiraṇyākṣo mātaraṃ prāha jālaṃ hitvā viṣṇorbhajane 'laṃ kuruṣva / mayisnehaṃ putrahetorvirūḍhaṃ sukhaduḥ khe ceha loke paratra //
analyzed: hiraṇyākṣaḥ mātaram prāha jālam hitvā viṣṇoḥ bhajane lam kuruṣva mayi sneham putra hetoḥ virūḍham sukha duḥ khe ca iha loke paratra

original: yāvatsnehaṃ mayi mātaḥ karoṣi tāvatkleśaṃ śāśvataṃ yāsyasi tvam / mātaśca te mayi putratvabuddhistvayyapyeṣā mātṛbuddhirmamāpi //
analyzed: yāvat sneham mayi mātar karoṣi tāvat kleśam śāśvatam yāsyasi tvam mātar ca te mayi putra tva buddhiḥ tvayi api eṣā mātṛ buddhiḥ mama api

original: tāte pūjye pitṛbuddhirmamāsti tasmiṃstute bhartṛbuddhirhi mithyā / nirmāti yasmāddharireva sarvaṃ samyak pātā niyato 'sau murāriḥ //
analyzed: tāte pūjye pitṛ buddhiḥ mama asti tasmin tute bhartṛ buddhiḥ hi mithyā nirmāti yasmāt hariḥ eva sarvam samyak pātā niyataḥ sau murāriḥ

original: ato hi mātā harireva sarvadā tvanyāsāṃ vai mātṛtā copacārāt / nirmātṛtvaṃ yadi mukhyaṃ tvayi syāddroṇādīnāṃ jananī kā vadasva //
analyzed: atas hi mātā hariḥ eva sarvadā tu anyāsām vai mātṛ tā ca upacārāt nirmātṛ tvam yadi mukhyam tvayi syāt droṇa ādīnām jananī kā vadasva

original: mātṛtvaṃ vai yadi mukhyaṃ tvayi syāddhātrādīnāṃ jananī kā vadasva / yataḥ sadā yāti jagattatto hariḥ sadā pitā viṣṇurajaḥ purāṇaḥ //
analyzed: mātṛ tvam vai yadi mukhyam tvayi syāt dhātṛ ādīnām jananī kā vadasva yatas sadā yāti jagat tattaḥ hariḥ sadā pitā viṣṇuḥ ajaḥ purāṇaḥ

original: sadā pitā mukhyapitā yadi syādgarbhasthabāle pālakaḥ ko vadasva / mātāpitroḥ pālakatvaṃ yadi syātkūrmādīnāṃ pālakau kau vadasva //
analyzed: sadā pitā mukhya pitā yadi syāt garbha stha bāle pālakaḥ kaḥ vadasva mātā pitroḥ pālaka tvam yadi syāt kūrma ādīnām pālakau kau vadasva

original: mātāpitroḥ pālakatvaṃ yadi syātkṛpādīnāṃ rakṣakau kau vadasva / punnāmakānnārakāddeha bhajāntasmāttrātāputraviṣṇuḥ purāṇaḥ //
analyzed: mātā pitroḥ pālaka tvam yadi syāt kṛpā ādīnām rakṣakau kau vadasva put nāmakāt nārakāt deha bhaja an tasmāt trātā putra viṣṇuḥ purāṇaḥ

original: na tārakohaṃ narakācca subhrūrna vai bhartā nāpi pitrādayaśca / na vai mātā nānujādiśca sarvaḥ sarvatrātā viṣṇurato na cānyaḥ //
analyzed: na tārakā uham narakāt ca subhrūḥ na vai bhartā na api pitṛ ādayaḥ ca  na vai mātā na anujā ādiḥ ca sarvaḥ sarva trātā viṣṇuḥ atas na ca anyaḥ

original: māyāṃ madīyāṃ jñānaśastreṇa cchitvā bhaktyā hareḥ smaraṇaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva / yadbhaktirūpūrvaṃ smaraṇaṃ nāma viṣṇostatsarvathā pāpaharaṃ ca mātaḥ //
analyzed: māyām madīyām jñāna śastreṇa chitvā bhaktyā hareḥ smaraṇam tvam kuruṣva yat bhakti rūpūrvam smaraṇam nāma viṣṇoḥ tat sarvathā pāpa haram ca mātar

original: yo vā bhaktyā smaraṇaṃ nāma viṣṇoḥ karotyasau pāpaharo bhaviṣyati / ayaṃ deho durllabhaḥ karmabhūmau tatrāpi madhye bhajanaṃ viṣṇumūrteḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ vā bhaktyā smaraṇam nāma viṣṇoḥ karoti asau pāpa haraḥ bhaviṣyati ayam dehaḥ durllabhaḥ karma bhūmau tatra api madhye bhajanam viṣṇu mūrteḥ

original: āyurgataṃ vyarthameva tvadīyaṃ śīghraṃ bhajeḥ śrīnivāsasya pādam / upadiśyaivaṃ mātaraṃ putravaryo daityāveśātsobhavadvai tapasvī //
analyzed: āyuḥ gatam vyartham eva tvadīyam śīghram bhajeḥ śrīnivāsasya pādam upadiśya evam mātaram putra varyaḥ daitya āveśāt saḥ bhavat vai tapasvī

original: caturmukhaṃ prīṇayitvaiva bhaktyā hyavadhyatvaṃ prāpa tasmānmahātmā / tato bhūmiṃ karavadveṣṭayitvā ninye tadā daityavaryo mahātmā //
analyzed: caturmukham prīṇayitvā eva bhaktyā hi avadhya tvam prāpa tasmāt mahātmā tatas bhūmim kara vat veṣṭayitvā ninye tadā daitya varyaḥ mahātmā

original: śrīmuṣṭadeśe prādurāsīddharistu vārāhaviṣṇustvajanaḥ purāṇaḥ / bhittvācābdhiṃ viviśe taṃ mahātmā rasātale saṃsthitaṃ bhūtalaṃ ca //
analyzed: śrī muṣṭadeśe prādurāsīt hariḥ tu vārāha viṣṇuḥ tu ajanaḥ purāṇaḥ bhittvā aca abdhim viviśe tam mahātmā rasātale saṃsthitam bhū talam ca

original: svadaṃṣṭrāgre sthāpayitvā'jagāma tadāgamādāgato daityavaryaḥ / taṃ karṇamūle tāḍayitvā jaghāna prasādayāmāsa ca pūrvavadbhuvam //
analyzed: sva daṃṣṭra agre sthāpayitvā ājagāma tad āgamāt āgataḥ daitya varyaḥ tam karṇa mūle tāḍayitvā jaghāna prasādayāmāsa ca pūrvavat bhuvam

original: sudiggajānsthāpayitvā ca viṣṇuḥ śrīmuṣṭe vai saṃsthitaḥ śrīvarāhaḥ / tadā hariścintayāmāsa viṣṇurbhaktyā madīyaṃ mānuṣaṃ dehamadya //
analyzed: sudiś gajān sthāpayitvā ca viṣṇuḥ śrī muṣṭe vai saṃsthitaḥ śrīvarāhaḥ tadā hariḥ cintayāmāsa viṣṇuḥ bhaktyā madīyam mānuṣam deham adya

original: ārādhayiṣyanti ca māṃ kva ete teṣāṃ dayāṃ kutra vāhaṃ kariṣye / evaṃ hariścintayitvā sukanye vaikuṇṭhalokādacalaṃ śeṣa saṃjñam / vīndraskandhe sthāpayitvā svayaṃ ca samāgatobhūdbhūtalaṃ bhūtaleśaḥ //
analyzed: ārādhayiṣyanti ca mām kva ete teṣām dayām kutra vā aham kariṣye evam hariḥ cintayitvā sukanye vaikuṇṭha lokāt acalam śeṣa saṃjñam  vīndra skandhe sthāpayitvā svayam ca samāgataḥ bhūt bhū talam bhū tala īśaḥ

original: suvarṇamukharītīramārabhya garuḍadhvajaḥ / śrīkṛṣṇaveṇīparyantaṃ sthāpayā māsa taṃ girim //
analyzed: suvarṇamukharī tīram ārabhya garuḍadhvajaḥ śrī kṛṣṇa veṇī paryantam sthāpaya āsa tam girim

original: gireḥ pucche tu śrīśailaṃ madhyame 'hobalaṃ smṛtam / mukhaṃ ca śrīnivāsasya kṣetraṃ ca samudāhṛtam //
analyzed: gireḥ pucche tu śrīśailam madhyame hobalam smṛtam mukham ca śrīnivāsasya kṣetram ca samudāhṛtam

original: alpena tapasābhīṣṭaṃ sidhyatyasminnahobale / gaṅgādisarvatīrthāni puṇyāni hyatra saṃti vai //
analyzed: alpena tapasā abhīṣṭam sidhyati asmin ahar bale gaṅgā ādi sarva tīrthāni puṇyāni hi atra saṃti vai

original: ya enaṃ sevate nityaṃ śraddhābhaktisamanvitaḥ / jñānārthī jñānamāpnoti dravyārthī dravyamāpruyāt //
analyzed: yaḥ enam sevate nityam śraddhā bhakti samanvitaḥ jñāna arthī jñānam āpnoti dravya arthī dravyam āpruyāt

original: putrārthī putramāpnoti nṛpo rājyaṃ ca vindati / yaṃyaṃ kāmayate martyastantamāpnoti sarvathā //
analyzed: putra arthī putram āpnoti nṛpaḥ rājyam ca vindati yam yam kāmayate martyaḥ tan tam āpnoti sarvathā

original: cintitaṃ sādhyate yasmāttasmāccintāmaṇiṃ viduḥ / puṣkariṇyāśca bāhulyādgirāvasminsaraḥ su ca / puṣkarādririti prāhurevaṃ tattvārthavedinaḥ //
analyzed: cintitam sādhyate yasmāt tasmāt cintāmaṇim viduḥ puṣkariṇyāḥ ca bāhulyāt girau asmin saraḥ su ca puṣkarādriḥ iti prāhuḥ evam tattva artha vedinaḥ

original: śātakuṃbhasvarūpatvātkanakādriṃ ca taṃ viduḥ / vaikuṇṭhādāgatenaiva vaikuṇṭhādririti smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: śātakuṃbha svarūpa tvāt kanakādrim ca tam viduḥ vaikuṇṭhāt āgatena eva vaikuṇṭhādriḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: amṛtaiśvaryasaṃyukto vyaṅkaṭādririti smṛtaḥ / vyaṅkaṭeśasya śailasya māhātmyaṃ yāvadasti hi //
analyzed: amṛta aiśvarya saṃyuktaḥ vyaṅkaṭādriḥ iti smṛtaḥ vyaṅkaṭeśasya śailasya māhātmyam yāvat asti hi

original: tāvadvaktuṃ samagreṇa na samarthaścaturmukhaḥ / vyaṅkaṭādrau parāṃ bhaktiṃ ye kurvanti dinedine / paṅgarjaṅghāla eva syādacakṣuḥ padmalocanaḥ //
analyzed: tāvat vaktum samagreṇa na samarthaḥ caturmukhaḥ vyaṅkaṭa adrau parām bhaktim ye kurvanti dine dine  eva syāt acakṣuḥ padma locanaḥ

original: mūko vāgmī bhavedeva badhiraḥ śrāvako bhavet / vandhyā syādbahuputrā ca nirdhanaḥ sadhano bhavet //
analyzed: mūkaḥ vāgmī bhavet eva badhiraḥ śrāvakaḥ bhavet  vandhyā syāt bahu putrā ca nirdhanaḥ sa dhanaḥ bhavet

original: etatsarvaṃ girau bhaktimātreṇaiva bhaveddhruvam / tattvato vyaṅkaṭādrestu svarūpaṃ vetti ko bhuvi //
analyzed: etat sarvam girau bhakti mātreṇa eva bhavet dhruvam tattvataḥ vyaṅkaṭa adreḥ tu svarūpam vetti kaḥ bhuvi

original: yasmādasya gireḥ puṇyaṃ māhātmyaṃ vetti yaḥ pumān / māyāvī paramānandaṃ tyaktvā vaikuṇṭhamuttamam / svāmipuṣkariṇītīre ramayā sahamodate //
analyzed: yasmāt asya gireḥ puṇyam māhātmyam vetti yaḥ pumān māyāvī parama ānandam tyaktvā vaikuṇṭham uttamam svāmipuṣkariṇī tīre ramayā saha modate

original: kalyāṇādbhutagātrāya kāmitārthapdāyine / śrīmadvyaṅkaṭanāthāya śrīnivāsāya te namaḥ //
analyzed: kalyāṇa adbhuta gātrāya śrīmat vyaṅkaṭa nāthāya śrīnivāsāya te namaḥ

original: śrīsvāmipuṣkariṇyāśca māhātmyaṃ śṛṇu kanyake / svāmipuṣkariṇīmadhye śrīnivāsosti sarvadā //
analyzed: śrī svāmipuṣkariṇyāḥ ca māhātmyam śṛṇu kanyake svāmipuṣkariṇī madhye śrīnivāsaḥ asti sarvadā

original: snānaṃ kurvanti ye tatra teṣāṃ muktiḥ kare sthitā / tisraḥ koṭyordhakoṭiśca tīrthāni bhuvanatraye / tāni sarvāṇi tatraiva saṃti tīrthe hareḥ sadā //
analyzed: snānam kurvanti ye tatra teṣām muktiḥ kare sthitā tisraḥ tīrthāni bhuvanatraye tāni sarvāṇi tatra eva saṃti tīrthe hareḥ sadā

original: tattīrthaṃ śrīnivāsākhyaṃ sarvadevanamaskṛtam / tadeva śrīnivāsasya mandiraṃ parikīrtitam //
analyzed: tat tīrtham śrīnivāsa ākhyam sarva deva namaskṛtam tat eva śrīnivāsasya mandiram parikīrtitam

original: taddarśanādeva kanye yānti pāpāni bhasmasāt / ekaikasnānamātreṇa satsaṃgo bhavati dhruvam //
analyzed: tad darśanāt eva kanye yānti pāpāni bhasmasāt ekaika snāna mātreṇa sat saṃgaḥ bhavati dhruvam

original: satsaṃgājjñānamāsādya jñānānmokṣaṃ ca vindati / adhikāriṇāṃ bhavedevaṃ viparītamayoginām //
analyzed: sat saṃgāt jñānam āsādya jñānāt mokṣam ca vindati adhikāriṇām bhavet evam viparītam ayoginām

original: tīrthānāṃ snānamātreṇa mokṣaṃ yāntīti ye viduḥ / te sarve asurā jñeyāste yānti hyadhamāṃ gatim //
analyzed: tīrthānām snāna mātreṇa mokṣam yānti iti ye viduḥ te sarve asurāḥ jñeyāḥ te yānti hi adhamām gatim

original: śrīnivāsasya tīrthesminvāyukoṇe ca kanyake / āste vāyuḥ sadā viṣṇoḥ pūjāṃ kartumanuttamām //
analyzed: śrīnivāsasya tīrthe asmin vāyu koṇe ca kanyake  āste vāyuḥ sadā viṣṇoḥ pūjām kartum anuttamām

original: vāyutīrthaṃ ca tatproktaṃ hastadvādaśakāntaram / hastaṣaṭkapramāṇaṃ ca paścime samudāhṛtam / uttare hastaṣaṭkaṃ tu vāyutīrthamudāhṛtam //
analyzed: vāyutīrtham ca tat proktam hasta dvādaśaka antaram hasta ṣaṭka pramāṇam ca paścime samudāhṛtam uttare hasta ṣaṭkam tu vāyutīrtham udāhṛtam

original: ye veṣṇavā vaiṣṇavadāsavaryāḥ snānaṃ suryustatra pūrvaṃ sukanye / madhvāntasthāḥ śrīnivāsastu nityamatra snānātprīyatāṃ me dayāluḥ //
analyzed: ye vā iṣṇavāḥ vaiṣṇava dāsa varyāḥ snānam suryuḥ tatra pūrvam sukanye madhvānta sthāḥ śrīnivāsaḥ tu nityam atra snānāt prīyatām me dayāluḥ

original: ye madhvatīrthe snātumicchanti devi rudrādayo vāyubhaktā mahāntaḥ / sadā snānaṃ tatra kurvanti devi prātaḥ kāle codayātpūrvameva //
analyzed: ye madhvatīrthe snātum icchanti devi rudra ādayaḥ vāyu bhaktāḥ mahāntaḥ sadā snānam tatra kurvanti devi prātar kāle codayāt pūrvam eva

original: ye vāyutīrthe visṛjanti dehajaṃ malaṃ mūtraṃ vamanaṃ śleṣmakaṃ ca / ye 'pānaśuddhiṃ liṅgaśuddhiṃ ca kanye kurvanti te hyasurā rākṣasāśca //
analyzed: ye vāyutīrthe visṛjanti deha jam malam mūtram vamanam śleṣmakam ca  ye pāna śuddhim liṅga śuddhim ca kanye kurvanti te hi asurāḥ rākṣasāḥ ca

original: śṛṇvanti ye bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ kiṃ varṇaye tasya puṇyaṃ tu devi / ye kṛṣṇamantraṃ tu japanti devi hyaṣṭā kṣaraṃ mantravaraṃ sugopyam //
analyzed: śṛṇvanti ye bhāgavatam purāṇam kim varṇaye tasya puṇyam tu devi ye kṛṣṇa mantram tu japanti devi hi aṣṭa kṣaram mantra varam su gopyam

original: teṣāṃ hariḥ prīyate keśavolaṃ madhvāntastho nātra vicāryamasti / evaṃ dānaṃ tatra kurvanti ye vai dvijāgryāṇāṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ vidāṃ ca //
analyzed: teṣām hariḥ prīyate madhu anta sthaḥ na atra vicāryam asti evam dānam tatra kurvanti ye vai dvijāgryāṇām vaiṣṇavānām vidām ca

original: teṣāṃ puṇyaṃ naiva jānanti devā jānātyevaṃ śrīnivāso haristu / śālagrāmaṃ vāyutīrthe dadante teṣāṃ puṇyaṃ vetti sa vyaṅkaṭeśaḥ //
analyzed: teṣām puṇyam nā eva jānanti devāḥ jānāti evam śrīnivāsaḥ hariḥ tu śālagrāmam vāyutīrthe dadante teṣām puṇyam vetti sa vyaṅkaṭa īśaḥ

original: sudurlabho vāyutīrthe 'bhiṣeko niṣkāmabuddhyā vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca devi / tatrāpi tīrthe labhyate bhāgyayogādbhāgavatasya śravaṇaṃ viṣṇudāsaiḥ //
analyzed: su durlabhaḥ vāyutīrthe bhiṣekaḥ niṣkāma buddhyā vaiṣṇavānām ca devi tatra api tīrthe labhyate bhāgya yogāt bhāgavatasya śravaṇam viṣṇu dāsaiḥ

original: tathaiva tīrthe durlabhaṃ tatra devi śālagrāmasya dvijavarye ca dānam / jaṃbūphalākārasunīlavarṇaṃ mukhadvayaṃ cakracatuṣṭayānvitam //
analyzed: tathā eva tīrthe durlabham tatra devi śālagrāmasya dvija varye ca dānam jaṃbū phala ākāra su nīla varṇam mukha dvayam cakra catuṣṭaya anvitam

original: sukesaraiḥ saṃyutaṃ svarṇacihnadhvajāṃ kuśairvajracihnairyavaiśca / jānārdanīṃ mūrtimāhurmahānto dānaṃ tasyā durlabhaṃ tatra tīrthe //
analyzed: su kesaraiḥ saṃyutam svarṇa cihna dhvajām kuśaiḥ vajra cihnaiḥ yavaiḥ ca jānārdanīm mūrtim āhuḥ mahāntaḥ dānam tasyāḥ durlabham tatra tīrthe

original: atyuttamaṃ mūrtidānaṃ tu bhadre sudurllabhaṃ paramaṃ nātra lobhaḥ / sudurlabhaṃ bahudogdhyāśca gṛṣṭerdānaṃ tathā vastraratnādikānām //
analyzed: atyuttamam mūrti dānam tu bhadre su durllabham paramam na atra lobhaḥ su durlabham bahu dogdhyāḥ ca gṛṣṭeḥ dānam tathā vastra ratna ādikānām

original: atyuttamaṃ dravyadānaṃ ca devi svāpekṣitaṃ dānamāhurmahāntaḥ / svasyānapekṣaṃ phaladānaṃ ca vastrādānaṃ tasya vyarthamāhurmahāntaḥ //
analyzed: atyuttamam dravya dānam ca devi sva apekṣitam dānam āhuḥ mahāntaḥ svasya anapekṣam phala dānam ca vastra ādānam tasya vyartham āhuḥ mahāntaḥ

original: atyuttamaṃ gṛṣṭidānaṃ ca puṇyaṃ naivāpyate dugdhadohāśca gāvaḥ / atyuttame vastradāne subuddhiḥ sudurghaṭā paramā vai janānām //
analyzed: atyuttamam gṛṣṭi dānam ca puṇyam na eva āpyate dugdha dohāḥ ca gāvaḥ atyuttame vastra dāne su buddhiḥ su durghaṭā paramā vai janānām

original: atyuttamaṃ bhāgavatasya pustakaṃ sudurghaṭaṃ vāyutīrthaṃ ca kanye / atyuttamaṃ dravyadānaṃ ca devi sudurghaṭaṃ vāyutīrthaṃ nṛṇāṃ hi / sudurlabho vaiṣṇavaistattvavidbhirharervicāro vāyutīrthe ca kanye //
analyzed: atyuttamam bhāgavatasya pustakam su durghaṭam vāyutīrtham ca kanye atyuttamam dravya dānam ca devi su durghaṭam vāyutīrtham nṛṇām hi su durlabhaḥ vaiṣṇavaiḥ tattva vidbhiḥ hareḥ vicāraḥ vāyutīrthe ca kanye

original: śrīnivāsasya tīrthasya uttarasyāṃ diśi sthitam / candratīrtha miti proktaṃ tatrāste candramāḥ sadā //
analyzed: śrīnivāsasya tīrthasya uttarasyām diśi sthitam candratīrtham iti proktam tatra āste candramāḥ sadā

original: śrīnivāsasya pūjāṃ ca tatra sthitvā karotyayam / tatra snānaṃ prakurvanti puṇyadeśe ca kanyake //
analyzed: śrīnivāsasya pūjām ca tatra sthitvā karoti ayam  tatra snānam prakurvanti puṇya deśe ca kanyake

original: gurutalpādipāpebhyo mucyante nātra saṃśayaḥ / tatra snātvā pūrvabhāge śālagrāmaṃ dadāti yaḥ //
analyzed: gurutalpa ādi pāpebhyaḥ mucyante na atra saṃśayaḥ tatra snātvā pūrva bhāge śālagrāmam dadāti yaḥ

original: jñānadvārā mokṣameti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / dadhivāmanamūrteśca dānaṃ tatra sudurlabham //
analyzed: jñāna dvārā mokṣam eti na atra kāryā vicāraṇā dadhi vāmana mūrteḥ ca dānam tatra su durlabham

original: badarīphalamātraṃ tu vatulaṃ nīlavarṇakam / prasannavadanaṃ sūkṣmaṃ susnigdhaṃ kanyake śubhe //
analyzed: badarī phala mātram tu nīla varṇakam prasanna vadanam sūkṣmam su snigdham kanyake śubhe

original: cakradvayasamāyuktaṃ gaupūraiḥ pañcabhiryutam / cāpabāṇasamāyuktamanataṃ kuṇḍalākṛtim //
analyzed: cakra dvaya samāyuktam gaupūraiḥ pañcabhiḥ yutam cāpa bāṇa samāyuktam anatam kuṇḍala ākṛtim

original: vanamāla sukhayutaṃ mūrdhnasāhasrasaṃyutam / raupyabindusamāyuktaṃ savye bhadrārdhamātrakam //
analyzed: vanamāla sukha yutam mūrdhna sāhasra saṃyutam raupya bindu samāyuktam savye bhadra ardha mātrakam

original: candreṇa sahitaṃ devi dadhivāmanamucyate / etādṛśaṃ kalau nṝṇāṃ durlabhaṃ bahubhāgyadam / lakṣmīnārāyaṇasamāṃ tāṃ mūrtiṃ viddhi bhāmini //
analyzed: candreṇa sahitam devi dadhivāmanam ucyate etādṛśam kalau nṝṇām durlabham bahu bhāgya dam  lakṣmī nārāyaṇa samām tām mūrtim viddhi bhāmini

original: sudurlabhaṃ tasya mūrteśca dānaṃ taccandratīrthe śravaṇaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca / samyak svarūpaṃ dadhivāmanasya sudurghaṭaṃ śravaṇaṃ vaiṣṇavācca //
analyzed: su durlabham tasya mūrteḥ ca dānam tat candratīrthe śravaṇam durghaṭam ca samyak svarūpam dadhivāmanasya su durghaṭam śravaṇam vaiṣṇavāt ca

original: tatra snātvā vāmanasya svarūpaśravaṇādvidurdānaphalaṃ samaṃ ca / daśahastapramāṇaṃ tu candratīrthamudāhṛtam //
analyzed: tatra snātvā vāmanasya sva rūpa śravaṇāt viduḥ dāna phalam samam ca daśa hasta pramāṇam tu candratīrtham udāhṛtam

original: madhyāhne durlabhaṃ snānaṃ nṛṇāṃ tatra sumaṅgale / tatra sthitvā dhanyanaraḥ sadā bhajati vai harim //
analyzed: madhyāhne durlabham snānam nṛṇām tatra sumaṅgale tatra sthitvā dhanya naraḥ sadā bhajati vai harim

original: varāhamūrtidānaṃ tu śālagrāmasya durlabham / jaṃbūphalapramāṇaṃ tu etadvai kukkuṭāṇḍavat //
analyzed: varāha mūrti dānam tu śālagrāmasya durlabham jaṃbū phala pramāṇam tu etat vai kukkuṭa aṇḍa vat

original: vadanaṃ valayākāraṃ pramāṇaṃ caṇakādivat / devasya vāmabhāge ca madhyadeśaṃ vihāya ca //
analyzed: vadanam valaya ākāram pramāṇam caṇaka ādi vat  devasya vāma bhāge ca madhyadeśam vihāya ca

original: cakradvayasamāyuktaṃmūrdhadeśe ca bhāmini / suvarṇabindunā yuktaṃ bhūvarāhākhyamucyate //
analyzed: cakra dvaya samāyuktam mūrdha deśe ca bhāmini suvarṇa bindunā yuktam bhūvarāha ākhyam ucyate

original: pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhūvarāhasya marterdānaṃ dattvā śravaṇaṃ cāpi kṛtvā / tatra sthitaṃ bhūvarāhaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sa vai naraḥ kṛtakṛtyo hi loke //
analyzed: pūjām kṛtvā bhūvarāhasya marteḥ dānam dattvā śravaṇam ca api kṛtvā tatra sthitam bhūvarāham ca dṛṣṭvā sa vai naraḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ hi loke

original: tatra snātvā bhūvarāhasya marteḥ śṛṇoti yo lakṣaṇaṃ samyageva / sa tena puṇyaṃ samupaiti devi sa muktibhāṅ nātra vicāryamasti //
analyzed: tatra snātvā bhūvarāhasya marteḥ śṛṇoti yaḥ lakṣaṇam samyak eva sa tena puṇyam samupaiti devi sa mukti bhāj na atra vicāryam asti

original: īśānakoṇe śrīnivāsasya devi raudraṃ tīrthaṃ paramaṃ pāvanaṃ ca / tatra sthitvā rudradevo mahātmā pūjāṃ karoti śrīnivāsasya nityam //
analyzed: īśāna koṇe śrīnivāsasya devi raudram tīrtham paramam pāvanam ca tatra sthitvā rudra devaḥ mahātmā pūjām karoti śrīnivāsasya nityam

original: hastāṣṭakaṃ tatpramāṇaṃ vadanti tatra snānaṃ vaiṣṇavaiḥ kāryameva / tatra snātvā prayato vai murāreḥ kathāṃ divyāṃ śṛṇuyādādareṇa / snānaṃ pānaṃ tatra dānaṃ ca kuryāllakṣmīnṛsiṃhaprīyate devi nityam3,26.76 //
analyzed: hasta aṣṭakam tad pramāṇam vadanti tatra snānam vaiṣṇavaiḥ kāryam eva tatra snātvā prayataḥ vai murāreḥ kathām divyām śṛṇuyāt ādareṇa snānam pānam tatra dānam ca kuryāt lakṣmī nṛsiṃha prīyate devi  /

original: badarīphalamātraṃ ca vartulaṃ bindusaṃyutam //
analyzed: badarī phala mātram ca vartulam bindu saṃyutam

original: devasya vāmabhāge tu cakradvayasamanvitam / suvarṇarekhāsaṃyuktaṃ kiñcidraktasamanvitam //
analyzed: devasya vāma bhāge tu cakra dvaya samanvitam suvarṇa rekhā saṃyuktam kiñcid rakta samanvitam

original: vaiśyavarṇaṃ savadanaṃ padmarekhādicihnitam / lakṣmīnṛsiṃhaṃ taṃ viddhi bhuktimuktipradāyakam //
analyzed: vaiśya varṇam sa vadanam padma rekhā ādi cihnitam lakṣmī nṛsiṃham tam viddhi bhukti mukti pradāyakam

original: etā dṛśaṃ gaṇḍikāyāḥ śilāyā mūrterdānaṃ durghaṭaṃ viddhi vīndra / tatra snātvā śrīnṛsiṃhasvarūpaṃ lakṣmīpateḥ śṛṇuyādbhaktiyuktaḥ //
analyzed: etāḥ dṛśam gaṇḍikāyāḥ śilāyāḥ mūrteḥ dānam durghaṭam viddhi vi indra tatra snātvā śrī nṛsiṃha sva rūpam lakṣmīpateḥ śṛṇuyāt bhakti yuktaḥ

original: mūrterdānātphalamāpnoti devi satyaṃsatyaṃ nātra vicāryamasti //
analyzed: mūrteḥ dānāt phalam āpnoti devi satyam satyam na atra vicāryam asti

original: īśānaśakrayormadhye brahmatīrthamudāhṛtam / durlabhaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ tu snānaṃ sarvārthasādhakam //
analyzed: īśāna śakrayoḥ madhye brahmatīrtham udāhṛtam  durlabham mānuṣāṇām tu snānam sarva artha sādhakam

original: śālagrāmasya dānaṃ tu durlabhaṃ tatra vai nṛṇām / lakṣmīnārāyaṇasyaiva mūrterdānaṃ sudurlabham //
analyzed: śālagrāmasya dānam tu durlabham tatra vai nṛṇām lakṣmī nārāyaṇasya eva mūrteḥ dānam su durlabham

original: sthalamauduṃbarasamaṃ tatpramāṇamudāhṛtam / chattrākāraṃ vartulaṃ ca prasannavadanaṃ śubham //
analyzed: sthalam auduṃbara samam tat pramāṇam udāhṛtam chattra ākāram vartulam ca prasanna vadanam śubham

original: caṇakapradeśamātraṃ ca vadanaṃ samudāhṛtam / savye dakṣiṇapārśve ca samayoḥ puṣkalānvitam //
analyzed: caṇaka pradeśa mātram ca vadanam samudāhṛtam savye dakṣiṇa pārśve ca samayoḥ puṣkala anvitam

original: goyūthavatsavarṇaṃ ca catuścakrasamanvitam / gokhuraiśca samāyuktaṃ suvarṇakiṇasaṃyutam //
analyzed: go yūtha vat savarṇam ca catur cakra samanvitam go khuraiḥ ca samāyuktam suvarṇa kiṇa saṃyutam

original: vanamālābhisaṃyuktaṃ vajrapuṅkhaiśca saṃyutam / etādṛśīṃ darermūrti lakṣmīnārāyaṇaṃ viduḥ //
analyzed: vanamālā abhisaṃyuktam vajra puṅkhaiḥ ca saṃyutam etādṛśīm dareḥ mūrti lakṣmī nārāyaṇam viduḥ

original: kalau nṛṇāṃ tasya lābho durlabhaḥ saṃsmṛto bhuvi / dānaṃ ca sutarāṃ devi darlabhaṃ kiṃ vadāmi te //
analyzed: kalau nṛṇām tasya lābhaḥ durlabhaḥ saṃsmṛtaḥ bhuvi dānam ca sutarām devi darlabham kim vadāmi te

original: brahmatīrthe ca saṃsnāya śrotavyā vai hareḥ kathā / gaṇḍikāyāḥ śilāyāśca lakṣmīnārāyaṇasya tu //
analyzed: brahmatīrthe ca saṃsnāya śrotavyā vai hareḥ kathā gaṇḍikāyāḥ śilāyāḥ ca lakṣmīnārāyaṇasya tu

original: lakṣaṇaṃ yo vijānāti tadā tatsadṛśaṃ phalam / prāpnotyeva na saṃdeho nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: lakṣaṇam yaḥ vijānāti tadā tad sadṛśam phalam prāpnoti eva na saṃdehaḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: śrīnivāsasya tīrthasya pūrve syādindratīrthakam / śrīnivāsasya pūjāṃ tu kartumāste śacīpatiḥ //
analyzed: śrīnivāsasya tīrthasya pūrve syāt indratīrthakam  śrīnivāsasya pūjām tu kartum āste śacīpatiḥ

original: śālagrāmaśilādānaṃ kartavyaṃ śrotriyāyavai / śālagrāmaśilādānaṃ hatyākoṭivināśanam //
analyzed: śālagrāma śilā dānam kartavyam śrotriyāya vai śālagrāma śilā dānam hatyā koṭi vināśanam

original: tasmiṃstīrthe tu yo devi sītārāmaśilābhidhām / dadāti bhūtale bhadre bhūpateḥ sadṛśo bhavet //
analyzed: tasmin tīrthe tu yaḥ devi sītārāmaśilā abhidhām dadāti bhū tale bhadre bhūpateḥ sadṛśaḥ bhavet

original: sītārāmaśilā devi dvividhā saṃprakīrtitā / pañcacakrayutā kācitṣaṭracakreṇa ca saṃyutā //
analyzed: sītārāmaśilā devi dvividhā saṃprakīrtitā pañca cakra yutā kācid ṣaṭra cakreṇa ca saṃyutā

original: tatrāpi ṣaṭracakrayutā hyuttamā saṃprakīrtitā / pañcacakrayutāyāśca phalaṃ dviguṇamīritam //
analyzed: tatra api ṣaṣ ra cakra yutā hi uttamā saṃprakīrtitā pañca cakra yutāyāḥ ca phalam dviguṇam īritam

original: kukkuṭāṇḍapramāṇaṃ ca susigdhaṃ nīlavarṇakam / vadanatrayasaṃyuktaṃ saṭcakraiḥ kesarairyutam //
analyzed: kukkuṭa aṇḍa pramāṇam ca su sigdham nīla varṇakam vadana traya saṃyuktam saṭ cakraiḥ kesaraiḥ yutam

original: svarṇarekhāsamāyuktaṃ dhvajavajrāṅkuśairyutam / etādṛśaṃ tu vai bhadre sītārāmābhidhaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: svarṇa rekhā samāyuktam dhvaja vajra aṅkuśaiḥ yutam etādṛśam tu vai bhadre sītārāma abhidham smṛtam

original: vadanevandane devi sītārāmasya kośakam / durlabhaṃ tu kalau nṝṇāṃ svasāmrājyapradaṃ śubham //
analyzed: vadanevandane devi sītārāmasya kośakam durlabham tu kalau nṝṇām sva sāmrājya pradam śubham

original: indratīrthe mahādevi sītārāma bhidhāśilā / yā taddānaṃ durlabhaṃ tannālpasya tapasaḥ phalam //
analyzed: indratīrthe mahādevi sītārāma bhidhā śilā  yā tat dānam durlabham tat na alpasya tapasaḥ phalam

original: dānasya śaktyabhāve tu śrotavyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ hareḥ / śālagrāma śilādānādyatphalaṃ tatphalaṃ labhet //
analyzed: dānasya śakti abhāve tu śrotavyam lakṣaṇam hareḥ śālagrāma śilā dānāt yat phalam tat phalam labhet

original: āgneyakoṇe śrīnivāsasya devi tīrthaṃ tvāste vahnisaṃjñaṃ suśastam / sa vahnidevaḥ śrīnivāsasya pūjāṃ kartuṃ hyāste sarvadā tīrthamadhye //
analyzed: āgneya koṇe śrīnivāsasya devi tīrtham tu āste vahni saṃjñam su śastam sa vahni devaḥ śrīnivāsasya pūjām kartum hi āste sarvadā tīrtha madhye

original: yo vā tīrthe vahnisaṃjñe ca devi bhaktyā snānaṃ kurute 'jaṃ smaranhi / jñānadvārā mokṣamāpnoti devi tatra snānaṃ durllabhaṃ vai nṛṇāṃ ca //
analyzed: yaḥ vā tīrthe vahni saṃjñe ca devi bhaktyā snānam kurute smaran hi jñāna dvārā mokṣam āpnoti devi tatra snānam durllabham vai nṛṇām ca

original: jñātvā snānaṃ duṣkaraṃ tīrtharāje bhaktistasmindurllabhā caiva devi / śālagrāme tacchilāyāśca dānaṃ sudurlabhaṃ vāsudevābhidhāyāḥ //
analyzed: jñātvā snānam duṣkaram tīrtha rāje bhaktiḥ tasmin durllabhā ca eva devi śālagrāme tad śilāyāḥ ca dānam su durlabham vāsudeva abhidhāyāḥ

original: hrasvaṃ tathā vartulaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ mukhaṃ mukhacakraṃ suśuddham / suveṇuyuktaṃ vāsudevābhidheyaṃ dānaṃ kalau durlabhaṃ tasya bhadre //
analyzed: hrasvam tathā vartulam nīla varṇam sūkṣmam mukham mukha cakram su śuddham su veṇu yuktam vāsudeva abhidheyam dānam kalau durlabham tasya bhadre

original: dāne tasyāḥ śaktya bhāve ca devi snātvā tīrthe vāsudevābhidhasya / samyak śrāvyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vai śilāyāstayostulyaṃ phalamāhurmahāntaḥ //
analyzed: dāne tasyāḥ śakti a bhāve ca devi snātvā tīrthe vāsudeva abhidhasya samyak śrāvyam lakṣaṇam vai śilāyāḥ tayoḥ tulyam phalam āhuḥ mahāntaḥ

original: dakṣiṇe śrīnivāsasya yamatīrthaṃ ca saṃsmṛtam / tatrāste yamarājastu pūjāṃ kartuṃ hareḥ sadā //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe śrīnivāsasya yamatīrtham ca saṃsmṛtam tatra āste yamarājaḥ tu pūjām kartum hareḥ sadā

original: tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ cāpyakṣayaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam / śālagrāmaśilādānaṃ kāryaṃ tatra mahāmune //
analyzed: tatra snānam ca dānam ca api akṣayam paramam smṛtam śālagrāma śilā dānam kāryam tatra mahā mune

original: paṭṭābhirāmasaṃjñāyāḥ śilāyā dānamiṣyate / taccūtaphalavatsthūlaṃ vadanatrayasaṃyutam //
analyzed: paṭṭābhirāma saṃjñāyāḥ śilāyāḥ dānam iṣyate tat cūta phalavat sthūlam vadanatraya saṃyutam

original: śiraścakreṇa rahitaṃ saptacakraiḥ samanvitam / nīlavarṇaṃ svarṇarekhaṃ gośurādyaiḥ samanvitam //
analyzed: śiraḥ cakreṇa rahitam sapta cakraiḥ samanvitam nīla varṇam svarṇa rekham gośura ādyaiḥ samanvitam

original: paṭṭavardhanarāmaṃ tu durlabhaṃ bahubhāgyadam / paṭṭavardhanarāmaṃ tu yo dadāti ca tatra vai / paṭṭābhiṣikto bhavati nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: paṭṭavardhana rāmam tu durlabham bahu bhāgya dam paṭṭavardhana rāmam tu yaḥ dadāti ca tatra vai paṭṭa abhiṣiktaḥ bhavati na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: śrīnivāsasya nairṛtye nairṛtaṃ tīrthamuttamam / āste hi nirṛtistatra pūjāṃ kurtuṃ ca sarvadā //
analyzed: śrīnivāsasya nairṛtye nairṛtam tīrtham uttamam āste hi nirṛtiḥ tatra pūjām kurtum ca sarvadā

original: tatra snānaṃ prakartavyaṃ punarjanma na vidyate / śālagrāmaśilāyāścaḥ puruṣottamasaṃjñikām //
analyzed: tatra snānam prakartavyam punarjanma na vidyate śālagrāma śilāyāḥ ca puruṣottama saṃjñikām

original: mūrtiṃ dadāti yo martyaḥ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim / auduṃbaraphalākāraṃ prasannavadanaṃ śubham //
analyzed: mūrtim dadāti yaḥ martyaḥ sa yāti paramām gatim  auduṃbara phala ākāram prasanna vadanam śubham

original: cakradvyasamāyuktaṃ śiraścakrasamanvitam / suvarṇabindusaṃyuktaṃ vajrāṅkuśasamānvatam //
analyzed: cakra dvya samāyuktam śiraḥ cakra samanvitam suvarṇa bindu saṃyuktam

original: tanmūrtidānaṃ durlabhaṃ tatra devaḥ prīṇāti yasmācchrīnivāso mahātmā / yadā dānaṃ durghaṭaṃ syācca devi tadā śrotavyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tasya mūrteḥ //
analyzed: tad mūrti dānam durlabham tatra devaḥ prīṇāti yasmāt śrīnivāsaḥ mahātmā yadā dānam durghaṭam syāt ca devi tadā śrotavyam lakṣaṇam tasya mūrteḥ

original: pāśinairṛtayormadhye śeṣatīrthaṃ paraṃ smṛtam / tatra snātvā śeṣamūrtiṃ pradadāti dvijātaye //
analyzed: pāśi nairṛtayoḥ madhye śeṣa tīrtham param smṛtam tatra snātvā śeṣa mūrtim pradadāti dvijātaye

original: sa yāti paramaṃ lokaṃ punarāvṛttivarjitam / auduṃbaraphalākāraṃ kuṇḍalākṛtimeva ca //
analyzed: sa yāti paramam lokam punarāvṛtti varjitam auduṃbara phala ākāram kuṇḍala ākṛtim eva ca

original: śeṣavadvadanaṃ tasya tasmiṃścakradvayaṃ smṛtam / phalaṃ tamekacakreṇa saṃyutaṃ valmikānvitam //
analyzed: śeṣavat vadanam tasya tasmin cakra dvayam smṛtam phalam tam eka cakreṇa saṃyutam valmikā anvitam

original: kiñcidvarṇasamāyuktaṃ śeṣamūrti matisphuṭam / suptā prabuddhā dvividhā śeṣamūrtirudāhṛtā //
analyzed: kiñcid varṇa samāyuktam śeṣa mūrti mati sphuṭam suptā prabuddhā dvividhā śeṣa mūrtiḥ udāhṛtā

original: phaṇonnatā prabuddhā syātsaptalakṣaphaṇānvitā / tatrāpi durlabhā suptā mahābhāgyakarīsmṛtā //
analyzed: phaṇa unnatā prabuddhā syāt sapta lakṣa phaṇa anvitā tatra api durlabhā suptā mahābhāgya karī smṛtā

original: iha loke paratrāpi mokṣadā nātra saṃśayaḥ / navacakrādupakramya viṃśatyantaṃ ca yatra saḥ //
analyzed: iha loke paratra api mokṣa dāḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ navacakrāt upakramya viṃśati antam ca yatra saḥ

original: ananta iti vijñeyo hyanantaphaladāyakaḥ / viśvaṃbharaḥ sa vijñeyo viṃśatyūrdhvaṃ varānane //
analyzed: anantaḥ iti vijñeyaḥ hi ananta phala dāyakaḥ viśvaṃbharaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ viṃśati ūrdhvam varānane

original: tatrāpi kesaraiścaikrarlakṣaṇaiśca samanvitam / kalau tu durlabhaṃ naṇāṃ taddānaṃ cātidurlabham //
analyzed: tatra api kesaraiḥ ca ekrar lakṣaṇaiḥ ca samanvitam kalau tu durlabham tad dānam ca ati durlabham

original: snānaṃ kṛtvā śeṣatīrthe viśuddhenaiva cetasā / eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śrutvā prayāti paramāṃ gatim //
analyzed: snānam kṛtvā śeṣa tīrthe viśuddhena eva cetasā eteṣām lakṣaṇam śrutvā prayāti paramām gatim

original: tataḥ paraṃ mahābhāge vāruṇaṃ tīrthamuttamam / tatrāste varuṇo devaḥ pūjāṃ kartuṃ hareḥ sadā //
analyzed: tatas param mahābhāge vāruṇam tīrtham uttamam tatra āste varuṇaḥ devaḥ pūjām kartum hareḥ sadā

original: tatra snānaṃ prakartavyaṃ dātavyaṃ dānamuttamam / śiśumāraṃ ca matsyaṃ ca trivikramamathāpi vā / dātavyaṃ bhūtikāmena tīrthesminviravarṇini //
analyzed: tatra snānam prakartavyam dātavyam dānam uttamam śiśumāram ca matsyam ca trivikramam atha api vā dātavyam bhūti kāmena tīrthe asmin viravarṇini

original: jaṃbūphalasamākārā pucche sūkṣmā sabindukā / cakratrayā ca vadane pucchopari sacakrakā //
analyzed: jaṃbū phala sama ākārā pucche sūkṣmā sa bindukā cakra trayā ca vadane puccha upari sa cakrakā

original: śrīvatsabindumālāḍhyā matsyamūrtirudāhṛtā / pucchādadhaścakrayutaṃ śiśumāramudāhṛtam //
analyzed: śrīvatsa bindu mālā āḍhyā matsya mūrtiḥ udāhṛtā pucchāt adhas cakra yutam śiśumāram udāhṛtam

original: vakracakrayutaścetsyāttrivikrama udāhṛtaḥ / eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śrutvā vāruṇe tīrtha uttame //
analyzed: vakra cakra yutaḥ ced syāt trivikramaḥ udāhṛtaḥ eteṣām lakṣaṇam śrutvā vāruṇe tīrthe uttame

original: etaddānaphalaṃ prāpya modate viṣṇumandire / pūrvauktā mūrtayo yasmin gṛhe tiṣṭhanti bhāmini / bhāgīrathī tīrthavarā saṃnidhatte na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: etat dāna phalam prāpya modate viṣṇu mandire pūrva uktāḥ mūrtayaḥ yasmin gṛhe tiṣṭhanti bhāmini bhāgīrathī tīrtha varā saṃnidhatte na saṃśayaḥ

original: svāmi puṣkariṇīsnānaṃ durghaṭaṃ tu kalau nṛṇām / tatra sthitānāṃ tīrthānāṃ snānaṃ cāpyatidurghaṭam //
analyzed: svāmi puṣkariṇī snānam durghaṭam tu kalau nṛṇām tatra sthitānām tīrthānām snānam ca api ati durghaṭam

original: śālagrāmaśilādānaṃ durghaṭaṃ ca tathā smṛtām / svāmipuṣkariṇītīre kanyādānaṃ sudurghaṭam //
analyzed: śālagrāma śilā dānam durghaṭam ca tathā smṛtām svāmipuṣkariṇī tīre kanyā dānam su durghaṭam

original: durghaṭaṃ kapilādānaṃ bhakṣyadānaṃ sudurghaṭam / svāmipuṣkariṇītīrthe tīrtheṣvanyeṣu bhāmini //
analyzed: durghaṭam kapilā dānam bhakṣya dānam su durghaṭam svāmipuṣkariṇī tīrthe tīrtheṣu anyeṣu bhāmini

original: snānaṃ kuru yathānyā yaṃ śayyādānaṃ tathā kuru / jaigīṣavyena muninā tvevamuktā ca kanyakā //
analyzed: snānam kuru yathā anyā yam śayyā dānam tathā kuru jaigīṣavyena muninā tu evam uktā ca kanyakā

original: svāmipuṣkariṇīsnānaṃ sā cakāra dhṛtavratā / tīrtheṣveteṣu susnātā dānaṃ cakre subhāminī //
analyzed: svāmi puṣkariṇī snānam sā cakāra dhṛta vratā tīrtheṣu eteṣu su snātā dānam cakre su bhāminī

original: uvāsa tatra sā davī triḥ saptakandināni ca / svāmipuṣkaraṇītīramahimānaṃ śṛṇoti yaḥ / sa yāti paramāṃ bhaktiṃ śrīnivāse jaganmaye //
analyzed: uvāsa tatra sā davī tris sapta kandināni ca svāmipuṣkaraṇī tīra mahimānam śṛṇoti yaḥ sa yāti paramām bhaktim śrīnivāse jagat maye

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe tṛtīyāṃśe brahmakāṇḍe vyaṅkaṭagirimāhātmye svāmipuṣkariṇyāditīrthatatratyadevatadīyaśālagrāmalakṣaṇa  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe tṛtīya aṃśe brahmakāṇḍe vyaṅkaṭagiri māhātmye svāmipuṣkariṇī ādi tīrtha tatratya deva tadīya śālagrāma lakṣaṇa

original: taddānādivarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśodhyāyaḥ
analyzed: taddānādivarṇanam nāma ṣaḍviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam- 27
analyzed: śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

original: śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca / sā gatā snātukāmātha nandāṃ pāpanivāriṇīm / papraccha taṃ guruṃ vipraṃ vinayāvanatā sudhīḥ //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca sā gatā snātu kāmā atha nandām pāpa nivāriṇīm papraccha tam gurum vipram vinaya avanatā sudhīḥ

original: kinnāmeyaṃ nadī vipra kiṃ kāryaṃ cātra me vada / jaigīṣavyastvevamukto vākyametaduvāca ha //
analyzed: kin nāma iyam nadī vipra kim kāryam ca atra me vada jaigīṣavyaḥ tu evam uktaḥ vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: jaigīṣavya uvāca / śṛṇu bhadre pravakṣyāmi māhātmyaṃ pāpanāśanam / iyaṃ nadī mahābhāge sadā pāpavināśinī //
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ uvāca śṛṇu bhadre pravakṣyāmi māhātmyam pāpa nāśanam iyam nadī mahābhāge sadā pāpa vināśinī

original: brahmahatyādipāpaugho yatra snānena naśyati / pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate hyatra snānaṃ kartuṃ samudyataiḥ //
analyzed: brahmahatyā ādi pāpa oghaḥ yatra snānena naśyati pratyakṣam dṛśyate hi atra snānam kartum samudyataiḥ

original: jalaṃ cāśubhrarūpeṇa pāpaiśca paridṛśyate / yāvacchubhrodakaṃ devi tāvatsanānaṃ ca kārayet //
analyzed: jalam ca aśubhra rūpeṇa pāpaiḥ ca paridṛśyate yāvat śubhra udakam devi tāvat sa nānam ca kārayet

original: yāvacchubhrodakaṃ naiva tāvatpāpaṃ na naśyati / śuddhodake samāyāte pāpaṃ naṣṭamiti dhruvam //
analyzed: yāvat śubhra udakam na eva tāvat pāpam na naśyati śuddha udake samāyāte pāpam naṣṭam iti dhruvam

original: kalāvitthaṃ viśālākṣi mahimā dṛśyate bhuvi / atra snānaṃ prakartavyaṃ dātavyaṃ dāna muttamam / tataśca jñānamāsādya viviṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati //
analyzed: kalau ittham viśāla akṣi mahimā dṛśyate bhuvi  atra snānam prakartavyam dātavyam dāna muttamam tatas ca jñānam āsādya viviṣṇu lokam sa gacchati

original: gurustrīgamanāccandra ahalyāyāṃ gato hariḥ / surāpānācca śukrastu suvarṇaharaṇādbaliḥ //
analyzed: guru strī gamanāt candra ahalyāyām gataḥ hariḥ surā pānāt ca śukraḥ tu suvarṇa haraṇāt baliḥ

original: brahmahatyāyāśca rudro nāgo dattāpahārakaḥ / sūtasya hananādrāmo nirmukto hyatra bhāmini //
analyzed: brahmahatyāyāḥ ca rudraḥ nāgaḥ datta apahārakaḥ sūtasya hananāt rāmaḥ nirmuktaḥ hi atra bhāmini

original: nānena sadṛśaṃ tīrthaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati / snānaṃ kuru mahābhāge tena siddhiṃ hyavāpsyasi //
analyzed: na anena sadṛśam tīrtham na bhūtam na bhaviṣyati snānam kuru mahābhāge tena siddhim hi avāpsyasi

original: jaigīṣavyeṇa muninā pitrā saha ca kanyakā / snānaṃ cakāra vidhivadudatiṣṭhacca bhāmini //
analyzed: jaigīṣavyeṇa muninā pitrā saha ca kanyakā snānam cakāra vidhivat udatiṣṭhat ca bhāmini

original: yāvacca pauruṣaṃ sūktaṃ tāvatkālaṃ hi tiṣṭhati / paścājjaptvā mahāmantraṃ veṅkaṭeśābhidhaṃ param //
analyzed: yāvat ca pauruṣam sūktam tāvatkālam hi tiṣṭhati paścāt japtvā mahā mantram veṅkaṭeśa abhidham param

original: dvijātīnprīṇayitvā sā vastradravyādibhūṣaṇaiḥ / tasmācca prayayau devī kamārītīrthamuttamam //
analyzed: dvijātīn prīṇayitvā sā vastra dravya ādi bhūṣaṇaiḥ tasmāt ca prayayau devī kamārītīrtham uttamam

original: kumārīmahimānaṃ ca śrutvā snānaṃ cakāra sā / punarāvṛtya sā devī hyantarā virajānadīm //
analyzed: kumārī mahimānam ca śrutvā snānam cakāra sā  punar āvṛtya sā devī hi antarā virajā nadīm

original: dṛṣṭvā papraccha sā devī jaigīṣavyaṃ guruṃ prabhum / kiṃ saṃjñikeyaṃ viprendra kiṃ kāryaṃ hyatra me vada //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā papraccha sā devī jaigīṣavyam gurum prabhum kim saṃjñikā iyam vipra indra kim kāryam hi atra me vada

original: jaigīṣavyaḥ pṛṣṭa eva muvāca karuṇānidhiḥ / iyaṃ bhāgīrathī kanye āyāti hyantareṇa tu //
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ eva m uvāca karuṇā nidhiḥ iyam bhāgīrathī kanye āyāti hi antareṇa tu

original: ataḥ sā procyate hyantargaṅgeti paramarṣibhiḥ / kanye tvasyāstu salilaṃ śrīninivāsapriyaṃ sadā //
analyzed: atas sā procyate hi antar gaṅgā iti parama ṛṣibhiḥ kanye tu asyāḥ tu salilam śrī ninivāsa priyam sadā

original: atra snānaṃ yaḥ karoti sa yāti paramāṃ gatim / snānaṃ cakāra sā kanyā jale paramapāvane //
analyzed: atra snānam yaḥ karoti sa yāti paramām gatim snānam cakāra sā kanyā jale parama pāvane

original: dānādikaṃ tathā jñātvā jajāpa paramaṃ manum / śrīnivāsasamīpaṃ tu punarāgatya bhāminī //
analyzed: dāna ādikam tathā jñātvā jajāpa paramam manum  śrīnivāsa samīpam tu punar āgatya bhāminī
